question_en: Which Assassin's Creed is the latest released?
pos_context_en: In February 2016, Ubisoft announced they would not be releasing a new game in 2016 in order to step "back and [re-examine] the "Assassin's Creed" franchise... [and take the] year to evolve the game mechanics and to make sure we're delivering on the promise of "Assassin's Creed" offering unique and memorable gameplay experiences". On the decision, Guillemot said that "Ubisoft started to question the annualized franchise with the release of "Assassin's Creed Unity", and the fact that "Assassin's Creed Syndicate" had "a slower launch than expected". Guillemot added that "by moving away from the annual iterations of the franchise, it will give the "Assassin's Creed" teams more time to take advantage of new engines and technology". "Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag"s director Ashraf Ismail, commented on an interview that he and the team would be interested in doing an "Assassin's Creed" game in an Ancient Egyptian setting, along with reiterating an earlier statement that a female leading character was not an impossibility for the series. In May 2017, Ubisoft confirmed the development of "Assassin's Creed Origins". It was announced to be set in the Ptolemaic Egypt in June 2017. The game was released worldwide on October 27, 2017 for PlayStation 4, Xbox One and Windows.
neg_context_en:
On November 12, 2009, Ubisoft released "Assassin's Creed II" themed virtual items on PlayStation Home to promote the release of the game, as well as the game "" for PSP. "Assassin's Creed II" virtual items and an Ezio costume were also released on the Xbox Live Marketplace for the Xbox 360's avatars. On November 19, 2009, more "Assassin's Creed II" virtual items were released in PlayStation Home, along with a costume for Ezio, which was released on November 26, 2009, in which the player could obtain and roam PlayStation Home in it. On December 3, 2009, more 15th century Italian renaissance themed items were released in Home.
Ezio's "Purple Assassin" costume is available to download on "LittleBigPlanet", as of December 8, 2009, on the PlayStation Network.

Ubisoft's senior vice president of sales and marketing, Tony Key, said the game would enjoy the biggest marketing commitment in company history. Ubisoft UK MD Rob Cooper has said that "Assassin's Creed III" is a good entry point for newcomers to the series, and that he thinks "Assassin's Creed III" will hold its own against this year's biggest releases. In March 2012, the "Assassin's Creed: Double Pack" was released both as a retail purchase for PlayStation 3, Xbox 360 and for download on PSN, which brings together the first "Assassin's Creed" and "Assassin's Creed II" in a virtual compilation box.

Following the reports, Ubisoft released "Assassin's Creed III"s official box art on March 1, 2012, which confirmed the game's American Revolution setting. The company said it will announce "all the details" at 5pm on March 5. Additionally, "Game Informer" revealed its latest cover feature, which included more artwork of the game's new main character. On March 2, several screenshots were leaked ahead of Ubisoft's official reveal, and the first gameplay details emerged via "Game Informer".

Assassin's Creed III: Liberation is a 2012 action-adventure video game developed and published by Ubisoft, initially as an exclusive title for PlayStation Vita. Sony announced the game at its press conference during the Electronic Entertainment Expo 2012, few days after first leaks about the game presented in "Game Informer". It was released on October 30, 2012 alongside "Assassin's Creed III", with which it can be linked. The game was re-released as Assassin's Creed: Liberation HD for the PlayStation 3, Xbox 360 and Microsoft Windows via the PlayStation Network, Xbox Live Arcade and Steam, respectively. It was later packed as part of "Assassin's Creed The Americas Collection" for the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360, along with "Assassin's Creed III" and "". In March 2019, the game will be re-released as a part of "Assassin's Creed III Remastered" for PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and Microsoft Windows, featuring 4K HDR, enhanced visuals, an entirely new graphics engine using physics-based lighting, brand new character models, heavily revamped game mechanics and more.

In November 2010, Ubisoft's CEO Yves Guillemot teased "something "Assassin's" related" in 2011, despite an earlier statement by Ubisoft Montreal's Jean-Francois Boivin that no "Assassin's Creed" game will be released in 2011. Geoffroy Sardin of Ubisoft later confirmed that there will be a "big" Assassin's Creed game in 2011. Guillemot also explained that ultimate goal for Ubisoft is to release new games in the franchise annually along with Ubisoft's most popular other franchises. In February 2011, Ubisoft CEO Yves Guillemot confirmed that the next "Assassin's Creed" game would be released during its next fiscal year, which starts on April 1, 2011, and ends on March 31, 2012.

Assassin's Creed Unity is an action-adventure video game developed by Ubisoft Montreal and published by Ubisoft. It was released in November 2014 for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One. It is the eighth major installment in the "Assassin's Creed" series, and the successor to 2013's "". It also has ties to "Assassin's Creed Rogue" which was released for the previous generation consoles, the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 on the same date.

Information on "Origins", then titled "Assassin's Creed Empire", first leaked in January 2017, showing several screenshots of a character on a boat and in front of a cave. The game was officially revealed on June 11, 2017. It was developed using the latest iteration of the AnvilNext engine. During production of "Assassin's Creed III" in November 2011 Ubisoft conducted a fan survey exploring potential settings for future titles. Ancient Egypt was one of the most popular choices, but Alex Hutchinson, the creative director of "Assassin's Creed III", dismissed the results as he considered Ancient Egypt—as with the other two chosen settings, feudal Japan and World War II—as being "the worst choices" for a setting. The development team hired Egyptologists to assist in making the open world more accurate to the time period.

On April 29, 2011 the game's name was released on the official "Assassin's Creed" Facebook page, with a link which led to a flash file. The teaser clip included the words, "Altaïr Ibn La-Ahad, Son of no one" in Arabic which hints that "Altaïr", the main protagonist of the first game, may once again be the main protagonist of the game. A third teaser clip for the game showed the city of Constantinople, which hints at it being the setting for the game. In the E3 rumor section of its April 2011 issue, Xbox World 360 said "Assassin's Creed: Revelations" is not "Assassin's Creed III", but suggests that game is also secretly in the works. "Revelations" was likely to be "another slimline "Brotherhood"-style offering", Xbox World 360 stated. On May 5, "Game Informer" released details of the game, and the game was "officially" announced by Ubisoft at Electronic Entertainment Expo 2011.

In early February 2013, during its quarterly financial call to investors, Ubisoft CEO Yves Guillemot confirmed that the next "Assassin's Creed" game, due for release some time before April 2014, would feature a new hero, time period, and development team. On February 28, 2013, Ubisoft posted their first promotional picture and cover for their next "Assassin's Creed" game, following leaked marketing material days before. It announced the title of the game as "Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag" and featured an unnamed character holding a flintlock and a sword with a black flag in the back ground containing the Assassin's symbol with a skull. A reported glitch on the official "Assassin's Creed IV" website suggested the game will release on next-gen consoles and October 29 as the release date, which was confirmed by the first trailer for the game, released on March 4, 2013 (originally leaked on March 2, 2013, but was quickly pulled by Ubisoft).
question_src: Je! Ni imani ipi ya Assassin ambayo imetolewa hivi karibuni?
pos_context_src: Mnamo Februari 2016, Ubisoft alitangaza kuwa hawatatoa mchezo mpya mnamo 2016 ili kurudisha nyuma "na [kukagua tena] Franchise ya" Assassin's Creed "... [na uchukue] mwaka wa kuibadilisha mechanics ya mchezo na kuhakikisha kuwa tunatoa ahadi ya" Assassin's Creed "inayotoa uzoefu wa kipekee na wa kukumbukwa". Juu ya uamuzi huo, Guillemot alisema kwamba "Ubisoft alianza kuhoji dhamana ya mwaka na kutolewa kwa" Assassin's Creed Unity ", na ukweli kwamba" Assassin's Creed Syndicate "ilikuwa" uzinduzi wa polepole kuliko ilivyotarajiwa ". IV: Mkurugenzi wa Bendera Nyeusi "Ashraf Ismail, alitoa maoni juu ya mahojiano kwamba yeye na timu hiyo wangevutiwa kufanya mchezo wa" Assassin's Creed "katika mpangilio wa zamani wa Wamisri, pamoja na kurudia taarifa ya mapema kwamba mhusika anayeongoza wa kike haikuwa uwezekano wa mfululizo. Mnamo Mei 2017, Ubisoft alithibitisha maendeleo ya" Assassin Creed's Asili ". ilitolewa ulimwenguni mnamo Oktoba 27, 2017 kwa PlayStation 4, Xbox One na Windows.
neg_context_title_src: Imani ya Assassin IV: Bendera Nyeusi
neg_context_src:
Mnamo Novemba 12, 2009, Ubisoft aliachilia vitu vya "Assassin's Creed II" vilivyowekwa kwenye nyumba ya PlayStation ili kukuza kutolewa kwa mchezo, na pia mchezo "" kwa PSP. "Assassin's Creed II" Vitu vya kawaida na mavazi ya Ezio pia yalitolewa kwenye soko la Xbox Live kwa Avatars za Xbox 360. Mnamo Novemba 19, 2009, vitu vya kawaida vya "Assassin's Creed II" vilitolewa nyumbani kwa PlayStation, pamoja na mavazi ya Ezio, ambayo ilitolewa Novemba 26, 2009, ambayo mchezaji angeweza kupata na kuzurura nyumbani kwa PlayStation ndani yake. Mnamo Desemba 3, 2009, zaidi ya karne ya 15 ya Italia Renaissance vitu vilivyotolewa nyumbani.
Mavazi ya Ezio ya "Purple Assassin" inapatikana kupakua kwenye "LittleBigPlanet", kama Desemba 8, 2009, kwenye Mtandao wa PlayStation.

Makamu wa rais mwandamizi wa uuzaji na uuzaji wa Ubisoft, Tony Key, alisema mchezo huo utafurahiya kujitolea kwa uuzaji katika historia ya kampuni. Ubisoft UK MD Rob Cooper alisema kuwa "Assassin's Creed III" ni mahali pazuri kwa wageni kwenye safu hiyo, na kwamba anafikiria "Assassin's Creed III" itashikilia mwenyewe dhidi ya kutolewa kubwa kwa mwaka huu. Mnamo Machi 2012, "Imani ya Assassin's: Double Pack" ilitolewa kama ununuzi wa rejareja kwa PlayStation 3, Xbox 360 na kupakuliwa kwenye PSN, ambayo inaleta pamoja "Assassin's Creed" na "Assassin's Creed II" kwenye sanduku la mkusanyiko.

Kufuatia ripoti hizo, Ubisoft aliachilia sanaa rasmi ya sanduku la "Assassin's Creed III" mnamo Machi 1, 2012, ambayo ilithibitisha mpangilio wa Mapinduzi ya Amerika. Kampuni hiyo ilisema itatangaza "Maelezo yote" saa 5 jioni mnamo Machi 5. Kwa kuongezea, "Mchezo wa Habari" ulifunua kipengee chake cha hivi karibuni, ambacho kilijumuisha mchoro zaidi wa mhusika mkuu wa mchezo huo. Mnamo Machi 2, viwambo kadhaa vilivuja mbele ya kufunuliwa rasmi kwa Ubisoft, na maelezo ya kwanza ya mchezo wa michezo yalitokea kupitia "Mchezo wa Habari".

Assassin's Creed III: Ukombozi ni mchezo wa video wa hatua ya 2012 uliotengenezwa na kuchapishwa na Ubisoft, hapo awali kama jina la kipekee la PlayStation Vita. Sony alitangaza mchezo huo katika mkutano wake wa waandishi wa habari wakati wa Exporn Expo ya Elektroniki 2012, siku chache baada ya uvujaji wa kwanza juu ya mchezo uliowasilishwa katika "Mchezo wa Habari". Iliachiliwa mnamo Oktoba 30, 2012 pamoja na "Assassin's Creed III", ambayo inaweza kuunganishwa. Mchezo huo ulitolewa tena kama Imani ya Assassin: Ukombozi HD kwa PlayStation 3, Xbox 360 na Microsoft Windows kupitia Mtandao wa PlayStation, Xbox Live Arcade na Steam, mtawaliwa. Iliwekwa baadaye kama sehemu ya "Assassin's Creed Mkusanyiko wa Amerika" kwa PlayStation 3 na Xbox 360, pamoja na "Assassin's Creed III" na "". Mnamo Machi 2019, mchezo huo utatolewa tena kama sehemu ya "Creed III ya Assassin" kwa PlayStation 4, Xbox One, na Microsoft Windows, iliyo na 4K HDR, taswira zilizoimarishwa, injini mpya ya picha kwa kutumia taa za msingi wa fizikia, aina mpya za tabia, mechanics ya mchezo iliyobadilishwa sana na zaidi.

Mnamo Novemba 2010, Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa Ubisoft Yves Guillemot alicheka "Kitu" cha Assassin "kinachohusiana" mnamo 2011, licha ya taarifa ya mapema ya Ubisoft Montreal's Jean-Francois Boivin kwamba hakuna mchezo wa "Assassin's Creed" utatolewa mnamo 2011. Geoffroy Sardin wa Ubisoft baadaye alithibitisha kuwa "Assassin". Ubisoft ni kutolewa michezo mpya katika Franchise kila mwaka pamoja na Franchise zingine maarufu za Ubisoft. Mnamo Februari 2011, Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa Ubisoft Yves Guillemot alithibitisha kwamba mchezo ujao wa "Assassin's Creed" utatolewa katika mwaka wake ujao wa fedha, ambao unaanza Aprili 1, 2011, na kumalizika Machi 31, 2012.

Umoja wa Assassin's Creed ni mchezo wa video-adventure uliotengenezwa na Ubisoft Montreal na kuchapishwa na Ubisoft. Ilitolewa mnamo Novemba 2014 kwa Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4 na Xbox One. Ni awamu kuu ya nane katika safu ya "Assassin's Creed", na mrithi wa 2013's "". Pia ina uhusiano na "Creed Rogue ya Assassin" ambayo ilitolewa kwa Consoles za kizazi kilichopita, PlayStation 3 na Xbox 360 kwa tarehe hiyo hiyo.

Habari juu ya "Asili", kisha iliyopewa jina la "Dola ya Creed ya Assassin", ilivuja kwa mara ya kwanza mnamo Januari 2017, ikionyesha picha kadhaa za mhusika kwenye mashua na mbele ya pango. Mchezo huo ulifunuliwa rasmi mnamo Juni 11, 2017. Iliandaliwa kwa kutumia iteration ya hivi karibuni ya injini ya AnvilNext. Wakati wa utengenezaji wa "Assassin's Creed III" mnamo Novemba 2011 Ubisoft alifanya uchunguzi wa shabiki kuchunguza mipangilio inayowezekana ya majina ya baadaye. Misri ya Kale ilikuwa moja ya chaguo maarufu, lakini Alex Hutchinson, mkurugenzi wa ubunifu wa "Assassin's Creed III", alitupilia mbali matokeo kama alivyozingatia Misri ya zamani - kama ilivyo kwa mipangilio mingine miwili iliyochaguliwa, Japan ya Feudal na Vita vya Kidunia vya pili - kama "chaguo mbaya zaidi" kwa mpangilio. Timu ya maendeleo iliajiri Wamisri kusaidia katika kuifanya ulimwengu wazi kuwa sahihi zaidi kwa kipindi cha wakati.

Mnamo Aprili 29, 2011 jina la mchezo huo lilitolewa kwenye ukurasa rasmi wa Facebook wa "Assassin's Creed", na kiunga ambacho kilisababisha faili ya flash. Sehemu ya chai ni pamoja na maneno, "Altaïr ibn la-Ahad, mwana wa mtu yeyote" kwa Kiarabu ambayo inaonyesha kwamba "Altaïr", mhusika mkuu wa mchezo wa kwanza, anaweza tena kuwa mhusika mkuu wa mchezo huo. Sehemu ya tatu ya mchezo wa mchezo ilionyesha jiji la Constantinople, ambalo linaonyesha kuwa ni mpangilio wa mchezo. Katika sehemu ya uvumi ya E3 ya toleo lake la Aprili 2011, Xbox World 360 ilisema "Imani ya Assassin: Ufunuo" sio "Assassin's Creed III", lakini inaonyesha kwamba mchezo huo pia uko kwenye kazi za siri. "Ufunuo" inaweza kuwa "nyingine ndogo" Udugu "-style inayotoa", Xbox World 360 ilisema. Mnamo Mei 5, "Mchezo wa Habari" ulitoa maelezo ya mchezo huo, na mchezo huo "ulitangazwa rasmi" na Ubisoft huko Electronic Entertainment Expo 2011.

Mwanzoni mwa Februari 2013, wakati wa simu yake ya kifedha ya wawekezaji, Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa Ubisoft Yves Guillemot alithibitisha kwamba mchezo ujao wa "Assassin's Creed", kwa sababu ya kutolewa muda kabla ya Aprili 2014, ungeonyesha shujaa mpya, kipindi cha wakati, na timu ya maendeleo. Mnamo Februari 28, 2013, Ubisoft alituma picha yao ya kwanza ya kukuza na kufunika kwa mchezo wao ujao wa "Assassin's Creed", kufuatia siku za uuzaji zilizovuja siku zilizopita. Ilitangaza kichwa cha mchezo kama "Assassin's Creed IV: Bendera Nyeusi" na ilionyesha tabia isiyo na jina iliyoshikilia blintlock na upanga na bendera nyeusi kwenye ardhi ya nyuma iliyo na alama ya Assassin na fuvu. Glitch iliyoripotiwa kwenye wavuti rasmi ya "Assassin's Creed IV" ilionyesha mchezo huo utatolewa kwa mioyo ijayo na Oktoba 29 kama tarehe ya kutolewa, ambayo ilithibitishwa na trela ya kwanza ya mchezo huo, iliyotolewa Machi 4, 2013 (hapo awali ilivuja Machi 2, 2013, lakini ilitolewa haraka na Ubisoft).
report_src: Mchezo wa hivi karibuni katika mfululizo wa “Assassin’s Creed” uliotolewa ni “Assassin’s Creed Origins”, ambao ulizinduliwa duniani kote tarehe 27 Oktoba 2017 kwa PlayStation 4, Xbox One na Windows [1].
all_claims: Mchezo wa hivi karibuni katika mfululizo wa “Assassin’s Creed” uliotolewa ni “Assassin’s Creed Origins”, ambao ulizinduliwa duniani kote tarehe 27 Oktoba 2017 kwa PlayStation 4, Xbox One na Windows [1].
claims_w_citations: Mchezo wa hivi karibuni katika mfululizo wa “Assassin’s Creed” uliotolewa ni “Assassin’s Creed Origins”, ambao ulizinduliwa duniani kote tarehe 27 Oktoba 2017 kwa PlayStation 4, Xbox One na Windows [1].
claims_retained: Mchezo wa hivi karibuni katika mfululizo wa “Assassin’s Creed” uliotolewa ni “Assassin’s Creed Origins”, ambao ulizinduliwa duniani kote tarehe 27 Oktoba 2017 kwa PlayStation 4, Xbox One na Windows [1].

question_en: What is Captain Cold's real name?
pos_context_en: Captain Cold (Leonard Snart) is a fictional supervillain/antihero appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics. Captain Cold is the leader of the Rogues, a loose criminal association, as well as the older brother of Golden Glider. An acquaintance of the various superheroes known as the Flash, he has served as a bitter enemy to Barry Allen, both enemy and grudging friend to Wally West, and one of the regretting killers of Bart Allen. As part of 2011's The New 52 reboot, Captain Cold is a villain that with his team The Rogues lives by a code to never kill and sometimes can be perceived as a hero.
neg_context_en: Captain Cold was declared the leader of the Flash's Rogues Gallery. His skill and experience have made him a strong leader to the likes of the Weather Wizard, the new Trickster, the new Mirror Master, and the new Captain Boomerang. Len seems to have taken the young Captain Boomerang under his wing, after the elder Boomerang was recently killed. Tabloids rumoured that Captain Cold's sister, the Golden Glider, was Boomerang's mother, making him Captain Cold's nephew. This turned out to be false, however, as the new Boomerang's mother has been revealed to be Meloni Thawne, who is also the mother of Bart Allen. Despite his more ruthless nature as of late, Captain Cold's heart is not completely frozen, evidenced by having sent flowers to honor Sue Dibny, murdered wife of the Elongated Man.

In "Little Orphan Hero", it is revealed that Hero's real name is Leslie and in "Nipple Ring-Ring Goes to Foster Care" that he earned the name "Captain Hero" when he was 12 years old and masturbated with a hero sandwich in public. What would occur in a continuous spiral is Captain Hero telling his 12-year-old self (through a walkie-talkie via an electrical storm) to do stupid things. Captain Hero says that the one that did this to him told him to "go screw a garbage disposal", thus causing the "accident" that lost his penis – although he has been shown to possess one, and is particularly resilient to physical harm; he had a sexual relationship with Foxxy for an episode, in which they explored increasingly harmful parasexual activities, including disembowelment.

Real name unknown, Copperhead is a crime boss in Central City, as well as a former mercenary. She is an antagonist of both Batman and the Flash.
Two-Face placed a large bounty on Batman's head that many super-villains and mercenaries intended to collect, including Copperhead. Alongside several other villains Copperhead tracked down the Bat to a active train. Climbing on board the train Copperhead attempted to kill Batman but he was able to escape by jumping into a flowing stream.
After a brief stint of assassinations and other mercenary jobs, Copperhead was called up to lead her families' crime business in Central City. After a mysterious rival boss started muscling in on her territory she decided to hire several mercenaries to enforce her rule, two of these mercenaries were Shrapnel and Black Spider. However Black Spider was arrested by the Flash for robbing a diamond exchange, and Shrapnel was arrested after murdering the Road Reapers. Soon after this another pair of mercenaries were apprehended by the Flash- Trigger Twins, this prompted Copperhead to open negotiations with the mysterious crimelord whom she discovered was Captain Cold of the Rogues, in order to find away to defeat the Flash. Copperhead followed Cold's plan to eliminate the Flash, but Cold turned on her when he planted a cold bomb in a weapons delivery. The Flash was able to save her after he apprehended Cold, but without any evidence of her involvement she was allowed to walk free.

During the events of "Underworld Unleashed", Captain Cold lost his soul to Neron but Wally West brought it back to the land of the living. He soon returned to crime, this time a member of Wally's Rogues Gallery. The Rogues had first been assembled when another Flash foe, the super-intelligent Gorilla Grodd had broken them out of jail to distract the Flash. The Golden Glider had abandoned her bounty hunter career and had started partnering with a series of thugs who she dressed in a costume, armed with a copy of Captain Cold's signature Cold Gun, and called Chillblaine. Already distraught over the death of her lover, the Top, it seemed that the supposed death of her brother pushed her over the edge. But the last Chillblaine was a little smarter and more vicious. He murdered the Golden Glider, prompting Captain Cold to hunt him down, torture him and kill him by freezing his outer layer of skin and then pushing him off a high rise building. Not long after that, Snart was framed by a new incarnation of Mister Element. He used his Element Gun to simulate Cold's gun, using ice and cold to murder several police officers before Captain Cold and the Flash discovered who was actually responsible. With the death of his sister, and having killed Chillblaine and Mr. Element in vengeance, Cold has again become an unrepentant criminal. However, during a confrontation with Brother Grimm, Cold actually worked with Wally West to defeat the powerful magic user, although this was mainly because he and Mirror Master had been betrayed by Grimm and wanted revenge.

In the 2008 miniseries "", Captain Cold and the Rogues briefly joined Libra's Secret Society of Super Villains. In "" story, however, Cold and the rest of the Rogues reject Libra's offer, wanting to stay out of the game. Before they can retire, they hear of Inertia escaping and decide to stick around long enough to get revenge for being used. Cold and his group are challenged by a new set of Rogues, formed by Libra to be their replacements. The new group, having kidnapped Cold's father, challenge the Rogues, and are defeated and killed. Cold goes to his father, talking to him about the abuse he suffered, and the fate of his sister. After the elder Snart insults him and his mother, calling them weak, Cold punches him, but finds himself unable to kill him, instead getting Heat Wave to do it. The Rogues have their confrontation with Inertia, despite interference by Zoom and Libra, and kill Inertia. Libra then reveals that he needs the Rogues because Barry Allen has returned from the dead, and the Flashes are potential threats to him and Darkseid. Though shocked by the news that Allen is alive, Cold still rejects his offer of membership. After regrouping, Cold and the other Rogues agree not to retire, claiming that the game is back on. In "Final Crisis" #7, someone that looks like Captain Cold appears as a Justifier and is seen fighting the Female Furies alongside the other Justifiers under Lex Luthor's control.

In the timeline of the 2011 company-wide reboot of all its superhero titles, The New 52, Captain Cold is reintroduced as a younger man than in the previous timeline and now with his Rogues lives with a code to never kill. His origin remains the same, however, his sister Lisa has not been the Golden Glider, and is instead dying of cancer. Upon learning that the hospital does not have enough energy to power a laser that could save her life, because of an EMP seemingly caused by the Flash, Cold blames him for everything that has happened to him, including a falling out with the Rogues, and decides to break the rules of their "game" and kill the Flash. Captain Cold has undergone experiments that have given him ice-based metahuman powers, including the ability to slow down the molecules around him, creating a field of inertia that reduces the Flash's speed to human level, allowing Captain Cold to touch him and effortlessly beat him. He and the Rogues are set to return, but later defeated them with help from Flash, and the Pied Piper.

Traditionally, Captain Cold is driven by three things: money, women, and the desire to beat Barry Allen. Although not the lecher that Captain Boomerang was, Len Snart has an eye for the ladies, particularly models. When Barry Allen died, Captain Cold drifted for a while, jumping back and forth over the lines of crime and justice. He was captured by the Manhunter and served time in the Suicide Squad, worked with his sister as a bounty hunter (Golden Snowball Recoveries), and, with his longtime friend and sometimes nemesis Heat Wave, encountered Fire and Ice of the Justice League. He has teamed up with various villains over the years other than the many Rogues. These include Catwoman and the Secret Society of Super Villains. His favorite baseball team is the Houston Astros.

On the ABC animated series "Challenge of the Super Friends", Captain Cold is one of two Flash villains (along with Grodd) that appear as members of Lex Luthor's Legion of Doom. Dick Ryal provided the voice of Captain Cold. This version of Captain Cold was depicted as having pale blue skin.

In 1988 Gallo founded the heavy metal band "Cold Shot" recruiting singer/songwriter Adam Murray, bassist Erin Bartley, and drummer Rikki Baggett. The name "Cold Shot" (a suggestion by Murray) was not inspired from Stevie Ray Vaughan's song of the same name.Murray was working a construction job. His boss described his ex as "A real cold shot". Cold Shot played alongside such bands as the Bullet Boys, Bang Tango, Guns and Roses and Motörhead. Cold Shot disbanded in 1994. In November 2012 Cold Shot signed a record deal with Eönian Records to release all their previously unreleased material.
question_src: Je! Jina halisi la Kapteni Cold ni nani?
pos_context_src: Kapteni Cold (Leonard Snart) ni msimamizi wa hadithi/antihero anayeonekana katika vitabu vya vichekesho vya Amerika vilivyochapishwa na Jumuia za DC. Kapteni Cold ndiye kiongozi wa Rogues, chama cha wahalifu huru, na vile vile kaka mkubwa wa Glider Glider. Jamaa wa mashujaa mbalimbali wanaojulikana kama The Flash, amewahi kuwa adui mwenye uchungu kwa Barry Allen, adui na rafiki wa kuhuzunisha kwa Wally West, na mmoja wa wauaji wa kujuta wa Bart Allen. Kama sehemu ya mwaka wa 2010 mpya wa 52, Kapteni Cold ni villain ambayo na timu yake Rogues huishi kwa nambari ya kamwe kuua na wakati mwingine inaweza kutambuliwa kama shujaa.
neg_context_title_src: Orodha ya marafiki wakuu wa marafiki
neg_context_src: Kapteni Cold alitangazwa kiongozi wa nyumba ya sanaa ya The Flash's Rogues. Ustadi wake na uzoefu wake umemfanya kuwa kiongozi hodari wa kupenda kwa Mchawi wa Hali ya Hewa, Trickster mpya, New Mirror Master, na Kapteni mpya Boomerang. Len anaonekana kuchukua Kapteni mdogo Boomerang chini ya bawa lake, baada ya mzee Boomerang kuuawa hivi karibuni. Tabloids alisikika kwamba dada ya Kapteni Cold, The Glider Glider, alikuwa mama wa Boomerang, na kumfanya kuwa mpwa wa Kapteni Cold. Hii iligeuka kuwa ya uwongo, hata hivyo, kama mama mpya wa Boomerang amefunuliwa kuwa Meloni Thawne, ambaye pia ni mama wa Bart Allen. Licha ya hali yake mbaya zaidi kama ya marehemu, moyo wa Kapteni Cold haujahifadhiwa kabisa, umethibitishwa na kuwa na maua ya kumheshimu Sue Dibny, mke wa mtu huyo aliyeinuliwa.

Katika "Kidogo cha Orphan shujaa", imefunuliwa kuwa jina halisi la shujaa ni Leslie na katika "Nipple Ring-Ring huenda kwa utunzaji" kwamba alipata jina "Kapteni shujaa" wakati alikuwa na umri wa miaka 12 na alipiga punyeto na sandwich ya shujaa hadharani. Kile kingetokea katika ond inayoendelea ni Kapteni shujaa kumwambia mtu wake wa miaka 12 (kupitia mseto wa kuongea kupitia dhoruba ya umeme) kufanya vitu vya kijinga. Kapteni shujaa anasema kwamba yule aliyemfanyia hivi alimwambia "aende screw utupaji wa takataka", na hivyo kusababisha "ajali" ambayo ilipoteza uume wake - ingawa ameonyeshwa kuwa na mtu mmoja, na ana nguvu sana kwa madhara ya mwili; Alikuwa na uhusiano wa kimapenzi na Foxxy kwa sehemu, ambayo waligundua shughuli zinazozidi kuwa mbaya za parasexual, pamoja na kuteremka.

Jina halisi haijulikani, Copperhead ni bosi wa uhalifu katika Central City, na pia mamluki wa zamani. Yeye ni mpinzani wa wote Batman na Flash.
Uso-mbili uliweka fadhila kubwa juu ya kichwa cha Batman ambayo villain nyingi na mamluki walikusudia kukusanya, pamoja na shaba. Kando na wabaya wengine kadhaa wakuu walifuatilia bat kwa treni inayofanya kazi. Kupanda kwenye bodi ya treni ya treni ilijaribu kumuua Batman lakini aliweza kutoroka kwa kuruka kwenye mkondo unaotiririka.
Baada ya mauaji mafupi ya mauaji na kazi zingine za huruma, Copperhead aliitwa kuongoza biashara ya uhalifu wa familia zake katika Jiji la Kati. Baada ya bosi wa mpinzani wa ajabu kuanza kutengenezea kwenye eneo lake aliamua kuajiri mamluki kadhaa ili kutekeleza utawala wake, mbili kati ya mamluki haya yalikuwa mabamba na buibui nyeusi. Walakini Spider Nyeusi alikamatwa na Flash kwa kuiba kubadilishana almasi, na Shrapnel alikamatwa baada ya kuua wavunaji wa barabara. Mara tu baada ya jozi hii nyingine ya mamluki kukamatwa na Mapacha wa Flash- trigger, hii ilisababisha Copperhead kufungua mazungumzo na Crimelord ya ajabu ambaye aligundua alikuwa Kapteni Baridi wa Rogues, ili kupata mbali kushinda Flash. Copperhead ilifuata mpango wa Cold kuondoa taa hiyo, lakini baridi ilimgeukia wakati alipanda bomu baridi katika utoaji wa silaha. Flash iliweza kumuokoa baada ya kukamata baridi, lakini bila ushahidi wowote wa kuhusika kwake aliruhusiwa kutembea huru.

Wakati wa matukio ya "Underworld kufunguliwa", Kapteni Cold alipoteza roho yake kwa Neron lakini Wally West alirudisha katika nchi ya walio hai. Hivi karibuni alirudi kwa uhalifu, wakati huu mwanachama wa Nyumba ya sanaa ya Wally's Rogues. Rogues walikuwa wamekusanyika mara ya kwanza wakati adui mwingine wa Flash, Gorilla Grodd mwenye akili nyingi alikuwa amewavunja gerezani ili kuvuruga Flash. Glider ya dhahabu ilikuwa imeachana na kazi yake ya wawindaji wa fadhila na alikuwa ameanza kushirikiana na safu ya majambazi ambao alikuwa amevaa mavazi, akiwa na nakala ya bunduki ya Baridi ya Kapteni Cold, na akaitwa Chillblaine. Tayari alikuwa na mashaka juu ya kifo cha mpenzi wake, juu, ilionekana kuwa kifo cha kaka yake kilimsukuma juu ya makali. Lakini chillblaine ya mwisho ilikuwa nadhifu kidogo na mbaya zaidi. Aliua glider ya dhahabu, na kumfanya Kapteni Cold amwinde, amtese na kumuua kwa kufungia safu yake ya nje ya ngozi na kisha kumsukuma kwenye jengo kubwa la kupanda. Sio muda mrefu baada ya hapo, Snart aliandaliwa na mwili mpya wa kitu cha Mister. Alitumia bunduki yake ya kuiga bunduki ya Cold, kwa kutumia barafu na baridi kuua maafisa kadhaa wa polisi kabla ya Kapteni Cold na Flash kugundua ni nani aliyewajibika. Pamoja na kifo cha dada yake, na baada ya kumuua Chillblaine na Mr. Element kwa kulipiza kisasi, baridi tena imekuwa mhalifu asiyetubu. Walakini, wakati wa mzozo na Ndugu Grimm, Baridi alifanya kazi na Wally West kumshinda mtumiaji huyo mwenye nguvu wa uchawi, ingawa hii ni kwa sababu yeye na Mirror Master walikuwa wamesalitiwa na Grimm na walitaka kulipiza kisasi.

Katika miniseries ya 2008 "", Kapteni Cold na Rogues walijiunga kwa kifupi Jumuiya ya Siri ya Libra ya Super Villains. Katika hadithi ya "", hata hivyo, baridi na wengine wa Rogues wanakataa toleo la Libra, wakitaka kukaa nje ya mchezo. Kabla ya kustaafu, wanasikia ya kutoroka kwa hali ya juu na kuamua kushikamana muda wa kutosha kulipiza kisasi kwa kutumiwa. Baridi na kikundi chake wanapingwa na seti mpya ya Rogues, iliyoundwa na Libra kuwa nafasi zao. Kundi hilo jipya, baada ya kumteka nyara baba ya Cold, changamoto ya Rogues, na wameshindwa na kuuawa. Baridi huenda kwa baba yake, akizungumza naye juu ya unyanyasaji aliopata, na hatima ya dada yake. Baada ya mzee Snart kumtukana yeye na mama yake, kuwaita dhaifu, baridi humchoma, lakini hujikuta akishindwa kumuua, badala yake kupata wimbi la joto kuifanya. Rogues wana mzozo wao na hali ya ndani, licha ya kuingiliwa na Zoom na Libra, na kuua inertia. Libra basi anafunua kuwa anahitaji Rogues kwa sababu Barry Allen amerudi kutoka kwa wafu, na taa hizo ni vitisho vinavyowezekana kwake na Darkseid. Ingawa alishtushwa na habari kwamba Allen yuko hai, Cold bado anakataa toleo lake la ushirika. Baada ya kujipanga tena, baridi na Rogues nyingine wanakubali kutostaafu, wakidai kuwa mchezo umerudi. Katika "Mgogoro wa Mwisho" #7, mtu ambaye anaonekana kama Kapteni Cold anaonekana kama halali na anaonekana akipigana na Fedha za Kike pamoja na wahalali wengine chini ya udhibiti wa Lex Luthor.

Katika ratiba ya kuanza tena kampuni ya mwaka 2011 ya majina yake yote superhero, mpya 52, Kapteni Cold anafanywa tena kama mtu mdogo kuliko wakati wa zamani na sasa na watu wake wazima wanaishi na nambari ya kamwe kuua. Asili yake inabaki kuwa sawa, hata hivyo, dada yake Lisa hajakuwa mtu wa dhahabu, na badala yake anakufa na saratani. Baada ya kujifunza kuwa hospitali haina nguvu ya kutosha ya nguvu ya laser ambayo inaweza kuokoa maisha yake, kwa sababu ya EMP inayoonekana kusababishwa na Flash, baridi humlaumu kwa kila kitu ambacho kimetokea kwake, pamoja na kuanguka nje na Rogues, na kuamua kuvunja sheria za "mchezo" wao na kuua Flash. Kapteni Cold amepata majaribio ambayo yamempa nguvu za metahuman zenye msingi wa barafu, pamoja na uwezo wa kupunguza kasi ya molekuli karibu naye, na kuunda uwanja wa inertia ambao unapunguza kasi ya Flash kwa kiwango cha mwanadamu, kumruhusu Kapteni Cold kumgusa na kumpiga kwa nguvu. Yeye na Rogues wanapaswa kurudi, lakini baadaye wakawashinda kwa msaada kutoka kwa Flash, na Piper Pied.

Kijadi, Kapteni Cold anaendeshwa na vitu vitatu: pesa, wanawake, na hamu ya kumpiga Barry Allen. Ingawa sio lecher ambayo Kapteni Boomerang alikuwa, Len Snart ana jicho kwa wanawake, haswa mifano. Wakati Barry Allen alikufa, Kapteni Cold aliteleza kwa muda, akaruka nyuma na mbele juu ya mistari ya uhalifu na haki. Alitekwa na Manhunter na akatumikia wakati katika kikosi cha kujiua, alifanya kazi na dada yake kama wawindaji wa fadhila (kupona kwa theluji ya dhahabu), na, na rafiki yake wa muda mrefu na wakati mwingine Nemesis Heat Wave, alikutana na moto na barafu ya Ligi ya Haki. Ameshirikiana na wabaya mbali mbali kwa miaka mingine zaidi ya watu wengi. Hizi ni pamoja na Catwoman na Jumuiya ya Siri ya Super Villains. Timu yake ya kupenda ya baseball ni Houston Astros.

Kwenye safu ya michoro ya ABC "Changamoto ya Marafiki wa Super", Kapteni Cold ni mmoja wa wabaya wawili wa Flash (pamoja na Grodd) ambao wanaonekana kama washiriki wa Lex Luthor's Jeshi la Doom. Dick Ryal alitoa sauti ya Kapteni Cold. Toleo hili la Kapteni Cold lilionyeshwa kuwa na ngozi ya rangi ya bluu.

Mnamo 1988 Gallo alianzisha bendi nzito ya chuma "Cold Shot" kuajiri mwimbaji/mtunzi wa wimbo Adam Murray, bassist Erin Bartley, na mpiga ngoma Rikki Baggett. Jina "Cold Shot" (maoni ya Murray) halikuhamasishwa kutoka kwa wimbo wa Stevie Ray Vaughan wa jina moja.Murray alikuwa akifanya kazi ya ujenzi. Bosi wake alielezea zamani wake kama "risasi baridi". Baridi risasi ilicheza kando na bendi kama vile wavulana wa risasi, bang tango, bunduki na roses na motörhead. Baridi ya risasi iliondolewa mnamo 1994. Mnamo Novemba 2012 Baridi ya Baridi ilisaini mpango wa rekodi na Eönian Records kuachilia nyenzo zao zote ambazo hazikufunguliwa hapo awali.

question_en: Did the Stackhouse books get made into a show?
pos_context_en: Eric Northman is a fictional character in "The Southern Vampire Mysteries," a series of thirteen books written by "New York Times" bestselling author Charlaine Harris. He is a vampire, slightly over one thousand years old, and is first introduced in the first novel, "Dead Until Dark" and appears in all subsequent novels. Since the book series is told from the first person perspective of Sookie Stackhouse, what readers perceive of his character is influenced by what Sookie comprehends. HBO's television series "True Blood" is based on this book series and the character of Eric Northman is portrayed somewhat differently. A list of "True Blood" characters has a detailed description of Eric's character from the TV show.
neg_context_en: Sometime in the mid 1840s, the botanist Charles Alexander Johns saw Stackhouse's watercolours and asked her to provide illustrations for a series of popular natural history books that he was publishing through the Society for Promoting Christian Knowledge. The first two were "Forest Trees of Britain" (1847) and "A Week at the Lizard" (1848, focusing on the Lizard peninsula in Cornwall); in both, some of the illustrations were engravings based on watercolours by Stackhouse, uncredited, but signed 'E.S.' This was followed by Johns's best-known book, "Flowers of the Field", published in two volumes in 1851 with over 200 uncredited illustrations by Stackhouse. Referred to as "the bible of the amateur botanist," its success was such that it went into more than 50 editions and was still in print a century after it first came out. In addition, after Johns and Stackhouse were dead, the SPCK continued to use Stackhouse's images in other books; it is estimated that they had been printed in at least 15 and as many as 30 different books by the end of the 19th century.

In 1967, George Mitchell recorded Stackhouse, Curtis and Nighthawk as the Blues Rhythm Boys in Dundee, Mississippi. Nighthawk died shortly after the recording was made. Another field researcher, David Evans, recorded Stackhouse in Crystal Springs. By 1970, following the deaths of Curtis and Mason, Stackhouse had moved to Memphis, Tennessee, where he resided with his old friend Wilkins and his wife, Carrie. At the height of the blues revival Stackhouse toured with Wilkins and with the Memphis Blues Caravan and performed at various music festivals.

Emily Stackhouse (15 July 1811 – 1 April 1870) was a 19th-century Cornish botanical artist and plant collector. She collected and painted flowers and mosses throughout the British isles, and her work was widely reproduced in a series of popular books issued by the Society for Promoting Christian Knowledge. Many of her watercolours show that she had collected and depicted specific plants years earlier than their accredited discovery in Cornwall, and it is now acknowledged that she collected and classified nearly all of the British mosses.

Stackhouse tutored Jimmy Rogers and Sammy Lawhorn in guitar techniques. Between 1948 and 1954, he worked during the day at the Chrysler plant in West Helena, Arkansas, and played the blues in his leisure time. He did not move from the South, unlike many of his contemporaries, and continued to perform locally into the 1960s with Frank Frost, Boyd Gilmore and Baby Face Turner. In May 1965, Sonny Boy Williamson II, who was by then back on "King Biscuit Time", used Stackhouse as an accompanist when he was recorded in concert by Chris Strachwitz of Arhoolie Records. The recording, entitled "King Biscuit Time", was issued under Williamson's name. Shortly afterwards, Williamson died. Stackhouse continued briefly on the radio program, back in tandem with Nighthawk.

The Sookie Stackhouse Companion is a book written by Charlaine Harris and published by Ace Hardcover/Ace Books (an imprint of Berkley Books, owned by Penguin Random House) on 30 August 2011, which later went on to win the Anthony Award for Best Critical Non-Fiction in 2012.

Houston Stackhouse (September 28, 1910 – September 23, 1980) was an American Delta blues guitarist and singer. He is best known for his association with Robert Nighthawk. He was not especially noted as a guitarist or singer, but Nighthawk showed gratitude to Stackhouse, his guitar teacher, by backing him on a number of recordings in the late 1960s. Apart from a brief tour in Europe, Stackhouse confined his performing to the area around the Mississippi Delta.

She taught in schools in both Indianapolis and Chicago. She wrote for the "Chicago Tribune" under the pseudonym "Nora Marks" from 1888 to 1890, and later became publisher of the Little Chronicle Publishing Company, Chicago; this published several of her own works, along with other educational books and the "Little Chronicle", an illustrated newspaper intended for young children. Whilst she wrote both fiction and non-fiction, the former mostly romances and the latter mostly educational books, she is best known for her 1912 novel "Greyfriars Bobby". This popular work recounted the famous story of the eponymous dog; most of the modern versions of the story seem to stem from her form of the tale. Many details of the book, especially those regarding the dog's master are inaccurate; until recently it was assumed that she had no opportunity for original research of her setting. It seems likely that she worked from the basic story and embellished it from her own imagination. The story, however, "is" lovingly detailed; the descriptions of the geography may be somewhat confused, but effort was clearly made to get names correct, and to get across the atmosphere of the city. Unusually for someone with no connection to the country, her portrayal of the local accent was convincing and strongly phrased; this suggests it is possible she picked up the story directly from Scottish immigrants to the Midwest.

When the novel begins, Sookie Stackhouse is still recovering physically and emotionally from the torture she received at the hands of demented fairies Lochlan and Neave in the previous book ("Dead and Gone"). She has finally settled into a relationship with the Viking vampire Eric, and her errant brother Jason seems to have his life in order, too, with a solid new girlfriend, Michele. But all the other people in Sookie’s life—Eric himself, her former lover Bill, her friend and boss Sam—are having family problems. Eric’s maker, Appius Livius Ocella, shows up with Eric’s ‘brother’ in tow—he is Alexei Romanov, only son of the last Czar of Russia, who as an adolescent witnessed the Bolshevik Revolution, including the slaughter of his entire family. He developed emotional problems as a result. Appius has sought Eric out as a last resort, to see if Eric can help restore Alexei to sanity. Meanwhile, Bill is still suffering from the silver poisoning he got via the teeth of Neave when he rescued Sookie from her torturers. He is not getting better, and may only be able to be cured by the blood of a vampire made by Bill's maker, the dead Lorena, but Bill refuses to ask his sibling for help.

Stackhouse appeared on the editorial masthead of "Christianity Today" from 1994 until 2018, and served as a contributing editor for "Books & Culture" and "Christian History & Biography" magazines. He is a former columnist with "Christian Week" and the "Winnipeg Free Press", and resumed his column with "Faith Today" in 2009. He served as senior advisor to the Centre for Research on Canadian Evangelicalism from its genesis in 2008 to 2010. He currently blogs weekly for "Context with Lorna Dueck," a leading Canadian Christian public affairs television program, and writes occasionally for the Religion News Service, "Sightings" (produced at the University of Chicago Divinity School), and other media.

The book is often considered a classic, especially for children, and has been reprinted several times; it was the basis for the films "Challenge to Lassie" (MGM, 1949) and "Greyfriars Bobby" (Disney, 1961), although both of these postdated her death. Both films starred Donald Crisp.

In "True Blood", an HBO series based on the earliest books in the series, the character of Eric Northman is played by Swedish actor Alexander Skarsgård. Some details of the character are portrayed somewhat differently on "True Blood" than in the books. In the series, Eric is created by Godric, with whom he shares a deep bond of loyalty and devotion. In season 2 Godric commits suicide by exposing himself to sunlight, causing Eric to shed bloody vampire tears, however, in the novels he cries for the first time in book 9. In the series, Bill, rather than Eric, saves Sookie from Long Shadow (in the books Eric kills him). Eric has not demonstrated the outward concern for Sookie that he exhibited in the early novels, but he appears to be developing an uneasy, guarded affection for her and the series seems to portray a reluctance on his part to show people, particularly Sookie, his genuine emotions. Often Eric has presented himself to Sookie as violent, arrogant, mischievous and consciously manipulative. Thus far in the series he has usually acted in a manner with little apparent concern for Sookie's feelings or immediate safety, although ultimately he seems to protect her.
question_src: Je! Vitabu vya Stackhouse vilitengenezwa kuwa onyesho?
pos_context_src: Eric Northman ni tabia ya uwongo katika "The Southern Vampire Siri," mfululizo wa vitabu kumi na tatu vilivyoandikwa na mwandishi wa "New York Times" Charlaine Harris. Yeye ni vampire, zaidi ya umri wa miaka elfu moja, na huletwa kwanza katika riwaya ya kwanza, "Dead hadi Giza" na inaonekana katika riwaya zote za baadaye. Kwa kuwa safu ya kitabu inaambiwa kutoka kwa mtazamo wa mtu wa kwanza wa Sookie Stackhouse, kile wasomaji wanaona tabia yake huathiriwa na kile Sookie anaelewa. Mfululizo wa runinga wa HBO "Damu ya Kweli" ni msingi wa safu hii ya kitabu na tabia ya Eric Northman imeonyeshwa tofauti. Orodha ya wahusika wa "Damu ya Kweli" ina maelezo ya kina ya tabia ya Eric kutoka kwenye kipindi cha Runinga.
neg_context_src: Wakati fulani katikati ya miaka ya 1840, mtaalam wa mimea Charles Alexander Johns aliona maji ya Stackhouse na kumuuliza atoe vielelezo kwa safu ya vitabu maarufu vya historia ya asili ambavyo alikuwa akichapisha kupitia jamii ya kukuza maarifa ya Kikristo. Wawili wa kwanza walikuwa "Miti ya Misitu ya Briteni" (1847) na "Wiki huko Lizard" (1848, ikilenga Peninsula ya Lizard huko Cornwall); Katika zote mbili, vielelezo vingine vilikuwa maandishi ya msingi wa maji na Stackhouse, ambayo hayajakadiriwa, lakini ilisainiwa 'E.S.' Hii ilifuatiwa na kitabu kinachojulikana cha Johns, "Maua ya Shamba", iliyochapishwa katika vitabu viwili mnamo 1851 na vielelezo zaidi ya 200 visivyo na alama na Stackhouse. Imetajwa kama "Bibilia ya Botanist ya Amateur," mafanikio yake yalikuwa kwamba iliingia katika matoleo zaidi ya 50 na bado yalikuwa yakichapishwa karne moja baada ya kutoka kwa mara ya kwanza. Kwa kuongezea, baada ya Johns na Stackhouse kufa, SPCK iliendelea kutumia picha za Stackhouse kwenye vitabu vingine; Inakadiriwa kuwa walikuwa wamechapishwa angalau 15 na vitabu 30 tofauti mwishoni mwa karne ya 19.

Mnamo 1967, George Mitchell alirekodi Stackhouse, Curtis na Nighthawk kama wavulana wa Blues Rhythm huko Dundee, Mississippi. Nightawk alikufa muda mfupi baada ya kurekodi kufanywa. Mtafiti mwingine wa uwanja, David Evans, alirekodi Stackhouse katika Crystal Springs. Kufikia 1970, kufuatia vifo vya Curtis na Mason, Stackhouse alikuwa amehamia Memphis, Tennessee, ambapo aliishi na rafiki yake wa zamani Wilkins na mkewe, Carrie. Katika urefu wa uamsho wa Blues Stackhouse iliguswa na Wilkins na Msafara wa Memphis Blues na kufanywa katika sherehe mbali mbali za muziki.

Emily Stackhouse (15 Julai 1811-1 Aprili 1870) alikuwa msanii wa karne ya 19 ya Cornish na ushuru wa mimea. Alikusanya na kuchora maua na mosses katika Visiwa vya Uingereza, na kazi yake ilitolewa sana katika safu ya vitabu maarufu vilivyotolewa na Jumuiya ya kukuza maarifa ya Kikristo. Wengi wa maji yake yanaonyesha kuwa alikuwa amekusanya na kuonyesha mimea maalum miaka mapema kuliko ugunduzi wao ulioidhinishwa huko Cornwall, na sasa inakubaliwa kuwa alikusanya na kuainisha karibu wote wa Mosses wa Uingereza.

Stackhouse alifundisha Jimmy Rogers na Sammy Lawhorn katika mbinu za gita. Kati ya 1948 na 1954, alifanya kazi wakati wa mchana katika mmea wa Chrysler huko West Helena, Arkansas, na kucheza Blues wakati wake wa burudani. Hakuhama kutoka Kusini, tofauti na watu wengi wa wakati wake, na aliendelea kufanya mazoezi ndani ya miaka ya 1960 na Frank Frost, Boyd Gilmore na Baby Suce Turner. Mnamo Mei 1965, Sonny Boy Williamson II, ambaye wakati huo alikuwa nyuma kwenye "Mfalme wa Biscuit", alitumia Stackhouse kama msaidizi wakati alirekodiwa katika tamasha na Chris Strachwitz wa Arhoolie Record. Rekodi hiyo, iliyopewa jina la "Mfalme wa Biscuit Time", ilitolewa chini ya jina la Williamson. Muda kidogo baadaye, Williamson alikufa. Stackhouse iliendelea kwa ufupi kwenye kipindi cha redio, nyuma sanjari na NightAwk.

Mshirika wa Sookie Stackhouse ni kitabu kilichoandikwa na Charlaine Harris na kuchapishwa na Ace Hardcover/Ace Vitabu (maandishi ya Vitabu vya Berkley, inayomilikiwa na Penguin Random House) mnamo 30 Agosti 2011, ambayo baadaye iliendelea kushinda tuzo ya Anthony kwa hadithi isiyo ya kweli mnamo 2012.

Houston Stackhouse (Septemba 28, 1910 - Septemba 23, 1980) alikuwa gitaa na mwimbaji wa Amerika ya Delta Blues. Anajulikana zaidi kwa ushirika wake na Robert NightHawk. Hakujulikana sana kama mpiga gita au mwimbaji, lakini Nighthawk alionyesha shukrani kwa Stackhouse, mwalimu wake wa gita, kwa kumuunga mkono kwenye rekodi kadhaa mwishoni mwa miaka ya 1960. Mbali na safari fupi huko Uropa, Stackhouse alifunga mazoezi yake kwa eneo linalozunguka Delta ya Mississippi.

Alifundisha mashuleni katika Indianapolis na Chicago. Aliandika kwa "Chicago Tribune" chini ya jina la "Nora Marks" kutoka 1888 hadi 1890, na baadaye akawa mchapishaji wa Kampuni ya Little Chronicle Publishing, Chicago; Hii ilichapisha kazi zake kadhaa, pamoja na vitabu vingine vya elimu na "Mambo ya Nyakati", gazeti lililoonyeshwa lililokusudiwa watoto wadogo. Wakati aliandika hadithi za uwongo na zisizo za uwongo, mapenzi ya zamani na vitabu vya mwisho vya elimu, anajulikana zaidi kwa riwaya yake ya 1912 "Greyfriars Bobby". Kazi hii maarufu ilisimulia hadithi maarufu ya mbwa asiyejulikana; Toleo nyingi za kisasa za hadithi zinaonekana kutoka kwa aina yake ya hadithi. Maelezo mengi ya kitabu, haswa wale kuhusu bwana wa mbwa sio sahihi; Hadi hivi karibuni ilidhaniwa kuwa hakuwa na nafasi ya utafiti wa awali wa mpangilio wake. Inaonekana kwamba alifanya kazi kutoka kwa hadithi ya msingi na kuipamba kutoka kwa mawazo yake mwenyewe. Hadithi, hata hivyo, "ni" ina maelezo ya upendo; Maelezo ya jiografia yanaweza kuchanganyikiwa, lakini juhudi zilifanywa wazi ili kupata majina sahihi, na kupata mazingira ya jiji. Kwa kawaida kwa mtu asiye na uhusiano na nchi, picha yake ya lafudhi ya eneo hilo ilikuwa ya kushawishi na kusambazwa sana; Hii inaonyesha kuwa inawezekana alichukua hadithi moja kwa moja kutoka kwa wahamiaji wa Scottish kwenda Midwest.

Wakati riwaya inapoanza, Sookie Stackhouse bado anapona kimwili na kihemko kutokana na mateso aliyopokea mikononi mwa Fairies ya Demented Lochlan na Neave kwenye kitabu cha zamani ("Dead and Gone"). Mwishowe ameishi katika uhusiano na Vampire wa Viking Eric, na kaka yake anayetenda Jason anaonekana kuwa na maisha yake katika utaratibu, pia, na rafiki mpya wa kike, Michele. Lakini watu wengine wote katika maisha ya Sookie - Seri mwenyewe, mpenzi wake wa zamani, rafiki yake na bosi Sam - wana shida ya kifamilia. Mtengenezaji wa Eric, Appius Livius Ocella, anajitokeza na 'kaka' wa Eric - ni Alexei Romanov, mtoto wa pekee wa Czar wa mwisho wa Urusi, ambaye kama kijana alishuhudia mapinduzi ya Bolshevik, pamoja na kuuawa kwa familia yake yote. Alipata shida za kihemko kama matokeo. Appius amemtafuta Eric kama njia ya mwisho, ili kuona ikiwa Eric anaweza kusaidia kurejesha Alexei kwa Sanity. Wakati huo huo, Bill bado anaugua sumu ya fedha aliyopata kupitia meno ya Neave wakati aliokoa Sookie kutoka kwa watekaji wake. Yeye hajazidi kuwa bora, na anaweza tu kuponywa na damu ya vampire iliyotengenezwa na mtengenezaji wa Bill, Lorena aliyekufa, lakini Bill anakataa kumuuliza ndugu yake msaada.

Stackhouse alionekana kwenye masthead ya wahariri wa "Ukristo Leo" kutoka 1994 hadi 2018, na kutumika kama mhariri anayechangia wa "Vitabu na Utamaduni" na "Historia ya Christian & Biografia". Yeye ni mwandishi wa zamani wa safu na "Wiki ya Kikristo" na "Winnipeg Free Press", na akaanza tena safu yake na "Imani Leo" mnamo 2009. Alihudumu kama mshauri mwandamizi wa Kituo cha Utafiti juu ya Uinjilishaji wa Canada kutoka Mwanzo wake mnamo 2008 hadi 2010. Kwa sasa anablogi kila wiki kwa "muktadha wa Lorna Dueck," Masikio ya Waandishi wa Habari wa Canada, "Sevaings of Seurse," Sevenings "Ovessions of Seurse," Sevensings "Ovessions of a, Densi ya Univings," Sevensings "Overing" Sevensings "Overings," Ovening Canassings Affer am a, " Chicago Divinity School), na media zingine.

Kitabu mara nyingi huchukuliwa kuwa cha kawaida, haswa kwa watoto, na kimechapishwa tena mara kadhaa; Ilikuwa msingi wa filamu "Changamoto kwa Lassie" (MGM, 1949) na "Greyfriars Bobby" (Disney, 1961), ingawa zote mbili zilisababisha kifo chake. Filamu zote mbili zilikuwa na nyota Donald Crisp.

Katika "Damu ya Kweli", safu ya HBO kulingana na vitabu vya mapema katika safu hiyo, tabia ya Eric Northman inachezwa na muigizaji wa Uswidi Alexander Skarsgård. Maelezo kadhaa ya mhusika huonyeshwa kwa njia tofauti kwenye "damu ya kweli" kuliko kwenye vitabu. Katika safu hiyo, Eric ameumbwa na Godric, ambaye anashiriki naye dhamana kubwa ya uaminifu na kujitolea. Katika Msimu wa 2 Godric anajiua kwa kujiweka wazi kwa jua, na kusababisha Eric kumwaga machozi ya damu ya Vampire, hata hivyo, katika riwaya hizo analia kwa mara ya kwanza katika Kitabu cha 9. Katika safu hiyo, Bill, badala ya Eric, anaokoa Sookie kutoka kwa Kivuli cha muda mrefu (katika vitabu Eric vinamuua). Eric hajaonyesha wasiwasi wa nje kwa Sookie aliouonyesha katika riwaya za mapema, lakini anaonekana kuwa akiendeleza mapenzi, alilindwa kwake na mfululizo unaonekana kuonyesha kusita kwake kuonyesha watu, haswa Sookie, hisia zake za kweli. Mara nyingi Eric amejitolea kwa Sookie kama vurugu, kiburi, mafisadi na mwenye busara. Hadi sasa katika safu hiyo kawaida amefanya kwa njia isiyo na wasiwasi mdogo kwa hisia za Sookie au usalama wa haraka, ingawa mwishowe anaonekana kumlinda.
report_src: Ndiyo, vitabu vya mfululizo wa Sookie Stackhouse (The Southern Vampire Series) vilibadilishwa kuwa mfululizo wa runinga wa HBO uitwao “Damu ya Kweli” (“True Blood”) ambao umetegemea moja kwa moja matukio na wahusika wa vitabu hivyo [1].

question_en: Where are Porsches manufactured?
pos_context_en: First launched in the 2006 model year, the Cayman is a coupé derived from Porsche's second and third generation Boxster roadster, styled in its first iteration by Pinky Lai. A large percentage of the Boxsters were assembled in Finland for Porsche by Valmet Automotive with others assembled in Zuffenhausen, Stuttgart. All Caymans were manufactured in Finland by Valmet Automotive. Porsche's Deputy Chairman, Holger P. Haerter said the contract with Valmet Automotive would end in 2012, and the Cayman's production was to be outsourced to Magna Steyr in Graz, Austria. As Volkswagen assumed control of Porsche AG, production of Caymans and Boxsters after 2012 began in the former Karmann plant in Osnabrück, Germany, at the time owned by Volkswagen and also used for production of the 2012 Golf (Mk6) convertible.
neg_context_en: The company also started work on a new design, the Porsche 356, the first car to carry the Porsche brand name. The company then was located in Gmünd in Carinthia, where they had relocated from Stuttgart to avoid Allied bombing. The company started manufacturing the Porsche 356 in an old saw mill in Gmünd. They made only 49 cars, which were built entirely by hand.

Porsche GmbH had manufactured about 100 chassis for their unsuccessful proposal for the Tiger tank, the "Porsche Tiger", in the Nibelungenwerk factory in Sankt Valentin, Austria. Both the successful Henschel proposal and the Porsche design used the same Krupp-designed turret—the Henschel design had its turret more-or-less centrally located on its hull, while the Porsche design placed the turret much closer to the front of the superstructure. Since the competing Henschel Tiger design was chosen for production, the Porsche chassis were no longer required for the Tiger tank project. It was therefore decided that the Porsche chassis were to be used as the basis of a new heavy panzerjäger, "Ferdinand", mounting Krupp's newly developed "Panzerjägerkanone 43/2" (PaK 43) anti-tank gun. This precise long-range weapon was intended to destroy enemy tanks before they came within their own range of effective fire.

At the Internationale Automobil-Ausstellung (Frankfurt Motor Show) in Frankfurt in September 1963, Porsche presented its successor to the Porsche 356 as the 901. It took several more months until the cars were manufactured for sale to customers. Between 14 September and 16 November 1964, 82 cars were built and the 901 was presented in October at the 1964 Paris Auto Salon. There, French car maker Peugeot objected to Porsche using any three digit number where the middle number was 0, asserting ownership of the naming rights in key markets, and having already sold many models with that scheme.

The Porsche Carrera GT (Project Code 980) is a mid-engine sports car that was manufactured by German automobile manufacturer Porsche between 2004–2007. Sports Car International named the Carrera GT number one on its list of Top Sports Cars of the 2000s, and number eight on Top Sports Cars of All Time list. For its advanced technology and development of its chassis, Popular Science magazine granted the "Best of What's New" award in 2003.

As the company grew the product categories diversified. There are three possibilities how designs made by Porsche Design can appear — Porsche Design brand products made exclusively for Porsche Design; products bearing the manufacturer's name and the writing "Design by F.A. Porsche"; and products with no hint of Porsche Design at all. Porsche Design came up with several bathroom designs, a washing machine, furniture, knives, television receivers, desk lamps (one with three telescoping radio antennas attaching the light bulb holder to the base and one employing design aspects of a guillotine in its pull-out mechanism), tobacco pipes with air-cooled-engine-inspired cooling fins, pens made out of wire-cloth used in oil hoses for racing engines, computer monitors, computer external hard drives, coffee makers, and even a grand piano for an Austrian manufacturer Bösendorfer. The "Design by F.A. Porsche" mark is used no more, with the exception of the professional kitchen knives of CHROMA Cnife.

The production version was unveiled at the 2013 Frankfurt Motor Show. The 2014 model year 918 Spyder was produced in a limited series and it was developed in Weissach and assembled in Zuffenhausen. Porsche manufactured 918 units as a 2014 model year and production started on November 18, 2013, with deliveries scheduled to begin in December 2013. Sales in the United States began in June 2014. Pricing for the 918 Spyder started at (~ or ). According to its battery size, the 918 Spyder was eligible to a federal tax credit of up to .

After the family decided to change the company's legal form and to keep the family out of its management, Ferdinand Alexander founded his own industrial design company, Porsche Design, in Stuttgart, Germany, which was later moved to Zell am See, Austria, where the Porsche family owns an estate called Schüttgut. The first product Porsche Design created was a chronograph wristwatch made by Swiss watchmaker company Orfina. Its design started while F.A. was still working at the Porsche Style bureau. It was launched in 1973 and was different from other chronograph wristwatches, as its case and bracelet were made out of matte black chromed steel. It was intended as accessory for Porsche drivers and sold by the Porsche dealers. It operated the then-new Valjoux 7750 movement, which is today still the most widespread mechanical movement for chronograph wristwatches. As many customers would have liked a normally-coloured watch, a version with bead-blasted stainless steel was issued. Later the movement was changed to the Lemania 5100, which was a simple and rugged movement mainly used for military watches. The Porsche Design Chrono I was made in different versions — color of case and straps, print on dial — for several country's air forces, as well as the NATO alliance.

The Porsche Panamera is an executive car (E-segment in Europe) manufactured by the German automobile manufacturer Porsche. It is front-engined and has a rear-wheel-drive layout, with all-wheel drive versions also available. It is the only sedan manufactured by Porsche as part of its strategy of expanding its market.

Porsche Holding GmbH, headquartered in Salzburg, Austria, was founded by Louise Piëch and Ferry Porsche (daughter and son of Ferdinand Porsche) in 1947 as Porsche Konstruktionen GesmbH in Gmünd, Austria. After Porsche 360 Grand Prix racing car was designed by Ferry Porsche with help from the engineers of his father's design office for Cisitalia in 1947, the company started manufacturing Porsche 356, starting with the prototype Porsche 356/1 and then 356/2 in 1948 at the factory located in a saw mill in Gmünd, and later at a factory in Salzburg.
question_src: Porsches zinatengenezwa wapi?
pos_context_src: Ilizinduliwa kwa mara ya kwanza katika mwaka wa mfano wa 2006, Cayman ni coupe inayotokana na kizazi cha pili na cha tatu cha Boxster Roadster, kilichoundwa katika iteration yake ya kwanza na Pinky Lai. Asilimia kubwa ya Boxsters walikusanyika nchini Ufini kwa Porsche na Valmet Magari na wengine waliokusanyika huko Zuffenhausen, Stuttgart. Caymans wote walitengenezwa nchini Ufini na Valmet Automotive. Mwenyekiti wa Naibu wa Porsche, Holger P. Haerter alisema mkataba na Valmet Automotive utamalizika mnamo 2012, na uzalishaji wa Cayman ulipaswa kutolewa kwa Magna Steyr huko Graz, Austria. Kama Volkswagen alivyodhani udhibiti wa Porsche AG, utengenezaji wa Caymans na Boxsters baada ya 2012 kuanza katika mmea wa zamani wa Karmann huko Osnabrück, Ujerumani, wakati unaomilikiwa na Volkswagen na pia kutumika kwa uzalishaji wa gofu ya 2012 (MK6).
neg_context_src: Kampuni hiyo pia ilianza kufanya kazi kwenye muundo mpya, Porsche 356, gari la kwanza kubeba jina la chapa ya Porsche. Kampuni hiyo wakati huo ilikuwa katika Gmünd huko Carinthia, ambapo walikuwa wamehama kutoka Stuttgart ili kuepusha mabomu ya Allies. Kampuni hiyo ilianza kutengeneza Porsche 356 katika kinu cha zamani cha Saw huko Gmünd. Walifanya magari 49 tu, ambayo yalijengwa kabisa kwa mkono.

Porsche GmbH alikuwa ametengeneza chasi 100 kwa pendekezo lao lisilofanikiwa la tank ya Tiger, "Porsche Tiger", katika kiwanda cha Nibelungenwerk huko Sankt Valentin, Austria. Pendekezo zote mbili za Henschel zilizofanikiwa na muundo wa Porsche ulitumia turret hiyo iliyoundwa na Krupp-muundo wa Henschel ulikuwa na turret yake zaidi au chini ya serikali kuu, wakati muundo wa Porsche uliweka turret karibu sana mbele ya muundo wa juu. Kwa kuwa muundo wa Henschel Tiger ulioshindana ulichaguliwa kwa uzalishaji, chasi ya Porsche haikuhitajika tena kwa mradi wa tank ya Tiger. Kwa hivyo iliamuliwa kwamba chasi ya Porsche ilipaswa kutumiwa kama msingi wa panzerjäger nzito mpya, "Ferdinand", iliyowekwa "Krupp mpya ya" Panzerjägerkanone 43/2 "(PAK 43) bunduki ya anti-tank. Silaha hii ya masafa marefu ilikusudiwa kuharibu mizinga ya adui kabla ya kuja ndani ya moto wao wenyewe.

Kwenye Internationale Automobil-Aussstellung (Frankfurt Motor Show) huko Frankfurt mnamo Septemba 1963, Porsche aliwasilisha mrithi wake kwa Porsche 356 kama 901. Ilichukua miezi kadhaa zaidi hadi magari yalipotengenezwa kwa wateja. Kati ya tarehe 14 Septemba na 16 Novemba 1964, magari 82 yalijengwa na 901 iliwasilishwa mnamo Oktoba mnamo 1964 Paris Auto Salon. Huko, mtengenezaji wa gari la Ufaransa Peugeot alikataa Porsche kwa kutumia nambari yoyote ya nambari tatu ambapo nambari ya kati ilikuwa 0, akidai umiliki wa haki za kumtaja katika masoko muhimu, na tayari ameuza mifano mingi na mpango huo.

Porsche Carrera GT (Mradi wa Mradi 980) ni gari la michezo ya katikati ambayo ilitengenezwa na mtengenezaji wa gari wa Ujerumani Porsche kati ya 2004-2007. Sports Car International iliyopewa jina la Carrera GT namba moja kwenye orodha yake ya magari ya juu ya michezo ya miaka ya 2000, na nambari ya nane kwenye magari ya juu ya michezo ya orodha yote ya wakati. Kwa teknolojia yake ya hali ya juu na ukuzaji wa chasi yake, gazeti maarufu la sayansi liliruhusu tuzo ya "Best of What's New" mnamo 2003.

Wakati kampuni ilikua aina ya bidhaa iliyogawanywa. Kuna uwezekano tatu jinsi miundo iliyotengenezwa na muundo wa Porsche inaweza kuonekana - bidhaa za bidhaa za muundo wa Porsche zilizotengenezwa tu kwa muundo wa Porsche; bidhaa zilizo na jina la mtengenezaji na uandishi "Ubunifu na F.A. Porsche"; na bidhaa ambazo hazina ladha ya muundo wa Porsche hata. Ubunifu wa Porsche ulikuja na miundo kadhaa ya bafuni, mashine ya kuosha, fanicha, visu, wapokeaji wa televisheni, taa za dawati (moja iliyo na antennas tatu za redio zinazoshikilia mmiliki wa balbu nyepesi kwenye msingi na moja inayotumia muundo wa Guillotine kwa njia yake ya kuvuta, bomba za tumbaku zilizowekwa ndani ya vitu vya kuchoma-vifungo vya kuchoma-vifungo vilivyochomwa na Injini za mbio, wachunguzi wa kompyuta, vifaa vya nje vya kompyuta, watengenezaji wa kahawa, na hata piano kubwa kwa mtengenezaji wa Austria Bösendorfer. Alama ya "Ubunifu wa F.A. Porsche" haitumiki tena, isipokuwa visu za jikoni za kitaalam za chroma cnife.

Toleo la uzalishaji lilifunuliwa kwenye Maonyesho ya Magari ya Frankfurt ya 2013. Spyder ya mfano wa mwaka wa 2014 918 ilitengenezwa katika safu ndogo na ilitengenezwa huko Weissach na kukusanyika huko Zuffenhausen. Porsche ilitengeneza vitengo 918 kama mfano wa mwaka wa 2014 na uzalishaji ulianza Novemba 18, 2013, na usafirishaji uliopangwa kuanza Desemba 2013. Uuzaji nchini Merika ulianza mnamo Juni 2014. Bei ya Spyder 918 ilianza (~ au). Kulingana na saizi yake ya betri, Spyder 918 ilistahiki mkopo wa ushuru wa shirikisho hadi.

Baada ya familia kuamua kubadilisha fomu ya kisheria ya kampuni hiyo na kuweka familia nje ya usimamizi wake, Ferdinand Alexander alianzisha kampuni yake ya kubuni ya viwanda, Porsche Design, huko Stuttgart, Ujerumani, ambayo baadaye ilihamishiwa Zell Am See, Austria, ambapo familia ya Porsche inamiliki mali inayoitwa Schüttgut. Ubunifu wa kwanza wa bidhaa ya Porsche iliyoundwa ilikuwa wristwatch ya chronograph iliyotengenezwa na kampuni ya Uswisi ya Watchmaker Orfina. Ubunifu wake ulianza wakati F.A. ilikuwa bado inafanya kazi katika Ofisi ya Sinema ya Porsche. Ilizinduliwa mnamo 1973 na ilikuwa tofauti na viboko vingine vya chronograph, kwani kesi yake na bangili zilitengenezwa kwa chuma cha matte nyeusi. Ilikusudiwa kama nyongeza ya madereva ya Porsche na kuuzwa na wafanyabiashara wa Porsche. Iliendesha harakati mpya ya Valjoux 7750 ya wakati huo, ambayo leo bado ni harakati iliyoenea zaidi ya mitambo kwa wristwatches za chronograph. Kama wateja wengi wangependa saa ya rangi ya kawaida, toleo lililo na chuma cha pua kilichochomwa kilitolewa. Baadaye harakati hiyo ilibadilishwa kuwa Lemania 5100, ambayo ilikuwa harakati rahisi na rugged iliyotumika sana kwa lindo za jeshi. Ubunifu wa Porsche Chrono nilifanywa katika matoleo tofauti - rangi ya kesi na kamba, kuchapisha kwenye piga - kwa vikosi kadhaa vya anga vya nchi, na vile vile Ushirikiano wa NATO.

Porsche Panamera ni gari la mtendaji (sehemu ya e-Ulaya) iliyotengenezwa na mtengenezaji wa gari wa Ujerumani Porsche. Imewekwa mbele na ina mpangilio wa gari-gurudumu la nyuma, na matoleo ya gari-gurudumu pia yanapatikana. Ni sedan pekee iliyotengenezwa na Porsche kama sehemu ya mkakati wake wa kupanua soko lake.

Porsche akiwa ameshikilia GmbH, makao yake makuu huko Salzburg, Austria, ilianzishwa na Louise Piëch na Ferry Porsche (binti na mtoto wa Ferdinand Porsche) mnamo 1947 kama Porsche Konstruktionen Gesmbh huko Gmünd, Austria. Baada ya gari la mbio za Porsche 360 ​​Grand Prix zilibuniwa na Ferry Porsche kwa msaada kutoka kwa wahandisi wa ofisi ya kubuni ya baba yake kwa Cisitalia mnamo 1947, kampuni ilianza kutengeneza Porsche 356, ikianza na mfano wa Porsche 356/1 na kisha 356/2 mnamo 1948 huko Saltory huko Sald katika GMün.
report_src: Kwa mujibu wa taarifa zilizopo, asilimia kubwa ya Boxster za kizazi cha pili na cha tatu hukusanywa nchini Ufini katika kiwanda cha Valmet Automotive, huku idadi ndogo zikitengenezwa kwenye makao makuu ya Porsche huko Zuffenhausen, Stuttgart, Ujerumani [1]. Cayman zote za awali zilitengenezwa pia Ufini katika Valmet Automotive [1]. Mkataba na Valmet ulipangwa kumalizika mwaka 2012, na mpango wa awali ulikuwa kuhamishia uzalishaji wa Cayman kwa Magna Steyr mjini Graz, Austria [1]. Baada ya Volkswagen kuchukua udhibiti wa Porsche AG, uzalishaji wa Boxster na Cayman ulianza 2012 katika kiwanda cha zamani cha Karmann kilichoko Osnabrück, Ujerumani [1].
