question_en: When was Gona Barracks built?
pos_context_en: Gona Barracks is a heritage-listed barracks at 3, 7,12, 25 & 26 Gona Parade, Kelvin Grove, City of Brisbane, Queensland, Australia. It was built from to 1960s. It is also known as Kelvin Grove Military Reserve and Kelvin Grove Training Area. It was added to the Queensland Heritage Register on 7 February 2005.
neg_context_en: The former Gona Barracks is important in demonstrating the pattern of Queensland's history as evidence of Queensland's preparations for military involvement in various world conflicts. Specifically, Gona Barracks is associated with the expansion of military training for militia forces after the introduction of compulsory military training in 1911, the provision of facilities for specialist militia units, and the continuation of voluntary military forces until 1998. The place contains World War I drill halls built for militia units of infantry, and more specialised groups such as the artillery, engineers and service corps, and as such demonstrates the extent of the various sections of the armed forces at the time and the commitment of the citizen soldiers who composed these units. The general size of the barracks site also demonstrates the site's early history as the Brisbane Grammar School endowment, from 1879 to 1911.

During the 1960s the Australian Army began renaming their barracks sites, drawing on prominent battles for the names. The Kelvin Grove site became "Gona Barracks", derived from the Battle of Gona, fought between Japanese and Australian troops on the north coast of Papua New Guinea between 16 November and 9 December 1942. The barracks continued to evolve and new military units moved to the site. In 1965 five brick houses were built along Blamey Street at a cost of for use as married quarters. Two of the houses were later removed from Blamey Street, and the remaining three were excised from the barracks site. In 1966 the parade ground area was resealed in order to install two helicopter landing pads, while by the 1980s, a new steel demountable lecture room was constructed where the former riding school once stood. Another building, the 1934 staff officers quarters, was removed and relocated to Witton Barracks at Indooroopilly in 1974. In the 1970s portions of army land were acquired by the Main Roads Department for various road works adjoining the site, while another portion was sold and became part of the Kelvin Grove Campus of Queensland University of Technology.

In October 1998, following a period of scaling down of activity at the site, Gona Barracks officially closed. Units based at the barracks were dispersed to other Army bases, the museum shifted to Enoggera and a war memorial flagpole sent out to the Royal Australian Regiment Memorial Walk and Contemplation Building at Enoggera.

The Gona Barracks site was established just prior to World War I in the 1910s, for the purpose of military training for specialist units of compulsory militia forces. The site continued to develop and became a Citizens Military Force training complex in the 1950s, and later an Army Reserve recruitment centre.
Gona Barracks was listed on the Queensland Heritage Register on 7 February 2005 having satisfied the following criteria.

The World War I era buildings in the upper barracks area of Gona Barracks demonstrate rare aspects of Queensland's cultural heritage as a surviving precinct of buildings from this period, and as examples of the early design of buildings by the Commonwealth. The concentration of drill halls, and the number of different types of drill halls for the various services sited at one location was not a common military practice at the time. The gun park, services, artillery and engineers drill halls are rare surviving examples of their type.

Gona Barracks has a special association with a substantial part of Queensland's military community. As a military training ground since the early years of World War I until 1998, thousands of servicemen and women have an association with the site which has played an active role during the major periods of defence organisation in this country. In more recent years, it has functioned as an Army recruiting centre, particularly for the Army Reserve who were based at the site.

The Engineers area is reached immediately upon entering the lower barracks from Blamey Street. A group of seven buildings are loosely organised around a bitumen area, and include administration buildings, a bridging store, an armoury and quartermasters store, an RAE training assembly hall and a 1970s prefabricated lecture room. The bridging store is a timber-framed shed building, while the other structures in the Engineers area are timber or steel framed buildings, set on concrete stumps and featuring weatherboard cladding and corrugated iron or steel roofs. The Engineers buildings are a mixture of structures built both on-site, and relocated from Wacol Army Barracks in 1953.

The settlement of Brisbane began in 1825 with the establishment of a penal colony along that part of the Brisbane River that was later to become the town's central business district. Transportation of convicts ceased less than twenty years later in 1842, and Brisbane was opened to free settlement. The town was surveyed, and land to the north and west of Spring Hill, an area of early settlement, was made into park land. West of Victoria Park, the largest of the government reserves, the area now known as Kelvin Grove was cleared, and subdivided and offered for sale by the 1860s. The site that was eventually to become Gona Barracks was listed as Portion 322, Parish of North Brisbane, County of Stanley.
question_src: Je! Gona Barracks ilijengwa lini?
pos_context_src: Gona Barracks ni kambi iliyoorodheshwa ya urithi saa 3, 7,12, 25 & 26 Gona Parade, Kelvin Grove, Jiji la Brisbane, Queensland, Australia. Ilijengwa kutoka 1960s. Inajulikana pia kama Kelvin Grove Hifadhi ya Kijeshi na eneo la Mafunzo ya Kelvin Grove. Iliongezwa kwa Jalada la Urithi wa Queensland mnamo 7 Februari 2005.
neg_context_src: Barracks ya zamani ya Gona ni muhimu katika kuonyesha muundo wa historia ya Queensland kama ushahidi wa maandalizi ya Queensland ya ushiriki wa kijeshi katika mizozo mbali mbali ya ulimwengu. Specifically, Gona Barracks is associated with the expansion of military training for militia forces after the introduction of compulsory military training in 1911, the provision of facilities for specialist militia units, and the continuation of voluntary military forces until 1998. The place contains World War I drill halls built for militia units of infantry, and more specialised groups such as the artillery, engineers and service corps, and as such demonstrates the extent of the various sections ya vikosi vya jeshi wakati huo na kujitolea kwa askari wa raia ambao walijumuisha vitengo hivi. Saizi ya jumla ya tovuti ya Barracks pia inaonyesha historia ya mapema ya tovuti kama Endowment ya Shule ya Grammar ya Brisbane, kutoka 1879 hadi 1911.

Wakati wa miaka ya 1960 jeshi la Australia lilianza kutaja maeneo yao ya kambi, wakichora vita maarufu kwa majina. Wavuti ya Kelvin Grove ikawa "Gona Barracks", inayotokana na Vita vya Gona, ilipigana kati ya askari wa Kijapani na Australia kwenye pwani ya kaskazini ya Papua New Guinea kati ya Novemba 16 na 9 Desemba 1942. Barracks iliendelea kufuka na vitengo vipya vya jeshi vilihamia kwenye tovuti. Mnamo 1965 nyumba tano za matofali zilijengwa kando ya Mtaa wa Comey kwa gharama ya matumizi kama robo za ndoa. Nyumba mbili baadaye ziliondolewa kutoka kwa Mtaa wa Blamey, na tatu zilizobaki zilitolewa kutoka kwa tovuti ya kambi. Mnamo mwaka wa 1966 eneo la gwaride la gwaride liliandaliwa ili kufunga pedi mbili za kutua za helikopta, wakati mnamo miaka ya 1980, chumba kipya cha mihadhara cha chuma kilijengwa ambapo shule ya zamani ya kupanda ilisimama mara moja. Jengo lingine, maafisa wa wafanyikazi wa 1934, liliondolewa na kuhamishiwa Witton Barracks huko Indooroopilly mnamo 1974. Katika miaka ya 1970 sehemu za ardhi za jeshi zilipatikana na idara kuu ya barabara kwa kazi mbali mbali za barabara zinazoambatana na tovuti, wakati sehemu nyingine iliuzwa na ikawa sehemu ya Chuo cha Kelvin Grove cha Chuo Kikuu cha Queensland cha Teknolojia.

Mnamo Oktoba 1998, kufuatia kipindi cha kuongeza shughuli kwenye tovuti, Gona Barracks ilifungwa rasmi. Vitengo vilivyowekwa kwenye kambi vilitawanywa kwa besi zingine za Jeshi, jumba la kumbukumbu lilihamia Enoggera na bendera ya kumbukumbu ya vita iliyotumwa kwa Jumba la Ukumbusho la Kikosi cha Australia na Jengo la Tafakari huko Enoggera.

Tovuti ya Gona Barracks ilianzishwa kabla ya Vita vya Kwanza vya Kidunia mnamo 1910, kwa madhumuni ya mafunzo ya kijeshi kwa vitengo maalum vya vikosi vya wanamgambo vya lazima. Tovuti iliendelea kukuza na ikawa raia wa mafunzo ya jeshi la wanajeshi mnamo miaka ya 1950, na baadaye kituo cha kuajiri wa Jeshi la Jeshi.
Gona Barracks aliorodheshwa kwenye Jalada la Urithi wa Queensland mnamo 7 Februari 2005 baada ya kuridhisha vigezo vifuatavyo.

Majengo ya Era ya Vita vya Kwanza katika eneo la Upper Barracks ya Gona Barracks yanaonyesha mambo adimu ya urithi wa kitamaduni wa Queensland kama eneo lililobaki la majengo kutoka kipindi hiki, na kama mifano ya muundo wa mapema wa majengo na Jumuiya ya Madola. Mkusanyiko wa kumbi za kuchimba visima, na idadi ya aina tofauti za kumbi za kuchimba visima kwa huduma mbali mbali zilizowekwa katika eneo moja haikuwa mazoezi ya kawaida ya kijeshi wakati huo. Hifadhi ya bunduki, huduma, ufundi wa sanaa na kumbi za wahandisi ni mifano nadra ya kuishi ya aina yao.

Gona Barracks ina ushirika maalum na sehemu kubwa ya jamii ya jeshi la Queensland. Kama uwanja wa mafunzo ya kijeshi tangu miaka ya mapema ya Vita vya Kwanza vya Dunia hadi 1998, maelfu ya watumwa na wanawake wana uhusiano na tovuti ambayo imechukua jukumu kubwa katika vipindi vikuu vya shirika la ulinzi katika nchi hii. Katika miaka ya hivi karibuni, imefanya kazi kama kituo cha kuajiri jeshi, haswa kwa Hifadhi ya Jeshi ambao walikuwa kwenye tovuti.

Sehemu ya wahandisi hufikiwa mara moja baada ya kuingia kwenye kambi za chini kutoka kwa Mtaa wa Blamey. Kundi la majengo saba yameandaliwa kwa urahisi karibu na eneo la lami, na ni pamoja na majengo ya utawala, duka la kufunga daraja, duka la silaha na Quartermasters, Jumba la Mkutano wa RAE na chumba cha mihadhara cha miaka ya 1970. Duka la kufunga daraja ni jengo la kumwaga la mbao, wakati miundo mingine katika eneo la wahandisi ni majengo ya mbao au ya chuma, yaliyowekwa kwenye stumps za zege na zilizo na ubao wa bodi ya hali ya hewa na chuma cha bati au paa za chuma. Majengo ya Wahandisi ni mchanganyiko wa miundo iliyojengwa kwenye tovuti, na imehamishwa kutoka Barracks ya Jeshi la Wacol mnamo 1953.

Makazi ya Brisbane ilianza mnamo 1825 na kuanzishwa kwa koloni la adhabu pamoja na sehemu hiyo ya Mto Brisbane ambayo baadaye ilikuwa wilaya kuu ya biashara ya jiji hilo. Usafiri wa wafungwa ulikoma chini ya miaka ishirini baadaye mnamo 1842, na Brisbane ilifunguliwa kwa makazi ya bure. Jiji lilichunguzwa, na ardhi kaskazini na magharibi mwa Spring Hill, eneo la makazi ya mapema, lilifanywa kuwa ardhi ya mbuga. Magharibi mwa Victoria Park, kubwa zaidi ya akiba ya serikali, eneo ambalo sasa linajulikana kama Kelvin Grove lilifutwa, na kugawanywa na kutolewa kwa kuuza na miaka ya 1860. Tovuti ambayo mwishowe ilikuwa ya kuwa Gona Barracks iliorodheshwa kama Sehemu ya 322, Parokia ya Brisbane Kaskazini, Kata ya Stanley.

question_en: Where was the DreamHack Open Cluj-Napoca 2015 held?
pos_context_en: DreamHack Open Cluj-Napoca 2015 was the seventh "" that was held from October 28–November 1, 2015 at the Sala Polivalentă in Cluj-Napoca, Romania. It was organized by DreamHack with help from Valve Corporation and the Professional Gamers League. The tournament had a total prize pool of $250,000 USD.

The 16 teams at the major qualifier played at DreamHack Open Stockholm 2015. The bottom eight teams from ESL One Cologne 2015, five teams from two European qualifiers, two teams from the North American qualifier, and one team from the Asian qualifier.

question_en: When was Tylenol introduced?
pos_context_en: The brand was introduced in 1955 by McNeil Laboratories, a family owned pharmaceutical manufacturer. Two brothers took over the company from their father that year, and that year one of them learned about paracetamol, which was not on the US market at that time. To avoid competing with aspirin, they marketed it as a product to reduce fever in children, packaging it like a red fire truck with the slogan, "for little hotheads". The name "Tylenol" and the generic name "acetaminophen" were generated by McNeil from the chemical name of the drug. Johnson & Johnson bought McNeil in 1959, and one year later the drug was made available over the counter.
neg_context_en: At a Burson-Marsteller organized press conference in November 1982, Johnson & Johnson introduced new tamper-proof packaging, becoming the first company to introduce triple-sealed packaging, which later became the industry standard. The conference gave Johnson & Johnson the opportunity to announce that they were reintroducing Tylenol capsules to the market and would replace any Tylenol that consumers had thrown away. In addition, Johnson & Johnson published advertisements with coupons for consumers to use in replacing Tylenol that had been thrown out and produced commercials and print advertisements thanking the public for their "continuing confidence and support". Within six weeks of the introduction of the repackaged product Tylenol's sales returned to the previous level. In 1983, Burson-Marsteller was awarded a Silver Anvil for "out-of-the-ordinary crisis management" for its work with Johnson & Johnson. The company was brought back to handle crisis management during a second Tylenol crisis, involving cyanide tainting in New York in 1986.

However, Sterling Products did not market "Panadol" in the United States or other countries where "Bayer Aspirin" still dominated the aspirin market. Other firms began selling acetaminophen drugs, most significantly, McNeil Laboratories with liquid "Tylenol" in 1955, and "Tylenol" pills in 1958. By 1967, "Tylenol" was available without a prescription. Because it did not cause gastric irritation, acetaminophen rapidly displaced much of aspirin's sales. Another analgesic, anti-inflammatory drug was introduced in 1962: ibuprofen (sold as "Brufen" in the U.K. and "Motrin" in the U.S.). By the 1970s, aspirin had a relatively small portion of the pain reliever market, and in the 1980s sales decreased even more when ibuprofen became available without prescription.

On September 29, 1982, a "Tylenol scare" began when the first of seven individuals died in the Chicago metropolitan area after ingesting Extra Strength Tylenol that had been deliberately contaminated with cyanide. Within a week, the company pulled 31 million bottles of tablets back from retailers, making it one of the first major product recalls in American history.

Burson-Marsteller's handling of the Chicago Tylenol poisonings for Johnson & Johnson in September 1982 has been referred to as the "gold standard" for crisis management. Seven people in the Chicago area were killed when they took Tylenol capsules tainted with cyanide, and Johnson & Johnson went to Burson-Marsteller for advice on how to approach the situation. After an eighth death, which occurred in California, the response by Johnson & Johnson was to announce a nationwide recall of all Tylenol capsules. Burson-Marsteller organized a press conference televised across 35 markets in the United States, addressing the recall and reporting that the product tampering had occurred on the shelves, not during manufacturing. During late October 1982, a brief television campaign was undertaken asking for the public to trust Tylenol, and Burson-Marsteller carried out nationwide polling which found that the majority of the population still had confidence in Johnson & Johnson. Ninety percent of respondents stated that they did not hold the manufacturer responsible for the deaths.

In a concerted effort to reassure the public, Johnson & Johnson distributed warnings to hospitals and distributors and halted Tylenol production and advertising. On October 5, 1982, it issued a nationwide recall of Tylenol products; an estimated 31 million bottles were in circulation, with a retail value of over US $100 million ($267 million in 2018). The company also advertised in the national media for individuals not to consume any of its products that contained acetaminophen after it was determined that only these capsules had been tampered with. Johnson & Johnson offered to exchange all Tylenol capsules already purchased by the public for solid tablets.

In the fall of 1982, a murderer added 65 milligrams of cyanide to some Tylenol capsules on store shelves, killing seven people, including three in one family. Johnson & Johnson recalled and destroyed 31 million capsules at a cost of $100 million. The affable CEO, James Burke, appeared in television ads and at news conferences informing consumers of the company's actions. Tamper-resistant packaging was rapidly introduced, and Tylenol sales swiftly bounced back to near pre-crisis levels.

On January 15, 2010, Johnson & Johnson announced a voluntary recall of several hundred batches of popular medicines, including Benadryl, Motrin, Rolaids, Simply Sleep, St. Joseph Aspirin and Tylenol. The recall was due to complaints of a musty smell suspected to be due to contamination of the packaging with the chemical 2,4,6-tribromoanisole. The full health effects of 2,4,6-tribromoanisole are not known but no serious events have been documented in medical literature. The recall came 20 months after McNeil first began receiving and investigating consumer complaints about moldy-smelling bottles of Tylenol Arthritis Relief caplets, according to the United States Food and Drug Administration (FDA). The recall included 53 million bottles of over-the-counter products including Tylenol, Motrin and Rolaids, Benadryl and St. Joseph's Aspirin, involving lots in the Americas, the United Arab Emirates and Fiji.

On September 29, 1982, a "Tylenol scare" began when the first of seven individuals died in Chicago metropolitan area, after ingesting Extra Strength Tylenol that had been deliberately laced with cyanide. Within a week, the company pulled 31 million bottles of capsules back from retailers, making it one of the first major recalls in American history. The incident led to reforms in the packaging of over-the-counter substances and to federal anti-tampering laws. The case remains unsolved and no suspects have been charged. Johnson & Johnson's quick response, including a nationwide recall, was widely praised by public relations experts and the media and was the gold standard for corporate crisis management.

As a result of the crisis, all Tylenol capsules were discontinued, as were capsules of other brand names. Retained by McNeil's president, Joseph Chiesa, new product consultant Martin Calle of management strategist Calle & Company conceived the world's first tamper-resistant gelatin-enrobed capsule called "Tylenol Gelcaps", which proved to resuscitate the 92% of capsule-segment sales lost to the recall. The tamper-resistant, triple-sealed safety containers were placed on the shelves of retailers 10 weeks after the withdrawal, and other manufacturers followed suit. The crisis cost the company more than $100 million, but Tylenol regained 100% of the market share it had before the crisis. The Tylenol murderer was never found, and a $100,000 reward offered by Johnson & Johnson remains unclaimed.
question_src: Tylenol ilianzishwa lini?
pos_context_src: Chapa hiyo ilianzishwa mnamo 1955 na Maabara ya McNeil, familia inayomilikiwa na familia. Ndugu wawili walichukua kampuni kutoka kwa baba yao mwaka huo, na mwaka huo mmoja wao alijifunza juu ya paracetamol, ambayo haikuwa kwenye soko la Amerika wakati huo. Ili kuzuia kushindana na aspirini, waliiuza kama bidhaa ili kupunguza homa kwa watoto, kuifunga kama lori nyekundu ya moto na kauli mbiu, "kwa Hotheads Little". Jina "Tylenol" na jina la generic "acetaminophen" lilitolewa na McNeil kutoka kwa jina la kemikali la dawa hiyo. Johnson & Johnson walinunua McNeil mnamo 1959, na mwaka mmoja baadaye dawa hiyo ilipatikana juu ya counter.
neg_context_src: Katika mkutano wa waandishi wa habari wa Burson-Marsteller mnamo Novemba 1982, Johnson & Johnson walianzisha ufungaji mpya wa uthibitisho, na kuwa kampuni ya kwanza kuanzisha ufungaji wa muhuri mara tatu, ambao baadaye ukawa kiwango cha tasnia. Mkutano huo uliwapa Johnson & Johnson fursa ya kutangaza kwamba walikuwa wakibadilisha vidonge vya Tylenol kwenye soko na watachukua nafasi ya tylenol ambayo watumiaji walikuwa wameitupa. Kwa kuongezea, Johnson & Johnson walichapisha matangazo na kuponi kwa watumiaji kutumia katika kuchukua nafasi ya Tylenol ambayo ilikuwa imetupwa nje na kutoa matangazo na matangazo ya kuchapisha yakishukuru umma kwa "ujasiri wao na msaada". Ndani ya wiki sita za kuanzishwa kwa mauzo ya bidhaa iliyowekwa tena ya Tylenol ilirudi katika kiwango cha zamani. Mnamo 1983, Burson-Marsteller alipewa tuzo ya fedha kwa "usimamizi wa shida ya nje" kwa kazi yake na Johnson & Johnson. Kampuni hiyo ilirudishwa nyuma kushughulikia usimamizi wa shida wakati wa mzozo wa pili wa Tylenol, ikihusisha utapeli wa cyanide huko New York mnamo 1986.

Walakini, bidhaa za Sterling hazikuwa soko "Panadol" huko Merika au nchi zingine ambapo "Bayer Aspirin" bado ilitawala soko la Aspirin. Kampuni zingine zilianza kuuza dawa za acetaminophen, kwa kiasi kikubwa, maabara ya McNeil na kioevu "Tylenol" mnamo 1955, na vidonge vya "Tylenol" mnamo 1958. Kufikia 1967, "Tylenol" ilipatikana bila dawa. Kwa sababu haikusababisha kuwasha kwa tumbo, acetaminophen haraka ilihama mauzo mengi ya Aspirin. Dawa nyingine ya analgesic, ya kupambana na uchochezi ilianzishwa mnamo 1962: ibuprofen (iliyouzwa kama "Brufen" huko U.K. na "Motrin" huko Merika). Kufikia miaka ya 1970, aspirini ilikuwa na sehemu ndogo ya soko la kupunguza maumivu, na katika mauzo ya 1980 yalipungua zaidi wakati ibuprofen ilipatikana bila dawa.

Mnamo Septemba 29, 1982, "Tylenol Scare" ilianza wakati wa kwanza wa watu saba walikufa katika eneo la mji mkuu wa Chicago baada ya kumeza nguvu ya ziada Tylenol ambayo ilikuwa imechafuliwa kwa makusudi na cyanide. Ndani ya wiki moja, kampuni ilichora chupa milioni 31 za vidonge nyuma kutoka kwa wauzaji, na kuifanya kuwa moja ya bidhaa kuu ya kwanza inayokumbuka katika historia ya Amerika.

Utunzaji wa Burson-Marsteller wa sumu ya Chicago Tylenol kwa Johnson & Johnson mnamo Septemba 1982 umetajwa kama "kiwango cha dhahabu" kwa usimamizi wa shida. Watu saba katika eneo la Chicago waliuawa wakati walichukua vidonge vya Tylenol vilivyochapishwa na Cyanide, na Johnson & Johnson walikwenda Burson-Marsteller kwa ushauri juu ya jinsi ya kukaribia hali hiyo. Baada ya kifo cha nane, kilichotokea huko California, majibu ya Johnson & Johnson yalipaswa kutangaza ukumbusho wa kitaifa wa vidonge vyote vya Tylenol. Burson-Marsteller aliandaa mkutano wa waandishi wa habari ulipigiwa televisheni katika masoko 35 nchini Merika, akihutubia ukumbusho na kuripoti kwamba uporaji wa bidhaa ulitokea kwenye rafu, sio wakati wa utengenezaji. Mwisho wa Oktoba 1982, kampeni fupi ya runinga ilifanywa ikiuliza umma kumwamini Tylenol, na Burson-Marsteller alifanya upigaji kura wa kitaifa ambao uligundua kuwa idadi kubwa ya watu bado walikuwa na imani na Johnson & Johnson. Asilimia tisini ya waliohojiwa walisema kwamba hawakushikilia mtengenezaji anayehusika na vifo hivyo.

Katika juhudi za pamoja za kuwahakikishia umma, Johnson & Johnson walisambaza maonyo kwa hospitali na wasambazaji na kusimamisha uzalishaji na matangazo ya Tylenol. Mnamo Oktoba 5, 1982, ilitoa kumbukumbu ya kitaifa ya bidhaa za Tylenol; Takriban chupa milioni 31 zilikuwa kwenye mzunguko, na thamani ya rejareja ya zaidi ya dola milioni 100 ($ 267 milioni mwaka 2018). Kampuni hiyo pia ilitangaza katika vyombo vya habari vya kitaifa kwa watu wasiotumia bidhaa zake zozote ambazo zilikuwa na acetaminophen baada ya kuamua kuwa vidonge hivi tu vilikuwa vimepigwa marufuku. Johnson & Johnson walijitolea kubadilishana vidonge vyote vya Tylenol tayari vilivyonunuliwa na umma kwa vidonge vikali.

Katika msimu wa 1982, muuaji aliongezea milligram 65 za cyanide kwa vidonge kadhaa vya tylenol kwenye rafu za duka, na kuwauwa watu saba, pamoja na watatu katika familia moja. Johnson & Johnson walikumbuka na kuharibu vidonge milioni 31 kwa gharama ya dola milioni 100. Mkurugenzi Mtendaji anayehusika, James Burke, alionekana kwenye matangazo ya runinga na kwenye mikutano ya habari kuwaambia watumiaji juu ya vitendo vya kampuni hiyo. Ufungaji sugu wa tamper ulianzishwa haraka, na mauzo ya Tylenol haraka yalirudishwa nyuma kwa viwango vya karibu vya mgogoro.

Mnamo Januari 15, 2010, Johnson & Johnson walitangaza ukumbusho wa hiari wa vikundi mia kadhaa vya dawa maarufu, pamoja na Benadryl, Motrin, Rolaids, Kulala tu, St Joseph Aspirin na Tylenol. Ukumbusho ulitokana na malalamiko ya harufu ya harakati inayoshukiwa kuwa ni kwa sababu ya uchafuzi wa ufungaji na kemikali 2,4,6-tribromoanisole. Athari kamili za kiafya za 2,4,6-tribromoanisole hazijulikani lakini hakuna matukio makubwa ambayo yameorodheshwa katika fasihi ya matibabu. Ukumbusho ulikuja miezi 20 baada ya McNeil kuanza kupokea na kuchunguza malalamiko ya watumiaji juu ya chupa zenye harufu nzuri ya vifurushi vya misaada ya Tylenol, kulingana na Utawala wa Chakula na Dawa wa Merika (FDA). Ukumbusho huo ulijumuisha chupa milioni 53 za bidhaa za kukabiliana na-pamoja na Tylenol, Motrin na Rolaids, Benadryl na Aspirin ya St Joseph, ikihusisha kura katika Amerika, Falme za Kiarabu na Fiji.

Mnamo Septemba 29, 1982, "Tylenol Scare" ilianza wakati wa kwanza wa watu saba walikufa katika eneo la mji mkuu wa Chicago, baada ya kumeza nguvu ya ziada Tylenol ambayo ilikuwa imewekwa kwa makusudi na cyanide. Ndani ya wiki moja, kampuni hiyo ilivuta chupa milioni 31 za vidonge nyuma kutoka kwa wauzaji, na kuifanya kuwa moja ya kumbukumbu kuu ya kwanza katika historia ya Amerika. Tukio hilo lilisababisha mageuzi katika ufungaji wa vitu vya kukabiliana na na sheria za shirikisho zinazopingana na shirikisho. Kesi hiyo bado haijatatuliwa na hakuna mtuhumiwa aliyeshtakiwa. Jibu la haraka la Johnson & Johnson, pamoja na ukumbusho wa kitaifa, lilisifiwa sana na wataalam wa uhusiano wa umma na vyombo vya habari na ilikuwa kiwango cha dhahabu kwa usimamizi wa shida ya kampuni.

Kama matokeo ya shida, vidonge vyote vya Tylenol vilikomeshwa, kama vile vidonge vya majina mengine ya chapa. Imehifadhiwa na Rais wa McNeil, Joseph Chiesa, mshauri mpya wa bidhaa Martin Calle wa Mkakati wa Usimamizi Calle & Kampuni alichukua kizuizi cha kwanza cha sugu cha gelatin kilichoitwa "Tylenol Gelcaps", ambayo ilithibitisha kurudisha tena asilimia 92 ya mauzo ya sehemu ya caps ilipotea. Vyombo visivyo na sugu, vya usalama vilivyotiwa muhuri mara tatu viliwekwa kwenye rafu za wauzaji wiki 10 baada ya kujiondoa, na wazalishaji wengine walifuata. Mgogoro huo uligharimu kampuni zaidi ya dola milioni 100, lakini Tylenol alipata 100% ya sehemu ya soko ambayo ilikuwa nayo kabla ya shida. Muuaji wa Tylenol hajawahi kupatikana, na thawabu ya $ 100,000 inayotolewa na Johnson & Johnson bado haijadaiwa.

question_en: When was Frontier Martial-Arts Wrestling established?
pos_context_en: Chō Sentō Puroresu FMW is a Japanese professional wrestling promotion founded on July 28, 1989, by Atsushi Onita as Frontier Martial-Arts Wrestling (FMW). The promotion specializes in hardcore wrestling involving weapons such as barbed wire and fire. They held their first show on October 6, 1989. In the late 1990s, FMW had a brief working agreement with Extreme Championship Wrestling, and as well had 14 DVDs released in the U.S. by Tokyopop. On March 4, 2015, FMW was resurrected under the name Chō Sentō Puroresu FMW.
neg_context_title_en: List of Frontier Martial-Arts Wrestling tournaments
List of Frontier Martial-Arts Wrestling tournaments
neg_context_en: Frontier Martial-Arts Wrestling held a variety of professional wrestling tournaments competed for by wrestlers that were part of their roster during its existence between 1989 and 2001.

FMW's first tournament, a single-elimination tournament took place at the "Battle Resistance - 1st Open Tournament" event on January 7, 1990. Aside from the tournament, the event also featured a women's wrestling match between Miwa Sato and Kumiko Matsuda.

On November 23, 1999, Michaels made a special appearance for Frontier Martial-Arts Wrestling at the 10th Anniversary Show at the Yokohama Arena, serving as the guest referee for the H vs fake Hayabusa (Mr. Gannosuke) main event. He got himself involved in the match when Gannosuke delivered a low blow on him and he responded later on with "Sweet Chin Music".

The talent divided into two promotions: Kodo Fuyuki's World Entertainment Wrestling (WEW), the name of FMW's title governing body since 1999, and Mr. Gannosuke's Wrestling Marvelous Future (WMF). Some of the talent also made appearances on Onita's special shows. Following Fuyuki's death in 2003, most of the WEW talent formed a successor promotion, Apache Pro-Wrestling Army.

Frontier Wrestling Alliance (FWA) was a professional wrestling promotion in Britain. Established in 1993 as the Fratton Wrestling Association it soon became the Frontier Wrestling Alliance six years later and until 2007 when it lost a scripted inter-promotional feud with . As a result of losing the promotion was forced to close and the company XWA was founded, largely based on the old FWA with some old staff and wrestlers as well as some championships. However, in 2009 the FWA brand was relaunched again as a separate promotion to the XWA, running for 3 more years before folding again in 2012.

On August 20, 1999, Motokawa began working regularly for Frontier Martial-Arts Wrestling (FMW), where she often wrestled opposite Kaori Nakayama. On October 24, 2000, Motokawa teamed with Azusa Kudo and Hisakatsu Oya to unsuccessfully challenge Nakayama, Gedo and Jado for the WEW 6-Man Tag Team Championship. Motokawa wrestled regularly for the promotion until August 2001, when she began suffering from various injuries, which eventually led her to undergo a hernia surgery. While she was sidelined, FMW went out of business.

Following the closure of Frontier Martial-Arts Wrestling in 2002, Hiromichi Fuyuki formed his own promotion, which ran under the names Fuyuki-Gun Promotion (originally used by Fuyuki for an FMW-aligned venture following his withdrawal from WAR) and World Entertainment Wrestling, and which administered the WEW titles originally created in FMW in 1999. FMW alumni such as Kintaro Kanemura, Tetsuhiro Kuroda and Go Ito maintained the promotion even after Fuyuki's death in March 2003, but stopped in May 2004.

After leaving Frontier Martial-Arts Wrestling in the summer of 1991, Kazuyoshi Osako and Kiyoshi "Mickey" Ibaragi founded Wrestling International New Generations (W*ING), with Osako as President and Ibaragi as Vice President. They would also lure away Mr. Pogo and Victor Quinones from FMW, taking away their number one heel and booker/talent exchanger.
On October 31, 2017, FMW founder Atsushi Onita retired after 43 years in the ring. The promotion is still in operation.
question_src: Je! Mbele za sanaa ya kijeshi ilianzishwa lini?
pos_context_src: Chō Sentō Puroresu FMW ni mtaalam wa kitaalam wa Wrestling wa Kijapani aliyeanzishwa mnamo Julai 28, 1989, na Atsushi Onita kama Frontier Martial-Sanaa Wrestling (FMW). Ukuzaji utaalam katika mieleka ngumu inayojumuisha silaha kama vile waya zilizopigwa na moto. Walifanya onyesho lao la kwanza mnamo Oktoba 6, 1989. Mwisho wa miaka ya 1990, FMW walikuwa na makubaliano mafupi ya kufanya kazi na ubingwa uliokithiri, na vile vile walikuwa na DVD 14 zilizotolewa huko Merika na Tokyopop. Mnamo Machi 4, 2015, FMW ilifufuliwa chini ya jina Chō Sentō Puroresu FMW.
neg_context_title_src: Orodha ya mashindano ya sanaa ya mapambo ya kijeshi
Orodha ya mashindano ya sanaa ya mapambo ya kijeshi
neg_context_src: Frontier Martial-Sanaa Wrestling ilifanya mashindano ya kitaalam ya wrestling yaliyoshindana na wrestlers ambayo yalikuwa sehemu ya orodha yao wakati wa uwepo wake kati ya 1989 na 2001.

Mashindano ya kwanza ya FMW, mashindano ya kuondoa moja yalifanyika katika hafla ya "Upinzani wa Vita - 1 Open Mashindano" mnamo Januari 7, 1990. Mbali na mashindano hayo, hafla hiyo pia ilionyesha mechi ya kugongana ya wanawake kati ya Miwa Sato na Kumiko Matsuda.

Mnamo Novemba 23, 1999, Michaels alifanya sura maalum kwa mpangilio wa sanaa ya Frontier Martial katika onyesho la maadhimisho ya miaka 10 huko Yokohama Arena, akihudumu kama mwamuzi wa mgeni wa hafla kuu ya H vs Hayabusa (Mr. Gannosuke). Alijiingiza kwenye mechi wakati Gannosuke alipomtoa pigo la chini na akajibu baadaye na "Muziki wa Tamu ya Tamu".

Talanta imegawanywa katika matangazo mawili: Kodo Fuyuki's Burudani ya Burudani ya Ulimwenguni (WEW), jina la kikundi cha FMW cha kichwa cha tangu tangu 1999, na Mr. Gannosuke's Wrestling Ajabu ya Baadaye (WMF). Baadhi ya talanta pia ilionekana kwenye maonyesho maalum ya Onita. Kufuatia kifo cha Fuyuki mnamo 2003, talanta nyingi za WEW ziliunda kukuza mrithi, Jeshi la Apache Pro-Wrestling.

Frontier Wrestling Alliance (FWA) alikuwa mtaalam wa kukuza mieleka nchini Uingereza. Ilianzishwa mnamo 1993 kama Chama cha Fratton Wrestling hivi karibuni ikawa Frontier Wrestling Alliance miaka sita baadaye na hadi 2007 wakati ilipoteza maandishi ya maandishi ya ukuzaji na. Kama matokeo ya kupoteza kukuza ililazimishwa kufunga na kampuni XWA ilianzishwa, kwa msingi wa FWA ya zamani na wafanyikazi wengine wa zamani na wrestlers pamoja na ubingwa. Walakini, mnamo 2009 chapa ya FWA ilizinduliwa tena kama tangazo tofauti kwa XWA, ikiendesha kwa miaka 3 zaidi kabla ya kukunja tena mnamo 2012.

Mnamo Agosti 20, 1999, Motokawa alianza kufanya kazi mara kwa mara kwa Frontier Martial-Sanaa Wrestling (FMW), ambapo mara nyingi aligombana kinyume na Kaori Nakayama. Mnamo Oktoba 24, 2000, Motokawa walishirikiana na Azusa Kudo na Hisakatsu Oya ili kufanikiwa kutoa changamoto kwa Nakayama, Gedo na Jado kwa ubingwa wa timu ya WEW 6-Man Tag. Motokawa aligombana mara kwa mara kwa kukuza hadi Agosti 2001, alipoanza kuteseka na majeraha kadhaa, ambayo mwishowe yalipelekea kufanyiwa upasuaji wa hernia. Wakati alikuwa ametengwa, FMW ilitoka kwa biashara.

Kufuatia kufungwa kwa Frontier Martial-Sanaa wrestling mnamo 2002, Hiromichi Fuyuki aliunda kukuza kwake mwenyewe, ambayo iliendesha chini ya majina ya Fuyuki-gun kukuza (hapo awali iliyotumiwa na Fuyuki kwa ubia wa FMW uliyokuwa ukifuata ubia wake. Kintaro Kanemura, Tetsuhiro Kuroda na Go Ito waliendeleza kukuza hata baada ya kifo cha Fuyuki mnamo Machi 2003, lakini alisimama Mei 2004.

Baada ya kuacha Frontier Martial-Sanaa kugongana katika msimu wa joto wa 1991, Kazuyoshi Osako na Kiyoshi "Mickey" Ibaragi walianzisha Wrestling Vizazi vipya vya kimataifa (W*ing), na Osako kama rais na Ibaragi kama makamu wa rais. Pia wangemwondoa Mr. Pogo na Victor Quinones kutoka FMW, wakiondoa kisigino chao cha kwanza na kiboreshaji/talanta exchanger.
Mnamo Oktoba 31, 2017, mwanzilishi wa FMW Atsushi Onita alistaafu baada ya miaka 43 kwenye pete. Ukuzaji bado unafanya kazi.

question_en: When were Arabic numerals adopted in Europe?
pos_context_en: From India, the thriving trade between Islamic sultans and Africa carried the concept to Cairo. Arabic mathematicians extended the system to include decimal fractions, and Muḥammad ibn Mūsā al-Ḵwārizmī wrote an important work about it in the 9th  century. The modern Arabic numerals were introduced to Europe with the translation of this work in the 12th century in Spain and Leonardo of Pisa's "Liber Abaci" of 1201. In Europe, the complete Indian system with the zero was derived from the Arabs in the 12th century.
neg_context_title_en: Reception of Islam in Early Modern Europe
Islamic world contributions to Medieval Europe
neg_context_en: The Hindu-Arabic numeral system was developed by Indian mathematicians around AD 500 using quite different forms of the numerals. From India, the system was adopted by Arabic mathematicians in Baghdad and passed on to the Arabs farther west. The current form of the numerals developed in North Africa. It was in the North African city of Bejaia that the Italian scholar Fibonacci first encountered the numerals; his work was crucial in making them known throughout Europe. The use of Arabic numerals spread around the world through European trade, books and colonialism.

It was invented between the 1st and 4th centuries by Indian mathematicians. The system was adopted in Arabic mathematics by the 9th century. Influential were the books of Muḥammad ibn Mūsā al-Khwārizmī ("On the Calculation with Hindu Numerals", ) and Al-Kindi ("On the Use of the Hindu Numerals", ). The system later spread to medieval Europe by the High Middle Ages.

The reason the digits are more commonly known as "Arabic numerals" in Europe and the Americas is that they were introduced to Europe in the 10th century by Arabic-speakers of North Africa, who were then using the digits from Libya to Morocco. Arabs, on the other hand, call the base-10 system (not just these digits) "Hindu numerals", referring to their origin in India. This is not to be confused with what the Arabs call the "Hindi numerals", namely the Eastern Arabic numerals ( - - - - - - - - - ) used in the Middle East, or any of the numerals currently used in Indian languages (e.g. Devanagari: ).

Until Arabic numerals were adopted and adapted from Indian numerals in the 8th and 9th centuries AD, and promoted in Europe by Fibonacci of Pisa with his 1202 book "Liber Abaci", numerals were predominantly alphabetical. For instance in Ancient Greece, Greek numerals used the alphabet. It is just a short step from using letters of the alphabet in everyday arithmetic and mathematics to seeing numbers in words, and to writing with an awareness of the numerical dimension of words.

In Christian Europe, the first mention and representation of Hindu-Arabic numerals (from one to nine, without zero), is in the ", an illuminated compilation of various historical documents from the Visigothic period in Spain, written in the year 976 by three monks of the Riojan monastery of San Martín de Albelda.
Between 967 and 969, Gerbert of Aurillac discovered and studied Arab science in the Catalan abbeys. Later he obtained from these places the book " ("On multiplication and division"). After becoming Pope Sylvester II in the year 999, he introduced a new model of abacus, the so-called Abacus of Gerbert, by adopting tokens representing Hindu-Arab numerals, from one to nine.

The European acceptance of the numerals was accelerated by the invention of the printing press, and they became widely known during the 15th century. Early evidence of their use in Britain includes: an equal hour horary quadrant from 1396, in England, a 1445 inscription on the tower of Heathfield Church, Sussex; a 1448 inscription on a wooden lych-gate of Bray Church, Berkshire; and a 1487 inscription on the belfry door at Piddletrenthide church, Dorset; and in Scotland a 1470 inscription on the tomb of the first Earl of Huntly in Elgin Cathedral. (See G.F. Hill, "The Development of Arabic Numerals in Europe" for more examples.) In central Europe, the King of Hungary Ladislaus the Posthumous, started the use of Arabic numerals, which appear for the first time in a royal document of 1456. By the mid-16th century, they were in common use in most of Europe. Roman numerals remained in use mostly for the notation of anno Domini years, and for numbers on clockfaces.

Following the first wave of Arabic interest during the Renaissance of the 12th century, which saw numerous Arabic texts being translated into Latin, there was a 'second wave' of interest in the study of Arabic literature, Arabic science and Islamic philosophy in 16th-century France and 17th-century England.
Together with the development of the Franco-Ottoman alliance, cultural and scientific exchanges between France and the Ottoman Empire flourished. French scholars such as Guillaume Postel or Pierre Belon were able to travel to Asia Minor and the Middle East to collect information.
Scientific exchange is thought to have occurred, as numerous works in Arabic, especially pertaining to astronomy were brought back, annotated and studied by scolars such as Guillaume Postel. Transmission of scientific knowledge, such as the Tusi-couple, may have occurred on such occasions, at the time when Copernicus was establishing his own astronomical theories.

The work was translated into Arabic around 820 by Al-Khwarizmi, whose "On the Calculation with Hindu Numerals" was in turn influential in the adoption of the Hindu-Arabic numerals in Europe from the 12th century.

Stefan of Pise translated into Latin around 1127 an Arab manual of medical theory. The method of algorism for performing arithmetic with Indian-Arabic numerals was developed by the Persian al-Khwarizmi in the 9th century, and introduced in Europe by Leonardo Fibonacci (1170–1250). A translation by Robert of Chester of the "Algebra" by al-Kharizmi is known as early as 1145. Ibn al-Haytham (Alhazen, 980–1037) compiled treatises on optical sciences, which were used as references by Newton and Descartes. Medical sciences were also highly developed in Islam as testified by the Crusaders, who relied on Arab doctors on numerous occasions. Joinville reports he was saved in 1250 by a “Saracen” doctor.

The numeral system came to be known to both the Persian mathematician Khwarizmi, who wrote a book, "On the Calculation with Hindu Numerals" in about 825, and the Arab mathematician Al-Kindi, who wrote four volumes, "On the Use of the Hindu Numerals" ( ["kitāb fī isti'māl al-'adād al-hindī"]) around 830. These earlier texts did not use the Hindu numerals. Kushyar ibn Labban who wrote "Kitab fi usul hisab al-hind (Principles of Hindu Reckoning)" is one of the oldest surviving manuscripts using the Hindu numerals. These books are principally responsible for the diffusion of the Hindu system of numeration throughout the Islamic world and ultimately also to Europe.
question_src: Je! Nambari za Kiarabu zilipitishwa lini huko Uropa?
pos_context_src: Kutoka India, biashara yenye kustawi kati ya Waislamu wa Kiisilamu na Afrika ilibeba wazo hilo kwenda Cairo. Wataalam wa hesabu wa Kiarabu waliongeza mfumo huo ni pamoja na vipande vya decimal, na Muḥammad ibn Mūsā al-ḵwārizmī aliandika kazi muhimu juu yake katika karne ya 9. Hesabu za kisasa za Kiarabu zilianzishwa Ulaya na tafsiri ya kazi hii katika karne ya 12 huko Uhispania na Leonardo wa "Liber Abaci" ya Pisa ya 1201. Huko Ulaya, mfumo kamili wa India na sifuri ulitokana na Waarabu katika karne ya 12.
neg_context_title_src: Mapokezi ya Uislamu mapema Ulaya ya kisasa
Mchango wa ulimwengu wa Kiislamu kwa Ulaya ya zamani
neg_context_src: Mfumo wa nambari ya Kihindu-Kiarabu ulitengenezwa na wataalam wa hesabu wa India karibu na AD 500 kwa kutumia aina tofauti za nambari. Kutoka India, mfumo huo ulipitishwa na wataalam wa hesabu wa Kiarabu huko Baghdad na kupitishwa kwa Waarabu mbali magharibi. Njia ya sasa ya hesabu zilizotengenezwa katika Afrika Kaskazini. Ilikuwa katika mji wa Afrika Kaskazini wa Bejaia ambapo msomi wa Italia Fibonacci alikutana na nambari za kwanza; Kazi yake ilikuwa muhimu katika kuwafanya wajulikane kote Ulaya. Matumizi ya nambari za Kiarabu zilienea ulimwenguni kote kupitia biashara ya Ulaya, vitabu na ukoloni.

Ilibuniwa kati ya karne ya 1 na 4 na wataalam wa hesabu wa India. Mfumo huo ulipitishwa katika hesabu ya Kiarabu na karne ya 9. Ushawishi wa vitabu vya Muḥammad ibn mūsā al-khwārizmī ("juu ya hesabu na nambari za Kihindu",) na al-kindi ("juu ya matumizi ya nambari za Kihindu",). Mfumo baadaye ulienea hadi Ulaya ya zamani na Zama za Juu za Kati.

Sababu ya nambari hiyo inajulikana zaidi kama "hesabu za Kiarabu" huko Uropa na Amerika ni kwamba walianzishwa Ulaya katika karne ya 10 na wasemaji wa Kiarabu wa Afrika Kaskazini, ambao wakati huo walikuwa wakitumia nambari kutoka Libya kwenda Moroko. Waarabu, kwa upande mwingine, huita mfumo wa msingi-10 (sio nambari hizi tu) "nambari za Kihindu", wakimaanisha asili yao nchini India. Hii haifai kuchanganyikiwa na kile Waarabu huita "nambari za Kihindi", ambazo ni nambari za Kiarabu za Mashariki ( - - - - - - - - -) zinazotumika katika Mashariki ya Kati, au nambari yoyote inayotumika kwa sasa katika lugha za India (k.v. Devanagari:).

Hadi hesabu za Kiarabu zilipitishwa na kubadilishwa kutoka nambari za India katika karne ya 8 na 9 AD, na kupandishwa huko Uropa na Fibonacci wa Pisa na kitabu chake cha "Liber Abaci", hesabu zilikuwa za alfabeti. Kwa mfano katika Ugiriki ya kale, nambari za Uigiriki zilitumia alfabeti. Ni hatua fupi tu kutoka kwa kutumia herufi za alfabeti katika hesabu za kila siku na hisabati kuona nambari kwa maneno, na kuandika kwa ufahamu wa mwelekeo wa maneno.

Katika Ulaya ya Ukristo, kutajwa kwa kwanza na uwakilishi wa hesabu za Kihindu-Kiarabu (kutoka moja hadi tisa, bila sifuri), iko katika ", mkusanyiko ulioangaziwa wa hati mbali mbali za kihistoria kutoka kipindi cha Visigothic huko Uhispania, kilichoandikwa katika mwaka wa 976 na watawa watatu wa monasteri ya Riojan ya San Martín de Albelda.
Kati ya 967 na 969, Gerbert wa Aurillac aligundua na kusoma sayansi ya Kiarabu katika Abbeys ya Kikatalani. Baadaye alipata kutoka kwa maeneo haya kitabu "(" juu ya kuzidisha na mgawanyiko ") Baada ya kuwa Papa Sylvester II katika mwaka wa 999, alianzisha mfano mpya wa Abacus, kinachojulikana kama Abacus wa Gerbert, kwa kupitisha ishara zinazowakilisha nambari za Hindu-Arab, kutoka moja hadi tisa.

Kukubalika kwa Ulaya kwa hesabu kuliharakishwa na uvumbuzi wa vyombo vya habari vya kuchapa, na walijulikana sana wakati wa karne ya 15. Ushuhuda wa mapema wa matumizi yao nchini Uingereza ni pamoja na: Horary Quadrant ya Horary ya saa kutoka 1396, huko England, maandishi 1445 kwenye Mnara wa Kanisa la Heathfield, Sussex; Uandishi wa 1448 juu ya lango la mbao la Lych-lango la Bray, Berkshire; na uandishi wa 1487 kwenye mlango wa Belfry katika Kanisa la Piddletrenthide, Dorset; na huko Scotland uandishi 1470 kwenye kaburi la Earl ya kwanza ya Huntly katika Kanisa kuu la Elgin. . Hesabu za Kirumi zilibaki katika matumizi zaidi kwa maoni ya miaka ya Anno Domini, na kwa idadi kwenye saa za saa.

Kufuatia wimbi la kwanza la riba ya Kiarabu wakati wa Renaissance ya karne ya 12, ambayo iliona maandishi mengi ya Kiarabu yalitafsiriwa kwa Kilatini, kulikuwa na 'wimbi la pili' la kupendeza katika masomo ya fasihi ya Kiarabu, sayansi ya Kiarabu na falsafa ya Kiisilamu katika Ufaransa ya karne ya 16 na England ya karne ya 17.
Pamoja na maendeleo ya Alliance ya Franco-Ottoman, kubadilishana kitamaduni na kisayansi kati ya Ufaransa na Dola ya Ottoman ilifanikiwa. Wasomi wa Ufaransa kama vile Guillaume Postel au Pierre Belon waliweza kusafiri kwenda Asia Ndogo na Mashariki ya Kati kukusanya habari.
Kubadilishana kwa kisayansi kunafikiriwa kutokea, kwani kazi nyingi katika Kiarabu, haswa zinazohusiana na unajimu zilirudishwa, zilifafanuliwa na kusomewa na scolars kama vile Guillaume Postel. Uwasilishaji wa maarifa ya kisayansi, kama vile Tusi-Couple, inaweza kuwa ilitokea kwenye hafla kama hizo, wakati huo Copernicus alikuwa akianzisha nadharia zake za angani.

Kazi hiyo ilitafsiriwa kwa Kiarabu karibu 820 na al-Khwarizmi, ambaye "juu ya hesabu na nambari za Kihindu" ilikuwa na ushawishi mkubwa katika kupitishwa kwa hesabu za Kihindu-Kiarabu huko Uropa kutoka karne ya 12.

Stefan wa Pise alitafsiriwa kwa Kilatini karibu 1127 mwongozo wa Kiarabu wa nadharia ya matibabu. Njia ya algorism ya kufanya hesabu na hesabu za India-Kiarabu ilitengenezwa na Al-Khwarizmi wa Uajemi katika karne ya 9, na kuletwa Ulaya na Leonardo Fibonacci (1170-1250). Tafsiri ya Robert wa Chester wa "Algebra" na al-Kharizmi inajulikana mapema kama 1145. Ibn al-Haytham (Alhazen, 980-1037) alijumuisha mikataba juu ya sayansi ya macho, ambayo ilitumiwa kama marejeleo ya Newton na Descartes. Sayansi ya matibabu pia ilibuniwa sana katika Uislamu kama ilivyoshuhudiwa na Crusaders, ambao walitegemea madaktari wa Kiarabu mara kadhaa. Joinville anaripoti aliokolewa mnamo 1250 na daktari wa "Saracen".

The numeral system came to be known to both the Persian mathematician Khwarizmi, who wrote a book, "On the Calculation with Hindu Numerals" in about 825, and the Arab mathematician Al-Kindi, who wrote four volumes, "On the Use of the Hindu Numerals" ( ["kitāb fī isti'māl al-'adād al-hindī"]) around 830. These earlier texts did not use the Hindu Nambari. Kushyar ibn Labban ambaye aliandika "Kitab fi usul Hisab al-Hind (Misingi ya Hindu Reckoning)" ni moja ya maandishi ya zamani zaidi ya kuishi kwa kutumia nambari za Kihindu. Vitabu hivi vina jukumu la utangamano wa mfumo wa Kihindu wa hesabu katika ulimwengu wote wa Kiisilamu na mwishowe pia kwa Ulaya.
report_src: Nambari za Kiarabu zilianza kupokelewa barani Ulaya katika karne ya 12, hasa baada ya kutafsiriwa kwa kazi ya Muḥammad ibn Mūsā al-ḵwārizmī huko Uhispania na kuchochewa zaidi na kitabu “Liber Abaci” cha Leonardo wa Pisa kilichochapishwa mwaka 1201, ambacho kilisambaza mfumo huu unaojumuisha sifuri na tarakimu za desimali kote Ulaya [1].

question_en: What was the fastest fighter plane used by the U.S. in World War II?
pos_context_en: The Republic P-47 Thunderbolt was a World War II era fighter aircraft produced by the United States from 1941 through 1945. Its primary armament was eight .50-caliber machine guns and in the fighter-bomber ground-attack role it could carry five-inch rockets or a bomb load of 2,500 pounds (1,103 kg). When fully loaded the P-47 weighed up to eight tons (tonnes) making it one of the heaviest fighters of the war. The P-47 was designed around the powerful Pratt & Whitney R-2800 Double Wasp engine which was also used by two U.S. Navy fighters, the Grumman F6F Hellcat and the Vought F4U Corsair. The Thunderbolt was effective as a short-to-medium range escort fighter in high-altitude air-to-air combat and ground attack in both the World War II European and Pacific theaters.
neg_context_title_en: Air warfare of World War II
neg_context_en: Air superiority depended on having the fastest, most maneuverable fighters, in sufficient quantity, based on well-supplied airfields, within range. The RAF demonstrated the importance of speed and maneuverability in the Battle of Britain (1940), when its fast Spitfire and Hawker Hurricane fighters easily riddled the clumsy Stukas as they were pulling out of dives. The race to build the fastest fighter became one of the central themes of World War II.

The Hawker Tempest is a British fighter aircraft primarily used by the Royal Air Force (RAF) in the Second World War. The Tempest, originally known as the "Typhoon II", was an improved derivative of the Hawker Typhoon, intended to address the Typhoon's unexpected fall-off of performance at high altitude by replacing its wing with a thinner laminar flow design. Having diverged considerably from the Typhoon, it was chosen to rename the aircraft "Tempest". The Tempest emerged as one of the most powerful fighters of World War II and was the fastest single-engine propeller-driven aircraft of the war at low altitude.

British long-range bomber planes such as the Short Stirling had been designed before 1939 for strategic flights and given a large armament, but their technology still suffered from numerous flaws. The smaller and shorter ranged Bristol Blenheim, the RAF's most-used bomber, was defended by only one hydraulically operated machine-gun turret, and whilst this appeared sufficient, it was soon revealed that the turret was a pathetic defence against squadrons of German fighter planes. American bomber planes such as the B-17 Flying Fortress had been built before the war as the only adequate long-range bombers in the world, designed to patrol the long American coastlines. Defended by as many as six machine-gun turrets providing 360° cover, the B-17s were still vulnerable without fighter protection even when used in large formations.

The first unit to be equipped with the F2A-1 was Lt. Cdr. Warren Harvey’s VF-3, assigned to air group. On 8 December 1939, VF-3 received 10 of the 11 Buffalos delivered to the U.S. Navy. The remaining 43 F2A-1s were declared surplus and sold to Finland. Although it was becoming clear the F2A was inferior to the latest German and British fighters—Ralph Ingersoll wrote in late 1940 after visiting Britain that "The best American fighter planes already delivered to the British are used by them either as advanced trainers --or for fighting equally obsolete Italian planes in the Middle East. That is all they are good for"—in the early years of World War II all modern monoplane fighter types were in high demand. Consequently, the United Kingdom, Belgium, and the Netherlands East Indies purchased several hundred export models of the Buffalo.

The Dornier Do 335 "Pfeil" ("Arrow") was a World War II heavy fighter built by the Dornier company. The two-seater trainer version was called "Ameisenbär" ("anteater"). The "Pfeil"s performance was much better than other twin-engine designs due to its unique push-pull configuration and the lower aerodynamic drag of the in-line alignment of the two engines. It was Nazi Germany's fastest piston-engined aircraft of World War II. The "Luftwaffe" was desperate to get the design into operational use, but delays in engine deliveries meant that only a handful were delivered before the war ended.

The Heinkel He 100 was a German pre-World War II fighter aircraft design from Heinkel. Although it proved to be one of the fastest fighter aircraft in the world at the time of its development, the design was not ordered into series production. Approximately 19 prototypes and pre-production examples were built. None are known to have survived the war.

An early use was for the interplane wing struts on some biplanes. The Italian World War I Ansaldo SVA series of fast reconnaissance biplanes were among the fastest aircraft of their era, while the Handley Page H.P.42 was a successful airliner of the late 1920s and the Fiat CR.42 "Falco" fighter remained in service until World War II.
On the airfield quantity Hohentengen was the Dornier Do 335, one of the fastest fighter of World War II, tested.

U-234, by far the greatest prize, arrived on May 19, seized off Nova Scotia by the U.S. destroyer escort . It had left Germany with a cargo bound for Japan of a disassembled Messerschmitt Me 262 jet plane, the most sophisticated fighter of World War II; two top Japanese scientists; and two high-ranking Nazi officers. While this was enough to create a media sensation, it was decades later before the U.S. government revealed that the sub also carried a top secret load of uranium oxide produced by the German atomic weapons program bound for a last-ditch Japanese effort. Instead, the extremely valuable nuclear material was diverted to the U.S.' top secret Manhattan Project, and ended up part of the bomb the U.S. Army Air Corps dropped over Hiroshima to hasten the end of the Pacific war.
question_src: Je! Ni ndege gani ya wapiganaji ya haraka sana iliyotumiwa na Merika katika Vita vya Kidunia vya pili?
pos_context_src: Jamhuri ya P-47 Thunderbolt ilikuwa ndege ya wapiganaji wa Vita vya Kidunia vya pili iliyotengenezwa na Merika kutoka 1941 hadi 1945. Silaha yake ya msingi ilikuwa bunduki nane .50-caliber bunduki na katika jukumu la mshambuliaji-mshambuliaji inaweza kubeba makombora ya inchi tano au mzigo wa bomu wa pauni 2,500 (kilo 1,103). Wakati wa kupakia kikamilifu P-47 uzani wa tani nane (tani) na kuifanya kuwa moja ya wapiganaji mzito wa vita. P-47 ilibuniwa karibu na injini ya nguvu ya Pratt & Whitney R-2800 mara mbili ambayo pia ilitumiwa na wapiganaji wawili wa Navy wa Merika, Grumman F6F Hellcat na Vought F4U Corsair. Thunderbolt ilikuwa na ufanisi kama mpiganaji wa kusindikiza kwa muda mfupi hadi wa kati katika mapigano ya juu-hewa-kwa-hewa na shambulio la ardhini katika sinema zote za Vita vya Kidunia vya pili vya Ulaya na Pasifiki.
neg_context_title_src: Vita vya hewa vya Vita vya Kidunia vya pili
Teknolojia wakati wa Vita vya Kidunia vya pili
neg_context_src: Ukuu wa hewa ulitegemea kuwa na wapiganaji wa haraka zaidi, wanaoweza kufikiwa zaidi, kwa idadi ya kutosha, kwa msingi wa viwanja vya ndege vilivyo na vifaa vizuri, ndani ya anuwai. RAF ilionyesha umuhimu wa kasi na ujanja katika Vita vya Uingereza (1940), wakati wapiganaji wake wa haraka wa Spitfire na Hawker Kimbunga walipiga risasi kwa urahisi Stukas walipokuwa wakitoka kwenye dives. Mashindano ya kujenga mpiganaji wa haraka sana ikawa moja ya mada kuu ya Vita vya Kidunia vya pili.

Hawker Dhoruba ni ndege ya wapiganaji wa Uingereza kimsingi inayotumiwa na Royal Air Force (RAF) katika Vita vya Pili vya Ulimwengu. Dhoruba hiyo, ambayo ilijulikana kama "Kimbunga II", ilikuwa derivative iliyoboreshwa ya Kimbunga cha Hawker, iliyokusudiwa kushughulikia hali ya utendaji isiyotarajiwa ya hali ya juu kwa kuchukua nafasi ya mrengo wake na muundo mwembamba wa mtiririko wa laminar. Baada ya kuelekezwa sana kutoka kwa kimbunga, ilichaguliwa kubadili jina la ndege "dhoruba". Dhoruba iliibuka kama mmoja wa wapiganaji wenye nguvu zaidi wa Vita vya Kidunia vya pili na ilikuwa ndege ya haraka zaidi ya injini inayoendeshwa na uwanja wa vita kwa urefu wa chini.

Ndege za bomu za muda mrefu za Uingereza kama vile Stirling fupi zilikuwa zimetengenezwa kabla ya 1939 kwa ndege za kimkakati na kupewa silaha kubwa, lakini teknolojia yao bado ilikuwa na dosari nyingi. Bristol Blenheim mdogo na mfupi, aliyetetewa na mshambuliaji aliyetumiwa sana na RAF, alitetewa na turret moja tu ya mashine ya maji, na wakati hii ilionekana ya kutosha, ilifunuliwa hivi karibuni kuwa turret ilikuwa ulinzi wa huruma dhidi ya squadrons ya ndege za wapiganaji wa Ujerumani. Ndege za bomu za Amerika kama vile ngome ya kuruka ya B-17 ilikuwa imejengwa kabla ya vita kama washambuliaji wa kutosha wa muda mrefu ulimwenguni, iliyoundwa iliyoundwa na doria za pwani ndefu za Amerika. Kutetewa na turrets nyingi za bunduki-za-bunduki zinazotoa kifuniko cha 360 °, B-17 walikuwa bado katika mazingira magumu bila kinga ya wapiganaji hata wakati walitumiwa katika fomu kubwa.

Sehemu ya kwanza kuwa na vifaa vya F2A-1 ilikuwa Lt. CDR. VF-3 ya Warren Harvey, iliyopewa Kikundi cha Hewa. Mnamo tarehe 8 Desemba 1939, VF-3 ilipokea Buffalos 10 kati ya 11 zilizowasilishwa kwa Jeshi la Merika la Merika. 43 F2A-1 zilizobaki zilitangazwa ziada na kuuzwa kwa Ufini. Ingawa ilikuwa wazi kuwa F2A ilikuwa duni kwa wapiganaji wa hivi karibuni wa Wajerumani na Uingereza -Ralph Ingersoll aliandika mwishoni mwa 1940 baada ya kutembelea Uingereza kwamba "ndege bora wa wapiganaji wa Amerika tayari walipelekwa kwa Waingereza wanatumiwa nao kama wakufunzi wa hali ya juu -kwa kupigania miaka yote ya wapiganaji wa karibu. Kwa hivyo, Uingereza, Ubelgiji, na Uholanzi East Indies walinunua mifano mia kadhaa ya usafirishaji wa nyati.

Dornier Do 335 "Pfeil" ("Arrow") alikuwa mpiganaji mzito wa Vita vya Kidunia vya pili vilivyojengwa na Kampuni ya Dornier. Toleo la mkufunzi wa seti mbili liliitwa "Ameisenbär" ("Anteater"). Utendaji wa "Pfeil" ulikuwa bora zaidi kuliko miundo mingine ya injini-mapacha kwa sababu ya usanidi wake wa kipekee wa kushinikiza na Drag ya chini ya aerodynamic ya upatanishi wa ndani wa injini hizo mbili. Ilikuwa ndege ya Nazi ya haraka sana ya Nazi ya Pistoni ya Vita vya Kidunia vya pili. "Luftwaffe" ilitamani kupata muundo huo katika matumizi ya kiutendaji, lakini kuchelewesha kwa usafirishaji wa injini ilimaanisha kuwa ni wachache tu waliotolewa kabla ya vita kumalizika.

Heinkel yeye 100 alikuwa muundo wa ndege wa zamani wa Vita vya Kidunia vya pili kutoka Heinkel. Ingawa ilithibitisha kuwa moja ya ndege ya wapiganaji wa haraka sana ulimwenguni wakati wa maendeleo yake, muundo huo haukuamriwa katika uzalishaji wa mfululizo. Takriban mifano 19 na mifano ya utengenezaji wa kabla ilijengwa. Hakuna anayejulikana kuwa alinusurika vita.

Matumizi ya mapema yalikuwa kwa vijiti vya mrengo wa kuingiliana kwenye milipuko kadhaa. Mfululizo wa Vita vya Kidunia vya Kwanza vya Ansaldo SVA vya milipuko ya haraka ya kufikirika walikuwa miongoni mwa ndege za haraka sana za enzi zao, wakati Handley Ukurasa H.P.42 ilikuwa ndege ya kufanikiwa ya miaka ya 1920 na Fiat Cr.42 "Falco" alibaki kwenye huduma hadi Vita vya Kidunia vya pili.
Kwenye uwanja wa ndege Hohentengen alikuwa Dornier Do 335, mmoja wa mpiganaji wa haraka sana wa Vita vya Kidunia vya pili, aliyejaribiwa.

U-234, kwa tuzo kubwa zaidi, ilifika Mei 19, ilimshika Nova Scotia na Escort Mwangamizi wa Merika. Ilikuwa imeondoka Ujerumani na shehena ya kubeba mizigo kwenda Japan ya ndege iliyotengwa ya Messerschmitt Me 262, mpiganaji wa kisasa zaidi wa Vita vya Kidunia vya pili; Wanasayansi wawili wa juu wa Kijapani; na maafisa wawili wa kiwango cha juu cha Nazi. Wakati hii ilitosha kuunda hisia za vyombo vya habari, ilikuwa miongo kadhaa baadaye kabla ya serikali ya Merika kufunua kuwa SUB pia ilibeba mzigo wa juu wa oksidi ya urani iliyotengenezwa na mpango wa silaha za atomiki za Ujerumani zilizowekwa kwa juhudi ya mwisho ya Kijapani. Badala yake, nyenzo zenye thamani kubwa za nyuklia zilielekezwa kwa Merika ' Mradi wa Juu wa Siri ya Manhattan, na kuishia sehemu ya bomu The Jeshi la Anga la Merika la Merika lilishuka juu ya Hiroshima ili kuharakisha mwisho wa Vita vya Pasifiki.

question_en: How many people live in Virginia?
pos_context_en: there were 2,775,354 people in Northern Virginia; almost exactly a third of the state's population. This figure includes the exurban Clarke, Fauquier, Spotsylvania, Stafford, and Warren counties, as well as the independent city of Fredericksburg. Together, these jurisdictions account for 407,749 residents. The combined population of Arlington, Fairfax, Loudoun, and Prince William counties and the independent cities of Alexandria, Fairfax, Falls Church, Manassas, and Manassas Park is 2,367,605, which was 28.66% of Virginia's population in July 2013.

There were 270 housing units at an average density of 1,094.4 per square mile (417.0/km). The racial makeup of the town was 99.50% White and 0.50% African American. In 2006, there were four people from Eastern India, one African American, one Pacific Islander, and several people of American Indian extraction. Many people have familial ties with residents of the Eastern Shore of Virginia as well as places on the western shore, such as Reedville and Urbanna.

Published July 19, 2010, this first installment focuses on the U.S. intelligence system's growth and redundancies. It questions its manageability, as it has become "so large, so unwieldy, and so secretive that no one knows how much money it costs, how many people it employs, how many programs exist within it, or exactly how many agencies do the same work." The report states that "An estimated 854,000 people, nearly 1.5 times as many people as live in Washington, D.C., hold top-secret security clearances."

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.

question_src: Ni watu wangapi wanaishi Virginia?
pos_context_src: Kulikuwa na watu 2,775,354 huko Kaskazini mwa Virginia; Karibu theluthi moja ya idadi ya watu wa serikali. Takwimu hii ni pamoja na Exurban Clarke, Fauquier, Spotsylvania, Stafford, na Warren, na mji huru wa Fredericksburg. Pamoja, mamlaka hizi zina akaunti ya wakaazi 407,749. Idadi ya pamoja ya Arlington, Fairfax, Loudoun, na Prince William Counties na miji huru ya Alexandria, Fairfax, Falls Church, Manassas, na Manassas Park ni 2,367,605, ambayo ilikuwa 28.66% ya idadi ya watu wa Virginia mnamo Julai 2013.
neg_context_src: Kama ya sensa ya 2000, kulikuwa na watu 605, kaya 244, na familia 181 zinazoishi katika mji huo. Uzani wa idadi ya watu ulikuwa watu 2,448.2 kwa maili ya mraba (932.8/km). Kulikuwa na vitengo 270 vya makazi kwa wastani wa 1,094.4 kwa maili ya mraba (417.0/km). Ubunifu wa rangi ya mji ulikuwa 99.50% nyeupe na 0.50% American American. Mnamo 2006, kulikuwa na watu wanne kutoka India ya Mashariki, Mmarekani mmoja wa Kiafrika, Kisiwa kimoja cha Pasifiki, na watu kadhaa wa uchimbaji wa Amerika ya Amerika. Watu wengi wana uhusiano wa kifamilia na wakaazi wa Shore ya Mashariki ya Virginia na maeneo kwenye Shore ya Magharibi, kama vile Reedville na Urbanna.

Iliyochapishwa Julai 19, 2010, awamu hii ya kwanza inazingatia ukuaji na ukuaji wa mfumo wa ujasusi wa Merika. Inahoji usimamizi wake, kwani imekuwa "kubwa sana, isiyo na maana, na ya usiri kiasi kwamba hakuna mtu anajua ni pesa ngapi, ni watu wangapi, ni programu ngapi zipo ndani yake, au ni wakala wangapi hufanya kazi hiyo hiyo." Ripoti hiyo inasema kwamba "inakadiriwa watu 854,000, karibu mara 1.5 watu wengi kama wanaishi Washington, D.C., wanashikilia kibali cha usalama wa siri."
Ơ ni moja ya vokali 12 za lugha ya Kivietinamu. Inatamkwa (isiyo na [O]).

Winfield Toll Bridge, pia inajulikana kama Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, ni kihistoria wa kihistoria wa Cantilever Warren Truss Bridge iliyoko Winfield na Red House, Kaunti ya Putnam, West Virginia. Ilijengwa mnamo 1955, na inachukua Mto wa Kanawha, iliyobeba West Virginia Route 34. Cantilever kupitia-truss ina nafasi mbili za nanga kila futi 245 kwa urefu na urefu wa futi 462 kwa urefu kati ya mistari ya kituo cha pier. Span kuu ina futi mbili 128, inchi 4, mikono ya cantilever na miguu 205, inchi 4, iliyosimamishwa.

Kama ya sensa ya 2000, kulikuwa na watu 3,255, kaya 1,424, na familia 868 zilizokaa katika mji huo. Uzani wa idadi ya watu ulikuwa watu 1,059.4 kwa maili ya mraba (409.4/km²). Kulikuwa na vitengo 1,594 vya makazi kwa wastani wa 518.8 kwa maili ya mraba (200.5/km²). Ubunifu wa rangi ya mji ulikuwa 95.24% nyeupe, 1.94% American American, 0.28% Wamarekani, 1.14% Asia, 0.77% kutoka kwa jamii zingine, na 0.65% kutoka kwa jamii mbili au zaidi. Hispanic au Latino ya mbio yoyote walikuwa 1.41% ya idadi ya watu.
Kulikuwa na kaya 1,424 kati yao 26.3% walikuwa na watoto chini ya umri wa miaka 18 wanaoishi nao, 47.0% walikuwa wenzi walioolewa walioishi pamoja, 10.3% walikuwa na nyumba ya kike na hakuna mume aliyekuwepo, na 39.0% hawakuwa familia. 34.6% ya kaya zote zilitengenezwa na watu binafsi na 14.0% walikuwa na mtu anayeishi peke yake ambaye alikuwa na umri wa miaka 65 au zaidi. Saizi ya wastani ya kaya ilikuwa 2.17 na ukubwa wa wastani wa familia ulikuwa 2.79.
