question_en: How old is Drake Hogestyn?
pos_context_en: Donald Drake Hogestyn ( (born September 29, 1953) is an American actor best known for his long running role as John Black on the American soap opera "Days of Our Lives".
neg_context_en: Hogestyn began his acting career by entering a Columbia Pictures talent search that included 75,000 people. Hogestyn was among the 30 selected, and his first starring role was on the prime time series "Seven Brides for Seven Brothers". After a few minor roles (one as Kort, leader of the Micro Workers in the episode 'Princess Metra', on the 80s television series "Otherworld (TV series)"), Hogestyn joined the cast of "Days of our Lives" in 1986. He initially played a mystery man referred to simply as "The Pawn," however, it was soon revealed The Pawn was the presumed dead Roman Brady. Hogestyn quickly became a fan favorite and enjoyed many popular pairings, the most popular of which was the legendary one he shared with longtime co-star Deidre Hall. In 1998, while starring on "Days", Shelley Long wanted Drake to join her for an upcoming series, "Kelly, Kelly". He was set to star in both until the filming of the pilot episode of "Kelly, Kelly" conflicted with his schedule on "Days" and the role went to Robert Hays.

Hogestyn was born in Fort Wayne, Indiana, where he graduated from North Side High School. He attended the University of South Florida in Tampa on a baseball scholarship, majoring in pre-dentistry. He graduated with a double major in microbiology and applied sciences. He was then drafted by two professional baseball organizations: the St. Louis Cardinals and the New York Yankees. Hogestyn signed with the Yankees and played third base for one of their farm teams until he was injured in 1978.

Drake Hogestyn was fired in 2007 as a way to shrink down the budget. Later, in an attempt to stabilize ratings, he was brought back in 2008. As a result, it provided many storyline opportunities for the couple. However, with a vastly shrinking budget things didn't pan out as planned. "Days of Our Lives" was renewed in 2008, but the budget was slashed severely by 40%. To make do with the new restrictions, executive producer Ken Corday was forced to fire his two highest paid actors, Deidre Hall and Drake Hogestyn. Critics slammed the show for their firings, with TV Guide's Nelson Branco saying in an interview, "The show became uglier after Hall and Hogestyn left the airwaves. Many claim it was the beginning of the end for our industry. You’d be hard-pressed to find anyone who would disagree with that statement." Matt Mitovich said their exit was, "Truly the end of an era, as daytime television says goodbye to 'Days of Our Lives' John Black and Dr. Marlena Evans on Friday, Jan. 23. Drake Hogestyn and Deidre Hall, aka John and "Doc," have nearly 12,000 Days appearances between them over the past 32 years. As such, they will leave behind many memories for fans of NBC's long-running (and now only) sudser. The iconic couple will create another magical moment when they say goodbye to Salem and loved ones following this week's hospital bedside wedding ceremony."

On January 24, 1986, daytime newcomer and former minor league baseball player, Drake Hogestyn joined the cast as The Pawn without his bandages, who would later assume the alias John Black. As The Pawn (Glen Vincent, then Robert Poynton) was introduced onscreen in November 1985, the casting department at "Days of Our Lives" had been searching for an older actor to portray The Pawn when Hogestyn wandered into the NBC casting offices to meet with Doris Sabbagh, the head of the casting department at Columbia Pictures about a guest spot on "Crazy Like a Fox". Instead, Sabbagh brought Hogestyn in to audition for "Days". Hogestyn later admitted that he didn't know anything about the role and he thought he had auditioned for ABC's "One Life to Live". Hogestyn was a fan of daytime soaps and his agent had passed on several soap roles "but Drake wanted this one." He watched some episodes and then went to the audition. Though everyone seemed to love him, Hogestyn almost missed out on the role because he was so young. However, it was his screen test with Deidre Hall that put Hogestyn over the top. Hogestyn was chosen out of five other actors and signed a three-year contract.

In 1991, Wayne Northrop agreed to return to "Days" to reprise his role of Roman. In order to keep both actors on the show, Drake's story was retconned and his past rewritten. Despite this change, Hogestyn remained one of the show's most popular actors. The pairing of John Black and Marlena Evans (Deidre Hall) is one of the show's enduring supercouples.

In 2009, after struggling in the ratings for years, "Days of Our Lives" received a two-year pickup. However, the soap's budget was decreased by 40%. To make do with the new restrictions, executive producer Ken Corday was forced to fire Deidre Hall and Drake Hogestyn. Marlena's on screen love interest, Drake Hogestyn, had been fired in early 2007 as a way to clear money in the budget. However, he was brought back in 2008 for storyline purposes and to please fans. The couple were quickly reunited after Drake returned; and then they traveled to Switzerland to treat John's physical disability. Fans were furious with the way the writers wrote John and Marlena out. In an interview with Nelson Branco, Deidre said, "Yes. There was enormous upheaval. I wasn't following a lot of the brouhaha but I was told fans and critics were upset. But it is what it is. Yes, it feels good to hear that fans miss Marlena. People are deeply attached to her."

Drake's John Black character was "killed off" the week of October 15, 2007. It was rumored the character was officially dead and would not be back, but "Days" has a reputation for "killing" many characters and eventually bringing them back. In fact it turned out that John was not really dead at all, but had been abducted by long-time nemesis Stefano DiMera. As of January 8, 2008, Drake was back on "Days of our Lives" in the role he created. Confirmed on November 17, 2008, Drake, along with his long-time co-star, Deidre Hall, were let go from "Days of our Lives" due to budget cuts. Days of Our Lives brought back the characters of John and Marlena starting September 26, 2011.

As his past was slowly being revealed, John was also dismissed from the ISA (due to refusing long-term assignments), and he opened a private investigation firm with Steve Johnson called Black Patch. In late 2016 and early 2017, as Drake Hogestyn was recovering from injuries he sustained in an on-set accident, John's absence was explained at first with a visit to his native Louisiana, then by a long-term "assignment" or "mission", suggesting that John was either working for a high-level client of Black Patch, or had been reinstated in the ISA. Hogestyn's return to the show in mid-2017 was explained as the latter being true, as John returned from a deep-cover ISA assignment only to join his wife Marlena on a rescue mission to save several younger Salemites, including his son Paul, from a deserted island. John's adventures in 2017 included helping Paul solve the mystery of Deimos Kiriakis's murder, and yet another classic soap opera mistaken-identity caper
Hogestyn married his childhood sweetheart Victoria. The couple have four children: three daughters, Whitney, Alexandra and Rachael; and one son, Ben.
question_src: Drake Hogestyn ana umri gani?
pos_context_src: Donald Drake Hogestyn ((amezaliwa Septemba 29, 1953) ni muigizaji wa Amerika anayejulikana kwa jukumu lake la muda mrefu kama John Black kwenye Opera ya Sabuni ya Amerika "Siku zetu za Maisha".
neg_context_src: Hogestyn alianza kazi yake ya kaimu kwa kuingia kwenye utaftaji wa talanta ya Columbia Picha ambayo ni pamoja na watu 75,000. Hogestyn alikuwa mmoja wa wachezaji 30 waliochaguliwa, na jukumu lake la kwanza la nyota lilikuwa kwenye safu ya wakati wa juu "Bibi Saba kwa Ndugu Saba". Baada ya majukumu machache (moja kama Kort, kiongozi wa wafanyikazi wa Micro kwenye sehemu ya 'Princess Metra', kwenye safu ya runinga ya 80s "Wengine World (mfululizo wa TV)"), Hogestyn alijiunga na "Siku za Maisha yetu" mnamo 1986. Hapo awali alicheza mtu wa siri aliyetajwa kama "The Pawn," hata hivyo, alijidhihirisha kwamba Pawn alijidhihirisha kwamba Pawn alijidhihirisha kwamba Pawn alijidhihirisha kwamba Pawn alijidhihirisha kwamba Pawn alijidhihirisha kwamba Pawn alishtuka Hogestyn haraka alikua shabiki anayependa na alifurahiya jozi nyingi maarufu, maarufu zaidi ambayo ilikuwa hadithi ya hadithi aliyoshiriki na Star-Star Deidre Hall wa muda mrefu. Mnamo 1998, alipokuwa akiigiza "Siku", Shelley Long alitaka Drake ajiunge naye kwa safu inayokuja, "Kelly, Kelly". Alikuwa ameamua kuwa nyota wote hadi filamu ya kipindi cha majaribio cha "Kelly, Kelly" iligongana na ratiba yake juu ya "Siku" na jukumu hilo lilikwenda kwa Robert Hays.

Hogestyn alizaliwa huko Fort Wayne, Indiana, ambapo alihitimu kutoka Shule ya Upili ya Kaskazini. Alihudhuria Chuo Kikuu cha Florida Kusini huko Tampa kwenye usomi wa baseball, akifanya kazi katika uwanja wa mapema. Alihitimu na kuu mara mbili katika microbiology na akatumia sayansi. Wakati huo aliandaliwa na mashirika mawili ya kitaalam ya baseball: Makardinali wa St. Louis na New York Yankees. Hogestyn alisaini na Yankees na kucheza msingi wa tatu kwa moja ya timu zao za shamba hadi alipojeruhiwa mnamo 1978.

Drake Hogestyn alifukuzwa kazi mnamo 2007 kama njia ya kupunguza bajeti. Baadaye, katika jaribio la kuleta utulivu, alirudishwa mnamo 2008. Kama matokeo, ilitoa fursa nyingi za hadithi kwa wanandoa. Walakini, na bajeti inayopungua sana mambo hayakutoka kama ilivyopangwa. "Siku za maisha yetu" zilifanywa upya mnamo 2008, lakini bajeti ilipigwa sana na 40%. Kufanya na vizuizi vipya, mtayarishaji mtendaji Ken Corday alilazimishwa kuwasha moto watendaji wake wawili waliolipwa zaidi, Deidre Hall na Drake Hogestyn. Wakosoaji walipiga show hiyo kwa firtings zao, na mwongozo wa Televisheni Nelson Branco akisema katika mahojiano, "Maonyesho hayo yakawa mabaya baada ya Hall na Hogestyn kuacha airwaves. Wengi wanadai kuwa ilikuwa mwanzo wa mwisho wa tasnia yetu. Utakuwa mgumu kupata mtu yeyote ambaye angekubaliana na taarifa hiyo." Matt Mitovich alisema kuondoka kwao ni, "Kweli mwisho wa enzi, kama runinga ya mchana inasema kwaheri kwa 'Siku za Maisha yetu' John Black na Dk. Marlena Evans Ijumaa, Januari 23. Drake Hogestyn na Deidre Hall, AKA John na" Doc, "wanaonekana karibu na siku 12,000 kati yao miaka 32 iliyopita. Wanandoa wa iconic wataunda wakati mwingine wa kichawi wanaposema kwaheri kwa Salem na wapendwa kufuatia sherehe ya harusi ya wiki hii ya hospitalini. "

Mnamo Januari 24, 1986, mgeni wa mchana na mchezaji wa zamani wa baseball wa Ligi ndogo, Drake Hogestyn alijiunga na wahusika kama pawn bila bandeji zake, ambaye baadaye angechukua jina la John Black. Kama Pawn (Glen Vincent, wakati huo Robert Poynton) alianzishwa kwenye skrini mnamo Novemba 1985, idara ya wahusika katika "Siku za Maisha yetu" walikuwa wakitafuta muigizaji mzee kuonyesha pawn wakati Hogestyn alitangatanga katika ofisi za NBC za kukutana na Doris Sabbagh, mkuu wa Idara ya Wahusika wa Columbia. Badala yake, Sabbagh alileta Hogestyn katika ukaguzi wa "siku". Baadaye Hogestyn alikiri kwamba hakujua chochote kuhusu jukumu hilo na alifikiria alikuwa amekagua "Maisha ya Kuishi" ya ABC. Hogestyn alikuwa shabiki wa sabuni za mchana na wakala wake alikuwa amepitisha majukumu kadhaa ya sabuni "lakini Drake alitaka hii." Alitazama vipindi kadhaa kisha akaenda kwenye ukaguzi. Ingawa kila mtu alionekana kumpenda, Hogestyn karibu alikosa jukumu hilo kwa sababu alikuwa mchanga sana. Walakini, ilikuwa mtihani wake wa skrini na Deidre Hall ambayo iliweka Hogestyn juu. Hogestyn alichaguliwa kati ya watendaji wengine watano na kusaini mkataba wa miaka tatu.

Mnamo 1991, Wayne Northrop alikubali kurudi "siku" ili kuchukua jukumu lake la Kirumi. Ili kuweka watendaji wote kwenye onyesho, hadithi ya Drake ilirudiwa tena na maandishi yake ya zamani. Pamoja na mabadiliko haya, Hogestyn alibaki mmoja wa waigizaji maarufu wa onyesho. Pairing ya John Black na Marlena Evans (Deidre Hall) ni moja wapo ya maonyesho ya kudumu ya show.

Mnamo 2009, baada ya kujitahidi katika makadirio kwa miaka, "Siku za Maisha yetu" zilipokea picha ya miaka mbili. Walakini, bajeti ya SOAP ilipunguzwa kwa 40%. Kufanya na vizuizi vipya, mtayarishaji mtendaji Ken Corday alilazimishwa kuwasha moto Deidre Hall na Drake Hogestyn. Marlena juu ya riba ya upendo wa skrini, Drake Hogestyn, alikuwa amefukuzwa kazi mapema 2007 kama njia ya kusafisha pesa katika bajeti. Walakini, alirudishwa mnamo 2008 kwa madhumuni ya hadithi na kufurahisha mashabiki. Wenzi hao waliunganishwa haraka baada ya Drake kurudi; Na kisha walisafiri kwenda Uswizi kutibu ulemavu wa mwili wa John. Mashabiki walikasirika na jinsi waandishi waliandika John na Marlena nje. Katika mahojiano na Nelson Branco, Deidre alisema, "Ndio. Kulikuwa na machafuko makubwa. Sikuwa nikifuata brouhaha nyingi lakini niliambiwa mashabiki na wakosoaji walikasirika. Lakini ndivyo ilivyo. Ndio, inahisi kusikia kuwa mashabiki wanakosa Marlena. Watu wameunganishwa sana."

Tabia ya Drake ya John Black "iliuawa" wiki ya Oktoba 15, 2007. Ilinaswa na tabia hiyo ilikuwa imekufa rasmi na haingerudi, lakini "Siku" zina sifa ya "kuua" wahusika wengi na mwishowe kuwarudisha. Kwa kweli iligeuka kuwa John hakuwa amekufa kabisa, lakini alikuwa ametekwa nyara na Nemesis Stefano Dimera wa muda mrefu. Kufikia Januari 8, 2008, Drake alikuwa nyuma kwenye "Siku za Maisha yetu" katika jukumu alilounda. Ilithibitishwa mnamo Novemba 17, 2008, Drake, pamoja na nyota mwenza wa muda mrefu, Deidre Hall, waliachiliwa kutoka "Siku za Maisha yetu" kwa sababu ya kupunguzwa kwa bajeti. Siku za maisha yetu zilirudisha wahusika wa John na Marlena kuanzia Septemba 26, 2011.

Kama zamani zake zilifunuliwa polepole, John pia alifukuzwa kutoka ISA (kwa sababu ya kukataa kazi za muda mrefu), na akafungua kampuni ya uchunguzi ya kibinafsi na Steve Johnson anayeitwa Black Patch. Mwishoni mwa mwaka wa 2016 na mwanzoni mwa 2017, wakati Drake Hogestyn alikuwa akipona kutokana na majeraha aliyokuwa akipata katika ajali iliyowekwa, kutokuwepo kwa John ilielezewa mwanzoni na ziara ya Louisiana yake ya asili, kisha kwa "mgawo" wa muda mrefu au "misheni", na kupendekeza kwamba John alikuwa akifanya kazi kwa mteja wa kiwango cha juu cha Black Patch, au alikuwa amesisitiza tena. Kurudi kwa Hogestyn kwenye show katikati ya mwaka wa 2017 kulielezewa kama wa mwisho kuwa kweli, wakati John alirudi kutoka kwa mgawo wa ISA wa kina tu ili ajiunge na mkewe Marlena kwenye misheni ya uokoaji ili kuokoa Salemites kadhaa, pamoja na mtoto wake Paul, kutoka kisiwa kilichoachwa. Adventures ya John mnamo 2017 ni pamoja na kumsaidia Paul kutatua siri ya mauaji ya Deimos Kiriakis, na bado opera nyingine ya kitambulisho cha sabuni iliyokosea
Hogestyn alioa mpenzi wake wa utoto Victoria. Wanandoa wana watoto wanne: binti watatu, Whitney, Alexandra na Rachael; na mwana mmoja, Ben.

question_en: How large is Antarctica?
pos_context_en: Positioned asymmetrically around the South Pole and largely south of the Antarctic Circle, Antarctica is the southernmost continent and is surrounded by the Southern Ocean; alternatively, it may be considered to be surrounded by the southern Pacific, Atlantic, and Indian Oceans, or by the southern waters of the World Ocean. There are a number of rivers and lakes in Antarctica, the longest river being the Onyx. The largest lake, Vostok, is one of the largest sub-glacial lakes in the world. Antarctica covers more than , making it the fifth-largest continent, about 1.3 times as large as Europe. The coastline measures and is mostly characterised by ice formations, as the following table shows:
neg_context_en: Hamilton led a two-man field party in Antarctica (October 1958–January 1959) for the International Geophysical Year, and launched a new understanding of Antarctica. He was the first to apply the name trans-Antarctic Mountains (two years later, formalized as Transantarctic Mountains) to that 3,500 km range. Hamilton recognized that a large sector of this range contained distinctive granitic rocks like South Australia's Adelaide orogenic belt. Associated fossils of diverse ages in Antarctica, Australia, and southernmost Africa further linked these continents, and supported then-radical explanations of continental drift. Before traveling to Antarctica, Hamilton was what he later described as a "closet drifter," aware that Southern Hemisphere geology provided powerful evidence favoring continental drift. He returned to Antarctica for fieldwork in 1963 and 1964 in other parts of the Transantarctic Mountains, including those once continuous with other Australian tracts. He also investigated in the field evidence for drift in Australia and South Africa, integrating his work with that of other researchers to show how Antarctica and other Gondwana continents had drifted apart.

Some of Antarctica has been warming up; particularly strong warming has been noted on the Antarctic Peninsula. A study by Eric Steig published in 2009 noted for the first time that the continent-wide average surface temperature trend of Antarctica is slightly positive at >0.05 °C (0.09 °F) per decade from 1957 to 2006. This study also noted that West Antarctica has warmed by more than 0.1 °C (0.2 °F) per decade in the last 50 years, and this warming is strongest in winter and spring. This is partly offset by autumn cooling in East Antarctica. There is evidence from one study that Antarctica is warming as a result of human carbon dioxide emissions, but this remains ambiguous. The amount of surface warming in West Antarctica, while large, has not led to appreciable melting at the surface, and is not directly affecting the West Antarctic Ice Sheet's contribution to sea level. Instead the recent increases in glacier outflow are believed to be due to an inflow of warm water from the deep ocean, just off the continental shelf. The net contribution to sea level from the Antarctic Peninsula is more likely to be a direct result of the much greater atmospheric warming there.

West Antarctica, or Lesser Antarctica, one of the two major regions of Antarctica, is the part of that continent that lies within the Western Hemisphere, and includes the Antarctic Peninsula. It is separated from East Antarctica by the Transantarctic Mountains and is covered by the West Antarctic Ice Sheet. It lies between the Ross Sea (partly covered by the Ross Ice Shelf), and the Weddell Sea (largely covered by the Filchner-Ronne Ice Shelf). It may be considered a giant peninsula stretching from the South Pole towards the tip of South America.

Antarctica, on average, is the coldest, driest, and windiest continent, and has the highest average elevation of all the continents. Most of Antarctica is a polar desert, with annual precipitation of only 200 mm (8 in) along the coast and far less inland. The temperature in Antarctica has reached −89.2 °C (−128.6 °F) (or even −94.7 °C (−135.8 °F) as measured from space), though the average for the third quarter (the coldest part of the year) is −63 °C (−81 °F). Anywhere from 1,000 to 5,000 people reside throughout the year at research stations scattered across the continent. Organisms native to Antarctica include many types of algae, bacteria, fungi, plants, protista, and certain animals, such as mites, nematodes, penguins, seals and tardigrades. Vegetation, where it occurs, is tundra.

Nearly all of Antarctica is covered by a sheet of ice that is, on average, a mile thick or more (1.6 km). Antarctica contains 90% of the world's ice and more than 70% of its fresh water. If all the land-ice covering Antarctica were to melt — around of ice — the seas would rise by over . This is, however, very unlikely within the next few centuries. The Antarctic is so cold that even with increases of a few degrees, temperatures would generally remain below the melting point of ice. Higher temperatures are expected to lead to more precipitation, which takes the form of snow. This would increase the amount of ice in Antarctica, offsetting approximately one third of the expected sea level rise from thermal expansion of the oceans.
During a recent decade, East Antarctica thickened at an average rate of about 1.8 centimetres per year while West Antarctica showed an overall thinning of 0.9 centimetres per year. For the contribution of Antarctica to present and future sea level change, see sea level rise. Because ice flows, albeit slowly, the ice within the ice sheet is younger than the age of the sheet itself.

Since 2001, Noble has been researching and visiting the Antarctic, and has produced several series of works on this subject, including "Antarctica Iceblink" and "Antarctica Whiteout". These works are often concerned with how Antarctica has been portrayed in popular perceptions, exploring how we have come to see Antarctica as 'a glistening white world where penguins frolic and snowflakes fall'.

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.

Antarctica ( or , ) is Earth's southernmost continent. It contains the geographic South Pole and is situated in the Antarctic region of the Southern Hemisphere, almost entirely south of the Antarctic Circle, and is surrounded by the Southern Ocean. At , it is the fifth-largest continent. For comparison, Antarctica is nearly twice the size of Australia. About 98% of Antarctica is covered by ice that averages in thickness, which extends to all but the northernmost reaches of the Antarctic Peninsula.
question_src: Antarctica ni kubwa kiasi gani?
pos_context_src: Nafasi ya asymmetrically kuzunguka pole ya kusini na kwa kiasi kikubwa kusini mwa mzunguko wa Antarctic, Antarctica ndio bara la kusini na limezungukwa na Bahari ya Kusini; Vinginevyo, inaweza kuzingatiwa kuzungukwa na Bahari ya Kusini mwa Pasifiki, Atlantic, na Hindi, au maji ya kusini ya Bahari ya Dunia. Kuna idadi ya mito na maziwa huko Antarctica, mto mrefu zaidi kuwa onyx. Ziwa kubwa zaidi, Vostok, ni moja ya maziwa makubwa zaidi ulimwenguni. Antarctica inashughulikia zaidi ya, na kuifanya bara la tano kwa ukubwa, karibu mara 1.3 kubwa kama Ulaya. Vipimo vya pwani na inaonyeshwa zaidi na muundo wa barafu, kama meza ifuatayo inavyoonyesha:

neg_context_src: Hamilton aliongoza sherehe ya uwanja wa watu wawili huko Antarctica (Oktoba 1958-Januari 1959) kwa mwaka wa kimataifa wa jiografia, na akazindua uelewa mpya wa Antarctica. Alikuwa wa kwanza kutumia jina la Milima ya Trans-Antarctic (miaka miwili baadaye, iliyoandaliwa kama Milima ya Transantarctic) kwa aina hiyo ya km 3,500. Hamilton alitambua kuwa sekta kubwa ya safu hii ilikuwa na miamba ya granitic ya kipekee kama ukanda wa Adelaide Orogenic wa Australia Kusini. Fossils zinazohusiana na umri tofauti huko Antarctica, Australia, na kusini mwa Afrika ziliunganisha zaidi mabara haya, na kuunga mkono maelezo ya wakati huo ya drift ya bara. Kabla ya kusafiri kwenda Antarctica, Hamilton ndivyo alivyoelezea baadaye kama "chumbani," akijua kuwa Jiolojia ya Hemisphere ya Kusini ilitoa ushahidi wenye nguvu unaopendelea kuteleza kwa Bara. Alirudi Antarctica kwa kazi ya shamba mnamo 1963 na 1964 katika sehemu zingine za Milima ya Transantarctic, pamoja na zile zilizokuwa zikiendelea na trakti zingine za Australia. Alichunguza pia katika ushahidi wa uwanja wa Drift huko Australia na Afrika Kusini, akiunganisha kazi yake na ile ya watafiti wengine kuonyesha jinsi Antarctica na mabara mengine ya Gondwana yalitengana.

Baadhi ya Antarctica imekuwa ikiongezeka; Hasa joto kali limeonekana kwenye peninsula ya Antarctic. Utafiti uliofanywa na Eric Steig uliochapishwa mnamo 2009 ulibainika kwa mara ya kwanza kwamba hali ya wastani ya joto ya uso wa Antarctica ni chanya kidogo kwa> 0.05 ° C (0.09 ° F) kwa muongo mmoja kutoka 1957 hadi 2006. Utafiti huu pia ulibaini kuwa miaka ya Antarctica imeongezeka kwa zaidi ya 50 ya joto. Hii ni sehemu iliyosababishwa na baridi ya vuli huko Antarctica Mashariki. Kuna ushahidi kutoka kwa utafiti mmoja kwamba Antarctica ina joto kama matokeo ya uzalishaji wa kaboni dioksidi kaboni, lakini hii inabaki kuwa ngumu. Kiasi cha joto la uso huko Antarctica Magharibi, wakati ni kubwa, haijasababisha kuyeyuka kwa uso, na haiathiri moja kwa moja mchango wa Karatasi ya Ice ya Antarctic katika kiwango cha bahari. Badala yake ongezeko la hivi karibuni la utaftaji wa barafu linaaminika kuwa ni kwa sababu ya uingiaji wa maji ya joto kutoka bahari ya kina, nje ya rafu ya bara. Mchango wa jumla kwa usawa wa bahari kutoka kwa peninsula ya Antarctic ina uwezekano mkubwa wa kuwa matokeo ya moja kwa moja ya joto kubwa zaidi ya anga huko.

West Antarctica, au Antarctica ndogo, moja ya mikoa kuu ya Antarctica, ni sehemu ya bara hilo ambalo liko ndani ya ulimwengu wa Magharibi, na ni pamoja na peninsula ya Antarctic. Imetengwa kutoka Antarctica ya Mashariki na Milima ya Transantarctic na inafunikwa na karatasi ya barafu ya Antarctic Magharibi. Iko kati ya Bahari ya Ross (sehemu iliyofunikwa na rafu ya barafu ya Ross), na Bahari ya Weddell (iliyofunikwa sana na Rafu ya Ice ya Filchner-Ronne). Inaweza kuzingatiwa kama peninsula kubwa inayoanzia kwenye pole ya kusini kuelekea ncha ya Amerika Kusini.

Antarctica, kwa wastani, ni bara baridi zaidi, kavu na zaidi, na ina mwinuko wa wastani wa mabara yote. Zaidi ya Antarctica ni jangwa la polar, na mvua ya kila mwaka ya 200 mm (8 in) kando ya pwani na chini sana. Joto huko Antarctica limefikia −89.2 ° C (−128.6 ° F) (au hata −94.7 ° C (−135.8 ° F) kama kipimo kutoka nafasi), ingawa wastani wa robo ya tatu (sehemu ya baridi zaidi ya mwaka) ni −63 ° C ( - 81 f). Mahali popote kutoka kwa watu 1,000 hadi 5,000 hukaa mwaka mzima katika vituo vya utafiti vilivyotawanyika kote bara. Viumbe asili ya Antarctica ni pamoja na aina nyingi za mwani, bakteria, kuvu, mimea, protista, na wanyama fulani, kama vile sarafu, nematode, penguins, mihuri na tardigrades. Mboga, ambapo hufanyika, ni tundra.

Karibu yote ya Antarctica inafunikwa na karatasi ya barafu ambayo, kwa wastani, maili nene au zaidi (km 1.6). Antarctica ina 90% ya barafu ya ulimwengu na zaidi ya 70% ya maji yake safi. Ikiwa barafu yote ya ardhi inayofunika Antarctica ingeyeyuka-karibu na barafu-bahari zingeongezeka zaidi. Hii ni, hata hivyo, uwezekano mkubwa katika karne chache zijazo. Antarctic ni baridi sana kwamba hata na kuongezeka kwa digrii chache, joto kwa ujumla lingebaki chini ya kiwango cha barafu. Joto la juu linatarajiwa kusababisha mvua zaidi, ambayo inachukua fomu ya theluji. Hii ingeongeza kiwango cha barafu huko Antarctica, kumaliza takriban theluthi moja ya kiwango cha bahari kinachotarajiwa kutoka kwa upanuzi wa mafuta ya bahari.
Katika muongo wa hivi karibuni, Antarctica ya Mashariki iliongezeka kwa kiwango cha wastani cha sentimita 1.8 kwa mwaka wakati Antarctica Magharibi ilionyesha kupungua kwa sentimita 0.9 kwa mwaka. Kwa mchango wa Antarctica ya sasa na ya baadaye mabadiliko ya kiwango cha bahari, angalia kiwango cha bahari. Kwa sababu barafu inapita, pamoja na polepole, barafu ndani ya karatasi ya barafu ni mchanga kuliko umri wa karatasi yenyewe.

Pia ilidai kuwa njia nyeupe za moshi kama vile kuonekana nyuma ya kombora kwenye onyesho kawaida hufanyika kutoka kwa uzinduzi wa kombora la ardhini, na kamwe na makombora ya hewa-hewa.

Tangu 2001, Noble amekuwa akitafiti na kutembelea Antarctic, na ametoa kazi kadhaa juu ya mada hii, pamoja na "Antarctica Iceblink" na "Antarctica Whiteout". Kazi hizi mara nyingi zinajali na jinsi Antarctica imeonyeshwa kwa maoni maarufu, ikichunguza jinsi ambavyo tumekuja kuona Antarctica kama 'ulimwengu mweupe unaong'aa ambapo penguins frolic na theluji zinaanguka'.

Winfield Toll Bridge, pia inajulikana kama Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, ni kihistoria wa kihistoria wa Cantilever Warren Truss Bridge iliyoko Winfield na Red House, Kaunti ya Putnam, West Virginia. Ilijengwa mnamo 1955, na inachukua Mto wa Kanawha, iliyobeba West Virginia Route 34. Cantilever kupitia-truss ina nafasi mbili za nanga kila futi 245 kwa urefu na urefu wa futi 462 kwa urefu kati ya mistari ya kituo cha pier. Span kuu ina futi mbili 128, inchi 4, mikono ya cantilever na miguu 205, inchi 4, iliyosimamishwa.

Antarctica (AU,) ni bara la kusini kabisa duniani. Inayo jiografia ya kusini na iko katika mkoa wa Antarctic wa ulimwengu wa kusini, karibu kusini mwa mzunguko wa Antarctic, na imezungukwa na Bahari ya Kusini. Katika, ni bara kubwa zaidi. Kwa kulinganisha, Antarctica ni karibu mara mbili ya ukubwa wa Australia. Karibu 98% ya Antarctica inafunikwa na barafu ambayo inaenea kwa unene, ambayo inaenea kwa wote lakini kaskazini mwa ufikiaji wa peninsula ya Antarctic.

question_en: How many copies did Salem's Lot sell?
pos_context_en:
Politics during the time influenced King's writing of the story. The corruption in the government was a significant factor in the inspiration of the story. Of this he recalls,
In 2005, Centipede Press released a deluxe limited edition of "'Salem's Lot" with black and white photographs by Jerry Uelsmann and the two short stories "Jerusalem's Lot" and "One for the Road", as well as over 50 pages of deleted material. The book was limited to 315 copies, each signed by Stephen King and Jerry Uelsmann. The book was printed on 100# Mohawk Superfine paper, it measured , was over thick, and weighed more than . The book included a ribbon marker, head and tail bands, three-piece cloth construction, and a slipcase. An unsigned hardcover edition limited to 600 copies, was later released. Both the signed and unsigned editions were sold out. In an interview with the printed trade journal "Fine Books & Collections", King said of the illustrated folio version of his "'Salem's Lot", "I think it's beautiful!" A trade edition was later released.
neg_context_en: According to Judith and Neil Morgan, the book sold well immediately. The trade edition initially sold an average of 12,000 copies a month, a figure which rose rapidly. Bullock's department store in Los Angeles, California, sold out of its first, 100-copy order of the book in a day and quickly reordered 250 more. The Morgans attribute these sales numbers to "playground word-of-mouth", asserting that children heard about the book from their friends and nagged their parents to buy it for them. However, Houghton Mifflin's school edition did not sell as well. As Geisel noted in Jonathan Cott's 1983 profile of him, "Houghton Mifflin... had trouble selling it to the schools; there were a lot of Dick and Jane devotees, and my book was considered too fresh and irreverent. But Bennett Cerf at Random House had asked for trade rights, and it just took off in the bookstores." Geisel told the Morgans, "Parents understood better than school people the necessity for this kind of reader."

By 1933 the painting was famous enough to be the subject of a notable article in the Welsh language magazine "Y Ford Gron" (The Round Table) and by 1937, "Salem" gained yet more popularity when Sir Ifan ab Owen Edwards sold thousands of prints to supporters of the Urdd Gobaith Cymru for 6d. By 1942 it was described by "Yr Aelwyd" as "One of the most beautiful pictures of the religious life of Wales in old times" and in 1950, 1956 and 1957 many more Welsh households obtained copies when the picture was used in the Cymru Fydd calendar. By the 1960s, the painting was famous throughout Wales and was ubiquitous in many Welsh communities.

In 2006 the "Salem Gazette" was resurrected under the banner of GateHouse Media, and currently operates as a free weekly newspaper focusing on culture, daily life and human interest in Salem. New editions of the paper are distributed on Fridays. The paper prints approximately 13,000 copies per week. The first editor of the new Salem Gazette was Bill Woolley, followed by Lisa Guerriero, current editor of the "Melrose Free Press". Since 2011, the editor of the "Salem Gazette" has been Sarah Thomas.

Sales exceeded the estimates of IPS and the expectations of the creators themselves. Chmielarz sold between 4,000 and 6,000 copies by mail at a time when just a thousand or two thousand units was considered a major achievement. Even foreign Western hits had rarely achieved that level of sales. Additionally, the market was still dominated by rampant piracy. At a time where democracy and capitalism were just being introduced to Poland and in which The Software Protection Act was just being created – coming into effect in 1994 – players were not used to paying high amounts for original not-bootlegged games. Polish developers had become accustomed to players pirating their games, and continued to spend months on titles despite little return. According to Chmielarz, the main reason for this cultural landscape was the commodity exchange which he himself came from, and he was very critical about pirates, particular those who had tried to hack his own game. One such example is CSL, who had been publicly highlighted by "Gambler" magazine as the "'best' Polish hacker" for cracking "Tajemnica statuetki" among other titles. Nevertheless, despite the game being frequently pirated, a sizable number of units were sold legally. Part of the reason is that CSL had only completed a partial hack, leaving some copy protection codes unbroken, a fact discovered by Chmielarz upon testing. "SS-NG" ("Secret Service - Next Generation") puts "Tajemnica Statuetki"'s success in a piracy-prone market to it being reasonably cheap and comparable to English-language adventure games. Due to the difficulty of the game, particularly a puzzle set when the protagonist is trying to escape from prison, Chmielarz received incessant calls from players who stuck unable to move on; he would have to explain the "absurd" solution over the phone. Just with the profits of those initial sales, he was able to keep Metropolis Software running for two years without financial difficulty. "SS-NG" notes that its contemporaries had begun making games for 8-bit computers, which freed up the market for Metropolis Software to pursue PC game development without competition. The game's success gave the development team enough faith to put everything else aside in creating the next game. They planned for this next title to follow in the footsteps of its success, being competitive not only in Poland but also in foreign countries. As the game sold well, both players and reviewers eagerly awaited the next offering from this young studio. The studio had set the bar very high with "Tajemnica Statuetki", and so to avoid half-measures being taken, graphic designers, animators and testers were hired.

Shortly after its release, "Slay Tracks" became a collector's item. According to an April 1990 Drag City press release, copies were typically sold for $500–$600. Malkmus and Kannberg each kept 100 copies of the EP, and Malkmus said "I used to sell them for fifty dollars. When I needed money I'd go in and sell a couple to the store and they'd sell for a hundred dollars each. I rarely meet anyone who bought it when it originally came out." Malkmus also said that the pair "probably gave away about one-hundred to friends and bands we later toured with." The songs on "Slay Tracks" found airplay on several college radio stations, including University of Virginia's WTJU and University of California, Berkeley's KALX. Kannberg commented on the EP's unanticipated popularity, saying "It was very surprising to find that people were into ["Slay Tracks"]."

Mnamo 2005, Centipede Press ilitoa toleo la Deluxe Limited la "'Salem's Lot" na picha nyeusi na nyeupe na Jerry Uelsmann na hadithi mbili fupi "Jerusalem's Lot" na "Moja kwa Barabara", na pia zaidi ya kurasa 50 za nyenzo zilizofutwa. Kitabu hicho kilikuwa na nakala 315, kila mmoja aliyesainiwa na Stephen King na Jerry Uelsmann. Kitabu hicho kilichapishwa kwenye karatasi 100# Mohawk Superfine, ilipima, ilikuwa juu ya nene, na uzani zaidi ya. Kitabu hiki kilijumuisha alama ya Ribbon, kichwa na bendi za mkia, ujenzi wa kitambaa-kipande tatu, na slipcase. Toleo la hardcover ambalo halijasajiliwa kwa nakala 600, baadaye lilitolewa. Toleo zote mbili zilizosainiwa na ambazo hazijasajiliwa ziliuzwa. Katika mahojiano na jarida la biashara lililochapishwa "Vitabu Vizuri na Makusanyo", King alisema juu ya toleo la picha ya "Salem's Lot", "Nadhani ni nzuri!" Toleo la biashara baadaye lilitolewa.
neg_context_title_src: Mgogoro juu ya ulimwengu usio na kipimo
neg_context_src: Kulingana na Judith na Neil Morgan, kitabu hicho kiliuza vizuri mara moja. Toleo la biashara hapo awali liliuza wastani wa nakala 12,000 kwa mwezi, takwimu ambayo iliongezeka haraka. Duka la Idara ya Bullock huko Los Angeles, California, liliuza nje ya agizo lake la kwanza, nakala ya nakala 100 kwa siku na haraka ikapanga tena 250 zaidi. Wargans huonyesha nambari hizi za mauzo kuwa "uwanja wa michezo-wa-kinywa", wakisema kwamba watoto walisikia juu ya kitabu hicho kutoka kwa marafiki wao na kuwachanganya wazazi wao ili wainunue. Walakini, toleo la shule la Horton Mifflin halikuuza pia. Kama Geisel alivyosema katika maelezo mafupi ya Jonathan Cott ya 1983 ya yeye, "Horton Mifflin ... alikuwa na shida kuiuza kwa shule hizo; kulikuwa na Dick na Jane wa kujitolea, na kitabu changu kilizingatiwa kuwa safi sana na kisicho na heshima. Lakini Bennett Cerf katika Nyumba isiyo ya kawaida alikuwa ameuliza haki za biashara, na ilichukuliwa tu kwenye duka la vitabu." Geisel aliwaambia Morgans, "Wazazi walielewa bora kuliko watu wa shule umuhimu wa msomaji wa aina hii."

Kufikia 1933 uchoraji ulikuwa maarufu vya kutosha kuwa mada ya nakala mashuhuri katika jarida la lugha ya Wales "Y Ford Gron" (meza ya pande zote) na mnamo 1937, "Salem" ilipata umaarufu zaidi wakati Sir Ifan Ab Owen Edward aliuza maelfu ya prints kwa wafuasi wa Urdd Gobaith Cymru kwa 6d. Kufikia 1942 ilielezewa na "yr aelwyd" kama "moja ya picha nzuri zaidi ya maisha ya kidini ya Wales katika nyakati za zamani" na mnamo 1950, 1956 na 1957 kaya nyingi zaidi za Wales zilipata nakala wakati picha hiyo ilitumika kwenye kalenda ya Cymru Fydd. Kufikia miaka ya 1960, uchoraji ulikuwa maarufu kote Wales na ulikuwa wa kawaida katika jamii nyingi za Wales.

Mnamo 2006 "Salem Gazette" ilifufuliwa chini ya bendera ya Media Media, na kwa sasa inafanya kazi kama gazeti la bure la wiki linalozingatia utamaduni, maisha ya kila siku na shauku ya kibinadamu huko Salem. Matoleo mapya ya karatasi yanasambazwa Ijumaa. Karatasi inachapisha nakala takriban 13,000 kwa wiki. Mhariri wa kwanza wa gazeti mpya la Salem alikuwa Bill Woolley, akifuatiwa na Lisa Guerriero, mhariri wa sasa wa "Melrose Free Press". Tangu 2011, mhariri wa "Gazeti la Salem" amekuwa Sarah Thomas.

Wolfman alisema wakati aliweka safu ya DC, aligundua itakuwa mwanzo mpya kabisa kwa DCU. "Nilijua mbele, na walifanya pia, hii itakuwa kubwa," alisema. "Lakini, hakuna mtu aliyejua jinsi ingeuza vizuri, au ikiwa ingeuza kabisa. Ilikuwa hatari DC ilikuwa tayari kuchukua, kwa sababu mawazo yangu yalikuwa kwamba DC ilihitaji msaada mwingi wakati huo, na walifanya pia." Wolfman pia alisema aliona kama jaribio la kuboresha sifa ya DC kwa hadithi. Wasomaji wengi wakati huo waliona wakiwa wa zamani.

Winfield Toll Bridge, pia inajulikana kama Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, ni kihistoria wa kihistoria wa Cantilever Warren Truss Bridge iliyoko Winfield na Red House, Kaunti ya Putnam, West Virginia. Ilijengwa mnamo 1955, na inachukua Mto wa Kanawha, iliyobeba West Virginia Route 34. Cantilever kupitia-truss ina nafasi mbili za nanga kila futi 245 kwa urefu na urefu wa futi 462 kwa urefu kati ya mistari ya kituo cha pier. Span kuu ina futi mbili 128, inchi 4, mikono ya cantilever na miguu 205, inchi 4, iliyosimamishwa.

Mnamo Septemba 2016, baada ya kupata TWC, Charter ilionyesha ingekuwa bei ya msimu wa 2017 juu ya $ 4.50. "[Mpango wa zamani] hauko tena kwenye meza - haikufanya kazi," mtendaji mkuu wa Charter Thomas Rutledge kwa "Los Angeles Times". "Tunapenda kuuza kituo kwa wengine, lakini hakuna mtu aliyeinunua - na hatujatoa. Kwa hivyo ikiwa watumiaji wanataka kituo cha Dodger, watahitaji kujiandikisha ili tupate."

Uuzaji ulizidi makadirio ya IPs na matarajio ya waundaji wenyewe. Chmielarz aliuza kati ya nakala 4,000 hadi 6,000 kwa barua wakati ambao vitengo elfu moja au mbili vilizingatiwa kuwa mafanikio makubwa. Hata hits za Magharibi za Magharibi hazikufanikiwa sana kiwango hicho cha mauzo. Kwa kuongeza, soko lilikuwa bado linaongozwa na uharamia ulioenea. Kwa wakati ambapo demokrasia na ubepari zilikuwa zikitambulishwa tu kwa Poland na ambayo Sheria ya Ulinzi wa Programu ilikuwa ikiundwa tu-ilianza kutumika mnamo 1994-wachezaji hawakutumiwa kulipa viwango vya juu kwa michezo ya asili isiyo na bootlegged. Watengenezaji wa Kipolishi walikuwa wamezoea wachezaji wakipiga michezo yao, na waliendelea kutumia miezi kadhaa kwenye majina licha ya kurudi kidogo. Kulingana na Chmielarz, sababu kuu ya mazingira haya ya kitamaduni ilikuwa ubadilishanaji wa bidhaa ambayo yeye mwenyewe alitoka, na alikuwa mkosoaji sana juu ya maharamia, haswa wale ambao walikuwa wamejaribu kudanganya mchezo wake mwenyewe. Mfano mmoja kama huo ni CSL, ambaye alikuwa ameonyeshwa hadharani na jarida la "Gambler" kama "'bora' Kipolishi Hacker" cha kupasuka "Tajemnica Statuetki" kati ya majina mengine. Walakini, licha ya mchezo kuwa mara kwa mara, idadi kubwa ya vitengo viliuzwa kihalali. Sehemu ya sababu ni kwamba CSL ilikuwa imekamilisha tu utapeli wa sehemu, ikiacha nambari za ulinzi wa nakala zisizovunjika, ukweli uliogunduliwa na Chmielarz juu ya upimaji. "SS-ng" ("Huduma ya Siri-Kizazi kijacho") inaweka mafanikio ya "Tajemnica Statuetki" katika soko la uharamia kuwa na bei rahisi na kulinganishwa na michezo ya adha ya lugha ya Kiingereza. Kwa sababu ya ugumu wa mchezo, haswa picha iliyowekwa wakati mhusika mkuu anajaribu kutoroka kutoka gerezani, Chmielarz alipokea simu zisizo sawa kutoka kwa wachezaji ambao walishikilia hawawezi kuendelea; Angelazimika kuelezea suluhisho la "upuuzi" juu ya simu. Na faida tu ya mauzo hayo ya awali, aliweza kuweka programu ya Metropolis inayoendesha kwa miaka miwili bila ugumu wa kifedha. "SS-NG" inabaini kuwa yake Wadau walikuwa wameanza kutengeneza michezo kwa kompyuta 8-bit, ambazo zilitoa soko la programu ya Metropolis kufuata maendeleo ya mchezo wa PC bila ushindani. Kufanikiwa kwa mchezo huo kulipa timu ya maendeleo imani ya kutosha kuweka kila kitu kingine kando katika kuunda mchezo unaofuata. Walipanga jina hili lijalo kufuata nyayo za mafanikio yake, kuwa na ushindani sio tu huko Poland lakini pia katika nchi za nje. Wakati mchezo uliuzwa vizuri, wachezaji na wakaguzi wote walingojea kwa hamu toleo linalofuata kutoka kwa studio hii vijana. Studio ilikuwa imeweka bar juu sana na "Tajemnica Statuetki", na kwa hivyo kuzuia hatua za nusu kuchukuliwa, wabuni wa picha, wahuishaji na majaribio waliajiriwa.
Sanaʽa alichaguliwa kama mji mkuu wa kitamaduni wa Kiarabu na Ligi ya Kiarabu. Mnamo 2008, Msikiti wa Al Saleh ulikamilishwa. Inashikilia waabudu zaidi ya 40,000.

Muda kidogo baada ya kutolewa kwake, "Slay Tracks" ikawa bidhaa ya ushuru. Kulingana na taarifa ya vyombo vya habari vya Aprili 1990 Drag, nakala kawaida ziliuzwa kwa $ 500- $ 600. Malkmus na Kannberg kila mmoja aliweka nakala 100 za EP, na Malkmus alisema "Nilikuwa nikiuza kwa dola hamsini. Wakati nilihitaji pesa ningeingia na kuuza wanandoa dukani na wangeuza kwa dola mia kila moja. Mara chache sikukutana na mtu yeyote ambaye alinunua wakati asili ilitoka." Malkmus pia alisema kwamba jozi "labda ilitoa karibu mia moja kwa marafiki na bendi ambazo baadaye tuliomba nao." Nyimbo kwenye "Slay Tracks" zilipata Airplay kwenye vituo kadhaa vya redio za chuo kikuu, pamoja na Chuo Kikuu cha WTJU cha Chuo Kikuu cha Virginia na Chuo Kikuu cha California, Berkeley's Kalx. Kannberg alitoa maoni juu ya umaarufu usiotarajiwa wa EP, akisema "ilishangaza sana kupata kwamba watu walikuwa kwenye [" Nyimbo za Slay "]."
report_src: Kulingana na maelezo ya uchapishaji, toleo la Deluxe Limited la “‘Salem’s Lot” lilitolewa na likawa na nakala 315 zilizosainiwa ambazo zote ziliuzwa, kisha likafuata toleo la hardcover lisilo na saini lenye nakala 600 ambazo pia ziliuzwa; jumla ya nakala zilizouzwa kupitia matoleo haya mawili ilikuwa hivyo 915 (315 + 600) [1].

question_en: What is the U.S. National Debt?
pos_context_en: U.S. household and non-profit net worth exceeded $100 trillion for the first time in Q1 2018; it has been setting records since Q4 2012. The U.S. federal government or "national debt" was $21.1 trillion in May 2018, just over 100% GDP. Using a subset of the national debt called "debt held by the public", U.S. debt was approximately 77% GDP in 2017. By this measure, the U.S. ranked 43rd highest among 2017 nations. Debt held by the public rose considerably as a result of the Great Recession and its aftermath. It is expected to continue rising as the country ages towards 100% GDP by 2028.
neg_context_title_en: National debt of the United States
National debt of the United States
National debt of the United States
National debt of the United States
National debt of the United States
neg_context_en: The idea of conveying a message through a periodically updated clock found an earlier expression in the Doomsday Clock. However, the innovation of the National Debt Clock was to feature a constantly running counter; it has since inspired similar projects elsewhere, both in the United States and further afield. In particular, it has become a national fixture shows that the U.S.'s increasing debt. By 1995, the "New York Times" reported that politicians were citing the clock to advocate for a reduction to the national budget. Various tracking counters of national debt are also kept online.

According to the "CIA World Factbook", during 2015, the U.S. debt to GDP ratio of 73.6% was the 39th highest in the world. This was measured using "debt held by the public." However, $1 trillion in additional borrowing since the end of FY 2015 has raised the ratio to 76.2% as of April 2016 [See Appendix#National debt for selected years]. Also, this number excludes state and local debt. According to the OECD, general government gross debt (federal, state, and local) in the United States in the fourth quarter of 2015 was $22.5 trillion (125% of GDP); subtracting out $5.25 trillion for intergovernmental federal debt to count only federal "debt held by the public" gives 96% of GDP.

The U.S. public debt was $909 billion in 1980, an amount equal to 33% of America's gross domestic product (GDP); by 1990, that number had more than tripled to $3.2 trillion—or 56% of GDP. In 2001 the national debt was $5.7 trillion; however, the debt-to-GDP ratio remained at 1990 levels. Debt levels rose quickly in the following decade, and on January 28, 2010, the U.S. debt ceiling was raised to $14.3 trillion. Based on the 2010 United States federal budget, total national debt will grow to nearly 100% of GDP, versus a level of approximately 80% in early 2009. The White House estimates that the government's tab for servicing the debt will exceed $700 billion a year in 2019, up from $202 billion in 2009.

As of October 2018, foreigners owned $6.2 trillion of U.S. debt, or approximately 39 percent of the debt held by the public of $16.1 trillion and 28 percent of the total debt of $21.8 trillion. At the close of 2018, the largest foreign holders were China ($1.13 trillion), Japan ($1.02 trillion), Brazil ($313 billion), and Ireland ($287 billion).

The idea for the clock came from New York real estate developer Seymour Durst, who wanted to highlight the rising national debt. In 1989, he sponsored the installation of the first clock, which was originally placed on Sixth Avenue between 42nd and 43rd Streets, one block away from Times Square. In 2004, the original clock was dismantled and replaced by a newer clock near 44th Street and Sixth Avenue. In 2008, as the U.S. national debt exceeded $10 trillion for the first time, it was reported that the value of the debt may have exceeded the number of digits in the clock. The lit dollar-sign in the clock's leftmost digit position was later changed to the "1" digit to represent the ten-trillionth place. In 2017, the clock was moved again to One Bryant Park, near its original location.

In 2005, he completed a documentary film on the U.S. National Debt titled "TIME-BOMB: America's Debt Crises Causes Consequences and Solutions". The film featured interviews with prominent businesspeople (George Soros, Peter G. Peterson, Steven Rattner), U.S. senators (Warren Rudman, Robert Byrd, Pete Domenici) and economists (Harvard's Benjamin M. Friedman and Kenneth Rogoff, and Boston University's Laurence Kotlikoff). In April 2006 the film was broadcast on national television, and again aired in August 2006.

The cost of servicing the U.S. national debt can be measured in various ways. The CBO analyzes net interest as a percentage of GDP, with a higher percentage indicating a higher interest payment burden. During 2015, this was 1.3% GDP, close to the record low 1.2% of the 1966–1968 era. The average from 1966 to 2015 was 2.0% of GDP. However, the CBO estimated in 2016 that the interest amounts and % GDP will increase significantly over the following decade as both interest rates and debt levels rise: "Interest payments on that debt represent a large and rapidly growing expense of the federal government. CBO's baseline shows net interest payments more than tripling under current law, climbing from $231 billion in 2014, or 1.3 percent of GDP, to $799 billion in 2024, or 3.0 percent of GDP—the highest ratio since 1996."

Since 2010, the U.S. Treasury has been obtaining negative real interest rates on government debt, meaning the inflation rate is greater than the interest rate paid on the debt. Such low rates, outpaced by the inflation rate, occur when the market believes that there are no alternatives with sufficiently low risk, or when popular institutional investments such as insurance companies, pensions, or bond, money market, and balanced mutual funds are required or choose to invest sufficiently large sums in Treasury securities to hedge against risk.

The U.S. government is obligated under current law to make mandatory payments for programs such as Medicare, Medicaid and Social Security. The Government Accountability Office (GAO) projects that payouts for these programs will significantly exceed tax revenues over the next 75 years. The Medicare Part A (hospital insurance) payouts already exceed program tax revenues, and social security payouts exceeded payroll taxes in fiscal 2010. These deficits require funding from other tax sources or borrowing. The present value of these deficits or unfunded obligations is an estimated $45.8 trillion. This is the amount that would have had to be set aside in 2009 in order to pay for the unfunded obligations which, under current law, will have to be raised by the government in the future. Approximately $7.7 trillion relates to Social Security, while $38.2 trillion relates to Medicare and Medicaid. In other words, health care programs will require nearly five times more funding than Social Security. Adding this to the national debt and other federal obligations would bring total obligations to nearly $62 trillion. However, these unfunded obligations are not counted in the national debt, as shown in monthly Treasury reports of the national debt.
question_src: Je! Deni la kitaifa la Merika ni nini?
pos_context_src: Kaya ya Amerika na isiyo ya faida ilizidi $ 100 trilioni kwa mara ya kwanza katika Q1 2018; Imekuwa ikiweka rekodi tangu Q4 2012. Serikali ya shirikisho la Merika au "deni la kitaifa" ilikuwa $ 21.1 trilioni Mei 2018, zaidi ya 100% Pato la Taifa. Kutumia sehemu ndogo ya deni la kitaifa linaloitwa "deni lililoshikiliwa na umma", deni la Merika lilikuwa takriban 77% Pato la Taifa mnamo 2017. Kwa hatua hii, Merika ilishika nafasi ya 43 kati ya mataifa ya 2017. Deni lililoshikiliwa na umma liliongezeka sana kama matokeo ya kushuka kwa uchumi na athari zake. Inatarajiwa kuendelea kuongezeka kadri nchi zinavyokuwa na umri wa miaka 100% ya Pato la Taifa ifikapo 2028.
neg_context_src: Wazo la kufikisha ujumbe kupitia saa iliyosasishwa mara kwa mara ilipata usemi wa mapema katika saa ya siku ya mwisho. Walakini, uvumbuzi wa saa ya deni ya kitaifa ilikuwa kuonyesha kukabiliana na kila wakati; Imesababisha miradi kama hiyo mahali pengine, nchini Merika na mbali zaidi. Hasa, imekuwa mpango wa kitaifa unaonyesha kuwa deni linaloongezeka la Merika. Kufikia 1995, "New York Times" iliripoti kwamba wanasiasa walikuwa wakitoa mfano wa kutetea kupunguzwa kwa bajeti ya kitaifa. Vipimo anuwai vya ufuatiliaji wa deni la kitaifa pia huhifadhiwa mkondoni.

Kulingana na "CIA World Factbook", wakati wa 2015, deni la Merika kwa uwiano wa Pato la Taifa la asilimia 73.6 lilikuwa la 39 zaidi ulimwenguni. Hii ilipimwa kwa kutumia "deni lililoshikiliwa na umma." Walakini, $ 1 trilioni katika kukopa zaidi tangu mwisho wa FY 2015 kumeongeza uwiano huo hadi asilimia 76.2 hadi Aprili 2016 [tazama DEMPLE#deni la kitaifa kwa miaka iliyochaguliwa]. Pia, nambari hii haijumuishi deni ya serikali na ya ndani. Kulingana na OECD, deni kuu la serikali kuu (Shirikisho, Jimbo, na Mitaa) nchini Merika katika robo ya nne ya 2015 lilikuwa $ 22.5 trilioni (125% ya Pato la Taifa); Kuondoa $ 5.25 trilioni kwa deni la serikali ya serikali kuhesabu tu "deni lililoshikiliwa na umma" linatoa 96% ya Pato la Taifa.

Deni la umma la Merika lilikuwa $ 909 bilioni mnamo 1980, kiasi sawa na 33% ya bidhaa za jumla za Amerika (GDP); Kufikia 1990, idadi hiyo ilikuwa zaidi ya mara tatu hadi $ 3.2 trilioni - au 56% ya Pato la Taifa. Mnamo 2001 deni la kitaifa lilikuwa $ 5.7 trilioni; Walakini, uwiano wa deni hadi GDP ulibaki katika viwango vya 1990. Viwango vya deni viliongezeka haraka katika muongo uliofuata, na mnamo Januari 28, 2010, dari ya deni la Merika iliongezwa hadi $ 14.3 trilioni. Kulingana na bajeti ya shirikisho la Merika la 2010, jumla ya deni la kitaifa litakua hadi karibu 100% ya Pato la Taifa, dhidi ya kiwango cha takriban 80% mwanzoni mwa 2009. Ikulu ya White House inakadiria kuwa kichupo cha serikali cha kutumikia deni hiyo kitazidi dola bilioni 700 kwa mwaka mwaka 2019, kutoka $ 202 bilioni mwaka 2009.

Mnamo Oktoba 2018, wageni walikuwa na $ 6.2 trilioni ya deni la Merika, au takriban asilimia 39 ya deni lililoshikiliwa na umma wa $ 16.1 trilioni na asilimia 28 ya deni jumla ya $ 21.8 trilioni. Mwisho wa 2018, wamiliki wakubwa wa kigeni walikuwa China ($ 1.13 trilioni), Japan ($ 1.02 trilioni), Brazil ($ 313 bilioni), na Ireland ($ 287 bilioni).

Wazo la saa lilitoka kwa msanidi programu wa mali isiyohamishika ya New York Seymour Durst, ambaye alitaka kuonyesha deni la kitaifa linaloongezeka. Mnamo 1989, alifadhili usanikishaji wa saa ya kwanza, ambayo hapo awali iliwekwa kwenye Sita Avenue kati ya mitaa ya 42 na 43, block moja mbali na Times Square. Mnamo 2004, saa ya asili ilibomolewa na kubadilishwa na saa mpya karibu na 44th Street na Sita Avenue. Mnamo 2008, deni la kitaifa la Merika lilizidi $ 10 trilioni kwa mara ya kwanza, iliripotiwa kuwa thamani ya deni inaweza kuwa imezidi idadi ya nambari katika saa. Ishara ya dola ya lit katika nafasi ya kushoto ya saa ilibadilishwa baadaye kuwa nambari ya "1" kuwakilisha mahali pa trilioni kumi. Mnamo mwaka wa 2017, saa ilihamishwa tena kwenye Hifadhi moja ya Bryant, karibu na eneo lake la asili.

Mnamo 2005, alikamilisha filamu ya maandishi juu ya deni la kitaifa la U.S. lililopewa jina la "Bomu ya Muda: Migogoro ya Deni la Amerika husababisha athari na suluhisho". Filamu hiyo ilionyesha mahojiano na wafanyabiashara maarufu (George Soros, Peter G. Peterson, Steven Rattner), Maseneta wa Merika (Warren Rudman, Robert Byrd, Pete Domenici) na wachumi (Harvard's Benjamin M. Friedman na Kenneth Rogoff, na Chuo Kikuu cha Boston Laurence Kotliki). Mnamo Aprili 2006 filamu hiyo ilitangazwa kwenye runinga ya kitaifa, na ilirushwa tena mnamo Agosti 2006.

Gharama ya kuhudumia deni la kitaifa la Merika linaweza kupimwa kwa njia tofauti. CBO inachambua riba ya jumla kama asilimia ya Pato la Taifa, na asilimia kubwa inayoonyesha mzigo mkubwa wa malipo ya riba. Mnamo mwaka wa 2015, hii ilikuwa Pato la Taifa 1.3, karibu na rekodi ya chini ya asilimia 1.2 ya ERA ya 1966-1968. Wastani kutoka 1966 hadi 2015 ilikuwa 2.0% ya Pato la Taifa. Walakini, CBO ilikadiriwa mnamo 2016 kwamba kiasi cha riba na % Pato la Taifa itaongezeka sana katika muongo uliofuata kwani viwango vyote vya riba na viwango vya deni vinaongezeka: "Malipo ya riba juu ya deni hilo yanawakilisha gharama kubwa na inayokua kwa kasi ya serikali ya shirikisho. Kibilioni cha CBO, asilimia ya asilimia ya GD, kwa asilimia 20 ya GD9, kwa asilimia 20 ya asilimia ya GD9, kwa asilimia 29 kwa asilimia 79 kwa asilimia 79 kwa asilimia 79 kwa asilimia 20 ya GD9 ya asilimia 79 kwa asilimia 79 kwa asilimia 79 kwa asilimia 20, asilimia 79 ya asilimia 2014, asilimia 79 ya asilimia 2014, asilimia 79 ya asilimia 2014, asilimia 79 ya GURP ya GURP ya GURP ya GURP ya GURP ya GURP ya GURP ya GURP ya GURP ya GUR. Pato la Taifa - uwiano wa juu zaidi tangu 1996. "

Tangu 2010, Hazina ya Merika imekuwa ikipata viwango vya riba halisi juu ya deni la serikali, ikimaanisha kiwango cha mfumko ni mkubwa kuliko kiwango cha riba kinacholipwa kwa deni. Viwango vya chini kama hivyo, vilivyopatikana na kiwango cha mfumko, hufanyika wakati soko linaamini kuwa hakuna njia mbadala zilizo na hatari ya kutosha, au wakati uwekezaji maarufu wa kitaasisi kama vile kampuni za bima, pensheni, au dhamana, soko la pesa, na fedha za usawa zinahitajika au kuchagua kuwekeza kiasi kikubwa cha kutosha katika usalama wa hazina dhidi ya hatari.

Serikali ya Merika inalazimika chini ya sheria ya sasa kufanya malipo ya lazima kwa mipango kama Medicare, Medicaid na Usalama wa Jamii. Miradi ya Ofisi ya Uwajibikaji ya Serikali (GAO) ambayo malipo ya programu hizi yatazidi mapato ya ushuru kwa miaka 75 ijayo. Sehemu ya Medicare A (Bima ya Hospitali) tayari inazidi mapato ya ushuru ya mpango, na malipo ya usalama wa kijamii yalizidi ushuru wa walipaji katika fedha za 2010. Mapungufu haya yanahitaji ufadhili kutoka kwa vyanzo vingine vya ushuru au kukopa. Thamani ya sasa ya upungufu huu au majukumu yasiyofadhiliwa ni wastani wa $ 45.8 trilioni. Hii ndio kiasi ambacho kingelazimika kuwekwa kando mnamo 2009 ili kulipia majukumu ambayo hayajafadhiliwa ambayo, chini ya sheria ya sasa, italazimika kuinuliwa na serikali katika siku zijazo. Takriban $ 7.7 trilioni inahusiana na Usalama wa Jamii, wakati $ 38.2 trilioni inahusiana na Medicare na Medicaid. Kwa maneno mengine, mipango ya utunzaji wa afya itahitaji ufadhili karibu mara tano kuliko Usalama wa Jamii. Kuongeza hii kwa deni la kitaifa na majukumu mengine ya shirikisho kungeleta majukumu jumla kwa karibu $ 62 trilioni. Walakini, majukumu haya yasiyofadhiliwa hayahesabiwi katika deni la kitaifa, kama inavyoonyeshwa katika ripoti za Hazina ya kila mwezi ya deni la kitaifa.
report_src: Deni la kitaifa la Merika ni jumla ya kiasi ambacho serikali ya shirikisho inadaiwa na wawekezaji wa ndani na wa kimataifa; kiasi hiki kilipanda hadi dola trilioni 21.1 mnamo Mei 2018, kiwango kinachozidi 100% ya Pato la Taifa (GDP) [1]. Hata hivyo, ukizingatia tu sehemu ndogo iitwayo “deni lililoshikiliwa na umma,” kiwango kilikuwa takriban 77% ya GDP mwaka 2017, na kuliweka Merika nafasi ya 43 kati ya mataifa kwa uwiano huo [1]. Deni hilo limekuwa likiongezeka sana tangu mdororo wa kiuchumi wa 2008 na linatarajiwa kuendelea kukua, likifikia tena 100% ya GDP ifikapo 2028 kadiri idadi ya watu inavyozeeka na gharama za kijamii kuongezeka [1].

question_en: Does cognitive dissonance factor into pluralistic ignorance?
pos_context_en: Prentice and Miller found that, on average, private levels of comfort with drinking practices on campus were much lower than the perceived average. In the case of men, they found a shifting of private attitudes toward this perceived norm, a form of cognitive dissonance. Women, on the other hand, were found to have an increased sense of alienation on the campus but lacked the attitude change detected in men, presumably because norms related to alcohol consumption on campus are much more central for men than for women. Research has shown that pluralistic ignorance plagues not only those who indulge, but also those who abstain: from gambling, smoking and drinking and among some who follow vegetarianism. The latter has found that pluralistic ignorance can be caused by the structure of the underlying social network, not cognitive dissonance.
neg_context_title_en: False allegation of child sexual abuse
neg_context_en:
When individuals encounter new information or new experiences, they categorize the information based on their preexisting attitudes, thoughts, and beliefs. If the new encounter does not coincide with their preexisting assumptions, then dissonance is likely to occur. When dissonance does occur, individuals are motivated to reduce the dissonance they experience by avoiding situations that would either cause the dissonance or increase the dissonance. For this reason, cognitive dissonance is considered a drive state that encourages motivation to achieve consonance and reduce dissonance.
An example of cognitive dissonance would be if someone holds the belief that maintaining a healthy lifestyle is important, but they don't regularly work out or eat healthy. They may experience dissonance between their beliefs and their actions. If there is a significant amount of dissonance, they may be motivated to change their attitudes and work out more or eat healthier foods. They may also be inclined to avoid situations that will point out the fact that their attitudes and beliefs are inconsistent, such as avoiding the gym or not reading health reports.According to cognitive dissonance theory, there are three types of cognitive relationships: consonant relationships, dissonant relationships, and irrelevant relationships. Consonant relationships are when two elements, such as your beliefs and actions, are in equilibrium with each other or coincide. Dissonant relationships are when two elements are not in equilibrium and cause dissonance. Irrelevant relationships are when two elements do not possess a meaningful relationship with one another, they are unrelated and do not cause dissonance.

The predictive dissonance model proposes that cognitive dissonance is fundamentally related to the predictive coding (or predictive processing) model of cognition. A predictive processing account of the mind proposes that perception actively involves the use of a Bayesian hierarchy of acquired prior knowledge, which primarily serves the role of predicting incoming proprioceptive, interoceptive and exteroceptive sensory inputs. Therefore, the brain is an inference machine which attempts to actively predict and explain its sensations. Crucial to this inference is the minimization of prediction error. The predictive dissonance account proposes that the motivation for cognitive dissonance reduction is related to an organism's active drive for reducing prediction error. Moreover, it proposes that human (and perhaps other animal) brains have evolved to selectively ignore contradictory information (as proposed by dissonance theory) to prevent the overfitting of their predictive cognitive models to local and thus non-generalizable conditions. The predictive dissonance account is highly compatible with the action-motivation model since, in practice, prediction error can arise from unsuccessful behavior.

Cognitive dissonance, a theory originally developed by Festinger (1957), is the idea that people experience a sense of guilt or uneasiness when two linked cognitions are inconsistent, such as when there are two conflicting attitudes about a topic, or inconsistencies between one's attitude and behavior on a certain topic. The basic idea of the Cognitive Dissonance Theory relating to attitude change, is that people are motivated to reduce dissonance which can be achieved through changing their attitudes and beliefs. Cooper & Fazio's (1984) have also added that cognitive dissonance does not arise from any simple cognitive inconsistency, but rather results from freely chosen behavior that may bring about negative consequences. These negative consequences may be threats to the consistency, stability, predictability, competence, moral goodness of the self-concept, or violation of general self-integrity.

Pluralistic ignorance can be contrasted with the false consensus effect. In pluralistic ignorance, people privately disdain but publicly support a norm (or a belief), while the false consensus effect causes people to wrongly assume that most people think like they do, while in reality most people do not think like they do (and express the disagreement openly). For instance, pluralistic ignorance may lead a student to drink alcohol excessively because she believes that everyone else does that, while in reality everyone else also wishes they could avoid binge drinking, but no one expresses that due to the fear of being ostracized. A false consensus for the same situation would mean that the student believes that most other people do not enjoy excessive drinking, while in fact most other people do enjoy that and openly express their opinion about it.

The action–motivation model proposes that inconsistencies in a person's cognition cause mental stress, because psychologic inconsistency interferes with the person's functioning in the real world. Among the ways for coping, the person can choose to exercise a behavior that is inconsistent with his or her current attitude (a belief, an ideal, a value system), but later try to alter that belief to be consonant with a current behaviour; the cognitive dissonance occurs when the person's cognition does not match the action taken. If the person changes the current attitude, after the dissonance occurs, he or she then is obligated to commit to that course of behaviour.

The reduction of the psychological stress of cognitive dissonance is a function of the magnitude of the dissonance caused by the existential inconsistency, between two contradictory beliefs held by the person; or by the contradiction between the person's beliefs and an action he or she has taken. Two factors determine the degree of psychological dissonance caused by two conflicting cognitions or by two conflicting actions:

The results reported in "Contributions from Research on Anger and Cognitive Dissonance to Understanding the Motivational Functions of Asymmetrical Frontal Brain Activity" (2004) indicate that the occurrence of cognitive dissonance is associated with neural activity in the left frontal cortex, a brain structure also associated with the emotion of anger; moreover, functionally, anger motivates neural activity in the left frontal cortex. Applying a directional model of Approach motivation, the study "Anger and the Behavioural Approach System" (2003) indicated that the relation between cognitive dissonance and anger is supported by neural activity in the left frontal cortex that occurs when a person takes control of the social situation causing the cognitive dissonance. Conversely, if the person cannot control or cannot change the psychologically stressful situation, he or she is without a motivation to change the circumstance, then there arise other, negative emotions to manage the cognitive dissonance, such as socially inappropriate behavior.

Disconfirming evidence can lead to cognitive dissonance on the part of these individuals, and lead them to deliberately or unconsciously attempt to resolve dissonance by ignoring, discounting or even destroying the evidence. Once any steps are taken to justify the decision that the accused is guilty, it becomes very difficult for the official to accept disconfirming evidence, and this can continue during appeals, retrials or any other effort to revisit a verdict.

This type of cognitive dissonance occurs to a person faced with making a difficult decision, wherein there always exist aspects of the rejected-object not chosen, which appeal to the person making the choice. The action of deciding provokes the psychological dissonance consequent to choosing X instead of Y, despite little difference between X and Y; thus, the decision "I chose X" is dissonant with the cognition that "There are some aspects of Y that I like." Moreover, the study "Choice-induced Preferences in the Absence of Choice: Evidence from a Blind Two-choice Paradigm with Young Children and Capuchin Monkeys" (2010) reports similar results in the occurrence of cognitive dissonance in human beings and in animals.
question_src: Je! Usumbufu wa utambuzi unasababisha ujinga wa wingi?
pos_context_src: Prentice na Miller waligundua kuwa, kwa wastani, viwango vya kibinafsi vya faraja na mazoea ya kunywa kwenye vyuo vikuu yalikuwa chini sana kuliko wastani uliotambuliwa. Kwa upande wa wanaume, walipata mabadiliko ya mitazamo ya kibinafsi kuelekea kawaida hii, aina ya utambuzi wa utambuzi. Wanawake, kwa upande mwingine, walipatikana na hisia za kutengwa kwenye chuo kikuu lakini walikosa mabadiliko ya mtazamo uliogunduliwa kwa wanaume, labda kwa sababu kanuni zinazohusiana na unywaji pombe kwenye chuo kikuu ni muhimu zaidi kwa wanaume kuliko kwa wanawake. Utafiti umeonyesha kuwa ujinga wa kidini hauna tu wale ambao hujishughulisha, lakini pia wale ambao huzuia: kutoka kwa kamari, sigara na kunywa na kati ya wengine wanaofuata mboga mboga. Mwisho huo umegundua kuwa ujinga wa wingi unaweza kusababishwa na muundo wa mtandao wa kijamii wa msingi, sio utambuzi wa utambuzi.
neg_context_title_src: Madai ya uwongo ya unyanyasaji wa kijinsia kwa mtoto
neg_context_src:
Wakati watu wanapokutana na habari mpya au uzoefu mpya, huweka habari hiyo kulingana na mitazamo yao, mawazo, na imani. Ikiwa mkutano mpya hauendani na mawazo yao ya preexisting, basi dissonance inaweza kutokea. Wakati dissonance inatokea, watu wanahamasishwa kupunguza dissonance wanayopata kwa kuzuia hali ambazo zinaweza kusababisha kutokujali au kuongeza dissonance. Kwa sababu hii, dissonance ya utambuzi inachukuliwa kuwa hali ya kuendesha ambayo inahimiza motisha ya kufikia konsonanti na kupunguza dissonance.
Mfano wa dissonance ya utambuzi itakuwa ikiwa mtu anashikilia imani kwamba kudumisha maisha ya afya ni muhimu, lakini hawafanyi kazi mara kwa mara au kula afya. Wanaweza kupata uzoefu kati ya imani zao na matendo yao. Ikiwa kuna kiwango kikubwa cha dissonance, wanaweza kuhamasishwa kubadilisha mitazamo yao na kufanya kazi zaidi au kula vyakula vyenye afya. Wanaweza pia kuwa na mwelekeo wa kuzuia hali ambazo zitaonyesha ukweli kwamba mitazamo na imani zao haziendani, kama vile kuzuia mazoezi au kusoma ripoti za afya.Kuhusu nadharia ya utambuzi, kuna aina tatu za uhusiano wa utambuzi: uhusiano wa konsonanti, uhusiano wa dharau, na uhusiano usio na maana. Urafiki wa konsonanti ni wakati vitu viwili, kama imani na vitendo vyako, viko katika usawa na kila mmoja au sanjari. Mahusiano ya dissonant ni wakati vitu viwili haviko katika usawa na husababisha dissonance. Mahusiano yasiyofaa ni wakati mambo mawili hayana uhusiano wa maana na mwenzake, hayahusiani na hayasababishi.

Mfano wa utabiri wa utabiri unapendekeza kwamba dissonance ya utambuzi inahusiana kimsingi na mfano wa utabiri (au usindikaji wa utabiri) wa utambuzi. Akaunti ya usindikaji ya utabiri wa akili inapendekeza kwamba mtazamo unajumuisha kikamilifu utumiaji wa uongozi wa Bayesian wa maarifa yaliyopatikana hapo awali, ambayo kimsingi hutumikia jukumu la kutabiri pembejeo zinazoingia, za kuingiliana na za nje. Kwa hivyo, ubongo ni mashine ya uelekezaji ambayo inajaribu kutabiri kikamilifu na kuelezea hisia zake. Muhimu kwa uelekezaji huu ni upunguzaji wa kosa la utabiri. Akaunti ya utabiri wa utabiri inapendekeza kwamba motisha ya kupunguza utambuzi wa utambuzi inahusiana na kiumbe hai cha kiumbe cha kupunguza kosa la utabiri. Kwa kuongezea, inapendekeza kwamba akili za kibinadamu (na labda wanyama wengine) zimetokea ili kupuuza kwa hiari habari zinazopingana (kama ilivyopendekezwa na nadharia ya dissonance) kuzuia kupindukia kwa mifano yao ya utambuzi kwa hali ya ndani na kwa hivyo hali zisizoweza kusomeka. Akaunti ya kutabiri ya kutabiri inaendana sana na mfano wa motivation ya hatua kwani, kwa mazoezi, kosa la utabiri linaweza kutokea kwa tabia isiyofanikiwa.

Dissonance ya utambuzi, nadharia iliyoundwa na Festinger (1957), ni wazo kwamba watu wanapata hisia za hatia au kutokuwa na wasiwasi wakati utambuzi mbili zilizounganishwa hazilingani, kama vile wakati kuna mitazamo miwili inayopingana juu ya mada, au kutokubaliana kati ya mtazamo na tabia ya mtu kwenye mada fulani. Wazo la msingi la nadharia ya utambuzi inayohusiana na mabadiliko ya mtazamo, ni kwamba watu wanahamasishwa kupunguza dissonance ambayo inaweza kupatikana kupitia kubadilisha mitazamo na imani zao. Cooper & Fazio's (1984) pia wameongeza kuwa dissonance ya utambuzi haitokei kutoka kwa kutokuwa na utambuzi wowote wa utambuzi, lakini badala yake hutokana na tabia iliyochaguliwa kwa uhuru ambayo inaweza kuleta athari mbaya. Matokeo haya mabaya yanaweza kuwa vitisho kwa msimamo, utulivu, utabiri, uwezo, wema wa maadili ya dhana ya kibinafsi, au ukiukaji wa kujitegemea kwa jumla.

Ujinga wa kweli unaweza kulinganishwa na athari ya makubaliano ya uwongo. Kwa ujinga wa kimilele, watu wanachukia kibinafsi lakini wanaunga mkono hadharani (au imani), wakati athari ya makubaliano ya uwongo husababisha watu kudhani vibaya kuwa watu wengi hufikiria kama wanavyofanya, wakati kwa kweli watu wengi hawafikiri kama wanavyofanya (na kuelezea kutokubaliana waziwazi). Kwa mfano, ujinga wa wingi unaweza kusababisha mwanafunzi kunywa pombe kupita kiasi kwa sababu anaamini kwamba kila mtu mwingine hufanya hivyo, wakati kwa kweli kila mtu mwingine pia anatamani wangeweza kuzuia kunywa, lakini hakuna mtu anayeelezea kwamba kwa sababu ya kuogopa kutengwa. Makubaliano ya uwongo kwa hali hiyo hiyo inamaanisha kwamba mwanafunzi anaamini kuwa watu wengine wengi hawafurahii kunywa sana, wakati kwa kweli watu wengine wengi hufurahiya na kuelezea maoni yao wazi juu yake.

Mfano wa hatua -ya kupendekeza unapendekeza kwamba kutokwenda katika utambuzi wa mtu husababisha mkazo wa akili, kwa sababu kutokubaliana kwa kisaikolojia kunaingiliana na utendaji wa mtu huyo katika ulimwengu wa kweli. Miongoni mwa njia za kukabiliana, mtu anaweza kuchagua kutumia tabia ambayo haiendani na mtazamo wake wa sasa (imani, bora, mfumo wa thamani), lakini baadaye jaribu kubadilisha imani hiyo kuwa ya pamoja na tabia ya sasa; Dissonance ya utambuzi hufanyika wakati utambuzi wa mtu haulingani na hatua iliyochukuliwa. Ikiwa mtu huyo atabadilisha mtazamo wa sasa, baada ya kutokuwepo, yeye basi analazimika kujitolea kwa tabia hiyo.

Kupunguzwa kwa mkazo wa kisaikolojia wa utambuzi wa utambuzi ni kazi ya ukubwa wa dissonance inayosababishwa na kutokuwepo kwa usawa, kati ya imani mbili zinazopingana na mtu huyo; au kwa kupingana kati ya imani ya mtu huyo na hatua ambayo amechukua. Sababu mbili huamua kiwango cha kutokujali kisaikolojia kinachosababishwa na utambuzi mbili unaopingana au kwa vitendo viwili vinavyogombana:

Matokeo yaliyoripotiwa katika "michango kutoka kwa utafiti juu ya hasira na dissonance ya utambuzi ya kuelewa kazi za uhamasishaji za shughuli za ubongo wa mbele" (2004) zinaonyesha kuwa tukio la kutofautisha kwa utambuzi linahusishwa na shughuli za neural katika cortex ya mbele ya kushoto, muundo wa ubongo pia unaohusishwa na hisia za hasira; Kwa kuongezea, kwa kazi, hasira huhamasisha shughuli za neural kwenye kortini ya kushoto ya mbele. Kutumia mfano wa mwelekeo wa uhamasishaji wa njia, utafiti "hasira na mfumo wa tabia" (2003) ulionyesha kuwa uhusiano kati ya utambuzi wa utambuzi na hasira unasaidiwa na shughuli za neural katika cortex ya mbele ya kushoto ambayo hufanyika wakati mtu anachukua udhibiti wa hali ya kijamii na kusababisha usumbufu wa utambuzi. Kinyume chake, ikiwa mtu hawezi kudhibiti au hawezi kubadilisha hali ya kisaikolojia inayofadhaisha, yeye hana motisha ya kubadilisha hali hiyo, basi kuna hisia zingine, hasi za kusimamia utambuzi wa utambuzi, kama vile tabia isiyofaa ya kijamii.

Ushuhuda unaothibitisha unaweza kusababisha kutokujua kwa watu hawa, na kuwaongoza kwa kujaribu kwa makusudi au bila kujua ya kutatua dissonance kwa kupuuza, kupunguzwa au hata kuharibu ushahidi. Mara tu hatua zozote zikichukuliwa kuhalalisha uamuzi kwamba mshtakiwa ana hatia, inakuwa ngumu sana kwa afisa kukubali ushahidi wa kuthibitisha, na hii inaweza kuendelea wakati wa rufaa, marudio au juhudi nyingine yoyote ya kutazama tena uamuzi.

Aina hii ya utambuzi wa utambuzi hufanyika kwa mtu anayekabiliwa na kufanya uamuzi mgumu, ambayo kila wakati kuna mambo ya kitu kilichokataliwa ambacho hakijachaguliwa, ambacho kinavutia mtu anayefanya uchaguzi. Kitendo cha kuamua husababisha kutofaulu kwa kisaikolojia matokeo ya kuchagua X badala ya Y, licha ya tofauti kidogo kati ya X na Y; Kwa hivyo, uamuzi "nilichagua X" hauna maana na utambuzi kwamba "kuna mambo kadhaa ya Y ambayo napenda." Kwa kuongezea, utafiti "upendeleo uliosababishwa na uchaguzi kwa kukosekana kwa chaguo: ushahidi kutoka kwa kipofu cha uchaguzi wa mbili na watoto wadogo na nyani wa Capuchin" (2010) inaripoti matokeo kama hayo katika tukio la kutofautisha kwa utambuzi kwa wanadamu na kwa wanyama.
report_src: Utafiti wa Prentice na Miller ulionyesha kuwa wanaume vyuoni, walipotambua kuwa wanakunywa pombe kidogo kuliko wanavyodhani wengine wanakunywa, walibadilisha mitazamo yao ili iendane na “kaida” hiyo, wakionyesha aina ya usumbufu wa utambuzi unaoweza kuchochea ujinga wa wingi kwao [1]; hata hivyo, wanawake katika sampuli hiyo walihisi kutengwa bila kubadilisha mtazamo, ikionyesha kuwa usumbufu wa utambuzi si lazima usababisha ujinga wa wingi kwa makundi yote [1]. Aidha, utafiti mwingine ulihitimisha kuwa ujinga wa wingi unaweza kutokana na muundo wa mtandao wa kijamii wenyewe badala ya michakato ya utambuzi, na hivyo kuonesha kuwa usumbufu wa utambuzi ni sababu mojawapo tu, si sharti kuu [1]. Kwa hiyo, ingawa usumbufu wa utambuzi unaweza kuchangia ujinga wa wingi katika hali fulani—hasa pale watu wanapopunguza mvutano kwa kurekebisha imani binafsi kufuatia dhana potofu ya kaida—ushahidi unaonyesha kuwa kuna michakato mingine ya kijamii inayoweza kuuzua bila kuwepo kwa usumbufu wa utambuzi, hivyo si sahihi kusema kila mara kwamba usumbufu wa utambuzi ndiyo chanzo kikuu cha ujinga wa wingi.

Utafiti wa Prentice na Miller ulionyesha kuwa wanaume vyuoni, walipotambua kuwa wanakunywa pombe kidogo kuliko wanavyodhani wengine wanakunywa, walibadilisha mitazamo yao ili iendane na “kaida” hiyo, wakionyesha aina ya usumbufu wa utambuzi unaoweza kuchochea ujinga wa wingi kwao [1]; hata hivyo, wanawake katika sampuli hiyo walihisi kutengwa bila kubadilisha mtazamo, ikionyesha kuwa usumbufu wa utambuzi si lazima usababisha ujinga wa wingi kwa makundi yote [1].
