question_en: Who is head writer for the British soap opera Emmerdale?
pos_context_en: Emmerdale (known as Emmerdale Farm until 1989) is a British soap opera set in Emmerdale (known as Beckindale until 1994), a fictional village in the Yorkshire Dales. Created by Kevin Laffan, "Emmerdale Farm" was first broadcast on 16 October 1972. Produced by ITV Yorkshire, it has been filmed at their Leeds studio since its inception. The programme is broadcast in every ITV region.
neg_context_en: From 1999 to 2001, Beedles worked as a story associate on "Coronation Street" before moving onto "Emmerdale" as Story Editor. In 2005, Beedles was appointed Series Producer of British television soap opera "Emmerdale", taking over from Steve Frost. She had worked as a producer and series editor for the ITV soap before taking on the role.During her time on the soap, she was responsible for many major storylines, including the Kings River showhome explosion storyline, and the Tom King kidnap plot. She was also responsible for the Who Killed Tom King? storyline, which was nominated for Best Storyline at the 2007 British Soap Awards. Under her tenure Emmerdale was nominated for a BAFTA for three consecutive years, won an RTS Award and the Broadcast Digital Award for the Who Killed Tom King online channel.

On 3 March 2008, Paul and Jonny made British television history by becoming the first couple on a primetime soap opera to enter a civil partnership since the Civil Partnership Act 2004 came into force on 5 December 2005. Although radio soap "The Archers" and daytime soap "Doctors" had previously featured civil partnerships, "Emmerdale" was the first primetime soap opera to do so. Bose said he was proud "Emmerdale" was the first, and commented that soaps "have a great responsibility to show things as they change and be cutting edge".

Roberts has worked on some of the most popular British soap operas, including Channel 4's now-defunct "Brookside" as a scriptwriter (1999–2003), and as a story associate on ITV's "Coronation Street" in 1997. In 1998 he worked as a script editor on ITV's other long-running soap, "Emmerdale", moving across to write several episodes himself the following year.

On 3 March 2008, Paul and Jonny made British television history by becoming the first couple on a primetime soap opera to enter a civil partnership since the Civil Partnership Act 2004 came into force on 5 December 2005. Although radio soap "The Archers" and daytime soap "Doctors" had previously featured civil partnerships, "Emmerdale" was the first primetime soap opera to do so. Matthew Bose, who plays Paul, said he was "proud" "Emmerdale" was the first, and commented that soaps "have a great responsibility to show things as they change and be cutting edge".

Oliver Horsbrugh (1937 – August 2009) was a British television director most recently for "Emmerdale". He also directed episodes of the top rated ITV1 soap opera, "Coronation Street", from the early 1970s. He won a BAFTA as part of the "Emmerdale" team in 2001 when the programme was awarded the Best Soap Award.

Anita Turner (born 1972) is a British script editor, and television producer. From 2008 to 2009 Turner was the series producer of the British television soap opera "Emmerdale".
Turner worked as a script editor for the ITV series "Emmerdale", and held that role for three years.

Paul Lambert is a fictional character from the British ITV soap opera, "Emmerdale", played by Mathew Bose. Paul appeared between 2004 and 2009. He arrives as the son of existing characters Val Lambert (Charlie Hardwick) and Rodney Blackstock (Patrick Mower) and in 2008 Paul, who is openly gay, enters into a civil partnership with Jonny Foster, the first of any primetime soap opera. In 2015, Bose made brief returns to the show, on two separate occasions, one being in March and the other being in September.

Oates began working on the ITV soap opera "Emmerdale" in early 2010 as a story editor, under then-producer, Gavin Blyth. Oates edited various storylines for the show, including Aaron Livesy (Danny Miller) assisting the suicide of his boyfriend, Jackson Walsh (Marc Silcock), which won the British Soap Award for Best Storyline in 2012. Oates held a key role in the soap's fortieth anniversary celebrations and said that she was "proud" to be involved. Oates left her position at "Emmerdale" in 2012, having worked on the show for two and a half years. Reflecting on Oates' work on the show as story editor, John Whiston, the creative director of ITV soaps, commented, "Kate swept into Emmerdale a couple of years ago with a deadly combination of determination and brio. She soon proved her worth to the show, working on stories that ranged from the extremely tough to the light and funny."

The premise of "Emmerdale Farm" was similar to the BBC radio soap opera "The Archers", focusing on a family, a farm and characters in a nearby village. The programme's farmyard filming was originally modelled on RTÉ's "The Riordans", an Irish soap opera which was broadcast from the mid-1960s to the end of the 1970s. "The Riordans" broke new ground for soap operas by being filmed largely outdoors (on a farm, owned on the programme by Tom and Mary Riordan) rather than in a studio—the usual practice of British and American soap operas. The programme pioneered farmyard location shooting, with farm animals and equipment. During the 1960s and 1970s, outdoor filming of television programmes with outdoor broadcast units (OBUs) was in its infancy due to higher costs and reliance on the weather. "The Riordans" success demonstrated that a soap opera could be filmed largely outdoors, and Yorkshire Television sent people to its set in County Meath to see the programme's production firsthand.
Kate Oates (born 1979/1980) is a British television producer, known for her work on the soap operas "The Archers", "Emmerdale", "Coronation Street" and "EastEnders".

Oates' appointment as the series producer of "Coronation Street", succeeding Blackburn, was announced on 18 September 2015. Oates was delighted to join the soap, describing the move as "exiciting" and adding that she felt honoured to do so. Oates joined the soap in early 2016. On the move from "Emmerdale" to "Coronation Street", she commented, "But as much as "Emmerdale" has meant the world to me "Corrie" also has a special place in my heart." John Whiston felt that Oates was the perfect person to become the series producer of the soap. Blackburn described the position as "one of the best jobs in television" and wished Oates luck. Roberts opined that Oates would make an "ideal" producer for the series and believed that she had "all the qualities to be a big success as producer of "Coronation Street"". Mark Jefferies of "Daily Mirror" thought that Oates would be the ""Coronation Street" saviour". Oates was first credited in the position in episode 8968, first broadcast on 15 August 2016.

Andy Halls of "The Sun" reported on 22 July 2018 that Oates had entered negotiations with the BBC to become the executive producer of their soap opera, "EastEnders". A BBC spokesperson told Halls that producers liked her work on "Coronation Street" and felt it would suit the tone of "EastEnders". Over two weeks later, it was announced that Oates would become the senior executive producer of "EastEnders" as well as BBC medical dramas "Casualty" and "Holby City". Oates will primarily work with the team at "EastEnders" and will work alongside the show's current executive consultant, John Yorke from October to December 2018 to provide a "smooth handover". Afterwards, Oates will have sole responsibility for the show. Oates relished in the chance to be involved in the production of the three shows. She commented, "I'm excited about meeting the teams and talent behind each show and can't wait to get stuck in and tell some unmissable stories." Mark Linsey, the CCO of BBC Studios, called Oates a "dynamic, passionate and creative storyteller" and looked forward to her joining the studios. Charlotte Moore was very pleased with Oates' appointment and said in a press release, "she has a real passion for soaps and I have no doubt that her experience, creative flair and dynamism will excite the next generation of BBC One soap fans." Piers Wenger, the controller of BBC Drama, opined that Oates had an "unrivalled" ability to make soaps and continuing dramas popular and "talked about". He predicted that she would be "brilliant" in her new position.

Oates begun her career as a researcher and editorial assistant for writer, Germaine Greer and credited Greer as "inspiring", "inimitable", "kind" and "enthusiastic". She moved to Carlton Television as a researcher and script editor for soap opera, "Crossroads", which she continued until 2003. "Crossroads" was cancelled in March 2003, with the final episode airing in May. Oates' work on "Crossroads" lead her to begin producing BBC Radio 4 soap opera, "The Archers", a place which she credits as the "bulk of her training". In 2012, Oates praised "The Arches" editor of twenty-one years, Vanessa Whitburn, calling her "inspiring". Oates produced the soap opera for seven years, choosing to leave in 2010.
question_src: Je! Mwandishi Mkuu wa Sabuni ya Uingereza Opera Emmerdale?
pos_context_src: Emmerdale (inayojulikana kama Emmerdale Farm hadi 1989) ni opera ya sabuni ya Uingereza iliyowekwa huko Emmerdale (inayojulikana kama Bec mosale hadi 1994), kijiji cha uwongo huko Yorkshire Dales. Iliundwa na Kevin Laffan, "Emmerdale Farm" ilitangazwa kwa mara ya kwanza mnamo Oktoba 16 1972. Iliyotengenezwa na ITV Yorkshire, imepigwa picha katika studio yao ya Leeds tangu kuanzishwa kwake. Programu hiyo inatangazwa katika kila mkoa wa ITV.
neg_context_src: Kuanzia 1999 hadi 2001, Beedles alifanya kazi kama mshirika wa hadithi kwenye "Coronation Street" kabla ya kuhamia "Emmerdale" kama Mhariri wa Hadithi. Mnamo 2005, Beedles aliteuliwa mtayarishaji wa safu ya runinga ya runinga ya Uingereza "Emmerdale", akichukua nafasi kutoka kwa Steve Frost. Alikuwa amefanya kazi kama mtayarishaji na mhariri wa mfululizo wa sabuni ya ITV kabla ya kuchukua jukumu hilo. Kuweka wakati wake kwenye sabuni, alikuwa na jukumu la hadithi nyingi kubwa, pamoja na hadithi ya Mlipuko wa Mto wa Kings River, na njama ya Tom King. Pia alikuwa na jukumu la yule aliyemuua Tom King? Hadithi ya hadithi, ambayo iliteuliwa kwa Best Storyline katika Tuzo za Sabuni za Uingereza za 2007. Chini ya umiliki wake Emmerdale aliteuliwa kwa BAFTA kwa miaka mitatu mfululizo, alishinda tuzo ya RTS na Tuzo ya Dijiti ya Matangazo kwa WHO iliua Tom King Online.

Mnamo tarehe 3 Machi 2008, Paul na Jonny walifanya historia ya televisheni ya Uingereza kwa kuwa wanandoa wa kwanza kwenye opera ya kwanza ya sabuni ili kuingia kwenye ushirikiano wa raia tangu Sheria ya Ushirikiano wa Kiraia 2004 ilianza kutumika mnamo 5 Desemba 2005. Ingawa sabuni ya redio "The Archers" na Sabuni ya Mchana "Madaktari" walikuwa wakifanya kazi za ushirika, "Emmerdale" ilifanya kwanza. Bose alisema anajivunia "Emmerdale" alikuwa wa kwanza, na akatoa maoni kwamba Sabuni "zina jukumu kubwa la kuonyesha mambo wakati wanabadilika na kuwa wakikata makali".

Roberts amefanya kazi kwenye baadhi ya viboreshaji maarufu zaidi vya sabuni ya Uingereza, pamoja na Channel 4 ya sasa-defunct "Brookside" kama mwandishi wa maandishi (1999-2003), na kama mshirika wa hadithi kwenye "Coronation Street" ya ITV mnamo 1997. Mnamo 1998 alifanya kazi kama mhariri wa maandishi kwenye ITV nyingine ya ITV inayofuata kwa muda mrefu.

Mnamo tarehe 3 Machi 2008, Paul na Jonny walifanya historia ya televisheni ya Uingereza kwa kuwa wanandoa wa kwanza kwenye opera ya kwanza ya sabuni ili kuingia kwenye ushirikiano wa raia tangu Sheria ya Ushirikiano wa Kiraia 2004 ilianza kutumika mnamo 5 Desemba 2005. Ingawa sabuni ya redio "The Archers" na Sabuni ya Mchana "Madaktari" walikuwa wakifanya kazi za ushirika, "Emmerdale" ilifanya kwanza. Mathayo Bose, ambaye anacheza Paul, alisema alikuwa "mwenye kiburi" "Emmerdale" alikuwa wa kwanza, na akatoa maoni kwamba Sabuni "zina jukumu kubwa la kuonyesha mambo wakati wanabadilika na kuwa wakikata".

Oliver Horsbrugh (1937 - Agosti 2009) alikuwa mkurugenzi wa runinga wa Uingereza hivi karibuni kwa "Emmerdale". Alielekeza pia vipindi vya Opera ya juu ya ITV1 iliyokadiriwa, "Coronation Street", kutoka miaka ya mapema ya 1970. Alishinda BAFTA kama sehemu ya timu ya "Emmerdale" mnamo 2001 wakati programu hiyo ilipewa tuzo bora ya SOAP.

Anita Turner (amezaliwa 1972) ni mhariri wa maandishi wa Uingereza, na mtayarishaji wa runinga. Kuanzia 2008 hadi 2009 Turner alikuwa mtayarishaji wa safu ya sabuni ya runinga ya Uingereza "Emmerdale".
Turner alifanya kazi kama mhariri wa maandishi wa safu ya ITV "Emmerdale", na alishikilia jukumu hilo kwa miaka mitatu.

Paul Lambert ni tabia ya uwongo kutoka kwa opera ya sabuni ya ITV ya Uingereza, "Emmerdale", iliyochezwa na Mathew Bose. Paul alionekana kati ya 2004 na 2009. Anafika kama mtoto wa wahusika waliopo Val Lambert (Charlie Hardwick) na Rodney Blackstock (Patrick Mower) na mnamo 2008 Paul, ambaye ni waziwazi, anaingia katika ushirikiano wa raia na Jonny Foster, wa kwanza wa opera ya kwanza ya SOAP. Mnamo mwaka wa 2015, Bose alirudi kwa kifupi kwenye onyesho, mara mbili tofauti, moja ikiwa Machi na nyingine ikiwa mnamo Septemba.

Oates alianza kufanya kazi kwenye Opera ya ITV "Emmerdale" mapema 2010 kama mhariri wa hadithi, chini ya mtayarishaji, Gavin Blyth. Oates alihariri hadithi mbali mbali za onyesho hilo, pamoja na Aaron Livesy (Danny Miller) akisaidia kujiua kwa mpenzi wake, Jackson Walsh (Marc Silcock), ambayo ilishinda tuzo ya Sabuni ya Uingereza kwa hadithi bora mnamo 2012. Oates alishikilia jukumu muhimu katika sherehe za kumbukumbu za sabuni na akasema kwamba alikuwa "anajivunia" kuhusika. Oates aliacha msimamo wake huko "Emmerdale" mnamo 2012, baada ya kufanya kazi kwenye onyesho kwa miaka miwili na nusu. Kutafakari juu ya kazi ya Oates kwenye onyesho kama Mhariri wa Hadithi, John Whiston, mkurugenzi wa ubunifu wa ITV Sabuni, alitoa maoni, "Kate aliingia Emmerdale miaka michache iliyopita na mchanganyiko mbaya wa uamuzi na Brio. Hivi karibuni alithibitisha kuwa na show hiyo, akifanya kazi kwenye hadithi ambazo zilitoka kwa nguvu sana na ya kuchekesha."

Nguzo ya "Emmerdale Farm" ilikuwa sawa na opera ya redio ya BBC "The Archers", ikilenga familia, shamba na wahusika katika kijiji kilicho karibu. Utengenezaji wa filamu ya shamba hilo hapo awali ulibadilishwa juu ya "The Riordans", opera ya sabuni ya Ireland ambayo ilitangazwa kutoka katikati ya miaka ya 1960 hadi mwisho wa miaka ya 1970. "Riordans" ilivunja msingi mpya wa viboreshaji vya sabuni kwa kutayarishwa kwa kiasi kikubwa (kwenye shamba, inayomilikiwa na mpango wa Tom na Mary Riord) badala ya studio - mazoea ya kawaida ya operesheni za sabuni za Uingereza na Amerika. Programu hiyo ilifanya upainia wa eneo la shamba la shamba, na wanyama wa shamba na vifaa. Wakati wa miaka ya 1960 na 1970, utengenezaji wa filamu za nje za runinga na vitengo vya utangazaji vya nje (OBUs) ulikuwa katika utoto wake kwa sababu ya gharama kubwa na kutegemea hali ya hewa. Mafanikio ya "Riordans" yalionyesha kuwa opera ya sabuni inaweza kutayarishwa kwa nje, na Televisheni ya Yorkshire ilipeleka watu kwa seti yake katika Kata ya Meath ili kuona uzalishaji wa programu hiyo.
Kate Oates (amezaliwa 1979/1980) ni mtayarishaji wa televisheni wa Uingereza, anayejulikana kwa kazi yake juu ya operesheni za sabuni "The Archers", "Emmerdale", "Coronation Street" na "EastEnders".

Uteuzi wa Oates kama mtayarishaji wa "Mtaa wa Coronation", uliofaulu Blackburn, ulitangazwa mnamo 18 Septemba 2015. Oates alifurahi kujiunga na sabuni hiyo, akielezea hatua hiyo kama "akiondoka" na kuongeza kuwa alihisi kuheshimiwa kufanya hivyo. Oates alijiunga na sabuni mapema mwaka wa 2016. Kwenye hoja kutoka "Emmerdale" kwenda "Coronation Street", alitoa maoni, "lakini kama" Emmerdale "imemaanisha ulimwengu kwangu" Corrie "pia una nafasi maalum moyoni mwangu." John Whiston alihisi kuwa Oates ndiye mtu kamili kuwa mtayarishaji wa sabuni. Blackburn alielezea msimamo huo kama "moja ya kazi bora katika runinga" na alitamani Bahati ya Oates. Roberts aliamua kwamba Oates angefanya mtayarishaji "bora" kwa safu hiyo na aliamini kuwa alikuwa na "sifa zote za kuwa mafanikio makubwa kama mtayarishaji wa" Coronation Street "". Mark Jefferies wa "Daily Mirror" alidhani kwamba Oates itakuwa "" Coronation Street "Mwokozi". Oates alipewa sifa ya kwanza katika nafasi hiyo katika sehemu ya 8968, ilitangazwa kwa mara ya kwanza tarehe 15 Agosti 2016.

Andy Majumba ya "Jua" yaliripoti mnamo Julai 22, 2018 kwamba Oates alikuwa ameingia mazungumzo na BBC kuwa mtayarishaji mtendaji wa opera yao ya sabuni, "EastEnders". Msemaji wa BBC aliwaambia Jumba kwamba wazalishaji walipenda kazi yake kwenye "Coronation Street" na alihisi itafaa sauti ya "EastEnders". Zaidi ya wiki mbili baadaye, ilitangazwa kuwa Oates atakuwa mtayarishaji mkuu wa "EastEnders" na vile vile BBC Medical Dramas "CHAMUAL" na "Holby City". Oates kimsingi atafanya kazi na timu katika "EastEnders" na atafanya kazi pamoja na mshauri mtendaji wa sasa wa show, John Yorke kutoka Oktoba hadi Desemba 2018 kutoa "laini laini". Baadaye, Oates atakuwa na jukumu la show. Oates alifurahi katika nafasi ya kuhusika katika utengenezaji wa maonyesho hayo matatu. Alitoa maoni, "Nimefurahiya kukutana na timu na talanta nyuma ya kila onyesho na siwezi kusubiri kukwama na kusimulia hadithi zisizopingika." Mark Linsey, CCO wa Studios za BBC, zilizoitwa Oates "mwandishi wa hadithi mwenye nguvu na wa ubunifu" na alitazamia kujiunga na studio. Charlotte Moore alifurahishwa sana na miadi ya Oates na akasema katika taarifa kwa waandishi wa habari, "ana mapenzi ya kweli kwa sabuni na sina shaka kuwa uzoefu wake, ubunifu wa nguvu na nguvu zitasababisha kizazi kijacho cha mashabiki wa BBC One." Piers Wenger, mtawala wa mchezo wa kuigiza wa BBC, aliamua kwamba Oates alikuwa na uwezo "usio na usawa" wa kutengeneza sabuni na michezo ya kuigiza kuwa maarufu na "ilizungumziwa". Alitabiri kwamba atakuwa "kipaji" katika msimamo wake mpya.

Oates alianza kazi yake kama mtafiti na msaidizi wa wahariri wa mwandishi, Germaine Greer na alimtaja Greer kama "msukumo", "inimible", "aina" na "shauku". Alihamia Televisheni ya Carlton kama mtafiti na mhariri wa maandishi wa Opera ya Sabuni, "Crossroads", ambayo aliendelea hadi 2003. "Crossroads" ilifutwa mnamo Machi 2003, na sehemu ya mwisho ya kuangazia Mei. Kazi ya Oates kwenye "Crossroads" inamwongoza kuanza kutengeneza opera ya sabuni ya BBC 4, "Archers", mahali anapodai kama "wingi wa mafunzo yake". Mnamo mwaka wa 2012, Oates alimpongeza "The Arches" mhariri wa miaka ishirini na moja, Vanessa Whitburn, akimwita "msukumo". Oates ilizalisha opera ya sabuni kwa miaka saba, ikichagua kuondoka mnamo 2010.
report_src: Mwandishi mkuu (ambaye pia ndiye muundaji asilia) wa opera ya sabuni ya Uingereza “Emmerdale” ni Kevin Laffan, ambaye alianzisha kipindi hicho kilipoanza kurushwa tarehe 16 Oktoba 1972 [1].

question_en: When did Wilton Norman Chamberlain die?
pos_context_en: Wilton Norman Chamberlain (; August 21, 1936 – October 12, 1999) was an American basketball player who played center position and is considered one of the most prominent and dominant players in NBA history. He played for the Philadelphia/San Francisco Warriors, the Philadelphia 76ers, and the Los Angeles Lakers of the National Basketball Association (NBA). He played for the University of Kansas and also for the Harlem Globetrotters before playing in the NBA. Chamberlain stood tall, and weighed as a rookie before bulking up to 275 and eventually to over with the Lakers.
neg_context_en: Wilton Norman Chamberlain was born in Philadelphia, into a family of nine children, the son of Olivia Ruth Johnson, a domestic worker and homemaker, and William Chamberlain, a welder, custodian, and handyman. He was a frail child, nearly dying of pneumonia in his early years and missing a whole year of school as a result. In his early years Chamberlain was not interested in basketball, because he thought it was "a game for sissies". Instead, he was an avid track and field athlete: as a youth, he high jumped 6 feet, 6 inches, ran the 440 yards in 49.0 seconds and the 880 yards in 1:58.3, put the shot 53 feet, 4 inches, and broad jumped 22 feet. But according to Chamberlain, "basketball was king in Philadelphia", so he eventually turned to the sport. Because Chamberlain was a very tall child, already measuring at age 10 and when he entered Philadelphia's Overbrook High School, he had a natural advantage against his peers; he soon was renowned for his scoring talent, his physical strength and his shot blocking abilities. According to ESPN journalist Hal Bock, Chamberlain was "scary, flat-out frightening... before he came along, most basketball players were mortal-sized men. Chamberlain changed that." It was also in this period of his life when his three lifelong nicknames "Wilt the Stilt", "Goliath", and his favorite, "The Big Dipper", were allegedly born.

The prosecution theorized that McMonigle abducted Chamberlain with the intention of raping her, murdered her when she tried to resist, and later carried her body to the Devil's Slide and tossed it into the ocean. He was pronounced guilty by the jury after only 38 minutes of deliberation, and sentenced to die in the gas chamber. While in death row, he confessed to the murder of a San Francisco woman and later to have murdered eleven people overall, but he was not charged with more murders. In his last statement before his execution in 1948, however, McMonigle claimed that he was not involved in Chamberlain's disappearance.

Chamberlain died of his lingering wartime wounds in 1914 in Portland, Maine, at the age of eighty-five. He is interred at Pine Grove Cemetery in Brunswick, Maine. Beside him as he died was Dr. Abner O. Shaw of Portland, one of the two surgeons who had operated on him in Petersburg 50 years previously. A full study of his medical history strongly suggests that it was complications from the wound suffered at Petersburg that resulted in his death. He was the last Civil War veteran to die as a result of wounds from the war and considered by some the last casualty of the war.

Chamberlain threw himself into parliamentary work, begrudging the times when he was unable to attend debates and spending much time on committee work. He was chairman of the national Unhealthy Areas Committee (1919–21) and in that role, had visited the slums of London, Birmingham, Leeds, Liverpool and Cardiff. Consequently, in March 1920, Bonar Law offered him a junior post at the Ministry of Health on behalf of the Prime Minister, but Chamberlain was unwilling to serve under Lloyd George and was offered no further posts during Lloyd George's premiership. When Bonar Law resigned as party leader, Austen Chamberlain took his place as head of the Unionists in Parliament. Unionist leaders were willing to fight the 1922 election in coalition with the Lloyd George Liberals, but on 19 October, Unionist MPs held a meeting at which they voted to fight the election as a single party. Lloyd George resigned, as did Austen Chamberlain, and Bonar Law was recalled from retirement to lead the Unionists as Prime Minister.

Chamberlain had long enjoyed excellent health, except for occasional attacks of gout, but by July 1940, he was in almost constant pain. He sought treatment, and later that month entered hospital for surgery. Surgeons discovered that he was suffering from terminal bowel cancer, but they concealed it from him, instead telling him that he would not require further surgery. Chamberlain resumed work in mid-August. He returned to his office on 9 September, but renewed pain, compounded by the night-time bombing of London which forced him to go to an air raid shelter and denied him rest, sapped his energy, and he left London for the last time on 19 September. He returned to Highfield Park in Heckfield. He offered his resignation to Churchill on 22 September. The Prime Minister was initially reluctant to accept; but as both men realised that Chamberlain would never return to work, Churchill finally allowed him to resign. The Prime Minister asked if Chamberlain would accept the highest order of British chivalry, the Order of the Garter, of which his brother had been a member. Chamberlain refused. He said he would "prefer to die plain 'Mr Chamberlain' like my father before me, unadorned by any title".

Chamberlain himself lived to see his ideas begin to bear fruit. Adolf Hitler, while still growing as a political figure in Germany, visited him several times (in 1923 and in 1926, together with Joseph Goebbels) at the Wagner family's property in Bayreuth. Later, in January 1927, Hitler, along with several highly ranked members of the Nazi Party, attended Chamberlain's funeral.
Chamberlain's ideas particularly influenced Alfred Rosenberg, who became the Nazi Party's in-house philosopher. In 1909, some months before his 17th birthday, he went with an aunt to visit his guardian where several other relatives were gathered. Bored, he went to a book shelf, picked up a copy of Chamberlain's "The Foundations" and wrote of the moment: "I felt electrified; I wrote down the title and went straight to the bookshop." In 1930 Rosenberg published "The Myth of the Twentieth Century," a homage to and continuation of Chamberlain's work. Rosenberg had accompanied Hitler when he called upon Wagner's widow, Cosima, in October 1923 when he met her son-in-law. Hitler told the ailing Chamberlain he was working on his own book which, he intended should do for the Third Reich what Chamberlain's book had done for the Second.

Chamberlain briefly played minor league baseball for the 1899 Buffalo Bisons in the Western League. He did not win any games for Buffalo. In 1904, Sporting Life reported that the pitcher had a brother, F. Earl Chamberlain, who was named a Pacific Coast League umpire. Elton died of colon cancer at the age of 61. He was interred in the Holy Cross Cemetery in Baltimore, Maryland.

Chamberlain was praised as an able and upright judge and a sound lawyer; even his conduct of the Orr trial had its defenders. When he died in 1802, the newly appointed Lord Chancellor of Ireland, Lord Redesdale, was warned that it would not be easy to find a suitable replacement. He had a great gift for friendship: his colleague, later Lord Chief Justice of Ireland, Lord Downes, when he died in 1826 asked to be buried in St. Ann's Church, Dawson Street, beside Chamberlain, his inseparable friend for many years: "their union and friendship was complete..and now they lie together in the same tomb". Like most judges of the time he was notably extravagant: judges were expected to live and entertain on a scale beyond their salaries, and Chamberlain, who had several children to support, is said to have died almost penniless.

Azaria Chamberlain (11 June 1980 – 17 August 1980) was an Australian 2-month-old baby girl who was killed by a dingo on the night of 17 August 1980 on a family camping trip to Uluru (also known as Ayers Rock) in the Northern Territory. Her body was never found. Her parents, Lindy and Michael Chamberlain, reported that she had been taken from their tent by a dingo. Lindy Chamberlain was, however, tried for murder and spent more than three years in prison. She was released when a piece of Azaria's clothing was found near a dingo lair, and new inquests were opened. In 2012, 32 years after Azaria's death, the Chamberlains' version of events was officially supported by a coroner.
question_src: Je! Wilton Norman Chamberlain alikufa lini?
pos_context_src: Wilton Norman Chamberlain (; Agosti 21, 1936 - Oktoba 12, 1999) alikuwa mchezaji wa mpira wa kikapu wa Amerika ambaye alicheza nafasi ya katikati na anachukuliwa kuwa mmoja wa wachezaji mashuhuri na wakubwa katika historia ya NBA. Alichezea Washujaa wa Philadelphia/San Francisco, Philadelphia 76ers, na Los Angeles Lakers wa Chama cha Mpira wa Kikapu cha Taifa (NBA). Alichezea Chuo Kikuu cha Kansas na pia kwa Harlem Globetrotters kabla ya kucheza katika NBA. Chamberlain alisimama mrefu, na uzani kama rookie kabla ya bulking hadi 275 na mwishowe kumalizika na Lakers.
neg_context_src: Wilton Norman Chamberlain alizaliwa huko Philadelphia, kuwa familia ya watoto tisa, mtoto wa Olivia Ruth Johnson, mfanyakazi wa nyumbani na mama wa nyumbani, na William Chamberlain, welder, mlezi, na handyman. Alikuwa mtoto dhaifu, karibu kufa na pneumonia katika miaka yake ya mapema na kukosa mwaka mzima wa shule kama matokeo. Katika miaka yake ya mapema Chamberlain hakuvutiwa na mpira wa kikapu, kwa sababu alidhani ni "mchezo wa Sissies". Badala yake, alikuwa wimbo wa kupendeza na mwanariadha wa shamba: Kama ujana, aliruka juu miguu 6, inchi 6, aliendesha yadi 440 katika sekunde 49.0 na yadi 880 katika 1: 58.3, akapiga risasi futi 53, inchi 4, na pana akaruka miguu 22. Lakini kulingana na Chamberlain, "mpira wa kikapu ulikuwa mfalme huko Philadelphia", kwa hivyo mwishowe akageuka kwenye mchezo. Kwa sababu Chamberlain alikuwa mtoto mrefu sana, tayari alikuwa na umri wa miaka 10 na alipoingia shule ya upili ya Philadelphia, alikuwa na faida ya asili dhidi ya wenzake; Hivi karibuni alikuwa maarufu kwa talanta yake ya bao, nguvu yake ya mwili na uwezo wake wa kuzuia risasi. Kulingana na mwandishi wa habari wa ESPN Hal Bock, Chamberlain alikuwa "wa kutisha, wa kutisha ... kabla ya kuja, wachezaji wengi wa mpira wa kikapu walikuwa wanaume wa ukubwa. Chamberlain ilibadilisha hiyo." Ilikuwa pia katika kipindi hiki cha maisha yake wakati majina yake matatu ya utani ya maisha "yatakaa", "Goliathi", na mpendwa wake, "Big Dipper", walidaiwa alizaliwa.

Mwendesha mashtaka aligundua kwamba McMonigle alimteka Chamberlain kwa kusudi la kumbaka, akamwua wakati alipojaribu kupinga, na baadaye akaipeleka mwili wake kwenye slaidi ya shetani na akaitupa baharini. Alitamkwa kuwa na hatia na majaji baada ya dakika 38 tu ya kufikiria, na akahukumiwa kufa katika chumba cha gesi. Wakati akiwa katika safu ya kifo, alikiri mauaji ya mwanamke wa San Francisco na baadaye aliwauwa watu kumi na moja kwa jumla, lakini hakushtakiwa kwa mauaji zaidi. Katika taarifa yake ya mwisho kabla ya kuuawa kwake mnamo 1948, McMonigle alidai kwamba hakuhusika katika kutoweka kwa Chamberlain.

Chamberlain alikufa kutokana na majeraha yake ya wakati wa vita mnamo 1914 huko Portland, Maine, akiwa na umri wa miaka themanini na tano. Anaingiliwa katika Makaburi ya Pine Grove huko Brunswick, Maine. Kando yake alipokufa alikuwa Dk. Abner O. Shaw wa Portland, mmoja wa waganga wa upasuaji wawili ambao walikuwa wamefanya kazi kwake huko Petersburg miaka 50 hapo awali. Utafiti kamili wa historia yake ya matibabu unaonyesha kwamba ilikuwa shida kutoka kwa jeraha lililopatikana huko Petersburg ambalo lilisababisha kifo chake. Alikuwa mkongwe wa mwisho wa Vita vya wenyewe kwa wenyewe kufa kwa sababu ya majeraha kutoka kwa vita na kuzingatiwa na baadhi ya majeruhi wa mwisho wa vita.

Chamberlain alijitupa katika kazi ya bunge, akisisitiza nyakati ambazo hakuweza kuhudhuria mijadala na kutumia muda mwingi kwenye kazi ya kamati. Alikuwa mwenyekiti wa Kamati ya Kitaifa isiyo na afya (1919-21) na katika jukumu hilo, alikuwa ametembelea makazi duni ya London, Birmingham, Leeds, Liverpool na Cardiff. Kwa hivyo, mnamo Machi 1920, Sheria ya Bonar ilimpa nafasi ndogo katika Wizara ya Afya kwa niaba ya Waziri Mkuu, lakini Chamberlain hakutaka kutumikia chini ya Lloyd George na hakupewa machapisho zaidi wakati wa udhamini wa Lloyd George. Wakati Bonar Law alijiuzulu kama kiongozi wa chama, Austen Chamberlain alichukua nafasi yake kama mkuu wa wanajeshi katika Bunge. Viongozi wa umoja walikuwa tayari kupigania uchaguzi wa 1922 katika umoja na Lloyd George Liberals, lakini mnamo Oktoba 19, wabunge wa Muungano walifanya mkutano ambao walipiga kura kupigana na uchaguzi kama chama kimoja. Lloyd George alijiuzulu, kama vile Austen Chamberlain, na sheria ya Bonar ilikumbukwa kutoka kwa kustaafu ili kuwaongoza washirika kama Waziri Mkuu.

Chamberlain alikuwa amefurahiya afya bora kwa muda mrefu, isipokuwa kwa shambulio la mara kwa mara la gout, lakini mnamo Julai 1940, alikuwa katika maumivu karibu ya kila wakati. Alitafuta matibabu, na baadaye mwezi huo aliingia hospitalini kwa upasuaji. Madaktari wa upasuaji waligundua kuwa alikuwa akiugua saratani ya matumbo ya terminal, lakini waliificha kutoka kwake, badala yake wakamwambia kwamba hatahitaji upasuaji zaidi. Chamberlain alianza tena kazi katikati ya Agosti. Alirudi ofisini kwake mnamo 9 Septemba, lakini akaumwa upya, akiongezewa na bomu ya London ya usiku ambayo ilimlazimisha kwenda kwenye makazi ya uvamizi wa hewa na kumkataa kupumzika, akapiga nguvu, na akaondoka London kwa mara ya mwisho mnamo Septemba 19. Alirudi Hifadhi ya Highfield huko Heckfield. Alitoa kujiuzulu kwake kwa Churchill mnamo Septemba 22. Waziri mkuu hapo awali alikuwa anasita kukubali; Lakini kama watu wote wawili waligundua kuwa Chamberlain hatarudi kazini, Churchill hatimaye alimruhusu ajiuzulu. Waziri Mkuu aliuliza ikiwa Chamberlain angekubali agizo la juu zaidi la chivalry ya Uingereza, agizo la garter, ambalo kaka yake alikuwa mwanachama. Chamberlain alikataa. Alisema "angependelea kufa wazi 'Bwana Chamberlain' kama baba yangu kabla yangu, bila kufanywa na jina lolote".

Chamberlain mwenyewe aliishi kuona maoni yake yanaanza kuzaa matunda. Adolf Hitler, wakati bado alikuwa akikua kama mtu wa kisiasa nchini Ujerumani, alimtembelea mara kadhaa (mnamo 1923 na mnamo 1926, pamoja na Joseph Goebbels) katika mali ya familia ya Wagner huko Bayreuth. Baadaye, mnamo Januari 1927, Hitler, pamoja na washiriki kadhaa wa Chama cha Nazi, walihudhuria mazishi ya Chamberlain.
Maoni ya Chamberlain yalimshawishi Alfred Rosenberg, ambaye alikua mwanafalsafa wa nyumbani wa Nazi. Mnamo 1909, miezi kadhaa kabla ya siku yake ya kuzaliwa ya 17, alikwenda na shangazi kumtembelea mlezi wake ambapo jamaa wengine kadhaa walikusanyika. Kuchoka, alikwenda kwenye rafu ya kitabu, akachukua nakala ya "Misingi" ya Chamberlain na kuandika juu ya wakati huu: "Nilihisi umeme; niliandika kichwa na kwenda moja kwa moja kwenye duka la vitabu." Mnamo 1930 Rosenberg alichapisha "Hadithi ya Karne ya Ishirini," heshima na mwendelezo wa kazi ya Chamberlain. Rosenberg alikuwa ameandamana na Hitler wakati alipomwita mjane wa Wagner, Cosima, mnamo Oktoba 1923 alipokutana na mkwewe. Hitler aliliambia Chamberlain anayelea kuwa alikuwa akifanya kazi kwenye kitabu chake mwenyewe ambacho, alikusudia kufanya kwa Reich ya tatu kile kitabu cha Chamberlain kilifanya kwa pili.

Chamberlain alicheza kwa kifupi baseball ndogo ya ligi kwa 1899 Buffalo Bisons kwenye Ligi ya Magharibi. Hakushinda michezo yoyote kwa Buffalo. Mnamo 1904, Maisha ya Sporting yaliripoti kwamba mtungi alikuwa na kaka, F. Earl Chamberlain, ambaye alipewa jina la Uigizaji wa Ligi ya Pasifiki. Elton alikufa na saratani ya koloni akiwa na umri wa miaka 61. Aliingiliwa katika kaburi la Holy Cross huko Baltimore, Maryland.

Chamberlain alisifiwa kama jaji anayeweza na mwenye wima na wakili wa sauti; Hata mwenendo wake wa kesi ya ORR ulikuwa na watetezi wake. Alipokufa mnamo 1802, Lord Chancellor aliyeteuliwa mpya wa Ireland, Lord Redesdale, alionywa kuwa haitakuwa rahisi kupata uingizwaji unaofaa. Alikuwa na zawadi kubwa kwa urafiki: mwenzake, baadaye Bwana Jaji Mkuu wa Ireland, Lord Downes, alipokufa mnamo 1826 aliuliza kuzikwa katika Kanisa la Mtakatifu Ann, Dawson Street, kando na Chamberlain, rafiki yake asiyeweza kutengwa kwa miaka mingi: "Muungano wao na urafiki ulikuwa kamili..na sasa wanalala pamoja kwenye kaburi lile lile". Kama majaji wengi wa wakati huo alikuwa akizidi sana: majaji walitarajiwa kuishi na kuburudisha kwa kiwango zaidi ya mishahara yao, na Chamberlain, ambaye alikuwa na watoto kadhaa wa kuunga mkono, inasemekana alikufa karibu penniles.

Azaria Chamberlain (11 Juni 1980-17 Agosti 1980) alikuwa mtoto wa kike wa miezi 2 wa Australia ambaye aliuawa na Dingo usiku wa 17 Agosti 1980 katika safari ya kambi ya familia kwenda Uluru (pia inajulikana kama Ayers Rock) katika eneo la kaskazini. Mwili wake haukupatikana kamwe. Wazazi wake, Lindy na Michael Chamberlain, waliripoti kwamba alikuwa amechukuliwa kutoka kwa hema lao na dingo. Lindy Chamberlain, hata hivyo, alijaribu mauaji na alitumia zaidi ya miaka mitatu gerezani. Aliachiliwa wakati kipande cha mavazi ya Azaria kilipatikana karibu na dingo lair, na uchunguzi mpya ulifunguliwa. Mnamo mwaka wa 2012, miaka 32 baada ya kifo cha Azaria, toleo la matukio ya Chamberlains liliungwa mkono rasmi na coroner.

question_en: Where was Georgios Papadopoulos born?
pos_context_en: Papadopoulos was born in Elaiohori, a small village in the Prefecture of Achaea in Peloponnese to local schoolteacher Christos Papadopoulos and his wife Chrysoula. He was the eldest son and had two brothers, Konstantinos and Haralambos. After finishing high school in 1937 he enrolled in the Hellenic Military Academy, completing its three-year program in 1940.
neg_context_en:
Translated as:
A failed assassination attempt against Papadopoulos was perpetrated by Alexandros Panagoulis in the morning of 13 August 1968, when Papadopoulos was driven from his summer residence in Lagonisi to Athens, escorted by his personal security motorcycles and cars. Panagoulis ignited a bomb at a point of the coastal road where the limousine carrying Papadopoulos would have to slow down, but the bomb failed to harm Papadopoulos. Panagoulis was captured a few hours later in a nearby sea cave, since the boat sent to help him escape was instructed to leave at a specific time and he couldn't swim there on time due to strong sea currents. After his arrest, he was taken to the Greek Military Police (EAT-ESA) offices where he was questioned, beaten and tortured. On 17 November 1968, Panagoulis was sentenced to death but was personally pardoned by Papadopoulos, served only five years in prison, and after democracy was restored was elected a member of Parliament. He was regarded as an emblematic figure of the struggle to restore democracy, and as such has often been paralleled to Harmodius and Aristogeiton, two ancient Athenians known for their assassination tyrannicide of Hipparchus.

In 1964, Papadopoulos was transferred to an artillery division in Thrace by decree of Center Union Defense Minister Garoufalias. In June 1965, days before the onset of the major political turmoil known as Apostasia, he made national headlines after arresting two soldiers under his command and eight leftist civilians from settlements near his military camp, on charges that they had conspired to sabotage army vehicles by pouring sugar into the vehicles' gas tanks. The ten were imprisoned and tortured, but it was eventually proven that Papadopoulos himself had sabotaged the vehicles. Andreas Papandreou wrote in his memoirs that Papadopoulos wanted to prove that under the Center Union government, the communists had been left free to undermine national security. Even after this scandal, Papadopoulos was not discharged from the army since prime minister Georgios Papandreou forgave him as a compatriot of his father.
In 1967, Papadopoulos was promoted to colonel.

At the beginning of 1944, Papadopoulos left Greece with the help of British intelligence agents and went to Egypt, where the Greek government-in-exile was based, and was promoted to lieutenant. Along with other right-wing military officers, he participated in the creation of the nationalist right-wing secret IDEA organization in the fall of 1944, shortly after the country's liberation. Those 1940B officers who took refuge in Egypt with the king immediately after the German invasion had become generals when their still-colonel classmates undertook the coup of 1967.

Dimitrios Papadopoulos was born on 15 December 1889 to the military doctor Spyridon Papadopoulos (1853–1930) and his wife Eleni (1857–1949). He was born in Nafplio, where his father was director of the Akronafplia military hospital. He had five siblings, the older brother Ioannis (1887–1913), and the younger brothers Angelos (1893–1973) and Athanasios (1900–1971) and two sisters.

After democracy was restored in 1974, during the period of metapolitefsi ("regime change"), Papadopoulos and his cohorts were tried for high treason, mutiny, torture, and other crimes and misdemeanors. On 23 August 1975, he and several others were found guilty and were sentenced to death, which was later commuted to life imprisonment. Papadopoulos remained in prison, rejecting an amnesty offer that required that he acknowledge his past record and express remorse, until his death on 27 June 1999 at age 80 in a hospital in Athens, where he had been treated for cancer since 1996.

Daniil Papadopoulos (; born 1963 in Thessaloniki) is a former Greek footballer that played in several positions throughout his career. He was born in Thessaloniki and played youth football with Olympos Dendropotamou before starting his professional career with Iraklis. Papadopoulos spent his entire professional career with Iraklis and he is the all-time leader for Iraklis with 419 appearances. Papadopoulos is also the second all-time goalscorer of Iraklis with 64 goals. He managed to gain 5 caps for Greece. Papadopoulos also had a brief career in management, as an assistant and caretaker manager of Iraklis and as a manager in second and third tier teams.

Georgios Papadopoulos (; ; 5 May 1919 – 27 June 1999) was the head of the military coup d'état that took place in Greece on 21 April 1967, and leader of the junta that ruled the country from 1967 to 1974. He held his dictatorial power until 1973, when he was himself overthrown by his co-conspirator Dimitrios Ioannidis.

Papadopoulos was born in Nicosia in 1973, the son of lawyer, politician and future president Tassos Papadopoulos and his wife Fotini. He studied law at University College London and was called to the bar at Inner Temple. During his time in London, he served as president of EFEK, the Cypriot students' federation in Britain. On his return to Cyprus, Papadopoulos began work at his father's firm.

Lazaros Papadopoulos (Greek: Λάζαρος Παπαδόπουλος; born June 3, 1980), is a retired Greek professional basketball player. He was listed at 7 ft (2.13 m) 265 lbs (120 kg), and played the center position. Born in Krasnodar, Papadopoulos started his professional career with Iraklis. An All-EuroLeague Second Team selection in 2007, he played for several teams in Europe throughout his professional career, most notably winning the EuroLeague twice, in 2002 with Panathinaikos and in 2012 with Olympiacos. Papadopoulos represented Greece regularly, winning the gold medal in the 2005 EuroBasket, and the silver medal in the 2006 FIBA World Championship.
question_src: Georgios Papadopoulos alizaliwa wapi?
pos_context_src: Papadopoulos alizaliwa huko Elaiohori, kijiji kidogo katika mkoa wa Achaea huko Peloponnese kwa mwalimu wa shule ya ndani Christos Papadopoulos na mkewe Chrysoula. Alikuwa mtoto wa kwanza na alikuwa na kaka wawili, Konstantinos na Haralambos. Baada ya kumaliza shule ya upili mnamo 1937 alijiandikisha katika Chuo cha Jeshi la Hellenic, akimaliza mpango wake wa miaka tatu mnamo 1940.
neg_context_src:
Ilitafsiriwa kama:
Jaribio la kuuawa lililoshindwa dhidi ya Papadopoulos lilifanywa na Alexandros Panagoulis asubuhi ya 13 Agosti 1968, wakati Papadopoulos alifukuzwa kutoka makazi yake ya majira ya joto huko Lagonisi kwenda Athene, akisindikizwa na pikipiki na magari yake ya usalama. Panagoulis aliweka bomu katika hatua ya barabara ya pwani ambapo limousine iliyobeba papadopoulos ingelazimika kupungua, lakini bomu ilishindwa kumdhuru Papadopoulos. Panagoulis alitekwa masaa machache baadaye katika pango la bahari iliyo karibu, kwani mashua iliyotumwa ili kumsaidia kutoroka aliagizwa kuondoka kwa wakati fulani na hakuweza kuogelea huko kwa wakati kutokana na mikondo ya bahari yenye nguvu. Baada ya kukamatwa kwake, alipelekwa katika ofisi za polisi wa Jeshi la Uigiriki (EAT-ESA) ambapo alihojiwa, kupigwa na kuteswa. Mnamo tarehe 17 Novemba 1968, Panagoulis alihukumiwa kifo lakini alisamehewa kibinafsi na Papadopoulos, alitumikia miaka mitano tu gerezani, na baada ya demokrasia kurejeshwa alichaguliwa kama mbunge. Alizingatiwa kama mfano wa mapambano ya kurejesha demokrasia, na kwa hivyo mara nyingi imekuwa ikifanana na Harmodius na Aristogeiton, Waathene wawili wa zamani wanaojulikana kwa udhalilishaji wao wa Hipparchus.

Mnamo 1964, Papadopoulos alihamishiwa mgawanyiko wa sanaa huko Thrace na Amri ya Waziri wa Ulinzi wa Kituo cha Garoufalias. Mnamo Juni 1965, siku kabla ya mwanzo wa machafuko makubwa ya kisiasa yaliyojulikana kama Apostasia, alitoa vichwa vya habari vya kitaifa baada ya kuwakamata askari wawili chini ya amri yake na raia wanane wa kushoto kutoka makazi karibu na kambi yake ya jeshi, kwa tuhuma kwamba walikuwa wamefanya mazoezi ya jeshi la jeshi kwa kumwaga sukari ndani ya mizinga ya gesi. Wale kumi walifungwa na kuteswa, lakini mwishowe ilithibitishwa kuwa Papadopoulos mwenyewe alikuwa ameharibu magari. Andreas Papandreou aliandika katika kumbukumbu zake kwamba Papadopoulos alitaka kudhibitisha kuwa chini ya serikali ya Kituo cha Muungano, Wakomunisti walikuwa wameachwa huru kudhoofisha usalama wa kitaifa. Hata baada ya kashfa hii, Papadopoulos hakuondolewa kutoka kwa jeshi tangu Waziri Mkuu Georgios Papandreou alimsamehe kama mshirika wa baba yake.
Mnamo 1967, Papadopoulos alipandishwa kwa Kanali.

Mwanzoni mwa 1944, Papadopoulos aliondoka Ugiriki kwa msaada wa mawakala wa ujasusi wa Uingereza na akaenda Misri, ambapo serikali ya Uigiriki ilitegemea, na ikapandishwa kuwa Lieutenant. Pamoja na maafisa wengine wa kijeshi wa mrengo wa kulia, alishiriki katika uundaji wa shirika la wazo la siri la mrengo wa kulia katika msimu wa 1944, muda mfupi baada ya ukombozi wa nchi hiyo. Wale maafisa wa 1940B ambao walikimbilia Misri na mfalme mara baada ya uvamizi wa Wajerumani kuwa majenerali wakati wenzao wa darasa la Colonel walipofanya mapinduzi ya 1967.

Dimitrios Papadopoulos alizaliwa mnamo 15 Desemba 1889 kwa daktari wa jeshi Spyridon Papadopoulos (1853-1930) na mkewe Eleni (1857-1949). Alizaliwa huko Nafplio, ambapo baba yake alikuwa mkurugenzi wa Hospitali ya Jeshi ya Akronafplia. Alikuwa na ndugu zake watano, kaka mkubwa Ioannis (1887-1913), na ndugu mdogo Angelos (1893-1973) na Athanasios (1900-1971) na dada wawili.

Baada ya demokrasia kurejeshwa mnamo 1974, katika kipindi cha metapolitefsi ("mabadiliko ya serikali"), Papadopoulos na vikosi vyake vilijaribiwa kwa uhaini mkubwa, mutiny, kuteswa, na uhalifu mwingine na makosa. Mnamo tarehe 23 Agosti 1975, yeye na wengine kadhaa walipatikana na hatia na walihukumiwa kifo, ambayo baadaye ilihamishwa kifungo cha maisha. Papadopoulos alibaki gerezani, akikataa ofa ya msamaha ambayo ilimtaka akubali rekodi yake ya zamani na ajutie majuto, hadi kifo chake mnamo tarehe 27 Juni 1999 akiwa na umri wa miaka 80 hospitalini huko Athene, ambapo alikuwa ametibiwa saratani tangu 1996.

Daniil Papadopoulos (; amezaliwa 1963 huko Thesaloniki) ni mchezaji wa zamani wa Uigiriki ambaye alicheza katika nafasi kadhaa wakati wote wa kazi yake. Alizaliwa huko Thesaloniki na kucheza mpira wa vijana na Olimpiki Dendropotamou kabla ya kuanza kazi yake ya kitaalam na Iraklis. Papadopoulos alitumia kazi yake yote ya kitaalam na Iraklis na yeye ndiye kiongozi wa wakati wote kwa Iraklis na kuonekana 419. Papadopoulos pia ni alama ya pili ya malengo ya Iraklis na malengo 64. Alifanikiwa kupata kofia 5 za Ugiriki. Papadopoulos pia alikuwa na kazi fupi katika usimamizi, kama msaidizi na msimamizi wa walezi wa Iraklis na kama meneja katika timu za pili na za tatu.

Georgios Papadopoulos (;; 5 Mei 1919-27 Juni 1999) alikuwa mkuu wa mapinduzi ya kijeshi ambayo yalifanyika nchini Ugiriki mnamo Aprili 21, 1967, na kiongozi wa junta aliyetawala nchi hiyo kutoka 1967 hadi 1974. Alishikilia nguvu yake ya kidikteta hadi 1973, wakati yeye mwenyewe alipozidiwa na mtu anayemaliza muda wake.

Papadopoulos alizaliwa huko Nicosia mnamo 1973, mwana wa wakili, mwanasiasa na rais wa baadaye Tassos Papadopoulos na mkewe Fotini. Alisoma sheria katika Chuo Kikuu cha London na aliitwa kwenye bar huko Hekalu la ndani. Wakati wa London, aliwahi kuwa Rais wa Efek, Shirikisho la Wanafunzi wa Cypriot huko Uingereza. Aliporudi Kupro, Papadopoulos alianza kufanya kazi katika kampuni ya baba yake.

Lazaros papadopoulos (Kiyunani: λ mbe π π ά λ Aliorodheshwa kwa 7 ft (2.13 m) lbs 265 (kilo 120), na kucheza nafasi ya katikati. Mzaliwa wa Krasnodar, Papadopoulos alianza kazi yake ya kitaalam na Iraklis. Uteuzi wa pili wa timu ya All-Euroleague mnamo 2007, alicheza kwa timu kadhaa barani Ulaya wakati wote wa taaluma yake, haswa akishinda Euroleague mara mbili, mnamo 2002 na Panathinaikos na mnamo 2012 na Olimpiki. Papadopoulos aliwakilisha Ugiriki mara kwa mara, akishinda medali ya dhahabu katika EuroBasket ya 2005, na medali ya fedha katika Mashindano ya Dunia ya FIBA ​​ya 2006.

question_en: Who discovered 5-Hydroxyeicosatetraenoic acid?
pos_context_en: The Nobel laureate, Bengt I. Samuelsson, and colleagues first described 5("S")-HETE in 1976 as a metabolite of arachidonic acid made by rabbit neutrophils. Biological activity was linked to it several years later when it was found to stimulate human neutrophil rises in cytosolic calcium, chemotaxis, and increases in their cell surface adhesiveness as indicated by their aggregation to each other. Since a previously discovered arachidonic acid metabolite made by neutrophils, leukotriene B4 (LTB), also stimulates human neutrophil calcium rises, chemotaxis, and auto-aggregation and is structurally similar to 5("S")-HETE in being a 5-("S")-hydroxy-eicosateraenoate, it was assumed that 5-("S")-HETE stimulated cells through the same cell surface receptors as those used by (LTB) viz., the leukotriene B4 receptors. However, further studies in neutrophils indicated that 5-("S")-HETE acts through a receptor distinct from that used by LTB as well as various other neutrophil stimuli. This 5("S")-HETE receptor is termed the oxoeicosanoid receptor 1 (abbreviated as (OXER1).
neg_context_en: 5-Hydroxyeicosatetraenoic acid (5-HETE, 5("S")-HETE, or 5"S"-HETE) is an eicosanoid, i.e. a metabolite of arachidonic acid. It is produced by diverse cell types in humans and other animal species. These cells may then metabolize the formed 5("S")-HETE to 5-oxo-eicosatetraenoic acid (5-oxo-ETE), 5("S"),15("S")-dihydroxyeicosatetraenoic acid (5("S"),15("S")-diHETE), or 5-oxo-15-hydroxyeicosatetraenoic acid (5-oxo-15("S")-HETE).

As indicated in their individual Wikipedia pages, 5-hydroxyeicosatetraenoic acid (which, like 5-oxo-eicosatetraenoic acid, acts through the OXER1 receptor), 5-oxo-eicosatetraenoic acid, 12-Hydroxyeicosatetraenoic acid, 15-Hydroxyeicosatetraenoic acid, and 20-Hydroxyeicosatetraenoic acid show numerous activities in animal and human cells as well as in animal models that are related to, for example, inflammation, allergic reactions, cancer cell growth, blood flow to tissues, and/or blood pressure. However, their function and relevancy to human physiology and pathology have not as yet been shown.

Among the 5("S")-HETE family members, 5("S")-HETE takes precedence over the other members of this family because it was the first to be discovered and has been studied far more thoroughly. However, 5-oxo-ETE is the most potent member of this family and therefore may be its critical member with respect to physiology and pathology. 5-OxoETE has gained attention in recent studies. 
5-Hydroxyeicosatetraenoic acid is more properly termed 5("S")-hydroxyicosatetraenoic acid or 5("S")-HETE) to signify the ("S") configuration of its 5-hydroxy residue as opposed to its 5("R")-hydroxyicosatetraenoic acid (i.e., 5("R")-HETE) stereoisomer. Since 5("R")-HETE was rarely considered in the early literature, 5("S")-HETE was frequently termed 5-HETE. This practice occasionally continues. 5("S")-HETE's IUPAC name, (5"S",6"E",8"Z",11"Z",14"Z")-5-hydroxyicosa-6,8,11,14-tetraenoic acid, defines 5("S")-HETE's structure unambiguously by notating not only its "S"-hydroxyl chirality but also the cis–trans isomerism geometry for each of its 4 double bonds; E signifies trans and Z signifies cis double bond geometry. The literature commonly uses an alternate but still unambiguous name for 5("S")-HETE viz., 5"(S)"-hydroxy-6"E",8"Z",11"Z",14"Z"-eicosatetraenoic acid.

15-Hydroxyeicosatetraenoic acid (also termed 15-HETE, 15("S")-HETE, and 15"S"-HETE) is an eicosanoid, i.e. a metabolite of arachidonic acid. Various cell types metabolize arachidonic acid to 15("S")-hydroperoxyeicosatetraenoic acid (15("S")-HpETE). This initial hydroperoxide product is extremely short-lived in cells: if not otherwise metabolized, it is rapidly reduced to 15"(S)"-HETE. Both of these metabolites, depending on the cell type which forms them, can be further metabolized to 15-oxo-eicosatetraenoic acid (15-oxo-ETE), 5"S",15"S"-dihydroxy-eicosatetraenoic acid (5("S"),15("S")-diHETE), 5-oxo-15("S")-hydroxyeicosatetraenoic acid (5-oxo-15("S")-HETE, a subset of specialized pro-resolving mediators viz., the lipoxins, a class of pro-inflammatory mediators, the eoxins, and other products that have less well-defined activities and functions. Thus, 15("S")-HETE and 15("S")-HpETE, in addition to having intrinsic biological activities, are key precursors to numerous biologically active derivatives.

5(S)-HETE is a product of the cellular metabolism of the n-6 polyunsaturated fatty acid, arachidonic acid (i.e. 5"Z",8"Z",11"Z",14"Z"-eicosatetraenoic acid), by ALOX5 (also termed arachidonate-5-lipoxygenase, 5-lipoxygenase, 5-LO, and 5-LOX). ALOX5 metabolizes arachidonic acid to its hydroperoxide derivative, arachidonic acid 5-hydroperoxide i.e. 5"S"-hydroperoxy-6"E",8"Z",11"Z",14"Z"-eicosatetraenoic acid (5("S")-HpETE). 5-("S")-HpETE may then be released and rapidly converted to 5("S")-HETE by ubiquitous cellular peroxidases:

5("S")-HETE may also be made in combination with 5("R")-HETE along with numerous other "(S,R)"-hydroxy polyunsaturated fatty acids as a consequence of the non-enzymatic oxidation reactions. Formation of these products can occur in any tissue subjected to oxidative stress.
Cells metabolize 5-("S")-HETE in other ways. They may use:

15-Lipoxygenase-1: Cells metabolize arachidonic acid with 15-lipoxygenase-1 (i.e., 15-LO-1, ALOX15) to form 15("S")-HpETE as a major product and 12("S")-hydroperoxy-5"Z",8"Z",10"E",15"Z"-eicosatetraenoic acid (12("S")-HpETE) and 14("S"),15("S")-"trans"-oxido-5"Z",8"Z",11"Z"-14,15-leukotriene A4 as minor products; 15("S")-HpETE and 12("S")-HpETE are rapidly converted to 15("S")-HETE and 12("S")-hydroxy-5"Z",8"Z",10"E",15"Z"-eicosatetraenoic acid (12("S")-hydroxyeicosatetraenoic acid), (i.e. 12("S")-HETE), respectively, or further metabolized through other enzyme pathways; 14("S"),15("S")-"trans"-oxido-5"Z",8"Z",11"Z"-14,15-leukotriene A is metabolized by 15-LO-1 to various isomers of 8,15("S")-dihydroxy-5"S",8"S","11Z",13"S"-eicosatetraenoic acids, e.g. 8,15(S)-LTB's.

CYP4F11 omega-hydroxylates leukotriene B4 (LTB4) to 20-hydroxy-LTB4, 5-Hydroxyicosatetraenoic acid (5-HETE) to 20-hydroxy-5-HETE (i.e. 5,20-diHETE), 12-hydroxyeicosatetraenoic acid (12-HETE) to 12,20-diHETE, lipoxins and possibly 5-oxo-eicosatetraenoic acid (5-oxo-ETE) to their 20-hydroxy metabolites; these reactions begin the inactivation of these pro- (LTB4, 5-HETE, 12-HETE, and 5-oxo-ETE) and anti- (lipoxins) cell signaling agents; however, it is relatively weak compared to, and therefore possibly not as physiologically relevant as, other CYP4Fs such as CYP4F2, CYP4F3a, CYP4F3b, CYP4A11 and CYP4F2 in doing so. The enzyme also hydroxylates arachidonic acid (i.e. eicosatetraenoic acid to 20-Hydroxyeicosatetraenoic acid) (20-HETE) although other cytochromes such as CYP4A11 and CYP4F2 appear more important in this metabolic conversion. 20-HETE is a short-lived potent signaling agent that functions to regulate blood flow, vascularization, blood pressure, and kidney tubule absorption of ions in rodents and possibly humans. Gene polymorphism variants of CYP4A11 are associated with the development of hypertension and cerebral infarction (i.e. ischemic stroke) in humans (see 20-Hydroxyeicosatetraenoic acid). In spite of its relative impotency and/or importance in accomplishing these omega-hydroxylations, CYP4F11 may contribute to them in certain tissues.
question_src: Nani aligundua asidi 5-hydroxyeicosatetraenoic?
pos_context_src: Laureate ya Nobel, Bengt I. Samuelsson, na wenzake walielezea kwanza 5 ("S")-mnamo 1976 kama metabolite ya asidi ya arachidonic iliyotengenezwa na neutrophils ya sungura. Shughuli ya kibaolojia iliunganishwa nayo miaka kadhaa baadaye wakati ilipatikana ili kuchochea kuongezeka kwa neutrophil ya binadamu katika kalsiamu ya cytosolic, chemotaxis, na kuongezeka kwa wambiso wa uso wa seli kama inavyoonyeshwa na mkusanyiko wao kwa kila mmoja. Kwa kuwa metabolite ya asidi ya arachidonic iliyogunduliwa hapo awali iliyotengenezwa na neutrophils, leukotriene B4 (LTB), pia huchochea kalsiamu ya neutrophil ya kibinadamu, chemotaxis, na auto-aggregation na inafanana na 5 ("s"-Hete kwa kuwa 5-("s"-hydros-ecy-ecy-ecy-ecy-eecy-eecy-ecy-ecy-eicy-eicy-eicy- 5-("S")-HETE zilizochochewa seli kupitia receptors za uso wa seli kama zile zinazotumiwa na (LTB)., Leukotriene B4 receptors. Walakini, tafiti zaidi katika neutrophils zilionyesha kuwa 5-("S")-hete hufanya kazi kwa njia ya receptor tofauti na ile inayotumiwa na LTB na vile vile vichocheo vingine vya neutrophil. Hii 5 ("S")-HETE receptor inaitwa receptor ya oxoeicosanoid 1 (iliyofupishwa kama (oxer1).
neg_context_src: 5-hydroxyeicosatetraenoic acid (5-HETE, 5 ("S")-hete, au 5 "S" -hete) ni eicosanoid, i.e metabolite ya asidi arachidonic. Inatolewa na aina tofauti za seli kwa wanadamu na spishi zingine za wanyama. Seli hizi zinaweza kutengenezea 5 ("S")-HETE hadi 5-oxo-eicosatetraenoic acid (5-oxo-ete), 5 ("S"), 15 ("S")-dihydroxyeicosatetraenoic asidi (5 ("s"), 15 ("s")-dihex-acio-5-hyoos. asidi (5-oxo-15 ("s")-hete).

Kama inavyoonyeshwa katika kurasa zao za wikipedia, asidi 5-hydroxyeicosatetraenoic (ambayo, kama 5-oxo-eicosatetraenoic acid, hufanya kupitia receptor ya oxer1), 5-oxo-eicosatetraenoic, 12-hydroxyeicosateenoenooic, 15-h 20-hydroxyeicosatetraenoic asidi inaonyesha shughuli nyingi katika seli za wanyama na binadamu na katika mifano ya wanyama ambayo inahusiana na, kwa mfano, uchochezi, athari za mzio, ukuaji wa seli ya saratani, mtiririko wa damu kwa tishu, na/au shinikizo la damu. Walakini, kazi yao na umuhimu kwa fiziolojia ya mwanadamu na ugonjwa wa ugonjwa bado haujaonyeshwa.

Kati ya 5 ("S")-wanafamilia wa HETE, 5 ("S")-HETE inachukua kipaumbele juu ya washiriki wengine wa familia hii kwa sababu ilikuwa ya kwanza kugunduliwa na imesomwa kabisa. Walakini, 5-Oxo-ETE ndiye mwanachama mwenye nguvu zaidi wa familia hii na kwa hivyo anaweza kuwa mwanachama wake muhimu kwa heshima na fiziolojia na ugonjwa wa ugonjwa. 5-Oxoete amepata umakini katika masomo ya hivi karibuni. 
5-hydroxyeicosatetraenoic acid inaitwa vizuri zaidi 5 ("s")-hydroxyicosatetraenoic acid au 5 ("s")-hete) kuashiria usanidi wa ("s") wa mabaki yake ya 5-hydroxy kama vile 5 ("r"-hydroxyic. 5 ("r")-hete) stereoisomer. Kwa kuwa 5 ("r")-hete hakuzingatiwa sana katika fasihi ya mapema, 5 ("s")-hete mara nyingi aliitwa 5-HETE. Zoezi hili mara kwa mara linaendelea. 5 ("S")-Jina la IUPAC la HETE, (5 "S", 6 "E", 8 "Z", 11 "Z", 14 "Z")-5-hydroxyicosa-6,8,11,14-tetraenoic acid, anafafanua 5 ("s")-muundo wa hete haukufahamu "si tu" Jiometri ya isomerism kwa kila moja ya vifungo 4 mara mbili; E inaashiria trans na z inaashiria jiometri ya dhamana ya CIS mara mbili. Fasihi kawaida hutumia jina mbadala lakini bado lisilo ngumu kwa 5 ("S")-hete viz., 5 "(s)"-hydroxy-6 "E", 8 "Z", 11 "Z", 14 "Z" -eicosatetraenoic acid.

15-hydroxyeicosatetraenoic acid (pia inaitwa 15-HETE, 15 ("S")-hete, na 15 "S" -hete) ni eicosanoid, i.e metabolite ya asidi ya arachidonic. Aina anuwai za seli hutengeneza asidi ya arachidonic hadi 15 ("S")-asidi ya hydroperoxyeicosatetraenoic (15 ("s")-hpete). Bidhaa hii ya awali ya hydroperoxide ni ya muda mfupi sana katika seli: ikiwa sio vinginevyo imechanganywa, hupunguzwa haraka hadi 15 "(s)"-hete. Wote wa metabolites hizi, kulingana na aina ya seli ambayo huunda, inaweza kutekelezwa zaidi hadi 15-oxo-eicosatetraenoic acid (15-oxo-ete), 5 "s", 15 "s" -dihydroxy-eicosatetraenoic acid (5 ("s"), 15 ("s"),-dihete), dihete), dihete), dihete), dihete), dihete), dihete), dihete), dihete), dihete), dihete), dihete), dihete), diHete), dehete), 5-oxo-15 ("S")-Hydroxyeicosatetraenoic acid (5-oxo-15 ("S")-HETE, sehemu ndogo ya wapatanishi maalum wa kutatua. 15 ("S")-HPETE, pamoja na kuwa na shughuli za ndani za kibaolojia, ni watangulizi muhimu kwa derivatives nyingi za biolojia.

5 (S) -Hete ni bidhaa ya kimetaboliki ya seli ya asidi ya mafuta ya N-6 polyunsaturated, asidi arachidonic (i.e. 5 "Z", 8 "Z", 11 "Z", 14 "Z" -eicosatetraenoic acid), na Alox5 (pia aliitwa arachidididi-lipogygen, 5, na 5, na 5-liposatetraenoic acid), by alox5 (pia inaitwa arachidididi-lipogygen-lipogygen-lipogygen-lipogygen, 5-lipoxygen-lipogygen-lipogygen-lipogygen-lipogygen-lipogygen-lipogygen-lipogygen-lipogygen-lipogygen-lipogygen-lipoxy-lipogygen-lipogygen-lixy, Alox5 inachanganya asidi ya arachidonic kwa derivative yake ya hydroperoxide, arachidonic 5-hydroperoxide i.e. 5 "S" -hydroperoxy-6 "E", 8 "Z", 11 "Z", 14 "Z" -eicosatetraenoic acid (5 ("s")-hpete). 5-("S")-HPETE inaweza kutolewa na kubadilishwa haraka kuwa 5 ("S")-HETE na peroxidases za seli za kawaida:

5 ("S")-hete inaweza pia kufanywa pamoja na 5 ("r")-hete pamoja na zingine nyingi "(s, r)"-asidi ya mafuta ya hydroxy polyunsaturated kama matokeo ya athari ya oxidation isiyo ya enzymatic. Uundaji wa bidhaa hizi unaweza kutokea kwa tishu yoyote iliyowekwa chini ya mafadhaiko ya oksidi.
Seli hutengeneza 5-("s")-hete kwa njia zingine. Wanaweza kutumia:

15-lipo oxygenase-1: seli hutengeneza asidi arachidonic na 15-lipo oxygenase-1 (i.e., 15-LO-1, ALOX15) kuunda 15 ("S")-hpete kama bidhaa kuu na 12 ("s")-hydroperoxy-5 "z", 8 "z", 10 "e", 15 "-". " 14 ("S"), 15 ("S")-"trans" -oxido-5 "Z", 8 "Z", 11 "Z" -14,15-Leukotriene A4 kama bidhaa ndogo; 15 ("S")-Hpete na 12 ("S")-Hpete hubadilishwa haraka kuwa 15 ("S")-HETE na 12 ("S")-Hydroxy-5 "Z", 8 "Z", 10 "E", 15 "Z" -eicosatetraenoic acid (12 ("S")-hydroxyicosatetranoic acid (12 ("s")-hydroxyicosatetranoic acid (12 ("s")-hydroxyicosatetraenoic acid (12 ("s")-hydroxyicosatetranoic acid (12 ("s")-hydroxyicosatetranoic acid (12 ("s")-hydroxyetatetranoic acid (12 ("s")-hydroxyetatetranoic acid (12 (" 12 ("S")-hete), mtawaliwa, au zaidi ya metaboli kupitia njia zingine za enzyme; 14 ("S"), 15 ("S")-"Trans" -oxido-5 "Z", 8 "Z", 11 "Z" -14,15-leukotriene a imechanganywa na 15-lo-1 kwa isomers anuwai ya 8,15 ("S")-dihydroxy-5 "S", 8 "," "" "11", "11", "11", "11", "11", "11", "" 11 "," 11 "," 11 "," 11 "," 11 "," 11 "," 11 "," 11 "" n.k. 8,15 (s) -ltb's.

CYP4F11 Omega-hydroxylates leukotriene B4 (LTB4) hadi 20-hydroxy-ltb4, 5-hydroxyicosatetraenoic acid (5-hete) hadi 20-hydroxy-5-hete (i.e. 5,20-dihete), 12-hydroxy 12,20-dihete, lipoxins na uwezekano wa 5-oxo-eicosatetraenoic acid (5-oxo-ETE) kwa metabolites zao 20-hydroxy; Athari hizi huanza uvumbuzi wa hizi pro- (LTB4, 5-HETE, 12-HETE, na 5-oxo-ETE) na anti- (lipoxins) kuashiria mawakala wa seli; Walakini, ni dhaifu ikilinganishwa na, na kwa hivyo labda sio sawa na kisaikolojia kama, CYP4Fs zingine kama CYP4F2, CYP4F3A, CYP4F3B, CYP4A11 na CYP4F2 katika kufanya hivyo. Enzyme pia hydroxylates arachidonic acid (i.e. eicosatetraenoic acid hadi 20-hydroxyeicosatetraenoic) (20-HETE) ingawa cytochromes zingine kama CYP4A11 na CYP4F2 zinaonekana muhimu zaidi katika ubadilishaji huu wa metabolic. 20-HETE ni wakala wa muda mfupi wa kuashiria anayefanya kazi kudhibiti mtiririko wa damu, mishipa, shinikizo la damu, na kunyonya kwa tubule ya figo ya ions kwenye panya na labda wanadamu. Lahaja za polymorphism ya Gene ya CYP4A11 inahusishwa na maendeleo ya shinikizo la damu na infarction ya ubongo (i.e. ischemic kiharusi) kwa wanadamu (ona 20-hydroxyeicosatetraenoic acid). Licha ya kutokuwa na nguvu ya jamaa na/au umuhimu katika kukamilisha omega-hydroxylations, CYP4F11 inaweza kuwachangia katika tishu fulani.
