question_en: What is the most watched news network?
pos_context_en: In prime time and total day ratings for the week of April 15 to 21, 2013, Fox News, propelled by its coverage of the Boston Marathon bombing, was the highest-ranked network on U.S. cable television, for the first time since August 2005, when Hurricane Katrina hit the Gulf Coast of the United States. January 2014 marked Fox News's 145th consecutive month as the number one rated cable news channel. During that month, Fox News beat CNN and MSNBC combined in overall viewers in both prime time hours and the total day. In the third quarter of 2014, the network was the most-watched cable channel during prime time hours. During the final week of the campaign for the United States elections, 2014, Fox News had the highest ratings of any cable channel, news or otherwise. On election night itself, Fox News' coverage had higher ratings than that of any of the other five cable or network news sources among viewers between 25 and 54 years of age. The network hosted the first prime-time GOP candidates' forum of the 2016 campaign on August 6. The debate reached a record-breaking 24 million viewers, by far the largest audience ever for any cable news event.
neg_context_en: "7th Heaven" was the most watched TV series ever on the WB. It holds the record for the WB's most watched hour at 12.5 million viewers, on February 8, 1999; 19 of the WB's 20 most watched hours were from "7th Heaven". On May 8, 2006, it was watched by 7.56 million viewers, the highest rating for the WB since January 2005. When the show moved to the CW, ratings dropped. Possible reasons for the decline include an aired "Countdown to Goodbye" ad campaign for the last six months of the 2005–06 season, which promoted it as the final season ever; though the CW announced the series' unexpected renewal, it didn't promote the new season strongly via billboards, bus stops, magazine or on-air promos. Lastly, the network moved "7th Heaven" from its long-established Monday night slot to Sunday nights, causing ratings to drop further. The series had a season average of just 3.3 million on the new network, losing 36% of the previous year's audience. It was the third most watched scripted show on the CW. Overall, it was the seventh most watched show.CBS Television Distribution handles the domestic and international distribution of the series. Season one episodes were retitled 7th Heaven Beginnings. Although the series did not receive a rating other than TV-G throughout its 11-season run, reruns on some cable/satellite channels have been given either a TV-PG or TV-14 rating (depending on the subject matter).

RTS has the most watched news and current affairs programmes in the country, according to the AGB Nilsen Serbian ratings.
The centerpiece of RTS news programming is the "Dnevnik" (English: Journal), which is the network’s main news programme and is aired on RTS1. The "Dnevnik" bulletins are aired at 8:00 (runs for approximately 25 minutes), 12:00 during workweek and 13:00 Saturdays and Sundays (around 15 minutes, excluding Sports Review and Weather forecast), 19:30 (between 35 and 40 minutes) and at 23:00 (approximately 20 minutes). The flagship (evening) "Dnevnik" has been the most watched news programme in Serbia since 2003, averaging between 1.5–2 million viewers nightly.

CBS became the most watched American broadcast television network once again in the 2005–06 season, an achievement that the network proclaimed in on-air promotions as being "America's Most Watched Network" (a term it would use again in the 2011–12 season). This lasted until the 2007–08 season, when Fox overtook CBS for first, becoming the first non-Big Three network to earn the title as the most watched network overall in the United States; despite CBS's continued strong lineup, Fox's first-place finish that season was primarily due to its reliance on "American Idol" (the longest reigning #1 prime time U.S. television program from 2004 to 2011) and the effects of the 2007–08 Writers Guild of America strike. CBS retook its place as the top-rated network in the 2008–09 season, where it has remained every season since. Fox and CBS, both having ranked as the highest rated of the major broadcast networks during the 2000s, tend to nearly equal one another in the 18–34, 18–49 and 25–54 demographics, with either network alternating in placing first in either of these groups by very close margins. "NCIS", which has been the flagship of CBS's Tuesday lineup for much of its run, became the network's highest-rated drama by the 2007–08 season.

NBC Nightly News (titled as NBC Nightly News with Lester Holt for its weeknight broadcasts since June 22, 2015) is the flagship daily evening television news program for NBC News, the news division of the NBC television network in the United States. First aired on August 3, 1970, the program is currently the most watched network newscast in the United States, with an average of 9.3 million viewers, just a few thousand more than its nearest rival, ABC's "World News Tonight". "NBC Nightly News" is produced from Studio 3C at NBC Studios at 30 Rockefeller Center in New York City and select editions broadcast from The Brokaw News Center in Universal City, California.

"World News Tonight" was the most watched network evening newscast for the week of March 30, 2015. This marked the first time in seven years that the program finished at #1, beating out "NBC Nightly News" in all categories.

TV Patrol North Mindanao is the local news network broadcast of the ABS-CBN Regional Network Group in Cagayan de Oro City. It has been the most watched news program in Cagayan de Oro City and Misamis Oriental. The newscast is a tabloid-style format (inspired from United States local television newscasts) and the program delivers news headlines about current events in Northern Mindanao (Region X), parts of Zamboanga Peninsula (Region IX) and, since 2018, Caraga Region (Region XIII)

NBC's live telecast of Super Bowl XLIX in 2015 currently holds the record for the largest average viewership of any live single-network U.S. television broadcast, with 114.4 million viewers. During this broadcast, the halftime show featuring Katy Perry was watched by 118.5 million viewers. The previous live telecast Super Bowl XLV in February 2011 helped Fox become the first ever television network in the United States to be watched by at least 100 million American viewers by average for a single primetime night of programming. Moreover, Super Bowl telecasts account for 23 of the most-watched television broadcasts based on overall viewership in U.S. television history. Fox's live telecast of Super Bowl LI in 2017 currently holds the largest total viewership in U.S. television history, peaking at 172 million viewers in Super Bowl's first ever overtime play.

He began working for Soviet Central Television in 1957, after he worked for two years at the Taganka Theatre. For 30 years he co-anchored the network's prime time news program "Vremya". The program, which still has reach all over Russia on various networks and internationally, is one of the most watched news programs in the world. Throughout his tenure, Kirillov, often alongside his colleague Nonna Bedrova, was the news frontman of the Soviet Union's state-owned network for all of the nation's pivotal events since the 1950s, covering the annual celebrations of state occasions, the death and funeral of Leonid Brezhnev and his successors Yuri Andropov and Konstantin Chernenko, and the Soviet government's decision to invade Afghanistan in 1979, as well as the Moscow Olympics the following year. Kirillov also accompanied dignitaries, notably Soviet leaders, on their official visits to foreign countries to do reporting on location.

At the same time, citing its dominance in the Spanish-language television market, having consistently beaten Telemundo and other smaller Spanish language networks in the ratings, the network decided to refocus its efforts on attracting Hispanic and Latinos viewers who preferred watching programs on English language broadcast and cable networks to grow its viewership further. The strategy helped Univision to nearly double its ratings during prime time by 1998, ranking as the fifth most-watched American broadcast network by the 1998–99 season (beating fledgling English-language networks UPN and The WB), as it steadily began to attract bilingual viewers away from the English-language networks. In September 1998, the network added two new shows to shore up its struggling afternoon lineup leading into the highly rated "Cristina". While one of the programs – the game show "El Bla-Blazo" – lasted only a few years, it experienced more long-term success with the newsmagazine that followed it, "El Gordo y La Flaca" ("The Scoop and the Skinny", although alternately translated as "The Fat Man and the Skinny Girl"), a Miami-based entertainment news program hosted by Raul De Molina and Lili Estefan, who had become popular with viewers for their entertainment reports on the network's news programs.
question_src: Je! Ni mtandao gani wa habari unaotazamwa zaidi?
pos_context_src: Katika viwango vya juu na jumla ya siku kwa wiki ya Aprili 15 hadi 21, 2013, Fox News, iliyosisitizwa na chanjo yake ya bomu ya Boston Marathon, ilikuwa mtandao wa nafasi ya juu kwenye runinga ya Cable ya Merika, kwa mara ya kwanza tangu Agosti 2005, wakati Kimbunga Katrina kiligonga pwani ya Merika. Januari 2014 iliweka alama ya mwezi wa 145 mfululizo wa Fox News kama idhaa ya habari ya kwanza ya Cable. Wakati wa mwezi huo, Fox News ilipiga CNN na MSNBC pamoja katika watazamaji wa jumla katika masaa yote ya wakati na jumla ya siku. Katika robo ya tatu ya 2014, mtandao ulikuwa kituo cha cable kilichotazamwa zaidi wakati wa masaa ya wakati mkuu. Wakati wa wiki ya mwisho ya kampeni ya uchaguzi wa Merika, 2014, Fox News ilikuwa na viwango vya juu zaidi vya kituo chochote cha habari, habari au vinginevyo. Usiku wa uchaguzi yenyewe, chanjo ya Fox News ilikuwa na viwango vya juu kuliko ile ya vifaa vingine vitano au vyanzo vya habari vya mtandao kati ya watazamaji kati ya miaka 25 na 54. Mtandao ulishiriki mkutano wa kwanza wa wagombea wa GOP wa wakati wa kampeni ya 2016 mnamo Agosti 6. Mjadala huo ulifikia watazamaji wa rekodi milioni 24, kwa watazamaji wakubwa kabisa kwa hafla yoyote ya habari ya cable.
neg_context_title_src: Habari za Ulimwenguni za ABC usiku wa leo
Orodha ya matangazo ya televisheni yaliyotazamwa zaidi
neg_context_src: "Mbingu ya 7" ilikuwa safu ya TV iliyotazamwa zaidi kwenye WB. Inashikilia rekodi ya saa inayotazamwa zaidi ya WB kwa watazamaji milioni 12.5, mnamo Februari 8, 1999; Masaa 19 ya WB yaliyotazamwa zaidi ya WB yalikuwa kutoka "Mbingu ya 7". Mnamo Mei 8, 2006, ilitazamwa na watazamaji milioni 7.56, kiwango cha juu zaidi kwa WB tangu Januari 2005. Wakati onyesho lilipohamia CW, makadirio yalipungua. Sababu zinazowezekana za kupungua ni pamoja na kampeni ya matangazo ya "kuhesabu kwaheri" kwa miezi sita iliyopita ya msimu wa 2005-06, ambayo ilikuza kama msimu wa mwisho; Ingawa CW ilitangaza safu ya upya isiyotarajiwa, haikukuza msimu mpya kupitia mabango, vituo vya mabasi, gazeti au matangazo ya hewani. Mwishowe, mtandao ulihamia "Mbingu ya 7" kutoka kwa muda mrefu uliowekwa Jumatatu usiku hadi Jumapili usiku, na kusababisha makadirio kushuka zaidi. Mfululizo huo ulikuwa na wastani wa msimu wa milioni 3.3 kwenye mtandao mpya, kupoteza asilimia 36 ya watazamaji wa mwaka uliopita. Ilikuwa onyesho la tatu lililotazamwa zaidi kwenye CW. Kwa jumla, ilikuwa Show ya saba iliyoangaliwa zaidi.CBS Televisheni inashughulikia usambazaji wa ndani na wa kimataifa wa safu hiyo. Vipindi vya msimu mmoja vilibadilishwa mwanzo wa 7 wa Mbingu. Ingawa mfululizo huo haukupokea rating nyingine isipokuwa TV-G wakati wa msimu wake wa 11, reruns kwenye njia zingine za cable/satelaiti zimepewa rating ya TV-PG au TV-14 (kulingana na jambo linalohusika).

RTS ina habari zinazotazamwa zaidi na mambo ya sasa nchini, kulingana na viwango vya AGB Nilsen Serbia.
Kitovu cha programu ya habari ya RTS ni "DNevnik" (Kiingereza: Jarida), ambayo ni mpango kuu wa habari wa mtandao na inarushwa kwenye RTS1. Bulletins za "Dnevnik" zinarushwa saa 8:00 (zinaendesha kwa takriban dakika 25), 12:00 wakati wa kazi na 13:00 Jumamosi na Jumapili (karibu dakika 15, ukiondoa ukaguzi wa michezo na utabiri wa hali ya hewa), 19:30 (kati ya dakika 35 na 40) na saa 23:00 (takriban dakika 20). Bendera ya (jioni) "Dnevnik" imekuwa programu inayotazamwa zaidi huko Serbia tangu 2003, wastani wa watazamaji milioni 1.5-2 usiku.

CBS ikawa mtandao wa runinga wa Amerika uliotazamwa tena katika msimu wa 2005-06, mafanikio ambayo mtandao ulitangaza katika matangazo ya hewani kama "mtandao unaotazamwa zaidi wa Amerika" (neno ambalo lingetumia tena katika msimu wa 2011 hadi 12). Hii ilidumu hadi msimu wa 2007-08, wakati Fox ilichukua CBS kwa mara ya kwanza, ikawa mtandao wa kwanza usio wa Big kupata taji kama mtandao uliotazamwa zaidi nchini Merika; Licha ya CBS kuendelea kwa nguvu, kumaliza kwa nafasi ya kwanza ya Fox msimu huo ilikuwa kwa sababu ya kutegemea "American Idol" (kipindi kirefu zaidi cha #1 cha Televisheni cha U.S. kutoka 2004 hadi 2011) na athari za mgomo wa Waandishi wa 2007-08 wa Amerika. CBS ilichukua nafasi yake kama mtandao uliokadiriwa zaidi katika msimu wa 2008-09, ambapo imebaki kila msimu tangu. Fox na CBS, zote zilikuwa zimeorodheshwa kama kiwango cha juu zaidi cha mitandao kuu ya matangazo wakati wa miaka ya 2000, huwa sawa sawa katika 18- 34, 18-49 na 25-54, na mtandao wowote ukibadilishana katika kuweka kwanza katika vikundi hivi kwa pembezoni sana. "NCIS", ambayo imekuwa mfano wa mpango wa Jumanne wa CBS kwa muda mwingi wa kukimbia, ikawa mchezo wa kuigiza uliokadiriwa zaidi na msimu wa 2007-08.

Habari za Usiku wa NBC (zilizopewa jina la NBC Nightly News na Lester Holt kwa matangazo yake ya wiki moja tangu Juni 22, 2015) ni mpango wa habari wa kila siku wa Televisheni ya NBC, Idara ya Habari ya Mtandao wa Televisheni ya NBC huko Merika. Ilirushwa kwanza mnamo Agosti 3, 1970, mpango huo kwa sasa ndio habari inayotazamwa zaidi huko Merika, na wastani wa watazamaji milioni 9.3, elfu chache zaidi ya mpinzani wake wa karibu, "Habari za Dunia za ABC". "Habari za Usiku wa NBC" hutolewa kutoka Studio 3C katika Studios za NBC katika Kituo cha Rockefeller 30 huko New York City na uchague matoleo ya matangazo kutoka Kituo cha Habari cha Brokaw huko Universal City, California.

"Habari za Ulimwenguni Usiku" ilikuwa habari ya kutazama zaidi ya Mtandao wa Jioni kwa wiki ya Machi 30, 2015. Hii ilikuwa mara ya kwanza katika miaka saba kwamba mpango huo ulimaliza saa #1, ukipiga "Habari za Usiku wa NBC" katika vikundi vyote.

TV Patrol North Mindanao ndio matangazo ya mtandao wa habari wa Kikundi cha Mtandao wa Mkoa wa ABS-CBN huko Cagayan de Oro City. Imekuwa programu inayotazamwa zaidi katika Cagayan de Oro City na Misamis Mashariki. Utangazaji ni muundo wa mtindo wa tabloid (ulioongozwa na habari za runinga za Amerika) na mpango huo unatoa vichwa vya habari kuhusu matukio ya sasa huko Kaskazini mwa Mindanao (Mkoa X), sehemu za Zamboanga peninsula (Mkoa IX) na, tangu 2018, Mkoa wa Caraga (Mkoa wa XIII)

Televisheni ya moja kwa moja ya NBC ya Super Bowl Xlix mnamo 2015 kwa sasa inashikilia rekodi ya utangazaji mkubwa wa wastani wa matangazo yoyote ya moja kwa moja ya mtandao wa Merika, na watazamaji milioni 114.4. Wakati wa matangazo haya, kipindi cha nusu saa kilicho na Katy Perry kiliangaliwa na watazamaji milioni 118.5. Televisheni ya moja kwa moja ya Super Bowl XLV mnamo Februari 2011 ilisaidia Fox kuwa mtandao wa kwanza wa runinga nchini Merika kutazamwa na watazamaji angalau milioni 100 wa Amerika kwa wastani kwa usiku mmoja wa programu. Kwa kuongezea, Super Bowl Telecasts inachukua alama 23 za matangazo yaliyotazamwa zaidi kwa msingi wa utazamaji wa jumla katika historia ya runinga ya U.S. Televisheni ya moja kwa moja ya Fox ya Super Bowl Li mnamo 2017 kwa sasa inashikilia utazamaji mkubwa zaidi katika historia ya runinga ya U.S., ikipata watazamaji milioni 172 katika mchezo wa kwanza wa Super Bowl.

Alianza kufanya kazi kwa Televisheni kuu ya Soviet mnamo 1957, baada ya kufanya kazi kwa miaka miwili kwenye ukumbi wa michezo wa Taganka. Kwa miaka 30 aliunga mkono mpango wa habari wa wakati wa mtandao "Vremya". Programu hiyo, ambayo bado imefikia Urusi kote kwenye mitandao mbali mbali na kimataifa, ni moja wapo ya programu zinazotazamwa zaidi ulimwenguni. Throughout his tenure, Kirillov, often alongside his colleague Nonna Bedrova, was the news frontman of the Soviet Union's state-owned network for all of the nation's pivotal events since the 1950s, covering the annual celebrations of state occasions, the death and funeral of Leonid Brezhnev and his successors Yuri Andropov and Konstantin Chernenko, and the Soviet government's decision to invade Afghanistan mnamo 1979, na vile vile Olimpiki ya Moscow mwaka uliofuata. Kirillov pia aliandamana na watukufu, haswa viongozi wa Soviet, kwenye ziara zao rasmi kwa nchi za nje kufanya ripoti juu ya eneo.

Wakati huo huo, ikitoa mfano wa kutawala kwake katika soko la televisheni la lugha ya Kihispania, ikiwa na Beaten Telemundo mara kwa mara na mitandao mingine ndogo ya lugha ya Uhispania kwenye makadirio, mtandao uliamua kutafakari tena juhudi zake za kuvutia watazamaji wake wa Rico na Latinos ambao walipendelea programu za kutazama kwenye utangazaji wa lugha ya Kiingereza na mitandao ya cable ili kukuza utazamaji wake zaidi. Mkakati huo ulisaidia Univision karibu mara mbili makadirio yake wakati wa kwanza ifikapo 1998, uliowekwa kama mtandao wa tano uliotazamwa zaidi wa Amerika na msimu wa 1998-99 (ukipiga mitandao mpya ya lugha ya Kiingereza UPN na WB), kwani ilianza kuvutia watazamaji wa lugha mbili mbali na mitandao ya lugha ya Kiingereza. Mnamo Septemba 1998, mtandao uliongezea vipindi viwili vipya ili kuongeza safu yake ya mchana ya mapambano inayoongoza kwenye "Cristina" iliyokadiriwa sana. Wakati moja ya programu-mchezo unaonyesha "El Bla-Blazo"-ilidumu miaka michache tu, ilipata mafanikio ya muda mrefu zaidi na Newsmagazine ambayo ilifuata, "El Gordo y la Flaca" ("Scoop na Skinny", ingawa ilitafsiriwa kama "The Fat Man and the Skin Girl"), Miami iliyokuwa ikifanya kazi ya Miami, Tamil ilifanya kazi ya burudani ya Miami. Maarufu na watazamaji kwa ripoti zao za burudani kwenye programu za habari za mtandao.
report_src: Mtandao wa habari unaotazamwa zaidi ni Fox News, ambao tangu Agosti 2005 umekuwa ukiongoza viwango mara kwa mara, na kufikia Januari 2014 ulikuwa umeweka rekodi ya miezi 145 mfululizo kama idhaa nambari moja ya habari kwenye runinga ya kebo nchini Marekani [1]. Katika kipindi cha Aprili 15–21, 2013, ukishadidiwa na chanjo ya shambulio la Boston Marathon, Fox News kiliongoza runinga yote ya kebo, si taarifa pekee, na baadaye katika robo ya tatu ya 2014 kilikuwa kituo cha kebo kinachotazamwa zaidi nyakati za “prime time” [1]. Zaidi ya hayo, katika wiki ya mwisho ya kampeni za uchaguzi wa Marekani 2014 na usiku wa uchaguzi, Fox News kiliwapita washindani wake wote katika kundi muhimu la watazamaji wenye umri wa miaka 25–54, hata kikizidi jumla ya CNN na MSNBC pamoja katika vipindi vingi [1]. Hata mdahalo wa kwanza wa wagombea wa GOP 2016 uliopeperushwa na Fox News ulivutia watazamaji milioni 24, idadi kubwa zaidi kuwahi kurekodiwa kwa tukio lolote la habari la kebo, ikithibitisha tena umaarufu wa mtandao huo [1].

question_en: What is the second lightest element in the periodic table?
pos_context_en: "Chlorine" (symbol Cl) is the second lightest halogen, found in the periodic table in group 17. The element forms diatomic molecules under standard conditions, called dichlorine. It has the highest electron affinity and the third highest electronegativity of all the elements; for this reason, chlorine is a strong oxidizing agent.
neg_context_en: Chlorine is a chemical element with symbol Cl and atomic number 17. The second-lightest of the halogens, it appears between fluorine and bromine in the periodic table and its properties are mostly intermediate between them. Chlorine is a yellow-green gas at room temperature. It is an extremely reactive element and a strong oxidising agent: among the elements, it has the highest electron affinity and the third-highest electronegativity, behind only oxygen and fluorine.

Hydrogen is found in the first group and first period in the periodic table, i.e. it is the first element on the periodic table, making it the lightest element. Since hydrogen gas is so light, it rises in the atmosphere and is therefore rarely found in its pure form, H. In a flame of pure hydrogen gas, burning in air, the hydrogen (H) reacts with oxygen (O) to form water (HO) and releases energy.

Technetium, with atomic number (denoted "Z") 43, is the lowest-numbered element in the periodic table of which all isotopes are radioactive. The second-lightest exclusively radioactive element, promethium, has an atomic number of 61. Atomic nuclei with an odd number of protons are less stable than those with even numbers, even when the total number of nucleons (protons + neutrons) is even, and odd numbered elements have fewer stable isotopes.

Period 5 has the same number of elements as period 4 and follows the same general structure but with one more post transition metal and one fewer nonmetal. Of the three heaviest elements with biological roles, two (molybdenum and iodine) are in this period; tungsten, in period 6, is heavier, along with several of the early lanthanides. Period 5 also includes technetium, the lightest exclusively radioactive element.

Within each group of nonmetals, reactivity decreases with each lower rows of the table (from a light element to a heavy element) in the periodic table, because the valence electrons are at progressively higher energies and thus progressively less tightly bound. In fact, oxygen (the lightest element in group 16) is the most reactive nonmetal after fluorine, even though it is not a halogen, because the valence shell of a halogen is at a higher principal quantum number.

Ununennium, also known as eka-francium or simply element 119, is the hypothetical chemical element with symbol Uue and atomic number 119. "Ununennium" and "Uue" are the temporary systematic IUPAC name and symbol respectively, until a permanent name is decided upon. In the periodic table of the elements, it is expected to be an s-block element, an alkali metal, and the first element in the eighth period. It is the lightest element that has not yet been synthesized.

Lithium (Li) is an alkali metal with atomic number 3, occurring naturally in two isotopes: Li and Li. The two make up all natural occurrence of lithium on Earth, although further isotopes have been synthesized. In ionic compounds, lithium loses an electron to become positively charged, forming the cation Li. Lithium is the first alkali metal in the periodic table, and the first metal of any kind in the periodic table. At standard temperature and pressure, lithium is a soft, silver-white, highly reactive metal. With a density of 0.564 g·cm, lithium is the lightest metal and the least dense solid element.

Dmitri Mendeleev published a periodic table of the chemical elements in 1869 based on properties that appeared with some regularity as he laid out the elements from lightest to heaviest. When Mendeleev proposed his periodic table, he noted gaps in the table and predicted that as-then-unknown elements existed with properties appropriate to fill those gaps. He named them eka-boron, eka-aluminium and eka-silicon with atomic masses 44, 68 and 72 respectively.

The lightest of the Group 0 gases, the first in the periodic table, was assigned a theoretical atomic mass between 5.3×10 and 9.6×10. The kinetic velocity of this gas was calculated by Mendeleev to be 2,500,000 meters per second. Nearly massless, these gases were assumed by Mendeleev to permeate all matter, rarely interacting chemically. The high mobility and very small mass of the trans-hydrogen gases would result in the situation that they could be rarefied, yet appear to be very dense.
question_src: Je! Ni kitu gani cha pili nyepesi kwenye meza ya upimaji?
pos_context_src: "Chlorine" (alama Cl) ni halogen ya pili nyepesi zaidi, inayopatikana katika meza ya upimaji katika kundi 17. Sehemu hutengeneza molekuli za diatomic chini ya hali ya kawaida, inayoitwa dichlorine. Inayo ushirika wa juu zaidi wa elektroni na umeme wa tatu wa juu wa vitu vyote; Kwa sababu hii, klorini ni wakala hodari wa oxidizing.
neg_context_src: Chlorine ni kitu cha kemikali na alama ya CL na nambari ya atomiki 17. Nguvu ya pili ya halojeni, inaonekana kati ya fluorine na bromine kwenye meza ya upimaji na mali zake ni za kati kati yao. Chlorine ni gesi ya manjano-kijani kwenye joto la kawaida. Ni kitu tendaji sana na wakala hodari wa oksidi: kati ya vitu, ina ushirika wa juu zaidi wa elektroni na umeme wa tatu wa juu, nyuma ya oksijeni na fluorine tu.

Hydrogen hupatikana katika kikundi cha kwanza na kipindi cha kwanza kwenye meza ya upimaji, i.e. ndio kitu cha kwanza kwenye meza ya upimaji, na kuifanya kuwa nyepesi zaidi. Kwa kuwa gesi ya haidrojeni ni nyepesi, huinuka angani na kwa hivyo haipatikani katika hali yake safi, H. Katika moto wa gesi safi ya haidrojeni, inawaka hewani, hidrojeni (H) humenyuka na oksijeni (O) kuunda maji (HO) na kutoa nishati.

Technetium, iliyo na nambari ya atomiki (iliyoonyeshwa "Z") 43, ndio kitu cha chini kabisa katika jedwali la upimaji ambalo isotopu zote ni za mionzi. Kiwango cha pili cha taa-ya pili, Promethium, ina idadi ya atomiki ya 61. Kiini cha atomiki kilicho na idadi isiyo ya kawaida ya protoni hazina msimamo kuliko zile zilizo na idadi, hata wakati idadi ya jumla ya viini (protoni + neutrons) ni hata, na vitu visivyo vya kawaida vina isotopes chache.

Kipindi cha 5 kina idadi sawa ya vitu kama kipindi cha 4 na inafuata muundo huo wa jumla lakini kwa chuma kimoja cha mpito na moja isiyo ya kawaida. Kati ya vitu vitatu vizito zaidi na majukumu ya kibaolojia, mbili (molybdenum na iodini) ziko katika kipindi hiki; Tungsten, katika kipindi cha 6, ni nzito, pamoja na lanthanides kadhaa za mapema. Kipindi cha 5 pia ni pamoja na technetium, nyepesi zaidi ya mionzi.

Ndani ya kila kundi la wasio wa kawaida, reac shughuli hupungua kwa kila safu ya chini ya meza (kutoka kwa nyepesi hadi kitu kizito) kwenye meza ya upimaji, kwa sababu elektroni za valence ziko kwenye nguvu za juu zaidi na kwa hivyo hatua kwa hatua zimefungwa sana. Kwa kweli, oksijeni (nyepesi zaidi katika kundi 16) ni tendaji zaidi ya tendaji baada ya fluorine, ingawa sio halogen, kwa sababu ganda la halogen liko kwa idadi kubwa ya kiwango cha juu.

Ununennium, pia inajulikana kama Eka-Francium au kipengee cha 119, ni sehemu ya kemikali ya nadharia na alama ya UUE na nambari ya atomiki 119. "Ununennium" na "UUE" ndio jina la muda mfupi la IUPAC na alama mtawaliwa, hadi jina la kudumu litaamuliwa. Katika jedwali la mara kwa mara la vitu, inatarajiwa kuwa kitu cha S-block, chuma cha alkali, na kitu cha kwanza katika kipindi cha nane. Ni kitu nyepesi zaidi ambacho hakijatengenezwa.

Lithium (Li) ni chuma cha alkali na nambari ya atomiki 3, inayotokea kwa asili katika isotopu mbili: Li na Li. Wawili hufanya tukio la asili la lithiamu duniani, ingawa isotopu zaidi zimetengenezwa. Katika misombo ya ionic, lithiamu hupoteza elektroni ili kushtakiwa vyema, na kutengeneza cation li. Lithium ni chuma cha kwanza cha alkali kwenye meza ya upimaji, na chuma cha kwanza cha aina yoyote kwenye meza ya upimaji. Katika joto la kawaida na shinikizo, lithiamu ni laini, nyeupe-nyeupe, chuma tendaji sana. Na wiani wa 0.564 g · cm, lithiamu ni chuma nyepesi na kitu kidogo mnene.

Dmitri Mendeleev alichapisha meza ya mara kwa mara ya vitu vya kemikali mnamo 1869 kulingana na mali ambayo ilionekana na hali ya kawaida wakati alipoweka mambo kutoka kwa nyepesi hadi nzito. Wakati Mendeleev alipendekeza meza yake ya mara kwa mara, alibaini mapungufu kwenye meza na kutabiri kwamba vitu vya kawaida vilikuwa vimekuwepo na mali inayofaa kujaza mapungufu hayo. Aliwaita jina la Eka-Boron, Eka-aluminium na Eka-Silicon na misa ya atomiki 44, 68 na 72 mtawaliwa.

Gesi nyepesi zaidi ya kikundi 0, ya kwanza kwenye meza ya upimaji, ilipewa molekuli ya atomiki kati ya 5.3 × 10 na 9.6 × 10. Kasi ya kinetic ya gesi hii ilihesabiwa na Mendeleev kuwa mita 2,500,000 kwa sekunde. Karibu isiyo na nguvu, gesi hizi zilidhaniwa na Mendeleev kupata mambo yote, mara chache huingiliana kwa kemikali. Uhamaji mkubwa na misa ndogo sana ya gesi ya trans-hydrogen ingesababisha hali kwamba zinaweza kuwa nadra, lakini zinaonekana kuwa mnene sana.

question_en: What type of government does Kazakhastan have?
pos_context_en:
The Senate of Kazakhastan (, "Qazaqstan Parlamentiniń Senaty") is the upper house of two chambers in Kazakhstan's legislature, known as the Parliament ("Parlamenti"). The Senate is composed of elected members - two from each region, the city of republican importance (Almaty) and the capital city of the Republic of Kazakhstan at joint sessions of the members of all representative bodies of respective regions, city of the republican importance and the capital city of the Republic.
Members of the Senate are elected on the basis of indirect suffrage by secret ballot. Half of elected members of the Senate are up for election every three years.
Fifteen members are appointed by the President of Kazakhstan with the view to ensure representation for all the diverse national, cultural components of society.
The term of office for the members of the Senate is 6 years.
According to constitutional norms in the Parliament of the fifth convocation, members of the Senate elected in 2011 and 2014 and those appointed by the President of the Republic of Kazakhstan in 2011 and 2013 continue to hold office.
neg_context_en: The table below offers a full list of which countries are what type of democracy. Keep note that the head of state, chief executive, government, and legislatures can have their official names be seemingly contradictory to this classification. The name a democracy gives itself or its office does not indicate what type of democracy it is.

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.

Recent exhibitions at Tensta konsthall include
• “Abstract Possible: The Stockholm Synergies,” with Doug Ashford, Claire Barclay, Goldin+Senneby, Wade Guyton, Mai-Thu Perret, Walid Raad, and Haegue Yang, among others
• “Kami, Khokha, Bert and Ernie: World Heritage” by Hinrich Sachs
• “Doing what you want: Marie-Louise Ekman accompanied by Sister Corita Kent, Mladen Stilinović, and Martha Wilson” 
• “The Society without qualities” with Sören Andreasen, Ane Hjort Guttu, Sture Johannesson, Sharon Lockhardt, and Palle Nielsen (part of “The new model” and curated by Lars Bang Larsen)
• “Working With…” by Zak Kyes
• “We are continuing BBDG” with Bernd Krauss
• “Two Archives” by Babak Afrassiabi and Nasrin Tabatabai

The president is the head of state. He also is the commander in chief of the armed forces and may veto legislation that has been passed by the Parliament. President Nursultan Nazarbayev, who has been in office since Kazakhstan became independent, won a new 7-year term in the 1999 election that the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe said fell short of international standards. A major political opponent, former prime minister Akezhan Kazhegeldin, was prohibited from running against the president because he had attended an unauthorized meeting of "the movement for free elections". On top of this the election was unconstitutionally called two years ahead of schedule. Free access to the media is also denied to opposing opinions. In 2002 a law set very stringent requirements for the maintenance of legal status of a political party, which lowered the number of legal parties from 19 in 2002 to 8 in 2003. The prime minister, who serves at the pleasure of the president, chairs the Cabinet of Ministers and serves as Kazakhstan's head of government. There are three deputy prime ministers and 16 ministers in the Cabinet. Bakhytzhan Sagintayev became the Prime Minister in September 2016.

question_src: Kazakhastan ina aina gani ya serikali?
pos_context_src:
Seneti ya Kazakhastan (, "Qazaqstan Parlamentiniń Senaty") ni nyumba ya juu ya vyumba viwili katika wabunge wa Kazakhstan, inayojulikana kama Bunge ("Parlamenti"). Seneti inaundwa na washiriki waliochaguliwa - mbili kutoka kila mkoa, Jiji la Umuhimu wa Republican (Almaty) na mji mkuu wa Jamhuri ya Kazakhstan katika vikao vya pamoja vya wanachama wa mashirika yote ya mwakilishi wa mikoa husika, mji wa umuhimu wa Republican na mji mkuu wa jamhuri.
Wajumbe wa Seneti huchaguliwa kwa msingi wa kutosheleza moja kwa moja kwa kura ya siri. Nusu ya wanachama waliochaguliwa wa Seneti ni juu ya uchaguzi kila baada ya miaka mitatu.
Wajumbe kumi na tano wameteuliwa na Rais wa Kazakhstan kwa lengo la kuhakikisha uwakilishi wa sehemu zote za kitaifa, za kitamaduni za jamii.
Muda wa ofisi kwa wanachama wa Seneti ni miaka 6.
Kulingana na kanuni za kikatiba katika Bunge la Mkutano wa Tano, wanachama wa Seneti waliochaguliwa mnamo 2011 na 2014 na wale walioteuliwa na Rais wa Jamhuri ya Kazakhstan mnamo 2011 na 2013 wanaendelea kufanya ofisi.
neg_context_src: Jedwali hapa chini linatoa orodha kamili ambayo nchi ni aina gani ya demokrasia. Endelea kumbuka kuwa mkuu wa nchi, mtendaji mkuu, serikali, na wabunge wanaweza kuwa na majina yao rasmi kuwa yanaonekana kupingana na uainishaji huu. Jina ambalo demokrasia inatoa yenyewe au ofisi yake haionyeshi ni aina gani ya demokrasia.

Winfield Toll Bridge, pia inajulikana kama Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, ni kihistoria wa kihistoria wa Cantilever Warren Truss Bridge iliyoko Winfield na Red House, Kaunti ya Putnam, West Virginia. Ilijengwa mnamo 1955, na inachukua Mto wa Kanawha, iliyobeba West Virginia Route 34. Cantilever kupitia-truss ina nafasi mbili za nanga kila futi 245 kwa urefu na urefu wa futi 462 kwa urefu kati ya mistari ya kituo cha pier. Span kuu ina futi mbili 128, inchi 4, mikono ya cantilever na miguu 205, inchi 4, iliyosimamishwa.

Maonyesho ya hivi karibuni huko Tensta Konsthall ni pamoja na
• "Abstract inawezekana: Synergies ya Stockholm," na Doug Ashford, Claire Barclay, Goldin+Senneby, Wade Guyton, Mai-Thu Perret, Walid Raad, na Haegue Yang, kati ya wengine
• "Kami, Khokha, Bert na Ernie: Urithi wa Dunia" na Hinrich Sachs
• "Kufanya unachotaka: Marie-Louise Ekman akifuatana na Dada Corita Kent, Mladen Stilinović, na Martha Wilson" 
• "Jamii isiyo na Sifa" na Sören Andreasen, Ane Hjort Guttu, Sture Johannesson, Sharon Lockhardt, na Palle Nielsen (sehemu ya "Mfano Mpya" na iliyochapishwa na Lars Bang Larsen)
• "Kufanya kazi na ..." na Zak Kyes
• "Tunaendelea BBDG" na Bernd Krauss
• "Jalada mbili" na Babak Afrassiabi na Nasrin Tabatabai

Rais ndiye mkuu wa nchi. Yeye pia ndiye kamanda mkuu wa vikosi vya jeshi na sheria za kura ya turuba ambazo zimepitishwa na Bunge. Rais Nursultan Nazarbayev, ambaye amekuwa ofisini tangu Kazakhstan kuwa huru, alishinda kipindi kipya cha miaka 7 katika uchaguzi wa 1999 kwamba shirika la usalama na ushirikiano barani Ulaya lilisema hali ya chini ya viwango vya kimataifa. Mpinzani mkubwa wa kisiasa, Waziri Mkuu wa zamani Akezhan Kazhegeldin, alikuwa marufuku kukimbia dhidi ya rais kwa sababu alikuwa amehudhuria mkutano usioidhinishwa wa "harakati za uchaguzi wa bure". Juu ya uchaguzi huu uliitwa bila Katiba kwa miaka miwili kabla ya ratiba. Ufikiaji wa bure kwa media pia unakataliwa kwa maoni yanayopingana. Mnamo 2002 sheria iliweka mahitaji madhubuti ya utunzaji wa hali ya kisheria ya chama cha siasa, ambacho kilipunguza idadi ya vyama vya kisheria kutoka 19 mnamo 2002 hadi 8 mnamo 2003. Waziri Mkuu, ambaye anahudumu kwa Rais wa Rais, viti vya Baraza la Mawaziri la Mawaziri na kutumika kama mkuu wa serikali wa Kazakhstan. Kuna mawaziri wakuu watatu na mawaziri 16 kwenye baraza la mawaziri. Bakhytzhan Sagintayev alikua Waziri Mkuu mnamo Septemba 2016.

question_en: When was activity theory created?
pos_context_en:
The activity theory, also known as the implicit theory of aging, normal theory of aging, and lay theory of aging, proposes that successful ageing occurs when older adults stay active and maintain social interactions. It takes the view that the aging process is delayed and the quality of life is enhanced when old people remain socially active. 
The activity theory rose in opposing response to the disengagement theory. The activity theory and the disengagement theory were the two major theories that outlined successful aging in the early 1960s. The theory was developed by Robert J. Havighurst in 1961. In 1964, Bernice Neugarten asserted that satisfaction in old age depended on active maintenance of personal relationships and endeavors.
neg_context_en: AT remained virtually unknown outside the Soviet Union until the mid-1980s, when it was picked up by Scandinavian researchers. The first international conference on activity theory was not held until 1986. The earliest non-Soviet paper cited by Nardi is a 1987 paper by Yrjö Engeström: "Learning by expanding". This resulted in a reformulation of AT. Kuutti notes that the term "activity theory" "can be used in two senses: referring to the original Soviet tradition or referring to the international, multi-voiced community applying the original ideas and developing them further."

The application of activity theory to information systems derives from the work of Bonnie Nardi and Kari Kuutti. Kuutti's work is addressed below. Nardi's approach is, briefly, as follows: Nardi (p. 6) described activity theory as "...a powerful and clarifying descriptive tool rather than a strongly predictive theory. The object of activity theory is to understand the unity of consciousness and activity...Activity theorists argue that consciousness is not a set of discrete disembodied cognitive acts (decision making, classification, remembering), and certainly it is not the brain; rather, consciousness is located in everyday practice: you are what you do." Nardi (p. 5) also argued that "activity theory proposes a strong notion of "mediation"—all human experience is shaped by the tools and sign systems we use." Nardi (p. 6) explained that "a basic tenet of activity theory is that a notion of consciousness is central to a depiction of activity. Vygotsky described consciousness as a phenomenon that unifies attention, intention, memory, reasoning, and speech..." and (p. 7) "Activity theory, with its emphasis on the importance of motive and consciousness—which belongs only to humans—sees people and things as fundamentally different. People are not reduced to 'nodes' or 'agents' in a system; 'information processing' is not seen as something to be modelled in the same way for people and machines."

After Vygotsky's foundational work on the individual's higher psychological functions and Leontiev's extension of these insights to collective activity systems, questions of diversity and dialogue between different traditions or perspectives became increasingly serious challenges, when, especially in the post-1990s, activity theory 'went international'. The work of Michael Cole and Yrjö Engeström in the 1970s and 1980s – mostly in parallel, but occasionally in collaboration – brought activity theory to a much wider audience of scholars in Scandinavia and North America. Once the lives and biographies of all the participants and the history of the wider community are taken into account, "multiple activity systems" need to be considered, positing, according to Engeström, the need for a "third generation" to ""develop conceptual tools to understand dialogue, multiple perspectives, and networks of interacting activity Systems"". This larger canvas of active individuals (and researchers) embedded in organizational, political, and discursive practices constitutes a tangible advantage of second- and third-generation CHAT over its earlier Vygotskian ancestor, which focused on mediated action in relative isolation Third generation activity theory is the application of "Activity Systems Analysis" (ASA) in developmental research where investigators take a participatory and interventionist role in the participants' activities and change their experiences. Engeström's now famous diagram, or "basic activity triangle", – (which adds rules/norms, intersubjective community relations, and division of labor, as well as multiple activity systems sharing an object) – has become the principal third generation model among the research community for analysing individuals and groups. Engeström summarizes the current state of CHAT with five principles:
Most often, learning technologists have used third-generation CHAT as a guiding theoretical framework to understand how technologies are adopted, adapted, and configured through use in complex social situations.

Action regulation theory (or Activity regulation theory) was jointly developed by Winfried Hacker. in the 1980s. The Theory serves as a basis for modelling working conditions. As a process model it has its roots in the Soviet psychological activity theory on the one side and on the other side it is based on the T.O.T.E. Model (Test-Operation-Test-Exit) from Miller, Galanter and Pribram.
The pursued approach of the Action-Regulation-Theory is the integration of cognitive, behaviourism and social science orientated conceptions. This integration then is used to make explanatory and modelling statements about work conditions. Hacker talks in this context about the holistic work activity, which is an essential criteria for personality development. Through the above described should the partialization of work activity and the Taylorism be overcome. As a cybernetic approach the ground idea of an action/ activity is the regulation.
Between the visible work activity and the non visible cognitive processes is a gap, which the Action-Regulation-Theory promise to close. Through a hierarchical-sequential structured model, action steps are supposed to be accurately captured and analysed.

Activity is preferable to inactivity because it facilitates well-being on multiple levels. Because of improved general health and prosperity in the older population, remaining active is more feasible now than when this theory was first proposed by Havighurst nearly six decades ago. The activity theory is applicable for a stable, post-industrial society, which offers its older members many opportunities for meaningful participation.Weakness: Some aging persons cannot maintain a middle-aged lifestyle, due to functional limitations, lack of income, or lack of a desire to do so. Many older adults lack the resources to maintain active roles in society. On the flip side, some elders may insist on continuing activities in late life that pose a danger to themselves and others, such as driving at night with low visual acuity or doing maintenance work to the house while climbing with severely arthritic knees. In doing so, they are denying their limitations and engaging in unsafe behaviors.

Routine activity theory is a sub-field of crime opportunity theory that focuses on situations of crimes. It was first proposed by Marcus Felson and Lawrence E. Cohen in their explanation of crime rate change in the United States 1947 - 1974. The theory has been extensively applied and has become one of the most cited theories in criminology. Unlike criminological theories of criminality, routine activity theory studies crime as an event, closely relates crime to its environment and emphasize its ecological process, thereby diverting academic attention away from mere offenders.

In his 1987 ""Learning by expanding"", Engeström offers a very detailed account of the diverse sources, philosophical and psychological, that inform activity theory. In subsequent years, however, a simplified picture has emerged from his and other researchers' work, namely the idea that (to date) there are three principal 'stages' or 'generations' of activity theory, or "cultural-historical activity theory (CHAT). Whilst the first generation built on Vygotsky's notion of mediated action, from the individual's perspective, and the second generation built on Leont'ev's notion of activity system, with emphasis on the collective, the third generation, which appeared in the mid-nineties, builds on the idea of multiple interacting activity systems focused on a partially shared object, and boundary-crossings between them.

The origins of activity theory can be traced to several sources, which have subsequently given rise to various complementary and intertwined strands of development. This account will focus on three of the most important of these strands. The first is associated with the Moscow Institute of Psychology and in particular the "troika" of young Russian researchers, Vygotsky, Leont'ev and Luria. Vygotsky founded cultural-historical psychology, a field that became the basis for modern AT; Leont'ev, one of the principal founders of activity theory, both developed and reacted against Vygotsky's work. Leont'ev's formulation of general activity theory is currently the most influential in post-Soviet developments in AT, which have largely been in social-scientific, organizational, and writing-studies rather than psychological research.

Activity theory is not grounded in any one area of field of research, but instead draws from several disciplines including psychology, behaviorism, and socio-cultural studies. Although activity theory originated in the social sciences, it is currently applied most frequently to social-scientific, organizational, and writing studies. Modeled as a triangle, activity theory considers how multiple factors (subject, object, mediating artifacts, rules, and division of labor) existing in an activity system (environment) interact to achieve an outcome. Central to activity theory is the concept of mediation. Human activities are driven by a need to achieve a certain outcome or goal. Typically this activity is mediated by artifacts which include tools, language, signs, and cultural norms. In "Textual Objects" Cheryl Geisler explains that texts are traditionally identified as meditational means to complete a task, though she offers that texts might also be identified as the motive in discourse communities in which text is valued as the outcome as opposed to the means of an outcome. Geisler notes that texts produced for meditational means are typically more private/personalized, whereas texts identified as objects are often written with a public motive. She does not argue, however, that texts should exist exclusively as one or the other, but rather she suggests that texts can function as both.
question_src: Je! Nadharia ya shughuli iliundwa lini?
pos_context_src:
Nadharia ya shughuli, inayojulikana pia kama nadharia kamili ya kuzeeka, nadharia ya kawaida ya kuzeeka, na kuweka nadharia ya kuzeeka, inapendekeza kuwa kuzeeka kwa mafanikio hufanyika wakati wazee wazee wanakaa hai na kudumisha mwingiliano wa kijamii. Inachukua maoni kwamba mchakato wa kuzeeka umecheleweshwa na ubora wa maisha huimarishwa wakati watu wazee wanabaki hai kijamii. 
Nadharia ya shughuli iliongezeka katika kukabiliana na nadharia ya kutengwa. Nadharia ya shughuli na nadharia ya kutengwa ilikuwa nadharia kuu mbili ambazo zilielezea kuzeeka kwa mafanikio katika miaka ya mapema ya 1960. Nadharia hiyo ilitengenezwa na Robert J. Havighurst mnamo 1961. Mnamo 1964, Bernice Neugarten alisisitiza kwamba kuridhika katika uzee kulitegemea matengenezo ya kazi ya kibinafsi na juhudi.
neg_context_src: Wakati wa kubaki haijulikani nje ya Umoja wa Soviet hadi katikati ya miaka ya 1980, wakati ilichukuliwa na watafiti wa Scandinavia. Mkutano wa kwanza wa kimataifa juu ya nadharia ya shughuli haukufanyika hadi 1986. Karatasi ya kwanza isiyo ya Soviet iliyotajwa na Nardi ni karatasi ya 1987 na Yrjö Engeström: "Kujifunza kwa Kupanua". Hii ilisababisha mageuzi ya AT. Kuutti anabainisha kuwa neno "nadharia ya shughuli" "linaweza kutumika katika akili mbili: ukimaanisha mila ya asili ya Soviet au kurejelea jamii ya kimataifa, yenye sauti nyingi kutumia maoni ya asili na kuyaendeleza zaidi."

Utumiaji wa nadharia ya shughuli kwa mifumo ya habari inatokana na kazi ya Bonnie Nardi na Kari Kuutti. Kazi ya Kuutti imeshughulikiwa hapa chini. Nardi's approach is, briefly, as follows: Nardi (p. 6) described activity theory as "...a powerful and clarifying descriptive tool rather than a strongly predictive theory. The object of activity theory is to understand the unity of consciousness and activity...Activity theorists argue that consciousness is not a set of discrete disembodied cognitive acts (decision making, classification, remembering), and certainly it is not the brain; rather, consciousness is located in everyday Mazoezi: Wewe ndivyo unavyofanya. " Nardi (uk. 5) pia alisema kwamba "nadharia ya shughuli inapendekeza wazo kali la" upatanishi " - uzoefu wote wa kibinadamu umeundwa na zana na mifumo ya ishara tunayotumia." Nardi (uk. 6) alielezea kwamba "nadharia ya msingi ya nadharia ya shughuli ni kwamba wazo la fahamu ni msingi wa taswira ya shughuli. Vygotsky alielezea fahamu kama jambo ambalo linaunganisha umakini, nia, kumbukumbu, hoja, na hotuba ..." na (p. 7) "nadharia ya shughuli, kwa sababu ya watu kuwa ni wahusika. kwa 'node' au 'mawakala' katika mfumo;

Baada ya kazi ya msingi ya Vygotsky juu ya kazi za juu za kisaikolojia na upanuzi wa Leontiev wa ufahamu huu kwa mifumo ya shughuli za pamoja, maswali ya utofauti na mazungumzo kati ya mila au mitazamo tofauti ikawa changamoto kubwa, wakati, haswa baada ya miaka ya 1990, nadharia ya shughuli 'ilikwenda kimataifa'. Kazi ya Michael Cole na Yrjö Engeström katika miaka ya 1970 na 1980 - zaidi sambamba, lakini mara kwa mara kwa kushirikiana - ilileta nadharia ya shughuli kwa watazamaji pana wa wasomi huko Scandinavia na Amerika ya Kaskazini. Mara tu maisha na wasifu wa washiriki wote na historia ya jamii pana inazingatiwa, "mifumo mingi ya shughuli" inahitaji kuzingatiwa, ikisisitiza, kulingana na Engeström, hitaji la "kizazi cha tatu" "" kukuza zana za dhana kuelewa mazungumzo, mitazamo mingi, na mitandao ya mifumo ya shughuli za kuingiliana ". Canvas hii kubwa ya watu wanaofanya kazi (na watafiti) walioingia katika shirika, kisiasa, na mazoea ya kujitenga hufanya faida inayoonekana ya gumzo la kizazi cha pili na cha tatu juu ya babu yake wa mapema wa Vygotskian, ambayo ililenga hatua ya upatanishi katika nadharia ya shughuli za kizazi cha tatu ni matumizi ya "mifumo ya uchambuzi" (ASA) katika Utafiti wa Maendeleo ambapo wachunguzi huchukua hatua za wachunguzi wanaowaingiza wanaowashirikisha wanaowaingiliana na wahusika wanaowaingilia kati wahusika. Mchoro maarufu sasa wa Engeström, au "pembetatu ya shughuli za msingi", - (ambayo inaongeza sheria/kanuni, uhusiano wa jamii ya ndani, na mgawanyiko wa wafanyikazi, pamoja na mifumo mingi ya shughuli zinazoshiriki kitu) - imekuwa mfano mkuu wa kizazi cha tatu kati ya jamii ya utafiti kwa kuchambua watu na vikundi. Engeström muhtasari wa hali ya sasa ya gumzo na kanuni tano: Mara nyingi, wataalamu wa kujifunza wametumia gumzo la kizazi cha tatu kama mfumo wa nadharia wa kuelewa jinsi teknolojia ni iliyopitishwa, ilibadilishwa, na kusanidiwa kupitia matumizi katika hali ngumu za kijamii.

Nadharia ya kanuni ya hatua (au nadharia ya kanuni ya shughuli) ilitengenezwa kwa pamoja na Winfried Hacker. Mnamo miaka ya 1980. Nadharia hiyo hutumika kama msingi wa mfano wa hali ya kufanya kazi. Kama mfano wa mchakato ina mizizi yake katika nadharia ya shughuli za kisaikolojia ya Soviet upande mmoja na kwa upande mwingine ni msingi wa T.O.T.E. Mfano (mtihani-wa-kazi-mtihani-kutoka) kutoka Miller, Galanter na Pribram.
Njia iliyofuatwa ya nadharia ya kanuni-nadharia ni ujumuishaji wa maoni ya utambuzi, tabia na maoni ya sayansi ya kijamii. Ujumuishaji huu basi hutumiwa kufanya taarifa za kuelezea na za modeli kuhusu hali ya kazi. Hacker inazungumza katika muktadha huu juu ya shughuli ya jumla ya kazi, ambayo ni vigezo muhimu kwa maendeleo ya utu. Kupitia yaliyoelezwa hapo juu ikiwa upendeleo wa shughuli za kazi na Taylorism itashindwa. Kama njia ya cybernetic wazo la msingi la hatua/ shughuli ni kanuni.
Kati ya shughuli inayoonekana ya kazi na michakato isiyoonekana ya utambuzi ni pengo, ambalo ahadi ya nadharia ya hatua ya kuifunga. Kupitia mfano wa muundo wa mpangilio wa hali ya juu, hatua za hatua zinapaswa kutekwa kwa usahihi na kuchambuliwa.

Shughuli ni bora kwa kutokuwa na shughuli kwa sababu inawezesha ustawi katika viwango vingi. Kwa sababu ya afya bora na ustawi katika idadi ya wazee, iliyobaki hai inawezekana zaidi sasa kuliko wakati nadharia hii ilipendekezwa kwanza na Havighurst karibu miongo sita iliyopita. Nadharia ya shughuli inatumika kwa jamii thabiti, ya baada ya viwanda, ambayo inawapa washiriki wake fursa nyingi za ushiriki wenye maana.Waki: watu wengine wazee hawawezi kudumisha maisha ya miaka ya kati, kwa sababu ya mapungufu ya kazi, ukosefu wa mapato, au ukosefu wa hamu ya kufanya hivyo. Wazee wengi wazee wanakosa rasilimali za kudumisha majukumu katika jamii. Kwenye upande wa blip, wazee wengine wanaweza kusisitiza juu ya shughuli za kuendelea katika maisha ya marehemu ambayo huleta hatari kwao na wengine, kama vile kuendesha usiku na hali ya chini ya kuona au kufanya kazi ya matengenezo kwa nyumba wakati wakipanda na magoti ya arthritic. Kwa kufanya hivyo, wanakanusha mapungufu yao na kujihusisha na tabia zisizo salama.

Nadharia ya shughuli za kawaida ni uwanja mdogo wa nadharia ya fursa ya uhalifu ambayo inazingatia hali za uhalifu. Ilipendekezwa kwa mara ya kwanza na Marcus Felson na Lawrence E. Cohen katika maelezo yao ya mabadiliko ya kiwango cha uhalifu huko Merika 1947 - 1974. Nadharia hiyo imekuwa ikitumika sana na imekuwa moja ya nadharia iliyotajwa zaidi katika uhalifu. Tofauti na nadharia za uhalifu wa uhalifu, nadharia ya kawaida ya shughuli za nadharia ya uhalifu kama tukio, inahusiana sana na uhalifu kwa mazingira yake na kusisitiza mchakato wake wa kiikolojia, na hivyo kupotosha umakini wa kitaaluma mbali na wahalifu tu.

Katika mwaka wake wa 1987 "" Kujifunza kwa kupanua "", Engeström hutoa akaunti ya kina ya vyanzo anuwai, falsafa na kisaikolojia, ambayo inaarifu nadharia ya shughuli. In subsequent years, however, a simplified picture has emerged from his and other researchers' work, namely the idea that (to date) there are three principal 'stages' or 'generations' of activity theory, or "cultural-historical activity theory (CHAT). Whilst the first generation built on Vygotsky's notion of mediated action, from the individual's perspective, and the second generation built on Leont'ev's notion of activity system, with emphasis on the collective, Kizazi cha tatu, ambacho kilionekana katikati ya miaka ya tisini, huunda juu ya wazo la mifumo mingi ya shughuli za kuingiliana ililenga kitu kilichoshirikiwa, na kuvuka kwa mipaka kati yao.

Asili ya nadharia ya shughuli inaweza kupatikana kwa vyanzo kadhaa, ambavyo baadaye vimesababisha kuongezeka kwa safu kadhaa za maendeleo na zilizoingiliana. Akaunti hii itazingatia tatu ya muhimu zaidi ya kamba hizi. Ya kwanza inahusishwa na Taasisi ya Saikolojia ya Moscow na haswa "Troika" ya watafiti wachanga wa Urusi, Vygotsky, Leont'ev na Luria. Vygotsky alianzisha saikolojia ya kihistoria ya kihistoria, uwanja ambao ukawa msingi wa kisasa AT; Leont'ev, mmoja wa waanzilishi wakuu wa nadharia ya shughuli, wote waliendeleza na kuguswa dhidi ya kazi ya Vygotsky. Uundaji wa Leont'ev wa nadharia ya jumla ya shughuli kwa sasa ni ushawishi mkubwa katika maendeleo ya baada ya Soviet huko AT, ambayo kwa kiasi kikubwa yamekuwa katika jamii za kijamii, shirika, na uandishi badala ya utafiti wa kisaikolojia.

Nadharia ya shughuli haijawekwa katika eneo lolote la uwanja wa utafiti, lakini badala yake huchota kutoka kwa taaluma kadhaa ikiwa ni pamoja na saikolojia, tabia, na masomo ya kitamaduni. Ingawa nadharia ya shughuli ilitoka katika sayansi ya kijamii, kwa sasa inatumika mara nyingi kwa masomo ya kijamii, ya kijamii, ya shirika, na uandishi. Imewekwa kama pembetatu, nadharia ya shughuli inazingatia jinsi sababu nyingi (somo, kitu, upatanishi wa mabaki, sheria, na mgawanyiko wa kazi) zilizopo katika mfumo wa shughuli (mazingira) huingiliana ili kufikia matokeo. Katikati ya nadharia ya shughuli ni wazo la upatanishi. Shughuli za kibinadamu zinaendeshwa na hitaji la kufikia matokeo au lengo fulani. Kawaida shughuli hii inaingiliana na mabaki ambayo ni pamoja na zana, lugha, ishara, na kanuni za kitamaduni. Katika "vitu vya maandishi" Cheryl Geisler anaelezea kwamba maandishi yanatambuliwa jadi kama njia ya kutafakari ya kukamilisha kazi, ingawa yeye hutoa kwamba maandishi yanaweza pia kutambuliwa kama nia katika jamii za mazungumzo ambayo maandishi yanathaminiwa kama matokeo kinyume na njia ya matokeo. Geisler anabainisha kuwa maandishi yanayozalishwa kwa njia za kutafakari kawaida ni ya kibinafsi/ya kibinafsi, wakati maandishi yaliyotambuliwa kama vitu mara nyingi huandikwa kwa nia ya umma. Yeye haogopi, hata hivyo, kwamba maandishi yanapaswa kuwapo peke kama moja au nyingine, lakini badala yake anapendekeza kwamba maandishi yanaweza kufanya kazi kama yote mawili.

question_en: Does the Dan Le Batard Show still air?
pos_context_en: Le Batard hosts a daily radio show with Jon "Stugotz" Weiner that originates from WAXY in Miami and is carried nationally on ESPN Radio. He also hosts "Highly Questionable", which airs daily on ESPN and was originally titled "Dan Le Batard is Highly Questionable"; Le Batard co-hosts the program with his father Gonzalo and revolving co-host. Additionally, he is a frequent contributor to several ESPN programs, serving as a regular replacement host for "Pardon the Interruption".
neg_context_title_en: The Dan Le Batard Show with Stugotz
The Dan Le Batard Show with Stugotz
The Dan Le Batard Show with Stugotz
The Dan Le Batard Show with Stugotz
neg_context_en: From its premiere until May 10, 2013, the show bore Le Batard's name and was called Dan Le Batard Is Highly Questionable ("DLHQ"), and from its premiere until March 23, 2015 the show aired on ESPN2. The program is based in Le Batard's hometown of Miami, Florida, and produced via satellite in Washington, D.C.. It was created by the same people behind "Pardon the Interruption" ("PTI"), which Le Batard has appeared on multiple times as a substitute host.

The Dan Le Batard Show with Stugotz is a sports talk radio show hosted by Dan Le Batard and Jon "Stugotz" Weiner and broadcast on WAXY AM 790 "The Ticket" in Miami, Florida, and on many ESPN Radio affiliates nationwide. The show is heard locally Monday through Friday from 9 AM to 1 PM ET and nationally on ESPN Radio and ESPNEWS from 10 AM to 1 PM (prior to April 2, 2018, the television simulcast was aired on ESPNU). The show features commentary on the day's sports news, perspective on other news stories, interviews with sports analysts and sports figures, as well as a generous blend of pop culture and listener interaction. The hosts are known for their self-deprecating humor, which carries over onto the show through running jokes. Le Batard and Stugotz interact throughout the show with executive producer Mike Ryan, show booker Allyson Turner, and fellow producers Roy Bellamy, Billy "Guillermo" Gil, and Chris "Fats and Info" Cote, collectively nicknamed the Shipping Container Filled with Frightened Refugees. The show commonly refers to themselves as a "marching band to nowhere" and a "flying saucer of BS"

Dan Le Batard was born in Jersey City, New Jersey. His Cuban exile parents, Gonzalo and Lourdes, moved the family to Central Islip, New York, before settling in Miramar, Florida. Dan's brother is Miami-based artist David Le Batard, professionally known as LEBO. Le Batard is also fluent in Spanish, which he learned through his parents' heritage. During the 2016 exhibition MLB game in Cuba, Le Batard talked on his radio show about how his family risked everything to come to the U.S. His surname is of French origin, meaning "the bastard". On September 13, 2018, Miami Herald reporter and Le Batard’s longtime friend Greg Cote published an article announcing that Dan had become engaged to his girlfriend of two years, Valerie Scheide.The article was published without the couple’s consent, which caused great embarrassment for Le Batard as he was on the air at the time the news broke.Dan and Valerie plan to marry in late 2019.

On the May 5, 2017, episode of "The Bill Simmons Podcast", hosted by Bill Simmons, a long time friend of Le Batard, Rapaport once again brought up the beef between him and the show. He repeatedly insulted Le Batard, Stugotz, and the show's producers saying they were only there to get his coffee. Simmons was uncomfortable for the entirety of Rapaport's rant against the show saying, “I still feel awkward because I like all those guys. I wish this would work out.”

Currently, Le Batard and Stugotz are joined on-air by Greg Cote of The Miami Herald on Tuesdays, and additional ESPN personalities (including Sarah Spain, Domonique Foxworth, Mina Kimes and others) make regular guest hosting appearances.

In September 2011, ESPN launched "Dan Le Batard Is ¿Highly Questionable?" (retitled "Highly Questionable" in 2013) on ESPN as part of the afternoon "Sports Talk Block." The show originally featured Le Batard and his father, Gonzalo, whom he calls "Papi." Bomani Jones later joined the show as a host in February 2013, accompanying Dan & "Papi" in discussing current sports news & event topics, and later leaving the show in June 2017 to go, and do other things for ESPN, including hosting High Noon with Pablo Torre.

Beginning in 2012, Jones appeared regularly on Dan Le Batard's ESPN2 show, "Dan Le Batard Is Highly Questionable", where he discussed major sports stories with Le Batard. Around the same time, he began guest hosting on "The Dan Le Batard Show with Stugotz" radio show on The Ticket Miami on Wednesdays. On May 9, 2013 it was reported that Jones had signed a new four-year contract with ESPN. In May 2013, Jones became co-host of the renamed "Highly Questionable", which would move to ESPN in March 2015. Jones remained on "Highly Questionable" until June 2017, when he left the show to prepare for a new project with fellow ESPN talent Pablo S. Torre.
After running for nine years on local radio, The Dan Le Batard Show debuted on ESPN Radio on September 30, 2013.

Le Batard is a frequent contributor to many programs on the ESPN television network. Among others, he is a recurring guest on "Outside the Lines", "The Sports Reporters", and "College GameDay". He is also a regular guest host of "Pardon the Interruption", where he has been christened "The Hateable Dan Le Batard" due to his sometimes controversial (and usually contrarian) opinions, as well as his unorthodox attire. Hosting duties on "PTI" have allowed Le Batard the implementation of the catch-phrase "Bam!", which he exclaims in various ways at the beginning of each show he guest hosts. Le Batard has a joking rivalry with former PTI stat boy Tony Reali.
question_src: Je! Dan Le Batard inaonyesha bado hewa?
pos_context_src: Le Batard mwenyeji wa kipindi cha redio cha kila siku na Jon "Stugotz" Weiner ambayo inatoka Waxy huko Miami na inachukuliwa kitaifa kwenye Redio ya ESPN. Yeye pia mwenyeji "mwenye kuhojiwa sana", ambayo hutoka kila siku kwenye ESPN na hapo awali ilipewa jina la "Dan Le Batard ni ya kuhojiwa sana"; Le Batard anashirikiana na mpango huo na baba yake Gonzalo na mwenyeji anayesimamia mwenyeji. Kwa kuongezea, yeye ni mchangiaji wa mara kwa mara katika programu kadhaa za ESPN, akihudumu kama mwenyeji wa kawaida wa "msamaha wa usumbufu".
neg_context_title_src: Maonyesho ya Dan Le Batard na Stugotz
Maonyesho ya Dan Le Batard na Stugotz
Maonyesho ya Dan Le Batard na Stugotz
Maonyesho ya Dan Le Batard na Stugotz
neg_context_src: Kuanzia mkutano wake hadi Mei 10, 2013, onyesho la jina la Le Batard na liliitwa Dan Le Batard linahojiwa sana ("DLHQ"), na kutoka kwa mkutano wake hadi Machi 23, 2015 onyesho lilirushwa kwenye ESPN2. Programu hiyo iko katika mji wa Le Batard wa Miami, Florida, na inazalishwa kupitia satellite huko Washington, D.C .. Iliundwa na watu wale wale walio nyuma ya "Usumbufu wa Usumbufu" ("PTI"), ambayo Le Batard ameonekana mara kadhaa kama mwenyeji mbadala.

Maonyesho ya Dan Le Batard na Stugotz ni kipindi cha redio ya mazungumzo ya michezo iliyohudhuriwa na Dan Le Batard na Jon "Stugotz" Weiner na kutangazwa kwenye Waxy AM 790 "Tiketi" huko Miami, Florida, na kwa washirika wengi wa Redio ya ESPN kote nchini. Kipindi hicho kinasikika Jumatatu hadi Ijumaa kutoka 9 asubuhi hadi 1 jioni ET na kitaifa kwenye Redio ya ESPN na ESPNews kutoka 10 asubuhi hadi 1 jioni (kabla ya Aprili 2, 2018, simulcast ya runinga ilirushwa kwenye ESPNU). Maonyesho hayo yanaonyesha maoni juu ya habari za siku za michezo, mtazamo juu ya hadithi zingine za habari, mahojiano na wachambuzi wa michezo na takwimu za michezo, na pia mchanganyiko wa utamaduni wa pop na mwingiliano wa msikilizaji. Wasimamizi wanajulikana kwa ucheshi wao wa kujishusha, ambao hubeba kwenye onyesho kupitia utani. Le Batard na Stugotz wanaingiliana katika kipindi chote cha onyesho na mtayarishaji mtendaji Mike Ryan, show Booker Allyson Turner, na wazalishaji wenzake Roy Bellamy, Billy "Guillermo" Gil, na Chris "Fats na Info" Cote, kwa pamoja waliita kwa kontena la Shipping lililojaa wakimbizi. Kipindi kawaida hujiita kama "bendi ya kuandamana kwenda mahali" na "saucer ya kuruka ya BS"

Dan Le Batard alizaliwa huko Jersey City, New Jersey. Wazazi wake wa uhamishaji wa Cuba, Gonzalo na Lourdes, walihamisha familia hiyo katikati mwa Islip, New York, kabla ya kutulia huko Miramar, Florida. Ndugu ya Dan ni msanii wa msingi wa Miami David Le Batard, anayejulikana kama Lebo. Le Batard pia ni mzuri katika Uhispania, ambayo alijifunza kupitia urithi wa wazazi wake. Wakati wa maonyesho ya MLB ya maonyesho ya 2016 huko Cuba, Le Batard alizungumza kwenye kipindi chake cha redio kuhusu jinsi familia yake ilihatarisha kila kitu kuja U.S. jina lake ni la asili ya Ufaransa, ikimaanisha "bastard". Mnamo Septemba 13, 2018, Mwandishi wa Miami Herald na rafiki wa muda mrefu wa Le Batard Greg Cote alichapisha nakala iliyotangaza kwamba Dani alikuwa ameshirikiana na rafiki yake wa kike wa miaka miwili, Valerie Scheide. Nakala hiyo ilichapishwa bila idhini ya wanandoa, ambayo ilisababisha aibu kubwa kwa Le Batard wakati alipokuwa hewani wakati wa habari ulipovunja.

Mnamo Mei 5, 2017, sehemu ya "The Bill Simmons Podcast", iliyohudhuriwa na Bill Simmons, rafiki wa muda mrefu wa Le Batard, Rapaport alileta tena nyama kati yake na onyesho. Alimtukana mara kwa mara Le Batard, Stugotz, na wazalishaji wa onyesho wakisema walikuwa tu kupata kahawa yake. Simmons hakuwa na wasiwasi kwa jumla ya rant ya Rapaport dhidi ya onyesho akisema, "Bado ninahisi kuwa mbaya kwa sababu ninawapenda wale wote. Natamani hii ingefanikiwa."

Hivi sasa, Le Batard na Stugotz wamejumuishwa hewani na Greg Cote wa Miami Herald siku za Jumanne, na haiba ya ziada ya ESPN (pamoja na Sarah Spain, Domonique Foxworth, Mina Kimes na wengine) hufanya kuonekana mara kwa mara kwa wageni.

Mnamo Septemba 2011, ESPN ilizindua "Dan Le Batard ni" kuhojiwa sana? " . Awali onyesho hilo lilionyesha Le Batard na baba yake, Gonzalo, ambaye anamwita "Papi." Baadaye Bomani Jones alijiunga na onyesho kama mwenyeji mnamo Februari 2013, akiandamana na Dan & "Papi" katika kujadili habari za sasa za michezo na mada, na baadaye kuacha onyesho mnamo Juni 2017 kwenda, na kufanya mambo mengine kwa ESPN, pamoja na mwenyeji wa saa sita mchana na Pablo Torre.

Kuanzia mwaka wa 2012, Jones alionekana mara kwa mara kwenye onyesho la Dan Le Batard's ESPN2, "Dan Le Batard anahoji sana", ambapo alijadili hadithi kuu za michezo na Le Batard. Karibu wakati huo huo, alianza mgeni mwenyeji kwenye kipindi cha redio cha "The Dan Le Batard na Stugotz" kwenye tiketi Miami Jumatano. Mnamo Mei 9, 2013 iliripotiwa kwamba Jones alikuwa amesaini mkataba mpya wa miaka nne na ESPN. Mnamo Mei 2013, Jones alikua mwenyeji wa jina la "kuhojiwa sana", ambalo lingehamia ESPN mnamo Machi 2015. Jones alibaki kwenye "kuhojiwa sana" hadi Juni 2017, alipoondoka kwenye onyesho la kuandaa mradi mpya na talanta ya ESPN Pablo S. Torre.
Baada ya kukimbia kwa miaka tisa kwenye redio ya hapa, onyesho la Dan Le Batard lilijadiliwa kwenye Redio ya ESPN mnamo Septemba 30, 2013.

Le Batard ni mchangiaji wa mara kwa mara kwa programu nyingi kwenye mtandao wa runinga wa ESPN. Miongoni mwa wengine, yeye ni mgeni anayerudia juu ya "nje ya mistari", "waandishi wa michezo", na "Chuo cha Gameday". Yeye pia ni mgeni wa kawaida wa "Kusamehe Usumbufu", ambapo amekuwa christened "Hakable Dan Le Batard" kwa sababu ya maoni yake ya wakati mwingine (na kawaida ya contrarian), pamoja na mavazi yake yasiyokuwa ya kweli. Majukumu ya mwenyeji juu ya "PTI" yameruhusu Le Batard utekelezaji wa mfano wa "Bam!", Ambayo anasema kwa njia mbali mbali mwanzoni mwa kila onyesho la wageni. Le Batard ana mashindano ya utani na kijana wa zamani wa PTI Stat Tony Reali.
