question_en: Is Pearl beer still in production?
pos_context_en:
In 1952, when the San Antonio Brewing Association changed its name to the Pearl Brewing Company, the triple Xs joined the Pearl name as a dominant image on the product and the company as a whole. The triple Xs were back on the company logo and were used on almost all of Pearl's advertisements. The Xs held this significant role to the end of production at the brewery in 2001, when the brewery closed its doors and the company logo was abandoned. As production of Pearl and Pearl Light spun up at Miller's Fort Worth facility, the product logos were redesigned. The updated label does not use the triple Xs, so a significant part of company identity has been virtually eliminated from the Pearl beers. However, Pearl's Country Club malt liquor still displays the XXXs in its logo.
Many people wonder where the Xs came from, and how were they ever used on beer. In truth, the three Xs are actually a quality rating system. The system was initially used in Europe during the 16th Century. As European royalty traveled their lands and visited neighboring counties, a royal courier was sent ahead of the official party. The courier's job was to sample beer at inns along the way. If the beer was only average, the courier would mark the inn's sign or door with a single X. If the inn's beer was deemed good, the sign or door would receive two Xs. A mark on an inn of three Xs meant that the beer inside was excellent, and a must-stop for the royal court as they passed through.
neg_context_en: The triple Xs were adopted by the San Antonio Brewing Association to portray two things: the high quality of their beers, and the pride that workers put into their products. The triple Xs may be gone from company and Pearl beer logos, but it has not completely vanished. In the 1960s, Pearl absorbed the Goetz Brewing Company and made Country Club Malt Liquor one of Pearl's key products. When Country Club received its only product makeover a few years after the buyout, it gained the triple Xs in its logo. The Xs were situated in the top-center of the logo's crown. Country Club is still produced today, and it still carries the “xXx” mark of Pearl.

In 1961, the Pearl Brewing Company officially purchased the M. K. Goetz Brewing Company. Overall, the merger of the two companies was a success. Beers from both companies began to be produced at the two facilities. Goetz brewed all of the Pearl beers for easier distribution in the north, and Pearl produced Goetz's Country Club malt liquor. Country Club proved very successful for Pearl, and in fact is the only Goetz beer still in production by Pabst today under the Pearl Brewing Company name. The merger was not without its problems, but overall the transition occurred smoothly. Pearl took over as the corporate headquarters and some duplicate jobs were eliminated. The production side of Goetz remained intact, with Pearl treating Goetz employees just as they did the employees in San Antonio, like family.

With the end of Prohibition, so too came the end of the Alamo Foods Company. The company went back to their prior name: San Antonio Brewing Association (1933–1952). Most believed beer production would quickly return to the levels before the 1920 ban. However, Pearl's hard times were not over yet. In 1933, the nation was still deep in the grips of the Great Depression. Although most of the public would have loved to enjoy a Pearl, the financial situation of most made buying beer an unaffordable luxury. Through her skillful management, Emma Koehler kept the brewery afloat through the Depression, selling beer to those who could afford it and continuing many of the business ventures that had carried the brewery through Prohibition.

The Pearl Brewing Company (also known as the Pearl Brewery or just Pearl) was an American brewery, established in 1883 in Downtown San Antonio, Texas, USA. In 1985, Pearl's parent company purchased the Pabst Brewing Company and assumed the Pabst name. In 1999, the Pabst Brewing Company began transferring its production to Miller Brewing, on a contract basis, and closing all of its breweries. Pearl beer is still in production at Miller's Ft. Worth, Texas facility, but the Pearl Brewery in San Antonio was closed in 2001. Since then, the former brewery was purchased by Silver Ventures, Inc., which has made the property the crown jewel in revitalization efforts of southern Midtown and northern Downtown San Antonio.

Through the 1940s, operations at Pearl continued at a steady pace. Pearl was well established as the largest brewer in Texas, even though Lone Star beers had adopted the slogan proclaiming Lone Star the national beer of Texas. Pearl, as a company, did its part in the war effort, reducing can production to save on metals and producing generic beer for the troops abroad. At the end of the war, Pearl reestablished its aggressive growth drive and shifted marketing to focus on the emerging power buyer, the postwar housewife.

Rather than building a second brewery and potentially putting the company at risk, Pearl decided to purchase an existing brewery to increase production and the distribution network. Overall, buying out another brewery meant a larger initial investment, but the new brewery would be able to put out Pearl beer almost immediately and therefore help recoup costs more quickly. From a short list of potentials, the M. K. Goetz Brewing Company in St. Joseph, Missouri, seemed the perfect fit for Pearl's plans. Goetz's historic brewery would allow increased production levels and the ability to use the well-established distribution network to help Pearl reach untapped markets. In addition, Pearl gained access to the Goetz line of beers, from pilsners to malt liquors.

When the ban on beer ended in 1933, the brewery quickly began the production of Pearl and Texas Pride beer once again. Along with their return, the triple Xs returned, as well. The Xs were absent from advertising and the company logo for 15 years after Prohibition, but they held a prominent status on every single bottle. In the late 1940s, the brewery launched an advertising campaign stating the brewery's beers were the “Three xXx of Texas.” The triple Xs took a renewed and increased role at the brewery, but their growth in prominence did not end there.

With the start of Prohibition, the triple Xs disappeared as the company was forced to transform itself to try to survive. The brewery produced a wide variety of bottled drinks during the beer-less time, including near beer and root beer. Other companies picked up on the use of Xs on their near or root beers, the most famous of which being Triple XXX Root Beer, but Pearl (at that time Alamo Industries/Foods) never used the Xs on any of their products. The Xs were gone from the brewery during Prohibition, but not forgotten.

Production and market-wise, the 1950s were similar to the late 1940s. In the early '50s, the San Antonio Brewing Association felt they needed to increase the association of their number one product, Pearl lager beer, with the company itself. In marketing research, the association found that most consumers believed the San Antonio Brewing Association encompassed more than a single brewery; in fact, the public thought San Antonio Brewing Association referred to all brewing in San Antonio in general. Therefore, in 1952 the San Antonio Brewing Association changed its name to the Pearl Brewing Company (1952–present).
question_src: Je! Bia ya lulu bado iko katika uzalishaji?
pos_context_src:
Mnamo 1952, wakati Jumuiya ya San Antonio Brewing ilibadilisha jina lake kuwa Kampuni ya Pearl Brewing, Triple XS ilijiunga na jina la Pearl kama picha kubwa kwenye bidhaa na kampuni kwa ujumla. Triple XS walikuwa nyuma kwenye nembo ya kampuni na walitumiwa karibu na matangazo yote ya Pearl. XS ilishikilia jukumu hili muhimu hadi mwisho wa uzalishaji katika biashara ya pombe mnamo 2001, wakati kampuni ya biashara ya biashara ilifunga milango yake na nembo ya kampuni iliachwa. Kama utengenezaji wa lulu na taa ya lulu iliongezeka katika kituo cha Miller's Fort Worth, nembo za bidhaa zilibadilishwa tena. Lebo iliyosasishwa haitumii Triple XS, kwa hivyo sehemu muhimu ya kitambulisho cha kampuni imeondolewa kutoka kwa bia ya lulu. Walakini, pombe ya Klabu ya Nchi ya Pearl bado inaonyesha XXXS katika nembo yake.
Watu wengi wanajiuliza XS ilitoka wapi, na ni vipi waliwahi kutumika kwenye bia. Kwa kweli, Xs tatu kwa kweli ni mfumo wa viwango vya ubora. Mfumo huo hapo awali ulitumika Ulaya wakati wa karne ya 16. Wakati kifalme cha Ulaya kilisafiri ardhi zao na kutembelea kaunti za jirani, mjumbe wa kifalme alitumwa mbele ya chama rasmi. Kazi ya Courier ilikuwa sampuli ya bia huko Inns njiani. Ikiwa bia ilikuwa ya wastani tu, mjumbe angeashiria ishara ya nyumba ya wageni au mlango na X moja. Ikiwa bia ya nyumba ya wageni ilionekana kuwa nzuri, ishara au mlango ungepokea X mbili. Alama kwenye nyumba ya wageni ya Xs tatu ilimaanisha kuwa bia ya ndani ilikuwa bora, na lazima-kusimama kwa korti ya kifalme wakati walipitia.
neg_context_src: Triple XS ilipitishwa na Chama cha Brewing cha San Antonio kuonyesha mambo mawili: ubora wa juu wa bia zao, na kiburi ambacho wafanyikazi waliweka katika bidhaa zao. Triple XS inaweza kuwa imepita kutoka kwa kampuni na nembo za bia za Pearl, lakini haijatoweka kabisa. Mnamo miaka ya 1960, Pearl ilichukua Kampuni ya Goetz Brewing na kutengeneza pombe ya Klabu ya Malt moja ya bidhaa muhimu za Pearl. Wakati Club ya Nchi ilipokea bidhaa yake pekee ya bidhaa miaka michache baada ya ununuzi, ilipata Xs tatu katika nembo yake. XS ilikuwa katika kituo cha juu cha taji ya nembo. Klabu ya Nchi bado inazalishwa leo, na bado hubeba alama ya "XXX" ya Lulu.

Mnamo 1961, Kampuni ya Pearl Brewing ilinunua rasmi Kampuni ya M. K. Goetz Brewing. Kwa jumla, kuunganishwa kwa kampuni hizo mbili kulifanikiwa. Bia kutoka kampuni zote mbili zilianza kuzalishwa katika vituo hivyo viwili. Goetz alitengeneza bia zote za lulu kwa usambazaji rahisi kaskazini, na Pearl alizalisha pombe ya Klabu ya Goetz ya Malt. Klabu ya Nchi ilithibitisha kufanikiwa sana kwa Pearl, na kwa kweli ndio bia pekee ya Goetz bado katika uzalishaji na Pabst leo chini ya jina la Kampuni ya Pearl Brewing. Kuunganishwa haikuwa bila shida zake, lakini jumla ya mabadiliko yalitokea vizuri. Lulu alichukua madaraka kama makao makuu ya kampuni na kazi zingine mbili ziliondolewa. Upande wa uzalishaji wa Goetz ulibaki wazi, na Pearl akiwatibu wafanyikazi wa Goetz kama vile walivyofanya wafanyikazi huko San Antonio, kama familia.

Mwisho wa marufuku, ndivyo pia mwisho wa Kampuni ya Alamo Foods. Kampuni hiyo ilirudi kwa jina lao la hapo awali: San Antonio Brewing Association (1933-1952). Wengi waliamini uzalishaji wa bia ungerudi haraka katika viwango kabla ya marufuku ya 1920. Walakini, nyakati ngumu za Lulu hazijaisha bado. Mnamo mwaka wa 1933, taifa lilikuwa bado lina ndani ya Unyogovu Mkubwa. Ingawa umma mwingi ungependa kufurahiya lulu, hali ya kifedha ya kununua bia zaidi kuwa anasa isiyoweza kufikiwa. Kupitia usimamizi wake wa ustadi, Emma Koehler aliweka biashara ya pombe kupitia unyogovu, na kuuza bia kwa wale ambao wangeweza kumudu na kuendelea na shughuli nyingi za biashara ambazo zilikuwa zimebeba pombe kupitia makatazo.

Kampuni ya Pearl Brewing (pia inajulikana kama Pearl Brewery au Luch Pearl) ilikuwa pombe ya Amerika, iliyoanzishwa mnamo 1883 katika jiji la San Antonio, Texas, USA. Mnamo 1985, kampuni ya mzazi ya Pearl ilinunua Kampuni ya Pabst Brewing na kudhani jina la Pabst. Mnamo mwaka wa 1999, Kampuni ya Pabst Brewing ilianza kuhamisha uzalishaji wake kwa Miller Brewing, kwa msingi wa mkataba, na kufunga biashara yake yote. Bia ya lulu bado iko katika uzalishaji huko Miller's Ft. Thamani, Kituo cha Texas, lakini Brewery ya Pearl huko San Antonio ilifungwa mnamo 2001. Tangu wakati huo, pombe ya zamani ilinunuliwa na Silver Ventures, Inc., ambayo imefanya mali hiyo kuwa vito vya taji katika juhudi za kurekebisha za Midtown Kusini na kaskazini mwa San Antonio.

Kupitia miaka ya 1940, shughuli huko Pearl ziliendelea kwa kasi kubwa. Lulu ilianzishwa vizuri kama pombe kubwa zaidi huko Texas, ingawa bia ya Lone Star ilikuwa imepitisha kauli mbiu ya kutangaza nyota ya Lone Beer ya Kitaifa ya Texas. Lulu, kama kampuni, ilifanya sehemu yake katika juhudi za vita, kupunguza kunaweza kutengeneza ili kuokoa kwenye metali na kutengeneza bia ya generic kwa askari nje ya nchi. Mwisho wa vita, Pearl alianzisha tena ukuaji wake wa ukuaji wa nguvu na akabadilisha uuzaji ili kuzingatia mnunuzi wa nguvu anayeibuka, mama wa nyumbani wa baada ya vita.

Badala ya kujenga pombe ya pili na uwezekano wa kuweka kampuni hiyo hatarini, Pearl aliamua kununua biashara ya kuuza pombe ili kuongeza uzalishaji na mtandao wa usambazaji. Kwa jumla, kununua pombe nyingine ilimaanisha uwekezaji mkubwa wa awali, lakini kampuni mpya ya kuuza pombe ingeweza kuweka bia ya lulu karibu mara moja na kwa hivyo kusaidia kupata gharama haraka zaidi. Kutoka kwa orodha fupi ya uwezo, Kampuni ya M. K. Goetz Brewing huko St. Joseph, Missouri, ilionekana kuwa sawa kabisa kwa mipango ya Pearl. Biashara ya kihistoria ya Goetz ingeruhusu viwango vya uzalishaji na uwezo wa kutumia mtandao wa usambazaji uliowekwa vizuri kusaidia Lulu kufikia masoko yasiyokuwa na alama. Kwa kuongezea, Lulu alipata ufikiaji wa mstari wa bia wa Goetz, kutoka kwa pilsners hadi pombe ya malt.

Wakati marufuku ya bia ilimalizika mnamo 1933, pombe ya haraka ilianza uzalishaji wa Pearl na Texas Pride bia tena. Pamoja na kurudi kwao, Triple XS ilirudi, vile vile. XS haikuwepo kwa matangazo na nembo ya kampuni kwa miaka 15 baada ya kukataza, lakini walishikilia hadhi maarufu kwenye kila chupa moja. Mwishoni mwa miaka ya 1940, kampuni ya bia ilizindua kampeni ya matangazo ikisema bia ya pombe ilikuwa "tatu xxx ya Texas." Triple XS ilichukua jukumu mpya na kuongezeka kwa pombe, lakini ukuaji wao katika umaarufu haukuishia hapo.

Kwa kuanza kwa marufuku, XS ya tatu ilipotea wakati kampuni ililazimishwa kujibadilisha kujaribu kuishi. Bia hiyo ilizalisha vinywaji vingi vya chupa wakati wa bia-chini, pamoja na bia na bia ya mizizi. Kampuni zingine zilichukua matumizi ya XS kwenye bia zao za karibu au mizizi, maarufu zaidi ambayo kuwa bia ya mizizi ya XXX, lakini Pearl (wakati huo Alamo Viwanda/Chakula) hakuwahi kutumia XS kwenye bidhaa zao yoyote. XS ilikuwa imepita kutoka kwa pombe wakati wa kukataza, lakini haikusahaulika.

Uzalishaji na soko la busara, miaka ya 1950 ilikuwa sawa na mwishoni mwa miaka ya 1940. Katika miaka ya mapema ya 50, Chama cha Brewing cha San Antonio kiliona wanahitaji kuongeza ushirika wa bidhaa zao namba moja, Pearl Lager Beer, na kampuni yenyewe. Katika utafiti wa uuzaji, Chama kiligundua kuwa watumiaji wengi waliamini Chama cha San Antonio Brewing kilijumuisha zaidi ya pombe moja; Kwa kweli, umma walidhani Chama cha San Antonio Brewing kilirejelea pombe yote huko San Antonio kwa ujumla. Kwa hivyo, mnamo 1952 Chama cha San Antonio Brewing kilibadilisha jina lake kuwa Kampuni ya Pearl Brewing (1952 -sasa).

question_en: Does Shantou University have a graduate program?
pos_context_en: Under the auspice of the Li Ka Shing Foundation, STU has become one of the few universities in Mainland China that awards full scholarships to overseas exchange students. The university has established close academic ties with nearly 20 universities in such countries as the United States, United Kingdom, France, Japan, Russia, Australia and Germany, and launched exchange programs for undergraduates and graduate students.
neg_context_en: STU, a key comprehensive university under the provincial Project 211 program, was founded in 1981 with the approval of the State Council. As the only public university that receives long-term funding from the Li Ka Shing Foundation, it is jointly supported by the Ministry of Education, the Guangdong Provincial Government and the Li Ka Shing Foundation. The Li Ka Shing Foundation has committed and donated a total of HK$5.4 billion to support Shantou University (including the Cheung Kong Graduate School of Business), of which HK$4.2 billion has already been donated as of 2012.

Shantou University has 1 National Key Discipline, offers Cheung Kong Scholar Professorships, provides 3 Postdoctoral Programs, 1 Doctoral Program for first-level discipline and 25 Doctoral Programs for second-level disciplines, 10 Master’s Programs for first-level disciplines and 84 Master’s Programs for second-level disciplines, as well as 6 Professional master's degree Programs. It also has 1 National Key Laboratory and 5 Provincial Key Laboratories, 2 National Pilot Sites for Innovative Talents Training, 7 National Distinctive Programs, as well as 4 Provincial Branded Programs. The University now offers a comprehensive education system from bachelor to doctorate programs, including a 7-year master program in Clinical Medicine. Currently, STU has a staff of 5,113 and over 9,450 students and has nurtured nearly 70,000 graduates. The University consists of ten colleges and schools, namely, College of Liberal Arts, College of Sciences, College of Engineering, Medical College, Law School, Business School, Cheung Kong School of Art and Design, Cheung Kong School of Journalism and Communication, Graduate School, School of Continuing Education and Veritas College. It enrolls qualified students from all over the country (including Special Administrative Regions of Hong Kong and Macau, as well as Taiwan). STU has established centers and laboratories, which conduct basic scientific research and directly serve local economic development, including the Artificial Intelligence Manufacturing Technology Laboratory funded by the Ministry of Education, STU Division of National Key Discipline in Molecular Pathology, Research Institute of Tumor Pathology, Marine Biology Laboratory of Guangdong Province, Image-processing Technology Key Laboratory of Guangdong Province, CAD/CAM Center, Laboratory for Wind Tunnel Testing, Laboratory for Structural Engineering, FMS Laboratory and Institute for Artificial Intelligence and Pattern Recognition.

Shantou University (; abbreviated STU), a key comprehensive university under the provincial Project 211 program in Guangdong, was founded in 1981 with the approval of the State Council. It is the only public university that receives funding from the Li Ka Shing Foundation. It is also supported by the Ministry of Education (MOE), the Guangdong Provincial Government and the Li Ka Shing Foundation. STU is located in Shantou, a city in Southeast China.

The English Language Center (ELC) was founded in 2003. The ELC provides English training for all students at Shantou University's main campus. The core of its program consists of a two-year series of required courses. The ELC also offers elective courses which are aimed at more specialized skills (debate, speech, academic writing, etc.). The ELC organizes many co-curricular activities.

In 2002, STU implemented a credit system similar to those that have been proved successful for universities in developed countries, which provides students greater opportunities to choose a wider range of elective courses. This reform will provide STI students with more freedom in selecting courses and may lead to the establishment of a new interdisciplinary curriculum.
In May 2002, the English Language Center (ELC) was set up and the “English Enhancement Program” was initiated to reform English language teaching designed for university-wide students who would like to pass CET.The objective of the program is to make the students better at communication, critical thinking and innovation with the use of English. The measure is to teach the students how to think and communicate in English through teaching and learning exchanges, and help the students develop their skills in speaking, listening, reading and writing, etc. by organizing extra-curricular activities involving the use of English.

With the reference to Columbia University’s and University of Missouri’s programs, the School develops a “fundamental but practical” curriculum, with international and practice-oriented features. It adopts the worldwide used curriculum system of “Platform Module” and offers small-group classes, English-immersed, and bilingual courses. It is also developing a four-year discipline in Journalistic English. The Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist Peter Arnett has taught at the school since 2007.

Based on the international approach of education called PLEASE (Professor, Language, Edited textbook, Activities, Disciplines and Employment), the School adopts bilingual and English immersed teaching modes for various programs including Alternative Dispute Resolution (ADR), which received the accreditation of the Hong Kong International Administration Centre. The curriculum for the program of Public Administration is designed to help develop professionals for international public administration projects.

In 2012, the programs of Chemistry and Clinical Medicine are listed in the global top 1% of programs based on ESI（Essential Science Indicators）data, fully demonstrating the favorable results of the “211 Project”.

STU continued to promote its work concerning international accreditation for its undergraduate programs. In 2011, the Business School’s BBA (Bachelor of Business Administration) program was granted EFMD Programme Accreditation System (EPAS) accreditation, the first university in Asia to pass this kind of accreditation.
question_src: Je! Chuo Kikuu cha Shantou kina mpango wa kuhitimu?
pos_context_src: Chini ya mpango wa Li Ka Shing Foundation, Stu imekuwa moja ya vyuo vikuu vichache nchini China ambayo inatoa tuzo kamili kwa wanafunzi wa kubadilishana nje ya nchi. Chuo kikuu kimeanzisha uhusiano wa karibu wa masomo na vyuo vikuu karibu 20 katika nchi kama vile Merika, Uingereza, Ufaransa, Japan, Urusi, Australia na Ujerumani, na kuzindua mipango ya kubadilishana kwa wahitimu na wanafunzi waliohitimu.
neg_context_src: Stu, chuo kikuu muhimu chini ya mpango wa Mradi wa Mkoa 211, ilianzishwa mnamo 1981 na idhini ya Halmashauri ya Jimbo. Kama chuo kikuu pekee cha umma ambacho kinapokea ufadhili wa muda mrefu kutoka kwa Li Ka Shing Foundation, inasaidiwa kwa pamoja na Wizara ya Elimu, Serikali ya Mkoa wa Guangdong na Li Ka Shing Foundation. Shirika la Li Ka Shing limejitolea na kutoa jumla ya HK $ 5.4 bilioni kusaidia Chuo Kikuu cha Shantou (pamoja na Shule ya Biashara ya Cheung Kong), ambayo HK $ 4.2 bilioni tayari imetolewa mnamo 2012.

Chuo Kikuu cha Shantou kina nidhamu 1 ya kitaifa, inatoa udhamini wa wasomi wa Cheung Kong, hutoa mipango 3 ya postdoctoral, mpango 1 wa udaktari wa nidhamu ya kiwango cha kwanza na mipango 25 ya udaktari ya nidhamu za kiwango cha pili, mipango 10 ya Master ya taaluma za kiwango cha kwanza na mipango ya 84 ya utaalam wa kiwango cha pili, na pia mipango 6 ya Utaalam. Pia ina maabara muhimu ya kitaifa na maabara muhimu ya mkoa 5, tovuti 2 za majaribio za kitaifa kwa mafunzo ya vipaji vya ubunifu, mipango 7 ya kitaifa, na pia mipango 4 ya mkoa. Chuo kikuu sasa kinatoa mfumo kamili wa elimu kutoka kwa Shahada hadi mipango ya udaktari, pamoja na mpango wa miaka 7 katika dawa ya kliniki. Hivi sasa, STU ina wafanyikazi wa wanafunzi 5,113 na zaidi ya 9,450 na amekua wahitimu karibu 70,000. Chuo kikuu kina vyuo na shule kumi, ambazo ni, Chuo cha Sanaa ya Liberal, Chuo cha Sayansi, Chuo cha Uhandisi, Chuo cha Matibabu, Shule ya Sheria, Shule ya Biashara, Cheung Kong Shule ya Sanaa na Ubunifu, Cheung Kong Shule ya Uandishi wa Habari na Mawasiliano, Shule ya Uhitimu, Shule ya Kuendelea na Chuo cha Veritas. Inasajili wanafunzi waliohitimu kutoka nchi nzima (pamoja na mikoa maalum ya utawala ya Hong Kong na Macau, na pia Taiwan). Stu imeanzisha vituo na maabara, ambayo hufanya utafiti wa kimsingi wa kisayansi na hutumikia moja kwa moja maendeleo ya uchumi wa ndani, pamoja na maabara ya teknolojia ya usanifu wa akili iliyofadhiliwa na Wizara ya Elimu, STU Idara ya Nidhamu ya Kitaifa katika ugonjwa wa Masi, Taasisi ya Utafiti ya Patholojia ya Tumor, Maabara ya Ufundi wa Majini, Maabara ya Uandishi wa Uchunguzi wa Kihindi, Maabara ya Uchunguzi wa Kamong, Maabara ya Guang ya Ajira ya Guang ya Guang, Camping Center. Maabara ya Uhandisi wa Miundo, Maabara ya FMS na Taasisi ya Ushauri wa bandia na Utambuzi wa Mfano.

Chuo Kikuu cha Shantou (; kifupi cha Stu), chuo kikuu muhimu chini ya mpango wa Mradi wa Mkoa wa 211 huko Guangdong, ulianzishwa mnamo 1981 na idhini ya Halmashauri ya Jimbo. Ni chuo kikuu pekee cha umma kinachopokea ufadhili kutoka kwa Li Ka Shing Foundation. Inasaidiwa pia na Wizara ya Elimu (MOE), serikali ya mkoa wa Guangdong na Li Ka Shing Foundation. Stu iko katika Shantou, mji katika kusini mashariki mwa Uchina.

Kituo cha Lugha cha Kiingereza (ELC) kilianzishwa mnamo 2003. ELC hutoa mafunzo ya Kiingereza kwa wanafunzi wote katika chuo kikuu cha Shantou. Msingi wa mpango wake una safu ya miaka mbili ya kozi zinazohitajika. ELC pia hutoa kozi za uchaguzi ambazo zinalenga ustadi maalum (mjadala, hotuba, uandishi wa kitaaluma, nk). ELC hupanga shughuli nyingi za mitaala.

Mnamo 2002, STU ilitekeleza mfumo wa mkopo sawa na ule ambao umethibitishwa kufanikiwa kwa vyuo vikuu katika nchi zilizoendelea, ambayo hutoa wanafunzi fursa kubwa za kuchagua kozi nyingi za uchaguzi. Mabadiliko haya yatawapa wanafunzi wa STI uhuru zaidi katika kuchagua kozi na inaweza kusababisha uanzishwaji wa mtaala mpya wa kimataifa.
Mnamo Mei 2002, Kituo cha Lugha cha Kiingereza (ELC) kilianzishwa na "Programu ya Uimarishaji wa Kiingereza" ilianzishwa ili kurekebisha Mafundisho ya Lugha ya Kiingereza iliyoundwa kwa wanafunzi wa vyuo vikuu ambao wangependa kupitisha CET. Kusudi la mpango huo ni kuwafanya wanafunzi kuwa bora katika mawasiliano, mawazo mazito na uvumbuzi na utumiaji wa Kiingereza. Hatua hiyo ni kufundisha wanafunzi jinsi ya kufikiria na kuwasiliana kwa Kiingereza kupitia kubadilishana na kujifunza, na kusaidia wanafunzi kukuza ujuzi wao katika kuongea, kusikiliza, kusoma na kuandika, nk kwa kuandaa shughuli za ziada za mitaala zinazojumuisha utumiaji wa Kiingereza.

Kwa kumbukumbu ya mipango ya Chuo Kikuu cha Columbia na Chuo Kikuu cha Missouri, shule inakuza mtaala "wa msingi lakini wa vitendo", na sifa za kimataifa na zenye mwelekeo. Inachukua mfumo wa mtaala uliotumiwa ulimwenguni wa "moduli ya jukwaa" na hutoa madarasa ya kikundi kidogo, kozi za Kiingereza, na za lugha mbili. Pia inaendeleza nidhamu ya miaka minne katika Kiingereza cha uandishi wa habari. Mwandishi wa habari anayeshinda tuzo ya Pulitzer Peter Arnett amefundisha shuleni tangu 2007.

Kwa msingi wa mbinu ya kimataifa ya elimu inayoitwa tafadhali (profesa, lugha, maandishi yaliyohaririwa, shughuli, taaluma na ajira), shule inachukua njia mbili za kufundishia za lugha mbili na Kiingereza kwa mipango mbali mbali ikiwa ni pamoja na Azimio la Mzozo Mbadala (ADR), ambayo ilipokea idhini ya Kituo cha Utawala cha Kimataifa cha Hong Kong. Mtaala wa mpango wa utawala wa umma umeundwa kusaidia kukuza wataalamu wa miradi ya kimataifa ya utawala wa umma.

Mnamo mwaka wa 2012, mipango ya kemia na dawa ya kliniki imeorodheshwa katika kiwango cha juu cha 1% cha mipango kulingana na Viashiria vya Sayansi muhimu） data, inayoonyesha kikamilifu matokeo mazuri ya "mradi 211".

Stu iliendelea kukuza kazi yake kuhusu idhini ya kimataifa kwa mipango yake ya shahada ya kwanza. Mnamo mwaka wa 2011, mpango wa shule ya biashara ya BBA (Shahada ya Utawala wa Biashara) ulipewa idhini ya Programu ya EFMD (EPAS), chuo kikuu cha kwanza huko Asia kupitisha aina hii ya idhini.
report_src: Ndiyo, Chuo Kikuu cha Shantou kina mpango wa kuhitimu, kwani kimelianzisha rasmi “mipango ya kubadilishana kwa wahitimu na wanafunzi waliohitimu” kupitia ushirikiano na takriban vyuo vikuu 20 kutoka nchi zikiwemo Marekani, Uingereza, Ufaransa, Japani, Urusi, Australia na Ujerumani, hatua inayolenga kuwapa wahitimu fursa za kitaaluma na kimataifa baada ya kumaliza masomo yao ya kwanza [1].

question_en: Can you cut a nerve fiber?
pos_context_en: Surgery can be done in case a nerve has become cut or otherwise divided. Recovery of a nerve after surgical repair depends mainly on the age of the patient. Young children can recover close-to-normal nerve function. In contrast, a patient over 60 years old with a cut nerve in the hand would expect to recover only protective sensation, that is, the ability to distinguish hot/cold or sharp/dull. Many other factors also affect nerve recovery. The use of autologous nerve grafting procedures that involve redirection of regenerative donor nerve fibers into the graft conduit has been successful in restoring target muscle function. Localized delivery of soluble neurotrophic factors may help promote the rate of axon regeneration observed within these graft conduits.
neg_context_en: A neurolytic block is a form of nerve block involving the deliberate injury of a nerve by freezing or heating ("neurotomy") or the application of chemicals ("neurolysis"). These interventions cause degeneration of the nerve's fibers and temporary (a few months, usually) interference with the transmission of nerve signals. In these procedures, the thin protective layer around the nerve fiber, the basal lamina, is preserved so that, as a damaged fiber regrows, it travels within its basal lamina tube and connects with the correct loose end, and function may be restored. Surgical cutting of a nerve (neurectomy), severs these basal lamina tubes, and without them to channel the regrowing fibers to their lost connections, over time a painful neuroma or deafferentation pain may develop. This is why the neurolytic is usually preferred over the surgical block.

A neurolytic block is the deliberate injury of a nerve by the application of chemicals (in which case the procedure is called "neurolysis") or physical agents such as freezing or heating ("neurotomy"). These interventions cause degeneration of the nerve's fibers and temporary interference with the transmission of pain signals. In these procedures, the thin protective layer around the nerve fiber, the basal lamina, is preserved so that, as a damaged fiber regrows, it travels within its basal lamina tube and connects with the correct loose end, and function may be restored. Surgically cutting a nerve severs these basal lamina tubes, and without them to channel the regrowing fibers to their lost connections, a painful neuroma or deafferentation pain may develop. This is why the neurolytic is preferred over the surgical block.

Epineurial repair is a common surgical procedure to repair a nerve laceration via the epineurium, the connective tissue surrounding nerve fibers originating from the spinal cord. It is intended to allow the restoration of sensory function. When a nerve is lacerated or cut, repair is done by sewing the cut ends together through the epineurium to increase the potential of the proximal part growing correctly along the route the degrading distal part leaves behind. Usual sensation and mobility will not be an immediate result because nerves grow at a rate of approximately 1 millimeter per day, so it will take a few months to notice the final outcome. Research in use of nerve grafts and nerve growth factors is being done to speed recovery time.

With this discovery, the team set out to perform nerve transfer surgery specifically aimed to reinnervate sensory feedback. A piece of skin near or over the targeted muscle was denervated, thus the afferent nerve fibers were allowed to reinnervate the skin.
In a case of a woman patient with left arm amputation at the humeral neck, the supraclavicular sensory nerve was cut, the proximal end was ligated to prevent regeneration and reinnervation, and the distal end was coapted end-to-side to the ulnar nerve. The intercostobrachial cutaneous nerve was treated with the same method, with the distal end coapted to the median nerve.

Surgery can be done in case a peripheral nerve has become cut or otherwise divided. This is called peripheral nerve reconstruction. The injured nerve is identified and exposed so that normal nerve tissue can be examined above and below the level of injury, usually with magnification, using either loupes or an operating microscope. If a large segment of nerve is harmed, as can happen in a crush or stretch injury, the nerve will need to be exposed over a larger area. Injured portions of the nerve are removed. The cut nerve endings are then carefully reapproximated using very small sutures. The nerve repair must be covered by healthy tissue, which can be as simple as closing the skin or it can require moving skin or muscle to provide healthy padded coverage over the nerve. The type of anesthesia used depends on the complexity of the injury. A surgical tourniquet is almost always used.

Neurectomy is a surgical procedure in which a nerve or section of a nerve is severed or removed. Cutting a sensory nerve severs its basal lamina tubes, and without them to channel the regrowing fibers to their lost connections, over time a painful neuroma or deafferentation pain may develop. This is why the neurolytic is usually preferred over the surgical sensory nerve block. This surgery is performed in rare cases of severe chronic pain where no other treatments have been successful, and for other conditions such as involuntary twitching and excessive blushing or sweating.

Neurectomy involves cutting a nerve, and is (rarely) used in patients with short life expectancy who are unsuitable for drug therapy due to ineffectiveness or intolerance. The dorsal root or dorsal root ganglion (that carry mostly sensory signals) may be usefully targeted (called rhizotomy); with the dorsal root ganglion possibly the more effective target because some sensory fibers enter the spinal cord from the dorsal root ganglion via the "ventral" (motor) root, and these would not be interrupted by dorsal root neurectomy. Because nerves often carry both sensory and motor fibers, motor impairment is a possible side effect of neurectomy. A common result of this procedure is "deafferentation pain" where, 6–9 months after surgery, pain returns at greater intensity.

After the sensory nerves are exposed, each sensory nerve root is divided into 3-5 rootlets. Each rootlet is tested with electromyography, which records electrical patterns in muscles. Rootlets are ranked from 1 (mild) to 4 (severe) for spasticity. The severely abnormal rootlets are cut. This technique is repeated for rootlets between spinal nerves L2 and S2. Half of the L1 dorsal root fibers are cut without EMG testing.

Ephaptic transmission is when two nerves communicate with each other via an artificial synapse between nerves. Healthy peripheral nerves are insulated with a myelin sheath that helps to both enhance electric transmission and to prevent cross-talk between parallel nerves. After a lesion, it has been observed that regenerating nerves might not be myelinated effectively. Consequently, the two nerve fibers can come into contact and provide a means for an impulse to be directly conducted through the nerve membrane. An analogy for this is having two uninsulated electrical wires placed adjacent to each other. Thus, the two nerves are able to “cross-talk” and send action potentials in both directions.
question_src: Je! Unaweza kukata nyuzi ya ujasiri?
pos_context_src: Upasuaji unaweza kufanywa ikiwa ujasiri umekatwa au umegawanywa vingine. Kupona kwa ujasiri baada ya ukarabati wa upasuaji inategemea sana umri wa mgonjwa. Watoto wadogo wanaweza kupona kazi ya karibu na ya kawaida. Kwa kulinganisha, mgonjwa zaidi ya miaka 60 na ujasiri uliokatwa mikononi angetarajia kupata hisia za kinga tu, ambayo ni, uwezo wa kutofautisha moto/baridi au mkali/wepesi. Sababu zingine nyingi pia zinaathiri kupona kwa ujasiri. Matumizi ya michakato ya kupandikiza ujasiri wa neva ambayo inahusisha uelekezaji wa nyuzi za wafadhili wa kuzaliwa upya kwenye mfereji wa ufisadi umefanikiwa katika kurejesha kazi ya misuli inayolenga. Uwasilishaji wa ndani wa sababu za mumunyifu za neurotrophic zinaweza kusaidia kukuza kiwango cha kuzaliwa upya kwa axon inayozingatiwa ndani ya njia hizi za ujanja.
neg_context_src: Kizuizi cha neurolytic ni aina ya kizuizi cha ujasiri kinachojumuisha jeraha la makusudi la ujasiri kwa kufungia au inapokanzwa ("neurotomy") au matumizi ya kemikali ("neurolysis"). Uingiliaji huu husababisha kuzorota kwa nyuzi za ujasiri na muda mfupi (miezi michache, kawaida) kuingiliwa na maambukizi ya ishara za ujasiri. Katika taratibu hizi, safu nyembamba ya kinga karibu na nyuzi za mishipa, lamina ya basal, imehifadhiwa ili, kama nyuzi iliyoharibiwa, inasafiri ndani ya bomba lake la lamina ya basal na inaunganisha na mwisho sahihi, na kazi inaweza kurejeshwa. Kukata kwa upasuaji wa ujasiri (neurectomy), huweka mirija hii ya lamina ya basal, na bila wao kugeuza nyuzi zinazoweza kurudi kwenye miunganisho yao iliyopotea, baada ya muda neuroma chungu au maumivu ya deafferentation yanaweza kuibuka. Hii ndio sababu neurolytic kawaida hupendelea juu ya kizuizi cha upasuaji.

Kizuizi cha neurolytic ni jeraha la makusudi la ujasiri na matumizi ya kemikali (kwa hali ambayo utaratibu huitwa "neurolysis") au mawakala wa mwili kama kufungia au kupokanzwa ("neurotomy"). Uingiliaji huu husababisha kuzorota kwa nyuzi za ujasiri na kuingiliwa kwa muda na maambukizi ya ishara za maumivu. Katika taratibu hizi, safu nyembamba ya kinga karibu na nyuzi za mishipa, lamina ya basal, imehifadhiwa ili, kama nyuzi iliyoharibiwa, inasafiri ndani ya bomba lake la lamina ya basal na inaunganisha na mwisho sahihi, na kazi inaweza kurejeshwa. Kukata kwa neva kwa mishipa hizi za mishipa ya lamina ya basal, na bila wao kugeuza nyuzi zinazoweza kurudi tena kwenye miunganisho yao iliyopotea, maumivu ya neuroma au maumivu ya deafferentation yanaweza kuibuka. Hii ndio sababu neurolytic inapendelea juu ya kizuizi cha upasuaji.

Urekebishaji wa Epineurial ni utaratibu wa kawaida wa upasuaji wa kukarabati laceration ya ujasiri kupitia epineurium, tishu zinazojumuisha zinazozunguka nyuzi za ujasiri zinazotokana na kamba ya mgongo. Imekusudiwa kuruhusu urejesho wa kazi ya hisia. Wakati ujasiri unakatwa au kukatwa, ukarabati hufanywa kwa kushona kata hukatwa pamoja kupitia epineurium ili kuongeza uwezo wa sehemu ya karibu inayokua kwa usahihi njiani sehemu ya uharibifu ya nyuma huacha nyuma. Hisia za kawaida na uhamaji hazitakuwa matokeo ya haraka kwa sababu mishipa inakua kwa kiwango cha takriban milimita 1 kwa siku, kwa hivyo itachukua miezi michache kugundua matokeo ya mwisho. Utafiti katika utumiaji wa ujanja wa ujasiri na sababu za ukuaji wa ujasiri unafanywa kwa wakati wa kupona haraka.

Kwa ugunduzi huu, timu ilianza kufanya upasuaji wa uhamishaji wa ujasiri uliolenga kurejesha maoni ya hisia. Sehemu ya ngozi karibu au juu ya misuli iliyolengwa ilibadilishwa, kwa hivyo nyuzi za ujasiri wa ushirika ziliruhusiwa kurejesha ngozi.
Katika kesi ya mwanamke mgonjwa aliye na kukatwa kwa mkono wa kushoto kwenye shingo ya unyevu, ujasiri wa hisia ya juu ulikatwa, mwisho wa mwisho ulipigwa ili kuzuia kuzaliwa upya na uhuishaji, na mwisho wa distal uliwekwa mwisho kwa upande wa ulnar. Mishipa ya intercostobrachial cutaneous ilitibiwa kwa njia ile ile, na mwisho wa distal uliowekwa kwa ujasiri wa wastani.

Upasuaji unaweza kufanywa ikiwa ujasiri wa pembeni umekatwa au umegawanywa vingine. Hii inaitwa ujenzi wa ujasiri wa pembeni. Mishipa iliyojeruhiwa hutambuliwa na kufunuliwa ili tishu za kawaida za ujasiri ziweze kuchunguzwa hapo juu na chini ya kiwango cha kuumia, kawaida na ukuzaji, kwa kutumia vibanda au darubini inayofanya kazi. Ikiwa sehemu kubwa ya ujasiri imeumizwa, kama inavyoweza kutokea katika jeraha la kuponda au kunyoosha, ujasiri utahitaji kufunuliwa juu ya eneo kubwa. Sehemu zilizojeruhiwa za ujasiri huondolewa. Mwisho wa mishipa iliyokatwa basi hufanywa tena kwa uangalifu kwa kutumia suture ndogo sana. Urekebishaji wa ujasiri lazima kufunikwa na tishu zenye afya, ambayo inaweza kuwa rahisi kama kufunga ngozi au inaweza kuhitaji ngozi ya kusonga au misuli kutoa chanjo yenye afya juu ya ujasiri. Aina ya anesthesia inayotumiwa inategemea ugumu wa jeraha. Mshindi wa upasuaji karibu hutumika kila wakati.

Neurectomy ni utaratibu wa upasuaji ambao ujasiri au sehemu ya ujasiri hutolewa au kuondolewa. Kukata ujasiri wa hisia huweka zilizopo zake za msingi za lamina, na bila wao kuelekeza nyuzi zinazorudisha nyuma kwa viunganisho vyao vilivyopotea, baada ya muda maumivu ya maumivu ya neuroma au maumivu ya deafferentation yanaweza kuibuka. Hii ndio sababu neurolytic kawaida hupendelea juu ya kizuizi cha ujasiri wa hisia. Upasuaji huu unafanywa katika visa adimu vya maumivu sugu sugu ambapo hakuna matibabu mengine ambayo yamefanikiwa, na kwa hali zingine kama vile kupunguka kwa hiari na blush nyingi au jasho.

Neurectomy inajumuisha kukata ujasiri, na ni (mara chache) hutumika kwa wagonjwa walio na umri mfupi wa kuishi ambao hawafai kwa tiba ya dawa kwa sababu ya kutofanikiwa au kutovumiliana. Mizizi ya dorsal au genge la mizizi ya dorsal (ambayo hubeba ishara nyingi za hisia) inaweza kulengwa kwa urahisi (inayoitwa rhizotomy); Na genge la mizizi ya dorsal labda lengo bora zaidi kwa sababu nyuzi zingine za hisia huingia kwenye kamba ya mgongo kutoka kwa genge la mizizi ya dorsal kupitia mzizi wa "ventral" (motor), na hizi hazingeingiliwa na neurectomy ya mizizi ya dorsal. Kwa sababu mishipa mara nyingi hubeba nyuzi za hisia na motor, kuharibika kwa gari ni athari inayowezekana ya neurectomy. Matokeo ya kawaida ya utaratibu huu ni "maumivu ya deafferentation" ambapo, miezi 6-9 baada ya upasuaji, maumivu yanarudi kwa kiwango kikubwa.

Baada ya mishipa ya hisia kufunuliwa, kila mzizi wa ujasiri wa hisia umegawanywa katika mizizi 3-5. Kila mzizi hupimwa na elektroni, ambayo inarekodi mifumo ya umeme kwenye misuli. Mizizi imeorodheshwa kutoka 1 (laini) hadi 4 (kali) kwa spasticity. Mizizi isiyo ya kawaida hukatwa. Mbinu hii inarudiwa kwa mizizi kati ya mishipa ya mgongo L2 na S2. Nusu ya nyuzi za mizizi ya L1 hukatwa bila upimaji wa EMG.

Uwasilishaji wa Ephaptic ni wakati mishipa miwili inawasiliana kupitia njia ya bandia kati ya mishipa. Mishipa ya pembeni yenye afya ni maboksi na sheath ya myelin ambayo husaidia kuongeza maambukizi ya umeme na kuzuia mazungumzo ya msalaba kati ya mishipa inayofanana. Baada ya lesion, imeonekana kuwa mishipa ya kuzaliwa upya inaweza kuwa haifai kwa ufanisi. Kwa hivyo, nyuzi mbili za ujasiri zinaweza kuwasiliana na kutoa njia ya msukumo kufanywa moja kwa moja kupitia membrane ya ujasiri. Mfano wa hii ni kuwa na waya mbili za umeme ambazo hazikuwekwa karibu na kila mmoja. Kwa hivyo, mishipa hiyo miwili ina uwezo wa "kuongea" na kutuma uwezo wa vitendo katika pande zote mbili.
report_src: Ndiyo, nyuzi za ujasiri zinaweza kukatwa kwa upasuaji, jambo linalofanywa pale ambapo ujasiri umekatika au kugawanyika vibaya, na baadaye hutengenezwa ili kuruhusu kuzaliwa upya kwa axoni na kurejesha kazi ya misuli lengwa [1].
all_claims: Ndiyo, nyuzi za ujasiri zinaweza kukatwa kwa upasuaji, jambo linalofanywa pale ambapo ujasiri umekatika au kugawanyika vibaya, na baadaye hutengenezwa ili kuruhusu kuzaliwa upya kwa axoni na kurejesha kazi ya misuli lengwa [1].

question_en: How large is the Sanjay Gandhi National Park?
pos_context_en: The park was further expanded to a total area of 82.25 square km in 1981. The park was renamed Sanjay Gandhi National Park in 1996, after Sanjay Gandhi, the son of former Prime Minister Indira Gandhi. The same year, some forests from the Thane division were merged into the park, further expanding its total area to 103.84 square km.
neg_context_en: The "karvi" shrub, as it is locally called in the Marathi language, sometimes also spelled as "karvy" in English, only blooms once in eight years in a mass flowering covering the forest floor in a lavender blush. It grows in abundance in the Western Ghats hills near Mumbai including throughout the Sanjay Gandhi National Park as in other parts of its natural range. In Sanjay Gandhi National Park its latest blooming took place in 2008, and it is scheduled to bloom here again in 2016. Termed by nature enthusiasts as 'nature's miracle' its maximum bloom can be seen on some of the inner paths and trails that lie undisturbed in the park. It survives best on the vast sloping expanses of the hillsides, with the Kanheri caves area of the park being one of the best places to observe large areas of blooms.

Parts of the article referred to from the Times of India article dated 5 July 2004
Kasambe, R. (2012): Butterfly fauna of the Sanjay Gandhi National Park and Mumbai. Bionotes. 14 (3): 76–80

The rich flora and fauna of Sanjay Gandhi National Park attracts more than 2 million visitors every year. Tourists also enjoy visiting the 2400-year-old Kanheri caves sculpted out of the rocky cliffs which lie within the park.

Sanjay Gandhi National Park is said to be one of the most visited national parks in Asia. According to estimates, around 2 million visitors visit this park annually. Collection at the gates in November 2004 touched .

Seven Buddhist caves, older than Kanheri Caves have also been discovered very recently. Detailed exploration and documentation is awaited from The Archaeological Survey of India.
The park's main entrance is located in Borivali, east of Borivali railway station, which is approximately north of southern tip of Mumbai city, with suburban trains running every 5 minutes. From Borivali station, one can walk or hire an auto rickshaw to reach Sanjay Gandhi National Park. It is well connected with all parts of Mumbai and Maharashtra by road. The Western Express Highway (NH 8) passes by the park entrance. Buses are available on holidays and Sundays from Mumbai to the park. Also, chartered vehicles can be hired for groups to visit the park.

Sanjay Gandhi National Park is an protected area near Mumbai in Maharashtra State in India. It was formerly known as Borivali National Park.
It is notable as one of the major national parks existing within a metropolis limit and is one of the most visited parks in the world.

The park is home to a number of endangered species of flora and fauna. The forest area of the park houses over 1,000 plant species, 251 species of migratory, land and water birds, 50,000 species of insects and 40 species of mammals. In addition, the park also provides shelter to 38 species of reptiles, 9 species of amphibians, 150 species of butterflies and a large variety of fish.

The Sanjay Gandhi National Park area has a long written history dating back to the 4th century BCE. In ancient India, Sopara and Kalyan were two ports in the vicinity that traded with ancient civilisations such as Greece and Mesopotamia. The land route between these two ports was partially through this forest.

There are several public walking trails in the park. The popular "Ashok Van" trail winds up through thick forest to a dense cluster of Ashoka trees that are a welcome half way resting spot. One can return by "Gaumukh" trail to an open place of volcanic rock to return to the Kanheri caves. A more ambitious route is the 'View Point' trail to the highest point in Mumbai, for a panoramic view of the city and a view of the three lakes of the city – Tulsi Lake, Vihar Lake and Powai Lake. New jungle trails at Sanjay Gandhi National Park allow visitors to see the more unexplored parts of the park. They are the "Shilonda Trail", the "Malad Trail", and the "Yeoor Trail". Trails access cost is Rs. 25 per person.
question_src: Hifadhi ya Kitaifa ya Sanjay Gandhi ni kubwa kiasi gani?
pos_context_title_src: Hifadhi ya Kitaifa ya Sanjay Gandhi
pos_context_src: Hifadhi hiyo iliongezwa zaidi hadi eneo la jumla la kilomita za mraba 82.25 mnamo 1981. Hifadhi hiyo ilipewa jina la Hifadhi ya Kitaifa ya Sanjay Gandhi mnamo 1996, baada ya Sanjay Gandhi, mtoto wa Waziri Mkuu wa zamani Indira Gandhi. Mwaka huo huo, misitu kadhaa kutoka Idara ya Thane iliunganishwa ndani ya uwanja huo, ikipanua zaidi eneo lake hadi kilomita za mraba 103.84.
neg_context_title_src: Hifadhi ya Kitaifa ya Sanjay Gandhi

neg_context_src: Shada ya "Karvi", kama inavyoitwa ndani ya lugha ya Marathi, wakati mwingine pia imeandikwa kama "Karvy" kwa Kiingereza, blooms mara moja tu katika miaka nane katika maua yaliyofunika sakafu ya msitu kwenye blush ya lavender. Inakua kwa wingi katika vilima vya magharibi vya Ghats karibu na Mumbai ikiwa ni pamoja na katika Hifadhi ya Kitaifa ya Sanjay Gandhi kama katika sehemu zingine za asili yake. Katika Hifadhi ya Kitaifa ya Sanjay Gandhi ya hivi karibuni ilifanyika mnamo 2008, na imepangwa Bloom hapa tena mnamo 2016. Iliyotajwa na washiriki wa maumbile kama 'Muujiza wa Mazingira' Bloom yake ya juu inaweza kuonekana kwenye njia zingine za ndani na njia ambazo hazina msingi katika uwanja huo. Inakaa vizuri kwenye eneo kubwa la mteremko wa vilima, na eneo la mapango ya Kanheri kuwa moja wapo ya maeneo bora ya kuona maeneo makubwa ya blooms.

Sehemu za kifungu hicho zilizotajwa kutoka kwa jarida la Times of India la tarehe 5 Julai 2004
Kasambe, R. (2012): Fauna ya kipepeo ya Hifadhi ya Kitaifa ya Sanjay Gandhi na Mumbai. Bionotes. 14 (3): 76-80

Flora tajiri na fauna ya Hifadhi ya Kitaifa ya Sanjay Gandhi inavutia wageni zaidi ya milioni 2 kila mwaka. Watalii pia wanafurahia kutembelea mapango ya Kanheri ya miaka 2400 yaliyopigwa nje ya miamba ya mwamba ambayo iko ndani ya uwanja huo.

Hifadhi ya Kitaifa ya Sanjay Gandhi inasemekana kuwa moja ya mbuga za kitaifa zilizotembelewa zaidi huko Asia. Kulingana na makadirio, wageni karibu milioni 2 hutembelea mbuga hii kila mwaka. Mkusanyiko katika Gates mnamo Novemba 2004 uligusa.

Mapango saba ya Wabudhi, wakubwa kuliko mapango ya Kanheri pia yamegunduliwa hivi karibuni. Uchunguzi wa kina na nyaraka zinasubiriwa kutoka kwa Utafiti wa Archaeological wa India.
Milango kuu ya mbuga iko katika Borivali, mashariki mwa Kituo cha Reli cha Borivali, ambayo ni takriban kaskazini mwa ncha ya kusini ya Jiji la Mumbai, na treni za miji zinazoendesha kila dakika 5. Kutoka kituo cha Borivali, mtu anaweza kutembea au kuajiri rickshaw ya auto kufikia Hifadhi ya Kitaifa ya Sanjay Gandhi. Imeunganishwa vizuri na sehemu zote za Mumbai na Maharashtra na barabara. Barabara kuu ya Western Express (NH 8) hupita karibu na mlango wa Hifadhi. Mabasi yanapatikana kwenye likizo na Jumapili kutoka Mumbai hadi Hifadhi. Pia, magari ya chartered yanaweza kuajiriwa kwa vikundi kutembelea mbuga hiyo.

Hifadhi ya Kitaifa ya Sanjay Gandhi ni eneo linalolindwa karibu na Mumbai katika jimbo la Maharashtra nchini India. Hapo zamani ilijulikana kama Hifadhi ya Kitaifa ya Borivali.
Inafahamika kama moja ya mbuga kuu za kitaifa zilizopo ndani ya kikomo cha mji mkuu na ni moja ya mbuga zilizotembelewa zaidi ulimwenguni.

Hifadhi hiyo ni nyumbani kwa idadi ya spishi zilizo hatarini za mimea na wanyama. Sehemu ya msitu wa mbuga hiyo ina zaidi ya spishi 1,000 za mimea, spishi 251 za ndege za uhamiaji, ardhi na maji, spishi 50,000 za wadudu na spishi 40 za mamalia. Kwa kuongezea, mbuga hiyo pia hutoa makazi kwa spishi 38 za reptilia, spishi 9 za amphibians, spishi 150 za vipepeo na aina kubwa ya samaki.

Sehemu ya Hifadhi ya Kitaifa ya Sanjay Gandhi ina historia ndefu iliyoandikwa ya karne ya 4 KWK. Huko India ya zamani, Sopara na Kalyan walikuwa bandari mbili karibu na ambayo ilifanya biashara na maendeleo ya zamani kama vile Ugiriki na Mesopotamia. Njia ya ardhi kati ya bandari hizi mbili ilikuwa sehemu kupitia msitu huu.

Kuna njia kadhaa za kutembea kwa umma kwenye uwanja huo. Njia maarufu ya "Ashok van" inapita kupitia msitu mnene hadi nguzo mnene ya miti ya Ashoka ambayo ni sehemu ya kupumzika ya nusu ya kupumzika. Mtu anaweza kurudi kwa njia ya "Gaumukh" mahali pa wazi ya mwamba wa volkeno kurudi kwenye mapango ya Kanheri. Njia kabambe zaidi ni njia ya 'mtazamo wa kutazama' kwa kiwango cha juu zaidi huko Mumbai, kwa mtazamo wa jiji na mtazamo wa maziwa matatu ya mji - Ziwa la Tulsi, Ziwa la Vihar na Ziwa la Powai. Njia mpya za Jungle katika Hifadhi ya Kitaifa ya Sanjay Gandhi huruhusu wageni kuona sehemu zisizo wazi zaidi za uwanja huo. Ni "Shilonda Trail", "Malad Trail", na "Yeoor Trail". Gharama ya ufikiaji wa njia ni Rupia. 25 kwa kila mtu.
report_src: Hifadhi ya Kitaifa ya Sanjay Gandhi inajumuisha eneo la jumla la takriban kilomita za mraba 103.84 kufuatia kuongezwa kwa misitu kutoka Idara ya Thane mwaka 1996, hatua iliyopanua mipaka yake kutoka ukubwa wa awali wa km² 82.25 uliowekwa mwaka 1981 [1].

question_en: When was the Pythagorean theorem developed?
pos_context_en: There is debate whether the Pythagorean theorem was discovered once, or many times in many places, and the date of first discovery is uncertain, as is the date of the first proof. According to Joran Friberg, a historian of mathematics, evidence indicates that the Pythagorean theorem "was well-known to the mathematicians of the Old Babylonian period" (20th to 16th centuries BC), which would have been over a thousand years before Pythagoras was born. The history of the theorem can be divided into four parts: knowledge of Pythagorean triples, knowledge of the relationship among the sides of a right triangle, knowledge of the relationships among adjacent angles, and proofs of the theorem within some deductive system.
neg_context_en: In 1988, "The Theorem of Pythagoras" was the first video produced by the series and reviews the Pythagorean theorem. For all right triangles, the square of the hypotenuse is equal to the sum of the squares of the other two sides ( a + b = c ). The theorem is named after Pythagoras of ancient Greece. Pythagorean triples occur when all three sides of a right triangle are integers such as a = 3, b = 4 and c = 5. A clay tablet shows that the Babylonians knew of Pythagorean triples 1200 years before Pythagoras, but nobody knows if they knew the more-general Pythagorean theorem. The Chinese proof uses four similar triangles to prove the theorem.

In India, the "Baudhayana Sulba Sutra", the dates of which are given variously as between the 8th and 5th century BC, contains a list of Pythagorean triples discovered algebraically, a statement of the Pythagorean theorem, and a geometrical proof of the Pythagorean theorem for an isosceles right triangle.
The "Apastamba Sulba Sutra" (c. 600 BC) contains a numerical proof of the general Pythagorean theorem, using an area computation. Van der Waerden believed that "it was certainly based on earlier traditions". Carl Boyer states that the Pythagorean theorem in "Śulba-sũtram" may have been influenced by ancient Mesopotamian math, but there is no conclusive evidence in favor or opposition of this possibility.
With contents known much earlier, but in surviving texts dating from roughly the 1st century BC, the Chinese text "Zhoubi Suanjing" (周髀算经), ("The Arithmetical Classic of the Gnomon and the Circular Paths of Heaven") gives a reasoning for the Pythagorean theorem for the (3, 4, 5) triangle—in China it is called the "Gougu theorem" (勾股定理). During the Han Dynasty (202 BC to 220 AD), Pythagorean triples appear in "The Nine Chapters on the Mathematical Art", together with a mention of right triangles. Some believe the theorem arose first in China, where it is alternatively known as the "Shang Gao theorem" (商高定理), named after the Duke of Zhou's astronomer and mathematician, whose reasoning composed most of what was in the "Zhoubi Suanjing".

Pythagoras, whose dates are commonly given as 569–475 BC, used algebraic methods to construct Pythagorean triples, according to Proclus's commentary on Euclid. Proclus, however, wrote between 410 and 485 AD. According to Thomas L. Heath (1861–1940), no specific attribution of the theorem to Pythagoras exists in the surviving Greek literature from the five centuries after Pythagoras lived. However, when authors such as Plutarch and Cicero attributed the theorem to Pythagoras, they did so in a way which suggests that the attribution was widely known and undoubted. "Whether this formula is rightly attributed to Pythagoras personally, [...] one can safely assume that it belongs to the very oldest period of Pythagorean mathematics."

The Pythagoreans engaged with geometry as a liberal philosophy which served to establish principles and allowed theorems to be explored abstractly and mentally. Pythagorean philosophers believed that there was a close relationship between numbers and geometrical forms. Early-Pythagorean philosophers proved simple geometrical theorems, including "the sum of the angles of a triangle equals two right angles". Pythagoreans also came up with three of the five regular polyhedra: the tetrahedron, the cube and the dodecahedron. The sides of a regular dodecahedron are regular pentagons, which for Pythagoreans symbolized health. They also revered the pentagram, as each diagonal divides the two others at the golden ratio. When linear geometrical figures replaced the dots, the combination of Babylonian algebra and Pythagorean arithmetic provided the basis for Greek geometric algebra. By attempting to establish a system of concrete and permanent rules, Pythagoreans helped to establish strict axiomatic procedures of solving mathematical problems.

Around 400 BC, according to Proclus, Plato gave a method for finding Pythagorean triples that combined algebra and geometry. Around 300 BC, in Euclid's "Elements", the oldest extant axiomatic proof of the theorem is presented.

Evidence for more complex mathematics does not appear until around 3000 BC, when the Babylonians and Egyptians began using arithmetic, algebra and geometry for taxation and other financial calculations, for building and construction, and for astronomy. The most ancient mathematical texts from Mesopotamia and Egypt are from 2000–1800 BC. Many early texts mention Pythagorean triples and so, by inference, the Pythagorean theorem seems to be the most ancient and widespread mathematical development after basic arithmetic and geometry. It is in Babylonian mathematics that elementary arithmetic (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division) first appear in the archaeological record. The Babylonians also possessed a place-value system, and used a sexagesimal numeral system, still in use today for measuring angles and time.

A generalization of the Pythagorean theorem extending beyond the areas of squares on the three sides to similar figures was known by Hippocrates of Chios in the 5th century BC, and was included by Euclid in his "Elements":

Thales is supposed to have used geometry to solve problems such as calculating the height of pyramids based on the length of shadows, and the distance of ships from the shore. He is also credited by tradition with having made the first proof of two geometric theorems—the "Theorem of Thales" and the "Intercept theorem" described above. Pythagoras is widely credited with recognizing the mathematical basis of musical harmony and, according to Proclus' commentary on Euclid, he discovered the theory of proportionals and constructed regular solids. Some modern historians have questioned whether he really constructed all five regular solids, suggesting instead that it is more reasonable to assume that he constructed just three of them. Some ancient sources attribute the discovery of the Pythagorean theorem to Pythagoras, whereas others claim it was a proof for the theorem that he discovered. Modern historians believe that the principle itself was known to the Babylonians and likely imported from them. The Pythagoreans regarded numerology and geometry as fundamental to understanding the nature of the universe and therefore central to their philosophical and religious ideas. They are credited with numerous mathematical advances, such as the discovery of irrational numbers. Historians credit them with a major role in the development of Greek mathematics (particularly number theory and geometry) into a coherent logical system based on clear definitions and proven theorems that was considered to be a subject worthy of study in its own right, without regard to the practical applications that had been the primary concern of the Egyptians and Babylonians.

Nicomachus' treatises were well known in Greek, Latin and the Arabic worlds. In the 1st century an Arabic translation of Nicomachus’ "Introduction to Arithmetic" was published. The Arabic translations of Nicomachus' treatises were in turn translated into Latin by Gerard of Cremona, making them part of the Latin tradition of numerology. The Pythagorean theorem was referenced in Arabic manuscripts. Scholars in the Arabic world displayed a strong interest in Pythagorean concepts. In the 1st century Abu al-Wafa' Buzjani discussed multiplication and division in a treatise on arithmetic for business administrators in reference to Nicomachus. However, the primary interest of Islamic arithmeticians was in solving practical problems, such as taxation, measurement, the estimation of agricultural values and business applications for the buying and selling of goods. There was little interest for the Pythagorean numerology that developed in the Latin world. The primary arithmetical system used by Islamic mathematicians was based on Hindu arithmetic, which rejected the notion that the relations between numbers and geometrical forms were symbolic.
question_src: Je! Nadharia ya Pythagorean ilitengenezwa lini?
pos_context_src: Kuna mjadala ikiwa nadharia ya Pythagorean iligunduliwa mara moja, au mara nyingi katika maeneo mengi, na tarehe ya ugunduzi wa kwanza haina uhakika, kama ilivyo tarehe ya uthibitisho wa kwanza. Kulingana na Joran Friberg, mwanahistoria wa hisabati, ushahidi unaonyesha kwamba nadharia ya Pythagorean "ilijulikana sana na wanasayansi wa kipindi cha zamani cha Babeli" (karne ya 20 hadi 16 KK), ambayo ingekuwa zaidi ya miaka elfu kabla ya Pythagoras kuzaliwa. Historia ya nadharia inaweza kugawanywa katika sehemu nne: maarifa ya triples za Pythagorean, ufahamu wa uhusiano kati ya pande za pembetatu ya kulia, ufahamu wa uhusiano kati ya pembe za karibu, na uthibitisho wa nadharia ndani ya mfumo fulani wa kujitolea.
neg_context_src: Mnamo 1988, "Theorem of Pythagoras" ilikuwa video ya kwanza iliyotengenezwa na mfululizo na kukagua Theorem ya Pythagorean. Kwa pembetatu zote za kulia, mraba wa hypotenuse ni sawa na jumla ya viwanja vya pande zingine mbili (A + B = C). Nadharia hiyo inaitwa baada ya Pythagoras ya Ugiriki ya Kale. Triples za Pythagorean hufanyika wakati pande zote tatu za pembetatu ya kulia ni nambari kama vile = 3, b = 4 na c = 5. Ubao wa udongo unaonyesha kuwa Wababeli walijua juu ya miaka 1200 ya Pythagorean miaka 1200 kabla ya Pythagoras, lakini hakuna mtu anayejua ikiwa wanajua nadharia ya Pythagorean zaidi. Uthibitisho wa Wachina hutumia pembetatu nne zinazofanana kudhibitisha nadharia hiyo.

Huko India, "Baudhayana Sulba Sutra", tarehe ambazo zimepewa tofauti kama kati ya karne ya 8 na 5 KK, ina orodha ya trairs ya Pythagorean iligundua algebra, taarifa ya Theorem ya Pythagorean, na uthibitisho wa kijiometri wa Trianorean.
"Apastamba sulba sutra" (c. 600 KK) ina uthibitisho wa hesabu wa nadharia ya jumla ya Pythagorean, kwa kutumia hesabu ya eneo. Van der Waerden aliamini kwamba "hakika ilikuwa msingi wa mila ya mapema". Carl Boyer anasema kwamba nadharia ya Pythagorean katika "śulba-sũtram" inaweza kuwa imeathiriwa na hesabu za zamani za Mesopotamian, lakini hakuna ushahidi kamili katika neema au kupinga uwezekano huu.
Pamoja na yaliyomo mapema sana, lakini katika maandishi yaliyosalia kutoka takriban karne ya 1 KK, maandishi ya Wachina "Zhoubi Suanjing" (周髀算经), ("Arithmetical Classic of the Gnomon na Njia za Mbingu za Mbingu") inatoa hoja kwa theorem ya Pythagorean kwa (3, 4). Wakati wa nasaba ya Han (202 KK hadi 220 BK), safari za Pythagorean zinaonekana katika "Sura tisa juu ya Sanaa ya Hisabati", pamoja na kutaja pembetatu za kulia. Wengine wanaamini nadharia hiyo iliibuka kwanza nchini Uchina, ambapo inajulikana kama "Shang Gao Theorem" (商高定理), jina lake baada ya mtaalam wa mtaalam wa wanahistoria wa Zhou, ambaye hoja yake ilijumuisha zaidi ya kile kilichokuwa katika "Zhoubi Suanjing".

Pythagoras, ambaye tarehe zake hupewa kawaida kama 569-475 KK, alitumia njia za algebraic kujenga tatu za Pythagorean, kulingana na maoni ya Proclus juu ya Euclid. Proclus, hata hivyo, aliandika kati ya 410 na 485 BK. Kulingana na Thomas L. Heath (1861-1940), hakuna sifa maalum ya nadharia ya Pythagoras iliyopo katika fasihi iliyosalia ya Uigiriki kutoka karne tano baada ya Pythagoras kuishi. Walakini, wakati waandishi kama vile Plutarch na Cicero waligundua nadharia hiyo kwa Pythagoras, walifanya hivyo kwa njia ambayo inaonyesha kwamba sifa hiyo ilijulikana sana na bila shaka. "Ikiwa formula hii inahusishwa kwa usahihi na Pythagoras kibinafsi, [...] mtu anaweza kudhani salama kuwa ni ya kipindi kongwe zaidi cha hesabu ya Pythagorean."

Wa -Pythagoreans walishirikiana na jiometri kama falsafa ya huria ambayo ilitumika kuanzisha kanuni na kuruhusu nadharia zichunguzwe kwa kufikirika na kiakili. Wanafalsafa wa Pythagorean waliamini kwamba kulikuwa na uhusiano wa karibu kati ya idadi na aina za kijiometri. Wanafalsafa wa mapema-Pythagorean walithibitisha nadharia rahisi za kijiometri, pamoja na "jumla ya pembe za pembetatu ni sawa na pembe mbili za kulia". Pythagoreans pia walikuja na watatu kati ya watano wa kawaida wa polyhedra: tetrahedron, mchemraba na dodecahedron. Pande za dodecahedron ya kawaida ni pentagons za kawaida, ambazo kwa watu wa Pythagoreans walifanana na afya. Pia waliheshimu pentagram, kwani kila diagonal inawagawanya wengine wawili kwa uwiano wa dhahabu. Wakati takwimu za kijiometri za mstari zilibadilisha dots, mchanganyiko wa algebra ya Babeli na hesabu ya Pythagorean ilitoa msingi wa algebra ya jiometri ya Uigiriki. Kwa kujaribu kuanzisha mfumo wa sheria za zege na za kudumu, watu wa Pythagore walisaidia kuanzisha taratibu kali za kutatua shida za kihesabu.

Karibu 400 KK, kulingana na Proclus, Plato alitoa njia ya kupata tatu za Pythagorean ambazo zilichanganya algebra na jiometri. Karibu 300 KK, katika "vitu" vya Euclid, dhibitisho la zamani zaidi la nadharia ya nadharia linawasilishwa.

Ushahidi wa hisabati ngumu zaidi hauonekani hadi karibu 3000 KK, wakati Wababeli na Wamisri walipoanza kutumia hesabu, algebra na jiometri kwa ushuru na mahesabu mengine ya kifedha, kwa ujenzi na ujenzi, na kwa unajimu. Maandishi ya zamani zaidi ya kihesabu kutoka Mesopotamia na Misri ni kutoka 2000-1800 KK. Maandishi mengi ya mapema hutaja triples za Pythagorean na kwa hivyo, kwa uelekezaji, Theorem ya Pythagorean inaonekana kuwa maendeleo ya zamani na kuenea ya kihesabu baada ya hesabu za msingi na jiometri. Ni katika hesabu ya Babeli ambayo hesabu ya msingi (kuongeza, kutoa, kuzidisha na mgawanyiko) huonekana kwanza kwenye rekodi ya akiolojia. Wababeli pia walikuwa na mfumo wa thamani ya mahali, na walitumia mfumo wa nambari za ngono, bado unatumika leo kwa pembe na wakati.

Ujanibishaji wa nadharia ya Pythagorean inayoenea zaidi ya maeneo ya viwanja kwa pande tatu kwa takwimu kama hizo ilijulikana na Hippocrates wa Chios katika karne ya 5 KK, na ilijumuishwa na Euclid katika "mambo" yake:

Thales inastahili kutumia jiometri kutatua shida kama vile kuhesabu urefu wa piramidi kulingana na urefu wa vivuli, na umbali wa meli kutoka pwani. Anahesabiwa pia na mila kwa kuwa ametoa uthibitisho wa kwanza wa nadharia mbili za jiometri - "Theorem of Thales" na "Theorem ya" Intercept "iliyoelezwa hapo juu. Pythagoras inajulikana sana kwa kutambua msingi wa kihesabu wa maelewano ya muziki na, kulingana na maoni ya Proclus juu ya Euclid, aligundua nadharia ya idadi na akaunda vimumunyisho vya kawaida. Wanahistoria wengine wa kisasa wamehoji ikiwa kweli ameunda vimumunyisho vyote vitano vya kawaida, na kupendekeza kwamba ni busara zaidi kudhani kuwa aliunda tatu tu kati yao. Vyanzo vingine vya zamani vinadai ugunduzi wa nadharia ya Pythagorean kwa Pythagoras, wakati wengine wanadai ilikuwa ni dhibitisho kwa nadharia ambayo aligundua. Wanahistoria wa kisasa wanaamini kwamba kanuni yenyewe ilijulikana kwa Wababeli na uwezekano wa kuingizwa kutoka kwao. Wapythagoreans walichukulia hesabu na jiometri kama msingi wa kuelewa asili ya ulimwengu na kwa hivyo katikati ya maoni yao ya kifalsafa na ya kidini. Wanahesabiwa na maendeleo kadhaa ya kihesabu, kama vile ugunduzi wa idadi isiyo ya kweli. Wanahistoria wanawapa jukumu kubwa katika ukuzaji wa hesabu za Uigiriki (haswa nadharia ya idadi na jiometri) katika mfumo mzuri wa kimantiki kulingana na ufafanuzi wazi na nadharia zilizothibitishwa ambazo zilizingatiwa kuwa somo linalostahili kusoma kwa haki yake, bila kuzingatia matumizi ya vitendo ambayo yalikuwa jambo la msingi la Wamisri na Babeli.

Matibabu ya Nikomachus yalijulikana sana katika ulimwengu wa Kiyunani, Kilatini na Waarabu. Katika karne ya 1 tafsiri ya Kiarabu ya Nicomachus '"Utangulizi wa hesabu" ilichapishwa. Tafsiri za Kiarabu za mikataba ya Nicomachus 'zilitafsiriwa kwa Kilatini na Gerard wa Cremona, na kuzifanya kuwa sehemu ya mila ya Kilatini ya hesabu. Nadharia ya Pythagorean ilirejelewa katika maandishi ya Kiarabu. Wasomi katika ulimwengu wa Kiarabu walionyesha shauku kubwa katika dhana za Pythagorean. Katika karne ya 1 Abu al-Wafa 'Buzjani alijadili kuzidisha na mgawanyiko katika makubaliano juu ya hesabu kwa wasimamizi wa biashara kwa kuzingatia Nicomachus. Walakini, nia ya msingi ya hesabu za Kiislamu ilikuwa katika kutatua shida za vitendo, kama vile ushuru, kipimo, makadirio ya maadili ya kilimo na matumizi ya biashara kwa ununuzi na uuzaji wa bidhaa. Kulikuwa na riba kidogo kwa hesabu ya Pythagorean ambayo ilikua katika ulimwengu wa Kilatini. Mfumo wa hesabu ya msingi uliotumiwa na wanasayansi wa Kiisilamu ulitokana na hesabu ya Kihindu, ambayo ilikataa wazo kwamba uhusiano kati ya idadi na aina ya jiometri ulikuwa wa mfano.
report_src: Hakuna tarehe moja inayoafikiwa kwa ugunduzi wa nadharia ya Pythagorean, kwani ushahidi unaonyesha ilijulikana na kutumiwa katika Ubabeli wa zamani kati ya karne ya 20 na ya 16 KK—zaidi ya milenia moja kabla ya kuzaliwa kwa Pythagoras (takriban 570–495 KK) [1].
all_claims: Hakuna tarehe moja inayoafikiwa kwa ugunduzi wa nadharia ya Pythagorean, kwani ushahidi unaonyesha ilijulikana na kutumiwa katika Ubabeli wa zamani kati ya karne ya 20 na ya 16 KK—zaidi ya milenia moja kabla ya kuzaliwa kwa Pythagoras (takriban 570–495 KK) [1].
