question_en: Who created Andes mints?
pos_context_en: In 1921, Andrew Kanelos opened a small candy store in Chicago, Illinois. While he initially called his store "Andy's Candies" in reference to himself, he quickly found that men did not like giving boxes of candy with another man's name to their wives and girlfriends. As such, he changed the spelling of the business to "Andes Candies." In 1980, Andes was purchased by the Swiss candy company Interfood (later Jacobs Suchard). When Jacobs Suchard bought Brach's in 1987, Andes became part of that division. When Jacobs Suchard was sold to Kraft General Foods in 1990, Brach's was kept separate by owner Klaus J. Jacobs. In need of cash, Brach's sold Andes to Tootsie Roll Industries in 2000.
neg_context_en: Andes joined his friend Joseph Segel at The Franklin Mint (a mint producing coinage) in 1967, becoming its first executive vice-president. In 1970, he was named president of its US division, and Franklin Mint stock began to be actively traded on the New York Stock Exchange. When Segel retired in 1973, Andes became CEO and chairman of Franklin Mint Corporation, which by then had expanded internationally and was also producing coin-of-the-realm for several foreign countries.

Andes Chocolate Mints are small rectangular candies consisting of one mint-green layer sandwiched in between two chocolate-brown layers. The candies are usually wrapped in green foil imprinted with the company's logo, the word "Andes" written amidst a drawing of snow-capped peaks. First launched in 1950, they are produced by Tootsie Roll Industries and made in Delavan, Wisconsin.

The most common Andes mint is 1.5 × 0.75 × 0.25 inches, weighs 4.75 grams, and contains 25 calories. A larger size is also available, measuring 2 × 0.75 × 0.25 inches, weighing 9 grams, and containing 47.5 calories.In 2007, the Andes "Limited Edition Dessert Indulgence" array was introduced. It offered an assortment of three new flavors.Andes Mints have been used in several other products. These include baking chips, ice cream, cookies, and cake rolls. Several fast food and fast casual chains have offered Andes Mints in some of their offerings including: Jack in the Box milkshakes, Arby's milkshakes, as a Caribou Coffee cooler and as a featured topping in the topping bar at Yogurtland. The baking chips were introduced in the autumn of 2003 and include the mints' original design.

In the United States, Andes mints are a popular after-dinner mint and are often distributed at restaurants, particularly Olive Garden. The mint used at Olive Garden is a special flavor manufactured exclusively for the restaurant chain, but it is tastewise similar to the Mint Parfait flavor, containing the same layers, but at different ratios.
In 1981, Franklin Mint Corporation was acquired by Warner Communications (the predecessor of Time Warner Corporation). Andes continued as CEO of Franklin Mint Corporation until 1986.

Under Andes’ direction, sales at The Franklin Mint grew steadily, due largely to a program of product diversification from coins and medals to porcelain, crystal, die-cast collectibles and leather-bound books, while still maintaining its status as the world’s largest private mint.
There was a sense of mission and excitement at the Mint, and it was the same thing here at the Institute. We were banded together by a common purpose—and by the sheer terror of it all.

Romney's was founded in 1918, and used an old recipe to create mint cake. This mint cake was sold in Kendal and sent by train to other areas of the north-west for sale. In 1987, Romney's bought Wiper's Mint Cake from Harry Wiper, who had inherited ownership of Wiper's in 1960 when his father Robert Wiper died. 
In 2016 Romney's collaborated with fashion site Lyst to create a limited run of "Kendall Mint Cakes" to celebrate Kendall Jenner's 21st Birthday on 3 November. 200 limited edition cakes were given away on social media.

Pez was first marketed as a compressed peppermint sweet in Vienna, Austria, in 1927 by Eduard Haas III. The name PEZ is an abbreviation of PfeffErminZ (German for peppermint). Haas created the peppermints using family owned baking powders, and decided to serve the mints in small, hand-size containers. He manufactured a small tin to hold the mints, similar to the modern Altoids tins. The first Pez mint dispensers, known as "regulars," were similar in shape to a cigarette lighter, and dispensed an adult breath mint marketed as an alternative to tobacco. They were invented by Oscar Uxa. Haas Food Manufacturing Corporation of Vienna was the first to sell Pez products.
question_src: Nani aliunda Andes Mints?
pos_context_src: Mnamo 1921, Andrew Kanelos alifungua duka ndogo la pipi huko Chicago, Illinois. Wakati hapo awali aliita duka lake "Pipi za Andy" akimaanisha mwenyewe, haraka aligundua kuwa wanaume hawapendi kutoa masanduku ya pipi na jina la mtu mwingine kwa wake zao na marafiki wa kike. Kama hivyo, alibadilisha herufi ya biashara kuwa "Andes Pipi." Mnamo 1980, Andes ilinunuliwa na Kampuni ya Pipi ya Uswizi (baadaye Jacobs Suchard). Wakati Jacobs Suchard alinunua Brach mnamo 1987, Andes alikua sehemu ya mgawanyiko huo. Wakati Jacobs Suchard alipouzwa kwa Kraft General Foods mnamo 1990, Brach ilihifadhiwa na mmiliki Klaus J. Jacobs. Katika kuhitaji pesa, Brach aliuza Andes kwa Tootsie Roll Viwanda mnamo 2000.
neg_context_src: Andes alijiunga na rafiki yake Joseph Segel huko Franklin Mint (mint inayozalisha coinage) mnamo 1967, na kuwa makamu wa rais wa kwanza. Mnamo mwaka wa 1970, aliitwa Rais wa Idara yake ya Amerika, na hisa ya Franklin Mint ilianza kuuzwa kwa bidii kwenye Soko la Hisa la New York. Wakati Segel alistaafu mnamo 1973, Andes alikua Mkurugenzi Mtendaji na Mwenyekiti wa Franklin Mint Corporation, ambayo wakati huo ilikuwa imepanuka kimataifa na pia alikuwa akizalisha sarafu ya nchi kadhaa za nje.

Mints ya chokoleti ya Andes ni pipi ndogo za mstatili zinazojumuisha safu moja ya kijani-kijani iliyowekwa kati ya tabaka mbili za hudhurungi. Pipi kawaida hufungwa kwa kijani kibichi kilichowekwa na nembo ya kampuni, neno "Andes" limeandikwa katikati ya mchoro wa kilele cha theluji. Ilizinduliwa kwa mara ya kwanza mnamo 1950, hutolewa na Tootsie Roll Viwanda na kufanywa huko Delavan, Wisconsin.

Mint ya kawaida ya Andes ni inchi 1.5 × 0.75 × 0.25, uzani wa gramu 4.75, na ina kalori 25. Saizi kubwa inapatikana pia, kupima inchi 2 × 0.75 × 0.25, uzito wa gramu 9, na iliyo na kalori 47.5.Ina 2007, safu ya Dessert ya Andes "Limited Edition" ilianzishwa. Ilitoa urval ya ladha tatu mpya. Mints zimetumika katika bidhaa zingine kadhaa. Hii ni pamoja na chips za kuoka, ice cream, kuki, na rolls za keki. Chakula kadhaa cha haraka na minyororo ya kawaida ya haraka imetoa mints ya Andes katika baadhi ya sadaka zao ikiwa ni pamoja na: Jack kwenye sanduku la maziwa, maziwa ya Arby, kama kahawa ya kahawa ya Caribou na kama topping iliyoonyeshwa kwenye baa ya juu huko Yogurtland. Chips za kuoka zilianzishwa katika vuli ya 2003 na ni pamoja na muundo wa asili wa Mints.

Huko Merika, Andes Mints ni mint maarufu baada ya chakula cha jioni na mara nyingi husambazwa katika mikahawa, haswa Bustani ya Olive. Mint inayotumika kwenye Bustani ya Olive ni ladha maalum iliyotengenezwa peke kwa mnyororo wa mgahawa, lakini ni sawa na ladha ya mint parfait, iliyo na tabaka zile zile, lakini kwa uwiano tofauti.
Mnamo 1981, Franklin Mint Corporation ilipatikana na Mawasiliano ya Warner (mtangulizi wa Time Warner Corporation). Andes aliendelea kama Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa Franklin Mint Corporation hadi 1986.

Chini ya mwelekeo wa Andes, mauzo katika Franklin Mint yalikua kwa kasi, kwa sababu ya mpango wa mseto wa bidhaa kutoka kwa sarafu na medali hadi porcelain, glasi, mkusanyiko wa kufa na vitabu vilivyofungwa kwa ngozi, wakati bado vinaendelea kudumisha hali yake kama mint kubwa ya kibinafsi ulimwenguni.
Kulikuwa na hisia ya misheni na msisimko huko Mint, na ilikuwa kitu kimoja hapa katika Taasisi. Tuliunganishwa pamoja na kusudi la kawaida - na kwa hofu kubwa ya yote.

Romney ilianzishwa mnamo 1918, na ilitumia kichocheo cha zamani kuunda keki ya mint. Keki hii ya mint iliuzwa huko Kendal na kutumwa na gari moshi kwenda maeneo mengine ya kaskazini-magharibi kwa kuuza. Mnamo mwaka wa 1987, Romney alinunua keki ya Wiper's Mint kutoka kwa Harry Wiper, ambaye alikuwa amerithi umiliki wa Wiper's mnamo 1960 wakati baba yake Robert Wiper alikufa. 
Mnamo mwaka wa 2016 Romney alishirikiana na tovuti ya mitindo Lyst kuunda mbio ndogo ya "Kendall Mint Cakes" kusherehekea siku ya kuzaliwa ya 21 ya Kendall Jenner tarehe 3 Novemba. Keki 200 za toleo ndogo zilipewa kwenye media za kijamii.

Pez iliuzwa kwanza kama tamu iliyokandamizwa ya peppermint huko Vienna, Austria, mnamo 1927 na Eduard Haas III. Jina Pez ni muhtasari wa pfefferminz (Kijerumani kwa peppermint). Haas aliunda peppermints kwa kutumia poda za kuoka zinazomilikiwa na familia, na aliamua kutumikia mints katika vyombo vidogo, vya ukubwa wa mkono. Alitengeneza bati ndogo kushikilia mints, sawa na vifungo vya kisasa vya Altoids. Matawi ya kwanza ya Pez Mint, inayojulikana kama "Regars," yalikuwa sawa katika sura nyepesi ya sigara, na kusambaza pumzi ya watu wazima iliyouzwa kama njia mbadala ya tumbaku. Walianzishwa na Oscar UXA. Shirika la utengenezaji wa chakula la Haas la Vienna lilikuwa la kwanza kuuza bidhaa za PEZ.

question_en: How big is Japans current navy?
pos_context_en: The , JMSDF, also referred to as the Japanese Navy, is the maritime warfare branch of the Japan Self-Defense Forces, tasked with the naval defense of Japan. It is the "de facto" navy of Japan and was formed following the dissolution of the Imperial Japanese Navy (IJN) after World War II. The JMSDF has a fleet of 154 ships and 346 aircraft and consists of approximately 45,800 personnel. Its main tasks are to maintain control of the nation's sea lanes and to patrol territorial waters. It also participates in UN-led peacekeeping operations (PKOs) and Maritime Interdiction Operations (MIOs).

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.

In his planning for how the war in the Pacific would be fought and won, Admiral Chester Nimitz knew the manufacturing might of the United States would eventually supply him with a force large enough to overcome the forces of the Empire of Japan. He referred to this future force as the 'Big Blue Fleet'. To make it effective at projecting its power, he would need to devise a way to keep it supplied and in fighting condition. The ongoing resupply of a large naval force across the vast expanse of the Pacific would require the US Navy to perform something no navy had ever accomplished before.

question_en: What is the largest judo competition?
pos_context_en: The World Judo Championships are the highest level of international judo competition, along with the Olympic judo competition. The championships are held once every year (except the years when the Olympics take place) by the International Judo Federation, and qualified judoka compete in their respective categories as representatives of their home countries. Team competitions have also been held since 1994. The men's championships began in 1956, though the format and periodicity of the championships have changed over time. The last edition of the championships took place in Budapest, Hungary in 2017.
neg_context_en:
Popularity for the 2014 Commonwealth Games in Glasgow is growing exponentially as the day of the opening ceremony quickly approaches. Approximately 92% of the total number of tickets available - for the 11 days of sporting events - have already sold out; with judo and athletics, as well as various other sporting disciplines proving popular amongst supporters of the host and commonwealth nations.
The popularity of judo amongst the host-nation supporters is due to the Glasgow European Open, which took place in October 2013. The event was the largest judo tournament held in Scotland to date, however, this was not the main aim of the event; it was to increase the popularity of judo with the Glasgow’s citizens, in the hope of increasing the number of people getting involved in the sport as well as to gain more supporters in the run-up to the Commonwealth Games.

Takemori began practicing judo in 1937. He founded the Washington Judo Club with Don Draeger and taught there from the end of World War II. The club became the largest in the area and while there he would reach 9th dan in judo (one of the handful of Americans to reach that rank). James Takemori was one of the founders of the Judo Black Belt Federation which became the United States Judo Federation. By 1965, he was considered one of the top 15 judo black belts in America. He served as a coach for the 1964 US Olympic judo bronze medalist Jim Bregman and served as a coach for the US men's and women's national teams. He served on selection committees for the US men's and women's national and international teams. He served as a coach for other US Teams as well including the Southern US Team. Takemori utilized his influence in getting Allen Coage named to the US 1976 Olympic Team in the open weight class where he won a bronze medal. It was under Takemori's leadership that the US Women won three bronze medals in the first women's Worlds Championships in judo. He served as the USJF Juniors chairman. He also served as Chairman of the AAU Junior Judo Program.

question_src: Je! Ni mashindano gani makubwa zaidi ya Judo?
pos_context_src: Mashindano ya Dunia ya Judo ni kiwango cha juu zaidi cha mashindano ya kimataifa ya Judo, pamoja na Mashindano ya Olimpiki ya Judo. Mashindano hayo hufanyika mara moja kila mwaka (isipokuwa miaka ambayo Olimpiki hufanyika) na Shirikisho la Kimataifa la Judo, na Judoka waliohitimu wanashindana katika vikundi vyao kama wawakilishi wa nchi zao. Mashindano ya timu pia yamefanyika tangu 1994. Mashindano ya wanaume walianza mnamo 1956, ingawa muundo na upimaji wa ubingwa umebadilika kwa wakati. Toleo la mwisho la ubingwa lilifanyika huko Budapest, Hungary mnamo 2017.

Umaarufu kwa Michezo ya Jumuiya ya Madola ya 2014 huko Glasgow inakua sana kama siku ya sherehe ya ufunguzi inakaribia haraka. Takriban 92% ya jumla ya idadi ya tikiti zinazopatikana - kwa siku 11 za hafla za michezo - tayari zimeshauza; Na Judo na riadha, pamoja na taaluma zingine za michezo zinazoonyesha kuwa maarufu kati ya wafuasi wa mwenyeji na mataifa ya Jumuiya ya Madola.
Umaarufu wa Judo kati ya wafuasi wa mataifa ya mwenyeji ni kwa sababu ya Glasgow European Open, ambayo ilifanyika mnamo Oktoba 2013. Hafla hiyo ilikuwa mashindano makubwa ya Judo yaliyofanyika huko Scotland hadi leo, hii haikuwa lengo kuu la hafla hiyo; Ilikuwa kuongeza umaarufu wa Judo na raia wa Glasgow, kwa matumaini ya kuongeza idadi ya watu wanaohusika katika mchezo huo na kupata wafuasi zaidi katika michezo ya Jumuiya ya Madola.

Takemori alianza kufanya mazoezi ya Judo mnamo 1937. Alianzisha Klabu ya Washington Judo na Don Draeger na kufundisha hapo tangu mwisho wa Vita vya Kidunia vya pili. Klabu ikawa kubwa zaidi katika eneo hilo na wakati huko angefika Dani 9 huko Judo (mmoja wa Wamarekani wachache kufikia kiwango hicho). James Takemori alikuwa mmoja wa waanzilishi wa Shirikisho la Belt Nyeusi ambalo likawa Shirikisho la Judo la Merika. Kufikia 1965, alichukuliwa kuwa mmoja wa mikanda 15 ya juu ya Judo nyeusi huko Amerika. Alifanya kazi kama mkufunzi wa medali ya medali ya shaba ya Olimpiki ya Amerika ya 1964 Jim Bregman na kutumika kama mkufunzi wa timu za kitaifa za wanaume na wanawake. Alihudumu kwenye kamati za uteuzi kwa timu za kitaifa za wanaume na wanawake za Amerika na za kimataifa. Alifanya kazi kama kocha wa timu zingine za Amerika na pamoja na timu ya Amerika Kusini. Takemori alitumia ushawishi wake katika kupata Allen Coage iliyotajwa kwa timu ya Olimpiki ya Amerika ya 1976 katika darasa la uzani wazi ambapo alishinda medali ya shaba. Ilikuwa chini ya uongozi wa Takemori kwamba wanawake wa Amerika walishinda medali tatu za shaba katika Mashindano ya Kwanza ya Ulimwengu wa Wanawake huko Judo. Alihudumu kama Mwenyekiti wa Juniors wa USJF. Pia aliwahi kuwa mwenyekiti wa mpango wa AAU Junior Judo.

question_en: What is a denture specialist called?
pos_context_en: The fabrication of a set of complete dentures is a challenge for any dentist/denturist. There are many axioms in the production of dentures that must be understood; ignorance of one axiom can lead to failure of the denture. In the vast majority of cases, complete dentures should be comfortable soon after insertion, although almost always at least two adjustment visits are necessary to remove the cause of sore spots. One of the most critical aspects of dentures is that the impression of the denture must be perfectly made and used with perfect technique to make an accurate model of the patient's edentulous (toothless) gums. The dentist or denturist must use a process called border molding to ensure that the denture flanges are properly extended. An array of problems may occur if the final impression of the denture is not made properly. It takes considerable patience and experience for a dentist to know how to make a denture, and for this reason it may be in the patient's best interest to seek a specialist, either a prosthodontist or denturist, to make the denture. A denturist is a trained and licensed professional who sees patients in need of dentures, partials, relines or repairs. A denturist not only takes the impression, but makes the entire denture in his or her own laboratory. The denturist then schedules a date for the delivery of the finished dentures to the patient. A general dentist may do a good job making dentures, but only if he or she is meticulous and experienced. Many dentists no longer make dentures themselves. but instead take an impression of the patients' mouth and then either send the impressions to a dental laboratory, which could be anywhere in the world, or send the patient to a denturist. Once the laboratory receives dental impressions of the patient's mouth, the laboratory creates plaster molds from them. The laboratory uses the molds to create the wax rims used to register the patient's bite. These wax rims are returned to the dentist, who uses them to register the patient's bite. The dentist may assist the patient in choosing the correct size of teeth for the dentures, or simply make the selection himself. Once bite registration is completed and the teeth are selected for the dentures, the wax rim is usually returned to the dental laboratory in order to have the denture teeth set into the wax. Once the teeth are set into the wax rim, the result is a prefinished denture that looks almost like the finished product. This prefinished denture is usually returned to the dentist's office and the patient usually has a chance to approve the setup (for immediate or standard dentures) or to try the denture before it is finished. After approval by the patient, the dentist returns the pre-denture to the laboratory for final processing. The finished denture is then returned to the dentist's office for delivery to the patient.
neg_context_en: A denture cleaner (also termed denture cleanser), is a cleaner used to clean dentures when they are out of the mouth. Their main use is to control the growth of microorganisms on the dentures, especially "Candida albicans", thereby preventing denture-related stomatitis. When dentures are worn in the mouth, a biofilm develops which may be similar to dental plaque. It may become hardened and mineralized as dental calculus. Denture cleansers are also used to remove stains and other debris that may be caused by diet, tobacco use, drinking coffee, drinking tea, etc.

Support is the principle that describes how well the underlying mucosa (oral tissues, including gums) keeps the denture from moving vertically towards the arch in question during chewing, and thus being excessively depressed and moving deeper into the arch. For the mandibular arch, this function is provided primarily by the buccal shelf, a region extending laterally from the back or posterior ridges, and by the pear-shaped pad (the most posterior area of keratinized gingival formed by the scaling down of the retro-molar papilla after the extraction of the last molar tooth). Secondary support for the complete mandibular denture is provided by the alveolar ridge crest. The maxillary arch receives primary support from the horizontal hard palate and the posterior alveolar ridge crest. The larger the denture flanges (that part of the denture that extends into the vestibule), the better the stability (another parameter to assess fit of a complete denture). Long flanges beyond the functional depth of the sulcus are a common error in denture construction, often (but not always) leading to movement in function, and ulcerations (denture sore spots).

Alternatively, stock abutments are used to retain dentures using a male-adapter attached to the implant and a female adapter in the denture. Two common types of adapters are the ball-and-socket style retainer and the button-style adapter. These types of stock abutments allow movement of the denture, but enough retention to improve the quality of life for denture wearers, compared to conventional dentures. Regardless of the type of adapter, the female portion of the adapter that is housed in the denture will require periodic replacement, however the number and adapter type does not seem to affect patient satisfaction with the prosthetic for various removable alternatives.

Dentures are prosthetic appliances fabricated to fill the gaps of missing teeth. Conventional style dentures are removable appliances and are designed to be either a complete denture or a partial denture anchoring to adjacent teeth. There are many denture designs, some which rely on chemical bonding or clasping onto teeth or attached via dental implants known as fixed prosthodontics.
People are now living longer and retaining their teeth for longer due to the preventive focused approach to dentistry. Although the rates of edentulism are rapidly declining, this is resulting in the number of natural teeth retained in the dentition. The impact of this is especially apparent in the residential care setting, as Personal Care Assistant staff are often time poor as a high resident to PCA ratio, oral care is often not adequately attended too or not at all. Residential care facilities will continue to encounter residents retaining their own natural teeth as the population is growing and living for longer periods so an oral health intervention will be required to combat this area of care that is severely lacking in many facilities. Utilising Oral Health Therapists in this sector would provide some assistance in closing the gap.

Processing a denture is usually performed using a lost-wax technique whereby the form of the final denture, including the acrylic denture teeth, is invested in stone. This investment is then heated, and when it melts the wax is removed through a spruing channel. The remaining cavity is then either filled by forced injection or pouring in the uncured denture acrylic, which is either a heat cured or cold-cured type. During the processing period, heat cured acrylics—also called permanent denture acrylics—go through a process called polymerization, causing the acrylic materials to bond very tightly and taking several hours to complete. After a curing period, the stone investment is removed, the acrylic is polished, and the denture is complete. The end result is a denture that looks much more natural, is much stronger and more durable than a cold cured temporary denture, resists stains and odors, and will last for many years.

Dentures (also known as false teeth) are prosthetic devices constructed to replace missing teeth, and are supported by the surrounding soft and hard tissues of the oral cavity. Conventional dentures are removable (removable partial denture or complete denture). However, there are many denture designs, some which rely on bonding or clasping onto teeth or dental implants (fixed prosthodontics). There are two main categories of dentures, the distinction being whether they are used to replace missing teeth on the mandibular arch or on the maxillary arch.

They can also work independently in their own clinic with patients providing appropriate management and treatment of dentures and other oral appliances. Denturists are well educated in clinical and technical knowledge of denture care, as well as completing many hours of practical skills in producing dentures. They ultimately receive more comprehensive study in oral prosthetics than any other health professional including the general dentist. Therefore, the collaborative role of denturists provides an important model of re-allocating dental services to alleviate stresses from the general dentists, reserving valuable time for restorative, cosmetic, hygiene, and emergency dental procedures.

Denturism is defined as the practice by denturists of examining oral health, planning treatment, making artificial dentures including other removable oral appliances and fitting them to patients. It is a recognized profession throughout the world and currently utilized in many countries including Australia, New zealand, United States, United Kingdom and Canada. In the United States, denturism is only legislated and practiced in 7 states (Maine, Arizona, Idaho, Montana, Washington, Oregon, and Colorado). However, in Australia, the United Kingdom and Canada, all states, provinces and territories recognize the profession.

The program is competitive and selective. Prospective students are encouraged to complete and earn Dental Technology Degree prior to applying Denture Specialist Program. By acquiring Dental Technology knowledge prior to entering Denture Specialist Program would help students to follow course works with better understanding. Work experience from denturist clinic, denture laboratory and other dental field is plus to be succeed before and after graduation.
question_src: Je! Mtaalam wa meno huitwaje?
pos_context_src: Utengenezaji wa seti ya meno kamili ni changamoto kwa daktari wa meno/meno yoyote. Kuna axioms nyingi katika utengenezaji wa meno ambayo lazima ieleweke; Ujinga wa axiom moja inaweza kusababisha kutofaulu kwa denture. Katika idadi kubwa ya visa, meno kamili yanapaswa kuwa vizuri mara baada ya kuingizwa, ingawa karibu kila wakati angalau ziara mbili za marekebisho ni muhimu kuondoa sababu ya matangazo ya kidonda. Mojawapo ya mambo muhimu zaidi ya meno ni kwamba hisia za meno lazima zifanywe kikamilifu na kutumiwa na mbinu kamili ya kutengeneza mfano sahihi wa ufizi wa mgonjwa (toothless). Daktari wa meno au meno lazima atumie mchakato unaoitwa ukingo wa mpaka ili kuhakikisha kuwa flange za meno zinapanuliwa vizuri. Safu ya shida inaweza kutokea ikiwa maoni ya mwisho ya denture hayafanywa vizuri. Inachukua uvumilivu mkubwa na uzoefu kwa daktari wa meno kujua jinsi ya kutengeneza denture, na kwa sababu hii inaweza kuwa katika shauku bora ya mgonjwa kutafuta mtaalam, ama mtaalam wa densi au denturist, kutengeneza denture. Denturist ni mtaalamu aliyefundishwa na mwenye leseni ambaye huwaona wagonjwa wanaohitaji meno, sehemu, huelekeza au matengenezo. Denturist sio tu inachukua hisia, lakini hufanya denture nzima katika maabara yake mwenyewe. Denturist basi hupanga tarehe ya utoaji wa meno ya kumaliza kwa mgonjwa. Daktari wa meno ya jumla anaweza kufanya kazi nzuri kutengeneza meno, lakini tu ikiwa yeye ni mwenye uangalifu na mwenye uzoefu. Madaktari wa meno wengi hawafanyi meno tena. lakini badala yake chukua hisia za mdomo wa wagonjwa na kisha utumie maoni kwa maabara ya meno, ambayo inaweza kuwa mahali popote ulimwenguni, au kutuma mgonjwa kwa denturist. Mara tu maabara inapopokea hisia za meno ya mdomo wa mgonjwa, maabara huunda umbo la plaster kutoka kwao. Maabara hutumia ukungu kuunda miiba ya nta inayotumika kusajili kuumwa kwa mgonjwa. Rims hizi za nta zinarudishwa kwa daktari wa meno, ambaye Inawatumia kusajili kuumwa kwa mgonjwa. Daktari wa meno anaweza kumsaidia mgonjwa katika kuchagua saizi sahihi ya meno kwa meno, au tu kufanya uteuzi mwenyewe. Mara tu usajili wa bite ukikamilika na meno huchaguliwa kwa meno, mdomo wa nta kawaida hurejeshwa kwa maabara ya meno ili meno ya meno iwe ndani ya nta. Mara meno yamewekwa ndani ya mdomo wa nta, matokeo yake ni denture iliyowekwa tayari ambayo inaonekana kama bidhaa iliyomalizika. Denture hii iliyotanguliwa kawaida hurejeshwa katika ofisi ya daktari wa meno na mgonjwa kawaida huwa na nafasi ya kupitisha usanidi (kwa meno ya haraka au ya kawaida) au kujaribu meno kabla ya kumaliza. Baada ya idhini ya mgonjwa, daktari wa meno anarudisha densi ya mapema kwa maabara kwa usindikaji wa mwisho. Denture iliyokamilishwa basi inarudishwa katika ofisi ya daktari wa meno kwa kujifungua kwa mgonjwa.
neg_context_src: Kisafishaji cha meno (pia huitwa Cleanser ya meno), ni safi inayotumika kusafisha meno wakati iko nje ya mdomo. Matumizi yao kuu ni kudhibiti ukuaji wa vijidudu kwenye meno, haswa "Candida albicans", na hivyo kuzuia stomatitis inayohusiana na meno. Wakati meno huvaliwa kinywani, biofilm inakua ambayo inaweza kuwa sawa na jalada la meno. Inaweza kuwa ngumu na madini kama hesabu ya meno. Utakaso wa meno pia hutumiwa kuondoa stain na uchafu mwingine ambao unaweza kusababishwa na lishe, matumizi ya tumbaku, kunywa kahawa, chai ya kunywa, nk.

Msaada ni kanuni ambayo inaelezea jinsi mucosa ya msingi (tishu za mdomo, pamoja na ufizi) huzuia meno kutoka kwa kusonga kwa wima kuelekea safu inayohusika wakati wa kutafuna, na kwa hivyo kuwa na huzuni nyingi na kusonga mbele zaidi. Kwa arch ya lazima, kazi hii hutolewa kimsingi na rafu ya buccal, mkoa unaoenea baadaye kutoka nyuma au matuta ya nyuma, na kwa pedi iliyo na umbo la pear (eneo la nyuma zaidi la gingival ya keratinized inayoundwa na kuongeza chini ya papilla ya retro-molar baada ya uchimbaji wa jino la mwisho). Msaada wa sekondari kwa meno kamili ya lazima hutolewa na Alveolar Ridge Crest. Arch maxillary inapokea msaada wa msingi kutoka kwa palate ngumu ya usawa na eneo la nyuma la alveolar Ridge Crest. Kubwa ya denture ya denture (sehemu hiyo ya denture ambayo inaenea ndani ya vestibule), bora utulivu (paramu nyingine ya kutathmini kifafa cha denture kamili). Flanges ndefu zaidi ya kina cha kazi cha kiberiti ni kosa la kawaida katika ujenzi wa meno, mara nyingi (lakini sio kila wakati) na kusababisha harakati katika kazi, na vidonda (matangazo ya meno).

Vinginevyo, abutments za hisa hutumiwa kuhifadhi meno kwa kutumia adapta ya kiume iliyowekwa kwenye kuingiza na adapta ya kike kwenye denture. Aina mbili za kawaida za adapta ni mtindo wa mpira-na-socket na adapta ya mtindo wa kifungo. Aina hizi za kukomesha hisa huruhusu harakati za meno, lakini uhifadhi wa kutosha ili kuboresha hali ya maisha kwa wavaa meno, ikilinganishwa na meno ya kawaida. Bila kujali aina ya adapta, sehemu ya kike ya adapta ambayo imewekwa kwenye denture itahitaji uingizwaji wa mara kwa mara, hata hivyo idadi na aina ya adapta haionekani kuathiri kuridhika kwa mgonjwa na kahaba kwa njia mbadala zinazoweza kutolewa.

Meno ni vifaa vya kahaba vilivyotengenezwa ili kujaza mapengo ya meno yaliyokosekana. Densi za mtindo wa kawaida ni vifaa vinavyoweza kutolewa na vimeundwa kuwa meno kamili au sehemu ya meno ya meno kwa meno ya karibu. Kuna miundo mingi ya meno, ambayo hutegemea dhamana ya kemikali au kugonga kwenye meno au kushikamana kupitia implants za meno zinazojulikana kama prosthodontics ya kudumu.
Watu sasa wanaishi kwa muda mrefu na wanahifadhi meno yao kwa muda mrefu kwa sababu ya njia ya kinga ya meno. Ingawa viwango vya edentulism vinapungua haraka, hii inasababisha idadi ya meno ya asili yaliyowekwa kwenye dentition. Athari za hii zinaonekana dhahiri katika mpangilio wa utunzaji wa makazi, kwani wafanyikazi wa Msaidizi wa Huduma ya Kibinafsi mara nyingi huwa duni kama mkazi wa hali ya juu kwa uwiano wa PCA, utunzaji wa mdomo mara nyingi hauhudhuriwa vya kutosha au sio kabisa. Vituo vya utunzaji wa makazi vitaendelea kukutana na wakaazi wanaohifadhi meno yao ya asili kwani idadi ya watu inakua na kuishi kwa muda mrefu ili uingiliaji wa afya ya mdomo utahitajika kupambana na eneo hili la utunzaji ambalo linakosekana sana katika vituo vingi. Kutumia wataalamu wa afya ya mdomo katika sekta hii kunaweza kutoa msaada katika kufunga pengo.

Kusindika denture kawaida hufanywa kwa kutumia mbinu ya kupotea-nta ambayo fomu ya denture ya mwisho, pamoja na meno ya meno ya akriliki, imewekeza kwa jiwe. Uwekezaji huu basi huwashwa, na wakati inayeyuka nta huondolewa kupitia kituo cha spruning. Cavity iliyobaki basi imejazwa na sindano ya kulazimishwa au kumwaga kwenye akriliki ya meno, ambayo ni aina ya joto iliyoponywa au baridi. Katika kipindi cha usindikaji, joto liliponya acrylics - pia inaitwa acrylics ya kudumu ya meno -nenda kupitia mchakato unaoitwa upolimishaji, na kusababisha vifaa vya akriliki kushikamana sana na kuchukua masaa kadhaa kukamilisha. Baada ya kipindi cha kuponya, uwekezaji wa jiwe huondolewa, akriliki imechafuliwa, na meno yamekamilika. Matokeo ya mwisho ni denture ambayo inaonekana zaidi ya asili, ina nguvu zaidi na ni ya kudumu zaidi kuliko denture baridi ya muda iliyoponywa, inapinga stain na harufu, na itadumu kwa miaka mingi.

Meno (pia inajulikana kama meno ya uwongo) ni vifaa vya ufundi vilivyojengwa ili kuchukua nafasi ya meno kukosa, na inasaidiwa na tishu laini na ngumu za cavity ya mdomo. Meno ya kawaida hutolewa (denture inayoweza kutolewa au denture kamili). Walakini, kuna miundo mingi ya meno, ambayo hutegemea kushikamana au kushinikiza kwenye meno au implants za meno (prosthodontics iliyowekwa). Kuna aina mbili kuu za meno, tofauti kuwa ikiwa hutumiwa kuchukua nafasi ya meno kukosa kwenye arch ya lazima au kwenye arch maxillary.

Wanaweza pia kufanya kazi kwa uhuru katika kliniki yao na wagonjwa wanaotoa usimamizi sahihi na matibabu ya meno na vifaa vingine vya mdomo. Denturists wameelimishwa vizuri katika maarifa ya kliniki na kiufundi ya utunzaji wa meno, na pia kumaliza masaa mengi ya ustadi wa vitendo katika kutengeneza meno. Mwishowe wanapokea utafiti kamili zaidi katika prosthetics ya mdomo kuliko mtaalamu mwingine yeyote wa afya pamoja na daktari wa meno. Kwa hivyo, jukumu la kushirikiana la denturists hutoa mfano muhimu wa kupanga tena huduma za meno ili kupunguza mafadhaiko kutoka kwa madaktari wa meno, kuhifadhi wakati muhimu wa kurejesha, vipodozi, usafi, na taratibu za meno za dharura.

Denturism hufafanuliwa kama shughuli ya denturists ya kuchunguza afya ya mdomo, matibabu ya kupanga, kutengeneza meno ya bandia ikiwa ni pamoja na vifaa vingine vya mdomo vinavyoweza kutolewa na kuwafaa kwa wagonjwa. Ni taaluma inayotambulika ulimwenguni kote na kwa sasa inatumiwa katika nchi nyingi ikiwa ni pamoja na Australia, New Zealand, Merika, Uingereza na Canada. Huko Merika, Denturism ni sheria tu na inafanywa katika majimbo 7 (Maine, Arizona, Idaho, Montana, Washington, Oregon, na Colorado). Walakini, huko Australia, Uingereza na Canada, majimbo yote, majimbo na wilaya zinatambua taaluma hiyo.

Programu hiyo ni ya ushindani na ya kuchagua. Wanafunzi wanaotarajiwa wanahimizwa kukamilisha na kupata digrii ya teknolojia ya meno kabla ya kutumia mpango wa wataalamu wa meno. Kwa kupata maarifa ya teknolojia ya meno kabla ya kuingia Programu ya Mtaalam wa meno ingesaidia wanafunzi kufuata kazi za kozi na uelewa bora. Uzoefu wa kazi kutoka kliniki ya meno, maabara ya meno na uwanja mwingine wa meno ni pamoja na kufanikiwa kabla na baada ya kuhitimu.
report_src: Mtaalam maalumu anayebobea katika kuchukua vipimo vya mdomo, kutengeneza na kufaa meno bandia (denture) huitwa denturist; huyu ni mtaalamu aliyefundishwa na mwenye leseni ambaye huchukua hisia, hutengeneza denture yote maabara na kupanga tarehe ya kukabidhi meno kwa mgonjwa [1].
all_claims: Mtaalam maalumu anayebobea katika kuchukua vipimo vya mdomo, kutengeneza na kufaa meno bandia (denture) huitwa denturist; huyu ni mtaalamu aliyefundishwa na mwenye leseni ambaye huchukua hisia, hutengeneza denture yote maabara na kupanga tarehe ya kukabidhi meno kwa mgonjwa [1].
claims_w_citations: Mtaalam maalumu anayebobea katika kuchukua vipimo vya mdomo, kutengeneza na kufaa meno bandia (denture) huitwa denturist; huyu ni mtaalamu aliyefundishwa na mwenye leseni ambaye huchukua hisia, hutengeneza denture yote maabara na kupanga tarehe ya kukabidhi meno kwa mgonjwa [1].

question_en: Why do lions kill their own cubs?
pos_context_en: For example, newly dominant male lions often kill cubs in the pride that they did not sire. This behavior is adaptive because killing the cubs eliminates competition for their own offspring and causes the nursing females to come into heat faster, thus allowing more of his genes to enter into the population. Sociobiologists would view this instinctual cub-killing behavior as being inherited through the genes of successfully reproducing male lions, whereas non-killing behavior may have died out as those lions were less successful in reproducing.
neg_context_en:
When first introduced to the rest of the pride, lion cubs lack confidence when confronted with adults other than their mother. They soon begin to immerse themselves in the pride life, however, playing among themselves or attempting to initiate play with the adults. Lionesses with cubs of their own are more likely to be tolerant of another lioness's cubs than lionesses without cubs. Male tolerance of the cubs varies – sometimes a male will patiently let the cubs play with his tail or his mane, whereas another may snarl and bat the cubs away.
Weaning occurs after six or seven months. Male lions reach maturity at about three years of age and at four to five years are capable of challenging and displacing adult males associated with another pride. They begin to age and weaken at between 10 and 15 years of age at the latest. When one or more new males oust the previous males associated with a pride, the victors often kill any existing young cubs, perhaps because females do not become fertile and receptive until their cubs mature or die. Females often fiercely defend their cubs from a usurping male but are rarely successful unless a group of three or four mothers within a pride join forces against the male. Cubs also die from starvation and abandonment, and predation by leopards, hyenas and wild dogs. Up to 80% of lion cubs will die before the age of two.

When George Adamson is forced to kill a lion, after the lion kills a native villager, and then George kills a lioness out of self-defence, he brings home the three orphaned cubs she had been trying to protect. The Adamsons tend to the three orphaned lion cubs to young lionhood, and, when the time comes, the two largest are sent to the Rotterdam Zoo, while Elsa the Lioness (the smallest of the litter) remains with Joy. When Elsa is held responsible for stampeding a herd of elephants through a village, John Kendall, Adamson's boss, gives the couple three months to either rehabilitate Elsa to the wild, or send her to a zoo. Joy opposes sending Elsa to a zoo, and spends much time attempting to reintroduce Elsa to the life of a wild lion in a distant reserve. At last, she succeeds, and with mixed feelings and a breaking heart, she returns her friend to the wild. The Adamsons then depart for their home in England; a year later they return to Kenya for a week, hoping to find Elsa. They do, and happily discover she hasn't forgotten them and is the mother of three cubs. The Adamsons made an agreement not to handle the cubs, in contrast to the way they did with Elsa.The film's credits list lions and lionesses Boy, Girl, Henrietta, Mara, Ugas, and "the Cubs".

When one or more new male lions oust or replace a previous male(s) associated with a pride, they often kill any existing young cubs, a form of infanticide. Initially, both the University of Oxford study and Johnny Rodrigues, head of the Zimbabwe Conservation Task Force, indicated that they believed Cecil's six cubs could be killed by the new dominant male in the pride. In a later interview, however, Rodrigues said Jericho had assumed control of the pride but had not killed Cecil's cubs, and that he was also keeping the cubs safe from any rivals.

Infanticide is the killing of a non-adult animal by an adult of the same species. Infanticide is often, but not always, accompanied by cannibalism. It is often displayed in lions; a male lion encroaching on the territory of a rival pride will often kill any existing cubs fathered by other males; this brings the lionesses into heat more quickly, enabling the invading lion to sire his own young. This is a good example of cannibalistic behavior in a genetic context.

Daly and Wilson point out that infanticide is an extreme form of biasing parental investment that is widely practiced in the animal world. For example, when an immigrant male lion enters a pride, it is not uncommon for him to kill the cubs fathered by other males. Since the pride can only provide support for a limited number of cubs to survive to adulthood, the killing of the cubs in competition with the new male's potential offspring increases the chances of his progeny surviving to maturity. In addition, the act of infanticide speeds the return to sexual receptivity in the females, allowing for the male to father his own offspring in a timelier manner. These observations indicate that in the animal world, males employ certain measures in order to ensure that parental investment is geared specifically toward their own offspring.

Lahore Zoo received a pair of Bengal tigers from Belgium in 1992 to start their captive breeding program. In 1997, six Bengal tigers died from "Trypanosomiasis" at the zoo, and in 2006, four more became victims. In July 2007, two female Bengal tigers, one of which had given the zoo 19 cubs, died from same disease. In early May 2009, a 3-year-old female Bengal tiger died after a cesarean section to take out her dead babies. In April 2009, a Bengal tiger gave birth to four In July 2009, a lion gave birth to two cubs but killed them by eating their heads. Director, Zafar Shah, said that the lion had been killing her cubs for the last three years and is a victim of "cannibalism" - a mental disease found in 5-6% of lions worldwide. At Lahore Zoo, there have been many births of Bengal tiger cubs who are deformed and do not survive long. In late 2010, the officials showed concern for the issue of inbreeding that might be the reason behind these deaths.

In January 1961, Elsa died from disease resulting from a tick bite. Her three young cubs became a nuisance, killing the livestock of local farmers. The Adamsons, who feared the farmers might kill the cubs, were able to eventually capture them and transport them to neighboring Tanganyika Territory, where they were promised a home at Serengeti National Park. In the concluding part of "Forever Free" the Adamsons lost track of the cubs in their new home. After describing a fruitless search, Joy Adamson contemplated a pair of lions: "My heart was with them wherever they were. But it was also with these two lions here in front of us; and as I watched this beautiful pair, I realized how all the characteristics of our cubs were inherent in them. Indeed, in every lion I saw during our searches I recognized the intrinsic nature of Elsa, Jespah, Gopa and Little Elsa, the spirit of all the magnificent lions in Africa".

Asiatic lions mate foremost between September and January. Mating lasts three to six days. During these days, they usually do not hunt, but only drink water. Gestation lasts about 110 days. Litters comprise one to four cubs.
Dominant males mate more frequently than their coalition partners. During a study carried out between December 2012 and December 2016, three females were observed switching mating partners in favour of the dominant male.
The average interval between births is 24 months, unless cubs die due to infanticide by adult males or because of diseases and injuries. Cubs become independent at the age of about two years. Subadult males leave their natal pride latest at the age of three years and become nomads until they establish their own territory.

The Cowardly Lion is a minor character in author Gregory Maguire's 1995 revisionist novel "" and its 2003 Broadway musical adaptation. In both works, he is first seen as a Lion Cub (lion with human attributes) who has been torn from his mother and used as an experiment (in the book by Doctor Dillamond's replacement, Doctor Nikidik, and in the musical an agent of the Wizard) on the nature of Animals. Elphaba (the future Wicked Witch of the West) saves the Lion Cub that in the end of both adaptations attempts to kill her. He also appears in Maguire's 2005 sequel "Son of a Witch", also in a minor role. The Cowardly Lion is the central character in the third book of the series, "A Lion Among Men", where he is given the name of Brrr, which was the name given to him in "Wicked". Doctor Nikidik mentions that he intended to give the Lion Cub the name of Prrr, but since "it shivers more than it purrs," he names it Brrr.
question_src: Kwa nini simba huua watoto wao wenyewe?
pos_context_src: Kwa mfano, simba wa kiume wapya wanaotawala mara nyingi huua watoto kwenye kiburi ambacho hawakuimba. Tabia hii ni ya kubadilika kwa sababu kuua Wakuu huondoa ushindani kwa watoto wao wenyewe na husababisha wanawake wauguzi kuja joto haraka, na hivyo kuruhusu jeni lake zaidi kuingia katika idadi ya watu. Wanasaikolojia wangeona tabia hii ya kuua ya ujazo kama kurithiwa kupitia jeni la kuzaa kwa mafanikio simba wa kiume, wakati tabia isiyo ya kuua inaweza kuwa ilikufa kwani simba hao hawakufanikiwa sana katika kuzaliana.
neg_context_src:
Wakati wa kwanza kuletwa kwa kiburi kilichobaki, watoto wa simba hawana ujasiri wakati wanakabiliwa na watu wazima isipokuwa mama yao. Hivi karibuni wanaanza kujiingiza katika maisha ya kiburi, hata hivyo, wakicheza kati yao au kujaribu kuanzisha kucheza na watu wazima. Simba na watoto wao wenyewe wana uwezekano mkubwa wa kuwa na uvumilivu wa watoto wengine wa simba kuliko simba bila watoto. Uvumilivu wa kiume wa Cuba hutofautiana - wakati mwingine kiume atawaacha watoto wachanga kucheza na mkia wake au mane yake, wakati mwingine anaweza kuteleza na kufyatua watoto wachanga.
Kuchochea hufanyika baada ya miezi sita au saba. Simba wa kiume hufikia ukomavu wakiwa na umri wa miaka mitatu na kwa miaka nne hadi mitano wana uwezo wa changamoto na kuwaondoa wanaume wazima wanaohusishwa na kiburi kingine. Wanaanza kuzeeka na kudhoofisha wakiwa na umri wa miaka 10 hadi 15 hivi karibuni. Wakati wanaume mmoja au zaidi wapya wakiondoa wanaume wa zamani wanaohusishwa na kiburi, washindi mara nyingi huua watoto wachanga wowote waliopo, labda kwa sababu wanawake hawana rutuba na wanakubali hadi watoto wao wazima au wanakufa. Wanawake mara nyingi hutetea kwa ukali watoto wao kutoka kwa mwanaume anayechukua lakini hawafaulu sana isipokuwa kikundi cha mama watatu au wanne ndani ya vikosi vya kujiunga na vikosi dhidi ya mwanaume. Cuba pia hufa kutokana na njaa na kutelekezwa, na utabiri wa chui, fisi na mbwa mwitu. Hadi 80% ya watoto wa simba watakufa kabla ya umri wa miaka miwili.

Wakati George Adamson analazimishwa kuua simba, baada ya simba kumuua mwanakijiji wa asili, na kisha George anaua simba kutoka kwa kujilinda, huleta nyumbani watoto watatu wa watoto yatima ambaye alikuwa akijaribu kulinda. Adamsons huwa na watoto watatu wa watoto yatima kwa vijana wa simba, na, wakati utakapofika, mbili kubwa hutumwa kwa Rotterdam Zoo, wakati Elsa simba (mdogo wa takataka) anabaki na furaha. Wakati Elsa anashikiliwa kwa kukanyaga kundi la tembo kupitia kijiji, John Kendall, bosi wa Adamson, anawapa wanandoa miezi mitatu ili kumkarabati Elsa porini, au kumpeleka kwenye zoo. Furaha inapinga kupeleka Elsa kwenye zoo, na hutumia wakati mwingi kujaribu kuunda tena Elsa kwenye maisha ya simba mwitu kwenye hifadhi ya mbali. Mwishowe, anafanikiwa, na kwa hisia mchanganyiko na moyo wa kuvunja, anamrudisha rafiki yake porini. Adamsons basi huondoka nyumbani kwao England; Mwaka mmoja baadaye wanarudi Kenya kwa wiki, wakitarajia kupata Elsa. Wao hufanya, na kugundua kwa furaha hajasahau yao na ndiye mama wa watoto watatu. Adamsons walifanya makubaliano ya kutoshughulikia Cuba, tofauti na jinsi walivyofanya na Elsa.Miko wa filamu huorodhesha Simba na Simbases Boy, Msichana, Henrietta, Mara, Ugas, na "The Cubs".

Wakati simba mmoja wa kiume au zaidi atakapokuwa akiacha au kuchukua nafasi ya kiume (s) ya zamani inayohusishwa na kiburi, mara nyingi huua watoto wachanga wowote waliopo, aina ya watoto wachanga. Hapo awali, Chuo Kikuu cha Oxford Study na Johnny Rodrigues, mkuu wa Kikosi cha Uhifadhi wa Zimbabwe, walionyesha kuwa waliamini watoto sita wa Cecil wanaweza kuuawa na mwanaume mpya katika kiburi. Katika mahojiano ya baadaye, hata hivyo, Rodrigues alisema Jeriko alichukua udhibiti wa kiburi lakini alikuwa hajawauwa Wakuu wa Cecil, na kwamba pia alikuwa akiweka Wakuu salama kutoka kwa wapinzani wowote.

Utoto wa watoto ni mauaji ya mnyama ambaye sio mtu mzima na mtu mzima wa spishi zile zile. Utoto wa watoto mara nyingi, lakini sio kila wakati, unaambatana na cannibalism. Mara nyingi huonyeshwa kwenye simba; Simba wa kiume anayeingia kwenye eneo la kiburi cha mpinzani mara nyingi ataua watoto wowote wa zamani waliozaliwa na wanaume wengine; Hii inaleta simba kwenye joto haraka zaidi, kuwezesha simba anayevamia kuangusha watoto wake mwenyewe. Hii ni mfano mzuri wa tabia ya bangi katika muktadha wa maumbile.

Daly na Wilson wanasema kwamba watoto wachanga ni aina kubwa ya uwekezaji wa wazazi ambao unafanywa sana katika ulimwengu wa wanyama. Kwa mfano, wakati simba wa kiume wahamiaji anapoingia kiburi, sio kawaida kwake kuua watoto wa watoto waliozaliwa na wanaume wengine. Kwa kuwa kiburi kinaweza kutoa msaada kwa idadi ndogo ya watoto wa Cuba kuishi hadi watu wazima, mauaji ya Wakuu katika mashindano na uzao mpya wa kiume huongeza nafasi za kizazi chake kuishi kwa ukomavu. Kwa kuongezea, kitendo cha watoto wachanga huharakisha kurudi kwa utaftaji wa kijinsia kwa wanawake, kumruhusu mwanaume kuzaa watoto wake kwa njia ya wakati. Uchunguzi huu unaonyesha kuwa katika ulimwengu wa wanyama, wanaume huajiri hatua fulani ili kuhakikisha kuwa uwekezaji wa wazazi unakusudiwa haswa kwa watoto wao wenyewe.

Lahore Zoo alipokea jozi ya Tiger ya Bengal kutoka Ubelgiji mnamo 1992 kuanza mpango wao wa ufugaji mateka. Mnamo 1997, Tiger sita za Bengal zilikufa kutokana na "trypanosomiasis" kwenye zoo, na mnamo 2006, wanne wakawa waathirika. Mnamo Julai 2007, Tiger mbili za kike za Bengal, moja ambayo ilikuwa imetoa zoo 19, alikufa kutokana na ugonjwa huo. Mwanzoni mwa Mei 2009, mwanamke wa miaka 3 Bengal Tiger alikufa baada ya sehemu ya cesarean kuchukua watoto wake waliokufa. Mnamo Aprili 2009, Tiger ya Bengal ilizaa nne mnamo Julai 2009, simba alizaa watoto wawili lakini aliwaua kwa kula vichwa vyao. Mkurugenzi, Zafar Shah, alisema kuwa simba alikuwa akiua watoto wake kwa miaka mitatu iliyopita na ni mwathirika wa "cannibalism" - ugonjwa wa akili uliopatikana katika 5-6% ya simba ulimwenguni. Katika Zoo ya Lahore, kumekuwa na watoto wengi wa watoto wa Bengal Tiger ambao wameharibika na hawaishi kwa muda mrefu. Mwishoni mwa mwaka wa 2010, maafisa walionyesha wasiwasi juu ya suala la kuzaliana ambayo inaweza kuwa sababu ya vifo hivi.

Mnamo Januari 1961, Elsa alikufa kutokana na ugonjwa unaotokana na kuumwa na tick. Vijana wake watatu wakawa shida, na kuua mifugo ya wakulima wa eneo hilo. Adamsons, ambao waliogopa wakulima wanaweza kuua Wakuu, waliweza kuwakamata na kuwasafirisha katika eneo la jirani la Tanganyika, ambapo waliahidiwa nyumba katika Hifadhi ya Kitaifa ya Serengeti. Katika sehemu ya kuhitimisha ya "Forever Free" Adams walipoteza wimbo wa Wakuu katika nyumba yao mpya. Baada ya kuelezea utaftaji usio na matunda, Joy Adamson alitafakari jozi ya simba: "Moyo wangu ulikuwa pamoja nao popote walipokuwa. Lakini pia ilikuwa na simba hawa wawili hapa mbele yetu; na kama nilivyotazama jozi hii nzuri, niligundua jinsi tabia zote za watoto wetu zilikuwa asili yao. simba barani Afrika ".

Asia simba mwenzi wa mbele kati ya Septemba na Januari. Kuoga huchukua siku tatu hadi sita. Wakati wa siku hizi, kawaida hawawinda, lakini kunywa maji tu. Ishara hudumu kama siku 110. Litters inajumuisha cub moja hadi nne.
Wanaume wakubwa mara nyingi zaidi kuliko wenzi wao wa umoja. Wakati wa utafiti uliofanywa kati ya Desemba 2012 na Desemba 2016, wanawake watatu walizingatiwa wakibadilisha washirika kwa niaba ya mwanaume mkubwa.
Kipindi cha wastani kati ya kuzaliwa ni miezi 24, isipokuwa Cuba hufa kwa sababu ya watoto wachanga na wanaume wazima au kwa sababu ya magonjwa na majeraha. Cubs huwa huru katika umri wa miaka kama mbili. Wanaume wa Subadult huacha kiburi chao cha asili cha hivi karibuni wakiwa na umri wa miaka mitatu na kuwa nomads hadi watakapoanzisha eneo lao.

Simba ya Cowardly ni tabia ndogo katika riwaya ya marekebisho ya mwandishi wa Gregory Maguire "" na muundo wake wa muziki wa Broadway wa 2003. Katika kazi zote mbili, anaonekana kwanza kama mtoto wa simba (simba aliye na sifa za kibinadamu) ambaye amebomolewa kutoka kwa mama yake na kutumika kama jaribio (katika kitabu na uingizwaji wa Daktari Dillamond, Daktari Nikidik, na katika muziki wa wakala wa Mchawi) juu ya asili ya wanyama. Elphaba (Mchawi Mbaya wa Magharibi) anaokoa Cub ya Simba kwamba mwisho wa marekebisho yote mawili yanajaribu kumuua. Anaonekana pia katika safu ya Maguire ya 2005 "Mwana wa Mchawi", pia katika jukumu dogo. Simba ya Cowardly ndiye mhusika mkuu katika kitabu cha tatu cha mfululizo, "Simba kati ya Wanaume", ambapo anapewa jina la Brrr, ambalo jina alipewa katika "Wovu". Daktari Nikidik anataja kwamba alikusudia kumpa mtoto wa simba jina la PRRR, lakini kwa kuwa "inatetemeka zaidi kuliko hiyo," anaiita Brrr.
report_src: Simba dume mpya anapotwaa uongozi wa kiburi huua makaratasi yaliyopo, kwa sababu kibiolojia kitendo hiki kinamnyima mpinzani yeyote nafasi ya kueneza jeni zake na, muhimu zaidi, husababisha majike waliokuwa wananyonyesha kuacha kunyonyesha na kurudi joto mapema, hivyo kumpa dume huyo fursa ya kuzaa haraka na kusambaza jeni lake kwa idadi kubwa ya watoto wapya; dume asiyeua hangebaki na faida hii ya uzazi na angepoteza ushindani wa kijeni [1].

question_en: What does nerfing mean?
pos_context_en: A nerf is a change to a game that reduces the desirability or effectiveness of a particular game element. The term is also used as a verb for the act of making such a change. The first established use of the term was in "Ultima Online", as a reference to the Nerf brand of toys whose bullets are soft and less likely to cause serious injury.
neg_context_en:
A Nerf war is an activity involving Nerf Blasters or other foam-firing toy weapons. Nerf wars can be a wide range of games, from informal shootouts in offices and basements to well-organized outdoor battles with high-powered modified blasters. Since foam-firing guns are relatively safe and cheap, Nerf wars can include participants and battlefields otherwise unsuitable for airsoft and paintball.
Nerf wars can take place anywhere. Any area with a good balance of open space and cover can be a candidate. Basements, offices, and backyards are common locations for informal games. For larger wars with more participants, bigger venues like gymnasiums, public parks, forests, ravines, and schools make good playing areas. The inside of a large hall such as a room can may be turned into a battlefield by turning tables onto their sides. When planning a Nerf war in a public area, the organizer typically reserves the space and watches out for non-participants to reduce any liability. The ability to play in free locations is an important element of a Nerf war's accessibility.

A nerf bar is a tubular device fitted to the side of a racecar, typically single-seat race cars that compete on asphalt or dirt oval tracks. A "nerf" is a small, sometimes intentional, collision between two cars in which one driver bumps the other to facilitate a successful pass. The nerf bar protects the sides of the vehicles and also keeps their tires from becoming entangled. If fast-spinning tires come in contact with each other, one or both of the cars may lose control or even become airborne. These are commonly used on Modifieds such as used in the NASCAR Whelen Modified Series, and the wheel pods behind the rear wheels on a Dallara DW12 INDYCAR is often nicknamed the nerf bar because of the similar purpose.

According to most enthusiasts and the general public, Nerf stands for ""non-expanding recreational foam"." This is supported by the fact that the darts are made from a solid, spongy cellular material. To produce it, polyester resin reacts with another compound in the presence of CO from another reaction. It is this gas that creates open pockets within the polyurethane that, in turn, make the material soft and light. However, there is no such acronym listed on any of the patents for the blasters and/or other products in the Nerf product line, so this urban legend has long been proven false; it is instead a backronym.
Nerf is a brand of toy and can also refer to the foam that these toys use.

The band takes their name from the "Star Wars" franchise. A "nerf" is a domesticated, bison-like quadruped, bred mainly as fatstock; thus, a "" (equivalent to a sheep herder) is not a well-regarded occupation, especially not by Princess Leia (Carrie Fisher). In the film "The Empire Strikes Back" (1980), Leia insults Han Solo (Harrison Ford) for asserting that she has romantic feelings for him: "Why you stuck-up, half-witted, scruffy-looking nerfherder!"

Nerfs in various online games, including "Anarchy Online", have spurred in-world protests. Since many items in virtual worlds are sold or traded among players, a nerf may have an outsized impact on the virtual economy. As players respond, the nerf may cause prices to fluctuate before settling down in a different equilibrium. This impact on the economy, along with the original impact of the nerf, can cause large player resentment for even a small change. In particular, in the case of items or abilities which have been nerfed, players can become upset over the perceived wasted efforts in obtaining the now nerfed features. For games where avatars and items represent significant economic value, this may bring up legal issues over the lost value.

Nerf (trademarked in capitals as NERF) is a toy brand created by Parker Brothers and currently owned by Hasbro. Most of the toys are a variety of foam-based weaponry, with other Nerf products including balls for sports like American football, basketball and baseball. The most notable of the toys are the dart guns (referred to by Hasbro as "blasters") that shoot ammunition made from Nerf foam. Since many such items were released during the 1970s, Nerf products often feature bright neon colors and soft textures similar to the flagship Nerf ball. The slogan, which has been frequently used since advertising in the 1990s, is ""It's Nerf or Nothin'!"". Annual revenues under the Nerf brand are approximately .

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.
s͎ is a symbol used in the Extensions to the International Phonetic Alphabet to represent a whistled s. The sound occurs in the Shona language represented by sv, as in the name of Morgan Tsvangirai.
question_src: Je! Nerfing inamaanisha nini?
pos_context_src: NERF ni mabadiliko kwa mchezo ambao hupunguza kutamani au ufanisi wa kitu fulani cha mchezo. Neno hilo pia hutumiwa kama kitenzi kwa kitendo cha kufanya mabadiliko kama haya. Matumizi ya kwanza ya neno hilo yalikuwa katika "Ultima Online", kama kumbukumbu ya chapa ya Nerf ya vitu vyake vya kuchezea ambavyo risasi ni laini na chini ya uwezekano wa kusababisha jeraha kubwa.
neg_context_src:
Vita vya NERF ni shughuli inayohusisha Blasters za Nerf au silaha zingine za kurusha povu. Vita vya Nerf vinaweza kuwa michezo mingi, kutoka kwa risasi zisizo rasmi katika ofisi na basement hadi vita vilivyoandaliwa vizuri na blasters zilizo na nguvu nyingi. Kwa kuwa bunduki za kurusha povu ni salama na bei rahisi, vita vya Nerf vinaweza kujumuisha washiriki na uwanja wa vita vinginevyo haifai kwa Airsoft na mpira wa rangi.
Vita vya Nerf vinaweza kuchukua mahali popote. Sehemu yoyote iliyo na usawa mzuri wa nafasi wazi na kifuniko kinaweza kuwa mgombea. Basement, ofisi, na uwanja wa nyuma ni maeneo ya kawaida kwa michezo isiyo rasmi. Kwa vita vikubwa na washiriki zaidi, kumbi kubwa kama mazoezi ya mazoezi, mbuga za umma, misitu, mito, na shule hufanya maeneo mazuri ya kucheza. Ndani ya ukumbi mkubwa kama chumba inaweza kugeuzwa kuwa uwanja wa vita kwa kugeuza meza pande zao. Wakati wa kupanga vita vya NERF katika eneo la umma, mratibu kawaida huhifadhi nafasi hiyo na hutazama kwa washiriki wasio washiriki ili kupunguza dhima yoyote. Uwezo wa kucheza katika maeneo ya bure ni sehemu muhimu ya upatikanaji wa vita vya Nerf.

Baa ya NERF ni kifaa cha tubular kilichowekwa upande wa mbio za mbio, kawaida magari ya mbio za kiti moja ambazo hushindana kwenye lami au nyimbo za mviringo za uchafu. "Nerf" ni ndogo, wakati mwingine kukusudia, mgongano kati ya magari mawili ambayo dereva mmoja hutupa mwingine ili kuwezesha kupita kwa mafanikio. Baa ya NERF inalinda pande za magari na pia huzuia matairi yao yasishike. Ikiwa matairi yanayozunguka haraka yanawasiliana, moja au moja ya magari yanaweza kupoteza udhibiti au hata kuwa hewa. Hizi hutumiwa kawaida kwenye modifieds kama vile kutumika katika safu ya Nascar Whelen iliyorekebishwa, na maganda ya gurudumu nyuma ya magurudumu ya nyuma kwenye Dallara DW12 Indycar mara nyingi huitwa Bar ya Nerf kwa sababu ya kusudi kama hilo.

Kulingana na wanaovutia na umma kwa ujumla, NERF inasimama "" povu isiyo ya kupanua ya burudani "." Hii inaungwa mkono na ukweli kwamba mishale hufanywa kutoka kwa nyenzo ngumu, ya spongy. Ili kuizalisha, resin ya polyester humenyuka na kiwanja kingine mbele ya CO kutoka kwa athari nyingine. Ni gesi hii ambayo huunda mifuko wazi ndani ya polyurethane ambayo, kwa upande wake, hufanya nyenzo laini na nyepesi. Walakini, hakuna kifungu kama hicho kilichoorodheshwa kwenye ruhusu yoyote ya Blasters na/au bidhaa zingine kwenye mstari wa bidhaa wa Nerf, kwa hivyo hadithi hii ya mijini imethibitishwa kwa muda mrefu; Badala yake ni jina la nyuma.
NERF ni chapa ya toy na pia inaweza kurejelea povu ambayo vifaa vya kuchezea hutumia.

Bendi inachukua jina lao kutoka kwa franchise ya "Star Wars". "NERF" ni sehemu ya ndani, iliyo na bison-kama quadruped, iliyowekwa kama mafuta; Kwa hivyo, "" (sawa na mchungaji wa kondoo) sio kazi inayofikiriwa vizuri, haswa sio na Princess Leia (Carrie Fisher). Katika filamu "The Dola Strikes Back" (1980), Leia anamtukana Han Solo (Harrison Ford) kwa kudai kwamba ana hisia za kimapenzi kwake: "Kwa nini umekwama, nusu-mvivu, mwenye sura nzuri!"

Nerfs katika michezo mbali mbali ya mkondoni, pamoja na "Anarchy Online", wamechochea maandamano ya ulimwengu. Kwa kuwa vitu vingi katika ulimwengu wa kawaida huuzwa au kuuzwa kati ya wachezaji, NERF inaweza kuwa na athari ya nje kwa uchumi wa kawaida. Kama wachezaji wanajibu, NERF inaweza kusababisha bei kubadilika kabla ya kutulia katika usawa tofauti. Athari hii kwa uchumi, pamoja na athari ya asili ya NERF, inaweza kusababisha chuki kubwa ya wachezaji kwa mabadiliko madogo. Hasa, katika kesi ya vitu au uwezo ambao umekuwa na wasiwasi, wachezaji wanaweza kukasirika juu ya juhudi zilizopotea katika kupata sifa za sasa. Kwa michezo ambayo avatars na vitu vinawakilisha thamani kubwa ya kiuchumi, hii inaweza kuleta maswala ya kisheria juu ya thamani iliyopotea.

NERF (iliyowekwa alama katika miji mikuu kama NERF) ni chapa ya toy iliyoundwa na Parker Brothers na kwa sasa inamilikiwa na Hasbro. Toys nyingi ni aina ya silaha za msingi wa povu, na bidhaa zingine za NERF pamoja na mipira ya michezo kama mpira wa miguu wa Amerika, mpira wa kikapu na baseball. Yaliyojulikana zaidi ya vifaa vya kuchezea ni bunduki za dart (zilizotajwa na Hasbro kama "blasters") ambazo risasi za risasi zilizotengenezwa kutoka kwa povu ya Nerf. Kwa kuwa vitu vingi kama hivyo vilitolewa wakati wa miaka ya 1970, bidhaa za NERF mara nyingi huwa na rangi nzuri za neon na muundo laini sawa na mpira wa bendera ya Nerf. Kauli mbiu, ambayo imekuwa ikitumika mara kwa mara tangu matangazo katika miaka ya 1990, ni "" Ni Nerf au Nothin '! "". Mapato ya kila mwaka chini ya chapa ya NERF ni takriban.

Winfield Toll Bridge, pia inajulikana kama Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, ni kihistoria wa kihistoria wa Cantilever Warren Truss Bridge iliyoko Winfield na Red House, Kaunti ya Putnam, West Virginia. Ilijengwa mnamo 1955, na inachukua Mto wa Kanawha, iliyobeba West Virginia Route 34. Cantilever kupitia-truss ina nafasi mbili za nanga kila futi 245 kwa urefu na urefu wa futi 462 kwa urefu kati ya mistari ya kituo cha pier. Span kuu ina futi mbili 128, inchi 4, mikono ya cantilever na miguu 205, inchi 4, iliyosimamishwa.

S͎ ni ishara inayotumika katika viongezeo kwa alfabeti ya kimataifa ya fonetiki kuwakilisha s. Sauti hiyo hufanyika katika lugha ya Kingereza inayowakilishwa na SV, kama kwa jina la Morgan Tsvangirai.
report_src: “Nerfing” ni mchakato wa kubadili mchezo ili kupunguza nguvu, ufanisi au mvuto wa kipengele fulani—kama silaha, tabia au mbinu—ili kuweka uwiano wa ushindani; neno hili pia hutumika kama kitenzi kuashiria kuchukua hatua hiyo [1]. Mwenzo wa matumizi ya “nerf” ulionekana katika mchezo mtandaoni “Ultima Online,” yakifananishwa na bidhaa laini za uchezaji za chapa ya Nerf ambazo “risasi” zake huwa laini na hivyo hazisababishi madhara makubwa, ikimpa mchezaji picha ya kupunguzwa makali katika mchezo [1].
