question_en: What years did Glenn "Pop" Warner live?
pos_context_en: Glenn Scobey Warner (April 5, 1871 – September 7, 1954), most commonly known as Pop Warner, was an American college football coach at various institutions who is responsible for several key aspects of the modern game. Included among his innovations are the single and double wing formations (precursors of the modern spread and shotgun formations), the three point stance and the body blocking technique. Fellow pioneer coach Amos Alonzo Stagg called Warner "one of the excellent creators". He was inducted as a coach into the College Football Hall of Fame as part of its inaugural class in 1951. He also contributed to a junior football program which became known as Pop Warner Little Scholars, a popular youth American football organization.
neg_context_title_en: 1940 San Jose State Spartans football team
neg_context_en: Warner was the brother of famed football coach Pop Warner. In 1902, Bill and Glenn both played pro football for the Syracuse Athletic Club during the first World Series of Football, held at Madison Square Garden. It was during this event, that Warner played in the very first professional indoor football game as his Syracuse squad upset the heavily favored "New York" team. While Glenn was injured during the event with a head injury, Bill and the rest of the Syracuse team went on to win the event.

Glenn "Pop" Warner coached at several schools throughout his career, including the University of Georgia, Cornell University, University of Pittsburgh, Stanford University, and Temple University. One of his most famous stints was at the Carlisle Indian Industrial School, where he coached Jim Thorpe, who went on to become the first president of the National Football League, an Olympic Gold Medalist, and is widely considered one of the best overall athletes in history. Warner wrote one of the first important books of football strategy, "Football for Coaches and Players", published in 1927. Though the shift was invented by Stagg, Warner's single wing and double wing formations greatly improved upon it; for almost 40 years, these were among the most important formations in football. As part of his single and double wing formations, Warner was one of the first coaches to effectively utilize the forward pass. Among his other innovations are modern blocking schemes, shoulder pads, and the three-point stance. The youth football league, Pop Warner Little Scholars, was named in his honor.

Glenn "Pop" Warner coached at several schools throughout his career, including the University of Georgia, Cornell University, University of Pittsburgh, Stanford University, Iowa State University, and Temple University. One of his most famous stints was at the Carlisle Indian Industrial School, where he coached Jim Thorpe, who went on to become the first president of the National Football League, an Olympic Gold Medalist, and is widely considered one of the best overall athletes in history. Warner wrote one of the first important books of football strategy, "Football for Coaches and Players", published in 1927. Though the shift was invented by Stagg, Warner's single wing and double wing formations greatly improved upon it; for almost 40 years, these were among the most important formations in football. As part of his single and double wing formations, Warner was one of the first coaches to effectively utilize the forward pass. Among his other innovations are modern blocking schemes, the three-point stance, and the reverse play. The youth football league, Pop Warner Little Scholars, was named in his honor.

Wilton lettered three seasons (1926–1928) in football for Glenn Scobey "Pop" Warner at Stanford University. In his three years the Stanford football team went a combined 26–5–3 with two trips to the Rose Bowl. In 1927 against USC he caught a 74-yard touchdown pass from Biff Hoffman, which was at the time the longest in Stanford history.

While coaching at Temple, Warner continued living in Palo Alto (where Stanford is located). After his 1938 retirement he was immediately recruited as an advisor to Dudley DeGroot, a center at Stanford and head coach at San Jose State University (near Palo Alto). Officially an advisor, Warner was immediately put in charge of the offense. According to Powers, "DeGroot had been using a single back offense but Pop immediately changed to the double wing, much to the doubts of San Jose players. However, the formation began to click and San Jose not only enjoyed an undefeated season but was the highest scoring team in the nation." That year the San Jose State Spartans played against College of the Pacific, coached by Amos Alonzo Stagg. It was the first time the two coaches had met since 1907, when Warner was coaching Carlisle and defeated Stagg's University of Chicago 18–4. Warner and DeGroot's San Jose State defeated Stagg's Pacific Tigers, 39–0.

During the first 40 years of organized varsity college lacrosse, known alternately as the ICLA, ILA, USICLL, USILL and USILA, two Pennsylvania schools, Lehigh and Swarthmore fielded dominant teams. The two teams were voted National Champions of college lacrosse a combined fourteen (14) seasons. Glenn "Pop" Warner, the Hall of Fame football coach at the Carlisle Indian School (PA) from 1899 to 1903, substituted lacrosse for baseball during the spring season because he said, "Lacrosse is a developer of health and strength. It is a game that spectators rave over once they understand it." It is also likely that lacrosse, a contact sport, helped prepare his football players for the fall season. By 1920, the USILL had expanded to include teams from Syracuse, Rutgers, Penn State and, encouraged by Pop Warner, even considered adding a varsity team at the University of Pittsburgh. In 1920, college lacrosse realigned their association, adding a Southern Division, which included powerful teams from Lehigh, Penn and Swarthmore along with traditional Maryland power Johns Hopkins. The United States Intercollegiate Lacrosse Association (USILA), the organization still in existence today, officially was formed in November 1925.
Famed football coach Glenn Scobey "Pop" Warner was an advisory coach for the Spartans in 1939 and 1940, helping the team to a 24–1 record over the two seasons.

The following are the conference's various Player of the Year award recipients. In 2004 the Defensive Player of the Year award was renamed the Pat Tillman Defensive Player of the Year.
The Glenn "Pop" Warner Memorial Trophy was awarded annually by the Palo Club to the most valuable senior player on the West Coast. It was awarded from 1950 to 2004. Notably, all recipients played for Pac-10 institutions. The award is distinguished from the unaffiliated W. J. Voit Memorial Trophy, presented annually from 1951 to 1978 to the top player on the Pacific Coast regardless of class-year.

Although the 1915 season was a success, the next year's team was one of the greatest of Warner's career. The Panthers were again undefeated and, like the previous year, six of the eight games were shutouts. Thirty-two of their 35 players were from Western Pennsylvania, near Pittsburgh. The team scored 255 points, conceding 25. Warner considered the team an improvement because its defense was more dominant than the previous year's. The Panthers were the consensus national champions, and Warner became recognized as one of football's greatest coaches.
In 1917 the United States entered World War I, and some players (including Andy Hastings and Jimmy Dehart) entered military service. Pittsburgh played an undefeated full season despite the war, although it was not awarded the national championship. Although the team lacked the previous year's punch, it dominated the opposition. A key aspect of its success was the opposing coaches' inability to address Warner's evolving strategies; according to Powers, "His reverse plays were a mystery, although Pop always was willing to explain them in detail to any other coach".
question_src: Glenn "pop" Warner aliishi miaka gani?
pos_context_src: Glenn Scobey Warner (Aprili 5, 1871 - Septemba 7, 1954), anayejulikana sana kama Pop Warner, alikuwa mkufunzi wa mpira wa miguu wa chuo kikuu katika taasisi mbali mbali ambaye ana jukumu la mambo kadhaa muhimu ya mchezo wa kisasa. Imejumuishwa kati ya uvumbuzi wake ni aina moja na mbili za mrengo (watangulizi wa muundo wa kisasa wa kueneza na bunduki), msimamo wa alama tatu na mbinu ya kuzuia mwili. Kocha mwenzangu wa painia Amosi Alonzo Stagg aliitwa Warner "mmoja wa waundaji bora". Aliingizwa kama kocha katika Ukumbi wa Soka wa Chuo cha Umaarufu kama sehemu ya darasa lake la uzinduzi mnamo 1951. Pia alichangia mpango wa mpira wa miguu ambao ulijulikana kama Pop Warner Little Scholars, shirika maarufu la mpira wa miguu la Amerika.

Tuzo za Mpira wa Miguu za Pac-12
neg_context_src: Warner alikuwa kaka wa mkufunzi maarufu wa mpira wa miguu Pop Warner. Mnamo 1902, Bill na Glenn wote walicheza mpira wa miguu kwa Klabu ya riadha ya Syracuse wakati wa Mfululizo wa kwanza wa mpira wa miguu, uliofanyika Madison Square Garden. Ilikuwa wakati wa hafla hii, kwamba Warner alicheza katika mchezo wa kwanza wa mpira wa miguu wa ndani wakati kikosi chake cha Syracuse kilikasirisha timu iliyopendelea sana "New York". Wakati Glenn alijeruhiwa wakati wa hafla hiyo na jeraha la kichwa, Bill na timu nyingine ya Syracuse waliendelea kushinda hafla hiyo.

Glenn "Pop" Warner alifundisha katika shule kadhaa wakati wote wa kazi yake, pamoja na Chuo Kikuu cha Georgia, Chuo Kikuu cha Cornell, Chuo Kikuu cha Pittsburgh, Chuo Kikuu cha Stanford, na Chuo Kikuu cha Temple. Mojawapo ya viboko vyake maarufu ilikuwa katika Shule ya Viwanda ya Carlisle India, ambapo alimfundisha Jim Thorpe, ambaye aliendelea kuwa rais wa kwanza wa Ligi ya Soka ya Kitaifa, medali ya dhahabu ya Olimpiki, na anachukuliwa kuwa mmoja wa wanariadha bora katika historia. Warner aliandika moja ya vitabu muhimu vya kwanza vya mkakati wa mpira wa miguu, "mpira wa miguu kwa makocha na wachezaji", uliochapishwa mnamo 1927. Ingawa mabadiliko hayo yalibuniwa na Stagg, mrengo mmoja wa Warner na aina mbili za mrengo ziliboresha sana juu yake; Kwa karibu miaka 40, hizi zilikuwa kati ya fomu muhimu zaidi katika mpira wa miguu. Kama sehemu ya muundo wake wa mrengo mmoja na mara mbili, Warner alikuwa mmoja wa makocha wa kwanza kutumia vizuri kupita mbele. Kati ya uvumbuzi wake mwingine ni miradi ya kisasa ya kuzuia, pedi za bega, na msimamo wa alama tatu. Ligi ya Soka ya Vijana, Pop Warner Little Scholars, ilipewa jina kwa heshima yake.

Glenn "Pop" Warner alifundisha katika shule kadhaa wakati wote wa kazi yake, pamoja na Chuo Kikuu cha Georgia, Chuo Kikuu cha Cornell, Chuo Kikuu cha Pittsburgh, Chuo Kikuu cha Stanford, Chuo Kikuu cha Jimbo la Iowa, na Chuo Kikuu cha Hekalu. Mojawapo ya viboko vyake maarufu ilikuwa katika Shule ya Viwanda ya Carlisle India, ambapo alimfundisha Jim Thorpe, ambaye aliendelea kuwa rais wa kwanza wa Ligi ya Soka ya Kitaifa, medali ya dhahabu ya Olimpiki, na anachukuliwa kuwa mmoja wa wanariadha bora katika historia. Warner aliandika moja ya vitabu muhimu vya kwanza vya mkakati wa mpira wa miguu, "mpira wa miguu kwa makocha na wachezaji", uliochapishwa mnamo 1927. Ingawa mabadiliko hayo yalibuniwa na Stagg, mrengo mmoja wa Warner na aina mbili za mrengo ziliboresha sana juu yake; Kwa karibu miaka 40, hizi zilikuwa kati ya fomu muhimu zaidi katika mpira wa miguu. Kama sehemu ya muundo wake wa mrengo mmoja na mara mbili, Warner alikuwa mmoja wa makocha wa kwanza kutumia vizuri kupita mbele. Miongoni mwa uvumbuzi wake mwingine ni miradi ya kisasa ya kuzuia, msimamo wa alama tatu, na uchezaji wa nyuma. Ligi ya Soka ya Vijana, Pop Warner Little Scholars, ilipewa jina kwa heshima yake.

Wilton aliandika misimu mitatu (1926-1928) katika mpira wa miguu kwa Glenn Scobey "Pop" Warner katika Chuo Kikuu cha Stanford. Katika miaka yake mitatu timu ya mpira wa miguu ya Stanford ilienda pamoja 26-5-5 na safari mbili kwa Rose Bowl. Mnamo 1927 dhidi ya USC alipata kupita kwa uwanja wa 74 kutoka Biff Hoffman, ambayo wakati huo ilikuwa ndefu zaidi katika historia ya Stanford.

Wakati wa kufundisha Hekaluni, Warner aliendelea kuishi Palo Alto (ambapo Stanford iko). Baada ya kustaafu kwake 1938 aliajiriwa mara moja kama mshauri wa Dudley DeGroot, kituo cha Stanford na mkufunzi mkuu katika Chuo Kikuu cha Jimbo la San Jose (karibu na Palo Alto). Kimsingi mshauri, Warner mara moja aliwekwa kwa jukumu la kosa hilo. Kulingana na Powers, "DeGroot alikuwa akitumia kosa moja la nyuma lakini Pop alibadilika mara moja kuwa mrengo huo mara mbili, kwa mashaka ya wachezaji wa San Jose. Walakini, malezi yakaanza kubonyeza na San Jose hakufurahiya msimu tu lakini ilikuwa timu ya bao la juu kabisa katika taifa." Mwaka huo Spartans ya Jimbo la San Jose ilicheza dhidi ya Chuo cha Pasifiki, iliyofunzwa na Amos Alonzo Stagg. Ilikuwa mara ya kwanza makocha hao wawili kukutana tangu 1907, wakati Warner alikuwa akifundisha Carlisle na kushinda Chuo Kikuu cha Stagg cha Chicago 18-4. Jimbo la Warner na Degroot la San Jose lilishinda Tiger za Pacific za Stagg, 39-0.

Wakati wa miaka 40 ya kwanza ya lacrosse ya chuo kikuu iliyoandaliwa, inayojulikana kama ICLA, ILA, USICLL, USILL na USILA, shule mbili za Pennsylvania, Lehigh na timu za Swarthmore zilitawala. Timu hizo mbili zilipigiwa kura Mabingwa wa Kitaifa wa Chuo cha Lacrosse msimu wa kumi na nne (14). Glenn "Pop" Warner, mkufunzi wa mpira wa miguu wa Fame katika Shule ya Hindi ya Carlisle (PA) kutoka 1899 hadi 1903, alibadilisha Lacrosse kwa baseball wakati wa msimu wa masika kwa sababu alisema, "Lacrosse ni msanidi programu wa afya na nguvu. Ni mchezo ambao watazamaji huibuka mara moja wanaelewa." Inawezekana pia kwamba Lacrosse, mchezo wa mawasiliano, ulisaidia kuandaa wachezaji wake wa mpira kwa msimu wa msimu wa joto. Kufikia 1920, USILL ilikuwa imepanuka ili kujumuisha timu kutoka Syracuse, Rutger, Jimbo la Penn na, kutiwa moyo na Pop Warner, hata ilizingatia kuongeza timu ya varsity katika Chuo Kikuu cha Pittsburgh. Mnamo 1920, Chuo cha Lacrosse kiliamua ushirika wao, na kuongeza mgawanyiko wa kusini, ambao ulijumuisha timu zenye nguvu kutoka Lehigh, Penn na Swarthmore pamoja na Power Power ya Maryland Johns Hopkins. Jumuiya ya Amerika ya Intercollegiate Lacrosse Association (USILA), shirika bado liko leo, liliundwa rasmi mnamo Novemba 1925.
Kocha maarufu wa mpira wa miguu Glenn Scobey "Pop" Warner alikuwa mkufunzi wa ushauri wa Spartans mnamo 1939 na 1940, akiisaidia timu hiyo rekodi ya 24-1 kwa misimu miwili.

Ifuatayo ni wapokeaji wa tuzo za Mchezaji wa Mwaka. Mnamo 2004 Mchezaji wa Kutetea wa Tuzo ya Mwaka alipewa jina la Mchezaji wa Kutetea wa Pat Tillman wa Mwaka.
Glenn "Pop" Warner Memorial Trophy ilipewa kila mwaka na Klabu ya Palo kwa mchezaji mwandamizi wa thamani zaidi kwenye Pwani ya Magharibi. Ilikabidhiwa kutoka 1950 hadi 2004. Hasa, wapokeaji wote walicheza kwa taasisi za Pac-10. Tuzo hiyo inajulikana kutoka kwa Trophy ya Ukumbusho ya W. J. Voit, iliyowasilishwa kila mwaka kutoka 1951 hadi 1978 hadi mchezaji wa juu kwenye Pwani ya Pasifiki bila kujali darasa la darasa.

Ingawa msimu wa 1915 ulifanikiwa, timu ya mwaka ujao ilikuwa moja ya kazi kubwa ya Warner. Panthers walikuwa hawajafaulu tena na, kama mwaka uliopita, michezo sita kati ya nane ilikuwa imefungwa. Thelathini na mbili ya wachezaji wao 35 walikuwa kutoka Western Pennsylvania, karibu na Pittsburgh. Timu hiyo ilifunga alama 255, ikikubali 25. Warner aliona timu hiyo kuwa maboresho kwa sababu utetezi wake ulikuwa mkubwa zaidi kuliko wa mwaka uliopita. Panthers walikuwa mabingwa wa kitaifa wa makubaliano, na Warner alitambuliwa kama mmoja wa makocha wakubwa wa mpira.
Mnamo 1917 Merika iliingia Vita vya Kwanza vya Dunia, na wachezaji wengine (pamoja na Andy Hastings na Jimmy DeHart) waliingia kwenye jeshi. Pittsburgh alicheza msimu kamili wa msimu kamili licha ya vita, ingawa haikupewa ubingwa wa kitaifa. Ingawa timu ilikosa punch ya mwaka uliopita, ilitawala upinzani. Sehemu muhimu ya mafanikio yake ilikuwa kutokuwa na uwezo wa makocha wanaopingana kushughulikia mikakati ya kutoa Warner; Kulingana na Powers, "michezo yake ya nyuma ilikuwa siri, ingawa Pop kila wakati alikuwa tayari kuelezea kwa undani kwa kocha mwingine yeyote".

question_en: What is a Cricket bat called?
pos_context_en: The "blade" of a cricket bat is a wooden block that is generally flat on the striking face and with a ridge on the reverse (back) which concentrates wood in the middle where the ball is generally hit. The bat is traditionally made from willow wood, specifically from a variety of white willow called cricket bat willow ("Salix alba" var. "caerulea"), treated with raw (unboiled) linseed oil, which has a protective function. This variety of willow is used as it is very tough and shock-resistant, not being significantly dented nor splintering on the impact of a cricket ball at high speed, while also being light in weight. The face of the bat is often covered with a protective film by the user.
neg_context_en:
"Law 5: The bat". The bat is no more than in length, no more than wide, no more than deep at its middle and no deeper than at the edge. The hand or glove holding the bat is considered part of the bat. Ever since the ComBat incident, a highly publicised marketing attempt by Dennis Lillee, who brought out an aluminium bat during an international game, the Laws have provided that the blade of the bat must be made of wood.
"Law 6: The pitch". The pitch is a rectangular area of the ground long and wide. The Ground Authority selects and prepares the pitch, but once the game has started, the umpires control what happens to the pitch. The umpires are also the arbiters of whether the pitch is fit for play, and if they deem it unfit, with the consent of both captains can change the pitch. Professional cricket is almost always played on a grass surface. However, in the event a non-turf pitch is used, the artificial surface must have a minimum length of and a minimum width of .

A cricket bat is a specialised piece of equipment used by batsmen in the sport of cricket to hit the ball, typically consisting of a cane handle attached to a flat-fronted willow-wood blade. The length of the bat may be no more than 38 inches (965 mm) and the width no more than 4.25 inches (108 mm). Its use is first mentioned in 1624. Since 1979, a rule change stipulated that bats can only be made from wood.

Batting is the act or skill of hitting the cricket ball with a cricket bat to score runs or prevent the loss of one's wicket. Any player who is currently batting is denoted as a batsman, regardless of their particular area of expertise. Batsmen have to adapt to various conditions when playing on different cricket pitches, especially in different countries: therefore, as well as having outstanding physical batting skills, top-level batsmen will have lightning reflexes, excellent decision-making and be good strategists.

Cricket clothing and equipment is regulated by the laws of cricket. Cricket clothing, known as cricket whites, or flannels, is slightly loose fitting so as not to restrict players' movements. Use of protective equipment, such as helmets, gloves and pads, is also regulated.Batsmen are allowed to wear gloves while batting. The batsman can be also caught out if the ball touches the glove instead of the bat, provided the hand is in contact with the bat. This is because the glove is considered to be the extension of the bat. The batsman may also wear protective helmets usually with a visor to protect themselves. Helmets are usually employed when facing fast bowlers. While playing spinners, it might not be employed.

Any player, regardless of their area of special skill, is referred to as a batsman while they are actually batting. However, a player who is in the team principally because of their batting skill is referred to as a specialist batsman, or simply "batsman", regardless of whether they are currently batting. (A specialist bowler, on the other hand, would be referred to as a "batsman" only while actually engaged in batting.) In women's cricket, the term "bats woman" is sometimes encountered, as is "batter", but 'batsman' is widely used in both men's and women's cricket.

Stoolball is a sport that dates back to at least the 15th century, originating in Sussex, southern England. It may be an ancestor of cricket (a game it resembles), baseball, and rounders, in fact stoolball is sometimes called "cricket in the air". There is a tradition that it was played by milkmaids who used their milking stools as a "wicket" and the bittle, or milk bowl as a bat. Hence its archaic name of "bittle-battle."

"We designed the building from the inside out, not the outside in,” said Loretta H. Cockrum, Foram’s founder, chairman and CEO. “We wanted the most efficient office building ever designed, with no wasted space or wasted energy. This is a building of the future more than a building of the present. A lot of love has gone into that building, and a lot of pride."

Bats are very well equipped to prey upon crickets. While some bats rely purely on mid-flight echolocation to locate their prey, other species locate their prey through passive listening, orienting towards sounds made by the prey, and often emitting a fainter echolocation call as they approach their target. "Teleogryllus oceanicus" crickets have been shown to be able to distinguish a range of echolocation frequencies, responding with avoidance flight away from the bats. Multiple species of bats ("Nyctophilus major" and "N. geoffroyi") have been shown to prefer trills in the cricket song compared to chirps. As a result, male crickets prefer to call from shelter, and the calls from males in shelter contain a greater number of trills than those emitted by a non-sheltered male.

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.
question_src: Je! Bat ya kriketi inaitwaje?
pos_context_src: "Blade" ya kofia ya kriketi ni block ya mbao ambayo kwa ujumla ni gorofa juu ya uso unaovutia na kwa ridge kwenye nyuma (nyuma) ambayo huzingatia kuni katikati ambapo mpira kwa ujumla hupigwa. Bat hiyo imetengenezwa kwa jadi kutoka kwa kuni ya Willow, haswa kutoka kwa aina ya White Willow inayoitwa Cricket Bat Willow ("Salix Alba" var. "Caerulea"), iliyotibiwa na mafuta mbichi (yasiyosafishwa), ambayo ina kazi ya kinga. Aina hii ya Willow hutumiwa kwani ni ngumu sana na inachukua mshtuko, bila kuwa na denched sana au kugawanyika juu ya athari ya mpira wa kriketi kwa kasi kubwa, wakati pia kuwa nyepesi kwa uzito. Uso wa mkate mara nyingi hufunikwa na filamu ya kinga na mtumiaji.
neg_context_src:
"Sheria ya 5: Bat". Bat sio zaidi ya urefu, sio zaidi ya upana, sio zaidi ya kina katikati yake na sio zaidi kuliko makali. Mkono au glavu iliyoshikilia popo inachukuliwa kuwa sehemu ya popo. Tangu tukio hilo la mapigano, jaribio la uuzaji lililotangazwa sana la Dennis Lillee, ambaye alitoa kofia ya alumini wakati wa mchezo wa kimataifa, sheria zimetoa kwamba blade ya bat lazima ifanyike kwa kuni.
"Sheria ya 6: lami". Shimo ni eneo la mstatili la ardhi kwa muda mrefu na pana. Mamlaka ya chini huchagua na kuandaa lami, lakini mara tu mchezo unapoanza, umpires hudhibiti kile kinachotokea kwa lami. Umpires pia ni wasuluhishi wa ikiwa lami ni sawa kwa kucheza, na ikiwa wataona kuwa haifai, kwa idhini ya maafisa wote wanaweza kubadilisha lami. Cricket ya kitaalam karibu kila wakati inachezwa kwenye uso wa nyasi. Walakini, katika tukio ambalo lami isiyo ya turf inatumika, uso wa bandia lazima uwe na urefu wa chini na upana wa chini wa.

Kofia ya kriketi ni kipande maalum cha vifaa vinavyotumiwa na popo kwenye mchezo wa kriketi kugonga mpira, kawaida inayojumuisha kushughulikia miwa iliyowekwa kwenye blade ya gorofa-mbele ya kuni. Urefu wa bat inaweza kuwa sio zaidi ya inchi 38 (965 mm) na upana sio zaidi ya inchi 4.25 (108 mm). Matumizi yake yametajwa kwanza mnamo 1624. Tangu 1979, mabadiliko ya sheria yalisema kwamba popo zinaweza kufanywa tu kutoka kwa kuni.

Kupiga ni kitendo au ustadi wa kupiga mpira wa kriketi na kofia ya kriketi kupata alama au kuzuia upotezaji wa wigi ya mtu. Mchezaji yeyote ambaye kwa sasa anatangazwa kama mtu wa popo, bila kujali eneo la utaalam. Batsmen wanapaswa kuzoea hali mbali mbali wakati wa kucheza kwenye vibanda tofauti vya kriketi, haswa katika nchi tofauti: kwa hivyo, na vile vile kuwa na ustadi bora wa kupigwa kwa mwili, popo wa kiwango cha juu watakuwa na taa za umeme, kufanya maamuzi bora na kuwa wenye mikakati mzuri.

Mavazi ya kriketi na vifaa vinadhibitiwa na sheria za kriketi. Mavazi ya kriketi, inayojulikana kama wazungu wa kriketi, au flannels, inafaa kidogo ili usizuie harakati za wachezaji. Matumizi ya vifaa vya kinga, kama vile helmeti, glavu na pedi, pia imewekwa .Batsmen wanaruhusiwa kuvaa glavu wakati wa kupiga. Batsman anaweza pia kushikwa ikiwa mpira unagusa glavu badala ya popo, mradi mkono unawasiliana na popo. Hii ni kwa sababu glavu inachukuliwa kuwa upanuzi wa bat. Batsman anaweza pia kuvaa helmeti za kinga kawaida na visor kujilinda. Helmet kawaida huajiriwa wakati wa kukabiliwa na viboreshaji vya haraka. Wakati wa kucheza spinners, inaweza kuajiriwa.

Mchezaji yeyote, bila kujali eneo la ustadi maalum, anatajwa kama batsman wakati wanapiga. Walakini, mchezaji ambaye yuko kwenye timu kimsingi kwa sababu ya ustadi wao wa kupigwa hurejelewa kama mtaalam wa batsman, au tu "batsman", bila kujali kama wanapiga. (Mtaalam wa utaalam, kwa upande wake, angejulikana kama "popo" tu wakati kweli anahusika katika kupiga.) Katika kriketi ya wanawake, neno "popo mwanamke" wakati mwingine hukutana, kama "batter", lakini 'batsman' hutumiwa sana katika kriketi ya wanaume na wanawake.

Stoolball ni mchezo ambao ulianza angalau karne ya 15, unaotokea Sussex, kusini mwa England. Inaweza kuwa babu wa kriketi (mchezo unaofanana), baseball, na pande zote, kwa kweli stoolball wakati mwingine huitwa "kriketi hewani". Kuna mila kwamba ilichezwa na mama wa maziwa ambao walitumia viti vyao vya maziwa kama "tiketi" na bittle, au bakuli la maziwa kama popo. Kwa hivyo jina lake la kizamani la "Bittle-vita."

"Tulibuni jengo hilo kutoka ndani, sio nje," alisema Loretta H. Cockrum, mwanzilishi wa Foram, Mwenyekiti na Mkurugenzi Mtendaji. "Tulitaka jengo bora zaidi la ofisi lililowahi kubuniwa, bila nafasi ya kupoteza au nishati ya kupoteza. Hii ni jengo la siku zijazo zaidi ya jengo la sasa. Upendo mwingi umeingia kwenye jengo hilo, na kiburi sana."

Popo zina vifaa vizuri vya kuwinda kwenye crickets. Wakati popo wengine hutegemea tu juu ya uwanja wa ndege ili kupata mawindo yao, spishi zingine hupata mawindo yao kupitia usikilizaji wa kupita, na kuelekea sauti zilizotengenezwa na mawindo, na mara nyingi hutoa wito wa echolocation wakati wanakaribia lengo lao. "Teleogryllus Oceanicus" Crickets zimeonyeshwa kuwa na uwezo wa kutofautisha masafa ya masafa ya echolocation, kujibu kwa kukimbia kukimbia mbali na popo. Aina nyingi za popo ("Nyctophilus kubwa" na "N. Geoffroyi") zimeonyeshwa kupendelea trill katika wimbo wa kriketi ikilinganishwa na chirps. Kama matokeo, crickets za kiume zinapendelea kupiga simu kutoka kwa makazi, na simu kutoka kwa wanaume kwenye makazi zina idadi kubwa ya trill kuliko zile zilizotolewa na mwanaume ambaye hakuwa na makao.

Winfield Toll Bridge, pia inajulikana kama Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, ni kihistoria wa kihistoria wa Cantilever Warren Truss Bridge iliyoko Winfield na Red House, Kaunti ya Putnam, West Virginia. Ilijengwa mnamo 1955, na inachukua Mto wa Kanawha, iliyobeba West Virginia Route 34. Cantilever kupitia-truss ina nafasi mbili za nanga kila futi 245 kwa urefu na urefu wa futi 462 kwa urefu kati ya mistari ya kituo cha pier. Span kuu ina futi mbili 128, inchi 4, mikono ya cantilever na miguu 205, inchi 4, iliyosimamishwa.

pos_context_en: According to the Hebrew Bible, the Kingdom of Israel () was one of two successor states to the former United Kingdom of Israel and Judah. Historians often refer to the Kingdom of Israel as the "Northern Kingdom" or as the "Kingdom of Samaria" to differentiate it from the Southern Kingdom of Judah.
neg_context_en: The Northern Isles (; ; ) are a pair of archipelagos off the north coast of mainland Scotland, comprising Orkney and Shetland. The climate is cool and temperate and much influenced by the surrounding seas. There are a total of 26 inhabited islands with landscapes of the fertile agricultural islands of Orkney contrasting with the more rugged Shetland islands to the north, where the economy is more dependent on fishing and the oil wealth of the surrounding seas. Both have a developing renewable energy industry. They also share a common Pictish and Norse history. Both island groups were absorbed into the Kingdom of Scotland in the 15th century and remained part of the country following the formation of the Kingdom of Great Britain in 1707, and later the United Kingdom after 1801. The islands played a significant naval role during the world wars of the 20th century.

The kingdom of the East Angles bordered the North Sea to the north and the east, with the River Stour historically dividing it from the East Saxons to the south. The North Sea provided a "thriving maritime link to Scandinavia and the northern reaches of Germany", according to the historian Richard Hoggett. The kingdom's western boundary varied from the rivers Ouse, Lark and Kennett to further westwards, as far as the Cam in what is now Cambridgeshire. At its greatest extent, the kingdom comprised the modern-day counties of Norfolk, Suffolk and parts of eastern Cambridgeshire.

According to the Hebrew Bible Jeroboam built two places of worship, one at Bethel and one at far northern Dan, as alternatives to the Temple in Jerusalem.() He did not want the people of his kingdom to have religious ties to Jerusalem, the capital city of the rival Kingdom of Judah. He erected golden bulls at the entrance to the Temples to represent the national god. The Hebrew Bible, written from the perspective of scribes in Jerusalem, referred to these acts as the way of Jeroboam or the errors of Jeroboam. ()
question_src: Je! Ni nyumba gani zinajumuisha ufalme wa kaskazini?
pos_context_src: Kulingana na Bibilia ya Kiebrania, Ufalme wa Israeli () ulikuwa mmoja wa majimbo mawili ya mrithi wa Uingereza wa zamani wa Israeli na Yuda. Wanahistoria mara nyingi hurejelea ufalme wa Israeli kama "ufalme wa kaskazini" au kama "Ufalme wa Samaria" ili kuitofautisha na ufalme wa kusini wa Yuda.
neg_context_src: Visiwa vya Kaskazini (; Hali ya hewa ni nzuri na ya joto na inaathiriwa sana na bahari zinazozunguka. Kuna jumla ya visiwa 26 vinavyokaliwa na mandhari ya visiwa vya kilimo yenye rutuba ya Orkney tofauti na visiwa vya Shetland vilivyo na kaskazini, ambapo uchumi unategemea zaidi uvuvi na utajiri wa mafuta ya bahari zinazozunguka. Wote wana tasnia inayoendelea ya nishati mbadala. Pia wanashiriki historia ya kawaida na historia ya Norse. Makundi yote mawili ya kisiwa yaliingizwa katika Ufalme wa Scotland katika karne ya 15 na yalibaki sehemu ya nchi kufuatia kuundwa kwa ufalme wa Great Britain mnamo 1707, na baadaye Uingereza baada ya 1801. Visiwa vilicheza jukumu kubwa la majini wakati wa Vita vya Kidunia vya karne ya 20.

Upendo mwingi umeingia kwenye jengo hilo, na kiburi sana."

Cantilever kupitia-truss ina nafasi mbili za nanga kila futi 245 kwa urefu na urefu wa futi 462 kwa urefu kati ya mistari ya kituo cha pier. Span kuu ina futi mbili 128, inchi 4, mikono ya cantilever na miguu 205, inchi 4, iliyosimamishwa.

Ufalme wa pembe za mashariki ulipakana na Bahari ya Kaskazini kaskazini na mashariki, na mto Stour kihistoria ukigawanya kutoka Saxons Mashariki kuelekea kusini. Bahari ya Kaskazini ilitoa "kiunga cha baharini kinachoendelea kwa Scandinavia na ufikiaji wa kaskazini wa Ujerumani", kulingana na mwanahistoria Richard Hoggett. Mpaka wa magharibi wa ufalme ulitofautiana kutoka kwa Mito ya Ouse, Lark na Kennett hadi magharibi, mbali kama vile cam katika ambayo sasa ni Cambridgeshire. Kwa kiwango chake kikubwa, Ufalme ulikuwa na kaunti za kisasa za Norfolk, Suffolk na sehemu za Cambridgeshire Mashariki.

() Hakutaka watu wa ufalme wake wawe na uhusiano wa kidini na Yerusalemu, mji mkuu wa ufalme wa mpinzani wa Yuda. Aliweka ng'ombe wa dhahabu kwenye mlango wa mahekalu kuwakilisha Mungu wa Kitaifa. question_en: Is Alex Fletcher married?
pos_context_en: Fletcher is married to the actor Neil Davies (who appeared in "Brookside" as Robbie Moffatt, an on-screen boyfriend in 2000 and 2001) and with whom she has a daughter, Yasmin, born in 2005 and a son, Hanson, born in 2016. She also has a brother called Bradley. She lives with her husband, son and daughter in Merseyside.
neg_context_en: Alexandra "Alex" Fletcher (born 8 July 1976 in Childwall, Liverpool) is a British actress known for her roles as Jacqui Dixon in "Brookside" and Diane O'Connor in "Hollyoaks".
Alex Fletcher (born 30 April 1999) is an English professional footballer who plays for Plymouth Argyle.
Day announced on 14 February 2014 that he had been dating fellow YouTuber Carrie Hope Fletcher since October 2013. However, Fletcher announced their break-up via Twitter on 14 March 2014.

The story starts with William Fletcher, a young man who is in love with his cousin, Alice. Her father has forbidden her marriage to Fletcher on account of religious difference. After he thwarts Alice's attempt to run away with Fletcher to North America, Alice's father forces her to marry Charles Leslie instead. In despair, Fletcher decides to leave England and relocate to the Massachusetts Bay Colony. In the Bay colony, Fletcher marries an orphan girl named Martha although he is still in love with Alice. He founds a household several miles out of town, and has children; Everell, and two others. He receives word that Charles and Alice Leslie have both died, and that their children, who will be renamed Faith and Hope, will be coming to live with the Fletchers.

On November 4, 1855, Fletcher married Keziah Price Lister from Hallowell, Maine, who had come to Indianapolis in 1851 to become a public school teacher. Lister, whose first husband had deserted her and moved to Texas, obtained a divorce and then married Fletcher. In 1855 Fletcher moved his children and second wife into the Alfred Harrison home on North Pennsylvania Street in Indianapolis, leaving the Wood Lawn house to his son, Miles, and his family.
Fletcher began his law practice in Urbana, Ohio, and was the first attorney practicing law in Indianapolis. He was a prosecuting attorney for the Marion County Circuit Court in 1822 and 1823 and a prosecuting attorney for the Fifth Circuit Court in 1825 and 1826. Fletcher went on to join a law firm with Ovid Butler, Simon Yandes, and Horatio C. Newcomb. On December 26, 1846, Fletcher and Butler dissolved their law practice and collection business, but Fletcher continued to devote time to his farming operations and banking interests.

Fletcher lived in England for a large portion of his life. While in Europe he associated with Amy Lowell, Ezra Pound, and other Imagist poets; he was one of the six Imagists who adopted the name and stuck to it until their aims were achieved. Fletcher resumed a liaison with Florence Emily "Daisy" Arbuthnot (née Goold) at her house in Kent. She had been married to Malcolm Arbuthnot and Fletcher's adultery with her was the grounds for the divorce. The couple married on July 5, 1916. The marriage produced no children, but Arbuthnot's son and daughter from her previous marriage lived with the couple, who later divorced.

Elias is married to Hugh Fletcher, former CEO of Fletcher Challenge and a former Chancellor of the University of Auckland. In 1994, her brother-in-law, Jim Fletcher, was stabbed to death by an intruder in his Papamoa beach house.
Sir Alexander MacPherson Fletcher (26 August 1929 – 18 September 1989), sometimes known as Alex Fletcher, was a British Conservative Party politician.

Fletcher joined "Brookside" in 1990 and played the role of Jacqui Farnham (née Dixon) until the series ended in 2003. In addition to her role in "Brookside", she has made a number of other television appearances, both in acting and presenting roles. These include parts in "Doctors" and "", and a guest presenting role on the chat show "Loose Women". She was also an occasional presenter of the children's series "Why Don't You?"
question_src: Je! Alex Fletcher ameolewa?
pos_context_src: Fletcher ameolewa na muigizaji Neil Davies (ambaye alionekana katika "Brookside" kama Robbie Moffatt, mpenzi wa skrini mnamo 2000 na 2001) na ambaye ana binti, Yasmin, mzaliwa wa 2005 na mtoto wa kiume, Hanson, aliyezaliwa mnamo 2016. Yeye pia ana kaka anayeitwa Bradley. Anaishi na mumewe, mwanawe na binti huko Merseyside.
neg_context_src: Alexandra "Alex" Fletcher (amezaliwa 8 Julai 1976 huko Childwall, Liverpool) ni mwigizaji wa Uingereza anayejulikana kwa majukumu yake kama Jacqui Dixon katika "Brookside" na Diane O'Connor katika "Hollyoaks".
Alex Fletcher (amezaliwa 30 Aprili 1999) ni mtaalam wa mpira wa miguu wa Kiingereza ambaye anacheza kwa Plymouth Argyle.
Siku ilitangaza mnamo 14 Februari 2014 kwamba alikuwa akichumbiana na YouTuber Carrie Hope Fletcher tangu Oktoba 2013. Walakini, Fletcher alitangaza mapumziko yao kupitia Twitter mnamo 14 Machi 2014.

Hadithi inaanza na William Fletcher, kijana ambaye anampenda binamu yake, Alice. Baba yake amekataza ndoa yake kwa Fletcher kwa sababu ya tofauti za kidini. Baada ya kudhoofisha jaribio la Alice la kukimbia na Fletcher kwenda Amerika Kaskazini, baba ya Alice anamlazimisha kuolewa na Charles Leslie badala yake. Kwa kukata tamaa, Fletcher anaamua kuondoka Uingereza na kuhamia Massachusetts Bay Colony. Katika koloni la Bay, Fletcher anaoa msichana wa mayatima anayeitwa Martha ingawa bado anampenda Alice. Anaanzisha kaya maili kadhaa nje ya mji, na ana watoto; Everell, na wengine wawili. Anapokea habari kwamba Charles na Alice Leslie wote wamekufa, na kwamba watoto wao, ambao watapewa jina la Imani na Tumaini, watakuja kuishi na Fletchers.

Mnamo Novemba 4, 1855, Fletcher alifunga ndoa na Keziah Bei Lister kutoka Hallowell, Maine, ambaye alikuwa amekuja Indianapolis mnamo 1851 kuwa mwalimu wa shule ya umma. Lister, ambaye mumewe wa kwanza alikuwa amemwacha na kuhamia Texas, akapata talaka na kisha akaolewa na Fletcher. Mnamo 1855 Fletcher alihamisha watoto wake na mke wake wa pili ndani ya nyumba ya Alfred Harrison kwenye Mtaa wa Pennsylvania Kaskazini huko Indianapolis, na kuacha nyumba ya Wood Lawn kwa mtoto wake, Miles, na familia yake.
Fletcher alianza mazoezi yake ya sheria huko Urbana, Ohio, na alikuwa wakili wa kwanza kutekeleza sheria huko Indianapolis. Alikuwa wakili wa mashtaka wa Korti ya Duru ya Kaunti ya Marion mnamo 1822 na 1823 na wakili wa mashtaka wa Korti ya Daraja la Tano mnamo 1825 na 1826. Fletcher aliendelea kujiunga na kampuni ya sheria na Ovid Butler, Simon Yandes, na Horatio C. Newcomb. Mnamo Desemba 26, 1846, Fletcher na Butler walifuta mazoea yao ya sheria na biashara ya ukusanyaji, lakini Fletcher aliendelea kutumia wakati wa shughuli zake za kilimo na masilahi ya benki.

Fletcher aliishi Uingereza kwa sehemu kubwa ya maisha yake. Wakati alipokuwa Ulaya alihusishwa na Amy Lowell, Ezra Pound, na washairi wengine wa mawazo; Alikuwa mmoja wa watu sita wa mawazo ambao walipitisha jina hilo na kushikamana nayo hadi malengo yao yatakapopatikana. Fletcher alianza tena uhusiano na Florence Emily "Daisy" Arbuthnot (née Goold) nyumbani kwake huko Kent. Alikuwa ameolewa na Malcolm Arbuthnot na uzinzi wa Fletcher na yeye ndio sababu ya talaka. Wanandoa hao waliolewa mnamo Julai 5, 1916. Ndoa hiyo haikuzaa watoto, lakini mtoto wa Arbuthnot na binti yake kutoka kwa ndoa yake ya zamani waliishi na wenzi hao, ambao baadaye walitengana.

Elias ameolewa na Hugh Fletcher, Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa zamani wa Fletcher Challenge na Kansela wa zamani wa Chuo Kikuu cha Auckland. Mnamo 1994, mkwewe, Jim Fletcher, alipigwa na kuuawa na mtu anayeingia katika nyumba yake ya pwani ya Papamoa.
Sir Alexander Macpherson Fletcher (26 Agosti 1929 - 18 Septemba 1989), wakati mwingine anayejulikana kama Alex Fletcher, alikuwa mwanasiasa wa Chama cha Conservative.

Fletcher alijiunga na "Brookside" mnamo 1990 na alichukua jukumu la Jacqui Farnham (née Dixon) hadi safu hiyo ilimalizika mnamo 2003. Mbali na jukumu lake katika "Brookside", ametoa nafasi zingine za runinga, zote mbili katika majukumu na kuwasilisha majukumu. Hii ni pamoja na sehemu katika "Madaktari" na "", na Mgeni anayewasilisha jukumu kwenye onyesho la gumzo "Wanawake huru". Alikuwa pia mtangazaji wa mara kwa mara wa safu ya watoto "Kwanini wewe?"
report_src: Ndiyo, Alex Fletcher ameolewa; mume wake ni muigizaji Neil Davies, aliyemtambulisha kama Robbie Moffatt kwenye tamthilia ya “Brookside” kati ya 2000 na 2001 [1].

question_en: What was the first U.S. aircraft carrier?
pos_context_title_en: Institutions in the Southern Victory Series
pos_context_en: The United States developed the first aircraft carrier, the USS "Remembrance". This ship first sailed in 1920 and assisted the Irish government in suppressing a pro-British rebellion in Ulster. The "Remembrance", for many years, was the only U.S. aircraft carrier. The Pacific War saw the first naval battles where the combatants engaged one another with planes instead of ships. During the Second Great War, several escort carriers were built from converted merchant ship hulls.
neg_context_title_en: List of aircraft carrier classes of the United States Navy
neg_context_en: Whiting sometimes is referred to as the U.S. Navys "father of the aircraft carrier." He had begun agitating for U.S. Navy development of what were then called "plane carriers" in the spring of 1916, and as early as March 1917 he had proposed to United States Secretary of the Navy Josephus Daniels that the Navy acquire a ship with an aircraft catapult and a flight deck, prompting the first serious U.S. Navy consideration of the acquisition of any kind of aviation ship since the American Civil War of 1861–1865. The United States Department of the Navy rejected his proposal on 20 June 1917. In the years between World War I and World War II, however, Whiting would be instrumental in the construction of five of the U.S. Navys first six aircraft carriers and serve as executive officer of its first two. He also served as acting commanding officer of its first carrier at a time when the United States was experimenting with many aspects of the operation of aircraft carriers and their aircraft.

One of the first major operations in which the ships were involved was Operation Eagle Claw launched by "Nimitz" in 1980 after she had deployed to the Indian Ocean in response to the taking of hostages in the U.S. embassy in Tehran. Although initially part of the U.S. Atlantic Fleet, "Dwight D. Eisenhower" relieved "Nimitz" in this operation after her service in the Mediterranean Sea. "Nimitz" conducted a Freedom of Navigation exercise alongside the aircraft carrier in August 1981 in the Gulf of Sidra, near Libya. During this exercise, two of the ship's F-14 Tomcats shot down two Libyan aircraft in what became known as the Gulf of Sidra incident. In 1987, "Carl Vinson" participated in the first U.S. carrier deployment in the Bering Sea, and "Nimitz" provided security during the 1988 Olympic Games in Seoul.

On 1 April 1931, Rear Admiral Joseph M. Reeves took command of Carrier Division 2 (CarDiv 2), becoming the first carrier division commander in the U.S. Navy. Reeves was also designated as Commander Aircraft U.S. Fleet. Carrier Division 2 initially consisted of the U.S. Navy's first true fast aircraft carriers, and , as well as former minesweeper which acted as an aircraft tender and guardship for the two carriers. Under Reeves' leadership, both carriers had previously distinguished themselves in two major naval exercises, the 1929 Fleet Problem IX and the 1930 Fleet Problem X, demonstrating the potential of aircraft carriers and their embarked air groups in naval offensive operations. Aircraft carriers from Carrier Division 2 became the first to embark U.S. Marine Corps aviation units when, on 2 November 1931, squadron VS-14M joined the "Saratoga" and squadron VS-15M joined the "Lexington".

Carrier Strike Group 1 traces its lineage to Carrier Division 1 (CarDiv 1), the U.S. Navy's first seagoing naval aviation formation. It was first organized in October 1930 as part of the Aircraft Scouting Force, U.S. Fleet in the Atlantic. It initially included the U.S. Navy's first aircraft carrier, the , as well as the aircraft tender and the minesweepers and . In 1933, was reassigned to Carrier Division One under Commander Aircraft, Scouting Force, which also included aircraft tender "Wright"; the minesweepers , "Teal", and ; and the rigid airships and . Carrier Division One was initially headquartered at the Coco Solo Naval Air Station located on the Atlantic side of the Panama Canal Zone near Colón, Panama. In 1939, Carrier Division One was transferred to the Pacific Scouting Force. Division aircraft carriers saw service in World War II, the Korean War, and the Vietnam War.

Whiting reported aboard "Langley" on 20 March 1922, the day of her commissioning, as her first executive officer, also serving on an acting basis as her first commanding officer and thus becoming the first person to command a U.S. Navy aircraft carrier. "Langley" was far too slow to keep up with the battle fleet, and her main purpose was to serve as a laboratory for the exploration of the new naval warfare discipline of aircraft carrier operations, with her personnel and those of her embarked air squadrons experimenting to discover what practices worked best. Flying a Vought VE-7, Lieutenant Virgil C. Griffin made the first takeoff from an American carrier from "Langley" on 17 October 1922, and Lieutenant Commander Godfrey Chevalier made the first landing on 26 October 1922 in an Aeromarine 39B. On 18 November 1922, Whiting himself made the worlds first catapult launch of an aircraft from an aircraft carrier while aboard "Langley", piloting a Naval Aircraft Factory PT while "Langley" was at anchor in Virginias York River.

In 1940, Admiral William Halsey recommended construction of naval auxiliaries for pilot training. In early 1941 the British asked the US to build on their behalf six carriers of an improved "Audacity" design but the US had already begun their own escort carrier. On 1 February 1941, the United States Chief of Naval Operations gave priority to construction of naval auxiliaries for aircraft transport. U.S. ships built to meet these needs were initially referred to as auxiliary aircraft escort vessels (AVG) in February 1942 and then auxiliary aircraft carrier (ACV) on 5 August 1942. The first U.S. example of the type was . Operation Torch and North Atlantic anti-submarine warfare proved these ships capable aircraft carriers for ship formations moving at the speed of trade or amphibious invasion convoys. U.S. classification revision to escort aircraft carrier (CVE) on 15 July 1943 reflected upgraded status from auxiliary to combatant. They were informally known as "Jeep carriers" or "baby flattops". It was quickly found that the escort carriers had better performance than light carriers, which tended to pitch badly in moderate to high seas. The "Commencement Bay" class was designed to incorporate the best features of American CVLs on a more stable hull with a less expensive propulsion system.

The Curtiss Carrier Pigeon was an American mail plane of the 1920s. A single-engined biplane designed and built to replace World War I surplus aircraft such as the DH-4, the Carrier Pigeon was one of the first aircraft designed specifically for U.S. Airmail service.
In 1925 the U.S. Postal Service felt they had excellent operational service with converted Airco D.H.4 biplanes. The eight-year-old designs were considered antiquated by this time, however, and a modern purpose-built machine was desired. While most manufacturers started to build new generation passenger aircraft with mail cargo capability, the Curtiss Carrier Pigeon was the first clean-sheet design specifically made for U.S. air-mail service. The aircraft was intended to be sold directly to the Postal Service, but new legislation that opened up outside contracts brought on a slew of competing models.

Over the next two decades Mitscher worked to develop naval aviation, taking assignments serving on the aircraft carriers and , the seaplane tender , and taking command of Patrol Wing 1, in addition to a number of assignments ashore. "Langley" was the navy's first aircraft carrier. A converted collier, she could only make , thus limiting her ability to generate wind over her flight deck and lift under the wings of her aircraft for launching and recovery. Aboard "Langley" Mitscher and other naval aviation pioneers developed many of the methods by which aircraft would be handled aboard U.S. Navy aircraft carriers. Many of these techniques continue to be used in the current-day U.S. Navy.

Following "Ranger" and before the entry of the United States into World War II, four more carriers were commissioned. 
The Imperial Japanese Navy struck Pearl Harbor on 7 December 1941, but none of the Pacific Fleet's aircraft carriers were in the harbor. Because a large fraction of the navy's battleship fleet was put out of commission by the attack, the undamaged aircraft carriers were forced to become the load-bearers of the early part of the war. The first aircraft carrier offensive of the U.S. Navy came on 1 February 1942, when the carriers Enterprise and Yorktown, attacked the Japanese bases in the Marshall and Gilbert Islands. The Battle of the Coral Sea became the first sea battle in history in which neither opposing fleet saw the other. The Battle of Midway started as a Japanese offensive on Midway Atoll met by an outnumbered U.S. carrier force, and resulted in a U.S. victory. The Battle of Midway was the turning point in the Pacific War.
question_src: Je! Mtoaji wa ndege wa kwanza wa Merika alikuwa nini?
pos_context_title_src: Taasisi katika Mfululizo wa Ushindi wa Kusini
pos_context_src: Merika iliendeleza mbebaji wa kwanza wa ndege, "Ukumbusho" wa USS. Meli hii ilisafiri kwa mara ya kwanza mnamo 1920 na kusaidia serikali ya Ireland kukandamiza uasi wa pro-Briteni huko Ulster. "Ukumbusho", kwa miaka mingi, ulikuwa tu mbebaji wa ndege wa Merika. Vita vya Pasifiki viliona vita vya kwanza vya majini ambapo wapiganaji walishirikiana na ndege badala ya meli. Wakati wa Vita Kuu ya Pili, wabebaji kadhaa wa kusindikiza walijengwa kutoka kwa vibanda vya meli ya waongofu.
neg_context_title_src: Mtoaji wa ndege wa darasa la Nimitz
Orodha ya madarasa ya wabebaji wa ndege ya Jeshi la Merika la Merika
neg_context_src: Whiting wakati mwingine hujulikana kama Navys wa Merika "baba wa mtoaji wa ndege." Alikuwa ameanza kuchochea maendeleo ya Jeshi la Merika la Merika la kile wakati huo kiliitwa "wabebaji wa ndege" katika chemchemi ya 1916, na mapema mnamo Machi 1917 alikuwa amependekeza kwa Katibu wa Merika wa Navy Josephus Daniels kwamba Navy apate meli na manati ya ndege na ndege ya ndege ya Apio. Idara ya Jeshi la Merika la Merika ilikataa pendekezo lake mnamo Juni 20, 1917. Katika miaka kati ya Vita vya Kwanza vya Dunia na Vita vya Kidunia vya pili, hata hivyo, Whiting ingekuwa muhimu katika ujenzi wa wabebaji watano wa ndege sita wa Merika na kutumika kama afisa mtendaji wa wawili wake wa kwanza. Alifanya kazi pia kama afisa wa kuamuru wa mtoaji wake wa kwanza wakati Merika ilikuwa ikijaribu mambo mengi ya operesheni ya wabebaji wa ndege na ndege zao.

Mojawapo ya shughuli kuu za kwanza ambazo meli zilihusika ilikuwa Operesheni Eagle Claw ilizinduliwa na "Nimitz" mnamo 1980 baada ya kupelekwa kwenye Bahari ya Hindi ili kujibu mateka katika Ubalozi wa Merika huko Tehran. Ingawa hapo awali ilikuwa sehemu ya meli ya Atlantiki ya U.S., "Dwight D. Eisenhower" aliondoa "Nimitz" katika operesheni hii baada ya huduma yake katika Bahari ya Mediterania. "Nimitz" ilifanya mazoezi ya uhuru wa urambazaji kando ya mtoaji wa ndege mnamo Agosti 1981 katika Ghuba ya Sidra, karibu na Libya. Wakati wa zoezi hili, mbili za meli za F-14 za meli zilipiga ndege mbili za Libya kwa kile kilichojulikana kama Ghuba ya tukio la Sidra. Mnamo 1987, "Carl Vinson" alishiriki katika kupelekwa kwa wabebaji wa kwanza wa Merika katika Bahari ya Bering, na "Nimitz" walitoa usalama wakati wa Michezo ya Olimpiki ya 1988 huko Seoul.

Mnamo 1 Aprili 1931, Admiral Joseph M. Reeves alichukua amri ya mgawanyiko wa 2 (Cardiv 2), na kuwa kamanda wa kwanza wa mgawanyiko wa wabebaji katika Jeshi la Merika la Merika. Reeves pia aliteuliwa kama Kamanda wa Ndege wa U.S. Kitengo cha 2 cha kubeba hapo awali kilikuwa na wabebaji wa kwanza wa ndege wa haraka wa Jeshi la Merika la Merika, na, na pia Minesweeper ya zamani ambayo ilifanya kama zabuni ya ndege na ulinzi kwa wabebaji hao wawili. Chini ya uongozi wa Reeves, wabebaji wote hapo awali walikuwa wamejitofautisha katika mazoezi makubwa mawili ya majini, Shida ya Fleet ya 1929 na Shida ya Fleet ya 1930, ikionyesha uwezo wa wabebaji wa ndege na vikundi vyao vya ndege katika shughuli za kukera za majini. Wabebaji wa ndege kutoka kwa mgawanyiko wa 2 wakawa wa kwanza kuanza vitengo vya anga vya U.S. Marine Corps wakati, mnamo 2 Novemba 1931, squadron VS-14M alijiunga na "Saratoga" na squadron VS-15M walijiunga na "Lexington".

Kikundi cha Mgomo wa Carrier 1 kinafuatilia ukoo wake kwa mgawanyiko wa mtoaji wa 1 (Cardiv 1), muundo wa anga wa kwanza wa bahari wa Merika wa Jeshi la Merika. Iliandaliwa kwa mara ya kwanza mnamo Oktoba 1930 kama sehemu ya Kikosi cha Ndege cha Ndege, meli za Merika huko Atlantiki. Hapo awali ilijumuisha shehena ya kwanza ya ndege ya Jeshi la Merika la Merika,, na vile vile zabuni ya ndege na wachimbaji na. Mnamo mwaka wa 1933, alipewa jukumu la mgawanyiko wa kwanza chini ya ndege ya kamanda, Kikosi cha Scouting, ambacho pia kilijumuisha zabuni ya ndege "Wright"; wachimbaji, "teal", na; na airship ngumu na. Mgawanyiko wa kwanza wa Carriers hapo awali uliwekwa makao makuu katika Kituo cha Ndege cha Coco Solo Naval kilicho upande wa Atlantiki ya eneo la Mfereji wa Panama karibu na Colón, Panama. Mnamo mwaka wa 1939, mgawanyiko wa wabebaji wa kwanza ulihamishiwa kwa Kikosi cha Scouting cha Pasifiki. Wabebaji wa ndege waliona huduma katika Vita vya Kidunia vya pili, Vita vya Korea, na Vita vya Vietnam.

Whiting aliripoti ndani ya "Langley" mnamo Machi 20, 1922, siku ya kuamuru kwake, kama afisa wake wa kwanza, pia akihudumu kwa kaimu kama afisa wake wa kwanza na hivyo kuwa mtu wa kwanza kuamuru mchukua ndege wa Jeshi la Merika la Merika. "Langley" ilikuwa polepole sana kuendelea na meli ya vita, na kusudi lake kuu lilikuwa kutumika kama maabara ya uchunguzi wa nidhamu mpya ya vita vya majini vya shughuli za wabebaji wa ndege, na wafanyikazi wake na wale wa vikosi vyake vya ndege vinavyojaribu kugundua ni mazoea gani yaliyofanya kazi vizuri. Kuruka Ve-7, Luteni Virgil C. Griffin alifanya kazi ya kwanza kutoka kwa mtoaji wa Amerika kutoka "Langley" mnamo 17 Oktoba 1922, na kamanda wa uwongo Godfrey Chevalier alifanya kutua kwa kwanza mnamo 26 Oktoba 1922 katika Aeromarine 39B. Mnamo tarehe 18 Novemba 1922, Whiting mwenyewe alifanya ulimwengu wa kwanza uzinduzi wa ndege kutoka kwa shehena ya ndege wakati ndani ya "Langley", akijaribu kiwanda cha ndege cha majini PT wakati "Langley" alikuwa kwenye nanga huko Virginias York River.

Mnamo 1940, Admiral William Halsey alipendekeza ujenzi wa wasaidizi wa majini kwa mafunzo ya majaribio. Mwanzoni mwa 1941 Waingereza waliuliza Amerika kujenga kwa niaba yao wabebaji sita wa muundo bora wa "Audacity" lakini Merika tayari walikuwa wameanza kubeba wao wenyewe. Mnamo 1 Februari 1941, Mkuu wa Uendeshaji wa majini wa Merika alitoa kipaumbele kwa ujenzi wa wasaidizi wa majini kwa usafirishaji wa ndege. Meli za Merika zilizojengwa ili kukidhi mahitaji haya hapo awali zilijulikana kama vyombo vya ndege vya msaidizi (AVG) mnamo Februari 1942 na kisha kubeba ndege msaidizi wa ndege (ACV) mnamo 5 Agosti 1942. Mfano wa kwanza wa U.S. wa aina hiyo ulikuwa. Operesheni Torch na vita vya Atlantiki ya Atlantiki ya Atlantiki vilithibitisha meli hizi zenye uwezo wa kubeba ndege kwa fomu za meli zinazohamia kwa kasi ya biashara au uvamizi wa uvamizi. Uainishaji wa Uainishaji wa Merika kwa Kusafirisha Ndege (CVE) Mnamo 15 Julai 1943 ilionyesha hali iliyosasishwa kutoka kwa msaidizi hadi mpiganaji. Walijulikana kama "wabebaji wa jeep" au "flattops za watoto". Iligundulika haraka kuwa wabebaji wa kusindikiza walikuwa na utendaji bora kuliko wabebaji nyepesi, ambao walielekea kupungua vibaya kwa wastani na bahari kubwa. Darasa la "Kuanza Bay" lilibuniwa kuingiza huduma bora za CVL za Amerika kwenye eneo lenye utulivu zaidi na mfumo wa bei ghali.

Pigeon ya Curtiss ilikuwa ndege ya barua ya Amerika ya miaka ya 1920. Biplane iliyoundwa moja iliyoundwa na kujengwa kuchukua nafasi ya ndege ya Vita vya Kwanza vya Dunia kama vile DH-4, Pigeon ya Carrier ilikuwa moja ya ndege ya kwanza iliyoundwa mahsusi kwa huduma ya Airmail ya U.S.
Mnamo 1925 Huduma ya Posta ya Merika ilihisi walikuwa na huduma bora ya kufanya kazi na viboreshaji vya Airco D.H.4. Miundo ya miaka nane ilizingatiwa kuwa ya zamani na wakati huu, hata hivyo, na mashine ya kisasa iliyojengwa kwa kusudi ilihitajika. Wakati wazalishaji wengi walianza kujenga ndege ya abiria wa kizazi kipya na uwezo wa kubeba mizigo ya barua, Pigeon ya Curtiss ilikuwa muundo wa kwanza wa karatasi safi iliyotengenezwa mahsusi kwa huduma ya barua-pepe ya Merika. Ndege hiyo ilikusudiwa kuuzwa moja kwa moja kwa Huduma ya Posta, lakini sheria mpya ambayo ilifungua mikataba ya nje ilileta mifano ya kushindana.

Katika miongo miwili ijayo Mitscher alifanya kazi kukuza anga za majini, kuchukua kazi zinazotumika kwa wabebaji wa ndege na, zabuni ya seaplane, na kuchukua amri ya Patrol Wing 1, kwa kuongeza idadi ya kazi pwani. "Langley" alikuwa mtoaji wa ndege wa kwanza wa Navy. Collier aliyebadilishwa, angeweza kutengeneza tu, na hivyo kupunguza uwezo wake wa kutoa upepo juu ya staha yake ya kukimbia na kuinua chini ya mabawa ya ndege yake kwa kuzindua na kupona. Aboard "Langley" Mitscher na waanzilishi wengine wa anga ya majini waliendeleza njia nyingi ambazo ndege ingeshughulikiwa ndani ya wabebaji wa ndege wa Jeshi la Merika la Merika. Mbinu nyingi hizi zinaendelea kutumiwa katika Jeshi la Jeshi la Merika la kisasa la Merika.

Kufuatia "Ranger" na kabla ya kuingia kwa Merika katika Vita vya Kidunia vya pili, wabebaji wengine wanne waliagizwa. 
Jeshi la Kijapani la Imperial liligonga Bandari ya Pearl mnamo 7 Desemba 1941, lakini hakuna wa wabebaji wa ndege wa Pasifiki wa Pasifiki aliyekuwa bandarini. Kwa sababu sehemu kubwa ya meli ya vita ya Navy iliwekwa nje ya tume na shambulio hilo, wabebaji wa ndege ambao hawakuharibiwa walilazimishwa kuwa wachukuaji wa kwanza wa vita. Mtoaji wa ndege wa kwanza wa kukera kwa Jeshi la Merika la Merika walikuja mnamo 1 Februari 1942, wakati biashara ya wabebaji na Yorktown, ilishambulia besi za Kijapani katika Visiwa vya Marshall na Gilbert. Vita vya Bahari ya Coral ikawa vita ya kwanza ya bahari katika historia ambayo hakuna meli iliyopingana hailiona nyingine. Vita vya Midway vilianza kama kichukizo cha Kijapani huko Midway Atoll kilikutana na jeshi la kubeba la Merika lililozidi, na kusababisha ushindi wa Merika. Vita ya Midway ilikuwa nafasi ya kugeuza katika Vita vya Pasifiki.
report_src: Mtoaji wa kwanza wa ndege wa Merika ulikuwa USS “Ukumbusho” (USS Memorial), meli ambayo ilianza safari yake ya kwanza mwaka 1920 na kwa muda mrefu ikabaki kuwa mbebaji pekee wa ndege wa Marekani [1].

question_en: Is Georges Sagnac dead?
pos_context_en: Georges Sagnac (14 October 1869 – 26 February 1928) was a French physicist who lent his name to the Sagnac effect, a phenomenon which is at the basis of interferometers and ring laser gyroscopes developed since the 1970s.
neg_context_en: Sagnac was born at Périgueux and entered the École Normale Supérieure in 1889. While a lab assistant at the Sorbonne, he was one of the first in France to study X-rays, following Wilhelm Conrad Röntgen. He belonged to a group of friends and scientists that notably included Pierre and Marie Curie, Paul Langevin, Jean Perrin, and the mathematician Émile Borel. Marie Curie says that she and her husband had traded ideas with Sagnac around the time of the discovery of radioactivity. Sagnac died at Meudon-Bellevue.

The Sagnac effect, also called Sagnac interference, named after French physicist Georges Sagnac, is a phenomenon encountered in interferometry that is elicited by rotation. The Sagnac effect manifests itself in a setup called a ring interferometer. A beam of light is split and the two beams are made to follow the same path but in opposite directions. On return to the point of entry the two light beams are allowed to exit the ring and undergo interference. The relative phases of the two exiting beams, and thus the position of the interference fringes, are shifted according to the angular velocity of the apparatus. In other words, when the interferometer is at rest with respect to the earth, the light travels at a constant speed. However, when the interferometer system is spun, one beam of light will slow with respect to the other beam of light. This arrangement is also called a Sagnac interferometer. Georges Sagnac set up this experiment to prove the existence of the aether that Einstein's theory of special relativity had discarded.

The best known use of the Sagnac interferometer lies in its sensitivity to rotation. The first accounts of the effects of rotation on this form of interferometer were published in 1913 by Georges Sagnac, who mistakenly believed that his ability to detect a "whirling of the ether" disproved relativity theory. The sensitivity of present-day Sagnac interferometers far exceeds that of Sagnac's original arrangement. The sensitivity to rotation is proportional to the area circumscribed by the counter-rotating beams, and fibre optic gyroscopes, present-day descendants of the Sagnac interferometer, use thousands of loops of optical fibre rather than mirrors, such that even small to medium-sized units easily detect the rotation of the Earth. Ring laser gyroscopes (not illustrated) are another form of Sagnac rotation sensor that have important applications in inertial guidance systems.

In 1913, Georges Sagnac showed that if a beam of light is split and sent in two opposite directions around a closed path on a revolving platform with mirrors on its perimeter, and then the beams are recombined, they will exhibit interference effects. From this result Sagnac concluded that light propagates at a speed independent of the speed of the source. The motion of the earth through space had no apparent effect on the speed of the light beam, no matter how the platform was turned. The effect had been observed earlier (by Harress in 1911), but Sagnac was the first to correctly identify the cause.

The Sagnac effect demonstrates that one beam on a rotating platform covers less distance than the other beam, which creates the shift in the interference pattern. Georges Sagnac's original experiment has been shown to suffer extinction effects, but since then, the Sagnac effect has also been shown to occur in vacuum, where extinction plays no role.

It also claimed that white smoke trails such as seen behind the missile on the footage usually occur from land-to-air missile launches, and never with air-to-air missiles.
“This is not a full list of inconsistencies in the obviously edited video footage. [The footage does not give] a clear picture of when and where the video was recorded. If watched carefully, one can clearly see two roads parallel to the shoreline,” the Russian Foreign Ministry said. “But there aren't such roads in the indicated area of Abkhazia’s coast. Abkhazia's famous sand beaches - 100 meters in width - are not seen in the footage, even though they can be seen by satellite.”

The Bridge in Tredyffrin Township was a historic stone arch bridge carrying Gulph Road across Trout Creek in Tredyffrin Township, Chester County, Pennsylvania, USA. It had one span, a solid, semicircular stone arch long. There were stone wing walls at each end, with roughly squared stone voussoirs forming the arch ring. The vault of the arch had been sealed with gunite when the bridge was surveyed in 1982, and the parapets had also been topped with concrete. The bridge was built at an unknown date in the late 19th or early 20th century, and was a well-preserved, typical example of stone arch bridge construction in that period.

question_src: Je! Georges Sagnac amekufa?
pos_context_src: Georges Sagnac (14 Oktoba 1869 - 26 Februari 1928) alikuwa mtaalam wa fizikia wa Ufaransa ambaye aliipa jina lake kwa Athari ya Sagnac, jambo ambalo ni kwa msingi wa interferometers na pete za laser gyroscopes zilizotengenezwa tangu miaka ya 1970.
neg_context_title_src: 2008 Upigaji ndege wa kupeleleza wa Georgia
neg_context_src: Sagnac alizaliwa huko Périgueux na akaingia katika École Normale Supérieure mnamo 1889. Wakati msaidizi wa maabara huko Sorbonne, alikuwa mmoja wa wa kwanza nchini Ufaransa kusoma X-rays, kufuatia Wilhelm Conrad Röntgen. Alikuwa wa kikundi cha marafiki na wanasayansi ambao ni pamoja na Pierre na Marie Curie, Paul Langevin, Jean Perrin, na mtaalam wa hesabu Émile Borel. Marie Curie anasema kwamba yeye na mumewe walikuwa wameuza maoni na Sagnac wakati wote wa ugunduzi wa redio. Sagnac alikufa huko Meudon-Bellevue.

Athari ya Sagnac, ambayo pia huitwa kuingiliwa kwa Sagnac, jina lake baada ya mwanafizikia wa Ufaransa Georges Sagnac, ni jambo ambalo limekutana katika interferometry ambalo linasisitizwa na mzunguko. Athari ya Sagnac inajidhihirisha katika usanidi unaoitwa interferometer ya pete. Boriti ya mwanga imegawanywa na mihimili miwili hufanywa kufuata njia ile ile lakini kwa mwelekeo tofauti. Kurudi kwa hatua ya kuingia mihimili miwili ya taa inaruhusiwa kutoka kwa pete na kuingiliwa. Awamu za jamaa za mihimili miwili inayotoka, na kwa hivyo msimamo wa pindo la kuingilia, hubadilishwa kulingana na kasi ya angular ya vifaa. Kwa maneno mengine, wakati interferometer iko kupumzika kwa heshima na dunia, taa husafiri kwa kasi ya kila wakati. Walakini, wakati mfumo wa interferometer utakapowekwa, boriti moja ya mwanga itapungua kwa heshima na boriti nyingine ya mwanga. Mpangilio huu pia huitwa Sagnac interferometer. Georges Sagnac alianzisha jaribio hili ili kudhibitisha uwepo wa aether kwamba nadharia ya Einstein ya uhusiano maalum ilikuwa imetupilia mbali.

Matumizi yanayojulikana ya SAGNAC interferometer iko katika unyeti wake wa kuzunguka. Akaunti za kwanza za athari za kuzunguka kwa aina hii ya interferometer zilichapishwa mnamo 1913 na Georges Sagnac, ambaye aliamini vibaya kwamba uwezo wake wa kugundua "nadharia ya" ether "iliyogawanywa. Usikivu wa interferometers za siku hizi za SAGNAC zinazidi ile ya mpangilio wa asili wa Sagnac. Usikivu wa kuzunguka ni sawa na eneo lililowekwa na mihimili inayozunguka, na nyuzi za macho za macho, kizazi cha siku hizi cha sagnac interferometer, hutumia maelfu ya vitanzi vya nyuzi za macho badala ya vioo, hivyo kwamba hata vitengo vya ukubwa wa kati hugundua mzunguko wa dunia kwa urahisi. Gyroscopes za laser (hazionyeshwa) ni aina nyingine ya sensor ya mzunguko wa Sagnac ambayo ina matumizi muhimu katika mifumo ya mwongozo wa ndani.

Mnamo 1913, Georges Sagnac ilionyesha kuwa ikiwa boriti ya taa imegawanywa na kutumwa kwa pande mbili tofauti kuzunguka njia iliyofungwa kwenye jukwaa linalozunguka na vioo kwenye mzunguko wake, na kisha mihimili imebadilishwa tena, itaonyesha athari za kuingilia kati. Kutoka kwa matokeo haya Sagnac alihitimisha kuwa mwanga hueneza kwa kasi huru ya kasi ya chanzo. Mwendo wa Dunia kupitia nafasi haukuwa na athari dhahiri kwa kasi ya boriti ya mwanga, haijalishi jinsi jukwaa liligeuzwa. Athari ilikuwa imezingatiwa mapema (na Harress mnamo 1911), lakini Sagnac alikuwa wa kwanza kutambua kwa usahihi sababu hiyo.

Athari ya SAGNAC inaonyesha kuwa boriti moja kwenye jukwaa linalozunguka inashughulikia umbali mdogo kuliko boriti nyingine, ambayo husababisha mabadiliko katika muundo wa kuingilia kati. Jaribio la awali la Georges Sagnac limeonyeshwa kupata athari za kutoweka, lakini tangu wakati huo, athari ya Sagnac pia imeonyeshwa kutokea katika utupu, ambapo kutoweka hana jukumu.

Pia ilidai kuwa njia nyeupe za moshi kama vile kuonekana nyuma ya kombora kwenye onyesho kawaida hufanyika kutoka kwa uzinduzi wa kombora la ardhini, na kamwe na makombora ya hewa-hewa.
"Hii sio orodha kamili ya kutokwenda katika video iliyohaririwa wazi. [Picha haitoi] picha wazi ya lini na video hiyo ilirekodiwa. Ikiwa imetazamwa kwa uangalifu, mtu anaweza kuona wazi barabara mbili zikiwa na ufukweni," Wizara ya Mambo ya nje ya Urusi ilisema. "Lakini hakuna barabara kama hizi katika eneo lililoonyeshwa la pwani ya Abkhazia. Fukwe maarufu za mchanga wa Abkhazia - mita 100 kwa upana - hazionekani kwenye picha, ingawa zinaweza kuonekana na satelaiti."

Daraja katika mji wa Tredyffrin lilikuwa daraja la kihistoria la jiwe lililobeba barabara ya Gulph kuvuka Trout Creek katika Tredyffrin Township, Chester County, Pennsylvania, USA. Ilikuwa na span moja, jiwe thabiti, la semicircular refu. Kulikuwa na ukuta wa mrengo wa jiwe kila mwisho, na vifuniko vya jiwe takriban mraba kutengeneza pete ya arch. Sehemu ya arch ilikuwa imetiwa muhuri na bunduki wakati daraja lilichunguzwa mnamo 1982, na vifurushi pia vilikuwa vimeingizwa na simiti. Daraja hilo lilijengwa katika tarehe isiyojulikana mwishoni mwa karne ya 19 au mapema karne ya 20, na ilikuwa mfano mzuri, mfano wa ujenzi wa jiwe la jiwe katika kipindi hicho.
