question_en: Where was Jeffrey Dunham born?
pos_context_en: Dunham was born in Dallas, Texas on April 18, 1962. When he was three months old, he was adopted by real estate appraiser Howard Dunham, and his homemaker wife Joyce, who raised him in a devoutly Presbyterian household in an affluent Dallas neighborhood, as an only child.
neg_context_en: Jeffrey Dunham (born April 18, 1962) is an American ventriloquist and comedian who has also appeared on numerous television shows, including "Late Show with David Letterman", "Comedy Central Presents", "The Tonight Show" and "Sonny With a Chance". He has six specials that run on Comedy Central: "", "", "Jeff Dunham's Very Special Christmas Special", "", "", and "". Dunham also starred in "The Jeff Dunham Show", a series on the network in 2009.

Katherine Mary Dunham was born on June 22, 1909, in a Chicago hospital and taken as an infant to her parents' home in Glen Ellyn, Illinois, a village about 25 miles west of Chicago. Her father, Albert Millard Dunham, was a descendant of slaves from West Africa and Madagascar. Her mother, Fanny June Dunham (née Taylor), who was of mixed French-Canadian and Native American heritage, died when Dunham was three years old. She had an older brother, Albert Jr., with whom she had a close relationship. After her father's remarriage a few years later, the family moved to a predominantly white neighborhood in Joliet, Illinois, where her father ran a dry-cleaning business.

Dunham met his first wife, Paige Brown, at the Comedy Corner in West Palm Beach, Florida. They began dating in December 1992. In May 1994, Dunham married Brown and adopted her one-and-a-half-year-old daughter, Bree. Their daughters Ashlyn and Kenna were born in 1995 and 1997, respectively. Dunham's time away while performing proved a strain on the marriage, and in November 2008, he filed for divorce. By mid-2009, Dunham was in a relationship with fellow Texan Audrey Murdick, a certified nutritionist, personal trainer, and competition bodybuilder, and on December 25, 2011 they became engaged. On October 12, 2012, the couple married. On May 14, 2015, Dunham announced, via Facebook, that he and Audrey were expecting twin boys. In October, she gave birth to James Jeffrey and Jack Steven.

Born in Maine, to an affluent family, his parents were Earl and Charlotte Dunham. He has a sister named Patricia June. Robert grew up in Wellesley Hills, Massachusetts. He attended Noble and Greenough School in Dedham, Massachusetts. Dunham was later accepted into Williams College, in Williamstown, Massachusetts, where he received his Bachelor of Arts degree in Art History.

Her parents were born in Kansas and met in Wichita, where they married on May 5, 1940. After the attack on Pearl Harbor, her father joined the United States Army and her mother worked at a Boeing plant in Wichita. According to Dunham, she was named after her father because he wanted a son, though her relatives doubt this story and her maternal uncle recalled that her mother named Dunham after her favorite actress Bette Davis' character in the film "In This Our Life" because she thought Stanley, as a girl's name, sounded sophisticated. As a child and teenager she was known as Stanley. Other children teased her about her name but she used it through high school, "apologizing for it each time she introduced herself in a new town". By the time Dunham began attending college, she was known by her middle name, Ann, instead. After World War II, Dunham's family moved from Wichita to California while her father attended the University of California, Berkeley. In 1948, they moved to Ponca City, Oklahoma, and from there to Vernon, Texas, and then to El Dorado, Kansas. In 1955, the family moved to Seattle, Washington, where her father was employed as a furniture salesman and her mother worked as vice president of a bank. They lived in an apartment complex in the Wedgwood neighborhood where she attended Nathan Eckstein Junior High School.

Dunham was born in Coventry, Connecticut, on June 10, 1833. He was the son of Austin and Martha (Root) Dunham. The family moved to Hartford, Connecticut in 1835. Dunham's father was a merchant and businessman in Hartford. His father was in the cotton manufacturing business as well as the banking and insurance business – which enterprises Dunham took over later after his father's death. Dunham's maternal grandfather was Judge Jesse Root.

Dunham was born on October 10, 1905, in Mount Holly Township, New Jersey into a Philadelphia family with progressive leanings. His maternal grandfather had commanded a regiment of freed slaves in the Civil War, and his father James Henry Dunham was a Presbyterian minister who resigned his ministry in 1912, when Barrows was seven years old, because his study of philosophy and science, begun in the 1880s and 90s at the then College of New Jersey and at the University of Berlin, led him ultimately to disbelieve in supernatural religion. He took a Ph.D. in philosophy from the University of Pennsylvania in 1913 and went on to become a professor and dean at Temple University, where his son would eventually come to teach as well.

He was born in New York City, the first-born son of Theodore Dunham, a surgeon, and Josephine Balestier. He was educated at the private schools St. Bernard's School and Browning School, both in New York. At Harvard University he studied chemistry and graduated "summa cum laude" in 1921 with an A.B.. His graduate work was at Cornell University, where he
was awarded his M.D. in 1925. He then studied physics at
Princeton University, earning an A.M. in 1926 and a Ph.D. in 1927. He was married to Miriam Phillips Thompson in 1926, and the couple would have two children.

Cyrus Livingston Dunham (January 16, 1817 – November 21, 1877) was an attorney, soldier, and prominent Indiana politician, serving most notably as a U.S. Representative from Indiana from 1849 to 1855.
Born in Dryden, New York in 1817, Dunham attended public schools, and eventually taught school. After earning a law degree and being admitted to the Bar, he moved to Salem, Indiana in 1841 and began practicing law. Dunham was elected prosecuting attorney of Washington County, Indiana in 1845 and then served as a member of the Indiana State House of Representatives for one term from 1846 to 1847.
question_src: Jeffrey Dunham alizaliwa wapi?
pos_context_src: Dunham alizaliwa huko Dallas, Texas mnamo Aprili 18, 1962. Wakati alikuwa na miezi mitatu, alipitishwa na tathmini ya mali isiyohamishika Howard Dunham, na mke wake wa nyumbani Joyce, ambaye alimlea katika kaya ya Presbyterian katika kitongoji cha Dallas, kama mtoto wa pekee.
neg_context_src: Jeffrey Dunham (amezaliwa Aprili 18, 1962) ni mtu wa Amerika na mchekeshaji ambaye pia ameonekana kwenye vipindi vingi vya runinga, pamoja na "Maonyesho ya Late na David Letterman", "Comedy Central Presents", "The Tonight Show" na "Sonny Pamoja na Nafasi". Ana utaalam sita ambao unaendesha Central Central: "", "", "Jeff Dunham maalum sana ya Krismasi", "", "", na "". Dunham pia alikuwa na nyota katika "The Jeff Dunham Show", mfululizo kwenye mtandao mnamo 2009.

Katherine Mary Dunham alizaliwa mnamo Juni 22, 1909, katika hospitali ya Chicago na kuchukuliwa kama mtoto mchanga nyumbani kwa wazazi wake huko Glen Ellyn, Illinois, kijiji kilicho karibu maili 25 magharibi mwa Chicago. Baba yake, Albert Millard Dunham, alikuwa kizazi cha watumwa kutoka Afrika Magharibi na Madagaska. Mama yake, Fanny Juni Dunham (née Taylor), ambaye alikuwa na mchanganyiko wa Ufaransa na Urithi wa Amerika ya Amerika, alikufa wakati Dunham alikuwa na umri wa miaka mitatu. Alikuwa na kaka mkubwa, Albert Jr., ambaye alikuwa na uhusiano wa karibu. Baada ya kuoa tena kwa baba yake miaka michache baadaye, familia ilihamia katika kitongoji nyeupe huko Joliet, Illinois, ambapo baba yake aliendesha biashara ya kusafisha.

Dunham alikutana na mke wake wa kwanza, Paige Brown, kwenye kona ya ucheshi huko West Palm Beach, Florida. Walianza kuchumbiana mnamo Desemba 1992. Mnamo Mei 1994, Dunham alifunga ndoa na Brown na kumchukua binti yake mmoja na nusu, Bree. Binti zao Ashlyn na Kenna walizaliwa mnamo 1995 na 1997, mtawaliwa. Wakati wa Dunham wakati wa kufanya kazi ulithibitisha shida kwenye ndoa, na mnamo Novemba 2008, alitoa talaka. Kufikia katikati ya 2009, Dunham alikuwa kwenye uhusiano na Texan Audrey Murdick, mtaalam wa lishe aliyethibitishwa, mkufunzi wa kibinafsi, na mjenzi wa mashindano, na mnamo Desemba 25, 2011 walishirikiana. Mnamo Oktoba 12, 2012, wenzi hao walioa. Mnamo Mei 14, 2015, Dunham alitangaza, kupitia Facebook, kwamba yeye na Audrey walikuwa wanatarajia wavulana mapacha. Mnamo Oktoba, alizaa James Jeffrey na Jack Steven.

Mzaliwa wa Maine, kwa familia tajiri, wazazi wake walikuwa Earl na Charlotte Dunham. Ana dada anayeitwa Patricia Juni. Robert alikulia katika Wellesley Hills, Massachusetts. Alihudhuria Shule ya Noble na Greenough huko Dedham, Massachusetts. Dunham baadaye alikubaliwa katika Chuo cha Williams, huko Williamstown, Massachusetts, ambapo alipokea Shahada yake ya Shahada ya Sanaa katika Historia ya Sanaa.

Wazazi wake walizaliwa huko Kansas na walikutana huko Wichita, ambapo walifunga ndoa mnamo Mei 5, 1940. Baada ya shambulio la Bandari ya Pearl, baba yake alijiunga na Jeshi la Merika na mama yake walifanya kazi kwenye mmea wa Boeing huko Wichita. Kulingana na Dunham, alipewa jina la baba yake kwa sababu alitaka mtoto wa kiume, ingawa jamaa zake wanatilia shaka hadithi hii na mjomba wake wa mama alikumbuka kwamba mama yake aliitwa Dunham baada ya mwigizaji wake anayependa Bette Davis 'kwenye filamu "katika maisha yetu" kwa sababu alifikiria Stanley, kama jina la msichana, alisikika sana. Kama mtoto na kijana alijulikana kama Stanley. Watoto wengine walimdhihaki juu ya jina lake lakini aliitumia kupitia shule ya upili, "akiomba msamaha kwa kila wakati alijitambulisha katika mji mpya". Kufikia wakati Dunham alipoanza kuenda chuo kikuu, alijulikana kwa jina lake la kati, Ann, badala yake. Baada ya Vita vya Kidunia vya pili, familia ya Dunham ilihama kutoka Wichita kwenda California wakati baba yake alihudhuria Chuo Kikuu cha California, Berkeley. Mnamo 1948, walihamia Ponca City, Oklahoma, na kutoka huko kwenda Vernon, Texas, na kisha kwenda El Dorado, Kansas. Mnamo 1955, familia ilihamia Seattle, Washington, ambapo baba yake aliajiriwa kama muuzaji wa fanicha na mama yake alifanya kazi kama makamu wa rais wa benki. Waliishi katika eneo la ghorofa katika kitongoji cha Wedgwood ambapo alihudhuria Shule ya Upili ya Nathan Eckstein Junior.

Dunham alizaliwa huko Coventry, Connecticut, mnamo Juni 10, 1833. Alikuwa mtoto wa Austin na Martha (mzizi) Dunham. Familia hiyo ilihamia Hartford, Connecticut mnamo 1835. Baba ya Dunham alikuwa mfanyabiashara na mfanyabiashara huko Hartford. Baba yake alikuwa katika biashara ya utengenezaji wa pamba pamoja na biashara ya benki na bima - ambayo biashara Dunham ilichukua baadaye baada ya kifo cha baba yake. Babu wa mama wa Dunham alikuwa jaji Jesse Root.

Dunham alizaliwa mnamo Oktoba 10, 1905, katika Jiji la Mount Holly, New Jersey katika familia ya Philadelphia iliyo na malengo ya maendeleo. Babu yake mama alikuwa ameamuru jeshi la watumwa walioachiliwa katika Vita vya wenyewe kwa wenyewe, na baba yake James Henry Dunham alikuwa waziri wa Presbyterian ambaye alijiuzulu huduma yake mnamo 1912, wakati Barrows alikuwa na umri wa miaka saba, kwa sababu masomo yake ya falsafa na sayansi, alianza miaka ya 1880 na 90s katika Chuo Kikuu cha New Jersey na Chuo Kikuu cha Berlin. Alichukua Ph.D. Katika falsafa kutoka Chuo Kikuu cha Pennsylvania mnamo 1913 na kuendelea kuwa profesa na dean katika Chuo Kikuu cha Temple, ambapo mtoto wake baadaye angekuja kufundisha pia.

Alizaliwa huko New York City, mtoto wa kwanza wa Theodore Dunham, daktari wa upasuaji, na Josephine Balestier. Alikuwa ameelimishwa katika Shule ya Binafsi ya Shule ya St Bernard na Shule ya Browning, wote huko New York. Katika Chuo Kikuu cha Harvard alisoma kemia na kuhitimu "Summa cum laude" mnamo 1921 na A.B .. Kazi yake ya kuhitimu ilikuwa katika Chuo Kikuu cha Cornell, ambapo yeye
alipewa tuzo yake ya M.D. mnamo 1925. Kisha akasoma fizikia huko
Chuo Kikuu cha Princeton, kupata A.M. Mnamo 1926 na Ph.D. Mnamo 1927. Alikuwa ameolewa na Miriam Phillips Thompson mnamo 1926, na wenzi hao wangekuwa na watoto wawili.

Cyrus Livingston Dunham (Januari 16, 1817 - Novemba 21, 1877) alikuwa wakili, askari, na mwanasiasa mashuhuri wa Indiana, akihudumu sana kama mwakilishi wa Merika kutoka Indiana kutoka 1849 hadi 1855.
Mzaliwa wa Dryden, New York mnamo 1817, Dunham alienda shule za umma, na mwishowe alifundisha shule. Baada ya kupata digrii ya sheria na kukubaliwa kwenye baa, alihamia Salem, Indiana mnamo 1841 na akaanza kutekeleza sheria. Dunham alichaguliwa kuwa wakili wa mashtaka wa Kaunti ya Washington, Indiana mnamo 1845 na kisha akatumika kama mwanachama wa Baraza la Wawakilishi la Jimbo la Indiana kwa muda mmoja kutoka 1846 hadi 1847.

question_en: When was St. James' Anglican Church in Morpeth constructed?
pos_context_en: St James' Anglican Church is a heritage-listed Anglican church precinct at 19 Tank Street, Morpeth, City of Maitland, New South Wales, Australia. The original design has been attributed to Edward Charles Close, with later additions by Edmund Blacket and John Horbury Hunt and built from 1837 to 1875 by E.C. Close and James Sherwood. The precinct also includes the St. James' rectory and parish hall (formerly schoolhouse). The property is vested in the Trustees of Church Property for the Diocese of Newcastle.It was added to the New South Wales State Heritage Register on 27 January 2017.
neg_context_en: The St. James' Anglican Church Group, Morpeth is of state historical significance as it constitutes a tangible and legible link to the early European settlement of the township and Port of Morpeth, and as such with the early colonisation of NSW.

The intactness of the St. James' Anglican Church Group, Morpeth, as well as the quality of the design and execution of the pulpit and hammerbeam truss roof, indicates that the group is of state heritage significance as an important reference site for understanding the religious and physical development of Morpeth, a township of importance in the development of NSW.
The St. James' Anglican Church Group, Morpeth is of state significance for its aesthetic characteristics and demonstration of creative and technical achievement.

While most structural elements of St. James' Anglican Church, Morpeth are not rare in terms of execution and fabric, the John Horbury Hunt-designed hammerbeam truss roof is one of few in NSW, and is radically different from his other roof designs. This roof design, integral to the church, indicates that the church is of state heritage significance for its rarity value.

The St. James' Anglican Church Group, Morpeth is of state significance for its historic association with prolific 19th century architects Edmund Blacket and John Horbury Hunt, both of whom are recognised as having made important contributions to the development of ecclesiastical buildings in NSW, and especially in the Hunter Region.

When in the 1960s the picket fence partially collapsed, it was removed and not replaced. In the early 1970s a City of Westminster gas lamp was brought to Morpeth and installed just outside the entry to the church. In 1972 a columbarium was built, despite the proximity of the cemetery.

The St. James' Anglican Church Group, Morpeth is of state heritage significance for its strong association with the prolific 19th century architects Edmund Blacket and John Horbury Hunt, both of whom are recognised as having made important contributions to the development of ecclesiastical buildings in NSW, and especially in the Hunter Region.

The St. James' Anglican Church Group, Morpeth is of state heritage significance for the Horbury Hunt-designed hammerbeam truss roof with boarded ceiling within the church, which is significant for the integrity of its design and skill involved in its execution. Other moveable heritage items that are significant include the sandstone pulpit, a replica of the 13th century example in Beaulieu Abbey, Hampshire, and the ornately-carved stone baptismal font, designed by architect Edmund Blacket and installed in 1864.

The St. James Anglican Church Group, Morpeth is of state significance for its association with Lieutenant Edward Charles Close, who conveyed to the Diocese of Newcastle the land on which the church, rectory and hall are located, and substantially funded the erection of the buildings. Close, a capable artist whose works provide invaluable evidence of early colonial life in Sydney, the Illawarra and the Hunter River district, may have designed the church, and potentially the parish hall (originally the parish schoolhouse).
question_src: Kanisa la Anglikana la Anglikana la Mtakatifu James lilijengwa lini?
pos_context_title_src: Kanisa la Anglikana la St James, Morpeth
pos_context_src: Kanisa la St James 'Anglican ni eneo la kanisa la Anglikana lililoorodheshwa na Urithi katika 19 Tank Street, Morpeth, Jiji la Maitland, New South Wales, Australia. Ubunifu wa asili umehusishwa na Edward Charles Karibu, na nyongeza za baadaye na Edmund Blacket na John Horbury Hunt na kujengwa kutoka 1837 hadi 1875 na E.C. Karibu na James Sherwood. Precinct pia ni pamoja na ukumbi wa St James 'na ukumbi wa parokia (zamani wa shule). Mali hiyo imepewa wadhamini wa mali ya Kanisa kwa Dayosisi ya Newcastle.Iliongezwa kwenye Jisajili la Urithi wa Jimbo la New South Wales mnamo 27 Januari 2017.

neg_context_src: Kundi la Kanisa la Mtakatifu James 'Anglikana, Morpeth ni la umuhimu wa kihistoria wa serikali kwani hufanya kiunga kinachoonekana na kinachofaa kwa makazi ya mapema ya Uropa na bandari ya Morpeth, na kwa hivyo na ukoloni wa mapema wa NSW.

Uwezo wa kikundi cha kanisa la St. James 'Anglican, Morpeth, na ubora wa muundo na utekelezaji wa paa la mimbari na nyundo, inaonyesha kuwa kikundi hicho ni cha umuhimu wa urithi wa serikali kama tovuti muhimu ya kumbukumbu ya kuelewa maendeleo ya kidini na ya mwili ya Morpeth, mji wa umuhimu katika maendeleo ya NSW.
Kikundi cha Kanisa la St. James 'Anglikana, Morpeth ni muhimu sana kwa sifa zake za uzuri na maonyesho ya mafanikio ya ubunifu na kiufundi.

Wakati mambo mengi ya kimuundo ya Kanisa la Mtakatifu James 'Anglikana, Morpeth sio nadra katika suala la utekelezaji na kitambaa, John Horbury Hunt-iliyoundwa ya Hammerbeam Truss paa ni moja wapo katika NSW, na ni tofauti sana na muundo wake mwingine wa paa. Ubunifu huu wa paa, muhimu kwa Kanisa, unaonyesha kuwa Kanisa ni la umuhimu wa urithi wa serikali kwa thamani yake ya rarity.

Kikundi cha Kanisa la St. James 'Anglican, Morpeth ni muhimu sana kwa ushirika wake wa kihistoria na wasanifu wa karne ya 19 Edmund Blacket na John Horbury Hunt, ambao wote wanatambuliwa kuwa wametoa michango muhimu katika maendeleo ya majengo ya kikanisa katika NSW, na haswa katika mkoa wa Hunter.

Wakati katika miaka ya 1960 uzio wa kachumbari uliporomoka, iliondolewa na haijabadilishwa. Katika miaka ya mapema ya 1970 mji wa Westminster gesi ililetwa Morpeth na kusanikishwa nje ya kuingia kanisani. Mnamo 1972 columbarium ilijengwa, licha ya ukaribu wa kaburi.

Kikundi cha Kanisa la St. James 'Anglican, Morpeth ni muhimu kwa urithi wa serikali kwa ushirika wake mkubwa na wasanifu wa karne ya 19 Edmund Blacket na John Horbury Hunt, ambao wote wanatambuliwa kuwa wametoa michango muhimu katika maendeleo ya majengo ya kidini katika NSW, na haswa katika mkoa wa Hunter.

Kikundi cha Kanisa la St. James 'Anglican, Morpeth ni muhimu sana kwa hali ya urithi wa Horbury Hunt-iliyoundwa na dari iliyo na dari ndani ya kanisa, ambayo ni muhimu kwa uadilifu wa muundo wake na ustadi unaohusika katika utekelezaji wake. Vitu vingine vya urithi vinavyoweza kusongeshwa ambavyo ni muhimu ni pamoja na Sandstone Pulpit, picha ya mfano wa karne ya 13 huko Beaulieu Abbey, Hampshire, na font ya kubatiza jiwe iliyochongwa, iliyoundwa na mbuni Edmund Blacket na iliyowekwa mnamo 1864.

Kikundi cha Kanisa la Mtakatifu James Anglican, Morpeth ni muhimu sana kwa ushirika wake na Lieutenant Edward Charles karibu, ambaye alifikisha Dayosisi ya Newcastle ardhi ambayo Kanisa, Rectory na Hall ziko, na walifadhili sana ujenzi wa majengo hayo. Karibu, msanii mwenye uwezo ambaye kazi zake hutoa ushahidi muhimu wa maisha ya wakoloni wa mapema huko Sydney, Illawarra na Wilaya ya Hunter River, inaweza kuwa imeunda kanisa, na uwezekano wa ukumbi wa parokia (asili ya shule ya parokia).

question_en: When was written music first developed?
pos_context_en: The Medieval period includes music from after the fall of Rome to about 1400. Monophonic chant, also called plainsong or Gregorian chant, was the dominant form until about 1100. Catholic monks developed the first forms of modern European musical notation in order to standardize liturgy throughout the worldwide Church. Polyphonic (multi-voiced) music developed from monophonic chant throughout the late Middle Ages and into the Renaissance, including the more complex voicings of motets. The Renaissance era was from 1400 to 1600. It was characterized by greater use of instrumentation, multiple interweaving melodic lines, and the use of the first bass instruments. Social dancing became more widespread, so musical forms appropriate to accompanying dance began to standardize. It is in this time that the notation of music on a staff and other elements of musical notation began to take shape. This invention made possible the separation of the composition of a piece of music from its "transmission"; without written music, transmission was oral, and subject to change every time it was transmitted. With a musical score, a work of music could be performed without the composer's presence. The invention of the movable-type printing press in the 15th century had far-reaching consequences on the preservation and transmission of music.
neg_context_en: Prior to the 1880s, popular music publishing was a secondary function of music stores or "serious" (Classical) music publishers. After 1880, publishers in New York developed a promotional technique called plugging. By 1900, most music publishers had clustered their businesses along 28th St. (between 6th Ave. and Broadway) in order to be closer to New York's thriving entertainment center. This area came to be known as Tin Pan Alley. The first decade of the 20th century saw the production of more popular music than had ever been written up to that time: about 25,000 songs annually. In 1893, sheet music for the song "After the Ball" sold one million copies and, over the next ten years, went on to sell a total of ten million.

In the first quarter of the 19th century alone, 10,000 pieces of popular music were printed by U.S. publishers. The industry, however, did nothing to promote music or develop writers. Songs became popular by word-of-mouth. Most minstrel troupes and professional singers wrote their own music or had songs written to order. Stephen Foster was the first composer who tried to make a living as an independent professional songwriter but, in the 1850s, copyright protection was so lax and royalties so small (or non-existent) that he found himself living in poverty. This changed only gradually as young men involved in other business enterprises began to perceive the possibilities for enrichment in song publishing.

In early 20th-century American musical theater, the first musicals written and produced by African Americans debuted on Broadway in 1898 with a musical by Bob Cole and Billy Johnson. In 1901, the first recording of black musicians was of Bert Williams and George Walker, featuring music from Broadway musicals. Theodore Drury helped black artists develop in the opera field. He founded the Drury Opera Company in 1900 and, although he used a white orchestra, he featured black singers in leading roles and choruses. Although this company was only active from 1900 to 1908, black singers' opportunities with Drury marked the first black participation in opera companies. Also significant is Scott Joplin's opera "Treemonisha", which is unique as a ragtime-folk opera; it was first performed in 1911.

The musical style which developed from these early experiments was called monody. In the 1590s, monody developed into a vehicle capable of extended dramatic expression through the work of composers such as Jacopo Peri, working in conjunction with poet Ottavio Rinuccini. In 1598, Peri and Rinuccini produced "Dafne", an entire drama sung in monodic style: this was the first creation of a new form called "opera". Though Peri's Dafne was the first performed opera, its music has been lost to the centuries. Instead, L'Euridice, his second opera is most-often heralded as the history-making work. The new form of opera also borrowed, especially for the librettos, from an existing pastoral poetic form called the intermedio; it was mainly the musical style that was new. The instrumentation for an opera from the Camerata composers (Caccini and Peri) was written for a handful of gambas, lutes, and harpsichord or organ for continuo.

Musical notation was developed before parchment or paper were used for writing. The earliest form of musical notation can be found in a cuneiform tablet that was created at Nippur, in Sumer (today's Iraq) in about 2,000 BC. The tablet represents fragmentary instructions for performing music, that the music was composed in harmonies of thirds, and that it was written using a diatonic scale.

Music publishing using machine-printed sheet music developed during the Renaissance music era in the mid-15th century. The development of music publication followed the evolution of printing technologies that were first developed for printing regular books. After the mid-15th century, mechanical techniques for printing sheet music were first developed. The earliest example, a set of liturgical chants, dates from about 1465, shortly after the Gutenberg Bible was printed. Prior to this time, music had to be copied out by hand. To copy music notation by hand was a very costly, labor-intensive and time-consuming process, so it was usually undertaken only by monks and priests seeking to preserve sacred music for the church. The few collections of secular (non-religious) music that are extant were commissioned and owned by wealthy aristocrats. Examples include the Squarcialupi Codex of Italian Trecento music and the Chantilly Codex of French Ars subtilior music.

Most early written classical music was predominantly sacred; collections of written music and literature were held by monasteries, cathedrals, and other religious establishments, such as church music societies, offices, and seminaries. As universities emerged in the 12th century, libraries formed throughout Europe, and obtained donations or gifts from monasteries and private collectors. The advent of national and centralized libraries two centuries later allowed for greater attention to special materials like music collections. Up to the end of the 15th century, music collections had been limited to religious organizations, private collectors, or small areas of university libraries. Public collections grew with the development of printing at the end of the 15th century and the surge of scholarly and artistic endeavors of the Renaissance.

Born in Pimlico, London, he made his first onstage appearance at the age of seven. He was an apprentice in a boat building business before becoming a professional entertainer in 1888, making his first appearances in pantomimes and minstrel shows. By 1895 he had become a leading music hall entertainer, appearing at the Middlesex Music Hall in London and developing an act that was considered somewhat risqué for the time. Described as a "low comedian", his popular songs (written by others) included "A Little Bit Off the Top", "The Cock of the North", and "When I Get Some Money".

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.
question_src: Je! Muziki ulioandikwa ulitengenezwa kwanza?
pos_context_src: Kipindi cha medieval ni pamoja na muziki kutoka baada ya kuanguka kwa Roma hadi karibu 1400. Monophonic chant, pia inayoitwa Plainsong au Gregorian Chant, ilikuwa fomu kubwa hadi karibu 1100. Watawa wa Katoliki waliendeleza aina ya kwanza ya nukuu ya kisasa ya muziki wa Ulaya ili kudhibitisha liturujia katika kanisa lote ulimwenguni. Muziki wa Polyphonic (anuwai) ulioandaliwa kutoka kwa wimbo wa monophonic katika Zama za Kati na kuingia Renaissance, pamoja na sauti ngumu zaidi za Motets. Enzi ya Renaissance ilikuwa kutoka 1400 hadi 1600. Ilikuwa na sifa ya matumizi makubwa ya vifaa, mistari mingi ya melodic inayoingiliana, na utumiaji wa vyombo vya kwanza vya bass. Densi ya kijamii ilizidi kuenea, kwa hivyo aina za muziki zinazofaa kuandamana na densi zilianza kusawazisha. Ni katika wakati huu kwamba maoni ya muziki kwenye wafanyikazi na mambo mengine ya nukuu ya muziki yakaanza kuchukua sura. Uvumbuzi huu ulifanya uwezekano wa mgawanyo wa muundo wa kipande cha muziki kutoka kwa "maambukizi" yake; Bila muziki ulioandikwa, maambukizi yalikuwa ya mdomo, na yanabadilika kila wakati yalipitishwa. Na alama ya muziki, kazi ya muziki inaweza kufanywa bila uwepo wa mtunzi. Uvumbuzi wa vyombo vya habari vya kuchapa vya aina inayoweza kusongeshwa katika karne ya 15 ulikuwa na athari kubwa juu ya uhifadhi na usambazaji wa muziki.
neg_context_src: Kabla ya miaka ya 1880, uchapishaji maarufu wa muziki ulikuwa kazi ya sekondari ya maduka ya muziki au wachapishaji wa muziki "wakubwa" (wa zamani). Baada ya 1880, wachapishaji huko New York walitengeneza mbinu ya uendelezaji inayoitwa plugging. Kufikia 1900, wachapishaji wengi wa muziki walikuwa wameunganisha biashara zao pamoja na 28 St. (kati ya 6 Ave. na Broadway) ili kuwa karibu na Kituo cha Burudani cha New York. Sehemu hii ilijulikana kama Tin Pan Alley. Muongo wa kwanza wa karne ya 20 uliona utengenezaji wa muziki maarufu kuliko vile ulivyowahi kuandikwa hadi wakati huo: karibu nyimbo 25,000 kila mwaka. Mnamo 1893, muziki wa karatasi ya wimbo "Baada ya Mpira" uliuza nakala milioni moja na, kwa miaka kumi ijayo, iliendelea kuuza jumla ya milioni kumi.

Katika robo ya kwanza ya karne ya 19 pekee, vipande 10,000 vya muziki maarufu vilichapishwa na wachapishaji wa Merika. Sekta hiyo, hata hivyo, haikufanya chochote kukuza muziki au kukuza waandishi. Nyimbo zikawa maarufu kwa neno-kwa-kinywa. Troupe nyingi za minstrel na waimbaji wa kitaalam waliandika muziki wao wenyewe au walikuwa na nyimbo zilizoandikwa kuagiza. Stephen Foster alikuwa mtunzi wa kwanza ambaye alijaribu kupata pesa kama mwandishi wa nyimbo wa kitaalam lakini, katika miaka ya 1850, ulinzi wa hakimiliki ulikuwa wa kawaida na mrahaba mdogo sana (au haupo) kwamba alijikuta akiishi katika umaskini. Hii ilibadilika polepole tu wakati vijana waliohusika katika biashara zingine za biashara walianza kugundua uwezekano wa utajiri katika kuchapisha wimbo.

Mwanzoni mwa ukumbi wa michezo wa muziki wa Amerika ya karne ya 20, muziki wa kwanza ulioandikwa na kutengenezwa na Wamarekani wa Kiafrika ulijadiliwa huko Broadway mnamo 1898 na muziki na Bob Cole na Billy Johnson. Mnamo 1901, rekodi ya kwanza ya wanamuziki weusi ilikuwa ya Bert Williams na George Walker, iliyo na muziki kutoka kwa Broadway Music. Theodore Drury ilisaidia wasanii weusi kukuza kwenye uwanja wa opera. Alianzisha Kampuni ya Drury Opera mnamo 1900 na, ingawa alitumia orchestra nyeupe, alionyesha waimbaji weusi katika majukumu na choruses zinazoongoza. Ingawa kampuni hii ilikuwa kazi tu kutoka 1900 hadi 1908, fursa za waimbaji weusi na Drury ziliashiria ushiriki wa kwanza mweusi katika kampuni za opera. La muhimu pia ni opera ya Scott Joplin "Treemonia", ambayo ni ya kipekee kama opera ya watu wa wakati; Ilifanywa kwa mara ya kwanza mnamo 1911.

Mtindo wa muziki ambao ulitengeneza kutoka kwa majaribio haya ya mapema uliitwa Monody. Mnamo miaka ya 1590, Monody alikua gari yenye uwezo wa kupanuka kwa sauti kubwa kupitia kazi ya watunzi kama vile Jacopo Peri, akifanya kazi kwa kushirikiana na mshairi Ottavio rinuccini. Mnamo 1598, Peri na Rinuccini walizalisha "Dafne", mchezo mzima wa kuimba kwa mtindo wa monodic: hii ilikuwa uumbaji wa kwanza wa fomu mpya inayoitwa "Opera". Ingawa Dafne ya Peri ilikuwa opera ya kwanza iliyofanywa, muziki wake umepotea kwa karne nyingi. Badala yake, L'E hivyo, opera yake ya pili inaangaziwa zaidi kama kazi ya kutengeneza historia. Njia mpya ya opera pia imekopa, haswa kwa librettos, kutoka kwa fomu ya ushairi wa kichungaji inayoitwa interdio; Ilikuwa mtindo wa muziki ambao ulikuwa mpya. Utunzaji wa opera kutoka kwa watunzi wa Camerata (Caccini na Peri) uliandikwa kwa wachache wa Gambas, Lutes, na Harpsichord au Organ kwa Contineo.

Ujumbe wa muziki uliandaliwa kabla ya ngozi au karatasi ilitumika kwa uandishi. Njia ya kwanza ya nukuu ya muziki inaweza kupatikana katika kibao cha cuneiform ambacho kiliundwa huko Nippur, huko Sumer (Iraq ya leo) karibu 2000 KK. Kompyuta kibao inawakilisha maagizo ya kugawanyika kwa muziki, kwamba muziki huo uliundwa katika maonyesho ya theluthi, na kwamba iliandikwa kwa kutumia kiwango cha diatonic.

Uchapishaji wa muziki kwa kutumia muziki uliochapishwa wa mashine uliyotengenezwa wakati wa muziki wa Renaissance katikati ya karne ya 15. Ukuzaji wa uchapishaji wa muziki ulifuatia mabadiliko ya teknolojia za kuchapa ambazo ziliandaliwa kwanza kwa kuchapisha vitabu vya kawaida. Baada ya katikati ya karne ya 15, mbinu za mitambo za muziki wa kuchapa zilitengenezwa kwanza. Mfano wa mapema, seti ya vifungo vya liturujia, tarehe kutoka karibu 1465, muda mfupi baada ya Biblia ya Gutenberg kuchapishwa. Kabla ya wakati huu, muziki ulipaswa kunakiliwa kwa mkono. Ili kunakili nukuu ya muziki kwa mkono ilikuwa mchakato wa gharama kubwa sana, wenye nguvu na wa muda, kwa hivyo ilifanywa tu na watawa na makuhani wakitaka kuhifadhi muziki mtakatifu kwa kanisa. Makusanyo machache ya muziki wa kidunia (usio wa kidini) ambao ni wa zamani uliagizwa na unamilikiwa na matajiri wakuu. Mifano ni pamoja na squarcialupi codex ya muziki wa Italia Trecento na Chantilly Codex ya muziki wa chini wa Ars.

Muziki mwingi wa mapema ulioandikwa ulikuwa mtakatifu; Makusanyo ya muziki ulioandikwa na fasihi yalifanyika na watawa, makanisa, na vituo vingine vya kidini, kama vile jamii za muziki wa kanisa, ofisi, na semina. Vile vyuo vikuu vilipoibuka katika karne ya 12, maktaba zilizoundwa kote Ulaya, na kupata michango au zawadi kutoka kwa watawa na watoza kibinafsi. Kutokea kwa maktaba za kitaifa na za kati karne mbili baadaye kuruhusiwa kwa umakini mkubwa kwa vifaa maalum kama makusanyo ya muziki. Hadi mwisho wa karne ya 15, makusanyo ya muziki yalikuwa mdogo kwa mashirika ya kidini, watoza ushuru, au maeneo madogo ya maktaba za vyuo vikuu. Makusanyo ya umma yalikua na maendeleo ya uchapishaji mwishoni mwa karne ya 15 na kuongezeka kwa wasomi na juhudi za kisanii za Renaissance.

Mzaliwa wa Pimlico, London, alifanya muonekano wake wa kwanza akiwa na umri wa miaka saba. Alikuwa mwanafunzi katika biashara ya ujenzi wa mashua kabla ya kuwa burudani ya kitaalam mnamo 1888, akifanya kuonekana kwake kwa mara ya kwanza katika maonyesho ya Pantomimes na Minstrel. Kufikia 1895 alikuwa mtu wa burudani anayeongoza wa muziki, akionekana kwenye Jumba la Muziki la Middlesex huko London na kuendeleza kitendo ambacho kilizingatiwa mara kadhaa kwa wakati huo. Imefafanuliwa kama "mchekeshaji wa chini", nyimbo zake maarufu (zilizoandikwa na wengine) ni pamoja na "kidogo juu ya juu", "jogoo wa kaskazini", na "wakati nitapata pesa".

Winfield Toll Bridge, pia inajulikana kama Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, ni kihistoria wa kihistoria wa Cantilever Warren Truss Bridge iliyoko Winfield na Red House, Kaunti ya Putnam, West Virginia. Ilijengwa mnamo 1955, na inachukua Mto wa Kanawha, iliyobeba West Virginia Route 34. Cantilever kupitia-truss ina nafasi mbili za nanga kila futi 245 kwa urefu na urefu wa futi 462 kwa urefu kati ya mistari ya kituo cha pier. Span kuu ina futi mbili 128, inchi 4, mikono ya cantilever na miguu 205, inchi 4, iliyosimamishwa.

question_en: Who is the CEO of the WWE?
pos_context_en: Vincent Kennedy McMahon (; born August 24, 1945) is an American professional wrestling promoter and executive, American football executive, and businessman. Since taking over the company from his father in the 1980s, he has worked in the corporate area of the WWE and behind the scenes. He currently serves as the majority owner, chairman and CEO of WWE as well as founder of Alpha Entertainment, which is the holding company of the American football league the XFL.
neg_context_en:
As of 2018, the company's Board of Directors has nine members: Vince McMahon, the company's Chairman of the Board and CEO; Stuart U. Goldfarb, President of Fullbridge, Inc.; Patricia A. Gottesman, former President and CEO of Crimson Hexagon; Frank A. Riddick, III, CEO of Shale-Inland Group, Inc.; Jeffrey R. Speed, former Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of Six Flags; Laureen Ong, former President of Travel Channel; Robyn W. Peterson, 
Chief Technology Officer and Head of Product, Mashable; Stephanie McMahon, Chief Brand Officer of WWE; and Paul "Triple H" Levesque, WWE's Executive Vice President of talent, live events, and creative.

Linda McMahon, the CEO at the time, elected to close the nightclub in February 2003 so WWE could concentrate more on their global efforts. The retail shop closed two months later. This meant that WWE Niagara Falls was the only official WWE retail store in the world. The complex remained closed for two years until 2005, when the Hard Rock Cafe took over the lease and the business. On August 16, 2006, WWE returned to the former location for the 2006 Diva Search finale. WWE also held press conferences at the Hard Rock Cafe for WrestleMania's 24, 25, 27, 30.

WWE & Company is a fashion, beauty and lifestyle technology company specialising in the development of mobile, cloud-based, O2O commerce enterprise technologies, targeting the mainland Chinese consumers. WWE is a joint venture between The Wharf (Holdings) Limited (), Walton Brown Group (a company of The Lane Crawford Joyce Group), and eCargo Holdings Limited (ASX:ECG), initially capitalised at RMB 300 million. WWE & Company was founded and led by Thomson Cheng, President of Walton Brown, and Christopher Lau, CEO and Founder of ECG, as co-CEOs in Hong Kong. 
Walton Brown and ECG jointly invested RMB 150 million for an initial 50% equity interest and The Wharf (Holdings) Limited, which operates Harbour City and Times Square in Hong Kong, will co-invest another RMB 150 million for a 50% equity interest through Novel Colour, a wholly owned subsidiary.

In 2009, McMahon announced his resignation from WWE which went into effect January 1, 2010. He later became CEO of entertainment service company YOU On Demand in late 2010. On July 12, 2013, McMahon voluntarily stepped down as CEO of YOU On Demand and appointed Weicheng Liu as his successor, while remaining the company's principal executive officer and Vice Chairman of the Board. On February 22, 2016, he returned to the WWE as an on-screen character.
The company's majority owner is its chairman and CEO, Vince McMahon, who retains a 42% ownership of the company's outstanding stock and 83% of the voting power.

In 2010, Ben Feder stepped down as CEO, and was replaced by executive chairman Strauss Zelnick, who remains the company's chairman and CEO. In January 2013, while being dissolved, THQ sold the rights of the "WWE" wrestling games series to Take-Two. Subsequently, 2K Sports has published annual "WWE 2K" games as part of its lineup.

She went through a confirmation process in the Connecticut State Assembly where she was questioned on her record as CEO of WWE. The State Senate approved her nomination by a vote of 34-1 and the House by 96-45 with some opponents expressing concerns that the nature of her WWE activities would send the wrong message. State representative Bruce Morris claimed she lacked "depth of knowledge regarding education." However, state representative John Hetherington said it "would be good to have someone outside the establishment on the board."

The origins of the WWE Network can trace back to 2000 when USA Network filed the lawsuit against the World Wrestling Federation (WWF, now known as the WWE) due to breach of contract which saw most of its programming moved to Viacom-owned TNN and MTV. The Delaware Chancery Court ruled in favor of the WWF in June 2000. Then CEO, Linda McMahon, revealed that WWF wanted its own cable network and testified that before WWF signed a rights deal with Viacom, the company had floated the idea of acquiring USA's Sci-Fi Channel, and reformatting it as a dedicated wrestling network. USA executives rejected the idea, and McMahon said that former USA Networks President Barry Baker encouraged her to talk to other programmers about potential deals. "I can tell you right now, Linda, you're not going to get anybody to give you a network," McMahon testified. In 2005, USA Network re-acquired the rights to all WWE programming.

In February 2013, Glory announced that former WWE Executive VP Andrew Whitaker had been hired as the global CEO of Glory Sports International. In August 2014, Glory announced that Jon J. Franklin had been appointed as new CEO of Glory Sports International. In January 2018, Glory announced that Franklin had moved to the role of Chief Development Officer, and former UFC executive Marshall Zelaznik had been hired as the new CEO.
question_src: Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa WWE ni nani?
pos_context_src: Vincent Kennedy McMahon (; amezaliwa Agosti 24, 1945) ni mtaalam wa mitihani wa Amerika na mtendaji, mtendaji wa mpira wa miguu wa Amerika, na mfanyabiashara. Tangu kuchukua kampuni kutoka kwa baba yake katika miaka ya 1980, amefanya kazi katika eneo la ushirika la WWE na nyuma ya pazia. Hivi sasa anafanya kazi kama mmiliki wengi, Mwenyekiti na Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa WWE na mwanzilishi wa Alpha Entertainment, ambayo ni kampuni inayoshikilia ya Ligi ya Soka ya Amerika XFL.
neg_context_src:
Mnamo mwaka wa 2018, bodi ya wakurugenzi ya kampuni hiyo ina wanachama tisa: Vince McMahon, mwenyekiti wa kampuni hiyo na Mkurugenzi Mtendaji; Stuart U. Goldfarb, Rais wa Fullbridge, Inc.; Patricia A. Gottesman, rais wa zamani na Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa Crimson Hexagon; Frank A. Riddick, III, Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa Shale-Inland Group, Inc.; Jeffrey R. Speed, makamu wa rais mtendaji wa zamani na afisa mkuu wa kifedha wa bendera sita; Laureen Ong, Rais wa zamani wa Kituo cha Kusafiri; Robyn W. Peterson, 
Afisa Mkuu wa Teknolojia na Mkuu wa Bidhaa, Mashable; Stephanie McMahon, afisa mkuu wa chapa ya WWE; na Paul "Triple H" Levesque, makamu wa rais mtendaji wa WWE wa talanta, hafla za moja kwa moja, na ubunifu.

Linda McMahon, Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wakati huo, alichaguliwa kufunga kilabu cha usiku mnamo Februari 2003 ili WWE iweze kuzingatia zaidi juhudi zao za ulimwengu. Duka la rejareja lilifunga miezi miwili baadaye. Hii ilimaanisha kuwa WWE Niagara Falls ndio duka pekee la rejareja la WWE ulimwenguni. Ugumu huo ulibaki kufungwa kwa miaka miwili hadi 2005, wakati Hard Rock Cafe ilichukua kukodisha na biashara. Mnamo Agosti 16, 2006, WWE ilirudi katika eneo la zamani kwa fainali ya utaftaji wa diva ya 2006. WWE pia ilifanya mikutano ya waandishi wa habari kwenye Hard Rock Cafe kwa WrestleMania's 24, 25, 27, 30.

WWE & Company ni kampuni ya teknolojia ya mtindo, uzuri na mtindo wa maisha inayobobea katika maendeleo ya teknolojia ya biashara ya wingu, ya wingu, ya O2O, inayolenga watumiaji wa China Bara. WWE ni ubia kati ya Wharf (Holdings) Limited (), Walton Brown Group (kampuni ya Lane Crawford Joyce Group), na Ecargo Holdings Limited (ASX: ECG), hapo awali ilikuwa mtaji katika RMB milioni 300. WWE & Kampuni ilianzishwa na kuongozwa na Thomson Cheng, rais wa Walton Brown, na Christopher Lau, Mkurugenzi Mtendaji na mwanzilishi wa ECG, kama Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa Hong Kong. 
Walton Brown na ECG kwa pamoja waliwekeza RMB milioni 150 kwa riba ya awali ya 50% na Wharf (Holdings) Limited, ambayo inafanya kazi Bandari ya Jiji na Times Square huko Hong Kong, itaunda RMB nyingine milioni 150 kwa riba ya usawa wa 50% kupitia Rangi ya Riwaya, kampuni inayomilikiwa kabisa.

Mnamo mwaka wa 2009, McMahon alitangaza kujiuzulu kwake kutoka WWE ambayo ilianza kutumika Januari 1, 2010. Baadaye alikua Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa Kampuni ya Huduma ya Burudani wewe kwa mahitaji mwishoni mwa mwaka wa 2010. Mnamo Julai 12, 2013, McMahon alijitolea kwa hiari kama Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa Mahitaji na alimteua Weicheng Liu kama mrithi wake, wakati akibaki afisa mkuu wa kampuni hiyo na makamu wa bodi. Mnamo Februari 22, 2016, alirudi kwa WWE kama mhusika wa skrini.
Mmiliki wa kampuni hiyo ni mwenyekiti wake na Mkurugenzi Mtendaji, Vince McMahon, ambaye anamiliki umiliki wa asilimia 42 wa hisa bora ya kampuni na 83% ya nguvu ya kupiga kura.

Mnamo mwaka wa 2010, Ben Feder alishuka kama Mkurugenzi Mtendaji, na akabadilishwa na mwenyekiti mtendaji Strauss Zelnick, ambaye bado ni mwenyekiti wa kampuni hiyo na Mkurugenzi Mtendaji. Mnamo Januari 2013, wakati ilifutwa, THQ iliuza haki za safu ya Michezo ya "WWE" kuchukua mbili. Baadaye, michezo ya 2K imechapisha michezo ya kila mwaka ya "WWE 2K" kama sehemu ya safu yake.

Alipitia mchakato wa uthibitisho katika Bunge la Jimbo la Connecticut ambapo alihojiwa kwenye rekodi yake kama Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa WWE. Seneti ya Jimbo iliidhinisha uteuzi wake kwa kura ya 34-1 na Baraza kwa 96-45 na wapinzani wengine wakionyesha wasiwasi kwamba asili ya shughuli zake za WWE itatuma ujumbe mbaya. Mwakilishi wa serikali Bruce Morris alidai alikuwa na "kina cha maarifa kuhusu elimu." Walakini, mwakilishi wa serikali John Hetherington alisema "itakuwa vizuri kuwa na mtu nje ya uanzishwaji kwenye bodi."

Asili ya Mtandao wa WWE inaweza kufuata nyuma hadi 2000 wakati Mtandao wa USA ulipowasilisha kesi dhidi ya Shirikisho la Wrestling World (WWF, inayojulikana kama WWE) kwa sababu ya uvunjaji wa mkataba ambao uliona programu zake nyingi zilihamia kwa TNN na MTV inayomilikiwa na Viacom. Korti ya Chancery ya Delaware iliamua kupendelea WWF mnamo Juni 2000. Kisha Mkurugenzi Mtendaji, Linda McMahon, alifunua kwamba WWF ilitaka mtandao wake wa cable na ilishuhudia kwamba kabla ya WWF kusaini mpango wa haki na Viacom, kampuni ilikuwa imeelekeza wazo la kupata kituo cha Sci-Fi cha USA, na kurekebisha kama mtandao ulioandaliwa. Watendaji wa USA walikataa wazo hilo, na McMahon alisema kwamba Rais wa zamani wa Mitandao ya USA Barry Baker alimhimiza azungumze na waandaaji wengine juu ya mikataba inayowezekana. "Naweza kukuambia hivi sasa, Linda, hautapata mtu yeyote kukupa mtandao," McMahon alishuhudia. Mnamo 2005, Mtandao wa USA ulipata tena haki za programu zote za WWE.

Mnamo Februari 2013, Utukufu ulitangaza kwamba mtendaji wa zamani wa WWE Andrew Whitaker alikuwa ameajiriwa kama Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa Global wa Glory Sports International. Mnamo Agosti 2014, Utukufu ulitangaza kwamba Jon J. Franklin aliteuliwa kama Mkurugenzi Mtendaji mpya wa Glory Sports International. Mnamo Januari 2018, Utukufu ulitangaza kwamba Franklin alikuwa amehamia jukumu la Afisa Mkuu wa Maendeleo, na mtendaji wa zamani wa UFC, Marshall Zelaznik alikuwa ameajiriwa kama Mkurugenzi Mtendaji mpya.
report_src: Kwa sasa, Mkurugenzi Mtendaji (CEO) wa World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE) ni Vincent Kennedy McMahon, aliyezaliwa 24 Agosti 1945, ambaye pia ni mwenyekiti na mmiliki mkuu wa kampuni hiyo pamoja na kuwa mwanzilishi wa Alpha Entertainment inayomiliki Ligi ya Soka ya Amerika, XFL [1].

question_en: What happens when the president and VP of the USA die?
pos_context_en: If the Vice President-elect dies or resigns "before" the meeting of the Electoral College in December, the National Committee of the winning party would, in consultation with the president-elect, choose a replacement to receive the electoral votes of the Vice Presidential nominee in the same manner as would happen if the former Vice Presidential nominee had become President-elect due to the death of the apparent winner. Assuming the requisite number the electors agreed to vote for the replacement candidate, that person would then become the Vice President-elect. If such a vacancy were to occur "after" the electoral votes had been cast in the states, most authorities maintain that no replacement would be chosen and the new President (after taking office) would nominate a Vice President, per the provisions of the Twenty-fifth Amendment to the Constitution.
neg_context_title_en: State funerals in the United States
List of Presidents of the United States who died in office
Traditions of the United States Senate
neg_context_en: The Twenty-fifth Amendment (1967) clarifies what happens upon the death, removal, or resignation of the President or Vice President and how the Presidency is temporarily filled if the President becomes disabled and cannot fulfill the responsibilities of the office. It supersedes the ambiguous succession rule established in . A concrete plan of succession has been needed on multiple occasions since 1789. However, for nearly 20% of U.S. history, there has been no vice president in office who can assume the presidency.

Sitting presidents who die while in office may lie in repose in the East Room of the White House. Former presidents may lie in repose in their home or adopted state, usually at their presidential library, before traveling to Washington, D.C. when thereafter, lying in state in the United States Capitol Rotunda will occur. Dwight D. Eisenhower was an exception to this general rule. Following his death at Walter Reed Army Hospital in 1969, Eisenhower lay in repose in the Bethlehem Chapel at Washington National Cathedral for 28 hours, rather than at his presidential library in Abilene, Kansas.

Because of the nature of the cross campus elections for the Executive posts, it is in theory possible for any member of the Union to stand for any post, and thus in the past this was capable of creating the anomaly that the VP-S&L (Cross Campus election) could have been held by a separate person from the post of President of the Athletic Union (Internal AU election) and the VP-SCA could have been separate from Chair HUSSO. While changes to the constitution/standing orders have removed the possibility of this happening for Chair-HUSSO, it is still theoretically possible to have the posts of Vice President Scarborough held by a student who is neither a resident of the town, or undertaking a course at the campus. This happened in the elections of 2010 and 2011 when Matthew Jason Brown who graduated from Scarborough two years before, but was undertaking a course on the Hull campus was elected to the post and then reelected the subsequent year.

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.

From May 1973 to September 1974, Abdelghani Bousta lived in hiding. During this time, he realised the mistakes made when the March 1973 events were organised. In 1975, he wrote a critical analysis of UNFP on behalf of the Option Révolutionnaire (Revolutionary option) movement, harshly criticising the events and the leaders: “[…] the March 1973 events helped shed light on the internal contradictions of the Party and show the true nature of its leaders: putschist and adventurous leaders who did not see any problem in sacrificing dozens of activists in a hazardous battle.”

"The Man" was written before the Twenty-fifth Amendment to the United States Constitution. It depicts a political situation in which the office of Vice Presidency is vacant due to the incumbent's death. While overseas in Germany, the President and the Speaker of the House are in a freak accident; the President is killed, the Speaker of the House later dies in surgery. The Presidency then devolves onto Douglass Dilman, the President Pro Tempore of the Senate, a black man earlier elected to that office in deference to his race. Dilman's presidency is challenged by white racists, black political activists, and an attempted assassination. Later, he is impeached on false charges for firing the United States Secretary of State. One of his children, who is "passing" for white, is targeted and harassed. At the end of the book the protagonist - though having credibly dealt with considerable problems during his Presidency and gained some popularity - does not consider running for re-election.

On March 26, 1841, William Henry Harrison became ill with a cold. According to the prevailing medical misconception of that time, it was believed that his illness was directly caused by the bad weather at his inauguration; however, Harrison's illness did not arise until more than three weeks after the event. The cold worsened, rapidly turning to pneumonia and pleurisy. He sought to rest in the White House, but could not find a quiet room because of the steady crowd of office seekers. His extremely busy social schedule made any rest time scarce.

If the apparent winner dies between the College's December vote and its counting in Congress in January, the Twelfth Amendment stipulates that all electoral ballots cast shall be counted, presumably even those for a dead candidate. The U.S. House committee reporting on the proposed Twentieth Amendment said the "Congress would have 'no discretion' [and] 'would declare that the deceased candidate had received a majority of the votes.'"

If a Senator dies in office, it is traditional for the Senate to adjourn for a day and for U.S. flags to be flown at half-staff. A black cloth and a vase filled with white roses are placed over the deceased Senator's desk, and a large contingent of Senators often travel to the home state of the departed senator to pay their respects.
question_src: Ni nini kinatokea wakati Rais na VP wa USA wanakufa?
pos_context_src: Ikiwa Makamu wa Rais-mteule atakufa au kujiuzulu "kabla ya" mkutano wa Chuo cha Uchaguzi mnamo Desemba, Kamati ya Kitaifa ya Chama Cha Kushinda, kwa kushauriana na Rais-mteule, itachagua nafasi ya kupokea kura za uchaguzi za Makamu wa Rais aliyeteuliwa kwa njia ile ile kama ingetokea ikiwa Makamu wa Rais wa zamani angekuwa wa Rais aliyeteuliwa. Kwa kudhani nambari inayohitajika wateule walikubali kupiga kura kwa mgombeaji wa uingizwaji, mtu huyo atakuwa makamu wa rais-mteule. Ikiwa nafasi kama hiyo ingetokea "baada ya" kura za uchaguzi zilitupwa Amerika, viongozi wengi wanadumisha kuwa hakuna ubadilishaji wowote utakauchaguliwa na rais mpya (baada ya kuchukua madaraka) angemteua makamu wa rais, kwa vifungu vya marekebisho ya ishirini na tano kwa Katiba.
neg_context_title_src: Umoja wa Chuo Kikuu cha Hull
Orodha ya Marais wa Merika waliokufa ofisini
neg_context_src: Marekebisho ya ishirini na tano (1967) yanafafanua kile kinachotokea juu ya kifo, kuondolewa, au kujiuzulu kwa rais au makamu wa rais na jinsi urais unavyojazwa kwa muda ikiwa rais atakuwa mlemavu na hawezi kutimiza majukumu ya ofisi. Inazidisha sheria ya mfululizo wa kufanikiwa iliyoanzishwa. Mpango halisi wa mfululizo umehitajika mara kadhaa tangu 1789. Walakini, kwa karibu 20% ya historia ya Merika, hakujakuwa na makamu wa rais katika ofisi ambaye anaweza kudhani urais.

Kukaa marais ambao hufa wakati ofisini wanaweza kulala katika chumba cha mashariki cha Ikulu ya White. Marais wa zamani wanaweza kulala katika nyumba yao au jimbo lililopitishwa, kawaida katika maktaba yao ya rais, kabla ya kusafiri kwenda Washington, D.C. wakati baadaye, wakiwa wamelala katika jimbo la Merika Capitol Rotunda itatokea. Dwight D. Eisenhower ilikuwa ubaguzi kwa sheria hii ya jumla. Kufuatia kifo chake katika Hospitali ya Jeshi la Walter Reed mnamo 1969, Eisenhower alilala katika eneo la Bethlehem Chapel huko Washington National Cathedral kwa masaa 28, badala ya maktaba yake ya rais huko Abilene, Kansas.

Kwa sababu ya maumbile ya uchaguzi wa chuo kikuu cha machapisho ya watendaji, inawezekana kwa nadharia kwa mwanachama yeyote wa Muungano kusimama kwa chapisho lolote, na kwa hivyo huko nyuma hii ilikuwa na uwezo wa kuunda maoni kwamba VP-S & L (uchaguzi wa chuo kikuu) ungeweza kushikiliwa na mtu tofauti na wadhifa wa rais wa umoja wa riadha (uchaguzi wa ndani wa AU) na VP-Sca aliweza kutengana na mwenyekiti. Wakati mabadiliko ya Katiba/maagizo ya kusimama yameondoa uwezekano wa hii kutokea kwa mwenyekiti-HUSSO, bado inawezekana kuwa na machapisho ya Makamu wa Rais Scarborough yaliyoshikiliwa na mwanafunzi ambaye sio mkazi wa mji, au kufanya kozi hiyo. Hii ilitokea katika uchaguzi wa 2010 na 2011 wakati Matthew Jason Brown aliyehitimu kutoka Scarborough miaka miwili iliyopita, lakini alikuwa akifanya kozi kwenye chuo kikuu cha Hull alichaguliwa kwa wadhifa huo na kisha akabadilisha tena mwaka uliofuata.

Winfield Toll Bridge, pia inajulikana kama Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, ni kihistoria wa kihistoria wa Cantilever Warren Truss Bridge iliyoko Winfield na Red House, Kaunti ya Putnam, West Virginia. Ilijengwa mnamo 1955, na inachukua Mto wa Kanawha, iliyobeba West Virginia Route 34. Cantilever kupitia-truss ina nafasi mbili za nanga kila futi 245 kwa urefu na urefu wa futi 462 kwa urefu kati ya mistari ya kituo cha pier. Span kuu ina futi mbili 128, inchi 4, mikono ya cantilever na miguu 205, inchi 4, iliyosimamishwa.

Kuanzia Mei 1973 hadi Septemba 1974, Abdelghani Bousta aliishi mafichoni. Wakati huu, aligundua makosa yaliyofanywa wakati matukio ya Machi 1973 yalipangwa. Mnamo 1975, aliandika uchambuzi muhimu wa UNFP kwa niaba ya chaguo RévolutionNaire (Chaguo la Mapinduzi), akikosoa vikali matukio na viongozi: "[…] Matukio ya Machi 1973 yalisaidia kutoa mwanga juu ya utata wa ndani wa chama hicho na kuonyesha hali ya kweli ya viongozi wake: Viongozi wa Adsonates.

"Mtu" iliandikwa kabla ya Marekebisho ya ishirini na tano kwa Katiba ya Merika. Inaonyesha hali ya kisiasa ambayo Ofisi ya Makamu wa Urais ni wazi kwa sababu ya kifo cha mtu huyo. Wakati nje ya nchi nchini Ujerumani, Rais na Spika wa Nyumba hiyo wako kwenye ajali mbaya; Rais aliuawa, Spika wa Nyumba baadaye anakufa katika upasuaji. Urais basi hujitolea kwa Douglass Dilman, Rais Pro Tempore wa Seneti, mtu mweusi aliyechaguliwa mapema katika ofisi hiyo kwa heshima ya mbio zake. Urais wa Dilman unapingwa na wanaharakati weupe, wanaharakati weusi wa kisiasa, na mauaji ya kujaribu. Baadaye, anashikwa na mashtaka ya uwongo kwa kumpiga risasi Katibu wa Jimbo la Merika. Mmoja wa watoto wake, ambaye "anapita" kwa White, analengwa na kunyanyaswa. Mwisho wa kitabu hicho mhusika mkuu - ingawa alikuwa na shida ya shida wakati wa urais wake na alipata umaarufu - haifikirii kufanya uchaguzi tena.

Mnamo Machi 26, 1841, William Henry Harrison aliugua na homa. Kulingana na maoni potofu ya matibabu ya wakati huo, iliaminika kuwa ugonjwa wake ulisababishwa moja kwa moja na hali mbaya ya hewa wakati wa uzinduzi wake; Walakini, ugonjwa wa Harrison haukuibuka hadi zaidi ya wiki tatu baada ya tukio hilo. Baridi ilizidi kuwa mbaya, ikigeuka haraka kwa pneumonia na pleurisy. Alitafuta kupumzika katika Ikulu ya White, lakini hakuweza kupata chumba tulivu kwa sababu ya umati wa watu wanaotafuta ofisi. Ratiba yake ya kijamii iliyokuwa na shughuli nyingi ilifanya wakati wowote wa kupumzika.

Ikiwa mshindi anayeonekana atakufa kati ya kura ya Desemba na kuhesabu kwake katika Congress mnamo Januari, marekebisho ya kumi na mbili yanasema kwamba kura zote za uchaguzi zitahesabiwa, labda hata zile za mgombea aliyekufa. Kamati ya Nyumba ya Merika inayoripoti juu ya marekebisho ya ishirini iliyopendekezwa ilisema "Congress haitakuwa na 'busara' [na] 'itatangaza kwamba mgombea wa marehemu amepata kura nyingi."

Ikiwa seneta atakufa ofisini, ni jadi kwa Seneti kuandamana kwa siku moja na kwa bendera za Merika zirudishwe kwa wafanyikazi wa nusu. Kitambaa cheusi na chombo kilichojazwa na maua meupe huwekwa juu ya dawati la seneta wa marehemu, na maseneta kubwa mara nyingi husafiri kwenda kwa jimbo la seneta aliyeondoka kulipa heshima zao.
report_src: Iwapo Rais na Makamu wa Rais wa Marekani watakufa au kushindwa kutekeleza majukumu yao kwa wakati mmoja, sheria ya urithi wa urais (Presidential Succession Act ya 1947) inaamuru kwamba Spika wa Baraza la Wawakilishi ndiye anayefuata na huapishwa kuwa Rais; ikiwa Spika hana sifa au hayupo, nafasi inakwenda kwa Rais wa muda wa Seneti, na kisha kwa mawaziri wa Baraza la Mawaziri kuanzia Waziri wa Mambo ya Nje, kufuata mpangilio ulioainishwa kisheria. Baada ya kuapishwa, Rais huyo mpya anaweza kujaza pengo la Makamu wa Rais kwa kuteua mgombea ambaye lazima athibitishwe na wingi wa kura katika Baraza la Wawakilishi na Seneti, utaratibu unaowezeshwa na Marekebisho ya Ishirini na Tano, Kipengele cha 2, ambacho huruhusu Rais mpya kuteua Makamu wa Rais baada ya kuchukua madaraka [1].
all_claims: Iwapo Rais na Makamu wa Rais wa Marekani watakufa au kushindwa kutekeleza majukumu yao kwa wakati mmoja, sheria ya urithi wa urais (Presidential Succession Act ya 1947) inaamuru kwamba Spika wa Baraza la Wawakilishi ndiye anayefuata na huapishwa kuwa Rais; ikiwa Spika hana sifa au hayupo, nafasi inakwenda kwa Rais wa muda wa Seneti, na kisha kwa mawaziri wa Baraza la Mawaziri kuanzia Waziri wa Mambo ya Nje, kufuata mpangilio ulioainishwa kisheria.

question_en: Where was Melissa Gaboriau Auf der Maur born?
pos_context_en: Auf der Maur was born in Montreal, Quebec to journalist and politician Nick Auf der Maur and journalist and literary translator Linda Gaboriau. Auf der Maur's father's family was Swiss–German and her mother's was mixed European-American. Gaboriau was born in Boston, Massachusetts in the United States. As a result, she holds dual Canadian–American citizenship. Auf der Maur's surname translates to English as "on the wall", as "maur" was derived from the German word for "wall" ("die Mauer"). She has stated that her grandmother, Theresia Schaelin-Auf der Maur, was "always pounding my heritage down my throat—reminding me that I'm the last one in North America to further the name".
neg_context_en: Melissa Gaboriau Auf der Maur (; born March 17, 1972) is a Canadian musician, singer-songwriter, photographer and actress.

Auf der Maur did not meet her father until she was three years old. Gaboriau called Nick Auf der Maur after her daughter began questioning her about her father's identity. Reflecting on the encounter, Auf der Maur said "[my father] realised my mother Linda was the love of his life because she'd offered the gift of this child without any demands. He fell madly in love with her [and] pursued her for two years". Auf der Maur and Gaboriau married in 1978 when Melissa was six years old. The couple divorced in 1979 after which Auf der Maur traveled worldwide with her mother. A portion of Auf der Maur's childhood was spent living in "a circus caravan in Wales, a red post-office box truck in Morocco, and a hut in Kenya" with her mother. During her time in Kenya, she contracted three bouts of malaria and returned to Montreal.

In Montreal, Auf der Maur attended the Fine Arts Core Education (FACE) School and Moving in New Directions (MIND) High School—both of which are schools of alternative education. At FACE, she was a member of the classical choir and at MIND, she was "part of the small English elite", where she formed friendships with Leonard Cohens daughter Lorca and Rufus Wainwright. At school, she became interested in photography and subsequently attended Concordia University, from which she majored in photography in 1994. At Concordia at age 19, Auf der Maur began working part-time as a disc jockey at Bifteck, a well known rock club, where she met several musicians including Steve Durand.

Nick Auf der Maur (April 10, 1942 – April 7, 1998) was a journalist, politician and "man about town" boulevardier in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. He was also the father of rock musician Melissa Auf der Maur, through his marriage to Linda Gaboriau.

In 2002, Auf der Maur formed a brief project with former Hole drummer Samantha Maloney, Peaches, Paz Lenchantin and Radio Sloan. Adopting the title The Chelsea—named after the Chelsea Hotel in New York where Auf der Maur had lived for a number of years—the band performed one show at Spaceland in Los Angeles, California in February that included original songs and cover versions. Featuring a cover version of Devos "Gates of Steel" and early renditions of songs Auf der Maur would feature on her debut studio album, the show was poorly received due to its "seeming lack of preparation" and "was little more than pleasantly mopey and blurry garage rock" according to a Variety review. Courtney Love subsequently named her backing band The Chelsea, also hiring Maloney and Sloan in the process, while touring for her debut studio album, "America's Sweetheart" (2004).

Hole reunited again—with the "Celebrity Skin" line-up of Love, Erlandson, Auf der Maur and Schemel—for a one-off performance at Public Assembly in Brooklyn, New York on April 12, 2012 at an after-party for Schemel's film "Hit So Hard" (2011). Originally Auf der Maur, Erlandson and Schemel were performing as a trio until Love arrived for a spontaneous performance of "Miss World" and "Over the Edge". "The Quietus" reported in April 2014 that the four members had reunited although in subsequent interviews, Love downplayed talk of an imminent reunion. In April 2016, Auf der Maur stated in an interview that she no longer had time or energy for a full-fledged reunion, but would be interested in wrapping up the Hole legacy with a retrospective disc and small set of tour dates.

Recorded from 2001 to 2003  at various studios in the U.S. and Canada, Auf der Maur's debut studio album "Auf der Maur" was released in February 2004 on Capitol Records. Produced with Chris Goss, Auf der Maur financed the recording sessions herself as she was not signed to a record label at the time of recording and during post-production, her budget ran out and she was unable to mix the album. She accepted a recording contract from Capitol soon afterwards and released "Auf der Maur" to "generally favorable reviews", according to Metacritic. The album's supporting singles—"Followed the Waves", "Real a Lie" and "Taste You"—were moderate successes in the United Kingdom, charting in the Top 40 of the UK Single Charts. As of 2010, "Auf der Maur" sold 200,000 copies worldwide.

Gaboriau was previously married to Montreal city councillor Nick Auf der Maur, and is the mother of rock musician Melissa Auf der Maur. She and her late partner of 35 years, author and professor Hervé de Fontenay, have one son, architect Yves de Fontenay.

Auf der Maur began performing in 1993 after forming the indie rock band Tinker while she was a student at Concordia University. She was recruited as the bassist for the American alternative rock band Hole in the summer of 1994 and is included on several Hole releases, including the album "Celebrity Skin" (1998). Following her departure from Hole in 1999, Auf der Maur briefly joined The Smashing Pumpkins as a touring member for its 2000 tour and began her solo career; her debut studio album, "Auf der Maur", was released in 2004 on Capitol Records and her second studio album, "Out of Our Minds", was released in 2010 on her own independent record label, PHI–MAdM Music. She has also collaborated with Indochine, Rufus Wainwright, Ric Ocasek and Neverending White Lights.
question_src: Melissa Gaboriau auf der Maur alikuwa wapi?
pos_context_src: Auf der Maur alizaliwa huko Montreal, Quebec kwa mwandishi wa habari na mwanasiasa Nick Auf der Maur na mwandishi wa habari na mtafsiri wa fasihi Linda Gaboriau. Familia ya baba ya baba ya AUF Der Maur ilikuwa Uswizi-Ujerumani na mama yake walichanganywa Ulaya-Amerika. Gaboriau alizaliwa huko Boston, Massachusetts huko Merika. Kama matokeo, anashikilia uraia wa Canada na Amerika. Jina la Auf der Maur linatafsiri kwa Kiingereza kama "kwenye ukuta", kama "Maur" ilitokana na neno la Kijerumani la "Wall" ("Die Mauer"). Amesema kwamba bibi yake, Theresia Schaelin-auf der Maur, alikuwa "kila wakati akipiga urithi wangu chini ya koo langu-akiniambia kuwa mimi ndiye wa mwisho katika Amerika ya Kaskazini kuendeleza jina".
neg_context_src: Melissa Gaboriau auf der Maur (; amezaliwa Machi 17, 1972) ni mwanamuziki wa Canada, mwandishi wa wimbo, mpiga picha na mwigizaji.

Auf der Maur hakukutana na baba yake hadi alikuwa na miaka mitatu. Gaboriau alimwita Nick Auf der Maur baada ya binti yake kuanza kumuuliza juu ya kitambulisho cha baba yake. Akifikiria juu ya mkutano huo, Auf der Maur alisema "[baba yangu] aligundua mama yangu Linda alikuwa upendo wa maisha yake kwa sababu alitoa zawadi ya mtoto huyu bila madai yoyote. Alimpenda sana [na] akamfuata kwa miaka miwili". Auf der Maur na Gaboriau walioa mnamo 1978 wakati Melissa alikuwa na miaka sita. Wenzi hao waliachana mnamo 1979 baada ya hapo Auf der Maur alisafiri ulimwenguni na mama yake. Sehemu ya utoto wa Auf der Maur ilitumiwa kuishi katika "Msafara wa Circus huko Wales, lori nyekundu ya sanduku la ofisi huko Moroko, na kibanda huko Kenya" na mama yake. Wakati wa wakati wake nchini Kenya, alipata mikataba mitatu ya ugonjwa wa malaria na akarudi Montreal.

Huko Montreal, Auf der Maur alihudhuria shule ya Sanaa ya Sanaa ya Sanaa (uso) na kusonga mbele kwa mwelekeo mpya (akili) shule ya upili - ambayo ni shule za elimu mbadala. Huko usoni, alikuwa mwanachama wa kwaya ya zamani na akilini, alikuwa "sehemu ya wasomi wa Kiingereza", ambapo aliunda urafiki na binti wa Leonard Cohens Lorca na Rufus Wainwright. Huko shuleni, alipendezwa na upigaji picha na baadaye alienda Chuo Kikuu cha Concordia, ambayo alijitahidi katika upigaji picha mnamo 1994. Huko Concordia akiwa na umri wa miaka 19, Auf der Maur alianza kufanya kazi kwa muda kama jockey huko Bifteck, kilabu cha mwamba kinachojulikana, ambapo alikutana na wanamuziki kadhaa akiwemo Steve Durand.

Nick Auf der Maur (Aprili 10, 1942 - Aprili 7, 1998) alikuwa mwandishi wa habari, mwanasiasa na "mtu kuhusu mji" Boulevardier huko Montreal, Quebec, Canada. Alikuwa pia baba wa mwanamuziki wa mwamba Melissa auf der Maur, kupitia ndoa yake na Linda Gaboriau.

Mnamo 2002, Auf der Maur aliunda mradi mfupi na wa zamani wa Drummer wa Hole Samantha Maloney, Peaches, Paz Lenchantin na Radio Sloan. Kupitisha kichwa cha Chelsea - kilichoitwa baada ya Hoteli ya Chelsea huko New York ambapo Auf der Maur alikuwa akiishi kwa miaka kadhaa - bendi hiyo ilifanya onyesho moja huko Spaceland huko Los Angeles, California mnamo Februari ambayo ni pamoja na nyimbo za asili na matoleo ya jalada. Akishirikiana na toleo la jalada la Devos "Gates of Steel" na tafsiri za mapema za nyimbo ambazo auf der Maur zingeonekana kwenye albamu yake ya kwanza ya studio, onyesho hilo halikupokelewa vibaya kwa sababu ya "Kuonekana Kukosekana kwa Matayarisho" na "ilikuwa zaidi ya mwamba wa kupendeza na mwamba wa karakana" kulingana na ukaguzi wa anuwai. Courtney Love baadaye aliipa jina lake la kuunga mkono The Chelsea, pia kuajiri Maloney na Sloan katika mchakato huo, wakati akitembelea albamu yake ya kwanza ya studio, "Sweetheart ya Amerika" (2004).

Hole aliungana tena-na "Ngozi ya Mtu Mashuhuri" ya Upendo, Erlandson, Auf der Maur na Schemel-kwa utendaji wa moja kwenye Bunge la Umma huko Brooklyn, New York mnamo Aprili 12, 2012 katika sherehe ya filamu ya schemel "Hit So Hard" (2011). Hapo awali AUF der Maur, Erlandson na Schemel walikuwa wakifanya kama watatu hadi upendo ulipofika kwa utendaji wa hiari wa "Miss World" na "juu ya makali". "The Quietus" iliripoti mnamo Aprili 2014 kwamba washiriki hao wanne walikuwa wameungana tena ingawa katika mahojiano ya baadaye, Upendo walipenda mazungumzo ya kuungana tena. Mnamo Aprili 2016, Auf der Maur alisema katika mahojiano kuwa hakuwa na wakati au nguvu ya kuungana tena, lakini angevutiwa na kufunga urithi wa shimo na diski ya kupatikana na tarehe ndogo za tarehe za utalii.

Iliyorekodiwa kutoka 2001 hadi 2003 katika studio mbali mbali huko Merika na Canada, albamu ya kwanza ya studio ya kwanza ya Auf der Maur "Auf der Maur" ilitolewa mnamo Februari 2004 kwenye Capitol Record. Iliyotengenezwa na Chris Goss, Auf der Maur alifadhili vikao vya kurekodi mwenyewe kwani hakusainiwa kwa lebo ya rekodi wakati wa kurekodi na wakati wa utengenezaji, bajeti yake ilimalizika na hakuweza kuchanganya albamu hiyo. Alikubali mkataba wa kurekodi kutoka Capitol mara baadaye na akaachilia "Auf der Maur" kwa "hakiki nzuri", kulingana na Metacritic. Albamu inayounga mkono - "ilifuata mawimbi", "Uongo halisi" na "Onjeni" - mafanikio ya wastani huko Uingereza, kuorodhesha katika chati 40 za juu za Uingereza. Mnamo mwaka wa 2010, "Auf der Maur" aliuza nakala 200,000 ulimwenguni.

Gaboriau hapo awali alikuwa ameolewa na diwani wa jiji la Montreal Nick Auf der Maur, na ndiye mama wa mwanamuziki wa mwamba Melissa auf der Maur. Yeye na mwenzi wake wa marehemu wa miaka 35, mwandishi na Profesa Hervé de Fontenay, wana mtoto mmoja, mbunifu Yves de Fontenay.

Auf der Maur alianza kufanya mazoezi mnamo 1993 baada ya kuunda bendi ya mwamba wa indie wakati alikuwa mwanafunzi katika Chuo Kikuu cha Concordia. Aliajiriwa kama bassist wa bendi mbadala ya mwamba wa Amerika katika msimu wa joto wa 1994 na amejumuishwa kwenye matoleo kadhaa ya shimo, pamoja na albamu "Mashuhuri Ngozi" (1998). Kufuatia kuondoka kwake kutoka Hole mnamo 1999, Auf der Maur alijiunga kwa kifupi Maboga ya Smashing kama mshiriki wa utalii kwa safari yake ya 2000 na kuanza kazi yake ya pekee; Albamu yake ya kwanza ya studio, "Auf der Maur", ilitolewa mnamo 2004 kwenye Capitol Records na albamu yake ya pili ya studio, "Kati ya Akili zetu", ilitolewa mnamo 2010 kwenye lebo yake ya rekodi huru, Phi -MADM Music. Ameshirikiana pia na Indochine, Rufus Wainwright, Ric Ocasek na taa nyeupe za kushinikiza.
report_src: Melissa Gaboriau Auf der Maur alizaliwa mjini Montreal, mkoa wa Quebec nchini Kanada [1].
