question_en: What is the life expectancy of a horse?
pos_context_en: Depending on breed, management and environment, the modern domestic horse has a life expectancy of 25 to 30 years. Uncommonly, a few animals live into their 40s and, occasionally, beyond. The oldest verifiable record was "Old Billy", a 19th-century horse that lived to the age of 62. In modern times, Sugar Puff, who had been listed in "Guinness World Records" as the world's oldest living pony, died in 2007 at age 56.
neg_context_title_en: Field artillery in the American Civil War
British Army during the Victorian Era
neg_context_en: The number of horses killed in the war was at the time unprecedented in modern warfare. For example, in the Relief of Kimberley, French's cavalry rode 500 horses to their deaths in a single day. The wastage was particularly heavy among British forces for several reasons: overloading of horses with unnecessary equipment and saddlery, failure to rest and acclimatise horses after long sea voyages and, later in the war, poor management by inexperienced mounted troops and distant control by unsympathetic staffs. The average life expectancy of a British horse, from the time of its arrival in Port Elizabeth, was around six weeks.
It is unknown as to why Prospect Point lived as long as he did. The average life expectancy for a Thoroughbred is between the ages of 25-28.

Horses were required to pull the enormous weight of the cannon and ammunition; on average, each horse pulled about 700 pounds (317.5 kg). Each gun in a battery used two six-horse teams (for normal field artillery; heavier guns required much larger teams): one team pulled a limber that attached to the trail of the gun to form a four-wheeled wagon of sorts; the other pulled a limber that attached to a caisson. The large number of horses posed a logistical challenge for the artillery, because they had to be fed, maintained, and replaced when worn out or injured. Artillery horses were generally selected second from the pool of high quality animals; cavalry mounts were the best horses. The life expectancy of an artillery horse was under eight months. They suffered from disease, exhaustion from long marches—typically 16 miles (25.8 km) in 10 hours—and battle injuries.

Each wooden carousel horse that is attached to the operational carousel required several hours of restoration labor. Upon arrival to the museum, many of these artifacts dated close to 100 years old, and had an original life expectancy of around five years. Due to wood rot, many of the horses had to be completely re-carved by hand. The process of re-carving utilized the same primitive tools that would have been used in the original making. It is estimated that thousands of hours of labor were volunteered to complete the projects. To keep with historical building styles, each horse contains wooden dowels instead of nails (Reinhardt,2014).

The cavalry, obsessed with the charge with cold steel, had "ceased to be in any useful sense mobile". They used heavy chargers as mounts rather than lighter horses. The heavy mounts required acclimatisation and recovery after long sea voyages, and needed plenty of forage when grazing was sparse. They were also overloaded with unnecessary or over-decorated equipment and saddlery. The average life expectancy of a British horse from the time of its arrival in South Africa was around six weeks.

Life expectancy usually varies within a range. For example, a Beagle (average life expectancy 13.3 years) usually lives to around 12–15 years, and a Scottish Terrier (average life expectancy 12 years) usually lives to around 10–16 years.

Depending on maturity, breed, and work expected, horses are usually put under saddle and trained to be ridden between the ages of two and four. Although Thoroughbred race horses are put on the track as young as the age of two in some countries, horses specifically bred for sports such as dressage are generally not put under saddle until they are three or four years old, because their bones and muscles are not solidly developed. For endurance riding competition, horses are not deemed mature enough to compete until they are a full 60 calendar months (five years) old.

Writing for Allmusic, critic William Ruhlman wrote that "Singer/songwriter Jeffrey Foucault likes to play in a familiar, slow-moving country-folk style; this is a guy who has been to the desert on "A Horse with No Name," searching for a "Heart of Gold." The lyrical reflections he expresses so introspectively also tend to be spare and allusive... For the most part, however, Foucault is a miniaturist as interested in evoking mood as meaning in his atmospheric music, expecting his listeners to fill in the blanks." David Kleiner of Minor 7th wrote "Writers should check out Foucault's similes, here ("singing / darker than the sea") and throughout ("smoking like a river / in the dark before the dawn"), as the comparison is always unexpected and richer for it... What you remember is, "When I had one good coat, I was warm." You disappear. Only Foucault's songs remain, as haunting as they are haunted."

He explained the album title, saying: "If you listen to it, and look at some of the old cats who’ve used the title before, one of The Beatles [George Harrison] was actually called “the dark horse” before, because you didn’t know how much of his musical involvement had a hand in what Beatles material came out. The dark horse meaning, like, the least expected person to win the race, or the least expected person to win the Super Bowl. I look at the dark horse as the person that you don’t always expect to see coming out on top. I consider myself a dark horse in the industry."
question_src: Je! Matarajio ya maisha ya farasi ni nini?
pos_context_src: Kulingana na kuzaliana, usimamizi na mazingira, farasi wa kisasa wa ndani ana matarajio ya maisha ya miaka 25 hadi 30. Kwa kawaida, wanyama wachache huishi katika miaka yao 40 na, mara kwa mara, zaidi. Rekodi ya kongwe iliyothibitishwa ilikuwa "Old Billy", farasi wa karne ya 19 ambaye aliishi hadi umri wa miaka 62. Katika nyakati za kisasa, Sugar Puff, ambaye alikuwa ameorodheshwa katika "Guinness World Record" kama Pony wa kongwe zaidi ulimwenguni, alikufa mnamo 2007 akiwa na umri wa miaka 56.
neg_context_title_src: Artillery ya shamba katika Vita vya wenyewe kwa wenyewe vya Amerika
Jeshi la Uingereza wakati wa Victoria
neg_context_src: Idadi ya farasi waliouawa katika vita wakati huo haijawahi kutokea katika vita vya kisasa. Kwa mfano, katika unafuu wa Kimberley, wapanda farasi wa Ufaransa walipanda farasi 500 kwa vifo vyao kwa siku moja. Upotezaji huo ulikuwa mzito sana kati ya vikosi vya Uingereza kwa sababu kadhaa: upakiaji wa farasi na vifaa visivyo vya lazima na saddlery, kushindwa kupumzika na kusambaza farasi baada ya safari ndefu za baharini na, baadaye vitani, usimamizi duni na askari wasio na uzoefu na udhibiti wa mbali na wafanyikazi wasio na huruma. Matarajio ya wastani ya maisha ya farasi wa Uingereza, tangu wakati wa kuwasili kwake Port Elizabeth, ilikuwa karibu wiki sita.
Haijulikani kwa nini Matarajio Point aliishi kwa muda mrefu kama alivyofanya. Matarajio ya wastani ya maisha kwa Thoroughbred ni kati ya umri wa 25-28.

Farasi walihitajika kuvuta uzito mkubwa wa kanuni na risasi; Kwa wastani, kila farasi alivuta karibu pauni 700 (kilo 317.5). Kila bunduki kwenye betri ilitumia timu mbili za farasi sita (kwa sanaa ya kawaida ya uwanja; bunduki nzito zilihitaji timu kubwa zaidi): Timu moja ilichora limber ambayo ilishikamana na njia ya bunduki kuunda gari lenye magurudumu manne; Nyingine ikavuta limber ambayo ilishikamana na caisson. Idadi kubwa ya farasi ilileta changamoto ya vifaa kwa sanaa hiyo, kwa sababu ilibidi kulishwa, kutunzwa, na kubadilishwa wakati imechoka au kujeruhiwa. Farasi wa sanaa kwa ujumla walichaguliwa pili kutoka kwa dimbwi la wanyama wa hali ya juu; Milima ya wapanda farasi walikuwa farasi bora. Matarajio ya maisha ya farasi wa sanaa yalikuwa chini ya miezi nane. Waliteseka na magonjwa, uchovu kutoka maandamano marefu - kawaida maili 16 (km 25) katika masaa 10 - na majeraha ya vita.

Kila farasi wa carousel ya mbao ambayo imeunganishwa na gari inayofanya kazi inahitajika masaa kadhaa ya kazi ya kurejesha. Baada ya kufika kwenye jumba la kumbukumbu, mengi ya mabaki haya yaliyokuwa karibu na miaka 100, na yalikuwa na umri wa miaka ya karibu miaka mitano. Kwa sababu ya kuoza kwa kuni, farasi wengi walipaswa kubuniwa tena kwa mkono. Mchakato wa kuchonga tena ulitumia zana zile zile za zamani ambazo zingetumika katika utengenezaji wa asili. Inakadiriwa kuwa maelfu ya masaa ya wafanyikazi walijitolea kukamilisha miradi hiyo. Ili kuweka mitindo ya kihistoria ya ujenzi, kila farasi ina dowels za mbao badala ya kucha (Reinhardt, 2014).

Cavalry, iliyozingatiwa na malipo na chuma baridi, ilikuwa "imekoma kuwa katika hali yoyote muhimu ya rununu". Walitumia chaja nzito kama milipuko badala ya farasi nyepesi. Milima nzito ilihitaji kuongezeka na kupona baada ya safari ndefu za bahari, na ilihitaji malisho mengi wakati malisho yalikuwa kidogo. Pia zilikuwa zimejaa vifaa visivyo vya lazima au vilivyopambwa zaidi na saddlery. Matarajio ya wastani ya maisha ya farasi wa Uingereza tangu wakati wa kuwasili kwake Afrika Kusini yalikuwa karibu wiki sita.

Matarajio ya maisha kawaida hutofautiana ndani ya anuwai. Kwa mfano, beagle (wastani wa kuishi miaka 13.3) kawaida huishi hadi miaka 12 hadi 15, na Terrier ya Scottish (wastani wa kuishi miaka 12) kawaida huishi hadi miaka 10-16.

Kulingana na ukomavu, kuzaliana, na kazi inayotarajiwa, farasi kawaida huwekwa chini ya saruji na kufunzwa ili kupangwa kati ya miaka miwili na minne. Ijapokuwa farasi wa mbio zilizowekwa wazi huwekwa kwenye wimbo wa vijana kama umri wa miaka miwili katika nchi zingine, farasi zilizowekwa mahsusi kwa michezo kama vile dressage kwa ujumla hazijawekwa chini ya saruji hadi wawe na umri wa miaka mitatu au minne, kwa sababu mifupa na misuli yao haijaendelezwa. Kwa ushindani wa wanaoendesha uvumilivu, farasi hazijachukuliwa kukomaa vya kutosha kushindana hadi wawe na miezi 60 kamili (miaka mitano).

Kuandika kwa AllMusic, mkosoaji William Ruhlman aliandika kwamba "mwimbaji/mtunzi wa nyimbo Jeffrey Foucault anapenda kucheza kwa mtindo wa kawaida wa watu wa nchi; huyu ni mtu ambaye amekuwa jangwani juu ya" farasi asiye na jina, "akitafuta" moyo wote. Kama nia ya kuamsha hisia kama maana katika muziki wa anga, akitarajia wasikilizaji wake kujaza nafasi zilizo wazi. " David Kleiner wa Mdogo wa 7 aliandika "Waandishi wanapaswa kuangalia picha za Foucault, hapa (" Kuimba / Nyeusi kuliko Bahari ") na kwa wakati wote (" kuvuta sigara kama mto / gizani kabla ya alfajiri "), kama kulinganisha kila wakati kunaweza kutarajiwa na tajiri kwa ajili yake ... kile unakumbuka ni," Wakati nilikuwa na kanzu moja nzuri, sivyo ya kutarajiwa. "

Alifafanua kichwa cha albamu, akisema: "Ukisikiliza, na uangalie paka zingine za zamani ambazo zilitumia kichwa hapo awali, mmoja wa The Beatles [George Harrison] aliitwa" Farasi wa giza "hapo awali, kwa sababu haukujua ni kiasi gani cha ushiriki wake wa muziki kuwa na mtu aliyekuwa akimshinda mtu huyo wa Bools. Tarajia kuona ikitoka juu.
report_src: Kwa kawaida, farasi wa kisasa wanaotarajiwa kutunzwa vizuri huishi kati ya miaka 25 na 30, ingawa wapo wachache wanaoweza kufikia miaka 40 au zaidi [1]; rekodi za kihistoria zinaonyesha “Old Billy” aliishi hadi miaka 62, wakati katika nyakati za kisasa poni aitwaye Sugar Puff alifikia miaka 56 kabla ya kufariki mwaka 2007, kuthibitisha kwamba, ingawa si jambo la kawaida, baadhi ya farasi wanaweza kuvuka kikomo cha kawaida cha miongo mitatu ya maisha [1].

question_en: How did King Arthur die?
pos_context_title_en: King Arthur and His Knights of the Round Table
pos_context_en: After the Grail is found, the last battle of the Knights of the Round Table is fought. In this battle many knights die, and with them King Arthur, Sir Gawain, who is Arthur's nephew, and Mordred, the wicked son of King Arthur, and his half-sister Morgana le Fay. King Arthur is taken away to Avalon, a secret island after he is terribly wounded by Mordred while he was making the final stab with his sword to kill Mordred.
neg_context_title_en: King Arthur: Legend of the Sword
neg_context_en: There are evident parallels between these stories and those which surround other medieval characters like Barbarossa or King Arthur. It is said that Barbarossa did not die, but retired to a cave in the Kyffhäuser mountain, and that one day, when the ravens no long fly around the mountain, he will awake and restore Germany to its ancient greatness. King Arthur, according to many traditions, lives in many hills and caves of the island of Great Britain. His most famous dwelling is the Eildon Hill in Scotland, where he took refuge after the battle of Camlann.

Geoffrey Ashe points out that Arthur is said by Geoffrey of Monmouth to have crossed into Gaul twice, once to help a Roman emperor and once to subdue a civil war. Riothamus did both, assuming that he was a king in Britain as well as Armorica. Arthur is also said to have been betrayed by one of his advisers, and Riothamus was betrayed by one of his supposed allies. Finally, it is well known how King Arthur was carried off to Avalon (called "insula Auallonis" by Geoffrey of Monmouth, the first author to mention the legendary isle) before he died; Riothamus, after his defeat at Déols, was last known to have fled to the kingdom of the Germanic Burgundians, perhaps passing through a town called Avallon (though no ancient source on Riothamus mentions him being anywhere in the area of Avallon).

The red-billed chough has a long association with Cornwall, and appears on the Cornish coat of arms. According to Cornish legend King Arthur did not die after his last battle but rather his soul migrated into the body of a red-billed chough, the red colour of its bill and legs being derived from the blood of the last battle and hence killing this bird was unlucky. Legend also holds that after the last Cornish chough departs from Cornwall, then the return of the chough, as happened in 2001, will mark the return of King Arthur.

The French poet Chrétien de Troyes created a version of a naive, victimised King Arthur who is cuckolded by his allegedly best friend Lancelot and left by his knights who rather seek for the Holy Grail than to stand by his side while Mordred is about to become Arthur's nemesis. Films like First Knight that pick up these motifs, depict Arthur as a King whose Britons fail him and who lives in a gigantic castle which must have required such a great deal of drudgery that it is hard to believe in his legendary popularity. Finally he dies tragically. In "Arthur of the Britons" the protagonist does not die, nor does he have to escape to Avalon or Brittany in France. In the penultimate episode, which probably should have been the second-season finale, under threat of attack by the Scots, Arthur comes close to securing a treaty between himself, Cerdig and Yorath the Jute, but a carelessly placed target board results in a death, and old hostilities quickly re-surface. Arthur and his men return home, disappointed, but still hopeful that one day, there will be a lasting peace.
In 1975, the series was edited into a 90-minute direct-to-video movie, "King Arthur, the Young Warlord". The complete series was released on DVD in 2008, by Network DVD. While the movie is available in the US and the UK, the series is only available in the UK.

Ashamed of his failures, Arthur tries to throw away the sword, but the Lady of the Lake returns it and shows him a vision of England's future under Vortigern's rule. Coming to terms with his responsibility, Arthur reunites with Bedivere. When they return to the rebel hideout, however, they discover all of their allies dead, Vortigern having found them and delivered an ultimatum: if Arthur does not surrender himself, the captured mage will die. Arthur surrenders himself, but as Vortigern is about to execute his nephew, a giant snake summoned by the mage attacks and devours Vortigern's men. While Bedivere and the others lead an attack on the castle, a desperate Vortigern sacrifices his only daughter and is transformed into the demon knight, confronting Arthur in a separate dimension. Despite his fighting skill, Arthur is beaten, and he is about to submit when he witnesses a vision of his father, convincing him to accept the sword and his character as his own. Arthur violently slays Vortigern but blesses him as he dies.

The possibility of Arthur's return is first mentioned by William of Malmesbury in 1125: "But Arthur’s grave is nowhere seen, whence antiquity of fables still claims that he will return." In the "Miracles of St. Mary of Laon" ("De Miraculis Sanctae Mariae Laudensis"), written by a French cleric and chronicler named Hériman of Tournai in c. 1145, but referring to events that occurred in 1113, mention is made of the Breton and Cornish belief that Arthur still lived. As Constance Bullock-Davies demonstrated, various non-Welsh sources indicate that this belief in Arthur's eventual messianic return was extremely widespread amongst the Britons from the 12th century onwards. How much earlier than this it existed is still debated – it was often linked to the expulsion of the English and Normans from Britain. This did, in fact, remain a powerful aspect of the Arthurian legend through the medieval period and beyond. So John Lydgate in his "Fall of Princes" (1431–8) notes the belief that Arthur "shall resorte as lord and sovereyne Out of fayrye and regne in Breteyne" and Philip II of Spain apparently swore, at the time of his marriage to Mary I of England in 1554, that he would resign the kingdom if Arthur should return.

Arthur's mole is removed and is told that the melanoma has been dealt with. The following month Arthur coughs blood and asks Dom to examine him. Dom orders a CT scan which reveals that he has secondary tumours on his lungs. Arthur tells Morven about his condition and accepts he must endure a tough course of chemotherapy. After undergoing chemotherapy Arthur is hopeful that his illness will be cured. He and Morven decide to get married the same day to celebrate his optimism. But Arthur is told by Sacha that his cancer has spread to his stomach and is terminal. Ostlere said Arthur was scared and turned to Sacha for "peace of mind" but did not expect to be told that he will die. Arthur is left in a "state of denial, anger and fear". He and Morven agree to cancel their wedding until Arthur has "a moment of clarity" and realises he wants to marry Morven more than anything else. The two go on and marry in a ceremony at the hospital surrounded by friends. The actor explained that "the wedding is about two people doing what they can to carry on and have an amazing day with all their family and friends. It's the best day of Arthur's life... but also the worst."

Arthur is now King and hard at work establishing Camelot as the center of government and authority. A few ambitious lords from other parts of Britain have designs on Arthur's throne, and Merlin is kept busy preventing them from doing so. Having unwisely taken Morgause (his half-sister) to his bed as a very young man after his first battle and victory, Arthur is now the father of Mordred. Merlin foresees that Mordred will be the cause of Arthur's death, but doesn't understand how it will happen. He spends a great deal of time traveling in disguise and observing Morgause's scheming and intrigue.

Arthur Pendragon is the son of King Uther and Igraine. The wizard Merlin had Arthur brought up by the knight Sir Ector and his son Kay. When Uther died from an illness without being able to see his son, Merlin held a contest in London where whoever pulls Excalibur from the stone will become the new king. When Arthur found the sword in the stone while going to retrieve a recently knighted Kay's sword, he showed it to Kay where Sir Ector alerted those partaking in the contest of it in order to see if Arthur was the one who pulled it from the stone. When everyone else failed and Arthur pulled the sword from the stone, Arthur was automatically made the next king and reunited with his mother. In his difficult beginnings as the ruler of Camelot, King Arthur had to unite the kings of Britain in order to fight off the Saxons. He even gained Merlin as his mythical advisor and protector. After he unknowingly seduced Morgause, he had a vision that his unborn son would rise up and destroy him. This ended up resulting in the birth of Mordred as Merlin worked to prepare King Arthur for the day this prophecy happens. Following a fight with the Romans, King Arthur's half-sister Morgan le Fay became one of the fiercest foes of King Arthur, Merlin, and all of Camelot. When it came to the Battle of Camlann, King Arthur and Mordred faced each other where both of them became badly wounded. In his dying breath, King Arthur instructed Sir Bedivere throw Excalibur into Lake Benoye. At first he was reluctant, Sir Bedivere threw it toward the lake where it was caught by the hand of the Lady of the Lake. After a night has passed, nine women dressed as queens came and loaded King Arthur's body onto a barge and rowed it across the lake as Merlin showed them the way into Avalon.
question_src: Mfalme Arthur alikufaje?
pos_context_title_src: Mfalme Arthur na visu vyake vya meza ya pande zote
pos_context_src: Baada ya Grail kupatikana, vita ya mwisho ya Knights ya meza ya pande zote inapigwa. Katika vita hii Knights wengi hufa, na pamoja nao Mfalme Arthur, Sir Gawain, ambaye ni mpwa wa Arthur, na Mordred, mwana mwovu wa Mfalme Arthur, na dada yake wa nusu Morgana Le Fay. Mfalme Arthur anachukuliwa kwenda Avalon, kisiwa cha siri baada ya kujeruhiwa sana na Mordred wakati alikuwa akifanya kazi ya mwisho na upanga wake kumuua Mordred.
neg_context_src: Kuna kufanana dhahiri kati ya hadithi hizi na zile zinazozunguka wahusika wengine wa mzee kama Barbarossa au King Arthur. Inasemekana kwamba Barbarossa hakufa, lakini alistaafu kwenye pango katika mlima wa Kyffhäuser, na kwamba siku moja, wakati Ravens hakuna muda mrefu kuzunguka mlima, ataamka na kurejesha Ujerumani kwa ukuu wake wa zamani. Mfalme Arthur, kulingana na mila nyingi, anaishi katika vilima vingi na mapango ya kisiwa cha Great Britain. Makao yake maarufu ni Eildon Hill huko Scotland, ambapo alikimbilia baada ya Vita vya Camlann.

Geoffrey Ashe anasema kwamba Arthur anasemekana na Geoffrey wa Monmouth kuwa amevuka kwenda Gaul mara mbili, mara moja kusaidia Mfalme wa Kirumi na mara moja kushinda vita vya wenyewe kwa wenyewe. Riothamus alifanya wote wawili, akidhani kwamba alikuwa mfalme huko Uingereza na Armorica. Arthur pia anasemekana alisalitiwa na mmoja wa washauri wake, na Riothamus alisalitiwa na mmoja wa washirika wake. Mwishowe, inajulikana jinsi Mfalme Arthur alichukuliwa kwenda Avalon (inayoitwa "insula auallonis" na Geoffrey wa Monmouth, mwandishi wa kwanza kutaja kisiwa cha hadithi) kabla ya kufa; Riothamus, baada ya kushindwa kwake huko Déols, alijulikana mara ya mwisho kukimbilia Ufalme wa Waburgundian wa Kijerumani, labda akipitia mji uitwao Avallon (ingawa hakuna chanzo cha zamani juu ya Riothamus kinachomtaja kuwa mahali popote katika eneo la Avallon).

Chombo kilicho na rangi nyekundu kina ushirika mrefu na Cornwall, na huonekana kwenye kanzu ya mikono ya Cornish. Kulingana na hadithi ya Cornish Mfalme Arthur hakufa baada ya vita yake ya mwisho lakini badala yake roho yake ilihamia ndani ya mwili wa choma iliyotiwa nyekundu, rangi nyekundu ya muswada wake na miguu ikitokana na damu ya vita vya mwisho na kwa hivyo kuua ndege hii haikuwa mbaya. Legend pia inashikilia kwamba baada ya chama cha mwisho cha Cornish kuondoka kutoka Cornwall, kisha kurudi kwa choma, kama ilivyotokea mnamo 2001, kutaashiria kurudi kwa Mfalme Arthur.

Mshairi wa Ufaransa Chrétien de Troyes aliunda toleo la Mfalme Arthur asiye na akili, aliyeathiriwa na rafiki yake anayedaiwa kuwa rafiki bora Lancelot na kushoto na Knights wake ambaye badala yake anatafuta Grail Takatifu kuliko kusimama kando yake wakati Mordred yuko karibu kuwa Arthur's Nemesis. Filamu kama Kwanza Knight ambazo huchukua motifs hizi, zinaonyesha Arthur kama mfalme ambaye Britons hushindwa naye na ambaye anaishi katika jumba kubwa ambalo lazima lilihitaji shida kubwa kwamba ni ngumu kuamini katika umaarufu wake wa hadithi. Mwishowe anakufa kwa huzuni. Katika "Arthur wa Britons" mhusika mkuu hafe, na haifai kutoroka kwenda Avalon au Brittany huko Ufaransa. Katika sehemu ya penultimate, ambayo labda inapaswa kuwa fainali ya msimu wa pili, chini ya tishio la kushambuliwa na Scots, Arthur anakaribia kupata makubaliano kati yake, Cerdig na Yorath jute, lakini bodi iliyowekwa kwa uangalifu husababisha kifo, na uhasama wa zamani haraka. Arthur na wanaume wake wanarudi nyumbani, walikatishwa tamaa, lakini bado wana matumaini kuwa siku moja, kutakuwa na amani ya kudumu.
Mnamo 1975, mfululizo huo ulihaririwa kuwa sinema ya dakika 90 ya moja kwa moja, "King Arthur, The Young Warlord". Mfululizo kamili ulitolewa kwenye DVD mnamo 2008, na DVD ya Mtandao. Wakati sinema inapatikana Amerika na Uingereza, safu hiyo inapatikana tu nchini Uingereza.

Akiwa na aibu juu ya mapungufu yake, Arthur anajaribu kutupa upanga, lakini yule mwanamke wa ziwa anairudisha na kumuonyesha maono ya hatma ya England chini ya utawala wa Vortigern. Kuja na jukumu lake, Arthur anaungana tena na Bedivere. Wanaporudi kwenye maficho ya waasi, hata hivyo, hugundua washirika wao wote wakiwa wamekufa, Vortigern wakiwa wamewapata na kuwasilisha mwisho: ikiwa Arthur hajajisalimisha, mage aliyetekwa atakufa. Arthur anajisalimisha mwenyewe, lakini kama Vortigern anakaribia kumtenda mpwa wake, nyoka mkubwa aliyeitwa na Mage anashambulia na anakula wanaume wa Vortigern. Wakati Bedivere na wengine wanaongoza shambulio kwenye ngome, Vortigern anayekata tamaa anatoa dhabihu ya binti yake wa pekee na hubadilishwa kuwa Demon Knight, akigongana na Arthur katika hali tofauti. Licha ya ustadi wake wa mapigano, Arthur hupigwa, na anakaribia kuwasilisha wakati anashuhudia maono ya baba yake, akimshawishi akubali upanga na tabia yake kama yake. Arthur anauma kwa nguvu Vortigern lakini anabariki wakati anakufa.

Uwezo wa kurudi kwa Arthur unatajwa kwanza na William wa Malmesbury mnamo 1125: "Lakini kaburi la Arthur halijaonekana, ambapo zamani za hadithi bado zinadai kwamba atarudi." Katika "Miujiza ya Mtakatifu Mary wa Laon" ("De Miraculis Sanctae Mariae Laudensis"), iliyoandikwa na mchungaji wa Ufaransa na mwandishi anayeitwa Hériman wa Tournai katika c. 1145, lakini akimaanisha matukio ambayo yalitokea mnamo 1113, kutajwa kunafanywa kwa imani ya Breton na Cornish ambayo Arthur bado aliishi. Kama Constance Bullock-Davies alivyoonyesha, vyanzo anuwai visivyo vya Welsh vinaonyesha kuwa imani hii katika kurudi kwa Arthur ya baadaye ya Masihi ilikuwa imeenea sana kati ya Britons kutoka karne ya 12 kuendelea. Ni mapema zaidi kuliko hii ilikuwepo bado inajadiliwa - mara nyingi ilihusishwa na kufukuzwa kwa Kiingereza na Normans kutoka Uingereza. Hii, kwa kweli, ilibaki kuwa sehemu yenye nguvu ya hadithi ya Arthurian kupitia kipindi cha mzee na zaidi. Kwa hivyo John Lydgate katika "anguko la wakuu" (1431-8) anabaini imani kwamba Arthur "atarudi kama Lord na Sovereyne nje ya Fayrye na Regne huko Breteyne" na Philip II wa Uhispania inaonekana, wakati wa ndoa yake na Mary I wa England mnamo 1554, kwamba angejiuzulu ikiwa Arthur angefanya Arthur angefanya.

Mole ya Arthur huondolewa na inaambiwa kwamba melanoma imeshughulikiwa. Mwezi uliofuata Arthur anakohoa damu na anauliza Dom achunguze. Dom anaamuru Scan ya CT ambayo inaonyesha kwamba ana tumors za sekondari kwenye mapafu yake. Arthur anamwambia Morven juu ya hali yake na anakubali lazima avumilie kozi ngumu ya chemotherapy. Baada ya kufanyiwa chemotherapy Arthur ana matumaini kuwa ugonjwa wake utaponywa. Yeye na Morven wanaamua kuolewa siku hiyo hiyo kusherehekea matumaini yake. Lakini Arthur anaambiwa na Sacha kwamba saratani yake imeenea kwa tumbo lake na ni terminal. Ostlere alisema Arthur aliogopa na akamgeukia Sacha kwa "amani ya akili" lakini hakutarajia kuambiwa atakufa. Arthur ameachwa katika "hali ya kukataa, hasira na hofu". Yeye na Morven wanakubali kufuta harusi yao hadi Arthur awe na "wakati wa uwazi" na anatambua kuwa anataka kuoa Morven kuliko kitu kingine chochote. Wawili hao wanaendelea kuolewa katika sherehe katika hospitali iliyozungukwa na marafiki. Muigizaji alielezea kuwa "harusi ni juu ya watu wawili wanaofanya kile wanachoweza kuendelea na kuwa na siku ya kushangaza na familia zao na marafiki. Ni siku bora ya maisha ya Arthur ... lakini pia mbaya zaidi."

Arthur sasa ni mfalme na ni ngumu kufanya kazi ya kuanzisha Camelot kama kituo cha serikali na mamlaka. Mabwana wachache wenye tamaa kutoka sehemu zingine za Uingereza wana miundo juu ya kiti cha enzi cha Arthur, na Merlin anahifadhiwa kuwazuia kufanya hivyo. Baada ya kuchukua Morgause (dada yake wa nusu) kitandani mwake kama kijana sana baada ya vita yake ya kwanza na ushindi, Arthur sasa ndiye baba wa Mordred. Merlin anaona kuwa Mordred itakuwa sababu ya kifo cha Arthur, lakini haelewi jinsi itatokea. Yeye hutumia wakati mwingi kusafiri kwa kujificha na kuangalia mipango ya Morgause na fitina.

Arthur Pendragon ni mwana wa Mfalme Uther na Igraine. Mchawi Merlin alikuwa na Arthur aliyelelewa na Knight Sir Ector na mtoto wake Kay. Wakati Uther alikufa kutokana na ugonjwa bila kuwa na uwezo wa kumuona mtoto wake, Merlin alifanya mashindano huko London ambapo kila mtu anayevuta Excalibur kutoka kwa jiwe atakuwa mfalme mpya. Wakati Arthur alipopata upanga ndani ya jiwe wakati akienda kupata upanga wa Kay uliowekwa hivi karibuni, aliionyesha kwa Kay ambapo Sir Ector aliwaonya wale walioshiriki kwenye mashindano yake ili kuona ikiwa Arthur ndiye aliyeivuta kutoka kwa jiwe. Wakati kila mtu mwingine alishindwa na Arthur akavuta upanga kutoka kwa jiwe, Arthur alifanywa moja kwa moja mfalme mwingine na kuungana tena na mama yake. Katika mwanzo wake mgumu kama mtawala wa Camelot, Mfalme Arthur alilazimika kuwaunganisha wafalme wa Uingereza ili kupigana na Saxons. Hata alipata Merlin kama mshauri wake wa hadithi na mlinzi. Baada ya kudanganya Morgause, alikuwa na maono kwamba mtoto wake ambaye hajazaliwa angeinuka na kumwangamiza. Hii ilimalizika kusababisha kuzaliwa kwa Mordred wakati Merlin alifanya kazi kuandaa King Arthur kwa siku ambayo unabii huu unatokea. Kufuatia mapigano na Warumi, dada wa Mfalme Arthur Morgan Le Fay alikua mmoja wa maadui mkali wa Mfalme Arthur, Merlin, na wote wa Camelot. Ilipofika kwenye vita vya Camlann, Mfalme Arthur na Mordred walikabili kila mmoja ambapo wote wawili walijeruhiwa vibaya. Katika pumzi yake ya kufa, Mfalme Arthur alimwagiza Sir Bedivere atupe Excalibur ndani ya Ziwa Benoye. Mwanzoni alisita, Sir Bedivere akaitupa kuelekea ziwa ambapo ilikamatwa na mkono wa yule mwanamke wa ziwa. Baada ya usiku kupita, wanawake tisa wamevaa kama Queens walipokuja na kupakia mwili wa Mfalme Arthur kwenye barge na kuiweka kwenye ziwa wakati Merlin aliwaonyesha njia ya kuingia Avalon.
report_src: Mfalme Arthur alikufa kutokana na majeraha makubwa aliyoyapata katika vita ya mwisho ya Knights wa Meza ya Pande Zote alipokuwa akipigana na mwanawe mwovu Mordred; ingawa alimwua Mordred kwa upanga wake, Mordred alimjeruhi vibaya sana kabla ya kufa [1]. Majeraha hayo yalikuwa mabaya kiasi kwamba Arthur alibebwa kwenda Avalon, kisiwa cha siri kilichoaminika kuwa na nguvu za uponyaji, lakini hakuweza kupona na hivyo akafariki huko [1].

question_en: Does Buddhism believe in Jesus?
pos_context_en: Although analogies have been drawn between Buddhism and Christianity, there are differences between the two religions beginning with monotheism's place at the core of Christianity, and Buddhism's orientation towards non-theism (the lack of relevancy of the existence of a creator deity) which runs counter to teachings about God in Christianity; and extending to the importance of grace in Christianity against the rejection of interference with karma in Theravada Buddhism, etc. Another difference between the two traditions is the Christian belief in the centrality of the crucifixion of Jesus as a single event believed to act as the atonement of sins and its direct contrast to Buddhist teachings.
neg_context_en: Takahashi preached that Buddhism and Christianity in the present age have become academic, or formalized, and changed into a faith based on other powers. In response to this, he advocated returning to the times of Gotama Siddhartha and Jesus Christ in many of his literary works, starting with “"Ningen/Shaka"” (“Human Beings/Gotama Buddha”). In addition, Takahashi emphasized that neither Jesus Christ nor Gotama Siddhartha preached the thoughts of other powers at all, and that Christianity and Buddhism in their respective times were not complicated like the Christianity and Buddhism of today. With regard to the thoughts of other powers influencing these religions, these laws of nature (the pure religious base of Buddhism, Islam, and Christianity) transformed as a result of the intentions of those who were in power over time, as well as the interpretations of the many scholars; the cores of these laws of nature were lost, various theories became mixed, and they became academized in a complex manner and lost their substance. In addition, these laws of nature were intentionally distorted and conveyed to people for the purpose of individual's own benefit, and people were made to believe that those who obstructed this would be met with strict counteractions. This new set of distorted laws were slowly deemed as being the laws of nature as taught in today's versions of those religions.

Most scholars believe there is no historical evidence of any influence by Buddhism on Christianity, Paula Fredriksen stating that no serious scholarly work has placed the origins of Christianity outside the backdrop of 1st century Palestinian Judaism. Leslie Houlden states that although modern parallels between the teachings of Jesus and Buddha have been drawn, these comparisons emerged after missionary contacts in the 19th century and there is no historically reliable evidence of contacts between Buddhism and Jesus.

In 2008, Al Mohler declined to sign An Evangelical Manifesto, publishing a lengthy explanation for his decision. Mohler is an evangelical and an exclusivist, which means that he believes Jesus is the only way through which an individual can attain salvation or have a relationship with God the Father. As a Calvinist, Mohler believes that human salvation is a free gift from God which cannot be earned by human action or will and is only given to the elect. He has publicly advanced this position with respect to Judaism, Islam, and Catholicism. He recently stated that "any belief system, any world view, whether it's Zen Buddhism or Hinduism or dialectical materialism for that matter, Marxism, that keeps persons captive and keeps them from coming to faith in the Lord Jesus Christ, yes, is a demonstration of Satanic power." He believes Muslims are motivated by demonic power and in the months after the September 11, 2001 attacks, Mohler characterized Islamic views of Jesus as false and destructive:

In Tilakkhana, de Silva finds a foundation for a constructive dialogue with Buddhists regarding the role of Jesus as saviour in Christianity. Buddhists overcome Tilakkhana by turning attention away from the self and focusing their attention towards anattā; therefore, the ultimate goal to which Buddhism is directed towards – Nibbana – can be achieved by self effort. This, de Silva believes, is one of the "deepest dilemmas in Buddhism," leading him to ask the question "What is the self that denies the self and at the same time asserts that it alone can save the self?" He infers that "to deny the self and to affirm self-sufficiency is a contradiction."

Late in the 20th century, historian Jerry H. Bentley also wrote of similarities and stated that it is possible "that Buddhism influenced the early development of Christianity" and suggested "attention to many parallels concerning the births, lives, doctrines, and deaths of the Buddha and Jesus". Some high level Buddhists have drawn analogies between Jesus and Buddhism, e.g. in 2001 the Dalai Lama stated that "Jesus Christ also lived previous lives", and added that "So, you see, he reached a high state, either as a Bodhisattva, or an enlightened person, through Buddhist practice or something like that." Thich Nhat Hanh affirmed core Christian beliefs such as the trinity, and the death and resurrection of Jesus Christ, in his book "Living Buddha, Living Christ". Bokin Kim, similarly, sees Christ as the Buddha Dharmakaya, and Jesus as similar to Gautama who was just a historical manifestation of the transhistorical Buddha.

Although modern parallels between the teachings of Jesus and Buddhist philosophy have been drawn (by the 14th Dalai Lama for example), these comparisons emerged after missionary contacts in the 19th century, and there is no historically reliable evidence of contacts between Buddhism and Jesus during his life. Modern scholarship has almost unanimously agreed that claims of the travels of Jesus to Tibet, Kashmir or India (see Unknown years of Jesus) and the influence of Buddhism on his teachings are without historical basis.
The similarities between the teachings of Buddha and Jesus have been noted. On this subject, Bible scholar Marcus Borg and Buddhist Jack Kornfield collaborated on a book, "Jesus and Buddha: The Parallel Sayings'.'

Though some early Christians were aware of Buddhism which was practiced in both the Greek and Roman Empires in the pre-Christian period, the majority of modern Christian scholarship has roundly rejected any historical basis for the travels of Jesus to India or Tibet or direct influences between the teachings of Christianity in the West and Buddhism; and has seen the attempts at parallel symbolism as cases of parallelomania which exaggerate resemblances. However, in the East syncretism between Nestorian Christianity and Buddhism was widespread along the Silk Road in Antiquity and the Middle Ages, and was especially pronounced in the medieval Church of the East in China, as evidenced by the Jesus Sutras.

Late in the 20th century, historian Jerry H. Bentley also wrote of similarities and stated that it is possible "that Buddhism influenced the early development of Christianity" and suggested "attention to many parallels concerning the births, lives, doctrines, and deaths of the Buddha and Jesus". Some high level Buddhists have drawn analogies between Jesus and Buddhism, e.g. in 2001 the Dalai Lama stated that "Jesus Christ also lived previous lives", and added that "So, you see, he reached a high state, either as a Bodhisattva, or an enlightened person, through Buddhist practice or something like that."

Faith is included in lists of virtues for laypeople, and is therefore described as a progressive quality for devotees, as a devotee who is new to the Buddhist religion is characterized as "young in devotion". Thus, there are various lists of virtues in which faith is included, and other early traditions have also given faith a prominent role, such as the Sarvāstivāda tradition. Moreover, early Buddhism describes faith as an important quality in stream-enterers, a state preceding enlightenment. In standard descriptions of people going forth (taking ordination as a monk), faith is mentioned as an important motivation. Despite this role, some Indologists such as André Bareau and Lily De Silva believed early Buddhism did not assign the same value to faith as in some other religions, such as Christianity. Bareau argued that "Buddhism has no comparable [idea of] pure faith as in Christianity, ... The idea of blind faith, an absolute faith in a master's word, goes completely against the spirit of early Buddhism." Translator Caroline Rhys Davids disagreed with such statements, however, stating that "faith is no less important than it is for all religions worthy of the name". Indologist Richard Gombrich argues that Buddhism does not prescribe believing in someone or something to the extent of going against reason. Also, Gombrich believes the Buddha did not aim to create a religion that focuses on devotion to his person, though he recognizes that such devotion already started when the Buddha was still alive. Gombrich notes that there is a lot of material in the early scriptures emphasizing how important faith is, but argues that "the growth of Buddhist rites and liturgies was surely a wholly unintended consequence of the Buddha's preaching".
question_src: Je! Ubuddha unamwamini Yesu?
pos_context_src: Ingawa analog zimetolewa kati ya Ubuddha na Ukristo, kuna tofauti kati ya dini hizo mbili zilizoanza na mahali pa Monotheism katika msingi wa Ukristo, na mwelekeo wa Ubuddha kuelekea kutokuwepo (ukosefu wa umuhimu wa uwepo wa mungu wa Muumba) ambao unapingana na mafundisho juu ya Mungu katika Ukristo; na kupanua umuhimu wa neema katika Ukristo dhidi ya kukataliwa kwa kuingiliwa na Karma katika Ubuddha wa Theravada, nk Tofauti nyingine kati ya mila hizo mbili ni imani ya Kikristo katika uhalali wa kusulubiwa kwa Yesu kama tukio moja linaloaminika kutenda kama upatanisho wa dhambi na tofauti zake za moja kwa moja na mafundisho ya Wabudhi.
neg_context_title_src: Ushawishi wa Wabudhi juu ya Ukristo
neg_context_src: Takahashi alihubiri kwamba Ubuddha na Ukristo katika wakati huu wa sasa umekuwa wasomi, au rasmi, na kubadilishwa kuwa imani kulingana na nguvu zingine. Kujibu hili, alitetea kurudi nyakati za Gotama Siddhartha na Yesu Kristo katika kazi zake nyingi za fasihi, akianza na "" Ningen/Shaka "" ("Binadamu/Gotama Buddha"). Kwa kuongezea, Takahashi alisisitiza kwamba Yesu Kristo wala Gotama Siddhartha walihubiri mawazo ya nguvu zingine, na kwamba Ukristo na Ubuddha katika nyakati zao hazikuwa ngumu kama Ukristo na Ubuddha wa leo. Kuhusiana na mawazo ya nguvu zingine zinazoshawishi dini hizi, sheria hizi za asili (msingi safi wa kidini wa Ubudha, Uislamu, na Ukristo) zilibadilishwa kwa sababu ya nia ya wale ambao walikuwa madarakani kwa wakati, na tafsiri za wasomi wengi; Cores za sheria hizi za maumbile zilipotea, nadharia mbali mbali zilichanganywa, na zilibadilishwa kwa njia ngumu na kupoteza mali zao. Kwa kuongezea, sheria hizi za maumbile zilipotoshwa kwa makusudi na kupelekwa kwa watu kwa madhumuni ya faida ya mtu binafsi, na watu walifanywa kuamini kwamba wale ambao walizuia hii watafikiwa na mashtaka madhubuti. Seti hii mpya ya sheria zilizopotoka zilionekana polepole kama sheria za maumbile kama inavyofundishwa katika matoleo ya leo ya dini hizo.

Wasomi wengi wanaamini kuwa hakuna ushahidi wa kihistoria wa ushawishi wowote wa Ubuddha juu ya Ukristo, Paula Fredriksen akisema kwamba hakuna kazi kubwa ya wasomi iliyoweka asili ya Ukristo nje ya uwanja wa nyuma wa karne ya 1 ya Uyahudi ya Palestina. Leslie Houlden anasema kwamba ingawa kufanana kwa kisasa kati ya mafundisho ya Yesu na Buddha kumechorwa, kulinganisha haya kuliibuka baada ya mawasiliano ya wamishonari katika karne ya 19 na hakuna ushahidi wa kihistoria wa mawasiliano kati ya Ubuddha na Yesu.

Mnamo 2008, Al Mohler alikataa kusaini manifesto ya kiinjili, akichapisha maelezo marefu kwa uamuzi wake. Mohler ni kiinjili na anayetengwa, ambayo inamaanisha kwamba anaamini Yesu ndiye njia pekee ambayo mtu anaweza kupata wokovu au kuwa na uhusiano na Mungu Baba. Kama Kalvinist, Mohler anaamini kwamba wokovu wa mwanadamu ni zawadi ya bure kutoka kwa Mungu ambayo haiwezi kupatikana kwa hatua ya kibinadamu au mapenzi na hupewa wateule tu. Ameendeleza msimamo huu hadharani kwa heshima na Uyahudi, Uislamu, na Ukatoliki. Hivi majuzi alisema kwamba "mfumo wowote wa imani, maoni yoyote ya ulimwengu, iwe ni Ubuddha wa Zen au Uhindu au ubinafsi wa lahaja kwa jambo hilo, Marxism, ambayo inawafanya watu mateka na kuwazuia kuja kwa imani na Bwana Yesu Kristo, ndio, ni maonyesho ya nguvu ya kishetani." Anaamini Waislamu wanahamasishwa na nguvu ya pepo na katika miezi baada ya shambulio la Septemba 11, 2001, Mohler alionyesha maoni ya Kiisilamu ya Yesu kama ya uwongo na ya uharibifu:

Katika Tilakkhana, de Silva hupata msingi wa mazungumzo ya kujenga na Wabudhi kuhusu jukumu la Yesu kama Mwokozi katika Ukristo. Wabudhi wanashinda Tilakkhana kwa kugeuza umakini mbali na ubinafsi na kulenga umakini wao kuelekea anattā; Kwa hivyo, lengo la mwisho ambalo Ubuddha huelekezwa kwa - Nibbana - inaweza kupatikana kwa juhudi za kibinafsi. Hii, De Silva anaamini, ni moja wapo ya "shida kubwa katika Ubuddha," ikimwongoza kuuliza swali "Je! Ni ubinafsi gani ambao unakataa ubinafsi na wakati huo huo unadai kwamba pekee inaweza kuokoa ubinafsi?" Anasisitiza kwamba "kukataa ubinafsi na kudhibitisha kujitosheleza ni utata."

Marehemu katika karne ya 20, mwanahistoria Jerry H. Bentley pia aliandika juu ya kufanana na akasema kwamba inawezekana "kwamba Ubuddha ulisababisha maendeleo ya mapema ya Ukristo" na kupendekeza "umakini kwa kufanana nyingi juu ya kuzaliwa, maisha, mafundisho, na vifo vya Buddha na Yesu". Wabudhi wengine wa kiwango cha juu wamechora analog kati ya Yesu na Ubuddha, n.k. Mnamo 2001 Dalai Lama alisema kwamba "Yesu Kristo pia aliishi maisha ya zamani", na akaongeza kuwa "kwa hivyo, unaona, alifikia hali ya juu, ama kama Bodhisattva, au mtu aliyeangaziwa, kupitia mazoezi ya Wabudhi au kitu kama hicho." Thich Nhat Hanh alithibitisha imani za Kikristo kama vile Utatu, na kifo na ufufuko wa Yesu Kristo, katika kitabu chake "Living Buddha, Kristo aliye hai". Bokin Kim, vivyo hivyo, anamwona Kristo kama Buddha Dharmakaya, na Yesu kama sawa na Gautama ambaye alikuwa dhihirisho la kihistoria la Buddha wa Transhistorical.

Ingawa kufanana kwa kisasa kati ya mafundisho ya Yesu na falsafa ya Wabudhi kumetolewa (na 14 Dalai Lama kwa mfano), kulinganisha haya kuliibuka baada ya mawasiliano ya wamishonari katika karne ya 19, na hakuna ushahidi wa kihistoria wa mawasiliano kati ya Ubuddha na Yesu wakati wa maisha yake. Usomi wa kisasa umekubaliana kwa makubaliano kwamba madai ya safari za Yesu kwenda Tibet, Kashmir au India (tazama miaka isiyojulikana ya Yesu) na ushawishi wa Ubuddha kwa mafundisho yake bila msingi wa kihistoria.
Kufanana kati ya mafundisho ya Buddha na Yesu kumebainika. Juu ya somo hili, msomi wa Bibilia Marcus Borg na Wabudhi Jack Kornfield walishirikiana kwenye kitabu, "Jesus na Buddha: Maneno Sambamba '.'

Ingawa Wakristo wengine wa mapema walikuwa wanajua Ubuddha ambao ulitekelezwa katika falme zote mbili za Uigiriki na Kirumi katika kipindi cha kabla ya Ukristo, wasomi wengi wa kisasa wa Kikristo wamekataa msingi wowote wa kihistoria kwa safari za Yesu kwenda India au Tibet au ushawishi wa moja kwa moja kati ya mafundisho ya Ukristo huko Magharibi na Ubudha; na ameona majaribio ya ishara sambamba kama kesi za parallelomania ambazo zinazidisha kufanana. Walakini, katika usawazishaji wa Mashariki kati ya Ukristo wa Nestorian na Ubuddha ulikuwa umeenea kando ya barabara ya hariri huko Antiquity na Zama za Kati, na ilitamkwa sana katika kanisa la zamani la Mashariki huko Uchina, kama inavyothibitishwa na Yesu Sutras.

Marehemu katika karne ya 20, mwanahistoria Jerry H. Bentley pia aliandika juu ya kufanana na akasema kwamba inawezekana "kwamba Ubuddha ulisababisha maendeleo ya mapema ya Ukristo" na kupendekeza "umakini kwa kufanana nyingi juu ya kuzaliwa, maisha, mafundisho, na vifo vya Buddha na Yesu". Wabudhi wengine wa kiwango cha juu wamechora analog kati ya Yesu na Ubuddha, n.k. Mnamo 2001 Dalai Lama alisema kwamba "Yesu Kristo pia aliishi maisha ya zamani", na akaongeza kuwa "kwa hivyo, unaona, alifikia hali ya juu, ama kama Bodhisattva, au mtu aliyeangaziwa, kupitia mazoezi ya Wabudhi au kitu kama hicho."

Imani imejumuishwa katika orodha ya fadhila kwa watu, na kwa hivyo inaelezewa kama ubora unaoendelea kwa waja, kama mja ambaye ni mpya kwa dini ya Wabudhi anaonyeshwa kama "mchanga katika kujitolea". Kwa hivyo, kuna orodha mbali mbali za fadhila ambazo imani imejumuishwa, na mila zingine za mapema pia zimetoa imani jukumu maarufu, kama vile mila ya Sarvāstivāda. Kwa kuongezea, Ubuddha wa mapema unaelezea imani kama ubora muhimu katika waingiaji wa mkondo, hali iliyotangulia. Katika maelezo ya kawaida ya watu wanaokwenda (kuchukua uwekaji kama mtawa), imani imetajwa kama motisha muhimu. Licha ya jukumu hili, wasomi wengine kama vile André Bareau na Lily de Silva waliamini Ubuddha wa mapema hawakutoa dhamana sawa na imani kama ilivyo katika dini zingine, kama vile Ukristo. Bareau alisema kwamba "Ubuddha hauna wazo la kulinganishwa [la] imani safi kama ilivyo kwa Ukristo, ... wazo la imani ya kipofu, imani kabisa katika neno la bwana, linaenda kabisa dhidi ya roho ya Ubudha wa mapema." Mtafsiri Caroline Rhys Davids hakukubaliana na taarifa kama hizo, hata hivyo, akisema kwamba "imani sio muhimu sana kuliko ilivyo kwa dini zote zinazostahili jina". Daktari wa watoto Richard Gombrich anasema kuwa Ubuddha haukuamuru kuamini mtu au kitu kwa kiwango cha kwenda kinyume na sababu. Pia, Gombrich anaamini Buddha hakukusudia kuunda dini ambayo inazingatia kujitolea kwa mtu wake, ingawa anatambua kuwa ibada kama hiyo tayari ilianza wakati Buddha alikuwa hai. Gombrich anabainisha kuwa kuna nyenzo nyingi katika maandiko ya mapema akisisitiza jinsi imani ni muhimu, lakini anasema kwamba "ukuaji wa ibada za Wabudhi na liturgies kwa kweli ilikuwa matokeo yasiyotarajiwa kabisa ya mahubiri ya Buddha".
report_src: Kwa ujumla, Ubuddha hauamini kwamba Yesu ni Mungu, Mwokozi au kiungo cha lazima kwa wokovu, kwa sababu msingi wake hauhusishi imani katika Mungu Muumba na haukidhi dhana ya neema au upatanisho kupitia kusulubiwa, ambayo ni nguzo kuu ya Ukristo [1]; badala yake, Wabuddha huona ukombozi unapatikana kupitia kuelewa Kweli Nne Tukufu na kutenda Njia ya Uadilifu, wakiwa huru kifikra kumheshimu Yesu kama mwalimu wa kiroho au mtu mwenye maadili bila kumpa hadhi ya kimungu.

question_en: How many countries speak Spanish?
pos_context_en:
The Association of Spanish Language Academies (, or ) is the entity which regulates the Spanish language. It was created in Mexico in 1951 and represents the union of all the separate academies in the Spanish-speaking world. It comprises the academies of 23 countries, ordered by date of Academy foundation: Spain (1713), Colombia (1871), Ecuador (1874), Mexico (1875), El Salvador (1876), Venezuela (1883), Chile (1885), Peru (1887), Guatemala (1887), Costa Rica (1923), Philippines (1924), Panama (1926), Cuba (1926),
Paraguay (1927), Dominican Republic (1927), Bolivia (1927), Nicaragua (1928), Argentina (1931), Uruguay (1943), Honduras (1949), Puerto Rico (1955), United States (1973) and Equatorial Guinea (2016).
The (Cervantes Institute) is a worldwide nonprofit organization created by the Spanish government in 1991. This organization has branched out in over 20 different countries, with 54 centers devoted to the Spanish and Hispanic American cultures and Spanish language. The ultimate goals of the Institute are to promote universally the education, the study, and the use of Spanish as a second language, to support methods and activities that help the process of Spanish-language education, and to contribute to the advancement of the Spanish and Hispanic American cultures in non-Spanish-speaking countries. The Institute's 2015 report "El español, una lengua viva" (Spanish, a living language) estimates that there are 559 million Spanish speakers worldwide. Among the sources cited in the report is the U.S. Census Bureau, which estimates that the U.S. will have 138 million Spanish speakers by 2050, making it the biggest Spanish-speaking nation on earth, with Spanish the mother tongue of almost a third of its citizens.
neg_context_title_en: Spanish language in the United States
Names given to the Spanish language
neg_context_en: Spanish is spoken by about 90% of the country's population. In Nicaragua the Voseo form is common, just as in other countries in Central and South America like Honduras, Argentina, Uruguay or coastal Colombia. Spanish has many different dialects spoken throughout Latin America, Central American Spanish is the dialect spoken in Nicaragua. In the Caribbean coast many afro-Nicaraguans and creoles speak English and creole English as their first language. Also in the Caribbean coast, many Indigenous people speak their native languages, such as the Miskito, Sumo, Rama and Garifuna language. In addition, many ethnic groups in Nicaragua, such as the Chinese Nicaraguans and Palestinian Nicaraguans, have maintained their ancestral languages, which are minority languages, while also speaking Spanish and/or English. These minority languages include Chinese, Arabic, German, and Italian, among others.

Guatemalan Spanish () is the national variant of Spanish spoken in the Central American country of Guatemala. About 13.7 million of the 16 million population speak Spanish. It includes the use of the second-person singular personal pronoun "vos" alongside the standard Spanish second-person singular pronouns "tú" and "usted" to form a three-level system of second-person singular address.A number of words widely used in Guatemala which have Mayan or other native origins, in particular names for flora, fauna and toponyms. Some of these words are used in most, or all, Spanish-speaking countries, like "chocolate" and "aguacate" ("avocado"), and some are only used in Mexico and most Central American countries, like Guatemala and El Salvador. The latter include "guajolote" "turkey" < Nahuatl "huaxōlōtl" (although "chompipe" is also used; "pavo" is also used, as in other Spanish-speaking countries); "papalote" "kite" < Nahuatl "pāpālōtl" "butterfly"; and "jitomate" "tomato" < Nahuatl "xītomatl" . For a more complete list see List of Spanish words of Nahuatl origin. Local words include There are also many words unique to Central America, for example, "chunche" or "chochadas" or "babosadas" means "thing" or "stuff" in some places. The words used to describe children (or kids) vary among the countries in Central America; in Guatemala they are often called "patojos". Cipotes is also used in Guatemala in the eastern departments. In the western and northern departments of Guatemala "chamacos" is used to say children or kids. In Guatemala and Honduras the word "güiros" is also used. In Guatemala (also in Honduras and El Salvador) people with money are said to have "pisto", a term originally used by Maya peoples in Guatemala.

Mexicans are linguistically diverse, with many speaking European languages as well as various Indigenous Mexican Languages. Spanish is spoken by approximately 92.17% of Mexicans as their first language making them the largest Spanish speaking group in the world followed by Colombia (45,273,925), Spain (41,063,259) and Argentina (40,134,425). Although the great majority speak Spanish "de facto" the second most populous language among Mexicans is English due to the regional proximity of the United States which calls for a bilingual relationship in order to conduct business and trade as well as the migration of Mexicans into that country who adopt it as a second language.

The United States has forty-one million people aged five or older that speak Spanish at home, making Spanish the second most spoken language of the United States by far. Spanish is the most studied foreign language in United States, with about six million students. With over 50 million native speakers, heritage language speakers and second language speakers, the United States now has the second largest Spanish-speaking population in the world after Mexico, although it is not an official language of the country. About half of all American Spanish speakers also assessed themselves as speaking English "very well" in the 2000 U.S. Census. This percentage increased to 57% in the 2013-2017 American Community Survey. The United States is among the Spanish-speaking countries that has its own Academy of the Spanish Language.

While everyone in Spain can speak Spanish, other languages figure prominently in many areas: Basque in the Basque Country and Navarre; Catalan in Catalonia, Balearic Islands and Valencia (where it is usually referred to as Valencian), and Galician in Galicia. Spanish is official throughout the country; the rest of these have co-official status in their respective communities and all are major enough that there are numerous daily newspapers in these languages and, especially in Catalan, a significant book publishing industry. Many citizens in these territories consider their own language as their primary language and Spanish as secondary; these languages cover broad enough regions to have multiple distinct dialects. Spanish itself also has distinct dialects around the country, with the Andalusian dialect being closer to the Spanish of the Americas, which it heavily influenced.

A similar situation occurred in the American Southwest, including California, Arizona, New Mexico and Texas, where Spaniards, then "criollos" (Tejanos, Californios, etc.) followed by Chicanos (Mexican Americans) and later Mexican immigrants, kept the Spanish language alive before, during and after the American appropriation of those territories following the Mexican–American War. Spanish continues to be used by millions of citizens and immigrants to the United States from Spanish-speaking countries of the Americas (for example, many Cubans arrived in Miami, Florida, beginning with the Cuban Revolution in 1959, and followed by other Latin American groups; the local majority is now Spanish-speaking). Spanish is now treated as the country's "second language," and over 5 percent of the U.S. population are Spanish-speaking, but most Latino/Hispanic Americans are bilingual or also regularly speak English.

In 1492, the arrival of Christopher Columbus on a Castilian-paid expedition paved the way for the Spanish colonization of the Americas. As a result of this process, most countries in South America now speak the same language as Castile. Until about the eighteenth century, the Kingdom of Castile, and not Spain as a whole, was the colonizing power, and the language used was called "castellano". Thus, some Latin American countries formerly under Spanish rule have retained the custom of calling it "castellano", while others eventually switched to calling it "español", with many different factors influencing the final choice.

Another motivator for the unification of Spanish is the translation by multinational companies of manuals, software, websites, etc., from English to Spanish. It is easier to use a neutral version of Spanish than to create different versions for each country or region. If it were done by country, there would be over twenty versions, and if by region it would be difficult to define which countries belonged to which region, as well as being complicated from the logistical point of view. The result has been to identify a neutral Spanish, a version that tries to avoid regional phenomena, such as the Spanish-speaking American voseo, or terms that may be identified with specific countries (for example, for “computer”, the term in Spanish-speaking America is ', except in a few areas that prefer ', while in Spain the most frequent term is '; as a result, Microsoft Windows uses the region-neutral term '). This neutral language is developed with the help of glossaries that prescribe the preferred terms and the terms to avoid. It is a common occurrence in the computing field, because it lowers production costs.

Much as with French Americans, who are of French descent but mostly by way of Canada, the majority of the 41 million massively strong Spanish-speaking population have come by way of Latin America, especially Mexico, but also Puerto Rico, Dominican Republic, and other areas that the Spanish themselves colonized. Many of the Hispanic and Latino Americans bring their Spanish-speaking culture into the country. A lot of the Americans who are descended from Mexico, Puerto Rico or other places from Latin America have Spanish ancestry from Spain, but it is mixed with a different race; for example, Mexican-Americans who are identified as mestizo, which is mixed Native American and European ancestry, while others, like Puerto Ricans in the United States, are identified as Mulatto, which is mixed African and European ancestry. However, some Spanish Americans are descendants of colonial settlers in the southwestern states, especially New Mexico, before they became part of the United States.
question_src: Ni nchi ngapi zinazungumza Kihispania?
pos_context_src:
Chama cha Taaluma za Lugha ya Uhispania (, AU) ni chombo ambacho kinasimamia lugha ya Uhispania. Iliundwa huko Mexico mnamo 1951 na inawakilisha umoja wa taaluma zote tofauti katika ulimwengu unaozungumza Kihispania. Inajumuisha taaluma za nchi 23, zilizoamriwa na Tarehe ya Academy Foundation: Uhispania (1713), Colombia (1871), Ecuador (1874), Mexico (1875), El Salvador (1876), Venezuela (1883), Chile (1885), Peru (1887), Guatis (1883), Chile (1885). Philippines (1924), Panama (1926), Cuba (1926),
Paraguay (1927), Jamhuri ya Dominika (1927), Bolivia (1927), Nicaragua (1928), Argentina (1931), Uruguay (1943), Honduras (1949), Puerto Rico (1955), United States (1973) na ikweta (ikweta (ikweta (ikweta (ikweta (ikweta (ikweta.
(Taasisi ya Cervantes) ni shirika lisilo la faida ulimwenguni lililoundwa na serikali ya Uhispania mnamo 1991. Shirika hili limetangaza katika nchi zaidi ya 20, na vituo 54 vilivyowekwa kwa tamaduni za Uhispania na za Kihispania na lugha ya Uhispania. Malengo ya mwisho ya Taasisi ni kukuza ulimwengu wote, utafiti, na utumiaji wa Kihispania kama lugha ya pili, kusaidia njia na shughuli zinazosaidia mchakato wa elimu ya lugha ya Kihispania, na kuchangia maendeleo ya tamaduni za Uhispania na za Amerika katika nchi zisizo za Uhispania. Ripoti ya Taasisi ya 2015 "El Español, Una Lengua Viva" (Kihispania, lugha hai) inakadiria kuwa kuna wasemaji milioni 559 wa Uhispania ulimwenguni. Miongoni mwa vyanzo vilivyotajwa katika ripoti hiyo ni Ofisi ya sensa ya Merika, ambayo inakadiria kuwa Merika itakuwa na wasemaji milioni 138 wa Uhispania ifikapo 2050, na kuifanya kuwa taifa kubwa la Uhispania duniani, na lugha ya mama ya Uhispania ya karibu theluthi ya raia wake.
neg_context_src: Kihispania huzungumzwa na karibu 90% ya idadi ya watu wa nchi hiyo. Katika Nicaragua fomu ya Voseo ni ya kawaida, kama ilivyo katika nchi zingine za Amerika ya Kati na Kusini kama Honduras, Argentina, Uruguay au Colombia ya Pwani. Kihispania ina lahaja nyingi tofauti zinazozungumzwa katika Amerika ya Kusini, Amerika ya Kati ni lahaja inayozungumzwa huko Nicaragua. Katika pwani ya Karibiani wengi wa Afro-Nicaraguans na Creoles huongea Kiingereza na Kiingereza cha Kiingereza kama lugha yao ya kwanza. Pia katika pwani ya Karibiani, watu wengi asilia huzungumza lugha zao za asili, kama lugha ya Miskito, Sumo, Rama na Garifuna. Kwa kuongezea, makabila mengi huko Nicaragua, kama vile Wanicaragua wa China na Wapalestina wa Wapalestina, wametunza lugha za mababu zao, ambazo ni lugha ndogo, wakati pia zinazungumza Kihispania na/au Kiingereza. Lugha hizi ndogo ni pamoja na Wachina, Kiarabu, Kijerumani, na Italia, miongoni mwa zingine.

Guatemalan Kihispania () ni lahaja ya kitaifa ya Uhispania inayozungumzwa katika nchi ya Amerika ya Kati ya Guatemala. Karibu milioni 13.7 ya watu milioni 16 huzungumza Kihispania. Ni pamoja na utumiaji wa mtu wa pili wa kitamkwa cha kibinafsi "Vos" pamoja na matamshi ya kawaida ya mtu wa pili wa Uhispania "Tú" na "Usted" kuunda mfumo wa kiwango cha tatu cha anwani ya mtu wa pili. Baadhi ya maneno haya hutumiwa katika nchi nyingi, au zote, zinazozungumza Kihispania, kama "chokoleti" na "aguacate" ("avocado"), na zingine hutumiwa tu huko Mexico na nchi nyingi za Amerika ya Kati, kama Guatemala na El Salvador. Mwisho huo ni pamoja na "guajolote" "Uturuki" <nahuatl "huaxōlōtl" (ingawa "chompipe" pia hutumiwa; "pavo" pia hutumiwa, kama ilivyo katika nchi zingine zinazozungumza Kihispania); "Papalote" "kite" <nahuatl "pāpālōtl" "kipepeo"; na "jitomate" "nyanya" <nahuatl "xītomatl". Kwa orodha kamili zaidi tazama orodha ya maneno ya Kihispania ya asili ya Nahuatl. Maneno ya ndani ni pamoja na kuna maneno mengi ya kipekee kwa Amerika ya Kati, kwa mfano, "chunche" au "chochadas" au "Babosadas" inamaanisha "kitu" au "vitu" katika maeneo mengine. Maneno yaliyotumiwa kuelezea watoto (au watoto) yanatofautiana kati ya nchi za Amerika ya Kati; Huko Guatemala mara nyingi huitwa "patojos". Cipotes pia hutumiwa katika Guatemala katika idara za mashariki. Katika idara za magharibi na kaskazini za Guatemala "Chamacos" hutumiwa kusema watoto au watoto. Huko Guatemala na Honduras neno "güiros" pia hutumiwa. Huko Guatemala (pia huko Honduras na El Salvador) watu walio na pesa wanasemekana kuwa na "pisto", neno lililotumiwa hapo awali na watu wa Maya huko Guatemala.

Wamexico ni tofauti ya lugha, na lugha nyingi zinazozungumza Ulaya na lugha tofauti za asili za Mexico. Kihispania huzungumzwa na takriban asilimia 92.17 ya watu wa Mexico kama lugha yao ya kwanza kuwafanya kuwa kundi kubwa zaidi la Uhispania ulimwenguni lililofuatwa na Colombia (45,273,925), Uhispania (41,063,259) na Argentina (40,134,425). Ijapokuwa wengi huzungumza Kihispania "de facto" lugha ya pili yenye watu wengi kati ya watu wa Mexico ni Kiingereza kwa sababu ya ukaribu wa mkoa wa Merika ambayo inahitaji uhusiano wa lugha mbili ili kufanya biashara na biashara na uhamiaji wa Mexico kwenda nchi hiyo ambao huchukua kama lugha ya pili.

Merika ina watu milioni arobaini na moja wenye umri wa miaka mitano au zaidi ambao huzungumza Kihispania nyumbani, na kufanya Kihispania kuwa lugha ya pili inayozungumzwa zaidi ya Merika. Kihispania ndio lugha ya kigeni iliyosomwa zaidi huko Merika, na wanafunzi wapata milioni sita. Na wasemaji wa asili zaidi ya milioni 50, wasemaji wa lugha ya urithi na wasemaji wa lugha ya pili, Merika sasa ina idadi ya pili kubwa ya Kihispania ulimwenguni baada ya Mexico, ingawa sio lugha rasmi ya nchi. Karibu nusu ya wasemaji wote wa Uhispania wa Amerika pia walijitathmini kama kuzungumza Kiingereza "vizuri sana" katika sensa ya 2000 ya Merika. Asilimia hii iliongezeka hadi 57% katika Uchunguzi wa Jumuiya ya Amerika ya 2013-2017. Merika ni kati ya nchi zinazozungumza Kihispania ambazo zina taaluma yake ya lugha ya Uhispania.

Wakati kila mtu nchini Uhispania anaweza kuzungumza Kihispania, lugha zingine zinaonekana sana katika maeneo mengi: Basque katika nchi ya Basque na Navarre; Kikatalani katika Catalonia, Visiwa vya Balearic na Valencia (ambapo kawaida hujulikana kama Valencian), na Galician huko Galicia. Kihispania ni rasmi kote nchini; Wengine wote wana hadhi ya kushirikiana katika jamii zao na zote ni kubwa ya kutosha kwamba kuna magazeti kadhaa ya kila siku katika lugha hizi na, haswa katika Kikatalani, tasnia kubwa ya kuchapisha vitabu. Raia wengi katika wilaya hizi huchukulia lugha yao wenyewe kama lugha yao ya msingi na Kihispania kama sekondari; Lugha hizi hufunika mikoa pana ya kutosha kuwa na lahaja nyingi tofauti. Kihispania yenyewe pia ina lahaja tofauti kote nchini, na lahaja ya Andalusian kuwa karibu na Uhispania wa Amerika, ambayo ilishawishi sana.

Hali kama hiyo ilitokea Amerika ya Kusini magharibi, pamoja na California, Arizona, New Mexico na Texas, ambapo Spaniards, kisha "Criollos" (Tejanos, Californios, nk) ikifuatiwa na Chicanos (Wamarekani wa Mexico) na baadaye wahamiaji wa Mexico, waliweka lugha ya Spanish. Uhispania inaendelea kutumiwa na mamilioni ya raia na wahamiaji kwenda Merika kutoka nchi zinazoongea Uhispania za Amerika (kwa mfano, Wakuu wengi walifika Miami, Florida, wakianza na Mapinduzi ya Cuba mnamo 1959, na kufuatiwa na vikundi vingine vya Amerika ya Kusini; idadi kubwa ya Wahispania sasa). Kihispania sasa inachukuliwa kama "lugha ya pili ya nchi," na zaidi ya asilimia 5 ya idadi ya watu wa Merika wanazungumza Kihispania, lakini Wamarekani wengi wa Latino/Hispanic ni lugha mbili au pia huzungumza Kiingereza mara kwa mara.

Mnamo 1492, kuwasili kwa Christopher Columbus kwenye msafara wa kulipwa wa Castilia kulisababisha njia ya ukoloni wa Uhispania wa Amerika. Kama matokeo ya mchakato huu, nchi nyingi huko Amerika Kusini sasa zinazungumza lugha moja na Castile. Hadi karibu karne ya kumi na nane, ufalme wa Castile, na sio Uhispania kwa ujumla, ilikuwa nguvu ya koloni, na lugha iliyotumiwa iliitwa "Castellano". Kwa hivyo, nchi zingine za Amerika ya Kusini hapo zamani zilikuwa chini ya utawala wa Uhispania zimehifadhi desturi ya kuiita "Castellano", wakati wengine walibadilisha kuiita "Español", na mambo mengi tofauti yanayoshawishi chaguo la mwisho.

Kichocheo kingine cha umoja wa Kihispania ni tafsiri na kampuni za kimataifa za hati, programu, tovuti, nk, kutoka Kiingereza hadi Kihispania. Ni rahisi kutumia toleo la upande wowote la Uhispania kuliko kuunda matoleo tofauti kwa kila nchi au mkoa. Ikiwa ilifanywa na nchi, kungekuwa na matoleo zaidi ya ishirini, na ikiwa kwa mkoa itakuwa ngumu kufafanua ni nchi gani ni za mkoa gani, na pia kuwa ngumu kutoka kwa maoni ya vifaa. Matokeo yake yamekuwa ya kubaini Kihispania kisicho na upande, toleo ambalo linajaribu kuzuia matukio ya kikanda, kama vile Voseo ya Amerika inayoongea Kihispania, au maneno ambayo yanaweza kutambuliwa na nchi maalum (kwa mfano, kwa "kompyuta", neno katika Uhispania la kawaida ni ', isipokuwa katika maeneo machache ambayo yanapendelea', wakati wa Uhispania. Lugha hii ya upande wowote huandaliwa kwa msaada wa glossaries ambazo huagiza masharti yaliyopendekezwa na masharti ya kuepusha. Ni tukio la kawaida katika uwanja wa kompyuta, kwa sababu hupunguza gharama za uzalishaji.

Kama ilivyo kwa Wamarekani wa Ufaransa, ambao ni wa asili ya Ufaransa lakini zaidi kwa njia ya Canada, idadi kubwa ya watu milioni 41 wenye nguvu wa Uhispania wamekuja kwa njia ya Amerika ya Kusini, haswa Mexico, lakini pia Puerto Rico, Jamhuri ya Dominika, na maeneo mengine ambayo Wahispania wenyewe walikoloni. Wamarekani wengi wa Rico na Latino huleta utamaduni wao unaozungumza Kihispania nchini. Wamarekani wengi ambao wametoka Mexico, Puerto Rico au maeneo mengine kutoka Amerika ya Kusini wana asili ya Uhispania kutoka Uhispania, lakini imechanganywa na mbio tofauti; Kwa mfano, Wamarekani-Wamarekani ambao wametambuliwa kama mestizo, ambayo ni mchanganyiko wa asili ya Amerika na Uropa, wakati wengine, kama Puerto Ricans huko Merika, wanatambuliwa kama Mulatto, ambayo ni mchanganyiko wa asili ya Kiafrika na Ulaya. Walakini, Wamarekani wengine wa Uhispania ni kizazi cha walowezi wa kikoloni katika majimbo ya kusini magharibi, haswa New Mexico, kabla ya kuwa sehemu ya Merika.
