neg_context_src: Eagle-owl ya Eurasian ni ndege mkubwa sana, ndogo kuliko tai ya dhahabu ("Aquila chrysaetos") lakini kubwa kuliko bundi wa theluji, licha ya kuongezeka kwa ukubwa na spishi zote mbili. Wakati mwingine hujulikana kama bundi mkubwa zaidi ulimwenguni, ingawa bundi wa samaki wa Blakiston ("B. blakistoni") ni mzito kidogo kwa wastani na uzani mwepesi mkubwa wa kijivu ("Strix nebulosa") ni kidogo kwa wastani. Heimo Mikkola aliripoti vielelezo vikubwa zaidi vya tai-owl kuwa na misa ya juu ya mwili, kama bundi mkubwa wa samaki wa Blakiston na alipata urefu wa muda mrefu. Kwa upande wa uzito wa wastani na saizi ya mrengo, Blakiston ndio spishi kubwa zaidi, hata inazidi kuwa kubwa katika mambo haya kuliko jamii kubwa ya Eagle-Owl kutoka Urusi. Pia, ingawa ni fupi kuliko kubwa zaidi ya spishi za mwisho, Eagle-Owl ya Eurasian inaweza kupima zaidi ya mara mbili kama vile bundi mkubwa wa kijivu. Eagle-owl ya Eurasian kawaida ina mabawa ya, na vielelezo vikubwa zaidi vinaweza kufikia. Urefu wa spishi unaweza kutofautiana kutoka. Wanawake wanaweza kupima kutoka na wanaume wanaweza kupima. Kwa kulinganisha, bundi wa ghalani ("Tyto alba"), aina ya bundi iliyosambazwa zaidi ulimwenguni, ina uzito wa 500 g (1.1 lb) na bundi mkubwa wa pembe ("Bubo Virginianus"), ambayo inajaza niche ya mazingira ya Eagle-owl huko Amerika Kaskazini, inazunguka karibu 1.4 kg (3.1 lb).

Eagle-Owl ya Eurasian ni mwanachama wa jenasi "Bubo", ambayo inaweza kujumuisha spishi 22 au 25 za mbali. Karibu spishi zote kubwa za bundi ulimwenguni leo zinajumuishwa katika "Bubo". Kwa msingi wa rekodi kubwa ya kisukuku na usambazaji wa kati wa spishi za nje kwenye bara hilo, "Bubo" inaonekana kuwa imeibuka katika Afrika, ingawa mionzi ya mapema inaonekana tawi kutoka kusini mwa Asia pia. Genera mbili ya mali ya Scops Owls tata, Giant Scops Owls ("Otus Gurneyi") iliyopatikana Asia na "Ptilopsis" au White-uso Owl inayopatikana barani Afrika, ingawa iliwekwa wazi katika kundi la Owl la Scops, zinaonekana kushiriki tabia kadhaa na Eagle-Owls. "Strix" pia inahusiana na "bubo" na inachukuliwa kuwa "dada tata", na "pulsatrix" ikiwezekana kuwa ya kati kati ya hizo mbili. Eagle-owl ya Eurasian inaonekana kuwakilisha upanuzi wa jenasi "Bubo" katika bara la Eurasian. Aina chache za "Bubo" zinaonekana kuwa zimetokana na Eagle-Owl ya Eurasian, na kuifanya kuwa "paraspecies", au angalau wanashiriki babu wa kawaida. Eagle-owl ya Farao, iliyosambazwa katika peninsula ya Arabia na sehemu za Jangwa la Sahara kupitia Afrika Kaskazini ambapo maeneo ya mwamba hupatikana, hadi hivi karibuni ilizingatiwa kuwa sehemu ndogo ya Eagle-Owl ya Eurasian. Inatokea kwamba Eagle-Owl ya Farao hutofautiana karibu 3.8% katika DNA ya mitochondrial kutoka Eagle-Owl ya Eurasian, zamani tofauti za maumbile ya kutofautisha spishi za 1.5%. Ndogo na paler kuliko Eagle-owls ya Eurasian, Farao pia inaweza kuzingatiwa kama spishi tofauti kwa sababu ya simu yake ya juu na ya kushuka zaidi na uchunguzi kwamba Eagle-owls wa Eurasian zamani alipatikana huko Moroko ("B. B. Hispanus") inaonekana hakuzaa na yule anayeshirikiana na Pfari-eals. Badala yake, mbio bado zilipatikana pamoja na Firaoh Eagle-owl porini ("B. b. Interpositus") katika Mashariki ya Kati imepatikana ili kuzalishwa ndani Wanyama wa porini walio na tai-eagle-owl, ingawa vifaa vya genetical vimeonyesha "interpositus" yenyewe inaweza kuwa spishi tofauti kutoka kwa Eagle-owl ya Eurasian, kwani inatofautiana na uteuzi wa uteuzi wa Eagle-Owl ya Eurasian na 2.8% katika DNA ya mitochondrial. Eagle-owl ya India pia ilizingatiwa kuwa sehemu ndogo za Eagle-Owl hadi hivi karibuni, lakini saizi yake ndogo, sauti tofauti (iliyofungwa zaidi na ya juu kuliko Waurasia), na ukweli kwamba kwa kiasi kikubwa ni sawa katika usambazaji (kujaza sehemu ndogo za India) na mabamba mengine ya Eagle-owl ya Eurasi. DNA ya mitochondrial ya spishi za India pia inaonekana tofauti sana na spishi za Uropa. Cape Eagle-Owl ("B. capensis") inaonekana kuwakilisha kurudi kwa mstari huu wa maumbile ndani ya bara la Afrika, ambapo inaongoza mtindo wa maisha sawa na Kaskazini mwa Eagle-owls mbali kusini. Sehemu nyingine ya kikundi cha kaskazini cha "Bubo" ni bundi wa theluji. Inaonekana kuwa imejitenga na "bubo" zingine angalau miaka milioni 4 iliyopita.

Kwa usawa au hata zaidi kuliko bundi mkubwa mwenye pembe, tai-owl ya Eurasian ni tishio kwa aina yoyote ndogo ya raptor inayokutana nayo, iwe bundi wengine au ndege wa diurnal wa mawindo. Wote wameambiwa, zaidi ya spishi 20 za accipitrid, spishi 15 za bundi na spishi 9 za Falcon zimepatikana kati ya mawindo yao. Eagle-owl ya Eurasian ndiye mtangulizi wa msingi wa ndege wengine wa mawindo katika Eurasia, hata prolific raptor-mauaji ya kaskazini ya Goshawk ("Accipiter gentilis") ni sawa na idadi kubwa ya raptors zilizochukuliwa. Hadi 6% ya chakula cha jumla kwa idadi na 36% na prey biomass kwa Eagle-owls ya Eurasian inaweza kujumuishwa na ndege wengine wa raptorial. Mawindo ya msingi ya raptorial iliyochukuliwa na Eagle-owls huko Uropa ni spishi mbili: bundi wa muda mrefu na buzzard ya kawaida. Wote huchukuliwa kwa idadi kubwa ambayo wao huweka katika aina tano za juu za ndege zinazowindwa mara kwa mara huko Uropa. Katika Luxembourg, bundi mwenye muda mrefu na buzzard wa kawaida walikuwa wa nne na wa tano mara kwa mara waliwinda mawindo. Viwango vingine vya juu vimejumuisha bundi wa muda mrefu kuwa spishi za mawindo za nne za kawaida huko Bavaria na Buzzard kuwa aina ya tatu ya mawindo ya kawaida katika utafiti kutoka Jamhuri ya Czech. Wakati wahamia, bundi wa muda mrefu huonekana kuchagua maeneo ya kusonga kwa sehemu kulingana na ikiwa eagle-owls hugunduliwa, kwa hivyo tai-owls zina ushawishi mkubwa sana juu ya tabia ya mawindo haya. Licha ya idadi kubwa iliyochukuliwa ya yote haya, tai-owl ya uhaba zaidi haionekani kuwa na athari kubwa kwa idadi yao ya jumla, haswa ikilinganishwa na sababu za anthropogenic. Mbali na spishi hizi mbili, sehemu kubwa ya mawindo ya raptorial kwa tai-owls imeundwa na bundi zingine. Kwa kuzingatia kwamba bundi wote wa Ulaya kwa kiasi fulani usiku, wanaweza kukutwa na kuuawa baada ya kugunduliwa na Eagle-Owl wa Eurasian. Huko Ulaya, imeua kila aina nyingine ya bundi, kutoka kwa bundi mdogo wa Pygmy na bundi wa bundi mkubwa kwa bundi mkubwa wa kijivu na bundi wa theluji. Eurasian Eagle-Owl ndiye raptor pekee ambayo imekuwa ikijulikana kuwinda Owl ya theluji mara kadhaa. Walakini, tishio la Eagle-owls la Tishio linaleta kwa raptors zingine zinaweza kuzidishwa. Wakati mwingine, na idadi ya mawindo ya wanyama wa kutosha, wanaweza kiota karibu kama mita kadhaa za raptors wengine na kamwe kuwanyanyasa. Wakati wa kuweka vijiti katika miti ile ile kama buzzards zenye miguu mirefu ("Buteo rufinus") kusini mashariki mwa Bulgaria, Eagle-Owls ya Eurasian haikuweza kutabiri buzzards wakati wowote. Buzzards zenye miguu mirefu zimeuawa hata hivyo huko Kazakhstan. Hata katika visa hivyo vya mara kwa mara ambapo huchukua raptors moja au kadhaa, haziathiri idadi ya watu, isipokuwa mawindo ya raptorial tayari yamepunguzwa sana kwa sababu ya sababu nyingine (mara nyingi za kibinadamu). Kwa mfano, licha ya wote kuwa mtangulizi anayejulikana wa wote wawili, hawakukandamiza idadi kubwa ya Goshawks ya Kaskazini au Owls ya Tawny kusini mwa Ufini. Utafiti mmoja ulionyesha kuwa raptors wengi hujihusisha na uepukaji wa anga wakati wa kukutana na Eagle-owls na wakati utabiri wa tai-owls ulipungua msongamano wa idadi ya watu, mara chache walisababisha kupungua kwa kufanikiwa au kubadilika kwa makazi.

Kwa ujumla, kunaonekana kuwa na nguvu ya kushikamana kwa nguvu kati ya ndege wa mawindo na mawindo makubwa zaidi ya raptorial yaliyoshambuliwa na Eagle-Owl ya Eurasian huwa sawa na saizi yao wenyewe. Raptors kubwa, kama vile tai na vibanda, wanaonekana kuwa hawawezi kushawishiwa sana kwa tai-owls. Walakini, huko Scandinavia, kuna visa viwili vya tai-owls zinazoingia kwenye viota "vikubwa" vya tai nyeupe-tailed ("Haliaeetus albicilla"). Kwa kuzingatia saizi, uzito wa wastani wa watu wazima, na tabia mbaya ya tai hii, inawezekana kwamba vijana wa Raptors wengine wakubwa kuliko wao wenyewe wanaweza kushambuliwa. Eagles ya Imperial ya Mashariki ("Aquila Heliaca"), ambayo ni karibu kubwa kama tai nyeupe-tail kwa uzito wa wastani, wameuawa na tai-owls huko Kazakhstan. Kushangaza, kwa kuzingatia tishio kubwa ambalo tai kawaida huleta kwa tai-owl kuliko Vica versa, ilionekana tai ya dhahabu ilikuwa kati ya mabaki ya mawindo yaliyopatikana karibu na kiota katika Pyrenees ya Ufaransa. Kesi nchini Uhispania ambapo ndege kubwa, kubwa ya mawindo, shamba la Wamisri ("Neophron percnopterus") na tai ya Bonelli, ambayo ni sawa kwa ukubwa na tai-owls, zote zina uzito zaidi, zimetabiriwa, hizi zinaonekana kuchukuliwa kutoka Nest au muda mfupi baada ya uhuru na tukio la nadra. Walakini, huko Uturuki, tai-owl inaonekana ni mtangulizi wa kawaida na mzito wa Eagles ya Bonelli. Eagle-owl ya Eurasian inatabiri washiriki wakubwa wa aina nyingi za diurnal raptor genera: Goshawks ya kaskazini kutoka kwa "accipiter" genus, upland buzzards kutoka kwa "Buteo" genus na gyrfalcons ("F. rusticolus") ya "Falco" genus. Vipeperushi vikubwa zaidi, i.e. wale ambao wanaweza wastani au zaidi katika misa ya mwili, kuchukuliwa kama mawindo ni pamoja na Osprey ("Pandion Haliaetus"), Kites Nyekundu ("Milvus Milvus"), tai fupi-toed ("Circaetus gallicus"), Eagle Greater ("Clanga Clanga"). Buzzards zenye miguu-mbaya ("Buteo lagopus") na Saker Falcons ("Falco Cherrug"), katika ambayo wanawake wote ni wastani zaidi ya. Kuchukua kwa buzzards zenye miguu mibaya na bundi wa theluji lazima iwekwe kwa wahasiriwa kamili, kwani wao hua zaidi kaskazini kuliko Eagle-owls za Eurasian. Eagle-owls za Eurasian pia huwinda raptors ndogo zinazopatikana, pamoja na zile kama vile kestrels ndogo ("Falco naumanni") na Sparrowhawks ya Kijapani ("Accipiter Gularis") ambayo ina uzito chini ya. Baadhi ya hizi ni visa vya tai-owls kuua viota au watoto wachanga lakini wanaweza kupata kwa urahisi watu wazima, goshawks na falcons ya saizi yoyote.

Eagle-owl ya Eurasian ("Bubo Bubo") inaweza kuwa aina ya nguvu zaidi ya bundi, kuweza kushambulia na kuua mawindo makubwa mbali na uwezo wa bundi wengine hai. Walakini, spishi hizo ni alama zaidi kwa uwezo wake wa kuishi kwenye mawindo tofauti zaidi kuliko ndege nyingine yoyote ya ukubwa wa raptorial, ambayo, ikizingatiwa saizi yake kubwa, karibu imezuiliwa kabisa kwa tai. Aina hii inaweza kuzoea mawindo madogo ya kushangaza ambapo ndio aina pekee inayopatikana na mawindo makubwa ambapo ni mengi. Eagle-owls ya Eurasian hulisha kawaida juu ya mamalia wadogo wenye uzito au zaidi, ingawa karibu 45% ya spishi za mawindo zilizorekodiwa zina wastani wa mwili wa watu wazima wa chini ya. Kawaida 55-80% ya chakula cha tai-owls ni mamalia.

Masomo mengi ya lishe huweka uzito wa wastani wa mawindo ya tai ya Eagle-owl katika ukanda wa, kwa hivyo spishi zinafaa vizuri ndani ya sheria ya thumb ambayo mawindo mengi hayana uzito zaidi ya 20% ya uzani wa ndege wa raptorial. Ikumbukwe kwamba wastani wa uzito wa mawindo ukilinganisha na misa ya mwili wa tai-owl inaripotiwa kuwa ya wastani na isiyoelezewa kwa bundi na raptors kwa ujumla, mawindo ya wastani kwa kila utafiti mmoja ilikuwa 7.2% ya misa ya mwili wa tai. Ndege wa Raptorial wa Ulaya wanaowezekana kushambulia mawindo ya ukubwa mkubwa ikilinganishwa na wao walikuwa kite nyeusi ("Milvus wahamiaji"), ambaye mawindo yake ya wastani yalikuwa 35.7% ya uzito wake mwenyewe, na bundi wa Pygmy wa Eurasian ("Glaucidium Passerinum"), ambaye mawindo yake wastani yalikuwa 31.7% ya uzito wake. Kwa upande mwingine, wakati idadi ya sungura ilikuwa kwenye kilele chao, misa ya mawindo ya wastani nchini Uhispania inaweza kuwa angalau 55% ya mwili wa Eagle-Owls 'katika idadi hiyo ya watu. Ulinganisho wa mawindo ya raptorial ulikadiriwa kuwa uzito wa mawindo kwa tai-owls huko Uropa ulikuwa kama maana kati ya mikoa kuu 5, ya juu zaidi ya bundi yoyote lakini inafanana au nyepesi kidogo kuliko wastani wa Ulaya kwa Goshawks ya Kaskazini ("Accipiter Mataifa") na chini sana kuliko Eagles mbili za Ulaya. Kwa utafiti huo uzito wa mawindo wa wastani wa bundi mkubwa aliye na pembe katika mikoa 4 ya Amerika ya Kaskazini ilikuwa chini sana (wastani tu). Katika Scrub ya Mediterranean, mawindo ya wastani ya mamalia ya Eagle-Owl ya Eurasian yalikuwa karibu mara tano kuliko ile ya bundi kubwa kutoka kwa makazi kama hiyo huko Chile, California na Colorado, ambapo kwa pamoja chakula cha mama cha Owl kilicho na pembe. Walakini, kulinganisha kati ya eagle- na bundi wenye pembe kulingana na biomes sita kulinganishwa katika Amerika na Eurasia walipata mawindo makubwa ya bundi ya pembe, ya juu zaidi kuliko ile ya Eagle-owl. Ikiwa masomo yanayojulikana ya Asia yamechanganywa na yale ya Uropa, uzito wa mawindo wa wastani kwa Eagle-Owl kwa ujumla pia inaweza kuwa takriban. Kati ya bundi wa huruma huko Uropa, Uzito wa mawindo wa bundi wa muda mrefu ("Asio otus") ulipatikana kuwa, Owl Tawny ("Strix Aluco") alichukua mawindo yenye maana ya (ingawa ndani inaweza kuwa ya juu kama) na bundi wa muda mfupi ("ASIO flammeus") Maana ya mawindo ilikuwa. Utafiti nchini Ufini ukitaka kutofautisha tofauti za mawindo zilizochukuliwa na wanawake na tai ndogo za kiume ziligundua kuwa mawindo ya jinsia mbili yalipatikana na, mtawaliwa. Spishi zilizochukuliwa kama chakula na jinsia mbili huko zilikuwa sawa lakini kike mara nyingi walipata watu wakubwa wa mawindo.

Saizi kubwa, bulky, kujenga-umbo-umbo, tufts sikio na macho ya machungwa hutoa hii kama spishi tofauti. Mbali na morphology ya jumla, sifa zilizo hapo juu zinatofautiana kabisa na zile za aina mbili kubwa za bundi za subarctic huko Uropa na Asia ya Magharibi, ambayo ni bundi wa Grey Grey na Greyish kwa chokoleti-Brown Ural Owl ("Strix Uralensis"), zote ambazo hazina tufts za sikio na zina kichwa cha kichwa. Owl ya theluji ni dhahiri tofauti kutoka kwa tai nyingi za tai, lakini wakati wa msimu wa baridi mbio za Eagle-Owl za Palest Eagle ("B. B. Sibiricus") zinaweza kuonekana kuwa nyeupe. Walakini, mwisho bado ni tofauti ya tai-eagle-owl na haina rangi safi ya asili nyeupe na utaftaji mweusi wa spishi ndogo (ambazo zina vifurushi vidogo, vya sikio ambazo zimezingatiwa tu kuwa zimejaa kwenye hafla adimu). Bundi aliye na muda mrefu ana manyoya sawa na tai-owl lakini ni ndogo sana (wastani wa tai-owl anaweza kuwa na urefu wa mara mbili na mara kumi kuliko bundi wa wastani).

Mawindo mkubwa na hatari zaidi ya mamalia hayajashughulikiwa mara kwa mara na Eagle-Owl ya Eurasian. Karibu spishi thelathini za carnivores za mamalia zimeripotiwa katika lishe yao. Wengi wa haya ni lazima, ambayo ni aina ndogo kabisa ya carnivore lakini inaweza kujitetea kwa nguvu, hata weasel mdogo ("Mustela nivalis"). Walakini, tofauti na ndege wengine wadogo wa mawindo, Eagle-Owl ya Eurasian inaonekana haina shida kushinda weasels kadhaa na hata martens, wengine wa mwisho wanaweza kuwa sawa na uzito wao wenyewe, na watawaua vijana wa spishi kubwa kama vile Otter ("Lutra Lutra") na beji ya Eurasian ("Meles". Walakini, carnivore moja iliyoripotiwa zaidi ni Red Fox ("Vulpes Vulpes"), kama vile wamerekodiwa katika lishe kutoka Denmark na Uhispania hadi Mashariki ya Urusi Mashariki. Vielelezo vingi vya mbweha vilivyochukuliwa na tai-owls ni vijana au subadults. Uchunguzi mwingine ulisisitiza kwamba mbweha wa wastani alichukuliwa kama uzani, karibu sawa na uzito wa tai-owl, lakini vielelezo vingine vya Fox viliuawa ambavyo vilikadiriwa kuwa na uzito, kubwa zaidi kuliko ile ya Eagle. Angalau spishi zingine nne za mbweha zimethibitishwa kama mawindo katika Mashariki ya Kati na Asia. Mbwa za Raccoon ("Nyctereutes Procyonoides"), wastani, zimetapeliwa huko Asia pia. Carnivores zingine kubwa zimekuwa zikiwindwa pia, pamoja na Mongoose wa Kimisri anayevamia ("Herpestes ichneumon") nchini Uhispania na kufifia mishipa ("Paguma mabuu") nchini Uchina, wote walikuwa na ukubwa wa paka kwa wastani wa, mtawaliwa. Carnivores ya ndani ikiwa ni pamoja na paka ("Felis silvestris catus") ya ukubwa wote na mbwa wadogo ("Canis lupus jamaa") au watoto wanaweza kuwa mawindo ya Eagle-owls ya Eurasian. Paka zilizouawa zimekadiriwa kupima. Mbwa waliouawa na Bavaria-Eagle-owls walikadiriwa kuwa wastani. Carnivores zisizo za asili kama vile American Mink ("Neovison Vison") na Raccoon ("Procyon Lotor") pia wametapeliwa na Eagle-Owls, ambayo inadhaniwa kwa bahati mbaya kwa bahati mbaya Faida mawindo yaliyochukuliwa kwa idadi kubwa na hawa wachuuzi wa manyoya ambao hawajakaguliwa. Eagle-owl ya Eurasian labda ndiye bundi aliye hai ameripotiwa sana (ikiwa sio kawaida) kumuua vijana wa wasio na maana. Angalau spishi tisa zimetambuliwa kama chakula chao. Inawezekana kwamba baadhi ya ungulates huliwa kama carrion lakini spishi hii, kama bundi wengi, kawaida huua chakula chake mwenyewe, tofauti na tai nyingi ambazo hutumia carrion mara kwa mara. Miongoni mwa mawindo yasiyokuwa ya kumbukumbu ni spishi tatu za kulungu na spishi tano za vifaa vya mbuzi, pamoja na vifaru vya boar mwitu ("Sus Scrofa"). Uzito tu wa kulungu wa ROE ("Capreolus capreolus") umekadiriwa sana wakati kuchukuliwa na vielelezo vilivyouawa vimejumuisha: kulungu, mfano na hata, katika safu ndogo ya watu wazima kwa kulungu, wote ni kubwa kuliko ile ya tai wenyewe na kubwa zaidi kuliko mawindo yoyote yanayojulikana kwa bundi lingine. Katika masomo kutoka kwa Bavaria na Austria, uzito wa wastani wa kulungu wa ROE uliokamatwa ulikuwa tu, ikionyesha kulungu wachanga sana kuchukuliwa. Hata kama kuchukuliwa kama watoto wachanga, fawns au ndama, vijana wa ungulates wengine waliochukuliwa wangepima angalau, kutoka kwa uzito wa kuzaliwa wa ibex ("capra ibex") hadi ile ya kulungu nyekundu ("Cervus elaphus"). Labda kubwa zaidi, kondoo wa kawaida wa ndani ("Ovis Aries") waliochukuliwa na Eagle-Owls wanaweza kuripotiwa kuwa ni pamoja na watu "wazima".

Kama mtangulizi mwenye bahati nzuri, Eagle-Owl ya Eurasian itawinda karibu mawindo yoyote ya ukubwa unaokutana nayo. Mara nyingi wao huchukua kile mawindo huwa kawaida ndani ya kawaida na wanaweza kuchukua idadi kubwa ya spishi zinazochukuliwa kuwa hatari kwa masilahi ya kifedha ya binadamu kama panya, panya na njiwa. Eagle-owls ya Eurasian huchukua aina adimu au hatarini pia. Miongoni mwa spishi zinazochukuliwa kuwa dhaifu (hadi zilizo hatarini sana kama ilivyo kwenye mink na eel, zote mbili zilizopitishwa sana na wanadamu) kutoweka inayojulikana kuwindwa na Eagle-owls ni Desman wa Urusi ("Desmana Moschata") Pyrenean Desman ("Galeyss" Barbastel ", Barbastel", Barbastel "Barbastel", Barbastel "," . . eel ("Anguilla Anguilla") na Lumpfish ("Cyclopterus lumpus").
report_src: Eagle-owl ya Eurasian inaweza kufikia ukubwa mkubwa sana; majike ndiyo wenye ukubwa zaidi, wakikua hadi urefu wa takriban sentimita 75 (inchi 30) na mrengo ukiwa na upana wa hadi sentimita 188 (futi 6 na inchi 2), ilhali madume huwa wadogo kidogo kuliko majike [1].

question_en: How big was the SS Great Eastern?
pos_context_en: SS "Great Eastern" was an iron sailing steamship designed by Isambard Kingdom Brunel, and built by J. Scott Russell & Co. at Millwall Iron Works on the River Thames, London. She was by far the largest ship ever built at the time of her 1858 launch, and had the capacity to carry 4,000 passengers from England to Australia without refuelling. Her length of was only surpassed in 1899 by the 17,274-gross-ton RMS "Oceanic", her gross tonnage of 18,915 was only surpassed in 1901 by the 21,035-gross-ton RMS "Celtic", and her 4,000-passenger capacity was surpassed in 1913 by the 4,935-passenger SS "Imperator". The ship's five funnels were rare. These were later reduced to four.
neg_context_en:
An early example of breaking-up a structure by use of a wrecking ball, she was scrapped at New Ferry on the River Mersey by Henry Bath & Son Ltd in 1889–1890 – it took 18 months to take her apart. At the time Everton Football Club were looking for a flagpole for their Anfield ground, and consequently purchased her top mast. It still stands there today at the ground - now owned by Liverpool Football Club (formed 1892), at the Kop end. In 2011, the Channel 4 programme "Time Team" found geophysical survey evidence to suggest that residual iron parts from the ship's keel and lower structure still reside in the foreshore.
During 1859, when "Great Eastern" was off Portland conducting trials, an explosion aboard blew off one of the funnels. The funnel was salvaged and subsequently purchased by the water company supplying Weymouth and Melcombe Regis in Dorset, UK, and used as a filtering device. It was later transferred to the Bristol Maritime Museum close to Brunel's SS "Great Britain" then moved to the SS "Great Britain" museum.

"Great Eastern's" keel was laid down on 1 May 1854. The hull was an all-iron construction, a double hull of wrought iron in plates with ribs every . Internally, the hull was divided by two long, high, longitudinal bulkheads and further transverse bulkheads dividing the ship into nineteen compartments. "Great Eastern" was the first ship to incorporate the double-skinned hull, a feature which would not be seen again in a ship for several decades, but which is now compulsory for reasons of safety.

Upon "Great Eastern's" return to England, the ship was chartered by the British Government to transport troops to Quebec. 2,144 officers and men, 473 women and children, and 200 horses were embarked at Liverpool along with 40 paying passengers. The ship sailed on 25 June 1861 and went at full speed throughout most of the trip arriving at her destination 8 days and 6 hours after leaving Liverpool. "Great Eastern" stayed for a month and returned to Britain at the beginning of July with 357 paying passengers.
She was long, wide, with a draft of unloaded and fully laden, and displaced 32,000 tons fully loaded. In comparison, SS "Persia", launched in 1856, was long with a beam.

The voyage took 9 days 13 hours. "Great Eastern's" arrival in New York was virtually unnoticed due to the American Civil War, and when it was opened to the public at 25 cents a head there was little interest. 194 passengers sailed on the return journey on 25 May and 5,000 tons of wheat was also carried.

"Great Eastern" sailed from Liverpool on Tuesday 10 September 1861, commanded by Captain James Walker. On her second day out the wind increased to gale force, causing the ship to roll heavily. The port paddle wheel was completely lost, and the starboard paddle wheel smashed to pieces when one of the lifeboats broke loose. At the same time it was discovered that the cast iron rudder post, which was in diameter, had sheared off above its collar and the rudder was swinging free and hitting the screw, which was slowly breaking it up.

The launch of the ship cost £170,000, a third of Brunel's estimate for the entire vessel, and it had yet to be fitted out. It was difficult to get any more money from the Eastern Company's investors as the company was close to bankruptcy. To prevent this from happening, a new company was formed, the "Great Ship Company", with capital of £340,000. They bought the ship for £160,000, which left enough funds for fitting her out. The Eastern Company's shareholders were given the market value of their £20 shares (£2 10s) towards payment for shares in the new company and the Eastern Steam Navigation Company entered liquidation.

Brunel showed his idea to John Scott Russell, an experienced naval architect and ship builder whom he had first met at the Great Exhibition. Scott Russell examined Brunel's plan and made his own calculations as to the ship's feasibility. He calculated that it would have a displacement of 20,000 tons and would require to achieve , but believed it was possible. At Scott Russell's suggestion, they approached the directors of the Eastern Steam Navigation Company.

The Docks brought with them many associated industries, such as flour and sugar processing, and also ship building. On 31 January 1858 the largest ship of that time, the SS "Great Eastern" designed by Isambard Kingdom Brunel, was launched from the yard of Messrs Scott, Russell & Co, of Millwall. The length was too big for the river so the ship had to be launched sideways. Due to the technical difficulties of the launch this was the last big ship to be built on the Island and the industry fell into a decline. However, parts of the launching slipway and plate works have been preserved in situ and may be seen close to Masthouse Terrace Pier.
question_src: SS ilikuwa kubwa sana?
pos_context_src: SS "Mkuu wa Mashariki" ilikuwa mvuke ya meli ya chuma iliyoundwa na Isambard Kingdom Brunel, na iliyojengwa na J. Scott Russell & Co huko Millwall Iron Works kwenye Mto Thames, London. Alikuwa meli kubwa kabisa iliyowahi kujengwa wakati wa uzinduzi wake wa 1858, na alikuwa na uwezo wa kubeba abiria 4,000 kutoka England kwenda Australia bila kuongeza nguvu. Urefu wake ulizidi tu mnamo 1899 na 17,274-Gross-tani RMS "Oceanic", jumla yake ya 18,915 ilizidi mnamo 1901 na 21,035-Gross-tani "Celtic", na uwezo wake wa 4,000 ulizidi mnamo 1913 na 4,933-SS "." Funi tano za meli zilikuwa nadra. Hizi baadaye zilipunguzwa hadi nne.
neg_context_src:
Mfano wa mapema wa kuvunja muundo kwa kutumia mpira uliovunjika, alipigwa kwenye Ferry mpya kwenye Mto Mersey na Henry Bath & Son Ltd mnamo 1889-1890-ilichukua miezi 18 kumtenga. Wakati huo Klabu ya Soka ya Everton walikuwa wakitafuta bendera kwa uwanja wao wa Anfield, na kwa hivyo akanunua mlingoti wake wa juu. Bado iko pale leo ardhini - sasa inamilikiwa na Klabu ya Soka ya Liverpool (iliyoundwa 1892), mwishoni mwa Kop. Mnamo mwaka wa 2011, mpango wa Channel 4 "Timu ya Time" ulipata ushahidi wa uchunguzi wa jiografia kupendekeza kwamba sehemu za madini ya mabaki kutoka kwa keel ya meli na muundo wa chini bado unakaa kwenye uwanja wa mbele.
Wakati wa 1859, wakati "Great East" ilikuwa nje ya Portland ikifanya majaribio, mlipuko ndani ulipiga moja ya vifurushi. Funeli hiyo iliokolewa na baadaye kununuliwa na kampuni ya maji inayosambaza Weymouth na Melcombe Regis huko Dorset, Uingereza, na kutumika kama kifaa cha kuchuja. Ilihamishiwa baadaye kwenye Jumba la Makumbusho la Maritime ya Bristol karibu na Brunel's SS "Great Britain" kisha ikahamia kwenye Jumba la kumbukumbu la SS "Great Britain".

"Great Eastern's" keel iliwekwa mnamo 1 Mei 1854. Sehemu hiyo ilikuwa ujenzi wa chuma, sehemu mbili ya chuma iliyotengenezwa kwa sahani zilizo na mbavu kila. Kwa ndani, kitovu kiligawanywa na vichwa viwili virefu, vya juu, vya muda mrefu na vichwa vikuu zaidi vya kugawanya meli hiyo katika sehemu kumi na tisa. "Mkuu wa Mashariki" ilikuwa meli ya kwanza kuingiza kitovu cha ngozi mbili, kipengele ambacho hakingeonekana tena katika meli kwa miongo kadhaa, lakini ambayo sasa ni ya lazima kwa sababu za usalama.

Baada ya kurudi Uingereza "Mkuu wa Mashariki", meli hiyo iliandaliwa na Serikali ya Uingereza kusafirisha askari kwenda Quebec. Maafisa 2,144 na wanaume, wanawake na watoto 473, na farasi 200 walianzishwa Liverpool pamoja na abiria 40 wanaolipa. Meli hiyo ilisafiri mnamo tarehe 25 Juni 1861 na kwenda kwa kasi kamili wakati wote wa safari iliyofika kwenye marudio yake siku 8 na masaa 6 baada ya kuacha Liverpool. "Mkuu wa Mashariki" alikaa kwa mwezi mmoja na akarudi Uingereza mwanzoni mwa Julai na abiria 357 wanaolipa.
Alikuwa mrefu, pana, na rasimu ya kupakuliwa na kujaa kikamilifu, na kutengwa kwa tani 32,000 zilizojaa kikamilifu. Kwa kulinganisha, SS "Uajemi", iliyozinduliwa mnamo 1856, ilikuwa ndefu na boriti.

Safari ilichukua siku 9 masaa 13. Kufika kwa "Mkuu wa Mashariki" huko New York hakuonekana kwa sababu ya Vita vya wenyewe kwa wenyewe vya Amerika, na wakati ilifunguliwa kwa umma kwa senti 25 kichwa kulikuwa na riba kidogo. Abiria 194 walisafiri kwa safari ya kurudi mnamo Mei 25 na tani 5,000 za ngano pia ilibebwa.

"Mkuu wa Mashariki" alisafiri kutoka Liverpool mnamo Jumanne 10 Septemba 1861, iliyoamriwa na Kapteni James Walker. Siku yake ya pili nje ya upepo iliongezeka hadi kwa nguvu ya gale, na kusababisha meli kusonga sana. Gurudumu la Port Paddle lilipotea kabisa, na gurudumu la paddle ya Starboard likagonga vipande vipande wakati moja ya boti za maisha zilivunjika. Wakati huo huo iligundulika kuwa chapisho la chuma la kutupwa, ambalo lilikuwa na kipenyo, lilikuwa limetengwa juu ya kola yake na ukingo ulikuwa ukisogelea huru na kupiga screw, ambayo ilikuwa ikivunja polepole.

Uzinduzi wa meli uligharimu pauni 170,000, theluthi ya makisio ya Brunel kwa chombo chote, na ilikuwa bado haijafungwa. Ilikuwa ngumu kupata pesa zaidi kutoka kwa wawekezaji wa Kampuni ya Mashariki kwani kampuni hiyo ilikuwa karibu na kufilisika. Ili kuzuia hili kutokea, kampuni mpya iliundwa, "kampuni kubwa ya meli", na mtaji wa Pauni 340,000. Walinunua meli hiyo kwa Pauni 160,000, ambayo iliacha pesa za kutosha kwa kumfaa. Wanahisa wa Kampuni ya Mashariki walipewa bei ya soko la hisa zao za Pauni 20 (£ 2 10s) kuelekea malipo kwa hisa katika kampuni mpya na Kampuni ya Mashariki ya Steam Navigation iliingia kufutwa.

Brunel alionyesha wazo lake kwa John Scott Russell, mbunifu wa majini mwenye uzoefu na mjenzi wa meli ambaye alikuwa amekutana naye kwa mara ya kwanza kwenye maonyesho makubwa. Scott Russell alichunguza mpango wa Brunel na kufanya mahesabu yake mwenyewe juu ya uwezekano wa meli. Alihesabu kwamba itakuwa na uhamishaji wa tani 20,000 na ingehitaji kufikia, lakini aliamini inawezekana. Kwa maoni ya Scott Russell, walikaribia wakurugenzi wa Kampuni ya Mashariki ya Mashariki.

Doksi zilileta viwanda vingi vinavyohusika, kama vile unga na usindikaji wa sukari, na pia ujenzi wa meli. Mnamo tarehe 31 Januari 1858 meli kubwa zaidi ya wakati huo, SS "Great Mashariki" iliyoundwa na Isambard Kingdom Brunel, ilizinduliwa kutoka uwanja wa Messrs Scott, Russell & Co, wa Millwall. Urefu ulikuwa mkubwa sana kwa mto kwa hivyo meli ilibidi izinduliwe kando. Kwa sababu ya ugumu wa kiufundi wa uzinduzi huu ndio ulikuwa meli kubwa ya mwisho kujengwa kwenye kisiwa hicho na tasnia ilipungua. Walakini, sehemu za uzinduzi wa kazi na kazi za sahani zimehifadhiwa katika hali na zinaweza kuonekana karibu na masthouse Terrace Pier.
report_src: Ndiyo, SS "Mkuu wa Mashariki" kweli ilikuwa kubwa sana: wakati ilipozinduliwa mwaka 1858 ndiyo meli kubwa zaidi kuwahi kujengwa duniani, ikiwa na uzito wa jumla wa tani 18,915 na uwezo wa kubeba abiria 4,000 safari ndefu kutoka England hadi Australia bila kuongeza makaa au nguvu nyingine, rekodi zilizodumu hadi mwishoni mwa karne ya 19 na mapema karne ya 20 kabla ya kupitwa na RMS "Oceanic" (1899) na “Celtic” (1901) kwa tani, na SS nyingine mwaka 1913 kwa idadi ya abiria [1].

question_en: Who plays Booth?
pos_context_en: In 1959, the actor Robert McQueeney played Booth in the episode "The Man Who Loved Lincoln" on the ABC/Warner Brothers western television series, "Colt .45", starring Wayde Preston as the fictitious undercover agent Christopher Colt, who in the story line is assigned to protect Booth from a death threat.
neg_context_en: William Booth (9 May 1886 – 1963) was an English professional football centre half who played in the Football League for Sheffield United. He made 369 appearances for Brighton & Hove Albion and was a member of the team that won the 1909–10 Southern League First Division title and the 1910 FA Charity Shield. Booth was a non-playing reserve for England in February 1913.

Edwin Thomas Booth (November 13, 1833 – June 7, 1893) was an American actor who toured throughout the United States and the major capitals of Europe, performing Shakespearean plays. In 1869, he founded Booth's Theatre in New York. Some theatrical historians consider him the greatest American actor, and the greatest Prince Hamlet, of the 19th century. His achievements are often overshadowed by his relationship with his brother, actor John Wilkes Booth, who assassinated President Abraham Lincoln.

From 1985 to 1986, Booth appeared as pub landlord Ted Pilkington in the short-lived ITV soap "Albion Market". He starred in the 1998 short film "The Duke", playing an elderly man who tells his adoring grandson that he is John Wayne. In 2001, Booth appeared in several episodes of "Family Affairs" playing Barry Hurst, Sadie Hargreaves' brother-in-law. He played a tramp named Nobby Stuart in a special two-hander episode of "EastEnders".

Central to the identity of Booth's theatre was the stage background of Edwin Booth, who belonged to the Booth Family dynasty, which ruled the American stage in the 19th century. It was actually touring with his father, Junius Brutus Booth, that gave Edwin his first break, first appearing as Tressel in Richard II in Boston in 1849. After his father's death in 1852 Booth toured internationally, visiting Australia and Hawaii and briefly settling in California before returning to East Coast. Edwin is perhaps best known for his "hundred nights of Hamlet" in which he played Hamlet for 101 consecutive performances, a record held until 1922. Booth is also known for his relationship with his infamous brother, John Wilkes, who assassinated President Abraham Lincoln. After the tragedy, Edwin publicly disowned his brother.

Issac Ramoun Booth (born May 23, 1971) is a former American professional football player who played three seasons in the National Football League with the Cleveland Browns and Baltimore Ravens. Booth was drafted by the Browns in the fifth round of the 1994 NFL Draft and played cornerback for the Browns for the 1994 and 1995 seasons, earning one start in each of his first two seasons. After the 1995 season the original Cleveland Browns relocated to Baltimore, Maryland and became the Baltimore Ravens. Booth played his final season with the Ravens playing in 11 games and earning a career high three starts. Booth retired from football after the 1996 season. During his brief career, Booth played in 36 games, earning five starts, 55 tackles, two interceptions and one forced fumble.

John "Jack" Booth (birth unknown) is an English former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1940s and 1950s. He played at representative level for Yorkshire, and at club level for Wakefield Trinity (Heritage № 557), as a , or , i.e. number 8 or 10, or, 11 or 12.

Booth gained national renown in England with his performance in the title role of "Richard III" in 1817 at the Covent Garden Theatre. Critics compared his performances favorably with those of Edmund Kean, who was at the time the foremost tragedian in Britain. Partisans of the two actors, called Boothites and Keanites, would occasionally start rows at venues where the two were playing together. This did not stop the two from performing in the same plays; Kean and Booth acted in several Shakespearean productions at the Drury Lane Theatre from 1817 to 1821. Kean then saw Booth as a threat and orchestrated a way for the two of them to perform those roles yet again, planning to outperform his opponent. Kean’s long-standing presence contributed to Booth’s neverending comparisons to his rival.

Since 2006, Booth has been married to Sonia Bonneventia Pule, former Miss South Africa first princess and international model whom he met in 2002. They have two sons, Nathan Katlego, and Noah Neo. Booth saved a woman from being beaten on Cape Town's nightclub strip on Long Street early on a Saturday morning. Booth had been playing for Wits in an Absa Premiership game against Ajax Cape Town, which they lost 1–0, hosted at Cape Town Stadium on the previous Friday night. After using an ATM and walking back to his friends, he saw a man assaulting the woman and rushed to her assistance. The attacker shoved Booth, who toppled onto a store’s window ledge which had spikes to prevent people sitting on the ledge. Members of the Central City Improvement District took the attacker away. Booth returned to his hotel where the team doctor attended to his injuries.
question_src: Nani anacheza kibanda?
pos_context_src: Mnamo 1959, muigizaji Robert McQueeney alicheza kibanda katika sehemu ya "Mtu ambaye alimpenda Lincoln" kwenye safu ya televisheni ya ABC/Warner Western, "Colt .45", nyota wa Wayde Preston kama wakala wa uwongo Christopher Colt, ambaye katika safu ya hadithi amepewa kulinda Booth kutokana na tishio la kifo.
neg_context_src: William Booth (9 Mei 1886 - 1963) alikuwa kituo cha mpira wa miguu kitaalam wa Kiingereza ambaye alicheza kwenye Ligi ya Mpira wa miguu kwa Sheffield United. Alijitokeza 369 kwa Brighton & Hove Albion na alikuwa mwanachama wa timu hiyo ambayo ilishinda taji la kwanza la Idara ya Kwanza ya Ligi ya Kusini na 1910 FA Charity Shield. Booth ilikuwa hifadhi isiyo ya kucheza kwa England mnamo Februari 1913.

Edwin Thomas Booth (Novemba 13, 1833 - Juni 7, 1893) alikuwa muigizaji wa Amerika ambaye aligundua Amerika yote na miji mikuu ya Uropa, akicheza michezo ya Shakespearean. Mnamo 1869, alianzisha ukumbi wa michezo wa Booth huko New York. Wanahistoria wengine wa maonyesho wanamchukulia kama muigizaji mkubwa wa Amerika, na mkuu mkubwa wa Hamlet, wa karne ya 19. Mafanikio yake mara nyingi hufunikwa na uhusiano wake na kaka yake, muigizaji John Wilkes Booth, ambaye alimuua Rais Abraham Lincoln.

Kuanzia 1985 hadi 1986, Booth alionekana kama mmiliki wa nyumba ya Pub Ted Pilkington katika Soko la ITV la muda mfupi "Soko la Albion". Alipata nyota katika filamu fupi ya 1998 "The Duke", akicheza mzee ambaye anamwambia mjukuu wake wa kuabudu kuwa yeye ni John Wayne. Mnamo 2001, Booth alionekana katika vipindi kadhaa vya "Masuala ya Familia" akicheza Barry Hurst, mkwe wa Sadie Hargreave. Alicheza tramp inayoitwa Nobby Stuart katika sehemu maalum ya mikono miwili ya "EastEnders".

Katikati ya utambulisho wa ukumbi wa michezo wa Booth ilikuwa hatua ya msingi ya Edwin Booth, ambaye alikuwa wa nasaba ya familia ya Booth, ambayo ilitawala hatua ya Amerika katika karne ya 19. Kwa kweli ilikuwa ikitembelea na baba yake, Junius Brutus Booth, ambayo ilimpa Edwin mapumziko yake ya kwanza, alionekana kwanza kama Tressel huko Richard II huko Boston mnamo 1849. Baada ya kifo cha baba yake mnamo 1852 Booth alitembea kimataifa, akitembelea Australia na Hawaii na kutulia kwa muda mfupi huko California kabla ya kurudi Pwani ya Mashariki. Edwin labda anajulikana zaidi kwa "Usiku wa Mamia ya Hamlet" ambayo alicheza Hamlet kwa maonyesho 101 mfululizo, rekodi iliyofanyika hadi 1922. Booth pia anajulikana kwa uhusiano wake na kaka yake mbaya, John Wilkes, ambaye alimuua Rais Abraham Lincoln. Baada ya janga hilo, Edwin alimkataa kaka yake.

Issac Ramoun Booth (amezaliwa Mei 23, 1971) ni mchezaji wa zamani wa mpira wa miguu wa Amerika ambaye alicheza misimu mitatu kwenye Ligi ya Soka ya Kitaifa na Cleveland Brown na Baltimore Ravens. Booth aliandaliwa na Brows katika raundi ya tano ya Rasimu ya NFL ya 1994 na kucheza kona ya Brows kwa misimu ya 1994 na 1995, akipata mwanzo mmoja katika kila msimu wake wa kwanza. Baada ya msimu wa 1995 Cleveland Brown wa asili alihamia Baltimore, Maryland na kuwa Baltimore Ravens. Booth alicheza msimu wake wa mwisho na The Ravens akicheza katika michezo 11 na kupata kazi ya juu tatu. Booth alistaafu kutoka mpira wa miguu baada ya msimu wa 1996. Wakati wa kazi yake fupi, Booth alicheza katika michezo 36, akipata kuanza tano, vifijo 55, mikutano miwili na moja iliyolazimishwa.

John "Jack" Booth (kuzaliwa haijulikani) ni mchezaji wa zamani wa Ligi ya Mtaalam wa Rugby wa Kiingereza ambaye alicheza miaka ya 1940 na 1950. Alicheza katika kiwango cha mwakilishi kwa Yorkshire, na katika kiwango cha kilabu cha Wakefield Utatu (Urithi № 557), kama, au, i.e. namba 8 au 10, au, 11 au 12.

Booth alipata mashuhuri nchini Uingereza na utendaji wake katika jukumu la "Richard III" mnamo 1817 katika ukumbi wa michezo wa Covent Garden. Wakosoaji walilinganisha maonyesho yake vyema na yale ya Edmund Kean, ambaye wakati huo alikuwa mpatanishi wa kwanza huko Uingereza. Washiriki wa watendaji hao wawili, wanaoitwa Boothites na Keanites, wakati mwingine wangeanza safu kwenye kumbi ambapo wawili hao walikuwa wakicheza pamoja. Hii haikuzuia wawili hao kufanya katika mechi zile zile; Kean na Booth walitenda katika uzalishaji kadhaa wa Shakespearean katika The Drury Lane Theatre kutoka 1817 hadi 1821. Kean basi aliona Booth kama tishio na akapanga njia kwa wote wawili kutekeleza majukumu hayo tena, akipanga kumpitisha mpinzani wake. Uwepo wa muda mrefu wa Kean ulichangia kulinganisha kwa Booth na mpinzani wake.

Tangu 2006, Booth ameolewa na Sonia Bonneventia Pule, wa zamani wa Miss Afrika Kusini wa kwanza na mfano wa kimataifa ambaye alikutana naye mnamo 2002. Wana watoto wawili, Nathan Katlego, na Noah Neo. Booth aliokoa mwanamke kutokana na kupigwa kwenye strip ya uwanja wa usiku wa Cape Town huko Long Street mapema Jumamosi asubuhi. Booth alikuwa akicheza kwa WITS katika mchezo wa Absa Premier dhidi ya Ajax Cape Town, ambayo walipoteza 1-0, mwenyeji kwenye Uwanja wa Cape Town Ijumaa iliyopita. Baada ya kutumia ATM na kurudi kwa marafiki zake, aliona mtu akimshambulia yule mwanamke na akamkimbilia. Mshambuliaji alishtua kibanda, ambaye aliingia kwenye daraja la duka la duka ambalo lilikuwa na spikes kuzuia watu wamekaa kwenye daraja. Wajumbe wa Wilaya ya Uboreshaji wa Jiji kuu walimchukua mshambuliaji huyo. Booth alirudi katika hoteli yake ambapo daktari wa timu alihudhuria majeraha yake.

question_en: Where was Jonathan Swift born?
pos_context_en: Jonathan Swift was born on 30 November 1667 in Dublin, Ireland. He was the second child and only son of Jonathan Swift (1640–1667) and his wife Abigail Erick (or Herrick) of Frisby on the Wreake. His father was a native of Goodrich, Herefordshire, but he accompanied his brothers to Ireland to seek their fortunes in law after their Royalist father's estate was brought to ruin during the English Civil War. His maternal grandfather, James Ericke, was the vicar of Thornton, England. In 1634 the vicar was convicted of Puritan practices. Some time thereafter, Ericke and his family, including his young daughter Abilgail, fled to Ireland.
neg_context_en:
Born of English parents in Ireland, Jonathan Swift was working as Sir William Temple's secretary at the time he composed "A Tale of a Tub" (1694–1697). The publication of the work coincided with Swift's striking out on his own, having despaired of getting a good "living" from Temple or Temple's influence. There is speculation about what caused the rift between Swift and his employer, but, as A. C. Elias persuasively argues, it seems that the final straw came with Swift's work on Temple's "Letters." Swift had been engaged to translate Temple's French correspondence, but Temple, or someone close to Temple, edited the French text to make Temple seem both prescient and more fluent. Consequently, the letters and the translations Swift provided did not gibe, and, since Swift could not accuse Temple of falsifying his letters, and because the public would never believe that the retired state minister had lied, Swift came across as incompetent.
Even though Swift published the "Tale" as he left Temple's service, it was conceived earlier, and the book is a salvo in one of Temple's battles. Swift's general polemic concerns an argument (the "Quarrel of the Ancients and the Moderns") that had been over for nearly ten years by the time the book was published. The "Quarrel of the Ancients and Moderns" was a French academic debate of the early 1690s, occasioned by Fontenelle arguing that modern scholarship had allowed modern man to surpass the ancients in knowledge. Temple argued against this position in his "On Ancient and Modern Learning" (where he provided the first English formulation of the commonplace that modern critics see more only because they are dwarves standing on the shoulders of giants), and Temple's somewhat naive essay prompted a small flurry of responses. Among others, two men who took the side opposing Temple were Richard Bentley (classicist and editor) and William Wotton (critic).

The legend of Swift's silver mine is based on accounts given in the journal of an Englishman named Jonathan Swift. Swift claimed to have preceded Daniel Boone into Kentucky, coming to the region in 1760 on a series of mining expeditions. The journal recounts how a wounded bear led Swift to a vein of silver ore in a cave, and how that for the next nine years, he made annual treks back to the site of the mine, carrying out "silver bars and minted coins." An article in an 1886 edition of "Harper's Magazine" tells how Swift supposedly buried a good deal of the treasure at various locations:

Swift was studying for his master's degree when political troubles in Ireland surrounding the Glorious Revolution forced him to leave for England in 1688, where his mother helped him get a position as secretary and personal assistant of Sir William Temple at Moor Park, Farnham. Temple was an English diplomat who arranged the Triple Alliance of 1668. He had retired from public service to his country estate to tend his gardens and write his memoirs. Gaining his employer's confidence, Swift "was often trusted with matters of great importance". Within three years of their acquaintance, Temple had introduced his secretary to William III and sent him to London to urge the King to consent to a bill for triennial Parliaments.

Swift had residence in Trim, County Meath, after 1700. He wrote many of his works during this time period. In February 1702, Swift received his Doctor of Divinity degree from Trinity College, Dublin. That spring he travelled to England and then returned to Ireland in October, accompanied by Esther Johnson—now 20—and his friend Rebecca Dingley, another member of William Temple's household. There is a great mystery and controversy over Swift's relationship with Esther Johnson, nicknamed "Stella". Many, notably his close friend Thomas Sheridan, believed that they were secretly married in 1716; others, like Swift's housekeeper Mrs Brent and Rebecca Dingley (who lived with Stella all through her years in Ireland) dismissed the story as absurd. Swift certainly did not wish her to marry anyone else: in 1704, when their mutual friend William Tisdall informed Swift that he intended to propose to Stella, Swift wrote to him to dissuade him from the idea. Although the tone of the letter was courteous, Swift privately expressed his disgust for Tisdall as an "interloper", and they were estranged for many years.

At the age of one, child Jonathan was taken by his wet nurse to her hometown of Whitehaven, Cumberland, England. He said that there he learned to read the Bible. His nurse returned him to his mother, still in Ireland, when he was three.

Born in Dundalk, Swift was educated at a Christian Brothers School. His father ran a co-operative bakery but this closed and the family endured poverty. In 1914, Swift began an apprenticeship at a bakery in Dublin, and spent much of his spare time attending meetings where Jim Larkin was speaking. He briefly joined the Irish Volunteers, but took time out following an accident, and decided not to rejoin due to Larkin's opposition to the organisation.

Swift was born on Nantucket Island, the son of Foster Swift and his wife, Deborah. At the age of six, he saw George Washington on Boston Common, an experience that made an indelible impression on him.
In 1792, the Swifts moved to Taunton, Massachusetts, where Joseph became the student of Reverend Samuel Daggat, who prepared him to enter Harvard College. Swift had read accounts of the American Revolution in his father’s diary and heard stories from a family friend, Major General David Cobb. With Cobb’s advice and assistance, Swift was appointed by President John Adams on May 12, 1800 as a cadet of artillerists and engineers. He reported for duty a month later at Newport Harbor.

Swift took up his residence at Moor Park where he met Esther Johnson, then eight years old, the daughter of an impoverished widow who acted as companion to Temple's sister Lady Giffard. Swift was her tutor and mentor, giving her the nickname "Stella", and the two maintained a close but ambiguous relationship for the rest of Esther's life.

Swift was born on 7 June 1874 at Hardshaw Hall, Lancashire to Thomas Swift and his second wife Emily. The male members of the family were mostly lawyers - Thomas Swift was a solicitor, three of his sons also became solicitors, his brother was a registrar and his cousin, Sir John Rigby was a barrister and later judge. After John Rigby became a King's Counsel in 1880, Thomas Swift switched paths and became a barrister. He specialised in criminal work, and served as counsel in the trial of Florence Maybrick. His career change had a great impact on the family - they moved from Lancashire to Liverpool (where Thomas Swift's Chambers were) and Rigby Swift was undoubtedly influenced by his father's career when it came to choosing one of his own.
question_src: Jonathan Swift alizaliwa wapi?
pos_context_src: Jonathan Swift alizaliwa mnamo 30 Novemba 1667 huko Dublin, Ireland. Alikuwa mtoto wa pili na mtoto wa pekee wa Jonathan Swift (1640-1667) na mkewe Abigail Erick (au Herrick) wa Frisby kwenye Wreake. Baba yake alikuwa mzaliwa wa Goodrich, Herefordshire, lakini aliongozana na ndugu zake kwenda Ireland kutafuta utajiri wao katika sheria baada ya mali ya baba yao wa kifalme kufikishwa wakati wa Vita vya wenyewe kwa wenyewe vya Kiingereza. Babu yake mama, James Ericke, alikuwa msaidizi wa Thornton, England. Mnamo 1634 Vicar alihukumiwa kwa mazoea ya Wapuritan. Wakati fulani baadaye, Ericke na familia yake, pamoja na binti yake mchanga Abilgail, walikimbilia Ireland.
neg_context_src:
Mzaliwa wa wazazi wa Kiingereza huko Ireland, Jonathan Swift alikuwa akifanya kazi kama katibu wa Sir William Temple wakati huo aliunda "Tale ya Tub" (1694-161697). Uchapishaji wa kazi hiyo uliambatana na Swift akijigonga peke yake, akiwa na tamaa ya kupata "kuishi" nzuri kutoka kwa ushawishi wa Hekaluni au Hekaluni. Kuna uvumi juu ya nini kilisababisha ugomvi kati ya Swift na mwajiri wake, lakini, kama A. C. Elias anashangaza, inaonekana kwamba majani ya mwisho yalikuja na kazi ya Swift kwenye "Barua" za Hekaluni. Swift alikuwa ameshirikiana kutafsiri mawasiliano ya Ufaransa ya Hekaluni, lakini hekalu, au mtu aliye karibu na hekalu, alihariri maandishi ya Ufaransa ili kufanya hekalu ionekane ya kitabia na ya ufasaha zaidi. Kwa hivyo, barua na tafsiri Swift zilizotolewa hazikufanya, na, kwa kuwa Swift hakuweza kushtaki Hekaluni kwa kuiba barua zake, na kwa sababu umma hautawahi kuamini kwamba waziri wa serikali aliyestaafu alikuwa amesema uwongo, Swift aligundua kuwa hana uwezo.
Hata ingawa Swift alichapisha "hadithi" wakati alipoacha huduma ya Hekalu, ilichukuliwa mapema, na kitabu hicho ni salvo katika moja ya vita vya Hekaluni. Polemic ya jumla ya Swift inahusu hoja ("ugomvi wa watu wa zamani na wa kisasa") ambayo ilikuwa imekwisha kwa karibu miaka kumi na wakati kitabu kilichapishwa. "Ugomvi wa watu wa zamani na wa kisasa" ulikuwa mjadala wa kitaaluma wa Ufaransa wa miaka ya 1690, ulisababisha Fontenelle akisema kwamba usomi wa kisasa ulimruhusu mwanadamu wa kisasa kuzidi wazee katika maarifa. Hekalu liligombana dhidi ya msimamo huu katika "juu ya ujifunzaji wake wa zamani na wa kisasa" (ambapo alitoa muundo wa kwanza wa Kiingereza wa mahali pa kawaida kwamba wakosoaji wa kisasa wanaona tu kwa sababu ni vibanda vilivyosimama juu ya mabega ya makubwa), na insha ya Hekalu isiyo na maana ilisababisha majibu madogo. Kati ya wengine, watu wawili ambao walichukua upande wa kupinga hekalu walikuwa Richard Bentley (mtaalam na mhariri) na William Wotton (mkosoaji).

Hadithi ya Mgodi wa Fedha wa Swift ni msingi wa akaunti zilizopewa katika Jarida la Mwingereza anayeitwa Jonathan Swift. Swift alidai kuwa alimtangulia Daniel Boone ndani ya Kentucky, akija katika mkoa huo mnamo 1760 juu ya safu ya safari za madini. Jarida linasimulia jinsi dubu aliyejeruhiwa aliongoza haraka kwa mshipa wa fedha kwenye pango, na jinsi hiyo kwa miaka tisa ijayo, alifanya safari za kila mwaka kurudi kwenye tovuti ya mgodi, akifanya "baa za fedha na sarafu zilizowekwa." Nakala katika toleo la 1886 la "Jarida la Harper" linaelezea jinsi Swift alivyokuwa akizika mpango mzuri wa hazina katika maeneo mbali mbali:

Swift alikuwa akisoma kwa digrii ya bwana wake wakati shida za kisiasa huko Ireland zinazozunguka mapinduzi ya utukufu zilimlazimisha kuondoka kwenda Uingereza mnamo 1688, ambapo mama yake alimsaidia kupata msimamo kama katibu na msaidizi wa kibinafsi wa Sir William Temple huko Moor Park, Farnham. Hekalu alikuwa mwanadiplomasia wa Kiingereza ambaye alipanga Alliance Triple ya 1668. Alikuwa amestaafu kutoka kwa huduma ya umma kwenda kwa mali yake ya nchi ili kuchukua bustani zake na kuandika kumbukumbu zake. Kupata ujasiri wa mwajiri wake, Swift "mara nyingi aliaminiwa na mambo ya umuhimu mkubwa". Ndani ya miaka mitatu ya marafiki wao, Temple alikuwa amemtambulisha katibu wake kwa William III na kumpeleka London kumhimiza mfalme akubali muswada wa wabunge wa tatu.

Swift alikuwa na makazi huko Trim, Kaunti ya Meath, baada ya 1700. Aliandika kazi zake nyingi wakati huu wa kipindi. Mnamo Februari 1702, Swift alipokea Daktari wake wa Shahada ya Uungu kutoka Chuo cha Utatu, Dublin. Hiyo chemchemi alisafiri kwenda Uingereza na kisha akarudi Ireland mnamo Oktoba, akifuatana na Esther Johnson - sasa 20 - na rafiki yake Rebecca Dingley, mwanachama mwingine wa kaya ya William Temple. Kuna siri kubwa na ubishani juu ya uhusiano wa Swift na Esther Johnson, jina lake "Stella". Wengi, haswa rafiki yake wa karibu Thomas Sheridan, aliamini kwamba walikuwa wameolewa kwa siri mnamo 1716; Wengine, kama mfanyikazi wa nyumba wa Swift Bi Brent na Rebecca Dingley (ambaye alikuwa akiishi na Stella kwa miaka yote huko Ireland) walitupilia mbali hadithi hiyo kama upuuzi. Kwa kweli Swift hakutamani aolewe na mtu mwingine yeyote: mnamo 1704, wakati rafiki yao wa pande zote William Tisdall alimjulisha Swift kwamba alikusudia kupendekeza Stella, Swift alimwandikia ili kumzuia kutoka kwa wazo hilo. Ingawa sauti ya barua hiyo ilikuwa nzuri, Swift alionyesha uchukizo wake kwa Tisdall kama "mwingiliano", na walitengwa kwa miaka mingi.

Katika umri wa moja, mtoto Jonathan alichukuliwa na muuguzi wake wa mvua katika mji wake wa Whitehaven, Cumberland, England. Alisema kuwa hapo alijifunza kusoma Bibilia. Muuguzi wake alimrudisha kwa mama yake, bado yuko Ireland, alipokuwa na miaka mitatu.

Mzaliwa wa Dundalk, Swift alielimishwa katika shule ya Christian Brothers. Baba yake aliendesha mkate wa kushirikiana lakini hii ilifungwa na familia ilivumilia umaskini. Mnamo 1914, Swift alianza mazoezi katika mkate huko Dublin, na alitumia wakati wake mwingi wa kuhudhuria mikutano ambapo Jim Larkin alikuwa akizungumza. Alijiunga kwa ufupi wa kujitolea wa Ireland, lakini alichukua muda kufuatia ajali, na aliamua kutojiunga tena kutokana na kupinga kwa Larkin kwa shirika.

Swift alizaliwa kwenye Kisiwa cha Nantucket, mtoto wa Foster Swift na mkewe, Deborah. Katika umri wa miaka sita, alimuona George Washington kwenye Boston Common, uzoefu ambao ulimwonyesha.
Mnamo 1792, Swifts walihamia Taunton, Massachusetts, ambapo Joseph alikua mwanafunzi wa Mchungaji Samuel Daggat, ambaye alimuandaa kuingia Chuo cha Harvard. Swift alikuwa amesoma akaunti za Mapinduzi ya Amerika katika kitabu cha baba yake na kusikia hadithi kutoka kwa rafiki wa familia, Meja Jenerali David Cobb. Kwa ushauri na msaada wa Cobb, Swift aliteuliwa na Rais John Adams mnamo Mei 12, 1800 kama cadet ya sanaa na wahandisi. Aliripoti kwa kazi mwezi mmoja baadaye katika Bandari ya Newport.

Swift alikaa makazi yake huko Moor Park ambapo alikutana na Esther Johnson, wakati huo alikuwa na umri wa miaka nane, binti ya mjane masikini ambaye alifanya kama rafiki wa dada wa Hekaluni Lady Giffard. Swift alikuwa mkufunzi wake na mshauri, akimpa jina la utani "Stella", na wawili hao walidumisha uhusiano wa karibu lakini wenye utata kwa maisha yote ya Esta.

Swift alizaliwa mnamo 7 Juni 1874 huko Hardshaw Hall, Lancashire kwa Thomas Swift na mkewe wa pili Emily. Washiriki wa kiume wa familia hiyo walikuwa mawakili wengi - Thomas Swift alikuwa wakili, watatu wa wanawe pia wakawa wakili, kaka yake alikuwa msajili na binamu yake, Sir John Rigby alikuwa mjumbe na baadaye jaji. Baada ya John Rigby kuwa shauri la Mfalme mnamo 1880, Thomas Swift alibadilisha njia na kuwa barrister. Alifanya utaalam katika kazi ya jinai, na aliwahi kuwa shauri katika kesi ya Florence Maybrick. Mabadiliko yake ya kazi yalikuwa na athari kubwa kwa familia - walihama kutoka Lancashire kwenda Liverpool (ambapo vyumba vya Thomas Swift walikuwa) na Rigby Swift bila shaka alishawishiwa na kazi ya baba yake wakati wa kuchagua mmoja wake.
report_src: Jonathan Swift alizaliwa mjini Dublin, Ireland, tarehe 30 Novemba 1667 [1].

question_en: How many countries are part of the Commonwealth?
pos_context_en: The Commonwealth Youth Programme, also known as CYP, is an international development agency working with young people between the ages of 15 and 29. Part of the Commonwealth Secretariat, CYP is active in the Commonwealth's 54 member countries. CYP has a head office in London with four centres in Africa, Lusaka, Zambia, Asia Chandigarh, India, Caribbean Georgetown, Guyana and Pacific Honiara, Solomon Islands. Currently there are Four Regional Directors and 16 programme officers plus support staff are working there.
neg_context_title_en: Foreign relations of the United Kingdom
neg_context_en: Commonwealth countries share many links outside government, with over a hundred Commonwealth-wide non-governmental organisations, notably for sport, culture, education, law and charity. The Association of Commonwealth Universities is an important vehicle for academic links, particularly through scholarships, principally the Commonwealth Scholarship, for students to study in universities in other Commonwealth countries. There are also many non-official associations that bring together individuals who work within the spheres of law and government, such as the Commonwealth Lawyers Association and the Commonwealth Parliamentary Association.

The Commonwealth Games are overseen by the Commonwealth Games Federation (CGF), which also controls the sporting programme and selects the host cities. The games movement consists of international sports federations (IFs), (CGAs), and organising committees for each specific Commonwealth Games. There are several rituals and symbols, such as the Commonwealth Games flag and Queen's Baton, as well as the opening and closing ceremonies. Over 5,000 athletes compete at the Commonwealth Games in more than 15 different sports and more than 250 events. The first, second, and third-place finishers in each event receive Commonwealth Games medals: gold, silver, and bronze, respectively. Apart from many Olympic sports, the games also include some sports which are played predominantly in Commonwealth countries but which are not part of the Olympic programme, such as lawn bowls, netball and squash.

By 1949, the British Commonwealth was a group of eight countries, each having George VI as king. India, however, desired to become a republic, but not depart the Commonwealth by doing so. This was accommodated by the creation of the title "Head of the Commonwealth" for the King and India became a republic in 1950. Subsequently, many other nations including Pakistan, Sri Lanka, Malaysia and Singapore ceased to recognise the monarch of the United Kingdom as their respective head of state, but as members of the Commonwealth of Nations recognised the British monarch as Head of the Commonwealth.

In 2009, to mark the 60th anniversary of the founding of the Commonwealth, the Royal Commonwealth Society commissioned a poll of public opinion in seven of the member states: Australia, Canada, India, Jamaica, Malaysia, South Africa and the United Kingdom. It found that most people in these countries were largely ignorant of the Commonwealth's activities, aside from the Commonwealth Games, and indifferent toward its future. Support for the Commonwealth was twice as high in developing countries as in developed countries; it was lowest in Britain.

Due to their shared constitutional histories, several countries in the Commonwealth have similar legal and political systems. The Commonwealth requires its members to be functioning democracies that respect human rights and the rule of law. Most Commonwealth countries have the bicameral Westminster system of parliamentary democracy. The Commonwealth Parliamentary Association facilitates co-operation between legislatures across the Commonwealth, and the Commonwealth Local Government Forum promotes good governance amongst local government officials. Most Commonwealth members use common law, modelled on English law. The Judicial Committee of the Privy Council is the supreme court of 14 Commonwealth members.

Wales is one of six countries to have competed in every Commonwealth Games since 1930, the others being Australia, Canada, England, New Zealand and Scotland. The Commonwealth Games is the only major sporting event where Wales takes part as a separate entity, apart from the Six Nations Rugby Championship Rugby World Cup and international association football competitions, as in other events, such as the Olympic Games, they compete under the banner of the United Kingdom.

In the 2016 Brexit referendum 52% of those who voted supported "Brexit", and the government started negotiating to leave the European Union in 2019.
The UK has varied relationships with the countries that make up the Commonwealth of Nations which originated from the British Empire. Elizabeth II of the United Kingdom is Head of the Commonwealth and is Queen of 16 of its 53 member states. Those that retain the Queen as head of state are called Commonwealth realms. Over time several countries have been suspended from the Commonwealth for various reasons. Zimbabwe was suspended because of the authoritarian rule of its President and so too was Pakistan, but it has since returned. Countries which become republics are still eligible for membership of the Commonwealth so long as they are deemed democratic. Commonwealth nations such as Malaysia enjoyed no export duties in trade with the UK before the UK concentrated its economic relationship with EU member states.

Commonwealth countries are major stakeholders in the process and success of the Doha Development Agenda. Together the Commonwealth’s 53 member countries account for 30 per cent of the world’s population and about 25 per cent of its international trade and investment. Commonwealth countries account for 40 per cent of WTO membership. CBC’s trade development objectives include encouraging
trade facilitation and further liberalisation of services; encouraging developing countries to play an active role in the World Trade Organization, and in new trade rounds, by maximising their negotiating strength through cooperative action.

The Association of Commonwealth Universities (ACU) was established in 1913, and has over 500 member institutions in over 50 countries across the Commonwealth. It is the world’s oldest international network of universities and its mission is to promote and support excellence in higher education for the benefit of individuals and societies throughout the commonwealth and beyond. While it is the oldest university network, it represents the future – it has a combined population of 3 billion, mainly under the age of 30, in Commonwealth countries.
question_src: Je! Ni sehemu ngapi za Jumuiya ya Madola?
pos_context_title_src: Programu ya Vijana ya Jumuiya ya Madola
pos_context_src: Programu ya Vijana ya Jumuiya ya Madola, pia inajulikana kama CYP, ni shirika la maendeleo la kimataifa linalofanya kazi na vijana wenye umri wa kati ya miaka 15 na 29. Sehemu ya Sekretarieti ya Jumuiya ya Madola, CYP inafanya kazi katika nchi wanachama wa Jumuiya ya Madola. CYP ina ofisi kuu huko London na vituo vinne barani Afrika, Lusaka, Zambia, Asia Chandigarh, India, Georgetown ya Karibi, Guyana na Pacific Honiara, Visiwa vya Solomon. Hivi sasa kuna wakurugenzi wanne wa mkoa na maafisa wa programu 16 pamoja na wafanyikazi wa msaada wanafanya kazi huko.
neg_context_title_src: Wales kwenye Michezo ya Jumuiya ya Madola
Baraza la Biashara la Jumuiya ya Madola
Chama cha Vyuo Vikuu vya Jumuiya ya Madola
neg_context_src: Nchi za Jumuiya ya Madola hushiriki viungo vingi nje ya serikali, na zaidi ya mashirika ya Jumuiya ya Jumuiya ya Jumuiya ya Madola, haswa kwa michezo, utamaduni, elimu, sheria na misaada. Chama cha Vyuo Vikuu vya Jumuiya ya Madola ni gari muhimu kwa viungo vya kitaaluma, haswa kupitia masomo, haswa Scholarship ya Jumuiya ya Madola, kwa wanafunzi kusoma katika vyuo vikuu katika nchi zingine za Jumuiya ya Madola. Kuna pia vyama vingi visivyo vya rasmi ambavyo vinakusanya pamoja watu ambao hufanya kazi ndani ya nyanja za sheria na serikali, kama vile Chama cha Wanasheria wa Jumuiya ya Madola na Chama cha Bunge la Jumuiya ya Madola.

Michezo ya Jumuiya ya Madola inasimamiwa na Shirikisho la Michezo ya Jumuiya ya Madola (CGF), ambayo pia inadhibiti mpango wa michezo na huchagua miji ya mwenyeji. Harakati za Michezo zina mashirika ya kimataifa ya michezo (IFS), (CGAS), na kamati za kuandaa kwa kila michezo maalum ya Jumuiya ya Madola. Kuna mila na alama kadhaa, kama bendera ya Michezo ya Jumuiya ya Madola na Baton ya Malkia, na pia sherehe za ufunguzi na za kufunga. Zaidi ya wanariadha 5,000 wanashindana katika Michezo ya Jumuiya ya Madola katika michezo zaidi ya 15 tofauti na matukio zaidi ya 250. Watengenezaji wa kwanza, wa pili, na wa tatu katika kila hafla hupokea medali za Michezo ya Jumuiya ya Madola: Dhahabu, Fedha, na Bronze, mtawaliwa. Mbali na michezo mingi ya Olimpiki, michezo hiyo pia ni pamoja na michezo kadhaa ambayo inachezwa sana katika nchi za Jumuiya ya Madola lakini ambayo sio sehemu ya mpango wa Olimpiki, kama vile bakuli za lawn, mpira wa miguu na boga.

Kufikia 1949, Jumuiya ya Madola ya Uingereza ilikuwa kundi la nchi nane, kila mmoja alikuwa na George VI kama mfalme. India, hata hivyo, ilitamani kuwa jamhuri, lakini sio kuondoka katika Jumuiya ya Madola kwa kufanya hivyo. Hii iliwekwa na uundaji wa kichwa "Mkuu wa Jumuiya ya Madola" kwa Mfalme na India ikawa Jamhuri mnamo 1950. Baadaye, mataifa mengine mengi ikiwa ni pamoja na Pakistan, Sri Lanka, Malaysia na Singapore waliacha kutambua Mfalme wa Uingereza kama mkuu wao wa serikali, lakini kama washiriki wa Jumuiya ya Jumuiya ya kawaida.

Mnamo mwaka wa 2009, kuashiria kumbukumbu ya miaka 60 ya kuanzishwa kwa Jumuiya ya Madola, Jumuiya ya Royal ya Jumuiya ya Madola iliagiza kura ya maoni ya umma katika nchi saba za wanachama: Australia, Canada, India, Jamaica, Malaysia, Afrika Kusini na Uingereza. Iligundua kuwa watu wengi katika nchi hizi walikuwa hawajui sana shughuli za Jumuiya ya Madola, kando na Michezo ya Jumuiya ya Madola, na hawajali siku zijazo. Msaada kwa Jumuiya ya Madola ulikuwa juu mara mbili katika nchi zinazoendelea kama ilivyo katika nchi zilizoendelea; Ilikuwa chini kabisa nchini Uingereza.

Kwa sababu ya historia yao ya kikatiba iliyoshirikiwa, nchi kadhaa katika Jumuiya ya Madola zina mifumo kama hiyo ya kisheria na kisiasa. Jumuiya ya Madola inahitaji washiriki wake kufanya kazi za demokrasia ambazo zinaheshimu haki za binadamu na sheria ya sheria. Nchi nyingi za Jumuiya ya Madola zina mfumo wa bicameral Westminster wa demokrasia ya bunge. Jumuiya ya Wabunge wa Jumuiya ya Madola inawezesha ushirikiano kati ya wabunge katika Jumuiya ya Madola, na Jukwaa la Serikali za Mitaa za Jumuiya ya Madola linakuza utawala bora kati ya viongozi wa serikali za mitaa. Washirika wengi wa Jumuiya ya Madola hutumia sheria za kawaida, zilizowekwa kwenye sheria za Kiingereza. Kamati ya Mahakama ya Baraza la Ushuru ni Mahakama Kuu ya Wajumbe 14 wa Jumuiya ya Madola.

Wales ni moja wapo ya nchi sita kushindana katika kila Michezo ya Jumuiya ya Madola tangu 1930, zingine kuwa Australia, Canada, England, New Zealand na Scotland. Michezo ya Jumuiya ya Madola ndio hafla kuu ya michezo ambapo Wales inashiriki kama chombo tofauti, mbali na Mashindano ya Mashindano ya Rugby ya Rugby ya Kombe la Dunia na mashindano ya mpira wa miguu ya kimataifa, kama katika hafla zingine, kama Michezo ya Olimpiki, wanashindana chini ya bendera ya Uingereza.

Katika kura ya maoni ya Brexit 52% ya wale waliopiga kura waliunga mkono "Brexit", na serikali ilianza kujadili kuondoka Jumuiya ya Ulaya mnamo 2019.
Uingereza ina uhusiano tofauti na nchi ambazo zinaunda Jumuiya ya Madola ya Mataifa ambayo ilitoka kwa Dola ya Uingereza. Elizabeth II wa Uingereza ni mkuu wa Jumuiya ya Madola na ni Malkia wa nchi 16 za wanachama wake 53. Wale ambao huhifadhi malkia kama mkuu wa nchi huitwa Realms ya Jumuiya ya Madola. Kwa wakati nchi kadhaa zimesimamishwa kutoka Jumuiya ya Madola kwa sababu tofauti. Zimbabwe ilisitishwa kwa sababu ya sheria ya kimabavu ya rais wake na hivyo pia Pakistan, lakini imerudi. Nchi ambazo zinakuwa jamhuri bado zinastahili ushirika wa Jumuiya ya Madola muda mrefu kama zinavyodhaniwa kuwa za Kidemokrasia. Mataifa ya Jumuiya ya Madola kama vile Malaysia hayakufurahia kazi za kuuza nje katika biashara na Uingereza kabla ya Uingereza kujilimbikizia uhusiano wake wa kiuchumi na nchi wanachama wa EU.

Nchi za Jumuiya ya Madola ni wadau wakuu katika mchakato na mafanikio ya ajenda ya maendeleo ya Doha. Pamoja nchi wanachama wa Jumuiya ya Madola 53 huchukua asilimia 30 ya idadi ya watu ulimwenguni na karibu asilimia 25 ya biashara yake ya kimataifa na uwekezaji. Nchi za Jumuiya ya Madola zina asilimia 40 ya ushirika wa WTO. Malengo ya maendeleo ya biashara ya CBC ni pamoja na kutia moyo
uwezeshaji wa biashara na huria zaidi ya huduma; Kuhimiza nchi zinazoendelea kuchukua jukumu kubwa katika Shirika la Biashara Ulimwenguni, na katika raundi mpya za biashara, kwa kuongeza nguvu zao za kujadili kupitia hatua za ushirika.

Jumuiya ya Vyuo Vikuu vya Jumuiya ya Madola (ACU) ilianzishwa mnamo 1913, na ina taasisi zaidi ya 500 katika nchi zaidi ya 50 katika Jumuiya ya Madola. Ni mtandao wa zamani zaidi wa kimataifa wa vyuo vikuu na dhamira yake ni kukuza na kuunga mkono ubora katika elimu ya juu kwa faida ya watu na jamii katika Jumuiya ya Madola na zaidi. Wakati ni mtandao wa kongwe wa chuo kikuu, inawakilisha siku za usoni - ina idadi ya pamoja ya bilioni 3, haswa chini ya umri wa miaka 30, katika nchi za Jumuiya ya Madola.

question_en: When was Zylom Studios founded?
pos_context_en: Zylom was founded in Eindhoven, the Netherlands, in 2001. Due to the success of the company it expanded fast and just a couple of years later in 2006, it was acquired by the American RealNetworks Inc.. In 2011, RealNetworks came up with one name for all their game websites, GameHouse. Zylom became part of GameHouse too, but because of the popular and well-known name of the company, it stayed Zylom for their consumers. In 2012 Zylom’s in-house game studio was closed, but Zylom still continues to develop their own game titles like the "Delicious" series.
neg_context_en:
The nine founders of Zylom had a hard time making the website profitable in the first years. Releasing Deluxe games, advertisements, and a change of target audience was the answer. In the beginning, Zylom mainly focused on online games for young men, until extensive research revealed their games were mostly played by women. The company decided to change their target audience and focused more and more on download games that were suitable for female players. Nowadays Zylom is strongly related to www.gamehouse.com, www.realnetworks.com, and www.atrativa.com.br
Type: Subsidiary
Founded: 2001 (Eindhoven)
Headquarters: Eindhoven, the Netherlands
Industry: Casual Games/Casual Online/Video Games Developer/Publisher/Distributor
Employees: 50 – 70
Website: www.zylom.com

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.

The factory was founded on 2nd August 1916 as the Moscow Automotive Society or AMO (). The factory was completed in 1917, just before the Revolution, and was built south of Moscow near Moscow River in Tjufeleva grove. It was a modern building with the latest in American equipment and was designed to employ 6,000 workers. The plans were to produce Fiat F-15 1.5-ton trucks under license. Because of the October Revolution and the subsequent Russian Civil War it took until 1st November 1924 to produce the first vehicle which was shown at a parade in 7th of November, the AMO-F15. Nevertheless the factory sill managed to assemble trucks bought from Italy in 1917-1919. In April 30 1923 the factory was named after an Italian coummunist Pietro Ferrero, but in 1925 was renamed to First National Automobile Factory (Russian: 1-й Государственный автомобильный завод). 2 years later in 1927 Ivan Likhachov was appointed as a head of the factory, a person whose name the factory bears from 1956. In April 1929, it was agreed on to expand the plant to build Autocar 2.5-ton truck models.

Tortoiseshell wares were first mentioned by Thomas Whieldon in his "Account and Memorandum Book" of 1749. In his "Experiment Book", Josiah Wedgwood states that in 1759 tortoiseshell ware was the second most important ware at the Whieldon factory, but the market was declining:“[…] But as no improvement had been made in this branch for several years, the country was grown weary of it; and though the price had been lowered from time to time, in order to increase the sale, the expedient did not answer, and something new was wanted, to give a little spirit to the business."Historically, tortoiseshell wares have come to be associated almost exclusively with Thomas Whieldon, however, ceramics expert Pat Halfpenny warns that:“The ‘Whieldon’ label has inhibited scholarly research and limited our understanding of the pottery production dates in North Staffordshire.”In his 1991 study of William Greatbatch, David Barker also concluded:"Many of the wares manufactured by Whieldon are of types now known to have been made by Greatbatch and have been found on the Greatbatch site. Whieldon ware, or Whieldon-type ware are terms which are widely accepted in describing a variety of ceramics, particularly tortoiseshell wares, but which lead to problems in any objective research into the pottery of the period."In the absence of any supporting information, caution is therefore needed in ascribing any particular tortoiseshell wares to Thomas Whieldon.

From May 1973 to September 1974, Abdelghani Bousta lived in hiding. During this time, he realised the mistakes made when the March 1973 events were organised. In 1975, he wrote a critical analysis of UNFP on behalf of the Option Révolutionnaire (Revolutionary option) movement, harshly criticising the events and the leaders: “[…] the March 1973 events helped shed light on the internal contradictions of the Party and show the true nature of its leaders: putschist and adventurous leaders who did not see any problem in sacrificing dozens of activists in a hazardous battle.”
question_src: Zylom Studios ilianzishwa lini?
pos_context_src: Zylom ilianzishwa huko Eindhoven, Uholanzi, mnamo 2001. Kwa sababu ya mafanikio ya kampuni iliongezeka haraka na miaka michache tu baadaye mnamo 2006, ilipatikana na American Realnetworks Inc .. Mnamo mwaka wa 2011, Realnetworks ilikuja na jina moja kwa tovuti zao zote za mchezo, Gamehouse. Zylom ikawa sehemu ya Gamehouse pia, lakini kwa sababu ya jina maarufu na linalojulikana la kampuni hiyo, ilikaa Zylom kwa watumiaji wao. Mnamo mwaka wa 2012 studio ya mchezo wa ndani wa Zylom ilifungwa, lakini Zylom bado inaendelea kukuza majina yao ya mchezo kama safu ya "Ladha".
neg_context_title_src: Mpango wa hatua ya nishati endelevu ya Seoul
neg_context_src:
Waanzilishi tisa wa Zylom walikuwa na wakati mgumu kuifanya wavuti hiyo kuwa na faida katika miaka ya kwanza. Kutoa michezo ya Deluxe, matangazo, na mabadiliko ya watazamaji walengwa ilikuwa jibu. Hapo mwanzo, Zylom ililenga sana kwenye michezo ya mkondoni kwa vijana, hadi utafiti wa kina ulifunua michezo yao ilichezwa sana na wanawake. Kampuni iliamua kubadilisha watazamaji wao na kulenga zaidi na zaidi kwenye michezo ya kupakua ambayo ilikuwa inafaa kwa wachezaji wa kike. Siku hizi Zylom inahusiana sana na www.gamehouse.com, www.realnetworks.com, na www.atrativa.com.br

Winfield Toll Bridge, pia inajulikana kama Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, ni kihistoria wa kihistoria wa Cantilever Warren Truss Bridge iliyoko Winfield na Red House, Kaunti ya Putnam, West Virginia. Ilijengwa mnamo 1955, na inachukua Mto wa Kanawha, iliyobeba West Virginia Route 34. Cantilever kupitia-truss ina nafasi mbili za nanga kila futi 245 kwa urefu na urefu wa futi 462 kwa urefu kati ya mistari ya kituo cha pier. Span kuu ina futi mbili 128, inchi 4, mikono ya cantilever na miguu 205, inchi 4, iliyosimamishwa.

Kiwanda kilianzishwa mnamo 2 Agosti 1916 kama Jumuiya ya Magari ya Moscow au AMO (). Kiwanda kilikamilishwa mnamo 1917, kabla tu ya Mapinduzi, na ilijengwa kusini mwa Moscow karibu na Mto wa Moscow huko Tjufeleva Grove. Ilikuwa jengo la kisasa na la hivi karibuni katika vifaa vya Amerika na ilibuniwa kuajiri wafanyikazi 6,000. Mipango hiyo ilikuwa ya kutengeneza malori ya Fiat F-15 1.5-tani chini ya leseni. Kwa sababu ya Mapinduzi ya Oktoba na vita vya wenyewe kwa wenyewe vya Urusi ilichukua hadi 1 Novemba 1924 kutengeneza gari la kwanza ambalo lilionyeshwa kwenye gwaride mnamo 7 Novemba, AMO-F15. Walakini kiwanda hicho kilifanikiwa kukusanya malori yaliyonunuliwa kutoka Italia mnamo 1917-1919. Mnamo Aprili 30 1923 kiwanda hicho kilipewa jina la mtu wa Italia Pietro Ferrero, lakini mnamo 1925 alipewa jina la kwanza la Kiwanda cha Kitaifa cha Magari (Kirusi: 1-й государственнный автомобильный завод). Miaka 2 baadaye mnamo 1927 Ivan Likhachov aliteuliwa kama mkuu wa kiwanda hicho, mtu ambaye jina lake kiwanda huzaa kutoka 1956. Mnamo Aprili 1929, ilikubaliwa kupanua mmea huo kujenga mifano ya lori ya tani 2.5.

Tepe za Tortoiseshell zilitajwa kwa mara ya kwanza na Thomas Whieldon katika kitabu chake cha "Akaunti na Memorandum" ya 1749. Katika "kitabu chake cha majaribio", Yosia Wedgwood anasema kwamba mnamo 1759 Tortoiseshell Ware ilikuwa ya pili muhimu zaidi katika eneo hili la Whieldon, lakini soko lilikuwa likipungua: " Imeshushwa mara kwa mara, ili kuongeza uuzaji, anayefaa hakujibu, na kitu kipya kilihitajika, kutoa roho kidogo kwa biashara. "Kwa kihistoria, bidhaa za Tortoiseshell zimekuwa zikihusishwa karibu na Thomas Whieldon, hata hivyo, mtaalam wa kauri Pat. 1991 Utafiti wa William Greatbatch, David Barker pia alihitimisha: "bidhaa nyingi zilizotengenezwa na Whieldon ni za aina ambazo zinajulikana kuwa zimetengenezwa na GreatBatch na zimepatikana kwenye tovuti ya GreatBatch. Whieldon ware, au whieldon-aina ya ware ni kwa njia ambayo inakubaliwa sana katika kutafakari kwa njia yoyote. Kukosekana kwa habari yoyote inayounga mkono, tahadhari inahitajika katika kuainisha bidhaa yoyote ya Tortoiseshell kwa Thomas Whieldon.

Kuanzia Mei 1973 hadi Septemba 1974, Abdelghani Bousta aliishi mafichoni. Wakati huu, aligundua makosa yaliyofanywa wakati matukio ya Machi 1973 yalipangwa. Mnamo 1975, aliandika uchambuzi muhimu wa UNFP kwa niaba ya chaguo RévolutionNaire (Chaguo la Mapinduzi), akikosoa vikali matukio na viongozi: "[…] Matukio ya Machi 1973 yalisaidia kutoa mwanga juu ya utata wa ndani wa chama hicho na kuonyesha hali ya kweli ya viongozi wake: Viongozi wa Adsonates.
