question_en: How did The New Edition Story fair with ratings?
pos_context_en: "The New Edition Story" has garnered positive reviews from critics. On Metacritic, the series holds a score of 76 out of 100. It currently has a 100% rating, with an average score of 7.2/10 on Rotten Tomatoes, along with the consensus being, ""The New Edition Story" colorfully showcases its subjects with honesty and clarity while offering an entertainingly paced overview that leaves room for plenty of the group's greatest hits". The film received rave reviews for the child actors who portrayed younger versions of New Edition in the first part of the series. Sylvia Obell of Buzzfeed praised the casting as "absolute perfection" and rated it an A+. Obell compared the film to another iconic television miniseries -- "it is on its way to being the best black TV biopic since """ which aired on ABC in 1992. The most talked about similarities is the uncanny "jawdropping" striking resemblance of the young Bobby Brown, portrayed by Tyler Marcel Williams, who nailed the looks, demeanor and Bobby's most iconic "body roll". Also another uncanny resemblance were of the vocals of the young Ralph Tresvant, portrayed by Jahi Di'Allo Winston. For viewers, hearing his first lead solo appearance in the film singing "Candy Girl" gave chills for nailing every note. Trey Mangum of Blavity said that BET "outdid" themselves, saying "With the warm reception and open arms that the world received The New Edition Story with, it's clear that this story needed to be told, and this was the perfect time." Mangum complimented the "spot-on" casting of both the young and adult casts, as well as the fact both casts recorded their own vocals, a rarity for musical biopics.
neg_context_en: By the late 1990s, as its similarly formatted syndicated competitors had already begun waning in the ratings, the program tweaked its format in an effort to retain viewers. While its focus continued to revolve partly around entertainment and crime stories, it also began phasing in additional hard news content (consisting of select major headlines of given warranty and other notable general news and legal-related stories) as well as lifestyle and human interest features. In the late 2000s, as video sharing websites such as YouTube came into prominence, "Inside Edition" began incorporating viral videos in most broadcasts, either those in relating to a news story covered in that day's edition or, more commonly, humorous or amazing videos (including clever marriage proposals, people and animals displaying interesting talents or stunts, active military personnel returning home from duty surprising family members and practical jokes); videos of the latter type are typically included in the "D" block which closes each broadcast.

The show's early ratings proved disappointing, resulting in several cast re-shuffles that saw most of the original characters written out of the series, and new actors brought in, including Stephen Whittaker, Gerard Sont, Danielle Fairclough, Ciri Thompson, Kevin J. Wilson, Abigail, Lynda Stoner and Patsy Stephen. Attempts to boost the ratings saw an increase in sex and nudity, including storylines involving bondage and lesbianism. These sexual elements provoked considerable controversy, with some TV watchdogs attacking "Chances" as "teleporn". The program's storylines also became increasingly bizarre and fantasy-oriented, with new stories involving the Asian Triads, ghosts, an angel on a Harley Davidson motorcycle, an Egyptian Sun Goddess, laser-wielding vampires, man-eating plants, and neo-Nazis hunting valuable Third Reich artifacts (in Melbourne, bizarrely). "The Age" noted that "Chances" became "notorious" because of these elements. These changes provoked much discussion and comment within the press and the public; however, they did not lead to a strong increase in ratings. Because of its "camp" elements, "Chances" did gain a small but devoted audience.

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.

So if consumers want the Dodger channel, they’ll need to subscribe to us to get it.”

From May 1973 to September 1974, Abdelghani Bousta lived in hiding. During this time, he realised the mistakes made when the March 1973 events were organised. In 1975, he wrote a critical analysis of UNFP on behalf of the Option Révolutionnaire (Revolutionary option) movement, harshly criticising the events and the leaders: “[…] the March 1973 events helped shed light on the internal contradictions of the Party and show the true nature of its leaders: putschist and adventurous leaders who did not see any problem in sacrificing dozens of activists in a hazardous battle.”
question_src: Je! Hadithi mpya ya toleo mpya ilikuwa na makadirio?
pos_context_src: "Hadithi mpya ya Toleo" imepata hakiki nzuri kutoka kwa wakosoaji. Kwenye Metacritic, safu hiyo inashikilia alama ya 76 kati ya 100. Kwa sasa ina kiwango cha 100%, na alama ya wastani ya 7.2/10 kwenye Nyanya iliyooza, pamoja na makubaliano kuwa, "" Hadithi mpya ya Toleo "inaonyesha kwa rangi ya masomo yake kwa uaminifu na uwazi wakati unapeana burudani ya vikundi. Filamu ilipokea hakiki za rave kwa watendaji wa watoto ambao walionyesha matoleo madogo ya toleo jipya katika sehemu ya kwanza ya safu. Sylvia Obell wa Buzzfeed alisifu utaftaji kama "ukamilifu kabisa" na akakadiri A+. Obell alilinganisha filamu hiyo na huduma nyingine za runinga za runinga - "Iko njiani kuwa bora zaidi ya Televisheni nyeusi tangu" "" ambayo ilirushwa kwenye ABC mnamo 1992. Kilichoongea zaidi juu ya kufanana ni yule ambaye "Jawdropping" anafanana na Bobby Brown. Pia sura nyingine isiyo ya kawaida ilikuwa ya sauti ya kijana Ralph Tresvant, aliyeonyeshwa na Jahi Di'allo Winston. Kwa watazamaji, kusikia muonekano wake wa kwanza wa solo kwenye filamu akiimba "Msichana wa Pipi" alitoa baridi kwa kushinikiza kila barua. Trey Mangum wa Blavity alisema kwamba bet "outdid" wenyewe, akisema "na mapokezi ya joto na mikono wazi ambayo ulimwengu ulipokea hadithi mpya ya toleo na, ni wazi kwamba hadithi hii inahitajika kuambiwa, na huu ulikuwa wakati mzuri." Mangum alipongeza utaftaji wa "doa-on" wa watoto wachanga na watu wazima, na vile vile ukweli wote ulirekodi sauti zao, rarity kwa biopics ya muziki.
neg_context_src: Mwisho wa miaka ya 1990, kama washindani wake waliowekwa sawa walikuwa tayari wameanza kupungua katika makadirio, mpango huo uliunganisha muundo wake katika juhudi za kuhifadhi watazamaji. Wakati umakini wake uliendelea kugeukia hadithi za burudani na uhalifu, pia ilianza kupeana habari za ziada za habari ngumu (iliyojumuisha vichwa vikuu vya udhamini uliopeanwa na habari zingine zinazojulikana na hadithi zinazohusiana na kisheria) na mtindo wa maisha na sifa za wanadamu. Mwishoni mwa miaka ya 2000, kama tovuti za kushiriki video kama vile YouTube zilivyokua, "Ndani Toleo" lilianza kuingiza video za virusi kwenye matangazo mengi, ama zile zinazohusiana na hadithi ya habari iliyofunikwa katika toleo la siku hiyo au, video za kawaida au za kushangaza (pamoja na wanajeshi wanaofanya kazi kwa wanajeshi, wanajeshi wanaofanya kazi kwa wanajeshi, wanajeshi wanaofanya mazoezi ya wanajeshi, wanajeshi wanaofanya kazi kwa wanajeshi, wanajeshi wanaofanya kazi kwa wanajeshi; Video za aina ya mwisho kawaida hujumuishwa kwenye block ya "D" ambayo hufunga kila matangazo.

Vipimo vya mapema vya onyesho vilionyesha kukatisha tamaa, na kusababisha mashaka kadhaa ambayo yaliona wahusika wengi wa asili wameandikwa nje ya safu hiyo, na watendaji wapya walileta, pamoja na Stephen Whittaker, Gerard Sont, Danielle Fairclough, Ciri Thompson, Kevin J. Wilson, Abigail, Lynda Stoner na Patsy Stephen. Jaribio la kuongeza makadirio yaliona kuongezeka kwa ngono na uchi, pamoja na hadithi za hadithi zinazojumuisha utumwa na ujamaa. Vitu hivi vya ngono vilisababisha ubishani mkubwa, na walinzi wengine wa TV wakishambulia "nafasi" kama "teleper". Hadithi za programu hiyo pia zilizidi kuwa za kushangaza na zenye mwelekeo wa kupendeza, na hadithi mpya zinazohusisha Triads za Asia, vizuka, malaika kwenye pikipiki ya Harley Davidson, mungu wa jua wa Misri, vampires za laser, mimea inayotumia mwanadamu, na neo-Nazis huntiting wa tatu. "Umri" ulibaini kuwa "nafasi" zikawa "sifa mbaya" kwa sababu ya mambo haya. Mabadiliko haya yalisababisha majadiliano mengi na maoni ndani ya vyombo vya habari na umma; Walakini, hawakusababisha ongezeko kubwa la makadirio. Kwa sababu ya vitu vyake vya "kambi", "nafasi" zilipata hadhira ndogo lakini iliyojitolea.

Katika toleo la Ripoti ya Ubora wa Huduma ya Afya ya California 2010, Aetna alipokea nyota 3 kati ya 4 katika kukutana na viwango vya kitaifa vya utunzaji na jinsi wanachama wanavyopima HMO yao, kwa rating ya "nzuri" (nje ya "masikini," "haki," "nzuri," au "bora").

Winfield Toll Bridge, pia inajulikana kama Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, ni kihistoria wa kihistoria wa Cantilever Warren Truss Bridge iliyoko Winfield na Red House, Kaunti ya Putnam, West Virginia. Ilijengwa mnamo 1955, na inachukua Mto wa Kanawha, iliyobeba West Virginia Route 34. Cantilever kupitia-truss ina nafasi mbili za nanga kila futi 245 kwa urefu na urefu wa futi 462 kwa urefu kati ya mistari ya kituo cha pier. Span kuu ina futi mbili 128, inchi 4, mikono ya cantilever na miguu 205, inchi 4, iliyosimamishwa.

question_en: How large is Lake Michigan?
pos_context_en: Lake Michigan has a surface area of 22,404 sq.mi (58,026 km); (13,237 square miles, 34,284 km lying in Michigan state, 7,358 square miles, 19,056 km in Wisconsin, 234 square miles, 606 km in Indiana, & 1,576 square miles, 4,079 km in Illinois) making it the largest lake entirely within one country by surface area (Lake Baikal, in Russia, is larger by water volume), and the fifth-largest lake in the world. It is the larger half of Lake Michigan–Huron, which is the largest body of fresh water in the world by surface area. It is long by wide with a shoreline long. The lake's average depth is 46 fathoms 3 feet (279 ft; 85 m), while its greatest depth is 153 fathoms 5 feet (923 ft; 281 m). It contains a volume of 1,180 cubic miles (4,918 km³) of water. Green Bay in the northwest is its largest bay. Grand Traverse Bay in its northeast is another large bay. Lake Michigan's deepest region, which lies in its northern-half, is called Chippewa Basin (named after prehistoric Lake Chippewa) and is separated from South Chippewa Basin, by a relatively shallower area called the Mid Lake Plateau.
neg_context_en:
Twelve million people live along Lake Michigan's shores, mainly in the Chicago and Milwaukee metropolitan areas. The economy of many communities in northern Michigan and Door County, Wisconsin is supported by tourism, with large seasonal populations attracted by the beauty and recreational opportunities offered by Lake Michigan. Seasonal residents often have summer homes along the waterfront and return home for the winter. The southern tip of the lake near Gary, Indiana is heavily industrialized. Cities on the shores of Lake Michigan include:
Illinois

The state has numerous large islands, the principal ones being the Manitou, Beaver, and Fox groups in Lake Michigan; Isle Royale and Grande Isle in Lake Superior; Drummond, Marquette, Bois Blanc, and Mackinac islands in Lake Huron; and Neebish and Sugar islands in St. Mary's River. Michigan has about 150 lighthouses, the most of any U.S. state. The first lighthouses in Michigan were built between 1818 and 1822. They were built to project light at night and to serve as a landmark during the day to safely guide the passenger ships and freighters traveling the Great Lakes. See Lighthouses in the United States.

Michigan () is a state in the Great Lakes and Midwestern regions of the United States. The state's name, Michigan, originates from the Ojibwe word "mishigamaa", meaning "large water" or "large lake". With a population of about 10 million, Michigan is the tenth most populous of the 50 United States, with the 11th most extensive total area, and is the largest state by total area east of the Mississippi River. Its capital is Lansing, and its largest city is Detroit. Metro Detroit is among the nation's most populous and largest metropolitan economies.

The Great Lakes that border Michigan from east to west are Lake Erie, Lake Huron, Lake Michigan and Lake Superior. It has more public golf courses, registered boats and lighthouses than any other state. The state is bounded on the south by the states of Ohio and Indiana, sharing land and water boundaries with both. Michigan's western boundaries are almost entirely water boundaries, from south to north, with Illinois and Wisconsin in Lake Michigan; then a land boundary with Wisconsin and the Upper Peninsula, that is principally demarcated by the Menominee and Montreal Rivers; then water boundaries again, in Lake Superior, with Wisconsin and Minnesota to the west, capped around by the Canadian province of Ontario to the north and east.
The heavily forested Upper Peninsula is relatively mountainous in the west. The Porcupine Mountains, which are part of one of the oldest mountain chains in the world, rise to an altitude of almost above sea level and form the watershed between the streams flowing into Lake Superior and Lake Michigan. The surface on either side of this range is rugged. The state's highest point, in the Huron Mountains northwest of Marquette, is Mount Arvon at . The peninsula is as large as Connecticut, Delaware, Massachusetts, and Rhode Island combined but has fewer than 330,000 inhabitants. They are sometimes called "Yoopers" (from "U.P.'ers"), and their speech (the "Yooper dialect") has been heavily influenced by the numerous Scandinavian and Canadian immigrants who settled the area during the lumbering and mining boom of the late 19th century.
The Lower Peninsula is shaped like a mitten and many residents hold up a hand to depict where they are from. It is long from north to south and from east to west and occupies nearly two-thirds of the state's land area. The surface of the peninsula is generally level, broken by conical hills and glacial moraines usually not more than a few hundred feet tall. It is divided by a low water divide running north and south. The larger portion of the state is on the west of this and gradually slopes toward Lake Michigan. The highest point in the Lower Peninsula is either Briar Hill at , or one of several points nearby in the vicinity of Cadillac. The lowest point is the surface of Lake Erie at .

The lakes also moderate seasonal temperatures to some degree, but not with as large an influence as do large oceans; they absorb heat and cool the air in summer, then slowly radiate that heat in autumn. They protect against frost during transitional weather, and keep the summertime temperatures cooler than further inland. This effect can be very localized and overridden by offshore wind patterns. This temperature buffering produces areas known as "fruit belts", where fruit can be produced that is typically grown much farther south. For instance, Western Michigan has apple and cherry orchards, and vineyards cultivated adjacent to the lake shore as far north as the Grand Traverse Bay and Nottawasaga Bay in central Ontario. The eastern shore of Lake Michigan and the southern shore of Lake Erie have many successful wineries because of the moderating effect, as does the Niagara Peninsula between Lake Erie and Lake Ontario. A similar phenomenon allows wineries to flourish in the Finger Lakes region of New York, as well as in Prince Edward County, Ontario on Lake Ontario's northeast shore. Related to the lake effect is the regular occurrence of fog over medium-sized areas, particularly along the shorelines of the lakes. This is most noticeable along Lake Superior's shores.

The largest of all the islands is Isle Royale in Lake Superior, which, in addition to its waters and other surrounding islands, is organized as Isle Royale National Park. Isle Royale itself is . The most populated island is Grosse Ile with approximately 10,000 residents, located in the Detroit River about south of Detroit. The majority of Michigan's islands are uninhabited and very small. Some of these otherwise unusable islands have been used for the large number of Michigan's lighthouses to aid in shipping throughout the Great Lakes, while others have been set aside as nature reserves. Many islands in Michigan have the same name, even some that are in the same municipality and body of water, such as Gull, Long, or Round islands.

Michigan is the leading auto-producing state in the US, with the industry primarily located throughout the Midwestern United States, Ontario, Canada, and the Southern United States. With almost ten million residents, Michigan is a large and influential state, ranking tenth in population among the fifty states. Detroit is the centrally located metropolitan area of the Great Lakes Megalopolis and the second-largest metropolitan area in the U.S. linking the Great Lakes system.
The Metro Detroit area in Southeast Michigan is the state's largest metropolitan area (roughly 50% of the population resides there) and the eleventh largest in the USA. The Grand Rapids metropolitan area in Western Michigan is the state's fastest-growing metro area, with over 1.3 million residents . Metro Detroit receives more than 15 million visitors each year. Michigan has many popular tourist destinations, including areas such as Frankenmuth in The Thumb, and Traverse City on the Grand Traverse Bay in Northern Michigan. Tourists spend about $17 billion annually in Michigan supporting 193,000 jobs.

Platte Lake (sometimes referred to as Big Platte Lake) is one of the many lakes located in the northwestern part of Michigan's lower peninsula. There are two lakes in Benzie County, Michigan based on the name Platte, the other being Little Platte. Platte Lake covers 2,516 acres and is 3.3 miles long and 1.6 miles wide. The average depth of Platte Lake is 24 feet deep. The deepest point of the lake is measured at 95 feet deep. The Platte River flows through the lake at a speed of 120 cubic feet per second. This means the residence time for the water in Platte Lake is 6 months. Also meaning that every hour 3.3 million gallons of water are passing through Platte Lake. The Platte River flows through Platte Lake and continues downstream through Loon Lake until it finally reaches Lake Michigan.

Crystal Lake, the largest lake of this name in Michigan, is located near Lake Michigan in Benzie County about 25 miles (40 km) southwest of Traverse City and about 2 miles (3 km) northeast of Frankfort at . It measures approximately 2.5 by 8 miles (4 by 13 km), and has a maximum depth of 165 feet (50 m). At , it is Michigan's ninth largest inland lake. Up to and through the American Civil War years Crystal Lake was known as "Cap Lake" due to the frequent whitecaps visible on its surface. Crystal Lake is adjacent to the southern reaches of the Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore.
question_src: Ziwa Michigan ni kubwa kiasi gani?
pos_context_src: Ziwa Michigan lina eneo la uso wa 22,404 sq.mi (58,026 km); . Ziwa la tano kwa ukubwa ulimwenguni. Ni nusu kubwa ya Ziwa Michigan -Huron, ambayo ni mwili mkubwa wa maji safi ulimwenguni na eneo la uso. Ni ndefu kwa upana na mwambao mrefu. Kina cha wastani cha ziwa ni fathoms 46 futi 3 (279 ft; 85 m), wakati kina chake kikubwa ni 153 fathoms futi 5 (923 ft; 281 m). Inayo kiasi cha maili ya ujazo 1,180 (4,918 km³) ya maji. Green Bay kaskazini magharibi ni bay yake kubwa. Grand Traverse Bay kaskazini mashariki mwake ni ziwa lingine kubwa. Kanda ya ndani kabisa ya Ziwa Michigan, ambayo iko katika nusu yake ya kaskazini, inaitwa Bonde la Chippewa (jina lake baada ya Ziwa la Prehistoric Chippewa) na limetengwa na Bonde la Chippewa Kusini, na eneo lenye kina kirefu linaloitwa Mid Lake Plateau.
neg_context_title_src: Ziwa la Crystal (Kaunti ya Benzie, Michigan)
neg_context_src:
Watu milioni kumi na mbili wanaishi kando ya mwambao wa Ziwa Michigan, haswa katika maeneo ya jiji la Chicago na Milwaukee. Uchumi wa jamii nyingi kaskazini mwa Michigan na Kata ya Door, Wisconsin inasaidiwa na utalii, na idadi kubwa ya msimu inayovutiwa na uzuri na fursa za burudani zinazotolewa na Ziwa Michigan. Wakazi wa msimu mara nyingi huwa na nyumba za majira ya joto kando ya maji na kurudi nyumbani kwa msimu wa baridi. Ncha ya kusini ya ziwa karibu na Gary, Indiana inaendelea sana. Miji kwenye mwambao wa Ziwa Michigan ni pamoja na:
Illinois

Jimbo lina visiwa vingi vikubwa, vikuu vikuu kuwa Manitou, Beaver, na vikundi vya Fox katika Ziwa Michigan; Isle Royale na Grande Isle katika Ziwa Superior; Drummond, Marquette, Bois Blanc, na Visiwa vya Mackinac katika Ziwa Huron; na Visiwa vya Neebish na sukari katika Mto wa St Mary. Michigan ina taa za takriban 150, zaidi ya jimbo lolote la Merika. Taa za kwanza huko Michigan zilijengwa kati ya 1818 na 1822. Zilijengwa ili kuangazia usiku na kutumika kama alama wakati wa mchana ili kuongoza usalama wa meli za abiria na mizigo wanaosafiri Maziwa Makuu. Tazama taa za taa huko Merika.

Michigan () ni jimbo katika maeneo ya Maziwa Makuu na Midwestern ya Merika. Jina la serikali, Michigan, linatoka kwa neno la Ojibwe "mishigamaa", linamaanisha "maji makubwa" au "ziwa kubwa". Pamoja na idadi ya watu karibu milioni 10, Michigan ni ya kumi kubwa zaidi ya Amerika 50, na eneo la jumla la 11, na ndio jimbo kubwa na jumla ya eneo mashariki mwa Mto wa Mississippi. Mji mkuu wake ni Lansing, na mji wake mkubwa ni Detroit. Metro Detroit ni kati ya uchumi wa mji mkuu na mkubwa zaidi wa mji mkuu.

Maziwa makubwa ambayo yana mpaka Michigan kutoka mashariki hadi magharibi ni Ziwa Erie, Ziwa Huron, Ziwa Michigan na Ziwa Superior. Inayo kozi zaidi za gofu za umma, boti zilizosajiliwa na taa za taa kuliko hali nyingine yoyote. Jimbo hilo limefungwa kusini na majimbo ya Ohio na Indiana, kugawana mipaka ya ardhi na maji na zote mbili. Mipaka ya magharibi ya Michigan ni mipaka ya maji kabisa, kutoka kusini hadi kaskazini, na Illinois na Wisconsin katika Ziwa Michigan; Halafu mpaka wa ardhi na Wisconsin na peninsula ya juu, ambayo kimsingi imeainishwa na Mito ya Menominee na Montreal; Kisha mipaka ya maji tena, katika Ziwa Superior, na Wisconsin na Minnesota magharibi, walizunguka na mkoa wa Canada wa Ontario kaskazini na mashariki. Peninsula yenye misitu yenye misitu mingi ni ya mlima magharibi. Milima ya Porcupine, ambayo ni sehemu ya moja ya minyororo kongwe ya mlima ulimwenguni, huinuka hadi urefu wa karibu juu ya usawa wa bahari na kuunda maji kati ya mito inayopita ndani ya Ziwa Superior na Ziwa Michigan. Uso kwa kila upande wa masafa haya ni rugged. Hoja ya juu kabisa ya serikali, katika Milima ya Huron kaskazini magharibi mwa Marquette, ni Mlima Arvon saa. Peninsula ni kubwa kama Connecticut, Delaware, Massachusetts, na Rhode Island pamoja lakini ina chini ya wenyeji 330,000. Wakati mwingine huitwa "yoopers" (kutoka "U.P.'ers"), na hotuba yao ("Yooper Dialect") imeshawishiwa sana na wahamiaji wengi wa Scandinavia na Canada ambao walitatua eneo hilo wakati wa kuzidisha na kuchimba madini mwishoni mwa karne ya 19. Peninsula ya chini imeundwa kama mitten na wakaazi wengi wanashikilia mkono kuonyesha ni wapi wametoka. Ni ndefu kutoka kaskazini kwenda kusini na kutoka mashariki hadi magharibi na inachukua karibu theluthi mbili ya eneo la ardhi la serikali. Uso wa peninsula kwa ujumla ni kiwango, kilichovunjwa na vilima vya conical na tabia za glacial kawaida sio zaidi ya urefu wa futi mia chache. Imegawanywa na mgawanyiko wa chini wa maji unaoendesha kaskazini na Kusini. Sehemu kubwa ya serikali iko magharibi mwa hii na polepole mteremko kuelekea Ziwa Michigan. Hoja ya juu kabisa katika peninsula ya chini ni ama Briar Hill huko, au moja ya alama kadhaa karibu karibu na Cadillac. Hoja ya chini kabisa ni uso wa Ziwa Erie saa.

Maziwa pia yana wastani wa joto la msimu kwa kiwango fulani, lakini sio na ushawishi mkubwa kama vile bahari kubwa; Wao huchukua joto na baridi hewa katika msimu wa joto, kisha huangaza polepole joto hilo katika vuli. Wao hulinda dhidi ya baridi wakati wa hali ya hewa ya mpito, na huweka joto la msimu wa joto zaidi kuliko mashambani zaidi. Athari hii inaweza kuwekwa ndani sana na kuzidiwa na mifumo ya upepo wa pwani. Buffering hii ya joto hutoa maeneo inayojulikana kama "mikanda ya matunda", ambapo matunda yanaweza kuzalishwa ambayo kawaida hupandwa mbali zaidi kusini. Kwa mfano, Western Michigan ina apple na bustani za miti, na shamba la mizabibu lililopandwa karibu na mwambao wa ziwa hadi kaskazini kama Grand Traverse Bay na Nottawasaga Bay katikati mwa Ontario. Shore ya Mashariki ya Ziwa Michigan na pwani ya kusini ya Ziwa Erie zina wineries nyingi zilizofanikiwa kwa sababu ya athari ya kudhibiti, kama vile peninsula ya Niagara kati ya Ziwa Erie na Ziwa Ontario. Hali kama hiyo inaruhusu wineries kustawi katika mkoa wa Maziwa ya Finger ya New York, na pia katika Kaunti ya Prince Edward, Ontario kwenye Ziwa Ontario kaskazini mashariki. Kuhusiana na athari ya ziwa ni tukio la kawaida la ukungu juu ya maeneo ya ukubwa wa kati, haswa kando ya mwambao wa maziwa. Hii inaonekana zaidi kando ya mwambao wa Ziwa Superior.

Kubwa zaidi ya visiwa vyote ni Isle Royale katika Ziwa Superior, ambayo, pamoja na maji yake na visiwa vingine vya karibu, imeandaliwa kama Isle Royale National Park. Isle Royale yenyewe ni. Kisiwa kilicho na watu wengi ni Grosse Ile na wakazi takriban 10,000, walioko katika Mto wa Detroit karibu kusini mwa Detroit. Visiwa vingi vya Michigan havina makazi na ni ndogo sana. Baadhi ya visiwa hivi visivyoweza kutumiwa vimetumika kwa idadi kubwa ya taa za Michigan kusaidia katika usafirishaji katika maziwa yote makubwa, wakati zingine zimewekwa kando kama akiba ya asili. Visiwa vingi huko Michigan vina jina moja, hata zingine ambazo ziko katika manispaa moja na mwili wa maji, kama visiwa vya Gull, ndefu, au pande zote.

Michigan ndio jimbo linaloongoza linalounda auto huko Amerika, na tasnia hiyo iko katika Midwestern Merika, Ontario, Canada, na Amerika ya Kusini. Pamoja na wakazi karibu milioni kumi, Michigan ni hali kubwa na yenye ushawishi, iliyowekwa katika idadi ya kumi kati ya majimbo hamsini. Detroit ndio eneo kuu la mji mkuu wa Megalopolis ya Maziwa Makuu na eneo la mji mkuu wa pili huko Merika kuunganisha mfumo wa Maziwa Makuu.
Sehemu ya Metro Detroit kusini mashariki mwa Michigan ndio eneo kubwa zaidi la mji mkuu (takriban 50% ya idadi ya watu hukaa hapo) na ya kumi na moja kubwa nchini USA. Sehemu ya Metropolitan ya Grand Rapids huko Western Michigan ndio eneo la metro linalokua kwa kasi zaidi, na zaidi ya wakazi milioni 1.3. Metro Detroit hupokea wageni zaidi ya milioni 15 kila mwaka. Michigan ina maeneo mengi maarufu ya watalii, pamoja na maeneo kama Frankenmuth kwenye kidole, na City Traverse kwenye Grand Traverse Bay kaskazini mwa Michigan. Watalii hutumia karibu dola bilioni 17 kila mwaka huko Michigan kusaidia kazi 193,000.

Ziwa la Platte (wakati mwingine hujulikana kama Ziwa kubwa la Platte) ni moja ya maziwa mengi yaliyoko kaskazini magharibi mwa peninsula ya chini ya Michigan. Kuna maziwa mawili katika Kaunti ya Benzie, Michigan kulingana na jina la Platte, lingine likiwa kidogo. Platte Lake inashughulikia ekari 2,516 na ni maili 3.3 kwa urefu na maili 1.6 kwa upana. Kina cha wastani cha Ziwa la Platte ni futi 24 kwa kina. Sehemu ya ndani kabisa ya ziwa hupimwa kwa kina cha futi 95. Mto wa Platte unapita kwenye ziwa kwa kasi ya futi za ujazo 120 kwa sekunde. Hii inamaanisha wakati wa makazi ya maji katika Ziwa la Platte ni miezi 6. Pia ikimaanisha kuwa kila saa milioni 3.3 za maji hupitia Ziwa la Platte. Mto wa Platte unapita kupitia Ziwa la Platte na unaendelea chini ya Ziwa la Loon hadi hatimaye itakapofika Ziwa Michigan.

Crystal Lake, ziwa kubwa zaidi la jina hili huko Michigan, liko karibu na Ziwa Michigan katika kaunti ya Benzie karibu maili 25 (km 40) kusini magharibi mwa Traverse City na umbali wa maili 2 kaskazini mashariki mwa Frankfort huko. Inapima takriban 2,5 kwa maili 8 (4 na 13 km), na ina kina cha urefu wa futi 165 (50 m). Katika, ni ziwa kubwa la tisa la Michigan. Hadi na kupitia miaka ya Vita vya wenyewe kwa wenyewe vya Amerika Crystal Lake ilijulikana kama "Ziwa la Cap" kwa sababu ya Whitecaps ya mara kwa mara inayoonekana kwenye uso wake. Ziwa la Crystal liko karibu na ufikiaji wa kusini wa Dunes ya Dunes ya Kulala.
report_src: Ziwa Michigan lina eneo la uso la maili za mraba 22,404 (sawa na kilomita za mraba 58,026), na hivyo kulifanya kuwa ziwa la tano kwa ukubwa duniani kwa eneo la maji juu ya ardhi [1]. Hili ni nusu ya mfumo wa Ziwa Michigan-Huron, ambao kwa pamoja ndilo mwili mkubwa zaidi wa maji safi duniani kwa eneo la uso [1]. Ziwa hili lina ujazo wa takribani maili za ujazo 1,180 (kilomita za ujazo 4,918) wa maji, kina cha wastani cha futi 279 (mita 85) na kina cha juu kabisa cha futi 923 (mita 281) katika Bonde la Chippewa [1].

question_en: How long is the optic nerve?
pos_context_en: The optic nerve leaves the orbit (eye socket) via the optic canal, running postero-medially towards the optic chiasm, where there is a partial decussation (crossing) of fibers from the temporal visual fields (the nasal hemi-retina) of both eyes. The proportion of decussating fibers varies between species, and is correlated with the degree of binocular vision enjoyed by a species. Most of the axons of the optic nerve terminate in the lateral geniculate nucleus from where information is relayed to the visual cortex, while other axons terminate in the pretectal nucleus and are involved in reflexive eye movements. Other axons terminate in the suprachiasmatic nucleus and are involved in regulating the sleep-wake cycle. Its diameter increases from about 1.6 mm within the eye to 3.5 mm in the orbit to 4.5 mm within the cranial space. The optic nerve component lengths are 1 mm in the globe, 24 mm in the orbit, 9 mm in the optic canal, and 16 mm in the cranial space before joining the optic chiasm. There, partial decussation occurs, and about 53% of the fibers cross to form the optic tracts. Most of these fibers terminate in the lateral geniculate body.
neg_context_en: The optic nerve is the second of twelve paired cranial nerves and is technically part of the central nervous system, rather than the peripheral nervous system because it is derived from an out-pouching of the diencephalon (optic stalks) during embryonic development. As a consequence, the fibers of the optic nerve are covered with myelin produced by oligodendrocytes, rather than Schwann cells of the peripheral nervous system, and are encased within the meninges. Peripheral neuropathies like Guillain–Barré syndrome do not affect the optic nerve. However, most typically the optic nerve is grouped with the other eleven cranial nerves and considered to be part of the peripheral nervous system.

Optic nerve sheath meningiomas (ONSM) are rare benign tumors of the optic nerve. 60–70% of cases occur in middle age females, and is more common in older adults (mean age 44.7 years). It is also seen in children, but this is rare. The tumors grow from cells that surround the optic nerve, and as the tumor grows, it compresses the optic nerve. This causes loss of vision in the affected eye. Rarely, it may affect both eyes at the same time.

Medical examination of the optic nerve with an ophthalmoscope may reveal a swollen optic nerve, but the nerve may also appear normal. Presence of an afferent pupillary defect, decreased color vision, and visual field loss (often central) are suggestive of optic neuritis. Recovery of visual function is expected within 10 weeks. However, attacks may lead to permanent axonal loss and thinning of the retinal nerve fiber layer.

The most recognized cause of a toxic optic neuropathy is methanol intoxication. This can be a life-threatening event that normally accidentally occurs when the victim mistook, or substituted, methanol for ethyl alcohol. Blindness can occur with drinking as little as an ounce of methanol, but this can be counteracted by concurrent drinking of ethyl alcohol. The patient initially has nausea and vomiting, followed by respiratory distress, headache, and visual loss 18–48 hours after consumption. Without treatment, patients can go blind, and their pupils will dilate and stop reacting to light.The inherited optic neuropathies typically manifest as symmetric bilateral central visual loss. Optic nerve damage in most inherited optic neuropathies is permanent and progressive.The optic nerve contains axons of nerve cells that emerge from the retina, leave the eye at the optic disc, and go to the visual cortex where input from the eye is processed into vision. There are 1.2 million optic nerve fibers that derive from the retinal ganglion cells of the inner retina.

The leaked documents describe the users under surveillance as "unselected", meaning that data was collected indiscriminately in bulk from users regardless of whether they were an intelligence target or not. The vast majority of affected users would have been completely innocent of any crime or suspicion of a crime. Optic Nerve as described in the documents collected one still image every 5 minutes per user, attempting to comply with human rights legislation. The images were collected in a searchable database, and used for experiments in facial recognition, to monitor known targets, and to discover new targets. The choice of Yahoo! for surveillance was taken because "Yahoo webcam is known to be used by GCHQ targets". Unlike the US NSA, the UK GCHQ is not required by law to minimize the collection from domestic citizens, so UK citizens could have been targeted on the same level as non-UK citizens.

The optic nerve hypoplasia is generally manifested by nystagmus (involuntary eye movements, often side-to-side) and a smaller-than-usual optic disc. The degree of visual impairment is variable, and ranges from normal vision to complete blindness. When nystagmus develops, it typically appears by 1–8 months of age, and usually indicates that there will be a significant degree of visual impairment, but the severity is difficult to predict in infancy. Although there are many measures to compensate for visual impairment, there are few treatments available to induce normal optic nerve function.

The British intelligence agency Government Communications Headquarters (GCHQ)'s secret mass surveillance program Optic Nerve and National Security Agency (NSA) were reported to be indiscriminately collecting still images from Yahoo webcam streams from millions of mostly innocent Yahoo webcam users, among other things creating a database for facial recognition for future use. Optic Nerve took a still image from the webcam stream every 5 minutes.

In the initial self-published issues, as well as the first eight Drawn & Quarterly issues (1995-2001), "Optic Nerve" was typically a collection of short stories. After an extended hiatus, Tomine resumed the comic in fall of 2004 and began his first multi-issue storyline, "Shortcomings," with #9.
Issue one contains five stories entitled "Sleepwalk," "Echo Ave.," "Long Distance," "Drop" and "Lunch Break." Published by Drawn and Quarterly in April 1995. Issue two contains four stories entitled "The Connecting Thread," "Summer Job," "Pink Frosting" and "Layover." Published by Drawn and Quarterly in November 1995

The use of optic nerve sheath diameter (ONSD) for the assessment of ICP dates back to 1987 when Cennamo and colleagues demonstrated a linear relationship between ICP and the sheath diameter measured with a trans-orbital ultrasound probe in an A-scan mode (principally equivalent to the time-of-the-flight measurements of the cranium diameter). The original measurement method was technically difficult and unreliable because of the nearly coaxial alignment of the optic nerve and propagation axis of the ultrasound wave, but the precision was significantly improved with the use of B-scan (or planar) ultrasound which provided longitudinal cross-section images of the optic nerve and its sheath. Since then, the method has been successfully validated in several relatively large studies that included patients with severe head trauma, hydrocephalus, intracranial hemorrhage or stroke, liver failure, and climbers with acute mountain sickness. While the ONSD can at any given point along the optic nerve be measured with a precision of <1mm, the reliability of derived ICP levels is plagued by inter-individual variability and the dependence of ONSD magnitude on the point along the nerve at which the measurement was taken. Almost all validation studies so far have recommended that ONSD to be used for identification of patients with intracranial hypertension that requires treatment (ICP>20mmHg, i.e. ONSD>5mmHg) rather than for a measurement of ICP.
question_src: Je! Mishipa ya macho ni ya muda gani?
pos_context_src: Mishipa ya macho huacha mzunguko (tundu la jicho) kupitia mfereji wa macho, inayoendesha postero-medially kuelekea chiasm ya macho, ambapo kuna sehemu ya kuvuka (kuvuka) ya nyuzi kutoka kwa uwanja wa kuona wa muda (pua ya hemi-retina) ya macho yote mawili. Sehemu ya nyuzi za kupunguka hutofautiana kati ya spishi, na inahusiana na kiwango cha maono ya binocular inayofurahishwa na spishi. Axons nyingi za ujasiri wa macho husitisha kwenye kiini cha genicrate cha baadaye kutoka ambapo habari huelekezwa kwenye gamba la kuona, wakati axons zingine zinasitisha kwenye kiini cha prectal na zinahusika katika harakati za jicho la kuvutia. Axons zingine husitisha kwenye kiini cha suprachiasmatic na zinahusika katika kudhibiti mzunguko wa kuamka-kulala. Kipenyo chake huongezeka kutoka karibu 1.6 mm ndani ya jicho hadi 3.5 mm kwenye mzunguko hadi 4.5 mm ndani ya nafasi ya cranial. Urefu wa sehemu ya ujasiri wa macho ni 1 mm katika ulimwengu, 24 mm katika mzunguko, 9 mm kwenye mfereji wa macho, na 16 mm katika nafasi ya cranial kabla ya kujiunga na macho ya macho. Huko, utengamano wa sehemu hufanyika, na karibu 53% ya nyuzi huvuka kuunda trakti za macho. Wengi wa nyuzi hizi husitisha katika mwili wa genicrate wa baadaye.
neg_context_title_src: Kipimo kisichoweza kuvamia cha shinikizo la ndani
neg_context_src: Mishipa ya macho ni ya pili ya mishipa ya cranial ya kumi na mbili na ni sehemu ya mfumo mkuu wa neva, badala ya mfumo wa neva wa pembeni kwa sababu imetokana na kuzidisha kwa diencephalon (mabua ya macho) wakati wa ukuaji wa embryonic. Kama matokeo, nyuzi za ujasiri wa macho zinafunikwa na myelin zinazozalishwa na oligodendrocyte, badala ya seli za Schwann za mfumo wa neva wa pembeni, na zimefungwa ndani ya meninges. Neuropathies ya pembeni kama ugonjwa wa Guillain -Barré haiathiri ujasiri wa macho. Walakini, kawaida ujasiri wa macho huwekwa na mishipa mingine kumi na moja ya cranial na inachukuliwa kuwa sehemu ya mfumo wa neva wa pembeni.

Optic nerve sheath meningiomas (ONSM) ni nadra tumors benign ya ujasiri wa macho. 60-70% ya kesi hufanyika kwa wanawake wa umri wa kati, na ni kawaida zaidi kwa watu wazima (inamaanisha umri wa miaka 44.7). Inaonekana pia kwa watoto, lakini hii ni nadra. Tumors hukua kutoka kwa seli zinazozunguka ujasiri wa macho, na tumor inakua, inasisitiza ujasiri wa macho. Hii husababisha upotezaji wa maono katika jicho lililoathiriwa. Mara chache, inaweza kuathiri macho yote kwa wakati mmoja.

Uchunguzi wa kimatibabu wa ujasiri wa macho na ophthalmoscope inaweza kuonyesha ujasiri wa macho, lakini ujasiri unaweza pia kuonekana kuwa wa kawaida. Uwepo wa kasoro ya ushirika ya wanafunzi, maono ya rangi iliyopungua, na upotezaji wa uwanja wa kuona (mara nyingi katikati) ni ya kupendekeza neuritis ya macho. Kupona kwa kazi ya kuona inatarajiwa ndani ya wiki 10. Walakini, shambulio linaweza kusababisha upotezaji wa axonal wa kudumu na nyembamba ya safu ya nyuzi ya ujasiri wa retina.

Sababu inayotambuliwa zaidi ya neuropathy ya sumu ni ulevi wa methanoli. Hili linaweza kuwa tukio la kutishia maisha ambalo kawaida hufanyika kwa bahati mbaya wakati mwathiriwa aliponya, au badala yake, methanoli kwa pombe ya ethyl. Upofu unaweza kutokea kwa kunywa kidogo kama aunzi ya methanoli, lakini hii inaweza kupingana na kunywa pombe ya kawaida ya ethyl. Mgonjwa hapo awali ana kichefuchefu na kutapika, ikifuatiwa na shida ya kupumua, maumivu ya kichwa, na upotezaji wa kuona masaa 18- 48 baada ya matumizi. Bila matibabu, wagonjwa wanaweza kuwa kipofu, na wanafunzi wao watapunguza na kuacha kuguswa na nyepesi. Neuropathies za kurithi za kawaida kawaida zinaonekana kama upotezaji wa kati wa kuona. Uharibifu wa ujasiri wa macho katika neuropathies ya optic iliyorithiwa ni ya kudumu na ya maendeleo. Ujanja wa macho una axons za seli za ujasiri ambazo hutoka kwenye retina, kuacha jicho kwenye diski ya macho, na kwenda kwenye cortex ya kuona ambapo pembejeo kutoka kwa jicho inasindika kuwa maono. Kuna nyuzi za ujasiri wa macho ya milioni 1.2 ambazo hupatikana kutoka kwa seli za genge la retina la retina ya ndani.

Hati zilizovuja zinaelezea watumiaji walio chini ya uchunguzi kama "wasiochaguliwa", ikimaanisha kuwa data ilikusanywa bila hiari kwa wingi kutoka kwa watumiaji bila kujali kama walikuwa lengo la akili au la. Idadi kubwa ya watumiaji walioathirika wangekuwa hawana hatia kabisa ya uhalifu wowote au tuhuma za uhalifu. Mishipa ya macho kama ilivyoelezewa katika hati zilizokusanya moja bado picha kila dakika 5 kwa kila mtumiaji, kujaribu kufuata sheria za haki za binadamu. Picha hizo zilikusanywa katika hifadhidata inayoweza kutafutwa, na kutumika kwa majaribio katika utambuzi wa usoni, kufuatilia malengo yanayojulikana, na kugundua malengo mapya. Chaguo la Yahoo! Kwa uchunguzi ulichukuliwa kwa sababu "Yahoo Webcam inajulikana kutumiwa na malengo ya GCHQ". Tofauti na NSA ya Amerika, GCHQ ya Uingereza haihitajiki na sheria kupunguza mkusanyiko kutoka kwa raia wa nyumbani, kwa hivyo raia wa Uingereza wangeweza kulengwa kwa kiwango sawa na raia wasio wa Uingereza.

Hypoplasia ya ujasiri wa macho kwa ujumla huonyeshwa na nystagmus (harakati za jicho la hiari, mara nyingi upande-kwa-upande) na diski ndogo kuliko kawaida ya macho. Kiwango cha kuharibika kwa kuona ni tofauti, na huanzia maono ya kawaida kukamilisha upofu. Wakati Nystagmus inakua, kawaida huonekana kwa umri wa miezi 1-8, na kawaida inaonyesha kuwa kutakuwa na kiwango kikubwa cha udhaifu wa kuona, lakini ukali ni ngumu kutabiri katika utoto. Ingawa kuna hatua nyingi za kulipa fidia kwa uharibifu wa kuona, kuna matibabu machache yanayopatikana ili kushawishi kazi ya kawaida ya ujasiri wa macho.

Shirika la Ushauri wa Ushauri wa Uingereza Makao makuu ya Serikali ya Mawasiliano (GCHQ) mpango wa uchunguzi wa siri wa macho na shirika la usalama la kitaifa (NSA) waliripotiwa kuwa wakikusanya picha bado kutoka kwa mito ya Yahoo Webcam kutoka kwa mamilioni ya watumiaji wa Webcam wasio na hatia, kati ya vitu vingine vinavyounda hifadhidata kwa utambuzi wa usoni kwa matumizi ya baadaye. Optic Nerve ilichukua picha bado kutoka kwa mkondo wa wavuti kila dakika 5.

Katika maswala ya kwanza yaliyochapishwa, na vile vile nane za kwanza zilizotolewa na robo (1995-2001), "Optic Nerve" kawaida ilikuwa mkusanyiko wa hadithi fupi. Baada ya hiatus iliyopanuliwa, Tomine alianza tena Jumuia mnamo 2004 na akaanza hadithi yake ya kwanza ya hadithi, "Mapungufu," na #9.
Suala la kwanza lina hadithi tano zinazoitwa "Sleepwalk," "Echo Ave.," "umbali mrefu," "Drop" na "mapumziko ya chakula cha mchana." Iliyochapishwa na Drawn na Quarterly mnamo Aprili 1995. Toleo la pili lina hadithi nne zilizoitwa "Thread ya Kuunganisha," "Kazi ya Majira ya joto," "Pink Frosting" na "LayOver." Iliyochapishwa na Drawn na Quarterly mnamo Novemba 1995

Matumizi ya kipenyo cha optic nerve sheath (ONSD) kwa tathmini ya ICP ilianza mwaka wa 1987 wakati Cennamo na wenzake walionyesha uhusiano wa mstari kati ya ICP na kipenyo cha sheath kilichopimwa na probe ya trans-orbital ultrasound katika hali ya Scan (kimsingi sawa na kipimo cha wakati-wa-mwanga. Njia ya kipimo cha asili ilikuwa ngumu na isiyoaminika kwa sababu ya upatanishi wa karibu wa ujasiri wa macho na mhimili wa uenezi wa wimbi la ultrasound, lakini usahihi uliboreshwa sana na matumizi ya ultrasound ya B-scan (au planar) ambayo ilitoa picha za sehemu ya muda mrefu ya ujasiri wa macho na shina lake. Tangu wakati huo, njia hiyo imethibitishwa kwa mafanikio katika tafiti kadhaa kubwa ambazo ni pamoja na wagonjwa walio na kiwewe kali cha kichwa, hydrocephalus, hemorrhage ya ndani au kiharusi, kushindwa kwa ini, na wapandaji wenye ugonjwa wa mlima wa papo hapo. Wakati ONSD inaweza wakati wowote kando ya ujasiri wa macho kupimwa kwa usahihi wa <1mm, kuegemea kwa viwango vya ICP vinavyotokana na kutofautisha kwa mtu binafsi na utegemezi wa ukubwa wa ONSD kwenye hatua iliyo na ujasiri ambao kipimo kilichukuliwa. Karibu tafiti zote za uthibitisho hadi sasa zimependekeza kwamba ONSD itumike kwa kitambulisho cha wagonjwa walio na shinikizo la damu ya ndani ambayo inahitaji matibabu (ICP> 20mmHg, i.e. ONSD> 5mmHg) badala ya kipimo cha ICP.
report_src: Ujasiri wa macho huwa na urefu wa takriban 1 mm ndani ya mpira wa jicho, 24 mm katika sehemu ya kwenye mzunguko wa macho, 9 mm unapopita kwenye mfereji wa macho, na 16 mm ndani ya fuvu kabla ya kuungana na chiasma ya macho, hivyo jumla yake hufikia karibu 50 mm (sawa na sentimita 5) kwa binadamu watu wazima [1].

question_en: How high is Kahlenberg Mountain?
pos_context_en: Kahlenberg is 484 meters high and lies in the northeastern foothills of the Eastern Alps. The mountain is mostly flysch, which is composed of quartz, limestone, marl, and other conglomerates. East of Kahlenberg is Leopoldsberg; and to the west are Reisenberg, Latisberg, and Hermannskogel.
neg_context_en: The Kahlenberg Transmitter is a facility for FM- and TV on the Kahlenberg near Vienna. It was established in 1953 and used until 1956 an antenna on the observation tower Stefaniewarte. From 1956 to 1974 a 129 metre high guyed mast built of lattice steel was used. Since 1974 a 165 metre high guyed steel tube mast has been used, which is equipped with rooms of technical equipment.

The Kahlenberg lies in the Vienna Woods and is one of the most popular destinations for day-trips from Vienna, offering a view over the entire city. Parts of Lower Austria can also be seen from "Stefaniewarte" at the peak. Next to Stefaniewarte is a 165-meter high steel tower that serves as the transmitter for the ORF, the Austrian Broadcast Corporation. Two terraces are located on the mountain: one at a small church called St. Josef and one at a restaurant built in the 1930s by architect Erich Boltenstern. Parts of the restaurant and a nearby abandoned hotel have been torn down and replaced by a modern restaurant and MODUL University Vienna, a private university established in 2007, focusing on Social and Economic Development, in particular in the areas of tourism, information technology and public governance. The demolition was opposed by the local historical society and by some architects who believed the building was worth protecting. There is also a spiritual recovery center and a center for a Catholic reform movement, the Schönstattbewegung Österreich.

MODUL University Vienna is situated on Kahlenberg, a mountain () located in the 19th district of Vienna, Austria (Döbling). Kahlenberg lies in the Wienerwald (Vienna forest) and is one of the most popular destinations for day-trips from Vienna, offering a view over the entire city. Student accommodation arranged by MU Vienna is available in the 19th and 20th districts of Vienna. Many students live in other parts of Vienna or in their home cities and countries and commute to the campus. Kahlenberg can be reached by car or by bus (Bus line 38A) via the Höhenstraße, part of which is cobblestone.

Kahlenberg can be reached by car or by bus (Bus line 38A) via the picturesque Höhenstraße, part of which is cobblestone. The first Austrian cog railway was built to Kahlenberg in 1872 and 1873 and opened in 1874. It was designed by Carl Maader. The track climbed 316 meters over 5.5 km and started from the train station in Nußdorf (today the end station of the tram-line D) and connected through Grinzing and Krapfenwaldl to the Kahlenberg Hotel, which opened in 1872. An average of 180,000 passengers used the train line each year. After World War I, the Vienna municipality converted the trams to electric power. The surrounding citizens had already dismantled large parts of the track during the war. On September 21, 1920, the line was finally shut down.

The Battle of Vienna ( or "Kahlenberg" (Battle of the Bald Mountains); or "odsiecz wiedeńska" (The Relief of Vienna); Modern Turkish: "İkinci Viyana Kuşatması", Ottoman Turkish: "Beç Ḳalʿası Muḥāṣarası") took place at Kahlenberg Mountain near Vienna on 1683 after the imperial city had been besieged by the Ottoman Empire for two months. The battle was fought by the Habsburg Monarchy, the Polish–Lithuanian Commonwealth and the Holy Roman Empire, under the command of King John III Sobieski against the Ottomans and their vassal and tributary states. The battle marked the first time the Commonwealth and the Holy Roman Empire had cooperated militarily against the Ottomans, and it is often seen as a turning point in history, after which "the Ottoman Turks ceased to be a menace to the Christian world". In the ensuing war that lasted until 1699, the Ottomans lost almost all of Hungary to the Holy Roman Emperor Leopold I.

"We designed the building from the inside out, not the outside in,” said Loretta H. Cockrum, Foram’s founder, chairman and CEO. “We wanted the most efficient office building ever designed, with no wasted space or wasted energy. This is a building of the future more than a building of the present. A lot of love has gone into that building, and a lot of pride."

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.

question_src: Mlima wa Kahlenberg uko juu kiasi gani?
pos_context_src: Kahlenberg ni urefu wa mita 484 na iko katika mwinuko wa kaskazini mashariki mwa Alps ya Mashariki. Mlima ni zaidi ya kuruka, ambayo inaundwa na quartz, chokaa, marl, na wabunge wengine. Mashariki ya Kahlenberg ni Leopoldsberg; na magharibi ni Reisenberg, Latisberg, na Hermannskogel.
neg_context_src: Transmitter ya Kahlenberg ni kituo cha FM- na TV kwenye Kahlenberg karibu na Vienna. Ilianzishwa mnamo 1953 na kutumika hadi 1956 antenna kwenye mnara wa uchunguzi wa Stefaniewarte. Kuanzia 1956 hadi 1974 mita 129 ya juu ya Guyed iliyojengwa kwa chuma cha kimiani ilitumiwa. Tangu 1974 mita 165 ya juu ya chuma ya bomba la chuma imetumika, ambayo imewekwa na vyumba vya vifaa vya kiufundi.

Kahlenberg iko katika Woods ya Vienna na ni moja wapo ya maeneo maarufu kwa safari za siku kutoka Vienna, kutoa maoni juu ya jiji lote. Sehemu za Austria ya chini pia zinaweza kuonekana kutoka "Stefaniewarte" kwenye kilele. Karibu na Stefaniewarte ni mnara wa chuma wa juu wa mita 165 ambao hutumika kama transmitter kwa ORF, Shirika la Matangazo la Austria. Matuta mawili yapo kwenye mlima: moja katika kanisa dogo linaloitwa St. Josef na moja katika mgahawa uliojengwa miaka ya 1930 na mbuni Erich Boltenstern. Sehemu za mgahawa na hoteli iliyoachwa karibu imebomolewa na kubadilishwa na mgahawa wa kisasa na Chuo Kikuu cha Modul Vienna, chuo kikuu cha kibinafsi kilichoanzishwa mnamo 2007, ikizingatia maendeleo ya kijamii na kiuchumi, haswa katika maeneo ya utalii, teknolojia ya habari na utawala wa umma. Uharibifu huo ulipingwa na jamii ya kihistoria ya kihistoria na na wasanifu wengine ambao waliamini jengo hilo linafaa kulinda. Kuna pia kituo cha kupona kiroho na kituo cha harakati ya mageuzi ya Katoliki, Schönstattbewegung Österreich.

Chuo Kikuu cha Modul Vienna iko kwenye Kahlenberg, mlima () ulio katika wilaya ya 19 ya Vienna, Austria (Döbling). Kahlenberg iko katika Wienerwald (Msitu wa Vienna) na ni moja wapo ya maeneo maarufu kwa safari za siku kutoka Vienna, kutoa maoni juu ya jiji lote. Malazi ya wanafunzi yaliyopangwa na Mu Vienna yanapatikana katika wilaya ya 19 na 20 ya Vienna. Wanafunzi wengi wanaishi katika sehemu zingine za Vienna au katika miji yao ya nyumbani na nchi na husafiri kwenda chuo kikuu. Kahlenberg inaweza kufikiwa na gari au kwa basi (basi ya basi 38a) kupitia Höhenstraße, sehemu ambayo ni cobblestone.

Kahlenberg inaweza kufikiwa na gari au kwa basi (mstari wa basi 38a) kupitia picha nzuri ya Höhenstraße, ambayo sehemu yake ni cobblestone. Reli ya kwanza ya COG ya Austria ilijengwa kwa Kahlenberg mnamo 1872 na 1873 na kufunguliwa mnamo 1874. Iliundwa na Carl Maader. Njia hiyo ilipanda mita 316 zaidi ya kilomita 5.5 na kuanza kutoka kituo cha gari moshi huko Nußdorf (leo kituo cha mwisho cha Tram-line D) na kushikamana kupitia Grinzing na Krapfenwaldl hadi Hoteli ya Kahlenberg, ambayo ilifunguliwa mnamo 1872. Wastani wa abiria 180,000 walitumia mstari wa treni kila mwaka. Baada ya Vita vya Kwanza vya Ulimwengu, Manispaa ya Vienna ilibadilisha tramu kuwa nguvu ya umeme. Raia walio karibu walikuwa wameshatoa sehemu kubwa za wimbo wakati wa vita. Mnamo Septemba 21, 1920, mstari huo ulifungwa.

Vita vya Vienna (au "Kahlenberg" (Vita vya Milima ya Bald); au "Odsiecz Wiedeńska" (Msaada wa Vienna); Kituruki cha kisasa: "Ikinci Viyana Kuşatması", Ottoman Turkish: "Beç ḳalʿası muḥā. alikuwa amezingirwa na Dola ya Ottoman kwa miezi miwili. Vita hiyo ilipiganwa na kifalme cha Habsburg, Jumuiya ya Madola ya Kipolishi na Kilithuania na Dola Takatifu ya Kirumi, chini ya amri ya Mfalme John III Sobieski dhidi ya Waotomani na majimbo yao na ya serikali. Vita viliashiria mara ya kwanza Jumuiya ya Madola na Dola Takatifu ya Kirumi ilikuwa imeshirikiana kijeshi dhidi ya Waotomania, na mara nyingi huonekana kama mabadiliko katika historia, baada ya "Waturuki wa Ottoman walikoma kuwa hatari kwa ulimwengu wa Kikristo". Katika vita iliyofuata ambayo ilidumu hadi 1699, Waottomani walipoteza karibu wote wa Hungary kwa Mtawala Mtakatifu wa Kirumi Leopold I.

"Tulibuni jengo hilo kutoka ndani, sio nje," alisema Loretta H. Cockrum, mwanzilishi wa Foram, Mwenyekiti na Mkurugenzi Mtendaji. "Tulitaka jengo bora zaidi la ofisi lililowahi kubuniwa, bila nafasi ya kupoteza au nishati ya kupoteza. Hii ni jengo la siku zijazo zaidi ya jengo la sasa. Upendo mwingi umeingia kwenye jengo hilo, na kiburi sana."

Winfield Toll Bridge, pia inajulikana kama Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, ni kihistoria wa kihistoria wa Cantilever Warren Truss Bridge iliyoko Winfield na Red House, Kaunti ya Putnam, West Virginia. Ilijengwa mnamo 1955, na inachukua Mto wa Kanawha, iliyobeba West Virginia Route 34. Cantilever kupitia-truss ina nafasi mbili za nanga kila futi 245 kwa urefu na urefu wa futi 462 kwa urefu kati ya mistari ya kituo cha pier. Span kuu ina futi mbili 128, inchi 4, mikono ya cantilever na miguu 205, inchi 4, iliyosimamishwa.

question_en: Which race has the most people?
pos_context_en: The world's largest ethnic group is Han Chinese with Mandarin being the world's most spoken language in terms of native speakers.
neg_context_en: One of his works, "Man's Most Dangerous Myth", was written while race was considered the determinant of people's character and intelligence (Rowman and Littlefield). Montagu presented a unique theory for his time: "in biology race is defined as a subdivision of species which inherits physical characteristics distinguishing it from other populations of the species. In this sense there are many human 'races.' But this is not the sense in which many anthropologists, race-classifiers, and racists have used the term." He admits that in a biological sense, there is the existence of races within mankind. However, he also believes that not all of mankind can be classified. Part of his reasoning has to do with mixed origin, which has resulted in “overlapping” of physicalities. Instead of races and subspecies, he prefers mixed ethnic groups. His writing further emphasizes the complexity of our descent and rejects claims that support one race being superior when compared to others. He also says profoundly that the "so-called" main divisions of mankind are species instead of races.

The Rohingya people have been described as "one of the world's least wanted minorities" and "some of the world's most persecuted people". Médecins Sans Frontières claimed that the discrimination and human rights challenges the Rohingya people have faced at the hands of the country's government and military are "among the world's top ten most under-reported stories of 2007.” In February 1992, Myanmar's Ministry of Foreign Affairs stated in a press release, “In actual fact, although there are (135) national races living in Myanmar today, the so-called Rohingya people is not one of them. Historically, there has never been a 'Rohingya' race in Myanmar."

The prominent German zoologist Ernst Haeckel mentioned Müller when he formulated his own racialist theory about higher and lower races:
The Caucasian, or Mediterranean man ("Homo Mediterraneus"), has from time immemorial been placed at the head of all the races of men, as the most highly developed and perfect. It is generally called the Caucasian race, but as, among all the varieties of the species, the Caucasian branch is the least important, we prefer the much more suitable appellation proposed by Friedrich Müller, namely, that of "Mediterranese". For the most important varieties of this species, which are moreover the most eminent actors in what is called “Universal History,” first rose to a flourishing condition on the shores of the Mediterranean.… This species alone (with the exception of the Mongolian) has had an actual history; it alone has attained to that degree of civilization which seems to raise men above the rest of nature.
Besides contributing largely on comparative philology and etnnology to the "Mitteilungen der anthropologischen Gesellschaft" and the "Wiener Zeitschrift für die Kunde des Morgenlandes", and editing these periodicals for a time, Müller wrote:

Throughout Rosecroft's history, it has featured notable races. From 1984 to 1988, it hosted segments of the Breeders Crown. Starting in 1990 and ending in 1995, the racetrack hosted the Messenger Stakes, the second leg of the Triple Crown of Harness Racing for Pacers. Rosecroft hosted the Potomac Stakes, Maryland most successful harness race, from 1990 to 1992. Rosecroft features the Maryland Sire Stakes, which showcases the best standardbred horses in Maryland. Besides the races, Rosecroft has had famous people and horses work and race at the track. John Wager, Maryland's all-time most winning driver, has been working at Rosecroft since 1974. Several famous people—Lyndon B. Johnson, Elizabeth Taylor, and Nancy Pelosi, among others—have visited Rosecroft. Cam's Card Shark raced at Rosecroft in 1994 and challenged the single-season record for most money won in a season by winning over $2 million, and Robust Hanover set a track record while winning the Breeders Crown in 1985.

Worldwide, English is used widely as a lingua franca and can be seen to be the dominant language at this time. The world's largest language by native speakers is Mandarin Chinese which is a first language of around 960 million people, or 12.44% of the population, predominantly in Greater China. Spanish is spoken by around 330 to 400 million people, predominantly in the Americas and Spain. Arabic is spoken by around 280 million people. Bengali is spoken by around 250 to 300 million people worldwide, predominantly in Bangladesh and India. Hindi is spoken by about 200 million speakers, mostly in India. Portuguese is spoken by about 230 million speakers in Portugal, Brazil, East Timor, and Southern Africa.
question_src: Je! Ni mbio gani inayo watu wengi?
pos_context_src: Kabila kubwa zaidi ulimwenguni ni Han Wachina na Mandarin kuwa lugha inayozungumzwa zaidi ulimwenguni kwa suala la wasemaji wa asili.
neg_context_src: Mojawapo ya kazi zake, "hadithi hatari zaidi ya mwanadamu", iliandikwa wakati mbio zilizingatiwa kama tabia ya watu na akili (Rowman na Littlefield). Montagu aliwasilisha nadharia ya kipekee kwa wakati wake: "Katika mbio za biolojia hufafanuliwa kama ugawanyaji wa spishi ambazo zinarithi sifa za mwili zinazotofautisha na idadi nyingine ya spishi. Kwa maana hii kuna jamii nyingi za wanadamu. ' Lakini hii sio maoni ambayo wanatheolojia wengi, wachezaji wa mbio, na wanariadha wametumia neno hilo. " Anakiri kwamba kwa maana ya kibaolojia, kuna uwepo wa jamii ndani ya wanadamu. Walakini, pia anaamini kuwa sio wanadamu wote wanaweza kuainishwa. Sehemu ya hoja yake inahusiana na asili mchanganyiko, ambayo imesababisha "kuingiliana" kwa mwili. Badala ya jamii na subspecies, anapendelea makabila yaliyochanganywa. Uandishi wake unasisitiza zaidi ugumu wa asili yetu na anakataa madai ambayo yanaunga mkono mbio moja kuwa bora ikilinganishwa na wengine. Pia anasema sana kwamba "kinachojulikana" mgawanyiko kuu wa wanadamu ni spishi badala ya jamii.

Watu wa Rohingya wameelezewa kama "mmoja wa watu wachache waliotaka ulimwengu" na "watu wengine walioteswa zaidi ulimwenguni". Médecins Sans Frontières alidai kwamba ubaguzi na changamoto za haki za binadamu ambazo watu wa Rohingya wamekabili mikononi mwa serikali ya nchi hiyo na wanajeshi ni "miongoni mwa hadithi kumi zilizoripotiwa zaidi ulimwenguni za 2007." Mnamo Februari 1992, Wizara ya Mambo ya nje ya Myanmar ilisema katika taarifa kwa waandishi wa habari, "Kwa kweli, ingawa kuna (135) mbio za kitaifa zinazoishi nchini Myanmar leo, watu wanaoitwa Rohingya sio mmoja wao. Kwa kihistoria, hajawahi kuwa na mbio za 'Rohingya' huko Myanmar."

Mtaalam mashuhuri wa Ujerumani Ernst Haeckel alimtaja Müller wakati aliunda nadharia yake mwenyewe ya ubaguzi wa rangi juu ya jamii za juu na za chini:
Mtu wa Caucasian, au Mediterranean ("Homo Mediterraneus"), kutoka kwa kumbukumbu ya wakati amewekwa kichwani mwa jamii zote za wanaume, kama walivyokua zaidi na kamili. Kwa ujumla huitwa Mbio wa Caucasian, lakini kama, kati ya kila aina ya spishi, tawi la Caucasian sio muhimu zaidi, tunapendelea upendeleo unaofaa zaidi uliopendekezwa na Friedrich Müller, ambao ni, wa "Mediterranese". Kwa aina muhimu zaidi ya spishi hii, ambayo ni zaidi ya watendaji mashuhuri katika ile inayoitwa "Historia ya Universal," kwanza iliongezeka kwa hali ya kustawi kwenye mwambao wa Bahari ya Mediterranean.… Aina hii pekee (isipokuwa Mongolian) imekuwa na historia halisi; Ni peke yake imefikia kiwango hicho cha ustaarabu ambacho kinaonekana kuwainua wanaume juu ya maumbile yote.
Licha ya kuchangia sana philology ya kulinganisha na etnnology kwa "Mitteilungen der anthropologischen gesellschaft" na "Wiener Zeitschrift für Die Kunde des Morgenlandes", na kuhariri nakala hizi kwa muda, Müller aliandika:

Katika historia yote ya Rosecroft, imeonyesha jamii mashuhuri. Kuanzia 1984 hadi 1988, ilishiriki sehemu za taji ya wafugaji. Kuanzia 1990 na kumalizika mnamo 1995, mbio za mbio zilishiriki Matunzio ya Mjumbe, mguu wa pili wa taji ya tatu ya mbio za harness kwa vifurushi. Rosecroft alishiriki mbio za Potomac, Maryland waliofanikiwa zaidi, kutoka 1990 hadi 1992. Rosecroft inaangazia Stakes za Maryland, ambazo zinaonyesha farasi bora zaidi huko Maryland. Mbali na jamii, Rosecroft amekuwa na watu maarufu na farasi wanafanya kazi na mbio kwenye wimbo. John Wager, dereva wa wakati wote anayeshinda zaidi ya Maryland, amekuwa akifanya kazi huko Rosecroft tangu 1974. Watu kadhaa maarufu-Lyndon B. Johnson, Elizabeth Taylor, na Nancy Pelosi, miongoni mwa wengine-wametembelea Rosecroft. Kadi ya Cam Shark ilikimbilia Rosecroft mnamo 1994 na kupinga rekodi ya msimu mmoja wa pesa nyingi zilizoshinda kwa msimu kwa kushinda zaidi ya dola milioni 2, na nguvu Hanover aliweka rekodi ya wimbo wakati akishinda taji ya wafugaji mnamo 1985.

Ulimwenguni kote, Kiingereza hutumiwa sana kama lingua Franca na inaweza kuonekana kuwa lugha kuu wakati huu. Lugha kubwa zaidi ulimwenguni na wasemaji wa asili ni Mandarin Wachina ambayo ni lugha ya kwanza ya watu karibu milioni 960, au asilimia 12.44 ya idadi ya watu, haswa nchini China kubwa. Kihispania huzungumzwa na watu karibu milioni 330 hadi 400, haswa Amerika na Uhispania. Kiarabu huzungumzwa na karibu watu milioni 280. Kibengali huzungumzwa na watu karibu milioni 250 hadi 300 ulimwenguni, haswa huko Bangladesh na India. Kihindi huzungumzwa na wasemaji wapata milioni 200, zaidi nchini India. Ureno inazungumzwa na wasemaji wapata milioni 230 huko Ureno, Brazil, Timor ya Mashariki, na Afrika Kusini.
