question_en: How large is the Sahara desert?
pos_context_en:
The Sahara is a vast desert of northern Africa, measuring about 932 miles from north to south and 2484 miles from east to west, and dotted with oases which are centres of population. Eight years after the journey of the French explorer Henri Duveyrier (1859–61), which had important scientific results, Pope Pius IX on 6 August 1868 appointed the Archbishop of Algiers, Mgr Charles Lavigerie, delegate Apostolic of the Sahara and the Sudan. In the same year the Jesuits established themselves at Laghouat, the extremity occupied by French arms. In 1871 they sent to Mgr Lavigerie a long report in which they advocated the establishment of dispensaries and schools. In 1872 Father Charmetant and two other White Fathers (Missionary Fathers of Africa of Algiers) replaced the Jesuits at Laghouat. In 1873 the White Fathers established themselves at Biskra, Ouargla, Touggart and Gerryville. Later a station was founded at Melili in M'zab.
Two successive attempts were made by the White Fathers to reach the Sudan region by crossing the Sahara, thus reaching Timbuktu, a large market for black slaves, there to join in the struggle against slavery. The first attempt was made in December, 1878, by Fathers Menoret, Paulmier and Bouchand; they were slain in April, 1876 by their Touarag guides, being the first martyrs of the Society of White Fathers, and the cause of their beatification was introduced at Rome in 1909. After this disaster the White Fathers founded two stations, not farther north in the desert, but to the north-east, at Tripoli and Ghadames, both in Libya. The massacre of the explorer Flatters and his companions (1880–81) did not discourage the White Fathers in their second attempt to cross the Sahara. In 1881 Father Richard set out from Ghadames, having become so Arabian in speech and bearing that no one suspected his nationality. He intended to establish himself with Fathers Morat and Pouplard at Ghat in the midst of the Libyan desert, but all three were assassinated.
neg_context_en: South of the Atlas Mountains is the dry and barren expanse of the Sahara desert, which is the largest sand desert in the world. In places the desert is cut by irregular watercourses called wadis—streams that flow only after rainfalls but are usually dry. The Sahara’s major landforms include ergs, large seas of sand that sometimes form into huge dunes; the hammada, a level rocky plateau without soil or sand; and the reg, a level plain of gravel or small stones. The Sahara covers the southern part of Algeria, Morocco and Tunisia, and most of Libya. Only two regions of Libya are outside the desert: Tripolitania in the northwest and Cyrenaica in the northeast. Most of Egypt is also desert, with the exception of the Nile River and the irrigated land along its banks. The Nile Valley forms a narrow fertile thread that runs along the length of the country.

The surface of the desert ranges from large areas of sand dunes (erg), to stone plateaus (hamadas), gravel plains (reg), dry valleys (wadis), and salt flats. The only permanent river that crosses the ecoregion is the Nile River, which originates in central Africa and empties northwards into the Mediterranean Sea. Some areas encompass vast underground aquifers resulting in oases, while other regions severely lack water reserves.
The Sahara Desert features a hot desert climate (Köppen climate classification "BWh"). The Sahara Desert is one of the driest and hottest regions of the world, with a mean temperature sometimes over and the average high temperatures in summer are over for months at a time, and can even soar to . In desert rocky mountains such as the Tibesti in Libya or the Hoggar in Algeria, average highs in summer are slightly moderated by the high elevation and are between at elevation. Daily variations may also be extreme: a swing from has been observed. Typical temperature swings are between .

The Sahara Desert is the world's largest hot desert, located in North Africa. It stretches from the Red Sea to the Atlantic Ocean. The vast desert encompasses several ecologically distinct regions. The Sahara Desert ecoregion covers an area of in the hot, hyper-arid center of the Sahara, surrounded on the north, south, east, and west by desert ecoregions with higher rainfall and more vegetation.

The Sahara Desert was chosen as an ideal location for solar farms as it is exposed to bright sunshine nearly all the time, roughly between 80% and 97% of the daylight hours in the best cases. This is the sunniest year-round area on the planet. In the world's largest hot desert, there is an extremely vast area, covering almost the whole desert, that receives more than 3,600 h of yearly sunshine. There is also a very large area in excess of 4,000 h of sunshine annually. The highest solar radiation received on the planet is in the Sahara Desert, under the Tropic of Cancer. This results from a general, strong lack of cloud cover year-round and a geographical position under the tropics.

The potential for generating solar energy from the Sahara Desert is huge, the highest found on the globe. Professor David Faiman of Ben-Gurion University has stated that the technology now exists to supply all of the world's electricity needs from 10% of the Sahara Desert. Desertec Industrial Initiative was a consortium seeking $560 billion to invest in North African solar and wind installations over the next forty years to supply electricity to Europe via cable lines running under the Mediterranean Sea. European interest in the Sahara Desert stems from its two aspects: the almost continual daytime sunshine and plenty of unused land. The Sahara receives more sunshine per acre than any part of Europe. The Sahara Desert also has the empty space totalling hundreds of square miles required to house fields of mirrors for solar plants.

As also parts of the desert regions in the Middle East and North Africa (MENA) come with high wind potential, Dii is examining in which geographic regions the installation of wind farms is suitable. Wind turbines produce electricity by wind turning the blades, which spin a shaft, which connects to a generator which produces electricity. The Sahara Desert is one of the windiest areas on the planet, especially on the western coast where lies the Atlantic coastal desert along Western Sahara and Mauritania. The annual average wind speed at the ground greatly exceeds 5 m/s in most of the desert, and even approach 8 m/s or 9 m/s along the western ocean coast. It's important to note that wind speed increases with height. The regularity and the constancy of winds in arid regions are major assets for wind energy, too. The winds blow nearly constantly over the desert and there are generally no windless days during throughout the year. Therefore, the desert of North Africa is also an ideal location to install large-scale wind parks and wind turbines with very good productivity.

The Sahara Desert ecoregion, as defined by the World Wide Fund for Nature (WWF), includes the hyper-arid center of the Sahara, between 18° and 30° N. It is one of several desert and xeric shrubland ecoregions that cover the northern portion of the African continent.

The Kiffian culture is a prehistoric industry, or domain, that existed between 10,000 and 8,000 years ago in the Sahara, during the Neolithic Subpluvial. Human remains from this culture were found in 2000 at a site known as Gobero, located in Niger in the Ténéré Desert. The site is known as the largest and earliest grave of Stone Age people in the Sahara desert. The Kiffians were skilled hunters. Bones of many large savannah animals that were discovered in the same area suggest that they lived on the shores of a lake that was present during the Holocene Wet Phase, a period when the Sahara was verdant and wet. The Kiffian people were tall, standing over six feet in height. Craniometric analysis indicates that this early Holocene population was closely related to the Late Pleistocene Iberomaurusians and early Holocene Capsians of the Maghreb, as well as mid-Holocene Mechta groups. Traces of the Kiffian culture do not exist after 8,000 years ago, as the Sahara went through a dry period for the next thousand years. After this time, the Tenerian culture colonized the area.

The annual average insolation, which represents the total amount of solar radiation energy received on a given area and on a giver period, is about 2,500 kWh/(m² year) over the region and this number can soar up to almost 3,000 kWh/(m² year) in the best cases. The weather features of the Sahara Desert, especially the insolation, have a pronounced nature. The annual electricity production reaches 1,300,000 TWh at maximum in this sun-drenched area if the whole desert is covered in solar panels.
The desert is also extremely vast covering about some 9,000,000 km² (3,474,920 sq mi), being almost as large as China or the United States and is sparsely populated, making it possible to set up large solar farms without a negative impact on inhabitants of the region, too. Lastly, sand deserts can provide silicon, a raw material that is essential in the production of solar panels.
question_src: Jangwa la Sahara ni kubwa kiasi gani?
pos_context_src:
Sahara ni jangwa kubwa la kaskazini mwa Afrika, yenye urefu wa maili 932 kutoka kaskazini hadi kusini na maili 2484 kutoka mashariki hadi magharibi, na iliyo na mafuta ambayo ni vituo vya idadi ya watu. Miaka minane baada ya safari ya mchunguzi wa Ufaransa Henri Duveyrier (1859-61), ambayo ilikuwa na matokeo muhimu ya kisayansi, Papa Pius IX mnamo 6 Agosti 1868 aliteua Askofu Mkuu wa Algiers, mgr Charles Lavigerie, atoe kitume wa Sahara na Sudani. Katika mwaka huo huo WaJesuits walijiimarisha huko Laghouat, ukali uliochukuliwa na mikono ya Ufaransa. Mnamo 1871 walipeleka kwa MGR Lavigerie ripoti ndefu ambayo walitetea uanzishwaji wa mawakili na shule. Mnamo 1872 Baba Charmetant na baba wengine wawili weupe (Mababa wa Wamishonari wa Afrika wa Algiers) walibadilisha WaJesuits huko Laghouat. Mnamo 1873 baba nyeupe walijianzisha huko Biskra, Ouargla, Touggart na Gerryville. Baadaye kituo kilianzishwa huko Melili huko M'zab.
Majaribio mawili mfululizo yalifanywa na baba weupe kufikia mkoa wa Sudan kwa kuvuka Sahara, na hivyo kufikia Timbuktu, soko kubwa kwa watumwa weusi, huko kuungana na mapambano dhidi ya utumwa. Jaribio la kwanza lilifanywa mnamo Desemba, 1878, na Mababa Menoret, Paulmier na Bouchand; Waliuawa mnamo Aprili, 1876 na waongozaji wao wa Touarag, wakiwa mashuhuri wa kwanza wa Jumuiya ya Mababa weupe, na sababu ya kupigwa kwao ilianzishwa huko Roma mnamo 1909. Baada ya msiba huu baba weupe walianzisha vituo viwili, sio mbali kaskazini mwa jangwa, lakini kuelekea Kaskazini-Mashariki, huko Tripoli na Ghadames, wote huko Libya. Mauaji ya Flatters ya Explorer na wenzake (1880-81) hayakuvunja moyo baba wazungu katika jaribio lao la pili la kuvuka Sahara. Mnamo 1881 baba Richard alitoka Ghadames, akiwa amekuwa Arabia sana katika hotuba na kuzaa kwamba hakuna mtu anayeshuku utaifa wake. Alikusudia kujianzisha na baba Morat na Pouplard huko Ghat katikati ya Jangwa la Libya, lakini wote watatu waliuawa.
neg_context_src: Kusini mwa Milima ya Atlas ni anga kavu na tasa ya Jangwa la Sahara, ambayo ni jangwa kubwa zaidi ulimwenguni. Katika maeneo jangwa hukatwa na njia za maji zisizo za kawaida zinazoitwa Wadis -Mto ambao hutiririka tu baada ya mvua lakini kawaida huwa kavu. Maumbo makubwa ya Sahara ni pamoja na ERG, bahari kubwa ya mchanga ambayo wakati mwingine huunda kuwa matuta makubwa; Hammada, kiwango cha mwamba mwamba bila mchanga au mchanga; na reg, kiwango cha changarawe au mawe madogo. Sahara inashughulikia sehemu ya kusini ya Algeria, Moroko na Tunisia, na zaidi ya Libya. Mikoa miwili tu ya Libya iko nje ya jangwa: Tripolitania kaskazini magharibi na Cyrenaica kaskazini mashariki. Wengi wa Misri pia ni jangwa, isipokuwa Mto wa Nile na ardhi ya umwagiliaji kando ya benki zake. Bonde la Nile linaunda nyuzi nyembamba yenye rutuba ambayo inaendesha urefu wa nchi.

Uso wa jangwa unaanzia maeneo makubwa ya matuta ya mchanga (ERG), kwa jiwe la jiwe (hamadas), tambarare za changarawe (reg), mabonde kavu (wadis), na kujaa chumvi. Mto pekee wa kudumu ambao huvuka Ecoregion ni Mto wa Nile, ambao unatoka Afrika ya Kati na unaingia kaskazini kuelekea Bahari ya Mediterania. Maeneo mengine yanajumuisha maji mengi ya chini ya ardhi yanayosababisha oases, wakati mikoa mingine inakosa akiba ya maji.
Jangwa la Sahara lina hali ya hewa ya jangwa moto (Uainishaji wa hali ya hewa wa Köppen "BWH"). Jangwa la Sahara ni moja wapo ya maeneo kavu na moto zaidi ya ulimwengu, na joto la kawaida wakati mwingine na joto la wastani katika msimu wa joto limekwisha kwa miezi kwa wakati, na linaweza kuongezeka. Katika Milima ya Rocky ya Jangwa kama vile Tibesti huko Libya au Hoggar huko Algeria, wastani wa msimu wa joto hurekebishwa kidogo na mwinuko mkubwa na ni kati ya mwinuko. Tofauti za kila siku zinaweza pia kuwa kubwa: swing kutoka imezingatiwa. Swings za kawaida za joto ni kati.

Jangwa la Sahara ndio jangwa kubwa zaidi ulimwenguni, lililoko Afrika Kaskazini. Inapita kutoka Bahari Nyekundu hadi Bahari ya Atlantiki. Jangwa kubwa linajumuisha maeneo kadhaa tofauti ya ikolojia. Jangwa la Sahara linashughulikia eneo la kituo cha moto, chenye nguvu ya Sahara, iliyozungukwa kaskazini, kusini, mashariki, na magharibi na ecoregions za jangwa zilizo na mvua kubwa na mimea zaidi.

Jangwa la Sahara lilichaguliwa kama eneo bora kwa mashamba ya jua kwani yanafunuliwa na jua kali karibu wakati wote, takriban kati ya 80% na 97% ya masaa ya mchana katika kesi bora. Hii ndio eneo la jua la jua zaidi kwenye sayari. Katika jangwa kubwa zaidi ulimwenguni, kuna eneo kubwa sana, linalofunika karibu jangwa lote, ambalo hupokea zaidi ya 3,600 h ya jua la kila mwaka. Kuna pia eneo kubwa sana zaidi ya 4,000 h ya jua kila mwaka. Mionzi ya jua ya juu iliyopokelewa kwenye sayari iko kwenye jangwa la Sahara, chini ya tropic ya saratani. Hii inatokana na jumla, ukosefu mkubwa wa kifuniko cha wingu mwaka mzima na msimamo wa kijiografia chini ya nchi za joto.

Uwezo wa kutoa nishati ya jua kutoka kwa jangwa la Sahara ni kubwa, inayopatikana zaidi ulimwenguni. Profesa David Faiman wa Chuo Kikuu cha Ben-Gurion alisema kuwa teknolojia hiyo sasa ipo ya kusambaza mahitaji yote ya umeme ulimwenguni kutoka 10% ya Jangwa la Sahara. Mpango wa Viwanda wa Jangwa ulikuwa makubaliano ya kutafuta dola bilioni 560 kuwekeza katika mitambo ya jua ya Afrika Kaskazini na upepo katika miaka arobaini ijayo kusambaza umeme kwenda Ulaya kupitia mistari ya cable inayoendesha chini ya Bahari ya Mediterania. Masilahi ya Ulaya katika jangwa la Sahara yanatokana na mambo yake mawili: jua la karibu la jua na ardhi nyingi ambazo hazijatumiwa. Sahara hupokea jua zaidi kwa ekari kuliko sehemu yoyote ya Ulaya. Jangwa la Sahara pia lina nafasi tupu ya jumla ya mamia ya maili za mraba zinazohitajika kwa uwanja wa vioo kwa mimea ya jua.

Kama pia sehemu za mikoa ya jangwa katika Mashariki ya Kati na Afrika Kaskazini (MENA) zinakuja na uwezo mkubwa wa upepo, DII inachunguza ambayo mikoa ya kijiografia ya ufungaji wa mashamba ya upepo inafaa. Turbines za upepo hutoa umeme kwa upepo kugeuza blade, ambayo inazunguka shimoni, ambayo inaunganisha kwa jenereta ambayo hutoa umeme. Jangwa la Sahara ni moja wapo ya maeneo yenye nguvu zaidi kwenye sayari, haswa kwenye pwani ya magharibi ambayo iko jangwa la pwani la Atlantiki kando ya Sahara magharibi na Mauritania. Kasi ya wastani ya upepo wa kila mwaka ardhini inazidi 5 m/s katika jangwa nyingi, na hata inakaribia 8 m/s au 9 m/s kando ya Pwani ya Bahari ya Magharibi. Ni muhimu kutambua kuwa kasi ya upepo huongezeka na urefu. Utaratibu na uwepo wa upepo katika mikoa yenye ukame ni mali kuu kwa nishati ya upepo, pia. Upepo huvuma karibu kila wakati juu ya jangwa na kwa ujumla hakuna siku zisizo na upepo wakati wote wa mwaka. Kwa hivyo, jangwa la Afrika Kaskazini pia ni eneo bora la kufunga mbuga za upepo mkubwa na turbines za upepo na tija nzuri sana.

Ecoregion ya Jangwa la Sahara, kama inavyofafanuliwa na Mfuko wa Ulimwenguni Wote wa Asili (WWF), ni pamoja na kituo cha mseto wa Sahara, kati ya 18 ° na 30 ° N. Ni moja wapo ya ecoregions kadhaa za jangwa na Xeric ambazo zinafunika sehemu ya kaskazini ya bara la Afrika.

Tamaduni ya Kiffian ni tasnia ya prehistoric, au kikoa, ambayo ilikuwepo kati ya miaka 10,000 na 8,000 iliyopita huko Sahara, wakati wa Neolithic subpluvial. Mabaki ya wanadamu kutoka kwa tamaduni hii yalipatikana mnamo 2000 kwenye tovuti inayojulikana kama Gobero, iliyoko Niger katika Jangwa la Ténéré. Tovuti hiyo inajulikana kama kaburi kubwa na la kwanza la watu wa umri wa jiwe katika jangwa la Sahara. Wa Kiffi walikuwa wawindaji wenye ujuzi. Mifupa ya wanyama wengi wakubwa wa Savannah ambao waligunduliwa katika eneo hilo hilo wanaonyesha kwamba waliishi kwenye mwambao wa ziwa ambao ulikuwepo wakati wa sehemu ya mvua ya Holocene, kipindi ambacho Sahara ilikuwa ya mvua na mvua. Watu wa Kiffian walikuwa mrefu, wamesimama juu ya futi sita kwa urefu. Mchanganuo wa Craniometric unaonyesha kuwa idadi hii ya mapema ya Holocene ilikuwa inahusiana sana na marehemu Pleistocene Iberomaurusians na Waandishi wa mapema wa Holocene wa Maghreb, na vikundi vya Mid-Holocene Mechta. Maneno ya tamaduni ya Kiffian hayakuwepo baada ya miaka 8,000 iliyopita, kwani Sahara ilipitia kipindi cha kavu kwa miaka elfu ijayo. Baada ya wakati huu, utamaduni wa Tenerian uliweka eneo hilo.

Ushuru wa wastani wa kila mwaka, ambao unawakilisha jumla ya nishati ya mionzi ya jua iliyopokelewa kwenye eneo fulani na kwa kipindi cha mtoaji, ni karibu 2,500 kWh/(m² mwaka) juu ya mkoa na idadi hii inaweza kuongezeka hadi karibu 3,000 kWh/(m² mwaka) katika kesi bora. Vipengele vya hali ya hewa ya jangwa la Sahara, haswa ufilisi, zina asili iliyotamkwa. Uzalishaji wa umeme wa kila mwaka unafikia 1,300,000 TWH kwa kiwango cha juu katika eneo hili lililochomwa na jua ikiwa jangwa lote limefunikwa kwenye paneli za jua.
Jangwa pia ni kubwa sana juu ya kilomita 9,000,000 (3,474,920 sq mi), kuwa karibu kubwa kama Uchina au Merika na ina watu wengi, na kuifanya iweze kuanzisha shamba kubwa za jua bila athari mbaya kwa wenyeji wa mkoa huo, pia. Mwishowe, jangwa la mchanga linaweza kutoa silicon, malighafi ambayo ni muhimu katika utengenezaji wa paneli za jua.
report_src: Jangwa la Sahara ni mojawapo ya maeneo makubwa kabisa yenye ukame duniani, likiwa na urefu wa takribani maili 932 kutoka kaskazini hadi kusini (karibu km 1,500) na upana wa takribani maili 2,484 kutoka mashariki hadi magharibi (karibu km 4,000), hali inayoonyesha umbali mrefu unaolikamilisha kama jangwa kubwa barani Afrika [1].

question_en: Who designed Westminster Cathedral?
pos_context_en: Apart from the twenty years as a seminary in the late nineteenth century, this site has a 330-year tradition of contributing to the education of young women. The school building was designed by John Francis Bentley, also responsible for Westminster Cathedral. In 1993 Cardinal Basil Hume, Archbishop of Westminster, visited the school for a Mass to celebrate its 100th anniversary.
neg_context_en: The founder of Westminster Cathedral, Cardinal Herbert Vaughan laid great emphasis on the beauty and integrity of the cathedral's liturgy. Initially, he determined there should be a community of Benedictine monks at the new cathedral, performing the liturgies and singing the daily Office. This caused great resentment amongst the secular clergy of the diocese, who felt they were being snubbed. In the end, negotiations with both the English Benedictines and the community of French Benedictines at Farnborough failed and a 'traditional' choir of men and boys was set up instead. Despite great financial problems, the Choir School opened on 5 October 1901 with eleven boy choristers, in the building originally intended for the Benedictine monks. Cardinal Vaughan received the boys with the words "You are the foundation stones". The Cathedral Choir was officially instituted three months later in January 1902. Sung Masses and Offices were immediately established when the cathedral opened for worship in 1903, and have continued without interruption ever since. Today, Westminster Cathedral Choir is the only professional Catholic choir in the world to sing daily Mass and Vespers.

When the question of a musical director was first considered, the choice fell on the singer Sir Charles Santley, who had conducted the choir of the pro-cathedral in Kensington on several occasions. But Santley knew his limitations and refused. Richard Runciman Terry —Director of Music at Downside Abbey School— then became the first director of music of Westminster Cathedral. It proved to be an inspired choice. Terry was both a brilliant choir trainer and a pioneering scholar, one of the first musicologists to revive the great works of the English and other European Renaissance composers. Terry built Westminster Cathedral Choir's reputation on performances of music —by Byrd, Tallis, Taverner, Palestrina and Victoria, among others- that had not been heard since the sixteenth and seventeenth centuries, and Mass at the cathedral was soon attended by inquisitive musicians as well as the faithful. The performance of great Renaissance Masses and motets in their proper liturgical context remains the cornerstone of the choir's activity.

Westminster Cathedral has published a monthly magazine since 1896, before the building work was completed. The latest in a series of titles is "Oremus", which first appeared in 1996. (The Latin word "oremus" translates into English as "Let us pray".) "Oremus" is a 32-page colour magazine, which contains features and articles by well-known members of the Catholic community, as well as non-Catholic commentators and leading figures within British society. It is the successor of titles such as the "Westminster Cathedral Record", selling at 6d per copy from January 1896, the "Westminster Cathedral Chronicle", a monthly, available from January 1907 at 2d a copy or 3/- a year, post paid, and the "Westminster Cathedral Bulletin", first published in 1974. Dylan Parry, who edited the magazine between 2012 and August 2016, took the decision to make "Oremus" a free publication in 2013. The magazine is also available to download via Westminster Cathedral's website.

The site on which the cathedral stands in the City of Westminster was purchased by the Diocese of Westminster in 1885, and construction was completed in 1903. Westminster Cathedral is the largest Catholic church building in England and Wales and the seat of the Archbishop of Westminster.

It was not until the visit of Pope John Paul II in 1982 that the next mosaic was installed above the northwest entrance. Rather than a scene, this mosaic is an inscription: "Porta sis ostium pacificum par eum qui se ostium appellavit, Jesus Christum" (May this door be the gate of peace through Him who called Himself the gate, Jesus Christ). In 1999 the mosaic of Saint Patrick, holding a shamrock and a pastoral staff as well as trampling on a snake, was installed at the entrance to the chapel in his honour. In 2001 a striking mosaic of Saint Alban, strongly influenced by the style of early Byzantine iconography, was installed by the designer, Christopher Hobbs. Due to the very favourable reception of this work, Hobbs was commissioned for further mosaics: the chapel to Saint Joseph which contains mosaics of the Holy Family (2003) and men working on Westminster Cathedral (2006). Hobbs also did the chapel in honour of Saint Thomas Becket illustrating the saint standing in front of the old Canterbury Cathedral on the chapel's east wall and the murder of Thomas on the west wall. The vault is decorated with a design of flowers, tendrils and roundels. (2006). As of 2011, there were plans for further mosaics, for example Saint Francis of Assisi and Saint Anthony in the narthex

The monuments include those to George Ogden who died in 1781, by Hayward, to Anne Matthews who died in 1793, by Thomas Banks, to John Philips Buchanan who died at Waterloo in 1815, to the first Duke of Westminster, designed by C. J. Blomfield, and two memorial plaques to members of the Egerton family. On the wall of the southwest crossing pier are monuments which include a cenotaph to the casualties in HMS "Chester" in the Battle of Jutland in 1916 who included the 16-year-old John Cornwell VC. The west wall of the south transept has many memorials, including cenotaphs to the Cheshire Regiment, the Royal Air Force and the Free Czech Forces.

Scott was appointed architect to Westminster Abbey in 1849. In 1853 he built a Gothic terraced block adjoining the abbey in Broad Sanctuary. In 1858 he designed Christchurch Cathedral, Christchurch, New Zealand which now lies partly ruined following the earthquake in 2011 and subsequent attempts to demolish the cathedral by the Anglican Church authorities. Demolition was blocked after appeals by the population of Christchurch but the future of this historic building is still in dispute

The design by John Pollard Seddon – then diocesan architect for London – and Edward Beckitt Lamb (son of Edward Buckton Lamb) was based on earlier schemes that each had proposed separately, and was one of many extensions proposed for Westminster Abbey in late 19th and early 20th centuries by architects such as George Gilbert Scott, George John Shaw Lefevre, James Fergusson, and Henry Travis. In particular, the clergy at Westminster Abbey were concerned that the church was becoming crowded with monuments, and more space was needed. Some of the proposed designs were considered by a Royal Commission in 1891, and the issue was given added impetus after the coronation of King Edward VII and Queen Alexandra in August 1902 by a desire for Westminster Abbey to become a fitting Imperial monument, to compete with the baroque St Paul's Cathedral where Queen Victoria had commemorated her Diamond Jubilee in 1897.

At Truro they were commissioned by John Loughborough Pearson to design windows for the new Cathedral, and of these windows it is claimed - "“The stained glass which was made by Clayton and Bell is thought to be the finest Victorian stained glass in England and tells the story of the Christian Church, starting with the birth of Jesus and finishing with the building of Truro Cathedral.” " 
In London, another new cathedral was under construction- the Byzantine style, enormously ornate (and as yet incompletely decorated), Catholic Cathedral of Westminster, designed by John Francis Bentley. Many designers were employed as the cathedral has a series of chapels, each different in concept. Lord Brampton, a recent convert to Roman Catholicism, selected Clayton and Bell to fill his commission for an altarpiece for the Chapel of Saints Augustine and Gregory, representing the conversion of England to Christianity. Clayton designed the mosaics in much the way that he designed stained glass, in a Victorian Gothic manner, but with a gold background, traditional to the ancient mosaics of Venice. Although the work was to be assembled by Salviati’s workshop on Murano, the tiles were English, having been made by a technique developed by the stained glass firm of James Powell and Sons and manufactured by that firm. Clayton despatched the cartoons and the tiles to Venice, where the expert mosaicists selected and glued them face down to the drawing, a technique said to have been devised by Salviati. The tiles were then adhered to the wall surface and the paper removed, leaving the mosaic intact. Lord Brampton died in 1907, to be commemorated by a mosaic of the “Just Judge”. One of Clayton’s last commissions was the design for another mosaic for the chapel “Non Angli sed Angeli”, donated by the Choir in 1912.
question_src: Ni nani aliyebuni Kanisa Kuu la Westminster?
pos_context_title_src: Shule ya Upili ya Moyo Mtakatifu, Hammersmith
pos_context_src: Mbali na miaka ishirini kama seminari mwishoni mwa karne ya kumi na tisa, tovuti hii ina mila ya miaka 330 ya kuchangia elimu ya wanawake vijana. Jengo la shule lilibuniwa na John Francis Bentley, pia kuwajibika kwa Kanisa kuu la Westminster. Mnamo 1993 Kardinali Basil Hume, Askofu Mkuu wa Westminster, alitembelea shule hiyo kwa misa ya kusherehekea kumbukumbu yake ya miaka 100.
neg_context_title_src: Majumba ya Monumental ya Imperial na Mnara
neg_context_src: Mwanzilishi wa Kanisa kuu la Westminster, Kardinali Herbert Vaughan alisisitiza sana juu ya uzuri na uadilifu wa liturujia ya kanisa kuu. Hapo awali, aliamua kuwe na jamii ya watawa wa Benedictine kwenye kanisa kuu mpya, wakifanya liturujia na kuimba ofisi ya kila siku. Hii ilisababisha chuki kubwa kati ya makasisi wa kidunia wa dayosisi, ambao waliona walikuwa wakinyang'anywa. Mwishowe, mazungumzo na Benedictines ya Kiingereza na jamii ya Benedictines ya Ufaransa huko Farnborough ilishindwa na kwaya ya 'jadi' ya wanaume na wavulana ilianzishwa badala yake. Licha ya shida kubwa za kifedha, shule ya kwaya ilifunguliwa mnamo 5 Oktoba 1901 na chorista kumi na moja, katika jengo hilo hapo awali lililokusudiwa kwa watawa wa Benedictine. Kardinali Vaughan alipokea wavulana na maneno "Wewe ndiye Mawe ya Msingi". Kwaya ya Kanisa kuu ilianzishwa rasmi miezi mitatu baadaye mnamo Januari 1902. Masheikh na ofisi zilizoimbwa zilianzishwa mara moja wakati Kanisa kuu lilifunguliwa kwa ibada mnamo 1903, na zimeendelea bila usumbufu tangu hapo. Leo, kwaya ya Kanisa Kuu la Westminster ndio kwaya ya kitaalam ya Katoliki tu ulimwenguni kuimba Misa ya kila siku na Vespers.

Wakati swali la mkurugenzi wa muziki lilipozingatiwa kwanza, chaguo lilimpata mwimbaji Sir Charles Santley, ambaye alikuwa ameendesha kwaya ya pro-Cathedral huko Kensington mara kadhaa. Lakini Santley alijua mapungufu yake na alikataa. Richard Runciman Terry - Mtaalam wa Muziki katika Shule ya Abbey ya Downide - kisha akawa mkurugenzi wa kwanza wa Muziki wa Westminster Cathedral. Ilithibitika kuwa chaguo lililopuliziwa. Terry wote alikuwa mkufunzi wa kwaya ya kipaji na msomi wa upainia, mmoja wa wanamuziki wa kwanza kufufua kazi kubwa za Kiingereza na watunzi wengine wa Renaissance wa Ulaya. Terry aliunda sifa ya Choir ya Kanisa Kuu la Westminster juu ya maonyesho ya muziki- na Byrd, Tallis, Taverner, Palestrina na Victoria, miongoni mwa wengine- ambao walikuwa hawajasikika tangu karne ya kumi na sita na ya kumi na saba, na Mass katika kanisa kuu ilihudhuriwa na wanamuziki wanaouliza na vile vile waaminifu. Utendaji wa watu wakubwa wa Renaissance na Motets katika muktadha wao sahihi wa kiteknolojia bado ndio msingi wa shughuli ya kwaya.

Kanisa kuu la Westminster limechapisha gazeti la kila mwezi tangu 1896, kabla ya kazi ya ujenzi kukamilika. Ya hivi karibuni katika safu ya majina ni "Oremus", ambayo ilionekana mara ya kwanza mnamo 1996. (Neno la Kilatini "Oremus" hutafsiri kwa Kiingereza kama "Wacha tuombe".) "Oremus" ni jarida la rangi ya kurasa 32, ambalo lina sifa na vifungu na washiriki wanaojulikana wa jamii ya Katoliki, na pia watoa maoni wasio Wakatoliki na takwimu zinazoongoza ndani ya jamii ya Uingereza. Ni mrithi wa majina kama vile "Westminster Cathedral Record", akiuza kwa 6d kwa nakala kutoka Januari 1896, "Westminster Cathedral Chronicle", kila mwezi, inayopatikana kutoka Januari 1907 saa 2d nakala au 3/- mwaka, Post ililipwa, na "Westminster Cathedral Bulletin", ilichapisha Magongo ya 2017. "Oremus" Mchapishaji wa bure mnamo 2013. Jarida linapatikana pia kupakua kupitia wavuti ya Westminster Cathedral.

Tovuti ambayo kanisa kuu limesimama katika mji wa Westminster lilinunuliwa na Dayosisi ya Westminster mnamo 1885, na ujenzi ulikamilishwa mnamo 1903. Westminster Cathedral ndio jengo kubwa la kanisa Katoliki huko England na Wales na kiti cha Askofu Mkuu wa Westminster.

Haikuwa mpaka ziara ya Papa John Paul II mnamo 1982 kwamba mosaic iliyofuata iliwekwa juu ya mlango wa kaskazini magharibi. Badala ya tukio, mosaic hii ni maandishi: "Porta sis ostium pacificum par eum qui se ostium appellavit, Yesu Christum" (mlango huu uwe lango la amani kupitia yeye aliyejiita lango, Yesu Kristo). Mnamo mwaka wa 1999 Musa wa Mtakatifu Patrick, akiwa ameshikilia shamrock na wafanyikazi wa kichungaji na kukanyaga nyoka, aliwekwa kwenye mlango wa kanisa kwa heshima yake. Mnamo 2001 mosaic ya kushangaza ya Saint Alban, iliyoathiriwa sana na mtindo wa picha ya mapema ya Byzantine, iliwekwa na mbuni, Christopher Hobbs. Kwa sababu ya mapokezi mazuri ya kazi hii, Hobbs aliagizwa kwa picha zaidi: Chapel kwa Mtakatifu Joseph ambayo ina mosai za Familia Takatifu (2003) na wanaume wanaofanya kazi kwenye Westminster Cathedral (2006). Hobbs pia alifanya kanisa hilo kwa heshima ya Mtakatifu Thomas Becket akionyesha mtakatifu amesimama mbele ya Kanisa kuu la zamani la Canterbury kwenye ukuta wa mashariki wa Chapel na mauaji ya Thomas kwenye ukuta wa Magharibi. Vault imepambwa na muundo wa maua, tendrils na raundi. (2006). Mnamo mwaka wa 2011, kulikuwa na mipango ya mosai zaidi, kwa mfano Mtakatifu Francis wa Assisi na Mtakatifu Anthony katika Narthex

Makaburi hayo ni pamoja na wale wa George Ogden ambaye alikufa mnamo 1781, na Hayward, kwa Anne Matthews ambaye alikufa mnamo 1793, na Thomas Banks, kwa John Philips Buchanan ambaye alikufa huko Waterloo mnamo 1815, kwa Duke wa kwanza wa Westminster, iliyoundwa na C. J. Blomfield, na maelewano mawili ya kumbukumbu ya washiriki wa familia ya Egert. Kwenye ukuta wa kusini magharibi mwa Pier ni makaburi ambayo ni pamoja na cenotaph kwa majeruhi katika HMS "Chester" katika Vita vya Jutland mnamo 1916 ambaye alijumuisha John Cornwell VC wa miaka 16. Ukuta wa magharibi wa Transept Kusini una kumbukumbu nyingi, pamoja na cenotaphs kwa Kikosi cha Cheshire, Jeshi la Anga la Royal na vikosi vya bure vya Czech.

Scott aliteuliwa mbunifu wa Westminster Abbey mnamo 1849. Mnamo 1853 aliunda kizuizi cha gothic kilichoungana na Abbey katika patakatifu pa pana. Mnamo 1858 aliunda Kanisa kuu la Christchurch, Christchurch, New Zealand ambayo sasa imeharibiwa kufuatia tetemeko la ardhi mnamo 2011 na majaribio ya baadaye ya kubomoa kanisa kuu na viongozi wa kanisa la Anglikana. Uharibifu ulizuiliwa baada ya rufaa na idadi ya watu wa Christchurch lakini mustakabali wa jengo hili la kihistoria bado uko kwenye mzozo

Ubunifu wa John Pollard Seddon - wakati huo mbunifu wa Dayosisi ya London - na Edward Beckitt Mwanakondoo (mtoto wa Edward Buckton Lamb) alitokana na miradi ya mapema ambayo kila mmoja alikuwa amependekeza kando, na alikuwa mmoja wa viongezeo vingi vilivyopendekezwa kwa Westminster Abbey mwishoni mwa karne ya 19 na mapema karne ya 20 na wasanifu kama vile George Gilbert Scott. Hasa, wachungaji huko Westminster Abbey walikuwa na wasiwasi kwamba kanisa hilo lilikuwa likijaa makaburi, na nafasi zaidi inahitajika. Baadhi ya miundo iliyopendekezwa ilizingatiwa na tume ya kifalme mnamo 1891, na suala hilo liliongezewa msukumo baada ya kutekwa kwa Mfalme Edward VII na Malkia Alexandra mnamo Agosti 1902 na hamu ya Westminster Abbey kuwa mtawala anayefaa wa Imperial, kushindana na Kanisa kuu la Baroque St Paul.

Huko Truro waliagizwa na John Loughborough Pearson kubuni madirisha kwa kanisa kuu mpya, na kati ya madirisha haya inadaiwa - "" Glasi iliyochafuliwa ambayo ilitengenezwa na Clayton na Bell inadhaniwa kuwa glasi bora zaidi ya Victoria huko England na inasimulia hadithi ya kanisa la Kikristo, kuanzia na kuzaliwa kwa Yesu na kumaliza na Jengo la Jengo la Truro. " " 
Huko London, kanisa kuu lingine lilikuwa chini ya ujenzi- mtindo wa Byzantine, uliopambwa sana (na kama uliopambwa kabisa), Kanisa Katoliki la Westminster, iliyoundwa na John Francis Bentley. Wabunifu wengi waliajiriwa kama Kanisa Kuu lina safu ya chapati, kila tofauti katika dhana. Lord Brampton, mbadilishaji wa hivi karibuni wa Ukatoliki wa Kirumi, alichagua Clayton na Bell kujaza tume yake ya madhabahu kwa Chapel ya Watakatifu Augustine na Gregory, anayewakilisha ubadilishaji wa England kuwa Ukristo. Clayton alibuni michoro kwa njia ambayo aliunda glasi iliyowekwa, kwa njia ya Victoria ya Victoria, lakini kwa asili ya dhahabu, ya jadi kwa picha za zamani za Venice. Ingawa kazi hiyo ilikusanywa na semina ya Salviati juu ya Murano, tiles hizo zilikuwa za Kiingereza, zilifanywa na mbinu iliyotengenezwa na kampuni ya glasi iliyowekwa wazi ya James Powell na wana na viwandani na kampuni hiyo. Clayton alituma katuni na tiles kwenda Venice, ambapo wataalam wa mosaic walichagua na kuwachanganya uso chini ya mchoro, mbinu iliyosemwa ilibuniwa na Salviati. Matofali hayo yalizingatiwa kwa uso wa ukuta na karatasi ikaondolewa, ikiacha mosaic intact. Lord Brampton alikufa mnamo 1907, kukumbukwa na mosaic ya "jaji wa haki". Moja ya tume ya mwisho ya Clayton ilikuwa muundo wa picha nyingine ya Chapel "Non Angli Sed Angeli", iliyotolewa na kwaya mnamo 1912.
report_src: Kanisa Kuu la Westminster (Westminster Cathedral) lilibuniwa na mbunifu John Francis Bentley, ambaye pia alibuni jengo la Shule ya Upili ya Moyo Mtakatifu, Hammersmith [1].

question_en: Who is mayor of Islip, NY?
pos_context_en: The town is governed by a Town Supervisor, which is a similar position to that of a Mayor, and four councilmembers elected on an at-large basis. There is also a Town Clerk and Receiver of Taxes, both duly elected. All of the elected officials serve staggered four year terms that are up for election in odd years, except when special elections are held pursuant to state law. The current supervisor is Angie Carpenter, a Republican, who was formerly the Suffolk County Treasurer. She succeeded Tom Croci after he was elected to the New York State Senate in 2015.
neg_context_en: On November 29, 1683, William Nicoll (Nicholls) founder of the Town of Islip, NY, a son of New York City Mayor Matthias Nicoll, was awarded the first ”Royal Patent” of the east end of what is now the Town of Islip. Mr. Nicoll purchased land from Sachem (Chief) Winnequaheagh of Connetquot. He named his 50,000 acre (8 x 10 mile tract of land (210 km2)) plantation "Islip Grange," in honor of Nicoll's ancestral home in East Northamptonshire, England, from which Matthias emigrated in 1664: Islip, England. Significantly, this eventually became the largest manor on Long Island.

William Nicoll, a son of New York City Mayor Matthias Nicoll, became a patentee in the 1680s of the east end of what is now the Town of Islip. He accumulated over and named his estate Islip, after the Nicolls' ancestral home in East Northamptonshire, England. His domain included what are now the hamlets of Islip, East Islip, Bayport, Sayville, West Sayville, Oakdale, Great River, Islip Terrace, Central Islip, Hauppauge, Holbrook, Bohemia, Brentwood, Holtsville, and a portion of Ronkonkoma. This land was purchased from Winnequaheagh, Sachem of Connetquot in 1683. The annual fee paid to Governor Thomas Dongan of New York was five bushels of good winter wheat or 25 shillings.

On November 29, 1683, William Nicoll (Nicolls), founder of the Town of Islip and son of New York City Mayor Matthias Nicoll, was awarded the first royal patent to the east end of what is now the Town of Islip. Nicoll purchased land from Sachem (Paramount chief) Winnequaheagh of Connetquot. He named his plantation (an tract of land) "Islip Grange", in honor of his ancestral home of Islip (UK) in East Northamptonshire, England, from which Matthias emigrated in 1664. Nicoll's domain extended from East Islip to Bayport and embraced the present-day communities of Sayville, West Sayville, Oakdale, Great River, Islip Terrace, Central Islip, Hauppauge, Holbrook, Bohemia, Brentwood, Holtsville, and a portion of Ronkonkoma. Nicoll paid an annual quit-rent (tax) to Thomas Dongan, 2nd Earl of Limerick and Governor of the Province of New York, of five bushels of good winter wheat or twenty-five (25) shillings payable annually on March 25.

Tom Cilmi (born June 5, 1964) is a Republican Legislator who currently serves constituents for the Tenth Legislative District of New York, and was first inaugurated in January 2010. The 10th District in Suffolk County encompasses Islip, East Islip, Hauppauge, Islip Terrace, Great River, Bohemia, Ronkonkoma, Bay Shore and Islandia. He formerly served as the president of the Islip Chamber of Commerce.

Islip is a station on the Montauk Branch of the Long Island Rail Road, off NY 111 (Islip Avenue) and Nassau Avenue, north of Suffolk CR 50 (Union Boulevard), and south of Moffitt Boulevard in Islip, New York, but the official description of its location isn't as precise. The MTA describes the station as being located at the same address, but also between Sunrise Highway (NY 27) and NY 27A, and does not include Nassau Avenue. Full Service and Daily Ticket Machines are on the north side of the station building.

Nicoll was born in the village of Islip, Northamptonshire in England in 1657. He was the son of Abigail (née Johns) Nicoll and Matthias Nicoll, who served as the 6th Mayor of New York City from 1672 to 1673. His sister, Margaret Nicoll, was married to Col. Richard Floyd Jr., the colonel of provincial troops of Suffolk County and judge of the Court of Common Pleas and grandfather of William Floyd.

Islip was doubtless a member of the family which rose to ecclesiastical importance in the person of Archbishop Simon Islip. John entered the monastery of Westminster about 1480, and showed his administrative capacity in minor offices, till in 1498 he was elected prior, and on 27 October 1500 abbot of Westminster. The first business which he undertook was to claim for the abbey of Westminster the possession of the body of HenryVI, for whose canonisation Henry VII was pressing at Rome. The claim was disputed by Windsor and Chertsey Abbey, and the question was argued before the privy council, which decided in favour of Westminster. Henry VI's remains were removed from Windsor at a cost of £500. Islip had next to advise Henry VII in his plan for removing the old lady chapel of the abbey church and the erection instead of the chapel which still bears Henry VII's name. The old building was pulled down, and on 24 January 1503 Islip laid the foundation-stone of the new structure. The indentures between the king and Abbot Islip relating to the foundation of Henry VII's chantry and the regulation of its services are in the Harleian MS. 1498. They are splendidly engrossed, and have two initial letters which represent the king giving the document to Islip and the monks who kneel before him. The face of Islip is so strongly marked that it seems to be a real portrait.

Matthias Nicoll relocated to New York from Islip, Northamptonshire, England, in 1664.
His son, William Nicoll, became a royal patentee of the east end of what is now the Town of Islip, and his domain reached from East Islip to Bayport and included Sayville, West Sayville, Oakdale, Great River, Islip Terrace, Central Islip, Hauppauge, Holbrook, Bohemia, Brentwood, Holtsville and a portion of Ronkonkoma. All of this land was bought from Winne-quaheagh, Sachem (chief) of Connetquot in 1683. The yearly fee paid to Governor Thomas Dongan of New York was five bushels of quality winter wheat or 25 shillings. Other early land patentees were Andrew Gibb (Islip Hamlet), John Mowbray (Bay Shore, originally Awixa), Stephan Van Cortlandt (Sagtikos Manor), and Thomas Willets (West Islip).

Lowell Harrelson, the owner of the garbage, tried to negotiate for the "Mobro" to dock near Queens, whence the refuse would be carried back to Islip by trucks. Claire Shulman, the borough president of Queens, was not consulted, however; she obtained a temporary restraining order that forced the waste to stay at sea. The "Mobro" and its decaying cargo stayed off the shores of Brooklyn until July, when the vessel was granted a federal anchorage in New Jersey. The court hearings ran until October, when it was agreed that the cargo should be incinerated in Brooklyn. The 430 tons of ash that remained from this process was added to the landfill in Islip.
question_src: Meya wa Islip ni nani, NY?
pos_context_src: Jiji linatawaliwa na msimamizi wa jiji, ambayo ni nafasi sawa na ile ya meya, na madiwani wanne waliochaguliwa kwa msingi mkubwa. Kuna pia karani wa jiji na mpokeaji wa ushuru, wote waliochaguliwa. Maafisa wote waliochaguliwa hutumikia masharti ya miaka minne ambayo ni ya uchaguzi katika miaka isiyo ya kawaida, isipokuwa wakati uchaguzi maalum unafanyika kulingana na sheria za serikali. Msimamizi wa sasa ni Angie Carpenter, Republican, ambaye zamani alikuwa mweka hazina wa Kaunti ya Suffolk. Alifanikiwa Tom Croci baada ya kuchaguliwa katika Seneti ya Jimbo la New York mnamo 2015.
neg_context_src: Mnamo Novemba 29, 1683, mwanzilishi wa William Nicoll (Nicholls) wa mji wa Islip, NY, mwana wa Meya wa Jiji la New York Matthias Nicoll, alipewa tuzo ya kwanza "Royal Patent" ya mwisho wa Mashariki ya sasa ni mji wa Islip. Bwana Nicoll alinunua ardhi kutoka Sachem (Chief) Winnequaheagh wa Connetquot. Alitaja ekari yake 50,000 (8 x 10 maili ya ardhi (210 km2)) "Islip Grange," kwa heshima ya nyumba ya mababu ya Nicoll huko Northamptonshire Mashariki, England, ambayo Matthias alihamia mnamo 1664: Islip, England. Kwa kweli, mwishowe hii ikawa manor kubwa kwenye Kisiwa cha Long.

William Nicoll, mwana wa Meya wa Jiji la New York Matthias Nicoll, alikua patente katika miaka ya 1680 ya mwisho wa mashariki wa ambayo sasa ni mji wa Islip. Alijikusanya na jina lake la mali isiyohamishika, baada ya nyumba ya mababu ya Nicoll huko Northamptonshire Mashariki, England. Kikoa chake ni pamoja na kile ambacho sasa ni Hamlets of Islip, Islip Mashariki, Bayport, Sayville, West Sayville, Oakdale, Mto Mkuu, Islip Terrace, Islip ya Kati, Hauppauge, Holbrook, Bohemia, Brentwood, Holtsville, na sehemu ya Ronkoma. Ardhi hii ilinunuliwa kutoka Winnequaheagh, Sachem ya Connetquot mnamo 1683. Ada ya kila mwaka iliyolipwa kwa Gavana Thomas Dongan wa New York ilikuwa mabasi matano ya ngano nzuri ya msimu wa baridi au shilingi 25.

Mnamo Novemba 29, 1683, William Nicoll (Nicolls), mwanzilishi wa mji wa Islip na mwana wa Meya wa Jiji la New York Matthias Nicoll, alipewa patent ya kwanza ya kifalme hadi mwisho wa mashariki wa ambayo sasa ni mji wa Islip. Nicoll alinunua ardhi kutoka kwa Sachem (Mkuu wa Paramount) Winnequaheagh wa Connetquot. He named his plantation (an tract of land) "Islip Grange", in honor of his ancestral home of Islip (UK) in East Northamptonshire, England, from which Matthias emigrated in 1664. Nicoll's domain extended from East Islip to Bayport and embraced the present-day communities of Sayville, West Sayville, Oakdale, Great River, Islip Terrace, Central Islip, Hauppauge, Holbrook, Bohemia, Brentwood, Holtsville, na sehemu ya Ronkonkoma. Nicoll alilipa kodi ya kujiondoa ya kila mwaka (ushuru) kwa Thomas Dongan, Earl ya 2 ya Limerick na Gavana wa Mkoa wa New York, ya mabasi matano ya ngano nzuri ya msimu wa baridi au shilingi ishirini na tano (25) zinazolipwa kila mwaka mnamo Machi 25.

Tom Cilmi (amezaliwa Juni 5, 1964) ni mbunge wa Republican ambaye kwa sasa anahudumia maeneo ya Wilaya ya Kumi ya New York, na alizinduliwa kwanza mnamo Januari 2010. Wilaya ya 10 katika Kaunti ya Suffolk inajumuisha Islip, Islip Mashariki, Hauppauge, Islip Terrace, Great River, Bohemia, Ronkoma, Baye, Baye. Hapo zamani aliwahi kuwa Rais wa Chumba cha Biashara cha Islip.

Islip ni kituo kwenye tawi la Montauk la Barabara ya Long Island, mbali na NY 111 (Islip Avenue) na Nassau Avenue, kaskazini mwa Suffolk CR 50 (Union Boulevard), na kusini mwa Moffitt Boulevard huko Islip, New York, lakini maelezo rasmi ya eneo lake sio sawa. MTA inaelezea kituo hicho kuwa iko katika anwani hiyo hiyo, lakini pia kati ya Barabara kuu ya Jua (NY 27) na NY 27A, na haijumuishi Nassau Avenue. Huduma kamili na mashine za tikiti za kila siku ziko upande wa kaskazini wa jengo la kituo.

Nicoll alizaliwa katika kijiji cha Islip, Northamptonshire huko England mnamo 1657. Alikuwa mtoto wa Abigail (née Johns) Nicoll na Matthias Nicoll, ambaye aliwahi kuwa Meya wa 6 wa New York City kutoka 1672 hadi 1673. Dada yake, Margaret Nicoll, alikuwa ameolewa na Col. Richard Floy Jr. ya Pleas ya kawaida na babu wa William Floyd.

Islip bila shaka alikuwa mtu wa familia ambaye aliibuka na umuhimu wa kikanisa kwa mtu wa Askofu Mkuu Simon Islip. John aliingia katika nyumba ya watawa ya Westminster karibu 1480, na alionyesha uwezo wake wa kiutawala katika ofisi ndogo, hadi mnamo 1498 alichaguliwa kabla, na mnamo 27 Oktoba 1500 Abbot wa Westminster. Biashara ya kwanza ambayo alichukua ilikuwa kudai kwa Abbey ya Westminster milki ya mwili wa Henryvi, ambaye Canonization Henry VII alikuwa akishinikiza huko Roma. Madai hayo yalipingwa na Windsor na Chertsey Abbey, na swali hilo lilisemwa mbele ya Baraza la Faida, ambalo liliamua kwa Westminster. Mabaki ya Henry VI yaliondolewa kutoka Windsor kwa gharama ya Pauni 500. Islip alikuwa karibu kumshauri Henry VII katika mpango wake wa kuondoa yule mzee wa kanisa la Abbey na ujenzi badala ya kanisa ambalo bado lina jina la Henry VII. Jengo la zamani lilivutwa, na mnamo Januari 24 Januari 1503 likaweka jiwe la msingi wa muundo mpya. Matangazo kati ya Mfalme na Abbot Islip yanayohusiana na msingi wa Chantry ya Henry VII na kanuni za huduma zake ziko kwenye Harleian MS. 1498. Wameshikwa kwa kifahari, na wana herufi mbili za awali ambazo zinawakilisha mfalme akitoa hati hiyo kwa Islip na watawa ambao wanapiga magoti mbele yake. Uso wa Islip umewekwa alama sana hivi kwamba inaonekana kuwa picha halisi.

Matthias Nicoll alihamia New York kutoka Islip, Northamptonshire, England, mnamo 1664.
Mwanawe, William Nicoll, alikua patentee wa kifalme wa mwisho wa mashariki wa kile ambacho sasa ni mji wa Islip, na kikoa chake kilifikiwa kutoka Islip Mashariki kwenda Bayport na ni pamoja na Sayville, West Sayville, Oakdale, Mto Mkuu, Islip Terrace, Islip ya Kati, Hauppauge, Holbrook, Bohemia, Brentwood, Holtsville na Holtville na Holtville. Ardhi hii yote ilinunuliwa kutoka kwa Winne-Quaheagh, Sachem (mkuu) wa Connetquot mnamo 1683. Ada ya kila mwaka iliyolipwa kwa Gavana Thomas Dongan wa New York ilikuwa basi tano za ngano ya msimu wa baridi au shilingi 25. Wamiliki wengine wa ardhi wa mapema walikuwa Andrew Gibb (Islip Hamlet), John Mowbray (Bay Shore, asili Awixa), Stephan Van Cortlandt (Sagtikos Manor), na Thomas Willets (West Islip).

Lowell Harrelson, mmiliki wa takataka, alijaribu kujadili kwa "Mobro" ili kuzunguka Queens, ambapo taka hiyo ingerudishwa nyuma kwa Islip na malori. Claire Shulman, Rais wa Borough wa Queens, hakushauriwa, hata hivyo; Alipata agizo la kuzuia muda ambalo lililazimisha taka kukaa baharini. "Mobro" na shehena yake ya kuoza ilikaa pwani ya Brooklyn hadi Julai, wakati chombo hicho kilipewa nanga ya shirikisho huko New Jersey. Usikilizaji wa korti uliendelea hadi Oktoba, wakati ilikubaliwa kwamba shehena hiyo inapaswa kutekelezwa huko Brooklyn. Tani 430 za majivu ambazo zilibaki kutoka kwa mchakato huu ziliongezwa kwa utaftaji wa ardhi huko Islip.
report_src: Katika Manispaa ya Islip, nafasi ya meya inalinganishwa moja kwa moja na “msimamizi wa jiji”; mtu anayeshikilia wadhifa huu kwa sasa ni Angie Carpenter, ambaye alichukua nafasi hiyo mwaka 2015 baada ya mtangulizi wake, Tom Croci, kuchaguliwa katika Seneti ya Jimbo la New York [1].

question_en: What is the molecular weight of water?
pos_context_en: Molecular masses are calculated from the standard atomic weights of each nuclide, while molar masses are calculated from the atomic mass of each element. The atomic mass takes into account the isotopic distribution of the element in a given sample (usually assumed to be "normal"). For example, water has a molar mass of 18.0153(3) g/mol, but individual water molecules have molecular masses which range between 18.010 564 6863(15) u (HO) and 22.027 7364(9) u (DO).
neg_context_en: There are a variety of probes with different membrane and shaft length combinations available. The molecular weight cutoff of commercially available microdialysis probes covers a wide range of approximately 6-100kD, but also 1MD is available. While water-soluble compounds generally diffuse freely across the microdialysis membrane, the situation is not as clear for highly lipophilic analytes, where both successful (e.g. corticosteroids) and unsuccessful microdialysis experiments (e.g. estradiol, fusidic acid) have been reported. However, the recovery of water-soluble compounds usually decreases rapidly if the molecular weight of the analyte exceeds 25% of the membrane’s molecular weight cutoff.

The upper molecular-weight limit for a small molecule is approximately 900 daltons, which allows for the possibility to rapidly diffuse across cell membranes so that it can reach intracellular sites of action. This molecular weight cutoff is also a necessary but insufficient condition for oral bioavailability as it allows for transcellular transport through intestinal epithelial cells. In addition to intestinal permeability, the molecule must also possess a reasonably rapid rate of dissolution into water and adequate water solubility and moderate to low first pass metabolism. A somewhat lower molecular weight cutoff of 500 daltons (as part of the "rule of five") has been recommended for oral small molecule drug candidates based on the observation that clinical attrition rates are significantly reduced if the molecular weight is kept below this limit.

A molecule of heavy water has two deuterium atoms in place of the two protium atoms of ordinary "light" water. The weight of a heavy water molecule, however, is not substantially different from that of a normal water molecule, because about 89% of the molecular weight of water comes from the single oxygen atom rather than the two hydrogen atoms. The colloquial term "heavy water" refers to a highly enriched water mixture that contains mostly deuterium oxide , but also some hydrogen-deuterium oxide (HDO) and a smaller amount of ordinary hydrogen oxide . For instance, the heavy water used in CANDU reactors is 99.75% enriched by hydrogen atom-fraction—meaning that 99.75% of the hydrogen atoms are of the heavy type. For comparison, ordinary water (the "ordinary water" used for a deuterium standard) contains only about 156 deuterium atoms per million hydrogen atoms, meaning that 0.0156% of the hydrogen atoms are of the heavy type.

In many web sources, particularly in relation to safety considerations at commercial and industrial facilities in the U.S., vapour density is defined with respect to air, not hydrogen. Air is given a vapour density of one. For this use, air has a molecular weight of 28.97 atomic mass units, and all other gas and vapour molecular weights are divided by this number to derive their vapour density. For example, acetone has a vapour density of 2 in relation to air. That means acetone vapour is twice as heavy as air. This can be seen by dividing the molecular weight of Acetone, 58.1 by that of air, 28.97, which equals 2.

Chloropicrin's chemical formula is CClNO and its molecular weight is 164.38 grams/mole. Pure chloropicrin is a colorless liquid, with a boiling point of 112 °C. Chloropicrin is sparingly soluble in water with solubility of 2000 mg/L at 25 °C. It is volatile, with a vapor pressure of 23.2 millimeters of mercury (mmHg) at 25 °C; the corresponding Henry's law constant is 0.00251 atmosphere-cubic meter per mole. The octanol-water partition coefficient ("K") of chloropicrin is estimated to be 269. Its soil adsorption coefficient ("K"; normalized to soil organic matter content) is 25 cm/g.

Schizophyllan has a molecular weight of 450,000 Da, and a specific rotation in water of +18-24°. A chemically analogous polysaccharide, scleroglucan, is formed by the fungus "Athelia rolfsii". Both polysaccharides share the chemical structure of the backbone with curdlan. It is known for several things, including its ability to stimulate the immune system, carry metals in water, aid in delivering drugs, and use in some nanofibers.

Mass (m) per unit volume (V) is the density m/V. Mass is conserved on mixing, but the volume of 1 cm of ethanol mixed with 1 cm of water is reduced to less than 2 cm due to the formation of ethanol-water bonds. The plot of volume or density versus molecular fraction of ethanol in water is a quadratic curve. However, the plot of index of refraction versus molecular fraction of ethanol in water is linear, and the weight fraction equals the fractional density (d; Teertstra 2005).

The molecular weight of the polymer is perhaps one of the most important properties to consider when determining antimicrobial properties because antimicrobial activity is markedly dependent on the molecular weight. It has been determined that optimal activity is achieved when polymers have a molecular weight in the range of 1.4x10 Da to 9.4x10 Da. Weights larger than this range show a decrease in activity. This dependence on weight can be attributed to the sequence of steps necessary for biocidal action. Extremely large molecular weight polymers will have trouble diffusing through the bacterial cell wall and cytoplasm. Thus much effort has been directed towards controlling the molecular weight of the polymer.

By weight, the average human adult male is approximately 60% water and the average adult female is approximately 55%. There can be considerable variation in body water percentage based on a number of factors like age, health, water intake, weight, and sex. In a large study of adults of all ages and both sexes, the adult human body averaged ~65% water. However, this varied substantially by age, sex, and adiposity (amount of fat in body composition). The figure for water fraction by weight in this sample was found to be 58 ±8% water for males and 48 ±6% for females. The body water constitutes as much as 93% of the body weight of a newborn infant, whereas some obese people are as little as 15% water by weight. This is due to how fat tissue does not retain water as well as lean tissue. These statistical averages will vary with factors such as type of population, age of people sampled, number of people sampled, and methodology. So there is not, and cannot be, a figure that is exactly the same for all people, for this or any other physiological measure.

In chemistry, the molar mass "M" is a physical property defined as the mass of a given substance (chemical element or chemical compound) divided by the amount of substance. The base SI unit for molar mass is kg/mol. However, for historical reasons, molar masses are almost always expressed in g/mol.

The molar mass of atoms of an element is given by the Standard atomic weight of the element multiplied by the molar mass constant, "M" = 1 × 10 kg/mol = 1 g/mol:
Multiplying by the molar mass constant ensures that the calculation is dimensionally correct: standard relative atomic masses are dimensionless quantities (i.e., pure numbers) whereas molar masses have units (in this case, grams/mole).
question_src: Je! Uzito wa maji ni nini?
pos_context_src: Mashehe ya Masi huhesabiwa kutoka kwa uzito wa kawaida wa atomiki ya kila nuclide, wakati misa ya molar huhesabiwa kutoka kwa wingi wa atomiki ya kila kitu. Misa ya atomiki inazingatia usambazaji wa isotopic ya kitu hicho katika sampuli fulani (kawaida hudhaniwa kuwa "kawaida"). Kwa mfano, maji yana molekuli ya molar ya 18.0153 (3) g/mol, lakini molekuli za maji za mtu binafsi zina misa ya Masi ambayo ni kati ya 18.010 564 6863 (15) U (HO) na 22.027 7364 (9) U (DO).
neg_context_src: Kuna aina ya uchunguzi na mchanganyiko tofauti wa membrane na shimoni inayopatikana. Uzito wa uzito wa kibiashara wa uchunguzi wa kibiashara wa microdialysis unashughulikia anuwai ya takriban 6-100kD, lakini pia 1MD inapatikana. Wakati misombo ya mumunyifu wa maji kwa ujumla hutengana kwa uhuru kwenye membrane ya microdialysis, hali sio wazi kwa uchambuzi wa lipophilic, ambapo wote waliofanikiwa (k.m. corticosteroids) na majaribio ya microdialysis yasiyofanikiwa (k.m. estradil, asidi ya fusidic) yameripotiwa. Walakini, urejeshaji wa misombo ya mumunyifu wa maji kawaida hupungua haraka ikiwa uzito wa Masi ya mchambuzi unazidi 25% ya kukatwa kwa uzito wa membrane.

Kikomo cha juu cha uzito wa Masi kwa molekuli ndogo ni takriban daltons 900, ambayo inaruhusu uwezekano wa kutengana haraka kwenye utando wa seli ili iweze kufikia maeneo ya ndani ya hatua. Uzito huu wa uzito wa Masi pia ni hali ya lazima lakini haitoshi kwa bioavailability ya mdomo kwani inaruhusu usafirishaji wa transcellular kupitia seli za epithelial za matumbo. Mbali na upenyezaji wa matumbo, molekuli lazima pia iwe na kiwango cha haraka cha kufutwa ndani ya maji na umumunyifu wa maji na wastani hadi kimetaboliki ya kwanza ya kupita. Uzito wa chini wa uzito wa Masi ya daltons 500 (kama sehemu ya "sheria ya tano") imependekezwa kwa wagombea wa dawa ndogo ya molekuli ya mdomo kulingana na uchunguzi kwamba viwango vya kuvutia vya kliniki vinapunguzwa sana ikiwa uzito wa Masi umewekwa chini ya kikomo hiki.

Molekuli ya maji mazito ina atomi mbili za deuterium badala ya atomi mbili za protini za maji ya kawaida "mwanga". Uzito wa molekuli nzito ya maji, hata hivyo, sio tofauti sana na ile ya molekuli ya kawaida ya maji, kwa sababu karibu 89% ya uzito wa maji wa Masi hutoka kwa chembe moja ya oksijeni badala ya atomi mbili za hidrojeni. Neno la colloquial "maji mazito" linamaanisha mchanganyiko wa maji ulio na utajiri mkubwa ambao una oksidi ya deuterium, lakini pia oksidi ya oksidi ya hidrojeni (HDO) na kiwango kidogo cha oksidi ya kawaida ya hidrojeni. Kwa mfano, maji mazito yanayotumiwa katika Reactors ya Candu ni 99.75% iliyojazwa na sehemu ya atomi ya hydrogen-ikimaanisha kuwa 99.75% ya atomi za hidrojeni ni za aina nzito. Kwa kulinganisha, maji ya kawaida ("maji ya kawaida" yanayotumiwa kwa kiwango cha deuterium) ina atomi za deuterium 156 tu kwa atomi za hidrojeni milioni, ikimaanisha kuwa 0.0156% ya atomi za hidrojeni ni za aina nzito.

Katika vyanzo vingi vya wavuti, haswa kuhusiana na maanani ya usalama katika vituo vya kibiashara na viwandani huko Merika, wiani wa mvuke hufafanuliwa kwa heshima na hewa, sio hidrojeni. Hewa hupewa wiani wa mvuke wa moja. Kwa matumizi haya, AIR ina uzito wa Masi wa vitengo vya atomiki 28.97, na uzito mwingine wote wa gesi na mvuke umegawanywa na idadi hii kupata wiani wao wa mvuke. Kwa mfano, acetone ina wiani wa mvuke wa 2 kuhusiana na hewa. Hiyo inamaanisha mvuke wa acetone ni mara mbili nzito kama hewa. Hii inaweza kuonekana kwa kugawa uzito wa Masi ya asetoni, 58.1 na ile ya hewa, 28.97, ambayo ni sawa na 2.

Mfumo wa kemikali wa Chloropicrin ni CCLNO na uzito wake wa Masi ni gramu 164.38/mole. Chloropicrin safi ni kioevu kisicho na rangi, na kiwango cha kuchemsha cha 112 ° C. Chloropicrin ni mumunyifu kidogo katika maji na umumunyifu wa 2000 mg/L kwa 25 ° C. Ni tete, na shinikizo ya mvuke ya milimita 23.2 ya zebaki (MMHG) kwa 25 ° C; Sheria inayolingana ya Henry ni mita 0.00251 mita za ujazo wa mita kwa mole. Mchanganyiko wa mgawanyiko wa maji ya octanol ("K") ya chloropicrin inakadiriwa kuwa 269. mgawo wake wa adsorption ya mchanga ("K"; kawaida kwa yaliyomo kwenye vitu vya kikaboni) ni 25 cm/g.

Schizophyllan ina uzito wa Masi ya 450,000 Da, na mzunguko maalum katika maji ya +18-24 °. Polysaccharide ya kemikali, scleroglucan, imeundwa na kuvu "Athelia rolfsii". Polysaccharides zote mbili hushiriki muundo wa kemikali wa uti wa mgongo na Curdlan. Inajulikana kwa vitu kadhaa, pamoja na uwezo wake wa kuchochea mfumo wa kinga, kubeba metali katika maji, misaada katika kupeleka dawa, na kutumia katika nanofibers kadhaa.

Misa (m) kwa kila kitengo (v) ni wiani m/v. Misa imehifadhiwa kwenye mchanganyiko, lakini kiasi cha cm 1 ya ethanol iliyochanganywa na 1 cm ya maji hupunguzwa kuwa chini ya 2 cm kutokana na malezi ya vifungo vya maji ya ethanol. Njama ya kiasi au wiani dhidi ya sehemu ya Masi ya ethanol katika maji ni curve ya quadratic. Walakini, njama ya index ya kinzani dhidi ya sehemu ya Masi ya ethanol katika maji ni ya mstari, na sehemu ya uzito ni sawa na wiani wa pande zote (D; Teertstra 2005).

Uzito wa Masi ya polymer labda ni moja ya mali muhimu zaidi kuzingatia wakati wa kuamua mali ya antimicrobial kwa sababu shughuli za antimicrobial zinategemea sana uzito wa Masi. Imeamuliwa kuwa shughuli bora hupatikana wakati polima zina uzito wa Masi katika safu ya 1.4x10 DA hadi 9.4x10 DA. Uzito mkubwa kuliko safu hii unaonyesha kupungua kwa shughuli. Utegemezi huu juu ya uzito unaweza kuhusishwa na mlolongo wa hatua muhimu kwa hatua ya biocidal. Polymers kubwa ya uzito wa Masi itakuwa na shida kutofautisha kupitia ukuta wa seli ya bakteria na cytoplasm. Kwa hivyo juhudi nyingi zimeelekezwa katika kudhibiti uzito wa Masi ya polymer.

Kwa uzani, wastani wa kiume wa watu wazima ni takriban maji 60% na wastani wa kike ni takriban 55%. Kunaweza kuwa na tofauti kubwa katika asilimia ya maji ya mwili kulingana na sababu kadhaa kama umri, afya, ulaji wa maji, uzito, na ngono. Katika utafiti mkubwa wa watu wazima wa kila kizazi na jinsia zote mbili, mwili wa binadamu wa watu wazima ulipata maji ~ 65%. Walakini, hii ilitofautiana sana na umri, jinsia, na adiposity (kiasi cha mafuta katika muundo wa mwili). Takwimu ya sehemu ya maji kwa uzito katika sampuli hii iligunduliwa kuwa maji 58 ± 8% kwa wanaume na 48 ± 6% kwa wanawake. Maji ya mwili hufanya kama asilimia 93 ya uzito wa mwili wa mtoto mchanga, wakati watu wengine feta ni kidogo kama 15% maji kwa uzito. Hii ni kwa sababu ya jinsi tishu za mafuta hazihifadhi maji na tishu konda. Viwango hivi vya takwimu vitatofautiana na sababu kama aina ya idadi ya watu, umri wa watu waliopigwa sampuli, idadi ya watu waliopigwa sampuli, na mbinu. Kwa hivyo hakuna, na haiwezi kuwa, takwimu ambayo ni sawa kwa watu wote, kwa hii au hatua nyingine yoyote ya kisaikolojia.

Katika kemia, molar molar "M" ni mali ya mwili inayofafanuliwa kama wingi wa dutu fulani (kitu cha kemikali au kiwanja cha kemikali) kilichogawanywa na kiasi cha dutu. Kitengo cha msingi cha Si kwa molekuli ya molar ni kilo/mol. Walakini, kwa sababu za kihistoria, watu wa molar huonyeshwa karibu kila wakati katika g/mol.

Umati wa molar wa atomi ya kitu hupewa na uzito wa kawaida wa atomi ya kitu kilichozidishwa na molar ya molar mara kwa mara, "M" = 1 × 10 kg/mol = 1 g/mol:
Kuzidisha kwa molekuli ya molar mara kwa mara inahakikisha kwamba hesabu ni sawa: kiwango cha kawaida cha atomiki ni idadi isiyo na kipimo (i.e., nambari safi) wakati raia wa molar wana vitengo (katika kesi hii, gramu/mole).
report_src: Uzito wa maji kwa kipimo cha kawaida cha kemia ni mola moja, ambayo inaonyesha jumla ya wingi wa molekuli 6.022 × 10²³ za H₂O, na thamani yake ni takribani 18.0153 gramu kwa kila moli ya maji ya “kawaida” yaliyo na usambazaji wa isotopu wa kawaida duniani [1].
all_claims: Uzito wa maji kwa kipimo cha kawaida cha kemia ni mola moja, ambayo inaonyesha jumla ya wingi wa molekuli 6.022 × 10²³ za H₂O, na thamani yake ni takribani 18.0153 gramu kwa kila moli ya maji ya “kawaida” yaliyo na usambazaji wa isotopu wa kawaida duniani [1].
claims_w_citations: Uzito wa maji kwa kipimo cha kawaida cha kemia ni mola moja, ambayo inaonyesha jumla ya wingi wa molekuli 6.022 × 10²³ za H₂O, na thamani yake ni takribani 18.0153 gramu kwa kila moli ya maji ya “kawaida” yaliyo na usambazaji wa isotopu wa kawaida duniani [1].
claims_retained: Uzito wa maji kwa kipimo cha kawaida cha kemia ni mola moja, ambayo inaonyesha jumla ya wingi wa molekuli 6.022 × 10²³ za H₂O, na thamani yake ni takribani 18.0153 gramu kwa kila moli ya maji ya “kawaida” yaliyo na usambazaji wa isotopu wa kawaida duniani [1].

question_en: How deep is Lake Victoria?
pos_context_en: Lake Victoria occupies a shallow depression in Africa. The lake has a maximum depth of between 80 and and an average depth of . Its catchment area covers . The lake has a shoreline of when digitized at the 1:25,000 level, with islands constituting 3.7 percent of this length, and is divided among three countries: Kenya (6 percent or ), Uganda (45 percent or ), and Tanzania (49 percent or ).
neg_context_en: Most of these lakes are relatively shallow (like Victoria) and part of the present-day upper Nile basin. The exception is Lake Kivu, which is part of the present-day Congo River basin, but is believed to have been connected to Lakes Edward and Victoria by rivers until the uplifting of parts of the East African Rift. This deep lake may have functioned as an "evolutionary reservoir" for this haplochromine group in periods where other shallower lakes in the region dried out, as happened to Lake Victoria about 15,000 years ago. In recent history only Lake Kyoga was easily accessible to Victoria cichlids, as further downstream movement by the Victoria Nile (to Lake Albert) is prevented by a series of waterfalls, notably Murchison. In contrast, the Owen Falls (now flooded by a dam) between Victoria and Kyoga were essentially a series of rapids that did not effectively block fish movements between the two lakes.

The main church in Nether Wasdale is St Michaels and All Angels Church, which was built in the 16th century. The church has a maypole in front of it: now a listed structure, it was built originally to celebrate Queen Victoria's diamond jubilee.. The nearby Wastwater is, at 258' deep the deepest of all of the Lake District lakes. Nether Wasdale is served by the ancient Bridle Path "Guards Lonning" that runs from Lane Side east of Gosforth along to Guards Head, between Blengdale Forest and the newly planted Bamse's Wood, across a wooden footbridge at Kid Beck and down between Yew Tree Farm and Windsor Farm into Nether Wasdale.

The only outflow from Lake Victoria is the Nile River, which exits the lake near Jinja, Uganda. In terms of contributed water, this makes Lake Victoria the principal source of the longest branch of the Nile. However, the most distal source of the Nile Basin, and therefore the ultimate source of the Nile, is more often considered to be one of the tributary rivers of the Kagera River (the exact tributary remains undetermined), and which originates in either Rwanda or Burundi. The uppermost section of the Nile is generally known as the Victoria Nile until it reaches Lake Albert. Although it is a part of the same river system known as the White Nile and is occasionally referred to as such, strictly speaking this name does not apply until after the river crosses the Uganda border into South Sudan to the north.

Deep Lake is a body of water lying south of Olympia in Thurston County, Washington. It is deep at its deepest point and has a water volume of . The lake drains into Black River by way of Beaver Creek and Scott Lake. Deep Lake is located in Section 3, Township 16N, Range 2W, Willamette. The lake is bordered on two sides by Millersylvania State Park. An RV resort camp occupies the lake's eastern shore. The lake's fish population includes stocked rainbow trout and naturally reproducing largemouth bass, bluegill, yellow perch, and pumpkinseed.
ㅞ is one of the Korean hangul. The Unicode for ㅞ is U+315E.

Lake Tali Karng is a natural lake in the Alpine region of Victoria, in eastern Australia. At in area and in depth, the lake is the only deep lake in Victoria. The lake was formed by a landslide 1,500 years ago and is the only lake in the Alpine region.

The Bridge in Tredyffrin Township was a historic stone arch bridge carrying Gulph Road across Trout Creek in Tredyffrin Township, Chester County, Pennsylvania, USA. It had one span, a solid, semicircular stone arch long. There were stone wing walls at each end, with roughly squared stone voussoirs forming the arch ring. The vault of the arch had been sealed with gunite when the bridge was surveyed in 1982, and the parapets had also been topped with concrete. The bridge was built at an unknown date in the late 19th or early 20th century, and was a well-preserved, typical example of stone arch bridge construction in that period.
ㅝ is one of the Korean hangul. The Unicode for ㅝ is U+315D.
ㅟ is one of the Korean hangul. The Unicode for ㅟ is U+315F.
question_src: Ziwa Victoria ni ya kina gani?
pos_context_src: Ziwa Victoria inachukua unyogovu wa kina barani Afrika. Ziwa lina kina cha kati kati ya 80 na kina cha wastani cha. Sehemu yake ya kukamata inashughulikia. Ziwa hilo lina mwambao wa wakati wa digitized katika kiwango cha 1: 25,000, na visiwa vyenye asilimia 3.7 ya urefu huu, na imegawanywa kati ya nchi tatu: Kenya (asilimia 6 au), Uganda (asilimia 45 au), na Tanzania (asilimia 49 au).
neg_context_title_src: Ziwa la kina (Kaunti ya Thurston, Washington)
neg_context_src: Maziwa haya mengi hayana kina (kama Victoria) na sehemu ya bonde la leo la juu la Nile. Isipokuwa ni Ziwa Kivu, ambayo ni sehemu ya Bonde la Mto wa Kongo la leo, lakini inaaminika kuwa imeunganishwa na Maziwa Edward na Victoria na Mito hadi kuinua sehemu za Ufa wa Afrika Mashariki. Ziwa hili la kina linaweza kufanya kazi kama "hifadhi ya mabadiliko" kwa kikundi hiki cha haplochromine katika vipindi ambavyo maziwa mengine ya kina katika mkoa huo yalikauka, kama ilivyotokea katika Ziwa Victoria miaka 15,000 iliyopita. Katika historia ya hivi karibuni Ziwa Kyoga pekee ndizo zilizopatikana kwa urahisi na Victoria Cichlids, kwani harakati za chini zaidi za Victoria Nile (hadi Ziwa Albert) zinazuiliwa na safu ya milango ya maji, haswa Murchison. Kwa kulinganisha, Maporomoko ya Owen (ambayo sasa yamefurika na bwawa) kati ya Victoria na Kyoga kwa kweli yalikuwa safu ya rapids ambayo haikuzuia harakati za samaki kati ya maziwa hayo mawili.

Kanisa kuu huko Nether Wasdale ni St Michaels na Kanisa lote la Malaika, ambalo lilijengwa katika karne ya 16. Kanisa lina maypole mbele yake: sasa muundo ulioorodheshwa, ilijengwa hapo awali kusherehekea Jubilee ya Malkia Victoria .. Maji ya karibu ni, saa 258 'kina kabisa cha maziwa yote ya Ziwa. Nether Wasdale inahudumiwa na njia ya zamani ya Bridle "Walinzi wa Uonevu" ambayo inaanzia upande wa mashariki mwa Gosforth pamoja na Mkuu wa Walinzi, kati ya Msitu wa Blengdale na kuni mpya ya Bamse, kwenye eneo la miguu la mbao huko Kid Beck na chini kati ya Shamba la Yew Tree na Windsor Farm ndani ya Nether Wasdale.

Mtiririko wa pekee kutoka Ziwa Victoria ni Mto wa Nile, ambao unatoka kwenye ziwa karibu na Jinja, Uganda. Kwa upande wa maji yaliyochangiwa, hii inafanya Ziwa Victoria kuwa chanzo kikuu cha tawi refu zaidi la Nile. Walakini, chanzo cha mbali zaidi cha bonde la Nile, na kwa hivyo chanzo cha mwisho cha Nile, mara nyingi huchukuliwa kuwa moja ya mito ya kijeshi ya Mto wa Kagera (kijeshi halisi bado haijafafanuliwa), na ambayo inatokea katika Rwanda au Burundi. Sehemu ya juu kabisa ya Nile inajulikana kama Victoria Nile hadi itakapofika Ziwa Albert. Ingawa ni sehemu ya mfumo huo wa mto unaojulikana kama White Nile na mara kwa mara hurejelewa kama hivyo, kusema madhubuti jina hili halifanyi kazi hadi baada ya mto kuvuka mpaka wa Uganda kwenda Sudani Kusini kaskazini.

Ziwa la kina ni mwili wa maji ulioko kusini mwa Olimpiki katika Kata ya Thurston, Washington. Ni ya kina katika eneo lake la ndani kabisa na ina kiasi cha maji. Ziwa linaingia ndani ya Mto Nyeusi kwa njia ya Beaver Creek na Ziwa la Scott. Ziwa la kina liko katika Sehemu ya 3, Township 16N, Range 2W, Willamette. Ziwa hilo limepakana pande mbili na Hifadhi ya Jimbo la Millersylvania. Kambi ya mapumziko ya RV inachukua pwani ya mashariki ya ziwa. Idadi ya samaki wa ziwa ni pamoja na trout ya upinde wa mvua iliyojaa na asili ya kuzaa bass kubwa, bluu ya bluu, manjano ya manjano, na malenge.
ㅞ ni moja ya Hangul ya Kikorea. Unicode ya ㅞ ni U+315E.

Ziwa Tali Karng ni ziwa la asili katika mkoa wa Alpine wa Victoria, mashariki mwa Australia. Katika eneo na kwa kina, ziwa ndio ziwa pekee kubwa huko Victoria. Ziwa hilo liliundwa na maporomoko ya ardhi miaka 1,500 iliyopita na ndio ziwa pekee katika mkoa wa Alpine.

Daraja katika mji wa Tredyffrin lilikuwa daraja la kihistoria la jiwe lililobeba barabara ya Gulph kuvuka Trout Creek katika Tredyffrin Township, Chester County, Pennsylvania, USA. Ilikuwa na span moja, jiwe thabiti, la semicircular refu. Kulikuwa na ukuta wa mrengo wa jiwe kila mwisho, na vifuniko vya jiwe takriban mraba kutengeneza pete ya arch. Sehemu ya arch ilikuwa imetiwa muhuri na bunduki wakati daraja lilichunguzwa mnamo 1982, na vifurushi pia vilikuwa vimeingizwa na simiti. Daraja hilo lilijengwa katika tarehe isiyojulikana mwishoni mwa karne ya 19 au mapema karne ya 20, na ilikuwa mfano mzuri, mfano wa ujenzi wa jiwe la jiwe katika kipindi hicho.
