question_en: What is the oldest structure in Latvia?
pos_context_title_en: Bauska Church of the Holy Spirit
pos_context_en: Church of the Holy Spirit is a Lutheran church and the oldest existing building in Bauska, Latvia. Built between 1591 and 1594 for the needs of the city's Baltic German population. The original building did not have a tower, which was built in 1614 and completed in 1623 by master craftsman Michael Ulrich from Arnstadt who built cupola and high steeple tower. In 1799 the steeple was ruined by a direct lightning strike and the tower was covered by a temporary wooden structure. In 1815 the damaged tower was hit by a lightning once again and the temporary four-sloped roof become permanent.
neg_context_en: Gas pipeline from Lithuanian border to Iecava with the diameter of 500 mm was built in 1962. It is the oldest pipeline in Latvia. In 2013 construction works for enhancement of capacity of interconnection was finished. New discharge capacity will allow transmissions of 6.48 million cubic metres per day from Lithuania to Latvia and 6.24 million cubic metres per day from Latvia to Lithuania. The expansion is set to start operating in 2019-2020. The pipeline is linked with Estonia–Latvia Interconnection.

Salaspils is one of the oldest settlements in Latvia. Archaeological excavations of 1964–1975 (during the construction of Riga HES) in ancient settlements, burial grounds and castle mounds give evidence of very dense population of the region. At this time, the remains of 11,000-year-old reindeer hunters were found (the oldest known human settlement in all of Latvia) and 3500-year-old remains of Baltic hunters, buried in hollowed-out oak-tree trunks, were found as well. There is evidence that both Livs and Balts built hill forts in the region.

The Constitution of Latvia () is the fundamental law of the Republic of Latvia. Satversme is the oldest Eastern or Central European constitution still in force and the sixth oldest still-functioning republican basic law in the world. It was adopted, as it states itself in the text, by the people of Latvia, in their freely elected Constitutional Assembly of Latvia on 15 February 1922 and came into force on 7 November 1922. It was heavily influenced by Germany's Weimar Constitution and the Swiss Federal Constitution. The constitution establishes the main bodies of government (Saeima, State President, Cabinet of Ministers, Courts, State Auditor); it consists of 115 articles arranged in eight chapters.

The red-white-red Latvian flag () is first mentioned in the medieval "Rhymed Chronicle of Livonia" ("Livländische Reimchronik"), which covers the period from 1180 to 1343, and is thus among the oldest flags in the world. The chronicle tells of a battle that took place around 1279, in which ancient Latvian tribes from Cēsis, a city in the northern part of modern-day Latvia, went to war, bearing a red flag with a white stripe.

Jūrmala Park (Seaside Park) is located in the western part of the city at the seaside. The park is long with a total area of 70 ha and is one of the largest planted parks in Latvia. It was developed at the end of the 19th century
At the end of Peldu Street are Latvia's largest drums – one of the objects of Liepāja's environmental design which reminds one that Liepāja is the music capital of Latvia.
The open-air concert stage Pūt, vējiņi! (Blow, wind, blow!) was built in 1964. It has been the venue for a good many concerts and festivals, with the festival "Liepājas Dzintars" ("Amber of Liepāja") being the most famous among them, as it could be regarded as the oldest rock festival of the former Soviet Union. It was held for the first time in 1968.
Alongside the stage is an interesting building, the former Bath House built in 1902 and designed by Max Paul Bertschy. At the beginning of the 19th century Liepāja was a renowned health resort and the Russian tsar and his family had been visiting Liepāja. This all encouraged other aristocrats from Russia and Europe to spend their summers in Liepāja as well.

The Lapeer County Courthouse is among the earliest of its kind built in the state. It is recognized as the oldest original courthouse structure still in use in the state of Michigan and one of the 10 oldest such structures in all of the country. Lapeer County was formed in 1822 with the city of Lapeer being established as the county seat in 1831. The structure is recognized as having been first constructed in 1839, although this represents an earlier structure built on the site. The date on the pediment states 1846, which is the date that the current structure was completed—having been started the previous year. It was commissioned by state representative and state senator Alvin N. Hart, who lobbied successfully for Lapeer to continue to serve as the county seat. Hart sold the structure to the Board of Supervisors of Lapeer County for $4,500 in 1853. The first local Grange in Michigan was founded at this site in 1872. Since its construction, the only alteration to the structure occurred when three doorways were cut into the portico in 1938.
One of the oldest performances is bird healing. Birds symbolized evil and disease. By driving them away from the fences and fields, it was believed that all evil and accidents would be dispelled.

Kuldīga is the pearl of Kurzeme, Latvia's western region.
It is an ancient town with unique, distinctive architecture. Saint Catherine is believed to be the patron saint of Kuldīga, and thus the oldest church of the town has been named after St Catherine. The foundation of the building was laid as early as in 1252; later the church was remodelled a number of times.
The small River Alekšupīte runs through the very centre of the Kuldīga old town, along the walls of the houses. The Old Town around the small river itself is unique: it is the only remaining 17th–18th-century ensemble of this kind in the Baltic states. A 4.5 m high waterfall on the Alekšupīte is the highest in Latvia.
The pride of Kuldīga is the Venta Rapid, a 240-meter wide natural rapid which is the widest in Europe. 
Not far from the rapid there is the Kuldīga brick bridge built in 1874, one of the longest bridges of this type in Europe.
Kuldīga was recognized an EDEN destination in 2007.

Jelgava Gymnasium or Academia Petrina is the oldest higher educational establishment in Latvia. Based on an idea by Friedrich Wilhelm von Raison, it was established in Mitau, capital of the Duchy of Courland and Semigallia, by Duke Peter von Biron in 1775. The duke wanted to attract professors like Immanuel Kant and Johan Gottfried Herder, but they refused.
question_src: Je! Muundo wa zamani zaidi katika Latvia ni nini?
pos_context_title_src: Kanisa la Bauska la Roho Mtakatifu
pos_context_src: Kanisa la Roho Mtakatifu ni kanisa la Kilutheri na jengo la kongwe zaidi huko Bauska, Latvia. Imejengwa kati ya 1591 na 1594 kwa mahitaji ya idadi ya watu wa Baltic wa Baltic. Jengo la asili halikuwa na mnara, ambao ulijengwa mnamo 1614 na kukamilika mnamo 1623 na fundi wa ufundi Michael Ulrich kutoka Arnstadt ambaye aliunda Cupola na mnara wa juu. Mnamo 1799 mwinuko uliharibiwa na mgomo wa umeme wa moja kwa moja na mnara ulifunikwa na muundo wa muda wa mbao. Mnamo 1815 mnara ulioharibiwa ulipigwa na umeme mara nyingine tena na paa la muda mfupi la kupunguka likawa la kudumu.
neg_context_src: Bomba la gesi kutoka mpaka wa Kilithuania hadi IECAVA na kipenyo cha 500 mm ilijengwa mnamo 1962. Ni bomba la zamani zaidi huko Latvia. Mnamo 2013 ujenzi wa kazi za ukuzaji wa uwezo wa unganisho ulikuwa umekamilika. Uwezo mpya wa kutokwa utaruhusu usafirishaji wa mita za ujazo milioni 6.48 kwa siku kutoka Lithuania hadi Latvia na mita za ujazo milioni 6.24 kwa siku kutoka Latvia hadi Lithuania. Upanuzi umewekwa kuanza kufanya kazi mnamo 2019-2020. Bomba limeunganishwa na unganisho la Estonia -Latvia.

Salaspils ni moja wapo ya makazi kongwe huko Latvia. Mchanganyiko wa akiolojia wa 1964-1975 (wakati wa ujenzi wa Riga Hes) katika makazi ya zamani, uwanja wa mazishi na milango ya ngome hutoa ushahidi wa idadi kubwa ya watu wa mkoa huo. Kwa wakati huu, mabaki ya wawindaji wa reindeer wenye umri wa miaka 11,000 walipatikana (makazi ya watu wa zamani zaidi katika Latvia) na mabaki ya miaka 3500 ya wawindaji wa Baltic, waliozikwa katika miti ya miti ya mwaloni iliyokuwa na mashimo, walipatikana pia. Kuna ushahidi kwamba wote Livs na Balts waliunda ngome za kilima katika mkoa huo.

Katiba ya Latvia () ni sheria ya msingi ya Jamhuri ya Latvia. Satversme ndiye katiba ya kongwe ya Mashariki au Kati ya Ulaya bado inaanza kutumika na sheria ya zamani ya zamani ya Republican ulimwenguni. Ilipitishwa, kama inavyosema katika maandishi, na watu wa Latvia, katika mkutano wao wa katiba wa Katiba uliochaguliwa kwa uhuru mnamo tarehe 15 Februari 1922 na kuanza kutumika mnamo Novemba 7, 1922. Ilisukumwa sana na Katiba ya Weimar ya Ujerumani na Katiba ya Shirikisho la Uswizi. Katiba inaanzisha mashirika kuu ya serikali (SAEIMA, Rais wa Jimbo, Baraza la Mawaziri la Mawaziri, Korti, Mkaguzi wa Jimbo); Inayo nakala 115 zilizopangwa katika sura nane.

Bendera nyekundu-nyeupe-nyekundu ya Latvian () imetajwa kwanza katika "historia ya zamani ya wimbo wa Livonia" ("Livländische Reimchronik"), ambayo inashughulikia kipindi kutoka 1180 hadi 1343, na kwa hivyo ni kati ya bendera kongwe zaidi ulimwenguni. Mambo ya nyakati yanaelezea juu ya vita ambayo ilifanyika karibu 1279, ambayo makabila ya zamani ya Kilatvia kutoka Cēsis, mji ulioko kaskazini mwa Latvia ya kisasa, ulikwenda vitani, ukibeba bendera nyekundu na kamba nyeupe.

Jūrmala Park (Hifadhi ya Bahari) iko katika sehemu ya magharibi ya mji kwenye bahari. Hifadhi hiyo ni ndefu na eneo la jumla ya hekta 70 na ni moja ya mbuga kubwa zilizopandwa huko Latvia. Ilitengenezwa mwishoni mwa karne ya 19
Mwisho wa Mtaa wa Peldu ni ngoma kubwa zaidi ya Latvia - moja ya vitu vya muundo wa mazingira wa Liepāja ambayo inakumbusha mtu kwamba Liepāja ni mji mkuu wa muziki wa Latvia.
Hatua ya Tamasha la Open-Air Pūt, Vējiņi! . Ilifanyika kwa mara ya kwanza mnamo 1968.
Pamoja na hatua hiyo ni jengo la kupendeza, nyumba ya zamani ya Bath iliyojengwa mnamo 1902 na iliyoundwa na Max Paul Bertschy. Mwanzoni mwa karne ya 19 Liepāja alikuwa mapumziko mashuhuri ya afya na Tsar wa Urusi na familia yake walikuwa wakitembelea Liepāja. Hii yote iliwatia moyo wakuu wengine kutoka Urusi na Ulaya kutumia msimu wao wa joto huko Liepāja pia.

Korti ya Kaunti ya Lapeer ni kati ya aina ya kwanza ya aina yake iliyojengwa katika jimbo. Inatambulika kama muundo wa kongwe wa zamani wa mahakama bado unatumika katika jimbo la Michigan na moja ya miundo 10 kongwe katika nchi yote. Kaunti ya Lapeer iliundwa mnamo 1822 na jiji la Lapeer limeanzishwa kama kiti cha kaunti mnamo 1831. Muundo huo unatambuliwa kuwa umejengwa kwanza mnamo 1839, ingawa hii inawakilisha muundo wa mapema uliojengwa kwenye tovuti. Tarehe kwenye Amerika ya Amerika 1846, ambayo ni tarehe ambayo muundo wa sasa ulikamilishwa -kuwa imeanzishwa mwaka uliopita. Iliagizwa na mwakilishi wa serikali na seneta wa serikali Alvin N. Hart, ambaye alishawishi kwa mafanikio kwa Lapeer kuendelea kutumika kama kiti cha kaunti. Hart aliuza muundo huo kwa Bodi ya Wasimamizi wa Kaunti ya Lapeer kwa $ 4,500 mnamo 1853. Grange ya kwanza huko Michigan ilianzishwa katika tovuti hii mnamo 1872. Tangu ujenzi wake, mabadiliko pekee ya muundo huo yalitokea wakati milango mitatu ilikatwa Portico mnamo 1938.
Moja ya maonyesho ya kongwe ni uponyaji wa ndege. Ndege zilionyesha uovu na magonjwa. Kwa kuwafukuza mbali na uzio na shamba, iliaminika kuwa uovu wote na ajali zingeondolewa.

Kuldīga ni lulu ya Kurzeme, mkoa wa magharibi wa Latvia.
Ni mji wa zamani na usanifu wa kipekee, tofauti. Mtakatifu Catherine anaaminika kuwa mtakatifu wa mlinzi wa Kuldīga, na kwa hivyo kanisa kongwe la mji limetajwa baada ya St Catherine. Msingi wa jengo hilo uliwekwa mapema kama mnamo 1252; Baadaye kanisa lilirekebishwa mara kadhaa.
Mto mdogo Alekšupīte unapita katikati ya mji wa zamani wa Kuldīga, kando ya kuta za nyumba. Mji wa zamani karibu na mto mdogo yenyewe ni wa kipekee: ni mkusanyiko wa karne ya 17 hadi 18 wa aina hii katika majimbo ya Baltic. Maporomoko ya maji ya juu ya 4.5 m kwenye Alekšupīte ni ya juu zaidi katika Latvia.
Kiburi cha Kuldīga ni Venta Haraka, haraka ya mita 240 ya haraka ambayo ni pana zaidi huko Uropa. 
Sio mbali na haraka kuna daraja la matofali ya Kuldīga iliyojengwa mnamo 1874, moja ya madaraja marefu zaidi ya aina hii huko Uropa.
Kuldīga alitambuliwa marudio ya Edeni mnamo 2007.

Jelgava Gymnasium au Academia Petrina ndio uanzishwaji wa kongwe zaidi wa elimu huko Latvia. Kulingana na wazo la Friedrich Wilhelm von Raison, ilianzishwa huko Mitau, mji mkuu wa Duchy wa Courland na Semigallia, na Duke Peter von Biron mnamo 1775. Duke alitaka kuvutia maprofesa kama Imanuel Kant na Johan Gottfried Herder, lakini walikataa.

question_en: What kind of democracy do the Dutch have?
pos_context_en:
Even though urban governments showed rare signs of democracy they were primarily an oligarchic system marked by an exclusive hierarchy. Class divisions, however were not as deep as in other European states, and the rights that the common class possessed did not differ much from what the intellectuals could practice. There was a cultural harmony and it prevented the formation of two completely divided classes and allowed for a social participation of all. Similarly, the basis of education was the same for all, and this allowed for a social bond. The difference in rights that the upper and lower classes possessed was reduced to the amount of money available to the individual. If one was wealthy, he could afford higher-level education. However, this alone did not earn him any political privileges or extensive political rights but only the ability to earn more wealth. 
The whole population of the Dutch Republic did not have the choice of voting for the representative of the Country inasmuch as there was not a choice between a democracy and an aristocracy but rather between an aristocracy and a monarchy. The stadtholder would be a member of the House of Orange-Nassau.
neg_context_title_en: Museum of Australian Democracy at Eureka
Criminal justice system of the Netherlands
neg_context_en: The party opposes the European Union and campaigns for a referendum on Dutch EU membership. It also adopts a nationalist viewpoint in which the Dutch culture should be protected; the party is in favor of reinstating border controls and ending what it perceives as mass immigration. It campaigns against unchecked immigration, and says it would introduce a "Dutch Values Protection Act" and wants to ban Islamic face veils and other face coverings.

In 2002, the legal scholar Afshin Ellian, a refugee from Iran, advocated a monocultural "Rechtsstaat" in the Netherlands. A liberal democracy cannot be multicultural, he argued, because multiculturalism is an ideology and a democracy has no official ideology. What is more, according to Ellian, a democracy must be monolingual. The Dutch language is the language of the constitution, and therefore it must be the only public language — all others must be limited to the private sphere. The Netherlands, he wrote, had been taken hostage by the left-wing multiculturalists, and their policy was in turn determined by the Islamic conservatives. Ellian stated that there were 800 000 Muslims in the country, with 450 mosques, and that the Netherlands had legalised the "feudal system of the Islamic Empire". Democracy and the rule of law could only be restored by abolishing multiculturalism.

The Youth Organisation Freedom and Democracy (, JOVD) is a Dutch political youth organisation. The JOVD cooperates with the People's Party for Freedom and Democracy (VVD), but is a politically independent organisation. Having trained many well known members of the House of Representatives, as well as ministers and the current Prime Minister, the JOVD is a well renowned political school. The JOVD is a member of the liberal umbrella organisations European Liberal Youth (LYMEC) and International Federation of Liberal Youth (IFLRY).

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.

MADE’s permanent exhibition used innovative digital immersion to engage visitors with the questions: What is democracy and why do we care? Why has it been fought for, yesterday and today? What does it feel like to be without power? Combining contemporary technology with historic objects, the role of the people as the centre of democracy was explored. How are decisions made? Who are they made for? What influence do you have in our contemporary democracy today?

Fundamental changes in penal philosophy resulted from the national concern that was registered over these ever-escalating prison waitlists. The Dutch Ministry of Justice report, "Law in Motion", in fact advocated, “[w]hat is at stake is nothing less than the credibility of constitutional government and its democratic and social values…Our highest policy priority is, of necessity, to combat crime by preventive and repressive means…[.]” In response to the concerns of the populace, a substantial increase in the construction of prisons was undertaken in the 1980s and again in the 1990s. Increased incarceration capacity was a direct result of criticism emanating from burgeoning prison waitlists. The far severer sentencing of offenders also increased the need for additional prison capacity. Approximately 13,000 unsuspended prison sentences were imposed totaling 2,100 detention years in 1970. Yet, in 2000, while the number of unsuspended prison sentences doubled, the number of detention years imposed increased nearly eightfold to 16,000. Following the prison construction boom of the 1980s, prison capacity increased from 3,300 occupants to approximately 12,800. In the 1990s, capacity was further increased by an additional 3,500 individuals, bringing the total prison capacity to approximately 16,300 persons. This trend is likely to continue into the future. At least one commentator has noted that the enactment of a “three strikes law” has the potential to raise the Dutch incarceration rate to that of American levels. For 2002, the incarceration rate was 93 inmates per 100,000 citizens. Prosecutors’ prior widespread discretion over cases has declined since the enactment of new penological guidelines. Guidelines previously imposed a presumption in favour of dismissal, whereas now the guidelines impose a presumption to not dismiss cases.

During the explorations of Lubbers, a preliminary agreement was reached. For the first time in political history, The Netherlands might be governed by a minority cabinet supported by a third party "outside" the government. There would be two contracts drawn up: the actual government agreement between VVD and CDA and a so-called ""gedoogakkoord"" (tolerance agreement) between the cabinet and PVV. The agreement would handle matters such as immigration, integration, asylum, and law and order. This means there could be agreements on issues raised especially by the PVV in its campaign, like family reunification, on newcomers paying into social security before being eligible to receive it. Even more controversially regulations on the clothing of civil servants could be introduced – which means headscarves and other religious symbols might be banned in the civil service. Informateur Lubbers called it a “special majority cabinet” rather than a minority government.

"We designed the building from the inside out, not the outside in,” said Loretta H. Cockrum, Foram’s founder, chairman and CEO. “We wanted the most efficient office building ever designed, with no wasted space or wasted energy. This is a building of the future more than a building of the present. A lot of love has gone into that building, and a lot of pride."
question_src: Je! Uholanzi una demokrasia gani?
pos_context_src:
Hata ingawa serikali za mijini zilionyesha ishara adimu za demokrasia walikuwa kimsingi mfumo wa oligarchic uliowekwa na uongozi wa kipekee. Mgawanyiko wa darasa, hata hivyo haukuwa wa kina kama katika majimbo mengine ya Uropa, na haki ambazo darasa la kawaida lilikuwa nazo halikutofautiana sana na kile wasomi wanaweza kufanya. Kulikuwa na maelewano ya kitamaduni na ilizuia malezi ya madarasa mawili yaliyogawanywa kabisa na kuruhusiwa kwa ushiriki wa kijamii wa wote. Vivyo hivyo, msingi wa elimu ulikuwa sawa kwa wote, na hii iliruhusiwa kwa dhamana ya kijamii. Tofauti ya haki ambazo madarasa ya juu na ya chini yalikuwa na yalipunguzwa kwa kiasi cha pesa kinachopatikana kwa mtu huyo. Ikiwa mtu alikuwa tajiri, angeweza kumudu elimu ya kiwango cha juu. Walakini, hii peke yake haikumpa haki yoyote ya kisiasa au haki kubwa za kisiasa lakini tu uwezo wa kupata utajiri zaidi. 
Idadi yote ya Jamhuri ya Uholanzi haikuwa na chaguo la kupiga kura kwa mwakilishi wa nchi hiyo kwani hakukuwa na chaguo kati ya demokrasia na aristocracy lakini badala ya aristocracy na kifalme. Stadtholder atakuwa mwanachama wa Nyumba ya Orange-Nassau.
neg_context_title_src: Uhuru wa shirika la vijana na demokrasia
Jumba la kumbukumbu ya demokrasia ya Australia huko Eureka
Mfumo wa haki za jinai za Uholanzi
2010 Uundaji wa Baraza la Mawaziri la Uholanzi
neg_context_src: Chama kinapinga Jumuiya ya Ulaya na kampeni za kura ya maoni juu ya ushirika wa Uholanzi wa EU. Pia inachukua maoni ya kitaifa ambayo utamaduni wa Uholanzi unapaswa kulindwa; Chama kinapendelea kurudisha udhibiti wa mpaka na kumaliza kile kinachoona kama uhamiaji mkubwa. Inafanya kampeni dhidi ya uhamiaji ambao haujatatuliwa, na inasema ingeanzisha "Sheria ya Ulinzi wa Maadili ya Uholanzi" na inataka kupiga marufuku pazia la uso wa Kiisilamu na vifuniko vingine vya uso.

Mnamo 2002, msomi wa kisheria Afshin Ellian, mkimbizi kutoka Iran, alitetea "Rechtssuat" ya kitamaduni huko Uholanzi. Demokrasia ya huria haiwezi kuwa ya kitamaduni, alisema, kwa sababu tamaduni nyingi ni itikadi na demokrasia haina itikadi rasmi. Zaidi ya hayo, kulingana na Ellian, demokrasia lazima iwe ya monolingual. Lugha ya Uholanzi ni lugha ya Katiba, na kwa hivyo lazima iwe lugha ya umma tu - wengine wote lazima wawe mdogo kwa nyanja ya kibinafsi. Uholanzi, aliandika, alikuwa amechukuliwa mateka na wataalamu wa tamaduni za mrengo wa kushoto, na sera zao zilidhamiriwa na wahafidhina wa Kiisilamu. Ellian alisema kwamba kulikuwa na Waislamu 800,000 nchini, na misikiti 450, na kwamba Uholanzi walikuwa wamehalalisha "mfumo wa ufalme wa Kiislamu". Demokrasia na sheria ya sheria inaweza kurejeshwa tu kwa kumaliza tamaduni nyingi.

Shirika la Vijana Uhuru na Demokrasia (, JOVD) ni shirika la vijana la kisiasa la Uholanzi. JOVD inashirikiana na Chama cha Watu kwa Uhuru na Demokrasia (VVD), lakini ni shirika huru la kisiasa. Baada ya kufundisha wanachama wengi wanaojulikana wa Baraza la Wawakilishi, na pia mawaziri na Waziri Mkuu wa sasa, Jovd ni shule mashuhuri ya kisiasa. JOVD ni mwanachama wa mashirika ya mwavuli ya ukombozi wa Vijana wa Liberal (Lymec) na Shirikisho la Kimataifa la Vijana wa Liberal (IFLRY).

Winfield Toll Bridge, pia inajulikana kama Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, ni kihistoria wa kihistoria wa Cantilever Warren Truss Bridge iliyoko Winfield na Red House, Kaunti ya Putnam, West Virginia. Ilijengwa mnamo 1955, na inachukua Mto wa Kanawha, iliyobeba West Virginia Route 34. Cantilever kupitia-truss ina nafasi mbili za nanga kila futi 245 kwa urefu na urefu wa futi 462 kwa urefu kati ya mistari ya kituo cha pier. Span kuu ina futi mbili 128, inchi 4, mikono ya cantilever na miguu 205, inchi 4, iliyosimamishwa.

Maonyesho ya kudumu ya Made yalitumia kuzamisha ubunifu wa dijiti kuwashirikisha wageni na maswali: demokrasia ni nini na kwa nini tunajali? Kwa nini imepigwa vita, jana na leo? Je! Inahisije kuwa bila nguvu? Kuchanganya teknolojia ya kisasa na vitu vya kihistoria, jukumu la watu kama kituo cha demokrasia liligunduliwa. Je! Maamuzi yanafanywaje? Wametengenezwa kwa nani? Je! Una ushawishi gani katika demokrasia yetu ya kisasa leo?

Mabadiliko ya kimsingi katika falsafa ya adhabu yalitokana na wasiwasi wa kitaifa ambao ulisajiliwa juu ya orodha hizi za kusubiri za gereza. Ripoti ya Wizara ya Sheria ya Uholanzi, "Sheria katika Motion", kwa kweli ilitetea, "[w] kofia iko hatarini sio kitu kidogo kuliko uaminifu wa serikali ya kikatiba na maadili yake ya kidemokrasia na ya kijamii ... kipaumbele cha sera yetu ya juu ni, ya lazima, kupambana na uhalifu kwa njia ya kukandamiza na ya kukandamiza. Kuongezeka kwa uwezo wa kufungwa ilikuwa matokeo ya moja kwa moja ya kukosoa kutoka kwa orodha za kusubiri za gereza. Hukumu kali ya wahalifu pia iliongeza hitaji la uwezo wa ziada wa gereza. Takriban hukumu 13,000 za gereza ambazo hazikutekelezwa ziliwekwa jumla ya miaka 2,100 ya kizuizini mnamo 1970. Bado, mnamo 2000, wakati idadi ya hukumu za gereza ziliongezeka maradufu, idadi ya miaka ya kizuizini iliyowekwa iliongezeka karibu nane hadi 16,000. Kufuatia ujenzi wa gereza la miaka ya 1980, uwezo wa gereza uliongezeka kutoka kwa wakaazi 3,300 hadi takriban 12,800. Mnamo miaka ya 1990, uwezo uliongezeka zaidi na watu 3,500 wa ziada, na kuleta jumla ya uwezo wa gereza kwa takriban watu 16,300. Hali hii inaweza kuendelea katika siku zijazo. Angalau mtoa maoni mmoja amebaini kuwa sheria ya "sheria tatu za mgomo" ina uwezo wa kuongeza kiwango cha kufungwa kwa Uholanzi kwa ile ya viwango vya Amerika. Kwa 2002, kiwango cha kufungwa kilikuwa wafungwa 93 kwa raia 100,000. Uadilifu wa waendesha mashtaka wa hapo awali juu ya kesi umepungua tangu kutekelezwa kwa miongozo mpya ya kidini. Miongozo hapo awali ilisababisha dhana katika kupendelea kufukuzwa, wakati sasa miongozo hiyo inaweka dhana ya kutotupilia mbali kesi.

Wakati wa uchunguzi wa lubbers, makubaliano ya awali yalifikiwa. Kwa mara ya kwanza katika historia ya kisiasa, Uholanzi inaweza kutawaliwa na baraza la mawaziri la wachache linaloungwa mkono na mtu wa tatu "nje" Serikali. Kutakuwa na mikataba miwili iliyoundwa: makubaliano halisi ya serikali kati ya VVD na CDA na kinachojulikana "" Gedoogakkoord "" (makubaliano ya uvumilivu) kati ya Baraza la Mawaziri na PVV. Makubaliano hayo yangeshughulikia mambo kama vile uhamiaji, ujumuishaji, hifadhi, na sheria na utaratibu. Hii inamaanisha kunaweza kuwa na makubaliano juu ya maswala yaliyoletwa haswa na PVV katika kampeni yake, kama kuungana tena kwa familia, kwa wageni wanaolipa katika Usalama wa Jamii kabla ya kustahiki kuipokea. Hata kanuni za ubishani zaidi juu ya mavazi ya wafanyikazi wa umma zinaweza kuletwa - ambayo inamaanisha kuwa vichwa vya kichwa na alama zingine za kidini zinaweza kupigwa marufuku katika utumishi wa umma. Habari Lubbers aliiita "baraza la mawaziri maalum" badala ya serikali ya wachache.

"Tulibuni jengo hilo kutoka ndani, sio nje," alisema Loretta H. Cockrum, mwanzilishi wa Foram, Mwenyekiti na Mkurugenzi Mtendaji. "Tulitaka jengo bora zaidi la ofisi lililowahi kubuniwa, bila nafasi ya kupoteza au nishati ya kupoteza. Hii ni jengo la siku zijazo zaidi ya jengo la sasa. Upendo mwingi umeingia kwenye jengo hilo, na kiburi sana."
report_src: Kihistoria, Uholanzi haukuwa na demokrasia kamili bali mfumo wa utawala uliokuwa karibu zaidi na oligarkia, ambapo serikali za mijini “zilionyesha ishara adimu za demokrasia” lakini zilisalia chini ya uongozi wa tabaka dogo la watawala [1]; raia wa kawaida hawakuwa na chaguo la kumpigia kura mwakilishi wao, kwa kuwa kulikuwa tu na uchaguzi kati ya aristokrasia na utawala wa kifalme, na Stadtholder alikuwa lazima atoke katika Nyumba ya Orange-Nassau [1]. Mfumo huu uliwaacha watu wengi bila haki za kisiasa za moja kwa moja licha ya usawa fulani wa elimu na fursa za kiuchumi, hivyo Uholanzi wa wakati huo ulifanana zaidi na “demokrasia ya kilimwengu” yenye ushiriki finyu badala ya demokrasia ya wingi wa raia [1].

question_en: How many types of calendars are there?
pos_context_en: Calendars fall into four types, lunisolar, solar, lunar, seasonal, besides calendars with "years" of fixed length, with no intercalation. Most pre-modern calendars are lunisolar. The seasonal calendars rely on changes in the environment rather than lunar or solar observations. The Islamic and some Buddhist calendars are lunar, while most modern calendars are solar, based on either the Julian or the Gregorian calendars.
neg_context_title_en: History of science and technology in Africa
neg_context_en: There are many types of calendar, serving a wide variety of uses.

Ancient documents and inscriptions, such as from Rome and China, include early forms of calendars. Printing gave rise to many related types of publication which track dates, of which calendars are just one. The modern calendar evolved alongside others such as almanacs, which collected religious, cultural, meteorological, astronomical and astrological information in a table format; practica, which gave astrological predictions for the year ahead; and diaries for personal and professional use. The introduction of broadside printing allowed a calendar to be printed on a single large sheet of paper, differentiating the basic calendar from more detailed diaries and practica. In the absence of accurate clocks, calendars doubled as timekeeping aids - by noting the times of sunrise and moonrise, calendars helped farmers tell the time while in the fields.

The basic element to the calendar is Sunday, which is a festival of Jesus’ resurrection. However, Christian Churches have historically observed other festivals which commemorate events in the life of Jesus or of significant individuals in the history of the Church. The purpose of the liturgical calendar is to guide commemorations as a part of the daily worship of the Lutheran Church. There is some variation associated with the observance of the calendar, as each Lutheran Church creates its own calendar and each congregation must choose independently how many individuals will be commemorated within a given year and how many festivals and lesser festivals they will publicly celebrate, especially if they do not coincide with a Sunday.

Three types of calendars can be found in Africa: lunar, solar, and stellar. Most African calendars are a combination of the three. African calendars include the Akan calendar, Egyptian calendar, Berber calendar, Ethiopian calendar, Igbo calendar, Yoruba calendar, Shona calendar, Swahili calendar, Xhosa calendar, Borana calendar, and Luba calendar.

A new version of Calendar with a text-heavy was added to Windows 8 as one of many apps written to run full-screen or snapped as part of Microsoft's Metro design language philosophy. It is one of three apps on Windows that originate from Microsoft Outlook, the other two being Mail and People apps. Structurally, the three apps are one and are installed and uninstalled as such. But each has its own user interface. Calendar in Windows 8 originally supported Outlook.com, Exchange, Google Calendar, and Facebook calendars. Because of API changes, Facebook and Google calendars can no longer be directly synced on Windows 8. Like many Microsoft apps introduced for Windows 8, many of the features are hidden in the charms or a menu at the bottom of the screen that is triggered by right clicking. Different calendars can be labeled with different colors. When a user with a Microsoft account adds a calendar account on one computer with Windows 8 Calendar, the account will be automatically added to all other Windows 8 computers the user is logged into. .ics files are not supported in this version.

Google Calendar allows users to create and edit events. Events have a set start time and stop time, with an option for an "All-day event". Users can enable a "Recurring" functionality with optional parameters for frequency. Users can add a color to an event for recognition or to distinguish the event from others. Users can optionally set notifications, with options for type (email, mobile push notification) and time. Locations can be added for easy understanding of an event's place. Events are viewable in different types of setups, including day, week, month, or schedule. Users can invite other people to events; for other Google Calendar users, the event becomes visible in their calendar, and for non-Google Calendar users, an email will have options for "Yes", "No", or "Maybe". Privacy settings allow the user to define the levels of public visibility of the entire calendar or individual events. Although the calendar defaults to showing users event times in their local time, users can specify a different time zone for an event. Users can enable or disable the visibility of special calendars, including a Birthdays calendar, that automatically retrieves dates of births from a user's Google contacts and displays the dates on a yearly basis, and a Holidays calendar, a country-specific calendar featuring dates of special occasions.

The calendar recognizes two types of months: synodic month and sidereal month. The Synodic months are used to compose the years while the 27 lunar sidereal days (Sanskrit: "nakshatra"), alongside the 12 signs of the zodiac, are used for astrological calculations. (The Burmese calendar also recognizes a solar month called "Thuriya Matha", which is defined as 1/12th of a year. But the solar month varies by the type of year such as tropical year, sidereal year, etc.)

Hinduism and Buddhism were the prominent religions of southeast Asia in the 1st millennium CE, prior to the Islamic conquest that started in the 14th century. The Hindus prevailed in Bali, Indonesia and they have two types of Hindu calendar. One is a 210-day based Pawukon calendar which likely is a pre-Hindu system, and another is similar to lunisolar calendar system found in South India and it is called the Balinese saka calendar which uses Hindu methodology. The names of month and festivals of Balinese Hindus for the most part are different, though the significance and legends have some overlap.

Aztec religious life was organized around the calendars. As most Mesoamerican people, the Aztecs used two calendars simultaneously: a ritual calendar of 260 days called the "tonalpohualli" and a solar calendar of 365 days called the "xiuhpohualli". Each day had a name and number in both calendars, and the combination of two dates were unique within a period of 52 years. The tonalpohualli was mostly used for divinatory purposes and it consisted of 20 day signs and number coefficients of 1–13 that cycled in a fixed order. The "xiuhpohualli" was made up of 18 “months” of 20 days, and with a remainder of 5 “void” days at the end of a cycle before the new "xiuhpohualli" cycle began. Each 20-day month was named after the specific ritual festival that began the month, many of which contained a relation to the agricultural cycle. Whether, and how, the Aztec calendar corrected for leap year is a matter of discussion among specialists. The monthly rituals involved the entire population as rituals were performed in each household, in the "calpolli" temples and in the main sacred precinct. Many festivals involved different forms of dancing, as well as the reenactment of mythical narratives by deity impersonators and the offering of sacrifice, in the form of food, animals and human victims.
question_src: Kuna aina ngapi za kalenda?
pos_context_src: Kalenda huanguka katika aina nne, lunisolar, jua, mwezi, msimu, mbali na kalenda zilizo na "miaka" ya urefu uliowekwa, bila kuingiliana. Kalenda nyingi za kabla ya kisasa ni lunisolar. Kalenda za msimu hutegemea mabadiliko katika mazingira badala ya uchunguzi wa jua au jua. Kalenda za Kiisilamu na zingine za Wabudhi ni za mwezi, wakati kalenda nyingi za kisasa ni za jua, kwa msingi wa kalenda za Julian au Gregorian.
neg_context_title_src: Historia ya Sayansi na Teknolojia barani Afrika
neg_context_src: Kuna aina nyingi za kalenda, kutumikia matumizi anuwai.

Hati za zamani na maandishi, kama vile kutoka Roma na Uchina, ni pamoja na aina za kalenda za mapema. Uchapishaji ulitoa aina nyingi zinazohusiana za uchapishaji ambazo zinafuatilia tarehe, ambazo kalenda ni moja tu. Kalenda ya kisasa ilibadilika pamoja na zingine kama vile almanacs, ambazo zilikusanya habari za kidini, kitamaduni, hali ya hewa, kisayansi na unajimu katika muundo wa meza; mazoezi, ambayo yalitoa utabiri wa unajimu kwa mwaka ujao; na diaries kwa matumizi ya kibinafsi na ya kitaalam. Utangulizi wa uchapishaji wa Broadside uliruhusu kalenda kuchapishwa kwenye karatasi moja kubwa, ikitofautisha kalenda ya msingi kutoka kwa diaries za kina na mazoezi. Kwa kukosekana kwa saa sahihi, kalenda ziliongezeka mara mbili kama misaada ya wakati - kwa kubaini nyakati za jua na mwezi, kalenda zilisaidia wakulima kusema wakati wakati wa shambani.

Jambo la msingi kwa kalenda ni Jumapili, ambayo ni sikukuu ya ufufuo wa Yesu. Walakini, makanisa ya Kikristo yameona sherehe zingine ambazo zinaadhimisha matukio katika maisha ya Yesu au ya watu muhimu katika historia ya kanisa. Kusudi la kalenda ya liturujia ni kuongoza maadhimisho kama sehemu ya ibada ya kila siku ya Kanisa la Kilutheri. Kuna tofauti kadhaa zinazohusiana na utunzaji wa kalenda, kwani kila kanisa la Kilutheri linaunda kalenda yake na kila mkutano lazima uchague kwa uhuru ni watu wangapi watakumbukwa ndani ya mwaka uliopewa na sherehe ngapi na sherehe ndogo ambazo watasherehekea hadharani, haswa ikiwa hawaendani na Jumapili.

Aina tatu za kalenda zinaweza kupatikana barani Afrika: mwezi, jua, na stellar. Kalenda nyingi za Kiafrika ni mchanganyiko wa tatu. Kalenda za Kiafrika ni pamoja na Kalenda ya Akan, Kalenda ya Wamisri, Kalenda ya Berber, Kalenda ya Ethiopia, Kalenda ya Igbo, Kalenda ya Yoruba, Kalenda ya Shona, Kalenda ya Kiswahili, Kalenda ya Xhosa, Kalenda ya Borana, na Kalenda ya Luba.

Toleo jipya la kalenda iliyo na maandishi-nzito iliongezwa kwa Windows 8 kama moja ya programu nyingi zilizoandikwa ili kuendesha skrini kamili au iliyopigwa kama sehemu ya falsafa ya lugha ya Microsoft ya Metro. Ni moja ya programu tatu kwenye Windows ambazo zinatoka kwa Microsoft Outlook, zingine mbili kuwa barua na programu za watu. Kimuundo, programu tatu ni moja na zimewekwa na hazijasanifiwa kama vile. Lakini kila moja ina interface yake ya mtumiaji. Kalenda katika Windows 8 awali iliunga mkono Outlook.com, kubadilishana, kalenda ya Google, na kalenda za Facebook. Kwa sababu ya mabadiliko ya API, kalenda za Facebook na Google haziwezi kusawazishwa moja kwa moja kwenye Windows 8. Kama programu nyingi za Microsoft zilizoletwa kwa Windows 8, huduma nyingi zimefichwa kwenye hirizi au menyu chini ya skrini ambayo inasababishwa na kubonyeza kulia. Kalenda tofauti zinaweza kuandikiwa na rangi tofauti. Wakati mtumiaji aliye na akaunti ya Microsoft anaongeza akaunti ya kalenda kwenye kompyuta moja na Kalenda ya Windows 8, akaunti itaongezwa kiatomati kwa kompyuta zingine zote za Windows 8 ambazo mtumiaji ameingia. Faili za .ics hazihimiliwi katika toleo hili.

Kalenda ya Google inaruhusu watumiaji kuunda na kuhariri matukio. Matukio yana wakati wa kuanza na wakati wa kuacha, na chaguo la "tukio la siku zote". Watumiaji wanaweza kuwezesha utendaji wa "mara kwa mara" na vigezo vya hiari kwa frequency. Watumiaji wanaweza kuongeza rangi kwenye hafla ya kutambuliwa au kutofautisha tukio hilo kutoka kwa wengine. Watumiaji wanaweza kuweka arifa kwa hiari, na chaguzi za aina (barua pepe, arifa ya kushinikiza ya rununu) na wakati. Sehemu zinaweza kuongezwa kwa uelewa rahisi wa mahali pa tukio. Matukio yanaonekana katika aina tofauti za usanidi, pamoja na siku, wiki, mwezi, au ratiba. Watumiaji wanaweza kuwaalika watu wengine kwenye hafla; Kwa watumiaji wengine wa kalenda ya Google, hafla hiyo inaonekana katika kalenda yao, na kwa watumiaji wa kalenda isiyo ya google, barua pepe itakuwa na chaguzi za "ndio", "hapana", au "labda". Mipangilio ya faragha inamruhusu mtumiaji kufafanua viwango vya mwonekano wa umma wa kalenda nzima au matukio ya mtu binafsi. Ingawa kalenda inachagua kuonyesha nyakati za tukio la watumiaji katika wakati wao wa ndani, watumiaji wanaweza kutaja eneo tofauti la wakati kwa hafla. Watumiaji wanaweza kuwezesha au kulemaza mwonekano wa kalenda maalum, pamoja na kalenda ya siku za kuzaliwa, ambayo inachukua tarehe za kuzaliwa kutoka kwa mawasiliano ya Google na kuonyesha tarehe kila mwaka, na kalenda ya likizo, kalenda maalum ya nchi iliyo na tarehe maalum.

Kalenda inatambua aina mbili za miezi: Mwezi wa Synodic na Mwezi wa Sidereal. Miezi ya synodic hutumiwa kutunga miaka wakati siku 27 za Lunar Sidereal (Sanskrit: "Nakshatra"), kando na ishara 12 za zodiac, hutumiwa kwa mahesabu ya unajimu. .

Uhindu na Ubuddha zilikuwa dini maarufu za Asia ya Kusini katika milenia ya 1, kabla ya ushindi wa Kiisilamu ulioanza katika karne ya 14. Wahindu walishinda huko Bali, Indonesia na wana aina mbili za kalenda ya Kihindu. Mojawapo ni kalenda ya siku 210 ya Pawukon ambayo inaweza kuwa mfumo wa kabla ya Hindu, na nyingine ni sawa na mfumo wa kalenda ya lunisolar inayopatikana India Kusini na inaitwa kalenda ya Saka ya Balinese ambayo hutumia mbinu ya Kihindu. Majina ya mwezi na sherehe za Wahindu wa Balinese kwa sehemu kubwa ni tofauti, ingawa umuhimu na hadithi zina mwingiliano.

Maisha ya kidini ya Azteki yalipangwa karibu na kalenda. Kama watu wengi wa Mesoamerican, Waazteki walitumia kalenda mbili wakati huo huo: kalenda ya ibada ya siku 260 inayoitwa "Tonalpohualli" na kalenda ya jua ya siku 365 inayoitwa "Xiuhpohualli". Kila siku ilikuwa na jina na idadi katika kalenda zote mbili, na mchanganyiko wa tarehe mbili ulikuwa wa kipekee katika kipindi cha miaka 52. Tonalpohualli ilitumika sana kwa madhumuni ya uungu na ilikuwa na ishara za siku 20 na idadi ya mgawanyiko wa 1-13 ambao ulipanda baiskeli kwa mpangilio uliowekwa. "Xiuhpohualli" ilitengenezwa na "miezi" 18 ya siku 20, na kwa mabaki ya siku 5 "tupu" mwishoni mwa mzunguko kabla ya mzunguko mpya wa "Xiuhpohualli". Kila mwezi wa siku 20 ulipewa jina baada ya tamasha maalum la ibada ambalo lilianza mwezi, ambao wengi walikuwa na uhusiano na mzunguko wa kilimo. Ikiwa, na vipi, kalenda ya Aztec iliyorekebishwa kwa mwaka wa kuruka ni suala la majadiliano kati ya wataalamu. Tamaduni za kila mwezi zilihusisha idadi ya watu kama mila zilifanywa katika kila kaya, katika mahekalu ya "Calpolli" na katika eneo kuu takatifu. Sherehe nyingi zilihusisha aina tofauti za densi, na vile vile kutekelezwa kwa hadithi za hadithi na waigaji wa mungu na toleo la dhabihu, kwa njia ya chakula, wanyama na wahasiriwa wa kibinadamu.

question_en: What was Reginald Aubrey Fessenden's first patented invention?
pos_context_en: She was named in honor of Reginald Aubrey Fessenden, born in Brome County, Quebec, Canada, 6 October 1866. He served as head chemist with Thomas Edison's East Orange, New Jersey, laboratories. In 1890 he began concentrating on electrical engineering, and through the next years made many important inventions and improvements in existing devices. His great contributions in the field of radio (particularly the invention of radio-telephony were of marked benefit not only to the Navy but to all seamen. He died 22 July 1932, at his home on Bermuda.
neg_context_en: The list of Reginald Fessenden patents contains the innovation of his pioneering experiments. Reginald Aubrey Fessenden received hundreds of patents for devices in fields such as high-powered transmitting, sonar, and television.

Reginald Aubrey Fessenden (October 6, 1866 – July 22, 1932) was a Canadian-born inventor, who did a majority of his work in the United States and also claimed U.S. citizenship through his American-born father. During his life he received hundreds of patents in various fields, most notably ones related to radio and sonar.

Having few resources, he had to rely on friends to push his project. Despite great difficulty, three patents were awarded: "The Wave Transmitter" (October 11, 1904), which is the precursor of today's radio transceiver; "The Wireless Telephone" and the "Wireless Telegraph", both dated November 22, 1904.
The next advancement was the vacuum tube detector, invented by Westinghouse engineers. On Christmas Eve 1906, Reginald Fessenden used a synchronous rotary-spark transmitter for the first radio program broadcast, from Ocean Bluff-Brant Rock, Massachusetts. Ships at sea heard a broadcast that included Fessenden playing "O Holy Night" on the violin and reading a passage from the Bible. This was, for all intents and purposes, the first transmission of what is now known as amplitude modulation or AM radio.

At the outbreak of World War I, Fessenden volunteered his services to the Canadian government and was sent to London where he developed a device to detect enemy artillery and another to locate enemy submarines. Other efforts included a version of microfilm, that helped him to keep a compact record of his inventions, projects and patents. He also patented the basic ideas leading to reflection seismology, a technique important for its use in exploring for petroleum, and received patents for diverse subjects that included tracer bullets, paging, television apparatus, and a turbo electric drive for ships.

An inveterate tinkerer, Fessenden eventually became the holder of more than 500 patents. He could often be found in a river or lake, floating on his back, a cigar sticking out of his mouth and a hat pulled down over his eyes. At home he liked to lie on the carpet, a cat on his chest. In this state of relaxation, Fessenden could imagine, invent and think his way to new ideas. Fessenden also had a reputation for being temperamental, although in his defense his wife later stated that "Fessenden was never a difficult man to W O R K with but he was an intensely difficult man to play politics with." However, one of his former assistants, Charles J. Pannill, recalled that "He was a great character, of splendid physique, but what a temper!", while a second, Roy Weagant, ruefully noted that "He could be very nice at times, but only at times."

On December 23, 1900, Reginald Aubrey Fessenden sent and received the first intelligible speech by electromagnetic waves on a pair of masts high and apart on Cobb Island.
Fessenden was using a spark transmitter with the Kintner-Brashear interrupter.

In 1901, Reginald Fessenden demonstrated a direct-conversion heterodyne receiver or beat receiver as a method of making continuous wave radiotelegraphy signals audible. Fessenden's receiver did not see much application because of its local oscillator's stability problem. A stable yet inexpensive local oscillator was not available until Lee de Forest invented the triode vacuum tube oscillator. In a 1905 patent, Fessenden stated that the frequency stability of his local oscillator was one part per thousand.

In 1925, "Radio News", saluting Fessenden as "one of the greatest American radio inventors", began a monthly autobiographical series titled "The Inventions of Reginald A. Fessenden", with the intention of publishing the completed installments as a book. However, instead of reviewing his radio work, Fessenden immediately went on a series of tangents, including discussions of which races he believed were the most capable of producing inventions, and the proper approach that government institutions should be taking in order to support inventors. (At the close of the seventh installment, "Radio News" included a disclaimer that it was "not responsible for any opinions expressed in Dr. Fessenden's article".) After eleven installments Fessenden had only covered his life up to 1893, having discussed virtually nothing about radio, and the series was quietly terminated at this point.
In response to Edison's patent, Reginald Fessenden invented the bi-pin connector for the 1893 World's Fair. Other lamp bases include the bayonet mount and wedge base.
question_src: Je! Uvumbuzi wa kwanza wa hati miliki ya Reginald Aubrey Fessenden ulikuwa nini?
pos_context_src: Alitajwa kwa heshima ya Reginald Aubrey Fessenden, aliyezaliwa katika Brome County, Quebec, Canada, 6 Oktoba 1866. Alihudumu kama Mkuu wa Kemia na Thomas Edison's East Orange, New Jersey, maabara. Mnamo 1890 alianza kuzingatia uhandisi wa umeme, na kupitia miaka ijayo alifanya uvumbuzi na maboresho mengi katika vifaa vilivyopo. Mchango wake mkubwa katika uwanja wa redio (haswa uvumbuzi wa redio-telephony ulikuwa na faida kubwa sio tu kwa Jeshi la Wanamaji lakini kwa Seamen wote. Alikufa 22 Julai 1932, nyumbani kwake Bermuda.
neg_context_title_src: Orodha ya ruhusu ya Reginald Fessenden
neg_context_src: Orodha ya ruhusu ya Reginald Fessenden ina uvumbuzi wa majaribio yake ya upainia. Reginald Aubrey Fessenden alipokea mamia ya ruhusu kwa vifaa kwenye uwanja kama vile kupitisha nguvu, sonar, na runinga.

Reginald Aubrey Fessenden (Oktoba 6, 1866-Julai 22, 1932) alikuwa mvumbuzi mzaliwa wa Canada, ambaye alifanya kazi yake nyingi nchini Merika na pia alidai uraia wa Merika kupitia baba yake mzaliwa wa Amerika. Wakati wa maisha yake alipokea mamia ya ruhusu katika nyanja mbali mbali, haswa zile zinazohusiana na redio na sonar.

Kuwa na rasilimali chache, ilibidi ategemee marafiki kushinikiza mradi wake. Licha ya ugumu mkubwa, ruhusu tatu zilitolewa: "Transmitter ya Wimbi" (Oktoba 11, 1904), ambayo ni mtangulizi wa transceiver ya leo ya redio; "Simu isiyo na waya" na "Telegraph isiyo na waya", zote mbili za Novemba 22, 1904.
Maendeleo yaliyofuata yalikuwa kizuizi cha bomba la utupu, zuliwa na wahandisi wa Westinghouse. Siku ya Krismasi 1906, Reginald Fessenden alitumia transmitter ya synchronous rotary-spark kwa matangazo ya kwanza ya redio, kutoka Ocean Bluff-Brant Rock, Massachusetts. Meli baharini zilisikia matangazo ambayo ni pamoja na Fessenden akicheza "O Holy Night" kwenye violin na kusoma kifungu kutoka kwa Bibilia. Hii ilikuwa, kwa nia na madhumuni yote, maambukizi ya kwanza ya kile kinachojulikana kama moduli ya amplitude au redio ya AM.

Katika kuzuka kwa Vita vya Kwanza vya Kidunia, Fessenden alijitolea huduma zake kwa serikali ya Canada na alitumwa London ambapo alitengeneza kifaa cha kugundua sanaa ya maadui na mwingine kupata manowari ya adui. Jaribio zingine ni pamoja na toleo la microfilm, ambalo lilimsaidia kuweka rekodi ya uvumbuzi, miradi na ruhusu. Pia alitoa hati miliki maoni ya msingi yanayoongoza kwa kutafakari seismology, mbinu muhimu kwa matumizi yake katika kuchunguza petroli, na alipokea ruhusu kwa masomo anuwai ambayo ni pamoja na risasi za tracer, paging, vifaa vya runinga, na gari la umeme la turbo kwa meli.

Tinkerer ya Inveterate, Fessenden mwishowe alikua mmiliki wa ruhusu zaidi ya 500. Mara nyingi aliweza kupatikana katika mto au ziwa, akielea mgongoni mwake, sigara ikitoka kinywani mwake na kofia ikavutwa juu ya macho yake. Nyumbani alipenda kulala kwenye carpet, paka kwenye kifua chake. Katika hali hii ya kupumzika, Fessenden angeweza kufikiria, kugundua na kufikiria njia yake ya maoni mapya. Fessenden pia alikuwa na sifa ya kuwa na hasira, ingawa katika utetezi wake mke wake baadaye alisema kwamba "Fessenden hakuwahi kuwa mtu mgumu wa kufanya kazi naye lakini alikuwa mtu mgumu sana kucheza siasa." Walakini, mmoja wa wasaidizi wake wa zamani, Charles J. Pannill, alikumbuka kwamba "alikuwa mhusika mkubwa, wa mwili mzuri, lakini ni hasira gani!", Wakati wa pili, Roy Weagant, aligundua kuwa "anaweza kuwa mzuri sana wakati mwingine, lakini wakati mwingine tu."

Mnamo Desemba 23, 1900, Reginald Aubrey Fessenden alituma na kupokea hotuba ya kwanza isiyoweza kueleweka na mawimbi ya umeme kwenye jozi ya masts juu na kando kwenye Kisiwa cha Cobb.
Fessenden alikuwa akitumia transmitter ya cheche na kintner-brashear interrupter.

Mnamo 1901, Reginald Fessenden alionyesha mpokeaji wa heterodyne wa moja kwa moja au mpokeaji wa kupiga kama njia ya kufanya ishara za wimbi za radiotelegraphy zinazoendelea kueleweka. Mpokeaji wa Fessenden hakuona maombi mengi kwa sababu ya shida ya utulivu wa oscillator. Oscillator thabiti lakini isiyo na bei ghali haikuwepo hadi Lee de Msitu atakapogundua oscillator ya utupu wa Triode. Katika patent ya 1905, Fessenden alisema kwamba utulivu wa mzunguko wa oscillator yake ya ndani ulikuwa sehemu moja kwa elfu.

Mnamo 1925, "Habari za Redio", kumsalimu Fessenden kama "mmoja wa wavumbuzi wakubwa wa redio ya Amerika", alianza mfululizo wa kila mwezi wa jina la "Uvumbuzi wa Reginald A. Fessenden", kwa kusudi la kuchapisha vifunguo vilivyokamilishwa kama kitabu. Walakini, badala ya kukagua kazi yake ya redio, Fessenden mara moja alienda kwenye safu ya tangi, pamoja na majadiliano ambayo jamii aliamini ndio yenye uwezo wa kutengeneza uvumbuzi, na njia sahihi ambayo taasisi za serikali zinapaswa kuchukua ili kusaidia wavumbuzi. .
Kujibu patent ya Edison, Reginald Fessenden aligundua kiunganishi cha bi-pin kwa haki ya 1893 ya ulimwengu. Misingi mingine ya taa ni pamoja na mlima wa bayonet na msingi wa kabari.
report_src: Kwa mujibu wa maelezo pekee yaliyopo kwenye kumbukumbu kuhusu Reginald Aubrey Fessenden, hakuna taarifa inayoonyesha ni uvumbuzi upi uliopewa hati miliki yake ya kwanza; maandishi yanataja tu kwamba alianza kuzingatia uhandisi wa umeme mwaka 1890 na baadaye akafanya uvumbuzi na maboresho mengi, hasa katika mawasiliano ya redio-simu, lakini hayabainishi ni kifaa au mbinu gani hasa aliyopatia hati miliki kwanza [1].

question_en: How many students are enrolled at UT's Cockrell School of Engineering?
pos_context_en: The Cockrell School of Engineering at the University of Texas at Austin has more than 7,800 students enrolled in nine undergraduate degrees and thirteen graduate programs. The college is ranked fourth in the world according to the Academic Ranking of World Universities and eighth nationally by "U.S. News & World Report", while all graduate programs are ranked in the top twenty nationally. Annual research expenditures are over $150 million and the school has the fourth-largest number of faculty in the National Academy of Engineering.
neg_context_title_en: University of Texas at Austin School of Architecture
neg_context_en: The Cockrell School of Engineering is home to over 80 student organizations under the supervision of the Engineering Student Life Office. These organizations offer a wide variety of student groups that provide academic, professional development, service, and social opportunities. The majority are student chapters of national and international professional engineering organizations. Among the organizations are:

Joe H. Gill and his engineering friends thoughtfully considered how to make a holiday of April Fool's Day. After an unsuccessful attempt involving tying cans around dogs' tails and releasing them to disrupt class, the group of students saw a wooden statue about five feet high while getting refreshments, which they requested to borrow. The next day, Gill presented the statue as their patron saint and traced his ancestry back to ancient times between classes. The presentation successfully broke up classes, and led to his christening as Alexander Frederick Claire, patron saint of UT engineers, exactly one year later. Alec was at the center of a friendly rivalry between law and engineering students for many years, and was subject to numerous escapades such as kidnappings and amputations. Today, what is left of the original wooden statue is safely preserved in the engineering library.

Every year, engineering groups on campus build new Alecs which are then voted on by the students. The winner is announced on April 1 during Alec's birthday party.The Cockrell School of Engineering has formal organized research units that coordinate and promote faculty and student research. These units provide and maintain specialized research facilities for faculty within a designated field.

Ahmed H. Tewfik is an Egyptian-American electrical engineer, professor and college administrator who currently serves as the chair of the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at the Cockrell School of Engineering at the University of Texas at Austin since October 1, 2010. He holds the Cockrell Family Chair in Engineering #1 at UT Austin. For his research and contributions to the field of Signal Processing he was awarded the 2017 IEEE Signal Processing Society Technical Achievement Award as well as the IEEE Third Millennium Award in 2000. He is the 2018–2019 IEEE Signal Processing Society President-Elect.

In 1910, The University of Texas at Austin College of Engineering (now known as the Cockrell School of Engineering) began offering a professional degree in architecture. Two years later, the program had over 30 registered students. The school was expanded over the next two decades under the leadership of Frederick Giesecke and Goldwin Goldsmith. In 1925, the school became the first in Texas to be accepted for membership in the Association of Collegiate Schools of Architecture. The program was accredited in 1935 by the National Architectural Accreditation Board. The school moved into its permanent home in the Architecture Building (Goldsmith Hall, named after Goldwin Goldsmith) in 1933 and became the School of Architecture in 1948. The school's first graduate was Bertram Ernst Giesecke, who was officially licensed as an architect in 1927.UTSOA is home to:

Seven schools provide undergraduate programs and an additional seven provide graduate and professional programs. Students pursuing graduate degrees in departments of these schools are enrolled in the Graduate School. The School of Continuing Education and Summer Sessions offers programs for college and high school students, professionals, and other adults. Of the 15,182 undergraduate students, 4,602 (30.3%) are affiliated with the largest college by enrollment, Arts and Sciences, followed by 3,203 (21.1%) in Engineering and 3,101 (20.4%) in Agriculture and Life Sciences. By student enrollment, the smallest of the seven undergraduate colleges is Architecture, Art, and Planning, with 503 (3.3%) students.

Prior to his role as executive vice president and provost of UT Austin from 2013 to 2015, he was appointed as the eighth dean of the Cockrell School of Engineering at UT Austin in 2008 and served in that capacity for five years. In 2015, he was selected as the 29th president of UT Austin.

Dr. Santoso joined the faculty at the Cockrell School of Engineering at the University of Texas at Austin in 2003. He teaches courses in the broad area of electric power systems, particularly in power quality, modeling and simulation of electrical transients and wind power systems. Since becoming professor, he has graduated seven doctoral and twenty-four master’s students.

The Cooper Union School of Engineering's enrollment includes about 550 students, and is the largest of the three schools by a significant margin. It is one of the most prestigious and selective engineering schools in the United States, consistently ranked within the top ten undergraduate engineering programs among non-doctorate-awarding schools nationwide. The school offers ABET-accredited Bachelor of Engineering (B.E.) programs in chemical, civil, electrical, and mechanical engineering. In addition, Cooper Union offers an interdisciplinary engineering program, leading to a Middle States Association of Colleges and Schools-accredited Bachelor of Science in Engineering (B.S.E.) degree.
question_src: Je! Ni wanafunzi wangapi wameandikishwa katika Shule ya Uhandisi ya UT ya UT?
pos_context_src: Shule ya Uhandisi ya Cockrell katika Chuo Kikuu cha Texas huko Austin ina zaidi ya wanafunzi 7,800 waliojiunga na digrii tisa za shahada ya kwanza na mipango kumi na tatu ya wahitimu. Chuo hicho kiko nafasi ya nne ulimwenguni kulingana na kiwango cha kitaaluma cha vyuo vikuu vya ulimwengu na nane kitaifa na "Habari za U.S. na Ripoti ya Dunia", wakati mipango yote ya wahitimu imeorodheshwa katika ishirini ya juu kitaifa. Matumizi ya utafiti wa kila mwaka ni zaidi ya dola milioni 150 na shule hiyo ina idadi kubwa ya nne ya kitivo katika Chuo cha Uhandisi cha Kitaifa.
neg_context_title_src: Chuo Kikuu cha Texas katika Shule ya Usanifu ya Austin
neg_context_src: Shule ya Uhandisi ya Cockrell ni nyumbani kwa mashirika zaidi ya 80 ya wanafunzi chini ya usimamizi wa Ofisi ya Maisha ya Wanafunzi wa Uhandisi. Mashirika haya hutoa anuwai ya vikundi vya wanafunzi ambavyo vinapeana kitaaluma, maendeleo ya kitaalam, huduma, na fursa za kijamii. Wengi ni sura za wanafunzi za mashirika ya kitaifa na ya kimataifa ya uhandisi. Kati ya mashirika ni:

Joe H. Gill na marafiki wake wa uhandisi walizingatia kwa uangalifu jinsi ya kufanya likizo ya Siku ya Aprili Fool. Baada ya jaribio lisilofanikiwa la kuhusisha kufunga makopo karibu na mikia ya mbwa na kuwaachilia ili kuvuruga darasa, kikundi cha wanafunzi waliona sanamu ya mbao karibu na futi tano wakati wakipata vinywaji, ambavyo waliomba kukopa. Siku iliyofuata, Gill aliwasilisha sanamu hiyo kama mtakatifu wao na akamfuata ukoo wake nyuma kwa nyakati za zamani kati ya madarasa. Uwasilishaji huo ulifanikiwa kuvunja madarasa, na kusababisha Christening yake kama Alexander Frederick Claire, mtakatifu wa Wahandisi wa UT, haswa mwaka mmoja baadaye. Alec alikuwa katikati ya mashindano ya urafiki kati ya sheria na wanafunzi wa uhandisi kwa miaka mingi, na alikuwa chini ya kutoroka kadhaa kama vile utekaji nyara na kukatwa. Leo, kile kilichobaki cha sanamu ya asili ya mbao imehifadhiwa salama katika maktaba ya uhandisi.

Kila mwaka, vikundi vya uhandisi kwenye vyuo vikuu huunda alecs mpya ambazo hupigiwa kura na wanafunzi. Mshindi anatangazwa Aprili 1 wakati wa sherehe ya kuzaliwa ya Alec. Shule ya Uhandisi ya Cockrell ina vitengo rasmi vya utafiti ambavyo vinaratibu na kukuza kitivo na utafiti wa wanafunzi. Vitengo hivi vinatoa na kudumisha vifaa maalum vya utafiti kwa kitivo ndani ya uwanja uliotengwa.

Ahmed H. Tewfik ni mhandisi wa umeme wa Misri, profesa na msimamizi wa vyuo vikuu ambaye kwa sasa anatumika kama mwenyekiti wa Idara ya Uhandisi wa Umeme na Kompyuta katika Shule ya Uhandisi ya Cockrell katika Chuo Kikuu cha Texas huko Austin tangu Oktoba 1, 2010. Anashikilia mwenyekiti wa familia ya Cockrell katika Uhandisi #1 huko UT Austin. Kwa utafiti wake na michango yake katika uwanja wa usindikaji wa ishara alipewa tuzo ya Ufundi ya Ufundi ya IEEE ya 2017 na tuzo ya Tatu ya Milenia ya IEEE mnamo 2000. Yeye ndiye Rais wa Usindikaji wa IEEE wa IEEE wa 2018.

Mnamo 1910, Chuo Kikuu cha Texas katika Chuo cha Uhandisi cha Austin (ambacho sasa kinajulikana kama Shule ya Uhandisi ya Cockrell) kilianza kutoa digrii ya kitaalam katika usanifu. Miaka miwili baadaye, mpango huo ulikuwa na wanafunzi zaidi ya 30 waliosajiliwa. Shule hiyo iliongezwa kwa miongo miwili ijayo chini ya uongozi wa Frederick Giesecke na Goldwin Goldsmith. Mnamo 1925, shule hiyo ikawa ya kwanza huko Texas kukubaliwa kwa ushirika katika Chama cha Shule za Usanifu. Programu hiyo iliidhinishwa mnamo 1935 na Bodi ya Udhibitishaji wa Usanifu wa Kitaifa. Shule hiyo ilihamia katika nyumba yake ya kudumu katika jengo la usanifu (Goldsmith Hall, iliyopewa jina la Goldwin Goldsmith) mnamo 1933 na ikawa Shule ya Usanifu mnamo 1948. Mhitimu wa kwanza wa shule hiyo alikuwa Bertram Ernst Giesecke, ambaye alikuwa na leseni rasmi kama mbuni mnamo 1927.utsoa ni nyumbani kwa:::

Shule saba hutoa mipango ya shahada ya kwanza na nyongeza saba hutoa mipango ya kuhitimu na ya kitaalam. Wanafunzi wanaofuata digrii za kuhitimu katika idara za shule hizi wameandikishwa katika shule ya kuhitimu. Shule ya Kuendelea na Elimu na Vikao vya Majira ya joto hutoa mipango ya wanafunzi wa vyuo vikuu na shule za upili, wataalamu, na watu wengine wazima. Kati ya wanafunzi 15,182 wahitimu, 4,602 (30.3%) wana uhusiano na chuo kikuu zaidi na uandikishaji, sanaa na sayansi, ikifuatiwa na 3,203 (21.1%) katika uhandisi na 3,101 (20.4%) katika Sayansi ya Kilimo na Maisha. Kwa uandikishaji wa wanafunzi, ndogo kati ya vyuo saba vya shahada ya kwanza ni usanifu, sanaa, na mipango, na wanafunzi 503 (3.3%).

Kabla ya jukumu lake kama Makamu wa Rais Mtendaji na Mtoaji wa UT Austin kutoka 2013 hadi 2015, aliteuliwa kama mkuu wa nane wa Shule ya Uhandisi ya Cockrell huko UT Austin mnamo 2008 na alihudumu katika uwezo huo kwa miaka mitano. Mnamo mwaka wa 2015, alichaguliwa kama Rais wa 29 wa UT Austin.

Dk. Santoso alijiunga na kitivo katika Shule ya Uhandisi ya Cockrell katika Chuo Kikuu cha Texas huko Austin mnamo 2003. Anafundisha kozi katika eneo pana la mifumo ya umeme, haswa katika ubora wa nguvu, modeli na simulation ya muda mfupi wa umeme na mifumo ya nguvu ya upepo. Tangu kuwa profesa, amehitimu wanafunzi saba wa udaktari na ishirini na nne.

Uandikishaji wa Shule ya Uhandisi ya Cooper Union ni pamoja na wanafunzi wapatao 550, na ndio kubwa zaidi ya shule hizo tatu kwa kiwango kikubwa. Ni moja wapo ya shule za uhandisi za kifahari na za kuchagua huko Merika, zilizowekwa katika mipango ya juu ya uhandisi wa shahada ya kwanza kati ya shule zisizo za kuzaa za kitaifa nchini kote. Shule hiyo inapeana mipango ya uhandisi ya ABET inayothibitishwa ya uhandisi (B.E.) katika kemikali, raia, umeme, na uhandisi wa mitambo. Kwa kuongezea, Cooper Union inatoa mpango wa uhandisi wa kidini, na kusababisha Chama cha Kati cha Vyuo na Shahada ya Sayansi iliyothibitishwa katika Uhandisi (B.S.E.).

question_en: How many episodes did King of the Hill have?
pos_context_en: Judge began creating "King of the Hill" during his time making the MTV series "Beavis and Butt-Head", which he also created and voiced. After pitching the pilot to Fox, Judge was paired with Greg Daniels, an experienced writer who previously worked on "The Simpsons". The series debuted on the Fox network as a mid-season replacement in 1997, quickly becoming a hit. The series' popularity led to worldwide syndication, and reruns aired on Adult Swim from 2009 until 2018. As of July 24, 2018, reruns aired on Comedy Central. The show became one of Fox's longest-running series (third-longest as an animated series, behind "The Simpsons" and "Family Guy").. A total of 259 episodes aired over the course of its 13 seasons. The final episode aired on Fox on September 13, 2009. Four episodes from the final season were to have aired on Fox, but later premiered in nightly syndication from May 3 to 6, 2010.
neg_context_title_en: List of King of the Hill home video releases
List of King of the Hill episodes
List of King of the Hill home video releases
neg_context_en: King of the Hill season box sets have been released on DVD since 2003 in region 1, region 2 and in region 4. Seasons one to thirteen have been released in region 1 and seasons one to five in region 2 and region 4. The first six seasons were issued by 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment; releases of seasons seven and onwards were by Olive Films, who acquired the rights in 2014. For details on episodes listed below, refer to the List of "King of the Hill" episodes.

Because FOX wanted to make room for new shows on their "Animation Domination" line-up, the final six DABE episodes were cut down to two ("The Boy Can't Help It" and "To Sirloin with Love"). Both episodes aired as a special one-hour series finale on September 13, 2009. The other four unaired episodes ("The Honeymooners," "Bill Gathers Moss," "When Joseph Met Lori, and Made Out with Her in the Janitor's Closet," and "Just Another Manic Kahn-Day") did not air on FOX, but did appear in syndicated reruns and on Cartoon Network's Adult Swim line-up, as well as appearing on streaming platforms Netflix and Amazon Prime. "To Sirloin with Love" is still considered by most to be the final episode of the series, despite not being the last episode to air, as it was the last episode produced and written for the series.

"King of the Hill" is an American animated television series created by Mike Judge and Greg Daniels. The series focuses on the Hills, a middle-class American family in the fictional city of Arlen, Texas. It originally aired on Fox from January 12, 1997 to September 13, 2009; with four episodes from the final season premiering in syndication from May 3 to May 6, 2010. A total of 259 episodes aired over the course of 13 seasons.

The showrunners for the season were John Altschuler and Dave Krinsky. Beginning with the episode "Lucky See, Monkey Do", "King of the Hill" started being produced in 720p high-definition. 20th Century Fox Television initially ordered 13 DABE production episodes, but decided to keep the show in production for four additional episodes (DABE14–DABE17).

Because it was scheduled to lead off Fox's Sunday-night animated programming lineup, portions of "King of the Hill" episodes were often pre-empted by sporting events that ran into overtime; in season nine especially, whole episodes were pre-empted. Ultimately, enough episodes were pre-empted that the majority of the series' 10th season—initially intended to be the final season, consisted of unaired ninth-season episodes.

This is the first "King of the Hill" box set, released on July 1, 2003. It contains all thirteen episodes produced (only 12 were aired in season 1, one episode was held over for broadcast with season 2) from the first season (1997) spread across three DVD-9s (single-sided, dual layer).

The thirteenth and final season of "King of the Hill" originally aired Sunday nights on the Fox Broadcasting Company from September 28, 2008 to September 13, 2009. Four episodes from this season originally premiered in syndication from May 3 to May 6, 2010. Actress Brittany Murphy, who voiced Luanne Platter, died of pneumonia on December 20, 2009, five months before the final four episodes aired.

"King of the Hill" is the twenty-third episode in the ninth season of the American animated television series "The Simpsons". It originally aired on the Fox network in the United States on May 3, 1998. It was written by John Swartzwelder and directed by Steven Dean Moore, and guest stars Brendan Fraser and Steven Weber. The episode sees Homer trying to climb a large mountain to impress Bart after he humiliates him at a church picnic with his lack of fitness.

The showrunners for the season were John Altschuler and Dave Krinsky. The wackier stories from recent years began to be phased out. Series creator Mike Judge described the episodes from this season as "small personal stories like we did in the second season."
question_src: Je! Mfalme wa kilima alikuwa na vipindi vingapi?
pos_context_src: Jaji alianza kuunda "Mfalme wa kilima" wakati wake wa kutengeneza safu ya MTV "Beavis na Butt-kichwa", ambayo pia aliunda na kuelezea. Baada ya kumpiga marubani kwa Fox, Jaji alichorwa na Greg Daniels, mwandishi mwenye uzoefu ambaye hapo awali alifanya kazi kwenye "The Simpsons". Mfululizo huo ulijadiliwa kwenye mtandao wa Fox kama uingizwaji wa msimu wa katikati mnamo 1997, haraka ikawa hit. Umaarufu wa mfululizo ulisababisha ushirika wa ulimwenguni kote, na reruns ilirushwa kwa watu wazima kuogelea kutoka 2009 hadi 2018. Kufikia Julai 24, 2018, reruns ilirushwa kwenye Comedy Central. Kipindi hicho kilikuwa moja ya safu ya muda mrefu zaidi ya Fox (ya tatu-ya muda mrefu kama safu ya michoro, nyuma ya "The Simpsons" na "Familia Guy") .. Jumla ya sehemu 259 zilirushwa wakati wa misimu yake 13. Sehemu ya mwisho ilirushwa kwenye Fox mnamo Septemba 13, 2009. Vipindi vinne kutoka msimu wa mwisho vilipaswa kurushwa kwenye FOX, lakini baadaye ilizinduliwa katika ushirika wa usiku kutoka Mei 3 hadi 6, 2010.
neg_context_title_src: Orodha ya Mfalme wa video ya Hill Home
Orodha ya Mfalme wa Vipindi vya Hill
Orodha ya Mfalme wa video ya Hill Home
neg_context_src: Seti za King of the Hill msimu zimetolewa kwenye DVD tangu 2003 katika Mkoa wa 1, Mkoa wa 2 na katika Mkoa wa 4. Msimu mmoja hadi kumi na tatu wameachiliwa katika Mkoa 1 na Msimu mmoja hadi watano katika Mkoa wa 2 na Mkoa wa 4. Misimu sita ya kwanza ilitolewa na Burudani ya Karne ya 20 ya Fox; Matoleo ya misimu saba na kuendelea yalikuwa na Filamu za Olive, ambao walipata haki hizo mnamo 2014. Kwa maelezo juu ya vipindi vilivyoorodheshwa hapo chini, rejea orodha ya vipindi vya "Mfalme wa The Hill".

Kwa sababu Fox alitaka kufanya nafasi ya maonyesho mapya kwenye safu yao ya "uhuishaji", vipindi sita vya mwisho vya dabe vilikatwa hadi mbili ("Mvulana Hauwezi Kuisaidia" na "kwa Sirloin na Upendo"). Vipindi vyote viwili vilirudishwa kama fainali maalum ya saa moja mnamo Septemba 13, 2009. Vipindi vingine vinne visivyojulikana ("The Honeymooners," "Bill Gathers Moss," "Wakati Joseph alikutana na Lori, na akafanya kazi na yeye kwenye chumbani la janitor," na "Manic mwingine Kahn-Days" walifanya kazi kwa watu wazima, alionekana kama Synm, "Manic-Day") na Syn-oven, "Sym-oven," Syn-oven, "Syn-Oven," Synved, " Kuonekana kwenye majukwaa ya utiririshaji Netflix na Amazon Prime. "Kwa Sirloin na Upendo" bado inachukuliwa na wengi kuwa sehemu ya mwisho ya safu hiyo, licha ya kuwa sio sehemu ya mwisho ya Hewa, kwani ilikuwa sehemu ya mwisho iliyotengenezwa na kuandikwa kwa safu hiyo.

"Mfalme wa Hill" ni safu ya runinga ya Amerika iliyoundwa na Mike Jaji na Greg Daniels. Mfululizo huo unazingatia Milima, familia ya Amerika ya kati katika mji wa uwongo wa Arlen, Texas. Awali ilirushwa kwenye Fox kutoka Januari 12, 1997 hadi Septemba 13, 2009; na vipindi vinne kutoka msimu wa mwisho wa msimu wa mwisho katika ushirika kutoka Mei 3 hadi Mei 6, 2010. Jumla ya vipindi 259 vilirushwa kwa kipindi cha misimu 13.

Maonyesho ya msimu walikuwa John Altschuler na Dave Krinsky. Kuanzia na sehemu ya "Lucky See, Monkey Do", "King of the Hill" ilianza kuzalishwa kwa ufafanuzi wa juu wa 720p. Televisheni ya Fox ya karne ya 20 hapo awali iliamuru vipindi 13 vya utengenezaji wa DABE, lakini iliamua kuweka onyesho katika uzalishaji kwa vipindi vinne vya ziada (DABE14 -DABE17).

Kwa sababu ilipangwa kuongoza mpango wa programu ya Jumapili-Jumapili-Jumapili, sehemu za vipindi vya "King of the Hill" mara nyingi vilikuwa vimetengwa na hafla za michezo ambazo ziliingia nyongeza; Katika msimu wa tisa haswa, vipindi vyote vilitengwa kabla. Mwishowe, vipindi vya kutosha vilikuwa vimetengwa kuwa msimu mwingi wa 10 wa msimu wa 10-uliokusudiwa kuwa msimu wa mwisho, ulikuwa na vipindi vya msimu wa tisa.

Hii ni sanduku la kwanza la "King of The Hill", lililotolewa mnamo Julai 1, 2003. Inayo sehemu zote kumi na tatu zilizotengenezwa (12 tu zilirushwa katika Msimu 1, sehemu moja ilifanyika kwa matangazo na Msimu wa 2) kutoka msimu wa kwanza (1997) kuenea kwa DVD-9s (safu moja, mbili).

Msimu wa kumi na tatu na wa mwisho wa "King of The Hill" hapo awali ulirushwa usiku wa Jumapili kwenye Kampuni ya Utangazaji ya Fox kutoka Septemba 28, 2008 hadi Septemba 13, 2009. Vipindi vinne kutoka msimu huu vilitangazwa katika ushirika kutoka Mei 3 hadi Mei 6, 2010. Brittany Murphy, ambaye alimwomba Luanne Platter, alikufa wa PneedUMonia mnamo Desemba 20, 2009.

"Mfalme wa kilima" ni sehemu ya ishirini na tatu katika msimu wa tisa wa safu ya runinga ya Amerika "The Simpsons". Hapo awali ilirushwa kwenye Mtandao wa Fox huko Merika mnamo Mei 3, 1998. Iliandikwa na John Swartzwelder na kuongozwa na Steven Dean Moore, na nyota za wageni Brendan Fraser na Steven Weber. Sehemu hiyo inamuona Homer akijaribu kupanda mlima mkubwa ili kumvutia Bart baada ya kumdhalilisha kwenye pichani ya kanisani na ukosefu wake wa usawa.

Maonyesho ya msimu walikuwa John Altschuler na Dave Krinsky. Hadithi za Wackier kutoka miaka ya hivi karibuni zilianza kutolewa. Muumbaji wa mfululizo Mike Jaji alielezea vipindi kutoka msimu huu kama "hadithi ndogo za kibinafsi kama tulivyofanya katika msimu wa pili."
