question_en: How well did Descent: FreeSpace – The Great War sale?
pos_context_en: PC Data, which tracked computer game sales in the United States, reported that "Descent: FreeSpace" earned nearly $4 million and sold around 100,000 copies by October 1999.
neg_context_en: "" was released by Volition in 1998. It shared the "Descent" name, but otherwise had no connection to the series; it was given the "Descent" prefix to avoid trademark issues with "FreeSpace", a disk compression utility (in Europe, it was released as "Conflict: FreeSpace – The Great War"). "FreeSpace" was a space simulator, and while it was still technically a 3D shooter, it did not retain "Descent"s characteristic "six degrees of freedom" control scheme, save for a cheat code that would force the player's ship to loosely mimic "Descent"s physics. Some early drafts of the "FreeSpace" story had the pilot searching for "Descent"s "Material Defender", but the story of the finished game was unrelated.

"Descent: FreeSpace" was well received as a single-player space simulation that integrated all the desired features of its genre, from competent AI wingmen, to the presence of large capital ships that not only dwarf the fighters piloted by the player, but also explode spectacularly when destroyed. However, the game's multiplayer mode was criticised, as it was plagued by lag and inaccurate tracking of statistics. An expansion for the game, which was less well received, was also released in 1998 under the title of "Silent Threat", and focuses on events after the main game's campaign with the player working for an intelligence branch of the Terrans' armed forces that later attempt to overthrow the Terran government. A sequel to "Descent: FreeSpace" entitled "FreeSpace 2", was released in 1999 to critical acclaim.

Descent: FreeSpace – The Great War, also known as Conflict: FreeSpace – The Great War in Europe, or simply just FreeSpace; is a 1998 space combat simulation IBM PC compatible computer game developed by Volition, when it was split off from Parallax Software, and published by Interplay Productions. In 2001, it was ported to the Amiga platform as FreeSpace: The Great War by Hyperion Entertainment. The game places players in the role of a human pilot, who operates in several classes of starfighter and combats against opposing forces, either human or alien, in various space-faring environments, such as in orbit above a planet or within an asteroid belt. The story of the game's single player campaign focuses on a war in the 24th century between two factions, one human and the other alien, that is interrupted in its fourteenth year by the arrival of an enigmatic and militant alien race, whose genocidal advance forces the two sides into a ceasefire in order to work together to halt the threat.

"Descent: FreeSpace" received generally good reviews following its launch, with "PC Gamer UK" placing it 20th in its 1999 Top 100 Awards. However reviewers were split on several aspects of the game. While many praised the graphics of the game, some approving of how well rendered an in-game asteroid stood out before the background of softly glowing nebulae, galaxies and stars, others felt the 3D effects were not "spectacular" to those of the software rendered version, commenting that rendered nebulae were unconvincing and that the models of in-game ships lacked detail and had blurry textures. Despite the differences between them, all reviewers unanimously agreed that the explosions effects in the game, including the many small details of the capital ships upon breaking up, were the most impressive they had seen (at the time).

Apogee Software announced on December 12, 1997 that they would be exclusively publishing "FreeSpace" for the first three months before handing the publishing rights back to Interplay Entertainment. This was part of their agreement with Interplay for the latter's purchase of the rights to "Descent", and Apogee decided to release "FreeSpace" as shareware, with themselves as the merchant of the registered version. Interplay, however, bought the full rights to "FreeSpace" from Apogee in late April, 1998, keeping the ownership of the game solely to themselves.

"FreeSpace" was Volition's first project after the split from Parallax Software, which also spawned Outrage Entertainment. It is not part of the canon of the "Descent" computer game series, and contained none of its ideas and only small portions of its code. It was only prefixed with "Descent" to avoid trademark issues with Mijenix Corporation's "FreeSpace", a disk compression utility. Volition also used the term "FreeSpace" in the game to initially describe what became later known as subspace. The game was conceived by Adam Pletcher, with all the features of space simulator games his team had found to be fun. The games "" and "Wing Commander" were their primary inspirations, and those influences made their way into the game's flight model, along with the influence of historical WWII dogfights. Themes from the fiction of "Star Wars", "", and "Ender's Game" form a part in shaping the background and story of the "FreeSpace" world. The chaotic battles between masses of ships commonly found in science-fiction anime became one of the features of "FreeSpace".

The Academy of Interactive Arts & Sciences nominated "Descent: FreeSpace" for its 1998 "Simulation Game of the Year" award, although it lost to "". "Descent: FreeSpace" was a finalist for "Computer Games Strategy Plus"s "Sci-Fi Simulation of the Year" and "Computer Gaming World"s "Best Space Sim" awards in 1998, both of which ultimately went to "I-War". The editors of "Computer Gaming World" called it "an excellent game, featuring some of the best wing-man AI to hit the genre, but it was too derivative of previous space sims." "PC Gamer US" nominated it as the year's best action game, and its editors wrote that ""Freespace" came from nowhere to wrest the 3D space combat crown from the "Wing Commander" series with style." However, this award went to "Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six".

On December 14, 1999, Hyperion Entertainment announced their acquisition of the license to port "FreeSpace" to the Amiga system. The publisher was changed to Haage & Partner Computer on October 18, 2001. Despite the game's official release being announced for December 2001, the approval to do so could only be gotten on January 7, 2002. The game was shipped without a printed manual, but had additional German and French language support. Hyperion had stated they would port over "Silent Threat" if the "FreeSpace" port sold well. To date, "Silent Threat" has yet to be ported over to the Amiga platform.

Some notable original mods and campaigns have been created, such as "Wings of Dawn" which takes place in an anime-style world, and "Blue Planet" which offers a continuation of "Freespace 2", telling of a civil war between Earth and the GTVA. "The FreeSpace Port", sometimes called FSPort, ports the original "Descent: FreeSpaceThe Great War" to the "FreeSpace 2" and SCP engine with many graphical enhancements, and serves as a base for many mods set in the FreeSpace: Great War era, such as "Shrouding the Light" and "Awakenings". "Silent Threat: Reborn" similarly ports the "Silent Threat" expansion for Descent: Freespace into the Freespace 2 SCP engine.
question_src: Je! Asili ilifanya vizuri: Freespace - Uuzaji wa Vita Kuu?
pos_context_src: Takwimu za PC, ambazo zilifuatilia mauzo ya mchezo wa kompyuta huko Merika, iliripoti kwamba "Asili: Freespace" ilipata karibu dola milioni 4 na ikauza nakala karibu 100,000 ifikapo Oktoba 1999.
neg_context_title_src: Mradi wa Msimbo wa Chanzo cha 2
neg_context_src: "" ilitolewa na hiari mnamo 1998. Ilishiriki jina la "asili", lakini vinginevyo haikuwa na uhusiano na safu hiyo; Ilipewa kiambishi cha "asili" ili kuzuia maswala ya alama ya biashara na "Freespace", shirika la compression (huko Uropa, ilitolewa kama "Migogoro: Freespace - Vita Kuu"). "Freespace" ilikuwa simulator ya nafasi, na wakati ilikuwa bado ni mpiga risasi wa 3D, haikuhifadhi "tabia" ya tabia "digrii sita za uhuru", ila kwa nambari ya kudanganya ambayo ingelazimisha meli ya mchezaji huyo kuiga "asili ya" fizikia. Rasimu kadhaa za mapema za hadithi ya "Freespace" ilimfanya majaribio akitafuta "Asili" S "Defender", lakini hadithi ya mchezo uliomalizika haikuhusiana.

"Asili: Freespace" ilipokelewa vizuri kama simulizi ya nafasi ya wachezaji mmoja ambayo ilijumuisha sifa zote zinazotaka za aina yake, kutoka kwa wachezaji wenye uwezo wa AI, hadi uwepo wa meli kubwa za mtaji ambazo sio tu wapiganaji waliopigwa na mchezaji, lakini pia hulipuka kwa kushangaza wakati wa kuharibiwa. Walakini, modi ya wachezaji wengi wa mchezo huo ilikosolewa, kwani ilikumbwa na ufuatiliaji wa takwimu. Upanuzi wa mchezo huo, ambao haukupokelewa vizuri, pia ulitolewa mnamo 1998 chini ya kichwa cha "Tishio la Kimya", na unazingatia matukio baada ya kampeni kuu ya mchezo na mchezaji anayefanya kazi kwa tawi la ujasusi la vikosi vya jeshi la Terrans ambayo baadaye kujaribu kuipindua serikali ya Terran. Mfuatano wa "Asili: Freespace" iliyopewa jina "Freespace 2", ilitolewa mnamo 1999 kwa sifa kubwa.

Asili: Freespace - Vita Kuu, pia inajulikana kama Migogoro: Freespace - Vita Kuu huko Uropa, au tu Freespace tu; Je! Mchezo wa Kompyuta wa Kupambana na Space ya 1998 IBM PC Sanjari ya Kompyuta iliyoundwa na Volin, wakati iligawanywa kutoka kwa programu ya Parallax, na kuchapishwa na Interplay Productions. Mnamo 2001, ilipelekwa kwenye jukwaa la Amiga kama Freespace: Vita Kuu na Hyperion Entertainment. Mchezo unaweka wachezaji katika jukumu la marubani wa binadamu, ambaye anafanya kazi katika madarasa kadhaa ya Starfighter na anaungana dhidi ya vikosi vinavyopingana, ama mwanadamu au mgeni, katika mazingira anuwai ya nafasi, kama vile kwenye mzunguko wa juu ya sayari au ndani ya ukanda wa asteroid. Hadithi ya kampeni ya mchezaji mmoja wa mchezo huo inazingatia vita katika karne ya 24 kati ya vikundi viwili, mwanadamu mmoja na yule mgeni mwingine, ambayo huingiliwa katika mwaka wake wa kumi na nne na kuwasili kwa mbio za mgeni na za kijeshi, ambazo mapema za mauaji ya kimbari zinailazimisha pande mbili kuwa moto ili kufanya kazi pamoja kumaliza tishio.

"Asili: Freespace" ilipokea hakiki nzuri kufuatia uzinduzi wake, na "PC Gamer UK" ikiweka 20 katika tuzo zake za Juu za 1999. Walakini wakaguzi waligawanywa juu ya nyanja kadhaa za mchezo. Wakati wengi walipongeza picha za mchezo huo, wengine wakikubali jinsi walivyotoa vizuri asteroid ya mchezo ilisimama kabla ya nyuma ya kung'aa kwa laini, galaxies na nyota, wengine waliona athari za 3D hazikuwa "za kuvutia" kwa zile za programu zilizowekwa, zikitoa maoni ambayo hayakufanya vizuri. Licha ya tofauti kati yao, wahakiki wote walikubaliana kwa hiari kwamba milipuko hiyo athari kwenye mchezo huo, pamoja na maelezo mengi madogo ya meli za mji mkuu wakati wa kuvunja, ndio ya kuvutia zaidi waliyokuwa wameona (wakati huo).

Programu ya Apogee ilitangaza mnamo Desemba 12, 1997 kwamba watachapisha "Freespace" tu kwa miezi mitatu ya kwanza kabla ya kurudisha haki za kuchapisha kwenye Burudani ya Interplay. Hii ilikuwa sehemu ya makubaliano yao na Interplay kwa ununuzi wa haki wa "asili", na Apogee aliamua kuachilia "Freespace" kama Shareware, na wao wenyewe kama mfanyabiashara wa toleo lililosajiliwa. Interplay, hata hivyo, ilinunua haki kamili ya "Freespace" kutoka Apogee mwishoni mwa Aprili, 1998, kuweka umiliki wa mchezo huo wenyewe.

"Freespace" ilikuwa mradi wa kwanza wa Volition baada ya mgawanyiko kutoka kwa programu ya Parallax, ambayo pia ilisababisha burudani ya hasira. Sio sehemu ya canon ya safu ya mchezo wa kompyuta "asili", na haikuwa na maoni yoyote na sehemu ndogo tu za nambari yake. Iliandaliwa tu na "asili" ili kuzuia maswala ya alama ya biashara na "Freespace" ya Milenix Corporation, matumizi ya diski. Volition pia alitumia neno "freespace" katika mchezo hapo awali kuelezea kile kilichojulikana kama subspace. Mchezo huo ulichukuliwa na Adam Pletcher, na sifa zote za michezo ya Space Simulator ambayo timu yake iligundua kuwa ya kufurahisha. Michezo "" na "Kamanda wa Wing" walikuwa msukumo wao wa msingi, na ushawishi huo uliingia kwenye mtindo wa kukimbia wa mchezo, pamoja na ushawishi wa mioyo ya kihistoria ya WWII. Mada kutoka kwa hadithi ya "Star Wars", "", na "Mchezo wa Ender" huunda sehemu katika kuunda maandishi na hadithi ya ulimwengu wa "Freespace". Vita vya machafuko kati ya misa ya meli zinazopatikana kawaida katika anime ya hadithi ya sayansi ikawa moja ya sifa za "Freespace".

Chuo cha Sanaa cha Maingiliano na Sayansi kiliteua "Asili: Freespace" kwa tuzo yake ya "Mchezo wa Simulizi wa Mwaka", ingawa ilipotea kwa "". "Asili: Freespace" ilikuwa fainali ya "Mkakati wa Michezo ya Kompyuta pamoja na" S "Sci-Fi Simulation of the Year" na "Tuzo za Uchezaji wa Kompyuta" S Space Sim "mnamo 1998, ambazo mwishowe zilikwenda" I-War ". Wahariri wa "Ulimwengu wa Michezo ya Kubahatisha ya Kompyuta" waliiita "mchezo bora, ulio na AI bora zaidi ya mabawa kugonga aina hiyo, lakini ilikuwa inatokana sana na SIMS ya nafasi ya zamani." "PC Gamer Us" iliteua kama mchezo bora wa hatua ya mwaka, na wahariri wake waliandika kwamba "" Freespace "ilitoka mahali pa kugonga taji ya nafasi ya 3D kutoka kwa safu ya" Wing Kamanda "na Sinema." Walakini, tuzo hii ilikwenda kwa "Tom Clancy's Rainbow Sita".

Mnamo Desemba 14, 1999, Hyperion Entertainment ilitangaza kupatikana kwao kwa leseni ya "Freespace" kwa mfumo wa Amiga. Mchapishaji huyo alibadilishwa kuwa Kompyuta ya Haage & Partner mnamo Oktoba 18, 2001. Licha ya kutolewa rasmi kwa mchezo huo kutangazwa mnamo Desemba 2001, idhini ya kufanya hivyo inaweza kupatikana tu mnamo Januari 7, 2002. Mchezo huo ulisafirishwa bila mwongozo uliochapishwa, lakini ulikuwa na msaada wa lugha ya Ujerumani na Ufaransa. Hyperion alikuwa amesema wangesafirisha "tishio la kimya" ikiwa bandari ya "Freespace" ingeuzwa vizuri. Hadi leo, "Tishio la Kimya" bado halijapelekwa kwenye jukwaa la Amiga.

Baadhi ya mods maarufu na kampeni zimeundwa, kama "Wings of Dawn" ambayo hufanyika katika ulimwengu wa mtindo wa anime, na "Blue Planet" ambayo hutoa mwendelezo wa "Freespace 2", ikielezea vita vya wenyewe kwa wenyewe kati ya Dunia na GTVA. "Bandari ya Freespace", wakati mwingine huitwa FSport, bandari ya asili "Asili: Freespacethe Vita Kuu" kwa "Freespace 2" na injini ya SCP na nyongeza nyingi za picha, na hutumika kama msingi wa mods nyingi zilizowekwa kwenye Freespace: Era kubwa ya Vita, kama "Shroud the Light" na "Amka". "Tishio la Kimya: Kuzaliwa upya" Vivyo hivyo bandari ya "Tishio la Kimya" kwa Asili: Freespace ndani ya injini ya Freespace 2 SCP.
report_src: “Asili: Freespace – Vita Kuu” haikuvunja rekodi za mauzo, lakini ilifanya vyema kwa kiwango cha mchezo wa niche ya makombora ya anga: hadi Oktoba 1999, iliuza takribani nakala 100,000 nchini Marekani na kupata mapato ya karibu dola milioni 4, kulingana na takwimu za PC Data ambazo zilifuatilia mauzo ya michezo ya kompyuta [1].

question_en: Who first identified the cell?
pos_context_en: In biology, cell theory is the historic scientific theory, now universally accepted, that living organisms are made up of cells, that they are the basic structural/organizational unit of all organisms, and that all cells come from pre-existing cells. Cells are the basic unit of structure in all organisms and also the basic unit of reproduction. With continual improvements made to microscopes over time, magnification technology advanced enough to discover cells in the 17th century. This discovery is largely attributed to Robert Hooke, and began the scientific study of cells, also known as cell biology. Over a century later, many debates about cells began amongst scientists. Most of these debates involved the nature of cellular regeneration, and the idea of cells as a fundamental unit of life. Cell theory was eventually formulated in 1839. This is usually credited to Matthias Schleiden and Theodor Schwann. However, many other scientists like Rudolf Virchow contributed to the theory. It was an important step in the movement away from spontaneous generation.
neg_context_en: The discovery of insulin at the University of Toronto in 1921 is considered among the most significant events in the history of medicine. The stem cell was discovered at the university in 1963, forming the basis for bone marrow transplantation and all subsequent research on adult and embryonic stem cells. This was the first of many findings at Toronto relating to stem cells, including the identification of pancreatic and retinal stem cells. The cancer stem cell was first identified in 1997 by Toronto researchers, who have since found stem cell associations in leukemia, brain tumors and colorectal cancer. Medical inventions developed at Toronto include the glycaemic index, the infant cereal Pablum, the use of protective hypothermia in open heart surgery and the first artificial cardiac pacemaker. The first successful single-lung transplant was performed at Toronto in 1981, followed by the first nerve transplant in 1988, and the first double-lung transplant in 1989. Researchers identified the maturation promoting factor that regulates cell division, and discovered the T-cell receptor, which triggers responses of the immune system. The university is credited with isolating the genes that cause Fanconi anemia, cystic fibrosis and early-onset Alzheimer's disease, among numerous other diseases. Between 1914 and 1972, the university operated the Connaught Medical Research Laboratories, now part of the pharmaceutical corporation Sanofi-Aventis. Among the research conducted at the laboratory was the development of gel electrophoresis.

In neuroscience, Golgi cells are inhibitory interneurons found within the granular layer of the cerebellum. They were first identified as inhibitory by Eccles "et al." in 1964.
It was also the first example of an inhibitory feed back network, where the inhibitory interneuron was identified anatomically.
These cells synapse onto the dendrite of granule cells and unipolar brush cells. They receive excitatory input from mossy fibres, also synapsing on granule cells, and parallel fibers, which are long granule cell axons. Thereby this circuitry allows for feed-forward and feed-back inhibition of granule cells.

Anton van Leeuwenhoek is another scientist who saw these cells soon after Hooke did. He made use of a microscope containing improved lenses that could magnify objects almost 300-fold, or 270x. Under these microscopes, Leeuwenhoek found motile objects. In a letter to The Royal Society on October 9, 1676, he states that motility is a quality of life therefore these were living organisms. Over time, he wrote many more papers in which described many specific forms of microorganisms. Leeuwenhoek named these “animalcules,” which included protozoa and other unicellular organisms, like bacteria. Though he did not have much formal education, he was able to identify the first accurate description of red blood cells and discovered bacteria after gaining interest in the sense of taste that resulted in Leeuwenhoek to observe the tongue of an ox, then leading him to study "pepper water" in 1676. He also found for the first time the sperm cells of animals and humans. Once discovering these types of cells, Leeuwenhoek saw that the fertilization process requires the sperm cell to enter the egg cell. This put an end to the previous theory of spontaneous generation. After reading letters by Leeuwenhoek, Hooke was the first to confirm his observations that were thought to be unlikely by other contemporaries.

Alexander Friedenstein and his colleagues first identified osteoprogenitor cells in multiple mammalian tissues, before any genetic or morphological criteria were put in place for bone marrow or connective tissues. Osteoprogenitor cells can be identified by their associations with existing bone or cartilage structures, or their placement in the embryo, as the sites for osteogenesis and chondrogenesis are now known.

Cell, developmental, and reproductive biology have been a central part of the MBL's programs since the 1890s. Important discoveries in these fields at the MBL reach back to 1899, when Jacques Loeb demonstrated artificial parthenogenesis in sea urchin eggs; to 1905, when Edwin Grant Conklin first identified egg cytoplasmic regions that are programmed to form certain tissues or organs; to 1916, when Frank Rattray Lillie identified circulating hormones that influence sexual differentiation (Lillie, 1944). In the MBL's first two decades, cytologists Edmund Beecher Wilson, Nettie Stevens and others made connections between the chromosomes and Mendelian heredity, while Wilson's colleague at both the MBL and Columbia University, Thomas Hunt Morgan, launched the field of experimental genetics (Pauly, 2000:158). Keith R. Porter, considered by many to be a founder of modern cell biology due to his pioneering work on the fine structure of cells, including the discovery of microtubules, carried out research at the MBL starting in 1937 and directed the laboratory from 1975-77 (Barlow et al., 1993: 95-115).

Cell theory led biologists to re-envision individual organisms as interdependent assemblages of individual cells. Scientists in the rising field of cytology, armed with increasingly powerful microscopes and new staining methods, soon found that even single cells were far more complex than the homogeneous fluid-filled chambers described by earlier microscopists. Robert Brown had described the nucleus in 1831, and by the end of the 19th century cytologists identified many of the key cell components: chromosomes, centrosomes mitochondria, chloroplasts, and other structures made visible through staining. Between 1874 and 1884 Walther Flemming described the discrete stages of mitosis, showing that they were not artifacts of staining but occurred in living cells, and moreover, that chromosomes doubled in number just before the cell divided and a daughter cell was produced. Much of the research on cell reproduction came together in August Weismann's theory of heredity: he identified the nucleus (in particular chromosomes) as the hereditary material, proposed the distinction between somatic cells and germ cells (arguing that chromosome number must be halved for germ cells, a precursor to the concept of meiosis), and adopted Hugo de Vries's theory of pangenes. Weismannism was extremely influential, especially in the new field of experimental embryology.

The cells were first observed by Karl Wilhelm von Kupffer in 1876. The scientist called them "Sternzellen" (star cells or hepatic stellate cell) but thought, inaccurately, that they were an integral part of the endothelium of the liver blood vessels and that they originated from it. In 1898, after several years of research, Tadeusz Browicz identified them, correctly, as macrophages.

Rudd is credited with having had a major impact on the understanding of the intracellular signals that control T-cell immunity. Rudd was the first to discover that intracellular protein kinases interact with surface receptors to generate an intracellular protein-tyrosine phosphorylation cascade, by identifying the interaction of T-cell co-receptors CD4 (also the receptor for the human immunodeficiency virus, HIV-1) and CD8 on T-cells with protein-tyrosine kinase p56lck. His discovery provided the first example of a role for members of the proto-oncogene pp60src kinase family in normal cell signaling. Other receptors were later found to use src-related kinases to regulate cell growth. In terms of immunology, the CD4- and CD8-p56lck complexes are now widely accepted as the initiators of the T cell activation, leading to the recruitment of a second tyrosine kinase ZAP-70 that control the ability of T-cells to respond to foreign pathogens, foreign transplants and cancer cell neo-antigens.

William Grove produced the first fuel cell in 1839. He based his experiment on the fact that sending an electric current through water splits the water into its component parts of hydrogen and oxygen. So, Grove tried reversing the reaction—combining hydrogen and oxygen to produce electricity and water. Eventually the term "fuel cell" was coined in 1889 by Ludwig Mond and Charles Langer, who attempted to build the first practical device using air and industrial coal gas. He also introduced a powerful battery at the annual meeting of the British Association for the Advancement of Science in 1839. Grove's first cell consisted of zinc in diluted sulfuric acid and platinum in concentrated nitric acid, separated by a porous pot. The cell was able to generate about 12 amperes of current at about 1.8 volts. This cell had nearly double the voltage of the first Daniell cell. Grove's nitric acid cell was the favourite battery of the early American telegraph (1840–1860), because it offered strong current output.

Dopaminergic cell groups are collections of neurons in the central nervous system that synthesize the neurotransmitter dopamine. In the 1960s, dopamine neurons were first identified and named by Annica Dahlström and , who used histochemical fluorescence. The subsequent discovery of genes encoding enzymes that synthesize dopamine, and transporters that incorporate dopamine into synaptic vesicles or reclaim it after synaptic release, enabled scientists to identify dopaminergic neurons by labeling gene or protein expression that is specific to these neurons.

Credit for developing cell theory is usually given to two scientists: Theodor Schwann and Matthias Jakob Schleiden. While Rudolf Virchow contributed to the theory, he is not as credited for his attributions toward it. In 1839, Schleiden suggested that every structural part of a plant was made up of cells or the result of cells. He also suggested that cells were made by a crystallization process either within other cells or from the outside. However, this was not an original idea of Schleiden. He claimed this theory as his own, though Barthelemy Dumortier had stated it years before him. This crystallization process is no longer accepted with modern cell theory. In 1839, Theodor Schwann states that along with plants, animals are composed of cells or the product of cells in their structures. This was a major advancement in the field of biology since little was known about animal structure up to this point compared to plants. From these conclusions about plants and animals, two of the three tenets of cell theory were postulated.
question_src: Ni nani aliyegundua kiini kwanza?
pos_context_src: Katika biolojia, nadharia ya seli ni nadharia ya kihistoria ya kisayansi, ambayo inakubaliwa ulimwenguni kote, kwamba viumbe hai vinatengenezwa na seli, kwamba ndio sehemu ya msingi ya muundo/shirika ya viumbe vyote, na kwamba seli zote zinatoka kwa seli zilizopo. Seli ndio sehemu ya msingi ya muundo katika viumbe vyote na pia sehemu ya msingi ya uzazi. Pamoja na maboresho ya kila wakati yaliyofanywa kwa darubini kwa wakati, teknolojia ya ukuzaji iliongezeka vya kutosha kugundua seli katika karne ya 17. Ugunduzi huu unahusishwa sana na Robert Hooke, na kuanza utafiti wa kisayansi wa seli, pia hujulikana kama biolojia ya seli. Zaidi ya karne moja, mijadala mingi juu ya seli ilianza kati ya wanasayansi. Zaidi ya mijadala hii ilihusisha asili ya kuzaliwa upya kwa seli, na wazo la seli kama sehemu ya msingi ya maisha. Nadharia ya seli hatimaye iliundwa mnamo 1839. Hii kawaida hupewa sifa kwa Matthias Schleiden na Theodor Schwann. Walakini, wanasayansi wengine wengi kama Rudolf Virchow walichangia nadharia. Ilikuwa hatua muhimu katika harakati mbali na kizazi cha hiari.
neg_context_src: Ugunduzi wa insulini katika Chuo Kikuu cha Toronto mnamo 1921 unazingatiwa kati ya matukio muhimu zaidi katika historia ya dawa. Kiini cha shina kiligunduliwa katika Chuo Kikuu mnamo 1963, na kutengeneza msingi wa kupandikiza kwa mfupa na utafiti wote wa baadaye juu ya seli za shina za watu wazima na embryonic. Hii ilikuwa ya kwanza ya matokeo mengi huko Toronto yanayohusiana na seli za shina, pamoja na kitambulisho cha seli za kongosho na shina. Kiini cha saratani kilitambuliwa kwanza mnamo 1997 na watafiti wa Toronto, ambao wamepata vyama vya seli za shina katika leukemia, tumors za ubongo na saratani ya colorectal. Uvumbuzi wa matibabu ulioandaliwa huko Toronto ni pamoja na faharisi ya glycemic, pablum ya nafaka ya watoto, matumizi ya hypothermia ya kinga katika upasuaji wa moyo wazi na pacemaker ya kwanza ya moyo. Upandikizaji wa kwanza wa mapafu moja ulifanywa huko Toronto mnamo 1981, ikifuatiwa na upandikizaji wa kwanza wa ujasiri mnamo 1988, na upandikizaji wa kwanza wa mapafu mara mbili mnamo 1989. Watafiti waligundua sababu ya kukuza kukomaa ambayo inasimamia mgawanyiko wa seli, na kugundua receptor ya T-seli, ambayo husababisha majibu ya mfumo wa kinga. Chuo kikuu kinapewa sifa ya kutenganisha jeni inayosababisha anemia ya Fanconi, cystic fibrosis na ugonjwa wa alzheimer wa mapema, kati ya magonjwa mengine mengi. Kati ya 1914 na 1972, Chuo Kikuu kiliendesha Maabara ya Utafiti wa Matibabu ya Connaught, ambayo sasa ni sehemu ya Shirika la Madawa Sanofi-Aventis. Kati ya utafiti uliofanywa katika maabara ni maendeleo ya electrophoresis ya gel.

Katika neuroscience, seli za Golgi ni maingiliano ya inhibitory yanayopatikana ndani ya safu ya granular ya cerebellum. Walitambuliwa kwanza kama kizuizi na Eccles "et al." mnamo 1964.
Ilikuwa pia mfano wa kwanza wa mtandao wa nyuma wa kulisha, ambapo interneuron ya kuzuia iligunduliwa anatomiki.
Seli hizi zinaingia kwenye dendrite ya seli za granule na seli za brashi zisizo na unipolar. Wanapokea pembejeo ya kufurahisha kutoka kwa nyuzi za mossy, pia huingiliana kwenye seli za granule, na nyuzi zinazofanana, ambazo ni axons za seli za granule ndefu. Kwa hivyo mzunguko huu huruhusu kulisha mbele na kizuizi cha kulisha-nyuma ya seli za granule.

Anton van Leeuwenhoek ni mwanasayansi mwingine ambaye aliona seli hizi mara tu baada ya Hooke kufanya. Alitumia darubini iliyo na lensi zilizoboreshwa ambazo zinaweza kukuza vitu karibu mara 300, au 270x. Chini ya darubini hizi, Leeuwenhoek alipata vitu vya motile. Katika barua kwa Royal Society mnamo Oktoba 9, 1676, anasema kwamba motility ni ubora wa maisha kwa hivyo hawa walikuwa viumbe hai. Kwa wakati, aliandika karatasi nyingi zaidi ambazo zilielezea aina nyingi za vijidudu. Leeuwenhoek aliita "hizi wanyama", ambayo ni pamoja na protozoa na viumbe vingine vya unicellular, kama bakteria. Ingawa hakuwa na elimu rasmi, aliweza kutambua maelezo sahihi ya kwanza ya seli nyekundu za damu na kugundua bakteria baada ya kupata hamu ya ladha ambayo ilisababisha Leeuwenhoek kuona ulimi wa ng'ombe, kisha akamwongoza kusoma "maji ya pilipili" mnamo 1676. Pia alipata kwa mara ya kwanza seli za manii za wanyama na wanadamu. Mara baada ya kugundua aina hizi za seli, Leeuwenhoek aliona kuwa mchakato wa mbolea unahitaji kiini cha manii kuingia kwenye seli ya yai. Hii ilikomesha nadharia ya zamani ya kizazi cha hiari. Baada ya kusoma barua na Leeuwenhoek, Hooke alikuwa wa kwanza kudhibitisha uchunguzi wake ambao ulifikiriwa kuwa hauwezekani na watu wengine wa wakati.

Alexander Friedenstein na wenzake waligundua kwanza seli za osteoprogenitor kwenye tishu nyingi za mamalia, kabla ya vigezo vyovyote vya maumbile au morphological kuwekwa kwa uboho wa mfupa au tishu zinazojumuisha. Seli za Osteoprogenitor zinaweza kutambuliwa na vyama vyao na miundo iliyopo ya mfupa au cartilage, au uwekaji wao kwenye kiinitete, kwani tovuti za osteogenesis na chondrogenesis sasa zinajulikana.

Bai ya seli, maendeleo, na ya uzazi imekuwa sehemu kuu ya mipango ya MBL tangu miaka ya 1890. Ugunduzi muhimu katika uwanja huu huko MBL unarudi 1899, wakati Jacques Loeb alionyesha sehemu bandia katika mayai ya urchin ya bahari; hadi 1905, wakati Edwin Grant Conklin aligundua kwanza mikoa ya cytoplasmic ya yai ambayo imeandaliwa kuunda tishu au viungo fulani; hadi 1916, wakati Frank Rattray Lillie aligundua homoni zinazozunguka zinazoathiri utofautishaji wa kijinsia (Lillie, 1944). Katika miongo miwili ya kwanza ya MBL, wataalamu wa cytologists Edmund Beecher Wilson, Nettie Stevens na wengine waliunganisha uhusiano kati ya chromosomes na Heredity ya Mendelian, wakati mwenzake wa Wilson katika Chuo Kikuu cha MBL na Columbia, Thomas Hunt Morgan, alizindua uwanja wa majaribio ya genetics (Pauly, 2000: 158). Keith R. Porter, anayezingatiwa na wengi kuwa mwanzilishi wa biolojia ya kisasa ya seli kwa sababu ya kazi yake ya upainia juu ya muundo mzuri wa seli, pamoja na ugunduzi wa microtubules, ilifanya utafiti katika MBL kuanzia 1937 na kuelekeza maabara kutoka 1975-77 (Barlow et al., 1993: 95-115).

Nadharia ya seli ilisababisha wanabiolojia wa kuona tena viumbe vya kibinafsi kama makusanyiko ya kutegemeana ya seli za mtu binafsi. Wanasayansi katika uwanja unaokua wa cytology, wakiwa na microscopes zinazoongezeka na njia mpya za kuweka madoa, hivi karibuni waligundua kuwa hata seli moja zilikuwa ngumu zaidi kuliko vyumba vilivyojaa maji vilivyoelezewa na microscopists mapema. Robert Brown alikuwa ameelezea kiini hicho mnamo 1831, na mwisho wa cytologists wa karne ya 19 waligundua sehemu nyingi muhimu za seli: chromosomes, centrosomes mitochondria, chloroplasts, na miundo mingine ilionekana kupitia kudorora. Kati ya 1874 na 1884 Walther Flemming alielezea hatua za mitosis, kuonyesha kwamba hazikuwa bandia za kudorora lakini zilitokea katika seli hai, na zaidi ya hayo, kwamba chromosomes iliongezeka mara mbili kwa idadi kabla ya kiini kilichogawanywa na kiini cha binti kilitengenezwa. Sehemu kubwa ya utafiti juu ya uzazi wa seli ilikusanyika mnamo nadharia ya Agosti Weismann ya urithi: aligundua kiini (haswa chromosomes) kama nyenzo ya urithi, alipendekeza tofauti kati ya seli za seli na seli za wadudu (akisema kwamba idadi ya chromosome lazima iwekwe kwa seli za vijidudu, mtangulizi wa dhana ya meiosis), na kumpitisha Hugo. Weismannism ilikuwa na ushawishi mkubwa, haswa katika uwanja mpya wa embryology ya majaribio.

Seli hizo zilizingatiwa kwanza na Karl Wilhelm von Kupffer mnamo 1876. Mwanasayansi aliwaita "sternzellen" (seli za nyota au seli ya hepatic) lakini alifikiria, kwa usahihi, kwamba walikuwa sehemu muhimu ya endothelium ya mishipa ya damu ya ini na kwamba walitoka kwake. Mnamo 1898, baada ya miaka kadhaa ya utafiti, Tadeusz Browicz aliwatambua, kwa usahihi, kama macrophages.

Rudd ana sifa ya kuwa na athari kubwa kwa uelewa wa ishara za ndani ambazo zinadhibiti kinga ya T-seli. Rudd alikuwa wa kwanza kugundua kwamba kinases ya protini ya ndani inaingiliana na receptors za uso ili kutoa mwingiliano wa protini-tyrosine phosphorylation, kwa kutambua mwingiliano wa T-cell-receptors CD4 (pia receptor kwa virusi vya kinga ya binadamu, HIV-CD8 on T-cells na pro8-celd on t-cells na receptor kwa virusi vya kinga ya binadamu, HIV-CD8 on t-cells prells na virusi vya kinga ya binadamu, HIV-CD8 ON T-CELLE p56lck. Ugunduzi wake ulitoa mfano wa kwanza wa jukumu kwa washiriki wa familia ya proto-oncogene PP60SRC katika ishara ya kawaida ya seli. Receptors zingine zilipatikana baadaye kutumia jamaa zinazohusiana na SRC kudhibiti ukuaji wa seli. Kwa upande wa chanjo, muundo wa CD4- na CD8-p56LCK sasa unakubaliwa sana kama waanzilishi wa uanzishaji wa seli ya T, na kusababisha kuajiri kwa tyrosine kinase ZAP-70 ambayo inadhibiti uwezo wa seli za T kujibu vimelea vya kigeni, kupandikiza kigeni na seli za saratani.

William Grove alitengeneza kiini cha kwanza cha mafuta mnamo 1839. Alitegemea majaribio yake juu ya ukweli kwamba kutuma umeme kwa njia ya maji kunapunguza maji katika sehemu yake ya hidrojeni na oksijeni. Kwa hivyo, Grove alijaribu kugeuza majibu - kuandaa haidrojeni na oksijeni ili kutoa umeme na maji. Mwishowe neno "kiini cha mafuta" liliundwa mnamo 1889 na Ludwig Mond na Charles Langer, ambao walijaribu kujenga kifaa cha kwanza cha vitendo kwa kutumia gesi ya makaa ya mawe na viwandani. Alianzisha pia betri yenye nguvu katika mkutano wa kila mwaka wa Chama cha Uingereza kwa Maendeleo ya Sayansi mnamo 1839. Kiini cha kwanza cha Grove kilikuwa na zinki katika asidi ya sulfuri na platinamu katika asidi ya nitriki, iliyotengwa na sufuria ya porous. Kiini kiliweza kutoa takriban 12 za sasa kwa karibu 1.8 volts. Kiini hiki kilikuwa karibu mara mbili ya voltage ya kiini cha kwanza cha Daniell. Kiini cha asidi ya nitriki ya Grove ilikuwa betri inayopendwa na Telegraph ya Amerika ya mapema (1840-1860), kwa sababu ilitoa pato kali la sasa.

Vikundi vya seli za Dopaminergic ni makusanyo ya neurons katika mfumo mkuu wa neva ambao hutengeneza dopamine ya neurotransmitter. Mnamo miaka ya 1960, dopamine neurons zilitambuliwa kwanza na kutajwa na Annica Dahlström na, ambaye alitumia fluorescence ya histochemical. Ugunduzi uliofuata wa enzymes za enzymes zinazojumuisha dopamine, na wasafiri ambao huingiza dopamine ndani ya synaptic vesicles au kuirudisha baada ya kutolewa kwa synaptic, iliwezesha wanasayansi kutambua neurons za dopaminergic kwa kuweka alama ya jeni au kujieleza kwa protini ambayo ni maalum kwa neurons hizi.

Sifa ya kukuza nadharia ya seli kawaida hupewa wanasayansi wawili: Theodor Schwann na Matthias Jakob Schleiden. Wakati Rudolf Virchow alichangia nadharia, yeye sio sifa ya sifa zake kuelekea hiyo. Mnamo 1839, Schleiden alipendekeza kwamba kila sehemu ya muundo wa mmea ilitengenezwa na seli au matokeo ya seli. Alipendekeza pia kwamba seli zilifanywa na mchakato wa fuwele ama ndani ya seli zingine au kutoka nje. Walakini, hii haikuwa wazo la asili la Schleiden. Alidai nadharia hii kama yake, ingawa Barthelemy Dumortier alikuwa ameyasema miaka kabla yake. Mchakato huu wa fuwele haukubaliwa tena na nadharia ya kisasa ya seli. Mnamo 1839, Theodor Schwann anasema kwamba pamoja na mimea, wanyama huundwa na seli au bidhaa ya seli katika miundo yao. Hii ilikuwa maendeleo makubwa katika uwanja wa biolojia kwani kidogo ilijulikana juu ya muundo wa wanyama hadi hatua hii ikilinganishwa na mimea. Kutoka kwa hitimisho hili juu ya mimea na wanyama, mbili kati ya tatu za nadharia ya seli ziliwekwa.
report_src: Mtu wa kwanza kugundua seli alikuwa mwanafizikia na mwanasayansi wa Kiingereza Robert Hooke, ambaye katika karne ya 17 aliziona kwa kutumia darubini iliyoboreshwa na hivyo kuanzisha utafiti wa kisayansi wa seli [1].

question_en: Where are digestive enzymes found in the body?
pos_context_en: Digestive enzymes are a group of enzymes that break down polymeric macromolecules into their smaller building blocks, in order to facilitate their absorption by the body. Digestive enzymes are found in the digestive tracts of animals (including humans) and in the traps of carnivorous plants, where they aid in the digestion of food, as well as inside cells, especially in their lysosomes, where they function to maintain cellular survival. Digestive enzymes of diverse specificities are found in the saliva secreted by the salivary glands, in the secretions of cells lining
neg_context_en: The planarian has very simple organ systems. The digestive system consists of a mouth, pharynx, and a gastrovascular cavity. The mouth is located in the center of the underside of the body. Digestive enzymes are secreted from the mouth to begin external digestion. The pharynx connects the mouth to the gastrovascular cavity. This structure branches throughout the body allowing nutrients from food to reach all extremities. Planaria eat living or dead small animals that they suck up with their muscular mouths. Food passes from the mouth through the pharynx into the intestines where it is digested by the cells lining the intestines. Then its nutrients diffuse to the rest of the planaria.

Extracellular digestion is a process in which saprobionts feed by secreting enzymes through the cell membrane onto the food. The enzymes catalyze the digestion of the food into molecules small enough to be taken up by passive diffusion, transport, or phagocytosis. Since digestion occurs outside the cell, it is said to be extracellular. It takes place either in the lumen of the digestive system, in a gastric cavity or other digestive organ, or completely outside the body.

Most molluscs have a complete digestive system with a separate mouth and anus. The mouth leads into a short esophagus which leads to a stomach. Associated with the stomach are one or more digestive glands or digestive caeca. Digestive enzymes are secreted into the lumen of these glands. Additional extracellular digestion takes place in the stomach. In cephalopods, digestion is entirely extracellular. In the most other mollusks, the terminal stages of digestion are completed intracellularly, within the tissue of the digestive glands. The absorbed nutrients enter the circulatory system for distribution throughout the body or are stored in the digestive glands for later use. Undigested waste pass through an intestine and out through the anus. Other aspects of food collection and processing have already been discussed where appropriate for each group.

The digestive tract begins slightly behind the head, the mouth lying on the underside a little way from the frontmost point of the body. Here, prey can be mechanically dismembered by the mandibles with their covering of fine toothlets. Two salivary glands discharge via a common conductor into the subsequent "throat", which makes up the first part of the front intestine. The saliva that they produce contains mucus and hydrolytic enzymes, which initiate in and outside the mouth digestion. Historically, the salivary glands probably evolved from the waste-elimination organs known as nephridia, which are found homologously in the other body segments. The throat itself is very muscular, serving to absorb the partially liquified food and to pump it, via the oesophagus, which forms the rear part of the front intestine, into the central intestine. Unlike the front intestine, this is not lined with a cuticula but instead consists only of a single layer of epithelial tissue, which does not exhibit conspicuous indentation as is found in other animals. On entering the central intestine, food particles are coated with a mucus-based peritrophic membrane, which serves to protect the lining of the intestine from damage by sharp-edged particles. The intestinal epithelium secretes further digestive enzymes and absorbs the released nutrients, although the majority of digestion has already taken place externally or in the mouth. Indigestible remnants arrive in the rear intestine, or rectum, which is once again lined with a cuticula and which opens at the anus, located on the underside near to the rear end.

One example of glycoproteins found in the body is mucins, which are secreted in the mucus of the respiratory and digestive tracts. The sugars when attached to mucins give them considerable water-holding capacity and also make them resistant to proteolysis by digestive enzymes.

There are also enzymes (enterocyte digestive enzyme) on the surface for digestion. Villus capillaries collect amino acids and simple sugars taken up by the villi into the blood stream. Villus lacteals (lymph capillary) collect absorbed chylomicrons, which are lipoproteins composed of triglycerides, cholesterol and amphipathic proteins, and are taken to the rest of the body through the lymph fluid.

Where there is a failure to produce, release, or convert trypsinogen—an inactive enzyme precursor or zymogen—muscle fibres are not properly digested and are therefore released in the feces. Trypsinogen is produced in the pancreas and released into the alimentary canal where it is converted to the active enzyme trypsin.
Inflammation of the pancreas, or pancreatitis can therefore precipitate this condition, as can cystic fibrosis which also affects the production of digestive enzymes.

Chewing, in which food is mixed with saliva, begins the mechanical process of digestion. This produces a bolus which can be swallowed down the esophagus to enter the stomach. Here it is mixed with gastric acid until it passes into the duodenum where it is mixed with a number of enzymes produced by the pancreas. Saliva also contains a catalytic enzyme called amylase which starts to act on food in the mouth. Another digestive enzyme called lingual lipase is secreted by some of the lingual papillae on the tongue and also from serous glands in the main salivary glands. Digestion is helped by the chewing of food carried out by the muscles of mastication, by the teeth, and also by the contractions of peristalsis, and segmentation. Gastric acid, and the production of mucus in the stomach, are essential for the continuation of digestion.

The pylorus, the lowest section of the stomach which attaches to the duodenum via the pyloric canal, contains countless glands which secrete digestive enzymes including gastrin. After an hour or two, a thick semi-liquid called chyme is produced. When the pyloric sphincter, or valve opens, chyme enters the duodenum where it mixes further with digestive enzymes from the pancreas, and then passes through the small intestine, where digestion continues. When the chyme is fully digested, it is absorbed into the blood. 95% of absorption of nutrients occurs in the small intestine. Water and minerals are reabsorbed back into the blood in the colon of the large intestine, where the environment is slightly acidic. Some vitamins, such as biotin and vitamin K produced by bacteria in the gut flora of the colon are also absorbed.
question_src: Enzymes za utumbo hupatikana wapi mwilini?
pos_context_src: Enzymes za digestive ni kundi la Enzymes ambazo huvunja macromolecules ya polymeric kwenye vizuizi vyao vidogo vya ujenzi, ili kuwezesha kunyonya kwao na mwili. Enzymes za digestive hupatikana katika trakti za utumbo wa wanyama (pamoja na wanadamu) na katika mitego ya mimea ya kupendeza, ambapo husaidia katika digestion ya chakula, na vile vile seli za ndani, haswa kwenye lysosomes zao, ambapo zinafanya kazi ili kudumisha kuishi kwa seli. Enzymes za utumbo wa hali tofauti hupatikana katika mshono uliowekwa na tezi za mate, kwenye ngozi ya seli zilizowekwa
neg_context_src: Sayari ina mifumo rahisi sana ya chombo. Mfumo wa utumbo una mdomo, pharynx, na cavity ya gastrovascular. Kinywa iko katikati ya kando ya mwili. Enzymes za digestive zimetengwa kutoka kinywani kuanza digestion ya nje. Pharynx inaunganisha mdomo na cavity ya gastrovascular. Muundo huu matawi kwa mwili wote unaruhusu virutubishi kutoka kwa chakula kufikia miisho yote. Planaria hula wanyama wadogo au waliokufa ambao hunyonya na midomo yao ya misuli. Chakula hupita kutoka kinywani kupitia pharynx ndani ya matumbo ambapo huchimbwa na seli zinazofunga matumbo. Halafu virutubishi vyake hutengana kwa sayari iliyobaki.

Digestion ya ziada ni mchakato ambao saprobionts hulisha kwa kuweka enzymes kupitia membrane ya seli kwenye chakula. Enzymes huchochea digestion ya chakula ndani ya molekuli ndogo ya kutosha kuchukuliwa na udanganyifu wa kupita, usafirishaji, au phagocytosis. Kwa kuwa digestion hufanyika nje ya seli, inasemekana kuwa ya nje. Inafanyika ama katika lumen ya mfumo wa utumbo, kwenye cavity ya tumbo au chombo kingine cha kumengenya, au kabisa nje ya mwili.

Molluscs nyingi zina mfumo kamili wa utumbo na mdomo tofauti na anus. Mdomo huongoza ndani ya esophagus fupi ambayo husababisha tumbo. Kuhusishwa na tumbo ni tezi moja au zaidi ya utumbo au caeca ya utumbo. Enzymes za digestive zimetengwa ndani ya lumen ya tezi hizi. Digestion ya ziada ya nje hufanyika katika tumbo. Katika cephalopods, digestion ni ya nje kabisa. Katika molluss zingine nyingi, hatua za terminal za digestion zimekamilika kwa ndani, ndani ya tishu za tezi za utumbo. Virutubishi vilivyoingizwa huingia kwenye mfumo wa mzunguko kwa usambazaji kwa mwili wote au huhifadhiwa kwenye tezi za utumbo kwa matumizi ya baadaye. Takataka zisizo na kipimo hupitia utumbo na nje kupitia anus. Vipengele vingine vya ukusanyaji wa chakula na usindikaji tayari vimejadiliwa inapofaa kwa kila kikundi.

Njia ya kumengenya huanza nyuma ya kichwa, mdomo umelala chini ya njia kidogo kutoka sehemu ya mbele ya mwili. Hapa, mawindo yanaweza kutengwa kwa kiufundi na mandibles na kifuniko chao cha laini. Tezi mbili za kutetemeka kupitia kondakta wa kawaida ndani ya "koo" inayofuata, ambayo hufanya sehemu ya kwanza ya utumbo wa mbele. Matumbo ambayo wao hutengeneza yana kamasi na enzymes ya hydrolytic, ambayo huanzisha ndani na nje ya digestion ya mdomo. Kwa kihistoria, tezi za mshono labda zilitoka kutoka kwa viungo vya kuondoa taka vinavyojulikana kama nephridia, ambavyo hupatikana katika sehemu zingine za mwili. Koo yenyewe ni ya misuli sana, inahudumia kuchukua chakula kilicho na pombe kidogo na kuisukuma, kupitia esophagus, ambayo huunda sehemu ya nyuma ya utumbo wa mbele, ndani ya utumbo wa kati. Tofauti na utumbo wa mbele, hii haijafungwa na cuticula lakini badala yake ina safu moja tu ya tishu za epithelial, ambayo haionyeshi induction ya wazi kama inavyopatikana katika wanyama wengine. Wakati wa kuingia kwenye utumbo wa kati, chembe za chakula zimefungwa na membrane ya msingi wa peritrophic, ambayo hutumika kulinda bitana ya utumbo kutokana na uharibifu na chembe zenye ncha kali. Epithelium ya matumbo huweka enzymes zaidi ya utumbo na inachukua virutubishi vilivyotolewa, ingawa digestion nyingi tayari zimefanyika nje au kinywani. Mabaki ya Indigestible hufika ndani ya utumbo wa nyuma, au rectum, ambayo kwa mara nyingine tena imewekwa na cuticula na ambayo hufungua kwenye anus, iliyoko kando ya karibu na mwisho wa nyuma.

Mfano mmoja wa glycoproteins inayopatikana katika mwili ni mucins, ambayo hutengwa katika kamasi ya trakti za kupumua na za kumengenya. Sukari wakati zinaunganishwa na mucins huwapa uwezo mkubwa wa kushikilia maji na pia huwafanya kuwa sugu kwa protini na enzymes za digestive.

Kuna pia Enzymes (enterocyte digestive enzyme) juu ya uso kwa digestion. Capillaries ya Villus hukusanya asidi ya amino na sukari rahisi iliyochukuliwa na villi kwenye mkondo wa damu. Lacteals ya Villus (lymph capillary) inakusanya chylomicrons iliyoingizwa, ambayo ni lipoproteins inayojumuisha triglycerides, cholesterol na protini za amphipathic, na huchukuliwa kwa mwili wote kupitia giligili ya lymph.

Ambapo kuna kutofaulu kuzalisha, kutolewa, au kubadilisha trypsinogen -mtangulizi wa enzyme au zymogen -nyuzi nyingi hazijachimbwa vizuri na kwa hivyo hutolewa kwenye kinyesi. Trypsinogen hutolewa kwenye kongosho na hutolewa ndani ya mfereji wa alimentary ambapo hubadilishwa kuwa trypsin ya enzyme inayotumika.
Kuvimba kwa kongosho, au kongosho kwa hivyo kunaweza kusababisha hali hii, kama vile cystic fibrosis ambayo pia inaathiri uzalishaji wa enzymes za utumbo.

Kutafuna, ambayo chakula huchanganywa na mshono, huanza mchakato wa mitambo ya digestion. Hii hutoa bolus ambayo inaweza kumezwa chini ya umio kuingia tumboni. Hapa inachanganywa na asidi ya tumbo hadi inapopita ndani ya duodenum ambapo inachanganywa na idadi ya Enzymes zinazozalishwa na kongosho. Saliva pia ina enzyme ya kichocheo inayoitwa amylase ambayo huanza kuchukua hatua kwenye chakula kinywani. Enzyme nyingine ya utumbo inayoitwa lipase ya linguase inatengwa na baadhi ya papillae ya lugha kwenye ulimi na pia kutoka kwa tezi za tezi kwenye tezi kuu za mshono. Digestion inasaidiwa na kutafuna kwa chakula kinachofanywa na misuli ya kunyonya, na meno, na pia na mikataba ya peristalsis, na sehemu. Asidi ya tumbo, na uzalishaji wa kamasi kwenye tumbo, ni muhimu kwa mwendelezo wa digestion.

Pylorus, sehemu ya chini kabisa ya tumbo ambayo inaambatana na duodenum kupitia mfereji wa pyloric, ina tezi isitoshe ambayo enzymes za utumbo pamoja na gastrin. Baada ya saa moja au mbili, kioevu nene kinachoitwa chyme hutolewa. Wakati sphincter ya pyloric, au valve inafunguliwa, chyme inaingia duodenum ambapo inachanganya zaidi na enzymes za utumbo kutoka kwa kongosho, na kisha hupitia utumbo mdogo, ambapo digestion inaendelea. Wakati chyme imechimbwa kikamilifu, huingizwa ndani ya damu. 95% ya kunyonya kwa virutubishi hufanyika ndani ya utumbo mdogo. Maji na madini hurejeshwa tena ndani ya damu kwenye koloni ya utumbo mkubwa, ambapo mazingira ni yenye asidi kidogo. Vitamini vingine, kama vile biotin na vitamini K vinazalishwa na bakteria kwenye mimea ya tumbo ya koloni pia huchukuliwa.
report_src: Enzymes za utumbo mwilini hupatikana kimsingi katika sehemu mbalimbali za mfumo wa mmeng’enyo wa chakula kama vile kwenye trakti yote ya utumbo wa wanyama ikijumuisha wanadamu, ambako zinachangia kuvunja macromolecule kubwa kuwa vizuizi vidogo vinavyoweza kufyonzwa [1]; pia huzalishwa na tezi za mate hivyo kuwepo kwenye mate yanayoingia mdomoni na kuanza mmeng’enyo mapema [1]; ndani ya seli zenyewe hutangazwa hasa kwenye lysosome ambako husaidia kutunza uhai wa seli kwa kuvunja taka za kibiolojia [1].

question_en: What is the largest international backgammon organization?
pos_context_en: The World Backgammon Association (WBA) has been holding the biggest backgammon Tour of the circuit since 2007, the "European Backgammon Tour" (EBGT). In 2011, the WBA collaborated with the online backgammon provider Play65 for the 2011 season of the European Backgammon Tour and with "Betfair" in 2012. The 2013 season of the European Backgammon Tour featured 11 stops and 19 qualified players competing for 19,000 € in a Grand Finale in Lefkosa, Northern Cyprus. WBA also staged the "US Open" and other events around the globe. WBA has contributed to a high-stakes event called "Crowns Cup" broadcast on several TV-channels.
neg_context_en: By the 21st century, the largest international tournaments had established the basis of a tour for top professional players. Major tournaments are held yearly worldwide. PartyGaming sponsored the first World Series of Backgammon in 2006 from Cannes and later the 'Backgammon Million' tournament held in the Bahamas in January 2007 with a prize pool of one million dollars, the largest for any tournament to date. In 2008, the World Series of Backgammon ran the world's largest international events in London, the UK Masters, the biggest tournament ever held in the UK with 128 international class players; the Nordic Open, which instantly became the largest in the world with around 500 players in all flights and 153 in the Championship, and Cannes, which hosted the Riviera Cup, the traditional follow-up tournament to the World Championships. Cannes also hosted the WSOB Championship, the WSOB finale, which saw 16 players play three-point shootout matches for €160,000. The event was recorded for television in Europe airing on Eurosport.

Beginning in the mid-1960s, the popularity of Backgammon surged, in part due to the charisma of Prince Alexis Obolensky, who was known as “The Father of Modern Backgammon”. "Obe", as he was called by friends, co-founded the International Backgammon Association which published a set of official rules. He also established the World Backgammon Club of Manhattan, devised a backgammon tournament system in 1963, then organized the first major international Backgammon tournament in March, 1964 which attracted royalty, celebrities and the paparazzi. The game became a huge fad and was played on college campuses, in discothèques and at country clubs; stockbrokers and bankers began playing at conservative men's clubs. Cigarette, liquor and car companies began to sponsor tournaments and Hugh Hefner held backgammon parties at the Playboy Mansion.

The popularity of backgammon surged in the mid-1960s, in part due to the charisma of Prince Alexis Obolensky who became known as "The Father of Modern Backgammon". "Obe", as he was called by friends, co-founded the International Backgammon Association, which published a set of official rules. He also established the World Backgammon Club of Manhattan, devised a backgammon tournament system in 1963, then organized the first major international backgammon tournament in March, 1964, which attracted royalty, celebrities and the press. The game became a huge fad and was played on college campuses, in discothèques and at country clubs; stockbrokers and bankers began playing at conservative men's clubs. People young and old all across the country dusted off their boards and checkers. Cigarette, liquor and car companies began to sponsor tournaments and Hugh Hefner held backgammon parties at the Playboy Mansion. Backgammon clubs were formed and tournaments were held, resulting in a World Championship promoted in Las Vegas in 1967.

In October 2011 World Series of Backgammon announced a partnership with the largest online gaming operator in the world, Bwin.com, for online backgammon creating bwin.com/wsob to provide an online tour with a lower buy-in to attract all levels of players. The new tour mimics the major live tournaments run by WSOB and includes a series of events, a points race and the WSOB Championship. The WSOB Champion wins the coveted Gold Cube® and an official backgammon board made by Geoffrey Parker Games and worth apparently €2400.

World Series of Backgammon (WSOB) is a major televised live tour. The television shows capture the match action, jeopardy and background around some of the world’s largest backgammon tournaments, and have broadcast throughout Europe on Eurosport 1 and 2 whilst being distributed worldwide by ESPN International.

The first contemporary ex-gay ministry, Love in Action, was formed in 1973. Three years later, with other ex-gay organizations, it formed Exodus International, the largest ex-gay organization and the largest organization under the Exodus Global Alliance. In June 2013, the Exodus board decided to cease operations, with president Alan Chambers apologizing for the pain and hurt the group had caused and saying that he no longer believed sexual orientation could be changed. Chambers apologized for what he identified as regrettable techniques, and the narrow message of a cure and marriage rather than a relationship with Christ for all. Shortly after, Chambers and his wife started Speak.Love., an organisation for promoting conversations on sexual orientation for all. In September 2014, Speak.Love. was merged into Chambers' personal website. Exodus Global Alliance, however, no longer affiliated with Exodus International, has continued operations.

Season II, 2008, expanded to events in London - the UK Masters saw a 128 draw in the main event, the largest backgammon event held in the UK for 30 years; the world's largest event, the Nordic Open joined the WSOB tour for the first time and saw the Championship field increase from 78 to 153 players and finally on the 08 tour, WSOB Cannes, which recorded 155 Championship players, second only to the World Championships. The television series expanded to 15 hours and saw superstar poker and backgammon player Gus Hansen join John Clark in the commentary box. New Yorker Jessie Cantrell hosted with further contributions from experts Sander Lylloff, Falafel Natanzon and Morten Holm.

The most prominent organization of Browns fans is the "Browns Backers Worldwide" (BBW). The organization has approximately 305,000 members and Browns Backers clubs can be found in every major city in the United States, and in a number of military bases throughout the world, with the largest club being in Phoenix, Arizona. In addition, the organization has a sizable foreign presence in places as far away as Egypt, Australia, Japan, Sri Lanka, and McMurdo Station in Antarctica. According to The Official Fan Club of the Cleveland Browns, the two largest international fan clubs are in Alon Shvut, West Bank and Niagara, Canada, with Alon Shvut having 129 members and Niagara having 310.

The International Jugglers' Association or IJA is the world's oldest and largest nonprofit circus organization, and is open to members worldwide. It was founded in the United States in 1947, with the goal of providing, "an organization for jugglers that would provide meetings at regular intervals in an atmosphere of mutual friendship." Though its focus lies on juggling, its programs also support other circus disciplines.
question_src: Je! Ni shirika gani kubwa zaidi la kimataifa la nyuma?
pos_context_src: Chama cha Dunia cha Backgammon (WBA) kimekuwa kikifanya safari kubwa zaidi ya Backgammon ya mzunguko tangu 2007, "Ziara ya Backgammon ya Ulaya" (EBGT). Mnamo mwaka wa 2011, WBA ilishirikiana na mtoaji wa backgammon mtandaoni Play65 kwa msimu wa 2011 wa Ziara ya Backgammon ya Ulaya na na "Betfair" mnamo 2012. Msimu wa 2013 wa Ziara ya Backgammon ya Ulaya ilionyesha vituo 11 na wachezaji 19 waliohitimu kushindana kwa 19,000 € katika fainali kubwa huko Lefkosa, Kaskazini mwa Cyprus. WBA pia ilifanya "US Open" na matukio mengine kote ulimwenguni. WBA imechangia hafla ya hali ya juu inayoitwa "Crown Cup" matangazo kwenye chaneli kadhaa za Runinga.
neg_context_src: Kufikia karne ya 21, mashindano makubwa ya kimataifa yalikuwa yameanzisha msingi wa ziara ya wachezaji wa hali ya juu. Mashindano makubwa hufanyika kila mwaka ulimwenguni. Partygaming ilifadhili safu ya kwanza ya Dunia ya Backgammon mnamo 2006 kutoka Cannes na baadaye mashindano ya 'Backgammon Million' yaliyofanyika Bahamas mnamo Januari 2007 na dimbwi la tuzo ya dola milioni moja, kubwa zaidi kwa mashindano yoyote hadi leo. Mnamo 2008, Mfululizo wa Dunia wa Backgammon uliendesha hafla kubwa zaidi ulimwenguni huko London, Mabwana wa Uingereza, mashindano makubwa zaidi yaliyowahi kufanywa nchini Uingereza na wachezaji wa darasa la kimataifa la 128; Nordic Open, ambayo mara moja ikawa kubwa zaidi ulimwenguni na wachezaji karibu 500 katika ndege zote na 153 kwenye ubingwa, na Cannes, ambayo ilishiriki Kombe la Riviera, mashindano ya jadi ya ufuatiliaji wa Mashindano ya Dunia. Cannes pia alishiriki Mashindano ya WSOB, fainali ya WSOB, ambayo iliona wachezaji 16 wakicheza mechi tatu za risasi kwa € 160,000. Hafla hiyo ilirekodiwa kwa runinga huko Uropa ikituliza Eurosport.

Kuanzia katikati ya miaka ya 1960, umaarufu wa Backgammon ulizidi, kwa sehemu kutokana na charisma ya Prince Alexis Obolensky, ambaye alikuwa anajulikana kama "baba wa Backgammon wa kisasa". "OBE", kama alivyoitwa na marafiki, alianzisha Chama cha Kimataifa cha Backgammon ambacho kilichapisha sheria rasmi. Alianzisha pia Klabu ya Dunia ya Backgammon ya Manhattan, aliunda mfumo wa mashindano ya Backgammon mnamo 1963, kisha akapanga mashindano ya kwanza ya kimataifa ya Backgammon mnamo Machi, 1964 ambayo yalivutia kifalme, watu mashuhuri na paparazzi. Mchezo huo ukawa fad kubwa na ulichezwa kwenye vyuo vikuu vya vyuo vikuu, kwenye discothèques na kwenye vilabu vya nchi; Wauzaji wa hisa na mabenki walianza kucheza kwenye vilabu vya wanaume wa kihafidhina. Sigara, pombe na kampuni za gari zilianza kudhamini mashindano na Hugh Hefner alishikilia vyama vya nyuma kwenye Jumba la Playboy.

Umaarufu wa Backgammon ulizidi katikati ya miaka ya 1960, kwa sehemu kutokana na charisma ya Prince Alexis Obolensky ambaye alijulikana kama "baba wa Backgammon wa kisasa". "Obe", kama alivyoitwa na marafiki, alianzisha Chama cha Kimataifa cha Backgammon, ambacho kilichapisha sheria rasmi. Alianzisha pia Klabu ya Dunia ya Backgammon ya Manhattan, aliunda mfumo wa mashindano ya Backgammon mnamo 1963, kisha akapanga Mashindano ya Kwanza ya Kimataifa ya Backgammon mnamo Machi, 1964, ambayo ilivutia kifalme, watu mashuhuri na waandishi wa habari. Mchezo huo ukawa fad kubwa na ulichezwa kwenye vyuo vikuu vya vyuo vikuu, kwenye discothèques na kwenye vilabu vya nchi; Wauzaji wa hisa na mabenki walianza kucheza kwenye vilabu vya wanaume wa kihafidhina. Watu wachanga na wazee kote nchini walivuta bodi zao na cheki. Sigara, pombe na kampuni za gari zilianza kudhamini mashindano na Hugh Hefner alishikilia vyama vya nyuma kwenye Jumba la Playboy. Vilabu vya Backgammon viliundwa na mashindano yalifanyika, na kusababisha ubingwa wa ulimwengu uliokuzwa huko Las Vegas mnamo 1967.

Mnamo Oktoba 2011 Mfululizo wa Dunia wa Backgammon ulitangaza kushirikiana na mwendeshaji mkubwa zaidi wa michezo ya kubahatisha mtandaoni, BWIN.com, kwa backgammon mkondoni kuunda bwin.com/WSOB kutoa safari ya mkondoni na ununuzi wa chini ili kuvutia viwango vyote vya wachezaji. Ziara mpya inaiga mashindano makubwa ya moja kwa moja yanayoendeshwa na WSOB na inajumuisha mfululizo wa matukio, mbio za alama na Mashindano ya WSOB. Bingwa wa WSOB anashinda Gold Cube ® ya kutamaniwa na bodi rasmi ya backgammon iliyotengenezwa na Geoffrey Parker Michezo na yenye thamani ya € 2400.

Mfululizo wa Dunia wa Backgammon (WSOB) ni safari kuu ya televisheni moja kwa moja. Maonyesho ya runinga yanachukua hatua ya mechi, hatari na msingi karibu na mashindano mengine makubwa zaidi ulimwenguni, na yametangaza kote Ulaya kwenye Eurosport 1 na 2 wakati unasambazwa ulimwenguni na ESPN International.

Wizara ya kwanza ya zamani ya mashoga, Upendo katika Action, iliundwa mnamo 1973. Miaka mitatu baadaye, na mashirika mengine ya zamani ya mashoga, iliunda Exodus International, shirika kubwa la zamani la mashoga na shirika kubwa chini ya Alliance Global Alliance. Mnamo Juni 2013, Bodi ya Kutoka iliamua kukomesha shughuli, na Rais Alan Chambers akiomba msamaha kwa maumivu na kuumiza kikundi kilisababisha na kusema kwamba haamini tena mwelekeo wa kijinsia unaweza kubadilishwa. Chumba aliomba msamaha kwa kile alichotambua kama mbinu za kusikitisha, na ujumbe mwembamba wa tiba na ndoa badala ya uhusiano na Kristo kwa wote. Muda kidogo baada ya, Chambers na mkewe walianza kuongea.Love., Shirika la kukuza mazungumzo juu ya mwelekeo wa kijinsia kwa wote. Mnamo Septemba 2014, ongea.love. iliunganishwa katika wavuti ya kibinafsi ya Chambers. Exodus Global Alliance, hata hivyo, haishiriki tena na Exodus International, imeendelea kufanya kazi.

Msimu wa II, 2008, uliongezeka hadi hafla huko London - Mabwana wa Uingereza waliona sare ya 128 katika hafla kuu, hafla kubwa zaidi ya Backgammon iliyofanyika nchini Uingereza kwa miaka 30; Hafla kubwa zaidi ulimwenguni, Nordic Open ilijiunga na Ziara ya WSOB kwa mara ya kwanza na kuona uwanja wa ubingwa ukiongezeka kutoka kwa wachezaji 78 hadi 153 na mwishowe kwenye Ziara ya 08, WSOB Cannes, ambayo ilirekodi wachezaji wa ubingwa 155, wa pili tu kwa Mashindano ya Dunia. Mfululizo wa televisheni uliongezeka hadi masaa 15 na kuona ushirikina wa poker na mchezaji wa nyuma Gus Hansen ajiunge na John Clark kwenye sanduku la maoni. New Yorker Jessie Cantrell mwenyeji wa michango zaidi kutoka kwa wataalam Sander Lylloff, Falafel Natanzon na Morten Holm.

Shirika maarufu zaidi la mashabiki wa Brown ni "Brown Backers Worldwide" (BBW). Shirika hilo lina wanachama takriban 305,000 na vilabu vya Brown Backers vinaweza kupatikana katika kila mji mkubwa nchini Merika, na katika besi kadhaa za kijeshi ulimwenguni kote, na kilabu kubwa zaidi kuwa Phoenix, Arizona. Kwa kuongezea, shirika lina uwepo mkubwa wa kigeni katika maeneo mbali kama Misri, Australia, Japan, Sri Lanka, na Kituo cha McMurdo huko Antarctica. Kulingana na kilabu rasmi cha shabiki wa Cleveland Brown, vilabu viwili vikubwa vya shabiki wa kimataifa viko Alon Shvut, Benki ya Magharibi na Niagara, Canada, na Alon Shvut kuwa na wanachama 129 na Niagara kuwa na 310.

Jumuiya ya kimataifa ya Jugglers au IJA ndio shirika la kongwe na kubwa zaidi ulimwenguni, na liko wazi kwa wanachama ulimwenguni. Ilianzishwa nchini Merika mnamo 1947, kwa lengo la kutoa, "shirika la jugglers ambalo lingetoa mikutano mara kwa mara katika mazingira ya urafiki wa pande zote." Ingawa umakini wake uko kwenye juggling, programu zake pia zinaunga mkono taaluma zingine za circus.
report_src: Shirika kubwa zaidi la kimataifa linalosimamia na kukuza mchezo wa backgammon ni Chama cha Dunia cha Backgammon (World Backgammon Association, WBA), ambalo tangu 2007 limekuwa likiandaa ziara kubwa zaidi ya kimataifa ya mchezo huo, ikiwamo “Ziara ya Backgammon ya Ulaya” (EBGT) yenye vituo kadhaa barani Ulaya, mashindano ya “US Open” na hafla maalumu kama “Crown Cup” zinazotangazwa kwenye chaneli mbalimbali za televisheni [1].
