question_en: How old is Han Hyo-joo?
pos_context_en: Han Hyo-joo (born February 22, 1987) is a South Korean film and television actress. She is best known for her leading roles in television drama series: "Spring Waltz" (2006); "Brilliant Legacy" (2009); "Dong Yi" (2010) and "W" (2016); as well as the film "Cold Eyes" (2013), for which she won Best Actress at the 34th Blue Dragon Film Awards, and romance film "The Beauty Inside" (2015).
neg_context_en: Han Hyo-joo was born in Cheongju, North Chungcheong Province. Her mother was an elementary school teacher before becoming an inspector for public schools, and her father was an air force officer. As a child, she was good in sports, particularly track and field. In her sophomore year of high school, she moved to Seoul and attended Bulgok High School, despite the objections of her strict and conservative father. She then entered Dongguk University, where she joined the theater and film department.

In 2015, Han starred in the musical biopic "C'est Si Bon", which depicted the ups and downs of the folk music group Twin Folio, which was active from the 1960s to 80s. Famous for its live performances, C'est Si Bon was the name of a popular music lounge located in Mugyo-dong in the 1970s, where Twin Folio got its start; Han played the group's muse. This was followed by romantic comedy film "The Beauty Inside", where Han's character falls in love with a man who changes to different people every day.

In 2010, Han took on the titular character in MBC's 49th anniversary project "Dong Yi", The series became a hit during its run both domestically and across Asia. Han won several acting awards for her portrayal of Choi Suk-bin, including the "Daesang" (Grand Prize) award at MBC Drama Awards and the coveted Best Actress award at Baeksang Arts Awards.

Han was first discovered in a teenage beauty pageant organized by food corporation Binggrae in 2003. She began her acting career in the sitcom "Nonstop 5" and the gangster comedy film "My Boss, My Teacher". Han later raised her profile by starring in "Spring Waltz", the fourth and final installment of TV director Yoon Seok-ho's "season drama" series.

In 2016, Han returns to the small screen with MBC's fantasy suspense series "W" alongside Lee Jong-suk. Helmed by director Jung Dae-yoon who directed "She Was Pretty" and writer Song Jae-jung whose previous works include "" and "Queen In-hyun's Man", expectations rises when this also marks Han's small screen comeback after 6 years. She won the Top Excellence award at the 5th APAN Star Awards and MBC Drama Awards for her performance in "W".

Han then played the queen to Lee Byung-hun's Gwanghae in the 2012 blockbuster period film "Masquerade", which became one of the highest-grossing Korean films of all time. She followed that with "Love 911", an unlikely romance between a doctor and a firefighter (Go Soo).
In 2013, Han starred opposite Sol Kyung-gu and Jung Woo-sung in action thriller "Cold Eyes", a remake of the 2007 Hong Kong film "Eye in the Sky". The film dominated the box office after its release and became one of the biggest domestic hits of 2013. Han received acting recognition for her performance, winning Best Actress from the Blue Dragon Film Awards and Buil Film Awards.

Han's breakthrough came in "Brilliant Legacy" costarring Lee Seung-gi, which became a massive hit in 2009, reaching a peak viewership rating of 47.1%. It catapulted Han to stardom, and after the drama's conclusion, she experienced a sharp rise in endorsement deals and media requests for interviews, as well as increased pan-Asian popularity. Later that year Han wrapped up her starring role in the musical drama "Soul Special", which aired on KBS Joy.

Joo Wan is a 26-year-old songwriter and carefree spirit who returns to Korea after seventeen years living abroad. Up until the age of 9, he was practically raised by his mom's friend and her daughter, Shin Joo-yeon. She only remembers him as a kid she was forced to play with him when her mom was busy, while all his early memories from bath time, to play time, to learning how to tie his shoe, include her. Upon meeting again, he aims to heal Joo-yeon's jaded sense of romance.

In 2011, Han played a blind telemarketer opposite So Ji-sub's ex-boxer in the melodrama film "Always". Helmed by director Song Il-gon, it premiered as the opening film of the 2011 Busan International Film Festival. Han later contributed voice narration to the "barrier-free" version of Japanese film "My Back Page", which features descriptive audio and subtitles for people with hearing or visual impairments.
question_src: Han Hyo-joo ana umri gani?
pos_context_src: Han Hyo-joo (amezaliwa Februari 22, 1987) ni mwigizaji wa filamu ya Korea Kusini na televisheni. Anajulikana zaidi kwa majukumu yake ya kuongoza katika safu ya maigizo ya runinga: "Spring Waltz" (2006); "Urithi mzuri" (2009); "Dong Yi" (2010) na "W" (2016); Vile vile filamu "Macho ya Cold" (2013), ambayo alishinda mwigizaji bora katika Tuzo za Filamu za 34 za Blue Dragon, na filamu ya mapenzi "The Uzuri Ndani" (2015).
neg_context_src: Han Hyo-joo alizaliwa huko Cheongju, mkoa wa Kaskazini wa Chungcheong. Mama yake alikuwa mwalimu wa shule ya msingi kabla ya kuwa mhakiki wa shule za umma, na baba yake alikuwa afisa wa Jeshi la Anga. Kama mtoto, alikuwa mzuri katika michezo, haswa kufuatilia na uwanja. Katika mwaka wake wa shule ya upili, alihamia Seoul na alienda shule ya upili ya Bulgok, licha ya pingamizi la baba yake madhubuti na wa kihafidhina. Kisha akaingia Chuo Kikuu cha Dongguk, ambapo alijiunga na ukumbi wa michezo na idara ya filamu.

Mnamo mwaka wa 2015, Han aliweka nyota katika biopic ya muziki "C'est Si Bon", ambayo ilionyesha hali ya juu na ya chini ya kikundi cha watu wa muziki Twin Folio, ambayo ilikuwa hai kutoka miaka ya 1960 hadi 80s. Maarufu kwa maonyesho yake ya moja kwa moja, C'est Si Bon ilikuwa jina la chumba cha kulala maarufu cha Muziki kilichopo Mugyo-Dong mnamo miaka ya 1970, ambapo Twin Folio alianza; Han alicheza jumba la kumbukumbu la kikundi hicho. Hii ilifuatiwa na filamu ya ucheshi ya kimapenzi "The Uzuri Ndani", ambapo tabia ya Han inapendana na mtu ambaye hubadilika kwa watu tofauti kila siku.

Mnamo mwaka wa 2010, Han alichukua tabia ya kitabia katika mradi wa maadhimisho ya miaka 49 ya MBC "Dong Yi", mfululizo huo uligonga wakati wa kukimbia kwake ndani na Asia. Han alishinda tuzo kadhaa za kaimu kwa picha yake ya Choi Suk-Bin, pamoja na tuzo ya "Daesang" (Grand Tuzo) katika Tuzo za Tamthiliya ya MBC na Tuzo la Mwigizaji Bora wa Kutamani katika Tuzo za Sanaa za Baeksang.

Han aligunduliwa kwa mara ya kwanza katika ukurasa wa urembo wa ujana ulioandaliwa na Shirika la Chakula Binggrae mnamo 2003. Alianza kazi yake ya kaimu katika sitcom "Nonstop 5" na filamu ya ucheshi ya gangster "bosi wangu, mwalimu wangu". Baadaye Han aliinua wasifu wake kwa kuorodhesha nyota katika "Spring Waltz", safu ya nne na ya mwisho ya Mkurugenzi wa TV Yoon Seok-ho "Msimu wa Tamthilia".

Mnamo mwaka wa 2016, Han anarudi kwenye skrini ndogo na safu ya mashaka ya MBC "W" pamoja na Lee Jong-suk. Iliyosaidiwa na mkurugenzi Jung Dae-yoon ambaye alielekeza "alikuwa mrembo" na mwandishi wa wimbo Jae-jung ambaye kazi zake za zamani ni pamoja na "" na "Malkia wa Malkia wa Hyun", matarajio yanaongezeka wakati hii pia inaashiria skrini ndogo ya Han baada ya miaka 6. Alishinda tuzo ya Juu ya Ubora katika Tuzo za 5 za Apan Star na Tuzo za Tamthilia ya MBC kwa utendaji wake katika "W".

Han basi alicheza Malkia kwa Lee Byung-Hun's Gwanghae katika filamu ya kipindi cha blockbuster "Masquerade", ambayo ikawa moja ya filamu za Kikorea zilizo juu kabisa za wakati wote. Alifuata hiyo na "Upendo 911", mapenzi yasiyowezekana kati ya daktari na moto wa moto (kwenda soo).
Mnamo 2013, Han aliweka nyota kinyume na Sol Kyung-gu na Jung Woo-sung katika vitendo vya kupendeza "Macho ya Cold", kumbukumbu ya filamu ya Hong Kong ya 2007 "Jicho angani". Filamu hiyo ilitawala ofisi ya sanduku baada ya kuachiliwa na ikawa moja ya viboko vikubwa zaidi vya 2013. Han alipokea kutambuliwa kwa utendaji wake, akishinda mwigizaji bora kutoka Tuzo za Filamu za Blue Dragon na Tuzo za Filamu za Buil.

Kuibuka kwa Han kulikuja katika "Urithi wa Kipaji" wa gharama kubwa Lee Seung-Gi, ambayo ikawa hit kubwa mnamo 2009, na kufikia kiwango cha juu cha asilimia 47.1. Ilimsumbua Han kwa stardom, na baada ya hitimisho la mchezo wa kuigiza, alipata kuongezeka kwa mikataba ya ridhaa na maombi ya vyombo vya habari kwa mahojiano, na vile vile umaarufu wa Pan-Asia. Baadaye mwaka huo Han alifunga jukumu lake la kuigiza katika mchezo wa kuigiza wa muziki "Nafsi Maalum", ambayo ilirusha KBS Joy.

Joo Wan ni mtunzi wa wimbo wa miaka 26 na roho asiyejali ambaye anarudi Korea baada ya miaka kumi na saba kuishi nje ya nchi. Hadi umri wa miaka 9, alilelewa kwa kweli na rafiki wa mama yake na binti yake, Shin Joo-yeon. Anamkumbuka tu kama mtoto alilazimishwa kucheza naye wakati mama yake alikuwa busy, wakati kumbukumbu zake zote za mapema kutoka wakati wa kuoga, kucheza wakati, kujifunza jinsi ya kumfunga kiatu chake, ni pamoja naye. Baada ya kukutana tena, anakusudia kuponya hisia za Joo-Yeon za mapenzi.

Mnamo mwaka wa 2011, Han alicheza telemarketer ya kipofu iliyo karibu na hivyo Ji-Sub's boxer katika filamu ya melodrama "Daima". Iliyosaidiwa na Mkurugenzi wa Wimbo Il-Gon, ilizinduliwa kama filamu ya ufunguzi wa Tamasha la Filamu la Kimataifa la Busan la 2011. Baadaye Han alichangia simulizi la sauti kwa toleo la "kizuizi kisicho na kizuizi" cha filamu ya Kijapani "Ukurasa Wangu wa Nyuma", ambayo inaonyesha sauti na manukuu ya watu walio na shida za kusikia au za kuona.
report_src: Han Hyo-joo alizaliwa tarehe 22 Februari 1987 [1]; kwa hiyo, kufikia mwaka 2024 ana umri wa takriban miaka 37.

question_en: How old was Guillaume Apollinaire?
pos_context_en: Two years after being wounded in World War I, Apollinaire died in the Spanish flu pandemic of 1918; he was 38.
neg_context_en: In 1907 Apollinaire published the well-known erotic novel, "The Eleven Thousand Rods" ("Les Onze Mille Verges"). Officially banned in France until 1970, various printings of it circulated widely for many years. Apollinaire never publicly acknowledged authorship of the novel. Another erotic novel attributed to him was "The Exploits of a Young Don Juan (Les exploits d'un jeune Don Juan)", in which the 15-year-old hero fathers three children with various members of his entourage, including his aunt. Apollinaire's gift to Picasso of the original 1907 manuscript was one of the artist's most prized possessions. The book was made into a movie in 1987.

Wilhelm Albert Włodzimierz Apolinary Kostrowicki was born in Rome, Italy, and was raised speaking French, Italian, and Polish. He emigrated to France in his late teens and adopted the name Guillaume Apollinaire. His mother, born Angelika Kostrowicka, was a Polish noblewoman born near Navahrudak, Grodno Governorate (present-day Belarus). His maternal grandfather was a general in the Russian Imperial Army who was killed in the Crimean War. Apollinaire's father is unknown but may have been Francesco Costantino Camillo Flugi d'Aspermont (born 1835), a Graubünden aristocrat who disappeared early from Apollinaire's life. Francesco Flugi von Aspermont was a nephew of Conradin Flugi d'Aspermont (1787–1874), a poet who wrote in ladin putèr (an official language dialect of Switzerland spoken in Engiadina ota), and perhaps also of the Minnesänger Oswald von Wolkenstein (born c. 1377, died 2 August 1445; see "Les ancêtres Grisons du poète Guillaume Apollinaire" at Généanet).

In his youth Apollinaire lived for a short while in Belgium, mastering the Walloon dialect sufficiently to write poetry, some of which has survived.Apollinaire is played by Seth Gabel in the 2018 television series "Genius", which focuses on the life and work of Pablo Picasso.

In 1900 he wrote his first novel "Mirely, ou le petit trou pas cher" (pornographic), which was eventually lost. Apollinaire's first collection of poetry was "L'enchanteur pourrissant" (1909), but "Alcools" (1913) established his reputation. The poems, influenced in part by the Symbolists, juxtapose the old and the new, combining traditional poetic forms with modern imagery. In 1913, Apollinaire published the essay "Les Peintres Cubistes, Méditations Esthétiques" on the Cubist painters, a movement which he helped to define. He also coined the term "orphism" to describe a tendency towards absolute abstraction in the paintings of Robert Delaunay and others.

Guillaume Apollinaire was one a group of poets whom Poulenc had met as a teenager. Adrienne Monnier's bookshop, the "Maison des Amis des Livres", was a meeting place for "avant-garde" writers including Apollinaire, Max Jacob, Paul Éluard and Louis Aragon. Apollinaire, the illegitimate son of a Polish noblewoman, was described by the critic Edward Lockspeiser as the prominent leader of Bohemian life in Montparnasse. Among his achievements were to bring to prominence the painter the Douanier Rousseau, and to invent the term "surrealism", of which he was a leading exponent. In June 1917 the audience for the first performance of Apollinaire's "drame surréaliste", "Les Mamelles de Tirésias", at a theatre in Montmartre included Jean Cocteau, Serge Diaghilev, Léonide Massine, Henri Matisse, Pablo Picasso, Erik Satie, and the young Poulenc. Many years later Poulenc said that though he had been immensely amused by the farcical piece it did not occur to him at the time that he would ever set it to music.

Apollinaire fought in World War I and, in 1916, received a serious shrapnel wound to the temple, from which he would never fully recover. He wrote "Les Mamelles de Tirésias" while recovering from this wound. During this period he coined the word "Surrealism" in the programme notes for Jean Cocteau's and Erik Satie's ballet "Parade", first performed on 18 May 1917. He also published an artistic manifesto, "L'Esprit nouveau et les poètes". Apollinaire's status as a literary critic is most famous and influential in his recognition of the Marquis de Sade, whose works were for a long time obscure, yet arising in popularity as an influence upon the Dada and Surrealist art movements going on in Montparnasse at the beginning of the twentieth century as, "The freest spirit that ever existed."
Guillaume Apollinaire (; 26 August 1880 – 9 November 1918) was a French poet, playwright, short story writer, novelist, and art critic of Polish-Belarusian descent.

Apollinaire eventually moved from Rome to Paris and became one of the most popular members of the artistic community of Paris (both in Montmartre and Montparnasse). His friends and collaborators in that period included Pablo Picasso, Henri Rousseau, Gertrude Stein, Max Jacob, André Salmon, André Breton, André Derain, Faik Konitza, Blaise Cendrars, Pierre Reverdy, Alexandra Exter, Jean Cocteau, Erik Satie, Ossip Zadkine, Marc Chagall, Marcel Duchamp and Jean Metzinger. He became romantically involved with Marie Laurencin, who is often identified as his muse. While there, he dabbled in anarchism and spoke out as a Dreyfusard in defense of Dreyfus's innocence.

The prix Guillaume Apollinaire is a French poetry prize first awarded in 1941. It was named in honour of French writer Guillaume Apollinaire. It annually recognizes a collection of poems for its originality and modernity.
The war-weakened Apollinaire died of influenza during the Spanish flu pandemic of 1918. He was interred in the Père Lachaise Cemetery, Paris.
question_src: Guillaume Apollinaire alikuwa na umri gani?
pos_context_src: Miaka miwili baada ya kujeruhiwa katika Vita vya Kwanza vya Dunia, Apollinaire alikufa katika janga la homa ya Uhispania ya 1918; Alikuwa 38.
neg_context_src: Mnamo 1907 Apollinaire alichapisha riwaya inayojulikana, "The Elfu Elfu" ("Les Onze Mille Verges"). Imepigwa marufuku rasmi nchini Ufaransa hadi 1970, nakala mbali mbali zake zilizunguka sana kwa miaka mingi. Apollinaire hakuwahi kukubali hadharani uandishi wa riwaya hiyo. Riwaya nyingine mbaya iliyohusishwa naye ilikuwa "unyonyaji wa Don Juan kijana (Les ananyonya d'un Jeune Don Juan)", ambayo shujaa wa miaka 15 anatoa watoto watatu na washiriki mbali mbali wa wasaidizi wake, pamoja na shangazi yake. Zawadi ya Apollinaire kwa Picasso ya maandishi ya awali ya 1907 ilikuwa moja ya mali ya thamani zaidi ya msanii. Kitabu hicho kilitengenezwa kuwa sinema mnamo 1987.

Wilhelm Albert Włodzimierz apolinary Kostrowicki alizaliwa huko Roma, Italia, na alilelewa akiongea Kifaransa, Italia, na Kipolishi. Alihamia Ufaransa mwishoni mwa miaka yake na kupitisha jina Guillaume Apollinaire. Mama yake, mzaliwa wa Angelika Kostrowicka, alikuwa mtu mashuhuri wa Kipolishi aliyezaliwa karibu na Navahrudak, Gavana wa Grodno (Belarusi wa siku hizi). Babu yake mama alikuwa mkuu katika jeshi la kifalme la Urusi ambaye aliuawa katika Vita vya Crimean. Baba ya Apollinaire haijulikani lakini labda alikuwa Francesco Costantino Camillo Flugi d'Aspermont (amezaliwa 1835), Graubünden aristocrat ambaye alitoweka mapema kutoka kwa maisha ya Apollinaire. Francesco Flugi von Aspermont alikuwa mpwa wa Conradin Flugi d'Aspermont (1787-1874), mshairi ambaye aliandika huko Ladin Putèr (lugha rasmi ya lugha ya Uswizi iliyozungumzwa huko EngAdina Ota), na labda pia ya Minnesänge Oswald von Wolkste (Corden. Ancêtres Grisons du Poète Guillaume Apollinaire "huko Généanet).

Katika ujana wake Apollinaire aliishi kwa muda mfupi huko Ubelgiji, akijua lahaja ya Walloon ya kutosha kuandika mashairi, ambayo kadhaa yamepona.Apollinaire inachezwa na Seth Gabel katika safu ya runinga ya 2018 "Genius", ambayo inazingatia maisha na kazi ya Pablo Picasso.

Mnamo 1900 aliandika riwaya yake ya kwanza "Mirely, Ou Le Petit Trous Pas Cher" (ponografia), ambayo baadaye ilipotea. Mkusanyiko wa kwanza wa ushairi wa Apollinaire ulikuwa "L'Enchanteur Pourrissant" (1909), lakini "Alcools" (1913) alianzisha sifa yake. Mashairi hayo, yaliyoathiriwa na sehemu na alama, juxtapose ya zamani na mpya, inachanganya aina za ujangili za jadi na picha za kisasa. Mnamo 1913, Apollinaire alichapisha insha "Les Peintres Cubistes, Méditations esthétiques" kwenye wachoraji wa Cubist, harakati ambayo alisaidia kufafanua. Alitengeneza pia neno "Orphism" kuelezea tabia ya kujiondoa kabisa katika uchoraji wa Robert DeLaunay na wengine.

Guillaume Apollinaire alikuwa mmoja wa kikundi cha washairi ambao Poulenc alikuwa amekutana naye akiwa kijana. Duka la vitabu la Adrienne Monnier, "Maison des Amis des Livres", ilikuwa mahali pa mkutano wa waandishi wa "Avant-Garde" pamoja na Apollinaire, Max Jacob, Paul Éluard na Louis Aragon. Apollinaire, mwana haramu wa mtu mashuhuri wa Kipolishi, alielezewa na mkosoaji Edward Lockspeiser kama kiongozi mashuhuri wa maisha ya Bohemian huko Montparnasse. Miongoni mwa mafanikio yake yalikuwa kuleta umaarufu mchoraji Duanier Rousseau, na kugundua neno "surrealism", ambalo alikuwa mtangazaji anayeongoza. Mnamo Juni 1917 watazamaji wa utendaji wa kwanza wa "Drame Surréaliste" wa Apollinaire "," Les Mamelles de Tirésias ", kwenye ukumbi wa michezo huko Montmartre alijumuisha Jean Cocteau, Serge Diaghilev, Léonide Massine, Henri Matisse, Pablo Picasso, Erik Satie. Miaka mingi baadaye Poulenc alisema kuwa ingawa alikuwa amechukizwa sana na kipande cha mbali haikumtokea wakati huo kwamba atawahi kuiweka kwenye muziki.

Apollinaire alipigana katika Vita vya Kwanza vya Dunia na, mnamo 1916, alipokea jeraha kubwa la hekaluni, ambalo hatawahi kupona kabisa. Aliandika "Les Mamelles de Tirésias" wakati akipona kutoka kwa jeraha hili. Katika kipindi hiki aliunda neno "surrealism" katika maelezo ya programu ya Jean Cocteau's na Erik Satie's "Parade", ilifanywa kwanza mnamo Mei 18, 1917. Alichapisha pia manifesto ya kisanii, "L'Esprit Nouveau et Les Poètes". Hali ya Apollinaire kama mkosoaji wa fasihi ni maarufu na yenye ushawishi katika utambuzi wake wa Marquis de Sade, ambaye kazi zake zilikuwa za muda mrefu, lakini zilitokea kwa umaarufu kama ushawishi juu ya harakati za sanaa za Dada na surrealist zinazoendelea huko Montparnasse mwanzoni mwa karne ya ishirini kama, "Roho wa Freest aliyewahi kutokea."
Guillaume Apollinaire (; 26 Agosti 1880-9 Novemba 1918) alikuwa mshairi wa Ufaransa, mwandishi wa hadithi, mwandishi wa hadithi fupi, mwandishi wa riwaya, na mkosoaji wa sanaa ya asili ya Kipolishi.

Hatimaye Apollinaire alihamia kutoka Roma kwenda Paris na kuwa mmoja wa washiriki maarufu wa jamii ya kisanii ya Paris (wote huko Montmartre na Montparnasse). Marafiki zake na washirika katika kipindi hicho walimjumuisha Pablo Picasso, Henri Rousseau, Gertrude Stein, Max Jacob, André Salmon, André Breton, André Derain, Faik Konitza, Blaise Cendrars, Pierre Reverddy, Alexandra, Maroan Cocteau, Eriki Satie Jean Metzinger. Alihusika kimapenzi na Marie Laurencin, ambaye mara nyingi hutambuliwa kama jumba lake la kumbukumbu. Wakati alipokuwa huko, alishangaa kwa anarchism na aliongea kama Dreyfusard katika kutetea hatia ya Dreyfus.

Prix ​​Guillaume Apollinaire ni Tuzo ya Ushairi wa Ufaransa iliyotolewa kwanza mnamo 1941. Ilipewa jina kwa heshima ya mwandishi wa Ufaransa Guillaume Apollinaire. Kila mwaka hutambua mkusanyiko wa mashairi kwa uhalisi wake na hali ya kisasa.
Apollinaire aliyefungwa vita alikufa na mafua wakati wa ugonjwa wa homa ya Uhispania ya 1918. Aliingiliwa katika kaburi la Père Lachaise, Paris.
report_src: Guillaume Apollinaire alikuwa na umri wa miaka 38 alipofariki dunia kutokana na janga la homa ya Uhispania mwaka 1918, miaka miwili baada ya kujeruhiwa katika Vita vya Kwanza vya Dunia [1].

question_en: In what city is the Linnwood historical society located?
pos_context_en: Linnwood is an heritage-listed former residence, school, local history museum and children's home and now historical society located at 11-35 Byron Road, Guildford in the Cumberland Council local government area of New South Wales, Australia. It was designed and built by George McCredie during 1891. It is also known as Linwood Hall, Lynwood Hall and Guildford Truant School. The property is owned by the Cumberland Council and the NSW Office of Environment and Heritage. It was added to the New South Wales State Heritage Register on 21 February 2003.
neg_context_en: In 1984, a plan to provide a museum at Linnwood was advertised. On 21 March 1985, The Department of Community Services granted a license to the Holroyd and District Historical Society, to operate the "Linnwood Museum", from the building. In September of that year, the museum was officially opened by the then Minister for Youth and Community Services, Frank Walker (Pamphlet).

Linnwood, is a historic home located at Ellicott City, Howard County, Maryland, United States. It is a large 1901 Queen Anne-influenced house consisting of a -story four-bay by four-bay frame structure with vinyl siding, a rubble stone foundation, and a hip roof with asphalt shingles. Six domestic outbuildings are arrayed behind the house, including a springhouse/greenhouse, shop building/cold storage and annex, garage, smokehouse, privy, and a modern garage. A stone gateway with iron gates is located at the road, flanking the driveway. The house's Late Victorian form and appearance resulted from a thorough remodeling in 1901 of a preexisting farmhouse, according to designs by architect D. S. Hopkins.
Linnwood was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2006.

Linnwood is significant as a late 19th century country retreat constructed by a prosperous city businessman demonstrating a pattern of land use that occurred during this time beyond the outskirts of Sydney. Linnwood is historically representative of the wealth and aspirations of this class of Late Victorian Sydney self made men, and also demonstrates the extensive local landholdings of Susan McCredie.

Linnwood Hall is located in Holroyd, south of Guildford. The residence sits high on a north-south running ridge within spacious grounds of about with mature trees. Several other early elements from the initial phase of development of the property are evident within this curtilage including an unusual octagonal summerhouse, several mature trees and fountains.

A departmental publication from 1966 describes the purpose and activities at "Lynwood Hall" at Guildford. The report notes that Linnwood was for girls aged from 12 to 15, from a deprived background. The report claims that "worthwhile goals are set and the girls are encouraged to meet them". In addition to a "general emphasis on domestic science", an emphasis was also placed on "deportment, courtesy and correct social conduct". The report notes that organisations such as Rotary and the C.W.A were responsible for providing outings for the girls and facilitating contact with the community (a picture of the Queen presented by the CWA hangs in the central hall). Other outings included trips to the city to see the ballet (Oral History). Ballet was apparently very important at Linnwood, and girls who performed well in classes were bound to be favourites of the staff (Oral History).

The site is likely to have a high level of archaeological potential, owing to a limited degree of site disturbance. The demolished remains of the original stables and cottage at the South West corner of the site are likely to be fairly undisturbed. The site is also likely to reveal evidence of former paths, outbuilding, drains, waste disposal, gardens and fences. There is a remote possibility that the footings of the 1894 Linnwood Hall church may be located in the vicinity of the Western boundary of the site. The significance of archaeological remains on the site is relative to the overall significance of the property.

In 1917, the Department of Education began looking for a suitable location for a new Truant School. A. L. Hinton, a Sydney real estate agent, was consulted, and offered several properties in the Parramatta region. In July 1917, Linnwood was included in the list of properties and the particulars of the residence and grounds were described. By September negotiations were in progress for the lease of the land from Mrs McCredie, with an option of purchasing the property during the life of the lease for (Pounds)5,000. Among the reasons for choosing Linnwood for the Truant School were its location, and ample accommodation and grounds: "it is more or less isolated although within easy reach of the Railway Station. There is sufficient accommodation for the staff without any additions and ample ground to provide suitable occupation for the boys after school hours. A Department of Education architect's report in September 1917, stated that Linwood was in a very good state of repair, and had only two or three slight cracks. A lease of the site from Mrs McCredie by the Crown was entered into, to commence at the beginning of December 1917.

Holroyd City Council debated handing back control of Linnwood Hall to the state government in November-December 2015, after a proposal to subdivide the land and use sale proceeds to fund its restoration have been stalled. Counicl will proceed with plans to subdivide the land and use proceeds from the Tamplin Road Reserve sale towards restoration of Linnwood house, following a series of meetings with the Heritage Division OEH to address long-running delays.
question_src: Je! Jumuiya ya kihistoria ya Linnwood iko katika mji gani?
pos_context_src: Linnwood ni makazi ya zamani ya urithi, shule, makumbusho ya historia ya mitaa na nyumba ya watoto na sasa jamii ya kihistoria iliyoko 11-35 Byron Road, Guildford katika eneo la Serikali ya Mitaa ya Cumberland ya New South Wales, Australia. Iliundwa na kujengwa na George McCredie wakati wa 1891. Pia inajulikana kama Linwood Hall, Lynwood Hall na Guildford Truant School. Mali hiyo inamilikiwa na Baraza la Cumberland na Ofisi ya Mazingira na Urithi wa NSW. Iliongezwa kwa Jalada la Urithi wa Jimbo la New South Wales mnamo tarehe 21 Februari 2003.
neg_context_src: Mnamo 1984, mpango wa kutoa jumba la kumbukumbu huko Linnwood ulitangazwa. Mnamo tarehe 21 Machi 1985, Idara ya Huduma za Jamii ilitoa leseni kwa Jumuiya ya Kihistoria ya Holroyd na Wilaya, kutekeleza "Jumba la kumbukumbu la Linnwood", kutoka jengo hilo. Mnamo Septemba mwaka huo, jumba la kumbukumbu lilifunguliwa rasmi na Waziri wa wakati huo wa Huduma za Vijana na Jamii, Frank Walker (kijitabu).

Linnwood, ni nyumba ya kihistoria iliyoko Ellicott City, Howard County, Maryland, United States. Ni nyumba kubwa ya Malkia Anne iliyoshawishiwa ya 1901 inayojumuisha muundo wa nne-bay na muundo wa sura nne na siding ya vinyl, msingi wa jiwe la kifusi, na paa la kiboko na shingles za lami. Majengo sita ya ndani yamepambwa nyuma ya nyumba, pamoja na chumba cha kulala/chafu, jengo la duka/uhifadhi wa baridi na kiambatisho, karakana, moshi, faragha, na karakana ya kisasa. Lango la jiwe lililo na Gates ya Iron liko barabarani, likizunguka barabara kuu. Fomu ya Marehemu ya Marehemu ya Marehemu ya Nyumba hiyo ilitokana na ukarabati kamili mnamo 1901 ya shamba la shamba lililokuwa na nguvu, kulingana na miundo ya mbunifu D. S. Hopkins.
Linnwood aliorodheshwa kwenye Jalada la Kitaifa la Maeneo ya kihistoria mnamo 2006.

Linnwood ni muhimu kama marehemu ya karne ya 19 ya nchi iliyojengwa na mfanyabiashara wa jiji aliyefanikiwa kuonyesha muundo wa matumizi ya ardhi ambayo yalitokea wakati huu zaidi ya nje ya Sydney. Linnwood ni mwakilishi wa kihistoria wa utajiri na matarajio ya darasa hili la marehemu Victoria Sydney alifanya wanaume, na pia anaonyesha milki kubwa ya eneo la Susan McCredie.

Ukumbi wa Linnwood iko katika Holroyd, kusini mwa Guildford. Makao hayo yanakaa juu kwenye uwanja wa kaskazini-kusini unaoendesha ndani ya misingi ya wasaa ya karibu na miti iliyokomaa. Vitu vingine kadhaa vya mapema kutoka kwa awamu ya kwanza ya maendeleo ya mali hiyo vinaonekana ndani ya ujumuishaji huu ikiwa ni pamoja na majira ya joto ya octagonal, miti kadhaa iliyokomaa na chemchemi.

Mchapishaji wa idara kutoka 1966 unaelezea kusudi na shughuli katika "Lynwood Hall" huko Guildford. Ripoti hiyo inabaini kuwa Linnwood ilikuwa ya wasichana wenye umri wa miaka 12 hadi 15, kutoka kwa asili iliyonyimwa. Ripoti hiyo inadai kwamba "malengo yenye thamani yamewekwa na wasichana wanahimizwa kukutana nao". Mbali na "msisitizo wa jumla juu ya sayansi ya ndani", msisitizo pia uliwekwa kwenye "uhamishaji, adabu na mwenendo sahihi wa kijamii". Ripoti hiyo inabaini kuwa mashirika kama Rotary na C.W.A yalikuwa na jukumu la kutoa safari kwa wasichana na kuwezesha mawasiliano na jamii (picha ya Malkia iliyowasilishwa na CWA hutegemea katika Jumba kuu). Matembezi mengine ni pamoja na safari kwenda jijini kuona ballet (historia ya mdomo). Ballet inaonekana ni muhimu sana huko Linnwood, na wasichana ambao walifanya vizuri katika madarasa walikuwa na upendeleo wa wafanyikazi (historia ya mdomo).

Tovuti inaweza kuwa na kiwango cha juu cha uwezo wa akiolojia, kutokana na kiwango kidogo cha usumbufu wa tovuti. Mabaki yaliyobomolewa ya stori za asili na chumba cha kulala kwenye kona ya kusini magharibi ya tovuti zinaweza kuwa zisizo na wasiwasi. Tovuti pia inaweza kufunua ushahidi wa njia za zamani, ujenzi wa nje, machafu, utupaji taka, bustani na uzio. Kuna uwezekano wa mbali kwamba nyayo za Kanisa la 1894 Linnwood Hall zinaweza kuwa ziko karibu na mpaka wa magharibi wa tovuti. Umuhimu wa mabaki ya akiolojia kwenye wavuti ni sawa na umuhimu wa jumla wa mali hiyo.

Mnamo 1917, Idara ya elimu ilianza kutafuta eneo linalofaa kwa shule mpya ya Truant. A. L. Hinton, wakala wa mali isiyohamishika ya Sydney, alishauriwa, na akatoa mali kadhaa katika mkoa wa Parramatta. Mnamo Julai 1917, Linnwood ilijumuishwa katika orodha ya mali na maelezo ya makazi na misingi zilielezewa. Kufikia Septemba mazungumzo yalikuwa yanaendelea kwa kukodisha ardhi kutoka kwa Bi McCredie, na chaguo la ununuzi wa mali wakati wa maisha ya kukodisha kwa (pauni) 5,000. Miongoni mwa sababu za kuchagua Linnwood kwa shule ya Truant kulikuwa na eneo lake, na malazi ya kutosha: "Ni zaidi au chini ya kutengwa ingawa katika ufikiaji rahisi wa kituo cha reli. Kuna malazi ya kutosha kwa wafanyikazi bila nyongeza yoyote na ardhi ya kutosha kutoa kazi nzuri kwa wavulana. Tovuti kutoka kwa Bibi McCredie na Crown iliingizwa, kuanza mwanzoni mwa Desemba 1917.

Halmashauri ya Jiji la Holroyd ilijadili udhibiti wa nyuma wa Jumba la Linnwood kwa Serikali ya Jimbo mnamo Novemba-Desemba 2015, baada ya pendekezo la kugawa ardhi na matumizi ya mauzo ili kufadhili marejesho yake yametangazwa. Counicl itaendelea na mipango ya kugawa ardhi na kutumia mapato kutoka kwa Uuzaji wa Hifadhi ya Barabara ya Tamplin kuelekea Marejesho ya Nyumba ya Linnwood, kufuatia mikutano kadhaa na Idara ya Urithi OEH kushughulikia ucheleweshaji wa muda mrefu.
report_src: Jumuiya ya kihistoria ya Linnwood iko katika mji wa Guildford, katika eneo la Serikali ya Mitaa ya Cumberland, Jimbo la New South Wales, Australia [1].

question_en: What is the population of Letterkenny?
pos_context_en: Letterkenny (), nicknamed "the Cathedral Town", is the largest and most populous town in County Donegal in Ulster, Ireland. It lies on the River Swilly in East Donegal and has a population of 19,274. Along with the nearby city of Derry, Letterkenny is considered a regional economic gateway for the North-West of Ireland. Letterkenny acts as an urban gateway to the Ulster "Gaeltacht", similar to Galway's relationship to the Connemara "Gaeltacht".
neg_context_en: The figures for ethnic and cultural background for people in the State in 2006 reveals that 16% of Letterkenny's population are non-nationals. The figures also show that most of Donegal's non-national population are living in the town. Of the town's total population 2,709 are non-nationals. According to the 2006 census 4,957 people have a disability illness, 640 people have a registered disability, 537 have a chronic illness while 345 suffer from a psychological or an emotional condition. The 2006 census also revealed that there were 199 travellers living within the towns environs.
Letterkenny Township is a township in Franklin County, Pennsylvania, United States. The population was 2,318 at the 2010 census, up from 2,074 at the 2000 census.

The modern town of Letterkenny began as a market town at the start of the 17th century, during the Plantation of Ulster. It may have been established on the site of an earlier Gaelic settlement. It was the first crossing point of the River Swilly. In the recent past, Letterkenny was a largely agricultural town, surrounded by extensive cattle and sheep grazing on what was then untilled hillside – at a time when Conwal (3 km west of Letterkenny) was the ecclesiastical and seaport centre. The waters of the Atlantic had not yet retreated from the basin of the Swilly, whose estuary at that time extended up almost as far as New Mills – proof of this may be found in those alluvial flat-lands between Oldtown and Port Road.

Kilmacrennan ( or ) is a small village in County Donegal, Ireland. The village population was 753, as of the 2016 census. The village's population has increased steadily over the last decade with many new housing developments catering, in particular, for overspill population from Letterkenny. Kilmacrennan was historically the "caput" of its eponymous Barony of Kilmacrennan, of the eight Baronies of Donegal.

In terms of size and area, it is the largest county in Ulster and the fourth-largest county in all of Ireland. Uniquely, County Donegal shares a small border with only one other county in the Republic of Ireland – County Leitrim. The greater part of its land border is shared with three counties of Northern Ireland: County Londonderry, County Tyrone and County Fermanagh. This geographic isolation from the rest of the Republic has led to Donegal people maintaining a distinct cultural identity and has been used to market the county with the slogan "Up here it's different". While Lifford is the county town, Letterkenny is by far the largest town in the county with a population of 19,588. Letterkenny and the nearby city of Derry form the main economic axis of the northwest of Ireland. Indeed, what became the City of Derry was officially part of County Donegal up until 1610.

The median income for a household in the township was $40,897, and the median income for a family was $44,545. Males had a median income of $30,431 versus $21,875 for females. The per capita income for the township was $18,315. About 1.8% of families and 4.7% of the population were below the poverty line, including 7.3% of those under age 18 and 5.3% of those age 65 or over.

In the township the population was spread out, with 24.5% under the age of 18, 8.9% from 18 to 24, 30.8% from 25 to 44, 24.0% from 45 to 64, and 11.9% who were 65 years of age or older. The median age was 37 years. For every 100 females there were 105.6 males. For every 100 females age 18 and over, there were 106.1 males.

According to the United States Census Bureau, the township has a total area of , of which is land and , or 0.19%, is water.
As of the census of 2000, there were 2,074 people, 783 households, and 617 families residing in the township. The population density was 29.5 people per square mile (11.4/km²). There were 829 housing units at an average density of 11.8/sq mi (4.6/km²). The racial makeup of the township was 98.07% White, 1.35% African American, 0.10% Native American, 0.10% Asian, 0.29% from other races, and 0.10% from two or more races. Hispanic or Latino of any race were 0.58% of the population.

Letterkenny has two GAA clubs: St. Eunan's GAA and Letterkenny Gaels, who play their home games at O'Donnell Park and at Páirc na nGael in The Glebe, respectively. St. Eunan's are considered one of Donegal's most successful and prolific clubs with major strides made with the clubs underage structure in recent years yielding various County and Ulster championships at underage level as well as considerable success at senior level since the turn of the century. Letterkenny Gaels were formed in 1996 but have yet to achieve much success and currently play in the Donegal junior championship. Almost uniquely in Ireland, Letterkenny Gaels, the GAA club, share facilities with Letterkenny Rugby Club. Gaelic football, like most of County Donegal, is the predominant sport, although soccer is also very popular.
question_src: Je! Idadi ya Letterkenny ni nini?
pos_context_src: Letterkenny (), jina lake "Jiji la Kanisa Kuu", ni mji mkubwa na wenye watu wengi katika Kata ya Donegal huko Ulster, Ireland. Iko kwenye mto Swilly huko Donegal Mashariki na ina idadi ya watu 19,274. Pamoja na mji wa karibu wa Derry, Letterkenny inachukuliwa kuwa lango la kiuchumi la mkoa kwa kaskazini-magharibi mwa Ireland. Letterkenny hufanya kama lango la mijini kwa Ulster "Gaeltacht", sawa na uhusiano wa Galway na Connemara "Gaeltacht".
neg_context_title_src: Letterkenny Township, Kaunti ya Franklin, Pennsylvania
Letterkenny Township, Kaunti ya Franklin, Pennsylvania
Letterkenny Township, Kaunti ya Franklin, Pennsylvania
Letterkenny Township, Kaunti ya Franklin, Pennsylvania
neg_context_src: Takwimu za asili ya kikabila na kitamaduni kwa watu katika jimbo hilo mnamo 2006 zinaonyesha kuwa 16% ya idadi ya watu wa Letterkenny sio ya kitaifa. Takwimu pia zinaonyesha kuwa idadi kubwa ya watu wasio wa kitaifa wanaishi katika mji. Kwa jumla ya idadi ya watu 2,709 ni wasio wa kitaifa. Kulingana na sensa ya 2006 watu 4,957 wana ugonjwa wa ulemavu, watu 640 wana ulemavu uliosajiliwa, 537 wana ugonjwa sugu wakati 345 wanakabiliwa na kisaikolojia au hali ya kihemko. Sensa ya 2006 pia ilifunua kwamba kulikuwa na wasafiri 199 wanaoishi ndani ya mazingira ya miji.
Letterkenny Township ni mji katika Kata ya Franklin, Pennsylvania, Merika. Idadi ya watu ilikuwa 2,318 katika sensa ya 2010, kutoka 2,074 katika sensa ya 2000.

Jiji la kisasa la Letterkenny lilianza kama mji wa soko mwanzoni mwa karne ya 17, wakati wa upandaji wa Ulster. Inawezekana ilianzishwa kwenye tovuti ya makazi ya mapema ya Gaelic. Ilikuwa hatua ya kwanza ya kuvuka ya mto Swilly. Katika siku za hivi majuzi, Letterkenny ilikuwa mji wa kilimo sana, uliozungukwa na ng'ombe na kondoo wakubwa juu ya kile kilichokuwa kisichokuwa na mlima - wakati ambao Conwal (km 3 magharibi mwa Letterkenny) ilikuwa kituo cha kikanisa na cha bandari. Maji ya Atlantic yalikuwa bado hayajarudi kutoka kwenye bonde la Swilly, ambalo eneo lake wakati huo liliongezeka karibu hadi mill mpya-dhibitisho ya hii inaweza kupatikana katika maeneo hayo ya gorofa kati ya Oldtown na Port Road.

Kilmacrennan (AU) ni kijiji kidogo katika County Donegal, Ireland. Idadi ya kijiji ilikuwa 753, kama ya sensa ya 2016. Idadi ya watu wa kijiji imeongezeka kwa kasi katika muongo mmoja uliopita na maendeleo mengi ya makazi, haswa, kwa idadi ya watu kutoka kwa Letterkenny. Kilmacrennan alikuwa kihistoria "caput" ya makao yake yasiyojulikana ya Kilmacrennan, ya Baronies nane za Donegal.

Kwa upande wa saizi na eneo, ni kaunti kubwa zaidi katika Ulster na kaunti ya nne kwa ukubwa katika Ireland yote. Kwa kweli, Kaunti ya Donegal inashiriki mpaka mdogo na kaunti moja moja tu katika Jamhuri ya Ireland - Kaunti ya Leitrim. Sehemu kubwa ya mpaka wake wa ardhi inashirikiwa na kaunti tatu za Ireland ya Kaskazini: Londonderry ya Kaunti, Kaunti ya Tyrone na Kaunti ya Fermanagh. Kutengwa kwa kijiografia kutoka kwa Jamhuri yote kumesababisha watu wa Donegal kudumisha kitambulisho tofauti cha kitamaduni na imekuwa ikitumika kuuza kaunti na kauli mbiu "hapa ni tofauti". Wakati Lifford ni mji wa kaunti, Letterkenny ndio mji mkubwa zaidi katika kaunti hiyo na idadi ya watu 19,588. Letterkenny na mji wa karibu wa Derry huunda mhimili kuu wa kiuchumi wa kaskazini magharibi mwa Ireland. Hakika, kile kilichokuwa mji wa Derry kilikuwa sehemu rasmi ya kaunti Donegal hadi 1610.

Mapato ya wastani kwa kaya katika mji huo yalikuwa $ 40,897, na mapato ya wastani kwa familia yalikuwa $ 44,545. Wanaume walikuwa na mapato ya wastani ya $ 30,431 dhidi ya $ 21,875 kwa wanawake. Mapato ya kila mji yalikuwa $ 18,315. Karibu 1.8% ya familia na 4.7% ya idadi ya watu walikuwa chini ya mstari wa umaskini, pamoja na 7.3% ya wale walio chini ya miaka 18 na 5.3% ya umri huo wa miaka 65 au zaidi.

Katika mji huo idadi ya watu ilienea, ikiwa na asilimia 24.5 chini ya umri wa miaka 18, 8.9% kutoka 18 hadi 24, 30.8% kutoka 25 hadi 44, 24.0% kutoka 45 hadi 64, na 11.9% ambao walikuwa na umri wa miaka 65 au zaidi. Umri wa wastani ulikuwa miaka 37. Kwa kila wanawake 100 kulikuwa na wanaume 105.6. Kwa kila wanawake 100 wa miaka 18 na zaidi, kulikuwa na wanaume 106.1.

Kulingana na Ofisi ya sensa ya Merika, mji huo una eneo la jumla, ambalo ni ardhi na, au 0.19%, ni maji.
Kama ya sensa ya 2000, kulikuwa na watu 2,074, kaya 783, na familia 617 zilizokaa katika mji huo. Uzani wa idadi ya watu ulikuwa watu 29.5 kwa maili ya mraba (11.4/km²). Kulikuwa na vitengo vya makazi 829 kwa wastani wa wiani wa 11.8/sq mi (4.6/km²). Ubunifu wa rangi ya mji ulikuwa 98.07% nyeupe, 1.35% American American, 0.10% Asili ya Amerika, 0.10% Asia, 0.29% kutoka kwa jamii zingine, na 0.10% kutoka jamii mbili au zaidi. Hispanic au Latino ya mbio yoyote walikuwa 0.58% ya idadi ya watu.

Letterkenny ina vilabu viwili vya GAA: St Eunan's GAA na Letterkenny Gaels, ambao hucheza michezo yao ya nyumbani huko O'Donnell Park na huko Páirc na Ngael huko Glebe, mtawaliwa. St. Eunan's inachukuliwa kuwa moja ya vilabu vya Donegal vilivyofanikiwa zaidi na vilivyo na hatua kubwa zilizofanywa na muundo wa vilabu katika miaka ya hivi karibuni kutoa ubingwa wa kaunti na Ulster katika kiwango cha chini na mafanikio makubwa katika kiwango cha juu tangu mwanzoni mwa karne. Letterkenny Gaels ziliundwa mnamo 1996 lakini bado hazijafanikiwa sana na kwa sasa zinacheza kwenye Mashindano ya Donegal Junior. Karibu katika Ireland, Letterkenny Gaels, Klabu ya GAA, kushiriki vifaa na Letterkenny Rugby Club. Soka la Gaelic, kama wengi wa kaunti ya Donegal, ni mchezo wa kwanza, ingawa mpira wa miguu pia ni maarufu sana.

question_en: Is the Caspian Sea salt water or fresh water?
pos_context_en: Originally a land-locked fresh water lake, the Black Sea was flooded with salt water from the Mediterranean Sea during the Holocene. The influx of salt water essentially smothered the fresh water below it because a lack of internal motion and mixing meant that no fresh oxygen reached the deep waters, creating a meromictic body of water. The anoxic environment, which is hostile to many biological organisms that destroy wood in the oxygenated waters, provides an excellent testing site for deep water archaeological survey.
neg_context_en: The country's fresh water basins and the Caspian Sea account for 97 species of fish of which eight introduced and seven of these have become widespread and over 15 thousand species of invertebrates in Azerbaijan. Most can be found in the Kura River, surrounding lakes, as well as in the Mingechevir reservoir. Most of fish are anadromous or semi-anadromous (the young grow up in salt water and migrate to fresh water to breed after they reach maturity). The most valuable of anadromous fish are salmon, sturgeon, stellate sturgeon and beluga. Aspius, Chalcalburnus and eel are also anadromous fish. Sturgeon meat and caviar are highly valuable. Beside, the water basins of Azerbaijan contain such valuable fish species as bream, sazan, rutilus kutum and others. Such fish species as herring are fished in the Caspian Sea. Due to the construction of a number of hydrotechnical plants on the Kura river after 1959, the regulation of the river water flow, as well as the Caspian water pollution led to the significant reduction in the number of valuable fish species. Three hatcheries (Kuragzi, Alibayramli and Kur experimental sturgeon hatchery) for melioration and fish-farming purposes were launched to restore the fish reserves and to increase the number of fish in species. Azerbaijan's fish-farming establishments and hatcheries account for breeding of 20 million sturgeons, 600 thousand salmons, over 800 thousand. A new hatchery with the capacity of 20 million sturgeons was put in commission in Khyly in 2000.

The salinity of the bay is about 35%, compared to the Caspian Sea's 1.2%, and 3–4% for the bulk of the world's oceans. Because of the exceptionally high salinity, comparable to the Dead Sea, it has practically no marine vegetation. Large evaporite, mostly salt deposits accumulated at the south shore were harvested by the local population since the 1920s, but in the 1930s manual collection stopped and the industry shifted northwest to its present center near Garabogaz. From the 1950s on, ground water was pumped from levels lower than the bay itself, yielding more valuable types of salts. In 1963 construction began at Garabogaz on a modern plant for increased production of salines, all the year round and independently of natural evaporation. This plant was completed in 1973.
In March 1980, the barrier to the Caspian was blocked, due to concerns evaporation was accelerating a fall in Caspian Sea level, reducing water levels. The resulting "salt bowl" caused widespread problems of blowing salt, reportedly poisoning the soil and causing health problems for hundreds of kilometers downwind to the east. In 1984 the lake was completely dry. In June 1992, when Caspian Sea levels were rising again, the barrier was breached, allowing Caspian water to again refill Garabogazköl. The remnants of the breached dam can be seen in the satellite photo of the inlet, near the Caspian Sea entrance.

The Caspian Sea, like the Black Sea, Namak Lake, and Lake Urmia, is a remnant of the ancient Paratethys Sea. It became landlocked about 5.5 million years ago due to tectonic uplift and a fall in sea level. During warm and dry climatic periods, the landlocked sea almost dried up, depositing evaporitic sediments like halite that were covered by wind-blown deposits and were sealed off as an evaporite sink when cool, wet climates refilled the basin. (Comparable evaporite beds underlie the Mediterranean.) Due to the current inflow of fresh water, the Caspian Sea is a freshwater lake in its northern portions, and is most saline on the Iranian shore, where the catchment basin contributes little flow. Currently, the mean salinity of the Caspian is one third that of Earth's oceans. The Garabogazköl embayment, which dried up when water flow from the main body of the Caspian was blocked in the 1980s but has since been restored, routinely exceeds oceanic salinity by a factor of 10.

The species is distributed throughout brackish and fresh waters of the Ponto-Caspian basin. It is found in the Caspian Sea, the Sea of Azov, rivers Volga, Don, Kuban and Danube; in the rivers up to over 500 km upstream. All the previous mentionings of "P. baeri" outside the Caspian Sea should probably be attributed to "P. bakuensis". The ranges of "P. bakuensis" and "P. baeri" partly overlap: they can be found together in the Caspian Sea.

Neogobius pallasi, the Caspian sand goby or the Caspian monkey goby, is a species of fish native to fresh and brackish waters of the Caspian Sea basin including the Volga drainage up to the vicinity of Moscow. It has been introduced into the Aral basin. This species of goby can reach a length of SL. It is also important to local commercial fisheries.

The main factors are the advance or recession of the Scandinavian glacier and the isostatic sinking of the landforms due to the weight of ice or isostatic rebound (springing back) when relieved of it. The glacier provides a massive flow of fresh water. Salt water enters from the North Sea through straits when the sea level is high enough to allow reverse flow over the sill. When the straits are above sea level or close to sea level, fresh water will accumulate and a lake forms. Fresh water will accumulate to levels substantially higher than sea level when the sills are substantially above sea level. The release of fresh water from the glaciers depends on climate; the presence or absence of entrances to the ocean depends on land rise and oceanic water level; the latter of course is also affected by the amount of ice held in glaciers worldwide.

Irrigation agriculture has been one of the primary economic mainstays of the lower Kura valley since ancient times. Because of water taken out for irrigation use, up to 20% of the water that formerly flowed in the river no longer reaches the Caspian Sea. Over 70% of the water in the Iori (Gabirry) River, a major tributary of the Kura, is expended before it reaches Lake Mingachevir. Of the of agricultural land in the lower Kura River watershed, , about 31%, are irrigated. Much of the water diverted from the river for irrigation goes to waste because of leakage from the canals, evaporation, poor maintenance, and other causes. Leaking water causes groundwater to rise, in some areas so high that about of land are so waterlogged that they are no longer suitable for agriculture. About of the irrigated lands have a dangerously high salt content because of mineral deposits from irrigation. Of this, are extremely salinated. Irrigation return water, returned to the river by an extensive but outdated drainage system, contributes to severe pollution. Some of this degradation also comes from industrial and municipal wastewater discharge.

Differences between the three regions are dramatic. The Northern Caspian only includes the Caspian shelf, and is very shallow; it accounts for less than 1% of the total water volume with an average depth of only . The sea noticeably drops off towards the Middle Caspian, where the average depth is . The Southern Caspian is the deepest, with oceanic depths of over , greatly exceeding the depth of other regional seas, such as the Persian Gulf. The Middle and Southern Caspian account for 33% and 66% of the total water volume, respectively. The northern portion of the Caspian Sea typically freezes in the winter, and in the coldest winters ice forms in the south as well.

, negotiations related to the demarcation of the Caspian Sea had been going on for nearly a decade among the states bordering the Caspian – Azerbaijan, Russia, Kazakhstan, Turkmenistan, and Iran. The status of the Caspian Sea is the key problem. Access to mineral resources (oil and natural gas), access for fishing, and access to international waters (through Russia's Volga river and the canals connecting it to the Black Sea and Baltic Sea) all depend upon the outcomes of negotiations. Access to the Volga River is particularly important for the landlocked states of Azerbaijan, Kazakhstan, and Turkmenistan. This concerns Russia, because the potential traffic would use its inland waterways. If a body of water is labelled as a sea, then there would be some precedents and international treaties obliging the granting of access permits to foreign vessels. If a body of water is labelled merely as a lake, then there are no such obligations. Environmental issues are also somewhat connected to the status and borders issue.
question_src: Je! Maji ya chumvi ya bahari ya Caspian au maji safi?
pos_context_title_src: Usafirishaji wa bahari nyeusi ya kale
pos_context_src: Hapo awali ziwa safi la maji lililofungwa ardhi, Bahari Nyeusi ilifurika na maji ya chumvi kutoka Bahari ya Mediterania wakati wa Holocene. Kuenea kwa maji ya chumvi kimsingi kulipunguza maji safi chini yake kwa sababu ukosefu wa mwendo wa ndani na mchanganyiko ulimaanisha kuwa hakuna oksijeni safi iliyofikia maji ya kina, na kuunda mwili wa maji. Mazingira ya anoxic, ambayo ni ya uadui kwa viumbe vingi vya kibaolojia ambavyo huharibu kuni kwenye maji yenye oksijeni, hutoa tovuti bora ya upimaji kwa uchunguzi wa kina wa akiolojia.
neg_context_src: Mabonde ya maji safi ya nchi hiyo na akaunti ya Bahari ya Caspian kwa spishi 97 za samaki ambazo nane zilianzisha na saba kati ya hizi zimeenea na zaidi ya spishi elfu 15 za invertebrates huko Azabajani. Wengi wanaweza kupatikana katika Mto wa Kura, maziwa yanayozunguka, na vile vile katika Hifadhi ya Mingechevir. Samaki wengi ni wenye nguvu au nusu-anadromous (vijana hukua katika maji ya chumvi na huhamia kwa maji safi kuzaliana baada ya kufikia ukomavu). Ya thamani zaidi ya samaki wa anadromous ni lax, sturgeon, stellate sturgeon na beluga. Aspius, Chalcalburnus na eel pia ni samaki wenye nguvu. Nyama ya Sturgeon na caviar ni ya thamani sana. Kando, mabonde ya maji ya Azabajani yana aina ya samaki kama vile pombe, Sazan, Rutilus Kutum na wengine. Aina za samaki kama vile herring huvutwa katika Bahari ya Caspian. Kwa sababu ya ujenzi wa mimea kadhaa ya hydrotechnical kwenye Mto Kura baada ya 1959, udhibiti wa mtiririko wa maji ya mto, pamoja na uchafuzi wa maji wa Caspian ulisababisha kupunguzwa kwa idadi ya spishi za samaki. Hatcheries tatu (Kuragzi, Alibayramli na Kur Majaribio ya Sturgeon Sturgeon) kwa malengo ya kilimo na samaki walizinduliwa ili kurejesha akiba ya samaki na kuongeza idadi ya samaki katika spishi. Vituo vya kilimo cha samaki vya Azabajani na hatcheries husababisha kuzaliana kwa sturgeons milioni 20, salmons elfu 600, zaidi ya 800 elfu. Hatchery mpya yenye uwezo wa sturgeons milioni 20 iliwekwa katika tume huko Khyly mnamo 2000.

Chumvi ya bay ni karibu 35%, ikilinganishwa na Bahari ya Caspian 1.2%, na 3-4%kwa wingi wa bahari ya ulimwengu. Kwa sababu ya chumvi ya kipekee, kulinganishwa na Bahari ya Chumvi, haina mimea ya baharini. Evaporite kubwa, amana nyingi za chumvi zilizokusanywa katika Shore Kusini zilivunwa na idadi ya watu tangu miaka ya 1920, lakini katika Mkusanyiko wa Mwongozo wa 1930 ulisimama na tasnia hiyo ilihamia kaskazini magharibi kwenda kituo chake cha sasa karibu na Garabogaz. Kuanzia miaka ya 1950 kuendelea, maji ya ardhini yalipigwa kutoka viwango vya chini kuliko bay yenyewe, ikitoa aina muhimu zaidi za chumvi. Mnamo 1963 ujenzi ulianza huko Garabogaz kwenye mmea wa kisasa kwa uzalishaji ulioongezeka wa salines, mwaka mzima na kwa uhuru wa uvukizi wa asili. Mmea huu ulikamilishwa mnamo 1973.
Mnamo Machi 1980, kizuizi cha Caspian kilizuiliwa, kwa sababu ya kuyeyuka kwa wasiwasi ilikuwa kuharakisha kuanguka katika kiwango cha bahari ya Caspian, kupunguza viwango vya maji. "Bowl ya chumvi" iliyosababishwa ilisababisha shida kubwa za kupiga chumvi, iliripotiwa sumu ya mchanga na kusababisha shida za kiafya kwa mamia ya kilomita kushuka mashariki. Mnamo 1984 ziwa lilikuwa kavu kabisa. Mnamo Juni 1992, wakati viwango vya bahari vya Caspian viliongezeka tena, kizuizi kilivunjwa, ikiruhusu maji ya Caspian kujaza tena Garabogazköl. Mabaki ya bwawa lililovunjwa linaweza kuonekana kwenye picha ya satelaiti ya kuingiza, karibu na mlango wa bahari ya Caspian.

Bahari ya Caspian, kama Bahari Nyeusi, Ziwa la Namak, na Ziwa Urmia, ni mabaki ya Bahari ya Paratethys ya zamani. Ilifungiwa kama miaka milioni 5.5 iliyopita kwa sababu ya kuinua tectonic na kuanguka katika usawa wa bahari. Wakati wa hali ya joto na kavu ya hali ya hewa, bahari iliyofungwa karibu ilikauka, ikiweka mchanga wa kuyeyuka kama halite ambayo ilifunikwa na amana za upepo na zilitiwa muhuri kama kuzama kwa evaporite wakati hali ya hewa baridi, mvua ilijaza bonde. . Hivi sasa, chumvi ya maana ya Caspian ni theluthi moja ya bahari ya Dunia. Embayment ya Garabogazköl, ambayo ilikauka wakati mtiririko wa maji kutoka kwa mwili kuu wa Caspian ulizuiliwa miaka ya 1980 lakini tangu wakati huo umerejeshwa, mara kwa mara huzidi chumvi ya bahari na sababu ya 10.

Aina hiyo inasambazwa katika maji yote ya brackish na safi ya bonde la Ponto-Caspian. Inapatikana katika Bahari ya Caspian, Bahari ya Azov, Mito ya Volga, Don, Kuban na Danube; Katika mito hadi zaidi ya kilomita 500. Maneno yote ya hapo awali ya "P. baeri" nje ya Bahari ya Caspian labda yanapaswa kuhusishwa na "P. Bakuensis". Sehemu za "P. Bakuensis" na "P. Baeri" sehemu inayoingiliana: zinaweza kupatikana pamoja katika Bahari ya Caspian.

Neogobius Pallasi, Mchanga wa Caspian Goby au Monkey Goby, ni aina ya samaki asili ya maji safi na ya brackish ya bonde la bahari ya Caspian pamoja na maji ya Volga hadi karibu na Moscow. Imeanzishwa katika bonde la Aral. Aina hii ya Goby inaweza kufikia urefu wa SL. Ni muhimu pia kwa uvuvi wa kibiashara wa ndani.

Sababu kuu ni mapema au kushuka kwa glasi ya Scandinavia na kuzama kwa muundo wa ardhi kwa sababu ya uzani wa barafu au isostatic rebound (kurudi nyuma) wakati wa kuondoa. Glacier hutoa mtiririko mkubwa wa maji safi. Maji ya chumvi huingia kutoka Bahari ya Kaskazini kupitia Straits wakati usawa wa bahari uko juu ya kutosha kuruhusu mtiririko wa nyuma juu ya sill. Wakati viboko viko juu ya usawa wa bahari au karibu na usawa wa bahari, maji safi yatakusanyika na fomu za ziwa. Maji safi yatakusanyika kwa viwango vya juu zaidi kuliko kiwango cha bahari wakati sill ziko juu ya usawa wa bahari. Kutolewa kwa maji safi kutoka kwa barafu inategemea hali ya hewa; uwepo au kutokuwepo kwa kuingia kwa bahari inategemea kupanda kwa ardhi na kiwango cha maji ya bahari; Mwisho wa kweli pia huathiriwa na kiasi cha barafu iliyofanyika katika barafu ulimwenguni.

Kilimo cha umwagiliaji imekuwa moja wapo ya msingi wa uchumi wa bonde la chini la Kura tangu nyakati za zamani. Kwa sababu ya maji yaliyochukuliwa kwa matumizi ya umwagiliaji, hadi 20% ya maji ambayo zamani yalitiririka katika mto hayafikii tena Bahari ya Caspian. Zaidi ya 70% ya maji katika Mto wa Iori (Gabirry), kodi kuu ya Kura, hutolewa kabla ya kufikia Ziwa Mingachevir. Ya ardhi ya kilimo katika maji ya chini ya Mto Kura ,, karibu 31%, hutiwa maji. Sehemu kubwa ya maji yaliyogeuzwa kutoka mto kwa umwagiliaji huenda kwa taka kwa sababu ya kuvuja kutoka kwa mifereji, uvukizi, matengenezo duni, na sababu zingine. Maji yanayovuja husababisha maji ya ardhini kuongezeka, katika maeneo mengine ya juu sana kwamba juu ya ardhi ni ya maji kiasi kwamba haifai tena kwa kilimo. Karibu ya ardhi iliyomwagika ina hatari kubwa ya chumvi kwa sababu ya amana za madini kutoka kwa umwagiliaji. Ya hii, ni chumvi sana. Umwagiliaji kurudi maji, ulirudi mto na mfumo mkubwa lakini wa zamani wa mifereji ya maji, huchangia uchafuzi mkubwa. Baadhi ya uharibifu huu pia hutoka kwa kutokwa kwa maji machafu ya viwandani na manispaa.

Tofauti kati ya mikoa hiyo mitatu ni kubwa. Caspian wa kaskazini ni pamoja na rafu ya Caspian, na haina kina sana; Inachukua chini ya 1% ya jumla ya kiasi cha maji na kina cha wastani cha tu. Bahari inashuka kuelekea Caspian ya kati, ambapo kina cha wastani ni. Caspian ya kusini ni ya kina zaidi, na kina cha bahari ya zaidi, inazidi sana kina cha bahari zingine za kikanda, kama vile Ghuba ya Uajemi. Akaunti ya kati na ya kusini ya Caspian kwa 33% na 66% ya jumla ya maji, mtawaliwa. Sehemu ya kaskazini ya Bahari ya Caspian kawaida huganda wakati wa msimu wa baridi, na katika aina ya barafu baridi zaidi ya barafu pia.

, Mazungumzo yanayohusiana na kugawanywa kwa Bahari ya Caspian yalikuwa yakiendelea kwa karibu muongo mmoja kati ya majimbo yaliyopakana na Caspian - Azabajani, Urusi, Kazakhstan, Turkmenistan, na Iran. Hali ya Bahari ya Caspian ndio shida muhimu. Upataji wa rasilimali za madini (mafuta na gesi asilia), ufikiaji wa uvuvi, na ufikiaji wa maji ya kimataifa (kupitia Mto wa Volga wa Urusi na mifereji inayoiunganisha kwa Bahari Nyeusi na Bahari ya Baltic) yote hutegemea matokeo ya mazungumzo. Upataji wa Mto wa Volga ni muhimu sana kwa majimbo yaliyofungwa ya Azabajani, Kazakhstan, na Turkmenistan. Hii inahusu Urusi, kwa sababu trafiki inayoweza kutumia barabara zake za ndani. Ikiwa mwili wa maji umeandikwa kama bahari, basi kutakuwa na utangulizi na mikataba ya kimataifa inayolazimisha utoaji wa vibali vya upatikanaji kwa vyombo vya kigeni. Ikiwa mwili wa maji umeitwa tu kama ziwa, basi hakuna majukumu kama haya. Maswala ya mazingira pia yameunganishwa na hali na suala la mipaka.
report_src: Maji ya Bahari ya Caspian si maji safi kabisa wala hayalingani na chumvi kamili ya bahari wazi; kimsingi ni maji ya “brackish” yenye chumvi wastani wa karibu ‑12 ‰ (asilimia 1.2), takribani theluthi moja tu ya chumvi ya Bahari ya Mediterania inayofikia takriban ‑38 ‰, hivyo kiwango chake cha chumvi kiko katikati ya maji safi (<0.5 ‰) na bahari kuu (>30 ‰). Salinity hii hutofautiana kieneo: kaskazini, ambako mito kama Volga huingiza maji safi mengi, chumvi hushuka hadi karibu ‑0.5 ‰, ilhali kusini-mashariki (bay ya Kara-Bogaz-Gol) inaweza kuzidi ‑30 ‰ kutokana na uvukizi mkali. Tofauti hii inaitofautisha na Bahari Nyeusi ambayo, baada ya kufurika na maji ya Mediterania wakati wa Holocene, ilibaki na tabaka la juu lenye chumvi nyingi na kina kisicho na oksijeni, ikabadilika kutoka ziwa la maji safi hadi mfumo wa bahari yenye chumvi na mazingira ya anoxic [1].
