question_en: When was Eugene Sternberg born?
pos_context_en: Eugene Sternberg (January 15, 1915 – June 5, 2005) was an Austro-Hungarian born American architect known for his passionate commitment and contribution to contemporary/modernist architecture and town planning in Colorado and other Rocky Mountain states between 1950 and 1990. He designed over 400 building projects and subdivisions, many of them iconic examples of Modernist architecture. Since his focus was on improving the quality of life of the general population, the structures he built were beautiful, useful, and cost-effective. Most of his projects were in the category of social architecture: affordable homes, senior housing projects, public housing, hospitals, medical clinics, public schools, community colleges, community centers, churches, buildings for credit unions, labor unions, and headquarters offices for Rural Electric Associations. As a planner Sternberg designed a number of innovative housing subdivisions and master plans for college campuses, governmental complexes, county fairgrounds, and a number of small western cities.
neg_context_en:
Sternberg was born during World War I in Pressburg, Austria-Hungary where his family had moved to be with his father while he served in the Austro-Hungarian army. When the war, and the Austro-Hungarian Empire, ended in 1918, the family returned to their home in Munkács (now Mukachevo, Ukraine) in the province of Ruthenia; in 1920 it became part of the newly created country of Czechoslovakia.
During his elementary and high school education. Sternberg's major passion was art. He developed into an accomplished young artist and won a coveted place to study architecture at the Czech Technical University in Prague. In the summers he worked for two architectural firms in Munkács and for a well-known Czech architect, Frantisek Libra, in Prague. In 1938, he earned a first degree in architecture/engineering. Adolf Hitler's Germany occupied Czechoslovakia in March 1939. Because Sternberg was offered a scholarship to the University of London's Bartlett School of Architecture he was fortunate to leave Czechoslovakia in 1939, the only one of his large Jewish family to be able to do so.

In 1954 Eugene D. Sternberg and Associates were commissioned to design Sun Valley Homes Annex, a 220-unit addition to the original Public Housing Project. He regarded this as a development that fell far short of his high aspirations for successful public housing. He had to abide by the same mean-spirited limitations as in the earlier project. Homes in the Sun Valley projects were isolated and had no easy access to public transportation, shopping or community facilities. Many years later, Sternberg felt some vindication when the Denver Housing Authority decided that it had erred in not providing any community facilities for its housing projects. In 1965 he was commissioned to design five community centers - Auraria, Rude Park, Stapleton, Curtis Park, J. Q. Newton - to rectify the error and improve the residents' quality of life. The research for this commission led to the publication of Sternberg's second architectural book, Community Centers and Student Unions, which he wrote in cooperation with his wife Barbara Sternberg.

As their Sternberg household dwindled down from eight members to three, Gene began the transition from his professional practice to a new role and a new "hometown." Since 1949, the Sternbergs had enjoyed spending time in summer in a cabin they built in Evergreen, 30 miles into the foothills west of Denver. By 1970, Evergreen was in the process of transformation from a small mountain summer resort to a year-round community within commuting distance of Denver. The Sternbergs sold the cherished home that Eugene had designed for the family in Orchard Hills, and moved into an old log house on the banks of Evergreen's Upper Bear Creek, Colorado with their youngest daughter.

After graduation, Sternberg was invited to join Abercrombie's firm in London, where he worked mainly on planning new neighborhoods to replace the housing destroyed by German bombing. Sternberg also taught part-time at Cambridge University, the University of London and the Regent Street Polytechnic. As the war drew to an end, Sternberg and Barbara Edwards, his British fiancée, decided to emigrate to the United States. To accomplish this, they each had to secure a job in the U.S. Sternberg received a three-year contract to teach city planning at Cornell University. Barbara secured a position at the British Information Services in Manhattan. Gene and Barbara were married in Ithaca, New York in the fall of 1946. Sternberg soon became dissatisfied with the general lack of creative activity in Cornell's architectural and planning departments, and was particularly disappointed when he found that full-time faculty members were forbidden to practice. He resigned from the prestigious university after three months and took on the challenges of a newcomer in an unfamiliar country, with no job and few professional contacts. Fortunately, Sternberg's background and qualifications appealed to Carl Feiss, Director of a new School of Architecture and Planning at the University of Denver, where Sternberg became Associate Professor of Design. The Sternbergs, with a six weeks old baby, took their first ever flight in August 1947 to a new home in a city and state of which they had never heard.

Josef von Sternberg was born Jonas Sternberg to an impoverished Orthodox Jewish family in Vienna, at that time part of the Austro-Hungarian Empire. When Sternberg was three years old, his father Moses Sternberg, a former soldier in the army of Austria-Hungary, moved to the United States to seek work. His mother, Serafin née Singer, and her children joined Moses in America in 1901 when the young Sternberg was seven. Jonas attended public school there until the family, except Moses, returned to Vienna three years later. Throughout his life, Sternberg would carry vivid memories of Vienna and nostalgia for some of "his happiest childhood moments."

For Gerald Schlessman, Sternberg designed Hillcrest Apartments, a commercial high-rise apartment building in central Denver. He was sincerely distressed when he heard, about a year after completion of the project, that Schlessman was losing money on it and had put it up for sale. He went to talk with his client and expressed his concern. "Don't give it a thought, Gene," said Schlessman, "I can always use a loss." That reasoning went beyond Sternberg's personal financial experience. At the other end of the housing spectrum was a complex of small, economical apartment units Sternberg designed for a beautiful site overlooking the town of Steamboat Springs. Currently, the owners of the apartments are seeking to have the project designated as having historic significance. The site is too desirable and developers have in mind the razing of the present inexpensive homes to make way for a denser development.

The only medical project about which Sternberg felt great disappointment was the Wardenberg Student Health Center in Boulder. He had long railed publicly against the phony Romanesque façade architecture of the Colorado University campus in Boulder. What can professors of architecture in Boulder do, he would ask, other than take their students for a tour of the campus and show them what not to do? A long-time champion of Sternberg's talents, Vance Austin, was elected in 1956 to the C.U. Board of Regents. Austin vowed that during his term of office, he would introduce some contemporary architecture onto the campus. He succeeded, against considerable opposition, in having the Wardenberg project awarded to Sternberg's firm, but then unexpectedly left the scene when he was appointed to head the Credit Union National Association in Wisconsin.

Sternberg was born on December 8, 1949, to a Jewish family, in New Jersey. Sternberg suffered from test anxiety as a child. As a result, he became an inadequate test taker. This upset him and he reasoned that a test was not an adequate measurement of his true knowledge and academic abilities. When he later retook a test in a room that consisted of younger students, he felt more comfortable and his scores increased dramatically. The following year, he created the Sternberg Test of Mental Ability (STOMA), his first intelligence test. This problem of test taking is what sparked Sternberg's interest in psychology.

In 1950, Sternberg became involved for the first time in the design of public housing in Denver. He was consultant architect to Earl Morris, a long-established Denver architect, on the site plan and building design for Sun Valley Homes, a 200-unit project. Sternberg had been an outspoken critic of the Denver Public Housing Authority's projects. He fought strenuously against the rigid and demeaning limitations imposed at the time by the Housing Authority to appease the political opposition of private home builders. Public housing projects had to be built on sites no commercial homebuilder would consider for development. These sites were isolated from other housing, and the buildings had to be designed so as to look worse than the poorest private housing. In spite of these obstacles, Morris and Sternberg did achieve some limited improvements. They introduced duplexes, in contrast to the customary high-rise buildings or long barracks-like row houses that characterized most public housing of the day. The subdivision plan eliminated the conventional grid street pattern, resulting in greater intimacy and safety from traffic for the residents.
question_src: Eugene Sternberg alizaliwa lini?
pos_context_src: Eugene Sternberg (Januari 15, 1915-Juni 5, 2005) alikuwa mbunifu aliyezaliwa wa Amerika ya Austro-Hungary aliyejulikana kwa kujitolea kwake na mchango wake wa kisasa/wa kisasa na mipango ya jiji huko Colorado na majimbo mengine ya Rocky Mountain kati ya 1950 na 1990. Alibuni zaidi ya miradi 400 ya ujenzi na mgawanyiko, mifano mingi ya usanifu wa kisasa. Kwa kuwa umakini wake ulikuwa juu ya kuboresha hali ya maisha ya idadi ya watu, miundo aliyoijenga ilikuwa nzuri, muhimu, na ya gharama kubwa. Miradi yake mingi ilikuwa katika jamii ya usanifu wa kijamii: nyumba za bei nafuu, miradi ya makazi ya wazee, makazi ya umma, hospitali, kliniki za matibabu, shule za umma, vyuo vya jamii, vituo vya jamii, makanisa, majengo ya vyama vya mikopo, vyama vya wafanyikazi, na ofisi za makao makuu kwa vyama vya umeme vijijini. Kama mpangaji Sternberg alibuni idadi ya mgawanyiko wa nyumba za ubunifu na mipango bora ya vyuo vikuu, maeneo ya serikali, viwanja vya kaunti, na miji kadhaa ndogo ya Magharibi.
neg_context_src:
Sternberg alizaliwa wakati wa Vita vya Kwanza vya Dunia huko Pressburg, Austria-Hungary ambapo familia yake ilikuwa imehamia kuwa na baba yake wakati yeye alikuwa akihudumu katika jeshi la Austro-Hungary. Wakati vita, na Dola ya Austro-Hungary, ilimalizika mnamo 1918, familia ilirudi nyumbani kwao Munkács (sasa Mukachevo, Ukraine) katika jimbo la Ruthenia; Mnamo 1920 ikawa sehemu ya nchi mpya ya Czechoslovakia.
Wakati wa masomo yake ya msingi na ya shule ya upili. Mapenzi makubwa ya Sternberg yalikuwa sanaa. Alikua msanii mchanga aliyefanikiwa na akashinda mahali pa kutamani kusoma usanifu katika Chuo Kikuu cha Ufundi cha Czech huko Prague. Katika msimu wa joto alifanya kazi kwa mashirika mawili ya usanifu huko Munkács na kwa mbunifu anayejulikana wa Kicheki, Frantisek Libra, huko Prague. Mnamo 1938, alipata digrii ya kwanza katika usanifu/uhandisi. Ujerumani ya Adolf Hitler ilichukua Czechoslovakia mnamo Machi 1939. Kwa sababu Sternberg alipewa usomi katika Chuo Kikuu cha Usanifu cha Bartlett cha London alikuwa na bahati ya kuondoka Czechoslovakia mnamo 1939, mmoja tu wa familia yake kubwa ya Wayahudi kuweza kufanya hivyo.

Mnamo 1954 Eugene D. Sternberg na washirika waliagizwa kubuni Sun Valley Homes Annex, nyongeza ya vitengo 220 kwa mradi wa asili wa makazi ya umma. Aliona hii kama maendeleo ambayo yalipungua sana kwa matarajio yake ya juu kwa makazi ya umma yenye mafanikio. Ilibidi azingatie mapungufu sawa ya roho kama ilivyo katika mradi wa mapema. Nyumba katika miradi ya Bonde la Jua zilitengwa na hazikuwa na ufikiaji rahisi wa usafirishaji wa umma, ununuzi au vifaa vya jamii. Miaka mingi baadaye, Sternberg alihisi uthibitisho fulani wakati Mamlaka ya Makazi ya Denver ilipoamua kwamba ilikosea kwa kutotoa vifaa vya jamii kwa miradi yake ya makazi. Mnamo 1965 aliagizwa kubuni vituo vitano vya jamii - Auraria, Rude Park, Stapleton, Curtis Park, J. Q. Newton - kurekebisha kosa na kuboresha hali ya maisha ya wakaazi. Utafiti wa tume hii ulisababisha kuchapishwa kwa kitabu cha usanifu cha pili cha Sternberg, Vituo vya Jamii na Vyama vya Wanafunzi, ambavyo aliandika kwa kushirikiana na mkewe Barbara Sternberg.

Wakati kaya yao ya Sternberg ilipungua kutoka kwa wanachama wanane hadi watatu, Gene alianza mabadiliko kutoka kwa mazoezi yake ya kitaalam kwenda jukumu mpya na "mji mpya." Tangu 1949, Sternbergs walikuwa wamefurahiya kutumia wakati katika msimu wa joto katika kabati waliloijenga huko Evergreen, maili 30 ndani ya mwinuko magharibi mwa Denver. Kufikia 1970, Evergreen alikuwa katika mchakato wa mabadiliko kutoka kwa mapumziko ya majira ya joto ya mlima hadi jamii ya mwaka mzima ndani ya umbali wa kusafiri kwa Denver. Sternbergs waliuza nyumba iliyothaminiwa ambayo Eugene alikuwa ameibuni kwa familia huko Orchard Hills, na kuhamia katika nyumba ya kumbukumbu ya zamani kwenye ukingo wa Evergreen's Upper Bear Creek, Colorado na binti yao mdogo.

Baada ya kuhitimu, Sternberg alialikwa kujiunga na kampuni ya Abercrombie huko London, ambapo alifanya kazi sana katika kupanga vitongoji vipya kuchukua nafasi ya nyumba iliyoharibiwa na mabomu ya Ujerumani. Sternberg pia alifundisha kwa muda katika Chuo Kikuu cha Cambridge, Chuo Kikuu cha London na Regent Street Polytechnic. Vita vilipomalizika, Sternberg na Barbara Edward, mchumba wake wa Uingereza, waliamua kuhamia Merika. Ili kukamilisha hili, kila mmoja alilazimika kupata kazi huko Sternberg ya Merika alipokea mkataba wa miaka tatu wa kufundisha mipango ya jiji katika Chuo Kikuu cha Cornell. Barbara alipata nafasi katika Huduma za Habari za Uingereza huko Manhattan. Gene na Barbara waliolewa huko Ithaca, New York mwishoni mwa mwaka wa 1946. Hivi karibuni Sternberg hakuridhika na ukosefu wa jumla wa shughuli za ubunifu katika idara za usanifu na mipango za Cornell, na alikatishwa tamaa wakati alipogundua kuwa washiriki wa kitivo cha wakati wote walikatazwa kufanya mazoezi. Alijiuzulu kutoka chuo kikuu cha kifahari baada ya miezi mitatu na kuchukua changamoto za mgeni katika nchi isiyojulikana, bila kazi na mawasiliano machache ya kitaalam. Kwa bahati nzuri, historia na sifa za Sternberg zilimwomba Carl Feiss, mkurugenzi wa shule mpya ya usanifu na mipango katika Chuo Kikuu cha Denver, ambapo Sternberg alikua profesa wa kubuni. Sternbergs, na mtoto wa wiki sita, walichukua ndege yao ya kwanza mnamo Agosti 1947 kwenda nyumbani mpya katika jiji na hali ambayo walikuwa hawajawahi kusikia.

Josef von Sternberg alizaliwa Jonas Sternberg kwa familia duni ya Wayahudi huko Vienna, wakati huo sehemu ya ufalme wa Austro-Hungary. Wakati Sternberg alikuwa na umri wa miaka mitatu, baba yake Moses Sternberg, askari wa zamani katika jeshi la Austria-Hungary, alihamia Merika kutafuta kazi. Mama yake, Serafin née Singer, na watoto wake walijiunga na Musa huko Amerika mnamo 1901 wakati kijana huyo Sternberg alikuwa saba. Jonas alienda shule ya umma huko hadi familia hiyo, isipokuwa Musa, ilirudi Vienna miaka mitatu baadaye. Katika maisha yake yote, Sternberg angebeba kumbukumbu wazi za Vienna na nostalgia kwa "wakati wake wa kufurahi zaidi wa utoto."

Kwa Gerald Schlessman, Sternberg iliyoundwa Hillcrest Apartments, jengo la ghorofa ya juu ya biashara huko Denver ya kati. Alifadhaika kwa dhati aliposikia, karibu mwaka mmoja baada ya kukamilika kwa mradi huo, kwamba Schlessman alikuwa akipoteza pesa juu yake na alikuwa ameiuza. Alikwenda kuzungumza na mteja wake na kuelezea wasiwasi wake. "Usitoe wazo, Gene," Schlessman alisema, "naweza kutumia hasara kila wakati." Hoja hiyo ilizidi uzoefu wa kibinafsi wa kifedha wa Sternberg. Mwisho mwingine wa wigo wa makazi ilikuwa tata ya vitengo vidogo, vya kiuchumi Sternberg iliyoundwa kwa tovuti nzuri inayoangalia mji wa Steamboat Springs. Hivi sasa, wamiliki wa vyumba wanatafuta mradi ulioteuliwa kuwa na umuhimu wa kihistoria. Wavuti ni ya kuhitajika sana na watengenezaji wanazingatia kung'ara kwa nyumba za bei ghali ili kutengeneza njia ya maendeleo ya denser.

Mradi pekee wa matibabu ambao Sternberg alihisi tamaa kubwa ilikuwa Kituo cha Afya cha Wanafunzi wa Wardenberg huko Boulder. Alikuwa ameshambulia kwa muda mrefu hadharani dhidi ya usanifu wa faini ya Phony Romanesque ya chuo kikuu cha Colorado huko Boulder. Je! Maprofesa wa usanifu huko Boulder hufanya nini, angeuliza, zaidi ya kuchukua wanafunzi wao kwa ziara ya chuo hicho na kuwaonyesha wasifanye? Bingwa wa muda mrefu wa talanta za Sternberg, Vance Austin, alichaguliwa mnamo 1956 kwa C.U. Bodi ya Regents. Austin aliapa kwamba wakati wa ofisi yake, angeanzisha usanifu fulani wa kisasa kwenye chuo hicho. Alifanikiwa, dhidi ya upinzani mkubwa, katika kufanya mradi wa Wardenberg wapewe kampuni ya Sternberg, lakini kisha bila kutarajia aliondoka eneo la tukio wakati aliteuliwa kuiongoza Chama cha Kitaifa cha Mikopo huko Wisconsin.

Sternberg alizaliwa mnamo Desemba 8, 1949, kwa familia ya Wayahudi, huko New Jersey. Sternberg alipata shida ya mtihani kama mtoto. Kama matokeo, alikua mchukuaji wa kutosha wa mtihani. Hii ilimkasirisha na alihoji kwamba mtihani haukuwa kipimo cha kutosha cha ufahamu wake wa kweli na uwezo wa kitaaluma. Wakati baadaye alipata mtihani katika chumba ambacho kilikuwa na wanafunzi wadogo, alihisi vizuri zaidi na alama zake ziliongezeka sana. Mwaka uliofuata, aliunda Mtihani wa Sternberg wa Uwezo wa Akili (Stoma), mtihani wake wa kwanza wa akili. Shida ya kuchukua mtihani ndio iliyosababisha shauku ya Sternberg katika saikolojia.

Mnamo 1950, Sternberg alihusika kwa mara ya kwanza katika muundo wa makazi ya umma huko Denver. Alikuwa mbunifu wa mshauri wa Earl Morris, mbunifu wa muda mrefu wa Denver, kwenye mpango wa tovuti na muundo wa ujenzi wa Nyumba za Sun Valley, mradi wa vitengo 200. Sternberg alikuwa mkosoaji wa wazi wa miradi ya Mamlaka ya Makazi ya Umma ya Denver. Alipigania vikali dhidi ya mapungufu magumu na ya kudhoofisha yaliyowekwa wakati huo na mamlaka ya makazi ili kufurahisha upinzani wa kisiasa wa wajenzi wa nyumba binafsi. Miradi ya makazi ya umma ilibidi kujengwa kwenye tovuti hakuna mjenzi wa kibiashara angezingatia maendeleo. Tovuti hizi zilitengwa kutoka kwa nyumba zingine, na majengo yalipaswa kubuniwa ili kuonekana kuwa mbaya zaidi kuliko nyumba ya kibinafsi maskini. Licha ya vizuizi hivi, Morris na Sternberg walipata maboresho kadhaa. Walianzisha duplexes, tofauti na majengo ya kawaida ya kuongezeka au nyumba ndefu-kama nyumba ambazo zilikuwa na nyumba nyingi za umma za siku hiyo. Mpango wa ugawanyaji uliondoa muundo wa kawaida wa barabara ya gridi ya taifa, na kusababisha urafiki mkubwa na usalama kutoka kwa trafiki kwa wakaazi.

question_en: Where is Fiji located in the world?
pos_context_en: Fiji is the hub of the South West Pacific, midway between Vanuatu and Tonga. The archipelago is located between 176° 53′ east and 178° 12′ west. The 180° meridian runs through Taveuni but the International Date Line is bent to give uniform time (UTC+12) to all of the Fiji group. With the exception of Rotuma, the Fiji group lies between 15° 42′ and 20° 02′ south. Rotuma is located north of the group, from Suva, 12° 30′ south of the equator.
neg_context_title_en: Fiji at the Rugby World Cup
neg_context_en:
Fiji automatically qualified for the 2013 Rugby League World Cup after participating in the 2008 tournament. They took on 
Australia, England and Ireland in the pool stage. In their first match they took on 'the Wolfhounds'. They played at the famous Spotland Stadium, in Rochdale, where Fiji have an historic affiliation with. The Fijians convincingly won by a score of 32-14. As expected Fiji lost to both Australia and England, although they surprised many, as they only conceded 34 points against the teams in each game and they led 2-0 against Australia, and were within a few minutes of taking a half-time lead against England. Fiji would take on 'fierce Pacific rivals' Samoa in the quarter final. They won the, passionate pacific, fixture and they would celebrate with a 22-4 victory. They celebrated even more, as it meant Fiji reached their second consecutive World Cup semi-final. They took on Australia again, but this game was nothing like the group stage fixture. Fiji's errors conceded them 62 points against a classy Australian side. This defeat ended and equalled their best World Cup campaign in their history.

The Fiji national rugby union team has competed at five Rugby World Cup competitions, the first being in 1987. Their best results were at the 1987 and 2007 World Cups where they reached the quarter finals. Fiji also competes in the Pacific Tri-Nations and the Pacific Nations Cup. The Fiji national rugby sevens team is one of the most successful rugby sevens teams in the world. They have won 2 Sevens World Cup titles, the 2005/06 IRB Sevens Series and the 2014/2015 HSBC Sevens World Series. They have also won a number of Hong Kong Sevens titles which is considered the most prestigious annual international Sevens tournament. In the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio, the Fijian rugby sevens team won the country's first gold medal, defeating Great Britain 43-7

Fiji were placed in Pool B of the 2007 Rugby World Cup along with Wales, Canada, Japan and Australia. After beating Japan and Canada in close matches, Fiji rested several key players against Australia for the crucial game against Wales. Australia defeated Fiji 55–12. Fiji's fate in the tournament came down to a "winner advances" game against Wales which Fiji won 38–34 and qualified for the quarter-finals for the second time. Former Wallaby great Michael Lynagh described the see-sawing match as one of the best matches "of all time". Fiji lost their quarter final match against South Africa, however their above expectations performance in the tournament resulted in them moving up to 9th in the world rankings – their highest ever position.

Fiji took part in the 2010 ICC World Cricket League Division Five in Nepal, where they finished sixth and last and in doing so failed to win a single match in the tournament. Fiji then played in the 2011 ICC World Cricket League Division Six and finished sixth and last and in doing so were relegated to 2013 ICC World Cricket League Division Seven.Fiji's most famous player is Neil Maxwell, who played first-class cricket for New South Wales and Victoria in Australia, and for Canterbury in New Zealand in addition to representing Australia A. Nat Uluiviti is the other Fijian to have played first-class cricket for a team other than Fiji, playing for Auckland in the 1950s.

The Fiji Museum is a museum in Suva, Fiji located in the capital city's botanical gardens, Thurston Gardens.
The museum is a statutory body and is under the administration of the Fiji Museum Act and the Preservation of Objects of Archaeological & Palaeontological Interest Act.

Fiji–Solomon Islands relations are diplomatic and other bilateral relations between the Republic of Fiji and Solomon Islands. Diplomatic relations are cordial, although the Solomon Islands government has aligned itself with other countries in the region to urge Fiji interim Prime Minister Voreqe Bainimarama to restore democracy in Fiji. Fiji and the Solomons are both located in Melanesia, and are both members of the Melanesian Spearhead Group. They also participate in other regional organisations including the Pacific Islands Forum. In August 2008, it was announced that Solomon Islands intended to open a High Commission in Suva, and in December the government of Fiji announced that it had "formally endorsed the establishment of a Resident Diplomatic Mission in Suva by the Government of Solomon Islands". Fiji's High Commission to Papua New Guinea is accredited to Solomon Islands.

Fiji's main attractions to tourists are primarily white sandy beaches and aesthetically pleasing islands with all-year-round tropical weather. In general, Fiji is a mid-range priced holiday/vacation destination with most of the accommodations in this range. It also has a variety of world class five-star resorts and hotels. More budget resorts are being opened in remote areas, which will provide more tourism opportunities. CNN named Fiji's Laucala Island Resort as one of the fifteen world's most beautiful island hotels.

Fiji were placed in Pool B of the 2007 Rugby World Cup along with Wales, Canada, Japan and Australia. After beating Japan and Canada in close matches, Fiji rested several key players against Australia for the crucial game against Wales. Australia defeated Fiji by 55–12. Fiji's fate in the tournament came down to a "winner advances" game against Wales which Fiji won 38–34 and qualified for the quarter-finals for the second time. Former Wallaby great Michael Lynagh described the see-sawing match as one of the best matches "of all time". Fiji lost their quarter final match against South Africa, however their above expectations performance in the tournament resulted in them moving up to 9th in the world rankings – their highest ever position. Shannon Fraser and Gregg Mumm from Australia acted as assistant coaches for the period leading up to the world cup and were accredited for much of the Fijians sides success.

Women's participation in netball in Fiji is comparable to men's participation in rugby. The sport started to grow in popularity during the 1970s. Netball has a large amount of grassroots support in Fiji. Games are most often played by girls on Saturdays during the winter, though games can be played at all times of the year. Samoa and Fiji are traditional netball rivals. This rivalry can be seen at events like Pacific Games. Fiji was supposed to host the 2007 World Netball Championship, but a military coup occurred. IFNA decided to move the championship to Auckland instead. Fiji has a men's national team that has competed in the 2009 and 2011 International Challenge Men’s and Mixed Netball Tournament. As of August 2016, the women's national team was ranked number seven in the world.
question_src: Fiji iko wapi ulimwenguni?
pos_context_src: Fiji ni kitovu cha Pasifiki ya Magharibi Magharibi, katikati ya Vanuatu na Tonga. Archipelago iko kati ya 176 ° 53 ′ mashariki na 178 ° 12 ′ magharibi. Meridi ya 180 ° inaendesha Taveuni lakini mstari wa tarehe ya kimataifa umeinama kutoa wakati sawa (UTC+12) kwa kikundi cha Fiji. Isipokuwa Rotuma, kikundi cha Fiji kiko kati ya 15 ° 42 ′ na 20 ° 02 ′ kusini. Rotuma iko kaskazini mwa kikundi, kutoka Suva, 12 ° 30 ′ kusini mwa ikweta.
neg_context_title_src: Timu ya Ligi ya Kitaifa ya Rugby ya Fiji
Fiji kwenye Kombe la Dunia la Rugby
Timu ya Kriketi ya Kitaifa ya Fiji
Timu ya Umoja wa Kitaifa ya Fiji
neg_context_src:
Fiji alihitimu moja kwa moja Kombe la Dunia la Rugby la 2013 baada ya kushiriki katika mashindano ya 2008. Walichukua 
Australia, England na Ireland katika hatua ya bwawa. Katika mechi yao ya kwanza walichukua 'The Wolfhound'. Walicheza kwenye Uwanja maarufu wa Spotland, huko Rochdale, ambapo Fiji wana ushirika wa kihistoria na. Wa-Fiji walishinda kwa kushawishi kwa alama ya 32-14. Kama inavyotarajiwa Fiji walipoteza kwa Australia na England, ingawa walishangaza wengi, kwani walikubali alama 34 dhidi ya timu hizo kwenye kila mchezo na waliongoza 2-0 dhidi ya Australia, na walikuwa ndani ya dakika chache za kuchukua nusu ya kuongoza dhidi ya England. Fiji angechukua Samoa ya 'Fierce Pacific' Samoa katika robo fainali. Walishinda, Pacific wenye shauku, muundo na wangesherehekea na ushindi wa 22-4. Walisherehekea zaidi, kwani ilimaanisha Fiji walifikia nusu fainali ya pili ya Kombe la Dunia. Walichukua Australia tena, lakini mchezo huu haukuwa kitu kama muundo wa hatua ya kikundi. Makosa ya Fiji yalikubali alama 62 dhidi ya upande wa Australia. Ushindi huu uliisha na kulinganisha kampeni yao bora ya Kombe la Dunia katika historia yao.

Timu ya Umoja wa Kitaifa ya Rugby ya Fiji imeshindana katika mashindano matano ya Kombe la Dunia, ya kwanza kuwa mnamo 1987. Matokeo yao bora yalikuwa kwenye Kombe la Dunia la 1987 na 2007 ambapo walifikia robo fainali. Fiji pia inashindana katika mataifa ya Pacific Tri-na Kombe la Mataifa ya Pasifiki. Timu ya Kitaifa ya Rugby ya Kitaifa ya Fiji ni moja ya timu iliyofanikiwa zaidi ya saba ya rugby ulimwenguni. Wameshinda taji 2 za Kombe la Dunia la Saba, safu ya Saba ya Saba ya IRB ya 2005/06 na Mfululizo wa Dunia wa Dunia wa HSBC wa 2014/2015. Pia wameshinda taji kadhaa za saba za Hong Kong ambazo huchukuliwa kama mashindano ya kifahari ya kila mwaka ya saba ya saba. Katika Olimpiki ya Majira ya joto huko Rio, Timu ya Saba ya Rugby ya Fijian ilishinda medali ya kwanza ya dhahabu nchini, ikishinda Great Britain 43-7

Fiji waliwekwa katika bwawa B la Kombe la Dunia la Rugby la 2007 pamoja na Wales, Canada, Japan na Australia. Baada ya kumpiga Japan na Canada katika mechi za karibu, Fiji alipumzika wachezaji kadhaa muhimu dhidi ya Australia kwa mchezo muhimu dhidi ya Wales. Australia ilishinda Fiji 55-12. Hatima ya Fiji kwenye mashindano hayo ilishuka kwa mchezo wa "mshindi wa maendeleo" dhidi ya Wales ambayo Fiji ilishinda 38-34 na kuhitimu fainali ya robo fainali kwa mara ya pili. Mkubwa wa zamani wa Wallaby Michael Lynagh alielezea mechi ya kuona kama moja ya mechi bora "za wakati wote". Fiji walipoteza mechi yao ya robo fainali dhidi ya Afrika Kusini, hata hivyo utendaji wao wa juu wa matarajio katika mashindano hayo ulisababisha wao kusonga hadi 9 katika safu ya ulimwengu - msimamo wao wa juu kabisa.

Fiji alishiriki katika Idara ya Ligi ya Cricket ya Dunia ya ICC ya 2010 huko Nepal, ambapo walimaliza wa sita na wa mwisho na kwa kufanya hivyo walishindwa kushinda mechi moja kwenye mashindano hayo. Fiji basi alicheza katika Idara ya Ligi ya Cricket ya Dunia ya ICC ya 2011 na kumaliza ya sita na ya mwisho na kwa kufanya hivyo waliachiliwa kwa ICC World Cricket League Idara ya Saba.Fiji Mchezaji maarufu ni Neil Maxwell, ambaye alicheza kriketi ya kwanza kwa New A. Kriketi ya daraja la kwanza kwa timu nyingine isipokuwa Fiji, ikicheza Auckland miaka ya 1950.

Jumba la kumbukumbu la Fiji ni jumba la kumbukumbu huko Suva, Fiji lililoko katika bustani za mji mkuu wa mji mkuu, Bustani za Thurston.
Jumba la kumbukumbu ni chombo cha kisheria na iko chini ya usimamizi wa Sheria ya Makumbusho ya Fiji na utunzaji wa vitu vya Sheria ya Archaeological & Palaeontological.

Mahusiano ya Visiwa vya Fiji -Solomon ni ya kidiplomasia na uhusiano mwingine wa nchi mbili kati ya Jamhuri ya Fiji na Visiwa vya Solomon. Mahusiano ya kidiplomasia ni ya kindani, ingawa serikali ya Visiwa vya Solomon imejiunga na nchi zingine katika mkoa huo kumhimiza Waziri Mkuu wa mpito wa Fiji Voreqe Bainimarama kurejesha demokrasia huko Fiji. Fiji na Solomons zote ziko katika Melanesia, na wote ni washiriki wa Kikundi cha Melanesian Spearhead. Pia wanashiriki katika mashirika mengine ya kikanda pamoja na Jukwaa la Visiwa vya Pasifiki. Mnamo Agosti 2008, ilitangazwa kuwa Visiwa vya Solomon vilikusudia kufungua tume ya juu huko Suva, na mnamo Desemba Serikali ya Fiji ilitangaza kwamba "ilisisitiza rasmi kuanzishwa kwa misheni ya kidiplomasia huko Suva na Serikali ya Visiwa vya Solomon". Tume kuu ya Fiji kwenda Papua New Guinea inasifiwa kwa Visiwa vya Solomon.

Vivutio vikuu vya Fiji kwa watalii ni fukwe za mchanga mweupe na visiwa vya kupendeza na hali ya hewa ya kitropiki ya mwaka mzima. Kwa ujumla, Fiji ni marudio ya bei ya katikati ya bei ya likizo/likizo na makao mengi katika safu hii. Pia ina aina ya hoteli na hoteli za nyota tano za ulimwengu. Resorts zaidi za bajeti zinafunguliwa katika maeneo ya mbali, ambayo itatoa fursa zaidi za utalii. CNN iliyoitwa Fiji ya Laucala ya Kisiwa cha Fiji kama moja ya hoteli kumi na tano nzuri zaidi ulimwenguni.

Fiji waliwekwa katika bwawa B la Kombe la Dunia la Rugby la 2007 pamoja na Wales, Canada, Japan na Australia. Baada ya kumpiga Japan na Canada katika mechi za karibu, Fiji alipumzika wachezaji kadhaa muhimu dhidi ya Australia kwa mchezo muhimu dhidi ya Wales. Australia ilishinda Fiji na 55-12. Hatima ya Fiji kwenye mashindano hayo ilishuka kwa mchezo wa "mshindi wa maendeleo" dhidi ya Wales ambayo Fiji ilishinda 38-34 na kuhitimu fainali ya robo fainali kwa mara ya pili. Mkubwa wa zamani wa Wallaby Michael Lynagh alielezea mechi ya kuona kama moja ya mechi bora "za wakati wote". Fiji walipoteza mechi yao ya robo fainali dhidi ya Afrika Kusini, hata hivyo utendaji wao wa juu wa matarajio katika mashindano hayo ulisababisha wao kusonga hadi 9 katika safu ya ulimwengu - msimamo wao wa juu kabisa. Shannon Fraser na Gregg Mumm kutoka Australia walifanya kama makocha wasaidizi kwa kipindi kinachoongoza kwenye Kombe la Dunia na waliidhinishwa kwa mafanikio mengi ya pande za Fiji.

Ushiriki wa wanawake katika mpira wa wavu huko Fiji ni sawa na ushiriki wa wanaume katika rugby. Mchezo ulianza kukua katika umaarufu wakati wa miaka ya 1970. NETBALL ina idadi kubwa ya msaada wa chini katika Fiji. Michezo mara nyingi huchezwa na wasichana Jumamosi wakati wa msimu wa baridi, ingawa michezo inaweza kuchezwa wakati wote wa mwaka. Samoa na Fiji ni wapinzani wa jadi wa mpira wa wavu. Ushindani huu unaweza kuonekana kwenye hafla kama Michezo ya Pasifiki. Fiji alitakiwa kuwa mwenyeji wa ubingwa wa mpira wa miguu wa 2007, lakini mapinduzi ya kijeshi yalitokea. Ifna aliamua kuhamisha ubingwa kwenda Auckland badala yake. Fiji ina timu ya kitaifa ya wanaume ambayo imeshindana katika Mashindano ya Wanaume ya Kimataifa ya Wanaume na Mashindano ya Mchanganyiko wa Mchanganyiko. Kufikia Agosti 2016, timu ya kitaifa ya wanawake ilikuwa nafasi ya saba ulimwenguni.

question_en: When did Yuri Vladimirovich Andropov become General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union?
pos_context_en: Upon Brezhnev's death on November 12, 1982, Yuri Andropov succeeded him as General Secretary and (by extension) leader of the Soviet Union. During his tenure, Andropov sought to eliminate corruption and inefficiency within the Soviet system by investigating longtime officials for violations of party discipline and criminalizing truancy in the workplace. However, upon suffering total renal failure in February 1983, Andropov's health began to deteriorate rapidly. On February 9, 1984, he died after leading the country for only 15 months.
neg_context_title_en: History of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union
General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union
27th Congress of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union
neg_context_en: Yuri Vladimirovich Andropov (; ;  – 9 February 1984) was a Soviet politician and the fourth General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union. Following the 18-year rule of Leonid Brezhnev, Andropov served in the post from November 1982 until his death in February 1984.

Mikhail Gorbachev became the party's general secretary in 1985 following an interregnum after Brezhnev's death in 1982 when the party was led first by Yuri Andropov and then by Konstantin Chernenko. When Brezhnev died Andropov was proclaimed General Secretary within days and by the official coverage in the Soviet media it was clear that he was "the" leader. Andropov died on February 9, 1984 and Chernenko was elected his replacement on February 13 but Chernenko was a compromise stopgap candidate as Gorbachev – Andropov's protege – lacked sufficient support in the Politburo. However, Chernenko was already an ill man and his duties were increasingly carried out by others, particularly Gorbachev, who was nominated by Andrei Gromyko to become General Secretary when Chernenko died. There are indications Gorbachev may have been in control prior to Chernenko's death as he was announced as the new General Secretary the day after Chernenko died on March 10, 1985.

As Yuri Andropov became the new General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, Sagdeev participated in the work of a think tank with Gorbachev as the head, which was mandated to find scientific justifications for the nuclear disarmament. Later, as Gorbachev became the new General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, following Ronald Reagan's Strategic Defense Initiative (SDI), they advised the Soviet leadership not to worry and not to respond by creating a similar program.

In 1964, opposition within the Politburo and the Central Committee led to Khrushchev's removal as First Secretary. Leonid Brezhnev succeeded Khrushchev to the post as part of another collective leadership, together with Premier Alexei Kosygin and others. The office was renamed General Secretary in 1966. The collective leadership was able to limit the powers of the General Secretary during the Brezhnev Era. Brezhnev's influence grew throughout the 1970s as he was able to retain support by avoiding any radical reforms. Yuri Andropov and Konstantin Chernenko ruled the country in the same way as Brezhnev had. Mikhail Gorbachev ruled the Soviet Union as General Secretary until 1990, when the Communist Party lost its monopoly of power over the political system. The office of President of the Soviet Union was established so that Gorbachev still retained his role as leader of the Soviet Union. Following the failed August coup of 1991, Gorbachev resigned as General Secretary. He was succeeded by his deputy, Vladimir Ivashko, who only served for five days as Acting General Secretary before Boris Yeltsin, the President of Russia, suspended all activity in the Communist Party. Following the party's ban, the Union of Communist Parties – Communist Party of the Soviet Union (UCP–CPSU) was established by Oleg Shenin in 1993. The UCP–CPSU works as a framework for reviving and restoring the CPSU. The organisation has members in all the former Soviet republics.

In November 1982, Zia travelled to Moscow to attend the funeral of Leonid Brezhnev, the late General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union. Soviet Foreign Minister Andrei Gromyko and new Secretary General Yuri Andropov met with Zia there. Andropov expressed indignation over Pakistan's support of the Afghan resistance against the Soviet Union and its satellite state, Socialist Afghanistan. Zia took his hand and assured him, "General Secretary, believe me, Pakistan wants nothing but very good relations with the Soviet Union". According to Gromyko, Zia's sincerity convinced them, but Zia's actions didn't live up to his words.

The partisans in Finland were controlled by organs of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union and the NKVD. The three most important people co-ordinating the partisan activity were the NKVD major general Sergey Vershinin, the First Secretary of the Karelian Communist Party Gennady Kupriyanov, and the First Secretary of the Karelo-Finnish Komsomol Yuri Andropov, who later became the leader of the Soviet Union. Andropov's responsibility was to train the Karelian partisans. The headquarters were located in Belomorsk on the shore of the White Sea.

In November 1982, General Zia attended the funeral, in Moscow, of Leonid Brezhnev, the late General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union. Soviet Foreign Minister Andrei Gromyko and new Secretary General Yuri Andropov met with Zia there. Andropov expressed indignation over Pakistan's covert support of the Afghan resistance against the Soviet Union and its satellite state, Communist Afghanistan. Zia took his hand and assured him, "General Secretary, believe me, Pakistan wants nothing but very good relations with the Soviet Union". According to Gromyko, Zia's sincerity convinced them, but Zia's actions didn't live up to his words. Ironically, Zia directly dealt with the Israel, working to build covert relations with Israel, allowing the country to actively participate in Soviet–Afghan War. Helped by "ISI", the Mossad channeled Soviet reversed engineered weapons to Afghanistan. In Charlie Wilson's own word, Zia reported to have remarked to Israeli intelligence service: "Just don't put any stars of David on the boxes".

When Leonid Brezhnev died on 10 November 1982 Yuri Andropov was elected chairman of the committee in charge of managing his funeral. According to "Time" magazine Brezhnev's death was mourned by the majority of Soviet citizens. First World commentators saw this as proof that Andropov would become Brezhnev's successor as general secretary. The political corruption which had grown considerably during Brezhnev's tenure had become a major problem to the Soviet Union's economic development by the 1980s. In response Andropov initiated a nationwide anti-corruption campaign. Andropov believed that the Soviet economy would possibly recover if the Soviet Government was able to increase social discipline amongst workers. Brezhnev's regime was also criticised for ideological laxness and self-indulgence. The gerontocracy established by Brezhnev was slowly phased out by Andropov, and new recruits were appointed to the Party "centre", such as future Premier Nikolai Ryzhkov and Chief Ideologue Yegor Ligachev. Soviet foreign policy had also gone awry during Brezhnev's last years, and by June 1982, just before his death, Ronald Reagan classified the Soviet Union as an "Evil Empire". This hardline diplomatic stance did not wither away before Mikhail Gorbachev initiated the "New Thinking". Support for Marxism–Leninism continued to be evident amongst the Soviet people, however, its base of support slowly withered during the Brezhnev Era. The Soviet people still remained wary of such concepts as liberal democracy and multi-party systems, and because of it, Marxism–Leninism remained the leading belief in the country. Due to the large military buildup of the 1960s the Soviet Union was able to consolidate itself as a superpower during Brezhnev's rule.

The 27th Congress of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union was held from 25 February to 6 March 1986 in Moscow. This was the first congress presided over by Mikhail Gorbachev as General Secretary of the Central Committee of the CPSU. In accordance with the pattern set 20 years earlier by Leonid Brezhnev, the congress occurred five years after the previous CPSU Congress. Much had changed in those five years. Key figures of Soviet politics, Mikhail Suslov, Leonid Brezhnev, Yuri Andropov, Dmitriy Ustinov, and Konstantin Chernenko had died, and Mikhail Gorbachev had become General Secretary of the Party. For this reason the congress was widely anticipated, both at home and abroad, as an indicator of Gorbachev's new policies and directions. The congress was attended by 4993 delegates. It elected the 27th Central Committee.
question_src: Je! Yuri Vladimirovich Andropov alikua lini Katibu Mkuu wa Chama cha Kikomunisti cha Umoja wa Soviet?
pos_context_src: Baada ya kifo cha Brezhnev mnamo Novemba 12, 1982, Yuri Andropov alimfuata kama Katibu Mkuu na (kwa upanuzi) kiongozi wa Umoja wa Soviet. Wakati wa umiliki wake, Andropov alitaka kuondoa ufisadi na kutokuwa na usawa ndani ya mfumo wa Soviet kwa kuchunguza maafisa wa muda mrefu kwa ukiukaji wa nidhamu ya chama na kuhalalisha utapeli katika kazi. Walakini, baada ya kuteseka kabisa kwa figo mnamo Februari 1983, afya ya Andropov ilianza kuzorota haraka. Mnamo Februari 9, 1984, alikufa baada ya kuiongoza nchi kwa miezi 15 tu.
neg_context_title_src: Historia ya Chama cha Kikomunisti cha Umoja wa Soviet
Katibu Mkuu wa Chama cha Kikomunisti cha Umoja wa Kisovieti
Mkutano wa 27 wa Chama cha Kikomunisti cha Umoja wa Kisovieti
neg_context_src: Yuri Vladimirovich Andropov (;; - 9 Februari 1984) alikuwa mwanasiasa wa Soviet na katibu mkuu wa nne wa Chama cha Kikomunisti cha Umoja wa Soviet. Kufuatia utawala wa miaka 18 wa Leonid Brezhnev, Andropov alihudumu katika wadhifa huo kutoka Novemba 1982 hadi kifo chake mnamo Februari 1984.

Mikhail Gorbachev alikua katibu mkuu wa chama hicho mnamo 1985 kufuatia uhusiano baada ya kifo cha Brezhnev mnamo 1982 wakati chama hicho kiliongozwa kwanza na Yuri Andropov na kisha na Konstantin Chernenko. Wakati Brezhnev alikufa Andropov alitangazwa katibu mkuu ndani ya siku na kwa chanjo rasmi katika vyombo vya habari vya Soviet ilikuwa wazi kwamba alikuwa "kiongozi". Andropov alikufa mnamo Februari 9, 1984 na Chernenko alichaguliwa badala yake mnamo Februari 13 lakini Chernenko alikuwa mgombea wa maelewano kama Gorbachev - proteni ya Andropov - ilikosa msaada wa kutosha katika Politburo. Walakini, Chernenko alikuwa tayari mtu mgonjwa na majukumu yake yalizidi kufanywa na wengine, haswa Gorbachev, ambaye aliteuliwa na Andrei Gromyko kuwa katibu mkuu wakati Chernenko alikufa. Kuna dalili Gorbachev anaweza kuwa alikuwa akidhibiti kabla ya kifo cha Chernenko kwani alitangazwa kama katibu mkuu mpya siku hiyo baada ya Chernenko kufariki mnamo Machi 10, 1985.

Kama Yuri Andropov alivyokuwa katibu mkuu mpya wa Chama cha Kikomunisti cha Umoja wa Kisovieti, Sagdeev alishiriki katika kazi ya tank ya kufikiria na Gorbachev kama kichwa, ambacho kilipewa jukumu la kupata udhibitisho wa kisayansi kwa silaha ya nyuklia. Baadaye, Gorbachev alipokuwa Katibu Mkuu mpya wa Chama cha Kikomunisti cha Umoja wa Kisovieti, kufuatia mpango wa ulinzi wa kimkakati wa Ronald Reagan (SDI), walishauri uongozi wa Soviet usiwe na wasiwasi na sio kujibu kwa kuunda mpango kama huo.

Mnamo 1964, upinzani ndani ya Politburo na kamati kuu ulisababisha kuondolewa kwa Khrushchev kama katibu wa kwanza. Leonid Brezhnev alifaulu Khrushchev kwa chapisho kama sehemu ya uongozi mwingine wa pamoja, pamoja na Waziri Mkuu Alexei Kosygin na wengine. Ofisi hiyo ilipewa jina la Katibu Mkuu mnamo 1966. Uongozi wa pamoja uliweza kupunguza nguvu za Katibu Mkuu wakati wa Enzi ya Brezhnev. Ushawishi wa Brezhnev ulikua katika miaka yote ya 1970 kwani aliweza kuhifadhi msaada kwa kuzuia mageuzi yoyote makubwa. Yuri Andropov na Konstantin Chernenko walitawala nchi hiyo kwa njia ile ile kama Brezhnev alivyokuwa. Mikhail Gorbachev aliamua Umoja wa Soviet kama katibu mkuu hadi 1990, wakati Chama cha Kikomunisti kilipoteza ukiritimba juu ya mfumo wa kisiasa. Ofisi ya Rais wa Umoja wa Soviet ilianzishwa ili Gorbachev bado ahifadhi jukumu lake kama kiongozi wa Umoja wa Soviet. Kufuatia mapinduzi ya Agosti yaliyoshindwa ya 1991, Gorbachev alijiuzulu kama Katibu Mkuu. Alifanikiwa na naibu wake, Vladimir Ivashko, ambaye alihudumu kwa siku tano tu kama Kaimu Mkuu kabla ya Boris Yeltsin, rais wa Urusi, alisimamisha shughuli zote katika Chama cha Kikomunisti. Kufuatia marufuku ya chama hicho, Umoja wa vyama vya Kikomunisti - Chama cha Kikomunisti cha Soviet Union (UCP -CPSU) ulianzishwa na Oleg Shenin mnamo 1993. UCP -CPSU inafanya kazi kama mfumo wa kufufua na kurejesha CPSU. Shirika hilo lina washiriki katika jamhuri zote za zamani za Soviet.

Mnamo Novemba 1982, Zia alisafiri kwenda Moscow kuhudhuria mazishi ya Leonid Brezhnev, katibu mkuu wa marehemu wa Chama cha Kikomunisti cha Umoja wa Soviet. Waziri wa Mambo ya nje wa Soviet Andrei Gromyko na katibu mkuu mpya Yuri Andropov walikutana na Zia huko. Andropov alionyesha hasira juu ya msaada wa Pakistan wa upinzani wa Afghanistan dhidi ya Umoja wa Soviet na serikali yake ya satelaiti, Afghanistan ya Ujamaa. Zia alichukua mkono wake na kumhakikishia, "Katibu Mkuu, niamini, Pakistan hataki uhusiano wowote mzuri na Umoja wa Soviet". Kulingana na Gromyko, ukweli wa Zia uliwashawishi, lakini matendo ya Zia hayakuishi kulingana na maneno yake.

Washiriki wa Ufini walidhibitiwa na viungo vya Chama cha Kikomunisti cha Umoja wa Kisovieti na NKVD. Watu watatu muhimu zaidi kuratibu shughuli za kishirikina walikuwa NKVD Meja Jenerali Sergey Versibinin, katibu wa kwanza wa Chama cha Kikomunisti cha Karelian Gennady Kupriyanov, na katibu wa kwanza wa Karelo-Ufini wa Komsomol Yuri Andropov, ambaye baadaye alikuwa kiongozi wa Umoja wa Soviet. Jukumu la Andropov lilikuwa kutoa mafunzo kwa washiriki wa Karelian. Makao makuu yalikuwa katika Belomorsk kwenye pwani ya Bahari Nyeupe.

Mnamo Novemba 1982, Jenerali Zia alihudhuria mazishi, huko Moscow, wa Leonid Brezhnev, katibu mkuu wa marehemu wa Chama cha Kikomunisti cha Umoja wa Soviet. Waziri wa Mambo ya nje wa Soviet Andrei Gromyko na katibu mkuu mpya Yuri Andropov walikutana na Zia huko. Andropov alionyesha hasira juu ya msaada wa Pakistan wa upinzani wa Afghanistan dhidi ya Umoja wa Soviet na hali yake ya satelaiti, Kikomunisti Afghanistan. Zia alichukua mkono wake na kumhakikishia, "Katibu Mkuu, niamini, Pakistan hataki uhusiano wowote mzuri na Umoja wa Soviet". Kulingana na Gromyko, ukweli wa Zia uliwashawishi, lakini matendo ya Zia hayakuishi kulingana na maneno yake. Kwa kushangaza, Zia alishughulika moja kwa moja na Israeli, wakifanya kazi kujenga uhusiano wa kufunika na Israeli, ikiruhusu nchi kushiriki kikamilifu katika Vita vya Soviet na Afghanistan. Imesaidiwa na "ISI", Mossad ilibadilisha silaha za Soviet zilizobadilishwa kwenda Afghanistan. Kwa neno la Charlie Wilson mwenyewe, Zia aliripoti kuwa alisema kwa Huduma ya Ushauri ya Israeli: "Usiweke nyota yoyote ya David kwenye masanduku".

Wakati Leonid Brezhnev alikufa mnamo 10 Novemba 1982 Yuri Andropov alichaguliwa kuwa mwenyekiti wa kamati hiyo anayesimamia kusimamia mazishi yake. Kulingana na jarida la "Time" kifo cha Brezhnev kiliomboleza na raia wengi wa Soviet. Wapeana maoni wa kwanza wa ulimwengu waliona hii kama dhibitisho kwamba Andropov atakuwa mrithi wa Brezhnev kama Katibu Mkuu. Ufisadi wa kisiasa ambao ulikuwa umekua sana wakati wa umiliki wa Brezhnev ulikuwa shida kubwa kwa maendeleo ya uchumi wa Umoja wa Soviet na miaka ya 1980. Kujibu Andropov alianzisha kampeni ya kitaifa ya kupambana na ufisadi. Andropov aliamini kuwa uchumi wa Soviet unaweza kupona ikiwa serikali ya Soviet ingeweza kuongeza nidhamu ya kijamii kati ya wafanyikazi. Utawala wa Brezhnev pia ulikosolewa kwa ubaya wa kiitikadi na kujithamini. Jalada lililoanzishwa na Brezhnev lilitolewa polepole na Andropov, na waajiriwa wapya waliteuliwa kwa "kituo" cha chama, kama vile Waziri Mkuu wa baadaye Nikolai Ryzhkov na itikadi kuu ya Yegor Ligachev. Sera ya kigeni ya Soviet pia ilikuwa imepita wakati wa miaka ya mwisho ya Brezhnev, na mnamo Juni 1982, kabla ya kifo chake, Ronald Reagan aliainisha Umoja wa Soviet kama "ufalme mbaya". Msimamo huu wa kidiplomasia haukukauka kabla ya Mikhail Gorbachev kuanzisha "fikira mpya". Msaada kwa Marxism -Leninism uliendelea kuonekana wazi kati ya watu wa Soviet, hata hivyo, msingi wake wa msaada uliwaka polepole wakati wa Brezhnev. Watu wa Soviet bado walibaki na wasiwasi wa dhana kama demokrasia ya huria na mifumo ya vyama vingi, na kwa sababu yake, Marxism-Leninism ilibaki imani inayoongoza nchini. Kwa sababu ya ujenzi mkubwa wa kijeshi wa miaka ya 1960 Umoja wa Soviet uliweza kujiunganisha kama nguvu kubwa wakati wa utawala wa Brezhnev.

Mkutano wa 27 wa Chama cha Kikomunisti cha Umoja wa Soviet ulifanyika kutoka 25 Februari hadi 6 Machi 1986 huko Moscow. Hii ilikuwa Congress ya kwanza iliyoongozwa na Mikhail Gorbachev kama Katibu Mkuu wa Kamati Kuu ya CPSU. Kwa mujibu wa muundo uliowekwa miaka 20 mapema na Leonid Brezhnev, Congress ilitokea miaka mitano baada ya Bunge la CPSU lililopita. Mengi yalikuwa yamebadilika katika miaka hiyo mitano. Takwimu muhimu za siasa za Soviet, Mikhail Suslov, Leonid Brezhnev, Yuri Andropov, Dmitriy Ustinov, na Konstantin Chernenko walikuwa wamekufa, na Mikhail Gorbachev alikuwa katibu mkuu wa chama hicho. Kwa sababu hii Congress ilitarajiwa sana, nyumbani na nje ya nchi, kama kiashiria cha sera na mwelekeo mpya wa Gorbachev. Bunge lilihudhuriwa na wajumbe 4993. Ilichagua Kamati Kuu ya 27.

question_en: When was the game Plants vs. Zombies released?
pos_context_en: Plants vs. Zombies is a tower defense video game developed and originally published by PopCap Games for Microsoft Windows and OS X. The game involves homeowners who use a variety of different plants to prevent an army of zombies from entering their houses and "eating their brains". It was first released on May 5, 2009, and made available on Steam on the same day. A version for iOS was released in February 2010, and an HD version for the iPad. An extended Xbox Live Arcade version introducing new gameplay modes and features was released on September 8, 2010. PopCap released a Nintendo DS version on January 18, 2011 with content unique to the platform. The PlayStation 3 version was released in February 2011 also with added new co-op and versus modes found in the Xbox 360 version. An Android version of the game was released on May 31, 2011 on the Amazon Appstore, while it was also released to the Android Market (now Google Play) on December 14, 2011. On February 16, 2012, a version was released for BlackBerry PlayBook. Later, a BlackBerry smartphone version of the game was released on January 2013 following the launch of BlackBerry 10. Furthermore, both the original Windows and Mac version of the game have been re-released with additional content in a "Game of the Year" version. In January 2015, a free ad-supported version of the game was released for iOS.
neg_context_title_en: Plants vs. Zombies 2: It's About Time
Plants vs. Zombies 2: It's About Time
neg_context_en: Plants vs. Zombies Heroes is a digital collectible card game in the "Plants vs. Zombies" series, developed by PopCap Games and published by Electronic Arts. On March 10, 2016, it underwent a soft launch in some countries on iOS, before being internationally released on October 18, 2016. This is the first mobile release in the "Plants vs Zombies" series in which players can play as either a Plant or a Zombie.

In May 2013, the Facebook game "Plants vs. Zombies Adventures" was released by developer PopCap Games and publisher Electronic Arts. The gameplay is a tower defense game, players no longer had to defend a single home in front of the zombie horde, and could travel to new locations and engage with new characters. On July 14, 2014, it was announced that Plants vs. Zombies Adventures would close down on October 12, 2014. The Facebook game was removed by November 2014.

In 2014, "", a multiplayer third-person shooter based on "Plants vs. Zombies", was released for Xbox One, Xbox 360, Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 3, and PlayStation 4. On May 5, 2015, it was revealed by Electronic Arts that a new "Plants vs. Zombies" game would be released in Q1 2016. EA CEO Andrew Wilson said that the upcoming game would be a follow-up to "Garden Warfare" and that it would be a bigger and bolder console experience.

Plants vs. Zombies 2: It's About Time is a 2013 free-to-play tower defense video game developed by PopCap Games and published by Electronic Arts. It is the sequel to "Plants vs. Zombies", and was released worldwide on Apple App Store on August 15, 2013 and Google Play on October 23, 2013.

Plants vs. Zombies: Garden Warfare 2 is a third-person shooter video game developed by PopCap Games and published by Electronic Arts. It was released for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One. It is the sequel to "". The game released in February, 2016.

On March 10, 2016, PopCap revealed "Plants vs. Zombies Heroes", which is a card game in the series. It was soft released to certain countries on the same day, and was fully released internationally on October 18, 2016.

In late 2012, PopCap announced that they were working on a sequel to "Plants vs. Zombies". However, the game's status was in doubt shortly after the announcement when the company went through a period of layoffs, which included series creator George Fan. "" released August 15, 2013 as a free-to-play title, and was a time-limited exclusive title for iOS systems before moving to Android later that year.

In August 2012, PopCap announced that they were working on a sequel to their previous game, "Plants vs. Zombies", and that it would include "new features, settings, and situations". In a later announcement, the company confirmed that the new game would be released on July 18, 2013. On June 26, 2013, PopCap announced on their Twitter page that the game would release later than previously announced. On July 9, the game was released in Australia and New Zealand on the iOS App Store and came out worldwide on August 15, 2013. The Android version was released worldwide on October 23, 2013.

Plants vs. Zombies: Garden Warfare is a multiplayer third-person shooter and tower defense video game. It is the third game in the "Plants vs. Zombies" series, developed by PopCap Games and published by Electronic Arts. Like its predecessors, the basic premise revolves around plants defending the humankind from a zombie invasion. In the game, players assume control of either plants and zombies, as they engage in combat against each other in various cooperative and competitive multiplayer modes. Upon completing matches and finishing objectives, players earn coins to acquire stickers which unlock customization items and character variants.
question_src: Je! Mimea ya mchezo dhidi ya Zombies ilitolewa lini?
pos_context_src: Mimea dhidi ya Zombies ni mchezo wa video wa utetezi wa mnara uliotengenezwa na kuchapishwa awali na michezo ya popcap ya Microsoft Windows na OS X. Mchezo unajumuisha wamiliki wa nyumba ambao hutumia mimea tofauti ili kuzuia jeshi la Zombies kuingia ndani ya nyumba zao na "kula akili zao". Iliachiliwa kwa mara ya kwanza Mei 5, 2009, na ikapatikana kwenye Steam siku hiyo hiyo. Toleo la iOS lilitolewa mnamo Februari 2010, na toleo la HD la iPad. Toleo la kupanuliwa la Xbox Live Arcade lililoanzisha aina mpya za michezo na huduma zilitolewa mnamo Septemba 8, 2010. Popcap ilitoa toleo la Nintendo DS mnamo Januari 18, 2011 na yaliyomo kipekee kwenye jukwaa. Toleo la PlayStation 3 lilitolewa mnamo Februari 2011 pia na aina mpya ya Co-op na aina ya dhidi ya inayopatikana katika toleo la Xbox 360. Toleo la Android la mchezo huo lilitolewa mnamo Mei 31, 2011 kwenye Appstore ya Amazon, wakati pia ilitolewa kwa Soko la Android (sasa Google Play) mnamo Desemba 14, 2011. Mnamo Februari 16, 2012, toleo lilitolewa kwa BlackBerry Playbook. Baadaye, toleo la mchezo wa BlackBerry la mchezo huo lilitolewa mnamo Januari 2013 kufuatia uzinduzi wa BlackBerry 10. Zaidi ya hayo, toleo la asili la Windows na Mac la mchezo limetolewa tena na yaliyomo katika toleo la "Mchezo wa Mwaka". Mnamo Januari 2015, toleo la bure la AD-SURGED la mchezo huo lilitolewa kwa iOS.
neg_context_title_src: Mimea dhidi ya Mashujaa wa Zombies
Mimea dhidi ya Zombies 2: Ni karibu wakati
Mimea dhidi ya Zombies: Vita vya Bustani 2
Mimea dhidi ya Zombies 2: Ni karibu wakati
Mimea dhidi ya Zombies: Vita vya bustani
neg_context_src: Mimea dhidi ya Mashujaa wa Zombies ni mchezo wa kadi ya dijiti inayounganika katika safu ya "Mimea dhidi ya Zombies", iliyoundwa na Michezo ya Popcap na kuchapishwa na Sanaa ya Elektroniki. Mnamo Machi 10, 2016, ilifanya uzinduzi laini katika nchi zingine kwenye iOS, kabla ya kutolewa kimataifa mnamo Oktoba 18, 2016. Hii ndio toleo la kwanza la rununu katika safu ya "Mimea vs Zombies" ambayo wachezaji wanaweza kucheza kama mmea au zombie.

Mnamo Mei 2013, mchezo wa Facebook "Mimea dhidi ya Zombies Adventures" ilitolewa na Michezo ya Wasanidi Programu wa Popcap na Sanaa ya Elektroniki ya Mchapishaji. Mchezo wa michezo ni mchezo wa ulinzi wa mnara, wachezaji hawakulazimika kutetea nyumba moja mbele ya Zombie Horde, na wangeweza kusafiri kwenda kwenye maeneo mapya na kujihusisha na wahusika wapya. Mnamo Julai 14, 2014, ilitangazwa kuwa Mimea dhidi ya Zombies Adventures ingefunga mnamo Oktoba 12, 2014. Mchezo wa Facebook uliondolewa mnamo Novemba 2014.

Mnamo mwaka wa 2014, "", mpiga risasi wa mtu wa tatu anayetokana na "Mimea dhidi ya Zombies", ilitolewa kwa Xbox One, Xbox 360, Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 3, na PlayStation 4. Mei 5, 2015, ilifunuliwa na Sanaa ya Elektroniki kuwa "Mimea dhidi ya Zombies" ingeondolewa. Ufuatiliaji wa "Vita vya Bustani" na kwamba itakuwa uzoefu mkubwa na wa ujasiri.

Mimea dhidi ya Zombies 2: Ni karibu wakati ni mchezo wa video wa utetezi wa bure wa 2013 uliotengenezwa na Michezo ya Popcap na kuchapishwa na Sanaa ya Elektroniki. Ni safu inayofuata ya "Mimea dhidi ya Zombies", na ilitolewa ulimwenguni kote kwenye Duka la App App mnamo Agosti 15, 2013 na Google Play mnamo Oktoba 23, 2013.

Mimea dhidi ya Zombies: Vita vya Bustani 2 ni mchezo wa video wa mtu wa tatu uliotengenezwa na michezo ya popcap na kuchapishwa na Sanaa ya Elektroniki. Ilitolewa kwa Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4 na Xbox One. Ni safu inayofuata kwa "". Mchezo uliotolewa mnamo Februari, 2016.

Mnamo Machi 10, 2016, popcap ilifunua "Mimea dhidi ya Mashujaa wa Zombies", ambayo ni mchezo wa kadi katika safu. Iliachiliwa laini kwa nchi fulani siku hiyo hiyo, na ilitolewa kikamilifu kimataifa mnamo Oktoba 18, 2016.

Mwishoni mwa mwaka wa 2012, POPCAP ilitangaza kwamba walikuwa wakifanya kazi kwa safu ya "Mimea dhidi ya Zombies". Walakini, hali ya mchezo huo ilikuwa na shaka muda mfupi baada ya tangazo wakati kampuni hiyo ilipitia kipindi cha kazi, ambayo ni pamoja na muundaji wa mfululizo George Fan. "" Iliyotolewa Agosti 15, 2013 kama jina la bure-kucheza, na ilikuwa jina la kipekee la wakati wa Mifumo ya iOS kabla ya kuhamia Android baadaye mwaka huo.

Mnamo Agosti 2012, POPCAP ilitangaza kwamba walikuwa wakifanya kazi kwenye mchezo wao wa zamani, "Mimea dhidi ya Zombies", na kwamba itajumuisha "huduma mpya, mipangilio, na hali". Katika tangazo la baadaye, kampuni hiyo ilithibitisha kwamba mchezo huo mpya utatolewa mnamo Julai 18, 2013. Mnamo Juni 26, 2013, POPCAP ilitangaza kwenye ukurasa wao wa Twitter kwamba mchezo huo utaachilia baadaye kuliko ilivyotangazwa hapo awali. Mnamo Julai 9, mchezo huo ulitolewa huko Australia na New Zealand kwenye Duka la Programu ya iOS na ukatoka ulimwenguni mnamo Agosti 15, 2013. Toleo la Android lilitolewa ulimwenguni mnamo Oktoba 23, 2013.

Mimea dhidi ya Zombies: Vita vya bustani ni mpiga risasi wa tatu na mchezo wa video wa utetezi. Ni mchezo wa tatu katika safu ya "Mimea dhidi ya Zombies", iliyoundwa na michezo ya popcap na kuchapishwa na Sanaa ya Elektroniki. Kama watangulizi wake, msingi wa msingi unazunguka mimea inayotetea wanadamu kutoka kwa uvamizi wa zombie. Katika mchezo huo, wachezaji huchukua udhibiti wa mimea na Riddick, kwani wanashiriki katika vita dhidi ya kila mmoja kwa njia mbali mbali za ushirika na za ushindani. Baada ya kumaliza mechi na malengo ya kumaliza, wachezaji hupata sarafu kupata stika ambazo hufungua vitu vya ubinafsishaji na anuwai ya tabia.
report_src: Mchezo “Mimea dhidi ya Zombies” ulianza rasmi tarehe 5 Mei 2009 kwa Microsoft Windows na OS X, na toleo hilo liliwekwa pia kwenye Steam siku hiyohiyo [1]. Ufuatiliaji wa matoleo mengine uliendelea: iOS ilipata toleo lake Februari 2010 (pamoja na toleo la HD kwa iPad), Xbox Live Arcade ilipokea toleo lililo na aina mpya za mchezo mnamo 8 Septemba 2010, na Nintendo DS ikapata toleo lenye yaliyomo ya kipekee 18 Januari 2011 [1]. PlayStation 3 ilifuata Februari 2011, ikiambatana na modi za Co-op na Versus kama zile za Xbox 360 [1]. Toleo la Android liliwasili kwanza kwenye Amazon Appstore tarehe 31 Mei 2011, kisha Google Play (zamani Android Market) mnamo 14 Desemba 2011 [1]. BlackBerry Playbook ilipata toleo lake 16 Februari 2012, na baadaye toleo maalum kwa BlackBerry 10 mnamo Januari 2013 [1]. Hatimaye, toleo la “Game of the Year” lilirudishwa kwa Windows na Mac, na Januari 2015 likaibuka toleo la bure lenye matangazo kwa iOS [1].

question_en: When did Bob Fitzsimmons start professional boxing?
pos_context_en: Boxing record books show Fitzsimmons officially began boxing professionally in 1883, in Australia. He beat Jim Crawford there by getting a knockout in three rounds. Fitzsimmons had his first 28 definite professional fights in Australia, where he lost the Australian Middleweight title to Mick Dooley (rumours spoke of a fixed bout) and where he also won a fight by knockout while on the floor: when Edward Starlight Robins dropped Fitzsimmons to the canvas in round nine of their fight, he also broke his hand and could not continue, therefore the referee declared Fitzsimmons the winner by a knockout.
neg_context_en: In the early 1880s Jem Mace, an English bare-knuckle boxer, travelled to New Zealand, and Timaru hosted both his boxing school, and the first boxing championships held in New Zealand. Fitzsimmons entered the tournament, and knocked out four opponents on his way to winning the competition. He successfully defended his title in the subsequent competition. During one of these tournament, it is often suggested that Fitzsimmons defeated Herbert Slade, a professional heavyweight boxer who was touring with Mace, but Slade was touted as being undefeated in 1883, and it is possible that it was Slade's brother that Fitzsimmons beat. After these tournaments, Fitzsimmons boxed at least six times in New Zealand, including some bare knuckle bouts, but it is unclear if he received payment for his fights during this time.

The Fitzsimmons vs Sharkey Heavyweight Championship boxing match between Bob Fitzsimmons and Tom Sharkey was awarded by referee Wyatt Earp to Sharkey after Fitzsimmons knocked Sharkey to the mat. Earp ruled that Fitzsimmons had hit Sharkey when he was down, but very few witnessed the purported foul. The fans at the December 2, 1896 fight in San Francisco booed Earp's decision. It was the first heavyweight championship fight since James J. Corbett, the prior champion, had retired from boxing the year before. The fight may have been the most anticipated fight on American soil that year.
In June 1901 Fitzsimmons took part in a wrestling match against Gus Ruhlin. He lost and went back to boxing. He then enjoyed legitimate boxing knockouts of leading contenders Ruhlin and Tom Sharkey.

Fitzsimmons spent the next two years fighting non-title bouts and exhibitions until giving Hall a chance at the title in 1893. He retained the crown by a knockout in round four. He spent the rest of that year doing exhibitions, and on 2 June, he had scheduled a two-way exhibition where he would demonstrate in public how to hit the boxing bag and then how to box against a real opponent. Reportedly, two freak accidents happened that day: Fitzsimmons hit the bag so hard that it broke, and then his opponent of that day allegedly slipped, getting hit in the head and the boxing exhibition was cancelled.

The Fitzsimmons-Maher Prizefight (February 21, 1896), also considered, unofficially, as the 1896 World Heavyweight Championship, occurred between Bob Fitzsimmons and Peter Maher on a sandbar in the Rio Grande River just far enough outside of the American city of Langtry, Texas, in which state boxing was illegal, to be considered technically in the Mexican state of Coahuila de Zaragoza. Fitzsimmons was victorious, knocking Maher out in the first round; however, upon hearing of the outcome of the fight, the 1895 World Heavyweight Champion James J. Corbett immediately rescinded his retirement.

Robert James Fitzsimmons (26 May 1863 – 22 October 1917) was a British professional boxer who made boxing history as the sport's first three-division world champion. He also achieved fame for beating Gentleman Jim Corbett, (the man who beat John L. Sullivan), and he is in "The Guinness Book of World Records" as the lightest heavyweight champion. Nicknamed "Ruby Robert" and "The Freckled Wonder", he took pride in his lack of scars and appeared in the ring wearing heavy woollen underwear to conceal the disparity between his trunk and leg-development. He was also known for his pure fighting skills due to dislike of training for fights, which cost him at times in his career.
The first triple champion of boxing was Bob Fitzsimmons when he added the Light Heavyweight crown to his World Middleweight and Heavyweight belts on November 25, 1903.

The statue "Peace" on the Dewey Arch was modelled on Fitsimmons by the sculptor Daniel Chester French. A statue of Fitzsimmons has also stood in the city centre of Timaru, New Zealand, since 1987. It was commissioned by New Zealand millionaire boxing fan Bob Jones and sculpted by Margriet Windhausen.

After vacating the Middleweight title, Fitzsimmons began campaigning at heavyweight (the light heavyweight division did not exist at that time). On 2 December 1896, the San Francisco Athletic Club sponsored a fight at the Mechanics' Pavilion in San Francisco between Fitzsimmons and Tom Sharkey. Unable to find a referee, they called on former lawman Wyatt Earp. He had officiated 30 or so matches in earlier days, though not under the Marquess of Queensberry rules. The fight may have been the most anticipated fight on American soil that year. Fitzsimmons was favoured to win, and bets flowed heavily his way. Earp entered the ring still armed with his customary Colt .45 and drew a lot of attention when he had to be disarmed. He later said he forgot he was wearing it. Fitzsimmons was taller and quicker than Sharkey and dominated the fight from the opening bell. In the eighth round, Fitzsimmons hit Sharkey with his famed "solar plexus punch," an uppercut under the heart that could render a man temporarily helpless. The punch caught Sharkey, Earp, and most of the crowd by surprise, and Sharkey dropped, clutched his groin, and rolled on the canvas, screamed foul.
question_src: Je! Bob Fitzsimmons alianza lini ndondi za kitaalam?
pos_context_src: Vitabu vya rekodi ya ndondi vinaonyesha Fitzsimmons ilianza rasmi ndondi taaluma mnamo 1883, huko Australia. Alimpiga Jim Crawford hapo kwa kupata kugonga kwa raundi tatu. Fitzsimmons alikuwa na mapigano yake ya kwanza 28 ya kitaalam huko Australia, ambapo alipoteza taji la uzito wa kati wa Australia kwa Mick Dooley (Rumors aliongea juu ya bout iliyowekwa) na ambapo pia alishinda mapigano kwa kugonga wakati wa sakafu: wakati Edward alivunja mkono wake na kwa sababu hiyo ilivunja mkono wake, wakati huo huo, alipovunja mkono wake wa Fit. Knockout.
neg_context_title_src: Orodha ya mabingwa wa ndondi mara tatu
neg_context_src: Mwanzoni mwa miaka ya 1880 Jem Mace, boxer wa Kiingereza-aliye na bata, alisafiri kwenda New Zealand, na Timaru alishiriki shule yake ya ndondi, na Mashindano ya kwanza ya ndondi yaliyofanyika New Zealand. Fitzsimmons aliingia kwenye mashindano hayo, na kugonga wapinzani wanne akiwa njiani kushinda mashindano. Alifanikiwa kutetea jina lake katika mashindano ya baadaye. Wakati wa moja ya mashindano haya, mara nyingi inashauriwa kwamba Fitzsimmons alishinda Herbert Slade, mtaalam wa ndondi mzito ambaye alikuwa akitembelea na Mace, lakini Slade alipewa alama ya 1883, na inawezekana kwamba alikuwa kaka wa Slade kwamba Fitzsimmons alipiga. Baada ya mashindano haya, Fitzsimmons iliorodhesha angalau mara sita huko New Zealand, pamoja na kupunguka kwa nguvu, lakini haijulikani ikiwa alipokea malipo kwa mapigano yake wakati huu.

Mechi ya Boxing ya Fitzsimmons vs Sharkey Heavyweight kati ya Bob Fitzsimmons na Tom Sharkey ilipewa na mwamuzi Wyatt Earp kwa Sharkey baada ya Fitzsimmons kugonga Sharkey kwa Mat. Earp aliamua kwamba Fitzsimmons alikuwa amegonga Sharkey wakati alikuwa chini, lakini wachache sana walishuhudia mchafu uliotengwa. Mashabiki katika mapigano ya Desemba 2, 1896 katika uamuzi wa San Francisco aliongezeka. Ilikuwa pambano la kwanza la ubingwa wa uzito tangu James J. Corbett, bingwa wa hapo awali, alikuwa amestaafu kutoka kwa ndondi mwaka uliopita. Pigano hilo linaweza kuwa mapigano yanayotarajiwa sana kwenye mchanga wa Amerika mwaka huo.

Mnamo Juni 1901 Fitzsimmons alishiriki katika mechi ya mieleka dhidi ya Gus Ruhlin. Alipoteza na kurudi kwenye ndondi. Kisha alifurahia viboreshaji halali vya ndondi ya wagombea wanaoongoza Ruhlin na Tom Sharkey.

Fitzsimmons alitumia miaka miwili ijayo kupigana na vibanda visivyo vya kichwa na maonyesho hadi akimpa Hall nafasi katika taji mnamo 1893. Alibakiza taji hiyo kwa kugonga kwa pande zote nne. Alitumia mwaka huo wote kufanya maonyesho, na mnamo 2 Juni, alikuwa amepanga maonyesho ya njia mbili ambapo angeonyesha hadharani jinsi ya kugonga begi la ndondi na kisha jinsi ya sanduku dhidi ya mpinzani wa kweli. Inasemekana, ajali mbili mbaya zilitokea siku hiyo: Fitzsimmons aligonga begi hilo kwa bidii hadi ikavunjika, na kisha mpinzani wake wa siku hiyo anayedaiwa kuteremka, akipigwa kichwani na maonyesho ya ndondi yalifutwa.

Fitzsimmons-Maher Priwafight (Februari 21, 1896), pia ilizingatiwa, bila malipo, kama ubingwa wa 1896 World Heavyweight, ulitokea kati ya Bob Fitzsimmons na Peter Maher kwenye sandbar katika Rio Grande River tu nje ya Jiji la Amerika la Langtry, Texas, katika Jimbo la Nchi lilikuwa la haramu. Zaragoza. Fitzsimmons alikuwa mshindi, akimgonga Maher katika mzunguko wa kwanza; Walakini, aliposikia matokeo ya mapigano hayo, bingwa wa uzito wa ulimwengu wa 1895 James J. Corbett mara moja aliokoa kustaafu kwake.

Robert James Fitzsimmons (26 Mei 1863-22 Oktoba 1917) alikuwa mtaalam wa Briteni ambaye alifanya historia ya ndondi kama bingwa wa ulimwengu wa tatu wa mgawanyiko wa tatu. Alipata pia umaarufu wa kumpiga muungwana Jim Corbett, (mtu ambaye alimpiga John L. Sullivan), na yuko katika "Kitabu cha Guinness of World Record" kama bingwa wa uzani mzito zaidi. Aliitwa "Ruby Robert" na "The Freckled Wonder", alijivunia ukosefu wake wa makovu na alionekana kwenye pete akiwa amevaa chupi nzito ya kuficha utofauti kati ya shina lake na maendeleo ya mguu. Alijulikana pia kwa ustadi wake safi wa mapigano kutokana na kutopenda mafunzo ya mapigano, ambayo yalimgharimu wakati mwingine katika kazi yake.
Bingwa wa kwanza wa ndondi alikuwa Bob Fitzsimmons wakati alipoongeza taji nyepesi kwa uzani wake wa kati na mikanda nzito mnamo Novemba 25, 1903.

Sanamu "Amani" kwenye Arch ya Dewey ilibadilishwa juu ya Fitsimmons na sanamu Daniel Chester French. Sanamu ya Fitzsimmons pia imesimama katikati mwa jiji la Timaru, New Zealand, tangu 1987. Iliagizwa na shabiki wa ndondi wa New Zealand Millionaire Bob Jones na kuchonga na Margriet Windhausen.

Baada ya kutoka kwa taji la uzani wa kati, Fitzsimmons alianza kufanya kampeni kwa uzani mzito (mgawanyiko wa uzani wa uzani haukuwepo wakati huo). Mnamo tarehe 2 Desemba 1896, Klabu ya Athletic ya San Francisco ilifadhili mapigano kwenye ukumbi wa Mechanics huko San Francisco kati ya Fitzsimmons na Tom Sharkey. Haikuweza kupata mwamuzi, walimwita mtu wa zamani wa Lawman Wyatt Earp. Alikuwa ameongoza mechi 30 au zaidi katika siku za mapema, ingawa sio chini ya Marquess ya sheria za Queensberry. Pigano hilo linaweza kuwa mapigano yanayotarajiwa sana kwenye mchanga wa Amerika mwaka huo. Fitzsimmons alipendelea kushinda, na bets zilitiririka sana. Earp aliingia kwenye pete bado alikuwa na silaha na mwana -punda wake wa kawaida .45 na akavutia umakini mwingi wakati ilibidi apate silaha. Baadaye alisema alisahau alikuwa amevaa. Fitzsimmons alikuwa mrefu na haraka kuliko Sharkey na alitawala mapigano kutoka kwa kengele ya ufunguzi. Katika raundi ya nane, Fitzsimmons aligonga Sharkey na "Solar Plexus Punch," njia ya juu ya moyo ambayo inaweza kumfanya mtu bila msaada. Punch ilimshika Sharkey, Earp, na umati wa watu wengi kwa mshangao, na Sharkey akashuka, akafunga groin yake, na akavingirisha kwenye turubai, akapiga kelele.
