question_en: When were stradivarius violins made?
pos_context_en: According to the Finnish Broadcasting Company YLE, Berglund's Stradivarius violin was sold by his heirs in 2012 to the Finnish Cultural Foundation for 1.8 million euros. At the same time the performing artist's rights to Berglund's recordings as well as his valuable collection of orchestral sheet music were donated to the foundation. The latter material will be made available to researchers in ten years' time. The violin will be named Stradivarius ex. Berglund. Mr Berglund's son Juha Berglund, the spokesperson for the family, says that his father had several instruments, but the Stradivari was the dearest to him. Mr Berglund's specific wish was that the violin should stay in Finland. The violin was built in around 1700. The violin is in exceptionally good condition for its age.
neg_context_title_en: Player preferences among new and old violins
neg_context_en:
In his teens Temianka played a Laurentius Storioni of 1780. While traveling under the aegis of the Curtis Institute, he briefly played a loaned Stradivarius, which was exchanged for a Januarius Gagliano. In 1929 Temianka owned the violin made in 1752 by Joannes Baptista Guadagnini. In the 1930s he played a Silvestre violin, with which he made his early Vintage recordings, and subsequently a Januarius Gagliano and a Carlo Bergonzi.
The Stradivarius he played during the years of the Paganini Quartet was the "Comte Cozio di Salabue" of 1727, which was Paganini's own concert violin. It was later played by Martin Beaver, first violinist of the Tokyo String Quartet, which played since 1995 on the same quartet of Stradivarius instruments once owned by Paganini, until the Tokyo String Quartet retired in July 2013. These remarkable instruments—the viola had inspired Paganini to commission Hector Berlioz's "Harold en Italie"—were also played by the Cleveland Quartet for almost 15 years, beginning in 1982, and are presently owned by Nippon Music Foundation of Japan, after deacquisition by the Corcoran Gallery in the mid-1990s for $15 million. They were then played for several years by the Hagen Quartet, and are now in the hands of the Quartetto di Cremona.
When the years of the Paganini Quartet came to an end, Temianka played a Michelangelo Bergonzi of 1759. His recordings of the Handel Sonatas were made on an Andrea Guarneri of 1687.In February 2013, Chapman University endowed the Henri Temianka Professorship in Music and Scholarship in String Studies. The violin played by Albert Saparoff, concertmaster of the Hollywood Symphony, was endowed as the Temianka-Saparoff violin, and is dedicated for the use of a selected recipient while studying there.

Dalley plays a Nicolas Lupot violin, made in France in 1810. Some years ago the quartet members were approached by the Corcoran Gallery in Washington, D.C., which made a very generous offer of possible extended use by the quartet of its rare Stradivarius instruments. Antonio Stradivarius of Cremona produced a life-time of fine instruments. At the time of the offer, there were only 500 violins, fifty cellos, and ten violas still extant. Although much less rare than the Stradivarii, the specific venerable instruments owned and played by the quartet's members, with their craftsmanship, type of wood, varnish, and all of substantial age, together "created such a warmth and complexity of sound that enticed, then seduced each of us." The offer to use the Stradivarii was politely declined. At this writing Dalley has been playing the violin for 75 years. He refers to his violin as his friend.

Du Pré primarily played on two Stradivarius cellos, one from 1673 and the Davidov Stradivarius of 1712. Both instruments were gifts from her godmother, Ismena Holland. She performed with the 1673 Stradivarius from 1961 until 1964, when she acquired the Davidov. Many of her most famous recordings were made on this instrument, including the Elgar Concerto with Barbirolli, the Robert Schumann Cello Concerto with Barenboim and the two Brahms cello sonatas. From 1969 to 1970 she (like Casals before her) played on a Francesco Goffriller cello, and in 1970 acquired a modern instrument from the Philadelphia violin maker Sergio Peresson. It was the Peresson cello that du Pré played for the remainder of her career until 1973, using it for a second, live, recording of the Elgar Concerto, and her last studio recording, of Frédéric Chopin's Cello Sonata in G minor and César Franck's Violin Sonata in A arranged for cello, in December 1971.

In 1885 he came to New York. While in the United States, he made it a practice to visit Hamburg every summer. He reportedly died from grief over the loss of his 1725 Stradivarius violin, which was stolen from him on 31 March 1894. It was his favorite, and he would play on no other in a concert. After Bott's death, a violin was found in the store of Victor S. Fletcher at 23 Union Square which his widow said was the stolen violin. She pointed to various identifying features, and two violin makers, August Gemünder and John Friedrich, testified that it was a Stradivarius, contradicting a Mr. Ross who had purchased the violin from Fletcher and said he did not think it a Stradivarius.

Yo-Yo Ma played his Stradivarius cello called the "Davidov Stradivarius", made in 1712 during Stradivari's "golden period". Itzhak Perlman played his Stradivarius violin called the "Soil Stradivarius", made in 1714 during Stradivari's "golden period". Gabriela Montero played a Steinway concert grand piano, model D-274. Anthony McGill played a Buffet clarinet.

The Lady Blunt is one of the two best-preserved Stradivarius violins in existence. It has survived, like the Messiah Stradivarius of 1716, in near-original condition, since it has resided mostly in the hands of collectors and seen little use. It was built on the PG form, being a mature golden period violin. The violin also retains its original neck. It has been played very rarely; Yehudi Menuhin played it in 1971, when the instrument was up for sale. In 2011 it was described as "the best-preserved Stradivarius to be offered for sale in the past century."

The Messiah-Salabue Stradivarius of 1716 is a violin made by Italian luthier Antonio Stradivari of Cremona. It is considered to be the only Stradivarius in existence in "as new" state. It is in the collection of the Ashmolean Museum in Oxford, England.

There have been many comparisons of Stradivarius and other old violins with more recent violins since 1817. They generally have found no differences in either subjective impressions or acoustic analysis. However, the tests have been criticized on various grounds. In a well-known 1977 experiment, Isaac Stern and Pinchas Zukerman and a classical violin dealer, Charles Beare, listened to a Stradivarius, a Guarneri, and a 1976 British violin. They were also unable to identify which instrument was which, and two of them mistakenly identified the 1976 violin as the Stradivarius.

The Molitor Stradivarius is an antique violin made by Italian luthier Antonio Stradivari of Cremona in 1697, the very beginning of the maker's celebrated "Golden" period. It bears the label "Antonius Stradivarius Cremonensis / Faciebat Anno 1697" and is branded to the lower rib, "Curtis Phila."
question_src: Violins za Stradivarius zilitengenezwa lini?
pos_context_src: Kulingana na kampuni ya utangazaji ya Kifini YLE, Berglund's Stradivarius violin iliuzwa na warithi wake mnamo 2012 hadi Jumuiya ya Utamaduni ya Kifini kwa Euro milioni 1.8. Wakati huo huo haki za msanii anayefanya rekodi za Berglund na mkusanyiko wake muhimu wa muziki wa karatasi ya orchestral ulitolewa kwa msingi. Vifaa vya mwisho vitapatikana kwa watafiti katika muda wa miaka kumi. Violin itaitwa Stradivarius Ex. Berglund. Mwana wa Bw Berglund, Juha Berglund, msemaji wa familia hiyo, anasema kwamba baba yake alikuwa na vyombo kadhaa, lakini Stradivari ndiye aliyependwa sana kwake. Tamaa maalum ya Bw Berglund ilikuwa kwamba violin inapaswa kukaa Ufini. Violin ilijengwa karibu 1700. Violin iko katika hali nzuri kwa umri wake.
neg_context_title_src: Mapendeleo ya wachezaji kati ya ukiukaji mpya na wa zamani
neg_context_src:
Katika vijana wake Temianka alicheza Laurentius Storioni ya 1780. Wakati akisafiri chini ya Aegis ya Taasisi ya Curtis, alicheza kwa kifupi Stradivarius, ambayo ilibadilishwa kwa Januarius Gagliano. Mnamo 1929 Temianka alimiliki violin iliyotengenezwa mnamo 1752 na Joannes Baptista Guadagnini. Mnamo miaka ya 1930 alicheza violin ya silvestre, ambayo alifanya rekodi zake za mapema za zabibu, na baadaye Januarius Gagliano na Carlo Bergonzi.
Stradivarius aliyocheza wakati wa miaka ya Paganini Quartet alikuwa "Comte Cozio di Salabue" ya 1727, ambayo ilikuwa tamasha la Paganini mwenyewe. Baadaye ilichezwa na Martin Beaver, mtawala wa kwanza wa Tokyo String Quartet, ambayo ilicheza tangu 1995 kwenye quartet ile ile ya vifaa vya Stradivarius ambavyo vilikuwa vya Paganini, hadi Tokyo String Quartet alistaafu mnamo Julai 2013. Vyombo hivi vya kushangaza - Harld pia alimchochea Paganie "" " Quartet kwa karibu miaka 15, kuanzia 1982, na kwa sasa inamilikiwa na Nippon Music Foundation ya Japan, baada ya Deacquisition na Jumba la sanaa la Corcoran katikati ya miaka ya 1990 kwa $ 15 milioni. Walichezwa kwa miaka kadhaa na Hagen Quartet, na sasa wako mikononi mwa Quartetto di Cremona.
Wakati miaka ya quartet ya Paganini ilipomalizika, Temianka alicheza Michelangelo Bergonzi ya 1759. Rekodi zake za Handel Sonatas zilitengenezwa kwenye Andrea Guarneri ya 1687.Katika Februari 2013, Chuo Kikuu cha Chapman kililipa udhamini wa Henri Temianka katika masomo ya muziki na masomo. Violin iliyochezwa na Albert Saparoff, Concertmaster wa Hollywood Symphony, ilipewa kama Temianka-Saparoff Violin, na imejitolea kwa matumizi ya mpokeaji aliyechaguliwa wakati wa kusoma hapo.

Dalley anacheza Nicolas Lupot Violin, iliyotengenezwa nchini Ufaransa mnamo 1810. Miaka kadhaa iliyopita washiriki wa quartet walikaribiwa na Jumba la sanaa la Corcoran huko Washington, D.C., ambalo lilitoa ofa kubwa ya matumizi ya kupanuliwa na quartet ya vyombo vyake vya nadra vya Stradivarius. Antonio Stradivarius wa Cremona alizalisha wakati wa maisha wa vyombo vizuri. Wakati wa toleo hilo, kulikuwa na viovu 500 tu, cellos hamsini, na viota kumi bado vimeongezeka. Ijapokuwa ni nadra sana kuliko stradivarii, vyombo maalum vya kupendeza vinavyomilikiwa na kuchezwa na washiriki wa quartet, na ufundi wao, aina ya kuni, varnish, na umri mkubwa, kwa pamoja "iliunda joto na ugumu wa sauti ambayo ilishawishi, kisha ikadanganya kila mmoja wetu." Ofa ya kutumia Stradivarii ilikataliwa kwa heshima. Katika uandishi huu Dalley amekuwa akicheza violin kwa miaka 75. Yeye hurejelea violin yake kama rafiki yake.

Du Pré kimsingi alicheza kwenye Cellos mbili za Stradivarius, moja kutoka 1673 na Davidov Stradivarius wa 1712. Vyombo vyote viwili vilikuwa zawadi kutoka kwa mama yake wa kike, Ismena Holland. Alifanya kazi na 1673 Stradivarius kutoka 1961 hadi 1964, alipopata Davidov. Rekodi zake nyingi maarufu zilitengenezwa kwenye chombo hiki, pamoja na Elgar Concerto na Barbirolli, Robert Schumann Cello Concerto na Barenboim na wawili wa Brahms Cello Sonatas. Kuanzia 1969 hadi 1970 yeye (kama Casals kabla yake) alicheza kwenye Francesco Goffriller Cello, na mnamo 1970 alipata chombo cha kisasa kutoka kwa mtengenezaji wa violin wa Philadelphia Sergio Peresson. Ilikuwa Peresson Cello ambayo Du Pré alicheza kwa kazi iliyobaki hadi 1973, akiitumia kwa pili, moja kwa moja, kurekodi kwa Elgar Concerto, na rekodi yake ya mwisho ya studio, ya Cello Sonata ya Frédéric Chopin huko G mdogo na César Franck's violin Sonata katika mpango wa Cello, mnamo Desemba 1971.

Mnamo 1885 alifika New York. Wakati alipokuwa Merika, aliifanya iwe mazoezi ya kutembelea Hamburg kila msimu wa joto. Aliripotiwa alikufa kutokana na huzuni juu ya kupotea kwa violin yake ya 1725 ya Stradivarius, ambayo iliibiwa kutoka kwake tarehe 31 Machi 1894. Ilikuwa ya kupenda kwake, na hakucheza kwenye tamasha lingine. Baada ya kifo cha Bott, violin ilipatikana katika duka la Victor S. Fletcher huko 23 Union Square ambayo mjane wake alisema ilikuwa violin iliyoibiwa. Alionyesha sifa mbali mbali za kutambua, na watengenezaji wawili wa violin, Agosti Gemünder na John Friedrich, walishuhudia kwamba ni Stradivarius, akipingana na Bwana Ross ambaye alikuwa amenunua violin kutoka kwa Fletcher na akasema hakufikiria ni Stradivarius.

Yo-Yo Ma alicheza Cello yake ya Stradivarius inayoitwa "Davidov Stradivarius", iliyotengenezwa mnamo 1712 wakati wa "kipindi cha dhahabu" cha Stradivari. Itzhak Perlman alicheza violin yake ya Stradivarius inayoitwa "udongo Stradivarius", iliyotengenezwa mnamo 1714 wakati wa "kipindi cha dhahabu" cha Stradivari. Gabriela Montero alicheza tamasha la Steinway Grand Piano, Model D-274. Anthony McGill alicheza clarinet ya buffet.

Lady Blunt ni moja wapo ya vibarua viwili vilivyohifadhiwa vyema vya Stradivarius. Imenusurika, kama Masihi Stradivarius wa 1716, katika hali ya karibu, kwani imekaa sana mikononi mwa watoza na kuona matumizi kidogo. Ilijengwa kwenye fomu ya PG, kuwa violin ya muda wa dhahabu iliyokomaa. Violin pia inashikilia shingo yake ya asili. Imechezwa mara chache sana; Yehuri Menyuhin ilicheza mnamo 1971, wakati chombo hicho kilikuwa kinauzwa. Mnamo mwaka wa 2011 ilielezewa kama "Stradivarius iliyohifadhiwa zaidi inayotolewa kwa kuuza katika karne iliyopita."

Masihi-Salabue Stradivarius wa 1716 ni violin iliyotengenezwa na Luthier Luthier Antonio Stradivari wa Cremona. Inachukuliwa kuwa stradivarius pekee iliyopo katika hali ya "kama mpya". Ni katika mkusanyiko wa Jumba la Makumbusho la Ashmolean huko Oxford, England.

Kumekuwa na kulinganisha nyingi za Stradivarius na ukiukwaji mwingine wa zamani na ukiukwaji wa hivi karibuni tangu 1817. Kwa ujumla hawajapata tofauti katika maoni ya kawaida au uchambuzi wa acoustic. Walakini, vipimo vimekosolewa kwa misingi mbali mbali. Katika jaribio linalojulikana la 1977, Isaac Stern na Pinchas Zukerman na muuzaji wa violin wa zamani, Charles Beare, walimsikiliza Stradivarius, Guarneri, na violin ya Uingereza ya 1976. Pia hawakuweza kutambua ni chombo gani ambacho, na wawili wao waligundua vibaya violin ya 1976 kama Stradivarius.

Molitor Stradivarius ni violin ya zamani iliyotengenezwa na Luthier Luthier Antonio Stradivari wa Cremona mnamo 1697, mwanzo wa kipindi cha sherehe cha "dhahabu" cha mtengenezaji. Inabeba lebo "Antonius Stradivarius cremonensis / faciebat Anno 1697" na inajulikana kwa mbavu ya chini, "Curtis Phila."
report_src: Viwandani na fundi hodari wa Kiitalia Antonio Stradivari, violini maarufu zinazojulikana kama “Stradivarius” zilitengenezwa hasa kati ya takriban 1660 na 1737, kipindi ambacho ndicho cha maisha na utendaji wake wa juu wa kitaalam; hivyo nyingi ya ala hizi zinatoka mwishoni mwa karne ya 17 hadi katikati ya karne ya 18. Mfano mmoja, Stradivarius Ex. Berglund, ulijengwa karibu mwaka 1700, ukiwakilisha muda ambao Stradivari alikuwa katika kilele cha ustadi wake [1].
all_claims: Viwandani na fundi hodari wa Kiitalia Antonio Stradivari, violini maarufu zinazojulikana kama “Stradivarius” zilitengenezwa hasa kati ya takriban 1660 na 1737, kipindi ambacho ndicho cha maisha na utendaji wake wa juu wa kitaalam; hivyo nyingi ya ala hizi zinatoka mwishoni mwa karne ya 17 hadi katikati ya karne ya 18.
Mfano mmoja, Stradivarius Ex.
Berglund, ulijengwa karibu mwaka 1700, ukiwakilisha muda ambao Stradivari alikuwa katika kilele cha ustadi wake [1].

question_en: Does the character Kaine Parker appear in any Marvel films?
pos_context_en: Kaine Parker is a fictional character appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. The character has been depicted as a superhero and former supervillain who serves as an ally, an enemy, and a foil of Spider-Man (Peter Parker) and Ben Reilly. Created by Terry Kavanagh and Steven Butler, the character first appeared in "Web of Spider-Man" #119 (December 1994) as the Jackal's first failed attempt of a clone of Spider-Man. He later appeared as the new Scarlet Spider in the "Marvel Point One" one-shot in November 2011 before starring in his own series.
neg_context_title_en: List of Marvel Comics characters: M
neg_context_en: However, on February 9, 2015, Sony Pictures and Marvel Studios announced that Spider-Man would appear in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU), with the character appearing in an MCU film and Sony releasing a "Spider-Man" film co-produced by Marvel Studios president Kevin Feige and Amy Pascal. Sony Pictures will continue to own, finance, distribute, and exercise final creative control over the "Spider-Man" films. The next month, Marvel Entertainment CCO Joe Quesada indicated that the Peter Parker version of the character would be used, which Feige confirmed in April. Feige also stated that Marvel had been working to add Spider-Man to the MCU since at least October 2014. The following June, Feige clarified that the initial Sony deal does not allow the character to appear in any of the MCU television series, as it was "very specific... with a certain amount of back and forth allowed." In November 2016, Holland revealed that he was signed for "three Spider-Man movies and three solo movies". In June 2017, Holland, Feige and Watts confirmed that a child wearing an Iron Man mask whom Stark saves from a drone in "Iron Man 2" (portrayed by Max Favreau) was a young Peter Parker, retroactively making it the introduction of the character to the MCU.

On July 22, 2011, during the San Diego Comic-Con, Marvel released an image to the audience depicting a burnt sweater of the original Scarlet Spider. This led many readers to assume that Ben Reilly would be returning and taking on the mantle of Scarlet Spider once again. However, through introduction of the Marvel Now event, Marvel Point One showed readers that Kaine Parker would be the main character in the new Scarlet Spider series.

The Ultimate Marvel version of Kaine is depicted as a misguided, disfigured clone who wears a tattered version of Ben Reilly's Spider-Man costume. Like Spider-Man (Peter Parker), Kaine possessed superhuman strength, reflexes, equilibrium and had a spider-sense. Created by ambitious mastermind Dr. Octopus (acting with consent of the CIA), he kidnaps Mary Jane Watson and attempts to give his captive superpowers (via OZ), triggering a transformation into a large red monster despite Tarantula's efforts. While trying to prevent Mary Jane from being taken, Kaine is killed by Nick Fury's Spider Slayers.

It was revealed in the "Marvel Point One" one shot that Kaine is the new Scarlet Spider in his own ongoing series. This was confirmed by editor Stephen Wacker in the "Letters to the Editor" page of "The Amazing Spider-Man" #673.

Kaine makes good on this in the new 2017 series "" where he confronts Ben Reilly upon tracking him to Las Vegas and they get into a fight. Ben convinces Kaine to stand down by arguing that he is genuinely trying to cure Abigail Mercury's terminal condition, but Kaine makes it clear to Ben that he will kill his "brother" for protecting the world if the girl dies and once Ben has saved her life. After Abigail Mercury because Ben tested a new drug on her too quickly, he is attacked by Kaine once again only for Kaine to be "killed" by what appears to be Marlo Chandler. The character that resembles Marlo Chandler then quickly identifies herself as actually being Death in disguise. She offers Ben the chance to restore Abigail Mercury or Kaine to life before she departs. When Ben asks her to save both of them and kill him instead, Death not only heals the other two, but also restores Ben to a healthy physical appearance, affirming that he has made a start on his efforts to redeem himself of his sins as the Jackal.

Alison Mongrain is a recurring character in "The Amazing Spider-Man" comic books during the latter half of the Clone Saga. She served as an agent of Norman Osborn, who had returned to North America to personally finish off Peter Parker and destroy everything he had held dear, which included his unborn child May Parker. In the final storyline of the Clone Saga, "Revelations", Mongrain's task was to poison Peter's pregnant wife Mary Jane Watson, forcing her into premature labor. In the alternate universe of the MC2 "Spider-Girl" title, Mongrain was tracked down by Peter's first clone Kaine, who rescued May from her grip and returned her to Peter and Mary Jane. Having bonded with May whilst keeping her prisoner, Alison returns sometime later with the intent of killing Normie Osborn whose brief tenure as the Green Goblin convince her that he would harm the child that she grew attached to. Spider-Girl. having been informed of her intents by Kaine reassured Mongrain that the child is safe by unmasking herself.

Kaine appears during the miniseries exploring the Clone Saga as it was originally conceived. He is working for both a shadowy figure and Jackal for unknown reasons and attacks Ben Reilly and Peter Parker when they first meet. After Jackal targets Mary Jane, Kaine leads them to Jackal's lair, only for all three to be captured. It is at this point that the two learn that Kaine is another Parker clone. When Kaine sees Gwen Stacy being cloned, he breaks all three free before burning the Mark of Kaine into Jackal's face and breaking his neck. When the building explodes, Kaine escapes, having stolen both Jackal's clone stabilizing agent and a second pod containing an unknown clone for his shadowy boss. The figure is later revealed to be Harry Osborn still alive, with the pod containing a clone of Norman Osborn. The duo have Doctor Octopus make a clone-stabilizing agent. Later, Kaine is shown obtaining the infant May Parker from Allison Mongrain for Harry. He begins having doubts over Harry's plans when he holds the baby. After more soul-searching, he finally convinces himself to defy Harry's orders and returns the baby to Mary Jane Watson before escaping.

The first issue sold over 50,000 copies, but sales dropped to an average of about 22,000 copies being sold per issue by July 2013. The series introduces several new characters in the Marvel world, such as Aracely Penalba (the demigod superhero known as Hummingbird), Dr. Donald Meland and his husband Wally Layton. The character Annabelle Adams is also introduced in the Marvel world as a love interest for Kaine. The characters play pivotal roles in the growth of Kaine as a superhero.

Kaine volunteers for a suicide mission to Earth-3145, where the Inheritors were trapped after the events of Spider-Verse. Kaine recruits Ashley Barton of Earth-807128 (that of Old Man Logan), who is not afraid to make sacrifices and take out the Inheritors, much like Kaine and Otto themselves, and unlike the other spiders. Kaine convinces Jessica Drew of Earth-616 to join the team, and deceives her, telling her the mission is actually a suicide mission to destroy the stone containing Solus' essence that could potentially leave them trapped to die on the radioactive Earth-3145. Lastly, they recruit "Charlie", a Peter Parker from Earth-217, who escaped the abuse of his Uncle Ben and does not believe in power or responsibility. Kaine plans to use Charlie as bait to lure Verna of the Inheritors.
question_src: Je! Mhusika Kaine Parker anaonekana katika filamu yoyote ya kushangaza?
pos_context_src: Kaine Parker ni tabia ya uwongo inayoonekana katika vitabu vya vichekesho vya Amerika vilivyochapishwa na Marvel Comics. Tabia hiyo imeonyeshwa kama msimamizi mkuu na msimamizi wa zamani ambaye hutumika kama mshirika, adui, na foil wa Spider-Man (Peter Parker) na Ben Reilly. Iliundwa na Terry Kavanagh na Steven Butler, mhusika alionekana kwa mara ya kwanza katika "Wavuti ya Spider-Man" #119 (Desemba 1994) kama jaribio la kwanza la Jackal lililoshindwa la Clone ya Spider-Man. Baadaye alionekana kama buibui mpya wa Scarlet katika "Marvel Point One" moja-risasi mnamo Novemba 2011 kabla ya kuanza nyota katika safu yake mwenyewe.
neg_context_title_src: Orodha ya wahusika wa Jumuia za Marvel: m
neg_context_src: Walakini, mnamo Februari 9, 2015, Sony Picha na Marvel Studios walitangaza kwamba Spider-Man angeonekana katika Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU), na mhusika akionekana katika filamu ya MCU na Sony akitoa filamu ya "Spider-Man" iliyotengenezwa na Rais wa Marvel Studios Kevin Feige na Amy Pascal. Picha za Sony zitaendelea kumiliki, kufadhili, kusambaza, na kutumia udhibiti wa mwisho wa ubunifu juu ya filamu za "Spider-Man". Mwezi uliofuata, Marvel Entertainment CCO Joe Quesada ilionyesha kuwa toleo la mhusika wa Peter Parker lingetumika, ambalo Feige alithibitisha Aprili. Feige pia alisema kwamba Marvel alikuwa akifanya kazi kuongeza Spider-Man kwa MCU tangu angalau Oktoba 2014. Juni iliyofuata, Feige alifafanua kwamba mpango wa kwanza wa Sony hauruhusu mhusika kuonekana katika safu yoyote ya runinga ya MCU, kwani ilikuwa "maalum sana ... na kiwango fulani cha kurudi na kurudi." Mnamo Novemba 2016, Holland alifunua kwamba alisainiwa kwa "sinema tatu za Spider-Man na sinema tatu za solo". Mnamo Juni 2017, Holland, Feige na Watts walithibitisha kwamba mtoto aliyevaa mask ya Iron Man ambaye Stark anaokoa kutoka kwa drone katika "Iron Man 2" (iliyoonyeshwa na Max Favreau) alikuwa Peter Parker mdogo, akiifanya kuwa utangulizi wa tabia hiyo kwa MCU.

Mnamo Julai 22, 2011, wakati wa San Diego Comic-Con, Marvel alitoa picha kwa hadhira inayoonyesha sweta ya kuteketezwa ya Spider ya Scarlet ya asili. Hii ilisababisha wasomaji wengi kudhani kuwa Ben Reilly angekuwa akirudi na kuchukua vazi la Scarlet Spider tena. Walakini, kupitia kuanzishwa kwa tukio la Marvel Sasa, Marvel Point One ilionyesha wasomaji kuwa Kaine Parker atakuwa mhusika mkuu katika safu mpya ya Scarlet Spider.

Toleo la mwisho la kushangaza la Kaine linaonyeshwa kama mtu aliyepotoshwa, aliyeharibiwa ambaye amevaa toleo lililopigwa la mavazi ya Spider-Man ya Ben Reilly. Kama Spider-Man (Peter Parker), Kaine alikuwa na nguvu kubwa ya kibinadamu, reflex, usawa na alikuwa na akili ya buibui. Iliyoundwa na Mastermind anayetamani Dk. Octopus (kaimu kwa idhini ya CIA), anamteka nyara Mary Jane Watson na kujaribu kuwapa wakuu wake wa mateka (kupitia Oz), na kusababisha mabadiliko kuwa monster kubwa licha ya juhudi za Tarantula. Wakati akijaribu kumzuia Mary Jane asichukuliwe, Kaine aliuawa na wauaji wa buibui wa Nick Fury.

Ilifunuliwa katika "Marvel Point One" risasi moja ambayo Kaine ndiye Spider mpya ya Scarlet katika safu yake mwenyewe inayoendelea. Hii ilithibitishwa na mhariri Stephen Wacker katika ukurasa wa "Barua kwa Mhariri" wa "Spider-Man" #673.

Kaine hufanya vizuri juu ya hii katika safu mpya ya 2017 "" ambapo anakutana na Ben Reilly akimfuata Las Vegas na wanaingia kwenye vita. Ben anamshawishi Kaine asimame kwa kusema kwamba anajaribu kuponya hali ya mwisho ya Abigail Mercury, lakini Kaine anaweka wazi kwa Ben kwamba atamuua "kaka" wake kwa kulinda ulimwengu ikiwa msichana atakufa na mara moja Ben ameokoa maisha yake. Baada ya Abigail Mercury kwa sababu Ben alijaribu dawa mpya juu yake haraka sana, anashambuliwa na Kaine tena kwa Kaine "kuuawa" na kile kinachoonekana kuwa Marlo Chandler. Tabia ambayo inafanana na Marlo Chandler basi hujitambulisha haraka kama kweli kuwa kifo kwa kujificha. Anampa Ben nafasi ya kurejesha Abigail Mercury au Kaine kabla ya kuondoka. Wakati Ben anamwuliza aokoe wote wawili na kumuua badala yake, kifo sio tu huponya wengine wawili, lakini pia anamrudisha Ben kwa sura nzuri ya mwili, akithibitisha kwamba ameanza juhudi zake za kujikomboa dhambi zake kama Jackal.

Alison Mongrain ni mhusika anayerudia katika vitabu vya ucheshi vya "The Spider-Man" wakati wa nusu ya mwisho ya saga ya Clone. Alihudumu kama wakala wa Norman Osborn, ambaye alikuwa amerudi Amerika Kaskazini kumaliza kibinafsi Peter Parker na kuharibu kila kitu alichokuwa ameshikilia, ambacho ni pamoja na mtoto wake ambaye hajazaliwa May Parker. Katika hadithi ya mwisho ya saga ya Clone, "Ufunuo", kazi ya Mongrain ilikuwa kumtia sumu mke mjamzito wa Peter Mary Jane Watson, na kumlazimisha kufanya kazi mapema. Katika ulimwengu mbadala wa kichwa cha MC2 "Spider-Girl", Mongrain alifuatiliwa na Clone Kaine wa kwanza wa Peter, ambaye aliokoa Mei kutoka kwa mtego wake na kumrudisha kwa Peter na Mary Jane. Baada ya kushikamana na Mei wakati wa kumweka mfungwa wake, Alison anarudi wakati mwingine baadaye kwa kusudi la kumuua Normie Osborn ambaye umiliki wake mfupi kama Green Goblin unamshawishi kwamba atamdhuru mtoto ambaye alikua naye. Spider-msichana. Baada ya kufahamishwa juu ya nia yake na Kaine alimhakikishia Mongrain kuwa mtoto yuko salama kwa kujiondoa.

Kaine anaonekana wakati wa huduma za kuchunguza saga ya Clone kama ilivyokuwa asili. Yeye anafanya kazi kwa takwimu ya kivuli na jackal kwa sababu zisizojulikana na anashambulia Ben Reilly na Peter Parker wakati wanakutana kwa mara ya kwanza. Baada ya malengo ya Jackal Mary Jane, Kaine huwaongoza kwenye Lair ya Jackal, ni kwa wote watatu kutekwa. Ni katika hatua hii kwamba wawili hao hujifunza kuwa Kaine ni mtu mwingine wa Parker. Wakati Kaine anamwona Gwen Stacy akiwa amepambwa, anavunja yote matatu bure kabla ya kuchoma alama ya Kaine usoni mwa Jackal na kuvunja shingo yake. Wakati jengo linalipuka, Kaine anatoroka, baada ya kuiba wakala wa utulivu wa Jackal na sufuria ya pili iliyo na mwamba usiojulikana kwa bosi wake wa kivuli. Takwimu hiyo baadaye inafunuliwa kuwa Harry Osborn bado yuko hai, na sufuria iliyo na mwamba wa Norman Osborn. Duo wana Daktari Octopus hufanya wakala wa utulivu wa Clone. Baadaye, Kaine anaonyeshwa kupata mtoto mchanga Mei Parker kutoka Allison Mongrain kwa Harry. Anaanza kuwa na mashaka juu ya mipango ya Harry wakati anashikilia mtoto. Baada ya kutafuta roho zaidi, hatimaye anajihakikishia kupuuza maagizo ya Harry na kumrudisha mtoto kwa Mary Jane Watson kabla ya kutoroka.

Suala la kwanza liliuza nakala zaidi ya 50,000, lakini mauzo yalipungua kwa wastani wa nakala 22,000 kuuzwa kwa kila Julai 2013. Mfululizo huo unaleta wahusika kadhaa katika ulimwengu wa Marvel, kama vile Aracely Penalba (Demigod superhero inayojulikana kama Hummingbird), Dk. Donald Meland na mumewe Wally Layton. Tabia Annabelle Adams pia huletwa katika ulimwengu wa Marvel kama shauku ya upendo kwa Kaine. Wahusika huchukua jukumu muhimu katika ukuaji wa Kaine kama superhero.

Kaine hujitolea kwa dhamira ya kujiua kwa Dunia-3145, ambapo warithi walinaswa baada ya matukio ya Spider-Aya. Kaine anaajiri Ashley Barton wa Earth-807128 (ile ya mzee Logan), ambaye haogopi kujitolea na kuchukua warithi, kama Kaine na Otto wenyewe, na tofauti na buibui wengine. Kaine anamshawishi Jessica Drew wa Earth-616 ajiunge na timu hiyo, na anamdanganya, akimwambia misheni hiyo ni dhamira ya kujiua ili kuharibu jiwe lililo na kiini cha solus ambacho kinaweza kuwaacha wakiwa wameshikwa ili kufa kwenye mionzi ya 3145. Mwishowe, wanaajiri "Charlie", Peter Parker kutoka Earth-217, ambaye alitoroka unyanyasaji wa mjomba wake Ben na haamini madarakani au jukumu. Kaine anapanga kumtumia Charlie kama bait kumshawishi Verna wa warithi.
report_src: Kwa mujibu wa taarifa zilizoainishwa, Kaine Parker ametambulishwa kama kloni ya kwanza iliyoshindikana ya Spider-Man na amejitokeza hasa katika vitabu vya vichekesho vya Marvel kuanzia “Web of Spider-Man” #119 (1994) na baadaye kama Scarlet Spider mpya mwaka 2011, bila kutajwa kuhusika katika filamu yoyote ya kisuper-hero hadi sasa [1]; hivyo, hakuna rekodi rasmi inayoonyesha kuwa mhusika huyu ameonekana katika filamu yoyote – iwe ndani ya Marvel Cinematic Universe au uzalishaji mwingine wa filamu za kisuper-hero.

question_en: How many members are there in the Canadian Forces?
pos_context_en: This unified institution consists of sea, land, and air elements referred to as the Royal Canadian Navy (RCN), Canadian Army, and Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF). Personnel may belong to either the Regular Force or the Reserve Force, which has four sub-components: the Primary Reserve, Supplementary Reserve, Cadet Organizations Administration and Training Service, and the Canadian Rangers. Under the National Defence Act, the Canadian Armed Forces are an entity separate and distinct from the Department of National Defence (the federal government department responsible for administration and formation of defence policy), which also exists as the civilian support system for the Forces. Current end strength is authorized at 126,500, including 71,500 Regular Force members, 30,000 Reserve Force members and 25,000 civilian employees. The number of filled positions is lower than the authorized strength.
neg_context_title_en: Canadian Forces Morale and Welfare Services
Canadian women in the World Wars
Army, Navy and Air Force Veterans in Canada
neg_context_en: The Armed Forces' 92,600 personnel are divided into a hierarchy of numerous ranks of officers and non-commissioned members. The governor general appoints, on the advice of the prime minister, the Chief of the Defence Staff (CDS) as the highest ranking commissioned officer in the Armed Forces and who, as head of the Armed Forces Council, is in command of the Canadian Forces. The Armed Forces Council also includes the Vice Chief of the Defence Staff, the commanders of the Royal Canadian Navy, the Canadian Army, the Royal Canadian Air Force, Canadian Joint Operations Command, Canadian Special Operations Forces Command, and other key Level 1 organizations. The Armed Forces Council generally operates from National Defence Headquarters (NDHQ) in Ottawa, Ontario. The sovereign and most other members of the Canadian Royal Family also act as colonels-in-chief, honorary air commodores, air commodores-in-chief, admirals, and captains-general of Canadian Forces units, though these positions are ceremonial.

Since 1948, Canada has taken part in many peacekeeping operations, either with the UN or other international organizations. Over 100,000 members of the Canadian Forces have served in these operations. As of January 1, 2000, 107 Canadian soldiers have died in the course of these missions. Canadian soldiers have developed an unusual degree of expertise and are now highly sought after for such missions. Members of Le Régiment de Hull are no exception to the rule: many of them have had an opportunity to participate in missions in Cyprus, Israel, Haiti and the former Yugoslavia. Members most recently served in the former Yugoslavia, Bosnia, Israel, Egypt, the Democratic Republic of Congo and Haiti. Alongside their colleagues in the Regular Force, the members of the Regiment in 1988 shared the honour of receiving the Nobel Peace Prize, which was awarded to "blue helmets" throughout the world.
Le Régiment de Hull was awarded its first battle honour on May 9, 2014, when it was announced that the regiment would receive the theatre honour AFGHANISTAN. The battle honour was presented to the unit on October 14, 2017 during a ceremony presided by the lieutenant governor of Quebec, J. Michel Doyon QC.

CFMWS has over 5,500 staff on bases/wings/units and at headquarters in Ottawa. In partnership with bases, wings, and units the Canadian Forces Regular Forces and Canadian Forces Primary Reserve members, retired and former members, military families, Department of National Defence employees, NPF employees, and Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) personnel, receive the morale and welfare programs, services, and activities needed.

Since 1947, the Canadian Armed Forces have completed 72 international missions. More than 3,600 soldiers, sailors and Air Force personnel are deployed overseas on operational missions. On any given day, about 8,000 Canadian Armed Forces members Royal Canadian Air Force, Royal Canadian Navy, and Canadian Army (one-third of the Canadian deployable force) are preparing for, engaged in or are returning from an overseas mission.

The Canadian Armed Forces currently lists 84 military occupations that are performed by either officer or non-commissioned members. Many occupations – such as training and development officer are common across all three branches, while others such as sonar operator are specific to one element.

On July 2, 1941, the Women's Division of the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF) was created. By the end of the war it totalled some 17,000 members. The RCAF did not train their female recruits to be flying instructors or combatants, although their direct spirit of participation is best described by the division's slogan, "We serve that men may fly". They were initially trained for clerical, administrative and support roles. As the war continued, however, women would also work in other positions like parachute riggers and laboratory assistants, and even in the very male-dominated electrical and mechanical trades. Many RCAF-WD members were sent to Great Britain to serve with Canadian squadrons and headquarters there..

The brigade maintains armoured, artillery, infantry, engineer and service support units to assist Joint Task Force Pacific (JTFP) and Canadian Joint Operations Command with domestic operations support (natural disasters, etc.), as well as supporting the Regular Force units of the 3rd Canadian Division by supporting and augmenting its battle groups. Soldiers of 39 CBG are trained in supporting domestic and also expeditionary operations. Every year many members of 39 CBG volunteer to serve all over the world in UN and NATO deployments. Hundreds of soldiers within the brigade have experience in deploying to the mission in Afghanistan as well as deploying to support the security operations for the Vancouver 2010 Olympic and Paralympic Winter Games.

The Royal Canadian Air Force Band (RCAF Band) () is a 35 member military band which represents the Royal Canadian Air Force in the Canadian Armed Forces. Currently located at Canadian Forces Base Winnipeg, the RCAF Band provides musical accompaniment for ceremonies of the RCAF in Canada. The band is presently under the command of Captain Matthew Clark.

The Army, Navy & Air Force Veterans in Canada is a non-profit Canadian ex-service organization (veterans' organization) founded in 1840, with more than 18,000 members throughout Canada. Membership includes people who have served as military, Royal Canadian Mounted Police, provincial and municipal police, direct relatives of members and also affiliated members. The ANAVETS club also accepts membership from any person who is interested.
question_src: Kuna wanachama wangapi katika vikosi vya Canada?
pos_context_src: Taasisi hii ya umoja ina bahari, ardhi, na vitu vya hewa vinavyojulikana kama Royal Canadian Navy (RCN), Jeshi la Canada, na Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF). Wafanyikazi wanaweza kuwa wa Kikosi cha Kawaida au Kikosi cha Hifadhi, ambacho kina vifaa vinne: Hifadhi ya Msingi, Hifadhi ya Kuongeza, Huduma za Asasi za Cadet na Huduma ya Mafunzo, na Ranger ya Canada. Chini ya Sheria ya Ulinzi ya Kitaifa, Vikosi vya Silaha vya Canada ni chombo tofauti na tofauti na Idara ya Ulinzi wa Kitaifa (Idara ya Serikali ya Shirikisho inayohusika na Utawala na Uundaji wa Sera ya Ulinzi), ambayo pia inapatikana kama mfumo wa msaada wa raia kwa vikosi. Nguvu ya mwisho ya sasa imeidhinishwa saa 126,500, pamoja na wanachama wa kawaida wa vikosi 71,500, wanachama 30,000 wa akiba na wafanyikazi 25,000 wa raia. Idadi ya nafasi zilizojazwa ni chini kuliko nguvu iliyoidhinishwa.
neg_context_title_src: Vikosi vya Canada vya Morale na Huduma za Ustawi
Orodha ya shughuli za kijeshi za Canada
Orodha ya kazi za kijeshi za Canada
Wanawake wa Canada katika Vita vya Kidunia
Jeshi, Jeshi la Jeshi na Jeshi la Anga huko Canada
neg_context_src: Wafanyikazi wa Kikosi cha Wanajeshi '92,600 wamegawanywa katika safu ya safu kadhaa za maafisa na washiriki wasio na kazi. Gavana Mkuu anateua, juu ya ushauri wa Waziri Mkuu, Mkuu wa Wafanyikazi wa Ulinzi (CDS) kama afisa wa hali ya juu zaidi katika vikosi vya jeshi na ambaye, kama mkuu wa Baraza la Vikosi vya Silaha, yuko katika jeshi la Canada. Baraza la Kikosi cha Wanajeshi pia linajumuisha makamu mkuu wa wafanyikazi wa ulinzi, makamanda wa Jeshi la Jeshi la Royal Canada, Jeshi la Canada, Jeshi la Anga la Canada, Amri ya Uendeshaji wa Canada, Amri Maalum ya Operesheni ya Canada, na mashirika mengine muhimu ya kiwango cha 1. Baraza la Kikosi cha Silaha kwa ujumla linafanya kazi kutoka Makao makuu ya Ulinzi wa Kitaifa (NDHQ) huko Ottawa, Ontario. Mfalme na washiriki wengine wengi wa familia ya kifalme ya Canada pia hufanya kama Colonels-Chief, Commodores ya Heshima ya Hewa, Air Commodores-In-Mkuu, Admirals, na Wakuu wa Vitengo vya Vikosi vya Canada, ingawa nafasi hizi ni za sherehe.

Tangu 1948, Canada imeshiriki katika shughuli nyingi za kulinda amani, ama na UN au mashirika mengine ya kimataifa. Zaidi ya wanachama 100,000 wa vikosi vya Canada wamehudumu katika shughuli hizi. Kufikia Januari 1, 2000, askari 107 wa Canada wamekufa wakati wa misheni hii. Askari wa Canada wameendeleza kiwango cha kawaida cha utaalam na sasa wanatafutwa sana kwa misheni kama hiyo. Wajumbe wa Le Régiment de Hull sio tofauti na sheria: wengi wao wamepata nafasi ya kushiriki katika misheni huko Kupro, Israeli, Haiti na Yugoslavia wa zamani. Wajumbe walihudumu hivi karibuni katika Yugoslavia ya zamani, Bosnia, Israeli, Misri, Jamhuri ya Kidemokrasia ya Kongo na Haiti. Pamoja na wenzao katika kikosi cha kawaida, washiriki wa Kikosi hicho mnamo 1988 walishiriki heshima ya kupokea Tuzo ya Amani ya Nobel, ambayo ilipewa "Helmet Blue" ulimwenguni kote.
Le Régiment de Hull alipewa heshima yake ya kwanza ya vita mnamo Mei 9, 2014, wakati ilitangazwa kuwa jeshi hilo litapokea heshima ya Theatre Afghanistan. Heshima ya vita iliwasilishwa kwa kitengo hicho mnamo Oktoba 14, 2017 wakati wa sherehe iliyoongozwa na Gavana wa Luteni wa Quebec, J. Michel Doyon QC.

CFMWS ina wafanyikazi zaidi ya 5,500 kwenye besi/mabawa/vitengo na katika makao makuu huko Ottawa. Kwa kushirikiana na besi, mabawa, na vitengo vya Kikosi cha Kikosi cha Canada na wanachama wa Hifadhi ya Msingi ya Canada, wastaafu na wanachama wa zamani, familia za jeshi, Idara ya Wafanyikazi wa Ulinzi wa Kitaifa, Wafanyikazi wa NPF, na Wafanyikazi wa Royal Canadian waliyopewa Polisi (RCMP), wanapokea mipango ya maadili na ustawi, huduma, na shughuli zinazohitajika.

Tangu 1947, Vikosi vya Silaha vya Canada vimekamilisha misheni 72 ya kimataifa. Zaidi ya askari 3,600, mabaharia na wafanyikazi wa Jeshi la Anga hupelekwa nje ya nchi kwenye misheni ya kufanya kazi. Katika siku yoyote, washiriki wapatao 8,000 wa Kikosi cha Wanajeshi wa Canada Royal Jeshi la Anga la Canada, Jeshi la Royal Canada, na Jeshi la Canada (theluthi moja ya Kikosi cha Kupelekwa cha Canada) wanajiandaa, wanaohusika au wanarudi kutoka kwa misheni ya nje ya nchi.

Vikosi vya Silaha vya Canada hivi sasa vinaorodhesha kazi 84 za kijeshi ambazo zinafanywa na afisa au washiriki wasio na kazi. Kazi nyingi - kama vile Afisa Mafunzo na Maendeleo ni kawaida katika matawi yote matatu, wakati zingine kama vile Sonar Operesheni ni maalum kwa kitu kimoja.

Mnamo Julai 2, 1941, Idara ya Wanawake ya Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF) iliundwa. Mwisho wa vita ilifikia washiriki wapatao 17,000. RCAF haikufundisha waajiri wao wa kike kuwa waalimu wa kuruka au wapiganaji, ingawa roho yao ya moja kwa moja ya ushiriki inaelezewa vyema na kauli mbiu ya Idara, "Tunatumikia kwamba wanaume wanaweza kuruka". Hapo awali walifunzwa kwa majukumu ya kidini, ya kiutawala na ya msaada. Wakati vita inavyoendelea, hata hivyo, wanawake wangefanya kazi katika nafasi zingine kama viboreshaji vya parachute na wasaidizi wa maabara, na hata katika biashara ya umeme inayotawaliwa na wanaume na mitambo. Washiriki wengi wa RCAF-WD walitumwa Great Britain kutumikia na vikosi vya Canada na makao makuu huko ..

Brigade inashikilia vitengo vya kivita, sanaa, watoto wachanga, mhandisi na huduma za kusaidia kusaidia Pasifiki ya Pasifiki (JTFP) na Amri ya Uendeshaji wa Pamoja ya Canada na msaada wa shughuli za ndani (majanga ya asili, nk), na pia kusaidia vitengo vya nguvu vya kawaida vya mgawanyiko wa 3 wa Canada kwa kuunga mkono na kukuza vikundi vya vita. Askari wa 39 CBG wamefunzwa katika kusaidia shughuli za ndani na pia za usafirishaji. Kila mwaka wanachama wengi wa CBG 39 hujitolea kutumikia ulimwenguni kote katika kupelekwa kwa UN na NATO. Mamia ya askari ndani ya Brigade wana uzoefu wa kupeleka misheni nchini Afghanistan na pia kupeleka kusaidia shughuli za usalama kwa Michezo ya msimu wa baridi wa Olimpiki wa Vancouver 2010 na Paralympic.

Royal Canadian Air Force Band (RCAF Band) () ni bendi 35 ya wanajeshi ambayo inawakilisha Jeshi la anga la Royal Canada katika vikosi vya jeshi la Canada. Hivi sasa iko katika Winnipeg ya Kikosi cha Canada, bendi ya RCAF hutoa mwongozo wa muziki kwa sherehe za RCAF huko Canada. Bendi hiyo iko chini ya amri ya Kapteni Matthew Clark.

Jeshi, Jeshi la Jeshi la Wanamaji na Anga huko Canada ni shirika lisilo la faida la huduma ya zamani ya Canada (Shirika la Veterans) lilianzishwa mnamo 1840, na wanachama zaidi ya 18,000 kote Canada. Uanachama ni pamoja na watu ambao wamehudumu kama polisi wa jeshi, Royal Canadian waliowekwa polisi, polisi wa mkoa na manispaa, jamaa za moja kwa moja za wanachama na pia washirika walioshirikiana. Klabu ya Anavets pia inakubali ushirika kutoka kwa mtu yeyote anayevutiwa.
report_src: Vikosi vya Silaha vya Canada vimeidhinishwa kuwa na jumla ya wanachama 126,500, ikijumuisha wanajeshi 71,500 wa Kikosi cha Kawaida, wanajeshi 30,000 wa Kikosi cha Hifadhi na wafanyakazi 25,000 wa raia; hata hivyo, nafasi zote bado hazijajazwa kikamilifu [1].

question_en: What years did Pavlov live?
pos_context_en: Ivan Petrovich Pavlov (; 27 February 1936) was a Russian physiologist known primarily for his work in classical conditioning.
neg_context_en: Pavlov was born into a Russian peasant family in the village of Boris-Romanovka in what is now Kostanay District in Kazakhstan. In 1931-2 he lived in Terensai Stantsy, now in the Adamovsky District of Orenburg Oblast, moving in 1932 to the city of Magnitogorsk in Chelyabinsk Oblast. He completed a basic education and in 1940 finished 3 years of training in the Magnitogorsk Industrial Technical Academy and Magnitogorsk Aeroclub.

Sergey Pavlov was born in 1981 in the city of Vladimir, Soviet Union (now Russia). Pavlov, who was an alcoholic who drank heavily. In a drunken fight, Pavlov stabbed two convicts with a knife - one of the men died and the other was badly injured. For this crime he could have been sentenced for life imprisonment, but he was only sentenced to eight-years imprisonment and was released after five-years. Pavlov was later convicted for two minor crimes but was soon released. For a few years he worked as foreman, where his colleagues described him as an angry, conflicted man who did not have any friends.

A Russian citizen, Pavlov was born in Ukhta, Komi ASSR. He lived in Rostov-on-Don and spent some time in the Russian army. According to a newspaper report by "Georgian Journal" he had serious problems with Rostov’s police while working there at a car wash, since he allegedly went on a drunken joyride in a car stolen from there. 
In an interview, Pavlov states that he had left behind a wife and 5-year-old son in Russia before going to Ukraine, where he then remarried to 21 year old Helen Kolenkinoyu in Slovyansk.

The young doctor Ivan Pavlov wants to live life "honorably and humanely." The path of the scientist is difficult and thorny. The treasury department does not release funds for research nor give access to animals for experimental use and Pavlov has to buy them on his own savings. The experiments follow one another. Pavlov is pursuing his goal with passion and force. For his work on the physiology of digestion he is awarded the Nobel Prize. Pavlov paves the way for objective studies of brain function in higher animals. Zvantsev, the assistant of Pavlov is an idealist who has become an ideological opponent of the scientist-materialist, implores him not to interfere with the "sanctuary of the spirit", but Pavlov boldly ignores his opponents-obscurantists. The revolutionary 1917 year comes. Pavlov angrily rejects the proposal of an American agent to go abroad; he decides to forever remain with his people in his homeland.

Ivan Pavlov, the eldest of eleven children, was born in Ryazan, Russian Empire. His father, Peter Dmitrievich Pavlov (1823–1899), was a village Russian orthodox priest. His mother, Varvara Ivanovna Uspenskaya (1826–1890), was a devoted homemaker. As a child, Pavlov willingly participated in house duties such as doing the dishes and taking care of his siblings. He loved to garden, ride his bicycle, row, swim, and play gorodki; he devoted his summer vacations to these activities. Although able to read by the age of seven, Pavlov was seriously injured when he fell from a high wall onto a stone pavement. As a result of the injuries he sustained he did not begin formal schooling until he was 11 years old.

A 1921 article by S. Morgulis in the journal "Science" was critical of Pavlov's work, raising concerns about the environment in which these experiments had been performed. Based on a report from H. G. Wells, claiming that Pavlov grew potatoes and carrots in his lab, the article stated, "It is gratifying to be assured that Professor Pavlov is raising potatoes only as a pastime and still gives the best of his genius to scientific investigation". That same year, Pavlov began holding laboratory meetings known as the 'Wednesday meetings' at which he spoke frankly on many topics, including his views on psychology. These meetings lasted until he died in 1936.
Pavlov was highly regarded by the Soviet government, and he was able to continue his research until he reached a considerable age. He was praised by Lenin. Despite praise from the Soviet Union government, the money that poured in to support his laboratory, and the honours he was given, Pavlov made no attempts to conceal the disapproval and contempt with which he regarded Soviet Communism.

He was only 24 years old when his first novel, "Captain of the Steppe", was published, receiving praise not only from critics but also from the jury of the Russian Booker Prize, which shortlisted the novel for the 1995 award. Pavlov went on to win the Prize in 2002 with his next book, the second novel in what would become the trilogy "Tales from the Last Days".

In 1837 Pavlov married the poet and translator Karolina Jaenisch. For years the pair ran a popular literary salon in their Moscow house on the Rozhdestvensky Boulevard. Their marriage ended in 1853, when, having squandered away her inherited fortune by gambling, Pavlov was forced to declare bankruptcy and spent several months in jail. His house was searched by the police, some politically dangerous papers were found and he was exiled to Vyatka where he spent the next two years.

Ivan Dmitrievich Pavlov was born 8 September 1919 in Makovskiye Vyselki, Ryazan Oblast, to a peasant family. After finishing the polytechnical college he worked as a technician at a metallurgic plant. Pavlov served in the military during World War II, active for six years, starting in the Soviet-Finnish War; he also took part in the Battle of Stalingrad. He was awarded the medal and title of "Hero of the Soviet Union" for his part in the defense of Stalingrad.

He graduated from Moscow University in 1815. After a doctorate in medicine, and two years travelling in Europe to study science, he was given a chair in Moscow in 1821, in Agriculture, Mineralogy and Forestry. Subsequently he wrote textbooks in agriculture and chemistry, and lobbied for changed agricultural practices.Schelling appears as a kind of absentee grand master of a new higher order. The most popular university lecturer of the period, Professor Pavlov, was master of ceremonies, greeting students at the door of his lecture hall with his famous question: "You want to know about nature, but what is nature and what is knowledge?"

The basics of Pavlov's classical conditioning serve as a historical backdrop for current learning theories. However, the Russian physiologist's initial interest in classical conditioning occurred almost by accident during one of his experiments on digestion in dogs. Considering that Pavlov worked closely with animals throughout many of his experiments, his early contributions were primarily about animal learning. However, the fundamentals of classical conditioning have been examined across many different organisms, including humans. The basic underlying principles of Pavlov's classical conditioning have extended to a variety of settings, such as classrooms and learning environments.
question_src: Je! Pavlov aliishi miaka gani?
pos_context_src: Ivan Petrovich Pavlov (; 27 Februari 1936) alikuwa mtaalam wa kisaikolojia wa Urusi anayejulikana sana kwa kazi yake katika hali ya classical.
neg_context_src: Pavlov alizaliwa katika familia ya wapenzi wa Urusi katika kijiji cha Boris-Romanovka katika wilaya ambayo sasa ni wilaya ya Kostanay huko Kazakhstan. Mnamo mwaka wa 1931-2 aliishi katika Terensai Stantsy, sasa katika wilaya ya Adamovsky ya Orenburg Oblast, akihamia mnamo 1932 hadi mji wa Magnitogorsk huko Chelyabinsk Oblast. Alikamilisha elimu ya msingi na mnamo 1940 alimaliza miaka 3 ya mafunzo katika Chuo cha Ufundi cha Viwanda cha Magnitogorsk na Magnitogorsk Aeroclub.

Sergey Pavlov alizaliwa mnamo 1981 katika mji wa Vladimir, Soviet Union (sasa Urusi). Pavlov, ambaye alikuwa mlevi ambaye alikunywa sana. Katika mapigano ya ulevi, Pavlov aliwachoma wafungwa wawili na kisu - mmoja wa wanaume hao alikufa na yule mwingine alijeruhiwa vibaya. Kwa uhalifu huu angeweza kuhukumiwa kifungo cha maisha, lakini alihukumiwa kifungo cha miaka nane tu na akaachiliwa baada ya miaka mitano. Pavlov baadaye alihukumiwa kwa uhalifu mbili ndogo lakini aliachiliwa hivi karibuni. Kwa miaka michache alifanya kazi kama Foreman, ambapo wenzake walimuelezea kama mtu mwenye hasira, aliyegombana ambaye hakuwa na marafiki wowote.

Raia wa Urusi, Pavlov alizaliwa huko Ukhta, Komi Assr. Aliishi Rostov-on-Don na alitumia muda katika jeshi la Urusi. Kulingana na ripoti ya gazeti la "Jarida la Georgia" alikuwa na shida kubwa na polisi wa Rostov wakati akifanya kazi huko kwenye safisha ya gari, kwani alidai aliendelea na ulevi wa ulevi katika gari lililoibiwa kutoka hapo. 
Katika mahojiano, Pavlov anasema kwamba alikuwa amemwacha mke na mtoto wa miaka 5 huko Urusi kabla ya kwenda Ukraine, ambapo alioa tena na umri wa miaka 21 Helen Kolenkinoyu huko Slovyansk.

Daktari mchanga Ivan Pavlov anataka kuishi maisha "kwa heshima na kibinadamu." Njia ya mwanasayansi ni ngumu na ya miiba. Idara ya Hazina haitoi pesa kwa utafiti au kutoa ufikiaji wa wanyama kwa matumizi ya majaribio na Pavlov lazima ainunue kwenye akiba yake mwenyewe. Majaribio yanafuatana. Pavlov anafuata lengo lake kwa shauku na nguvu. Kwa kazi yake juu ya fizikia ya digestion anapewa tuzo ya Nobel. Pavlov huweka njia ya masomo ya malengo ya kazi ya ubongo katika wanyama wa juu. ZvantSev, msaidizi wa Pavlov ni mtu anayefaa ambaye amekuwa mpinzani wa kiitikadi wa mwanasayansi-mali, anamsihi asiingiliane na "patakatifu pa roho", lakini Pavlov anapuuza kwa ujasiri wapinzani wake. Mapinduzi ya 1917 ya mwaka inakuja. Pavlov kwa hasira anakataa pendekezo la wakala wa Amerika kwenda nje ya nchi; Anaamua kubaki milele na watu wake katika nchi yake.

Ivan Pavlov, mkubwa wa watoto kumi na moja, alizaliwa huko Ryazan, Dola ya Urusi. Baba yake, Peter Dmitrievich Pavlov (1823-18899), alikuwa kuhani wa Orthodox wa kijiji. Mama yake, Varvara Ivanovna Uspenskaya (1826-1890), alikuwa mama wa kujitolea. Kama mtoto, Pavlov alishiriki kwa hiari katika majukumu ya nyumba kama vile kufanya vyombo na kuwatunza ndugu zake. Alipenda bustani, kupanda baiskeli yake, safu, kuogelea, na kucheza Gorodki; Alitoa likizo yake ya majira ya joto kwa shughuli hizi. Ingawa aliweza kusoma na umri wa miaka saba, Pavlov alijeruhiwa vibaya wakati alianguka kutoka kwa ukuta wa juu kwenye barabara ya jiwe. Kama matokeo ya majeraha aliyoendeleza hakuanza kusoma rasmi hadi alikuwa na umri wa miaka 11.

Nakala ya 1921 ya S. Morgulis katika jarida la "Sayansi" ilikuwa muhimu kwa kazi ya Pavlov, ikiongezea wasiwasi juu ya mazingira ambayo majaribio haya yalifanywa. Kulingana na ripoti kutoka kwa H. G. Wells, akidai kwamba Pavlov alikua viazi na karoti katika maabara yake, nakala hiyo ilisema, "Inaridhisha kuwa na uhakika kwamba Profesa Pavlov anaongeza viazi tu kama mchezo wa kupendeza na bado anatoa bora ya akili yake kwa uchunguzi wa kisayansi". Mwaka huo huo, Pavlov alianza kufanya mikutano ya maabara inayojulikana kama 'Mikutano ya Jumatano' ambayo alizungumza wazi juu ya mada nyingi, pamoja na maoni yake juu ya saikolojia. Mikutano hii ilidumu hadi alipokufa mnamo 1936.
Pavlov alizingatiwa sana na serikali ya Soviet, na aliweza kuendelea na utafiti wake hadi alipofikia umri mkubwa. Alisifiwa na Lenin. Licha ya sifa kutoka kwa serikali ya Umoja wa Soviet, pesa ambazo zilimimina ili kuunga mkono maabara yake, na heshima aliyopewa, Pavlov hakufanya majaribio ya kuficha kutokubaliwa na dharau ambayo alichukulia Ukomunisti wa Soviet.

Alikuwa na umri wa miaka 24 tu wakati riwaya yake ya kwanza, "Kapteni wa Steppe", ilichapishwa, ikipokea sifa sio tu kutoka kwa wakosoaji lakini pia kutoka kwa Jury la Tuzo la Booker la Urusi, ambalo liliorodhesha riwaya hiyo kwa tuzo ya 1995. Pavlov aliendelea kushinda tuzo hiyo mnamo 2002 na kitabu chake kinachofuata, riwaya ya pili katika ambayo ingekuwa "Hadithi za Trilogy kutoka Siku za Mwisho".

Mnamo 1837 Pavlov alioa mshairi na mtafsiri Karolina Jaenisch. Kwa miaka jozi hiyo iliendesha saluni maarufu ya fasihi katika nyumba yao ya Moscow kwenye Rozhdestvensky Boulevard. Ndoa yao ilimalizika mnamo 1853, wakati, baada ya kuharibiwa pesa zake za kurithi na kamari, Pavlov alilazimika kutangaza kufilisika na kukaa gerezani miezi kadhaa. Nyumba yake ilitafutwa na polisi, karatasi zingine hatari za kisiasa zilipatikana na alihamishwa kwenda Vyatka ambapo alikaa miaka miwili ijayo.

Ivan Dmitrievich Pavlov alizaliwa 8 Septemba 1919 huko Makovskiye Vyselki, Ryazan Oblast, kwa familia ya watu. Baada ya kumaliza Chuo cha Polytechnical alifanya kazi kama fundi katika mmea wa madini. Pavlov alihudumu katika jeshi wakati wa Vita vya Kidunia vya pili, akifanya kazi kwa miaka sita, akianza katika Vita vya Soviet-Ufini; Alishiriki pia katika vita vya Stalingrad. Alipewa medali na jina la "shujaa wa Soviet Union" kwa upande wake katika utetezi wa Stalingrad.

Alihitimu kutoka Chuo Kikuu cha Moscow mnamo 1815. Baada ya udaktari katika dawa, na miaka miwili kusafiri Ulaya kusoma sayansi, alipewa mwenyekiti huko Moscow mnamo 1821, katika kilimo, mineralogy na misitu. Baadaye aliandika vitabu vya kiada katika kilimo na kemia, na kushawishi kwa mazoea ya kilimo yaliyobadilika.Schelling inaonekana kama aina ya bwana mkubwa wa utaratibu mpya wa juu. Mhadhiri maarufu wa chuo kikuu cha kipindi hicho, Profesa Pavlov, alikuwa mkuu wa sherehe, akiwasalimia wanafunzi kwenye mlango wa ukumbi wake wa hotuba na swali lake maarufu: "Unataka kujua juu ya maumbile, lakini asili ni nini na maarifa ni nini?"

Msingi wa hali ya kitamaduni ya Pavlov hutumika kama uwanja wa kihistoria wa nadharia za sasa za kujifunza. Walakini, nia ya mtaalam wa kisaikolojia wa Urusi katika hali ya classical ilitokea karibu na bahati wakati wa moja ya majaribio yake juu ya digestion katika mbwa. Kwa kuzingatia kwamba Pavlov alifanya kazi kwa karibu na wanyama katika majaribio yake mengi, michango yake ya mapema ilikuwa juu ya ujifunzaji wa wanyama. Walakini, misingi ya hali ya classical imechunguzwa katika viumbe vingi tofauti, pamoja na wanadamu. Kanuni za msingi za hali ya kitamaduni ya Pavlov zimeenea kwa mipangilio mbali mbali, kama vyumba vya madarasa na mazingira ya kujifunza.
report_src: Ivan Pavlov alizaliwa tarehe 14 Septemba 1849 na kisha alifariki tarehe 27 Februari 1936 [1]; hivyo, akihesabu kutoka mwaka wa kuzaliwa hadi kifo chake, aliishi takriban miaka 86.
