question_en: What is the blood quantum for the Mississippi Choctaw?
pos_context_en: The Ute require a 5/8 blood quantum, the highest requirement of any American tribe. The Miccosukee of Florida, the Mississippi Choctaw, and the St. Croix Chippewa of Wisconsin all require one-half "tribal blood quantum", also a high percentage.
neg_context_en: The Choctaw (in the Choctaw language, Chahta) are a Native American people originally occupying what is now the Southeastern United States (modern-day Alabama, Florida, Mississippi and Louisiana). Their Choctaw language belongs to the Muskogean language family group. Hopewell and Mississippian cultures, who lived throughout the east of the Mississippi River valley and its tributaries. About 1,700 years ago, the Hopewell people built Nanih Waiya, a great earthwork mound located in what is central present-day Mississippi. It is still considered sacred by the Choctaw. The early Spanish explorers of the mid-16th century in the Southeast encountered Mississippian-culture villages and chiefs. The anthropologist John R. Swanton suggested that the Choctaw derived their name from an early leader. Henry Halbert, a historian, suggests that their name is derived from the Choctaw phrase "Hacha hatak" (river people).

In 2002, the United States Congress formally recognized the entire Choctaw Nation in 25 U.S.C. 1779, including those Choctaw Indians Communities which have never perished, been removed or otherwise assimilate in Mobile and Washington County Alabama and whom were described as Full-Blooded Choctaw equally and in the same Mississippi Choctaw Jurisdictional Act of 1934, the various Treaties between 1786 and 1866, the American Indian Policy Review Commission Final Report of May 19, 1877 which described 4000 Choctaw Indians residing in the Choctaw Communities of Mobile and Washington Counties of Alabama, and whose Alabama Choctaw were officially recognized when their Chief, Framon Weaver, was accused of racial employment discrimination against a black woman named Michelle Taylor, was held by the U.S. Supreme Court in Taylor v. Alabama Intertribal Council, 535 U.S. 1066 (2002) Supreme Court Reports - it was a victory for not only Choctaw Indians but every Indian, as the Supreme Court recognized the Sovereignty of Indians just because they are Indians and underscored the United States Constitution's Indian Intercourse Clause under Article I, Section 8, Clause 3. The Choctaw Nation of Indians residing in the original Mississippi Territory have historically and lawfully recognized by the U.S. Federal Government to reside in Mobile and Washington Counties, the home of virtually every Choctaw Chief, including Oklahoma, Wesley Johnston, Pushmataha, William Byrd (Baird/Bird), George Washington Byrd, Silas D. Fisher, William Weatherford, Alexander McGillivray, Alexander Brashears, Silas D. Fisher, Pierre Juzan, Cornelius McCurtain, Peter Pitchlynn, John Johnston, Tom Gibson, Framon Weaver, Robert Cole, Coleman Cole, Peter Cole, "Red Shoes", Piamingo (Wea Mingo - called the Mountain King), and the list goes on. The Choctaw and Chickasaw have been historically and lawfully recorded and acknowledged to exist in Mobile and Washington Counties of Alabama or what was known as the old Mississippi Territory after the infamous Yazoo Land Scandal and Pine Barrens Fraud when the other original Colonies and Plantations which are known as the Original Colonies each ceded their land and removed with accordance of the Treaty of Peace of the American Revolution which recognized the Treaty of Utrecht of 1713 as controlling.

The Choctaw have preserved their cultural identity and are documentermd extensively in the American Indian Policy Review Commission's Final Report to the Congress of the United States conducted under the authority of the Indian Self-Determination and Education Assistance Act of 1975 known as Public Law 93-638 by the Secretary of Interior, the Bureau Of Indian Affairs, and the Office of Federal Acknowledgement. The Choctaws of Alabama were previously identified by the Department of Interior in 1902 to be predominantly Choctaw Indians of the full blood as fully cited in the Mississippi Choctaw Jurisdictional Act of 1936. It was cited by the acting Secretary of Congress that it was the then policy of the President to deny the Choctaws of Alabama, Tennesee, and Texas because there were deemed to many Choctaw Indians in documentation by Congress. The US Federal Court of Claims previously cited the blackest of frauds had been committed against the Choctaws East of the Mississippi including the Alabama Choctaws Indians.

When Leflore was 22, he became a chief of the western division of the Choctaw Nation, when it was still in Mississippi. He is credited with abolishing the Choctaw "blood for blood" law, which dictated rounds of revenge for murders. LeFlore supported the "civilization" program, which U.S. President George Washington and Henry Knox developed during the Washington administration. Particularly after Andrew Jackson's election as president in 1828, he encouraged the Choctaw to make permanent residences, cultivate the land in agriculture, convert to Christianity, and send their children to United States schools for education.

In 1959, a dispute among the Mississippi Choctaw found Belvin encouraging support for a Choctaw high school in Mississippi. Victor Kaneubbe, a worker at a Baptist mission in Philadelphia, Mississippi was an Oklahoma Choctaw with a white wife and a mixed-blood daughter, who was unable to attend either the agency schools or white schools in Mississippi. Choctaw administrators refused to allow his daughter admittance and the Neshoba County School Board refused admittance as well. He brought the issue of racism to the fore and urged his missionary network to petition Congress for creation of a Choctaw high school. The adverse publicity enraged the Baptist community, and cost Kaneubbe his job, forcing him to transfer to the Navajo reservation. Kaneubbe left but the problem of inadequate education remained for eastern Choctaw. Appeals to the BIA resulted in responses that students could attend out of state boarding schools, thus squarely putting pressure on the eastern Choctaw to relocate or face lack of educational opportunity. Agitation from the National Congress of American Indians, the Mississippi Federation of Women's Clubs, Oklahoma Choctaw Chief Belvin, and other civil rights activists forced Mississippi's congressional delegation to request a high school and dormitory for the Mississippi Band of Choctaw Indians, though it took several more years of negotiation to make the high school become a reality.

Approximately 4,000–6,000 Choctaw remained in Mississippi in 1831 after the initial removal efforts. The U.S. agent William Ward, who was responsible for Choctaw registration in Mississippi under article XIV, strongly opposed their treaty rights. Although estimates suggested 5000 Choctaw remained in Mississippi, only 143 family heads (for a total of 276 adult persons) received lands under the provisions of Article 14. For the next ten years, the Choctaws in Mississippi were objects of increasing legal conflict, racism, harassment, and intimidation. The Choctaws described their situation in 1849: "we have had our habitations torn down and burned, our fences destroyed, cattle turned into our fields and we ourselves have been scourged, manacled, fettered and otherwise personally abused, until by such treatment some of our best men have died." Joseph B. Cobb, who moved to Mississippi from Georgia, described the Choctaw as having "no nobility or virtue at all, and in some respect he found blacks, especially native Africans, more interesting and admirable, the red man's superior in every way. The Choctaw and Chickasaw, the tribes he knew best, were beneath contempt, that is, even worse than black slaves." Removal continued throughout the 19th and 20th centuries. In 1846 1,000 Choctaw removed, and in 1903, another 300 Mississippi Choctaw were persuaded to move to the Nation in Oklahoma. By 1930 only 1,665 were estimated to have remained in Mississippi.

The "Choctaw" are a Native American people originally from the Southeastern United States (Mississippi, Alabama and, to a lesser extent, Louisiana). There were about 20,000 members of this tribe when they were forced to move to Indian territory. Many of them did not survive. They are of the Muskogean linguistic group. The word "Choctaw" (also rendered as "Chahta", "Chato", "Tchakta", and "Chocktaw") is possibly a corruption of the Spanish "chato", meaning flattened, in allusion to the tribe's custom of flattening the heads of infants. Noted anthropologist John Swanton, however, suggests that the name belonged to a Choctaw leader. They were descended from people of the Mississippian culture which was located throughout the Mississippi River valley. The early Spanish explorers, according to the historian Walter Lee Williams, encountered their ancestors. Although smaller Choctaw groups are located in the southern region, the Choctaw Nation of Oklahoma and the Mississippi Band of Choctaw Indians are the two primary Choctaw associations. This tribe was predominantly farmers (like most Indians were at the time) until they were removed from their land. They have grown substantially since the Trail of Tears and there are currently about 231,000 members, making the Choctaw the third largest Native American population in the United States. The capital of the Choctaw Nation is currently located in Tuskahoma, Oklahoma.

The Mississippi Band of Choctaw Indians is one of four federally recognized tribes of Choctaw Native Americans. On April 20, 1945, this band organized under the Indian Reorganization Act of 1934. Also in 1945 the Choctaw Indian Reservation was created from lands in Neshoba, Leake, Newton, Scott, Jones, Attala, Kemper, and Winston counties in Mississippi. The Mississippi Band of Choctaw Indians is the only federally recognized Native American tribe in the state.

The Mississippi College Choctaws are the athletic teams of Mississippi College. On July 11, 2014 the NCAA approved entering their second year of NCAA Division II candidacy. The Choctaws are in the process of becoming full members of the Gulf South Conference. The college sponsors teams in football, basketball (men's and women's), baseball, softball, tennis (men's & women's), golf (men's & women's), soccer (women's), volleyball, track and field (men's outdoor & women's indoor & outdoor), cross country running (men's & women's), equestrian (women's), and table tennis (men's & women's). In the second year of transition, the Choctaws compete against members of the Gulf South Conference. They will become full members of NCAA Division II and a full Gulf South Conference member in 2016-17.
question_src: Je! Damu ni nini kwa Choctaw ya Mississippi?
pos_context_src: UTE inahitaji kiwango cha damu 5/8, hitaji la juu zaidi la kabila lolote la Amerika. Miccosukee ya Florida, Mississippi Choctaw, na St. Croix Chippewa ya Wisconsin wote wanahitaji "damu ya kikabila", pia asilimia kubwa.
neg_context_title_src: Mississippi Bendi ya Wahindi wa Choctaw
Bendi ya Mowa ya Wahindi wa Choctaw
Mississippi Bendi ya Wahindi wa Choctaw
neg_context_src: Choctaw (kwa lugha ya Choctaw, Chahta) ni watu wa Amerika ya asili ambao asili ya Amerika ya Kusini (Alabama ya kisasa, Florida, Mississippi na Louisiana). Lugha yao ya Choctaw ni ya Kikundi cha Familia ya Lugha ya Muskogean. Tamaduni za Hopewell na Mississippian, ambazo ziliishi katika mashariki mwa Bonde la Mto wa Mississippi na huduma zake. Karibu miaka 1,700 iliyopita, watu wa Hopewell waliijenga Nanih Waiya, uwanja mkubwa wa ardhi ulioko katika Mississippi ya leo. Bado inachukuliwa kuwa takatifu na Choctaw. Wachunguzi wa mapema wa Uhispania wa katikati ya karne ya 16 kusini mashariki walikutana na vijiji vya kitamaduni na wakuu wa Mississippian. Mtaalam wa anthropolojia John R. Swanton alipendekeza kwamba Choctaw alipata jina lao kutoka kwa kiongozi wa mapema. Henry Halbert, mwanahistoria, anapendekeza kwamba jina lao limetokana na kifungu cha Choctaw "Hacha Hatak" (watu wa mto).

Mnamo 2002, Bunge la Merika lilitambua rasmi taifa zima la Choctaw mnamo 25 U.S.C. 1779, pamoja na zile jamii za Wahindi wa Choctaw ambazo hazijawahi kupotea, zimeondolewa au vinginevyo katika Simu ya Mkononi na Washington County Alabama na ambao walielezewa kama Choctaw kamili ya damu sawa na katika ile ile ya Mississippi Choctaw Sheria ya 1934, Mikataba tofauti kati ya 1786 na 1866, Ripoti ya Mwisho ya Tume ya Amerika ya 18 ya May 187 ambayo ni ya mwaka wa 19 wa May. Jamii za Choctaw za Simu za Simu na Washington za Alabama, na ambaye Alabama Choctaw walitambuliwa rasmi wakati mkuu wao, Framon Weaver, alishtumiwa kwa ubaguzi wa ajira dhidi ya mwanamke mweusi anayeitwa Michelle Taylor, alishikiliwa na Mahakama Kuu ya U.S. katika Taylor v. Alabama Interribal Halmashauri, 535 (20062 (200662 (536 1062 (5660 262 (56620 262 (566 262 (566 262 (566 262 (566 262 (566 262 (566 262 (566 262 (566 262 (566 262 (566 262 (566 262 (566 262 (566 262 (566 262 (566 262 (566 262 (20062 2002 (566 262 (566 262 (20062 2002 (566 262 ni tu. Indians but every Indian, as the Supreme Court recognized the Sovereignty of Indians just because they are Indians and underscored the United States Constitution's Indian Intercourse Clause under Article I, Section 8, Clause 3. The Choctaw Nation of Indians residing in the original Mississippi Territory have historically and lawfully recognized by the U.S. Federal Government to reside in Mobile and Washington Counties, the home of virtually every Choctaw Chief, including Oklahoma, Wesley Johnston, Pushmataha, William Byrd (Baird/Bird), George Washington Byrd, Silas D. Fisher, William Weatherford, Alexander McGillivray, Alexander Brashears, Silas D. Fisher, Pierre Juzan, Cornelius McCurtain, Peter Pitchlynn, John Johnston, Tom Gibson, Framon Weaver, Robert Cole, Coleman Cole, Peter Cole, "Viatu Nyekundu", Piamingo (Wea Mingo - anayeitwa Mlima Mfalme), na orodha inaendelea. Choctaw na Chickasaw zimerekodiwa kihistoria na kisheria na kukubalika kuwa zipo katika Simu za Simu na Washington za Alabama au kile kilichojulikana kama zamani Eneo la Mississippi baada ya kashfa mbaya ya ardhi ya Yazoo na udanganyifu wa pine wakati makoloni mengine ya asili na mashamba ambayo yanajulikana kama koloni za asili kila mmoja alitoa ardhi yao na kuondolewa kwa mujibu wa Mkataba wa Amani ya Mapinduzi ya Amerika ambayo ilitambua Mkataba wa Utrecht wa 1713 kama kudhibiti.

Choctaw wamehifadhi kitambulisho chao cha kitamaduni na wana kumbukumbu kubwa katika Ripoti ya Mwisho ya Tume ya Mapitio ya Sera ya Amerika ya Amerika kwa Bunge la Merika lililofanywa chini ya mamlaka ya Sheria ya Msaada wa Kibinafsi wa India na Sheria ya 1975 inayojulikana kama Sheria ya Umma ya 93-638 na Katibu wa Mambo ya Ndani, Ofisi ya Mambo ya India, na Ofisi ya Shirikisho la Shirikisho. Choctaws za Alabama hapo awali zilitambuliwa na Idara ya Mambo ya Ndani mnamo 1902 kuwa Wahindi wa Choctaw wa damu kamili kama ilivyoonyeshwa kikamilifu katika Sheria ya Mississippi Choctaw ya Sheria ya 1936. Ilitajwa na Katibu wa Congress kwamba ilikuwa sera ya wakati huo ili kumkataza Choctaws, alaBama, tewee, kwa sababu ya kutengwa kwa densi, kwa sababu ya kutengwa, kwa sababu ya densi, na demeed, kutenda densi, kutekelezwa kwa densi, kutekelezwa kwa sababu ya densi, kutekelezwa kwa deaw, de de tennee, tenNES, kutenda deam, tenNESED, de de tenne Wahindi katika nyaraka na Congress. Korti ya Shirikisho la Amerika ya madai hapo awali ilitoa mfano wa udanganyifu kabisa ilikuwa imefanywa dhidi ya Choctaws mashariki mwa Mississippi ikiwa ni pamoja na Wahindi wa Alabama Choctaws.

Wakati LeFlore alikuwa na miaka 22, alikua mkuu wa Idara ya Magharibi ya Taifa la Choctaw, wakati bado ilikuwa Mississippi. Ana sifa ya kumaliza sheria ya Choctaw "Damu kwa Damu", ambayo iliagiza raundi za kulipiza kisasi kwa mauaji. LeFlore aliunga mkono mpango wa "Ustaarabu", ambao Rais wa Merika George Washington na Henry Knox waliendeleza wakati wa utawala wa Washington. Hasa baada ya uchaguzi wa Andrew Jackson kama rais mnamo 1828, alihimiza Choctaw kufanya makazi ya kudumu, kulima ardhi katika kilimo, kugeukia Ukristo, na kupeleka watoto wao kwenda shule za Merika kwa elimu.

Mnamo 1959, mzozo kati ya Mississippi Choctaw ulipata Belvin akihimiza msaada wa Shule ya Upili ya Choctaw huko Mississippi. Victor Kaneubbe, mfanyakazi katika misheni ya Baptist huko Philadelphia, Mississippi alikuwa Oklahoma Choctaw na mke mweupe na binti aliye na damu mchanganyiko, ambaye hakuweza kuhudhuria shule za wakala au shule nyeupe huko Mississippi. Wasimamizi wa Choctaw walikataa kumruhusu binti yake kukiri na Bodi ya Shule ya Kaunti ya Neshoba walikataa kukubalika pia. Alileta suala la ubaguzi wa rangi mbele na akahimiza mtandao wake wa umishonari kuomba Bunge la kuunda Shule ya Upili ya Choctaw. Utangazaji mbaya ulikasirisha jamii ya Baptist, na kumgharimu Kaneubbe kazi yake, na kumlazimisha kuhamisha kwenye Uhifadhi wa Navajo. Kaneubbe aliondoka lakini shida ya elimu isiyofaa ilibaki kwa Choctaw ya Mashariki. Rufaa kwa BIA ilisababisha majibu kwamba wanafunzi wanaweza kuhudhuria shule za bweni za serikali, na hivyo kuweka shinikizo kwa Choctaw ya Mashariki kuhamia au kukabiliwa na fursa ya elimu. Machafuko kutoka kwa Mkutano wa Kitaifa wa Wahindi wa Amerika, Shirikisho la Mississippi la Vilabu vya Wanawake, Mkuu wa Oklahoma Choctaw Belvin, na wanaharakati wengine wa haki za raia walilazimisha ujumbe wa mkutano wa Mississippi kuomba shule ya upili na mabweni kwa bendi ya Mississippi ya Wahindi wa Choctaw, ingawa ilichukua miaka kadhaa zaidi ya mazungumzo kufanya shule ya juu kuwa ukweli.

Takriban 4,000-6,000 Choctaw alibaki Mississippi mnamo 1831 baada ya juhudi za awali za kuondolewa. Wakala wa Merika William Ward, ambaye alikuwa na jukumu la usajili wa Choctaw huko Mississippi chini ya Kifungu cha XIV, alipinga vikali haki zao za makubaliano. Ingawa makadirio yalionyesha Choctaw 5000 ilibaki Mississippi, ni vichwa 143 tu vya familia (kwa jumla ya watu wazima 276) walipokea ardhi chini ya masharti ya kifungu cha 14. Kwa miaka kumi ijayo, Choctaws huko Mississippi walikuwa vitu vya kuongezeka kwa migogoro ya kisheria, ubaguzi wa rangi, unyanyasaji, na vitisho. Choctaws walielezea hali yao mnamo 1849: "Tumekuwa na makazi yetu kubomolewa na kuchomwa moto, uzio wetu umeharibiwa, ng'ombe waligeuka katika uwanja wetu na sisi wenyewe tumepigwa marufuku, kudanganywa, kutengwa na vinginevyo kunyanyaswa kibinafsi, hadi kwa matibabu kama hayo baadhi ya wanaume wetu bora wamekufa." Joseph B. Cobb, ambaye alihamia Mississippi kutoka Georgia, alielezea Choctaw kama "hakuna mtukufu au fadhila kabisa, na kwa hali fulani alipata weusi, haswa Waafrika wa asili, wa kupendeza zaidi na wa kupendeza, mtu mwekundu kwa kila njia. Choctaw na Chickasaw, makabila aliyojua bora, yalikuwa chini ya dharau, hata. Kuondolewa kuliendelea katika karne ya 19 na 20. Mnamo 1846 1,000 Choctaw aliondolewa, na mnamo 1903, mwingine 300 Mississippi Choctaw walishawishiwa kuhamia taifa huko Oklahoma. Kufikia 1930 ni 1,665 tu waliokadiriwa kuwa walibaki Mississippi.

"Choctaw" ni watu wa Amerika ya asili asili kutoka kusini mashariki mwa Merika (Mississippi, Alabama na, kwa kiwango kidogo, Louisiana). Kulikuwa na washiriki wapatao 20,000 wa kabila hili wakati walilazimishwa kuhamia katika eneo la India. Wengi wao hawakuishi. Wao ni wa kikundi cha lugha ya Muskoge. Neno "Choctaw" (pia hutolewa kama "Chahta", "Chato", "Tchakta", na "Chocktaw") labda ni ufisadi wa Kihispania "Chato", ikimaanisha kufurahishwa, kwa kuzingatia tabia ya kabila la kuwashawishi wakuu wa watoto wachanga. Aligundua mtaalam wa anthropolojia John Swanton, hata hivyo, anaonyesha kwamba jina hilo ni la kiongozi wa Choctaw. Walitoka kwa watu wa tamaduni ya Mississippian ambayo ilikuwa katika Bonde la Mto wa Mississippi. Wachunguzi wa mapema wa Uhispania, kulingana na mwanahistoria Walter Lee Williams, walikutana na mababu zao. Ingawa vikundi vidogo vya Choctaw viko katika mkoa wa kusini, taifa la Choctaw la Oklahoma na bendi ya Mississippi ya Wahindi wa Choctaw ndio vyama viwili vya msingi vya Choctaw. Kabila hili lilikuwa wakulima (kama Wahindi wengi wakati huo) hadi walipoondolewa kwenye ardhi yao. Wamekua sana tangu uchaguzi wa machozi na kwa sasa kuna washiriki wapatao 231,000, na kufanya Choctaw kuwa idadi ya tatu kubwa ya Wamarekani nchini Merika. Mji mkuu wa Taifa la Choctaw kwa sasa iko katika Tuskahoma, Oklahoma.

Bendi ya Mississippi ya Wahindi wa Choctaw ni moja wapo ya makabila manne yanayotambuliwa ya Choctaw Wamarekani. Mnamo Aprili 20, 1945, bendi hii iliyoandaliwa chini ya Sheria ya Urekebishaji wa India ya 1934. Pia mnamo 1945 Uhifadhi wa Hindi wa Choctaw uliundwa kutoka nchi huko Neshoba, Leake, Newton, Scott, Jones, Attala, Kemper, na Winston huko Mississippi. Bendi ya Mississippi ya Wahindi wa Choctaw ndio kabila la pekee linalotambuliwa la Amerika ya Kusini katika jimbo hilo.

Chuo cha Mississippi Choctaws ni timu za riadha za Chuo cha Mississippi. Mnamo Julai 11, 2014 NCAA iliidhinisha kuingia mwaka wao wa pili wa uwakilishi wa Idara ya II ya NCAA. Choctaws ziko katika mchakato wa kuwa washiriki kamili wa Mkutano wa Ghuba Kusini. Chuo kikuu kinafadhili timu katika mpira wa miguu, mpira wa kikapu (wanaume na wanawake), baseball, mpira wa miguu, tenisi (wanaume na wanawake), gofu (wanaume na wanawake), mpira wa miguu (wanawake), mpira wa wavu, kufuatilia na uwanja (wa nje wa wanaume na wanawake wa ndani na wa nje), nchi inayovuka (Wanaume wa Wanaume), Wanawake. Katika mwaka wa pili wa mpito, Choctaws hushindana dhidi ya wanachama wa Mkutano wa Ghuba Kusini. Watakuwa washiriki kamili wa Idara ya II ya NCAA na mjumbe kamili wa Mkutano wa Ghuba Kusini mnamo 2016-17.
report_src: Kwa Choctaw ya Mississippi, sharti kuu la uandikishaji ni kwamba mwombaji awe na “damu ya kikabila” katika kiasi kikubwa (asilimia kubwa), ingawa maandishi yaliyopo hayataji sehemu kamili ya damu (k.v. 1/4 au 5/8); yanabainisha tu kwamba kima hicho ni kikubwa kuliko cha makabila mengi mengine [1].

1/4 au 5/8); yanabainisha tu kwamba kima hicho ni kikubwa kuliko cha makabila mengi mengine [1].

question_en: When did Jewish people first come to England?
pos_context_en: The first Jewish communities of significant size came to England with William the Conqueror in 1066. After the conquest of England, William instituted a feudal system in the country, whereby all estates formally belonged to the Crown; the king then appointed lords over these vast estates, but they were subject to duties and obligations (financial and military) to the king. Under the lords were other subjects such as serfs, who were bound and obliged to their lords, and to their lords' obligations. Merchants had a special status in the system, as did Jews. Jews were declared to be direct subjects of the king, unlike the rest of the population. This was an ambivalent legal position for the Jewish population, in that they were not tied to any particular lord but were subject to the whims of the king, it could be either advantageous or disadvantageous. Every successive king formally reviewed a royal charter, granting Jews the right to remain in England. Jews did not enjoy any of the guarantees of the Magna Carta of 1215.
neg_context_title_en: History of the Jews in England
List of British Jewish nobility and gentry
neg_context_en: English Jews experienced a "golden age" of sorts under Henry II in the late 12th century due to huge economic expansion and increased demand for credit. Major Jewish fortunes were made in London, Oxford, Lincoln, Bristol, and Norwich. The Crown, in turn, capitalized on the prosperity of its Jews. In addition to many arbitrary taxes, Richard I established the Ordinance of the Jewry in 1194 in an attempt to organize the Jewish community. It ensured that mandatory records would be kept by royal officials for all Jewish transactions. Every debt was recorded on a chirography to allow the king immediate and complete access to Jewish property. Richard also established a special exchequer to collect any unpaid debts due after the death of a Jewish creditor. The establishment of the Exchequer of the Jews eventually made all transactions of the English Jewry liable to taxation by the king in addition to the 10% of all sums recovered by Jews with the help of English courts. So, while the First and Second Crusades increased anti-Jewish sentiments, Jews in England went relatively unscathed beyond occasional fines and special levies. Though they did not experience the same kind of social mobility and cultural advancements that Jews under Muslim rule did, the Jews of England's population and prosperity increased under the protection of the king.

The Jewish community played an important role in England throughout much of the period. The first Jews arrived in England in the aftermath of the Norman invasion, when William the Conqueror brought over wealthy members of the Rouen community in Normandy to settle in London. The Jewish community expanded out across England and provided essential money-lending and banking services that were otherwise banned by the usury laws. During the 12th century, the Jewish financial community grew richer still, operating under royal protection and providing the king with a source of ready credit. All major towns had Jewish centres, and even the smaller towns saw visits by travelling Jewish merchants. Towards the end of Henry II's reign, however, the king ceased to borrow from the Jewish community and instead turned to extracting money from them through arbitrary taxation and fines. The Jews became vilified and accusations were made that they conducted ritual child murder, encouraging the pogroms carried out against Jewish communities in the reign of Richard I. After an initially peaceful start to John's reign, the king again began to extort money from the Jewish community and, with the breakdown in order in 1215, the Jews were subject to fresh attacks. Henry III restored some protection and Jewish money-lending began to recover. Despite this, the Jewish community became increasingly impoverished and was finally expelled from England in 1290 by Edward I, being replaced by foreign merchants.

The first Jews arrived in New York City in 1654, when it was still New Amsterdam, from Recife (Brazil) following the First Anglo-Dutch War, resulting a decade later in the first known civil rights case in the New World when a Jew named Asser Levy successfully appealed to the New Amsterdam colonial council for the right to serve in the army. Later German immigration brought large communities of Ashkenazi Jews. Starting then until 1820 was the first wave of Jewish immigration to America, bringing fewer than 15,000 Jews. The first wave of Jewish people were fleeing religious persecution in Brazil, Portugal, Spain, Bordeaux, Jamaica, England, Curaçao, Holland, and conquered by Russian Empire former Poland (Rzeczpospolita Obojga Narodów), and founded communities in New York, Newport, Charleston, Savannah, and Philadelphia. From 1820 to 1880 came the second wave, in which a quarter million German Jews migrated to America. A third major wave of Sephardi Jews coming from the Balkans and the Middle East after the Turkish revolution. The outbreak of World War I and the Holocaust caused many German Jews to immigrate to the United States. During this period, 1881 to 1924, over 2,000,000 Eastern European Jews immigrated, fleeing anti-semitic persecution in their home countries. A later wave from Eastern Europe, from 1985–1990, over 140,000 Jews immigrated from the former Soviet Union. 50,000 Jews a year still immigrate to the United States.

Although the first Jews may have arrived on the island of Great Britain with the Romans, it was not until the Norman Conquest of William the Conqueror in 1066 that organised Jewish communities first appeared in England. These existed until 1290 when the Jewish population of England was expelled by King Edward I of England.

The history of the Jews in Britain goes back to the reign of William I. The first written record of Jewish settlement in England dates from 1070, although Jews may have lived there since Roman times. The Jewish presence continued until King Edward I's Edict of Expulsion in 1290. After the expulsion, there was no Jewish community, apart from individuals who practised Judaism secretly, until the rule of Oliver Cromwell. While Cromwell never officially readmitted Jews to Britain, a small colony of Sephardic Jews living in London, was identified in 1656 and allowed to remain. The Jewish Naturalisation Act of 1753, an attempt to legalise the Jewish presence in Britain, remained in force for only a few months. Historians commonly date Jewish Emancipation to either 1829 or 1858 when Jews were finally allowed to sit in Parliament. The first Jewish knight was Sir Solomon de Medina, knighted in 1700, with no further Jews being knighted until 1837, when Queen Victoria knighted Moses Haim Montefiore; four years later, Isaac Lyon Goldsmid was made a baronet, the first Jew to receive a hereditary title. In 1885 Nathan Mayer Rothschild, 1st Baron Rothschild, became the first Jew to receive an hereditary peerage.

The Jewish Lads' and Girls' Brigade (JLGB) is a national Jewish youth organisation based in and primarily serving the United Kingdom. 
The UK's oldest Jewish youth movement, it was founded in 1895 as the Jewish Lads' Brigade by Colonel Albert E. W. Goldsmid, a senior army officer, to provide an interest for children of the many poor immigrant families who were coming into England at that time. The first company was launched in London's East End but others soon appeared throughout the city and the provinces. The movement later spread as far as South Africa and Canada.

Jewish heritage in the city, once part of a thriving community, can be dated back to around 1750, when a number of Jewish merchants from across the UK and Europe settled in Sunderland, eventually forming a congregation in 1768. A rabbi from Holland was established in the city in 1790. After a rapid growth in numbers during the latter half of the nineteenth century, the Jewish community in Sunderland reached its height in the mid 1930s, when around 2,000 Jews were recorded to be living in the town. The community has been in slow decline since the mid-20th century. Many Sunderland Jews left for stronger Jewish communities in Britain or to Israel. The Jewish primary school, the Menorah School, closed in July 1983. The synagogue on Ryhope Road, opened in 1928, closed at the end of March 2006. (See also Jews and Judaism in North East England) The Jewish population of the Sunderland Metropolitan Borough is continually diminishing, as the Jewish population fell from 114 people in 2001, to 76 people in 2011.

Jewish people have been recorded as living in Sussex since the 12th century and are first mentioned in 1179/80 pipe roll for Chichester. A considerable Jewish community existed in Chichester by 1186. Jews are also recorded in Arundel, Hailsham, and Lewes, and were expelled from Winchelsea in 1273. All Sussex's Jews would have been expelled in 1290 when Edward I of England issued the Edict of Expulsion. A Jewish population had returned to Sussex by the late 18th century in Brighton and Arundel and later there were also Jewish people in Findon, Seaford and Lewes.

The term "Jewish question" was first used in Great Britain around 1750 when the expression "Jewish question" appeared during the Jew Bill of 1753 debates in England. According to Holocaust scholar Lucy Dawidowicz, the term "Jewish Question," as introduced in western Europe, was a neutral expression for the negative attitude toward the apparent and persistent singularity of the Jews as a people against the background of the rising political nationalisms and new nation-states. Dawidowicz writes that "the histories of Jewish emancipation and of European antisemitism are replete with proffered 'solutions to the Jewish question.'"
question_src: Je! Watu wa Kiyahudi walikuja kwanza Uingereza?
pos_context_src: Jamii za kwanza za Wayahudi zenye ukubwa mkubwa zilikuja Uingereza na William Mshindi mnamo 1066. Baada ya ushindi wa England, William alianzisha mfumo wa kijeshi nchini, ambao kwa kawaida maeneo yote yalikuwa ya Taji; Mfalme basi aliteua mabwana juu ya maeneo haya makubwa, lakini walikuwa chini ya majukumu na majukumu (kifedha na kijeshi) kwa mfalme. Chini ya mabwana kulikuwa na masomo mengine kama vile serf, ambao walifungwa na kulazimika kwa mabwana wao, na kwa majukumu ya mabwana wao. Wafanyabiashara walikuwa na hadhi maalum katika mfumo, kama vile Wayahudi. Wayahudi walitangazwa kuwa masomo ya moja kwa moja ya Mfalme, tofauti na watu wengine. Hii ilikuwa msimamo wa kisheria unaovutia kwa idadi ya Wayahudi, kwa kuwa hawakufungwa kwa bwana yeyote lakini walikuwa chini ya matakwa ya mfalme, inaweza kuwa na faida au mbaya. Kila Mfalme anayefuata alikagua hati ya kifalme, akiwapa Wayahudi haki ya kubaki Uingereza. Wayahudi hawakufurahiya dhamana yoyote ya Magna Carta ya 1215.
neg_context_title_src: Orodha ya heshima ya Wayahudi ya Uingereza na uungwana
Vijana wa Kiyahudi 'na Brigade ya Wasichana
neg_context_src: Wayahudi wa Kiingereza walipata "umri wa dhahabu" wa aina chini ya Henry II mwishoni mwa karne ya 12 kwa sababu ya upanuzi mkubwa wa kiuchumi na kuongezeka kwa mahitaji ya mkopo. Bahati kubwa za Kiyahudi zilitengenezwa London, Oxford, Lincoln, Bristol, na Norwich. Taji, kwa upande wake, ilipewa ustawi wa Wayahudi wake. Mbali na ushuru mwingi wa kiholela, Richard I alianzisha agizo la Uyahudi mnamo 1194 katika jaribio la kuandaa Jumuiya ya Wayahudi. Ilihakikisha kuwa rekodi za lazima zitahifadhiwa na maafisa wa kifalme kwa shughuli zote za Kiyahudi. Kila deni lilirekodiwa kwenye chirografia ili kumruhusu Mfalme mara moja na ufikiaji kamili wa mali ya Kiyahudi. Richard pia alianzisha exchequer maalum kukusanya deni yoyote isiyolipwa baada ya kifo cha mkopeshaji wa Kiyahudi. Uanzishwaji wa exchequer ya Wayahudi mwishowe ulifanya shughuli zote za Uyahudi wa Kiingereza kuwajibika kwa ushuru na mfalme kwa kuongeza 10% ya hesabu zote zilizopatikana na Wayahudi kwa msaada wa mahakama za Kiingereza. Kwa hivyo, wakati vita vya kwanza na vya pili viliongezea hisia za kupinga-Wayahudi, Wayahudi huko England walikwenda bila shida zaidi ya faini ya mara kwa mara na ushuru maalum. Ingawa hawakupata uzoefu huo wa uhamaji wa kijamii na maendeleo ya kitamaduni ambayo Wayahudi chini ya utawala wa Waislamu walifanya, Wayahudi wa idadi ya watu wa England na ustawi waliongezeka chini ya ulinzi wa mfalme.

Jumuiya ya Wayahudi ilichukua jukumu muhimu nchini Uingereza kwa kipindi chote cha kipindi hicho. Wayahudi wa kwanza walifika Uingereza baada ya uvamizi wa Norman, wakati William Mshindi alileta washiriki matajiri wa jamii ya Rouen huko Normandy kuishi London. Jumuiya ya Wayahudi iliongezeka kote Uingereza na ilitoa huduma muhimu za kukopesha pesa na benki ambazo zilipigwa marufuku na sheria za malipo. Wakati wa karne ya 12, jamii ya kifedha ya Kiyahudi ilikua tajiri zaidi, ikifanya kazi chini ya ulinzi wa kifalme na kumpa mfalme chanzo cha mkopo tayari. Miji yote mikubwa ilikuwa na vituo vya Kiyahudi, na hata miji ndogo iliona ziara kwa kusafiri wafanyabiashara wa Kiyahudi. Mwisho wa utawala wa Henry II, hata hivyo, mfalme alikoma kukopa kutoka kwa jamii ya Wayahudi na badala yake akageuka kutoa pesa kutoka kwao kupitia ushuru wa kiholela na faini. Wayahudi walinyanyaswa na mashtaka yalitolewa kwamba walifanya mauaji ya kitamaduni, na kuhamasisha pogroms zilizofanywa dhidi ya jamii za Wayahudi katika utawala wa Richard I. Baada ya kuanza kwa amani kwa utawala wa Yohana, Mfalme tena alianza kupeana pesa kutoka kwa jamii ya Wayahudi na, na kuvunjika kwa miaka 1215, Wayahudi walikuwa chini ya shambulio mpya. Henry III alirudisha ulinzi na kukopesha pesa za Kiyahudi zilianza kupona. Pamoja na hayo, jamii ya Wayahudi ilizidi kuwa duni na hatimaye ilifukuzwa kutoka Uingereza mnamo 1290 na Edward I, ikibadilishwa na wafanyabiashara wa nje.

Wayahudi wa kwanza waliwasili New York City mnamo 1654, wakati ilikuwa bado New Amsterdam, kutoka Recife (Brazil) kufuatia vita vya kwanza vya Anglo-Uholanzi, na kusababisha muongo mmoja baadaye katika kesi ya kwanza ya haki za raia katika Ulimwengu Mpya wakati Myahudi aliyeitwa Asser Levy alifanikiwa kukata rufaa kwa Baraza mpya la Wakoloni la Amsterdam kwa Haki ya Kuhudumia Jeshi. Baadaye uhamiaji wa Ujerumani ulileta jamii kubwa za Wayahudi wa Ashkenazi. Kuanzia wakati huo hadi 1820 ilikuwa wimbi la kwanza la uhamiaji wa Kiyahudi kwenda Amerika, na kuleta Wayahudi chini ya 15,000. Wimbi la kwanza la watu wa Kiyahudi lilikuwa likikimbia mateso ya kidini huko Brazil, Ureno, Uhispania, Bordeaux, Jamaica, England, Curaçao, Holland, na kushinda na Dola ya Urusi ya zamani Poland (Rzeczpospolita Obojga Narodów), na jamii iliyoanzishwa huko New York, Newport, Charlest. Kuanzia 1820 hadi 1880 ilikuja wimbi la pili, ambalo Wayahudi wa Ujerumani milioni walihamia Amerika. Wimbi kuu la tatu la Wayahudi wa Sephardi kutoka Balkan na Mashariki ya Kati baada ya Mapinduzi ya Uturuki. Mlipuko wa Vita vya Kwanza vya Ulimwengu na Holocaust ulisababisha Wayahudi wengi wa Ujerumani kuhamia Merika. Katika kipindi hiki, 1881 hadi 1924, zaidi ya Wayahudi 2000 wa Mashariki wa Ulaya walihamia, wakikimbia mateso ya kupinga Ukemia katika nchi zao. Wimbi la baadaye kutoka Ulaya Mashariki, kutoka 1985-1990, zaidi ya Wayahudi 140,000 walihamia kutoka Umoja wa zamani wa Soviet. Wayahudi 50,000 kwa mwaka bado wanahamia Merika.

Ingawa Wayahudi wa kwanza wanaweza kuwa walifika kwenye kisiwa cha Great Britain na Warumi, haikuwa hadi mshindi wa Norman wa William Mshindi mnamo 1066 aliyeandaa jamii za Wayahudi zilionekana kwa mara ya kwanza Uingereza. Hizi zilikuwepo hadi 1290 wakati idadi ya Wayahudi ya England ilifukuzwa na Mfalme Edward I wa England.

Historia ya Wayahudi huko Uingereza inarudi kwenye utawala wa William I. Rekodi ya kwanza iliyoandikwa ya makazi ya Wayahudi huko England ilianzia 1070, ingawa Wayahudi wanaweza kuwa waliishi hapo tangu nyakati za Kirumi. Uwepo wa Wayahudi uliendelea hadi amri ya Mfalme Edward I ya kufukuzwa mnamo 1290. Baada ya kufukuzwa, hakukuwa na jamii ya Wayahudi, mbali na watu ambao walifanya mazoezi ya Uyahudi kwa siri, hadi utawala wa Oliver Cromwell. Wakati Cromwell hajawahi kusoma rasmi Wayahudi kwenda Uingereza, koloni ndogo ya Wayahudi wa Sephardic wanaoishi London, iligunduliwa mnamo 1656 na kuruhusiwa kubaki. Sheria ya Uzalishaji wa Kiyahudi ya 1753, jaribio la kuhalalisha uwepo wa Wayahudi huko Uingereza, ilibaki kwa nguvu kwa miezi michache tu. Wanahistoria kawaida huamua utaftaji wa Wayahudi hadi 1829 au 1858 wakati Wayahudi waliruhusiwa kukaa katika Bunge. Knight wa kwanza wa Kiyahudi alikuwa Sir Solomon de Medina, aligonga mnamo 1700, bila kuwa na Wayahudi zaidi wakiwa na nguvu hadi 1837, wakati Malkia Victoria alipomwona Moses Haim Montefiore; Miaka minne baadaye, Isaac Lyon Goldsmid alifanywa baronet, Myahudi wa kwanza kupokea jina la urithi. Mnamo 1885 Nathan Mayer Rothschild, 1 Baron Rothschild, alikua Myahudi wa kwanza kupokea peerage ya urithi.

Brigade ya Wayahudi na Wasichana 'na Brigade ya Wasichana (JLGB) ni shirika la kitaifa la vijana la Kiyahudi linaloishi ndani na kwa kimsingi linahudumia Uingereza. 
Harakati ya vijana wa zamani wa Kiyahudi wa Uingereza, ilianzishwa mnamo 1895 kama Brigade ya Wayahudi na Kanali Albert E. W. Goldsmid, afisa mwandamizi wa jeshi, kutoa nia ya watoto wa familia nyingi za wahamiaji ambao walikuwa wakikuja Uingereza wakati huo. Kampuni ya kwanza ilizinduliwa katika Mwisho wa London Mashariki lakini wengine walitokea hivi karibuni katika jiji na majimbo. Harakati hiyo baadaye ilienea hadi Afrika Kusini na Canada.

Urithi wa Kiyahudi katika jiji hilo, ambao mara moja ni sehemu ya jamii yenye kustawi, unaweza kuwa wa nyuma karibu 1750, wakati wafanyabiashara kadhaa wa Kiyahudi kutoka Uingereza na Ulaya walikaa Sunderland, mwishowe wakitengeneza mkutano mnamo 1768. Rabi kutoka Holland alianzishwa katika jiji la 1790, baada ya ukuaji wa haraka wakati wa Jumuiya ya Wayahudi, wakati wa Jumuiya ya Wayahudi, wakati wa jua la Wayahudi, wakati wa jua la Wayahudi, wakati wa jua la Wayahudi, wakati wa jua la milimieni, wakati wa milimieni, wakati wa milimieni, wakati wa milimied, wakati wa milimied, wakati wa miline, wakati wa miline, miline its ared 199,8 Karibu Wayahudi 2000 walirekodiwa kuwa wanaishi katika mji huo. Jamii imekuwa ikipungua polepole tangu katikati ya karne ya 20. Wayahudi wengi wa Sunderland waliondoka kwa jamii zenye nguvu za Wayahudi huko Uingereza au Israeli. Shule ya Msingi ya Kiyahudi, Shule ya Menorah, iliyofungwa mnamo Julai 1983. Sunagogi kwenye barabara ya Ryhope, lilifunguliwa mnamo 1928, lilifungwa mwishoni mwa Machi 2006. (Tazama pia Wayahudi na Uyahudi huko Kaskazini Mashariki mwa England) idadi ya Wayahudi ya watu wa Sunderland, watu wa 76, kwa watu 76.

Watu wa Kiyahudi wamerekodiwa kama wanaoishi Sussex tangu karne ya 12 na wametajwa kwanza katika safu ya bomba la 1179/80 kwa Chichester. Jumuiya kubwa ya Wayahudi ilikuwepo huko Chichester na 1186. Wayahudi pia wamerekodiwa huko Arundel, Hailsham, na Lewes, na walifukuzwa kutoka Winchelsea mnamo 1273. Wayahudi wote wa Sussex wangefukuzwa mnamo 1290 wakati Edward I wa England alitoa amri ya kufukuzwa. Idadi ya Wayahudi walikuwa wamerudi Sussex mwishoni mwa karne ya 18 huko Brighton na Arundel na baadaye pia kulikuwa na watu wa Kiyahudi huko Geton, Seaford na Lewes.

Neno "swali la Kiyahudi" lilitumiwa mara ya kwanza huko Great Britain karibu 1750 wakati msemo "swali la Kiyahudi" ulitokea wakati wa muswada wa Myahudi wa mijadala 1753 huko England. Kulingana na msomi wa Holocaust Lucy Dawidowicz, neno "swali la Kiyahudi," kama ilivyoletwa katika Ulaya Magharibi, ilikuwa ishara ya upande wowote kwa mtazamo mbaya kwa umoja dhahiri na unaoendelea wa Wayahudi kama watu dhidi ya msingi wa utaifa wa kisiasa unaokua na mataifa mapya. Dawidowicz anaandika kwamba "historia ya ukombozi wa Kiyahudi na antisemitism ya Ulaya imejaa suluhisho la 'swali la Wayahudi."
report_src: Ndiyo, rekodi zinaonyesha kwamba jamii za kwanza za Wayahudi zenye ukubwa unaotambulika zilifika Uingereza pamoja na William Mshindi baada ya uvamizi wa Norman mwaka 1066, ambapo walitangazwa kuwa “masomo ya moja kwa moja” ya mfalme na hivyo kutokuwa chini ya mabwana wa kifudal kama raia wengine [1].

question_en: Who was the last ruling monarch of Spain?
pos_context_en:
Spain came into existence as a single, united kingdom under Charles I of Spain on 23 January 1516. The monarchy was briefly abolished by the First Spanish Republic from 11 February 1873 until 29 December 1874. The monarchy was abolished again on 14 April 1931, first by the Second Spanish Republic – which lasted until 1 April 1939 – and subsequently by the dictatorship of Francisco Franco, who ruled until his death on 20 November 1975. Monarchy was restored on 22 November 1975 under Juan Carlos I, who was also the monarch until his abdication in 2014. His son Felipe VI is the current monarch. 
The 1978 constitution confirms the title of the monarch is the "King of Spain", but that he may also use other titles historically associated with the Crown,
including the kingdoms of Castile and León, Aragon, the Two Sicilies, Jerusalem, Navarre, Granada, Seville, Toledo, Valencia, Galicia, Sardinia, Córdoba, Corsica, etc.
neg_context_en: To date, he is the last monarch of Spain who died whilst on the throne.

The last few years of the rule of the mentally challenged and childless Charles II, were dominated by the politics of who would succeed the unfortunate monarch, the last Spanish king of the Habsburg dynasty. Spain was at the center of this political crisis, but it was the "object not the arbiter." Economic troubles, the decay of the Spanish bureaucracy, a series of defeats in wars against France, and the erosion of imperial institutions in the seventeenth century had left Charles the king of a declining empire, and his physical and mental weakness provided him with little ability to reverse the course of his country. The vastness of the Spanish Empire in the New World, along with her naval resources, had made Spain a vital part of European power politics. If the throne of Spain was to go to a relative of the king of France, or if the two countries were to be united, the balance of power in Europe might shift in France's favor. If it remained in the hands of another member of the anti-French, Austrian Habsburg dynasty, the status quo would remain. European politics during the seventeenth century became dominated by establishing an orderly succession in Spain that would not alter the balance between Europe's great powers.

The last Spanish monarchs being solemnly crowned were John I of Castile (1379), Ferdinand I of Aragon (1414), and Eleanor of Navarre (1479). Joan III of Navarre was crowned as late as 1555, although she ruled Navarre beyond the Pyrenees.

Months later, in November 1700, Charles II died, the last Habsburg Spanish monarch. 
The Duke of Anjou, a member of the Bourbon dynasty, was appointed as his successor, and who was enthroned by the name of Philip V of Spain. 
In 1702, the War of Spanish Succession started when the House of Austria, at odds with the will, invaded the Spanish territories in Italy. 
In 1703, maritime powers, England and Holland joined the House of Austria and declared war against the Two Crowns, Bourbon France and Spain. In Vienna the young archduke Charles of Austria was called for as an alternative candidate to rule Spain. 
In 1704, Charles moved to Portugal where he sought to recover from the Spanish throne for the Hapsburg dynasty. On the other side of the peninsula allies launched an attempted landing in Barcelona with the complicity of a small number of Austrian locals.
The plot was discovered and the allied landings failed. The exiled Austrian viceroy of Catalonia, Francisco Velasco was shocked and wanting to avoid any further Austrian conspiracies. Francisco began an indiscriminate repression in Barcelona, and repeatedly violated the constitution of Catalonia. This was a policy that unleashed hatred against, his sovereign, Philip V of Spain.

For those who ruled in or over Valencia, see the following pages:During the war (officially in 1707) Philip d'Anjou, the first of the Bourbon empire in Spain, disbanded the Crown of Aragon (Nueva Planta decrees). After this time, there are no more Aragonese monarchs. Nevertheless, Spanish monarchs up to Isabella II, while styling themselves "king/queen of Spain" on coins, still used some of the traditional nomenclature of the defunct Crown of Aragon in their official documents: "King/Queen of Castile, Leon, Aragon, both Sicilies, Jerusalem, Navarra, Granada, Toledo, Valencia, Galicia, Majorca, Sevilla, Sardinia, Cordova, Corsica, Murcia, Jaen, the Algarve, Algeciras, Gibraltar, the Canary Islands, the Eastern & Western Indias, the Islands & Mainland of the Ocean sea; Archduke of Austria; Duke of Burgundy, Brabant, Milan; Count of Habsburg, Flanders, Tyrol, Barcelona; Lord of Biscay, Molina".

In total, nine Stewart/Stuart monarchs ruled Scotland alone from 1371 until 1603. The last ruler of Scotland alone was James VI, who in 1603 became the first dual monarch of England and Scotland. Following the Glorious Revolution in 1688, two Stuart queens ruled the isles: Mary II and Anne. Both were the Protestant daughters of James VII and II by his first wife. They were the great-grandchildren of James VI and I. Their father had converted to Catholicism and his new wife gave birth to a son in 1688, who was brought up a Roman Catholic and preceded his half-sisters; so James was deposed by Parliament in 1689, in favour of his daughters. But neither had any children who survived to adulthood, so under the terms of the Act of Settlement 1701 and the Act of Security 1704, the crown passed to the House of Hanover on the death of Queen Anne in 1714.

Spain's world empire reached its greatest territorial extent in the late 18th century but it was under the Habsburg dynasty in the 16th and 17th centuries it reached the peak of its power and declined. The Iberian Union with Portugal meant that the monarch of Castile was also the monarch of Portugal, but they were ruled as separate entities both on the peninsula and in Spanish America and Brazil. In 1640, the House of Braganza revolted against Spanish rule and reasserted Portugal's independence.

The threat of internal stability remained until the marriage of Queen Isabella I of Castile and King Ferdinand II of Aragon in 1469. The two monarchs were promptly challenged by Joan of Castile but were swiftly successful. Isabella would go on to establish the "Hermandad" militia system, which would provide her with a royal counterbalance to any future challenge from the nobility. The two monarchs proceeded to conquer the Kingdom of Granada, the last Islamic state in the Iberian peninsula, which was completed by 1492. In that same year, the Alhambra Decree was issued, expelling all Jews from both Castile and Aragon. Now unified, Spain now enjoyed relative internal stability; rights and lands across the Mediterranean; and a strong tradition of seafaring in both the Atlantic and Mediterranean, which it would maximise in the coming decades.

Franco ruled until his death on 20 November 1975, when control was given to King Juan Carlos. In the last few months before Franco's death, the Spanish state went into a paralysis. This was capitalized upon by King Hassan II of Morocco, who ordered the 'Green March' into Western Sahara, Spain's last colonial possession.
question_src: Mfalme wa mwisho wa Uhispania alikuwa nani?
pos_context_src:
Uhispania ilitokea kama moja, Uingereza chini ya Charles I ya Uhispania mnamo 23 Januari 1516. Mfalme huo ulifutwa kwa kifupi na Jamhuri ya kwanza ya Uhispania kutoka 11 Februari 1873 hadi 29 Desemba 1874. Kifo chake mnamo Novemba 20, 1975. Utawala ulirudishwa mnamo 22 Novemba 1975 chini ya Juan Carlos I, ambaye pia alikuwa mfalme hadi kutekwa kwake mnamo 2014. Mwanawe Felipe VI ndiye mfalme wa sasa. 
Katiba ya 1978 inathibitisha jina la Mfalme ni "Mfalme wa Uhispania", lakini kwamba anaweza kutumia majina mengine kihistoria yanayohusiana na taji,
Ikiwa ni pamoja na falme za Castile na León, Aragon, Sicilies mbili, Yerusalemu, Navarre, Granada, Seville, Toledo, Valencia, Galicia, Sardinia, Córdoba, Corsica, nk.
neg_context_src: Hadi leo, yeye ndiye mfalme wa mwisho wa Uhispania ambaye alikufa wakati wa kiti cha enzi.

Miaka michache iliyopita ya utawala wa Charles II aliyepewa changamoto na mtoto, walitawaliwa na siasa za nani angefanikiwa Mfalme wa bahati mbaya, mfalme wa mwisho wa Uhispania wa nasaba ya Habsburg. Uhispania ilikuwa katikati ya mzozo huu wa kisiasa, lakini ilikuwa "kitu sio mshambuliaji." Shida za kiuchumi, kuoza kwa urasimu wa Uhispania, safu ya kushindwa katika vita dhidi ya Ufaransa, na mmomonyoko wa taasisi za kifalme katika karne ya kumi na saba ulikuwa umemwacha Charles Mfalme wa ufalme uliopungua, na udhaifu wake wa mwili na kiakili ulimpa uwezo mdogo wa kubadili kozi ya nchi yake. Ukuu wa ufalme wa Uhispania katika Ulimwengu Mpya, pamoja na rasilimali zake za majini, ulikuwa umeifanya Uhispania kuwa sehemu muhimu ya siasa za nguvu za Ulaya. Ikiwa kiti cha enzi cha Uhispania kingeenda kwa jamaa wa Mfalme wa Ufaransa, au ikiwa nchi hizo mbili zingeungana, usawa wa madaraka huko Uropa unaweza kubadilika kwa upendeleo wa Ufaransa. Ikiwa ilibaki mikononi mwa mwanachama mwingine wa nasaba ya Anti-French, nasaba ya Habsburg ya Austria, hali hiyo ingebaki. Siasa za Ulaya wakati wa karne ya kumi na saba zilitawaliwa kwa kuanzisha mfululizo wa utaratibu nchini Uhispania ambao hautabadilisha usawa kati ya nguvu kubwa za Uropa.

Wafalme wa mwisho wa Uhispania waliowekwa taji walikuwa John I wa Castile (1379), Ferdinand I wa Aragon (1414), na Eleanor wa Navarre (1479). Joan III wa Navarre alipewa taji mwishoni mwa 1555, ingawa alitawala Navarre zaidi ya Pyrenees.

Miezi baadaye, mnamo Novemba 1700, Charles II alikufa, Mfalme wa mwisho wa Uhispania wa Habsburg. 
Duke wa Anjou, mwanachama wa nasaba ya Bourbon, aliteuliwa kama mrithi wake, na ambaye alipewa jina la jina la Philip V wa Uhispania. 
Mnamo 1702, Vita ya Uhispania ya Uhispania ilianza wakati Nyumba ya Austria, ikiwa mbaya na mapenzi, ilivamia wilaya za Uhispania nchini Italia. 
Mnamo 1703, Nguvu za Maritime, England na Holland zilijiunga na Nyumba ya Austria na kutangaza vita dhidi ya taji hizo mbili, Bourbon Ufaransa na Uhispania. Huko Vienna archduke mdogo wa Austria aliitwa kama mgombea mbadala wa kutawala Uhispania. 
Mnamo 1704, Charles alihamia Ureno ambapo alitaka kupona kutoka kwa kiti cha enzi cha Uhispania kwa nasaba ya Hapsburg. Upande mwingine wa washirika wa peninsula walizindua kutua huko Barcelona na ugumu wa idadi ndogo ya wenyeji wa Austria.
Njama hiyo iligunduliwa na kutua kwa Allies kushindwa. Viceroy aliyehamishwa wa Austria wa Catalonia, Francisco Velasco alishtuka na kutaka kuzuia njama zozote za Austria. Francisco alianza ukandamizwaji wa ubaguzi huko Barcelona, ​​na akakiuka mara kwa mara katiba ya Catalonia. Hii ilikuwa sera ambayo ilifunua chuki dhidi yake, Mfalme wake, Philip V wa Uhispania.

Kwa wale ambao walitawala ndani au zaidi ya Valencia, angalia kurasa zifuatazo: Wakati wa Vita (rasmi mnamo 1707) Philip d'Anjou, wa kwanza wa Dola ya Bourbon huko Uhispania, aliondoa taji ya Aragon (Nueva Planta. Baada ya wakati huu, hakuna wafalme zaidi wa Aragonese. Walakini, wafalme wa Uhispania hadi Isabella II, wakati wakijifunga wenyewe "Mfalme/Malkia wa Uhispania" kwenye sarafu, bado walitumia jina la jadi la taji ya Aragon katika hati zao rasmi: "Mfalme wa Castile, Leon, Aragon, Sicilies, Jerusalem, Navarra, Granada, Toladada, Toladadada, Ti, Sardinia, Cordova, Corsica, Murcia, Jan, Algarve, Algeciras, Gibraltar, Visiwa vya Canary, Indias za Magharibi na Magharibi, Visiwa vya Bahari ya Bahari;

Kwa jumla, Monarchs tisa wa Stewart/Stuart alitawala Scotland peke yake kutoka 1371 hadi 1603. Mtawala wa mwisho wa Scotland pekee alikuwa James VI, ambaye mnamo 1603 akawa Mfalme wa kwanza wa England na Scotland. Kufuatia Mapinduzi ya utukufu mnamo 1688, Stuart Queens mbili zilitawala Visiwa: Mary II na Anne. Wote walikuwa binti wa Kiprotestanti wa James VII na II na mke wake wa kwanza. Walikuwa wajukuu wa James VI na mimi. Baba yao alikuwa amegeukia Ukatoliki na mke wake mpya akazaa mtoto wa kiume mnamo 1688, ambaye alilelewa Mkatoliki na aliwatangulia dada zake wa nusu; Kwa hivyo James aliondolewa na Bunge mnamo 1689, kwa niaba ya binti zake. Lakini hakuna watoto wowote ambao walinusurika kuwa watu wazima, kwa hivyo chini ya masharti ya Sheria ya Makazi 1701 na Sheria ya Usalama 1704, Taji ilipitishwa kwa Nyumba ya Hanover juu ya kifo cha Malkia Anne mnamo 1714.

Milki ya Ulimwenguni ya Uhispania ilifikia kiwango chake kikubwa zaidi katika karne ya 18 lakini ilikuwa chini ya nasaba ya Habsburg katika karne ya 16 na 17 ilifikia kilele cha nguvu yake na ilipungua. Muungano wa Iberia na Ureno ulimaanisha kwamba mfalme wa Castile pia alikuwa mfalme wa Ureno, lakini walitawaliwa kama vyombo tofauti kwenye peninsula na Amerika ya Uhispania na Brazil. Mnamo 1640, Nyumba ya Braganza iliasi dhidi ya utawala wa Uhispania na ikasisitiza uhuru wa Ureno.

Tishio la utulivu wa ndani lilibaki hadi ndoa ya Malkia Isabella I wa Castile na Mfalme Ferdinand II wa Aragon mnamo 1469. Watawala hao wawili walipingwa mara moja na Joan wa Castile lakini walifanikiwa haraka. Isabella angeendelea kuanzisha mfumo wa wanamgambo wa "Hermandad", ambao ungempa mpango wa kifalme kwa changamoto yoyote ya baadaye kutoka kwa heshima. Wafalme hao wawili waliendelea kushinda ufalme wa Granada, Jimbo la mwisho la Kiisilamu katika peninsula ya Iberia, ambayo ilikamilishwa na 1492. Katika mwaka huo huo, amri ya Alhambra ilitolewa, ikifukuza Wayahudi wote kutoka kwa Castile na Aragon. Sasa umoja, Uhispania sasa ilifurahia utulivu wa ndani; haki na ardhi katika Bahari ya Mediterania; na mila kali ya baharini katika Atlantiki na Bahari, ambayo ingeongeza katika miongo ijayo.

Franco alitawala hadi kifo chake mnamo Novemba 20, 1975, wakati udhibiti ulipopewa Mfalme Juan Carlos. Katika miezi michache iliyopita kabla ya kifo cha Franco, serikali ya Uhispania iliingia kupooza. Hii ilipewa mtaji na Mfalme Hassan II wa Moroko, ambaye aliamuru 'Green March' kwenda Sahara ya Magharibi, milki ya mwisho ya ukoloni ya Uhispania.
report_src: Mfalme wa mwisho (yaani anayeshikilia taji kwa sasa) wa Uhispania ni Felipe VI, ambaye alipochukua wadhifa huo tarehe 19 Juni 2014 kufuatia kujiuzulu kwa baba yake, Juan Carlos I, alirithi ufalme uliorejeshwa tarehe 22 Novemba 1975 baada ya kifo cha Franco na kutawazwa kwa Juan Carlos I [1].
