question_en: When was the Bill of Rights written?
pos_context_en: The Bill of Rights, also known as the English Bill of Rights, is an Act of the Parliament of England that sets out certain basic civil rights and clarifies who would be next to inherit the Crown. It received the Royal Assent on 16 December 1689 and is a restatement in statutory form of the Declaration of Right presented by the Convention Parliament to William III and Mary II in February 1689, inviting them to become joint sovereigns of England. The Bill of Rights lays down limits on the powers of the monarch and sets out the rights of Parliament, including the requirement for regular parliaments, free elections, and freedom of speech in Parliament. It sets out certain rights of individuals including the prohibition of cruel and unusual punishment and reestablished the right of Protestants to have arms for their defence within the rule of law. Furthermore, the Bill of Rights described and condemned several misdeeds of James II of England.
neg_context_en: The Bill of Rights in the United States is the first ten amendments to the United States Constitution. Proposed following the often bitter 1787–88 debate over ratification of the U.S. Constitution, and written to address the objections raised by Anti-Federalists, the Bill of Rights amendments add to the Constitution specific guarantees of personal freedoms and rights, clear limitations on the government's power in judicial and other proceedings, and explicit declarations that all powers not specifically delegated to Congress by the Constitution are reserved for the states or the people. The concepts codified in these amendments are built upon those found in several earlier documents, including the Virginia Declaration of Rights and the English Bill of Rights, along with earlier documents such as Magna Carta (1215). In practice, the amendments had little impact on judgments by the courts for the first 150 years after ratification.

The committee draft was written chiefly by George Mason, and the final version was adopted by the Virginia Convention with significant amendments by Robert C. Nicholas and James Madison on June 12, 1776.
The Virginia Declaration of Rights heavily influenced later documents. The Committee of Five is thought to have drawn on it when they drafted the United States Declaration of Independence in the same month (June 1776). James Madison was also influenced by the Declaration while drafting the Bill of Rights (introduced September 1789, ratified 1791).

Originally written by Forrest Spaulding, director of the Des Moines Public Library, in 1938, the Library Bill of Rights was adopted by the American Library Association in 1939, and has been revised several times since. Its original adoption was introduced with the statement, "Today indications in many parts of the world point to growing intolerance, suppression of free speech, and censorship affecting the rights of minorities and individuals," a reference to the emergence of totalitarian states during that time.

Emanuel Celler (D-NY), Chair of the House Judiciary Committee, introduced the Voting Rights Act in the House of Representatives on March 19, 1965 as H.R. 6400. The House Judiciary Committee was the first committee to consider the bill. The committee's ranking Republican, William McCulloch (R-OH), generally supported expanding voting rights, but he opposed both the poll tax ban and the coverage formula, and he led opposition to the bill in committee. The committee eventually approved the bill on May 12, but it did not file its committee report until June 1. The bill included two amendments from subcommittee: a penalty for private persons who interfered with the right to vote, and a prohibition of all poll taxes. The poll tax prohibition gained Speaker of the House John McCormack's support. The bill was next considered by the Rules Committee, whose chair, Howard W. Smith (D-VA), opposed the bill and delayed its consideration until June 24, when Celler initiated proceedings to have the bill discharged from committee. Under pressure from the bill's proponents, Smith allowed the bill to be released a week later, and the full House started debating the bill on July 6.

On June 11, 1963, President Kennedy met with Republican leaders to discuss the legislation before his television address to the nation that evening. Two days later, Senate Minority Leader Everett Dirksen and Senate Majority Leader Mike Mansfield both voiced support for the president's bill, except for provisions guaranteeing equal access to places of public accommodations. This led to several Republican Representatives drafting a compromise bill to be considered. On June 19, the president sent his bill to Congress as it was originally written, saying legislative action was "imperative". The president's bill went first to the House of Representatives, where it was referred to the Judiciary Committee, chaired by Emanuel Celler, a Democrat from New York. After a series of hearings on the bill, Celler's committee strengthened the act, adding provisions to ban racial discrimination in employment, providing greater protection to black voters, eliminating segregation in all publicly-owned facilities (not just schools), and strengthening the anti-segregation clauses regarding public facilities such as lunch counters. They also added authorization for the Attorney General to file lawsuits to protect individuals against the deprivation of any rights secured by the Constitution or U.S. law. In essence, this was the controversial "Title III" that had been removed from the 1957 Act and 1960 Act. Civil rights organizations pressed hard for this provision because it could be used to protect peaceful protesters and black voters from police brutality and suppression of free speech rights.

There are important differences between these little studied declarations. Where the Bill of Rights states that the King cannot make laws without the consent of Parliament, the Claim of Right says that all assertions of a right to rule above the law are themselves against the law. The Bill of Rights was inspired by John Locke. Behind the Claim of Right can be detected the guiding hand of James Dalrymple, 1st Viscount of Stair 1619–1695. Hume studied law as a student at Edinburgh. He implies that he neglected this study. This must be taken with a pinch of salt. He may have wanted to avoid giving the lay reader the impression that he had written a history just for lawyers like William Blackstone. What is certain is that he names two of the founders of Roman Dutch law, Johannes Voet and Arnold Vinnius, in the same breath as Cicero and Virgil. Cicero was, of course, a lawyer. The standard work for a Scottish law student to study was, then as now, "Stair's Institutions of the laws of Scotland".

The committee draft, likely for the most part written by Mason, received wide publicity (the final version much less so) and Mason's words "all men are born equally free and independent" were later reproduced in state constitutions from Pennsylvania to Montana; Jefferson tweaked the prose and included the sentiments in the Declaration of Independence. In 1778, Mason wrote that the Declaration of Rights "was closely imitated by the other United States". This was true, as seven of the original states, and Vermont, joined Virginia in promulgating a bill of rights. Four in addition specified rights that were protected, within the body of their constitutions. Feelings were so strong in Massachusetts that voters there in 1778 rejected a constitution drafted by a convention, insisting that a bill of rights had to come first.

The First Amendment is part of a group of 10 Amendments to the United States Constitution known as the Bill of Rights. The idea of adding a Bill of Rights to the Constitution was proposed by George Mason five days before the conclusion of the Constitutional Convention held in Philadelphia in 1787. His proposal was rejected by the other delegates. Alexander Hamilton later argued in "The Federalist Papers" that a Bill of Rights was unnecessary, claiming that since the Constitution granted limited powers to the federal government, it did not grant the new government the power to abuse the rights that would be secured by a Bill of Rights. Nevertheless, the supporters of the Constitution (known as Federalists) in order to secure its ratification in Massachusetts, agreed to add a group of Amendments to the Constitution after its ratification that would serve as a Bill of Rights. Later, six more states likewise recommended the addition of a Bill of Rights, and the idea also gained the support of Jefferson and Madison. When the First Federal Congress met in 1789, Madison implemented the idea by introducing 17 Amendments to the Constitution. By December 1791, ten of his Amendments were ratified by the necessary three quarters of the states, and they became part of the US Constitution, thereafter becoming known as "the Bill of Rights".

On September 12, George Mason of Virginia suggested the addition of a Bill of Rights to the Constitution modeled on previous state declarations, and Elbridge Gerry of Massachusetts made it a formal motion. However, after only a brief discussion where Roger Sherman pointed out that State Bills of Rights were not repealed by the new Constitution, the motion was defeated by a unanimous vote of the state delegations. Madison, then an opponent of a Bill of Rights, later explained the vote by calling the state bills of rights "parchment barriers" that offered only an illusion of protection against tyranny. Another delegate, James Wilson of Pennsylvania, later argued that the act of enumerating the rights of the people would have been dangerous, because it would imply that rights not explicitly mentioned did not exist; Hamilton echoed this point in "Federalist" No. 84.
question_src: Muswada wa haki uliandikwa lini?
pos_context_src: Muswada wa Haki, pia unajulikana kama Muswada wa Haki za Kiingereza, ni kitendo cha Bunge la England ambalo linaweka haki fulani za msingi za raia na anafafanua ni nani atakayekuwa karibu kurithi Taji. Ilipokea idhini ya kifalme mnamo 16 Desemba 1689 na ni marejesho katika fomu ya kisheria ya Azimio la Haki lililowasilishwa na Bunge la Mkutano kwa William III na Mary II mnamo Februari 1689, wakiwaalika kuwa wafalme wa pamoja wa England. Muswada wa Haki unaweka mipaka juu ya nguvu za Mfalme na huweka haki za Bunge, pamoja na hitaji la wabunge wa kawaida, uchaguzi wa bure, na uhuru wa kusema bungeni. Inaweka haki fulani za watu ikiwa ni pamoja na marufuku ya adhabu kali na isiyo ya kawaida na ilibadilisha haki ya Waprotestanti kuwa na mikono ya utetezi wao katika sheria. Kwa kuongezea, Muswada wa Haki ulielezea na kulaani makosa kadhaa ya James II ya England.
neg_context_title_src: Sheria ya Haki za Upigaji kura ya 1965
Sheria ya Haki za Kiraia ya 1964
neg_context_src: Muswada wa Haki nchini Merika ni marekebisho kumi ya kwanza kwa Katiba ya Merika. Iliyopendekezwa kufuatia mjadala wenye uchungu wa 1787-88 juu ya kuridhia Katiba ya Merika, na iliandikwa kushughulikia pingamizi zilizoletwa na wapinzani wa serikali, Muswada wa Marekebisho ya Haki unaongeza dhamana maalum ya uhuru na haki za kibinafsi, mapungufu ya wazi juu ya nguvu ya serikali na kesi zingine, na tamko zilizo wazi kwa sababu hiyo zinaelezewa kwa sheria. Dhana zilizowekwa katika marekebisho haya zimejengwa juu ya zile zilizopatikana katika hati kadhaa za mapema, pamoja na Azimio la Haki za Virginia na Muswada wa Haki za Kiingereza, pamoja na hati za mapema kama Magna Carta (1215). Kwa vitendo, marekebisho hayo yalikuwa na athari kidogo kwa hukumu na mahakama kwa miaka 150 ya kwanza baada ya kuridhiwa.

Rasimu ya kamati iliandikwa hasa na George Mason, na toleo la mwisho lilipitishwa na Mkutano wa Virginia na marekebisho makubwa na Robert C. Nicholas na James Madison mnamo Juni 12, 1776.
Azimio la haki za Virginia lilisababisha sana hati za baadaye. Kamati ya tano inadhaniwa kuwa imevutia wakati waliandaa Azimio la Uhuru la Merika katika mwezi huo huo (Juni 1776). James Madison pia alishawishiwa na Azimio hilo wakati wa kuandaa Muswada wa Haki (ulioanzishwa Septemba 1789, uliridhia 1791).

Hapo awali iliandikwa na Forrest Spaulding, mkurugenzi wa Maktaba ya Umma ya Des Moines, mnamo 1938, Muswada wa Haki za Maktaba ulipitishwa na Chama cha Maktaba ya Amerika mnamo 1939, na umebadilishwa mara kadhaa tangu. Kupitishwa kwake kwa asili ilianzishwa na taarifa hiyo, "leo dalili katika sehemu nyingi za ulimwengu zinaashiria kuongezeka kwa uvumilivu, kukandamiza hotuba ya bure, na udhibiti unaoathiri haki za watu wachache na watu," kumbukumbu ya kuibuka kwa majimbo ya jumla wakati huo.

Emanuel Celler (D-NY), Mwenyekiti wa Kamati ya Majaji ya Nyumba, alianzisha Sheria ya Haki za Upigaji kura katika Baraza la Wawakilishi mnamo Machi 19, 1965 kama H.R. 6400. Kamati ya Majaji ya Nyumba ilikuwa kamati ya kwanza ya kuzingatia muswada huo. Republican wa kiwango cha juu cha Kamati, William McCulloch (R-OH), kwa ujumla aliunga mkono kupanua haki za kupiga kura, lakini alipinga marufuku ya ushuru wa kura ya maoni na mfumo wa chanjo, na aliongoza kupinga muswada huo katika kamati. Hatimaye Kamati iliidhinisha muswada huo mnamo Mei 12, lakini haikuweka ripoti ya kamati yake hadi Juni 1. Muswada huo ulijumuisha marekebisho mawili kutoka kamati ndogo: adhabu kwa watu binafsi ambao waliingilia haki ya kupiga kura, na marufuku ya ushuru wote wa kura. Marufuku ya ushuru wa kura ya maoni yalipata Spika wa Msaada wa Nyumba John McCormack. Muswada huo ulizingatiwa baadaye na Kamati ya Sheria, ambaye mwenyekiti wake, Howard W. Smith (D-VA), alipinga muswada huo na kuchelewesha kuzingatiwa hadi Juni 24, wakati Celler alianzisha kesi ili muswada huo kutolewa kwa kamati. Chini ya shinikizo kutoka kwa watetezi wa muswada huo, Smith aliruhusu muswada huo kutolewa wiki moja baadaye, na nyumba kamili ilianza kujadili muswada huo mnamo Julai 6.

Mnamo Juni 11, 1963, Rais Kennedy alikutana na viongozi wa Republican kujadili sheria hiyo kabla ya anwani yake ya runinga kwa taifa hilo jioni hiyo. Siku mbili baadaye, Kiongozi wa Seneti wachache Everett Dirksen na Kiongozi Mkuu wa Seneti Mike Mansfield wote walionyesha msaada wa muswada wa rais, isipokuwa kwa vifungu vinavyohakikisha upatikanaji sawa wa maeneo ya makao ya umma. Hii ilisababisha wawakilishi kadhaa wa Republican kuandaa muswada wa maelewano kuzingatiwa. Mnamo Juni 19, rais alituma muswada wake kwa Congress kama ilivyoandikwa awali, akisema hatua ya kisheria ilikuwa "muhimu". Muswada wa rais ulikwenda kwanza kwa Baraza la Wawakilishi, ambapo ilielekezwa kwa Kamati ya Majaji, iliyoongozwa na Emanuel Celler, Democrat kutoka New York. Baada ya safu ya usikilizaji juu ya muswada huo, Kamati ya Celler iliimarisha Sheria hiyo, na kuongeza vifungu vya kupiga marufuku ubaguzi wa rangi katika ajira, kutoa ulinzi mkubwa kwa wapiga kura weusi, kuondoa ubaguzi katika vifaa vyote vinavyomilikiwa na umma (sio shule tu), na kuimarisha vifungu vya kujitenga kuhusu vifaa vya umma kama vile hesabu za chakula cha mchana. Waliongeza pia idhini kwa Mwanasheria Mkuu wa Serikali kuweka kesi za kesi kulinda watu dhidi ya kunyimwa haki yoyote iliyohifadhiwa na Katiba au sheria ya Merika. Kwa asili, hii ilikuwa "Kichwa cha III" cha ubishani ambacho kiliondolewa kutoka Sheria ya 1957 na Sheria ya 1960. Mashirika ya haki za raia yalishinikiza kwa bidii kwa kifungu hiki kwa sababu inaweza kutumika kulinda waandamanaji wa amani na wapiga kura weusi kutoka kwa ukatili wa polisi na kukandamiza haki za hotuba ya bure.

Kuna tofauti muhimu kati ya matamko haya madogo yaliyosomewa. Ambapo Muswada wa Haki unasema kwamba Mfalme hawezi kufanya sheria bila idhini ya Bunge, madai ya haki yanasema kwamba madai yote ya haki ya kutawala juu ya sheria ni dhidi ya sheria. Muswada wa Haki uliongozwa na John Locke. Nyuma ya madai ya haki inaweza kugunduliwa mkono wa mwongozo wa James Dalrymple, 1st Viscount ya Stair 1619-1695. Hume alisoma sheria kama mwanafunzi huko Edinburgh. Anamaanisha kwamba alipuuza utafiti huu. Hii lazima ichukuliwe na chumvi kidogo. Labda alitaka kuzuia kumpa msomaji huyo maoni kwamba alikuwa ameandika historia kwa mawakili kama William Blackstone. Ni nini hakika ni kwamba anataja waanzilishi wawili wa sheria za Uholanzi wa Kirumi, Johannes Voet na Arnold Vinnius, katika pumzi ile ile kama Cicero na Virgil. Cicero alikuwa, kwa kweli, wakili. Kazi ya kawaida kwa mwanafunzi wa sheria ya Scottish kusoma, basi kama sasa, "Taasisi za Stair za Sheria za Scotland".

Rasimu ya kamati, ikiwezekana kwa sehemu kubwa iliyoandikwa na Mason, ilipokea utangazaji mpana (toleo la mwisho ni chini sana) na maneno ya Mason "Wanaume wote huzaliwa sawa na huru" baadaye yalitolewa tena katika kanuni za serikali kutoka Pennsylvania hadi Montana; Jefferson aliunganisha prose na ni pamoja na hisia katika Azimio la Uhuru. Mnamo 1778, Mason aliandika kwamba Azimio la Haki "liliiga kwa karibu na Merika zingine". Hii ilikuwa kweli, kama majimbo saba ya asili, na Vermont, alijiunga na Virginia katika kutangaza muswada wa haki. Nne kwa kuongeza haki maalum ambazo zililindwa, ndani ya miili ya kanuni zao. Hisia zilikuwa na nguvu sana huko Massachusetts hivi kwamba wapiga kura huko mnamo 1778 walikataa katiba iliyoandaliwa na mkutano, ikisisitiza kwamba muswada wa haki ulipaswa kuja kwanza.

Marekebisho ya Kwanza ni sehemu ya kikundi cha marekebisho 10 kwa Katiba ya Merika inayojulikana kama Mswada wa Haki. Wazo la kuongeza muswada wa haki kwa Katiba lilipendekezwa na George Mason siku tano kabla ya kumalizika kwa Mkataba wa Katiba uliofanyika Philadelphia mnamo 1787. Pendekezo lake lilikataliwa na wajumbe wengine. Alexander Hamilton baadaye alibishana katika "Karatasi za Shirikisho" kwamba muswada wa haki haukuwa lazima, akidai kwamba kwa kuwa Katiba hiyo ilipeana nguvu ndogo kwa serikali ya shirikisho, haikuipa serikali mpya nguvu ya kutumia vibaya haki ambazo zitalindwa na muswada wa haki. Walakini, wafuasi wa Katiba (inayojulikana kama Shirikisho) ili kupata dhamana yake huko Massachusetts, walikubaliana kuongeza kikundi cha marekebisho ya Katiba baada ya kuridhiwa ambayo inaweza kutumika kama muswada wa haki. Baadaye, majimbo mengine sita vivyo hivyo yalipendekeza kuongezwa kwa muswada wa haki, na wazo hilo pia lilipata msaada wa Jefferson na Madison. Wakati Bunge la kwanza la Shirikisho lilipokutana mnamo 1789, Madison alitekeleza wazo hilo kwa kuanzisha marekebisho 17 ya Katiba. Kufikia Desemba 1791, marekebisho yake kumi yaliridhiwa na robo tatu muhimu za majimbo, na wakawa sehemu ya Katiba ya Amerika, baadaye ikajulikana kama "Mswada wa Haki".

Mnamo Septemba 12, George Mason wa Virginia alipendekeza kuongezwa kwa Muswada wa Haki kwa Katiba zilizowekwa kwenye matamko ya serikali ya zamani, na Elbridge Gerry wa Massachusetts aliifanya iwe mwendo rasmi. Walakini, baada ya majadiliano mafupi tu ambapo Roger Sherman alisema kwamba miswada ya haki za serikali hazikufutwa na Katiba mpya, hoja hiyo ilishindwa na kura ya makubaliano ya serikali. Madison, wakati huo alikuwa mpinzani wa muswada wa haki, baadaye alielezea kura hiyo kwa kuita Miswada ya Haki ya "vizuizi vya ngozi" ambavyo vilitoa udanganyifu tu wa ulinzi dhidi ya udhalimu. Mjumbe mwingine, James Wilson wa Pennsylvania, baadaye alisema kwamba kitendo cha kuelezea haki za watu zingekuwa hatari, kwa sababu itamaanisha kuwa haki ambazo hazijatajwa wazi hazikuwepo; Hamilton alielezea hatua hii katika "Shirikisho" Na. 84.
report_src: Muswada wa Haki uliandikwa mwaka 1689, ukiwasilishwa kama marejesho ya kisheria ya Azimio la Haki kwa William III na Mary II mnamo Februari 1689, kabla ya kupata idhini ya kifalme tarehe 16 Desemba 1689 [1].
all_claims: Muswada wa Haki uliandikwa mwaka 1689, ukiwasilishwa kama marejesho ya kisheria ya Azimio la Haki kwa William III na Mary II mnamo Februari 1689, kabla ya kupata idhini ya kifalme tarehe 16 Desemba 1689 [1].
claims_w_citations: Muswada wa Haki uliandikwa mwaka 1689, ukiwasilishwa kama marejesho ya kisheria ya Azimio la Haki kwa William III na Mary II mnamo Februari 1689, kabla ya kupata idhini ya kifalme tarehe 16 Desemba 1689 [1].

question_en: Will periods cease on progestin only birth control?
pos_context_en: Progestins in birth control pills are sometimes grouped by generation. While the 19-nortestosterone progestins are consistently grouped into generations, the pregnane progestins that are or have been used in birth control pills are typically omitted from such classifications or are grouped simply as "miscellaneous" or "pregnanes". In any case, CPA has been described as a "first-generation" progestin similarly to closely related progestins like chlormadinone acetate, medroxyprogesterone acetate, and megestrol acetate.
neg_context_title_en: Birth control in the United States
neg_context_en: A full list of contraindications can be found in the WHO "Medical Eligibility Criteria for Contraceptive Use" and the CDC"United States Medical Eligibility Criteria for Contraceptive Use".According to a 1999 evaluation of the studies performed on progestin-only birth control by the International Agency for Research on Cancer, there is some evidence that progestin-only birth control reduces the risk of endometrial cancer. The IARC concluded that there is no evidence progestin-only birth control increases the risk of any cancer, though the available studies were too small to be definitively conclusive.

The effect on sexual desire is varied, with increase or decrease in some but with no effect in most. Combined oral contraceptives reduce the risk of ovarian cancer and endometrial cancer and do not change the risk of breast cancer. They often reduce menstrual bleeding and painful menstruation cramps. The lower doses of estrogen released from the vaginal ring may reduce the risk of breast tenderness, nausea, and headache associated with higher dose estrogen products.
Progestin-only pills, injections and intrauterine devices are not associated with an increased risk of blood clots and may be used by women with a history of blood clots in their veins. In those with a history of arterial blood clots, non-hormonal birth control or a progestin-only method other than the injectable version should be used. Progestin-only pills may improve menstrual symptoms and can be used by breastfeeding women as they do not affect milk production. Irregular bleeding may occur with progestin-only methods, with some users reporting no periods. The progestins drospirenone and desogestrel minimize the androgenic side effects but increase the risks of blood clots and are thus not first line. The perfect use first-year failure rate of injectable progestin is 0.2%; the typical use first failure rate is 6%.

The mechanism of action of progestin only contraceptives depends on the progestin activity and dose. Intermediate dose progestin-only contraceptives, like Nexplanon or Implanon (and the progestin-only pill Cerazette) allow some follicular development but inhibit ovulation in almost all cycles as the primary mechanism of action. Ovulation was not observed in studies of Implanon in the first two years of use and only rarely in the third year with no pregnancies. A secondary mechanism of action is the progestogenic increase in cervical mucus viscosity which inhibits sperm penetration. Hormonal contraceptives also have effects on the endometrium that theoretically could affect implantation, however no scientific evidence indicates that prevention of implantation actually results from their use.

Contraception has many benefits beyond preventing pregnancy. Combination estrogen-progestin contraceptives can successfully treat dysmenorrhea (painful periods), provide symptom relief from endometriosis, reduce heavy menstrual bleeding and improve anemia related to menstrual blood loss, reduce symptoms of premenstrual syndrome and premenstrual dysphoric disorder, reduce ovarian and colon cancer risk, reduce moderate acne, prevent of menstrual migraines, and reduce hirsutism (abnormal hair growth). The progestin containing intrauterine device can reduce heavy menstrual bleeding and protect against pre-cancerous changes or cancer in the uterus. Condoms (male or female) are the only contraceptive method which protects against acquisition of sexually transmitted infections.

Improvements of existing birth control methods are needed, as around half of those who get pregnant unintentionally are using birth control at the time. A number of alterations of existing contraceptive methods are being studied, including a better female condom, an improved diaphragm, a patch containing only progestin, and a vaginal ring containing long-acting progesterone. This vaginal ring appears to be effective for three or four months and is currently available in some areas of the world. For women who rarely have sex, the taking of the hormonal birth control levonorgestrel around the time of sex looks promising.

In May 2015 the Obama administration stated that under the ACA, at least one form of all 18 FDA-approved methods of birth control for women must be covered without cost-sharing. These 18 methods include: sterilization surgery, surgical sterilization implant, implantable rod, copper intrauterine device, IUDs with progestin (a hormone), shot/injection, oral contraceptives (the pill), with estrogen and progestin, oral contraceptives with progestin only, oral contraceptives, known as extended or continuous use that delay menstruation, the patch, vaginal contraceptive ring, diaphragm, sponge, cervical cap, female condom, spermicide, emergency contraception (Plan B/morning-after pill), and emergency contraception (a different pill called Ella). All forms of male birth control are exempt from mandatory coverage under the ACA and the "ObamaCare Facts" page explicitly states that "Plans aren’t required to cover services related to a man’s reproductive capacity, like vasectomies."

Because combined birth control pills and other forms of combined birth control contain an estrogen, and because elagolix treats endometriosis by decreasing estrogen levels in the endometrium, these form of hormonal birth control are likely and expected to decrease the effectiveness of elagolix in the treatment of this condition. The effect of progestogen-only birth control on the effectiveness of elagolix in endometriosis is unknown. However, progestogens are antiestrogenic in the uterus, and high-dose progestin therapy is known to be effective in the treatment of endometriosis similarly to GnRH antagonists. On the basis of limited clinical research, combined birth control pills have also been found to be effective in the treatment of endometriosis, but are likely not as effective as GnRH modulator monotherapy. It is advised that women use non-hormonal methods of birth control during elagolix therapy and for one week following discontinuation of elagolix.

Etonogestrel is a progestin medication which is used as a means of birth control for women. It is available alone as an implant placed under the skin of the upper arm under the brand names Nexplanon and Implanon and in combination with ethinylestradiol, an estrogen, as a vaginal ring under the brand names NuvaRing and Circlet. Etonogestrel is effective as a means of birth control within 8 hours of insertion.
Side effects of etonogestrel include menstrual irregularities, headaches, vaginitis, breast tenderness, mood changes, abdominal pain, pharyngitis, acne, and others. Etonogestrel is a progestin, or a synthetic progestogen, and hence is an agonist of the progesterone receptor, the biological target of progestogens like progesterone. It has very weak androgenic and glucocorticoid activity and no other important hormonal activity.
Etonogestrel was introduced for medical use in 1998. It became available in the United States in 2006. Etonogestrel is sometimes referred to as a "third-generation" progestin. It is marketed throughout the world. A closely related and more widely known and used progestin, desogestrel, is a prodrug of etonogestrel in the body.

In a series of relatively small studies of the combination of low-dose CPA and ethinylestradiol as a birth control pill, depression was reported to have occurred in 1.3 to 4% of cycles. This is similar to the rate of mood changes (<3.5%) observed with birth control pills containing other progestins. A pharmacoepidemiological study using data from the United Kingdom General Practice Research Database found that the incidence of depression with birth control pills containing CPA was identical to that of birth control pills containing other progestins ( = 0.99). In clinical studies of the combination of low-dose CPA and estradiol valerate for the treatment of menopausal symptoms, preexisting adverse mood symptoms have been found to be significantly improved.
question_src: Je! Vipindi vitaacha progestin udhibiti wa kuzaa tu?
pos_context_src: Progestins katika vidonge vya kudhibiti uzazi wakati mwingine huwekwa kwa kizazi. Wakati progestins 19-nortestosterone zinawekwa mara kwa mara katika vizazi, progestins za ujauzito ambazo zimetumika au zimetumika katika vidonge vya kudhibiti uzazi kawaida huachwa kutoka kwa uainishaji kama huo au zimewekwa kwa kikundi kama "miscellaneous" au "wajawazito". Kwa hali yoyote, CPA imeelezewa kama progestin "kizazi cha kwanza" sawa na progestins zinazohusiana sana kama chlormadinone acetate, medroxyprogesterone acetate, na mestrol acetate.
neg_context_src: Orodha kamili ya contraindication inaweza kupatikana katika "vigezo vya ustahiki wa matibabu kwa matumizi ya uzazi wa mpango" na CDC "vigezo vya kustahiki matibabu vya Amerika kwa matumizi ya uzazi" .Kuhusu tathmini ya 1999 ya masomo yaliyofanywa juu ya udhibiti wa uzazi wa progestin tu kwa wakala wa kimataifa kwa saratani, kuna hatari ya kuzaliwa kwa saratani ya kuzaliwa kwa ugonjwa wa kuzaliwa kwa ugonjwa wa kuzaliwa. IARC ilihitimisha kuwa hakuna ushahidi wa progestin-udhibiti wa kuzaliwa tu huongeza hatari ya saratani yoyote, ingawa masomo yaliyopatikana yalikuwa madogo sana kuwa dhahiri.

Athari juu ya hamu ya ngono ni tofauti, na kuongezeka au kupungua kwa wengine lakini bila athari katika wengi. Mchanganyiko wa uzazi wa mpango uliochanganywa hupunguza hatari ya saratani ya ovari na saratani ya endometrial na haibadilishi hatari ya saratani ya matiti. Mara nyingi hupunguza kutokwa na damu kwa hedhi na maumivu ya hedhi chungu. Dozi ya chini ya estrogeni iliyotolewa kutoka kwa pete ya uke inaweza kupunguza hatari ya huruma ya matiti, kichefuchefu, na maumivu ya kichwa yanayohusiana na bidhaa za kiwango cha juu cha estrogeni.
Vidonge vya Progestin-pekee, sindano na vifaa vya intrauterine hazihusiani na hatari ya kuongezeka kwa damu na inaweza kutumiwa na wanawake walio na historia ya damu kwenye mishipa yao. Katika wale walio na historia ya damu ya arterial, udhibiti wa uzazi usio wa homoni au njia ya progestin tu isipokuwa toleo la sindano linapaswa kutumiwa. Vidonge vya Progestin-pekee vinaweza kuboresha dalili za hedhi na zinaweza kutumiwa na wanawake kunyonyesha kwani haziathiri uzalishaji wa maziwa. Kutokwa na damu isiyo ya kawaida kunaweza kutokea na njia za progestin-pekee, na watumiaji wengine wakiripoti hakuna vipindi. Progestins drospirenone na desogestrel hupunguza athari za androgenic lakini huongeza hatari za damu na kwa hivyo sio mstari wa kwanza. Kiwango kamili cha kushindwa kwa mwaka wa kwanza wa progestin ya sindano ni 0.2%; Kiwango cha kawaida cha matumizi ya kwanza ni 6%.

Utaratibu wa hatua ya progestin tu uzazi wa mpango inategemea shughuli za progestin na kipimo. Kiwango cha kati cha progestin-uzazi wa mpango tu, kama Nexplanon au Implanon (na progestin-tu kidonge cha kidonge) huruhusu ukuaji fulani wa follicular lakini kuzuia ovulation katika karibu mizunguko yote kama utaratibu wa hatua. Ovulation haikuzingatiwa katika masomo ya implanon katika miaka miwili ya kwanza ya matumizi na mara chache tu katika mwaka wa tatu bila ujauzito. Njia ya sekondari ya hatua ni kuongezeka kwa progestogenic katika mnato wa kamasi ya kizazi ambayo inazuia kupenya kwa manii. Ukarabati wa homoni pia una athari kwenye endometriamu ambayo kinadharia inaweza kuathiri kuingizwa, hata hivyo hakuna ushahidi wa kisayansi unaonyesha kuwa kuzuia kuingizwa kunatokana na matumizi yao.

Uzazi wa uzazi una faida nyingi zaidi ya kuzuia ujauzito. Mchanganyiko wa uzazi wa mpango wa estrojeni-progestin unaweza kufanikiwa kutibu dysmenorrhea (vipindi vyenye uchungu), kutoa dalili za utulivu kutoka kwa endometriosis, kupunguza kutokwa na damu kwa hedhi na kuboresha anemia inayohusiana na upotezaji wa damu ya hedhi, kupunguza dalili za ugonjwa wa ugonjwa wa ugonjwa wa ugonjwa wa ugonjwa wa hedhi na ugonjwa wa ugonjwa wa ugonjwa wa ugonjwa wa ugonjwa wa ugonjwa wa ugonjwa wa hedhi na ugonjwa wa ugonjwa wa ugonjwa wa ugonjwa wa ugonjwa wa hedhi, kupunguza ugonjwa wa ugonjwa wa ugonjwa wa ugonjwa wa hedhi, ugonjwa wa ugonjwa wa ugonjwa wa ugonjwa wa hedhi, kupunguza ugonjwa wa ugonjwa wa ugonjwa wa hedhi. (ukuaji wa nywele usio wa kawaida). Progestin iliyo na kifaa cha intrauterine inaweza kupunguza kutokwa na damu kwa hedhi na kulinda dhidi ya mabadiliko ya saratani au saratani kwenye uterasi. Kondomu (kiume au kike) ndio njia pekee ya uzazi wa mpango ambayo inalinda dhidi ya kupatikana kwa maambukizo ya zinaa.

Maboresho ya njia zilizopo za kudhibiti uzazi zinahitajika, kwani karibu nusu ya wale ambao wanapata ujauzito bila kukusudia hutumia udhibiti wa kuzaa wakati huo. Mabadiliko kadhaa ya njia zilizopo za uzazi wa mpango zinasomwa, pamoja na kondomu bora ya kike, diaphragm iliyoboreshwa, kiraka kilicho na progestin tu, na pete ya uke iliyo na progesterone ya kaimu ya muda mrefu. Pete hii ya uke inaonekana kuwa nzuri kwa miezi mitatu au nne na inapatikana katika maeneo mengine ya ulimwengu. Kwa wanawake ambao mara chache wanafanya ngono, kuchukua kwa levonorgestrel ya kuzaliwa kwa wakati wote wa ngono inaonekana kuahidi.

Mnamo Mei 2015 utawala wa Obama ulisema kwamba chini ya ACA, angalau aina moja ya njia zote 18 zilizopitishwa na FDA za kudhibiti uzazi kwa wanawake lazima zifunikwe bila kugawana gharama. Njia 18 ni pamoja na: upasuaji wa sterilization, kuingiza upasuaji wa upasuaji, fimbo inayoweza kuingizwa, kifaa cha shaba ya shaba, IUDs na progestin (homoni), risasi/sindano, uzazi wa mpango wa mdomo (kidonge), na estrogen na progestin, uzazi wa mpango na progestin tu, mabilioni ya uzazi, utumiaji wa manyoya unaojulikana kama vile unajulikana kama vile mabilioni, mabichi ya manyoya, mabichi ya manjano, petsept, petsept, petsept, petsept, petsept, petsept deving, petsept, petsept deving, petsept deving, petsept deving, petsept deving, petsept deving, pet countive and devidept magend, mamani ya mpango wa magereza. diaphragm, sifongo, kofia ya kizazi, kondomu ya kike, manii, uzazi wa dharura (mpango wa b/asubuhi-baada ya kidonge), na uzazi wa mpango wa dharura (kidonge tofauti kinachoitwa ella). Aina zote za udhibiti wa kuzaa kwa kiume hazina msamaha kutoka kwa chanjo ya lazima chini ya ACA na ukurasa wa "ukweli wa Obamacare" unasema wazi kuwa "mipango haihitajiki kufunika huduma zinazohusiana na uwezo wa uzazi wa mtu, kama vasectomies."

Kwa sababu vidonge vya pamoja vya uzazi na aina zingine za udhibiti wa pamoja wa kuzaa zina estrogeni, na kwa sababu elagolix huchukua endometriosis kwa kupungua kwa viwango vya estrogeni katika endometriamu, aina hizi za udhibiti wa kuzaliwa kwa homoni zinawezekana na zinatarajiwa kupungua kwa ufanisi wa elagolix katika matibabu ya hali hii. Athari za udhibiti wa uzazi wa progestogen tu juu ya ufanisi wa elagolix katika endometriosis haijulikani. Walakini, progestojeni ni antiestrogenic katika uterasi, na tiba ya progestin ya kiwango cha juu inajulikana kuwa na ufanisi katika matibabu ya endometriosis sawa na wapinzani wa GNRH. Kwa msingi wa utafiti mdogo wa kliniki, vidonge vya pamoja vya uzazi pia vimepatikana kuwa mzuri katika matibabu ya endometriosis, lakini labda sio nzuri kama monotherapy ya moduli ya GNRH. Inashauriwa kuwa wanawake hutumia njia zisizo za homoni za udhibiti wa kuzaa wakati wa tiba ya Elagolix na kwa wiki moja kufuatia kukomeshwa kwa Elagolix.

Etonogestrel ni dawa ya progestin ambayo hutumika kama njia ya kudhibiti uzazi kwa wanawake. Inapatikana peke yake kama kuingiza iliyowekwa chini ya ngozi ya mkono wa juu chini ya majina ya chapa Nexplanon na Implanon na kwa pamoja na ethinylestradiol, estrogeni, kama pete ya uke chini ya majina ya chapa na duara. Etonogestrel ni nzuri kama njia ya udhibiti wa kuzaa ndani ya masaa 8 ya kuingizwa.
Athari za etonogestrel ni pamoja na makosa ya hedhi, maumivu ya kichwa, vaginitis, huruma ya matiti, mabadiliko ya mhemko, maumivu ya tumbo, pharyngitis, chunusi, na wengine. Etonogestrel ni progestin, au progestogen ya synthetic, na kwa hivyo ni agonist ya receptor ya progesterone, lengo la kibaolojia la progestogens kama progesterone. Inayo shughuli dhaifu ya androgenic na glucocorticoid na hakuna shughuli nyingine muhimu ya homoni.
Etonogestrel ilianzishwa kwa matumizi ya matibabu mnamo 1998. Ilipatikana nchini Merika mnamo 2006. Etonogestrel wakati mwingine hujulikana kama progestin ya "kizazi cha tatu". Imeuzwa ulimwenguni kote. Progestin inayohusiana sana na inayojulikana zaidi na inayotumiwa, desogestrel, ni dawa ya etonogestrel mwilini.

Katika safu ya tafiti ndogo za mchanganyiko wa kipimo cha chini cha CPA na ethinylestradiol kama kidonge cha kudhibiti uzazi, unyogovu uliripotiwa kuwa ulitokea katika mzunguko wa 1.3 hadi 4%. Hii ni sawa na kiwango cha mabadiliko ya mhemko (<3.5%) inayozingatiwa na vidonge vya kudhibiti uzazi vyenye progestins zingine. Utafiti wa pharmacoepidemiological kwa kutumia data kutoka kwa hifadhidata ya utafiti wa mazoezi ya jumla ya Uingereza iligundua kuwa matukio ya unyogovu na vidonge vya kudhibiti uzazi yaliyo na CPA yalikuwa sawa na ile ya vidonge vya kudhibiti uzazi vilivyo na progestins zingine (= 0.99). Katika masomo ya kliniki ya mchanganyiko wa kiwango cha chini cha CPA na estradiol valerate kwa matibabu ya dalili za menopausal, dalili mbaya za mhemko zimepatikana kuboreshwa sana.
report_src: Kwa kawaida kutumia vidonge vya kuzuia mimba vilivyo na progestin pekee (progestin-only pills) hakuhakikishi kwamba hedhi itaacha kabisa; kinachotokea ni kwamba baadhi ya watumiaji hupata kupungua kwa damu ya kila mwezi, wengine hukosa kabisa kwa muda, na sehemu yao huendelea kupata hedhi isiyodhibitika (spotting) au mizunguko fupi, hivyo matokeo hutofautiana kati ya mtu na mtu. Kimsingi, progestin kama cyproterone acetate (CPA), ambayo huainishwa kama progestin “kizazi cha kwanza” [1], hufanya kazi kwa kukandamiza ovulation na kubadilisha ute wa shingo ya kizazi, na athari hizi zinaweza kupunguza au kusitisha hedhi, lakini si lazima zifanye hivyo kwa kila mtumiaji. Ikiwa hedhi yako imeacha kabisa au imebadilika sana, mara nyingi si jambo hatari, lakini ni busara kumjulisha mtoa huduma wa afya ili kuthibitisha kuwa hakuna tatizo jingine la kiafya na pia kujadili chaguo mbadala kama unahitaji mzunguko thabiti wa hedhi.
all_claims: Kwa kawaida kutumia vidonge vya kuzuia mimba vilivyo na progestin pekee (progestin-only pills) hakuhakikishi kwamba hedhi itaacha kabisa; kinachotokea ni kwamba baadhi ya watumiaji hupata kupungua kwa damu ya kila mwezi, wengine hukosa kabisa kwa muda, na sehemu yao huendelea kupata hedhi isiyodhibitika (spotting) au mizunguko fupi, hivyo matokeo hutofautiana kati ya mtu na mtu.

Kimsingi, progestin kama cyproterone acetate (CPA), ambayo huainishwa kama progestin “kizazi cha kwanza” [1], hufanya kazi kwa kukandamiza ovulation na kubadilisha ute wa shingo ya kizazi, na athari hizi zinaweza kupunguza au kusitisha hedhi, lakini si lazima zifanye hivyo kwa kila mtumiaji.

Ikiwa hedhi yako imeacha kabisa au imebadilika sana, mara nyingi si jambo hatari, lakini ni busara kumjulisha mtoa huduma wa afya ili kuthibitisha kuwa hakuna tatizo jingine la kiafya na pia kujadili chaguo mbadala kama unahitaji mzunguko thabiti wa hedhi.

question_en: Who designed Princess Leia's hair?
pos_context_en:
One of the more popular "Star Wars" characters, Leia has been called a 1980s icon, a feminist hero and model for other adventure heroines. She has appeared in many derivative works and merchandising, and has been referenced or parodied in several TV shows and films. Her "cinnamon buns" hairstyle from "Star Wars" (1977) and metal bikini from "Return of the Jedi" have become cultural icons.
Leia was created by "Star Wars" creator George Lucas, who in 1999 explained his early development of the main characters:
In the rough draft of "Star Wars", Leia is the spoiled teenage daughter of King Kayos and Queen Breha of Aquilae, with two brothers, Biggs and Windy; Biggs returned to the fourth draft as a childhood friend of Luke. Leia was at one point "the daughter of Owen Lars and his wife Beru ... Luke's cousin–together they visit the grave of his mother, who perished with his father on a planet destroyed by the Death Star." A later story synopsis establishes Leia as "Leia Antilles", the daughter of Bail Antilles from the peaceful world of Organa Major. In the fourth draft it was established that "Leia Organa" came instead from Alderaan.
neg_context_en: Leia's unique hairdo in 1977's "A New Hope" has come to be known as the "doughnut" or "cinnamon buns" hairstyle, and is iconic of the character and series. A February 1978 cover story for the British teen magazine "Jackie" included step-by-step instructions on how to replicate Leia's hair buns. In the 1978 short film parody "Hardware Wars", Princess Anne-Droid has actual cinnamon buns on the side of her head. Miss Piggy of "The Muppet Show" copied the hairdo in a "Star Wars"-themed episode of the series in February 1980. In the 1987 Mel Brooks comedy film "Spaceballs", Princess Vespa (Daphne Zuniga) appears to have the hairstyle, which is soon revealed to in fact be a large pair of headphones. In the parody film "Thumb Wars", the role of Leia was filled by a character named Princess Bunhead, who has two cinnamon rolls for hair. In 2015, Fisher's daughter Billie Lourd's character in the horror-comedy TV series "Scream Queens", a rich and disaffected sorority girl known as Chanel No. 3, wears earmuffs in every scene as an homage to Fisher's iconic Leia hairstyle. Lourd also has a cameo in "The Force Awakens" (2015) in which she wears Leia's distinctive hair buns.
Princess Leia's bikini (also known as Princess Leia's metal bikini) is an iconic costume worn by actress Carrie Fisher as Princess Leia in the 1983 "Star Wars" film "Return of the Jedi".

In the 1983 film "Return of the Jedi", Princess Leia (played by Carrie Fisher) wears a metal bikini, an iconic slave girl costume often imitated by female fans at "Star Wars" conventions. The metal string bikini consisted of a patterned copper brassiere with a curved, plunging neckline that fastened behind the neck and back with string. The thong bottom had copper plates at the groin in front and back partially covered by a red silk loincloth. Leia wore high leather boots, a hair fastener that positioned her braided ponytail to cascade over her right shoulder, two bracelets, and a snake arm-wrap. She also wore a chain and collar that bound her to Jabba the Hutt, her captor, which she used to kill him. The costume was made of brass and was so uncomfortable that actress Carrie Fisher described it as "what supermodels will eventually wear in the seventh ring of hell." The slave Leia costume has been elevated to pop culture icon status, spawning various spoofs and parodies (notably the episode of "Friends", "The One with the Princess Leia Fantasy").

Princess Leia Organa of Alderaan (also Senator Leia Organa or General Leia Organa) is a fictional character in the "Star Wars" franchise, portrayed in films by Carrie Fisher. Introduced in the original "Star Wars" film in 1977, Leia is princess of the planet Alderaan, a member of the Imperial Senate and an agent of the Rebel Alliance. She thwarts the sinister Sith Lord Darth Vader and helps bring about the destruction of the Empire's cataclysmic superweapon, the Death Star. In "The Empire Strikes Back" (1980), Leia commands a Rebel base and evades Vader as she falls in love with the smuggler, Han Solo. In "Return of the Jedi" (1983), Leia leads the operation to rescue Han from the crime lord Jabba the Hutt, and is revealed to be Vader's daughter and the twin sister of Luke Skywalker. The prequel film "" (2005) establishes that the twins' mother is Senator (and former queen) Padmé Amidala of Naboo, who dies after childbirth. Leia is adopted by Senator Bail and Queen Breha Organa of Alderaan. In "" (2015) and "" (2017), Leia is the founder and General of the Resistance against the First Order. She and Han have a son named Ben, who adopted the name Kylo Ren after turning to the dark side of the Force.

Leia is the lead character in the five-part comic limited series "" (2015), set between "Episode IV: A New Hope" and "The Empire Strikes Back". She is featured prominently in the four-part comic limited series "" (2015), set immediately after "Return of the Jedi". In "Princess Leia" #2 and "Shattered Empire", Leia is seen using her Force sensitivities to sense the past, and in "Star Wars" #12, she uses a lightsaber as a weapon for the first time canonically. "Princess Leia" reveals Leia to have had royal training in martial arts and explores her reaction to the destruction of Alderaan, while "Shattered Empire" also portrays her as a skilled pilot who undertakes a dangerous mission alongside Poe Dameron's mother.

In "The Courtship of Princess Leia" (1994) by Dave Wolverton, set immediately before the "Thrawn" trilogy, Leia is presented with an advantageous political marriage to Prince Isolder of the planet Hapes. A jealous Han abducts Leia and takes her to the planet Dathomir; Luke and Isolder follow, and there they all find the hidden forces of the Imperial warlord Zsinj. Defeating him, Han and Leia marry. The 2003 novels "A Forest Apart" and "Tatooine Ghost" by Troy Denning are set immediately after "The Courtship of Princess Leia". The newly married Leia fears that any children she has may succumb to the dark side like her father. During an adventure on Tatooine in "Tatooine Ghost", she discovers the diary of her grandmother Shmi Skywalker and meets some of young Anakin's childhood friends. When she learns of Anakin's childhood as a slave and the traumatic death of his mother, Leia learns to forgive her father.

Rosenberg noted that "the costume has become culturally iconic in a way that has slipped loose from the context of the scenes in which Leia wore it and the things she does after she is forced into the outfit." Philip Chien of the website "Wired" wrote in 2006, "There's no doubt that the sight of Carrie Fisher in the gold sci-fi swimsuit was burned into the sweaty subconscious of a generation of fanboys hitting puberty in the spring of 1983." Acknowledging the opinion of some that the "Slave Leia" iconography tarnishes the character's position as "feminist hero", Rosenberg argues:
Science fiction filmmaker Letia Clouston concurs, saying "Sci-fi has had a long history of strong female characters. Yes, Princess Leia was in a gold bikini, but she was also the one who single-handedly killed Jabba. When you take into account movies and TV shows like "Terminator", "Aliens", "Battlestar Galactica", and even video games like "Metroid", you can see sci-fi has consistently promoted the strength of women more than any other genre."

The character has been referenced or parodied in several TV shows and films, and celebrated in cosplay. Fisher appeared in the Leia metal bikini on the cover of the Summer 1983 issue of "Rolling Stone", and a painting of Leia and other characters surrounding Lucas appeared on the cover of the May 25, 1983 issue of "Time" announcing "Return of the Jedi". In 2013, cartoonist Jeffrey Brown published the bestselling "Star Wars: Vader's Little Princess", a comic strip-style book featuring Darth Vader and a young Leia in humorous father-daughter situations. Princess Leia appears on a 2007 US postage stamp and a 2015 UK stamp.

In their 2012 essay "Lightsabers, Political Arenas, and Marriages", Ray Merlock and Kathy Merlock Jackson cite Leia as the successor of earlier science fiction heroines Wilma Deering of "Buck Rogers" and Dale Arden of "Flash Gordon", and the embodiment of "a new stage in the ongoing presentation of the fairy-tale princess in jeopardy". Writing that "after Leia, no longer would princesses be passive and salvaged simply with a kiss," they note the reflection of the character in later Disney Princess animated films and in woman warriors such as Ellen Ripley from the "Alien" franchise and Xena of the adventure TV series "". A. O. Scott of "The New York Times" described Leia as "a foremother of Hermione Granger and Katniss Everdeen and of countless latter-day Disney princesses. She also foretold the recent, somewhat belated feminist turn in the "Star Wars" cycle itself".
question_src: Ni nani aliyebuni nywele za Princess Leia?
pos_context_src:
Mojawapo ya wahusika maarufu zaidi wa "Star Wars", Leia ameitwa icon ya 1980, shujaa wa kike na mfano wa mashujaa wengine wa adha. Ameonekana katika kazi nyingi za derivative na biashara, na amerejelewa au kuwekwa katika vipindi kadhaa vya Runinga na filamu. Hairstyle yake ya "Cinnamon Buns" kutoka "Star Wars" (1977) na Metal Bikini kutoka "Kurudi kwa Jedi" wamekuwa icons za kitamaduni.
Leia aliundwa na muundaji wa "Star Wars" George Lucas, ambaye mnamo 1999 alielezea maendeleo yake ya mapema ya wahusika wakuu:
Katika rasimu mbaya ya "Star Wars", Leia ndiye binti aliyeharibiwa wa Mfalme Kayos na Malkia Breha wa Aquilae, na kaka wawili, Biggs na Windy; Biggs alirudi kwenye rasimu ya nne kama rafiki wa utoto wa Luka. Leia alikuwa wakati mmoja "binti ya Owen Lars na mkewe Beru ... binamu wa Luka - kwa pamoja walitembelea kaburi la mama yake, ambaye aliangamia na baba yake kwenye sayari iliyoharibiwa na nyota ya kifo." Synopsis ya hadithi ya baadaye huanzisha Leia kama "Leia Antilles", binti ya Bail Antilles kutoka ulimwengu wa amani wa Organa Meja. Katika rasimu ya nne ilianzishwa kuwa "Leia Organa" ilikuja badala ya Alderaan.
neg_context_src: Hairdo ya kipekee ya Leia mnamo 1977's "Tumaini Mpya" imejulikana kama "donut" au "mdalasini buns" hairstyle, na ni picha ya tabia na safu. Hadithi ya Jalada la Februari 1978 kwa Jarida la Vijana la Uingereza "Jackie" lilijumuisha maagizo ya hatua kwa hatua juu ya jinsi ya kuiga nakala za nywele za Leia. Katika filamu fupi ya 1978 ya "vita vya vifaa", Princess Anne-Droid ana buns halisi za mdalasini upande wa kichwa chake. Miss Piggy wa "The Muppet Show" alinakili hairdo katika "Star Wars"-sehemu ya mfululizo mnamo Februari 1980. Katika filamu ya ucheshi ya Mel Brooks "Spaceballs", Princess Vespa (Daphne Zuniga) anaonekana kuwa na nywele, ambayo imefunuliwa hivi karibuni kuwa jozi kubwa ya vichwa. Katika filamu ya parody "Thumb Wars", jukumu la Leia lilijazwa na mhusika anayeitwa Princess Bunhead, ambaye ana safu mbili za mdalasini kwa nywele. Mnamo mwaka wa 2015, tabia ya binti wa Fisher, Billie Lourd katika safu ya Televisheni ya kutisha ya "Scream Queens", msichana tajiri na mgumu anayejulikana kama Chanel No. 3, amevaa masikio katika kila eneo kama sifa ya hairstyle ya Fisher ya Leia. Lourd pia ana habari katika "The Force Awakens" (2015) ambayo yeye huvaa vitunguu vya nywele vya Leia.

Bikini ya Princess Leia (pia inajulikana kama Princess Leia's Metal Bikini) ni mavazi ya kweli yaliyovaliwa na mwigizaji Carrie Fisher kama Princess Leia katika filamu ya "Star Wars" ya 1983 "Return of the Jedi".

Katika filamu ya 1983 "Return of the Jedi", Princess Leia (iliyochezwa na Carrie Fisher) amevaa bikini ya chuma, mavazi ya msichana wa mtumwa mara nyingi huiga na mashabiki wa kike kwenye mikusanyiko ya "Star Wars". Bikini ya kamba ya chuma ilikuwa na muundo wa shaba ulio na muundo na laini iliyokatwa, iliyoandaliwa ambayo ilifunga nyuma ya shingo na nyuma na kamba. Chini ya chini ilikuwa na sahani za shaba kwenye gongo mbele na nyuma iliyofunikwa na sehemu nyekundu ya hariri. Leia alivaa buti za ngozi za juu, kufunga kwa nywele ambayo iliweka ponytail yake iliyokuwa imejaa juu ya bega lake la kulia, vikuku viwili, na mkono wa nyoka. Yeye pia alikuwa amevaa mnyororo na kola ambayo ilimfunga kwa Jabba Hutt, mtekaji wake, ambayo alikuwa akimuua. Mavazi hayo yalitengenezwa kwa shaba na haikuwa na raha sana kwamba mwigizaji Carrie Fisher alielezea kama "ni nini supermodels baadaye itavaa kwenye pete ya saba ya kuzimu." Mavazi ya watumwa wa Leia yameinuliwa kwa hali ya picha ya utamaduni wa pop, ikitoa nyara na anuwai (haswa sehemu ya "Marafiki", "yule aliye na Ndoto ya Princess Leia").

Princess Leia Organa wa Alderaan (pia Seneta Leia Organa au Jenerali Leia Organa) ni tabia ya hadithi katika "Star Wars" Franchise, iliyoonyeshwa katika filamu na Carrie Fisher. Ilianzisha katika filamu ya awali ya "Star Wars" mnamo 1977, Leia ni Princess wa Sayari ya Alderaan, mwanachama wa Seneti ya Imperial na wakala wa Alliance ya Rebel. Yeye huzuia Sith Sith Lord Darth Vader na husaidia kuleta uharibifu wa nguvu ya Dola ya Cataclysmic, Star Star. Katika "The Dola Strikes Back" (1980), Leia anaamuru msingi wa waasi na kumwokoa Vader wakati anapendana na yule anayempenda sigara, Han Solo. Katika "Return of the Jedi" (1983), Leia anaongoza operesheni ya kumuokoa Han kutoka kwa jinai Bwana Jabba the Hutt, na anafunuliwa kuwa binti wa Vader na dada mapacha wa Luke Skywalker. Filamu ya prequel "" (2005) inadhihirisha kwamba mama wa mapacha ni Seneta (na Malkia wa zamani) Padmé Amidala wa Naboo, ambaye hufa baada ya kuzaa. Leia amepitishwa na Bail ya Seneta na Malkia Breha Organa wa Alderaan. Katika "" (2015) na "" (2017), Leia ndiye mwanzilishi na mkuu wa upinzani dhidi ya agizo la kwanza. Yeye na Han wana mtoto anayeitwa Ben, ambaye alichukua jina Kylo Ren baada ya kugeuka upande wa giza wa Kikosi.

Leia ndiye mhusika anayeongoza katika safu ya sehemu tano za Comic Limited "" (2015), iliyowekwa kati ya "Episode IV: Tumaini Mpya" na "The Dola Strikes Back". Anaonyeshwa sana katika safu ya sehemu nne za Comic Limited "" (2015), iliyowekwa mara baada ya "Kurudi kwa Jedi". Katika "Princess Leia" #2 na "Dola iliyovunjika", Leia anaonekana akitumia unyeti wa nguvu yake kuhisi zamani, na katika "Star Wars" #12, yeye hutumia taa kama silaha kwa mara ya kwanza kwa mara ya kwanza. "Princess Leia" anafunua Leia kuwa na mafunzo ya kifalme katika sanaa ya kijeshi na anachunguza majibu yake juu ya uharibifu wa Alderaan, wakati "Dola iliyovunjika" pia inamuonyesha kama majaribio mwenye ujuzi ambaye hufanya misheni hatari pamoja na mama ya Poe Dameron.

Katika "Uchumba wa Princess Leia" (1994) na Dave Wolverton, uliowekwa mara moja mbele ya "Thrawn" trilogy, Leia huwasilishwa na ndoa yenye faida ya kisiasa na Prince Isolder wa sayari ya sayari. Han wivu humnyakua Leia na kumpeleka kwenye sayari ya Dathomir; Luka na Isolder hufuata, na hapo wote wanapata nguvu za siri za Imperial Warlord Zsinj. Kumshinda, Han na Leia kuoa. Riwaya za 2003 "Msitu Mbali" na "Tatooine Ghost" na Troy Denning zimewekwa mara baada ya "Uchumba wa Princess Leia". Leia aliyeolewa hivi karibuni anaogopa kwamba watoto yeyote ambaye anaweza kuwa nao wanaweza kwenda upande wa giza kama baba yake. Wakati wa adha juu ya Tatooine katika "Tatooine Ghost", hugundua diary ya bibi yake Shmi Skywalker na hukutana na marafiki wa vijana wa watoto wa Anakin. Wakati anajifunza juu ya utoto wa Anakin kama mtumwa na kifo cha kiwewe cha mama yake, Leia anajifunza kumsamehe baba yake.

Rosenberg alibaini kuwa "mavazi yamekuwa ya kitamaduni kwa njia ambayo imeanguka kutoka kwa muktadha wa pazia ambalo Leia alivaa na vitu anavyofanya baada ya kulazimishwa kuingia kwenye mavazi." Philip Chien wa wavuti "Wired" aliandika mnamo 2006, "hakuna shaka kuwa kuona kwa Carrie Fisher katika kuogelea kwa dhahabu ya dhahabu kulichomwa ndani ya ujanja wa kizazi cha kizazi cha washabiki wanaopiga ujana katika chemchemi ya 1983." Kutambua maoni ya wengine kwamba picha ya "Mtumwa Leia" inasababisha msimamo wa mhusika kama "shujaa wa kike", Rosenberg anasema:
Mtengenezaji wa filamu za uwongo za Sayansi ya Delia Clouston, akisema "Sci-Fi amekuwa na historia ndefu ya wahusika wenye nguvu. Ndio, Princess Leia alikuwa kwenye bikini ya dhahabu, lakini pia ndiye aliyemwua Jabba. Unapozingatia sinema na vipindi vya Runinga kama" Terminator "," Aliens "," Battlestar Galactica "," ilikuza nguvu ya wanawake kuliko aina nyingine yoyote. "

Tabia hiyo imerejelewa au kupangwa katika vipindi kadhaa vya TV na filamu, na kusherehekewa katika cosplay. Fisher alionekana kwenye Leia Metal Bikini kwenye jalada la toleo la majira ya joto 1983 la "Rolling Stone", na uchoraji wa Leia na wahusika wengine walio karibu na Lucas walionekana kwenye jalada la toleo la Mei 25, 1983 la "Wakati" wakitangaza "Kurudi kwa Jedi". Mnamo 2013, mtaalam wa katuni Jeffrey Brown alichapisha "Star Wars: Vader's Little Princess", kitabu cha mtindo wa vichekesho kilicho na Darth Vader na Leia mchanga katika hali ya kuchekesha baba. Princess Leia anaonekana kwenye stempu ya posta ya Amerika ya 2007 na muhuri wa Uingereza wa 2015.

Katika insha yao ya 2012 "Taa za taa, uwanja wa kisiasa, na ndoa", Ray Merlock na Kathy Merlock Jackson anataja Leia kama mrithi wa mashujaa wa hadithi za uwongo za uwongo Wilma Deering wa "Buck Rogers" na Dale Arden wa "Flash Gordon", na embodiment ya "hatua mpya katika uwasilishaji unaoendelea wa Malkia wa Tamaa. Kuandika kwamba "Baada ya Leia, kifalme hazingekuwa tena na kuokolewa kwa busu," wanaona tafakari ya mhusika katika filamu za baadaye za Disney Princess na katika Wanawake Warumi kama Ellen Ripley kutoka kwa "mgeni" na Xena wa safu ya Televisheni ya Adventure "". A.

question_en: When was James Thomas Aubrey Jr. born?
pos_context_en: James Thomas Aubrey Jr. (December 14, 1918 – September 3, 1994) was an American television and film executive. President of the CBS television network from 1959 to 1965, he put some of television's most enduring series on the air, including "Gilligan's Island" and "The Beverly Hillbillies". Under Aubrey, CBS dominated American television the way General Motors and General Electric dominated their industries. "The New York Times Magazine" in 1964 called Aubrey "a master of programming whose divinations led to successes that are breathtaking".
neg_context_en: Born in LaSalle, Illinois, James Thomas Steven Aubrey was the eldest of four sons of James Thomas Aubrey Sr., an advertising executive with the Chicago firm of Aubrey, Moore, and Wallace; and his wife, the former Mildred Stever. He grew up in the affluent Chicago suburb of Lake Forest and attended Lake Forest Academy, Phillips Exeter Academy in Exeter, New Hampshire, and Princeton University. All four boys, James, Stever, David, and George, went to Lake Forest Academy, Exeter and Princeton; his brother Stever became a successful advertising man at J. Walter Thompson before heading the F. William Free agency. While at Princeton all four brothers were members of the Tiger Inn eating club. "My father insisted on accomplishment," Aubrey recalled in 1986. In college, Aubrey was a star on the football team, playing left end. He graduated in 1941 with honors in English and entered the United States Army Air Forces. During his service in World War II, Aubrey rose to the rank of major and taught military flying to actor James Stewart, who was a licensed civilian pilot.

Aubrey was born at Cefn-coed-y-cymmer on 13 May 1808. His parents were Thomas and Anne Aubrey of Cefn-coed-y-cymmer. He was schooled on the Arminianism, within the context of the Wesleyan faith, by an elder and at about the age of 14, when he had a religious conversion. By the age of 15, he was preaching and became a Wesleyan Methodist minister by 1826 and ordained a full-time minister in 1830. He married Elizabeth Williams of Ruthin on 6 April 1831.

Aubrey was president of the CBS Network for the next five years, and made it tremendously successful, substantially increasing ratings and doubling the company's profits. In the 1963–64 season, all twelve of the top daytime programs and fourteen of the top fifteen prime-time shows were on CBS – the lone evening exception was NBC's "Bonanza", ranked number two. After he was fired, journalists Richard Oulahan and William Lambert wrote in a "Life Magazine" profile:
In the long history of human communications, from tom-tom to Telstar, no one man ever had a lock on such enormous audiences as James Thomas Aubrey Jr. during his five-year tenure as head of the Columbia Broadcasting System's television network ... He was the world's No. 1 purveyor of entertainment.

He was born in Rutland, Canada West, the son of Patrick Morris and Ann McRae, and was educated at Saint-Chrysostome, Quebec. Foster settled at Aubrey, Quebec. He was mayor of Saint-Chrysostome for two years. He was defeated by James Pollock Brown when he ran for a federal seat in 1911; Morris was elected to the House of Commons in a 1913 by-election held after Brown's death. He was defeated by James Robb when he ran for reelection in the amalgamated riding of Châteauguay—Huntingdon in 1917. He died in Aubrey at the age of 73.

Aubrey was born in 1947 in Klagenfurt, Austria. His parents were Major Aubrey James Tregidgo and Edna May Tregidgo (née Boxall). He was educated at the Wolmer's Boys' School in Kingston, Jamaica, the Windsor Boys' School (Germany) and St. John's School (Singapore). He married Agnes Kristin Hallander, although the marriage ended in divorce. Aubrey trained for the stage at the Drama Centre London from 1967 to 1970. He is survived by his daughter , a French actress.

Ashley Anthony Froude was born in 1863 at Paddington, London, England. He married Ethel Aubrey Hallifax, daughter of Albert Praed Hallifax and Isabella Aubrey Coker, in 1897 at Chelsea, London, England. He died on 17 April 1949. He was appointed Companion, Order of St. Michael and St. George (C.M.G.) and held the office of Justice of the Peace (J.P.)
His son was John Aubrey Froude1 b. 1898, d. 22 Sep 1914 who died when H.M.S. Cressy was torpedoed by U.9.

James T. Rapier was born free in 1837 in Florence, Alabama to John H. Rapier, a prosperous local barber, and his wife, who were established free people of color. He had three older brothers. His father had been emancipated in 1829; his mother was born into a free black family of Baltimore, Maryland. She died in 1841 when Rapier was four years old. In 1842 James and his brother John Jr. went to Nashville, Tennessee to live with their paternal grandmother Sally Thomas. There they attended a school for African-American children, and learned to read and write.
Thomas Aubrey Chappé Hall (16 June 1873 – 21 May 1958) was a New Zealand wood carver and farmer. He was born in Ruddington, Nottinghamshire, England on 16 June 1873.

Aubrey James Finlay (born 2 March 1938 in Sion Mills, County Tyrone, Northern Ireland) is a former Irish cricketer. A right-handed batsman, he played eighteen times for the Ireland cricket team between 1957 and 1965, including nine first-class matches. Aubrey died on 4 April 2016, Altnagelvin Hospital, Londonderry.
question_src: Je! James Thomas Aubrey Jr. alizaliwa lini?
pos_context_src: James Thomas Aubrey Jr. (Desemba 14, 1918 - Septemba 3, 1994) alikuwa mtendaji wa televisheni wa Amerika na filamu. Rais wa Mtandao wa Televisheni ya CBS kutoka 1959 hadi 1965, aliweka safu kadhaa za kudumu za runinga hewani, pamoja na "Kisiwa cha Gilligan" na "The Beverly Hillbillies". Chini ya Aubrey, CBS ilitawala televisheni ya Amerika jinsi General Motors na General Electric ilitawala viwanda vyao. "Jarida la New York Times" mnamo 1964 liliitwa Aubrey "Mwalimu wa Programu ambaye uungu wake ulisababisha mafanikio ambayo ni ya kupendeza".
neg_context_src: Mzaliwa wa LaSalle, Illinois, James Thomas Steven Aubrey alikuwa mkubwa wa wana wanne wa James Thomas Aubrey Sr., mtendaji wa matangazo na kampuni ya Chicago ya Aubrey, Moore, na Wallace; na mkewe, wa zamani wa Mildred Stever. Alikua katika kitongoji tajiri cha Chicago cha Msitu wa Ziwa na alihudhuria Chuo cha Msitu wa Ziwa, Phillips Exeter Academy huko Exeter, New Hampshire, na Chuo Kikuu cha Princeton. Wavulana wote wanne, James, Stever, David, na George, walikwenda kwenye Chuo cha Ziwa Msitu, Exeter na Princeton; Ndugu yake Stever alikua mtu aliyefanikiwa wa matangazo huko J. Walter Thompson kabla ya kuiongoza F. William Free Agency. Wakati huko Princeton ndugu wote wanne walikuwa washiriki wa Klabu ya Kula ya Tiger Inn. "Baba yangu alisisitiza juu ya kufanikiwa," Aubrey alikumbuka mnamo 1986. Katika chuo kikuu, Aubrey alikuwa nyota kwenye timu ya mpira wa miguu, akicheza kushoto. Alihitimu mnamo 1941 na heshima kwa Kiingereza na akaingia vikosi vya anga vya Jeshi la Merika. Wakati wa ibada yake katika Vita vya Kidunia vya pili, Aubrey aliongezeka kwa kiwango cha kuu na kufundisha kijeshi kuruka kwa muigizaji James Stewart, ambaye alikuwa dereva wa leseni ya raia.

Aubrey alizaliwa huko CEFN-coed-y-cymmer mnamo 13 Mei 1808. Wazazi wake walikuwa Thomas na Anne Aubrey wa Cefn-Coed-y-Cymmer. Alitapeliwa juu ya Arminianism, katika muktadha wa imani ya Wesleyan, na mzee na karibu umri wa miaka 14, wakati alikuwa na ubadilishaji wa kidini. Kufikia umri wa miaka 15, alikuwa akihubiri na kuwa waziri wa Methodist wa Wesleyan mnamo 1826 na akaamuru waziri wa wakati wote mnamo 1830. Aliolewa na Elizabeth Williams wa Ruthin mnamo 6 Aprili 1831.

Aubrey alikuwa rais wa Mtandao wa CBS kwa miaka mitano ijayo, na aliifanya iweze kufanikiwa sana, kuongeza viwango vya juu na kuongeza faida ya kampuni hiyo. Katika msimu wa 1963-64, mipango yote kumi na mbili ya wakati wa juu na kumi na nne kati ya maonyesho ya juu kumi na tano ya wakati walikuwa kwenye CBS-isipokuwa jioni ya jioni ilikuwa "Bonanza" ya NBC, nafasi ya pili. Baada ya kufukuzwa kazi, waandishi wa habari Richard Oulahan na William Lambert waliandika katika wasifu wa "Jarida la Maisha":
Katika historia ndefu ya mawasiliano ya wanadamu, kutoka Tom-Tom hadi Telstar, hakuna mtu mmoja aliyewahi kufungwa kwa watazamaji wakubwa kama James Thomas Aubrey Jr. wakati wa umiliki wake wa miaka mitano kama mkuu wa mtandao wa runinga wa utangazaji wa Columbia ... alikuwa mtu wa kwanza wa Burudani.

Alizaliwa huko Rutland, Canada Magharibi, mtoto wa Patrick Morris na Ann McRae, na alielimishwa huko Saint-Chrysostome, Quebec. Kuendeleza makazi huko Aubrey, Quebec. Alikuwa meya wa Saint-Chrysostome kwa miaka miwili. Alishindwa na James Pollock Brown wakati alikimbilia kiti cha shirikisho mnamo 1911; Morris alichaguliwa katika Nyumba ya Commons katika uchaguzi mdogo wa 1913 uliofanyika baada ya kifo cha Brown. Alishindwa na James Robb wakati alipokimbilia kushirikiana tena katika safari ya kushirikiana ya Châteauguay - Huntingdon mnamo 1917. Alikufa huko Aubrey akiwa na umri wa miaka 73.

Aubrey alizaliwa mnamo 1947 huko Klagenfurt, Austria. Wazazi wake walikuwa Meja Aubrey James Tregidgo na Edna May Tregidgo (née Boxall). Alielimishwa katika Shule ya Wavulana ya Wolmer's huko Kingston, Jamaica, Shule ya Wavulana ya Windsor (Ujerumani) na Shule ya St John (Singapore). Aliolewa na Agnes Kristin Hallander, ingawa ndoa ilimalizika kwa talaka. Aubrey alifundisha hatua hiyo katika Kituo cha Tamthilia London kutoka 1967 hadi 1970. Amepona na binti yake, mwigizaji wa Ufaransa.

Ashley Anthony Froude alizaliwa mnamo 1863 huko Paddington, London, England. Aliolewa na Ethel Aubrey Hallifax, binti wa Albert alisifu Hallifax na Isabella Aubrey Coker, mnamo 1897 huko Chelsea, London, England. Alikufa mnamo 17 Aprili 1949. Aliteuliwa kuwa rafiki, agizo la Mtakatifu Michael na St George (C.M.G.) na akashikilia Ofisi ya Sheria ya Amani (J.P.)
Mwanawe alikuwa John Aubrey Froude1 b. 1898, d. 22 Sep 1914 ambaye alikufa wakati H.M.S. Cressy alibadilishwa na U.9.

James T. Rapier alizaliwa huru mnamo 1837 huko Florence, Alabama kwa John H. Rapier, kinyozi aliyefanikiwa, na mkewe, ambao walianzishwa watu wa rangi huru. Alikuwa na kaka watatu wakubwa. Baba yake alikuwa amekombolewa mnamo 1829; Mama yake alizaliwa katika familia ya bure ya Baltimore, Maryland. Alikufa mnamo 1841 wakati Rapier alikuwa na miaka nne. Mnamo 1842 James na kaka yake John Jr. walikwenda Nashville, Tennessee kuishi na bibi yao wa baba yake Sally Thomas. Huko walihudhuria shule ya watoto wa Kiafrika na Amerika, na walijifunza kusoma na kuandika.
Thomas Aubrey Chappé Hall (16 Juni 1873 - 21 Mei 1958) alikuwa New Zealand Wood Carver na mkulima. Alizaliwa huko Ruddington, Nottinghamshire, England mnamo 16 Juni 1873.

Aubrey James Finlay (amezaliwa 2 Machi 1938 huko Sion Mills, Kaunti ya Tyrone, Ireland ya Kaskazini) ni kriketi wa zamani wa Ireland. Batsman wa mkono wa kulia, alicheza mara kumi na nane kwa timu ya kriketi ya Ireland kati ya 1957 na 1965, pamoja na mechi tisa za darasa la kwanza. Aubrey alikufa mnamo 4 Aprili 2016, Hospitali ya Altnagelvin, Londonderry.
