question_en: When was Marin Heidegger born?
pos_context_en: Martin Heidegger (; ; 26 September 188926 May 1976) was a German philosopher and a seminal thinker in the Continental tradition and philosophical hermeneutics, and is "widely acknowledged to be one of the most original and important philosophers of the 20th century." Heidegger is best known for his contributions to phenomenology and existentialism, though as the "Stanford Encyclopedia of Philosophy" cautions, "his thinking should be identified as part of such philosophical movements only with extreme care and qualification". Heidegger's membership in and public support for the Nazi Party has been the subject of widespread controversy regarding the extent to which his Nazism influenced his philosophy.
neg_context_en: Heidegger was born in rural Meßkirch, Baden-Württemberg, the son of Johanna (Kempf) and Friedrich Heidegger. Raised a Roman Catholic, he was the son of the sexton of the village church that adhered to the First Vatican Council of 1870, which was observed mainly by the poorer class of Meßkirch. His family could not afford to send him to university, so he entered a Jesuit seminary, though he was turned away within weeks because of the health requirement and what the director and doctor of the seminary described as a psychosomatic heart condition. Heidegger was short and sinewy, with dark piercing eyes. He enjoyed outdoor pursuits, being especially proficient at skiing.

Heidegger's influence on French philosophy began in the 1930s, when "Being and Time", "What is Metaphysics?" and other Heideggerian texts were read by Jean-Paul Sartre and other existentialists, as well as by thinkers such as Alexandre Kojève, Georges Bataille and Emmanuel Levinas. Because Heidegger's discussion of ontology (the study of being) is rooted in an analysis of the mode of existence of individual human beings ("Da-sein", or there-being), his work has often been associated with existentialism. The influence of Heidegger on Sartre's "Being and Nothingness" is marked, but Heidegger felt that Sartre had misread his work, as he argued in later texts such as the "Letter on Humanism" In that text, intended for a French audience, Heidegger explained this misreading in the following terms:

Heidegger married Elfride Petri on 21 March 1917, in a Catholic ceremony officiated by his friend , and a week later in a Protestant ceremony in the presence of her parents. Their first son, Jörg, was born in 1919. Elfride then gave birth to in 1920. Heidegger knew that he was not Hermann's biological father but raised him as his son. Hermann's biological father, who became godfather to his son, was family friend and doctor Friedel Caesar. Hermann was told of this at the age of 14. Hermann became a historian and would later serve as the executor of Heidegger's will.

In late 1946, as France engaged in "épuration légale" in its Occupation zone, the French military authorities determined that Heidegger should be blocked from teaching or participating in any university activities because of his association with the Nazi Party. The denazification procedures against Heidegger continued until March 1949 when he was finally pronounced a "Mitläufer" (the second lowest of five categories of "incrimination" by association with the Nazi regime). No punitive measures against him were proposed. This opened the way for his readmission to teaching at Freiburg University in the winter semester of 1950–51. He was granted emeritus status and then taught regularly from 1951 until 1958, and by invitation until 1967.

On September 23, 1966, Heidegger was interviewed by Rudolf Augstein and Georg Wolff for "Der Spiegel" magazine, in which he agreed to discuss his political past provided that the interview be published posthumously (it was published on May 31, 1976). At his own insistence, Heidegger edited the published version of the interview extensively. In the interview, Heidegger defends his involvement with the Nazi party on two points: first, that he was trying to save the university from being completely taken over by the Nazis, and therefore he tried to work with them. Second, he saw in the historic moment the possibility for an "awakening" ("Aufbruch") which might help to find a "new national and social approach" to the problem of Germany's future, a kind of middle ground between capitalism and communism. For example, when Heidegger talked about a "national and social approach" to political problems, he linked this to Friedrich Naumann. According to Thomas Sheehan, Naumann had the "vision of a strong nationalism and a militantly anticommunist socialism, combined under a charismatic leader who would fashion a middle-European empire that "preserved the spirit and tradition of pre-industrial Germany even as it appropriated, in moderation, the gains of modern technology."

Deconstruction came to Heidegger's attention in 1967 by way of Lucien Braun's recommendation of Jacques Derrida's work (Hans-Georg Gadamer was present at an initial discussion and indicated to Heidegger that Derrida's work came to his attention by way of an assistant). Heidegger expressed interest in meeting Derrida personally after the latter sent him some of his work. There was discussion of a meeting in 1972, but this failed to take place. Heidegger's interest in Derrida is said by Braun to have been considerable (as is evident in two letters, of September 29, 1967 and May 16, 1972, from Heidegger to Braun). Braun also brought to Heidegger's attention the work of Michel Foucault. Foucault's relation to Heidegger is a matter of considerable difficulty; Foucault acknowledged Heidegger as a philosopher whom he read but never wrote about. (For more on this see "Penser à Strasbourg," Jacques Derrida, et al., which includes reproductions of both letters and an account by Braun, "À mi-chemin entre Heidegger et Derrida").

In "Being and Time", Heidegger investigates the question of Being by asking about the being for whom Being is a question. Heidegger names this being "Dasein" (see above), and he pursues his investigation through themes such as mortality, care, anxiety, temporality, and historicity. It was Heidegger's original intention to write a second half of the book, consisting of a ""Destruktion"" of the history of philosophy—that is, the transformation of philosophy by re-tracing its history—but he never completed this project.

Philosopher Martin Heidegger joined the Nazi Party (NSDAP) on May 1, 1933, ten days after being elected Rector of the University of Freiburg. A year later, in April 1934, he resigned the Rectorship and stopped taking part in Nazi Party meetings, but remained a member of the Nazi Party until its dismantling at the end of World War II. The denazification hearings immediately after World War II led to Heidegger's dismissal from Freiburg, banning him from teaching. In 1949, after several years of investigation, the French military finally classified Heidegger as a "Mitläufer" or "fellow traveller." The teaching ban was lifted in 1951, and Heidegger was granted "emeritus" status in 1953; however, he was never allowed to resume his philosophy chairmanship.

Heidegger spent much time at his vacation home at Todtnauberg, on the edge of the Black Forest. He considered the seclusion provided by the forest to be the best environment in which to engage in philosophical thought.
A few months before his death, he met with Bernhard Welte, a Catholic priest, Freiburg university professor and earlier correspondent. The exact nature of the conversation is not known, but what is known is that it included talk of Heidegger's relationship to the Catholic Church and subsequent Christian burial at which the priest officiated. Heidegger died on 26 May 1976, and was buried in the Meßkirch cemetery, beside his parents and brother.
question_src: Marin Heidegger alizaliwa lini?
pos_context_src: Martin Heidegger (;; 26 Septemba 188926 Mei 1976) alikuwa mwanafalsafa wa Ujerumani na mfikiriaji wa semina katika mila ya bara na hermeneutics ya falsafa, na "anakubaliwa sana kuwa mmoja wa wanafalsafa wa asili na muhimu wa karne ya 20." Heidegger anajulikana zaidi kwa michango yake katika uzushi na uwepo, ingawa kama "Stanford Encyclopedia of Philosophy", "mawazo yake yanapaswa kutambuliwa kama sehemu ya harakati za kifalsafa tu na utunzaji mkubwa na sifa". Ushirika wa Heidegger na msaada wa umma kwa chama cha Nazi imekuwa mada ya ubishani mkubwa kuhusu kiwango ambacho Nazism yake ilishawishi falsafa yake.
neg_context_src: Heidegger alizaliwa vijijini Meßkirch, Baden-Württemberg, mwana wa Johanna (Kempf) na Friedrich Heidegger. Alimwinua Mkatoliki, alikuwa mtoto wa sexton ya kanisa la kijijini ambalo lilifuata Baraza la kwanza la Vatikani la 1870, ambalo lilizingatiwa sana na kikundi masikini cha Meßkirch. Familia yake haikuweza kumpeleka chuo kikuu, kwa hivyo aliingia kwenye seminari ya Yesuit, ingawa aligeuzwa ndani ya wiki kwa sababu ya mahitaji ya kiafya na kile mkurugenzi na daktari wa seminari aliyefafanuliwa kama hali ya moyo wa kisaikolojia. Heidegger alikuwa mfupi na sinewy, na macho ya kutoboa giza. Alifurahia shughuli za nje, kuwa mzuri sana katika skiing.

Ushawishi wa Heidegger juu ya falsafa ya Ufaransa ulianza miaka ya 1930, wakati "kuwa na wakati", "Metaphysics ni nini?" Na maandiko mengine ya Heideggerian yalisomwa na Jean-Paul Sartre na wahusika wengine, na vile vile na wafikiriaji kama vile Alexandre Kojève, Georges Bataille na Emmanuel Levinas. Kwa sababu majadiliano ya Heidegger juu ya ontolojia (utafiti wa kuwa) yamewekwa katika uchambuzi wa hali ya uwepo wa wanadamu binafsi ("da-sein", au hapo), kazi yake mara nyingi imekuwa ikihusishwa na uwepo. Ushawishi wa Heidegger juu ya Sartre "Kuwa na Hakuna" ni alama, lakini Heidegger alihisi kwamba Sartre alikuwa amesoma kazi yake, kwani alibishana katika maandishi ya baadaye kama vile "Barua ya Humanism" katika maandishi hayo, yaliyokusudiwa kwa hadhira ya Ufaransa, Heidegger alielezea kusoma vibaya kwa maneno yafuatayo:

Heidegger alifunga ndoa na Elfride Petri mnamo tarehe 21 Machi 1917, katika sherehe ya Katoliki iliyoongozwa na rafiki yake, na wiki moja baadaye katika sherehe ya Waprotestanti mbele ya wazazi wake. Mwana wao wa kwanza, Jörg, alizaliwa mnamo 1919. Elfride kisha akazaa mnamo 1920. Heidegger alijua kuwa yeye sio baba wa kibaolojia wa Hermann lakini alimlea kama mtoto wake. Baba wa kibaolojia wa Hermann, ambaye alikua baba yake kwa mtoto wake, alikuwa rafiki wa familia na daktari Friedel Kaisari. Hermann aliambiwa hii akiwa na umri wa miaka 14. Hermann alikua mwanahistoria na baadaye angetumika kama mtekelezaji wa mapenzi ya Heidegger.

Mwishoni mwa 1946, wakati Ufaransa ilishiriki katika "Épuration Légale" katika eneo lake la kazi, viongozi wa jeshi la Ufaransa waliamua kwamba Heidegger anapaswa kuzuiliwa kutoka kwa kufundisha au kushiriki katika shughuli zozote za chuo kikuu kwa sababu ya ushirika wake na Chama cha Nazi. Taratibu za kuangazia dhidi ya Heidegger ziliendelea hadi Machi 1949 wakati hatimaye alitangazwa "Mitläufer" (wa pili wa chini wa aina tano za "idcimination" na ushirika na serikali ya Nazi). Hakuna hatua za adhabu dhidi yake zilizopendekezwa. Hii ilifungua njia ya usomaji wake wa kufundisha katika Chuo Kikuu cha Freiburg katika muhula wa msimu wa baridi wa 1950-51. Alipewa hadhi ya kutokea na kisha kufundishwa mara kwa mara kutoka 1951 hadi 1958, na kwa mwaliko hadi 1967.

Mnamo Septemba 23, 1966, Heidegger alihojiwa na Rudolf Augstein na Georgia Wolff kwa jarida la "Der Spiegel", ambalo alikubali kujadili zamani zake za kisiasa ikiwa mahojiano hayo yalichapishwa baada ya kifo (ilichapishwa mnamo Mei 31, 1976). Kwa msisitizo wake mwenyewe, Heidegger alihariri toleo lililochapishwa la mahojiano sana. Katika mahojiano, Heidegger anatetea kuhusika kwake na chama cha Nazi kwa alama mbili: kwanza, kwamba alikuwa akijaribu kuokoa chuo kikuu kutokana na kuchukuliwa kabisa na Wanazi, na kwa hivyo alijaribu kufanya kazi nao. Pili, aliona katika wakati wa kihistoria uwezekano wa "kuamka" ("Aufbruch") ambayo inaweza kusaidia kupata "njia mpya ya kitaifa na kijamii" kwa shida ya mustakabali wa Ujerumani, aina ya kati kati ya ubepari na ukomunisti. Kwa mfano, wakati Heidegger alizungumza juu ya "njia ya kitaifa na kijamii" na shida za kisiasa, aliunganisha hii na Friedrich Naumann. Kulingana na Thomas Sheehan, Naumann alikuwa na "maono ya utaifa hodari na ujamaa wa kijeshi wa kijeshi, pamoja chini ya kiongozi mwenye huruma ambaye angetengeneza ufalme wa katikati wa Uropa ambao" ulihifadhi roho na utamaduni wa Ujerumani ya kabla ya viwanda hata kama ilivyoamua, kwa wastani, faida za teknolojia ya kisasa "."

Ubunifu ulikuja kwa umakini wa Heidegger mnamo 1967 kwa njia ya pendekezo la Lucien Braun la kazi ya Jacques Derrida (Hans-Georg Gadamer alikuwepo kwenye majadiliano ya awali na alionyesha kwa Heidegger kwamba kazi ya Derrida ilikuja kwa njia ya msaidizi). Heidegger alionyesha nia ya kukutana na Derrida kibinafsi baada ya yule wa pili kumpeleka kazi yake. Kulikuwa na majadiliano ya mkutano mnamo 1972, lakini hii ilishindwa kuchukua nafasi. Kuvutiwa na Heidegger kwa Derrida inasemekana na Braun kuwa mkubwa (kama inavyoonekana katika barua mbili, za Septemba 29, 1967 na Mei 16, 1972, kutoka Heidegger hadi Braun). Braun pia alileta umakini wa Heidegger kazi ya Michel Foucault. Uhusiano wa Foucault na Heidegger ni suala la ugumu mkubwa; Foucault alikubali Heidegger kama mwanafalsafa ambaye alisoma lakini hakuandika kamwe. .

Katika "Kuwa na Wakati", Heidegger anachunguza swali la kuwa kwa kuuliza juu ya mtu ambaye ni swali. Heidegger anataja hii kuwa "dasein" (tazama hapo juu), na anafuata uchunguzi wake kupitia mada kama vile vifo, utunzaji, wasiwasi, tabia mbaya, na historia. Ilikuwa kusudi la kwanza la Heidegger kuandika nusu ya pili ya kitabu hicho, kilichojumuisha "" uharibifu "" wa historia ya falsafa-ambayo ni mabadiliko ya falsafa kwa kufuata tena historia yake-lakini hakuwahi kumaliza mradi huu.

Mwanafalsafa Martin Heidegger alijiunga na Chama cha Nazi (NSDAP) mnamo Mei 1, 1933, siku kumi baada ya kuchaguliwa kuwa Rector wa Chuo Kikuu cha Freiburg. Mwaka mmoja baadaye, mnamo Aprili 1934, alijiuzulu tena na akaacha kushiriki katika mikutano ya chama cha Nazi, lakini alibaki mwanachama wa chama cha Nazi hadi kutenguliwa kwake mwishoni mwa Vita vya Kidunia vya pili. Usikilizaji wa deni mara baada ya Vita vya Kidunia vya pili ulisababisha kufukuzwa kwa Heidegger kutoka Freiburg, kumpiga marufuku kufundisha. Mnamo 1949, baada ya uchunguzi wa miaka kadhaa, jeshi la Ufaransa hatimaye liliainisha Heidegger kama "Mitläufer" au "Msafiri mwenza." Marufuku ya kufundisha yaliondolewa mnamo 1951, na Heidegger alipewa hadhi ya "Emeritus" mnamo 1953; Walakini, hakuruhusiwa kuanza tena uenyekiti wake wa falsafa.

Heidegger alitumia muda mwingi nyumbani kwake Todtnauberg, kwenye ukingo wa Msitu mweusi. Alizingatia usiri uliotolewa na msitu kuwa mazingira bora ambayo unaweza kujihusisha na mawazo ya kifalsafa.
Miezi michache kabla ya kifo chake, alikutana na Bernhard Welte, kuhani Katoliki, profesa wa Chuo Kikuu cha Freiburg na mwandishi wa mapema. Asili halisi ya mazungumzo haijulikani, lakini kinachojulikana ni kwamba ni pamoja na mazungumzo ya uhusiano wa Heidegger na Kanisa Katoliki na mazishi ya Kikristo ya baadaye ambayo kuhani aliongoza. Heidegger alikufa mnamo Mei 26, 1976, na akazikwa kwenye kaburi la Meßkirch, kando na wazazi wake na kaka.

question_en: How did Zhou Enlai die?
pos_context_en: Soon after birth, Zhou Enlai was adopted by his father's youngest brother, Zhou Yigan, who was ill with tuberculosis. Apparently the adoption was arranged because the family feared Yigan would die without an heir. Zhou Yigan died soon after the adoption, and Zhou Enlai was raised by Yigan's widow, whose surname was Chen. Madame Chen was also from a scholarly family and received a traditional literary education. According to Zhou's own account, he was very close to his adoptive mother and acquired his lasting interest in Chinese literature and opera from her. Madame Chen taught Zhou to read and write at an early age, and Zhou later claimed to have read the famous vernacular novel "Journey to the West" at the age of six. By the age of eight, he was reading other traditional Chinese novels, including "the Water Margin", "Romance of the Three Kingdoms", and "Dream of the Red Chamber".
neg_context_en: On May 3, 1961, Zhou Enlai (Sun Weimin) comes to Boyan, an old revolutionary base in north China's Hebei province, to do investigation. On the way to Boyan Township, Zhou Enlai sees trees had been despoiled of their leaves. He feels puzzled. Guo Fenglin (He Wei), the director of Boyan People's Commune, sends people to shut the dissidents, and than takes some people to greet Zhou Enlai. As soon as Zhou Enlai meets Guo Fenglin, he asks where are the leaves, Guo Fenglin lies to Zhou Enlai. A passing little girl named Lian Di says the truth that the leaves were ate by local hungry people.

Whatever Mao's opinion of Zhou may have been, there was general mourning among the public. Foreign correspondents reported that Beijing, shortly after Zhou's death, looked like a ghost town. There was no burial ceremony, as Zhou had willed his ashes to be scattered across the hills and rivers of his hometown, rather than stored in a ceremonial mausoleum. With Zhou gone, it became clear how the Chinese people had revered him, and how they had viewed him as a symbol of stability in an otherwise chaotic period of history. Zhou's death also brought condolences from nations around the world.

This drama describes the life of Zhou Enlai, who serves as Premier of the People's Republic of China, from the founding of the Communist State in 1949 to 1976 until his death."My Uncle Zhou Enlai" is base on the biography of the same name by Zhou Bingde, Zhou Enlai's nephew.

After coming to power, Deng Xiaoping may have overemphasized Zhou Enlai's achievements to distance the Communist Party from Mao's Great Leap Forward and Cultural Revolution, both of which had seriously weakened the Party's prestige. Deng observed that Mao's disastrous policies could no longer represent the Party's finest hour, but that the legacy and character of Zhou Enlai could. Furthermore, Deng received credit for enacting successful economic policies that Zhou initially proposed. By actively associating itself with an already popular Zhou Enlai, Zhou's legacy may have been used (and possibly distorted) as a political tool of the Party after his death.

My Uncle Zhou Enlai () is a 2016 Chinese historical biographical television series directed by Chen Li and written by Zhang Fachun, starring Sun Weimin as the Chinese premier Zhou Enlai. The series also features Huang Wei, Tang Guoqiang, Ma Xiaowei, Lu Qi, Wang Wufu, Yang Buting and Zhao Liqiang. The script was loosely based on Zhou Enlai's niece Zhou Bingde's biography of the same name, and covers Zhou's life from the establishment of the Communist State to his death in 1976, focusing on his efforts to make the new China strong. The series was aired on CCTV-1 on July 4, 2016.

Zhou Enlai was born in Huai'an, Jiangsu province on 5 March 1898, the first son of his branch of the Zhou family. The Zhou family was originally from Shaoxing in Zhejiang province. During the late Qing dynasty, Shaoxing was famous as the home of families such as Zhou's, whose members worked as government "clerks" (師爷, shiye) generation after generation. To move up the ladder in civil service, the men in these families often had to be transferred, and in the late years of the Qing dynasty, Zhou Enlai's branch of the family moved to Huai'an. Even after the move, however, the family continued to view Shaoxing as its ancestral home.

The Story of Zhou Enlai () is a 2013 Chinese Historical period drama film written by Tian Yunzhang and Jiang Yue and directed by Chen Li. Based on the life of Premier Zhou Enlai between May 3 and May 7, 1961, when he investigated extensively and scientifically the rural situation in Huaxi of Guiyang and the old revolutionary base Boyan Township of Hebei, it stars Sun Weimin as Zhou Enlai and Hao Yan as Zhou's wife Deng Yingchao, with He Wei, Bai Qing, Chu Zhibo, and Niu Ben. The film premiered in China on 16 July 2013.

After Zhou's death, Mao issued no statements acknowledging Zhou's achievements or contributions and sent no condolences to Zhou's widow, herself a senior Party leader. Mao forbade his staff from wearing black mourning armbands. Whether or not Mao would have attended Zhou's funeral, which was held in the Great Hall of the People, Mao himself was in very poor health to do so in any event. Mao did however send a wreath to the funeral.

On the second day, after inquiring about the situations of the field and the post office, Zhou Enlai comes to the "Danganhu"'s (go-it-aloner) home to ask for information. The 65-year-old bachelor tells Zhou Enlai that he is an individuallist and he is afraid that others will eat his ration. At night, a freak storm badly damages all the sweet potato vines which were just planted. All the villagers are carrying rain gears to the fields to deal with the flood. Zhou Enlai is very melancholy when he sees the villagers working in the torrential rain. Zhou Enlai comes to the kitchen to help cooking a pot of brown sugar water.
question_src: Je! Zhou Enlai alikufaje?
pos_context_src: Mara tu baada ya kuzaliwa, Zhou Enlai alipitishwa na kaka mdogo wa baba yake, Zhou Yigan, ambaye alikuwa mgonjwa na ugonjwa wa kifua kikuu. Inavyoonekana kupitishwa kulipangwa kwa sababu familia iliogopa Yigan angekufa bila mrithi. Zhou Yigan alikufa mara tu baada ya kupitishwa, na Zhou Enlai alilelewa na mjane wa Yigan, ambaye jina lake lilikuwa Chen. Madame Chen pia alikuwa kutoka kwa familia ya wasomi na alipata elimu ya jadi ya fasihi. Kulingana na akaunti ya Zhou mwenyewe, alikuwa karibu sana na mama yake aliyekua na alipata shauku yake ya kudumu katika fasihi ya Wachina na opera kutoka kwake. Madame Chen alimfundisha Zhou kusoma na kuandika katika umri mdogo, na baadaye Zhou alidai kuwa alisoma riwaya maarufu ya kawaida "Safari ya Magharibi" akiwa na umri wa miaka sita. Kufikia umri wa miaka minane, alikuwa akisoma riwaya zingine za jadi za Wachina, pamoja na "Maji ya Maji", "Romance of the Falme tatu", na "Ndoto ya Chumba Nyekundu".
neg_context_src: Mnamo Mei 3, 1961, Zhou Enlai (Sun Weimin) anakuja Boyan, msingi wa zamani wa mapinduzi katika mkoa wa Hebei Kaskazini, kufanya uchunguzi. Njiani kuelekea mji wa Boyan, Zhou Enlai anaona miti ilikuwa imekataliwa kwa majani yao. Anahisi kushangazwa. Guo Fenglin (He Wei), mkurugenzi wa ushirika wa watu wa Boyan, hutuma watu kuwafunga wapinzani, na kuliko kuchukua watu wengine kumsalimia Zhou Enlai. Mara tu Zhou Enlai atakapokutana na Guo Fenglin, anauliza ni wapi majani, Guo Fenglin amelala Zhou Enlai. Msichana mdogo anayepita anayeitwa Lian Di anasema ukweli kwamba majani yalikula na watu wenye njaa wa hapa.

Maoni yoyote ya Mao juu ya Zhou yanaweza kuwa, kulikuwa na maombolezo ya jumla kati ya umma. Waandishi wa kigeni waliripoti kwamba Beijing, muda mfupi baada ya kifo cha Zhou, alionekana kama mji wa roho. Hakukuwa na sherehe yoyote ya mazishi, kwani Zhou alikuwa ametaka majivu yake kutawanyika kwenye vilima na mito ya mji wake, badala ya kuhifadhiwa kwenye mausoleum ya sherehe. Na Zhou ameenda, ikawa wazi jinsi watu wa China walivyomheshimu, na jinsi walivyomwona kama ishara ya utulivu katika kipindi cha historia cha machafuko. Kifo cha Zhou pia kilileta rambirambi kutoka kwa mataifa kote ulimwenguni.

Mchezo huu wa kuigiza unaelezea maisha ya Zhou Enlai, ambaye ni Waziri Mkuu wa Jamhuri ya Watu wa Uchina, tangu kuanzishwa kwa Jimbo la Kikomunisti mnamo 1949 hadi 1976 hadi kifo chake. "Mjomba wangu Zhou Enlai" ni msingi wa wasifu wa jina moja na Zhou Bingde, mpwa wa Zhou Enlai.

Baada ya kuingia madarakani, Deng Xiaoping anaweza kuwa ameshangaza mafanikio ya Zhou Enlai ili kuweka mbali Chama cha Kikomunisti kutoka kwa mapinduzi makubwa ya Mao mbele na mapinduzi ya kitamaduni, ambayo yote yalikuwa yamedhoofisha ufahari wa chama hicho. Deng aligundua kuwa sera mbaya za Mao haziwezi tena kuwakilisha saa nzuri zaidi ya chama, lakini kwamba urithi na tabia ya Zhou Enlai inaweza. Kwa kuongezea, Deng alipokea deni kwa kutunga sera za uchumi zilizofanikiwa ambazo Zhou alipendekeza hapo awali. Kwa kujihusisha kikamilifu na Zhou Enlai maarufu tayari, urithi wa Zhou unaweza kuwa umetumika (na labda kupotoshwa) kama zana ya kisiasa ya chama baada ya kifo chake.

Mjomba wangu Zhou Enlai () ni safu ya televisheni ya kihistoria ya Kichina ya 2016 iliyoongozwa na Chen Li na iliyoandikwa na Zhang Fachun, nyota ya Sun Weimin kama Waziri Mkuu wa China Zhou Enlai. Mfululizo huo pia unaangazia Huang Wei, Tang Guoqiang, Ma Xiaowei, Lu Qi, Wang Wufu, Yang Buting na Zhao Liqiang. Nakala hiyo ilitokana na msingi wa biografia ya Zhou Enlai ya Zhou Bingde ya jina moja, na inashughulikia maisha ya Zhou kutoka kuanzishwa kwa serikali ya Kikomunisti hadi kifo chake mnamo 1976, akizingatia juhudi zake za kufanya China mpya iwe na nguvu. Mfululizo huo ulirushwa kwenye CCTV-1 mnamo Julai 4, 2016.

Zhou Enlai alizaliwa huko Huai'an, Mkoa wa Jiangsu mnamo 5 Machi 1898, mtoto wa kwanza wa tawi lake la familia ya Zhou. Familia ya Zhou ilikuwa ya asili kutoka Shaoxing katika Mkoa wa Zhejiang. Wakati wa nasaba ya marehemu ya Qing, Shaoxing alikuwa maarufu kama nyumba ya familia kama vile Zhou, ambaye washiriki wake walifanya kazi kama kizazi cha "makarani" (師爷, shiye) baada ya kizazi. Ili kusonga ngazi katika utumishi wa umma, wanaume katika familia hizi mara nyingi walilazimika kuhamishwa, na katika miaka ya marehemu ya nasaba ya Qing, tawi la familia la Zhou Enlai lilihamia Huai'an. Hata baada ya hoja, hata hivyo, familia iliendelea kuona Shaoxing kama nyumba ya babu yake.

Hadithi ya Zhou Enlai () ni filamu ya kihistoria ya kihistoria ya Kichina ya 2013 iliyoandikwa na Tian Yunzhang na Jiang Yue na kuongozwa na Chen Li. Kulingana na maisha ya Waziri Mkuu Zhou Enlai kati ya Mei 3 na Mei 7, 1961, wakati alipochunguza sana na kisayansi hali ya vijijini huko Huaxi ya Guiyang na Jiji la zamani la Mapinduzi la Boyan la Hebei, ni nyota za jua kama Zhou Enlai na Hao Yan kama Zhou mke wa Ying. Filamu hiyo ilizinduliwa nchini China mnamo 16 Julai 2013.

Baada ya kifo cha Zhou, Mao hakutoa taarifa yoyote kukiri mafanikio au michango ya Zhou na hakutuma rambirambi kwa mjane wa Zhou, mwenyewe kiongozi mwandamizi wa chama. Mao alikataza fimbo yake kutokana na kuvaa vifurushi vyeusi vya kuomboleza. Ikiwa Mao angehudhuria mazishi ya Zhou, ambayo yalifanyika katika Jumba Kuu la Watu, Mao mwenyewe alikuwa katika afya mbaya sana kufanya hivyo kwa hali yoyote. Mao hata hivyo alituma wreath kwenye mazishi.

Siku ya pili, baada ya kuuliza juu ya hali ya uwanja na ofisi ya posta, Zhou Enlai anakuja nyumbani kwa "Danganhu" (Go-It-Aloner) kuuliza habari. Bachelor mwenye umri wa miaka 65 anamwambia Zhou Enlai kwamba yeye ni mtu mmoja na anaogopa kwamba wengine watakula chakula chake. Usiku, dhoruba kali huharibu vibaya mizabibu yote ya viazi ambayo ilipandwa tu. Wanakijiji wote wamebeba gia za mvua kwenye shamba ili kukabiliana na mafuriko. Zhou Enlai ni melanini sana wakati anaona wanakijiji wakifanya kazi katika mvua kubwa. Zhou Enlai anakuja jikoni kusaidia kupika sufuria ya maji ya sukari ya kahawia.
report_src: Kwa mujibu wa hati pekee tuliyopewa, ambayo inasimulia kuhusu kupitishwa kwa Zhou Enlai utotoni, malezi yake chini ya mjane Chen na mapenzi yake ya mapema kwa fasihi na opera, hakuna maelezo yoyote kuhusu tarehe, mahali wala sababu ya kifo chake, hivyo chanzo hiki hakijibu swali la jinsi Zhou Enlai alivyokufa [1].

question_en: On what plantation was Julius Caesar Chappelle a slave?
pos_context_en: Julius Caesar Chappelle (1852–1904) was an African-American politician born into slavery in South Carolina. After the American Civil War, he lived for a time with his family in LaVilla, Florida, helping develop the new town. In 1870, he was one of numerous Southern black migrants to Boston, Massachusetts, which had a thriving black community and strong abolitionist history. He later joined the Republican Party that was founded by abolitionists, and Chappelle was elected to two terms in the Massachusetts state legislature, serving 1883-1886. Julius Caesar Chappelle was also the first African-American to serve on the Massachusetts State Senate Committee where he served three terms. Chappelle was active in supporting civil rights, trying to reduce discrimination, and consumer affairs. His speeches were frequently covered by newspapers. Throughout his life and political career, he held secondary supervisory government positions in maintenance, such as at the United States Post Office and US Boston Custom House. Although Julius Caesar Chappelle may have graced the same pages in newspapers as Frederick Douglass, Chappelle is not as well known because he is not known to have left much of a literary footprint such as writing manuscripts or for pamphlets.
neg_context_en: The Chappelle's were split on the prohibition issue, Lewis Chappelle, Julius C. Chappelle's brother and a prominent construction contractor in Florida, was for prohibition but belonged to a non-politically based anti-alcohol group. Lewis Chappelle's son, music prodigy Pat H. Chappelle known as the "Pioneer of Negro Vaudeville," who owned traveling The Rabbit's Foot Company was also in the theater and saloon business, and would visit his uncle Julius Caesar Chappelle in Boston, Massachusetts. Julius Caesar Chappelle and his constituents, colleagues, and friends took a stand against prohibition.

In the early 1880s, Hayden helped bring Julius Caesar Chappelle into republican politics. Chappelle was a popular Republican legislator from 1883 to 1886 of Ward 9 that included the Beacon Hill area of Boston, MA. According to the "Boston Daily Globe" obituary of Julius C. Chappelle who died in 1904, when Chappelle lived in the "West End, he attracted the attention of the late Lewis Hayden, who brought him (Julius Caesar Chappelle) into the republican ranks of old ward 9, as a registrar for the colored voters in that ward." Chappelle was very successful in registering voters, and Chappelle later won several elections to the Boston legislature. Chappelle was also an alternate to the Republican National Convention that nominated James G. Blaine, and Chappelle was the only African-American on the Republican Senate Committee. During the Crispus Attucks monument unveiling in 1888, when Hayden could not attend due to frail health, Chappelle was president of the senate and along with others at the event gave homage to Hayden. .

South Carolina was an area of white resistance after the Civil War, and during Reconstruction to the new freedoms for former slaves after they were emancipated. Insurgent groups were active in trying to maintain white supremacy. In 1868, what was known as "The Death Card" was a playing card of hate circulated among white supremacists and it contained many images on the one card of white and people of color of South Carolina that were in public office and against slavery. The death card was created by white supremacist in public office in South Carolina. The Ku Klux Klan had numerous chapters that attacked freedmen to maintain white supremacy and establish dominance. Due to the severity of the insurgents' attacks, in 1871 President Ulysses Grant ordered the National Guard of the United States into nine counties in South Carolina, declaring martial law in order to suppress the Ku Klux Klan. The KKK usually raided towns, as many towns in South Carolina such as the Town of Newberry were abolitionist, whereas the slave plantation areas were not. The KKK made bull whip and shooting raids against freedmen and their allies in areas such as Newberry County.

Chappelle was born in Jacksonville, Florida, the son of Lewis Chappelle and his wife Anna, who had been slaves in Newberry County, South Carolina. After slavery was abolished, they left South Carolina with their relatives and other freed slaves to help construct the suburban neighborhood of LaVilla in Jacksonville, which became a center of African-American culture in Florida. Lewis Chappelle and his brother Mitchell Chappelle worked on house construction and also held several political positions in LaVilla. Their other brother Julius Caesar Chappelle, Pat's uncle, also worked in construction in LaVilla and then moved to Boston, Massachusetts, where he became a legislator between 1883 and 1886, one of the early black Republicans in Boston (the Republican Party was founded by abolitionists).
Pat Chappelle was musically gifted. He and his brothers and cousin learned musical skills from some of their relatives – Pat learned how to play the guitar and piano, but was best known for his proficiency in banjo. He left school after the fourth grade and played guitar in traveling string bands. He started playing in hotels on the East Coast and was discovered by a prestigious vaudeville circuit owner, Benjamin Franklin Keith, who offered him bookings with the Museum circuit in Boston and New York City. Later, he performed in Florida restaurants and saloons.

Chappelle also served as an alternate delegate to the Republican National Convention in Chicago that nominated James G. Blaine. Julius Caesar Chappelle was very loyal to the Republican Party in general, and fully supported African-Americans in Republican politics with helpful speeches and meetings that were sometimes covered by the media.
In 1884, "New York Herald" wrote about Boston politics, "We are now informed by Mr. Grimké, editor of "The Hub", Judge L. Roftin, J.C. Chappelle, Lewis Hayden, J. H. Wolf, and J.J. Smith—all leading citizens of the 'Athens of America'–that the colored vote of Boston is for Blaine."

Chappelle was seen as having tough contenders by the newspapers that followed the elections to the extent that sometimes they thought he would not win. "Mr. Julius C. Chappelle, the colored man on the Ward 9 Republican representative ticket, is evidently to be sacrificed by his friends of his white associate. "The Journal" significantly hints that 'the Republicans of Ward 9 should see to it that Henry Parkman is elected to the house by a good majority.'" Yet, Chappelle was reelected, defeating Robert Hooper, the son of Hon. Samuel Hooper.

As a youth, Julius C. Chappelle moved to Florida in 1869/1870 with two brothers, other relatives and freedmen from South Carolina to help build LaVilla. The town was later annexed by Jacksonville, Florida.

Chappelle was nominated for three terms to the State Senate Committee and in his third term, he served as president of the State Senate Committee. The "Boston Daily Globe" reported in its discussion of the activities of the different Wards "Hon. Henry H. Sprague has been renominated for State Senator and Mr. Julius C. Chappelle has been reappointed a member of the Republican State Committee. The action was taken by the Republican Convention for the Fifth Suffolk Senatorial District, which was held yesterday afternoon at 375 Washington Street, with Mr. Charles G. Wood of Ward 11 as chairman and Mr. Chappelle as Secretary." A "unamimous" vote "gave Mr. Chappelle a third term as member of the Republican State Committee although the district usually gives its representatives there two years only.",
question_src: Je! Julius Kaisari Chappelle alikuwa mtumwa gani?
pos_context_src: Julius Kaisari Chappelle (1852-1904) alikuwa mwanasiasa wa Kiafrika na Amerika alizaliwa katika utumwa huko Carolina Kusini. Baada ya Vita vya wenyewe kwa wenyewe vya Amerika, aliishi kwa muda na familia yake huko Lavilla, Florida, kusaidia kukuza mji mpya. Mnamo 1870, alikuwa mmoja wa wahamiaji wengi wa kusini mweusi kwenda Boston, Massachusetts, ambayo ilikuwa na jamii nyeusi na historia kali ya kukomesha. Baadaye alijiunga na Chama cha Republican ambacho kilianzishwa na wahalifu, na Chappelle alichaguliwa kwa masharti mawili katika Bunge la Jimbo la Massachusetts, akihudumia 1883-1886. Julius Caesar Chappelle pia alikuwa wa kwanza wa Kiafrika-Amerika kutumikia kwenye Kamati ya Seneti ya Jimbo la Massachusetts ambapo alitumikia masharti matatu. Chappelle alikuwa akifanya kazi katika kusaidia haki za raia, kujaribu kupunguza ubaguzi, na maswala ya watumiaji. Hotuba zake zilifunikwa mara kwa mara na magazeti. Katika maisha yake yote na kazi ya kisiasa, alishikilia nafasi za serikali za usimamizi wa sekondari katika matengenezo, kama vile katika Ofisi ya Posta ya Merika na Nyumba ya Kitamaduni ya Boston. Ijapokuwa Julius Caesar Chappelle anaweza kuwa alikuwa amepata kurasa zile zile kwenye magazeti kama Frederick Douglass, Chappelle haijulikani sana kwa sababu haijulikani kuwa ameacha sehemu kubwa ya maandishi kama vile kuandika maandishi ya maandishi au kwa vijikaratasi.
neg_context_src: Chappelle waligawanyika juu ya suala la kukataza, Lewis Chappelle, kaka wa Julius C. Chappelle na mkandarasi maarufu wa ujenzi huko Florida, alikuwa kwa marufuku lakini walikuwa wa kikundi cha watu wasio na kisiasa cha kuzuia pombe. Mwana wa Lewis Chappelle, Music Prodigy Pat H. Chappelle anayejulikana kama "Pioneer of Negro Vaudeville," ambaye alikuwa anamiliki kusafiri kwa kampuni ya mguu wa sungura pia alikuwa kwenye ukumbi wa michezo na biashara ya saloon, na angemtembelea mjomba wake Julius Kaisari Chappelle huko Boston, Massachusetts. Julius Kaisari Chappelle na watu wake, wenzake, na marafiki walichukua msimamo dhidi ya marufuku.

Mnamo miaka ya 1880, Hayden alisaidia kumleta Julius Kaisari Chappelle katika siasa za Republican. Chappelle alikuwa mbunge maarufu wa Republican kutoka 1883 hadi 1886 ya Kata 9 ambayo ni pamoja na eneo la Beacon Hill la Boston, MA. Kulingana na tukio la "Boston Daily Globe" la Julius C. Chappelle ambaye alikufa mnamo 1904, wakati Chappelle aliishi katika "Mwisho wa Magharibi, alivutia umakini wa marehemu Lewis Hayden, ambaye alimleta (Julius Caesar Chappelle) katika safu ya Republican ya Old Ward 9, kama msajili wa wapiga rangi walio na rangi hiyo." Chappelle alifanikiwa sana katika kusajili wapiga kura, na baadaye Chappelle alishinda uchaguzi kadhaa kwa Bunge la Boston. Chappelle pia alikuwa mbadala wa Mkutano wa Kitaifa wa Republican ambao ulimteua James G. Blaine, na Chappelle ndiye pekee wa Kiafrika-Amerika kwenye Kamati ya Seneti ya Republican. Wakati wa Monument ya Crispus Attucks kufunua mnamo 1888, wakati Hayden hakuweza kuhudhuria kwa sababu ya afya dhaifu, Chappelle alikuwa Rais wa Seneti na pamoja na wengine kwenye hafla hiyo walimpa heshima Hayden. .

Carolina Kusini ilikuwa eneo la upinzani mweupe baada ya Vita vya wenyewe kwa wenyewe, na wakati wa ujenzi wa uhuru mpya kwa watumwa wa zamani baada ya kutengwa. Vikundi vya waasi vilikuwa vinafanya kazi katika kujaribu kudumisha ukuu mweupe. Mnamo 1868, kile kilichojulikana kama "Kadi ya Kifo" kilikuwa kadi ya kucheza ya chuki iliyosambazwa kati ya wakuu weupe na ilikuwa na picha nyingi kwenye kadi moja ya nyeupe na watu wa rangi ya Carolina Kusini ambayo ilikuwa katika ofisi ya umma na dhidi ya utumwa. Kadi ya kifo iliundwa na supremacist nyeupe katika ofisi ya umma huko Carolina Kusini. Ku Klux Klan alikuwa na sura nyingi ambazo zilishambulia watu huru kudumisha ukuu nyeupe na kuanzisha utawala. Kwa sababu ya ukali wa mashambulio ya waasi, mnamo 1871 Rais Ulysses Grant aliamuru Mlinzi wa Kitaifa wa Merika katika kaunti tisa huko Carolina Kusini, akitangaza sheria za kijeshi ili kukandamiza Ku Klux Klan. KKK kawaida ilivamia miji, kama miji mingi huko Carolina Kusini kama vile mji wa Newberry ilikuwa ya kukomesha, wakati maeneo ya upandaji wa watumwa hayakuwa. KKK ilifanya mjeledi wa ng'ombe na shambulio la risasi dhidi ya watu huru na washirika wao katika maeneo kama vile Newberry County.

Chappelle alizaliwa huko Jacksonville, Florida, mtoto wa Lewis Chappelle na mkewe Anna, ambao walikuwa watumwa katika kaunti ya Newberry, South Carolina. Baada ya utumwa kufutwa, waliacha Carolina Kusini na jamaa zao na watumwa wengine walioachiliwa kusaidia kujenga kitongoji cha kitongoji cha Lavilla huko Jacksonville, ambacho kilikuwa kitovu cha tamaduni ya Kiafrika na Amerika huko Florida. Lewis Chappelle na kaka yake Mitchell Chappelle walifanya kazi katika ujenzi wa nyumba na pia walishikilia nafasi kadhaa za kisiasa huko Lavilla. Ndugu yao mwingine Julius Caesar Chappelle, mjomba wa Pat, pia alifanya kazi katika ujenzi huko Lavilla na kisha akahamia Boston, Massachusetts, ambapo alikua mbunge kati ya 1883 na 1886, mmoja wa watu wa Republican wa mapema huko Boston (Chama cha Republican kilianzishwa na waanzilishi).
Pat Chappelle alikuwa na vipawa vya muziki. Yeye na kaka zake na binamu walijifunza ustadi wa muziki kutoka kwa ndugu zao wengine - Pat alijifunza jinsi ya kucheza gita na piano, lakini alijulikana zaidi kwa ustadi wake huko Banjo. Aliacha shule baada ya daraja la nne na kucheza gita katika bendi za kamba za kusafiri. Alianza kucheza katika hoteli kwenye Pwani ya Mashariki na aligunduliwa na mmiliki wa mzunguko wa kifahari wa Vaudeville, Benjamin Franklin Keith, ambaye alimpa uhifadhi na mzunguko wa makumbusho huko Boston na New York City. Baadaye, alifanya katika mikahawa ya Florida na saloons.

Chappelle pia aliwahi kuwa mjumbe mbadala wa Mkutano wa Kitaifa wa Republican huko Chicago ambao ulimteua James G. Blaine. Julius Kaisari Chappelle alikuwa mwaminifu sana kwa Chama cha Republican kwa ujumla, na aliwaunga mkono kikamilifu Waafrika-Wamarekani katika siasa za Republican na hotuba nzuri na mikutano ambayo wakati mwingine ilifunikwa na wanahabari.
Mnamo 1884, "New York Herald" aliandika juu ya siasa za Boston, "Sasa tumefahamishwa na Mr. Grimké, mhariri wa" The Hub ", Jaji L. Roftin, J.C. Chappelle, Lewis Hayden, J. H. Wolf, na J.J. Smith - wote wanaoongoza raia wa 'Athens of America' -the Rangi wa Blon.

Chappelle alionekana kuwa na wagombea mgumu na magazeti ambayo yalifuata uchaguzi hadi wakati mwingine walidhani hatashinda. "Bwana Julius C. Chappelle, mtu mwenye rangi kwenye tiketi ya mwakilishi wa Wadi 9, ni dhahiri kutolewa dhabihu na marafiki wake wa mshirika wake mweupe." Jarida "linaonyesha kwamba 'Republican of Ward 9 wanapaswa kuona kwamba Henry Parkman amechaguliwa kwa Ikulu na watu wengi. Samweli Hooper.

Kama kijana, Julius C. Chappelle alihamia Florida mnamo 1869/1870 na kaka wawili, jamaa wengine na watu huru kutoka Carolina Kusini kusaidia kujenga Lavilla. Jiji hilo baadaye lilishikwa na Jacksonville, Florida.

Chappelle aliteuliwa kwa masharti matatu kwa Kamati ya Seneti ya Jimbo na katika kipindi chake cha tatu, aliwahi kuwa Rais wa Kamati ya Seneti ya Jimbo. "Boston Daily Globe" iliripoti katika majadiliano yake juu ya shughuli za wadi tofauti "Mhe. Henry H. Sprague amebadilishwa tena kwa Seneta wa Jimbo na Bwana Julius C. Chappelle ameteuliwa tena mwanachama wa Kamati ya Jimbo la Republican. Hatua hiyo ilichukuliwa na Mkutano wa Republican kwa Wilaya ya Seneta ya tano na Mr. Chappelle kama katibu. " Kura "isiyo ya kawaida" ilimpa Bwana Chappelle muhula wa tatu kama mjumbe wa Kamati ya Jimbo la Republican ingawa kawaida wilaya inawapa wawakilishi wake huko miaka miwili tu. ",
report_src: Julius Kaisari Chappelle alikuwa Mtumwa Mmarekani mwenye asili ya Kiafrika aliyezaliwa mwaka 1852 katika jimbo la Carolina Kusini, ambako alimilikiwa kama sehemu ya taasisi ya utumwa kabla ya Vita vya wenyewe kwa wenyewe vya Marekani kumaliza utumwa rasmi nchini humo [1].

question_en: How many people live in Thailand?
pos_context_en: Thailand is home to about 63 million people, 95% of these people follow Theravada Buddhism and it has become central to the culture and identity of Thailand. It has been observed that few Buddhist monks and authorities have taken action against the death penalty. Many monks in Thailand have been surprisingly tolerant. This might be because they come from rural areas of the country where the death penalty is strongly supported, they lack information because it is not a pressing issue and not widely debated, or they simply have no power and are forbidden from making political statements because political authorities are exclusively in control of the government in Thailand. Thailand's war on drugs may potentially explain its current retention of the death penalty. The manufacture and distribution of drugs is considered an offense in which the death penalty is mandatory. There were no executions in Thailand, however, between the years of 1988-1995 and 2004-2007.
neg_context_en: The vast majority of the Thai people live in Thailand, although some Thais can also be found in other parts of Southeast Asia. About 51–57 million live in Thailand alone, while large communities can also be found in the United States, China, Laos, Taiwan, Malaysia, Singapore, Cambodia, Burma, South Korea, Germany, the United Kingdom, Canada, Australia, Sweden, Norway, Libya, and the United Arab Emirates.

The Northern Thai people or Tai Yuan (ไทยวน, ), self-designation khon mu(e)ang (ฅนเมือง, , meaning "people of the (cultivated) land" or "people of our community") are the majority population of eight provinces in northern Thailand, principally in the area of the former kingdom of Lan Na. They belong to the group of Tai peoples and are closely related to Tai Lü and Tai Khün with regards to common culture, language and history. There are approximately 6 million Tai Yuan. Most of them live in Northern Thailand, with a small minority 29,442 (2005 census) living across the border in Bokeo Province and Sainyabuli Province of Laos. Their language is called Northern Thai, Lanna, or "Kham Mueang".

The Chinese population in Thailand had risen to 792,000 by 1910. By 1932, approximately 12.2 percent of the population was ethnic Chinese. The corruption of the Qing dynasty and the massive population increase in China, combined with high taxes, caused many families to leave for Thailand in search of work and a better life. Those who came before the First World War came overland or by sailboats called sampams, while after World War II most arrived by steam ship. The earlier tradition of Chinese-Thai intermarriage declined once large numbers of Chinese women immigrated in the early-20th century. New arrivals frequently came as families and resisted assimilation, retaining their Chinese culture and living in all-Chinese areas.

In 2016, 5.81 million people lived in poverty, or 11.6 million people (17.2% of population) if "near poor" is included. Proportion of the poor relative to total population in each region was 12.96% in the Northeast, 12.35% in the South, and 9.83% in the North. In 2017, there were 14 million people who applied for social welfare (yearly income of less than ฿100,000 was required). At the end of 2017, Thailand's total household debt was ฿11.76 trillion. In 2010, 3% of all household were bankrupt. In 2016, there were estimated 30,000 homeless persons in the country.

The exact number of child-prostitutes in Thailand is not known. According to the US-based research institute “Protection Project”, estimates of the number of children involved in prostitution living in Thailand ranges from 12,000 to the hundreds of thousands (ECPAT International). The government, university researchers, and NGOs estimated that there are as many as 30,000 to 40,000 prostitutes under 18 years of age, not including foreign migrants (US Department of State, 2005b). Thailand’s Health System Research Institute estimates that children in prostitution make up 40% of prostitutes in Thailand.

The Bank of Thailand estimates that, , 1,120,837 Thais worked overseas. The number of Thais registered as working overseas is only 117,291. 
Working overseas is increasingly popular among Thai people. Human traffickers sometimes take advantage of those working abroad. "The problems of deception, tricking people to work as forced labour or in the sex industry are more prominent," according to Kritaya Archavanitkul, a professor at Mahidol University's Institute for Population and Social Research. Many Thai people seek easy, but illegal, ways to work in other countries. That makes them easier targets for traffickers, and vulnerable to being taken advantage of by bad employers. In India, for example, massage parlors are a booming industry and many customers prefer fair-skinned women from countries like Thailand. Since 2015, Thailand has become a "source country" for coerced sex workers. Full data is not yet available for 2017, but Indian authorities said 40 Thai women were rescued from massage parlors acting as fronts for prostitution in Mumbai and Pune in the first half of 2017. Another 34 Thai women were rescued later in 2017 from massage parlors and spas in Hyderabad.

Thailand's successful government-sponsored family planning program has resulted in a decline in population growth from 3.1 percent in 1960 to around 0.4 percent in 2015. The World Bank forecasts a contraction of the working-age population of about 10 percent between 2010 and 2040. In 1970, an average of 5.7 people lived in a Thai household. At the time of the 2010 census, the figure was down to 3.2. Even though Thailand has one of the better social security systems in Asia, the increasing population of elderly people is a challenge for the country.

The population began to grow explosively as the standard of living rose, and a flood of people began to move from the villages to the cities, and above all to Bangkok. Thailand had 30 million people in 1965, while by the end of the 20th century the population had doubled. Bangkok's population had grown tenfold since 1945 and had tripled since 1970.

The United Nations classifies Thailand as an "aging society" (one-tenth of the population above 60), on track to become an "aged society" (one-fifth of the population above 60) by 2025. The Fiscal Policy Office projects that the number of Thais aged 60-plus will increase from 14 percent in 2016 to 17.5 percent in 2020, 21.2 percent in 2025, and 25.2 percent in 2030. it is estimated that there are 94,000 employees aged 60 years or more in the workforce.
The population of Thailand was estimated to be .
question_src: Ni watu wangapi wanaishi Thailand?
pos_context_src: Thailand ni nyumbani kwa watu milioni 63, 95% ya watu hawa hufuata Ubuddha wa Theravada na imekuwa msingi wa utamaduni na kitambulisho cha Thailand. Imebainika kuwa watawa wachache wa Wabudhi na viongozi wamechukua hatua dhidi ya adhabu ya kifo. Watawa wengi nchini Thailand wamekuwa wakivumilia kwa kushangaza. Hii inaweza kuwa kwa sababu wanatoka vijijini nchini ambapo adhabu ya kifo inaungwa mkono sana, wanakosa habari kwa sababu sio suala kubwa na sio kujadiliwa sana, au hawana nguvu na ni marufuku kutoa taarifa za kisiasa kwa sababu viongozi wa kisiasa wanadhibiti serikali nchini Thailand. Vita vya Thailand juu ya dawa za kulevya vinaweza kuelezea uwezekano wa kutunza kwa adhabu ya kifo. Utengenezaji na usambazaji wa dawa unachukuliwa kuwa kosa ambalo adhabu ya kifo ni ya lazima. Hakukuwa na mauaji nchini Thailand, hata hivyo, kati ya miaka ya 1988-1995 na 2004-2007.
neg_context_src: Idadi kubwa ya watu wa Thai wanaishi Thailand, ingawa Thais wengine wanaweza pia kupatikana katika sehemu zingine za Asia ya Kusini. Karibu milioni 51-57 wanaishi Thailand pekee, wakati jamii kubwa pia zinaweza kupatikana nchini Merika, Uchina, Laos, Taiwan, Malaysia, Singapore, Cambodia, Burma, Korea Kusini, Ujerumani, Uingereza, Canada, Australia, Sweden, Norway, Libya, na Emari wa Uajemi.

Watu wa Kaskazini wa Thai au Tai Yuan (ไทยวน,), Ubunifu wa Khon Mu (e) Ang (ฅนเมือง ,,, Kumaanisha "watu wa ardhi (iliyopandwa) au" watu wa jamii yetu ") ni idadi kubwa ya majimbo nane kaskazini mwa Thailand, haswa katika eneo la Ufalme wa zamani wa Lan Na. Wao ni wa kikundi cha watu wa Tai na wanahusiana sana na Tai Lü na Tai Khün kuhusu tamaduni za kawaida, lugha na historia. Kuna takriban milioni 6 Tai Yuan. Wengi wao wanaishi Kaskazini mwa Thailand, na wachache 29,442 (sensa ya 2005) wanaoishi katika mpaka katika Mkoa wa Bokeo na Mkoa wa Sainyabuli wa Laos. Lugha yao inaitwa Kaskazini mwa Thai, Lanna, au "Kham Mueang".

Idadi ya Wachina nchini Thailand ilikuwa imeongezeka hadi 792,000 ifikapo 1910. Kufikia 1932, takriban asilimia 12.2 ya idadi ya watu walikuwa Wachina wa kabila. Ufisadi wa nasaba ya Qing na kuongezeka kwa idadi ya watu nchini China, pamoja na ushuru mkubwa, ilisababisha familia nyingi kuondoka kwenda Thailand kutafuta kazi na maisha bora. Wale ambao walikuja kabla ya Vita vya Kwanza vya Ulimwengu walikuja au kwa mashua zinazoitwa Sampams, wakati baada ya Vita vya Kidunia vya pili kufika kwa meli ya mvuke. Tamaduni ya mapema ya ndoa ya Wachina-Thai ilipungua mara moja idadi kubwa ya wanawake wa China walihamia mapema karne ya 20. Waliofika mara nyingi walikuja kama familia na walipinga uhamishaji, wakihifadhi utamaduni wao wa Wachina na kuishi katika maeneo ya Wachina.

Mnamo mwaka wa 2016, watu milioni 5.81 waliishi katika umaskini, au watu milioni 11.6 (asilimia 17.2 ya idadi ya watu) ikiwa "karibu duni" imejumuishwa. Idadi ya jamaa duni na jumla ya idadi ya watu katika kila mkoa ilikuwa 12.96% kaskazini mashariki, 12.35% kusini, na 9.83% kaskazini. Mnamo mwaka wa 2017, kulikuwa na watu milioni 14 ambao waliomba ustawi wa jamii (mapato ya mwaka ya chini ya ฿ 100,000 inahitajika). Mwisho wa 2017, deni la jumla la kaya la Thailand lilikuwa ฿ 11.76 trilioni. Mnamo 2010, 3% ya kaya zote zilikuwa zimefilisika. Mnamo mwaka wa 2016, kulikuwa na makadirio ya watu 30,000 wasio na makazi nchini.

Idadi halisi ya wafanyakazi wa watoto nchini Thailand haijulikani. Kulingana na Taasisi ya Utafiti ya msingi wa Amerika "Mradi wa Ulinzi", makadirio ya idadi ya watoto wanaohusika katika ukahaba wanaoishi Thailand ni kati ya 12,000 hadi mamia ya maelfu (ECPAT International). Serikali, watafiti wa vyuo vikuu, na NGOs walikadiria kuwa kuna makahaba kama 30,000 hadi 40,000 chini ya umri wa miaka 18, bila kujumuisha wahamiaji wa kigeni (Idara ya Jimbo la Amerika, 2005b). Taasisi ya Utafiti wa Mfumo wa Afya wa Thailand inakadiria kuwa watoto katika ukahaba hufanya 40% ya makahaba nchini Thailand.

Benki ya Thailand inakadiria kuwa ,, 1,120,837 Thais ilifanya kazi nje ya nchi. Idadi ya Thais iliyosajiliwa kama kufanya kazi nje ya nchi ni 117,291 tu. 
Kufanya kazi nje ya nchi inazidi kuwa maarufu kati ya watu wa Thai. Wafanyabiashara wa binadamu wakati mwingine huchukua fursa ya wale wanaofanya kazi nje ya nchi. "Shida za udanganyifu, kuwadanganya watu kufanya kazi kama kazi ya kulazimishwa au katika tasnia ya ngono ni maarufu zaidi," kulingana na Kritaya Archavanitkul, profesa katika Taasisi ya Chuo Kikuu cha Mahidol na Utafiti wa Jamii. Watu wengi wa Thai hutafuta njia rahisi, lakini haramu, za kufanya kazi katika nchi zingine. Hiyo inawafanya malengo rahisi kwa wafanyabiashara, na wako katika hatari ya kuchukuliwa na waajiri wabaya. Huko India, kwa mfano, parlors za massage ni tasnia inayoongezeka na wateja wengi wanapendelea wanawake wenye ngozi nzuri kutoka nchi kama Thailand. Tangu 2015, Thailand imekuwa "nchi chanzo" kwa wafanyabiashara ya ngono iliyolazimishwa. Takwimu kamili bado hazipatikani kwa mwaka wa 2017, lakini viongozi wa India walisema wanawake 40 wa Thai waliokolewa kutoka kwa wahusika wa massage kama sehemu za ukahaba huko Mumbai na Pune katika nusu ya kwanza ya 2017. Wanawake wengine 34 wa Thai waliokolewa baadaye mnamo 2017 kutoka kwa parlors na spas huko Hyderabad.

Programu ya upangaji wa familia iliyofanikiwa na serikali ya Thailand imesababisha kupungua kwa ukuaji wa idadi ya watu kutoka asilimia 3.1 mnamo 1960 hadi asilimia 0.4 mnamo 2015. Benki ya Dunia inatabiri ubadilishaji wa idadi ya watu wenye umri wa karibu asilimia 10 kati ya 2010 na 2040. Mnamo 1970, wastani wa watu 5.7 waliishi katika kaya ya Thai. Wakati wa sensa ya 2010, takwimu ilikuwa chini ya 3.2. Hata ingawa Thailand ina moja ya mifumo bora ya Usalama wa Jamii huko Asia, kuongezeka kwa idadi ya wazee ni changamoto kwa nchi.

Idadi ya watu ilianza kuongezeka kwa kiwango cha kuishi, na mafuriko ya watu walianza kuhama kutoka vijiji kwenda miji, na zaidi ya yote kwenda Bangkok. Thailand ilikuwa na watu milioni 30 mnamo 1965, wakati mwishoni mwa karne ya 20 idadi ya watu walikuwa wameongezeka mara mbili. Idadi ya watu wa Bangkok walikuwa wamekua mara kumi tangu 1945 na walikuwa wameongezeka mara tatu tangu 1970.

Umoja wa Mataifa huainisha Thailand kama "jamii ya wazee" (moja ya kumi ya idadi ya watu zaidi ya 60), kwenye wimbo wa kuwa "jamii ya wazee" (theluthi moja ya idadi ya watu zaidi ya 60) ifikapo 2025. Miradi ya Ofisi ya Fedha ambayo idadi ya asilimia 20, kwa asilimia 20, kwa asilimia 20, asilimia 20, asilimia 20, asilimia 20.2.2.2.2.2.2.2.2.2, asilimia 20, asilimia 20, asilimia 20, asilimia 20, asilimia 20, asilimia 20, asilimia 20, asilimia 20, asilimia 20, asilimia 20, asilimia 20, asilimia 20, miaka 20, miaka 20, miaka 20, miaka 20, miaka 20, miaka 202.2 21.2 21 ettent evert est 20 ni wafanyikazi 94,000 wenye umri wa miaka 60 au zaidi katika nguvu kazi.
Idadi ya Thailand ilikadiriwa kuwa.

question_en: When did Nickelodeon network start?
pos_context_en: Nickelodeon launched on April 1, 1979 (as the first ever all children's network) on Warner Cable franchises across the country. Nickelodeon's name was proposed by New York based creative director/designer Joseph Iozzi, who also created the channel's first logo and original advertising campaign. Iozzi saw the word "nickelodeon" as a natural fit for the proposed children's channel: "The Nickelodeon was a turn of the century device for dispensing entertainment. The sound of the word was nice and rolled off the tongue easily". Hauser ultimately selected Iozzi's proposal out of a list out of 150 names. The other proposed names for the channel included The Savoy Channel and The Rainbow Network.
neg_context_en: In October 2009, Viacom brought "Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles" into the Nickelodeon family when it purchased the franchise from Mirage Studios, with a new CGI-animated series and live action film released since then. On May 12, 2010, the network reached an agreement with Haim Saban to obtain rights to broadcast new episodes of "Power Rangers" (after Saban had repurchased rights to the franchise from The Walt Disney Company earlier that month). The network began airing the series starting with the February 7, 2011 debut of its 18th season, "Power Rangers Samurai"; as part of the deal, Nickelodeon also acquired the rights to all 700 episodes of the series produced prior to then for broadcast on sister network Nicktoons, which began airing the series later that year. On January 1, 2011, Nickelodeon debuted "House of Anubis", a series based on the Nickelodeon Netherlands series "Het Huis Anubis", which became the first original scripted series to be broadcast in a weekdaily strip (similar to the soap opera format). Produced in the United Kingdom, it was also the first original series by the flagship U.S. channel to be produced outside of North America.

On August 11, 1991, Nickelodeon debuted its first original animated series – "Doug", "Rugrats", and "The Ren & Stimpy Show" – under the Nicktoons banner. The development of these programs was a reversal of the network's previous concerns, as Nickelodeon had previously refused to produce weekly animated series due to the high production costs. The three series found success by 1993, resulting in the creation of the network's fourth Nicktoon, "Rocko's Modern Life", which also became a success. Later, Nickelodeon partnered with Sony Wonder (currently of Sony Pictures Home Entertainment) to release episode compilations of the network's programs on VHS, which became top sellers, until 1996, after which Nickelodeon switched its distribution to Paramount Home Entertainment, with Paramount re-releasing episode compilations of the network's Nicktoons on VHS. "Doug" and "The Ren & Stimpy Show" would both end production around that time; however, "Doug" would be revived in 1996 as part of ABC's Saturday morning lineup. "Rugrats", on the other hand, returned from hiatus on May 9, 1997 (reruns continued to air up until that point).
On August 15, 1992, the network extended its Saturday schedule by two hours, with the launch of a primetime block called SNICK from 8:00 to 10:00 p.m. Eastern and Pacific Time; over the years, SNICK became home to shows such as "Are You Afraid of the Dark?", "Clarissa Explains It All", "All That", "The Amanda Show", and "Kenan & Kel". In 2004, the block was reformatted as the Saturday edition of TEENick, which originally debuted on Sunday evenings in 2000. The Saturday night block continues today and was not officially branded from 2009 to 2012, when the "Gotta See Saturdays" brand was adopted for the Saturday morning and primetime blocks; the TEENick branding, with its spelling altered to TeenNick, has since been used on the Nickelodeon sister channel previously known as The N. After a three-year absence following suspension of the publication in 1990, Nickelodeon resumed "Nickelodeon Magazine" under a pay/subscription model in June 1993. In March 1993, the channel enlisted the help of viewers to come up with new shapes in which to display its iconic orange logo in the network's promotions. The designs chosen – a cap, a balloon, a gear, a rocket and a top, among other shapes – were mainly 3D renderings, and debuted alongside a new promotional graphics package in June 1993. The success of the Saturday primetime block led Nickelodeon to expand its programming into primetime on other nights in 1996, with the extension of its broadcast day to 8:30 p.m. Eastern and Pacific Time (and later extended to 9:00 p.m. from 1998 to 2009) on Sunday through Friday nights.

In November 1998, Viacom International Media Networks Europe; then MTV Networks Europe announced the creation of Nickelodeon in Africa. The channel would broadcast along with MTV Europe. A programming block launched on July 1, 1999, here Nickelodeon shows aired on MNET's children's block K-TV. In 2005, K-TV decided to cease broadcasting Nickelodeon produced programming. In 2008, VIMN Africa decided to launch a 24-hour channel across Africa.
MTV Networks Africa also operates additional channels these include a localized version of Nickelodeon and promotes the European versions of MTV Live HD, VH1, MTV, MTV Portugal and MTV France.

In the mid-1990s, Nickelodeon decided to move production of some live-action series to the West Coast from Nickelodeon Studios in Orlando, Florida at Universal Studios. After scouting soundstages for a year, the network's headlining mover All That spent a year at Paramount Pictures before Nickelodeon obtained a lease for the 6238 Sunset Blvd facility, acquiring the soundstage and rebranding it Nickelodeon on Sunset by 1997. Due to limited studio space and the need to control plot spoilage for several programs, only a few series were taped at Nickelodeon on Sunset at a time. As a result, other live-action series produced for the network were filmed in other stage facilities with closed set policies throughout the Hollywood area.
Some of the shows filmed there for Nickelodeon include the ten-season run of "All That", "The Amanda Show", "Drake & Josh", and more recently "iCarly" and "Victorious".

On September 28, 2009, the network was relaunched as Nick Jr., named after the former preschool program block of the same name that aired on Nickelodeon from January 1988 to February 2009. The network debuted Nickmom, a four-hour nightly program block aimed at mothers in September 2012, which was controversial at its start due to its more lenient content standards (including some profanity, crude humor and suggestive references) than what is otherwise permitted on Nick Jr., particularly as the network operates a singular Eastern Time Zone feed, which results in the Nickmom block airing at the same time in all six U.S. time zones (being broadcast as early as 5:00 p.m. in the Hawaii–Aleutian Time Zone). While traditional advertising appears on the channel during the Nickmom block, the network otherwise only runs programming promotions and underwriter-style sponsorships in lieu of regular commercials.

Nicktoons was launched on May 1, 2002, as Nicktoons TV, part of the digital cable-exclusive MTV Digital Suite, in order to entice cable operators to pick up the network and give them a marketing advantage over satellite services. However, by early 2004, Nickelodeon management changed course and offered it to digital satellite services DirecTV and Dish Network. The network was originally marketed as commercial-free, with comedic promos involving Nickelodeon Animation Studios, two-minute cartoon shorts from foreign markets, and former program promotions which had previously been used on Nickelodeon taking up commercial time. By June 6, 2005, as the network's distribution increased, the network began to carry regular advertising.

TeenNick is a pay television network that is aimed at adolescents and young adults, which originated as a nighttime block called "The N" on Noggin (in a similar scheduling structure as Nickelodeon and Nick at Nite) on April 1, 2002, and was spun off into a standalone channel on December 31, 2007, when it took over the satellite transponder of Nickelodeon Games and Sports. On September 28, 2009, the network was rebranded as TeenNick, named after the former TEENick block that aired on Nickelodeon from July 2000 to February 2009. Although TeenNick has more relaxed program standards than the other Nickelodeon channels (save for Nick at Nite and the Nickmom block on Nick Jr.) – allowing for moderate profanity, suggestive dialogue and some violent content – the network has shifted its lineup almost exclusively towards current and former Nickelodeon series (including some that are burned off due to low ratings on the flagship channel) that have stricter content standards. It also airs some acquired sitcoms and drama series (such as "", which has aired on the network since 2003 as The N) and until the rebrand, also incorporated some original programming. On July 25, 2011, TeenNick began airing "The '90s Are All That", renamed "The Splat" in October 2015, a block of Nickelodeon's most popular 1990s programming, targeting the network's target demographic from that era.

Nickelodeon Creative Labs was founded in 1994 by Amy Friedman. The company produced motion graphics and short-form material for the Nickelodeon network, including the award-winning "Short Films by Short People" interstitial series. In 1996, Nickelodeon Creative Labs began producing the Nick Jr. series "Blue's Clues" in-house using Adobe After Effects, Photoshop, and Power Macintosh computers. In October 1999, Nickelodeon Creative Labs relaunched as Nick Digital; it was now also producing "Little Bill", another Nick Jr. series. In December 2008, MTV Networks planned to shut down Nick Digital by the end of the year. The company ultimately stayed open, but a Nick Digital branch at Nickelodeon Animation Studio took over producing visual effects for Nickelodeon's animated series. In 2009, Nickelodeon launched Nickelodeon Creative Advertising, a creative agency which produces advertising for kids and families.
question_src: Je! Mtandao wa Nickelodeon ulianza lini?
pos_context_src: Nickelodeon ilizinduliwa Aprili 1, 1979 (kama mtandao wa kwanza wa watoto) kwenye Franchise za Warner Cable kote nchini. Jina la Nickelodeon lilipendekezwa na Mkurugenzi wa ubunifu wa New York/mbuni Joseph Iozzi, ambaye pia aliunda nembo ya kwanza ya kituo na kampeni ya matangazo ya asili. Iozzi aliona neno "Nickelodeon" kama kifafa asili kwa kituo cha watoto kilichopendekezwa: "Nickelodeon ilikuwa zamu ya kifaa cha karne ya kusambaza burudani. Sauti ya neno ilikuwa nzuri na ikavingirishwa kwa urahisi". Hauser hatimaye alichagua pendekezo la Iozzi kutoka kwenye orodha kati ya majina 150. Majina mengine yaliyopendekezwa kwa kituo hicho ni pamoja na kituo cha Savoy na Mtandao wa Upinde wa mvua.
neg_context_title_src: Mitandao ya vyombo vya habari vya Viacom
neg_context_src: Mnamo Oktoba 2009, Viacom alileta "Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles" katika familia ya Nickelodeon wakati ilinunua Franchise kutoka Mirage Studios, na safu mpya ya CGI-Animated na Filamu ya Action ya moja kwa moja iliyotolewa tangu wakati huo. Mnamo Mei 12, 2010, mtandao ulifikia makubaliano na Haim Saban kupata haki ya kutangaza vipindi vipya vya "Power Ranger" (baada ya Saban kurejesha haki kwa dhamana kutoka kwa Kampuni ya Walt Disney mapema mwezi huo). Mtandao ulianza kupeana safu ya kuanza na kwanza ya Februari 7, 2011 ya msimu wake wa 18, "Power Ranger Samurai"; Kama sehemu ya mpango huo, Nickelodeon pia alipata haki za vipindi vyote 700 vya safu iliyotengenezwa kabla ya wakati huo kwa matangazo kwenye Nicktoons ya Dada, ambayo ilianza kupeana safu baadaye mwaka huo. Mnamo Januari 1, 2011, Nickelodeon alijadiliwa "Nyumba ya Anubis", safu ya msingi wa safu ya Nickelodeon Uholanzi "Het Huis Anubis", ambayo ikawa safu ya kwanza ya maandishi ya kutangazwa katika strip ya wiki (sawa na muundo wa opera ya sabuni). Iliyotengenezwa nchini Uingereza, pia ilikuwa safu ya kwanza ya kwanza na Kituo cha U.S. cha kuzalishwa nje ya Amerika ya Kaskazini.

Mnamo Agosti 11, 1991, Nickelodeon alijadili mfululizo wake wa kwanza wa michoro - "Doug", "Rugrats", na "The Ren & Stimpy Show" - chini ya bendera ya Nicktoons. Ukuzaji wa programu hizi ulikuwa mabadiliko ya wasiwasi wa zamani wa mtandao, kwani Nickelodeon hapo awali alikuwa amekataa kutoa safu ya michoro ya kila wiki kutokana na gharama kubwa za uzalishaji. Mfululizo huo tatu ulipata mafanikio ifikapo mwaka wa 1993, na kusababisha uundaji wa Nicktoon wa nne wa mtandao, "Maisha ya kisasa ya Rocko", ambayo pia ilifanikiwa. Baadaye, Nickelodeon alishirikiana na Sony Wonder (kwa sasa ya Sony Picha Burudani ya Nyumbani) kutolewa sehemu za programu za mtandao kwenye VHS, ambayo ikawa wauzaji wa juu, hadi 1996, baada ya hapo Nickelodeon alibadilisha usambazaji wake kwa Burudani ya Nyumbani, na Paramount kutolewa tena kwa sehemu ya utaftaji wa mtandao wa VHS. "Doug" na "The Ren & Stimpy Show" ingemaliza uzalishaji karibu wakati huo; Walakini, "Doug" ingefufuliwa mnamo 1996 kama sehemu ya safu ya asubuhi ya Jumamosi ya ABC. "Rugrats", kwa upande mwingine, ilirudi kutoka hiatus mnamo Mei 9, 1997 (reruns iliendelea kuibuka hadi wakati huo). Mnamo Agosti 15, 1992, mtandao uliongeza ratiba yake ya Jumamosi kwa masaa mawili, na uzinduzi wa kizuizi cha kwanza kinachoitwa Snick kutoka 8:00 hadi 10:00 p.m. Wakati wa Mashariki na Pasifiki; Kwa miaka mingi, Snick alikua nyumbani kwa maonyesho kama "Je! Unaogopa giza?", "Clarissa anafafanua yote", "yote hayo", "The Amanda Show", na "Kenan & Kel". Mnamo 2004, block hiyo ilibadilishwa kama toleo la Jumamosi la Teen, ambalo hapo awali lilijadiliwa Jumapili jioni mnamo 2000. Block ya Jumamosi usiku inaendelea leo na haikuwekwa alama rasmi kutoka 2009 hadi 2012, wakati chapa ya "Gotta See Jumamosi" ilipitishwa kwa Jumamosi asubuhi na vitalu vya mapema; Chapa ya vijana, na spelling yake ilibadilishwa kuwa Teennick, tangu sasa imekuwa ikitumika kwenye kituo cha dada cha Nickelodeon kilichojulikana kama N. baada ya kukosekana kwa miaka tatu kufuatia kusimamishwa kwa chapisho hilo katika 1990, Nickelodeon alianza tena "Jarida la Nickelodeon" chini ya mfano wa malipo/usajili mnamo Juni 1993. Mnamo Machi 1993, kituo hicho kiliamua msaada wa watazamaji kuja na maumbo mapya ambayo kuonyesha nembo yake ya machungwa katika matangazo ya mtandao. Miundo iliyochaguliwa - kofia, puto, gia, roketi na ya juu, kati ya maumbo mengine - yalikuwa tafsiri za 3D, na kujadiliwa kando na kifurushi kipya cha picha za uendelezaji mnamo Juni 1993. Mafanikio ya kipindi cha mapema cha Jumamosi lilisababisha Nickelodeon kupanua programu yake kuwa wakati wa mapema usiku mwingine mnamo 1996, na upanuzi wake wa 8:30. Wakati wa Mashariki na Pacific (na baadaye iliongezeka hadi 9:00 p.m. kutoka 1998 hadi 2009) Jumapili hadi Ijumaa usiku.

Mnamo Novemba 1998, Viacom International Media Networks Ulaya; Halafu Mitandao ya MTV Ulaya ilitangaza kuundwa kwa Nickelodeon barani Afrika. Kituo kingetangaza pamoja na MTV Ulaya. Kizuizi cha programu kilizinduliwa mnamo Julai 1, 1999, hapa Nickelodeon inaonyesha kurushwa kwenye block ya watoto ya Mnet K-TV. Mnamo 2005, K-TV iliamua kukomesha utangazaji Nickelodeon ilizalisha programu. Mnamo 2008, Vimn Africa iliamua kuzindua kituo cha masaa 24 kote Afrika.
Mitandao ya MTV Afrika pia inafanya kazi kwa njia za ziada hizi ni pamoja na toleo la ndani la Nickelodeon na inakuza matoleo ya Ulaya ya MTV Live HD, VH1, MTV, MTV Portugal na MTV Ufaransa.

Katikati ya miaka ya 1990, Nickelodeon aliamua kusonga uzalishaji wa safu ya moja kwa moja kwenda Pwani ya Magharibi kutoka Nickelodeon Studios huko Orlando, Florida huko Universal Studios. Baada ya kukagua sauti za mwaka, mtandao ulioangazia wakuu wa mtandao wote ambao ulitumia mwaka katika picha za Paramount kabla ya Nickelodeon kupata kukodisha kwa kituo cha 6238 Sunset Blvd, kupata sauti na kuiweka tena kwenye Nickelodeon kwenye Sunset ifikapo 1997. Kwa sababu ya nafasi ndogo ya studio na hitaji la kudhibiti nickelode kwa programu kadhaa tu. Kama matokeo, safu zingine za hatua za moja kwa moja zilizotengenezwa kwa mtandao zilitengenezwa katika vituo vingine vya hatua na sera zilizowekwa zilizowekwa katika eneo lote la Hollywood.
Baadhi ya maonyesho yaliyowekwa hapo kwa Nickelodeon ni pamoja na msimu wa kumi wa "All All", "The Amanda Show", "Drake & Josh", na hivi karibuni "Icarly" na "Ushindi".

Mnamo Septemba 28, 2009, mtandao huo ulianzishwa tena kama Nick Jr., aliyepewa jina la mpango wa zamani wa shule ya mapema ya jina moja ambalo lilirushwa Nickelodeon kutoka Januari 1988 hadi Februari 2009. Mtandao ulijadili Nickmom, mpango wa masaa manne ulilenga mama wengine mnamo Septemba 2012, ambao ulikuwa na ugomvi kwa sababu ya kunufaika zaidi (kwa sababu ya viwango vya juu vya viwango vya juu (kwa sababu ya viwango vya juu vya viwango vya juu, ni pamoja na muda wa kupungua kwa muda wa kusudi lake la kusudi la kusudi la kusudi la kusudi la kusudi la kusudi la kusudi la kusudi la kusudi la kusudi la kusudi la kusudi la kusudi la kusudi la muda mrefu. Kuruhusiwa kwa Nick Jr., haswa kama mtandao unavyofanya kazi ya kulisha kwa wakati wa Mashariki, ambayo husababisha Nickmom block airing wakati huo huo katika maeneo yote sita ya wakati wa Merika (kutangazwa mapema kama 5:00 p.m. katika eneo la wakati wa Hawaii -Aleutian). Wakati matangazo ya jadi yanaonekana kwenye kituo wakati wa Nickmom block, mtandao vinginevyo huendesha matangazo ya programu na udhamini wa mtindo wa chini badala ya matangazo ya kawaida.

Nicktoons ilizinduliwa mnamo Mei 1, 2002, kama Nicktoons TV, sehemu ya dijiti ya dijiti ya dijiti ya dijiti ya dijiti, ili kushawishi waendeshaji wa cable kuchukua mtandao na kuwapa faida ya uuzaji juu ya huduma za satelaiti. Walakini, mwanzoni mwa 2004, Usimamizi wa Nickelodeon ulibadilisha kozi na kuipeleka kwa Huduma za Satellite DirectV na Mtandao wa Dish. Mtandao huo uliuzwa hapo awali kuwa hauna biashara, na matangazo ya comedic yanayohusisha studio za michoro za Nickelodeon, kaptula za katuni za dakika mbili kutoka masoko ya nje, na matangazo ya zamani ya programu ambayo hapo awali yalikuwa yakitumika kwenye Nickelodeon kuchukua wakati wa kibiashara. Kufikia Juni 6, 2005, wakati usambazaji wa mtandao ulivyoongezeka, mtandao ulianza kubeba matangazo ya kawaida.

TeenNick ni mtandao wa televisheni ya kulipwa ambayo inakusudiwa vijana na watu wazima, ambayo ilitoka kama kizuizi cha usiku kinachoitwa "N" On Noggin (katika muundo kama huo wa ratiba kama Nickelodeon na Nick huko Nite) Aprili 1, 2002, na iliondolewa kwenye kituo cha kusimama mnamo Desemba 31, 2007, wakati ilichukua Michezo ya Satellitededer. On September 28, 2009, the network was rebranded as TeenNick, named after the former TEENick block that aired on Nickelodeon from July 2000 to February 2009. Although TeenNick has more relaxed program standards than the other Nickelodeon channels (save for Nick at Nite and the Nickmom block on Nick Jr.) – allowing for moderate profanity, suggestive dialogue and some violent content – ​​the network has shifted its Lineup karibu tu kuelekea safu ya sasa na ya zamani ya Nickelodeon (pamoja na zingine ambazo zimechomwa kwa sababu ya viwango vya chini kwenye kituo cha bendera) ambazo zina viwango vya maudhui vikali. Pia inaangazia safu zingine zilizopatikana za sitcom na mchezo wa kuigiza (kama "", ambayo imerushwa kwenye mtandao tangu 2003 kama N) na hadi Rebrand, pia iliingiza programu ya asili. Mnamo Julai 25, 2011, Teennick alianza kupeperusha "miaka ya 90 ni yote", iliyopewa jina la "The Splat" mnamo Oktoba 2015, kizuizi cha programu maarufu zaidi ya Nickelodeon ya 1990, ikilenga idadi ya watu inayolengwa kutoka enzi hiyo.

Maabara ya ubunifu ya Nickelodeon ilianzishwa mnamo 1994 na Amy Friedman. Kampuni hiyo ilitoa picha za mwendo na nyenzo za fomu fupi kwa Mtandao wa Nickelodeon, pamoja na tuzo ya "Filamu fupi za Tuzo na Watu Short". Mnamo mwaka wa 1996, Maabara ya Ubunifu ya Nickelodeon ilianza kutengeneza safu ya Nick Jr. "Blue's Clues" ndani ya nyumba kwa kutumia Adobe Baada ya Athari, Photoshop, na Kompyuta za Power Macintosh. Mnamo Oktoba 1999, maabara ya ubunifu ya Nickelodeon ilizinduliwa tena kama Nick Digital; Ilikuwa pia inazalisha "Bill Little", safu nyingine ya Nick Jr. Mnamo Desemba 2008, Mitandao ya MTV ilipanga kufunga Nick Digital mwishoni mwa mwaka. Kampuni hiyo hatimaye ilibaki wazi, lakini tawi la Nick Digital katika Studio ya Uhuishaji ya Nickelodeon ilichukua athari za kuona kwa safu ya michoro ya Nickelodeon. Mnamo mwaka wa 2009, Nickelodeon alizindua Matangazo ya ubunifu ya Nickelodeon, wakala wa ubunifu ambao hutoa matangazo kwa watoto na familia.
report_src: Mtandao wa Nickelodeon ulianza rasmi kurushwa hewani tarehe 1 Aprili 1979, ukiwa umetambulishwa kama mtandao wa kwanza kabisa wa watoto nchini Marekani kupitia Franchise za Warner Cable [1].
