question_en: When was the Montana Vigilantes formed?
pos_context_en: The history of vigilante justice and the Montana Vigilantes began in 1863 in what was at the time a remote part of eastern Idaho Territory. Vigilante activities continued, although somewhat sporadically, through the Montana Territorial period until the territory became the state of Montana on November 8, 1889. Vigilantism arose because territorial law enforcement and the courts had very little power in the remote mining camps during the territorial period.
neg_context_en:
The first written account of the vigilantes was Thomas Dimsdale's "Vigilantes of Montana" which first appeared as a series of articles in 1865 editions of the "Montana Post", Virginia City's and Montana's first newspaper. Dimsdale was a member of the Alder Gulch Vigilance Committee and editor of the "Montana Post." His early accounts of the Alder Gulch vigilante events are widely cited and the book version of his articles, the first book published in Montana Territory in 1866, has been extensively reprinted since its first edition.
X. Biedler, one of the Alder Gulch and Helena vigilante enforcers wrote about his vigilante activities in his personal journals. They weren't available until well after his death when Helen F. Sanders, the daughter-in-law of Wilbur Sanders finally got them published in 1957. Nathaniel Langford, also a member of the vigilantes, explorer of the upper Yellowstone (1870), first superintendent of Yellowstone National Park (1872–1877), territorial tax collector (1864–1869) and author published "Vigilante Days and Ways-Pioneers of the Rockies" in 1893 after he returned to his home in Minnesota. In a 1912 speech to the Montana Historical Society, western historian, Olin Wheeler provided positive commentary on the Alder Gulch vigilantes in a tribute to the life of Nathaniel Langford.
Another account, not published until 1982, is that of former Montana Supreme Court Justice (1922–1935) Lew L. Callaway. Edited by his son Lew Callaway Jr., "Montana's Righteous Hangmen:The Vigilantes in Action" stems from Callaway's association with vigilante Captain James William in the late 1800s. Lew Callaway wrote extensively about the vigilantes and his stories which add more intimate details about how the vigilantes operated are captured in this volume. Although some vigilante activities during this period were criticized by citizens and civic leaders, there was a general affirmation of their purpose and contribution to law and order in a growing territory. Mark C. Dillon's "Montana Vigilantes 1863–1870 Gold, Guns and Gallows" (2013) concludes that given the lawless environment and criminal activity in Alder Gulch and Helena at the time, the lack of any functioning justice system and the understanding of due process at the time, the vigilantes acted in a way they thought was best for their communities. He contends that judging the vigilantes by today's understanding and standards of due process is problematic.
In 2004, Frederick Allen, a journalist and historian, published "A Decent and Orderly Lynching:The Montana Vigilantes" reviewed as an up-to-day balanced account of Montana's vigilante history (1864–1870). Allen's book reinforces the motivations and methods of the earliest vigilantes in Alder Gulch while commenting on the growing disdain for vigilantism in the late 1860s. More generalist works on Montana history such as Merrill G. Burlingame's "The Montana Frontier" (1942) and Michael P. Malone's "Montana-A History of Two Centuries" (1991) adequately summarize the vigilante period largely based on earlier accounts by Dimsdale, Langford and Biedler. Additionally, many topical histories of Montana, such as novelist and Montana historian Dan Cushman's "Montana: The Gold Frontier" (1973) cover the vigilante period.

As the gold fields of Alder Gulch and Grasshopper Creek declined in 1865, prospectors and fortune seekers migrated to newly discovered areas in and around Last Chance Gulch (now Helena, Montana). As lawlessness increased, vigilante justice continued there with the formation of the Committee of Safety in 1865. During the period 1865–1870, at least 14 alleged criminals were executed by Helena's vigilantes. In 1884, ranchers in Central and Eastern Montana resorted to vigilante justice to deal with cattle rustlers and horse thieves. The best-known vigilante group in that area were "Stuart's Stranglers", organized by Granville Stuart in the Musselshell region. As formal law enforcement became more prevalent in the region, vigilantism fell into decline.

Vigilantism in pre-territorial and territorial Montana has been written about, romanticized and chronicled in personal memoirs, biographies, documentary and scholarly works, film and fiction for well over a century. The first book published in Montana was Thomas J. Dimsdale's 1866 first edition of "The Vigilantes of Montana", which was compiled from a series of newspaper articles he wrote for the "Montana Post" in 1865. Historical analysis of the period ranges from disrepute to heroism, with debates over whether the lack of any functioning justice system and the understanding of due process at the time meant the vigilantes acted in a way they thought was best for their communities or if modern standards of due process should govern analysis of their actions.

On December 19–21, 1863, a public trial was held for George Ives, the suspected murderer of a young Dutch immigrant Nicholas Tiebolt. Hundreds of miners from around the area attended the 3-day, outdoor trial. George Ives was prosecuted by Wilbur F. Sanders and Ives was convicted and hanged on December 21, 1863. Sanders played a prominent role in Montana history and eventually became the first U.S. Senator from Montana when the territory gained statehood in 1889. While the Ives trial resulted in an execution many residents were frustrated by a cumbersome process that could easily be manipulated. This sentiment is illustrated by a quote from Thomas Dimsdale who wrote the first published account of the Montana Vigilantes, originally written in 1865 as a series of articles for the "Montana Post" and later compiled into a book.

The numerical symbol 3-7-77 has long been associated with Montana vigilantes. Its meaning is unclear though many theories have been put forward trying to explain what it symbolized, none conclusive, including references to the dimensions of a grave, the amount of time a miscreant had to leave town, assorted Masonic symbolism, details of membership structure, and a simple copying of the symbol from organizations in Colorado and California. Although it has been associated with vigilantes in Alder Gulch, this is not supported by historical evidence. The first documented evidence of use of the symbol in a vigilante scenario occurred in November 1879 in Helena when it was mentioned in a newspaper article. A 1914 dissertation noted that it was simply used as part of a meeting notice. It was incorporated into the uniform patch of the Montana Highway Patrol (MHP) in 1956. MHP administrator Alex Stephenson designed the insignia and explained, "we chose the symbol to keep alive the memory of this first people's police force."

Although the vigilance committee started as a small secret institution in Virginia City, knowledge of it soon spread in the territory and membership grew. As a secret organization, exact accounts of membership vary, but many members became prominent in the history of the territory and state. Among those who were members include Wilbur Sanders (1st U.S. Senator from Montana (1890)), Sidney Edgerton (first Governor of Montana Territory (1864)), Nelson Story (famous for his 1866 cattle drive from Texas to Bozeman and prominent Bozeman merchant), John Bozeman (founder of Bozeman, Montana (1864) and the Bozeman Trail), Nathaniel P. Langford (first Yellowstone National Park superintendent (1872–1877)), James Stuart (brother of Granville Stuart, who would form the Stuarts' Stranglers in 1884), Tom Cover (one of the Alder Gulch prospectors who discovered the first gold there and alleged murderer of John Bozeman (1867)) and Thomas Dimsdale (editor of Montana's first newspaper, the "Montana Post" and author of "The Vigilantes of Montana" (1866)).

The first stockmen's association in Montana was formed in Virginia City in 1873. The association was established to discuss branding standards, how to deal with rustling and how to influence the territorial legislature to pass laws favorable to the cattle industry. This association did not survive, but led to the creation of other organizations in subsequent years. In 1878, the Montana Stock Association of Lewis and Clark County was organized. One of its prominent members, Ross Deegan, editorialized about the need for extralegal action if the territorial legislature did not enact laws to protect the cattle industry:
In July, 1879, a Territorial Stock Association was formed that ultimately spawned a number of small county or district based associations throughout Montana. By 1883, the value of cattle in Montana was estimated at greater than $25 million and annual losses from rustling exceeded three percent. By the summer of 1884, cattle men resorted to vigilatism to deal with rustlers and the first recorded hanging occurred at Fort Maginnis on July 3, 1884, when Reese Anderson, a DHS ranch foreman, and several other ranch hands hanged Sam McKenzie for horse thievery.

On July 14, 1864, four prospectors—John S. Cowan, John Crab, Bob Staley and Daniel Jackson—found gold in a small creek they named "Last Chance Gulch". As word of the strike spread throughout the area, prospectors and fortune seekers, including many from Alder Gulch and Bannack, migrated to Last Chance Gulch and the town of Helena, Montana was founded. By the middle of 1865, many prominent vigilantes of Alder Gulch, including Wilbur Sanders, John X. Biedler, and Anton Holter, had moved to Helena. When the territory was formed, three judicial districts were established. The First District belonged to Judge Hosmer and included the towns of Bannack, Virginia City, Nevada City and Deer Lodge. The Third District encompassed the towns around Helena. From July 1864, until August 1865, the only justice system was the miners' court; the Third District did not get its first chief judge until August 1865, when Judge Lyman Munson arrived from the east.

Due to the secret nature of the organization it is difficult to be sure when an execution was carried out by the vigilance committee or another group of motivated citizens. In the months following the Ives trial many suspected road agents were hanged. Notably, Henry Plummer, the sheriff of Bannack, who was suspected by many of being the ringleader of the road agents. The Montana Vigilantes hanged men using the testimony of other men who faced their imminent executions as the sole evidence. Of the few accounts of the early actions of the Alder Gulch Vigilantes, Beidler and Dimsdale are the most complete, although they give little information about the secret trials conducted by the vigilantes. Estimates vary, but noted vigilante historian Frederick Allen believes that between the years 1863 and 1865 somewhere from 15 to 35 people were killed due to the actions of the Alder Gulch vigilantes.
question_src: Montana iliundwa lini?
pos_context_src: Historia ya Haki ya Vigilante na Montana Vigilantes ilianza mnamo 1863 katika ile wakati huo ilikuwa sehemu ya mbali ya eneo la Idaho Mashariki. Shughuli za Vigilante ziliendelea, ingawa kwa kiasi fulani, kupitia kipindi cha eneo la Montana hadi eneo hilo likawa jimbo la Montana mnamo Novemba 8, 1889. Vigilantism iliibuka kwa sababu utekelezaji wa sheria za eneo na mahakama zilikuwa na nguvu kidogo katika kambi za madini za mbali wakati wa kipindi cha eneo.
neg_context_src: Akaunti ya kwanza iliyoandikwa ya The Vigilantes ilikuwa "Vigilantes ya Montana" ambayo ilionekana kama safu ya makala katika matoleo ya 1865 ya "Montana Post", gazeti la kwanza la Virginia City na Montana. Dimsdale alikuwa mwanachama wa Kamati ya Uangalizi ya Alder Gulch na mhariri wa "Montana Post." Akaunti zake za mapema za hafla za Alder Gulch Vigilante zimetajwa sana na toleo la kitabu cha nakala zake, kitabu cha kwanza kilichochapishwa katika eneo la Montana mnamo 1866, kimechapishwa sana tangu toleo lake la kwanza. X. Biedler, mmoja wa Alder Gulch na Helena Vigilante Enforcers aliandika juu ya shughuli zake za macho katika majarida yake ya kibinafsi. Hawakupatikana hadi baada ya kifo chake wakati Helen F. Sanders, binti-mkwe wa Wilbur Sanders hatimaye alipochapishwa mnamo 1957. Nathaniel Langford, pia mwanachama wa Vigilantes, Explorer wa Upper Yellowstone (1870), Msimamizi wa kwanza wa Hifadhi ya Kitaifa ya Yellowstone (1872-1877). "Siku za Vigilante na Njia za Waanzilishi wa Rockies" mnamo 1893 baada ya kurudi nyumbani kwake Minnesota. Katika hotuba ya 1912 kwa Jumuiya ya Kihistoria ya Montana, mwanahistoria wa Magharibi, Olin Wheeler alitoa maoni mazuri juu ya Alder Gulch Vigilantes katika ushuru wa maisha ya Nathaniel Langford. Akaunti nyingine, ambayo haijachapishwa hadi 1982, ni ile ya Jaji wa zamani wa Mahakama Kuu ya Montana (1922-1935) Lew L. Callaway. Ilihaririwa na mtoto wake Lew Callaway Jr., "Haki ya Haki ya Montana: Vigilantes in Action" inatokana na ushirika wa Callaway na Nahodha wa Vigilante James William mwishoni mwa miaka ya 1800. Lew Callaway aliandika sana juu ya Vigilantes na hadithi zake ambazo zinaongeza maelezo ya karibu zaidi juu ya jinsi vigilantes inavyofanya kazi hutekwa kwa kiasi hiki. Ingawa shughuli zingine za macho katika kipindi hiki zilikosolewa na raia na viongozi wa raia, kulikuwa na uthibitisho wa jumla wa kusudi lao na mchango kwa sheria na utaratibu katika eneo linalokua. Alama C. "Montana Vigilantes 1863-1870 dhahabu, bunduki na gallows" (2013) anahitimisha kwamba ilitoa mazingira yasiyokuwa na sheria na shughuli za uhalifu huko Alder Gulch na Helena wakati huo, ukosefu wa mfumo wowote wa haki na uelewa wa mchakato unaofaa wakati huo, Vigilantes walitenda kwa njia walidhani bora kwa mawasiliano yao. Anasema kwamba kuhukumu macho kwa uelewa wa leo na viwango vya mchakato unaofaa ni shida. Mnamo 2004, Frederick Allen, mwandishi wa habari na mwanahistoria, alichapisha "heshima na mpangilio mzuri: Montana Vigilantes" ilipitiwa kama akaunti ya siku ya usawa ya historia ya Montana ya Vigilante (1864-1870). Kitabu cha Allen kinasisitiza motisha na njia za waangalifu wa mapema huko Alder Gulch wakati wa kutoa maoni juu ya udhalilishaji unaokua wa umakini wa miaka ya 1860. Jenerali zaidi anafanya kazi kwenye historia ya Montana kama vile Merrill G. Burlingame's "Montana Frontier" (1942) na Michael P. Malone's "Historia ya Montana-A ya karne mbili" (1991) inafupisha kwa muhtasari kipindi cha Vigilante kwa msingi wa akaunti za Dimsdale, Langford na Biedler. Kwa kuongezea, historia nyingi za juu za Montana, kama vile mwandishi wa riwaya na mwanahistoria wa Montana Dan Cushman's "Montana: The Gold Frontier" (1973) hushughulikia kipindi cha Vigilante.

Kama uwanja wa dhahabu wa Alder Gulch na Grasshopper Creek ulipungua mnamo 1865, watazamaji na watafutaji wa bahati walihamia maeneo yaliyogunduliwa hivi karibuni ndani na karibu na Chance Gulch (sasa Helena, Montana). Wakati uvunjaji wa sheria ulipoongezeka, haki ya macho iliendelea huko na malezi ya Kamati ya Usalama mnamo 1865. Katika kipindi cha 1865-1870, angalau wahalifu 14 waliodaiwa waliuawa na Vigilantes wa Helena. Mnamo 1884, wafanyabiashara wa kati na mashariki mwa Montana waliamua kuwa macho ili kukabiliana na wahuni wa ng'ombe na wezi wa farasi. Kikundi kinachojulikana zaidi katika eneo hilo walikuwa "Stuart's Stranglers", iliyoandaliwa na Granville Stuart katika mkoa wa Musselshell. Wakati utekelezaji rasmi wa sheria ulipoenea zaidi katika mkoa huo, umakini ulianguka.

Vigilantism katika Montana ya kabla na ya eneo imeandikwa juu, ya kimapenzi na kuongozwa katika kumbukumbu za kibinafsi, wasifu, maandishi na kazi za wasomi, filamu na uwongo kwa zaidi ya karne. Kitabu cha kwanza kilichochapishwa huko Montana kilikuwa toleo la kwanza la "Thomas J. Dimsdale la 1866 la" The Vigilantes of Montana ", ambalo liliundwa kutoka kwa safu ya nakala za magazeti aliyoandika kwa" Montana Post "mnamo 1865. Njia walidhani ni bora kwa jamii zao au ikiwa viwango vya kisasa vya mchakato unaofaa vinapaswa kudhibiti uchambuzi wa matendo yao.

Mnamo Desemba 19-21, 1863, kesi ya umma ilifanyika kwa George Ives, muuaji anayeshukiwa wa mhamiaji mchanga wa Uholanzi Nicholas Tiebolt. Mamia ya wachimbaji kutoka eneo hilo walihudhuria kesi ya siku 3, ya nje. George Ives alishtakiwa na Wilbur F. Sanders na Ives walihukumiwa na kunyongwa mnamo Desemba 21, 1863. Sanders alichukua jukumu maarufu katika historia ya Montana na mwishowe akawa seneta wa kwanza wa Merika kutoka Montana wakati eneo hilo lilipoanza kuwa na michakato ya 1889. Maoni haya yanaonyeshwa na nukuu kutoka kwa Thomas Dimsdale ambaye aliandika akaunti ya kwanza iliyochapishwa ya Montana Vigilantes, iliyoandikwa hapo awali mnamo 1865 kama safu ya makala ya "Montana Post" na baadaye ikakusanywa katika kitabu.

Alama ya nambari 3-7-77 kwa muda mrefu imekuwa ikihusishwa na Montana Vigilantes. Maana yake haijulikani wazi ingawa nadharia nyingi zimewekwa mbele kujaribu kuelezea ni nini kiliashiria, hakuna mtu kamili, pamoja na marejeleo ya vipimo vya kaburi, muda ambao utapeli ulilazimika kuondoka mji, kuashiria ishara za Masonic, maelezo ya muundo wa wanachama, na kunakili rahisi kutoka kwa mashirika huko Colorado na California. Ingawa imehusishwa na macho katika Alder Gulch, hii haihimiliwi na ushahidi wa kihistoria. Ushuhuda wa kwanza wa kumbukumbu ya matumizi ya alama hiyo katika hali ya macho ilitokea Novemba 1879 huko Helena wakati ilitajwa katika nakala ya gazeti. Dissertation ya 1914 ilibaini kuwa ilitumika tu kama sehemu ya ilani ya mkutano. Iliingizwa kwenye kiraka cha sare ya Montana Highway Patrol (MHP) mnamo 1956. Msimamizi wa MHP Alex Stephenson alibuni Insignia na akaelezea, "Tulichagua ishara ya kuweka kumbukumbu ya jeshi la watu wa kwanza."

Ingawa Kamati ya Uangalifu ilianza kama taasisi ndogo ya siri katika Jiji la Virginia, ufahamu wake ulienea hivi karibuni katika eneo na ushirika ulikua. Kama shirika la siri, akaunti halisi za uanachama zinatofautiana, lakini wanachama wengi wakawa maarufu katika historia ya eneo na serikali. Kati ya wale ambao walikuwa washiriki ni pamoja na Wilbur Sanders (Seneta wa 1 wa Merika kutoka Montana (1890)), Sidney Edgerton (Gavana wa Kwanza wa Montana Wilaya (1864)), Nelson Hadithi (maarufu kwa gari lake la 1866 kutoka Texas hadi Bozeman na mwandishi maarufu wa Bozeman), John Bozeman (mwanzilishi wa Bozeman), Mon6. Langford (Msimamizi wa Hifadhi ya Kitaifa ya Kwanza ya Yellowstone (1872-1877)), James Stuart (kaka wa Granville Stuart, ambaye angeunda Stuarts 'Stranglers mnamo 1884), Tom Cover (mmoja wa watazamaji wa Alder Gulch ambaye aligundua dhahabu ya kwanza hapo na madai ya muuaji wa John Bozeman (1867) na ThomDas DIMSMERES, DIMSTESE, DIMSMEDERES, DIMSTESER, DIMSTESED) na DIMSMEDEMEMEMER (1867) and a na 1867. "Montana Post" na mwandishi wa "The Vigilantes of Montana" (1866)).

Chama cha kwanza cha hisa huko Montana kiliundwa katika Jiji la Virginia mnamo 1873. Chama hicho kilianzishwa kujadili viwango vya chapa, jinsi ya kukabiliana na kutu na jinsi ya kushawishi wabunge wa eneo hilo kupitisha sheria zinazofaa kwa tasnia ya ng'ombe. Chama hiki hakikuishi, lakini kilisababisha kuundwa kwa mashirika mengine katika miaka iliyofuata. Mnamo 1878, Chama cha Hisa cha Montana cha Lewis na Kaunti ya Clark kiliandaliwa. Mmoja wa washiriki wake mashuhuri, Ross Deegan, alihariri juu ya hitaji la hatua za ziada ikiwa Bunge la eneo halikutunga sheria kulinda tasnia ya ng'ombe:
Mnamo Julai, 1879, chama cha hisa cha ardhi kiliundwa ambacho kilisababisha idadi ya vyama vidogo vya kaunti au wilaya kote Montana. Kufikia 1883, thamani ya ng'ombe huko Montana ilikadiriwa kuwa zaidi ya dola milioni 25 na hasara za kila mwaka kutoka kwa kutuliza ilizidi asilimia tatu. Kufikia msimu wa joto wa 1884, wanaume wa ng'ombe waliamua kuwa macho ili kukabiliana na wahuni na kunyongwa kwa kwanza kulitokea huko Fort Maginnis mnamo Julai 3, 1884, wakati Reese Anderson, mtawala wa shamba la DHS, na mikono mingine kadhaa ya shamba ilimnyonga Sam McKenzie kwa wezi wa farasi.

Mnamo Julai 14, 1864, watazamaji wanne - John S. Cowan, John Crab, Bob Staley na Daniel Jackson - walipata dhahabu kwenye kijito kidogo walichokiita "Chance Chance Gulch". Kama neno la mgomo lilivyoenea katika eneo lote, watazamaji na wanaotafuta bahati, pamoja na wengi kutoka Alder Gulch na Bannack, walihamia Chance Gulch na mji wa Helena, Montana ulianzishwa. Kufikia katikati ya 1865, macho mengi maarufu ya Alder Gulch, pamoja na Wilbur Sanders, John X. Biedler, na Anton Holter, walikuwa wamehamia Helena. Wakati eneo lilipoundwa, wilaya tatu za mahakama zilianzishwa. Wilaya ya kwanza ilikuwa ya Jaji Hosmer na ni pamoja na miji ya Bannack, Virginia City, Nevada City na Deer Lodge. Wilaya ya tatu ilijumuisha miji karibu na Helena. Kuanzia Julai 1864, hadi Agosti 1865, mfumo wa haki pekee ulikuwa Korti ya Wachimbaji; Wilaya ya tatu haikupata jaji wake mkuu wa kwanza hadi Agosti 1865, wakati jaji Lyman Munson alipofika kutoka mashariki.

Kwa sababu ya hali ya siri ya shirika ni ngumu kuwa na uhakika wakati utekelezaji ulifanywa na Kamati ya Vigilance au kikundi kingine cha raia waliohamasishwa. Katika miezi iliyofuata kesi ya Ives mawakala wengi wa barabara walioshukiwa walitundikwa. Kwa kweli, Henry Plummer, sheriff wa Bannack, ambaye alishukiwa na wengi wa kuwa mtoaji wa mawakala wa barabara. Montana Vigilantes walipachika wanaume kwa kutumia ushuhuda wa wanaume wengine ambao walikabiliwa na mauaji yao karibu kama ushahidi wa pekee. Kati ya akaunti chache za hatua za mapema za Alder Gulch Vigilantes, Beidler na Dimsdale ndio kamili zaidi, ingawa wanapeana habari kidogo juu ya majaribio ya siri yaliyofanywa na Vigilantes. Makadirio yanatofautiana, lakini mwanahistoria wa macho wa macho Frederick Allen anaamini kwamba kati ya miaka 1863 na 1865 mahali pengine kutoka watu 15 hadi 35 waliuawa kwa sababu ya vitendo vya macho ya Alder Gulch.
report_src: Montana ilipandishwa hadhi kutoka eneo la eneo na kuwa jimbo la Marekani tarehe 8 Novemba 1889, tukio lililoashiria mwisho wa enzi ya shughuli nyingi za vikundi vya vigilante katika kanda hiyo ya magharibi ya milima ya Rocky [1].
all_claims: Montana ilipandishwa hadhi kutoka eneo la eneo na kuwa jimbo la Marekani tarehe 8 Novemba 1889, tukio lililoashiria mwisho wa enzi ya shughuli nyingi za vikundi vya vigilante katika kanda hiyo ya magharibi ya milima ya Rocky [1].

question_en: Did Catalonia do trade with France?
pos_context_en: In the last decades of the 17th century during the reign of Spain's last Habsburg king, Charles II, despite intermittent conflict between Spain and France, the population increased to approximately 500.000 inhabitants and the Catalan economy recovered, not only in Barcelona, but also along the Catalan coast and even in some inland areas. This economic growth was boosted by the export of wine to England and the Dutch Republic, due to the trade war of French minister Jean-Baptiste Colbert against the Dutch and later for the participation of this countries in the Nine Years' War against France, as a consequence, there weren't able to trade with French wine. This new trade caused many Catalans to look to England and, especially, the Netherlands as political and economic models for Catalonia.
neg_context_title_en: National and regional identity in Spain
National and regional identity in Spain
neg_context_en: In the last decades of the 17th century during the reign of Spain's last Habsburg king, Charles II, despite intermittent conflict between Spain and France, the population increased to approximately 500.000 inhabitants and the Catalan economy recovered. This economic growth was boosted by the export of wine to England and the Dutch Republic, this countries were involved in the Nine Years' War against France, as a consequence, there weren't able to trade with French wine. This new trade caused many Catalans to look to England and, especially, the Netherlands as political and economic models for Catalonia.

During the Franco-Spanish War (1635–1659), Catalonia revolted (1640–1652) against a large and burdensome presence of the royal army in its territory, being briefly proclaimed a republic under French protection. Within a brief period France took full control of Catalonia, until it was largely reconquered by the Spanish army. Under the terms of the Treaty of the Pyrenees in 1659, the Spanish Crown ceded the northern parts of Catalonia, mostly the County of Roussillon, to France. During the War of the Spanish Succession (1701–1714), the Crown of Aragon sided against the Bourbon Philip V of Spain; following Catalan defeat on 11 September 1714, Philip V, inspired by the model of France imposed a unifying administration across Spain, enacting the Nueva Planta decrees, suppressing the main Catalan institutions and rights like in the other realms of the Crown of Aragon. This led to the eclipse of Catalan as a language of government and literature, replaced by Spanish. Along the 18th century, Catalonia experienced economic growth, reinforced in the late quarter of the century when the Castile's trade monopoly with American colonies ended.

After the union of Castilian and Aragonese Crowns (1479), Catalonia continued as a distinct political entity under the Castilian crown, retaining its political liberties. Nevertheless, there were conflicts with the centre over trade and financial policy, and the Reapers' War of 1640–59 showed the "typical tendencies of Catalan separatism", when Catalonia sought the protection of France, then at war with Spain.

On July 9, 1713, the Principality of Catalonia declared the war to the Kingdom of France and the Duke of Anjou (Philip V of Spain), who since the Catalan constitutions of 1706 did not recognize him as the legitimate king of the Monarchy of Spain and the next day it published a ban to remove troops for the Army of Catalonia, being his first units the Regiment of the Deputation of the General of Catalonia and the Regiment of the City of Barcelona. For the position of general commander of the Army they appointed Lieutenant Marshal Antoni de Villarroel i Peláez on July 10. The artillery and the Cavalry Regiment of the Faith were financed by the merchant Amador Dalmau and Colom, as well as two ships for the Navy.

The Spanish Constitution of 1978 contains a clause forbidding the formation of federations amongst autonomous communities. Therefore, if it were the case that the "Països Catalans" idea gained a majority democratic support in future elections, a constitutional amendment would still be needed for those parts of the "Països Catalans" lying in Spain to create a common legal representative body, even though in the addenda to the Constitution there is a clause allowing an exception to this rule in the case of Navarre, which can join the Basque Country should the people choose to do so.
Catalans in the French territory of Northern Catalonia, although proud of their language and culture, are not committed to independence. Jordi Vera, a CDC councillor in Perpignan, has said that his party favoured closer trade and transport relationships with Catalonia, and that he believed Catalan independence would improve the prospects of that happening, but that secession from France was "not on the agenda". When Catalans took to the streets in 2016 under the banner of "" ("Yes to the Catalan Country") to protest the French government's decision to combine , the region which contained Northern Catalonia, with to create a new region to be called , the French magazine said that the movement was "completely unrelated to the situation on the other side of the border", and that it was "more directed against Toulouse [the chief city of ] than against Paris or for Barcelona." , which stood in the French legislative election, 2017, said that's its aim is a "territorial collectivity" within the French Republic on the same lines as Corsica.

Northern Catalonia ( , also known as "Catalunya Nord" ), French Catalonia or Roussillon refers to the Catalan-speaking and Catalan-culture territory ceded to France by Spain through the signing of the Treaty of the Pyrenees in 1659 in exchange of France's effective renunciation on the formal protection given to the recent founded Catalan Republic. The area corresponds exactly to the modern French "département" of the Pyrénées-Orientales which were historically part of Catalonia since the old County of Barcelona, and lasted during the times of the Crown of Aragon and the Principality of Catalonia until they were given to France by Spain.

Despite the difficult internal situation, including the military occupation, the high new taxes and the mercantilist policy of the House of Bourbon, Catalonia recovered significantly in the course of the 18th century, achieving a successful process of proto-industrialization. The population and the economy both grew, agricultural production increased, and trade increased, complemented during the last quarter of the century with the opening of trade with America; transformations all of which (as in France) tended to undermine the Old Regime and lay the ground for the rise of industrialization, the first signs of which appeared in the 18th-century manufacture of cotton goods and other textiles. By the end of the 18th century, the popular classes began to experience the first effects of proletarianization.

Catalonia, in the north-east of Spain bordering France and the Mediterranean, contains large areas of productive agriculture. Historically it has been a land of small proprietors with relatively secure tenure. Its position has oriented its trade towards the Mediterranean through the great port-city of Barcelona, rather than the transatlantic trade that grew during the Spanish Golden Age.

With the victory of the army of the Marquis of Los Vélez in Tarragona on December 23, it continued its advance towards Barcelona, while the French army of d'Espenan proceeded to leave Catalonia to France at the beginning of January 1641. Negotiations with the French intensified, on January 3 a delegation of three Catalans met with Cardinal Richelieu who assured them protection if they were a republic like Genoa. In this sense on January 14 du Plessis-Besançon went at the residence of the president of the Deputation of the General of Catalonia or Generalitat, Pau Claris, to still conferring. From this negotiation, on January 16, Pau Claris presented a proposal before the States-General by which the King of France agreed to put the Principality under his protection if Catalonia changed its government to a republic. On 17 January 1641, the States-General of Catalonia proclaimed the Catalan Republic under French protection for the first time. A week later, following the defeat of the Catalan army in the , near Barcelona, du Plessis-Besançon managed to convince the Catalan authorities that the help they needed could only be obtained from France if they recognized Louis XIII of France as sovereign. Pau Claris appealed on 23 January to Louis XIII, recognizing him as Count of Barcelona (as Louis I) and placed the Principality of Catalonia under French sovereignty.
question_src: Je! Catalonia ilifanya biashara na Ufaransa?
pos_context_src: Katika miongo kadhaa iliyopita ya karne ya 17 wakati wa utawala wa mfalme wa mwisho wa Habsburg, Charles II, licha ya mzozo wa muda kati ya Uhispania na Ufaransa, idadi ya watu iliongezeka hadi wakaazi wa takriban 500.000 na uchumi wa Kikatalani ulipona, sio tu huko Barcelona, ​​lakini pia kando ya pwani ya Kikatalani na hata katika maeneo mengine ya mashambani. Ukuaji huu wa uchumi uliongezwa na usafirishaji wa divai kwenda England na Jamhuri ya Uholanzi, kwa sababu ya vita vya biashara ya Waziri wa Ufaransa Jean-Baptiste Colbert dhidi ya Uholanzi na baadaye kwa ushiriki wa nchi hizi katika vita vya miaka tisa dhidi ya Ufaransa, kwa sababu hiyo, hakuweza kufanya biashara na divai ya Ufaransa. Biashara hii mpya ilisababisha Wakatoliki wengi kuangalia England na, haswa, Uholanzi kama mifano ya kisiasa na kiuchumi kwa Catalonia.
neg_context_title_src: Kitambulisho cha kitaifa na kikanda nchini Uhispania
Kitambulisho cha kitaifa na kikanda nchini Uhispania
neg_context_src: Katika miongo kadhaa iliyopita ya karne ya 17 wakati wa utawala wa mfalme wa mwisho wa Habsburg, Charles II, licha ya mzozo wa muda kati ya Uhispania na Ufaransa, idadi ya watu iliongezeka hadi wenyeji takriban 500.000 na uchumi wa Kikatalani ulipona. Ukuaji huu wa uchumi uliongezeka na usafirishaji wa divai kwenda England na Jamhuri ya Uholanzi, nchi hizi zilihusika katika vita vya miaka tisa dhidi ya Ufaransa, kwa sababu hiyo, hakuweza kufanya biashara na divai ya Ufaransa. Biashara hii mpya ilisababisha Wakatoliki wengi kuangalia England na, haswa, Uholanzi kama mifano ya kisiasa na kiuchumi kwa Catalonia.

Wakati wa Vita vya Franco-Spanish (1635-1659), Catalonia iliasi (1640-1652) dhidi ya uwepo mkubwa na mkubwa wa Jeshi la Royal katika eneo lake, likitangazwa kwa kifupi Jamhuri chini ya ulinzi wa Ufaransa. Katika kipindi kifupi Ufaransa ilichukua udhibiti kamili wa Catalonia, hadi ilipowekwa tena na jeshi la Uhispania. Chini ya masharti ya Mkataba wa Pyrenees mnamo 1659, taji ya Uhispania ilitoa sehemu za kaskazini za Catalonia, zaidi ya kaunti ya Roussillon, kwenda Ufaransa. Wakati wa vita vya mfululizo wa Uhispania (1701-1714), taji ya Aragon iliunga mkono dhidi ya Bourbon Philip V ya Uhispania; Kufuatia kushindwa kwa Kikatalani mnamo tarehe 11 Septemba 1714, Philip V, alichochewa na mfano wa Ufaransa aliweka utawala wa kuunganisha kote Uhispania, na kutunga amri za Nueva Planta, akikandamiza taasisi kuu na haki za Kikatalani kama katika eneo lingine la Taji ya Aragon. Hii ilisababisha kupatwa kwa Kikatalani kama lugha ya serikali na fasihi, kubadilishwa na Uhispania. Pamoja na karne ya 18, Catalonia ilipata ukuaji wa uchumi, iliyoimarishwa katika robo ya karne wakati biashara ya Castile na makoloni ya Amerika ilimalizika.

Baada ya umoja wa taji za Castilia na Aragonese (1479), Catalonia iliendelea kama chombo tofauti cha kisiasa chini ya taji ya Castilia, ikihifadhi uhuru wake wa kisiasa. Walakini, kulikuwa na migogoro na Kituo juu ya sera ya Biashara na Fedha, na Vita vya Wavunaji wa 1640-59 vilionyesha "tabia za kawaida za kujitenga kwa Kikatalani", wakati Catalonia ilitafuta ulinzi wa Ufaransa, kisha vitani na Uhispania.

Mnamo Julai 9, 1713, ukuu wa Catalonia ulitangaza vita hiyo kwa ufalme wa Ufaransa na Duke wa Anjou (Philip V wa Uhispania), ambaye tangu Katiba ya Kikatalani ya 1706 haikumtambua kama mfalme halali wa kifalme wa Uhispania na siku iliyofuata ilichapisha marufuku ya kuondoa vikosi vya jeshi la kwanza, kwa kuwa Jeshi la kwanza la Jeshi la Catalon, kwa kuwa Jeshi la Jeshi la Catalon, kwa kuwa Jeshi la Jeshi la Jeshi la Catalon, la kwanza la Jeshi la Jeshi la Catalon, Je! Catalonia na Kikosi cha Jiji la Barcelona. Kwa nafasi ya Kamanda Mkuu wa Jeshi walimteua Luteni Marshal Antoni de Villarroel I Peláez mnamo Julai 10. Artillery na Kikosi cha Cavalry cha Imani kilifadhiliwa na mfanyabiashara Amador Dalmau na Colom, na pia meli mbili kwa Jeshi la Wanamaji.

Katiba ya Uhispania ya 1978 ina kifungu kinachokataza malezi ya mashirika kati ya jamii zinazojitegemea. Therefore, if it were the case that the "Països Catalans" idea gained a majority democratic support in future elections, a constitutional amendment would still be needed for those parts of the "Països Catalans" lying in Spain to create a common legal representative body, even though in the addenda to the Constitution there is a clause allowing an exception to this rule in the case of Navarre, which can join the Basque Country should the people choose to do so.
Wakatoliki katika eneo la Ufaransa la Kaskazini mwa Catalonia, ingawa wanajivunia lugha na utamaduni wao, hawajajitolea kwa uhuru. Jordi Vera, diwani wa CDC huko Perpignan, alisema kuwa chama chake kilipendelea biashara ya karibu na uhusiano wa kusafirisha na Catalonia, na kwamba aliamini uhuru wa Kikatalani utaboresha matarajio ya kutokea, lakini kwamba kukiri kutoka Ufaransa "sio kwenye ajenda". Wakati Catalans walipeleka barabarani mnamo 2016 chini ya bendera ya "" ("Ndio kwa nchi ya Kikatalani") kuandamana uamuzi wa serikali ya Ufaransa ya kuchanganya, mkoa ambao ulikuwa na Catalonia ya Kaskazini, na kuunda mkoa mpya kuitwa, gazeti la Ufaransa lilisema kwamba harakati hiyo ilikuwa "isiyohusiana kabisa na hali ya upande mwingine wa wakuu", na kwamba "ilielekeza" kwa sababu ya ", na kwamba", na kwamba ",", na kwamba, ",", ",", ",", kuendelea ", na kwamba,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,, katima kuendelea kuendelea kwenda kudumu,. , ambayo ilisimama katika uchaguzi wa sheria wa Ufaransa, 2017, ilisema hiyo ndio lengo lake ni "umoja wa nchi" ndani ya Jamhuri ya Ufaransa kwenye mistari ile ile kama Corsica.

Catalonia ya Kaskazini (, pia inajulikana kama "Catalunya Nord"), Catalonia ya Ufaransa au Roussillon inahusu eneo la Kikatalani na la Kikatalani lililopeanwa kwenda Ufaransa na Uhispania kupitia kusainiwa kwa Mkataba wa Walinzi waliopewa hivi karibuni. Sehemu hiyo inalingana kabisa na "maonyesho" ya kisasa ya Ufaransa ya Pyrénées-orientales ambayo yalikuwa sehemu ya kihistoria ya Catalonia tangu kaunti ya zamani ya Barcelona, ​​na ilidumu wakati wa taji ya Aragon na ukuu wa Catalonia hadi walipopewa Ufaransa na Uhispania.

Licha ya hali ngumu ya ndani, pamoja na kazi ya kijeshi, ushuru mpya na sera ya Mercantilist ya Baraza la Bourbon, Catalonia ilipona sana wakati wa karne ya 18, ikifanikiwa mchakato wa mafanikio wa viwanda. Idadi ya watu na uchumi wote ulikua, uzalishaji wa kilimo uliongezeka, na biashara iliongezeka, ikamilishwa katika robo ya mwisho ya karne na ufunguzi wa biashara na Amerika; Mabadiliko yote ambayo (kama ilivyo nchini Ufaransa) yalipunguza kudhoofisha serikali ya zamani na kuweka msingi wa kuongezeka kwa ukuaji wa uchumi, ishara za kwanza ambazo zilionekana katika utengenezaji wa bidhaa za pamba na nguo zingine. Mwisho wa karne ya 18, madarasa maarufu yalianza kupata athari za kwanza za utaalam.

Catalonia, kaskazini mashariki mwa Uhispania inayopakana na Ufaransa na Bahari ya Mediterranean, ina maeneo makubwa ya kilimo chenye tija. Kwa kihistoria imekuwa ardhi ya wamiliki wadogo na umiliki salama. Msimamo wake umeelekeza biashara yake kuelekea Bahari ya Mediterranean kupitia mji mkubwa wa Barcelona, ​​badala ya biashara ya transatlantic ambayo ilikua wakati wa umri wa dhahabu wa Uhispania.

Pamoja na ushindi wa Jeshi la Marquis la Los Vélez huko Tarragona mnamo Desemba 23, iliendelea mapema kuelekea Barcelona, ​​wakati jeshi la Ufaransa la D'Espenan liliendelea kuondoka Catalonia kwenda Ufaransa mwanzoni mwa Januari 1641. Mazungumzo na Wafaransa walitetea, Januari 3 ujumbe wa Wakatala watatu walikutana na watu wa Kardie. Kwa maana hii Januari 14 du Plessis-besançon alienda katika makazi ya rais wa kupelekwa kwa mkuu wa Catalonia au Generalitat, Pau Claris, bado akitoa. Kutoka kwa mazungumzo haya, mnamo Januari 16, Pau Claris aliwasilisha pendekezo mbele ya Mkuu wa Amerika ambayo Mfalme wa Ufaransa alikubali kuweka kanuni chini ya ulinzi wake ikiwa Catalonia itabadilisha serikali yake kuwa jamhuri. Mnamo tarehe 17 Januari 1641, Mkuu wa Amerika wa Catalonia alitangaza Jamhuri ya Kikatalani chini ya ulinzi wa Ufaransa kwa mara ya kwanza. Wiki moja baadaye, kufuatia kushindwa kwa jeshi la Kikatalani, karibu na Barcelona, ​​du Plessis-Besançon alifanikiwa kushawishi viongozi wa Kikatalani kwamba msaada wanaohitaji unaweza kupatikana tu kutoka Ufaransa ikiwa wangemtambua Louis XIII ya Ufaransa kama Mfalme. Pau Claris alitoa rufaa mnamo Januari 23 kwa Louis XIII, akimtambua kama Hesabu ya Barcelona (kama Louis I) na akaweka kanuni za Catalonia chini ya uhuru wa Ufaransa.
report_src: Hapana; katika kipindi kilichoelezwa (nusu ya pili ya karne ya 17) biashara kuu ya Catalonia haikuelekezwa Ufaransa, bali ilihamia England na Jamhuri ya Uholanzi, kwani vita vya kibiashara vilivyoanzishwa na waziri wa Ufaransa Jean-Baptiste Colbert dhidi ya Uholanzi na kisha Vita vya Miaka Tisa vilifanya mataifa hayo mawili kushindwa kununua divai ya Kifaransa, hivyo yakageukia divai ya Kikatalani [1].

question_en: Is Windows XP abandonware?
pos_context_en: On April 14, 2009, Windows XP exited mainstream support and entered the extended support phase; Microsoft continued to provide security updates every month for Windows XP, however, free technical support, warranty claims, and design changes were no longer being offered. Extended support ended on April 8, 2014, over 12 years since the release of XP; normally Microsoft products have a support life cycle of only 10 years. Beyond the final security updates released on April 8, no more security patches or support information are provided for XP free-of-charge; "critical patches" will still be created, and made available only to customers subscribing to a paid "Custom Support" plan. As it is a Windows component, all versions of Internet Explorer for Windows XP also became unsupported.
neg_context_en:
Despite the approaching end of support, there were still notable holdouts that had not migrated past XP; many users elected to remain on XP because of the poor reception of Windows Vista, sales of newer PCs with newer versions of Windows declined due to the Great Recession and the effects of Vista, and deployments of new versions of Windows in enterprise environments require a large amount of planning, which includes testing applications for compatibility (especially those that are dependent on Internet Explorer 6, which is not compatible with newer versions of Windows). Major security software vendors (including Microsoft itself) planned to continue offering support and definitions for Windows XP past the end of support to varying extents, along with the developers of Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, and Opera web browsers; despite these measures, critics similarly argued that users should eventually migrate from XP to a supported platform. The United States' Computer Emergency Readiness Team released an alert in March 2014 advising users of the impending end of support, and informing them that using XP after April 8 may prevent them from meeting US government information security requirements.
Microsoft continued to provide Security Essentials virus definitions and updates for its Malicious Software Removal Tool (MSRT) for XP until July 14, 2015. As the end of extended support approached, Microsoft began to increasingly urge XP customers to migrate to newer versions such as Windows 7 or 8 in the interest of security, suggesting that attackers could reverse engineer security patches for newer versions of Windows and use them to target equivalent vulnerabilities in XP. Windows XP is remotely exploitable by numerous security holes that were discovered after Microsoft stopped supporting it.

Support for Windows XP without a service pack ended on September 30, 2005. Windows XP Service Packs 1 and 1a were retired on October 10, 2006, and Service Pack 2 reached end of support on July 13, 2010, almost six years after its general availability. The company stopped general licensing of Windows XP to OEMs and terminated retail sales of the operating system on June 30, 2008, 17 months after the release of Windows Vista. However, an exception was announced on April 3, 2008, for OEMs producing what it defined as "ultra low-cost personal computers", particularly netbooks, until one year after the availability of Windows 7 on October 22, 2010. Analysts felt that the move was primarily intended to compete against Linux-based netbooks, although Microsoft's Kevin Hutz stated that the decision was due to apparent market demand for low-end computers with Windows.

Windows XP Embedded, commonly abbreviated "XPe", is a componentized version of the Professional edition of Windows XP. An original equipment manufacturer is free to choose only the components needed thereby reducing operating system footprint and also reducing attack area as compared with XP Professional. Unlike Windows CE, Microsoft's operating system for portable devices and consumer electronics, XP Embedded provides the full Windows API, and support for the full range of applications and device drivers written for Microsoft Windows. The system requirements state that XPe can run on devices with at least 32 MB Compact Flash, 32 MB RAM and a P-200 microprocessor. XPe was released on November 28, 2001. As of October 2008, the newest release is Windows XP Embedded Service Pack 3.

Despite the end of support for Windows XP, Microsoft has released two emergency security updates for the operating system to patch major security vulnerabilities:On release, Windows XP received critical acclaim. CNET described the operating system as being "worth the hype", considering the new interface to be "spiffier" and more intuitive than previous versions, but feeling that it may "annoy" experienced users with its "hand-holding". XP's expanded multimedia support and CD burning functionality were also noted, along with its streamlined networking tools. The performance improvements of XP in comparison to 2000 and ME were also praised, along with its increased number of built-in device drivers in comparison to 2000. The software compatibility tools were also praised, although it was noted that some programs, particularly older MS-DOS software, may not work correctly on XP due to its differing architecture. They panned Windows XP's new licensing model and product activation system, considering it to be a "slightly annoying roadblock", but acknowledged Microsoft's intent for the changes. "PC Magazine" provided similar praise, although noting that a number of its online features were designed to promote Microsoft-owned services, and that aside from quicker boot times, XP's overall performance showed little difference over Windows 2000.

Windows XP has been criticized for its vulnerabilities due to buffer overflows and its susceptibility to malware such as viruses, trojan horses, and worms. Nicholas Petreley for "The Register" notes that "Windows XP was the first version of Windows to reflect a serious effort to isolate users from the system, so that users each have their own private files and limited system privileges." However, users by default receive an administrator account that provides unrestricted access to the underpinnings of the system. If the administrator's account is compromised, there is no limit to the control that can be asserted over the PC. Windows XP Home Edition also lacks the ability to administer security policies and denies access to the Local Users and Groups utility.

Windows XP includes technology from Roxio which allows users to directly burn files to a compact disc through Windows Explorer. Previously, end users had to install CD burning software. In Windows XP, CD and DVD-RAM (FAT32 only for DVD-RAM) burning has been directly integrated into the Windows interface. Data discs are created using the Joliet and ISO 9660 file systems and audio CDs using the Redbook standard. To prevent buffer underrun errors, Windows XP premasters a complete image of files to be burnt and then streams it to the disc burner. Users can burn files to a CD in the same way they write files to a floppy disk or to the hard drive via standard copy-paste or drag and drop methods. The burning functionality is also exposed as an API called the Image Mastering API. Windows XP's CD burning support does not do disk-to-disk copying or disk images, although the API can be used programmatically to do these tasks. Creation of audio CDs is integrated into Windows Media Player. Audio CDs are burnt using track-at-once mode. CD-RW discs can be quick erased.

Windows XP can also encrypt files on a remote server with NTFS if the server is trusted for delegation in Active Directory and the user's certificate and private key are loaded in the local profile on the server. If a roaming user profile is used, it will be copied locally. On a WebDAV server mapped by a drive letter, Windows XP can encrypt the file locally and transport it as a raw encrypted file to the WebDAV server using the HTTP PUT command. Similarly, EFS encrypted files can be downloaded raw from the WebDAV and decrypted locally. The command line utilities "cipher", "copy" and "xcopy" have been updated in Windows XP. EFS can also be completely disabled in Windows XP through Group Policy (for a domain) or through the registry (for a non-domain computer).

Based on Windows XP with SP3, this version offers more features over Windows Embedded for Point of Service such as Full Localization and XPS support if .NET Framework 3.5 or higher is installed. Windows Embedded POSReady 2009 was released on December 9, 2008. Prior to XP's end of support, some Windows XP users have reported that the Regedit tool on their operating system can be used to 'trick' Windows Update into accepting updates targeting POSReady 2009. POSReady 2009 is also notable as being the last XP derived operating system to receive official support from Microsoft.

In Windows XP, there are some improvements made to System Restore compared to Windows Me. System Restore uses a copy-on-write "file system filter driver" for taking snapshots. In Windows XP, System Restore is configurable per volume and the data stores are also stored per volume. On NTFS volumes, the Restore Points are stored using NTFS compression and protected using ACLs. A Disk Cleanup handler allows deleting all but the most recent Restore Point. Besides the Registry hives and system files, COM+ and WMI databases and the IIS metabase can also be restored. System Restore supports Group Policy. System Restore in Windows XP also works without issues with EFS-encrypted files.
question_src: Je! Windows XP ni Abandonware?
pos_context_src: Mnamo Aprili 14, 2009, Windows XP ilitoka msaada wa kawaida na ikaingia katika sehemu ya msaada iliyoongezwa; Microsoft iliendelea kutoa sasisho za usalama kila mwezi kwa Windows XP, hata hivyo, msaada wa kiufundi wa bure, madai ya dhamana, na mabadiliko ya muundo hayakutolewa tena. Msaada ulioongezwa ulimalizika Aprili 8, 2014, zaidi ya miaka 12 tangu kutolewa kwa XP; Kawaida bidhaa za Microsoft zina mzunguko wa maisha wa miaka 10 tu. Zaidi ya sasisho za mwisho za usalama zilizotolewa Aprili 8, hakuna viraka zaidi vya usalama au habari ya msaada hutolewa kwa malipo ya bure ya XP; "Patches muhimu" bado itaundwa, na itapatikana tu kwa wateja wanaojiunga na mpango wa kulipwa wa "msaada wa kawaida". Kama ni sehemu ya Windows, matoleo yote ya Internet Explorer ya Windows XP pia hayakusaidiwa.
neg_context_src:
Licha ya mwisho wa msaada, bado kulikuwa na milki mashuhuri ambayo haikuhamia XP ya zamani; Watumiaji wengi waliochaguliwa kubaki kwenye XP kwa sababu ya mapokezi duni ya Windows Vista, mauzo ya PC mpya zilizo na matoleo mapya ya Windows yalipungua kwa sababu ya kushuka kwa uchumi na athari za Vista, na kupelekwa kwa matoleo mapya ya Windows katika mazingira ya biashara yanahitaji kiwango kikubwa cha mipango, ambayo ni pamoja na matumizi ya majaribio ya utangamano (haswa wale ambao ni wategemezi wa Interner 6, ambayo inajumuisha matumizi ya utangamano (haswa ambayo ni tegemezi ya Interner 6, ambayo ni pamoja na upimaji wa matumizi ya utangamano (haswa wale ambao ni tegemezi kwa Intervrer 6, ambayo ni pamoja na majaribio ya utangamano (haswa wale ambao ni tegemezi ya Intervrer 6, ambayo inaambatana na mpya. Wauzaji wakuu wa programu ya usalama (pamoja na Microsoft yenyewe) walipanga kuendelea kutoa msaada na ufafanuzi wa Windows XP iliyopita mwisho wa msaada kwa viboreshaji tofauti, pamoja na watengenezaji wa Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, na vivinjari vya Wavuti vya Opera; Licha ya hatua hizi, wakosoaji vivyo hivyo walisema kwamba watumiaji wanapaswa kuhamia kutoka XP kwenda kwenye jukwaa linaloungwa mkono. Timu ya utayari wa dharura ya kompyuta ya Merika ilitoa tahadhari mnamo Machi 2014 kuwashauri watumiaji juu ya mwisho wa msaada, na kuwajulisha kuwa kutumia XP baada ya Aprili 8 kunaweza kuwazuia kukidhi mahitaji ya usalama wa habari ya serikali ya Amerika.
Microsoft iliendelea kutoa ufafanuzi wa usalama wa virusi na sasisho za zana yake mbaya ya kuondoa programu (MSRT) kwa XP hadi Julai 14, 2015. Wakati mwisho wa msaada uliopanuliwa ulikaribia, Microsoft ilianza kuwahimiza wateja wa XP kuhamia kwenye matoleo mapya kama vile Windows 7 au 8 kwa nia ya usalama, ikionyesha kuwa washambuliaji wahusika wa wahandisi wa wahandisi wa wahandisi. Windows XP inatumiwa kwa mbali na mashimo mengi ya usalama ambayo yaligunduliwa baada ya Microsoft kuacha kuunga mkono.

Msaada kwa Windows XP bila pakiti ya huduma ilimalizika mnamo Septemba 30, 2005. Windows XP Huduma za Huduma 1 na 1A zilistaafu mnamo Oktoba 10, 2006, na Pack ya Huduma 2 ilifikia mwisho wa msaada mnamo Julai 13, 2010, karibu miaka sita baada ya kupatikana kwake kwa jumla. Kampuni hiyo ilisimamisha leseni ya jumla ya Windows XP kwa OEMS na kukomeshwa mauzo ya rejareja ya mfumo wa uendeshaji mnamo Juni 30, 2008, miezi 17 baada ya kutolewa kwa Windows Vista. Walakini, ubaguzi ulitangazwa Aprili 3, 2008, kwa OEMs kutengeneza kile kilichofafanuliwa kama "kompyuta za kibinafsi za bei ya chini", haswa vitabu, hadi mwaka mmoja baada ya kupatikana kwa Windows 7 mnamo Oktoba 22, 2010. Wachambuzi waliona kwamba hatua hiyo ilikusudiwa kushindana na windows zilizowekwa kwa sababu hiyo ilisema kwamba kwa sababu ya madeni ilisema kwamba ni kwa sababu ya madai ya windows kwa sababu ya madai ya windows kwa sababu ya madai kwamba madai ya windows ilidaiwa kwamba madai ya madai ya windows ilidaiwa kwamba madai ya kudai kwamba kwa sababu ya madai ya windows kudai kwamba madai ya windows kudai kwamba madai ya windows kudai kwamba madai ya windows ilidai kwamba marekebisho.

Windows XP iliyoingia, iliyofupishwa "XPE", ni toleo la toleo la toleo la kitaalam la Windows XP. Mtengenezaji wa vifaa vya asili ni bure kuchagua tu vifaa vinavyohitajika kwa hivyo kupunguza mfumo wa mfumo wa uendeshaji na pia kupunguza eneo la shambulio ikilinganishwa na XP Professional. Tofauti na Windows CE, mfumo wa uendeshaji wa Microsoft kwa vifaa vya kubebea na vifaa vya umeme, XP iliyoingia hutoa API kamili ya Windows, na msaada kwa anuwai kamili ya matumizi na madereva ya kifaa kilichoandikwa kwa Microsoft Windows. Mahitaji ya mfumo yanasema kuwa XPE inaweza kukimbia kwenye vifaa na angalau 32 MB compact flash, 32 MB RAM na microprocessor ya P-200. XPE ilitolewa Novemba 28, 2001. Mnamo Oktoba 2008, kutolewa mpya ni Windows XP iliyoingia ya Huduma ya 3.

Licha ya kumalizika kwa msaada kwa Windows XP, Microsoft imetoa sasisho mbili za usalama wa dharura kwa mfumo wa uendeshaji ili kupata udhaifu mkubwa wa usalama: juu ya kutolewa, Windows XP ilipokea madai muhimu. CNET ilielezea mfumo wa uendeshaji kuwa "unastahili hype", ukizingatia interface mpya kuwa "spiffier" na angavu zaidi kuliko matoleo ya zamani, lakini kuhisi kuwa inaweza "kukasirisha" watumiaji wenye uzoefu na "kushikilia mikono". Msaada wa multimedia uliopanuliwa wa XP na utendaji wa kuchoma wa CD pia ulibainika, pamoja na zana zake za mitandao zilizoratibiwa. Maboresho ya utendaji wa XP kwa kulinganisha na 2000 na mimi pia yalisifiwa, pamoja na idadi yake ya madereva iliyojengwa kwa kulinganisha na 2000. Zana za utangamano wa programu pia zilisifiwa, ingawa ilibainika kuwa programu zingine, haswa programu ya zamani ya MS-DOS, haiwezi kufanya kazi kwa usahihi kwenye XP kwa sababu ya usanifu wake tofauti. Waligonga mfano mpya wa leseni ya Windows XP na mfumo wa uanzishaji wa bidhaa, wakizingatia kuwa "kizuizi kidogo cha barabara", lakini walikubali kusudi la Microsoft kwa mabadiliko hayo. "Jarida la PC" lilitoa sifa kama hiyo, ingawa ikigundua kuwa idadi ya huduma zake za mkondoni zilibuniwa kukuza huduma zinazomilikiwa na Microsoft, na kwamba kando na nyakati za haraka za Boot, utendaji wa jumla wa XP ulionyesha tofauti kidogo juu ya Windows 2000.

Windows XP imekosolewa kwa udhaifu wake kwa sababu ya kufurika kwa buffer na uwezekano wake wa programu hasidi kama vile virusi, farasi wa Trojan, na minyoo. Nicholas Petreley kwa "Msajili" anabaini kuwa "Windows XP ilikuwa toleo la kwanza la Windows kuonyesha juhudi kubwa ya kuwatenga watumiaji kutoka kwa mfumo, ili watumiaji kila mmoja awe na faili zao za kibinafsi na haki za mfumo mdogo." Walakini, watumiaji kwa chaguo -msingi wanapokea akaunti ya msimamizi ambayo hutoa ufikiaji usiozuiliwa kwa mizani ya mfumo. Ikiwa akaunti ya msimamizi imeathirika, hakuna kikomo kwa udhibiti ambao unaweza kusemwa juu ya PC. Toleo la nyumbani la Windows XP pia linakosa uwezo wa kusimamia sera za usalama na inakanusha ufikiaji wa watumiaji wa ndani na matumizi ya vikundi.

Windows XP inajumuisha teknolojia kutoka Roxio ambayo inaruhusu watumiaji kuchoma faili moja kwa moja kwenye diski ya kompakt kupitia Windows Explorer. Hapo awali, watumiaji wa mwisho walilazimika kusanikisha programu ya kuchoma ya CD. Katika Windows XP, CD na DVD-RAM (FAT32 tu kwa DVD-RAM) kuchoma imeunganishwa moja kwa moja kwenye interface ya Windows. Diski za data huundwa kwa kutumia mifumo ya faili ya Joliet na ISO 9660 na CD za sauti kwa kutumia kiwango cha RedBook. Ili kuzuia makosa ya buffer, Windows XP Premia picha kamili ya faili kuchomwa na kisha kuisambaza kwa burner ya disc. Watumiaji wanaweza kuchoma faili kwa CD kwa njia ile ile wanaandika faili kwenye diski ya floppy au kwa gari ngumu kupitia njia ya kawaida ya nakala au kuvuta na njia za kuacha. Utendaji wa kuchoma pia hufunuliwa kama API inayoitwa API ya Utaalam wa Picha. Msaada wa kuchoma wa CD wa Windows XP haufanyi nakala za diski-diski au picha za diski, ingawa API inaweza kutumika kwa njia ya kufanya kazi hizi. Uundaji wa CD za sauti umejumuishwa katika Windows Media Player. CD za sauti zinateketezwa kwa kutumia hali ya kufuatilia mara moja. Diski za CD-RW zinaweza kufutwa haraka.

Windows XP pia inaweza kushinikiza faili kwenye seva ya mbali na NTFS ikiwa seva inaaminika kwa ujumbe katika Saraka ya Active na cheti cha mtumiaji na ufunguo wa kibinafsi umejaa kwenye wasifu wa ndani kwenye seva. Ikiwa wasifu wa mtumiaji unaotembea unatumika, itanakiliwa ndani. Kwenye seva ya WebDav iliyowekwa na barua ya kuendesha, Windows XP inaweza kushinikiza faili ndani na kuipeleka kama faili iliyosimbwa kwa RAW kwa seva ya WebDAV kwa kutumia amri ya HTTP PUT. Vivyo hivyo, faili zilizosimbwa za EFS zinaweza kupakuliwa RAW kutoka kwa WebDAV na kuchapishwa ndani. Huduma za mstari wa amri "cipher", "nakala" na "xcopy" zimesasishwa katika windows xp. EFS pia inaweza kulemazwa kabisa katika Windows XP kupitia sera ya kikundi (kwa kikoa) au kupitia usajili (kwa kompyuta isiyo ya kikoa).

Kulingana na Windows XP na SP3, toleo hili linatoa huduma zaidi juu ya Windows iliyoingia kwa uhakika wa huduma kama vile ujanibishaji kamili na msaada wa XPS ikiwa mfumo wa NET 3.5 au zaidi imewekwa. Windows iliyoingizwa Pos tayari 2009 ilitolewa mnamo Desemba 9, 2008. Kabla ya mwisho wa msaada wa XP, watumiaji wengine wa Windows XP wameripoti kwamba zana ya RegeDit kwenye mfumo wao wa uendeshaji inaweza kutumika 'kudanganya' Sasisho la Windows katika kukubali sasisho zinazolenga Pos tayari 2009.

Katika Windows XP, kuna maboresho kadhaa yaliyofanywa ili kurejesha mfumo ikilinganishwa na Windows Me. Kurejesha Mfumo hutumia nakala ya "Dereva wa Kichujio cha Faili" kwa kuchukua snapshots. Katika Windows XP, kurejesha mfumo kunaweza kusanidiwa kwa kila kiasi na duka za data pia huhifadhiwa kwa kiasi. Kwenye idadi ya NTFS, vidokezo vya kurejesha huhifadhiwa kwa kutumia compression ya NTFS na kulindwa kwa kutumia ACLS. Mtoaji wa kusafisha diski huruhusu kufuta yote lakini hatua ya kurejesha hivi karibuni. Mbali na mikoko ya usajili na faili za mfumo, hifadhidata za COM+ na WMI na metabase ya IIS pia zinaweza kurejeshwa. Kurejesha mfumo inasaidia sera ya kikundi. Kurejesha mfumo katika Windows XP pia hufanya kazi bila maswala na faili zilizowekwa na EFS.
report_src: Ingawa Windows XP haipokei tena sasisho za usalama za bure tangu kumalizika kwa “msaada ulioongezwa” tarehe 8 Aprili 2014, baada ya “msaada wa kawaida” kukomeshwa 14 Aprili 2009, na hivyo watumiaji wa kawaida hawapati tena viraka wala usaidizi wa kiufundi bure [1], Microsoft bado hutengeneza “patches muhimu” kwa wateja wanaolipia mpango maalum wa msaada [1]; kwa hiyo mfumo huu haujatupiliwa mbali kabisa na mmiliki wake. Neno “abandonware” humaanisha programu ambayo inatelekezwa na mwenye haki za umiliki na haipatikani tena kibiashara; lakini Windows XP bado inamilikiwa kisheria na Microsoft, hairuhusiwi kusambazwa bila leseni, na kampuni inaendelea kutoa msaada wa kulipwa kwa baadhi ya wateja wa biashara. Kwa hivyo, licha ya kukosa msaada wa bure kwa umma, Windows XP haiwezi kuhesabiwa kama abandonware kwa maana ya kisheria, bali ni programu isiyoungwa mkono kwa bure kwa watumiaji wa kawaida, huku haki zote za usambazaji na umiliki zikiendelea kudhibitiwa na Microsoft.

question_en: When was the Valencia Street Circuit built in Spain?
pos_context_en: The official track layout was unveiled by Valencia Councillor and transport counselor, Mario Flores, on 19 July 2007. The track was first used in the last weekend of July 2008, as the circuit hosted a round of the Spanish F3 Championship and International GT Open. It was first used for the European Grand Prix on 24 August 2008.
neg_context_en: The Valencia Street Circuit (, ) was a street circuit in Valencia, Spain which hosted the Formula One European Grand Prix for five years (2008–2012). The first race meeting on the circuit was held over the 23/24 August 2008 weekend, with Felipe Massa winning the main event, the European Grand Prix, after starting from pole position. The circuit uses the roads skirting the city's harbour and America's Cup port area – including a section over a swing bridge, and also includes some roads designed exclusively for racing purposes by the German architect Hermann Tilke, who also designed the infrastructure buildings for the circuit. The 2012 edition took place on 24 June and was the last to go under the name of the European Grand Prix until 2016, when the Baku City Circuit used the title for one year. It has not been used since 2013 after a deal fell through to alternate this venue with Catalunya in Barcelona to host the Spanish Grand Prix.

The 2010 Valencian GP2 round was a GP2 Series motor race held on June 26 and June 27, 2010 at the Valencia Street Circuit in Valencia, Spain. It was the fourth round of the 2010 GP2 Season and the second race of the 2010 GP3 Season. The race was used to support the 2010 European Grand Prix.

Circuit Ricardo Tormo, also known as Circuit de Valencia and officially named Circuit de la Comunitat Valenciana Ricardo Tormo, is a motorsport race track located in Cheste (Valencia, Spain) and built in 1999. It has a capacity of 120,000 and a main straight of 876 metres. It is often used as a test track by the Formula One teams, because of the mild temperatures in winter. Anthony Davidson holds the unofficial lap record, set in 2006 while testing a Honda RA106, with a time of 1 m 08.540sec.

The 2009 Valencian GP2 round was the seventh round of the 2009 GP2 Series season. It was held on August 22 and 23, 2009 at Valencia Street Circuit at Valencia, Spain. The race was used as a support race to the 2009 European Grand Prix. Last year's race was quite eventful, with championship frontrunners Giorgio Pantano and Bruno Senna retiring on the last lap, with Senna retiring just before the finish line. Past Winners include last year's Campos duo Vitaly Petrov and Lucas di Grassi, who both competed this year. This race saw a driver reshuffle with Davide Valsecchi moving to Barwa Addax Team in place of Romain Grosjean who now races in F1. Formula Three Euroseries Race Winner Stefano Coletti replaces Valsecchi at Durango. The round also saw the departure of FMS, who sold their stake back to Scuderia Coloni.

Once a year between 2008–2012 the European Formula One Grand Prix took place in the Valencia Street Circuit. Valencia is among (with Barcelona, Porto and Monte Carlo) the only European cities ever to host Formula One World Championship Grands Prix on public roads in the middle of cities. The final race in 2012 European Grand Prix saw an extremely popular winner, since home driver Fernando Alonso won for Ferrari in spite of starting halfway down the field. The Valencian Community motorcycle Grand Prix "(Gran Premi de la Comunitat Valenciana de motociclisme)" is part of the Grand Prix motorcycle racing season at the Circuit Ricardo Tormo (also known as "Circuit de Valencia") held in November. Periodically the Spanish round of the Deutsche Tourenwagen Masters touring car racing Championship (DTM) is held in Valencia.

The FIA WTCC Race of Spain was a round of the World Touring Car Championship, which was held at the Circuit Ricardo Tormo near the city of Valencia in Spain. The race ran at Valencia every year from the return of the series in 2005 season through to 2012. The event was initially kept on the 2013 calendar without a venue being confirmed, it was later dropped entirely from the schedule.

"Eurostar Valencia" was built as yard number 197 in 2003 by Cantiere Navale Visentini, Donada, Italy for the Grimaldi Group. She was launched on 18 January 2003 and was delivered on 16 June. Her port of registry is Palermo. Initially operated by Grimaldi Ferries, "Eurostar Valencia" started her maiden voyage on 5 July when she departed Salerno for Valencia, Spain. She then operated on various route in the Mediterranean Sea calling at Palermo, Salerno, Tunis, Valencia and Valletta. In January 2005, she was transferred to Civitavecchia, operating on routes to Bastia, Cagliari, Porto Vecchio and Toulon. She was renamed "Sorrento" on 13 November 2006.

Ford opened a factory at Valencia in 1976 to build its new European supermini, the Fiesta, which is still being built there 40 years and several incarnations later, although it has also been built in Britain and Germany. The Escort and Orion were also built there in the 1980s and 1990s, as was the Ka from 1996 until 2008, when production of its successor was switched to the Fiat factory in Poland. The Escort's successor, the Focus was produced at the Valencia plant from 1998 until 2011, since when all European production of the third generation Focus has been concentrated in Germany. The C-Max version of the third generation Focus, however, was built there from 2010 until 2014. The factory also hosted production of a Mazda model, the Mazda 2, from 2002 to 2007, as part of Ford's venture with the Japanese carmaker.

The 2008 European Grand Prix (formally the LII Telefónica Grand Prix of Europe) was a Formula One motor race held on 24 August 2008 at the Valencia Street Circuit, Valencia, Spain. It was the 12th race of the 2008 Formula One season. The 57-lap race was won by Felipe Massa for the Ferrari team after starting from pole position. Lewis Hamilton finished second in a McLaren car, with Robert Kubica third in a BMW Sauber.
question_src: Mzunguko wa Mtaa wa Valencia ulijengwa lini huko Uhispania?
pos_context_src: Mpangilio rasmi wa kufuatilia ulifunuliwa na diwani wa Valencia na mshauri wa usafirishaji, Mario Flores, mnamo Julai 19, 2007. Njia hiyo ilitumika kwa mara ya kwanza mwishoni mwa wiki iliyopita ya Julai 2008, wakati mzunguko huo ulishiriki raundi ya Mashindano ya Uhispania ya F3 na GT ya Kimataifa. Ilitumika kwa mara ya kwanza kwa Grand Grand Prix mnamo 24 Agosti 2008.
neg_context_src: Mzunguko wa Mtaa wa Valencia (,) ulikuwa mzunguko wa barabarani huko Valencia, Uhispania ambao ulishiriki Mfumo wa Grand Prix wa Ulaya kwa miaka mitano (2008–2012). Mkutano wa kwanza wa mbio kwenye mzunguko ulifanyika mwishoni mwa wiki 23/24 ya Agosti 2008, na Felipe Massa akishinda hafla kuu, Grand Prix ya Ulaya, baada ya kuanza kutoka msimamo wa pole. Mzunguko huo hutumia barabara zinazozunguka bandari ya jiji na eneo la Kombe la Amerika - pamoja na sehemu juu ya daraja la swing, na pia inajumuisha barabara zingine iliyoundwa tu kwa madhumuni ya mbio na mbunifu wa Ujerumani Hermann Tilke, ambaye pia alibuni majengo ya miundombinu kwa mzunguko huo. Toleo la 2012 lilifanyika mnamo Juni 24 na lilikuwa la mwisho kwenda chini ya jina la Grand Prix ya Ulaya hadi 2016, wakati Mzunguko wa Jiji la Baku ulitumia taji hilo kwa mwaka mmoja. Haijatumika tangu 2013 baada ya mpango kuanguka ili kubadilisha ukumbi huu na Catalunya huko Barcelona kuwa mwenyeji wa Grand Prix ya Uhispania.

Mzunguko wa Valencian GP2 wa 2010 ulikuwa mbio za gari za GP2 zilizofanyika Juni 26 na Juni 27, 2010 katika Mzunguko wa Mtaa wa Valencia huko Valencia, Uhispania. Ilikuwa raundi ya nne ya msimu wa GP2 wa 2010 na mbio za pili za msimu wa GP3 wa 2010. Mashindano hayo yalitumika kusaidia Grand Prix ya Ulaya ya 2010.

Mzunguko Ricardo Tormo, pia inajulikana kama mzunguko de Valencia na jina lake Circuit de la Comunitat Valenciana Ricardo Tormo, ni wimbo wa mbio za motorsport ulioko katika Checte (Valencia, Uhispania) na kujengwa mnamo 1999. Inayo uwezo wa 120,000 na moja kwa moja ya mita 876. Mara nyingi hutumiwa kama wimbo wa mtihani na timu za formula One, kwa sababu ya joto kali wakati wa baridi. Anthony Davidson anashikilia rekodi isiyo rasmi ya LAP, iliyowekwa mnamo 2006 wakati akijaribu Honda RA106, na wakati wa 1 m 08.540sec.

Duru ya Valencian GP2 ya 2009 ilikuwa raundi ya saba ya msimu wa mfululizo wa GP2 wa 2009. Ilifanyika mnamo Agosti 22 na 23, 2009 katika Mzunguko wa Mtaa wa Valencia huko Valencia, Uhispania. Mashindano hayo yalitumika kama mbio ya msaada kwa Grand Prix ya Ulaya ya 2009. Mashindano ya mwaka jana yalikuwa ya bahati nzuri, na watangulizi wa ubingwa Giorgio Pantano na Bruno Senna wakistaafu kwenye paja la mwisho, na Senna alistaafu kabla ya safu ya kumaliza. Wshindi wa zamani ni pamoja na Campos Duo Vitaly Petrov na Lucas di Grassi, ambao wote walishindana mwaka huu. Mashindano haya yaliona dereva akirudishwa tena na Davide Valsecchi akihamia timu ya Barwa Addax badala ya Romain Grosjean ambaye sasa anakimbilia F1. Mshindi wa mbio tatu za Mshindi wa mbio za Euroseries Stefano Coletti anachukua nafasi ya Valsecchi huko Durango. Duru pia iliona kuondoka kwa FMS, ambao waliuza hisa yao kurudi Scuderia Coloni.

Mara moja kwa mwaka kati ya 2008–2012 Mfumo wa Ulaya Grand Prix ulifanyika katika Mzunguko wa Mtaa wa Valencia. Valencia ni kati ya (na Barcelona, ​​Porto na Monte Carlo) miji pekee ya Uropa iliyowahi kuwa mwenyeji wa Mfumo wa Mashindano ya Dunia ya Formula One kwenye barabara za umma katikati ya miji. Mbio za mwisho mnamo 2012 Grand Prix ya Ulaya iliona mshindi maarufu sana, kwani dereva wa nyumbani Fernando Alonso alishinda kwa Ferrari licha ya kuanza katikati ya uwanja. Pikipiki ya Jumuiya ya Valencian Grand Prix "(Gran Premi de la Comunitat Valenciana de Motociclisme)" ni sehemu ya msimu wa mbio za pikipiki za Grand Prix kwenye mzunguko wa Ricardo Tormo (pia inajulikana kama "Circuit de Valencia") uliofanyika Novemba. Mara kwa mara duru ya Uhispania ya Deutsche Tourenwagen Masters Kutembelea Mashindano ya Mashindano ya Mashindano ya Gari (DTM) inafanyika Valencia.

Mashindano ya FIA WTCC ya Uhispania yalikuwa duru ya ubingwa wa gari la utalii wa ulimwengu, ambao ulifanyika katika mzunguko wa Ricardo Tormo karibu na mji wa Valencia huko Uhispania. Mashindano hayo yalikimbia huko Valencia kila mwaka kutoka kwa kurudi kwa mfululizo mnamo msimu wa 2005 hadi 2012. Hafla hiyo ilihifadhiwa kwenye kalenda ya 2013 bila ukumbi uliothibitishwa, baadaye ilishuka kabisa kutoka kwa ratiba.

"Eurostar Valencia" ilijengwa kama nambari ya yadi 197 mnamo 2003 na Cantiere Navale Visentini, Donada, Italia kwa Kikundi cha Grimaldi. Alizinduliwa mnamo 18 Januari 2003 na aliwasilishwa mnamo Juni 16. Bandari yake ya Usajili ni Palermo. Hapo awali iliendeshwa na Grimaldi Ferries, "Eurostar Valencia" alianza safari yake ya ujakazi mnamo Julai 5 wakati aliondoka Salerno kwenda Valencia, Uhispania. Kisha akafanya kazi kwa njia mbali mbali katika Bahari ya Mediterania huko Palermo, Salerno, Tunis, Valencia na Valletta. Mnamo Januari 2005, alihamishiwa Civitavecchia, akifanya kazi kwa njia za Bastia, Cagliari, Porto Vecchio na Toulon. Aliitwa "Sorrento" mnamo 13 Novemba 2006.

Ford alifungua kiwanda huko Valencia mnamo 1976 kujenga supermini yake mpya ya Ulaya, Fiesta, ambayo bado inajengwa huko miaka 40 na mwili kadhaa baadaye, ingawa pia imejengwa huko Uingereza na Ujerumani. Escort na Orion pia zilijengwa huko miaka ya 1980 na 1990, kama ilivyokuwa KA kutoka 1996 hadi 2008, wakati utengenezaji wa mrithi wake ulibadilishwa kwenye kiwanda cha Fiat huko Poland. Mrithi wa kusindikiza, lengo lilitolewa katika mmea wa Valencia kutoka 1998 hadi 2011, tangu wakati uzalishaji wote wa Uropa wa Kizazi cha Tatu umejikita nchini Ujerumani. Toleo la C-Max la mwelekeo wa kizazi cha tatu, hata hivyo, lilijengwa hapo kutoka 2010 hadi 2014. Kiwanda pia kilishiriki uzalishaji wa mfano wa Mazda, Mazda 2, kutoka 2002 hadi 2007, kama sehemu ya ubia wa Ford na mpiga gari wa Japan.

Grand Prix ya Ulaya ya 2008 (rasmi Lii Telefónica Grand Prix ya Uropa) ilikuwa mbio ya Mfumo wa Mfumo wa One uliofanyika tarehe 24 Agosti 2008 katika Duru ya Mtaa wa Valencia, Valencia, Uhispania. Ilikuwa mbio ya 12 ya msimu wa 2008 msimu mmoja. Mashindano ya mbio 57 yalishindwa na Felipe Massa kwa timu ya Ferrari baada ya kuanza kutoka nafasi ya pole. Lewis Hamilton alimaliza wa pili katika gari la McLaren, na Robert Kubica wa tatu katika BMW Sauber.
