question_en: When did Amsterdam become the capital of the Netherlands?
pos_context_en: Although the proper legal status of Amsterdam as capital of the Netherlands is of recent date, the city has been uniformly recognised as capital ever since 1814. This is partly because it is a "Royal City", used not only for the inauguration of kings, but also for royal weddings (note though that royal burials take place in Delft), and also because of its dominant position in Dutch history. From the end of the 16th century the city grew rapidly to become the largest and most powerful city in the Netherlands and the main centre of trade, commerce, finance and culture.
neg_context_en: Amsterdam is the capital of the Netherlands according to the Constitution of the Netherlands, although the States General and the Executive Branch have been situated in The Hague since 1588, along with the Supreme Court and the Council of State. Since the 1983 revision of the Constitution of the Netherlands, Article 32 mentions that "the King shall be sworn in and inaugurated as soon as possible in the capital city, Amsterdam". It is the only reference in the document stating that Amsterdam is the capital.

Amsterdam had its start when the railroad was extended to that point. The community was named after Amsterdam, the capital of the Netherlands. A post office called Amsterdam was established in 1903, and remained in operation until 1959.

Only in 1806, when the Kingdom of Holland was a puppet state of the First French Empire, was the settlement granted city rights by Louis Bonaparte. After the Napoleonic Wars, modern-day Belgium and the Netherlands were combined in the United Kingdom of the Netherlands to form a buffer against France. As a compromise, Brussels and Amsterdam alternated as capital every two years, with the government remaining in The Hague. After the separation of Belgium in 1830, Amsterdam remained the capital of the Netherlands, while the government was situated in The Hague. When the government started to play a more prominent role in Dutch society after 1850, The Hague quickly expanded. Many streets were specifically built for the large number of civil servants employed in the country's government and for the Dutchmen who were retiring from the administration of the Netherlands East Indies. The growing city annexed the rural municipality of Loosduinen partly in 1903 and completely in 1923.

Under the Dutch Constitution, Amsterdam is the capital of the Netherlands. Since the 1983 constitutional revision, the constitution mentions "Amsterdam" and "capital" in chapter 2, article 32: The king's confirmation by oath and his coronation take place in "the capital Amsterdam" (""de hoofdstad Amsterdam""). Previous versions of the constitution only mentioned "the city of Amsterdam" (""de stad Amsterdam""). For a royal investiture, therefore, the States General of the Netherlands (the Dutch Parliament) meets for a ceremonial joint session in Amsterdam. The ceremony traditionally takes place at the Nieuwe Kerk on Dam Square, immediately after the former monarch has signed the act of abdication at the nearby Royal Palace of Amsterdam. Normally, however, the Parliament sits in The Hague, the city which has historically been the seat of the Dutch government, the Dutch monarchy, and the Dutch supreme court. Foreign embassies are also located in The Hague.

Only once during its history was Amsterdam both "capital" and seat of government. Between 1808 and 1810, during the Kingdom of Holland, King Louis Napoleon resided in Amsterdam and declared the city capital of his kingdom and seat of government. To accommodate the king, the grand seventeenth-century Town Hall of Amsterdam, prime example of the republican values that were prevalent for so long in the Netherlands, was converted into a Royal Palace.

Amsterdam (, ; ) is the capital city and most populous municipality of the Netherlands. Its status as the capital is mandated by the Constitution of the Netherlands, although it is not the seat of the government, which is The Hague. Amsterdam has a population of 851,373 within the city proper, 1,351,587 in the urban area and 2,410,960 in the metropolitan area. The city is located in the province of North Holland in the west of the country but is not its capital, which is Haarlem. The metropolitan area comprises much of the northern part of the Randstad, one of the larger conurbations in Europe, with a population of approximately 8 million.

Prince William VI (son of Prince William V of Orange), returned to the Netherlands in 1813, after Napoleon fell from power, and restored the palace to its original owners. After his investiture as King William I of the Netherlands, however, Amsterdam was made the official capital of the United Kingdom of the Netherlands (the seats of government being Brussels and The Hague). The new king realised the importance of having a palace in the capital, and the Town Hall again became a royal palace.

In 1810 the Netherlands were annexed by the French Empire and King Louis Napoleon was replaced by a French governor, who took up residence in the Royal Palace in Amsterdam. From 1810 to 1813 Amsterdam kept its position of capital city somewhat, as Emperor Napoleon declared the city to be the third city of the Empire (after Paris and Rome) and an imperial residence. In December 1813, after the fall of Napoleon and the accession of Prince William VI of Orange as Sovereign of the Netherlands, The Hague was restored as the seat of government.

Amsterdam was platted in 1891. The city was named after Amsterdam, capital of the Netherlands. Arthur Stilwell, an early-20th-century railroad executive, chose it because the Dutch capital was where the firm of an important railway financier, Jan de Goeijen, was located. A post office has been in operation at Amsterdam since 1892.
question_src: Je! Amsterdam alikua mji mkuu wa Uholanzi?
pos_context_src: Ingawa hali sahihi ya kisheria ya Amsterdam kama mji mkuu wa Uholanzi ni ya hivi karibuni, mji umetambuliwa kwa usawa kama mji mkuu tangu 1814. Hii ni kwa sababu ni "mji wa kifalme", ​​haukutumika tu kwa uzinduzi wa wafalme, lakini pia kwa harusi za kifalme (kumbuka ingawa Mazishi ya Royal hufanyika huko Delft), na kwa sababu ya Historia yake. Kuanzia mwisho wa karne ya 16 mji ulikua haraka kuwa mji mkubwa na wenye nguvu zaidi nchini Uholanzi na kituo kikuu cha biashara, biashara, fedha na utamaduni.
neg_context_src: Amsterdam ni mji mkuu wa Uholanzi kulingana na Katiba ya Uholanzi, ingawa Jenerali Mkuu na Tawi la Utendaji wamekuwa katika Hague tangu 1588, pamoja na Mahakama Kuu na Baraza la Nchi. Tangu marekebisho ya 1983 ya Katiba ya Uholanzi, Kifungu cha 32 kinataja kwamba "Mfalme ataapishwa na kuzinduliwa haraka iwezekanavyo katika mji mkuu, Amsterdam". Ni kumbukumbu pekee katika hati inayosema kwamba Amsterdam ndio mji mkuu.

Amsterdam alikuwa na mwanzo wake wakati reli iliongezwa hadi wakati huo. Jamii ilipewa jina la Amsterdam, mji mkuu wa Uholanzi. Ofisi ya posta inayoitwa Amsterdam ilianzishwa mnamo 1903, na ilibaki inafanya kazi hadi 1959.

Ni mnamo 1806 tu, wakati Ufalme wa Holland ulikuwa hali ya Dola ya kwanza ya Ufaransa, ndio makazi yaliyopewa haki za jiji na Louis Bonaparte. Baada ya vita vya Napoleon, Ubelgiji wa siku hizi na Uholanzi zilijumuishwa nchini Uingereza ya Uholanzi kuunda buffer dhidi ya Ufaransa. Kama maelewano, Brussels na Amsterdam walibadilisha kama mtaji kila miaka miwili, na serikali iliyobaki katika The Hague. Baada ya kujitenga kwa Ubelgiji mnamo 1830, Amsterdam ilibaki mji mkuu wa Uholanzi, wakati serikali ilikuwa katika Hague. Wakati serikali ilipoanza kuchukua jukumu maarufu zaidi katika jamii ya Uholanzi baada ya 1850, Hague iliongezeka haraka. Barabara nyingi zilijengwa mahsusi kwa idadi kubwa ya wafanyikazi wa umma walioajiriwa katika serikali ya nchi hiyo na kwa Waholanzi ambao walikuwa wakistaafu kutoka kwa usimamizi wa Uholanzi East Indies. Jiji lililokua lilisisitiza manispaa ya vijijini ya Loosduinen sehemu mnamo 1903 na kabisa mnamo 1923.

Chini ya Katiba ya Uholanzi, Amsterdam ndio mji mkuu wa Uholanzi. Tangu marekebisho ya katiba ya 1983, Katiba inataja "Amsterdam" na "Capital" katika kifungu cha 2, Kifungu cha 32: Uthibitisho wa Mfalme kwa Aath na Coronation yake hufanyika katika "Capital Amsterdam" ("" De Hoofdstad Amsterdam ""). Matoleo ya zamani ya Katiba yalitaja tu "Jiji la Amsterdam" ("" De Stad Amsterdam ""). Kwa uwekezaji wa kifalme, kwa hivyo, Jenerali Mkuu wa Uholanzi (Bunge la Uholanzi) hukutana kwa kikao cha pamoja cha sherehe huko Amsterdam. Sherehe hiyo jadi hufanyika katika Nieuwe Kerk kwenye Dam Square, mara baada ya mfalme wa zamani kusaini kitendo cha kutekwa nyara katika Jumba la Royal la Amsterdam. Kawaida, hata hivyo, Bunge linakaa Hague, mji ambao kihistoria umekuwa kiti cha serikali ya Uholanzi, kifalme cha Uholanzi, na Mahakama Kuu ya Uholanzi. Balozi za kigeni pia ziko katika The Hague.

Mara moja tu wakati wa historia yake ilikuwa Amsterdam "mtaji" wote na kiti cha serikali. Kati ya 1808 na 1810, wakati wa Ufalme wa Holland, Mfalme Louis Napoleon alikaa Amsterdam na kutangaza mji mkuu wa ufalme wake na kiti cha serikali. Ili kubeba mfalme, ukumbi mkubwa wa mji wa Amsterdam wa karne ya kumi na saba, mfano mkuu wa maadili ya Republican ambayo yalikuwa yameenea kwa muda mrefu sana nchini Uholanzi, ilibadilishwa kuwa ikulu ya kifalme.

Amsterdam (,;) ni mji mkuu na manispaa ya watu wengi wa Uholanzi. Hali yake kama mji mkuu inaamriwa na Katiba ya Uholanzi, ingawa sio kiti cha serikali, ambacho ni Hague. Amsterdam ina idadi ya watu 851,373 ndani ya jiji sahihi, 1,351,587 katika eneo la mijini na 2,410,960 katika eneo la mji mkuu. Jiji liko katika mkoa wa Holland Kaskazini magharibi mwa nchi lakini sio mji mkuu wake, ambao ni Haarlem. Sehemu ya mji mkuu inajumuisha sehemu kubwa ya kaskazini ya Randstad, moja wapo ya maeneo makubwa huko Uropa, na idadi ya watu takriban milioni 8.

Prince William VI (mtoto wa Prince William V wa Orange), alirudi Uholanzi mnamo 1813, baada ya Napoleon kuanguka kutoka madarakani, na akarudisha ikulu kwa wamiliki wake wa asili. Baada ya uwekezaji wake kama Mfalme William I wa Uholanzi, hata hivyo, Amsterdam alifanywa kuwa mji mkuu rasmi wa Uingereza wa Uholanzi (viti vya serikali kuwa Brussels na Hague). Mfalme mpya aligundua umuhimu wa kuwa na ikulu katika mji mkuu, na ukumbi wa jiji tena ukawa ikulu ya kifalme.

Mnamo 1810 Uholanzi ilibadilishwa na Dola ya Ufaransa na Mfalme Louis Napoleon ilibadilishwa na gavana wa Ufaransa, ambaye alikaa katika Jumba la Royal huko Amsterdam. Kuanzia 1810 hadi 1813 Amsterdam aliweka msimamo wake wa mji mkuu kwa kiasi fulani, kwani Mtawala Napoleon alitangaza mji kuwa mji wa tatu wa Dola (baada ya Paris na Roma) na makazi ya kifalme. Mnamo Desemba 1813, baada ya kuanguka kwa Napoleon na kuingia kwa Prince William VI wa Orange kama Mfalme wa Uholanzi, Hague ilirudishwa kama kiti cha serikali.

Amsterdam iliwekwa mnamo 1891. Mji huo ulipewa jina la Amsterdam, mji mkuu wa Uholanzi. Arthur Stilwell, mtendaji wa reli ya mapema-karne ya 20, alichagua kwa sababu mji mkuu wa Uholanzi ndio ambapo kampuni ya mfadhili muhimu wa reli, Jan de Goeijen, ilikuwa. Ofisi ya posta imekuwa ikifanya kazi huko Amsterdam tangu 1892.
report_src: Ndiyo; Amsterdam ilitambuliwa kama mji mkuu wa Uholanzi tangu 1814, ingawa uhalali wake kisheria ulipitishwa baadaye, kutokana na kuwa “mji wa kifalme” uliotumiwa kwa uzinduzi na harusi za kifalme na pia kwa uzito wa historia yake [1]. Kuanzia mwisho wa karne ya 16, jiji hili lilipanuka kwa kasi na kuwa kubwa na lenye nguvu zaidi nchini, likiwa kitovu cha biashara, fedha na utamaduni, jambo lililoongeza uzito wa kupewa hadhi ya mji mkuu [1]. Hata hivyo, shughuli nyingi za serikali (ikiwemo Bunge na ofisi kuu za mfalme) zipo The Hague, hivyo nafasi ya Amsterdam ni zaidi ya kiishara kuliko kiutawala, huku mazishi ya kifalme yakifanyika Delft [1].

question_en: What is Mathematical physics used for?
pos_context_en: The term "mathematical physics" is sometimes used to denote research aimed at studying and solving problems inspired by physics or thought experiments within a mathematically rigorous framework. In this sense, mathematical physics covers a very broad academic realm distinguished only by the blending of pure mathematics and physics. Although related to theoretical physics, mathematical physics in this sense emphasizes the mathematical rigour of the same type as found in mathematics.
neg_context_en: It is common to use idealized models in physics to simplify things. Massless ropes, point particles, ideal gases and the particle in a box are among the many simplified models used in physics. The laws of physics are represented with simple equations such as Newton's laws, Maxwell's equations and the Schrödinger equation. These laws are such as a basis for making mathematical models of real situations. Many real situations are very complex and thus modeled approximate on a computer, a model that is computationally feasible to compute is made from the basic laws or from approximate models made from the basic laws. For example, molecules can be modeled by molecular orbital models that are approximate solutions to the Schrödinger equation. In engineering, physics models are often made by mathematical methods such as finite element analysis.

The usage of the term "mathematical physics" is sometimes idiosyncratic. Certain parts of mathematics that initially arose from the development of physics are not, in fact, considered parts of mathematical physics, while other closely related fields are. For example, ordinary differential equations and symplectic geometry are generally viewed as purely mathematical disciplines, whereas dynamical systems and Hamiltonian mechanics belong to mathematical physics. John Herapath used the term for the title of his 1847 text on "mathematical principles of natural philosophy"; the scope at that time being 
"the causes of heat, gaseous elasticity, gravitation, and other great phenomena of nature".

Letters in Mathematical Physics is a peer-reviewed scientific journal in mathematical physics published by Springer Science+Business Media. It publishes letters and longer research articles, occasionally also articles containing topical reviews. It is essentially a platform for the rapid dissemination of short contributions in the field of mathematical physics. In addition, the journal publishes contributions to modern mathematics in fields which have a potential physical application, and developments in theoretical physics which have potential mathematical impact. The editors are Volker Bach, Edward Frenkel, Maxim Kontsevich, Dirk Kreimer, Nikita Nekrasov, Massimo Porrati, and Daniel Sternheimer.

On the other hand, theoretical physics emphasizes the links to observations and experimental physics, which often requires theoretical physicists (and mathematical physicists in the more general sense) to use heuristic, intuitive, and approximate arguments. Such arguments are not considered rigorous by mathematicians, but that is changing over time.

Modeling and simulation (M&S) at simple terms is a substitute for physical experimentation, in which computers are used to compute the results of some physical phenomenon. As it is apparent from its name "Modeling and simulation" firstly a computer is used to build a mathematical model which contains all the parameters of physical model and represent physical model in virtual form then conditions are applied which we want to experiment on physical model, then simulation starts i.e, we leave on computer to compute/calculate the results of those conditions on mathematical model. In this way, actual experimentation can be avoided which is costly and time-consuming instead of using mathematical knowledge and computer's computation power to solve real-world problems cheaply and in a time efficient manner. As such, M&S can facilitate understanding a system's behavior without actually testing the system in the real world. For instance, to determine which type of spoiler would improve traction the most while designing a race car, a computer simulation of the car could be used to estimate the effect of different spoiler shapes on the coefficient of friction in a turn. Useful insights about different decisions in the design could be gleaned without actually building the car. In addition, simulation can support experimentation that occurs totally in software, or in human-in-the-loop environments where simulation represents systems or generates data needed to meet experiment objectives. Furthermore, simulation can be used to train persons using a virtual environment that would otherwise be difficult or expensive to produce.

The distinction is clear-cut, but not always obvious. For example, mathematical physics is the application of mathematics in physics. Its methods are mathematical, but its subject is physical. The problems in this field start with a "mathematical model of a physical situation" (system) and a "mathematical description of a physical law" that will be applied to that system. Every mathematical statement used for solving has a hard-to-find physical meaning. The final mathematical solution has an easier-to-find meaning, because it is what the solver is looking for.

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.
Ẑ is a Latin script letter, the letter Z with a circumflex, used for transliteration of the Cyrillic letter Ѕ in ISO 9 family of transliteration standards. The lower case version of the letter is ẑ.
Ġ is used in some Arabic transliteration schemes, such as DIN 31635 and ISO 233, to represent the letter (ġain).
question_src: Je! Fizikia ya hisabati hutumiwa nini?
pos_context_src: Neno "fizikia ya hisabati" wakati mwingine hutumiwa kuashiria utafiti unaolenga kusoma na kutatua shida zilizochochewa na fizikia au majaribio ya mawazo ndani ya mfumo mgumu wa kihesabu. Kwa maana hii, fizikia ya hisabati inashughulikia ulimwengu mpana wa kitaaluma unaotofautishwa tu na mchanganyiko wa hesabu safi na fizikia. Ingawa inahusiana na fizikia ya kinadharia, fizikia ya hisabati kwa maana hii inasisitiza ukali wa kihesabu wa aina ile ile kama inavyopatikana katika hisabati.
neg_context_src: Ni kawaida kutumia mifano bora katika fizikia ili kurahisisha vitu. Kamba zisizo na maana, chembe za uhakika, gesi bora na chembe kwenye sanduku ni kati ya mifano mingi rahisi inayotumika katika fizikia. Sheria za fizikia zinawakilishwa na hesabu rahisi kama sheria za Newton, hesabu za Maxwell na equation ya Schrödinger. Sheria hizi ni kama msingi wa kutengeneza mifano ya kihesabu ya hali halisi. Hali nyingi halisi ni ngumu sana na kwa hivyo inakadiriwa kuwa sawa kwenye kompyuta, mfano ambao unawezekana kwa hesabu hufanywa kutoka kwa sheria za msingi au kutoka kwa mifano ya takriban iliyotengenezwa kutoka kwa sheria za msingi. Kwa mfano, molekuli zinaweza kuigwa na mifano ya orbital ambayo ni suluhisho takriban kwa equation ya Schrödinger. Katika uhandisi, mifano ya fizikia mara nyingi hufanywa na njia za kihesabu kama vile uchambuzi wa vitu vya laini.

Matumizi ya neno "fizikia ya hisabati" wakati mwingine ni idiosyncratic. Sehemu zingine za hisabati ambazo hapo awali zilitokana na maendeleo ya fizikia, kwa kweli, hazizingatiwi sehemu za fizikia ya hisabati, wakati nyanja zingine zinazohusiana sana. Kwa mfano, usawa wa kawaida wa tofauti na jiometri ya huruma kwa ujumla huzingatiwa kama taaluma za kihesabu, wakati mifumo ya nguvu na mechanics ya Hamiltonia ni ya fizikia ya hisabati. John Herapath alitumia neno kwa jina la maandishi yake ya 1847 juu ya "kanuni za hisabati za falsafa ya asili"; wigo wakati huo kuwa 
"Sababu za joto, elasticity ya gaseous, mvuto, na hali zingine kubwa za maumbile".

Barua katika fizikia ya hisabati ni jarida la kisayansi lililopitiwa na rika katika fizikia ya hisabati iliyochapishwa na Sayansi ya Springer+Media ya Biashara. Inachapisha barua na nakala za utafiti mrefu, mara kwa mara pia nakala zilizo na hakiki za maandishi. Kwa kweli ni jukwaa la usambazaji wa haraka wa michango fupi katika uwanja wa fizikia ya hisabati. Kwa kuongezea, Jarida linachapisha michango ya hisabati ya kisasa katika nyanja ambazo zina matumizi ya mwili, na maendeleo katika fizikia ya kinadharia ambayo ina athari ya kihesabu. Wahariri ni Volker Bach, Edward Frenkel, Maxim Kontsevich, Dirk Kreimer, Nikita Nekrasov, Massimo Porrati, na Daniel Sternheimer.

Kwa upande mwingine, fizikia ya nadharia inasisitiza viungo kwa uchunguzi na fizikia ya majaribio, ambayo mara nyingi inahitaji wataalamu wa fizikia (na wataalamu wa fizikia kwa maana ya jumla) kutumia hoja za mrithi, za angavu, na takriban. Hoja kama hizo hazizingatiwi kuwa ngumu na wataalam wa hesabu, lakini hiyo inabadilika kwa wakati.

Modeling na simulation (M&S) kwa maneno rahisi ni mbadala wa majaribio ya mwili, ambayo kompyuta hutumiwa kutekeleza matokeo ya hali fulani ya mwili. Kama inavyoonekana kutoka kwa jina lake "Modeling and Simulation" kwanza kompyuta hutumiwa kujenga mfano wa kihesabu ambao una vigezo vyote vya mfano wa mwili na kuwakilisha mfano wa mwili katika hali halisi basi hali zinatumika ambazo tunataka kujaribu mfano wa mwili, kisha simulation huanza i.e, tunaondoka kwenye kompyuta ili kuhesabu/kuhesabu matokeo ya hali hizo kwenye mfano wa hesabu. Kwa njia hii, majaribio halisi yanaweza kuepukwa ambayo ni ya gharama kubwa na ya wakati badala ya kutumia maarifa ya hesabu na nguvu ya hesabu ya kompyuta kutatua shida za ulimwengu wa bei rahisi na kwa wakati mzuri. Kama hivyo, M&S inaweza kuwezesha kuelewa tabia ya mfumo bila kujaribu mfumo katika ulimwengu wa kweli. Kwa mfano, kuamua ni aina gani ya mporaji ingeboresha shughuli zaidi wakati wa kubuni gari la mbio, simulizi la kompyuta linaweza kutumiwa kukadiria athari za maumbo tofauti ya uharibifu kwenye mgawo wa msuguano kwa zamu. Ufahamu muhimu juu ya maamuzi tofauti katika muundo unaweza kuzalishwa bila kujenga gari. Kwa kuongezea, simulation inaweza kusaidia majaribio ambayo hufanyika kabisa katika programu, au katika mazingira ya kibinadamu-ya-kitanzi ambapo simulation inawakilisha mifumo au hutoa data inayohitajika kufikia malengo ya majaribio. Kwa kuongezea, simulation inaweza kutumika kutoa mafunzo kwa watu wanaotumia mazingira ya kawaida ambayo ingekuwa ngumu au ya gharama kubwa kutoa.

Tofauti ni wazi, lakini sio dhahiri kila wakati. Kwa mfano, fizikia ya hisabati ni matumizi ya hisabati katika fizikia. Njia zake ni za kihesabu, lakini mada yake ni ya mwili. Shida katika uwanja huu zinaanza na "mfano wa kihesabu wa hali ya mwili" (mfumo) na "maelezo ya kihesabu ya sheria ya mwili" ambayo itatumika kwa mfumo huo. Kila taarifa ya kihesabu inayotumika kwa kutatua ina maana ngumu ya kupata mwili. Suluhisho la mwisho la hesabu lina maana rahisi kupata, kwa sababu ndivyo solver inatafuta.

Winfield Toll Bridge, pia inajulikana kama Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, ni kihistoria wa kihistoria wa Cantilever Warren Truss Bridge iliyoko Winfield na Red House, Kaunti ya Putnam, West Virginia. Ilijengwa mnamo 1955, na inachukua Mto wa Kanawha, iliyobeba West Virginia Route 34. Cantilever kupitia-truss ina nafasi mbili za nanga kila futi 245 kwa urefu na urefu wa futi 462 kwa urefu kati ya mistari ya kituo cha pier. Span kuu ina futi mbili 128, inchi 4, mikono ya cantilever na miguu 205, inchi 4, iliyosimamishwa.
Ẑ ni barua ya maandishi ya Kilatini, barua z iliyo na circflex, inayotumika kwa kutafsiri kwa barua ya Kisiriza katika familia ya ISO 9 ya viwango vya tafsiri. Toleo la chini la barua ni ẑ.
Ġ Inatumika katika miradi kadhaa ya kutafsiri ya Kiarabu, kama vile DIN 31635 na ISO 233, kuwakilisha barua (ġAin).
report_src: Fizikia ya hisabati hutumika kama mbinu ya utafiti inayotumia miundo na mbinu za hali ya juu za kihesabu ili kuchunguza na kutatua matatizo yanayotokana na maswali ya kifizikia au majaribio ya mawazo, hivyo kuunda daraja thabiti kati ya hesabu safi na fizikia huku ikisisitiza ukali wa kidhibitisho sawa na ule unaotumika katika hisabati [1].

question_en: Does human breast milk have higher protein than cow milk?
pos_context_en: Whole cow's milk contains too little iron, retinol, vitamin E, vitamin C, vitamin D, unsaturated fats or essential fatty acids for human babies. Whole cow's milk also contains too much protein, sodium, potassium, phosphorus and chloride which may put a strain on an infant's immature kidneys. In addition, the proteins, fats and calcium in whole cow's milk are more difficult for an infant to digest and absorb than the ones in breast milk. Evaporated milk may be easier to digest due to the processing of the protein but is still nutritionally inadequate. Some infants are allergic to cow's milk protein, this problem may be associated with infant formulas derived from cow's milk.
neg_context_en: Breast milk also contains much more protein than cow's milk. It contains 60% protein whereas cow’s milk contains only 40% protein. Protein is very important for infants because they need more protein per pound than adults do. For the first few months of their life, this protein must come from breast milk or formula, it cannot come from cow's milk . One specific protein that breast milk has is lactoferrin, which is bacteriostatic, meaning it prevents the growth of harmful bacteria. Without protein, the baby cannot produce the immunity that its body desperately needs, resulting in a higher risk of disease and malnutrition. Breast milk provides the best source of protein for an infant.

However, some farming groups promote the practice. For example, Small Farm Today, in 2005, claimed beneficial use in invalid and convalescent diets, proposing that glycerol ethers, possibly important in nutrition for nursing infants, are much higher in does' milk than in cows' milk. A 1970 book on animal breeding claimed that does' milk differs from cows' or humans' milk by having higher digestibility, distinct alkalinity, higher buffering capacity, and certain therapeutic values in human medicine and nutrition. George Mateljan suggested doe milk can replace ewe milk or cow milk in diets of those who are allergic to certain mammals' milk. However, like cow milk, doe milk has lactose (sugar), and may cause gastrointestinal problems for individuals with lactose intolerance. In fact, the level of lactose is similar to that of cow milk.

Livestock are modified with the intention of improving economically important traits such as growth-rate, quality of meat, milk composition, disease resistance and survival. Animals have been engineered to grow faster, be healthier and resist diseases. Modifications have also improved the wool production of sheep and udder health of cows. Goats have been genetically engineered to produce milk with strong spiderweb-like silk proteins in their milk. A GM pig called Enviropig was created with the capability of digesting plant phosphorus more efficiently than conventional pigs. They could reduce water pollution since they excrete 30 to 70% less phosphorus in manure. Dairy cows have been genetically engineered to produce milk that would be the same as human breast milk. This could potentially benefit mothers who cannot produce breast milk but want their children to have breast milk rather than formula. Researchers have also developed a genetically engineered cow that produces allergy-free milk.

The hydrolyzed nature of fish protein powder (low molecular weight profile) leads it to be used in hypoallergenic applications such as infant formulas. There is no evidence that infants who have a high risk of having an allergy to cows milk should be fed hydrolyzed infant formula instead of breast milk for allergy prevention. For infants who have a high-risk of a cows milk allergy but cannot be fed breast milk, there is low-quality evidence suggesting that hydrolyzed protein-based formula may reduce the risk of a cows milk allergy compared to cow milk protein formula.

Overall buffalo milk has greater nutritional properties and values than cow milk. Buffalo milk has higher levels of fat lactose, protein, calcium, and vitamins A and C, with lower levels of vitamin E riboflavin an cholesterol. There is an absence of carotene and a presence of bioactivepentasaccharides and gangliosides not present in cows. Fat globules are larger but contain less membrane material than cow milk. However, specific breed of buffalo does affect milk composition. In a 2008 comparison of four Indian buffalo breeds, the Bhadawari was shown to have more solids not fat than the Murrah, which had the highest performance for fat, total protein, and casein contents.

There is a market for human breast milk, both in the form of wet nurse service and milk product. As a product, breast milk is exchanged by human milk banks as well as directly between milk donors and customers mediated by websites on the Internet. Human milk banks generally have standardized measures for screening donors and storing the milk, while donors on websites vary in regard to these measures. A study in 2013 came to the conclusion that 74% of breast milk samples from providers found from websites were colonized with Gram-negative bacteria or had more than 10,000 colony-forming units/mL of aerobic bacteria. Growth happens during transit. According to the FDA, the bacteria in fresh milk doubles every 20 minutes. Breast milk is considered to be healthier than cow's milk and infant formula when it comes to feeding an infant in the first 6 months of life, but only under extreme situations do international health organizations support feeding an infant breast milk from a healthy wet nurse rather than that of its biological mother. One reason is because the unregulated breast milk market is fraught with risks such as drugs of abuse and prescription medications being present in donated breast milk. The transmission of these substances through breast milk can do more harm than good when it comes to the health outcomes of the infant recipient.

Camel milk is a staple food of nomadic tribes living in deserts. According to a study, it consists of 11.7% solids, 3% protein, 3.6% fat, 0.8% ash, 4.4% lactose and 0.13% acidity (pH 6.5). The quantities of sodium, potassium, zinc, iron, copper, manganese, niacin and vitamin C were relatively higher than the amounts in cow milk. However, the levels of thiamin, riboflavin, folacin, vitamin B, pantothenic acid, vitamin A, lysine, and tryptophan were lower than those in cow milk. The molar percentages of the fatty acids in milk fat were 26.7% for palmitic acid, 25.5% oleic acid, 11.4% myristic acid and 11% palmitoleic acid. Camel milk has higher thermal stability compared with cow milk, but it does not compare favourably with sheep milk.

All mammalian species produce milk, but the composition of milk for each species varies widely and other kinds of milk are often very different from human breast milk. As a rule, the milk of mammals that nurse frequently (including human babies) is less rich, or more watery, than the milk of mammals whose young nurse less often. Human milk is noticeably thinner and sweeter than cow's milk.

The medicinal property of the Vechur cow's milk have been documented traditionally by Ayurveda and recent scientific studies have substantiated this. The protein component of the Vechur cow's milk has an improved antimicrobial property. As per recent findings, the anti-bacterial property of the lactoferrin protein present in the Vechur Cow milk is more than that of the antibiotic ampicillin. Although lactoferrin, present in the milk of all mammals, is found to have antimicrobial, antiviral, antitumor, immunodefence and anti-inflammatory properties recent studies prove that in the case of the lactoferrin protein in the Vechur Cow milk, these properties are much more enhanced. The Vechur Ghee (clarified butter) produced from Vechur cow’s milk, is famous for its high medicinal values due to the presence of A2 beta-lactalbumin protein and higher arginine content which is good for the health of convalescing people.
question_src: Je! Maziwa ya matiti ya binadamu yana protini ya juu kuliko maziwa ya ng'ombe?
pos_context_src: Maziwa ya ng'ombe mzima yana chuma kidogo sana, retinol, vitamini E, vitamini C, vitamini D, mafuta yasiyosafishwa au asidi muhimu ya mafuta kwa watoto wa binadamu. Maziwa ya ng'ombe mzima pia yana protini nyingi, sodiamu, potasiamu, fosforasi na kloridi ambayo inaweza kuweka shida kwenye figo za watoto wachanga. Kwa kuongezea, protini, mafuta na kalsiamu katika maziwa ya ng'ombe mzima ni ngumu zaidi kwa mtoto mchanga kuchimba na kunyonya kuliko zile zilizo kwenye maziwa ya matiti. Maziwa ya kuyeyuka yanaweza kuwa rahisi kuchimba kwa sababu ya usindikaji wa protini lakini bado haitoshi. Watoto wachanga ni mzio wa protini ya maziwa ya ng'ombe, shida hii inaweza kuhusishwa na formula za watoto zinazotokana na maziwa ya ng'ombe.
neg_context_src: Maziwa ya matiti pia yana protini zaidi kuliko maziwa ya ng'ombe. Inayo protini 60% wakati maziwa ya ng'ombe yana protini 40% tu. Protini ni muhimu sana kwa watoto wachanga kwa sababu wanahitaji protini nyingi kwa paundi kuliko watu wazima. Kwa miezi michache ya kwanza ya maisha yao, protini hii lazima itoke kutoka kwa maziwa ya matiti au formula, haiwezi kutoka kwa maziwa ya ng'ombe. Protini moja maalum ambayo maziwa ya matiti ina ni lactoferrin, ambayo ni bakteria, ikimaanisha inazuia ukuaji wa bakteria hatari. Bila protini, mtoto hawezi kutoa kinga ambayo mwili wake unahitaji sana, na kusababisha hatari kubwa ya magonjwa na utapiamlo. Maziwa ya matiti hutoa chanzo bora cha protini kwa mtoto mchanga.

Walakini, vikundi vingine vya kilimo vinakuza mazoezi. Kwa mfano, shamba ndogo leo, mnamo 2005, lilidai matumizi ya faida katika lishe batili na ya kudadisi, ikipendekeza kwamba ethers za glycerol, labda muhimu katika lishe kwa watoto wachanga, ni kubwa zaidi katika maziwa ya 'maziwa kuliko maziwa ya ng'ombe. Kitabu cha 1970 juu ya ufugaji wa wanyama kilidai kwamba 'maziwa hutofautiana na ng'ombe' au maziwa ya wanadamu kwa kuwa na digestibility ya juu, alkalinity tofauti, uwezo wa juu wa buffering, na maadili fulani ya matibabu katika dawa ya binadamu na lishe. George Mateljan alipendekeza maziwa ya Doe yanaweza kuchukua nafasi ya maziwa ya Ewe au maziwa ya ng'ombe katika lishe ya wale ambao ni mzio wa maziwa ya mamalia. Walakini, kama maziwa ya ng'ombe, maziwa ya doe yana lactose (sukari), na inaweza kusababisha shida ya utumbo kwa watu walio na uvumilivu wa lactose. Kwa kweli, kiwango cha lactose ni sawa na ile ya maziwa ya ng'ombe.

Mifugo hubadilishwa kwa kusudi la kuboresha sifa muhimu za kiuchumi kama kiwango cha ukuaji, ubora wa nyama, muundo wa maziwa, upinzani wa magonjwa na kuishi. Wanyama wameundwa kukua haraka, kuwa na afya njema na kupinga magonjwa. Marekebisho pia yameboresha uzalishaji wa pamba wa kondoo na afya ya ng'ombe. Mbuzi wamebuniwa kwa vinasaba kutengeneza maziwa na protini zenye nguvu za buibui-kama spiderweb kwenye maziwa yao. Nguruwe ya GM inayoitwa Enviropig iliundwa na uwezo wa kuchimba fosforasi ya mmea kwa ufanisi zaidi kuliko nguruwe za kawaida. Wanaweza kupunguza uchafuzi wa maji kwani wanatoa fosforasi 30 hadi 70% katika mbolea. Ng'ombe za maziwa zimeundwa kwa vinasaba kutengeneza maziwa ambayo yangekuwa sawa na maziwa ya mama ya binadamu. Hii inaweza kufaidika akina mama ambao hawawezi kuzaa maziwa ya matiti lakini wanataka watoto wao wawe na maziwa ya matiti badala ya formula. Watafiti pia wameandaa ng'ombe aliye na maumbile ambayo hutoa maziwa yasiyokuwa na mzio.

Asili ya hydrolyzed ya poda ya protini ya samaki (maelezo mafupi ya uzito wa Masi) husababisha kutumika katika matumizi ya hypoallergenic kama vile formula za watoto wachanga. Hakuna ushahidi kwamba watoto wachanga ambao wana hatari kubwa ya kuwa na mzio wa maziwa ya ng'ombe wanapaswa kulishwa formula ya watoto wachanga badala ya maziwa ya matiti kwa kuzuia mzio. Kwa watoto wachanga ambao wana hatari kubwa ya mzio wa maziwa ya ng'ombe lakini hawawezi kulishwa maziwa ya matiti, kuna ushahidi wa hali ya chini unaonyesha kwamba formula inayotokana na protini inaweza kupunguza hatari ya mzio wa maziwa ya ng'ombe ikilinganishwa na formula ya protini ya ng'ombe.

Maziwa ya Buffalo kwa jumla ina mali na maadili zaidi ya lishe kuliko maziwa ya ng'ombe. Maziwa ya Buffalo yana viwango vya juu vya lactose ya mafuta, protini, kalsiamu, na vitamini A na C, na viwango vya chini vya vitamini E riboflavin cholesterol. Kuna kukosekana kwa carotene na uwepo wa bioactivepentasaccharides na gangliosides ambazo hazipo kwenye ng'ombe. Globules za mafuta ni kubwa lakini zina vifaa vya chini vya membrane kuliko maziwa ya ng'ombe. Walakini, aina maalum ya nyati huathiri muundo wa maziwa. Kwa kulinganisha 2008 ya mifugo minne ya Buffalo ya India, Bhadawari ilionyeshwa kuwa na yabisi zaidi sio mafuta kuliko Murrah, ambayo ilikuwa na utendaji wa juu zaidi kwa mafuta, protini jumla, na yaliyomo kwenye kesiin.

Kuna soko la maziwa ya mama ya binadamu, katika mfumo wa huduma ya muuguzi wa mvua na bidhaa ya maziwa. Kama bidhaa, maziwa ya matiti hubadilishwa na benki za maziwa ya binadamu na moja kwa moja kati ya wafadhili wa maziwa na wateja wanaopatanishwa na wavuti kwenye mtandao. Benki za maziwa ya binadamu kwa ujumla zina hatua sanifu za uchunguzi wa wafadhili na kuhifadhi maziwa, wakati wafadhili kwenye wavuti hutofautiana kuhusu hatua hizi. Utafiti mnamo 2013 ulifikia hitimisho kwamba 74% ya sampuli za maziwa ya matiti kutoka kwa watoa huduma zilizopatikana kutoka kwa wavuti ziliwekwa koloni na bakteria hasi ya gramu au walikuwa na vitengo zaidi ya 10,000 vya kutengeneza koloni/ml ya bakteria ya aerobic. Ukuaji hufanyika wakati wa usafirishaji. Kulingana na FDA, bakteria katika maziwa safi huongezeka kila dakika 20. Maziwa ya matiti inachukuliwa kuwa yenye afya kuliko maziwa ya ng'ombe na formula ya watoto linapokuja suala la kulisha mtoto mchanga katika miezi 6 ya kwanza ya maisha, lakini tu chini ya hali mbaya ambayo mashirika ya afya ya kimataifa yanaunga mkono kulisha maziwa ya watoto wachanga kutoka kwa muuguzi mwenye afya badala ya ile ya mama yake wa kibaolojia. Sababu moja ni kwa sababu soko la maziwa ya matiti lisilodhibitiwa limejaa hatari kama vile dawa za unyanyasaji na dawa za kuagiza zipo katika maziwa ya matiti yaliyotolewa. Uwasilishaji wa vitu hivi kupitia maziwa ya matiti unaweza kufanya madhara zaidi kuliko nzuri linapokuja matokeo ya kiafya ya mpokeaji wa watoto wachanga.

Maziwa ya ngamia ni chakula kikuu cha makabila ya nomadic wanaoishi katika jangwa. Kulingana na utafiti, ina yabisi 11.7%, protini 3%, mafuta 3.6%, 0.8% Ash, 4.4% lactose na acidity 0.13% (pH 6.5). Kiasi cha sodiamu, potasiamu, zinki, chuma, shaba, manganese, niacin na vitamini C kilikuwa juu zaidi kuliko kiasi cha maziwa ya ng'ombe. Walakini, viwango vya thiamin, riboflavin, folacin, vitamini B, asidi ya pantothenic, vitamini A, lysine, na tryptophan vilikuwa chini kuliko ile ya maziwa ya ng'ombe. Asilimia ya molar ya asidi ya mafuta katika mafuta ya maziwa ilikuwa 26.7% kwa asidi ya palmitic, asidi ya oleic 25.5%, asidi 11.4% na asidi 11% ya Palmitoleic. Maziwa ya ngamia yana utulivu wa juu wa mafuta ikilinganishwa na maziwa ya ng'ombe, lakini hailinganisho vizuri na maziwa ya kondoo.

Aina zote za mamalia hutengeneza maziwa, lakini muundo wa maziwa kwa kila spishi hutofautiana sana na aina zingine za maziwa mara nyingi ni tofauti sana na maziwa ya binadamu. Kama sheria, maziwa ya mamalia ambayo wauguzi mara kwa mara (pamoja na watoto wa binadamu) hayana utajiri, au ni maji zaidi, kuliko maziwa ya mamalia ambayo muuguzi mchanga mara nyingi. Maziwa ya mwanadamu ni nyembamba na tamu kuliko maziwa ya ng'ombe.

Mali ya dawa ya maziwa ya ng'ombe wa Vechur imeandikwa jadi na Ayurveda na tafiti za kisayansi za hivi karibuni zimesisitiza hii. Sehemu ya protini ya maziwa ya ng'ombe wa Vechur ina mali bora ya antimicrobial. Kama ilivyo kwa matokeo ya hivi karibuni, mali ya anti-bakteria ya protini ya lactoferrin iliyopo kwenye maziwa ya ng'ombe wa Vechur ni zaidi ya ile ya ampicillin ya antibiotic. Ingawa lactoferrin, iliyopo katika maziwa ya mamalia wote, hupatikana kuwa na antimicrobial, antiviral, antitumor, chanjo na mali ya kupambana na uchochezi tafiti za hivi karibuni zinathibitisha kuwa katika kesi ya protini ya lactoferrin katika maziwa ya ng'ombe wa Vechur, mali hizi zinaimarishwa zaidi. Ghee ya Vechur (siagi iliyofafanuliwa) inayozalishwa kutoka kwa maziwa ya Vechur Cow, ni maarufu kwa maadili yake ya juu kwa sababu ya uwepo wa protini ya A2 beta-lactalbumin na yaliyomo ya juu ya arginine ambayo ni nzuri kwa afya ya watu wanaoshawishi.
report_src: La, maziwa ya matiti ya binadamu hayana protini nyingi kuliko maziwa ya ng’ombe; kinyume chake, maziwa ya ng’ombe mzima ndiyo yenye “protini nyingi” kiasi kwamba yanaweza kumletea mtoto mchanga mzigo wa ziada wa kimetaboli, huku protini zake pia zikiwa ngumu zaidi kumeng’enywa na kunyonya ukilinganisha na zile za maziwa ya binadamu [1].

question_en: Has the character Danielle "Dani" Cage appeared in any Marvel films?
pos_context_en: Jessica Campbell Jones is a fictional superhero appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. The character was created by writer Brian Michael Bendis and artist Michael Gaydos, and first appeared in "Alias" #1 (November 2001), as part of Marvel's Max, an imprint for more mature content. Within the context of Marvel's shared universe, Jones is a former superhero who becomes the owner and sole employee of Alias Private Investigations. Bendis originally envisioned the series centered on Jessica Drew and only decided to create Jones once he noticed that the main character had a distinct voice and background that differentiated her from Drew.

List of Marvel Comics characters: C
neg_context_en: Danielle "Dani" Cage is a fictional character in Marvel Comics. Danielle is the young daughter of Jessica Jones and Luke Cage, created by Brian Michael Bendis and Michael Gaydos, first appeared in "The Pulse" #13 (March 2006).

Danielle "Dani" Moonstar, originally codenamed Psyche and later Mirage, is a fictional Cheyenne superheroine appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. The character is usually depicted as associated with the X-Men.

In an alternate future timeline, Danielle Cage, nicknamed Dani, inherits both of her parents' abilities and becomes Captain America. It is mentioned that she was mentored by an aged version of Black Widow, who goes by the name Madame Natasha. She is plucked from her timeline to battle Ultron and then a Doombot, and subsequently teams up with the modern day Avengers to battle Moridun, who had possessed Wiccan. She returns to the present again to aid the U.S.Avengers in capturing her nemesis, the Golden Skull.

Marvel announced in September 2015 that Dawson would be appearing in "Luke Cage", in what Cage actor Mike Colter described as a "significant part", noting that the comics character Claire Temple was introduced as a love interest for Cage. The series introduces Temple's mother (portrayed by Sônia Braga), and gives Claire "a large storyline ... [she helps] out a lot." It also references her role as a version of Night Nurse, with a character dismissively referring to her as "the night nurse". Explaining the decision to have Temple appear across multiple series, which has been compared to the role that Nick Fury plays as "the connective thread" between the MCU films, Marvel Television head Jeph Loeb explained that it was due to Dawson's performance, saying "It wasn't just that Claire fit so well in those worlds, it's that Rosario fit so well in those worlds." When Temple first appears in the second season of "Daredevil", she has "a cut in her eyebrow", which Daredevil actor Charlie Cox explained was from one of the other series, saying that "the timeline had been thought through and worked out" to connect Dawson's various performances.
She was last seen applying to be Danielle Cage's nanny, but left when it became apparent that Luke Cage and Jessica Jones had no idea who she was.

In July 2016, Dawson was unable to promote "Luke Cage" because she was "back in New York ... filming something else for Marvel TV", which was confirmed that October to be "Iron Fist"; this appearance was set up at the end of "Luke Cage". A month later, Dawson was revealed to also be reprising her role in the crossover miniseries "The Defenders". Dawson also expressed interest in making a cameo appearance in "The Punisher", a spin-off series from "Daredevil", but was unable to due to a scheduling conflict.
After appearing in the second season of "Luke Cage", Dawson explained that she was reluctant to continue making appearances in the many series due to having to travel away from her family when working on the New York sets. She did think that she would return to "Luke Cage" if it was renewed for further seasons, and again expressed interest in appearing in "The Punisher" at some point moving forward "just so I can feel like I’ve done every show". Dawson later revealed that she had asked "Luke Cage" showrunner Cheo Hodari Coker whether she could contribute to the writing of Temple's last scene in the season; she considered the scene to be the culmination of three years of work for her, and felt that it had initially been written too much from the perspective of Cage, whom Temple has a fight with in the scene that ends their relationship. Dawson praised Coker for allowing her to push the scene to feature more of an equal balance between the characters, and Coker praised the work she did on this.

Following the announcement of the series, Russ Burlingame noted for ComicBook.com that Marvel may have been tempted to change Danny Rand from white to a person of Asian descent, especially given that the other Marvel Netflix series "Jessica Jones" and "Luke Cage" already set a precedent of increasing diversity by exploring a female and African-America lead, respectively. However, Burlingame was against this happening, wanting to see "the classic" version of the character, and feeling that making the character Asian simply because he is a martial artist was itself "quietly, subtlely racist". This situation, of casting either a white or Asian-American actor in the role, was described as "lose/lose" by Devin Faraci of Birth.Movies.Death, while Albert Ching at Comic Book Resources was strictly against casting an Asian-American. He said that any extra Asian-American representation onscreen would be positive, but that he was not comfortable with the idea of the first major Asian superhero in film or television being a martial artist. Ching questioned why this discussion had not been raised with any other character, and suggested that a non-white, non-Asian actor be cast instead to avoid either issues. He highlighted the casting of Chloe Bennet and Ming-Na Wen in the MCU series "Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.", both in "non-stereotypical roles", as examples of what roles he would rather have Asian-Americans be cast in.

During the "Hunt for Wolverine" storyline, a black market auction had somehow got the genetic material of Danielle Cage. When Iron Man, Jessica Jones, Luke Cage, and Spider-Man arrive undercover looking for Wolverine ever since his body disappeared from his unmarked grave, Luke and Jessica are outraged when they learned that their daughter's genetic material was being auctioned off.

Since "Boy Meets World" ended, Fishel has appeared in several films, including "National Lampoon's Dorm Daze". In 2006, she appeared in three made-for-DVD releases: "National Lampoon's Dorm Daze 2" (appearing again as "Marla" from the first film), the action film "Gamebox 1.0" (playing a dual role), and "The Chosen One", an independent animated film in which she provides the voice of the lead female character.

In 2018, Cage starred in the action thriller film, "Mandy", which premiered on January 19 at the 2018 Sundance Film Festival. Nick Allen of RogerEbert.com praised the movie, writing that "for all of the endless feral performances that Cage has given, in movies good, bad and forgettable, Cosmatos' style-driven, '80s-tastic passion for weird worlds and characters takes full advantage of Cage's greatness, and then some."
On October, Mandy's producer Elijah Wood announced the intention to sizing up an Oscar campaign for Nicolas Cage and composer Jóhann Jóhannsson but the film was disqualified because
was also released on VOD on September 14.

Jessica Jones debuted in the Marvel MAX imprint series "Alias" in November 2001. The character and series were created by writer Brian Michael Bendis and artist Michael Gaydos. "Alias" ran for 28 issues from 2001 to 2004, with most covers drawn by David W. Mack. After the end of the series, Jones and other characters from the series moved to Bendis' subsequent series, "The Pulse". In a 2005 interview, Bendis claimed:
"Originally, "Alias" was going to star Jessica Drew, but it became something else entirely. Which is good, because had we used Jessica, it would have been off continuity and bad storytelling." Previously, Bendis commented, "I was at one time toying with doing Jessica Drew [in "Alias"] because she has the best hair of any superhero in comics, but this book is entirely different than what that idea was to be."
question_src: Je! Tabia ya Danielle "Dani" Cage ilionekana katika filamu yoyote ya kushangaza?
pos_context_src: Jessica Campbell Jones ni superhero ya uwongo inayoonekana katika vitabu vya ucheshi vya Amerika vilivyochapishwa na Marvel Comics. Tabia hiyo iliundwa na mwandishi Brian Michael Bendis na msanii Michael Gaydos, na alionekana kwa mara ya kwanza katika "Alias" #1 (Novemba 2001), kama sehemu ya Marvel's Max, alama ya yaliyomo zaidi. Katika muktadha wa ulimwengu ulioshirikiwa wa Marvel, Jones ni mtu mkuu wa zamani ambaye anakuwa mmiliki na mfanyikazi wa pekee wa uchunguzi wa kibinafsi wa Alias. Hapo awali Bendis aliona mfululizo uliozingatia Jessica Drew na aliamua kuunda Jones mara tu alipogundua kuwa mhusika mkuu alikuwa na sauti tofauti na asili ambayo ilimtofautisha na Drew.
neg_context_title_src: Orodha ya wahusika wa Jumuia za Marvel: c
Orodha ya wahusika wa Jumuia za Marvel: c
Orodha ya wahusika wa Jumuia za Marvel: u
Orodha ya wahusika wa Jumuia za Marvel: c
neg_context_src: Danielle "Dani" Cage ni tabia ya uwongo katika Jumuia za Marvel. Danielle ni binti mdogo wa Jessica Jones na Luke Cage, iliyoundwa na Brian Michael Bendis na Michael Gaydos, walionekana kwa mara ya kwanza katika "The Pulse" #13 (Machi 2006).

Danielle "Dani" Moonstar, aliyetajwa hapo awali na Psyche na baadaye Mirage, ni hadithi ya Cheyenne Superheroine inayoonekana katika vitabu vya vichekesho vya Amerika vilivyochapishwa na Marvel Comics. Tabia kawaida huonyeshwa kama inayohusishwa na X-Men.

Katika ratiba mbadala ya wakati ujao, Danielle Cage, jina la jina la Dani, anarithi uwezo wa wazazi wake wote na kuwa Kapteni Amerika. Imetajwa kuwa alipewa mafunzo na toleo la zamani la Mjane mweusi, ambaye huenda kwa jina la Madame Natasha. Yeye ni kung'olewa kutoka kwa ratiba yake ya kupigana Ultron na kisha Doombot, na baadaye timu na Avenger ya siku ya kisasa kupigana Moridun, ambaye alikuwa na Wiccan. Anarudi tena ili kusaidia Wakuu wa U.S. katika kukamata nemesis yake, Fuvu la Dhahabu.

Marvel alitangaza mnamo Septemba 2015 kwamba Dawson angeonekana katika "Luke Cage", katika kile muigizaji wa Cage Mike Colter alielezea kama "sehemu muhimu", akigundua kuwa tabia ya Jumuia Claire Hekalu ilianzishwa kama shauku ya upendo kwa Cage. Mfululizo huo unamtambulisha mama ya Hekalu (iliyoonyeshwa na Sônia Braga), na inampa Claire "hadithi kubwa ... [anasaidia] mengi." Pia inarejelea jukumu lake kama toleo la muuguzi wa usiku, na mhusika akimrejelea kama "muuguzi wa usiku". Kuelezea uamuzi wa kuwa na Hekalu kuonekana katika safu kadhaa, ambazo zimelinganishwa na jukumu ambalo Nick Fury anacheza kama "nyuzi ya kuunganishwa" kati ya filamu za MCU, kichwa cha Televisheni cha Marvel, Jeph Loeb alielezea kuwa ni kwa sababu ya utendaji wa Dawson, akisema "haikuwa tu kwamba Claire anafaa sana katika ulimwengu huo, ni kwamba Rosario inafaa sana katika ulimwengu huo." Wakati Hekalu linaonekana kwanza katika msimu wa pili wa "Daredevil", amekuwa "amekatwa kwenye eyebrow yake", ambayo muigizaji wa Daredevil Charlie Cox alielezea ni kutoka kwa moja ya safu nyingine, akisema kwamba "ratiba ya wakati ilifikiriwa kupitia na ilifanya kazi" kuunganisha maonyesho mbali mbali ya Dawson.
Alionekana mara ya mwisho akiomba kuwa nanny wa Danielle Cage, lakini aliondoka wakati ilipoonekana kuwa Luke Cage na Jessica Jones hawakujua yeye ni nani.

Mnamo Julai 2016, Dawson hakuweza kukuza "Luke Cage" kwa sababu alikuwa "nyuma huko New York ... akitengeneza kitu kingine kwa Marvel TV", ambayo ilithibitishwa kuwa Oktoba kuwa "Iron Fist"; Muonekano huu ulianzishwa mwishoni mwa "Luke Cage". Mwezi mmoja baadaye, Dawson alifunuliwa pia kuwa akibadilisha jukumu lake katika wahudumu wa crossover "watetezi". Dawson pia alionyesha nia ya kufanya muonekano wa "The Punisher", safu ya kuzunguka kutoka "Daredevil", lakini haikuweza kutokana na mzozo wa ratiba.
Baada ya kuonekana katika msimu wa pili wa "Luke Cage", Dawson alielezea kwamba alisita kuendelea kuonekana katika safu nyingi kutokana na kusafiri mbali na familia yake wakati wa kufanya kazi kwenye seti za New York. Alifikiria kwamba atarudi kwa "Luke Cage" ikiwa itafanywa upya kwa misimu zaidi, na tena alionyesha nia ya kuonekana katika "The Punisher" wakati fulani kusonga mbele "ili niweze kuhisi kama nimefanya kila onyesho". Baadaye Dawson alifunua kwamba alikuwa ameuliza showrunner wa "Luke Cage" Cheo Hodari Coker kama angeweza kuchangia uandishi wa tukio la mwisho la Hekalu msimu huo; Aliona tukio hilo kuwa kilele cha miaka mitatu ya kazi kwake, na alihisi kwamba hapo awali ilikuwa imeandikwa sana kutoka kwa mtazamo wa Cage, ambaye Hekalu linapigana naye katika eneo ambalo linamaliza uhusiano wao. Dawson alimpongeza Coker kwa kumruhusu kushinikiza eneo hilo kuonyesha usawa zaidi kati ya wahusika, na Coker alisifu kazi aliyoifanya juu ya hii.

Kufuatia kutangazwa kwa safu hiyo, Russ Burlingame alibaini kwa ComicBook.com kwamba Marvel anaweza kuwa alijaribiwa kubadilisha Danny Rand kutoka White kuwa mtu wa asili ya Asia, haswa kutokana na kwamba safu nyingine ya Marvel Netflix "Jessica Jones" na "Luke Cage" tayari imeweka mfano wa kuongezeka kwa utofauti kwa kuchunguza kiongozi wa kike na wa Kiafrika-America. Walakini, Burlingame alikuwa dhidi ya hii kutokea, kutaka kuona toleo la "Classic" la mhusika, na kuhisi kwamba kumfanya mhusika Asia kwa sababu yeye ni msanii wa kijeshi yenyewe "kimya kimya, na ubaguzi wa rangi". Hali hii, ya kutupwa ama muigizaji mweupe au wa Asia-Amerika katika jukumu hilo, ilielezewa kama "kupoteza/kupoteza" na Devin Faraci wa kuzaliwa.Movies.Death, wakati Albert Ching kwenye rasilimali za vitabu vya vichekesho alikuwa madhubuti dhidi ya kumtupa Asia-Amerika. Alisema kuwa uwakilishi wowote wa ziada wa Asia na Amerika kwenye skrini itakuwa nzuri, lakini kwamba hakuwa vizuri na wazo la superhero kuu ya kwanza ya Asia katika filamu au televisheni kuwa msanii wa kijeshi. Ching alihoji kwa nini majadiliano haya hayakuinuliwa na tabia nyingine yoyote, na alipendekeza kwamba muigizaji ambaye sio mweupe, ambaye sio wa Asia atupwe badala yake ili aepuke masuala yoyote. Alionyesha utaftaji wa Chloe Bennet na Ming-na Wen katika safu ya MCU "Mawakala wa S.H.I.E.L.D.", wote katika "majukumu yasiyokuwa ya kisayansi", kama mifano ya majukumu gani angependa kuwa na Waamerika-Wamarekani kutupwa.

Wakati wa hadithi ya "Hunt for Wolverine", mnada wa soko nyeusi ulikuwa na njia ya maumbile ya Danielle Cage. Wakati Iron Man, Jessica Jones, Luke Cage, na Spider-Man wanapofika wakimtafuta Wolverine tangu mwili wake kutoweka kutoka kwenye kaburi lake lisilo na alama, Luka na Jessica wanakasirika walipopata habari kuwa nyenzo za maumbile ya binti yao zilikuwa zikipigwa mnada.

Kwa kuwa "Boy Meets World" ilimalizika, Fishel ameonekana katika filamu kadhaa, pamoja na "Dorm ya Taa ya Kitaifa". Mnamo 2006, alionekana katika kutolewa tatu-kwa-DVD: "Kitaifa cha Taa ya Taa ya Taa 2" (akionekana tena kama "Marla" kutoka filamu ya kwanza), filamu ya hatua "Gamebox 1.0" (ikicheza jukumu mbili), na "Mteule Mmoja", filamu huru ya michoro ambayo yeye hutoa sauti ya mhusika wa kike anayeongoza.

Mnamo mwaka wa 2018, CAGE iliongezeka katika filamu ya Action Thriller, "Mandy", ambayo ilizinduliwa mnamo Januari 19 kwenye Tamasha la Filamu la Sundance la 2018. Nick Allen wa Rogerebert.com alisifu sinema, akiandika kwamba "kwa maonyesho yote ya mwisho ambayo Cage ametoa, katika sinema nzuri, mbaya na inayoweza kusahaulika, mtindo wa Cosmatos, '80s-tastic kwa walimwengu weard na wahusika huchukua fursa kamili ya ukuu wa Cage, halafu wengine."
Mnamo Oktoba, mtayarishaji wa Mandy Elijah Wood alitangaza kusudi la kuongeza kampeni ya Oscar ya Nicolas Cage na mtunzi Jóhann Jóhannsson lakini filamu hiyo ilikataliwa kwa sababu
ilitolewa pia kwenye VOD mnamo Septemba 14.

Jessica Jones alijadiliwa katika safu ya Marvel Max Imprint "Alias" mnamo Novemba 2001. Tabia na safu ziliundwa na mwandishi Brian Michael Bendis na msanii Michael Gaydos. "Alias" iliendesha kwa maswala 28 kutoka 2001 hadi 2004, na vifuniko vingi vilivyochorwa na David W. Mack. Baada ya kumalizika kwa mfululizo, Jones na wahusika wengine kutoka mfululizo walihamia kwenye safu ya baadaye ya Bendis, "Pulse". Katika mahojiano ya 2005, Bendis alidai:
"Hapo awali," Alias ​​"alikuwa anaenda kwa nyota Jessica Drew, lakini ikawa kitu kingine kabisa. Ambayo ni nzuri, kwa sababu kama tungemtumia Jessica, ingekuwa mwendelezo na hadithi mbaya." Hapo awali, Bendis alitoa maoni, "Wakati mmoja nilikuwa nikicheza kwa kufanya Jessica Drew [katika" Alias ​​"] kwa sababu ana nywele bora zaidi ya superhero yoyote katika Jumuia, lakini kitabu hiki ni tofauti kabisa kuliko wazo hilo kuwa."
report_src: Hadi sasa, hakuna rekodi rasmi wala tangazo la Marvel Studios linaloonyesha kwamba tabia ya Danielle “Dani” Cage—binti wa Luke Cage na Jessica Jones katika vichekesho—amewahi kuonekana kwenye filamu yoyote ya Marvel (MCU) au “filamu ya kushangaza” nyingine; muonekano wake umebaki katika kurasa za vichekesho pekee, tofauti na wahusika wenzake kama Jessica Jones ambaye tayari ni sehemu ya ulimwengu wa Marvel katika vichekesho [1].
all_claims: Hadi sasa, hakuna rekodi rasmi wala tangazo la Marvel Studios linaloonyesha kwamba tabia ya Danielle “Dani” Cage—binti wa Luke Cage na Jessica Jones katika vichekesho—amewahi kuonekana kwenye filamu yoyote ya Marvel (MCU) au “filamu ya kushangaza” nyingine; muonekano wake umebaki katika kurasa za vichekesho pekee, tofauti na wahusika wenzake kama Jessica Jones ambaye tayari ni sehemu ya ulimwengu wa Marvel katika vichekesho [1].

question_en: Can greed be a good thing?
pos_context_en: Ivan Boesky famously defended greed in an 18 May 1986 commencement address at the UC Berkeley's School of Business Administration, in which he said, "Greed is all right, by the way. I want you to know that. I think greed is healthy. You can be greedy and still feel good about yourself". This speech inspired the 1987 film "Wall Street", which features the famous line spoken by Gordon Gekko: "Greed, for lack of a better word, is good. Greed is right, greed works. Greed clarifies, cuts through, and captures the essence of the evolutionary spirit. Greed, in all of its forms; greed for life, for money, for love, knowledge has marked the upward surge of mankind."
neg_context_en: If a Ferengi navigates the river properly, he can accumulate wealth and distribute it throughout society, at various points along the river. This may demonstrate an important distinction, even in Ferengi culture, between selfishness and greed. Ferengi believe that greed, while essential to their concept of economics, is not inherently selfish, because the pursuit of greed serves a greater good. This is similar to the "Greed is Good" speech made by Gordon Gekko in the film "Wall Street". Alternatively, the concept may demonstrate that Ferengi culture views both selfishness and greed as completely compatible with improving the wealth of the universe as a whole.

The primary aim of the dialogue is an attempt to define greed. A friend of Socrates argues that greed is a desire to profit from things of no value, but Socrates replies that no sensible man attempts to profit from worthless things, but inasfar as greed is a desire for profit, then it is a desire for the good, and thus everyone is greedy. The friend of Socrates thinks there is something wrong with Socrates' argument, but cannot say what is wrong with it.

Written shortly after the financial crash of 2008, Folbre explores how the boundaries between the pursuit of self-interest and immorality have become blurred. She argues that the mentality espoused by Oliver Stone's character Gordon Gecko that "greed is good," helped lead to the 2008 crash and persists in its wake. Yet, the same social norms that consider aggression, greed and lust an advantage to men in public life also view such things as perverse in women. Folbre argues that this double standard often puts aspiring women in a difficult position, which forces women to choose between their personal identity and the acceptance of the expected gender role.
Folbre brings women's work, their sexuality, and their ideas into the center of the dialectic between economic history and the history of economic ideas. Her book describes a process of economic and cultural change in the United States, Great Britain and France that shaped the evolution of patriarchal capitalism and the welfare state.

Thomas Aquinas says that greed "is a sin against God, just as all mortal sins, in as much as man condemns things eternal for the sake of temporal things." In Dante's "Purgatory", the avaricious penitents were bound and laid face down on the ground for having concentrated too much on earthly thoughts.
Meher Baba dictated that "Greed is a state of restlessness of the heart, and it consists mainly of craving for power and possessions. Possessions and power are sought for the fulfillment of desires. Man is only partially satisfied in his attempt to have the fulfillment of his desires, and this partial satisfaction fans and increases the flame of craving instead of extinguishing it. Thus greed always finds an endless field of conquest and leaves the man endlessly dissatisfied. The chief expressions of greed are related to the emotional part of man."

The final explanatory feature important to the Taliban's insurgency as a greed-based rebellion is the influence of a previous rebellion. With the support of the CIA and ISI the young Taliban in the 1990s were pitted against the Soviet Union in proxy war. This enabled the Taliban to do a number of things. They became involved in opium trade, were provided with weapons, and began to construct the organizational aptitude that allows for their continued success today. The previous involvement of the Taliban in an armed insurgency allows one of the issues with a greed-based insurgency to be dismissed. Collier and Hoeffler assert that the government has an innate advantage in greed-based conflicts as the government is more organized. However, in the case of the Afghan conflict this is not true. The transitional government is more fractionalized, less cooperative, and more ethnically divided than the Taliban. Therefore, using the greed-model we should actually expect the Taliban to defeat the transitional government after NATO's withdrawal, as the government possesses few advantages.

Other academics tend to compare greed to an addiction, because greed like smoking and drinking can illustrate that if a person can take over one's addictions it is possible to avert bad effects from resisting it. On the other hand, if one can not resist its temptations, he can easily get swept away by it. In other words, it can be deduced that certain traders who join the business world for the emotional agitation and desire of hitting that emotional high, are addicted to the release of certain brain chemicals that determine those states of happiness, euphoria and relaxation. Before mentioned fact can also imply that such traders are susceptible to all addictions. Furthermore, humans' brains are naturally activated by financial awards, which in the same way as drugs produce an incredible but perilous feeling and thus an addictive experience.

Early in the 1990s, Groth took issue with Sim's stance of self-publishing as the best option for creators, and began to disseminate the view that it was best to work for a publisher, mentioning Ivan Boesky's address to the University of California's commencement ceremony in May 1986, where Boesky informed his audience that "greed is all right, by the way. I want you to know that. I think greed is healthy. You can be greedy and still feel good about yourself."

On July 28, 2009, Cardinal Tarcisio Bertone cited Gekko's "Greed is good" slogan in a speech to the Italian Senate, saying that the free market had been replaced by a "greed market", and also blamed such a mentality for the 2007-2008 financial crisis.

Part one examined the growing greed of society and the 1980s ideal that greed is good. It also looked at the growing disparity between rich and poor.Viswalingam interviewed New South Wales Police Commissioner Ken Moroney about the extent to which many cases of rape have become particularly violent and gruesome, and asked why sex crimes are growing in number in society. The link between violent pornography and sex crimes was also examined in this episode. A medical ethicist Dr. Amin Abboud noted that sex had been trivialized and needed to be placed back into the context of emotional connections and intimacy and that sex should be rediscovered as part of love. In an interview, Orthodox Rabbi Shmuley Boteach stated that modern relationships collapse when people lose interest in the sex and that sex has become the sole measure and importance in a relationship.
question_src: Je! Tamaa inaweza kuwa jambo zuri?
pos_context_src: Ivan Boesky alitetea uchoyo katika anwani ya kuanza ya Mei 18, 1986 katika Shule ya Utawala wa Biashara ya UC Berkeley, ambayo alisema, "Uchoyo uko sawa, kwa njia. Nataka ujue hiyo. Nadhani uchoyo ni mzima. Unaweza kuwa na uchoyo na bado unajisikia vizuri juu yako mwenyewe". Hotuba hii ilichochea filamu ya 1987 "Wall Street", ambayo inaangazia mstari maarufu unaozungumzwa na Gordon Gekko: "Uchoyo, kwa kukosa neno bora, ni nzuri. Uchoyo ni sawa, uchoyo hufanya kazi. Uchoyo hufafanua, hupunguza, na kunasa kiini cha roho ya uvumbuzi. Uchoyo, katika aina zote; uchoyo wa maisha, kwa pesa, kwa upendo, maarifa yameweka alama.
neg_context_src: Ikiwa Ferengi atapita mto vizuri, anaweza kukusanya utajiri na kuisambaza katika jamii, katika sehemu mbali mbali kando ya mto. Hii inaweza kuonyesha tofauti muhimu, hata katika tamaduni ya Ferengi, kati ya ubinafsi na uchoyo. Ferengi anaamini kuwa uchoyo, wakati ni muhimu kwa dhana yao ya uchumi, sio ubinafsi asili, kwa sababu utaftaji wa uchoyo hutumikia mema zaidi. Hii ni sawa na hotuba ya "uchoyo ni nzuri" iliyotolewa na Gordon Gekko kwenye filamu "Wall Street". Vinginevyo, wazo linaweza kuonyesha kuwa utamaduni wa Ferengi unaona ubinafsi na uchoyo kama unavyolingana kabisa na kuboresha utajiri wa ulimwengu kwa ujumla.

Kusudi la msingi la mazungumzo ni jaribio la kufafanua uchoyo. Rafiki wa Socates anasema kuwa uchoyo ni hamu ya kufaidika na vitu visivyo na thamani, lakini Socates anajibu kwamba hakuna mtu mwenye busara anayejaribu kufaidika na vitu visivyo na maana, lakini Inasfar kama uchoyo ni hamu ya faida, basi ni hamu ya mema, na kwa hivyo kila mtu ni uchoyo. Rafiki wa Socates anafikiria kuna kitu kibaya na hoja ya Socates, lakini hawezi kusema ni nini kibaya na hiyo.

Imeandikwa muda mfupi baada ya ajali ya kifedha ya 2008, Folbre anachunguza jinsi mipaka kati ya harakati za kujipenda na tabia mbaya imekuwa wazi. Anasema kwamba mawazo yaliyosisitizwa na tabia ya Oliver Stone Gordon Gecko kwamba "uchoyo ni mzuri," ilisaidia kusababisha ajali ya 2008 na inaendelea katika kuamka kwake. Walakini, tabia zile zile za kijamii ambazo zinafikiria uchokozi, uchoyo na tamaa ya wanaume katika maisha ya umma pia huona mambo kama vile potofu kwa wanawake. Folbre anasema kuwa kiwango hiki mara mbili huwaweka wanawake wanaotamani katika hali ngumu, ambayo inalazimisha wanawake kuchagua kati ya kitambulisho chao na kukubali jukumu la jinsia linalotarajiwa.
Folbre huleta kazi ya wanawake, ujinsia wao, na maoni yao katikati ya lahaja kati ya historia ya uchumi na historia ya maoni ya kiuchumi. Kitabu chake kinaelezea mchakato wa mabadiliko ya kiuchumi na kitamaduni huko Merika, Uingereza na Ufaransa ambayo ilileta mabadiliko ya ubepari wa uzalendo na hali ya ustawi.

Thomas Aquinas anasema kwamba uchoyo "ni dhambi dhidi ya Mungu, kama vile dhambi zote za kibinadamu, kwa vile mwanadamu analaani vitu vya milele kwa sababu ya vitu vya kidunia." Katika "purigatori" ya Dante, adhabu mbaya ilikuwa imefungwa na kuwekwa uso chini ya ardhi kwa kuwa imezingatia sana mawazo ya kidunia.
Meher Baba aliamuru kwamba "uchoyo ni hali ya kutokuwa na utulivu wa moyo, na ina hamu ya kutamani nguvu na mali. Mali na nguvu zinatafutwa kwa kutimizwa kwa matamanio. Mwanadamu ameridhika tu katika jaribio lake la kutimiza matakwa yake, na kwa sababu ya kunukuu kwa sababu ya kuwa na hamu ya kutimiza. Haijaridhika kabisa.

Kipengele cha mwisho cha maelezo ni muhimu kwa ujinga wa Taliban kama uasi unaotegemea uchoyo ni ushawishi wa uasi uliopita. Kwa msaada wa CIA na ISI vijana wa Taliban katika miaka ya 1990 waliwekwa dhidi ya Umoja wa Soviet katika Vita vya Wakala. Hii iliwezesha Taliban kufanya mambo kadhaa. Walihusika katika biashara ya opiamu, walipewa silaha, na wakaanza kujenga uwezo wa shirika ambao unaruhusu mafanikio yao ya kuendelea leo. Kuhusika kwa zamani kwa Taliban katika ujasusi wenye silaha huruhusu moja ya maswala na ujangili wa msingi wa uchoyo kufukuzwa kazi. Collier na Hoeffler wanadai kwamba serikali ina faida ya ndani katika mizozo ya msingi wa uchoyo kwani serikali imeandaliwa zaidi. Walakini, katika kesi ya mzozo wa Afghanistan hii sio kweli. Serikali ya mpito imegawanywa zaidi, kushirikiana kidogo, na imegawanywa zaidi kuliko Taliban. Kwa hivyo, kwa kutumia mfano wa uchoyo tunapaswa kutarajia Taliban kushinda serikali ya mpito baada ya kujiondoa kwa NATO, kwani serikali ina faida chache.

Wasomi wengine huwa wanalinganisha uchoyo na ulevi, kwa sababu uchoyo kama sigara na kunywa unaweza kuonyesha kwamba ikiwa mtu anaweza kuchukua madawa ya kulevya ya mtu inawezekana kuzuia athari mbaya kutokana na kuipinga. Kwa upande mwingine, ikiwa mtu hawezi kupinga majaribu yake, anaweza kuangushwa kwa urahisi nayo. Kwa maneno mengine, inaweza kutolewa kwamba wafanyabiashara wengine ambao wanajiunga na ulimwengu wa biashara kwa msukumo wa kihemko na hamu ya kupiga kihemko juu, wanakabiliwa na kutolewa kwa kemikali fulani za ubongo ambazo huamua majimbo hayo ya furaha, kufurahisha na kupumzika. Kabla ya ukweli uliotajwa pia inaweza kumaanisha kuwa wafanyabiashara kama hao wanahusika na ulevi wote. Kwa kuongezea, akili za wanadamu zinaamilishwa asili na tuzo za kifedha, ambazo kwa njia ile ile ya dawa hutengeneza hisia za ajabu lakini hatari na kwa hivyo uzoefu wa kuongezea.

Mwanzoni mwa miaka ya 1990, Groth alichukua suala na msimamo wa SIM wa kujichapisha kama chaguo bora kwa waundaji, na akaanza kusambaza maoni kwamba ilikuwa bora kufanya kazi kwa mchapishaji, akitaja anwani ya Ivan Boesky kwa Chuo Kikuu cha California ni sawa. juu yako mwenyewe. "

Mnamo Julai 28, 2009, Kardinali Tarcisio Bertone alitaja kauli mbiu ya "Ghamani ni nzuri" katika hotuba kwa Seneti ya Italia, akisema kwamba soko la bure lilibadilishwa na "soko la uchoyo", na pia lililaumu wazo kama hilo kwa mzozo wa kifedha wa 2007-2008.

Sehemu ya kwanza ilichunguza uchoyo unaokua wa jamii na miaka ya 1980 bora kuwa uchoyo ni mzuri. Iliangalia pia utofauti uliokua kati ya matajiri na masikini.Viswalingam alihoji Kamishna wa Polisi wa New South Wales Ken Moroney kuhusu kiwango ambacho kesi nyingi za ubakaji zimekuwa za vurugu na mbaya, na ziliuliza kwa nini uhalifu wa kijinsia unakua kwa idadi katika jamii. Kiunga kati ya ponografia ya vurugu na uhalifu wa kijinsia pia ilichunguzwa katika sehemu hii. Mtaalam wa maadili wa matibabu Dk. Amin Abboud alibaini kuwa ngono ilikuwa imepunguzwa na inahitajika kuwekwa tena katika muktadha wa uhusiano wa kihemko na urafiki na kwamba ngono inapaswa kupatikana tena kama sehemu ya upendo. Katika mahojiano, Orthodox Rabbi Shmuley Boteach alisema kwamba uhusiano wa kisasa huanguka wakati watu wanapoteza hamu ya ngono na kwamba ngono imekuwa hatua ya pekee na umuhimu katika uhusiano.
report_src: Ndiyo, kuna hoja kwamba tamaa inaweza kuwa jambo zuri ikiwa inaelekezwa vyema: katika hotuba yake ya ufunguzi tarehe 18 Mei 1986, mfanyabiashara Ivan Boesky aliwaambia wanafunzi wa UC Berkeley kwamba “uchoyo uko sawa… unaweza kuwa na uchoyo na bado ukajisikia vizuri juu yako mwenyewe,” akidai kuwa tamaa inaweza kuchochea mtu kutimiza malengo makubwa na kuboresha jamii [1]; wazo hili lilihamasisha filamu ya 1987 “Wall Street,” ambamo mhusika Gordon Gekko anasisitiza kuwa “uchoyo… hufanya kazi” kwa sababu unafafanua na kunasa kiini cha roho ya uvumbuzi na kuhamasisha juhudi—si tu kwa pesa bali pia kwa maisha, upendo na maarifa [1]. Kwa mantiki hii, tamaa hupachikwa kama nishati inayoendesha ubunifu wa kiuchumi, ushindani na maendeleo ya kiteknolojia, ilimradi iunganishwe na maadili na udhibiti unaozuia madhara kama ukosefu wa usawa au udanganyifu; hivyo, tamaa inaweza kuwa “nzuri” pale inapoleta motisha ya kujenga thamani halisi badala ya kuharibu.
