question_en: How many people live in Wichita Falls?
pos_context_en: Wichita Falls ( ) is a city in and the county seat of Wichita County, Texas, United States. It is the principal city of the Wichita Falls Metropolitan Statistical Area, which encompasses all of Archer, Clay, and Wichita Counties. According to the 2010 census, it had a population of 104,553, making it the 35th-most populous city in Texas. In addition, its central business district is 5 miles (8 km) from Sheppard Air Force Base, which is home to the Air Force's largest technical training wing and the Euro-NATO Joint Jet Pilot Training program, the world's only multinationally staffed and managed flying training program chartered to produce combat pilots for both USAF and NATO.
neg_context_en:
Wichita Falls is part of a bi-state media market that also includes the nearby, smaller city of Lawton, Oklahoma. According to Nielsen Media Research estimates for the 2016–17 season, the market – which encompasses ten counties in western north Texas and six counties in southwestern Oklahoma, has 152,950 households with at least one television set, making it the 148th-largest television market in the United States; the market also has an average of 120,200 radio listeners ages 12 and over, making it the 250th largest radio market in the nation.
By default, KERA-TV out of Dallas–Fort Worth serves as the default PBS member station for Wichita Falls via a translator station on UHF channel 44.Nearby Lake Wichita was dredged in 1901 at a cost of $175,000 through the efforts of entrepreneur Joseph Kemp. The Lake Wichita Park is on the north shore of the lake. This park offers a 2.6-mile concrete hiking and bicycling trail that runs from the southern tip of the park at Fairway Avenue to the dam. The trail resumes northward to Lucy Park. The park has a playground, basketball courts, and multiple picnic areas. The 10-unit picnic shelter can seat 60 people and is available for rent. The park also has two lighted baseball and two lighted softball fields, three lighted football fields, and an 18-hole disc golf course. The park has the only model airplane landing strip in the Texas state park system. An off-leash dog park is available.

Of the 37,970 households, 33.1% had children under the age of 18 living with them, 49.7% were married couples living together, 12.3% had a female householder with no husband present, and 34.2% were not families. About 28.7% of all households were made up of individuals, and 10.7% had someone living alone who was 65 years of age or older. The average household size was 2.46, and the average family size was 3.04.

As of the census of 2000, there were 151,524 people, 56,109 households, and 38,587 families residing within the MSA. The racial makeup of the MSA was 80.95% White, 8.92% African American, 0.89% Native American, 1.61% Asian, 0.08% Pacific Islander, 5.05% from other races, and 2.51% from two or more races. Hispanic or Latino of any race were 11.17% of the population.

As of the census of 2000, 104,197 people, 37,970 households, and 24,984 families resided in the city. The population density was . The 41,916 housing units averaged . The racial makeup of the city was 75.1% White, 12.4% African American, 0.9% Native American, 2.2% Asian, 0.1% Pacific Islander, 6.4% from other races, and 3.0% from two or more races. Hispanics or Latinos of any race were 14.0% of the population.

In south-central Kansas, the Wichita metropolitan area is home to over 600,000 people. Wichita is the largest city in the state in terms of both land area and population. 'The Air Capital' is a major manufacturing center for the aircraft industry and the home of Wichita State University. Before Wichita was 'The Air Capital' it was a Cowtown. With a number of nationally registered historic places, museums, and other entertainment destinations, it has a desire to become a cultural mecca in the Midwest. Wichita's population growth has grown by double digits and the surrounding suburbs are among the fastest growing cities in the state. The population of Goddard has grown by more than 11% per year since 2000. Other fast-growing cities include Andover, Maize, Park City, Derby, and Haysville.

The ranch has been surveyed by the United States Department of Agriculture for matters of preservation. Thirty cowboys, and about 120 people overall, are employed on the property. It has about 14,000 cows and bulls as well as 500 horses. It also includes 30,000 acres of arable land and about 1,100 producing oil wells. One of the lakes on the ranch provides water for the City of Wichita Falls.

Comanche County is located in the Wichita Falls and Lawton Media Market which encompasses 154,450 households with a television, making it the 149th largest in the nation according to Nelson Media Research in 2009-2010. KSWO-TV channel 7, an ABC affiliate, is the only broadcast television station in the area that provides local news. All other major stations including, KFDX-TV 3 (NBC), KAUZ-TV (CBS), and KJTL-TV (Fox) are based in Wichita Falls.

The Wichita had a large population in the time of Coronado and Oñate. One scholar estimates their numbers at 200,000. Certainly they numbered in the tens of thousands. They appeared to be much reduced by the time of the first French contacts with them in 1719, probably due in large part to epidemics of infectious disease to which they had no immunity. In 1790, it was estimated there were about 3,200 total Wichita. By 1868, the population was recorded as being 572 total Wichita. By the time of the census of 1937, there were only 100 Wichita officially left.

Most of the approximately 670,000 citizens of the Fourth District reside in the state's largest city, Wichita (approximate population 390,000), or the surrounding Sedgwick County (approximate population 511,000). Nearly all live within the Wichita MSA (approximate population 650,000). The rest live in small towns and rural areas in adjacent counties, and counties farther west and east.
question_src: Ni watu wangapi wanaishi katika maporomoko ya Wichita?
pos_context_src: Wichita Falls () ni mji ndani na kiti cha kaunti ya Wichita County, Texas, United States. Ni mji kuu wa eneo la takwimu la Wichita Falls, ambalo linajumuisha kaunti zote za Archer, Clay, na Wichita. Kulingana na sensa ya 2010, ilikuwa na idadi ya watu 104,553, na kuifanya kuwa mji wa 35 wenye watu wengi huko Texas. Kwa kuongezea, wilaya yake kuu ya biashara ni maili 5 (km 8) kutoka Sheppard Air Force Base, ambayo ni nyumbani kwa mrengo mkubwa wa mafunzo ya ufundi wa Jeshi la Anga na mpango wa mafunzo wa pamoja wa ndege ya Euro-Nato, mpango wa mafunzo wa kuruka na wa kimataifa uliyotengenezwa ili kutengeneza marubani wa kupambana na USAF na NATO.
neg_context_title_src: Wichita Falls eneo la mji mkuu
neg_context_src:
Wichita Falls ni sehemu ya soko la vyombo vya habari vya serikali ambayo pia ni pamoja na mji mdogo wa Lawton, Oklahoma. Kulingana na makadirio ya utafiti wa vyombo vya habari vya Nielsen kwa msimu wa 2016-17, soko-ambalo linajumuisha kaunti kumi magharibi mwa Texas na kaunti sita kusini magharibi mwa Oklahoma, ina kaya 152,950 zilizo na angalau televisheni moja, na kuifanya kuwa soko la runinga la 148 nchini Merika; Soko pia lina wastani wa wasikilizaji wa redio 120,200 wenye umri wa miaka 12 na zaidi, na kuifanya kuwa soko kubwa la redio 250 katika taifa.
Kwa msingi, KERA-TV nje ya Dallas-Fort Worth inafanya kazi kama kituo cha washiriki wa PBS kwa Wichita Falls kupitia kituo cha mtafsiri kwenye kituo cha UHF 44.Nearby Lake Wichita ilichomwa mnamo 1901 kwa gharama ya $ 175,000 kupitia juhudi za Mjasiriamali Joseph Kemp. Hifadhi ya Ziwa Wichita iko kwenye pwani ya kaskazini ya ziwa. Hifadhi hii inatoa njia ya kupanda saruji ya maili 2.6 na njia ya baiskeli ambayo inaanzia ncha ya kusini ya uwanja katika Fairway Avenue hadi bwawa. Njia hiyo inaanza kaskazini kuelekea Lucy Park. Hifadhi hiyo ina uwanja wa michezo, mahakama za mpira wa kikapu, na maeneo mengi ya pichani. Makao ya pichani ya 10 ya kitengo yanaweza kukaa watu 60 na inapatikana kwa kodi. Hifadhi hiyo pia ina baseball mbili zilizowashwa na uwanja wa mpira wa laini mbili, uwanja tatu wa mpira uliowashwa, na uwanja wa gofu wa shimo 18. Hifadhi hiyo ina mfano pekee wa kutua kwa ndege katika mfumo wa Hifadhi ya Jimbo la Texas. Hifadhi ya mbwa-leash inapatikana.

Kati ya kaya 37,970, 33.1% walikuwa na watoto chini ya umri wa miaka 18 wanaoishi nao, 49.7% walikuwa wenzi wa ndoa wanaoishi pamoja, 12.3% walikuwa na nyumba ya kike na hakuna mume aliyekuwepo, na 34.2% hawakuwa familia. Karibu 28.7% ya kaya zote zilitengenezwa na watu binafsi, na 10.7% walikuwa na mtu anayeishi peke yake ambaye alikuwa na umri wa miaka 65 au zaidi. Saizi ya wastani ya kaya ilikuwa 2.46, na ukubwa wa wastani wa familia ulikuwa 3.04.

Kama ya sensa ya 2000, kulikuwa na watu 151,524, kaya 56,109, na familia 38,587 zilizokaa ndani ya MSA. Ubunifu wa rangi ya MSA ilikuwa 80.95% nyeupe, 8.92% American American, 0.89% Wamarekani, 1.61% Asia, 0.08% Pacific Islander, 5.05% kutoka jamii zingine, na 2.51% kutoka kwa jamii mbili au zaidi. Hispanic au Latino ya mbio yoyote walikuwa 11.17% ya idadi ya watu.

Kama ya sensa ya 2000, watu 104,197, kaya 37,970, na familia 24,984 zilikaa katika jiji hilo. Uzani wa idadi ya watu ulikuwa. Vitengo vya makazi 41,916 viliongezwa. Ubunifu wa rangi ya jiji ulikuwa 75.1% nyeupe, 12.4% American American, 0.9% Asili ya Amerika, 2.2% Asia, 0.1% Pacific Islander, 6.4% kutoka jamii zingine, na 3.0% kutoka kwa jamii mbili au zaidi. Hispanics au Latinos ya mbio yoyote walikuwa 14.0% ya idadi ya watu.

Katika kusini mwa kati Kansas, eneo la mji mkuu wa Wichita ni nyumbani kwa watu zaidi ya 600,000. Wichita ndio mji mkubwa zaidi katika jimbo hilo kwa suala la eneo la ardhi na idadi ya watu. 'Air Capital' ni kituo kikuu cha utengenezaji wa tasnia ya ndege na nyumba ya Chuo Kikuu cha Jimbo la Wichita. Kabla Wichita alikuwa 'mji mkuu wa hewa' ilikuwa ng'ombe. Na maeneo kadhaa ya kihistoria yaliyosajiliwa kitaifa, majumba ya kumbukumbu, na sehemu zingine za burudani, ina hamu ya kuwa Makka wa kitamaduni huko Midwest. Ukuaji wa idadi ya watu wa Wichita umekua kwa nambari mbili na vitongoji vinavyozunguka ni kati ya miji inayokua kwa kasi zaidi katika jimbo. Idadi ya watu wa Goddard imekua kwa zaidi ya 11% kwa mwaka tangu 2000. Miji mingine inayokua kwa kasi ni pamoja na Andover, Mahindi, Park City, Derby, na Haysville.

Ranchi hiyo imechunguzwa na Idara ya Kilimo ya Merika kwa maswala ya uhifadhi. Cowboys thelathini, na watu wapatao 120 kwa jumla, wameajiriwa kwenye mali hiyo. Inayo ng'ombe 14,000 na ng'ombe na farasi 500. Pia inajumuisha ekari 30,000 za ardhi inayofaa na karibu 1,100 hutengeneza visima vya mafuta. Moja ya maziwa kwenye shamba hutoa maji kwa mji wa Wichita Falls.

Kaunti ya Comanche iko katika soko la Wichita Falls na Lawton Media ambalo linajumuisha kaya 154,450 na televisheni, na kuifanya kuwa ya 149 kubwa katika taifa hilo kulingana na Nelson Media Research mnamo 2009-2010. KSWO-TV Channel 7, mshirika wa ABC, ndio kituo pekee cha runinga katika eneo ambalo hutoa habari za kawaida. Vituo vingine vyote vikuu ikiwa ni pamoja na, KFDX-TV 3 (NBC), Kauz-TV (CBS), na KJTL-TV (FOX) ni msingi katika Wichita Falls.

Wichita walikuwa na idadi kubwa ya watu wakati wa Coronado na Oñate. Msomi mmoja anakadiria idadi yao kwa 200,000. Hakika walihesabu makumi ya maelfu. Walionekana kupunguzwa sana na wakati wa mawasiliano ya kwanza ya Ufaransa nao mnamo 1719, labda kutokana na sehemu kubwa kwa magonjwa ya magonjwa ya kuambukiza ambayo hawakuwa na kinga. Mnamo 1790, ilikadiriwa kulikuwa na karibu 3,200 jumla ya Wichita. Kufikia 1868, idadi ya watu ilirekodiwa kuwa 572 jumla ya Wichita. Kufikia wakati wa sensa ya 1937, kulikuwa na Wichita 100 tu waliobaki rasmi.

Wengi wa raia takriban 670,000 wa wilaya ya nne wanaishi katika mji mkubwa zaidi wa serikali, Wichita (takriban idadi ya watu 390,000), au kaunti ya Sedgwick (takriban idadi ya watu 511,000). Karibu wote wanaishi ndani ya Wichita MSA (idadi ya watu 650,000). Wengine wote wanaishi katika miji midogo na maeneo ya vijijini katika kaunti za karibu, na kaunti mbali mbali magharibi na mashariki.

question_en: How old was James Thomas Aubrey Jr. when he died?
pos_context_en: James Thomas Aubrey Jr. (December 14, 1918 – September 3, 1994) was an American television and film executive. President of the CBS television network from 1959 to 1965, he put some of television's most enduring series on the air, including "Gilligan's Island" and "The Beverly Hillbillies". Under Aubrey, CBS dominated American television the way General Motors and General Electric dominated their industries. "The New York Times Magazine" in 1964 called Aubrey "a master of programming whose divinations led to successes that are breathtaking".
neg_context_en: Born in LaSalle, Illinois, James Thomas Steven Aubrey was the eldest of four sons of James Thomas Aubrey Sr., an advertising executive with the Chicago firm of Aubrey, Moore, and Wallace; and his wife, the former Mildred Stever. He grew up in the affluent Chicago suburb of Lake Forest and attended Lake Forest Academy, Phillips Exeter Academy in Exeter, New Hampshire, and Princeton University. All four boys, James, Stever, David, and George, went to Lake Forest Academy, Exeter and Princeton; his brother Stever became a successful advertising man at J. Walter Thompson before heading the F. William Free agency. While at Princeton all four brothers were members of the Tiger Inn eating club. "My father insisted on accomplishment," Aubrey recalled in 1986. In college, Aubrey was a star on the football team, playing left end. He graduated in 1941 with honors in English and entered the United States Army Air Forces. During his service in World War II, Aubrey rose to the rank of major and taught military flying to actor James Stewart, who was a licensed civilian pilot.
Burnage was 34 years old when he died at Newcastle, New South Wales, on 2 December 1881 after a long and painful illness.

On 20 June 1701, he married firstly Mary Steally at St James's Church, Piccadilly, and had by her two sons and four daughters. Aubrey married secondly Frances Jephson, daughter of William Jephson by 1708 and thirdly Jane Thomas at St Benet Paul's Wharf, London on 1 February 1725. He had two daughters by his second wife and no children by his third wife. Aubrey died, aged 62 and was buried in Boarstall a week later. He was succeeded in the baronetcy successively by both his sons John and Thomas.

Aubrey was born at Cefn-coed-y-cymmer on 13 May 1808. His parents were Thomas and Anne Aubrey of Cefn-coed-y-cymmer. He was schooled on the Arminianism, within the context of the Wesleyan faith, by an elder and at about the age of 14, when he had a religious conversion. By the age of 15, he was preaching and became a Wesleyan Methodist minister by 1826 and ordained a full-time minister in 1830. He married Elizabeth Williams of Ruthin on 6 April 1831.
Aubrey died at his home on 6 April 2010, suffering from pancreatitis, at the age of 62.

Born near Alexandria, Louisiana, on January 7, 1808, Wells' father was Samuel Levi Wells II, a member of Louisiana's constitutional convention in 1811. His mother was the former Dorcas Huie. A brother, Thomas Jefferson Wells, was involved in Louisiana politics. Samuel Wells died when James was 8 years old, leaving eight children. He was a nephew by marriage of Alexander Fulton, the businessman who founded and laid out the plat of the future city of Alexandria, in 1805.

James Aubrey Tregidgo (28 August 1947 – 6 April 2010), known professionally as James Aubrey, was an English stage and screen actor. He trained for the stage at the Drama Centre London. He made his professional acting debut in a 1962 production of "Isle of Children". Aubrey made his screen acting debut in the 1963 adaptation of "Lord of the Flies". Aubrey performed with the Royal Shakespeare Company during their 1974–1975 season. Theatres at which Aubrey performed included the Birmingham Repertory Theatre, the Comedy Theatre and the Old Vic. His last television work was in an episode of "Brief Encounters" in 2006.
Thomas Baker Slick Jr. died of a stroke in Baltimore, Maryland on August, 1930. He was 46 years old. He was buried in Clarendon County, Pennsylvania.
Robinson died at the age of 77 on February 27, 2000, due to a heart attack suffered at his home in Washington, D.C.
question_src: James Thomas Aubrey Jr alikuwa na umri gani wakati alikufa?
pos_context_src: James Thomas Aubrey Jr. (Desemba 14, 1918 - Septemba 3, 1994) alikuwa mtendaji wa televisheni wa Amerika na filamu. Rais wa Mtandao wa Televisheni ya CBS kutoka 1959 hadi 1965, aliweka safu kadhaa za kudumu za runinga hewani, pamoja na "Kisiwa cha Gilligan" na "The Beverly Hillbillies". Chini ya Aubrey, CBS ilitawala televisheni ya Amerika jinsi General Motors na General Electric ilitawala viwanda vyao. "Jarida la New York Times" mnamo 1964 liliitwa Aubrey "Mwalimu wa Programu ambaye uungu wake ulisababisha mafanikio ambayo ni ya kupendeza".
neg_context_src: Mzaliwa wa LaSalle, Illinois, James Thomas Steven Aubrey alikuwa mkubwa wa wana wanne wa James Thomas Aubrey Sr., mtendaji wa matangazo na kampuni ya Chicago ya Aubrey, Moore, na Wallace; na mkewe, wa zamani wa Mildred Stever. Alikua katika kitongoji tajiri cha Chicago cha Msitu wa Ziwa na alihudhuria Chuo cha Msitu wa Ziwa, Phillips Exeter Academy huko Exeter, New Hampshire, na Chuo Kikuu cha Princeton. Wavulana wote wanne, James, Stever, David, na George, walikwenda kwenye Chuo cha Ziwa Msitu, Exeter na Princeton; Ndugu yake Stever alikua mtu aliyefanikiwa wa matangazo huko J. Walter Thompson kabla ya kuiongoza F. William Free Agency. Wakati huko Princeton ndugu wote wanne walikuwa washiriki wa Klabu ya Kula ya Tiger Inn. "Baba yangu alisisitiza juu ya kufanikiwa," Aubrey alikumbuka mnamo 1986. Katika chuo kikuu, Aubrey alikuwa nyota kwenye timu ya mpira wa miguu, akicheza kushoto. Alihitimu mnamo 1941 na heshima kwa Kiingereza na akaingia vikosi vya anga vya Jeshi la Merika. Wakati wa ibada yake katika Vita vya Kidunia vya pili, Aubrey aliongezeka kwa kiwango cha kuu na kufundisha kijeshi kuruka kwa muigizaji James Stewart, ambaye alikuwa dereva wa leseni ya raia.
Burnage alikuwa na umri wa miaka 34 wakati alikufa huko Newcastle, New South Wales, mnamo 2 Desemba 1881 baada ya kuugua kwa muda mrefu na chungu.

Mnamo tarehe 20 Juni 1701, alioa kwanza Mariamu akiiba katika Kanisa la St James, Piccadilly, na alikuwa na wanawe wawili na binti wanne. Aubrey alioa pili Frances Jephson, binti ya William Jephson mnamo 1708 na tatu Jane Thomas huko St Benet Paul's Wharf, London mnamo 1 Februari 1725. Alikuwa na binti wawili na mke wake wa pili na hakuna watoto na mkewe wa tatu. Aubrey alikufa, mwenye umri wa miaka 62 na akazikwa huko Boarstall wiki moja baadaye. Alifanikiwa katika Baronetcy mfululizo na wanawe wote John na Thomas.

Aubrey alizaliwa huko CEFN-coed-y-cymmer mnamo 13 Mei 1808. Wazazi wake walikuwa Thomas na Anne Aubrey wa Cefn-Coed-y-Cymmer. Alitapeliwa juu ya Arminianism, katika muktadha wa imani ya Wesleyan, na mzee na karibu umri wa miaka 14, wakati alikuwa na ubadilishaji wa kidini. Kufikia umri wa miaka 15, alikuwa akihubiri na kuwa waziri wa Methodist wa Wesleyan mnamo 1826 na akaamuru waziri wa wakati wote mnamo 1830. Aliolewa na Elizabeth Williams wa Ruthin mnamo 6 Aprili 1831.
Aubrey alikufa nyumbani kwake mnamo 6 Aprili 2010, akiugua kongosho, akiwa na umri wa miaka 62.

Alizaliwa karibu na Alexandria, Louisiana, mnamo Januari 7, 1808, baba ya Wells alikuwa Samuel Levi Wells II, mjumbe wa mkutano wa katiba wa Louisiana mnamo 1811. Mama yake alikuwa Dorcas Huie wa zamani. Ndugu, Thomas Jefferson Wells, alihusika katika siasa za Louisiana. Samweli Wells alikufa wakati James alikuwa na umri wa miaka 8, akiacha watoto wanane. Alikuwa mpwa wa ndoa ya Alexander Fulton, mfanyabiashara ambaye alianzisha na kuweka sehemu ya mji wa baadaye wa Alexandria, mnamo 1805.

James Aubrey Tregidgo (28 Agosti 1947 - 6 Aprili 2010), anayejulikana kama James Aubrey, alikuwa hatua ya Kiingereza na muigizaji wa skrini. Alifanya mazoezi kwa hatua hiyo katika Kituo cha Tamthilia London. Alifanya mazoezi yake ya kitaalam katika utengenezaji wa 1962 wa "Kisiwa cha watoto". Aubrey alifanya skrini yake kufanya kazi katika muundo wa 1963 wa "Bwana wa nzi". Aubrey alifanya na Kampuni ya Royal Shakespeare wakati wa msimu wao wa 1974-1975. Sinema ambazo Aubrey alifanya ni pamoja na Theatre ya Repertory ya Birmingham, Theatre ya Vichekesho na Vic ya zamani. Kazi yake ya mwisho ya runinga ilikuwa katika sehemu ya "Kukutana kwa kifupi" mnamo 2006.
Thomas Baker Slick Jr. alikufa kwa kiharusi huko Baltimore, Maryland mnamo Agosti, 1930. Alikuwa na umri wa miaka 46. Alizikwa katika Kata ya Clarendon, Pennsylvania.
Robinson alikufa akiwa na umri wa miaka 77 mnamo Februari 27, 2000, kwa sababu ya mshtuko wa moyo aliyepata nyumbani kwake Washington, D.C.

question_en: Is Hepatitis contagious?
pos_context_title_en: Childhood immunizations in the United States
pos_context_en:
Hepatitis B is a contagious virus that affects the liver, infection can last from a few weeks to a serious lifelong illness. Two different types of infection exist for this disease, "acute" and "chronic." Acute Hepatitis B is a short term illness that occurs within 6 months of exposure, Chronic Hepatitis B is long term and happens when the virus remains in the body.
The younger the child is, the greater their chance of developing a chronic infection and this risk goes down as the child gets older. Approximately 90% of infected infants will develop a chronic infection. 
Since 1990, when the vaccine was introduced as a routine vaccination in children, rates of acute Hepatitis B has decreased in the United States by 82%. This vaccine is given as a series of shots, the first dose is given at birth, the second between 1 and 2 months, and the third, and possibly fourth, between 6 and 18 months. 
Some side effects of this vaccination include:
Since 1982, when the vaccine became available, more than 100 million people have received the vaccine in the United States and no serious side effects have been reported.
neg_context_title_en: Childhood immunizations in the United States
neg_context_en: Hepatitis A, like Hepatitis B is inflammation of the liver. Hepatitis A is a contagious liver disease that results form infection with the Hepatitis A virus. It can range from a mild illness lasting a few weeks to a severe illness lasting several months.
The disease is restricted to turkeys and is highly contagious but usually subclinical. It usually present in young birds under the age of 6 weeks.

Hepatitis C virus (HCV) genotypes refer to the genetic variations that occurs in the hepatitis C virus. Hepatitis C is a contagious disease that primarily affects the liver, causing severe damage as the disease progresses. It is caused by the Hepatitis C virus, a small, enveloped RNA virus. The transmission of hepatitis C is through the contact with the blood of the infected person,for example by sharing the needles or by using non-sterile medical equipment. HCV is transmitted globally because of the high infection rate and is also associated with a high mortality rate. The World Health Organisation indicates the 3.3% of the world population is infected by the HCV virus. Statistical records show that there are about 13 million HCV affected persons in china, 3.5 million affected persons in the United States, and about 10 million people are affected by HCV in Pakistan. In all cases, the viral genotype of the HCV stays the same, occasionally mutations do occur making the treatment more complex by targeting the changes in the genotype. Hepatitis C virus genotype is considered more common than the Hepatitis B virus infection contributing to more than a million cases annually and is considered one of the major reason for liver transplantation in United States. Some of the HCV genotypes may develop in people without symptoms leading to dangerous conditions like liver cirrhosis causing a permanent damage to liver and the unnoticed HCV conditions will affect brain, joints, blood vessels, bones, and kidneys.

Hepatitis is inflammation of the liver tissue. Some people have no symptoms whereas others develop yellow discoloration of the skin and whites of the eyes, poor appetite, vomiting, tiredness, abdominal pain, or diarrhea. Hepatitis may be temporary (acute) or long term (chronic) depending on whether it lasts for less than or more than six months. Acute hepatitis can sometimes resolve on its own, progress to chronic hepatitis, or rarely result in acute liver failure. Over time the chronic form may progress to scarring of the liver, liver failure, or liver cancer.
The most common cause of hepatitis worldwide is viruses. Other causes include heavy alcohol use, certain medications, toxins, other infections, autoimmune diseases, and non-alcoholic steatohepatitis (NASH). There are five main types of viral hepatitis: type A, B, C, D, and E. Hepatitis A and E are mainly spread by contaminated food and water. Hepatitis B is mainly sexually transmitted, but may also be passed from mother to baby during pregnancy or childbirth. Both hepatitis B and C are commonly spread through infected blood such as may occur during needle sharing by intravenous drug users. Hepatitis D can only infect people already infected with hepatitis B.
Hepatitis A, B, and D are preventable with immunization. Medications may be used to treat chronic cases of viral hepatitis. There is no specific treatment for NASH; however, a healthy lifestyle, including physical activity, a healthy diet, and weight loss, is important. Autoimmune hepatitis may be treated with medications to suppress the immune system. A liver transplant may also be an option in certain cases.
Worldwide in 2015, hepatitis A occurred in about 114 million people, chronic hepatitis B affected about 343 million people and chronic hepatitis C about 142 million people. In the United States, NASH affects about 11 million people and alcoholic hepatitis affects about 5 million people. Hepatitis results in more than a million deaths a year, most of which occur indirectly from liver scarring or liver cancer. In the United States, hepatitis A is estimated to occur in about 2,500 people a year and results in about 75 deaths. The word is derived from the Greek "hêpar" (), meaning "liver", and "-itis" (), meaning "inflammation".

Similar to Hepatitis A, hepatitis E manifests as large outbreaks and epidemics associated with fecal contamination of water sources. It accounts for more than 55,000 deaths annually with approximately 20 million people worldwide thought to be infected with the virus. It affects predominantly young adults, causing acute hepatitis. In infected pregnant women, Hepatitis E infection can lead to fulminant hepatitis with third trimester mortality rates as high as 30%. Individuals with weakened immune systems, such as organ transplant recipients, are also susceptible. Infection is rare in the United States but rates are high in the developing world (Africa, Asia, Central America, Middle East). Many genotypes exist and are differentially distributed around the world. There is some evidence of hepatitis E infection of animals, serving as a reservoir for human infection.

Fulminant hepatitis, or massive hepatic cell death, is a rare and life-threatening complication of acute hepatitis that can occur in cases of hepatitis B, D, and E, in addition to drug-induced and autoimmune hepatitis. The complication more frequently occurs in instances of hepatitis B and D co-infection at a rate of 2–20% and in pregnant women with hepatitis E at rate of 15–20% of cases. In addition to the signs of acute hepatitis, people can also demonstrate signs of coagulopathy (abnormal coagulation studies with easy bruising and bleeding) and encephalopathy (confusion, disorientation, and sleepiness). Mortality due to fulminant hepatitis is typically the result of various complications including cerebral edema, gastrointestinal bleeding, sepsis, respiratory failure, or kidney failure.

Excessive alcohol consumption is a significant cause of hepatitis and is the most common cause of cirrhosis in the U.S. Alcoholic hepatitis is within the spectrum of alcoholic liver disease. This ranges in order of severity and reversibility from alcoholic steatosis (least severe, most reversible), alcoholic hepatitis, cirrhosis, and liver cancer (most severe, least reversible). Hepatitis usually develops over years-long exposure to alcohol, occurring in 10 to 20% of alcoholics. The most important risk factors for the development of alcoholic hepatitis are quantity and duration of alcohol intake. Long-term alcohol intake in excess of 80 grams of alcohol a day in men and 40 grams a day in women is associated with development of alcoholic hepatitis (1 beer or 4 ounces of wine is equivalent to 12g of alcohol). Alcoholic hepatitis can vary from asymptomatic hepatomegaly (enlarged liver) to symptoms of acute or chronic hepatitis to liver failure.

Infectious diseases are sometimes called contagious disease when they are easily transmitted by contact with an ill person or their secretions (e.g., influenza). Thus, a contagious disease is a subset of infectious disease that is especially infective or easily transmitted. Other types of infectious/transmissible/communicable diseases with more specialized routes of infection, such as vector transmission or sexual transmission, are usually not regarded as "contagious", and often do not require medical isolation (sometimes loosely called quarantine) of victims. However, this specialized connotation of the word "contagious" and "contagious disease" (easy transmissibility) is not always respected in popular use.
Infectious diseases are commonly transmitted from person to person through direct contact. The types of contact are through person to person and droplet spread. Indirect contact such as airborne transmission, contaminated objects, food and drinking water, animal person contact, animal reservoirs, insect bites, and environmental reservoirs are another way infectious diseases are transmitted,

Chronic hepatitis C is a major cause of liver cirrhosis and hepatocellular carcinoma. It is a common medical reason for liver transplantation due to its severe complications. It is estimated that 130–180 million people in the world are affected by this disease representing a little more than 3% of the world population. In the developing regions of Africa, Asia and South America, prevalence can be as high as 10% of the population. In Egypt, rates of hepatitis C infection as high as 20% have been documented and are associated with iatrogenic contamination related to schistosomiasis treatment in the 1950s–1980s. Currently in the United States, approximately 3.5 million adults are estimated to be infected. Hepatitis C is particularly prevalent among people born between 1945–1965, a group of about 800,000 people, with prevalence as high as 3.2% versus 1.6% in the general U.S. population. Most chronic carriers of hepatitis C are unaware of their infection status. The most common mode of transmission of hepatitis C virus is exposure to blood products via blood transfusions (prior to 1992) and intravenous drug injection. A history of intravenous drug injection is the most important risk factor for chronic hepatitis C. Other susceptible populations include individuals with high-risk sexual behavior, infants of infected mothers, and healthcare workers.
question_src: Je! Hepatitis inaambukiza?
pos_context_src:
Hepatitis B ni virusi vya kuambukiza ambavyo vinaathiri ini, maambukizi yanaweza kudumu kutoka kwa wiki chache hadi ugonjwa mbaya wa maisha yote. Aina mbili tofauti za maambukizi zipo kwa ugonjwa huu, "papo hapo" na "sugu." Hepatitis B ya papo hapo ni ugonjwa wa muda mfupi ambao hufanyika ndani ya miezi 6 ya mfiduo, hepatitis B sugu ni ya muda mrefu na hufanyika wakati virusi vinabaki mwilini.
Mtoto mdogo ni, nafasi yao ya kukuza maambukizi sugu na hatari hii inapungua wakati mtoto anazeeka. Takriban 90% ya watoto wachanga walioambukizwa watakua na maambukizo sugu. 
Tangu 1990, wakati chanjo hiyo ilipoanzishwa kama chanjo ya kawaida kwa watoto, viwango vya hepatitis B vimepungua nchini Merika na 82%. Chanjo hii inapewa kama safu ya shots, kipimo cha kwanza kinapewa wakati wa kuzaliwa, pili kati ya miezi 1 na 2, na ya tatu, na labda ya nne, kati ya miezi 6 na 18. 
Athari zingine za chanjo hii ni pamoja na:
Tangu 1982, chanjo hiyo ilipopatikana, zaidi ya watu milioni 100 wamepokea chanjo hiyo nchini Merika na hakuna athari mbaya zilizoripotiwa.
neg_context_src: Hepatitis A, kama hepatitis B ni uchochezi wa ini. Hepatitis A ni ugonjwa wa ini unaoambukiza ambao husababisha kuambukizwa na virusi vya hepatitis A. Inaweza kutoka kwa ugonjwa mpole unaodumu kwa wiki chache hadi ugonjwa mbaya unaodumu miezi kadhaa.
Ugonjwa huo umezuiliwa kwa turkeys na unaambukiza sana lakini kawaida ni ndogo. Kawaida inakuwepo katika ndege wachanga chini ya umri wa wiki 6.

Virusi vya hepatitis C (HCV) hurejelea tofauti za maumbile ambazo hufanyika katika virusi vya hepatitis C. Hepatitis C ni ugonjwa unaoambukiza ambao huathiri ini, na kusababisha uharibifu mkubwa wakati ugonjwa unaendelea. Inasababishwa na virusi vya hepatitis C, virusi vidogo, vilivyofunikwa vya RNA. Uwasilishaji wa hepatitis C ni kupitia kuwasiliana na damu ya mtu aliyeambukizwa, kwa mfano kwa kushiriki sindano au kwa kutumia vifaa vya matibabu visivyo vya kuzaa. HCV hupitishwa ulimwenguni kwa sababu ya kiwango cha juu cha maambukizi na pia inahusishwa na kiwango cha juu cha vifo. Shirika la Afya Ulimwenguni linaonyesha asilimia 3.3 ya idadi ya watu ulimwenguni wameambukizwa na virusi vya HCV. Rekodi za takwimu zinaonyesha kuwa kuna watu wapatao milioni 13 wa HCV walioathirika nchini Uchina, watu walioathirika milioni 3.5 nchini Merika, na watu wapata milioni 10 wameathiriwa na HCV nchini Pakistan. Katika visa vyote, genotype ya virusi ya HCV inakaa sawa, mara kwa mara mabadiliko hufanyika na kufanya matibabu kuwa ngumu zaidi kwa kulenga mabadiliko katika genotype. Aina ya virusi vya hepatitis C inachukuliwa kuwa ya kawaida zaidi kuliko maambukizi ya virusi vya hepatitis B inayochangia kesi zaidi ya milioni kila mwaka na inachukuliwa kuwa moja ya sababu kuu ya kupandikiza ini nchini Merika. Baadhi ya genotypes za HCV zinaweza kukuza kwa watu bila dalili zinazoongoza kwa hali hatari kama ugonjwa wa ini husababisha uharibifu wa kudumu kwa ini na hali isiyoonekana ya HCV itaathiri ubongo, viungo, mishipa ya damu, mifupa, na figo.

Hepatitis ni kuvimba kwa tishu za ini. Watu wengine hawana dalili wakati wengine hutengeneza rangi ya manjano ya ngozi na wazungu wa macho, hamu mbaya, kutapika, uchovu, maumivu ya tumbo, au kuhara. Hepatitis inaweza kuwa ya muda mfupi (ya papo hapo) au ya muda mrefu (sugu) kulingana na ikiwa inadumu kwa chini ya au zaidi ya miezi sita. Hepatitis ya papo hapo wakati mwingine inaweza kusuluhisha yenyewe, maendeleo ya hepatitis sugu, au mara chache husababisha kushindwa kwa ini. Kwa wakati fomu sugu inaweza kuendelea na kukomesha ini, kushindwa kwa ini, au saratani ya ini. Sababu ya kawaida ya hepatitis ulimwenguni ni virusi. Sababu zingine ni pamoja na matumizi mazito ya pombe, dawa fulani, sumu, maambukizo mengine, magonjwa ya autoimmune, na steatohepatitis isiyo ya pombe (NASH). Kuna aina kuu tano za hepatitis ya virusi: Aina A, B, C, D, na E. hepatitis A na E husambazwa sana na chakula na maji yaliyochafuliwa. Hepatitis B inachukuliwa na zinaa, lakini pia inaweza kupitishwa kutoka kwa mama kwenda kwa mtoto wakati wa ujauzito au kuzaa. Hepatitis B na C kawaida huenea kupitia damu iliyoambukizwa kama vile inaweza kutokea wakati wa kugawana sindano na watumiaji wa dawa za ndani. Hepatitis D inaweza kuambukiza watu tu walioambukizwa na hepatitis B. hepatitis A, B, na D wanazuilika na chanjo. Dawa zinaweza kutumiwa kutibu kesi sugu za hepatitis ya virusi. Hakuna matibabu maalum kwa Nash; Walakini, maisha ya afya, pamoja na shughuli za mwili, lishe yenye afya, na kupunguza uzito, ni muhimu. Hepatitis ya autoimmune inaweza kutibiwa na dawa za kukandamiza mfumo wa kinga. Kupandikiza ini pia kunaweza kuwa chaguo katika hali fulani. Ulimwenguni kote mnamo 2015, Hepatitis A ilitokea katika watu wapatao milioni 114, hepatitis B sugu iliathiri watu wapata milioni 343 na hepatitis c sugu karibu watu milioni 142. Huko Merika, Nash anaathiri watu wapatao milioni 11 na hepatitis ya pombe huathiri watu milioni 5. Hepatitis husababisha vifo zaidi ya milioni kwa mwaka, zaidi ya ambayo hufanyika moja kwa moja kutoka kwa saratani ya ini au saratani ya ini. Huko Merika, hepatitis A inakadiriwa kutokea katika watu wapatao 2,500 kwa mwaka na husababisha vifo vya watu 75. Neno hilo limetokana na Kigiriki "Hêpar" (), ikimaanisha "ini", na "-itis" (), ikimaanisha "kuvimba".

Sawa na hepatitis A, hepatitis E inajidhihirisha kama milipuko mikubwa na milipuko inayohusiana na uchafuzi wa asili wa vyanzo vya maji. Inachukua vifo zaidi ya 55,000 kila mwaka na watu takriban milioni 20 ulimwenguni walidhani kuambukizwa na virusi. Inaathiri watu wazima vijana, na kusababisha hepatitis ya papo hapo. Katika wanawake wajawazito walioambukizwa, maambukizi ya hepatitis E yanaweza kusababisha hepatitis kamili na viwango vya vifo vya tatu vya trimester hadi 30%. Watu walio na kinga dhaifu, kama vile wapokeaji wa kupandikiza chombo, pia wanahusika. Kuambukizwa ni nadra nchini Merika lakini viwango viko juu katika ulimwengu unaoendelea (Afrika, Asia, Amerika ya Kati, Mashariki ya Kati). Genotypes nyingi zipo na zinasambazwa tofauti ulimwenguni. Kuna ushahidi fulani wa maambukizi ya hepatitis e ya wanyama, kutumika kama hifadhi ya maambukizo ya mwanadamu.

Hepatitis ya Fulminant, au kifo kikubwa cha seli ya hepatic, ni shida ya kawaida na ya kutishia maisha ya hepatitis ya papo hapo ambayo inaweza kutokea katika kesi za hepatitis B, D, na E, pamoja na hepatitis iliyosababishwa na dawa za kulevya na autoimmune. Shida hiyo hufanyika mara kwa mara katika hali ya kuambukizwa kwa hepatitis B na D kwa kiwango cha 2-20% na kwa wanawake wajawazito walio na hepatitis E kwa kiwango cha 15-20% ya kesi. Mbali na ishara za hepatitis ya papo hapo, watu wanaweza pia kuonyesha ishara za coagulopathy (masomo ya kawaida ya kusumbua na kusumbua rahisi na kutokwa na damu) na encephalopathy (machafuko, kufadhaika, na usingizi). Vifo kwa sababu ya hepatitis kamili kawaida ni matokeo ya shida kadhaa ikiwa ni pamoja na edema ya ubongo, kutokwa na damu kwa njia ya utumbo, sepsis, kutofaulu kwa kupumua, au kushindwa kwa figo.

Unywaji pombe kupita kiasi ni sababu kubwa ya hepatitis na ndio sababu ya kawaida ya ugonjwa wa ugonjwa wa hepatitis ya Merika uko ndani ya wigo wa ugonjwa wa ini. Hii inaanzia kwa ukali na kubadilika kutoka kwa steatosis ya pombe (kali kali, inayobadilika zaidi), hepatitis ya pombe, ugonjwa wa saratani, na saratani ya ini (kali zaidi, inayoweza kubadilishwa). Hepatitis kawaida huendeleza kwa miaka mingi ya pombe, kutokea kwa 10 hadi 20% ya walevi. Sababu muhimu zaidi za hatari kwa maendeleo ya hepatitis ya pombe ni wingi na muda wa ulaji wa pombe. Ulaji wa pombe ya muda mrefu zaidi ya gramu 80 za pombe kwa siku kwa wanaume na gramu 40 kwa siku kwa wanawake inahusishwa na maendeleo ya hepatitis ya pombe (1 bia au ounces 4 za divai ni sawa na 12g ya pombe). Hepatitis ya pombe inaweza kutofautiana kutoka kwa hepatomegaly ya asymptomatic (ini iliyokuzwa) hadi dalili za ugonjwa wa hepatitis ya papo hapo au sugu kwa kushindwa kwa ini.

Magonjwa ya kuambukiza wakati mwingine huitwa ugonjwa unaoambukiza wakati hupitishwa kwa urahisi na kuwasiliana na mtu mgonjwa au siri zao (k.v. mafua). Kwa hivyo, ugonjwa unaoambukiza ni sehemu ndogo ya magonjwa ya kuambukiza ambayo ni ya kuambukiza au yanayopitishwa kwa urahisi. Aina zingine za magonjwa ya kuambukiza/yanayoweza kuambukiza/yanayoweza kuambukizwa na njia maalum zaidi za maambukizi, kama vile maambukizi ya vector au maambukizi ya kijinsia, kawaida hayazingatiwi kama "kuambukiza", na mara nyingi hauitaji kutengwa kwa matibabu (wakati mwingine huitwa quarantine) ya wahasiriwa. Walakini, maana hii maalum ya neno "inayoambukiza" na "ugonjwa unaoambukiza" (uhamishaji rahisi) hauheshimiwi kila wakati katika matumizi maarufu.
Magonjwa ya kuambukiza kawaida hupitishwa kutoka kwa mtu hadi mtu kupitia mawasiliano ya moja kwa moja. Aina za mawasiliano ni kupitia mtu kwa mtu na droplet kuenea. Mawasiliano ya moja kwa moja kama vile maambukizi ya hewa, vitu vilivyochafuliwa, chakula na maji ya kunywa, mawasiliano ya mtu wa wanyama, hifadhi za wanyama, kuumwa na wadudu, na hifadhi za mazingira ni njia nyingine magonjwa ya kuambukiza hupitishwa,

Hepatitis C ya muda mrefu ni sababu kubwa ya ugonjwa wa ini na ugonjwa wa hepatocellular. Ni sababu ya kawaida ya matibabu ya kupandikiza ini kwa sababu ya shida zake kali. Inakadiriwa kuwa watu milioni 130-180 ulimwenguni wanaathiriwa na ugonjwa huu unaowakilisha zaidi ya 3% ya idadi ya watu ulimwenguni. Katika mikoa inayoendelea ya Afrika, Asia na Amerika Kusini, kuongezeka kunaweza kuwa juu kama 10% ya idadi ya watu. Huko Misri, viwango vya maambukizi ya hepatitis C juu kama 20% vimeandikwa na vinahusishwa na uchafu wa iatrogenic unaohusiana na matibabu ya schistosomiasis miaka ya 1950 hadi 1980. Hivi sasa nchini Merika, takriban watu wazima milioni 3.5 inakadiriwa kuambukizwa. Hepatitis C inaenea sana kati ya watu waliozaliwa kati ya 1945-1965, kikundi cha watu wapatao 800,000, na kiwango cha juu kama asilimia 3.2 dhidi ya 1.6% kwa idadi ya watu wa Merika. Vibebaji vingi sugu vya hepatitis C hawajui hali yao ya maambukizi. Njia ya kawaida ya maambukizi ya virusi vya hepatitis C ni yatokanayo na bidhaa za damu kupitia damu (kabla ya 1992) na sindano ya dawa ya ndani. Historia ya sindano ya dawa ya ndani ndio sababu muhimu zaidi ya hatari kwa hepatitis sugu C. Idadi zingine zinazohusika ni pamoja na watu walio na tabia ya hatari ya kijinsia, watoto wachanga wa mama walioambukizwa, na wafanyikazi wa huduma ya afya.
report_src: Ndiyo; Hepatitis B ni ugonjwa unaosababishwa na virusi vya kuambukiza vinavyoenea kupitia damu au majimaji ya mwili ya mtu aliyeathirika, ikijumuisha uambukizi wa mama kwenda kwa mtoto wakati wa kuzaliwa [1]. Virusi vinaweza kusababisha maambukizi ya muda mfupi (papo hapo) au ya muda mrefu (sugu) ikiwa hubaki mwilini zaidi ya miezi sita, na kadiri mtoto anavyokuwa mdogo ndivyo hatari ya kuendelea kuwa na maambukizi sugu inavyoongezeka—takriban 90 % ya watoto wachanga walioambukizwa huishia na maambukizi sugu [1]. Hata hivyo, chanjo ya hepatitis B, inayotolewa kuanzia saa chache baada ya kuzaliwa na kufuatiwa na dozi nyingine katika miezi inayofuata, imepunguza vifo na maambukizo nchini Merika kwa 82 % tangu 1990, huku zaidi ya watu milioni 100 wakipokea chanjo bila madhara makubwa kuripotiwa [1].

question_en: Is Alfie Moon still a character on EastEnders?
pos_context_en: Alfie Moon is a fictional character from the BBC soap opera "EastEnders", played by Shane Richie. He made his first appearance on 21 November 2002, and left on 25 December 2005. He returned to "EastEnders" on 21 September 2010, following the return of on-screen wife Kat (Jessie Wallace) two episodes previously.
neg_context_title_en: List of Kat & Alfie: Redwater characters
neg_context_en: Michael Moon is a fictional character from the BBC soap opera "EastEnders", played by Steve John Shepherd. The character is a second cousin once removed of Alfie Moon (Shane Richie), and first appears on 1 October 2010 after Alfie's return. He is also the father to Tommy Moon, whose mother is Alfie's wife Kat Moon (Jessie Wallace). Michael is later joined by his father Eddie Moon (David Essex) and half brothers Tyler (Tony Discipline) and Anthony (Matt Lapinskas).

On 4 April 2015, "EastEnders" bosses announced plans of a new six-part BBC drama series featuring iconic couple Kat (Jessie Wallace) and Alfie Moon (Shane Richie). The series, "Redwater", will follow the characters as they move to Ireland. Speaking at the time, executive producer Dominic Treadwell-Collins commented: "In the next few weeks on "EastEnders", viewers will witness several huge twists for Kat and Alfie Moon that will change their lives forever. Now is the perfect time to take two of "EastEnders"’ most beloved and enduring characters out of their comfort zone as they head to Ireland to search for answers to some very big questions… My team here are very excited about creating a whole new drama that stands apart from "EastEnders" while taking our style of storytelling to a place of stories, myth, secrets and immeasurable beauty."

Alfie Moon is played by Shane Richie. The character originally appeared in the soap opera "EastEnders" from 2002 to 2005, and 2010 to 2016. Before his departure from "EastEnders", he discovers he has a mass on his brain. Of Alfie's part in "Redwater", Richie said, "Alfie's journey is to help his wife find her son but at the same time he has his own dark secret which he's keeping." Richie later said, "For the first time in 15 years, [Alfie] questions himself as a father, a husband and as a life, it feels like it's coming to an end for him. [...] Alfie starts getting hallucinations and one in particular is quite harrowing."

"Kat & Alfie: Redwater" follows two characters from "EastEnders", Kat Moon (Jessie Wallace) and her husband Alfie Moon (Shane Richie), as they arrive in the fictional Irish village of Redwater to "search for answers to some very big questions" and put their past behind them. Redwater is described as a "very little romantic seaside town", and "a tiny, picturesque Irish harbour village, a quiet rural idyll by the sea where the Kelly and Dolan families have lived for generations." The then executive producer of "EastEnders", also executive producer of "Redwater", Dominic Treadwell-Collins, said that two events in "EastEnders" serve as a catalyst for the series. In "EastEnders" episodes broadcast in April, May and December 2015 and January 2016, Kat and Alfie win the lottery, Alfie discovers he has a mass in his brain and Kat discovers she gave birth to a son, Luke, after she passed out during the birth of her daughter Zoe Slater (Michelle Ryan); Luke was adopted by a family in Ireland without Kat knowing he existed. Kat's sister Belinda Peacock (Carli Norris) recalls a time the family (minus Kat) went to Redwater and they conclude that Luke must be there. Treadwell-Collins confirmed that "the discovery that Kat has a secret son will [...] ultimately lead to the Moons realising that the answers to so many questions lie across the sea in Ireland."

Elizabeth 'Liza' Moon, played by Joanne Adams, is the estranged wife of Alfie Moon (Shane Richie). She has not seen Alfie since he was sent to prison for credit card fraud, but Alfie visits her when he wants a divorce so he can marry Kat Slater (Jessie Wallace). Liza does not want a divorce but gives up on a reconciliation with Alfie when she realises he loves Kat, not her. She then agrees to a divorce and Alfie marries Kat on Christmas Day 2003.

Kat & Alfie: Redwater (also called Redwater in Ireland), is a British–Irish co-production television drama series broadcast on RTÉ One and BBC One. It was created by Dominic Treadwell-Collins as a six-part series based on the characters Kat Moon, played by Jessie Wallace, and Alfie Moon, played by Shane Richie, from the soap opera "EastEnders". The series is set in the fictional Irish village of Redwater, where the residents are hiding a dark secret, and features an ensemble cast. "Redwater" is a co-production between the BBC and Element Pictures, with Victoria Wharton serving as producer. It was filmed on location in Dublin, County Waterford and County Wicklow between 11 April and 26 July 2016. It started airing in Ireland on 14 May 2017 and the United Kingdom on 18 May 2017. It has also been shown in the United States and Canada. A second series was mooted during filming of the first but in September 2017, it was confirmed that no more episodes would be produced, leaving the fates of the characters unknown. However, Kat's return to "EastEnders" was confirmed on 20 December 2017, meaning that she had survived the events of "Redwater", and "EastEnders" storylines following her return confirmed that Alfie had also survived and he returned later in the year.

Victoria Alice "Nana" Moon, played by Hilda Braid, is the grandmother of Alfie and Spencer Moon (Shane Richie and Christopher Parker). Her storylines include meeting Wilfred Atkins (Dudley Sutton), a fraudster who wants to con her out of her possessions. In 2005 Nana's health began to fail and she develops dementia, much to the worry of Alfie. Tragedy strikes when Alfie takes Nana to visit Normandy in France to see her late husband's grave.

In April 2010, it was reported that "EastEnders" producers were considering bringing Spencer back to the series, and would make their decision after Alfie returns to the show later in the year. However, a BBC spokesperson denied the report, saying "There are absolutely no plans to bring Chris Parker – or the character of Spencer Moon – back to "EastEnders"."

On 23 July 2009, Richie announced on "The One Show" that his character Alfie Moon would return to EastEnders. Following an absence of almost five years, Richie made his on-screen return to "EastEnders" on 21 September 2010.
question_src: Je! Alfie Moon bado ni mhusika kwenye EastEnders?
pos_context_src: Alfie Moon ni tabia ya uwongo kutoka kwa Opera ya BBC Sabuni "EastEnders", iliyochezwa na Shane Richie. Alionekana mara ya kwanza mnamo Novemba 21, 2002, na akaondoka mnamo 25 Desemba 2005. Alirudi kwa "EastEnders" mnamo tarehe 21 Septemba 2010, kufuatia kurudi kwa mke wa skrini Kat (Jessie Wallace) vipindi viwili hapo awali.
neg_context_title_src: Orodha ya Kat & amp; Alfie: Wahusika wa maji nyekundu
neg_context_src: Michael Moon ni tabia ya uwongo kutoka kwa Opera ya BBC Sabuni "EastEnders", iliyochezwa na Steve John Shepherd. Tabia hiyo ni binamu wa pili aliyeondolewa kwa Alfie Moon (Shane Richie), na kwanza anaonekana mnamo 1 Oktoba 2010 baada ya kurudi kwa Alfie. Yeye pia ni baba wa Tommy Moon, ambaye mama yake ni mke wa Alfie Kat Moon (Jessie Wallace). Michael baadaye alijiunga na baba yake Eddie Moon (David Essex) na ndugu wa nusu Tyler (Tony nidhamu) na Anthony (Matt Lapinskas).

Mnamo 4 Aprili 2015, wakubwa wa "EastEnders" walitangaza mipango ya safu mpya ya maigizo ya BBC iliyo na wanandoa wa iconic Kat (Jessie Wallace) na Alfie Moon (Shane Richie). Mfululizo, "Redwater", utafuata wahusika wanapohamia Ireland. Wakizungumza wakati huo, mtayarishaji mtendaji Dominic Treadwell-Collins alitoa maoni: "Katika wiki chache zijazo kwenye" ​​EastEnders ", watazamaji watashuhudia twists kadhaa kubwa kwa Kat na Alfie Moon ambazo zitabadilisha maisha yao milele. Sasa ni wakati mzuri wa kuchukua mbili za" EastEnders "'wapenzi zaidi na wahusika kutoka kwa wahusika wao ni wakuu juu ya kusudi la" Kuuliza kwa Majibu kwa Maswali Maswali ya Kujiuliza kwa Maswali ya Kujiuliza kwa Maswali Maswali Yangu Kujiuliza Maswali Yangu Kujiuliza Maswali Yangu Kujiuliza Maswali Yangu Kuhitaji Kuhitaji Maswali Yao Kuhitaji Kutafuta Maswali Maswali Yao Kuhitaji Kuhitaji Kutafuta Maswali Maswali "Wakuu wa Kuhitaji Kuhitaji Kuhitaji Kutafuta Maswali Maswali" Wakuu wa Affeers " Inasimama kando na "EastEnders" wakati wa kuchukua mtindo wetu wa hadithi kuwa mahali pa hadithi, hadithi, siri na uzuri usioweza kufikiwa. "

Alfie Moon inachezwa na Shane Richie. Hapo awali mhusika alionekana kwenye opera ya sabuni "EastEnders" kutoka 2002 hadi 2005, na 2010 hadi 2016. Kabla ya kuondoka kwake kutoka "EastEnders", anagundua ana misa juu ya ubongo wake. Kati ya sehemu ya Alfie katika "Redwater", Richie alisema, "Safari ya Alfie ni kumsaidia mkewe kupata mtoto wake lakini wakati huo huo ana siri yake ya giza ambayo anaitunza." Baadaye Richie alisema, "Kwa mara ya kwanza katika miaka 15, [Alfie] anajiuliza kama baba, mume na kama maisha, inahisi kama inamalizika kwake.

"Kat & Alfie: Redwater" inafuata wahusika wawili kutoka "EastEnders", Kat Moon (Jessie Wallace) na mumewe Alfie Moon (Shane Richie), wanapofika katika kijiji cha uwongo cha Ireland cha Redwater "kutafuta majibu ya maswali kadhaa makubwa" na kuweka nyuma yao nyuma yao. Redwater inaelezewa kama "mji mdogo sana wa bahari ya kimapenzi", na "Kijiji kidogo cha Bandari ya Ireland, idyll ya vijijini na bahari ambayo familia za Kelly na Dolan zimeishi kwa vizazi." Mtayarishaji mtendaji wa wakati huo wa "EastEnders", pia mtayarishaji mtendaji wa "Redwater", Dominic Treadwell-Collins, alisema kuwa matukio mawili katika "EastEnders" hutumika kama kichocheo cha safu hiyo. Katika sehemu za "EastEnders" zilizotangazwa mnamo Aprili, Mei na Desemba 2015 na Januari 2016, Kat na Alfie wanashinda bahati nasibu, Alfie anagundua ana misa katika ubongo wake na Kat anagundua alizaa mtoto wa kiume, Luke, baada ya kumalizika wakati wa kuzaliwa kwa binti yake Zoe Slater (Michelle Ryan); Luka alipitishwa na familia huko Ireland bila Kat akijua kuwa alikuwepo. Dada wa Kat Belinda Peacock (Carli Norris) anakumbuka wakati familia (minus Kat) ilikwenda Redwater na wanahitimisha kuwa lazima Luka awe huko. Treadwell-Collins alithibitisha kwamba "ugunduzi kwamba Kat ana mtoto wa siri [...] mwishowe atasababisha mwezi kugundua kuwa majibu ya maswali mengi yapo baharini huko Ireland."

Elizabeth 'Liza' Moon, aliyechezwa na Joanne Adams, ndiye mke aliyetengwa wa Alfie Moon (Shane Richie). Hajamuona Alfie tangu alipopelekwa gerezani kwa udanganyifu wa kadi ya mkopo, lakini Alfie anamtembelea wakati anataka talaka ili aweze kuoa Kat Slater (Jessie Wallace). Liza hataki talaka lakini anaacha maridhiano na Alfie wakati atagundua kuwa anampenda Kat, sio yeye. Kisha anakubali talaka na Alfie anaoa Kat Siku ya Krismasi 2003.

Kat & Alfie: Redwater (pia inaitwa Redwater huko Ireland), ni safu ya tamthilia ya Televisheni ya Briteni-Ireland ya Matangazo ya Televisheni ya Briteni na BBC One. Iliundwa na Dominic Treadwell-Collins kama safu ya sehemu sita kulingana na wahusika Kat Moon, iliyochezwa na Jessie Wallace, na Alfie Moon, iliyochezwa na Shane Richie, kutoka Opera ya Sabuni "EastEnders". Mfululizo huo umewekwa katika kijiji cha uwongo cha Ireland cha Redwater, ambapo wakaazi wanaficha siri ya giza, na inaangazia mkutano wa kukusanyika. "Redwater" ni uzalishaji kati ya BBC na Picha za Vipengee, na Victoria Wharton akihudumu kama mtayarishaji. Ilipigwa picha kwenye eneo huko Dublin, Kaunti ya Waterford na Wicklow ya Kata kati ya 11 Aprili na 26 Julai 2016. Ilianza kupeperusha Ireland mnamo 14 Mei 2017 na Uingereza mnamo Mei 18, 2017 pia imeonyeshwa huko Merika na Canada. Mfululizo wa pili ulichemshwa wakati wa utengenezaji wa filamu ya kwanza lakini mnamo Septemba 2017, ilithibitishwa kuwa hakuna vipindi zaidi ambavyo vitatengenezwa, na kuacha vitisho vya wahusika wasiojulikana. Walakini, kurudi kwa Kat kwa "EastEnders" ilithibitishwa mnamo Desemba 20, 2017, ikimaanisha kuwa alikuwa amepona matukio ya "Redwater", na hadithi za "EastEnders" kufuatia kurudi kwake zilithibitisha kwamba Alfie pia alinusurika na alirudi baadaye katika mwaka huo.

Victoria Alice "Nana" Moon, iliyochezwa na Hilda Braid, ni bibi ya Alfie na Spencer Moon (Shane Richie na Christopher Parker). Hadithi zake ni pamoja na kukutana na Wilfred Atkins (Dudley Sutton), mtapeli ambaye anataka kumtoa nje ya mali zake. Mnamo 2005 afya ya Nana ilianza kutofaulu na yeye huendeleza shida ya akili, kwa wasiwasi wa Alfie. Msiba unagonga wakati Alfie anamchukua Nana kutembelea Normandy huko Ufaransa kuona kaburi la mumewe wa marehemu.

Mnamo Aprili 2010, iliripotiwa kwamba wazalishaji wa "EastEnders" walikuwa wakizingatia kumrudisha Spencer kwenye safu, na wangefanya uamuzi wao baada ya Alfie kurudi kwenye show baadaye katika mwaka. Walakini, msemaji wa BBC alikataa ripoti hiyo, akisema "hakuna mipango yoyote ya kumleta Chris Parker - au tabia ya Spencer Moon - kurudi" EastEnders "."

Mnamo tarehe 23 Julai 2009, Richie alitangaza kwenye "The One Show" kwamba mhusika wake Alfie Moon atarudi kwa EastEnders. Kufuatia kukosekana kwa karibu miaka mitano, Richie alifanya kurudi kwake kwa skrini kwa "EastEnders" mnamo tarehe 21 Septemba 2010.
report_src: Kulingana na taarifa tulizonazo, Alfie Moon aliondoka “EastEnders” mnamo 25 Desemba 2005 lakini akarudi tena tarehe 21 Septemba 2010, na hakuna kumbukumbu katika hati hii inayoonyesha kuwa aliacha kipindi tena baada ya kurejea, hivyo kwa msingi wa taarifa zilizopo inaonekana bado alikuwa mhusika angalau baada ya kurudi kwake mwaka 2010; hata hivyo, hatuna ushahidi zaidi kuthibitisha hali yake ya sasa kwenye mfululizo [1].

question_en: What is the magnetic force of the Earth?
pos_context_en: Earth's magnetic field, also known as the geomagnetic field, is the magnetic field that extends from the Earth's interior out into space, where it meets the solar wind, a stream of charged particles emanating from the Sun. Its magnitude at the Earth's surface ranges from 25 to 65 microteslas (0.25 to 0.65 gauss). Approximately, it is the field of a magnetic dipole currently tilted at an angle of about 11 degrees with respect to Earth's rotational axis, as if there were a bar magnet placed at that angle at the center of the Earth. The North geomagnetic pole, located near Greenland in the northern hemisphere, is actually the south pole of the Earth's magnetic field, and the South geomagnetic pole is the north pole. The magnetic field is generated by electric currents due to the motion of convection currents of molten iron in the Earth's outer core driven by heat escaping from the core, a natural process called a geodynamo.
neg_context_en: where formula_48 is the magnitude of the hypothetical test current and formula_49 is the length of hypothetical wire through which the test current flows. The magnetic field exerts a force on all magnets including, for example, those used in compasses. The fact that the Earth's magnetic field is aligned closely with the orientation of the Earth's axis causes compass magnets to become oriented because of the magnetic force pulling on the needle.

The mechanism by which the Earth generates a magnetic field is known as a dynamo. The magnetic field is generated by a feedback loop: current loops generate magnetic fields (Ampère's circuital law); a changing magnetic field generates an electric field (Faraday's law); and the electric and magnetic fields exert a force on the charges that are flowing in currents (the Lorentz force). These effects can be combined in a partial differential equation for the magnetic field called the "magnetic induction equation",

where the integral can be over all space or, equivalently, where is nonzero.
Magnetic potential energy is the form of energy related not only to the distance between magnetic materials, but also to the orientation, or alignment, of those materials within the field. For example, the needle of a compass has the lowest magnetic potential energy when it is aligned with the north and south poles of the Earth's magnetic field. If the needle is moved by an outside force, torque is exerted on the magnetic dipole of the needle by the Earth's magnetic field, causing it to move back into alignment. The magnetic potential energy of the needle is highest when its field is in the same direction as the Earth's magnetic field. Two magnets will have potential energy in relation to each other and the distance between them, but this also depends on their orientation. If the opposite poles are held apart, the potential energy will be higher the further they are apart and lower the closer they are. Conversely, like poles will have the highest potential energy when forced together, and the lowest when they spring apart.

Magnetic fields are widely used throughout modern technology, particularly in electrical engineering and electromechanics. Rotating magnetic fields are used in both electric motors and generators. The interaction of magnetic fields in electric devices such as transformers is studied in the discipline of magnetic circuits. Magnetic forces give information about the charge carriers in a material through the Hall effect. The Earth produces its own magnetic field, which shields the Earth's ozone layer from the solar wind and is important in navigation using a compass.
Although magnets and magnetism were studied much earlier, the research of magnetic fields began in 1269 when French scholar Petrus Peregrinus de Maricourt mapped out the magnetic field on the surface of a spherical magnet using iron needles. Noting that the resulting field lines crossed at two points he named those points 'poles' in analogy to Earth's poles. He also clearly articulated the principle that magnets always have both a north and south pole, no matter how finely one slices them.

At any location, the Earth's magnetic field can be represented by a three-dimensional vector. A typical procedure for measuring its direction is to use a compass to determine the direction of magnetic North. Its angle relative to true North is the "declination" () or "variation". Facing magnetic North, the angle the field makes with the horizontal is the "inclination" () or "magnetic dip". The "intensity" () of the field is proportional to the force it exerts on a magnet. Another common representation is in (North), (East) and (Down) coordinates.
The intensity of the field is often measured in gauss (G), but is generally reported in nanoteslas (nT), with 1 G = 100,000 nT. A nanotesla is also referred to as a gamma (γ). The tesla is the SI unit of the magnetic field, B. The Earth's field ranges between approximately 25,000 and 65,000 nT (0.25–0.65 G). By comparison, a strong refrigerator magnet has a field of about .

Gilbert's account of magnetism did not persuade Francis Bacon. He denied that Earth spun, and he denied deep verticity. Earth's core was cold, passive, and unmoving, as Telesio had said, and the Earth was not magnetic. Bacon offered an alternative explanation of magnetism. He construed magnetic motion as westward motion around Earth's vertices. Of course, such motion could be found everywhere. The Atlantic Ocean rolled westward and ricocheted off the eastern coast of the New World, creating the tides. The planets, stars, sun and moon migrated in the same direction. The stirrings of magnets could not be blamed on a special force, but only on the impulse of nearly all things to go west.

Earth’s magnetic fields are used for migration for a wide variety of species including bacteria, mollusks, arthropods, mammals, birds, reptiles, and amphibians. In order to understand the Earth’s magnetic fields, the earth can be viewed as a large magnet. As a typical magnet has a north and south end, so does the earth. The north pole magnet is located at the Earth’s north pole and the south pole magnet is located at the Earth’s south pole. From this north and south pole span magnetic fields. The magnetic field leaves the poles and curves around the earth until it reaches the opposite pole.

The Earth's magnetic field is generated by the circulation of charges in the Earth's molten core. The resulting magnetic dipole field forms a shape with magnetic field lines passing through the Earth's center, reaching the surface near the poles and extending far into space above the equator. Charged particles entering the field will tend to follow the lines of force, moving north or south. As they reach the polar regions, the magnetic lines begin to cluster together, and this increasing field can cause particles below a certain energy threshold to reflect, and begin travelling in the opposite direction. Such particles bounce back and forth between the poles until the collide with other particles. Particles with greater energy continue towards the Earth, impacting the atmosphere and causing the aurora.

Near the surface of the Earth, its magnetic field can be closely approximated by the field of a magnetic dipole positioned at the center of the Earth and tilted at an angle of about 11° with respect to the rotational axis of the Earth. The dipole is roughly equivalent to a powerful bar magnet, with its south pole pointing towards the geomagnetic North Pole. This may seem surprising, but the north pole of a magnet is so defined because, if allowed to rotate freely, it points roughly northward (in the geographic sense). Since the north pole of a magnet attracts the south poles of other magnets and repels the north poles, it must be attracted to the south pole of Earth's magnet. The dipolar field accounts for 80–90% of the field in most locations.
question_src: Je! Nguvu ya dunia ni nini?
pos_context_src: Sehemu ya sumaku ya Dunia, inayojulikana pia kama uwanja wa geomagnetic, ni uwanja wa sumaku ambao unaenea kutoka kwa mambo ya ndani ya Dunia kwenda kwenye nafasi, ambapo hukutana na upepo wa jua, mkondo wa chembe zilizoshtakiwa kutoka Jua. Ukuu wake katika uso wa Dunia unaanzia 25 hadi 65 microteslas (0.25 hadi 0.65 Gauss). Takriban, ni uwanja wa sumaku ya sumaku iliyowekwa kwa sasa kwa pembe ya digrii 11 kwa heshima na mhimili wa mzunguko wa Dunia, kana kwamba kulikuwa na sumaku ya bar iliyowekwa kwenye pembe hiyo katikati ya Dunia. Pole ya geomagnetic ya kaskazini, iliyo karibu na Greenland katika ulimwengu wa kaskazini, kwa kweli ni pole ya kusini ya uwanja wa sumaku wa Dunia, na pole ya geomagnetic ya kusini ndio pole ya kaskazini. Sehemu ya sumaku hutolewa na mikondo ya umeme kwa sababu ya mwendo wa mikondo ya mikondo ya chuma iliyoyeyuka katika msingi wa nje wa Dunia unaoendeshwa na joto kutoroka kutoka kwa msingi, mchakato wa asili unaoitwa geodynamo.
neg_context_src: Ambapo formula_48 ni ukubwa wa mtihani wa hypothetical wa sasa na formula_49 ni urefu wa waya wa nadharia ambayo mtihani wa sasa unapita. Shamba la sumaku lina nguvu kwenye sumaku zote ikiwa ni pamoja na, kwa mfano, zile zinazotumika kwenye dira. Ukweli kwamba uwanja wa sumaku wa Dunia umeunganishwa kwa karibu na mwelekeo wa mhimili wa Dunia husababisha sumaku za dira kuwa mwelekeo kwa sababu ya nguvu ya sumaku kuvuta kwenye sindano.

Utaratibu ambao dunia hutoa shamba ya sumaku inajulikana kama dynamo. Sehemu ya sumaku hutolewa na kitanzi cha maoni: vitanzi vya sasa hutoa shamba za sumaku (sheria ya mzunguko wa Ampère); Sehemu ya sumaku inayobadilika hutoa uwanja wa umeme (sheria ya Faraday); na shamba la umeme na sumaku hutoa nguvu kwa mashtaka ambayo yanapita katika mikondo (nguvu ya Lorentz). Athari hizi zinaweza kuunganishwa katika sehemu ya tofauti ya sehemu kwa uwanja wa sumaku unaoitwa "equation ya induction",,

Ambapo muhimu inaweza kuwa juu ya nafasi zote au, sawa, wapi nonzero.
Nishati inayowezekana ya sumaku ni aina ya nishati inayohusiana sio tu kwa umbali kati ya vifaa vya sumaku, lakini pia kwa mwelekeo, au upatanishi, wa vifaa hivyo ndani ya uwanja. Kwa mfano, sindano ya dira ina nguvu ya chini ya nguvu ya sumaku wakati imeunganishwa na miti ya kaskazini na kusini ya uwanja wa sumaku wa Dunia. Ikiwa sindano imehamishwa na nguvu ya nje, torque hutolewa kwenye sumaku ya sindano na uwanja wa sumaku wa Dunia, na kusababisha kurudi nyuma kwenye upatanishi. Nishati ya nguvu ya sindano ni ya juu wakati shamba lake liko katika mwelekeo sawa na uwanja wa sumaku wa Dunia. Sumaku mbili zitakuwa na nguvu zinazowezekana kuhusiana na kila mmoja na umbali kati yao, lakini hii pia inategemea mwelekeo wao. Ikiwa miti ya kinyume inashikiliwa, nishati inayowezekana itakuwa ya juu zaidi iko mbali na kupunguza karibu zaidi. Kinyume chake, kama miti itakuwa na nguvu kubwa zaidi wakati inalazimishwa pamoja, na ya chini wakati zinapoanza.

Mashamba ya sumaku hutumiwa sana katika teknolojia ya kisasa, haswa katika uhandisi wa umeme na elektroni. Mashamba ya sumaku inayozunguka hutumiwa katika motors zote za umeme na jenereta. Mwingiliano wa shamba la sumaku katika vifaa vya umeme kama vile transfoma husomwa katika nidhamu ya mizunguko ya sumaku. Vikosi vya sumaku vinatoa habari juu ya wabebaji wa malipo katika nyenzo kupitia athari ya ukumbi. Dunia hutoa shamba lake la sumaku, ambalo linalinda safu ya ozoni ya Dunia kutoka kwa upepo wa jua na ni muhimu katika urambazaji kwa kutumia dira.
Ingawa sumaku na sumaku zilisomewa mapema sana, utafiti wa shamba la sumaku ulianza mnamo 1269 wakati msomi wa Ufaransa Petrus Peregrinus de Maricourt aligundua uwanja wa sumaku kwenye uso wa sumaku ya spherical kwa kutumia sindano za chuma. Akigundua kuwa mistari ya uwanja iliyosababishwa ilivuka katika sehemu mbili aliitaja alama hizo 'miti' kwa mfano na miti ya Dunia. Pia alielezea wazi kanuni kwamba sumaku huwa na pole ya Kaskazini na Kusini, haijalishi ni laini gani moja.

Katika eneo lolote, uwanja wa sumaku wa Dunia unaweza kuwakilishwa na vector ya pande tatu. Utaratibu wa kawaida wa kupima mwelekeo wake ni kutumia dira kuamua mwelekeo wa kaskazini ya sumaku. Angle yake jamaa na North North ni "kupungua" () au "tofauti". Inakabiliwa na kaskazini ya kaskazini, pembe ambayo shamba hufanya na usawa ni "mwelekeo" () au "kuzamisha". "Nguvu" () ya shamba ni sawa na nguvu ambayo hutoa kwenye sumaku. Uwakilishi mwingine wa kawaida uko (kaskazini), (mashariki) na (chini) kuratibu.
Nguvu ya shamba mara nyingi hupimwa katika Gauss (g), lakini kwa ujumla inaripotiwa katika nanoteslas (NT), na 1 g = 100,000 nt. Nanotesla pia inajulikana kama gamma (γ). Tesla ni sehemu ya Si ya uwanja wa sumaku, B. Shamba la Dunia lina kati ya takriban 25,000 na 65,000 NT (0.25-0.65 g). Kwa kulinganisha, sumaku yenye nguvu ya jokofu ina uwanja wa karibu.

Akaunti ya Gilbert ya sumaku haikumshawishi Francis Bacon. Alikataa kwamba Dunia ilikauka, na akakataa wima ya kina. Msingi wa Dunia ulikuwa baridi, wa kupita, na usio na nguvu, kama Telesio alivyosema, na Dunia haikuwa ya nguvu. Bacon ilitoa maelezo mbadala ya sumaku. Aligundua mwendo wa sumaku kama mwendo wa magharibi karibu na wima za Dunia. Kwa kweli, mwendo kama huo unaweza kupatikana kila mahali. Bahari ya Atlantic ilizunguka magharibi na ikatoka pwani ya mashariki ya Ulimwengu Mpya, na kuunda mawimbi. Sayari, nyota, jua na mwezi zilihamia katika mwelekeo huo huo. Vichocheo vya sumaku hazikuweza kulaumiwa kwa nguvu maalum, lakini tu juu ya msukumo wa karibu vitu vyote kwenda magharibi.

Mashamba ya sumaku ya Dunia hutumiwa kwa uhamiaji kwa spishi anuwai ikiwa ni pamoja na bakteria, mollusks, arthropods, mamalia, ndege, reptilia, na amphibians. Ili kuelewa uwanja wa sumaku wa Dunia, dunia inaweza kutazamwa kama sumaku kubwa. Kama sumaku ya kawaida ina mwisho wa kaskazini na kusini, ndivyo pia dunia. Magnet ya kaskazini ya kaskazini iko kwenye Pole ya Kaskazini ya Dunia na sumaku ya kusini ya Pole iko kwenye Pole ya Kusini ya Dunia. Kutoka kwa uwanja huu wa kaskazini na kusini mwa uwanja wa sumaku. Shamba la sumaku huacha miti na curves kuzunguka dunia hadi ifikie pole.

Sehemu ya sumaku ya Dunia hutolewa na mzunguko wa mashtaka katika msingi wa kuyeyuka wa Dunia. Shamba la sumaku linalosababishwa hutengeneza sura na mistari ya uwanja wa sumaku inayopita katikati ya Dunia, ikifikia uso karibu na miti na kupanua mbali katika nafasi juu ya ikweta. Chembe zilizoshtakiwa zinazoingia kwenye shamba zitafuata mistari ya nguvu, kusonga kaskazini au kusini. Wanapofikia mikoa ya polar, mistari ya sumaku huanza kushikamana pamoja, na uwanja huu unaoongezeka unaweza kusababisha chembe chini ya kizingiti fulani cha nishati kutafakari, na kuanza kusafiri kwa upande mwingine. Chembe kama hizo hurudi nyuma na kati kati ya miti hadi kugongana na chembe zingine. Chembe zilizo na nishati kubwa zinaendelea kuelekea duniani, na kuathiri anga na kusababisha Aurora.

Karibu na uso wa Dunia, shamba lake la sumaku linaweza kukadiriwa kwa karibu na uwanja wa sumaku iliyowekwa katikati ya dunia na kushonwa kwa pembe ya karibu 11 ° kwa heshima na mhimili wa Dunia. Dipole ni sawa na sumaku yenye nguvu ya bar, na pole yake ya kusini ikielekeza kuelekea pole ya kaskazini ya geomagnetic. Hii inaweza kuonekana kuwa ya kushangaza, lakini pole ya kaskazini ya sumaku imeelezewa kwa sababu, ikiwa inaruhusiwa kuzunguka kwa uhuru, inaelekeza kaskazini (kwa maana ya kijiografia). Kwa kuwa pole ya kaskazini ya sumaku inavutia miti ya kusini ya sumaku zingine na kurudisha miti ya kaskazini, lazima ivutiwe na pole ya kusini ya sumaku ya Dunia. Sehemu ya dipolar ina akaunti ya 80-90% ya uwanja katika maeneo mengi.
report_src: Nguvu ya Dunia, inayojulikana kitaalamu kama uwanja wa sumaku wa Dunia, ni uwanja wa sumaku unaoenea kutoka ndani ya sayari hadi angani na hukutana na upepo wa jua, hivyo kuilinda Dunia dhidi ya chembe zilizoshtakiwa kutoka Jua [1]. Uwanja huu una ukubwa wa takriban 25–65 microtesla (sawa na 0.25–0.65 Gauss) kwenye uso wa Dunia [1]. Kimsingi unafanana na sumaku ya bar iliyopinda kwa takriban digrii 11 kutoka kwenye mhimili wa mzunguko wa Dunia, ukisababisha pole ya kaskazini ya geomagnetic (karibu na Greenland) kuwa pole ya kusini ya kimwili na kinyume chake kwa upande wa kusini [1]. Chanzo cha nguvu hii ni mikondo ya umeme inayotokana na mwendo wa chuma kilichoyeyuka kwenye kiini cha nje cha Dunia, inayoendeshwa na upotevu wa joto, mchakato uitwao geodynamo [1].
