question_en: Are humans considered carnivores?
pos_context_en:
Various mammals are omnivorous in the wild, such as species of pigs, badgers, bears, coatis, civets, hedgehogs, opossums, skunks, sloths, squirrels, raccoons, chipmunks, mice, and rats. Hominidae, including humans and chimpanzees, are also omnivores.
Most bear species are omnivores, but individual diets can range from almost exclusively herbivorous to almost exclusively carnivorous, depending on what food sources are available locally and seasonally. Polar bears are classified as carnivores, both taxonomically (they are in the order Carnivora), and behaviorally (they subsist on a largely carnivorous diet). Depending on the species of bear, there is generally a preference for one class of food, as plants and animals are digested differently. Wolf subspecies (including wolves, dogs, dingoes, and coyotes) eat some plant matter, but they have a general preference and are evolutionarily geared towards meat. Also, the maned wolf is a canid whose diet is naturally 50% plant matter.
neg_context_en: It is remarkable the almost complete absence of carnivores, which are only represented by a few bones of "Ursus arctos", "Lynx pardinus" and "Canis lupus". The occurrence of carnivores in other sites, as in Boquete de Zafarraya, alternates with human presence in the stratigraphy. This event is interpreted as a seasonal occupation of the site by humans. When humans leave this habitat, carnivores take place of the site. Since this situation is not observed at Cave of the Angel, and moreover, there is no interruption in the stratigraphy of human presence, it is likely that a long term human occupation took place. In contrast, the existence of those few carnivore remains can be explained as the result of human consumption as so it happens with rabbit remains ("Oryctolagus cuniculus").

Fungi that grow on the epidermis, hair, skin, nails, scales or feathers of living or dead animals are considered to be dermatophytes rather than carnivores. Similarly fungi in orifices and the digestive tract of animals are not carnivorous, and neither are internal pathogens. Neither are insect pathogens that stun and colonize insects normally labelled carnivorous if the fungal thallus is mainly in the insect as does "Cordyceps", or if it clings to the insect like the Laboulbeniales.

In more modern classification, such as that of the Angiosperm Phylogeny Group, the families have been retained, but they have been redistributed amongst several disparate orders. It is also recommended that "Drosophyllum" be considered in a monotypic family outside the rest of the Droseraceae, probably more closely allied to the Dioncophyllaceae. The current recommendations are shown below (only carnivorous genera are listed):
In horticulture, carnivorous plants are considered a curiosity or a rarity, but are becoming more common in cultivation with the advent of mass-production tissue-culture propagation techniques. Venus flytraps are still the most commonly grown, usually available at garden centers and hardware stores, sometimes offered alongside other easy to grow varieties. Nurseries that specialize in growing carnivorous plants exclusively also exist, more uncommon or demanding varieties of carnivorous plants can be obtained from specialist nurseries. California Carnivores is a notable example of such a nursery in the US that specializes in the cultivation of carnivorous plants. It is owned and operated by horticulturalist Peter D'Amato. Rob Cantley's Borneo Exotics in Sri Lanka is a large nursery that sells worldwide.

Foxes are often considered pests or nuisance creatures for their opportunistic attacks on poultry and other small livestock. Fox attacks on humans are not common.
Many foxes adapt well to human environments, with several species classified as "resident urban carnivores" for their ability to sustain populations entirely within urban boundaries. Foxes in urban areas can live longer and can have smaller litter sizes than foxes in non-urban areas. Urban foxes are ubiquitous in Europe, where they show altered behaviors compared to non-urban foxes, including increased population density, smaller territory, and pack foraging. Foxes have been introduced in numerous locations, with varying effects on indigenous flora and fauna.

Though Carnivora is a taxon for species classification, no such equivalent exists for omnivores, as omnivores are widespread across multiple taxonomic clades. The Carnivora order does not include all carnivorous species, and not all species within the Carnivora taxon are carnivorous. It is common to find physiological carnivores consuming materials from plants or physiological herbivores consuming material from animals, e.g. felines eating grass and deer eating birds. From a behavioral aspect, this would make them omnivores, but from the physiological standpoint, this may be due to zoopharmacognosy. Physiologically, animals must be able to obtain both energy and nutrients from plant and animal materials to be considered omnivorous. Thus, such animals are still able to be classified as carnivores and herbivores when they are just obtaining nutrients from materials originating from sources that do not seemingly complement their classification. For instance, it is well documented that animals such as giraffes, camels, and cattle will gnaw on bones, preferably dry bones, for particular minerals and nutrients. Felines, which are usually regarded as obligate carnivores, occasionally eat grass to regurgitate indigestibles (e.g. hair, bones), aid with hemoglobin production, and as a laxative.

Although insects can be a problem, by far the biggest killer of carnivorous plants (besides human maltreatment) is grey mold ("Botrytis cinerea"). This thrives under warm, humid conditions and can be a real problem in winter. To some extent, temperate carnivorous plants can be protected from this pathogen by ensuring that they are kept cool and well ventilated in winter and that any dead leaves are removed promptly. If this fails, a fungicide is in order.

Some physiological carnivores consume plant matter and some physiological herbivores consume meat. From a behavioral aspect, this would make them omnivores, but from the physiological standpoint, this may be due to zoopharmacognosy. Physiologically, animals must be able to obtain both energy and nutrients from plant and animal materials to be considered omnivorous. Thus, such animals are still able to be classified as carnivores and herbivores when they are just obtaining nutrients from materials originating from sources that do not seemingly complement their classification. For example, it is well documented that some ungulates such as giraffes, camels, and cattle, will gnaw on bones to consume particular minerals and nutrients. Also, cats, which are generally regarded as obligate carnivores, occasionally eat grass to regurgitate indigestible material (such as hairballs), aid with hemoglobin production, and as a laxative.

Many prehistoric mammals of the clade Carnivoramorpha (Carnivora and Miacoidea without Creodonta), along with the early order Creodonta, and some mammals of the even earlier order Cimolesta, were hypercarnivores. The earliest carnivorous mammal is considered to be "Cimolestes", which existed during the Late Cretaceous and early Paleogene periods in North America about 66 million years ago. Theropod dinosaurs such as "Tyrannosaurus rex" that existed during the late Cretaceous, although not mammals, were obligate carnivores.

Although dogs are most abundant and widely distributed terrestrial carnivores, the potential of feral and free-ranging dogs to compete with other large carnivores is limited by their strong association with humans. For example, a review of the studies in the competitive effects of dogs on sympatric carnivores did not mention any research on competition between dogs and wolves. Although wolves are known to kill dogs, they tend to live in pairs or in small packs in areas where they are highly persecuted, giving them a disadvantage facing large dog groups.
question_src: Je! Wanadamu wanachukuliwa kuwa carnivores?
pos_context_src:
Mamalia mbali mbali ni omnivorous porini, kama spishi za nguruwe, beji, huzaa, kanzu, civets, hedgehogs, opossums, skunks, sloths, squirrels, raccoons, chipmunks, panya, na panya. Hominidae, pamoja na wanadamu na chimpanzee, pia ni omnivores.
Aina nyingi za kubeba ni omnivores, lakini lishe ya mtu binafsi inaweza kutoka karibu na mimea ya karibu hadi karibu ya carnivorous, kulingana na ni vyanzo gani vya chakula vinapatikana ndani na msimu. Bears za polar zinaainishwa kama carnivores, zote mbili kwa ushuru (ziko katika mpangilio wa carnivora), na kwa tabia (wanashikilia lishe kubwa). Kulingana na spishi za dubu, kwa ujumla kuna upendeleo kwa darasa moja la chakula, kwani mimea na wanyama huchimbwa tofauti. Subspecies za Wolf (pamoja na mbwa mwitu, mbwa, dingo, na coyotes) hula kitu fulani cha mmea, lakini wana upendeleo wa jumla na wameelekezwa kwa nyama. Pia, mbwa mwitu wa manned ni canid ambaye lishe yake ni ya kawaida 50% ya mmea.
neg_context_src: Inashangaza kutokuwepo kabisa kwa carnivores, ambayo inawakilishwa tu na mifupa michache ya "Ursus Arctos", "Lynx Pardinus" na "Canis Lupus". Tukio la carnivores katika tovuti zingine, kama katika Boquete de Zafarraya, hubadilika na uwepo wa mwanadamu katika stratigraphy. Hafla hii inatafsiriwa kama kazi ya msimu wa tovuti na wanadamu. Wakati wanadamu wanaacha makazi haya, carnivores huchukua nafasi ya tovuti. Kwa kuwa hali hii haizingatiwi katika Pango la Malaika, na zaidi ya hayo, hakuna usumbufu katika hali ya uwepo wa mwanadamu, kuna uwezekano kwamba kazi ya mwanadamu ya muda mrefu ilifanyika. Kwa kulinganisha, uwepo wa mabaki hayo machache ya carnivore yanaweza kuelezewa kama matokeo ya matumizi ya binadamu kwa hivyo hufanyika na mabaki ya sungura ("Oryctolagus cuniculus").

Kuvu ambayo hukua kwenye epidermis, nywele, ngozi, kucha, mizani au manyoya ya wanyama walio hai au waliokufa huchukuliwa kuwa dermatophytes badala ya carnivores. Vivyo hivyo kuvu katika orifices na njia ya kumengenya ya wanyama sio ya kupendeza, na wala vimelea vya ndani. Wala sio vimelea vya wadudu ambavyo vinashangaza na kuwacha wadudu kawaida huitwa carnivorous ikiwa thallus ya kuvu iko katika wadudu kama vile "Cordyceps", au ikiwa inashikamana na wadudu kama Laboulbeniales.

Katika uainishaji wa kisasa zaidi, kama ile ya kikundi cha angiosperm phylogeny, familia zimehifadhiwa, lakini zimesambazwa tena kati ya maagizo kadhaa tofauti. Inapendekezwa pia kuwa "Drosophyllum" izingatiwe katika familia ya monotypic nje ya Droseraceae yote, labda inashirikiana kwa karibu na Dioncophyllaceae. Mapendekezo ya sasa yanaonyeshwa hapa chini (genera tu ya carnivorous imeorodheshwa):
Katika kilimo cha maua, mimea ya kupendeza inachukuliwa kuwa udadisi au rarity, lakini inakuwa kawaida katika kilimo na ujio wa mbinu za uenezaji wa tishu za tishu. Flytraps za Venus bado ni watu wa kawaida, kawaida hupatikana katika vituo vya bustani na maduka ya vifaa, wakati mwingine hutolewa kando na aina zingine rahisi za kukuza. Vitalu ambavyo vina utaalam katika mimea inayokua ya kupendeza pia inapatikana, aina zisizo za kawaida au zinazodai za mimea ya carnivorous zinaweza kupatikana kutoka kwa kitalu cha kitaalam. California carnivores ni mfano mashuhuri wa kitalu kama hicho huko Amerika ambacho kitaalam katika kilimo cha mimea ya carnivorous. Inamilikiwa na kuendeshwa na mtaalam wa maua Peter D'Amato. Rob Cantley's Borneo Exotics huko Sri Lanka ni kitalu kikubwa ambacho huuza ulimwenguni.

Mbweha mara nyingi hufikiriwa wadudu au viumbe vya kero kwa mashambulio yao ya fursa kwenye kuku na mifugo mingine ndogo. Mashambulio ya mbweha kwa wanadamu sio kawaida.
Mbweha nyingi huzoea vyema mazingira ya kibinadamu, na spishi kadhaa zilizoainishwa kama "wakaazi wa mijini" kwa uwezo wao wa kudumisha idadi ya watu ndani ya mipaka ya mijini. Mbweha katika maeneo ya mijini inaweza kuishi kwa muda mrefu na inaweza kuwa na ukubwa mdogo wa takataka kuliko mbweha katika maeneo yasiyo ya mijini. Mbweha za mijini ni za kawaida huko Uropa, ambapo zinaonyesha tabia zilizobadilishwa ikilinganishwa na mbweha zisizo za mijini, pamoja na kuongezeka kwa wiani wa idadi ya watu, eneo ndogo, na upakiaji wa pakiti. Mbweha zimeanzishwa katika maeneo mengi, na athari tofauti juu ya mimea ya asili na wanyama.

Ingawa Carnivora ni taxon ya uainishaji wa spishi, hakuna sawa sawa kwa omnivores, kwani omnivores zimeenea katika safu nyingi za ushuru. Agizo la Carnivora halijumuishi spishi zote za kupendeza, na sio spishi zote zilizo ndani ya taxon ya carnivora ni nzuri. Ni kawaida kupata vifaa vya mwili vya mwili vinavyotumia vifaa kutoka kwa mimea au mimea ya kisaikolojia inayotumia nyenzo kutoka kwa wanyama, n.k. Felini kula nyasi na kulungu kula ndege. Kutoka kwa tabia ya tabia, hii ingewafanya wawe omnivores, lakini kwa maoni ya kisaikolojia, hii inaweza kuwa ni kwa sababu ya zoopharmacognosy. Kisaikolojia, wanyama lazima waweze kupata nishati na virutubishi kutoka kwa vifaa vya mimea na wanyama ili kuzingatiwa kuwa sawa. Kwa hivyo, wanyama kama hao bado wanaweza kuainishwa kama carnivores na mimea ya mimea wakati wanapata virutubishi kutoka kwa vifaa vinavyotokana na vyanzo ambavyo havionekani kukamilisha uainishaji wao. Kwa mfano, imeandikwa vizuri kuwa wanyama kama twiga, ngamia, na ng'ombe watakuwa kwenye mifupa, ikiwezekana mifupa kavu, kwa madini na virutubishi fulani. Felini, ambazo kawaida huzingatiwa kama lazima za carnivores, mara kwa mara hula nyasi ili kudhibiti indigestibles (k.m. nywele, mifupa), misaada na uzalishaji wa hemoglobin, na kama laxative.

Ingawa wadudu wanaweza kuwa shida, kwa muuaji mkubwa zaidi wa mimea ya carnivorous (mbali na unyanyasaji wa binadamu) ni ukungu wa kijivu ("Botrytis cinerea"). Hii inakua chini ya hali ya joto, yenye unyevu na inaweza kuwa shida ya kweli wakati wa msimu wa baridi. Kwa kiwango fulani, mimea yenye joto ya carnivorous inaweza kulindwa kutoka kwa pathogen hii kwa kuhakikisha kuwa zinahifadhiwa vizuri na zina hewa nzuri wakati wa msimu wa baridi na kwamba majani yoyote yaliyokufa huondolewa mara moja. Ikiwa hii itashindwa, kuvu ni kwa utaratibu.

Baadhi ya mwili wa kisaikolojia hutumia vitu vya mmea na mimea ya mimea ya kisaikolojia hutumia nyama. Kutoka kwa tabia ya tabia, hii ingewafanya wawe omnivores, lakini kwa maoni ya kisaikolojia, hii inaweza kuwa ni kwa sababu ya zoopharmacognosy. Kisaikolojia, wanyama lazima waweze kupata nishati na virutubishi kutoka kwa vifaa vya mimea na wanyama ili kuzingatiwa kuwa sawa. Kwa hivyo, wanyama kama hao bado wanaweza kuainishwa kama carnivores na mimea ya mimea wakati wanapata virutubishi kutoka kwa vifaa vinavyotokana na vyanzo ambavyo havionekani kukamilisha uainishaji wao. Kwa mfano, imeandikwa vizuri kuwa baadhi ya visivyo na maana kama twiga, ngamia, na ng'ombe, vitatupa juu ya mifupa ili kutumia madini na virutubishi fulani. Pia, paka, ambazo kwa ujumla huzingatiwa kama viboreshaji vya carnivores, wakati mwingine hula nyasi ili kudhibiti nyenzo zisizo na mwili (kama vile mipira ya nywele), misaada na uzalishaji wa hemoglobin, na kama laxative.

Wanyama wengi wa prehistoric wa clade carnivoramoramorpha (Carnivora na Miacoidea bila Creodonta), pamoja na Creodonta ya mapema, na mamalia wengine wa agizo la mapema la Cimolesta, walikuwa hypercarnivores. Mnyama wa kwanza anayeonekana kuwa "cimolestes", ambayo ilikuwepo wakati wa kipindi cha marehemu cha Cretaceous na mapema Paleogene huko Amerika Kaskazini karibu miaka milioni 66 iliyopita. Dinosaurs za Theropod kama "Tyrannosaurus rex" ambayo ilikuwepo wakati wa marehemu Cretaceous, ingawa sio mamalia, walikuwa washirika wa carnivores.

Ingawa mbwa ni nyingi na kusambazwa sana carnivores ya ulimwengu, uwezo wa mbwa wa asili na wa bure kushindana na carnivores zingine kubwa ni mdogo na ushirika wao wenye nguvu na wanadamu. Kwa mfano, uhakiki wa masomo katika athari za ushindani wa mbwa kwenye carnivores ya huruma haukutaja utafiti wowote juu ya ushindani kati ya mbwa na mbwa mwitu. Ingawa mbwa mwitu wanajulikana kuua mbwa, huwa wanaishi kwa jozi au katika pakiti ndogo katika maeneo ambayo wanateswa sana, kuwapa shida inayowakabili vikundi vikubwa vya mbwa.

question_en: What is the most common natural polymer?
pos_context_en: People have been using natural organic polymers for centuries in the form of waxes and shellac, which is classified as a thermoplastic polymer. A plant polymer named cellulose provided the tensile strength for natural fibers and ropes, and by the early 19th century natural rubber was in widespread use. Polymers are the raw materials (the resins) used to make what are commonly called plastics. Plastics are the final product, created after one or more polymers or additives have been added to a resin during processing, which is then shaped into a final form. Polymers that have been around, and that are in current widespread use, include carbon-based polyethylene, polypropylene, polyvinyl chloride, polystyrene, nylons, polyesters, acrylics, polyurethane, and polycarbonates, and silicon-based silicones. Plastics are generally classified as "commodity", "specialty" and "engineering" plastics.
neg_context_en: DNA, RNA and proteins are most common sequence-controlled polymers in living creatures. Inspired by them, polymerization methods, utilizing DNA or RNA as templates to control sequences of polymer, are developed. At first, taking DNA or RNA as templates, scientists developed a series of peptide nucleic acid (PNA)-based polymers, without using DNA polymerases. But this method is limited to polymerization scale and yield. After that, polymerase chain reaction (PCR) is developed, which currently is still the most extensively used sequence-regulated method. By employing enzymes, the yields and scales are greatly increased, but the specificity of enzymes towards natural peptides limits this technique to a certain degree. Nowadays, more attention is paid to utilization of ribosomes to directly mimic the transcription and translation process. This technology called protein engineering is considered as the most promising biological polymerization method for synthesis of sequence-controlled polymers.

Just like erosion of rocks, natural phenomena can cause degradation in polymer systems. The elements of most concern to polymers are ultraviolet radiation, moisture and humidity, high temperatures and temperature fluctuations. Polymers are used in everyday life, so it is important for scientists and polymer producers to understand durability and expected lifespan of polymer products. Paint, a common polymer coating, is used to change the colour, change the reflectance (gloss), as well as forming a protective coating. The structure of paint consists of pigments in a matrix of resin.
A typical example is painted steel roofing and walling products, which are constantly exposed to harmful weathering conditions.

A polymer is a macromolecule, composed of many similar or identical repeated subunits. Polymers are common, but not limited to organic media. They range from familiar synthetic plastics to natural biopolymers such as DNA and proteins. Their unique elongated molecular structure produces unique physical properties, including toughness, viscoelasticity, and a tendency to form glasses and semicrystalline structures. The modern concept of polymers as covalently bonded macromolecular structures was proposed in 1920 by Hermann Staudinger.
One sub-field in the study of polymers is polymer physics. As a part of soft matter studies, Polymer physics concerns itself with the study of mechanical properties and focuses on the perspective of condensed matter physics.

Some familiar household synthetic polymers include: Nylons in textiles and fabrics, Teflon in non-stick pans, Bakelite for electrical switches, polyvinyl chloride (PVC) in pipes, etc. The common PET bottles are made of a synthetic polymer, polyethylene terephthalate. The plastic kits and covers are mostly made of synthetic polymers like polythene and tires are manufactured from Buna rubbers. However, due to the environmental issues created by these synthetic polymers which are mostly non-biodegradable and often synthesized from petroleum, alternatives like bioplastics are also being considered. They are however expensive when compared to the synthetic polymers.The eight most common types of synthetic organic polymers, which are commonly found in households are:

The Cohen brothers were looking for a commercial edge and became aware, in 1894, that Charles Cross, Edward Bevan and Clayton Beadle had patented their "artificial silk" which they named "Viscose" in the UK and "Rayon" in the US, and sold under the trade name "Dacron". Although natural polymers have been with around since time began, synthetic polymers are more recent and owe their origin to Alexander Parkes and his exhibits at the International Exhibition in London in 1862. The most basic building block of a polymer is a monomer, which, when combined with oxygen, nitrogen, chlorine, or fluoride, becomes a "polymers". The most important polymer, for fabric construction is Polyethylene terephthalate, more commonly known as "polyester". The bright vibrant synthetic fabrics made from these synthetic "building blocks" exhibit a silk "handle"; and all the comfort properties of natural fibres, imitating silk, wool and linen.

Generally, it has been found that scaffolds that closely resemble the natural environments of the tissue being engineered are the most successful. As a result, much research has gone into investigating natural polymers that can be tailored, through processing methodology, toward specific design criteria. Chitosan is currently one of the most widely used polymers as it is very similar to naturally occurring glycosaminoglycan (GAGs) and it is degradable by human enzymes.

Natural biodegradable polymers are formed in nature during growth cycles of all organisms. When searching for natural fibers to replace synthetic materials in athletic shoes, the major natural biodegradable polymer that offers the most potential are polysaccharides. Starch is a polysaccharide that is useful because it readily degrades into harmless products when placed in contact with soil microorganisms.

Polyvinyl ethers are a class of organic polymers derived from vinyl ethers. The most common polymers of this class are derived from methyl vinyl ether and ethyl vinyl ether, the polymer having the formula [CHCH(OCH)]. Commercial interest has also focused on polymers derived from ethyl, isobutyl, octadecyl substituents in place of methyl. Like other vinyl polymers, the polymers exhibit tacticity. Polymerization is typically initiated with Lewis acids such as boron trifluoride.

Inorganic polymers are polymers with a skeletal structure that does not include carbon atoms in the backbone. Polymers containing inorganic and organic components are sometimes called hybrid polymers, and most so-called inorganic polymers are hybrid polymers. One of the best known examples is polydimethylsiloxane, otherwise known commonly as silicone rubber. Inorganic polymers offer some properties not found in organic materials including low temperature flexibility, electrical conductivity, and nonflammability. The term "inorganic polymer" refers generally to one-dimensional polymers, rather than to heavily crosslinked materials such as silicate minerals. Inorganic polymers with tunable or responsive properties are sometimes called smart inorganic polymers. A special class of inorganic polymers are geopolymers, which may be anthropogenic or naturally occurring.
question_src: Je! Ni polima ya kawaida ya kawaida?
pos_context_src: Watu wamekuwa wakitumia polima za kikaboni kwa karne nyingi katika mfumo wa nta na ganda, ambayo imeainishwa kama polymer ya thermoplastic. Polymer ya mmea inayoitwa cellulose ilitoa nguvu tensile kwa nyuzi asili na kamba, na mwanzoni mwa karne ya 19 mpira wa asili ulikuwa katika matumizi mengi. Polymers ni malighafi (resini) inayotumika kutengeneza kile kinachoitwa plastiki kawaida. Plastiki ni bidhaa ya mwisho, iliyoundwa baada ya polima moja au zaidi au nyongeza zimeongezwa kwenye resin wakati wa usindikaji, ambayo kisha imeundwa kuwa fomu ya mwisho. Polymers ambazo zimekuwa karibu, na ambazo ziko katika matumizi ya sasa, ni pamoja na polyethilini ya kaboni, polypropylene, kloridi ya polyvinyl, polystyrene, nylons, polyesters, acrylics, polyurethane, na polycarbonates, na silicon-msingi wa silicon. Plastiki kwa ujumla huainishwa kama "bidhaa", "utaalam" na "uhandisi" plastiki.
neg_context_title_src: Upimaji wa hali ya hewa ya polima
Njia za ujumuishaji katika sayansi ya polymer
neg_context_src: DNA, RNA na protini ni polima za kawaida zinazodhibitiwa na mlolongo katika viumbe hai. Imehamasishwa nao, njia za upolimishaji, kutumia DNA au RNA kama templeti kudhibiti mlolongo wa polymer, zinatengenezwa. Mwanzoni, kuchukua DNA au RNA kama templeti, wanasayansi waliendeleza safu ya polima ya peptide (PNA), bila kutumia polymerases za DNA. Lakini njia hii ni mdogo kwa kiwango cha upolimishaji na mavuno. Baada ya hapo, athari ya mnyororo wa polymerase (PCR) imeandaliwa, ambayo kwa sasa bado ndiyo njia inayotumika sana ya mlolongo. Kwa kutumia Enzymes, mavuno na mizani huongezeka sana, lakini hali maalum ya enzymes kuelekea peptides asili hupunguza mbinu hii kwa kiwango fulani. Siku hizi, umakini zaidi hulipwa kwa utumiaji wa ribosomes ili kuiga moja kwa moja mchakato wa maandishi na tafsiri. Teknolojia hii inayoitwa uhandisi wa proteni inachukuliwa kama njia ya kuahidi ya polymerization ya biolojia kwa mchanganyiko wa polima zinazodhibitiwa na mlolongo.

Kama mmomonyoko wa miamba, matukio ya asili yanaweza kusababisha uharibifu katika mifumo ya polymer. Vitu vya wasiwasi zaidi kwa polima ni mionzi ya ultraviolet, unyevu na unyevu, joto la juu na kushuka kwa joto. Polymers hutumiwa katika maisha ya kila siku, kwa hivyo ni muhimu kwa wanasayansi na wazalishaji wa polymer kuelewa uimara na maisha yanayotarajiwa ya bidhaa za polymer. Rangi, mipako ya kawaida ya polymer, hutumiwa kubadilisha rangi, kubadilisha tafakari (gloss), na pia kuunda mipako ya kinga. Muundo wa rangi una rangi katika tumbo la resin.
Mfano wa kawaida ni rangi za chuma zilizochorwa na bidhaa za ukuta, ambazo hufunuliwa kila wakati kwa hali mbaya ya hali ya hewa.

Polymer ni macromolecule, inayojumuisha subunits nyingi zinazofanana au zinazofanana. Polymers ni kawaida, lakini sio mdogo kwa vyombo vya habari vya kikaboni. Zinatokana na plastiki za kawaida za synthetic hadi biopolymers asili kama vile DNA na protini. Muundo wao wa kipekee wa Masi hutengeneza mali ya kipekee ya mwili, pamoja na ugumu, viscoelasticity, na tabia ya kuunda glasi na muundo wa semicrystalline. Wazo la kisasa la polima kama miundo ya macromolecular iliyowekwa kwa usawa ilipendekezwa mnamo 1920 na Hermann Staudinger.
Sehemu moja ndogo katika utafiti wa polima ni fizikia ya polymer. Kama sehemu ya masomo laini, fizikia ya polymer inajishughulisha na utafiti wa mali ya mitambo na inazingatia mtazamo wa fizikia ya jambo lililofupishwa.

Baadhi ya polima za syntetisk za kaya ni pamoja na: nylons katika nguo na vitambaa, Teflon katika sufuria zisizo na fimbo, Bakelite kwa swichi za umeme, polyvinyl kloridi (PVC) katika bomba, nk chupa za kawaida za PET zinafanywa kwa polymer ya synthetic, polythylene terephthalate. Vifaa vya plastiki na vifuniko vinatengenezwa zaidi na polima za syntetisk kama polythene na matairi hutengenezwa kutoka kwa rubbers za Buna. Walakini, kwa sababu ya maswala ya mazingira yaliyoundwa na polima hizi za syntetisk ambazo haziwezi kuelezewa na mara nyingi hutengenezwa kutoka kwa mafuta, njia mbadala kama bioplastiki pia zinazingatiwa. Hata hivyo ni ghali ikilinganishwa na polima za syntetisk. Aina nane za kawaida za polima za kikaboni, ambazo hupatikana katika kaya ni:

Ndugu za Cohen walikuwa wakitafuta makali ya kibiashara na wakafahamu, mnamo 1894, kwamba Charles Cross, Edward Bevan na Clayton Beadle walikuwa na hati miliki ya "bandia" ambayo waliiita "Viscose" huko Uingereza na "Rayon" huko Amerika, na kuuzwa chini ya jina la biashara "Dacron". Ingawa polima za asili zimekuwa pamoja tangu wakati ulianza, polima za syntetisk ni za hivi karibuni zaidi na zinadaiwa asili yao kwa Alexander Parkes na maonyesho yake katika Maonyesho ya Kimataifa huko London mnamo 1862. Kizuizi cha msingi cha ujenzi wa polymer ni monomer, ambayo, wakati wa pamoja na oksijeni, nitrojeni, klorini, au fluoride, "Polym". " Polymer muhimu zaidi, kwa ujenzi wa kitambaa ni polyethilini terephthalate, inayojulikana zaidi kama "polyester". Vitambaa vyenye nguvu vya synthetic vilivyotengenezwa kutoka kwa "vizuizi vya ujenzi" vya synthetic vinaonyesha hariri "kushughulikia"; na mali yote ya faraja ya nyuzi za asili, kuiga hariri, pamba na kitani.

Kwa ujumla, imegundulika kuwa scaffolds ambazo zinafanana sana na mazingira ya asili ya tishu zinazoundwa ni kufanikiwa zaidi. Kama matokeo, utafiti mwingi umeenda katika kuchunguza polima za asili ambazo zinaweza kulengwa, kupitia njia ya usindikaji, kuelekea vigezo maalum vya muundo. Chitosan kwa sasa ni moja wapo ya polima inayotumiwa sana kwani ni sawa na asili ya glycosaminoglycan (GAGs) na inaharibiwa na enzymes za binadamu.

Polima za asili zinazoweza kusongeshwa huundwa katika maumbile wakati wa mizunguko ya ukuaji wa viumbe vyote. Wakati wa kutafuta nyuzi za asili ili kuchukua nafasi ya vifaa vya syntetisk katika viatu vya riadha, polymer kuu ya asili inayoweza kutolewa ambayo hutoa uwezo mkubwa ni polysaccharides. Wanga ni polysaccharide ambayo ni muhimu kwa sababu inaharibika kwa urahisi kuwa bidhaa zisizo na madhara wakati zinawekwa katika mawasiliano na vijidudu vya mchanga.

Ethers za Polyvinyl ni darasa la polima za kikaboni zinazotokana na vinyl ethers. Polima za kawaida za darasa hili zinatokana na methyl vinyl ether na ethyl vinyl ether, polymer kuwa na formula [CHCH (OCH)]. Masilahi ya kibiashara pia yamezingatia polima zinazotokana na ethyl, isobutyl, mbadala za octadecyl badala ya methyl. Kama polima zingine za vinyl, polima zinaonyesha mbinu. Upolimishaji kawaida huanzishwa na asidi ya Lewis kama vile boroni trifluoride.

Polima za isokaboni ni polima zilizo na muundo wa mifupa ambao haujumuishi atomi za kaboni kwenye uti wa mgongo. Polymers zilizo na vifaa vya isokaboni na kikaboni wakati mwingine huitwa polima za mseto, na polima nyingi zinazojulikana ni polima za mseto. Mojawapo ya mifano inayojulikana zaidi ni polydimethylsiloxane, vinginevyo hujulikana kama mpira wa silicone. Ma polima ya isokaboni hutoa mali zingine ambazo hazipatikani katika vifaa vya kikaboni pamoja na kubadilika kwa joto la chini, umeme wa umeme, na kutokuwa na mwangaza. Neno "polymer ya isokaboni" linamaanisha polima zenye sura moja, badala ya vifaa vilivyoingiliana sana kama madini ya silika. Polima za isokaboni zilizo na mali zinazoweza kusongeshwa au zenye msikivu wakati mwingine huitwa polima za isokaboni. Darasa maalum la polima za isokaboni ni geopolymers, ambayo inaweza kuwa ya anthropogenic au kawaida kutokea.
report_src: Polyethilini (PE) hutambulika kama polima ya kawaida zaidi duniani kwa sababu huzalishwa kwa wingi na hutumika katika bidhaa nyingi za kila siku kama mifuko ya plastiki, filamu za ufungaji, chupa na mabomba; kwa mujibu wa orodha ya polima zinazotumika sasa, polyethilini (iliyoandikwa “polyethilini ya kaboni”) ni mojawapo ya polima kuu pamoja na polypropylene, kloridi ya polyvinyl na polystyrene [1].

question_en: When was Lieutenant Colonel Sir Michael Frederick Bruxner born?
pos_context_en: Lieutenant Colonel Sir Michael Frederick Bruxner (25 March 1882 – 28 March 1970) was an Australian politician and soldier, serving for many years as Leader of the Country Party and its predecessors. Born in Tabulum in Northern New South Wales, Bruxner was educated at The Armidale School and started studies at University of Sydney but later dropped out to take up employment as a grazier and station agent in Tenterfield. After serving in the Citizen Military Forces from 1911, Bruxner enlisted into the Australian Light Horse upon the outbreak of the First World War in 1914. Serving with distinction in Gallipoli, Egypt and Palestine, he was promoted to lieutenant colonel and awarded the Distinguished Service Order.
neg_context_en: Bruxner started his military career when he was commissioned as a second lieutenant on 11 September 1911 in the 6th Australian (New England) Light Horse, Citizen Military Forces, which was redesignated the 5th the following year. When the First World War broke out in September 1914, Bruxner joined up soon after on 10 October 1914 with the 6th Light Horse Regiment in the Australian Imperial Force. Promoted to captain, Bruxner was sent with his unit to take part in the Gallipoli Campaign, being wounded several times. Later, in 1916, he commanded the 6th during part of the Battle of Romani and served with distinction in the Sinai and Palestine Campaign, for which he was mentioned in despatches twice. On 30 May 1917 was appointed by the President of France, Raymond Poincaré, as a Chevalier of the Légion d'honneur "in recognition of distinguished services during the campaign". Also in 1917, Bruxner was appointed to General Headquarters and rose to be assistant adjutant and quartermaster-general of the ANZAC Mounted Division. For his service he was promoted to lieutenant colonel and appointed as a Companion of the Distinguished Service Order (DSO) in 1919.

James Caird Bruxner, better known as 'Tim' (which was an old family nickname), was born 18 May 1923 in Tenterfield, New South Wales, the youngest son of NSW Country Party politician Michael Frederick Bruxner and Winifred Hay "Midge" Caird. His brother, John Michael Bruxner, later became a Judge of the District Court of New South Wales. He spent his early years on the family property "Roseneath", until he left to attend Cranbrook School, Sydney, becoming School Captain in 1940.

Bruxner was born in Tabulum, near the Clarence River in Northern New South Wales, the second son of English-born grazier Charles Augustus Bruxner (1851–1915) and his wife Sarah Elizabeth Barnes (1858–1941). Bruxner was initially educated in private tuition but was soon sent as a boarder first at St Mark's Crescent School in Darling Point, Sydney and then to The Armidale School, where he became School Captain in 1900. From 1901 to 1903, he studied arts and law at the University of Sydney while resident at St Paul's College, but was expelled for non-attendance of lectures.

Fleming was the only son of Sir William Fleming, 3rd Baronet of Rydal, Westmorland, and his wife Elizabeth Petyt, daughter of Christopher Petyt of Skipton, Yorkshire and was born on 10 December 1748. His father died when he was nine on 31 March 1757 and he succeeded to the baronetcy. Sir James Lowther became his ward. Fleming was educated at Eton College from 1760 to 1765. In 1770 he became High Sheriff of Cumberland and in 1779 was Lieutenant.-colonel in the Westmorland. Militia.

Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Kenneth Whistler Street, (1890–1972) was elevated as a judge of the Supreme Court on 7 October 1931. He thus joined the bench of which his father, Sir Philip Whistler Street, was then Chief Justice. According to Percival Serle, this is the only known case in Australian history of a father and a son sitting as judges together on the same bench. In 1949, as senior puisne judge, Street acted as Chief Justice when Sir Frederick Richard Jordan died. He was confirmed in that office from 6 January 1950 and was sworn in on 7 February. Street was Lieutenant-Governor from 1950 to 1972. Prior to his career as a judge, he served the Allied forces in World War I, having been commissioned on 29 September 1914 in the Duke of Cornwall’s Light Infantry and sent to France. He ultimately rose to the rank of Lieutenant-Colonel in the Australian Army.

Barne was the only son of Lieutenant-Colonel Michael Barne and Mary Boucherett, daughter of Ayscoghe Boucherett. He served as a captain in the 12th Royal Lancers.In 1830 he was elected Member of Parliament for the rotten borough of Dunwich, the previous MP being his father. He held the seat until 1832 when it was abolished under the 1832 Reform Act. He lived at Sotterley HalI and was High Sheriff of Suffolk in 1851.
Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Edward Boscawen Frederick, 9th Baronet, (29 June 1880 – 26 October 1956) was a British Army officer, first-class cricketer and courtier.

Lieutenant Colonel Sir William Frederick Travers O'Connor C.I.E. C.S.I. C.V.O (30 July 1870, Ireland - 14 December 1943, Chelsea.) was a British and Indian Army officer and diplomat. He was 6'1" tall with blue eyes and a fair complexion. He is remembered for his travels in Asia, cartography, study and publication of local cultures and language, his actions on the Younghusband expedition to Tibet, Royal Geographic Society council member, member of the Royal Automobile Club and for his work negotiating and signing the Nepal–Britain Treaty of 1923.

Returning to Australia in 1919, Bruxner sold his business and joined the Progressive Party, being elected to the Parliament of New South Wales for Northern Tablelands at the 1920 election. Bruxner came to political prominence when he led the rural "True Blues" faction of the Progressive Party that went against their Leader's decision to form a coalition in Sir George Fuller's short-lived government in 1921. Bruxner emerged as the leader of the reduced Progressive Party, which consisted of the members of his faction, but they nevertheless joined with Fuller's Nationalists to form government in 1922. Bruxner also became involved in the New England New State Movement. Bruxner resigned the party leadership, now for the renamed Country Party, at the end of 1925.
question_src: Je! Kanali wa Luteni Sir Michael Frederick Bruxner alizaliwa lini?
pos_context_src: Luteni Kanali Sir Michael Frederick Bruxner (25 Machi 1882 - 28 Machi 1970) alikuwa mwanasiasa na askari wa Australia, akihudumu kwa miaka mingi kama kiongozi wa chama cha nchi hiyo na watangulizi wake. Mzaliwa wa Tabulum kaskazini mwa New South Wales, Bruxner alielimishwa katika Shule ya Armidale na kuanza masomo katika Chuo Kikuu cha Sydney lakini baadaye aliacha kuchukua ajira kama wakala wa Grazier na kituo huko Tenterfield. Baada ya kutumikia katika vikosi vya jeshi la raia kutoka 1911, Bruxner aliingia ndani ya farasi nyepesi wa Australia juu ya kuzuka kwa Vita vya Kwanza vya Ulimwengu mnamo 1914. Kutumikia kwa tofauti huko Gallipoli, Misri na Palestina, alipandishwa kwa Lieutenant Colonel na kukabidhi agizo la huduma ya kutofautisha.
neg_context_title_src: Sir Michael Le Fleming, Baronet wa 4
neg_context_src: Bruxner alianza kazi yake ya kijeshi wakati alipoamriwa kama mjumbe wa pili mnamo 11 Septemba 1911 katika farasi wa 6 wa Australia (New England), vikosi vya jeshi la raia, ambayo ilibadilishwa tena ya 5 mwaka uliofuata. Wakati Vita vya Kwanza vya Ulimwengu vilipoibuka mnamo Septemba 1914, Bruxner alijiunga mara baada ya tarehe 10 Oktoba 1914 na Kikosi cha 6 cha Farasi wa Mwanga katika Jeshi la Imperial la Australia. Alipandishwa kwa nahodha, Bruxner alitumwa na kitengo chake kushiriki katika kampeni ya Gallipoli, akijeruhiwa mara kadhaa. Baadaye, mnamo 1916, aliamuru ya 6 wakati wa Sehemu ya Vita vya Romani na alihudumu kwa tofauti katika Kampeni ya Sinai na Palestina, ambayo alitajwa katika Despatches mara mbili. Mnamo Mei 30, 1917 aliteuliwa na Rais wa Ufaransa, Raymond Poincaré, kama chevalier wa Légion d'Honneur "kwa kutambua huduma zilizojulikana wakati wa kampeni". Pia mnamo 1917, Bruxner aliteuliwa katika makao makuu ya jumla na akaibuka kuwa msaidizi msaidizi na Quartermaster-General wa Idara ya Anzac iliyowekwa. Kwa huduma yake alipandishwa kwa Lieutenant Colonel na kuteuliwa kama rafiki wa Agizo la Huduma Iliyotambulika (DSO) mnamo 1919.

James Caird Bruxner, anayejulikana kama 'Tim' (ambayo alikuwa jina la zamani la utani), alizaliwa 18 Mei 1923 huko Tenterfield, New South Wales, mtoto wa mwisho wa mwanasiasa wa chama cha NSW Michael Frederick Bruxner na Winifred Hay "Midge" Caird. Ndugu yake, John Michael Bruxner, baadaye alikua jaji wa Korti ya Wilaya ya New South Wales. Alitumia miaka yake ya mapema kwenye mali ya familia "Roseneath", hadi alipoondoka kwenda shule ya Cranbrook, Sydney, na kuwa nahodha wa shule mnamo 1940.

Bruxner alizaliwa huko Tabulum, karibu na Mto wa Clarence kaskazini mwa New South Wales, mtoto wa pili wa mzaliwa wa Kiingereza Grazier Charles Augustus Bruxner (1851-1915) na mkewe Sarah Elizabeth Barnes (1858-1941). Hapo awali Bruxner alielimishwa katika masomo ya kibinafsi lakini hivi karibuni alitumwa kama boarder kwanza katika Shule ya St Mark's Crescent huko Darling Point, Sydney na kisha kwenda Shule ya Armidale, ambapo alikua nahodha wa shule mnamo 1900. Kuanzia 1901 hadi 1903, alisoma sanaa na sheria katika Chuo Kikuu cha Sydney wakati wa makazi katika Chuo cha St Paul, lakini alifundisha kwa sababu ya kutokufanya kazi kwa sababu ya kutokuwa na dhamana.

Fleming alikuwa mtoto wa pekee wa Sir William Fleming, Baronet wa 3 wa Rydal, Westmorland, na mkewe Elizabeth Petyt, binti ya Christopher Petyt wa Skipton, Yorkshire na alizaliwa mnamo 10 Desemba 1748. Baba yake alikufa alipokuwa na miaka tisa mnamo 31 Machi 1757 na alifanikiwa kwa Baronetcy. Sir James Lowther akawa wadi yake. Fleming alielimishwa katika Chuo cha Eton kutoka 1760 hadi 1765. Mnamo 1770 alikua Sheriff wa juu wa Cumberland na mnamo 1779 alikuwa Lieutenant.-Colonel huko Westmorland. Wanamgambo.

Lieutenant-Kanali Sir Kenneth Whistler Street, (1890-1972) aliinuliwa kama jaji wa Mahakama Kuu mnamo 7 Oktoba 1931. Kwa hivyo alijiunga na benchi ambalo baba yake, Sir Philip Whistler Street, wakati huo alikuwa Jaji Mkuu. Kulingana na Percival Serle, hii ndio kesi pekee inayojulikana katika historia ya Australia ya baba na mtoto walioketi kama waamuzi pamoja kwenye benchi moja. Mnamo 1949, kama jaji mwandamizi wa Puisne, Street alifanya kama Jaji Mkuu wakati Sir Frederick Richard Jordan alikufa. Alithibitishwa katika ofisi hiyo kutoka 6 Januari 1950 na aliapishwa mnamo 7 Februari. Mtaa ulikuwa Luteni-Gavana kutoka 1950 hadi 1972. Kabla ya kazi yake kama jaji, alihudumia vikosi vya Washirika katika Vita vya Kwanza vya Dunia, akiwa ametumwa mnamo tarehe 29 Septemba 1914 katika Duke ya nyepesi ya watoto wachanga na kupelekwa Ufaransa. Mwishowe aliongezeka kwa kiwango cha Lieutenant-Colonel katika Jeshi la Australia.

Barne alikuwa mtoto wa pekee wa Lieutenant-Colonel Michael Barne na Mary Boucherett, binti ya Ayscoghe Boucherett. Alifanya kazi kama nahodha katika 12 ya Royal Lancers.in 1830 alichaguliwa kuwa Mjumbe wa Bunge kwa Borough iliyooza ya Dunwich, mbunge wa zamani kuwa baba yake. Alishikilia kiti hadi 1832 wakati ilikomeshwa chini ya Sheria ya Mageuzi ya 1832. Aliishi Sotterley Hali na alikuwa Sheriff wa juu wa Suffolk mnamo 1851.
Lieutenant-Kanali Sir Edward Boscawen Frederick, 9 Baronet, (29 Juni 1880-26 Oktoba 1956) alikuwa afisa wa Jeshi la Uingereza, kriketi ya darasa la kwanza na wakuu.

Luteni Kanali Sir William Frederick Travers O'Connor C.I.E. C.S.I. C.V.O (30 Julai 1870, Ireland - 14 Desemba 1943, Chelsea.) Alikuwa afisa wa jeshi la Uingereza na India na mwanadiplomasia. Alikuwa 6'1 "mrefu na macho ya bluu na rangi nzuri. Anakumbukwa kwa safari zake huko Asia, katuni, kusoma na kuchapishwa kwa tamaduni za ndani na lugha, vitendo vyake juu ya safari ya Younghusband kwenda Tibet, Mwanachama wa Baraza la Royal Geographic, mwanachama wa Royal Automobile Club na kwa kazi yake ya kujadili na kusaini makubaliano ya 1923.

Kurudi Australia mnamo 1919, Bruxner aliuza biashara yake na alijiunga na Chama cha Progressive, akichaguliwa katika Bunge la New South Wales kwa Jedwali la Kaskazini katika uchaguzi wa 1920. Bruxner alifika kwenye umaarufu wa kisiasa wakati alipoongoza kikundi cha "kweli cha kweli" cha chama kinachoendelea ambacho kilikwenda kinyume na uamuzi wa kiongozi wao kuunda umoja katika serikali ya Sir George Fuller ya muda mfupi mnamo 1921. Bruxner aliibuka kama kiongozi wa washirika wa maendeleo, ambao walikuwa na washiriki wa serikali yake, lakini walijiunga na serikali kuu ya serikali kuu, lakini walijiunga na serikali kuu ya serikali kuu, lakini walijiunga na serikali kuu ya serikali kuu, ambayo ilihusika na serikali ya serikali kuu, ambayo walijiunga na serikali ya serikali ya Brum2, lakini walijiunga na serikali ya serikali ya Brum2, ambayo walijiunga na serikali ya serikali ya BREST. Harakati mpya za Jimbo. Bruxner alijiuzulu uongozi wa chama, sasa kwa Chama cha Nchi kilichopewa jina, mwishoni mwa 1925.

question_en: What was Jared Leto's first film?
pos_context_en: Jared Leto is an American entertainer with an extensive career in film, music, and television. He made his debut with minor roles in the television shows "Camp Wilder" (1992) and "Almost Home" (1993). He achieved recognition in 1994 for his role as Jordan Catalano in the teen drama television series "My So-Called Life". The show was praised for its portrayal of adolescence and gained a cult following, despite being canceled after only one season. The same year, he made his television film debut starring alongside Alicia Silverstone in "Cool and the Crazy". Leto's first film role was in the 1995 drama "How to Make an American Quilt". He later co-starred with Christina Ricci in "The Last of the High Kings" (1996) and received a supporting role in "Switchback" (1997). In 1997, Leto starred in the biopic "Prefontaine" in which he played the role of Olympic hopeful Steve Prefontaine. His portrayal received positive reviews from critics and is often considered his breakthrough role. The following year, Leto starred together with Alicia Witt in the horror "Urban Legend". He then acted alongside Sean Penn and Adrien Brody in the war film "The Thin Red Line" (1998). After playing supporting roles in "Black and White" and "Girl, Interrupted", Leto portrayed Angel Face in "Fight Club" (1999), which has since became a cult film.
neg_context_title_en: List of awards and nominations received by Jared Leto
List of awards and nominations received by Jared Leto
neg_context_en: Leto's next project was "Hurricane" (2010), an experimental short film which explores personal demons and unlocking secret fantasies in what is believed to be a dream. Leto filmed it in New York City and described its concept as a "surrealistic nightmare dream-fantasy." Upon release, "Hurricane" garnered controversy and was initially censored due to its elements of violence. At the 2011 MTV Video Music Awards, the short film received three nominations in the categories of Best Direction, Best Cinematography and Best Editing.

The film follows rock band Thirty Seconds to Mars as they first learn of and then begin to fight a $30 million lawsuit brought by record label EMI. At the time, they had been writing songs in preparation for the follow-up to their 2005 album "A Beautiful Lie". For the bulk of the film, the band, consisting of Jared Leto, his brother Shannon Leto, and Tomo Miličević, is shown working with producers Flood and Steve Lillywhite to create what would eventually become "This Is War". Between recording sessions, they meet with lawyers to negotiate for the band's survival.

This is a list of awards and nominations received by Jared Leto. In 2009, Leto returned to acting with "Mr. Nobody". He was nominated for the Volpi Cup for Best Actor at the 66th Venice International Film Festival for his performance. As April 2017, Jared Leto has been nominated for 119 awards, winning 68. His awards in music are credited to him and fellow rock band members of Thirty Seconds to Mars

In 2013, Leto played HIV positive trans woman Rayon in Jean-Marc Vallée's film "Dallas Buyers Club", his first film role in five years. The film was released in November 2013, receiving acclaim from reviewers and roused nominations for major awards. Leto won the Critics' Choice Movie Award, Golden Globe Award, Screen Actors Guild Award, and Academy Award—all of Best Supporting Actor.

Leto described the series as an "unofficial sequel" to "Artifact", a documentary film about the legal dispute between Thirty Seconds to Mars and record label EMI. He explained, "it's what happens when "Artifact" left off. Literally. The last shot of the film is the first shot of the series." The series is directed by Jared Leto under his longtime pseudonym Bartholomew Cubbins. A trailer for the series premiered in November 2014, featuring a British narrator and assorted live scenes, paired with some interviews and some of the band's songs, including "Closer to the Edge".

The episode was filmed on location at University High School in Los Angeles, CA. The pilot was written by series creator Winnie Holzman and directed by Scott Winant. During filming, Holzman changed the status of Jared Leto's character Jordan Catalano. Originally, he was only supposed to appear in the first episode, but after Holzman saw Leto's acting skills, she wanted to keep him as a series regular. "But as soon as we got Jared on film, we knew he had to be a continuing character."

A concert film recorded during the tour was first announced through several teasers released in 2012. Jared Leto, however, after noticing the amount of live footage recorded, decided to release a documentary series which was officially announced on November 3, 2014. In an interview with "Rolling Stone", Leto stated, "You travel the world, you get on stages all over the planet, you have all kinds of once-in-a-lifetime experiences, and what's special is to document that and then share it. This is us in Lebanon and Russia and Israel and Brazil and South Africa – we're sharing some of the most intimate moments of our lives, and also some of the biggest."

Leto next appeared in the independent film "Highway". Set in 1994, Leto is caught with the wife of his employer, a Vegas thug, and flees to Seattle with his best friend Jake Gyllenhaal in the week preceding Kurt Cobain's suicide. Filming finished in early 2000, but the film was not released until March 2002 on home video formats, although originally scheduled for a theatrical release.

After landing the lead role of a British aristocrat in the 1998 drama "Basil", Leto starred in the horror "Urban Legend". The film was poorly received by most movie critics, however, it was a financial success. The same year, Terrence Malick cast Leto for a supporting role in the war film "The Thin Red Line" alongside Sean Penn and Adrien Brody. It garnered mostly positive reviews and was a moderate success in the box office. It received multiple awards and nominations, including seven Academy Award nominations; Leto shared a Satellite Award with the rest of the cast.
question_src: Filamu ya kwanza ya Jared Leto ilikuwa nini?
pos_context_src: Jared Leto ni burudani ya Amerika na kazi kubwa katika filamu, muziki, na runinga. Alifanya kwanza kwa majukumu madogo katika vipindi vya runinga "Camp Wilder" (1992) na "Karibu Nyumbani" (1993). Alipata kutambuliwa mnamo 1994 kwa jukumu lake kama Jordan Catalano katika safu ya televisheni ya Vijana "Maisha Yangu Yanayoitwa". Kipindi hicho kilisifiwa kwa kuonyeshwa kwa ujana na kupata ibada ifuatayo, licha ya kufutwa baada ya msimu mmoja tu. Mwaka huo huo, alifanya filamu yake ya televisheni inayoangazia pamoja na Alicia Silverstone katika "Baridi na The Crazy". Jukumu la kwanza la filamu la Leto lilikuwa katika mchezo wa kuigiza wa 1995 "Jinsi ya kutengeneza mto wa Amerika". Baadaye alishirikiana na Christina Ricci katika "Mwisho wa Wafalme wa Juu" (1996) na akapata jukumu la kuunga mkono katika "switchback" (1997). Mnamo 1997, Leto aliweka nyota katika "prefontaine" ya biopic ambayo alicheza jukumu la Olimpiki anayetumaini Steve Prefontaine. Maonyesho yake yalipokea maoni mazuri kutoka kwa wakosoaji na mara nyingi hufikiriwa jukumu lake la mafanikio. Mwaka uliofuata, Leto aliweka nyota pamoja na Alicia Witt katika "hadithi ya mijini" ya kutisha. Kisha akafanya kando na Sean Penn na Adrien Brody katika filamu ya vita "The Thin Red Line" (1998). Baada ya kucheza majukumu ya kusaidia katika "Nyeusi na Nyeupe" na "Msichana, aliingiliwa", Leto alionyesha uso wa Malaika katika "Fight Club" (1999), ambayo imekuwa filamu ya ibada.
neg_context_title_src: Orodha ya tuzo na uteuzi uliopokelewa na Jared Leto
Orodha ya tuzo na uteuzi uliopokelewa na Jared Leto
neg_context_src: Mradi uliofuata wa Leto ulikuwa "Hurricane" (2010), filamu fupi ya majaribio ambayo inachunguza pepo za kibinafsi na kufungua ndoto za siri katika kile kinachoaminika kuwa ndoto. Leto aliigiza huko New York City na kuelezea wazo lake kama "ndoto ya ndoto ya ndoto ya ndoto." Baada ya kuachiliwa, "Kimbunga" kilipata ubishani na hapo awali kilidhibitiwa kwa sababu ya mambo ya vurugu. Katika Tuzo za Muziki za Video za MTV za 2011, filamu fupi ilipokea majina matatu katika aina ya mwelekeo bora, sinema bora na uhariri bora.

Filamu inafuatia bendi ya mwamba sekunde thelathini na Mars wakati wanajifunza kwanza na kisha kuanza kupigana na kesi ya $ 30 milioni iliyoletwa na lebo ya rekodi EMI. Wakati huo, walikuwa wakiandika nyimbo katika kuandaa ufuatiliaji wa albamu yao ya 2005 "Uongo Mzuri". Kwa wingi wa filamu, bendi hiyo, iliyojumuisha Jared Leto, kaka yake Shannon Leto, na Tomo Miličević, inaonyeshwa kufanya kazi na wazalishaji mafuriko na Steve Lillywhite kuunda kile ambacho baadaye kingekuwa "hii ni vita". Kati ya vikao vya kurekodi, wanakutana na mawakili kujadili kuishi kwa bendi hiyo.

Hii ni orodha ya tuzo na uteuzi uliopokelewa na Jared Leto. Mnamo 2009, Leto alirudi kufanya kazi na "Mr. Hakuna". Aliteuliwa kwa Kombe la Volpi kwa muigizaji bora katika Tamasha la Filamu la Kimataifa la Venice la 66 kwa utendaji wake. Mnamo Aprili 2017, Jared Leto ameteuliwa kwa tuzo 119, akishinda 68. Tuzo zake kwenye muziki zinahesabiwa kwake na washiriki wa bendi ya mwamba wa sekunde thelathini kwa Mars

Mnamo 2013, Leto alicheza mwanamke wa VVU wa Trans Rayon katika filamu ya Jean-Marc Vallée "Dallas Buyers Club", jukumu lake la kwanza la filamu katika miaka mitano. Filamu hiyo ilitolewa mnamo Novemba 2013, ikipokea sifa kutoka kwa wakaguzi na kuteuliwa kwa tuzo kuu. Leto alishinda Tuzo la Sinema ya Chaguo la Wakosoaji, Tuzo la Golden Globe, Tuzo la Waigizaji wa Screen, na Tuzo la Chuo -cha Muigizaji Bora wa Kusaidia.

Leto alielezea mfululizo huo kama "mpangilio usio rasmi" kwa "Artifact", filamu ya maandishi kuhusu mzozo wa kisheria kati ya sekunde thelathini kwa Mars na rekodi ya EMI. Alifafanua, "Ni nini kinatokea wakati" Artifact "iliacha. Hakika. Risasi ya mwisho ya filamu ni risasi ya kwanza ya safu hiyo." Mfululizo huo umeelekezwa na Jared Leto chini ya jina lake la muda mrefu Bartholomew Cubbins. Trailer ya safu hiyo ilizinduliwa mnamo Novemba 2014, ikishirikiana na mwandishi wa Uingereza na picha za moja kwa moja, zilizowekwa na mahojiano kadhaa na nyimbo zingine za bendi hiyo, pamoja na "Karibu na Edge".

Sehemu hiyo ilitengenezwa kwenye eneo katika Shule ya Upili ya Chuo Kikuu huko Los Angeles, CA. Pilot iliandikwa na muundaji wa mfululizo Winnie Holzman na kuongozwa na Scott Winant. Wakati wa utengenezaji wa filamu, Holzman alibadilisha hali ya tabia ya Jared Leto Jordan Catalano. Hapo awali, alitakiwa kuonekana katika sehemu ya kwanza, lakini baada ya Holzman kuona ustadi wa kaimu wa Leto, alitaka kumweka kama mfululizo mara kwa mara. "Lakini mara tu tulipoingia kwenye filamu, tulijua lazima awe tabia ya kuendelea."

Filamu ya tamasha iliyorekodiwa wakati wa ziara hiyo ilitangazwa kwa mara ya kwanza kupitia chai kadhaa iliyotolewa mnamo 2012. Jared Leto, hata hivyo, baada ya kugundua kiwango cha kumbukumbu ya moja kwa moja, aliamua kuachilia safu ya maandishi ambayo ilitangazwa rasmi mnamo Novemba 3, 2014. Katika mahojiano na "Jiwe la Rolling", "Usafiri wa Ulimwenguni, Unaowa na Spect-in the Converting-in the Convertin-in the Spect-in the Converting-in the Convertin-in the Converting-in the Conventive-in the Convertin-in the Word-in the Converting-in the Consument- Na kisha kushiriki.

Leto baadaye alionekana kwenye filamu huru "Barabara kuu". Imewekwa mnamo 1994, Leto anashikwa na mke wa mwajiri wake, Thug ya Vegas, na anakimbilia Seattle na rafiki yake mkubwa Jake Gyllenhaal katika wiki iliyotangulia kujiua kwa Kurt Cobain. Filamu ilimaliza mapema 2000, lakini filamu hiyo haikutolewa hadi Machi 2002 kwenye fomati za video za nyumbani, ingawa hapo awali ilipangwa kutolewa kwa maonyesho.

Baada ya kutua jukumu la kuongoza la aristocrat wa Uingereza katika mchezo wa kuigiza wa 1998 "Basil", Leto aliweka nyota katika Hofu ya "Hadithi ya Mjini". Filamu hiyo ilipokelewa vibaya na wakosoaji wengi wa sinema, hata hivyo, ilikuwa mafanikio ya kifedha. Mwaka huo huo, Terrence Malick alitupa Leto kwa jukumu la kusaidia katika filamu ya vita "The Thin Red Line" pamoja na Sean Penn na Adrien Brody. Ilipata hakiki nzuri zaidi na ilikuwa mafanikio ya wastani katika ofisi ya sanduku. Ilipokea tuzo nyingi na uteuzi, pamoja na uteuzi wa tuzo saba za Chuo; Leto alishiriki tuzo ya satelaiti na wahusika wengine wote.

question_en: What years did Count Carl Gustav Rehnskiöld live?
pos_context_en: Count Carl Gustav Rehnskiöld (6 August 1651 – 29 January 1722) was a Swedish Field Marshal ("Fältmarskalk") and Royal Councilor. He was King Charles XII's mentor and chief military advisor, and served as deputy commander-in-chief of the Carolean Army, an army he assisted both in its education and development.
neg_context_en: After the battle, Rehnskiöld became a prisoner of war in Russia and spent the years in captivity together with Count Carl Piper by running a management office in Moscow to assist the other Swedish prisoners of war. Rehnskiöld was exchanged in 1718 and arrived at the siege of Fredriksten just before Charles XII was shot to death. Rehnskiöld later served as commander in western Sweden and, suffering from an old shrapnel injury, died in 1722.

In January 1722, Frederick I summoned Rehnskiöld to Kungsör. Rehnskiöld fell ill during the journey and was taken to Läggesta Inn outside of Mariefred. Having high fever and spitting blood, his declining health indicated that he was suffering from his old shrapnel injury from Veprik. He died on 29 January the same year, and with his death, both the noble and the count's branch of the Rehnskiöld family was extinguished. The funeral took place on 15 March at Storkyrkan in Stockholm. The officiant was Chaplain Jöran Nordberg, who had followed Rehnskiöld and the army from 1703 to 1715. Rehnskiöld's widow, Elisabeth, married Imperial Count Erasmus Ernst Fredrik von Küssow in 1724, and died on 23 November 1726.

Carl Gustav Rehnskiöld was the eighth of the Rehnskiölds' eleven children. After his father's death in 1658, Carl Gustav had two brothers and two sisters. The government councilor Philip Christoff von der Lancken and the regional councilor Joachim Cuhn von Owstien, both close friends to Gerdt Rehnskiöld before his death, received custody over the five siblings. The siblings suffered from financial hardship, partly due to Gerdt’s money problems during the latter part of his life, and partly because of inheritance disputes between the five siblings and Gerdt Rehnskiöld's third wife and widow Anna Catharina Gärffelt. The guardians had granted her Birgitta Rehnskiöld's family jewelery and 14,000 riksdaler from the heritage. As a result, the siblings complained about their guardians' way of treating them and wrote several letters of complaint to the Swedish government. Carl Gustav Rehnskiöld's brother-in-law Anders Appelman later came to participate more actively in the upbringing of the five siblings, and gave funds to Carl Gustav's and his brothers' continued education. Carl Gustav Rehnskiöld undertook home education and entered Lund University at the age of 20. Here he studied theology, history, language and philosophy. He participated in lectures with historian and philosopher Samuel von Pufendorf, who took notice of the keen student and offered individual lessons under his tutelage. Pufendorf left a lasting impression. Rehnskiöld re-wrote Pufendorf's work "Einleitung zur Historie der vornehmsten Reichen und Staaten in Europa" (printed in Frankfurt only in 1682), provided the manuscript with Pufendorf's personal comments, and kept it for the remainder of his life.

The victory at Fraustadt had a crippling effect in Denmark, Russia and Saxony, and caused shock waves around Europe. In France, the victory was celebrated, and Prussian policy immediately became friendlier to the Swedes. In June the same year, Rehnskiöld was made Count (in 1719, the count’s branch of the Rehnskiöld family was introduced at the House of Nobility under number 48). With the main Saxon army defeated, the Swedish Army had the opportunity to move into Saxony and force Augustus II out of the war. In August, Charles XII reunited with Rehnskiöld’s army. The joint army moved through Imperial Silesia, and by September, the Swedes had successfully occupied Saxony without resistance. The Treaty of Altranstädt (1706) was concluded between Sweden and Saxony on 14 September. Under Swedish terms, Augustus II was forced to break all ties with his allies, renounce his claims to the Polish crown, and accept Stanisław Leszczyński as the new King.

On January 17, 1697, Rehnskiöld married Elisabeth Funck, daughter of the assessor in Bergskollegium Johan Funck. Rehnskiöld was thus brother-in-law to Carl Magnus Stuart, who was married to his wife's older sister Margaretha Funck. In 1699, a daughter was born to the couple, who died before she was one year old. Rehnskiöld then left Sweden to embark on the Great Northern War, reuniting with his wife on the spring of 1707 in the castle of Altranstädt.

Throughout the campaign, Rehnskiöld held a fierce rivalry with the Marshal of the Realm, Count Carl Piper, who had accompanied Charles XII as chief of the perambulating chancellery since 1700. The tense relationship between Rehnskiöld and Piper dated back to the Swedish Army's march on Saxony. Both men desired the King's favor: as the senior civilian army official Piper sought to persuade the King not to make reckless actions, whilst Rehnskiöld, as second-in-command of the army supported the King's offensive plans. The antagonism between the two, in combination with their fiery temperament and pride in their own abilities, made them unable to reason with each other without an intermediary, a role usually filled by Quartermaster general Axel Gyllenkrok. Their relationship would eventually cause discord and division within the Swedish headquarters, as well as hopelessness and anxiety within the army.

Rehnskiöld was born on 6 August 1651 in Stralsund in Swedish Pomerania. His parents were the government councilor of Pomerania, Gerdt Antoniison Rehnskiöld (1610−1658), originally Keffenbrinck, and Birgitta Torskeskål (died 1655), niece of Baron Johan Adler Salvius. Keffenbrinck's descendants came from Westphalia, and their seat was the castle of Rehne in the northern part of the Münsterland province. Gerdt Rehnskiöld initially served as a scribe in Kammarkollegium, and later as the authorized representative of the Crown at King Gustavus Adolphus' administrative entourage during the King's military campaign in Germany. Thanks to his efforts in the maintenance of the Swedish troops during the Thirty Years War, he became a naturalized Swedish nobleman in 1639 by Queen Kristina and adopted the name Rehnskiöld after his family seat. He was also awarded the Griebenow, Willershusen, and Hohenwarth estates in Pomerania, as well as Stensättra farm in Södermanland. In 1640, the Rehnskiöld family was introduced in the House of Nobility at number 270.

During late autumn 1709, Rehnskiöld and the captured Swedish army were transported to Moscow, where Peter I arranged a massive victory parade on 22 December. The prisoners of war were arranged in ranks, with Rehnskiöld and Piper walking among the last. After the parade, the Swedish prisoners were distributed to cities and prison camps around Russia. Rehnskiöld and Piper moved into Avram Lopuchin's house in Moscow. During a dinner Rehnskiöld had an argument with Piper and Lewenhaupt, where Piper criticized Rehnskiöld's leadership during the battle of Poltava and blamed him for the loss. Piper's insults provoked Rehnskiöld to the point of violence. Lewenhaupt and Gyllenkrok separated them, and Rehnskiöld began accusing Lewenhaupt and the other officers for expressing criticism towards Charles XII:

Rehnskiöld joined the Swedish Army at the age of 22, and in 1673 obtained a commission as Ensign at Captain Reinhold Anrep's company in the Närke-Värmland Regiment. Already in the following year, he was appointed Lieutenant at the Queen Dowager of the Realm's Horse Life Regiment. In July 1675, he transferred to the Uppland Regiment, and on 12 February 1676 he became an officer of the prestigious Life Guards.
question_src: Je! Ni miaka gani Carl Gustav Rehnskiöld aliishi miaka gani?
pos_context_src: Hesabu Carl Gustav Rehnskiöld (6 Agosti 1651 - 29 Januari 1722) alikuwa uwanja wa Uswidi ("Fältmarskalk") na Royal Diwani. Alikuwa mshauri na mshauri mkuu wa jeshi la Mfalme Charles XII, na aliwahi kuwa kamanda mkuu wa jeshi la Carolean, jeshi alilosaidia katika elimu na maendeleo yake.
neg_context_src: Baada ya vita, Rehnskiöld alikua mfungwa wa vita nchini Urusi na alitumia miaka hiyo uhamishoni pamoja na Count Carl Piper kwa kuendesha ofisi ya usimamizi huko Moscow kusaidia wafungwa wengine wa vita wa Uswidi. Rehnskiöld alibadilishwa mnamo 1718 na alifika katika kuzingirwa kwa Fredriksten kabla tu ya Charles XII kupigwa risasi kuuawa. Baadaye Rehnskiöld aliwahi kuwa kamanda magharibi mwa Uswidi na, akiugua jeraha la zamani la shrap, alikufa mnamo 1722.

Mnamo Januari 1722, Frederick nilimwita Rehnskiöld kwa Kungsör. Rehnskiöld aliugua wakati wa safari na akapelekwa Läggesta Inn nje ya Mariefred. Kuwa na homa kubwa na kumwagika damu, afya yake kupungua ilionyesha kuwa alikuwa akiugua jeraha lake la zamani kutoka kwa Veprik. Alikufa mnamo Januari 29 mwaka huo huo, na kwa kifo chake, tawi la Noble na la hesabu la familia ya Rehnskiöld lilizimwa. Mazishi yalifanyika mnamo Machi 15 huko Storkyrkan huko Stockholm. Msimamizi huyo alikuwa Chaplain Jöran Nordberg, ambaye alikuwa amemfuata Rehnskiöld na Jeshi kutoka 1703 hadi 1715. Mjane wa Rehnskiöld, Elisabeth, alioa hesabu ya kifalme ya Erasmus Ernst Fredrik von Küssow mnamo 1724, na akafa mnamo 23 Novemba 1726.

Carl Gustav Rehnskiöld alikuwa wa nane wa watoto wa Rehnskiölds 'kumi na moja. Baada ya kifo cha baba yake mnamo 1658, Carl Gustav alikuwa na kaka wawili na dada wawili. Diwani wa Serikali Philip Christoff von der Lancken na diwani wa mkoa Joachim Cuhn von Owstien, marafiki wote wa karibu na Gerdt Rehnskiöld kabla ya kifo chake, walipokea ulinzi juu ya ndugu hao watano. Ndugu walipata shida ya kifedha, kwa sababu ya shida za pesa za Gerdt wakati wa mwisho wa maisha yake, na kwa sababu ya migogoro ya urithi kati ya ndugu hao watano na Gerdt Rehnskiöld mke wa tatu na mjane Anna Catharina Gärffelt. Walezi walikuwa wamempa vito vya familia ya Birgitta Rehnskiöld na Riksdaler 14,000 kutoka Urithi. Kama matokeo, ndugu zake walilalamika juu ya njia ya walezi wao ya kuwatibu na waliandika barua kadhaa za malalamiko kwa serikali ya Uswidi. Ndugu wa Carl Gustav Rehnskiöld Anders Appelman baadaye alishiriki kikamilifu katika malezi ya ndugu hao watano, na akatoa pesa kwa Carl Gustav na masomo ya ndugu zake. Carl Gustav Rehnskiöld alichukua elimu ya nyumbani na akaingia Chuo Kikuu cha Lund akiwa na umri wa miaka 20. Hapa alisoma theolojia, historia, lugha na falsafa. Alishiriki katika mihadhara na mwanahistoria na mwanafalsafa Samuel von Pufendorf, ambaye aligundua mwanafunzi huyo mwenye bidii na akatoa masomo ya mtu binafsi chini ya mafunzo yake. Pufendorf aliacha hisia ya kudumu. Rehnskiöld aliandika tena kazi ya Pufendorf "Einleitung Zur Historia der Vornehmsten Reichen und Staaten huko Europa" (iliyochapishwa huko Frankfurt tu mnamo 1682), ilitoa maandishi hayo na maoni ya kibinafsi ya Pufendorf, na akaiweka kwa mabaki ya maisha yake.

Ushindi huko Fraustadt ulikuwa na athari mbaya huko Denmark, Urusi na Saxony, na kusababisha mawimbi ya mshtuko kote Ulaya. Huko Ufaransa, ushindi ulisherehekewa, na sera ya Prussian ikawa rafiki kwa Wasweden. Mnamo Juni mwaka huo huo, Rehnskiöld alifanywa kuhesabiwa (mnamo 1719, tawi la hesabu la familia ya Rehnskiöld lilianzishwa katika Nyumba ya Nobility chini ya namba 48). Pamoja na jeshi kuu la Saxon likishindwa, jeshi la Uswidi lilipata nafasi ya kuhamia Saxony na kulazimisha Augustus II nje ya vita. Mnamo Agosti, Charles XII aliungana tena na jeshi la Rehnskiöld. Jeshi la pamoja lilihamia Silesia ya Imperial, na mnamo Septemba, Wasweden walikuwa wamefanikiwa kuchukua Saxony bila upinzani. Mkataba wa Altranstädt (1706) ulihitimishwa kati ya Uswidi na Saxony mnamo 14 Septemba. Chini ya masharti ya Uswidi, Augustus II alilazimishwa kuvunja uhusiano wote na washirika wake, aachane na madai yake kwa taji ya Kipolishi, na akubali Stanisław Leszczyński kama mfalme mpya.

Mnamo Januari 17, 1697, Rehnskiöld alifunga ndoa na Elisabeth Funck, binti wa mhakiki huko Bergskollegium Johan Funck. Kwa hivyo Rehnskiöld alikuwa mkwe wa Carl Magnus Stuart, ambaye alikuwa ameolewa na dada mkubwa wa mke wake Margaretha Funck. Mnamo 1699, binti alizaliwa na wenzi hao, ambaye alikufa kabla ya kuwa na mwaka mmoja. Rehnskiöld kisha akaondoka Sweden kuanza Vita Kuu ya Kaskazini, akiungana tena na mkewe kwenye chemchemi ya 1707 katika ngome ya Altranstädt.

Katika kampeni yote, Rehnskiöld alishikilia mashindano makali na Marshal wa Realm, Count Carl Piper, ambaye alikuwa ameandamana na Charles XII kama mkuu wa chansela ya kueneza tangu 1700. Urafiki wa wakati kati ya Rehnskiöld na Piper ulirudi nyuma kwa Jeshi la Swichi la Machi kwenye Saxony. Wanaume wote wawili walitaka upendeleo wa Mfalme: Kama afisa mkuu wa jeshi la raia Piper alitaka kumshawishi mfalme asifanye vitendo visivyo vya kawaida, wakati Rehnskiöld, kama amri ya pili ya jeshi iliunga mkono mipango ya kukera ya Mfalme. Upinzani kati ya hizo mbili, pamoja na hasira zao za moto na kiburi katika uwezo wao wenyewe, uliwafanya washindwe kubishana na kila mmoja bila mpatanishi, jukumu ambalo kawaida limejazwa na Quartermaster General Gyllenkrok. Urafiki wao hatimaye ungesababisha ugomvi na mgawanyiko ndani ya makao makuu ya Uswidi, na vile vile kutokuwa na tumaini na wasiwasi ndani ya Jeshi.

Rehnskiöld alizaliwa mnamo 6 Agosti 1651 huko Stralsund huko Sweden Pomerania. Wazazi wake walikuwa diwani wa serikali wa Pomerania, Gerdt Antoniison Rehnskiöld (1610−1658), hapo awali Keffenbrinck, na Birgitta Torskeskål (alikufa 1655), mjukuu wa Baron Johan Adler Salvius. Wazao wa Keffenbrinck walikuja kutoka Westphalia, na kiti chao kilikuwa ngome ya Rehne kaskazini mwa mkoa wa Münsterland. Gerdt Rehnskiöld hapo awali aliwahi kuwa mwandishi huko Kammarkollegium, na baadaye kama mwakilishi aliyeidhinishwa wa taji huko Mfalme Gustavus Adolphus 'wahamasishaji wakati wa kampeni ya kijeshi ya Mfalme nchini Ujerumani. Shukrani kwa juhudi zake katika matengenezo ya askari wa Uswidi wakati wa Vita vya Miaka thelathini, alikua mtu mashuhuri wa Uswidi mnamo 1639 na Malkia Kristina na kupitisha jina Rehnskiöld baada ya kiti cha familia yake. Alipewa pia Griebenow, Willershusen, na Hohenwarth Estates huko Pomerania, na shamba la Stensättra huko Södermanland. Mnamo 1640, familia ya Rehnskiöld ilianzishwa katika nyumba ya heshima kwa nambari 270.

Wakati wa vuli ya marehemu 1709, Rehnskiöld na jeshi lililotekwa la Uswidi walisafirishwa kwenda Moscow, ambapo Peter nilipanga gwaride kubwa la ushindi mnamo Desemba 22. Wafungwa wa vita walipangwa katika safu, na Rehnskiöld na Piper wakitembea kati ya wa mwisho. Baada ya gwaride hilo, wafungwa wa Uswidi walisambazwa katika miji na kambi za gereza karibu na Urusi. Rehnskiöld na Piper walihamia ndani ya nyumba ya Avram Lopuchin huko Moscow. Wakati wa chakula cha jioni Rehnskiöld alikuwa na hoja na Piper na Lewenhaupt, ambapo Piper alikosoa uongozi wa Rehnskiöld wakati wa Vita vya Poltava na kumlaumu kwa hasara hiyo. Matusi ya Piper yalisababisha Rehnskiöld hadi kufikia vurugu. Lewenhaupt na Gyllenkrok waliwatenga, na Rehnskiöld walianza kumshtaki Lewenhaupt na maafisa wengine kwa kuelezea kukosoa kwa Charles XII:

Rehnskiöld alijiunga na jeshi la Uswidi akiwa na umri wa miaka 22, na mnamo 1673 alipata tume kama Ensign katika Kampuni ya Kapteni Reinhold Anrep katika Kikosi cha Närke-Värmland. Tayari katika mwaka uliofuata, aliteuliwa kuwa Luteni katika Malkia Dowager wa Kikosi cha Maisha cha Farasi wa Realm. Mnamo Julai 1675, alihamia Kikosi cha Uppland, na mnamo 12 Februari 1676 alikua afisa wa Walinzi wa Maisha ya kifahari.
report_src: Carl Gustav Rehnskiöld alizaliwa 6 Agosti 1651 na kufariki 29 Januari 1722, hivyo aliishi takriban miaka 70 (miaka 70 na takribani miezi 6) [1].
all_claims: Carl Gustav Rehnskiöld alizaliwa 6 Agosti 1651 na kufariki 29 Januari 1722, hivyo aliishi takriban miaka 70 (miaka 70 na takribani miezi 6) [1].
