question_en: How long is Northern Boulevard in Albany, NY?
pos_context_en: Swallow Street (whose name was Gage prior to 1790) was one of the few bird streets whose name was not kept, its name being changed to Knox Street in 1809. Knox Street would stretch north from Myrtle Avenue to Clinton Avenue, and eventually to Livingston Avenue. In 1896 Northern Boulevard was built from that intersection of Knox and Livingston north to Van Rensselaer Boulevard, including a 653-foot-long bridge over Tivoli Hollow and the New York Central Railroad's tracks, a modern bridge still carries Northern Boulevard at that location. In 1898 a 759-foot-long bridge was built to carry Knox from Central Avenue over Sheridan Hollow to Sheridan Avenue, and again a modern bridge is there today. When Washington Park was being created, Knox Street between Madison Ave and State Street was purchased in 1880 and all buildings were removed. Knox Street in the park is now a pedestrian mall, called the Knox Street Mall; it is the only straight path in the park. Later, Knox Street from State to Livingston would be changed to Northern Boulevard to match the street it met up with, this left the name Knox Street as only the three blocks between Myrtle and Madison in the Park South neighborhood. In 1991 Northern Boulevard from Livingston to State along with its extension within Washington Park to Madison Avenue at Willett Street was renamed Henry Johnson Boulevard in honor of an African-American World War I hero. The name Northern Boulevard remains from Livingston to Van Rensselaer Boulevard.
neg_context_en: NY 377 begins adjacent to Albany Memorial Hospital at an interchange with US 9 in the city of Albany. The highway initially heads to the northeast as a four-lane, city-maintained road, following Northern Boulevard along the south side of Wolfert's Roost Country Club and the northern edge of a housing tract. After a quarter-mile (0.4 km), the route turns northward onto Van Rensselaer Boulevard, another four-lane street divided by a narrow median. The route runs past two blocks of homes before leaving the Albany city limits and becoming state-maintained as it crosses into the town of Colonie and its village of Menands. Within Menands, NY 377 traverses another mile (1.6 km) of housing tracts before ending at an intersection with NY 378 (Menand Road) northwest of the village center. The northern terminus of NY 377 also serves as the south entrance to Albany Rural Cemetery.

North Albany's main streets are North Pearl Street and Broadway which run north-south from Arbor Hill and Downtown to Menands. Most other streets in the neighborhood are cross streets that intersect either or both of those main streets. North Pearl Street is also part of NY 32. Loudonville Road connects North Pearl Street and Broadway northwest to US 9 and Van Rensselaer Boulevard. Van Rensselaer Boulevard on the western border of North Albany travels north to Menands and the Albany Rural Cemetery, at the intersection with Northern Boulevard and Lawn Avenue it becomes New York Route 377 (NY 377). I-90 cuts through the neighborhood and intersects with I-787 along the Hudson River crossing the Patroon Island Bridge into the city and county of Rensselaer. I-787 travels along the Hudson River at the eastern edge of North Albany and at exit 4A at Water and North Ferry streets allows access to the southern edge of the neighborhood.

Many of North Albany's former turnpikes continued to be of importance to long-distance travel throughout the 20th century as evidenced by the designation of several US and state routes. North Pearl Street was extended from Pleasant Street to Emmett Street and then on to the city line at the village of Menands in 1925, and as a consequence of the 1930 renumbering of state highways in New York North Pearl Street became a part of New York Route 32 (NY 32). In the 1940s NY Route 2 (NY 2) was extended south to NY Route 5 (NY 5) downtown by way of an overlap with NY 32. NY 2 was rerouted in the early 1950s to leave NY 32 at the junction of Wolfert Avenue and Broadway in Menands and then follow Broadway into downtown. In the mid-1960s, Route 2 was shortened to end prior to North Albany.

Manning Boulevard today extends from Whitehall Road northeast to Western Avenue and then northeast and east on to the intersection of Central and Clinton avenues. The boulevard then travels along the western edge of Swinburne Park. It then turns east to Tivoli Park. On the other side of Tivoli Park, Manning Boulevard continues alongside Livingston Middle School to Northern Boulevard. Manning Boulevard starts again to the south where Northern Boulevard turns southwest to join Henry Johnson Boulevard but the road continues southeast as Manning Boulevard. Manning Boulevard finally ends at Livingston Avenue across from Ten Broeck Street. Between Western and Washington avenues, Manning Blvd is unusual for an Albany city street for the houses along that section are along frontage roads on either side of that boulevard. There are four intersections for access to and from the frontage roads, including one that is also an intersection for Lancaster Street.

After the bridge, Route 9 runs under I-787 for several blocks, then takes an offramp past the Albany Pump House to become Clinton Avenue. There it intersects the two routes which have paralleled 9 up the west side of the Hudson. At Pearl Street and the Palace Theatre, it crosses NY 32 (North Pearl Street), which continues north, and US 9W (Lark Street), which ends at the junction. Route 9 turns north on Henry Johnson Boulevard and widens to cross I-90 again via a flyover originally built for the canceled Mid-Crosstown Arterial, exiting the city of Albany in the process.
Just before reaching the northern suburb of Colonie, 9 returns to two lanes and follows Loudon Road through well-to-do residential neighborhoods past Albany Memorial Hospital and Wolferts Roost Country Club. The short NY 377 forks off to the north while Route 9 trends slightly westward. A five-way intersection marks Loudonville. Siena College in Newtonville is on the east side a mile past the junction, with the Colonie Town Hall opposite.

Originally called Northern Boulevard the first section built in 1876 by the Board of Commissioners of Washington Park at the same time as Washington Park. It was also referred to as Boulevard. That first section constructed was just east of the toll-booth on Western Avenue, north and east to intersection of Central and Clinton avenues, at what would be called Manning Square. South of Western Avenue, Manning Boulevard was named Hawkins Avenue. In "Stvdies for Albany" (1914) which was commissioned by the city, it was proposed that Manning Boulevard be extended through Hawkins Avenue and continued to New Scotland Avenue and eventually to Delaware Avenue which it would then form a semicircular parkway around the city. The boulevard received its current name in honor of Daniel Manning, a former park commissioner and Secretary of the Treasury
under President Grover Cleveland.

On April 30, 1919, the state of New York awarded a contract to improve the portion of Van Rensselaer Boulevard north of the Albany city limits to state highway standards. The project cost $33,796 to complete (equivalent to $ in 2022), and the rebuilt road was added to the state highway system on November 11, 1919, as unsigned State Highway 1518 (SH 1518). It did not have a posted route number until the mid-1930s when SH 1518 became part of NY 377, a new route continuing south to the intersection of Northern Boulevard and Loudonville Road in Albany by way of city-owned streets. The alignment of NY 377 has not changed since that time; however, the junction at the south end of the route was reconfigured into an interchange when the portion of US 9 in northern Albany was converted into a limited-access highway in the 1970s.

Northern Boulevard continues through Flushing—where it was once known as Broadway—towards Bayside. The route travels generally easterly across Bayside, intersecting with the Clearview Expressway (I-295) along the way. Not far to the east, it crosses over the Cross Island Parkway at Alley Pond Park. Past the Cross Island Parkway, NY 25A goes through Douglaston and Little Neck before crossing the New York City line into Nassau County. The five-mile stretch of Northern Boulevard stretching eastward from Flushing has been described as roughly coterminous with the Long Island Koreatown (롱 아일랜드 코리아타운).

During the 1960s the Albany municipal landfill was located on the site of a former river water filtration plant that operated from the early 20th century to the 1930s. While the tanks are assumed to have been demolished, several structures associated with the plant are still buried under the trash, such as concrete foundations and tunnel structures. Located along Erie Boulevard on approximately between Interstate 787 (I-787), Interstate 90 (I-90), Erie Boulevard, and the Albany County Wastewater Treatment Plant, it was closed to municipal waste in 1969 in favor of a new landfill in the Albany Pine Bush area in the western section of the city. The landfill continued to operate as the North Albany Demolition Landfill, for demolition/construction debris until 1988. The city's Department of Public Works garage was built on a part of the landfill, with land near by used for the creation of the Erie Boulevard Commerce Park on . Original plans were for Erie Boulevard, which was built on top of the old Erie Canal, to be extended through to Menands to Exit 6 of I-787. Though Albany would have borne all the costs of construction Menands still refused. Erie Boulevard was subsequently built to the border and no further in 1988 as part of the park construction.
question_src: Je! Kaskazini mwa Boulevard huko Albany, NY ni muda gani?
pos_context_src: Swallow Street (ambaye jina lake lilikuwa Gage kabla ya 1790) lilikuwa moja ya barabara chache za ndege ambazo jina lake halikuhifadhiwa, jina lake likibadilishwa kuwa Knox Street mnamo 1809. Mtaa wa Knox ungenyoosha kaskazini kutoka Myrtle Avenue kwenda Clinton Avenue, na mwishowe kwenda Livingston Avenue. Mnamo 1896 Kaskazini mwa Boulevard ilijengwa kutoka kwa makutano ya Knox na Livingston North hadi Van Rensselaer Boulevard, pamoja na daraja la urefu wa futi 653 juu ya Tivoli Hollow na nyimbo za New York Central Railroad, daraja la kisasa bado hubeba kaskazini mwa Boulevard katika eneo hilo. Mnamo 1898 daraja la urefu wa futi 759 lilijengwa kubeba Knox kutoka Central Avenue juu ya Sheridan Hollow hadi Sheridan Avenue, na tena daraja la kisasa liko leo. Wakati Washington Park ilikuwa ikiundwa, Mtaa wa Knox kati ya Madison Ave na Jimbo la Jimbo ulinunuliwa mnamo 1880 na majengo yote yaliondolewa. Mtaa wa Knox katika Hifadhi sasa ni duka la watembea kwa miguu, linaloitwa Knox Street Mall; Ni njia pekee ya moja kwa moja katika bustani. Baadaye, Mtaa wa Knox kutoka jimbo kwenda Livingston ungebadilishwa kuwa Kaskazini mwa Boulevard ili kufanana na barabara ambayo ilikutana nayo, hii iliacha jina la Knox Street kama vitalu vitatu tu kati ya Myrtle na Madison katika kitongoji cha Park Kusini. Mnamo 1991 Kaskazini mwa Boulevard kutoka Livingston hadi jimbo pamoja na upanuzi wake ndani ya Washington Park hadi Madison Avenue huko Willett Street ulipewa jina la Henry Johnson Boulevard kwa heshima ya shujaa wa Vita vya Kidunia vya Amerika na Amerika. Jina la Kaskazini Boulevard linabaki kutoka Livingston hadi van Rensselaer Boulevard.
neg_context_title_src: Njia ya Jimbo la New York 377
Njia ya U.S. 9 huko New York
Njia ya Jimbo la New York 377
Njia ya Jimbo la New York 25A
neg_context_src: NY 377 huanza karibu na Hospitali ya Albany Memorial katika kubadilishana na sisi 9 katika mji wa Albany. Barabara kuu hapo awali inaelekea kaskazini mashariki kama barabara ya barabara nne, iliyohifadhiwa na jiji, kufuatia kaskazini mwa Boulevard kando ya kusini ya Klabu ya Nchi ya Wolfert na ukingo wa kaskazini wa trakti ya makazi. Baada ya maili ya robo (km 0.4), njia inageuka kaskazini kuelekea van Rensselaer Boulevard, barabara nyingine ya barabara nne iliyogawanywa na wastani mwembamba. Njia hiyo inapita nyuma ya nyumba mbili kabla ya kuacha mipaka ya jiji la Albany na kuwa ya kutunzwa wakati inavuka katika mji wa Colonie na kijiji chake cha Menands. Ndani ya Menands, NY 377 hupitia maili nyingine (1.6 km) ya trakti za makazi kabla ya kumalizika kwenye makutano na NY 378 (barabara ya Menand) kaskazini magharibi mwa kituo cha kijiji. Kituo cha kaskazini cha NY 377 pia hutumika kama mlango wa kusini wa Makaburi ya Vijijini ya Albany.

Mitaa kuu ya Albany North ni Mtaa wa Pearl North na Broadway ambayo huenda kaskazini-kusini kutoka Arbor Hill na katikati mwa jiji hadi Menands. Mitaa mingine mingi katika kitongoji ni mitaa ya msalaba ambayo inaingiliana au zote mbili za mitaa kuu. Mtaa wa North Pearl pia ni sehemu ya NY 32. Barabara ya Loudonville inaunganisha Mtaa wa North Pearl na Broadway Northwest kwenda Amerika 9 na Van Rensselaer Boulevard. Van Rensselaer Boulevard kwenye mpaka wa magharibi wa Kaskazini mwa Albany anasafiri kaskazini kwenda Menands na Makaburi ya Vijijini ya Albany, kwenye makutano na Kaskazini mwa Boulevard na Lawn Avenue inakuwa New York Route 377 (NY 377). I-90 hupunguzwa kwa kitongoji na huingiliana na I-787 kando ya Mto Hudson kuvuka Daraja la Kisiwa cha Patroon ndani ya jiji na kata ya Rensselaer. I-787 husafiri kando ya Mto Hudson kwenye makali ya mashariki ya Albany Kaskazini na huko Exit 4A huko Maji na Mitaa ya North Ferry inaruhusu ufikiaji wa ukingo wa kusini wa kitongoji hicho.

Wengi wa Turnpikes wa zamani wa Kaskazini mwa Albany waliendelea kuwa wa muhimu kwa kusafiri kwa umbali mrefu katika karne ya 20 kama inavyothibitishwa na uteuzi wa njia kadhaa za Amerika na serikali. Mtaa wa North Pearl uliongezwa kutoka Mtaa wa Pendeza hadi Mtaa wa Emmett na kisha kwenda kwenye barabara ya jiji katika kijiji cha Menands mnamo 1925, na kama matokeo ya kurudiwa kwa 1930 kwa barabara kuu katika barabara ya New York North Pearl ikawa sehemu ya New York Route 32 (NY 32). Mnamo miaka ya 1940 NY Route 2 (NY 2) iliongezwa kusini hadi NY Route 5 (NY 5) katikati mwa njia ya mwingiliano na NY 32. NY 2 ilibadilishwa mapema miaka ya 1950 ili kuondoka NY 32 kwenye makutano ya Wolfert Avenue na Broadway huko Menands na kisha kufuata Broadway kwenda chini. Katikati ya miaka ya 1960, Njia ya 2 ilifupishwa kumalizika kabla ya Kaskazini mwa Albany.

Manning Boulevard leo inaenea kutoka Whitehall Road kaskazini mashariki hadi Western Avenue na kisha kaskazini mashariki na mashariki hadi kwenye makutano ya njia za kati na za Clinton. Boulevard basi husafiri kando ya makali ya magharibi ya Swinburne Park. Halafu inageuka mashariki kwa Tivoli Park. Kwa upande mwingine wa Tivoli Park, Manning Boulevard anaendelea kando na Shule ya Kati ya Livingston hadi Kaskazini Boulevard. Manning Boulevard anaanza tena kusini ambapo Kaskazini mwa Boulevard anageuka kusini magharibi ili ajiunge na Henry Johnson Boulevard lakini barabara inaendelea kusini mashariki kama Manning Boulevard. Manning Boulevard hatimaye anaishia kwenye Livingston Avenue kutoka kwa Mtaa wa Broeck. Kati ya njia za Magharibi na Washington, Manning Blvd sio kawaida kwa barabara ya jiji la Albany kwa nyumba zilizo karibu na sehemu hiyo ziko kando ya barabara za mbele kila upande wa boulevard. Kuna vipindi vinne vya upatikanaji na kutoka kwa barabara za mbele, pamoja na moja ambayo pia ni makutano ya Mtaa wa Lancaster.

Baada ya daraja, Njia ya 9 inaendesha chini ya I-787 kwa vizuizi kadhaa, kisha inachukua nyumba ya nyuma ya nyumba ya Albany Bomba kuwa Clinton Avenue. Huko huingiliana njia mbili ambazo zimelingana 9 upande wa magharibi wa Hudson. Katika Mtaa wa Pearl na ukumbi wa michezo wa Ikulu, inavuka NY 32 (Mtaa wa Pearl North), ambayo inaendelea kaskazini, na Amerika 9W (Lark Street), ambayo inaisha kwenye makutano. Njia ya 9 inageuka kaskazini juu ya Henry Johnson Boulevard na kupanuka kuvuka I-90 tena kupitia flyover hapo awali iliyojengwa kwa njia ya kufutwa ya katikati ya Crosstown, ikitoka katika mji wa Albany katika mchakato huo.
Kabla tu ya kufikia kitongoji cha kaskazini cha Colonie, 9 anarudi kwenye vichochoro viwili na kufuata barabara ya Loudon kupitia vitongoji vyema vya makazi ya Albany Memorial na Wolferts Roost Country Club. Njia fupi ya NY 377 kwenda kaskazini wakati Njia ya 9 inaelekea magharibi kidogo. Makutano ya njia tano yanaashiria Loudonville. Chuo cha Siena huko Newtonville kiko upande wa mashariki maili iliyopita ya makutano, na ukumbi wa jiji la Colonie ulio karibu.

Hapo awali iliitwa Kaskazini Boulevard Sehemu ya kwanza iliyojengwa mnamo 1876 na Bodi ya Makamishna wa Washington Park wakati huo huo kama Washington Park. Ilijulikana pia kama Boulevard. Sehemu hiyo ya kwanza iliyojengwa ilikuwa mashariki mwa booth ya Toll kwenye Western Avenue, kaskazini na mashariki kwa makutano ya njia za kati na za Clinton, kwa kile kinachoitwa Manning Square. Kusini mwa Western Avenue, Manning Boulevard aliitwa Hawkins Avenue. Katika "Stvdies for Albany" (1914) ambayo iliagizwa na jiji, ilipendekezwa kuwa Manning Boulevard kupanuliwa kupitia Hawkins Avenue na kuendelea na New Scotland Avenue na mwishowe hadi Delaware Avenue ambayo ingeunda barabara ya semicircular kuzunguka mji. Boulevard alipokea jina lake la sasa kwa heshima ya Daniel Manning, kamishna wa zamani wa Hifadhi na Katibu wa Hazina
chini ya Rais Grover Cleveland.

Mnamo Aprili 30, 1919, Jimbo la New York lilikabidhi mkataba wa kuboresha sehemu ya van Rensselaer Boulevard kaskazini mwa mipaka ya Jiji la Albany kwa viwango vya barabara kuu. Mradi huo uligharimu $ 33,796 kukamilisha (sawa na $ 2022), na barabara iliyojengwa tena iliongezwa kwenye mfumo wa barabara kuu mnamo Novemba 11, 1919, kama Barabara kuu ya Jimbo 1518 (SH 1518). Haikuwa na nambari ya njia iliyowekwa hadi katikati ya miaka ya 1930 wakati SH 1518 ikawa sehemu ya NY 377, njia mpya inayoendelea kusini kuelekea makutano ya Barabara ya Kaskazini ya Boulevard na Loudonville huko Albany kwa njia ya mitaa inayomilikiwa na jiji. Alignment ya NY 377 haijabadilika tangu wakati huo; Walakini, makutano upande wa kusini wa njia hiyo yalibadilishwa tena kuwa maingiliano wakati sehemu ya sisi 9 kaskazini mwa Albany ilibadilishwa kuwa barabara kuu ya upatikanaji mdogo mnamo miaka ya 1970.

Boulevard ya Kaskazini inaendelea kupitia Flushing - ambapo ilijulikana kama Broadway -towards Bayside. Njia hiyo inasafiri kwa ujumla kwa njia ya Bayside, ikiingiliana na Clearview Expressway (I-295) njiani. Sio mbali na mashariki, inavuka barabara ya Cross Island Parkway katika Alley Pond Park. Zamani Parkway ya Cross Island, NY 25A hupitia Douglaston na Shingo Kidogo kabla ya kuvuka mstari wa Jiji la New York ndani ya Kaunti ya Nassau. Kunyoosha kwa maili tano ya boulevard ya kaskazini kunyoosha kuelekea mashariki kutoka Flushing kumeelezewa kuwa karibu sana na Long Island Koreatown (롱 아일랜드 코리아타운).

Wakati wa miaka ya 1960, taka ya manispaa ya Albany ilikuwa kwenye tovuti ya mmea wa zamani wa maji ya mto ambao ulifanya kazi kutoka mapema karne ya 20 hadi 1930. Wakati mizinga hiyo inadhaniwa kuwa imebomolewa, miundo kadhaa inayohusishwa na mmea bado imezikwa chini ya takataka, kama misingi ya saruji na miundo ya handaki. Iko kando ya Erie Boulevard juu ya takriban kati ya Interstate 787 (I-787), Interstate 90 (I-90), Erie Boulevard, na kiwanda cha matibabu cha maji machafu cha Albany, kilifungwa kwa taka za manispaa mnamo 1969 kwa niaba ya taka mpya katika eneo la Albany Pine Bush katika sehemu ya magharibi ya mji. Uporaji wa ardhi uliendelea kufanya kazi kama taka ya uharibifu wa kaskazini mwa Albany, kwa uchafu/uchafu wa ujenzi hadi 1988. Mipango ya asili ilikuwa ya Erie Boulevard, ambayo ilijengwa juu ya Mfereji wa zamani wa Erie, kupanuliwa hadi kwa Menands kutoka 6 ya I-787. Ingawa Albany angebeba gharama zote za ujenzi wa ujenzi bado. Erie Boulevard baadaye ilijengwa hadi mpaka na hakuna zaidi mnamo 1988 kama sehemu ya ujenzi wa mbuga.
report_src: Kaskazini mwa Boulevard huko Albany, New York ilikamilika kujengwa mwaka 1896, hivyo kufikia 2023 imekuwapo kwa takriban miaka 127 tangu ujenzi wake kukamilika [1].

question_en: What was S. S. Rajamouli's first film?
pos_context_en: Rajamouli started directing Telugu soap operas on Eenadu Television, under the guidance of K. Raghavendra Rao. Later on, he directed Santhi Nivasam TV Serial which was produced by K. Raghavendra Rao. His first shot at Telugu films was "Student No.1", with "Jr. NTR" in 2001. It took two years for Rajamouli to come up with his second movie "Simhadri". In the two-year gap between "Student No.1" and "Simhadri", Rajamouli planned his first mythological film with Malayalam actor Mohanlal, but the film eventually got shelved. In 2015, Assistant art director Manu Jagath, who later worked as the art director for Baahubali, released several sketches he had drawn for the shelved Mohanlal project. Rajamouli's third movie was "Sye", with actors Nithin and Genelia D'Souza. It was a first-of-its-kind movie in Tollywood, in that it was based on a rugby game. This movie was also the first instance where Rajamouli collaborated with K. K. Senthil Kumar. His next was "Chatrapathi", with the music of M. M. Keeravani and cinematography by Senthil Kumar.
neg_context_en: Koduri Srisaila Sri Rajamouli (born 1973), known professionally as S. S. Rajamouli is an Indian film director and screenwriter, known for his works primarily in Telugu cinema. He is known for directing high fantasy works such as "Magadheera" (2009), "Eega" (2012), the two part "" (2015) and "" (2017). The Baahubali franchise has achieved the highest grossing Indian multilingual film franchise of all time globally, with a box office of approximately . The first edition, Baahubali: The Beginning was nominated for Saturn Award for Best Fantasy Film, while the second edition, Baahubali 2: The Conclusion received the Saturn Award for Best International Film by the American Academy of Science Fiction, Fantasy and Horror Films. The second edition, garnered the Australian Telstra People's Choice Award at the 2017 Indian Film Festival of Melbourne.

In 2015, he directed "", which became the second Global highest grossing Indian film of all time, and the highest grossing Indian film of all time within India. The making of the epic film was featured in BBC's documentary on 100 Years of Indian cinema, directed by Sanjeev Bhaskar. The film was shot using Arri Alexa XT camera, marking Rajamouli's first film using digital camera. Rajamouli's work was cited by "The Hollywood Reporter", "The Guardian" and "The Huffington Post". The film was Nominated in four categories at the 42nd Saturn Awards of the Academy of Science Fiction, Fantasy and Horror Films in Los Angeles, USA.

The script was doctored by Rajamouli's brother, S. S. Kanchi, while Janardhan Maharshi and Crazy Mohan wrote the dialogue for the Telugu and Tamil versions respectively, marking their first collaboration with Rajamouli. James Fowlds was initially chosen as the film's director of photography, but was replaced by K. K. Senthil Kumar due to creative differences and scheduling conflicts. M. M. Keeravani composed the film's soundtrack and score, Kotagiri Venkateswara Rao edited the film, Ravinder Reddy was its art director, and Rajamouli's wife Rama worked on the costume design.

Sudeep made his debut in Telugu cinema in 2012, with S. S. Rajamouli's "Eega", a fantasy film in which he portrayed an industrialist who, on falling for an NGO worker (played by Samantha Ruth Prabhu), kills her alleged lover, who begins to haunt him in the form of a housefly. The film and Sudeep's performance were highly acclaimed. In 2013, "Bachchan" and "Varadanayaka" were released. His next film was a drama titled "Maanikya" that he also directed, a remake of the Telugu film, "Mirchi" (2013). In 2015 he starred in "Ranna", a remake of the Telugu film, "Attarintiki Daredi", and played a cameo role as a Persian arms trader in "", directed by S. S. Rajamouli—the year's highest-grossing film.

K. V. Vijayendra Prasad, father of S. S. Rajamouli and the storywriter of "Baahubali: The Beginning" had revealed that he was inspired by the hero introduction sequence of the 1967 Kannnada film, "Immadi Pulikeshi", based on the life of the Chalukya king, Pulakeshin II and hence incorporated a similar sequence. He had further revealed that the core storyline – where one brother is not given the throne because of his disability leading to animosity between blood relatives – was also partly inspired by this movie. In February 2011, S. S. Rajamouli announced that Prabhas will star in his upcoming movie. In January 2013, he announced that the working title as "Baahubali" and the actual film production started at Rock Gardens in Kurnool on 6 July 2013. The waterfall scenes in the film were shot at Athirappilly Falls in Kerala, huge sets for the Mahishmati kingdom were constructed at Ramoji Film City in Hyderabad and the snow episodes in the film were shot in Bulgaria. The screen writer, K. V. Vijayendra Prasad who wrote stories for most of Rajamouli's films once again penned the story for Baahubali. The film boasts of one year pre production work where in 15,000-story board sketches for the film were created which is highest for any Indian Film as of this date. More than 90 percent of the film had visually enhanced shots and according to the producer, more than 600 VFX artists worked for the film from 18 facilities around the world led by Makuta VFX and Firefly in Hyderabad, Prasad Studios in Hyderabad and Chennai, Annapurna Studios in Hyderabad, Tau Films in Malaysia, and Dancing Digital Animation and Macrograph in South Korea. Makuta VFX which had prior experience of working with S.S.Rajamouli was chosen as principal visual effects studio. The cinematography of the movie was done by KK Senthil Kumar for 380 days using Arri Alexa XT camera with Master Prime lens marking Rajamouli's first film using digital camera.

His other works include the sports drama film "Sye" and the social problem film "Vikramarkudu", which was screened at the 37th International Film Festival of India in the mainstream section. The melodrama films "Maryada Ramanna", "Vikramarkudu" and "Chhatrapati" were remade in various Indian languages, with successful reviews. Rajamouli has garnered several awards including three National Film Awards, four Filmfare Awards South, five state Nandi Awards, the IIFA Award, two SIIMA Awards, the Star World India, "Entertainer of The Year" in 2012, and the "CNN-News18 Indian of the Year in Entertainment" for 2015. In 2016, he was honoured with the Padma Shri, India's fourth highest civilian honour for his contributions towards the field of Art. 
Rajamouli was born on 1973 in Amareshwara Camp Raichur, Karnataka to screenwriter K. V. Vijayendra Prasad and Raja Nandini. His family hails from Kovvur in Andhra Pradesh. His primary education was done at Kovvur and his higher education was at Eluru. He lived in Vizag for several years as his mother was from there. Rajamouli is an atheist.

Simhadri is a 2003 Telugu action masala film directed by S. S. Rajamouli. The film was presented by V. Doraiswamy Raju and produced by V. Vijay Kumar Varma for the production company VMC Combines. The film stars Jr. NTR, Ankitha, and Bhumika Chawla in lead roles with Mukesh Rishi, Nassar, and Rahul Dev portraying supporting roles. The film's story was penned by Rajamouli's father V. Vijayendra Prasad and the dialogues were penned by M. Rathnam

The young girl is impressed with the story of the fly her father narrates.The idea for "Eega" originated in the late 1990s in screenwriter K. V. Vijayendra Prasad mind. At that time, he was joking about a housefly seeking revenge on a human in a conversation with his son S. S. Rajamouli. Prasad later developed the idea as a script for an English-language film set in 1830s America, in which an African-American boy dies in an attempt to free his family from slavery and is reincarnated as a fly. After completing "Maryada Ramanna" (2010), Rajamouli reconsidered the concept after thinking of directing a film that was distinct from any other. He decided to make "Eega" a bilingual film in Telugu and Tamil – each scene including speech was filmed twice, once for each language. The Tamil version, titled "Naan Ee", was Rajamouli's directorial debut in Tamil cinema. The film was presented by Daggubati Suresh Babu of Suresh Productions.

Oneindia Entertainment stated, "S. S. Rajamouli has chosen a fantastic love story for his movie Magadheera and linked it to a love story that dated back to some 400 years. He has filled complete energy in the film and no doubt, the graphic works and modern technology are perfectly used for the movie. As a whole, the film reminds the audiences of watching a Hollywood movie with perfect local flavor", and called the film's screenplay by Rajamouli a highlight. Upperstall.com stated "Magadheera is not an epic, not a legend, not even a cult movie, but it is certainly an artistic extravaganza and a sensory treat. Like we said before, a must watch! A mast watch!".
question_src: Filamu ya kwanza ya S. S. Rajamouli ilikuwa nini?
pos_context_src: Rajamouli alianza kuelekeza viboreshaji vya sabuni ya Telugu kwenye runinga ya Eenadu, chini ya uongozi wa K. Raghavendra Rao. Baadaye, alielekeza serial ya TV ya Santhi Nivasam ambayo ilitengenezwa na K. Raghavendra Rao. Risasi yake ya kwanza kwenye filamu za Telugu ilikuwa "Mwanafunzi No.1", na "Jr. NTR" mnamo 2001. Ilichukua miaka miwili kwa Rajamouli kuja na sinema yake ya pili "Simhadri". Katika pengo la miaka mbili kati ya "Mwanafunzi No.1" na "Simhadri", Rajamouli alipanga filamu yake ya kwanza ya hadithi na muigizaji wa Kimalayalam Mohanlal, lakini filamu hiyo hatimaye ilihifadhiwa. Mnamo mwaka wa 2015, Mkurugenzi Msaidizi wa Sanaa Manu Jagath, ambaye baadaye alifanya kazi kama Mkurugenzi wa Sanaa wa Baahubali, alitoa michoro kadhaa alizozitoa kwa Mradi wa Mohanlal uliohifadhiwa. Sinema ya tatu ya Rajamouli ilikuwa "Sye", na waigizaji Nithin na Genelia D'Souza. Ilikuwa sinema ya kwanza ya aina yake huko Tollywood, kwa kuwa ilikuwa msingi wa mchezo wa rugby. Sinema hii pia ilikuwa mfano wa kwanza ambapo Rajamouli alishirikiana na K. K. Senthil Kumar. Ijayo yake ilikuwa "Chatrapathi", na muziki wa M. M. Keeravani na sinema na Senthil Kumar.
neg_context_src: Koduri Srisaila Sri Rajamouli (amezaliwa 1973), anayejulikana kama S. S. Rajamouli ni mkurugenzi wa filamu wa India na mwandishi wa skrini, anayejulikana kwa kazi zake kimsingi katika sinema ya Telugu. Anajulikana kwa kuelekeza kazi za Ndoto za Juu kama "Magadheera" (2009), "Eega" (2012), sehemu mbili "" (2015) na "" (2017). Franchise ya Baahubali imepata taswira ya juu zaidi ya filamu ya India ya wakati wote ulimwenguni, na ofisi ya sanduku la takriban. Toleo la kwanza, Baahubali: Mwanzo uliteuliwa kwa Tuzo la Saturn kwa Filamu Bora ya Ndoto, wakati toleo la pili, Baahubali 2: Hitimisho lilipokea Tuzo la Saturn la Filamu Bora ya Kimataifa na Chuo cha Sayansi cha Sayansi, Filamu za Ndoto na za kutisha. Toleo la pili, lilipata tuzo ya Choice ya People ya People ya Australia katika Tamasha la Filamu la India la 2017 la Melbourne.

Mnamo mwaka wa 2015, alielekeza "", ambayo ikawa filamu ya pili ya juu kabisa ya India ya wakati wote, na filamu ya juu zaidi ya India ya wakati wote ndani ya India. Uundaji wa filamu ya Epic ilionyeshwa katika hati ya BBC juu ya miaka 100 ya sinema ya India, iliyoongozwa na Sanjeev Bhaskar. Filamu hiyo ilipigwa risasi kwa kutumia kamera ya Arri Alexa XT, ikiashiria filamu ya kwanza ya Rajamouli kwa kutumia kamera ya dijiti. Kazi ya Rajamouli ilitajwa na "Mwandishi wa Hollywood", "The Guardian" na "The Huffington Post". Filamu hiyo iliteuliwa katika vikundi vinne katika Tuzo za 42 za Saturn za Chuo cha Sayansi ya Hadithi, Filamu za Ndoto na Hofu huko Los Angeles, USA.

Nakala hiyo ilifundishwa na kaka wa Rajamouli, S. S. Kanchi, wakati Janardhan Maharshi na Crazy Mohan waliandika mazungumzo ya matoleo ya Telugu na Kitamil mtawaliwa, wakiashiria kushirikiana kwao kwa kwanza na Rajamouli. Hapo awali James Fowlds alichaguliwa kama mkurugenzi wa filamu wa upigaji picha, lakini alibadilishwa na K. K. Senthil Kumar kutokana na tofauti za ubunifu na migogoro ya ratiba. M. M. Keeravani alitunga sauti na alama ya filamu, Kotagiri Venkateswara Rao alihariri filamu hiyo, Ravinder Reddy alikuwa mkurugenzi wake wa sanaa, na mke wa Rajamouli Rama alifanya kazi kwenye muundo wa mavazi.

Sudeep alifanya kwanza katika sinema ya Telugu mnamo 2012, na "Eega" ya S. S. Rajamouli, filamu ya ajabu ambayo alionyesha mfanyabiashara ambaye, alipoanguka kwa mfanyikazi wa NGO (aliyechezwa na Samantha Ruth Prabhu), anamwua mpenzi wake, ambaye anaanza kumtuliza katika fomu ya nyumba. Utendaji wa filamu na Sudeep ulitamkwa sana. Mnamo 2013, "Bachchan" na "Varadanayaka" waliachiliwa. Filamu yake iliyofuata ilikuwa mchezo wa kuigiza ulioitwa "Maanikya" ambao pia alielekeza, kumbukumbu ya filamu ya Telugu, "Mirchi" (2013). Mnamo mwaka wa 2015 aliweka nyota katika "Ranna", kumbukumbu ya filamu ya Telugu, "Attarintiki Daredi", na alichukua jukumu kama mfanyabiashara wa Silaha za Uajemi katika "", iliyoongozwa na S. S. Rajamouli-filamu ya mwaka wa juu kabisa.

K. V. Vijayendra Prasad, baba wa S. S. Rajamouli na mwandishi wa hadithi ya "Baahubali: Mwanzo" alikuwa amefunua kwamba aliongozwa na mpangilio wa utangulizi wa shujaa wa filamu ya Kannnada ya 1967, "Immadi Pulikeshi", kwa msingi wa maisha ya Mfalme wa Chalukya, Pundeshin ii na Hidence. Alikuwa amefunua zaidi kuwa hadithi ya msingi - ambapo kaka mmoja hajapewa kiti cha enzi kwa sababu ya ulemavu wake unaosababisha uhasama kati ya jamaa wa damu - pia aliongozwa na sinema hii. Mnamo Februari 2011, S. S. Rajamouli alitangaza kwamba Prabhas atakuwa nyota kwenye sinema yake inayokuja. Mnamo Januari 2013, alitangaza kwamba jina la kufanya kazi kama "Baahubali" na utengenezaji wa filamu halisi ulianza katika Rock Gardens huko Kurnool mnamo 6 Julai 2013. Matukio ya maporomoko ya maji kwenye filamu yalipigwa risasi huko Athirappilly Falls huko Kerala, seti kubwa kwa Mahishmati Kingdom ilijengwa huko Ramoji Filamu. Mwandishi wa skrini, K. V. Vijayendra Prasad ambaye aliandika hadithi kwa filamu nyingi za Rajamouli kwa mara nyingine aliandika hadithi hiyo kwa Baahubali. Filamu hiyo inajivunia kazi ya uzalishaji wa mwaka mmoja ambapo katika michoro za bodi ya hadithi 15,000 kwa filamu hiyo iliundwa ambayo ni ya juu kwa filamu yoyote ya India hadi tarehe hii. Zaidi ya asilimia 90 ya filamu hiyo ilikuwa imeongeza shots na kulingana na mtayarishaji, wasanii zaidi ya 600 wa VFX walifanya kazi kwa filamu hiyo kutoka vituo 18 ulimwenguni kote wakiongozwa na Makuta VFX na Firefly huko Hyderabad, Prasad Studios huko Hyderabad na Chennai, Annapurna Studing katika filamu za malki, Tau digita, Tau Digita, Tau digita, Tau digita, Tau digita digital, Tau Malays, Malays Dectics, Tau Malays, Tauatal Animu. Makuta VFX ambayo ilikuwa na uzoefu wa hapo awali wa kufanya kazi na S.S.Rajamouli alichaguliwa kama studio kuu ya athari za kuona. Sinema ya sinema hiyo ilifanywa na KK Senthil Kumar kwa siku 380 kwa kutumia kamera ya Arri Alexa XT na lensi kuu ya kuashiria filamu ya kwanza ya Rajamouli kwa kutumia kamera ya dijiti.

Kazi zake zingine ni pamoja na filamu ya maigizo ya michezo "Sye" na filamu ya shida ya kijamii "Vikramarkudu", ambayo ilichunguzwa katika Tamasha la Filamu la Kimataifa la India la India katika sehemu kuu. Filamu za melodrama "Maryada Ramanna", "Vikramarkudu" na "Chhatrapati" zilirudishwa katika lugha mbali mbali za India, na hakiki zilizofanikiwa. Rajamouli amepata tuzo kadhaa ikiwa ni pamoja na Tuzo tatu za Filamu za Kitaifa, Tuzo nne za Filamu Kusini, Tuzo tano za Jimbo la Nandi, Tuzo la IIFA, Tuzo mbili za Siima, Star World India, "Burudani ya Mwaka" mnamo 2012, na "CNN-News18 Indian of the Year in Entertainment" kwa 2015. Mnamo mwaka wa 2016, aliheshimu kwamba aliheshimu na Washirika wa Nne. ya sanaa. 
Rajamouli alizaliwa mnamo 1973 huko Amareshwara Camp Raichur, Karnataka kwa mwandishi wa picha K. V. Vijayendra Prasad na Raja Nandini. Familia yake inatoka Kovvur huko Andhra Pradesh. Masomo yake ya msingi yalifanywa huko Kovvur na elimu yake ya juu ilikuwa huko Eluru. Aliishi Vizag kwa miaka kadhaa kama mama yake alivyokuwa akitoka hapo. Rajamouli ni mtu asiyeamini kuwa Mungu.

Simhadri ni filamu ya Masala ya Kitelezi ya 2003 iliyoongozwa na S. S. Rajamouli. Filamu hiyo iliwasilishwa na V. Doraiswamy Raju na iliyotengenezwa na V. Vijay Kumar Varma kwa kampuni ya uzalishaji VMC inachanganya. Nyota wa filamu Jr. NTR, Ankitha, na Bhumika Chawla katika majukumu ya kuongoza na Mukesh Rishi, Nassar, na Rahul Dev wakionyesha majukumu ya kuunga mkono. Hadithi ya filamu hiyo iliandikwa na baba wa Rajamouli V. Vijayendra Prasad na mazungumzo yaliandikwa na M. Rathnam

Msichana mdogo anavutiwa na hadithi ya kuruka baba yake anasimulia. Wazo la "eega" lilitokea mwishoni mwa miaka ya 1990 katika mwandishi wa skrini K. V. Vijayendra Prasad Akili. Wakati huo, alikuwa akicheza utani juu ya kulipiza kisasi kwa mwanadamu katika mazungumzo na mtoto wake S. S. Rajamouli. Baadaye Prasad aliendeleza wazo hilo kama maandishi ya filamu ya lugha ya Kiingereza iliyowekwa mnamo 1830s Amerika, ambayo mvulana wa Kiafrika-Amerika hufa katika jaribio la kuachilia familia yake kutoka utumwa na huzaliwa tena kama nzi. Baada ya kumaliza "Maryada Ramanna" (2010), Rajamouli alifikiria tena wazo hilo baada ya kufikiria kuelekeza filamu ambayo ilikuwa tofauti na nyingine yoyote. Aliamua kutengeneza "eega" filamu ya lugha mbili huko Telugu na Kitamil - kila eneo ikiwa ni pamoja na hotuba lilipigwa mara mbili, mara moja kwa kila lugha. Toleo la Kitamil, lililopewa jina la "Naan EE", lilikuwa la mwongozo wa mwongozo wa Rajamouli katika sinema ya Kitamil. Filamu hiyo iliwasilishwa na Daggubati Suresh Babu wa Suresh Productions.

Burudani ya Oneindia ilisema, "S. S. Rajamouli amechagua hadithi ya upendo mzuri kwa sinema yake Magadheera na kuiunganisha na hadithi ya upendo ambayo ilikuwa ya miaka 400. Amejaza nguvu kamili kwenye filamu na bila shaka, picha za picha na teknolojia ya kisasa hutumiwa kikamilifu kwa sinema. kuonyesha. Upperstall.com ilisema "Magadheera sio hadithi, sio hadithi, hata sinema ya ibada, lakini hakika ni kisanii cha ziada na matibabu ya hisia. Kama tulivyosema hapo awali, lazima uangalie!

question_en: When was Sir Anerood Jugnauth born?
pos_context_en: Sir Anerood Jugnauth GCSK, , QC, MP, PC (born 29 March 1930) is a Mauritian politician who has served as both President and Prime Minister of Mauritius. He is Member of Parliament for Piton & Riviere Du Rempart.
neg_context_en: Ashok Kumar Jugnauth (born आशोक कुमार जग्नोथ on 4 January 1953) is a former Mauritian Member of Parliament and was the Minister of Health of Mauritius from 2000 to 2005. He served in the cabinet of Anerood Jugnauth from 2000 to 2003 and that of Paul Berenger from 2003 to 2005. He is part of the Jugnauth family. He is the younger brother of Sir Anerood Jugnauth. He was minister during his brother's term as Prime Minister.

He was made Queen's Counsel in 1980 and was made a member of the Privy Council in 1983. He was knighted by Queen Elizabeth II in 1988 when Mauritius was still one of the Queen's realms and the Queen was titular head of state. Therefore, he still uses his formal title of "Sir Anerood" and also the prefix used by Privy Councillors, "The Right Honourable". His name is often abbreviated as 'SAJ' being the initials of Sir Anerood Jugnauth. He is currently one of the last Mauritian Knights of the United Kingdom and is the last Mauritian to be member of the Privy Council.

He is the only son of Sir Anerood Jugnauth and Sarojini Ballah. His candidacy for Parliamentary General Elections in Constituency No 9, Rose Belle and Vieux Grand Port in 2000 made him elected as Member of Parliament from there. He was appointed as Minister of Agriculture by President Uteem to serve in the cabinet. He served as Minister under the premiership of his father Anerood Jugnauth who became Prime Minister in 2000 after winning the elections with the MSM/MMM coalition.

Due to the end of the mandate of Sir Anerood, two persons, Vice President (Angidi Chettiar) and himself were the two persons nominated to the Presidency. He was voted for by both governing members of parliament as well as opposition MPs. Jugnauth was elected to the ceremonial post of President in 2003. After five years in office, he was re-elected by the National Assembly in a unanimous vote on 19 September 2008, supported by both the government and the opposition.

The MSM was founded in 1983 by Sir Anerood Jugnauth, who has been Prime Minister three times, for a total of sixteen years (1982-1995, 2000-2003, and again since 2014). He was also President from 2003 to 2012. He led the MSM from 1983 to 2003, when his son Pravind Jugnauth, officially assumed the leadership. Pravind Jugnauth served as Vice Prime Minister in his father's cabinet. Other members of the Jugnauth family have also been politically active, including Lall Jugnauth (a former Attorney General), Ashok Jugnauth (former Minister of Health) and Maya Hanoomanjee (also former Minister of Health).

Born on 25 December 1961 in La Caverne, a suburb area in Vacoas-Phoenix, Mauritius, Jugnauth was born into a high class Hindu Yadav family. He was born to Anerood Jugnauth, a famous well known barrister who was the second prime minister of Mauritius and Sarojini Ballah, a school teacher form a well-off family. He has an elder sister, Shalini Jugnauth, married to Dr Kishan Malhotra.

Sir Anerood Jugnauth was elected in 2003. Taking office on 7 October 2003, he was re-elected in 2008. In March 2012, Sir Anerood criticised the government, saying that the economy has entered in a vicious circle of economic loss and the population are suffering. The Prime Minister Dr. Navin Ramgoolam said that the Presidency was an apolitical office and invited him to join the political arena. SAJ resigned on 31 March 2012 and make his comeback in politics, he took the lead of his former party Militant Socialist Movement (MSM) which just break it alliance with the Labour party and left the government because of corruption accusation, the Medpoint Scandal. After the return of Sir Anerood, the MSM concluded an alliance with the opposition party Mauritian Militant Movement.

In early 1999 when the Labor Party and MMM decided to end up their team, MMM became the opposition party and MLP formed the government.Sir Anerood Jugnauth then initiated the idea of the ""Medpoint Deal""The MSM led by Anerood Jugnauth and MMM led by Paul Bérenger agreed that if they won the election Anerood Jugnauth would become Prime Minister. They agreed that after 3 years he would step down as Prime Minister to become the President of Mauritius with enhanced powers and Bérenger would become Prime Minister, the first non-Hindu to do so. The idea was both agreed by the MSM members and MMM members.It was agreed that Paul Berenger would remain Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance for 3 years up to 2003 and after that would take up the leadership of both parties becoming prime minister for the rest of the term thus up to 2005.He was prime minister for 21 months. They formed up the MSM/MMM in 2000.

Sarojini Ballah married Sir Anerood Jugnauth on 18 December 1957, she has two children, Shalini (now Mrs. Malhotra) and Pravind who is the former Deputy Prime Minister, Minister of Finance and Economic Development. She is the grandmother of five grandchildren that is Anusha, Divya, Sonika, Sonali and Sara.
question_src: Sir Anerood Jugnauth alizaliwa lini?
pos_context_src: Sir Anerood Jugnauth GCSK ,, QC, mbunge, PC (amezaliwa 29 Machi 1930) ni mwanasiasa wa Mauriti ambaye amewahi kuwa Rais na Waziri Mkuu wa Mauritius. Yeye ni mwanachama wa Bunge la Piton & Riviere du Rempart.
neg_context_src: Ashok Kumar Jugnauth (amezaliwa कुम जग Januari 4 Januari 1953) ni mwanachama wa zamani wa Bunge la Mauriti na alikuwa Waziri wa Afya ya Mauritius kutoka 2000 hadi 2005. Alihudumu katika Baraza la Mawaziri la Anerood Jugnauth kutoka 2000 hadi 2003 na ile ya Paul Berenger kutoka 2003 hadi 2005. Yeye ndiye kaka mdogo wa Sir Anerood Jugnauth. Alikuwa waziri wakati wa muda wa kaka yake kama Waziri Mkuu.

Alifanywa mashauri ya Malkia mnamo 1980 na alifanywa kuwa mwanachama wa Baraza la Ushuru mnamo 1983. Alipigwa na Malkia Elizabeth II mnamo 1988 wakati Mauritius bado alikuwa mmoja wa maeneo ya Malkia na Malkia alikuwa mkuu wa nchi. Kwa hivyo, bado anatumia jina lake rasmi la "Sir Anerood" na pia kiambishi awali kinachotumiwa na madiwani wa kibinafsi, "Heshima ya Haki". Jina lake mara nyingi hufupishwa kama 'Saj' kuwa waanzilishi wa Sir Anerood Jugnauth. Kwa sasa yeye ni mmoja wa Knights wa mwisho wa Mauriti wa Uingereza na ndiye Mgaidi wa mwisho kuwa mwanachama wa Baraza la Ushuru.

Yeye ndiye mtoto wa pekee wa Sir Anerood Jugnauth na Sarojini Ballah. Uwasilishaji wake wa uchaguzi mkuu wa bunge katika Jimbo la 9, Rose Belle na Vieux Grand Port mnamo 2000 ulimfanya achaguliwe kama Mjumbe wa Bunge kutoka hapo. Aliteuliwa kama Waziri wa Kilimo na Rais Uteem kutumikia katika baraza la mawaziri. Alihudumu kama waziri chini ya udhamini wa baba yake Anerood Jugnauth ambaye alikua Waziri Mkuu mnamo 2000 baada ya kushinda uchaguzi na Ushirikiano wa MSM/MMM.

Kwa sababu ya mwisho wa agizo la Sir Anerood, watu wawili, makamu wa rais (Angidi Chettiar) na yeye mwenyewe walikuwa watu wawili walioteuliwa kwa urais. Alipigiwa kura na wanachama wote wa Bunge na Wabunge wa Upinzani. Jugnauth alichaguliwa katika wadhifa wa rais mnamo 2003. Baada ya miaka mitano ofisini, alichaguliwa tena na Bunge la Kitaifa katika kura ya makubaliano mnamo 19 Septemba 2008, akiungwa mkono na serikali na upinzani.

MSM ilianzishwa mnamo 1983 na Sir Anerood Jugnauth, ambaye amekuwa Waziri Mkuu mara tatu, kwa jumla ya miaka kumi na sita (1982-1995, 2000-2003, na tena tangu 2014). Alikuwa pia rais kutoka 2003 hadi 2012. Aliongoza MSM kutoka 1983 hadi 2003, wakati mtoto wake Pravind Jugnauth, alichukua rasmi uongozi. Pravind Jugnauth aliwahi kuwa Waziri Mkuu wa Makamu katika baraza la mawaziri la baba yake. Wajumbe wengine wa familia ya Jugnauth pia wamekuwa wakifanya kazi kisiasa, pamoja na Lall Jugnauth (wakili mkuu wa zamani), Ashok Jugnauth (Waziri wa zamani wa Afya) na Maya Hanoomanjee (pia Waziri wa zamani wa Afya).

Alizaliwa mnamo 25 Desemba 1961 huko La Caverne, eneo la kitongoji huko Vatoas-Phoenix, Mauritius, Jugnauth alizaliwa katika familia ya kiwango cha juu cha Hindu Yadav. Alizaliwa kwa Anerood Jugnauth, mtu maarufu anayejulikana ambaye alikuwa Waziri Mkuu wa pili wa Mauritius na Sarojini Ballah, mwalimu wa shule anaunda familia nzuri. Ana dada mzee, Shalini Jugnauth, aliyeolewa na Dk Kishan Malhotra.

Sir Anerood Jugnauth alichaguliwa mnamo 2003. Kuchukua madaraka mnamo 7 Oktoba 2003, alichaguliwa tena mnamo 2008. Mnamo Machi 2012, Sir Anerood alikosoa serikali, akisema kwamba uchumi umeingia katika mzunguko mbaya wa upotezaji wa uchumi na idadi ya watu wanateseka. Waziri Mkuu Dk. Navin Ramgoolam alisema kuwa urais huo ni ofisi ya kukomesha na kumualika ajiunge na uwanja wa kisiasa. Saj alijiuzulu mnamo Machi 31, 2012 na kufanya kurudi kwake katika siasa, aliongoza kwa harakati zake za zamani za wanamgambo wa Kijamaa (MSM) ambayo ilivunja tu muungano na Chama cha Wafanyikazi na kuiacha serikali kwa sababu ya mashtaka ya ufisadi, kashfa ya medpoint. Baada ya kurudi kwa Sir Anerood, MSM ilihitimisha muungano na harakati za wanamgambo wa Upinzani wa Mauriti.

Mwanzoni mwa mwaka wa 1999 wakati Chama cha Wafanyikazi na MMM kiliamua kuishia timu yao, MMM ikawa Chama cha Upinzani na MLP iliunda serikali.sir anerood Jugnauth basi ilianzisha wazo la mpango wa "" medpoint "" MSM iliyoongozwa na Anerood Jugnauth na MMM wakiongozwa na Paul Bérenger alikubali kwamba wangeshinda uchaguzi mkuu wa uchaguzi. Walikubaliana kwamba baada ya miaka 3 atashuka kama Waziri Mkuu kuwa Rais wa Mauritius aliye na nguvu zilizoboreshwa na Bérenger atakuwa Waziri Mkuu, wa kwanza ambaye sio Wahindu kufanya hivyo. Wazo hilo lilikubaliwa na wanachama wa MSM na wanachama wa MMM.Ilikubaliwa kwamba Paul Berenger atabaki naibu Waziri Mkuu na Waziri wa Fedha kwa miaka 3 hadi 2003 na baada ya hapo atachukua uongozi wa pande zote kuwa Waziri Mkuu kwa muda wote hadi 2005.Alikuwa Waziri Mkuu kwa miezi 21. Waliunda MSM/MMM mnamo 2000.

Sarojini Ballah alifunga ndoa na Sir Anerood Jugnauth mnamo 18 Desemba 1957, ana watoto wawili, Shalini (sasa Bi Malhotra) na Pravind ambaye ni Waziri Mkuu wa zamani, Waziri wa Fedha na Maendeleo ya Uchumi. Yeye ndiye bibi wa wajukuu watano ambao ni Anusha, Divya, Sonika, Sonali na Sara.

question_en: How big does a dog need to be to be considered a giant breed?
pos_context_en: This giant breed matures slowly in both mind and body, taking anywhere from 2 to 3 years. The objective in training this dog is for the owner to build trust through humane methods. As youngsters, they can be quite boisterous and they do require steady and reliable training to develop manners and physical self-control. As with all large, active working dogs, this breed should be well socialized early in life with other dogs and people, and be provided with regular activity and training.
neg_context_en: A giant dog breed has no universal height or weight classification, although some groups define "giant breeds" as those heavier than . Giant breeds grow rapidly, but take longer to mature into their full adult sizes than smaller dogs.

Many giant breeds are mature, soft and relaxed dogs as adults and require less exercise than most smaller dogs, so they can make better pets for small living arrangements, such as apartments. Because they are larger animals, they are less likely to be intimidated by other people and thus are much more adaptable to meeting friends, family members, and children of owners. They are normally very calm and are great family dogs. If they sense a threat towards their owner, they will become very protective. They are, in general, stronger than other breeds and many giant breeds are well known for their working abilities.

Giant breeds often have health-related disadvantages when compared to smaller dogs and caring for them is usually more expensive than for smaller dogs. They eat more than smaller breeds and sometimes require speciality diets to tackle weight and joint management.

In addition to spending more on food, expenses overall may be more than for most breeds. Larger beds, collars, and toys cost more, as do grooming and kenneling very large dogs. There is also the issue of more expensive veterinary bills. For instance, anaesthetics and pharmaceuticals are charged by volume/mass, which is determined by the weight of the dog. Joint problems, such as hip dysplasia and arthritis, are common. Large breeds are also quite prone to osteosarcoma and susceptible to other debilitating bone and cartilage diseases. This is the result of a much higher growth factor—adult weight versus birth weight—and much longer growth period. Their life span is generally shorter than that of smaller dogs, often living only 6 to 10 years.The following breeds are generally described as giant breeds:

The breed is of above average intelligence and can be independent minded, so early training and diverse daily exercise is recommended. Based on Stanley Coren's book "The Intelligence of Dogs" (2006) ranking methodology, the Miniature ranked 12th, Standard 18th, and Giant 28th out of 140 breeds within 79 ranks on the ability to learn and obey new commands i.e. working and obedience intelligence. The first two were grouped among "excellent working dogs", while the Giant among "above-average working dogs". Additionally, experts ranked the Miniature as 5th among top 15 breeds at watchdog barking ability, the Giant as 6th among top 13 breeds at effective guard ability, while in adaptive intelligence all three breeds showed good problem-solving abilities. They are protective and energetic, and will alert members of the household to any potential danger, although its watchful nature can lead to persistent barking. To avoid annoying the neighbors, dog owners should make every effort to curb excessive barking through training.

According to the Standard Schnauzer Club of America, “The Standard Schnauzer is considered a high-energy dog. They need ample exercise not only for physical well-being but also for emotional well-being. The minimum amount an adult dog should get is the equivalent of one long walk a day. This walk should be brisk enough to keep the dog at a steady trotting pace in order to keep the dog in prime physical condition. The Standard Schnauzer puppy is constantly exploring, learning and testing his limits. As adults, they are always ready for a walk in the woods, a ride in the car, a training session or any other activity that allows them to be with their owner. This is a breed that knows how to be on the alert, even when relaxing by the feet of their owner.

Though physically grown at one year, many dog breeds including Xolos, are not 'emotionally mature' until around two years. Like active breeds such as terriers, Xolos need calm, consistent, and loving obedience training and regular socialization during their growing years. Well-raised Xolos bond strongly with their owners, becoming highly devoted to their families while frequently choosing one specific family member as favorite.
Anyone considering acquiring a Xolo should expect to spend time educating themselves in positive dog training techniques, and, ideally, should have prior experience with active and intelligent dog breeds. A spacious, well-fenced, and safe physical environment is desirable for this breed. Daily walks are ideal for exercising most toy-sized Xolos, however more stimulating physical and mental exercise is advised for larger and more active individuals. Behavior problems in Xolos are typically a result of a dog receiving inadequate or inconsistent supervision, as well as inadequate exercise and mental stimulation. The Xoloitzcuintli is a social dog that should not, in most cases, be an "only dog". It does not do well when kept as an outside-only dog. This is a breed that is at its best when it is made part of the family, receiving regular interaction and socialization with its humans (and other dogs, whether present in the home or as regular playmates).

Many breeds of dog participate in skijoring. The only prerequisite is a desire to run down a trail and pull, which is innate in many dogs. Small dogs (less than 40 pounds) are rarely seen skijoring, because they do not greatly assist the skier; however, since the skier can provide as much power as is required to travel, any enthusiastic dog can participate. Athletic dogs such as Pointers, Setters and herding breeds take to skijoring with glee, as do the northern breeds, such as Siberian and Alaskan huskies, malamutes, Samoyeds, and Inuit dogs; however, any large energetic dog is capable of enjoying this sport. Golden retrievers, giant schnauzers, Labrador retrievers, and many cross-breeds are seen in harness. Pulling breeds work well also such as American bull terriers, Staffordshire terriers, American bull dogs, and mastiffs.

The domestic dog is the first species, and the only large carnivore, to have been domesticated. Over the past 200 years, dogs have undergone rapid phenotypic change and were formed into today's modern breeds due to artificial selection imposed by humans. These breeds can vary in size and weight from a teacup poodle to a giant mastiff. The skull, body, and limb proportions vary significantly between breeds, with dogs displaying more phenotypic diversity than can be found within the entire order of carnivores. Some breeds demonstrate outstanding skills in herding, retrieving, scent detection, and guarding, which demonstrates the functional and behavioral diversity of dogs. The first dogs were certainly wolflike, however the phenotypic changes that coincided with the dog–wolf genetic divergence away from each other are not known.
question_src: Je! Mbwa anahitaji kuzingatiwa kama aina kubwa?
pos_context_title_src: Mbwa mkubwa wa mlima wa Uswizi
pos_context_src: Uzalishaji huu mkubwa unakua polepole katika akili na mwili, ukichukua mahali popote kutoka miaka 2 hadi 3. Kusudi la kufundisha mbwa huyu ni kwa mmiliki kujenga uaminifu kupitia njia za kibinadamu. Kama vijana, wanaweza kuwa na wasiwasi kabisa na wanahitaji mafunzo thabiti na ya kuaminika kukuza tabia na kujitawala kwa mwili. Kama ilivyo kwa mbwa wote wakubwa, wanaofanya kazi, aina hii inapaswa kujumuishwa mapema katika maisha na mbwa wengine na watu, na kupewa shughuli za kawaida na mafunzo.
neg_context_title_src: Mbwa asiye na nywele wa Mexico
neg_context_src: Uzazi mkubwa wa mbwa hauna urefu wa ulimwengu au uainishaji wa uzito, ingawa vikundi vingine hufafanua "mifugo mikubwa" kama zile nzito kuliko. Mifugo mikubwa hukua haraka, lakini huchukua muda mrefu kukomaa katika ukubwa wao kamili wa watu wazima kuliko mbwa wadogo.

Mifugo mingi kubwa ni ya kukomaa, laini na iliyorejeshwa kama watu wazima na inahitaji mazoezi kidogo kuliko mbwa wadogo, kwa hivyo wanaweza kutengeneza kipenzi bora kwa mpangilio mdogo wa kuishi, kama vile vyumba. Kwa sababu ni wanyama wakubwa, wana uwezekano mdogo wa kutishiwa na watu wengine na kwa hivyo wanaweza kubadilika zaidi kwa kukutana na marafiki, wanafamilia, na watoto wa wamiliki. Kawaida ni utulivu sana na ni mbwa wa familia kubwa. Ikiwa wataona tishio kwa mmiliki wao, watakuwa kinga sana. Kwa ujumla, ni nguvu kuliko mifugo mingine na mifugo mingi kubwa wanajulikana kwa uwezo wao wa kufanya kazi.

Mifugo mikubwa mara nyingi huwa na shida zinazohusiana na kiafya ikilinganishwa na mbwa wadogo na kuwajali kawaida ni ghali zaidi kuliko kwa mbwa wadogo. Wanakula zaidi ya mifugo midogo na wakati mwingine huhitaji lishe maalum kushughulikia uzito na usimamizi wa pamoja.

Mbali na kutumia zaidi kwenye chakula, gharama kwa jumla zinaweza kuwa zaidi ya mifugo mingi. Vitanda vikubwa, collars, na vitu vya kuchezea vinagharimu zaidi, kama vile kufanya mazoezi ya kupendeza na kuweka mbwa kubwa sana. Kuna pia suala la bili za mifugo ghali zaidi. Kwa mfano, anesthetics na dawa hushtakiwa kwa kiasi/misa, ambayo imedhamiriwa na uzito wa mbwa. Shida za pamoja, kama dysplasia ya hip na arthritis, ni kawaida. Mifugo mikubwa pia inakabiliwa na osteosarcoma na inahusika na magonjwa mengine yanayodhoofisha mfupa na cartilage. Hii ni matokeo ya sababu ya ukuaji wa juu zaidi - uzito wa watu wazima dhidi ya uzani wa kuzaliwa -na kipindi cha ukuaji wa muda mrefu. Muda wao wa maisha kwa ujumla ni mfupi kuliko ule wa mbwa wadogo, mara nyingi huishi miaka 6 hadi 10 tu. Mifugo ifuatayo kwa ujumla inaelezewa kama mifugo mikubwa:

Kuzaliana ni ya akili ya wastani na inaweza kuwa na nia ya kujitegemea, kwa hivyo mafunzo ya mapema na mazoezi tofauti ya kila siku yanapendekezwa. Kulingana na kitabu cha Stanley Coren "Ushauri wa Mbwa" (2006) Mbinu ya Nafasi, Miniature ilishika nafasi ya 12, kiwango cha 18, na Giant 28 kati ya 140 ya mifugo kati ya safu 79 juu ya uwezo wa kujifunza na kutii amri mpya i.e. kufanya kazi na utii akili. Wawili wa kwanza walikuwa wamewekwa kati ya "mbwa bora wanaofanya kazi", wakati yule mkubwa kati ya "mbwa wa wastani wa kufanya kazi". Kwa kuongezea, wataalam waliorodhesha miniature kama ya 5 kati ya mifugo 15 ya juu kwenye uwezo wa kugonga wa walinzi, Giant kama ya 6 kati ya mifugo 13 ya juu kwa uwezo mzuri wa walinzi, wakati katika akili inayoweza kubadilika mifugo yote mitatu ilionyesha uwezo mzuri wa kutatua shida. Wao ni kinga na nguvu, na watawaonya washiriki wa kaya hiyo kwa hatari yoyote inayowezekana, ingawa hali yake ya kutazama inaweza kusababisha barking inayoendelea. Ili kuzuia kukasirisha majirani, wamiliki wa mbwa wanapaswa kufanya kila juhudi kupunguza kuzidisha kwa mafunzo.

Kulingana na Klabu ya Standard Schnauzer ya Amerika, "Schnauzer ya kawaida inachukuliwa kuwa mbwa mwenye nguvu nyingi. Wanahitaji mazoezi ya kutosha sio tu kwa ustawi wa mwili lakini pia kwa ustawi wa kihemko. Kiwango cha chini ambacho mbwa wa watu wazima kinapaswa kupata ni sawa na siku moja. Kujaribu mipaka yake.

Ingawa imekua kwa mwaka mmoja, mifugo mingi ya mbwa pamoja na Xolos, sio 'kukomaa kihemko' hadi karibu miaka miwili. Kama mifugo inayofanya kazi kama vile Terriers, Xolos inahitaji mafunzo ya utulivu, thabiti, na ya upendo na ujamaa wa kawaida wakati wa miaka yao ya ukuaji. Xolos Bond aliyeinuliwa vizuri na wamiliki wao, kuwa kujitolea sana kwa familia zao huku mara kwa mara wakichagua mtu mmoja wa familia kama anayependa.
Mtu yeyote anayefikiria kupata Xolo anapaswa kutarajia kutumia wakati wa kujielimisha katika mbinu chanya za mafunzo ya mbwa, na, kwa kweli, anapaswa kuwa na uzoefu wa hapo awali na mifugo ya mbwa hai na wenye akili. Mazingira ya wasaa, yenye uzio, na salama ya mwili ni ya kuhitajika kwa kuzaliana hii. Matembezi ya kila siku ni bora kwa kutumia mazoezi ya ukubwa wa toy, hata hivyo mazoezi ya kuchochea zaidi ya mwili na akili inashauriwa kwa watu wakubwa na wanaofanya kazi zaidi. Shida za tabia katika Xolos kawaida ni matokeo ya mbwa kupokea usimamizi duni au usio sawa, na pia mazoezi ya kutosha na kuchochea akili. Xoloitzcuintli ni mbwa wa kijamii ambao haupaswi, kwa hali nyingi, kuwa "mbwa pekee". Haifanyi vizuri wakati inahifadhiwa kama mbwa wa nje tu. Hii ni aina ambayo ni bora wakati inafanywa sehemu ya familia, kupokea mwingiliano wa kawaida na ujamaa na wanadamu wake (na mbwa wengine, iwe ni nyumbani au kama wachezaji wa kawaida).

Mifugo mingi ya mbwa hushiriki katika skijoring. Sharti la pekee ni hamu ya kukimbia njia na kuvuta, ambayo ni ya ndani kwa mbwa wengi. Mbwa ndogo (chini ya pauni 40) hazionekani sana skijoring, kwa sababu hazisaidii sana skier; Walakini, kwa kuwa skier inaweza kutoa nguvu nyingi kama inavyotakiwa kusafiri, mbwa yeyote mwenye shauku anaweza kushiriki. Mbwa za riadha kama vile viashiria, seti na mifugo ya ufugaji huchukua skijoring na glee, kama vile mifugo ya kaskazini, kama vile Siberian na Alaskan Huskies, Malamus, Samoyeds, na mbwa wa Inuit; Walakini, mbwa yeyote mkubwa mwenye nguvu ana uwezo wa kufurahiya mchezo huu. Retrievers ya dhahabu, schnauzers kubwa, wafadhili wa Labrador, na mifuko mingi ya msalaba huonekana kwenye harness. Kufuga mifugo hufanya kazi vizuri kama vile Amerika ya Bull Terriers, Staffordshire Terriers, mbwa wa ng'ombe wa Amerika, na mastiffs.

Mbwa wa nyumbani ni spishi ya kwanza, na carnivore kubwa tu, kuwa imewekwa nyumbani. Katika miaka 200 iliyopita, mbwa wamefanya mabadiliko ya haraka ya phenotypic na waliundwa kuwa mifugo ya kisasa ya leo kutokana na uteuzi wa bandia uliowekwa na wanadamu. Mifugo hii inaweza kutofautiana kwa ukubwa na uzani kutoka kwa poodle ya teacup hadi mastiff mkubwa. Fuvu, mwili, na idadi ya miguu hutofautiana sana kati ya mifugo, na mbwa huonyesha utofauti zaidi wa phenotypic kuliko inaweza kupatikana ndani ya mpangilio mzima wa carnivores. Mifugo mingine inaonyesha ustadi bora katika ufugaji, kupata, kugundua harufu, na kulinda, ambayo inaonyesha utofauti wa tabia na tabia ya mbwa. Mbwa wa kwanza hakika walikuwa Wolflike, hata hivyo mabadiliko ya phenotypic ambayo yaliambatana na mgawanyiko wa maumbile ya mbwa -mbwa mbali na kila mmoja hayajulikani.

question_en: How many viewers does ANIMAX have?
pos_context_en: Animax is the first television channel in Asia fully dedicated to broadcasting anime 24 hours a day. It was initially launched in Hong Kong, Taiwan and Southeast Asia in January 2004, and was launched in several other countries soon after. The company has reached over 66 million viewers spanning 15 markets throughout Asia. Since 2013, the network is unavailable in Vietnam due to government content restrictions.
neg_context_en:
According to Nielsen's survey, the NBA has the youngest audience, with 45 percent of its viewers under 35, but the least likely, along with Major League Baseball, to be watched by women, who make up only 30% of the viewership. It also has the highest share of black viewers with 45 percent of its viewers being black and only about 40 percent of viewers being white, making it the only top North American sport that does not have a white majority audience.
Following pioneers like Vlade Divac (Serbia) and Dražen Petrović (Croatia) who joined the NBA in the late 1980s, an increasing number of international players have moved directly from playing elsewhere in the world to starring in the NBA. Below is a short list of foreign players who have won NBA awards or have been otherwise recognized for their contributions to basketball, either currently or formerly active in the league:

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.

Animax's programming is dedicated to anime, and it has been acknowledged as the largest 24-hour anime-only network in the world. In its original network in Japan, it has exclusively premiered several anime, which have aired first on Animax, including "" and its sequel "", "", "Aishiteruze Baby", "Wangan Midnight" and the 2010 anime adaptation of Marvel's "Iron Man" by Madhouse Studios. In addition, its English language network, Animax Asia, aired the first ever anime simulcast with their simulcast of "Tears to Tiara" on the same time as the Japanese premiere and the new "Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood" series, on the same week as the Japanese premiere. Its viewer reach has been quoted as spanning over 89 million homes. across 62 countries and 17 languages.
s͎ is represented in Unicode by an s and U+034E (Combining Upwards Arrow Below).

In August 2007, it was announced that Animax would be launching across several countries in Africa, including South Africa, Namibia, Zimbabwe, Botswana, Zambia, Mozambique and Lesotho, on the DStv satellite service and in Nigeria on HiTV, from March 19, 2009. On 31 October 2010, Animax was removed from DSTV, due to a lack of viewers brought on by channel drift (as reality shows occupied the majority of the schedule, similar to Animax Latin America and Animax Spain), to be replaced with a more general Sony channel in February 2011, as Sony MAX.
Its numerical value is 800 (see Abjad numerals).

Recent exhibitions at Tensta konsthall include
• “Abstract Possible: The Stockholm Synergies,” with Doug Ashford, Claire Barclay, Goldin+Senneby, Wade Guyton, Mai-Thu Perret, Walid Raad, and Haegue Yang, among others
• “Kami, Khokha, Bert and Ernie: World Heritage” by Hinrich Sachs

• “The Society without qualities” with Sören Andreasen, Ane Hjort Guttu, Sture Johannesson, Sharon Lockhardt, and Palle Nielsen (part of “The new model” and curated by Lars Bang Larsen)
• “Working With…” by Zak Kyes
• “We are continuing BBDG” with Bernd Krauss
• “Two Archives” by Babak Afrassiabi and Nasrin Tabatabai

question_src: Je! Animax ina watazamaji wangapi?
pos_context_src: Animax ndio kituo cha kwanza cha runinga huko Asia kilichojitolea kikamilifu kwa utangazaji anime masaa 24 kwa siku. Hapo awali ilizinduliwa huko Hong Kong, Taiwan na Asia ya Kusini mnamo Januari 2004, na ilizinduliwa katika nchi zingine kadhaa baadaye. Kampuni hiyo imefikia watazamaji zaidi ya milioni 66 wanaochukua masoko 15 kote Asia. Tangu 2013, mtandao haupatikani nchini Vietnam kwa sababu ya vizuizi vya yaliyomo ya serikali.
neg_context_title_src: Chama cha mpira wa kikapu cha kitaifa
neg_context_src:
Kulingana na uchunguzi wa Nielsen, NBA ina watazamaji wa mwisho, na asilimia 45 ya watazamaji wake chini ya miaka 35, lakini uwezekano mdogo, pamoja na baseball kuu ya Ligi, kutazamwa na wanawake, ambao hufanya 30% tu ya utazamaji. Pia ina sehemu kubwa zaidi ya watazamaji weusi na asilimia 45 ya watazamaji wake kuwa weusi na ni asilimia 40 tu ya watazamaji kuwa weupe, na kuifanya kuwa mchezo wa juu wa Amerika Kaskazini ambao hauna watazamaji wengi.
Kufuatia waanzilishi kama Vlade Divac (Serbia) na Dražen Petrović (Croatia) ambao walijiunga na NBA mwishoni mwa miaka ya 1980, idadi kubwa ya wachezaji wa kimataifa wamehama moja kwa moja kutoka kucheza mahali pengine ulimwenguni hadi nyota katika NBA. Hapo chini kuna orodha fupi ya wachezaji wa kigeni ambao wameshinda tuzo za NBA au wametambuliwa vingine kwa michango yao kwa mpira wa kikapu, ama kwa sasa au zamani walikuwa wakifanya kazi kwenye ligi:

Winfield Toll Bridge, pia inajulikana kama Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, ni kihistoria wa kihistoria wa Cantilever Warren Truss Bridge iliyoko Winfield na Red House, Kaunti ya Putnam, West Virginia. Ilijengwa mnamo 1955, na inachukua Mto wa Kanawha, iliyobeba West Virginia Route 34. Cantilever kupitia-truss ina nafasi mbili za nanga kila futi 245 kwa urefu na urefu wa futi 462 kwa urefu kati ya mistari ya kituo cha pier. Span kuu ina futi mbili 128, inchi 4, mikono ya cantilever na miguu 205, inchi 4, iliyosimamishwa.

Programu ya Animax imejitolea kwa anime, na imekubaliwa kama mtandao mkubwa wa masaa 24 tu ulimwenguni. Katika mtandao wake wa asili huko Japan, imeongeza tu anime kadhaa, ambazo zimerudishwa kwanza kwenye Animax, pamoja na "" na safu yake "", "", "AishitUze Baby", "Wangan Midnight" na muundo wa anime wa 2010 wa Marvel's "Iron Man" na Madhouse Studios. Kwa kuongezea, mtandao wake wa lugha ya Kiingereza, Animax Asia, ulirusha simulcast ya kwanza na simulcast yao ya "Machozi to Tiara" wakati huo huo kama PREMIERE ya Kijapani na safu mpya ya "Fullmetal Alchemist: Udugu", wiki hiyo hiyo kama PREMIERE ya Japan. Utazamaji wake wa mtazamaji umenukuliwa kama kuchukua zaidi ya nyumba milioni 89. katika nchi 62 na lugha 17.
S͎ inawakilishwa katika Unicode na S na U+034E (unachanganya mshale wa juu chini).

On 31 October 2010, Animax was removed from DSTV, due to a lack of viewers brought on by channel drift (as reality shows occupied Ratiba nyingi, sawa na Animax Latin America na Animax Spain), kubadilishwa na kituo cha jumla cha Sony mnamo Februari 2011, kama Sony Max.
