question_en: When was the YMCA founded?
pos_context_en: The YMCA was founded by George Williams, a London draper, who was typical of the young men drawn to the cities by the Industrial Revolution. He and his colleagues were concerned about the lack of healthy activities for young men in major cities; the options available were usually taverns and brothels. Williams's idea grew out of meetings he held for prayer and Bible-reading among his fellow-workers in a business in the city of London, and on 6 June 1844, he founded the first YMCA in London with the purpose of "the improving of the spiritual condition of young men engaged in the drapery, embroidery, and other trades." By 1851, there were YMCAs in the United Kingdom, Australia, Belgium, Canada, France, Germany, the Netherlands, Switzerland, and the United States.
neg_context_en:
The International Coalition of the YMCA Universities brings together universities from all over the world, including Brazil, England, Germany, Hong Kong, India, Mexico, Uruguay, USA, and Venezuela. The universities offer a wide variety of courses on different levels.
Multiple colleges and universities have historically had connections to the YMCA. Springfield College, of Springfield, Massachusetts, was founded in 1885 as an international training school for YMCA Professionals, while one of the two schools that eventually became Concordia University—Sir George Williams College—started from night courses offered at the Montreal YMCA. Northeastern University began out of a YMCA in Boston, and Franklin University began as the YMCA School of Commerce. San Francisco's Golden Gate University traces its roots to the founding of the YMCA Night School on 1 November 1881. Detroit College of Law, now the Michigan State University College of Law, was founded with a strong connection to the Detroit, Michigan YMCA. It had a 99-year lease on the site, and it was only when it expired that the college moved to East Lansing, Michigan. Youngstown State University traces its roots to the establishment of a law school by the local YMCA in 1908. The Nashville School of Law was the YMCA Night Law School until November 1986, having offered law classes since 1911 and the degree of Juris Doctor since January 1927. YMCA pioneered the concept of night school, providing educational opportunities for people with full-time employment. Many YMCAs offer ESL programmes, alternative high school, day care, and summer camp programs. In India, YMCA University of Science and Technology Faridabad was founded in 1969. It offers various programme-related to science and engineering.

The Granite City YMCA is a historic YMCA building located at 2001 Edison Avenue in Granite City, Illinois. The building was built in 1924–26 for Granite City's branch of the YMCA, which was founded in 1916. St. Louis, Missouri-based architects Wedemeyer and Nelson designed the Late Gothic Revival style building; their design features a red brick and green tile exterior punctuated by vertical shafts and topped by a parapet. The building is the only institutional building in Granite City designed in the Gothic Revival style. The YMCA used the building for their activities, which included athletics, community education and citizenship classes, community gatherings, and charity work. The building closed in 2004 when the YMCA moved elsewhere.

The Akron Area YMCA was founded in 1870. In the 1920s, the Akron YMCA Building was constructed, and the YMCA moved into the building. It was intended to be used as most YMCA branches were used in that era: a Christian organization that was meant to give people a place to eat, stay for short or long terms, and worship. The exercise facilities in place today were used for a variety of different reasons then, but it was originally constructed with an indoor pool which is still in use. The main part of the building was used as living space for many of its members (of both sexes), and was the only place some could turn when they had not much else.

YMCA North Tyneside was founded in 1870 and was originally known as The Borough of Tynemouth YMCA. After an inaugural meeting on 7 June 1879 weekly meetings followed in the Sons of Temperance Hall, Norfolk Street, North Shields. The YMCA grew in popularity. Within a year larger premises were needed. Meetings moved to 53 Tyne Street, North Shields and in 1879 to Camden Street, North Shields. In 1920 the YMCA moved to a building in Bedford Street (which is still owned by the YMCA and now occupied by the Citizens Advice Bureau) where it remained until 1938 when it moved to the present building and the current registered office at Church Way, North Shields.

In 1969, prior to the founding of the SPLC, Dees sued the Young Men's Christian Association (YMCA) in Montgomery, Alabama at the request of civil rights activist Mary Louise Smith, whose son Vincent and nephew Edward had been refused admission to attend a YMCA summer camp. The YMCA, being a private organization, was presumptively not bound by the provisions of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, which would have forbidden them to discriminate against children on the basis of race. However, Dees discovered that, in order to avoid desegregating its recreational facilities, the city of Montgomery had instead signed a secret agreement with the YMCA to operate them as private facilities but on the city's behalf. This led the trial court to rule that the YMCA had a "municipal charter" and was therefore bound by the Fourteenth Amendment to the United States Constitution to desegregate its facilities. According to historian Timothy Minchin, Dees was "emboldened by this victory" when he founded the SPLC in 1971. The United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit later affirmed the trial judge's finding, reversing only his order that the YMCA use affirmative action to racially integrate its board of directors.

YMCA Football Club was an Irish football club based in Belfast, formed by the members of the Belfast YMCA. It was founded in 1883 and competed as a senior club in the Irish Cup. Its best season was 1888-89, when the club reached the final of both the Irish Cup and the first County Antrim Shield, losing to Distillery on both occasions. The club also competed that season in the 1888-89 FA Cup. Later in 1889, however, the club folded, with most players joining Cliftonville, in what was described as an "amalgamation". In 1891, however, the YMCA Athletic Club acquired the Enfield ground on the Crumlin Road with a view to reviving the football team for the 1891-92 season. The revival was not a success, however, and the team, bottom of the league, resigned before Christmas. The club appears to have folded in 1892.

The Panama YMCA was founded on 24 May 1966. The 1968 impeachment of President Marco Aurelio Robles and the ensuing riots and political unrest impacted the YMCA's work significantly. Due to the chaos, the schools were closed for five months, and the after-school programmes at the Panama YMCA were cancelled. Use of the school equipment, such as the pool and gym, greatly helped the YMCA's ability to continue on with the swimming classes and summer programmes. These programmes remained popular throughout this time.

The Ohio YMCA Youth in Government program was led by Ohio-West Virginia Area YMCA from 1952 until 1970 when the Ohio-West Virginia Area Council ceased to operate program in the 1970s as the Ohio-West Virginia Area YMCA and the State YMCA of Michigan became the Great Lakes Region YMCA. In 1972 the Great Lakes Region YMCA appointed an Executive of what was called the West Virginia-Ohio YMCA, operated by the Great Lakes Region to run the YMCA Youth in Government and HI-Y programs throughout the states of West Virginia and Ohio. The Great Lakes Region continued to support these programs into the 1980s. In 1984 a new Ohio-West Virginia YMCA is chartered by the National YMCA. At the end of 2012 the Ohio-West Virginia YMCA made the decision to no longer be a YMCA and chose to return their charter to Y-USA, at this time the Ohio Alliance of YMCA's began operating the Ohio YMCA Youth in Government programs.

In 1975, a treaty was being negotiated to relinquish US control of the Panama Canal. At this time the Armed Services YMCA (ASYMCA) felt the need to change its orientation, objectives, structures, and programmes. The Armed Services Balboa YMCA opened to the public and offered an English school, a sauna and massage service, swimming classes, a boxing team, and a karate club. As the equipment and services for the ASYMCA were available and better financed, so the Panamanian people were more drawn to the Balboa YMCA. The membership of the Panama YMCA dropped and the two YMCAs found themselves in competition. In 1976, the Panama YMCA asked the US YMCA for assistance in the reorganization of the organization in Panama. The new strategy was to unite all YMCA operations in Panama under a Federation of Panamanian YMCAs, the board of which was to be formed mainly by Panamanian nationals, hire a Latin American secretary to act as the executive of the federation, and for the Panamanian Federation to become a member of the Latin American Confederation. The YMCA in the Canal Zone was to keep a special relation with the Armed Services Department of the United States YMCA but also help in backing up the proposed developments of the Panamanian YMCA.
question_src: YMCA ilianzishwa lini?
pos_context_src: YMCA ilianzishwa na George Williams, mtoaji wa London, ambaye alikuwa mfano wa vijana waliovutiwa na miji na Mapinduzi ya Viwanda. Yeye na wenzake walikuwa na wasiwasi juu ya ukosefu wa shughuli za afya kwa vijana katika miji mikubwa; Chaguzi zinazopatikana kawaida zilikuwa Taa na madalali. Wazo la Williams lilikua nje ya mikutano aliyokuwa akifanya kwa sala na kusoma Bibilia kati ya wafanyikazi wenzake katika biashara katika jiji la London, na mnamo 6 Juni 1844, alianzisha YMCA ya kwanza huko London kwa kusudi la "uboreshaji wa hali ya kiroho ya vijana waliojihusisha na drapery, embroidery, na biashara zingine." Kufikia 1851, kulikuwa na YMCAs huko Uingereza, Australia, Ubelgiji, Canada, Ufaransa, Ujerumani, Uholanzi, Uswizi, na Merika.
neg_context_src:
Ushirikiano wa Kimataifa wa Vyuo Vikuu vya YMCA huleta pamoja vyuo vikuu kutoka ulimwenguni kote, pamoja na Brazil, England, Ujerumani, Hong Kong, India, Mexico, Uruguay, USA, na Venezuela. Vyuo vikuu vinatoa kozi mbali mbali kwenye viwango tofauti.
Vyuo vikuu vingi na vyuo vikuu vilikuwa na kihistoria vilikuwa na uhusiano na YMCA. Chuo cha Springfield, cha Springfield, Massachusetts, kilianzishwa mnamo 1885 kama shule ya mafunzo ya kimataifa kwa wataalamu wa YMCA, wakati moja ya shule hizo mbili ambazo baadaye zikawa Chuo Kikuu cha Concordia - Chuo cha George Williams - kilianza kutoka kozi za usiku zilizotolewa katika Montreal YMCA. Chuo Kikuu cha Kaskazini mashariki kilianza kutoka YMCA huko Boston, na Chuo Kikuu cha Franklin kilianza kama Shule ya Biashara ya YMCA. Chuo Kikuu cha San Francisco cha Golden Gate kinafuatilia mizizi yake hadi kuanzishwa kwa Shule ya Usiku ya YMCA mnamo 1 Novemba 1881. Chuo cha Sheria cha Detroit, sasa Chuo cha Sheria cha Chuo Kikuu cha Michigan, kilianzishwa na uhusiano mkubwa na Detroit, Michigan YMCA. Ilikuwa na kukodisha kwa miaka 99 kwenye tovuti, na ilikuwa tu wakati ilimalizika kwamba chuo kilihamia Lansing Mashariki, Michigan. Chuo Kikuu cha Jimbo la Youngstown kinafuatilia mizizi yake kwa uanzishwaji wa shule ya sheria na YMCA ya eneo hilo mnamo 1908. Shule ya sheria ya Nashville ilikuwa Shule ya Sheria ya Usiku ya YMCA hadi Novemba 1986, ikiwa imetoa madarasa ya sheria tangu 1911 na kiwango cha daktari wa Juris tangu Januari 1927. YMCA ilifanya wazo la shule ya usiku. YMCA nyingi hutoa mipango ya ESL, shule mbadala ya upili, utunzaji wa siku, na mipango ya kambi ya majira ya joto. Huko India, Chuo Kikuu cha Sayansi na Teknolojia cha YMCA Faridabad kilianzishwa mnamo 1969. Inatoa programu mbali mbali zinazohusiana na sayansi na uhandisi.

Granite City YMCA ni jengo la kihistoria la YMCA lililoko 2001 Edison Avenue huko Granite City, Illinois. Jengo hilo lilijengwa mnamo 1924-26 kwa tawi la Granite City la YMCA, ambalo lilianzishwa mnamo 1916. St. Louis, wasanifu wa msingi wa Missouri Wedemeyer na Nelson walibuni jengo la mtindo wa marehemu wa Gothic; Ubunifu wao una matofali nyekundu na kijani kibichi cha nje kilichochomwa na shimoni za wima na zilizowekwa na parapet. Jengo ni jengo la kitaasisi katika Granite City iliyoundwa kwa mtindo wa uamsho wa Gothic. YMCA ilitumia jengo hilo kwa shughuli zao, ambazo ni pamoja na riadha, elimu ya jamii na madarasa ya uraia, mikusanyiko ya jamii, na kazi ya hisani. Jumba hilo lilifunga mnamo 2004 wakati YMCA ilihamia mahali pengine.

Sehemu ya Akron YMCA ilianzishwa mnamo 1870. Mnamo miaka ya 1920, jengo la Akron YMCA lilijengwa, na YMCA ilihamia ndani ya jengo hilo. Ilikusudiwa kutumiwa kama matawi mengi ya YMCA yalitumiwa katika enzi hiyo: shirika la Kikristo ambalo lilikuwa na maana ya kuwapa watu mahali pa kula, kukaa kwa muda mfupi au mrefu, na ibada. Vitu vya mazoezi vilivyopo leo vilitumika kwa sababu tofauti wakati huo, lakini hapo awali ilijengwa na dimbwi la ndani ambalo bado linatumika. Sehemu kuu ya jengo hilo ilitumika kama nafasi ya kuishi kwa washiriki wake wengi (wa jinsia zote), na ndio mahali pekee ambao wengine wanaweza kugeuka wakati hawakuwa na kitu kingine.

YMCA North Tyneside ilianzishwa mnamo 1870 na hapo awali ilijulikana kama Borough ya Tynemouth YMCA. Baada ya mkutano wa uzinduzi mnamo 7 Juni 1879 mikutano ya kila wiki ilifuatiwa katika Wana wa Jumba la Tempenance, Mtaa wa Norfolk, North Shields. YMCA ilikua katika umaarufu. Katika mwaka mmoja majengo makubwa yalihitajika. Mikutano ilihamia 53 Tyne Street, North Shields na mnamo 1879 kwenda Camden Street, North Shields. Mnamo 1920 YMCA ilihamia kwenye jengo katika Bedford Street (ambayo bado inamilikiwa na YMCA na sasa inamilikiwa na Ofisi ya Ushauri ya Raia) ambapo ilibaki hadi 1938 wakati ilihamia kwenye jengo la sasa na ofisi ya sasa iliyosajiliwa huko Kanisa, North Shields.

Mnamo mwaka wa 1969, kabla ya kuanzishwa kwa SPLC, Dees alishtaki Chama cha Vijana cha Kikristo (YMCA) huko Montgomery, Alabama kwa ombi la mwanaharakati wa haki za raia Mary Louise Smith, ambaye mtoto wake Vincent na mpwa wa Edward alikuwa amekataa kulazwa kuhudhuria kambi ya majira ya joto ya YMCA. YMCA, kuwa shirika la kibinafsi, haikufungwa na vifungu vya Sheria ya Haki za Kiraia ya 1964, ambayo ingewazuia kuwabagua watoto kwa msingi wa mbio. Walakini, Dees aligundua kuwa, ili kuzuia kuangazia vifaa vyake vya burudani, mji wa Montgomery badala yake ulikuwa umesaini makubaliano ya siri na YMCA kuwaendesha kama vifaa vya kibinafsi lakini kwa niaba ya jiji. Hii ilisababisha korti ya kesi kutawala kwamba YMCA ilikuwa na "hati ya manispaa" na kwa hivyo ilifungwa na marekebisho ya kumi na nne kwa Katiba ya Merika ili kuainisha vifaa vyake. Kulingana na mwanahistoria Timothy Minchin, Dees "alishikwa na ushindi huu" wakati alianzisha SPLC mnamo 1971. Mahakama ya Rufaa ya Merika kwa Duru ya Tano baadaye ilithibitisha kupatikana kwa jaji wa kesi hiyo, ikibadilisha tu agizo lake kwamba YMCA itumie hatua ya ushirika kuunganisha bodi yake ya wakurugenzi.

Klabu ya Soka ya YMCA ilikuwa kilabu cha mpira wa miguu cha Ireland kilichojengwa huko Belfast, kilichoundwa na washiriki wa Belfast YMCA. Ilianzishwa mnamo 1883 na ilishindana kama kilabu cha juu katika Kombe la Ireland. Msimu wake bora ulikuwa 1888-89, wakati kilabu kilipofikia fainali ya Kombe la Ireland na Shield ya Kaunti ya Kwanza, ikipoteza kwa kupotea mara kwa mara. Klabu hiyo pia ilishindana msimu huo katika Kombe la FA la 1888-89. Baadaye mnamo 1889, hata hivyo, kilabu kilikusanyika, na wachezaji wengi wakijiunga na Cliftonville, katika kile kilichoelezewa kama "ujumuishaji". Mnamo 1891, hata hivyo, Klabu ya riadha ya YMCA ilipata uwanja wa Enfield kwenye barabara ya Crumlin kwa lengo la kufufua timu ya mpira wa miguu kwa msimu wa 1891-92. Uamsho haukuwa mafanikio, hata hivyo, na timu, chini ya ligi, ilijiuzulu kabla ya Krismasi. Klabu inaonekana kuwa imekusanywa mnamo 1892.

Panama YMCA ilianzishwa mnamo Mei 24, 1966. Mashtaka ya 1968 ya Rais Marco Aurelio Robles na ghasia zilizofuata na machafuko ya kisiasa yaligusa kazi ya YMCA kwa kiasi kikubwa. Kwa sababu ya machafuko, shule zilifungwa kwa miezi mitano, na mipango ya baada ya shule huko Panama YMCA ilifutwa. Matumizi ya vifaa vya shule, kama vile bwawa na mazoezi, ilisaidia sana uwezo wa YMCA kuendelea na madarasa ya kuogelea na mipango ya majira ya joto. Programu hizi zilibaki maarufu wakati huu wote.

Programu ya Vijana ya YMCA ya Ohio katika Serikali iliongozwa na eneo la Ohio-West Virginia Area YMCA kutoka 1952 hadi 1970 wakati Baraza la eneo la Ohio-West Virginia lilikoma kufanya kazi mnamo miaka ya 1970 kama eneo la Ohio-West Virginia Area YMCA na Jimbo la YMCA la Michigan likawa Mkoa wa Maziwa Makuu ya YMCA. Mnamo 1972 mkoa wa Maziwa Makuu ya YMCA iliteua mtendaji wa kile kilichoitwa West Virginia-Ohio YMCA, kilichoendeshwa na Mkoa wa Maziwa Makuu kuendesha vijana wa YMCA katika serikali na mipango ya hi-y katika majimbo yote ya West Virginia na Ohio. Mkoa wa Maziwa Makuu uliendelea kusaidia programu hizi hadi miaka ya 1980. Mnamo 1984 New-West-West Virginia YMCA imeorodheshwa na YMCA ya kitaifa. Mwisho wa mwaka wa 2012 Ohio-West Virginia YMCA ilifanya uamuzi wa kuwa tena YMCA na kuchagua kurudisha hati yao kwa Y-USA, kwa wakati huu Alliance ya Ohio ya YMCA ilianza kufanya kazi kwa Vijana wa YMCA katika mipango ya serikali.

Mnamo 1975, makubaliano yalikuwa yakijadiliwa kuachana na udhibiti wa Amerika wa Mfereji wa Panama. Kwa wakati huu huduma za Silaha YMCA (ASYMCA) ziliona hitaji la kubadilisha mwelekeo wake, malengo, muundo, na mipango. Huduma za Silaha Balboa YMCA zilifunguliwa kwa umma na kutoa shule ya Kiingereza, sauna na huduma ya massage, madarasa ya kuogelea, timu ya ndondi, na kilabu cha karate. Kama vifaa na huduma za ASYMCA zilipatikana na kufadhiliwa vizuri, kwa hivyo watu wa Panamani walivutiwa zaidi na Balboa YMCA. Ushirika wa Panama YMCA ulishuka na YMCAs mbili zilijikuta kwenye mashindano. Mnamo 1976, Panama YMCA iliuliza YMCA ya Amerika kwa msaada katika kupanga upya shirika huko Panama. Mkakati mpya ulikuwa kuunganisha shughuli zote za YMCA huko Panama chini ya shirikisho la Panamanian YMCAS, bodi ambayo iliundwa sana na raia wa Panamania, kuajiri katibu wa Amerika ya Kusini kufanya kama mtendaji wa Shirikisho hilo, na kwa Shirikisho la Panamanian kuwa mwanachama wa Shirikisho la Amerika ya Kusini. YMCA katika eneo la mfereji ilikuwa kuweka uhusiano maalum na Idara ya Huduma za Silaha za Merika za Merika lakini pia kusaidia katika kuunga mkono maendeleo yaliyopendekezwa ya Panamanian YMCA.
report_src: YMCA ilianzishwa tarehe 6 Juni 1844 mjini London na George Williams, mshonaji nguo kijijini aliyekuwa amehamia jijini kipindi cha Mapinduzi ya Viwanda [1].
all_claims: YMCA ilianzishwa tarehe 6 Juni 1844 mjini London na George Williams, mshonaji nguo kijijini aliyekuwa amehamia jijini kipindi cha Mapinduzi ya Viwanda [1].

question_en: How many people are employed by the company G4S?
pos_context_en: It is the world's largest security company measured by revenues and has operations in more than 90 countries. With over 570,000 employees, it is the world's third-largest private employer, the largest European and African private employer, and among the largest on the London Stock Exchange. G4S was founded in 2004 by the merger of the UK-based Securicor plc with the Denmark-based Group 4 Falck.
neg_context_en: Gurkha Services was formed in 2007 and employed 600 people as of November 2011. In the north east of England they were hired in an attempt to reduce metal theft from railways.

CNS Y-12 currently employs approximately 4,700 people. About 1,500 additional personnel work onsite as employees of organizations that include UT-Battelle, Science Applications International Corporation, Bechtel Jacobs, UCOR, and WSI Oak Ridge (an American-controlled unit of G4S Secure Solutions), which holds the security contract for the site.

It is the main employer in the area, with the Iron and Steel Works employing 5,519 people in 2005. The number of permanently employed workers has historically been declining, numbering 9,276 people in 1998, while during the communist era more than 15,000 worked there. The actual number of people working for TŽ is still somewhat higher, as many people are employed seasonally in brigade work and in affiliated facilities. The company is the main sponsor of the local ice hockey team HC Oceláři Třinec (Třinec Steelers).

He formed GSM with a colleague from his days at ICI in 1974. The company specialises in labels and barcoding equipment, sheet metal assemblies and automotive components. Through many acquisitions, the company employed over 400 people at nine sites across the United Kingdom by the time of Dodd's death.

On March 25, 2004, Comcast's G4 gaming channel announced a merger with TechTV. This move became hugely controversial among loyal fans of TechTV. Around May 6, G4 announced the termination of 250 employees from the San Francisco office by July 10, 2004, allowing approximately 80 to 100 employees to transition to G4's main office in Los Angeles, California if they agreed to relocate there. Norton chose to stay in San Francisco instead of moving to Los Angeles, and left the company.

On 12 July 2012, it was announced that 3,500 British troops would be deployed at the 2012 Summer Olympics due to a shortage of adequately trained G4S security staff, with Labour MP Keith Vaz claiming that, "G4S has let the country down and we have literally had to send in the troops". Shares in G4S later dropped 9 percent after the firm claimed it faced a possible £50 million loss as a result of failing to provide sufficient trained staff for the 2012 Olympic Games. On 17 July, the company's chief executive, Nick Buckles, appeared before the Home Affairs Select Committee, where he apologised for the organisational failings, expressed regret at having taken on the Olympic security contract, and agreed in principle to pay bonuses to soldiers drafted at the last moment as replacement security staff. Pressed by Labour MP David Winnick, he was forced to admit that organisational situation had become a "humiliating shambles".

In late 2012, G4's studio programming ceased in preparation for its relaunch as Esquire Network on September 23, 2013, as part of a licensing deal with Hearst Corporation, owner of "Esquire" magazine. However, on September 9, 2013, NBCUniversal announced that Esquire Network would instead replace sister channel, Style, leaving G4 "as is for the foreseeable future, though it's highly unlikely the company will invest in more original programming". In August 2013, it was reported that approximately 61,217,000 American households (53.61% of households with television) were receiving G4, though this declined with later removals by several cable services as carriage agreements expired.

The city is home to some internationally active and well known enterprises. The Buderus company was created in the year 1731 and is one of the oldest still existing (large) enterprises. As BBT Thermotechnik, now part of the Bosch group, Buderus was for many decades one of the largest employers in the central Hessian area with more than 10,000 persons employed in Wetzlar alone (worldwide over 16,000), working in the areas casting (with cement), high-grade steel and heating technologies. Economic changes, repeated shifts of the stock majority as well as close-downs and sales of various divisions have strongly changed the company in the meantime. However, it ranks among the largest enterprises in Hesse. Wetzlar is apart from Jena and Oberkochen a German centre for optics as well as the most important German location for the precision engineering industry. The manufactured products have gained worldwide reputation. One of the most important companies in the area of microscopy is Leica Microsystems (formerly known as Ernst Leitz), which in its peak times employed over 7000 people in the city. Small format (35 mm) photography was invented in Wetzlar, and Leica cameras are well known for their excellent quality. In addition there are cameras of the companies Leidolf and Minox, binoculars and telescopes made by the company Hensoldt AG (now Carl Zeiss), part of the Zeiss group (over 2,000 people employed in peak times). Other well-known firms are Philips (with about 1,200 employed at times) or Siemens AG and Siemens VDO, since 2007 Continental AG or the Sancura BKK, a supraregional health insurance company, which is combined with the Taunus BKK. The Business park "Spilburg", former barracks, became home to a number of innovative enterprises, particularly in the area of optics/precision mechanics, information technology and services. Additionally, areas in the "Westend" as well as the "Hörnsheimer Eck" and the "Dillfeld" are available for new businesses to set up.

Justice secretary Liz Truss informed Members of Parliament that insufficient staffing lay at the root of the Birmingham riot. She said G4S would have to pay the costs of ten highly trained public sector Tornado elite teams dispatched to end the 12-hour riot at its Birmingham prison. Three hundred and eighty prisoners were transferred from wrecked wings of the prison to other jails across England, but their dispersal led to two incidents at HM Prison Hull on Sunday and another at HM Prison Cardiff and yet another at HM Prison Swaleside. At the riot's start, prisoners took keys from a G4S guard. At 10:00 a.m. G4S deployed two Tornado teams but that response was insufficient. Seven public sector Tornado teams were therefore necessarily dispatched to Birmingham at 11:29 a.m. “Shortly after 10 p.m., the teams had secured all four wings," she said. Labour MPs pressed Truss over whether prior warnings from the Birmingham independent monitoring board had been acted upon, and about the consequences of a 700 million pound budget cut and the reduction of 7,000 prison officers on the overall stability of the Prison Service. Labour said the riot should prompt the government to review the operation of prisons by private companies such as G4S and Serco. Although Truss repeatedly refused to acknowledge if she had read the Birmingham prison watchdog’s October report that warned of the need for urgent action to tackle understaffing and the spread of psychoactive drugs, she said they had been discussed with the prison's governor. The Truss statement followed still another warning from John Thornhill, the president of the independent monitoring board. He said insufficient staff had caused rising levels of violence in prisons in England and Wales: “It is the board’s view, echoed by prison staff, that there are insufficient staff numbers to deal with many of the day-to-day situations that occur in a local prison… The result, as we have seen in recent weeks, is an increase in riots that damage the system.” “The impact of this unrestrained violence is that a large number of prisoners have to be transferred to other prisons that are already stretched with their own problems and staffing issues.”
question_src: Ni watu wangapi wameajiriwa na kampuni G4S?
pos_context_src: Ni kampuni kubwa zaidi ya usalama ulimwenguni inayopimwa na mapato na ina shughuli katika nchi zaidi ya 90. Na zaidi ya wafanyikazi 570,000, ni mwajiri wa kibinafsi wa tatu kwa ukubwa ulimwenguni, mwajiri mkubwa zaidi wa Ulaya na Afrika, na kati ya wakubwa kwenye Soko la Hisa la London. G4S ilianzishwa mnamo 2004 na ujumuishaji wa Securicor Plc ya msingi wa Uingereza na Kikundi cha 4 cha Denmark Falck.
neg_context_title_src: Třinec chuma na kazi za chuma
neg_context_src: Huduma za Gurkha ziliundwa mnamo 2007 na kuajiri watu 600 mnamo Novemba 2011. Katika Mashariki ya Kaskazini ya England waliajiriwa katika jaribio la kupunguza wizi wa chuma kutoka kwa reli.

CNS Y-12 kwa sasa inaajiri watu takriban 4,700. Karibu 1,500 wafanyakazi wa ziada wanafanya kazi kama wafanyikazi wa mashirika ambayo ni pamoja na UT-Battelle, Maombi ya Sayansi Shirika la Kimataifa, Bechtel Jacobs, UCOR, na WSI Oak Ridge (kitengo cha kudhibitiwa cha Amerika cha G4S Salama), ambayo inashikilia mkataba wa usalama wa tovuti.

Ni mwajiri mkuu katika eneo hilo, na kazi za chuma na chuma zinaajiri watu 5,519 mnamo 2005. Idadi ya wafanyikazi walioajiriwa kabisa wamekuwa wakipungua, na watu 9,276 mnamo 1998, wakati wakati wa kikomunisti zaidi ya 15,000 walifanya kazi huko. Idadi halisi ya watu wanaofanya kazi kwa Tž bado ni kubwa zaidi, kwani watu wengi huajiriwa kwa msimu katika kazi ya brigade na katika vituo vya ushirika. Kampuni hiyo ndiyo mdhamini mkuu wa timu ya hockey ya barafu ya HC Oceláři Třinec (Třinec Steelers).

Aliunda GSM na mwenzake kutoka siku zake huko ICI mnamo 1974. Kampuni hiyo inataalam katika lebo na vifaa vya barcoding, makusanyiko ya chuma na vifaa vya magari. Kupitia ununuzi mwingi, kampuni iliajiri watu zaidi ya 400 katika tovuti tisa kote Uingereza wakati wa kifo cha Dodd.

Mnamo Machi 25, 2004, Channel ya Michezo ya Kubahatisha ya Comcast ya Comcast ilitangaza kuunganishwa na TechTV. Hatua hii ikawa na ubishani mkubwa kati ya mashabiki waaminifu wa TechTV. Karibu Mei 6, G4 ilitangaza kukomeshwa kwa wafanyikazi 250 kutoka ofisi ya San Francisco ifikapo Julai 10, 2004, ikiruhusu wafanyikazi takriban 80 hadi 100 kubadilika kwenda kwa ofisi kuu ya G4 huko Los Angeles, California ikiwa wangekubali kuhamia hapo. Norton alichagua kukaa San Francisco badala ya kuhamia Los Angeles, na akaondoka kampuni hiyo.

Mnamo Julai 12, 2012, ilitangazwa kuwa askari 3,500 wa Uingereza watapelekwa katika Olimpiki ya msimu wa joto wa 2012 kwa sababu ya uhaba wa wafanyikazi wa usalama wa G4S waliofunzwa vizuri, na mbunge wa Wafanyikazi Keith Vaz akidai kwamba, "G4S imeiruhusu nchi hiyo chini na tumelazimika kutuma vikosi". Hisa katika G4S baadaye zilishuka asilimia 9 baada ya kampuni hiyo kudai inakabiliwa na hasara ya pauni milioni 50 kwa sababu ya kushindwa kutoa wafanyikazi wa kutosha wa mafunzo kwa Michezo ya Olimpiki ya 2012. Mnamo Julai 17, mtendaji mkuu wa kampuni hiyo, Nick Buckles, alijitokeza mbele ya Kamati ya Chaguzi ya Mambo ya Nyumbani, ambapo aliomba msamaha kwa mapungufu ya shirika, alionyesha kujuta kwa kuchukua mkataba wa usalama wa Olimpiki, na akakubali kwa kanuni kulipa mafao kwa askari walioandaliwa wakati wa mwisho kama wafanyikazi wa usalama. Akisisitizwa na mbunge wa Kazi David Winnick, alilazimika kukubali kwamba hali ya shirika imekuwa "mashaka ya aibu".

Mwishoni mwa mwaka wa 2012, programu ya studio ya G4 ilikoma katika kuandaa uzinduzi wake kama Mtandao wa Esquire mnamo Septemba 23, 2013, kama sehemu ya mpango wa leseni na Hearst Corporation, mmiliki wa jarida la "Esquire". Walakini, mnamo Septemba 9, 2013, NBCUniversal ilitangaza kwamba mtandao wa Esquire badala yake utachukua nafasi ya Dada Channel, Sinema, na kuacha G4 "kama ilivyo kwa siku zijazo zinazoonekana, ingawa kuna uwezekano mkubwa kampuni hiyo itawekeza katika programu ya asili zaidi". Mnamo Agosti 2013, iliripotiwa kuwa kaya takriban 61,217,000 za Amerika (53.61% ya kaya zilizo na televisheni) zilikuwa zikipokea G4, ingawa hii ilipungua na kutolewa baadaye na huduma kadhaa za cable kwani mikataba ya kubeba ilimalizika.

Jiji ni nyumbani kwa biashara zingine za kimataifa na zinazojulikana. Kampuni ya Buderus iliundwa katika mwaka wa 1731 na ni moja ya biashara kongwe zaidi (kubwa). Kama BBT Thermotechnik, ambayo sasa ni sehemu ya Kikundi cha Bosch, Buderus alikuwa kwa miongo mingi ya waajiri wakubwa katika eneo la Hessian la kati na watu zaidi ya 10,000 walioajiriwa huko Wetzlar pekee (ulimwenguni zaidi ya 16,000), wakifanya kazi katika maeneo ya kutupwa (pamoja na saruji), chuma cha kiwango cha juu na teknolojia za joto. Mabadiliko ya kiuchumi, mabadiliko ya mara kwa mara ya idadi ya hisa na vile vile vya karibu na mauzo ya mgawanyiko mbali mbali yamebadilisha kampuni kwa wakati huu. Walakini, ni kati ya biashara kubwa zaidi huko Hesse. Wetzlar ni mbali na Jena na Oberkochen kituo cha Ujerumani cha macho na eneo muhimu zaidi la Ujerumani kwa tasnia ya uhandisi ya usahihi. Bidhaa zilizotengenezwa zimepata sifa ya ulimwenguni kote. Moja ya kampuni muhimu zaidi katika eneo la microscopy ni Leica Microsystems (ambayo zamani ilijulikana kama Ernst Leitz), ambayo katika nyakati zake za kilele iliajiri watu zaidi ya 7000 jijini. Upigaji picha ndogo (35 mm) ulianzishwa huko Wetzlar, na kamera za Leica zinajulikana kwa ubora wao bora. Kwa kuongezea kuna kamera za kampuni Leidolf na Minox, binoculars na darubini zilizotengenezwa na kampuni Hensoldt AG (sasa Carl Zeiss), sehemu ya Kikundi cha Zeiss (zaidi ya watu 2000 walioajiriwa katika Times Times). Kampuni zingine zinazojulikana ni Philips (zilizo na takriban 1,200 walioajiriwa wakati mwingine) au Nokia AG na Nokia VDO, tangu 2007 Bara AG au Sancura BKK, kampuni kubwa ya bima ya afya, ambayo imejumuishwa na Taunus BKK. Hifadhi ya biashara "Spilburg", kambi ya zamani, ikawa nyumbani kwa biashara kadhaa za ubunifu, haswa katika eneo la mechanics/mechanics ya usahihi, teknolojia ya habari na huduma. Kwa kuongeza, maeneo katika "Westend" na "Hörnsheimer Eck" na "Dillfeld" yanapatikana kwa biashara mpya kuanzisha.

Katibu wa Sheria Liz Truss aliwaambia wanachama wa Bunge kwamba wafanyikazi wa kutosha waliweka mzizi wa ghasia za Birmingham. Alisema G4S italazimika kulipa gharama ya timu kumi zilizofunzwa za sekta ya umma ya Tornado iliyotumwa kumaliza ghasia za masaa 12 kwenye gereza lake la Birmingham. Wafungwa mia tatu na themanini walihamishwa kutoka mabawa yaliyoharibika ya gereza hilo kwenda gerezani zingine kote Uingereza, lakini utawanyiko wao ulisababisha matukio mawili kwenye gereza la HM Jumapili na mwingine kwenye gereza la HM Cardiff na mwingine mwingine katika gereza la HM. Mwanzoni mwa ghasia, wafungwa walichukua funguo kutoka kwa walinzi wa G4S. Saa 10:00 a.m. G4S ilipeleka timu mbili za kimbunga lakini majibu hayo hayatoshi. Timu saba za sekta ya umma kwa hivyo zilipelekwa Birmingham saa 11:29 a.m. "Muda kidogo baada ya 10 p.m., timu hizo zilikuwa na mabawa yote manne," alisema. Wabunge wa Wafanyikazi walisisitiza juu ya ikiwa maonyo ya hapo awali kutoka kwa Bodi ya Ufuatiliaji ya Uhuru ya Birmingham yalitekelezwa, na juu ya matokeo ya kukatwa kwa bajeti ya pauni milioni 700 na kupunguzwa kwa maafisa wa gereza 7,000 juu ya utulivu wa jumla wa huduma ya gereza. Kazi ilisema ghasia zinapaswa kuhamasisha serikali kukagua uendeshaji wa magereza na kampuni binafsi kama G4S na Serco. Ijapokuwa Truss alikataa mara kwa mara kukiri ikiwa alikuwa amesoma ripoti ya Oktoba ya Birmingham ya Oktoba kwamba alionya juu ya hitaji la hatua za haraka za kukabiliana na kazi duni na kuenea kwa dawa za kisaikolojia, alisema walikuwa wamejadiliwa na gavana wa gereza hilo. Taarifa hiyo ya truss ilifuata onyo lingine kutoka kwa John Thornhill, rais wa Bodi ya Ufuatiliaji huru. Alisema wafanyakazi wa kutosha walisababisha kuongezeka kwa vurugu katika magereza huko England na Wales: "Ni maoni ya bodi, yaliyowekwa na wafanyikazi wa gereza, kwamba hakuna idadi ya wafanyikazi wa kutosha kukabiliana na hali nyingi za siku ambazo hufanyika katika gereza la eneo hilo ... matokeo, kama tulivyoona katika wiki za hivi karibuni, ni kuongezeka kwa ghasia ambazo hufanyika katika gereza la eneo hilo ... kuharibu mfumo. " "Athari za vurugu hii isiyozuiliwa ni kwamba idadi kubwa ya wafungwa wanapaswa kuhamishiwa magereza mengine ambayo tayari yamewekwa na shida zao na maswala ya wafanyikazi."

question_en: What did Machairodontinae primarily prey on?
pos_context_en: On occasion, the bone of a fossilised predator is preserved well enough to retain recognizable proteins that belong to the species it consumed when alive. Stable isotope analysis of these proteins has shown that "Smilodon" preyed mainly on bison and horses, and occasionally ground sloths and mammoths, while "Homotherium" often preyed on young mammoths and other grazers such as pronghorn antelope and bighorn sheep when mammoths were not available.
neg_context_en: Modern cats, and presumably the basal genera of all cats, such as "Pseudaelurus" and "Proailurus", use the throat clamp as a common method of dispatching prey. The suffocation would inhibit sound from the panicked prey, a method used by modern cheetahs and leopards. The wound from the canines and the lack of air would then kill the prey animal.

The general bite-and-retreat hypothesis has been criticised because of its bloodiness and because the struggling prey would have attracted any predators and scavengers in the area. The idea that a single animal would wound, release, and follow a prey animal has been counteracted more strongly. Cats rarely walk away from prey until they have eaten their fill and it would have risked being stolen by other predators.

Broken teeth indicate the frequency at which teeth contact bone. Increased teeth-bone contact suggests either increased consumption of carcasses, rapid consumption of prey, or increased aggression over kills – all three of which point to decreased prey availability, heightening competition between predators. Such a competitive environment would favor the faster killing of prey, because if prey is taken away before consumption (such as by out-competing) the energetic cost of capturing that prey is not reimbursed, and, if this occurs often enough in the lifetime of a predator, death by exhaustion or starvation would result. The earliest adaptations improving the speed at which prey was killed are present in the skull and mandible of "P. ogygia" and of "M. aphanistus", and in the cervical vertebrae and forelimb of "P. ogygia". They provide further morphological evidence for the importance of speed in the evolution of the saber-toothed phenotype.

A more common and widely accepted view of machairodont hunting is the throat-shearing bite. Modern cats use a throat clamp, a bite positioned around the upper section of the throat, to suffocate the prey by compressing the windpipe. Their canines serve to puncture the skin and mostly allow a better grip, and do not do any significant damage to the prey. Machairodonts, alternatively, would have caused damage if they used the same technique as their modern relatives.

Though bloody, this method would take the shortest amount of time to kill the animal out of all the hypotheses. Because of the differences of anatomy between species possibly hunted by machairodonts, the geometry needed to kill a horse, for instance, might not work for a bison. This would require the genus, or even the specific species, to be highly specialized for one type of prey animal. This might offer an explanation for their extinction, for the movement or extinction of that prey species would lead to the death of its specialist predator.

In 1985, American paleontologist William Akersten suggested the shearing bite. This method of killing is similar to the style of killing seen in hyenas and canines today. A group of machairodonts captured and completely subdued a prey item, holding it still while one from the group bit into the abdominal cavity, pulled back and tore open the body.

The name 'saber-toothed tigers' is misleading. Machairodonts were not in the same subfamily as tigers, there is no evidence that they had tiger-like coat patterns, and this broad group of animals did not all live or hunt in the same manner as the modern tiger. DNA analysis published in 2005 confirmed and clarified cladistic analysis in showing that the Machairodontinae diverged early from the ancestors of modern cats and are not closely related to any living feline species.

The jaws of machairodonts, especially more derived species with longer canines, such as "Smilodon" and "Megantereon", are unusually weak. Digital reconstructions of the skulls of lions and of "Smilodon" show that the latter would have fared poorly with the stresses of holding onto struggling prey. The main issue was the stresses suffered by the mandible: a strong force threatened to break the jaw as pressure was placed on its weakest points.

The most studied section of the machairodont group is the skull, and specifically the teeth. With a large range of genera, good fossil representation, comparable modern relatives, diversity within the group, and a good understanding of the ecosystems inhabited, the machairodont subfamily provides one of the best means of research for the analysis of hypercarnivores, specialization, and the relationships between predator and prey.
question_src: Je! Machairodontinae kimsingi aliwinda nini?
pos_context_src: Wakati mwingine, mfupa wa wanyama wanaokula huhifadhiwa vizuri huhifadhiwa vizuri kutunza protini zinazotambulika ambazo ni za spishi ambazo zilitumia wakati hai. Mchanganuo thabiti wa isotopu ya protini hizi umeonyesha kuwa "Smilodon" iliyowekwa juu ya bison na farasi, na mara kwa mara sloths na mamalia, wakati "homotherium" mara nyingi hutayarishwa kwa mamalia vijana na grazers zingine kama vile antelope ya pronghorn na kondoo wa bighorn wakati mammoths hazipatikani.
neg_context_src: Paka za kisasa, na labda genera ya basal ya paka zote, kama "Pseudaelurus" na "Proilurus", tumia koo la koo kama njia ya kawaida ya kupeleka mawindo. Kutosheleza kunaweza kuzuia sauti kutoka kwa mawindo ya hofu, njia inayotumiwa na cheetahs za kisasa na chui. Jeraha kutoka kwa canines na ukosefu wa hewa basi ungeua mnyama wa mawindo.

Dhana ya jumla ya kuuma-na-kurudi tena imekosolewa kwa sababu ya damu yake na kwa sababu mawindo yanayojitahidi yangevutia wanyama wanaokula wenza na scavenger katika eneo hilo. Wazo kwamba mnyama mmoja angeumia, kuachilia, na kufuata mnyama wa mawindo amepingwa kwa nguvu zaidi. Paka mara chache hutembea mbali na mawindo hadi wamekula kujaza kwao na ingekuwa hatari ya kuibiwa na wanyama wengine.

Meno yaliyovunjika yanaonyesha frequency ambayo meno huwasiliana na mfupa. Kuongezeka kwa mawasiliano ya mfupa wa meno kunaonyesha kuongezeka kwa matumizi ya mizoga, matumizi ya haraka ya mawindo, au kuongezeka kwa uchokozi juu ya mauaji-yote matatu ambayo yanaonyesha kupungua kwa upatikanaji wa mawindo, kuongeza ushindani kati ya wanyama wanaowinda. Mazingira kama hayo ya ushindani yangependelea mauaji ya mawindo haraka, kwa sababu ikiwa mawindo yatachukuliwa kabla ya matumizi (kama vile kwa kushindana) gharama ya nguvu ya kukamata kwamba mawindo hayarudishiwi, na, ikiwa hii itatokea mara nyingi katika maisha ya wanyama wanaokula, kifo na uchovu au njaa ingesababisha. Marekebisho ya mapema zaidi ya kuboresha kasi ambayo mawindo yaliuawa yanakuwepo kwenye fuvu na halali ya "P. ogygia" na ya "M. aphanistus", na katika vertebrae ya kizazi na utabiri wa "P. ogygia". Wanatoa ushahidi zaidi wa kisaikolojia kwa umuhimu wa kasi katika mabadiliko ya phenotype ya sabuni.

Mtazamo wa kawaida na unaokubaliwa sana wa uwindaji wa Machairodont ni kuumwa kwa koo. Paka za kisasa hutumia clamp ya koo, bite iliyowekwa karibu na sehemu ya juu ya koo, ili kutengenezea mawindo kwa kushinikiza bomba la upepo. Canines zao hutumikia kuchoma ngozi na mara nyingi huruhusu mtego bora, na usifanye uharibifu wowote mkubwa kwa mawindo. Machairodonts, vinginevyo, ingesababisha uharibifu ikiwa wangetumia mbinu ile ile kama jamaa zao wa kisasa.

Ingawa ni damu, njia hii ingechukua muda mfupi sana kumuua mnyama kutoka kwa hypotheses zote. Kwa sababu ya tofauti za anatomy kati ya spishi zinazoweza kuwindwa na Machairodonts, jiometri ilihitaji kuua farasi, kwa mfano, inaweza kufanya kazi kwa bison. Hii itahitaji jenasi, au hata spishi maalum, kuwa maalum sana kwa aina moja ya mnyama wa mawindo. Hii inaweza kutoa maelezo kwa kutoweka kwao, kwa harakati au kutoweka kwa spishi hizo za mawindo kungesababisha kifo cha mtaalam wake mtaalam.

Mnamo 1985, mtaalam wa paleontologist wa Amerika William Akersten alipendekeza kuumwa kwa shearing. Njia hii ya kuua ni sawa na mtindo wa mauaji unaoonekana katika fisi na canines leo. Kundi la Machairodonts lilitekwa na kupindua kabisa kitu cha mawindo, likishikilia wakati mmoja kutoka kwa kikundi kidogo ndani ya tumbo la tumbo, likarudi nyuma na kubomoa mwili.

Jina 'saber-toothed tiger' ni kupotosha. Machairodonts hazikuwa katika sehemu ndogo kama ya Tiger, hakuna ushahidi kwamba walikuwa na mifumo ya kanzu kama tiger, na kundi hili pana la wanyama hawakuishi au kuwinda kwa njia ile ile ya Tiger ya kisasa. Mchanganuo wa DNA uliochapishwa mnamo 2005 ulithibitisha na kufafanua uchambuzi wa kijeshi katika kuonyesha kwamba Machairodontinae ilibadilika mapema kutoka kwa mababu wa paka za kisasa na hazihusiani sana na spishi yoyote ya feline.

Taya za Machairodonts, haswa spishi zinazotokana zaidi zilizo na canines ndefu, kama "Smilodon" na "Megantereon", ni dhaifu sana. Marekebisho ya dijiti ya fuvu za simba na ya "Smilodon" yanaonyesha kuwa mwisho huo ungekuwa umejaa vibaya na mafadhaiko ya kushikilia mawindo ya kujitahidi. Suala kuu lilikuwa mafadhaiko yaliyopatikana na halali: nguvu kubwa ilitishia kuvunja taya kwani shinikizo liliwekwa kwenye alama zake dhaifu.

Sehemu iliyosomwa zaidi ya kikundi cha Machairodont ni fuvu, na haswa meno. Na aina kubwa ya genera, uwakilishi mzuri wa kisukuku, jamaa za kisasa zinazoweza kulinganishwa, utofauti ndani ya kikundi, na uelewa mzuri wa mazingira yanayokaliwa, Machairodont subfamily hutoa njia mojawapo ya utafiti kwa uchambuzi wa hypercarnivores, utaalam, na uhusiano kati ya wanyama wanaowinda na mawindo.
report_src: Uchambuzi wa isotopu ya protini uliohifadhiwa kwenye mifupa umebainisha kuwa mawindo makuu ya Machairodontinae yalitegemea spishi: Smilodon ilijikita zaidi kuwinda wanyama wakubwa wanaokula nyasi kama bison na farasi, na mara chache sloths na mamalia wakubwa kama mammoth [1]; kwa upande mwingine, Homotherium mara nyingi ililenga hasa mamalia vijana hususan ndovu wakubwa wachanga (mammoth) na, wakati hawapatikani, ilihamishia mashambulizi yake kwa wanyama wengine wanaokula majani kama pronghorn antelope na kondoo wa milimani (bighorn) [1]. Hivyo, kimsingi Machairodontinae waliwinda mamalia wakubwa wanaokula nyasi, wakiwemo bison, farasi na ndovu wachanga, huku wakibadilisha kulingana na upatikanaji wa mawindo.

Hivyo, kimsingi Machairodontinae waliwinda mamalia wakubwa wanaokula nyasi, wakiwemo bison, farasi na ndovu wachanga, huku wakibadilisha kulingana na upatikanaji wa mawindo.

question_en: Does the character Madelyne "Maddie" Jennifer Pryor-Summers have super powers?
pos_context_en: Madelyne "Maddie" Jennifer Pryor-Summers is a fictional supervillainess appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics, primarily featured off-and-on as an antagonist of the X-Men. Originally the love interest and first wife of X-Men leader Cyclops (Scott Summers), she became a long-standing member of the "X-Men" supporting cast, until a series of traumas—being abandoned by her husband, losing her infant son, and discovering that she was a clone of Jean Grey—eventually led to her being manipulated into becoming a supervillain. She and Cyclops are the parents of Nathan Summers (Cable). Her biography has been rendered particularly complicated because of the many retcons involved in the publication history of both her character and that of Jean Grey.
neg_context_title_en: The Adventures of Cyclops and Phoenix
neg_context_en: Madelyne's hairstyle design was modeled off the book's editor at the time, Louise Jones (later Louise Simonson)—a design retained on the character until 1988. Claremont named the character after Steeleye Span singer Maddy Prior. Claremont had already created a character named "Maddy Pryor", a little girl that appeared very briefly in "Avengers Annual" #10 (1981), and has no in-story connections to the X-Men character. Claremont, nonetheless, years later took an opportunity to indulge in an in-joke: in "Uncanny X-Men" #238 (1988), a similar child would appear as Madelyne's mental image of herself, wearing the same clothes as the little girl from "Avengers Annual" #10, repeating the girl's same line of dialogue, but also singing "Gone to America", one of Steeleye Span's biggest hits.

Threnody didn't get the chance to make up her mind. The unstable Madelyne Pryor arrived at the graveyard in search of Nate Grey. Threnody knew Madelyne from Nate's talk of her but also from Sinister's files and knew she was programmed to breed with the Summers line. Lashing out with jealously and contempt, Threnody reveals to Maddie that despite walking around she was in fact still dead. Enraged, Madelyne attacked Threnody and unleashed the neuro-locks restraining Threnody's power, sucking her dry of her energy.

According to Claremont, the original link between Madelyne Pryor and Jean Grey was entirely the product of Mastermind. Seeking revenge against the X-Men after Jean (as Phoenix) had driven him insane, Mastermind uses his powers of illusion to convince Scott and the others that Madelyne is Phoenix incarnate—a cosmic threat—in an attempt to have the team kill her. Mastermind's plan fails, and Madelyne and Cyclops are married shortly after. Claremont had conceived Madelyne as a device to write Scott Summers out of the X-Men and have him retire "happily ever after" with Madelyne and their child.

Shortly after Jean Grey (Phoenix) was believed dead, Cyclops (her longtime love interest, real name Scott Summers) met a woman who was almost her exact duplicate named Madelyne Pryor. Unbeknownst to either of them at the time, Madelyn Pryor was a clone of Jean Grey, created by Mister Sinister. Sinister was given vast powers by the virtually immortal mutant Apocalypse, but he feared Apocalypse's power and began to investigate a means to defeat him. He discovered that the combination of Summers and Grey's DNA would produce a mutant of sufficient power to do this. With Jean Grey apparently dead, and Sinister for some reason unable to combine their DNA artificially, he created Madelyne Pryor and positioned her to make contact with Cyclops. His plan worked: the two married and had a child, whom they named Nathan Christopher Summers.

Alone and threatened, Madelyne calls the X-Men for help; they arrive and fight off another attack by the Marauders. Despairing from Scott's absence and of her son's fate, she contemplates suicide. Madelyne's brother-in-law, Alex Summers (Havok), talks her out of it, and the two of them grow closer. With the Marauders still after her, she stays with the X-Men, and they sacrifice their lives to stop the Adversary from remaking the world in "Fall of the Mutants". A reporter video-interviews them before their death, and Maddie uses this to deliver a message to Scott, pleading that he find their child. With the world thinking them dead, Madelyne and the X-Men are resurrected by the Omniversal Guardian Roma and begin working secretly out of an abandoned Reavers base in Australia. Madelyne serves as the team's technical support.

Although Scott tries to live a normal family life in Alaska, he often thinks of Jean Grey, and of his life with the X-Men. Maddie tries her best to make Scott happy, but her efforts seem wasted. Finally Scott receives a call from his former teammate Angel that Jean Grey has been found alive. Without explaining himself, Scott abandons Madelyne and their son to reunite with his lost love, and forms X-Factor with his old friends from the original X-Men. Madelyne and Nathan are then attacked by the Marauders; Nathan is kidnapped and Madelyne left for dead, but survives and is hospitalized as a "Jane Doe". A guilt-wracked and increasingly unstable Scott returned home to find his house empty, and all records of his family's existence erased.

Asked about his intended plans for Madelyne's character, Claremont said:
Madelyne Pryor was brought back in 1995 as a supporting character in "X-Man", a marginal X-Men related title. Though by around 2001 (along with the cancellation of the "X-Man" title), this became a false start at reviving the character, as Pryor would again cease being featured in any Marvel titles, except when Chris Claremont included the character in his non-canon limited-series, "" (2004-2006).

In the Marvel Mangaverse title "Legacy of Fire", Madelyne Pryor was reinvented as Madelyne Pyre, a powerful sorceress and possessor of the Phoenix Sword, who was training her sister Jena to be her successor.

In one alternate reality (Earth-89112), Madelyne Pryor and S'ym were successful in opening a portal between Limbo and Earth (having killed baby Nathan Christopher) and demons overran the planet. The X-Men and X-Factor were dead (with the exception of a possessed Wolverine), and the only resistance left was led by Doctor Strange, who attempted to summon the Phoenix Force through Rachel Summers, the reality-hopping daughter of Scott Summers and Jean Grey. Madelyne however was successful in quelling the resistance and wresting control of the Phoenix Force from Rachel, but was ultimately betrayed and killed by S'ym, using Wolverine's reanimated adamantium skeleton. Rachel, reassuming the mantle of the Phoenix, used the Force to cleanse the planet of the demon plague.
question_src: Je! Tabia ya Madelyne "Maddie" Jennifer Pryor-majira ya joto ina nguvu kubwa?
pos_context_src: Madelyne "Maddie" Jennifer Pryor-Summers ni usimamizi wa hadithi zinazoonekana katika vitabu vya vichekesho vya Amerika vilivyochapishwa na Marvel Comics, kimsingi vilivyoonyeshwa kama mpinzani wa X-Men. Hapo awali shauku ya upendo na mke wa kwanza wa Kiongozi wa Kiongozi wa X-Men (Scott Summers), alikua mwanachama wa muda mrefu wa "X-Men" anayeunga mkono, hadi safu ya majeraha-kuachwa na mumewe, kumpoteza mtoto wake mchanga, na kugundua kuwa alikuwa mwamba wa Jean Grey-mara kwa mara alisababisha kudanganywa kwake. Yeye na Vimbunga ni wazazi wa Nathan Summers (cable). Wasifu wake umefanywa kuwa ngumu sana kwa sababu ya retcons nyingi zinazohusika katika historia ya uchapishaji ya tabia yake na ile ya Jean Grey.
neg_context_src: Ubunifu wa nywele wa Madelyne ulibadilishwa mbali na mhariri wa kitabu hicho wakati huo, Louise Jones (baadaye Louise Simonson) - muundo uliowekwa juu ya mhusika hadi 1988. Claremont aliita tabia hiyo baada ya mwimbaji wa Steeleye Span Maddy kabla. Claremont alikuwa tayari ameunda mhusika anayeitwa "Maddy Pryor", msichana mdogo ambaye alionekana kwa ufupi sana katika "Avenger kila mwaka" #10 (1981), na hana uhusiano wa ndani na tabia ya X-Men. Claremont, hata hivyo, miaka baadaye ilichukua fursa ya kujiingiza katika utani: katika "Uncanny X-Men" #238 (1988), mtoto kama huyo angeonekana kama picha ya akili ya Madelyne, akivaa nguo zile zile kama msichana mdogo kutoka "Avenger kila mwaka" #10, akirudia safu moja ya mazungumzo ya Sping.

Threnody hakupata nafasi ya kufanya akili yake. Madelyne Pryor asiye na msimamo alifika kaburini akitafuta Nate Grey. Threnody alijua Madelyne kutoka kwa mazungumzo ya Nate juu yake lakini pia kutoka kwa faili za Sinister na alijua kuwa alikuwa amepangwa kuzaliana na Mstari wa Majira. Kujifunga kwa wivu na dharau, Threnody anamfunulia Maddie kwamba licha ya kutembea karibu alikuwa bado amekufa. Alikasirika, Madelyne alishambulia threnody na kufunua nguvu ya kuzuia neuro, akimnyonya kavu ya nguvu zake.

Kulingana na Claremont, kiunga cha asili kati ya Madelyne Pryor na Jean Grey kilikuwa bidhaa ya Mastermind. Kutafuta kulipiza kisasi dhidi ya X-Men baada ya Jean (kama Phoenix) kumfanya mwendawazimu, Mastermind anatumia nguvu zake za udanganyifu kumshawishi Scott na wengine kwamba Madelyne ni Phoenix mwili-tishio la ulimwengu-katika jaribio la timu imuue. Mpango wa Mastermind unashindwa, na Madelyne na Cyclops wameolewa muda mfupi baadaye. Claremont alikuwa amechukua mimba Madelyne kama kifaa cha kuandika Scott Summers kutoka kwa X-Men na kumfanya astaafu "kwa furaha milele" na Madelyne na mtoto wao.

Muda kidogo baada ya Jean Grey (Phoenix) kuaminiwa kuwa amekufa, Vimbunga (shauku yake ya upendo wa muda mrefu, jina halisi la Scott Summers) alikutana na mwanamke ambaye alikuwa karibu na nakala yake halisi inayoitwa Madelyne Pryor. Haijulikani kwa mmoja wao wakati huo, Madelyn Pryor alikuwa mwamba wa Jean Grey, iliyoundwa na Mister Sinister. Sinister alipewa nguvu kubwa na apocalypse ya kutokufa, lakini aliogopa nguvu ya Apocalypse na akaanza kuchunguza njia ya kumshinda. Aligundua kuwa mchanganyiko wa Majira ya joto na DNA ya Grey yangeleta nguvu ya kutosha kufanya hivyo. Na Jean Grey dhahiri amekufa, na mbaya kwa sababu fulani hakuweza kuchanganya DNA yao bandia, aliunda Madelyne Pryor na akamweka nafasi ya kuwasiliana na Vimbunga. Mpango wake ulifanya kazi: wawili walioa na walikuwa na mtoto, ambaye walimpa jina la Nathan Christopher Summers.

Peke yake na kutishiwa, Madelyne huwaita X-Men kwa msaada; Wanafika na kupigana na shambulio lingine na Marauders. Kukata tamaa kutokana na kukosekana kwa Scott na hatma ya mwanawe, anafikiria kujiua. Mkwewe wa Madelyne, Alex Summers (Havok), anaongea naye, na wote wawili wanakua karibu. Pamoja na Marauders bado baada yake, yeye hukaa na X-Men, na wanatoa maisha yao ili kumzuia adui asichukue ulimwengu katika "Kuanguka kwa Mutants". Mwandishi wa habari anawaona kabla ya kifo chao, na Maddie hutumia hii kutoa ujumbe kwa Scott, akimsihi apate mtoto wao. Pamoja na ulimwengu kuwafikiria wakiwa wamekufa, Madelyne na X-Men wamefufuliwa na Mlezi wa Omniversal Roma na kuanza kufanya kazi kwa siri nje ya msingi wa waanzilishi waliotengwa huko Australia. Madelyne hutumika kama msaada wa kiufundi wa timu.

Ingawa Scott anajaribu kuishi maisha ya kawaida ya familia huko Alaska, mara nyingi anafikiria Jean Grey, na maisha yake na X-Men. Maddie anajaribu bora kumfanya Scott afurahi, lakini juhudi zake zinaonekana kupotea. Mwishowe Scott anapokea simu kutoka kwa malaika mwenzake wa zamani kwamba Jean Grey amepatikana akiwa hai. Bila kujielezea, Scott anaacha Madelyne na mtoto wao kuungana tena na upendo wake uliopotea, na anaunda X-Factor na marafiki wake wa zamani kutoka kwa X-Men wa asili. Madelyne na Nathan basi wanashambuliwa na Marauders; Nathan alitekwa nyara na Madelyne aliondoka kwa wafu, lakini anaokoka na amelazwa hospitalini kama "Jane Doe". Scott aliye na hatia na asiye na msimamo alirudi nyumbani ili kupata nyumba yake ikiwa tupu, na rekodi zote za uwepo wa familia yake zilifutwa.

Alipoulizwa juu ya mipango yake iliyokusudiwa ya tabia ya Madelyne, Claremont alisema:
Madelyne Pryor alirudishwa mnamo 1995 kama mhusika anayeunga mkono katika "X-Man", kichwa cha X-Men kinachohusiana. Ijapokuwa karibu 2001 (pamoja na kufutwa kwa kichwa cha "X-Man"), hii ikawa mwanzo wa uwongo katika kufufua tabia hiyo, kwani Pryor angeacha tena kuonyeshwa katika majina yoyote ya kushangaza, isipokuwa wakati Chris Claremont alijumuisha mhusika katika mfululizo wake ambao sio wa Canon, "" (2004-2006).

Katika jina la Marvel Mangaverse "Urithi wa Moto", Madelyne Pryor alirudishwa kama Madelyne Pyre, mchawi mwenye nguvu na mmiliki wa Upanga wa Phoenix, ambaye alikuwa akimfundisha dada yake Jena kuwa mrithi wake.

Katika ukweli mmoja mbadala (Earth-89112), Madelyne Pryor na S'ym walifanikiwa katika kufungua portal kati ya limbo na dunia (baada ya kumuua mtoto Nathan Christopher) na pepo walizidi sayari hii. X-Men na X-factor walikuwa wamekufa (isipokuwa Wolverine aliye na milki), na upinzani pekee uliobaki uliongozwa na Daktari Strange, ambaye alijaribu kuita nguvu ya Phoenix kupitia Rachel Summers, binti wa kweli wa Scott Summers na Jean Grey. Madelyne hata hivyo alifanikiwa kumaliza kumaliza upinzani na udhibiti wa jeshi la Phoenix kutoka kwa Raheli, lakini mwishowe alisalitiwa na kuuawa na S'ym, kwa kutumia mifupa ya Wolverine ya Adamantium. Rachel, akisisitiza tena vazi la Phoenix, alitumia nguvu kusafisha sayari ya pigo la pepo.
report_src: Ndiyo, Madelyne “Maddie” Jennifer Pryor-Summers ana nguvu kubwa: akiwa mwamba wa Jean Grey, anarithi vipaji vikuu vya mutant—telepathy na telekinesis—ambavyo humruhusu kusoma na kudhibiti mawazo pamoja na kuhamisha, kulinda au kuripua vitu kwa nguvu ya akili pekee [1]; baadaye, alipochukua jukumu la Goblin Queen, aliongezea uwezo wa uchawi wa paka la Limbo unaojumuisha kutengeneza vifungu vya kidimoni, udanganyifu wa hali halisi na udhibiti wa pepo, hivyo kumfanya mmoja wa wapinzani hatari zaidi wa X-Men. Mchanganyiko huu wa nguvu za kiakili na uchawi humwezesha kufanana kwa kiwango na maadui wakali kama Phoenix Force, kuunda majeshi ya mapepo na hata kupambana na timu nzima ya X-Men mara kadhaa; kwa hivyo, katika muktadha wa ulimwengu wa Marvel, Madelyne Pryor huhesabiwa kuwa shujaa/mhalifu mwenye uwezo wa juu sana.

question_en: Where did Richard Siegmund Lindzen study physics?
pos_context_en: Richard Siegmund Lindzen (born February 8, 1940) is an American atmospheric physicist known for his work in the dynamics of the middle atmosphere, atmospheric tides, and ozone photochemistry. He has published more than 200 scientific papers and books. From 1983 until his retirement in 2013, he was Alfred P. Sloan Professor of Meteorology at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology. He was a lead author of Chapter 7, "Physical Climate Processes and Feedbacks," of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change's Third Assessment Report on climate change. He has criticized the scientific consensus about climate change and what he has called "climate alarmism."
neg_context_en: Lindzen worked on Chapter 7 of 2001 IPCC Working Group 1, which considers the physical processes that are active in real world climate. He had previously been a contributor to Chapter 4 of the 1995 "IPCC Second Assessment". He described the full 2001 IPCC report as "an admirable description of research activities in climate science" although he criticized the Summary for Policymakers. Lindzen stated in May 2001 that it did not truly summarize the IPCC report but had been amended to state more definite conclusions. He also emphasized the fact that the summary had not been written by scientists alone. The NAS panel on which Lindzen served says that the summary was the result of dialogue between scientists and policymakers.

A 1996 article in "The New York Times" included the comments of several other experts. Jerry D. Mahlman, director of the Geophysical Fluid Dynamics Laboratory, did not accept Lindzen's assessment of the science, and said that Lindzen had "sacrificed his luminosity by taking a stand that most of us feel is scientifically unsound." Mahlman did, however, admit that Lindzen was a "formidable opponent". William Gray of Colorado State University basically agreed with Lindzen, describing him as "courageous". He said, "A lot of my older colleagues are very skeptical on the global warming thing". He added that while he regarded some of Lindzen's views as flawed, he said that, "across the board he's generally very good". John Wallace of the University of Washington agreed with Lindzen that progress in climate change science had been exaggerated, but said there are "relatively few scientists who are as skeptical of the whole thing as Dick [Lindzen] is".

Lindzen was born on February 8, 1940 in Webster, Massachusetts. His father, a shoemaker, had fled Hitler's Germany with his mother. He moved to the Bronx soon after his birth and grew up in a Jewish household in a predominantly Catholic neighborhood there. Lindzen attended the Bronx High School of Science (winning Regents' and National Merit Scholarships), Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute,and Harvard University. From Harvard, he received an A.B. in physics in 1960, followed by an S.M. in applied mathematics in 1961 and a PhD in applied mathematics in 1964. His doctoral thesis, "Radiative and photochemical processes in strato- and mesospheric dynamics", concerned the interactions of ozone photochemistry, radiative transfer, and dynamics in the middle atmosphere.

Lindzen's work on atmospheric tides led him to the study of planetary waves and the general circulation of atmospheres. By 1967, he had contributed a number of papers on the theory of waves in the middle atmosphere. In "Planetary waves on beta planes", he developed a beta plane approximation for simplifying the equations of classical tidal theory, whilst at the same time developing planetary wave relations. He noticed from his equations that eastward-traveling waves (known as "Rossby waves" since their discovery in 1939 by Carl-Gustav Rossby) and westward-traveling waves (which Lindzen himself helped in establishing as "atmospheric Kelvin waves") with periods less than five days were "vertically trapped." At the same time, an important paper by Booker and Bretherton appeared, which Lindzen read with great interest. Booker and Bretherton showed that vertically propagating gravity waves were completely absorbed at a critical level.

From 1972 to 1982 Lindzen was a professor of dynamic meteorology at Harvard University. From February to June 1975 he was a visiting professor of dynamic meteorology at MIT, and during part of 1979 Lindzen was a visiting professor at the Hebrew University of Jerusalem, before switching affiliations to MIT as the Alfred P. Sloan Professor of Meteorology in 1983.

His PhD thesis of 1964 concerned the interactions of ozone photochemistry, radiative transfer and the dynamics of the middle atmosphere. This formed the basis of his seminal "Radiative and Photochemical Processes in Mesospheric Dynamics" that was published in four parts in the "Journal of the Atmospheric Sciences" between 1965 and 1966. The first of these, "Part I: Models for Radiative and Photochemical Processes", was co-authored with his Harvard colleague and former PhD thesis advisor, Richard M. Goody, who is well known for his 1964 textbook "Atmospheric Radiation". The Lindzen and Goody (1965) study has been widely cited as foundational in the exact modeling of middle atmosphere ozone photochemistry. This work was extended in 1973 to include the effects of nitrogen and hydrogen reactions with his former PhD student, Donna Blake, in "Effect of photochemical models on calculated equilibria and cooling rates in the stratosphere".

Nevertheless, the predictions of classical tidal theory still did not agree with observations. It was Lindzen, in his 1966 paper, "On the theory of the diurnal tide", who showed that the solution set of Hough functions given by Bernhard Haurwitz to Laplace's tidal equation was incomplete: modes with negative equivalent depths had been omitted. Lindzen went on to calculate the thermal response of the diurnal tide to ozone and water vapor absorption in detail and showed that when his theoretical developments were included, the surface pressure oscillation was predicted with approximately the magnitude and phase observed, as were most of the features of the diurnal wind oscillations in the mesosphere. In 1967, along with his NCAR colleague, Douglas D. McKenzie, Lindzen extended the theory to include a term for Newtonian cooling due to emission of infrared radiation by carbon dioxide in the stratosphere along with ozone photochemical processes, and then in 1968 he showed that the theory also predicted that the semi-diurnal oscillation would be insensitive to variations in the temperature profile, which is why it is observed so much more strongly and regularly at the surface.

In an announcement on December 27, 2013, the Cato Institute said that at Cato, Lindzen's focus would be on "the interaction between science and policymakers" and that he would study "whether the move from largely private funding to public support has introduced biases into science and the public policies informed by science."

In 2017, Lindzen has sent a petition to President Trump, asking the President to withdraw the United States from the United Nations Convention on Climate Change. The petition contains the names of "around 300 eminent scientists and other qualified individuals" and calls on the United States and other nations to “change course on an outdated international agreement that targets minor greenhouse gases,” starting with carbon dioxide. It receives considerable media coverage and 22 then current or retired MIT professors promptly issued an open letter addressed to Trump informing him that Lindzen’s petition doesn’t represent their views or those of the vast majority of other climate scientists. Lindzen and his supporting signers then published another rebuttal letter in response.
question_src: Richard Siegmund Lindzen alisoma fizikia?
pos_context_src: Richard Siegmund Lindzen (amezaliwa Februari 8, 1940) ni mwanafizikia wa anga wa Amerika anayejulikana kwa kazi yake katika mienendo ya anga ya kati, mawimbi ya anga, na upigaji picha wa ozoni. Amechapisha zaidi ya karatasi 200 za kisayansi na vitabu. Kuanzia 1983 hadi kustaafu kwake mnamo 2013, alikuwa Alfred P. Sloan Profesa wa Meteorology katika Taasisi ya Teknolojia ya Massachusetts. Alikuwa mwandishi anayeongoza wa sura ya 7, "michakato ya hali ya hewa ya mwili na malisho," ya jopo la serikali juu ya ripoti ya tathmini ya hali ya hewa ya hali ya hewa juu ya mabadiliko ya hali ya hewa. Amekosoa makubaliano ya kisayansi juu ya mabadiliko ya hali ya hewa na kile ameita "kengele ya hali ya hewa."
neg_context_src: Lindzen alifanya kazi katika Sura ya 7 ya 2001 Kikundi cha Kufanya kazi cha IPCC 1, ambacho kinazingatia michakato ya mwili ambayo inafanya kazi katika hali ya hewa ya ulimwengu. Hapo awali alikuwa mchangiaji wa kifungu cha 4 cha "Tathmini ya Pili ya IPCC" ya 1995. Alifafanua ripoti kamili ya IPCC ya 2001 kama "maelezo ya kupendeza ya shughuli za utafiti katika sayansi ya hali ya hewa" ingawa alikosoa muhtasari wa watunga sera. Lindzen alisema mnamo Mei 2001 kwamba haikufupisha muhtasari wa ripoti ya IPCC lakini ilikuwa imerekebishwa ili kuelezea hitimisho dhahiri zaidi. Alisisitiza pia ukweli kwamba muhtasari huo ulikuwa haujaandikwa na wanasayansi pekee. Jopo la NAS ambalo Lindzen alihudumia anasema kwamba muhtasari huo ulikuwa matokeo ya mazungumzo kati ya wanasayansi na watunga sera.

Nakala ya 1996 katika "The New York Times" ni pamoja na maoni ya wataalam wengine kadhaa. Jerry D. Mahlman, mkurugenzi wa Maabara ya Dynamics ya Geophysical Fluid, hakukubali tathmini ya Lindzen ya sayansi hiyo, na akasema kwamba Lindzen alikuwa "ametoa dhabihu yake kwa kuchukua msimamo ambao wengi wetu tunahisi sio wa kisayansi." Hata hivyo, Mahlman alikubali kwamba Lindzen alikuwa "mpinzani mkubwa". William Grey wa Chuo Kikuu cha Jimbo la Colorado kimsingi alikubaliana na Lindzen, akimuelezea kama "ujasiri". Alisema, "wenzangu wengi wakubwa wana wasiwasi sana juu ya kitu cha joto duniani". Aliongeza kuwa wakati anachukulia maoni ya Lindzen kuwa na dosari, alisema kwamba, "kwenye bodi yote kwa ujumla ni mzuri sana". John Wallace wa Chuo Kikuu cha Washington alikubaliana na Lindzen kwamba maendeleo katika sayansi ya mabadiliko ya hali ya hewa yalizidishwa, lakini akasema kuna "wanasayansi wachache ambao wana wasiwasi wa jambo zima kama Dick [Lindzen] ni".

Lindzen alizaliwa mnamo Februari 8, 1940 huko Webster, Massachusetts. Baba yake, mfanyikazi wa shoem, alikuwa amekimbia Ujerumani ya Hitler na mama yake. Alihamia Bronx mara tu baada ya kuzaliwa kwake na alikua katika kaya ya Wayahudi katika kitongoji cha Wakatoliki huko. Lindzen alihudhuria Shule ya Upili ya Bronx ya Sayansi (kushinda Regents 'and National Merit Scholarship), Taasisi ya Rensselaer Polytechnic, na Chuo Kikuu cha Harvard. Kutoka Harvard, alipokea A.B. Katika Fizikia mnamo 1960, ikifuatiwa na S.M. Katika hesabu iliyotumika mnamo 1961 na PhD katika hesabu iliyotumika mnamo 1964. nadharia yake ya udaktari, "michakato ya mionzi na picha katika mienendo ya Strato- na mesospheric", ilihusika na mwingiliano wa upigaji picha wa ozoni, uhamishaji wa mionzi, na mienendo katika anga ya kati.

Kazi ya Lindzen kwenye mawimbi ya anga ilimwongoza kwenye masomo ya mawimbi ya sayari na mzunguko wa jumla wa anga. Kufikia 1967, alikuwa amechangia karatasi kadhaa kwenye nadharia ya mawimbi katika anga ya kati. Katika "Mawimbi ya Sayari kwenye Ndege za Beta", aliendeleza makadirio ya ndege ya beta kwa kurahisisha hesabu za nadharia ya kitamaduni, wakati huo huo kukuza uhusiano wa wimbi la sayari. Aligundua kutoka kwa hesabu zake kwamba mawimbi ya kusafiri mashariki (inayojulikana kama "Rossby Waves" tangu ugunduzi wao mnamo 1939 na Carl-Gustav Rossby) na mawimbi ya kusafiri magharibi (ambayo Lindzen mwenyewe alisaidia kuanzisha kama "anga ya anga ya Kelvin") na vipindi vilivyo chini ya siku tano vilitengwa. " Wakati huo huo, karatasi muhimu ya Booker na Bretherton ilionekana, ambayo Lindzen alisoma kwa riba kubwa. Booker na Bretherton walionyesha kuwa mawimbi ya nguvu ya kueneza kwa wima yalichukuliwa kabisa katika kiwango muhimu.

Kuanzia 1972 hadi 1982 Lindzen alikuwa profesa wa hali ya hewa ya nguvu katika Chuo Kikuu cha Harvard. Kuanzia Februari hadi Juni 1975 alikuwa profesa wa kutembelea wa hali ya hewa ya nguvu huko MIT, na wakati wa sehemu ya 1979 Lindzen alikuwa profesa anayetembelea katika Chuo Kikuu cha Kiebrania cha Yerusalemu, kabla ya kubadili ushirika kuwa MIT kama profesa wa Alfred P. Sloan wa meteorology mnamo 1983.

Thesis yake ya PhD ya 1964 ilihusika na mwingiliano wa upigaji picha wa ozoni, uhamishaji wa radi na mienendo ya anga ya kati. Hii iliunda msingi wa michakato yake ya "mionzi ya mionzi na picha katika mienendo ya mesospheric" ambayo ilichapishwa katika sehemu nne katika "Jarida la Sayansi ya Atmospheric" kati ya 1965 na 1966. Ya kwanza ya haya, "Sehemu ya I: mifano ya michakato ya radiative na picha za zamani, ni mtu wa kwanza wa kujulikana na wahusika wa zamani wa hadithi, mshauri wa zamani na mshauri wa zamani wa maelfu, mshauri wa zamani na mshauri wa zamani wa maelfu, mshauri wa zamani na mshauri wa zamani, mshauri wa zamani, mshauri wa zamani, mshauri wa zamani, mshauri wa zamani, mshauri wa zamani wa maelfu, mshauri wa zamani wa maelfu na wa zamani wa michakato ya kujulikana na mkuu wa zamani wa maelfu, mtu wa zamani wa maelfu, mtu wa zamani wa maelfu, mtu wa zamani wa mafaili wa zamani, mshauri wa zamani wa mafaili yake, mtu wa zamani wa mafaili yake, mtu wa zamani wa mafaili yake, mtu wa zamani wa mafaili yake, Kitabu chake cha 1964 "Mionzi ya Atmospheric". Utafiti wa Lindzen na Goody (1965) umetajwa sana kama msingi katika mfano halisi wa picha za kati za picha za ozoni. Kazi hii iliongezwa mnamo 1973 ili kujumuisha athari za athari za nitrojeni na hidrojeni na mwanafunzi wake wa zamani wa PhD, Donna Blake, katika "Athari ya mifano ya picha kwenye usawa uliohesabiwa na viwango vya baridi kwenye stratosphere".

Walakini, utabiri wa nadharia ya kitamaduni bado haukukubaliana na uchunguzi. Ilikuwa Lindzen, katika karatasi yake ya 1966, "Kwenye Nadharia ya Diurnal Tide", ambaye alionyesha kuwa suluhisho la kazi za Hough zilizopewa na Bernhard Haurwitz kwa usawa wa Laplace hazikukamilika: Njia zilizo na kina kirefu zilikuwa zimeachwa. Lindzen aliendelea kuhesabu majibu ya mafuta ya wimbi la diurnal kwa kunyonya kwa ozoni na maji kwa undani na ilionyesha kuwa wakati maendeleo yake ya nadharia yalipojumuishwa, oscillation ya shinikizo ya uso ilitabiriwa na takriban ukubwa na sehemu iliyozingatiwa, kama ilivyokuwa kwa huduma nyingi za upepo wa diurnal katika mesosphere. Mnamo mwaka wa 1967, pamoja na mwenzake wa NCAR, Douglas D. McKenzie, Lindzen waliongeza nadharia hiyo ni pamoja na muda wa baridi ya Newtonia kwa sababu ya utoaji wa mionzi ya infrared na kaboni dioksidi kwenye stratosphere pamoja na michakato ya ozone, halafu mnamo 1968 alionyesha kwamba nadharia ingetabiri kwamba semi-demon-demon ion ionser intses inserses ionsed the nadharia ingekuwa na nadharia ingekuwa pia nadharia ya nadharia ingekuwa na nadharia ingekuwa pia nadharia ya nadharia ingekuwa na nadharia ya kwamba semina-demitive in ions interser the nadharia ingekuwa pia nadharia ya nadharia ingekuwa pia nadharia ya nadharia ingekuwa pia nadharia ya nadharia ingekuwa pia nadharia ya nadharia ingekuwa pia nadharia ya nadharia ingekuwa pia nadharia ya nadharia ingekuwa pia nadharia ya nadharia ingekuwa pia nadharia ya nadharia ingekuwa pia nadharia ya nusu. Profaili, ndiyo sababu inazingatiwa kwa nguvu zaidi na mara kwa mara kwenye uso.

Katika tangazo mnamo Desemba 27, 2013, Taasisi ya Cato ilisema kwamba huko Cato, lengo la Lindzen litakuwa "mwingiliano kati ya sayansi na watunga sera" na kwamba atasoma "ikiwa hatua kutoka kwa ufadhili wa kibinafsi hadi msaada wa umma imeanzisha upendeleo katika sayansi na sera za umma zilizoarifiwa na sayansi."

Mnamo mwaka wa 2017, Lindzen ametuma ombi kwa Rais Trump, akiuliza rais aondoe Merika kutoka Mkutano wa Umoja wa Mataifa juu ya Mabadiliko ya Tabianchi. Ombi hilo lina majina ya "wanasayansi mashuhuri 300 na watu wengine waliohitimu" na inatoa wito kwa Merika na mataifa mengine "kubadilisha kozi ya makubaliano ya kimataifa ambayo yanalenga gesi ndogo za chafu," kuanzia na kaboni dioksidi. Inapokea chanjo kubwa ya vyombo vya habari na 22 basi maprofesa wa sasa au wastaafu wa MIT walitoa barua wazi iliyoelekezwa kwa Trump ikimjulisha kwamba ombi la Lindzen haliwakili maoni yao au yale ya wanasayansi wengine wa hali ya hewa. Lindzen na saini yake inayounga mkono basi walichapisha barua nyingine ya kukabiliana na majibu.
report_src: Ndiyo, Richard Siegmund Lindzen alisoma na kuendeleza taaluma yake katika fizikia ya anga; anatajwa wazi kama “mwanafizikia wa anga wa Amerika” na amekuwa Profesa wa Meteorology katika MIT kuanzia 1983 hadi kustaafu mwaka 2013, akichapisha zaidi ya karatasi 200 za kisayansi juu ya mienendo ya anga, mawimbi ya anga na upigaji picha wa ozoni, masuala yanayohusisha matumizi ya falsafa na kanuni za fizikia katika utafiti wa hali ya hewa [1].
