question_en: When does the NFL season end?
pos_context_en:
The 2019 NFL season will be the 100th season of the National Football League (NFL). The season will tentatively begin on September 5, 2019, in the home stadium of the Super Bowl LIII champion (either Los Angeles Rams or New England). The season will conclude with Super Bowl LIV, the league's championship game, tentatively scheduled for February 2, 2020, at Hard Rock Stadium in Miami, Florida.
The 2019 NFL Draft will be held from April 25–27 in Nashville, Tennessee.
neg_context_en: The season ended when the Baltimore Colts defeated the New York Giants in the NFL Championship Game for the second year in a row.

Exhibition games are almost exclusively played at night due to hot summer weather, and are frequently scheduled based on local convenience (e.g. games on the west coast tend to start at 7:00 p.m. PT/10:00 p.m. ET). When applicable, the NFL's blackout restrictions apply, although stations are allowed to play the game on a tape delay if the game does not sell out (unlike the regular season policy, when rights revert to NFL Films). However, the blackout restrictions have never been applied since 2015 as a result of a passed vote during the league's owners' meeting in March in which the league, as an experiment because no regular season games in the 2014 season were blacked out and an FCC vote in September 2014 to no longer enforce blackouts, eliminated blackout rules for at least the last two seasons. Many more exhibition games fail to sell out than do regular-season games.

The season ended when the Green Bay Packers defeated the New York Giants in the NFL Championship Game.Though both the Giants and the Packers finished a game ahead of their closest division rivals, both clinched their divisions on December 3, the final day of the 11-game regular season. The New York Giants and Washington Redskins had played to a 0–0 tie earlier in the season, and both had 8–1–1 records when they met at New York's Polo Grounds before a crowd of 62,404. The Giants did not reach the end zone, but three field goals were enough for a 9–7 win and the division title.

The Sports Broadcasting Act of 1961 and Public Law 89-800, which govern the antitrust exemptions given to the National Football League, prohibit the broadcasting of NFL games within 75 miles of any high school football game on Friday nights between September and early December. Because most populated areas of the United States have at least one high school football game within a 75-mile radius, and because broadcasting is an integral part of the NFL's business model (roughly half of the league's revenue comes from television contracts), this effectively prohibits the playing of NFL games in competition with high school football. (These rules do not apply during preseason, when Friday night games are common, nor does it apply at the end of the season, though the only time regular season games are played on Friday in the NFL is on Christmas.) Only recently have national sports television channels fully capitalized on this rule; since 2005, the ESPN family of networks (usually the sub-networks ESPN2, ESPNU and online broadcaster ESPN3, although the main channel also shows occasional games) has aired regular season matchups between nationally ranked teams under the "High School Showcase" banner. Fox Sports 1 also included high school football in its lineup when it launched in 2013.

The season ended on December 30, when the Green Bay Packers defeated the New York Giants 16–7 in the NFL championship game at Yankee Stadium. The Packers successfully defended their 1961 NFL title, finishing the 1962 season at 14–1; their only loss was to the Detroit Lions on Thanksgiving Day at Tiger Stadium.The Green Bay Packers won their first ten games, until losing 26–14 on November 22 at Detroit. The Lions' win put them a game behind the Pack rather than 2 games behind, but in the final week, they lost to Chicago, 3–0. Even a Lions win would have been made moot when Green Bay's won 20–17 at L.A. to finish with a record of 13–1.

The 1996 NFL season was the 77th regular season of the National Football League and the season was marked by notable controversies from beginning to end. The season ended with Super Bowl XXXI when the Green Bay Packers defeated the New England Patriots 35–21 at the Louisiana Superdome.

The season ended when the New York Giants crushed the Chicago Bears in the NFL Championship Game, The Lions and the Cardinals had both finished 1955 poorly, 3–9 and 4–7–1, but both got off to fast starts in 1956. Both ended up finishing second in the Conference races.

The season ended when the Minnesota Vikings defeated the Cleveland Browns in the NFL championship game, earning the right to face the American Football League's Kansas City Chiefs in Super Bowl IV in New Orleans Tulane Stadium. This was the last awarding of the Ed Thorp Memorial Trophy to the NFL champion; the trophy was introduced 35 years earlier in 1934. As was the case the previous season, the NFL Champion was not crowned as the world champion because of the Vikings' 23-7 loss to the Chiefs in the Super Bowl. This occurrence can no longer happen, as the AFL and the NFL merged with each other the following season (1970), with 2 separate conferences (the AFC and the NFC) both playing together in the same league (the NFL), with the 2 conference champions playing each other every year in the Super Bowl.

The 1985 NFL season was the 66th regular season of the National Football League. The season ended with Super Bowl XX when the Chicago Bears defeated the New England Patriots 46–10 at the Louisiana Superdome. The Bears became the second team in NFL history (after the previous season's San Francisco 49ers) to win 15 games in the regular season and 18 including the playoffs."W = Wins, L = Losses, T = Ties, PCT = Winning Percentage, PF= Points For, PA = Points Against"The following players set all-time records during the season:

The 1940 NFL season was the 21st regular season of the National Football League. The season ended when the Chicago Bears defeated the Washington Redskins in the NFL Championship Game, 73–0. This game still stands as the most one-sided victory in NFL history. The Pittsburgh Pirates were renamed the Pittsburgh Steelers before the 1940 season."W = Wins, L = Losses, T = Ties, PCT= Winning Percentage, PF= Points For, PA = Points Against"

The 2019 Playoffs are tentatively scheduled to begin on the weekend of January 4–5, 2020, with the Wild Card Playoff round. The four winners of these games will visit the top two seeds in each conference in the Divisional round games, tentatively scheduled for January 11–12. The winners of those games will advance to the Conference championships tentatively scheduled for January 19. Starting With The AFC Championship Game which will begin at 3:00 PM E.T on CBS. Followed By the NFC Championship Game which will begin at at 6:30 PM E.T on Fox. The 2020 Pro Bowl will be held at a site to be announced, tentatively scheduled for January 26 and will be broadcast on ESPN. Super Bowl LIV, tentatively scheduled for February 2, will be played at Hard Rock Stadium in Miami on Fox.
question_src: Msimu wa NFL unaisha lini?
pos_context_src:
Msimu wa NFL wa 2019 utakuwa msimu wa 100 wa Ligi ya Soka ya Kitaifa (NFL). Msimu utaanza mnamo Septemba 5, 2019, kwenye uwanja wa nyumbani wa Super Bowl Liii Champion (ama Los Angeles Rams au New England). Msimu utahitimishwa na Super Bowl Liv, mchezo wa ubingwa wa ligi, uliopangwa kwa tarehe 2 Februari, 2020, kwenye Uwanja wa Hard Rock huko Miami, Florida.
Rasimu ya NFL ya 2019 itafanyika kutoka Aprili 25-27 huko Nashville, Tennessee.
neg_context_src: Msimu uliisha wakati Baltimore Colts ilishinda New York Giants kwenye mchezo wa ubingwa wa NFL kwa mwaka wa pili mfululizo.

Michezo ya maonyesho inachezwa karibu usiku kwa sababu ya hali ya hewa ya joto ya majira ya joto, na mara nyingi hupangwa kulingana na urahisi wa ndani (k.m. michezo kwenye Pwani ya Magharibi huanza saa 7:00 p.m. PT/10: 00 p.m. ET). Inapotumika, vizuizi vya NFL vya Blackout vinatumika, ingawa vituo vinaruhusiwa kucheza mchezo kwenye kuchelewesha mkanda ikiwa mchezo hautauza (tofauti na sera ya msimu wa kawaida, wakati haki zinarudi kwenye filamu za NFL). Walakini, vizuizi vya kuzima havijawahi kutumika tangu mwaka 2015 kwa sababu ya kura iliyopita wakati wa mkutano wa wamiliki wa ligi mnamo Machi ambayo ligi, kama jaribio kwa sababu hakuna michezo ya msimu wa msimu wa 2014 ilibadilishwa na kura ya FCC mnamo Septemba 2014 ili usifanye tena Blackout, iliondoa sheria za Blackout kwa angalau sekunde mbili zilizopita. Michezo mingi zaidi ya maonyesho inashindwa kuuza kuliko michezo ya msimu wa kawaida.

Msimu uliisha wakati Green Bay Packers ilishinda New York Giants kwenye mchezo wa ubingwa wa NFL.Lakini Giants na Packers walimaliza mchezo kabla ya wapinzani wao wa karibu wa mgawanyiko, wote walifanya mgawanyiko wao mnamo Desemba 3, siku ya mwisho ya msimu wa kawaida wa mchezo wa 11. New York Giants na Washington Redskins walikuwa wamecheza kwa kufunga 0-0 mapema msimu, na wote wawili walikuwa na rekodi 8-1-1 wakati walipokutana kwenye uwanja wa New York kabla ya umati wa watu 62,404. Giants hazikufika eneo la mwisho, lakini malengo matatu ya uwanja yalikuwa ya kutosha kwa ushindi wa 9-7 na taji la mgawanyiko.

Sheria ya Utangazaji wa Michezo ya 1961 na Sheria ya Umma 89-800, ambayo inasimamia misamaha ya kutokukiritimba iliyopewa Ligi ya Soka ya Kitaifa, inakataza utangazaji wa michezo ya NFL ndani ya maili 75 ya mchezo wowote wa mpira wa miguu wa shule ya upili Ijumaa usiku kati ya Septemba na mapema Desemba. Kwa sababu maeneo mengi ya watu wa Merika yana angalau mchezo wa mpira wa miguu wa shule ya upili ndani ya eneo la maili 75, na kwa sababu utangazaji ni sehemu muhimu ya mtindo wa biashara wa NFL (takriban nusu ya mapato ya ligi hutoka kwa mikataba ya runinga), hii inakataza kucheza kwa michezo ya NFL katika mashindano na mpira wa miguu ya shule ya upili. (Sheria hizi hazifanyi kazi wakati wa preseason, wakati michezo ya Ijumaa usiku ni ya kawaida, na haifanyi kazi mwishoni mwa msimu, ingawa michezo pekee ya msimu wa kawaida inachezwa Ijumaa katika NFL iko kwenye Krismasi.) Hivi karibuni huwa na vituo vya runinga vya kitaifa vilivyo na mtaji kabisa kwenye sheria hii; Tangu 2005, familia ya ESPN ya mitandao (kawaida ya mtandao mdogo wa ESPN2, ESPNU na mtangazaji mtandaoni ESPN3, ingawa kituo kikuu pia kinaonyesha michezo ya mara kwa mara) imeongeza matchups ya msimu wa kawaida kati ya timu zilizowekwa kitaifa chini ya bendera ya "shule ya upili". Fox Sports 1 pia ni pamoja na mpira wa miguu wa shule ya upili kwenye safu yake wakati ilizinduliwa mnamo 2013.

Msimu uliisha mnamo Desemba 30, wakati Green Bay Packers ilishinda New York Giants 16-7 kwenye mchezo wa ubingwa wa NFL kwenye Uwanja wa Yankee. Packers walifanikiwa kutetea taji lao la NFL la 1961, kumaliza msimu wa 1962 saa 14-1; Upotezaji wao tu ulikuwa kwa Simba ya Detroit siku ya Kushukuru kwenye Uwanja wa Tiger. Green Bay Packers walishinda michezo yao ya kwanza kumi, hadi kupoteza 26-14 Novemba 22 huko Detroit. Ushindi wa Simba uliwaweka mchezo nyuma ya pakiti badala ya michezo 2 nyuma, lakini katika wiki ya mwisho, walipoteza Chicago, 3-0. Hata ushindi wa simba ungefanywa moot wakati Green Bay ilishinda 20-17 huko L.A. kumaliza na rekodi ya 13-1.

Msimu wa NFL wa 1996 ulikuwa msimu wa kawaida wa 77 wa Ligi ya Soka ya Kitaifa na msimu uliwekwa na mabishano mashuhuri tangu mwanzo hadi mwisho. Msimu uliisha na Super Bowl XXXI wakati Green Bay Packers ilishinda New England Patriots 35-21 huko Louisiana Superdome.

Msimu uliisha wakati New York Giants iliponda Bears ya Chicago kwenye mchezo wa ubingwa wa NFL, Simba na Makardinali wote walikuwa wamemaliza 1955 vibaya, 3-9 na 4-7-1, lakini wote walianza kuanza haraka mnamo 1956. Wote waliishia kumaliza pili kwenye mbio za mkutano.

Msimu uliisha wakati Waviking wa Minnesota waliposhinda Cleveland Browns kwenye mchezo wa ubingwa wa NFL, wakipata haki ya kukabili Wakuu wa Jiji la Kanda la Amerika la Kansas huko Super Bowl IV katika Uwanja wa New Orleans Tulane. Hii ilikuwa tuzo ya mwisho ya tuzo ya Ukumbusho wa Ed Thorp kwa bingwa wa NFL; Nyara hiyo ilianzishwa miaka 35 mapema mnamo 1934. Kama ilivyokuwa msimu uliopita, bingwa wa NFL hakupewa taji kama bingwa wa ulimwengu kwa sababu ya kupoteza kwa Waviking 23-7 kwa Wakuu katika Super Bowl. Tukio hili haliwezi kutokea tena, kwani AFL na NFL ziliungana na kila mmoja msimu uliofuata (1970), na mikutano 2 tofauti (AFC na NFC) zote zinacheza pamoja kwenye ligi moja (NFL), na mabingwa 2 wa mkutano wakicheza kila mwaka katika Super Bowl.

Msimu wa NFL wa 1985 ulikuwa msimu wa kawaida wa 66 wa Ligi ya Soka ya Kitaifa. Msimu uliisha na Super Bowl XX wakati Chicago Bears ilishinda New England Patriots 46-10 huko Louisiana Superdome. Bears ikawa timu ya pili katika historia ya NFL (baada ya msimu uliopita wa San Francisco 49ers) kushinda michezo 15 katika msimu wa kawaida na 18 pamoja na mchezo wa kucheza. "W = mafanikio, l = hasara, t = mahusiano, PCT = Asilimia ya kushinda, PF = alama za, PA = alama dhidi ya" wachezaji wafuatao waliweka rekodi za wakati wote wakati wa msimu:

Msimu wa 1940 wa NFL ulikuwa msimu wa 21 wa kawaida wa Ligi ya Soka ya Kitaifa. Msimu uliisha wakati Chicago Bears ilishinda Washington Redskins kwenye mchezo wa ubingwa wa NFL, 73-0. Mchezo huu bado unasimama kama ushindi wa upande mmoja katika historia ya NFL. Maharamia wa Pittsburgh walipewa jina la Pittsburgh Steelers kabla ya msimu wa 1940. "W = mafanikio, l = hasara, t = mahusiano, PCT = Asilimia ya kushinda, PF = Pointi za, PA = Pointi dhidi ya"

Mchezo wa kucheza wa 2019 umepangwa kuanza kuanza mwishoni mwa wiki ya Januari 4-5, 2020, na raundi ya kucheza ya kadi ya mwitu. Washindi wanne wa michezo hii watatembelea mbegu mbili za juu katika kila mkutano katika michezo ya pande zote, iliyopangwa kwa Januari 11-12. Washindi wa michezo hiyo wataendeleza ubingwa wa mkutano uliopangwa kwa Januari 19. Kuanzia na mchezo wa ubingwa wa AFC ambao utaanza saa 3:00 jioni E.T kwenye CBS. Ikifuatiwa na mchezo wa ubingwa wa NFC ambao utaanza saa 6:30 jioni E.T kwenye Fox. 2020 Pro Bowl itafanyika kwenye tovuti kutangazwa, iliyopangwa kwa Januari 26 na itatangazwa kwenye ESPN. Super Bowl Liv, iliyopangwa kwa maandishi ya Februari 2, itachezwa kwenye Uwanja wa Hard Rock huko Miami kwenye Fox.

question_en: How many vertebrae does a human have?
pos_context_en: At birth the majority of humans have 33 separate vertebrae. However, during normal development several vertebrae fuse together, leaving a total of 24, in most cases. The confusion about whether or not there are 32-34 vertebrae stems from the fact that the two lowest vertebrae, the sacrum and the coccyx, are single bones made up of several smaller bones which have fused together. This is how the vertebrae are counted: 24 separate vertebrae and the sacrum, formed from 5 fused vertebrae and the coccyx, formed from 3-5 fused vertebrae. If you count the coccyx and sacrum each as one vertebra, then there are 26 vertebrae. If the fused vertebrae are all counted separately, then the total number of vertebrae comes to between 32 and 34.
neg_context_en: Cats have seven cervical vertebrae like almost all mammals, thirteen thoracic vertebrae (humans have twelve), seven lumbar vertebrae (humans have five), three sacral vertebrae (humans have five because of their bipedal posture), and, except for Manx cats and other shorter tailed cats, twenty-two or twenty-three caudal vertebrae (humans have three to five, fused into an internal coccyx). The extra lumbar and thoracic vertebrae account for the cat's enhanced spinal mobility and flexibility, compared to humans. The caudal vertebrae form the "tail", used by the cat as a counterbalance to the body during quick movements. Between their vertebrae, they have elastic discs, useful for cushioning the jump landings.

Cats have seven cervical vertebrae (as do most mammals); 13 thoracic vertebrae (humans have 12); seven lumbar vertebrae (humans have five); three sacral vertebrae (as do most mammals, but humans have five); and a variable number of caudal vertebrae in the tail (humans have only vestigial caudal vertebrae, fused into an internal coccyx). The extra lumbar and thoracic vertebrae account for the cat's spinal mobility and flexibility. Attached to the spine are 13 ribs, the shoulder, and the pelvis. Unlike human arms, cat forelimbs are attached to the shoulder by free-floating clavicle bones which allow them to pass their body through any space into which they can fit their head.

Vertebrae are defined by the regions of the vertebral column that they occur in, as in humans. Cervical vertebrae are those in the neck area. With the exception of the two sloth genera ("Choloepus" and "Bradypus") and the manatee genus, ("Trichechus"), all mammals have seven cervical vertebrae. In other vertebrates, the number of cervical vertebrae can range from a single vertebra in amphibians, to as many as 25 in swans or 76 in the extinct plesiosaur "Elasmosaurus". The dorsal vertebrae range from the bottom of the neck to the top of the pelvis. Dorsal vertebrae attached to the ribs are called thoracic vertebrae, while those without ribs are called lumbar vertebrae. The sacral vertebrae are those in the pelvic region, and range from one in amphibians, to two in most birds and modern reptiles, or up to three to five in mammals. When multiple sacral vertebrae are fused into a single structure, it is called the sacrum. The synsacrum is a similar fused structure found in birds that is composed of the sacral, lumbar, and some of the thoracic and caudal vertebra, as well as the pelvic girdle. Caudal vertebrae compose the tail, and the final few can be fused into the pygostyle in birds, or into the coccygeal or tail bone in chimpanzees (and humans).

African apes have three and four lumbar vertebrae, (bonobos have longer spines with an additional vertebra) and humans normally five. This difference, and because the lumbar spines of the extinct "Nacholapithecus" (a Miocene hominoid with six lumbar vertebrae and no tail) are similar to those of early "Australopithecus" and early "Homo", it is assumed that the Chimpanzee-human last common ancestor also had a long vertebral column with a long lumbar region and that the reduction in the number of lumbar vertebrae evolved independently in each ape clade.

In many species, though not in mammals, the cervical vertebrae bear ribs. In many groups, such as lizards and saurischian dinosaurs, the cervical ribs are large; in birds, they are small and completely fused to the vertebrae. The transverse processes of mammals are homologous to the cervical ribs of other amniotes. In the whale the cervical vertebrae are typically fused, an adaptation trading flexibility for stability during swimming. All mammals except manatees and sloths have seven cervical vertebrae, whatever the length of the neck. This includes seemingly unlikely animals such as the giraffe, the camel, and the blue whale, for example. Birds usually have more cervical vertebrae with most having a highly flexible neck consisting of 13–25 vertebrae.

A horse has an average total of 18 thoracic vertebrae, with 5 located in the withers. Each thoracic vertebra is also associated with a rib. A horse also has, on average, six lumbar vertebrae. Some breeds, such as the Arabian, will sometimes, but not always, have five lumbar vertebrae and 17 thoracic vertebrae. There appears to be little correlation between back length and number of vertebrae, as many horses with short backs do have the typical number of vertebrae. The length of each vertebra in the lumbar region seems to have the greater influence on the strength of the horse's back.

In all mammals the thoracic vertebrae are connected to ribs and their bodies differ from the other regional vertebrae due to the presence of facets. Each vertebra has a facet on each side of the vertebral body which articulates with the head of a rib. There is also a facet on each of the transverse processes which articulates with the tubercle of a rib. The number of thoracic vertebrae varies considerably across the species. Most marsupials have thirteen, but koalas only have eleven. The norm is twelve to fifteen in mammals, (twelve in the human), though there are from eighteen to twenty in the horse, tapir, rhinoceros and elephant. In certain sloths there is an extreme number of twenty-five and at the other end only nine in the cetacean.

Ribs are classed as flat bones which usually have a protective role in the body. Humans have 24 ribs, in 12 pairs. All are attached at the back to the thoracic vertebrae, and are numbered from 1–12 according to the vertebrae they attach to. The first rib is attached to thoracic vertebra 1 (T1). At the front of the body most of the ribs are joined by costal cartilages to the sternum. The ribs connect to the vertebrae with two joints, the costovertebral joints.

"Orthosuchus" has 24 vertebrae, and 8 of them are believed to be in the cervical region. All vertebrae appear to be amphicoelous. It does not have tall neural spine but the height of them decrease from head to tail. The vertebrae in the neck region are tightly bonded together. The ribs start at the twelfth vertebra, which supports the ilium. The tail consists of 8 vertebrae of different size and shape. The first one is in contact with the sacral ribs, three vertebrae at the far end of the tail are tiny in size, and the other four vertebrae form the middle of the tail. The ribs form antero-ventral and postero-dorsal flanges, which are for the muscle attachments.
question_src: Je! Binadamu ana vertebrae ngapi?
pos_context_src: Wakati wa kuzaliwa wanadamu wengi wana vertebrae 33 tofauti. Walakini, wakati wa maendeleo ya kawaida vertebrae kadhaa fuse pamoja, ikiacha jumla ya 24, katika hali nyingi. Machafuko juu ya ikiwa kuna au kuna vertebrae 32-34 inatokana na ukweli kwamba vertebrae mbili za chini, sacrum na coccyx, ni mifupa moja iliyoundwa na mifupa kadhaa ndogo ambayo imeungana pamoja. Hivi ndivyo vertebrae inavyohesabiwa: vertebrae 24 tofauti na sacrum, iliyoundwa kutoka vertebrae 5 iliyosafishwa na coccyx, iliyoundwa kutoka vertebrae 3-5. Ikiwa utahesabu coccyx na sacrum kila moja kama vertebra moja, basi kuna vertebrae 26. Ikiwa vertebrae iliyosafishwa yote imehesabiwa tofauti, basi idadi ya vertebrae inakuja kati ya 32 na 34.
neg_context_src: Paka zina vertebrae saba za kizazi kama karibu mamalia wote, vertebrae kumi na tatu (wanadamu wana miaka kumi na mbili), vertebrae saba (wanadamu wana watano), vertebrae tatu (wanadamu wana watano kwa sababu ya mkao wao wa bipedal), na, isipokuwa kwa paka za Manx na vifungo viwili vya watu wa ishirini na mbili. watano, waliingizwa kwenye coccyx ya ndani). Akaunti ya ziada ya lumbar na thoracic vertebrae kwa uhamaji wa mgongo ulioimarishwa wa paka na kubadilika, ikilinganishwa na wanadamu. Vertebrae ya caudal huunda "mkia", inayotumiwa na paka kama kukabiliana na mwili wakati wa harakati za haraka. Kati ya vertebrae yao, wana diski za elastic, muhimu kwa kutua kutua kwa kuruka.

Paka zina vertebrae saba za kizazi (kama vile mamalia wengi); 13 thoracic vertebrae (wanadamu wana 12); vertebrae saba za lumbar (wanadamu wana tano); vertebrae tatu za sacral (kama vile mamalia wengi, lakini wanadamu wana tano); na idadi tofauti ya vertebrae ya caudal kwenye mkia (wanadamu wana vertebrae ya caudal tu, iliyowekwa ndani ya coccyx ya ndani). Akaunti ya ziada ya lumbar na thoracic vertebrae kwa uhamaji wa mgongo wa paka na kubadilika. Iliyowekwa kwenye mgongo ni mbavu 13, bega, na pelvis. Tofauti na mikono ya kibinadamu, vifurushi vya paka vimeunganishwa kwa bega na mifupa ya bure ya kuteleza ambayo inawaruhusu kupitisha miili yao kupitia nafasi yoyote ambayo wanaweza kutoshea kichwa chao.

Vertebrae hufafanuliwa na mikoa ya safu ya vertebral ambayo hufanyika, kama kwa wanadamu. Vertebrae ya kizazi ni zile zilizo kwenye eneo la shingo. Isipokuwa kwa aina mbili za ujanja ("Choloepus" na "Bradypus") na genus ya manatee, ("Trichechus"), mamalia wote wana vertebrae saba ya kizazi. Katika vertebrates zingine, idadi ya vertebrae ya kizazi inaweza kutoka kwa vertebra moja katika amphibians, hadi 25 katika Swans au 76 katika plesiosaur "Elasmosaurus". Vertebrae ya dorsal huanzia chini ya shingo hadi juu ya pelvis. Vertebrae ya dorsal iliyowekwa kwenye mbavu huitwa vertebrae ya thoracic, wakati zile ambazo hazina mbavu huitwa lumbar vertebrae. Vertebrae ya sacral ni ile iliyo katika mkoa wa pelvic, na huanzia moja kwa amphibians, hadi mbili katika ndege wengi na reptilia za kisasa, au hadi tatu hadi tano kwa mamalia. Wakati vertebrae nyingi za sacral zinaingizwa kwenye muundo mmoja, huitwa sacrum. Synsacrum ni muundo kama huo unaopatikana katika ndege ambao unaundwa na sacral, lumbar, na baadhi ya vertebra ya thoracic na caudal, pamoja na mshipi wa pelvic. Vertebrae ya caudal huunda mkia, na wachache wa mwisho wanaweza kuingizwa ndani ya pygostyle katika ndege, au ndani ya mfupa wa coccy au mkia kwenye chimpanzee (na wanadamu).

Apes wa Kiafrika wana vertebrae tatu na nne za lumbar, (Bonobos wana miiba mirefu na vertebra ya ziada) na wanadamu kawaida watano. Tofauti hii, na kwa sababu miiba ya lumbar ya "nacholapithecus" (miocene hominoid na vertebrae sita na hakuna mkia) ni sawa na ile ya "Australopithecus" ya mapema na "Homo", inadhaniwa kuwa na mkoa wa muda mrefu wa muda mrefu na wahusika wa muda mrefu wa muda mrefu wa muda mrefu wa muda mrefu wa muda mrefu wa muda mrefu wa muda mrefu wa muda mrefu na kwamba kunawa kwa muda mrefu wa muda mrefu wa muda mrefu wa muda mrefu wa muda mrefu wa muda mrefu wa muda mrefu wa muda mrefu wa muda mrefu wa muda mrefu tolewa kwa kujitegemea katika kila safu ya ape.

Katika spishi nyingi, ingawa sio kwa mamalia, miiba ya kizazi cha kizazi cha kizazi. Katika vikundi vingi, kama vile mijusi na dinosaurs za saurischian, mbavu za kizazi ni kubwa; Katika ndege, ni ndogo na hushonwa kabisa kwa vertebrae. Michakato ya kubadilika ya mamalia ni ya asili kwa mbavu za kizazi za amniotes zingine. Katika nyangumi vertebrae ya kizazi kawaida husafishwa, kubadilika kwa biashara kwa utulivu wakati wa kuogelea. Mamalia wote isipokuwa manatees na sloths wana vertebrae saba ya kizazi, chochote urefu wa shingo. Hii ni pamoja na wanyama ambao hawaonekani kama twiga, ngamia, na nyangumi wa bluu, kwa mfano. Ndege kawaida huwa na vertebrae zaidi ya kizazi na wengi kuwa na shingo yenye kubadilika sana yenye vertebrae 13-25.

Farasi ina jumla ya vertebrae 18 ya thoracic, na 5 iko kwenye Withers. Kila vertebra ya thoracic pia inahusishwa na mbavu. Farasi pia, kwa wastani, vertebrae sita ya lumbar. Baadhi ya mifugo, kama vile Arabia, wakati mwingine, lakini sio kila wakati, kuwa na vertebrae tano za lumbar na vertebrae 17 za thoracic. Inaonekana kuwa na uhusiano mdogo kati ya urefu wa nyuma na idadi ya vertebrae, kama farasi wengi wenye migongo fupi huwa na idadi ya kawaida ya vertebrae. Urefu wa kila vertebra katika mkoa wa lumbar unaonekana kuwa na ushawishi mkubwa juu ya nguvu ya mgongo wa farasi.

Katika mamalia wote vertebrae ya thoracic imeunganishwa na mbavu na miili yao inatofautiana na vertebrae nyingine ya mkoa kwa sababu ya uwepo wa sehemu. Kila vertebra ina sehemu ya kila upande wa mwili wa vertebral ambayo inaelezea na kichwa cha mbavu. Kuna pia sura kwenye kila moja ya michakato inayobadilika ambayo inaelezea na tubercle ya mbavu. Idadi ya vertebrae ya thoracic inatofautiana sana katika spishi zote. Mariko wengi wana kumi na tatu, lakini koalas wana kumi na moja tu. Kawaida ni kumi na mbili hadi kumi na tano kwa mamalia, (kumi na mbili kwa mwanadamu), ingawa kuna kutoka kumi na nane hadi ishirini katika farasi, tapir, vifaru na tembo. Katika sloths fulani kuna idadi kubwa ya ishirini na tano na mwisho mwingine ni tisa tu kwenye cetacean.

Mbavu huwekwa kama mifupa ya gorofa ambayo kawaida huwa na jukumu la kinga katika mwili. Wanadamu wana mbavu 24, katika jozi 12. Zote zimeunganishwa nyuma kwa vertebrae ya thoracic, na huhesabiwa kutoka 1-12 kulingana na vertebrae wanayoambatana nayo. Rib ya kwanza imeunganishwa na thoracic vertebra 1 (T1). Mbele ya mwili zaidi ya mbavu zinajumuishwa na cartilages za gharama kubwa kwa sternum. Mbavu huunganisha na vertebrae na viungo viwili, viungo vya costovertebral.

"Orthosuchus" ina vertebrae 24, na 8 kati yao wanaaminika kuwa katika mkoa wa kizazi. Vertebrae yote inaonekana kuwa ya amphicoelous. Haina mgongo mrefu wa neural lakini urefu wao hupungua kutoka kichwa hadi mkia. Vertebrae katika mkoa wa shingo imefungwa kwa pamoja. Mbavu huanza kwenye vertebra ya kumi na mbili, ambayo inasaidia ilium. Mkia huo una vertebrae 8 ya saizi tofauti na sura. Ya kwanza inawasiliana na mbavu za sacral, vertebrae tatu mwisho wa mkia ni ndogo kwa ukubwa, na vertebrae nyingine nne huunda katikati ya mkia. Mbavu huunda antero-ventral na flanges za postero-dorsal, ambazo ni za viambatisho vya misuli.
report_src: Binadamu huzaliwa wakiwa na takriban vertebrae 33 tofauti, lakini wakati wa ukuaji wa kawaida baadhi huungana na kusababisha idadi ya vertebrae tofauti kupungua hadi 24; ukihesabu sacrum na coccyx kama mifupa miwili iliyobaki baada ya kuungana, jumla huwa vertebrae 26, ilhali ukitofautisha kila kipande cha sacrum (5) na cha coccyx (3–5) idadi yote hufikia kati ya 32 na 34 [1].

question_en: What kind of housing did the Taensa live in?
pos_context_en: The Taensa and the closely related Natchez are descendants of the late prehistoric Plaquemine culture (1200-1700 CE). The Plaquemine culture was a Mississippian culture variant centered on the Lower Mississippi River valley. They had complex political and religious institutions and lived in large villages centered on ceremonial platform mounds. They were primarily agriculturists who grew maize, pumpkins, squash, beans and tobacco. They had a deep history in the area stretching back through the earlier Coles Creek (700-1200 CE) and Troyville cultures (400-700 CE) to the Marksville culture (100 BCE to 400 CE), which was contemporaneous with the Hopewell cultures of present-day Ohio and Illinois.
neg_context_en: In 1698 French Catholic missionary priests Antoine Davion and François de Montigny and J. B. La Source (a lay person and possible servant to the priests) visited the Taensa; de Montigny founded a short-lived mission among them. De Montigny at that time records their population as being 700 people. In 1699 French explorer Pierre Le Moyne d'Iberville recorded the Taensa as having 300 warriors and living in seven villages named as Taensas, Chaoucoula, Conchayon, Couthaougoula, Nyhougoula, Ohytoucoulas, and Talaspa. The majority of these names are in the Muskogean Mobilian trade language and not the Natchezan Taensa language.

The beginning of the Transylvania Phase (1550-1700 CE) of the Tensas Basin region saw the increasing spread of Mississippian influences diffusing southward from what is now southeastern Arkansas. This is most identifiable in ceramic traditions. The Mississippian peoples of the Central Mississippi Valley used different vessel forms, tempering agents, and decorations than the Plaquemine peoples of the Lower Mississippi Valley. By the late 17th century these changes in ceramic technology had reached the Taensa in the Lower Tensas Basin. The pottery of the Taensa was made with typical Mississippian culture pottery shapes and used the Mississippian hallmark of crushed mussel shell as a tempering agent, but was still being engraved with decorative designs typical of the Plaquemine area. Pottery from the Natchez sites of nearby western Mississippi still used the traditional Plaquemine grog tempering and decorative designs. On this basis the Taensa are considered to be the last Mississippian culture group to inhabit the Tensas River valley of Louisiana.

The English and French colonies in the American southeast struggled for domination. The English colony of South Carolina had established a large trading network among the southeastern Native Americans, which by 1700 stretched west as far as the Mississippi River. The Chickasaw, who lived north of the Taensa and Natchez, were regularly visited by English traders and were well supplied with English trade goods and firearms. Their most lucrative trade with the English was in furs and Indian slaves. For decades the Chickasaw conducted slave raids over a wide region, and were often joined by Natchez and Yazoo warriors to attack and enslave members of smaller tribes like the Taensa. In 1706, fearing a slavers raid by a combined force of Chickasaw and Yazoo, the Taensa abandoned their village on Lake St. Joseph. They headed south to seek shelter with the Bayogoula at their village on the western bank of the Mississippi, roughly south of present-day Baton Rouge. Conflicts soon developed, and the Taensa attacked and nearly exterminated the Bayogoula peoples and burned their village down—an act described as treacherous by later historians.

This pattern of plazas flanked by mounds with temples, elite residences and mortuary structures at their summits was inherited from their Plaquemine and Coles Creek ancestors, and was a village arrangement widely employed throughout the southeast. The Coles Creek era Balmoral Mounds and early Plaquemine era Routh Mounds (occupied circa 1200 to 1350 CE) sites which features this same layout are also located on the western bank of Lake St Joseph near where the Taensa lived in the 17th century.

Taensa mortuary traditions for the elites was to first bury the deceased and at a later date exhume and burn the body. The defleshed bones were then collected into a bundle and placed in a split cane basket which would then reside in the temple which also acted as a mortuary house.

Though their initial relations with the Europeans had been friendly, the rivalry of the European powers strained native populations throughout the region. The Taensa ultimately migrated in 1715, under the protection of the French, to lands near modern Mobile on an eastern branch of the Mobile River north of Mobile Bay that was subsequently named for them as the Tensaw River. In 1763 the French ceded the eastern half of French Louisiana to the British following their defeat in the Seven Years' War. Rather than live under British rule, the Taensa/Tensaw again relocated, along with the Apalachee and Pakana, this time west of the Mississippi to French territory on the Red River. There they eventually merged with the Chitimacha . According to historian James Mooney, they numbered about 100 persons in 1805.

The Taensa temple compares with similar descriptions recorded by artist of the main temple at the contemporaneous Grand Village of the Natchez. Like the Natchez temple, it was situated on a low platform mound flanking the plaza., but unlike the Natchez temple it was surrounded with a palisade of sharpened stakes decorated with human skulls taken during wars with their enemies. Inside the palisade was a large dome-shaped structure over in circumference. At the peak of the roof were three red, yellow, and white painted wooden eagle effigies. The bird carvings faced east toward the rising sun. Woven cane mats covered the structure's outer walls and roof, and the temple was painted red. A guardian lived in a small shed that stood near the door.

The Taensa were sedentary maize growing agriculturalists as opposed to hunter gatherers and lived in permanent villages with wattle and daub buildings. These structures were up to in length and in height and made from logs plastered in clay with roofs of woven split cane matting. Their village on Lake St Joseph is described as fitting the same dispersed hamlet pattern of the Natchez. It stretched for on the western lake shore with neighborhoods being interspersed with fields and forest. The main precinct had a log palisade, inside of which was the chiefs residence, the temple, and eight other structures. Like other Native Americans in the southeast it also had an open plaza area used for public rituals and functions such as the Green Corn Ceremony and games such as chunkey and the ballgame.

Like some other inhabitants of the area, such as the Natchez, Tunica, and Houma, Taensa society was matrilineal. Taensa society was also very hierarchical and showed marked class differences between commoners and elites, hallmarks of being a simple chiefdom. Chiefs exercised absolute power and were treated with great respect; unlike more egalitarian customs among the northern tribes the early chroniclers were used to. An example of this respect was recorded during a ceremonial visit by a chief to visit the explorer René-Robert Cavelier, Sieur de La Salle, when attendants came several hours in advance of the chief and with their hands swept the road clean.
question_src: Je! Taensa iliishi katika nyumba gani?
pos_context_src: Taensa na Natchez inayohusiana sana ni kizazi cha tamaduni ya marehemu ya prehistoric (1200-1700 CE). Utamaduni wa plaquemine ulikuwa utamaduni wa Mississippian uliolenga kwenye Bonde la Mto la Mississippi la chini. Walikuwa na taasisi ngumu za kisiasa na za kidini na waliishi katika vijiji vikubwa vilivyozingatia milango ya jukwaa la sherehe. Kimsingi walikuwa wataalamu wa kilimo ambao walikua mahindi, maboga, boga, maharagwe na tumbaku. Walikuwa na historia ya kina katika eneo lililokuwa nyuma kupitia Coles Creek ya mapema (700-1200 CE) na tamaduni za Troyville (400-700 CE) kwa tamaduni ya Marksville (100 KWK hadi 400 CE), ambayo ilikuwa ya wakati mmoja na tamaduni za Hopewell za leo za Ohio na Illinois.
neg_context_src: Mnamo 1698 Mapadri wa Wamishonari wa Katoliki wa Ufaransa Antoine Davion na François de Montigny na J. B. La Chanzo (mtu aliyelala na mtumwa anayewezekana kwa makuhani) walitembelea Taensa; De Montigny alianzisha utume wa muda mfupi kati yao. De Montigny wakati huo anarekodi idadi yao kama watu 700. Mnamo 1699 mchunguzi wa Ufaransa Pierre Le Moyne d'Iberville alirekodi Taensa kama kuwa na mashujaa 300 na wanaoishi katika vijiji saba vilivyoitwa Taensas, Chaoucoula, Conchayon, Couthaougoula, Nyhougoula, Ohytoucoulas, na Talaspa. Wengi wa majina haya yamo katika lugha ya biashara ya Muskogean Mobilian na sio lugha ya Natchezan Taensa.

Mwanzo wa awamu ya Transylvania (1550-1700 CE) ya mkoa wa Bonde la Tensas iliona kuongezeka kwa ushawishi wa Mississippian unaojitokeza kusini kutoka kwa sasa mashariki mwa Arkansas. Hii inatambulika zaidi katika mila ya kauri. Watu wa Mississippian wa Bonde kuu la Mississippi walitumia aina tofauti za chombo, mawakala wa kusukuma, na mapambo kuliko watu wa Plaquemine wa Bonde la Mississippi la chini. Mwishoni mwa karne ya 17 mabadiliko haya katika teknolojia ya kauri yalikuwa yamefikia Taensa katika bonde la chini la Tensas. Ufinyanzi wa Taensa ulifanywa na maumbo ya kawaida ya utamaduni wa Mississippian na kutumia alama ya Mississippian ya ganda la mussel lililokandamizwa kama wakala wa kusukuma, lakini bado alikuwa akichorwa na miundo ya mapambo ya kawaida ya eneo la plaquemine. Ufinyanzi kutoka kwa maeneo ya Natchez ya Mississippi ya magharibi ya karibu bado ilitumia hali ya jadi ya ujanibishaji na muundo wa mapambo. Kwa msingi huu Taensa inachukuliwa kuwa kikundi cha mwisho cha kitamaduni cha Mississippian kuishi katika Bonde la Mto la Tensas la Louisiana.

Wakoloni wa Kiingereza na Ufaransa huko Amerika Kusini walijitahidi kutawala. Koloni la Kiingereza la Carolina Kusini lilikuwa limeanzisha mtandao mkubwa wa biashara kati ya Wamarekani wa Kusini mashariki, ambao mnamo 1700 ulienea magharibi hadi Mto wa Mississippi. Chickasaw, ambaye alikuwa akiishi kaskazini mwa Taensa na Natchez, walitembelewa mara kwa mara na wafanyabiashara wa Kiingereza na walipewa vyema bidhaa za biashara ya Kiingereza na silaha za moto. Biashara yao yenye faida kubwa na Kiingereza ilikuwa katika furs na watumwa wa India. Kwa miongo kadhaa Chickasaw ilifanya shambulio la watumwa juu ya mkoa mpana, na mara nyingi walijumuishwa na Natchez na Warundi wa Yazoo kushambulia na kufanya watumwa wa makabila madogo kama Taensa. Mnamo 1706, akiogopa wavamizi wa watumwa kwa nguvu ya pamoja ya Chickasaw na Yazoo, Taensa iliachana na kijiji chao kwenye Ziwa St Joseph. Walielekea kusini kutafuta makazi na Bayogoula katika kijiji chao kwenye benki ya magharibi ya Mississippi, karibu kusini mwa Baton Rouge wa leo. Migogoro iliibuka hivi karibuni, na Taensa ilishambulia na karibu kuwaangamiza watu wa Bayogoula na kuchoma kijiji chao - kitendo kilichoelezewa kama wasaliti na wanahistoria wa baadaye.

Mtindo huu wa plazas zilizowekwa na mabwawa na mahekalu, makazi ya wasomi na miundo ya maji katika mikutano yao ilirithiwa kutoka kwa mababu zao wa plaquemine na Coles Creek, na ilikuwa mpangilio wa kijiji ulioajiriwa sana kusini mashariki. Coles Creek era balmoral mabwawa na mapema plaquemine era round (ilichukua circa 1200 hadi 1350 CE) ambayo ina muundo huu pia iko kwenye benki ya magharibi ya Ziwa St Joseph karibu na Taensa iliishi katika karne ya 17.

Mila ya Taensa Rehani kwa wasomi ilikuwa kwanza kumzika marehemu na baadaye baadaye na kuchoma mwili. Mifupa iliyochafuliwa basi ilikusanywa ndani ya kifungu na kuwekwa kwenye kikapu cha miwa kilichogawanyika ambacho kingekaa ndani ya hekalu ambalo pia lilifanya kama nyumba ya kuhifadhia maji.

Ingawa uhusiano wao wa awali na Wazungu ulikuwa wa urafiki, mashindano ya nguvu za Ulaya yalisababisha idadi ya watu wa asili katika mkoa wote. Taensa hatimaye ilihamia mnamo 1715, chini ya ulinzi wa Wafaransa, kwenda karibu na simu za kisasa kwenye tawi la mashariki la Mto wa Simu kaskazini mwa Simu ya Bay ambayo baadaye ilipewa jina lao kama Mto wa Tensaw. Mnamo 1763 Mfaransa alitoa nusu ya mashariki ya Louisiana ya Ufaransa kwa Waingereza kufuatia kushindwa kwao katika vita vya miaka saba. Badala ya kuishi chini ya utawala wa Uingereza, Taensa/Tensaw walihamia tena, pamoja na Apalachee na Pakana, wakati huu magharibi mwa Mississippi kwenda eneo la Ufaransa kwenye Mto Nyekundu. Huko mwishowe waliungana na Chitimacha. Kulingana na mwanahistoria James Mooney, walikuwa na watu wapatao 100 mnamo 1805.

Hekalu la Taensa linalinganishwa na maelezo kama hayo yaliyorekodiwa na msanii wa hekalu kuu katika kijiji cha kisasa cha Natchez. Kama Hekalu la Natchez, lilikuwa kwenye uwanja wa chini wa jukwaa lililokuwa likiweka plaza., Lakini tofauti na Hekalu la Natchez lilizungukwa na palisade ya vijiti vilivyopambwa vilivyopambwa na fuvu za kibinadamu zilizochukuliwa wakati wa vita na maadui wao. Ndani ya palisade kulikuwa na muundo mkubwa wa umbo la dome juu ya mzunguko. Katika kilele cha paa kulikuwa na rangi tatu nyekundu, manjano, na nyeupe zilizochorwa za mbao. Mchoro wa ndege ulikabili mashariki kuelekea jua linalochomoza. Mikeka iliyosokotwa ya miwa ilifunika ukuta wa nje na paa, na hekalu lilichorwa nyekundu. Mlezi aliishi katika chumba kidogo ambacho kilisimama karibu na mlango.

Taensa walikuwa mahindi waliokaa mahindi wanaokua wa kilimo badala ya wawindaji wa wawindaji na waliishi katika vijiji vya kudumu na majengo ya wattle na daub. Miundo hii ilikuwa hadi urefu na kwa urefu na imetengenezwa kutoka kwa magogo yaliyowekwa kwenye mchanga na paa za kusokotwa kwa miwa. Kijiji chao kwenye Ziwa St Joseph kinaelezewa kuwa sawa na muundo huo wa Hamlet uliotawanyika wa Natchez. Ilienea kwenye mwambao wa Ziwa la Magharibi na vitongoji vimeingizwa na shamba na msitu. Precinct kuu ilikuwa na logi palisade, ndani ambayo ilikuwa makazi ya wakuu, hekalu, na miundo mingine nane. Kama Wamarekani wengine wa asili katika kusini mashariki pia walikuwa na eneo la wazi la plaza linalotumika kwa mila ya umma na kazi kama sherehe ya mahindi ya kijani na michezo kama Chunkey na Ballgame.

Kama wenyeji wengine wa eneo hilo, kama vile Natchez, Tunica, na Houma, Jumuiya ya Taensa ilikuwa ya matrilineal. Jamii ya Taensa pia ilikuwa ya kihierarkia sana na ilionyesha tofauti za darasa kati ya watu wa kawaida na wasomi, alama za kuwa msingi rahisi. Wakuu walitumia nguvu kabisa na walitibiwa kwa heshima kubwa; Tofauti na mila zaidi ya usawa kati ya makabila ya kaskazini ambayo watangazaji wa mapema walitumiwa. Mfano wa heshima hii ulirekodiwa wakati wa ziara ya sherehe na mkuu wa kumtembelea mchunguzi wa René-Robert Cavelier, Sieur de la Salle, wakati wahudumu walikuja masaa kadhaa kabla ya mkuu na mikono yao ilifunga barabara safi.
report_src: Taensa waliishi katika vijiji vikubwa vilivyopangwa kuzunguka majukwaa ya udongo yaliyoinuliwa (ceremonial platform mounds) ambayo yalitumika kwa sherehe na shughuli za kisiasa; hivyo, makazi yao yalikuwa ya kijamii na ya kiutawala badala ya kuwa nyumba za mtu mmoja mmoja zilizojitenga [1].

question_en: How long did King Victor Emmanuel II reign?
pos_context_en: Victor Emmanuel II (; full name: "Vittorio Emanuele Maria Alberto Eugenio Ferdinando Tommaso di Savoia"; 14 March 1820 – 9 January 1878) was King of Sardinia from 1849 until 17 March 1861. At that point, he assumed the title of King of Italy and became the first king of a united Italy since the 6th century, a title he held until his death in 1878. The Italians gave him the epithet of "Father of the Fatherland" (). The monument Altare della Patria (or "Vittoriano") in Rome was built in his honor.
neg_context_title_en: List of prime ministers of King Victor Emmanuel III
neg_context_en: The rest of Victor Emmanuel II's reign was much quieter. After the Kingdom of Italy was established he decided to continue on as King Victor Emmanuel II instead of Victor Emmanuel I of Italy. This was a terrible move as far as public relations went as it was not indicative of the fresh start that the Italian people wanted and suggested that Sardinia-Piedmont had taken over the Italian Peninsula, rather than unifying it. Despite this mishap, the remainder of Victor Emmanuel II's reign was consumed by wrapping up loose ends and dealing with economic and cultural issues. His role in day-to-day governing gradually dwindled, as it became increasingly apparent that a king could no longer keep a government in office against the will of Parliament. As a result, while the wording of the Statuto Albertino stipulating that ministers were solely responsible to the crown remained unchanged, in practice they were now responsible to Parliament.

Victor Emmanuel III (Vittorio Emanuele Ferdinando Maria Gennaro di Savoia; , ; 11 November 1869 – 28 December 1947) was the King of Italy from 29 July 1900 until his abdication on 9 May 1946. In addition, he held the thrones of Ethiopia and Albania as Emperor of Ethiopia (1936–41) and King of the Albanians (1939–43). During his reign of nearly 46 years, which began after the assassination of his father Umberto I, the Kingdom of Italy became involved in two world wars. His reign also encompassed the birth, rise, and fall of Italian Fascism.

In any event, once the referendum's result was certified, Victor Emmanuel and all other male members of the House of Savoy were required to leave the country. Taking refuge in Egypt, where he was welcomed with great honor by King Faruk, Victor Emmanuel died in Alexandria a year later, of pulmonary congestion. He was interred behind the altar of St Catherine's Cathedral. He was the last surviving grandchild of Victor Emmanuel II of Italy. In 1948, "Time" magazine included an article about "The Little King".

Following the war, on 9 May 1946, Victor Emmanuel III abdicated in favour of their son Umberto, and the former king assumed the title of Count of Pollenzo. On 2 June 1946 a referendum resulted in 52 percent of voters favouring an Italian republic over the monarchy. The republic was formally proclaimed four days later, and the House of Savoy's reign over Italy formally ended on 12 June 1946. Elena and Victor Emmanuel III went to Egypt, where they were welcomed with great honor by King Faruk, but forced to live the rest of their lives in exile. Vittorio Emmanuel III died a year later of pulmonary congestion in Alexandria. Elena stayed in Egypt a short time before moving to France. There, in Montpellier, she was diagnosed with a severe form of cancer, and died while having surgery to treat it.

He became King of Sardinia-Piedmont in 1849 when his father abdicated the throne, after a humiliating military defeat by the Austrians at the Battle of Novara. Victor Emmanuel was immediately able to obtain a rather favorable armistice at Vignale by the Austrian imperial army commander, Radetzky. The treaty, however, was not ratified by the Piedmontese lower parliamentary house, the Chamber of Deputies, and Victor Emmanuel retaliated by firing his Prime Minister, Claudio Gabriele de Launay, replacing him with Massimo D'Azeglio. After new elections, the peace with Austria was accepted by the new Chamber of Deputies. In 1849, Victor Emmanuel also fiercely suppressed a revolt in Genoa, defining the rebels as a "vile and infected race of canailles."
In 1852, he appointed Count Camillo Benso of Cavour ("Count Cavour") as Prime Minister of Piedmont-Sardinia. This turned out to be a wise choice, since Cavour was a political mastermind and a major player in the Italian unification in his own right. Victor Emmanuel II soon became the symbol of the "Risorgimento", the Italian unification movement of the 1850s and early 60s. He was especially popular in the Kingdom of Sardinia-Piedmont because of his respect for the new constitution and his liberal reforms.
Following Victor Emmanuel's advice, Cavour joined Britain and France in the Crimean War against Russia. Cavour was reluctant to go to war due to the power of Russia at the time and the expense of doing so. Victor Emmanuel, however, was convinced of the rewards to be gained from the alliance created with Britain and, more importantly, France.

Within a year, public opinion forced a referendum on whether to retain the monarchy or become a republic. In hopes of helping the monarchist cause, Victor Emmanuel formally abdicated on 9 May 1946. His son ascended to the throne as Umberto II. This move failed. In the referendum held a month later, 52 percent of voters favoured a republic, and the Kingdom of Italy was no more. Some historians (such as Sir Charles Petrie) have speculated that the result might have been different if Victor Emmanuel had abdicated in favour of Umberto shortly after the Allied invasion of Sicily in 1943, or at the latest had abdicated outright in 1944 rather than simply transferring his powers to his son. Umberto had been widely praised for his performance as "de facto" head of state beginning in 1944, and his relative popularity might have saved the monarchy. The Italian conductor Arturo Toscanini declared that he would not come back to Italy as a subject of the "degenerate king" and more generally as long as the house of Savoy was ruling; Benedetto Croce had previously stated in 1944 that "as long as the present king remains head of state, we feel that Fascism has not ended, (...) that it will be reborn, more or less disguised".
During his reign Victor Emmanuel was served by a total of 21 Prime Ministers; 17 from Italy and 4 from Albania.

On 29 July 1900, at the age of 30, Victor Emmanuel acceded to the throne upon his father's assassination. The only advice that his father Umberto ever gave his heir was "Remember: to be a king, all you need to know is how to sign your name, read a newspaper, and mount a horse". His early years showed evidence that, by the standards of the Savoy monarchy, he was a man committed to constitutional government. Indeed, even though his father was killed by an anarchist, the new King showed a commitment to constitutional freedoms.

Having done much to improve the state of his inheritance in 1684, Victor Amadeus took the decision to abdicate in September 1730. The previous month the lonely king had lost most of his family, including his favourite and eldest son the Prince of Piedmont, and sought the security of a previous mistress Anna Canalis di Cumiana. The couple were married in a private ceremony on 12 August 1730 in the Royal Chapel in Turin having obtained permission from Pope Clement XII. Still attractive in her forties, Victor Amadeus had long been in love with her and as a wedding gift, created her the Marchioness of Spigno. The couple made their marriage public on 3 September 1730 much to the dismay of the court. A month later, Victor Amadeus announced his wish to abdicate the throne and did so in a ceremony at the Castle of Rivoli on the day of his marriage. His son succeeded him as Charles Emmanuel III.
question_src: Mfalme Victor Emmanuel II alitawala kwa muda gani?
pos_context_src: Victor Emmanuel II (; jina kamili: "Vittorio Emanuele Maria Alberto Eugenio Ferdinando Tommaso Di Savoia"; 14 Machi 1820 - 9 Januari 1878) alikuwa Mfalme wa Sardinia kutoka 1849 hadi 17 Machi 1861. Wakati huo, alidhani jina la King of Italia na kuwa Mfalme wa kwanza wa Italy. Waitaliano walimpa epithet ya "baba wa nchi ya baba" (). Monument Altare della Patria (au "Vittoriano") huko Roma ilijengwa kwa heshima yake.
neg_context_title_src: Orodha ya mawaziri wakuu wa Mfalme Victor Emmanuel III
neg_context_src: Utawala uliobaki wa Victor Emmanuel II ulikuwa kimya zaidi. Baada ya ufalme wa Italia kuanzishwa aliamua kuendelea kama Mfalme Victor Emmanuel II badala ya Victor Emmanuel I wa Italia. Hii ilikuwa harakati mbaya hadi uhusiano wa umma ulivyokwenda kwani haikuwa ishara ya mwanzo mpya ambao watu wa Italia walitaka na kupendekeza kwamba Sardinia-Piedmont alikuwa amechukua peninsula ya Italia, badala ya kuiunganisha. Licha ya mishap hii, mabaki ya utawala wa Victor Emmanuel II yalitumiwa kwa kufunga malengo huru na kushughulikia maswala ya kiuchumi na kitamaduni. Jukumu lake katika utawala wa siku hadi siku lilipungua polepole, kwani ilizidi kuonekana kuwa mfalme hakuweza tena kuweka serikali ofisini dhidi ya mapenzi ya Bunge. Kama matokeo, wakati maneno ya Statuto Albertino yanaashiria kwamba mawaziri walikuwa na jukumu la taji walibaki bila kubadilika, kwa vitendo sasa walikuwa na jukumu la bunge.

Victor Emmanuel III (Vittorio Emanuele Ferdinando Maria Gennaro di Savoia; ,; 11 Novemba 1869 - 28 Desemba 1947) alikuwa Mfalme wa Italia kutoka 29 Julai 1900 hadi kutekwa kwake mnamo 9 Mei 1946. Kwa kuongezea, alishikilia Thrones ya Ethiopia na Albania kama Mfalme wa Ethiopia. (1939–43). Wakati wa utawala wake wa karibu miaka 46, ambayo ilianza baada ya kuuawa kwa baba yake Umberto I, Ufalme wa Italia ulihusika katika vita mbili za ulimwengu. Utawala wake pia ulijumuisha kuzaliwa, kuongezeka, na kuanguka kwa ufashisti wa Italia.

Kwa hali yoyote, mara tu matokeo ya kura ya maoni yalipothibitishwa, Victor Emmanuel na washiriki wengine wote wa nyumba ya Savoy walitakiwa kuondoka nchini. Kukimbilia Misri, ambapo alikaribishwa kwa heshima kubwa na Mfalme Faruk, Victor Emmanuel alikufa huko Alexandria mwaka mmoja baadaye, wa msongamano wa mapafu. Aliingiliwa nyuma ya madhabahu ya Kanisa kuu la St Catherine. Alikuwa mjukuu wa mwisho wa Victor Emmanuel II wa Italia. Mnamo 1948, jarida la "Muda" lilijumuisha nakala kuhusu "Mfalme mdogo".

Kufuatia vita, mnamo Mei 9, 1946, Victor Emmanuel III alimwondoa kwa niaba ya mtoto wao Umberto, na mfalme wa zamani alichukua jina la Hesabu ya Pollenzo. Mnamo tarehe 2 Juni 1946 kura ya maoni ilisababisha asilimia 52 ya wapiga kura wanaopendelea jamhuri ya Italia juu ya kifalme. Jamhuri ilitangazwa rasmi siku nne baadaye, na nyumba ya utawala wa Savoy juu ya Italia ilimalizika rasmi mnamo Juni 12, 1946. Elena na Victor Emmanuel III walikwenda Misri, ambapo walikaribishwa kwa heshima kubwa na Mfalme Faruk, lakini walilazimishwa kuishi maisha yao yote uhamishoni. Vittorio Emmanuel III alikufa mwaka mmoja baadaye wa msongamano wa mapafu huko Alexandria. Elena alikaa Misri muda mfupi kabla ya kuhamia Ufaransa. Huko, huko Montpellier, aligunduliwa na saratani kali, na alikufa wakati akifanya upasuaji ili kutibu.

Akawa Mfalme wa Sardinia-Piedmont mnamo 1849 wakati baba yake aliteka kiti cha enzi, baada ya kushindwa kwa kijeshi na Waustria kwenye vita vya Novara. Victor Emmanuel mara moja aliweza kupata kijeshi kizuri huko Vignale na kamanda wa Jeshi la Imperial la Austria, Radetzky. Mkataba huo, hata hivyo, haukuridhiwa na Nyumba ya Bunge ya Chini ya Piedmontese, Chumba cha Manaibu, na Victor Emmanuel walilipiza kisasi kwa kumfukuza waziri mkuu wake, Claudio Gabriele de Launay, akichukua nafasi yake na Massimo d'Azeglio. Baada ya uchaguzi mpya, amani na Austria ilikubaliwa na chumba kipya cha manaibu. Mnamo 1849, Victor Emmanuel pia alikandamiza uasi huko Genoa, akifafanua waasi kama "mbio mbaya na iliyoambukizwa ya Canailles."
Mnamo 1852, aliteua Hesabu Camillo Benso wa Cavour ("Hesabu Cavour") kama Waziri Mkuu wa Piedmont-Sardinia. Hii iligeuka kuwa chaguo la busara, kwani Cavour alikuwa msimamizi wa kisiasa na mchezaji muhimu katika umoja wa Italia kwa haki yake mwenyewe. Victor Emmanuel II hivi karibuni ikawa ishara ya "Risorgimento", harakati ya umoja wa Italia ya miaka ya 1850 na mapema 60s. Alikuwa maarufu sana katika Ufalme wa Sardinia-Piedmont kwa sababu ya heshima yake kwa Katiba mpya na mageuzi yake ya huria.
Kufuatia ushauri wa Victor Emmanuel, Cavour alijiunga na Uingereza na Ufaransa katika vita vya uhalifu dhidi ya Urusi. Cavour hakusita kwenda vitani kwa sababu ya nguvu ya Urusi wakati huo na gharama ya kufanya hivyo. Victor Emmanuel, hata hivyo, alikuwa ameshawishika juu ya thawabu zinazopatikana kutoka kwa muungano ulioundwa na Uingereza na, muhimu zaidi, Ufaransa.

Ndani ya mwaka mmoja, maoni ya umma yalilazimisha kura ya maoni juu ya kudumisha kifalme au kuwa jamhuri. Kwa matumaini ya kusaidia sababu ya monarchist, Victor Emmanuel alitekwa rasmi mnamo 9 Mei 1946. Mwana wake alipanda kiti cha enzi kama Umberto II. Hoja hii ilishindwa. Katika kura ya maoni iliyofanyika mwezi mmoja baadaye, asilimia 52 ya wapiga kura walipendelea jamhuri, na ufalme wa Italia haukuwa tena. Wanahistoria wengine (kama vile Sir Charles Petrie) wamesema kwamba matokeo yanaweza kuwa tofauti ikiwa Victor Emmanuel alikuwa amemwondoa kwa niaba ya Umberto muda mfupi baada ya uvamizi wa Allies wa Sicily mnamo 1943, au hivi karibuni alikuwa amemwondoa waziwazi mnamo 1944 badala ya kuhamisha nguvu zake kwa mtoto wake. Umberto alikuwa amesifiwa sana kwa utendaji wake kama mkuu wa serikali "de facto" akianza mnamo 1944, na umaarufu wake wa jamaa ungeokoa kifalme. Kondakta wa Italia Arturo Toscanini alitangaza kwamba hatarudi Italia kama mada ya "Mfalme Mbaya" na kwa jumla zaidi kama Nyumba ya Savoy ilikuwa inatawala; Benedetto Croce hapo awali alikuwa alisema mnamo 1944 kwamba "mradi mfalme wa sasa atabaki kuwa mkuu wa nchi, tunahisi kwamba ufashisti haujamalizika, (...) kwamba utazaliwa upya, zaidi au chini ya kujificha".
Wakati wa utawala wake Victor Emmanuel alihudumiwa na jumla ya mawaziri wakuu 21; 17 kutoka Italia na 4 kutoka Albania.

Mnamo tarehe 29 Julai 1900, akiwa na umri wa miaka 30, Victor Emmanuel alikubali kiti cha enzi juu ya mauaji ya baba yake. Ushauri pekee ambao baba yake Umberto aliwahi kutoa mrithi wake ilikuwa "Kumbuka: kuwa mfalme, unahitaji kujua ni jinsi ya kusaini jina lako, soma gazeti, na uweke farasi". Miaka yake ya mapema ilionyesha ushahidi kwamba, kwa viwango vya Utawala wa Savoy, alikuwa mtu aliyejitolea kwa Serikali ya Katiba. Kwa kweli, ingawa baba yake aliuawa na mtu anayekata tamaa, mfalme huyo mpya alionyesha kujitolea kwa uhuru wa kikatiba.

Baada ya kufanya mengi kuboresha hali ya urithi wake mnamo 1684, Victor Amadeus alichukua uamuzi wa kuteka nyara mnamo Septemba 1730. Mwezi uliopita Mfalme wa Lonely alikuwa amepoteza familia yake, pamoja na mtoto wake wa kwanza na mkubwa wa Prince wa Piedmont, na alitafuta usalama wa bibi wa zamani Anna Canalis di Cumiana. Wanandoa hao waliolewa katika sherehe ya kibinafsi mnamo 12 Agosti 1730 huko Royal Chapel huko Turin walipata ruhusa kutoka kwa Papa Clement XII. Bado anavutia katika miaka yake, Victor Amadeus alikuwa akimpenda kwa muda mrefu na kama zawadi ya harusi, alimuumba maandamano ya Spigno. Wanandoa hao walifanya ndoa yao kuwa hadharani mnamo tarehe 3 Septemba 1730 kwa masikitiko ya korti. Mwezi mmoja baadaye, Victor Amadeus alitangaza hamu yake ya kuteka kiti cha enzi na alifanya hivyo katika sherehe katika Jumba la Rivoli siku ya ndoa yake. Mwanawe alifanikiwa kama Charles Emmanuel III.
report_src: Victor Emmanuel II alianza kutawala mwaka 1849 kama Mfalme wa Sardinia na akaendelea kushika kiti cha ufalme (baadaye kama Mfalme wa Italia) hadi kifo chake tarehe 9 Januari 1878, akiweka jumla ya takriban miaka 28 na miezi 10 ya utawala mfululizo [1].

question_en: What is the name of the law that was passed to legalize euthanasia in Canada?
pos_context_en: On 17 June 2016, Bill C-14 to legalize and regulate assisted dying passed in Canada's Parliament. This section outlines the details of this law. Strict rules govern access to assisted suicide. If they are not met, anyone who aids another person in killing themselves is guilty of a crime. Canada's law on assisted dying does not allow advance directives, nor does it allow it for minors or people who are suffering from a mental illness.
neg_context_title_en: Rights of the Terminally Ill Act 1995
neg_context_en: On 17 June 2016, a bill to legally allow assisted suicide within Canada became law after it passed both houses of the Parliament of Canada and received Royal Assent.

Voluntary euthanasia was legalized in the Netherlands (in 2002), Belgium (in 2002), Luxembourg (in 2008), and Canada (in 2016). Assisted suicide, where the patient has to take the final action themselves (unlike voluntary euthanasia), is legal in Canada, the Netherlands, Luxembourg, Switzerland and parts of the United States. In the United States there are assisted dying laws restricted to terminally ill adults in Oregon, Montana, Washington, Vermont, Hawaii, California, Colorado and Washington D.C. The laws require that the patient's attending physician certify mental competence. Oregon was the first United States state to legalize assisted suicide, which was achieved through popular vote. The Act was a citizens' initiative passed twice by Oregon voters. The first time was in a general election in November 1994 when it passed by a margin of 51% to 49%. An injunction delayed implementation of the Act until it was lifted on October 27, 1997. In November 1997, a measure was placed on the general election ballot to repeal the Act. Voters chose to retain the Act by a margin of 60% to 40%.

On 6 February 2015, the Supreme Court of Canada unanimously ruled in "Carter v Canada (AG)" that Canadian adults who are mentally competent and suffering intolerably and permanently have the right to a doctor's help in dying. The court however suspended its ruling for 12 months to give the government an opportunity to write legislation and draft new laws and policies around assisted dying. In January 2016 the court granted an additional 4-month extension to its ruling suspension to allow time for the newly elected Liberal government to consult with Canadians on drafting a law to comply with the ruling. As an interim measure, it also ruled that provincial courts can now begin approving applications for euthanasia until the new law passes.

As a result of the decision voluntary euthanasia was expected to be made legal for "a competent adult person who (1) clearly consents to the termination of life and (2) has a grievous and irremediable medical condition (including an illness, disease or disability) that causes enduring suffering that is intolerable to the individual in the circumstances of his or her condition". However, the law as passed was much more restrictive than the court envisioned and remains contentious.

In 2001, the Netherlands passed a law legalizing euthanasia including physician-assisted suicide. This law codifies the twenty-year-old convention of not prosecuting doctors who have committed euthanasia in very specific cases, under very specific circumstances. The Ministry of Public Health, Wellbeing and Sports claims that this practice "allows a person to end their life in dignity after having received every available type of palliative care." The United Nations has reviewed and commented on the Netherlands euthanasia law.

Assisted suicide was previously prohibited under the criminal code as a form of culpable homicide. The prohibition was overturned in a February 2015 decision by the Supreme Court in "Carter v Canada (Attorney General)", which ruled that adults with grievous and irremediable medical conditions are entitled to physician-assisted suicide. The Court delayed its suspension of invalidity for a period of 12 months, to allow Parliament the opportunity to amend its laws, if it so chose. In January 2016, the Court granted an additional four-month extension to the suspension to allow for further time. As an interim measure, it ruled that provincial courts can now begin approving applications for euthanasia pursuant to the criteria in the "Carter" decision. On 6 June 2016, the suspension of invalidity expired and the law was struck down. On 17 June 2016, a bill to legalize and regulate assisted dying passed in Canada's Parliament.

Efforts to change government policies on euthanasia of humans in the 20th and 21st centuries have met limited success in Western countries. Human euthanasia policies have also been developed by a variety of NGOs, most notably medical associations and advocacy organizations. , active human euthanasia is legal in the Netherlands, Belgium, Colombia, Luxembourg, and Canada.
Assisted suicide is legal in Switzerland, Germany, the Netherlands, and in the US states of Washington, Oregon, Colorado, Hawaii, Vermont, Montana, Washington DC, and California. A law legalising euthanasia in the Australian state of Victoria will come into effect in mid-2019.

On 25 March 1997, the federal parliament passed the "Euthanasia Laws Act 1997", which, although not technically repealing the "Rights of the Terminally Ill Act", for all practical purposes rendered it of no legal effect. Rather than repeal the Act directly, the law instead amended the "Northern Territory (Self-Government) Act 1978", the act under which the Commonwealth Parliament has delegated legislative power to the Northern Territory Parliament—effectively the territory's "constitution" or "charter"—removing the Territory's constitutional power to pass any law permitting euthanasia. The Act technically remains in force in the Territory, but to the extent that it permits euthanasia it is now invalid and of no legal effect.

The province of Quebec had legalized doctor assisted suicide in June 2014 as well as in late 2015 the province's Court of Appeal confirmed that their law did not contravene the country's Criminal Code because of the Carter v Canada (AG) ruling of the Supreme Court of Canada.
question_src: Je! Jina la sheria ambalo lilipitishwa kuhalalisha euthanasia huko Canada?
pos_context_src: Mnamo tarehe 17 Juni 2016, Bill C-14 kuhalalisha na kudhibiti kusaidiwa kufa ilipitishwa katika Bunge la Canada. Sehemu hii inaelezea maelezo ya sheria hii. Sheria kali zinasimamia upatikanaji wa kujiua. Ikiwa hawajafikiwa, mtu yeyote anayemsaidia mtu mwingine katika kujiua ana hatia ya uhalifu. Sheria ya Canada juu ya Kufa Kufa hairuhusu maagizo ya mapema, na hairuhusu kwa watoto au watu ambao wanaugua ugonjwa wa akili.
neg_context_title_src: Haki za Sheria ya Kuugua Mbaya 1995
neg_context_src: Mnamo tarehe 17 Juni 2016, muswada wa kuruhusu kihalali kujiua ndani ya Canada ukawa sheria baada ya kupitisha nyumba zote mbili za Bunge la Canada na kupokea ridhaa ya kifalme.

Euthanasia ya hiari ilihalalishwa nchini Uholanzi (mnamo 2002), Ubelgiji (mnamo 2002), Luxembourg (mnamo 2008), na Canada (mnamo 2016). Kujiua kusaidiwa, ambapo mgonjwa lazima achukue hatua za mwisho zenyewe (tofauti na euthanasia ya hiari), ni halali nchini Canada, Uholanzi, Luxembourg, Uswizi na sehemu za Merika. Nchini Merika kuna sheria za kufa zilizosaidiwa zilizozuiliwa kwa watu wazima wanaougua huko Oregon, Montana, Washington, Vermont, Hawaii, California, Colorado na Washington D.C. Sheria zinahitaji kwamba mgonjwa anayehudhuria daktari athibitishe uwezo wa akili. Oregon alikuwa jimbo la kwanza la Merika kuhalalisha kujiua, ambayo ilipatikana kupitia kura maarufu. Sheria hiyo ilikuwa mpango wa raia uliopitishwa mara mbili na wapiga kura wa Oregon. Mara ya kwanza ilikuwa katika uchaguzi mkuu mnamo Novemba 1994 wakati ilipitishwa kwa kiwango cha 51% hadi 49%. Maagizo yalichelewesha utekelezaji wa Sheria hiyo hadi ilipoondolewa mnamo Oktoba 27, 1997. Mnamo Novemba 1997, hatua iliwekwa kwenye kura ya uchaguzi mkuu ili kufuta Sheria hiyo. Wapiga kura walichagua kudumisha kitendo hicho kwa kiwango cha 60% hadi 40%.

Mnamo tarehe 6 Februari 2015, Mahakama Kuu ya Canada kwa makubaliano iliamua katika "Carter v Canada (AG)" kwamba watu wazima wa Canada ambao wana uwezo wa kiakili na wanaoteseka na wana haki ya msaada wa daktari katika kufa. Korti hata hivyo ilisimamisha uamuzi wake kwa miezi 12 ili kuipatia serikali fursa ya kuandika sheria na rasimu sheria na sera mpya karibu na Kufa Kufa. Mnamo Januari 2016 Korti ilipeana nyongeza ya miezi 4 kwa kusimamishwa kwake kwa uamuzi ili kuruhusu wakati wa Serikali mpya ya Liberal iliyochaguliwa kushauriana na Canada juu ya kuandaa sheria kufuata uamuzi huo. Kama hatua ya muda mfupi, pia iliamua kwamba mahakama za mkoa sasa zinaweza kuanza kupitisha maombi ya ugonjwa wa euthanasia hadi sheria mpya itakapopita.

Kama matokeo ya uamuzi wa hiari ya hiari ilitarajiwa kufanywa kuwa halali kwa "mtu mzima anayefaa ambaye (1) anakubali kabisa kukomesha maisha na (2) ana hali mbaya ya matibabu na isiyoweza kuepukika (pamoja na ugonjwa, ugonjwa au ulemavu) ambayo husababisha kuteseka ambayo haiwezi kuvumilia kwa mtu katika hali ya hali yake". Walakini, sheria kama ilivyopitishwa ilikuwa ya kizuizi zaidi kuliko mahakama ilivyodhaniwa na inabaki na ubishani.

Mnamo 2001, Uholanzi ilipitisha sheria kuhalalisha ugonjwa wa euthanasia ikiwa ni pamoja na kujiua kwa daktari. Sheria hii inaangazia mkutano wa miaka ishirini wa kutowashtaki madaktari ambao wamefanya ugonjwa wa ugonjwa katika kesi maalum, katika hali maalum. Wizara ya Afya ya Umma, Ustawi na Michezo inadai kwamba shughuli hii "inamruhusu mtu kumaliza maisha yao kwa heshima baada ya kupokea kila aina ya utunzaji wa hali ya juu." Umoja wa Mataifa umekagua na kutoa maoni juu ya sheria ya Uholanzi ya Euthanasia.

Kujiua kusaidiwa hapo awali kulizuiliwa chini ya Msimbo wa Jinai kama njia ya mauaji yanayoweza kutolewa. Marufuku hayo yalipinduliwa katika uamuzi wa Februari 2015 na Mahakama Kuu katika "Carter v Canada (Mwanasheria Mkuu wa Serikali)", ambayo iliamua kwamba watu wazima walio na hali mbaya ya matibabu na isiyoweza kutekelezwa wanastahili kujiua kwa daktari. Korti ilichelewesha kusimamishwa kwake kwa batili kwa kipindi cha miezi 12, kuruhusu Bunge fursa ya kurekebisha sheria zake, ikiwa ilichagua. Mnamo Januari 2016, korti ilitoa nyongeza ya miezi nne kwa kusimamishwa ili kuruhusu muda zaidi. Kama hatua ya muda mfupi, iliamua kwamba mahakama za mkoa sasa zinaweza kuanza kupitisha maombi ya ugonjwa wa euthanasia kulingana na vigezo katika uamuzi wa "Carter". Mnamo 6 Juni 2016, kusimamishwa kwa batili kumalizika na sheria ilipigwa chini. Mnamo tarehe 17 Juni 2016, muswada wa kuhalalisha na kudhibiti kufa kwa kufa ulipitishwa katika Bunge la Canada.

Jaribio la kubadilisha sera za serikali juu ya ugonjwa wa wanadamu katika karne ya 20 na 21 zimefikia mafanikio madogo katika nchi za Magharibi. Sera za binadamu za euthanasia pia zimetengenezwa na anuwai ya NGOs, vyama haswa vya matibabu na mashirika ya utetezi. , Euthanasia inayotumika ni halali nchini Uholanzi, Ubelgiji, Colombia, Luxembourg, na Canada.
Kujiua kusaidiwa ni halali nchini Uswizi, Ujerumani, Uholanzi, na katika Amerika ya Washington, Oregon, Colorado, Hawaii, Vermont, Montana, Washington DC, na California. Sheria ya kuhalalisha ugonjwa wa euthanasia katika jimbo la Australia la Victoria itaanza kutumika katikati ya mwaka wa 2019.

Mnamo tarehe 25 Machi 1997, Bunge la Shirikisho lilipitisha Sheria ya "Sheria za Euthanasia 1997", ambayo, ingawa haitoi tena "Haki za Sheria ya Ill", kwa madhumuni yote ya vitendo hayakufanya athari ya kisheria. Badala ya kufuta Sheria hiyo moja kwa moja, sheria badala yake ilirekebisha Sheria ya "Wilaya ya Kaskazini (Serikali ya Serikali) 1978", Sheria ambayo Bunge la Jumuiya ya Madola limekabidhi nguvu ya kisheria kwa Bunge la Wilaya ya Kaskazini-kwa ufanisi kwa "Katiba" yoyote au "Charter"-inayoonyesha nguvu ya Katiba ya eneo hilo. Kitendo hicho kitaalam kinabaki na nguvu katika eneo, lakini kwa kiwango ambacho inaruhusu euthanasia sasa ni batili na haina athari ya kisheria.

Mkoa wa Quebec ulikuwa umehalalisha daktari alisaidia kujiua mnamo Juni 2014 na mwishoni mwa mwaka wa 2015 Korti ya Rufaa ya mkoa ilithibitisha kwamba sheria yao haikupinga kanuni ya jinai ya nchi hiyo kwa sababu ya uamuzi wa Carter v Canada (AG) wa Mahakama Kuu ya Canada.
