question_en: When was the first safety pin developed?
pos_context_en: American mechanic Walter Hunt is regarded as the inventor of the safety pin that bears resemblance to those used today. The safety pin included a clasp that covered the point and kept it from opening, and a circular twist at the bend to act as a spring and hold it in place. Charles Rowley (Birmingham, England) independently patented a similar safety pin in October 1849, although the company no longer makes these.
neg_context_en: During the emergence of punk rock in the late seventies, safety pins became associated with the genre, its followers and fashion. Some claim the look was taken originally from Richard Hell whom the British punks saw in pictures, and whose style they adopted. This is disputed by a number of artists from the first wave of British punks, most notably Johnny Rotten, who insists that safety pins were originally incorporated for more practical reasons, for example, to remedy "the arse of your pants falling out". British punk fans, after seeing the clothing worn by such punk forerunners, then incorporated safety pins into their own wardrobe as clothing decoration or as piercings, shifting the purpose of the pins from practicality to fashion. The safety pin subsequently has become an image associated with punk rock by media and popular culture outlets.

Morton wore a jean jacket held together by safety pins as early as 1971, years before the use of safety pins became a widespread part of punk fashion. The use of safety pins in clothing and piercings was later popularized by artists such as Richard Hell, the Sex Pistols and others during the punk rock explosion of the late 70's. It was a jacket that Morton had admired a few years prior on his friend and mentor, Royce Dendler, an assistant professor at Oberlin College, whom Morton met when he was 14 years of age. Morton later visited Dendler while he was attending SVA and Dendler was also living in New York at the time. Upon inquiring as to the jacket's current whereabouts, Dendler answered by pointing to the doormat below them. Morton offered to replace the doormat and asked if he could have the jacket even though it was now tattered, in need of much repair. Morton subsequently repaired the jacket using safety pins to make it wearable and liked the look so much that he gleefully added even more safety pins. It's also been said that Morton wrote the lyrics to one of his earliest songs, "Mr. Crab", after Dendler "walked him around New York and told him to write them." He recorded the song a few weeks later in September 1972 and it was eventually released in 1997 on the "Those Were Different Times" 3x10" vinyl set on Scat Records credited to The Styrenes.

The fibula, a form of brooch, was invented by the Myceaneans on the Greek Peloponnesus between the 14th and 13th Century BC, and is considered an early precursor to a safety pin since they were used in a similar manner. Fibulae were used by Greek women and men to help secure tunics.

The Risdon Manufacturing Company, established in Naugatuck around 1910, began by producing safety pins. Local housewives and children were often hired to attach the pins to cardboard for easy sale. Risdon became the manufacturer of total packaging for cosmetics, personal, household and other consumer products and home sewing notions such as common pins, needles, snaps and other accessories. It is now the Crown Risdon Co., headquartered in Watertown, Connecticut.

An air bag is a safety feature designed to protect automobile passengers in a head-on collision. Most cars today have driver's side airbags and many have one on the passenger side as well. Located in the steering wheel assembly on the driver's side and in the dashboard on the passenger side, the air bag device responds within milliseconds of a crash. The original safety cushion was first created by John W. Hetrick in 1952. After a car accident that his family was involved in, Hetrick drew sketches of compressed air stored in a container. When a spring-loaded weight senses the car decelerating at a rapid enough rate, it opens a valve that allows the pressure in the container to fill a bag. With this knowledge, he developed his design until he was able to obtain a patent on the device on August 5, 1952. Later in 1967, Dr. Allen S. Breed invented and developed a key component for automotive use in 1967, the ball-in-tube inertial sensor for crash detection. Breed Corporation then marketed this innovation to Chrysler.

"We designed the building from the inside out, not the outside in,” said Loretta H. Cockrum, Foram’s founder, chairman and CEO. “We wanted the most efficient office building ever designed, with no wasted space or wasted energy. This is a building of the future more than a building of the present. A lot of love has gone into that building, and a lot of pride."

Glock pistols are designed with three independent safety mechanisms to prevent accidental discharge. The system, designated "Safe Action" by Glock, consists of an external integrated trigger safety and two automatic internal safeties: a firing pin safety, and a drop safety. The external safety is a small inner lever contained in the trigger. Pressing the lever activates the trigger bar and sheet metal connector. The firing pin safety is a solid hardened steel pin that, in the secured state, blocks the firing pin channel (disabling the firing pin in its longitudinal axis). It is pushed upward to release the firing pin for firing only when the trigger is actuated and the safety is pushed up through the backward movement of the trigger bar. The drop safety guides the trigger bar in a ramp that is released only when direct rearward pressure is applied to the trigger. The three safety mechanisms are automatically disengaged one after the other when the trigger is squeezed, and are automatically reactivated when the trigger is released. This passive safety system omits the manipulation of traditional on-off levers, hammers, or other external safeties as found in many other handgun designs. The ability to fire immediately, without worrying about an external safety, is one feature Glock has stressed as an advantage when selling its guns, especially to police departments.

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.

In 1991, the station developed First Alert, the first automated weather warning system for television use (which was based on the manual-input First Warning system developed by KWTV around that time); it also assembled crews of storm chasing units, the "First Alert Storm Teams" (or "F.A.S.T. units"), which utilized custom vehicles equipped with video cameras and pioneering technology that enabled still photographs to be transmitted over cellular telephone (the "First Pix" cell technology as well as "First Alert" would earn the station a Regional News Emmy Award in 1991). Morgan – who was later sued for breach of contract and accusations of taking storm-related videotapes, computer programs and forecasting equipment without the station's permission – left KOCO to become chief meteorologist at KFOR-TV in August 1992, and was later briefly replaced by former Weather Channel severe weather expert Vince Miller.
question_src: Pini ya usalama wa kwanza ilitengenezwa lini?
pos_context_src: Mechanic Walter Hunt ya Amerika inachukuliwa kama mvumbuzi wa pini ya usalama ambayo inafanana na wale wanaotumiwa leo. Pini ya usalama ni pamoja na clasp ambayo ilifunua uhakika na kuizuia kutoka kufunguliwa, na twist ya mviringo kwenye bend kufanya kama chemchemi na kushikilia mahali. Charles Rowley (Birmingham, England) alijitegemea kwa uhuru pini sawa ya usalama mnamo Oktoba 1849, ingawa kampuni haifanyi tena.
neg_context_src: Wakati wa kuibuka kwa mwamba wa punk mwishoni mwa miaka ya sabini, pini za usalama zilihusishwa na aina hiyo, wafuasi wake na mitindo. Wengine wanadai sura hiyo ilichukuliwa asili kutoka kwa Richard Hell ambaye punks za Uingereza ziliona kwenye picha, na ambao walichukua mtindo wao. Hii inasemekana na wasanii kadhaa kutoka wimbi la kwanza la punks za Uingereza, haswa Johnny Rotten, ambaye anasisitiza kwamba pini za usalama ziliingizwa kwa sababu za vitendo zaidi, kwa mfano, kurekebisha "punda wa suruali yako kuanguka". Mashabiki wa punk wa Uingereza, baada ya kuona mavazi yaliyovaliwa na watangulizi wa punk, kisha wakaingiza pini za usalama ndani ya WARDROBE yao wenyewe kama mapambo ya mavazi au kama kutoboa, wakibadilisha kusudi la pini kutoka kwa vitendo hadi mtindo. Pini ya usalama baadaye imekuwa picha inayohusishwa na mwamba wa punk na media na maduka maarufu ya utamaduni.

Morton alivaa koti ya jean iliyoshikiliwa pamoja na pini za usalama mapema 1971, miaka kabla ya matumizi ya pini za usalama ikawa sehemu ya mtindo wa punk. Matumizi ya pini za usalama katika mavazi na kutoboa baadaye ilijulikana na wasanii kama vile Richard Hell, bastola za ngono na zingine wakati wa mlipuko wa mwamba wa punk wa miaka ya 70. Ilikuwa koti ambayo Morton alikuwa amevutiwa na miaka michache kabla ya rafiki yake na mshauri, Royce Dendler, profesa msaidizi katika Chuo cha Oberlin, ambaye Morton alikutana naye alipokuwa na umri wa miaka 14. Baadaye Morton alitembelea Dendler wakati alikuwa akihudhuria SVA na Dendler pia alikuwa akiishi New York wakati huo. Baada ya kuuliza juu ya habari za sasa za koti, Dendler alijibu kwa kuashiria mlango ulio chini yao. Morton alijitolea kuchukua nafasi ya chumba hicho na akauliza ikiwa angeweza kuwa na koti hiyo ingawa ilikuwa imetapeliwa, ikihitaji ukarabati mwingi. Morton baadaye alirekebisha koti kwa kutumia pini za usalama ili kuifanya iweze kuvaliwa na kupenda sura hiyo kiasi kwamba akaongeza pini za usalama zaidi. Inasemekana pia kwamba Morton aliandika maneno hayo kwa moja ya nyimbo zake za mapema, "Bwana Crab", baada ya Dendler "kumtembea karibu na New York na kumwambia aandike." Alirekodi wimbo huo wiki chache baadaye mnamo Septemba 1972 na hatimaye ilitolewa mnamo 1997 mnamo "hizo zilikuwa nyakati tofauti" 3x10 "vinyl iliyowekwa kwenye rekodi za SCAT zilizopewa sifa.

Fibula, aina ya brooch, ilibuniwa na Myceaneans kwenye Peloponnesus ya Uigiriki kati ya karne ya 14 na 13 KK, na inachukuliwa kuwa mtangulizi wa mapema kwa pini ya usalama kwani ilitumiwa kwa njia ile ile. Fibulae zilitumiwa na wanawake wa Uigiriki na wanaume kusaidia nguo salama.

Kampuni ya Viwanda ya Risdon, iliyoanzishwa huko Naugatuck karibu 1910, ilianza kwa kutengeneza pini za usalama. Mama wa nyumbani na watoto mara nyingi waliajiriwa kushikamana na pini kwa kadibodi kwa uuzaji rahisi. Risdon alikua mtengenezaji wa ufungaji kamili wa vipodozi, kibinafsi, kaya na bidhaa zingine za watumiaji na maoni ya kushona nyumbani kama pini za kawaida, sindano, snaps na vifaa vingine. Sasa ni Crown Risdon Co, makao makuu huko Watertown, Connecticut.

Mfuko wa hewa ni sehemu ya usalama iliyoundwa kulinda abiria wa gari kwenye mgongano wa kichwa. Magari mengi leo yana mikoba ya upande wa dereva na nyingi zina moja kwa upande wa abiria pia. Iko katika mkutano wa gurudumu la usukani kwa upande wa dereva na kwenye dashibodi upande wa abiria, kifaa cha begi la hewa hujibu ndani ya milimita ya ajali. Mto wa usalama wa asili uliundwa kwanza na John W. Hetrick mnamo 1952. Baada ya ajali ya gari ambayo familia yake ilihusika, Hetrick alichora michoro ya hewa iliyoshinikwa iliyohifadhiwa kwenye chombo. Wakati uzani wa kubeba-spring unaona gari ikipungua kwa kiwango cha haraka cha kutosha, inafungua valve ambayo inaruhusu shinikizo kwenye chombo kujaza begi. Kwa ufahamu huu, aliendeleza muundo wake hadi alipoweza kupata patent kwenye kifaa hicho mnamo Agosti 5, 1952. Baadaye mnamo 1967, Dk. Allen S. Breed aligundua na kuendeleza sehemu muhimu ya matumizi ya magari mnamo 1967, sensor ya ndani ya mpira kwa kugundua ajali. Shirika la kuzaliana basi liliuza uvumbuzi huu kwa Chrysler.

"Tulibuni jengo hilo kutoka ndani, sio nje," alisema Loretta H. Cockrum, mwanzilishi wa Foram, Mwenyekiti na Mkurugenzi Mtendaji. "Tulitaka jengo bora zaidi la ofisi lililowahi kubuniwa, bila nafasi ya kupoteza au nishati ya kupoteza. Hii ni jengo la siku zijazo zaidi ya jengo la sasa. Upendo mwingi umeingia kwenye jengo hilo, na kiburi sana."

Bastola za Glock zimetengenezwa na njia tatu za usalama za kujitegemea kuzuia kutokwa kwa bahati mbaya. Mfumo huo, ulioteuliwa "hatua salama" na Glock, una usalama wa nje wa trigger na usalama wa moja kwa moja wa ndani: usalama wa pini ya kurusha, na usalama wa kushuka. Usalama wa nje ni lever ndogo ya ndani iliyomo kwenye trigger. Kubonyeza lever huamsha bar ya trigger na kiunganishi cha chuma cha karatasi. Usalama wa pini ya kurusha ni pini ngumu ya chuma iliyo ngumu ambayo, katika hali iliyohifadhiwa, inazuia kituo cha kurusha pini (kulemaza pini ya kurusha kwenye mhimili wake wa muda mrefu). Inasukuma juu ili kutolewa pini ya kurusha kwa kurusha tu wakati trigger inapowekwa na usalama unasukuma kupitia harakati za nyuma za bar ya trigger. Usalama wa Drop huongoza bar ya trigger katika barabara ambayo hutolewa tu wakati shinikizo la nyuma la moja kwa moja linatumika kwa trigger. Njia tatu za usalama hukataliwa kiatomati moja baada ya nyingine wakati trigger inapowekwa, na hufanywa kiotomatiki wakati trigger inatolewa. Mfumo huu wa usalama wa kupita huachilia ujanja wa levers za jadi, nyundo, au usalama mwingine wa nje kama unavyopatikana katika miundo mingine mingi ya mkoba. Uwezo wa moto mara moja, bila kuwa na wasiwasi juu ya usalama wa nje, ni sehemu moja ambayo Glock amesisitiza kama faida wakati wa kuuza bunduki zake, haswa kwa idara za polisi.

Winfield Toll Bridge, pia inajulikana kama Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, ni kihistoria wa kihistoria wa Cantilever Warren Truss Bridge iliyoko Winfield na Red House, Kaunti ya Putnam, West Virginia. Ilijengwa mnamo 1955, na inachukua Mto wa Kanawha, iliyobeba West Virginia Route 34. Cantilever kupitia-truss ina nafasi mbili za nanga kila futi 245 kwa urefu na urefu wa futi 462 kwa urefu kati ya mistari ya kituo cha pier. Span kuu ina futi mbili 128, inchi 4, mikono ya cantilever na miguu 205, inchi 4, iliyosimamishwa.

Mnamo 1991, kituo kiliendeleza tahadhari ya kwanza, mfumo wa kwanza wa onyo la hali ya hewa kwa matumizi ya televisheni (ambayo ilikuwa msingi wa mfumo wa tahadhari wa kwanza wa mwongozo uliotengenezwa na KWTV karibu wakati huo); Pia ilikusanya vitengo vya vitengo vya kufukuza dhoruba, "Timu za Kwanza za Dhoruba" (au "F.A.S.T. Vitengo"), ambayo ilitumia magari maalum yaliyo na kamera za video na teknolojia ya upainia ambayo iliwezesha picha bado kupitishwa kwa simu ya rununu ("Pix" ya kwanza katika teknolojia ya seli. Morgan-ambaye baadaye alishtakiwa kwa uvunjaji wa mkataba na tuhuma za kuchukua video zinazohusiana na dhoruba, programu za kompyuta na vifaa vya utabiri bila idhini ya kituo hicho-aliondoka Koco kuwa mtaalam wa hali ya hewa huko Kfor-TV mnamo Agosti 1992, na baadaye akabadilishwa kwa muda mfupi na mtaalam wa hali ya hewa wa hali ya hewa Vince Miller.
report_src: Kulingana na chanzo kilichopo, utengenezaji wa kwanza uliorekodiwa wa pini ya usalama ulifanyika mnamo Oktoba 1849, wakati Charles Rowley wa Birmingham, England, alibuni kwa kujitegemea pini ya usalama inayofanana na ile inayotumiwa leo [1].
all_claims: Kulingana na chanzo kilichopo, utengenezaji wa kwanza uliorekodiwa wa pini ya usalama ulifanyika mnamo Oktoba 1849, wakati Charles Rowley wa Birmingham, England, alibuni kwa kujitegemea pini ya usalama inayofanana na ile inayotumiwa leo [1].

question_en: When was universal health care introduced in France?
pos_context_en: The current system has undergone several changes since its foundation in 1945, though the basis of the system remains state planned and operated.
neg_context_en: Following World War II, universal health care systems began to be set up around the world. On July 5, 1948, the United Kingdom launched its universal National Health Service. Universal health care was next introduced in the Nordic countries of Sweden (1955), Iceland (1956), Norway (1956), Denmark (1961), and Finland (1964). Universal health insurance was then introduced in Japan (1961), and in Canada through stages, starting with the province of Saskatchewan in 1962, followed by the rest of Canada from 1968 to 1972. The Soviet Union extended universal health care to its rural residents in 1969. Italy introduced its "Servizio Sanitario Nazionale" (National Health Service) in 1978. Universal health insurance was implemented in Australia beginning with the "Medibank" system which led to universal coverage under the Medicare system.

From the 1970s to the 2000s, Southern and Western European countries began introducing universal coverage, most of them building upon previous health insurance programs to cover the whole population. For example, France built upon its 1928 national health insurance system, with subsequent legislation covering a larger and larger percentage of the population, until the remaining 1% of the population that was uninsured received coverage in 2000. In addition, universal health coverage was introduced in some Asian countries, including South Korea (1989), Taiwan (1995), Israel (1995), and Thailand (2001).

Since 1905 the French Government has followed the principle of "laïcité", in which it is prohibited from recognising any specific right to a religious community (except for legacy statutes like those of military chaplains and the local law in Alsace-Moselle). It recognises religious organisations according to formal legal criteria that do not address religious doctrine. Conversely, religious organisations are expected to refrain from intervening in policy-making. Certain groups, such as Scientology, Children of God, the Unification Church, or the Order of the Solar Temple, are considered cults (""sectes"" in French), and therefore do not have the same status as recognised religions in France. "Secte" is considered a pejorative term in France.
The French health care system is one of universal health care largely financed by government national health insurance. In its 2000 assessment of world health care systems, the World Health Organization found that France provided the "close to best overall health care" in the world. The French healthcare system was ranked first worldwide by the World Health Organization in 1997. In 2011, France spent 11.6% of GDP on health care, or US$4,086 per capita, a figure much higher than the average spent by countries in Europe but less than in the United States. Approximately 77% of health expenditures are covered by government funded agencies.

Today, this system is more or less intact. All citizens and legal foreign residents of France are covered by one of these mandatory programs, which continue to be funded by worker participation. However, since 1945, a number of major changes have been introduced. Firstly, the different health care funds (there are five: General, Independent, Agricultural, Student, Public Servants) now all reimburse at the same rate. Secondly, since 2000, the government now provides health care to those who are not covered by a mandatory regime (those who have never worked and who are not students, meaning the very rich or the very poor). This regime, unlike the worker-financed ones, is financed via general taxation and reimburses at a higher rate than the profession-based system for those who cannot afford to make up the difference.

The French healthcare system was named by the World Health Organization in 2008 as the best performing system in the world in terms of availability and organization of health care providers . It is a universal health care system. It features a mix of public and private services, relatively high expenditure, high patient success rates and low mortality rates, and high consumer satisfaction. Its aims are to combine low cost with flexibility of patient choice as well as doctors' autonomy. While 99.9% of the French population is covered, the rising cost of the system has been a source of concern, as has the lack of emergency service in some areas. In 2004, the system underwent a number of reforms, including introduction of the "Carte Vitale" smart card system, improved treatment of patients with rare diseases, and efforts aimed at reducing medical fraud. While private medical care exists in France, the 75% of doctors who are in the national program provide care free to the patient, with costs being reimbursed from government funds. Like most countries, France faces problems of rising costs of prescription medication, increasing unemployment, and a large aging population.

In a social health insurance system, contributions from workers, the self-employed, enterprises, and governments are pooled into a single or multiple funds on a compulsory basis. It is based on risk pooling. The social health insurance model is also referred to as the 'Bismarck Model,' after Prussian Chancellor Otto von Bismarck, who introduced the first universal health care system in Germany in the 19th century. The funds typically contract with a mix of public and private providers for the provision of a specified benefit package. Preventive and public health care may be provided by these funds or responsibility kept solely by the Ministry of Health. Within social health insurance, a number of functions may be executed by parastatal or non-governmental sickness funds or in a few cases, by private health insurance companies. Social health insurance is used in a number of Western European countries and increasingly in Eastern Europe as well as in Israel and Japan.

The first move towards a national health insurance system was launched in Germany in 1883, with the Sickness Insurance Law. Industrial employers were mandated to provide injury and illness insurance for their low-wage workers, and the system was funded and administered by employees and employers through "sick funds", which were drawn from deductions in workers' wages and from employers' contributions. Other countries soon began to follow suit. In the United Kingdom, the National Insurance Act 1911 provided coverage for primary care (but not specialist or hospital care) for wage earners, covering about one third of the population. The Russian Empire established a similar system in 1912, and other industrialized countries began following suit. By the 1930s, similar systems existed in virtually all of Western and Central Europe. Japan introduced an employee health insurance law in 1927, expanding further upon it in 1935 and 1940. Following the Russian Revolution of 1917, the Soviet Union established a fully public and centralized health care system in 1920. However, it was not a truly universal system at that point, as rural residents were not covered.

From 2000 a universal health coverage has been in place, providing two fundamental rights for access to care: a right to health insurance for anyone in stable and regular residence in the territory and a right for the most disadvantaged, submitted to resources, to a free coverage, with exemption from fee.

Today, this system is more or less intact. All citizens and legal foreign residents of France are covered by one of these mandatory programs, which continue to be funded by worker participation. However, since 1945, a number of major changes have been introduced. Firstly, the different health care funds (there are five: General, Independent, Agricultural, Student, Public Servants) now all reimburse at the same rate. Secondly, since 2000, the government now provides health care to those who are not covered by a mandatory regime (those who have never worked and who are not students, meaning the very rich or the very poor). This regime, unlike the worker-financed ones, is financed via general taxation and reimburses at a higher rate than the profession-based system for those who cannot afford to make up the difference. Finally, to counter the rise in health care costs, the government has installed two plans, (in 2004 and 2006), which require insured people to declare a referring doctor in order to be fully reimbursed for specialist visits, and which installed a mandatory co-pay of €1 for a doctor visit, €0.50 for each box of medicine prescribed, and a fee of €16–18 per day for hospital stays and for expensive procedures.
question_src: Je! Huduma ya Afya ya Universal ilianzishwa lini Ufaransa?
pos_context_src: Mfumo wa sasa umepitia mabadiliko kadhaa tangu msingi wake mnamo 1945, ingawa msingi wa mfumo unabaki kuwa wa serikali na kuendeshwa.
neg_context_src: Kufuatia Vita vya Kidunia vya pili, mifumo ya utunzaji wa afya ya ulimwengu ilianza kuwekwa ulimwenguni kote. Mnamo Julai 5, 1948, Uingereza ilizindua Huduma yake ya Kitaifa ya Afya ya Universal. Huduma ya Afya ya Universal ilianzishwa baadaye katika Nchi za Nordic za Uswidi (1955), Iceland (1956), Norway (1956), Denmark (1961), na Ufini (1964). Bima ya Afya ya Universal ilianzishwa huko Japan (1961), na huko Canada kupitia hatua, kuanzia na mkoa wa Saskatchewan mnamo 1962, ikifuatiwa na Canada yote kutoka 1968 hadi 1972. Umoja wa Soviet uliongeza huduma ya afya kwa wakaazi wake wa vijijini mnamo 1969. Mfumo wa "Medibank" ambao ulisababisha chanjo ya ulimwengu chini ya mfumo wa Medicare.

Kuanzia miaka ya 1970 hadi miaka ya 2000, nchi za kusini na magharibi mwa Ulaya zilianza kuanzisha chanjo ya ulimwengu, wengi wao wakijenga mipango ya bima ya afya ya zamani ili kufunika idadi ya watu. Kwa mfano, Ufaransa ilijengwa juu ya mfumo wake wa kitaifa wa bima ya afya ya 1928, na sheria inayofuata inashughulikia asilimia kubwa na kubwa ya idadi ya watu, hadi 1% iliyobaki ya idadi ya watu ambayo haikupatikana ilipokea chanjo mnamo 2000. Kwa kuongezea, chanjo ya afya ilianzishwa katika nchi zingine za Asia, pamoja na Korea Kusini (1989), Taiwan (1995), Israel), na Thoail).

Tangu 1905 Serikali ya Ufaransa imefuata kanuni ya "laïcité", ambayo ni marufuku kutambua haki yoyote maalum kwa jamii ya kidini (isipokuwa kwa kanuni za urithi kama zile za chaplains za kijeshi na sheria za mitaa huko Alsace-Moselle). Inatambua mashirika ya kidini kulingana na vigezo rasmi vya kisheria ambavyo havishughulikii mafundisho ya kidini. Kinyume chake, mashirika ya kidini yanatarajiwa kukataa kuingilia kati katika utengenezaji wa sera. Vikundi fulani, kama vile Sayansi, Watoto wa Mungu, Kanisa la Umoja, au Agizo la Hekalu la jua, huchukuliwa kama ibada ("" Sehemu "" kwa Kifaransa), na kwa hivyo hazina hadhi sawa na dini zinazotambuliwa huko Ufaransa. "Secte" inachukuliwa kuwa neno la kupendeza nchini Ufaransa.
Mfumo wa utunzaji wa afya wa Ufaransa ni moja ya utunzaji wa afya kwa jumla unaofadhiliwa na bima ya kitaifa ya afya. Katika tathmini yake ya 2000 ya mifumo ya utunzaji wa afya duniani, Shirika la Afya Ulimwenguni liligundua kuwa Ufaransa ilitoa "karibu na huduma bora ya afya" ulimwenguni. Mfumo wa huduma ya afya ya Ufaransa uliorodheshwa kwanza ulimwenguni na Shirika la Afya Ulimwenguni mnamo 1997. Mnamo mwaka wa 2011, Ufaransa ilitumia 11.6% ya Pato la Taifa juu ya utunzaji wa afya, au dola 4,086 kwa kila mtu, takwimu kubwa zaidi kuliko wastani uliotumiwa na nchi za Ulaya lakini chini ya Merika. Takriban asilimia 77 ya matumizi ya afya hufunikwa na mashirika yanayofadhiliwa na serikali.

Leo, mfumo huu ni zaidi au chini kabisa. Raia wote na wakaazi wa kisheria wa Ufaransa wamefunikwa na moja ya mipango hii ya lazima, ambayo inaendelea kufadhiliwa na ushiriki wa wafanyikazi. Walakini, tangu 1945, mabadiliko kadhaa yameanzishwa. Kwanza, fedha tofauti za utunzaji wa afya (kuna tano: jumla, huru, kilimo, mwanafunzi, watumishi wa umma) sasa wote wanalipa kwa kiwango sawa. Pili, tangu 2000, serikali sasa hutoa huduma ya afya kwa wale ambao hawajafunikwa na serikali ya lazima (wale ambao hawajawahi kufanya kazi na ambao sio wanafunzi, wakimaanisha matajiri au masikini sana). Utawala huu, tofauti na wale wanaofadhiliwa na wafanyikazi, unafadhiliwa kupitia ushuru wa jumla na hulipa kwa kiwango cha juu kuliko mfumo wa taaluma kwa wale ambao hawawezi kufanya tofauti hiyo.

Mfumo wa huduma ya afya ya Ufaransa ulipewa jina na Shirika la Afya Ulimwenguni mnamo 2008 kama mfumo bora zaidi ulimwenguni katika suala la upatikanaji na shirika la watoa huduma ya afya. Ni mfumo wa huduma ya afya ya ulimwengu wote. Inaangazia mchanganyiko wa huduma za umma na za kibinafsi, matumizi ya juu, viwango vya mafanikio ya mgonjwa na viwango vya chini vya vifo, na kuridhika kwa watumiaji. Malengo yake ni kuchanganya gharama ya chini na kubadilika kwa uchaguzi wa mgonjwa na uhuru wa madaktari. Wakati 99.9% ya idadi ya watu wa Ufaransa inafunikwa, gharama kubwa ya mfumo imekuwa chanzo cha wasiwasi, kama vile ukosefu wa huduma ya dharura katika maeneo kadhaa. Mnamo 2004, mfumo ulipitia mageuzi kadhaa, pamoja na kuanzishwa kwa mfumo wa kadi ya "carte vitale", kuboresha matibabu ya wagonjwa walio na magonjwa adimu, na juhudi zinazolenga kupunguza udanganyifu wa matibabu. Wakati utunzaji wa matibabu ya kibinafsi upo nchini Ufaransa, 75% ya madaktari ambao wako katika mpango wa kitaifa hutoa huduma ya bure kwa mgonjwa, na gharama zinalipwa kutoka kwa fedha za serikali. Kama nchi nyingi, Ufaransa inakabiliwa na shida za kuongezeka kwa gharama za dawa za kuagiza, kuongezeka kwa ukosefu wa ajira, na idadi kubwa ya wazee.

Katika mfumo wa bima ya afya ya kijamii, michango kutoka kwa wafanyikazi, wanaojiajiri, biashara, na serikali zimewekwa kwa fedha moja au nyingi kwa msingi wa lazima. Ni kwa msingi wa kuogelea kwa hatari. Mfano wa bima ya afya ya kijamii pia hujulikana kama 'mfano wa Bismarck,' baada ya Kansela wa Prussian Otto von Bismarck, ambaye alianzisha mfumo wa kwanza wa utunzaji wa afya nchini Ujerumani katika karne ya 19. Fedha kawaida huambukizwa na mchanganyiko wa watoa huduma za umma na za kibinafsi kwa utoaji wa kifurushi maalum cha faida. Utunzaji wa afya na umma unaweza kutolewa na fedha hizi au jukumu linalohifadhiwa tu na Wizara ya Afya. Ndani ya bima ya afya ya kijamii, kazi kadhaa zinaweza kutekelezwa na fedha za ugonjwa au zisizo za kiserikali au katika visa vichache, na kampuni za bima za afya. Bima ya afya ya kijamii hutumiwa katika nchi kadhaa za Magharibi mwa Ulaya na inazidi Ulaya Mashariki na pia katika Israeli na Japan.

Hatua ya kwanza kuelekea mfumo wa bima ya afya ya kitaifa ilizinduliwa nchini Ujerumani mnamo 1883, na sheria ya bima ya ugonjwa. Waajiri wa viwandani waliamriwa kutoa bima ya kuumia na magonjwa kwa wafanyikazi wao wa mshahara wa chini, na mfumo huo ulifadhiliwa na kusimamiwa na wafanyikazi na waajiri kupitia "fedha za wagonjwa", ambazo zilitolewa kutoka kwa makato katika mshahara wa wafanyikazi na michango ya waajiri. Nchi zingine hivi karibuni zilianza kufuata. Huko Uingereza, Sheria ya Bima ya Kitaifa ya 1911 ilitoa chanjo ya utunzaji wa kimsingi (lakini sio mtaalamu au utunzaji wa hospitali) kwa wapataji wa mshahara, kufunika karibu theluthi moja ya idadi ya watu. Milki ya Urusi ilianzisha mfumo kama huo mnamo 1912, na nchi zingine zilizoendelea zilianza kufuatia. Kufikia miaka ya 1930, mifumo kama hiyo ilikuwepo katika karibu yote ya Ulaya ya Magharibi na Kati. Japan ilianzisha sheria ya bima ya afya ya mfanyakazi mnamo 1927, ikiongezeka zaidi juu yake mnamo 1935 na 1940. Kufuatia Mapinduzi ya Urusi ya 1917, Umoja wa Soviet ulianzisha mfumo kamili wa huduma ya afya na wa kati mnamo 1920. Walakini, haikuwa mfumo wa kweli wakati huo, kwani wakazi wa vijijini hawakufunikwa.

Kuanzia 2000 chanjo ya Afya ya Universal imekuwa mahali, ikitoa haki mbili za msingi za upatikanaji wa utunzaji: haki ya bima ya afya kwa mtu yeyote katika makazi thabiti na ya kawaida katika eneo hilo na haki ya wanyonge zaidi, waliowasilishwa kwa rasilimali, kwa chanjo ya bure, na msamaha kutoka kwa ada.

Leo, mfumo huu ni zaidi au chini kabisa. Raia wote na wakaazi wa kisheria wa Ufaransa wamefunikwa na moja ya mipango hii ya lazima, ambayo inaendelea kufadhiliwa na ushiriki wa wafanyikazi. Walakini, tangu 1945, mabadiliko kadhaa yameanzishwa. Kwanza, fedha tofauti za utunzaji wa afya (kuna tano: jumla, huru, kilimo, mwanafunzi, watumishi wa umma) sasa wote wanalipa kwa kiwango sawa. Pili, tangu 2000, serikali sasa hutoa huduma ya afya kwa wale ambao hawajafunikwa na serikali ya lazima (wale ambao hawajawahi kufanya kazi na ambao sio wanafunzi, wakimaanisha matajiri au masikini sana). Utawala huu, tofauti na wale wanaofadhiliwa na wafanyikazi, unafadhiliwa kupitia ushuru wa jumla na hulipa kwa kiwango cha juu kuliko mfumo wa taaluma kwa wale ambao hawawezi kufanya tofauti hiyo. Mwishowe, ili kukabiliana na kuongezeka kwa gharama za utunzaji wa afya, serikali imeweka mipango miwili, (mnamo 2004 na 2006), ambayo inahitaji watu wenye bima kutangaza daktari anayerejelea ili arudishwe kikamilifu kwa ziara za wataalamu, na ambayo ilisanikisha malipo ya lazima ya € 1 kwa ziara ya daktari, € 0.50 kwa kila sanduku la dawa iliyoainishwa, na ada ya € 168.
report_src: Huduma ya Afya ya Universal nchini Ufaransa ilianzishwa rasmi mwaka 1945 kupitia kuundwa kwa mfumo wa Sécurité Sociale, ulioweka msingi wa bima ya afya inayofadhiliwa na serikali na inayochukua idadi kubwa ya wananchi; tangu wakati huo mfumo huu umeendelea kufanyiwa marekebisho kadhaa lakini msingi wake wa umiliki na uendeshaji wa kiserikali umebaki thabiti [1].

question_en: Who is the first female Doctor?
pos_context_en: Elizabeth Blackwell (February 3, 1821 – May 31, 1910) was a British physician, notable as the first woman to receive a medical degree in the United States, and the first woman on the Medical Register of the General Medical Council. Elizabeth Blackwell played an important role in both the United States and the United Kingdom as a social and moral reformer. She acted as a pioneer in promoting the education of women in medicine. Elizabeth Blackwell's contributions remain celebrated through an Elizabeth Blackwell medal that is awarded to one woman every year who has added to the cause of promoting women in medicine. Furthermore, Hobart and William Smith College recently created a statue on their campus honoring Elizabeth Blackwell.
neg_context_title_en: History of women in Puerto Rico
neg_context_en: Dr. Fanny Jane Butler (5 October 1850 – 26 October 1889) was a medical missionary from England who was among the first female doctors to travel to India and the first fully trained doctor from England to do so. Prior to her work in Kashmir and other parts of India, Butler was a part of the first class of the London School of Medicine for Women, becoming a member of the forefront of female doctors. Butler spent seven years in India until her death in 1889 and opened medical dispensaries in Srinagar and Bhagalpur, where no medical facilities had previously existed. Butler also initiated the building of the first hospital in Srinagar in 1888 called the John Bishop Memorial Hospital and provided necessary medical care for Indian women, for whom little care had been available.

Jessie Handyside Gellatly (7 December 1882 – 30 June 1935) was one of the UK's first university qualified female doctors. She was one of 16 female doctors who served with the Royal Army Medical Corps in the First World War, and served as the Medical Officer of Health (MOH) for Cambridgeshire for most of her life.

The concept of a female Doctor was first mentioned in 1981, when Tom Baker suggested his successor might be female, after announcing the end of his tenure as the Fourth Doctor. Producer John Nathan-Turner later discussed the possibility of casting a woman as the Sixth Doctor to replace the departing Peter Davison's Fifth Doctor, claiming it was feasible but not something he was considering at the moment. In October 1986, during the transmission of Colin Baker's final season as the Sixth Doctor, series creator Sydney Newman wrote to BBC Controller Michael Grade, with a suggestion that "at a later stage Doctor Who should be metamorphosed into a woman". Dawn French, Joanna Lumley, and Frances de la Tour were suggested by Newman in 1986 for the role, but were dismissed by the BBC. Lumley later appeared as a satirical version of the Thirteenth Doctor in the 1999 Comic Relief special "The Curse of Fatal Death". Arabella Weir also played an alternate Third Doctor in the "Doctor Who Unbound" Big Finish episode "Exile". Neither portrayal is typically considered to be within the show's main continuity. Producer Jane Tranter also considered casting Judi Dench as the Ninth Doctor. Helen Mirren was suggested for the role of the Twelfth Doctor.

Emily Winifred Dickson (13 July 1866 – 19 January 1944) was an Irish doctor who was the first female Fellow of the Royal College of Surgeons in Ireland. She was also the first female Fellow of any of the Royal Colleges of Surgery in Great Britain and Ireland.

Smedley's "History of the Underground Railroad" cites Dr. Bartholomew Fussell with proposing, in 1846, the idea for a college that would train female doctors. It was a tribute to his departed sister, who Bartholomew felt could have been a doctor if women had been given the opportunity at that time. Her daughter, Graceanna Lewis, was to become one of the first woman scientists in the USA. At his house. The Pines, in Kennett Square, Pennsylvania, he invited five doctors to carry out his idea. The doctors invited were: Edwin Fussell (Bartholomew's nephew) M.D., Franklin Taylor, M.D., Ellwood Harvey, M.D., Sylvester Birdsall, M.D., and Dr. Ezra Michener. Graceanna was also in attendance. Dr. Fussell would support the college, but had little to do with it after it started in 1850 in Philadelphia.

Sofia Okunevska (Ukr. Софія Окуневська-Морачевська, Ger. Dr.in Sofia Okunewska-Moraczewska, 12 May 1865, Dovzhanka, Ternopil region, Austrian Empire – 24 February 1926, Lviv, Poland (today Ukraine)) was the first woman who graduated from university and became a doctor in Austria-Hungary, the first Ukrainian female doctor. Okunevska was a public activist and an important figure in feminist movement in Galicia and Austria-Hungary. She also debuted in literature - in the first women's almanac "First Wreath" she published a story about urban life "Sand. Sand! ", as well as work "Family bondage in songs and wedding ceremonies ". Last years she spent in Lviv, where she led a small medical practice. Okunevska died at the hospital for purulent appendicitis. Buried on Lychakiv Cemetery in Lviv

She approached the Alfred Wegener Institute for Polar and Marine Research (AWI) in 1984, wanting to join a German overwintering team to the Antarctic. This goal was achieved in 1989. Puskeppeleit was the first German female doctor to overwinter at the Georg-von-Neumayer Station at Atka Bay (Eckström Shelfeis), Antarctica, during 1989-1991. During this time she was also a member and team leader of the world first female-only team to overwinter in Antarctica. As the first German female station leader, overwintering physician and ship`s doctor onboard SA Agulhas S. A. Agulhas Puskeppeleit substantially contributed to changing the perception of women during the time when Antarctica was a male dominated research area. In 2017 she founded the DocShip International e.V. which should act as an interactive international platform for ship`s doctor. During her overwintering, Puskeppeleit initiated the first polar- and biomedical research at the German Antarctic overwinter station. She started the “UV–B radiation related biological climate change research project” in cooperation with the German Institute for Aero and Space Medicine (DLR). Other pilot-projects like “testing of wind energy plants as an alternative energy source in the Antarctic” or the “Establishment of an alternative waste disposal system at the German Antarctic station” had been also carried out successfully by the female overwintering team. In 1990 as a contemporary witness, Puskeppeleit made in her function as station leader together with the all-female team a unique sociopolitical contribution to the East-West German reunification on the ice. Through regular contact by radio to the former DDR station Georg Forster (70° 46′ S, 11 50 E) for the first time it was possible to information exchange concerning polar research issues. But also in social interaction the all - female team was able to support their East - German overwintering colleagues by German “bridge building” on the ice.

Claudia Potter (1881–1970) was the first female anesthesiologist in the United States, as well as the first physician in Texas to use gas anesthesia. She graduated from the University of Texas Medical Branch in 1904. She then did postgraduate work at the Mayo Clinic, served an internship at John Sealy Hospital in Galveston, and entered general practice with another female doctor in San Antonio. In 1906, she was hired by the Temple Sanitarium (later Scott and White Memorial Hospital) as the head of the Department of Anesthesiology, although after hearing of her hiring Dr. Raleigh White wrote to his partner Dr. A.C. Scott, "I will be home soon, for I know you have lost your mind if you have employed a woman doctor."

Dr. Bhakti Yadav (3 April 1926 – 14 August 2017) was an Indian doctor who was the first female MBBS from Indore, India and she was recognised by being awarded one of India's highest civilian honors, Padma Shri. She was known for her generosity, including offering free treatment since 1948. She was a gynaecologist.

Women's rights, in the early 1900s, opened the doors of opportunity for the women of Puerto Rico making it possible for them to work in positions and professions which were traditionally occupied by men, including the medical profession. The first female medical practitioners in the island were Drs. María Elisa Rivera Díaz and Ana Janer who established their practices in 1909 and Dr. Palmira Gatell who established her practice in 1910. Ana Janer and María Elisa Rivera Díaz graduated in the same medical school class in 1909 and thus could both be considered the first female Puerto Rican physicians. Drs. María Elisa Rivera Díaz, Ana Janer and Palmira Gatell were followed by Dr. Dolores Mercedes Piñero, who earned her medical degree from the College of Physicians and Surgeons in Boston in 1913. She was the first Puerto Rican female doctor to serve under contract in the U.S. Army during World War I. During the war, Piñero helped establish a hospital in Puerto Rico which took care of the soldiers who had contracted the swine flu.
question_src: Daktari wa kwanza wa kike ni nani?
pos_context_src: Elizabeth Blackwell (Februari 3, 1821 - Mei 31, 1910) alikuwa daktari wa Uingereza, mashuhuri kama mwanamke wa kwanza kupokea digrii ya matibabu huko Merika, na mwanamke wa kwanza kwenye Jalada la Matibabu la Baraza Kuu la Matibabu. Elizabeth Blackwell alichukua jukumu muhimu katika Merika na Uingereza kama mrekebishaji wa kijamii na maadili. Alifanya kama painia katika kukuza elimu ya wanawake katika dawa. Mchango wa Elizabeth Blackwell unabaki kusherehekea kupitia medali ya Elizabeth Blackwell ambayo hupewa mwanamke mmoja kila mwaka ambaye ameongeza kwa sababu ya kukuza wanawake katika dawa. Kwa kuongezea, Hobart na Chuo cha William Smith hivi karibuni waliunda sanamu kwenye chuo kikuu cha kumheshimu Elizabeth Blackwell.
neg_context_title_src: Chuo cha Matibabu cha Mwanamke cha Pennsylvania
Historia ya Wanawake huko Puerto Rico
neg_context_src: Dk Fanny Jane Butler (5 Oktoba 1850 - 26 Oktoba 1889) alikuwa mmishonari wa matibabu kutoka England ambaye alikuwa mmoja wa madaktari wa kwanza wa kike kusafiri kwenda India na daktari wa kwanza aliyefundishwa kikamilifu kutoka Uingereza kufanya hivyo. Kabla ya kazi yake huko Kashmir na sehemu zingine za India, Butler alikuwa sehemu ya darasa la kwanza la Shule ya Tiba ya London kwa Wanawake, na kuwa mwanachama wa mbele ya madaktari wa kike. Butler alitumia miaka saba nchini India hadi kifo chake mnamo 1889 na kufungua mawakili wa matibabu huko Srinagar na Bhagalpur, ambapo hakuna vifaa vya matibabu ambavyo hapo awali vilikuwepo. Butler pia alianzisha ujenzi wa hospitali ya kwanza huko Srinagar mnamo 1888 aliita Hospitali ya Memorial ya John Askofu na kutoa huduma muhimu za matibabu kwa wanawake wa India, ambao utunzaji mdogo ulikuwa unapatikana.

Jessie Handyside Gellatly (7 Desemba 1882 - 30 Juni 1935) alikuwa mmoja wa madaktari wa kike wa kwanza wa chuo kikuu waliohitimu. Alikuwa mmoja wa madaktari 16 wa kike ambao walihudumu na Royal Jeshi Medical Corps katika Vita vya Kwanza vya Ulimwengu, na aliwahi kuwa Afisa wa Afya wa Matibabu (MOH) kwa Cambridgeshire kwa maisha yake yote.

Wazo la daktari wa kike lilitajwa kwa mara ya kwanza mnamo 1981, wakati Tom Baker alipendekeza mrithi wake anaweza kuwa wa kike, baada ya kutangaza mwisho wa umiliki wake kama daktari wa nne. Mtayarishaji John Nathan-Turner baadaye alijadili uwezekano wa kumtupa mwanamke kama daktari wa sita kuchukua nafasi ya daktari wa tano wa Peter Davison, akidai ilikuwa inawezekana lakini sio kitu ambacho alikuwa akizingatia kwa sasa. Mnamo Oktoba 1986, wakati wa maambukizi ya msimu wa mwisho wa Colin Baker kama Daktari wa Sita, muundaji wa mfululizo Sydney Newman alimwandikia Daraja la BBC Michael Daraja, na maoni kwamba "katika hatua ya baadaye Daktari ambaye anapaswa kuwa Metamorphosed kuwa mwanamke". Dawn French, Joanna Lumley, na Frances de la Tour walipendekezwa na Newman mnamo 1986 kwa jukumu hilo, lakini walitupiliwa mbali na BBC. Baadaye Lumley alionekana kama toleo la kitabia la Daktari wa kumi na tatu katika Jumuiya ya Msaada wa Comic ya 1999 "Laana ya Kifo cha Fatal". Arabella Weir pia alicheza Daktari Mbadala wa tatu katika "Daktari Ambaye Unbound" Episode Kubwa "Exile". Wala kuonyesha kawaida huchukuliwa kuwa ndani ya mwendelezo kuu wa onyesho. Mtayarishaji Jane Tranter pia alizingatia kumtoa Judi Dench kama Daktari wa Tisa. Helen Mirren alipendekezwa kwa jukumu la daktari wa kumi na mbili.

Emily Winifred Dickson (13 Julai 1866 - 19 Januari 1944) alikuwa daktari wa Ireland ambaye alikuwa mwanafunzi wa kwanza wa Chuo cha Royal of Surgeons huko Ireland. Alikuwa pia rafiki wa kwanza wa kike wa vyuo vyovyote vya kifalme vya upasuaji huko Great Britain na Ireland.

"Historia ya reli ya chini ya ardhi" ya Smedley inataja Dk. Bartholomew Fussell na kupendekeza, mnamo 1846, wazo la chuo kikuu ambacho kingefundisha madaktari wa kike. Ilikuwa zawadi kwa dada yake aliyeondoka, ambaye Bartholomew alihisi angekuwa daktari ikiwa wanawake wangepewa fursa wakati huo. Binti yake, Graceanna Lewis, alikuwa mmoja wa wanasayansi wa kwanza wa wanawake huko USA. Nyumbani kwake. Pines, huko Kennett Square, Pennsylvania, aliwaalika madaktari watano kutekeleza wazo lake. Madaktari walioalikwa walikuwa: Edwin Fussell (mpwa wa Bartholomew) M.D., Franklin Taylor, M.D., Ellwood Harvey, M.D., Sylvester birdsall, M.D., na Dk Ezra Michener. Graceanna pia alikuwa akihudhuria. Dk. Fussell angeunga mkono chuo hicho, lakini alikuwa na uhusiano wowote nayo baada ya kuanza mnamo 1850 huko Philadelphia.

Sofia okunevska (Ukr. kutoka chuo kikuu na kuwa daktari huko Austria-Hungary, daktari wa kwanza wa kike wa Kiukreni. Okunevska alikuwa mwanaharakati wa umma na mtu muhimu katika harakati za wanawake huko Galicia na Austria-Hungary. Alijadiliwa pia katika fasihi - katika Almanac ya kwanza ya Wanawake "Wreath ya Kwanza" alichapisha hadithi kuhusu maisha ya mijini "mchanga. Mchanga!", Na pia kazi "utumwa wa familia katika nyimbo na sherehe za harusi". Miaka iliyopita alikaa huko LVIV, ambapo aliongoza mazoezi madogo ya matibabu. Okunevska alikufa hospitalini kwa purulent appendicitis. Kuzikwa kwenye Makaburi ya Lychakiv huko Lviv

Alikaribia Taasisi ya Alfred Wegener ya Utafiti wa Polar na Majini (AWI) mnamo 1984, akitaka kujiunga na timu ya Ujerumani inayozidi kwenda Antarctic. Lengo hili lilipatikana mnamo 1989. Puskeppeleit alikuwa daktari wa kwanza wa kike wa Ujerumani kupita katika kituo cha Georgia-von-Neumayer huko Atka Bay (Eckström Shelfeis), Antarctica, wakati wa 1989-1991. Wakati huu alikuwa pia mwanachama na kiongozi wa timu ya timu ya kwanza ya kike ya kike ili kuzidi huko Antarctica. Kama kiongozi wa kwanza wa kituo cha kike cha Ujerumani, daktari anayemzidisha na daktari wa meli kwenye bodi ya Agulhas S. A. Agulhas Puskeppeleit alichangia sana kubadilisha maoni ya wanawake wakati huo wakati Antarctica ilikuwa eneo la utafiti la kiume. Mnamo mwaka wa 2017 alianzisha Docship International E.V. ambayo inapaswa kufanya kama jukwaa la kimataifa la maingiliano la daktari wa meli. Wakati wa kupindukia kwake, Puskeppeleit alianzisha utafiti wa kwanza wa polar- na biomedical katika kituo cha Ujerumani cha Antarctic. Alianza mradi wa utafiti wa "UV -B unaohusiana na mionzi ya kibaolojia" kwa kushirikiana na Taasisi ya Ujerumani ya Aero na Tiba ya Nafasi (DLR). Miradi mingine ya majaribio kama "upimaji wa mimea ya nishati ya upepo kama chanzo mbadala cha nishati katika Antarctic" au "uanzishwaji wa mfumo mbadala wa utupaji taka katika kituo cha Antarctic cha Ujerumani" pia ilifanywa kwa mafanikio na timu ya kike inayozidi. Mnamo 1990 kama shahidi wa kisasa, Puskeppeleit alifanya kazi yake kama kiongozi wa kituo pamoja na timu ya wanawake wote ni mchango wa kipekee wa kijamii katika kuungana tena kwa Ujerumani Mashariki kwenye barafu. Kupitia mawasiliano ya kawaida na redio kwa kituo cha zamani cha DDR Georgia Forster (70 ° 46 ′ S, 11 50 E) kwa mara ya kwanza iliwezekana kubadilishana habari kuhusu maswala ya utafiti wa polar. Lakini pia katika maingiliano ya kijamii, timu ya kike iliweza kusaidia wenzao wa Mashariki - Wajerumani wanaopindukia na "jengo la daraja" la Ujerumani kwenye barafu.

Claudia Potter (1881-1970) alikuwa daktari wa kwanza wa kike huko Merika, na pia daktari wa kwanza huko Texas kutumia anesthesia ya gesi. Alihitimu kutoka Chuo Kikuu cha Tawi la Matibabu la Texas mnamo 1904. Kisha alifanya kazi ya kuhitimu katika Kliniki ya Mayo, alihudumia mazoezi katika Hospitali ya John Sealy huko Galveston, na akaingia mazoezi ya jumla na daktari mwingine wa kike huko San Antonio. Mnamo 1906, aliajiriwa na Sanitarium ya Hekalu (baadaye Hospitali ya Scott na White Memorial) kama mkuu wa Idara ya Anesthesiology, ingawa baada ya kusikia juu ya kuajiri Dk Raleigh White alimwandikia mwenzi wake Dk.

Dk. Bhakti Yadav (3 Aprili 1926 - 14 Agosti 2017) alikuwa daktari wa India ambaye alikuwa MBB wa kwanza kutoka Indore, India na alitambuliwa kwa kukabidhiwa mmoja wa heshima za juu zaidi za raia wa India, Padma Shri. Alijulikana kwa ukarimu wake, pamoja na kutoa matibabu ya bure tangu 1948. Alikuwa daktari wa watoto.

Haki za wanawake, mwanzoni mwa miaka ya 1900, zilifungua milango ya fursa kwa wanawake wa Puerto Rico na kuifanya iweze kufanya kazi katika nafasi na fani ambazo kwa jadi zilichukuliwa na wanaume, pamoja na taaluma ya matibabu. Wataalam wa kwanza wa matibabu ya kike katika kisiwa hicho walikuwa Drs. María Elisa Rivera Díaz na Ana Janer ambao walianzisha mazoea yao mnamo 1909 na Dk. Palmira Gatell ambao walianzisha mazoezi yake mnamo 1910. Ana Janer na María Elisa Rivera Díaz walihitimu katika darasa moja la shule ya matibabu mnamo 1909 na kwa hivyo wote wanaweza kuzingatiwa waganga wa kwanza wa kike wa Puerto Rican. Drs. María Elisa Rivera Díaz, Ana Janer na Palmira Gatell walifuatiwa na Dk. Dolores Mercedes Piñero, ambaye alipata digrii yake ya matibabu kutoka kwa Chuo cha Waganga na Madaktari wa upasuaji huko Boston mnamo 1913. Alikuwa daktari wa kwanza wa Puerto Rican aliyomuhudumia Assopiers Atseal Adged Adgen Atsed Adgen Adgen Adgen Adgen Am Am ​​A SANIIC AND AM SOSORE ADEET AMERE AMOET AMERO AMERO AMERO AMERO A COREIC AMBIER AMEOST AMEOST ADEET ADEET ADEET ADEET ADEET ADEET ADEET ADEET ADEET ADEET ADEET ADEET ADEET ADEET ADEC ambaye alikuwa amepata homa ya nguruwe.
report_src: Daktari wa kwanza wa kike anayetambuliwa kihistoria ni Elizabeth Blackwell, aliyezaliwa tarehe 3 Februari 1821 na kufariki 31 Mei 1910; ndiye mwanamke wa kwanza kupokea digrii ya udaktari nchini Marekani na pia mwanamke wa kwanza kusajiliwa katika Jalada la Matibabu la Baraza Kuu la Matibabu la Uingereza [1]. Blackwell alichangia pakubwa katika mageuzi ya kijamii na maadili, akianzisha harakati za kukuza elimu ya wanawake katika taaluma ya tiba, na mchango wake unaenziwa kila mwaka kupitia “Medali ya Elizabeth Blackwell” inayotolewa kwa mwanamke aliyeboresha nafasi ya wanawake katika dawa [1].

question_en: How did Iain Norman Macleod die?
pos_context_en: On 20 June 1970, two days after the Conservative Party's unexpected election victory, Macleod was appointed Chancellor of the Exchequer by the new Prime Minister, Heath. Despite being in pain, he made his one and only major speech on the economy as chancellor on 7 July 1970. In the speech Macleod bemoaned the high level of inflation and, at the same time, the highest level of unemployment since 1940. Later that day he was rushed to hospital with what was thought at first to be appendicitis, but was in fact a Pelvic Diverticulum. He was discharged 11 days later; yet at 10.30 pm on 20 July, while in 11 Downing Street, he suffered a massive heart attack and died at 11.35 pm.
neg_context_title_en: Evelyn Macleod, Baroness Macleod of Borve
neg_context_en: Iain Norman Macleod (11 November 1913 – 20 July 1970) was a British Conservative Party politician and government minister.

Iain Macleod was born at Clifford House, Skipton, Yorkshire, on 11 November 1913. His father, Dr. Norman Alexander Macleod, was a well-respected general practitioner in Skipton, with a substantial poor-law practice (providing medical services for those who could not afford to pay); the young Macleod would often accompany his father on his rounds. His parents were from the Isle of Lewis in the Western Isles of Scotland, belonging to the branch of the Macleods of Pabbay and Uig. They moved to Skipton in 1907. Macleod grew up with strong personal and cultural ties to Scotland, as his parents bought in 1917 part of the Leverhulme estate on the Isle of Lewis, where they often used to stay for family holidays.

Suez alienated academics, journalists and other opinion-formers from the Conservative Party. William Rees-Mogg, then a Conservative candidate in the North-East, made a speech urging that Macleod be party leader. David Astor of "The Observer", who on 4 November had attacked Eden for "crookedness" in an editorial, wrote to Macleod on 14 November, urging him as a younger minister to seize the party leadership so that collusion could be pinned on Eden and Lloyd, after Edward Boyle had told him that he was not interested and that Monckton was not up to it. Macleod did not reply but showed the letter to Freddie Bishop, head of the Prime Minister's Private Office, and Cabinet Secretary Norman Brook for their comments; Eden, who was on the verge of a breakdown, did not regard the matter as important. On 20 November 1956 the question of collusion was raised in Cabinet, with Eden and Lloyd (who was in New York at a United Nations meeting) both absent; Shepherd believes that it was probably Macleod who raised it. The Cabinet agreed to stick to Lloyd's formula that Britain had not "incited" the Israeli attack on Egypt.

On 3 July 1937, she married Mervyn Charles Mason (1907–1940), second son of Alwyne Mason of Foxley Manor, near Malmesbury, Wiltshire. During World War II, she worked for the London ambulance service and her husband was a Lieutenant in the Pioneer Corps. In 1940, he was killed after his ship was torpedoed off the coast of Ireland and she later married the future politician, Iain Norman Macleod, a member of the branch of the Macleods of Pabbay and Uig.

Iain Ciar MacLeod (Scottish Gaelic: Iain Ciar MacLeòid) (1330 – "c."1392) is considered to be fourth chief of Clan MacLeod. He was the eldest son of, and is thought to have succeeded his father, Malcolm, in the years spanning 1360–1370. Clan tradition states that he was the most tyrannical of all MacLeod chiefs. His wife supposedly was as cruel as he was; she is said to have had two of her daughters buried alive in the dungeon of Dunvegan Castle when they attempted to leave the clan. Iain Ciar was killed in an ambush in about 1392. He was succeeded by his second and only surviving son, William Cleireach.

Iain Borb was the son, and successor of William Cleireach, fifth chief of Clan MacLeod. According to the "Bannatyne manuscript", he was only ten years old at the time of his father's death. The manuscript relates how during his minority a guardian was chosen to lead the clan. This man's name was Iain Mishealbhach ('John the Unlucky') who was a cousin of the young Iain Borb. During Iain Mishealbhach's tenure as guardian, the MacLeods of Harris and Dunvegan were at their lowest point in their history. Many of the clan opposed the selection of Iain Mishealbhach, favouring instead Tormod Coil who slew Alastair Cannoch at the Battle of Sligachan. Tormod Coil defied the guardian and seized part of the lands of Glenelg.

Macleod did not contest the first ever Conservative Party leadership election in 1965, but endorsed the eventual winner Edward Heath. When the Conservatives returned to power in June 1970, he was appointed Chancellor of the Exchequer in Heath's government, but died suddenly only a month later.

Macleod was the elder brother of professor Anna MacGillivray Macleod; his younger brother was Dr. Alasdair MacGillivray Macleod, a general practitioner in Linlithgow. He was the son of Rev. Alasdair MacGillivray Macleod and Margaret Ingram Sangster, M.A. and the grandson of Rev. George Macleod of Garrabost, Isle of Lewis. He was second cousin to the Right Hon. Iain Norman Macleod, who served as Chancellor of the Exchequer in 1970. They belong to the branch of the Macleods of Pabbay and Uig.

Norman MacLeod was the younger son of Norman MacLeod, chief of Clan MacLeod. The elder Norman MacLeod died in 1706, leaving two young sons. The elder son, John, died in infancy in 1707. MacLeod was the Member of Parliament for Inverness-shire during the years 1741-1754. He matriculated arms, and supporters, at Lyon Office, on 12 January 1753. He supported the Government cause in the Jacobite Rising, and was an absentee chief as he seldom lived at his ancestors' traditional seat of Dunvegan Castle.

On 25 August, the day after Monckton's "outburst" expressing doubts at the Egypt Committee, Cabinet Secretary Norman Brook sent a note to Eden listing Macleod as among those Cabinet members (the others being Butler, Monckton, Heathcoat Amory, the Earl of Selkirk, Kilmuir and Heath who, as Chief Whip, attended Cabinet but was not technically a full member) who would want to postpone military action until all other options had been exhausted or until Nasser provided them with a better pretext, whichever came first. There were three unknowns and ten hawks—a narrow Cabinet majority in favour of military action.
question_src: Je! Iain Norman MacLeod alikufaje?
pos_context_src: Mnamo Juni 20, 1970, siku mbili baada ya ushindi wa uchaguzi usiotarajiwa wa Chama cha Conservative, MacLeod aliteuliwa Chansela wa Exchequer na Waziri Mkuu mpya, Heath. Licha ya kuwa na maumivu, alifanya hotuba yake kuu na tu juu ya uchumi kama Chancellor mnamo 7 Julai 1970. Katika hotuba MacLeod aliomboleza kiwango cha juu cha mfumko na, wakati huo huo, kiwango cha juu cha ukosefu wa ajira tangu 1940. Baadaye siku hiyo alikimbizwa hospitalini na kile kilichofikiriwa mwanzoni kuwa appendicitis, lakini kwa kweli alikuwa na nguvu. Aliondolewa siku 11 baadaye; Walakini saa 10:30 jioni mnamo Julai 20, wakati alikuwa katika Mtaa 11 wa Downing, alipata mshtuko mkubwa wa moyo na akafa saa 11.35 jioni.
neg_context_title_src: Evelyn MacLeod, Baroness MacLeod wa Borve
neg_context_src: Iain Norman MacLeod (11 Novemba 1913 - 20 Julai 1970) alikuwa mwanasiasa wa Chama cha Conservative na Waziri wa Serikali.

Iain MacLeod alizaliwa huko Clifford House, Skipton, Yorkshire, mnamo 11 Novemba 1913. Baba yake, Dk. Norman Alexander MacLeod, alikuwa mtaalamu anayeheshimiwa sana huko Skipton, na mazoezi ya sheria duni (kutoa huduma za matibabu kwa wale ambao hawakuweza kulipa); MacLeod mchanga mara nyingi angeandamana na baba yake kwenye raundi zake. Wazazi wake walikuwa kutoka Kisiwa cha Lewis katika Visiwa vya Magharibi mwa Scotland, mali ya tawi la MacLeods ya Pabbay na Uig. Walihamia Skipton mnamo 1907. MacLeod alikua na uhusiano mkubwa wa kibinafsi na kitamaduni huko Scotland, kama wazazi wake walinunua mnamo 1917 sehemu ya mali ya Leverhulme kwenye Kisiwa cha Lewis, ambapo mara nyingi walikuwa wakikaa likizo ya familia.

Wasomi waliotengwa wa Suez, waandishi wa habari na waandishi wengine wa maoni kutoka Chama cha Conservative. William Rees-Mogg, ambaye alikuwa mgombea wa kihafidhina huko Kaskazini-Mashariki, alifanya hotuba akihimiza kwamba MacLeod awe kiongozi wa chama. David Astor wa "The Observer", ambaye mnamo Novemba 4 alikuwa ameshambulia Edeni kwa "Crookedness" katika hariri, aliandika kwa MacLeod mnamo Novemba 14, akimsihi kama waziri mdogo kumtia uongozi wa chama hicho ili ujumuishaji uweze kuorodheshwa Edeni na Lloyd, baada ya Edward Boyle kumwambia kwamba hakuvutiwa na kwamba Monckton hakufanya hivyo. MacLeod hakujibu lakini alionyesha barua hiyo kwa Askofu wa Freddie, mkuu wa ofisi ya Waziri Mkuu, na Katibu wa Baraza la Mawaziri Norman Brook kwa maoni yao; Edeni, ambaye alikuwa karibu na kuvunjika, hakuona jambo hilo kama muhimu. Mnamo tarehe 20 Novemba 1956 swali la ujumuishaji liliongezwa katika baraza la mawaziri, na Edeni na Lloyd (ambaye alikuwa New York kwenye mkutano wa Umoja wa Mataifa) hawakuwepo; Mchungaji anaamini kwamba labda alikuwa MacLeod aliyeinua. Baraza la mawaziri lilikubali kushikamana na formula ya Lloyd kwamba Uingereza haikuwa "ilichochea" shambulio la Israeli huko Misri.

Mnamo 3 Julai 1937, alifunga ndoa na Mervyn Charles Mason (1907-1940), mtoto wa pili wa Alwyne Mason wa Foxley Manor, karibu na Malmesbury, Wiltshire. Wakati wa Vita vya Kidunia vya pili, alifanya kazi kwa Huduma ya Ambulensi ya London na mumewe alikuwa mjumbe katika Pioneer Corps. Mnamo 1940, aliuawa baada ya meli yake kutengwa pwani ya Ireland na baadaye alioa mwanasiasa wa baadaye, Iain Norman MacLeod, mwanachama wa tawi la MacLeods la Pabbay na Uig.

Iain Ciar MacLeod (Scottish Gaelic: Iain Ciar Macleòid) (1330 - "c." 1392) inachukuliwa kuwa mkuu wa nne wa Clan MacLeod. Alikuwa mtoto wa kwanza wa, na anafikiriwa kufanikiwa baba yake, Malcolm, katika miaka iliyochukua 1360-1370. Tamaduni ya ukoo inasema kwamba alikuwa mnyanyasaji zaidi wa wakuu wote wa MacLeod. Mkewe alidhani alikuwa mkatili kama yeye; Anasemekana alikuwa na binti zake wawili waliozikwa wakiwa hai kwenye shimo la Dunvegan Castle wakati walijaribu kuacha ukoo. Iain Ciar aliuawa katika shambulio mnamo 1392. Alifanikiwa na mtoto wake wa pili na wa pekee, William Cleireach.

Iain Borb alikuwa mtoto, na mrithi wa William Cleireach, mkuu wa tano wa Clan MacLeod. Kulingana na "Bannatyne Manuscript", alikuwa na umri wa miaka kumi tu wakati wa kifo cha baba yake. Nakala hiyo inaelezea jinsi wakati wa mdogo wake mlezi alichaguliwa kuongoza ukoo. Jina la mtu huyu lilikuwa Iain Mishealbhach ('John the Unlucky') ambaye alikuwa binamu wa Iain Borb mchanga. Wakati wa umiliki wa Iain Mishealbhach kama mlezi, MacLeods ya Harris na Dunvegan walikuwa katika hatua yao ya chini katika historia yao. Wengi wa ukoo huo walipinga uteuzi wa Iain Mishealbhach, badala ya Tormod Coil ambaye alimuua Alastair Cannoch kwenye Vita vya Sligachan. Tormod Coil alimdharau mlezi na akachukua sehemu ya ardhi ya Glenelg.

MacLeod hakugombea uchaguzi wa kwanza wa Uongozi wa Chama cha Conservative mnamo 1965, lakini alikubali mshindi wa mwisho Edward Heath. Wakati Conservatives waliporudi madarakani mnamo Juni 1970, aliteuliwa Chancellor wa Exchequer katika serikali ya Heath, lakini alikufa ghafla mwezi mmoja baadaye.

MacLeod alikuwa kaka mkubwa wa Profesa Anna MacGillivray MacLeod; Ndugu yake mdogo alikuwa Dk Alasdair MacGillivray MacLeod, mtaalamu wa jumla huko Linlithgow. Alikuwa mtoto wa Mchungaji Alasdair MacGillivray MacLeod na Margaret Ingram Sangster, M.A. na mjukuu wa Mchungaji George MacLeod wa Garrabost, Isle of Lewis. Alikuwa binamu wa pili kwa haki Mhe. Iain Norman MacLeod, ambaye aliwahi kuwa kansela wa Exchequer mnamo 1970. Wao ni wa tawi la MacLeods ya Pabbay na Uig.

Norman MacLeod alikuwa mtoto mdogo wa Norman MacLeod, mkuu wa Clan MacLeod. Mzee Norman MacLeod alikufa mnamo 1706, akiwaacha watoto wachanga wawili. Mwana mzee, John, alikufa akiwa mchanga mnamo 1707. MacLeod alikuwa mwanachama wa Bunge la Inverness-shire wakati wa miaka 1741-1754. Aliweka mikono, na wafuasi, katika ofisi ya Lyon, mnamo tarehe 12 Januari 1753. Aliunga mkono sababu ya serikali katika kuongezeka kwa Jacobite, na alikuwa mkuu wa kutokuwepo wakati yeye mara chache alikuwa akiishi katika kiti cha jadi cha mababu wake wa Dunvegan Castle.

Mnamo tarehe 25 Agosti, siku moja baada ya Monckton "Outburst" kuelezea mashaka katika Kamati ya Misri, Katibu wa Baraza la Mawaziri Norman Brook alituma barua kwa Edeni akiorodhesha MacLeod kama miongoni mwa washiriki wa baraza la mawaziri (wengine wakiwa Butler, Monckton, Heathcoat Amory, Earl wa Selkirk, Kilmuir na Heath ambao, kama wakuu wa mawaziri, washirika hawakuweza kuhudhuria mawaziri lakini washirika wa mawaziri, washirika wakuu wa mawaziri walipomhudumia mawaziri wakuu wa baraza la mawaziri. Umechoka au mpaka Nasser aliwapa kisingizio bora, kwa kila mtu aliyekuja kwanza. Kulikuwa na haijulikani tatu na Hawks kumi - baraza la mawaziri nyembamba kwa niaba ya hatua za kijeshi.
report_src: Iain Norman MacLeod alifariki usiku wa 20 Julai 1970 baada ya kupata mshtuko mkubwa wa moyo akiwa katika makaazi rasmi ya Waziri wa Fedha, namba 11 Downing Street, saa 10:30 jioni; alithibitishwa kufa saa 11:35 jioni siku hiyo hiyo [1].
