question_en: How fast is the fastest firing machine gun?
pos_context_en: This is the mechanical rate of fire, or how fast the weapon "cycles" (loads, locks, fires, unlocks, ejects). Measurement of the cyclic rate assumes that the weapon is being operated as fast as possible and does not consider operator tasks (magazine changes, aiming, etc.). When the trigger is pulled, the rate at which rounds are fired is the cyclic rate. Typical cyclic rates of fire are 600–900 RPM for assault rifles, 1,000-1,100 RPM in some cases, 900-1,200 RPM for submachine guns and machine pistols, and 600-1,500 RPM for machine guns. M134 Miniguns mounted on attack helicopters and other combat vehicles can achieve rates of fire of over 100 rounds per second (6,000 RPM). Cyclic rate of fire is the only rate that can be determined precisely.
neg_context_title_en: Institutions in the Southern Victory Series
neg_context_en: Fast draw is one of the fastest sports in the world. Every time is measured under one second, from the signal to draw to when the timer is stopped. The current World Fast Draw Association (WFDA) record for Open Class Fast Draw in an event called Standing Balloons is .208 seconds - and that includes the time it takes to react, draw, fire and pop a balloon target at eight feet away. A world class competitor can draw and fire a shot in under half a second. Given that the average human reaction time is around 0.2 to 0.25 seconds, the round is over before most people can react. The reaction times of the best fast draw shooters is 0.145 seconds, which means that the gun is cocked, drawn, aimed (from the hip), and fired in just over 0.06 seconds. To establish a World Fast Draw Association record, a second shot must be fired in the same competition that is no more than 0.30 seconds slower than the first; this is intended to prevent a shot that anticipates the start signal from setting a record. In competitions where two rounds must be fired, at separate targets, less than 0.10 seconds separate the shots.

The Second Great War also saw in use machine guns that closely resemble our timeline's equipment. The Confederate machine gun described as firing so fast it sounded like "a giant tearing a sail in half", most definitely points towards the "Maschinengewehr 42". The USA appears to have been using .30 caliber air-cooled machine guns resembling the M1919 Browning machine gun. It is also stated that the USA and CSA are equipped with similar .50 caliber pieces that in our timeline can only be the Browning M2. This is odd in that this timeline's John Browning was a Mormon born in Ogden, Utah.

The ShKAS was the fastest-firing rifle calibre aircraft armament in general service in World War II. A one-second burst from the four ShKAS of a Polikarpov I-153 or Polikarpov I-16 placed 120 bullets within 15 angular mils at 400 meters (1,312 feet) giving a firing density of 5 bullets per square meter of the sky. Moreover, the ShKAS was unusually light as well; the four guns, with 650 rounds of ammunition each, weighed a total of only 160 kg (350 lb).
ShKAS wasn't problem-free though. Soviet machine-gun technician Viktor M. Sinaisky recalled:Although chambered in the 7.62×54mmR, the ShKAS guns used cartridges specially built for them to smaller tolerances; to distinguish them from the regular 7.62 ammunition, the Cyrillic letter "Sh" (Ш) was imprinted on the bottom of the cases. The cases, designed by N. M. Elizarov, also had a few additional features like double crimping and a thicker case wall of "bimetallic" construction instead of the traditional brass. The main type of bullet used was armour-piercing incendiary B-32 bullet.Some military historians consider that feed system of the Mauser MG 213C (the seminal revolver cannon for Western designs) was inspired by the ShKAS.

The exhibition shooter Bob Munden (1942-2012), self-proclaimed as the "fastest man with a gun ever", could draw, fire, break a balloon target with a blank using a standard weight single-action revolver and return his gun to his holster in the blink of an eye. On the DVD "Outrageous Shooting," Munden was filmed shooting .16 of a second in an event called Walk and Draw Level.

During World War II, the MG 34 was superseded by a new GPMG, the MG 42, although it remained in combat use. The MG 42 was more efficient to manufacture, more robust, and had an extremely high cyclic rate of fire of 1,200 to 1,500 rounds per minute. One of the "Einheitsmaschinengewehr" (Universal machine gun) roles was to provide low level anti-aircraft coverage. A high cyclic rate of fire is advantageous for use against targets that are exposed to a general-purpose machine gun for a limited time span, like aircraft or targets that minimize their exposure time by quickly moving from cover to cover. For targets that can be fired on by a general-purpose machine gun for longer periods than just a few seconds the cyclic firing rate becomes less important. Arguably the finest all-round GPMG ever produced, it was nicknamed "Hitler's buzzsaw" by troops of Allies, and alongside the MG 34 it inflicted heavy casualties on Allied soldiers on all European and North African front of World War II. Following the end of the war the victorious Allied nations took interest in the MG 34 and MG 42, influencing many post-war general-purpose machine guns, many of which are still in use today. They lent design elements to the Belgian FN MAG and the American M60, while spawning the Zastava M53, Swiss M51, and Austrian MG 74. Such were its qualities of firepower and usability that it became the foundation of an entire series of postwar machine guns, including the MG 1 and MG 3 - the latter is still in production and service to this day.

Harold finds out that the "fast gun" is in the church. He sends Swope there to call him out. When the townspeople refuse to send out "the man who shot two silver dollars at the same time", Harold gives an order to Dink to find some kerosene and pour it everywhere. He then instructs Swope to deliver a message to the people in the church that if their fast gun does not come out in five minutes, Vinnie and his men will burn down the whole town.

In service, the Breda 37 and 38 proved to be fairly reliable heavy machine guns. Perhaps because the heavy support weapons received more attention from their crews, field reports were generally positive except for jams caused by desert sand and dust, which in the Western Desert affected all infantry machine guns to some extent. The Breda 37's slow rate of fire helped prevent overheating during continuous fire, and its powerful, heavy-bullet cartridge had excellent range and penetration. Still, this machine gun was almost twice as heavy as the German machine guns and heavier than weapons like the M1919. In fact, it was the heaviest World War II 'light' machine gun, and unnecessarily complex to use and deploy. This was another issue for Italians, whose mobility was limited by their weak truck fleet. The tripod added around 20 kg to the complex, putting it at around 40 kilograms.

Machine guns diverged into heavier and lighter designs. The later model water-cooled Maxim guns and its derivatives the MG 08 and the Vickers, as well as the American M1917 Browning machine gun, were all substantial weapons. The .303 Vickers, for example, weighed 33 lb (15 kg) and was mounted on a tripod that brought the total weight to 50 lb (23 kg). The heavier designs could, and in some cases did, fire for days on end, mainly in fixed defensive positions to repel infantry attacks. These machine guns were typically mounted on tripods and were water-cooled, and a well-trained crew could fire nonstop for hours, given sufficient ammunition, replacement barrels and cooling water. Carefully positioned heavy machine guns could stop an attacking force before they reached their objectives.

One of the "Einheitsmaschinengewehr" (Universal machine gun) roles was to provide low level anti-aircraft coverage. A high cyclic rate of fire firing rate is advantageous for use against targets that are exposed to a general-purpose machine gun for a limited time span, like aircraft or targets that minimize their exposure time by quickly moving from cover to cover. For targets that can be fired on by a general-purpose machine gun for longer periods than just a few seconds the cyclic firing rate becomes less important. 
As a consequence one of the MG 42 most notable features was in its high cyclic rate of fire of about 1,200 to 1,500 rounds per minute, twice the rate of the Vickers and Browning machine guns, which fired at a rate of about 600 rounds per minute. The ear could not easily discern the sound of individual shots being fired, instead hearing a sound described as like "ripping cloth" or a buzzsaw.

The battalion mainly used the M-8 Light Armored Car, as it was fast, up to 56 mph (90 km/h), and gave some protection from small arms fire. M8 was equipped with a 37 mm gun and 6X6 wheel drive. The M8 was the main reconnaissance vehicle used by the US military in World War II. Also used was M20 scout car, which was a M-8 without the 37 mm gun and turret. In its place was an anti-aircraft ring mount for a .50-caliber machine gun. A bazooka was provided for the crew to compensate for its lack of anti-armor weaponry. With this vehicles, the 82nd could scout ahead of the slower M4 Sherman tank with a top speed of 25 mph to 30 mph. Also used for reconnaissance and to run messages Harley-Davidson WLA motorcycles were used by the 82nd as well. Almost all units used Jeeps as they were fast four-wheel drive utility vehicles.
question_src: Je! Bunduki ya mashine ya kurusha haraka sana?
pos_context_src: Hii ndio kiwango cha moto cha mitambo, au jinsi silaha "mizunguko" ya haraka (mizigo, kufuli, moto, kufungua, kufutwa). Upimaji wa kiwango cha mzunguko hufikiria kuwa silaha hiyo inaendeshwa haraka iwezekanavyo na haizingati kazi za waendeshaji (mabadiliko ya gazeti, kulenga, nk). Wakati trigger inavutwa, kiwango ambacho raundi hufukuzwa ni kiwango cha mzunguko. Viwango vya kawaida vya mzunguko wa moto ni 600-900 rpm kwa bunduki za kushambulia, 1,000-1,100 rpm katika visa vingine, 900-1,200 rpm kwa bunduki ndogo ndogo na bastola za mashine, na 600-1,500 rpm kwa bunduki za mashine. M134 miniguns zilizowekwa kwenye helikopta za kushambulia na magari mengine ya kupambana yanaweza kufikia viwango vya moto wa zaidi ya raundi 100 kwa sekunde (6,000 rpm). Kiwango cha moto cha cyclic ndio kiwango pekee ambacho kinaweza kuamua kwa usahihi.
neg_context_title_src: Taasisi katika Mfululizo wa Ushindi wa Kusini
neg_context_src: Kuchora haraka ni moja ya michezo ya haraka sana ulimwenguni. Kila wakati hupimwa chini ya sekunde moja, kutoka ishara hadi wakati timer imesimamishwa. Rekodi ya sasa ya Chama cha Draw ya Ulimwenguni (WFDA) ya kuchora kwa haraka darasa katika hafla inayoitwa baluni zilizosimama ni sekunde .208 - na hiyo ni pamoja na wakati inachukua kuguswa, kuchora, moto na pop lengo la puto kwa umbali wa futi nane. Mshindani wa darasa la ulimwengu anaweza kuteka na kuchoma risasi chini ya nusu ya sekunde. Ikizingatiwa kuwa wakati wa wastani wa athari ya mwanadamu ni karibu sekunde 0.2 hadi 0.25, pande zote zimekwisha kabla ya watu wengi kuguswa. Nyakati za athari za wapiga risasi bora wa haraka ni sekunde 0.145, ambayo inamaanisha kuwa bunduki imechomwa, hutolewa, inayolenga (kutoka kwa kiboko), na kufutwa kwa zaidi ya sekunde 0.06. Ili kuanzisha rekodi ya ushirika wa ulimwengu wa haraka, risasi ya pili lazima iachishwe katika mashindano yale yale ambayo sio zaidi ya sekunde 0.30 polepole kuliko ya kwanza; Hii imekusudiwa kuzuia risasi ambayo inatarajia ishara ya kuanza kutoka kuweka rekodi. Katika mashindano ambapo raundi mbili lazima zifutwe, kwa malengo tofauti, chini ya sekunde 0.10 kutenganisha shots.

Vita kuu ya pili pia viliona katika kutumia bunduki za mashine ambazo zinafanana sana na vifaa vya ratiba yetu. Bunduki ya mashine ya Confederate iliyoelezewa kama kurusha haraka sana ilisikika kama "mtu mkubwa akivunja meli katikati", dhahiri anaelekeza kuelekea "Maschinengewehr 42". USA inaonekana kuwa ilikuwa ikitumia bunduki za mashine ya. Imeelezwa pia kuwa USA na CSA zina vifaa sawa .50 vipande vya caliber ambavyo katika ratiba yetu ya wakati vinaweza kuwa tu Browning M2. Hii ni isiyo ya kawaida kwa kuwa wakati huu John Browning alikuwa Mormoni aliyezaliwa huko Ogden, Utah.

SHKAS ilikuwa silaha ya ndege ya haraka sana ya moto katika huduma ya jumla katika Vita vya Kidunia vya pili. Kupasuka kwa sekunde moja kutoka kwa Shkas nne za Polikarpov I-153 au Polikarpov I-16 kuweka risasi 120 ndani ya mil 15 angular kwa mita 400 (miguu 1,312) ikitoa wiani wa risasi 5 kwa mita ya mraba ya angani. Kwa kuongezea, Shkas ilikuwa nyepesi pia; Bunduki nne, zilizo na raundi 650 za risasi kila moja, zilikuwa na uzito wa kilo 160 tu (350 lb).
Shkas hakuwa na shida hata hivyo. Mtaalam wa Mashine ya Soviet Viktor M. Sinaisky alikumbuka: Ingawa iliwekwa katika 7.62 × 54mmr, bunduki za Shkas zilitumia cartridges zilizojengwa maalum kwa uvumilivu mdogo; Ili kuwatofautisha na risasi za kawaida za 7.62, barua ya Kikosi "SH" (ш) iliwekwa chini ya kesi. Kesi hizo, iliyoundwa na N. M. Elizarov, pia ilikuwa na huduma chache za ziada kama crimping mara mbili na ukuta mzito wa ujenzi wa "bimetallic" badala ya shaba ya jadi. Aina kuu ya risasi iliyotumiwa ilikuwa ni ya kusisimua ya B-32 Bullet. Wanahistoria wengine wa kijeshi wanazingatia kuwa mfumo wa kulisha wa Mauser MG 213c (seminal Revolver Cannon kwa miundo ya Magharibi) iliongozwa na Shkas.

Mpiga risasi wa maonyesho Bob Munden (1942-2012), aliyejitangaza kama "mtu wa haraka sana na bunduki", angeweza kuchora, moto, kuvunja lengo la puto na tupu kwa kutumia kiwango cha kawaida cha kuchukua hatua moja na kurudisha bunduki yake kwa holster yake katika blink ya jicho. Kwenye DVD "risasi mbaya," Munden alipigwa risasi .16 ya pili katika hafla inayoitwa Walk and Draw Level.

Wakati wa Vita vya Kidunia vya pili, MG 34 iliongezwa na GPMG mpya, MG 42, ingawa ilibaki katika matumizi ya kupambana. MG 42 ilikuwa na ufanisi zaidi kutengeneza, nguvu zaidi, na ilikuwa na kiwango cha juu cha moto cha moto wa raundi 1,200 hadi 1,500 kwa dakika. Mojawapo ya "Einheitsmaschinengewehr" (bunduki ya mashine ya Universal) ilikuwa kutoa chanjo ya kiwango cha chini cha ndege. Kiwango cha juu cha moto wa mzunguko ni mzuri kwa matumizi dhidi ya malengo ambayo hufunuliwa na bunduki ya mashine ya kusudi la jumla kwa muda mdogo, kama ndege au malengo ambayo hupunguza wakati wao wa kufichua kwa kusonga haraka kutoka kwa kifuniko hadi kufunika. Kwa malengo ambayo yanaweza kufukuzwa na bunduki ya mashine ya kusudi la jumla kwa muda mrefu kuliko sekunde chache kiwango cha kurusha kwa mzunguko huwa sio muhimu. Kwa kweli GPMG bora kabisa iliyowahi kuzalishwa, ilipewa jina la "Hitler's Buzzsaw" na vikosi vya washirika, na kando na MG 34 ilisababisha majeruhi mzito kwa askari wa Allies kwenye mbele zote za Ulaya na Kaskazini mwa Vita vya Kidunia vya pili. Kufuatia kumalizika kwa vita mataifa ya mshirika yaliyoshinda yalipendezwa na MG 34 na MG 42, na kushawishi bunduki nyingi za kusudi la baada ya vita, ambazo nyingi bado zinatumika leo. Walipeana mambo ya kubuni kwa Belgian FN Mag na M60 wa Amerika, wakati wakitoa Zastava M53, Uswizi M51, na Austrian MG 74. Hiyo ilikuwa sifa zake za nguvu ya moto na utumiaji kwamba ikawa msingi wa safu nzima ya bunduki za baada ya vita, pamoja na MG 1 na MG 3 - latter bado ni uzalishaji.

Harold hugundua kuwa "bunduki ya haraka" iko kanisani. Yeye hutuma swope hapo kumpigia simu. Wakati watu wa mji wanakataa kutuma "mtu ambaye alipiga dola mbili za fedha kwa wakati mmoja", Harold anatoa agizo la DINK kupata mafuta ya taa na kuimimina kila mahali. Kisha anaamuru Swope kutoa ujumbe kwa watu kanisani kwamba ikiwa bunduki yao ya haraka haitokei kwa dakika tano, Vinnie na wanaume wake watawaka chini ya mji wote.

Katika huduma, Breda 37 na 38 ilithibitika kuwa bunduki ya kuaminika ya mashine nzito. Labda kwa sababu silaha nzito za msaada zilipokea umakini zaidi kutoka kwa wafanyakazi wao, ripoti za uwanja kwa ujumla zilikuwa nzuri isipokuwa kwa jams zilizosababishwa na mchanga wa jangwa na vumbi, ambalo katika Jangwa la Magharibi liliathiri bunduki zote za mashine ya watoto kwa kiwango fulani. Kiwango cha moto cha Breda 37 cha moto kilisaidia kuzuia overheating wakati wa moto unaoendelea, na cartridge yake yenye nguvu, nzito-bullet ilikuwa na kiwango bora na kupenya. Bado, bunduki hii ya mashine ilikuwa karibu mara mbili kama bunduki ya mashine ya Ujerumani na nzito kuliko silaha kama M1919. Kwa kweli, ilikuwa bunduki nzito zaidi ya Vita vya Kidunia vya II 'taa', na ngumu isiyo ya lazima kutumia na kupeleka. Hili lilikuwa suala lingine kwa Waitaliano, ambao uhamaji wao ulikuwa mdogo na meli zao dhaifu za lori. Tripod iliongezea karibu kilo 20 kwa tata, ikiiweka karibu kilo 40.

Bunduki za mashine zilielekezwa katika miundo nzito na nyepesi. Mfano wa baadaye wa maji yaliyopozwa na bunduki na vitu vyake vya MG 08 na Vickers, pamoja na bunduki ya mashine ya Browning ya Amerika ya M1917, wote walikuwa silaha kubwa. Vickers .303. Miundo nzito inaweza, na katika visa vingine, moto kwa siku mwisho, haswa katika nafasi za kujihami ili kurudisha mashambulio ya watoto wachanga. Bunduki hizi za mashine kawaida zilikuwa zimewekwa kwenye tripods na zilikuwa zimepozwa na maji, na wafanyakazi waliofunzwa vizuri waliweza kuwaka moto kwa masaa, wakipewa risasi za kutosha, mapipa ya uingizwaji na maji ya baridi. Kwa uangalifu bunduki nzito zilizowekwa kwa uangalifu zinaweza kuzuia nguvu ya kushambulia kabla ya kufikia malengo yao.

Mojawapo ya "Einheitsmaschinengewehr" (bunduki ya mashine ya Universal) ilikuwa kutoa chanjo ya kiwango cha chini cha ndege. Kiwango cha juu cha mzunguko wa kiwango cha kurusha moto ni faida kwa matumizi dhidi ya malengo ambayo hufunuliwa na bunduki ya mashine ya kusudi la jumla kwa muda mdogo, kama ndege au malengo ambayo hupunguza wakati wao wa kufichua kwa kusonga haraka kutoka kwa kifuniko hadi kufunika. Kwa malengo ambayo yanaweza kufukuzwa na bunduki ya mashine ya kusudi la jumla kwa muda mrefu kuliko sekunde chache kiwango cha kurusha kwa mzunguko huwa sio muhimu. 
Kama matokeo moja ya sifa za MG 42 mashuhuri zilikuwa katika kiwango cha juu cha moto wa karibu 1,200 hadi 1,500 kwa dakika, mara mbili kiwango cha bunduki za Vickers na Browning, ambazo zilirusha kwa kiwango cha raundi 600 kwa dakika. Sikio halikuweza kutambua kwa urahisi sauti ya shots ya mtu binafsi ikifukuzwa, badala yake kusikia sauti iliyoelezewa kama "kitambaa cha kung'oa" au buzzsaw.

Kikosi hicho kilitumia gari la kivita la M-8, kwani ilikuwa haraka, hadi 56 mph (90 km/h), na ikatoa ulinzi kutoka kwa moto mdogo wa mikono. M8 alikuwa na vifaa vya bunduki 37 mm na gari la gurudumu la 6x6. M8 ilikuwa gari kuu ya kufikiria inayotumiwa na jeshi la Merika katika Vita vya Kidunia vya pili. Iliyotumiwa pia ilikuwa gari ya M20 Scout, ambayo ilikuwa M-8 bila bunduki 37 mm na turret. Mahali pake palikuwa na mlima wa ndege wa kupambana na ndege kwa bunduki ya mashine ya .50-caliber. Bazooka ilitolewa kwa wafanyakazi kulipia fidia kwa ukosefu wake wa silaha za kupambana na silaha. Na magari haya, 82 inaweza kukagua mbele ya tank ya Sherman polepole na kasi ya juu ya 25 mph hadi 30 mph. Pia kutumika kwa uchunguzi tena na kuendesha ujumbe wa Harley-Davidson WLA pikipiki zilitumiwa na 82 pia. Karibu vitengo vyote vilitumia jeep kwani vilikuwa haraka gari za matumizi ya gurudumu nne.
report_src: Ndiyo, bunduki ya mashine inarusha risasi kwa kasi kubwa sana: bunduki za kushambulia hufikia raundi 600-900 kwa dakika, wakati baadhi ya mifano inazidi 1,000-1,100 rpm; bunduki ndogo ndogo na bastola za mashine hufika 900-1,200 rpm, na bunduki za mashine nzito hufika 600-1,500 rpm [1]. Vifaa maalumu kama M134 minigun, vinavyowekwa kwenye helikopta za kushambulia, vinaweza kufyatua zaidi ya raundi 100 kwa sekunde (takriban 6,000 rpm), kiwango kinachotambulika kuwa miongoni mwa ya juu zaidi duniani [1].

question_en: Does melioidosis affect humans?
pos_context_en: A definite history of contact with soil may not be elicited, as melioidosis can be dormant for many years before manifesting. Attention should be paid to a history of travel to endemic areas in returned travellers. Some authors recommend considering possibility of melioidosis in every febrile patient with a history of traveling to and/or staying at endemic areas.
neg_context_en: The single most important risk factor for developing melioidosis is diabetes mellitus, followed by hazardous alcohol use, chronic kidney disease, and chronic lung disease. Other risk factors include thalassaemia, occupation (rice paddy farmers), and cystic fibrosis. The mode of infection is believed to be through either a break in the skin, or the inhalation of aerosolized "B. pseudomallei" cells. Person-to-person spread has been described, but is extremely unusual. HIV infection does not predispose to melioidosis.

Melioidosis is endemic in parts of southeast Asia (including Thailand, Laos, Singapore, Brunei, Malaysia, Burma and Vietnam), China, Taiwan and northern Australia. Flooding can increase its extent, including flooding in central Australia. Multiple cases have also been described in Hong Kong and Brunei India, and sporadic cases in Central and South America, the Middle East, the Pacific and several African countries. Although only one case of melioidosis has ever been reported in Bangladesh, at least five cases have been imported to the UK from that country. Recent news reports indicate "B. pseudomallei" has been isolated from soil in Bangladesh, but this remains to be verified scientifically. This suggests that melioidosis is endemic to Bangladesh and that a problem of underdiagnosis or under-reporting exists there. most likely due to a lack of adequate laboratory facilities in affected rural areas. A high isolation frequency (percentage of positive soil samples) was found in east Saravan in rural Lao PDR distant from the Mekong River, thought by the investigators to be the highest geometric mean concentration in the world (about 464 (25-10,850 CFU/g soil).

In up to 25% of patients, no focus of infection is found and the diagnosis is usually made on blood cultures or throat swab. Melioidosis is said to be able to affect any organ in the body except the heart valves (endocarditis). Although meningitis has been described secondary to ruptured brain abscesses, primary meningitis has not been described. Less common manifestations include intravascular infection, lymph node abscesses (1.2–2.2%), pyopericardium and myocarditis, mediastinal infection, and thyroid and scrotal abscesses and ocular infection.

Melioidosis is a recognised disease in animals, including cats, goats, sheep, and horses. Cattle, water buffalo, and crocodiles are considered to be relatively resistant to melioidosis despite their constant exposure to mud. An outbreak at the Paris Zoo in the 1970s (""L’affaire du jardin des plantes"") was thought to have originated from an imported panda.

Patients with melioidosis usually have risk factors for disease, such as diabetes, thalassemia, hazardous alcohol use, or renal disease, and frequently give a history of occupational or recreational exposure to mud or pooled surface water. However, otherwise healthy patients, including children, may also get melioidosis.
Based on whole genome sequencing, humans may play a role in moving "B. pseudomallei" from place to place.

A complete screen (blood culture, sputum culture, urine culture, throat swab, and culture of any aspirated pus) should be performed on all patients with suspected melioidosis (culture on blood agar as well as Ashdown's medium). A definitive diagnosis is made by growing "B. pseudomallei" from any site. A throat swab is not sensitive, but is 100% specific if positive, and compares favourably with sputum culture. The sensitivity of urine culture is increased if a centrifuged specimen is cultured, and any bacterial growth should be reported (not just growth above 10 organisms/ml which is the usual cutoff). Very occasionally, bone marrow culture may be positive in patients who have negative blood cultures for "B. pseudomallei", but these are not usually recommended. A common error made by clinicians unfamiliar with melioidosis is to send a specimen from only the affected site (which is the usual procedure for most other infections) instead of sending a full screen.

Person-to-person transmission is exceedingly unusual; and patients with melioidosis should not be considered contagious. Lab workers should handle "B. pseudomallei" under BSL-3 isolation conditions, as laboratory-acquired melioidosis has been described.

Chronic melioidosis is usually defined by a duration of symptoms greater than two months and occurs in about 10% of patients. The clinical presentation of chronic melioidosis is protean and includes such presentations as chronic skin infections, chronic lung nodule, and pneumonia. In particular, chronic melioidosis closely mimics tuberculosis, and has sometimes been called "Vietnamese tuberculosis".
"B. pseudomallei" infection in humans is called melioidosis; its mortality is 20 to 50% even with treatment.
question_src: Je! Melioidosis inaathiri wanadamu?
pos_context_src: Historia dhahiri ya kuwasiliana na mchanga inaweza kuwa haijasisitizwa, kwani melioidosis inaweza kuwa dhaifu kwa miaka mingi kabla ya kudhihirishwa. Makini inapaswa kulipwa kwa historia ya kusafiri kwenda maeneo ya wasafiri waliorudishwa. Waandishi wengine wanapendekeza kuzingatia uwezekano wa melioidosis katika kila mgonjwa dhaifu na historia ya kusafiri na/au kukaa katika maeneo ya ugonjwa.
neg_context_src: Jambo moja muhimu zaidi la hatari ya kukuza melioidosis ni ugonjwa wa kisukari, ikifuatiwa na matumizi ya pombe hatari, ugonjwa sugu wa figo, na ugonjwa sugu wa mapafu. Sababu zingine za hatari ni pamoja na thalassemia, kazi (wakulima wa paddy), na cystic fibrosis. Njia ya maambukizi inaaminika kuwa kupitia mapumziko kwenye ngozi, au kuvuta pumzi ya seli za "B. pseudomallei". Kuenea kwa mtu-kwa-mtu kumeelezewa, lakini sio kawaida sana. Maambukizi ya VVU hayatabiri kwa melioidosis.

Melioidosis ni ugonjwa katika sehemu za Asia ya Kusini (pamoja na Thailand, Laos, Singapore, Brunei, Malaysia, Burma na Vietnam), Uchina, Taiwan na kaskazini mwa Australia. Mafuriko yanaweza kuongeza kiwango chake, pamoja na mafuriko katikati mwa Australia. Kesi nyingi pia zimeelezewa katika Hong Kong na Brunei India, na kesi za sporadic huko Amerika ya Kati na Kusini, Mashariki ya Kati, Pasifiki na nchi kadhaa za Afrika. Ingawa kesi moja tu ya melioidosis imewahi kuripotiwa nchini Bangladesh, angalau kesi tano zimeingizwa nchini Uingereza kutoka nchi hiyo. Ripoti za habari za hivi karibuni zinaonyesha "B. pseudomallei" imetengwa na mchanga huko Bangladesh, lakini hii inabaki kuthibitishwa kisayansi. Hii inaonyesha kuwa melioidosis ni ugonjwa wa Bangladesh na kwamba shida ya utambuzi wa chini au kuripoti kunapatikana hapo. Uwezo mkubwa kwa sababu ya ukosefu wa vifaa vya maabara vya kutosha katika maeneo yaliyoathiriwa vijijini. Masafa ya kutengwa ya juu (asilimia ya sampuli nzuri za mchanga) yalipatikana katika Saravan Mashariki vijijini Lao PDR mbali na Mto Mekong, iliyofikiriwa na wachunguzi kuwa mkusanyiko wa jiometri ya juu zaidi ulimwenguni (karibu 464 (25-10,850 CFU/G ardhi).

Katika hadi 25% ya wagonjwa, hakuna mwelekeo wa maambukizo hupatikana na utambuzi kawaida hufanywa kwa tamaduni za damu au swab ya koo. Melioidosis inasemekana kuwa na uwezo wa kuathiri chombo chochote mwilini isipokuwa valves za moyo (endocarditis). Ingawa ugonjwa wa meningitis umeelezewa sekondari kwa vitunguu vya ubongo vilivyochafuliwa, meningitis ya msingi haijaelezewa. Maonyesho ya kawaida ya kawaida ni pamoja na maambukizi ya intravascular, lymph node abscesses (1.2-2.2%), pyopericardium na myocarditis, maambukizi ya mediastinal, na abscessis ya tezi na maambukizi ya ocular.

Melioidosis ni ugonjwa unaotambuliwa katika wanyama, pamoja na paka, mbuzi, kondoo, na farasi. Ng'ombe, nyati za maji, na mamba huchukuliwa kuwa sugu kwa melioidosis licha ya kufichuliwa kwao kwa matope. Mlipuko katika Zoo ya Paris katika miaka ya 1970 ("" L'Affaire du Jardin des Plantes "") ilifikiriwa kuwa ilitoka kwa panda iliyoingizwa.

Wagonjwa walio na melioidosis kawaida huwa na sababu za hatari kwa magonjwa, kama vile ugonjwa wa sukari, thalassemia, matumizi ya pombe hatari, au ugonjwa wa figo, na mara nyingi hutoa historia ya mfiduo wa kazi au burudani kwa matope au maji ya uso yaliyowekwa. Walakini, vinginevyo wagonjwa wenye afya, pamoja na watoto, wanaweza pia kupata melioidosis.
Kwa msingi wa mpangilio mzima wa genome, wanadamu wanaweza kuchukua jukumu la kusonga "B. pseudomallei" kutoka mahali hadi mahali.

Screen kamili (utamaduni wa damu, utamaduni wa sputum, utamaduni wa mkojo, koo la koo, na utamaduni wa pus yoyote inayotarajiwa) inapaswa kufanywa kwa wagonjwa wote walio na melioidosis (utamaduni juu ya agar ya damu na kati ya Ashdown). Utambuzi dhahiri hufanywa na kukua "B. pseudomallei" kutoka kwa tovuti yoyote. Swab ya koo sio nyeti, lakini ni 100% maalum ikiwa ni chanya, na inalinganisha vyema na tamaduni ya sputum. Usikivu wa tamaduni ya mkojo huongezeka ikiwa mfano wa centrifuged umeandaliwa, na ukuaji wowote wa bakteria unapaswa kuripotiwa (sio ukuaji tu juu ya viumbe 10/ml ambayo ni kawaida cutoff). Mara kwa mara, utamaduni wa uboho unaweza kuwa mzuri kwa wagonjwa ambao wana tamaduni mbaya za damu kwa "B. pseudomallei", lakini hizi hazipendekezi kawaida. Kosa la kawaida lililofanywa na waganga wasio na habari na melioidosis ni kutuma mfano kutoka kwa tovuti iliyoathirika tu (ambayo ni utaratibu wa kawaida wa maambukizo mengine mengi) badala ya kutuma skrini kamili.

Uwasilishaji wa mtu-kwa-mtu ni kawaida sana; na wagonjwa walio na melioidosis hawapaswi kuzingatiwa kuambukiza. Wafanyikazi wa maabara wanapaswa kushughulikia "B. pseudomallei" chini ya hali ya kutengwa ya BSL-3, kwani maabara inayopatikana kwa maabara imeelezewa.

Melioidosis sugu kawaida hufafanuliwa na muda wa dalili kubwa kuliko miezi miwili na hufanyika kwa karibu 10% ya wagonjwa. Uwasilishaji wa kliniki wa melioidosis sugu ni proteni na inajumuisha mawasilisho kama maambukizo sugu ya ngozi, nodule sugu ya mapafu, na pneumonia. Hasa, ugonjwa sugu wa muda mrefu unaiga kifua kikuu, na wakati mwingine umeitwa "kifua kikuu cha Kivietinamu".
"B. pseudomallei" maambukizi kwa wanadamu huitwa melioidosis; Vifo vyake ni 20 hadi 50% hata na matibabu.
report_src: Ndiyo, melioidosis huathiri wanadamu; husababishwa na bakteria Burkholderia pseudomallei wanaopatikana hasa kwenye mchanga na maji yanayotuama katika ukanda wa kitropiki, na maambukizi hutokea kwa kuvuta hewa iliyochafuliwa, kuingia kwa bakteria kupitia jeraha, au kunywa maji yaliyoambukizwa. Ugonjwa huu unaweza kujificha mwilini bila dalili kwa miaka mingi kabla ya kujitokeza, jambo linalomaanisha kwamba historia dhahiri ya kuwasiliana na mchanga mara nyingi haionekani wazi [1]. Wagonjwa waliodhoofishwa kinga—hasa wenye kisukari, ugonjwa wa figo au magonjwa sugu ya mapafu—huathirika zaidi, na vifo vya melioidosis kali (sepsis) vinaweza kufikia 10–50 %. Dalili hutofautiana kutoka vichipuzi vidogo vya ngozi, homa na maumivu ya kichwa hadi nimonia kali au mshtuko wa damu, na mara nyingi hugunduliwa kwa watu waliowahi kusafiri au kuishi maeneo endemiki kama Asia ya Kusini-Mashariki na Australia Kaskazini, hivyo wahudumu wa afya wanashauriwa kuuliza historia ya safari kwa “mgonjwa dhaifu” mwenye dalili zisizoelezeka [1]. Matibabu huhitaji antibiotics zenye nguvu kwa wiki hadi miezi kadhaa ili kuzuia kurejea kwa maambukizi.

question_en: When was the SUV invented?
pos_context_en: The earliest examples of longer-wheelbase, civilian, wagon-type SUVs (using the term retrospectively) were truck-framed station wagons and carry-alls, to which four-wheel drive was added – first of all the 1946 Willys Jeep Station Wagon, launched a year "before" its 1947 Jeep Truck sibling. Though Willys sold it as a "Jeep", it wasn't offered with four-wheel drive until 1949. The all-steel GMC and Chevrolet Suburban Carryall that dated back to 1935, the 1953 International Harvester Travelall, and the 1954 Dodge (Power) Town Wagon were all large station-wagon bodied versions of light trucks that were made available with drive in 1956/1957. GMC and Chevy initially only offered the 4x4 option in the form of a dealer-installed NAPCO Power-Pak aftermarket conversion kit — factory four-wheel drive only arrived in 1960. In Britain, also from 1956, the Land Rover Series I line was expanded with a 107-inch long-wheelbase version, including a 10-seat station wagon which used very simple metal panels and bolt-together construction, intended to be used both as commercial vehicles and people-carriers.
neg_context_en: Heavier-duty SUVs are typically designed with a truck-style chassis with separate body, while lighter-duty (including cross-over models) are more similar to car construction, which are typically built with a unitary construction (where the body actually forms the structure). Originally designed and built to be work vehicles using a truck chassis, SUVs were not comprehensively re-designed to be safely used as passenger vehicles. The British television Fifth Gear programme staged a crash between a first generation (1989–98) Land Rover Discovery with a separate chassis and body, and a modern Renault Espace IV with monocoque (unit) design. This traditional truck-based SUV offered less protection for occupants than that offered in the modern multi-purpose vehicle with unitary construction. In some SUV fatalities involving truck-based construction, lawsuits against the automakers "were settled quietly and confidentially, without any public scrutiny of the results—or the underlying problems with SUV design", thus hiding the danger of vehicles such as the Ford Bronco and Explorer compared to regular passenger cars.

The initial tests of the Ford Excursion were "horrifying" for its ability to vault over the hood of a Ford Taurus. The big SUV was modified to include a type of blocker bar suggested by the French transportation ministry in 1971, a kind of under-vehicle roll bar designed to keep the large Ford Excursion from rolling over cars that were hit by it. The problem is "impact incompatibility", where the "hard points" of the end of chassis rails of SUVs are higher than the "hard points" of cars, causing the SUV to override the engine compartment and crumple zone of the car. There have been few regulations covering designs of SUVs to address the safety issue. The problem of heavy weight is a risk factor present for very large passenger cars, not only with SUVs. The typically higher SUV bumper heights and those built using stiff truck-based frames, also increases risks in crashes with passenger cars. The Mercedes ML320 was designed with bumpers at the same height as required for passenger cars.

The Lamborghini Urus concept was unveiled at the 2012 Beijing Auto Show on 23 April 2012. Later, the SUV was also shown at Pebble Beach in 2012. Powered by a 5.2 L V10 engine shared with the Gallardo, the engine generated a theoretical maximum power output of and was accompanied with an all-wheel drive system. The Urus was reported to have the lowest carbon emissions as compared to its competitors (i.e. the Porsche Cayenne, Bentley Bentayga and the Audi Q7). The Urus was conceived as a perfect daily driver unlike the other offerings from the brand. The sharp-lined exterior design of the SUV takes heavy influence from the company's V12 flagship, the Aventador. The production version of the SUV was introduced in 2017 with major changes done to the exterior and featuring a different powertrain than that of the concept.

The BMW X5 is a mid-size luxury SUV produced by BMW. The first generation of the X5, with the chassis code E53, made its debut in 1999. It was BMW's first SUV and it also featured all-wheel drive and was available with either manual or automatic transmission. In 2006, the second generation X5 was launched, known internally as the E70, featuring the torque-split capable xDrive all-wheel drive system mated to an automatic transmission, and in 2009 the X5 M performance variant was released as a 2010 model.

A man is driving an SUV when his GPS gives him a five seconds warning to exit the vehicle. He is shot in the forehead with a laser and the body is dumped, the SUV driving off by itself. Ryan meets with Madison and hears her story. He takes them in his car to look for the cell phone, but he is called to the scene of the SUV driver's body. A young boy tells Ryan that the empty car drove away. Ryan picks up the first driver's cellular phone from the coroner's office. He then intercepts the SUV, which tries to ram him. When Ryan pulls the SUV over, they are jumped by the satellite robot. They drive away, but are chased by the SUV, who also transmorphs into a robot.

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.
Ɯ was used in the Zhuang alphabet from 1957 to 1986 to represent the same vowel as in IPA; sometime before or in 1986, it was replaced with W.

Ƨ was used in the Zhuang alphabet from 1957 to 1986 to indicate the second, or falling, tone (), due to its resemblance to the numeral 2, along with four other letters resembling numbers. (See table). In 1986, Ƨ was replaced by the similarly shaped, but fully Latin, Z, when the alphabet was simplified for use in computers.

"We designed the building from the inside out, not the outside in,” said Loretta H. Cockrum, Foram’s founder, chairman and CEO. “We wanted the most efficient office building ever designed, with no wasted space or wasted energy. This is a building of the future more than a building of the present. A lot of love has gone into that building, and a lot of pride."

Ŭ represents a semivowel in the orthography of Esperanto, which is an international auxiliary language publicly presented in 1887. As in Belarusian, Esperanto Ŭ is pronounced as a non-syllabic , primarily in the diphthongs "aŭ", "eŭ" and rarely "oŭ".
question_src: Je! SUV iligunduliwa lini?
pos_context_src: Mfano wa mapema zaidi wa magurudumu ya muda mrefu, raia, aina ya gari (kwa kutumia neno hilo mara kwa mara) walikuwa gari za gari-za-lori na kubeba, ambayo gari la magurudumu manne liliongezwa-kwanza ya gari la 1946 la Jeep, lilizindua mwaka "kabla ya" jalada lake la 1947 la Jeep. Ingawa Willys aliiuza kama "jeep", haikutolewa na gari la magurudumu manne hadi 1949. GMC yote ya chuma na Chevrolet Suburban Carryall ambayo ilikuwa ya 1935, wahamiaji wa kimataifa wa 1953, na 1954 Dodge (Power) Town Wagon walikuwa wote wakuu wa kituo cha 195. GMC na Chevy hapo awali walitoa chaguo la 4x4 tu katika mfumo wa kit cha kugeuza cha Napco-Pak-Pak Aftermarket Kit-Kiwanda cha magurudumu manne kilifika tu mnamo 1960. Huko Uingereza, pia kutoka 1956, safu ya Land Rover I ilipanuliwa na vifaa vya kujengwa kwa urefu wa 107, ikiwa ni pamoja na vifaa vya kutengenezea 107, ikiwa ni pamoja na vifaa vya kutengenezea 107, ikiwa ni pamoja na seti ya seti 10 iliyotumiwa sana na vifaa vya sekunde 10, pamoja na seti ya 10 ya kutengenezea, pamoja na seti ya seti 10, na vifaa vya kujengwa kwa paneli 107, pamoja na paneli ya kutumiwa kwa paneli 10-teat imtesed imbat imbat kutumiwa na seti 10-teat kutumiwa kwa paneli 10-metat kutumiwa kwa bao 10-tele, bao-kutumiwa paneli na bao. kama magari ya kibiashara na wabebaji wa watu.
neg_context_title_src: Ukosoaji wa magari ya matumizi ya michezo
Ukosoaji wa magari ya matumizi ya michezo
neg_context_src: SUV za kazi nzito kawaida hubuniwa na chasi ya mtindo wa lori na mwili tofauti, wakati kazi nyepesi (pamoja na mifano ya kuvuka) ni sawa na ujenzi wa gari, ambao kawaida hujengwa na ujenzi wa umoja (ambapo mwili huunda muundo). Hapo awali iliyoundwa na kujengwa kuwa magari ya kazi kwa kutumia chasi ya lori, SUVs hazikuundwa tena ili kutumiwa salama kama magari ya abiria. Programu ya Tano ya Televisheni ya Uingereza ilisababisha ajali kati ya kizazi cha kwanza (1989-98) ugunduzi wa ardhi na chasi tofauti na mwili, na Renault Espace IV ya kisasa na muundo wa monocoque (kitengo). SUV hii ya jadi ya lori ilitoa ulinzi mdogo kwa wakaazi kuliko ile inayotolewa katika gari la kisasa la kusudi nyingi na ujenzi wa umoja. Katika baadhi ya vifo vya SUV vinavyojumuisha ujenzi wa msingi wa lori, kesi za kisheria dhidi ya waendeshaji "zilitatuliwa kimya kimya na kwa siri, bila uchunguzi wowote wa umma wa matokeo-au shida za msingi na muundo wa SUV", na hivyo kuficha hatari ya magari kama Ford Bronco na Explorer ikilinganishwa na magari ya abiria ya kawaida.

Vipimo vya awali vya safari ya Ford vilikuwa "vya kutisha" kwa uwezo wake wa kunyoosha juu ya kofia ya Ford Taurus. SUV kubwa ilibadilishwa kuwa ni pamoja na aina ya kizuizi cha blocker kilichopendekezwa na Wizara ya Usafiri wa Ufaransa mnamo 1971, aina ya bar ya chini ya gari iliyoundwa iliyoundwa kuweka safari kubwa ya Ford kutoka kwa kusonga juu ya magari ambayo yalipigwa nayo. Shida ni "kutokubaliana kwa athari", ambapo "alama ngumu" za mwisho wa reli za chasi za SUV ni kubwa kuliko "alama ngumu" za magari, na kusababisha SUV kupitisha eneo la injini na eneo la gari. Kumekuwa na kanuni chache zinazohusu miundo ya SUVs kushughulikia suala la usalama. Shida ya uzani mzito ni sababu ya hatari kwa magari makubwa sana ya abiria, sio tu na SUVs. Vipimo vya juu vya juu vya SUV na zile zilizojengwa kwa kutumia muafaka ngumu wa lori, pia huongeza hatari katika shambulio na magari ya abiria. Mercedes ML320 ilibuniwa na bumpers kwa urefu sawa na inahitajika kwa magari ya abiria.

Wazo la Urus la Lamborghini lilifunuliwa katika kipindi cha 2012 Beijing Auto Show mnamo 23 Aprili 2012. Baadaye, SUV pia ilionyeshwa huko Pebble Beach mnamo 2012. Iliyoendeshwa na injini ya 5.2 L V10 iliyoshirikiwa na Gallardo, injini ilizalisha nguvu ya juu ya nadharia ya na ilifuatana na mfumo wa gari-gurudumu. URUS iliripotiwa kuwa na uzalishaji wa chini wa kaboni ikilinganishwa na washindani wake (i.e. Porsche Cayenne, Bentley Bentayga na Audi Q7). Urus ilichukuliwa kama dereva kamili wa kila siku tofauti na matoleo mengine kutoka kwa chapa. Ubunifu wa nje ulio na nguvu wa SUV unachukua ushawishi mzito kutoka kwa bendera ya kampuni ya V12, Aventador. Toleo la uzalishaji wa SUV lilianzishwa mnamo 2017 na mabadiliko makubwa yaliyofanywa kwa nje na yenye nguvu tofauti kuliko ile ya wazo.

BMW X5 ni ukubwa wa kifahari wa kati wa SUV inayozalishwa na BMW. Kizazi cha kwanza cha X5, pamoja na nambari ya chasi E53, kilifanya kazi yake mnamo 1999. Ilikuwa SUV ya kwanza ya BMW na pia ilionyesha gari la gurudumu lote na ilipatikana na mwongozo au maambukizi ya moja kwa moja. Mnamo 2006, kizazi cha pili X5 kilizinduliwa, kinachojulikana ndani kama E70, kilicho na mfumo wa kugawanyika wa XDrive All-Wheel Drive uliendana na maambukizi ya moja kwa moja, na mnamo 2009 lahaja ya utendaji ya X5 M ilitolewa kama mfano wa 2010.

Mtu anaendesha SUV wakati GPS yake inampa onyo la sekunde tano kutoka kwa gari. Yeye hupigwa kwenye paji la uso na laser na mwili umetupwa, SUV ikiendesha peke yake. Ryan hukutana na Madison na kusikia hadithi yake. Anawachukua kwenye gari lake kutafuta simu ya rununu, lakini anaitwa eneo la mwili wa dereva wa SUV. Mvulana mdogo anamwambia Ryan kwamba gari tupu iliondoka. Ryan anachukua simu ya kwanza ya dereva kutoka kwa ofisi ya coroner. Kisha hukataza SUV, ambayo inajaribu kumkanyaga. Wakati Ryan anavuta SUV, wanaruka na roboti ya satelaiti. Wao huondoka, lakini hufukuzwa na SUV, ambao pia hupitisha ndani ya roboti.

Winfield Toll Bridge, pia inajulikana kama Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, ni kihistoria wa kihistoria wa Cantilever Warren Truss Bridge iliyoko Winfield na Red House, Kaunti ya Putnam, West Virginia. Ilijengwa mnamo 1955, na inachukua Mto wa Kanawha, iliyobeba West Virginia Route 34. Cantilever kupitia-truss ina nafasi mbili za nanga kila futi 245 kwa urefu na urefu wa futi 462 kwa urefu kati ya mistari ya kituo cha pier. Span kuu ina futi mbili 128, inchi 4, mikono ya cantilever na miguu 205, inchi 4, iliyosimamishwa.
Ɯ ilitumika katika alfabeti ya Zhuang kutoka 1957 hadi 1986 kuwakilisha vokali sawa na katika IPA; Wakati fulani kabla au mnamo 1986, ilibadilishwa na W.

Ƨ ilitumika katika alfabeti ya Zhuang kutoka 1957 hadi 1986 kuashiria ya pili, au kuanguka, sauti (), kwa sababu ya kufanana kwake na nambari 2, pamoja na herufi zingine nne zinazofanana. (Tazama meza). Mnamo 1986, ƨ ilibadilishwa na umbo sawa, lakini la Kilatini, Z, wakati alfabeti ilirahisishwa kwa matumizi katika kompyuta.

"Tulibuni jengo hilo kutoka ndani, sio nje," alisema Loretta H. Cockrum, mwanzilishi wa Foram, Mwenyekiti na Mkurugenzi Mtendaji. "Tulitaka jengo bora zaidi la ofisi lililowahi kubuniwa, bila nafasi ya kupoteza au nishati ya kupoteza. Hii ni jengo la siku zijazo zaidi ya jengo la sasa. Upendo mwingi umeingia kwenye jengo hilo, na kiburi sana."

Ŭ inawakilisha semivowel katika orthografia ya Esperanto, ambayo ni lugha ya kimataifa ya msaidizi iliyowasilishwa hadharani mnamo 1887. Kama ilivyo kwa Belarusi, Esperanto ŭ hutamkwa kama isiyo ya syllabic, haswa katika diphthongs "aŭ", "eŭ" na mara chache "oŭ".
report_src: Kwa ujumla, gari la matumizi mseto (SUV) linahesabiwa kuzaliwa katikati ya miaka ya 1930, wakati Chevrolet ilipozindua Suburban Carryall ya mwaka 1935—gari la abiria lenye mwili wa chuma lote lililojengwa juu ya chasi ya lori, lenye uwezo wa kubeba watu na mizigo katika mazingira mbalimbali, na kutajwa kama kielelezo cha kwanza cha kile kinachotambulika leo kama SUV [1].

question_en: How long was Leave It to Beaver?
pos_context_en: "Leave It to Beaver" ran for six full 39-week seasons (234 episodes). The series had its debut on CBS on October 4, 1957. The following season, it moved to ABC, where it stayed until completing its run on June 20, 1963. Throughout the show's run, it was shot with a single camera on black-and-white 35mm film. The show's production companies included the comedian George Gobel's Gomalco Productions (1957–61) and Kayro Productions (1961–63) with filming at Revue Studios/Republic Studios and Universal Studios in Los Angeles. The show was distributed by MCA TV.
neg_context_title_en: The New Leave It to Beaver
It's a Small World (Leave It to Beaver)
neg_context_en: Talbot's first appearance as "Gilbert" on "Leave it to Beaver" was in a 1959 episode called "Beaver and Gilbert," where he plays a new kid in town who is prone to telling tall tales. Talbot's signature episode in the "Leave it to Beaver" series is "The School Picture" in which he (Gilbert) tricks the Beav into making a face during the annual class photo. In another memorable episode, "Long Distance Call," Gilbert convinces Beaver to place an expensive phone call to Los Angeles Dodgers pitching star Don Drysdale.

During the series' run, Little Golden Books published "Leave It to Beaver" (1959), an inexpensive storybook for young children. Distinguished children's author Beverly Cleary published three softcover novels based on the series, "Leave It to Beaver" (1960), "Here's Beaver!" (1961), and "Beaver and Wally" (1961). Whitman Publishing printed "Leave It to Beaver: Fire!" (1962), a hardcover novel by Cole Fanin. In 1983, "The Beaver Papers" () by Will Jacobs and Gerard Jones was published. The book is a parody of a lost season comprising twenty-five episodes written in the style of various authors such as Tennessee Williams, Ernest Hemingway, and William Faulkner – a 30th Anniversary Edition was published in 2013 by Atomic Drop Press.

"Leave It to Beavers" received positive reviews. The A.V. Club's Kevin McFarland gave the episode a "B" grade and wrote, "About two thirds of the way through 'Leave It To The Beavers,' one of the beaver Wesen tells Nick that 'bravery isn’t in our nature,' but our hero refuses to believe that ancient standard. He's still relatively new to investigating matters of the Wesen world, and wants to believe in change; that any creature, like Bud, the first beaver he encountered, can muster up enough bravery to stand up to anything, from bridge trolls enforcing archaic tradition to Reapers out collecting heads. Though there is a moral built into that conversation, and the episode at large, it's hard to believe that this show would reach for an episodic moral over darkly lit action sequences, which inevitably pop up in the last ten minutes this week. It's a thrilling conclusion to an episode filled with a lot of talking and stunted inaction. Over the back half of this season, I've gone from wanting this show to succeed while feeling frustrated at how it squanders potential, into largely enjoying everything with a few reservations. That trepidation was more pronounced tonight that it has been the past two weeks, but still, I'm very pleased with the progress."

Fred Rutherford (Richard Deacon, October 18, 1957 – May 23, 1963) is Ward's pompous, overbearing co-worker. Fred is the father of an awkward teenage son named Clarence ("Lumpy"), and a daughter about Beaver's age named Violet. The Rutherfords socialize with the Cleavers on a couple of occasions: playing cards in the Cleaver home and, at a later time, enjoying a picnic outing together. Fred travels widely and gives Ward a meerschaum pipe after visiting Germany.Several "Andy Griffith Show" players appeared on "Leave It to Beaver". Hal Smith, Mayberry's town sot Otis Campbell, appeared as a restaurant manager in the fourth-season episode "Beaver Won't Eat", while Dorothy Neumann, Otis Campbell's wife Rita on "The Andy Griffith Show", appeared in "The Community Chest" as a Mayfield housewife. Howard McNear, Mayberry's barber Floyd Lawson, played a barber in a second-season "Beaver" episode. Burt Mustin (Mayfield's Gus, the fireman) had a long career as Jud Fletcher on "The Andy Griffith Show" and Will Wright (Mayfield's first season Pete, the fireman) appeared on "The Andy Griffith Show" as Ben Weaver, a sour, miserly Mayberry department store owner.

The New Leave It to Beaver (also known as Still the Beaver) is an American sitcom sequel to the original 1957–1963 sitcom "Leave It to Beaver". The series began with the 1983 reunion television movie "Still the Beaver" that aired on CBS in March 1983.
The success of the television movie prompted the creation of a revival series, also titled "Still the Beaver", that aired on the Disney Channel from 1984 to 1985. In 1986, the series was picked up by TBS where it aired until June 1989.

A comparison of how children interact with their brothers and sisters on such 1950s situation comedy television programs as "Leave It To Beaver" and "Father Knows Best" with those on such 1980s programs as "The Cosby Show" and "Family Ties" found that children interacted more positively in the 1950s but were more central to the main story action in the 1980s.

"It's a Small World" is the pilot episode from the iconic American television series "Leave It to Beaver" (1957–1963). The pilot (originally proposed as "Wally and The Beaver") was first televised April 23, 1957, on the syndicated anthology series, "Studio 57", without a laugh track nor the series' well known theme song, "The Toy Parade". It never aired as an episode within the series. It was televised again in October 2007 as part of TV Land's 50th anniversary celebration of "Leave It to Beaver". It was released to DVD in 2005. The series made its CBS debut several months later on October 4, 1957, with the episode, "Beaver Gets 'Spelled".

Contemporary commentators praised "Leave It to Beaver", with "Variety" comparing Beaver to Mark Twain's Tom Sawyer. Much juvenile merchandise was released during the show's first run, including board games, novels, and comic books. The show has enjoyed a renaissance in popularity since the 1970s through off-network syndication, a reunion telemovie ("Still the Beaver", 1983) and a sequel series, "The New Leave It to Beaver" (1985–89). In 1997, a movie version based on the original series was released to negative reviews. In October 2007, TV Land celebrated the show's 50th anniversary with a marathon. Although the show never broke into the Nielsen ratings top 30 or won any awards, it placed on "Time" magazine's unranked 2007 list of "All-TIME 100 TV Shows".

Dell Comics published six "Leave It to Beaver" comic books with photo covers of Beaver, Beaver and Wally, or Beaver and Ward. The first comic book (Four Color No. 912) is dated June 1958 and the last (Four Color No. 01-428-207) May–July 1962. In 2004, all six Dell "Leave It to Beaver" comic books in 'Near Mint' condition were valued in excess of two hundred dollars each.

The first season of "Veronica Mars" features a different "case of the week" each episode, and the season-long mystery of Lilly Kane's murder. In addition to developing a separate mystery for each episode, the writers also had to provide clues that would lead to the murder's resolution in the season finale. The murder mystery plot was planned from the beginning of the season and the killer's identity remained the same throughout production. Thomas said that at the beginning of the season, "I know the broad strokes, I know who did it, I know how it was done, I know the big arcs, but we're always filling in the details. Those are week to week. It's a week to week challenge in the writers room figuring out how much information we want to dole out to the audience."
question_src: Ni muda gani kuiacha kwa Beaver?
pos_context_src: "Acha kwa Beaver" iliendesha kwa misimu sita kamili ya wiki 39 (vipindi 234). Mfululizo huo ulikuwa na deni lake kwenye CBS mnamo Oktoba 4, 1957. Msimu uliofuata, ulihamia ABC, ambapo ilikaa hadi kukamilisha kukimbia kwake Juni 20, 1963. Katika kipindi chote cha onyesho, ilipigwa risasi na kamera moja kwenye filamu nyeusi-na-nyeupe 35mm. Kampuni za uzalishaji wa onyesho ni pamoja na Comedian George Gobel's Gomalco Productions (1957-61) na Kayro Productions (1961-63) na utengenezaji wa filamu katika Revue Studios/Republic Studios na Universal Studios huko Los Angeles. Kipindi hicho kilisambazwa na MCA TV.
neg_context_src: Muonekano wa kwanza wa Talbot kama "Gilbert" kwenye "Acha kwa Beaver" ilikuwa katika sehemu ya 1959 inayoitwa "Beaver na Gilbert," ambapo anacheza mtoto mpya katika mji ambaye anakabiliwa na hadithi ndefu. Sehemu ya saini ya Talbot katika safu ya "Acha It to Beaver" ni "Picha ya Shule" ambayo yeye (Gilbert) anamdanganya Beav kutengeneza uso wakati wa picha ya darasa la kila mwaka. Katika sehemu nyingine ya kukumbukwa, "Simu ya umbali mrefu," Gilbert anamshawishi Beaver kuweka simu ya gharama kubwa kwa Los Angeles Dodgers anayepiga nyota Don Drysdale.

Wakati wa mfululizo wa 'Run, Vitabu vya Golden Golden vilichapisha "Acha kwa Beaver" (1959), kitabu cha hadithi cha bei rahisi cha watoto wadogo. Mwandishi wa watoto aliyetambulika Beverly Cleary alichapisha riwaya tatu za laini kulingana na safu, "Acha kwa Beaver" (1960), "Hapa kuna Beaver!" (1961), na "Beaver na Wally" (1961). Whitman kuchapisha kuchapishwa "Acha kwa Beaver: Moto!" (1962), riwaya ngumu ya Cole Fanin. Mnamo 1983, "Karatasi za Beaver" () na Will Jacobs na Gerard Jones zilichapishwa. Kitabu hiki ni mfano wa msimu uliopotea unaojumuisha vipindi ishirini na tano vilivyoandikwa kwa mtindo wa waandishi anuwai kama vile Tennessee Williams, Ernest Hemingway, na William Faulkner-toleo la kumbukumbu ya miaka 30 lilichapishwa mnamo 2013 na Atomic Drop Press.

"Acha kwa Beavers" ilipokea hakiki nzuri. A.V. Kevin McFarland wa Club alitoa kipindi hicho kuwa daraja la "B" na kuandika, "karibu theluthi mbili ya njia kupitia 'Acha kwa Beavers,' mmoja wa Beaver Wesen anamwambia Nick kwamba 'Ushujaa hayuko katika maumbile yetu,' lakini shujaa wetu anakataa kuamini kuwa kawaida. Panga ushujaa wa kutosha kusimama kwa kitu chochote, kutoka kwa troll za Bridge zinazoongoza mila ya kizamani ili wavunaji wa kukusanya vichwa. Kufanya kazi.

Fred Rutherford (Richard Deacon, Oktoba 18, 1957-Mei 23, 1963) ni mfanyikazi mwenza wa Ward, anayeshinda. Fred ni baba wa mtoto wa kiume mwenye shida anayeitwa Clarence ("Lumpy"), na binti kuhusu umri wa Beaver anayeitwa Violet. Rutherfords wanashirikiana na washambuliaji mara kadhaa: kucheza kadi kwenye nyumba ya Cleaver na, baadaye, wakifurahia picha ya pichani pamoja. Fred anasafiri sana na anampa Ward bomba la Meerschaum baada ya kutembelea Ujerumani.Several "Andy Griffith Show" Wacheza walitokea kwenye "Acha kwa Beaver". Hal Smith, mji wa Mayberry Sot Otis Campbell, alionekana kama meneja wa mgahawa katika kipindi cha msimu wa nne "Beaver Hatakula", wakati Dorothy Neumann, mke wa Otis Campbell Rita kwenye "The Andy Griffith Show", alionekana katika "Kifua cha Jamii" kama mama wa Mayfield. Howard McNear, Barber Floyd Lawson wa Mayberry, alicheza kinyozi katika sehemu ya pili ya "Beaver" ya msimu wa pili. Burt Mustin (Mayfield's Gus, The Fireman) alikuwa na kazi ndefu kama Jud Fletcher kwenye "The Andy Griffith Show" na Will Wright (msimu wa kwanza wa Mayfield Pete, Fireman) alionekana kwenye "Andy Griffith Show" kama Ben Weaver, mmiliki wa duka la Idara ya Mayberry.

Kuiacha mpya kwa Beaver (pia inajulikana kama Beaver) ni safu ya Amerika ya sitcom kwa sitcom ya asili ya 1957-1963 "Acha kwa Beaver". Mfululizo huo ulianza na sinema ya televisheni ya kuungana tena ya 1983 "Bado Beaver" ambayo ilirushwa kwenye CBS mnamo Machi 1983.
Mafanikio ya sinema ya runinga yalichochea uundaji wa safu ya uamsho, ambayo pia yenye jina la "Bado Beaver", ambayo ilirushwa kwenye Kituo cha Disney kutoka 1984 hadi 1985. Mnamo 1986, mfululizo huo ulichukuliwa na TBS ambapo ilirushwa hadi Juni 1989.

Ulinganisho wa jinsi watoto wanavyoshirikiana na kaka na dada zao juu ya mipango ya televisheni ya hali ya miaka ya 1950 kama "Acha kwa Beaver" na "Baba anajua bora" na wale walio kwenye programu za 1980 kama "The Cosby Show" na "Mahusiano ya Familia" waligundua kuwa watoto waliingiliana zaidi katika miaka ya 1950 lakini walikuwa katikati ya hatua kuu ya hadithi katika 1980s.

"Ni ulimwengu mdogo" ni sehemu ya majaribio kutoka kwa safu ya televisheni ya Amerika "Acha kwa Beaver" (1957-1963). Pilot (iliyopendekezwa hapo awali kama "Wally na Beaver") ilipewa televisheni ya kwanza Aprili 23, 1957, kwenye safu ya anthology iliyoandaliwa, "Studio 57", bila wimbo wa kucheka wala safu ya wimbo unaojulikana, "The Toy Parade". Haijawahi kurushwa kama sehemu ndani ya safu. Ilipigwa televisheni tena mnamo Oktoba 2007 kama sehemu ya maadhimisho ya miaka 50 ya TV ya "Acha kwa Beaver". Iliachiliwa kwa DVD mnamo 2005. Mfululizo huo ulifanya deni lake la CBS miezi kadhaa baadaye Oktoba 4, 1957, na sehemu hiyo, "Beaver hupata 'spelling".

Wapeana maoni wa kisasa walisifu "Acha kwa Beaver", na "anuwai" kulinganisha Beaver na Mark Twain's Tom Sawyer. Bidhaa nyingi za vijana zilitolewa wakati wa kipindi cha kwanza cha onyesho, pamoja na michezo ya bodi, riwaya, na vitabu vya ucheshi. Kipindi hicho kimefurahiya Renaissance katika umaarufu tangu miaka ya 1970 kupitia usambazaji wa mtandao, mkutano wa Telemovie ("Bado Beaver", 1983) na safu ya safu, "Acha mpya kwa Beaver" (1985-89). Mnamo 1997, toleo la sinema kulingana na safu ya asili lilitolewa kwa hakiki hasi. Mnamo Oktoba 2007, Ardhi ya TV ilisherehekea kumbukumbu ya miaka 50 na mbio. Ingawa onyesho halijawahi kuvunja Viwango vya Nielsen Juu 30 au kushinda tuzo yoyote, iliwekwa kwenye orodha ya "Time" ya jarida la 2007 la "vipindi vya Televisheni vya wakati wote".

Jumuia za Dell zilichapisha vitabu sita vya "Acha kwa Beaver" na vifuniko vya picha vya Beaver, Beaver na Wally, au Beaver na Ward. Kitabu cha kwanza cha ucheshi (rangi nne Na. 912) ni tarehe Juni 1958 na ya mwisho (rangi nne Na. 01-428-207) Mei-Julai 1962. Mnamo 2004, wote sita Dell "Acha kwa Beaver" vitabu vya vichekesho katika hali ya 'karibu mint' vilithaminiwa zaidi ya dola mia mbili kila moja.

Msimu wa kwanza wa "Veronica Mars" unaonyesha "kesi tofauti ya wiki" kila sehemu, na siri ya muda mrefu ya mauaji ya Lilly Kane. Mbali na kukuza siri tofauti kwa kila sehemu, waandishi pia walilazimika kutoa dalili ambazo zingesababisha azimio la mauaji katika fainali ya msimu. Njama ya siri ya mauaji ilipangwa tangu mwanzo wa msimu na kitambulisho cha muuaji kilibaki sawa wakati wote wa uzalishaji. Thomas alisema kuwa mwanzoni mwa msimu, "Ninajua viboko pana, najua ni nani aliyefanya hivyo, najua jinsi ilifanywa, najua arcs kubwa, lakini kila wakati tunajaza maelezo. Hizo ni wiki hadi wiki. Ni changamoto ya wiki hadi wiki kwenye chumba cha waandishi kinachozingatia ni habari ngapi tunataka kuwafanya watazamaji."
report_src: “Acha kwa Beaver” iliendelea kurushwa hewani kwa takribani miaka 5 na nusu, kuanzia 4 Oktoba 1957 ilipozinduliwa kwenye CBS hadi 20 Juni 1963 ilipomaliza mbio yake kwenye ABC, ikiwa na jumla ya misimu sita kamili ya wiki 39 kila moja na vipindi 234 [1].
all_claims: “Acha kwa Beaver” iliendelea kurushwa hewani kwa takribani miaka 5 na nusu, kuanzia 4 Oktoba 1957 ilipozinduliwa kwenye CBS hadi 20 Juni 1963 ilipomaliza mbio yake kwenye ABC, ikiwa na jumla ya misimu sita kamili ya wiki 39 kila moja na vipindi 234 [1].

question_en: What is the largest producer of rye grain in the world?
pos_context_en: Rye is grown primarily in Eastern, Central and Northern Europe. The main rye belt stretches from northern Germany through Poland, Ukraine, Belarus, Lithuania and Latvia into central and northern Russia. Rye is also grown in North America (Canada and the United States), in South America (Argentina, Brazil and Chile), in Oceania (Australia and New Zealand), in Turkey, in Kazakhstan and in northern China.
neg_context_en: Central European countries are some of the most significant food producers in the world. Germany is the world's largest hops producer with 34.27% share in 2010, third producer of rye and barley, 5th rapeseed producer, sixth largest milk producer, and fifth largest potato producer. Poland is the world's largest triticale producer, second largest producer of raspberry, currant, third largest of rye, the fifth apple and buckwheat producer, and seventh largest producer of potatoes. The Czech Republic is world's fourth largest hops producer and 8th producer of triticale. Hungary is world's fifth hops and seventh largest triticale producer. Serbia is world's second largest producer of plums and second largest of raspberries. Slovenia is world's sixth hops producer.

Since Poland's accession to the European Union in 2004, Polish agriculture has performed extremely well and the country has over two million private farms. It is the leading producer in Europe of potatoes and rye (world's second largest in 1989) the world's largest producer of triticale, and one of the more important producers of barley, oats, sugar beets, flax, and fruits. Poland is the European Union's fourth largest supplier of pork after Germany, Spain and France.

Grain sorghum is the third most important cereal crop grown in the United States and the fifth most important cereal crop grown in the world. In 2010, Nigeria was the world's largest producer of grain sorghum, followed by the United States and India. In developed countries, and increasingly in developing countries such as India, the predominant use of sorghum is as fodder for poultry and cattle. Leading exporters in 2010 were the United States, Australia and Argentina; Mexico was the largest importer of sorghum.

Belgrove Distillery commenced production of mostly Rye Whisky in late 2010. All the grain used is grown on site, mostly rye but also oats, barley, wheat and spelt. Belgrove won Whisky Magazine ICONS OF WHISKY AUSTRALIA CRAFT PRODUCER OF THE YEAR 2019 as well as Jim Murray Whisky Bible Southern Hemisphere Whisky of the year 2019
One of the largest producers of rye flatbreads, and one of the most prominent in overseas markets, is the Swedish-founded company Wasabröd.

"Resurgens Rye" was the first whiskey distilled at ASW Distillery's Atlanta facility and is Atlanta's first rye since Prohibition, unique for being a single malt whiskey made from 100% malted rye grain, in contrast to the cereal rye comprising the base of most whiskey made from rye. It was introduced to the Atlanta market in late 2016. It won a Silver Medal at San Francisco World Spirits Competition.

Peel had good timing getting into the ergot business, because supplies in the United States had been subject to disruption. Russia was the world's principal exporter of ergot until the Russian Revolution in 1917. Spain then became the top producer of ergot, but supplies were then disrupted with the Spanish Civil War in 1936. In an effort to ensure his supply of raw materials, Peel began a campaign to educate farmers on the importance of ergot. Eli Lilly and Company, one of Peel's major customers, also assisted in this effort by providing publicity. Universal Laboratories began receiving considerable amounts of ergotic rye, which was stored in a grain elevator in downtown Dassel. The company supplied the vast majority of domestically produced ergot in the United States during World War II. In 1940, they produced , while in 1941, production was .

Historically Maryland is not known for bourbon products and was the third largest producer of rye whiskey behind Kentucky bourbon and Pennsylvania rye up until the early 1900s with the last distiller closing its doors in 1983. In 2013, Lyon's Distilling in Blackwater's Eastern Shore was the first to start distilling a true Maryland rye whiskey.

Rye whiskey was historically the prevalent whiskey in the northeastern states, especially Pennsylvania and Maryland. Pittsburgh was the center of rye whiskey production in the late 1700s and early 1800s. By 1808, Allegheny County farmers were selling one half barrel for each man, woman and child in the country. By the 1880s, Joseph F. Sinnott's distillery, Moore and Sinnott, located in Monongahela was the single largest producer of rye whiskey, with a capacity of 30,000 barrels a year. Rye whiskey largely disappeared after Prohibition. A few brands, such as Old Overholt, survived, although by the late 1960s former Pennsylvania brands like Old Overholt were being distilled mostly in Kentucky.

Present-day Poland is a country with favorable agricultural prospects, and over two million private farms. It is the leading producer of potatoes and rye in Europe, the world's largest producer of triticale, and one of the more important producers of barley, oats, sugar beets, flax, and various fruits. It is also the European Union's fourth largest supplier of pig meat after Germany, Spain and France.
question_src: Je! Ni nini mtayarishaji mkubwa zaidi wa nafaka za rye ulimwenguni?
pos_context_src: Rye hupandwa kimsingi mashariki, kati na kaskazini mwa Ulaya. Ukanda kuu wa rye unaanzia kaskazini mwa Ujerumani kupitia Poland, Ukraine, Belarusi, Lithuania na Latvia hadi Urusi ya kati na kaskazini. Rye pia hupandwa Amerika Kaskazini (Canada na Merika), Amerika Kusini (Argentina, Brazil na Chile), huko Oceania (Australia na New Zealand), nchini Uturuki, huko Kazakhstan na kaskazini mwa Uchina.
neg_context_src: Nchi za Ulaya ya Kati ni baadhi ya wazalishaji muhimu zaidi wa chakula ulimwenguni. Ujerumani ndio mtayarishaji mkubwa zaidi wa hops ulimwenguni na kushiriki 34.27% mnamo 2010, mtayarishaji wa tatu wa rye na shayiri, mtayarishaji wa 5 aliyebakwa, mtayarishaji wa sita wa maziwa, na mtayarishaji mkubwa wa tano wa viazi. Poland ndio mtayarishaji mkubwa zaidi wa ulimwengu wa Triticale, mtayarishaji wa pili mkubwa wa Raspberry, Currant, tatu kwa ukubwa wa Rye, Apple ya tano na mtayarishaji wa Buckwheat, na mtayarishaji wa saba wa viazi. Jamhuri ya Czech ni mtayarishaji wa nne wakubwa ulimwenguni na mtayarishaji wa 8 wa Triticale. Hungary ni hops ya tano ulimwenguni na mtayarishaji mkubwa wa saba wa Triticale. Serbia ni mtayarishaji wa pili mkubwa ulimwenguni wa plums na pili kubwa ya raspberries. Slovenia ni mtayarishaji wa sita wa ulimwengu.

Tangu kuingia kwa Poland kwa Jumuiya ya Ulaya mnamo 2004, kilimo cha Kipolishi kimefanya vizuri sana na nchi hiyo ina shamba zaidi ya milioni mbili. Ni mtayarishaji anayeongoza huko Uropa wa Viazi na Rye (wa pili kwa ukubwa ulimwenguni mnamo 1989) mtayarishaji mkubwa zaidi wa ulimwengu wa Triticale, na mmoja wa wazalishaji muhimu zaidi wa shayiri, shayiri, beets za sukari, kitani, na matunda. Poland ni muuzaji wa nne wakubwa wa Umoja wa Ulaya baada ya Ujerumani, Uhispania na Ufaransa.

Mchanganyiko wa nafaka ni mazao ya tatu muhimu zaidi ya nafaka yaliyopandwa nchini Merika na mazao ya tano muhimu zaidi ya nafaka yaliyopandwa ulimwenguni. Mnamo mwaka wa 2010, Nigeria ilikuwa mtayarishaji mkubwa zaidi wa mtambo wa nafaka, ikifuatiwa na Merika na India. Katika nchi zilizoendelea, na inazidi katika nchi zinazoendelea kama India, matumizi ya kawaida ya mtama ni kama lishe ya kuku na ng'ombe. Wauzaji wanaoongoza mnamo 2010 walikuwa Merika, Australia na Argentina; Mexico ilikuwa kuingiza kubwa zaidi ya mtama.

Belgrove distillery ilianza uzalishaji wa whisky ya rye mwishoni mwa mwaka wa 2010. Nafaka zote zilizotumiwa hupandwa kwenye tovuti, zaidi ya rye lakini pia oats, shayiri, ngano na spelling. Belgrove alishinda icons za gazeti la whisky la Whisky Australia Craft Mzalishaji wa Mwaka 2019 na Jim Murray Whisky Bible Kusini mwa Hemisphere Whisky ya Mwaka 2019
Mmoja wa wazalishaji wakubwa wa mkate wa rye, na moja ya maarufu katika masoko ya nje ya nchi, ni kampuni iliyowekwa na Uswidi Wasabröd.

"Resurgens Rye" ilikuwa whisky ya kwanza iliyowekwa katika kituo cha Atlanta cha Asw Distillery na ni Rye ya kwanza ya Atlanta tangu kukataza, kipekee kwa kuwa whisky moja ya malt iliyotengenezwa kutoka kwa 100% malted rye nafaka, tofauti na rye ya nafaka inayojumuisha msingi wa whisky iliyotengenezwa na Rye. Ilianzishwa katika soko la Atlanta mwishoni mwa mwaka wa 2016. Ilishinda medali ya fedha katika Mashindano ya San Francisco World Spirits.

Peel alikuwa na wakati mzuri wa kuingia kwenye biashara ya Ergot, kwa sababu vifaa nchini Merika vilikuwa vimepatikana kwa usumbufu. Urusi ilikuwa muuzaji mkuu wa ulimwengu wa Ergot hadi Mapinduzi ya Urusi mnamo 1917. Uhispania kisha ikawa mtayarishaji wa juu wa Ergot, lakini vifaa vilivurugika na Vita vya wenyewe kwa wenyewe vya Uhispania mnamo 1936. Katika juhudi za kuhakikisha usambazaji wake wa malighafi, Peel alianza kampeni ya kuelimisha wakulima juu ya umuhimu wa Ergot. Eli Lilly na Kampuni, mmoja wa wateja wakuu wa Peel, pia alisaidia katika juhudi hii kwa kutoa utangazaji. Maabara ya Universal ilianza kupokea idadi kubwa ya rye ya ergotic, ambayo ilihifadhiwa kwenye lifti ya nafaka huko Downtown Dassel. Kampuni hiyo ilitoa idadi kubwa ya Ergot iliyotengenezwa ndani nchini Merika wakati wa Vita vya Kidunia vya pili. Mnamo 1940, walitengeneza, wakati mnamo 1941, uzalishaji ulikuwa.

Kwa kihistoria Maryland haijulikani kwa bidhaa za Bourbon na alikuwa mtayarishaji wa tatu mkubwa wa Rye Whisky nyuma ya Kentucky Bourbon na Pennsylvania Rye hadi mwanzoni mwa 1900s na distiller ya mwisho kufunga milango yake mnamo 1983. Mnamo 2013, Lyon's Distilling katika Shore ya Mashariki ya Blackwater ilikuwa ya kwanza kuanza kuteremsha Maryland.

Rye Whisky alikuwa kihistoria whisky iliyoenea katika majimbo ya kaskazini mashariki, haswa Pennsylvania na Maryland. Pittsburgh ilikuwa kitovu cha uzalishaji wa Rye Whisky mwishoni mwa miaka ya 1700 na mapema 1800s. Kufikia 1808, wakulima wa Kaunti ya Allegheny walikuwa wakiuza pipa moja kwa kila mwanaume, mwanamke na mtoto nchini. Kufikia miaka ya 1880, Joseph F. Sinnott's distillery, Moore na Sinnott, iliyoko Monongahela alikuwa mtayarishaji mkubwa zaidi wa Rye Whisky, na uwezo wa mapipa 30,000 kwa mwaka. Rye whisky ilipotea sana baada ya kukataza. Bidhaa chache, kama vile Old Overholt, zilinusurika, ingawa mwishoni mwa miaka ya 1960 chapa za zamani za Pennsylvania kama Old Overholt zilikuwa zikishushwa sana huko Kentucky.

Poland ya leo ni nchi yenye matarajio mazuri ya kilimo, na zaidi ya shamba milioni mbili za kibinafsi. Ni mtayarishaji anayeongoza wa viazi na rye huko Uropa, mtayarishaji mkubwa zaidi ulimwenguni wa Triticale, na mmoja wa wazalishaji muhimu zaidi wa shayiri, shayiri, beets za sukari, kitani, na matunda kadhaa. Pia ni muuzaji wa nne mkubwa wa nyama ya nguruwe baada ya Ujerumani, Uhispania na Ufaransa.
