question_en: Who first developed reflection seismology?
pos_context_en: The Canadian inventor Reginald Fessenden was the first to conceive of using reflected seismic waves to infer geology. His work was initially on the propagation of acoustic waves in water, motivated by the sinking of the Titanic by an iceberg in 1912. He also worked on methods of detecting submarines during World War I. He applied for the first patent on a seismic exploration method in 1914, which was issued in 1917. Due to the war, he was unable to follow up on the idea. John Clarence Karcher discovered seismic reflections independently while working for the United States Bureau of Standards (now the National Institute of Standards and Technology) on methods of sound ranging to detect artillery. In discussion with colleagues, the idea developed that these reflections could aid in exploration for petroleum. With several others, many affiliated with the University of Oklahoma, Karcher helped to form the Geological Engineering Company, incorporated in Oklahoma in April, 1920. The first field tests were conducted near Oklahoma City, Oklahoma in 1921.
neg_context_en:
Reflection seismology (or seismic reflection) is a method of exploration geophysics that uses the principles of seismology to estimate the properties of the Earth's subsurface from reflected seismic waves. The method requires a controlled seismic source of energy, such as dynamite or Tovex blast, a specialized air gun or a seismic vibrator, commonly known by the trademark name Vibroseis. Reflection seismology is similar to sonar and echolocation. This article is about surface seismic surveys; for vertical seismic profiles, see VSP.
Reflections and refractions of seismic waves at geologic interfaces within the Earth were first observed on recordings of earthquake-generated seismic waves. The basic model of the Earth's deep interior is based on observations of earthquake-generated seismic waves transmitted through the Earth’s interior (e.g., Mohorovičić, 1910). The use of human-generated seismic waves to map in detail the geology of the upper few kilometers of the Earth's crust followed shortly thereafter and has developed mainly due to commercial enterprise, particularly the petroleum industry.

The use of reflection seismology in studies of tectonics and the Earth's crust was pioneered in the 1970s by groups such as the Consortium for Continental Reflection Profiling (COCORP), who inspired deep seismic exploration in other countries such as BIRPS in Great Britain and ECORS in France. The British Institutions Reflection Profiling Syndicate (BIRPS) was started up as a result of oil hydrocarbon exploration in the North Sea. It became clear that there was a lack of understanding of the tectonic processes that had formed the geological structures and sedimentary basins which were being explored. The effort produced some significant results and showed that it is possible to profile features such as thrust faults that penetrate through the crust to the upper mantle with marine seismic surveys.

In common with other geophysical methods, reflection seismology may be seen as a type of inverse problem. That is, given a set of data collected by experimentation and the physical laws that apply to the experiment, the experimenter wishes to develop an abstract model of the physical system being studied. In the case of reflection seismology, the experimental data are recorded seismograms, and the desired result is a model of the structure and physical properties of the Earth's crust. In common with other types of inverse problems, the results obtained from reflection seismology are usually not unique (more than one model adequately fits the data) and may be sensitive to relatively small errors in data collection, processing, or analysis. For these reasons, great care must be taken when interpreting the results of a reflection seismic survey.

The Geological Engineering Company folded due to a drop in the price of oil. In 1925, oil prices had rebounded, and Karcher helped to form Geophysical Research Corporation (GRC) as part of the oil company Amerada. In 1930, Karcher left GRC and helped to found Geophysical Service Incorporated (GSI). GSI was one of the most successful seismic contracting companies for over 50 years and was the parent of an even more successful company, Texas Instruments. Early GSI employee Henry Salvatori left that company in 1933 to found another major seismic contractor, Western Geophysical. 
Many other companies using reflection seismology in hydrocarbon exploration, hydrology, engineering studies, and other applications have been formed since the method was first invented. Major service companies today include CGG, ION Geophysical, Petroleum Geo-Services, Polarcus, TGS and WesternGeco. Most major oil companies also have actively conducted research into seismic methods as well as collected and processed seismic data using their own personnel and technology. Reflection seismology has also found applications in non-commercial research by academic and government scientists around the world.

The concept of deconvolution had an early application in reflection seismology. In 1950, Enders Robinson was a graduate student at MIT. He worked with others at MIT, such as Norbert Wiener, Norman Levinson, and economist Paul Samuelson, to develop the "convolutional model" of a reflection seismogram. This model assumes that the recorded seismogram "s"("t") is the convolution of an Earth-reflectivity function "e"("t") and a seismic wavelet "w"("t") from a point source, where "t" represents recording time. Thus, our convolution equation is
Early reflection seismology was viewed with skepticism by many in the oil industry. An early advocate of the method commented:

Knott's equations, derived in terms of potentials, were the first to describe the amplitudes of reflected and refracted waves at non-normal incidence and together with the Zoeppritz equations are now the basis for modern reflection seismology – an important technique in hydrocarbon exploration.

With Cornell colleague Sidney Kaufman, Oliver co-founded the first national program using reflection seismology to explore Earth's continental crust. The Consortium for Continental Reflection Profiling (COCORP) was initially funded by a small grant from the NSF. It has been used to map geological faults in many parts of the US, and has served as a model for seismic exploration projects in more than 20 other countries.

Reflection seismology, more commonly referred to as "seismic reflection" or abbreviated to "seismic" within the hydrocarbon industry, is used by petroleum geologists and geophysicists to map and interpret potential petroleum reservoirs. The size and scale of seismic surveys has increased alongside the significant concurrent increases in computer power during the last 25 years. This has led the seismic industry from laboriously – and therefore rarely – acquiring small 3D surveys in the 1980s to now routinely acquiring large-scale high resolution 3D surveys. The goals and basic principles have remained the same, but the methods have slightly changed over the years.
question_src: Ni nani aliyeendeleza Seismology ya Tafakari ya kwanza?
pos_context_src: Mvumbuzi wa Canada Reginald Fessenden alikuwa wa kwanza kuchukua mimba ya kutumia mawimbi ya mshtuko wa kueneza jiolojia. Kazi yake hapo awali ilikuwa juu ya uenezaji wa mawimbi ya acoustic ndani ya maji, ikichochewa na kuzama kwa Titanic na barafu mnamo 1912. Pia alifanya kazi kwa njia za kugundua manowari wakati wa Vita vya Kidunia. Aliomba kwa patent ya kwanza kwenye njia ya uchunguzi wa seismic mnamo 1914, ambayo ilitolewa mnamo 1917. Kwa sababu ya vita, hakutaka. John Clarence Karcher aligundua tafakari za mshikamano kwa uhuru wakati akifanya kazi kwa Ofisi ya Viwango ya Merika (sasa Taasisi ya Kitaifa ya Viwango na Teknolojia) juu ya njia za sauti kuanzia kugundua sanaa. Katika majadiliano na wenzake, wazo hilo lilikuza kwamba tafakari hizi zinaweza kusaidia katika utafutaji wa mafuta. Na wengine kadhaa, wengi walishirikiana na Chuo Kikuu cha Oklahoma, Karcher alisaidia kuunda kampuni ya uhandisi ya jiolojia, iliyojumuishwa huko Oklahoma mnamo Aprili, 1920. Vipimo vya uwanja wa kwanza vilifanywa karibu na Oklahoma City, Oklahoma mnamo 1921.
neg_context_src:
Tafakari ya Seismology (au Tafakari ya Seismic) ni njia ya utafutaji wa jiografia ambayo hutumia kanuni za seismolojia kukadiria mali ya subsurface ya Dunia kutoka kwa mawimbi ya seismic yaliyoonyeshwa. Njia hiyo inahitaji chanzo cha nguvu kinachodhibitiwa cha nishati, kama vile mlipuko wa nguvu au tovex, bunduki maalum ya hewa au vibrator ya seismic, inayojulikana na jina la alama ya vibroseis. Seismology ya Tafakari ni sawa na sonar na echolocation. Nakala hii ni juu ya uchunguzi wa uso wa uso; Kwa maelezo mafupi ya wima ya wima, ona VSP.
Tafakari na viboreshaji vya mawimbi ya mshikamano katika miingiliano ya jiografia ndani ya Dunia ilizingatiwa kwanza kwenye rekodi za mawimbi ya mshtuko wa tetemeko la ardhi. Mfano wa msingi wa mambo ya ndani ya ulimwengu ni msingi wa uchunguzi wa mawimbi ya mshtuko wa tetemeko la ardhi yanayopitishwa kupitia mambo ya ndani ya Dunia (k.m. Mohorovičić, 1910). Matumizi ya mawimbi ya kibinadamu yaliyotokana na kibinadamu kuweka ramani kwa undani jiografia ya kilomita chache za juu za ukoko wa Dunia ilifuatiwa muda mfupi baadaye na imeendelea sana kwa sababu ya biashara ya kibiashara, haswa tasnia ya petroli.

Matumizi ya tafakari ya seismology katika masomo ya tectonics na ukoko wa Dunia ilichangiwa katika miaka ya 1970 na vikundi kama vile Consortium ya Utaftaji wa Tafakari ya Bara (CoCORP), ambao walichochea uchunguzi wa kina wa seismic katika nchi zingine kama BIRPs huko Great Britain na Ecors huko Ufaransa. Taasisi za Briteni Tafakari za Utaftaji (BIRPs) zilianzishwa kama matokeo ya uchunguzi wa hydrocarbon ya mafuta katika Bahari ya Kaskazini. Ilibainika kuwa kulikuwa na ukosefu wa uelewa wa michakato ya tectonic ambayo ilikuwa imeunda miundo ya kijiolojia na mabonde ya sedimentary ambayo yalikuwa yakichunguzwa. Jaribio hilo lilileta matokeo kadhaa muhimu na ilionyesha kuwa inawezekana kutoa maelezo kama vile makosa ya kutuliza ambayo huingia kupitia ukoko hadi kwenye vazi la juu na uchunguzi wa baharini.

Kwa kawaida na njia zingine za kijiografia, seismolojia ya kutafakari inaweza kuonekana kama aina ya shida. Hiyo ni, kwa kuzingatia seti ya data iliyokusanywa na majaribio na sheria za mwili zinazotumika kwenye jaribio, majaribio yanataka kukuza mfano wa mfumo wa mwili unaosomwa. Katika kesi ya kutafakari seismology, data ya majaribio ni kumbukumbu za kumbukumbu, na matokeo yanayotaka ni mfano wa muundo na mali ya mwili wa ukoko wa Dunia. Kwa kawaida na aina zingine za shida mbaya, matokeo yaliyopatikana kutoka kwa seismolojia ya kutafakari kawaida sio ya kipekee (zaidi ya mfano mmoja inafaa data) na inaweza kuwa nyeti kwa makosa madogo katika ukusanyaji wa data, usindikaji, au uchambuzi. Kwa sababu hizi, uangalifu mkubwa lazima uchukuliwe wakati wa kutafsiri matokeo ya uchunguzi wa mshtuko wa hali ya hewa.

Kampuni ya Uhandisi wa Jiolojia iliongezwa kwa sababu ya kushuka kwa bei ya mafuta. Mnamo 1925, bei ya mafuta ilikuwa imeongezeka tena, na Karcher alisaidia kuunda Shirika la Utafiti wa Geophysical (GRC) kama sehemu ya kampuni ya mafuta Amerada. Mnamo 1930, Karcher aliondoka GRC na kusaidia kupata huduma ya jiografia ikiingizwa (GSI). GSI ilikuwa moja ya kampuni iliyofanikiwa zaidi ya kuambukizwa kwa seismic kwa zaidi ya miaka 50 na alikuwa mzazi wa kampuni iliyofanikiwa zaidi, Vyombo vya Texas. Mfanyikazi wa mapema wa GSI Henry Salvatori aliondoka kampuni hiyo mnamo 1933 kupata mkandarasi mwingine mkubwa wa mshtuko, Western Geophysical. 
Kampuni zingine nyingi zinazotumia seismology ya kutafakari katika uchunguzi wa hydrocarbon, hydrology, masomo ya uhandisi, na matumizi mengine yameundwa tangu njia hiyo ilibuniwa kwanza. Kampuni kubwa za huduma leo ni pamoja na CGG, Ion Geophysical, Petroli Geo-Huduma, Polarcus, TGS na Westergeco. Kampuni kubwa zaidi za mafuta pia zimefanya utafiti kikamilifu katika njia za mshikamano na pia zilizokusanywa na kusindika data za mshikamano kwa kutumia wafanyikazi wao na teknolojia. Seismology ya Tafakari pia imepata matumizi katika utafiti usio wa kibiashara na wanasayansi wa kitaaluma na serikali kote ulimwenguni.

Wazo la uamuzi lilikuwa na matumizi ya mapema katika kutafakari kwa seismology. Mnamo 1950, Enders Robinson alikuwa mwanafunzi aliyehitimu huko MIT. Alifanya kazi na wengine huko MIT, kama vile Norbert Wiener, Norman Levinson, na mtaalam wa uchumi Paul Samuelson, kukuza "mfano wa kigeugeu" wa seismogram ya kuonyesha. Mtindo huu unadhani kuwa seismogram iliyorekodiwa "S" ("T") ni uamuzi wa kazi ya kutafakari ya Dunia "E" ("T") na wimbi la mshtuko "W" ("T") kutoka kwa chanzo cha uhakika, ambapo "T" inawakilisha wakati wa kurekodi. Kwa hivyo, equation yetu ya uamuzi ni
Seismology ya kutafakari mapema ilitazamwa na mashaka na wengi katika tasnia ya mafuta. Wakili wa mapema wa njia hiyo alisema:

Viwango vya Knott, vinavyotokana na uwezo, vilikuwa vya kwanza kuelezea nafasi za mawimbi yaliyoonyeshwa na yaliyosafishwa kwa matukio yasiyokuwa ya kawaida na pamoja na hesabu za Zoeppritz sasa ndio msingi wa seismology ya kisasa-mbinu muhimu katika uchunguzi wa hydrocarbon.

Na mwenzake wa Cornell Sidney Kaufman, Oliver alianzisha mpango wa kwanza wa kitaifa kwa kutumia seismolojia ya kutafakari kuchunguza ukoko wa bara la Dunia. Consortium ya Utaftaji wa Tafakari ya Bara (COCORP) hapo awali ilifadhiliwa na ruzuku ndogo kutoka NSF. Imetumika kuchora makosa ya kijiolojia katika sehemu nyingi za Amerika, na imetumika kama mfano wa miradi ya uchunguzi wa seismic katika nchi zaidi ya 20.

Tafakari ya Seismology, inayojulikana zaidi kama "tafakari ya seismic" au iliyofupishwa kwa "seismic" ndani ya tasnia ya hydrocarbon, hutumiwa na jiolojia ya petroli na jiografia kwa ramani na kutafsiri hifadhi za petroli. Saizi na kiwango cha tafiti za mshtuko zimeongezeka kando na ongezeko kubwa la nguvu za kompyuta wakati wa miaka 25 iliyopita. Hii imesababisha tasnia ya mshtuko kutoka kwa bidii-na kwa hivyo mara chache-kupata uchunguzi mdogo wa 3D katika miaka ya 1980 hadi sasa kupata uchunguzi wa kiwango cha juu cha 3D. Malengo na kanuni za msingi zimebaki sawa, lakini njia zimebadilika kidogo kwa miaka.
report_src: Seismology ya tafakari ya kwanza iliendelezwa na John Clarence Karcher, ambaye mwaka 1919–1921 aligundua kwa kujitegemea tafakari za mawimbi ya mshtuko akiwa Ofisi ya Viwango ya Marekani, kisha akaendeleza wazo hilo kama zana ya kutafuta mafuta na kuongoza uundaji wa kampuni ya kwanza ya uhandisi wa jiolojia iliyoanzishwa Oklahoma mnamo Aprili 1920, ambapo vipimo vya uwanja wa kwanza vilifanywa mwaka 1921 [1].

question_en: Which character has been on General Hospital for the longest time?
pos_context_title_en: List of General Hospital cast members
pos_context_en: "General Hospital" is an American television soap opera, airing on ABC. Created by Frank and Doris Hursley, the serial premiered on April 1, 1963. The longest-running cast member is Leslie Charleson, who has portrayed Dr. Monica Quartermaine since August 17, 1977, also making her one of the longest-tenured actors in American soap operas. Former cast member Rachel Ames was previously the series' longest-running cast member, portraying Audrey Hardy from 1964 to 2007, and making guest appearances in 2009 and 2013, the latter for the series' fiftieth anniversary. Ames made a special appearance on October 30, 2015. Actors Genie Francis and Kin Shriner, who portray Laura Spencer and Scott Baldwin, are the second and third longest-running cast members, having joined "General Hospital" in February and August 1977, respectively. Actress Jacklyn Zeman — who portrays Bobbie Spencer — is the fourth longest-running cast member, joining the serial in December 1977. Actress Jane Elliot, who joined the serial in June 1978 as Tracy Quartermaine, is the fifth longest-running cast member, joining "General Hospital" in June 1978 until her departure in May 2017. Former cast member Anthony Geary, who portrayed Luke Spencer, was the sixth longest-running cast member, having joined "General Hospital" in November 1978. The following list is of cast members who are currently on the show: the main and recurring cast members, or those who are debuting, departing or returning to the series.

The series premiered on April 1, 1963. The following are characters from the American soap opera "General Hospital", who are notable for being the children of important characters. Introduced in various years, these children have played significant roles in a number of storylines over the years.

Tracy Quartermaine is a fictional character on the ABC soap opera "General Hospital". She is played by actress Jane Elliot, who originated the role in 1978 and has played her intermittently since that time, primarily on "GH" (1978–80, 1989–93, 1996, 2003–17) and briefly on "The City" (1996–97). In 1980, Elliot won the Daytime Emmy for outstanding supporting actress, and was nominated again in 1993. Briefly in 1989, while Jane Elliot was on maternal leave, Christine Jones took on the role. Tracy Quartermaine is currently the show's fifth longest-serving character after Dr. Monica Quartermaine, Luke Spencer, Laura Spencer and Scott Baldwin.

"General Hospital" aired its 10,000th episode on April 17, 2002, with an episode that revolved around the show's longest-running cast member, Rachel Ames. The episode commemorated her character Audrey March Hardy, celebrating her 10,000th shift as a nurse at the hospital. The episode was notable for showcasing the show's long history in a series of clips and montages.
question_src: Je! Ni tabia gani iliyokuwa kwenye Hospitali Kuu kwa muda mrefu zaidi?
pos_context_title_src: Orodha ya washiriki wa jumla wa hospitali
pos_context_src: "Hospitali Kuu" ni opera ya sabuni ya televisheni ya Amerika, inayoangazia ABC. Iliundwa na Frank na Doris Hursley, wahusika wakuu wa Aprili 1, 1963. Mwanachama mrefu zaidi wa wahusika ni Leslie Charleson, ambaye ameonyesha Dk. Monica Quartermaine tangu Agosti 17, 1977, pia akimfanya kuwa mmoja wa watendaji wa muda mrefu zaidi katika shughuli za SOAP za Amerika. Mwanachama wa zamani wa wahusika Rachel Ames hapo awali alikuwa mwanachama wa muda mrefu zaidi wa wahusika, akionyesha Audrey Hardy kutoka 1964 hadi 2007, na kufanya kuonekana kwa wageni mnamo 2009 na 2013, mwisho wa maadhimisho ya miaka hamsini. Ames alionekana maalum mnamo Oktoba 30, 2015. Waigizaji Genie Francis na Kin Shriner, ambao wanaonyesha Laura Spencer na Scott Baldwin, ni washiriki wa pili na wa tatu wa muda mrefu zaidi, wamejiunga na "Hospitali kuu" mnamo Februari na Agosti 1977, mtawaliwa. Mwigizaji Jacklyn Zeman-ambaye anaonyesha Bobbie Spencer-ndiye mwanachama wa nne anayesimamia muda mrefu zaidi, akijiunga na serial mnamo Desemba 1977. Mwigizaji Jane Elliot, ambaye alijiunga na serial mnamo Juni 1978 kama Tracy Quartermaine, ndiye mjumbe wa tano aliyetupwa, Anthony wa kwanza, wahusika wa kwanza wa Anthony. Mwanachama wa muda mrefu zaidi wa sita, baada ya kujiunga na "Hospitali kuu" mnamo Novemba 1978. Orodha ifuatayo ni ya washiriki ambao kwa sasa wako kwenye onyesho: washiriki wakuu na wanaorudiwa, au wale ambao wanajadili, wanaondoka au wanarudi kwenye safu hiyo.

Mnamo miaka ya 1970, jiji hilo liliitwa Port Charles, New York. Mfululizo huo uliangaziwa Aprili 1, 1963. Ifuatayo ni wahusika kutoka Opera ya Sabuni ya Amerika "Hospitali kuu", ambao wanajulikana kwa kuwa watoto wa wahusika muhimu. Ilianzisha katika miaka tofauti, watoto hawa wamecheza majukumu muhimu katika idadi ya hadithi kwa miaka.

Tracy Quartermaine ni tabia ya uwongo kwenye Opera ya Sabuni ya ABC "Hospitali kuu". Anachezwa na mwigizaji Jane Elliot, ambaye alianzisha jukumu hilo mnamo 1978 na amecheza naye mara kwa mara tangu wakati huo, haswa kwenye "GH" (1978-80, 1989-93, 1996, 2003-17) na kwa ufupi juu ya "Jiji" (1996-97). Mnamo 1980, Elliot alishinda Emmy wa mchana kwa mwigizaji bora anayeunga mkono, na aliteuliwa tena mnamo 1993. Kwa kifupi mnamo 1989, wakati Jane Elliot alikuwa likizo ya mama, Christine Jones alichukua jukumu hilo. Tracy Quartermaine kwa sasa ni mhusika wa tano anayetumikia kwa muda mrefu baada ya Dk. Monica Quartermaine, Luke Spencer, Laura Spencer na Scott Baldwin.

"Hospitali Kuu" ilirusha sehemu yake ya 10,000 Aprili 17, 2002, na sehemu ambayo ilizunguka mwanachama wa muda mrefu zaidi wa show, Rachel Ames. Sehemu hiyo ilikumbuka tabia yake Audrey Machi Hardy, akiadhimisha mabadiliko yake ya 10,000 kama muuguzi hospitalini. Sehemu hiyo ilijulikana kwa kuonyesha historia ndefu ya onyesho katika safu ya sehemu na montages.

question_en: Where did Rugby originate?
pos_context_en: Rugby refers to the team sports rugby league and rugby union. Legend claims that Rugby football was started around the time of 1845 in Rugby School, Rugby, Warwickshire, England, although forms of football in which the ball was carried and tossed date to medieval times. Rugby eventually split into two sports in 1895 when twenty one clubs split from the original Rugby Football Union, to form the Northern Union (later to be named rugby league in 1922) in the George Hotel, Huddersfield, Northern England over the issue of payment to players, thus making rugby league the first code to turn professional and pay its players, rugby union turned fully professional in 1995. Both sports are run by their respective world governing bodies World Rugby (rugby union) and the Rugby League International Federation (rugby league). Rugby football was one of many versions of football played at English public schools in the 19th century. Although rugby league initially used rugby union rules, they are now wholly separate sports. In addition to these two codes, both American and Canadian football evolved from rugby football.
neg_context_en: An integral part of Rugby Road is "Beta Bridge". In the 1850s, a bridge was erected over the Chesapeake and Ohio train tracks in the location of what is now Beta Bridge, but the current structure was built in 1923. The bridge was a part of a citywide paving and improvement project to prepare Charlottesville area streets for the automobile. Although it was originally known simply as the Rugby Road Bridge, when the Beta Theta Pi fraternity built their house at the corner of Chancellor and Rugby in 1927, it took its current name. In 1971, that fraternity location was closed, and the Delta Upsilon fraternity moved into its current location at 180 Rugby Road. As the unofficial monitors of the bridge, brothers and pledges of DU would paint over offensive messages or messages which did not contain 'THX DU' (for "Thanks Delta Upsilon"). In 2011, Beta Theta Pi moved back into their original house next to the bridge, and now messages typically contain 'THX Beta'.

The Rugby Club was formed in 1945 and was originally the Headquarters of the New South Wales Rugby Union and later the Australian Rugby Union and was where Wallabies touring teams were presented their jerseys. It was also where the Australian Rugby Union and New Zealand Rugby Union Boards agreed to establish the Rugby World Cup and later the Super Rugby and Tri-Nations competitions and the clubhouse of Sydney Harlequins who Participate in the New South Wales Suburban Rugby Union.

In 1966, preservationists formed Historic Rugby, a non-profit group dedicated to restoring and maintaining the community's surviving historic structures, which include the Christ Church Episcopal, the Thomas Hughes Library, the Rugby School, Kingstone Lisle, Uffington House, and Newbury House. The group has also reconstructed several buildings based on their original designs, including the Board of Aid office, the Rugby Commissary, and Sir Henry Kimber's Percy Cottage. The Harrow Road Cafe, a restaurant built in the 1980s, was named for a restaurant that existed at Rugby in the 1880s, although its original design is unknown. The Rugby Printing Works, which originally stood at nearby Deer Lodge, was moved to Rugby in the 1970s. Historic Rugby opened up the community's Beacon Hill area (originally planned to include residences and a park) to new home construction, with the condition that all new homes must be designed in accordance with the community's Victorian aesthetic.

Rugby union took root in Wales in 1850, when Reverend Rowland Williams became Vice-Principal at St David's College, Lampeter, where he introduced the sport. Wales played their first international on 19 February 1881; organised by Newport's Richard Mullock, Wales played against England, losing by seven goals, one drop goal and six tries to nil (8–0). On 12 March 1881, the Welsh Rugby Union was formed at The Castle Hotel, Neath. Two years later, the Home Nation Championshipnow the Six Nations Championshipwas first played and Wales did not register a win. However, rugby in Wales developed and, by the 1890s, the Welsh had developed the four three-quarters formation. This formation – with seven backs and eight forwards, instead of six backs and nine forwards – revolutionised the sport and was eventually adopted almost universally at international and club level.

The Rugby League European Federation are responsible for developing rugby league in Europe and the Northern Hemisphere,
In England, rugby league has traditionally been associated with the northern counties of Yorkshire, Lancashire and Cumbria where the game originated, especially in towns along the M62 corridor. Its popularity has also increased elsewhere. Currently, only one of the twelve Super League teams is based outside of these traditional counties: Catalans Dragons (Perpignan). Two other teams from outside the United Kingdom, the Toronto Wolfpack and Toulouse Olympique, also compete in the English Rugby League system. Both teams will play in the Rugby League Championship in 2018.

In 1996, the inaugural Ireland "State of Origin" series was established between Northern Ireland and the Republic where representatives of the club teams engaged in the All-Ireland competition played for each region over a 3 match competition. The inaugural winner was the Southern team. Some of the players involved in the State of Origin series from both regions over the next few years included some of the original stalwarts of Rugby League in Ireland: Eric Doyle, Phelim Comerford, Rickey Smith, Innes Gray, Brian Carney, Sean Cleary, Gavin Gordon, Peter McNamara, [Dara MacCarthy], Gavin Lee, Paul Ryan, Conor O'Sullivan, Neil Ryan, Ernie Hendy, Dave Moore, Garret Molloy,Dara MacCarthy Mick Molloy and Mick Browne.

Rugby is an unincorporated community in Morgan and Scott counties in the U.S. state of Tennessee. Founded in 1880 by English author Thomas Hughes, Rugby was built as an experimental utopian colony. While Hughes's experiment largely failed, a small community lingered at Rugby throughout the 20th century. In the 1960s, residents, friends and descendants of Rugby began restoring the original design and layout of the community, preserving surviving structures and reconstructing others. Rugby's Victorian architecture and picturesque setting have since made it a popular tourist attraction. In 1972, Rugby's historic area was listed under the name Rugby Colony on the National Register of Historic Places as a historic district.

Rugby railway station serves the town of Rugby in Warwickshire, England. It opened during the Victorian era, in 1885, replacing earlier stations situated a little further west. Since the closure of the former Rugby Central station on the now-abandoned Great Central Railway route through the town, it is Rugby's only station. Between 1950 and 1970 the station was known as Rugby Midland before reverting to its original title. The station underwent an extensive upgrade during 2006–2008, with extra platforms added, and a new ticket office and entrance building constructed, however the original Victorian part of the station was retained in the upgrade.

Rugby was founded in 1886 at a junction on the Great Northern Railway, where a branch line to Bottineau met the main line. The railroad promoters initially platted the town as Rugby Junction, getting the name Rugby from the town of Rugby in Warwickshire, England. It was one of several sites along the Great Northern's transcontinental route between Devils Lake and Minot that were named after places in England (the others were Berwick, Leeds, Knox, 
Norwich, Penn, Surrey, Churches Ferry, Tunbridge, and York). When the community became a city, the "Junction" was dropped from the name.

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.
question_src: Rugby ilitokea wapi?
pos_context_src: Rugby inahusu timu ya michezo ya rugby ya timu na umoja wa rugby. Legend anadai kwamba mpira wa miguu wa rugby ulianzishwa karibu wakati wa 1845 katika Shule ya Rugby, Rugby, Warwickshire, England, ingawa aina ya mpira wa miguu ambayo mpira ulibebwa na kutupwa tarehe hadi nyakati za medieval. Rugby hatimaye iligawanyika katika michezo miwili mnamo 1895 wakati vilabu ishirini na moja viligawanyika kutoka kwa umoja wa mpira wa miguu wa rugby, kuunda Jumuiya ya Kaskazini (baadaye kutajwa kuwa na Rugby League mnamo 1922) katika Hoteli ya George, Huddersfield, Kaskazini mwa England juu ya suala la malipo kwa wachezaji, na hivyo kufanya Rugby League Code ya Kwanza ya Wataalamu wa Uwanja wa Wataalam. Rugby World (Rugby Union) na Shirikisho la Kimataifa la Mchezo wa Rugby (Ligi ya Rugby). Soka la Rugby lilikuwa moja ya matoleo mengi ya mpira uliochezwa katika shule za umma za Kiingereza katika karne ya 19. Ingawa Ligi ya Rugby hapo awali ilitumia sheria za umoja wa rugby, sasa ni michezo tofauti kabisa. Mbali na nambari hizi mbili, mpira wa miguu wa Amerika na Canada ulitokea kutoka kwa mpira wa miguu.
neg_context_title_src: Timu ya Umoja wa Kitaifa ya Wales
neg_context_src: Sehemu muhimu ya Barabara ya Rugby ni "Daraja la Beta". Mnamo miaka ya 1850, daraja lilijengwa juu ya nyimbo za treni za Chesapeake na Ohio katika eneo ambalo sasa ni Bridge ya Beta, lakini muundo wa sasa ulijengwa mnamo 1923. Daraja hilo lilikuwa sehemu ya mradi wa kutengeneza jiji na uboreshaji wa mitaa ya Charlottesville kwa gari. Ingawa hapo awali ilijulikana kama Daraja la Barabara ya Rugby, wakati udugu wa Beta Theta Pi ulipounda nyumba yao kwenye kona ya Chancellor na Rugby mnamo 1927, ilichukua jina lake la sasa. Mnamo 1971, eneo hilo la udugu lilifungwa, na udugu wa Delta Upsilon ulihamia katika eneo lake la sasa katika Barabara ya Rugby 180. Kama wachunguzi wasio rasmi wa daraja, ndugu na ahadi za DU zingechora ujumbe wa kukera au ujumbe ambao haukuwa na 'thx du' (kwa "asante Delta Upsilon"). Mnamo mwaka wa 2011, Beta Theta Pi alirudi ndani ya nyumba yao ya asili karibu na daraja, na sasa ujumbe kawaida una 'thx beta'.

Klabu ya Rugby iliundwa mnamo 1945 na hapo awali ilikuwa makao makuu ya umoja wa New South Wales Rugby na baadaye umoja wa rugby wa Australia na ndipo timu za watalii za Wallabies ziliwasilishwa jerseys zao. Ilikuwa pia ambapo Bodi ya Umoja wa Rugby ya Australia na Bodi za Muungano za New Zealand zilikubaliana kuanzisha Kombe la Dunia la Rugby na baadaye mashindano ya Super Rugby na Tri-Nations na Clubhouse ya Sydney Harlequins ambao wanashiriki katika Umoja wa Rugby wa New South Wales.

Mnamo mwaka wa 1966, wahifadhi waliunda Rugby ya kihistoria, kikundi kisicho cha faida kilichojitolea kurejesha na kudumisha miundo ya kihistoria ya jamii, ambayo ni pamoja na Kristo Church Episcopal, Maktaba ya Thomas Hughes, Shule ya Rugby, Kingstone Lisle, Uffington House, na Newbury House. Kikundi hicho pia kimeunda tena majengo kadhaa kulingana na miundo yao ya asili, pamoja na Bodi ya Ofisi ya Msaada, Jumuiya ya Rugby, na Chumba cha Sir Henry Kimber cha Percy. Cafe ya Barabara ya Harrow, iliyojengwa katika miaka ya 1980, ilipewa jina la mgahawa ambao ulikuwepo huko Rugby miaka ya 1880, ingawa muundo wake wa asili haujulikani. Kazi za Uchapishaji wa Rugby, ambazo hapo awali zilisimama kwenye Deer Lodge ya karibu, zilihamishwa kwenda Rugby mnamo miaka ya 1970. Rugby ya kihistoria ilifungua eneo la Jumuiya ya Beacon Hill (hapo awali ilipangwa kujumuisha makazi na mbuga) kwa ujenzi mpya wa nyumba, kwa sharti kwamba nyumba zote mpya lazima zibuniwe kulingana na uzuri wa Victoria wa Victoria.

Umoja wa Rugby ulichukua mizizi huko Wales mnamo 1850, wakati Reverend Rowland Williams alipokuwa makamu mkuu katika Chuo cha St David, Lampeter, ambapo alianzisha mchezo huo. Wales walicheza kimataifa yao ya kwanza mnamo 19 Februari 1881; Imeandaliwa na Newport's Richard Mullock, Wales ilicheza dhidi ya England, ikipoteza kwa mabao saba, lengo moja la kushuka na sita kujaribu nil (8-0). Mnamo tarehe 12 Machi 1881, umoja wa rugby wa Welsh uliundwa katika Hoteli ya Castle, Neath. Miaka miwili baadaye, Mashindano ya Kitaifa ya Nyumbani ya Mashindano ya Mataifa sita yalicheza kwa mara ya kwanza na Wales hakujiandikisha ushindi. Walakini, rugby huko Wales ilikua na, kufikia miaka ya 1890, Wales walikuwa wameendeleza malezi manne ya robo tatu. Uundaji huu - na migongo saba na mbele nane, badala ya migongo sita na mbele tisa - ilibadilisha mchezo huo na baadaye ilipitishwa karibu ulimwenguni katika kiwango cha kimataifa na kilabu.

Shirikisho la Ligi ya Rugby lina jukumu la kuendeleza ligi ya rugby huko Uropa na ulimwengu wa kaskazini,
Huko England, Ligi ya Rugby kwa jadi imekuwa ikihusishwa na kaunti za kaskazini za Yorkshire, Lancashire na Cumbria ambapo mchezo huo ulitokea, haswa katika miji kando na M62 Corridor. Umaarufu wake pia umeongezeka mahali pengine. Hivi sasa, ni moja tu ya timu kumi na mbili za Super League ambazo ni nje ya kaunti hizi za jadi: Dragons za Catalans (Perpignan). Timu zingine mbili kutoka nje ya Uingereza, Toronto Wolfpack na Toulouse Olimpiki, pia zinashindana katika mfumo wa Ligi ya Rugby ya Kiingereza. Timu zote mbili zitacheza kwenye Mashindano ya Ligi ya Rugby mnamo 2018.

Mnamo mwaka wa 1996, safu ya uzinduzi wa "Jimbo la Asili" ya Ireland ilianzishwa kati ya Ireland ya Kaskazini na Jamhuri ambapo wawakilishi wa timu za kilabu walijihusisha na shindano la All-Ireland walicheza kwa kila mkoa juu ya mashindano 3 ya mechi. Mshindi wa uzinduzi alikuwa timu ya kusini. Baadhi ya wachezaji waliohusika katika safu ya Jimbo la Mwanzo kutoka mikoa yote miwili kwa miaka michache ijayo ni pamoja na baadhi ya safu za asili za mchezo wa rugby huko Ireland: Eric Doyle, Phelim Comerford, Rickey Smith, Innes Grey, Brian Carney, Sean CeAry, Gavin Gordon, Peter McNamara, [Dara Maccarthy], Gavan, Gavan, Gavan], Gavan, Gavan, Gavan], Gavin, Gavan], Gavan, Gavan], Gavin, Gavin, Gavan], Gavan], Gavin, Gavin, Gavan], Gavan], Gavan] Neil Ryan, Ernie Hendy, Dave Moore, Garret Molloy, Dara MacCarthy Mick Molloy na Mick Browne.

Rugby ni jamii isiyojumuishwa katika kaunti za Morgan na Scott katika jimbo la Merika la Tennessee. Ilianzishwa mnamo 1880 na mwandishi wa Kiingereza Thomas Hughes, rugby ilijengwa kama koloni la majaribio la utopian. Wakati majaribio ya Hughes yalishindwa sana, jamii ndogo ilikaa kwenye rugby katika karne yote ya 20. Mnamo miaka ya 1960, wakaazi, marafiki na kizazi cha rugby walianza kurejesha muundo wa asili na mpangilio wa jamii, kuhifadhi miundo iliyobaki na kuunda tena wengine. Usanifu wa Victoria wa Rugby na mpangilio mzuri tangu umeifanya iwe kivutio maarufu cha watalii. Mnamo 1972, eneo la kihistoria la Rugby liliorodheshwa chini ya jina la Rugby Colony kwenye Jalada la Kitaifa la Maeneo ya kihistoria kama wilaya ya kihistoria.

Kituo cha Reli cha Rugby kinatumikia mji wa Rugby huko Warwickshire, England. Ilifunguliwa wakati wa Victoria, mnamo 1885, ikichukua nafasi ya vituo vya mapema vilikuwa magharibi kidogo. Tangu kufungwa kwa kituo cha zamani cha Rugby Central kwenye njia kuu ya reli kuu iliyoachwa kupitia mji, ni kituo pekee cha Rugby. Kati ya 1950 na 1970 kituo hicho kilijulikana kama Rugby Midland kabla ya kurudi kwenye jina lake la asili. Kituo hicho kilisasishwa kwa kina wakati wa 2006-2008, na majukwaa ya ziada yaliongezwa, na ofisi mpya ya tikiti na jengo la kuingia lilijengwa, hata hivyo sehemu ya asili ya Victoria ilihifadhiwa kwenye sasisho.

Rugby ilianzishwa mnamo 1886 kwenye makutano kwenye Reli Kuu ya Kaskazini, ambapo mstari wa tawi kwenda Bottineau ulikutana na mstari kuu. Watangazaji wa reli hapo awali walipanda mji kama rugby Junction, kupata jina rugby kutoka mji wa rugby huko Warwickshire, England. Ilikuwa moja ya tovuti kadhaa kando ya njia kuu ya kupita ya Kaskazini kati ya Devils Lake na Minot ambayo ilipewa jina baada ya maeneo huko England (wengine walikuwa Berwick, Leeds, Knox, 
Norwich, Penn, Surrey, Makanisa Ferry, Tunbridge, na York). Wakati jamii ilipokuwa mji, "makutano" yalitupwa kutoka kwa jina.

Winfield Toll Bridge, pia inajulikana kama Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, ni kihistoria wa kihistoria wa Cantilever Warren Truss Bridge iliyoko Winfield na Red House, Kaunti ya Putnam, West Virginia. Ilijengwa mnamo 1955, na inachukua Mto wa Kanawha, iliyobeba West Virginia Route 34. Cantilever kupitia-truss ina nafasi mbili za nanga kila futi 245 kwa urefu na urefu wa futi 462 kwa urefu kati ya mistari ya kituo cha pier. Span kuu ina futi mbili 128, inchi 4, mikono ya cantilever na miguu 205, inchi 4, iliyosimamishwa.
report_src: Rugby inaaminika kuanzia takriban mwaka 1845 katika Shule ya Rugby iliyoko katika mji wa Rugby, Warwickshire, England, ambako wanafunzi walianza kubeba na kutupa mpira ndani ya mchezo wa mpira wa miguu, na hivyo kuweka msingi wa sheria za awali za mchezo huu [1].

question_en: When was Rockwood Hall built?
pos_context_en:
Importer and merchant Edwin Bartlett obtained the property around 1848, demolished the farmhouse, and built Rockwood, an English Gothic castle of locally-quarried stone. Bartlett hired Gervase Wheeler to design the house, which was built in 1849.
Bartlett sold the house to his business partner William Henry Aspinwall in 1860; Aspinwall made it his summer home and improved the property and house, and purchased enough land to make his estate . Aspinwall would often travel from New York City to the property via his yacht "Firefly", which he could moor to his dock at Rockwood Hall.
neg_context_en: The house's architecture inspired the design of the Sacred Heart Academy in Cincinnati, Ohio, which was built from 1864 to 1867 by Thomas Sargent as a private home for William C. Neff. The Cincinnati building is described as a "copy reversed left-to-right" of Rockwood Hall. The likely intermediate sources for Sargent were images published in "Villas on the Hudson", by A. A. Turner.

The historic district extends along Rockwood Road from Boardman Street southeasterly, ending just before the railroad tracks. Although the latter were important to the community's growth, and there is still a commuter rail stop there, it no longer has a historic station house. Most of the buildings in the district are residences built between about 1850 and 1900, although there are examples of older and newer buildings. The oldest buildings in the district are probably Mann House at 16 Rockwood Road (c. 1806), and the Darius Ware House at 29 Rockwood Road, which dates to about 1814. The only originally non-residential building in the district is the Norfolk Grange Hall, which was built as a Baptist church in 1863, and was the first church to be built away from the historic Town Hill area.

The Rockwood Hall club was building up debts, especially during the Great Depression, which began in 1929. The club was ultimately not financially successful, and declared bankruptcy in 1936. During the summer of 1937, Rockwood Hall Country Club leased the house and grounds to the Washington Irving Country Club and the coachhouse and stable to the Washington Irving Theater during Rockwood's foreclosure suit. The coachhouse and stable were remodeled and began showing summer productions beginning in 1938 and ending by 1940.

Rockefeller's heirs put the property up for sale, however no individual buyer could be found. At this point, the mansion was closed, its furnishings were removed, and about 20 caretakers were tending to the property. The first breakup of his property was a sale to Frank Vanderlip. In 1924, Vanderlip purchased 57 acres of Rockwood Hall's riverfront property to add to his estate, Beechwood. The bulk of the estate was purchased that same year by a group of investors, who formed Rockwood Hall, Inc. Their company purchased the property (with 210 acres west of Route 9 and 600 acres east) for around $1 million. The group converted the estate into a country club with a golf course, a swimming pool, and other facilities. The company formed Rockwood Hall Country Club and took out a mortgage with the Equitable Trust Company of New York, which was acquired by Chase Bank in 1930. Its 18-hole golf course was designed by Emmet & Tull in 1929. Rockwood Hall Country Club hired noted Australian golfer Joe Kirkwood Sr. to be the club's first golf professional.

Rockefeller intended the house to be his summer retreat, yet in his later years it became his year-round home. In 1922, Rockefeller died within Rockwood Hall, leaving the property empty. His funeral took place in Rockwood Hall, with a service by the rector of Saint Mary's Episcopal Church, which Rockefeller regularly attended. The gates of the estate were closed and guarded by policemen during the affair.

In 2014 and 2015, the Stone Barns Center for Food and Agriculture, a nearby non-profit farm, tended sheep and goats at Rockwood Hall. The effort was described as an experiment in land management to improve landscape health and ecosystem function, as well as possibly to increase access to land for beginning farmers by allowing them access to parks and other public lands. During the project, a shepherd would rotate the flock every few days through a series of paddocks, coaxing the animals to graze invasive plants like akebia and porcelain berry. The project gave the center additional land and forage for sheep, and helped control invasive plants and improve soil health. Local supporters of the project included New York Life, which supplied water, and the nearby retirement community Kendal on Hudson. From July to November 2014, the farm tended 50 sheep and 7 goats in the pastures of Rockwood Hall. In 2015, 10 Boer goats, 30 Tunis sheep, and 50 Finn Dorset sheep were moved to Rockwood Hall to graze.

In early 1992, Rockwood School District determined the necessity of constructing two new high schools to serve an expanding population. After voting to build the schools in March 1992, the Rockwood Board of Education unanimously voted to name the new southeast high school as Rockwood Summit High School. In May 1992, the board named Tom Hensley as the first principal of the school, and construction began that summer according to designs by the William B. Ittner architectural firm. Rock blasting was required to construct the building, which increased the cost by $207,000. The original estimate for the building was $17 million; the total cost of the building upon completion was $22.7 million, although the school was built with a combined cafeteria and theater to save $2.5 million. Among the $22.7 million cost of the building, costs for the pool facilities were $400,000, roofing and sheet metal were $780,000, masonry was $995,000, and data and voice networks were $200,000. When built, Summit featured a two-story commons and atrium, 77 classrooms, several computer labs, and art, music and theater facilities. The school opened on September 7, 1993, on the same day as Marquette High School, which was the first time that a school district in the St. Louis area had opened two new high schools on the same day. It opened with 635 9th and 10th grade students.

In 1927, Rockefeller's nephew John D. Rockefeller Jr. purchased 450 acres across Route 9 from Rockwood. In the following year, the Rockwood Hall club sold 166.5 acres of its own land east of Route 9 to John Jr., in order to settle or reduce two of its mortgages. By 1928, the club was profitable enough to plan to expand its property; the club planned for a second golf course on an adjacent property, as well as adjustments to most of its existing course and construction of four tennis courts and an outdoor pool. In the same year, Frederic N. Gilbert was removed as a member of the country club for allegedly trying to obtain control of it. Frank Harris Hitchcock was President of the club at the time, and had been the club's first president. Gilbert took legal action against the club.

Rockefeller Jr. deeded Rockwood Hall to his son Laurence Rockefeller on April 8, 1946. Later that year, the property was proposed for the location of the United Nations headquarters. It was one of a few proposals for the site, and was given by Laurence and Nelson Rockefeller for free. Officials of Westchester County had previously proposed the same site. Their father, John Jr., was cautious about the proposal, believing that the site's occupancy would prompt the UN's expansion onto other Rockefeller properties nearby in Pocantico Hills, and possibly even Kykuit, the family's seat. Laurence and Nelson, along with their brothers David and John, were all willing to give up their estates to make the site location possible. John Jr. expressed that the nature of the countryside in Westchester would be irrevocably changed. He instructed Nelson to inquire further about another proposed site near White Plains, New York, and to see about additional available land near Rockwood. Another reason given for John Jr.'s disapproval of the site was its distance from airports and other transportation available in New York City.
Laurance sold 80 acres of the property to IBM in 1970; New York Life later operated out of the site. Laurance had planned to donate Rockwood Hall to New York State, and made the IBM sale to offset the loss of tax revenue to the town of Mount Pleasant. During Laurence's ownership of the remaining land, he made the space available to the public for hiking, fishing, and other recreation.
question_src: Rockwood Hall ilijengwa lini?
pos_context_src:
Ingiza na mfanyabiashara Edwin Bartlett walipata mali hiyo karibu 1848, akabomoa shamba la shamba, na akaijenga Rockwood, ngome ya Gothic ya Kiingereza ya jiwe lililokuwa limeolewa. Bartlett aliajiri Gervase Wheeler kubuni nyumba hiyo, ambayo ilijengwa mnamo 1849.
Bartlett aliuza nyumba hiyo kwa mwenzi wake wa biashara William Henry Aspinwall mnamo 1860; Aspinwall aliifanya iwe nyumba yake ya majira ya joto na kuboresha mali na nyumba, na akanunua ardhi ya kutosha kutengeneza mali yake. Aspinwall mara nyingi alikuwa akisafiri kutoka New York City kwenda mali hiyo kupitia yacht "Firefly" yake, ambayo angeweza kuinua kizimbani chake huko Rockwood Hall.
neg_context_src: Usanifu wa nyumba hiyo ulichochea muundo wa Chuo cha Heart Takatifu huko Cincinnati, Ohio, ambacho kilijengwa kutoka 1864 hadi 1867 na Thomas Sargent kama nyumba ya kibinafsi ya William C. Neff. Jengo la Cincinnati linaelezewa kama "nakala iliyobadilishwa kushoto-kulia" ya Rockwood Hall. Vyanzo vya kati vya Sargent vilikuwa picha zilizochapishwa katika "Villas on Hudson", na A. A. Turner.

Wilaya ya kihistoria inaenea kando ya Rockwood Road kutoka Boardman Street Southeasterly, na kuishia kabla tu ya reli. Ingawa mwisho huo ulikuwa muhimu kwa ukuaji wa jamii, na bado kuna kituo cha reli ya kusafiri hapo, haina tena nyumba ya kihistoria ya kituo. Majengo mengi katika wilaya ni makazi yaliyojengwa kati ya 1850 na 1900, ingawa kuna mifano ya majengo ya zamani na mpya. Majengo kongwe zaidi katika wilaya hiyo labda ni Mann House katika Barabara ya Rockwood 16 (c. 1806), na Jumba la Darius Ware katika 29 Rockwood Road, ambayo ilianzia 1814. Jumba la asili lisilo la makazi katika wilaya hiyo ni ukumbi wa Norfolk Grange, ambao ulijengwa kama kanisa la Baptist mnamo 1863, na ilikuwa kanisa la kwanza kujengwa katika eneo la mji wa kihistoria.

Klabu ya Rockwood Hall ilikuwa ikiunda deni, haswa wakati wa Unyogovu Mkubwa, ambao ulianza mnamo 1929. Klabu hiyo haikufanikiwa kifedha, na ilitangaza kufilisika mnamo 1936. Wakati wa msimu wa joto wa 1937, Rockwood Hall Country Club ilikodisha nyumba na uwanja wa Washington Irving Country na Coachhouse na thabiti kwa Washington Irving Theatreds ya Rockwood. Jumba la makocha na thabiti lilirekebishwa na kuanza kuonyesha uzalishaji wa majira ya joto kuanza mnamo 1938 na kumalizika mnamo 1940.

Warithi wa Rockefeller huweka mali hiyo kwa kuuza, hata hivyo hakuna mnunuzi wa mtu binafsi anayeweza kupatikana. Katika hatua hii, jumba hilo lilifungwa, vyombo vyake viliondolewa, na walezi wapatao 20 walikuwa wakitunza mali hiyo. Kuvunja mali yake ya kwanza ilikuwa mauzo kwa Frank Vanderlip. Mnamo 1924, Vanderlip alinunua ekari 57 za mali ya mto wa Rockwood Hall ili kuongeza katika mali yake, Beechwood. Wingi wa mali hiyo ilinunuliwa mwaka huo huo na kikundi cha wawekezaji, ambao waliunda Rockwood Hall, Inc. Kampuni yao ilinunua mali hiyo (ikiwa na ekari 210 magharibi mwa Njia ya 9 na ekari 600 Mashariki) kwa karibu dola milioni 1. Kikundi kilibadilisha mali hiyo kuwa kilabu cha nchi na uwanja wa gofu, bwawa la kuogelea, na vifaa vingine. Kampuni hiyo iliunda Rockwood Hall Country Club na kuchukua rehani na kampuni ya uaminifu ya New York, ambayo ilipatikana na Chase Bank mnamo 1930. Kozi yake ya gofu ya shimo 18 ilibuniwa na Emmet & Tull mnamo 1929. Rockwood Hall Country Club iliyoajiriwa golfer wa Australia Joe Kirkwood Sr. kuwa mtaalam wa gofu wa kwanza wa kilabu.

Rockefeller alikusudia nyumba hiyo kuwa mafungo yake ya majira ya joto, lakini katika miaka yake ya baadaye ikawa nyumba yake ya mwaka mzima. Mnamo 1922, Rockefeller alikufa ndani ya Rockwood Hall, na kuacha mali hiyo tupu. Mazishi yake yalifanyika katika Rockwood Hall, na huduma ya mtaalam wa Kanisa la Saint Mary's Episcopal, ambalo Rockefeller alihudhuria mara kwa mara. Milango ya mali isiyohamishika ilifungwa na kulindwa na polisi wakati wa uchumba.

Mnamo mwaka wa 2014 na 2015, Kituo cha Jiwe la Barns la Chakula na Kilimo, shamba lisilo la faida, lilikuwa na kondoo na mbuzi huko Rockwood Hall. Jaribio hilo lilielezewa kama jaribio la usimamizi wa ardhi ili kuboresha kazi ya afya ya mazingira na mazingira, na vile vile kuongeza upatikanaji wa ardhi kwa wakulima wa kuanza kwa kuwaruhusu kupata mbuga na ardhi zingine za umma. Wakati wa mradi huo, mchungaji angezunguka kundi kila siku chache kupitia safu ya paddocks, akiwachanganya wanyama ili kulisha mimea vamizi kama Akebia na Porcelain Berry. Mradi huo uliipa kituo hicho ardhi ya ziada na malisho kwa kondoo, na kusaidia kudhibiti mimea vamizi na kuboresha afya ya mchanga. Wafuasi wa mitaa wa mradi huo ni pamoja na New York Life, ambayo ilitoa maji, na jamii ya kustaafu ya Kendal huko Hudson. Kuanzia Julai hadi Novemba 2014, shamba hilo lilikuwa na kondoo 50 na mbuzi 7 katika malisho ya Rockwood Hall. Mnamo mwaka wa 2015, mbuzi 10 za Boer, kondoo 30 wa Tunis, na kondoo 50 wa Finn Dorset walihamishwa kwenda Rockwood Hall kwenda kulisha.

Mwanzoni mwa 1992, Wilaya ya Rockwood School iliamua umuhimu wa kujenga shule mbili mpya za kuhudumia idadi ya watu inayoongezeka. Baada ya kupiga kura kujenga shule hizo mnamo Machi 1992, Bodi ya elimu ya Rockwood walipiga kura kwa hiari ya kutaja Shule ya Upili ya New Southeast kama Shule ya Upili ya Rockwood Summit. Mnamo Mei 1992, bodi hiyo ilimtaja Tom Hensley kama mkuu wa kwanza wa shule hiyo, na ujenzi ulianza msimu huo wa joto kulingana na miundo ya kampuni ya usanifu ya William B. Ittner. Mlipuko wa mwamba ulihitajika kujenga jengo hilo, ambalo liliongezea gharama na $ 207,000. Ukadiriaji wa asili kwa jengo hilo ulikuwa $ 17 milioni; Gharama ya jumla ya jengo hilo baada ya kukamilika ilikuwa $ 22.7 milioni, ingawa shule hiyo ilijengwa na duka la pamoja na ukumbi wa michezo ili kuokoa dola milioni 2.5. Kati ya gharama ya $ 22.7 milioni ya jengo hilo, gharama za vifaa vya dimbwi zilikuwa $ 400,000, paa na chuma cha karatasi zilikuwa $ 780,000, uashi ulikuwa $ 995,000, na data na mitandao ya sauti ilikuwa $ 200,000. Wakati wa kujengwa, Mkutano ulikuwa na hadithi mbili za hadithi na atrium, vyumba vya madarasa 77, maabara kadhaa za kompyuta, na vifaa vya sanaa, muziki na ukumbi wa michezo. Shule ilifunguliwa mnamo Septemba 7, 1993, siku hiyo hiyo kama Shule ya Upili ya Marquette, ambayo ilikuwa mara ya kwanza kwamba wilaya ya shule katika eneo la St. Louis ilikuwa imefungua shule mbili mpya siku hiyo hiyo. Ilifunguliwa na wanafunzi wa darasa la 935 na 10.

Mnamo 1927, mpwa wa Rockefeller John D. Rockefeller Jr. alinunua ekari 450 katika Njia ya 9 kutoka Rockwood. Katika mwaka uliofuata, Rockwood Hall Club iliuza ekari 166.5 za ardhi yake mashariki mwa Njia ya 9 hadi John Jr., ili kutuliza au kupunguza rehani zake mbili. Kufikia 1928, kilabu kilikuwa na faida ya kutosha kupanga kupanua mali yake; Klabu ilipanga kozi ya pili ya gofu juu ya mali ya karibu, na pia marekebisho ya kozi yake iliyopo na ujenzi wa mahakama nne za tenisi na dimbwi la nje. Katika mwaka huo huo, Frederic N. Gilbert aliondolewa kama mwanachama wa kilabu cha nchi kwa tuhuma za kujaribu kupata udhibiti wake. Frank Harris Hitchcock alikuwa rais wa kilabu wakati huo, na alikuwa rais wa kwanza wa kilabu. Gilbert alichukua hatua za kisheria dhidi ya kilabu.

Rockefeller Jr. Deed Rockwood Hall kwa mtoto wake Laurence Rockefeller mnamo Aprili 8, 1946. Baadaye mwaka huo, mali hiyo ilipendekezwa kwa eneo la makao makuu ya Umoja wa Mataifa. Ilikuwa moja ya mapendekezo machache kwa tovuti, na ilitolewa na Laurence na Nelson Rockefeller bure. Viongozi wa Kaunti ya Westchester hapo awali walipendekeza tovuti hiyo hiyo. Baba yao, John Jr., alikuwa mwangalifu juu ya pendekezo hilo, akiamini kwamba makazi ya tovuti hiyo yangechochea upanuzi wa UN kwenye mali zingine za Rockefeller karibu katika Pocantico Hills, na labda hata Kykuit, kiti cha familia. Laurence na Nelson, pamoja na ndugu zao David na John, wote walikuwa tayari kutoa sehemu zao ili kufanya eneo la tovuti liwezekane. John Jr. alionyesha kuwa asili ya mashambani huko Westchester ingebadilishwa bila kubadilika. Aliagiza Nelson kuuliza zaidi juu ya tovuti nyingine iliyopendekezwa karibu na White Plains, New York, na kuona juu ya ardhi inayopatikana karibu na Rockwood. Sababu nyingine iliyotolewa kwa kukataliwa kwa John Jr. kwa tovuti hiyo ilikuwa umbali wake kutoka kwa viwanja vya ndege na usafirishaji mwingine unaopatikana katika New York City.
Laurance iliuza ekari 80 za mali hiyo kwa IBM mnamo 1970; New York Life baadaye ilifanya kazi nje ya tovuti. Laurance alikuwa amepanga kutoa Rockwood Hall kwa Jimbo la New York, na kufanya uuzaji wa IBM kumaliza upotezaji wa mapato ya ushuru kwa mji wa Mount Pleasant. Wakati wa umiliki wa Laurence wa ardhi iliyobaki, alifanya nafasi hiyo kupatikana kwa umma kwa kupanda, uvuvi, na burudani zingine.
report_src: Rockwood Hall ilijengwa mnamo mwaka 1849, baada ya Edwin Bartlett kumwajiri mbunifu Gervase Wheeler kubuni jengo hilo la mtindo wa Gothic ya Kiingereza lililojengwa kwa jiwe [1].
all_claims: Rockwood Hall ilijengwa mnamo mwaka 1849, baada ya Edwin Bartlett kumwajiri mbunifu Gervase Wheeler kubuni jengo hilo la mtindo wa Gothic ya Kiingereza lililojengwa kwa jiwe [1].
claims_w_citations: Rockwood Hall ilijengwa mnamo mwaka 1849, baada ya Edwin Bartlett kumwajiri mbunifu Gervase Wheeler kubuni jengo hilo la mtindo wa Gothic ya Kiingereza lililojengwa kwa jiwe [1].
claims_retained: Rockwood Hall ilijengwa mnamo mwaka 1849, baada ya Edwin Bartlett kumwajiri mbunifu Gervase Wheeler kubuni jengo hilo la mtindo wa Gothic ya Kiingereza lililojengwa kwa jiwe [1].

question_en: Is firewood banksia found in North America?
pos_context_en: First described by the botanist Robert Brown in the early 19th century, no separate varieties of "Banksia menziesii" are recognised. It is found in Western Australia, from the Perth (32° S) region north to the Murchison River (27° S), and generally grows on sandy soils, in scrubland or low woodland. "Banksia menziesii" provides food for a wide array of invertebrate and vertebrate animals; birds and in particular honeyeaters are prominent visitors. A relatively hardy plant, "Banksia menziesii" is commonly seen in gardens, nature strips and parks in Australian urban areas with Mediterranean climates, but its sensitivity to dieback from the soil-borne water mould "Phytophthora cinnamomi" makes it short-lived in places with humid summers, such as Sydney. "Banksia menziesii" is widely used in the cut flower industry both in Australia and overseas.
neg_context_en: During data collection for "The Banksia Atlas" project, a single presumed natural hybrid between "B. prionotes" and "B. lindleyana" (porcupine banksia), with fruit like "B. lindleyana" but leaves intermediate between the two parents, was found north of Kalbarri National Park. At the time this was considered an important discovery, as the parent species were thought not to be closely related. Mast's analyses, however, place them both in a clade of eight species, though "B. lindleyana" remains less closely related to "B. prionotes" than "B. hookeriana". Hybrids of "B. prionotes" with "B. menziesii" (firewood banksia) have also been produced by artificial means, and presumed natural hybrids have been recorded.

Banksia menziesii, commonly known as firewood banksia, is a species of flowering plant in the genus "Banksia". It is a gnarled tree up to tall, or a lower spreading shrub in the more northern parts of its range. The serrated leaves are dull green with new growth a paler grey green. The prominent autumn and winter inflorescences are often two-coloured red or pink and yellow, and their colour has given rise to more unusual common names such as port wine banksia and strawberry banksia. Yellow blooms are rarely seen.

Two species of "Banksia" are found on Mount Henry Peninsula, "B. attenuata" (candlestick banksia) and "B. menziesii" (firewood banksia). "B. attenuata" flowers from spring into summer and the "B. menziesii" flowering occurs in autumn and winter, the presence of both these species on Mount Henry Peninsula means that at any time during an annual period, at least one of the species of "Banksia" will be in flower, This is a major factor in the support of Mount Henry Peninsula's bird population.

The hairpin banksia occurs along the east coast of Australia from the Dandenong Ranges east of Melbourne, Victoria, north through New South Wales and into Queensland. It is common north to Maryborough, with disjunct populations occurring as far north as the Atherton Tableland near Cairns. It occurs in a variety of habitats, from coastal heath ("spinulosa" and "collina") and elevated rocky slopes ("neoanglica" and "spinulosa") to inland dry sclerophyll forest dominated by eucalypts, where they form part of the understorey. Plants in exposed areas are generally considerably shorter than those in sheltered areas. It usually occurs on sand, but can be found in rocky clays or loams.

The most widely distributed of all western banksias, "Banksia attenuata" occurs across a broad swathe of southwest of Western Australia, from Kalbarri National Park and the Murchison River (with an outlying population in Zuytdorp National Park) southwards right to the southwestern corner of the state at Augusta and Cape Leeuwin, and then eastwards across the south to the western edge of Fitzgerald River National Park. Along the eastern border northwards it is found at Lake Grace, Lake Magenta north of Jerramungup, and the Wongan Hills. It is restricted to various sandy soils, including white, yellow or brown sands, and sand over either laterite or limestone. It forms an important component of open "Eucalyptus" woodland as a dominant or understory tree or tall shrub. To the north, it is a shrubby component of shrubland. It does not grow on heavy (clay-based) soils, and is hence only found in sandy pockets. Within open woodland, it is found alongside "B. menziesii", "B. ilicifolia", "B. prionotes", "Allocasuarina fraseriana", "Eucalyptus marginata", or "E. gomphocephala". The annual rainfall within its distribution varies from .

"Banksia ilicifolia" grows exclusively on sandy soils; its range ends where heavy soils are evident. It especially favours low-lying areas. It generally grows in open woodland alongside such trees as jarrah ("Eucalyptus marginata"), candlestick banksia ("Banksia attenuata"), firewood banksia ("B. menziesii") and Western Australian Christmas tree ("Nuytsia floribunda"). Along the south coast, it grows in heath, sometimes forming stands with bull banksia ("B. grandis").

Banksia oblongifolia, commonly known as the fern-leaved, dwarf or rusty banksia, is a species in the plant genus "Banksia". Found along the eastern coast of Australia from Wollongong, New South Wales in the south to Rockhampton, Queensland in the north, it generally grows in sandy soils in heath, open forest or swamp margins and wet areas. A many-stemmed shrub up to high, it has leathery serrated leaves and rusty-coloured new growth. The yellow flower spikes, known as inflorescences, most commonly appear in autumn and early winter. Up to 80 follicles, or seed pods, develop on the spikes after flowering. "Banksia oblongifolia" resprouts from its woody lignotuber after bushfires, and the seed pods open and release seed when burnt, the seed germinating and growing on burnt ground. Some plants grow between fires from seed shed spontaneously.

The common name of firewood banksia was a result of its quick-burning properties. Other names recorded include Menzies banksia, firewheel banksia, port wine banksia, flame banksia, and in the cut flower industry, strawberry banksia and raspberry frost banksia. The Beeloo Whadjuk Noongar people of the Perth region knew it as the "Mungyt". Despite its variation across its range, George noted that "B. menziesii" was a clearly defined species, and no formal division into subspecies was warranted.

Banksia seminuda, commonly known as the river banksia, is a tree in the plant genus "Banksia". It is found in south west Western Australia from Dwellingup (32°42′ S) to the Broke Inlet east of Denmark (34°57′ S). It is often mistaken for, and was originally considered a subspecies of, the "Banksia littoralis" (Swamp Banksia). Stephen Hopper described the subspecies "remanens" as a short-leaved shrubby form found in the coastal sands below granite outcrops in the Walpole-Nornalup National Park, however George does not feel this form warrants taxonomic recognition as it lies within the normal variability of the species and there was no clear distinction between it and the other populations of "B. seminuda".

Bull Banksia is common throughout south west Western Australia, occurring from Jurien (30°17′S) in the north, south to Cape Leeuwin (34°22′S) and east to Bremer Bay (34°23′S 119°22′S E). It has been found inland as far as Badgebup and Dongolocking Nature Reserve. It is very common on the lateritic soils of the Darling Range, where it forms an understory in Jarrah and Marri forests. It will grow on nearly all soils of the coastal sandplain, but is somewhat less common there.
question_src: Je! Banksia ya kuni hupatikana Amerika Kaskazini?
pos_context_src: Ilielezewa kwanza na mtaalam wa mimea Robert Brown mwanzoni mwa karne ya 19, hakuna aina tofauti za "Banksia menziesii" zinazotambuliwa. Inapatikana katika Australia Magharibi, kutoka mkoa wa Perth (32 ° S) kaskazini hadi Mto Murchison (27 ° S), na kwa ujumla hukua kwenye mchanga wa mchanga, katika eneo la miti au misitu ya chini. "Banksia menziesii" hutoa chakula kwa safu nyingi za wanyama wa ndani na wanyama; Ndege na haswa Honeyeaters ni wageni maarufu. Mmea mgumu, "Banksia menziesii" huonekana sana katika bustani, vipande vya asili na mbuga katika maeneo ya mijini ya Australia na hali ya hewa ya Mediterranean, lakini unyeti wake wa kufa kutoka kwa maji yanayotokana na mchanga "Phytophthora mdalasini" hufanya iwe kwa muda mfupi katika maeneo yenye majira ya joto, kama vile Sydney. "Banksia menziesii" hutumiwa sana katika tasnia ya maua iliyokatwa huko Australia na nje ya nchi.
neg_context_src: Wakati wa ukusanyaji wa data ya mradi wa "Banksia Atlas", mseto mmoja wa asili kati ya "B. Prionotes" na "B. Lindleyana" (Porcupine Banksia), na matunda kama "B. Lindleyana" lakini huacha kati kati ya wazazi hao wawili, ilipatikana kaskazini mwa Hifadhi ya Kitaifa ya Kalbarri. Wakati huu ulizingatiwa ugunduzi muhimu, kwani spishi za mzazi zilifikiriwa kuwa hazihusiani sana. Mchanganuo wa Mast, hata hivyo, huwaweka wote katika safu ya spishi nane, ingawa "B. lindleyana" bado haihusiani na "B. prionotes" kuliko "B. Hookeriana". Mahuluti ya "B. prionotes" na "B. menziesii" (Banksia ya Firewood) pia yametolewa kwa njia bandia, na mahuluti ya asili yamerekodiwa.

Banksia menziesii, inayojulikana kama Banksia ya kuni, ni aina ya mmea wa maua katika jenasi "Banksia". Ni mti uliokatwa hadi mrefu, au kichaka cha chini kinachoenea katika sehemu za kaskazini zaidi za anuwai. Majani yaliyosafishwa ni kijani kibichi na ukuaji mpya kijani kibichi cha kijani. Vipimo maarufu vya vuli na msimu wa baridi mara nyingi huwa rangi nyekundu au nyekundu na rangi ya manjano, na rangi yao imesababisha majina ya kawaida kama kawaida kama Banksia ya Mvinyo na Benki ya Strawberry. Blooms za manjano hazionekani sana.

Aina mbili za "Banksia" zinapatikana kwenye Peninsula ya Mlima Henry, "B. Attenuata" (Candlestick Banksia) na "B. Menziesii" (Banksia ya Firewood). "B. attenuata" maua kutoka chemchemi hadi majira ya joto na maua "B. menziesii" hufanyika katika vuli na msimu wa baridi, uwepo wa spishi hizi zote kwenye Mlima Henry peninsula inamaanisha kuwa wakati wowote wakati wa kipindi cha kila mwaka, angalau moja ya spishi za "Banksia" itakuwa katika maua, hii ni sababu kuu katika msaada wa watu wa Henry Henry.

Banksia ya hairpin hufanyika kando ya pwani ya mashariki ya Australia kutoka Dandenong inaanzia mashariki mwa Melbourne, Victoria, kaskazini kupitia New South Wales na kuingia Queensland. Ni kawaida kaskazini kwa Maryborough, na idadi ya watu wanaojitokeza kaskazini kama Atherton Tableland karibu na Cairns. Inatokea katika makazi anuwai, kutoka Heath ya Pwani ("Spinulosa" na "Collina") na mteremko wa mwamba ("Neoanglica" na "Spinulosa") hadi msitu wa kavu wa sclerophyll uliotawaliwa na eucalypts, ambapo huunda sehemu ya Understorey. Mimea katika maeneo wazi kwa ujumla ni fupi sana kuliko ile iliyo katika maeneo yaliyohifadhiwa. Kawaida hufanyika kwenye mchanga, lakini inaweza kupatikana katika miamba ya mwamba au loams.

Iliyosambazwa sana kwa benki zote za Magharibi, "Banksia attenuata" hupatikana katika eneo kubwa la kusini magharibi mwa Australia Magharibi, kutoka Hifadhi ya Kitaifa ya Kalbarri na Mto wa Murchison (na idadi ya watu wa nje huko Zuytdorp Hifadhi ya Taifa) kuelekea kusini mwa barabara ya kusini magharibi mwa Jimbo la Augusta na Cape. Pamoja na mpaka wa mashariki kaskazini hupatikana katika Ziwa Neema, Ziwa Magenta kaskazini mwa Jerramungup, na Wongan Hills. Imezuiliwa kwa mchanga wa mchanga, pamoja na mchanga mweupe, wa manjano au kahawia, na mchanga juu ya baadaye au chokaa. Inaunda sehemu muhimu ya "eucalyptus" wazi kama mti mkubwa au wa chini au kichaka kirefu. Kwa kaskazini, ni sehemu ya shrubby ya shrubland. Haikua juu ya mchanga mzito (msingi wa mchanga), na kwa hivyo hupatikana tu kwenye mifuko ya mchanga. Ndani ya Woodland wazi, hupatikana pamoja na "B. menziesii", "B. Ilicifolia", "B. prionotes", "Allocasuarina Fraseriana", "Eucalyptus marginata", au "E. Gomphocephala". Mvua ya kila mwaka ndani ya usambazaji wake inatofautiana kutoka.

"Banksia ilicifolia" inakua peke kwenye mchanga wa mchanga; Aina yake huisha ambapo mchanga mzito unaonekana. Inapendelea sana maeneo ya uwongo. Kwa ujumla hukua katika misitu wazi kando ya miti kama Jarrah ("Eucalyptus marginata"), Candlestick Banksia ("Banksia attenuata"), Banksia ya Firewood ("B. menziesii") na mti wa Krismasi wa Australia ("Nuytsia Floribunda"). Karibu na pwani ya kusini, inakua katika Heath, wakati mwingine kutengeneza inasimama na ng'ombe wa ng'ombe ("B. grandis").

Banksia oblongifolia, inayojulikana kama Fern-Leaved, kibete au Rusty Banksia, ni spishi katika aina ya mmea "Banksia". Kupatikana kando ya pwani ya mashariki ya Australia kutoka Wollongong, New South Wales kusini hadi Rockhampton, Queensland kaskazini, kwa ujumla hukua katika mchanga wa mchanga, msitu wazi au pembe za swamp na maeneo yenye mvua. Shada nyingi zenye shina hadi juu, ina majani yenye ngozi na ukuaji mpya wa rangi ya kutu. Maua ya manjano, inayojulikana kama inflorescences, kawaida huonekana katika vuli na msimu wa baridi mapema. Hadi follicles 80, au maganda ya mbegu, hutengeneza kwenye spikes baada ya maua. "Banksia oblongifolia" inaibuka kutoka kwa lignotuber yake ya miti baada ya milipuko ya kichaka, na maganda ya mbegu hufunguliwa na kutolewa mbegu wakati wa kuchomwa, mbegu ikiota na inakua kwenye ardhi ya kuteketezwa. Mimea mingine hukua kati ya moto kutoka kwa mbegu humwaga mara moja.

Jina la kawaida la Banksia ya kuni lilikuwa ni matokeo ya mali yake ya kuchoma haraka. Majina mengine yaliyorekodiwa ni pamoja na Menzies Banksia, Firewheel Banksia, Banksia ya Mvinyo ya Port, Blame Banksia, na katika tasnia ya maua iliyokatwa, Banksia ya Strawberry na Raspberry Frost Banksia. Watu wa Beeloo Whadjuk Noongar wa mkoa wa Perth walijua kama "mungyt". Licha ya tofauti zake katika anuwai yake, George alibaini kuwa "B. menziesii" ilikuwa spishi iliyoelezewa wazi, na hakuna mgawanyiko rasmi katika subspecies uliyodhibitishwa.

Banksia Seminuda, inayojulikana kama Mto Banksia, ni mti katika jenasi ya mmea "Banksia". Inapatikana kusini magharibi mwa Australia kutoka kwa Makao (32 ° 42 ′ S) hadi kwenye eneo lililovunjika mashariki mwa Denmark (34 ° 57 ′ S). Mara nyingi hukosea, na hapo awali ilizingatiwa kuwa sehemu ndogo za, "banksia littoralis" (Swamp Banksia). Stephen Hopper alielezea subspecies "remanens" kama fomu fupi ya shrubby iliyopatikana katika mchanga wa pwani chini ya uwanja wa granite katika uwanja wa kitaifa wa Walpole-Nornalup, hata hivyo George hahisi hali hii inatambua utambuzi wa taxonomic kama ilivyo ndani ya "aina ya kawaida" na hakukuwa na tofauti kati ya idadi ya watu. "

Banksia ya ng'ombe ni ya kawaida Kusini Magharibi Magharibi mwa Australia, inayotokea kutoka Jurien (30 ° 17's) kaskazini, kusini hadi Cape Leeuwin (34 ° 22's) na mashariki hadi Bremer Bay (34 ° 23'S 119 ° 22's E). Imepatikana ndani hadi Badgebup na Hifadhi ya Mazingira ya Dongolocking. Ni kawaida sana kwenye mchanga wa baadaye wa anuwai ya Darling, ambapo hutengeneza chini ya misitu ya Jarrah na Marri. Itakua juu ya mchanga wote wa mchanga wa pwani, lakini ni kawaida kidogo huko.

question_en: What was the first movie about space?
pos_context_en: Science fiction films appeared very early in the silent film era. The initial attempts were short films of typically 1 to 2 minutes in duration, shot in black and white, but sometimes with colour tinting. These usually had a technological theme, and were often intended to be humorous. "Le Voyage dans la Lune", created by Georges Méliès in 1902 is often considered to be the first science fiction film. It drew upon Jules Verne and H. G. Wells in its depiction of a spacecraft being launched to the moon in a large cannon. Its ground-breaking special effects pioneered the way for future science-fiction films, and it became largely popular after its release.
neg_context_en: The first cartoon from the "What a Cartoon!" project broadcast in its entirety was "The Powerpuff Girls in "Meat Fuzzy Lumkins"", which made its world premiere on Monday, February 20, 1995, during a television special called the "World Premiere Toon-In" (termed "President's Day Nightmare" by its producers, Williams Street). The special was hosted by Space Ghost and the cast of "Space Ghost Coast to Coast", and featured comic interviews and a mock contest with the creators of the various cartoons. The Toon-In was simulcast on Cartoon Network, TBS Superstation, and TNT. To promote the shorts, Cartoon Network's marketing department came up with the concept of "Dive-In Theater" in 1995 to showcase the 48 cartoon shorts. The cartoons were shown at water parks and large municipal swimming pools, treating kids and their parents to exclusive poolside screenings on 9' x 12' movie screens.

Academy Award winner Dennis Muren offers a memory of 1955: “[M]y pal Bruce and I hurried into the Hawaii Theatre on Hollywood Boulevard to see a new color movie, "Conquest of Space". We were eight years old. ... ‘Reeling’ by on the giant screen, we saw a giant circular space station in orbit one hundred [sic] miles up, seemingly in orbit above me over Hollywood. Wow! And that was just the beginning. Awesome rocket ships of various shapes flew about. ... Finally, the movie ended with a skillful landing and joyful liftoff from the desolate red surface of Mars. ...”

In 1926 Kutter went to Cologne and joined the Phototechnical Laboratory, and created his first films the same year. From 1931 to 1947 he worked for the Bavaria Film in Munich. In 1937 he made the science fiction movie, "Weltraumschiff I startet" [Space Ship I Launches], a story about a first Moon flight which he dated on 13 June 1963, his 60th birthday. Kutter was awarded two golden medals at the Venice Biennale.

Cockrum, Foram’s founder, chairman and CEO. “We wanted the most efficient office building ever designed, with no wasted space or wasted energy. This is a building of the future more than a building of the present. A lot of love has gone into that building, and a lot of pride."

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.

Filming began December 29, 1965, in Stage H at Shepperton Studios, Shepperton, England. The studio was chosen because it could house the pit for the Tycho crater excavation scene, the first to be shot. The production moved in January 1966 to the smaller MGM-British Studios in Borehamwood, where the live action and special effects filming was done, starting with the scenes involving Floyd on the Orion spaceplane; it was described as a "huge throbbing nerve center  ... with much the same frenetic atmosphere as a Cape Kennedy blockhouse during the final stages of Countdown." The only scene not filmed in a studio—and the last live-action scene shot for the film—was the skull-smashing sequence, in which Moonwatcher (Richter) wields his newfound bone "weapon-tool" against a pile of nearby animal bones. A small elevated platform was built in a field near the studio so that the camera could shoot upward with the sky as background, avoiding cars and trucks passing by in the distance. The "Dawn of Man" sequence that opens the film was photographed at Borehamwood by John Alcott after Geoffrey Unsworth left to work on other projects.

Satellite in the Sky is a 1956 British CinemaScope science fiction film in Warner Color, produced by Edward J. Danziger and Harry Lee Danziger, directed by Paul Dickson, and starring Kieron Moore, Lois Maxwell, Donald Wolfit, and Bryan Forbes. The film was distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures. Special effects were by Wally Veevers, who would later work on Stanley Kubrick's "" (1968). 
After initial experiments using high-speed aircraft, scientists in Great Britain create the "Stardust", the first manned spaceship to orbit the Earth. Some of the crew members have concerned loved ones. Barbara (Thea Gregory), the wife of Larry Noble (Jimmy Hanley), and Ellen (Shirley Lawrence), the girlfriend of radio operator Jimmy Wheeler (Bryan Forbes), are afraid that the space flight will be dangerous.
question_src: Je! Sinema ya kwanza ilikuwa nini kuhusu nafasi?
pos_context_title_src: Historia ya Filamu za Hadithi za Sayansi
pos_context_src: Filamu za uwongo za sayansi zilionekana mapema sana katika enzi ya filamu ya kimya. Jaribio la awali lilikuwa filamu fupi za kawaida dakika 1 hadi 2 kwa muda, zilizopigwa rangi nyeusi na nyeupe, lakini wakati mwingine na rangi ya rangi. Hizi kawaida zilikuwa na mandhari ya kiteknolojia, na mara nyingi zilikusudiwa kuwa za kuchekesha. "Le Voyage dans la Lune", iliyoundwa na Georges Méliès mnamo 1902 mara nyingi huchukuliwa kuwa filamu ya kwanza ya hadithi za sayansi. Ilichora juu ya Jules Verne na H. G. Wells katika taswira yake ya spacecraft iliyozinduliwa kwa mwezi katika kanuni kubwa. Athari zake maalum za kuvunja ardhi zilifanya njia ya filamu za uwongo za sayansi ya baadaye, na ikawa maarufu sana baada ya kutolewa.
neg_context_src: Katuni ya kwanza kutoka kwa "Katuni gani!" Matangazo ya mradi kwa jumla yalikuwa "Wasichana wa Powerpuff katika" Nyama Fuzzy Lumkins "", ambayo ilifanya mkutano wake wa ulimwengu Jumatatu, Februari 20, 1995, wakati wa televisheni maalum inayoitwa "PREMIERE TOON-in" (inayoitwa "Siku ya Rais ya Nightmare" na wazalishaji wake, Williams Street). Maalum ilishikiliwa na Space Ghost na wahusika wa "Space Ghost Coast hadi Pwani", na alionyesha mahojiano ya vichekesho na mashindano ya dhihaka na waundaji wa katuni mbali mbali. Toon-in ilikuwa simulcast kwenye mtandao wa katuni, ushirikina wa TBS, na TNT. Ili kukuza kaptula, idara ya uuzaji ya Mtandao wa Katuni ilikuja na wazo la "Dive-In Theatre" mnamo 1995 kuonyesha kaptula 48 za katuni. Katuni zilionyeshwa katika mbuga za maji na mabwawa makubwa ya kuogelea ya manispaa, kutibu watoto na wazazi wao kwa uchunguzi wa kipekee wa poolside kwenye skrini za sinema 9 'x 12'.

Winfield Toll Bridge, pia inajulikana kama Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, ni kihistoria wa kihistoria wa Cantilever Warren Truss Bridge iliyoko Winfield na Red House, Kaunti ya Putnam, West Virginia.
