Filamu ilianza Desemba 29, 1965, katika hatua ya H huko Shepperton Studios, Shepperton, England. Studio ilichaguliwa kwa sababu inaweza kuweka shimo kwa eneo la uchimbaji wa Tycho Crater, ya kwanza kupigwa risasi. Uzalishaji huo ulihamia mnamo Januari 1966 kwa studio ndogo za MGM-Briteni huko Borehamwood, ambapo hatua ya moja kwa moja na athari maalum ya filamu ilifanyika, ikianza na pazia lililohusisha Floyd kwenye Spaceplane ya Orion; Ilielezewa kama "kituo kikubwa cha ujasiri wa ujasiri ... na mazingira sawa ya frenetic kama Cape Kennedy blockhouse wakati wa hatua za mwisho za kuhesabu." Tukio la pekee ambalo halijatayarishwa katika studio-na tukio la mwisho la moja kwa moja lilipigwa kwa filamu hiyo-ilikuwa mlolongo wa fuvu, ambapo Moonwatcher (Richter) ana "chombo chake cha" silaha "mpya dhidi ya rundo la mifupa ya wanyama iliyo karibu. Jukwaa ndogo iliyoinuliwa ilijengwa katika uwanja karibu na studio ili kamera iweze kupiga juu na anga kama msingi, kuzuia magari na malori yanayopita kwa mbali. Mlolongo wa "Alfajiri ya Man" ambayo inafungua filamu hiyo ilipigwa picha huko Borehamwood na John Alcott baada ya Geoffrey Unsworth kuondoka kufanya kazi kwenye miradi mingine.

Satellite angani ni filamu ya hadithi ya uwongo ya Briteni ya Briteni ya 1956 huko Warner Colour, iliyotengenezwa na Edward J. Danziger na Harry Lee Danziger, iliyoongozwa na Paul Dickson, na nyota Kieron Moore, Lois Maxwell, Donald Wolfit, na Bryan Forbes. Filamu hiyo ilisambazwa na picha za Warner Bros. Athari maalum zilikuwa na Wally Veevers, ambaye baadaye angefanya kazi kwenye Stanley Kubrick's "" (1968). 
Baada ya majaribio ya awali kutumia ndege ya kasi kubwa, wanasayansi huko Great Britain huunda "Stardust", nafasi ya kwanza ya kueneza Dunia. Baadhi ya washiriki wa wafanyakazi wamewajali wapendwa. Barbara (Thea Gregory), mke wa Larry Noble (Jimmy Hanley), na Ellen (Shirley Lawrence), rafiki wa kike wa redio Jimmy Wheeler (Bryan Forbes), wanaogopa kwamba ndege ya nafasi itakuwa hatari.
report_src: Sinema ya kwanza iliyoelezea safari ya kwenda anga za nje ilikuwa “Le Voyage dans la Lune,” iliyotengenezwa na Georges Méliès mwaka 1902 [1]. Filamu hii ilionyesha kundi la wanasayansi wanaozindua chombo cha angani kwa kutumia kanuni kubwa na kutua kwenye uso wa Mwezi, wazo lililovutiwa na kazi za Jules Verne na H. G. Wells [1]. Ikiwa sehemu ya enzi ya filamu bubu, ilitumia athari maalum za kuvunja ardhi ambazo baadaye zikawa msingi wa filamu nyingi za uwongo wa sayansi [1]. Umaarufu wake mkubwa baada ya kutolewa uliifanya itambulike sana, na kwa kawaida hutajwa kama filamu ya kwanza kabisa kuhusu nafasi na hadithi za sayansi [1].

question_en: Is John Part still alive?
pos_context_en: John Part (born June 29, 1966) is a Canadian professional darts player and commentator, nicknamed Darth Maple. Part is a three-times World Champion, having won the 1994 BDO World Darts Championship, and the PDC World Championship in 2003 and 2008. He is statistically North America's greatest darts player to date. He has the distinction of being the first non-UK player to win the World Championship, and the only non-European to date to win the PDC World Darts Championship. His first Championship was the second time a non-seeded player won the BDO World Darts Championship, and one of the few times where a player only lost one set in the entire tournament. His nine year gap between his first and second World Championships is tied with Ted Hankey for the longest gap between World Championships, and his third triumph in 2008 saw him become the first player in history to win a world title in three different venues, and the first to win at the Alexandra Palace. His 2008 win saw him join Phil Taylor, Eric Bristow, Raymond van Barneveld and John Lowe as the only players with three or more World Championships, and become only the second player (after Taylor) to win multiple PDC titles. His eleven televised PDC finals is tied with Dennis Priestley for the eighth most all time, and his £874,151 in prize money to date is the sixteenth highest amount in PDC history.
neg_context_en: By the episode "Blinking Red Light", it is now widely believed that Red John is dead, with Jane and Lisbon the only ones aware he is still alive. One of the people believing Red John to be dead is James Panzer, a blogger pretending to devote his life to find a serial killer known as "the San Joaquin Killer" (abbreviated SJK, who has killed at least five young women). In reality, Panzer is the killer. Jane suspects Panzer but initially lacks the proof to expose him. When he and Panzer both appear on Karen Cross's television talk show discussing the SJK case, Jane recognizes Panzer has to be stopped and goads Panzer into comparing Red John unfavorably to SJK. Panzer rises to the bait, making bold statements that the SJK killings were the work of a genius and Red John by comparison is a ""common sociopath, lazy, sloppy, delusional"" and already forgotten since Jane killed him. Panzer then makes the same mistake made by Jane and Kristina Frye: belittling Red John in a public forum. A couple of hours after the television appearance, Panzer is found murdered, with Red John's smiley face painted in blood on one of the walls near his body. Panzer's murder proves Jane's theory that Red John is still alive. This makes Panzer Red John's ninth male victim.

John finds that his son is still alive but suffers from Alzheimer's disease and is in a nursing home, with no children to help look after him. Assisted by Jack Harkness, John visits his son, who barely remembers John's presence. John becomes very remorseful at missing his son's life and being unable to adapt to modern times.

After each Legionnaire is killed, Lejaune props up his body and makes it appear he is still alive. Finally, only Lejaune, Beau and John remain. Then Beau is seemingly killed. When John sees Lejaune searching Beau's body, he grabs his bayonet, but Lejaune draws his pistol and sentences him to death. Beau, barely alive, grabs Lejaune's leg, enabling John to stab him. Before dying, Beau tells John to desert and deliver a letter to their aunt. When John spots the relief force, he fires a single shot, then leaves.

He kept potentially expensive company round the card table. His opponents included John Bingham (later Lord Lucan), before his fall the most formidable stud poker player in London. Evans is frequently asked whether or not he believes that Lucan murdered Sandra Rivett in November 1974. "John was a killer at the poker table, a pussycat away from it. Certainly not!" And is Lucan still alive? "His family is long-lived. John is probably still with us, possibly living right here in the UK!" In Evans's opinion, Lucan should now come forward "to face the music" and prove his innocence.

Carter was still alive in 2014. His grandson Hunter, Tommy's son, is a video game millionaire; he has known John Ross Ewing since childhood, and still holds a grudge against the Ewings. He makes a secret deal with Nicolas Treviño to take control of Ewing Global, laughing at John Ross that Carter had tricked J.R. the same way. Meanwhile, Bobby seeks out Tracey (now Melinda Clarke) to get her help in negotiating a resolution with her nephew. But Hunter is unaware that Nicolas works for a Mexican drug cartel, and when the deal is done, they murder Hunter and make it look like suicide.

Elsewhere, Anna arranges to have John sent a single red rose, along with a picture of her holding a recent newspaper to show that she is still alive. John, now released from prison, drives to the beach house to find a new family has bought it and are sitting happily together on the front porch. John is then able to move on with his life and find peace with Judith.

Fearing he could be hanged for a crime he did not commit, John visits the Wildings' house in London, suspecting that Mr Wilding is still alive. However, Wilding's mother tells him that she identified her son's body. John then travels down to the hotel in Plymouth where he had planned to stay with Susan. There, he finds Wilding, who tells him that he was on the train and murdered his wife for being unfaithful, and then planted his identifying papers on one of the dead. The two men fight and Wilding shoots John in the head.

Elaine realizes that, since he had a grown son in 1935, Paul must be much older than he looks. Paul reveals that he is, in fact, 108 years of age; he was 44 when John walked the Green Mile. Not only is he still alive, but so is Del's mouse, Mr. Jingles. Paul continues to explain that although John never intended for it to happen, his curing of Paul has given him an extraordinary lifespan, causing him to outlive his family and friends, which he perceives is a punishment from God for executing John, and will also outlive Elaine. Paul later attends her funeral and muses that if John's power could make a normally short-lived mouse live for six decades as Mr. Jingles has, how much longer does he himself have left.

Sir Patrick was, according to a charter dated 24 June 1646, still alive then, but is thought to have died before 9 November 1649, when his son John was Retoured his heir. That was followed on the same day by a Precept from Chancery for infefting John Hepburne, now of Wauchtoun, as heir to his father, Sir Patrick Hepburne of Wauchtoun, Knt. in the lands and baronies of Wauchtoun and The Bass, and other lands in the sheriffdoms of Edinburgh and Berwick.

The song "Still Alive" was written by Jonathan Coulton and performed by Ellen McLain for the "Portal" video game. McLain also provides the voice for GLaDOS, an artificial intelligence for the fictional Aperture Science Enrichment Center and the game's antagonist. "Still Alive" is sung from the perspective of GLaDOS and used as the song that runs over the game's credits. By the end of the game, Chell, the game's protagonist who has been misled and placed in life-threatening situations within the Aperture Science Enrichment Center, the setting of the game, by GLaDOS, will have finally encountered and defeated GLaDOS. However, the song and portions of post-credit scenes suggests that GLaDOS is still functional, and despite having been apparently destroyed by Chell, is "not even angry" at that prospect, having considered the monitoring of Chell's performance through the test chambers as a "huge success", regardless of the destruction caused by Chell and the Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device being released into the outside world, for those that are "still alive". The Combine invasion of Earth from the "Half-Life" series was also hinted in the song by GLaDOS ("Go ahead and leave me, I think I'd prefer to stay inside. Maybe you'll find someone else to help you. Maybe Black Mesa. That was a joke. Ha Ha. Fat Chance."). The song itself is also present as a samba instrumental version through in-game radios at certain points within the game.
question_src: Je! Yohana sehemu bado yuko hai?
pos_context_src: John Sehemu (amezaliwa Juni 29, 1966) ni mchezaji wa kitaalam wa Canada na mtangazaji, jina lake Darth Maple. Sehemu ni bingwa wa ulimwengu wa mara tatu, baada ya kushinda Mashindano ya Dunia ya BDO ya 1994, na Mashindano ya Dunia ya PDC mnamo 2003 na 2008. Yeye ni mchezaji wa takwimu wa Amerika ya Kaskazini hadi leo. Ana tofauti ya kuwa mchezaji wa kwanza ambaye sio wa Uingereza kushinda ubingwa wa ulimwengu, na mtu pekee ambaye sio wa Ulaya hadi leo kushinda Mashindano ya Dunia ya PDC. Mashindano yake ya kwanza yalikuwa mara ya pili mchezaji ambaye hajapata mbegu alishinda ubingwa wa BDO World Darts, na moja ya mara chache ambapo mchezaji alipoteza seti moja tu kwenye mashindano yote. Pengo lake la miaka tisa kati ya ubingwa wake wa kwanza na wa pili wa ulimwengu limefungwa na Ted Hankey kwa pengo refu zaidi kati ya ubingwa wa ulimwengu, na ushindi wake wa tatu mnamo 2008 ulimwona kuwa mchezaji wa kwanza katika historia kushinda taji la ulimwengu katika kumbi tatu tofauti, na wa kwanza kushinda kwenye Jumba la Alexandra. Ushindi wake wa 2008 ulimwona akijiunga na Phil Taylor, Eric Bristow, Raymond van Barneveld na John Lowe kama wachezaji pekee walio na ubingwa wa ulimwengu tatu au zaidi, na kuwa mchezaji wa pili (baada ya Taylor) kushinda taji nyingi za PDC. Fainali zake kumi na moja za runinga za PDC zimefungwa na Dennis Priestley kwa nane wakati wote, na Pauni 874,151 yake katika tuzo ya tuzo hadi leo ni kiwango cha kumi na sita katika historia ya PDC.
neg_context_src: Kwa sehemu ya "Blinking Red Light", sasa inaaminika sana kuwa Red John amekufa, na Jane na Lisbon ndio pekee wanajua kuwa yuko hai. Mmoja wa watu wanaoamini Red John kuwa amekufa ni James Panzer, mwanablogi anayejifanya atumie maisha yake kupata muuaji wa serial anayejulikana kama "The San Joaquin Killer" (alifupisha SJK, ambaye amewaua wanawake wachanga watano). Kwa kweli, Panzer ndiye muuaji. Jane anatuhumu Panzer lakini hapo awali hana dhibitisho la kumfunua. Wakati yeye na Panzer wote wanaonekana kwenye kipindi cha mazungumzo cha televisheni cha Karen Cross kinachojadili kesi ya SJK, Jane anatambua Panzer lazima asimamishwe na Goads Panzer kulinganisha Red John vibaya na SJK. Panzer anaongezeka kwa bait, na kutoa taarifa za ujasiri kwamba mauaji ya SJK yalikuwa kazi ya fikra na nyekundu John kwa kulinganisha ni "" jamii ya kawaida, wavivu, dhaifu, ya udanganyifu "" na tayari amesahau tangu Jane kumuua. Panzer basi hufanya kosa lile lile lililofanywa na Jane na Kristina Frye: kumdharau Red John kwenye mkutano wa umma. Masaa kadhaa baada ya kuonekana kwa runinga, Panzer hupatikana ameuawa, na uso wa tabasamu nyekundu wa John umechorwa kwenye damu kwenye moja ya ukuta karibu na mwili wake. Mauaji ya Panzer yanathibitisha nadharia ya Jane kwamba Red John bado yuko hai. Hii inafanya Panzer Red John wa tisa wa kiume.

John hugundua kuwa mtoto wake bado yuko hai lakini anaugua ugonjwa wa Alzheimer na yuko katika makao ya wauguzi, bila watoto kusaidia kumtunza. Kusaidiwa na Jack Harkness, John anamtembelea mtoto wake, ambaye anakumbuka uwepo wa John. John anajuta sana kukosa maisha ya mwanawe na kutoweza kuzoea nyakati za kisasa.

Baada ya kila Legionnaire kuuawa, Lejaune anaongeza mwili wake na kuifanya ionekane bado yuko hai. Mwishowe, Lejaune tu, Beau na John wanabaki. Halafu Beau anaonekana kuuawa. Wakati John anapoona Lejaune akitafuta mwili wa Beau, anachukua bayonet yake, lakini Lejaune huchota bastola yake na kumhukumu afe. Beau, hai hai, anachukua mguu wa Lejaune, akimwezesha John kumchoma. Kabla ya kufa, Beau anamwambia John aondoke na kupeleka barua kwa shangazi yao. Wakati John anaona nguvu ya misaada, anawasha risasi moja, kisha anaondoka.

Aliweka kampuni ya gharama kubwa kuzunguka meza ya kadi. Wapinzani wake ni pamoja na John Bingham (baadaye Lord Lucan), kabla ya kuanguka kwake mchezaji wa poker anayeweza sana huko London. Evans anaulizwa mara kwa mara ikiwa anaamini kwamba Lucan alimuua Sandra Rivett mnamo Novemba 1974. "John alikuwa muuaji kwenye meza ya poker, pussycat mbali nayo. Hakika sio!" Na Lucan bado yuko hai? "Familia yake ni ya muda mrefu. John labda bado yuko nasi, labda anaishi hapa Uingereza!" Kwa maoni ya Evans, Lucan sasa anapaswa kuja mbele "kukabiliana na muziki" na kudhibitisha hatia yake.

Carter alikuwa bado hai mnamo 2014. Mjukuu wake Hunter, mtoto wa Tommy, ni mchezo wa video wa video; Amemjua John Ross Ewing tangu utoto, na bado anashikilia chuki dhidi ya Wa -Ewings. Yeye hufanya mpango wa siri na Nicolas Treviño kuchukua udhibiti wa Ewing Global, akicheka John Ross kwamba Carter alikuwa amemdanganya J.R. Vivyo hivyo. Wakati huo huo, Bobby anatafuta Tracey (sasa Melinda Clarke) kupata msaada wake katika kujadili azimio na mpwa wake. Lakini Hunter hajui kuwa Nicolas anafanya kazi kwa gari la dawa za Mexico, na wakati mpango huo unafanywa, wanamuua Hunter na kuifanya ionekane kama kujiua.

Mahali pengine, Anna anapanga kumfanya John atume nyekundu nyekundu, pamoja na picha ya kushikilia gazeti la hivi karibuni kuonyesha kuwa bado yuko hai. John, aliyeachiliwa sasa kutoka gerezani, anaendesha kwa nyumba ya pwani kupata familia mpya imeinunua na imekaa kwa furaha pamoja kwenye ukumbi wa mbele. John basi ana uwezo wa kuendelea na maisha yake na kupata amani na Judith.

Kuogopa kuwa angeweza kunyongwa kwa uhalifu ambao hakufanya, John anatembelea nyumba ya Wanyamapori huko London, akishuku kuwa Bw Wilding bado yuko hai. Walakini, mama yake Wilding anamwambia kwamba aligundua mwili wa mwanawe. John basi anasafiri kwenda kwenye hoteli huko Plymouth ambapo alikuwa amepanga kukaa na Susan. Huko, anamkuta Wilding, ambaye anamwambia kwamba alikuwa kwenye gari moshi na kumuua mkewe kwa kutokuwa mwaminifu, na kisha akapanda karatasi zake za kutambua kwenye mmoja wa wafu. Wanaume hao wawili wanapigana na kutikisa risasi John kichwani.

Elaine anatambua kuwa, kwa kuwa alikuwa na mtoto mzima mnamo 1935, Paul lazima awe mzee zaidi kuliko anavyoonekana. Paulo anafunua kuwa, kwa kweli, ana umri wa miaka 108; Alikuwa 44 wakati John alitembea maili ya kijani. Sio tu kuwa yeye bado yuko hai, lakini ndivyo pia panya wa Del, Bwana Jingles. Paulo anaendelea kuelezea kwamba ingawa John hakuwahi kusudi la kutokea, kuponya kwake Paulo kumempa maisha ya ajabu, na kumfanya aendelee familia yake na marafiki, ambayo anaona ni adhabu kutoka kwa Mungu kwa kumtekeleza John, na pia atamzidisha Elaine. Baadaye Paul anahudhuria mazishi yake na anaonekana kwamba ikiwa nguvu ya John inaweza kufanya panya ya kawaida ya muda mfupi kuishi kwa miongo sita kama Bwana Jingles ana, ni muda gani yeye mwenyewe ameondoka.

Sir Patrick alikuwa, kulingana na hati ya tarehe 24 Juni 1646, bado alikuwa hai wakati huo, lakini anafikiriwa kuwa alikufa kabla ya 9 Novemba 1649, wakati mtoto wake John alirudishwa mrithi wake. Hiyo ilifuatiwa siku hiyo hiyo na amri kutoka kwa Chancery kwa kumfanya John Hepburne, sasa wa Wauchtoun, kama mrithi wa baba yake, Sir Patrick Hepburne wa Wauchtoun, Knt. Katika ardhi na makao ya Wauchtoun na bass, na ardhi zingine katika sheriffdoms ya Edinburgh na Berwick.

Wimbo "bado hai" uliandikwa na Jonathan Coulton na uliofanywa na Ellen McLain kwa mchezo wa video wa "Portal". McLain pia hutoa sauti kwa Glados, akili ya bandia kwa Kituo cha Uboreshaji wa Sayansi ya Ufundi na mpinzani wa mchezo huo. "Bado hai" imeimbwa kutoka kwa mtazamo wa Glados na kutumika kama wimbo ambao unaendesha sifa za mchezo. Mwisho wa mchezo, Chell, mhusika mkuu wa mchezo ambaye amepotoshwa na kuwekwa katika hali ya kutishia maisha ndani ya Kituo cha Uboreshaji wa Sayansi ya Aperture, mpangilio wa mchezo huo, na Glados, hatimaye umekutana na Glados. Walakini, wimbo na sehemu za picha za baada ya mkopo zinaonyesha kuwa Glados bado inafanya kazi, na licha ya kuwa imeharibiwa na Chell, "sio hata hasira" kwa matarajio hayo, baada ya kuzingatia ufuatiliaji wa utendaji wa Chell kupitia vyumba vya majaribio kama "mafanikio makubwa", bila kujali uharibifu uliosababishwa na Chell na "hai." Uvamizi wa Mchanganyiko wa Dunia kutoka kwa safu ya "Half-Life" pia uliwekwa kwenye wimbo na Glados ("Nenda mbele na uniache, nadhani ningependelea kukaa ndani. Labda utapata mtu mwingine kukusaidia. Labda Nyeusi Mesa. Hiyo ilikuwa utani. Ha ha. Mafuta."). Wimbo yenyewe pia upo kama toleo la muhimu la Samba kupitia redio za mchezo wa ndani katika sehemu fulani ndani ya mchezo.
report_src: Kwa mujibu wa kumbukumbu zilizopo, John Sehemu alizaliwa tarehe 29 Juni 1966 na bado anatajwa kwa wakati uliopo kama “mchezaji wa kitaalam wa Canada na mtangazaji” bila kutajwa tarehe ya kifo, jambo linaloashiria kuwa bado yuko hai [1].

question_en: Do praying mantises always eat their mates?
pos_context_en: The closest relatives of mantises are the termites and cockroaches (Blattodea), which are all within the superorder Dictyoptera. Mantises are sometimes confused with stick insects (Phasmatodea), other elongated insects such as grasshoppers (Orthoptera), or other unrelated insects with raptorial forelegs such as mantisflies (Mantispidae). Mantises are mostly ambush predators, but a few ground-dwelling species are found actively pursuing their prey. They normally live for about a year. In cooler climates, the adults lay eggs in autumn, then die. The eggs are protected by their hard capsules and hatch in the spring. Females sometimes practice sexual cannibalism, eating their mates after copulation.
neg_context_en: "L. minor" is a solitary species and like most other praying mantises will only come together to mate. Mating times for this species are highly dependent upon weather conditions and prey availability. Typically females are most likely to accept a mate and have a successful clutch two weeks after their last molt.

Common insects that prey on wasps include praying mantises, dragonflies, centipedes, beetles and moths. In fact, large wasps will even prey on smaller wasps. Spiders will also capture wasps in their webs and eat them. Predatory reptiles and amphibians, such as frogs, lizards, toads, and salamanders see the wasp as just another opportunistic meal and do not differentiate them from other insects, despite their feared sting. Birds that regularly consume bugs will also eat wasps. Other creatures that eat wasps, particularly mammals, are more interested in the larvae rather than the adults.

Nymphs are skittish but at the 1st instar they are calm and are not able to move quickly like most praying mantises. After the 2nd instar they start to get skittish. Nymphs are known to play dead. If startled sometimes nymphs will jump up into the air and fall face up or down to the ground with their legs pulled in. Adults and nymphs are known to do a threat pose when startled. "Deroplatys lobata" are aggressive toward each other and they will sometimes eat each other so they should not be kept together in captivity. Younger nymphs are not very aggressive toward each other so can be kept together and there will rarely be any cannibalism if they are fed enough. From the 1st instar to adult they often threaten each other by doing a threat pose and striking to scare off the other mantis. After laying the ootheca the female sits on her ootheca to defend it. 
These mantids need a very humid environment. Misting them heavily directly onto the mantis every evening works well. To keep the humidity up, substrate like moist sphagnum moss can be added but is not needed. "Deroplatys lobata" do well when the temperature is not below 75 degrees Fahrenheit to 95 degrees Fahrenheit. Sudden changes in temperature may kill the mantis. If kept warmer praying mantises will grow faster and live a shorter life but if kept cooler then they grow slower and live a longer life. When kept warmer it speeds up their metabolism and when kept cooler it slows down their metabolism and this is true for all praying mantises. To molt "Deroplatys lobata" need a rough superior support, like a piece of rough bark or a rough stick at a diagonal angle or attached to the top of the container so that the nymph will hang upside down which is needed to molt. Their cage should be well ventilated with twigs for the mantis to perch on. They don't require much room as they are not active predators, but they do need room to molt. A good sized container for "Deroplatys lobata" in width and height is usually 3x the length of the mantis, but for young nymphs (1st to 2nd instar nymphs) a 16oz container is good. During molting, it is vital that you do not disturb them. Also, make sure that the humidity is at a safe level because too much humidity can hinder the insect from drying out correctly and it might end up with bent legs and crippled arms.

Similar behaviours have been observed in other species, such as in males of two species of dragonflies ("Aeshna grandis" & "Aeshna viridis"). They engage in matutinal searching flights each morning until they find a receptive female to mate with. A similar phenomenon is seen in male praying mantises, where they respond to the emerging light each morning by increasing flight activity.

For certain species, commencing mating during the early morning's twilight period may be adaptive because it could reduce the risk of predation, increase the chance of finding mates, and reduce competition for mates, all of which may increase reproductive success.
Animals are generally more vulnerable during copulation (e.g., praying mantis), so mating during a time when there is less predatory activity may be an anti-predatory adaptation. Some species may even take up to several hours to finish mating, which increases this vulnerability. For species that copulate for longer periods, shifting their mating schedule may additionally allow enough time for the male to completely inseminate the female (i.e., it will reduce the chance of having to escape from a predator mid-copulation). One example of a matutinal mating routine is exhibited by female tropical praying mantises ("Mantis religiosa)." To avoid detection from predators they use different stances to blend in with their environment. They can orient themselves to look like leaves or sticks. However, when females are ready to mate they will take up a different posture where they expose pheromone-emitting glands that attract mates, and in the process must disengage from their normal camouflaging stance. Likely to compensate for this vulnerability, females will initiate this stance only at first light when diurnal predators that are visual hunters are less active (e.g., birds and insectivorous primates).

Another breeder of mantises states that "S. viridis":
...is an attractive species due to its aggressiveness. Anyone interested in looking at how a praying mantis chase down its prey and devour it greedily, this is the species! ...they are not as bulky as Sphodromantis Lineola but aggressive nevertheless. This species was easy to raise, feed them plenty of roaches, crickets, and wild caught flying insects, and they will gladly accept the food. Mating this species was not difficult at all, [the] male will initiate the move and [the] female will be more cooperative when fed well. A warm, well-heated enclosure of about 90°F works as a catalyst to further improve the chances of mating.

Sexual cannibalism is common among most predatory species of mantises in captivity. It has sometimes been observed in natural populations, where about a quarter of male-female encounters result in the male being eaten by the female. Around 90% of the predatory species of mantises participate in sexual cannibalism. Adult males typically outnumber females at first, but their numbers may be fairly equivalent later in the adult stage, possibly because females selectively eat the smaller males. In "Tenodera sinensis", 83% of males escape cannibalism after an encounter with a female, but since multiple matings occur, the probability of a male's being eaten increases cumulatively.

While praying mantises are carnivorous insects, they also are in danger of being eaten by larger animals. The young instars of several mantids such as the bark mantid "Tarachodes afzelii" are Batesian mimics of ants, but there seem to be no mantids that mimic models in any other taxon. Curiously, the young instars derive protection from their resemblance to ants, while bigger instars and adults, neither of which are ant mimics, eat ants.

Most mantises stalk tempting prey if it strays close enough, and will go further when they are especially hungry. Once within reach, mantises strike rapidly to grasp the prey with their spiked raptorial forelegs. Some ground and bark species pursue their prey in a more active way. For example, members of a few genera such as the ground mantises, "Entella", "Ligaria", and "Ligariella" run over dry ground seeking prey, much as tiger beetles do.
The fore gut of some species extends the whole length of the insect and can be used to store prey for digestion later. This may be advantageous in an insect that feeds intermittently. Chinese mantises live longer, grow faster, and produce more young when they are able to eat pollen.
question_src: Je! Kuomba kunakula kila wakati hula wenzi wao?
pos_context_src: Jamaa wa karibu zaidi wa manukuu ni maeneo ya mchwa na mende (Blattodea), ambayo yote yamo ndani ya Dictyoptera. Mantises wakati mwingine huchanganyikiwa na wadudu wa fimbo (phasmatodea), wadudu wengine wenye urefu kama vile panzi (orthoptera), au wadudu wengine wasio na uhusiano na utabiri wa macho kama vile mantisflies (Mantispidae). Manukuu ni wanyama wanaokula wenzao wengi, lakini spishi chache za makao hupatikana hufuata mawindo yao. Kawaida wanaishi kwa karibu mwaka. Katika hali ya hewa baridi, watu wazima huweka mayai katika vuli, kisha hufa. Mayai yanalindwa na vidonge vyao ngumu na hatch katika chemchemi. Wanawake wakati mwingine hufanya mazoezi ya ngono, kula wenzi wao baada ya kuiga.
neg_context_src: "L. Ndogo" ni spishi ya peke yake na kama manukuu mengine mengi ya kusali yatakusanyika tu kwa mwenzi. Nyakati za kupandisha kwa spishi hii hutegemea sana hali ya hali ya hewa na upatikanaji wa mawindo. Kawaida wanawake wana uwezekano mkubwa wa kukubali mwenzi na wana mafanikio ya wiki mbili baada ya molt yao ya mwisho.

Wadudu wa kawaida ambao huwinda kwenye nyasi ni pamoja na kusali, manjano, vitunguu, mende na nondo. Kwa kweli, nyigu kubwa zitawinda hata wasps ndogo. Spiders pia watakamata nyongo kwenye webs zao na kula. Reptilia za ulaji na amphibians, kama vyura, mijusi, vichwa, na salamanders huona wasp kama chakula kingine cha fursa na hawatofautishi na wadudu wengine, licha ya kuumwa kwao. Ndege ambazo hutumia mende mara kwa mara pia zitakula nyongo. Viumbe wengine ambao hula nyongo, haswa mamalia, wanavutiwa zaidi na mabuu badala ya watu wazima.

Nymphs ni skittish lakini kwa 1 Instar ni shwari na hawawezi kusonga haraka kama mantises wengi wa kusali. Baada ya Instar ya 2 wanaanza kupata skittish. Nymphs zinajulikana kucheza Dead. Ikiwa wakati mwingine nymphs zitaruka juu angani na kuanguka uso juu au chini chini na miguu yao kuvutwa ndani. Watu wazima na nymph wanajulikana kufanya tishio wakati wa mshtuko. "Deroplatys lobata" ni fujo kwa kila mmoja na wakati mwingine watakula kila mmoja kwa hivyo hawapaswi kuwekwa pamoja. Nymphs mdogo sio mkali sana kwa kila mmoja kwa hivyo inaweza kuwekwa pamoja na mara chache kutakuwa na cannibalism yoyote ikiwa italishwa vya kutosha. Kuanzia 1 ya Instar hadi kwa watu wazima mara nyingi hutishia kila mmoja kwa kufanya tishio na kupigwa kumtisha yule mantis mwingine. Baada ya kuwekewa ootheca kike anakaa juu ya ootheca yake ili kuitetea. Mantids hizi zinahitaji mazingira yenye unyevu sana. Kuwakosea sana moja kwa moja kwenye Mantis kila jioni inafanya kazi vizuri. Ili kuweka unyevu juu, substrate kama moss yenye unyevu inaweza kuongezwa lakini haihitajiki. "Deroplatys lobata" hufanya vizuri wakati hali ya joto sio chini ya nyuzi 75 Fahrenheit hadi nyuzi 95 Fahrenheit. Mabadiliko ya ghafla ya joto yanaweza kuua mantis. Ikiwa viboreshaji vya kusali vya joto vitakua haraka na kuishi maisha mafupi lakini ikiwa yamehifadhiwa basi hukua polepole na kuishi maisha marefu. Inapowekwa joto huharakisha kimetaboliki yao na wakati inapowekwa baridi hupunguza kimetaboliki yao na hii ni kweli kwa mantiki zote za kusali. Ili molt "deroplatys lobata" inahitaji msaada mbaya zaidi, kama kipande cha gome mbaya au fimbo mbaya kwa pembe ya diagonal au kushikamana juu ya chombo ili nymph iweze kunyongwa chini ambayo inahitajika molt. Ngome yao inapaswa kuingizwa vizuri na matawi kwa Mantis kuzidi. Hazihitaji nafasi nyingi kwani sio wadudu wanaofanya kazi, lakini wanahitaji nafasi ya kuhujumu. Chombo kizuri cha ukubwa wa "deroplatys lobata" kwa upana na urefu kawaida ni 3x the Urefu wa mantis, lakini kwa nymphs mchanga (1 hadi 2nd nymphs) chombo 16oz ni nzuri. Wakati wa kuyeyuka, ni muhimu kwamba usiwasumbue. Pia, hakikisha kuwa unyevu uko katika kiwango salama kwa sababu unyevu mwingi unaweza kuzuia wadudu kutoka kukausha kwa usahihi na inaweza kuishia na miguu iliyoinama na mikono iliyokuwa na kilema.

Tabia kama hizo zimezingatiwa katika spishi zingine, kama vile kwa wanaume wa spishi mbili za joka ("Aeshna grandis" & "Aeshna viridis"). Wanajihusisha na ndege za kutafuta kila asubuhi hadi watakapopata mwanamke anayepokea kuoana naye. Jambo kama hilo linaonekana katika mantiki ya kuomba ya kiume, ambapo hujibu taa inayoibuka kila asubuhi kwa kuongeza shughuli za kukimbia.

Kwa spishi fulani, kuanza kupandisha wakati wa jioni ya jioni ya mapema kunaweza kuwa sawa kwa sababu inaweza kupunguza hatari ya utabiri, kuongeza nafasi ya kupata wenzi, na kupunguza ushindani kwa wenzi, yote ambayo yanaweza kuongeza mafanikio ya uzazi.
Wanyama kwa ujumla ni hatari zaidi wakati wa kuiga (k.v., kusali mantis), kwa hivyo kuoana wakati ambao kuna shughuli za uwindaji mdogo kunaweza kuwa marekebisho ya kupinga ugonjwa. Aina zingine zinaweza kuchukua hadi masaa kadhaa kumaliza kupandisha, ambayo huongeza hatari hii. Kwa spishi ambazo hunakili kwa muda mrefu, kubadilisha ratiba yao ya kupandisha kunaweza kuongeza muda wa kutosha kwa mwanaume kuingiza kabisa kike (kwa mfano, itapunguza nafasi ya kutoroka kutoka kwa uwindaji wa katikati). Mfano mmoja wa utaratibu wa kuoana wa matiti unaonyeshwa na mantiki ya kusali ya kike ya kitropiki ("mantis digriiosa)." Ili kuzuia kugunduliwa kutoka kwa wanyama wanaowinda hutumia msimamo tofauti kujumuika na mazingira yao. Wanaweza kujielekeza kuonekana kama majani au vijiti. Walakini, wakati wanawake wako tayari kuoana watachukua mkao tofauti ambapo huonyesha tezi za pheromone zinazovutia ambao huvutia wenzi, na kwa mchakato huo lazima kutengana na msimamo wao wa kawaida wa kuficha. Inawezekana kulipa fidia kwa udhaifu huu, wanawake wataanzisha msimamo huu mara ya kwanza wakati wadudu wa diurnal ambao ni wawindaji wa kuona hawafanyi kazi sana (k.v. Ndege na primates zisizo za kawaida).

Mfugaji mwingine wa Mantises anasema kwamba "S. viridis":
... ni spishi ya kuvutia kwa sababu ya uchokozi wake. Mtu yeyote anayevutiwa na kuangalia jinsi Mantis anayeomba afukuze mawindo yake na anakula kwa uchoyo, hii ndio spishi! ... Sio bulky kama sphodromantis lineola lakini fujo hata hivyo. Aina hii ilikuwa rahisi kuinua, kuwalisha roaches nyingi, korongo, na wadudu wa porini, na watakubali chakula hicho kwa furaha. Kupatana spishi hii haikuwa ngumu hata kidogo, [kiume] ataanzisha hatua hiyo na [mwanamke] atashirikiana zaidi wakati wa kulishwa vizuri. Kifuniko cha joto, kilicho na joto la karibu 90 ° F hufanya kazi kama kichocheo ili kuboresha zaidi nafasi za kupandisha.

Cannibalism ya kijinsia ni ya kawaida kati ya spishi nyingi za uwindaji katika utumwa. Wakati mwingine imekuwa ikizingatiwa katika idadi ya watu wa asili, ambapo karibu robo ya kukutana kwa wanaume wa kike husababisha kiume kuliwa na kike. Karibu 90% ya spishi za uwindaji wa mantises hushiriki katika bangi ya ngono. Wanaume wazima kawaida huzidi wanawake mwanzoni, lakini idadi yao inaweza kuwa sawa baadaye katika hatua ya watu wazima, labda kwa sababu wanawake hula wanaume wadogo. Katika "Tenodera sinensis", asilimia 83 ya wanaume hutoroka baada ya kukutana na mwanamke, lakini kwa kuwa mateso mengi hufanyika, uwezekano wa kuliwa kwa kiume huongezeka.

Wakati mantiki ya kusali ni wadudu wa kawaida, pia wako katika hatari ya kuliwa na wanyama wakubwa. Vijana wachanga wa mantids kadhaa kama vile bark mantid "tarachode afzelii" ni mimics wa Batesian wa mchwa, lakini inaonekana hakuna mantids ambayo huiga mifano katika taxon nyingine yoyote. Kwa kushangaza, vijana wachanga hupata ulinzi kutoka kwa kufanana kwao na mchwa, wakati wakubwa na watu wazima, ambao hawana mimi ni watu wa ant, kula mchwa.

Manukuu mengi hutembea mawindo ya kumjaribu ikiwa yanapotea karibu, na yataenda mbali zaidi wakati wana njaa. Mara tu ndani ya kufikiwa, manukuu hupiga haraka ili kufahamu mawindo na utabiri wao wa spaptorial. Baadhi ya ardhi na bark hufuata mawindo yao kwa njia ya kazi zaidi. Kwa mfano, washiriki wa genera chache kama vile manukuu ya ardhini, "entella", "ligaria", na "ligariella" hukimbilia ardhi kavu wakitafuta mawindo, kama vile mende wa tiger hufanya.
Tumbo la mbele la spishi zingine hupanua urefu wote wa wadudu na inaweza kutumika kuhifadhi mawindo kwa digestion baadaye. Hii inaweza kuwa na faida katika wadudu ambao hulisha mara kwa mara. Manukuu ya Wachina huishi kwa muda mrefu, hukua haraka, na huzaa watoto zaidi wanapoweza kula poleni.
report_src: Hapana; ulaji wa wenzi hauitokei kila mara kwa manukuu, kwani utafiti unaonyesha ni tukio la nyakati fulani tu ambapo majike ‘‘wakati mwingine hufanya mazoezi ya ngono, kula wenzi wao baada ya kuiga’’ [1]. Ingawa kiwango halisi hutofautiana kati ya spishi na mazingira (baadhi ya tafiti huonyesha chini ya robo ya matukio ya kujamiiana), visa vingi vya manukuu huisha bila dume kuliwa, na katika spishi zingine tabia hii haijawahi kurekodiwa kabisa. Hivyo, ingawa ulaji wa wenzi ni maarufu na umekuwa chanzo cha sifa ya kipekee kwa mdudu huyu, si tabia ya lazima wala ya kila mara, bali ni mkakati unaoweza kutokea kulingana na nishati inayohitajika, upatikanaji wa mawindo mengine, au mwitikio wa mkutano wenye mkanganyiko kati ya dume na jike.

question_en: What is the population of Burntisland, Scotland?
pos_context_en: Burntisland ( , ) is a royal burgh and parish in Fife, Scotland, on the northern shore of the Firth of Forth. According to the 2011 census, the town has a population of 6,269.
neg_context_en: On 14 March and 27 May 1963 and Gourlay told the Commons that Burntisland Shipbuilding had cut its workforce from about 1,500 in 1961 to just over 500 in 1963. (An alternative source states that in 1961 Burntisland had 1,000 employees.) On 14 March Gourlay pleaded for small shipyards on the east coast of Scotland such as Burntisland to be awarded War Department contracts and on 27 May he claimed in the Commons that the Local Employment Act had not led to the creation of any new jobs in Burntisland. Whitelaw conceded that the number of shipyard workers unemployed in Burntisland had risen from six in May 1961 to 116 in May 1963.

As of the 2010 United States Census, Barrington had a population of 16,310. It is a predominantly white community at 94.7 percent of residents. There were 6,011 households; 40.3% had children under the age of 18 living with them, 68.7% were married couples living together, 7.6% had a female householder with no husband present, and 21.6% were non-families. 18.8% of all households were made up of individuals and 10.0% had someone living alone who was 65 years of age or older. The average household size was 2.73 and the average family size was 3.14. The population was spread out, with 28.2% under the age of 18, 5.1% from 18 to 24, 26.4% from 25 to 44, 25.6% from 45 to 64, and 14.7% who were 65 years of age or older. The median age was 40 years. For every 100 females, there were 95.1 males. For every 100 females age 18 and over, there were 91.0 males.

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.

Bearsden is primarily a middle-class commuter suburb, with its residents travelling into Glasgow each day to work or study. The majority of its housing stock is detached. According to the 2001 census of Scotland, the area comprises 10,417 households, with a total population of 27,967. This is an increase of 0.6% (or 161 people) since 1991, when the population stood at 27,806 (there are an average of 2.64 people per household). Of these, 8,306 are over 55 years old, 17,700 are in social class ABC1, and 6,052 are in social class C2DE. A similar population figure was estimated in 2010 for the two council wards (27,551). 73% of working residents surveyed travel to work by car, 16% by train or bus, 5% by other methods, and 6% work mainly at home. Many of the west of Scotland's most expensive houses are in the Old Bearsden Outstanding Conservation Area – Bearsden's postcode (G61) was ranked 7th richest in the UK by a 2005 survey, with an estimated 176 millionaires living there. By comparison, just 235 people were estimated to be receiving Jobseeker's Allowance in 2011.

In 2012, Barendrecht had a population of 47,055, of which 23,230 were male (49.4%) and 23,825 female (50.6%). According to the civil registry, 21% of its population were under the age of 14, 11% were between 15 and 24 years old, 27% were from 25 to 44, 28% were from 45 to 64 and 13% were 65 years of age or older. The marital status of the municipality was distributed such that 46% of its population was married, 45% never married, 6% divorced and 4% widowed. Twenty percent of the population of Barendrecht was from foreign origin, which is one percent point below the national average of twenty-one percent. The foreign origin of the municipality was 7% Western, 4% Suriname, 3% Turkey, 2% Morocco, 1% Dutch Caribbean and 4% from other countries.

The 2001 UK Census revealed that the borough had a population of 263,464 – of whom 127,806 were male, and 135,658 female. Of those stating a choice, 47.71% described themselves as Christian, 17.71% as Hindu, 12.26% as Muslim and 10% as having no religion. Of the population, 39.96% were in full-time employment and 7.86% in part-time employment – compared to a London average of 42.64% and 8.62%, respectively. Residents were predominantly owner-occupiers, with 23.17% owning their house outright, and a further 31.33% owning with a mortgage. 10.59% were in local authority housing, with a further 13.29% renting from a housing association, or other registered social landlord.

Bodedern is a village and community in the west of Anglesey, Wales.
At the 2001 census, it had a population of 1,074, decreasing slightly to 1,051 at the 2011 census.
The village has a bilingual primary school, Ysgol Gynradd Bodedern, and a secondary school, Ysgol Uwchradd Bodedern. The village's football team, Bodedern Athletic F.C. play in the Welsh Alliance League. Bodedern was the site of the National Eisteddfod of Wales in 2017.
Bodedern lies on the B5109, about east of its junction with the A4025 south of Llanfachraeth. About to the south, beyond the A55 road lie the villages of Caergeiliog and Llanfihangel yn Nhowyn. The Valley Wetlands, an area of lakes and marshes and a RSPB bird sanctuary, lie between these two villages. Bodedern is the closest village to the island's largest natural lake, Llyn Llywenan, which lies to the north. The parish church (St Edern's Church, Bodedern) dates from the 14th century and is a Grade II* listed building, being listed because it is considered a good example of a late medieval church with some fine interior fittings.

Shawlands () is an area of Glasgow, Scotland located less than south of the River Clyde. The area has an approximate population of 7015 people, with over 82% dwelling in flats, 74% owner occupied and 79% living alone or with one other person. Neighbouring districts include the areas of Crossmyloof, Strathbungo, Langside, Newlands, and Pollokshaws with Shawlands itself overlapping the Glasgow City Ward map areas 6 (Pollokshields) and 7 (Langside) The area consists mainly of tenement flats but also includes two-storey terraced cottages and a small number of detached and semi-detached houses. Tenements remain the most common form of dwelling in the city today.

The United Kingdom Census 2001 showed a total resident population for Burnley urban area of 73,021. The town is the main population centre in the Burnley-Nelson urban area, which has an estimated population of over 150,000; for comparison purposes, this is about the same size as Oxford, Swindon or Slough. At that time the racial composition of the wider local government district (the Borough of Burnley) was 91.77% White and 7.16% South Asian or South Asian / British, predominantly from [Bangladesh] . The largest religious groups were Christian (74.46%) and Muslim (6.58%). 59.02% of adults between the ages of 16 and 74 were classed as economically active and in work. In the United Kingdom Census 2011 these figures had changed to 87.4% White and 10.7% South Asian or South Asian / British, with 63.6% identifying as Christian and 9.9% Muslim. The ONS annual population survey for the year Apr 2013 – Mar 2014 showed that 63.1% of adults between the ages of 16 and 64 were classed as economically active.
question_src: Je! Idadi ya watu wa Burrtisland, Scotland ni nini?
pos_context_src: Burntisland (,) ni Royal Burgh na Parokia huko Fife, Scotland, kwenye mwambao wa kaskazini wa Firth ya Forth. Kulingana na sensa ya 2011, mji una idadi ya watu 6,269.
neg_context_title_src: Kampuni ya ujenzi wa meli ya Burntisland
neg_context_src: Mnamo tarehe 14 Machi na 27 Mei 1963 na Gourlay aliwaambia Commons kwamba ujenzi wa meli ya Burrtisland ulikuwa umekata kazi yake kutoka karibu 1,500 mnamo 1961 hadi zaidi ya 500 mnamo 1963. (Chanzo mbadala kinasema kwamba mnamo 1961 Burntisland alikuwa na wafanyikazi 1,000 kama vile Burn Awards alipowa na Wateya wa Awamu ya Scotland. Katika Commons kwamba Sheria ya Ajira ya Mitaa haikusababisha kuundwa kwa kazi yoyote mpya huko Burrtisland. Whitelaw alikubali kwamba idadi ya wafanyikazi wa meli isiyo na kazi huko Burrtisland iliongezeka kutoka sita Mei 1961 hadi 116 Mei 1963.

Kama ya sensa ya Merika ya 2010, Barrington alikuwa na idadi ya watu 16,310. Ni jamii nyeupe kwa asilimia 94.7 ya wakaazi. Kulikuwa na kaya 6,011; 40.3% walikuwa na watoto chini ya umri wa miaka 18 wanaoishi nao, 68.7% walikuwa wameolewa wanandoa wanaoishi pamoja, 7.6% walikuwa na nyumba ya kike na hakuna mume aliyekuwepo, na 21.6% hawakuwa familia. 18.8% ya kaya zote zilitengenezwa na watu binafsi na 10.0% walikuwa na mtu anayeishi peke yake ambaye alikuwa na umri wa miaka 65 au zaidi. Saizi ya wastani ya kaya ilikuwa 2.73 na ukubwa wa wastani wa familia ulikuwa 3.14. Idadi ya watu ilienea, na 28.2% chini ya umri wa miaka 18, 5.1% kutoka 18 hadi 24, 26.4% kutoka 25 hadi 44, 25.6% kutoka 45 hadi 64, na 14.7% ambao walikuwa na umri wa miaka 65 au zaidi. Umri wa wastani ulikuwa miaka 40. Kwa kila wanawake 100, kulikuwa na wanaume 95.1. Kwa kila wanawake 100 wa miaka 18 na zaidi, kulikuwa na wanaume 91.0.

Winfield Toll Bridge, pia inajulikana kama Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, ni kihistoria wa kihistoria wa Cantilever Warren Truss Bridge iliyoko Winfield na Red House, Kaunti ya Putnam, West Virginia. Ilijengwa mnamo 1955, na inachukua Mto wa Kanawha, iliyobeba West Virginia Route 34. Cantilever kupitia-truss ina nafasi mbili za nanga kila futi 245 kwa urefu na urefu wa futi 462 kwa urefu kati ya mistari ya kituo cha pier. Span kuu ina futi mbili 128, inchi 4, mikono ya cantilever na miguu 205, inchi 4, iliyosimamishwa.

Bearsden kimsingi ni kitongoji cha waendeshaji wa kiwango cha kati, na wakaazi wake wakisafiri kwenda Glasgow kila siku kufanya kazi au kusoma. Sehemu kubwa ya hisa yake ya makazi imezuiliwa. Kulingana na sensa ya 2001 ya Scotland, eneo hilo linajumuisha kaya 10,417, na jumla ya watu 27,967. Hii ni ongezeko la 0.6% (au watu 161) tangu 1991, wakati idadi ya watu ilisimama kwa 27,806 (kuna wastani wa watu 2.64 kwa kila kaya). Kati ya hizi, 8,306 ni zaidi ya miaka 55, 17,700 ziko kwenye darasa la kijamii ABC1, na 6,052 ziko kwenye darasa la kijamii C2DE. Idadi kama hiyo ya idadi ya watu ilikadiriwa mnamo 2010 kwa wadi mbili za baraza (27,551). 73% ya wakaazi wanaofanya kazi walichunguza kusafiri kwenda kufanya kazi kwa gari, 16% kwa treni au basi, 5% kwa njia zingine, na 6% hufanya kazi nyumbani. Wengi wa magharibi mwa nyumba za gharama kubwa za Scotland ziko katika eneo la zamani la Uhifadhi wa Bearsden - Postcode ya Bearsden (G61) ilishika nafasi ya 7 nchini Uingereza na uchunguzi wa 2005, na wastani wa mamilioni 176 wanaoishi huko. Kwa kulinganisha, watu 235 tu walikadiriwa kupokea posho ya mfanyikazi mnamo 2011.

Mnamo mwaka wa 2012, Barendrecht alikuwa na idadi ya watu 47,055, ambapo 23,230 walikuwa wa kiume (49.4%) na 23,825 wa kike (50.6%). Kulingana na Msajili wa Kiraia, 21% ya idadi ya watu walikuwa chini ya umri wa miaka 14, 11% walikuwa kati ya miaka 15 na 24, 27% walikuwa kutoka 25 hadi 44, 28% walikuwa kutoka 45 hadi 64 na 13% walikuwa na umri wa miaka 65 au zaidi. Hali ya ndoa ya manispaa ilisambazwa kiasi kwamba 46% ya wakazi wake walikuwa wameolewa, 45% hawakuwahi kuoa, 6% walitengwa na 4% wajane. Asilimia ishirini ya idadi ya watu wa Barendrecht walikuwa kutoka asili ya kigeni, ambayo ni asilimia moja chini ya wastani wa kitaifa wa asilimia ishirini na moja. Asili ya kigeni ya manispaa ilikuwa 7% Magharibi, 4% Suriname, 3% Uturuki, 2% Moroko, 1% ya Uholanzi ya Uholanzi na 4% kutoka nchi zingine.

Sensa ya 2001 ya Uingereza ilifunua kwamba eneo hilo lilikuwa na idadi ya watu 263,464 - kati yao 127,806 walikuwa wa kiume, na 135,658 wa kike. Kati ya wale wanaosema chaguo, 47.71% walijielezea kama Wakristo, 17.71% kama Hindu, 12.26% kama Waislamu na 10% kama hawana dini. Kati ya idadi ya watu, 39.96% walikuwa katika ajira ya wakati wote na 7.86% katika ajira kwa muda-ikilinganishwa na wastani wa London wa 42.64% na 8.62%, mtawaliwa. Wakazi walikuwa wamiliki wa nyumba, na 23.17% wanamiliki nyumba yao wazi, na zaidi ya 31.33% wanamiliki na rehani. 10.59% walikuwa katika makazi ya serikali za mitaa, na kukodisha zaidi ya 13.29% kutoka kwa chama cha makazi, au mwenye nyumba mwingine aliyesajiliwa.

Bodedern ni kijiji na jamii magharibi mwa Anglesey, Wales.
Katika sensa ya 2001, ilikuwa na idadi ya watu 1,074, ikipungua kidogo hadi 1,051 katika sensa ya 2011.
Kijiji kina shule ya msingi ya lugha mbili, Ysgol Gynradd Bodedern, na shule ya sekondari, Ysgol Uwchradd Bodedern. Timu ya mpira wa miguu ya kijiji, Bodedern Athletic F.C. Cheza kwenye Ligi ya Alliance ya Welsh. Bodedern ilikuwa tovuti ya kitaifa Eisteddfod of Wales mnamo 2017.
Bodedern iko kwenye B5109, karibu mashariki mwa makutano yake na A4025 kusini mwa Llanfachraeth. Karibu kusini, zaidi ya barabara ya A55 yapo vijiji vya Caergeliog na Llanfihangel yn Nhowyn. Sehemu za mvua za bonde, eneo la maziwa na mabwawa na patakatifu pa ndege ya RSPB, iko kati ya vijiji hivi viwili. Bodedern ndio kijiji cha karibu zaidi cha ziwa kubwa la asili la kisiwa, Llyn Llywenan, ambayo iko kaskazini. Kanisa la Parokia (Kanisa la St Edern, Bodedern) linaanzia karne ya 14 na ni jengo la daraja la II* lililoorodheshwa, liliorodheshwa kwa sababu inachukuliwa kuwa mfano mzuri wa kanisa la mzee wa marehemu na vifaa vya ndani vya mambo ya ndani.

Shawlands () ni eneo la Glasgow, Scotland iko chini ya kusini mwa mto Clyde. Eneo hilo lina idadi ya watu takriban wa watu 7015, na zaidi ya 82% makazi katika kujaa, 74% mmiliki alichukua na 79% wanaoishi peke yake au na mtu mwingine. Wilaya za jirani ni pamoja na maeneo ya Crossmyloof, Strathbungo, Langside, Newlands, na Pollokshaws na Shawlands yenyewe inaingiliana na Maeneo ya Kata ya Jiji la Glasgow 6 (Pollokshields) na 7 (Langside) eneo hilo lina sehemu kubwa za kujaa lakini pia ni pamoja na nyumba mbili zilizowekwa na nyumba ndogo. Upangaji unabaki kuwa aina ya kawaida ya makao katika jiji leo.

Sensa ya Uingereza ya 2001 ilionyesha jumla ya wakazi wa eneo la Burnley mijini la 73,021. Jiji ndio kituo kikuu cha idadi ya watu katika eneo la Mjini wa Burnley-Nelson, ambalo lina idadi ya watu zaidi ya 150,000; Kwa madhumuni ya kulinganisha, hii ni sawa na Oxford, Swindon au Slough. Wakati huo muundo wa kikabila wa wilaya pana ya serikali ya mitaa (Borough of Burnley) ulikuwa 91.77% nyeupe na 7.16% Asia Kusini au Kusini mwa Asia / Briteni, haswa kutoka [Bangladesh]. Vikundi vikubwa vya kidini vilikuwa vya Kikristo (74.46%) na Waislamu (6.58%). 59.02% ya watu wazima kati ya umri wa miaka 16 na 74 waliwekwa kama kazi kiuchumi na kazini. Katika sensa ya Uingereza 2011 takwimu hizi zilibadilika kuwa 87.4% nyeupe na 10.7% Asia ya Kusini au Kusini mwa Asia / Briteni, na asilimia 63.6 ikitambulisha kama Wakristo na 9.9% Waislamu. Utafiti wa idadi ya watu wa ONS kwa mwaka APR 2013 - Mar 2014 ilionyesha kuwa asilimia 63.1 ya watu wazima kati ya miaka 16 na 64 waliwekwa kama kazi kiuchumi.

question_en: Who was head coach of the San Diego Chargers in the 2014 season?
pos_context_en: The San Diego Chargers season was the franchise's 45th season in the National Football League (NFL), the 55th overall, and the second under head coach Mike McCoy. After former Chargers' offensive coordinator, Ken Whisenhunt, was hired by the Tennessee Titans to become their new head coach, the Chargers promoted Frank Reich to replace him. Reich spent last season as the Chargers' quarterback coach.
neg_context_title_en: History of the San Diego Chargers
History of Los Angeles Chargers head coaches
neg_context_en: Coryell was hired as the San Diego Chargers' head coach on September 25, 1978, the same day as the infamous PSA Flight 182 crash in San Diego. When Don Coryell began coaching the team, the Chargers had a win-loss record of 1–4 for that season. The team broke their losing streak with eight additional wins and three losses that season after Coryell became head coach. The Chargers 9–7 record was their first winning season since 1969.

The San Diego Chargers season was the franchise's 17th season in the National Football League (NFL), and its 27th overall. the team failed to improve on their 8–8 record from 1985 Following a stagnant 1–7 start, Head Coach Don Coryell was fired and Al Saunders was named interim Head Coach. After the season, Saunders was named the permanent Head Coach and would hold the position through the end of the 1988 season. Leslie O'Neal was named Defensive Rookie of the Year.

He then left to become head coach of the San Diego Chargers, where the highlight of his tenure would be an AFC Championship and San Diego's first trip to the Super Bowl after the 1994 season where they fell to the 49ers, 49-26. Ross' first season in San Diego (1992) saw the Chargers drop the first four regular season games, but they recovered to win 11 of their final 12 games to win the AFC West, their first division title since 1981. In his five seasons with the Chargers, they won two division titles and made the playoffs three times. His regular season coaching record with the Chargers was 47–33, and 3–3 in the playoffs.

The San Diego Chargers season was the franchise's 44th season in the National Football League (NFL), the 54th overall, and the 1st under head coach Mike McCoy. The Chargers finished the regular season with a record of 9–7, improving on their 7–9 record from 2012. Also, they qualified for the playoffs for the first time since 2009. The Chargers defeated the Cincinnati Bengals in the Wild Card round by a score of 27–10, but lost to the Denver Broncos in the Divisional round by a score of 24–17. This was the Chargers' final playoff appearance in San Diego. They did not play in the postseason again until 2018, after relocating to Los Angeles.
During the 1986 San Diego Chargers season, following the resignation of Coryell, Al Saunders was named head coach. The team finished 4-12 that year.
The 1974 San Diego Chargers season began with the team trying to improve on their 2–11–1 record in 1973. It was Tommy Prothro's first season as the team's head coach.

The San Diego Chargers season was the franchise's 32nd season in the National Football League (NFL) and the 42nd overall and the third and final season under head coach Mike Riley. The team improved on their 1–15 record in 2000 to finish 5–11 but missed the playoffs for the 6th straight year. It was Mike Riley’s final season as the team’s head coach. At the end of the season running back LaDainian Tomlinson won the Offensive Rookie of the Year award. Despite finishing 5–11 after losing their final nine games of the season, eight of the Chargers’ losses were by less than a touchdown and five of them were by three points.

The 2016 San Diego Chargers season was the franchise's 47th season in the National Football League, the 57th overall, the 56th and final season in San Diego, California and the fourth under head coach Mike McCoy.

In the 1970s, Al Saunders joined the coaching staff at USC and San Diego State University (SDSU), whose SDSU Aztecs were then under the control of Head Coach Don Coryell. Saunders would go with Coryell to NFL when Coryell became the head coach of the San Diego Chargers.
Statistics correct as of December 30, 2007, after the end of the 2007 NFL season.
question_src: Je! Kocha mkuu wa San Diego Charger alikuwa nani msimu wa 2014?
pos_context_src: Msimu wa San Diego Charger ulikuwa msimu wa 45 wa Franchise katika Ligi ya Soka ya Kitaifa (NFL), jumla ya 55, na ya pili chini ya kocha mkuu Mike McCoy. Baada ya mratibu wa zamani wa Charger, Ken Whisenhunt, aliajiriwa na Tennessee Titans kuwa mkufunzi wao mpya, Charger alimkuza Frank Reich kuchukua nafasi yake. Reich alitumia msimu uliopita kama mkufunzi wa robo ya Charger.
neg_context_title_src: Historia ya Chaja za San Diego
Historia ya makocha wakuu wa Los Angeles
neg_context_src: Coryell aliajiriwa kama mkufunzi mkuu wa San Diego Charger mnamo Septemba 25, 1978, siku hiyo hiyo kama ajali mbaya ya ndege ya PSA 182 huko San Diego. Wakati Don Coryell alipoanza kufundisha timu, Charger walikuwa na rekodi ya upotezaji wa 1-5 kwa msimu huo. Timu hiyo ilivunja wimbo wao wa kupoteza na ushindi wa nyongeza nane na hasara tatu msimu huo baada ya Coryell kuwa mkufunzi mkuu. Rekodi ya Chaja 9-7 ilikuwa msimu wao wa kwanza wa kushinda tangu 1969.

Msimu wa San Diego Charger ulikuwa msimu wa 17 wa Franchise katika Ligi ya Soka ya Kitaifa (NFL), na jumla yake ya 27. Timu hiyo ilishindwa kuboresha kwenye rekodi yao ya 8-8 kutoka 1985 kufuatia kuanza kwa nguvu 1-7, kocha mkuu Don Coryell alifukuzwa kazi na Al Saunders aliitwa mkufunzi mkuu wa mpito. Baada ya msimu, Saunders alipewa jina la Kocha Mkuu wa Kudumu na angeshikilia msimamo huo hadi mwisho wa msimu wa 1988. Leslie O'Neal aliitwa Rookie ya Kutetea ya Mwaka.

Kisha akaondoka kuwa mkufunzi mkuu wa San Diego Charger, ambapo ukumbusho wa umiliki wake itakuwa ubingwa wa AFC na safari ya kwanza ya San Diego kwenda Super Bowl baada ya msimu wa 1994 ambapo walianguka kwa 49ers, 49-26. Msimu wa kwanza wa Ross huko San Diego (1992) aliona Charger wakishuka michezo minne ya kwanza ya msimu, lakini walipona kushinda michezo 11 ya mwisho yao 12 kushinda AFC West, taji lao la kwanza tangu 1981. Katika misimu yake mitano na Chaja, walishinda taji mbili za mgawanyiko na kufanya mchezo huo mara tatu. Rekodi yake ya kufundisha ya msimu wa kawaida na Chaja ilikuwa 47-33, na 3-3 kwenye mechi za kucheza.

Msimu wa San Diego Charger ulikuwa msimu wa 44 wa Franchise katika Ligi ya Soka ya Kitaifa (NFL), jumla ya 54, na 1 chini ya Kocha Mkuu Mike McCoy. Chaja walimaliza msimu wa kawaida na rekodi ya 9-7, wakiboresha rekodi yao ya 7-9 kutoka 2012. Pia, walihitimu mchezo huo kwa mara ya kwanza tangu 2009. Chaja zilishinda Bengali za Cincinnati kwenye raundi ya mwitu na alama ya 27-10, lakini walipoteza kwa Denver Broncos katika raundi ya mgawanyiko na alama ya 247. Hii ilikuwa muonekano wa mwisho wa Charger huko San Diego. Hawakucheza tena kwenye postseason tena hadi 2018, baada ya kuhamia Los Angeles.
Wakati wa msimu wa 1986 wa San Diego Charger, kufuatia kujiuzulu kwa Coryell, Al Saunders aliitwa Kocha Mkuu. Timu ilimaliza 4-12 mwaka huo.
Msimu wa 1974 wa San Diego Charger ulianza na timu kujaribu kuboresha kwenye rekodi yao ya 2-11-1 mnamo 1973. Ilikuwa msimu wa kwanza wa Tommy Prothro kama mkufunzi mkuu wa timu hiyo.

Msimu wa San Diego Charger ulikuwa msimu wa 32 wa Franchise katika Ligi ya Soka ya Kitaifa (NFL) na msimu wa 42 na msimu wa tatu na wa mwisho chini ya Kocha Mkuu Mike Riley. Timu iliboresha kwenye rekodi yao ya 1-15 mnamo 2000 kumaliza 5-11 lakini ilikosa mchezo wa kucheza kwa mwaka wa 6 sawa. Ilikuwa msimu wa mwisho wa Mike Riley kama mkufunzi mkuu wa timu. Mwisho wa msimu uliokuwa ukirudi nyuma LaDainian Tomlinson alishinda tuzo ya kukera ya Tuzo ya Mwaka. Licha ya kumaliza 5-11 baada ya kupoteza michezo yao tisa ya mwisho ya msimu, hasara nane za Chaja zilikuwa chini ya kugusa na watano kati yao walikuwa kwa alama tatu.

Msimu wa San Diego Charger wa 2016 ulikuwa msimu wa 47 wa Franchise katika Ligi ya Soka ya Kitaifa, jumla ya 57, msimu wa 56 na wa mwisho huko San Diego, California na wa nne chini ya kocha mkuu Mike McCoy.

Mnamo miaka ya 1970, Al Saunders alijiunga na wafanyikazi wa kufundisha katika Chuo Kikuu cha Jimbo la USC na San Diego (SDSU), ambao SDSU Azteki wakati huo walikuwa chini ya usimamizi wa kocha mkuu Don Coryell. Saunders angeenda na Coryell kwenda NFL wakati Coryell alipokuwa kocha mkuu wa San Diego Charger.
Takwimu ni sawa na Desemba 30, 2007, baada ya kumalizika kwa msimu wa NFL wa 2007.
report_src: Kocha mkuu wa San Diego Chargers katika msimu wa 2014 alikuwa Mike McCoy, aliyekuwa akiiongoza timu hiyo kwa mwaka wake wa pili mfululizo [1].
all_claims: Kocha mkuu wa San Diego Chargers katika msimu wa 2014 alikuwa Mike McCoy, aliyekuwa akiiongoza timu hiyo kwa mwaka wake wa pili mfululizo [1].

question_en: When did Donald Duart Maclean join the Cambridge Five?
pos_context_en: From Gresham's, Maclean won a place at Trinity Hall, Cambridge, arriving in 1931 to read modern languages. Even before the end of his first year he began to throw off parental restraints and engage openly in communist agitprop. He also played rugby for his college through the winter of 1932–33. Eventually his ambitions would lead to him joining the Communist Party. In his second year at Cambridge, his father died, afterwards marking a period of parental relaxation. Maclean's political views grew much more apparent in the following years in light of "his admiring, if sometimes puzzled, mother".
neg_context_en: Donald Duart Maclean (; 25 May 1913 – 6 March 1983) was a British diplomat and member of the Cambridge Five, who acted as spies for the Soviet Union.

Nunn May joined the Communist Party of Great Britain in the 1930s, and was active in the Association of Scientific Workers. Cambridge Five spy ring member Donald Duart Maclean was also at Trinity Hall during an overlapping period.

Yuri Modin (November 8, 1922 in Suzdal – 2007 in Moscow) was the KGB controller for the "Cambridge Five" from 1948 to 1951, during which Donald Duart Maclean was said to have passed atomic secrets to the Soviets. In 1951, Modin arranged the defections of Maclean and Guy Burgess. Modin's predecessors in control of the damaging Cambridge spy ring were executed during Stalin's Great Purge.

Sir John Maclean, 4th Baronet of Duart and Morvern (1670–1716) was the 20th Clan Chief of Clan Maclean from 1674 to 1716. He was the 16th and last Laird of Duart, when in 1691 he lost Castle Duart to Archibald Campbell, 1st Duke of Argyll. The castle wasn't recovered by Clan Maclean until 1912 until it was purchased by Fitzroy Donald Maclean, 221 years later.

Duart Castle was originally built in the 13th century, and was part of Clan MacLean. in 1350, Lachlan Lubanach Maclean of Duart was given the Castle as her dowry. The Clan Campbell's first involvement was an attack in 1647, and Archibald Campbell, 9th Earl of Argyll finally captured the Castle in 1691. The Castle was then demolished, leaving the Castle in ruin. Large bricks from the ruins of the Castle were used by Donald Maclean, 5th Laird of Torloisk, to build a cottage for his family close to the Castle. By 1751, the castle has been abandoned and was officially part of the Torosay Castle estate. 
Descendants of Archibald Campbell, 1st Duke of Argyll sold the castle in 1801. It was purchased by Clan MacQuarrie, before it was sold to Carter-Campbell of Possil, who kept the Castle as a ruin in the Torosay estate. When the estate was sold, the Castle ruin was purchased by Sir Fitzroy Donald Maclean and restored.

A group of Soviet sympathizers, in respected positions in British society, formed the Cambridge Five, sometimes called the Cambridge Four, and it has never been established how many active agents were involved. Of these, the most devastating was Kim Philby. Other confirmed members included Donald Duart Maclean, Guy Burgess, and Anthony Blunt. See Cambridge Five for other suspects.

Born in Marylebone, London, Donald Duart Maclean was the son of Sir Donald Maclean and Gwendolen Margaret Devitt. His father was chosen as chairman of the rump of the 23 independent MPs who backed H. H. Asquith in the Liberal Party in the House of Commons whilst the bulk of the Liberal MPs had followed David Lloyd George into the Coalition Liberal party in the November 1918 election. As the Labour Party had no leader and Sinn Féin did not attend, he became titular Leader of the Opposition. Maclean's parents had houses in London (later in Buckinghamshire) as well as in the Scottish Borders, where his father represented Peebles and Southern Midlothian, but the family lived mostly in and around London. He grew up in a very political household, in which world affairs were constantly discussed. In 1931 his father entered the Coalition Cabinet as President of the Board of Education.

In 1609, Lachlan was also one of twelve leading men of the Highlands who submitted formally to the Bishop of the Isles (Andrew Knox) in Iona and (in August) entered into a bond to observe the Statutes of Icolmkill, a regulatory reform which Donald Gregory described as “of the utmost importance for the improvement of the Isles”. His eleven co-signatories were Angus Macdonald of Dunnyveg, Hector Og Maclean of Duart, Donald Gorm Macdonald of Sleat, Ruari Macleod of Harris, Donald Macdonald (the Captain of Clanranald), Lachlan Maclean of Coll, Hector Maclaine of Lochbuie, Lachlan and Allan Maclean (the brothers of Duart), Gillespie MacQuarrie of Ulva and Donald Macfie of Colonsay.

The three Maclean children all married Russians, but left Moscow to live in London and the U.S, as they still had the right to British or American passports. Fergus, the eldest son, enrolled at University College London in 1974, prompting a question in Parliament. Donald's son, Donald, married firstly Lucy, daughter of George Hanna, an English man who worked for the BBC and friend of the family. They had a son, Donald Duart Maclean's only grandson (who was born in 1970), who resides in the UK.

Maclean married Gwendolen Margaret Devitt (26 September 1880 – 23 July 1962), daughter of Andrew Devitt (1850–1931) and Jane Dales Morrison (1856–1947), on 2 October 1907. They are buried in the churchyard of Holy Trinity Church, Penn, Buckinghamshire, together with their eldest son, Ian. The diplomat and spy, Donald Duart Maclean, was another of his sons.
question_src: Je! Donald Duart MacLean alijiunga lini na Cambridge Tano?
pos_context_src: Kutoka kwa Gresham's, MacLean alishinda mahali katika Utatu wa Utatu, Cambridge, akiwasili mnamo 1931 kusoma lugha za kisasa. Hata kabla ya mwisho wa mwaka wake wa kwanza alianza kutupa vizuizi vya wazazi na kujihusisha waziwazi katika AgitProp ya Kikomunisti. Alicheza pia rugby kwa chuo chake kupitia msimu wa baridi wa 1932–33. Mwishowe matarajio yake yangesababisha yeye kujiunga na Chama cha Kikomunisti. Katika mwaka wake wa pili huko Cambridge, baba yake alikufa, baadaye kuashiria kipindi cha kupumzika kwa wazazi. Maoni ya kisiasa ya Maclean yalikua dhahiri zaidi katika miaka iliyofuata kwa kuzingatia "kupendeza kwake, ikiwa wakati mwingine alishangaa, mama".
neg_context_src: Donald Duart MacLean (; 25 Mei 1913 - 6 Machi 1983) alikuwa mwanadiplomasia wa Uingereza na mwanachama wa Cambridge Tano, ambaye alifanya kama wapelelezi wa Umoja wa Soviet.

Nunn May alijiunga na Chama cha Kikomunisti cha Uingereza mnamo 1930, na alikuwa akifanya kazi katika Chama cha Wafanyikazi wa Sayansi. Cambridge watano wa kupeleleza pete ya kupeleleza Donald Duart MacLean pia alikuwa katika Ukumbi wa Utatu wakati wa kipindi kinachoingiliana.

Yuri Modin (Novemba 8, 1922 huko Suzdal - 2007 huko Moscow) alikuwa mtawala wa KGB kwa "Cambridge tano" kutoka 1948 hadi 1951, wakati ambao Donald Duart Maclean alisemekana alipitisha siri za atomiki kwa Wakuu. Mnamo 1951, Modin alipanga upungufu wa MacLean na Guy Burgess. Watangulizi wa Modin katika udhibiti wa pete ya kupeleleza ya Cambridge walitekelezwa wakati wa Purge Kuu ya Stalin.

Sir John Maclean, 4 Baronet wa Duart na Morvern (1670-1716) alikuwa mkuu wa ukoo wa 20 wa Clan Maclean kutoka 1674 hadi 1716. Alikuwa wa 16 na wa mwisho wa Duart, wakati mnamo 1691 alipoteza Castle Duart kwenda Archibald Campbell, Duke wa 1 wa Argyll. Ngome haikupatikana na ukoo MacLean hadi 1912 hadi ilinunuliwa na Fitzroy Donald MacLean, miaka 221 baadaye.

Duart Castle hapo awali ilijengwa katika karne ya 13, na ilikuwa sehemu ya ukoo MacLean. Mnamo 1350, Lachlan Lubanach MacLean wa Duart alipewa ngome kama mahari yake. Kuhusika kwa kwanza kwa Clan Campbell ilikuwa shambulio mnamo 1647, na Archibald Campbell, 9 Earl wa Argyll hatimaye aliteka ngome hiyo mnamo 1691. Ngome hiyo ilibomolewa, ikiacha ngome huko Ruin. Matofali makubwa kutoka kwa magofu ya ngome yalitumiwa na Donald MacLean, Laird wa 5 wa Torloisk, kujenga nyumba ya familia yake karibu na ngome. Kufikia 1751, ngome hiyo imeachwa na ilikuwa sehemu ya mali ya Jumba la Torosay. 
DESCENDANTS ya Archibald Campbell, Duke wa 1 wa Argyll aliuza ngome hiyo mnamo 1801. Ilinunuliwa na Clan Macquarrie, kabla ya kuuzwa kwa Carter-Campbell wa Pospil, ambaye aliweka ngome kama uharibifu katika mali ya Torosay. Wakati mali hiyo iliuzwa, uharibifu wa ngome ulinunuliwa na Sir Fitzroy Donald Maclean na kurejeshwa.

Kundi la wa huruma wa Soviet, katika nafasi zinazoheshimiwa katika jamii ya Uingereza, waliunda Cambridge tano, wakati mwingine huitwa Cambridge Nne, na haijawahi kuanzishwa ni mawakala wangapi waliohusika. Kati ya hizi, mbaya zaidi alikuwa Kim Philby. Washiriki wengine waliothibitishwa ni pamoja na Donald Duart MacLean, Guy Burgess, na Anthony Blunt. Tazama Cambridge tano kwa watuhumiwa wengine.

Mzaliwa wa Marylebone, London, Donald Duart MacLean alikuwa mtoto wa Sir Donald Maclean na Gwendolen Margaret Devitt. Baba yake alichaguliwa kama mwenyekiti wa rump ya wabunge 23 huru ambao walimsaidia H. H. Asquith katika Chama cha Liberal katika Baraza la Commons wakati idadi kubwa ya wabunge wa Liberal walikuwa wamemfuata David Lloyd George katika Chama cha Liberal Liberal katika uchaguzi wa Novemba 1918. Wakati Chama cha Wafanyikazi hakikuwa na kiongozi na Sinn Féin hakuhudhuria, alikua kiongozi wa upinzaji. Wazazi wa MacLean walikuwa na nyumba huko London (baadaye huko Buckinghamshire) na pia katika Mipaka ya Scottish, ambapo baba yake aliwakilisha Peebles na Midlothian Kusini, lakini familia hiyo iliishi sana ndani na karibu na London. Alikua katika kaya ya kisiasa, ambayo mambo ya ulimwengu yalijadiliwa kila wakati. Mnamo 1931 baba yake aliingia katika baraza la mawaziri la umoja kama rais wa Bodi ya elimu.

Mnamo mwaka wa 1609, Lachlan pia alikuwa mmoja wa watu kumi na wawili wanaoongoza wa Nyanda za Juu ambao waliwasilisha rasmi kwa Askofu wa Visiwa (Andrew Knox) ​​huko Iona na (mnamo Agosti) aliingia katika dhamana ya kuona kanuni za Icolmkill, mageuzi ya kisheria ambayo Donald Gregory alielezea kama "Umuhimu wa Uboreshaji wa Uboreshaji wa Uboreshaji." Washirika wake kumi na moja walikuwa Angus Macdonald wa Dunnyveg, Hector og Maclean wa Duart, Donald Gorm MacDonald wa Sleat, Ruari MacLeod wa Harris, Donald MacDonald (Kapteni wa Clanrand), Lachlan MacLean wa Coll MacLaine wa Mac Ndugu wa Duart), Gillespie Macquarrie wa Ulva na Donald Macfie wa Colonsay.

Watoto watatu wa Maclean wote walioa Warusi, lakini waliondoka Moscow kuishi London na U.S, kwani bado walikuwa na haki ya pasi za Uingereza au Amerika. Fergus, mtoto wa kwanza, aliyejiunga katika Chuo Kikuu cha London London mnamo 1974, na kusababisha swali katika Bunge. Mwana wa Donald, Donald, alioa kwanza Lucy, binti ya George Hanna, mtu wa Kiingereza ambaye alifanya kazi kwa BBC na rafiki wa familia. Walikuwa na mtoto wa kiume, mjukuu wa pekee wa Donald Duart MacLean (ambaye alizaliwa mnamo 1970), ambaye anakaa Uingereza.

MacLean alifunga ndoa na Gwendolen Margaret Devitt (26 Septemba 1880 - 23 Julai 1962), binti ya Andrew Devitt (1850-1931) na Jane Dales Morrison (1856-1947), mnamo 2 Oktoba 1907. Wamezikwa katika kanisa la kanisa la Utatu Mtakatifu, Penn, Buckinghamshire, wasomi pamoja. Mwanadiplomasia na mpelelezi, Donald Duart MacLean, alikuwa mwingine wa wanawe.
report_src: Hati iliyonukuliwa haielezi tarehe mahsusi ambayo Donald Duart MacLean alijiunga na kundi la kijasusi la “Cambridge Tano”; inataja tu kuwa alianza kushiriki waziwazi katika propaganda ya Kikomunisti “hata kabla ya mwisho wa mwaka wake wa kwanza” huko Cambridge (1931-1932) na kwamba “mwishowe matarajio yake yangesababisha yeye kujiunga na Chama cha Kikomunisti” [1].
