question_en: What causes the green color of the Statue of Liberty?
pos_context_en: Verdigris is the common name for a green pigment obtained through the application of acetic acid to copper plates or the natural patina formed when copper, brass or bronze is weathered and exposed to air or seawater over a period of time. It is usually a basic copper carbonate, but near the sea will be a basic copper chloride. If acetic acid is present at the time of weathering, it may consist of copper(II) acetate.
neg_context_title_en: Statue of Liberty in popular culture
Conservation-restoration of the Statue of Liberty
neg_context_en: Originally, the statue was a dull copper color, but shortly after 1900 a green patina, also called verdigris, caused by the oxidation of the copper skin, began to spread. As early as 1902 it was mentioned in the press; by 1906 it had entirely covered the statue. Believing that the patina was evidence of corrosion, Congress authorized for various repairs, and to paint the statue both inside and out. There was considerable public protest against the proposed exterior painting. The Army Corps of Engineers studied the patina for any ill effects to the statue and concluded that it protected the skin, "softened the outlines of the Statue and made it beautiful." The statue was painted only on the inside. The Corps of Engineers also installed an elevator to take visitors from the base to the top of the pedestal.

There have been questions raised about how the statue would hold up for thousands of years, based on her current corrosion patterns. Studies done during various repairs in the past hundred years show that the copper "skin" of the statue herself will hold up, but her insides may not. The copper has aged and chemically changed to create a patina, which on metal is a coating of various chemical compounds such as oxides, carbonates, sulfides, or sulfates formed on the surface during exposure to atmospheric elements. It is this patina that gives the statue her sea-green coloring, due to the oxidation of the copper. It also means that the statue's deterioration by seawater and winds is greatly slowed. The only thing that still poses a threat to the patina is acid rain, which has the power to corrode the surface.

Discoloration of teeth may result from bacteria stains, tobacco, tea, coffee, foods with an abundance of chlorophyll, restorative materials, and medications. Stains from bacteria may cause colors varying from green to black to orange. Green stains also result from foods with chlorophyll or excessive exposure to copper or nickel. Amalgam, a common dental restorative material, may turn adjacent areas of teeth black or gray. Long term use of chlorhexidine, a mouthwash, may encourage extrinsic stain formation near the gingiva on teeth. This is usually easy for a hygienist to remove. Systemic disorders also can cause tooth discoloration. Congenital erythropoietic porphyria causes porphyrins to be deposited in teeth, causing a red-brown coloration. Blue discoloration may occur with alkaptonuria and rarely with Parkinson's disease. Erythroblastosis fetalis and biliary atresia are diseases which may cause teeth to appear green from the deposition of biliverdin. Also, trauma may change a tooth to a pink, yellow, or dark gray color. Pink and red discolorations are also associated in patients with lepromatous leprosy. Some medications, such as tetracycline antibiotics, may become incorporated into the structure of a tooth, causing intrinsic staining of the teeth.

It has been claimed that the colours of the flag were incorporated into the first public performance of Sir Cavendish Boyle's "Ode to Newfoundland" at the Casino Theatre in 1901, where a character resembling the Statue of Liberty clad in a flowing gown of vertical stripes of pink, white and green is said to have appeared on stage. The next day the colours appeared on the cover of the music sheet published by Boyle. The pink, white and green tricolour did, in fact, appear on the first published sheet music of Boyle's "Ode to Newfoundland", which was published in January 1902, however, the music which was eventually used for the Ode came later and is used to this day. Connecting the pink, white and green with the Ode to Newfoundland was clever but not definitive. The cover to that sheet music depicted the "Pink, White and Green" being held by a fisherman and intertwined with the Union Jack being held by a Royal Navy sailor. It is unsubstantiated, however, that the pink-based tricolour appeared in connection with the first performance of the "Ode to Newfoundland" at the Casino Theatre. This performance actually took place on December 22, 1902 as part of the closing of the play "Mamzelle" - a play in which the French character Marianne, bearing a strong resemblance to the Statue of Liberty, appears clothed in a tricolour gown of red, white and blue based on the French tricolour.

In July 2015, the Charleston church shooting caused many Southern states and communities to rethink the public display of Confederate symbols and monuments. The New Orleans mayor Mitch Landrieu called for the Liberty Place monument and statues honoring Robert E. Lee and other Confederate notables to be removed from prominent public spaces, explaining that "that's what museums are for". The idea drew both support and resistance and the city council voted unanimously to hold public hearings to discuss the proposal. In December 2016, the council voted to remove the monument, and its move was upheld by a federal appeals court in March 2017.

Once the interior scaffolding was installed, a thorough evaluative survey of the interior coatings was executed. The acknowledged presumption of most involved in the restoration was that all coatings would be removed from the interior metals, that repairs would be made, that metals would be recoated, and the interior would be adequately weatherproofed. The preexisting interior coatings on both the secondary wrought iron framework and the wrought iron central pylon would be removed along with the multiple layers of coal tar and paint that had been applied to the internal copper sheathing. A "New York Times" article from February 8, 1984, mentioned that the interior copper which was at that time painted "government green" would be cleaned to resemble the salmon color of a new penny. That outermost "government green" layer was a vinyl paint applied in 1975.
Because certain sections that had corroded were hidden beneath the layers of coatings, no attempt was made to salvage any of the seven layers of paint, (consisting of a base coat of red lead primer plus six additional coats) and the two layers of bituminous paint (a coal tar coating) that had been used as a water sealant in the statues interior around 1911. The three available coating removal methods tested, developed (or not) and implemented (or not) were: thermal coating removal, abrasive coating removal and chemical coating removal. The methods contemplated for the removal of the coatings on the interior copper differed from that of the other interior metals. For the preparation of the wrought iron parts of the statue, an abrasive removal method also known as dry sandblasting was implemented in order to prevent against flash rusting, The low dusting abrasive material used in the dry sandblasting technique was aluminum oxide.

Green is common in nature, as many plants are green because of a complex chemical known as chlorophyll, which is involved in photosynthesis. Chlorophyll absorbs the long wavelengths of light (red) and short wavelengths of light (blue) much more efficiently than the wavelengths that appear green to the human eye, so light reflected by plants is enriched in green. Chlorophyll absorbs green light poorly because it first arose in organisms living in oceans where purple halobacteria were already exploiting photosynthesis. Their purple color arose because they extracted energy in the green portion of the spectrum using bacteriorhodopsin. The new organisms that then later came to dominate the extraction of light were selected to exploit those portions of the spectrum not used by the halobacteria.
Animals typically use the color green as camouflage, blending in with the chlorophyll green of the surrounding environment. Green animals include, especially, amphibians, reptiles, and some fish, birds and insects. Most fish, reptiles, amphibians, and birds appear green because of a reflection of blue light coming through an over-layer of yellow pigment. Perception of color can also be affected by the surrounding environment. For example, broadleaf forests typically have a yellow-green light about them as the trees filter the light. Turacoverdin is one chemical which can cause a green hue in birds, especially. Invertebrates such as insects or mollusks often display green colors because of porphyrin pigments, sometimes caused by diet. This can causes their feces to look green as well. Other chemicals which generally contribute to greenness among organisms are flavins (lychochromes) and hemanovadin. Humans have imitated this by wearing green clothing as a camouflage in military and other fields. Substances that may impart a greenish hue to one's skin include biliverdin, the green pigment in bile, and ceruloplasmin, a protein that carries copper ions in chelation.

On July 30, 1916, during World War I, German saboteurs set off a disastrous explosion on the Black Tom peninsula in Jersey City, New Jersey, in what is now part of Liberty State Park, close to Bedloe's Island. Carloads of dynamite and other explosives that were being sent to Britain and France for their war efforts were detonated, and seven people were killed. The statue sustained minor damage, mostly to the torch-bearing right arm, and was closed for ten days. The cost to repair the statue and buildings on the island was about . The narrow ascent to the torch was closed for public-safety reasons, and it has remained closed ever since.

The Rangers previously had a navy alternate jersey featuring the head of the Statue of Liberty with the team abbreviation (NYR) below in a futuristic script. Silver was used as an accent color, but the player names and numbers retain the same color schemes as the regular jerseys, except for a darker shade of blue. With the exception of a white version used in the 1998–99 season, this jersey was used from 1996 to 2007, and proved to be highly popular with fans.

The species was originally called the "blue frog" ("Rana caerulea") despite its green color. The specimens White sent to England were damaged by the preservative and appeared blue. The color of the frog is caused by blue and green pigments covered in a yellow layer; the preservative destroyed the yellow layer and left the frog with a blue appearance. The specific epithet, "caerulea", which is Latin for blue, has remained. This frog is sometimes referred to as "Pelodryas caerulea" in the scientific literature. In Australia, the frog is also known more simply as the "green tree frog", but that name is often given to the most common green arboreal species in a region, such as the American green tree frog ("Hyla cinerea").
question_src: Ni nini husababisha rangi ya kijani ya sanamu ya uhuru?
pos_context_src: Verdigris ni jina la kawaida kwa rangi ya kijani iliyopatikana kupitia utumiaji wa asidi ya asetiki kwa sahani za shaba au patina ya asili inayoundwa wakati shaba, shaba au shaba imewekwa wazi na kufunuliwa na hewa au maji ya bahari kwa muda mrefu. Kawaida ni kaboni ya msingi ya shaba, lakini karibu na bahari itakuwa kloridi ya msingi ya shaba. Ikiwa asidi asetiki iko wakati wa hali ya hewa, inaweza kuwa na acetate ya shaba (II).
neg_context_title_src: Sanamu ya Uhuru katika Tamaduni Maarufu
Uhifadhi wa kumbukumbu ya Sanamu ya Uhuru
Chura wa mti wa kijani wa Australia
neg_context_src: Hapo awali, sanamu hiyo ilikuwa rangi nyepesi ya shaba, lakini muda mfupi baada ya 1900 patina ya kijani, pia inayoitwa Verdigris, iliyosababishwa na oxidation ya ngozi ya shaba, ilianza kuenea. Mapema mnamo 1902 ilitajwa kwenye vyombo vya habari; Kufikia 1906 ilikuwa imefunika sanamu kabisa. Kuamini kwamba patina ilikuwa ushahidi wa kutu, Congress iliyoidhinishwa kwa matengenezo mbali mbali, na kuchora sanamu hiyo ndani na nje. Kulikuwa na maandamano makubwa ya umma dhidi ya uchoraji uliopendekezwa wa nje. Jeshi la Wahandisi lilisoma patina kwa athari yoyote mbaya kwa sanamu hiyo na ilihitimisha kuwa ililinda ngozi, "ilipunguza muhtasari wa sanamu hiyo na kuifanya iwe nzuri." Sanamu hiyo ilichorwa tu ndani. Corps ya Wahandisi pia iliweka lifti kuchukua wageni kutoka msingi hadi juu ya msingi.

Kumekuwa na maswali yaliyoulizwa juu ya jinsi sanamu hiyo ingeshikilia kwa maelfu ya miaka, kwa kuzingatia mifumo yake ya sasa ya kutu. Utafiti uliofanywa wakati wa matengenezo anuwai katika miaka mia iliyopita unaonyesha kuwa "ngozi" ya shaba ya sanamu mwenyewe itashikilia, lakini ndani yake inaweza kuwa haifai. Copper imebadilika na kubadilika kwa kemikali ili kuunda patina, ambayo kwenye chuma ni mipako ya misombo anuwai ya kemikali kama vile oksidi, kaboni, sulfidi, au sulfate zilizoundwa juu ya uso wakati wa kufichua vitu vya anga. Ni patina hii ambayo inatoa sanamu ya kuchorea-kijani-kijani, kwa sababu ya oxidation ya shaba. Inamaanisha pia kuwa kuzorota kwa sanamu na maji ya bahari na upepo hupunguzwa sana. Kitu pekee ambacho bado kinaleta tishio kwa patina ni mvua ya asidi, ambayo ina nguvu ya kutuliza uso.

Uainishaji wa meno unaweza kusababisha madoa ya bakteria, tumbaku, chai, kahawa, vyakula vyenye chlorophyll, vifaa vya kurejesha, na dawa. Madoa kutoka kwa bakteria yanaweza kusababisha rangi tofauti kutoka kijani hadi nyeusi hadi machungwa. Madoa ya kijani pia hutokana na vyakula vyenye chlorophyll au mfiduo mwingi wa shaba au nickel. Amalgam, nyenzo ya kawaida ya kurejesha meno, inaweza kugeuza maeneo ya karibu ya meno nyeusi au kijivu. Matumizi ya muda mrefu ya chlorhexidine, kinywa, inaweza kuhamasisha malezi ya doa karibu na gingiva kwenye meno. Hii kawaida ni rahisi kwa usafi kuondoa. Shida za kimfumo pia zinaweza kusababisha kubadilika kwa jino. Congenital erythropoietic porphyria husababisha porphyrins kuwekwa kwenye meno, na kusababisha rangi nyekundu-hudhurungi. Kubadilika kwa bluu kunaweza kutokea na alkaptonuria na mara chache na ugonjwa wa Parkinson. Erythroblastosis fetasis na biliary atresia ni magonjwa ambayo yanaweza kusababisha meno kuonekana kijani kutoka kwa kutua kwa biliverdin. Pia, kiwewe kinaweza kubadilisha jino kuwa rangi ya rangi ya hudhurungi, manjano, au giza. Diski za rangi ya pinki na nyekundu pia zinahusishwa kwa wagonjwa walio na ukoma wa lepromatous. Dawa zingine, kama vile dawa za kuzuia ugonjwa wa tetracycline, zinaweza kuingizwa katika muundo wa jino, na kusababisha kudorora kwa meno.

Imedaiwa kuwa rangi za bendera ziliingizwa katika utendaji wa kwanza wa umma wa Sir Cavendish Boyle "Ode to Newfoundland" kwenye ukumbi wa michezo wa Casino mnamo 1901, ambapo mhusika anayefanana na sanamu ya Uhuru katika gauni inayotiririka ya viboko vya wima, nyeupe na kijani inasemekana imeonekana kwenye hatua. Siku iliyofuata rangi zilionekana kwenye kifuniko cha karatasi ya muziki iliyochapishwa na Boyle. Tricolor ya rangi ya pinki, nyeupe na kijani, kwa kweli, ilionekana kwenye muziki wa kwanza uliochapishwa wa "Ode to Newfoundland", ambayo ilichapishwa mnamo Januari 1902, hata hivyo, muziki ambao baadaye ulitumika kwa Ode ulikuja baadaye na unatumika leo. Kuunganisha rangi ya pinki, nyeupe na kijani na ODE kwa Newfoundland ilikuwa busara lakini sio dhahiri. Jalada la muziki wa karatasi hiyo lilionyesha "pink, nyeupe na kijani" ikishikiliwa na mvuvi na kuunganishwa na umoja wa Jack ukishikiliwa na baharia wa Royal Navy. Haijulikani, hata hivyo, kwamba tricolor ya msingi wa pink ilionekana kuhusiana na utendaji wa kwanza wa "Ode to Newfoundland" kwenye ukumbi wa michezo wa Casino. Utendaji huu ulifanyika mnamo Desemba 22, 1902 kama sehemu ya kufungwa kwa mchezo wa "Mamzelle" - mchezo ambao mhusika wa Ufaransa Marianne, akifanana sana na sanamu ya Uhuru, anaonekana amevalia gauni ya tricolor ya nyekundu, nyeupe na bluu kulingana na tricolor ya Ufaransa.

Mnamo Julai 2015, risasi ya Kanisa la Charleston ilisababisha majimbo mengi ya kusini na jamii kufikiria tena onyesho la umma la alama na makaburi ya Confederate. Meya wa New Orleans Mitch Landrieu alitaka Monument ya Mahali ya Uhuru na sanamu kumheshimu Robert E. Lee na notisi zingine za Confederate ziondolewe kutoka kwa nafasi maarufu za umma, akielezea kwamba "hiyo ndio makumbusho ya". Wazo hilo lilivutia msaada na upinzani na baraza la jiji lilipiga kura bila kukusudia kufanya mikutano ya hadhara kujadili pendekezo hilo. Mnamo Desemba 2016, baraza lilipiga kura ya kuondoa mnara huo, na hatua yake ilisimamiwa na korti ya rufaa ya shirikisho mnamo Machi 2017.

Mara tu ujanibishaji wa mambo ya ndani ulipowekwa, uchunguzi kamili wa tathmini ya mipako ya mambo ya ndani ulitekelezwa. Dhana iliyokubaliwa ya kuhusika zaidi katika marejesho ni kwamba mipako yote itaondolewa kutoka kwa metali za ndani, kwamba matengenezo yangefanywa, metali zingeondolewa, na mambo ya ndani yangezuiliwa vya kutosha. Mapazia ya mambo ya ndani yaliyowekwa juu ya mfumo wa chuma uliofanywa wa sekondari na pylon ya chuma iliyotengenezwa ingeondolewa pamoja na tabaka nyingi za tar ya makaa ya mawe na rangi ambayo ilikuwa imetumika kwa sheathing ya ndani ya shaba. Nakala ya "New York Times" kutoka Februari 8, 1984, ilisema kwamba shaba ya mambo ya ndani ambayo wakati huo ilikuwa rangi "Green Green" ingesafishwa ili kufanana na rangi ya salmoni ya senti mpya. Safu ya nje "Serikali Green" ilikuwa rangi ya vinyl iliyotumika mnamo 1975.
Because certain sections that had corroded were hidden beneath the layers of coatings, no attempt was made to salvage any of the seven layers of paint, (consisting of a base coat of red lead primer plus six additional coats) and the two layers of bituminous paint (a coal tar coating) that had been used as a water sealant in the statues interior around 1911. The three available coating removal methods tested, developed (or not) and implemented (or sio) walikuwa: Kuondoa mipako ya mafuta, kuondoa mipako ya abrasive na kuondolewa kwa mipako ya kemikali. Njia zilizofikiriwa kuondolewa kwa mipako kwenye shaba ya ndani ilitofautiana na ile ya metali zingine za ndani. Kwa utayarishaji wa sehemu za chuma zilizotengenezwa, njia ya kuondolewa kwa nguvu pia inajulikana kama mchanga kavu ilitekelezwa ili kuzuia dhidi ya kutu, nyenzo za chini za vumbi zilizotumiwa katika mbinu kavu ya mchanga ilikuwa aluminium.

Kijani ni kawaida katika maumbile, kwani mimea mingi ni kijani kwa sababu ya kemikali tata inayojulikana kama chlorophyll, ambayo inahusika katika photosynthesis. Chlorophyll inachukua mawimbi marefu ya mwanga (nyekundu) na mawimbi mafupi ya mwanga (bluu) kwa ufanisi zaidi kuliko mawimbi ambayo yanaonekana kuwa kijani kwa jicho la mwanadamu, kwa hivyo mwanga unaoonyeshwa na mimea umejazwa kwa kijani kibichi. Chlorophyll inachukua taa ya kijani vibaya kwa sababu iliibuka kwanza katika viumbe vinavyoishi katika bahari ambapo halobacteria ya zambarau tayari ilikuwa ikinyonya picha. Rangi yao ya zambarau iliibuka kwa sababu walitoa nishati katika sehemu ya kijani ya wigo kwa kutumia bacteriorhodopsin. Viumbe vipya ambavyo baadaye vilikuja kutawala uchimbaji wa taa vilichaguliwa ili kutumia sehemu hizo za wigo ambazo hazikutumiwa na halobacteria.
Wanyama kawaida hutumia rangi ya kijani kama kuficha, ikichanganyika na kijani kibichi cha mazingira ya karibu. Wanyama wa kijani ni pamoja na, haswa, amphibians, reptilia, na samaki wengine, ndege na wadudu. Samaki wengi, reptilia, amphibians, na ndege huonekana kijani kwa sababu ya kuonyesha taa ya bluu inayokuja kupitia safu ya rangi ya manjano. Mtazamo wa rangi pia unaweza kuathiriwa na mazingira yanayozunguka. Kwa mfano, misitu pana kawaida huwa na taa ya kijani-kijani juu yao kama miti huchuja taa. Turacoverdin ni kemikali moja ambayo inaweza kusababisha kijani kibichi katika ndege, haswa. Invertebrates kama vile wadudu au mollusks mara nyingi huonyesha rangi ya kijani kwa sababu ya rangi ya porphyrin, wakati mwingine husababishwa na lishe. Hii inaweza kusababisha kinyesi chao kuonekana kijani pia. Kemikali zingine ambazo kwa ujumla huchangia kijani kati ya viumbe ni flavins (Lychochromes) na Hemanovadin. Wanadamu wameiga hii kwa kuvaa mavazi ya kijani kama kuficha katika uwanja wa kijeshi na mwingine. Vitu ambavyo vinaweza kupeana hue ya kijani kwa ngozi ya mtu ni pamoja na biliverdin, rangi ya kijani kwenye bile, na ceruloplasmin, protini ambayo hubeba ioni za shaba katika chelation.

Mnamo Julai 30, 1916, wakati wa Vita vya Kwanza vya Dunia, wasafishaji wa Ujerumani walianzisha mlipuko mbaya kwenye peninsula ya Tom Nyeusi huko Jersey City, New Jersey, katika ambayo sasa ni sehemu ya Hifadhi ya Jimbo la Liberty, karibu na Kisiwa cha Bedloe. Mizigo ya baruti na milipuko mingine ambayo ilikuwa ikipelekwa Uingereza na Ufaransa kwa juhudi zao za vita ilifutwa, na watu saba waliuawa. Sanamu hiyo iliendeleza uharibifu mdogo, haswa kwa mkono wa kulia wa tochi, na ilifungwa kwa siku kumi. Gharama ya kukarabati sanamu na majengo kwenye kisiwa hicho ilikuwa karibu. Kupanda nyembamba kwa tochi ilifungwa kwa sababu za usalama wa umma, na imebaki imefungwa tangu hapo.

Ranger hapo awali walikuwa na Jersey mbadala ya Navy iliyo na kichwa cha Sanamu ya Uhuru na muhtasari wa timu (NYR) hapa chini kwenye hati ya baadaye. Fedha ilitumika kama rangi ya lafudhi, lakini majina ya mchezaji na nambari huhifadhi miradi sawa ya rangi kama jerseys za kawaida, isipokuwa kwa kivuli cheusi cha bluu. Isipokuwa toleo nyeupe linalotumiwa katika msimu wa 1998-99, jezi hii ilitumiwa kutoka 1996 hadi 2007, na ilionekana kuwa maarufu sana na mashabiki.

Aina hiyo iliitwa "Blue Frog" ("Rana Caerulea") licha ya rangi yake ya kijani. Vielelezo vyeupe vilivyotumwa England viliharibiwa na kihifadhi na vilionekana bluu. Rangi ya chura husababishwa na rangi ya bluu na kijani iliyofunikwa kwenye safu ya manjano; Kihifadhi kiliharibu safu ya manjano na kuachana na chura na muonekano wa bluu. Epithet maalum, "Caerulea", ambayo ni Kilatini kwa bluu, imebaki. Chura huyu wakati mwingine hujulikana kama "Pelodryas caerulea" katika fasihi ya kisayansi. Huko Australia, chura pia hujulikana zaidi kama "chura wa mti wa kijani", lakini jina hilo mara nyingi hupewa spishi za kawaida za kijani kibichi katika mkoa, kama vile Frog ya Mti wa Kijani wa Amerika ("Hyla Cinerea").
report_src: Rangi ya kijani inayojulikana kwenye Sanamu ya Uhuru husababishwa na verdigris, patina ambayo hutokea pale ambapo karatasi za shaba za sanamu zinapokaa wazi kwa muda mrefu na kuathiriwa na hewa, unyevunyevu na dawa za baharini, na hivyo kutengeneza tabaka la misombo kama kabonati ya shaba au, karibu na bahari, kloridi ya shaba; ikiwa asidi asetiki ipo inaweza pia kutengeneza acetate ya shaba (II), yote ambayo hutoa mwonekano wa kijani unaoonekana leo [1].

question_en: How old is Melissa Gaboriau Auf der Maur?
pos_context_en: Melissa Gaboriau Auf der Maur (; born March 17, 1972) is a Canadian musician, singer-songwriter, photographer and actress.
neg_context_en: Auf der Maur did not meet her father until she was three years old. Gaboriau called Nick Auf der Maur after her daughter began questioning her about her father's identity. Reflecting on the encounter, Auf der Maur said "[my father] realised my mother Linda was the love of his life because she'd offered the gift of this child without any demands. He fell madly in love with her [and] pursued her for two years". Auf der Maur and Gaboriau married in 1978 when Melissa was six years old. The couple divorced in 1979 after which Auf der Maur traveled worldwide with her mother. A portion of Auf der Maur's childhood was spent living in "a circus caravan in Wales, a red post-office box truck in Morocco, and a hut in Kenya" with her mother. During her time in Kenya, she contracted three bouts of malaria and returned to Montreal.

Auf der Maur was born in Montreal, Quebec to journalist and politician Nick Auf der Maur and journalist and literary translator Linda Gaboriau. Auf der Maur's father's family was Swiss–German and her mother's was mixed European-American. Gaboriau was born in Boston, Massachusetts in the United States. As a result, she holds dual Canadian–American citizenship. Auf der Maur's surname translates to English as "on the wall", as "maur" was derived from the German word for "wall" ("die Mauer"). She has stated that her grandmother, Theresia Schaelin-Auf der Maur, was "always pounding my heritage down my throat—reminding me that I'm the last one in North America to further the name".

Gaboriau was previously married to Montreal city councillor Nick Auf der Maur, and is the mother of rock musician Melissa Auf der Maur. She and her late partner of 35 years, author and professor Hervé de Fontenay, have one son, architect Yves de Fontenay.

Hole reunited again—with the "Celebrity Skin" line-up of Love, Erlandson, Auf der Maur and Schemel—for a one-off performance at Public Assembly in Brooklyn, New York on April 12, 2012 at an after-party for Schemel's film "Hit So Hard" (2011). Originally Auf der Maur, Erlandson and Schemel were performing as a trio until Love arrived for a spontaneous performance of "Miss World" and "Over the Edge". "The Quietus" reported in April 2014 that the four members had reunited although in subsequent interviews, Love downplayed talk of an imminent reunion. In April 2016, Auf der Maur stated in an interview that she no longer had time or energy for a full-fledged reunion, but would be interested in wrapping up the Hole legacy with a retrospective disc and small set of tour dates.

In Montreal, Auf der Maur attended the Fine Arts Core Education (FACE) School and Moving in New Directions (MIND) High School—both of which are schools of alternative education. At FACE, she was a member of the classical choir and at MIND, she was "part of the small English elite", where she formed friendships with Leonard Cohens daughter Lorca and Rufus Wainwright. At school, she became interested in photography and subsequently attended Concordia University, from which she majored in photography in 1994. At Concordia at age 19, Auf der Maur began working part-time as a disc jockey at Bifteck, a well known rock club, where she met several musicians including Steve Durand.

Recorded from 2001 to 2003  at various studios in the U.S. and Canada, Auf der Maur's debut studio album "Auf der Maur" was released in February 2004 on Capitol Records. Produced with Chris Goss, Auf der Maur financed the recording sessions herself as she was not signed to a record label at the time of recording and during post-production, her budget ran out and she was unable to mix the album. She accepted a recording contract from Capitol soon afterwards and released "Auf der Maur" to "generally favorable reviews", according to Metacritic. The album's supporting singles—"Followed the Waves", "Real a Lie" and "Taste You"—were moderate successes in the United Kingdom, charting in the Top 40 of the UK Single Charts. As of 2010, "Auf der Maur" sold 200,000 copies worldwide.

"Real a Lie" was one of the many songs written by Melissa Auf der Maur over a 12-year period from 1992 to 2004. Originally titled "Realalie", the song was first performed by her original band, Tinker, which also included co-writer Steve Durand, and was released as the band's second single in 1994, which was backed with the b-side "Saxon Princess." Auf der Maur later reworked the song during the recording sessions for "Auf der Maur" in 2003-4 featruing a layer Wall of sound of guitars. The song was featured as the third track on the album.A promotional music video was created for the single in 2004 and released on May 3, 2004.Firecrasher, "MAdM | Melissa Auf der Maur | Archives | Watching video: Auf der Maur - Real, A Lie" http://www.melissaaufdermaur.org/video/view/auf_der_maur_real_a_lie/14 Retrieved on June 20, 2010. The video is compiled of photographs of Auf der Maur performing "Real a Lie" and was recorded in still motion.

From 1994 to 1995, Auf der Maur toured worldwide with Hole in support of its second studio album, "Live Through This" (1994). On the tour, Auf der Maur was described by guitarist Eric Erlandson as "bringing sunshine to the band" during the "dark and grey" atmosphere of the tour, which was problematic due to the band's recent bereavements—notably the death of Pfaff and Love's husband Kurt Cobain—as well as Love's drug addiction. Auf der Maur befriended Patty Schemel and rented a house with her following the two-year-long tour. The duo began a side project, Constant Comment, and released a split 7" single with Red Aunts on Sympathy for the Record Industry featuring the song "Firecrasher". Auf der Maur has since said her friendship and musical compatibility between her and Schemel was based on a "redhead connection"; Schemel has referred to Auf der Maur as her "anchor" during the period following the death of Pfaff and Cobain.
Auf der Maur was featured on various Hole releases, including the 1996 non-album single "Gold Dust Woman" and on various live tracks on "My Body, the Hand Grenade" (1997). She was featured on the band's third studio album, "Celebrity Skin" (1998), performing bass and co-composing five of the 12 songs. "Celebrity Skin" was a major critical and commercial success; it charted at number 9 in the U.S. "Billboard" 200 albums chart and number 3 in the Canadian Albums Chart, as well its lead single and title track peaking at number 1 on the "Billboard" Modern Rock Tracks chart. It has since been certified platinum in both the U.S. and Canada. Following the tour in support of its release, Auf der Maur left Hole in October 1999 as her five-year contract with the band ended and she wished "to grow in many different directions".

Auf der Maur briefly toured with former The Cars frontman Ric Ocasek in 1997, after contributing bass and background vocals to his 1997 solo album "Troublizing". She collaborated with French group Indochine on their song "Le Grand Secret", singing a duet in French with Nicola Sirkis, to great acclaim in France. Auf der Maur joined the band on stage to perform the song on various occasions and appeared in the music video for the song. She performed a rare, short, acoustic set of some of her solo songs during an Indochine show in Paris, February 22, 2002. Auf der Maur has contributed bass and backing vocals to childhood friend Rufus Wainwright's album "Poses" and appears in his 1998 video for "April Fools". In 2008, she collaborated with Canadian musician Daniel Victor on his music collaboration project Neverending White Lights. They recorded the song "The World is Darker", for which a video was released in March 2008. Aside from this, she has contributed to albums by artists such as Ryan Adams, Ben Lee, Idaho, The Stills and Fountains of Wayne.
question_src: Melissa Gaboriau auf der Maur ana umri gani?
pos_context_src: Melissa Gaboriau auf der Maur (; amezaliwa Machi 17, 1972) ni mwanamuziki wa Canada, mwandishi wa wimbo, mpiga picha na mwigizaji.
neg_context_src: Auf der Maur hakukutana na baba yake hadi alikuwa na miaka mitatu. Gaboriau alimwita Nick Auf der Maur baada ya binti yake kuanza kumuuliza juu ya kitambulisho cha baba yake. Akifikiria juu ya mkutano huo, Auf der Maur alisema "[baba yangu] aligundua mama yangu Linda alikuwa upendo wa maisha yake kwa sababu alitoa zawadi ya mtoto huyu bila madai yoyote. Alimpenda sana [na] akamfuata kwa miaka miwili". Auf der Maur na Gaboriau walioa mnamo 1978 wakati Melissa alikuwa na miaka sita. Wenzi hao waliachana mnamo 1979 baada ya hapo Auf der Maur alisafiri ulimwenguni na mama yake. Sehemu ya utoto wa Auf der Maur ilitumiwa kuishi katika "Msafara wa Circus huko Wales, lori nyekundu ya sanduku la ofisi huko Moroko, na kibanda huko Kenya" na mama yake. Wakati wa wakati wake nchini Kenya, alipata mikataba mitatu ya ugonjwa wa malaria na akarudi Montreal.

Auf der Maur alizaliwa huko Montreal, Quebec kwa mwandishi wa habari na mwanasiasa Nick Auf der Maur na mwandishi wa habari na mtafsiri wa fasihi Linda Gaboriau. Familia ya baba ya baba ya AUF Der Maur ilikuwa Uswizi-Ujerumani na mama yake walichanganywa Ulaya-Amerika. Gaboriau alizaliwa huko Boston, Massachusetts huko Merika. Kama matokeo, anashikilia uraia wa Canada na Amerika. Jina la Auf der Maur linatafsiri kwa Kiingereza kama "kwenye ukuta", kama "Maur" ilitokana na neno la Kijerumani la "Wall" ("Die Mauer"). Amesema kwamba bibi yake, Theresia Schaelin-auf der Maur, alikuwa "kila wakati akipiga urithi wangu chini ya koo langu-akiniambia kuwa mimi ndiye wa mwisho katika Amerika ya Kaskazini kuendeleza jina".

Gaboriau hapo awali alikuwa ameolewa na diwani wa jiji la Montreal Nick Auf der Maur, na ndiye mama wa mwanamuziki wa mwamba Melissa auf der Maur. Yeye na mwenzi wake wa marehemu wa miaka 35, mwandishi na Profesa Hervé de Fontenay, wana mtoto mmoja, mbunifu Yves de Fontenay.

Hole aliungana tena-na "Ngozi ya Mtu Mashuhuri" ya Upendo, Erlandson, Auf der Maur na Schemel-kwa utendaji wa moja kwenye Bunge la Umma huko Brooklyn, New York mnamo Aprili 12, 2012 katika sherehe ya filamu ya schemel "Hit So Hard" (2011). Hapo awali AUF der Maur, Erlandson na Schemel walikuwa wakifanya kama watatu hadi upendo ulipofika kwa utendaji wa hiari wa "Miss World" na "juu ya makali". "The Quietus" iliripoti mnamo Aprili 2014 kwamba washiriki hao wanne walikuwa wameungana tena ingawa katika mahojiano ya baadaye, Upendo walipenda mazungumzo ya kuungana tena. Mnamo Aprili 2016, Auf der Maur alisema katika mahojiano kuwa hakuwa na wakati au nguvu ya kuungana tena, lakini angevutiwa na kufunga urithi wa shimo na diski ya kupatikana na tarehe ndogo za tarehe za utalii.

Huko Montreal, Auf der Maur alihudhuria shule ya Sanaa ya Sanaa ya Sanaa (uso) na kusonga mbele kwa mwelekeo mpya (akili) shule ya upili - ambayo ni shule za elimu mbadala. Huko usoni, alikuwa mwanachama wa kwaya ya zamani na akilini, alikuwa "sehemu ya wasomi wa Kiingereza", ambapo aliunda urafiki na binti wa Leonard Cohens Lorca na Rufus Wainwright. Huko shuleni, alipendezwa na upigaji picha na baadaye alienda Chuo Kikuu cha Concordia, ambayo alijitahidi katika upigaji picha mnamo 1994. Huko Concordia akiwa na umri wa miaka 19, Auf der Maur alianza kufanya kazi kwa muda kama jockey huko Bifteck, kilabu cha mwamba kinachojulikana, ambapo alikutana na wanamuziki kadhaa akiwemo Steve Durand.

Iliyorekodiwa kutoka 2001 hadi 2003 katika studio mbali mbali huko Merika na Canada, albamu ya kwanza ya studio ya kwanza ya Auf der Maur "Auf der Maur" ilitolewa mnamo Februari 2004 kwenye Capitol Record. Iliyotengenezwa na Chris Goss, Auf der Maur alifadhili vikao vya kurekodi mwenyewe kwani hakusainiwa kwa lebo ya rekodi wakati wa kurekodi na wakati wa utengenezaji, bajeti yake ilimalizika na hakuweza kuchanganya albamu hiyo. Alikubali mkataba wa kurekodi kutoka Capitol mara baadaye na akaachilia "Auf der Maur" kwa "hakiki nzuri", kulingana na Metacritic. Albamu inayounga mkono - "ilifuata mawimbi", "Uongo halisi" na "Onjeni" - mafanikio ya wastani huko Uingereza, kuorodhesha katika chati 40 za juu za Uingereza. Mnamo mwaka wa 2010, "Auf der Maur" aliuza nakala 200,000 ulimwenguni.

"Uongo wa kweli" ilikuwa moja ya nyimbo nyingi zilizoandikwa na Melissa auf der Maur kwa kipindi cha miaka 12 kutoka 1992 hadi 2004. Hapo awali ilipewa jina la "Reallie", wimbo huo ulifanywa kwa mara ya kwanza na bendi yake ya asili, Tinker, ambayo pia ni pamoja na mwandishi mwenza Steve Durand, na ilitolewa kama bendi ya pili mnamo 1994, ambayo ilirudishwa nyuma na S-Side "Saxon." AUF der Maur baadaye alibadilisha wimbo wakati wa vikao vya kurekodi vya "Auf der Maur" mnamo 2003-4 akifanya safu ya ukuta wa sauti ya gita. Wimbo huo ulionyeshwa kama wimbo wa tatu kwenye albamu. Video ya Muziki ya Uendelezaji iliundwa kwa moja mnamo 2004 na kutolewa Mei 3, 2004.FireCrasher, "Madm | Melissa auf der Maur | Jalada | Kuangalia Video: Auf der Maur - Real, Uongo" http://www.melissaaufdermaur.org/video/view/auf_der_maur_real_a_lie/14 Rudishwa mnamo Juni 20, 2010. Video hiyo imeundwa na picha za Auf der Maur akifanya "Real A" na ilirekodiwa katika Motion bado.

Kuanzia 1994 hadi 1995, Auf der Maur alienda ulimwenguni kote na Hole akiunga mkono albamu yake ya pili ya studio, "Live Kupitia hii" (1994). Kwenye ziara hiyo, Auf der Maur alielezewa na gitaa Eric Erlandson kama "kuleta jua kwenye bendi" wakati wa hali ya "giza na kijivu" ya ziara hiyo, ambayo ilikuwa shida kutokana na kufiwa kwa bendi hiyo hivi karibuni - haswa kifo cha Pfaff na mume wa Upendo Kurt Cobain - vile vile madawa ya kulevya. Auf der Maur alishirikiana na Patty Schemel na kukodisha nyumba na yeye kufuatia safari hiyo ya miaka miwili. Duo alianza mradi wa upande, maoni ya mara kwa mara, na akatoa mgawanyiko 7 "moja na shangazi nyekundu juu ya huruma kwa tasnia ya rekodi iliyo na wimbo" Firecrasher ". Auf der Maur alisema kuwa urafiki wake na utangamano wa muziki kati yake na schemel ulitokana na" Uunganisho wa Redhead "; Schemel amemrejelea AUF Der Maur kama" Anchor "wakati wa wakati huo."
Auf der Maur alionyeshwa kwenye toleo mbali mbali za shimo, pamoja na Albamu moja isiyo ya Albamu "Woman Woman" na kwenye nyimbo tofauti za moja kwa moja kwenye "Mwili Wangu, The Hand Grenade" (1997). Alionyeshwa kwenye albamu ya tatu ya studio, "Ngozi ya Mashuhuri" (1998), akiigiza bass na kushirikiana na nyimbo tano kati ya 12. "Ngozi ya Mtu Mashuhuri" ilikuwa mafanikio makubwa na ya kibiashara; Iliorodhesha kwa nambari ya 9 katika chati ya Albamu za "Billboard" za U.S. na nambari ya 3 kwenye chati ya Albamu za Canada, na wimbo wake wa kwanza na kichwa cha kichwa cha 1 kwenye chati ya "Billboard" Rock Rock. Imethibitishwa platinamu katika U.S. na Canada. Kufuatia ziara hiyo kuunga mkono kutolewa kwake, Auf der Maur aliondoka Hole mnamo Oktoba 1999 wakati mkataba wake wa miaka mitano na bendi hiyo ulimalizika na alitamani "kukua katika mwelekeo tofauti".

Auf der Maur aliguswa kwa ufupi na wa zamani wa mbele wa Magari Ric Ocasek mnamo 1997, baada ya kuchangia sauti za bass na za nyuma kwenye albamu yake ya solo ya 1997 "Shida". Alishirikiana na kikundi cha Ufaransa Indochine kwenye wimbo wao "Le Grand Siri", akiimba duet kwa Kifaransa na Nicola Sirkis, kwa sifa kubwa huko Ufaransa. Auf der Maur alijiunga na bendi hiyo kwenye hatua ya kufanya wimbo huo mara kadhaa na alionekana kwenye video ya muziki ya wimbo huo. Alifanya seti ya nadra, fupi, ya sauti ya nyimbo zake za solo wakati wa onyesho la Indochine huko Paris, Februari 22, 2002. Auf der Maur amechangia bass na kuunga mkono sauti kwa rafiki wa utoto Rufus Wainwright "Asses" na anaonekana katika video yake ya 1998 ya "Aprili Fools". Mnamo 2008, alishirikiana na mwanamuziki wa Canada, Daniel Victor kwenye mradi wake wa kushirikiana na Muziki wa White Taa. Walirekodi wimbo "Ulimwengu ni Nyeusi", ambayo video ilitolewa mnamo Machi 2008. Mbali na hii, amechangia Albamu na wasanii kama Ryan Adams, Ben Lee, Idaho, The Stills and Fountain of Wayne.
report_src: Melissa Gaboriau auf der Maur alizaliwa tarehe 17 Machi 1972 [1], na hivyo kufikia leo (Aprili 2024) ana umri wa takriban miaka 52.
all_claims: Melissa Gaboriau auf der Maur alizaliwa tarehe 17 Machi 1972 [1], na hivyo kufikia leo (Aprili 2024) ana umri wa takriban miaka 52.

question_en: When was the Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez built?
pos_context_en: Built in the Magdalena Mixhuca public park in 1959, the circuit hosted its first Formula One Grand Prix in 1962, as a non-Championship race. The following year the Mexican Grand Prix became a full World Championship event. The circuit remained part of the F1 calendar through 1970, when spectator overcrowding caused unsafe conditions. When the track re-opened in 1986, the circuit boasted a new pit complex, as well as improved safety all around. In 2001 CIE and Forsythe Racing tasked D3 Motorsport Development with revamping the circuit. A redesign to include the Foro and a complete upgrade of the circuit was done. It saw a record crowd of 402,413 people attend a round of the CART Championship in 2002. As of 2018, the Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez has been the only venue for the F1 Mexican Grand Prix.
neg_context_en: On September 20, 2016 Fernández's achievements have been recognised by the naming of Turn 12 of the Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez in his honour.

The 1987 Mexican Grand Prix was a Formula One motor race held at Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez on October 18, 1987. It was the fourteenth round of the 1987 Formula One season. It was the 11th Mexican Grand Prix and the second since the Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez was renovated and returned to the World Championship calendar.

The Gran Premio Tecate was a round of the Champ Car World Series held on the Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez circuit in Mexico City, Mexico. It was first held in 1980, and in its first two years of competition was the penultimate round of the championship. After its re-inception in 2002, it was the season-ending round. It was to have been the penultimate round of the 2007 season, but became the final round when the Grand Prix Arizona was cancelled.
This road-course race took place on March 5, 2006 at Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez in Mexico City, Mexico. Boris Said won the pole.
The 1991 430 km of Mexico City was the seventh round of the 1991 World Sportscar Championship season, taking place at Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez, Mexico. It took place on October 6, 1991.
EDC Mexico in Mexico City is scheduled to return to Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez for February 23-24, 2019.

The series kicked off at the Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez in Mexico City, with a non-points-paying race during the weekend of March 4, along with events from the Busch Series and the Rolex Sports Car Series. The race was won by Carlos Pardo (#14 Dodge), followed by Rafael Martínez (#19 Ford) and Freddy Tame, Jr. (#18 Ford).

The 1990 Mexican Grand Prix was a Formula One motor race held at Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez on 24 June 1990. It was sixth race of the 1990 Formula One season, the 14th Mexican Grand Prix and the fifth since the Mexico City circuit returned to the Formula One calendar in 1986. It was held over 69 laps of the 4.4 kilometre circuit for a race distance of 305 kilometres.
EDC Mexico in Mexico City was planned for February 24–25 at Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez.
The 1990 480 km of Mexico City was the ninth and final round of the 1990 World Sportscar Championship season, taking place at Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez, Mexico. It took place on October 7, 1990.
question_src: Je! Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez ilijengwa lini?
pos_context_src: Ilijengwa katika Hifadhi ya Umma ya Magdalena Mixhuca mnamo 1959, mzunguko huo ulishiriki formula yake ya kwanza Grand Prix mnamo 1962, kama mbio zisizo za ubingwa. Mwaka uliofuata Mexico Grand Prix ikawa tukio kamili la ubingwa wa ulimwengu. Mzunguko ulibaki sehemu ya kalenda ya F1 kupitia 1970, wakati watazamaji wa watazamaji walisababisha hali isiyo salama. Wakati wimbo ulifunguliwa tena mnamo 1986, mzunguko ulijivunia ugumu mpya wa shimo, na pia usalama ulioboreshwa pande zote. Mnamo 2001 CIE na mbio za Forsythe zilifanya kazi ya maendeleo ya D3 Motorsport na kurekebisha mzunguko. Urekebishaji upya ni pamoja na foro na usasishaji kamili wa mzunguko ulifanyika. Iliona umati wa watu 402,413 unahudhuria raundi ya ubingwa wa gari mnamo 2002. Mnamo mwaka wa 2018, Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez imekuwa mahali pekee pa F1 Mexico Grand Prix.
neg_context_src: Mnamo Septemba 20, 2016 mafanikio ya Fernández yametambuliwa kwa kumtaja Turn 12 ya Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez kwa heshima yake.

Mbio za Mexico Grand Prix za mwaka wa 1987 zilikuwa mbio za formula One Motor zilizofanyika huko Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez mnamo Oktoba 18, 1987. Ilikuwa raundi ya kumi na nne ya msimu wa mwaka wa 1987. Ilikuwa ya 11 ya Mexico Grand Prix na ya pili tangu Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez ilirekebishwa na kurudishwa kwenye kalenda ya ubingwa wa ulimwengu.

Gran Presio Tecate ilikuwa raundi ya Mfululizo wa Dunia wa Gari la Champ iliyofanyika kwenye mzunguko wa Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez huko Mexico City, Mexico. Ilifanyika kwa mara ya kwanza mnamo 1980, na katika miaka yake ya kwanza ya mashindano ilikuwa duru ya ubingwa. Baada ya uvumbuzi wake tena mnamo 2002, ilikuwa mzunguko wa msimu. Ilikuwa ni raundi ya mwisho ya msimu wa 2007, lakini ikawa raundi ya mwisho wakati Grand Prix Arizona ilifutwa.
Mashindano haya ya kozi ya barabara yalifanyika mnamo Machi 5, 2006 huko Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez huko Mexico City, Mexico. Boris alisema alishinda pole.
Kilomita ya 1991 430 ya Mexico City ilikuwa raundi ya saba ya msimu wa ubingwa wa Sportscar wa 1991, uliofanyika huko Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez, Mexico. Ilifanyika Oktoba 6, 1991.
EDC Mexico huko Mexico City imepangwa kurudi Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez kwa Februari 23-24, 2019.

Mfululizo huo ulianza huko Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez huko Mexico City, na mbio zisizo za malipo wakati wa wikendi ya Machi 4, pamoja na hafla kutoka kwa safu ya Busch na safu ya gari ya Rolex Sports. Mashindano hayo yalishindwa na Carlos Pardo (#14 Dodge), ikifuatiwa na Rafael Martínez (#19 Ford) na Freddy Tame, Jr. (#18 Ford).

Mexico Grand Prix ya 1990 ilikuwa mbio ya formula One ya gari iliyofanyika huko Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez mnamo 24 Juni 1990. Ilikuwa mbio ya sita ya msimu wa 1990 msimu mmoja, Grand Prix ya Mexico ya 14 na ya tano tangu Mexico City Circuit ilirudi kwenye Kalenda ya Mfumo wa Kwanza.
EDC Mexico huko Mexico City ilipangwa mnamo Februari 24-25 huko Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez.
Kilomita ya 1990 480 ya Mexico City ilikuwa raundi ya tisa na ya mwisho ya msimu wa ubingwa wa Sportscar World, uliofanyika huko Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez, Mexico. Ilifanyika Oktoba 7, 1990.
report_src: Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez ilijengwa mwaka 1959 katika Hifadhi ya Umma ya Magdalena Mixhuca, mjini Mexico City, kabla ya kuanza kuhudumia mashindano ya magari ya kiwango cha juu kama vile Mexico Grand Prix ya Formula 1 [1].
all_claims: Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez ilijengwa mwaka 1959 katika Hifadhi ya Umma ya Magdalena Mixhuca, mjini Mexico City, kabla ya kuanza kuhudumia mashindano ya magari ya kiwango cha juu kama vile Mexico Grand Prix ya Formula 1 [1].
claims_w_citations: Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez ilijengwa mwaka 1959 katika Hifadhi ya Umma ya Magdalena Mixhuca, mjini Mexico City, kabla ya kuanza kuhudumia mashindano ya magari ya kiwango cha juu kama vile Mexico Grand Prix ya Formula 1 [1].
claims_retained: Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez ilijengwa mwaka 1959 katika Hifadhi ya Umma ya Magdalena Mixhuca, mjini Mexico City, kabla ya kuanza kuhudumia mashindano ya magari ya kiwango cha juu kama vile Mexico Grand Prix ya Formula 1 [1].

question_en: When was Konstantin Dmitriyevich Balmont born?
pos_context_en: Konstantin Dmitriyevich Balmont (; – 23 December 1942) was a Russian symbolist poet and translator. He was one of the major figures of the Silver Age of Russian Poetry.
neg_context_en: Konstantin Balmont was born at his family's estate, Gumnishchi, Shuya (then Vladimir Governorate, now Ivanovo Oblast), the third of seven sons of a Russian nobleman, lawyer, and senior state official, Dmitry Konstantinovich Balmont, and Vera Nikolayevna (née Le′bedeva) who came from a military family. The latter knew several foreign languages, was enthusiastic about literature and theater, and exerted a strong influence on her son. Balmont learned to read at the age of five and cited Aleksandr Pushkin, Nikolai Nekrasov, Alexey Koltsov, and Ivan Nikitin as his earliest influences. Later he remembered the first ten years of his life spent at Gumnishchi with great affection and referred to the place as 'a tiny kingdom of silent comfort'.

On 27 September 1896 Balmont married Yekaterina Alekseyevna Andreyeva (1867–1952), a well-educated woman who came from a rich merchant's family, related to the well-known Moscow publishers, the Sabashnikovs. Andreyeva and Balmont had much in common; they formed a tandem of translators and worked together on the works of Gerhart Hauptmann and Oscar Wilde. Andreyeva, a strong-minded woman, was a leading force in the family, and in her 'strong, healthy and loving hands' (according Boris Zaitsev, who knew them well) Balmont led a "disciplined, working man's life." In 1901 their daughter Nina Balmont (Bruni in marriage, died in Moscow in 1989) was born.
In the early 1900s, while in Paris, Balmont met Yelena Konstantinovna Tsvetkovskaya (1880–1943), general K. G. Tzvetkovsky's daughter, a student of mathematics at the University of Paris and the poet's ardent fan. Balmont, as some of his letters suggested, wasn't in love with her, but soon found himself in many ways dependent upon the girl who proved to be a loyal, devoted friend. Balmont's family life got seriously complicated in 1907 when Tsvetkovskaya gave birth to a daughter Mirra, named so by her father in the memory of the poet Mirra Lokhvitskaya, who died in 1905 and with whom he had passionate platonic relations. Torn between the two families, in 1909 Balmont attempted suicide for the second time (jumping out a window) and again survived. Up until 1917 he lived in Saint Petersburg with Tsvetkovskaya and Mirra, occasionally visiting Yekaterina and Nina in Moscow. While in France Balmont continued to correspond with Andreyeva up until 1934.

Balmont died on 23 December 1942 in a refuge for Russian emigres, the Russian House, due to complications from pneumonia. He is interred in Noisy-le-Grand's Catholic cemetery, four words engraved on his grey tomb: "Constantin Balmont, poete russe". Among the several people who came to the funeral were Zaitsev, Balmont's daughter Mirra, and Jurgis Baltrushaitis's widow.

From 1919 Balmont was romantically linked with Dagmar Shakhovskaya (née von Lilienfeld, 1893–1967), who followed Balmont to France in 1921. They lived apart except for brief periods, although Dagmar bore Balmont two children: Georges (1922–1943) and Svetlana (b. 1925). Balmont sent her letters or postcards almost daily; in all, 858 of them survived, mostly from 1920-1924. It was Elena Tsvetkovskaya, though, who remained with Balmont until his dying day. She died in 1943, surviving her husband by a year. Mirra Balmont (in her first marriage Boychenko, in the second Ayutina) was a published poet, who used the pseudonym Aglaya Gamayun. She died in Paris in 1970.

1918–1920 were years of great hardship for Balmont who, living in Petrograd (with Elena Tsvetkovskaya and their daughter Mirra) had also to support Andreyeva and their daughter Nina in Moscow. He struck up a friendship with Marina Tsvetayeva, another poet on the verge of physical collapse. Unwilling to collaborate with the Bolsheviks (whose "hands were smeared with blood," as he declared openly at one of the literary meetings) occasionally he had to be forced to. In 1920 Anatoly Lunacharsky (urged by Jurgis Baltrushaitis, then the head of the Lithuanian diplomatic mission in Moscow) granted Balmont permission to leave the country. Boris Zaitsev later opined that what Baltrushaitis did was actually to save Balmont's life. According to Sergey Litovtsev (a Russian critic who lived in immigration) at one of the secret meetings of the Cheka the fate of Balmont was discussed, "...it's just that those who were demanding he be put to a firing squad happened to be in the minority at the time." On May 25, 1920, Balmont and his family left Russia for good. As soon as Balmont reached Reval, rumors began to circulate that he had begun to make anti-Soviet public statements, leading to the cancellation of other writers' journeys out of Soviet Russia. Balmont denied these rumors, and there is no evidence to support them, but by 1921 Balmont was regularly publishing inflammatory articles against the Soviet government in the émigré press.

In 1890 Balmont released a self-financed book called "Collection of Poems" (Sbornik stikhotvoreny), which included some of the pieces published in 1885. Instrumental in helping the publication was Vladimir Korolenko, by then an established writer, who had received a handwritten notebook (sent to him by Konstantin's classmates) and sent back detailed and favorable critical analysis. He praised the schoolboy's eye for detail, warned against the occasional lapse of concentration, and advised him to "trust that unconscious part of the human soul which accumulates momentary impressions." "Should you learn to concentrate and work methodically, in due time we'll hear of your having developed into something quite extraordinary," were the last words of this remarkable letter. Balmont was greatly impressed with the famous writer's magnanimity and later referred to Korolenko as his 'literary godfather'. The book, though, proved to be a failure. Disgusted with it, Balmont purchased and burnt all the remaining copies. "My first book, of course, was a total failure. People dear to me have made this fiasco even less bearable with their negativism," he wrote in 1903, meaning apparently Larisa, but also his university friends who considered the book 'reactionary' and scorned its author for 'betraying the ideals of social struggle'. Again, Korolenko came to Balmont's aid: "The poor guy is very shy; more editorial attention to his work would make great difference," he wrote to Mikhail Albov, one of the editors of "Severny Vestnik", in September 1891.

In his 1903 short autobiography Balmont wrote: According to Yekaterina Andreyeva's "Memoirs", Balmont's paternal grand-grandfather Ivan Andreyevich Balamut (Баламут, the Ukrainian surname, translated literally as "trouble-maker") was a landowner in Kherson, Southern Ukraine, who served as a cavalry sergeant in Catherine the Great's Imperial Guard regiment (Andreyeva insisted she had seen the proof of it in an original parchment-written document kept in the family archives).

In March 1901 Balmont took part in a student demonstration on the square in front of Kazan Cathedral which was violently disrupted by police and Cossack units. Several days later, at a literary event in the Russian State Duma, he recited his new poem "The Little Sultan" (Malenkii sultan), a diatribe against Tsar Nicholas II, which then circulated widely in hand-written copies. As a result, Balmont was deported from the capital and banned for two years from living in university cities. On 14 March 1902 Balmont left Russia for Britain and France, lecturing at the Russian College of Social Sciences, Paris. While there he met Elena Konstantinovna Tsvetkovskaya, the daughter of a prominent general, who in 1905 became his third (common-law) wife. In 1903 Balmont returned to Russia, his administrative restrictions having been removed by Interior Minister von Plehve. Back in Moscow, he joined Bryusov and Polyakov in the founding of the journal "Vesy" (The Scales), published by Scorpion.

In February 1889 he married Larisa Mikhailovna Garelina; unhappy in marriage, on 13 March 1890 Balmont attempted suicide by jumping from a third-story window, leaving him with a limp and an injured writing hand for the rest of his life. He was involved in two other common-law marriages and attempted suicide a second time later in life.
question_src: Konstantin Dmitriyevich Balmont alizaliwa lini?
pos_context_src: Konstantin Dmitriyevich Balmont (; - 23 Desemba 1942) alikuwa mshairi na mtafsiri wa Kirusi. Alikuwa mmoja wa takwimu kuu za Umri wa Fedha wa Ushairi wa Urusi.
neg_context_src: Konstantin Balmont alizaliwa katika mali ya familia yake, Gumnishchi, Shuya (wakati huo Gavana wa Vladimir, sasa Ivanovo Oblast), wa tatu kati ya wana saba wa mtu mashuhuri wa Urusi, wakili, na afisa mwandamizi wa serikali, Dmitry Konstantinovich Balmont, na Vera Nikolayevna (Née Le'Bevantinovich Balmont, na Vera Nikolayevna. Mwishowe alijua lugha kadhaa za kigeni, alikuwa na shauku juu ya fasihi na ukumbi wa michezo, na alitoa ushawishi mkubwa kwa mtoto wake. Balmont alijifunza kusoma akiwa na umri wa miaka mitano na alimtaja Aleksandr Pushkin, Nikolai Nekrasov, Alexey Koltsov, na Ivan Nikitin kama ushawishi wake wa mapema. Baadaye alikumbuka miaka kumi ya kwanza ya maisha yake alitumia huko Gumnishchi kwa upendo mkubwa na akataja mahali kama 'ufalme mdogo wa faraja ya kimya'.

Mnamo tarehe 27 Septemba 1896 Balmont alifunga ndoa na Yekaterina Alekseyevna Andreyeva (1867-1952), mwanamke aliyeelimika ambaye alitoka katika familia ya mfanyabiashara tajiri, anayehusiana na wachapishaji wanaojulikana wa Moscow, Sabashnikovs. Andreyeva na Balmont walikuwa na mambo mengi ya kawaida; Waliunda tandem ya watafsiri na walifanya kazi pamoja kwenye kazi za Gerhart Hauptmann na Oscar Wilde. Andreyeva, mwanamke mwenye nia njema, alikuwa nguvu inayoongoza katika familia, na katika mikono yake 'yenye nguvu, yenye afya na yenye upendo' (kulingana na Boris Zaitsev, ambaye aliwajua vizuri) Balmont aliongoza "maisha ya mtu mwenye nidhamu, anayefanya kazi." Mnamo 1901 binti yao Nina Balmont (Bruni katika ndoa, alikufa huko Moscow mnamo 1989) alizaliwa.
Mwanzoni mwa 1900s, wakati huko Paris, Balmont alikutana na Yelena Konstantinovna Tsvetkovskaya (1880-1943), Jenerali K. G. Tzvetkovsky, mwanafunzi wa hisabati katika Chuo Kikuu cha Paris na shabiki wa mshairi. Balmont, kama barua zake zingine zilivyopendekeza, hakumpenda, lakini hivi karibuni alijikuta katika njia nyingi akimtegemea msichana ambaye alionekana kuwa rafiki mwaminifu, aliyejitolea. Maisha ya familia ya Balmont yalikuwa magumu sana mnamo 1907 wakati Tsvetkovskaya alimzaa binti Mirra, aliyepewa jina la baba yake katika kumbukumbu ya mshairi Mirra Lokhvitskaya, ambaye alikufa mnamo 1905 na ambaye alikuwa na uhusiano wa kupendeza wa Plato. Ilibomolewa kati ya familia hizo mbili, mnamo 1909 Balmont alijaribu kujiua kwa mara ya pili (kuruka nje ya dirisha) na alinusurika tena. Hadi 1917 aliishi Saint Petersburg na Tsvetkovskaya na Mirra, mara kwa mara alitembelea Yekaterina na Nina huko Moscow. Wakati nilipokuwa Ufaransa Balmont iliendelea kuambatana na Andreyeva hadi 1934.

Balmont alikufa mnamo 23 Desemba 1942 katika kimbilio la wahamiaji wa Urusi, nyumba ya Urusi, kwa sababu ya shida kutoka kwa pneumonia. Anaingiliwa katika kaburi la Katoliki la Noisy-Le-Grand, maneno manne yaliyoandikwa kwenye kaburi lake la kijivu: "Constantin Balmont, Poete Russe". Kati ya watu kadhaa waliokuja kwenye mazishi walikuwa Zaitsev, binti wa Balmont Mirra, na mjane wa Jurgis Baltrushaitis.

Kuanzia 1919 Balmont alihusishwa kimapenzi na Dagmar Shakhovskaya (née von Lilienfeld, 1893-1967), ambaye alifuata Balmont kwenda Ufaransa mnamo 1921. Waliishi kando isipokuwa kwa vipindi vifupi, ingawa Dagmar alibeba Balmont watoto wawili: Georges (19223). Balmont alimtumia barua au kadi za posta karibu kila siku; Kwa jumla, 858 kati yao walinusurika, zaidi kutoka 1920-1924. Ilikuwa Elena Tsvetkovskaya, ingawa, ambaye alibaki na Balmont hadi siku yake ya kufa. Alikufa mnamo 1943, akinusurika mumewe kwa mwaka. Mirra Balmont (katika ndoa yake ya kwanza Boychenko, katika Ayutina ya pili) alikuwa mshairi aliyechapishwa, ambaye alitumia jina la Aglaya Gamayun. Alikufa huko Paris mnamo 1970.

1918-1920 walikuwa miaka ya ugumu mkubwa kwa Balmont ambaye, anayeishi Petrograd (na Elena Tsvetkovskaya na binti yao Mirra) pia walimuunga mkono Andreyeva na binti yao Nina huko Moscow. Alianzisha urafiki na Marina Tsvetayeva, mshairi mwingine aliye karibu na kuanguka kwa mwili. Hakutaka kushirikiana na Wabolsheviks (ambao "mikono yake ilikuwa imejaa damu," kama alivyotangaza wazi katika moja ya mikutano ya fasihi) wakati mwingine ilibidi alazimishwe. Mnamo 1920 Anatoly Lunacharsky (alihimizwa na Jurgis Baltrushaitis, basi mkuu wa misheni ya kidiplomasia ya Kilithuania huko Moscow) alimpa Balmont ruhusa ya kuondoka nchini. Boris Zaitsev baadaye aliamua kwamba kile Baltrushaitis alifanya ni kweli kuokoa maisha ya Balmont. Kulingana na Sergey Litovtsev (mkosoaji wa Urusi ambaye alikuwa akiishi katika uhamiaji) katika moja ya mikutano ya siri ya Cheka hatima ya Balmont ilijadiliwa, "... ni kwamba wale ambao walikuwa wakimtaka apewe kikosi cha kurusha kilikuwa katika wachache wakati huo." Mnamo Mei 25, 1920, Balmont na familia yake waliondoka Urusi kwa uzuri. Mara tu Balmont ilipofika Reval, uvumi ulianza kuzunguka kwamba alikuwa ameanza kutoa taarifa za umma za Soviet, na kusababisha kufutwa kwa safari za waandishi wengine kutoka Urusi ya Urusi. Balmont alikataa uvumi huu, na hakuna ushahidi wa kuwaunga mkono, lakini mnamo 1921 Balmont alikuwa akichapisha nakala za uchochezi dhidi ya Serikali ya Soviet kwenye vyombo vya habari vya Émigré.

Mnamo 1890 Balmont alitoa kitabu cha kujipatia pesa kinachoitwa "Mkusanyiko wa Mashairi" (Sbornik Stikhotvoreny), ambayo ni pamoja na vipande kadhaa vilivyochapishwa mnamo 1885. Asili katika kusaidia kuchapishwa ilikuwa Vladimir Korolenko, na mwandishi aliyeanzishwa, ambaye alikuwa amepokea maandishi ya maandishi na aliyotumwa na Konstant. Alisifu jicho la mtoto wa shule kwa undani, alionya dhidi ya kupotea kwa wakati mwingine, na akamshauri "kuamini kwamba sehemu isiyo na fahamu ya roho ya mwanadamu ambayo hujilimbikiza hisia za muda mfupi." "Ikiwa utajifunza kujishughulisha na kufanya kazi kwa njia, kwa wakati unaofaa tutasikia juu yako kuwa na kitu cha kushangaza kabisa," zilikuwa maneno ya mwisho ya barua hii ya kushangaza. Balmont alivutiwa sana na ukuu wa mwandishi maarufu na baadaye alimtaja Korolenko kama 'fasihi ya fasihi yake'. Kitabu, hata hivyo, kilithibitika kuwa kilishindwa. Alichukizwa nayo, Balmont alinunua na kuchoma nakala zote zilizobaki. "Kitabu changu cha kwanza, kwa kweli, kilikuwa kilishindwa kabisa. Watu wapenzi kwangu wamefanya fiasco hii kuwa chini ya uvumilivu wao," aliandika mnamo 1903, akimaanisha dhahiri Larisa, lakini pia marafiki wake wa chuo kikuu ambao walizingatia kitabu hicho 'Reaction' na kumdharau mwandishi wake kwa 'kusaliti maadili ya mapambano ya kijamii'. Tena, Korolenko alifika kwa msaada wa Balmont: "Mtu masikini ni aibu sana; umakini zaidi wa kazi yake ungefanya tofauti kubwa," alimwandikia Mikhail Albov, mmoja wa wahariri wa "Severny Vestnik", mnamo Septemba 1891.

Katika picha yake fupi ya 1903 Balmont aliandika: Kulingana na "mjukuu wa Yekaterina Andreyeva", babu wa Balmont, babu wa Balmont Ivan Andreyevich Balamut (баguzi, jina la Kiukreni, aliyetafsiriwa kama "mtengenezaji wa shida" alikuwa mmiliki wa ardhi huko Kherson, Southern, Cuthern, Cuthern, As Serven, As Cavine, As Cavine, As Cavine, As Cavine, As Cavine, As Cavine, As Cavine, As Cavine, As Cavine, As Cavine, As Cavine, As Cavine, As Cavine, As Caving Cavi Kikosi cha Walinzi wa Imperial wa Great (Andreyeva alisisitiza kwamba alikuwa ameona uthibitisho wake katika hati ya asili iliyoandikwa ya ngozi iliyowekwa kwenye Jalada la Familia).

Mnamo Machi 1901 Balmont alishiriki katika maandamano ya wanafunzi kwenye mraba mbele ya Kanisa Kuu la Kazan ambalo lilisumbuliwa kwa nguvu na polisi na vitengo vya Cossack. Siku kadhaa baadaye, katika hafla ya fasihi katika Jimbo la Urusi Duma, alisoma shairi lake mpya "Sultan Little" (Malenkii Sultan), diatribe dhidi ya Tsar Nicholas II, ambayo ilizunguka sana katika nakala zilizoandikwa kwa mkono. Kama matokeo, Balmont aliondolewa kutoka mji mkuu na marufuku kwa miaka miwili kutoka kuishi katika miji ya vyuo vikuu. Mnamo tarehe 14 Machi 1902 Balmont aliondoka Urusi kwenda Uingereza na Ufaransa, akijadili katika Chuo cha Urusi cha Sayansi ya Jamii, Paris. Alipokuwa huko alikutana na Elena Konstantinovna Tsvetkovskaya, binti wa Jenerali mashuhuri, ambaye mnamo 1905 alikua mke wake wa tatu (wa kawaida). Mnamo 1903 Balmont alirudi Urusi, vizuizi vyake vya kiutawala vimeondolewa na Waziri wa Mambo ya Ndani von Plehve. Kurudi huko Moscow, alijiunga na Bryusov na Polyakov katika kuanzishwa kwa jarida "Vesy" (mizani), iliyochapishwa na Scorpion.

Mnamo Februari 1889 alioa Larisa Mikhailovna Garelina; Hajafurahi katika ndoa, mnamo 13 Machi 1890 Balmont alijaribu kujiua kwa kuruka kutoka kwenye dirisha la hadithi ya tatu, na kumuacha akiwa na mkono na mkono wa maandishi aliyejeruhiwa kwa maisha yake yote. Alihusika katika ndoa zingine mbili za sheria na kujaribu kujiua mara ya pili baadaye maishani.
report_src: Samahani, hati tuliyo nayo haina taarifa juu ya tarehe ya kuzaliwa ya Konstantin Dmitriyevich Balmont; inataja tu tarehe ya kifo chake (23 Desemba 1942) bila kutaja tarehe ya kuzaliwa [1].
all_claims: Samahani, hati tuliyo nayo haina taarifa juu ya tarehe ya kuzaliwa ya Konstantin Dmitriyevich Balmont; inataja tu tarehe ya kifo chake (23 Desemba 1942) bila kutaja tarehe ya kuzaliwa [1].
claims_w_citations: Samahani, hati tuliyo nayo haina taarifa juu ya tarehe ya kuzaliwa ya Konstantin Dmitriyevich Balmont; inataja tu tarehe ya kifo chake (23 Desemba 1942) bila kutaja tarehe ya kuzaliwa [1].

question_en: Can a septic tank explode?
pos_context_en:
Sewer gas can contain methane and hydrogen sulfide, both highly flammable and potentially explosive substances. As such, ignition of the gas is possible with flame or sparks.
The methane concentration in open sewers is lower (7 to 15 ppmv) than the closed drains (up to 300 ppmv) in samples collected 2 cm above the level of sewage.
neg_context_en: Septic tanks have to be pumped periodically by a vacuum truck to eliminate non reducing solids. Failure to pump a septic tank can cause overflow that damages the leach field, and contaminates ground water. Septic tanks may also require some lifestyle changes, such as not using garbage disposals, minimizing fluids flushed into the tank, and minimizing nondigestible solids flushed into the tank. For example, septic safe toilet paper is recommended.

A septic tank is an underground chamber made of concrete, fiberglass or plastic through which domestic wastewater (sewage) flows for basic treatment. Settling and anaerobic processes reduce solids and organics, but the treatment efficiency is only moderate (referred to as "primary treatment"). Septic tank systems are a type of simple onsite sewage facility (OSSF). They can be used in areas that are not connected to a sewerage system, such as rural areas. The treated liquid effluent is commonly disposed in a septic drain field which provides further treatment. However, groundwater pollution may occur and can be a problem.

Septage or "septic tank sludge" is partially treated sludge that is accumulated and stored in a septic tank or similar onsite sewage facility. Septage is a by-product from the pretreatment of household wastewater (sewage) in a septic tank. After a few years of accumulation, septage is usually pumped out of a septic tank by a vacuum truck. Septic tanks are receiving blackwater from flush toilets, as well as greywater. This means that septage only contains the kind of solid waste that can be flushed, such as toilet paper. Septage may also include "scum", which is material that floats at the top and contains fats, oil and grease as well as any floating solid waste.

Proponents claim the additives in wastewater can facilitate reduction in organic load and pathogen removal, leading to significant improvements in effluent quality. They also claim benefits relating to the rate of sludge build-up and odor reduction. One source claims that septic tank additives can reduce hydrogen sulphide and ammonia production. Their reasoning is that additives contain natural’ organisms that prevail over the rather less ‘natural’ organisms that would otherwise dominate conditions in the treatment unit, whether this be a septic tank or some form of aerobic treatment. They even claim that by overcoming the effects of ‘unnatural’ substances such as bleach and other disinfectants, the use of septic tank additives allows septic tanks and other treatment systems to function in conditions that would otherwise have resulted in their becoming ‘dead’ and non-functional.

Effluent sewer systems, also called septic tank effluent drainage (STED) or solids-free sewer (SFS) systems, have septic tanks that collect sewage from residences and businesses, and the effluent that comes out of the tank is sent to either a centralized sewage treatment plant or a distributed treatment system for further treatment. Most of the solids are removed by the septic tanks, so the treatment plant can be much smaller than a typical plant. In addition, because of the vast reduction in solid waste, a pumping system can be used to move the wastewater rather than a gravity system. The pipes have small diameters, typically . Because the waste stream is pressurized, they can be laid just below the ground surface along the land's contour.

Effluent sewer systems, also called septic tank effluent drainage (STED) or solids-free sewer (SFS) systems, have septic tanks that collect sewage from residences and businesses, and the effluent that comes out of the tank is sent to either a centralized sewage treatment plant or a distributed treatment system for further treatment. Most of the solids are removed by the septic tanks, so the treatment plant can be much smaller than a typical plant. In addition, because of the vast reduction in solid waste, a pumping system can be used to move the wastewater rather than a gravity system.

The fermentation processes cause the contents of a septic tank to be anaerobic with a low redox potential, which keeps phosphates in a soluble and, thus, mobilized form. Phosphates discharged from a septic tank into the environment can trigger prolific plant growth including algal blooms, which can also include blooms of potentially toxic cyanobacteria.

Septic tank and drain field microorganisms have very limited capability for catabolizing petroleum products and chlorinated solvents, and cannot remove dissolved metals; although some may sorb onto septic tank sludge or drain field soils, and concentrations may be diluted by other groundwater in the vicinity of the drain field. Cleaning formulations may reduce drain field efficiency. Laundry bleach may slow or stop microbial activity in the drain field, and sanitizing or deodorizing chemicals may have similar effects. Detergents, solvents and drain cleaners may transport emulsified, saponified or dissolved fats into the drain field before they can be catabolized to short-chain organic acids in the septic tank scum layer.

Like any system, a septic system requires maintenance. The maintenance of a septic system is often the responsibility of the resident or property owner. Some forms of abuse or neglect include the following:
Septic tank additives have been promoted by some manufacturers with the aim to improve the effluent quality from septic tanks, reduce sludge build-up and to reduce odors. However, these additives—which are commonly based on "effective microorganisms"—are usually costly in the longer term and fail to live up to expectations. It has been estimated that in the U.S. more than 1,200 septic system additives were available on the market in 2011. However, very little peer-reviewed and replicated field research exists regarding the efficacy of these biological septic tank additives.

While a properly maintained and located septic tank does not pose any more environmental problems than centralized municipal sewage treatment, certain problems can arise with septic tanks in unsuitable locations. Since septic systems require large drainfields, they are not suitable for densely built areas.
question_src: Je! Tangi ya septic inaweza kulipuka?
pos_context_src:
Gesi ya maji taka inaweza kuwa na methane na sulfidi ya hidrojeni, vitu vyenye kuwaka sana na vinaweza kulipuka. Kama hivyo, kuwasha gesi kunawezekana na moto au cheche.
Mkusanyiko wa methane katika maji taka wazi ni chini (7 hadi 15 ppmv) kuliko machafu yaliyofungwa (hadi 300 ppmv) katika sampuli zilizokusanywa cm 2 juu ya kiwango cha maji taka.
neg_context_src: Mizinga ya septic inapaswa kusukuma mara kwa mara na lori la utupu ili kuondoa vimumunyisho visivyopunguza. Kukosa kusukuma tank ya septic kunaweza kusababisha kufurika ambayo huharibu shamba la leach, na inachafua maji ya ardhini. Mizinga ya septic inaweza pia kuhitaji mabadiliko kadhaa ya mtindo wa maisha, kama vile kutotumia taka za takataka, kupunguza maji yaliyojaa ndani ya tank, na kupunguza vimumunyisho visivyo na hewa vilivyoingia kwenye tank. Kwa mfano, karatasi ya choo salama cha septic inapendekezwa.

Tangi ya septic ni chumba cha chini ya ardhi kilichotengenezwa na simiti, fiberglass au plastiki kupitia ambayo maji machafu ya ndani (maji taka) hutiririka kwa matibabu ya msingi. Michakato ya kutulia na ya anaerobic hupunguza vimumunyisho na viumbe, lakini ufanisi wa matibabu ni wastani tu (hujulikana kama "matibabu ya msingi"). Mifumo ya tank ya septic ni aina ya kituo rahisi cha maji taka (OSSF). Inaweza kutumika katika maeneo ambayo hayajaunganishwa na mfumo wa maji taka, kama maeneo ya vijijini. Mafuta ya kioevu yaliyotibiwa kawaida hutolewa katika uwanja wa kukimbia wa septic ambao hutoa matibabu zaidi. Walakini, uchafuzi wa maji ya ardhini unaweza kutokea na inaweza kuwa shida.

Septage au "septic tank sludge" inatibiwa kwa sehemu ambayo imekusanywa na kuhifadhiwa katika tank ya septic au kituo sawa cha maji taka. Septage ni bidhaa kutoka kwa utaftaji wa maji machafu ya kaya (maji taka) katika tank ya septic. Baada ya miaka michache ya mkusanyiko, septage kawaida hupigwa nje ya tank ya septic na lori la utupu. Mizinga ya septic inapokea maji nyeusi kutoka kwa vyoo vyenye laini, na vile vile maji ya grey. Hii inamaanisha kuwa septage ina aina ya taka ngumu ambazo zinaweza kubomolewa, kama karatasi ya choo. Septage inaweza pia kujumuisha "scum", ambayo ni nyenzo ambayo huelea juu na ina mafuta, mafuta na grisi pamoja na taka yoyote ngumu.

Watetezi wanadai viongezeo katika maji machafu vinaweza kuwezesha kupunguzwa kwa mzigo wa kikaboni na kuondolewa kwa pathogen, na kusababisha maboresho makubwa katika ubora mzuri. Pia wanadai faida zinazohusiana na kiwango cha kupunguzwa kwa sludge na kupunguzwa kwa harufu. Chanzo kimoja kinadai kwamba viongezeo vya tank ya septic vinaweza kupunguza sulphide ya hidrojeni na uzalishaji wa amonia. Hoja yao ni kwamba viongezeo vina viumbe vya asili 'ambavyo vinashinda viumbe vya chini vya' asili 'ambavyo vinaweza kutawala hali katika kitengo cha matibabu, iwe hii ni tank ya septic au aina fulani ya matibabu ya aerobic. Wanadai hata kwamba kwa kushinda athari za vitu vya 'visivyo vya asili' kama vile bleach na disinfectants zingine, utumiaji wa viongezeo vya tank ya septic huruhusu mizinga ya septic na mifumo mingine ya matibabu kufanya kazi katika hali ambazo zingesababisha kuwa 'wafu' na sio kazi.

Mifumo ya maji taka ya maji taka, ambayo pia huitwa mifereji ya maji ya septic tank (STED) au mifumo ya maji taka ya bure (SFS), ina mizinga ya septic ambayo inakusanya maji taka kutoka kwa makazi na biashara, na maji safi ambayo hutoka kwenye tank hutumwa kwa mmea wa kati wa maji taka au mfumo wa matibabu uliosambazwa kwa matibabu zaidi. Vimumunyisho vingi huondolewa na mizinga ya septic, kwa hivyo mmea wa matibabu unaweza kuwa mdogo sana kuliko mmea wa kawaida. Kwa kuongezea, kwa sababu ya kupunguzwa kwa taka ngumu, mfumo wa kusukuma maji unaweza kutumika kusonga maji machafu badala ya mfumo wa mvuto. Mabomba yana kipenyo kidogo, kawaida. Kwa sababu mkondo wa taka umeshinikizwa, zinaweza kuwekwa chini ya uso wa ardhi kando ya contour ya ardhi.

Mifumo ya maji taka ya maji taka, ambayo pia huitwa mifereji ya maji ya septic tank (STED) au mifumo ya maji taka ya bure (SFS), ina mizinga ya septic ambayo inakusanya maji taka kutoka kwa makazi na biashara, na maji safi ambayo hutoka kwenye tank hutumwa kwa mmea wa kati wa maji taka au mfumo wa matibabu uliosambazwa kwa matibabu zaidi. Vimumunyisho vingi huondolewa na mizinga ya septic, kwa hivyo mmea wa matibabu unaweza kuwa mdogo sana kuliko mmea wa kawaida. Kwa kuongezea, kwa sababu ya kupunguzwa kwa taka ngumu, mfumo wa kusukuma maji unaweza kutumika kusonga maji machafu badala ya mfumo wa mvuto.

Michakato ya Fermentation husababisha yaliyomo kwenye tank ya septic kuwa anaerobic na uwezo wa chini wa redox, ambayo huweka phosphates katika mumunyifu na, kwa hivyo, fomu ya kuhamasishwa. Phosphates iliyotolewa kutoka kwa tank ya septic ndani ya mazingira inaweza kusababisha ukuaji wa mmea ulioenea ikiwa ni pamoja na blooms za algal, ambazo zinaweza pia kujumuisha blooms za cyanobacteria yenye sumu.

Tank ya septic na vijidudu vya uwanja wa kukimbia vina uwezo mdogo sana wa kuchora bidhaa za petroli na vimumunyisho vya klorini, na haiwezi kuondoa metali zilizofutwa; Ingawa wengine wanaweza kuingia kwenye tank ya septic au mchanga wa mchanga, na viwango vinaweza kupunguzwa na maji mengine ya ardhini karibu na uwanja wa kukimbia. Njia za kusafisha zinaweza kupunguza ufanisi wa uwanja. Bleach ya kufulia inaweza kupunguza au kuzuia shughuli za microbial kwenye uwanja wa kukimbia, na kusafisha au kuzaa kemikali inaweza kuwa na athari sawa. Vizuizi, vimumunyisho na wasafishaji wa kukimbia vinaweza kusafirisha mafuta yaliyosafishwa, yaliyosafishwa au kufutwa ndani ya uwanja wa kukimbia kabla ya kubatilishwa kwa asidi ya kikaboni ya muda mfupi kwenye safu ya tank ya tank ya septic.

Kama mfumo wowote, mfumo wa septic unahitaji matengenezo. Utunzaji wa mfumo wa septic mara nyingi ni jukumu la mkazi au mmiliki wa mali. Aina zingine za unyanyasaji au kutelekezwa ni pamoja na yafuatayo:
Viongezeo vya tank ya septic vimepandishwa na wazalishaji wengine kwa lengo la kuboresha ubora wa maji kutoka kwa mizinga ya septic, kupunguza ujenzi wa sludge na kupunguza harufu. Walakini, viongezeo hivi - ambavyo ni vya kawaida kwa msingi wa "vijidudu vyenye ufanisi" - kawaida huwa na gharama kubwa kwa muda mrefu na hushindwa kuishi kulingana na matarajio. Imekadiriwa kuwa huko U.S. zaidi ya nyongeza za mfumo wa septic 1,200 zilipatikana kwenye soko mnamo 2011. Walakini, utafiti mdogo sana wa rika na zilizopitiwa tena zipo kuhusu ufanisi wa viongezeo vya tank ya kibaolojia ya kibaolojia.

Wakati tank iliyohifadhiwa vizuri na iliyowekwa vizuri haitoi shida yoyote ya mazingira kuliko matibabu ya maji taka ya manispaa, shida kadhaa zinaweza kutokea na mizinga ya septic katika maeneo yasiyofaa. Kwa kuwa mifumo ya septic inahitaji uwanja mkubwa wa kukimbia, haifai kwa maeneo yaliyojengwa sana.
report_src: Ndiyo, tangi ya septic inaweza kulipuka kwa sababu ndani ya mazingira yake yaliyofungwa hukusanyika gesi zinazotokana na uharibifu wa kikaboni kama methane na sulfidi ya hidrojeni; gesi hizi ni zinazowaka sana na zinaweza kulipuka endapo zitawashwa na moto au cheche [1]. Utafiti unaonyesha kuwa mkusanyiko wa methane katika maji taka yaliyofungwa unaweza kufikia hadi 300 ppmv—kiwango mara kadhaa zaidi ya kile kinachopatikana katika maji taka wazi (7–15 ppmv)—na hivyo kuongeza hatari ya mlipuko katika matangi ya septic ambayo kimsingi ni mifumo iliyofungwa [1].
