question_en: Where is Salvija Square located?
pos_context_en: Slavija Square () is a major commercial junction, situated between the intersections of Kralja Milana, Beogradska, Makenzijeva, Svetosavska, Bulevar oslobođenja, Deligradska and Nemanjina streets in Belgrade. The square was previously named Dimitrije Tucović Square after the prominent Serbian socialist.
neg_context_en: Pioneer Square station is located under 3rd Avenue between Cherry Street and Yesler Way in the Pioneer Square neighborhood of Downtown Seattle. The station is at the northern end of the Pioneer Square National Historic District, where the city's oldest buildings are located, and is near the Seattle Underground Tour and the Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park. To the north and east is the Seattle Civic Center, a complex of city and King County government office buildings, including Seattle City Hall and the King County Courthouse. Pioneer Square station is six blocks east of Colman Dock, the city's primary ferry terminal for Washington State Ferries and King County Water Taxi service.

Freedom Square was located on the corner of Victoria and Morris Streets. It was famous in the 1950s for the political meetings held there. It was utilised by the African National Congress (ANC) and the Transvaal Congress Party. Many of the meetings were chaired by Trevor Huddleston. Freedom Square facilitated the cooperation between the aforementioned political parties. Here parties worked together against the apartheid regime. Freedom Square in Sophiatown should not be confused with Freedom Square in Kliptown, Soweto, where the Freedom Charter was adopted by the ANC in 1955. It was in this Freedom Square in Sophiatown that Nelson Mandela made his first public allusion to violence and armed resistance as a legitimate tool for change. This earned him a reprimand from Albert Luthuli who by then replaced Dr A.B. Xuma as president of the ANC. Current remnants of Freedom Square may be found beneath a school playing field alongside the Christ the King Church.

Sullivan Square is a traffic circle located in the Charlestown neighborhood of Boston, Massachusetts. The MBTA's Sullivan Square station is located to the west of the square. Adjacent to the East Somerville area of Somerville, Sullivan Square is named after James Sullivan, an early 19th-century Governor of Massachusetts. In the early 2000s, the Sullivan Square Overpass was dismantled, which left a stub approach to Route 99.
Sanaʽa was chosen as the 2004 Arab Cultural Capital by the Arab League. In 2008, the Al Saleh Mosque was completed. It holds over 40,000 worshipers.

The Town Square, a.k.a. Tidmouth Town Square, is where the Town Hall of Tidmouth is located. The station serving the square is located North of Tidmouth Station, on both the Loop Line and Duck's branch line. There is also a library located at the Town Hall.

When discussing the time period where children begin to speak, Bates received a lot of attention for finding an overwhelming amount of nouns within the first 50 words of a native English speaker's vocabulary. Bates helped settle an ongoing debate among linguists who argued that a referential language style, characterized by the child's first 50 words containing mostly object labels, was a better strategy in developing language than a personal and socially expressive language style. She found that regardless of the strategy applied by the child, they learn words at the same rate. She did, however, find strong predictive power in the child’s vocabulary at 13 and 20 months old and their grammatical complexity at 2 years old. Bates finds that language learning comes from the neural plasticity in the brain; therefore, children can and are able to learn a language, even with brain trauma.
Research in her lab also showed that adult aphasic patients' deficits were not specific to linguistic structures theorized to be localized to specific brain areas, nor were they restricted to the linguistic domain. Lesion sites overlap in the role that they affect speech fluency and complexity. Language is dependent upon basic cognitive processes such as memory, pattern recognition, and spreading activation. This perspective runs counter to the theory of Noam Chomsky, Eric Lenneberg, and Steven Pinker that language is a special stimulus that is processed by specific language modules in the mind such as the localization to the Broca's and Wernicke's areas.

"We designed the building from the inside out, not the outside in,” said Loretta H. Cockrum, Foram’s founder, chairman and CEO. “We wanted the most efficient office building ever designed, with no wasted space or wasted energy. This is a building of the future more than a building of the present. A lot of love has gone into that building, and a lot of pride."

Its other form is also found in Saraiki Spoken in Jhang in the form of voiced retroflex implosive, .

ڼ is the twenty-ninth letter of Pashto alphabet. It represents the retroflex nasal (IPA: ) which is ण in Devanagari and is transliterated . In Saraiki it is written as ݨ.
question_src: Salvija Square iko wapi?
pos_context_src: Slavija Square () ni makutano makubwa ya kibiashara, yaliyo kati ya sehemu za Kralja Milana, Beogradska, Makenzijeva, Svetosavska, Bulevar Oslobođenja, Deligradska na Nemanjina huko Belgrade. Mraba hapo awali uliitwa Dimitrije Tucović Square baada ya mwanajeshi maarufu wa Serbia.
neg_context_title_src: Maeneo ya uwongo katika Thomas & amp; Marafiki
neg_context_src: Kituo cha Mraba wa Pioneer kiko chini ya 3 Avenue kati ya Cherry Street na Yesler Way katika kitongoji cha Pioneer Square cha jiji la Seattle. Kituo hicho kiko upande wa kaskazini wa Wilaya ya Kihistoria ya Pioneer Square, ambapo majengo kongwe ya jiji iko, na iko karibu na Seattle Underground Ziara na Hifadhi ya Kihistoria ya Klondike Gold Rush. Kwa upande wa kaskazini na mashariki ni Kituo cha Umma cha Seattle, eneo la majengo ya ofisi ya serikali ya Jiji na King, pamoja na Jumba la Jiji la Seattle na Korti ya King County. Kituo cha Mraba wa Pioneer ni vitalu sita mashariki mwa Colman Dock, kituo cha msingi cha mji huo kwa Jimbo la Washington na Huduma ya Teksi ya Maji ya King County.

Uhuru Square ilikuwa kwenye kona ya Victoria na mitaa ya Morris. Ilikuwa maarufu katika miaka ya 1950 kwa mikutano ya kisiasa iliyofanyika hapo. Ilitumiwa na Bunge la Kitaifa la Afrika (ANC) na Chama cha Congress cha Transvaal. Mikutano mingi iliongozwa na Trevor Huddleston. Uhuru Square iliwezesha ushirikiano kati ya vyama vya siasa vilivyotajwa hapo awali. Hapa vyama vilifanya kazi pamoja dhidi ya serikali ya ubaguzi. Mraba wa Uhuru huko Sophiatown haupaswi kuchanganyikiwa na Uhuru Square huko Kliptown, Soweto, ambapo hati ya uhuru ilipitishwa na ANC mnamo 1955. Ilikuwa katika Uhuru wa Mraba huko Sophiatown kwamba Nelson Mandela alifanya maoni yake ya kwanza kwa vurugu na upinzani wa silaha kama zana halali ya mabadiliko. Hii ilimpatia kukemea kutoka kwa Albert Luthuli ambaye wakati huo alichukua nafasi ya Dr A.B. Xuma kama rais wa ANC. Mabaki ya sasa ya Uhuru Square yanaweza kupatikana chini ya uwanja wa kucheza wa shule pamoja na Kanisa la Kristo King.

Sullivan Square ni mduara wa trafiki ulio katika kitongoji cha Charlestown cha Boston, Massachusetts. Kituo cha mraba cha MBTA cha Sullivan iko magharibi mwa mraba. Karibu na eneo la Somerville Mashariki la Somerville, Sullivan Square limetajwa baada ya James Sullivan, gavana wa mapema wa karne ya 19 wa Massachusetts. Mnamo miaka ya 2000, mraba wa Sullivan ulipunguka, ambao uliacha njia ya kubadilika kwa Njia ya 99.
Sanaʽa alichaguliwa kama mji mkuu wa kitamaduni wa Kiarabu na Ligi ya Kiarabu. Mnamo 2008, Msikiti wa Al Saleh ulikamilishwa. Inashikilia waabudu zaidi ya 40,000.

Mraba wa Town, a.k.a. Tidmouth Town Square, ndipo ukumbi wa mji wa Tidmouth uko. Kituo kinachohudumia mraba iko kaskazini mwa Kituo cha Tidmouth, kwenye mstari wa kitanzi na mstari wa tawi la bata. Pia kuna maktaba iko kwenye ukumbi wa jiji.

Wakati wa kujadili kipindi cha wakati ambao watoto huanza kuongea, Bates walipokea umakini mkubwa kwa kupata idadi kubwa ya nomino ndani ya maneno 50 ya kwanza ya msamiati wa msemaji wa Kiingereza. Bates ilisaidia kumaliza mjadala unaoendelea kati ya wataalamu wa lugha ambao walisema kwamba mtindo wa lugha ya kutaja, ulioonyeshwa na maneno 50 ya kwanza ya mtoto yaliyo na lebo za kitu, ilikuwa mkakati bora katika kukuza lugha kuliko mtindo wa lugha ya kibinafsi na ya kijamii. Aligundua kuwa bila kujali mkakati unaotumiwa na mtoto, wanajifunza maneno kwa kiwango sawa. Alifanya, hata hivyo, alipata nguvu kubwa ya utabiri katika msamiati wa mtoto akiwa na miezi 13 na 20 na ugumu wao wa kisarufi akiwa na umri wa miaka 2. Bates hugundua kuwa kujifunza lugha hutoka kwa uboreshaji wa neural kwenye ubongo; Kwa hivyo, watoto wanaweza na wana uwezo wa kujifunza lugha, hata na kiwewe cha ubongo.
Utafiti katika maabara yake pia ilionyesha kuwa upungufu wa wagonjwa wa watu wazima wa aphasic haukuwa maalum kwa miundo ya lugha iliyowekwa ndani ya maeneo maalum ya ubongo, wala hawakuzuiliwa kwa kikoa cha lugha. Tovuti za lesion zinaingiliana katika jukumu ambalo zinaathiri ufasaha wa hotuba na ugumu. Lugha inategemea michakato ya msingi ya utambuzi kama kumbukumbu, utambuzi wa muundo, na uanzishaji wa kueneza. Mtazamo huu unaendana na nadharia ya Noam Chomsky, Eric Lenneberg, na Steven Pinker kwamba lugha hiyo ni kichocheo maalum ambacho kinasindika na moduli maalum za lugha katika akili kama ujanibishaji wa maeneo ya Broca na Wernicke.

"Tulibuni jengo hilo kutoka ndani, sio nje," alisema Loretta H. Cockrum, mwanzilishi wa Foram, Mwenyekiti na Mkurugenzi Mtendaji. "Tulitaka jengo bora zaidi la ofisi lililowahi kubuniwa, bila nafasi ya kupoteza au nishati ya kupoteza. Hii ni jengo la siku zijazo zaidi ya jengo la sasa. Upendo mwingi umeingia kwenye jengo hilo, na kiburi sana."

question_en: Where was Jacques de Molay born?
pos_context_en: Little is known of his early years, but Jacques de Molay was probably born in Molay, Haute-Saône, in the County of Burgundy, at the time a territory ruled by Otto III as part of the Holy Roman Empire, and in modern times in the area of Franche-Comté, northeastern France. His birth year is not certain, but judging by statements made during the later trials, was probably around 1250. He was born, as most Templar knights were, into a family of minor or middle-ranking nobility. It is suggested that he was dubbed a knight at age 21 in 1265 and is known that he was executed in 1314, aged about 70. If correct, these dates lead to the belief that he was born about 1244.
neg_context_en: In 1758, a young Jacques-Jean le Coulteux du Molay (1740–1823), equerry to King Louis XV, and his wife Geneviéve –Sophie le Coulteux de la Noraye (painted below in 1788); built the chateau, his first large residence, in the heart of Normandy’s woodland countryside, close to Rouen, his birthplace. Jacques-Jean was a wealthy and well known banker, who had one son (Jacques Félix Le Coulteux du Molay was born Paris 29 June 1779 and died in Dijon 1 April 1812) with Genevieve before their divorce. During their time together they also bought the famous Malmaison near Paris – some of those styles are reflected in the chateau you now stand. Jacques-Jean later married Alexandrine Sophie Pauline Le Couteulx; the couple had three children.

On 14 September, Philip took advantage of the rumors and inquiry to begin his move against the Templars, sending out a secret order to his agents in all parts of France to implement a mass arrest of all Templars at dawn on 13 October. Philip wanted the Templars arrested and their possessions confiscated to incorporate their wealth into the Royal Treasury and to be free of the enormous debt he owed the Templar Order. Molay was in Paris on 12 October, where he was a pallbearer at the funeral of Catherine of Courtenay, wife of Count Charles of Valois, and sister-in-law of King Philip. In a dawn raid on Friday, 13 October 1307, Molay and sixty of his Templar brother knights were arrested. Philip then had the Templars charged with heresy and many other trumped-up charges, most of which were identical to the charges which had previously been leveled by Philip's agents against Pope Boniface VIII.

In 1265, as a young man, he was received into the Order of the Templars in a chapel at the Beaune House, by Humbert de Pairaud, the Visitor of France and England. Another prominent Templar in attendance was Amaury de la Roche, Templar Master of the province of France.

After the Fall of Acre to the Egyptian Mamluks in 1291, the Franks (a name used in the Levant for Catholic Europeans) who were able to do so retreated to the island of Cyprus. It became the headquarters of the dwindling Kingdom of Jerusalem, and the base of operations for any future military attempts by the Crusaders against the Egyptian Mamluks, who for their part were systematically conquering any last Crusader strongholds on the mainland. Templars in Cyprus included Jacques de Molay and Thibaud Gaudin, their 22nd Grand Master. During a meeting assembled on the island in the autumn of 1291, Molay spoke of reforming the Order and put himself forward as an alternative to the current Grand Master. Gaudin died around 1292 and, as there were no other serious contenders for the role at the time, Molay was soon elected. In spring 1293, he began a tour of the West to try to muster more support for a reconquest of the Holy Land. Developing relationships with European leaders such as Pope Boniface VIII, Edward I of England, James I of Aragon and Charles II of Naples, Molay's immediate goals were to strengthen the defence of Cyprus and rebuild the Templar forces. From his travels, he was able to secure authorization from some monarchs for the export of supplies to Cyprus, but could obtain no firm commitment for a new Crusade. There was talk of merging the Templars with one of the other military orders, the Knights Hospitaller. The Grand Masters of both orders opposed such a merger, but pressure increased from the Papacy.

Modern historians agree that the Templar of Tyre's document does not designate Jacques de Molay, but instead designates the Mongol general "Mûlay". Earlier historians however, regularly confused the two. This confusion was further expanded in 1805, when the French playwright/historian, François Raynouard, made claims that Jerusalem had been captured by the Mongols, with Jacques de Molay in charge of one of the Mongol divisions. ""In 1299, the Grand-Master was with his knights at the taking of Jerusalem."" In 1846, a large-scale painting was created by Claude Jacquand, entitled "Molay Prend Jerusalem, 1299" ("Molay Takes Jerusalem, 1299"), which depicts the supposed event. Today the painting hangs in the Hall of the Crusades in the French national museum in Versailles. And in the 1861 edition of the French encyclopedia, the "Nouvelle Biographie Universelle", it says in the "Molay" article:

The Grand Master of the Hospitallers, Fulk de Villaret, was also delayed in his travel to France, as he was engaged with a battle at Rhodes. He did not arrive until late summer, so while waiting for his arrival, Molay met the Pope to discuss other matters, one of which was the charges by one or more ousted Templars who had made accusations of impropriety in the Templars' initiation ceremony. Molay had already spoken with the king in Paris on 24 June 1307 about the accusations against his order and was partially reassured. Returning to Poitiers, Molay asked the Pope to set up an inquiry to quickly clear the Order of the rumours and accusations surrounding it, and the Pope convened an inquiry on 24 August.

Jacques de Molay (; c. 1243 – 18 March 1314), also spelled "Molai", was the 23rd and last Grand Master of the Knights Templar, leading the Order from 20 April 1298 until it was dissolved by order of Pope Clement V in 1312. Though little is known of his actual life and deeds except for his last years as Grand Master, he is one of the best known Templars.

Manuel was born in the hamlet of La Conchette, in Enchastrayes (Alpes-de-Haute-Provence), near Barcelonette. His family included judges and attorneys who had established careers in the Ubaye Valley. At age seventeen, he joined the army, soon becoming an officer. He fought in the Italian campaigns under Napoleon Bonaparte, notably in the Battle of the Bridge of Arcole where he was wounded ending his military career.

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.
question_src: Jacques de Molay alizaliwa wapi?
pos_context_src: Kidogo anajulikana juu ya miaka yake ya mapema, lakini Jacques de Molay labda alizaliwa huko Molay, Haute-Saône, katika kaunti ya Burgundy, wakati huo eneo lililotawaliwa na Otto III kama sehemu ya Dola Takatifu la Roma, na katika nyakati za kisasa katika eneo la Franche-Comté, kaskazini mashariki mwa Ufaransa. Mwaka wake wa kuzaliwa sio wa hakika, lakini kuhukumu kwa taarifa zilizotolewa wakati wa majaribio ya baadaye, labda ilikuwa karibu 1250. Alizaliwa, kama vile visu vingi vya Templar vilikuwa, katika familia ya watu wakuu au wa kati. Inapendekezwa kuwa aliitwa knight akiwa na umri wa miaka 21 mnamo 1265 na anajulikana kuwa aliuawa mnamo 1314, akiwa na umri wa miaka 70. Ikiwa sahihi, tarehe hizi husababisha imani kwamba alizaliwa mnamo 1244.
neg_context_src: Mnamo 1758, kijana Jacques-Jean Le Coulteux du Molay (1740-1823), Equerry kwa Mfalme Louis XV, na mkewe Geneviéve -Sophie Le Coulteux de la Noraye (walijenga hapa chini mnamo 1788); Kuijenga Chateau, makazi yake ya kwanza kubwa, katika moyo wa nchi ya Normandy's Woodland, karibu na Rouen, mahali pa kuzaliwa. Jacques-Jean alikuwa benki tajiri na anayejulikana, ambaye alikuwa na mtoto mmoja (Jacques félix le Coulteux du Molay alizaliwa Paris 29 Juni 1779 na akafa huko Dijon 1 Aprili 1812) na Genevieve kabla ya talaka yao. Wakati wa wakati wao pamoja walinunua pia Malmaison maarufu karibu na Paris - baadhi ya mitindo hiyo inaonyeshwa kwenye chateau sasa unasimama. Jacques-Jean baadaye alioa Alexandrine Sophie Pauline Le Couteulx; Wanandoa walikuwa na watoto watatu.

Mnamo tarehe 14 Septemba, Filipo alichukua fursa ya uvumi na uchunguzi kuanza harakati zake dhidi ya templeti, na kupeleka amri ya siri kwa mawakala wake katika sehemu zote za Ufaransa kutekeleza kukamatwa kwa templeti zote alfajiri mnamo 13 Oktoba. Filipo alitaka templeti zikakamatwa na mali zao zikatwaliwa ili kuingiza utajiri wao katika Hazina ya Royal na kuwa huru na deni kubwa alilodai Agizo la Templar. Molay alikuwa huko Paris mnamo Oktoba 12, ambapo alikuwa mtu anayeshambuliwa kwenye mazishi ya Catherine wa Courtenay, mke wa Hesabu Charles wa Valois, na dada-mkwe wa Mfalme Philip. Katika shambulio la alfajiri Ijumaa, 13 Oktoba 1307, Molay na sitini ya kaka yake wa templar Knights walikamatwa. Filipo wakati huo alikuwa na templeti kushtakiwa kwa uzushi na mashtaka mengine mengi ya kupindukia, ambayo mengi yalikuwa sawa na mashtaka ambayo hapo awali yalitolewa na mawakala wa Filipo dhidi ya Papa Boniface VIII.

Mnamo 1265, akiwa kijana, alipokelewa katika agizo la templeti katika kanisa huko Beaune House, na Humbert de Paraud, mgeni wa Ufaransa na England. Templar mwingine maarufu katika mahudhurio alikuwa Amaury de la Roche, Templar Master wa Mkoa wa Ufaransa.

Baada ya kuanguka kwa Acre kwa Mamluks ya Wamisri mnamo 1291, Franks (jina lililotumiwa katika Levant kwa Wazungu wa Katoliki) ambao waliweza kufanya hivyo walirudi kisiwa cha Kupro. Ikawa makao makuu ya ufalme wa kupungua wa Yerusalemu, na msingi wa shughuli kwa majaribio yoyote ya kijeshi ya baadaye na Wakosoaji dhidi ya Mamluks wa Wamisri, ambao kwa upande wao walikuwa wakishinda ngome yoyote ya mwisho ya Crusader kwenye Bara. Templars huko Kupro ni pamoja na Jacques de Molay na Thibaud Gaudin, bwana wao wa 22. Wakati wa mkutano uliokusanyika kwenye kisiwa hicho katika vuli ya 1291, Molay alizungumza juu ya kurekebisha agizo hilo na kujiweka mbele kama njia mbadala ya Mwalimu Mkuu wa sasa. Gaudin alikufa karibu 1292 na, kwa kuwa hakukuwa na wagombea wengine wakubwa kwa jukumu hilo wakati huo, Molay alichaguliwa hivi karibuni. Mnamo Spring 1293, alianza ziara ya Magharibi kujaribu kujaribu kuunga mkono zaidi kwa Ardhi Takatifu. Kuendeleza uhusiano na viongozi wa Ulaya kama vile Papa Boniface VIII, Edward I wa England, James I wa Aragon na Charles II wa Naples, malengo ya haraka ya Molay yalikuwa kuimarisha utetezi wa Kupro na kujenga tena vikosi vya Templar. Kutoka kwa safari zake, aliweza kupata idhini kutoka kwa wafalme wengine kwa usafirishaji wa vifaa kwenda Kupro, lakini hakuweza kupata dhamira thabiti kwa vita mpya. Kulikuwa na mazungumzo ya kuunganisha templeti na moja ya maagizo mengine ya kijeshi, The Knights Hospitaller. Mabwana wakuu wa maagizo yote mawili walipinga ujumuishaji kama huo, lakini shinikizo liliongezeka kutoka kwa upapa.

Wanahistoria wa kisasa wanakubali kwamba templar ya hati ya Tire haitoi Jacques de Molay, lakini badala yake inaainisha "Mongol" Mûlay ". Hapo awali wanahistoria, mara kwa mara walichanganya wawili hao. Machafuko haya yaliongezwa zaidi mnamo 1805, wakati mwanahistoria/mwanahistoria wa Ufaransa, François Raynouard, alitoa madai kwamba Yerusalemu alikuwa amekamatwa na Wamongolia, na Jacques de Molay akisimamia moja ya mgawanyiko wa Mongol. "" Mnamo 1299, mkuu huyo alikuwa na Knights yake wakati wa kuchukua Yerusalemu. "" Mnamo 1846, uchoraji mkubwa uliundwa na Claude Jacquand, uliopewa jina la "Molay Prend Jerusalem, 1299" ("Molay anachukua Yerusalemu, 1299"), ambayo inaonyesha tukio hilo. Leo uchoraji hutegemea katika Ukumbi wa Vita katika Jumba la Makumbusho la Kitaifa la Ufaransa huko Versailles. Na katika toleo la 1861 la Encyclopedia ya Ufaransa, "Nouvelle Biographie Universelle", inasema katika nakala ya "Molay":

Mwalimu mkuu wa Hospitali, Fulk de Villaret, pia alicheleweshwa katika kusafiri kwake kwenda Ufaransa, kwani alikuwa akishirikiana na vita huko Rhode. Hakufika hadi mwishoni mwa msimu wa joto, kwa hivyo wakati akingojea kuwasili kwake, Molay alikutana na Papa kujadili mambo mengine, ambayo moja ilikuwa mashtaka ya templeti moja au zaidi ambaye alikuwa ametoa tuhuma za kutokujali katika sherehe ya kuanzishwa ya Templars. Molay alikuwa tayari amezungumza na mfalme huko Paris mnamo tarehe 24 Juni 1307 kuhusu tuhuma dhidi ya agizo lake na alihakikishiwa sehemu. Kurudi kwa Poitiers, Molay alimwuliza Papa kuanzisha uchunguzi ili kusafisha haraka agizo la uvumi na mashtaka yaliyoizunguka, na Papa alikusanya uchunguzi mnamo tarehe 24 Agosti.

Jacques de Molay (; c. 1243 - 18 Machi 1314), pia aliorodheshwa "Molai", alikuwa 23 na wa mwisho mkuu wa Knights Templar, akiongoza agizo kutoka 20 Aprili 1298 hadi ilifutwa kwa amri ya Papa Clement V mnamo 1312. Ingawa ni mdogo anayejulikana kwa maisha yake halisi na matendo yake kama ya miaka ya mwisho, yeye ni mtu mmoja wa mwisho.

Manuel alizaliwa katika Hamlet ya La Conchette, huko Enchastrayes (Alpes-de-Haute-Provence), karibu na Barcelonette. Familia yake ni pamoja na majaji na mawakili ambao walikuwa wameanzisha kazi katika Bonde la Ubaye. Katika umri wa miaka kumi na saba, alijiunga na jeshi, hivi karibuni kuwa afisa. Alipigania katika kampeni za Italia chini ya Napoleon Bonaparte, haswa katika vita vya Daraja la Arcole ambapo alijeruhiwa kumaliza kazi yake ya kijeshi.

Winfield Toll Bridge, pia inajulikana kama Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, ni kihistoria wa kihistoria wa Cantilever Warren Truss Bridge iliyoko Winfield na Red House, Kaunti ya Putnam, West Virginia. Ilijengwa mnamo 1955, na inachukua Mto wa Kanawha, iliyobeba West Virginia Route 34. Cantilever kupitia-truss ina nafasi mbili za nanga kila futi 245 kwa urefu na urefu wa futi 462 kwa urefu kati ya mistari ya kituo cha pier. Span kuu ina futi mbili 128, inchi 4, mikono ya cantilever na miguu 205, inchi 4, iliyosimamishwa.

question_en: Who won the 2017 Mexico City ePrix?
pos_context_en: The 2017 Mexico City ePrix (officially the 2017 FIA Formula E Julius Baer Mexico City ePrix) was a Formula E electric car race held on 1 April 2017 before a crowd of 36,000 people at the Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez in Mexico City, Mexico. It was the fourth round of the 2016–17 Formula E season, and the second running of the event. The 45-lap race was won by Audi Sport ABT driver Lucas di Grassi after starting from 15th position. Jean-Éric Vergne finished second for the Techeetah team and Virgin driver Sam Bird came in third.
neg_context_en: The 2018 Mexico City ePrix (formally the 2018 ABB Formula E Mexico City ePrix) was a Formula E electric car race held at the Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez in the centre of Mexico City on 3 March 2018. It was the fifth round of the 2017–18 Formula E season and the third edition of the event as part of the championship. The 47-lap race was won by Audi driver Daniel Abt after starting from fifth position. Oliver Turvey finished second for NIO and e.Dams-Renault driver Sébastien Buemi came in third.

The 2018 Mexico City ePrix was confirmed as part of Formula E's 2017–18 series schedule in September 2017 by the FIA World Motor Sport Council. It was the fifth of twelve scheduled single-seater electric car races of the 2017–18 season, and the third time that the ePrix has been held as part of the FIA Formula E Championship. It was held on 3 March 2018 at the Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez in the centre of Mexico City. The ePrix was the only race of the season that took place on a permanent motor racing facility: it consists of a mixture of the Grand Prix and oval layouts and has seventeen turns at a length of . The high elevation of the circuit created thin air and lower wind resistance, causing teams to optimise the cooling of their cars, and the asphalt surface was less abrasive than other tracks. Furthermore, the world governing body of motorsport, the Fédération Internationale de l'Automobile (FIA) introduced a track limits zone on the approach to turn one to prevent competitors from using the grass in that area. The driver adviser to the stewards for the ePrix was former Deutsche Tourenwagen Masters racer Alexandre Prémat.

The 2016 Mexico City ePrix was a Formula E motor race held on 12 March 2016 at the Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez in Mexico City, Mexico. It was the fifth championship race of the 2015–16 Formula E season, the single-seater, electrically powered racing car series' second season. It also was the 16th Formula E race overall. The race was initially won by Lucas di Grassi, but later the win was handed to Jérôme d'Ambrosio because di Grassi's car was found to be underweight. This was d'Ambrosio's second Formula E win, after the 2015 Berlin ePrix, where he had also benefited from a disqualification of di Grassi.

The Mexico City ePrix was confirmed as part of Formula E's 2016–17 series schedule in September 2016 by the FIA World Motor Sport Council. It was the fourth of twelve scheduled single-seater electric car races of the 2016–17 season, the second running of the event, and was held on 1 April 2017 at the Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez. The ePrix was the only race of the season that took place on a permanent race track which consists of a mixture between the Grand Prix and oval layouts and is long with 17 corners. The circuit underwent changes following the previous year's running of the race with the first corner altered to become a right-hand turn and the final chicane was modified to prevent drivers from short-cutting the corner in order to gain an advantage.

After being stripped of the victory in previous year's race because of an underweight car, Audi Sport ABT team principal Hans-Jurgen Abt said his team's objective was to get onto the podium. He acknowledged that getting the victory would not be easy because of the competitiveness of the field. After retiring from the preceding Buenos Aires ePrix, Bird stated that he would enter the Mexico City race with a positive attitude and affirmed his belief in his team and he felt there was a possibility of getting onto the podium in the event they perform well in qualifying. Mitch Evans reiterated that despite Jaguar not scoring points in the season's opening three races, the Buenos Aires race showed that he was becoming more confident and wanted to carry over his momentum from the four-month break. He also said he was excited to compete in the Mexico City ePrix.

The 2017 New York City ePrix (formally the 2017 FIA Formula E Qualcomm New York City ePrix) were a pair of Formula E electric car races held on July 15 and 16, 2017 at the Brooklyn Street Circuit in Red Hook, Brooklyn before a two-day crowd of 20,000 people. They were the ninth and tenth races of the 2016–17 Formula E season and the inaugural running of the event. The first race, contested over 43 laps on 15 July, was won by Virgin driver Sam Bird after starting from fourth place. Jean-Éric Vergne finished second for Techeetah, and his teammate Stéphane Sarrazin came third. The longer 49-lap race held the following day was won by Bird from a pole position start. Mahindra teammates Felix Rosenqvist and Nick Heidfeld completed the podium's final two places.
For the 2017 Mexico City ePrix he made a guest appearance as an analyst for Channel 5 coverage.
The Mexico City ePrix is an annual race of the single-seater, electrically powered Formula E championship, held in Mexico City, Mexico. It was first raced in the 2015–16 season.

Oliver Turvey won the pole position after Daniel Abt was penalised for a tyre pressure infringement and maintained his advantage on the first lap. He came under pressure from José María López until he retired from the ePrix with power issues, handing the lead to López. Di Grassi and Jérôme d'Ambrosio made early pit stops for the switch into their second cars and di Grassi became the leader on lap 26 when the rest of the field made their stops. D'Ambrosio held off pressure from Vergne for second place until he was passed on the 43rd lap and di Grassi remained the leader for the rest of the race after conserving electrical energy to win. There were three lead changes among four different drivers and three safety car periods during the course of the race.
question_src: Nani alishinda Eprix ya Mexico ya 2017?
pos_context_src: Jiji la Mexico la 2017 la Eprix (rasmi FIA ya 2017 FIA formula e Julius Baer Mexico City Eprix) ilikuwa mbio za gari za umeme za formula E zilizofanyika 1 Aprili 2017 kabla ya umati wa watu 36,000 huko Autódromor Rodríguez huko Mexico, Mexico. Ilikuwa raundi ya nne ya msimu wa formula E ya 2016-17, na mchezo wa pili wa hafla hiyo. Mbio za paja 45 zilishindwa na dereva wa Audi Sport ABT Lucas di Grassi baada ya kuanza kutoka nafasi ya 15. Jean-Éric Vergne alimaliza wa pili kwa timu ya Techeetah na dereva wa bikira Sam bird alifika katika tatu.
neg_context_src: Jiji la Mexico la 2018 la Mexico (hapo awali Mfumo wa gari la ABB E la 2018 lilikuwa mbio ya gari la umeme la Elektroniki lililofanyika huko Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez katikati ya Mexico City mnamo 3 Machi 2018. Ilikuwa raundi ya tano ya msimu wa 2017-18 Msimu E na sehemu ya tatu kama sehemu ya Mashindano. Mashindano ya mbio 47 yalishindwa na dereva wa Audi Daniel Abt baada ya kuanza kutoka nafasi ya tano. Oliver Turvey alimaliza pili kwa dereva wa Nio na E.DAMS-Renault Sébastien Buemi alifika wa tatu.

EPRIX ya Jiji la Mexico la 2018 ilithibitishwa kama sehemu ya ratiba ya Mfululizo wa Mfumo wa 2017-18 mnamo Septemba 2017 na Baraza la Michezo la Dunia la FIA. Ilikuwa ya tano ya mbio kumi na mbili zilizopangwa za gari moja la msimu wa msimu wa 2017-18, na mara ya tatu kwamba EPRIX imefanyika kama sehemu ya Mashindano ya FIA Formula E. Ilifanyika tarehe 3 Machi 2018 huko Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez katikati mwa Mexico City. EPRIX ndio mbio pekee ya msimu ambayo ilifanyika kwenye kituo cha mbio za kudumu za gari: ina mchanganyiko wa mpangilio wa Grand Prix na mviringo na ina zamu kumi na saba kwa urefu wa. Uinuko mkubwa wa mzunguko uliunda hewa nyembamba na upinzani wa chini wa upepo, na kusababisha timu kuongeza baridi ya magari yao, na uso wa lami haukuwa mbaya kuliko nyimbo zingine. Kwa kuongezea, baraza linaloongoza ulimwenguni la Motorsport, Fédération Internationale de l'Atomobile (FIA) ilianzisha eneo la mipaka ya njia ya kugeuza mtu kuzuia washindani kutumia nyasi kwenye eneo hilo. Mshauri wa dereva kwa wasimamizi wa EPRIX alikuwa wa zamani wa Deutsche Tourenwagen Masters Racer Alexandre Prémat.

Mexico City Eprix ya 2016 ilikuwa mbio ya Mfumo wa Magari ya Mfumo E iliyofanyika tarehe 12 Machi 2016 huko Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez huko Mexico City, Mexico. Ilikuwa mbio ya tano ya ubingwa wa msimu wa formula E ya 2015-16, seti moja, msimu wa pili wa gari la racing 'msimu wa pili. Pia ilikuwa mbio ya 16 formula E jumla. Mashindano hayo hapo awali yalishindwa na Lucas di Grassi, lakini baadaye ushindi huo ulikabidhiwa Jérôme D'Ambrosio kwa sababu gari la Di Grassi liligundulika kuwa na uzito. Hii ilikuwa ushindi wa pili wa D'Ambrosio, baada ya Berlin Eprix ya 2015, ambapo pia alikuwa amefaidika kutokana na kutofaulu kwa di Grassi.

Mexico City EPRIX ilithibitishwa kama sehemu ya ratiba ya mfululizo wa Mfumo wa 2016-17 mnamo Septemba 2016 na Baraza la Michezo la Magari ya FIA World. Ilikuwa ya nne kati ya mbio za gari kumi na mbili zilizopangwa za seti moja ya msimu wa 2016-17, mbio ya pili ya hafla hiyo, na ilifanyika 1 Aprili 2017 katika Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez. EPRIX ndio mbio pekee ya msimu ambayo ilifanyika kwenye wimbo wa mbio za kudumu ambao una mchanganyiko kati ya mpangilio wa Grand Prix na mviringo na ni mrefu na pembe 17. Mzunguko ulibadilika kufuatia mbio za mwaka uliopita za mbio na kona ya kwanza ilibadilishwa kuwa zamu ya kulia na chicane ya mwisho ilibadilishwa ili kuzuia madereva kutoka kwa kukatwa kwa kona ili kupata faida.

Baada ya kuvuliwa ushindi katika mbio za mwaka uliopita kwa sababu ya gari lenye uzito, mkuu wa timu ya Audi Sport ABT Hans-Jurgen ABT alisema lengo la timu yake lilikuwa kuingia kwenye podium. Alikubali kwamba kupata ushindi hautakuwa rahisi kwa sababu ya ushindani wa uwanja. Baada ya kustaafu kutoka kwa Buenos Aires Eprix aliyetangulia, Ndege alisema kwamba ataingia kwenye mbio za jiji la Mexico na mtazamo mzuri na alithibitisha imani yake katika timu yake na alihisi kuna uwezekano wa kuingia kwenye podium katika tukio ambalo wanafanya vizuri katika kufuzu. Mitch Evans alisisitiza kwamba licha ya Jaguar kutofunga alama katika msimu wa ufunguzi wa msimu huo, mbio za Buenos Aires zilionyesha kuwa alikuwa anajiamini zaidi na alitaka kubeba kasi yake kutoka mapumziko ya miezi nne. Alisema pia alikuwa na furaha ya kushindana katika Jiji la Mexico Eprix.

Eprix ya New York City ya 2017 (rasmi ya FIA ya FIA ya 2017 ya Qualcomm New York City Eprix) ilikuwa jozi ya mbio za gari za umeme zilizofanyika Julai 15 na 16, 2017 katika Mzunguko wa Mtaa wa Brooklyn huko Red Hook, Brooklyn kabla ya umati wa watu wa siku mbili wa watu 20,000. Walikuwa mbio za tisa na kumi za msimu wa formula E ya 2016-17 na harakati za uzinduzi wa hafla hiyo. Mbio za kwanza, zilizogombewa zaidi ya laps 43 mnamo Julai 15, zilishindwa na dereva wa bikira Sam bird baada ya kuanza kutoka nafasi ya nne. Jean-Éric Vergne alimaliza wa pili kwa Techeetah, na mwenzake Stéphane Sarrazin walikuja wa tatu. Mashindano ya muda mrefu zaidi ya 49 yaliyofanyika siku iliyofuata yalishindwa na ndege kutoka mwanzo wa msimamo. Wenzake wa Mahindra Felix Rosenqvist na Nick Heidfeld walikamilisha sehemu mbili za mwisho za podium.
Kwa Jiji la Mexico la 2017 alifanya muonekano wa mgeni kama mchambuzi wa chanjo ya Channel 5.
Mexico City Eprix ni mbio ya kila mwaka ya seti moja, ubingwa wa umeme wa formula E, uliofanyika Mexico City, Mexico. Ilipigwa mara ya kwanza katika msimu wa 2015-16.

Oliver Turvey alishinda nafasi ya pole baada ya Daniel Abt kuadhibiwa kwa ukiukwaji wa shinikizo la tairi na kudumisha faida yake kwenye paja la kwanza. Alipata shinikizo kutoka kwa José María López hadi alipostaafu kutoka kwa Eprix na maswala ya nguvu, akimpa kiongozi López. Di Grassi na Jérôme d'Ambrosio walifanya mashimo ya mapema kwa kubadili ndani ya magari yao ya pili na di Grassi alikua kiongozi kwenye paja 26 wakati uwanja wote uliposimama. D'Ambrosio alishikilia shinikizo kutoka kwa Vergne kwa nafasi ya pili hadi alipopitishwa kwenye paja la 43 na di Grassi alibaki kiongozi kwa mbio zote baada ya kuhifadhi nishati ya umeme kushinda. Kulikuwa na mabadiliko matatu ya kuongoza kati ya madereva wanne tofauti na vipindi vitatu vya gari usalama wakati wa mbio.

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.

Mukhaestate is a village located in the west part of Georgia, Kobuleti municipality in the Adjarian region (an autonomous region). Village is situated at 60 metres above the sea level. In the village is a small river, which called Achkva. According to the data of 2014, 1 837 people live in the village. During the 15th-16th century Mukhaestate was the main residence place for nobleman from Guria region. Mukhaestate is 36.9 kilometers north of Batumi and approximately 315 km west of the nation's capital Tbilisi. The mountainous area is good for subtropical species.

Mukhaestate ni kijiji kilicho katika sehemu ya magharibi ya Georgia, Manispaa ya Kobuleti katika mkoa wa Addinari (mkoa wa uhuru). Kijiji kiko katika mita 60 juu ya usawa wa bahari. Katika kijiji hicho kuna mto mdogo, ambao unaitwa Achkva. Kulingana na data ya 2014, watu 1 837 wanaishi katika kijiji hicho. Wakati wa karne ya 15 hadi 16 Mukhaestate ilikuwa mahali pa makazi kuu kwa mtukufu kutoka mkoa wa Guria. Mukhaestate ni kilomita 36.9 kaskazini mwa Batumi na takriban kilomita 315 magharibi mwa mji mkuu wa taifa Tbilisi. Sehemu ya mlima ni nzuri kwa spishi za chini.

Kulikuwa na vitengo 3,426 vya makazi kwa wastani wa 1,052.7 kwa maili ya mraba (407.0/km²). Ubunifu wa rangi ya jiji ulikuwa 94.90% nyeupe, 0.33% American American, 1.38% Wamarekani, 0.52% Asia, 0.03% Pacific Islander, 0.96% kutoka jamii zingine, na 1.88% kutoka kwa jamii mbili au zaidi. Hispanic au Latino ya mbio yoyote walikuwa 2.20% ya idadi ya watu.
Kulikuwa na kaya 2,912 kati yao 27,5% walikuwa na watoto chini ya umri wa miaka 18 wanaoishi nao, asilimia 42.8 walikuwa wenzi wa ndoa walioishi pamoja, 12.3% walikuwa na kaya ya kike na hakuna mume aliyekuwepo, na 40.6% hawakuwa familia. 35.1% ya kaya zote zilitengenezwa na watu binafsi na 17.8% walikuwa na mtu anayeishi peke yake ambaye alikuwa na umri wa miaka 65 au zaidi. Saizi ya wastani ya kaya ilikuwa 2.24 na ukubwa wa wastani wa familia ulikuwa 2.88.

question_en: How large is Israel?
pos_context_en: Israel's area is approximately , which includes of inland water. Israel stretches from north to south, and its width ranges from to, at its narrowest point, .
neg_context_en: The Council on Foreign Relations states in its publisher's blurb for the book that "Start-up Nation" addresses the question: "How is it that Israel—a country of 7.1 million people, only sixty years old, surrounded by enemies, in a constant state of war since its founding, with no natural resources—produces more start-up companies than large, peaceful, and stable nations like Japan, China, India, Korea, Canada, and the United Kingdom?" "The Economist" notes that Israel now has more high-tech start-ups and a larger venture capital industry per capita than any other country in the world. The success of Israel's high-tech sector over the past two decades has attracted recent attention from business journalists and "The Economist" describes "Start-up Nation" as the most notable of a "growing pile" of books on the subject.

"Like them, we had shaken off foreign rule; like them, we had to learn for ourselves how to reclaim the land, how to increase the yields of our crops, how to irrigate, how to raise poultry, how to live together, and how to defend ourselves." Israel could be a role model because it "had been forced to find solutions to the kinds of problems that large, wealthy, powerful states had never encountered".

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.

pos_context_src: Sehemu ya Israeli ni takriban, ambayo ni pamoja na maji ya ndani. Israeli huanzia kaskazini kwenda kusini, na upana wake unaanzia kutoka, katika hatua yake nyembamba,.
neg_context_src: Baraza juu ya Mahusiano ya Mambo ya nje linasema katika blurb ya mchapishaji wake kwa kitabu kwamba "taifa la kuanza" linashughulikia swali: "Je! Ni vipi Israeli-nchi ya watu milioni 7.1, umri wa miaka sitini tu, wamezungukwa na maadui, katika hali ya vita mara kwa mara tangu kuanzishwa kwake, bila rasilimali asili-inatoa maoni zaidi ya kampuni kubwa, zenye amani na za Uchina, za Uchina, za Uchina, za Uchina, za Uchina, za Uchina, za Uchina, za Uchina, za Uchina, za Uchina, za Uchina, za Uchina, za Uchina, za Uchina, za Uchina, za Uchina, za Uchina, za Uchina, za Uchina, na Uchina, Uchina, Uchina, Uchina. "Mchumi" anabainisha kuwa Israeli sasa ina kuanza zaidi ya hali ya juu na tasnia kubwa ya mitaji kwa kila nchi kuliko nchi nyingine yoyote ulimwenguni. Mafanikio ya sekta ya hali ya juu ya Israeli katika miongo miwili iliyopita yamevutia umakini wa hivi karibuni kutoka kwa waandishi wa biashara na "The Economist" anafafanua "taifa la kuanza" kama maarufu zaidi "rundo linalokua" la vitabu juu ya mada hiyo.

"Kama wao, tulikuwa tumetikisa sheria za kigeni; kama wao, tulilazimika kujifunza sisi wenyewe jinsi ya kurudisha ardhi, jinsi ya kuongeza mavuno ya mazao yetu, jinsi ya kumwagilia, jinsi ya kuinua kuku, jinsi ya kuishi pamoja, na jinsi ya kujitetea." Israeli inaweza kuwa mfano wa kuigwa kwa sababu "ililazimishwa kupata suluhisho kwa aina ya shida ambazo majimbo makubwa, tajiri, yenye nguvu hayakuwahi kukutana nayo".

Winfield Toll Bridge, pia inajulikana kama Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, ni kihistoria wa kihistoria wa Cantilever Warren Truss Bridge iliyoko Winfield na Red House, Kaunti ya Putnam, West Virginia. Ilijengwa mnamo 1955, na inachukua Mto wa Kanawha, iliyobeba West Virginia Route 34. Cantilever kupitia-truss ina nafasi mbili za nanga kila futi 245 kwa urefu na urefu wa futi 462 kwa urefu kati ya mistari ya kituo cha pier. Span kuu ina futi mbili 128, inchi 4, mikono ya cantilever na miguu 205, inchi 4, iliyosimamishwa.

question_en: How tall is the African elephant?
pos_context_en: One species of African elephant, the bush elephant, is the largest living terrestrial animal, while the forest elephant is the third-largest. Their thickset bodies rest on stocky legs, and they have concave backs. Their large ears enable heat loss. The upper lip and nose form a trunk. The trunk acts as a fifth limb, a sound amplifier, and an important method of touch. African elephants' trunks end in two opposing lips, whereas the Asian elephant trunk ends in a single lip. In "L. africana", males stand tall at the shoulder and weigh , while females stand tall and weigh ; "L. cyclotis" is smaller with male shoulder heights of up to . The largest recorded individual stood at the shoulder and weighed . The tallest recorded individual stood at the shoulder and weighed .
neg_context_en: Elephants are the largest living terrestrial animals. African bush elephants are the largest species, with males typically being tall at the shoulder and while females stand tall at the shoulder with a body mass of . Male Asian elephants are usually about tall at the shoulder and whereas females are tall at the shoulder and . African forest elephants are the smallest species, usually being around tall at the shoulder and . Male African elephants are typically 23% taller than females, whereas male Asian elephants are only around 15% taller than females. The skeleton of the elephant is made up of 326–351 bones. The vertebrae are connected by tight joints, which limit the backbone's flexibility. African elephants have 21 pairs of ribs, while Asian elephants have 19 or 20 pairs.

The African bush elephant is the largest and heaviest land animal on Earth, being up to tall at the shoulder and in weight (a male shot in 1974, near Mucusso, southern Angola). On average, males are about tall at the shoulder and in weight, while females are much smaller at about tall at the shoulder and in weight. Elephants attain their maximum stature when they complete the fusion of long-bone epiphyses, occurring in males around the age of 40 and females around the age of 25. Their large size means that they must consume around 50 gallons of water every day in order to stay hydrated.

A male African forest elephant rarely exceeds 2.5 m (8.2 ft) in height, considerably smaller than the bush species which is usually over 3 m (9.8 ft) and sometimes almost 4 m (13.1 ft) tall. "L. cyclotis" reportedly weighs around , with the largest specimens attaining . Pygmy elephants of the Congo Basin, presumed to be a subgroup of "L. cyclotis", have reportedly weighed as little as as adults.

The African elephant ("Loxodonta africana") is a very large herbivore having thick, almost hairless skin, a long, flexible, prehensile trunk, upper incisors forming long curved tusks of ivory, and large, fan-shaped ears. The two distinct species of African elephant are: African forest elephant ("Loxodonta cyclotis") and the African bush elephant ("Loxodonta africana"). Elephants are difficult to hunt because, despite their large size, they are able to hide in tall grass and are more likely to charge than the other species.

Carthaginian frescoes and coins minted by whoever controlled North Africa at various times show very small elephants, perhaps at the shoulder, with the large ears and concave back typical of modern African elephants. The North African elephant was smaller than the modern African bush elephant ("L. a. africana"), probably similar in size to the modern African forest elephant ("L. cyclotis"). It is also possible that it was more docile and plainer than the African bush elephant, which is generally untamable, allowing the Punics to tame it as a war elephant by a method now lost to history.

African forest elephants travel in smaller groups than other elephant species. A typical group size consists of 2 to 8 individuals. The average family unit is 3 to 5 individuals, usually made up of female relatives. Most family groups are a mother and several of her offspring, or several groups of females and their offspring that interact with one another, especially at forest clearings. Female offspring are philopatric, male offspring disperse at maturity. Unlike African savanna elephants ("Loxodonta africana"), African forest elephants (Loxodonta cyclotis) do not usually interact with other family groups. Male African forest elephants tend to be solitary and only associate with other elephants during the mating season. Males have a dominance hierarchy based on size.

African elephants are highly intelligent, and they have a very large and highly convoluted neocortex, a trait they share with humans, apes and some dolphin species. They are amongst the world's most intelligent species. With a mass of just over 5 kg (11 lb), elephant brains are larger than those of any other land animal, and although the largest whales have body masses twentyfold those of a typical elephant, whale brains are barely twice the mass of an elephant's brain. The elephant's brain is similar to that of humans in terms of structure and complexity. For example, the elephant's cortex has as many neurons as that of a human brain, suggesting convergent evolution.

The bush elephant is much larger in height and weight than the forest elephant, while the forest elephant has rounder ears and a trunk that tends to be more hairy. The adult bush elephant has no predators other than humans. While the most numerous of the three extant elephant species, its population continues to decline due to poaching for ivory and destruction of habitat. Elephants are social animals, traveling in herds of females and adolescents, while adult males usually live alone. The desert elephant or desert-adapted elephant is not a distinct species of elephant, but are African bush elephants that live in the Namib and Sahara deserts.

In 2011, the Cleveland Metroparks Zoo opened its newest exhibit, African Elephant Crossing. At a total cost of $25 million, the state of the art habitat quadrupled the elephants' living space, allowing the zoo to increase its number of African elephants from three, to a herd of eight to ten. The exhibit features two large ranges—the Savanna and the Mopani—spread out over several acres. The ranges include deep ponds so that the elephants can swim, as well as expanded sleeping quarters. Areas of the ranges are also heated to maximize the elephants' habitat during the winter months. Periodically throughout the day, the elephants are shepherded across the pathway between the ranges, allowing visitors an up-close view of the animals. In addition to expanding the number of African elephants, the African Elephant Crossing exhibit introduced meerkats, naked mole rats, an African rock python and several species of birds.
question_src: Je! Tembo wa Kiafrika ana urefu gani?
pos_context_src: Aina moja ya tembo wa Kiafrika, tembo wa kichaka, ndiye mnyama mkubwa zaidi wa ulimwengu, wakati tembo wa msitu ndiye wa tatu kwa ukubwa. Miili yao nene hukaa kwenye miguu ya hisa, na wanayo migongo ya concave. Masikio yao makubwa huwezesha upotezaji wa joto. Mdomo wa juu na pua huunda shina. Shina hufanya kama kiungo cha tano, amplifier ya sauti, na njia muhimu ya kugusa. Vigogo vya tembo wa Kiafrika huisha katika midomo miwili inayopingana, wakati shina la tembo wa Asia linaisha kwenye mdomo mmoja. Katika "L. Africana", wanaume husimama mrefu begani na uzani, wakati wanawake wanasimama mrefu na uzani; "L. cyclotis" ni ndogo na urefu wa bega la kiume hadi. Mtu mkubwa aliyerekodiwa alisimama begani na uzani. Mtu mrefu zaidi aliyerekodiwa alisimama begani na uzani.
neg_context_src: Tembo ndio wanyama wakubwa wa ulimwengu. Tembo wa kichaka wa Kiafrika ndio spishi kubwa zaidi, na wanaume kawaida huwa mrefu begani na wakati wanawake wanasimama mrefu begani na mwili wa mwili wa. Tembo wa kiume wa Asia kawaida huwa mrefu juu ya bega na wakati wanawake ni mrefu begani na. Tembo wa misitu ya Kiafrika ndio spishi ndogo kabisa, kawaida kuwa karibu na mrefu begani na. Tembo wa kiume wa Kiafrika kawaida ni 23% mrefu kuliko wanawake, wakati tembo wa kiume wa Asia ni karibu 15% kuliko wanawake. Mifupa ya tembo imeundwa na mifupa 326-351. Vertebrae imeunganishwa na viungo vikali, ambavyo hupunguza kubadilika kwa mgongo. Tembo za Kiafrika zina jozi 21 za mbavu, wakati tembo wa Asia wana jozi 19 au 20.

Tembo wa kichaka wa Kiafrika ndiye mnyama mkubwa na mzito zaidi duniani, akiwa mrefu juu ya bega na kwa uzito (risasi ya kiume mnamo 1974, karibu na Mucusso, Angola ya kusini). Kwa wastani, wanaume ni mrefu kwa bega na kwa uzito, wakati wanawake ni ndogo sana kwa urefu wa bega na kwa uzito. Tembo hupata kiwango chao cha juu wakati wanakamilisha ujumuishaji wa epiphyses ya muda mrefu, inayotokea kwa wanaume karibu na umri wa miaka 40 na wanawake karibu na umri wa miaka 25. Saizi yao kubwa inamaanisha kuwa lazima wachukue galoni 50 za maji kila siku ili kukaa maji.

Tembo wa kiume wa Kiafrika wa Kiafrika mara chache huzidi 2.5 m (8.2 ft) kwa urefu, ndogo sana kuliko spishi za kichaka ambazo kawaida ni zaidi ya 3 m (9.8 ft) na wakati mwingine karibu 4 m (13.1 ft) mrefu. "L. cyclotis" inaripotiwa uzani karibu, na vielelezo vikubwa zaidi vinavyopatikana. Tembo za Pygmy za Bonde la Kongo, lililodhaniwa kuwa kikundi kidogo cha "L. cyclotis", wameripotiwa uzani kidogo kama watu wazima.

Tembo wa Kiafrika ("Loxodonta africana") ni mimea kubwa sana yenye ngozi nene, isiyo na nywele, shina refu, lenye kubadilika, la prehensile, incisors za juu zinazounda tusks ndefu za pembe za ndovu, na masikio makubwa, yenye umbo la shabiki. Aina mbili tofauti za tembo wa Kiafrika ni: tembo wa msitu wa Kiafrika ("loxodonta cyclotis") na tembo wa kichaka wa Kiafrika ("Loxodonta africana"). Tembo ni ngumu kuwinda kwa sababu, licha ya saizi yao kubwa, wana uwezo wa kujificha kwenye nyasi refu na wana uwezekano mkubwa wa kushtaki kuliko spishi zingine.

Frescoes za Carthaginian na sarafu zilizoandaliwa na mtu yeyote aliyedhibiti Afrika Kaskazini kwa nyakati tofauti zinaonyesha tembo mdogo sana, labda begani, na masikio makubwa na kushinikiza kawaida ya tembo wa kisasa wa Kiafrika. Tembo wa Afrika Kaskazini alikuwa mdogo kuliko tembo wa kisasa wa kichaka wa Kiafrika ("L. a. Africana"), labda sawa kwa ukubwa wa tembo wa kisasa wa msitu wa Kiafrika ("L. cyclotis"). Inawezekana pia kwamba ilikuwa ya busara zaidi na wazi kuliko tembo wa Kiafrika, ambayo kwa ujumla haiwezekani, ikiruhusu punics kuituliza kama tembo wa vita na njia ambayo sasa imepotea kwa historia.

Tembo za msitu wa Kiafrika husafiri katika vikundi vidogo kuliko spishi zingine za tembo. Saizi ya kawaida ya kikundi ina watu 2 hadi 8. Kitengo cha wastani cha familia ni watu 3 hadi 5, kawaida hufanywa na jamaa wa kike. Vikundi vingi vya familia ni mama na watoto wake kadhaa, au vikundi kadhaa vya wanawake na uzao wao ambao huingiliana, haswa kwenye misitu ya misitu. Watoto wa kike ni philopatric, watoto wa kiume hutawanyika katika ukomavu. Tofauti na tembo wa savanna wa Kiafrika ("Loxodonta africana"), tembo wa misitu ya Kiafrika (loxodonta cyclotis) kawaida hawaingiliani na vikundi vingine vya familia. Tembo wa misitu ya Kiafrika huwa huwa peke yao na hushirikiana tu na tembo wengine wakati wa msimu wa kuoana. Wanaume wana uongozi wa kutawala kulingana na saizi.

Tembo wa Kiafrika ni wenye akili sana, na wana neocortex kubwa sana na iliyoshawishiwa sana, tabia wanayoshiriki na wanadamu, nyani na spishi zingine za dolphin. Ni kati ya spishi zenye akili zaidi ulimwenguni. Pamoja na wingi wa zaidi ya kilo 5 (lb 11), akili za tembo ni kubwa kuliko ile ya mnyama mwingine yeyote wa ardhi, na ingawa nyangumi kubwa huwa na mwili wa watu ishirini na wale wa tembo wa kawaida, akili za nyangumi ni mara mbili ya wingi wa ubongo wa tembo. Ubongo wa tembo ni sawa na ile ya wanadamu katika suala la muundo na ugumu. Kwa mfano, cortex ya tembo ina neurons nyingi kama ile ya ubongo wa mwanadamu, na kupendekeza uvumbuzi wa waongofu.

Tembo ya kichaka ni kubwa zaidi kwa urefu na uzito kuliko tembo wa msitu, wakati tembo wa msitu una masikio ya pande zote na shina ambalo huelekea kuwa na nywele zaidi. Tembo ya Bush ya watu wazima haina wanyama wanaokula wanyama wengine isipokuwa wanadamu. Wakati idadi kubwa zaidi ya aina tatu za tembo, idadi ya watu inaendelea kupungua kwa sababu ya ujangili wa pembe za ndovu na uharibifu wa makazi. Tembo ni wanyama wa kijamii, wanaosafiri katika kundi la wanawake na vijana, wakati wanaume wazima kawaida hukaa peke yao. Tembo wa jangwa au tembo aliyebadilishwa jangwa sio aina tofauti ya tembo, lakini ni tembo wa kichaka wa Kiafrika ambao wanaishi katika jangwa la Namib na Sahara.

Mnamo mwaka wa 2011, Cleveland Metropark Zoo ilifungua maonyesho yake mapya zaidi, Tembo wa Tembo wa Kiafrika. Kwa gharama ya jumla ya dola milioni 25, hali ya makazi ya sanaa ilizidisha nafasi ya kuishi ya tembo, ikiruhusu zoo kuongeza idadi yake ya tembo wa Kiafrika kutoka tatu, hadi kundi la wanane hadi kumi. Maonyesho hayo yana safu mbili kubwa - Savanna na Mopani - huenea zaidi ya ekari kadhaa. Masafa ni pamoja na mabwawa ya kina ili tembo waweze kuogelea, na vile vile vyumba vya kulala vilivyopanuliwa. Sehemu za safu pia zina moto ili kuongeza makazi ya tembo wakati wa miezi ya msimu wa baridi. Mara kwa mara siku nzima, tembo hushonwa katika njia kati ya safu, ikiruhusu wageni mtazamo wa karibu wa wanyama. Mbali na kupanua idadi ya tembo wa Kiafrika, maonyesho ya kuvuka tembo wa Kiafrika yalileta meerkats, panya za uchi, mwamba wa mwamba wa Kiafrika na aina kadhaa za ndege.
report_src: Kwa mujibu wa hati, tembo wa Kiafrika wa kichaka (Loxodonta africana) wanaelezwa kuwa mnyama mkubwa zaidi duniani na wanaume “husimama mrefu begani,” huku tembo wa msitu (Loxodonta cyclotis) wakiwa wadogo zaidi, lakini kumbukumbu hiyo haijataja kwa namba kamili urefu wa bega kwa jinsia yoyote wala urefu wa rekodi za tembo mkubwa au mrefu zaidi; hivyo, nyaraka zilizopo hazitoi takwimu sahihi za sentimita au mita kuhusu kimo cha tembo wa Kiafrika [1].

question_en: When did Andrew Lloyd Weber write Cats?
pos_context_en: Lloyd Webber embarked on his next project without a lyricist, turning instead to the poetry of T. S. Eliot. "Cats" (1981) was to become the longest running musical in London, where it ran for 21 years before closing. On Broadway, "Cats" ran for 18 years, a record which would ultimately be broken by another Lloyd Webber musical, "The Phantom of the Opera".
neg_context_title_en: Old Possum's Book of Practical Cats
neg_context_en: Cats is a 1998 direct-to-video musical film based on the stage musical "Cats" by Andrew Lloyd Webber, itself based on the novel "Old Possum's Book of Practical Cats" by T. S. Eliot. Lloyd Webber himself personally oversaw orchestration for the film and called on Gillian Lynne, the original show's choreographer, to personally train the cast for the film. Trevor Nunn, the original director, did not serve as the director of this production.

Lloyd Webber started writing his own music at a young age, a suite of six pieces at the age of nine. He also put on "productions" with Julian and his Aunt Viola in his toy theatre (which he built at Viola's suggestion). His aunt Viola, an actress, took him to see many of her shows and through the stage door into the world of the theatre. He also had originally set music to "Old Possum's Book of Practical Cats" at the age of 15.

The best-known musical adaptation of the poems is Andrew Lloyd Webber's musical "Cats", which was premiered in the West End of London in 1981 and on Broadway in 1982. It became the longest-running Broadway show in history until it was overtaken by another musical by Lloyd Webber, "The Phantom of the Opera", and then by "Chicago". As well as the characters found in the book, "Cats" introduces several additional characters from Eliot's unpublished drafts, most notably Grizabella. A film adaptation of "Cats" is due for release on December 20, 2019.

In 1981, he produced Andrew Lloyd Webber's "Cats", then considered an unlikely subject for a musical. It became the hit of the season and went on to become one of the longest running musicals on both sides of the Atlantic. After the success of "Cats", he approached the French writing team Claude-Michel Schönberg and Alain Boublil about bringing their musical "Les Misérables" (then a successful French concept album) to the London stage. The musical opened in 1985 at the Barbican before transferring to the Palace Theatre. "Les Misérables" had a shaky start at the box office and a lukewarm critical reception before becoming a massive hit, largely by word-of-mouth.

The lyric, written by "Cats" director Trevor Nunn, was loosely based on T. S. Eliot's poems "Preludes" and 
"Rhapsody on a Windy Night"." Andrew Lloyd Webber's former writing partner Tim Rice and contemporary collaborator Don Black submitted a lyric to the show's producers for consideration, although Nunn's version was favoured. Elaine Paige has said that she sang a different lyric to the tune of "Memory" for the first ten previews of "Cats".

In 1998, Lloyd Webber released a film version of "Cats", which was filmed at the Adelphi Theatre in London. David Mallet directed the film, and Gillian Lynne choreographed it. The cast consisted of performers who had been in the show before, including Ken Page (the original Old Deuteronomy on Broadway), Elaine Paige (original Grizabella in London) and Sir John Mills as Gus: the Theatre Cat.

It was announced on 27 June 2014 that "Cats" will be returning to London from December 2014 for a 12-week run at the London Palladium following the UK national tour with the original creative team featuring direction from Trevor Nunn, choreography by Gillian Lynne and design by John Napier. The run was later extended through April 2015. Along with this Andrew Lloyd Webber would be rewriting a number of songs from the musical. Speaking on the revival, Lloyd Webber himself said, "we wanted to do Cats again ourselves, then the Palladium came up and Trevor fell in love with it. We’re taking the Cats show that’s touring and working on it afresh." The musical returned to the London Palladium for a run lasting from 23 October 2015 to 2 January 2016 starring Beverley Knight as Grizabella.

Macavity is the only real villain in the musical "Cats" by Andrew Lloyd Webber, who kidnaps Old Deuteronomy, the Jellicle leader, and attempts to abduct Demeter, one of two cats who sings about him. Lloyd Webber noted that "Macavity... is obviously a take-off on Moriarty." The character was originally played by Richard Pettyfer in the original West End production, by Kenneth Ard in the Broadway production, and by Bryn Walters in the "Cats" film production.

Andrew Lloyd Webber, Baron Lloyd-Webber (born 22 March 1948) is an English composer and impresario of musical theatre. Several of his musicals have run for more than a decade both in the West End and on Broadway. He has composed 13 musicals, a song cycle, a set of variations, two film scores, and a Latin Requiem Mass. Several of his songs have been widely recorded and were hits outside of their parent musicals, notably "The Music of the Night" and "All I Ask of You" from "The Phantom of the Opera", "I Don't Know How to Love Him" from "Jesus Christ Superstar", "Don't Cry for Me, Argentina" from "Evita", "Any Dream Will Do" from "Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat" and "Memory" from "Cats". In 2001 "The New York Times" referred to him as "the most commercially successful composer in history". Ranked the "fifth most powerful person in British culture" by "The Daily Telegraph" in 2008, the lyricist Don Black stated "Andrew more or less single-handedly reinvented the musical."
question_src: Je! Andrew Lloyd Weber aliandika lini paka?
pos_context_src: Lloyd Webber alianza mradi wake uliofuata bila mtaalam wa lyricist, akigeukia ushairi wa T. S. Eliot. "Paka" (1981) ilikuwa ya kuwa muziki mrefu zaidi huko London, ambapo iliendesha kwa miaka 21 kabla ya kufunga. Kwenye Broadway, "Paka" iliendesha kwa miaka 18, rekodi ambayo hatimaye ingevunjwa na muziki mwingine wa Lloyd Webber, "Phantom of the Opera".
neg_context_title_src: Kitabu cha zamani cha paka za paka
neg_context_src: Paka ni filamu ya muziki ya moja kwa moja ya 1998 kwa msingi wa muziki wa "Paka" wa hatua ya Andrew Lloyd Webber, yenyewe kwa msingi wa riwaya "Kitabu cha Old Possum cha Paka" na T. S. Eliot. Lloyd Webber mwenyewe alisimamia orchestration ya filamu hiyo na akamwita Gillian Lynne, mwandishi wa asili wa onyesho, kutoa mafunzo ya kibinafsi kwa filamu hiyo. Trevor Nunn, mkurugenzi wa asili, hakufanya kazi kama mkurugenzi wa uzalishaji huu.

Lloyd Webber alianza kuandika muziki wake mwenyewe katika umri mdogo, vipande vya vipande sita akiwa na umri wa miaka tisa. Pia alivaa "uzalishaji" na Julian na shangazi yake Viola katika ukumbi wake wa michezo wa toy (ambayo aliijenga kwa maoni ya Viola). Shangazi yake Viola, mwigizaji, alimchukua kuona maonyesho yake mengi na kupitia mlango wa hatua kwenye ulimwengu wa ukumbi wa michezo. Hapo awali alikuwa ameweka muziki kwa "Kitabu cha Old Possum cha Paka Vitendo" akiwa na umri wa miaka 15.

Marekebisho ya muziki yanayojulikana zaidi ya mashairi hayo ni muziki wa Andrew Lloyd Webber "Cats", ambao ulitangazwa katika West End ya London mnamo 1981 na huko Broadway mnamo 1982. Ikawa onyesho refu zaidi la Broadway katika historia hadi ilipomalizika na muziki mwingine na Lloyd Webber, "Phantom of the Opera". " Pamoja na wahusika wanaopatikana kwenye kitabu, "Paka" huanzisha herufi kadhaa za ziada kutoka kwa rasimu ambazo hazijachapishwa za Eliot, haswa Grizabella. Marekebisho ya filamu ya "paka" ni kwa sababu ya kutolewa mnamo Desemba 20, 2019.

Mnamo 1981, alitengeneza "Paka" za Andrew Lloyd Webber, kisha akazingatia mada isiyowezekana kwa muziki. Ikawa hit ya msimu na kuendelea kuwa moja ya muziki mrefu zaidi kwa pande zote za Atlantiki. Baada ya kufanikiwa kwa "Paka", alikaribia timu ya uandishi wa Ufaransa Claude-Michel Schönberg na Alain Boublil kuhusu kuleta muziki wao "Les Misérables" (kisha albamu ya dhana ya Ufaransa) kwenye hatua ya London. Muziki huo ulifunguliwa mnamo 1985 huko Barbican kabla ya kuhamishiwa kwenye ukumbi wa michezo wa Ikulu. "Les Misérables" ilikuwa na mwanzo mkali katika ofisi ya sanduku na mapokezi muhimu ya vuguvugu kabla ya kuwa hit kubwa, kwa kiasi kikubwa na neno-kinywa.

Lyric, iliyoandikwa na mkurugenzi wa "paka" Trevor Nunn, ilikuwa msingi wa mashairi ya T. S. Eliot "Preludes" na 
"Rhapsody Usiku wa Windy". "Mshirika wa zamani wa uandishi wa Andrew Lloyd Webber, Tim Rice na mshirika wa kisasa Don Black aliwasilisha wimbo kwa wazalishaji wa onyesho hilo kwa kuzingatia, ingawa toleo la Nunn lilipendelea. Elaine Paige alisema kuwa aliimba wimbo tofauti kwa tune ya" Kumbukumbu "kwa Maoni ya Kwanza ya" Pats "."

Mnamo 1998, Lloyd Webber alitoa toleo la filamu la "Paka", ambalo lilitengenezwa katika ukumbi wa michezo wa Adelphi huko London. David Mallet alielekeza filamu hiyo, na Gillian Lynne aliiga. Wahusika walikuwa na watendaji ambao walikuwa kwenye onyesho hapo awali, pamoja na Ken Ukurasa (wa zamani wa Kumbukumbu la zamani kwenye Broadway), Elaine Paige (Grizabella wa asili huko London) na Sir John Mills kama Gus: Theatre Cat.

Ilitangazwa mnamo 27 Juni 2014 kwamba "Paka" zitarudi London kutoka Desemba 2014 kwa wiki 12 katika London Palladium kufuatia Ziara ya Kitaifa ya Uingereza na timu ya ubunifu iliyo na mwelekeo kutoka kwa Trevor Nunn, choreography na Gillian Lynne na Design na John Napier. Run baadaye iliongezwa hadi Aprili 2015. Pamoja na Andrew Lloyd Webber wangekuwa wakiandika tena nyimbo kadhaa kutoka kwa muziki. Akiongea juu ya uamsho, Lloyd Webber mwenyewe alisema, "Tulitaka kufanya paka tena, kisha palladium ikatokea na Trevor aliipenda. Tunachukua paka zinaonyesha kuwa zinatembelea na kufanya kazi tena." Muziki huo ulirudi London Palladium kwa kukimbia kutoka 23 Oktoba 2015 hadi 2 Januari 2016 nyota wa Beverley Knight kama Grizabella.

Macavity ndiye mtu wa pekee katika "paka" za muziki na Andrew Lloyd Webber, ambaye huteka nyara ya zamani ya Kumbukumbu, kiongozi wa Jellicle, na kujaribu kumteka Demeter, mmoja wa paka wawili anayeimba juu yake. Lloyd Webber alibaini kuwa "Macavity ... ni wazi ni kuchukua juu ya Moriarty." Tabia hiyo ilichezwa hapo awali na Richard Pettyfer katika utengenezaji wa asili wa West End, na Kenneth Ard katika utengenezaji wa Broadway, na na Bryn Walters katika utengenezaji wa filamu wa "Paka".

Andrew Lloyd Webber, Baron Lloyd-Webber (amezaliwa 22 Machi 1948) ni mtunzi wa Kiingereza na impresario ya ukumbi wa michezo wa muziki. Muziki wake kadhaa umeendesha kwa zaidi ya muongo mmoja katika West End na kwenye Broadway. Ametengeneza muziki 13, mzunguko wa wimbo, seti ya tofauti, alama mbili za filamu, na misa ya Kilatini. "Evita", "Ndoto yoyote itafanya" kutoka "Joseph na Technicolor Dreamcoat" na "Kumbukumbu" kutoka "Paka". Mnamo 2001 "New York Times" ilimtaja kama "mtunzi aliyefanikiwa zaidi kibiashara katika historia". Alishika nafasi ya "mtu wa tano mwenye nguvu zaidi katika tamaduni ya Uingereza" na "Daily Telegraph" mnamo 2008, mtaalam wa lyricist Don Black alisema "Andrew zaidi au chini ya mkono mmoja alirudisha muziki."
