question_en: When was Louis XIV king?
pos_context_en: Louis XIV (Louis Dieudonné; 5 September 16381 September 1715), known as Louis the Great (') or the Sun King ('), was a monarch of the House of Bourbon who reigned as King of France from 1643 until his death in 1715. Starting on 14 May 1643 when Louis was 4 years old, his reign of 72 years and 110 days is the longest recorded of any monarch of a sovereign country in European history. In the age of absolutism in Europe, Louis XIV's France was a leader in the growing centralisation of power.
neg_context_title_en: The Taking of Power by Louis XIV
neg_context_en: King Louis XIV, son of Louis XIII, was only five years old when his father died. It was 20 years later, in 1661, when Louis XIV commenced his personal reign, that the young king showed interest in Versailles. The idea of leaving Paris, where, as a child, he had experienced first-hand the insurrection of the Fronde, had never left him. Louis XIV commissioned his architect Le Vau and his landscape architect Le Nôtre to transform the castle of his father, as well as the park, in order to accommodate the court. In 1678, after the Treaty of Nijmegen, the king decided that the court and the government would be established permanently in Versailles, which happened on 6 May 1682.

Louis XIV had emerged from the Franco-Dutch War in 1678 as the most powerful monarch in Europe, an absolute ruler who had won numerous military victories. Using a combination of aggression, annexation, and quasilegal means, Louis XIV set about extending his gains to stabilize and strengthen France's frontiers, culminating in the brief War of the Reunions (1683–84). The resulting Truce of Ratisbon guaranteed France's new borders for 20 years, but Louis XIV's subsequent actions – notably his revocation of the Edict of Nantes in 1685 – led to the deterioration of his military and political dominance. Louis XIV's decision to cross the Rhine in September 1688 was designed to extend his influence and pressure the Holy Roman Empire into accepting his territorial and dynastic claims, but when Leopold I and the German princes resolved to resist, and when the States General and William III brought the Dutch and the English into the war against France, the French King at last faced a powerful coalition aimed at curtailing his ambitions.

Louis XIV had emerged from the Franco-Dutch War in 1678 as the most powerful monarch in Europe, an absolute ruler who had won numerous military victories. Using a combination of aggression, annexation, and quasi-legal means, Louis XIV set about extending his gains to stabilize and strengthen France's frontiers, culminating in the brief War of the Reunions (1683–84). The resulting Truce of Ratisbon guaranteed France's new borders for twenty years, but Louis XIV's subsequent actions – notably his revocation of the Edict of Nantes in 1685 – led to the deterioration of his military and political dominance. Louis XIV's decision to cross the Rhine in September 1688 was designed to extend his influence and pressure the Holy Roman Empire into accepting his territorial and dynastic claims. But when Leopold I and the German princes resolved to resist, and when the States General and William III brought the Dutch and the English into the war against France, the French King at last faced a powerful coalition aimed at curtailing his ambitions.

Louis XIV of France had emerged from the Franco-Dutch War in 1678 as the most powerful monarch in Europe, an absolute ruler who had won numerous military victories. Using a combination of aggression, annexation, and quasi-legal means, Louis XIV set about extending his gains to stabilize and strengthen France's frontiers, culminating in the brief War of the Reunions (1683–84). The Truce of Ratisbon guaranteed France's new borders for twenty years, but Louis XIV's subsequent actions—notably his Edict of Fontainebleau (the revocation of the Edict of Nantes) in 1685— led to the deterioration of his military and political dominance. Louis XIV's decision to cross the Rhine in September 1688 was designed to extend his influence and pressure the Holy Roman Empire into accepting his territorial and dynastic claims. Leopold I and the German princes resolved to resist, and when the States General and William III brought the Dutch and the English into the war against France, the French King faced a powerful coalition aimed at curtailing his ambitions.

The main fighting took place around France's borders: in the Spanish Netherlands; the Rhineland; Duchy of Savoy; and Catalonia. The fighting generally favoured Louis XIV's armies, but by 1696 his country was in the grip of an economic crisis. The Maritime Powers (England and the Dutch Republic) were also financially exhausted, and when Savoy defected from the Alliance all parties were keen for a negotiated settlement. By the terms of the Treaty of Ryswick (1697) Louis XIV retained the whole of Alsace, but he was forced to return Lorraine to its ruler and give up any gains on the right bank of the Rhine. Louis XIV also accepted William III as the rightful King of England, while the Dutch acquired their Barrier fortress system in the Spanish Netherlands to help secure their own borders. However, with the ailing and childless Charles II of Spain approaching his end, a new conflict over the inheritance of the Spanish Empire would soon embroil Louis XIV and the Grand Alliance in a final war – the War of the Spanish Succession.

The Taking of Power by Louis XIV (), also called The Rise of Louis XIV, is a French television film by Italian film director Roberto Rossellini. The film revolves around the French king Louis XIV's rise to power after the death of his powerful advisor, Cardinal Mazarin. To achieve this political autonomy, Louis deals with his mother and the court nobles, all of whom makes the assumption that Mazarin's death will give them more power.
Colin McCabe of the University of Pittsburgh praised the film as "the most serious attempt by a great director to film history." In addition to the political story of the king's grasp of power, the "incidental details, it can be argued, form the real subject matter of all of Rossellini's historical films..." McCabe's examples include the doctors’ examination of Mazarin at the beginning of the film and the "extraordinary banquet" that comes close to the end. "We watch the dishes being prepared in a kitchen teeming with cooks, we follow the umpteenth platter as it is formally escorted through the corridors and staircases, until it reaches an enormous table, where the king sits alone, dining in front of his whole court.""The Taking of Power by Louis XIV" received a DVD release by The Criterion Collection in January 2009.

Initially, most of the other powers were willing to accept Anjou's reign as Philip V, but Louis's mishandling of their concerns soon drove the English, Dutch and other powers to join the Austrians in a coalition against France. The War of the Spanish Succession began in 1701 and raged for 12 years. In the end Louis's grandson was recognized as king of Spain, but he was obliged to agree to the forfeiture of succession rights in France, the Spanish Habsburgs' other European territories were largely ceded to Austria, and France was nearly bankrupted by the cost of the struggle. Louis died on 1 September 1715 ending his seventy-two-year reign, the longest in European history.
The reign of Louis XIV was so long that he outlived both his son and eldest grandson. He was succeeded by his great-grandson Louis XV. Louis XV was born on 15 February 1710 and was thus aged only five at his ascension, the third Louis in a row to become king of France before the age of thirteen (Louis XIII became king at 9, Louis XIV at almost 5 and himself at 5). Initially, the regency was held by Philip, Duke of Orléans, Louis XIV's nephew, as nearest adult male to the throne. This "Regence" was seen as a period of greater individual expression, manifested in secular, artistic, literary and colonial activity, in contrast to the austere latter years of Louis XIV's reign.

On 1 September 1715, Louis XIV died, and was to be succeeded by his great-grandson Louis, Duke of Anjou as Louis XV. The little boy was the grandson of Du Maine's late half-brother Louis, Grand Dauphin. The old king's last will and testament gave the regency to both his nephew the duc d'Orléans and the 45 year old duc du Maine. However, the next day, the duc d'Orléans ensured the annulment of Louis XIV's will in the Parlement de Paris.

The Death of Louis XIV () is a 2016 historical drama film written and directed by Albert Serra and starring Jean-Pierre Léaud as King Louis XIV. The film was screened out of competition at the 2016 Cannes Film Festival. It made its North American premiere at the 2016 Toronto International Film Festival and its U.S. premiere at the 54th New York Film Festival."New York Times" critic Manohla Dargis described the film as a "mesmerizing elegy." In "Screen", Allan Hunter called Léaud's performance "easily the actor’s best role and most noteworthy performance in some time." Jonathan Romney, film critic for "Sight & Sound", described "The Death of Louis XIV" as "strange, haunting and perhaps the most beautiful film seen in Cannes in [2016]".
question_src: Louis Xiv King alikuwa lini?
pos_context_src: Louis XIV (Louis Dieudonné; 5 Septemba 16381 Septemba 1715), inayojulikana kama Louis the Great (') au The Sun King ('), alikuwa mfalme wa nyumba ya Bourbon ambaye alitawala kama Mfalme wa Ufaransa kutoka miaka ya 1643 hadi kifo chake mnamo 1715. Kuanzia tarehe 14 Mei 1643 wakati Lous alikuwa na umri wa miaka 11 na miaka ya 7 ya miaka ya 7 na ya miaka 11 ya miaka ya 7 na ya miaka 11. Nchi huru katika historia ya Ulaya. Katika umri wa ukweli huko Uropa, Ufaransa ya Louis XIV ilikuwa kiongozi katika ukuaji wa madaraka.
neg_context_title_src: Kuchukua kwa nguvu na Louis XIV
neg_context_src: Mfalme Louis XIV, mwana wa Louis XIII, alikuwa na umri wa miaka mitano tu wakati baba yake alikufa. Ilikuwa miaka 20 baadaye, mnamo 1661, wakati Louis XIV ilipoanza utawala wake wa kibinafsi, kwamba Mfalme mchanga alionyesha kupendezwa na Versailles. Wazo la kuacha Paris, ambapo, kama mtoto, alikuwa amepata uzoefu wa kwanza wa uchochezi wa Fronde, alikuwa hajawahi kumuacha. Louis XIV aliagiza mbunifu wake Le Vau na mbunifu wake wa mazingira Le Nôtre kubadilisha ngome ya baba yake, na vile vile uwanja huo, ili kubeba korti. Mnamo 1678, baada ya Mkataba wa Nijmegen, Mfalme aliamua kwamba korti na serikali zitaanzishwa kabisa huko Versailles, ambayo ilitokea mnamo 6 Mei 1682.

Louis XIV alikuwa ameibuka kutoka kwa vita vya Franco-Uholanzi mnamo 1678 kama mfalme mwenye nguvu zaidi huko Uropa, mtawala kabisa ambaye alikuwa ameshinda ushindi kadhaa wa kijeshi. Kutumia mchanganyiko wa uchokozi, kiambatisho, na njia za quasilegal, Louis XIV alianza kupanua faida yake ili kuleta utulivu na kuimarisha mipaka ya Ufaransa, na kufikia vita vifupi vya kuungana tena (1683-84). Utapeli uliosababishwa wa Ratisbon ulihakikishia mipaka mpya ya Ufaransa kwa miaka 20, lakini hatua za baadaye za Louis XIV - haswa kufutwa kwake kwa amri ya Nantes mnamo 1685 - ilisababisha kuzorota kwa utawala wake wa kijeshi na kisiasa. Uamuzi wa Louis XIV wa kuvuka Rhine mnamo Septemba 1688 ulibuniwa kupanua ushawishi wake na kushinikiza Dola Takatifu ya Roma ili kukubali madai yake ya eneo na nasaba, lakini wakati Leopold mimi na wakuu wa Ujerumani waliazimia kupinga, na wakati Mkuu wa Merika walipomletea Cort.

Louis XIV alikuwa ameibuka kutoka kwa vita vya Franco-Uholanzi mnamo 1678 kama mfalme mwenye nguvu zaidi huko Uropa, mtawala kabisa ambaye alikuwa ameshinda ushindi kadhaa wa kijeshi. Kutumia mchanganyiko wa uchokozi, kiambatisho, na njia za kisheria, Louis XIV alianza kupanua faida zake ili kuleta utulivu na kuimarisha mipaka ya Ufaransa, ikikamilika katika vita vifupi vya kuungana tena (1683-84). Utapeli uliosababishwa wa Ratisbon ulihakikishia mipaka mpya ya Ufaransa kwa miaka ishirini, lakini hatua za baadaye za Louis XIV - haswa kufutwa kwake kwa amri ya Nantes mnamo 1685 - ilisababisha kuzorota kwa utawala wake wa kijeshi na kisiasa. Uamuzi wa Louis XIV wa kuvuka Rhine mnamo Septemba 1688 ulibuniwa kupanua ushawishi wake na kushinikiza Dola Takatifu ya Roma ili kukubali madai yake ya eneo na nasaba. Lakini wakati Leopold mimi na wakuu wa Ujerumani walipoamua kupinga, na wakati Mataifa Mkuu na William III walileta Uholanzi na Kiingereza katika vita dhidi ya Ufaransa, mfalme huyo wa Ufaransa mwishowe alikabiliwa na umoja wenye nguvu uliolenga kupunguza matarajio yake.

Louis XIV wa Ufaransa alikuwa ameibuka kutoka vita vya Franco-Uholanzi mnamo 1678 kama mfalme mwenye nguvu zaidi huko Uropa, mtawala kabisa ambaye alikuwa ameshinda ushindi kadhaa wa kijeshi. Kutumia mchanganyiko wa uchokozi, kiambatisho, na njia za kisheria, Louis XIV alianza kupanua faida zake ili kuleta utulivu na kuimarisha mipaka ya Ufaransa, ikikamilika katika vita vifupi vya kuungana tena (1683-84). Utapeli wa Ratisbon ulihakikishia mipaka mpya ya Ufaransa kwa miaka ishirini, lakini hatua za baadaye za Louis XIV - haswa amri yake ya Fontainebleau (kufutwa kwa amri ya Nantes) mnamo 1685 - ilisababisha kuzorota kwa nguvu yake ya kijeshi na kisiasa. Uamuzi wa Louis XIV wa kuvuka Rhine mnamo Septemba 1688 ulibuniwa kupanua ushawishi wake na kushinikiza Dola Takatifu ya Roma ili kukubali madai yake ya eneo na nasaba. Leopold mimi na wakuu wa Ujerumani waliamua kupinga, na wakati Mataifa Mkuu na William III walileta Uholanzi na Kiingereza katika vita dhidi ya Ufaransa, mfalme huyo wa Ufaransa alikabiliwa na muungano wenye nguvu uliolenga kupunguza matarajio yake.

Mapigano makuu yalifanyika karibu na mipaka ya Ufaransa: katika Uholanzi wa Uhispania; Rhineland; Duchy wa Savoy; na Catalonia. Mapigano hayo kwa ujumla yalipendelea vikosi vya Louis XIV, lakini kufikia 1696 nchi yake ilikuwa katika mzozo wa kiuchumi. Nguvu za Maritime (England na Jamhuri ya Uholanzi) pia zilikuwa zimechoka kifedha, na wakati Savoy alipofaulu kutoka kwa Alliance pande zote zilikuwa na hamu ya kujadiliwa. Kwa masharti ya Mkataba wa Ryswick (1697) Louis XIV alihifadhi Alsace yote, lakini alilazimika kumrudisha Lorraine kwa mtawala wake na kutoa faida yoyote kwenye benki ya kulia ya Rhine. Louis XIV pia alikubali William III kama mfalme anayefaa wa England, wakati Uholanzi walipata mfumo wao wa ngome ya kizuizi katika Uholanzi wa Uhispania kusaidia kupata mipaka yao wenyewe. Walakini, na Charles II anayeugua na asiye na mtoto wa Uhispania akikaribia mwisho wake, mzozo mpya juu ya urithi wa Dola ya Uhispania hivi karibuni ungeingiza Louis XIV na Alliance Grand katika vita vya mwisho - vita vya mfululizo wa Uhispania.

Kuchukua madaraka na Louis XIV (), pia inaitwa Rise of Louis XIV, ni filamu ya runinga ya Ufaransa na mkurugenzi wa filamu wa Italia Roberto Rossellini. Filamu hiyo inazunguka juu ya nguvu ya mfalme wa Ufaransa Louis XIV baada ya kifo cha mshauri wake mwenye nguvu, Kardinali Mazarin. Ili kufikia uhuru huu wa kisiasa, Louis anashughulika na mama yake na wakuu wa korti, ambao wote hufanya dhana kwamba kifo cha Mazarin kitawapa nguvu zaidi.
Colin McCabe wa Chuo Kikuu cha Pittsburgh alisifu filamu hiyo kama "jaribio kubwa zaidi na mkurugenzi mkubwa kwa historia ya filamu." Mbali na hadithi ya kisiasa ya ufahamu wa mfalme wa nguvu, "maelezo ya bahati mbaya, inaweza kusemwa, kuunda mada halisi ya filamu zote za kihistoria za Rossellini ..." Mifano ya McCabe ni pamoja na uchunguzi wa madaktari wa Mazarin mwanzoni mwa filamu na "karamu ya ajabu" ambayo inakaribia mwisho. "Tunatazama sahani zikiwa tayari katika jikoni iliyojaa na wapishi, tunafuata sahani ya kumi na mbili kwani inasafirishwa rasmi kupitia barabara na ngazi, hadi itakapofikia meza kubwa, ambapo Mfalme anakaa peke yake, akila mbele ya korti yake yote." "Kuchukua kwa nguvu na Louis Xiv" alipokea Dvd kutolewa kwa Januari 200.

Hapo awali, nguvu zingine nyingi zilikuwa tayari kukubali utawala wa Anjou kama Philip V, lakini Louis akizingatia wasiwasi wao hivi karibuni kulisababisha Kiingereza, Uholanzi na nguvu zingine kuungana na Waustria katika umoja dhidi ya Ufaransa. Vita vya mfululizo wa Uhispania vilianza mnamo 1701 na kukasirika kwa miaka 12. Mwishowe mjukuu wa Louis alitambuliwa kama Mfalme wa Uhispania, lakini alilazimika kukubaliana na upotezaji wa haki za mfululizo nchini Ufaransa, maeneo mengine ya Uhispania ya Habsburgs yalipelekwa kwa Austria, na Ufaransa ilifilisika na gharama ya mapambano. Louis alikufa mnamo 1 Septemba 1715 akimaliza utawala wake wa miaka sabini na mbili, mrefu zaidi katika historia ya Ulaya.
Utawala wa Louis XIV ulikuwa mrefu sana hivi kwamba aliishi mtoto wake na mjukuu mkubwa. Alifanikiwa na mjukuu wake Louis XV. Louis XV alizaliwa mnamo 15 Februari 1710 na kwa hivyo alikuwa na umri wa miaka mitano tu kwa kupaa kwake, Louis wa tatu mfululizo ili kuwa Mfalme wa Ufaransa kabla ya umri wa miaka kumi na tatu (Louis XIII alikua mfalme saa 9, Louis XIV karibu 5 na yeye mwenyewe akiwa na miaka 5). Hapo awali, Regency ilishikiliwa na Filipo, Duke wa Orléans, mpwa wa Louis XIV, kama mtu mzima wa karibu wa kiti cha enzi. "Regence" hii ilionekana kama kipindi cha kujieleza zaidi ya mtu binafsi, iliyoonyeshwa katika shughuli za kidunia, kisanii, fasihi na kikoloni, tofauti na miaka ya mwisho ya utawala wa Louis XIV.

Mnamo 1 Septemba 1715, Louis XIV alikufa, na alifanikiwa na mjukuu wake Louis, Duke wa Anjou kama Louis XV. Kijana mdogo alikuwa mjukuu wa kaka wa marehemu wa du Maine Louis, Grand Dauphin. Mapenzi ya zamani ya Mfalme na Agano la zamani alimpa mpwa wake wote Duc d'Orléans na yule mwenye umri wa miaka 45 Duc du Maine. Walakini, siku iliyofuata, Duc d'Orléans alihakikisha kufutwa kwa mapenzi ya Louis XIV katika Parleme de Paris.

Kifo cha Louis XIV () ni filamu ya kihistoria ya kihistoria ya 2016 iliyoandikwa na kuongozwa na Albert Serra na nyota Jean-Pierre Léaud kama Mfalme Louis XIV. Filamu hiyo ilionyeshwa nje ya mashindano katika Tamasha la Filamu la Cannes la 2016. Ilifanya mkutano wake wa Amerika Kaskazini katika Tamasha la Filamu la Kimataifa la Toronto la 2016 na mkutano wake wa Merika katika Tamasha la Filamu la 54 la New York. "New York Times" mkosoaji Manohla Dargis alielezea filamu hiyo kama "Mesmerizing Elegy." Katika "Screen", Allan Hunter aliita utendaji wa Léaud "kwa urahisi jukumu bora la muigizaji na utendaji muhimu zaidi kwa wakati fulani." Jonathan Romney, mkosoaji wa filamu wa "Sight & Sauti", alielezea "Kifo cha Louis XIV" kama "cha kushangaza, cha kusumbua na labda filamu nzuri zaidi inayoonekana huko Cannes mnamo [2016]".
report_src: Louis XIV alitawala kama Mfalme wa Ufaransa kuanzia 14 Mei 1643, aliporithi kiti cha enzi akiwa na umri wa miaka minne, hadi kifo chake mnamo 1 Septemba 1715, hivyo kutawala kwa miaka 72 mfululizo—utawala mrefu zaidi kwa mfalme yeyote katika historia ya Ulaya huru [1].
all_claims: Louis XIV alitawala kama Mfalme wa Ufaransa kuanzia 14 Mei 1643, aliporithi kiti cha enzi akiwa na umri wa miaka minne, hadi kifo chake mnamo 1 Septemba 1715, hivyo kutawala kwa miaka 72 mfululizo—utawala mrefu zaidi kwa mfalme yeyote katika historia ya Ulaya huru [1].

question_en: Does Mike O'Malley have a wife?
pos_context_en: O'Malley resides in Los Angeles with his wife Lisa. They have three children: Fiona, Seamus and Declan.
neg_context_en: A long time fan of Boston band Buffalo Tom, O'Malley is a close friend of lead singer Bill Janovitz. They have often supported causes together. O'Malley requested that the band create a title song for his own short-lived television show "The Mike O'Malley Show", as well as for the sitcom "Yes, Dear" which he co-starred on. According to O'Malley, his love of the band was shared with his wife and was "the glue" that kept them together during their long distance relationship.

In 2008, O'Malley became the spokesman for Time Warner Cable's digital cable. In 2009, O'Malley began playing the recurring character, Burt Hummel, the father of a gay student, on "Glee". It is a role which has pleasantly surprised him and lead to "Entertainment Weekly"'s Tim Stack to say, "If Mike O'Malley doesn't win an Emmy for playing Burt Hummel, I will be sorely disappointed." Chris Colfer, who plays Burt's son Kurt, has credited his off-screen relationship with O'Malley with improving the quality of their scenes together.

Patrick O'Malley is a '68 graduate of Marist High School. O'Malley has a bachelor's degree in economics and a master's degree in finance from Purdue University, as well as a Juris Doctor from John Marshall Law School. O'Malley currently resides in Palos Park, Illinois with his wife Mary Judith, they have two adult children; Brigid and Patrick. His uncle-in-law is former congressman Morgan Murphy.

O'Malley married schoolteacher Joyce Ervin on August 3, 1960. The couple lived in Conyers, Georgia and had three children named Karen, Joseph II and Mike. O'Malley began working at General Wholesale Company in 1970 and retired from the company in 1994. O'Malley was a member of the Holy Spirit Catholic Church in Conyers. After death, he was diagnosed with chronic traumatic encephalopathy.

O'Malley met his wife, the former Catherine "Katie" Curran, in 1986 while they were both in law school. At the time, he was working on Barbara Mikulski's U.S. Senate campaign and she was working on her father J. Joseph Curran, Jr.'s campaign for Attorney General of Maryland. They were married in 1990 and are the parents of four children, Grace, Tara, William and Jack. Before the 2006 election, O'Malley's father-in-law, Joseph Curran, citing his age and his long career, decided not to seek re-election for attorney general, preventing any conflict of interest that might arise in having O'Malley as governor. O'Malley is a Roman Catholic, who was educated in Catholic schools and was described by "The Washington Post" in 2015 as "a pray-every-morning, church-every-Sunday believer." He often travels to the West of Ireland and NUI Galway awarded him an honorary degree in 2008.

Beginning in 2010, O'Malley portrayed a recurring character on "Parenthood". He also hosted "The World's Funniest Office Commercials" in 2010. On July 8, 2010, O'Malley received a nomination for the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Guest Actor – Comedy Series for playing Burt Hummel on "Glee". Prior to its second season, O'Malley was made a series regular on "Glee". On August 8, 2010, O'Malley won the Teen Choice Award for Best Parental Unit. He returned to recurring guest star status for the show's third season.

O'Malley married Dr Hilda Moriarty (1922–1991) in August 1947. The couple had two children: the well-known Irish actor Daragh O'Malley, and Suzanne, a fashion designer. O'Malley's wife is famous as Patrick Kavanagh's ideal love in the poem "On Raglan Road".

Catherine "Katie" Curran O'Malley (born August 18, 1962) is a Baltimore City District Court judge and wife of Martin O'Malley, the former Governor of Maryland and Mayor of Baltimore, and 2016 presidential candidate.

O'Malley moves in with new intern Lexie Grey (Chyler Leigh), Meredith's half-sister. Lexie and O'Malley discover that he only failed his exam by a single point, leading him to confront Richard Webber (James Pickens, Jr.), the chief of surgery, to ask for a chance to retake the exam. He passes the second attempt, and begins to distance himself from Lexie, who has fallen in love with him. O'Malley supports Stevens when she discovers she has melanoma, and walks her down the aisle as she marries Karev. O'Malley begins to display a talent for trauma surgery, and is told by the chief of trauma surgery Owen Hunt (Kevin McKidd) that it is definitely his specialty. He then abruptly and inexplicably decides to join the U.S. Army. While his friends at the hospital prepare an intervention to convince O'Malley to stay, they all work on a severely disfigured John Doe, brought in after a horrible bus accident, in which he pushed a woman out of the way and saved her life. John Doe writes on Meredith's hand "007" and she realizes it is actually George. She runs to tell the other surgeons and they rush him to surgery. However, he flatlines and is ultimately declared braindead. There is confusion on if John Doe is really George and Callie confirms by a freckle on his hand. His organs are donated after Stevens confirms that is what O'Malley would have wanted, and he is buried a week later.
question_src: Je! Mike O'Malley ana mke?
pos_context_src: O'Malley anakaa Los Angeles na mkewe Lisa. Wana watoto watatu: Fiona, Seamus na Declan.
neg_context_src: Shabiki wa muda mrefu wa bendi ya Boston Buffalo Tom, O'Malley ni rafiki wa karibu wa mwimbaji anayeongoza Bill Janovitz. Mara nyingi wameunga mkono sababu pamoja. O'Malley aliomba bendi hiyo kuunda wimbo wa kichwa kwa kipindi chake cha muda mfupi cha runinga "The Mike O'Malley Show", na pia kwa sitcom "Ndio, Mpendwa" ambayo aliunganisha. Kulingana na O'Malley, upendo wake wa bendi hiyo ulishirikiwa na mkewe na ulikuwa "gundi" ambayo iliwaweka pamoja wakati wa uhusiano wao wa umbali mrefu.

Mnamo 2008, O'Malley alikua msemaji wa kebo ya dijiti ya Time Warner Cable. Mnamo 2009, O'Malley alianza kucheza tabia ya kurudia, Burt Hummel, baba wa mwanafunzi wa mashoga, kwenye "Glee". Ni jukumu ambalo limemshangaza sana na kusababisha "Burudani ya kila wiki" Tim Stack kusema, "ikiwa Mike O'Malley hatashinda Emmy kwa kucheza Burt Hummel, nitasikitishwa sana." Chris Colfer, ambaye anacheza mtoto wa Burt Kurt, ametoa sifa yake ya uhusiano wa skrini na O'Malley na kuboresha ubora wa picha zao pamoja.

Patrick O'Malley ni mhitimu wa '68 wa Shule ya Upili ya Marist. O'Malley ana digrii ya bachelor katika uchumi na digrii ya uzamili katika Chuo Kikuu cha Purdue, na pia daktari wa Juris kutoka Shule ya Sheria ya John Marshall. O'Malley kwa sasa anakaa Palos Park, Illinois na mkewe Mary Judith, wana watoto wawili wazima; Brigid na Patrick. Mjomba wake ni mjomba wa zamani wa Congress Morgan Murphy.

O'Malley alioa mwalimu wa shule ya Joyce Ervin mnamo Agosti 3, 1960. Wanandoa hao waliishi Conyers, Georgia na walikuwa na watoto watatu walioitwa Karen, Joseph II na Mike. O'Malley alianza kufanya kazi katika Kampuni ya jumla ya jumla mnamo 1970 na kustaafu kutoka kampuni hiyo mnamo 1994. O'Malley alikuwa mshiriki wa Kanisa la Mtakatifu Roho Katoliki huko Conyers. Baada ya kifo, aligunduliwa na ugonjwa sugu wa kiwewe.

O'Malley alikutana na mkewe, Catherine "Katie" Curran wa zamani, mnamo 1986 wakati wote walikuwa katika shule ya sheria. Wakati huo, alikuwa akifanya kazi kwenye kampeni ya Seneti ya Barbara Mikulski na alikuwa akifanya kazi kwa baba yake J. Joseph Curran, kampeni ya Jr. ya Mwanasheria Mkuu wa Maryland. Waliolewa mnamo 1990 na ni wazazi wa watoto wanne, Neema, Tara, William na Jack. Kabla ya uchaguzi wa 2006, baba mkwe wa O'Malley, Joseph Curran, akitoa mfano wa umri wake na kazi yake ya muda mrefu, aliamua kutotafuta kuchaguliwa tena kwa Mwanasheria Mkuu, kuzuia mgongano wowote wa riba ambao unaweza kutokea kwa kuwa O'Malley kama Gavana. O'Malley ni Mkatoliki wa Roma, ambaye alikuwa ameelimishwa katika shule za Katoliki na alielezewa na "The Washington Post" mnamo 2015 kama "muumini wa kusali-kila-asubuhi, kila siku-Jumapili." Mara nyingi yeye husafiri kwenda Magharibi mwa Ireland na Nui Galway walimpa digrii ya heshima mnamo 2008.

Kuanzia mwaka 2010, O'Malley alionyesha tabia ya mara kwa mara kwenye "Uzazi". Alishiriki pia "matangazo ya ofisi ya kufurahisha zaidi ulimwenguni" mnamo 2010. Mnamo Julai 8, 2010, O'Malley alipokea uteuzi wa Tuzo la Primetime Emmy kwa Mtaalam Bora wa Mgeni - Mfululizo wa Vichekesho wa kucheza Burt Hummel kwenye "Glee". Kabla ya msimu wake wa pili, O'Malley alifanywa mfululizo mara kwa mara kwenye "Glee". Mnamo Agosti 8, 2010, O'Malley alishinda Tuzo la Chaguo la Vijana kwa Kitengo Bora cha Wazazi. Alirudi kwenye hali ya nyota ya mgeni mara kwa mara kwa msimu wa tatu wa onyesho.

O'Malley alioa Dr Hilda Moriarty (1922-1991) mnamo Agosti 1947. Wanandoa hao walikuwa na watoto wawili: muigizaji anayejulikana wa Ireland Daragh O'Malley, na Suzanne, mbuni wa mitindo. Mke wa O'Malley ni maarufu kama upendo bora wa Patrick Kavanagh katika shairi "kwenye Barabara ya Raglan".

Catherine "Katie" Curran O'Malley (amezaliwa Agosti 18, 1962) ni jaji wa Mahakama ya Wilaya ya Baltimore na mke wa Martin O'Malley, Gavana wa zamani wa Maryland na Meya wa Baltimore, na mgombea wa urais wa 2016.

O'Malley anaingia na New Intern Lexie Grey (Chyler Leigh), dada wa Meredith. Lexie na O'Malley hugundua kuwa alishindwa tu mitihani yake kwa nukta moja, na kumpeleka akabiliane na Richard Webber (James Pickens, Jr.), mkuu wa upasuaji, ili aombe nafasi ya kuchukua mitihani. Yeye hupitisha jaribio la pili, na anaanza kujitenga na Lexie, ambaye amempenda. O'Malley anaunga mkono Stevens wakati anagundua ana melanoma, na anamtembea chini ya njia wakati anaoa Karev. O'Malley anaanza kuonyesha talanta ya upasuaji wa kiwewe, na anaambiwa na mkuu wa upasuaji wa kiwewe Owen Hunt (Kevin McKidd) kwamba hakika ni utaalam wake. Kisha yeye ghafla na bila kuamua kuamua kujiunga na Jeshi la Merika. Wakati marafiki zake hospitalini huandaa kuingilia kati ili kumshawishi O'Malley kukaa, wote wanafanya kazi kwa John Doe aliyeharibiwa vibaya, akaletwa baada ya ajali mbaya ya basi, ambayo alisukuma mwanamke kutoka njiani na kuokoa maisha yake. John Doe anaandika kwenye mkono wa Meredith "007" na anatambua kuwa ni George. Yeye hukimbia kuwaambia waganga wengine na wanamkimbilia kwa upasuaji. Walakini, yeye hua na hatimaye hutangazwa Braindead. Kuna machafuko ikiwa John Doe ni kweli George na Callie anathibitisha kwa mkono wake. Viungo vyake hutolewa baada ya Stevens kuthibitisha kwamba ndivyo O'Malley angetaka, na amezikwa wiki moja baadaye.
report_src: Ndiyo, Mike O’Malley ameoa; mke wake anaitwa Lisa, wanaishi Los Angeles na wamebarikiwa na watoto watatu—Fiona, Seamus na Declan [1].
all_claims: Ndiyo, Mike O’Malley ameoa; mke wake anaitwa Lisa, wanaishi Los Angeles na wamebarikiwa na watoto watatu—Fiona, Seamus na Declan [1].

question_en: Where was Donald Malcolm Campbell born?
pos_context_en: Donald Campbell was born at Canbury House, Kingston upon Thames, Surrey, the son of Malcolm, later Sir Malcolm Campbell, holder of 13 world speed records in the 1920s and 1930s in the "Bluebird" cars and boats, and his second wife, Dorothy Evelyn Whittall.
neg_context_en: Campbell was born on 4 May 1800 in Argyllshire, Scotland, the oldest child of the Rev. Donald Campbell. His mother died when Campbell was only 6, in 1806. Educated chiefly at home by his father, Campbell was already a good Latin scholar when he went to the University of Glasgow in 1811. Finishing his course in 1817, he became a student at the Divinity Hall, where he gained some reputation as a Hebraist.

Campbell was born in 1916, and completed his undergraduate education in psychology at the University of California, Berkeley, where he and his younger sister, Fayette, graduated first and second, respectively, in the class of 1939.

Campbell was born on 25 May 1957 in Keighley, West Riding of Yorkshire, son of a Scottish veterinary surgeon, Donald Campbell, and his wife Elizabeth. Campbell's parents had moved to Keighley when his father became a partner in a local veterinary practice. Donald was a Gaelic-speaker from the island of Tiree; his wife was from Ayrshire. Campbell grew up with two older brothers, Donald and Graeme, and a younger sister, Elizabeth. Alastair would go over the county border to Lancashire to watch Burnley F.C. with his father.

Campbell was born on 18 September 1949 in Skye, Scotland, to Rev. Donald Campbell and Margaret Campbell. His family moved to Edinburgh when he was two years old, where he was brought up. He was educated at George Watson's College, and took an MA at the University of Aberdeen. He worked as an English teacher at the Vale of Leven Academy in Dumbartonshire during 1973–75, before returning to university to study law at the University of Strathclyde.

Donald L. Campbell was born in Clinton, Iowa on August 5, 1904. From an early age, he showed a great fascination towards invention and solving problems. He actively indulged himself in building and problem-solving experiments. At the age of 16, Campbell took part in a national essay contest, which was sponsored by the Department of War. Twelve million contestants participated to write on the advantages of joining the army. One of the judges was General John J. Pershing. Out of this pool, Campbell came in first place. The first line of his essay read: “As Horace Greely once said, ‘Young man, go West.’ We now say, ‘Young man, join the Army.’” Later, he began his higher-level education at Iowa State University, where he majored in chemical engineering and came first in his class. Afterward, he earned his master’s degree at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology. He completed his education after attending Harvard Business School.

Campbell was born in 1874 at Ingonish, Nova Scotia. He married Carrie Giles. He was superintendent of St. Paul's Island from 1908–1919, and Sable Island from 1919–1921. Campbell entered provincial politics in the 1937 election, defeating Conservative incumbent Frederick W. Baldwin by 586 votes in the Victoria riding. He was re-elected in the 1941, and 1945 elections. He did not reoffer in the 1949 election. Campbell died at Middleton, Nova Scotia on May 16, 1951.

Campbell was born in Chislehurst, Kent on 11 March 1885, the only son of William Campbell, a Hatton Garden diamond seller. He attended the independent Uppingham School. In Germany, learning the diamond trade, he gained an interest in motorbikes and races. Returning to Britain, he worked for two years at Lloyd's of London for no pay, then for another year at £1 a week.

He was born in Kinistino, Saskatchewan, the son of Raymond Campbell and Lena Waddell, and was educated in Penticton, British Columbia. In 1977, he married Isabel Huchak. Campbell was an alderman for Vernon from 1968 to 1970. He served as secretary for the B.C. Interior Fruit Stand Association from 1965 to 1983. He died in office at the age of 51.

Born in Crowthorne, Berkshire, England he was the son of Alexander Robert Campbell-Johnston and his wife Frances Ellen Bury Campbell-Johnston (née Paliser). He was educated at Marlborough College and then studied law in California. He returned to the United Kingdom where he was called to bar at the Inner Temple in 1893. He subsequently travelled to South Africa where he was admitted as a barrister in 1902. He returned to the United Kingdom in 1906.
question_src: Donald Malcolm Campbell alizaliwa wapi?
pos_context_src: Donald Campbell alizaliwa huko Canbury House, Kingston juu ya Thames, Surrey, mwana wa Malcolm, baadaye Sir Malcolm Campbell, mmiliki wa rekodi 13 za kasi za ulimwengu katika miaka ya 1920 na 1930 katika "Bluebird" magari na boti, na mke wake wa pili, Dorothy Evelyn Whittall.
neg_context_src: Campbell alizaliwa mnamo 4 Mei 1800 huko Argyllshire, Scotland, mtoto kongwe wa Mchungaji Donald Campbell. Mama yake alikufa wakati Campbell alikuwa na miaka 6 tu, mnamo 1806. Alielimishwa nyumbani na baba yake, Campbell alikuwa tayari msomi mzuri wa Kilatini wakati alikwenda Chuo Kikuu cha Glasgow mnamo 1811. Kumaliza kozi yake mnamo 1817, alikua mwanafunzi katika Ukumbi wa Uungu, ambapo alipata sifa kama Hebraist.

Campbell alizaliwa mnamo 1916, na akamaliza masomo yake ya shahada ya kwanza katika Saikolojia katika Chuo Kikuu cha California, Berkeley, ambapo yeye na dada yake mdogo, Fayette, walihitimu kwanza na pili, mtawaliwa, katika darasa la 1939.

Campbell alizaliwa mnamo Mei 25, 1957 huko Keighley, West Riding wa Yorkshire, mtoto wa daktari wa mifugo wa Scottish, Donald Campbell, na mkewe Elizabeth. Wazazi wa Campbell walikuwa wamehamia Keighley wakati baba yake alipokuwa mshirika katika mazoezi ya mifugo ya hapa. Donald alikuwa msemaji wa Gaelic kutoka kisiwa cha Tiree; Mkewe alikuwa kutoka Ayrshire. Campbell alikua na kaka wawili wakubwa, Donald na Graeme, na dada mdogo, Elizabeth. Alastair angeenda juu ya mpaka wa kaunti kwenda Lancashire kutazama Burnley F.C. na baba yake.

Campbell alizaliwa mnamo 18 Septemba 1949 huko Skye, Scotland, kwa Mchungaji Donald Campbell na Margaret Campbell. Familia yake ilihamia Edinburgh wakati alikuwa na miaka miwili, ambapo alilelewa. Alielimishwa katika Chuo cha George Watson, na alichukua MA katika Chuo Kikuu cha Aberdeen. Alifanya kazi kama mwalimu wa Kiingereza huko Vale of Leven Academy huko Dumbartonshire wakati wa 1973-75, kabla ya kurudi chuo kikuu kusoma sheria katika Chuo Kikuu cha Strathclyde.

Donald L. Campbell alizaliwa huko Clinton, Iowa mnamo Agosti 5, 1904. Kuanzia umri mdogo, alionyesha hisia kubwa kuelekea uvumbuzi na kutatua shida. Alijiingiza kikamilifu katika kujenga na majaribio ya kutatua shida. Katika umri wa miaka 16, Campbell alishiriki katika shindano la kitaifa la insha, ambalo lilifadhiliwa na Idara ya Vita. Wagombea milioni kumi na mbili walishiriki kuandika juu ya faida za kujiunga na Jeshi. Mmoja wa majaji alikuwa Jenerali John J. Pershing. Kati ya dimbwi hili, Campbell alifika mahali pa kwanza. Mstari wa kwanza wa insha yake ulisomeka: "Kama Horace Greely aliwahi kusema, 'Kijana, kwenda magharibi.' Sasa tunasema, 'Kijana, jiunge na jeshi.'" Baadaye, alianza masomo yake ya kiwango cha juu katika Chuo Kikuu cha Jimbo la Iowa, ambapo alijisifu katika uhandisi wa kemikali na akaja darasani kwake. Baadaye, alipata digrii ya bwana wake katika Taasisi ya Teknolojia ya Massachusetts. Alikamilisha masomo yake baada ya kuhudhuria Shule ya Biashara ya Harvard.

Campbell alizaliwa mnamo 1874 huko Ingonish, Nova Scotia. Aliolewa na Carrie Giles. Alikuwa msimamizi wa Kisiwa cha St Paul kutoka 1908-1919, na Kisiwa cha Sable kutoka 1919-1921. Campbell aliingia katika siasa za mkoa katika uchaguzi wa 1937, akishinda kihafidhina Frederick W. Baldwin na kura 586 katika Victoria wanaoendesha. Alichaguliwa tena katika uchaguzi wa 1941, na 1945. Hakujiondoa tena katika uchaguzi wa 1949. Campbell alikufa huko Middleton, Nova Scotia mnamo Mei 16, 1951.

Campbell alizaliwa huko Chislehurst, Kent mnamo 11 Machi 1885, mtoto wa pekee wa William Campbell, muuzaji wa Hatton Garden Diamond. Alihudhuria Shule ya Uppingham huru. Huko Ujerumani, kujifunza biashara ya almasi, alipata shauku katika pikipiki na jamii. Kurudi Uingereza, alifanya kazi kwa miaka miwili huko Lloyd's London bila malipo, kisha kwa mwaka mwingine kwa £ 1 kwa wiki.

Alizaliwa huko Kinistino, Saskatchewan, mtoto wa Raymond Campbell na Lena Waddell, na alielimishwa huko Penticton, British Columbia. Mnamo 1977, alifunga ndoa na Isabel Huchak. Campbell alikuwa alderman wa Vernon kutoka 1968 hadi 1970. Alihudumu kama katibu waC. Chama cha Matunda ya Matunda ya Mambo ya Ndani kutoka 1965 hadi 1983. Alikufa ofisini akiwa na umri wa miaka 51.

Mzaliwa wa Crowthorne, Berkshire, England alikuwa mtoto wa Alexander Robert Campbell-Johnston na mkewe Frances Ellen Bury Campbell-Johnston (née Paliser). Alielimishwa katika Chuo cha Marlborough na kisha akasoma sheria huko California. Alirudi Uingereza ambapo aliitwa bar kwenye hekalu la ndani mnamo 1893. Baadaye alisafiri kwenda Afrika Kusini ambapo alilazwa kama barrister mnamo 1902. Alirudi Uingereza mnamo 1906.

question_en: Who first identified the endocrine system?
pos_context_en: The earliest study of endocrinology began in China. The Chinese were isolating sex and pituitary hormones from human urine and using them for medicinal purposes by 200 BCE. They used many complex methods, such as sublimation of steroid hormones. Another method specified by Chinese texts—the earliest dating to 1110—specified the use of saponin (from the beans of "Gleditsia sinensis") to extract hormones, but gypsum (containing calcium sulfate) was also known to have been used.
neg_context_title_en: List of human endocrine organs and actions
neg_context_en:
The term "endocrine disruptor" was coined at the Wingspread Conference Centre in Wisconsin, in 1991. One of the early papers on the phenomenon was by Theo Colborn in 1993. In this paper, she stated that environmental chemicals disrupt the development of the endocrine system, and that effects of exposure during development are often permanent.
Although the endocrine disruption has been disputed by some, work sessions from 1992 to 1999 have generated consensus statements from scientists regarding the hazard from endocrine disruptors, particularly in wildlife and also in humans.

In 1998, skeletal muscle was identified as an endocrine organ due to its now well-established role in the secretion of myokines. The use of the term myokine to describe cytokines and other peptides produced by muscle as signalling molecules was proposed in 2003.
The fetal endocrine system is one of the first systems to develop during prenatal development.

Grumbach made many seminal contributions the understanding of pediatric endocrinology including extensive studies on the development and function of the endocrine and neuroendocrine systems from fetal life through puberty, as well as studies of the hormonal and genetic effects on growth, bone maturation, puberty, sex determination and differentiation (and their disorders) and disease-causing pathology. He was a past president of the Endocrine Society, the American Pediatric Society, the Lawson Wilkins Pediatric Endocrine Society, the Association of Medical School Pediatric Department Chairmen, and honorary president of the International Endocrine Society. From 1956 to 1990 he supervised the training of 82 fellows from 15 countries on five continents. No single individual trained as many leaders or had a broader impact on Pediatric Endocrinology. He died on October 4, 2016 of a heart attack.

The endocrine system is a chemical messenger system consisting of hormones, the group of glands of an organism that secrete those hormones directly into the circulatory system to regulate the function of distant target organs, and the feedback loops which modulate hormone release so that homeostasis is maintained. In humans, the major endocrine glands are the thyroid gland and the adrenal glands. In vertebrates, the hypothalamus is the neural control center for all endocrine systems. The study of the endocrine system and its disorders is known as endocrinology. Endocrinology is a branch of internal medicine.

An analysis of the endocrine disrupting chemicals in Old Order Mennonite women in mid-pregnancy determined that they have much lower levels in their systems than the general population. Mennonites eat mostly fresh, unprocessed foods, farm without pesticides, and use few or no cosmetics or personal care products. One woman who had reported using hairspray and perfume had high levels of monoethyl phthalate, while the other women all had levels below detection. Three women who reported being in a car or truck within 48 hours of providing a urine sample had higher levels of diethylhexyl phthalate which is found in polyvinyl chloride, and is used in car interiors.

In 1998, the EPA announced the Endocrine Disruptor Screening Program by establishment of a framework for priority setting, screening and testing more than 85,000 chemicals in commerce. While the Food Quality Protection Act only required the EPA to screen pesticides for potential to produce effects similar to estrogens in humans, it also gave the EPA the authority to screen other types of chemicals and endocrine effects. Based recommendations from an advisory panel, the agency expanded the screening program to include male hormones, the thyroid system, and effects on fish and other wildlife. The basic concept behind the program is that prioritization will be based on existing information about chemical uses, production volume, structure-activity and toxicity. Screening is done by use of "in vitro" test systems (by examining, for instance, if an agent interacts with the estrogen receptor or the androgen receptor) and via the use of in animal models, such as development of tadpoles and uterine growth in prepubertal rodents. Full scale testing will examine effects not only in mammals (rats) but also in a number of other species (frogs, fish, birds and invertebrates). Since the theory involves the effects of these substances on a functioning system, animal testing is essential for scientific validity, but has been opposed by animal rights groups. Similarly, proof that these effects occur in humans would require human testing, and such testing also has opposition.

The corpuscles of Stannius are special endocrine organs in the kidney in fish and are responsible for maintaining calcium balance. They are found only in bony fishes. They were discovered and described by a German anatomist Hermann Friedrich Stannius in 1839. Stannius considered them as functionally similar to adrenal glands in mammals. But they have later been found to be anatomically different as they are derived from different tissues of the embryo. Structurally the corpuscles are a large number of spherical bodies separated from each other by loose connective tissues. Each body or lobule is in turn composed of several columnar cells, which contain secretory granules and are, thus, secretory in function. Each Secretory granule is spherical in shape and measures 0.5 to 1 μm in diameter. Their possible endocrine nature, i.e. producing hormone, was suspected from the complete anatomical description, and it was believed to be responsible for regulating calcium level in the blood. The hormone was identified as stanniocalcin.

Although most of the relevant tissues and endocrine glands had been identified by early anatomists, a more humoral approach to understanding biological function and disease was favoured by the ancient Greek and Roman thinkers such as Aristotle, Hippocrates, Lucretius, Celsus, and Galen, according to Freeman et al., and these theories held sway until the advent of germ theory, physiology, and organ basis of pathology in the 19th century.

Hardy served in the U.S. Army Medical Corps in early 1944 during the Second World War. He first worked at Stark General Hospital, Charleston in South Carolina. Hardy began writing his first book, "Surgery and the Endocrine System", in 1950 which was published two years later. He was awarded the Master of Medical Science in physiological chemistry by the University of Pennsylvania in 1951 for his research on using heavy water for measuring body fluids. He became the chair of surgery at the University of Mississippi School of Medicine, Jackson in 1955. He was also the first Professor of Surgery at the University of Mississippi School of Medicine.
question_src: Nani aligundua kwanza mfumo wa endocrine?
pos_context_src: Utafiti wa mapema wa endocrinology ulianza nchini China. Wachina walikuwa wakitenga ngono na homoni kutoka mkojo wa binadamu na kuzitumia kwa madhumuni ya dawa na 200 KWK. Walitumia njia nyingi ngumu, kama vile sublimation ya homoni za steroid. Njia nyingine iliyoainishwa na maandishi ya Wachina - ya kwanza kabisa hadi 1110 - ilielezea matumizi ya saponin (kutoka kwa maharagwe ya "Gleditsia sinensis") kutoa homoni, lakini jasi (iliyo na sulfate ya kalsiamu) pia ilijulikana kuwa ilitumika.
neg_context_title_src: Orodha ya viungo vya endocrine na vitendo
neg_context_src:
Neno "Endocrine Dissertur" liliundwa katika Kituo cha Mkutano wa Wingspread huko Wisconsin, mnamo 1991. Moja ya makaratasi ya mapema juu ya jambo hilo lilikuwa na Theo Colborn mnamo 1993. Katika karatasi hii, alisema kwamba kemikali za mazingira zinavuruga maendeleo ya mfumo wa endocrine, na athari za kufichua wakati wa maendeleo mara nyingi ni za kudumu.
Ingawa usumbufu wa endocrine umekuwa ukibishaniwa na wengine, vikao vya kazi kutoka 1992 hadi 1999 vimetoa taarifa za makubaliano kutoka kwa wanasayansi kuhusu hatari kutoka kwa wasumbufu wa endocrine, haswa katika wanyama wa porini na pia kwa wanadamu.

Mnamo 1998, misuli ya mifupa ilitambuliwa kama chombo cha endocrine kutokana na jukumu lake lililowekwa vizuri katika usiri wa myokines. Matumizi ya neno myokine kuelezea cytokines na peptides zingine zinazozalishwa na misuli kama ishara za molekuli zilipendekezwa mnamo 2003.
Mfumo wa endocrine ya fetasi ni moja wapo ya mifumo ya kwanza kukuza wakati wa maendeleo ya ujauzito.

Grumbach alitoa michango mingi ya seminal uelewa wa endocrinology ya watoto pamoja na masomo ya kina juu ya maendeleo na kazi ya mifumo ya endocrine na neuroendocrine kutoka maisha ya fetasi kupitia ujana, na pia masomo ya athari za homoni na maumbile juu ya ukuaji, kukomaa kwa mfupa, ujana, uamuzi wa kijinsia na utofautishaji (na shida zao) na njia zinazosababisha magonjwa. Alikuwa rais wa zamani wa Jumuiya ya Endocrine, Jumuiya ya Watoto wa Amerika, Jumuiya ya watoto wa Lawson Wilkins Endocrine, Chama cha Wakuu wa Idara ya watoto wa Shule ya Matibabu, na Rais wa Heshima wa Jumuiya ya Kimataifa ya Endocrine. Kuanzia 1956 hadi 1990 alisimamia mafunzo ya wenzake 82 kutoka nchi 15 kwenye mabara matano. Hakuna mtu mmoja aliyefundishwa kama viongozi wengi au alikuwa na athari kubwa kwa endocrinology ya watoto. Alikufa mnamo Oktoba 4, 2016 ya mshtuko wa moyo.

Mfumo wa endocrine ni mfumo wa mjumbe wa kemikali unaojumuisha homoni, kikundi cha tezi ya kiumbe ambacho huweka homoni hizo moja kwa moja kwenye mfumo wa mzunguko kudhibiti kazi ya viungo vya mbali, na matanzi ya maoni ambayo hurekebisha kutolewa kwa homoni ili homeostasis itunzwe. Kwa wanadamu, tezi kuu za endocrine ni tezi ya tezi na tezi za adrenal. Katika vertebrates, hypothalamus ni kituo cha kudhibiti neural kwa mifumo yote ya endocrine. Utafiti wa mfumo wa endocrine na shida zake hujulikana kama endocrinology. Endocrinology ni tawi la dawa ya ndani.

Mchanganuo wa endocrine kuvuruga kemikali kwa wanawake wa zamani wa Mennonite katika ujauzito wa katikati waliamua kuwa wana viwango vya chini sana katika mifumo yao kuliko idadi ya watu. Mennonites hula vyakula safi zaidi, visivyo na faida, shamba bila dawa za wadudu, na hutumia vipodozi vichache au hakuna bidhaa za utunzaji wa kibinafsi. Mwanamke mmoja ambaye alikuwa ameripoti kutumia nywele na manukato alikuwa na viwango vya juu vya monoethyl phthalate, wakati wanawake wengine wote walikuwa na viwango chini ya kugunduliwa. Wanawake watatu ambao waliripoti kuwa katika gari au lori kati ya masaa 48 ya kutoa sampuli ya mkojo walikuwa na viwango vya juu vya diethylhexyl phthalate ambayo hupatikana katika kloridi ya polyvinyl, na hutumiwa katika mambo ya ndani ya gari.

Mnamo 1998, EPA ilitangaza mpango wa uchunguzi wa usumbufu wa endocrine kwa kuanzishwa kwa mfumo wa mpangilio wa kipaumbele, uchunguzi na kupima kemikali zaidi ya 85,000 katika biashara. Wakati Sheria ya Ulinzi wa Ubora wa Chakula ilihitaji tu EPA kuangazia dawa za wadudu kwa uwezo wa kutoa athari zinazofanana na estrojeni kwa wanadamu, pia iliipa EPA mamlaka ya kukagua aina zingine za kemikali na athari za endocrine. Mapendekezo ya msingi kutoka kwa jopo la ushauri, shirika hilo lilipanua mpango wa uchunguzi ili kujumuisha homoni za kiume, mfumo wa tezi, na athari kwa samaki na wanyama wengine wa porini. Wazo la msingi nyuma ya mpango ni kwamba kipaumbele kitatokana na habari iliyopo kuhusu matumizi ya kemikali, kiasi cha uzalishaji, shughuli za muundo na sumu. Uchunguzi hufanywa kwa kutumia mifumo ya majaribio ya "in vitro" (kwa kuchunguza, kwa mfano, ikiwa wakala huingiliana na receptor ya estrogen au receptor ya androgen) na kupitia utumiaji wa mifano ya wanyama, kama vile maendeleo ya tadpoles na ukuaji wa uterine katika fimbo za mapema. Upimaji kamili utachunguza athari sio tu kwa mamalia (panya) lakini pia katika idadi ya spishi zingine (vyura, samaki, ndege na invertebrates). Kwa kuwa nadharia hiyo inajumuisha athari za vitu hivi kwenye mfumo wa kufanya kazi, upimaji wa wanyama ni muhimu kwa uhalali wa kisayansi, lakini umepingwa na vikundi vya haki za wanyama. Vivyo hivyo, dhibitisho kwamba athari hizi hufanyika kwa wanadamu zinaweza kuhitaji upimaji wa binadamu, na upimaji kama huo pia una upinzani.

Corpuscles ya Stannius ni viungo maalum vya endocrine katika figo katika samaki na wana jukumu la kudumisha usawa wa kalsiamu. Zinapatikana tu katika samaki wa bony. Waligunduliwa na kuelezewa na mwanaharakati wa Ujerumani Hermann Friedrich Stannius mnamo 1839. Stannius aliwachukulia kama sawa na tezi za adrenal katika mamalia. Lakini baadaye wamepatikana kuwa tofauti ya anatomiki kwani hutolewa kutoka kwa tishu tofauti za kiinitete. Kimuundo Corpuscles ni idadi kubwa ya miili ya spherical iliyotengwa kutoka kwa kila mmoja na tishu za kuunganika huru. Kila mwili au lobule inajumuisha seli kadhaa za safu, ambazo zina granules za siri na, kwa hivyo, ni za siri katika kazi. Kila granule ya siri ni spherical katika sura na kipimo 0.5 hadi 1 μm kwa kipenyo. Asili yao ya endocrine, i.e. kutengeneza homoni, ilishukiwa kutoka kwa maelezo kamili ya anatomiki, na iliaminika kuwa na jukumu la kudhibiti kiwango cha kalsiamu katika damu. Homoni iligundulika kama stanniocalcin.

Ingawa tishu nyingi husika na tezi za endocrine zilikuwa zimetambuliwa na anatomists wa mapema, njia ya ucheshi zaidi ya kuelewa kazi ya kibaolojia na magonjwa ilipendelea na wafikiriaji wa zamani wa Uigiriki na Warumi kama vile Aristotle, Hippocrates, Lucretius, Celsus, na Galen, kulingana na Freeman et al., Na nadharia hizi zilifanyika kwa Advent ya Wajerumani, Advent, na nadharia, na nadharia.

Hardy alihudumu katika Jeshi la Matibabu la Jeshi la Merika mapema 1944 wakati wa Vita vya Pili vya Ulimwengu. Kwanza alifanya kazi katika Hospitali kuu ya Stark, Charleston huko Carolina Kusini. Hardy alianza kuandika kitabu chake cha kwanza, "Upasuaji na Mfumo wa Endocrine", mnamo 1950 ambayo ilichapishwa miaka miwili baadaye. Alipewa Master of Sayansi ya Tiba katika Kemia ya Kisaikolojia na Chuo Kikuu cha Pennsylvania mnamo 1951 kwa utafiti wake juu ya kutumia maji mazito kwa kupima maji ya mwili. Akawa mwenyekiti wa upasuaji katika Chuo Kikuu cha Tiba cha Mississippi, Jackson mnamo 1955. Alikuwa pia profesa wa kwanza wa upasuaji katika Chuo Kikuu cha Mississippi cha Tiba.
report_src: Kulingana na takwimu zilizopo, Wachina ndio wanaotambuliwa kuwa wa kwanza kugundua na kuchunguza mfumo wa endocrine, kwani tayari kufikia karibu mwaka 200 KK walikuwa wanatenga homoni za ngono kutoka kwenye mkojo wa binadamu na kuzitumia kama dawa, wakitumia mbinu kama vile sublimation ya homoni za steroid na uchujaji kwa saponin kutoka “Gleditsia sinensis” pamoja na jasi yenye sulfate ya kalsiamu [1].

question_en: What was William James Perry's job before he was name Secretary of Defense?
pos_context_en: William James Perry (born October 11, 1927) is an American mathematician, engineer, and businessman who was the United States Secretary of Defense from February 3, 1994, to January 23, 1997, under President Bill Clinton. He also served as Deputy Secretary of Defense (1993–1994) and Under Secretary of Defense for Research and Engineering (1977–1981).
neg_context_title_en: William J. Perry Center for Hemispheric Defense Studies
neg_context_en: As he left the Pentagon, Perry listed what he thought were his most important accomplishments: establishing effective working relationships with U.S. military leaders; improving the lot of the military, especially enlisted men and women; managing the military drawdown; instituting important acquisition reforms; developing close relationships with many foreign defense ministers; effectively employing military strength and resources in Bosnia, Haiti, Korea, and the Persian Gulf area; dramatically reducing the nuclear legacy of the Cold War; and promoting the Partnership for Peace within NATO. His disappointments included failure to obtain Russian ratification of the START II treaty; slowness in securing increases in the budget for weapon systems modernization; and the faulty perceptions of the Gulf War illness syndrome held by some of the media and much of the public. At a ceremony for Perry in January 1997 General Shalikashvili noted the departing secretary's relationship with the troops. "Surely," Shalikashvili said, "Bill Perry has been the GI's secretary of defense. When asked his greatest accomplishment as secretary, Bill Perry didn't name an operation or a weapons system. He said that his greatest accomplishment was his very strong bond with our men and women in uniform."

The William J. Perry Award for Excellence in Security and Defense Education is named after the former U.S. Secretary of Defense who was responsible for the establishment of the William J. Perry Center for Hemispheric Defense Studies. Recipients are chosen for having substantially contributed in tangible ways to enhancing capacity in security and defense, building mutually beneficial relationships, and increasing democratic security in the Americas. Nominees may be educators, practitioners, or institutions of defense and security from throughout the Hemisphere, or from outside the region.

William Perry, who had served as US Undersecretary of Defense in the 1970s and had become familiar with WSJ reporter Bacon while in that capacity, was named to serve as Secretary of Defense in the Clinton Administration in 1994. He invited Bacon to serve as Assistant Secretary of Defense for Public Affairs, serving as the public face of the Defense Department.

After the resignation of Les Aspin in early 1994, Bentsen was seriously considered for the position of Secretary of Defense. This prospect, however, did not materialize and William Perry, then Deputy Secretary of Defense, was chosen to succeed Aspin. In early December 1994, Bentsen announced his retirement as Secretary of the Treasury. Before election day he had discussed with President Clinton that he was not prepared to stay in office until the end of Clinton's first term in 1997. He was succeeded in the position by Robert Rubin.

At the time of his appointment it was not expected that Perry would involve himself aggressively in foreign policy. He quickly belied this impression. Within days of taking office he left Washington on his first trip abroad to confer with European defense ministers. In April 1994 the "Economist", in an article entitled "Perrypatetic," observed: "The man who has started to sound like a secretary of state is in fact the defense secretary, William Perry. ... He is popping up in public all over the place and moving into the strategy business in a big way." In fact, Perry traveled abroad in his three-year tenure more than any previous secretary. Unlike most of his predecessors, Perry paid attention to the other nations in the Americas, hosting the first Conference of Defense Ministers of the Americas at Williamsburg, Virginia, in 1995 and attending the second conference in 1996 in Argentina. His extensive travel matched his direct style. In his travels, he emphasized personal contact with rank and file members of the armed forces. His frequent trips also reflected the demands of the large number of foreign crises that occurred during his term, including several requiring the deployment of U.S. forces.

Clearly, Perry bore a heavy load during his term as Secretary of Defense between 1994 and 1997. Fine-tuning the budget, downsizing the military, and conducting humanitarian, peacekeeping, and military operations provided him with a full agenda. In January 1996 he talked about experiences over the past year in which he never thought a Secretary of Defense would be involved. At the top of the list was witnessing participation of a Russian brigade in a U.S. division in the Bosnian peacekeeping operation. The others—Dayton, Ohio, becoming synonymous with peace in the Balkans; helping the Russian defense minister blow up a Minuteman missile silo in Missouri; watching United States and Russian troops training together in Kansas; welcoming former Warsaw Pact troops in Louisiana; operating a school at Garmisch, Germany, to teach former Soviet and East European military officers about democracy, budgeting, and testifying to a parliament; dismantling the military specifications system for acquisition; cutting the ear off a pig in Kazakhstan; and eating rendered Manchurian toad fat in China. These things, Perry said, demonstrate "just how much the world has changed, just how much our security has changed, just how much the Department of Defense has changed, and just how much my job has changed."

In Asia, like former defense secretary Caspar Weinberger a decade earlier, Perry endeavored to improve relations with both the People's Republic of China and Japan. He was the first secretary of defense to visit China after the Tiananmen Square protests of 1989, when PRC authorities forcibly crushed a dissident movement. While not ignoring long-standing problems such as the PRC's weapons sales abroad and its human rights abuses, he believed that the U.S. and the PRC should cooperate militarily. He made some progress, although when China threatened Taiwan just before the latter's presidential election in March 1996, the United States sent two aircraft carrier task forces to the area to counter the Chinese.

As always with Secretaries of Defense, the formulation of the Defense budget and shepherding it through Congress was one of Perry's most important duties. The problem of how to deal with a large projected Defense budget shortfall for the period 1995–2000, an issue that weakened Perry's predecessor Les Aspin and contributed to his resignation, persisted when Perry took office. Immediately on presenting his 1995 budget request, which he termed "a post-Cold War budget," Perry stated that Defense required a few more years of downsizing and that its infrastructure needed streamlining as well. The proposal, he said, maintained a ready-to-fight force, redirected a modernization program (including a strong research and development program), initiated a program to do business differently (acquisition reform), and reinvested defense dollars in the economy.
William Perry (born 1927) is an American businessman and former Secretary of Defense.
question_src: Kazi ya William James Perry kabla ya kuwa Katibu wa Ulinzi?
pos_context_src: William James Perry (amezaliwa Oktoba 11, 1927) ni mtaalam wa hesabu wa Amerika, mhandisi, na mfanyabiashara ambaye alikuwa Katibu wa Ulinzi wa Merika kutoka Februari 3, 1994, hadi Januari 23, 1997, chini ya Rais Bill Clinton. Pia aliwahi kuwa Naibu Katibu wa Ulinzi (1993-1994) na chini ya Katibu wa Ulinzi kwa Utafiti na Uhandisi (1977-1981).
neg_context_title_src: William J. Perry Kituo cha Mafunzo ya Ulinzi ya Hemispheric
neg_context_src: Alipoondoka Pentagon, Perry aliorodhesha kile alichofikiria ndio mafanikio yake muhimu zaidi: kuanzisha uhusiano mzuri wa kufanya kazi na viongozi wa jeshi la Merika; kuboresha mengi ya jeshi, haswa wanaume na wanawake walioandikishwa; kusimamia kushuka kwa jeshi; kuanzisha mageuzi muhimu ya ununuzi; kukuza uhusiano wa karibu na mawaziri wengi wa ulinzi wa kigeni; kwa ufanisi kutumia nguvu za kijeshi na rasilimali katika Bosnia, Haiti, Korea, na eneo la Ghuba ya Uajemi; Kupunguza sana urithi wa nyuklia wa Vita ya Maneno; na kukuza ushirikiano wa amani ndani ya NATO. Kukata tamaa kwake ni pamoja na kushindwa kupata uthibitisho wa Urusi wa makubaliano ya kuanza II; wepesi katika kupata ongezeko la bajeti ya mifumo ya kisasa ya silaha; na maoni mabaya ya ugonjwa wa ugonjwa wa Vita vya Ghuba yaliyoshikiliwa na vyombo vya habari na mengi ya umma. Katika sherehe ya Perry mnamo Januari 1997 Mkuu Shalikashvili alibaini uhusiano wa katibu wa kuondoka na askari. "Hakika," Shalikashvili alisema, "Bill Perry amekuwa katibu wa ulinzi wa GI. Alipoulizwa kufanikiwa kwake kama katibu, Bill Perry hakutaja operesheni au mfumo wa silaha. Alisema kwamba kufanikiwa kwake ni uhusiano wake mkubwa na wanaume wetu na wanawake katika sare."

Tuzo ya William J. Perry kwa Ubora katika Usalama na Elimu ya Ulinzi imetajwa baada ya Katibu wa zamani wa Ulinzi wa Merika ambaye alikuwa na jukumu la kuanzishwa kwa Kituo cha Ulinzi cha William J. Perry. Wapokeaji huchaguliwa kwa kuwa wamechangia sana katika njia zinazoonekana za kuongeza uwezo katika usalama na utetezi, kujenga uhusiano wenye faida, na kuongeza usalama wa kidemokrasia katika Amerika. Wateule wanaweza kuwa waalimu, watendaji, au taasisi za ulinzi na usalama kutoka katika ulimwengu wote, au kutoka nje ya mkoa.

William Perry, ambaye alikuwa akifanya kazi kama Amerika ya chini ya utetezi katika miaka ya 1970 na alikuwa amezoea mwandishi wa WSJ Bacon wakati akiwa katika uwezo huo, alipewa jina la Katibu wa Ulinzi katika Utawala wa Clinton mnamo 1994. Alimwalika Bacon atumike kama Katibu Msaidizi wa Ulinzi kwa Mambo ya Umma, akihudumia kama uso wa umma wa Idara ya Ulinzi.

Baada ya kujiuzulu kwa Les Aspin mapema 1994, Bentsen alizingatiwa sana kwa msimamo wa Katibu wa Ulinzi. Matarajio haya, hata hivyo, hayakufanya mazoezi na William Perry, wakati huo naibu Katibu wa Ulinzi, alichaguliwa kufanikiwa Aspin. Mwanzoni mwa Desemba 1994, Bentsen alitangaza kustaafu kwake kama Katibu wa Hazina. Kabla ya Siku ya Uchaguzi alikuwa amejadili na Rais Clinton kwamba hakuwa tayari kukaa ofisini hadi mwisho wa kipindi cha kwanza cha Clinton mnamo 1997. Alifanikiwa katika nafasi hiyo na Robert Rubin.

Wakati wa kuteuliwa kwake haikutarajiwa kwamba Perry angejihusisha kwa ukali katika sera za kigeni. Haraka alionyesha maoni haya. Ndani ya siku za kuchukua madaraka aliondoka Washington kwenye safari yake ya kwanza nje ya nchi ili kushirikiana na mawaziri wa ulinzi wa Ulaya. Mnamo Aprili 1994 "mchumi", katika nakala iliyopewa jina la "Perrypatetic," aliona: "Mtu ambaye ameanza kusikika kama Katibu wa Jimbo kwa kweli ni katibu wa utetezi, William Perry. ... Anajitokeza hadharani mahali pote na kuhamia katika biashara ya mkakati kwa njia kubwa." Kwa kweli, Perry alisafiri nje ya nchi katika umiliki wake wa miaka tatu zaidi ya katibu yeyote wa zamani. Tofauti na watangulizi wake wengi, Perry alizingatia mataifa mengine huko Amerika, mwenyeji wa Mkutano wa kwanza wa Mawaziri wa Ulinzi wa Amerika huko Williamsburg, Virginia, mnamo 1995 na kuhudhuria mkutano wa pili mnamo 1996 huko Argentina. Usafiri wake mkubwa ulilingana na mtindo wake wa moja kwa moja. Katika safari zake, alisisitiza mawasiliano ya kibinafsi na safu na washiriki wa faili za vikosi vya jeshi. Safari zake za mara kwa mara pia zilionyesha mahitaji ya idadi kubwa ya misiba ya kigeni ambayo ilitokea wakati wa kipindi chake, pamoja na kadhaa inayohitaji kupelekwa kwa vikosi vya Merika.

Kwa wazi, Perry alibeba mzigo mzito wakati wa muda wake kama Katibu wa Ulinzi kati ya 1994 na 1997. Kufunga bajeti, kupungua kwa jeshi, na kufanya kibinadamu, kulinda amani, na shughuli za kijeshi zilimpa ajenda kamili. Mnamo Januari 1996 alizungumza juu ya uzoefu katika mwaka uliopita ambao hakuwahi kufikiria Katibu wa Ulinzi atahusika. Juu ya orodha hiyo ilikuwa ikishuhudia ushiriki wa brigade wa Urusi katika mgawanyiko wa Merika katika operesheni ya kulinda amani ya Bosnia. Wengine - Dayton, Ohio, wakiwa sawa na amani katika Balkan; Kusaidia Waziri wa Ulinzi wa Urusi kulipua silo ya kombora la Minuteman huko Missouri; Kuangalia Merika na wanajeshi wa Urusi wakifanya mazoezi pamoja huko Kansas; kukaribisha askari wa zamani wa Warsaw Pact huko Louisiana; kuendesha shule huko Garmisch, Ujerumani, kufundisha maafisa wa zamani wa jeshi la Soviet na Mashariki juu ya demokrasia, bajeti, na kutoa ushahidi kwa Bunge; Kuondoa mfumo wa uainishaji wa kijeshi kwa upatikanaji; kukata sikio kwa nguruwe huko Kazakhstan; na kula kulipa mafuta ya chura ya Manchurian nchini China. Vitu hivi, Perry alisema, vinaonyesha "ni kiasi gani ulimwengu umebadilika, ni kiasi gani usalama wetu umebadilika, ni kiasi gani Idara ya Ulinzi imebadilika, na ni kiasi gani kazi yangu imebadilika."

Huko Asia, kama Katibu wa zamani wa Ulinzi Caspar Weinberger muongo mapema, Perry alijitahidi kuboresha uhusiano na Jamhuri ya Watu wa Uchina na Japan. Alikuwa Katibu wa kwanza wa Ulinzi kutembelea China baada ya maandamano ya Tiananmen Square ya 1989, wakati viongozi wa PRC walipokanyaga harakati za kupingana. Wakati hakupuuza shida za muda mrefu kama vile mauzo ya silaha za PRC nje ya nchi na unyanyasaji wake wa haki za binadamu, aliamini kwamba Merika na PRC zinapaswa kushirikiana kijeshi. Alifanya maendeleo kadhaa, ingawa wakati China ilitishia Taiwan kabla ya uchaguzi wa rais wa mwisho mnamo Machi 1996, Merika ilipeleka vikosi viwili vya kazi vya wabebaji katika eneo hilo kukabiliana na Wachina.

Kama kawaida na makatibu wa utetezi, uundaji wa bajeti ya utetezi na kuichunga kupitia Congress ilikuwa moja ya majukumu muhimu zaidi ya Perry. Shida ya jinsi ya kukabiliana na upungufu mkubwa wa bajeti ya ulinzi kwa kipindi cha 1995-2000, suala ambalo lilidhoofisha mtangulizi wa Perry Les Aspin na kuchangia kujiuzulu kwake, iliendelea wakati Perry alichukua madaraka. Mara moja alipowasilisha ombi lake la bajeti la 1995, ambalo aliita "bajeti ya vita ya baada ya baridi," Perry alisema kwamba utetezi ulihitaji miaka michache zaidi ya kupungua na kwamba miundombinu yake inahitaji kurahisisha pia. Pendekezo hilo, alisema, lilidumisha nguvu tayari ya mapigano, ilielekeza mpango wa kisasa (pamoja na mpango dhabiti wa utafiti na maendeleo), ilianzisha mpango wa kufanya biashara tofauti (mageuzi ya upatikanaji), na kupata tena dola za utetezi katika uchumi.
William Perry (amezaliwa 1927) ni mfanyabiashara wa Amerika na Katibu wa zamani wa Ulinzi.
report_src: Kabla ya kuteuliwa kuwa Katibu wa Ulinzi mnamo Februari 1994, William James Perry alikuwa ameshikilia nyadhifa kadhaa muhimu katika Wizara ya Ulinzi ya Marekani: aliwahi kuwa Naibu Katibu wa Ulinzi kuanzia 1993 hadi 1994 na, mapema, alikuwa Chini ya Katibu wa Ulinzi anayesimamia Utafiti na Uhandisi kati ya 1977 na 1981; nje ya serikalini, alikuwa pia mtaalam wa hesabu, mhandisi, na mfanyabiashara, maarifa yaliyompa msukumo na uzoefu uliomsaidia katika majukumu yake ya baadaye [1].
