question_en: What is the biggest library in US?
pos_context_title_en: List of the largest libraries in the United States
pos_context_en: The largest public library in the United States—and the largest library in the world—is the Library of Congress in Washington, D.C., which is the "de facto" national library of the United States. It holds more than 167 million items, including "more than 39 million books and other printed materials, 3.6 million recordings, 14.8 million photographs, 5.5 million maps, 8.1 million pieces of sheet music and 72 million manuscripts." Other than the Library of Congress, the largest public library in the United States is the New York Public Library, while the largest research library in the United States is the Harvard Library.
neg_context_en: The current Mériadeck building is one of the biggest public libraries in France with 27,000 square metres of floor space holding more than a million texts. The interior was redesigned over several years from 2004, partly because of the removal of an unusual and ambitious robotic book retrieval system, something more often found in academic research libraries in the USA. It has been suggested this system was part of a "think big" approach requested by the city mayor. The "robot" ended up being slow and expensive to run, using money that might be better spent on other library concerns, particularly acquisition and digital development. Extra floor space was opened up when redesigning so that about 9,000 square metres became accessible to the public, who make more than 700,000 visits a year. The interior is now more inviting, light and spacious, with extra displays and more opportunities for visitors to browse.

The British Museum library was the national library of the United Kingdom in all but name. During Panizzi's tenure as Keeper of Printed Books its holdings increased from 235,000 to 540,000 volumes, making it the largest library in the world at the time. Its famous circular Reading Room was designed and built by architect Sydney Smirke from a sketch drawn by Panizzi. The new reading room opened in 1857. The British Museum library formed the bulk of what became the British Library in 1973 and the "Round" Reading Room was in use until 1997 when the Library moved to its current site at St. Pancras.

Janaranjini Vayanasala, Kolani, Thodupuzha, Kerala is one of the biggest libraries in Kerala started at 1949. Around 30000 books including novels, children's books, stories, poems, Vedas, Upanishads etc. It is accommodated in its own two-storied building with separate TV room, reading room, book room, computer centre with high speed internet facility, and mini conference room.
Too many awards and recognitions are honoured. Received Kerala State Library Council's Best Library Award in Idukki district, in 2014. Rajaram Mohunroy Library Foundation award, KSLC awards etc..
https://www.facebook.com/janaranjinikolani

With an inventory of 8.5 million volumes and over 25,000 journals distributed in the central university library (UB) and 49 specialized libraries of the institutes, the library system of the FU is the biggest in Germany. Items published since 1990 are fully digitalized and accessible through an OPAC. The UB is granted the status "United Nations Depository Library" and is linked to the global library system of the UN under direction of the Dag Hammarskjöld Library in New York. The European Union also uses the UB as a "European Documentation Center".
As part of the library of the UN and the EU, it contains all publications of the UN General Assembly, the UN Security Council, the International Court of Justice as well as publications from the Council of Europe and the Organization for Security and Co-operation in Europe.

The original research library was created in 1928, a year after the founding of AMPAS. It is funded by the Academy Foundation, which is AMPAS' educational division. It one of the biggest film research libraries in the world, holding in excess of 32,000 books, 80,000 screenplays, and 300,000 files of clippings. Other materials at the library are 35,000 posters, 10 million photographs, copies of 2,400 periodicals, costume and production and costume sketches, sheet music and musical scores, and advertising materials, including press books and lobby cards. There are also artifacts such as Academy Award statuettes. The library is governed by the Academy's Board of Governors.

"We designed the building from the inside out, not the outside in,” said Loretta H. Cockrum, Foram’s founder, chairman and CEO. “We wanted the most efficient office building ever designed, with no wasted space or wasted energy. This is a building of the future more than a building of the present. A lot of love has gone into that building, and a lot of pride."

Extreme Music remains based in London. In 2005 it expanded to include a production facility in Santa Monica, California. Additional offices were opened globally, and as of 2016, Extreme had built a library which contained approximately 15,000 original copyrights. Noting its size and the impact of using only high-quality music in the library, Emanuel said:
“We’re very surgical about what we put in the catalog,” he says. “Our biggest competition, who we outperform, have a million copyrights.”

Old Appleton Bridge is a historic Pratt Truss Iron Bridge located at Old Appleton, Cape Girardeau County and Perry County, Missouri. It was built in 1879, and consists of a wrought iron, pin-connected, Pratt through truss main span, with two pin-connected, three panel Pratt pony-truss approach spans. It rests on limestone block masonry piers. The total length of the bridge is .

Recent exhibitions at Tensta konsthall include
• “Abstract Possible: The Stockholm Synergies,” with Doug Ashford, Claire Barclay, Goldin+Senneby, Wade Guyton, Mai-Thu Perret, Walid Raad, and Haegue Yang, among others
• “Kami, Khokha, Bert and Ernie: World Heritage” by Hinrich Sachs
• “Doing what you want: Marie-Louise Ekman accompanied by Sister Corita Kent, Mladen Stilinović, and Martha Wilson” 
• “The Society without qualities” with Sören Andreasen, Ane Hjort Guttu, Sture Johannesson, Sharon Lockhardt, and Palle Nielsen (part of “The new model” and curated by Lars Bang Larsen)
• “Working With…” by Zak Kyes
• “We are continuing BBDG” with Bernd Krauss
• “Two Archives” by Babak Afrassiabi and Nasrin Tabatabai
Sanaʽa was chosen as the 2004 Arab Cultural Capital by the Arab League. In 2008, the Al Saleh Mosque was completed. It holds over 40,000 worshipers.
question_src: Je! Ni maktaba gani kubwa ndani yetu?
pos_context_title_src: Orodha ya maktaba kubwa zaidi nchini Merika
pos_context_src: Maktaba kubwa zaidi ya umma nchini Merika - na maktaba kubwa zaidi ulimwenguni - ni maktaba ya Congress huko Washington, D.C., ambayo ni maktaba ya kitaifa ya "de facto" ya Merika. Inashikilia vitu zaidi ya milioni 167, pamoja na "vitabu zaidi ya milioni 39 na vifaa vingine vilivyochapishwa, rekodi milioni 3.6, picha milioni 14.8, ramani milioni 5.5, vipande milioni 8.1 vya muziki wa karatasi na maandishi ya milioni 72." Mbali na Maktaba ya Congress, maktaba kubwa zaidi ya umma nchini Merika ni Maktaba ya Umma ya New York, wakati maktaba kubwa ya utafiti huko Merika ni Maktaba ya Harvard.
neg_context_title_src: Chuo Kikuu cha bure cha Berlin
neg_context_src: Jengo la sasa la Mériadeck ni moja wapo ya maktaba kubwa ya umma huko Ufaransa na mita za mraba 27,000 za nafasi ya sakafu iliyo na maandishi zaidi ya milioni. Mambo ya ndani yalibadilishwa tena zaidi ya miaka kadhaa kutoka 2004, kwa sababu ya kuondolewa kwa mfumo wa urejeshaji wa kitabu cha robotic na kabambe, kitu kinachopatikana mara nyingi katika maktaba za utafiti wa kitaaluma huko USA. Imependekezwa mfumo huu ulikuwa sehemu ya njia ya "fikiria kubwa" iliyoombewa na meya wa jiji. "Robot" iliishia kuwa polepole na ghali kukimbia, kwa kutumia pesa ambayo inaweza kutumika vizuri kwenye maswala mengine ya maktaba, haswa upatikanaji na maendeleo ya dijiti. Nafasi ya sakafu ya ziada ilifunguliwa wakati wa kupanga upya ili mita za mraba 9,000 ziweze kupatikana kwa umma, ambao hufanya zaidi ya ziara 700,000 kwa mwaka. Mambo ya ndani sasa ni ya kuvutia zaidi, nyepesi na ya wasaa, na maonyesho ya ziada na fursa zaidi kwa wageni kuvinjari.

Maktaba ya Makumbusho ya Uingereza ilikuwa Maktaba ya Kitaifa ya Uingereza kwa jina lote lakini. Wakati wa umiliki wa Panizzi kama mtunza vitabu vilivyochapishwa viboreshaji vyake viliongezeka kutoka 235,000 hadi 540,000, na kuifanya kuwa maktaba kubwa zaidi ulimwenguni wakati huo. Chumba chake maarufu cha usomaji wa mviringo kilibuniwa na kujengwa na mbuni Sydney Smirke kutoka mchoro uliochorwa na Panizzi. Chumba kipya cha kusoma kilifunguliwa mnamo 1857. Maktaba ya Makumbusho ya Uingereza iliunda wingi wa maktaba ya Uingereza mnamo 1973 na chumba cha kusoma cha "pande zote" kilitumika hadi 1997 wakati maktaba ilipohamia kwenye tovuti yake ya sasa huko St. Pancras.

Janaranjini Vayanasala, Kolani, Thodupuzha, Kerala ni moja wapo ya maktaba kubwa huko Kerala ilianza mnamo 1949. Karibu vitabu 30000 pamoja na riwaya, vitabu vya watoto, hadithi, mashairi, vedas, upanishads nk Inapatikana katika chumba chake cha sekunde na chumba cha kulala cha chumba cha kulala, chumba cha kulala, chumba cha kulala, chumba cha kulala, chumba cha kulala, vedas, vedas, upanishads.
Tuzo nyingi na utambuzi unaheshimiwa. Alipokea Tuzo ya Maktaba Bora ya Maktaba ya Jimbo la Kerala katika Wilaya ya Idukki, mnamo 2014. Tuzo la Rajaram Mohunroy Library Foundation, Tuzo za KSLC nk ..
https://www.facebook.com/janaranjinikolani

Pamoja na hesabu ya kiasi cha milioni 8.5 na majarida zaidi ya 25,000 yaliyosambazwa katika Maktaba ya Chuo Kikuu cha Kati (UB) na maktaba 49 maalum za Taasisi, mfumo wa maktaba wa FU ndio mkubwa zaidi nchini Ujerumani. Vitu vilivyochapishwa tangu 1990 vimewekwa wazi kabisa na vinapatikana kupitia OPAC. UB imepewa hadhi ya "Maktaba ya Umoja wa Mataifa ya Umoja wa Mataifa" na imeunganishwa na mfumo wa maktaba ya kimataifa ya UN chini ya mwelekeo wa Maktaba ya Dag Hammarskjöld huko New York. Jumuiya ya Ulaya pia hutumia UB kama "kituo cha nyaraka za Ulaya".
Kama sehemu ya Maktaba ya UN na EU, ina machapisho yote ya Mkutano Mkuu wa UN, Baraza la Usalama la UN, Korti ya Haki ya Kimataifa na machapisho kutoka Baraza la Ulaya na Shirika la Usalama na Ushirikiano barani Ulaya.

Maktaba ya utafiti wa awali iliundwa mnamo 1928, mwaka mmoja baada ya kuanzishwa kwa Ampas. Inafadhiliwa na Academy Foundation, ambayo ni Idara ya elimu ya Ampas. Ni moja wapo ya maktaba kubwa ya utafiti wa filamu ulimwenguni, ikishikilia zaidi ya vitabu 32,000, skrini 80,000, na faili 300,000 za milio. Vifaa vingine kwenye maktaba ni mabango 35,000, picha milioni 10, nakala za nakala 2,400, mavazi na utengenezaji na michoro za mavazi, muziki wa karatasi na alama za muziki, na vifaa vya matangazo, pamoja na vitabu vya waandishi wa habari na kadi za kushawishi. Kuna pia mabaki kama vile Tuzo za Tuzo za Chuo. Maktaba inasimamiwa na Bodi ya Magavana ya Chuo.

"Tulibuni jengo hilo kutoka ndani, sio nje," alisema Loretta H. Cockrum, mwanzilishi wa Foram, Mwenyekiti na Mkurugenzi Mtendaji. "Tulitaka jengo bora zaidi la ofisi lililowahi kubuniwa, bila nafasi ya kupoteza au nishati ya kupoteza. Hii ni jengo la siku zijazo zaidi ya jengo la sasa. Upendo mwingi umeingia kwenye jengo hilo, na kiburi sana."

Muziki uliokithiri unabaki London. Mnamo 2005 iliongezeka kuwa ni pamoja na kituo cha uzalishaji huko Santa Monica, California. Ofisi za ziada zilifunguliwa ulimwenguni, na mnamo 2016, uliokithiri ulikuwa umeunda maktaba ambayo ilikuwa na hakimiliki za asili 15,000. Akigundua ukubwa wake na athari za kutumia muziki wa hali ya juu tu kwenye maktaba, Emanuel alisema:
"Tunafanya upasuaji sana juu ya kile tunachoweka kwenye orodha," anasema. "Ushindani wetu mkubwa, ambao tunazidi, wana hakimiliki milioni."

Daraja la zamani la Appleton ni daraja la kihistoria la Pratt Truss Iron lililopo Old Appleton, Kata ya Cape Girardeau na Kata ya Perry, Missouri. Ilijengwa mnamo 1879, na ina chuma kilichotengenezwa, kilichounganishwa na pini, Pratt kupitia span kuu ya truss, na njia mbili zilizounganishwa na pini, tatu za Pratt Pony-Truss. Inakaa kwenye piers za uashi wa chokaa. Urefu wa daraja ni.

question_en: How big is the South African army?
pos_context_en: The role of the Army was fundamentally changed by the upheavals of the early 1990s and after 1994 the Army became part of the new South African National Defence Force. It is now becoming increasingly involved in peacekeeping efforts in southern Africa, often as part of wider African Union operations. The Army is composed of roughly 40,100 regular uniformed personnel, augmented by 12,300 reserve force personnel. The rank/age structure of the army, which deteriorated desperately during the 1990s, is greatly improving through the Military Skills Development (MSDS) voluntary national service system. Through this system, young healthy members are being inducted into the regular and reserve forces every year.
neg_context_en:
The South African Army maintains large bases in all 9 provinces of the country, mostly in or around major cities and towns:
The army has 10 general support bases, seemingly part of the South African Army Support Formation.

The South African National Defence Force (SANDF) was created in 1994, as an all-volunteer military composed of the former South African Defence Force, the forces of the African nationalist groups (Umkhonto we Sizwe and Azanian People's Liberation Army), and the former Bantustan defence forces. The SANDF is subdivided into four branches, the South African Army, the South African Air Force, the South African Navy, and the South African Military Health Service. In recent years, the SANDF has become a major peacekeeping force in Africa, and has been involved in operations in Lesotho, the DRC, and Burundi, amongst others. It has also served in multinational UN peacekeeping forces such as the UN Force Intervention Brigade for example.

43 South African Brigade is a formation of the South African Army. It was established on 2 April 1997 at Wallmannsthal, Gauteng as 43 Mechanised Brigade and then changed to 43 South African Brigade in 1999. Administratively, the headquarters answers to the Chief of the Army. Operationally and for force training, the formation takes instructions from the Joint Operations Division. Units and subunits are attached as required for the task at hand. When not required, those units remain part of their respective type formations.

The SA Army command structure is as follows:The two standing army brigades are Headquarters 43 South African Brigade and Headquarters 46 South African Brigade. Each of these two headquarters are organised to provide four headquarters groups. Two of these units should be available for deployment at any one time whilst the other two are on leave and in training.

With the declaration of war in September 1939, the South African Army numbered only 5,353 regulars, with an additional 14,631 men of the Active Citizen Force (ACF) which gave peace time training to volunteers and in time of war would form the main body of the army. Pre-war plans did not anticipate that the army would fight outside southern Africa and it was trained and equipped only for bush warfare.

In 2000 the Corps became known as the South African Army Infantry Formation. The first woman battalion commander appears to have been appointed in 2001. The specialised horse/motorcycle/dog-using battalion, 12 South African Infantry Battalion, was disbanded in April 2005. The previous General Officer Commanding up to 2012 was Lieutenant General Themba Nkabinde.
Since 1994, South Africa's Infantry units have supported numerous operations for the United Nations and the African Union across the continent, including in the Democratic Republic of the Congo (MONUC/MONUSCO), the Force Intervention Brigade in particular, Burundi (South African Protection Support Detachment, and African Union Mission in Burundi), in the Comores, and with AMIS/UNMIS in the Sudan.

12 South African Infantry Battalion was a horse, dog and motorbike assisted infantry unit of the South African Army, which provided horse-mounted infantry and dog handlers to the army for defence purposes.

The South African National Defence Force has however started to remedy the situation with the procurement of 238 Patria AMV infantry fighting vehicles under the "Hoefyster" programme. Other procurements are planned and should follow in line with the guideline document – "Army Vision 2020". The SANDF has launched a project called "African Warrior" which is aimed in modernising the equipment and weapons of the SANDF. The project has been very successful in recent years and the South African Army has now put in service a 21st-century R4 assault rifle.

The South African Defence Force used it extensively in the early stages of the South African Border War, including Operation Savannah, calling it the G2. Approximately 72 are still held in reserve by the South African Army.
question_src: Jeshi la Afrika Kusini ni kubwa kiasi gani?
pos_context_src: Jukumu la jeshi lilibadilishwa kimsingi na machafuko ya miaka ya mapema ya 1990 na baada ya 1994 Jeshi likawa sehemu ya Jeshi la Ulinzi la Kitaifa la Afrika Kusini. Sasa inazidi kuhusika katika juhudi za kulinda amani kusini mwa Afrika, mara nyingi kama sehemu ya shughuli pana za umoja wa Afrika. Jeshi linaundwa na wafanyikazi takriban 40,100 wa sare za kawaida, zilizoongezewa na wafanyikazi wa vikosi 12,300. Muundo wa kiwango cha jeshi/umri wa jeshi, ambao ulizorota sana wakati wa miaka ya 1990, unaboresha sana kupitia mfumo wa huduma ya kitaifa ya Ustadi wa Jeshi (MSDS). Kupitia mfumo huu, washiriki wachanga wenye afya wanaingizwa katika vikosi vya kawaida na vya akiba kila mwaka.
neg_context_title_src: Uundaji wa watoto wa Jeshi la Afrika Kusini
Battalion ya watoto wachanga wa Afrika Kusini
neg_context_src:
Jeshi la Afrika Kusini linashikilia besi kubwa katika majimbo yote 9 ya nchi, zaidi katika miji na miji mikubwa na miji:
Jeshi lina misingi 10 ya msaada wa jumla, inaonekana kuwa sehemu ya muundo wa msaada wa Jeshi la Afrika Kusini.

Kikosi cha Ulinzi cha Kitaifa cha Afrika Kusini (SANDF) kiliundwa mnamo 1994, kama jeshi la kujitolea linalojumuisha Kikosi cha zamani cha Ulinzi cha Afrika Kusini, vikosi vya vikundi vya kitaifa vya Afrika (Umkhonto We Sizwe na Jeshi la Ukombozi la Watu wa Azania), na Kikosi cha zamani cha Ulinzi cha Bantustan. Sandf imegawanywa katika matawi manne, Jeshi la Afrika Kusini, Jeshi la Anga la Afrika Kusini, Jeshi la Afrika Kusini, na Huduma ya Afya ya Jeshi la Afrika Kusini. Katika miaka ya hivi karibuni, Sandf imekuwa nguvu kubwa ya kulinda amani barani Afrika, na imekuwa ikihusika katika shughuli huko Lesotho, DRC, na Burundi, miongoni mwa zingine. Pia imetumika katika vikosi vya kimataifa vya kulinda amani vya UN kama vile Brigade ya Kuingilia UN kwa mfano.

Brigade ya Afrika Kusini ni malezi ya Jeshi la Afrika Kusini. Ilianzishwa mnamo 2 Aprili 1997 huko Wallmannsthal, Gauteng kama 43 Mechanized Brigade na kisha ikabadilishwa kuwa Brigade 43 Afrika Kusini mnamo 1999. Kimsingi, makao makuu yanajibu kwa mkuu wa jeshi. Kwa operesheni na kwa mafunzo ya nguvu, malezi inachukua maagizo kutoka kwa mgawanyiko wa shughuli za pamoja. Vitengo na subunits vimeambatanishwa kama inavyotakiwa kwa kazi uliyonayo. Wakati hazihitajiki, vitengo hivyo vinabaki kuwa sehemu ya aina zao za aina.

Muundo wa Amri ya Jeshi la SA ni kama ifuatavyo: Brigade mbili za jeshi zilizosimama ni makao makuu 43 Brigade ya Afrika Kusini na makao makuu 46 Brigade ya Afrika Kusini. Kila moja ya makao makuu haya mawili yamepangwa kutoa vikundi vinne vya makao makuu. Vitengo viwili kati ya hizi vinapaswa kupatikana kwa kupelekwa wakati wowote wakati mwingine wawili wako likizo na mafunzo.

Pamoja na Azimio la Vita mnamo Septemba 1939, Jeshi la Afrika Kusini lilikuwa na sheria 5,353 tu, na wanaume 14,631 wa Kikosi cha Citizen Active (ACF) ambacho kilitoa mafunzo ya wakati wa amani kwa kujitolea na wakati wa vita wangeunda kikundi kikuu cha jeshi. Mipango ya kabla ya vita haikutarajia kwamba Jeshi litapigana nje ya Afrika Kusini na lilifunzwa na kuwekwa tu kwa vita vya Bush.

Mnamo 2000 Corps ilijulikana kama Uundaji wa watoto wachanga wa Afrika Kusini. Kamanda wa kwanza wa Kikosi cha Wanawake anaonekana kuteuliwa mnamo 2001. Kikosi maalum cha farasi/pikipiki/mbwa-kutumia, 12 Battalion ya watoto wachanga wa Afrika Kusini, ilitengwa mnamo Aprili 2005. Afisa mkuu wa zamani aliyeamuru hadi 2012 alikuwa Luteni Mkuu Themba Nkabinde.
Tangu 1994, vitengo vya watoto wachanga wa Afrika Kusini vimeunga mkono shughuli nyingi kwa Umoja wa Mataifa na Jumuiya ya Afrika kote, pamoja na Jamhuri ya Kidemokrasia ya Kongo (MONUC/MONUSCO), Brigade ya Kuingilia kati, Burundi (Msaada wa Ulinzi wa Afrika Kusini, na Misheni ya Umoja wa Afrika huko Burundi), huko Comores, na Amis/Unm.

12 Battalion ya watoto wachanga wa Afrika Kusini ilikuwa farasi, mbwa na pikipiki ilisaidia kitengo cha watoto wachanga wa Jeshi la Afrika Kusini, ambalo lilitoa watoto wachanga na washughulikiaji wa mbwa kwa jeshi kwa madhumuni ya utetezi.

Kikosi cha Ulinzi cha Kitaifa cha Afrika Kusini kimeanza kurekebisha hali hiyo na ununuzi wa magari 238 ya Patria AMV ya kupigania magari chini ya mpango wa "Hoefyster". Ununuzi mwingine umepangwa na unapaswa kufuata sambamba na hati ya mwongozo - "Maono ya Jeshi 2020". Sandf imezindua mradi unaoitwa "shujaa wa Afrika" ambao unakusudia kurekebisha vifaa na silaha za Sandf. Mradi huo umefanikiwa sana katika miaka ya hivi karibuni na Jeshi la Afrika Kusini sasa limefanya kazi ya bunduki ya kushambulia ya R4 ya karne ya 21.

Kikosi cha Ulinzi cha Afrika Kusini kilitumia sana katika hatua za mwanzo za vita vya mpaka wa Afrika Kusini, pamoja na Operesheni Savannah, na kuiita G2. Takriban 72 bado hushikiliwa na Jeshi la Afrika Kusini.
report_src: Jeshi la Afrika Kusini lina takriban wanajeshi 40,100 waliovaa sare za kawaida, na juhudi hizi zinaongezewa na takriban wanajeshi 12,300 wa vikosi vya akiba, hivyo kufanya ukubwa wake kufikia jumla ya karibu wanajeshi 52,400 kwa sasa [1].

question_en: Who is the current mayor of Mexico City?
pos_context_en: Claudia Sheinbaum Pardo is a Mexican scientist, politician and incumbent mayor of Mexico City. She jointly received the Nobel Peace Prize in 2007 as a member of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change. She was elected as mayor on July 1, 2018 as part of the Juntos Haremos Historia coalition. She is the second woman to serve as mayor but the first to be elected and the first member of the Jewish faith to be elected mayor of Mexico City.
neg_context_en: The mayor of Albuquerque, New Mexico is the chief executive officer of the city, elected for a four-year term. There are no term limits for the mayor. Under the New Mexico State Constitution, municipal elections are nonpartisan. The 30th and current Mayor is Tim Keller, a Democrat.

Rosario Robles Berlanga (; born 1956) is a Mexican politician who served as the Secretary of Social Development in the cabinet of Enrique Peña Nieto. She also was substitute Head of Government of the Federal District ("Mayor of Mexico City") when Cuauhtémoc Cárdenas resigned from the post to run for the Mexican presidential election, in 2000. She was the first female Mayor of Mexico City.
The Mayor of Albuquerque holds a full-time paid elected position with a four-year term. Elections for Mayor are nonpartisan. The current mayor is Tim Keller, who was elected in 2017.

The Torre Mayor (literally "Major Tower") is a skyscraper in Mexico City, Mexico. With a height of 225 metres (738 feet) to the top floor and 55 stories, it is the third tallest building in Mexico. It was surpassed in height by Torre BBVA Bancomer in 2015, which in turn was surpassed by Torre Reforma. From its completion in 2003 until 2010 (when it was surpassed by the 236 meter (774 ft) high Ocean Two in Panama City. ) it was also the tallest building in Latin America. The Torre Mayor was developed by Canadian businessman Paul Reichmann, who also maintains part ownership. It is also part-owned by a group of institutional investors. The building was designed by the architectural firms of Zeidler Partnership Architects and Executive Architects Adamson Associates Architects, both of Toronto. The structural engineers and designers were The Cantor Seinuk Group from New York City in association with Enrique Martínez Romero S.A. in Mexico City (Engineering News-Record, June 30, 2003).

Hazel Park utilizes the Council-Manager form of government, and thus is governed by a City Council consisting of a Mayor and four council members. The city council appoints a City Manager, who manages the day-to-day operations of the city. The current mayor of Hazel Park is Michael Webb, who succeeded Jeffrey Keeton, who served as mayor "pro tempore" until the resignation of former mayor Jan Parisi, in December 2016. Jan Parisi, the city’s first female mayor, stepped down due to health-and family-related reasons. Jan Parisi had replaced Jack Lloyd on June 17, 2014. The current city manager is Edward Klobucher. City government is located on the same block as the public library, police station and post office, at 9 Mile Road and John R. Road.

The Phoenix City Council consists of a mayor and eight city council members. While the mayor is elected in a citywide election, city council members are elected by votes only in the districts they represent, with both the mayor and councillors serving four year terms. The current mayor of Phoenix is Thelda Williams, a Republican who was appointed to serve until a special election can be held to replace Greg Stanton, who resigned to run for Congress. In setting city policy and passing rules and regulations, the mayor and city council members each have equal voting power.

The current mayor of the city is Sébastien D'Astous, who took office on February 20, 2015 after winning a by-election following the death in office of former mayor Ulrick Chérubin in September 2014. In the by-election D'Astous, formerly a city councillor, defeated Donald Blanchet, who had served as interim mayor between Chérubin's death and the by-election.

Betsabeé Romero's installation "Canto de Agua" (Song of water) was held in the Zócalo of Mexico City (2016), and opened by the mayor of Mexico City, Miguel Ángel Mancera. The installation combined the cultural traditions of the Day of the Dead ofrenda or offering; the trajinera, a traditional type of flat-bottomed boat; and the social concerns of the present. 103 trajineras were decorated as offerings to commemorate those who had died during the year and to connect their deaths to social conditions and problems of Mexico City. The trajineras were created by Mexican artisans from Ciudad Nezahualcóyotl and reflect traditions of pre-Hispanic times in which trajineras circulated in Tenochtitlán.

The Palacio de Correos de Mexico (Postal Palace of Mexico City) also known as the "Correo Mayor" (Main Post Office) is located in the historic center of Mexico City, on the Eje Central (Lazaro Cardenas) near the Palacio de Bellas Artes. It is an early 20th-century building built in the style of an Italian Renaissance palace. It was designed by Italian Adamo Boari, who also designed part of the Palacio de Bellas Artes across the street.
question_src: Meya wa sasa wa Mexico City?
pos_context_src: Claudia Sheinbaum Pardo ni mwanasayansi wa Mexico, mwanasiasa na meya anayehusika wa Mexico City. Kwa pamoja alipokea Tuzo la Amani la Nobel mnamo 2007 kama mwanachama wa jopo la serikali juu ya mabadiliko ya hali ya hewa. Alichaguliwa kama meya mnamo Julai 1, 2018 kama sehemu ya Juntos Haremos Historia Coalition. Yeye ndiye mwanamke wa pili kutumika kama meya lakini wa kwanza kuchaguliwa na mshiriki wa kwanza wa imani ya Kiyahudi kuchaguliwa Meya wa Mexico City.
neg_context_title_src: Kituo cha kihistoria cha Mexico City
neg_context_src: Meya wa Albuquerque, New Mexico ndiye afisa mkuu mtendaji wa jiji hilo, aliyechaguliwa kwa kipindi cha miaka minne. Hakuna mipaka ya muda kwa meya. Chini ya Katiba ya Jimbo la New Mexico, uchaguzi wa manispaa sio wa kawaida. Meya wa 30 na wa sasa ni Tim Keller, Democrat.

Rosario Robles Berlanga (; amezaliwa 1956) ni mwanasiasa wa Mexico ambaye alikuwa Katibu wa Maendeleo ya Jamii katika Baraza la Mawaziri la Enrique Peña Nieto. Yeye pia alikuwa mkuu wa serikali ya wilaya ya shirikisho ("Meya wa Mexico City") wakati Cuauhtémoc Cárdenas alijiuzulu katika wadhifa huo ili kugombea uchaguzi wa rais wa Mexico, mnamo 2000. Alikuwa meya wa kwanza wa Mexico City.
Meya wa Albuquerque anashikilia nafasi iliyochaguliwa ya muda wote na kipindi cha miaka minne. Uchaguzi kwa meya sio wa kawaida. Meya wa sasa ni Tim Keller, ambaye alichaguliwa mnamo 2017.

Meya wa Torre (halisi "mnara mkubwa") ni skyscraper huko Mexico City, Mexico. Na urefu wa mita 225 (miguu 738) hadi sakafu ya juu na hadithi 55, ni jengo la tatu refu zaidi huko Mexico. Ilizidi kwa urefu na Torre BBVA Bancomer mnamo 2015, ambayo ilizidiwa na Torre Reforma. Kuanzia kukamilika kwake mnamo 2003 hadi 2010 (wakati ilizidiwa na mita 236 (774 ft) Bahari ya Juu katika Jiji la Panama.) Pia ilikuwa jengo refu zaidi huko Latin America. Meya wa Torre alitengenezwa na mfanyabiashara wa Canada Paul Reichmann, ambaye pia anamiliki umiliki wa sehemu. Pia inamilikiwa na kikundi cha wawekezaji wa taasisi. Jengo hilo lilibuniwa na mashirika ya usanifu wa wasanifu wa Ushirikiano wa Zeidler na wasanifu wakuu wa Adamson Associates Wasanifu, wote wa Toronto. Wahandisi wa miundo na wabuni walikuwa kikundi cha Cantor Seinuk kutoka New York City kwa kushirikiana na Enrique Martínez Romero S.A. huko Mexico City (Rekodi ya Habari ya Uhandisi, Juni 30, 2003).

Hazel Park hutumia aina ya meneja wa baraza, na kwa hivyo inasimamiwa na baraza la jiji linalojumuisha meya na wanachama wanne wa baraza. Halmashauri ya jiji huteua meneja wa jiji, ambaye anasimamia shughuli za kila siku za jiji. Meya wa sasa wa Hazel Park ni Michael Webb, ambaye alifaulu Jeffrey Keeton, ambaye aliwahi kuwa Meya "Pro Tempore" hadi kujiuzulu kwa Meya wa zamani Jan Parisi, mnamo Desemba 2016. Jan Parisi, meya wa kwanza wa jiji hilo, alishuka kwa sababu ya afya na familia. Jan Parisi alikuwa amechukua nafasi ya Jack Lloyd mnamo Juni 17, 2014. Meneja wa jiji la sasa ni Edward Klobucher. Serikali ya jiji iko kwenye kizuizi sawa na Maktaba ya Umma, Kituo cha Polisi na Ofisi ya Posta, katika Barabara ya 9 Mile na John R. Road.

Halmashauri ya Jiji la Phoenix ina Meya na wanachama wanane wa Halmashauri ya Jiji. Wakati Meya amechaguliwa katika uchaguzi wa jiji lote, wanachama wa Halmashauri ya Jiji huchaguliwa na kura tu katika wilaya wanazowakilisha, na meya na madiwani wote wanaotumikia miaka minne. Meya wa sasa wa Phoenix ni Thelda Williams, Republican ambaye aliteuliwa kutumikia hadi uchaguzi maalum utakapofanyika kuchukua nafasi ya Greg Stanton, ambaye alijiuzulu kwa Congress. Katika kuweka sera za jiji na kupitisha sheria na kanuni, meya na wanachama wa baraza la jiji kila mmoja ana nguvu sawa ya kupiga kura.

Meya wa sasa wa jiji hilo ni Sébastien d'Astous, ambaye alichukua madaraka mnamo Februari 20, 2015 baada ya kushinda uchaguzi mdogo kufuatia kifo hicho katika ofisi ya Meya wa zamani Ulrick Chérubin mnamo Septemba 2014. Katika uchaguzi mdogo wa D'Astous, zamani wa diwani wa jiji, alishinda Donald Blanchet, ambaye alikuwa amehudumia kati ya Meya kati ya Meya kati ya Meya kati ya kati ya Chim.

Ufungaji wa Betsabeé Romero "Canto de Agua" (Wimbo wa Maji) ulifanyika katika Zócalo ya Mexico City (2016), na kufunguliwa na Meya wa Mexico City, Miguel Ángel Mantera. Ufungaji huo ulijumuisha mila ya kitamaduni ya siku ya wafu Ofrenda au toleo; Trajinera, aina ya jadi ya mashua iliyo chini ya gorofa; na wasiwasi wa kijamii wa sasa. Trajinera 103 walipambwa kama sadaka ya kuwaadhimisha wale ambao walikuwa wamekufa wakati wa mwaka na kuunganisha vifo vyao na hali ya kijamii na shida za Mexico City. Trajineras ziliundwa na mafundi wa Mexico kutoka Ciudad Nezahualcóyotl na kuonyesha mila ya nyakati za kabla ya Rico ambayo Trajineras ilizunguka huko Tenochtitlán.

Palacio de Correos de Mexico (Jumba la Posta la Mexico City) pia inajulikana kama "Meya wa Correo" (Ofisi kuu ya Posta) iko katika kituo cha kihistoria cha Mexico City, kwenye Eje Central (Lazaro Cardenas) karibu na Sanaa ya Palacio de Bellas. Ni jengo la mapema la karne ya 20 lililojengwa kwa mtindo wa ikulu ya Renaissance ya Italia. Iliundwa na Adamo Boari wa Italia, ambaye pia alibuni sehemu ya Sanaa ya Palacio de Bellas barabarani.

question_en: Who did Rupert murder?
pos_context_en: James Urban Ruppert (born March 29, 1934), is an American murderer, who was responsible for one of the deadliest shootings inside a private residence in US history. On Easter Sunday, March 30, 1975, Ruppert murdered 11 family members in his mother's house at 635 Minor Avenue in Hamilton, Ohio in what has been referred to as the "Easter Sunday Massacre." He is serving two life sentences at the Allen Oakwood Correctional Institution in Lima, Ohio.
neg_context_en: It is nevertheless undisputed that Frederick was murdered during his journey home by Count Henry VII of Waldeck and his henchmen, who included Friedrich von Hertingshausen and Konrad von Falkenberg. The murder may have served to get rid of a royal candidate; or the story of the royal election may have sprung up to find a motive for the murder. The assassination caused much concern at the time; a stone cross ("Kaiserkreuz") was erected at its location in Kleinenglis near Fritzlar. By order of King Rupert, the murderers had to donate an altar in Saint Peter's Church, Fritzlar to atone for their crime. Frederick was entombed in Brunswick Cathedral.

Rupert's imprisonment became more relaxed on the advice of the Archduke Leopold, Ferdinand's younger brother, who met and grew to like Rupert. Rupert practised etching, played tennis, practised shooting, read military textbooks and was taken on accompanied hunting trips. He also entered into a romantic affair with Susan Kuffstein, the daughter of Count von Kuffstein, his gaoler. He received a present of a rare white poodle that Rupert called Boy, or sometimes Pudel, and which remained with him into the English Civil War. Despite attempts by a Franco-Swedish army to seize Linz and free Rupert, his release was ultimately negotiated through Leopold and the Empress Maria Anna; in exchange for a commitment never again to take up arms against the Emperor, Rupert would be released. Rupert formally kissed the Emperor's hand at the end of 1641, turned down a final offer of an Imperial command and left Germany for England.

After a failed attempt to bribe his way free of his guards, Rupert was imprisoned in Linz. Lord Craven, also taken in the battle, attempted to persuade his captors to allow him to remain with Rupert, but was refused. Rupert's imprisonment was surrounded by religious overtones. His mother was deeply concerned that he might be converted from Calvinism to Catholicism; his captors, encouraged by Emperor Ferdinand III, deployed Jesuit priests in an attempt to convert him. The Emperor went further, proffering the option of freedom, a position as an Imperial general and a small principality if Rupert would convert. Rupert refused.

"We designed the building from the inside out, not the outside in,” said Loretta H. Cockrum, Foram’s founder, chairman and CEO. “We wanted the most efficient office building ever designed, with no wasted space or wasted energy. This is a building of the future more than a building of the present. A lot of love has gone into that building, and a lot of pride."

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.
Rupert Kenneth Furneaux (June 29, 1908 - 1981) was a British author who wrote many books on mysteries, murder trials and true crime.

From May 1973 to September 1974, Abdelghani Bousta lived in hiding. During this time, he realised the mistakes made when the March 1973 events were organised. In 1975, he wrote a critical analysis of UNFP on behalf of the Option Révolutionnaire (Revolutionary option) movement, harshly criticising the events and the leaders: “[…] the March 1973 events helped shed light on the internal contradictions of the Party and show the true nature of its leaders: putschist and adventurous leaders who did not see any problem in sacrificing dozens of activists in a hazardous battle.”

If watched carefully, one can clearly see two roads parallel to the shoreline,” the Russian Foreign Ministry said. “But there aren't such roads in the indicated area of Abkhazia’s coast. question_src: Je! Rupert aliua nani?
pos_context_src: James Urban Ruppert (amezaliwa Machi 29, 1934), ni muuaji wa Amerika, ambaye alikuwa na jukumu la moja ya risasi mbaya zaidi ndani ya makazi ya kibinafsi katika historia ya Amerika. Siku ya Jumapili ya Pasaka, Machi 30, 1975, Ruppert aliwauwa wanafamilia 11 katika nyumba ya mama yake katika 635 Mdogo Avenue huko Hamilton, Ohio katika kile ambacho kimejulikana kama "mauaji ya Jumapili ya Pasaka." Anahudumia sentensi mbili za maisha katika Taasisi ya Urekebishaji ya Allen Oakwood huko Lima, Ohio.
neg_context_title_src: 2008 Upigaji ndege wa kupeleleza wa Georgia
neg_context_src: Hata hivyo haijasemwa kwamba Frederick aliuawa wakati wa safari yake ya kwenda nyumbani na Count Henry VII wa Waldeck na wakuu wake, ambao ni pamoja na Friedrich von Hertingshausen na Konrad von Falkenberg. Mauaji hayo yanaweza kuwa yalimwondoa mgombea wa kifalme; Au hadithi ya uchaguzi wa kifalme inaweza kuwa imeibuka ili kupata nia ya mauaji. Uuaji huo ulisababisha wasiwasi mkubwa wakati huo; Msalaba wa jiwe ("Kaiserkreuz") ulijengwa katika eneo lake huko Kleinenglis karibu na Fritzlar. Kwa agizo la Mfalme Rupert, wauaji walilazimika kutoa madhabahu katika kanisa la Mtakatifu Peter, Fritzlar ili kulipia uhalifu wao. Frederick aliingizwa katika Kanisa kuu la Brunswick.

Kufungwa kwa Rupert kulirudishwa zaidi juu ya ushauri wa Archduke Leopold, kaka mdogo wa Ferdinand, ambaye alikutana na kukua kama Rupert. Rupert alifanya mazoezi, alicheza tenisi, akafanya mazoezi ya risasi, akasoma vitabu vya kijeshi na akachukuliwa kwa safari za uwindaji. Aliingia pia katika uhusiano wa kimapenzi na Susan Kuffstein, binti ya Count von Kuffstein, gaoler wake. Alipokea zawadi ya poodle nyeupe adimu ambayo Rupert alimwita Boy, au wakati mwingine Pudel, na ambayo ilibaki naye kwenye Vita vya wenyewe kwa wenyewe vya Kiingereza. Licha ya majaribio ya jeshi la Franco-Swedish kumtia Linz na Rupert ya bure, kutolewa kwake hatimaye kulijadiliwa kupitia Leopold na Empress Maria Anna; Badala ya kujitolea kamwe kuchukua silaha dhidi ya Mfalme, Rupert angeachiliwa. Rupert alimbusu rasmi mkono wa Mtawala mwishoni mwa 1641, akakataa ofa ya mwisho ya amri ya kifalme na akaondoka Ujerumani kwenda England.

Baada ya jaribio lililoshindwa la kutoa rushwa kwa walinzi wake, Rupert alifungwa gerezani huko Linz. Lord Craven, pia alichukuliwa vitani, alijaribu kuwashawishi watekaji wake wamruhusu abaki na Rupert, lakini alikataliwa. Kufungwa kwa Rupert kulizungukwa na overtones za kidini. Mama yake alikuwa na wasiwasi sana kwamba anaweza kubadilishwa kutoka kwa Kalvinism kwenda Ukatoliki; Watekaji wake, wakitiwa moyo na Mtawala Ferdinand III, walipeleka makuhani wa Jesuit katika jaribio la kumbadilisha. Mfalme alikwenda zaidi, akielezea chaguo la uhuru, msimamo kama mkuu wa kifalme na kanuni ndogo ikiwa Rupert angebadilisha. Rupert alikataa.

"Tulibuni jengo hilo kutoka ndani, sio nje," alisema Loretta H. Cockrum, mwanzilishi wa Foram, Mwenyekiti na Mkurugenzi Mtendaji. "Tulitaka jengo bora zaidi la ofisi lililowahi kubuniwa, bila nafasi ya kupoteza au nishati ya kupoteza. Hii ni jengo la siku zijazo zaidi ya jengo la sasa. Upendo mwingi umeingia kwenye jengo hilo, na kiburi sana."

Winfield Toll Bridge, pia inajulikana kama Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, ni kihistoria wa kihistoria wa Cantilever Warren Truss Bridge iliyoko Winfield na Red House, Kaunti ya Putnam, West Virginia. Ilijengwa mnamo 1955, na inachukua Mto wa Kanawha, iliyobeba West Virginia Route 34. Cantilever kupitia-truss ina nafasi mbili za nanga kila futi 245 kwa urefu na urefu wa futi 462 kwa urefu kati ya mistari ya kituo cha pier. Span kuu ina futi mbili 128, inchi 4, mikono ya cantilever na miguu 205, inchi 4, iliyosimamishwa.
Rupert Kenneth Furneaux (Juni 29, 1908 - 1981) alikuwa mwandishi wa Uingereza ambaye aliandika vitabu vingi juu ya siri, majaribio ya mauaji na uhalifu wa kweli.

Kuanzia Mei 1973 hadi Septemba 1974, Abdelghani Bousta aliishi mafichoni. Wakati huu, aligundua makosa yaliyofanywa wakati matukio ya Machi 1973 yalipangwa. Mnamo 1975, aliandika uchambuzi muhimu wa UNFP kwa niaba ya chaguo RévolutionNaire (Chaguo la Mapinduzi), akikosoa vikali matukio na viongozi: "[…] Matukio ya Machi 1973 yalisaidia kutoa mwanga juu ya utata wa ndani wa chama hicho na kuonyesha hali ya kweli ya viongozi wake: Viongozi wa Adsonates.
S͎ inawakilishwa katika Unicode na S na U+034E (unachanganya mshale wa juu chini).

Pia ilidai kuwa njia nyeupe za moshi kama vile kuonekana nyuma ya kombora kwenye onyesho kawaida hufanyika kutoka kwa uzinduzi wa kombora la ardhini, na kamwe na makombora ya hewa-hewa.
"Hii sio orodha kamili ya kutokwenda katika video iliyohaririwa wazi. [Picha haitoi] picha wazi ya lini na video hiyo ilirekodiwa. Ikiwa imetazamwa kwa uangalifu, mtu anaweza kuona wazi barabara mbili zikiwa na ufukweni," Wizara ya Mambo ya nje ya Urusi ilisema. "Lakini hakuna barabara kama hizi katika eneo lililoonyeshwa la pwani ya Abkhazia. Fukwe maarufu za mchanga wa Abkhazia - mita 100 kwa upana - hazionekani kwenye picha, ingawa zinaweza kuonekana na satelaiti."

question_en: Does Prey 2 exist?
pos_context_en: Arkane's "Prey" is largely unrelated to the 2006 game "Prey" developed by Human Head Studios, and is considered a reimagining of the intellectual property set in a wholly new narrative. While "Prey 2", a sequel to the 2006 game, had been planned by Human Head, it fell into development hell following transfer of the intellectual property from 3D Realms to Bethesda Softworks, and was eventually cancelled in 2014. Arkane's game does not use any of the planned sequel's assets, and only incorporates the previous game's name and the broad theme of the protagonist being hunted by aliens. Arkane built "Prey" as a spiritual sequel to "System Shock", providing the player with several potential means of progressing within the game.
neg_context_en: In June 2007, Miller co-founded a brand-management organization Radar Group, which was designed to help fledging development studios bring their games to publishers and distributors. "Prey 2" was one of three titles that Radar Group announced it was backing in March 2008, along with "Earth No More" and "Incarnate". At this point, "Prey 2" was described to be a narrative sequel to "Prey". In the game, Tommy abandons Earth as he is accused of the disappearance of his family and his girlfriend. At this point in development, "Prey 2" would have continued to be a first-person shooter using the portal/gravity-based gameplay as from the original game.

Bethesda announced at their press conference at the Electronic Entertainment Expo 2016 in June that they would be publishing a reboot of "Prey", also titled "Prey" to be developed by Arkane Studios. This game will not use any of the materials developed for "Prey 2", outside of the IP and the franchise concepts. Arkane Studios CEO and director Raphaël Colantonio said that at the time of completing "Dishonored", they sought to do a second project alongside "Dishonored 2", one that was "in first-person, with depth and simulation and narration", and that they opted to use the "Prey" narrative as it matched these thematic concepts well, but otherwise greatly different in gameplay. Hines added that when considering the core concept of the original 2006 "Prey" was about aliens chasing after the player-character, they felt the name worked well for the game that Arkane had pitched, and they did not have to be beholden to retain anything else about the original game. This gave Arkane's team the freedom it needed to do to complete their game without needing to consider the franchise's past history.

Issues regarding the development were not reported to the public at large, and due to a lack of direct information from either Bethesda or Human Head, many considered "Prey 2" to have entered development hell and creating speculation at its fate. In March 2012, rumors of "Prey 2"s cancellation began to circle; neither ZeniMax or Bethesda commented on this rumor. Instead, in the following month, they stated the game was would be delayed, and fail to make the 2012 release, though no new release window was given. Bethesda stated "the game's development [had] not progressed satisfactorily", and "the game [did] not currently meet [their] quality standards". Further concerns were raised when Bethesda removed "Prey 2" from their website in August 2012, stating to "Eurogamer" that for the present they need to focus the site on upcoming titles.

Though "Prey 2" was announced by 3D Realms in 2006, a few months after release of the first game, development work at Human Head Studios did not begin in earnest until 2009, after the rights for "Prey" had transferred from 3D Realms ultimately to ZeniMax Media, the parent company of Bethesda. Bethesda formally announced their title in early 2011, which revealed a change of the player's main character and of gameplay to a more open world game. Human Head quietly ceased development on the game in late 2011 for unstated reasons despite having progressed to a near alpha release state. Subsequently, several industrial rumors circulated that "Prey 2" had been cancelled or changed developers, including evidence that Arkane Studios had taken over development. Bethesda formally cancelled the game in 2014, stating it was not meeting their expectations. Later in 2016, Bethesda announced that a reboot of the franchise, "Prey", was set for release in 2017 and was under development by Arkane, who had taken the concepts and thematic elements of "Prey" but scrapped any previous work that had been done by Human Head.

Bethesda re-announced "Prey 2" in March 2011 for a planned 2012 release. Human Head Studios would continue to be the developer of this game. The announced game had several major changes from what had been described before while it was under development at 3D Realms/Radar Group, including the game in gameplay style as an open world game, and the shift of narrative from Tommy to Killian. Though the team had access to the newer id Tech 5 engine, they had been working since 2009 on a modified id Tech 4 engine that they opted to retain that engine. Project lead Chris Rhinehart said ""Prey 2" will provide gamers the opportunity to explore a new facet of the "Prey" universe, one that offers fast-paced action in an open, alien world. We're excited to show gamers the title we have been working on and hope they will be as excited by this title as we are." According to Pete Hines, the vice president of public relations and marketing at Bethesda, the current version of the game is what the developers wanted to make and not what has been announced before by the Radar Group. Human Head shared footage of their version of "Prey 2" with the Strong National Museum of Play in March 2018.

On 31 May 2013, "Kotaku" reported rumors that development had moved to Arkane Studios and that the development had been rebooted, scrapping all of Human Head Studios' work on "Prey 2" with a targeted release of 2016. After about a year of further rumors, Bethesda officially cancelled "Prey 2", though as described below, Arkane had started working on a "Prey" game that would be considered a reboot rather than a sequel, using none of the "Prey" concepts and none of Human Head's previous development.

The success of the original "Prey" led to the announcement of a sequel "Prey 2" in August 2006, with continued development by 3D Realms. However, the project faced a number of issues, including the transfer of the intellectual property (IP) rights to Bethesda Softworks (under ZeniMax Media) sometime by 2011. In March 2011, Bethesda announced that "Prey 2" would instead be developed by Human Head Studios using a modified id Tech 4 engine.

The first "Prey" game was released in July 2006; it had been developed by Human Head Studios, under contract with 3D Realms, and published by 2K Games. The game was considered successful; it had received Metacritic aggregate scores of 83 and 79 for the Xbox 360 and Microsoft Windows versions, respectively, and by October 2006, over one million units had been sold according to 3D Realms' Scott Miller. Miller announced as early as August 2006 that development on a sequel, "Prey 2", had started.

For unstated reasons, Human Head had quietly stopped development of "Prey 2" near the end of 2011, after having spent about two years of development on the title. Rhinehart said that at this point, "It was very close to an alpha state, with all major content pieces represented," and that they were at the point where they as developer would start working more closely with the publisher to determine what elements to keep or trim to progress further. Norm Nazaroff of Human Head believed they had added much more content and technical innovations to the title, as to make it "one of the best looking games of the [then-current] console generation". Another Human Head employee, Jason Blair, who had worked on narrative elements for "Prey 2", said that reasons for ending development were "political" and "petty".
question_src: Je! Mawindo 2 yapo?
pos_context_src: "Mawindo" ya Arkane hayahusiani na mchezo wa 2006 "mawindo" yaliyotengenezwa na studio za kichwa cha binadamu, na inachukuliwa kuwa kufikiria tena mali ya akili iliyowekwa katika simulizi mpya kabisa. Wakati "Prey 2", mpangilio wa mchezo wa 2006, ulikuwa umepangwa na kichwa cha mwanadamu, ilianguka ndani ya ukuzaji wa kuzimu kufuatia uhamishaji wa mali ya akili kutoka Realms ya 3D kwenda kwa Bethesda Softworks, na mwishowe ilifutwa mnamo 2014. Mchezo wa Arkane hautumii yoyote ya mpangilio wa mali iliyopangwa, na inaingiza tu jina la mchezo uliopita. Arkane aliijenga "mawindo" kama njia inayofuata ya kiroho kwa "mshtuko wa mfumo", ikimpa mchezaji njia kadhaa za maendeleo ndani ya mchezo.
neg_context_src: Mnamo Juni 2007, Miller alianzisha shirika la usimamizi wa chapa ya Radar, ambayo ilibuniwa kusaidia Studios za Maendeleo kuleta michezo yao kwa wachapishaji na wasambazaji. "Prey 2" ilikuwa moja ya majina matatu ambayo Radar Group ilitangaza kuwa inaunga mkono mnamo Machi 2008, pamoja na "Dunia hakuna" na "mwili". Katika hatua hii, "mawindo 2" ilielezewa kuwa hadithi inayofuata ya "mawindo". Katika mchezo huo, Tommy anaacha Dunia kwani anatuhumiwa kutoweka kwa familia yake na rafiki yake wa kike. Katika hatua hii katika maendeleo, "Prey 2" ingeendelea kuwa mpiga risasi wa kwanza kwa kutumia mchezo wa michezo wa portal/mvuto kama kutoka kwa mchezo wa asili.

Bethesda alitangaza katika mkutano wao wa waandishi wa habari kwenye Expor Expo ya Elektroniki ya Expo ya 2016 mnamo Juni kwamba watakuwa wakichapisha reboot ya "mawindo", ambayo pia yenye jina la "Prey" itatengenezwa na Arkane Studios. Mchezo huu hautatumia vifaa vyovyote vilivyotengenezwa kwa "mawindo 2", nje ya IP na dhana za Franchise. Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa Arkane Studios na mkurugenzi Raphaël Colantonio alisema kwamba wakati wa kumaliza "kudharauliwa", walitafuta mradi wa pili kando na "Dhamana 2", ambayo ilikuwa "kwa mtu wa kwanza, kwa kina na simulizi na hadithi", na kwamba waliamua kutumia hadithi ya "mawindo" kama ilivyo kwa dhana hizi, lakini vinginevyo. Hines ameongeza kuwa wakati wa kuzingatia wazo la msingi la "mawindo" ya asili ya 2006 ilikuwa juu ya wageni kufuatia baada ya mhusika, walihisi jina likifanya kazi vizuri kwa mchezo ambao Arkane alikuwa amepiga, na hawakuhitajika kuona kuwa na kitu kingine chochote juu ya mchezo wa asili. Hii iliipa timu ya Arkane uhuru unaohitajika kufanya ili kukamilisha mchezo wao bila kuhitaji kuzingatia historia ya zamani ya Franchise.

Maswala kuhusu maendeleo hayakuripotiwa kwa umma kwa jumla, na kwa sababu ya ukosefu wa habari ya moja kwa moja kutoka kwa Bethesda au kichwa cha mwanadamu, wengi walizingatia "mawindo 2" kuwa wameingia kuzimu ya maendeleo na kuunda uvumi katika hatima yake. Mnamo Machi 2012, uvumi wa kufuta "mawindo 2" ulianza kuzungusha; Wala Zenimax au Bethesda walitoa maoni juu ya uvumi huu. Badala yake, katika mwezi uliofuata, walisema mchezo huo utacheleweshwa, na wakashindwa kufanya kutolewa kwa 2012, ingawa hakuna dirisha mpya la kutolewa lililotolewa. Bethesda alisema "maendeleo ya mchezo huo hayakuendelea kuridhisha", na "mchezo [haukufikia] viwango vyao vya ubora". Maswala zaidi yaliongezwa wakati Bethesda iliondoa "mawindo 2" kutoka kwa wavuti yao mnamo Agosti 2012, ikisema "Eurogamer" ambayo kwa sasa wanahitaji kuzingatia tovuti kwenye majina yanayokuja.

Ingawa "Prey 2" ilitangazwa na Realms ya 3D mnamo 2006, miezi michache baada ya kutolewa kwa mchezo wa kwanza, kazi ya maendeleo katika studio za kichwa cha binadamu haikuanza kwa bidii hadi 2009, baada ya haki za "mawindo" kuhamishwa kutoka Realms 3D hatimaye kwenda Zenimax Media, kampuni ya mzazi ya Bethesda. Bethesda alitangaza rasmi taji lao mapema 2011, ambayo ilifunua mabadiliko ya mhusika mkuu wa mchezaji na mchezo wa mchezo wa wazi zaidi wa ulimwengu. Kichwa cha kibinadamu kilikomesha maendeleo kwenye mchezo huo mwishoni mwa mwaka wa 2011 kwa sababu ambazo hazijakamilika licha ya kuwa na maendeleo ya karibu na hali ya kutolewa kwa Alfa. Baadaye, uvumi kadhaa wa viwandani ulizunguka kwamba "mawindo 2" yalikuwa yamefutwa au kubadilishwa watengenezaji, pamoja na ushahidi kwamba Arkane Studios ilichukua maendeleo. Bethesda alifuta rasmi mchezo huo mnamo 2014, akisema haikuwa kukidhi matarajio yao. Baadaye mnamo 2016, Bethesda alitangaza kwamba kuanza tena kwa dhamana hiyo, "mawindo", iliwekwa kutolewa mnamo 2017 na ilikuwa chini ya maendeleo na Arkane, ambaye alikuwa amechukua dhana na mambo ya "mawindo" lakini aligonga kazi yoyote ya zamani ambayo ilifanywa na kichwa cha wanadamu.

Bethesda alitangaza tena "Prey 2" mnamo Machi 2011 kwa kutolewa kwa 2012. Studio za Kichwa cha Binadamu zingeendelea kuwa msanidi programu wa mchezo huu. Mchezo uliotangazwa ulikuwa na mabadiliko kadhaa makubwa kutoka kwa yale yaliyoelezewa hapo awali wakati yalikuwa chini ya maendeleo katika 3D Realms/Radar Group, pamoja na mchezo kwa mtindo wa mchezo wa michezo kama mchezo wa wazi wa ulimwengu, na mabadiliko ya simulizi kutoka Tommy kwenda kwa Killian. Ingawa timu ilikuwa na ufikiaji wa injini mpya ya ID Tech 5, walikuwa wakifanya kazi tangu 2009 kwenye injini ya kitambulisho cha 4 cha ID ambacho waliamua kutunza injini hiyo. Kiongozi wa Mradi Chris Rhinehart alisema "" Prey 2 "itawapa waendeshaji fursa ya kuchunguza sehemu mpya ya ulimwengu wa" mawindo ", ambayo inapeana hatua ya haraka katika ulimwengu wa wazi, wa mgeni. Tunafurahi kuonyesha wahusika jina ambalo tumekuwa tukifanya kazi na tunatumai kuwa watafurahi na jina hili kama sisi." Kulingana na Pete Hines, Makamu wa Rais wa Mahusiano ya Umma na Uuzaji huko Bethesda, toleo la sasa la mchezo ni kile watengenezaji walitaka kutengeneza na sio kile kilichotangazwa hapo awali na Kikundi cha Radar. Kichwa cha wanadamu kilishiriki onyesho la toleo la "Prey 2" na Jumba la Makumbusho ya Kitaifa ya kucheza mnamo Machi 2018.

Mnamo Mei 31, 2013, "Kotaku" iliripoti uvumi kwamba maendeleo yalikuwa yamehamia Arkane Studios na kwamba maendeleo yalikuwa yamewekwa tena, ikitoa kazi zote za kichwa cha wanadamu juu ya "Prey 2" na kutolewa kwa walengwa wa 2016. Baada ya mwaka wa uvumi zaidi, Bethesda alifutwa rasmi "Prey 2", kama ilivyoelezewa hapo chini, kama ilivyoelezewa, kama ilivyoelezewa hapo chini, kama ilivyoelezewa, kama vile alivyoainishwa hapo chini, kama vile alivyoainishwa hapo chini, kama vile alivyoainishwa, kama vile alivyoainishwa, kama vile alivyoainishwa, " Badala ya mwema, bila kutumia dhana yoyote ya "mawindo" na hakuna maendeleo ya kichwa cha zamani cha mwanadamu.

Mafanikio ya "mawindo" ya asili yalisababisha kutangazwa kwa safu ya "Prey 2" mnamo Agosti 2006, na maendeleo ya kuendelea na Realms ya 3D. Walakini, mradi huo ulikabiliwa na maswala kadhaa, pamoja na uhamishaji wa haki za miliki (IP) kwa Bethesda Softworks (chini ya Zenimax Media) wakati mwingine ifikapo mwaka 2011. Mnamo Machi 2011, Bethesda ilitangaza kwamba "Prey 2" badala yake itatengenezwa na studio za kichwa cha binadamu kwa kutumia injini ya kitambulisho cha 4.

Mchezo wa kwanza wa "mawindo" ulitolewa mnamo Julai 2006; Ilikuwa imetengenezwa na studio za kichwa cha binadamu, chini ya mkataba na 3D Realms, na kuchapishwa na Michezo ya 2K. Mchezo ulizingatiwa kufanikiwa; Ilikuwa imepokea alama za jumla za metacritic za 83 na 79 kwa toleo la Xbox 360 na Microsoft Windows, mtawaliwa, na mnamo Oktoba 2006, zaidi ya vitengo milioni moja vilikuwa vimeuzwa kulingana na 3D Realms 'Scott Miller. Miller alitangaza mapema Agosti 2006 kwamba maendeleo kwenye safu, "Prey 2", yalikuwa yameanza.

Kwa sababu ambazo hazijasemwa, Mkuu wa Binadamu alikuwa amesimamisha ukuaji wa "mawindo 2" karibu na mwisho wa 2011, baada ya kukaa karibu miaka miwili ya maendeleo kwenye taji hilo. Rhinehart alisema kuwa katika hatua hii, "Ilikuwa karibu sana na hali ya alpha, na vipande vyote vikuu vya yaliyomo," na kwamba walikuwa katika hatua ambayo kama msanidi programu wangeanza kufanya kazi kwa karibu na mchapishaji kuamua vitu gani vya kuweka au kupunguza kuendelea zaidi. Norm Nazaroff wa Kichwa cha Binadamu aliamini walikuwa wameongeza maudhui zaidi na uvumbuzi wa kiufundi kwa kichwa, kama kuifanya "moja ya michezo bora ya kizazi cha [wakati huo]". Mfanyikazi mwingine wa kichwa cha mwanadamu, Jason Blair, ambaye alikuwa amefanya kazi katika hadithi za "Prey 2", alisema kuwa sababu za kumaliza maendeleo zilikuwa "za kisiasa" na "petty".
report_src: Hapana, “Mawindo 2” haipo; toleo hilo liliwekwa kwenye mipango kama mwendelezo wa mchezo wa 2006 lakini mradi uliingia kwenye matatizo makubwa ya utengenezaji baada ya haki za mali kuhamishwa kutoka 3D Realms kwenda Bethesda Softworks, na hatimaye ukafutwa rasmi mwaka 2014 [1]. Badala yake, Arkane Studios walitoa “Mawindo” nyingine mwaka 2017 ambayo si mwendelezo bali ni kufikiria upya hadithi na mifumo ya mchezo, ikirithi tu jina la awali bila kutumia mipangilio au maudhui ya “Mawindo 2” iliyofutwa [1]. Hivyo, iwapo unatafuta sehemu ya pili rasmi ya hadithi ya 2006, bado haijatolewa na haipo kwenye ratiba ya kutengenezwa.
