question_en: Who created the Doctor Who character?
pos_context_en: The character of the Doctor was created by BBC Head of Drama, Sydney Newman. The first format document for the programme that was to become "Doctor Who" – then provisionally titled "The Troubleshooters" – was written in March 1963 by C. E. Webber, a staff writer who had been brought in to help develop the project. Webber's document contained a main character described as "The maturer man, 35–40, with some 'character twist.' " Newman was not keen on this idea and – along with several other changes to Webber's initial format – created an alternative lead character named Dr Who, a crotchety older man piloting a stolen time machine, on the run from his own far future world. No written record of Newman's conveyance of these ideas – believed to have taken place in April 1963 – exists, and the character of Dr Who first begins appearing in existing documentation from May of that year.
neg_context_en:
There have also been many references to "Doctor Who" in popular culture and other science fiction, including "" ("") and "Leverage". In the Channel 4 series "Queer as Folk" (created by later "Doctor Who" executive producer Russell T. Davies), the character of Vince was portrayed as an avid "Doctor Who" fan, with references appearing many times throughout in the form of clips from the programme. In a similar manner, the character of Oliver on "Coupling" (created and written by current show runner Steven Moffat) is portrayed as a "Doctor Who" collector and enthusiast.
References to "Doctor Who" have also appeared in the young adult fantasy novels "Brisingr" and "High Wizardry", the video game "Rock Band", the Adult Swim comedy show "Robot Chicken", the "Family Guy" episodes "Blue Harvest" and "420", and the game "RuneScape". It has also be referenced in "Destroy All Humans! 2", by civilians in the game's variation of England, and multiple times throughout the "Ace Attorney" series.

The character of Doctor Psycho was created by William Moulton Marston, creator of Wonder Woman and author of her original adventures. Marston, a psychologist, created Doctor Psycho as a murderous psychopath with an intense hatred of women. The character was partly inspired by actor Lon Chaney ("Man of a thousand faces") and partly by Marston's undergraduate advisor Hugo Münsterberg, who was opposed to women's suffrage and feminism, and was into metaphysics. Doctor Psycho was also one of several villains created for Wonder Woman who were occultists, beguiling the masses for their own self-enriching purposes.

A number of characters created for original "Doctor Who" fiction have been spun off into series of their own, such as the comic book "Miranda" based upon a character created for Lance Parkin's novel "Father Time", though the comic was not a success and was cancelled after three issues. First Mad Norwegian Press and later Random Static published a series of "Faction Paradox" books, based on the characters created by Lawrence Miles for the novel "Alien Bodies", and also republished one of the Bernice Summerfield novels originally published by Virgin. Twenty-First Century Publishers are due to publish a novel featuring the character Guy de Carnac, who was introduced in the 1995 "Doctor Who" novel, "Sanctuary."

Baker and Martin devised for "Doctor Who" the robotic dog K-9 (created for "The Invisible Enemy"), the renegade Time Lord Omega (created for "The Three Doctors", "Doctor Who"'s 10th anniversary story) and the Axons. K-9 was originally intended to appear in one story only, but the BBC decided to make it a recurring character. Several of Baker's stories had elements of hard science not often found in "Doctor Who", even though they've also been criticised for scientific inaccuracy. Together with Martin, they also created fantasy television serials for children including "Sky" (1975).

The character was created by Daniel O'Mahony for the Telos "Doctor Who" novella "The Cabinet of Light". Shortly after the novella was published it was announced that BBC Enterprises would not be renewing Telos's licence to produce "Doctor Who" novellas. Telos subsequently announced that they would begin producing a series of "Part mystery, part detective story, part dark fantasy, part science fiction"  novellas that would continue the spirit of the "Doctor Who" novellas. This was the "Time Hunter" range, which continued the adventures of Honoré and Emily Blandish.

The character of Emily Blandish was created by Daniel O'Mahony for the Telos "Doctor Who" novella "The Cabinet of Light". Shortly after the novella was published, it was announced that BBC Enterprises would not be renewing Telos' licence to produce "Doctor Who" novellas. Telos subsequently announced that they would begin producing a series of "Part mystery, part detective story, part dark fantasy, part science fiction"  novellas that would continue the spirit of the "Doctor Who" novellas. This was the "Time Hunter" range, which continued the adventures of Emily and Honoré Lechasseur.

Sabbath is the name of a recurring villain from the Eighth Doctor Adventures — spin-off novels based on the BBC science fiction television series "Doctor Who". The character was created by Lawrence Miles and first appeared in "The Adventuress of Henrietta Street". Originally, Miles had intended Sabbath to be a one-off character, but BBC Books editor Justin Richards asked to use the character in a continuing story arc.

Professor Urban Chronotis is a fictional character created by Douglas Adams. He was originally created for the 1979 "Doctor Who" serial "Shada", starring Tom Baker and Lalla Ward. However, the filming of the serial was never completed due to a strike. Adams then re-used the character and many of the themes from "Shada" in his novel "Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency", first published in 1987. In both versions, Chronotis is a clandestine time-traveller, whose time machine (or TARDIS, as they are termed in "Doctor Who") is disguised as his college rooms.

From 1966 until the following year Davis was the story editor of the popular BBC science-fiction series "Doctor Who", for which he created the character Jamie McCrimmon and co-created the popular cybernetic monsters known as the Cybermen, who continue to make appearances in the show, having been revived in the new run. His fellow co-creator of these creatures was the programme's unofficial scientific adviser Dr. Kit Pedler. Following their work on "Doctor Who" the pair teamed up in 1970 to create the science-fiction programme "Doomwatch". "Doomwatch" ran for three seasons on BBC One from 1970 to 1972 and spawned a novel written by Davis and Pedler, a subsequent cinema film and a 1999 revival on Channel 5.
question_src: Ni nani aliyeunda Daktari nani tabia?
pos_context_src: Tabia ya Daktari iliundwa na Mkuu wa BBC wa Tamthilia, Sydney Newman. Hati ya muundo wa kwanza wa mpango huo ambao ulikuwa "Daktari nani" - kisha uliopewa jina la "The Troubleshooters" - uliandikwa mnamo Machi 1963 na C. E. Webber, mwandishi wa wafanyikazi ambaye alikuwa ameletwa kusaidia kukuza mradi huo. Hati ya Webber ilikuwa na mhusika mkuu aliyeelezewa kama "mtu wa kukomaa, 35-40, na tabia ya 'tabia.' "Newman hakuwa na hamu ya wazo hili na - pamoja na mabadiliko mengine kadhaa kwa muundo wa kwanza wa Webber - aliunda mhusika mbadala anayeitwa Dr Who, mzee wa crotchety akijaribu mashine ya wakati iliyoibiwa, inayoendelea kutoka kwa ulimwengu wake wa baadaye. Hakuna rekodi iliyoandikwa ya kufikishwa kwa Newman ya maoni haya - inayoaminika ilifanyika mnamo Aprili 1963 - ipo, na tabia ya Dr ambaye kwanza anaanza kuonekana katika nyaraka zilizopo kutoka Mei mwaka huo.
neg_context_src:
Kumekuwa na marejeleo mengi kwa "Daktari nani" katika tamaduni maarufu na hadithi zingine za sayansi, pamoja na "" ("") na "Ukuzaji". Katika safu ya Channel 4 "Queer As Folk" (iliyoundwa na baadaye "Daktari Who" mtayarishaji mtendaji wa Russell T. Davies), tabia ya Vince ilionyeshwa kama shabiki wa "Daktari Who", na marejeleo yaliyoonekana mara nyingi katika mfumo wa sehemu hiyo. Vivyo hivyo, tabia ya Oliver kwenye "Coupling" (iliyoundwa na kuandikwa na mkimbiaji wa show ya sasa Steven Moffat) imeonyeshwa kama "Daktari Ambaye" Mkusanya na Mshiriki.
Marejeleo ya "Daktari Who" pia yameonekana katika riwaya za vijana za watu wazima "Brisingr" na "Wizardry ya Juu", mchezo wa video "Rock Band", watu wazima wa kuogelea wanaonyesha "Robot Kuku", "Familia ya Familia" "Blue Hana" na "420", na mchezo "Runescape". Pia imerejelewa katika "Waharibu Wanadamu wote! 2", na raia katika tofauti za mchezo wa England, na mara kadhaa katika safu ya "Wakili wa Ace".

Tabia ya Daktari Psycho iliundwa na William Moulton Marston, muundaji wa Wonder Woman na mwandishi wa adventures yake ya asili. Marston, mwanasaikolojia, aliunda Daktari Psycho kama psychopath ya mauaji na chuki kali ya wanawake. Tabia hiyo ilichochewa na muigizaji Lon Chaney ("Man of Elfu Nyuso") na kwa sehemu na mshauri wa shahada ya kwanza wa Marston Hugo Münsterberg, ambaye alipingana na utoshelevu wa wanawake na wanawake, na alikuwa kwenye tasnifu. Daktari Psycho pia alikuwa mmoja wa wabaya kadhaa walioundwa kwa Wonder Woman ambao walikuwa wakuu, wakiwadanganya raia kwa madhumuni yao ya kujiimarisha.

Wahusika kadhaa walioundwa kwa hadithi ya "Daktari Who" wa asili wamejitenga katika safu yao wenyewe, kama vile kitabu cha vichekesho "Miranda" kwa msingi wa tabia iliyoundwa kwa riwaya ya Lance Parkin "Wakati wa baba", ingawa Jumuia haikuwa mafanikio na ilifutwa baada ya maswala matatu. Kwanza Mad Norway Press na baadaye tuli ya baadaye ilichapisha safu ya vitabu vya "Faction Paradox", kwa msingi wa wahusika iliyoundwa na Lawrence Miles kwa riwaya ya "Mgeni Mgeni", na pia ilichapisha tena moja ya riwaya za Bernice Summerfield zilizochapishwa na Bikira. Mchapishaji wa karne ya ishirini na moja ni kwa sababu ya kuchapisha riwaya iliyo na mhusika Guy de Carnac, ambaye alianzishwa mnamo 1995 "Daktari Who" riwaya, "Sanctuary."

Baker na Martin walibuni kwa "Daktari nani" mbwa wa roboti K-9 (iliyoundwa kwa "Adui asiyeonekana"), wakati wa Renegade Lord Omega (iliyoundwa kwa "Madaktari Watatu", "Daktari Who" hadithi ya kumbukumbu ya miaka 10) na Axons. K-9 hapo awali ilikusudiwa kuonekana katika hadithi moja tu, lakini BBC iliamua kuifanya kuwa tabia ya mara kwa mara. Hadithi kadhaa za Baker zilikuwa na mambo ya sayansi ngumu ambayo hayapatikani mara nyingi katika "Daktari nani", ingawa pia wamekosolewa kwa usahihi wa kisayansi. Pamoja na Martin, pia waliunda safu za televisheni za kushangaza kwa watoto pamoja na "Sky" (1975).

Tabia hiyo iliundwa na Daniel O'Mahony kwa TELOS "Daktari ambaye" riwaya "Baraza la Mawaziri la Mwanga". Muda kidogo baada ya riwaya kuchapishwa ilitangazwa kuwa Enterprise za BBC hazitakuwa zinafanya upya leseni ya Telos ya kutengeneza "Daktari Who" riwaya. Telos baadaye alitangaza kwamba wataanza kutoa safu ya "sehemu ya siri, hadithi ya upelelezi, sehemu ya Ndoto ya Giza, sehemu ya hadithi za sayansi" ambayo ingeendelea na roho ya "Daktari Who" riwaya. Hii ilikuwa safu ya "wakati wa Hunter", ambayo iliendelea adventures ya Honoré na Emily Blandish.

Tabia ya Emily Blandish iliundwa na Daniel O'Mahony kwa Telos "Daktari ambaye" riwaya "Baraza la Mawaziri la Mwanga". Muda kidogo baada ya riwaya kuchapishwa, ilitangazwa kuwa Enterprise za BBC hazitakuwa zinafanya upya leseni ya Telos ya kutengeneza "Daktari Who" riwaya. Telos baadaye alitangaza kwamba wataanza kutoa safu ya "sehemu ya siri, hadithi ya upelelezi, sehemu ya Ndoto ya Giza, sehemu ya hadithi za sayansi" ambayo ingeendelea na roho ya "Daktari Who" riwaya. Hii ilikuwa aina ya "wakati wa Hunter", ambayo iliendelea adventures ya Emily na Honoré Lechasseur.

Sabato ni jina la mwanakijiji anayerudia kutoka kwa Adventures ya Daktari wa Nane-riwaya za spin-off kulingana na safu ya runinga ya hadithi ya BBC "Daktari Who". Tabia hiyo iliundwa na Lawrence Miles na ilionekana kwa mara ya kwanza katika "The Adventuress of Henrietta Street". Hapo awali, Miles alikuwa amekusudia Sabato kuwa mhusika mmoja, lakini mhariri wa vitabu vya BBC Justin Richards aliuliza kutumia mhusika katika safu ya hadithi inayoendelea.

Profesa Urban Chronotis ni tabia ya hadithi iliyoundwa na Douglas Adams. Hapo awali aliundwa kwa "Daktari" ambaye "serial" shada ", nyota Tom Baker na Lalla Ward. Walakini, utengenezaji wa filamu ya serial haukuwahi kukamilika kwa sababu ya mgomo. Adams basi alitumia tena tabia hiyo na mada nyingi kutoka "Shada" katika riwaya yake "Dirk Great's Holistic Detective", iliyochapishwa kwa mara ya kwanza mnamo 1987. Katika matoleo yote mawili, Chronotis ni msafiri wa wakati wa kawaida, ambaye mashine yake ya wakati (au Tardis, kama inavyoitwa "Daktari nani") amejificha kama vyumba vyake vya vyuo vikuu.

Kuanzia mwaka wa 1966 hadi mwaka uliofuata Davis alikuwa mhariri wa hadithi wa safu maarufu ya hadithi ya sayansi ya BBC "Daktari Who", ambayo aliunda mhusika Jamie McCrimmon na kuunda pamoja monsters maarufu wa cybernetic inayojulikana kama Cybermen, ambao wanaendelea kuonekana kwenye onyesho, baada ya kufufuliwa katika Run New Run. Mbuni mwenza mwenza wa viumbe hawa alikuwa mshauri wa kisayansi usio rasmi wa Dk. Kit Pedler. Kufuatia kazi yao juu ya "Daktari Who" jozi hiyo iliungana mnamo 1970 kuunda mpango wa hadithi za sayansi "DoomWatch". "Doomwatch" iliendesha kwa misimu mitatu kwenye BBC One kutoka 1970 hadi 1972 na kutoa riwaya iliyoandikwa na Davis na Pedler, filamu ya sinema inayofuata na uamsho wa 1999 kwenye Channel 5.
report_src: Tabia ya “Daktari Nani” iliundwa na Sydney Newman, aliyekuwa Mkuu wa Tamthilia wa BBC mnamo 1963, wakati alipopendekeza mhusika mbadala aitwaye Dr Who, mzee mwenye hasira anayesafiri kwa mashine ya wakati iliyoibiwa, badala ya wazo la awali la C. E. Webber [1].
all_claims: Tabia ya “Daktari Nani” iliundwa na Sydney Newman, aliyekuwa Mkuu wa Tamthilia wa BBC mnamo 1963, wakati alipopendekeza mhusika mbadala aitwaye Dr Who, mzee mwenye hasira anayesafiri kwa mashine ya wakati iliyoibiwa, badala ya wazo la awali la C.
E.
Webber [1].
claims_w_citations: Webber [1].
claims_retained: Webber [1].

question_en: Who is the current president of Malaysia?
pos_context_en: The Prime Minister of Malaysia () is the head of government and the highest political office in Malaysia. The Yang di-Pertuan Agong appoints Prime Minister as a Member of Parliament (MP) who, in his opinion, is most likely to command the confidence of a majority of MPs. The Prime Minister chairs the Cabinet of Malaysia, the de facto executive branch of government. On 18 October 2018, 7th Prime Minister, Mahathir Mohamad, announced a two-term limit (10 years Max) to all Cabinet Profolio.
neg_context_en: Effective 1 April 2017, the current President of the Court of Appeal is Zulkefli Ahmad Makinudin, consequential to previous President, Md Raus Sharif's elevation to the office of Chief Justice of Federal Court following Arifin Zakaria's retirement. On 11 July 2018, Ahmad Haji Maarop was sworn-in by the Yang di-Pertuan Agong to replace Zulkefli Ahmad Makinudin, who handed his resignation from the post following the 14th Malaysian general election.

Tan Sri Dato' (Dr.) Haji Muhyiddin bin Haji Muhammad Yassin (Jawi: محي الدين بن محمد يسٓ) (born 15 May 1947) is a Malaysian politician who is the incumbent Minister of Home Affairs of Malaysia, Member of Parliament for Pagoh, Member of Johor State Legislative Assembly for Gambir, Deputy President of Pakatan Harapan and President of Parti Pribumi Bersatu Malaysia. He was Deputy Prime Minister of Malaysia from 2009 till 2015, Deputy Chairman of Barisan Nasional and Deputy President of the United Malays National Organisation (UMNO), the main component party of the current Opposition (Federal government then), Barisan Nasional (BN) coalition from 2009 till 2016.

Under the helm of Prime Minister Najib Razak's administration, the two-way diplomatic ties between the two sovereign nations have since warmed and became normalized once more. Subsequently, US President Barack Obama's made his first official visit to Malaysia in April 2014, the first visit by a sitting US President since 1966. Prime Minister Najib and President Obama issued a joint statement that, among other things, elevated the Malaysia-US relationship to a comprehensive partnership. Malaysia is currently pursuing the Trans-Pacific Partnership (TPP) treaty with the support of the US until January 2017. Both countries continue to enjoy warm relations with the two leaders became close personal friends. On Christmas Eve in 2014, both Najib and Obama are seen playing golf together in Hawaii. Following the victory of Donald Trump in the 2016 US presidential election, the relations continue to be strengthened with Najib was among the international leaders that congratulated Trump and looked forward to continuing a partnership with the US under his presidency. In June 2018, the United States Embassy in Kuala Lumpur hosting a series of programs in Sabah (the former North Borneo) to celebrate the 150+ years of partnership with the people of the territory.

Tan Sri Vigneswaran s/o Sanasee (; born 1965) is a Malaysian politician. He is currently the tenth President of the Malaysian Indian Congress (MIC), a major component party of Barisan Nasional (BN) coalition. He is also the incumbent President of the Dewan Negara, or Senate, of Malaysia. He was appointed as a Senator on 23 June 2014 for a three-year term. He took the office of the President of the Senate on 26 April 2016.

Dato' Seri Dr Wan Azizah binti Wan Ismail (Jawi: وان عزيزه بنت وان اسماعيل; born 3 December 1952) is a Malaysian politician serving as the first female Deputy Prime Minister of Malaysia and the Minister of Women, Family and Community Development. She is the Member of Parliament for Pandan since 12 May 2018, after the Cabinet list has been announced by the newly appointed Prime Minister, Tun Dr Mahathir Mohamad. She is the first woman to hold the position in Malaysia. Currently, she is the President of the Pakatan Harapan coalition and previously was President of the People's Justice Party (Malay: Parti Keadilan Rakyat) from 1999 until 2018 and was elected Selangor State Legislative Assembly member for Kajang until May 2018.

The President of the Senate is created under Article 56 of the Constitution of Malaysia. The office is similar to the Speaker of the Dewan Rakyat: the president is elected by the members of the Senate and is expected to be politically impartial. If a member of the Dewan Negara is elected as the president and is a member of a state legislative assembly, he must resign from the assembly before exercising the functions of the office. As the president may hold different titles while in office, it also changes the style. The current president is Datuk SA. Vigneswaran. Therefore, while in session, the senators will call him as 'Datuk Yang di-Pertua' (Datuk President) or 'Tuan Yang di-Pertua' (Mr. President).

Dato' Sri Haji Mohammad Najib bin Tun Haji Abdul Razak (Jawi: محمد نجيب بن عبدالرازق; born 23 July 1953) is a Malaysian politician who served as the 6th Prime Minister of Malaysia from 2009 to 2018. He was the former President of the United Malays National Organisation (UMNO), the leading party in Malaysia's Barisan Nasional (BN) coalition, which maintained control of Malaysia's government as a parliamentary majority for more than sixty years until the coalition's defeat in the 2018 general election.

He is a former member of the United Malays National Organisation (UMNO) in Malaysia's ruling Barisan Nasional coalition. Like his father, he left UMNO in 2016. Mukhriz is currently the Deputy President of Parti Pribumi Bersatu Malaysia (PPBM, Malaysian United Indigenous Party) and the chairman of the Pakatan Harapan coalition in Kedah.

Malaysia's predominant political party, the United Malays National Organization (UMNO), held power in the coalition known as the Barisan Nasional (formerly the Alliance) with other parties since Malaya's independence in 1957 until 2018. In 1973, an alliance of communally based parties was replaced with a broader coalition – the Barisan Nasional — composed of fourteen parties. Today the Barisan Nasional coalition has three prominent members – the UMNO, MCA (Malaysian Chinese Association) and MIC (Malaysian Indian Congress). The current Prime Minister of Malaysia is from Pakatan Harapan (PH) who is the ex-UMNO leader, marking the first time the post is occupied by a non-UMNO party member.
Datuk Seri Abdul Halim bin Abdul Samad (Jawi: عبدالحاليم بن عبدالصمد) is a Malaysian politician and businessman. He is the current Deputy President of the Senate of Malaysia since 18 April 2016.

According to the federal constitution, the Yang di-Pertuan Agong shall first appoint as Prime Minister to preside over the Cabinet and requires such Prime Minister to be a member of the Dewan Rakyat (House of Representatives) who in his judgment is likely to command the confidence of the majority of the members of that House and must not a Malaysian citizen by naturalisation or by registration. The Yang di-Pertuan Agong on the Prime Minister's advice shall appoint other Ministers from either Dewan Rakyat or Dewan Negara (Senate).
question_src: Rais wa sasa wa Malaysia ni nani?
pos_context_src: Waziri Mkuu wa Malaysia () ndiye mkuu wa serikali na ofisi ya juu zaidi ya kisiasa nchini Malaysia. Yang Di-Pertuan Agong anamteua Waziri Mkuu kama Mjumbe wa Bunge (mbunge) ambaye, kwa maoni yake, ana uwezekano mkubwa wa kuamuru ujasiri wa wabunge wengi. Waziri Mkuu anakaa baraza la mawaziri la Malaysia, tawi la serikali kuu la serikali. Mnamo tarehe 18 Oktoba 2018, Waziri Mkuu wa 7, Mahathir Mohamad, alitangaza kikomo cha muda wa miaka mbili (miaka 10) kwa baraza la mawaziri lote.
neg_context_src: Ufanisi 1 Aprili 2017, Rais wa sasa wa Mahakama ya Rufaa ni Zulkefli Ahmad Makinudin, anayesababisha rais wa zamani, mwinuko wa MD Raus kwa ofisi ya Jaji Mkuu wa Mahakama ya Shirikisho kufuatia kustaafu kwa Arifin Zakaria. Mnamo tarehe 11 Julai 2018, Ahmad Haji Maarop aliapishwa na Yang Di-Pertuan Agong kuchukua nafasi ya Zulkefli Ahmad Makinudin, ambaye alitoa kujiuzulu kwake katika wadhifa huo kufuatia uchaguzi mkuu wa 14 wa Malaysia.

Tan Sri Dato '(Dr.) Haji Muhyiddin bin Haji Muhammad Yassin (Jawi: محي الدين بن محمد يٓ) (amezaliwa 15 Mei 1947) ni mwanasiasa wa Malaysia ambaye ni Waziri anayehusika wa Mambo ya nyumbani ya Malaysia, Mjumbe wa Parloy kwa Parl Rais wa Pakatan Harapan na Rais wa Parti Pribumi Bersatu Malaysia. Alikuwa Naibu Waziri Mkuu wa Malaysia kutoka 2009 hadi 2015, Naibu Mwenyekiti wa Barisan Nasional na Naibu Rais wa Shirika la Kitaifa la United Malays (UMNO), chama kikuu cha Upinzani wa sasa (Serikali ya Shirikisho wakati huo), Ushirikiano wa Barisan Nasional (BN) kutoka 2009 hadi 2016.

Chini ya uongozi wa utawala wa Waziri Mkuu Najib Razak, uhusiano wa kidiplomasia wa njia mbili kati ya mataifa hayo mawili huru umewasha moto na kuwa kawaida tena. Baadaye, Rais wa Merika Barack Obama alifanya ziara yake ya kwanza rasmi nchini Malaysia mnamo Aprili 2014, ziara ya kwanza na rais aliyeketi wa Amerika tangu 1966. Waziri Mkuu Najib na Rais Obama walitoa taarifa ya pamoja kwamba, miongoni mwa mambo mengine, waliinua uhusiano wa Malaysia na US kwa ushirikiano kamili. Malaysia kwa sasa inafuatilia makubaliano ya Ushirikiano wa Trans-Pacific (TPP) kwa msaada wa Amerika hadi Januari 2017. Nchi zote mbili zinaendelea kufurahiya uhusiano wa joto na viongozi hao wawili wakawa marafiki wa karibu. Siku ya Krismasi mnamo 2014, Najib na Obama wanaonekana wakicheza gofu pamoja huko Hawaii. Kufuatia ushindi wa Donald Trump katika uchaguzi wa rais wa Merika wa 2016, uhusiano unaendelea kuimarishwa na Najib ni miongoni mwa viongozi wa kimataifa ambao walimpongeza Trump na walitazamia kuendelea kushirikiana na Amerika chini ya urais wake. Mnamo Juni 2018, Ubalozi wa Merika huko Kuala Lumpur unashikilia mipango kadhaa huko Sabah (wa zamani wa North Borneo) kusherehekea miaka 150+ ya kushirikiana na watu wa eneo hilo.

Tan Sri Vigneswaran s/o Sanasee (; amezaliwa 1965) ni mwanasiasa wa Malaysia. Hivi sasa ni rais wa kumi wa Mkutano wa India wa India (MIC), chama kikuu cha umoja wa Barisan Nasional (BN). Yeye pia ni rais anayehusika wa Dewan Negara, au Seneti, wa Malaysia. Aliteuliwa kama seneta mnamo 23 Juni 2014 kwa kipindi cha miaka tatu. Alichukua ofisi ya Rais wa Seneti mnamo 26 Aprili 2016.

Dato 'Seri Dr Wan Azizah Binti Wan Ismail (Jawi: وان زيزه بنت وان اسمال; amezaliwa 3 Desemba 1952) ni mwanasiasa wa Malaysia anayehudumu kama Naibu wa kwanza wa kike wa Malaysia na Waziri wa Wanawake, Familia na Jumuiya. Yeye ndiye mwanachama wa Bunge la Pandan tangu Mei 12, 2018, baada ya orodha ya baraza la mawaziri kutangazwa na Waziri Mkuu aliyeteuliwa, Tun Dk Mahathir Mohamad. Yeye ndiye mwanamke wa kwanza kushikilia msimamo huo huko Malaysia. Hivi sasa, yeye ni rais wa Ushirikiano wa Pakatan Harapan na hapo awali alikuwa Rais wa Chama cha Haki cha Watu (Mala: Parti Keadilan Rakyat) kutoka 1999 hadi 2018 na alichaguliwa kuwa mjumbe wa Bunge la Bunge la Selangor kwa Kajang hadi Mei 2018.

Rais wa Seneti ameundwa chini ya Kifungu cha 56 cha Katiba ya Malaysia. Ofisi hiyo ni sawa na Spika wa Dewan Rakyat: Rais anachaguliwa na wanachama wa Seneti na inatarajiwa kuwa ya kisiasa. Ikiwa mjumbe wa Dewan Negara amechaguliwa kama rais na ni mwanachama wa Bunge la Sheria la Jimbo, lazima ajiuzulu kutoka kwa Bunge kabla ya kutekeleza majukumu ya ofisi. Kama rais anaweza kushikilia majina tofauti akiwa ofisini, pia hubadilisha mtindo. Rais wa sasa ni Datuk SA. Vigneswaran. Kwa hivyo, wakati wakiwa katika kikao, maseneta watamwita kama 'Datuk Yang di-Pertua' (Rais wa Datuk) au 'Tuan Yang Di-Pertua' (Mheshimiwa Rais).

Dato 'Sri Haji Mohammad Najib bin Tun Haji Abdul Razak (Jawi: محمد نجيب با عالرازق; amezaliwa 23 Julai 1953) ni mwanasiasa wa Malaysia ambaye alihudumu kama Waziri Mkuu wa 6 wa Mal Ushirikiano wa Nasional (BN), ambao ulidumisha udhibiti wa serikali ya Malaysia kama wabunge wengi kwa zaidi ya miaka sitini hadi kushindwa kwa muungano katika uchaguzi mkuu wa 2018.

Yeye ni mwanachama wa zamani wa Shirika la Kitaifa la United Malays (UMNO) katika Ushirikiano wa Barisan Nasional wa Malaysia. Kama baba yake, aliondoka Umno mnamo 2016. Mukhriz kwa sasa ndiye naibu wa rais wa Parti Pribumi Bersatu Malaysia (PPBM, Chama cha Asili cha Malaysia) na Mwenyekiti wa Ushirikiano wa Pakatan Harapan huko Kedah.

Chama kikuu cha siasa cha Malaysia, Shirika la Kitaifa la United Malays (UMNO), lilifanya madaraka katika umoja unaojulikana kama Barisan Nasional (zamani wa Alliance) na vyama vingine tangu uhuru wa Malaya mnamo 1957 hadi 2018. Mnamo 1973, muungano wa vyama vya jamii ulibadilishwa na muungano mpana - wa Baresan - walijumuisha wanne. Leo Ushirikiano wa Barisan Nasional una washiriki watatu mashuhuri - UMNO, MCA (Chama cha Wachina cha Malaysia) na MIC (Malaysian Indian Congress). Waziri Mkuu wa sasa wa Malaysia ni kutoka Pakatan Harapan (PH) ambaye ndiye kiongozi wa zamani wa-Umno, akiashiria mara ya kwanza Barua hiyo inamilikiwa na mwanachama wa chama kisicho cha PUMno.
Datuk Seri Abdul Halim bin Abdul Samad (Jawi: عالحاليم بن عالصمد) ni mwanasiasa na mfanyabiashara wa Malaysia. Yeye ndiye Naibu Rais wa sasa wa Seneti ya Malaysia tangu 18 Aprili 2016.

Kulingana na Katiba ya Shirikisho, Yang Di-Pertuan Agong atateua kwanza kama Waziri Mkuu kusimamia Baraza la Mawaziri na anahitaji Waziri Mkuu kama huyo kuwa mwanachama wa Dewan Rakyat (Baraza la Wawakilishi) ambaye kwa uamuzi wake anaweza kuamuru imani ya washiriki wengi wa nyumba hiyo na sio lazima raia wa Malaysia kwa usajili au usajili. Yang di-Pertuan Agong juu ya ushauri wa Waziri Mkuu atateua mawaziri wengine kutoka kwa Dewan Rakyat au Dewan Negara (Seneti).
report_src: Kwa mujibu wa hati pekee uliyotoa, inabainishwa kuwa mkuu wa dola ya Malaysia ni Yang di-Pertuan Agong ambaye huteua Waziri Mkuu, lakini jina la mtu anayeshikilia wadhifa huo kwa sasa halijaelezwa, hivyo hati hii haiwezi kutoa jibu sahihi kuhusu “Rais (au Yang di-Pertuan Agong) wa sasa wa Malaysia” [1].

question_en: What are the Troubles?
pos_context_en: The Troubles () was an ethno-nationalist conflict in Northern Ireland during the late 20th century. Also known internationally as the Northern Ireland conflict, and the Conflict in Ireland, it is sometimes described as a "guerrilla war" or a "low-level war". The conflict began in the late 1960s and is usually deemed to have ended with the Good Friday Agreement of 1998. Although the Troubles primarily took place in Northern Ireland, at times the violence spilled over into parts of the Republic of Ireland, England, and mainland Europe.
neg_context_en: Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.

Say What! is a live album released in 1986 by the Washington, D.C.-based go-go band Trouble Funk. The album was recorded live in London, England during the summer of 1986.

question_src: Je! Shida ni nini?
pos_context_src: Shida () ilikuwa mzozo wa kitaifa wa kitaifa huko Ireland ya Kaskazini mwishoni mwa karne ya 20. Pia inajulikana kimataifa kama mzozo wa Ireland ya Kaskazini, na mzozo huko Ireland, wakati mwingine huelezewa kama "vita vya waasi" au "vita vya kiwango cha chini". Mzozo huo ulianza mwishoni mwa miaka ya 1960 na kawaida huchukuliwa kuwa ulimalizika na makubaliano mazuri ya Ijumaa ya 1998. Ingawa shida hizo zilifanyika Kaskazini mwa Ireland, wakati mwingine vurugu zilitoka katika sehemu za Jamhuri ya Ireland, Uingereza, na Bara la Bara.
neg_context_src: Winfield Toll Bridge, pia inajulikana kama Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, ni kihistoria wa kihistoria wa Cantilever Warren Truss Bridge iliyoko Winfield na Red House, Kaunti ya Putnam, West Virginia. Ilijengwa mnamo 1955, na inachukua Mto wa Kanawha, iliyobeba West Virginia Route 34. Cantilever kupitia-truss ina nafasi mbili za nanga kila futi 245 kwa urefu na urefu wa futi 462 kwa urefu kati ya mistari ya kituo cha pier. Span kuu ina futi mbili 128, inchi 4, mikono ya cantilever na miguu 205, inchi 4, iliyosimamishwa.
S͎ inawakilishwa katika Unicode na S na U+034E (unachanganya mshale wa juu chini).

Sema nini! ni albamu ya moja kwa moja iliyotolewa mnamo 1986 na Washington, D.C.-msingi wa Go-Go Band Shida Funk. Albamu hiyo ilirekodiwa moja kwa moja huko London, England wakati wa msimu wa joto wa 1986.

question_en: What is the most common gastrointestinal disorder in the U.S.?
pos_context_en: Even though anatomically part of the GI tract, diseases of the mouth are often not considered alongside other gastrointestinal diseases. By far the most common oral conditions are plaque-induced diseases (e.g. gingivitis, periodontitis, dental caries). Some diseases which involve other parts of the GI tract can manifest in the mouth, alone or in combination, including:Oesophageal diseases include a spectrum of disorders affecting the oesophagus. The most common condition of the oesophagus in Western countries is gastroesophageal reflux disease, which in chronic forms is thought to result in changes to the epithelium of the oesophagus, known as Barrett's oesophagus.
neg_context_en: Functional gastrointestinal disorders the most common of which is irritable bowel syndrome. Functional constipation and chronic functional abdominal pain are other functional disorders of the intestine that have physiological causes, but do not have identifiable structural, chemical, or infectious pathologies.
Irritable bowel syndrome (IBS) is the most common of the functional gastrointestinal disorders. These are idiopathic disorders that the Rome process has helped to define.

Functional gastrointestinal (GI) disorders are a class of gastrointestinal disorders where there is a malfunction in the normal activities of the gastrointestinal tract, but there are no structural abnormalities that can explain the cause. There are rarely any tests that can detect the presence of these disorders. Clinical research in neurogastroenterology focuses mainly on the study of common functional gastrointestinal disorders such as irritable bowel syndrome, the most common functional GI disorder.
Functional gastrointestinal disorders are very common. Globally, irritable bowel syndrome and functional dyspepsia alone may affect 16–26% of the population.
The most common gastrointestinal abnormality is chronic constipation, though gastrointestinal reflux was also common.

CD with "non-classic symptoms" is the most common clinical found type and occurs in older children (over 2 years old), adolescents and adults. It is characterized by milder or even absent gastrointestinal symptoms and a wide spectrum of non-intestinal manifestations that can involve any organ of the body such as, cerebellar ataxia, hypertransaminasemia and peripheral neuropathy. As previously mentioned, CD although very frequently may be completely asymptomatic both in children (at least in 43% of the cases) and adults.

Constipation is the most common chronic gastrointestinal disorder in adults. Depending on the definition employed, it occurs in 2% to 20% of the population. It is more common in women, the elderly and children. Specifically constipation with no known cause affects females more often affected than males. The reasons it occurs more frequently in the elderly is felt to be due to an increasing number of health problems as humans age and decreased physical activity.Since ancient times different societies have published medical opinions about how health care providers should respond to constipation in patients. In various times and places, doctors have made claims that constipation has all sorts of medical or social causes. Doctors in history have treated constipation in reasonable and unreasonable ways, including use of a spatula mundani.

CD with "classic symptoms", which include gastrointestinal manifestations such as chronic diarrhea and bloating, malabsorption of certain vitamins and minerals, loss of appetite, impaired growth and even bone pain, is currently the least common presentation form of the disease and affects predominantly to small children generally younger than two years of age.

Gastrointestinal surgery can often be performed in the outpatient setting. In the United States in 2012, operations on the digestive system accounted for 3 of the 25 most common ambulatory surgery procedures and constituted 9.1 percent of all outpatient ambulatory surgeries.

Acute disease might include infections such as oesophagitis, trauma caused ingestion of corrosive substances, or rupture of veins such as oesophageal varices, Boerhaave syndrome or Mallory-Weiss tears. Chronic diseases might include congenital diseases such as Zenker's diverticulum and esophageal webbing, and oesophageal motility disorders including the nutcracker oesophagus, achalasia, diffuse oesophageal spasm, and oesophageal stricture.
question_src: Je! Ni shida gani ya kawaida ya utumbo huko Merika?
pos_context_src: Hata ingawa sehemu ya njia ya GI, magonjwa ya mdomo mara nyingi hayazingatiwi kando na magonjwa mengine ya utumbo. Kwa sasa hali ya kawaida ya mdomo ni magonjwa yaliyosababishwa na alama (k.m. gingivitis, periodontitis, caries ya meno). Magonjwa mengine ambayo yanahusisha sehemu zingine za njia ya GI yanaweza kudhihirika kinywani, peke yake au kwa pamoja, pamoja na: magonjwa ya oesophageal ni pamoja na wigo wa shida zinazoathiri umio. Hali ya kawaida ya esophagus katika nchi za Magharibi ni ugonjwa wa gastroesophageal reflux, ambayo katika aina sugu hufikiriwa kusababisha mabadiliko kwa epithelium ya esophagus, inayojulikana kama Esophagus ya Barrett.
neg_context_src: Shida ya njia ya utumbo ya kawaida ambayo ni ya kawaida ambayo ni ugonjwa wa matumbo. Kufanya kazi kwa kuvimbiwa na maumivu ya tumbo ya tumbo ni shida zingine za utumbo ambazo zina sababu za kisaikolojia, lakini hazina njia zinazotambulika za kimuundo, kemikali, au za kuambukiza.
Dalili ya Bowel isiyoweza kukasirika (IBS) ndio kawaida zaidi ya shida ya kazi ya utumbo. Hizi ni shida za idiopathic ambazo mchakato wa Roma umesaidia kufafanua.

Shida ya kazi ya utumbo (GI) ni darasa la shida ya utumbo ambapo kuna shida katika shughuli za kawaida za njia ya utumbo, lakini hakuna ukiukwaji wa kimuundo ambao unaweza kuelezea sababu. Kuna mara chache vipimo vyovyote ambavyo vinaweza kugundua uwepo wa shida hizi. Utafiti wa kliniki katika neurogastroenterology unazingatia sana uchunguzi wa shida za kawaida za utumbo kama vile ugonjwa wa matumbo usio na nguvu, shida ya kawaida ya GI.
Shida za kazi za utumbo ni za kawaida sana. Ulimwenguni kote, ugonjwa wa matumbo usio na hasira na dyspepsia inayofanya kazi pekee inaweza kuathiri 16-26% ya idadi ya watu.
Usumbufu wa kawaida wa utumbo ni kuvimbiwa sugu, ingawa reflux ya utumbo pia ilikuwa ya kawaida.

CD iliyo na "dalili zisizo za classic" ndio aina ya kawaida ya kliniki inayopatikana na hufanyika kwa watoto wakubwa (zaidi ya miaka 2), vijana na watu wazima. Ni sifa ya dalili kali au hata za kutokuwepo za utumbo na wigo mpana wa dhihirisho zisizo za ndani ambazo zinaweza kuhusisha chombo chochote cha mwili kama vile, cerebellar ataxia, hypertransaminasemia na neuropathy ya pembeni. Kama ilivyoelezwa hapo awali, CD ingawa mara nyingi inaweza kuwa ya kawaida kabisa kwa watoto (angalau katika 43% ya kesi) na watu wazima.

Kuvimbiwa ni shida ya kawaida ya njia ya utumbo kwa watu wazima. Kulingana na ufafanuzi uliotumiwa, hufanyika katika 2% hadi 20% ya idadi ya watu. Ni kawaida zaidi katika wanawake, wazee na watoto. Hasa kuvimbiwa bila sababu inayojulikana huathiri wanawake walioathiriwa mara nyingi kuliko wanaume. Sababu zinazotokea mara kwa mara katika wazee huhisi kuwa ni kwa sababu ya kuongezeka kwa shida za kiafya kama umri wa wanadamu na kupungua kwa shughuli za mwili. Kwa nyakati za zamani jamii tofauti zimechapisha maoni ya matibabu juu ya jinsi watoa huduma za afya wanapaswa kujibu kuvimbiwa kwa wagonjwa. Katika nyakati na maeneo tofauti, madaktari wametoa madai kwamba kuvimbiwa kuna kila aina ya sababu za matibabu au za kijamii. Madaktari katika historia wametibu kuvimbiwa kwa njia nzuri na zisizo na maana, pamoja na matumizi ya spatula mundani.

CD iliyo na "dalili za kawaida", ambayo ni pamoja na dhihirisho la utumbo kama vile kuhara sugu na kutokwa na damu, malabsorption ya vitamini na madini, upotezaji wa hamu ya kula, ukuaji wa ukuaji na hata maumivu ya mfupa, kwa sasa ni aina ya kawaida ya uwasilishaji wa ugonjwa na huathiri sana watoto wadogo kwa ujumla mdogo kuliko miaka miwili.

Upasuaji wa tumbo mara nyingi unaweza kufanywa katika mpangilio wa nje. Huko Merika mnamo 2012, shughuli kwenye mfumo wa utumbo zilichangia kwa taratibu 3 kati ya 25 za upasuaji wa kawaida na zilifanya asilimia 9.1 ya upasuaji wote wa nje wa wagonjwa.

Ugonjwa wa papo hapo unaweza kujumuisha maambukizo kama vile oesophagitis, kiwewe husababisha kumeza vitu vya kutu, au kupasuka kwa mishipa kama vile oesophageal varices, Boerhaave syndrome au machozi ya mallory-Weiss. Magonjwa sugu yanaweza kujumuisha magonjwa ya kuzaliwa kama vile Zenker's diverticulum na esophageal webbing, na shida ya oesophageal motility pamoja na Nutcracker esophagus, achalasia, kusambaza spasm ya oesophageal, na utii wa oesophageal.
report_src: Shida ya utumbo inayopatikana kwa wingi nchini Marekani ni ugonjwa wa gastroesophageal reflux (GERD), ambao huathiri umio na mara nyingi hutokea kwa sababu ya kurudi kwa asidi ya tumbo hadi kinywa; hali hii ndiyo “hali ya kawaida ya esophagus katika nchi za Magharibi” ikiwa ni pamoja na Marekani [1].

question_en: How many episodes did Seven Ages of Rock have?
pos_context_en: It comprised six 60-minute episodes (reduced to 48 minutes for VH1 Classic), with a final episode of 90 minutes, and was broadcast on Saturdays at 21:00 (repeated on BBC One on Sundays). Each episode focused on one type of rock music, each typified by one or two artists or bands. The series producer was William Naylor, and the executive producer for the BBC was Michael Poole, a former editor of the 1990s BBC music, arts and culture programme "The Late Show". The production was based at BBC Bristol and each programme was narrated by Julian Rhind-Tutt on the BBC and Dennis Hopper on VH1 classic.
neg_context_en: The VH1 version of this episode did not mention Peter Grant or 90/10 deal with concert promoters, the "designer bands" of Aerosmith, Guns N' Roses, and Bon Jovi, nor having any of them playing. It did not show Queen playing Hyde Park and did not have them playing Another One Bites the Dust or I Want To Break Free, with no discussion on the politics of playing in South America. The discussion of the Police is reduced and Walking on the Moon is not played. The Angel of Harlem is also not featured.

The series did receive some criticism from the press as it ignored rock and roll's contribution to the birth of rock. Neil McCormick, music critic for "The Daily Telegraph" (who appeared in one of the episodes as an interviewee) said: "...popular music only really gelled into what we now know as rock when Hendrix arrived in London in 1966."'.

In this episode some of the featured songs on the BBC website were not the same as featured in the episode. These include the episode not opening with Iggy and the Stooges' "No Fun" but the Sex Pistols' version (although is not named until the end of the episode), the Buzzcocks also played "Boredom" and "Ever Fallen in Love"; The Slits only featuring one song, "Typical Girls," rather than the three featured on the website; and Public Image's "Poptones" appearing in the episode.

The broadcast of the VH1 episode is very differently structured and features several different songs, interviews, and artists, as well as the main focus, Jimi Hendrix, being completely removed and the new focus being the Rolling Stones. This is not an issue with other episodes which are only mildly different.

"30 Rock" was a critical success, winning several major awards (including Primetime Emmy Awards for Outstanding Comedy Series in 2007, 2008, and 2009), and achieving the top ranking on many critics' year-end best of 2006 and 2007 lists. On July 14, 2009, the series was nominated for 22 Primetime Emmy Awards, the most in a single year for a comedy series. Despite the acclaim, the series struggled in the ratings throughout its run. During the course of the series, 138 episodes aired over seven seasons.

Seven Minutes in Hell received generally positive reviews from critics. LaToya Ferguson of The A.V. Club give the episode a B+, citing "After weeks of pointing out Scream Queens’ aggressively mean-spirited nature and confused tone, this week’s episode, “Seven Minutes In Hell,” finally feels like a strong piece of course correction for the show." IGN's Terri Schwartz give the episode 7.8 out of 10, stating it as "one of the series' weaker installments, though it did have several gems like Zayday's (Keke Palmer) pronouncement that, as co-KKT president, "the biggest change I'd like to implement is for everyone to stop being killed by a serial killer," and the Dickie Dollar Scholars' intervention with Chad for having sex with too many old people." Patrick Sproull from Den of Geek
says "Scream Queens' halfway point ended on a thrilling note. We've got a long way to go before the finale but the journey from here on out certainly looks like an exciting one."
Seven Ages of Rock (also known as 7 Ages of Rock) is a BBC Two series, co-produced by BBC Worldwide and VH1 Classic in 2007 about the history of rock music.

The VH1 broadcast was substantially different from the BBC. No discussion was made of the Sex Pistols' interview with Bill Grundy and the press coverage. Also there was no mention of The Buzzcocks, Tommy James talking about "New Rose", the Punk girl bands or Public Image Limited, instead the episode playing out to "London Calling" by the Clash.

Many of this episode's featured songs are completely different, and so they are listed separately here:
In 1967, Pink Floyd published "Arnold Layne", a song about a clothes-stealing transvestite, introducing a new concept in pop music, psychedelia. Like Andy Warhol did with The Velvet Underground in the US, they turned their shows into multimedia spectacles. Warhol came up with the idea of projecting films on the background of the stage. With Peter Jenner seeing Pink Floyd as the English version of the Velvet Underground, they decided to use this medium to illustrate the songs they were singing, projecting what effectively were the first music clips on a large screen behind the band. The shows grew ever more weird, and others followed. David Bowie was inspired by the weirdness of Velvet Underground and the madness of Pink Floyd's Syd Barrett (as exemplified by his Jugband Blues). Bowie created an alter-ego named Ziggy Stardust, which gave him an excuse to dress up on stage. Genesis' Peter Gabriel took Bowie's stage act even further dressing in even
more elaborate and bizarre costumes; "Compared to what Gabriel wore on stage, Bowie was dressed for a night at the pub."
question_src: Je! Umri wa mwamba ulikuwa na vipindi vingapi?
pos_context_src: Ilikuwa na sehemu sita za dakika 60 (zilizopunguzwa hadi dakika 48 kwa VH1 Classic), na sehemu ya mwisho ya dakika 90, na ilitangazwa Jumamosi saa 21:00 (ilirudiwa kwenye BBC One Jumapili). Kila sehemu ililenga aina moja ya muziki wa mwamba, kila moja iliyoainishwa na wasanii mmoja au wawili au bendi. Mtayarishaji wa mfululizo alikuwa William Naylor, na mtayarishaji mtendaji wa BBC alikuwa Michael Poole, mhariri wa zamani wa mpango wa Sanaa, Sanaa na Utamaduni wa BBC wa 1990 "The Late Show". Uzalishaji huo ulikuwa msingi wa BBC Bristol na kila programu ilisimuliwa na Julian Rhind-Tutt kwenye BBC na Dennis Hopper kwenye VH1 Classic.
neg_context_src: Toleo la VH1 la sehemu hii halikumtaja Peter Grant au 90/10 kushughulika na watangazaji wa tamasha, "bendi za wabunifu" za Aerosmith, Bunduki N 'Roses, na Bon Jovi, wala kuwa na yeyote kati yao anayecheza. Haikuonyesha Malkia akicheza Hyde Park na hakuwafanya wacheze mwingine kuuma vumbi au ninataka kujiondoa, bila majadiliano juu ya siasa za kucheza Amerika Kusini. Majadiliano ya polisi hupunguzwa na kutembea juu ya mwezi hayachezwi. Malaika wa Harlem pia hajaonyeshwa.

Mfululizo huo ulipokea ukosoaji kutoka kwa waandishi wa habari kwani ilipuuza mchango wa Rock na Roll kwa kuzaliwa kwa Rock. Neil McCormick, mkosoaji wa muziki wa "Daily Telegraph" (ambaye alionekana katika moja ya sehemu kama mhojiwa) alisema: "... Muziki maarufu tu uliingia kwenye kile tunachojua sasa kama Rock wakati Hendrix alipofika London mnamo 1966." '.

Katika sehemu hii baadhi ya nyimbo zilizoonyeshwa kwenye wavuti ya BBC hazikuwa sawa na zilizoonyeshwa kwenye sehemu hiyo. Hizi ni pamoja na sehemu ambayo haifunguliwa na Iggy na Stooges '"Hakuna Furaha" lakini toleo la Bastola ya Ngono (ingawa halijatajwa hadi mwisho wa sehemu hiyo), Buzzcocks pia ilicheza "Boredom" na "Waliowahi Kuanguka kwa Upendo"; Slits zilizo na wimbo mmoja tu, "Wasichana wa kawaida," badala ya zile tatu zilizoonyeshwa kwenye wavuti; na picha za umma "Poptones" zinaonekana kwenye sehemu hiyo.

Matangazo ya sehemu ya VH1 yamepangwa tofauti sana na yanaonyesha nyimbo kadhaa tofauti, mahojiano, na wasanii, na vile vile lengo kuu, Jimi Hendrix, akiondolewa kabisa na mtazamo mpya kuwa Mawe ya Rolling. Hili sio suala na vipindi vingine ambavyo ni tofauti tu.

"Rock 30" ilikuwa mafanikio makubwa, kushinda tuzo kadhaa kuu (pamoja na Tuzo za Primetime Emmy kwa safu bora ya ucheshi mnamo 2007, 2008, na 2009), na kufikia kiwango cha juu kwenye orodha ya mwisho ya mwaka wa wakosoaji wa 2006 na 2007. Mnamo Julai 14, 2009, mfululizo huo uliteuliwa kwa Tuzo 22 za Primetime Emmy, zaidi katika mwaka mmoja kwa safu ya ucheshi. Licha ya madai hayo, mfululizo ulijitahidi katika makadirio wakati wote wa kukimbia. Wakati wa kipindi cha mfululizo, vipindi 138 vilirushwa zaidi ya misimu saba.

Dakika saba kuzimu zilipokea hakiki nzuri kutoka kwa wakosoaji. Latoya Ferguson wa A.V. Klabu inapeana sehemu hiyo B+, ikitoa mfano "baada ya wiki za kuashiria Scream Queens 'asili yenye roho mbaya na sauti iliyochanganyikiwa, sehemu ya wiki hii," Dakika Saba Kuzimu, "mwishowe huhisi kama sehemu kubwa ya marekebisho ya onyesho." IGN's Terri Schwartz inatoa sehemu ya 7.8 kati ya 10, ikisema kama "moja ya safu dhaifu, ingawa ilikuwa na vito kadhaa kama matamshi ya Zayday (Keke Palmer) kwamba, kama Rais wa Kkt," Mabadiliko makubwa ningependa kutekeleza ni kwa kila mtu aache kuuawa na mtu wa Killer, "na wahusika wa Spection. Patrick Sproull kutoka Den ya Geek
Inasema "Scream Queens 'nusu ya hatua ilimalizika kwa barua ya kufurahisha. Tumekuwa na njia ndefu ya kwenda mbele ya mwisho lakini safari ya kutoka hapa kwenda nje inaonekana kama ya kufurahisha."
Umri wa miaka saba ya mwamba (pia inajulikana kama miaka 7 ya mwamba) ni safu mbili za BBC, zilizotengenezwa na BBC Ulimwenguni Pote na VH1 Classic mnamo 2007 kuhusu historia ya muziki wa mwamba.

Matangazo ya VH1 yalikuwa tofauti sana na BBC. Hakuna majadiliano yaliyofanywa ya mahojiano ya bastola ya ngono na Bill Grundy na chanjo ya waandishi wa habari. Pia hakukuwa na kutajwa kwa Buzzcocks, Tommy James akizungumza juu ya "New Rose", bendi za wasichana za punk au picha ya umma, badala yake sehemu hiyo ilicheza "London Wito" na Clash.

Nyimbo nyingi zilizoonyeshwa za sehemu hii ni tofauti kabisa, na kwa hivyo zimeorodheshwa tofauti hapa:
Mnamo 1967, Pink Floyd alichapisha "Arnold Layne", wimbo kuhusu transvestite inayoiba nguo, ikianzisha wazo mpya katika muziki wa pop, Psychedelia. Kama Andy Warhol alivyofanya na Velvet Chini ya Amerika, waligeuza maonyesho yao kuwa maonyesho ya media titika. Warhol alikuja na wazo la kutengeneza filamu kwenye historia ya hatua hiyo. Na Peter Jenner akiona Pink Floyd kama toleo la Kiingereza la Velvet Chini ya Velvet, waliamua kutumia njia hii kuelezea nyimbo walizokuwa wakiimba, wakifanya kazi kwa ufanisi sehemu za kwanza za muziki kwenye skrini kubwa nyuma ya bendi. Maonyesho yaliongezeka zaidi, na wengine walifuata. David Bowie aliongozwa na uchovu wa Velvet Underground na wazimu wa Pink Floyd's Sod Barrett (kama ilivyoonyeshwa na Blues yake ya Jugband). Bowie aliunda mabadiliko ya jina la Ziggy Stardust, ambayo ilimpa udhuru wa mavazi juu ya hatua. Mwanzo 'Peter Gabriel alichukua hatua ya hatua ya Bowie hata kuvaa zaidi hata
mavazi ya kufafanua zaidi na ya kushangaza; "Ikilinganishwa na kile Gabriel alivaa kwenye hatua, Bowie alikuwa amevaliwa usiku kwenye baa."
report_src: Mfululizo wa “Umri saba wa mwamba” ulijumuisha jumla ya vipindi saba: vipindi sita vya dakika 60 na kipindi cha mwisho cha dakika 90 [1].

question_en: When did Jean-Baptiste Poquelin adopt his stage name Moliere?
pos_context_en: Some French authors have shown a preference for mononyms. In the 17th century, the dramatist and actor Jean-Baptiste Poquelin (1622–73) took the mononym stage name Molière.
neg_context_en: The Molière was an international train operated by SNCF, initially linking Paris and Düsseldorf. The train was named after Jean Baptiste Poquelin using his stage name.

It has borne several names, including "rue de la Fontaine-Molière", "rue Traversière-Saint-Honoré" before 1843, earlier the "rue Traversine" or "Traversante", and in 1625 "rue de la Brasserie" or "rue du Bâton-Royal". It is notable for collège Jean-Baptiste-Poquelin, named after the playwright Jean-Baptiste-Poquelin, the real name of Molière.

Not to be confused with Jean-Baptiste Poquelin Molière (1622-73), the famous playwright of King Louis’ reign responsible for ballets such as "Le Bourgeois Gentilhomme" (1670), the Molière mentioned in the text is accompanied by “La Jeune” translated into English as “the young” or “the younger.” Given Poquelin was never known by such a title, it indicates “Molière” is rather the courtly spelling of “Mollier” as in Louis de Mollier (1615-88) an acclaimed dancer and musician of the court. Of course, Louis de Mollier is older than Jean-Baptiste Poquelin Molière, however historical records (such as pg.103 of the "Mercure Galant", July 1677) show Louis de Mollier was commonly known as “le petit Molière,” likely due to his waning popularity in comparison Poquelin.[8] It is thus feasible that “Molière La Jeune” is equivalent to “Molière le petit.”

Jean-Baptiste Poquelin, known by his stage name Molière (; ; 15 January 162217 February 1673), was a French playwright, actor and poet, widely regarded as one of the greatest writers in the French language and universal literature. His extant works includes comedies, farces, tragicomedies, comédie-ballets, and more. His plays have been translated into every major living language and are performed at the Comédie-Française more often than those of any other playwright today. His influence is such that the French language itself is often referred to as the "language of Molière".

Jean-Baptiste Poquelin is raised by his father and his grandfather because his mother dies when he's still very little. He works as a handyman, studies the law at a university and travels the country as an actor before he becomes the celebrated playwright Molière who impresses firstly the Duke of Orleans and then even King Louis XIV.

In 1661, Moliere moved his company into the theater built by Cardinal Richelieu at the Palais-Royal. After the death of Moliere in 1673, the composer Jean-Baptiste Lully expelled Moliere's actors from the theater and used it for performances of operas. Chased from their home, the actors of Moliere moved to a different theater, called La Couteillle, on the modern rue Jacques-Callot, where they merged with their old rivals, the company of the Hôtel de Bourgogne. In 1680, the new company was officially chartered by the King as the "Comédiens de Roi", which became known as the Comédie-Française. In 1689, they were forced to depart because of complaints that the actors were a bad influence on the neighboring noble students of the Collège des Quatre-Nations. They moved further south on the left bank to the modern rue de l'Ancienne-Comédie, where they remained until 1770, before moving back to their present home at the Palais-Royal between 1786 and 1790.

Molière was born in Paris, the son of Jean Poquelin and Marie Cressé, the daughter of a prosperous bourgeois family. Upon seeing him for the first time, a maid exclaimed, "Le nez!", a reference to the infant's large nose. Molière was called "Le Nez" by his family from that time. He lost his mother when he was ten and he did not seem to have been particularly close to his father. After his mother's death, he lived with his father above the "Pavillon des Singes" on the rue Saint-Honoré, an affluent area of Paris. It is likely that his education commenced with studies in a Parisian elementary school; this was followed with his enrollment in the prestigious Jesuit Collège de Clermont, where he completed his studies in a strict academic environment and got a first taste of life on the stage.

In 1631, Jean Poquelin purchased from the court of Louis XIII the posts of "" ("valet of the King's chamber and keeper of carpets and upholstery"). His son assumed the same posts in 1641. The title required only three months' work and an initial cost of 1,200 livres; the title paid 300 livres a year and provided a number of lucrative contracts. Poquelin also studied as a provincial lawyer some time around 1642, probably in Orléans, but it is not documented that he ever qualified. So far he had followed his father's plans, which had served him well; he had mingled with nobility at the Collège de Clermont and seemed destined for a career in office.

Having won the protection of the duc d'Orléans, the new troupe returned to Paris and took up residence at the "jeu de paume des Métayers", 13 rue de Seine, where they opened on 1 January 1644 playing tragedy. Receipts were low and their protector left for the war. Jean-Baptiste Poquelin, who signed himself Molière from 28 June, was obliged to borrow. They had to leave and moved to the "jeu de paume de la Croix-Noire", rue des Barrés, in December of the same year. Unable to repay his multiple creditors, Molière was imprisoned in August 1645 : after less than two years of existence, the "Illustre Théâtre" had finally failed, but it had made a mark on the history of theatre.
question_src: Je! Jean-Baptiste Poquelin alichukua jina lake la hatua gani Moliere?
pos_context_src: Waandishi wengine wa Ufaransa wameonyesha upendeleo kwa mononyms. Katika karne ya 17, mwigizaji na muigizaji Jean-Baptiste Poquelin (1622-73) alichukua jina la jina la Molière.
neg_context_src: Molière ilikuwa treni ya kimataifa inayoendeshwa na SNCF, hapo awali iliunganisha Paris na Düsseldorf. Treni hiyo ilipewa jina la Jean Baptiste Poquelin kutumia jina lake la hatua.

Imechukua majina kadhaa, pamoja na "Rue de la Fontaine-Molière", "Rue Traversière-Saint-Honoré" kabla ya 1843, mapema "Rue Traversine" au "Traversante", na mnamo 1625 "Rue de la Brasserie" au "Rue du Bâton-Royal". Inafahamika kwa Collège Jean-Baptiste-Poquelin, aliyepewa jina la mchezaji wa kucheza Jean-Baptiste-Poquelin, jina halisi la Molière.

Haipaswi kuchanganyikiwa na Jean-Baptiste Poquelin Molière (1622-73), mwandishi maarufu wa Mfalme Louis 'anayehusika na ballets kama "Le Bourgeois Gentilhomme" (1670), Molière iliyotajwa kwenye maandishi imeambatana na "La Jeeune" ilitafsiriwa "Young" Oro "" Young "Or" "Young" Oro "" Young "oro" orod "orosed" maandishi "kati ya" Young "or" oro "orosed" orod ". Kwa kuzingatia Poquelin hajawahi kujulikana na jina kama hilo, inaonyesha "Molière" ni spelling ya kweli ya "Mollier" kama ilivyo kwa Louis de Mollier (1615-88) densi aliyetamkwa na mwanamuziki wa korti. Kwa kweli, Louis de Mollier ni mzee kuliko Jean-Baptiste Poquelin Molière, hata hivyo rekodi za kihistoria (kama vile pg.103 ya "Mercure Galant", Julai 1677) inaonyesha Louis de Mollier alikuwa akijulikana kama "Le Petit Molière," uwezekano wa kutokana na umaarufu wake wa kulinganisha. Kwa hivyo inawezekana kwamba "Molière la Jeune" ni sawa na "Molière le Petit."

Jean-Baptiste Poquelin, anayejulikana kwa jina lake la hatua Molière (;; 15 Januari 162217 Februari 1673), alikuwa mchezaji wa kucheza wa Ufaransa, muigizaji na mshairi, anayechukuliwa sana kama mmoja wa waandishi wakubwa katika lugha ya Ufaransa na fasihi ya Universal. Kazi zake za nje ni pamoja na vichekesho, farces, tragicomedies, mapambo ya comédie, na zaidi. Michezo yake imetafsiriwa katika kila lugha kuu ya kuishi na hufanywa huko Comédie-Française mara nyingi zaidi kuliko ile ya mtu mwingine yeyote wa kucheza leo. Ushawishi wake ni kwamba lugha ya Kifaransa yenyewe mara nyingi hujulikana kama "lugha ya Molière".

Jean-Baptiste Poquelin analelewa na baba yake na babu yake kwa sababu mama yake anakufa wakati bado ni mdogo sana. Yeye hufanya kazi kama mfanyikazi, anasoma sheria katika chuo kikuu na anasafiri nchi kama muigizaji kabla ya kuwa mtu anayesherehekea mchezaji anayesherehekea Molière ambaye anamvutia kwanza Duke wa Orleans na kisha hata Mfalme Louis XIV.

Mnamo 1661, Moliere alihamisha kampuni yake katika ukumbi wa michezo uliojengwa na Kardinali Richelieu huko Palais-Royal. Baada ya kifo cha Moliere mnamo 1673, mtunzi Jean-Baptiste Lully aliwafukuza watendaji wa Moliere kutoka ukumbi wa michezo na akatumia kwa maonyesho ya michezo. Kufukuzwa kutoka nyumbani kwao, watendaji wa Moliere walihamia kwenye ukumbi wa michezo tofauti, inayoitwa La Couteillle, kwenye eneo la kisasa la Rue Jacques, ambapo waliungana na wapinzani wao wa zamani, kampuni ya Hôtel de Bourgogne. Mnamo 1680, kampuni hiyo mpya iliwekwa rasmi na mfalme kama "Comédiens de Roi", ambayo ilijulikana kama Comédie-Française. Mnamo 1689, walilazimika kuondoka kwa sababu ya malalamiko kwamba watendaji walikuwa ushawishi mbaya kwa wanafunzi wa jirani wa watu wa jirani wa Collège des Quatre. Walihamia kusini zaidi kwenye benki ya kushoto kwenda kwa Rue de l'Ancienne-Comédie wa kisasa, ambapo walibaki hadi 1770, kabla ya kurudi nyumbani kwao huko Palais-Royal kati ya 1786 na 1790.

Molière alizaliwa huko Paris, mwana wa Jean Poquelin na Marie Cressé, binti wa familia ya mabepari yenye mafanikio. Baada ya kumuona kwa mara ya kwanza, mjakazi akasema, "Le Nez!", Rejea ya pua kubwa ya mtoto. Molière aliitwa "Le Nez" na familia yake tangu wakati huo. Alipoteza mama yake alipokuwa na miaka kumi na hakuonekana alikuwa karibu sana na baba yake. Baada ya kifo cha mama yake, aliishi na baba yake juu ya "Pavillon des Singes" kwenye Rue Saint-Honoré, eneo tajiri la Paris. Inawezekana kwamba elimu yake ilianza na masomo katika shule ya msingi ya Parisian; Hii ilifuatiwa na uandikishaji wake katika kifahari cha Yesuit Collège de Clermont, ambapo alikamilisha masomo yake katika mazingira madhubuti ya kitaaluma na akapata ladha ya kwanza ya maisha kwenye hatua hiyo.

Mnamo 1631, Jean Poquelin alinunua kutoka Korti ya Louis XIII Machapisho ya "" ("Valet ya Chumba cha Mfalme na Askari wa Mazulia na Upholstery"). Mwanawe alichukua machapisho yale yale mnamo 1641. Kichwa kilihitaji kazi ya miezi mitatu tu na gharama ya awali ya livres 1,200; Kichwa kililipa livres 300 kwa mwaka na kutoa mikataba kadhaa ya faida. Poquelin pia alisoma kama wakili wa mkoa wakati fulani karibu 1642, labda huko Orléans, lakini haijaandikwa kuwa aliwahi kufuzu. Kufikia sasa alikuwa amefuata mipango ya baba yake, ambayo ilikuwa imemtumikia vyema; Alikuwa amechanganyika na heshima huko Collège de Clermont na alionekana kuwa na kazi ya ofisi.

Baada ya kushinda ulinzi wa Duc d'Orléans, kikundi kipya kilirudi Paris na kuishi katika "Jeu de Paume des Métayers", 13 Rue de Seine, ambapo walifungua 1 Januari 1644 wakicheza janga. Risiti zilikuwa chini na mlinzi wao aliondoka kwa vita. Jean-Baptiste Poquelin, ambaye alijisaini Molière kutoka Juni 28, alilazimika kukopa. Walilazimika kuondoka na kuhamia "Jeu de Paume de la Croix-Noire", Rue des Barrés, mnamo Desemba mwaka huo huo. Haikuweza kuwalipa wadai wake wengi, Molière alifungwa gerezani mnamo Agosti 1645: baada ya chini ya miaka miwili ya kuishi, "Illustra Théâtre" hatimaye ilishindwa, lakini ilifanya alama kwenye historia ya ukumbi wa michezo.
