question_en: When did CBS Sunday Morning first air?
pos_context_en: CBS News Sunday Morning is an American newsmagazine television program that has aired on CBS since January 28, 1979. Created by Robert Northshield and original host Charles Kuralt, the 90-minute program currently airs Sundays from 9:00 to 10:30 a.m. Eastern, Pacific Time from 7:00 to 8:30 a.m. and 8:00 to 9:30 a.m. in all other time zones (live in the Eastern and Central time zones, and on tape delay elsewhere). Since October 9, 2016, the show has been hosted by Jane Pauley, who also posts news segments, after the retirement of long-term host Charles Osgood. Osgood was the host for twenty-two years (and is the program's longest-serving host), taking over from Kuralt on April 10, 1994.
neg_context_en: On April 27, 2014, following an appearance during a "where are they now" segment and interview on "CBS Sunday Morning", Pauley began contributing to the show as a correspondent and occasional substitute host. Pauley has been a guest host on "CBS This Morning" and has also filled in for Scott Pelley on the "CBS Evening News". It was announced on September 25, 2016, that Pauley would take over as host of "CBS Sunday Morning" following the retirement of Charles Osgood. "We first got to know Jane when we did a story about her on "Sunday Morning,"" said Rand Morrison, the show’s executive producer, in a statement. "Our viewers immediately responded by suggesting she belonged on "Sunday Morning" permanently. And – as is so often the case, they were right. She’s a dedicated, experienced broadcast journalist. But – every bit as important – she’s a delight to work with. A worthy successor – and a perfect fit."

In 1982, the weekday version was extended to a full two hours and restored its previous "CBS Morning News" title, later to be replaced by short-lived "The Morning Program" in 1987. The Sunday version, however, survived, and retains its original format. Long after the daily editions ended, the Sunday edition's opening sequence continued to display all seven days of the week until the early 2000s. On January 25, 2004, "CBS News Sunday Morning" celebrated its 25th anniversary with clips and highlights from the show's first quarter-century on the air. Host Charles Osgood showed clips from former host Charles Kuralt.

On January 18, 1982, again at the expense of "Captain Kangaroo", "Morning" was expanded to the same two-hour format that "Today" and "GMA" were utilizing. Along the way it reassumed the title of The CBS Morning News (not to be confused with CBS's earlier morning newscast, the "CBS Early Morning News", later retitled as the "CBS Morning News"). Kuralt was replaced on the weekday broadcasts in March 1982. By this time management decided that morning news programming should be more competitive and hired Bill Kurtis, anchor of the highly rated evening newscasts at WBBM-TV in Chicago, as Sawyer's co-host. The Sunday edition of "Morning", with Kuralt as host, was kept; it remains on the air under its original title, "CBS News Sunday Morning" (now hosted by Jane Pauley).

The February 1, 2009 broadcast celebrated "Sunday Morning"s 30th anniversary. Segments examined how the world has changed in the three decades since the program began, the history of Sundays in America and – as a tie-in to the show's logo – the physics of the sun. An artist was commissioned to create new sun logos for the program, which debuted on that edition and were used in future broadcasts. CBS News correspondent Steve Hartman periodically revisits some of Charles Kuralt's memorable personal profiles. On May 17, 2009, "CBS News Sunday Morning" began broadcasting in high-definition. In 2014, rebroadcasts of the program began airing on sister cable network Smithsonian Channel (owned by CBS's parent company CBS Corporation), but has since been pulled from that channel's programming.

CBS, in contrast, has struggled since television's early age to maintain a long-term morning program. Though it initially tried to mimic "Today" when it debuted a morning show in a two-hour format in 1954, the show was reduced to one hour within a year in order to make room for the new children's television series "Captain Kangaroo". The network abandoned the morning show in 1957. From the late 1960s throughout the 1970s, the "CBS Morning News" aired as a straight one-hour morning newscast that had a high rate of turnover among its anchors. In January 1979, the network launched the innovative "___day Morning" series, which focused more on lifestyle and feature reports; this format, however, was relegated exclusively to Sundays after two years, and still airs under the title "CBS News Sunday Morning". It was not until 1982 that "Captain Kangaroo" ended its run on weekdays (before ending altogether in 1984), allowing CBS to expand its morning show to a full two hours. However, the high rate of turnover among anchors returned. An ill-fated comedic revamp of the show, "The Morning Program", debuted in 1987. After that, however, came "This Morning", which has so far had the longest run of any of CBS' morning show attempts. "This Morning" was eventually cancelled 12 years later, being replaced by "The Early Show" in 1999; "The Early Show", in turn, ceded to the new version of "CBS This Morning" (this time featuring a format focused more on hard news and interviews, excising lifestyle and infotainment segments) in January 2012.

An exception to the usual Saturday format occurred on February 2, 2013 (the day before Super Bowl XLVII), when the weekday anchor team hosted from New Orleans (where the game was held at the Mercedes-Benz Superdome), an edition that was branded as simply "CBS This Morning" (instead of "CBS This Morning Saturday") and was formatted similarly to the weekday program, including "EyeOpener" segments at the top of both hours. "CBS This Morning" does not produce a Sunday edition, due to the presence of the long-running "CBS News Sunday Morning", a newsmagazine that debuted in 1979 (and is a remnant of a short-lived reformatting of the original "CBS Morning News" broadcast that lasted until 1982). In contrast to "CBS This Morning", "CBS Sunday Morning" has long led the ratings among the Sunday network morning shows.
In Australia, a trimmed version (for 70 minutes excluding commercials) of the "CBS This Morning" weekday edition currently airs on CBS's sister network (since November 2017) Network Ten, along with regional affiliate WIN Television, weekday mornings from 4am until 6am AEST, with the Friday edition held over to the following Monday. A national weather map of Australia is inserted during local affiliate cutaways for weather. Commercial advertising is inserted instead of the usual cutaway to local news, however, near-simultaneously with the other U.S. "Big Three" television networks' breakfast television programs, with ABC-TV's "Good Morning America" on the Nine Network from 3:30 a.m. and NBC's "Today" airing on the Seven Network from 4 a.m. It is subject to preemption in regional areas for paid and religious programming. Unlike the Nine Network and Seven Network, the weekend edition is not shown.

For its first year, the program was broadcast live one hour later than the Monday through Friday version of the original "CBS This Morning", starting at 8:00 a.m. Eastern Time; however, it was based out of the same studio at the CBS Broadcast Center that was home to the weekday broadcast. The program moved to the 7:00 a.m. Eastern time slot (uniform with the weekday broadcast) in September 1998. Many CBS stations aired "CBS News Saturday Morning"/"The Saturday Early Show" in varying time slots; however, some affiliates opted to pre-empt the Saturday edition in favor of airing local morning newscasts, while some chose to carry the network's Saturday morning children's program block afterward if their newscast ended before 9:00 a.m. in order to make up for the pre-emption of the national program (something that remains the case with "CBS This Morning Saturday"). Production of the Saturday edition to the General Motors Building in 1999, when the weekday and Saturday programs were relaunched under "The Early Show" brand.

On Sunday, January 28, 1979, CBS revamped the program, premiering Morning, which was titled in accordance to the day of the week ("Monday Morning", "Tuesday Morning", etc.). The weekday "Morning" series competed with "Good Morning America" and "Today". Charles Kuralt hosted Sundays, while Bob Schieffer hosted the rest of the week; Kuralt took over the daily broadcasts as well starting on October 27, 1980. The program featured long-form pieces from CBS News bureaus, and many viewed it as a highbrow, classy newscast in the best CBS tradition. Despite critical acclaim, the program remained dead last in the ratings, and CBS was under more pressure from affiliates to present a more viable morning competitor. So on September 28, 1981, "Morning" dropped the days of the week from its title (except for "Sunday Morning"), was extended to 90 minutes and added Diane Sawyer as co-host; in the process, "Captain Kangaroo" was reduced to a half-hour daily and pushed to an earlier time period (7:00 a.m.).

On January 28, 1979, CBS launched "CBS News Sunday Morning" with Kuralt as host. On October 27, 1980, he was added as host of the weekday broadcasts of CBS' "Morning" show as well, being joined with Diane Sawyer as weekday co-host on September 28, 1981. Kuralt left the weekday broadcasts in March 1982, but continued to anchor the popular Sunday morning program until April 3, 1994, when he retired after 15 years as host and was succeeded by Charles Osgood.
question_src: CBS Jumapili asubuhi ilifanya lini hewa ya kwanza?
pos_context_src: Habari za CBS Jumapili asubuhi ni programu ya televisheni ya Amerika ya habari ambayo imerudishwa kwenye CBS tangu Januari 28, 1979. Iliyoundwa na Robert Northshield na mwenyeji wa asili Charles Kuralt, programu ya dakika 90 kwa sasa inaibuka Jumapili kutoka 9:00 hadi 10:30 a.m. Mashariki, wakati wote kutoka 7:00 hadi 8:30 a.m. na 8:30 hadi Zoses, kwa wakati mwingine wote wa Zo, kwa wakati mwingine wote na 8:30 a.m. A.M. A.M. A.M. A.M. Kuchelewesha mkanda mahali pengine). Tangu Oktoba 9, 2016, onyesho hilo limeshikiliwa na Jane Pauley, ambaye pia anachapisha sehemu za habari, baada ya kustaafu kwa mwenyeji wa muda mrefu Charles Osgood. Osgood alikuwa mwenyeji kwa miaka ishirini na mbili (na ndiye mwenyeji wa muda mrefu zaidi wa programu), akichukua kutoka Kuralt Aprili 10, 1994.
neg_context_src: Mnamo Aprili 27, 2014, kufuatia kuonekana wakati wa sehemu ya "Wako Wapi Sasa" na mahojiano kwenye "CBS Jumapili asubuhi", Pauley alianza kuchangia onyesho kama mwandishi na mwenyeji wa mbadala wa mara kwa mara. Pauley amekuwa mwenyeji wa mgeni kwenye "CBS Asubuhi hii" na pia amejaza Scott Pelley kwenye "Habari za Jioni za CBS". Ilitangazwa mnamo Septemba 25, 2016, kwamba Pauley angechukua kama mwenyeji wa "CBS Jumapili asubuhi" kufuatia kustaafu kwa Charles Osgood. "Kwanza tulimjua Jane wakati tulipofanya hadithi juu yake mnamo" Jumapili asubuhi, "" Rand Morrison, mtayarishaji mtendaji wa show, katika taarifa yake. "Watazamaji wetu walijibu mara moja kwa kupendekeza kuwa ni wa" Jumapili asubuhi "kabisa. Na - kama ilivyo kawaida, walikuwa sahihi. Yeye ni mwandishi wa habari aliyejitolea, mwenye uzoefu. Lakini - kila muhimu - anafurahi kufanya kazi naye. Mrithi anayestahili - na anayefaa kabisa."

Mnamo 1982, toleo la siku ya wiki liliongezwa hadi masaa mawili kamili na kurejesha jina lake la zamani la "CBS Morning News", baadaye kubadilishwa na muda mfupi "Programu ya Asubuhi" mnamo 1987. Toleo la Jumapili, hata hivyo, lilinusurika, na lina muundo wake wa asili. Muda mrefu baada ya matoleo ya kila siku kumalizika, mlolongo wa ufunguzi wa toleo la Jumapili uliendelea kuonyesha siku zote saba za juma hadi miaka ya 2000 mapema. Mnamo Januari 25, 2004, "Habari ya Jumapili ya CBS" ilisherehekea kumbukumbu yake ya 25 na sehemu na picha kuu kutoka kwa robo ya kwanza ya karne ya kwanza hewani. Mwenyeji Charles Osgood alionyesha sehemu kutoka kwa mwenyeji wa zamani Charles Kuralt.

Mnamo Januari 18, 1982, tena kwa gharama ya "Kapteni Kangaroo", "Morning" iliongezwa kwa muundo huo wa saa mbili ambao "Leo" na "GMA" walikuwa wakitumia. Njiani ilisisitiza tena jina la Habari za Morning za CBS (ili zisichanganyike na jarida la mapema la asubuhi la CBS, "Habari za Asubuhi za CBS", baadaye zilibadilishwa kama "Habari za Morning za CBS"). Kuralt ilibadilishwa kwenye matangazo ya siku ya wiki mnamo Machi 1982. Kufikia wakati huu usimamizi uliamua kwamba programu za habari za asubuhi zinapaswa kuwa za ushindani zaidi na kuajiriwa Bill Kurtis, nanga wa habari za jioni zilizokadiriwa sana huko WBBM-TV huko Chicago, kama mwenyeji wa Sawyer. Toleo la Jumapili la "Morning", na Kuralt kama mwenyeji, lilitunzwa; Inabaki hewani chini ya jina lake la asili, "Habari za CBS Jumapili asubuhi" (sasa inashikiliwa na Jane Pauley).

Matangazo ya Februari 1, 2009 yalisherehekea kumbukumbu ya "Jumapili asubuhi". Sehemu zilichunguza jinsi ulimwengu umebadilika katika miongo mitatu tangu mpango ulipoanza, historia ya Jumapili huko Amerika na-kama kufunga kwa nembo ya onyesho-Fizikia ya Jua. Msanii aliagizwa kuunda nembo mpya za jua kwa mpango huo, ambao ulijadili juu ya toleo hilo na ulitumika katika matangazo ya baadaye. Mwandishi wa Habari wa CBS Steve Hartman mara kwa mara anapitia maelezo mengine ya kibinafsi ya Charles Kuralt. Mnamo Mei 17, 2009, "Habari za Jumapili za CBS" zilianza kutangaza kwa ufafanuzi wa hali ya juu. Mnamo mwaka wa 2014, Rebroadcasts ya programu hiyo ilianza kupeperusha kwenye Kituo cha Dada Cable Network Smithsonian (inayomilikiwa na kampuni ya mzazi wa CBS CBS Corporation), lakini tangu wakati huo imekuwa ikitolewa kutoka kwa programu ya kituo hicho.

CBS, kwa upande wake, imejitahidi tangu umri mdogo wa runinga kudumisha programu ya asubuhi ya muda mrefu. Ingawa hapo awali ilijaribu kuiga "Leo" wakati ilipojadili onyesho la asubuhi katika muundo wa masaa mawili mnamo 1954, onyesho hilo lilipunguzwa hadi saa moja ndani ya mwaka ili kufanya nafasi ya safu mpya ya runinga ya watoto "Kapteni Kangaroo". Mtandao uliachana na onyesho la asubuhi mnamo 1957. Kuanzia mwishoni mwa miaka ya 1960 miaka ya 1970, "Habari za Morning za CBS" zilirushwa kama habari ya saa moja ya asubuhi ambayo ilikuwa na kiwango cha juu cha mauzo kati ya nanga zake. Mnamo Januari 1979, mtandao ulizindua safu ya ubunifu ya "___day asubuhi", ambayo ililenga zaidi katika mtindo wa maisha na ripoti za kipengele; Fomati hii, hata hivyo, iliachiliwa tu hadi Jumapili baada ya miaka miwili, na bado iko chini ya kichwa "Habari za CBS Jumapili asubuhi". Haikuwa hadi 1982 kwamba "Kapteni Kangaroo" alimaliza kukimbia siku za wiki (kabla ya kumaliza kabisa mnamo 1984), ikiruhusu CBS kupanua onyesho lake la asubuhi hadi masaa mawili kamili. Walakini, kiwango cha juu cha mauzo kati ya nanga kilirudi. Marekebisho mabaya ya onyesho la onyesho, "Programu ya Asubuhi", ilijadiliwa mnamo 1987. Baada ya hapo, hata hivyo, ilikuja "Asubuhi hii", ambayo hadi sasa ilikuwa na majaribio marefu zaidi ya majaribio yoyote ya asubuhi ya CBS. "Asubuhi hii" hatimaye ilifutwa miaka 12 baadaye, ikibadilishwa na "Maonyesho ya mapema" mnamo 1999; "Maonyesho ya mapema", kwa upande wake, yalitokana na toleo jipya la "CBS asubuhi ya leo" (wakati huu iliyo na muundo uliolenga zaidi habari ngumu na mahojiano, utaftaji wa maisha na sehemu za infotainment) mnamo Januari 2012.

Isipokuwa kwa muundo wa kawaida wa Jumamosi ulitokea mnamo Februari 2, 2013 (siku iliyotangulia Super Bowl XLVII), wakati timu ya nanga ya siku ya wiki ilishikilia kutoka New Orleans (ambapo mchezo ulifanyika kwenye Mercedes-Benz Superdome), toleo ambalo lilitajwa kama "CBS asubuhi hii" (badala ya "CBS asubuhi ya Jumamosi") na iliyowekwa sawa na wiki. "CBS Asubuhi hii" haitoi toleo la Jumapili, kwa sababu ya uwepo wa "Habari za CBS Jumapili asubuhi", habari ambayo ilijadiliwa mnamo 1979 (na ni mabaki ya mabadiliko ya muda mfupi ya matangazo ya asili ya "CBS Morning" ambayo yalidumu hadi 1982). Kinyume na "CBS asubuhi ya leo", "CBS Jumapili asubuhi" imeongoza kwa muda mrefu makadirio kati ya maonyesho ya asubuhi ya Jumapili.
Huko Australia, toleo lililopangwa (kwa dakika 70 ukiondoa matangazo) ya toleo la "CBS Asubuhi hii" kwa sasa linaonekana kwenye mtandao wa dada wa CBS (tangu Novemba 2017) Mtandao wa kumi, pamoja na ushirika wa ushirika wa kikanda, asubuhi ya wiki kuanzia saa 4 asubuhi hadi 6 asubuhi, na toleo la Ijumaa lililofanyika Jumatatu ifuatayo. Ramani ya hali ya hewa ya kitaifa ya Australia imeingizwa wakati wa kukatwa kwa ushirika wa ndani kwa hali ya hewa. Matangazo ya kibiashara huingizwa badala ya kukatwa kwa kawaida kwa habari za kawaida, hata hivyo, karibu na wakati huo huo na programu zingine za runinga za runinga za Merika "kubwa tatu", na ABC-TV "Morning America" ​​kwenye Mtandao wa Tisa kutoka 3:30 a.m. na NBC "leo" kwenye mtandao wa saba kutoka 4 a.m. Ni chini ya maeneo ya mikoani. Tofauti na Mtandao wa Tisa na Mtandao Saba, toleo la wikendi halijaonyeshwa.

Kwa mwaka wake wa kwanza, programu hiyo ilitangazwa moja kwa moja saa moja baadaye kuliko Jumatatu hadi toleo la Ijumaa la "CBS Asubuhi hii", kuanzia saa 8:00 a.m. Wakati wa Mashariki; Walakini, ilikuwa msingi wa studio hiyo hiyo katika Kituo cha Matangazo cha CBS ambacho kilikuwa nyumbani kwa matangazo ya siku ya wiki. Programu hiyo ilihamia hadi saa 7:00 a.m. Saa ya Mashariki (sare na matangazo ya siku ya wiki) mnamo Septemba 1998. Vituo vingi vya CBS vilirusha "Habari za CBS Jumamosi asubuhi"/"Maonyesho ya mapema ya Jumamosi" katika Slots za Muda tofauti; Walakini, washirika wengine waliamua kuandaa toleo la Jumamosi kwa niaba ya matangazo ya habari ya asubuhi, wakati wengine walichagua kubeba mpango wa Jumamosi ya Jumamosi ya watoto baadaye ikiwa utangazaji wao ulimalizika kabla ya 9:00 a.m. ili kufanya utangulizi wa mpango wa kitaifa (kitu ambacho kinabaki na "CBS asubuhi ya Jumamosi"). Uzalishaji wa Toleo la Jumamosi kwa Jengo la General Motors mnamo 1999, wakati programu za siku ya wiki na Jumamosi ziliwekwa tena chini ya chapa ya "The Show Show".

Siku ya Jumapili, Januari 28, 1979, CBS ilibadilisha mpango huo, Waziri Mkuu asubuhi, ambayo ilipewa jina kwa mujibu wa Siku ya Wiki ("Jumatatu asubuhi", "Jumanne asubuhi", nk). Mfululizo wa siku ya wiki "Asubuhi" ulishindana na "Good Morning America" ​​na "Leo". Charles Kuralt alishiriki Jumapili, wakati Bob Schieffer alikuwa mwenyeji wa wiki nzima; Kuralt alichukua matangazo ya kila siku pia kuanzia Oktoba 27, 1980. Programu hiyo ilionyesha vipande vya fomu ndefu kutoka kwa CBS News Bureaus, na wengi waliiona kama habari ya juu, ya habari ya kitamaduni katika mila bora ya CBS. Licha ya madai muhimu, mpango huo ulibaki umekufa katika makadirio, na CBS ilikuwa chini ya shinikizo zaidi kutoka kwa washirika kuwasilisha mshindani anayefaa zaidi wa asubuhi. Kwa hivyo mnamo Septemba 28, 1981, "Morning" iliangusha siku za juma kutoka kwa kichwa chake (isipokuwa "Jumapili asubuhi"), iliongezwa hadi dakika 90 na kuongeza Diane Sawyer kama mwenyeji mwenza; Katika mchakato huo, "Kapteni Kangaroo" ilipunguzwa hadi nusu saa kila siku na kusukuma kwa kipindi cha mapema (7:00 a.m.).

Mnamo Januari 28, 1979, CBS ilizindua "Habari za CBS Jumapili asubuhi" na Kuralt kama mwenyeji. Mnamo Oktoba 27, 1980, aliongezwa kama mwenyeji wa matangazo ya siku ya wiki ya onyesho la CBS "Morning" vile vile, akijumuishwa na Diane Sawyer kama mwenyeji wa wiki ya wiki mnamo Septemba 28, 1981. Kuralt aliondoka kwenye matangazo ya siku ya wiki mnamo Machi 1982, lakini aliendelea kushinikiza mpango maarufu wa Jumapili hadi Aprili 3, 1994, wakati alistaafu baada ya miaka 15 kama mwenyeji na alifanikiwa na charles.
report_src: “CBS Jumapili asubuhi” (CBS Sunday Morning) ilianza kurushwa hewani kwa mara ya kwanza tarehe 28 Januari 1979 [1].
all_claims: “CBS Jumapili asubuhi” (CBS Sunday Morning) ilianza kurushwa hewani kwa mara ya kwanza tarehe 28 Januari 1979 [1].
claims_w_citations: “CBS Jumapili asubuhi” (CBS Sunday Morning) ilianza kurushwa hewani kwa mara ya kwanza tarehe 28 Januari 1979 [1].
claims_retained: “CBS Jumapili asubuhi” (CBS Sunday Morning) ilianza kurushwa hewani kwa mara ya kwanza tarehe 28 Januari 1979 [1].

question_en: Does XETV-TDT have a website?
pos_context_en: As the original American digital television transition date of 17 February 2009 approached, XETV had expressed intentions to follow other San Diego-area stations in ceasing transmission of its analog signal. While the U.S. switchover deadline of 17 February was later pushed back to 12 June 2009 and only applied to American-licensed stations in any case, plans were announced to voluntarily make the station's English-language programming digital-only. The analog signal would be repurposed to retransmit the Mexican Galavisión network (not to be confused with the American cable channel of the same name). Claims on XETV's website that the station was indeed going to transmit a digitally-exclusive signal were rescinded on 17 February 2009 as the station decided to delay cutting off its analog signal until after it secured approval from the Mexican government. XETV management later stated that it had decided to maintain its analog signal to benefit Mexican viewers. XETV's analog signal was eventually repurposed on 5 March 2012, when the station began multicasting on its digital signal with the addition of Televisa's youth-oriented Canal 5 network on subchannel 6.2 and on its analog feed, while digital channel 6.1 retained the newscasts, CW network and syndicated programs in English. On the same date, XHBJ-TV channel 45 dropped Canal 5 for Galavisión. Canal 5 replaced XETV's English-language programming on its analog signal, in order to serve Spanish-speaking viewers in Tijuana that did not have television sets with built-in digital tuners or digital converter boxes prior to the Tijuana market's 2013 transition to digital television. The affiliation switch coincided with the commencement of digital multicasting on Televisa's Tijuana stations. Canal 5 moved to its primary channel on 31 May 2017, at which point, the 6.2 subchannel was decommissioned.
neg_context_en: Because XETV-TDT is licensed to Tijuana by the Mexican government, it is not covered under the FCC's must carry rules. This means that local cable providers are not required to carry XETV-TDT, even if the television station requests to be carried under this provision. As an English-language station XETV had been carried by Cox Communications, Time Warner Cable (now Charter Spectrum) and AT&T U-verse in San Diego, all on channel 6. KFMB-TV's "The CW San Diego" has replaced XETV on the American cable systems, as well as satellite television providers DirecTV and Dish Network. XETV is carried by all Mexican cable systems in its coverage area, as carriage of local broadcast stations is mandated by the Federal Telecommunications Institute (IFT).

In October 2001, Grupo Televisa entered into a joint sales and programming agreement with Entravision Communications. Under this agreement, Entravision, which already operated UPN affiliate XHUPN-TV (channel 49, now MyNetworkTV affiliate XHDTV-TDT) under a local marketing agreement, took over the management of XETV and consolidated XHUPN's operations into XETV's facilities. The agreement expired in 2006; by 2007, Televisa, through Bay City Television, had retaken full control of XETV's operations.

Prior to the CW disaffiliation, syndicated programs broadcast by XETV () included "Maury", "Seinfeld", "The Insider", "Rules of Engagement", "The Doctors" and "2 Broke Girls". As the San Diego affiliate of The CW, XETV-TDT cleared the network's entire programming schedule on digital channel 6.1 until 30 May 2017, when some of these shows carried over to KFMB's "The CW San Diego" subchannel.

XETV-TDT, virtual channel 6 (UHF digital channel 23), is a Mexican free-to-air television station located in Tijuana, Baja California, Mexico, carrying the Canal 5 network. XETV's terrestrial signal also covers the San Diego, California area across the international border in the United States. The station is owned by Mexican media company Grupo Televisa, and its technical operations and transmitter facilities are located on Mount San Antonio in Tijuana.

In 2000, XETV began transmitting a digital signal on UHF channel 23, becoming the first San Diego area station to begin digital television transmissions. It was also the first television station in Mexico to operate a digital signal; no other Mexican television station had begun digital operations at that time, and a digital television standard was not formally selected until 2004. It maps on digital tuners in both countries as virtual channel 6.1 through PSIP technology. In January 2006, the Secretariat of Communications and Transportation, which at the time still regulated broadcasting in Mexico, gave formal authorization for XETV's digital signal, with the full callsign XETV-TDT (a suffix standing for "Televisión digital terrestre", or Digital terrestrial television) and an effective radiated power of 402.8 kilowatts.

XETV retained virtual channel 6 after a major reshuffle of Mexican virtual channels in October 2016, which ordered all existing Mexican national networks to realign their virtual channels based on the flagship channel numbers in Mexico City. XETV then was temporarily the only station using a channel 6 assignment throughout Mexico, because the IFT reserved channel 6 for a potential fourth national network; as of February 2018, channel 6 has been assigned nationwide to Multimedios Televisión, which re-numbered all of their stations (including construction concessions that include the CDMX and Guadalajara regions) to that number (currently, Multimedios has no plans to expand their network to Tijuana, though its sister news network Milenio Television began an affiliation with XHDTV-TDT in September 2018). Virtual channel 5 is not available to XETV because of signal overlap between XETV and KTLA (owned by Tribune, and broadcasting on virtual channel 5), primarily around Oceanside, California; most Tijuana stations face similar signal overlap issues in this area to Los Angeles stations that preclude them from using the virtual channels that correspond to their networks.

Bay City Television, the Televisa subsidiary which operated XETV from San Diego, concurrently ceased operations on 31 May; unusually, the same repeat episode of "The King of Queens" that ended XETV's run as an English-language station near midnight local time, launched KFMB-DT2's run as a CW affiliate three minutes later. By Dunning's estimate, about 150 full-time, part-time, and freelance staffers were laid off between the closure of the news department on 31 March and the corporate shutdown. In addition to ending channel 6's affiliation with The CW three months earlier than scheduled, the closure of Bay City Television concluded XETV's 64-year history of serving San Diego with English-language programming; the move left MyNetworkTV affiliate XHDTV-TDT as the sole Mexican-licensed station providing English-language programming to the San Diego market.

The announcement of The CW's move to KFMB left XETV's future in question, with a station spokesperson stating on the day of the announcement that the station was evaluating its options. The station would reveal its plans on 26 January; on that date, it announced that news programming on XETV would be discontinued following the conclusion of the 10:00 p.m. newscast on 31 March 2017. Then, at midnight on 31 May and at the network's request, the CW affiliation moved to KFMB-TV's 8.2 subchannel. KFMB-TV also purchased substantially all of XETV's syndicated program inventory to run on the new subchannel, which it branded as "The CW San Diego". XETV then moved Canal 5 programming from its 6.2 subchannel to its main 6.1 subchannel, making the station a full-time Spanish-language outlet for the first time in its history. XETV had initially indicated it would transmit the Gala TV network, already seen in the Tijuana/San Diego area on XHBJ-TDT (channel 45), but later retracted that statement.

During a seminar by Sam Zell on 25 March 2008, it was announced that Tribune Broadcasting (which Zell had acquired the previous year as part of his takeover of corporate parent Tribune Company) had signed an affiliation agreement with Fox for its San Diego CW affiliate KSWB-TV (channel 69). Fox cited concerns with having its programming airing on a Mexican-licensed station, even though XETV had been with the network since Fox's inception and had broadcast its programming almost entirely in English for over half a century. This caught XETV station management off guard as officials were unaware about the pending affiliation switch until the announcement was made public.

XETV had originally carried a local newscast from the station's sign-on in 1953 until its news department was shut down in 1967 (Lionel Van Deerlin, later a congressman representing San Diego in the U.S. House of Representatives, served as news director during XETV's early years). In 1980, during its tenure as an independent station, XETV began running local news updates throughout the day; these continued to air until several months prior to the station's affiliation with Fox in October 1986. Although then-general manager Martin Colby originally stated that XETV would not offer a newscast, in response to then-Fox President Barry Diller's comments during the 1991 Television Critics Association Convention in pushing for Fox's affiliates to produce local newscasts that the network "won't tolerate any affiliate that is not in the news business," XETV began reconsidering the possibility of launching a news department.
question_src: Je! XETV-TDT ina tovuti?
pos_context_src: Kama tarehe ya awali ya mabadiliko ya televisheni ya Amerika ya 17 Februari 2009 ilikaribia, XETV ilikuwa imeelezea nia ya kufuata vituo vingine vya eneo la San Diego katika kukomesha ishara ya ishara yake ya analog. Wakati tarehe ya mwisho ya switchover ya Merika ya 17 Februari ilisukuma baadaye hadi 12 Juni 2009 na kutumika tu kwa vituo vyenye leseni ya Amerika kwa hali yoyote, mipango ilitangazwa kwa hiari kufanya programu ya lugha ya lugha ya Kiingereza tu. Ishara ya analog ingerejeshwa kurudisha tena mtandao wa Galavisión wa Mexico (sio kuchanganyikiwa na kituo cha cable cha Amerika cha jina moja). Madai kwenye wavuti ya XETV kwamba kituo hicho kingekuwa kweli kusambaza ishara ya kipekee iliondolewa mnamo tarehe 17 Februari 2009 wakati kituo kiliamua kuchelewesha kukata ishara yake ya analog hadi baada ya kupata idhini kutoka kwa serikali ya Mexico. Usimamizi wa XETV baadaye ulisema kwamba imeamua kudumisha ishara yake ya analog ili kufaidi watazamaji wa Mexico. Ishara ya analog ya XETV hatimaye ilirudishwa mnamo tarehe 5 Machi 2012, wakati kituo kilianza kueneza ishara yake ya dijiti na kuongezwa kwa mtandao wa Canal 5 wa Televisa ulioelekezwa kwenye subchannel 6.2 na kwenye malisho yake ya analog, wakati Digital Channel 6.1 ilibakiza habari, mtandao wa CW na mipango iliyojumuishwa kwa Kiingereza. Katika tarehe hiyo hiyo, XHBJ-TV Channel 45 ilishuka Canal 5 kwa Galavisión. Mfereji wa 5 ulibadilisha programu ya lugha ya Kiingereza ya XETV kwenye ishara yake ya analog, ili kuwahudumia watazamaji wanaozungumza Kihispania huko Tijuana ambao hawakuwa na seti za runinga na viboreshaji vya dijiti au sanduku za kibadilishaji za dijiti kabla ya mabadiliko ya Soko la Tijuana 2013 kuwa televisheni ya dijiti. Kubadilisha ushirika sanjari na kuanza kwa utangazaji wa dijiti kwenye vituo vya Televisa Tijuana. Mfereji 5 ulihamia kwenye kituo chake cha msingi mnamo Mei 31, 2017, wakati huo, subchannel 6.2 iliondolewa.
neg_context_src: Kwa sababu XETV-TDT ina leseni ya Tijuana na serikali ya Mexico, haijafunikwa chini ya FCC lazima ichukue sheria. Hii inamaanisha kuwa watoa huduma wa cable wa ndani hawahitajiki kubeba XETV-TDT, hata ikiwa kituo cha runinga kinapaswa kubeba chini ya kifungu hiki. Kama kituo cha lugha ya Kiingereza XETV ilikuwa imebebwa na Cox Mawasiliano, Time Warner Cable (sasa charter Spectrum) na AT&T U-Aya huko San Diego, yote kwenye Channel 6. KFMB-TV's "CW San Diego" imechukua nafasi ya XETV kwenye Mifumo ya Cable ya Amerika, na mtandao wa watoa huduma wa televisheni. XETV inachukuliwa na mifumo yote ya cable ya Mexico katika eneo lake la chanjo, kwani usafirishaji wa vituo vya utangazaji vya ndani unaamriwa na Taasisi ya Mawasiliano ya Shirikisho (IFT).

Mnamo Oktoba 2001, Grupo Televisa aliingia katika makubaliano ya pamoja ya uuzaji na programu na Mawasiliano ya Entravision. Chini ya makubaliano haya, Entravision, ambayo tayari ilifanya kazi UPN Affiliate XHUPN-TV (Channel 49, sasa MyNetworkTV mshirika wa XHDTV-TDT) chini ya makubaliano ya uuzaji wa ndani, ilichukua usimamizi wa XETV na shughuli za Xhupn zilizojumuishwa katika vifaa vya XETV. Makubaliano yalimalizika mnamo 2006; Kufikia 2007, Televisa, kupitia Televisheni ya Bay City, ilikuwa imerudisha udhibiti kamili wa shughuli za XETV.

Kabla ya kutengwa kwa CW, mipango iliyoandaliwa iliyotangazwa na XETV () ni pamoja na "Maury", "Seinfeld", "Insider", "Sheria za Ushiriki", "Madaktari" na "2 Wasichana waliovunja". Kama mshirika wa San Diego wa CW, XETV-TDT ilisafisha ratiba nzima ya programu kwenye kituo cha dijiti 6.1 hadi 30 Mei 2017, wakati baadhi ya maonyesho haya yalipelekwa kwa KFMB "CW San Diego" subchannel.

XETV-TDT, Kituo cha 6 (UHF Digital Channel 23), ni kituo cha runinga cha bure cha Mexico kilichopo Tijuana, Baja California, Mexico, kilichobeba mtandao wa Canal 5. Ishara ya ulimwengu ya XETV pia inashughulikia eneo la San Diego, California katika mpaka wa kimataifa nchini Merika. Kituo hicho kinamilikiwa na kampuni ya media ya Mexico Grupo Televisa, na shughuli zake za kiufundi na vifaa vya transmitter ziko kwenye Mount San Antonio huko Tijuana.

Mnamo 2000, XETV ilianza kupitisha ishara ya dijiti kwenye kituo cha UHF 23, ikawa kituo cha kwanza cha eneo la San Diego kuanza usafirishaji wa televisheni ya dijiti. Ilikuwa pia kituo cha kwanza cha runinga huko Mexico kuendesha ishara ya dijiti; Hakuna kituo kingine cha runinga cha Mexico kilianza shughuli za dijiti wakati huo, na kiwango cha televisheni cha dijiti hakijachaguliwa rasmi hadi 2004. Inatoa ramani kwenye viboreshaji vya dijiti katika nchi zote mbili kama kituo cha 6.1 kupitia teknolojia ya PSIP. Mnamo Januari 2006, Sekretarieti ya Mawasiliano na Usafiri, ambayo wakati huo bado ilidhibiti utangazaji huko Mexico, ilitoa idhini rasmi kwa ishara ya dijiti ya XETV, na simu kamili ya XETV-TDT (kiboreshaji cha "televisión digital terrestre", au televisheni ya dijiti) na nguvu ya 402.8.

XETV ilibakiza Channel 6 baada ya kurudiwa tena kwa vituo vya Mexico mnamo Oktoba 2016, ambayo iliamuru mitandao yote ya kitaifa ya Mexico kurekebisha njia zao za msingi kulingana na nambari za kituo cha bendera huko Mexico City. XETV basi ilikuwa kituo pekee cha kutumia mgawo wa Channel 6 kote Mexico, kwa sababu IFT iliyohifadhiwa Channel 6 kwa mtandao wa nne wa kitaifa unaowezekana; Mnamo Februari 2018, Channel 6 imepewa nchi nzima kwa multimedios Televisión, ambayo ilihesabu tena vituo vyao vyote (pamoja na makubaliano ya ujenzi ambayo ni pamoja na mikoa ya CDMX na Guadalajara) kwa idadi hiyo (kwa sasa, Multimedios haina mipango ya kupanua mtandao wao hadi Tijuana, ingawa dada yake ya habari ya Televisheni. Channel ya 5 haipatikani kwa XETV kwa sababu ya kuingiliana kwa ishara kati ya XETV na KTLA (inayomilikiwa na Tribune, na utangazaji kwenye kituo cha 5), ​​haswa karibu na Oceanside, California; Vituo vingi vya Tijuana vinakabiliwa na masuala sawa ya kuingiliana katika eneo hili hadi vituo vya Los Angeles ambavyo vinawazuia kutumia njia za kawaida zinazohusiana na mitandao yao.

Televisheni ya Bay City, tanzu ya Televisa ambayo iliendesha XETV kutoka San Diego, wakati huo huo ilikomesha shughuli mnamo Mei 31; Kwa kawaida, sehemu hiyo hiyo ya kurudia ya "Mfalme wa Queens" ambayo ilimaliza kukimbia kwa XETV kama kituo cha lugha ya Kiingereza karibu na wakati wa usiku wa manane, ilizindua KFMB-DT2 kama mshirika wa CW dakika tatu baadaye. Kwa makisio ya Dunning, karibu 150 wa wakati wote, wa muda, na wafanyikazi wa uhuru waliwekwa kati ya kufungwa kwa idara ya habari mnamo 31 Machi na kuzima kwa ushirika. Mbali na kumaliza ushirika wa Channel 6 na CW miezi mitatu mapema kuliko ilivyopangwa, kufungwa kwa Televisheni ya Bay City kuhitimisha historia ya miaka 64 ya XETV ya kutumikia San Diego na programu ya lugha ya Kiingereza; Hatua hiyo iliacha ushirika wa MyNetworkTV XHDTV-TDT kama kituo pekee cha leseni ya Mexico kutoa programu ya lugha ya Kiingereza katika soko la San Diego.

Tangazo la hoja ya CW kwenda KFMB liliacha mustakabali wa XETV, na msemaji wa kituo akisema siku ya tangazo kwamba kituo hicho kilikuwa kinatathmini chaguzi zake. Kituo kingeonyesha mipango yake mnamo 26 Januari; Katika tarehe hiyo, ilitangaza kwamba programu ya habari kwenye XETV itakomeshwa kufuatia kumalizika kwa 10:00 p.m. Habari mnamo 31 Machi 2017. Halafu, usiku wa manane mnamo Mei 31 na kwa ombi la mtandao, ushirika wa CW ulihamia kwa subchannel ya KFMB-TV ya 8.2. KFMB-TV pia ilinunua hesabu zote za programu ya XETV iliyoandaliwa ili kukimbia kwenye subchannel mpya, ambayo ilijulikana kama "CW San Diego". XETV kisha ikahamisha programu ya Canal 5 kutoka kwa subchannel yake 6.2 kwenda kwa subchannel yake kuu 6.1, na kuifanya kituo hicho kuwa duka la lugha ya Uhispania kwa mara ya kwanza katika historia yake. Hapo awali XETV ilionyesha ingesambaza mtandao wa Televisheni ya Gala, iliyoonekana tayari katika eneo la Tijuana/San Diego kwenye XHBJ-TDT (Channel 45), lakini baadaye ilirudisha taarifa hiyo.

Wakati wa semina ya Sam Zell mnamo 25 Machi 2008, ilitangazwa kuwa Utangazaji wa Tribune (ambao Zell alikuwa amepata mwaka uliopita kama sehemu ya kampuni yake ya mzazi wa Tribune) alikuwa amesaini makubaliano ya ushirika na Fox kwa mshirika wake wa San Diego CW KSWB-TV (Channel 69). Fox alitaja wasiwasi na kuwa na programu yake ya kupandikiza kwenye kituo cha leseni ya Mexico, hata ingawa XETV ilikuwa na mtandao tangu kuanzishwa kwa Fox na ilikuwa imetangaza programu yake karibu kabisa kwa Kiingereza kwa zaidi ya nusu karne. Usimamizi huu wa kituo cha XETV ulilinda wakati maafisa hawakujua juu ya ubadilishaji wa ushirika unaosubiri hadi tangazo hilo litakapowekwa wazi.

Hapo awali XETV ilikuwa imebeba habari ya eneo hilo kutoka kwa kituo cha kusainiwa mnamo 1953 hadi idara yake ya habari ilipofungwa mnamo 1967 (Lionel van Deerlin, baadaye mkutano wa Wabunge uliowakilisha San Diego katika Baraza la Wawakilishi la Merika, aliwahi kuwa mkurugenzi wa habari wakati wa miaka ya mapema ya XETV). Mnamo 1980, wakati wa umiliki wake kama kituo huru, XETV ilianza kuendesha sasisho za habari za ndani siku nzima; Hizi ziliendelea hewani hadi miezi kadhaa kabla ya ushirika wa kituo hicho na Fox mnamo Oktoba 1986. Ingawa meneja mkuu wa wakati huo Martin Colby hapo awali alisema kwamba XETV haitatoa habari, kwa kujibu maoni ya Rais wa Fox Barry Diller wakati wa Mkutano wa Televisheni wa 1991 ambao hautaweza kushinikiza kwa kushinikiza "kwa kushinikiza" kwa kushinikiza kwa kushinikiza "kwa kushinikiza kwa kushinikiza" kwa kushinikiza kushinikiza "kwa kushinikiza kwa kushinikiza" kutafakari kwa tafrija za habari za mitaa ambazo hazitaweza kuvumilia awamu yoyote ya kushinikiza "ISOLED AMPILESS HUDUA COUNSIVIOD HUDHA ya kuzindua idara ya habari.

question_en: How old is Captain Cold?
pos_context_en: Created by John Broome and Carmine Infantino, the character made his first appearance in "Showcase" #8 (June 1957).
neg_context_en: In the 2008 miniseries "", Captain Cold and the Rogues briefly joined Libra's Secret Society of Super Villains. In "" story, however, Cold and the rest of the Rogues reject Libra's offer, wanting to stay out of the game. Before they can retire, they hear of Inertia escaping and decide to stick around long enough to get revenge for being used. Cold and his group are challenged by a new set of Rogues, formed by Libra to be their replacements. The new group, having kidnapped Cold's father, challenge the Rogues, and are defeated and killed. Cold goes to his father, talking to him about the abuse he suffered, and the fate of his sister. After the elder Snart insults him and his mother, calling them weak, Cold punches him, but finds himself unable to kill him, instead getting Heat Wave to do it. The Rogues have their confrontation with Inertia, despite interference by Zoom and Libra, and kill Inertia. Libra then reveals that he needs the Rogues because Barry Allen has returned from the dead, and the Flashes are potential threats to him and Darkseid. Though shocked by the news that Allen is alive, Cold still rejects his offer of membership. After regrouping, Cold and the other Rogues agree not to retire, claiming that the game is back on. In "Final Crisis" #7, someone that looks like Captain Cold appears as a Justifier and is seen fighting the Female Furies alongside the other Justifiers under Lex Luthor's control.

Captain Cold was declared the leader of the Flash's Rogues Gallery. His skill and experience have made him a strong leader to the likes of the Weather Wizard, the new Trickster, the new Mirror Master, and the new Captain Boomerang. Len seems to have taken the young Captain Boomerang under his wing, after the elder Boomerang was recently killed. Tabloids rumoured that Captain Cold's sister, the Golden Glider, was Boomerang's mother, making him Captain Cold's nephew. This turned out to be false, however, as the new Boomerang's mother has been revealed to be Meloni Thawne, who is also the mother of Bart Allen. Despite his more ruthless nature as of late, Captain Cold's heart is not completely frozen, evidenced by having sent flowers to honor Sue Dibny, murdered wife of the Elongated Man.

In the timeline of the 2011 company-wide reboot of all its superhero titles, The New 52, Captain Cold is reintroduced as a younger man than in the previous timeline and now with his Rogues lives with a code to never kill. His origin remains the same, however, his sister Lisa has not been the Golden Glider, and is instead dying of cancer. Upon learning that the hospital does not have enough energy to power a laser that could save her life, because of an EMP seemingly caused by the Flash, Cold blames him for everything that has happened to him, including a falling out with the Rogues, and decides to break the rules of their "game" and kill the Flash. Captain Cold has undergone experiments that have given him ice-based metahuman powers, including the ability to slow down the molecules around him, creating a field of inertia that reduces the Flash's speed to human level, allowing Captain Cold to touch him and effortlessly beat him. He and the Rogues are set to return, but later defeated them with help from Flash, and the Pied Piper.

During the events of "Underworld Unleashed", Captain Cold lost his soul to Neron but Wally West brought it back to the land of the living. He soon returned to crime, this time a member of Wally's Rogues Gallery. The Rogues had first been assembled when another Flash foe, the super-intelligent Gorilla Grodd had broken them out of jail to distract the Flash. The Golden Glider had abandoned her bounty hunter career and had started partnering with a series of thugs who she dressed in a costume, armed with a copy of Captain Cold's signature Cold Gun, and called Chillblaine. Already distraught over the death of her lover, the Top, it seemed that the supposed death of her brother pushed her over the edge. But the last Chillblaine was a little smarter and more vicious. He murdered the Golden Glider, prompting Captain Cold to hunt him down, torture him and kill him by freezing his outer layer of skin and then pushing him off a high rise building. Not long after that, Snart was framed by a new incarnation of Mister Element. He used his Element Gun to simulate Cold's gun, using ice and cold to murder several police officers before Captain Cold and the Flash discovered who was actually responsible. With the death of his sister, and having killed Chillblaine and Mr. Element in vengeance, Cold has again become an unrepentant criminal. However, during a confrontation with Brother Grimm, Cold actually worked with Wally West to defeat the powerful magic user, although this was mainly because he and Mirror Master had been betrayed by Grimm and wanted revenge.

Traditionally, Captain Cold is driven by three things: money, women, and the desire to beat Barry Allen. Although not the lecher that Captain Boomerang was, Len Snart has an eye for the ladies, particularly models. When Barry Allen died, Captain Cold drifted for a while, jumping back and forth over the lines of crime and justice. He was captured by the Manhunter and served time in the Suicide Squad, worked with his sister as a bounty hunter (Golden Snowball Recoveries), and, with his longtime friend and sometimes nemesis Heat Wave, encountered Fire and Ice of the Justice League. He has teamed up with various villains over the years other than the many Rogues. These include Catwoman and the Secret Society of Super Villains. His favorite baseball team is the Houston Astros.

Captain Cold (Leonard Snart) is a fictional supervillain/antihero appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics. Captain Cold is the leader of the Rogues, a loose criminal association, as well as the older brother of Golden Glider. An acquaintance of the various superheroes known as the Flash, he has served as a bitter enemy to Barry Allen, both enemy and grudging friend to Wally West, and one of the regretting killers of Bart Allen. As part of 2011's The New 52 reboot, Captain Cold is a villain that with his team The Rogues lives by a code to never kill and sometimes can be perceived as a hero.

In the 2009–2010 "Blackest Night" storyline, the Rogues realize that the bodies of various dead Rogues are missing and prepare to fight them. Captain Cold knows that his sister, the Golden Glider, is among the reanimated Black Lanterns but is still ready to lead the Rogues against the zombies. He is confronted by the Black Lantern Glider, who attempts to use his feelings of love for her against him. However, Captain Cold manages to suppress these feelings long enough for him to fight back, freezing her within a block of ice. He subsequently kills Owen Mercer by throwing him into a pit with his Black Lantern father when he learns that Owen has been feeding people to his father in the belief that consuming flesh will restore him to life, informing Owen that Rogues do not kill women and children.

In the New 52 universe Captain Cold temporarily had metahuman ice powers, including the power to slow down the Flash or objects traveling at high velocities via molecular deceleration caused by Absolute Zero, but these powers are later lost in the "Forever Evil" series when he is attacked by Deathstorm- the Earth-3 counterpart of Firestorm- with Cold reverting to using his classic ice gun. Despite his lack of professional or technical expertise, Cold states that he spent so long analyzing the parts of his cold gun that he is able to recreate it in just over half an hour using parts stolen from a standard electronics shop. He's even skilled enough to program it for a host of unique effects simulating some of his powers; like his "Cold Field" which quick cools the atmosphere to the point everything caught in it grinds to a halt, or an auto activation function which triggers his Cold Gun's freeze ray via vocalized password input.
ㅞ is one of the Korean hangul. The Unicode for ㅞ is U+315E.

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.
question_src: Je! Kapteni ana umri gani?
pos_context_src: Iliyoundwa na John Broome na Carmine Infantino, mhusika alionekana mara ya kwanza katika "Showcase" #8 (Juni 1957).
neg_context_src: Katika miniseries ya 2008 "", Kapteni Cold na Rogues walijiunga kwa kifupi Jumuiya ya Siri ya Libra ya Super Villains. Katika hadithi ya "", hata hivyo, baridi na wengine wa Rogues wanakataa toleo la Libra, wakitaka kukaa nje ya mchezo. Kabla ya kustaafu, wanasikia ya kutoroka kwa hali ya juu na kuamua kushikamana muda wa kutosha kulipiza kisasi kwa kutumiwa. Baridi na kikundi chake wanapingwa na seti mpya ya Rogues, iliyoundwa na Libra kuwa nafasi zao. Kundi hilo jipya, baada ya kumteka nyara baba ya Cold, changamoto ya Rogues, na wameshindwa na kuuawa. Baridi huenda kwa baba yake, akizungumza naye juu ya unyanyasaji aliopata, na hatima ya dada yake. Baada ya mzee Snart kumtukana yeye na mama yake, kuwaita dhaifu, baridi humchoma, lakini hujikuta akishindwa kumuua, badala yake kupata wimbi la joto kuifanya. Rogues wana mzozo wao na hali ya ndani, licha ya kuingiliwa na Zoom na Libra, na kuua inertia. Libra basi anafunua kuwa anahitaji Rogues kwa sababu Barry Allen amerudi kutoka kwa wafu, na taa hizo ni vitisho vinavyowezekana kwake na Darkseid. Ingawa alishtushwa na habari kwamba Allen yuko hai, Cold bado anakataa toleo lake la ushirika. Baada ya kujipanga tena, baridi na Rogues nyingine wanakubali kutostaafu, wakidai kuwa mchezo umerudi. Katika "Mgogoro wa Mwisho" #7, mtu ambaye anaonekana kama Kapteni Cold anaonekana kama halali na anaonekana akipigana na Fedha za Kike pamoja na wahalali wengine chini ya udhibiti wa Lex Luthor.

Kapteni Cold alitangazwa kiongozi wa nyumba ya sanaa ya The Flash's Rogues. Ustadi wake na uzoefu wake umemfanya kuwa kiongozi hodari wa kupenda kwa Mchawi wa Hali ya Hewa, Trickster mpya, New Mirror Master, na Kapteni mpya Boomerang. Len anaonekana kuchukua Kapteni mdogo Boomerang chini ya bawa lake, baada ya mzee Boomerang kuuawa hivi karibuni. Tabloids alisikika kwamba dada ya Kapteni Cold, The Glider Glider, alikuwa mama wa Boomerang, na kumfanya kuwa mpwa wa Kapteni Cold. Hii iligeuka kuwa ya uwongo, hata hivyo, kama mama mpya wa Boomerang amefunuliwa kuwa Meloni Thawne, ambaye pia ni mama wa Bart Allen. Licha ya hali yake mbaya zaidi kama ya marehemu, moyo wa Kapteni Cold haujahifadhiwa kabisa, unathibitishwa na kutuma maua kumheshimu Sue Dibny, mke aliyeuawa wa mtu huyo aliyeinuliwa.

Katika ratiba ya kuanza tena kampuni ya mwaka 2011 ya majina yake yote superhero, mpya 52, Kapteni Cold anafanywa tena kama mtu mdogo kuliko wakati wa zamani na sasa na watu wake wazima wanaishi na nambari ya kamwe kuua. Asili yake inabaki kuwa sawa, hata hivyo, dada yake Lisa hajakuwa mtu wa dhahabu, na badala yake anakufa na saratani. Baada ya kujifunza kuwa hospitali haina nguvu ya kutosha ya nguvu ya laser ambayo inaweza kuokoa maisha yake, kwa sababu ya EMP inayoonekana kusababishwa na Flash, baridi humlaumu kwa kila kitu ambacho kimetokea kwake, pamoja na kuanguka nje na Rogues, na kuamua kuvunja sheria za "mchezo" wao na kuua Flash. Kapteni Cold amepata majaribio ambayo yamempa nguvu za metahuman zenye msingi wa barafu, pamoja na uwezo wa kupunguza kasi ya molekuli karibu naye, na kuunda uwanja wa inertia ambao unapunguza kasi ya Flash kwa kiwango cha mwanadamu, kumruhusu Kapteni Cold kumgusa na kumpiga kwa nguvu. Yeye na Rogues wanapaswa kurudi, lakini baadaye wakawashinda kwa msaada kutoka kwa Flash, na Piper Pied.

Wakati wa matukio ya "Underworld kufunguliwa", Kapteni Cold alipoteza roho yake kwa Neron lakini Wally West alirudisha katika nchi ya walio hai. Hivi karibuni alirudi kwa uhalifu, wakati huu mwanachama wa Nyumba ya sanaa ya Wally's Rogues. Rogues walikuwa wamekusanyika mara ya kwanza wakati adui mwingine wa Flash, Gorilla Grodd mwenye akili nyingi alikuwa amewavunja gerezani ili kuvuruga Flash. Glider ya dhahabu ilikuwa imeachana na kazi yake ya wawindaji wa fadhila na alikuwa ameanza kushirikiana na safu ya majambazi ambao alikuwa amevaa mavazi, akiwa na nakala ya bunduki ya Baridi ya Kapteni Cold, na akaitwa Chillblaine. Tayari alikuwa na mashaka juu ya kifo cha mpenzi wake, juu, ilionekana kuwa kifo cha kaka yake kilimsukuma juu ya makali. Lakini chillblaine ya mwisho ilikuwa nadhifu kidogo na mbaya zaidi. Aliua glider ya dhahabu, na kumfanya Kapteni Cold amwinde, amtese na kumuua kwa kufungia safu yake ya nje ya ngozi na kisha kumsukuma kwenye jengo kubwa la kupanda. Sio muda mrefu baada ya hapo, Snart aliandaliwa na mwili mpya wa kitu cha Mister. Alitumia bunduki yake ya kuiga bunduki ya Cold, kwa kutumia barafu na baridi kuua maafisa kadhaa wa polisi kabla ya Kapteni Cold na Flash kugundua ni nani aliyewajibika. Pamoja na kifo cha dada yake, na baada ya kumuua Chillblaine na Mr. Element kwa kulipiza kisasi, baridi tena imekuwa mhalifu asiyetubu. Walakini, wakati wa mzozo na Ndugu Grimm, Baridi alifanya kazi na Wally West kumshinda mtumiaji huyo mwenye nguvu wa uchawi, ingawa hii ni kwa sababu yeye na Mirror Master walikuwa wamesalitiwa na Grimm na walitaka kulipiza kisasi.

Kijadi, Kapteni Cold anaendeshwa na vitu vitatu: pesa, wanawake, na hamu ya kumpiga Barry Allen. Ingawa sio lecher ambayo Kapteni Boomerang alikuwa, Len Snart ana jicho kwa wanawake, haswa mifano. Wakati Barry Allen alikufa, Kapteni Cold aliteleza kwa muda, akaruka nyuma na mbele juu ya mistari ya uhalifu na haki. Alitekwa na Manhunter na akatumikia wakati katika kikosi cha kujiua, alifanya kazi na dada yake kama wawindaji wa fadhila (kupona kwa theluji ya dhahabu), na, na rafiki yake wa muda mrefu na wakati mwingine Nemesis Heat Wave, alikutana na moto na barafu ya Ligi ya Haki. Ameshirikiana na wabaya mbali mbali kwa miaka mingine zaidi ya watu wengi. Hizi ni pamoja na Catwoman na Jumuiya ya Siri ya Super Villains. Timu yake ya kupenda ya baseball ni Houston Astros.

Kapteni Cold (Leonard Snart) ni msimamizi wa hadithi/antihero anayeonekana katika vitabu vya vichekesho vya Amerika vilivyochapishwa na Jumuia za DC. Kapteni Cold ndiye kiongozi wa Rogues, chama cha wahalifu huru, na vile vile kaka mkubwa wa Glider Glider. Jamaa wa mashujaa mbalimbali wanaojulikana kama The Flash, amewahi kuwa adui mwenye uchungu kwa Barry Allen, adui na rafiki wa kuhuzunisha kwa Wally West, na mmoja wa wauaji wa kujuta wa Bart Allen. Kama sehemu ya mwaka wa 2010 mpya wa 52, Kapteni Cold ni villain ambayo na timu yake Rogues huishi kwa nambari ya kamwe kuua na wakati mwingine inaweza kutambuliwa kama shujaa.

Katika hadithi ya 2009-2010 "Nyeusi Nyeusi", Rogues hugundua kuwa miili ya wafu mbali mbali haipo na kujiandaa kupigana nao. Kapteni Cold anajua kuwa dada yake, Glider ya Dhahabu, ni kati ya taa nyeusi zilizowekwa upya lakini bado yuko tayari kuongoza Rogues dhidi ya Riddick. Anakabiliwa na glider ya taa nyeusi, ambaye anajaribu kutumia hisia zake za kumpenda dhidi yake. Walakini, Kapteni Cold ataweza kukandamiza hisia hizi muda mrefu wa kutosha kupigana nyuma, kumfungia ndani ya barafu. Baadaye anamuua Owen Mercer kwa kumtupa ndani ya shimo na baba yake wa taa nyeusi wakati anajifunza kwamba Owen amekuwa akilisha watu kwa baba yake kwa imani kwamba kula nyama kutamrejeshea maisha, na kumwambia Owen kwamba Rogues hawawauwa wanawake na watoto.

Katika Universal 52 mpya Kapteni Cold kwa muda alikuwa na nguvu za barafu za metahuman, pamoja na nguvu ya kupunguza kasi au vitu vinavyosafiri kwa vifuniko vya hali ya juu kupitia kupunguka kwa Masi iliyosababishwa na Zero kabisa, lakini nguvu hizi baadaye hupotea katika safu ya "milele" wakati anashambuliwa na Dhoruba ya Kufa ya Dunia. Licha ya ukosefu wake wa utaalam wa kitaalam au wa kiufundi, Cold anasema kwamba alitumia muda mrefu kuchambua sehemu za bunduki yake baridi hivi kwamba ana uwezo wa kuirudisha katika zaidi ya nusu saa kwa kutumia sehemu zilizoibiwa kutoka duka la umeme la kawaida. Yeye hata ana ujuzi wa kutosha kuipanga kwa jeshi la athari za kipekee za kuiga nguvu zake; Kama "uwanja wake baridi" ambao hupunguza haraka anga kwa uhakika kila kitu kilichopigwa ndani yake kinasambaza, au kazi ya uanzishaji wa gari ambayo husababisha ray yake ya baridi ya bunduki ya baridi kupitia pembejeo ya nywila.

Winfield Toll Bridge, pia inajulikana kama Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, ni kihistoria wa kihistoria wa Cantilever Warren Truss Bridge iliyoko Winfield na Red House, Kaunti ya Putnam, West Virginia. Ilijengwa mnamo 1955, na inachukua Mto wa Kanawha, iliyobeba West Virginia Route 34. Cantilever kupitia-truss ina nafasi mbili za nanga kila futi 245 kwa urefu na urefu wa futi 462 kwa urefu kati ya mistari ya kituo cha pier. Span kuu ina futi mbili 128, inchi 4, mikono ya cantilever na miguu 205, inchi 4, iliyosimamishwa.

question_en: What was the largest city in the Gupta Empire?
pos_context_en: The city also became a flourishing Buddhist centre boasting a number of important monasteries. It remained the capital of the Gupta dynasty (3rd–6th centuries) and the Pala Dynasty (8th-12th centuries). The city was largely in ruins when visited by Xuanzang, and suffered further damage at the hands of Muslim raiders in the 12th century. Afterwards, Sher Shah Suri made Pataliputra his capital and changed the name to modern Patna.
neg_context_en: The Gupta Empire had their capital at Pataliputra. The difference between Gupta Empire's and Mauryan Empire's administration was that in the Mauryan administration power was centralised but in the Gupta administration power was more decentralised. The empire was divided into provinces and the provinces were further divided into districts. Villages were the smallest units. The kingdom covered Gujarat, North-East India, south-eastern Pakistan, Odisha, northern Madhya Pradesh and eastern India with capital at Pataliputra, modern Patna. All forms of worship were carried out in Sanskrit.

The Gupta Empire was an ancient Indian empire existing from the mid-to-late 3rd century CE to 590 CE. At its zenith, from approximately 319 to 550 CE, it covered much of the Indian subcontinent. This period is called the "Golden" Age of India by some historians. The ruling dynasty of the empire was founded by the king Sri Gupta; the most notable rulers of the dynasty were Chandragupta I, Samudragupta, and Chandragupta II alias Vikramaditya. The 5th-century CE Sanskrit poet Kalidasa credits the Guptas with having conquered about twenty-one kingdoms, both in and outside India, including the kingdoms of Parasikas, the Hunas, the Kambojas, tribes located in the west and east Oxus valleys, the Kinnaras, Kiratas, and others.

During the reign of Chandragupta II, Gupta Empire maintained a large army consisting of 500,000 infantry, 50,000 cavalry, 20,000 charioteers and 10,000 elephants along with a powerful navy with more than 1200 ships. Chandragupta II controlled the whole of the Indian subcontinent; the Gupta empire was the most powerful empire in the world during his reign, at a time when the Roman Empire in the West was in decline.

A study of the epigraphical records of the Gupta empire shows that there was a hierarchy of administrative divisions from top to bottom. The empire was called by various names such as "Rajya", "Rashtra", "Desha", "Mandala", "Prithvi" and "Avani". It was divided into 26 provinces, which were styled as "Bhukti", "Pradesha" and "Bhoga". Provinces were also divided into "Vishayas" and put under the control of the "Vishayapati"s. A "Vishayapati" administered the "Vishaya" with the help of the "Adhikarana" (council of representatives), which comprised four representatives: "Nagarasreshesthi", "Sarthavaha", "Prathamakulike" and "Prathama Kayastha". A part of the "Vishaya" was called "Vithi". There were also trade links of Gupta business with the Roman empire.

An important development during the Gupta time was the recognition of Saketa as the legendary city of Ayodhya, the capital of the Ikshvaku dynasty. The 436 CE Karamdanda (Karmdand) inscription, issued during the reign of Kumaragupta I, names Ayodhya as the capital of the Kosala province, and records commander Prithvisena's offerings to Brahmins from Ayodhya. Later, the capital of the Gupta Empire was moved from Pataliputra to Ayodhya. Paramartha states that king Vikramaditya moved the royal court to Ayodhya; Xuanzang also corroborates this, stating that this king moved the court to the "country of Shravasti", that is, Kosala. A local oral tradition of Ayodhya, first recorded in writing by Robert Montgomery Martin in 1838, mentions that the city was deserted after the death of Rama's descendant Brihadbala. The city remain deserted until King Vikrama of Ujjain came searching for it, and re-established it. He cut down the forests that had covered the ancient ruins, erected the Ramgar fort, and built 360 temples.

The Kushan Empire would fall apart by 220 CE, creating more political turmoil in India. Then in 320, the Gupta Empire (Sanskrit: गुप्त राजवंश, Gupta Rājavanśha) was established and covered much of the Indian Subcontinent. Founded by Maharaja Sri-Gupta, the dynasty was the model of a classical civilization. Gupta kings united the area primarily through negotiation of local leaders and families as well as strategical intermarriage. Their rule covered less land than the Maurya Empire, but established the greatest stability. In 535, the empire ended when India was overrun by the Huns.

Carthage was one of the largest cities of the Hellenistic period and was among the largest cities in preindustrial history. Whereas by AD 14, Rome had at least 750,000 inhabitants and in the following century may have reached 1 million, the cities of Alexandria and Antioch numbered only a few hundred thousand or less. According to the not always reliable history of Herodian, Carthage rivaled Alexandria for second place in the Roman empire.
On top of Byrsa hill, the location of the Roman Forum, a residential area from the last century of existence (early second century BCE.) of the Punic city was excavated by the French archaeologist Serge Lancel. The neighborhood, with its houses, shops, and private spaces, is significant for what it reveals about daily life there over 2100 years ago.

The origins of the Gupta Empire are believed to be from local Rajas as only the father and grandfather of Chandra Gupta are mentioned in inscriptions. Chandra Gupta's reign was an unsettled one, but under his son, Samudra Gupta, the empire reached supremacy over India roughly similar to the proportions that the Maurya Empire had exercised before. Various records exist of Samudra Gupta's conquest, showing that nearly all of North India and a portion of Southern India had been under Gupta rule. The Empire was organised along the lines of provinces, frontier feudatories, and subordinate kings of vassal states that had sworn fealty to the Empire. In the case of Punjab, the local Janapadas were semi-independent but were expected to obey orders and pay homage to the empire. Samudra Gupta was regarded as a patron of the arts and humanities. Inscriptions give evidence to the Raja not only being a learned man, but one fond of the company of poets and writers; one type of coinage even shows him playing on the veena..

Faxian (or Fa Hsien etc.), a Chinese Buddhist, was one of the pilgrims who visited India during the reign of the Gupta emperor Chandragupta II. He started his journey from China in 399 and reached India in 405. During his stay in India up to 411, he went on a pilgrimage to Mathura, Kannauj, Kapilavastu, Kushinagar, Vaishali, Pataliputra, Kashi, and Rajagriha, and made careful observations about the empire's conditions. Faxian was pleased with the mildness of administration. The Penal Code was mild and offenses were punished by fines only. From his accounts, the Gupta Empire was a prosperous period. And until the Rome–China trade axis was broken with the fall of the Han dynasty, the Guptas did indeed prosper. His writings form one of the most important sources for the history of this period.

The history of Gujarat began with Stone Age settlements followed by Chalcolithic and Bronze Age settlements like Indus Valley Civilisation. Gujarat's coastal cities, chiefly Bharuch, served as ports and trading centers in the Nanda, Maurya, Satavahana and Gupta empires as well as Western Kshatrapas period. After the fall of the Gupta empire in the 6th century, Gujarat flourished as an independent Hindu/Buddhist state. The Maitraka dynasty, descended from a Gupta general, ruled from the 6th to the 8th centuries from their capital at Vallabhi, although they were ruled briefly by Harsha during the 7th century. The Arab rulers of Sindh sacked Vallabhi in 770, bringing the Maitraka dynasty to an end. The Gurjara-Pratihara Empire ruled Gujarat after from the 8th to 10th centuries. As well as, for some periods the region came under the control of Rashtrakuta Empire and Pala Empire. In 775 the first Parsi (Zoroastrian) refugees arrived in Gujarat from Greater Iran.
question_src: Je! Ni mji gani mkubwa katika Dola ya Gupta?
pos_context_src: Jiji pia likawa kituo cha Wabudhi kinachokua kikijivunia idadi ya watawa muhimu. Ilibaki kuwa mji mkuu wa nasaba ya Gupta (karne ya 3-6) na nasaba ya Pala (karne ya 8-12). Mji huo ulikuwa magofu wakati ulipotembelewa na Xuanzang, na ulipata uharibifu zaidi mikononi mwa Washambuliaji wa Waislamu katika karne ya 12. Baadaye, Sher Shah Suri alimfanya Pataliputra mji mkuu wake na akabadilisha jina hilo kuwa Patna wa kisasa.
neg_context_src: Milki ya Gupta ilikuwa na mtaji wao huko Pataliputra. Tofauti kati ya utawala wa Dola ya Gupta na Mauryan ni kwamba katika nguvu ya utawala wa Mauryan ilikuwa kati lakini katika nguvu ya utawala wa Gupta ilibadilishwa zaidi. Dola iligawanywa katika majimbo na majimbo yaligawanywa zaidi katika wilaya. Vijiji vilikuwa vitengo vidogo. Ufalme ulimfunika Gujarat, kaskazini-mashariki mwa India, kusini-mashariki mwa Pakistan, Odisha, kaskazini mwa Madhya Pradesh na India ya Mashariki na mji mkuu huko Pataliputra, Patna wa kisasa. Aina zote za ibada zilifanywa huko Sanskrit.

Dola ya Gupta ilikuwa ufalme wa zamani wa India uliopo kutoka katikati ya karne ya 3 hadi 590 CE. Katika Zenith yake, kutoka takriban 319 hadi 550 CE, ilishughulikia sehemu kubwa ya India. Kipindi hiki kinaitwa Umri wa "Dhahabu" wa India na wanahistoria wengine. Nasaba tawala ya Dola ilianzishwa na Mfalme Sri Gupta; Watawala mashuhuri zaidi wa nasaba walikuwa Chandragupta I, Samudragupta, na Chandragupta II alias Vikramaditya. Mshairi wa karne ya 5 wa Sanskrit Kalidasa anadai kwamba Guptas kwa kuwa ameshinda falme ishirini na moja, ndani na nje ya India, pamoja na falme za Parasikas, Hunas, Kambojas, makabila yaliyoko Magharibi na Mashariki ya Oxus, Kinnaras, Kiratas, na wengine.

Wakati wa utawala wa Chandragupta II, Dola ya Gupta ilidumisha jeshi kubwa lenye watoto 500,000, wapanda farasi 50,000, wapanda farasi 20,000 na tembo 10,000 pamoja na jeshi lenye nguvu na meli zaidi ya 1200. Chandragupta II ilidhibiti yote ya kihistoria ya India; Milki ya Gupta ilikuwa himaya yenye nguvu zaidi ulimwenguni wakati wa utawala wake, wakati ambao Dola ya Roma huko Magharibi ilikuwa imepungua.

Utafiti wa rekodi za epigraphical za ufalme wa Gupta unaonyesha kwamba kulikuwa na uongozi wa mgawanyiko wa kiutawala kutoka juu hadi chini. Dola iliitwa kwa majina anuwai kama "Rajya", "Rashtra", "Desha", "Mandala", "Prithvi" na "Avani". Iligawanywa katika majimbo 26, ambayo yalibuniwa kama "Bhukti", "Pradesha" na "Bhoga". Mikoa pia iligawanywa katika "vishayas" na kuwekwa chini ya udhibiti wa "vishayapati" s. "Vishayapati" ilisimamia "Vishaya" kwa msaada wa "Adhikarana" (Baraza la Wawakilishi), ambalo lilikuwa na wawakilishi wanne: "Nagarasreshesthi", "Sarthavaha", "Prathamakulike" na "Prathama Kayastha". Sehemu ya "vishaya" iliitwa "vithi". Kulikuwa pia na viungo vya biashara vya biashara ya Gupta na Dola ya Kirumi.

Maendeleo muhimu wakati wa Gupta yalikuwa utambuzi wa Saketa kama mji wa hadithi wa Ayodhya, mji mkuu wa nasaba ya Ikshvaku. Uandishi wa 436 CE Karamdanda (Karmdand), uliotolewa wakati wa utawala wa Kumaragupta I, unataja Ayodhya kama mji mkuu wa mkoa wa Kosala, na rekodi za kamanda wa Prithvisena kwa Brahmins kutoka Ayodhya. Baadaye, mji mkuu wa Dola ya Gupta ulihamishwa kutoka Pataliputra kwenda Ayodhya. Paramartha anasema kwamba Mfalme Vikramaditya alihamisha Korti ya Royal kwa Ayodhya; Xuanzang pia anasisitiza hii, akisema kwamba mfalme huyu alihamisha korti kwenda "nchi ya Shravasti", ambayo ni, Kosala. Tamaduni ya mdomo ya Ayodhya, iliyorekodiwa kwanza kwa maandishi na Robert Montgomery Martin mnamo 1838, inataja kwamba mji huo ulitengwa baada ya kifo cha kizazi cha Rama Brihadbala. Jiji linabaki kutengwa hadi Mfalme Vikrama wa Ujjain akaja kuutafuta, na akaiweka tena. Alikata misitu ambayo ilikuwa imefunika magofu ya zamani, ikaweka Ramgar Fort, na akaijenga mahekalu 360.

Milki ya Kushan ingeanguka mbali na 220 CE, na kuunda machafuko zaidi ya kisiasa nchini India. Halafu mnamo 320, Dola ya Gupta (Sanskrit: गुप जवंश, Gupta rājavanśha) ilianzishwa na kufunikwa sehemu ndogo ya India. Ilianzishwa na Maharaja Sri-Gupta, nasaba ilikuwa mfano wa ustaarabu wa zamani. Wafalme wa Gupta waliunganisha eneo hilo kimsingi kupitia mazungumzo ya viongozi wa ndani na familia na vile vile ndoa za kimkakati. Utawala wao ulifunika ardhi kidogo kuliko ufalme wa Maurya, lakini walianzisha utulivu mkubwa. Mnamo 535, Dola ilimalizika wakati India ilizidiwa na Huns.

Carthage ilikuwa moja wapo ya miji mikubwa ya kipindi cha Hellenistic na ilikuwa kati ya miji mikubwa katika historia ya preindustrial. Wakati kufikia AD 14, Roma ilikuwa na wenyeji wasiopungua 750,000 na katika karne iliyofuata inaweza kuwa imefikia milioni 1, miji ya Alexandria na Antiokia ilihesabiwa mia chache au chini. Kulingana na historia isiyo ya kuaminika ya Herodian, Carthage alimpitisha Alexandria kwa nafasi ya pili katika Dola ya Kirumi.
Juu ya Byrsa Hill, eneo la Jukwaa la Warumi, eneo la makazi kutoka karne ya mwisho ya kuishi (mapema karne ya pili KWK.) Ya Jiji la Punic lilichimbwa na mtaalam wa kale wa Ufaransa Serge Lancel. Jirani, pamoja na nyumba zake, maduka, na nafasi za kibinafsi, ni muhimu kwa kile kinachoonyesha juu ya maisha ya kila siku huko zaidi ya miaka 2100 iliyopita.

Asili ya Dola ya Gupta inaaminika kuwa kutoka kwa Rajas wa ndani kama baba na babu wa Chandra Gupta tu waliotajwa katika maandishi. Utawala wa Chandra Gupta ulikuwa mtu ambao haujashughulikiwa, lakini chini ya mtoto wake, Samudra Gupta, Dola ilifikia ukuu juu ya India takriban sawa na idadi ambayo Dola ya Maurya ilifanya mazoezi hapo awali. Rekodi mbali mbali zipo za ushindi wa Samudra Gupta, kuonyesha kwamba karibu yote ya India ya Kaskazini na sehemu ya kusini mwa India ilikuwa chini ya utawala wa Gupta. Dola iliandaliwa pamoja na mistari ya majimbo, vikosi vya mipaka, na wafalme wa chini wa majimbo ya Vassal ambayo yalikuwa yameapa ufalme. Kwa upande wa Punjab, Janapadas wa eneo hilo walikuwa huru lakini walitarajiwa kutii maagizo na kutoa heshima kwa Dola. Samudra Gupta alichukuliwa kama mlinzi wa sanaa na ubinadamu. Maandishi yanatoa ushahidi kwa Raja sio tu kuwa mtu aliyejifunza, lakini anapenda kampuni ya washairi na waandishi; Aina moja ya sarafu hata inamuonyesha akicheza kwenye veena ..

Faxian (au fa hsien nk), Wabudhi wa China, alikuwa mmoja wa mahujaji ambao walitembelea India wakati wa utawala wa Mfalme wa Gupta Chandragupta II. Alianza safari yake kutoka China mnamo 399 na akafika India mnamo 405. Wakati wa kukaa kwake India hadi 411, aliendelea na Hija kwenda Mathura, Kannauj, Kapilavastu, Kushinagar, Vaishali, Pataliputra, Kashi, na Rajagriha, na akafanya uchunguzi wa uangalifu juu ya hali ya Dola. Faxian alifurahishwa na upole wa utawala. Nambari ya adhabu ilikuwa laini na makosa yaliadhibiwa faini tu. Kutoka kwa akaunti zake, Dola ya Gupta ilikuwa kipindi cha mafanikio. Na hadi mhimili wa biashara wa Roma -China ulipovunjwa na anguko la nasaba ya Han, Guptas ilifanikiwa. Maandishi yake yanaunda moja ya vyanzo muhimu kwa historia ya kipindi hiki.

Historia ya Gujarat ilianza na makazi ya umri wa jiwe ikifuatiwa na makazi ya Chalcolithic na Bronze Age kama Ustaarabu wa Indus Valley. Miji ya pwani ya Gujarat, hasa Bharuch, ilitumika kama bandari na vituo vya biashara katika falme za Nanda, Maurya, Satavahana na Gupta pamoja na kipindi cha Magharibi mwa Kshatrapas. Baada ya kuanguka kwa Dola ya Gupta katika karne ya 6, Gujarat alifanikiwa kama jimbo huru la Hindu/Wabudhi. Nasaba ya Maitraka, iliyotoka kwa mkuu wa Gupta, ilitawala kutoka karne ya 6 hadi 8 kutoka mji mkuu wao huko Vallabhi, ingawa walitawaliwa kwa ufupi na Harsha wakati wa karne ya 7. Watawala wa Kiarabu wa Sindh walimnyakua Vallabhi mnamo 770, na kumaliza nasaba ya Maitraka. Dola ya Gurjara-Pratihara ilitawala Gujarat baada ya karne ya 8 hadi 10. Vile vile, kwa vipindi kadhaa mkoa ulikuja chini ya udhibiti wa Dola ya Rashtrakuta na Dola ya Pala. Mnamo 775 wakimbizi wa kwanza wa Parsi (Zoroastrian) walifika Gujarat kutoka Irani kubwa.
report_src: Mji mkubwa na mji mkuu wa Dola ya Gupta ulikuwa Pataliputra, ambao uliendelea kuwa kitovu cha kisiasa na kitamaduni cha nasaba hiyo kati ya karne ya 3 hadi ya 6 BK [1].
all_claims: Mji mkubwa na mji mkuu wa Dola ya Gupta ulikuwa Pataliputra, ambao uliendelea kuwa kitovu cha kisiasa na kitamaduni cha nasaba hiyo kati ya karne ya 3 hadi ya 6 BK [1].
