question_en: How much dopamine is in the human brain?
pos_context_en: Dopaminergic neurons (dopamine-producing nerve cells) are comparatively few in number—a total of around 400,000 in the human brain—and their cell bodies are confined in groups to a few relatively small brain areas. However their axons project to many other brain areas, and they exert powerful effects on their targets. These dopaminergic cell groups were first mapped in 1964 by Annica Dahlström and Kjell Fuxe, who assigned them labels starting with the letter "A" (for "aminergic"). In their scheme, areas A1 through A7 contain the neurotransmitter norepinephrine, whereas A8 through A14 contain dopamine. The dopaminergic areas they identified are the substantia nigra (groups 8 and 9); the ventral tegmental area (group 10); the posterior hypothalamus (group 11); the arcuate nucleus (group 12); the zona incerta (group 13) and the periventricular nucleus (group 14).
neg_context_en: Dopamine is one of the chemicals that carries messages between brain cells. There is evidence that too much dopamine may be involved in the development of schizophrenia, but it’s still not clear how, or whether everyone diagnosed with schizophrenia has too much dopamine. Neuroleptic drugs (antipsychotics), which are sometimes used to treat schizophrenia, target the dopamine system.

As noradrenaline is an intermediate on the path to adrenaline, dopamine is on the path to noradrenaline (and hence adrenaline.) In 1957 dopamine was identified in the human brain by researcher Kathleen Montagu. In 1958/59 Arvid Carlsson and his group in the Pharmacology Department of the University of Lund, including the medical students Åke Bertler and Evald Rosengren, not only found dopamine in the brain, but also – like noradrenaline in Marthe Vogt's exemplary study – in uneven distribution, quite different from the distribution of noradrenaline. This argued for a function beyond an intermediate. The concentration was highest in the corpus striatum, which contained only traces of noradrenaline. Carlsson's group had previously found that reserpine, which was known to cause a Parkinsonism syndrome, depleted dopamine (as well as noradrenaline and serotonin) from the brain. They concluded that ″dopamine is concerned with the function of the corpus striatum and thus with the control of motor function″. Thus for the first time the reserpine-induced Parkinsonism in laboratory animals and, by implication, Parkinson's disease in humans was related to depletion of striatal dopamine. A year later Oleh Hornykiewicz, who had been introduced to dopamine by Blaschko and was carrying out a colour reaction on extracts of human corpus striatum in the Pharmacological Institute of the University of Vienna, saw the brain dopamine deficiency in Parkinson's disease ″with  own naked eye: Instead of the pink colour given by the comparatively high concentrations of dopamine in the control samples, the reaction vials containing the extracts of the Parkinson's disease striatum showed hardly a tinge of pink discoloration″.

Dopamine does not cross the blood–brain barrier, so its synthesis and functions in peripheral areas are to a large degree independent of its synthesis and functions in the brain. A substantial amount of dopamine circulates in the bloodstream, but its functions there are not entirely clear. Dopamine is found in blood plasma at levels comparable to those of epinephrine, but in humans, over 95% of the dopamine in the plasma is in the form of dopamine sulfate, a conjugate produced by the enzyme sulfotransferase 1A3/1A4 acting on free dopamine. The bulk of this dopamine sulfate is produced in the mesentery that surrounds parts of the digestive system. The production of dopamine sulfate is thought to be a mechanism for detoxifying dopamine that is ingested as food or produced by the digestive process—levels in the plasma typically rise more than fifty-fold after a meal. Dopamine sulfate has no known biological functions and is excreted in urine.

In 1957 Kathleen Montagu demonstrated the presence of dopamine in the human brain; later that same year Carlsson also demonstrated that dopamine was a neurotransmitter in the brain and not just a precursor for norepinephrine. Carlsson went on to develop a method for measuring the amount of dopamine in brain tissues. He found that dopamine levels in the basal ganglia, a brain area important for movement, were particularly high. He then showed that giving animals the drug reserpine caused a decrease in dopamine levels and a loss of movement control. These effects were similar to the symptoms of Parkinson's disease. By administering to these animals L-Dopa, which is the precursor of dopamine, he could alleviate the symptoms. These findings led other doctors to try using L-Dopa in patients with Parkinson's disease, and it was found to alleviate some of the symptoms in the early stages of the disease. L-Dopa is still the basis for most commonly used means of treating Parkinson's disease.

Dopamine (DA, a contraction of 3,4-dihydroxyphenethylamine) is an organic chemical of the catecholamine and phenethylamine families that plays several important roles in the brain and body. It is an amine synthesized by removing a carboxyl group from a molecule of its precursor chemical L-DOPA, which is synthesized in the brain and kidneys. Dopamine is also synthesized in plants and most animals. In the brain, dopamine functions as a neurotransmitter—a chemical released by neurons (nerve cells) to send signals to other nerve cells. The brain includes several distinct dopamine pathways, one of which plays a major role in the motivational component of reward-motivated behavior. The anticipation of most types of rewards increases the level of dopamine in the brain, and many addictive drugs increase dopamine release or block its reuptake into neurons following release. Other brain dopamine pathways are involved in motor control and in controlling the release of various hormones. These pathways and cell groups form a dopamine system which is neuromodulatory.

Kathleen Montagu (estimated birth between 1847 and 1907 – 28 March 1966) was the first researcher to identify dopamine in human brains. 
Working in Hans Weil-Malherbe’s laboratory at the Runwell Hospital outside London the presence of dopamine was identified by paper chromatography in the brain of several species, including a human brain. Her research was published in August 1957, followed and confirmed by Hans Weil-Malherbe in November 1957.

Melanins are a family of dark-pigmented substances found in a wide range of organisms. Chemically they are closely related to dopamine, and there is a type of melanin, known as dopamine-melanin, that can be synthesized by oxidation of dopamine via the enzyme tyrosinase. The melanin that darkens human skin is not of this type: it is synthesized by a pathway that uses L-DOPA as a precursor but not dopamine. However, there is substantial evidence that the neuromelanin that gives a dark color to the brain's substantia nigra is at least in part dopamine-melanin.

Coping with stress is a key aspect of rabbit behavior, and this can be traced to part of the brain known as ventral tegmental area (VTA). Dopaminergic neurons in this part of the brain release the hormone dopamine, generalized as a "feel-good" hormone. In humans, dopamine is released through a variety of acts, including sexual activity, substance abuse, and even eating chocolate. However, in rabbits, it is released as part of a coping mechanism while in a heightened state of fear or stress, and has a calming effect. Dopamine has also been found in the rabbit's medial prefrontal cortex, the nucleus accumbens, and the amygdala. Physiological and behavioral responses to human-induced tonic immobility (TI, sometimes termed "trancing" or "playing dead") have been found to be indicative of a fear-motivated stress state, confirming that the promotion of TI to try to increase a bond between rabbits and their owners—thinking the rabbits enjoy it—is misplaced. However, some researchers conclude that inducing TI in rabbits is appropriate for certain procedures, as it holds less risk than anesthesia.

Dopamine was first synthesized in 1910 by George Barger and James Ewens at Wellcome Laboratories in London, England and first identified in the human brain by Kathleen Montagu in 1957. It was named dopamine because it is a monoamine whose precursor in the Barger-Ewens synthesis is 3,4-dihydroxyphenylalanine (levodopa or L-DOPA). Dopamine's function as a neurotransmitter was first recognized in 1958 by Arvid Carlsson and Nils-Åke Hillarp at the Laboratory for Chemical Pharmacology of the National Heart Institute of Sweden. Carlsson was awarded the 2000 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine for showing that dopamine is not only a precursor of norepinephrine (noradrenaline) and epinephrine (adrenaline), but is also itself a neurotransmitter.
question_src: Je! Dopamine ni kiasi gani kwenye ubongo wa mwanadamu?
pos_context_src: Dopaminergic neurons (seli za ujasiri wa dopamine) ni chache kwa idadi-jumla ya karibu 400,000 katika ubongo wa mwanadamu-na miili yao ya seli imefungwa kwa vikundi kwa maeneo machache ya ubongo. Walakini axons zao zinafanya maeneo mengine mengi ya ubongo, na hutoa athari kubwa kwa malengo yao. Vikundi hivi vya seli za dopaminergic viliwekwa kwenye ramani ya kwanza mnamo 1964 na Annica Dahlström na Kjell Fuxe, ambao waliwapatia lebo kuanzia na barua "A" (kwa "Aminergic"). Katika mpango wao, maeneo A1 kupitia A7 yana neurotransmitter norepinephrine, wakati A8 kupitia A14 ina dopamine. Maeneo ya dopaminergic waliyoyatambua ni nigra substantia (vikundi 8 na 9); eneo la tegmental (kikundi 10); hypothalamus ya nyuma (kikundi 11); kiini cha arcuate (kikundi 12); Zona incerta (kikundi 13) na kiini cha periventricular (kikundi 14).
neg_context_src: Dopamine ni moja ya kemikali ambayo hubeba ujumbe kati ya seli za ubongo. Kuna ushahidi kwamba dopamine nyingi inaweza kuhusika katika maendeleo ya ugonjwa wa akili, lakini bado haijafahamika ni jinsi gani, au ikiwa kila mtu aliyegunduliwa na schizophrenia ana dopamine nyingi. Dawa za Neuroleptic (antipsychotic), ambazo wakati mwingine hutumiwa kutibu schizophrenia, kulenga mfumo wa dopamine.

Kama noradrenaline ni ya kati kwenye njia ya adrenaline, dopamine iko kwenye njia ya noradrenaline (na kwa hivyo adrenaline.) Mnamo 1957 dopamine iligunduliwa katika ubongo wa mwanadamu na mtafiti Kathleen Montagu. Mnamo 1958/59 Arvid Carlsson na kikundi chake katika Idara ya Maduka ya dawa ya Chuo Kikuu cha Lund, pamoja na wanafunzi wa matibabu Åke Bertler na Evald Rosengren, sio tu walipata dopamine kwenye ubongo, lakini pia - kama noradrenaline katika mfano wa mfano wa Marthe Vogt - katika usambazaji usio na usawa, tofauti kabisa na usambazaji. Hii ilibishana kwa kazi zaidi ya kati. Mkusanyiko ulikuwa wa juu zaidi katika striatum ya Corpus, ambayo ilikuwa na athari za noradrenaline. Kundi la Carlsson hapo awali lilikuwa limegundua kuwa Reserpine, ambayo ilijulikana kusababisha ugonjwa wa parkinsonism, dopamine iliyokamilika (na vile vile noradrenaline na serotonin) kutoka kwa ubongo. Walihitimisha kuwa ″ dopamine inahusika na kazi ya corpus striatum na kwa hivyo na udhibiti wa kazi ya gari ″. Kwa hivyo kwa mara ya kwanza parkinsonism iliyosababishwa na reserpine katika wanyama wa maabara na, kwa maana, ugonjwa wa Parkinson kwa wanadamu ulihusiana na kupungua kwa dopamine ya striatal. Mwaka mmoja baadaye Oleh Hornykiewicz, ambaye alikuwa ametambulishwa kwa dopamine na Blaschko na alikuwa akifanya athari ya rangi kwenye dondoo za shirika la kibinadamu katika Taasisi ya Maduka ya dawa ya Chuo Kikuu cha Vienna, aliona upungufu wa ubongo katika ugonjwa wa parkinson wa macho, badala ya rangi ya alama ya juu ya usawa wa viini, badala ya samopt deving decils decilops decilops decilops decilops decilop activels ampine deivels active de converting decilop excations decilop ampine devels deivels deivels deivels deivent decinels deivent decine devels deivent decine devels deivels deivels deivels deivels the e miaka de. Extracts ya ugonjwa wa Parkinson's striatum ilionyesha ngumu sana ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi ya rangi.

Dopamine haivuki kizuizi cha damu -ubongo, kwa hivyo muundo wake na kazi katika maeneo ya pembeni ni kwa kiwango kikubwa huru ya muundo wake na kazi katika ubongo. Kiasi kikubwa cha dopamine huzunguka kwenye damu, lakini kazi zake haziko wazi kabisa. Dopamine hupatikana katika plasma ya damu katika viwango vinavyolinganishwa na ile ya epinephrine, lakini kwa wanadamu, zaidi ya 95% ya dopamine kwenye plasma iko katika mfumo wa dopamine sulfate, conjugate inayozalishwa na enzyme sulfotransferase 1A3/1A4 ikifanya kazi ya bure. Wingi wa sulfate hii ya dopamine hutolewa katika mesentery ambayo inazunguka sehemu za mfumo wa utumbo. Uzalishaji wa dopamine sulfate inadhaniwa kuwa utaratibu wa detoxifyine dopamine ambayo huingizwa kama chakula au inazalishwa na mchakato wa utumbo-ngazi katika plasma kawaida huongezeka zaidi ya mara hamsini baada ya chakula. Dopamine sulfate haina kazi zinazojulikana za kibaolojia na hutolewa kwenye mkojo.

Mnamo 1957 Kathleen Montagu alionyesha uwepo wa dopamine katika ubongo wa mwanadamu; Baadaye mwaka huo huo Carlsson pia alionyesha kuwa dopamine alikuwa neurotransmitter katika ubongo na sio tu mtangulizi wa norepinephrine. Carlsson aliendelea kukuza njia ya kupima kiwango cha dopamine kwenye tishu za ubongo. Aligundua kuwa viwango vya dopamine katika ganglia ya basal, eneo la ubongo muhimu kwa harakati, zilikuwa juu sana. Kisha alionyesha kuwa kuwapa wanyama reserpine ya dawa ilisababisha kupungua kwa viwango vya dopamine na upotezaji wa udhibiti wa harakati. Athari hizi zilikuwa sawa na dalili za ugonjwa wa Parkinson. Kwa kusimamia wanyama hawa L-dopa, ambayo ni mtangulizi wa dopamine, angeweza kupunguza dalili. Matokeo haya yalisababisha madaktari wengine kujaribu kutumia L-DOPA kwa wagonjwa walio na ugonjwa wa Parkinson, na ilipatikana kupunguza dalili kadhaa katika hatua za mwanzo za ugonjwa. L-dopa bado ni msingi wa njia zinazotumika sana za kutibu ugonjwa wa Parkinson.

Dopamine (DA, contraction ya 3,4-dihydroxyphenethylamine) ni kemikali ya kikaboni ya familia ya katekesi na phenethylamine ambayo inachukua majukumu kadhaa muhimu katika ubongo na mwili. Ni amine iliyoundwa kwa kuondoa kikundi cha carboxyl kutoka kwa molekuli ya kemikali yake ya l-dopa, ambayo imeundwa katika ubongo na figo. Dopamine pia imeundwa katika mimea na wanyama wengi. Katika ubongo, dopamine inafanya kazi kama neurotransmitter -kemikali iliyotolewa na neurons (seli za ujasiri) kutuma ishara kwa seli zingine za ujasiri. Ubongo ni pamoja na njia kadhaa tofauti za dopamine, moja ambayo inachukua jukumu kubwa katika sehemu ya motisha ya tabia inayochochewa na thawabu. Matarajio ya aina nyingi za thawabu huongeza kiwango cha dopamine kwenye ubongo, na dawa nyingi za kulevya huongeza kutolewa kwa dopamine au kuzuia kurudi kwake ndani ya neurons kufuatia kutolewa. Njia zingine za dopamine za ubongo zinahusika katika udhibiti wa gari na katika kudhibiti kutolewa kwa homoni kadhaa. Njia hizi na vikundi vya seli huunda mfumo wa dopamine ambao ni neuromodulatory.

Kathleen Montagu (inakadiriwa kuzaliwa kati ya 1847 na 1907 - 28 Machi 1966) alikuwa mtafiti wa kwanza kutambua dopamine katika akili za binadamu. 
Kufanya kazi katika maabara ya Hans Weil-Malherbe katika Hospitali ya Runwell nje ya London uwepo wa dopamine ulitambuliwa na chromatografia ya karatasi kwenye ubongo wa spishi kadhaa, pamoja na ubongo wa mwanadamu. Utafiti wake ulichapishwa mnamo Agosti 1957, na kufuatiwa na kuthibitishwa na Hans Weil-Malherbe mnamo Novemba 1957.

Melanins ni familia ya vitu vyenye rangi nyeusi vinavyopatikana katika anuwai ya viumbe. Kemikali zinahusiana sana na dopamine, na kuna aina ya melanin, inayojulikana kama dopamine-melanin, ambayo inaweza kutengenezwa na oxidation ya dopamine kupitia enzyme tyrosinase. Melanin ambayo inafanya giza ngozi ya mwanadamu sio ya aina hii: imeundwa na njia ambayo hutumia L-dopa kama mtangulizi lakini sio dopamine. Walakini, kuna ushahidi mkubwa kwamba neuromelanin ambayo hutoa rangi ya giza kwa nigra ya ubongo ni angalau katika sehemu ya dopamine-melanin.

Kukabiliana na mafadhaiko ni sehemu muhimu ya tabia ya sungura, na hii inaweza kupatikana kwa sehemu ya ubongo unaojulikana kama eneo la tegmental (VTA). Dopaminergic neurons katika sehemu hii ya ubongo kutolewa dopamine ya homoni, kwa jumla kama "hisia nzuri". Kwa wanadamu, dopamine hutolewa kupitia aina ya vitendo, pamoja na shughuli za ngono, unywaji wa dawa za kulevya, na hata kula chokoleti. Walakini, katika sungura, hutolewa kama sehemu ya utaratibu wa kukabiliana wakati katika hali ya hofu au mafadhaiko, na ina athari ya kutuliza. Dopamine pia imepatikana kwenye cortex ya medial ya sungura, kiini huamua, na amygdala. Majibu ya kisaikolojia na ya tabia kwa kutokuwa na nguvu ya tonic ya kibinadamu (TI, wakati mwingine huitwa "trancing" au "kucheza wafu") yamepatikana kuwa ishara ya hali ya dhiki inayochochewa na hofu, ikithibitisha kwamba kukuza kwa TI kujaribu kuongeza uhusiano kati ya sungura na wamiliki wao-kudhani sungura kufurahiya-haijakamilika. Walakini, watafiti wengine huhitimisha kuwa kushawishi TI katika sungura ni sawa kwa taratibu fulani, kwani ina hatari kidogo kuliko anesthesia.

Dopamine ilibuniwa kwanza mnamo 1910 na George Barger na James Ewens katika Maabara ya Wellcome huko London, England na kutambuliwa kwa mara ya kwanza katika ubongo wa mwanadamu na Kathleen Montagu mnamo 1957. Iliitwa Dopamine kwa sababu ni monoamine ambaye mtangulizi katika Barger-Ewens Synthesis Is 3,4-dihdroxyphine. Kazi ya Dopamine kama neurotransmitter ilitambuliwa kwa mara ya kwanza mnamo 1958 na Arvid Carlsson na Nils-Åke Hillarp katika Maabara ya Chemical Pharmacology ya Taasisi ya Moyo ya Kitaifa ya Uswidi. Carlsson alipewa tuzo ya Nobel ya 2000 katika fiziolojia au dawa kwa kuonyesha kwamba dopamine sio tu mtangulizi wa norepinephrine (noradrenaline) na epinephrine (adrenaline), lakini pia ni neurotransmitter.
report_src: Katika ubongo wa mwanadamu, kiasi cha dopamine kinahesabiwa zaidi kwa idadi ya neuroni zinazoiunda na kuiachia kuliko kwa ujazo kamili wa molekuli; jumla ya neuroni za dopamini ni takriban 400,000 pekee, idadi ndogo sana ikilinganishwa na idadi ya neuroni zote, lakini axoni zao husambaa kwenye maeneo mengi ya ubongo na hivyo kutoa athari kubwa za kimuundo na kisaikolojia [1].

question_en: How many battle ships did Japan employ in WWII?
pos_context_title_en: Imperial Japanese Navy in World War II
pos_context_en: Even after the disaster at Philippine Sea, the IJN was still a formidable force. Of the 12 battleships that were available at the beginning of the war in 1941-42, nine still remained operational, together with 14 out of the original 18 heavy cruisers. However, efforts to rebuild the carrier force were unsuccessful since the training given to new aviators was of a very low standard. Consequently, the new carriers never went to sea with a full air group. This left the Japanese with a ragtag collection of carriers, led by the "Zuikaku", which was the sole survivor of the Pearl Harbor attack force. The Japanese were left with two choices, either to commit their remaining strength in an all-out offensive, or to sit by while the Americans occupied the Philippines and cut the sea lanes between Japan and vital resources from the Dutch East Indies and Malaya. The plan devised by the Japanese was a final attempt to create a decisive battle by utilizing their last remaining strength, the firepower of its heavy cruisers and battleships, which were to be all committed against the American beachhead at Leyte. The Japanese planned to use their remaining carriers as bait, in order to lure the American carriers away from Leyte Gulf long enough for the heavy warships to enter and destroy any American ships present.
neg_context_title_en: Naval tactics in the Age of Steam
Imperial Japanese Army Railways and Shipping Section
Imperial Japanese Navy in World War II
Imperial Japanese Navy in World War II
neg_context_en:
Shortly after the end of the war, the first aircraft carriers designed from the keel up were completed: the Japanese "Hōshō" and the British "Hermes". Both ships were too small to be satisfactory. 
Under the terms of the Washington Treaty, Britain, America and Japan were allowed to convert two ships that were due to scrap under the treaty into aircraft carriers. By luck as much as planning, the Americans and Japanese both developed large carriers that were capable of handling up to 90 aircraft, based on the hulls of battlecruisers due to be scrapped under the Washington Treaty. Both navies gradually began to develop new tactics for employing aircraft carriers in battle, although these tactics did not come into full fruition until the middle of the Pacific Campaign of WWII.

Between 600,000 and 1,000,000 naval mines of all types were laid in WWII. Advancing military forces worked to clear mines from newly-taken areas, but extensive minefields remained in place after the war. Air-dropped mines had an additional problem for mine sweeping operations: they were not meticulously charted. In Japan, much of the B-29 mine-laying work had been performed at high altitude, with the drifting on the wind of mines carried by parachute adding a randomizing factor to their placement. Generalized danger areas were identified, with only the quantity of mines given in detail. Mines used in Operation Starvation were supposed to be self-sterilizing, but the circuit did not always work. Clearing the mines from Japanese waters took so many years that the task was eventually given to the Japan Maritime Self-Defense Force.

It was a large force which employed 300,000 soldiers (Army Shipping Units) at maximum and managed 30% of Japanese transport ships. For the Japanese Army, the Pacific War was not only a battle on the ground, but also at sea. Many Japanese soldiers fought on board against enemy submarines, PT boats and airplanes. At last, they rode on a Kamikaze special-attack boat and dashed into the enemy ship.

Japan's early WWII strategy towards the US, for example, made numerous assumptions that would lead the US Fleet to sail into the Western Pacific, to fight, on advantageous terms for the Japanese, a "Decisive Battle". Unfortunately for the Japanese, the US did not choose to make battleships its primary arm, fight for every Japanese outpost, use submarines only against the warrior targets of warships, or require a return to a fleet anchorage for regrouping. Intelligence was not a preferred assignment in the Japanese military, and their operations planners tended to make optimistic assumptions. An eccentric but incredibly creative US Marine, Earl Ellis, however, did foresee the US strategy for the Pacific in the 1920s, and set a standard for long-term estimates and net assessment

Although the Japanese lost four carriers and the worst consequences of Midway being the loss of experienced aircraft maintenance personnel, the engagement was ""not the battle that doomed Japan"". The outcome it did not lead to the end of the highly trained carrier aircrews or radically degrade the fighting capabilities of Japanese naval aviation as a whole. The Japanese only lost 110 aircrew during the battle, mostly from the "Hiryū" with American aircrew losses being far greater than the Japanese. The Japanese still had more warships of every category than the United States had in the Pacific and the Combined Fleet still possessed eight aircraft carriers, twice as many as the US Pacific Fleet. Additionally, while the United States did have three large carriers in the Pacific, in comparison to Japan's two, the Japanese vessels had a total capacity for 382 aircraft, compared to 300 on the American carriers. Also, the Japanese had another carrier already fitting out to join the fleet and two more in the later stages of construction. The American industry would deliver only small escort carriers during 1942, of which more than two thirds were went to the Atlantic; the massive shipbuilding program would not get into full gear until the following year. Consequently, for the time being the Japanese retained the advantage. As for naval aircraft, the Japanese were as strong as they had been at the beginning of the war. Until May and June 1942, air losses had been limited and aircraft production had kept pace with losses. From the beginning of war through the end of June, Japanese naval aircraft losses totaled 1,641. Almost half of the losses occurred during the months when the battles of Coral Sea and Midway took place, with the large majority in June, including many at Midway. Over the same period Japanese aircraft deliveries numbered 1,620. Additionally what was not of a major concern was pilots, as aircrew casualties at Midway were not so severe and the large majority of aircrew of the Kido Butai returned despite the sinking of their ships. These were bolstered by 2,000 newly trained pilots in 1942.

After the war, the Japanese Empire immediately turned its focus to the two remaining rivals for imperial dominance in the Pacific Ocean: Britain and the United States. Satō Tetsutarō, an IJN admiral and military theorist, speculated that conflict would inevitably arise between Japan and at least one of its two main rivals. To that end, he called for the IJN to maintain a fleet with at least 70% as many capital ships as the US Navy. This ratio, Satō theorized, would enable the Imperial Japanese Navy to defeat the US Navy in one major battle in Japanese waters in any eventual conflict. Accordingly, the 1907 Imperial Defense Policy called for the construction of a battle fleet of eight modern battleships, each, and eight modern armored cruisers, each. This was the genesis of the Eight-Eight Fleet Program, the development of a cohesive battle line of sixteen capital ships.

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.

Japan put particular emphasis on aircraft carriers. The Imperial Japanese Navy started the Pacific War with 10 aircraft carriers, the largest and most modern carrier fleet in the world at that time. There were seven American aircraft carriers at the beginning of hostilities, only three operating in the Pacific; and eight British aircraft carriers, of which a single one operated in the Indian Ocean. A large number of these Japanese carriers were of small size, however, in accordance with the limitations placed upon the Navy by the London and Washington Naval Conferences. Nonetheless the Japanese initially had the upper hand over the American and British, by grouping all of their fleet carriers into a single unit known as the 1st Air Fleet or Kidō Butai ("Mobile Force"). In the Kidō Butai, the two -class carriers were superior to any carrier in the world, until the wartime appearance of the American "Essex" class.

By contrast, the Imperial Japanese Navy had the advantage of a dozen operational battleships early in the war, but chose not to deploy them in any significant engagements. The two and two s, despite their extensive modernization and respectable speeds, were relegated to training and home defense, while the two and two were being saved due to fuel limitations for a "decisive battle", which never came. In fact, the only Japanese battleships to see much action in the early stages were the four s, which served mostly as carrier escorts due to their high speed and antiaircraft armament.

With the conclusion of World War I and the signing of the Washington Naval Treaty, the size of the Imperial Japanese Navy was significantly lessened, with a ratio of 5:5:3 required between the capital ships of the United Kingdom, the United States, and Japan. The treaty also banned Japan from building any new capital ships until 1931, with no capital ship permitted to exceed 35,000 tons. Provided that new additions did not exceed 3,000 tons, existing capital ships were allowed to be upgraded with improved torpedo bulges and deck armor. By the time the Washington Treaty had been fully implemented in Japan, only three classes of World War I-era capital ships—the and battleships, and the "Kongō"-class battlecruisers—remained active.
question_src: Je! Japan ilitumia meli ngapi katika WWII?
pos_context_title_src: Jeshi la Kijapani la Imperial katika Vita vya Kidunia vya pili
pos_context_src: Hata baada ya msiba katika Bahari ya Ufilipino, IJN bado ilikuwa nguvu kubwa. Kati ya vita 12 ambavyo vilikuwa vinapatikana mwanzoni mwa vita mnamo 1941-42, tisa bado walibaki wakifanya kazi, pamoja na 14 kati ya waendeshaji wakuu 18 wa asili. Walakini, juhudi za kujenga tena nguvu ya wabebaji hazikufanikiwa kwani mafunzo aliyopewa waendeshaji mpya yalikuwa ya kiwango cha chini sana. Kwa hivyo, wabebaji wapya hawakuenda baharini na kikundi kamili cha hewa. Hii iliwaacha Wajapani na mkusanyiko wa wabebaji wa ragtag, wakiongozwa na "Zuikaku", ambayo ilikuwa mwokoaji wa pekee wa Kikosi cha Mashambulio ya Bandari ya Pearl. Wajapani waliachwa na chaguo mbili, ama kufanya nguvu zao zilizobaki katika kukera, au kukaa karibu wakati Wamarekani walichukua Ufilipino na kukata vichochoro vya bahari kati ya Japan na rasilimali muhimu kutoka Uholanzi Mashariki ya Indies na Malaya. Mpango ulioundwa na Wajapani ulikuwa jaribio la mwisho la kuunda vita ya kuamua kwa kutumia nguvu zao za mwisho zilizobaki, nguvu ya moto wa waendeshaji wake wakubwa na vita, ambavyo vyote vilipaswa kufanywa dhidi ya kichwa cha Amerika huko Leyte. Wajapani walipanga kutumia wabebaji wao waliobaki kama bait, ili kuwarudisha wabebaji wa Amerika mbali na Leyte Ghuba muda wa kutosha kwa meli nzito za kuingia na kuharibu meli zozote za Amerika zilizopo.

neg_context_src:
Muda kidogo baada ya kumalizika kwa vita, wabebaji wa ndege wa kwanza iliyoundwa kutoka keel UP walikamilishwa: "Hōshō" wa Kijapani na "Hermes" wa Uingereza. Meli zote mbili zilikuwa ndogo sana kuwa za kuridhisha. 
Chini ya masharti ya Mkataba wa Washington, Uingereza, Amerika na Japan waliruhusiwa kubadilisha meli mbili ambazo zilitokana na chakavu chini ya Mkataba kuwa wabebaji wa ndege. Kwa bahati nzuri kama vile kupanga, Wamarekani na Wajapani wote waliendeleza wabebaji wakubwa ambao walikuwa na uwezo wa kushughulikia hadi ndege 90, kwa msingi wa vibanda vya wapiganaji wa vita kwa sababu ya kubomolewa chini ya Mkataba wa Washington. Navies zote mbili zilianza kukuza mbinu mpya za kuajiri wabebaji wa ndege vitani, ingawa mbinu hizi hazikufanikiwa kabisa hadi katikati ya kampeni ya Pacific ya WWII.

Kati ya migodi ya majini 600,000 na 1,000,000 ya kila aina iliwekwa katika WWII. Kuendeleza vikosi vya jeshi vilifanya kazi kusafisha migodi kutoka maeneo yaliyochukuliwa mpya, lakini uwanja mkubwa wa mgodi ulibaki mahali baada ya vita. Migodi iliyoshuka hewa ilikuwa na shida ya ziada kwa shughuli za kufagia mgodi: hazikuorodheshwa kwa uangalifu. Huko Japan, sehemu kubwa ya kazi ya kuwekewa mgodi wa B-29 ilikuwa imefanywa kwa urefu mkubwa, na kuteleza juu ya upepo wa migodi uliofanywa na parachute kuongeza sababu ya kubadilika kwa uwekaji wao. Sehemu za hatari ziligunduliwa, na idadi ya migodi tu iliyopewa kwa undani. Migodi iliyotumiwa katika njaa ya operesheni ilitakiwa kujiboresha, lakini mzunguko haukufanya kazi kila wakati. Kusafisha migodi kutoka kwa maji ya Kijapani ilichukua miaka mingi hivi kwamba kazi hiyo ilipewa hatimaye nguvu ya kujilinda ya bahari ya Japan.

Ilikuwa nguvu kubwa ambayo iliajiri askari 300,000 (vitengo vya usafirishaji wa jeshi) kwa kiwango cha juu na waliweza 30% ya meli za usafirishaji za Japan. Kwa jeshi la Japan, Vita vya Pasifiki haikuwa vita tu ardhini, bali pia baharini. Askari wengi wa Japani walipigania kwenye bodi dhidi ya manowari ya adui, boti za PT na ndege. Mwishowe, walipanda mashua maalum ya kushambulia Kamikaze na kuingia ndani ya meli ya adui.

Mkakati wa mapema wa WWII wa Japan kuelekea Amerika, kwa mfano, ulifanya mawazo mengi ambayo yangesababisha meli za Amerika kusafiri kwenda Pacific Magharibi, kupigana, kwa masharti mazuri kwa Wajapani, "vita vya maamuzi". Kwa bahati mbaya kwa Wajapani, Amerika haikuchagua kufanya vita vya mkono wake wa msingi, kupigania kila uwanja wa Kijapani, kutumia manowari tu dhidi ya malengo ya shujaa wa meli za kivita, au kuhitaji kurudi kwenye nanga ya meli kwa kujipanga tena. Ujuzi haukuwa mgawo uliopendekezwa katika jeshi la Japan, na wapangaji wa shughuli zao walijaribu kufanya mawazo ya matumaini. Marine wa Amerika lakini wa ubunifu wa Amerika, Earl Ellis, hata hivyo, aliona mkakati wa Amerika kwa Pasifiki katika miaka ya 1920, na kuweka kiwango kwa makadirio ya muda mrefu na tathmini ya jumla

Ingawa Wajapani walipoteza wabebaji wanne na athari mbaya zaidi ya Midway kuwa upotezaji wa wafanyikazi wenye uzoefu wa matengenezo ya ndege, ushiriki huo ulikuwa "" sio vita ambayo ilimaliza Japan "". Matokeo hayakusababisha mwisho wa ndege za kubeba zilizofunzwa sana au kudhoofisha uwezo wa mapigano wa anga za majini za Kijapani kwa ujumla. Wajapani walipoteza tu ndege 110 wakati wa vita, zaidi kutoka kwa "Hiryū" na upotezaji wa ndege wa Amerika kuwa mkubwa zaidi kuliko Wajapani. Wajapani bado walikuwa na meli za kivita zaidi za kila jamii kuliko Merika walikuwa na Pasifiki na meli iliyojumuishwa bado ilikuwa na wabebaji wa ndege wanane, mara mbili kama meli ya Pasifiki ya Amerika. Kwa kuongezea, wakati Merika ilikuwa na wabebaji wakubwa watatu katika Pasifiki, kwa kulinganisha na mbili za Japan, vyombo vya Kijapani vilikuwa na uwezo wa jumla wa ndege 382, ​​ikilinganishwa na 300 kwenye wabebaji wa Amerika. Pia, Wajapani walikuwa na mtoaji mwingine tayari anafaa kujiunga na meli na mbili zaidi katika hatua za baadaye za ujenzi. Sekta ya Amerika ingetoa wabebaji wadogo tu wakati wa 1942, ambayo zaidi ya theluthi mbili walikwenda Atlantiki; Programu kubwa ya ujenzi wa meli haingeingia kwenye gia kamili hadi mwaka uliofuata. Kwa hivyo, kwa wakati wa Kijapani kubaki na faida. Kama kwa ndege ya majini, Wajapani walikuwa na nguvu kama walivyokuwa mwanzoni mwa vita. Hadi Mei na Juni 1942, upotezaji wa hewa ulikuwa mdogo na uzalishaji wa ndege ulikuwa umeshika kasi na hasara. Tangu mwanzo wa vita hadi mwisho wa Juni, upotezaji wa ndege za Kijapani za Kijapani zilifikia 1,641. Karibu nusu ya hasara zilitokea wakati wa miezi wakati vita vya Bahari ya Coral na Midway vilifanyika, na idadi kubwa mnamo Juni, pamoja na wengi huko Midway. Katika kipindi hicho hicho ndege za Kijapani zinaorodheshwa 1,620. Kwa kuongeza kile ambacho hakikuwa cha wasiwasi mkubwa ilikuwa marubani, kwani majeruhi wa ndege huko Midway hayakuwa mazito na idadi kubwa ya Aircrew ya Kido Butai alirudi licha ya kuzama kwa meli zao. Hizi ziliongezwa na marubani 2000 waliofunzwa mnamo 1942.

Baada ya vita, Dola ya Japani mara moja ilielekeza umakini wake kwa wapinzani wawili waliobaki wa kutawala kwa kifalme katika Bahari ya Pasifiki: Uingereza na Merika. Satō Tetsutarō, mtaalam wa ijn admiral na mwanajeshi, alisema kwamba mzozo huo ungeibuka kati ya Japan na angalau mmoja wa wapinzani wake wawili. Kwa maana hiyo, aliitaka IJN kudumisha meli na angalau 70% kama meli nyingi za mji mkuu kama Jeshi la Merika la Merika. Uwiano huu, Satō nadharia, ungewezesha Jeshi la Kijapani la Imperial kushinda Jeshi la Jeshi la Merika katika vita moja kuu katika maji ya Kijapani katika mzozo wowote wa baadaye. Ipasavyo, sera ya Ulinzi ya Imperi ya 1907 ilitaka ujenzi wa meli za vita vya vita nane vya kisasa, kila moja, na wasafiri wa kivita wa kisasa, kila moja. Hii ilikuwa genesis ya mpango wa meli nane na nane, maendeleo ya vita vya kushikamana vya meli kumi na sita.

Winfield Toll Bridge, pia inajulikana kama Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, ni kihistoria wa kihistoria wa Cantilever Warren Truss Bridge iliyoko Winfield na Red House, Kaunti ya Putnam, West Virginia. Ilijengwa mnamo 1955, na inachukua Mto wa Kanawha, iliyobeba West Virginia Route 34. Cantilever kupitia-truss ina nafasi mbili za nanga kila futi 245 kwa urefu na urefu wa futi 462 kwa urefu kati ya mistari ya kituo cha pier. Span kuu ina futi mbili 128, inchi 4, mikono ya cantilever na miguu 205, inchi 4, iliyosimamishwa.

Japan iliweka msisitizo fulani kwa wabebaji wa ndege. Jeshi la kifalme la Kijapani lilianza vita vya Pasifiki na wabebaji wa ndege 10, meli kubwa na ya kisasa zaidi ulimwenguni wakati huo. Kulikuwa na wabebaji saba wa ndege wa Amerika mwanzoni mwa uhasama, ni watatu tu wanaofanya kazi katika Pasifiki; na wabebaji wanane wa ndege wa Uingereza, ambao mmoja mmoja alifanya kazi katika Bahari ya Hindi. Idadi kubwa ya wabebaji hawa wa Kijapani walikuwa wa ukubwa mdogo, hata hivyo, kulingana na mapungufu yaliyowekwa kwenye Jeshi la Jeshi la Wanamaji na Mikutano ya Naval ya London na Washington. Walakini Wajapani hapo awali walikuwa na mkono wa juu juu ya Amerika na Briteni, kwa kuweka vikundi vyao vyote vya meli ndani ya kitengo kimoja kinachojulikana kama Fleet ya 1 ya Hewa au Kidō Butai ("Kikosi cha Simu"). Katika Kidō Butai, wabebaji wawili wa vibete walikuwa bora kuliko mchukuaji yeyote ulimwenguni, hadi wakati wa vita wa darasa la "Essex" la Amerika.

Kwa kulinganisha, Jeshi la Kijapani la Imperial lilikuwa na faida ya vita kadhaa vya kufanya kazi mapema vitani, lakini ilichagua kutowapeleka katika shughuli zozote muhimu. Wawili na wawili, licha ya kisasa yao ya kisasa na kasi ya heshima, waliachiliwa kwa mafunzo na utetezi wa nyumbani, wakati wawili na wawili walikuwa wakiokolewa kwa sababu ya mapungufu ya mafuta kwa "vita vya kuamua", ambavyo havijawahi kuja. Kwa kweli, vita vya pekee vya Kijapani kuona hatua nyingi katika hatua za mwanzo zilikuwa S nne, ambazo zilitumika kama kusindikiza kwa wabebaji kutokana na kasi yao ya juu na silaha za ndege.

Kwa kumalizika kwa Vita vya Kwanza vya Ulimwengu na kusainiwa kwa Mkataba wa Naval wa Washington, saizi ya Jeshi la Kijapani la Imperial ilipunguzwa sana, na uwiano wa 5: 5: 3 inahitajika kati ya meli za mji mkuu wa Uingereza, Merika, na Japan. Mkataba huo pia ulipiga marufuku Japan kutoka kwa kujenga meli mpya za mtaji hadi 1931, bila meli yoyote ya mtaji inayoruhusiwa kuzidi tani 35,000. Isipokuwa kwamba nyongeza mpya hazizidi tani 3,000, meli za mtaji zilizopo ziliruhusiwa kuboreshwa na bulges bora za torpedo na silaha za staha. Kufikia wakati Mkataba wa Washington ulikuwa umetekelezwa kikamilifu nchini Japani, ni madarasa matatu tu ya meli za ulimwengu za Vita vya Kidunia-na vita vya vita, na wapiganaji wa "Kongō" -class wahusika-walifanya kazi.
report_src: Kwa mujibu wa taarifa iliyopo, Japani iliingia Vita ya Pasifiki ikiwa na wabebaji wa ndege 12, na baada ya hasara kadhaa tisa kati ya hao bado walikuwa wakifanya kazi kufikia 1944; vilevile, 14 kati ya “waendeshaji wakuu” 18 wa awali (meli kubwa kama wabebaji na meli za vita) bado walibaki kazini katika hatua hiyo ya vita [1]. Hivyo, kiwango cha chini kabisa cha meli kubwa ambazo Japani ilitumia ni takribani 18, lakini idadi kamili ya meli zote—ikiwemo manowari, wasafirishaji askari na maboti madogo—ilikuwa kubwa zaidi na haijaainishwa kikamilifu katika chanzo hiki.

question_en: Who was the main female lead in Payton Place?
pos_context_en: In the first episode, Dr. Michael Rossi (Ed Nelson) arrives from New York City to set up practice in town. Newspaper editor Matthew Swain (Warner Anderson) tells him people usually try to get away from towns like Peyton Place, not move to them. Matthew's third cousin Allison MacKenzie (Mia Farrow), a close friend of classmate Norman Harrington (Christopher Connelly), has begun to fall in love with his older brother, Rodney (Ryan O'Neal); she is smitten as soon as they share their first kiss. At the end of the episode, Allison's mother, Constance (Dorothy Malone), makes it clear she disapproves of her daughter's newfound relationship with Rodney.
neg_context_en: Payton started at the Peace Corps as a field assignment officer in 1964 helping prepare trainees to serve in West Africa. Payton traveled extensively for the Peace Corps performing psychological tests, interviews, clinical observations and peer reviews to help determine the conditions that would lead to the most satisfying experience for Peace Corps volunteers. In 1966 she was appointed Deputy Country Director for the Caribbean and in 1967 was appointed as Country Director for the Caribbean region supervising 130 volunteers involved in education projects on eight islands in the eastern Caribbean. At the time she was one of two women who were country directors.

Chicago's main offensive weapon was Payton and the running game. A big reason for Payton's success was fullback Matt Suhey as the primary lead blocker. Suhey was also a good ball carrier, rushing for 471 yards and catching 33 passes for 295 yards. The team's rushing was also aided by Pro Bowlers Jim Covert and Jay Hilgenberg and the rest of the Bears' offensive line including Mark Bortz, Keith Van Horne, and Tom Thayer.

Carolyn Robertson Payton (May 13, 1925 – April 11, 2001) was appointed Director of the United States Peace Corps in 1977 by President Jimmy Carter. She was the first female and the first African American to be Peace Corps Director. Payton was a pioneer in black women’s leadership within the American Psychological Association and psychology.

Jo Marie Payton (born August 3, 1950) is an American actress and singer who starred as Harriette Baines–Winslow, the matriarch of the Winslow family on the ABC/CBS sitcom "Family Matters" (1989–1998), and also appeared in a recurring role on its parent series "Perfect Strangers". From 2001 to 2005, Payton provided the voice for Suga Mama Proud on Bruce W. Smith's Disney Channel's "The Proud Family". The role earned her an NAACP Image Award nomination in 2005. Payton also had a recurring role as the personal assistant to Gregory Hines' character, Ben Doucette (Will Truman's boss), during season two of "Will & Grace" (1999–2000).

Jo Marie Payton was born on August 3, 1950, in Albany, Georgia. Sometime during her early teens, her family relocated to Opa-locka, Florida. Payton attended high school at North Dade Jr./ Sr. High School and later graduated from Miami Carol City Senior High School in 1968. Payton graduated from Albany State University.
Payton's big break came when she was cast as Harriet Winslow, the elevator operator on the ABC sitcom "'Perfect Strangers" in 1987. Her performance was so well received by audiences that she was given her own sitcom, "Family Matters", in 1989. Continuing her character Harriette Winslow from "Perfect Strangers", she played a mother in an African-American middle-class family living in Chicago, Illinois. Payton left "Family Matters" partway through its final season, appearing for the last time on December 19, 1997. Payton's character was played by Judyann Elder in the show's remaining eight episodes. In 2002, Payton appeared on the "TV Moms" episode of the Anne Robinson version of "The Weakest Link", and was the third one voted off. In 2003, Payton and her daughter appeared on a Mother's Day episode of "Lingo", playing against fellow TV mom Meredith Baxter and her daughter. Baxter and her daughter won. In 2005, Jo Marie Payton provided the voice of Suga Mama in "The Proud Family Movie". Her other television credits include "Desperate Housewives", "Reba", "Girlfriends", "Wanda at Large", "Judging Amy", "The Parkers", "Will & Grace", "The Hughleys", "7th Heaven", "Moesha", "The Jamie Foxx Show", "227", "Silver Spoons", "Small Wonder" and "The New Odd Couple". She also appeared in the Canadian TV mini series "The Rev" as Mama. In 2005, Payton co-hosted the 15th Annual NAACP Theatre Awards with Glynn Turman. In August 2009, Payton appeared on "Meet the Browns" as Shirley Van Owen. Payton recently hosted her own show on the Hometeam Network, "Second Chance with Jomarie Payton". In 2012, Payton was in the GMC TV movie special "From This Day Forward".
In 2004, in an effort to help raise funds for Virginia Union University, Payton wrote letters to alumni urging them to donate money in amounts from $18.65 to $186,500, in honor of the University's founding date of 1865. Payton also continued to donate, host charitable events, and support her alma mater of Albany State University while also continuing her education and making a successful career.
Payton is a member of the Alpha Kappa Alpha sorority. In 1999, she released a jazz album, "Southern Shadows". Payton has been married and divorced three times. Her first marriage was to Marc France from 1980 to 1987 with whom she has a daughter with, Chantale France, born 1984. From April 17, 1993 until 1998, Payton was married to Rodney Noble. Shortly after divorcing Noble, Payton married Landrus Clark in 1998; later divorcing in 2004. Payton has been married to Leonard Downs since 2007.

Payton retained her connection to the Peace Corps. In 1981, she spoke about the contribution that volunteers had made around the world, "I think the whole idea of Peace Corps was brought home to me most recently last summer, when there was a terribly damaging hurricane in the Caribbean. Some of the Volunteers who had served with me there were collecting food, clothes and money to send back to the Islanders. Those Volunteers had left the Islands in 1967, but they still had a concern and care about those Islanders. That's what I think is at the heart of the Peace Corps, and that's why the Peace Corps is relevant today." Payton was awarded the Peace Corps Leader for Peace Award in 1988. In 2000, Payton attended the swearing in ceremony for Peace Corps Director Mark L. Schneider.

Once he began to play football, as a junior, he achieved instant success as a running back, running 65 yards for a touchdown on his first high school carry. At , he was not especially large, but his speed and strength made him one of the team's featured players. John J. Jefferson High School was integrated with neighboring Columbia High School that year; Payton and his teammates were upset that their head coach, Charles L. Boston, had become an assistant and Payton boycotted some of the spring practices in protest, but returned during the fall season. He then earned statewide honors as a member of Mississippi's all-state team, leading Columbia to an unexpected 8–2 season. His performance helped ease the local tensions surrounding desegregation. Tommy Davis, Columbia's football coach, claimed that he could always count on Payton when the team needed to score. Payton's statistics proved that was no exaggeration: he scored in every game during his junior and senior years. He was named to the all-conference team two years in a row. Payton also led the Little Dixie Conference in scoring his senior year and made the all-state team. In addition to excelling at football, Payton averaged 18 points a game for Columbia's basketball team, leaped three-quarters of an inch short of 23 feet in the long jump, played baseball, and continued to drum in the school band.

Estella Payton sometimes Estelle Payton (August 17, 1904 – December 16, 1999) was a co-star on the "Woman's World" cooking show that aired on WKRG-TV in Mobile, Alabama for decades. Payton, an African American woman, appeared with Connie Bea Hope, a white woman, on the show starting in 1956. In the early years, Payton did not appear on camera unless her hands slipped into the shot while setting up or removing utensils. Later, in the 1960s, Payton began to appear on air and she eventually received third billing on the program's opening titles, was given her own microphone, and offered comments on Hope's demonstrations. The two women were known in the station for their usually good-natured backstage squabbles.

While still at the firm, Payton was tapped to be the lead counsel for the University of Michigan in defending its law and undergraduate schools' use of race in their admissions processes. For more than six years, Payton handled the two high-profile cases in the trial court and in the court of appeals, and argued "Gratz v. Bollinger" before the Supreme Court. He organized a broad coalition from higher education, the military and top businesses in support of diversity initiatives. In a narrow decision in "Grutter v. Bollinger", the Supreme Court upheld the use of race in college admissions.

One of the main highlights of Payton's career was his role as the fourth President of Tuskegee University, a role which he held for 29 years. Tuskegee University is a private and historically black university located in Tuskegee, Alabama. Within his second year as President, Payton worked for Vice President George H.W. Bush as educational advisor to Africa. His next major task as President was changing the name of the school from Tuskegee Institute to Tuskegee University in 1985. In 1996, Payton created the Tuskegee Syphilis Legacy Committee. Payton founded this committee in order to educate the government under President Bill Clinton and receive an apology for the use of African Americans as test subjects for 40 years on degenerative effects of diseases. Under Payton's tenure at Tuskegee, over $160 million was raised for campus endowment and the creation of its initial PhD program. He was also responsible for major restructuring of the campus, inclusive of new roadways, library, classroom buildings, residence halls, campus entrances, and a complete fence with gates surrounding campus.
Payton married his spouse, Thelma Loiuse Plane, in 1959 after meeting at Columbia University. They were married at the Riverside Church in New York City and were married for 54 years until her death in June 2013. Together, they had two children; one son, Mark Steven Payton and one daughter, Deborah Elizabeth Payton. Dr. Payton later died on September 28, 2016 in Estero, Florida.
question_src: Ni nani alikuwa kiongozi mkuu wa kike huko Payton Mahali?
pos_context_src: Katika sehemu ya kwanza, Dk Michael Rossi (Ed Nelson) anawasili kutoka New York City kuanzisha mazoezi jijini. Mhariri wa gazeti Matthew Swain (Warner Anderson) anamwambia watu kawaida hujaribu kutoka mbali na miji kama Peyton Mahali, sio kuhamia kwao. Binamu wa tatu wa Mathayo Allison Mackenzie (Mia Farrow), rafiki wa karibu wa mwanafunzi mwenzake Norman Harrington (Christopher Connelly), ameanza kupendana na kaka yake mkubwa, Rodney (Ryan O'Neal); Yeye hupigwa mara tu wanaposhiriki busu yao ya kwanza. Mwisho wa sehemu hiyo, mama ya Allison, Constance (Dorothy Malone), anaweka wazi kwamba hakubali uhusiano mpya wa binti yake na Rodney.
neg_context_src: Payton alianza huko Peace Corps kama afisa wa mgawo wa shamba mnamo 1964 kusaidia kuandaa wanafunzi kutumikia Afrika Magharibi. Payton alisafiri sana kwa Peace Corps kufanya vipimo vya kisaikolojia, mahojiano, uchunguzi wa kliniki na hakiki za rika kusaidia kuamua hali ambayo itasababisha uzoefu wa kuridhisha zaidi kwa watu wa kujitolea wa Peace Corps. Mnamo 1966 aliteuliwa kuwa mkurugenzi msaidizi wa nchi ya Karibiani na mnamo 1967 aliteuliwa kama mkurugenzi wa nchi kwa mkoa wa Karibiani anayesimamia wafanyakazi wa kujitolea 130 waliohusika katika miradi ya elimu kwenye visiwa nane katika Karibiani ya Mashariki. Wakati huo alikuwa mmoja wa wanawake wawili ambao walikuwa wakurugenzi wa nchi.

Silaha kuu ya kukera ya Chicago ilikuwa Payton na mchezo wa kukimbia. Sababu kubwa ya kufanikiwa kwa Payton ilikuwa kurudi nyuma Matt Suhey kama kizuizi cha msingi. Suhey pia alikuwa mtoaji mzuri wa mpira, akikimbilia kwa yadi 471 na kukamata pasi 33 kwa yadi 295. Kukimbilia kwa timu hiyo pia kulisaidiwa na Pro Bowlers Jim Covert na Jay Hilgenberg na mstari wote wa kukera wa Bears ikiwa ni pamoja na Mark Bortz, Keith Van Horne, na Tom Thayer.

Carolyn Robertson Payton (Mei 13, 1925 - Aprili 11, 2001) aliteuliwa Mkurugenzi wa Amerika ya Peace Corps mnamo 1977 na Rais Jimmy Carter. Alikuwa wa kwanza wa kike na wa kwanza wa Kiafrika kuwa mkurugenzi wa Peace Corps. Payton alikuwa painia katika uongozi wa wanawake weusi ndani ya Jumuiya ya Saikolojia ya Amerika na Saikolojia.

Jo Marie Payton (amezaliwa Agosti 3, 1950) ni mwigizaji na mwimbaji wa Amerika ambaye alikuwa na nyota kama Harriette Baines -Winnslow, matriarch wa familia ya Winslow kwenye ABC/CBS sitcom "Matukio ya Familia" (1989-1998), na pia alionekana katika jukumu la mara kwa mara kwenye safu ya mzazi ".". " Kuanzia 2001 hadi 2005, Payton alitoa sauti ya Suga Mama Proud juu ya Bruce W. Smith's Disney Channel's "Familia ya Proud". Jukumu hilo lilimpatia uteuzi wa tuzo ya picha ya NAACP mnamo 2005. Payton pia alikuwa na jukumu la mara kwa mara kama msaidizi wa kibinafsi wa tabia ya Gregory Hines, Ben Doucette (bosi wa Truman), wakati wa msimu wa pili wa "Will & Neema" (1999-2000).

Jo Marie Payton alizaliwa mnamo Agosti 3, 1950, huko Albany, Georgia. Wakati fulani wakati wa ujana wake, familia yake ilihamia Opa-Locka, Florida. Payton alihudhuria shule ya upili huko North Dade Jr./ Sr. Shule ya Upili na baadaye alihitimu kutoka Shule ya Upili ya Miami Carol City mnamo 1968. Payton alihitimu kutoka Chuo Kikuu cha Jimbo la Albany. Mapumziko makubwa ya Payton yalikuja wakati alipotupwa kama Harriet Winslow, mwendeshaji wa lifti kwenye ABC sitcom "'Perfect Stranger" mnamo 1987. Utendaji wake ulipokelewa vyema na watazamaji hivi kwamba alipewa sitcom yake mwenyewe, "Matukio ya Familia", mnamo 1989. Kuendelea na tabia yake Harriette Winlow kutoka "Wageni kamili", alicheza mama wa African. Payton aliondoka "Matukio ya Familia" kupitia msimu wake wa mwisho, alionekana kwa mara ya mwisho mnamo Desemba 19, 1997. Tabia ya Payton ilichezwa na Mzee wa Judyann katika sehemu nane zilizobaki. Mnamo 2002, Payton alionekana kwenye sehemu ya "TV Moms" ya toleo la Anne Robinson la "Kiunga dhaifu", na alikuwa wa tatu alipiga kura. Mnamo 2003, Payton na binti yake walionekana kwenye kipindi cha Siku ya Mama ya "Lingo", wakicheza dhidi ya mama mwenza wa TV Meredith Baxter na binti yake. Baxter na binti yake walishinda. Mnamo 2005, Jo Marie Payton alitoa sauti ya Suga Mama katika "Sinema ya Familia ya Kiburi". Sifa zake zingine za runinga ni pamoja na "Mama wa Tamaa", "Reba", "Rafiki wa kike", "Wanda kwa Kubwa", "Kuhukumu Amy", "Parkers", "Will & Neema", "Hughleys", "Mbingu ya 7", "Moesha", "Jamie Foxx Show", "227", "Silver Spoons", "Wanandoa" na "." Alionekana pia katika safu ya Mini ya TV ya Canada "The Rev" kama Mama. Mnamo 2005, Payton alishiriki tuzo za 15 za TheacP Theatre za mwaka na Glynn Turman. Mnamo Agosti 2009, Payton alionekana kwenye "Kutana na Brows" kama Shirley van Owen. Hivi karibuni Payton alishiriki onyesho lake mwenyewe kwenye Mtandao wa Hometeam, "Nafasi ya Pili na Jomarie Payton". Mnamo mwaka wa 2012, Payton alikuwa katika sinema ya GMC TV maalum "Kuanzia leo mbele". Mnamo 2004, Katika kujaribu kusaidia kuongeza pesa kwa Chuo Kikuu cha Virginia Union, Payton aliandika barua kwa alumni akiwasihi watoe pesa kwa kiasi kutoka $ 18.65 hadi $ 186,500, kwa heshima ya tarehe ya mwanzilishi ya chuo kikuu cha 1865. Payton pia aliendelea kutoa, kufanya kazi za hisani, na kumuunga mkono Mater ya Alma ya Chuo Kikuu cha Jimbo la Albany wakati pia akiendelea kutoa kazi yake na kufanya kazi ya hisani, na kumuunga mkono Mater ya Alma ya Chuo Kikuu cha Jimbo la Albany wakati pia aliendelea kutoa kazi yake, mwenyeji wa kufanikiwa. Payton ni mwanachama wa Sorority ya Alpha Kappa Alpha. Mnamo mwaka wa 1999, aliachia albamu ya jazba, "Vivuli vya Kusini". Payton ameolewa na talaka mara tatu. Ndoa yake ya kwanza ilikuwa kwa Marc Ufaransa kutoka 1980 hadi 1987 ambaye ana binti naye, Chantale Ufaransa, alizaliwa 1984. Kuanzia Aprili 17, 1993 hadi 1998, Payton alikuwa ameolewa na Rodney Noble. Muda kidogo baada ya talaka Noble, Payton alifunga ndoa na Landrus Clark mnamo 1998; Talaka baadaye mnamo 2004. Payton ameolewa na Leonard Downs tangu 2007.

Payton alihifadhi uhusiano wake na Corps ya Amani. Mnamo 1981, alizungumza juu ya mchango ambao wafanyakazi wa kujitolea walikuwa wamefanya ulimwenguni kote, "Nadhani wazo zima la Peace Corps lilifikishwa nyumbani kwangu hivi karibuni majira ya joto, wakati kulikuwa na kimbunga kilichoharibu sana huko Karibiani. Baadhi ya watu waliojitolea ambao walikuwa wamewahudumia Waliokuwa na Wale Waliokuwa na Wasio Waliokuwa Walifanya Waliyokuwa Walifanya Waliyokuwa Waliyokuwa Waliyokuwa Waliyokuwa Waliyokuwa Waliyokuwa Waliyokuwa na Wale Waliokuwa na Wale Waliokuwa na Wale Waliokuwa na Wale Waliokuwa na Wale Waliokuwa na Wale Waliokuwa na Wakuu wa Walinzi Wao Waliokuwa Waliacha Waliokuwa na Waandishi Wao Waliokuwa Waliacha Waliokuwa na Wakuu wa Waandishi Wao Waliacha Waliokuwa na Waandishi Wao Waliokuwa Waliacha Vilands Wao Waliacha Waliokuwa na Wakuu wa Waandishi Wao Waliokuwa na Waandishi Wao Waliacha Waasi Waoji Waliacha Waandishi Wao Waliacha Waasi Waliondoka Nadhani iko moyoni mwa Corps ya Amani, na ndio sababu Peace Corps inafaa leo. " Payton alipewa tuzo ya Amani Corps kwa Tuzo ya Amani mnamo 1988. Mnamo 2000, Payton alihudhuria sherehe hiyo ya Sherehe ya Mkurugenzi wa Peace Corps Mark L. Schneider.

Mara tu alipoanza kucheza mpira wa miguu, kama junior, alipata mafanikio ya papo hapo kama kurudi nyuma, akiendesha yadi 65 kwa kugusa juu ya kubeba shule ya upili ya kwanza. Katika, hakuwa mkubwa sana, lakini kasi yake na nguvu zake zilimfanya kuwa mmoja wa wachezaji wa timu hiyo. Shule ya Upili ya John J. Jefferson iliunganishwa na Shule ya Upili ya Columbia mwaka huo; Payton na wachezaji wenzake walikasirika kwamba kocha wao mkuu, Charles L. Boston, alikuwa msaidizi na Payton aligonga mazoea kadhaa ya msimu wa maandamano, lakini alirudi wakati wa msimu wa msimu. Kisha alipata heshima za serikali nzima kama mshiriki wa timu ya serikali ya Mississippi, akiongoza Columbia kwa msimu 8-2 usiotarajiwa. Utendaji wake ulisaidia kupunguza mvutano wa ndani unaozunguka uboreshaji. Tommy Davis, mkufunzi wa mpira wa miguu wa Colombia, alidai kwamba kila wakati angeweza kumtegemea Payton wakati timu inahitaji kupata alama. Takwimu za Payton zilithibitisha kwamba hiyo haikuwa ya kuzidisha: alifunga katika kila mchezo wakati wa miaka yake ya juu na ya juu. Alipewa jina la timu ya mkutano wote miaka miwili mfululizo. Payton pia aliongoza Mkutano mdogo wa Dixie katika kufunga mwaka wake wa juu na kufanya timu ya Jimbo All. Mbali na bora katika mpira wa miguu, Payton alizidisha alama 18 kwa timu ya mpira wa kikapu ya Colombia, akaruka robo tatu ya inchi fupi ya miguu 23 kwenye kuruka kwa muda mrefu, akacheza baseball, na aliendelea kupiga ngoma kwenye bendi ya shule.

Estella Payton wakati mwingine Estelle Payton (Agosti 17, 1904-Desemba 16, 1999) alikuwa nyota kwenye onyesho la "Women World" la kupikia ambalo lilirushwa kwenye WKRG-TV huko Simu, Alabama kwa miongo kadhaa. Payton, mwanamke wa Kiafrika wa Amerika, alionekana na Connie Bea Hope, mwanamke mweupe, kwenye onyesho lililoanza mnamo 1956. Katika miaka ya mapema, Payton hakuonekana kwenye kamera isipokuwa mikono yake iliingia kwenye risasi wakati wa kusanidi au kuondoa vyombo. Baadaye, katika miaka ya 1960, Payton alianza kuonekana hewani na mwishowe alipokea malipo ya tatu kwenye majina ya ufunguzi wa programu hiyo, alipewa kipaza sauti yake mwenyewe, na akatoa maoni juu ya maandamano ya Tumaini. Wanawake hao wawili walijulikana katika kituo hicho kwa washambuliaji wao wa kawaida wa kawaida wenye tabia nzuri.

Wakati bado yuko kwenye kampuni hiyo, Payton aligongwa kuwa ushauri wa kuongoza kwa Chuo Kikuu cha Michigan katika kutetea sheria zake na utumiaji wa shule za shahada ya kwanza katika michakato yao ya uandikishaji. Kwa zaidi ya miaka sita, Payton alishughulikia kesi hizo mbili za hali ya juu katika korti ya kesi na katika korti ya rufaa, na akasema "Gratz v. Bollinger" mbele ya Mahakama Kuu. Alipanga umoja mpana kutoka kwa elimu ya juu, biashara za kijeshi na za juu ili kuunga mkono mipango ya utofauti. Katika uamuzi mwembamba katika "Grutter v. Bollinger", Mahakama Kuu ilisisitiza matumizi ya mbio katika uandikishaji wa vyuo vikuu.

Mojawapo ya muhtasari kuu wa kazi ya Payton ilikuwa jukumu lake kama rais wa nne wa Chuo Kikuu cha Tuskegee, jukumu ambalo alishikilia kwa miaka 29. Chuo Kikuu cha Tuskegee ni chuo kikuu cha kibinafsi na kihistoria kilichopo Tuskegee, Alabama. Katika mwaka wake wa pili kama rais, Payton alifanya kazi kwa Makamu wa Rais George H.W. Bush kama Mshauri wa Kielimu kwa Afrika. Kazi yake kuu iliyofuata kama rais ilikuwa ikibadilisha jina la shule hiyo kutoka Taasisi ya Tuskegee kuwa Chuo Kikuu cha Tuskegee mnamo 1985. Mnamo 1996, Payton aliunda Kamati ya Urithi ya Tuskegee Syphilis. Payton alianzisha kamati hii ili kuelimisha serikali chini ya Rais Bill Clinton na kupokea msamaha kwa matumizi ya Wamarekani wa Kiafrika kama masomo ya mtihani kwa miaka 40 juu ya athari mbaya za magonjwa. Chini ya umiliki wa Payton huko Tuskegee, zaidi ya dola milioni 160 zilitolewa kwa uwekaji wa chuo kikuu na uundaji wa mpango wake wa kwanza wa PhD. Pia alikuwa na jukumu la urekebishaji mkubwa wa chuo hicho, pamoja na barabara mpya, maktaba, majengo ya darasa, kumbi za makazi, viingilio vya chuo kikuu, na uzio kamili na milango iliyozunguka chuo kikuu.
Payton alioa mwenzi wake, Thelma Loiuse Plane, mnamo 1959 baada ya kukutana katika Chuo Kikuu cha Columbia. Waliolewa katika Kanisa la Riverside huko New York City na waliolewa kwa miaka 54 hadi kifo chake mnamo Juni 2013. Pamoja, walikuwa na watoto wawili; Mwana mmoja, Mark Steven Payton na binti mmoja, Deborah Elizabeth Payton. Dk Payton baadaye alikufa mnamo Septemba 28, 2016 huko Estero, Florida.
report_src: Kiongozi mkuu wa kike katika mfululizo wa “Mahali pa Peyton” alikuwa Allison Mackenzie, ambaye aliigizwa na Mia Farrow [1].
all_claims: Kiongozi mkuu wa kike katika mfululizo wa “Mahali pa Peyton” alikuwa Allison Mackenzie, ambaye aliigizwa na Mia Farrow [1].

question_en: Who is the leader of Fancy Bear?
pos_context_en: The group is also suspected to be behind a spear phishing attack in August 2016 on members of the Bundestag and multiple political parties such as Linken-faction leader Sahra Wagenknecht, Junge Union and the CDU of Saarland. Authorities feared that sensitive information could be gathered by hackers to later manipulate the public ahead of elections such as Germany's next federal election which was due in September 2017.
neg_context_en: From mid-2014 until the fall of 2017, Fancy Bear targeted numerous journalists in the United States, Ukraine, Russia, Moldova, the Baltics, and other countries that had provided articles discrediting Putin and the Kremlin. According to the AP and SecureWorks, this group of journalists is the third largest group targeted by Fancy Bear after diplomatic personnel and U.S. Democrats. Fancy Bear's targeted list includes Adrian Chen, the Armenian journalist Maria Titizian, Eliot Higgins at Bellingcat, Ellen Barry and at least 50 other New York Times reporters, at least 50 foreign correspondents based in Moscow who worked for independent news outlets, Josh Rogin, a Washington Post columnist, Shane Harris, a Daily Beast writer who in 2015 covered intelligence issues, Michael Weiss, a CNN security analyst, Jamie Kirchick with the Brookings Institution, 30 media targets in Ukraine, many at the Kyiv Post, reporters who covered the Russian-backed war in eastern Ukraine, as well as in Russia where the majority of journalists targeted by the hackers worked for independent news (e.g. Novaya Gazeta or Vedomosti) such as at and mainstream Russian journalists Tina Kandelaki, Ksenia Sobchak, and the Russian television anchor , all of which worked for Dozhd.

All groups have a common hierarchy: in charge is the group father, previously often a noble but now most likely to be a well-educated male, who manages the finances and venues as well as the welfare of members in general. Under him are the band leader, who organises rehearsals and teaches the music, the Fancy Dress leader, who looks after choreography and interviews potential new members, and the group mother, who looks after food and settles disputes. She is also treated as a biological mother by group members. Cowboys are fit and strong members who are answerable to the Fancy Dress leader and look after general members. Then there are scouts, stilt walkers, and general members under the cowboys’ control. Scouts move ahead and solicit money from onlookers for the group.

Likely operating since the mid-2000s, Fancy Bear's methods are consistent with the capabilities of state actors. The group targets government, military, and security organizations, especially Transcaucasian and NATO-aligned states. Fancy Bear is thought to be responsible for cyber attacks on the German parliament, the French television station TV5Monde, the White House, NATO, the Democratic National Committee, Organization for Security and Co-operation in Europe and the campaign of French presidential candidate Emmanuel Macron.

Fancy Bear (also known as APT28, Pawn Storm, Sofacy Group, Sednit and STRONTIUM) is a cyber espionage group. Cybersecurity firm CrowdStrike has said with a medium level of confidence that it is associated with the Russian military intelligence agency GRU. The Foreign and Commonwealth Office, and security firms SecureWorks, ThreatConnect, and Fireeye's Mandiant, have also said the group is sponsored by the Russian government. In 2018, an indictment by the United States Special Counsel identified Fancy Bear as two GRU units known as Unit 26165 and Unit 74455.

Fancy has played diverse roles on stages all around England. He began his professional career by returning to the Chichester Festival Theatre in the repertory company where he had a nightly fight sequence with Donald Sinden in "The Scarlet Pimpernel", directed by Nicholas Hytner. Fancy has acted on the fringe at the White Bear Theatre, King's Head Theatre and twice at the Edinburgh Festival Fringe where he took a one-man Shakespeare-based piece on the subject of Jack Cade, who was the leader of a popular revolt in 1450 during the reign of King Henry VI of England. 
Other leading roles include Bill Sykes in "Oliver Twist" at the Bristol Old Vic directed by Phyllida Lloyd, Dussel in "The Dreams of Anne Frank" at the Polka Children’s Theatre, Willy Mossop in "Hobson’s Choice" at the Derby Playhouse and Bob Cratchit in "A Christmas Carol" at Clwyd Theatr Cymru.

Fancy Bear's targets have included Eastern European governments and militaries, the country of Georgia and the Caucasus, Ukraine, security-related organizations such as NATO, as well as US defense contractors Academi (formerly known as Blackwater), Science Applications International Corporation (SAIC), Boeing, Lockheed Martin, and Raytheon. Fancy Bear has also attacked citizens of the Russian Federation that are political enemies of the Kremlin, including former oil tycoon Mikhail Khodorkovsky, and Maria Alekhina of the band Pussy Riot. SecureWorks, a cybersecurity firm headquartered in the United States, concluded that from March 2015 to May 2016, the "Fancy Bear" target list included not merely the United States Democratic National Committee, but tens of thousands of foes of Putin and the Kremlin in the United States, Ukraine, Russia, Georgia, and Syria. Only a handful of Republicans were targeted, however. An AP analysis of 4,700 email accounts that had been attacked by Fancy Bear concluded that no country other than Russia would be interested in hacking so many very different targets that seemed to have nothing else in common other than their being of interest to the Russian government.

On January 10, 2018, the "Fancy Bears Hack Team" online persona leaked what appeared to be stolen International Olympic Committee (IOC) and U.S. Olympic Committee emails, dated from late 2016 to early 2017, were leaked in apparent retaliation for the IOC's banning of Russian athletes from the 2018 Winter Olympics as a sanction for Russia's systematic doping program. The attack resembles the earlier World Anti-Doping Agency (WADA) leaks. It is not known whether the emails are fully authentic, because of Fancy Bear's history of salting stolen emails with disinformation. The mode of attack was also not known, but was probably phishing.

A website created to leak documents taken in the WADA and IAAF attacks was fronted with a brief manifesto dated September 13, 2016, proclaiming that the site is owned by "Fancy Bears' hack team", which it said is an "international hack team" who "stand for fair play and clean sport". The site took responsibility for hacking WADA and promised that it would provide "sensational proof of famous athletes taking doping substances", beginning with the US Olympic team, which it said "disgraced its name by tainted victories". WADA said some of the documents leaked under this name were forgeries, and that data had been changed.

Network security firm FireEye released a detailed report on Fancy Bear in October 2014. The report designated the group as "Advanced Persistent Threat 28" (APT28) and described how the hacking group used zero-day exploits of the Microsoft Windows operating system and Adobe Flash. The report found operational details indicating that the source is a "government sponsor based in Moscow". Evidence collected by FireEye suggested that Fancy Bear's malware was compiled primarily in a Russian-language build environment and occurred mainly during work hours paralleling Moscow's time zone. FireEye director of threat intelligence Laura Galante referred to the group's activities as "state espionage" and said that targets also include "media or influencers."

In February 2017, the General Intelligence and Security Service (AIVD) of the Netherlands revealed that Fancy Bear and Cozy Bear had made several attempts to hack into Dutch ministries, including the Ministry of General Affairs, over the previous six months. Rob Bertholee, head of the AIVD, said on "EenVandaag" that the hackers were Russian and had tried to gain access to secret government documents.
question_src: Je! Kiongozi wa dubu wa dhana ni nani?
pos_context_src: Kikundi hicho pia kinashukiwa kuwa nyuma ya shambulio la ulaghai wa mkuki mnamo Agosti 2016 juu ya washiriki wa Bundestag na vyama vingi vya siasa kama kiongozi wa kikundi cha Linken Sahra Wagenknecht, Junge Union na CDU ya Saarland. Mamlaka yaliogopa kwamba habari nyeti inaweza kukusanywa na watapeli ili kudanganya umma kabla ya uchaguzi kama vile uchaguzi ujao wa shirikisho la Ujerumani ambao ulitakiwa mnamo Septemba 2017.
neg_context_src: Kuanzia katikati ya mwaka wa 2014 hadi msimu wa 2017, Fancy Bear alilenga waandishi wa habari wengi nchini Merika, Ukraine, Urusi, Moldova, Baltics, na nchi zingine ambazo zilikuwa zimetoa nakala za kumkataza Putin na Kremlin. Kulingana na AP na SalamaWorks, kikundi hiki cha waandishi wa habari ndio kundi la tatu kubwa linalolengwa na dubu la dhana baada ya wafanyikazi wa kidiplomasia na Democrats za Merika. Orodha ya walengwa wa Fancy Bear ni pamoja na Adrian Chen, mwanahabari wa Armenia Maria Titizian, Eliot Higgins huko Bellingcat, Ellen Barry na waandishi wengine 50 wa New York Times, angalau waandishi 50 wa kigeni walioko huko Moscow ambaye alifanya kazi kwa maduka ya habari ya kila siku, Maoni ya Waandishi wa Daily, Assed Seconing, Assed Seconing, Assed Seconing, Josh Rogin, Washington Post, Maoni ya Daily Beast, Am Daily Beasts, Josh Rogin, Washington Post. analyst, Jamie Kirchick with the Brookings Institution, 30 media targets in Ukraine, many at the Kyiv Post, reporters who covered the Russian-backed war in eastern Ukraine, as well as in Russia where the majority of journalists targeted by the hackers worked for independent news (e.g. Novaya Gazeta or Vedomosti) such as at and mainstream Russian journalists Tina Kandelaki, Ksenia Sobchak, na nanga ya runinga ya Urusi, yote ambayo yalifanya kazi kwa Dozhd.

Vikundi vyote vina uongozi wa kawaida: anayesimamia ni baba wa kikundi, hapo awali mara nyingi alikuwa mtu mzuri lakini sasa ana uwezekano mkubwa wa kuwa mwanaume aliyeelimika vizuri, ambaye husimamia fedha na kumbi pamoja na ustawi wa washiriki kwa ujumla. Chini yake ni kiongozi wa bendi, ambaye huandaa mazoezi na kufundisha muziki, kiongozi wa mavazi ya dhana, ambaye hutunza choreografia na anahoji washiriki wapya, na mama wa kikundi, ambaye hutunza migogoro ya chakula na kutulia. Yeye pia hutendewa kama mama wa kibaolojia na washiriki wa kikundi. Cowboys ni sawa na wanachama wenye nguvu ambao wanawajibika kwa kiongozi wa mavazi ya dhana na kuwatunza washiriki wa jumla. Halafu kuna skauti, watembea kwa miguu, na washiriki wa jumla chini ya udhibiti wa Cowboys. Scouts husonga mbele na kuomba pesa kutoka kwa watazamaji wa kikundi hicho.

Inawezekana kufanya kazi tangu katikati ya miaka ya 2000, njia za Fancy Bear zinaambatana na uwezo wa watendaji wa serikali. Kikundi kinalenga serikali, jeshi, na mashirika ya usalama, haswa Transcaucasian na majimbo yaliyowekwa na NATO. Fancy Bear inadhaniwa kuwajibika kwa mashambulio ya cyber juu ya Bunge la Ujerumani, kituo cha runinga cha Ufaransa TV5monde, White House, NATO, Kamati ya Kitaifa ya Kidemokrasia, Shirika la Usalama na Ushirikiano huko Uropa na kampeni ya mgombea wa urais wa Ufaransa Emmanuel Macron.

Fancy Bear (pia inajulikana kama APT28, Pawn Storm, Sofacy Group, Sednit na Strontium) ni kikundi cha cyber espionage. Kampuni ya cybersecurity CrowdStrike imesema na kiwango cha kati cha ujasiri kwamba inahusishwa na shirika la ujasusi la jeshi la Urusi GRU. Ofisi ya Mambo ya nje na Jumuiya ya Madola, na usalama wa mashirika ya usalama, Tishio, na fireeye's Mandiant, pia wamesema kikundi hicho kinafadhiliwa na serikali ya Urusi. Mnamo mwaka wa 2018, mashtaka ya Ushauri Maalum wa Merika yaligundua dubu ya dhana kama vitengo viwili vya GRU vinavyojulikana kama Kitengo 26165 na Kitengo 74455.

Fancy amecheza majukumu anuwai kwenye hatua kote Uingereza. Alianza kazi yake ya kitaalam kwa kurudi kwenye ukumbi wa michezo wa Tamasha la Chichester katika kampuni ya repertory ambapo alikuwa na mlolongo wa mapigano ya usiku na Donald Sinden katika "The Scarlet Pimpernel", iliyoongozwa na Nicholas Hytner. Fancy ameigiza kwenye Fringe katika The White Bear Theatre, Theatre ya King na mara mbili kwenye Fringe ya Tamasha la Edinburgh ambapo alichukua kipande cha mtu mmoja Shakespeare juu ya mada ya Jack Cade, ambaye alikuwa kiongozi wa maasi maarufu mnamo 1450 wakati wa utawala wa Mfalme Henry VI wa England. 
Majukumu mengine yanayoongoza ni pamoja na Bill Sykes katika "Oliver Twist" huko Bristol Old Vic iliyoongozwa na Phyllida Lloyd, Dussel katika "Ndoto za Anne Frank" katika ukumbi wa michezo wa watoto wa Polka, Willy Mossop katika "Chaguo la Hobson" huko Derby Playhouse na Bob Cratchit katika "Krismasi Carlol" huko Clwyd Tho.

Malengo ya Fancy Bear yamejumuisha serikali na wanamgambo wa Ulaya ya Mashariki, nchi ya Georgia na Caucasus, Ukraine, mashirika yanayohusiana na usalama kama NATO, pamoja na wakandarasi wa ulinzi wa Amerika Academi (zamani inayojulikana kama Nyeusi), Maombi ya Sayansi ya Kimataifa (SAIC), Boeing, Lockheed Martin, na Raytheon. Fancy Bear pia ameshambulia raia wa Shirikisho la Urusi ambalo ni maadui wa kisiasa wa Kremlin, pamoja na tycoon wa zamani wa mafuta Mikhail Khodorkovsky, na Maria Alekhina wa bendi ya Pussy Riot. SalamaWorks, kampuni ya cybersecurity iliyoelekezwa nchini Merika, ilihitimisha kuwa kuanzia Machi 2015 hadi Mei 2016, orodha ya malengo ya "Fancy Bear" haikujumuisha tu Kamati ya Kitaifa ya Kidemokrasia ya Merika, lakini makumi ya maelfu ya maadui wa Putin na Kremlin huko Merika, Ukraine, Urusi, Georgia, na Syria. Ni wachache tu wa Republican waliolengwa. Mchanganuo wa AP wa akaunti 4,700 za barua pepe ambazo zilishambuliwa na Fancy Bear zilihitimisha kuwa hakuna nchi nyingine isipokuwa Urusi ingekuwa na nia ya kuvinjari malengo mengi tofauti ambayo yalionekana kuwa na kitu kingine chochote isipokuwa kwao kwa kupendezwa na serikali ya Urusi.

Mnamo Januari 10, 2018, Timu ya "Fancy Bears Hack" mtandaoni ilivuja kile kilichoonekana kuwa kilichoibiwa kamati ya kimataifa ya Olimpiki (IOC) na barua pepe za Olimpiki za Merika, zilizoanzia mwishoni mwa mwaka wa 2016 hadi mapema 2017, zilivuja kwa kulipiza kisasi kwa marufuku ya IOC ya wanariadha wa Urusi. Shambulio hilo linafanana na Uvujaji wa Dunia wa Kupambana na Doping World (WADA). Haijulikani ikiwa barua pepe ni za kweli, kwa sababu ya historia ya dhana ya kubeba barua pepe zilizoibiwa na disinformation. Njia ya shambulio pia haikujulikana, lakini labda ilikuwa ulaghai.

Wavuti iliyoundwa ili kuvuja nyaraka zilizochukuliwa katika shambulio la WADA na IAAF zilitanguliwa na manifesto fupi ya tarehe 13 Septemba, 2016, ikitangaza kwamba tovuti hiyo inamilikiwa na "timu ya Fancy Bears", ambayo ilisema ni "timu ya kimataifa ya utapeli" ambao "wanasimama kwa mchezo mzuri na mchezo safi". Tovuti ilichukua jukumu la kuvinjari WADA na kuahidi kwamba itatoa "uthibitisho wa kihemko wa wanariadha maarufu kuchukua vitu vya kuzamisha", kuanzia na timu ya Olimpiki ya Amerika, ambayo ilisema "ilidhalilisha jina lake na Ushindi uliochafuliwa". Wada alisema baadhi ya hati zilizovuja chini ya jina hili zilikuwa za kughushi, na kwamba data ilibadilishwa.

Kampuni ya usalama wa mtandao FireEye ilitoa ripoti ya kina juu ya dubu ya dhana mnamo Oktoba 2014. Ripoti hiyo iliteua kikundi hicho kama "Advanced Tishio la Advanced 28" (APT28) na kuelezea jinsi kikundi cha utapeli kilitumia unyonyaji wa siku ya sifuri ya mfumo wa uendeshaji wa Microsoft Windows na Adobe Flash. Ripoti hiyo ilipata maelezo ya kiutendaji yanayoonyesha kuwa chanzo hicho ni "mdhamini wa serikali huko Moscow". Ushahidi uliokusanywa na FireEye ulipendekeza kwamba programu hasidi ya Fancy Bear iliundwa hasa katika mazingira ya kujenga lugha ya Kirusi na ilitokea wakati wa masaa ya kazi yanayofanana na eneo la wakati wa Moscow. Mkurugenzi wa Fireeye wa Ushauri wa Tishio Laura Galante alirejelea shughuli za kikundi hicho kama "hali ya hali" na akasema kwamba malengo pia ni pamoja na "vyombo vya habari au watendaji."

Mnamo Februari 2017, Huduma ya Ushauri na Usalama Mkuu (AIVD) ya Uholanzi ilifunua kwamba Fancy Bear na Bear ya kupendeza walikuwa wamefanya majaribio kadhaa ya kuingia katika wizara za Uholanzi, pamoja na Wizara ya Mambo ya Jumla, katika miezi sita iliyopita. Rob Bertholee, mkuu wa AIVD, alisema juu ya "Eenvandaag" kwamba watekaji nyara walikuwa Warusi na walijaribu kupata hati za serikali za siri.
