question_en: What is the oldest known variety of maize?
pos_context_en: An influential 2002 study by Matsuoka "et al". has demonstrated that, rather than the multiple independent domestications model, all maize arose from a single domestication in southern Mexico about 9,000 years ago. The study also demonstrated that the oldest surviving maize types are those of the Mexican highlands. Later, maize spread from this region over the Americas along two major paths. This is consistent with a model based on the archaeological record suggesting that maize diversified in the highlands of Mexico before spreading to the lowlands.
neg_context_title_en: Agriculture on the prehistoric Great Plains
neg_context_en: The indigenous crops were replaced slowly by other more productive crops developed in Mexico: maize, beans and additional varieties of squash. Maize, or corn, was a relative latecomer to the United States. The oldest known evidence of maize in Mexico dates from 6,700 BCE. The oldest evidence of maize cultivated in the United States is about 2,100 BCE at several locations in Arizona and New Mexico.

The domestication of maize is of particular interest to researchers—archaeologists, geneticists, ethnobotanists, geographers, etc. The process is thought by some to have started 7,500 to 12,000 years ago. Research from the 1950s to 1970s originally focused on the hypothesis that maize domestication occurred in the highlands between the states of Oaxaca and Jalisco, because the oldest archaeological remains of maize known at the time were found there.
Tortillas made with maize (corn) are the oldest variety of tortilla, and remain very popular in Mexico and Central America.

The earliest known dates for maize agriculture on the northern Great Plains are from AD 1000 to 1200. The Missouri River Valley in present-day North Dakota was probably the northern limit of pre-historic maize cultivation on the Great Plains. Prior to cultivation, Indian farmers had to breed maize varieties that would mature in short growing seasons. Prehistoric evidence of maize cultivation north of the border of the United States and Canada on the Great Plains is lacking but by the 1790s maize was being grown by Indian farmers as far north as the mouth of the Red River north of Winnipeg, Manitoba.

Maize has been a staple food for centuries. It is the most planted crop in the Mexican region. The country grows more than 42 different types of maize, each of which has several varieties whose number is estimated at more than 3,000 by the International Center for the Improvement of Maize and Wheat (CIMMYT). The characteristics of each variety depend upon soil conditions, humidity, altitude, and how cultivated. Some of the earliest evidence of maize cultivation suggests that domestication took place in several places at the same time.

During the early Late Woodland period (350–750 CE), maize agriculture is rare. A 2010 analysis of a local stalagmite revealed that Native Americans were burning forests to clear land as early as 100 BCE. Maize agriculture became more commonplace during the Middle Woodland 400 BCE–400 CE, which also saw a flowering of Eastern Agricultural Complex, that is, the increased gardening of indigenous seed crops. Maize came from the southwest to the lower Mississippi Valley. Bean cultivation preceded maize in the upper Ohio Valley. The following Late Prehistoric Woodland people approached solving this problem with the development of the "Three Sisters Crop" method or companion seed sowing. As Dragoo explained, environment affected development in ways of human living. Walton C. Galinat researched maize cultivation in the Eastern United States. These studies include terrain altitude deviation (valley vs ridge flats and plateau frost days) daily temperature changes and the number of days for the growing season comparing variety of maize through time. Early varieties of maize needed considerably more growing days than eight-row maize. In New England maize was well established by 1200 CE and distributions of the Southern Dent Pathway established other varieties of maize after 1500 CE. "Maize (corn) did not make a substantial contribution to the diet until after 1150 B.P." wrote Mills (OSU 2003).

Maize was the single most important staple of the Aztecs. It was consumed at every meal by all social classes, and played a central role in Aztec mythology. To some of the first Europeans, the Aztecs described maize as "precious, our flesh, our bones". It came in a vast number of varieties of various sizes, shapes and colors; yellow, reddish, white with stripes of color, black, with or without speckles and a blue-husked variant that was considered to be particularly precious. Other local and regional varieties must have also existed but few were recorded. Maize was revered to such an extent that women blew on maize before putting it into the cooking pot so that it would not fear the fire, and any maize that was dropped on the ground was picked up rather than being wasted. One of the Aztec informants of the Spanish Franciscan missionary and chronicler Bernardino de Sahagún explained the practice in the following way:

As maize was introduced to new cultures, new uses were developed and new varieties selected to better serve in those preparations. Maize was the staple food, or a major staple – along with squash, Andean region potato, quinoa, beans, and amaranth – of most pre-Columbian North American, Mesoamerican, South American, and Caribbean cultures. The Mesoamerican civilization, in particular, was deeply interrelated with maize. Its traditions and rituals involved all aspects of maize cultivation – from the planting to the food preparation. Maize formed the Mesoamerican people's identity.

Maize is believed to have crossed the Isthmus of Panama around 5,000 years BCE reaching Colombia and later the Ecuadorian coast. Since then, domestication and evolution of native varieties followed this pattern;
question_src: Je! Ni aina gani ya zamani ya mahindi inayojulikana?
pos_context_src: Utafiti wenye ushawishi wa 2002 na Matsuoka "et al". imeonyesha kuwa, badala ya mfano wa nyumba nyingi huru, mahindi yote yalitoka kwa nyumba moja kusini mwa Mexico karibu miaka 9,000 iliyopita. Utafiti pia ulionyesha kuwa aina za zamani zaidi za mahindi ni zile za Nyanda za Juu za Mexico. Baadaye, mahindi yalienea kutoka mkoa huu juu ya Amerika pamoja na njia kuu mbili. Hii inaambatana na mfano kulingana na rekodi ya akiolojia inayoonyesha kwamba mahindi yamegawanywa katika Nyanda za Juu za Mexico kabla ya kuenea kwa maeneo ya chini.
neg_context_title_src: Kilimo kwenye tambarare kubwa za prehistoric
neg_context_src: Mazao asilia yalibadilishwa polepole na mazao mengine yenye tija zaidi yaliyotengenezwa huko Mexico: mahindi, maharagwe na aina ya ziada ya boga. Mahindi, au mahindi, alikuwa jamaa wa Merika kwenda Merika. Ushuhuda wa zamani zaidi wa mahindi katika Mexico ulianza kutoka 6,700 KWK. Ushuhuda wa zamani zaidi wa mahindi yaliyopandwa nchini Merika ni karibu 2,100 KWK katika maeneo kadhaa huko Arizona na New Mexico.

Ukarabati wa mahindi ni ya kupendeza sana kwa watafiti - wanasaikolojia, wanasayansi wa maumbile, ethnobotanists, jiografia, nk Mchakato huo unafikiriwa na wengine wameanza miaka 7,500 hadi 12,000 iliyopita. Utafiti kutoka miaka ya 1950 hadi 1970 hapo awali ulilenga nadharia kwamba mahindi ya mahindi yalitokea katika nyanda za juu kati ya majimbo ya Oaxaca na Jalisco, kwa sababu mabaki ya zamani zaidi ya mahindi yaliyojulikana wakati huo yalipatikana hapo.
Tortillas zilizotengenezwa na mahindi (mahindi) ni aina ya kongwe ya tortilla, na inabaki maarufu sana huko Mexico na Amerika ya Kati.

Tarehe za kwanza zinazojulikana za kilimo cha mahindi kwenye Matawi makubwa ya Kaskazini ni kutoka AD 1000 hadi 1200. Bonde la Mto wa Missouri huko Dakota Kaskazini ya leo labda lilikuwa kikomo cha kaskazini cha kilimo cha mahindi ya kihistoria kwenye Matawi makubwa. Kabla ya kilimo, wakulima wa India walilazimika kuzaliana aina za mahindi ambazo zingekua katika misimu fupi ya kukua. Ushuhuda wa prehistoric wa kilimo cha mahindi kaskazini mwa mpaka wa Merika na Canada kwenye tambarare kubwa unapungukiwa lakini na mahindi ya 1790s yalikuwa yakipandwa na wakulima wa India hadi kaskazini kama mdomo wa Mto Nyekundu kaskazini mwa Winnipeg, Manitoba.

Mahindi yamekuwa chakula kikuu kwa karne nyingi. Ni mazao yaliyopandwa zaidi katika mkoa wa Mexico. Nchi inakua zaidi ya aina 42 za mahindi, ambayo kila moja ina aina kadhaa ambazo idadi yake inakadiriwa zaidi ya 3,000 na Kituo cha Kimataifa cha Uboreshaji wa Mahindi na Ngano (CIMMYT). Tabia za kila aina hutegemea hali ya mchanga, unyevu, urefu, na jinsi inavyopandwa. Baadhi ya ushahidi wa mapema wa kilimo cha mahindi unaonyesha kwamba uhamishaji ulifanyika katika maeneo kadhaa kwa wakati mmoja.

Katika kipindi cha mapema cha marehemu (350-750 CE), kilimo cha mahindi ni nadra. Mchanganuo wa 2010 wa stalagmite ya eneo hilo ilifunua kuwa Wamarekani asili walikuwa wakichoma misitu kusafisha ardhi mapema kama 100 KWK. Kilimo cha mahindi kilikuwa cha kawaida wakati wa katikati mwa Woodland 400 KWK -400 CE, ambayo pia iliona maua ya tata ya kilimo cha Mashariki, ambayo ni, kuongezeka kwa bustani ya mazao ya mbegu asilia. Mahindi yalikuja kutoka kusini magharibi hadi bonde la chini la Mississippi. Ukuzaji wa maharagwe ulitangulia mahindi katika Bonde la Juu la Ohio. Watu wafuatao wa marehemu wa marehemu walikaribia kutatua shida hii na maendeleo ya njia ya "Dada Tatu Mazao" au kupanda mbegu mwenza. Kama Dragoo alivyoelezea, mazingira yaliathiri maendeleo katika njia za maisha ya wanadamu. Walton C. Galinat alitafiti kilimo cha mahindi katika Amerika ya Mashariki. Masomo haya ni pamoja na kupotoka kwa urefu wa eneo (Bonde dhidi ya Ridge Flats na Siku za Frost ya Plateau) mabadiliko ya joto ya kila siku na idadi ya siku kwa msimu wa ukuaji kulinganisha aina ya mahindi kwa wakati. Aina za mapema za mahindi zinahitajika siku zinazokua zaidi kuliko mahindi ya safu nane. Huko New England mahindi ilianzishwa vizuri na 1200 CE na usambazaji wa njia ya kusini ya Dent ilianzisha aina zingine za mahindi baada ya 1500 CE. "Mahindi (mahindi) hayakutoa mchango mkubwa kwa lishe hadi baada ya 1150 b.p." aliandika Mills (OSU 2003).

Mahindi yalikuwa kikuu muhimu zaidi cha Waazteki. Ilitumiwa katika kila mlo na madarasa yote ya kijamii, na ilichukua jukumu kuu katika hadithi za Azteki. Kwa baadhi ya Wazungu wa kwanza, Waazteki walielezea mahindi kama "ya thamani, miili yetu, mifupa yetu". Ilikuja katika idadi kubwa ya aina ya ukubwa tofauti, maumbo na rangi; Njano, nyekundu, nyeupe na kupigwa kwa rangi, nyeusi, na au bila manyoya na lahaja ya rangi ya bluu ambayo ilizingatiwa kuwa ya thamani sana. Aina zingine za ndani na za kikanda lazima pia zilikuwepo lakini ni wachache walirekodiwa. Mahindi aliheshimiwa kwa kiwango ambacho wanawake walipiga mahindi kabla ya kuiweka ndani ya sufuria ya kupikia ili isiogope moto, na mahindi yoyote ambayo yalitupwa ardhini yalichukuliwa badala ya kupoteza. Mmoja wa watoa habari wa Azteki wa mmishonari wa Uhispania wa Uhispania na mwandishi wa habari Bernardino de Sahagún alielezea shughuli hiyo kwa njia ifuatayo:

Kama mahindi yalipoletwa kwa tamaduni mpya, matumizi mapya yalitengenezwa na aina mpya zilizochaguliwa ili kutumika vizuri katika maandalizi hayo. Mahindi yalikuwa chakula kikuu, au kikuu kikubwa-pamoja na boga, viazi za mkoa wa Andean, quinoa, maharagwe, na amaranth-ya watu wengi wa kabla ya Columbian Amerika ya Kaskazini, Mesoamerican, Amerika Kusini, na Karibiani. Ustaarabu wa Mesoamerican, haswa, ulihusiana sana na mahindi. Tamaduni na tamaduni zake zilihusisha nyanja zote za kilimo cha mahindi - kutoka kwa upandaji hadi utayarishaji wa chakula. Mahindi aliunda kitambulisho cha watu wa Mesoamerican.

Mahindi inaaminika kuwa yamevuka isthmus ya Panama karibu miaka 5,000 KWK kufikia Colombia na baadaye pwani ya Ecuadorian. Tangu wakati huo, kutengenezea na uvumbuzi wa aina za asili zilifuata muundo huu;
report_src: Aina ya zamani zaidi ya mahindi inayojulikana ni ile ya Nyanda za Juu za Mexico, ambayo tafiti zinaonyesha kuwa ndiyo toleo la awali kabla ya uenezaji wa zao hilo katika maeneo mengine ya Amerika [1].

question_en: How many pieces are used in backgammon?
pos_context_en: Backgammon is one of the oldest known board games. Its history can be traced back nearly 5,000 years to archeological discoveries in the Middle East, originally in Iran. It is a two player game where each player has fifteen pieces ("checkers") which move between twenty-four triangles ("points") according to the roll of two dice. The objective of the game is to be first to "bear off", i.e. move all fifteen checkers off the board. Backgammon is a member of the tables family, one of the oldest classes of board games.
neg_context_en:
"Tάβλη (tavli)" meaning "table" or "board" in Byzantine Greek, is the oldest game with rules known to be nearly identical to backgammon; it is described in an epigram of Byzantine Emperor Zeno (AD 476–491). The board was the same with 24 points, 12 on each side. As today, each player had 15 checkers and used cubical dice with sides numbered one to six. The object of the game, to be the first to bear off all of one's checkers, was also the same. Hitting a blot, reentering a piece from the bar, and bearing off, all followed the modern rules. The only differences with modern backgammon were the use of an extra die (three rather than two) and the starting of all pieces off the board (with them entering in the same way that pieces on the bar enter in modern backgammon). The name τάβλη is still used for backgammon in Greece, where it is frequently played in town plateias and cafes. The epigram of Zeno describes a particularly bad dice roll the emperor had for his given position. Zeno, who was white, had a stack of seven checkers, three stacks of two checkers and two "blots", checkers that stand alone on a point and are therefore in danger of being put outside the board by an incoming opponent checker. Zeno threw the three dice with which the game was played and obtained 2, 5 and 6. As in backgammon, Zeno could not move to a space occupied by two opponent (black) pieces. The white and black checkers were so distributed on the points that the only way to use all of the three results, as required by the game rules, was to break the three stacks of two checkers into blots, exposing them and ruining the game for Zeno.
The τάβλη of Zeno's time is believed to be a direct descendant of the earlier Roman "Ludus duodecim scriptorum" ("Game of twelve lines") with that board's middle row of points removed, and only the two outer rows remaining. Ludus duodecim scriptorum used a board with three rows of 12 points each with the 15 checkers being moved in opposing directions by the two players across three rows according to the roll of the three cubical dice. Little specific text about the gameplay of Ludus duodecim scriptorum has survived; it may have been related to the older Ancient Greek dice game Kubeia. The earliest known mention of the game is in Ovid's Ars Amatoria (The Art of Love) (written between 1 BC and 8 AD). In Roman times this game was also known as alea, and a likely apocryphal Latin story linked this name, and the game, to a Trojan soldier named Alea.

As a consequence of the reduced number of pieces, many people believe that hypergammon relies more heavily on luck than does backgammon. The lead in a game can swing very quickly. The difficulty of getting two pieces on the same point means that both players nearly always have blots on the board. The combination of the fact that bearing off can be completed with a single lucky roll of doubles and that it is nearly impossible to protect blots from being sent to the bar results in gammons being scored much more often than in backgammon.

The Game of Ur is a race game and it is probably a direct ancestor of the tables, or backgammon, family of games, which are still played today. The Game of Ur is played using two sets of seven checker-like game pieces. One set of pieces are white with five black dots and the other set is black with five white dots. The gameboard is composed of two rectangular sets of boxes, one containing three rows of four boxes each and the other containing three rows of two boxes each, joined together by a "narrow bridge" of two boxes. The gameplay involves elements of both luck and strategy. Movements are determined by rolling a set of four-sided, pyramid-shaped dice. Two of the four corners of each die are marked and the other two are not, giving each die an equal chance of landing with a marked or unmarked corner facing up. The number of marked ends facing upwards after a roll of the dice indicates how many spaces a player may move during that turn. A single game can last up to half an hour and can be very intense.

The approach originated in TD-Gammon (1992). In backgammon, the evaluation of the game situation during self-play was learned through TD(formula_1) using a layered neural network. Four inputs were used for the number of pieces of a given color at a given location on the board, totaling 198 input signals. With zero knowledge built in, the network learned to play the game at an intermediate level.
Backgammon playing pieces may be termed checkers, draughts, stones, men, counters, pawns, discs, pips, chips, or nips.

In backgammon, two players move their pieces in opposing directions, according to the rolls of dice. The use of a doubling cube allows players to increase the stakes of the game. The basis of the modern game can be traced to Medieval and Renaissance sources. Backgammon has been studied considerably by computer scientists, who have developed software that plays at the level of top human players.

The game can also be played on a 6 × 6 board with ten pieces on each side, labeled 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 9, 10, 11, and 12. A pair of 6-sided dice are rolled. The game can also be played in rounds with a doubling cube as in backgammon.

To reduce the possibility of cheating, most good quality backgammon sets use precision dice and a dice cup. This reduces the likelihood of loaded dice being used, which is the main way of cheating in face-to-face play. A common method of cheating online is the use of a computer program to find the optimal move on each turn; to combat this, many online sites use move-comparison software that identifies when a player's moves resemble those of a backgammon program. Online cheating has therefore become extremely difficult.

Russian backgammon is a variant described in 1895 as: "...much in vogue in Russia, Germany, and other parts of the Continent...". Players start with no checkers on the board, and both players move in the same direction to bear off in a common home board. In this variant, doubles are more powerful: four moves are played as in standard backgammon, followed by four moves according to the difference of the dice value from 7, and then the player has another turn (with the caveat that the turn ends if any portion of it cannot be completed).
question_src: Vipande vingapi vinatumika kwenye backgammon?
pos_context_src: Backgammon ni moja wapo ya michezo ya zamani ya bodi inayojulikana. Historia yake inaweza kupatikana nyuma karibu miaka 5,000 kwa uvumbuzi wa akiolojia katika Mashariki ya Kati, asili ya Iran. Ni mchezo wa wachezaji wawili ambapo kila mchezaji ana vipande kumi na tano ("Checkers") ambayo hutembea kati ya pembetatu ishirini na nne ("Pointi") kulingana na safu ya kete mbili. Kusudi la mchezo ni kuwa wa kwanza "kubeba mbali", i.e. kusonga cheki zote kumi na tano kwenye bodi. Backgammon ni mwanachama wa familia ya meza, moja ya darasa kongwe la michezo ya bodi.
neg_context_src: "T magari (tavli)" inamaanisha "meza" au "bodi" katika Byzantine Greek, ni mchezo kongwe na sheria zinazojulikana kuwa sawa na Backgammon; Imeelezewa katika epigram ya Mfalme wa Byzantine Zeno (AD 476-491). Bodi ilikuwa sawa na alama 24, 12 kwa kila upande. Kama leo, kila mchezaji alikuwa na cheki 15 na alitumia kete za ujazo na pande zilizohesabiwa moja hadi sita. Kitu cha mchezo, kuwa wa kwanza kuchukua cheki zote, pia ilikuwa sawa. Kupiga blot, kuweka tena kipande kutoka bar, na kuzaa, wote walifuata sheria za kisasa. Tofauti pekee na backgammon ya kisasa ilikuwa matumizi ya kufa zaidi (tatu badala ya mbili) na mwanzo wa vipande vyote kutoka kwenye bodi (pamoja nao wakiingia kwa njia ile ile ambayo vipande kwenye bar huingia kwenye backgammon ya kisasa). Jina thingsyβλη bado linatumika kwa backgammon huko Ugiriki, ambapo huchezwa mara kwa mara kwenye duka la jiji na mikahawa. Epigram ya Zeno inaelezea kete mbaya sana ambayo Mfalme alikuwa nayo kwa nafasi aliyopewa. Zeno, ambaye alikuwa mzungu, alikuwa na alama ya cheki saba, safu tatu za cheki mbili na "blots" mbili, cheki ambazo zinasimama peke yake kwa uhakika na kwa hivyo ziko katika hatari ya kuwekwa nje ya bodi na ukaguzi wa mpinzani anayeingia. Zeno alitupa kete tatu ambazo mchezo huo ulichezwa na kupata 2, 5 na 6. Kama ilivyo nyuma ya Backgammon, Zeno hakuweza kuhamia kwenye nafasi iliyochukuliwa na vipande viwili vya mpinzani (nyeusi). Cheki nyeupe na nyeusi zilisambazwa sana kwenye vidokezo hivi kwamba njia pekee ya kutumia matokeo yote matatu, kama inavyotakiwa na sheria za mchezo, ilikuwa kuvunja safu tatu za cheki mbili kwenye blots, zikizifunua na kuharibu mchezo kwa Zeno. Wakati wa Zeno inaaminika kuwa kizazi cha moja kwa moja cha "Ludus duodecim script" ("Mchezo wa mistari kumi na mbili") na safu ya katikati ya bodi iliyoondolewa, na safu mbili tu za nje zilizobaki. Ludus duodecim scriptrum alitumia bodi iliyo na safu tatu za alama 12 kila moja na cheki 15 zikihamishwa katika mwelekeo unaopingana na wawili hao Wacheza kwenye safu tatu kulingana na safu ya kete tatu za ujazo. Nakala maalum juu ya mchezo wa michezo wa Ludus Duodecim scriptrum imenusurika; Inawezekana ilihusiana na mchezo wa zamani wa kete wa zamani wa Uigiriki Kubeia. Kutajwa mapema kabisa kwa mchezo huo ni katika Ars Amatoria ya Ars (Sanaa ya Upendo) (iliyoandikwa kati ya 1 KK na 8 BK). Katika nyakati za Kirumi mchezo huu pia ulijulikana kama ALEA, na hadithi inayowezekana ya Kilatini iliunganisha jina hili, na mchezo, kwa askari wa Trojan anayeitwa Alea.

Kama matokeo ya idadi iliyopunguzwa ya vipande, watu wengi wanaamini kuwa hypergammon hutegemea sana bahati nzuri kuliko backgammon. Kuongoza katika mchezo kunaweza kugeuza haraka sana. Ugumu wa kupata vipande viwili kwenye hatua moja inamaanisha kuwa wachezaji wote karibu kila wakati huwa na blots kwenye bodi. Mchanganyiko wa ukweli kwamba kuzaa kunaweza kukamilika na safu moja ya bahati ya mara mbili na kwamba haiwezekani kulinda blots kutokana na kutumwa kwa matokeo ya gammons kuwa alama mara nyingi zaidi kuliko kwenye backgammon.

Mchezo wa ur ni mchezo wa mbio na labda ni babu wa moja kwa moja wa meza, au backgammon, familia ya michezo, ambayo bado inachezwa leo. Mchezo wa UR unachezwa kwa kutumia seti mbili za vipande saba vya mchezo kama wa ukaguzi. Seti moja ya vipande ni nyeupe na dots tano nyeusi na seti nyingine ni nyeusi na dots tano nyeupe. Bodi ya mchezo huo inaundwa na seti mbili za mstatili za masanduku, moja iliyo na safu tatu za masanduku manne kila moja na nyingine iliyo na safu tatu za masanduku mawili kila moja, iliyojumuishwa na "daraja nyembamba" la masanduku mawili. Mchezo wa michezo unajumuisha mambo ya bahati na mkakati wote. Harakati zimedhamiriwa kwa kusonga seti ya kete za upande wa nne, zenye umbo la piramidi. Pembe mbili kati ya nne za kila kufa ni alama na zingine mbili sio, zinampa kila kufa nafasi sawa ya kutua na kona iliyo na alama au isiyo na alama inayoelekea. Idadi ya ncha zilizowekwa alama juu baada ya safu ya kete inaonyesha ni nafasi ngapi mchezaji anaweza kusonga wakati huo. Mchezo mmoja unaweza kudumu hadi nusu saa na unaweza kuwa mkali sana.

Njia hiyo ilianzia TD-Gammon (1992). Katika Backgammon, tathmini ya hali ya mchezo wakati wa kucheza ilijifunza kupitia TD (formula_1) kwa kutumia mtandao wa neural uliowekwa. Pembejeo nne zilitumika kwa idadi ya vipande vya rangi fulani katika eneo fulani kwenye bodi, jumla ya ishara za pembejeo 198. Na maarifa ya sifuri yaliyojengwa ndani, mtandao ulijifunza kucheza mchezo huo kwa kiwango cha kati.
Vipande vya kucheza vya Backgammon vinaweza kuitwa cheki, rasimu, mawe, wanaume, vifaa, pawns, diski, pips, chips, au nips.

Katika Backgammon, wachezaji wawili husogeza vipande vyao kwa mwelekeo unaopingana, kulingana na safu za kete. Matumizi ya mchemraba unaokuwa unaruhusu wachezaji kuongeza viwango vya mchezo. Msingi wa mchezo wa kisasa unaweza kupatikana kwa vyanzo vya medieval na Renaissance. Backgammon imesomwa sana na wanasayansi wa kompyuta, ambao wametengeneza programu ambayo inacheza katika kiwango cha wachezaji wa juu wa wanadamu.

Mchezo pia unaweza kuchezwa kwenye bodi ya 6 × 6 na vipande kumi kila upande, iliyoandikwa 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 9, 10, 11, na 12. Jozi ya kete za upande 6 zimevingirwa. Mchezo pia unaweza kuchezwa kwa raundi na mchemraba unaozidi kuongezeka kama huko Backgammon.

Ili kupunguza uwezekano wa kudanganya, seti nzuri zaidi za nyuma hutumia kete ya usahihi na kikombe cha kete. Hii inapunguza uwezekano wa kete za kubeba zinazotumiwa, ambayo ndiyo njia kuu ya kudanganya katika kucheza kwa uso. Njia ya kawaida ya kudanganya mkondoni ni matumizi ya programu ya kompyuta kupata hoja bora kwa kila zamu; Ili kupambana na hii, tovuti nyingi za mkondoni hutumia programu ya kulinganisha ya hoja ambayo inabaini wakati hatua za mchezaji zinafanana na zile za mpango wa Backgammon. Kudanganya mkondoni kwa hivyo imekuwa ngumu sana.

Backgammon ya Urusi ni lahaja iliyoelezewa mnamo 1895 kama: "... mengi katika Vogue huko Urusi, Ujerumani, na sehemu zingine za bara ...". Wacheza huanza bila kuangalia kwenye bodi, na wachezaji wote wawili hutembea kwa mwelekeo mmoja ili kubeba katika bodi ya kawaida ya nyumbani. Katika lahaja hii, mara mbili ni nguvu zaidi: hatua nne zinachezwa kama ilivyo kwa kiwango cha nyuma, ikifuatiwa na hatua nne kulingana na tofauti ya thamani ya kete kutoka 7, na kisha mchezaji ana zamu nyingine (na pango ambalo zamu inaisha ikiwa sehemu yoyote yake haiwezi kukamilika).
report_src: Katika backgammon, kila mchezaji anatumia vipande kumi na tano, hivyo kwa kuwa mchezo unachezwa na wachezaji wawili jumla ya vipande vinavyotumika katika bodi ni 30 (vipande 15 × wachezaji 2) [1].

question_en: Did Gollum know Bilbo before he was turned?
pos_context_en: The Ring, which Gollum referred to as "my precious" or "precious", extended his life far beyond natural limits. Centuries of the Ring's influence twisted Gollum's body and mind, and, by the time of the novels, he "loved and hated [the Ring], just as he loved and hated himself." Throughout the story, Gollum was torn between his lust for the Ring and his desire to be free of it. Bilbo Baggins found the Ring and took it for his own, and Gollum afterwards pursued it for the rest of his life. Gollum finally seized the Ring from Frodo Baggins at the Cracks of Doom in Orodruin in Mordor, but he fell into the fires of the volcano, where both he and the Ring were destroyed.
neg_context_en: Bilbo Baggins stumbled upon Gollum's lair, having found the Ring in the network of goblin tunnels leading down to the lake. At his wits' end in the dark, Bilbo agreed to a riddle game with Gollum on the chance of being shown the way out of the mountains. In the first edition of "The Hobbit", Gollum's size is not stated. Only in the revised version is it specified that he is small and is actually an unnaturally long-lived Hobbit. Originally he was also characterized as being less bound to the Ring than in later versions; he offered to give the Ring to Bilbo if he lost the riddle game, and he showed Bilbo the way out of the mountains after losing. To fit the concept of the ruling Ring that emerged during the writing of "The Lord of the Rings", Tolkien revised later editions of "The Hobbit": The version of the story given in the first edition became the lie that Bilbo made up to justify his possession of the Ring to the Dwarves and Gandalf. In the new version Gollum pretended that he would show Bilbo the way out if he lost the riddle-game, but he actually planned to use the Ring to kill and eat the hobbit. Discovering the Ring missing, he suddenly realized the answer to Bilbo's last riddle – "What have I got in my pocket?" – and flew into a rage. Bilbo inadvertently discovered the Ring's power of invisibility as he fled, allowing him to follow Gollum undetected to a back entrance of the caves. Gollum was convinced that Bilbo knew the way out all along, and hoped to intercept him near the entrance, lest the goblins apprehend Bilbo and find the Ring. Bilbo at first thought to kill Gollum in order to escape, but was overcome with pity, and so merely leaped over him. As Bilbo escaped, Gollum cried out, "Thief, Thief, Thief! Baggins! We hates it, we hates it, we hates it forever!"

As is told in "The Hobbit", Bilbo found the Ring shortly afterward while lost in the tunnels near Gollum's lair. When "The Hobbit" was written, Tolkien had not yet conceived of the Ring's sinister history. Thus, in the first edition of "The Hobbit", Gollum offers to surrender the Ring to Bilbo as a reward for winning the Riddle Game. When Tolkien revised the nature of the Ring for "The Lord of the Rings", he realized that the Ring's grip on Gollum would never permit him to give it up willingly. Tolkien therefore revised the second edition of "The Hobbit": after losing the Riddle Game to Bilbo, Gollum went to get his "Precious" (as he always called it) so he could kill and eat Bilbo, but flew into a rage when he found the Ring missing. Deducing from Bilbo's last question—"What have I got in my pocket?"—that Bilbo had found the Ring, Gollum chased him through the caves, not realizing that the hobbit had discovered the Ring's powers of invisibility and was following him to the cave's exit. Bilbo escaped Gollum and the goblins by remaining invisible, but when he rejoined Gandalf and the dwarves he was travelling with, he decided not to tell them that the Ring had made him invisible. In fact he told them a story that closely followed the first edition of "The Hobbit": that Gollum had given him the Ring and showed him the way out. Gandalf was not convinced and later forced the real story from Bilbo; he was thus immediately suspicious of the Ring.

The company journeys into the Misty Mountains, where they find themselves amid a colossal battle between Stone Giants. They take refuge in a cave and are captured by Goblins, who take them to their leader, the Great Goblin. Bilbo becomes separated from the Dwarves and falls into a crevice where he encounters Gollum, who unknowingly drops a golden ring. Pocketing the ring, Bilbo finds himself confronted by Gollum. They play a riddle game, wagering that Bilbo will be shown the way out if he wins or eaten by Gollum if he loses. Bilbo eventually wins by asking Gollum what he has in his pocket. Noticing his ring is lost, Gollum realizes that Bilbo possesses it and chases him. Bilbo discovers that the ring grants him invisibility, but when he has a chance to kill Gollum, Bilbo spares his life out of pity and escapes while Gollum shouts his hatred towards the hobbit Baggins.

On the first night of the quest, the entire company is captured by three trolls, who plan to eat them. However, Gandalf arrives, imitating the trolls' voices and causing them to fight amongst themselves until the sun rises, which turns them to stone. As Bilbo searches for supplies in their cave, he meets an injured elf, Lianna (Jennifer Hale), who he assists by finding her healing potion. He also finds a dagger, which he calls Sting. The party then move on to the Elven city of Rivendell, where Elrond tells them of a secret entrance into the Lonely Mountain. They then head to the Misty Mountains. During the night, they are attacked by goblins, and Bilbo is knocked unconscious. He awakens alone and lost. As he wanders through the underground passages, he finds a ring, and encounters a creature named Gollum (Daran Norris). Gollum makes a deal with Bilbo; they will play a game of riddles. If Gollum wins, he will eat Bilbo, but if Bilbo wins, Gollum will show him the way out. Bilbo wins the game, and Gollum says he must get something before he can lead Bilbo out. He then realizes his ring is gone. Bilbo puts the ring on and discovers it makes its wearer invisible. An infuriated Gollum runs to the exit to try to stop Bilbo leaving, unwittingly leading the invisible Bilbo out. He reunites with the dwarves and Gandalf, but the party are then attacked by a groups of goblins and wargs. They climb to the tops of the trees, and are rescued by a band of eagles, who drop them off near Mirkwood Forest.

The scene cuts to Gandalf emerging from Mirkwood's dungeons after interrogating Gollum. Gandalf tells Aragorn that Gollum knows of Bilbo Baggins and The Shire, and explains that he must now go there to warn Frodo. Aragorn suggests sending Frodo to meet him in Bree, and Gandalf readily agrees. The film ends with Gollum speaking to himself in the dungeon, where he vows to kill "Bagginses" and reclaim his "Precious"."The Hunt for Gollum" had a shooting budget of less than £3,000. Location filming took place in North Wales, Epping Forest and Hampstead Heath. 160 people volunteered as crew members for the production. The production design was based on Peter Jackson's "Lord of the Rings" films. Director Chris Bouchard said, "Peter Jackson's individual look was a big inspiration, it's been an adventure for us to play in that world that he created." The film's most difficult production aspect was the title character.

In "The Return of the King", Sam single-handedly rescued Frodo from Cirith Ungol and, dressed in scavenged Orc-armour, the two began to make their way across the plateau of Gorgoroth. They finally arrived, against all odds, at Mount Doom, the only place where the Ring could be destroyed. However, Gollum had secretly followed them all the way, seeking a chance to surprise them and take the Ring. When Frodo and Sam had almost reached their destination, Gollum attacked them, but Frodo threw him down. Sam faced Gollum on his own, letting Frodo continue up the mountain to finish their mission. Like Bilbo and Frodo before him, Sam spared Gollum's life out of pity, and turned his back on the beaten (but still wily) creature and followed Frodo.

In "The Two Towers", Frodo and Sam confronted Gollum in the Emyn Muil; Gollum nearly strangled Sam, but Frodo subdued him with his Elvish sword, Sting, which had once belonged to Bilbo. Frodo tied an Elvish rope around Gollum's ankle as a leash, but the mere touch of the rope pained him. Taking pity on the wretched creature, just as Bilbo once had, Frodo made Gollum swear to help them. Agreeing to the oath, Gollum swore by the "precious" itself, and Frodo released him. The unlikely company, guided by Gollum, made their way to the Black Gate, the main entrance to Mordor. Frodo's kindness brought out Gollum's better nature, and he made at least some effort to keep his promise. Sam, however, despised Gollum upon sight, and often warned Frodo of the creature's deception and slipperiness.

Frodo and Sam made their way through Emyn Muil, followed by the creature Gollum, who had been tracking the Fellowship since Moria, seeking to reclaim the Ring he had possessed for centuries. After Gollum attacked the hobbits, Frodo subdued him with Sting. He then took pity on Gollum, and spared his life (just as Bilbo had done in "The Hobbit"), instead binding him to a promise to guide them through the Dead Marshes to the Black Gate, which Gollum did. Gollum said that there was "another way" into Mordor, and Frodo, over Sam's objections, allowed him to lead them south into Ithilien. It was there that they met Faramir, younger brother of Boromir, who took them to Henneth Annûn. There Frodo allowed Gollum to be captured by Faramir, saving Gollum's life but leaving him feeling betrayed by his "master". After giving them provisions, Faramir allowed the two hobbits and Gollum to go on their way, but warned Frodo of Gollum's treachery.

The group travels into the wild, where Gandalf saves the company from trolls and leads them to Rivendell, where Elrond reveals more secrets from the map. Passing over the Misty Mountains, they are caught by goblins and driven deep underground. Although Gandalf rescues them, Bilbo gets separated from the others as they flee the goblins. Lost in the goblin tunnels, he stumbles across a mysterious ring and then encounters Gollum, who engages him in a game of riddles. As a reward for solving all riddles Gollum will show him the path out of the tunnels, but if Bilbo fails, his life will be forfeit. With the help of the ring, which confers invisibility, Bilbo escapes and rejoins the dwarves, improving his reputation with them. The goblins and Wargs give chase, but the company are saved by eagles before resting in the house of Beorn.
question_src: Je! Gollum alijua Bilbo kabla ya kugeuzwa?
pos_context_src: Pete, ambayo Gollum alitaja kama "ya thamani yangu" au "ya thamani", iliongeza maisha yake mbali zaidi ya mipaka ya asili. Karne nyingi za ushawishi wa pete zilipotosha mwili na akili ya Gollum, na, wakati wa riwaya, "alipenda na kuchukia [pete], kama vile alivyopenda na kujichukia." Katika hadithi yote, Gollum alibomolewa kati ya tamaa yake kwa pete na hamu yake ya kuwa huru. Bilbo Baggins alipata pete na akachukua mwenyewe, na Gollum baadaye akaifuata kwa maisha yake yote. Hatimaye Gollum alinyakua pete kutoka kwa Frodo Baggins kwenye nyufa za adhabu huko Orodruin huko Mordor, lakini alianguka kwenye moto wa volkano, ambapo yeye na pete waliharibiwa.
neg_context_src: Bilbo Baggins alijikwaa juu ya lair ya Gollum, baada ya kupata pete kwenye mtandao wa vichungi vya Goblin vinavyoelekea chini ya ziwa. Mwisho wake gizani, Bilbo alikubali mchezo wa kitendawili na Gollum kwenye nafasi ya kuonyeshwa njia ya kutoka milimani. Katika toleo la kwanza la "The Hobbit", saizi ya Gollum haijaelezewa. Ni katika toleo lililorekebishwa tu ambalo limetajwa kuwa yeye ni mdogo na kwa kweli ni Hobbit isiyo ya kawaida. Hapo awali alikuwa na sifa ya kuwa amefungwa sana kwenye pete kuliko matoleo ya baadaye; Alijitolea kutoa pete kwa Bilbo ikiwa amepoteza mchezo wa kitendawili, na alionyesha Bilbo njia ya kutoka milimani baada ya kupoteza. Ili kutoshea wazo la pete ya kutawala ambayo iliibuka wakati wa uandishi wa "Bwana wa pete", Tolkien alirekebisha matoleo ya baadaye ya "The Hobbit": toleo la hadithi lililotolewa katika toleo la kwanza likawa uwongo ambao Bilbo alifanya kuhalalisha milki yake ya pete kwa vibanda na Gandalf. Katika toleo jipya Gollum alijifanya angeonyesha Bilbo njia ya kutoka ikiwa atapoteza mchezo wa kitendawili, lakini kwa kweli alipanga kutumia pete kuua na kula hobbit. Kugundua pete haipo, ghafla aligundua jibu la kitendawili cha mwisho cha Bilbo - "Nimepata nini mfukoni mwangu?" - na akaruka kwa hasira. Bilbo aligundua kwa nguvu nguvu ya pete ya kutoonekana wakati anakimbia, na kumruhusu kufuata Gollum bila kutambuliwa kwa mlango wa nyuma wa mapango. Gollum alikuwa ameshawishika kwamba Bilbo alijua njia ya nje wakati wote, na alitarajia kumkataza karibu na mlango, isije goblins kumkamata Bilbo na kupata pete. Mwanzoni Bilbo alifikiria kumuua Gollum ili kutoroka, lakini alishikwa na huruma, na kwa hivyo akaruka juu yake tu. Kama Bilbo alitoroka, Gollum alilia, "Mwizi, mwizi, mwizi! Baggins! Tunachukia, tunachukia, tunachukia milele!"

Kama inavyoambiwa katika "The Hobbit", Bilbo alipata pete muda mfupi baadaye wakati amepotea kwenye vichungi karibu na Gollum's Lair. Wakati "Hobbit" iliandikwa, Tolkien alikuwa bado hajachukua mimba ya historia mbaya ya pete. Kwa hivyo, katika toleo la kwanza la "The Hobbit", Gollum inatoa kutoa pete kwa Bilbo kama thawabu ya kushinda mchezo wa kitendawili. Wakati Tolkien alirekebisha asili ya pete kwa "Bwana wa pete", aligundua kuwa mtego wa pete juu ya Gollum hautamruhusu kamwe atoe kwa hiari. Kwa hivyo Tolkien alirekebisha toleo la pili la "The Hobbit": Baada ya kupoteza mchezo wa kitendawili kwenda Bilbo, Gollum alikwenda kupata "thamani" yake (kama alivyoiita kila wakati) ili aweze kuua na kula Bilbo, lakini akaruka kwa hasira wakati alipopata pete haipo. Kujitolea kutoka kwa swali la mwisho la Bilbo - "Nimepata nini mfukoni mwangu?" - kwamba Bilbo alikuwa amepata pete, Gollum alimfukuza kupitia mapango, bila kugundua kuwa Hobbit alikuwa amegundua nguvu za pete za kutoonekana na alikuwa akimfuata kwa pango la kutoka. Bilbo alitoroka Gollum na goblins kwa kubaki bila kuonekana, lakini wakati alijiunga na Gandalf na vibanda alivyokuwa akisafiri nao, aliamua kutowaambia kuwa pete hiyo ilimfanya aonekane. Kwa kweli aliwaambia hadithi ambayo ilifuata kwa karibu toleo la kwanza la "The Hobbit": kwamba Gollum alikuwa amempa pete na kumuonyesha njia ya kutoka. Gandalf hakushawishika na baadaye alilazimisha hadithi halisi kutoka kwa Bilbo; Kwa hivyo alikuwa akituhumu pete mara moja.

Kampuni hiyo inasafiri ndani ya Milima ya Misty, ambapo wanajikuta huku kukiwa na vita kubwa kati ya wakuu wa jiwe. Wanakimbilia kwenye pango na wanakamatwa na goblins, ambao wanawapeleka kwa kiongozi wao, Goblin mkubwa. Bilbo hutengwa na vibanda na huanguka kwenye barabara ambayo anakutana na Gollum, ambaye bila kujua anatoa pete ya dhahabu. Kuweka pete, Bilbo anajikuta akikabiliwa na Gollum. Wanacheza mchezo wa kitendawili, wakisisitiza kwamba Bilbo ataonyeshwa njia ya kutoka ikiwa atashinda au kuliwa na Gollum ikiwa atapoteza. Mwishowe Bilbo anashinda kwa kumuuliza Gollum ana nini mfukoni mwake. Kugundua pete yake imepotea, Gollum anatambua kuwa Bilbo anamiliki na kumfukuza. Bilbo anagundua kuwa pete inampa kutokuonekana, lakini wakati ana nafasi ya kumuua Gollum, Bilbo anaokoa maisha yake kwa huruma na kutoroka wakati Gollum anapiga kelele chuki yake kuelekea Hobbit Baggins.

Usiku wa kwanza wa kutaka, kampuni nzima inatekwa na troll tatu, ambao wanapanga kula. Walakini, Gandalf anafika, akiiga sauti za troll na kuwafanya wapigane kati yao hadi jua litakapochomoza, ambalo linawabadilisha kuwa jiwe. Wakati Bilbo anatafuta vifaa kwenye pango lao, hukutana na elf aliyejeruhiwa, Lianna (Jennifer Hale), ambaye husaidia kwa kupata potion yake ya uponyaji. Yeye pia hupata dagger, ambayo yeye huiita Sting. Chama hicho kinaendelea kwenye mji wa Elven wa Rivendell, ambapo Elrond huwaambia juu ya mlango wa siri ndani ya mlima wa Lonely. Kisha wanaelekea kwenye milima ya Misty. Wakati wa usiku, wanashambuliwa na goblins, na Bilbo anagongwa bila fahamu. Anaamka peke yake na kupotea. Wakati anatembea kupitia vifungu vya chini ya ardhi, hupata pete, na anakutana na kiumbe anayeitwa Gollum (Daran Norris). Gollum hufanya mpango na Bilbo; Watacheza mchezo wa vitendawili. Ikiwa Gollum atashinda, atakula Bilbo, lakini ikiwa Bilbo atashinda, Gollum atamuonyesha njia ya kutoka. Bilbo atashinda mchezo, na Gollum anasema lazima apate kitu kabla ya kumwongoza Bilbo. Kisha anatambua pete yake imeenda. Bilbo anaweka pete juu na hugundua inafanya mavazi yake yasionekane. Gollum aliyekasirika anakimbilia kutoka kujaribu kujaribu kuacha Bilbo, bila kujua akiongoza Bilbo asiyeonekana. Anaungana tena na vibete na Gandalf, lakini chama hicho kinashambuliwa na vikundi vya goblins na wargs. Wao hupanda juu ya vilele vya miti, na huokolewa na bendi ya Eagles, ambao huacha karibu na Msitu wa Mirkwood.

Tukio hilo linapunguka kwa Gandalf kutoka kwa shimo la Mirkwood baada ya kuhoji Gollum. Gandalf anamwambia Aragorn kwamba Gollum anajua ya Bilbo Baggins na Shire, na anaelezea kwamba lazima sasa aende huko kuonya Frodo. Aragorn anapendekeza kutuma Frodo kukutana naye huko Bree, na Gandalf anakubali kwa urahisi. Filamu hiyo inaisha na Gollum akizungumza na yeye ndani ya shimo, ambapo anaapa kuua "Bagginses" na kurudisha "thamani" yake. "Uwindaji wa Gollum" ulikuwa na bajeti ya risasi ya chini ya Pauni 3,000. Filamu za eneo zilifanyika huko North Wales, Epping Msitu na Hampstead Heath. Watu 160 walijitolea kama washiriki wa wafanyakazi kwa uzalishaji. Ubunifu wa uzalishaji ulitokana na filamu za Peter Jackson "Lord of the Rings". Mkurugenzi Chris Bouchard alisema, "Mwonekano wa mtu binafsi wa Peter Jackson ulikuwa msukumo mkubwa, imekuwa ni adha kwetu kucheza katika ulimwengu huo aliouunda." Sehemu ngumu zaidi ya utengenezaji wa filamu ilikuwa tabia ya kichwa.

Katika "Kurudi kwa Mfalme", ​​Sam mmoja aliokoa Frodo kutoka Cirith Ungol na, akiwa amevalia mavazi ya Orc-Armour, wawili hao walianza kwenda kwenye uwanja wa Gorgoroth. Mwishowe walifika, dhidi ya tabia mbaya zote, huko Mount Doom, mahali pekee ambapo pete inaweza kuharibiwa. Walakini, Gollum alikuwa amewafuata kwa siri njia yote, akitafuta nafasi ya kuwashangaza na kuchukua pete. Wakati Frodo na Sam walikuwa karibu kufikia marudio yao, Gollum aliwashambulia, lakini Frodo alimtupa chini. Sam alikabili Gollum peke yake, akimruhusu Frodo aendelee mlimani kumaliza misheni yao. Kama Bilbo na Frodo mbele yake, Sam aliokoa maisha ya Gollum kutokana na huruma, na akageuka juu ya kiumbe aliyepigwa (lakini bado ni mwenye nguvu) na akamfuata Frodo.

Katika "Towers mbili", Frodo na Sam waligongana na Gollum katika Emyn Muil; Gollum karibu akampiga Sam, lakini Frodo alimshinda kwa upanga wake wa Elvish, Sting, ambao hapo awali ulikuwa wa Bilbo. Frodo alifunga kamba ya elvish karibu na kiwiko cha Gollum kama leash, lakini mguso tu wa kamba ulimuumiza. Kuchukua huruma juu ya kiumbe mnyonge, kama vile Bilbo alivyokuwa hapo zamani, Frodo alifanya Gollum aape kuwasaidia. Kukubaliana na kiapo, Gollum aliapa na "thamani" yenyewe, na Frodo akamwachilia. Kampuni isiyowezekana, iliyoongozwa na Gollum, ilienda kwa Lango Nyeusi, mlango kuu wa Mordor. Fadhili za Frodo zilileta asili bora ya Gollum, na alifanya angalau juhudi fulani kuweka ahadi yake. Sam, hata hivyo, alimdharau Gollum mbele, na mara nyingi alionya Frodo juu ya udanganyifu wa kiumbe na utelezi.

Frodo na Sam walipitia Emyn Muil, akifuatiwa na kiumbe Gollum, ambaye alikuwa akifuatilia ushirika tangu Moria, akitaka kurudisha pete aliyokuwa nayo kwa karne nyingi. Baada ya Gollum kushambulia Hobbits, Frodo alimshinda na Sting. Kisha akamhurumia Gollum, na akaokoa maisha yake (kama vile Bilbo alikuwa amefanya katika "Hobbit"), badala yake akamfunga kwa ahadi ya kuwaongoza kupitia mabwawa yaliyokufa kwa lango nyeusi, ambalo Gollum alifanya. Gollum alisema kuwa kuna "njia nyingine" ndani ya Mordor, na Frodo, juu ya pingamizi za Sam, walimruhusu kuwaongoza kusini kuelekea Ithilien. Ilikuwa hapo kwamba walikutana na Faramir, kaka mdogo wa Boromir, ambaye aliwapeleka kwa Henneth Annûn. Kuna Frodo alimruhusu Gollum kutekwa na Faramir, akiokoa maisha ya Gollum lakini akamwacha akihisi kusalitiwa na "bwana" wake. Baada ya kuwapa vifunguo, Faramir aliruhusu Hobbits mbili na Gollum kuendelea, lakini alionya Frodo juu ya udanganyifu wa Gollum.

Kikundi kinasafiri ndani ya porini, ambapo Gandalf anaokoa kampuni hiyo kutoka kwa troll na inawapeleka Rivendell, ambapo Elrond anafunua siri zaidi kutoka kwenye ramani. Kupita juu ya Milima ya Misty, wanashikwa na goblins na inaendeshwa chini ya ardhi. Ingawa Gandalf anawaokoa, Bilbo hutengwa na wengine wanapokuwa wakikimbia goblins. Alipotea kwenye vichungi vya Goblin, yeye hujikwaa kwenye pete ya kushangaza na kisha akakutana na Gollum, ambaye humtia katika mchezo wa vitendawili. Kama thawabu ya kutatua vitendawili vyote Gollum vitamuonyesha njia ya nje ya vichungi, lakini ikiwa Bilbo atashindwa, maisha yake yatapotea. Kwa msaada wa pete, ambayo inapeana kutoonekana, Bilbo hutoroka na kuungana tena, akiboresha sifa yake nao. Goblins na wargs hupeana, lakini kampuni imeokolewa na Eagles kabla ya kupumzika katika nyumba ya Beorn.
report_src: Hapana; Gollum (aliyegeuka kutoka kwa Sméagol karne nyingi kabla) hakumfahamu wala kukutana na Bilbo Baggins hadi siku ambayo Bilbo alipoinasa Pete ndani ya mapango chini ya Mlima Mgumu, wakati Gollum alikuwa tayari amepotoshwa na pete na kuishi maisha ya upweke kwa takribani miaka 500; baada ya Bilbo kuichukua pete, ndipo Gollum alianza kumfuatilia “kwa maisha yake yote” akitumaini kuirudisha, jambo linaloonyesha kwamba mawasiliano yao ya kwanza yalikuja baada ya mabadiliko ya Gollum [1].

question_en: What is the population of Gjakova?
pos_context_en: Gjakova () or Đakovica (; sometimes transliterated as Djakovica) is a city and municipality located in the Gjakova District of western Kosovo. According to the 2011 census, the city of Gjakova has 40,827 inhabitants, while the municipality has,94,556 inhabitants.
neg_context_en: According to some statistics in the early 20th century in Gjakova there were 400 craftsmen. The vigorous development of craftsmanship stimulated also the development of trade. "The people of Gjakova have a tendency agriculture, but they are more betrothed to trade. They go to distant places where they open their shops, inns etc. to provide for their living" was written in the yearbook (salname) of the vilayet of Kosova in 1887. The Gjakovar traders and craftsmen used to sell their product not only in Grand Bazaar, but also in many markets in other towns of Ottoman Empire, of Serbia and Austria. According to the facts, in the 1720s, the traders of Pristina and Gjakova transported their goods firstly to Dubrovnik and then to Italy. In 1803 the trader (merchant) from Gjakova, Jonuz Spahiu, had sold 114 bales of small leathers in Venice. In 1827 Salih Gjakova and Kërsto Gjakova sent gunpowder, rifles and flint stone to Sarajevo, whilst a year later, Hasan Gjakova and his nephew Hamza sent three bales of rifles to Serbia. According to the minutes of customs duty (cymryks) of Pozhega, of Aleksinac, of Kragujevac, of Mokra Gora, of Belgrade, etc., the traders from Gjakova sold their goods such as silk galloons, tobacco, rice, maize, eels, razors, soles, double-barrel sporting rifles, pistols, long rifles, cartridges, gunpowder, flint stones, wax, snuff, different leathers, salt, oil, cotton, cotton breast collars, cotton ribbons, silver galloons, scarfs, figs etc. Ali Sulejmani from Gjakova, in 1837, transported 56 loads of sheep leathers and other goods in an amount of 283.38 groshes, through Belgrade to Austria whereas in 1841, Halil Dobruna transported through Serbia to Austria galloons in an amount of 1800 groshes and 21,5 loads of Morocco leather (saftjan).

According to OSCE estimations, before the Kosovo War of 1999 the municipality had a population of about 145,000, of which 93% were Kosovo Albanians and 7% non-majority communities, including some 3,000 Serbs, who mostly lived in the main town.

According to official data, in 2006, there were 581 registered small and medium enterprises, in 2008 there were 3,120 such registered businesses, while in 2012 their number had reached 4,120. Gjakova currently has 12,000 people employed, in both the public and private sector, mostly in the latter. Although unemployment is high, there is a gradual increase of employment over the years according to data from the Kosovo Ministry of Work and Social Wellbeing. According to government statistics, in 2010, 40,000 people were registered as unemployed, while in 2011 this number decreased to 30,000 and in 2012 to 15,000. 30,000 people in Gjakova receive social assistance. This category includes poor families, people with disabilities, families of war veterans/victims and the retired.

According to the 2011 census, the resident population was 94,556, of which urban inhabitants numbered 40,827 and rural 53,729; there were 47,226 males and 47,330 females. The ethnic groups include Albanians (87,672), Balkan Egyptians (5,117), Roma (738), Ashkali (613), and smaller numbers of Bosniaks (73), Serbs (17), Turks (16), Gorani (13) and others. Based on those that answered, the religious make-up was 77,299 Muslims, 16,296 Roman Catholics, 22 Orthodox Christians, 142 others, and 129 irreligious.

According to official sources identified in the Ministry of Trade and Industry, by the end of 2005 there were about 3,200 registered businesses that exercise activity in different areas of Gjakova, such as enterprise manufacturing, construction, service, trade, catering, craft, transportation, information technology, etc. Social economy in 1989 has counted 45 companies that have employed 18,640 workers. In non-economic activities (education, health, culture, government institutions, banks, etc.) there were employed 4000 workers. Furthermore, they also developed the private economy – where in 2010 approximately 920 employees were registered in the business entities. The economy of the municipality of Gjakova suffered mostly during the economic sanctions and the mass violence done by Serbian forces during the war. The situation further during NATO’s intervention as a result of the destructive actions of multiple military and police forces, which have stood and operated in the economic enterprise facilities. This meant that during their withdrawal, these Serbian forces robbed, looted and destroyed most of the assets, inventories, transportation machines, etc. The losses that were done in the social economy as a result of the war were approximately 190 million DEM, whereas in the private economy around 100 million DEM.

Gjakova is mentioned as a city for the first time in 1662, by the Ottoman Turkish traveler Evliya Çelebi, who described it as a flourishing and attractive town consisting of 2,000 houses, all built of stone with roofs and gardens. 
Public buildings were suited on a broad plain and included two richly adorned Congregational mosques, several prayer-houses, some khans with leaden roofs, a delightful bathhouse, and about 300 shops like nightingale-nests.

Dominated by small family businesses, retail stores, cafeterias and providers of basic services, the private sector of Gjakova remains weak. It makes up only 5.5 percent of all businesses registered in Kosovo. According to the Tax Administration Office in Gjakova, 88 to 93 percent of active businesses are businesses with a single owner, five to ten percent are businesses with limited liability and the remaining two percent are large businesses. As in any other place in Kosovo, more than 90 percent of the sector consists of small family businesses which cannot create growth with added value. Only 2 out of 53 studied businesses in the centre of Gjakova declared not having employed any relative.

Historical monuments in Gjakova are divided into three main categories based on their cultural, religious and social context. The core part of the town was created between the Krena River to the east and Cabrati hill to the west. Around the cornerstone of the town, the Old Bazaar - the center of trade and craftsmanship - was created. By 1900, the bazaar housed around 1000 enterprises. Numerous bridges were built to enable the journey of trade caravans across the neighboring rivers. With the fast development of trade in the city, several inns were built to host the many visitors. Because of its ancient origins and fast economic development, Gjakova has become of great historical importance.

British journalist H. Brailsford estimated in 1906 that two-thirds of the population of Kosovo was Albanian and one-third Serbian. The most populous western districts of Gjakova and Peć were said to have between 20,000 and 25,000 Albanian households, as against some 5,000 Serbian ones. A map of Alfred Stead, published in 1909, shows that similar numbers of Serbs and Albanians were living in the territory.
question_src: Je! Idadi ya Gjakova ni nini?
pos_context_src: Gjakova () au đakovica (; wakati mwingine hutafsiriwa kama Djakovica) ni jiji na manispaa iliyoko katika wilaya ya Gjakova ya magharibi ya Kosovo. Kulingana na sensa ya 2011, mji wa Gjakova una wenyeji 40,827, wakati manispaa hiyo ina, wenyeji 94,556.
neg_context_title_src: Historia ya idadi ya watu ya Kosovo
neg_context_src: Kulingana na takwimu kadhaa mwanzoni mwa karne ya 20 huko Gjakova kulikuwa na mafundi 400. Ukuaji mkubwa wa ufundi ulichochea pia maendeleo ya biashara. "Watu wa Gjakova wana kilimo cha tabia, lakini wamejishughulisha zaidi kufanya biashara. Wanakwenda maeneo ya mbali ambapo hufungua maduka yao, nyumba nk kutoa pesa zao" iliandikwa katika kitabu cha mwaka (Salname) ya Vilayet ya Kosova mnamo 1887. Gjakovar Wafanyabiashara na Matumizi ya Matumizi ya watu wengi, kwa watu wengi hutumia pesa nyingi kwa watu wengi katika watu wakubwa kwa watu wengi katika vijio kwa watu wengi katika vilset of cupys of cupys of the cupys of the cumt of of ofs tom in of of of of of of of of ofses waong tu bidhaa za bidhaa za watu wengi wao hutumia bidhaa zao tu, Grands in Madges In. Dola, ya Serbia na Austria. Kulingana na ukweli huo, katika miaka ya 1720, wafanyabiashara wa Pristina na Gjakova walisafirisha bidhaa zao kwanza kwenda Dubrovnik na kisha kwenda Italia. Mnamo 1803 mfanyabiashara (mfanyabiashara) kutoka Gjakova, Jonuz Spahiu, alikuwa ameuza bales 114 za manyoya madogo huko Venice. Mnamo 1827 Salih Gjakova na Kërsto Gjakova walipeleka bunduki, bunduki na jiwe la Flint kwa Sarajevo, wakati mwaka mmoja baadaye, Hasan Gjakova na mpwa wake Hamza walipeleka bunduki tatu kwenda Serbia. Kulingana na Dakika za Ushuru wa Forodha (Cymryks) wa Pozhega, wa Aleksinac, wa Kragujevac, wa Mokra Gora, wa Belgrade, nk, wafanyabiashara kutoka Gjakova waliuza bidhaa zao kama vile galloons, tumbaku, mpunga, mahindi, eels, pickes, mara mbili-barrels spoding, piarels mara mbili, spisels mara mbili, spisels mara mbili, spisels mara mbili. Gunpowder, mawe ya Flint, nta, snuff, ngozi tofauti, chumvi, mafuta, pamba, collars za matiti ya pamba, ribbons za pamba, galoni za fedha, skafu, tini nk. Dobruna kusafirishwa kupitia Serbia kwenda Austria galloons kwa kiasi cha groshes 1800 na mizigo 21,5 ya ngozi ya Moroko (Saftjan).

Kulingana na makadirio ya OSCE, kabla ya Vita vya Kosovo vya 1999 manispaa ilikuwa na idadi ya watu karibu 145,000, kati yao 93% walikuwa Waalbania wa Kosovo na jamii 7 zisizo za watu wengi, pamoja na Waserbia 3,000, ambao wengi waliishi katika mji kuu.

Kulingana na data rasmi, mnamo 2006, kulikuwa na biashara 581 zilizosajiliwa ndogo na za kati, mnamo 2008 kulikuwa na biashara 3,120 zilizosajiliwa, wakati mnamo 2012 idadi yao ilikuwa imefikia 4,120. Gjakova kwa sasa ana watu 12,000 walioajiriwa, katika sekta ya umma na ya kibinafsi, haswa baadaye. Ingawa ukosefu wa ajira uko juu, kuna ongezeko la ajira polepole kwa miaka kulingana na data kutoka kwa Wizara ya Kazi ya Kosovo na Ustawi wa Jamii. Kulingana na takwimu za serikali, mnamo 2010, watu 40,000 walisajiliwa kama wasio na kazi, wakati mwaka 2011 idadi hii ilipungua hadi 30,000 na mnamo 2012 hadi 15,000. Watu 30,000 huko Gjakova wanapokea msaada wa kijamii. Jamii hii ni pamoja na familia masikini, watu wenye ulemavu, familia za veterani wa vita/wahasiriwa na wastaafu.

Kulingana na sensa ya 2011, wakaazi walikuwa 94,556, ambao wenyeji wa mijini walikuwa 40,827 na vijijini 53,729; Kulikuwa na wanaume 47,226 na wanawake 47,330. Makabila hayo ni pamoja na Waalbania (87,672), Wamisri wa Balkan (5,117), Roma (738), Ashkali (613), na idadi ndogo ya Bosniaks (73), Serbs (17), Waturuki (16), Gorani (13) na wengine. Kulingana na wale waliojibu, waundaji wa kidini walikuwa Waislamu 77,299, Wakatoliki 16,296 wa Kirumi, Wakristo 22 wa Orthodox, wengine 142, na 129 wasio na maana.

Kulingana na vyanzo rasmi vilivyoainishwa katika Wizara ya Biashara na Viwanda, mwisho wa 2005 kulikuwa na biashara karibu 3,200 zilizosajiliwa ambazo zinafanya mazoezi katika maeneo tofauti ya Gjakova, kama vile utengenezaji wa biashara, ujenzi, huduma, biashara, upishi, ufundi, usafirishaji, teknolojia ya habari, nk Uchumi wa kijamii mnamo 1989 umehesabu kampuni 45 ambazo zimeajiri wafanyikazi 18,640. Katika shughuli zisizo za kiuchumi (elimu, afya, utamaduni, taasisi za serikali, benki, nk) kulikuwa na wafanyikazi 4000 walioajiriwa. Kwa kuongezea, pia waliendeleza uchumi wa kibinafsi - ambapo mnamo 2010 takriban wafanyikazi 920 walisajiliwa katika vyombo vya biashara. Uchumi wa manispaa ya Gjakova uliteseka sana wakati wa vikwazo vya kiuchumi na vurugu kubwa zilizofanywa na vikosi vya Serbia wakati wa vita. Hali hiyo zaidi wakati wa uingiliaji wa NATO kama matokeo ya vitendo vya uharibifu vya vikosi vingi vya jeshi na polisi, ambavyo vimesimama na kufanya kazi katika vituo vya biashara vya uchumi. Hii ilimaanisha kuwa wakati wa kujiondoa kwao, vikosi hivi vya Serbia viliiba, kupora na kuharibu mali nyingi, hesabu, mashine za usafirishaji, nk hasara ambazo zilifanywa katika uchumi wa kijamii kwa sababu ya vita zilikuwa takriban milioni 190 DEM, wakati katika uchumi wa kibinafsi karibu milioni 100 DEM.

Gjakova ametajwa kama mji kwa mara ya kwanza mnamo 1662, na msafiri wa Ottoman Kituruki Evliya Çelebi, ambaye alielezea kama mji wenye kustawi na wenye kuvutia wenye nyumba 2000, wote waliojengwa kwa mawe na paa na bustani. 
Majengo ya umma yalikuwa yanafaa kwenye bonde pana na ni pamoja na misikiti miwili iliyopambwa sana, nyumba kadhaa za sala, Khans kadhaa zilizo na paa za risasi, bafu ya kupendeza, na maduka 300 kama Nightingale-Viota.

Inatawaliwa na biashara ndogo za familia, duka za rejareja, mikahawa na watoa huduma za msingi, sekta binafsi ya Gjakova inabaki dhaifu. Inafanya asilimia 5.5 tu ya biashara zote zilizosajiliwa huko Kosovo. Kulingana na Ofisi ya Utawala wa Ushuru huko Gjakova, asilimia 88 hadi 93 ya biashara inayofanya kazi ni biashara na mmiliki mmoja, asilimia tano hadi kumi ni biashara yenye dhima ndogo na asilimia mbili zilizobaki ni biashara kubwa. Kama ilivyo katika sehemu nyingine yoyote huko Kosovo, zaidi ya asilimia 90 ya sekta hiyo ina biashara ndogo za familia ambazo haziwezi kuunda ukuaji na thamani iliyoongezwa. Ni biashara 2 tu kati ya 53 zilizosomewa katikati mwa Gjakova zilizotangaza kuwa hazijatumia jamaa yoyote.

Makaburi ya kihistoria huko Gjakova yamegawanywa katika vikundi vitatu kuu kulingana na muktadha wao wa kitamaduni, kidini na kijamii. Sehemu ya msingi ya mji iliundwa kati ya Mto wa Krena kuelekea mashariki na kilima cha Cabrati kuelekea magharibi. Karibu na jiwe la msingi la mji, Bazaar ya zamani - kitovu cha biashara na ufundi - iliundwa. Kufikia 1900, bazaar ilikuwa karibu biashara 1000. Madaraja mengi yalijengwa ili kuwezesha safari ya misafara ya biashara kwenye mito ya jirani. Pamoja na maendeleo ya haraka ya biashara katika jiji, nyumba kadhaa zilijengwa kuwa mwenyeji wa wageni wengi. Kwa sababu ya asili yake ya zamani na maendeleo ya haraka ya kiuchumi, Gjakova imekuwa ya umuhimu mkubwa wa kihistoria.

Mwandishi wa habari wa Uingereza H. Brailsford alikadiria mnamo 1906 kwamba theluthi mbili ya idadi ya watu wa Kosovo ilikuwa ya Albanian na theluthi moja. Wilaya zilizo na watu wengi wa magharibi wa Gjakova na Peć zilisemwa kuwa na kaya kati ya 20,000 hadi 25,000 za Albanian, kama dhidi ya zile za Waserbia 5,000. Ramani ya Alfred Stead, iliyochapishwa mnamo 1909, inaonyesha kwamba idadi kama hiyo ya Waserbia na Waalbania walikuwa wakiishi katika eneo hilo.
report_src: Kwa mujibu wa sensa ya mwaka 2011, jiji la Gjakova lina wakazi 40,827, huku manispaa nzima ikiwa na wakazi 94,556 [1].
all_claims: Kwa mujibu wa sensa ya mwaka 2011, jiji la Gjakova lina wakazi 40,827, huku manispaa nzima ikiwa na wakazi 94,556 [1].

question_en: What's the current population of Demopolis?
pos_context_en: Demopolis is the largest city in Marengo County, Alabama, United States. The population was 7,483 at the time of the 2010 United States Census.
neg_context_en: The Demopolis Times is a daily newspaper serving Demopolis, Alabama with a current circulation of about 1,700. The current editor is Robert Blankenship. In 2018, the paper won six awards from the Alabama Press Association including a second place finish for best business story or column in its class.

The congregation joined the Union of American Hebrew Congregations in 1907. By 1905, Demopolis had a population of around 124 Jews. In 1929 it had increased to 150. By the late 1930s, as was happening in other small Southern towns, the Jewish population had started an exodus to larger cities, with only 90 people remaining. A new, smaller masonry temple was built inside the shell of the 1893 building in 1958. The old temple was demolished after the new one was completed. The Jewish population continued to decline, with only a handful of people remaining by the late 1980s. The deed to Temple B’nai Jeshurun was signed over to Trinity Episcopal Church for $10 in 1989. The church continues to care for the property in 2010, having donated the sanctuary artifacts to the Museum of the Southern Jewish Experience in 2007. As of 2010, the last remaining former B’nai Jeshurun congregant was Bert Rosenbush, Jr, grandson of Julius Rosenbush.

During the 2000 United States Census, there were 7,540 people, 3,014 households, and 2,070 families residing in the city. The population density was 616.4 people per square mile (238.0/km). There were 3,311 housing units at an average density of 270.7 per square mile (104.5/km). The racial makeup of the city was 50.90% Black or African American, 47.75% White, 0.09% Native American, 0.20% Asian, none Pacific Islander, 0.48% from other races, and 0.58% from two or more races. 0.98% of the population were Hispanic or Latino of any race.

During the 2010 United States Census, there were 7,483 people, 3,049 households, and 1,998 families residing in the city. The population density was 613.4 people per square mile (236.1/km). There were 3,417 housing units at an average density of 280.1 per square mile (107.8/km). The racial makeup of the city was 50.1% Black or African American, 47.3% White, 0.1% Native American, 0.5% Asian, none Pacific Islander, 1.1% from other races, and 0.8% from two or more races. 2.4% of the population were Hispanic or Latino of any race.

In the city, the population was spread out with 27.0% under the age of 18, 8.8% from 18 to 24, 24.1% from 25 to 44, 25.3% from 45 to 64, and 14.8% who were 65 years of age or older. The median age was 37.1 years. For every 100 females, there were 80.7 males. For every 100 females age 18 and over, there were 78.2 males.

In the city, the population was spread out with 29.1% under the age of 18, 8.4% from 18 to 24, 26.6% from 25 to 44, 21.6% from 45 to 64, and 14.3% who were 65 years of age or older. The median age was 36 years. For every 100 females, there were 81.5 males. For every 100 females age 18 and over, there were 75.0 males.

The median income for a household in the city was $26,481, and the median income for a family was $35,752. Males had a median income of $37,206 versus $20,265 for females. The per capita income for the city was $16,687. About 26.0% of families and 30.6% of the population were below the poverty line, including 38.3% of those under age 18 and 21.1% of those age 65 or over.

The median income for a household in the city was $35,583, and the median income for a family was $49,973. Males had a median income of $50,734 versus $31,520 for females. The per capita income for the city was $21,116. About 19.1% of families and 26.8% of the population were below the poverty line, including 25.4% of those under age 18 and 27.5% of those age 65 or over.

The colonists, comprising about 200 people, soon established the town of Demopolis, or "City of the People", on top of White Bluff, but following a survey in August 1818, they learned that their actual land grants began less than a mile to the east of their newly cleared land. After abandoning the settlement of Demopolis, they soon established two other towns, Aigleville and Arcola. Aigleville was named in honor of Napoleon's ensign, featuring an eagle. Arcola was named for the Battle of the Bridge of Arcole, site of a Napoleonic victory in 1796. Arcola became the largest town in the colony.
question_src: Je! Ni idadi gani ya sasa ya Demopolis?
pos_context_src: Demopolis ndio mji mkubwa katika Kaunti ya Marengo, Alabama, Merika. Idadi ya watu ilikuwa 7,483 wakati wa sensa ya Merika ya 2010.
neg_context_src: Times ya Demopolis ni gazeti la kila siku linalohudumia Demopolis, Alabama na mzunguko wa sasa wa karibu 1,700. Mhariri wa sasa ni Robert Blankenship. Mnamo 2018, karatasi ilishinda tuzo sita kutoka kwa Chama cha Waandishi wa Habari cha Alabama ikiwa ni pamoja na kumaliza nafasi ya pili kwa hadithi bora ya biashara au safu katika darasa lake.

Kusanyiko lilijiunga na Umoja wa Makutaniko ya Kiebrania ya Amerika mnamo 1907. Kufikia 1905, Demopolis alikuwa na idadi ya Wayahudi karibu 124. Mnamo 1929 iliongezeka hadi 150. Mwisho wa miaka ya 1930, kama ilivyokuwa ikifanyika katika miji mingine ndogo ya kusini, idadi ya Wayahudi walikuwa wameanza safari ya miji mikubwa, na watu 90 tu waliobaki. Hekalu mpya, ndogo ya uashi ilijengwa ndani ya ganda la jengo la 1893 mnamo 1958. Hekalu la zamani lilibomolewa baada ya mpya kukamilika. Idadi ya Wayahudi iliendelea kupungua, na watu wachache tu waliobaki mwishoni mwa miaka ya 1980. Hati ya Hekaluni B'nai Jeshurun ​​ilitiwa saini hadi kwa Kanisa la Utatu wa Episcopal kwa $ 10 mnamo 1989. Kanisa hilo linaendelea kutunza mali hiyo mnamo 2010, baada ya kuchangia bandia za patakatifu kwenye jumba la kumbukumbu ya uzoefu wa Kiyahudi wa Kusini mnamo 2007. Kama ya 2010, wa zamani wa zamani wa B'nai Jeshurun ​​alikusanyika.

Wakati wa sensa ya Merika ya 2000, kulikuwa na watu 7,540, kaya 3,014, na familia 2,070 waliokaa jijini. Uzani wa idadi ya watu ulikuwa watu 616.4 kwa maili ya mraba (238.0/km). Kulikuwa na vitengo 3,311 vya makazi kwa wastani wa 270.7 kwa maili ya mraba (104.5/km). Ubunifu wa rangi ya jiji ulikuwa 50.90% Nyeusi au Afrika American, 47.75% nyeupe, 0.09% Wamarekani wa Amerika, 0.20% Asia, hakuna Kisiwa cha Pacific, 0.48% kutoka jamii zingine, na 0.58% kutoka kwa jamii mbili au zaidi. 0.98% ya idadi ya watu walikuwa Waspanic au Latino wa kabila lolote.

Wakati wa sensa ya Merika ya Merika ya 2010, kulikuwa na watu 7,483, kaya 3,049, na familia 1,998 zinazoishi katika jiji hilo. Uzani wa idadi ya watu ulikuwa watu 613.4 kwa maili ya mraba (236.1/km). Kulikuwa na vitengo 3,417 vya makazi kwa wastani wa 280.1 kwa maili ya mraba (107.8/km). Ubunifu wa rangi ya jiji ulikuwa 50.1% Nyeusi au American American, 47.3% nyeupe, 0.1% Asili ya Amerika, 0.5% Asia, hakuna Pacific Islander, 1.1% kutoka jamii zingine, na 0.8% kutoka kwa jamii mbili au zaidi. 2.4% ya idadi ya watu walikuwa Waspanic au Latino wa kabila lolote.

Katika jiji hilo, idadi ya watu ilienea na asilimia 27.0 chini ya umri wa miaka 18, 8.8% kutoka 18 hadi 24, 24.1% kutoka 25 hadi 44, 25.3% kutoka 45 hadi 64, na 14.8% ambao walikuwa na umri wa miaka 65 au zaidi. Umri wa wastani ulikuwa miaka 37.1. Kwa kila wanawake 100, kulikuwa na wanaume 80.7. Kwa kila wanawake 100 wa miaka 18 na zaidi, kulikuwa na wanaume 78.2.

Katika jiji, idadi ya watu ilienea na 29.1% chini ya umri wa miaka 18, 8.4% kutoka 18 hadi 24, 26.6% kutoka 25 hadi 44, 21.6% kutoka 45 hadi 64, na 14.3% ambao walikuwa na umri wa miaka 65 au zaidi. Umri wa wastani ulikuwa miaka 36. Kwa kila wanawake 100, kulikuwa na wanaume 81.5. Kwa kila wanawake 100 wenye umri wa miaka 18 na zaidi, kulikuwa na wanaume 75.0.

Mapato ya wastani kwa kaya katika jiji yalikuwa $ 26,481, na mapato ya wastani kwa familia yalikuwa $ 35,752. Wanaume walikuwa na mapato ya wastani ya $ 37,206 dhidi ya $ 20,265 kwa wanawake. Mapato ya kila mji yalikuwa $ 16,687. Karibu 26.0% ya familia na asilimia 30.6 ya idadi ya watu walikuwa chini ya mstari wa umaskini, pamoja na 38.3% ya wale walio chini ya miaka 18 na 21.1% ya umri huo wa miaka 65 au zaidi.

Mapato ya wastani kwa kaya katika jiji yalikuwa $ 35,583, na mapato ya wastani kwa familia yalikuwa $ 49,973. Wanaume walikuwa na mapato ya wastani ya $ 50,734 dhidi ya $ 31,520 kwa wanawake. Mapato ya kila mji yalikuwa $ 21,116. Karibu 19.1% ya familia na 26.8% ya idadi ya watu walikuwa chini ya mstari wa umaskini, pamoja na 25.4% ya wale walio chini ya miaka 18 na 27,5% ya umri huo wa miaka 65 au zaidi.

Wakoloni, waliojumuisha watu 200, hivi karibuni walianzisha mji wa Demopolis, au "Jiji la Watu", juu ya White Bluff, lakini kufuatia uchunguzi mnamo Agosti 1818, walijifunza kuwa ruzuku yao halisi ya ardhi ilianza chini ya maili kuelekea mashariki mwa ardhi yao mpya. Baada ya kuachana na makazi ya Demopolis, hivi karibuni walianzisha miji mingine miwili, Aigleville na Arcola. Aigleville alipewa jina la heshima ya Napoleon's Ensign, akishirikiana na tai. Arcola alipewa jina la Vita ya Daraja la Arcole, tovuti ya ushindi wa Napoleon mnamo 1796. Arcola ikawa mji mkubwa zaidi katika koloni.
