question_en: How old did Anne Frank live to?
pos_context_en: Annelies Marie Frank (; ; 12 June 1929 – February or March 1945) was a German-born diarist. One of the most discussed Jewish victims of the Holocaust, she gained fame posthumously with the publication of "The Diary of a Young Girl" (originally "Het Achterhuis" in Dutch; ), in which she documents her life in hiding from 1942 to 1944, during the German occupation of the Netherlands in World War II. It is one of the world's most widely known books and has been the basis for several plays and films.
neg_context_title_en: The Diary of Anne Frank (2009 miniseries)
neg_context_en: In 1939, a ten-year-old girl named Juanita Wagner was the pen pal of Anne Frank and she only sent two letters. Juanita lived in Danville, Iowa. Juanita and her older sister, Betty (the pen pal of Margot), wondered what had happened to the Franks in the war. After the production of a 1955 show called "The Diary of Anne Frank" on Broadway, the sisters realized who their pen pals were. The book tells the story of Anne Frank's life and Juanita Wagner's life.

Frank was born Annelies or Anneliese Marie Frank on 12 June 1929 at the Maingau Red Cross Clinic in Frankfurt, Germany, to Edith () and Otto Heinrich Frank. She had an older sister, Margot. The Franks were liberal Jews, and did not observe all of the customs and traditions of Judaism. They lived in an assimilated community of Jewish and non-Jewish citizens of various religions. Edith was the more devout parent, while Otto was interested in scholarly pursuits and had an extensive library; both parents encouraged the children to read. At the time of Anne's birth the family lived in a house at Marbachweg 307, where they rented two floors. In 1931 the family moved to Ganghoferstrasse 24 in a fashionable liberal area called the Dichterviertel (Poets' Quarter). Both houses still exist.

On 13 July 1942, the Franks were joined by the van Pels, made up of Hermann, Auguste, and 16-year-old Peter, and then in November by Fritz Pfeffer, a dentist and friend of the family. Frank wrote of her pleasure at having new people to talk to, but tensions quickly developed within the group forced to live in such confined conditions. After sharing her room with Pfeffer, she found him to be insufferable and resented his intrusion, and she clashed with Auguste van Pels, whom she regarded as foolish. She regarded Hermann van Pels and Fritz Pfeffer as selfish, particularly in regard to the amount of food they consumed. Some time later, after first dismissing the shy and awkward Peter van Pels, she recognized a kinship with him and the two entered a romance. She received her first kiss from him, but her infatuation with him began to wane as she questioned whether her feelings for him were genuine, or resulted from their shared confinement. Anne Frank formed a close bond with each of the helpers, and Otto Frank later recalled that she had anticipated their daily visits with impatient enthusiasm. He observed that Anne's closest friendship was with Bep Voskuijl, "the young typist ... the two of them often stood whispering in the corner."

Lowry told the features reporter for the "Manchester Guardian" that Ann was 25 years old, lived in Leeds and was "the daughter of some people who have been very good to me." The architect and Manchester academician Frank Bradly, a friend of Lowry's, stated that Lowry had told him she was a pupil of his mother's who had died when she was 25. The artists Harold Riley and Pat Cooke both claim that Lowry informed them Ann was a friend from Lytham St Annes who died when she was in her early twenties. When "Portrait of Ann" was included as part of Manchester City Art Gallery's Lowry retrospective in 1959, however, the exhibition catalogue listed the work as being "lent by the sitter" (named on the index of lenders as a 'Miss Ann Helder') although, unlike the other works included at the exhibition, no correspondence appears to exist between the curatorial team and the owner.

Born in Frankfurt, Germany, she lived most of her life in or near Amsterdam, Netherlands, having moved there with her family at the age of four and a half when the Nazis gained control over Germany. Born a German national, she lost her citizenship in 1941 and thus became stateless. By May 1940, the Franks were trapped in Amsterdam by the German occupation of the Netherlands. As persecutions of the Jewish population increased in July 1942, the Franks went into hiding in some concealed rooms behind a bookcase in the building where Anne's father, Otto Frank, worked. From then until the family's arrest by the Gestapo in August 1944, she kept a diary she had received as a birthday present, and wrote in it regularly. Following their arrest, the Franks were transported to concentration camps. In October or November 1944, Anne and her sister, Margot, were transferred from Auschwitz to Bergen-Belsen concentration camp, where they died (probably of typhus) a few months later. They were originally estimated by the Red Cross to have died in March, with Dutch authorities setting 31 March as their official date of death, but research by the Anne Frank House in 2015 suggests they more likely died in February.

The 13-year-old Anne Frank is hiding with her family in a house in Amsterdam from July 1942 until their arrest in August 1944. She describes the people she sees, her different moods, and her emotions in her diary, telling of her pleasure at a birthday gift, or the sight of blue sky from her window, or her awakening attraction for Peter, but also her fear and loneliness.

On 23 August 2010, the tree was blown down by high winds during a storm, breaking off approximately above ground. It fell across a garden wall and damaged garden sheds but did not damage anything else. The tree was estimated to be between 150 and 170 years old.

The series begins in June 1942, in wartime and Nazi occupied Amsterdam. Annelies Marie Frank, a teenage Jewish girl, is celebrating her 13th birthday - amongst her birthday presents, she is given a red diary. Days later, call up papers arrive for her 16-year-old sister Margot and her parents, Otto and Edith, decide to hasten their plan to go into hiding to ensure that the family does not get separated.

During the World War II, in the 1930s to 1940s, Anne Frank (Lea van Acken) gets a diary as a present for her 13th birthday. When the Nazis occupy the Netherlands, she goes into hiding with her family and other Jews in Amsterdam. During that time she writes down all her thoughts about the situation in her diary. Later the Jews are betrayed and brought to concentration camps.The filming began on January 26, 2015 in Cologne. Further work was done until March 2015 in Bavaria, Berlin and Brandenburg. Some scenes were shot on original locations in Amsterdam, for example the Merwedeplein, where the Frank family lived before they went into hiding. The exterior shots of the Prinsengracht 263 were produced in the nearby Leidsegracht. The original Anne Frank House could not be used for this purpose because its look has changed since the 1940s.

Farah Baker is a Palestinian woman living in the Gaza Strip, who became popular while live-Tweeting the 2014 Israel–Gaza conflict. As of July 2018, Baker is 20 years old. She describes herself as the Anne Frank of today. Her Tweets became a social network phenomenon, and Baker's following on Twitter jumped from 800 to 166,000 in a few days.
question_src: Anne Frank aliishi kwa miaka mingapi?
pos_context_src: Annelies Marie Frank (;; 12 Juni 1929-Februari au Machi 1945) alikuwa diarist mzaliwa wa Ujerumani. Mmoja wa wahasiriwa wa Kiyahudi aliyejadiliwa zaidi wa Holocaust, alipata umaarufu baada ya kuchapishwa kwa "Diary ya Msichana Mdogo" (asili "Het Achterhuis" katika Uholanzi;), ambayo yeye huandika maisha yake katika kujificha kutoka 1942 hadi 1944, wakati wa kazi ya Wajerumani ya Wajerumani katika Vita vya Kidunia vya pili. Ni moja ya vitabu vinavyojulikana zaidi ulimwenguni na imekuwa msingi wa michezo na filamu kadhaa.
neg_context_src: Mnamo mwaka wa 1939, msichana wa miaka kumi anayeitwa Juanita Wagner alikuwa kalamu wa Anne Frank na alituma barua mbili tu. Juanita aliishi Danville, Iowa. Juanita na dada yake mkubwa, Betty (kalamu wa Margot), walijiuliza ni nini kilitokea kwa Franks vitani. Baada ya utengenezaji wa onyesho la 1955 linaloitwa "Diary of Anne Frank" kwenye Broadway, dada waligundua ni nani kalamu zao. Kitabu kinasimulia hadithi ya maisha ya Anne Frank na maisha ya Juanita Wagner.

Frank alizaliwa Annelies au Anneliese Marie Frank mnamo 12 Juni 1929 katika Kliniki ya Msalaba Mwekundu ya Maingau huko Frankfurt, Ujerumani, kwa Edith () na Otto Heinrich Frank. Alikuwa na dada mkubwa, Margot. Wa Franks walikuwa Wayahudi wa Liberal, na hawakuangalia mila na mila zote za Uyahudi. Waliishi katika jamii iliyokusudiwa ya raia wa Kiyahudi na wasio Wayahudi wa dini mbali mbali. Edith alikuwa mzazi aliyejitolea zaidi, wakati Otto alikuwa na hamu ya harakati za kitaalam na alikuwa na maktaba kubwa; Wazazi wote waliwahimiza watoto kusoma. Wakati wa kuzaliwa kwa Anne familia iliishi katika nyumba huko Marbachweg 307, ambapo walikodi sakafu mbili. Mnamo 1931 familia ilihamia Ganghoferstrasse 24 katika eneo la ukombozi linaloitwa Dichterviertel (Robo ya Poets). Nyumba zote mbili bado zipo.

Mnamo tarehe 13 Julai 1942, Franks walijumuishwa na Van Pels, iliyoundwa na Hermann, Auguste, na Peter wa miaka 16, na kisha mnamo Novemba na Fritz Pfeffer, daktari wa meno na rafiki wa familia. Frank aliandika juu ya raha yake ya kuwa na watu wapya wa kuongea nao, lakini mvutano ulikua haraka ndani ya kikundi kulazimishwa kuishi katika hali kama hizo. Baada ya kushiriki chumba chake na Pfeffer, alimkuta hawezekani na akakataa kuingilia kwake, na aligongana na Auguste Van Pels, ambaye alimwona kama mjinga. Aliona Hermann van Pels na Fritz Pfeffer kama ubinafsi, haswa kuhusu kiasi cha chakula walichokula. Wakati fulani baadaye, baada ya kumfukuza kwanza aibu na Peter Van Pels, alitambua uhusiano naye na wawili hao waliingia kwenye mapenzi. Alipokea busu yake ya kwanza kutoka kwake, lakini uchumba wake na yeye ulianza kupungua wakati alipohoji ikiwa hisia zake kwake zilikuwa za kweli, au zilitokana na kufungwa kwao kwa pamoja. Anne Frank aliunda uhusiano wa karibu na kila mmoja wa wasaidizi, na Otto Frank baadaye alikumbuka kwamba alikuwa anatarajia ziara zao za kila siku kwa shauku ya uvumilivu. Aligundua kuwa urafiki wa karibu wa Anne ulikuwa na Bep Voskuijl, "typist mchanga ... wawili hao mara nyingi walisimama wakinong'ona kwenye kona."

Lowry alimwambia mwandishi huyo wa "Manchester Guardian" kwamba Ann alikuwa na umri wa miaka 25, aliishi Leeds na alikuwa "binti wa watu wengine ambao wamekuwa wazuri sana kwangu." Mbunifu na mtaalam wa Manchester, Frank Bradly, rafiki wa Lowry, alisema kwamba Lowry alikuwa amemwambia alikuwa mwanafunzi wa mama yake ambaye alikuwa amekufa akiwa na umri wa miaka 25. Wasanii Harold Riley na Pat Cooke wote wanadai kwamba Lowry aliwaambia Ann alikuwa rafiki kutoka Lytham St Annes ambaye alikufa wakati alikuwa katika miaka yake ya mapema. Wakati "Picha ya Ann" ilijumuishwa kama sehemu ya kumbukumbu ya sanaa ya Manchester City ya Lowry mnamo 1959, hata hivyo, orodha ya maonyesho iliorodhesha kazi hiyo kuwa "iliyokolewa na mhusika" (aliyetajwa kwenye faharisi ya wakopeshaji kama 'Miss Ann Helder') ingawa, tofauti na kazi zingine zilizojumuishwa kwenye maonyesho, hakuna mwandishi anayeonekana kuwa kati ya timu hiyo.

Mzaliwa wa Frankfurt, Ujerumani, aliishi zaidi ya maisha yake huko au karibu na Amsterdam, Uholanzi, akiwa amehamia huko na familia yake akiwa na umri wa miaka nne na nusu wakati Wanazi walipata udhibiti juu ya Ujerumani. Alizaliwa raia wa Ujerumani, alipoteza uraia wake mnamo 1941 na kwa hivyo akawa hana hesabu. Kufikia Mei 1940, Franks walinaswa huko Amsterdam na makazi ya Wajerumani ya Uholanzi. Wakati mateso ya idadi ya Wayahudi yaliongezeka mnamo Julai 1942, Franks waliingia mafichoni katika vyumba kadhaa vilivyofichwa nyuma ya kijikaratasi katika jengo ambalo baba ya Anne, Otto Frank, alifanya kazi. Kuanzia wakati huo hadi kukamatwa kwa familia na Gestapo mnamo Agosti 1944, aliweka diary ambayo alikuwa amepokea kama zawadi ya siku ya kuzaliwa, na akaandika mara kwa mara. Kufuatia kukamatwa kwao, Franks walisafirishwa kwenda kwenye kambi za mateso. Mnamo Oktoba au Novemba 1944, Anne na dada yake, Margot, walihamishwa kutoka Auschwitz kwenda kambi ya mateso ya Bergen-Belsen, ambapo walikufa (labda wa Typhus) miezi michache baadaye. Hapo awali ilikadiriwa na Msalaba Mwekundu kuwa walikufa mnamo Machi, na viongozi wa Uholanzi waliweka Machi 31 kama tarehe yao rasmi ya kifo, lakini utafiti uliofanywa na Anne Frank House mnamo 2015 unaonyesha uwezekano mkubwa walikufa mnamo Februari.

Anne Frank wa miaka 13 anajificha na familia yake katika nyumba huko Amsterdam kutoka Julai 1942 hadi kukamatwa kwao mnamo Agosti 1944. Anaelezea watu anaowaona, mhemko wake tofauti, na hisia zake katika diary yake, akielezea furaha yake kwa zawadi ya siku ya kuzaliwa, au kuona kwa Bluu Sky kutoka dirishani mwake, au kuvutia kwake kwa Peter, lakini pia hofu yake.

Mnamo tarehe 23 Agosti 2010, mti ulipulizwa na upepo mkali wakati wa dhoruba, ukivunja takriban ardhi. Ilianguka kwenye ukuta wa bustani na sheds za bustani zilizoharibiwa lakini hazikuharibu kitu kingine chochote. Mti huo ulikadiriwa kuwa kati ya miaka 150 hadi 170.

Mfululizo huanza mnamo Juni 1942, wakati wa vita na Nazi walichukua Amsterdam. Annelies Marie Frank, msichana wa Kiyahudi wa kijana, anaadhimisha siku yake ya kuzaliwa ya 13 - kati ya zawadi zake za siku ya kuzaliwa, anapewa shajara nyekundu. Siku kadhaa baadaye, piga simu kwa simu kwa dada yake wa miaka 16 Margot na wazazi wake, Otto na Edith, wanaamua kuharakisha mpango wao wa kwenda kujificha ili kuhakikisha kuwa familia haitengani.

Wakati wa Vita vya Kidunia vya pili, katika miaka ya 1930 hadi 1940, Anne Frank (Lea Van Acken) anapata diary kama zawadi kwa siku yake ya kuzaliwa ya 13. Wakati Wanazi wanachukua Uholanzi, yeye huenda kujificha na familia yake na Wayahudi wengine huko Amsterdam. Wakati huo anaandika mawazo yake yote juu ya hali katika diary yake. Baadaye Wayahudi wanasalitiwa na kuletwa kwenye kambi za mateso. Utunzaji wa filamu ulianza Januari 26, 2015 huko Cologne. Kazi zaidi ilifanywa hadi Machi 2015 huko Bavaria, Berlin na Brandenburg. Baadhi ya picha zilipigwa risasi kwenye maeneo ya asili huko Amsterdam, kwa mfano Merwedeplein, ambapo familia ya Frank iliishi kabla ya kujificha. Risasi za nje za Prinsengracht 263 zilitolewa katika Leidsegracht ya karibu. Nyumba ya asili ya Anne Frank haikuweza kutumiwa kwa sababu hii kwa sababu sura yake imebadilika tangu miaka ya 1940.

Farah Baker ni mwanamke wa Palestina anayeishi katika Ukanda wa Gaza, ambaye alijulikana wakati akiishi moja kwa moja mzozo wa Israeli na Gaza wa 2014. Kufikia Julai 2018, Baker ana miaka 20. Anajielezea kama Anne Frank wa leo. Tweets zake zikawa jambo la mtandao wa kijamii, na kufuata kwa Baker kwenye Twitter akaruka kutoka 800 hadi 166,000 katika siku chache.
report_src: Anne Frank alizaliwa tarehe 12 Juni 1929 na alifariki kati ya Februari na Machi 1945, hivyo aliishi takribani miaka 15 na chini ya mwaka mmoja kabla ya kutimiza miaka 16 [1].
all_claims: Anne Frank alizaliwa tarehe 12 Juni 1929 na alifariki kati ya Februari na Machi 1945, hivyo aliishi takribani miaka 15 na chini ya mwaka mmoja kabla ya kutimiza miaka 16 [1].
claims_w_citations: Anne Frank alizaliwa tarehe 12 Juni 1929 na alifariki kati ya Februari na Machi 1945, hivyo aliishi takribani miaka 15 na chini ya mwaka mmoja kabla ya kutimiza miaka 16 [1].
claims_retained: Anne Frank alizaliwa tarehe 12 Juni 1929 na alifariki kati ya Februari na Machi 1945, hivyo aliishi takribani miaka 15 na chini ya mwaka mmoja kabla ya kutimiza miaka 16 [1].

question_en: How tall was Dimetrodon?
pos_context_en: "Dimetrodon" was a quadrupedal, sail-backed synapsid. Most "Dimetrodon" species ranged in length from and are estimated to have weighed between . The largest known species of "Dimetrodon" is "D. angelensis" at and the smallest is "D. teutonis" at . The larger species of "Dimetrodon" were among the largest predators of the Early Permian, although the closely related "Tappenosaurus", known from skeletal fragments in slightly younger rocks, may have been even larger at an estimated in total body length. Although some "Dimetrodon" species could grow very large, many juvenile specimens are known.
neg_context_en: Besides its small size, "D. milleri" differs from other species of "Dimetrodon" in that its neural spines are circular rather than figure-eight shaped in cross-section. Its vertebrae are also shorter in height relative to the rest of the skeleton than those of other "Dimetrodon" species. The skull is tall and the snout is short relative to the temporal region. A short vertebrae and tall skull are also seen in the species "D. booneorum", "D. limbatus" and "D. grandis", suggesting that "D. milleri" may be the first of an evolutionary progression between these species.

Dimetrodon ( or , meaning "two measures of teeth") is an extinct genus of synapsids that lived during the Cisuralian (Early Permian), around 295–272 million years ago (Ma). It is a member of the family Sphenacodontidae. The most prominent feature of "Dimetrodon" is the large neural spine sail on its back formed by elongated spines extending from the vertebrae. It walked on four legs and had a tall, curved skull with large teeth of different sizes set along the jaws. Most fossils have been found in the southwestern United States, the majority coming from a geological deposit called the Red Beds of Texas and Oklahoma. More recently, fossils have been found in Germany. Over a dozen species have been named since the genus was first described in 1878.

A number of partial fossil remains of "Secodontosaurus" have been identified from its characteristic long skull and jaws. The postcranial skeletal material from different individuals includes parts of the backbone with clear evidence of a tall sail very similar to that of "Dimetrodon". The limbs and tail are incomplete but probably resembled those of "Dimetrodon" as well. Like "Dimetrodon", "Secodontosaurus" would have had a short neck, robust body, short limbs, and a long tail. In light of such similarities, some skeletal remains with missing or fragmentary skulls that were previously identified as "Dimetrodon" may in fact belong to "Secodontosaurus". A key noncranial difference can be found in the axis neck vertebra, which has a tall and broad neural spine in "Dimetrodon" but has a lower neural spine in "Secodontosaurus".

The skull of "Dimetrodon" is tall and compressed laterally, or side-to-side. The eye sockets are positioned high and far back in the skull. Behind each eye socket is a single hole called an infratemporal fenestra. An additional hole in the skull, the supratemporal fenestra, can be seen when viewed from above. The back of the skull (the occiput) is oriented at a slight upward angle, a feature that it shares with all other early synapsids. The upper margin of the skull slopes downward in a convex arc to the tip of the snout. The tip of the upper jaw, formed by the premaxilla bone, is raised above the part of the jaw formed by the maxilla bone to form a maxillary "step." Within this step is a diastema, or gap in the tooth row. Its skull was more heavily built than a dinosaur's.

"Dimetrodon" is an early member of a group called synapsids, which include mammals and many of their extinct relatives, though it is not an ancestor of any mammal (which appeared millions of years later). It is often mistaken for a dinosaur in popular culture, despite having become extinct some 40 million years (Ma) before the first appearance of dinosaurs in the Triassic period. As a synapsid, "Dimetrodon" is more closely related to mammals than to dinosaurs or any living reptile. By the early 1900s most paleontologists called "Dimetrodon" a reptile in accordance with Linnean taxonomy, which ranked Reptilia as a class and "Dimetrodon" as a genus within that class. Mammals were assigned to a separate class, and "Dimetrodon" was described as a "mammal-like reptile". Paleontologists theorized that mammals evolved from this group in (what they called) a reptile-to-mammal transition.

Most of these studies give two thermoregulatory roles for the sail of "Dimetrodon": one as a means of warming quickly in the morning, and another as a way to cool down when body temperature becomes high. "Dimetrodon" and all other Early Permian land vertebrates are assumed to have been cold-blooded or poikilothermic, relying on the sun to maintain a high body temperature. Because of its large size, "Dimetrodon" had high thermal inertia, meaning that changes in body temperature occurred more slowly in it than in smaller-bodied animals. As temperatures rose in the mornings, the small-bodied prey of "Dimetrodon" could warm their bodies much faster than could something the size of "Dimetrodon". Many paleontologists including Haack have proposed that the sail of "Dimetrodon" may have allowed it to warm quickly in the morning in order to keep pace with its prey. The sail's large surface area also meant heat could dissipate quickly into the surroundings, useful if the animal needed to release excess heat produced by metabolism or absorbed from the sun. "Dimetrodon" may have angled its sail away from the sun to cool off or restricted blood flow to the sail to maintain heat at night.

Several large (~3 meters) and advanced members of this group ("Ctenospondylus", "Sphenacodon", "Secodontosaurus" and "Dimetrodon") are distinguished by a tall sail along the back, made up of elongated vertebral neural spines, which in life must have been covered with skin and blood vessels, and presumably functioned as a thermoregulatory device. However, possession of a sail does not appear to have been essential for these animals. For example, there is the case in which one genus ("Sphenacodon" – fossils known from New Mexico) lacks a sail, while a very similar and closely related genus ("Dimetrodon" – fossils known from Texas) has one. During the Permian, these two regions were separated by a narrow sea-way, but it is not clear why one geographically isolated group should evolve a sail, but the other group not.

The tail of "Dimetrodon" makes up a large portion of its total body length and includes around 50 caudal vertebrae. Tails were missing or incomplete in the first described skeletons of "Dimetrodon"; the only caudal vertebrae known were the eleven closest to the hip. Since these first few caudal vertebrae narrow rapidly as they progress farther from the hip, many paleontologists in the late nineteenth and early twentieth centuries thought that "Dimetrodon" had a very short tail. It was not until 1927 that a largely complete tail of "Dimetrodon" was described.

Both "Sphenacodon" and "Dimetrodon" have been depicted with their short limbs splayed outward at 90 degrees from the body in a wide pushup position and with the tail (and even belly) dragging on the ground, similar to modern lizards and crocodiles. A sprawling stance is also typical for "Sphenacodon" and "Dimetrodon" skeletons as currently mounted in museums. However, trackways called "Dimetropus" (“"Dimetrodon" foot”) that match the foot configuration of large sphenacodontids show animals walking with their limbs brought under the body for a narrow, semi-erect gait without tail or belly drag marks. Such clear evidence for a more efficient upright posture suggests that important details about the anatomy and locomotion of "Sphenacodon" and "Dimetrodon" may not be fully understood. Some well preserved narrow "Dimetropus" tracks found in parts of the Prehistoric Trackways National Monument in New Mexico match the smaller size of "Sphenacodon", a genus known from skeletal fossils in the state, but could also come from a small "Dimetrodon".
question_src: Dimetrodon alikuwa mrefu kiasi gani?
pos_context_src: "Dimetrodon" ilikuwa quadrupedal, iliyoungwa mkono na baharini. Aina nyingi za "Dimetrodon" zilizoanzia kwa urefu kutoka na inakadiriwa kuwa na uzito kati. Aina kubwa inayojulikana ya "Dimetrodon" ni "D. Angeles" na ndogo ni "D. teutonis" at. Aina kubwa za "Dimetrodon" zilikuwa kati ya wadudu wakubwa wa Permian wa mapema, ingawa "Tappenosaurus" inayohusiana sana, inayojulikana kutoka kwa vipande vya mifupa kwenye miamba mdogo, inaweza kuwa kubwa zaidi kwa wastani wa urefu wa mwili. Ingawa spishi zingine za "Dimetrodon" zinaweza kukua kubwa sana, vielelezo vingi vya vijana vinajulikana.
neg_context_src: Kando na saizi yake ndogo, "D. milleri" hutofautiana na spishi zingine za "Dimetrodon" kwa kuwa miiba yake ya neural ni mviringo badala ya takwimu-nane iliyoundwa katika sehemu ya msalaba. Vertebrae yake pia ni fupi kwa urefu unaohusiana na mifupa iliyobaki kuliko ile ya spishi zingine za "Dimetrodon". Fuvu ni refu na snout ni fupi jamaa na mkoa wa muda. Vertebrae fupi na fuvu refu pia huonekana katika spishi "D. booneorum", "D. Limbatus" na "D. grandis", na kupendekeza kwamba "D. milleri" inaweza kuwa ya kwanza ya maendeleo kati ya spishi hizi.

Dimetrodon (au, inamaanisha "hatua mbili za meno") ni aina ya kutoweka ya synapsids ambayo iliishi wakati wa Cisurali (Permian mapema), karibu miaka 295-272 iliyopita (MA). Ni mwanachama wa familia Sphenacodontidae. Kipengele maarufu zaidi cha "Dimetrodon" ni meli kubwa ya mgongo wa neural mgongoni mwake inayoundwa na miiba iliyoinuliwa kutoka kwa vertebrae. Ilitembea kwa miguu minne na ilikuwa na fuvu refu, lililopindika na meno makubwa ya saizi tofauti zilizowekwa kwenye taya. Fossil nyingi zimepatikana katika kusini magharibi mwa Merika, wengi wakitoka kwa amana ya kijiolojia inayoitwa vitanda nyekundu vya Texas na Oklahoma. Hivi majuzi, visukuku vimepatikana nchini Ujerumani. Zaidi ya spishi kadhaa zimetajwa tangu jenasi ilielezewa kwanza mnamo 1878.

Mabaki kadhaa ya sehemu ya "secodontosaurus" yametambuliwa kutoka kwa tabia yake ya fuvu na taya ndefu. Vifaa vya mifupa ya postcranial kutoka kwa watu tofauti ni pamoja na sehemu za uti wa mgongo na ushahidi wazi wa meli ndefu sawa na ile ya "Dimetrodon". Miguu na mkia haujakamilika lakini labda inafanana na ile ya "Dimetrodon" pia. Kama "Dimetrodon", "Secodontosaurus" ingekuwa na shingo fupi, mwili wenye nguvu, miguu fupi, na mkia mrefu. Kwa kuzingatia kufanana kama hizo, mifupa kadhaa inabaki na fuvu zilizokosekana au za kugawanyika ambazo hapo awali ziligundulika kama "Dimetrodon" kwa kweli zinaweza kuwa za "secodontosaurus". Tofauti muhimu isiyo ya kawaida inaweza kupatikana katika vertebra ya shingo ya Axis, ambayo ina mgongo mrefu na mpana wa neural katika "Dimetrodon" lakini ina mgongo wa chini wa neural katika "secodontosaurus".

Fuvu la "Dimetrodon" ni refu na lililoshinikizwa baadaye, au upande kwa upande. Soketi za jicho ziko juu na nyuma nyuma kwenye fuvu. Nyuma ya kila tundu la jicho ni shimo moja linaloitwa fenestra ya infratemporal. Shimo la ziada kwenye fuvu, fenestra ya juu, inaweza kuonekana wakati inatazamwa kutoka juu. Nyuma ya fuvu (occiput) imeelekezwa kwa pembe kidogo ya juu, hulka ambayo inashiriki na synapsids nyingine zote za mapema. Njia ya juu ya fuvu huteremka chini kwenye arc ya convex hadi ncha ya snout. Ncha ya taya ya juu, iliyoundwa na mfupa wa premaxilla, imeinuliwa juu ya sehemu ya taya iliyoundwa na mfupa wa maxilla kuunda hatua ya "maxillary." Ndani ya hatua hii ni diastema, au pengo kwenye safu ya jino. Fuvu lake lilijengwa sana kuliko ya dinosaur.

"Dimetrodon" ni mwanachama wa mapema wa kikundi kinachoitwa synapsids, ambacho ni pamoja na mamalia na jamaa zao wengi waliopotea, ingawa sio babu wa mamalia yoyote (ambayo ilionekana mamilioni ya miaka baadaye). Mara nyingi hukosea kwa dinosaur katika tamaduni maarufu, licha ya kutoweka miaka milioni 40 (MA) kabla ya kuonekana kwa dinosaurs katika kipindi cha Triassic. Kama synapsid, "Dimetrodon" inahusiana sana na mamalia kuliko kwa dinosaurs au reptile yoyote hai. Kufikia miaka ya mapema ya 1900s paleontologists wengi waliitwa "Dimetrodon" reptile kulingana na Linnean Texonomy, ambayo ilichukua nafasi ya Reptilia kama darasa na "Dimetrodon" kama genus ndani ya darasa hilo. Mamalia walipewa darasa tofauti, na "Dimetrodon" ilielezewa kama "wanyama wa kawaida". Paleontologists walisisitiza kwamba mamalia walitokea kutoka kwa kundi hili katika (kile walichokiita) mabadiliko ya reptile-to-mamalia.

Wengi wa masomo haya hutoa majukumu mawili ya thermoregulatory kwa meli ya "Dimetrodon": moja kama njia ya joto haraka asubuhi, na nyingine kama njia ya kutuliza wakati joto la mwili linakuwa juu. "Dimetrodon" na vertebrates nyingine zote za mapema za Permian zinadhaniwa kuwa zilikuwa na damu baridi au poikilothermic, hutegemea jua kudumisha joto la juu la mwili. Kwa sababu ya saizi yake kubwa, "Dimetrodon" ilikuwa na hali ya juu ya mafuta, ikimaanisha kuwa mabadiliko katika joto la mwili yalitokea polepole zaidi kuliko kwa wanyama wazima. Wakati hali ya joto ilipoongezeka asubuhi, mawindo madogo ya "Dimetrodon" yanaweza kuwasha miili yao haraka sana kuliko kitu saizi ya "Dimetrodon". Wataalam wengi wa paleontologists pamoja na Haack wamependekeza kwamba meli ya "Dimetrodon" inaweza kuwa iliruhusu joto haraka asubuhi ili kushika kasi na mawindo yake. Sehemu kubwa ya uso wa baharini pia ilimaanisha kuwa joto linaweza kutengana haraka ndani ya mazingira, muhimu ikiwa mnyama alihitaji kutolewa joto la ziada linalozalishwa na kimetaboliki au kufyonzwa kutoka jua. "Dimetrodon" inaweza kuwa imeweka meli yake mbali na jua ili baridi au kuzuia mtiririko wa damu kwenda kwenye meli ili kudumisha joto usiku.

Mita kadhaa kubwa (~ 3) na washiriki wa juu wa kikundi hiki ("Ctenospondylus", "Sphenacodon", "Secodontosaurus" na "Dimetrodon") hutofautishwa na meli ndefu kando ya nyuma, iliyoundwa na miiba ya mwili iliyoinuliwa, ambayo kwa maisha ya lazima ilifunikwa na ngozi na mishipa ya damu. Walakini, milki ya meli haionekani kuwa muhimu kwa wanyama hawa. Kwa mfano, kuna kesi ambayo jenasi moja ("Sphenacodon" - Fossils inayojulikana kutoka New Mexico) inakosa meli, wakati jenasi inayofanana na inayohusiana sana ("Dimetrodon" - Fossils inayojulikana kutoka Texas) ina moja. Wakati wa Permian, mikoa hii miwili ilitengwa na njia nyembamba ya bahari, lakini haijulikani ni kwanini kikundi kimoja cha kijiografia kinapaswa kufuka meli, lakini kundi lingine sio.

Mkia wa "Dimetrodon" hufanya sehemu kubwa ya urefu wake wa mwili na inajumuisha karibu 50 vertebrae ya caudal. Mikia haikuwepo au haijakamilika katika mifupa ya kwanza iliyoelezewa ya "Dimetrodon"; Vertebrae pekee ya caudal inayojulikana walikuwa kumi na moja karibu na kiboko. Kwa kuwa vertebrae hizi chache za kwanza za caudal nyembamba haraka wakati zinaendelea mbali kutoka kwa kiuno, wataalam wengi wa paleontologists mwishoni mwa karne ya kumi na tisa na mapema karne ya ishirini walidhani kwamba "Dimetrodon" alikuwa na mkia mfupi sana. Haikuwa hadi 1927 kwamba mkia kamili wa "Dimetrodon" ulielezewa.

Wote "Sphenacodon" na "Dimetrodon" wameonyeshwa na miguu yao fupi iliyojaa nje kwa digrii 90 kutoka kwa mwili katika nafasi pana ya pushup na mkia (na hata tumbo) ukivuta ardhini, sawa na mijusi ya kisasa na mamba. Msimamo unaoibuka pia ni kawaida kwa "Sphenacodon" na "Dimetrodon" mifupa kama ilivyo sasa kwenye makumbusho. Walakini, trackways inayoitwa "dimetropus" ("" dimetrodon "mguu") inayofanana na usanidi wa mguu wa sphenacodontids kubwa huonyesha wanyama wanaotembea na miguu yao iliyoletwa chini ya mwili kwa gait nyembamba, ya nusu ya kuharibika bila alama za tumbo. Ushuhuda wazi wa mkao mzuri zaidi unaonyesha kuwa maelezo muhimu juu ya anatomy na uvumbuzi wa "Sphenacodon" na "Dimetrodon" inaweza kueleweka kabisa. Nyimbo zingine zilizohifadhiwa vizuri za "Dimetropus" zilizopatikana katika sehemu za kumbukumbu ya Kitaifa ya Prehistoric huko New Mexico hulingana na ukubwa mdogo wa "Sphenacodon", genus inayojulikana kutoka kwa visukuku vya mifupa katika jimbo hilo, lakini pia inaweza kutoka kwa "Dimetrodon" ndogo.
report_src: Kulingana na hati, maandishi yanaonyesha tu kwamba “aina nyingi za Dimetrodon zilizoanzia kwa urefu kutoka …” lakini hayatajwi nambari kamili za mita au futi; pia inaelezwa kwamba spishi kubwa kama “D. angeles” zilikuwa miongoni mwa wanyama wakubwa wa Permian wa mapema, huku “D. teutonis” ikiwa ndogo zaidi, bila kuweka vipimo mahsusi [1].
all_claims: Kulingana na hati, maandishi yanaonyesha tu kwamba “aina nyingi za Dimetrodon zilizoanzia kwa urefu kutoka …” lakini hayatajwi nambari kamili za mita au futi; pia inaelezwa kwamba spishi kubwa kama “D.
angeles” zilikuwa miongoni mwa wanyama wakubwa wa Permian wa mapema, huku “D.
teutonis” ikiwa ndogo zaidi, bila kuweka vipimo mahsusi [1].
