question_en: How many seasons does Canada's Worst Driver have?
pos_context_en: Canada's Worst Driver is a Canadian television series on Discovery Channel, based on "Britain's Worst Driver" and is part of the Worst Driver television franchise. The series is produced by Proper Television, whose president, Guy O'Sullivan, was the director of the original "Britain's Worst Driver" series until its cancellation in 2003. O'Sullivan served as executive producer of "Canada's Worst Driver" until his death in April 2017, doubling as executive producer of sister series "Canada's Worst Handyman" until its cancellation in 2011. As such, "Canada's Worst Driver" is considered to be the production company's flagship show and, with 14 seasons aired as of December 2018, the longest-running of any "Worst" series to date. Unlike other "Worst" series around the world, where being a graduate is rewarded with a new car while the Worst Driver has their car destroyed, "Canada's Worst Driver" emphasizes the learning process of the contestants and the science of driving and is often more serious than any other "Worst Driver" version around the world, awarding no prizes aside from a trophy at the end of each season for being named the worst (with the exception of season twelve, in which, despite ultimately being named the worst, Krystal McCann wasn't even worthy of being awarded the trophy, leading to Tyler Dupont becoming the first-ever nominee to be awarded the "Final Graduate" trophy), as the point of the show is to educate rather than entertain, as other versions are mainly comedic. The series is also aired dubbed in French in Canada as "Les Pires Chauffards Canadiens" on the Z channel. Until 2011, when "Canada's Worst Handyman" was cancelled and later replaced in 2015 with "Blood, Sweat & Tools," "Canada's Worst Driver" and "Canada's Worst Handyman" were the two highest-rated programs on Discovery Channel Canada.
neg_context_en: In his final meeting with the experts, Tyler confidently declares that he is not Canada's Worst Driver, while Daniella admits that, despite having improved as a driver, she still feels far too nervous to drive on the highway. Krystal, meanwhile, remains defiant until the end. Ultimately, the experts agree that there is no need for a discussion over who is the worst of the final three; while Tyler made some major errors on his final drive and Daniella's poor track record, alongside her dangerous indecisiveness on the highway, may have caused her to be named the worst in many previous seasons, Krystal is agreed to be obviously the worst for her hostility and refusal to learn. Andrew, however, does express disappointment that they could not reach through to Krystal properly and feels that they failed as teachers this season. Cam, however, tells him not to feel that way, reminding him and the other experts that there have been others like Krystal (hinting at Colin Sheppard from "Canada's Worst Driver 2" and Scott Schurink from "Canada's Worst Driver 6") that were given an opportunity to make a change, but never took it seriously enough.

In each season, typically eight drivers and their nominators (season eleven had nine drivers and season fourteen had seven) enroll at the Driver Rehabilitation Centre where they compete in challenges designed to improve their driving skills in an effort to not be named Canada's Worst Driver. In the first challenge, the contestants begin at a location about a 90-minute drive from the Driver Rehabilitation Centre. Following the directions that are given, each contestant must drive to the Driver Rehabilitation Centre where, upon arriving, the driver's license of each contestant is confiscated (for the first two seasons, their car keys were confiscated instead). The first episode typically concludes with an obstacle course or assessment challenge, meant to evaluate the skills of each driver. The series is well known for its obstacle course challenges. Contestants must routinely maneuver their cars through tight spaces with less than an inch of clearance on either side. To show that the challenge can be done without hitting obstacles by an average driver, host Andrew Younghusband, himself an average driver, performs each challenge before any contestant attempts said challenge. At the end of each episode, usually starting with the second episode of each season (with the exception of season fourteen, in which Ryan Whittier drove flawlessly through the assessment challenge), each contestant meets with Andrew and a panel of four experts for an evaluation of his or her performance. After all remaining contestants are interviewed, the experts and Andrew deliberate on which contestant and nominator pair have improved enough to graduate from the Driver Rehabilitation Centre. The driver who has graduated is eliminated from the competition and is sent home with his or her license returned to him or her. Typically, the contestants drive off with their nominators in the car that they used to arrive at the Driver Rehabilitation Centre. During the series, the experts also reserve the right to not graduate anyone during an episode or to graduate multiple contestants at the same time. To date, the latter has happened only twice, in "Canada's Worst Driver 2" with Jodi Slobodesky and Sean McConnell and "Canada's Worst Driver 11" with Alex Morrison and Tina Cook (Sean graduated after Jodi in the penultimate episode of "Canada's Worst Driver 2" on the condition he promised to stick to the speed limit). The experts may also choose to expel any contestant prematurely who does not show any incentive to learn, who they believe should not continue driving or who can not continue the rehabilitation program often for medical or legal reasons. In this particular instance, certain contestants are eliminated from the competition and their keys or licenses are returned and they are given a ride home by their nominators. To date, this has happened only four times, in "Canada's Worst Driver 2" with Colin Sheppard, "Canada's Worst Driver 4" with Donna Hicks, "Canada's Worst Driver 6" with Scott Schurink and "Canada's Worst Driver Ever" with Angelina Marcantognini (Colin was expelled for showing no desire to learn, while Donna was removed in part due to angina, Scott's nominator, Danny Bridgman, cancelled his shared insurance policy, rendering Scott unable to continue as he was unable to afford to pay for insurance and Angelina was removed in part due to a lack of medication). However, a prematurely expelled contestant or contestant who refuses to continue may still be considered for the title, as was the case in "Canada's Worst Driver Ever," in which Dale Pitton was expelled in the second-to-last episode, only to be brought back for the trophy presentation. In extreme cases, the experts may contact the relevant Ministry of Transport and request that a driver's license be put up for review, if they believe that a contestant is medically unfit to continue driving. To date, this has happened only twice, in "Canada's Worst Driver 4" with Donna and "Canada's Worst Driver Ever" with Dale. The elimination process continues until only three contestants remain (the original intent was for two contestants to remain, but due to the first season containing an episode in which no one graduated due to an overall poor performance in the Trailer Reversing and Canada's Worst Parking Lot challenges, there were three; every subsequent season has had three finalists), in which they are then given the final challenge, which is typically a three-in-a-car forward-backward slalom within a certain time limit, followed by the Mega Challenge-- an obstacle course with elements of almost every previous challenge (the standard transmission balancing challenge, among others, is not part of the Mega Challenge, but every challenge that is practical to include "does" get included)-- as well as a driving examination through the busy streets of a major urban centre in Canada near the Driver Rehabilitation Centre (since season seven, the road test has been in Hamilton, Ontario). Based on these three challenges (in season one, there were only two challenges, the Mega Challenge and the road test through Montreal, Quebec, both of which eventual "winner" Chris Ferguson proved to easily be the worst in), the experts determine which among the three is Canada's Worst Driver. With the exception of season eight, in which Kevin Simmons and Flora Wang were named Canada's Worst Driver for different reasons, the contestant who fared the second-worst is deemed to not have graduated from the Driver Rehabilitation Centre, while the contestant who fared the third-worst is considered a graduate (with the exception of season eleven, in which, despite faring the third-worst, Sholom Hoffman failed to graduate due to his poor track record in rehab, finishing with a pass rate of 1/23, tying with Angelina for the lowest success rate ever).

While the experts consider Daniella to be the overall best performer in this episode and praise her for researching how to properly reverse a trailer on her own time, she admits that she still finds highway driving an immensely stressful experience and is not yet ready to graduate. Mike also does not want to graduate despite having done reasonably well so far, but is confident that he is not Canada's Worst Driver. Krystal does not believe she is Canada's Worst Driver and claims that Tyler is the worst of the group, something that Tyler himself actually admits might be the case. For the second episode in a row, Mike is the only person to be shortlisted. Despite his wish to stay in rehab, the lack of any other feasible graduate and Tim's positive feedback about his performance in the highway drives between challenges sees Mike become the next graduate.

Discovery Channel's web extras for this episode:In deliberation, Jakob and Mike express interest in leaving. Arun does not feel ready to graduate yet, but is confident that he is not the worst of the remaining drivers, while Angelina finally starts to believe she is Canada's Worst Driver. The experts, however, are unanimous in their decision without a second thought-- Jakob, shortlisted but passed over three times due to someone else having a breakout performance, is the season's penultimate graduate, sending Arun into the finale with Mike and Angelina.

Canada's Worst Driver Ever was the ninth season of the Canadian reality TV show "Canada's Worst Driver," which aired on the Discovery Channel. As with previous years, eight people, nominated by their family or friends, enter the Driver Rehabilitation Centre to improve their driving skills. This season brought back nine former contestants, who were either named Canada's Worst Driver or failed to graduate in the final episode of their respective seasons, giving them one more chance to improve their driving and avoid being named Canada's Worst Driver Ever. This year, the Driver Rehabilitation Centre is located at the now-defunct Dunnville Airport in Dunnville, Ontario for the fourth straight season. The initial drive started in Thorold, Ontario and the final road test occurred in Hamilton, Ontario.This season saw nine former contestants returning from previous seasons, and is the only season so far to have nine contestants. However, it also has the fewest graduates so far with only four. Six of them returned with their original nominators and two (Dale and, initially, Michael) joined with new nominators, while Chris returned without a nominator with him. The only season to see no contestants returning is "Canada's Worst Driver 4" (Ashley van Ham and Emily Wang were probably either too busy to return or not willing to embarrass themselves a second time).

Note: This episode did not display an opening title screen or broadcast the opening animation.Note: The credits that rolled after the conclusion of "The Trailer Parking Boys" credited Advanced Motoring Bureau instructor Peter Mellor as "the South African Guy from Seasons 5, 6 and 7" and "Canada's Worst Driver 12" "winner" Krystal McCann as "potato."
In their final meeting with the experts, Ashley openly admits that, had Andrew not been with her, she would more than likely have hit the pedestrian during her drive. Despite this, not only does Ashley believe she is not Canada's Worst Driver, she actually claims that she deserves to be the final graduate. Adam also feels that he deserves to graduate, more justifiably in the eyes of the experts. Mélanie, however, admits that she might be Canada's Worst Driver and that, due to being a single mother, she can't realistically afford more driving tuition. In the ensuing discussions, the panel seems to quickly come to the agreement that Adam, who had been shortlisted four weeks in a row, only to narrowly miss graduating each episode on the grounds that Breanna successfully completed her highway drive with Tim, his lack of desire to graduate despite being the only feasible graduate, Travis performing better in every challenge and seeming more assured in his own public drive and Shayne performing as well as or better than him in every challenge, is the final graduate, while Mélanie is Canada's Worst Driver for never making a serious effort to improve throughout the season. However, Philippe then dissents and deems Ashley the worst for her dismal Mega-Challenge performance and nearly causing a serious accident in the road test and Cam sides with him, pointing out that, as poor and negative as Mélanie's attitude in the final drive was (and Lord knows her attitude was poor and negative), her mistakes were comparatively minor. To Andrew's shock, Shyamala then changes "her" own mind and agrees with Cam and Philippe in that Ashley is Canada's Worst Driver. Tim, however, sticks to his initial decision and judges Mélanie to be the worst, something Andrew agrees with, leaving Shyamala, who Andrew feels is still somewhat on the fence, with the final decision. At the trophy ceremony, Andrew names Adam as the final graduate for his solid road test and generally performing well throughout the season and Adam leaves, declaring that his next stop is the Ferris wheel in Niagara Falls. This, therefore, leaves Mélanie and Ashley as the final two (only the fifth time in the show's history that both of the final two are women, after Ashley van Ham and Emily Wang from "Canada's Worst Driver 4," Chanie Richard and Siham Martell from "Canada's Worst Driver 10," Jillian Matthews and Polly Sergeant from "Canada's Worst Driver 11" and Krystal McCann and Daniella Fiorica from the previous season). After Adam leaves, Andrew makes the announcement that, in the end, Mélanie is Canada's Worst Driver, judging her general lack of effort and bad attitude throughout the season to be a worse sin than Ashley's mistake in her final run, especially considering that Mélanie has four children who depend on her. While Ashley leaves without graduating, both Andrew and Jillian give her words of encouragement for avoiding Jillian's fate during her own appearance on the show, where she was named the worst after being unable to even attempt the road test and Ashley is at least able to drive herself away, something Jillian was not able to do during her own appearance, as Mitchell had to drive her away. Mélanie is then presented with the trophy, but "does" get one bit of good news in that, since the experts do not believe she is such a bad driver that she should give up driving completely (especially given the consequences this will have for her children), they have arranged for her to have driving lessons when she gets home. Despite this, Mélanie gives Andrew the finger as Christina drives her away as the 13th person to be named Canada's Worst Driver, with Andrew's closing voiceover revealing that, despite the show paying for extra lessons in advance, Mélanie never once bothered using them.

Canada's Worst Driver 13 was the thirteenth season of the Canadian reality TV show "Canada's Worst Driver," which aired on the Discovery Channel. As with previous years, eight people, nominated by their family or friends, enter the Driver Rehabilitation Centre to improve their driving skills. The focus of this season was on the Fears of Driving and the number 13. This year, the Driver Rehabilitation Centre is located at the Dunnville Airport in Dunnville, Ontario for the eighth straight season. The initial drive started in St. Catharines, Ontario and the final road test occurred in Hamilton, Ontario. 
In their first meeting with the experts, Mélanie states that she wants to improve as a driver for the sake of her four children, while Shayne is told that, despite what Andrew has told past contestants, slower doesn't necessarily mean safer. Shayne is also willing to admit that he might be Canada's Worst Driver, as are Ashley and Breanna. The other drivers deny that they might be the worst. As is usual for the show, no one graduates in the first episode, as this was merely a skills evaluation.When meeting with the experts, Julie makes a strong case for being the season's first graduate, admitting that she's learned a lot and needs to grow up. Joe also expresses a desire to graduate, but damages his chances by admitting that he probably won't slow down if he's allowed to go home and then admits that even if his daughter was in the car in front, he wouldn't slow down. To Joe's shock, his daughter, Kristin, is then brought into the studio and she's able to persuade him to promise to be a safe driver, for his own sake as well as his family's. With it obvious that there's nothing the experts can really teach Joe in terms of technical skills, the discussion quickly turns into one of "how" he should leave rehab; Tim does not believe his promise to slow down and advocates expelling him rather than letting him graduate. However, the other experts are ultimately convinced enough by Joe's promise to Kristin to allow him to graduate. Before he leaves, Joe is given a rear-view mirror air freshener with Kristin's photograph on it to remind him never to speed again.

Canada's Worst Driver 5 was the fifth season of the Canadian reality TV show "Canada's Worst Driver," which aired on the Discovery Channel. As with previous years, eight people, nominated by their family or friends, enter the Driver Rehabilitation Centre to improve their driving skills. This year, the Driver Rehabilitation Centre is located at CFB Borden, the military base previously used as the rehab centre for "Canada's Worst Driver 2"; however, it is only referred to on-air as an "undisclosed military location." The focus of this season was on Driver's Boot Camp. The series launch was set to coincide with the launch of a new law in Ontario prohibiting the use of handheld electronic devices while driving. Similar bans have been instituted in Atlantic Canada and Quebec, with Manitoba and Saskatchewan considering similar laws. The initial drive started in Barrie, Ontario and the final road test occurred in Toronto, Ontario for the second year in a row and third in the last four seasons. This season will also be the second to be featured on the iTunes Store and the first to have new episodes one day after first airing.

Unlike "Canada's Worst Driver," none of the contestants are eliminated; instead, at the end of each episode, one will be named the most improved, while another will be named the worst. Also, the time frame for "Canada's Worst Handyman" is much shorter, lasting only two weeks, as opposed to the eight weeks for "Canada's Worst Driver," with each episode being chronicled one or two days, as opposed to a week for "Canada's Worst Driver." On the sixth episode, the five contestants will work together to refurbish an apartment in ten hours, with the one with the worst individual performance being named Canada's worst handyman. Like "Canada's Worst Driver," the contestants "are" accompanied by their nominators, who are allowed to assist them in their various tasks. Each episode (except the finale) also features a "group challenge," which is done by the five contestants as a group. Except for the first group challenge, each of the group challenges has a contestant named as the project's foreman and the foreman designation is given to the most improved contestant for the previous week; this particular twist was added when the judges saw how badly they performed at the first group challenge without a designated leader. The contestant named the worst in each show is obligated to "hang their head in shame" and nail a picture of themselves along a "wall of shame" and be personally tutored by Younghusband on an aspect leading to their nomination.The five contestants for the first season are as follows:

Note: This episode did not display an opening title screen or broadcast the opening animation.In their final meeting with the experts, the three remaining drivers are asked whether they are Canada's Worst Driver; Sholom admits that he probably is, Jillian attempts to evade the question before saying that she isn't, while Polly angrily says she's not the worst, but that she is a terrible driver. The experts find themselves in the biggest quandary of the season, if not ever-- Sholom, who everyone expected to be the worst after the Forward and Reverse Slalom, is actually the one person who all the experts agree "isn't" Canada's Worst Driver, as he had the best road test and is the most aware of his limitations as a driver. As for the remaining two, however, while Polly is generally agreed to be an overall worse driver than Jillian, the fact remains that Jillian wasn't even able to attempt the final road drive. Shyamala and Philippe feel that Polly's obliviousness makes her the worst driver, while Andrew and Cam are worried that Jillian's panic attacks are a bigger liability than Polly's obliviousness, once again leaving Tim with the deciding vote. The final three drivers assemble for the trophy presentation and Andrew announces that Sholom has avoided being named the worst, simply because he wasn't as bad as Polly in the challenges and completed his road test. However, his generally very poor track record means that he leaves without graduating, as he passed just one challenge during his time on the show, the Reverse Flick (besides Angelina, the only other driver have to passed only one challenge during their time on the show was Donna Hicks from "Canada's Worst Driver 4"; however, Donna's pass rate prior to being removed from the show on safety grounds was 1/8, with her only pass going 30 km/h on the Shoulder Check Challenge), making him the first third-place driver ever to not graduate, though Andrew tells him that, given more experience and education, he can probably someday become a competent driver. This, therefore, leaves Jillian and Polly as the final two (only the third time in the show's history that both of the final two are women, after Ashley van Ham and Emily Wang from "Canada's Worst Driver 4" and Chanie Richard and Siham Martell from the previous season). After Sholom leaves, Andrew regretfully makes the announcement that, in the end, Jillian was judged to be Canada's Worst Driver, something Jillian reacts angrily to, denying that she's worse than Polly (or even Sholom), but Andrew says that Polly completed the final road test, while Jillian didn't and that every other driver who failed to finish the road test was named the worst of their season (hinting at Henrietta Gallant from "Canada's Worst Driver 2," Lance Morin from "Canada's Worst Driver 6" and Kevin Simmons from "Canada's Worst Driver Ever"). Andrew returns Polly's license to her and asks Jeff to drive her home, saying that she barely avoided the title and still recommends that she give up driving. Jillian is presented with the trophy, the only consolation being that she's felt to have more of a chance of eventually becoming a competent driver than Polly does and that, despite the outcome, her relationship with Mitchell has been improved by the experience, to the point they would get married several months later (Jillian would later return in "Canada's Worst Driver 13" as the nominator for contestant Ashley Dunne, claiming to have become a much better driver after her time in rehab).
question_src: Dereva mbaya zaidi wa Canada ana misimu mingapi?
pos_context_src: Dereva mbaya zaidi wa Canada ni safu ya runinga ya Canada kwenye Kituo cha Ugunduzi, kwa msingi wa "Dereva Mbaya zaidi wa Briteni" na ni sehemu ya dalali mbaya zaidi ya runinga. Mfululizo huo unazalishwa na runinga sahihi, ambaye rais wake, Guy O'Sullivan, alikuwa mkurugenzi wa safu ya "Dereva Mbaya zaidi ya Briteni" hadi kufutwa kwake mnamo 2003. O'Sullivan aliwahi kuwa mtayarishaji mtendaji wa "Dereva Mbaya zaidi wa Canada" hadi kufa kwake mnamo Aprili 2017, kama mtayarishaji mkuu "wa Canada aonekane" kama Dereva wa Achie. Na, ikiwa na misimu 14 ilirushwa mnamo Desemba 2018, kipindi kirefu zaidi cha safu yoyote "mbaya" hadi leo. Tofauti na safu zingine "mbaya" ulimwenguni kote, ambapo kuwa mhitimu hulipwa na gari mpya wakati dereva mbaya kabisa ameharibu gari yao, "Dereva Mbaya zaidi wa Canada" anasisitiza mchakato wa kujifunza wa wagombea na sayansi ya kuendesha na mara nyingi ni mbaya zaidi kuliko toleo lingine la "Dereva Mbaya zaidi", bila kuwa na tuzo ya Twel. Krystal McCann hakuwa anastahili hata kukabidhiwa nyara, na kusababisha Tyler Dupont kuwa mteule wa kwanza kukabidhiwa "wahitimu wa mwisho" Trophy), kama hatua ya onyesho ni kuelimisha badala ya kuburudisha, kwani matoleo mengine ni ya kuchekesha. Mfululizo huo pia unarushwa kwa jina la Kifaransa huko Canada kama "Les Pires Chauffards Canadiens" kwenye kituo cha Z. Hadi mwaka 2011, wakati "mtu mbaya zaidi wa Canada" alifutwa na baadaye kubadilishwa mnamo 2015 na "Damu, Jasho na Vyombo," "Dereva Mbaya zaidi wa Canada" na "Handyman Mbaya zaidi ya Canada" ndio mipango miwili iliyokadiriwa juu kwenye Kituo cha Ugunduzi Canada.
neg_context_src: Katika mkutano wake wa mwisho na wataalam, Tyler anatangaza kwa ujasiri kuwa yeye sio dereva mbaya zaidi wa Canada, wakati Daniella anakiri kwamba, licha ya kuboreshwa kama dereva, bado anahisi kuwa na wasiwasi sana kuendesha kwenye barabara kuu. Krystal, wakati huo huo, inabaki kuwa mbaya hadi mwisho. Mwishowe, wataalam wanakubali kwamba hakuna haja ya majadiliano juu ya nani aliye mbaya zaidi ya tatu za mwisho; Wakati Tyler alifanya makosa makubwa kwenye gari lake la mwisho na rekodi duni ya Daniella, pamoja na kutokuwa na hatia kwa hatari kwenye barabara kuu, labda ilimfanya apewe jina mbaya zaidi katika misimu mingi iliyopita, Krystal anakubaliwa kuwa dhahiri kuwa mbaya zaidi kwa uadui wake na kukataa kujifunza. Andrew, hata hivyo, anaonyesha tamaa kwamba hawakuweza kufikia kwa Krystal vizuri na anahisi kuwa walishindwa kama waalimu msimu huu. Cam, hata hivyo, anamwambia asihisi hivyo, akimkumbusha yeye na wataalam wengine kwamba kumekuwa na wengine kama Krystal (akielezea huko Colin Sheppard kutoka "Dereva Mbaya zaidi wa Canada 2" na Scott Schurink kutoka "Dereva Mbaya zaidi wa 6") ambao walipewa nafasi ya kufanya mabadiliko, lakini hawakuchukua kabisa.

Katika kila msimu, kawaida madereva wanane na wateule wao (msimu wa kumi na moja walikuwa na madereva tisa na msimu wa kumi na nne walikuwa na wajiandikishaji) katika Kituo cha Ukarabati wa Dereva ambapo wanashindana katika changamoto iliyoundwa kuboresha ustadi wao wa kuendesha gari kwa juhudi za kutoitwa dereva mbaya zaidi wa Canada. Katika changamoto ya kwanza, wagombea huanza katika eneo kuhusu gari la dakika 90 kutoka kituo cha ukarabati wa dereva. Kufuatia maelekezo ambayo yamepewa, kila mgombea lazima aende kwenye kituo cha ukarabati wa dereva ambapo, alipofika, leseni ya dereva ya kila mgombea inachukuliwa (kwa misimu miwili ya kwanza, funguo zao za gari zilichukuliwa badala yake). Sehemu ya kwanza kawaida huhitimisha na kozi ya kizuizi au changamoto ya tathmini, ilimaanisha kutathmini ujuzi wa kila dereva. Mfululizo huo unajulikana kwa changamoto zake za kozi ya kizuizi. Wagombea lazima waelekeze magari yao kupitia nafasi ngumu na chini ya inchi ya kibali kwa kila upande. Kuonyesha kuwa changamoto inaweza kufanywa bila kupiga vizuizi na dereva wa wastani, mwenyeji Andrew Younghusband, mwenyewe dereva wa wastani, hufanya kila changamoto kabla ya majaribio yoyote ya mgombea alisema changamoto. Mwisho wa kila sehemu, kawaida huanza na sehemu ya pili ya kila msimu (isipokuwa msimu wa kumi na nne, ambayo Ryan Whittier aliendesha gari kwa usawa kupitia changamoto ya tathmini), kila mgombea hukutana na Andrew na jopo la wataalam wanne kwa tathmini ya utendaji wake. Baada ya wagombea wote waliobaki kuhojiwa, wataalam na Andrew kwa makusudi ambayo mgombea na jozi za watendaji wameboresha vya kutosha kuhitimu kutoka Kituo cha Ukarabati wa Dereva. Dereva ambaye amehitimu huondolewa kwenye mashindano na hupelekwa nyumbani na leseni yake akarudi kwake. Kawaida, wagombea huendesha na wateule wao kwenye gari ambao walikuwa wakifika kwenye kituo cha ukarabati wa dereva. Wakati wa mfululizo, wataalam pia huhifadhi Haki ya kutohitimu mtu yeyote wakati wa sehemu au kuhitimu wagombea wengi kwa wakati mmoja. Hadi leo, mwisho huo umetokea mara mbili tu, katika "Dereva Mbaya zaidi wa Canada 2" na Jodi Slobodesky na Sean McConnell na "Dereva Mbaya zaidi wa Canada 11" na Alex Morrison na Tina Cook (Sean walihitimu baada ya Jodi katika sehemu ya penultimate ya "Dereva mbaya wa Canada 2" kwa sharti aliyoahidi kushikamana na kikomo cha kasi). Wataalam wanaweza pia kuchagua kumfukuza mgombea yeyote mapema ambaye haonyeshi motisha yoyote ya kujifunza, ambao wanaamini hawapaswi kuendelea kuendesha au ambao hawawezi kuendelea na mpango wa ukarabati mara nyingi kwa sababu za matibabu au za kisheria. Katika mfano huu, wagombea wengine huondolewa kwenye mashindano na funguo zao au leseni hurejeshwa na wanapewa safari ya kwenda nyumbani na wateule wao. To date, this has happened only four times, in "Canada's Worst Driver 2" with Colin Sheppard, "Canada's Worst Driver 4" with Donna Hicks, "Canada's Worst Driver 6" with Scott Schurink and "Canada's Worst Driver Ever" with Angelina Marcantognini (Colin was expelled for showing no desire to learn, while Donna was removed in part due to angina, Scott's nominator, Danny Bridgman, cancelled his shared insurance Sera, ikimpa Scott kushindwa kuendelea kwani hakuweza kulipia bima na Angelina aliondolewa kwa sehemu kutokana na ukosefu wa dawa). Walakini, mgombea aliyefukuzwa mapema au mgombea ambaye anakataa kuendelea bado anaweza kuzingatiwa kwa kichwa, kama ilivyokuwa katika "Dereva Mbaya zaidi wa Canada," ambayo Dale Pitton alifukuzwa katika sehemu ya pili hadi ya mwisho, ili kurudishwa kwa uwasilishaji wa nyara. Katika hali mbaya, wataalam wanaweza kuwasiliana na Wizara ya Uchukuzi na ombi kwamba leseni ya dereva ichukuliwe, ikiwa wanaamini kuwa mgombea hafai kuendelea kuendesha gari. Hadi leo, hii imetokea mara mbili tu, katika "Dereva Mbaya zaidi wa Canada 4" na Donna na "Mbaya zaidi ya Canada Dereva aliyewahi "na Dale. Mchakato wa kuondoa unaendelea hadi wagombea watatu tu waliobaki (kusudi la asili lilikuwa kwa wagombea wawili kubaki, lakini kwa sababu ya msimu wa kwanza ulio na sehemu ambayo hakuna mtu aliyehitimu kwa sababu ya utendaji duni katika trela ya kurudisha nyuma na ambayo ilipeana nafasi za mwisho, ambazo zilikuwa za mwisho, ambazo zilitoa mara tatu, ambazo zilitoa mara tatu, ambazo ni za kawaida, ambazo ni za kawaida, ambazo ni za kawaida, ambazo ni za kawaida, ambazo ndizo ambazo ndizo ambazo ndizo ambazo ndizo zilizokuwa na wakati huo huo, ambao walitoa nafasi ya mwisho ya Canada. Katika muda fulani, ikifuatiwa na Mega Challenge- kozi ya kizuizi na mambo ya karibu kila changamoto ya zamani (Changamoto ya kawaida ya kusawazisha, miongoni mwa wengine, sio sehemu ya Changamoto ya Mega, lakini kila changamoto ambayo ni ya vitendo kujumuisha "Je!" Pamoja na Uchunguzi wa Msimu Changamoto tatu (katika msimu wa kwanza, kulikuwa na changamoto mbili tu, Changamoto ya Mega na Mtihani wa Barabara kupitia Montreal, Quebec, zote mbili ambazo "mshindi" Chris Ferguson alithibitisha kuwa mbaya zaidi), wataalam huamua ni ipi kati ya watatu ni dereva wa Canada. Kutokuhitimu kutoka Kituo cha Ukarabati wa Dereva, wakati mgombea ambaye aligundua kuwa mbaya zaidi ya tatu anachukuliwa kuwa mhitimu (isipokuwa msimu wa kumi na moja, ambayo, licha ya kuwa ya tatu mbaya, Sholom Hoffman alishindwa kuhitimu kutokana na rekodi yake duni katika Rehab, kumaliza na kiwango cha kupita cha 1/23, akifunga na Angelina kwa kiwango cha chini).

Wakati wataalam wanamchukulia Daniella kuwa mwigizaji bora katika sehemu hii na kumsifu kwa kutafiti jinsi ya kubadili vizuri trela kwa wakati wake, anakiri kwamba bado anapata barabara kuu inayoendesha uzoefu wenye kusumbua sana na bado haijamaliza kuhitimu. Mike pia hataki kuhitimu licha ya kufanya vizuri hadi sasa, lakini ana hakika kuwa yeye sio dereva mbaya zaidi wa Canada. Krystal haamini kuwa yeye ndiye dereva mbaya zaidi wa Canada na anadai kwamba Tyler ndiye mbaya zaidi wa kikundi, kitu ambacho Tyler mwenyewe anakiri kuwa ndio kesi. Kwa sehemu ya pili mfululizo, Mike ndiye mtu pekee aliyeorodheshwa. Licha ya hamu yake ya kukaa katika rehab, kukosekana kwa mhitimu mwingine yeyote anayeweza kuhitimu na maoni mazuri ya Tim kuhusu utendaji wake katika barabara kuu kati ya changamoto huona Mike kuwa mhitimu mwingine.

Ugunduzi wa Wavuti wa Kituo cha Ugunduzi kwa sehemu hii: Kwa kufikiria, Jakob na Mike wanaonyesha nia ya kuondoka. Arun hajisikii tayari kuhitimu bado, lakini ana hakika kuwa yeye sio mbaya zaidi ya madereva waliobaki, wakati Angelina hatimaye anaanza kuamini kuwa yeye ndiye dereva mbaya zaidi wa Canada. Wataalam, hata hivyo, hawakubaliani katika uamuzi wao bila wazo la pili- Jakob, aliyeorodheshwa lakini alipita mara tatu kwa sababu ya mtu mwingine aliye na shughuli ya kuzuka, ndiye mhitimu wa msimu huo, akimtuma Arun kwenye fainali na Mike na Angelina.

Dereva mbaya zaidi wa Canada alikuwa msimu wa tisa wa kipindi cha Televisheni cha ukweli wa Canada "Dereva Mbaya zaidi wa Canada," ambayo ilirushwa kwenye kituo cha Ugunduzi. Kama ilivyo kwa miaka iliyopita, watu wanane, walioteuliwa na familia zao au marafiki, wanaingia Kituo cha Ukarabati wa Dereva ili kuboresha ujuzi wao wa kuendesha. Msimu huu ulirudisha wagombea tisa wa zamani, ambao waliitwa dereva mbaya zaidi wa Canada au walishindwa kuhitimu katika sehemu ya mwisho ya misimu yao, wakiwapa nafasi moja zaidi ya kuboresha kuendesha gari kwao na epuka kutajwa kuwa dereva mbaya zaidi wa Canada. Mwaka huu, Kituo cha Ukarabati wa Dereva kiko kwenye uwanja wa ndege wa sasa wa Dunnville huko Dunnville, Ontario kwa msimu wa nne wa moja kwa moja. Dereva ya kwanza ilianza huko Thorold, Ontario na mtihani wa mwisho wa barabara ulitokea huko Hamilton, Ontario. Msimu huu uliona wagombea tisa wa zamani wakirudi kutoka misimu iliyopita, na ndio msimu pekee hadi sasa kuwa na wagombea tisa. Walakini, pia ina wahitimu wachache hadi sasa na wanne tu. Sita kati yao walirudi na wateule wao wa asili na wawili (Dale na, mwanzoni, Michael) walijiunga na wateule wapya, wakati Chris alirudi bila mteule naye. Msimu pekee wa kuona hakuna wagombea wanaorudi ni "Dereva Mbaya zaidi wa Canada 4" (Ashley van Ham na Emily Wang labda walikuwa busy sana kurudi au hawakuwa tayari kujionea aibu mara ya pili).

Kumbuka: Sehemu hii haikuonyesha skrini ya kichwa cha ufunguzi au kutangaza uhuishaji wa ufunguzi.Note: mikopo ambayo ilizunguka baada ya kumalizika kwa "Trailer Parking Boys" ilipewa sifa ya Advanced Motoring Ofisi ya Peter Mellor kama "Mtu wa Afrika Kusini kutoka Sekunde 5, 6 na 7" na "Dereva Mbaya zaidi wa Canada 12" "Mshindi" Krystal McCann kama "Potato." " Katika mkutano wao wa mwisho na wataalam, Ashley anakiri waziwazi kwamba, Andrew asingekuwa naye, angekuwa zaidi ya uwezekano wa kumgonga mtembea kwa miguu wakati wa kuendesha. Pamoja na hayo, sio tu kwamba Ashley anaamini yeye sio dereva mbaya zaidi wa Canada, kwa kweli anadai kwamba anastahili kuwa mhitimu wa mwisho. Adamu pia anahisi kuwa anastahili kuhitimu, kwa sababu zaidi machoni pa wataalam. Mélanie, hata hivyo, anakiri kwamba anaweza kuwa dereva mbaya zaidi wa Canada na kwamba, kwa sababu ya kuwa mama mmoja, hawezi kumudu masomo zaidi ya kuendesha. Katika majadiliano yaliyofuata, jopo linaonekana haraka kufikia makubaliano kwamba Adamu, ambaye alikuwa ameorodheshwa wiki nne mfululizo, lakini alikosa kuhitimu kila sehemu kwa misingi ambayo Breanna alifanikiwa kumaliza barabara kuu na Tim, ukosefu wake wa kuhitimu licha ya kuwa yeye ndiye anayesimamia tu, akifanya kazi kwa kila mtu anayefanya vizuri, akifanya kazi kwa kila mtu anayefanya vizuri, akifanya kazi kwa kila mtu anayefanya vizuri, na yeye anafanya vizuri kama vile alivyokuwa akifanya vizuri, yeye ni mtu wa kuhitimu kuwa yeye ni mtu wa kwanza na anaonekana kuwa yeye ni mtu wa kwanza na anaonekana kuwa yeye ni mtu wa kwanza kuhitimu kuwa yeye ni mtu wa kwanza kuhitimu Mhitimu wa mwisho, wakati Mélanie ndiye dereva mbaya zaidi wa Canada kwa kutofanya bidii kubwa ya kuboresha msimu wote. Walakini, Philippe basi anapingana na kumwona Ashley kuwa mbaya zaidi kwa utendaji wake mbaya wa changamoto na karibu kusababisha ajali mbaya katika mtihani wa barabara na pande zote pamoja naye, akisema kwamba, duni na hasi kama mtazamo wa Mélanie kwenye gari la mwisho ulikuwa (na Bwana anajua mtazamo wake ulikuwa duni na hasi), makosa yake yalikuwa madogo. Kwa mshtuko wa Andrew, Shyamala basi hubadilisha "akili yake" na anakubaliana na Cam na Philippe kwa kuwa Ashley ni Dereva mbaya zaidi wa Canada. Tim, hata hivyo, anashikilia uamuzi wake wa kwanza na majaji Mélanie kuwa mbaya zaidi, kitu ambacho Andrew anakubaliana nacho, na kumuacha Shyamala, ambaye Andrew anahisi bado yuko kwenye uzio, na uamuzi wa mwisho. Katika sherehe ya nyara, Andrew anamtaja Adamu kama mhitimu wa mwisho kwa mtihani wake wa barabara na kwa ujumla akifanya vizuri msimu wote na Adamu anaondoka, akitangaza kwamba kituo chake cha pili ni gurudumu la Ferris huko Niagara Falls. This, therefore, leaves Mélanie and Ashley as the final two (only the fifth time in the show's history that both of the final two are women, after Ashley van Ham and Emily Wang from "Canada's Worst Driver 4," Chanie Richard and Siham Martell from "Canada's Worst Driver 10," Jillian Matthews and Polly Sergeant from "Canada's Worst Driver 11" and Krystal McCann and Daniella Fiorica from the previous msimu). Baada ya Adamu kuondoka, Andrew atatangaza kwamba, mwishowe, Mélanie ndiye dereva mbaya zaidi wa Canada, akihukumu ukosefu wake wa jumla wa juhudi na tabia mbaya msimu wote kuwa dhambi mbaya kuliko kosa la Ashley katika mchezo wake wa mwisho, haswa ukizingatia kuwa Mélanie ana watoto wanne ambao wanamtegemea. Wakati Ashley anaondoka bila kuhitimu, Andrew na Jillian wanapeana maneno yake ya kutia moyo kwa kuepusha hatima ya Jillian wakati wa kuonekana kwake kwenye onyesho, ambapo aliitwa Mbaya zaidi baada ya kushindwa hata kujaribu Mtihani wa Barabara na Ashley angalau aliweza kumfukuza, kitu Jillian hakuweza kufanya wakati wa kuonekana kwake, kama Mitchell alilazimika kumfukuza. Mélanie basi huwasilishwa na nyara, lakini "hufanya" kupata habari njema kwa kuwa, kwa kuwa wataalam hawaamini kuwa yeye ni dereva mbaya sana kwamba anapaswa kuacha kuendesha gari kabisa (haswa kutokana na matokeo ambayo hii itakuwa nayo kwa watoto wake), wamepanga kwa ajili yake kuwa na masomo ya kuendesha gari wakati anafika nyumbani. Pamoja na hayo, Mélanie anampa Andrew kidole wakati Christina anamwondoa kama mtu wa 13 ataitwa jina Dereva mbaya zaidi wa Canada, na sauti ya kufunga ya Andrew ikifunua kwamba, licha ya onyesho kulipia masomo ya ziada mapema, Mélanie hakuwahi kusumbua mara moja.

Dereva mbaya zaidi wa Canada 13 ilikuwa msimu wa kumi na tatu wa kipindi cha Televisheni cha ukweli wa Canada "Dereva Mbaya zaidi wa Canada," ambayo ilirushwa kwenye kituo cha Ugunduzi. Kama ilivyo kwa miaka iliyopita, watu wanane, walioteuliwa na familia zao au marafiki, wanaingia Kituo cha Ukarabati wa Dereva ili kuboresha ujuzi wao wa kuendesha. Lengo la msimu huu lilikuwa juu ya hofu ya kuendesha na nambari 13. Mwaka huu, Kituo cha Ukarabati wa Dereva kiko kwenye Uwanja wa Ndege wa Dunnville huko Dunnville, Ontario kwa msimu wa nane. Dereva ya awali ilianza huko St. Catharines, Ontario na mtihani wa mwisho wa barabara ulitokea Hamilton, Ontario. Katika mkutano wao wa kwanza na wataalam, Mélanie anasema kwamba anataka kuboresha kama dereva kwa ajili ya watoto wake wanne, wakati Shayne anaambiwa kwamba, licha ya kile Andrew amewaambia wagombea wa zamani, polepole haimaanishi salama. Shayne pia yuko tayari kukubali kuwa anaweza kuwa dereva mbaya zaidi wa Canada, kama vile Ashley na Breanna. Madereva wengine wanakataa kuwa wanaweza kuwa mbaya zaidi. Kama ilivyo kawaida kwa onyesho, hakuna mtu anayehitimu katika sehemu ya kwanza, kwani hii ilikuwa tathmini ya ustadi tu. Wakati wa mkutano na wataalam, Julie hufanya kesi kali kwa kuwa mhitimu wa kwanza wa msimu, akikubali kwamba amejifunza mengi na anahitaji kukua. Joe pia anaelezea hamu ya kuhitimu, lakini anaharibu nafasi zake kwa kukubali kwamba labda hatapunguza kasi ikiwa ataruhusiwa kwenda nyumbani na kisha anakubali kwamba hata kama binti yake alikuwa ndani ya gari mbele, asingepunguza polepole. Kwa mshtuko wa Joe, binti yake, Kristin, kisha huletwa ndani ya studio na ana uwezo wa kumshawishi aahidi kuwa dereva salama, kwa ajili yake mwenyewe na familia yake. Kwa dhahiri kuwa hakuna kitu wataalam wanaweza kumfundisha Joe katika suala la ustadi wa kiufundi, majadiliano hubadilika haraka kuwa moja ya "jinsi" anapaswa kuacha rehab; Tim haamini ahadi yake ya kupungua na kutetea kumfukuza badala ya kumruhusu ahitimu. Walakini, wataalam wengine hatimaye wanaamini vya kutosha Kwa ahadi ya Joe kwa Kristin kumruhusu kuhitimu. Kabla hajaondoka, Joe anapewa picha ya nyuma ya kioo-macho na picha ya Kristin juu yake ili kumkumbusha asiharakishe tena.

Dereva mbaya zaidi wa Canada 5 ilikuwa msimu wa tano wa kipindi cha Televisheni cha ukweli wa Canada "Dereva Mbaya zaidi wa Canada," ambayo ilirushwa kwenye Kituo cha Ugunduzi. Kama ilivyo kwa miaka iliyopita, watu wanane, walioteuliwa na familia zao au marafiki, wanaingia Kituo cha Ukarabati wa Dereva ili kuboresha ujuzi wao wa kuendesha. Mwaka huu, Kituo cha Ukarabati wa Dereva kiko katika CFB Borden, msingi wa kijeshi uliotumiwa hapo awali kama kituo cha rehab cha "Dereva Mbaya zaidi wa Canada 2"; Walakini, inajulikana tu hewani kama "eneo la jeshi ambalo halijajulikana." Lengo la msimu huu lilikuwa kwenye kambi ya boot ya dereva. Uzinduzi wa mfululizo uliwekwa sanjari na uzinduzi wa sheria mpya huko Ontario kuzuia matumizi ya vifaa vya elektroniki vya mkono wakati wa kuendesha. Marufuku kama hiyo yameanzishwa huko Atlantic Canada na Quebec, na Manitoba na Saskatchewan kuzingatia sheria kama hizo. Dereva ya kwanza ilianza huko Barrie, Ontario na mtihani wa mwisho wa barabara ulitokea Toronto, Ontario kwa mwaka wa pili mfululizo na wa tatu katika misimu minne iliyopita. Msimu huu pia itakuwa ya pili kuonyeshwa kwenye duka la iTunes na ya kwanza kuwa na vipindi vipya siku moja baada ya kuanza kwanza.

Tofauti na "dereva mbaya zaidi wa Canada," hakuna hata mmoja wa wagombea anayeondolewa; Badala yake, mwisho wa kila sehemu, mtu atapewa jina lililoboreshwa zaidi, wakati mwingine atapewa jina mbaya zaidi. Pia, wakati wa "Handyman Mbaya zaidi wa Canada" ni mfupi sana, hudumu kwa wiki mbili tu, tofauti na wiki nane za "Dereva Mbaya zaidi wa Canada," na kila sehemu ikitajwa siku moja au mbili, tofauti na wiki kwa "dereva mbaya zaidi wa Canada." Kwenye sehemu ya sita, wagombea watano watafanya kazi kwa pamoja kurekebisha nyumba katika masaa kumi, na yule aliye na utendaji mbaya zaidi wa mtu mmoja anayeitwa Canada mbaya zaidi wa Canada. Kama "Dereva Mbaya zaidi wa Canada," wagombea "" wanaambatana na wateule wao, ambao wanaruhusiwa kuwasaidia katika kazi zao mbali mbali. Kila sehemu (isipokuwa fainali) pia ina "changamoto ya kikundi," ambayo hufanywa na wagombea watano kama kikundi. Isipokuwa kwa changamoto ya kikundi cha kwanza, kila changamoto ya kikundi hicho ina mgombea aliyetajwa kama msimamizi wa mradi na jina la Foreman anapewa mgombea aliyeboreshwa zaidi kwa wiki iliyopita; Twist hii iliongezwa wakati majaji waliona jinsi walivyofanya vibaya kwenye Changamoto ya Kikundi cha Kwanza bila kiongozi aliyeteuliwa. Mshindani aliyetajwa kuwa mbaya zaidi katika kila onyesho analazimika "kunyongwa kichwa kwa aibu" na kucha picha yao kwenye "ukuta wa aibu" na kufundishwa kibinafsi na Younghusband kwenye kipengele kinachoongoza kwa uteuzi wao. Wagombea watano wa msimu wa kwanza ni kama ifuatavyo:

Kumbuka: Sehemu hii haikuonyesha skrini ya kichwa cha ufunguzi au kutangaza uhuishaji wa ufunguzi. Katika mkutano wao wa mwisho na wataalam, madereva watatu waliobaki wanaulizwa ikiwa ni dereva mbaya zaidi wa Canada; Sholom anakiri kuwa labda ni, Jillian anajaribu kukwepa swali kabla ya kusema kwamba yeye sio, wakati Polly Angrely anasema yeye sio mbaya zaidi, lakini kwamba yeye ni dereva mbaya. Wataalam hujikuta katika safu kubwa ya msimu, ikiwa sio wakati wowote- Sholom, ambaye kila mtu alitarajia kuwa mbaya zaidi baada ya kusonga mbele na kubadili, kwa kweli ndiye mtu mmoja ambaye wataalam wote wanakubali "sio" dereva mbaya zaidi wa Canada, kwani alikuwa na mtihani bora wa barabara na ndiye anayejua zaidi mapungufu yake kama dereva. Kama ilivyo kwa mbili zilizobaki, hata hivyo, wakati Polly kwa ujumla anakubaliwa kuwa dereva mbaya zaidi kuliko Jillian, ukweli unabaki kuwa Jillian hakuweza hata kujaribu gari la mwisho la barabara. Shyamala na Philippe wanahisi kuwa kutokuwa na huruma kwa Polly kunamfanya kuwa dereva mbaya zaidi, wakati Andrew na Cam wana wasiwasi kuwa mashambulio ya hofu ya Jillian ni dhima kubwa kuliko kutokujali kwa Polly, kwa mara nyingine tena wakimuacha Tim na kura ya kuamua. Madereva watatu wa mwisho wanakusanyika kwa uwasilishaji wa nyara na Andrew atangaza kwamba Sholom ameepuka kutajwa kuwa mbaya zaidi, kwa sababu tu hakuwa mbaya kama Polly katika changamoto na kumaliza mtihani wake wa barabara. Walakini, rekodi yake duni sana inamaanisha kuwa anaondoka bila kuhitimu, kwani alipitisha changamoto moja tu wakati wa kipindi chake kwenye onyesho, kurudi nyuma (mbali na Angelina, dereva mwingine tu alipaswa kupitisha changamoto moja tu wakati wao kwenye show alikuwa Donna Hick kutoka kwa "Dereva wa Canada 4 tu, kwa sababu ya Kupitia kwa Salama. Dereva wa nafasi ya tatu aliwahi kuhitimu, ingawa Andrew anamwambia kwamba, akipewa uzoefu zaidi na elimu, anaweza Labda siku moja huwa dereva anayefaa. Hii, kwa hivyo, inamwacha Jillian na Polly kama mbili za mwisho (mara ya tatu tu katika historia ya onyesho kwamba wote wawili wa mwisho ni wanawake, baada ya Ashley van Ham na Emily Wang kutoka "Dereva Mbaya zaidi wa Canada 4" na Chanie Richard na Siham Martell kutoka msimu uliopita). Baada ya Sholom kuondoka, Andrew kwa huzuni anasema kwa kutangaza kwamba, mwishowe, Jillian alihukumiwa kuwa dereva mbaya zaidi wa Canada, kitu ambacho Jillian humenyuka kwa hasira, akikataa kuwa yeye ni mbaya kuliko Polly (au hata Sholom), lakini Andrew anasema kwamba Polly alimaliza mtihani wa mwisho wa barabara, wakati Jillian hakufanya na kwamba kila dereva aliyeshindwa alimaliza barabara hiyo ilimtaja kuwa barabara ilimaliza kwa muda mrefu ilimtaja kuwa Polly alimaliza njia ya mwisho ya barabara ya mwisho, wakati yeye alimaliza muda wake wa kumaliza kwa muda mrefu, Andrew and and and and and and and a n a n a n a n a n a n a n a. "Dereva mbaya zaidi wa Canada 2," Lance Morin kutoka "Dereva Mbaya zaidi wa Canada 6" na Kevin Simmons kutoka "Dereva Mbaya zaidi wa Canada"). Andrew anarudisha leseni ya Polly kwake na anamwuliza Jeff aendeshe nyumbani kwake, akisema kwamba aliepuka kichwa hicho na bado anapendekeza aache kuendesha. Jillian amewasilishwa na nyara, faraja pekee ni kwamba anahisi kuwa na nafasi zaidi ya kuwa dereva anayefaa kuliko Polly anafanya na kwamba, licha ya matokeo, uhusiano wake na Mitchell umeboreshwa na uzoefu, hadi wakati wangefunga ndoa na Mkubwa.

question_en: What is the name of the Steelers home stadium in Pittsburg?
pos_context_en: Heinz Field is a stadium located in the North Shore neighborhood of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, United States. It primarily serves as the home to the Pittsburgh Steelers of the National Football League (NFL) and the Pittsburgh Panthers of the National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA). The stadium opened in 2001, after the controlled implosion of the teams' previous stadium, Three Rivers Stadium. The stadium is named for the locally based H. J. Heinz Company, which purchased the naming rights in 2001. It hosted the 2011 NHL Winter Classic between the Pittsburgh Penguins and Washington Capitals on January 1, 2011. On September 10, 2016, it hosted the Keystone Classic, which featured a renewal of the Penn State-Pitt football rivalry, setting a new attendance record at 69,983 people. In 2017 it hosted the Coors Light Stadium Series game featuring the Pittsburgh Penguins and Philadelphia Flyers.
neg_context_en: The NFL's Steelers played home games at Forbes Field from their 1933 inception to 1957. They first played at Pitt Stadium in 1942, in an exhibition match for U.S.O. charity against the Fort Knox "Armoraiders" on November 15. From 1958 to 1963, the Steelers split home games between Forbes Field and Pitt Stadium. Fans were able to purchase season ticket packages for one site or the other. In 1964, the Steelers began to play home games exclusively at Pitt Stadium, which they continued until moving to the new Three Rivers Stadium in 1970. Of historic note, the iconic photo of New York Giants quarterback Y. A. Tittle, helmet-less, bloodied and kneeling, was taken at Pitt Stadium in 1964 following a Giants' loss to the Steelers on September 20. The photo, taken by "Pittsburgh Post-Gazette" photographer Morris Berman, now hangs in the Pro Football Hall of Fame.

The Steelers, whose history traces to a regional pro team that was established in the early 1920s, joined the NFL as the Pittsburgh Pirates on July 8, 1933, owned by Art Rooney and taking its original name from the baseball team of the same name, as was common practice for NFL teams at the time. To distinguish them from the baseball team, local media took to calling the football team the Rooneymen, an unofficial nickname which persisted for decades after the team adopted its current nickname. The ownership of the Steelers has remained within the Rooney family since its founding. Art's son, Dan Rooney owned the team from 1988 until his death in 2017. Much control of the franchise has been given to Dan's son Art Rooney II. The Steelers enjoy a large, widespread fanbase nicknamed Steeler Nation. The Steelers currently play their home games at Heinz Field on Pittsburgh's North Side in the North Shore neighborhood, which also hosts the University of Pittsburgh Panthers. Built in 2001, the stadium replaced Three Rivers Stadium which hosted the Steelers for 31 seasons. Prior to Three Rivers, the Steelers had played their games in Pitt Stadium and Forbes Field.

In 1909 the Panthers, along with the Pirates, moved to Forbes Field, located on campus, where they played until 1924. In 1925, Pitt Stadium was completed on the opposite end of the campus, giving the Panthers their only private stadium. Pitt Stadium was home for the Panthers although the Steelers also used it for home games in the mid-1960s. Following the demolition of Pitt Stadium in 1999, the Panthers moved to Three Rivers Stadium, again on the North Shore, where the Pirates and Steelers had played since 1970. A handful of nationally televised Pitt Panther football games from the late 1970s to 1999 were played as home games not at Pitt Stadium but at Three Rivers with its more modern facilities.

The Pittsburgh Steelers and the Pittsburgh Pirates shared Three Rivers Stadium from 1970 to 2000. After discussions over the Pirates building a full-time baseball park, a proposal was made to renovate Three Rivers Stadium into a full-time football facility. Though met with negative reaction from Steelers ownership, the proposal was used as a "fallback position" that would be used if discussions for a new stadium failed. Steelers ownership stated that failing to build a new stadium would hurt the franchise's chances of signing players who might opt to sign with other teams, such as the other three teams in the Steelers division who had all recently built new football-only stadiums. In June 2001, the H. J. Heinz Company purchased the naming rights to the stadium. As per the deal, Heinz will pay the Steelers a total of $57 million through 2021; the "57" being an intentional reference to Heinz 57. Despite Heinz later announcing its acquisition of Kraft Foods Group to form Kraft Heinz Company in 2015, the stadium's name will remain Heinz Field.

Funded in conjunction with PNC Park and the David L. Lawrence Convention Center, the $281 million (equivalent to $ million in ) stadium stands along the Ohio River, on the Northside of Pittsburgh in the North Shore neighborhood. The stadium was designed with the city of Pittsburgh's history of steel production in mind, which led to the inclusion of 12,000 tons of steel into construction. Ground for the stadium was broken in June 1999 and the first football game was hosted in September 2001. The stadium's natural grass surface has been criticized throughout its history, but Steelers ownership has kept the grass after lobbying from players and coaches. Attendance for the 68,400 seat stadium has sold out for every Steelers home game, a streak which dates back to 1972 (a year before local telecasts of sold out home games were permitted in the NFL). A collection of memorabilia from the Steelers and Panthers of the past can be found in the Great Hall.

Due to the size of Vanderbilt Stadium in Nashville (only 41,000 seats), the now-Tennessee Oilers decided to play at the Liberty Bowl Memorial Stadium in Memphis as an interim home until what would become LP Field was ready to open in 1999. Ironically, most of the crowds in Memphis were more than small enough that Vanderbilt Stadium would've been able to accommodate them. Despite that, the Oilers were planning on playing there again for 1998. That changed after the final game of the season, when the Oilers faced the Steelers in front of 50,677 fans—the only crowd that could not have been reasonably accommodated at Vanderbilt. However, Steeler fans made up the great majority of the crowd (at least three-fourths, by one estimate ), despite the fact that it was a meaningless game for both teams (the Steelers already clinched the AFC Central and a first-round bye in the playoffs, Oilers were already eliminated from the playoffs) and the Steelers were resting several starters. The Oilers won 16–6 against mostly Steelers backup players. Adams was so embarrassed that he abandoned plans to play the 1998 season in Memphis and ended up moving to Vanderbilt after all. Adams would rename the team the Titans in 1999 when Adelphia Coliseum (now LP Field) opened.

In 2001, the Steelers moved into Heinz Field. The franchise dating back to 1933 has had several homes. For thirty-one seasons, the Steelers shared Forbes Field with the Pittsburgh Pirates from 1933 to 1963. In 1958, though they started splitting their home games at Pitt Stadium three blocks away at the University of Pittsburgh. From 1964 to 1969, the Steelers played exclusively at the on campus facility before moving with the Pirates to Three Rivers Stadium on the city's Northside. Three Rivers is remembered fondly by the Steeler Nation as where Chuck Noll and Dan Rooney turned the franchise into a powerhouse, winning four Super Bowls in just six seasons and making the playoffs 11 times in 13 seasons from 1972 to 1984, the AFC title game seven times. Since 2001 however a new generation of Steeler greats has made Heinz Field legendary with multiple AFC Championship Games being hosted and two Super Bowl championships.

The Pittsburgh Steelers played their first game in Three Rivers Stadium on September 20, 1970—a 19–7 loss to the Houston Oilers. Throughout their 31 seasons in Three Rivers Stadium, the Steelers posted a record of 182–72, including a 13-5 playoff record, and defeated every visiting franchise at least once from the stadium's opening to close, enjoying perfect records there against seven teams. The Steelers sold out every home game from 1972 through the closing of the stadium, a streak which continues through 2008. The largest attendance for a football game was on January 15, 1995, when 61,545 spectators witnessed the Steelers lose to the San Diego Chargers. On December 23, 1972, Three Rivers Stadium was site to the Immaculate Reception, which became regarded as one of the greatest plays in NFL history. Three Rivers Stadium hosted seven AFC Championship Games from 1972 to 1998; the Steelers won four. In the , the Steelers' Randy Fuller deflected a Hail Mary pass intended for Indianapolis Colts receiver Aaron Bailey as time expired, to send the franchise to their 5th Super Bowl. A Steelers symbol recognized worldwide, The Terrible Towel debuted on December 27, 1975, at Three Rivers Stadium. The Steelers would move to Heinz Field after it was closed.

"at Pitt Stadium, Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania"Scoring Drives:The Steelers bounced back with an impressive effort against the powerhouse Cowboys at home. Dallas was playing to clinch a playoff spot but they had to battle through a mud bog to earn the prize. What turned out to be the winning field goal was set up by a punt return from Mel Renfro. The Steelers didn't cross midfield until the 4th quarter as snow began to fall. They kept the game close until Dick Shiner came off the bench and led them to a touchdown drive. A drive sputtered out with less than 2 minutes left but the Steelers got yet another chance. Shiner hit Roy Jefferson on a long pass to the Dallas 20 yard line but the game ended.

The opening of Three Rivers ended their relatively brief stay at Pitt Stadium, where they had only been playing on a full-time basis for six years. Before that, the Steelers played most of their home games at Forbes Field, with occasional games being played at Pitt Stadium to take advantage of the larger capacity. The Steelers later returned the favor to the University of Pittsburgh in 2000 when the Pitt Panthers football team moved into Three Rivers for one season as an interim home before Heinz Field was ready in 2001. Pitt would also play their Backyard Brawl games against West Virginia in years Pitt hosted the game during the existence of Three Rivers.
question_src: Je! Jina la Uwanja wa Nyumba wa Steelers huko Pittsburg ni nini?
pos_context_src: Heinz Field ni uwanja ulioko katika kitongoji cha North Shore cha Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, United States. Kwa kweli ni nyumba ya Pittsburgh Steelers ya Ligi ya Soka ya Kitaifa (NFL) na Pittsburgh Panthers ya Chama cha Wanariadha wa Kitaifa (NCAA). Uwanja ulifunguliwa mnamo 2001, baada ya kuwekwa kwa udhibiti wa uwanja wa zamani wa timu, Uwanja wa Mito Tatu. Uwanja huo umetajwa kwa kampuni ya ndani ya H. J. Heinz, ambayo ilinunua haki za kumtaja mnamo 2001. Ilishiriki NHL msimu wa baridi wa NHL kati ya Penguins za Pittsburgh na Washington Capitals mnamo Januari 1, mnamo Septemba 10, 2016, ilishiriki Keystone Classic, ambayo ilionyesha upya wa Penn-Pitt Spect. Mnamo mwaka wa 2017 ilishiriki mchezo wa Mfululizo wa Uwanja wa Coors Light ulio na Penguins za Pittsburgh na Flyers za Philadelphia.
neg_context_src: Steelers ya NFL ilicheza michezo ya nyumbani huko Forbes Field tangu kuanzishwa kwao 1933 hadi 1957. Walicheza kwa mara ya kwanza kwenye Uwanja wa Pitt mnamo 1942, kwenye mechi ya maonyesho ya U.S.O. Misaada dhidi ya Fort Knox "Armoraiders" mnamo Novemba 15. Kuanzia 1958 hadi 1963, Steelers waligawanya michezo ya nyumbani kati ya uwanja wa Forbes na Uwanja wa Pitt. Mashabiki waliweza kununua vifurushi vya tikiti za msimu kwa tovuti moja au nyingine. Mnamo mwaka wa 1964, Steelers walianza kucheza michezo ya nyumbani peke yake kwenye Uwanja wa Pitt, ambao waliendelea hadi kuhamia Uwanja mpya wa Mito Tatu mnamo 1970. Kwa kumbukumbu ya kihistoria, picha ya picha ya New York Giants Quarterback Y. A. Tittle, Helmet-chini, Damu na Kupiga magoti, ilichukuliwa kwenye Uwanja wa Pitt mnamo 1964 kufuatia vibanda vya Septers. Baada ya gazeti "mpiga picha Morris Berman, sasa hutegemea Ukumbi wa Soka la Pro.

Steelers, ambayo historia yake inafuata timu ya pro ya mkoa ambayo ilianzishwa mapema miaka ya 1920, ilijiunga na NFL kama maharamia wa Pittsburgh mnamo Julai 8, 1933, inayomilikiwa na Art Rooney na kuchukua jina lake la asili kutoka kwa timu ya baseball ya jina moja, kama ilivyokuwa kawaida kwa timu za NFL wakati huo. Ili kuwatofautisha na timu ya baseball, vyombo vya habari vya ndani vilichukua kuiita timu ya mpira wa miguu Rooneymen, jina la utani lisilo rasmi ambalo liliendelea kwa miongo kadhaa baada ya timu kupitisha jina lake la utani la sasa. Umiliki wa Steelers umebaki ndani ya familia ya Rooney tangu kuanzishwa kwake. Mwana wa Sanaa, Dan Rooney alimiliki timu hiyo kutoka 1988 hadi kifo chake mnamo 2017. Udhibiti mwingi wa Franchise umepewa mtoto wa Dani Art Rooney II. Steelers wanafurahia shabiki mkubwa, aliyeenea kwa jina la Steeler Nation. Steelers kwa sasa wanacheza michezo yao ya nyumbani kwenye uwanja wa Heinz kwenye upande wa kaskazini wa Pittsburgh katika kitongoji cha North Shore, ambacho pia kinashikilia Chuo Kikuu cha Pittsburgh Panthers. Ilijengwa mnamo 2001, uwanja ulibadilisha Uwanja wa Mito tatu ambao uliwakaribisha Steelers kwa misimu 31. Kabla ya mito mitatu, Steelers walikuwa wamecheza michezo yao kwenye uwanja wa Pitt na uwanja wa Forbes.

Mnamo 1909 Panthers, pamoja na Maharamia, walihamia Forbes Field, iliyoko chuo kikuu, ambapo walicheza hadi 1924. Mnamo 1925, Uwanja wa Pitt ulikamilishwa upande wa pili wa chuo hicho, wakiwapa Panthers uwanja wao wa kibinafsi. Uwanja wa Pitt ulikuwa nyumbani kwa Panthers ingawa Steelers pia walitumia kwa michezo ya nyumbani katikati ya miaka ya 1960. Kufuatia uharibifu wa Uwanja wa Pitt mnamo 1999, Panthers walihamia kwenye Uwanja wa Mito Tatu, tena kwenye North Shore, ambapo Maharamia na Steelers walikuwa wamecheza tangu 1970. Michezo michache ya mpira wa miguu ya Pitt Panther kutoka mwishoni mwa miaka ya 1970 hadi 1999 ilichezwa kama michezo ya nyumbani sio kwenye Uwanja wa Pitt lakini kwenye vituo vitatu na vifaa vyake vya kisasa zaidi.

Pittsburgh Steelers na Pittsburgh maharamia walishiriki uwanja wa Mito Tatu kutoka 1970 hadi 2000. Baada ya majadiliano juu ya maharamia kujenga uwanja wa baseball wa wakati wote, pendekezo lilifanywa kukarabati Uwanja wa Mito tatu kuwa kituo cha mpira wa wakati wote. Ingawa ilikutana na athari mbaya kutoka kwa umiliki wa Steelers, pendekezo hilo lilitumika kama "msimamo wa kurudi nyuma" ambao utatumika ikiwa majadiliano ya uwanja mpya hayakufaulu. Umiliki wa Steelers ulisema kwamba kushindwa kujenga uwanja mpya kungeumiza nafasi za wachezaji wa kusaini wachezaji ambao wanaweza kuchagua kusaini na timu zingine, kama vile timu zingine tatu kwenye Idara ya Steelers ambao wote walikuwa wameunda viwanja vipya vya mpira wa miguu hivi karibuni. Mnamo Juni 2001, Kampuni ya H. J. Heinz ilinunua haki za kumtaja uwanja huo. Kama ilivyo kwa mpango huo, Heinz atalipa Steelers jumla ya $ 57 milioni kupitia 2021; "57" kuwa kumbukumbu ya kukusudia kwa Heinz 57. Licha ya Heinz baadaye kutangaza kupatikana kwake kwa Kraft Foods Group kuunda Kampuni ya Kraft Heinz mnamo 2015, jina la uwanja litabaki Heinz Field.

Iliyofadhiliwa kwa kushirikiana na PNC Park na Kituo cha Mkutano wa David L. Lawrence, uwanja wa $ 281 milioni (sawa na dola milioni) umesimama kando ya Mto wa Ohio, kaskazini mwa Pittsburgh katika kitongoji cha North Shore. Uwanja huo ulibuniwa na historia ya mji wa Pittsburgh wa uzalishaji wa chuma, ambayo ilisababisha kuingizwa kwa tani 12,000 za chuma kuwa ujenzi. Chini ya uwanja huo ulivunjwa mnamo Juni 1999 na mchezo wa kwanza wa mpira wa miguu ulishikiliwa mnamo Septemba 2001. Sehemu ya nyasi ya uwanja huo imekosolewa katika historia yake yote, lakini umiliki wa Steelers umeweka nyasi baada ya kushawishi kutoka kwa wachezaji na makocha. Mahudhurio ya Uwanja wa kiti cha 68,400 yameuza kwa kila mchezo wa nyumbani wa Steelers, mkondo ambao ulianza 1972 (mwaka mmoja kabla ya televisheni za mitaa zilizouzwa nje ya michezo kuruhusiwa katika NFL). Mkusanyiko wa kumbukumbu kutoka kwa Steelers na Panthers za zamani zinaweza kupatikana katika Jumba Kuu.

Kwa sababu ya saizi ya Uwanja wa Vanderbilt huko Nashville (viti 41,000 tu), Oilers wa sasa wa Tennessee waliamua kucheza kwenye Uwanja wa Ukumbusho wa Uhuru wa Bowl huko Memphis kama nyumba ya mpito hadi ile ambayo ingekuwa uwanja wa LP ulikuwa tayari kufungua mnamo 1999. Kwa kweli, wengi wa jogoo huko Memphis walikuwa zaidi ya washirika wa kutosha. Pamoja na hayo, Oilers walikuwa wakipanga kucheza huko tena kwa 1998. Hiyo ilibadilika baada ya mchezo wa mwisho wa msimu, wakati Oilers ilikabiliwa na Steelers mbele ya mashabiki 50,677 - umati wa watu ambao haungeweza kuwekwa kwa sababu huko Vanderbilt. Walakini, mashabiki wa Steeler walifanya idadi kubwa ya umati wa watu (angalau theluthi tatu, kwa makisio moja), licha ya ukweli kwamba ilikuwa mchezo usio na maana kwa timu zote mbili (Steelers tayari walikuwa wameshapata AFC Central na raundi ya kwanza katika mchezo wa kucheza, Oilers walikuwa tayari wameondolewa kutoka kwa mchezo wa kucheza) na Steelers walikuwa wakipumzika wachezaji kadhaa. Oilers walishinda 16-6 dhidi ya wachezaji wengi wa Hifadhi ya Steelers. Adams alikuwa na aibu sana hivi kwamba aliacha mipango ya kucheza msimu wa 1998 huko Memphis na kuishia kuhamia Vanderbilt baada ya yote. Adams angebadilisha timu hiyo Titans mnamo 1999 wakati Adelphia Coliseum (sasa LP Field) alifunguliwa.

Mnamo 2001, Steelers walihamia kwenye uwanja wa Heinz. Franchise iliyoanzia 1933 imekuwa na nyumba kadhaa. Kwa misimu thelathini na moja, Steelers ilishiriki uwanja wa Forbes na maharamia wa Pittsburgh kutoka 1933 hadi 1963. Mnamo 1958, ingawa walianza kugawa michezo yao ya nyumbani kwenye Uwanja wa Pitt mbali katika Chuo Kikuu cha Pittsburgh. Kuanzia 1964 hadi 1969, Steelers ilicheza peke katika kituo cha On Campus kabla ya kusonga na Uwanja wa Maharamia hadi Uwanja wa Mito Tatu upande wa kaskazini mwa jiji. Mito mitatu inakumbukwa kwa kupendeza na Taifa la Steeler kama ambapo Chuck Noll na Dan Rooney waligeuza Franchise kuwa nyumba ya umeme, wakishinda Super Bowls nne katika misimu sita tu na kufanya mchezo huo mara 11 katika misimu 13 kutoka 1972 hadi 1984, mchezo wa taji la AFC mara saba. Tangu 2001 hata hivyo kizazi kipya cha Steeler Greats kimefanya hadithi ya Heinz Field na michezo mingi ya ubingwa ya AFC kuwa mwenyeji na Mashindano mawili ya Super Bowl.

Pittsburgh Steelers walicheza mchezo wao wa kwanza katika Uwanja wa Mito tatu mnamo Septemba 20, 1970 - hasara ya 19-7 kwa Houston Oilers. Katika misimu yao yote 31 katika Uwanja wa Mito Tatu, Steelers waliweka rekodi ya 182-72, pamoja na rekodi ya kucheza 13-5, na wakashinda kila Franchise ya kutembelea angalau mara moja kutoka kwa ufunguzi wa uwanja wa kufunga, wakifurahia rekodi kamili huko dhidi ya timu saba. Steelers waliuza kila mchezo wa nyumbani kutoka 1972 kupitia kufungwa kwa uwanja huo, uwanja ambao unaendelea hadi 2008. Mahudhurio makubwa kwa mchezo wa mpira wa miguu yalikuwa Januari 15, 1995, wakati watazamaji 61,545 walishuhudia Steelers walipoteza kwa San Diego Chaja. Mnamo Desemba 23, 1972, Uwanja wa Mito Tatu ulikuwa tovuti ya mapokezi ya kifahari, ambayo ilizingatiwa kama moja ya michezo kubwa katika historia ya NFL. Uwanja wa Mito Tatu ulishiriki michezo saba ya ubingwa wa AFC kutoka 1972 hadi 1998; Steelers ilishinda nne. Katika, The Steelers 'Randy Fuller alipuuza kupitisha kwa mvua ya mawe ya Mary iliyokusudiwa kwa mpokeaji wa Indianapolis Colts Aaron Bailey kadri muda ulivyomalizika, kupeleka Franchise kwa Super Bowl yao ya 5. Alama ya Steelers inayotambuliwa ulimwenguni, taulo mbaya ilijadiliwa mnamo Desemba 27, 1975, kwenye Uwanja wa Mito Tatu. Steelers wangehamia uwanja wa Heinz baada ya kufungwa.

"Kwenye Uwanja wa Pitt, Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania" bao la bao: Steelers walirudi nyuma na juhudi ya kuvutia dhidi ya Cowboys ya Powerhouse nyumbani. Dallas alikuwa akicheza ili kuchukua nafasi ya kucheza lakini walilazimika kupigana kupitia matope ya matope ili kupata tuzo. Kilichogeuka kuwa lengo la uwanja wa kushinda lilianzishwa na kurudi kwa punt kutoka kwa Mel Renfro. Steelers haikuvuka uwanja wa kati hadi robo ya 4 wakati theluji ilipoanza kuanguka. Waliweka mchezo huo karibu hadi Dick Shiner akatoka kwenye benchi na kuwaongoza kwenye gari la kugusa. Hifadhi ilitoka nje na chini ya dakika 2 iliyobaki lakini Steelers walipata nafasi nyingine. Shiner alimgonga Roy Jefferson kwa kupita kwa muda mrefu hadi kwenye uwanja wa Dallas 20 lakini mchezo ulimalizika.

Ufunguzi wa mito mitatu ulimaliza kukaa kwao kwa kifupi kwenye Uwanja wa Pitt, ambapo walikuwa wakicheza tu kwa wakati wote kwa miaka sita. Kabla ya hapo, Steelers walicheza michezo yao ya nyumbani huko Forbes Field, na michezo ya mara kwa mara ilichezwa kwenye Uwanja wa Pitt kuchukua fursa ya uwezo mkubwa. Steelers baadaye walirudisha neema hiyo katika Chuo Kikuu cha Pittsburgh mnamo 2000 wakati timu ya mpira wa miguu ya Pitt Panthers ilipohamia kwenye mito mitatu kwa msimu mmoja kama nyumba ya mpito kabla ya Heinz Field kuwa tayari mnamo 2001. Pitt pia angecheza michezo yao ya nyuma ya brawl dhidi ya West Virginia katika miaka Pitt ilishiriki mchezo huo wakati wa uwepo wa Mito mitatu.
report_src: Jina la uwanja wa nyumbani wa Pittsburgh Steelers ni Heinz Field, uwanja ulioko katika kitongoji cha North Shore, Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, ambao ulifunguliwa mwaka 2001 na umebeba jina la kampuni ya ndani ya H. J. Heinz baada ya kununua haki za kutumia jina hilo mwaka huohuo [1].

J.
Heinz baada ya kununua haki za kutumia jina hilo mwaka huohuo [1].
