question_en: When was the first home TV introduced?
pos_context_en: Television became available in crude experimental forms in the late 1920s, but it would still be several years before the new technology would be marketed to consumers. After World War II, an improved form of black-and-white TV broadcasting became popular in the United States and Britain, and television sets became commonplace in homes, businesses, and institutions. During the 1950s, television was the primary medium for influencing public opinion. In the mid-1960s, color broadcasting was introduced in the US and most other developed countries. The availability of multiple types of archival storage media such as Betamax, VHS tape, local disks, DVDs, flash drives, high-definition Blu-ray Discs, and cloud digital video recorders has enabled viewers to watch pre-recorded material—such as movies—at home on their own time schedule. For many reasons, especially the convenience of remote retrieval, the storage of television and video programming now occurs on the cloud. At the end of the first decade of the 2000s, digital television transmissions greatly increased in popularity. Another development was the move from standard-definition television (SDTV) (576i, with 576 interlaced lines of resolution and 480i) to high-definition television (HDTV), which provides a resolution that is substantially higher. HDTV may be transmitted in various formats: 1080p, 1080i and 720p. Since 2010, with the invention of smart television, Internet television has increased the availability of television programs and movies via the Internet through streaming video services such as Netflix, Amazon Video, iPlayer, Hulu, Roku and Chromecast.
neg_context_title_en: Television licensing in the United Kingdom
neg_context_en: The first broadcasts in Brazil were for the 1950 World Cup, which the country hosted. Television was formally introduced on September 18 in that same year, with the launch of the now-defunct TV Tupi in São Paulo by media mogul Assis Chateaubriand. It was the first Lusophone or Portuguese-speaking country to introduce television, even before the home country of Portugal with RTP (1955). It was also the fifth nation in the world to have a television station with daily broadcasts, behind the United States, the United Kingdom, France, and Mexico. The first image to appear in TV Tupi was that of five-year-old Sônia Maria Dorce, who, dressed up as a Native Brazilian, said: "Good evening. You are in the open TV channel of Brazil". The symbol of Tupi was that of a Native Brazilian kid.

The home shopping/electronic retailing industry was created in 1977, when small market talk radio show host Bob Circosta was asked to sell avocado-green-colored can openers live on the air by station owner Bud Paxson, when an advertiser traded 112 units of product instead of paying his advertising bill. Hesitant at first, Circosta reluctantly obliged – and to both men's great surprise, all 112 can openers sold out within the hour. Paxson sensed the vast sales potential of home-based commerce, and founded the world's first shopping channel on cable television, later launching nationwide with the Home Shopping Network (rebranded as HSN). Bob Circosta was America's first ever TV home shopping host,becoming one of the most instantly recognizable salesmen in the United States. Over the next three decades, Circosta sold over 75,000 different products on HSN, netted over 20,000 hours of live, on-air TV selling, and achieved personal product sales in excess of one billion dollars. (The story is disputed; there is some record of Paxson having unsuccessfully tried a similar format in 1969 on one of his earlier TV stations, WNYP in Jamestown, New York.)

In March 1979, the government set up the Ethnic Television Review Panel, which recommended that SBS expand into television. SBS TV began test transmissions in April 1979 when it showed various foreign language programs on ABV-2 Melbourne and ABN-2 Sydney on Sunday mornings. Full-time transmission began at 6:30 pm on 24 October 1980 (United Nations Day), as Channel 0/28. The first program shown was a documentary entitled "Who Are We?", which was hosted by veteran news presenter Peter Luck. At the time, SBS was broadcasting on UHF Channel 28 and VHF Channel 0 (pronounced as "oh" and not "zero"), with a planned discontinuation of the latter at some time in the future. Bruce Gyngell, who introduced television to Australia in 1956, was given the task of introducing the first batch of programs on the new station.

Hometime was a PBS home improvement television show produced by Hometime Video Publishing of Chaska, Minnesota, in association with WHYY-TV/Wilmington-Philadelphia, and broadcast on public television and in syndication. It first aired on PBS on November 1, 1986. In 1992, "Hometime" began airing on TLC (The Learning Channel). When "Hometime" aired on TLC, Dean Johnson would say ""Hometime" will be right back", this was used when the show goes into commercial breaks. When the show comes out of commercial breaks, Dean Johnson would say "And now, back to "Hometime"". The show came to an end on January 30, 2016, and is no longer airing, although episodes of "Hometime" continued to air in syndication, but the syndicated version ended after 16 seasons.

"We designed the building from the inside out, not the outside in,” said Loretta H. Cockrum, Foram’s founder, chairman and CEO. “We wanted the most efficient office building ever designed, with no wasted space or wasted energy. This is a building of the future more than a building of the present. A lot of love has gone into that building, and a lot of pride."

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.

When television broadcasts in the UK were resumed after a break due to the Second World War, it was decided to introduce a television licence fee in order to fund the service. When first introduced on 1 June 1946, the licence covering the monochrome-only single-channel BBC television service cost £2 (equivalent to £ as of ). The licence was originally issued by the General Post Office (GPO), which was then the regulator of public communications within the UK. The GPO also issued licences for home radio receivers powered by mains electricity and was mandated by laws beginning with the Wireless Telegraphy Act 1904, to administer the licensing system. Households which bought a TV licence did not need to hold a separate radio licence as the TV licence covered both TV and radio reception.

On April 8, 1954, channel 4 became one of the first American television stations not owned by a network to produce and transmit local programs in color, beginning with a five-minute telecast hosted that evening by E.K. Gaylord; it also carried select NBC network programs in the format, with children's program "The Paul Winchell Show" was the station's first network color telecast. (Before the FCC had approved a color transmission standard, Gaylord had ordered color broadcasting equipment being developed by RCA – which included two RCA TK40 color cameras – in September 1949.) The cooking show "Cook's Book" became the first regular program to broadcast in color from the WKY studios and first in the state to do so, while dance program "Sooner Shindig" became the first live color program in the country to originate from the studios of a network-affiliated station. When NBC became the first network to commence color telecasts on May 1, WKY-TV provided color feeds of the Anadarko Indian Festival to the network for broadcast on "Today" and "Home". Local variety series "The Hank Thompson Show" also became the first color broadcast of a variety program. In 1955, WKY-TV became the first network affiliate to feed a full-length color program to a television network, transmitting coverage of a square dance convention in downtown Oklahoma City to NBC; it also transmitted closed-circuit images of a surgical procedure in color (WKY-TV had become the first Oklahoma television station to air a surgical procedure via closed circuit telecast four years earlier in February 1950).

Ŭ represents a semivowel in the orthography of Esperanto, which is an international auxiliary language publicly presented in 1887. As in Belarusian, Esperanto Ŭ is pronounced as a non-syllabic , primarily in the diphthongs "aŭ", "eŭ" and rarely "oŭ".

• 1983 – First meetings, first intervention letter. CIFC is founded in Toronto.
• 1985 – First newsletter is sent - by fax. It eventually becomes POV Magazine.
• 1988 – Montreal chapter (later to be known as Quebec chapter) is formed.
• 1991 – A National Executive is formed - John Walker, President.
• 1991 – First edition of POV Magazine, edited by Wyndham Wise – Geoff Bowie, first Publisher.
• 1994 – The first edition of Hot Docs is held- Paul Jay was Chair of CIFC and Founding Chair of Hot Docs!
• 1995 – Atlantic chapter is formed.
• 1996 – BC chapter is formed.
• 1997 – Hot Docs incorporates as a separate charitable organization.
• 1998 – First coast-to-coast National Executive elected - Gary Marcuse, Chair.
• 2003 – The CIFC changes its name to DOC.
• 2006 – Ottawa chapter is formed.
• 2006 – Newfoundland chapter is formed.
• 2007 – Winnipeg chapter is formed.
• 2008 – Alberta chapter is formed.
• 2009 – Newfoundland chapter folds.
question_src: TV ya kwanza ya nyumbani ilianzishwa lini?
pos_context_src: Televisheni ilipatikana katika fomu za majaribio zisizo za kawaida mwishoni mwa miaka ya 1920, lakini bado ingekuwa miaka kadhaa kabla ya teknolojia mpya kuuzwa kwa watumiaji. Baada ya Vita vya Kidunia vya pili, aina bora ya utangazaji wa TV nyeusi na nyeupe ikawa maarufu nchini Merika na Uingereza, na seti za runinga zikawa kawaida katika nyumba, biashara, na taasisi. Wakati wa miaka ya 1950, runinga ilikuwa njia ya msingi ya kushawishi maoni ya umma. Katikati ya miaka ya 1960, utangazaji wa rangi ulianzishwa huko Amerika na nchi zingine zilizoendelea. Upatikanaji wa aina nyingi za media za uhifadhi wa kumbukumbu kama vile Betamax, mkanda wa VHS, diski za ndani, DVD, anatoa za flash, diski za ufafanuzi wa juu wa Blu-ray, na rekodi za video za dijiti za wingu zimewezesha watazamaji kutazama nyenzo zilizorekodiwa mapema-kama sinema-nyumbani kwa ratiba yao ya wakati. Kwa sababu nyingi, haswa urahisi wa kurudisha mbali, uhifadhi wa programu za runinga na video sasa hufanyika kwenye wingu. Mwisho wa muongo wa kwanza wa miaka ya 2000, usafirishaji wa televisheni ya dijiti uliongezeka sana katika umaarufu. Maendeleo mengine yalikuwa hatua kutoka kwa televisheni ya ufafanuzi wa kawaida (SDTV) (576i, na mistari 576 iliyoingiliana ya azimio na 480i) kwa runinga ya ufafanuzi wa hali ya juu (HDTV), ambayo hutoa azimio ambalo ni kubwa zaidi. HDTV inaweza kusambazwa katika aina tofauti: 1080p, 1080i na 720p. Tangu 2010, na uvumbuzi wa runinga smart, runinga ya mtandao imeongeza upatikanaji wa programu za televisheni na sinema kupitia mtandao kupitia huduma za video kama vile Netflix, Video ya Amazon, iPlayer, Hulu, Roku na Chromecast.
neg_context_src: Matangazo ya kwanza huko Brazil yalikuwa ya Kombe la Dunia la 1950, ambalo nchi hiyo ilishiriki. Televisheni ilianzishwa rasmi mnamo Septemba 18 katika mwaka huo huo, na uzinduzi wa Televisheni ya sasa ya TV huko São Paulo na media mogul Assis Chateaubriand. Ilikuwa nchi ya kwanza ya Lusophone au inayozungumza Kireno kuanzisha runinga, hata kabla ya nchi ya Ureno na RTP (1955). Ilikuwa pia taifa la tano ulimwenguni kuwa na kituo cha runinga na matangazo ya kila siku, nyuma ya Merika, Uingereza, Ufaransa, na Mexico. Picha ya kwanza kuonekana kwenye TV Tupi ilikuwa ile ya Sônia wa miaka mitano Maria Dorce, ambaye, alikuwa amevaa kama Mbrazil wa asili, alisema: "Habari za jioni. Uko kwenye kituo cha wazi cha TV cha Brazil". Alama ya Tupi ilikuwa ile ya mtoto wa asili wa Brazil.

Sekta ya ununuzi wa nyumbani/elektroniki iliundwa mnamo 1977, wakati redio ndogo ya mazungumzo ya soko Bob Circosta iliulizwa kuuza avocado-kijani-rangi inaweza kufungua moja kwa moja hewani na mmiliki wa kituo Bud Paxson, wakati mtangazaji alifanya biashara ya vitengo 112 vya bidhaa badala ya kulipa muswada wake wa matangazo. Mwanzoni mwanzoni, Circosta alilazimika kwa kulazimika - na kwa mshangao mkubwa wa wanaume, wote 112 wanaweza kufunguliwa nje ya saa. Paxson aligundua uwezo mkubwa wa uuzaji wa biashara ya nyumbani, na alianzisha kituo cha kwanza cha ununuzi ulimwenguni kwenye runinga ya cable, baadaye ilizindua nchi nzima na mtandao wa ununuzi wa nyumbani (uliowekwa tena kama HSN). Bob Circosta alikuwa mwenyeji wa kwanza wa ununuzi wa nyumbani wa Televisheni ya Amerika, na kuwa mmoja wa wauzaji wanaotambulika mara moja huko Merika. Katika miongo mitatu ijayo, Circosta iliuza bidhaa zaidi ya 75,000 kwenye HSN, ilipata zaidi ya masaa 20,000 ya uuzaji wa moja kwa moja wa TV, na ilipata mauzo ya bidhaa za kibinafsi zaidi ya dola bilioni moja. (Hadithi hiyo inabishaniwa; kuna rekodi fulani ya Paxson baada ya kufanikiwa kujaribu muundo kama huo mnamo 1969 kwenye moja ya vituo vyake vya Televisheni, WNYP huko Jamestown, New York.)

Mnamo Machi 1979, serikali ilianzisha jopo la ukaguzi wa televisheni ya kikabila, ambayo ilipendekeza SBS kupanuka kuwa runinga. SBS TV ilianza upitishaji wa majaribio mnamo Aprili 1979 wakati ilionyesha mipango mbali mbali ya lugha ya kigeni kwenye ABV-2 Melbourne na ABN-2 Sydney asubuhi ya Jumapili. Uwasilishaji wa wakati wote ulianza saa 6:30 jioni tarehe 24 Oktoba 1980 (Siku ya Umoja wa Mataifa), kama Channel 0/28. Programu ya kwanza iliyoonyeshwa ilikuwa hati iliyoitwa "Sisi ni nani?", Ambayo ilishikiliwa na mtangazaji wa habari mkongwe Peter Luck. Wakati huo, SBS ilikuwa ikitangaza kwenye Kituo cha UHF 28 na VHF Channel 0 (iliyotamkwa kama "OH" na sio "Zero"), na kukomeshwa kwa mpango huo wakati ujao. Bruce Gyngell, ambaye alianzisha televisheni kwa Australia mnamo 1956, alipewa jukumu la kuanzisha kikundi cha kwanza cha mipango kwenye kituo kipya.

Hometime ilikuwa kipindi cha televisheni cha uboreshaji wa nyumba ya PBS iliyotengenezwa na Uchapishaji wa Video ya Hometime ya Chaska, Minnesota, kwa kushirikiana na Whyy-TV/Wilmington-Philadelphia, na kutangazwa kwenye runinga ya umma na kwa ushirika. Ilirushwa kwanza kwenye PBS mnamo Novemba 1, 1986. Mnamo 1992, "Hometime" ilianza kupeperusha TLC (Kituo cha Kujifunza). Wakati "Hometime" ilirushwa kwenye TLC, Dean Johnson angesema "" Hometime "itakuwa nyuma", hii ilitumika wakati onyesho linapoanza mapumziko ya kibiashara. Wakati onyesho linatoka kwa mapumziko ya kibiashara, Dean Johnson angesema "na sasa, kurudi" Hometime "". Kipindi hicho kilimalizika Januari 30, 2016, na haina hewa tena, ingawa sehemu za "Hometime" ziliendelea kuwa hewa katika ushirika, lakini toleo lililoandaliwa lilimalizika baada ya misimu 16.

"Tulibuni jengo hilo kutoka ndani, sio nje," alisema Loretta H. Cockrum, mwanzilishi wa Foram, Mwenyekiti na Mkurugenzi Mtendaji. "Tulitaka jengo bora zaidi la ofisi lililowahi kubuniwa, bila nafasi ya kupoteza au nishati ya kupoteza. Hii ni jengo la siku zijazo zaidi ya jengo la sasa. Upendo mwingi umeingia kwenye jengo hilo, na kiburi sana."

Winfield Toll Bridge, pia inajulikana kama Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, ni kihistoria wa kihistoria wa Cantilever Warren Truss Bridge iliyoko Winfield na Red House, Kaunti ya Putnam, West Virginia. Ilijengwa mnamo 1955, na inachukua Mto wa Kanawha, iliyobeba West Virginia Route 34. Cantilever kupitia-truss ina nafasi mbili za nanga kila futi 245 kwa urefu na urefu wa futi 462 kwa urefu kati ya mistari ya kituo cha pier. Span kuu ina futi mbili 128, inchi 4, mikono ya cantilever na miguu 205, inchi 4, iliyosimamishwa.

Wakati matangazo ya runinga nchini Uingereza yalipoanza tena baada ya mapumziko kutokana na Vita vya Pili vya Ulimwengu, iliamuliwa kuanzisha ada ya leseni ya runinga ili kufadhili huduma hiyo. Wakati wa kwanza kuletwa mnamo 1 Juni 1946, leseni inayofunika huduma ya runinga ya monochrome-moja tu ya huduma ya runinga ya BBC iligharimu pauni 2 (sawa na £ kama). Leseni hiyo ilitolewa hapo awali na Ofisi ya Posta Mkuu (GPO), ambayo wakati huo ilikuwa mdhibiti wa mawasiliano ya umma ndani ya Uingereza. GPO pia ilitoa leseni kwa wapokeaji wa redio za nyumbani zinazoendeshwa na umeme wa mains na iliagizwa na sheria zilizoanza na Sheria ya Telegraphy ya Wireless 1904, kusimamia mfumo wa leseni. Kaya ambazo zilinunua leseni ya TV hazikuhitaji kushikilia leseni tofauti ya redio kwani leseni ya TV ilishughulikia mapokezi ya Runinga na redio.

Mnamo Aprili 8, 1954, Channel 4 ikawa moja ya vituo vya kwanza vya televisheni vya Amerika ambavyo havikumilikiwa na mtandao wa kutengeneza na kusambaza programu za ndani kwa rangi, kuanzia na televisheni ya dakika tano iliyohudumiwa jioni hiyo na E.K. Gaylord; Pia ilibeba mipango ya mtandao wa NBC katika muundo, na programu ya watoto "The Paul Winchell Show" ilikuwa televisheni ya kwanza ya rangi ya mtandao. . Kituo cha ushirika wa mtandao. Wakati NBC ikawa mtandao wa kwanza kuanza televisheni za rangi mnamo Mei 1, WKY-TV ilitoa rangi ya Tamasha la Anadarko Hindi kwa mtandao kwa matangazo kwenye "Leo" na "Nyumbani". Mfululizo wa aina ya mitaa "The Hank Thompson Show" pia ikawa matangazo ya rangi ya kwanza ya programu anuwai. Mnamo 1955, WKY-TV ikawa ushirika wa kwanza wa mtandao kulisha mpango wa rangi kamili kwa mtandao wa runinga, ikisambaza chanjo ya mkutano wa densi ya mraba katika jiji la Oklahoma City hadi NBC; Pia ilisambaza picha zilizofungwa za utaratibu wa upasuaji katika rangi (WKY-TV ilikuwa kituo cha kwanza cha runinga cha Oklahoma kutoa utaratibu wa upasuaji kupitia televisheni ya mzunguko uliofungwa miaka nne mapema mnamo Februari 1950).

Ŭ inawakilisha semivowel katika orthografia ya Esperanto, ambayo ni lugha ya kimataifa ya msaidizi iliyowasilishwa hadharani mnamo 1887. Kama ilivyo kwa Belarusi, Esperanto ŭ hutamkwa kama isiyo ya syllabic, haswa katika diphthongs "aŭ", "eŭ" na mara chache "oŭ".

• 1983 - Mikutano ya kwanza, barua ya kwanza ya kuingilia kati. CIFC imeanzishwa huko Toronto.
• 1985 - jarida la kwanza limetumwa - na faksi. Mwishowe inakuwa Jarida la POV.
• 1988 - Sura ya Montreal (baadaye kujulikana kama Sura ya Quebec) imeundwa.
• 1991 - Mtendaji wa kitaifa ameundwa - John Walker, rais.
• 1991 - Toleo la kwanza la Jarida la POV, lililohaririwa na Wyndham Wise - Geoff Bowie, Mchapishaji wa Kwanza.
• 1994- Toleo la kwanza la Hati za Moto linashikiliwa- Paul Jay alikuwa mwenyekiti wa CIFC na mwenyekiti mwanzilishi wa Hati za Moto!
• 1995 - Sura ya Atlantic imeundwa.
• 1996 - Sura ya BC imeundwa.
• 1997 - Hati za moto zinajumuisha kama shirika tofauti la hisani.
• 1998-Mtendaji wa kwanza wa Pwani hadi Pwani aliyechaguliwa-Gary Marcuse, Mwenyekiti.
• 2003 - CIFC inabadilisha jina lake kuwa DOC.
• 2006 - Sura ya Ottawa imeundwa.
• 2006 - Sura ya Newfoundland imeundwa.
• 2007 - Sura ya Winnipeg imeundwa.
• 2008 - Sura ya Alberta imeundwa.
• 2009 - Folda za Sura ya Newfoundland.

question_en: How long did it take to complete the Chicago Central Area Transit Plan?
pos_context_en: In the summer of 1974, the CUTD selected a Core Plan, the initial portion of the Chicago Central Area Transit Project to be built. It consisted essentially of the Monroe Line, the Franklin Line, and a portion of the Randolph Line. The Core Plan, which would take about six years to complete and cost $1 billion based on an August 1973 cost estimate, was submitted to the Federal government on August 21, 1974. The Core Plan was received well, however, it was recommended that the project be reduced to $700 million. Modifications to the original Core Plan were made and the revised Plan was presented to UMTA in September 1974.
neg_context_en: In the early 1970s, while final planning was underway for a start on the new downtown subways, controversy began swirling in the District over the validity of the project and its cost. The 1968 Transit Plan was thought to be "mode restricted" and did not consider alternatives to the steel wheel-on-steel rail mode of rail rapid transit. Rail supporters argued that the "L" system was too extensive to replace with completely new equipment and vehicles, and that passenger volume on the core rail routes exceeded those which could be most efficiently carried by buses.

The Chicago Central Area Transit Plan, or generally referred to as the Chicago Central Area Transit Project (CCATP) in the 1970s, was an extensive study of the rapid transit system in downtown Chicago; the study had begun in 1965.

In April 1968, the completed study resulted in a three-volume report that proposed a series of recommendations for redeveloping and expanding Central Area communities, and for the replacement of The Loop elevated rapid transit system with a new Loop Subway under Randolph, Franklin, Van Buren, and Wabash, and a new Distributor Subway system in downtown Chicago (see Chicago "L").

A few years after the demise of the Chicago Central Area Transit Project (CCATP), the city was working on plans for new and less expensive transit alternatives for downtown Chicago. The Central Area had grown well beyond the expectations of the 1968 Transit Planning Study in terms of building development and employment growth. There were still concerns among Chicago's civic leaders that this growth would seriously outpace Chicago's mass transportation systems which had become insubstantial. By the 1980s and 1990s, replacement subways were deemed too expensive and extensions to the existing CTA heavy rail transit system were considered too limited in their benefits. Additional or expanded bus service on overcrowded and badly congested streets was considered impractical.

The Chicago Central Area Transit Project was formally adopted by the City of Chicago as part of the Comprehensive Plan of Chicago. In April 1970, the Chicago City Council passed a resolution authorizing the creation and implementation of the Chicago Urban Transportation District (CUTD). It also defined the boundaries of the District, a area encompassing downtown Chicago — bounded on the north by North Avenue, on the west by Ashland Avenue, on the south by the Stevenson Expressway, and on the east by Lake Michigan. In June, the CUTD was approved by public referendum with the power to levy taxes to provide the local share of funds for the Chicago Central Area Transit Project, which might have been the seed money for massive Federal assistance, at last, to bury the venerable Union Loop. In July, it was established by Illinois Statute as a separate municipal corporation with taxing powers.

The Central Area Circulator Project, coordinated by the Metropolitan Planning Council, opted for a light rail plan to enhance connectivity to a larger area of downtown by commuter railroad and rapid transit systems. The proposed system was dubbed the "Central Area Circulator", an eight-mile (13 km) light-rail transit network linking the North Western, Union and Randolph Metra suburban railroad stations to North Michigan Avenue, Streeterville, Navy Pier, the museums, and McCormick Place. The system was to include east-west routes north and south of the Chicago River as well as north-south links on portions of Michigan Avenue and Columbus Drive.

The Chicago Central Area Transit Plan called for subway construction to start in 1969, with the system opening in stages between 1973 and 1978. According to the 1968 report, the new Loop and Distributor Subways should have carried more than 390,000 passengers on an average weekday, including 152,000 daily passengers using the Distributor system. The total daily Distributor Subway travel by passengers who transferred to or from the commuter railroads (today's Metra and Amtrak) or other CTA rapid transit lines would have been twice these volumes. The Chicago Central Area Transit Plan's financial recommendations were, in retrospect, overly optimistic even for those days before the runaway inflation of the late 1960s and 1970s. The projected cost of building the Loop and Distributor Subway systems was $478 million in 1969 dollars. In this and other financial projections, the CCATPS assumed an "escalation" of 5% per year, an unfortunate estimate of the unforeseeable 8–11% inflation rates of the next few years.

Earlier proposals for transit facilities in the Chicago Central Area were reviewed, new plans were prepared and analyzed, and a recommended Central Area Transit Plan was developed. Loop area development potential was evaluated. Traffic projections were made. Consideration was given to architectural and environmental factors, operational requirements, and potential methods of financing the system. In April 1968 the study had culminated into an exhaustive three volume report recommending the construction of a fifteen-mile (24 km) subway system to replace the old elevated lines in downtown Chicago, naming it the Chicago Central Area Transit Project or CCATP.
The system proposed as a result of the 1968 Transit Planning Study consisted of two major transit facilities:The 'L' structures in downtown Chicago were to be replaced by subways under Franklin Street, Van Buren Street, Wabash Avenue, and Randolph Street. The proposed Loop Subway was to be linked to the Dan Ryan branch (then under construction at the time; now part of the Red Line) using the median strip of the proposed (but never built) Franklin Street Extension Expressway from the southwest corner of the Loop (Van Buren/Franklin) to Cermak-Chinatown. The Lake Street 'L' (Green Line) was to be replaced from Damen Avenue to the northwest corner of the Loop (Franklin/Randolph) by a new subway under Randolph Street. The Northside 'L' which carries Ravenswood (Brown Line) and Evanston Express (Purple Line) trains from Willow Street to the northwest corner of the Loop (Franklin/Randolph) would have been replaced by a new subway under Orleans Street to Division Street, and then northwest along Clybourn Avenue (adjacent to the State Street tubes) to the connection with the existing lines just south of Armitage.

The plan of expanded transit facilities would have undoubtedly benefited the whole Chicago metropolitan area. Many of the projects were basically completed, namely the extension of the West Side Subway (Congress Line) in the median of the Eisenhower Expressway (in operation June 22, 1958), Lake Street Elevation (in operation October 28, 1962), a part of the Englewood rapid transit extension (to Ashland/63rd, in operation May 6, 1969), the Dan Ryan rapid transit line (in operation September 28, 1969), the Kennedy and O'Hare rapid transit extensions (in operation February 1, 1970, completed September 3, 1984), massive signal and train control system improvements between 1967 and 1976, and the Southwest rapid transit extension, built in the form of the Midway Line (in operation October 31, 1993). Rolling stock and equipment improvements were made between 1964 and 1992 with the delivery of the High Performance Generation cars (the 2000-Series, 2200-Series, 2400-Series, 2600-Series, and 3200-Series). Modernization of many traction power substations, and remodeling of several outlying terminal stations were also completed. Some curve straightening projects were also completed such as the 2002-built Harrison Street Curve on the Green and Orange Lines, although most were not.
question_src: Ilichukua muda gani kukamilisha mpango wa usafirishaji wa eneo la Chicago?
pos_context_title_src: Mpango wa Usafirishaji wa eneo la Chicago
pos_context_src: Katika msimu wa joto wa 1974, CUTD ilichagua mpango wa msingi, sehemu ya awali ya Mradi wa Usafirishaji wa eneo la Chicago kujengwa. Ilikuwa na kimsingi ya mstari wa Monroe, mstari wa Franklin, na sehemu ya mstari wa Randolph. Mpango wa msingi, ambao ungechukua kama miaka sita kukamilisha na kugharimu dola bilioni 1 kulingana na makisio ya gharama ya Agosti 1973, uliwasilishwa kwa serikali ya shirikisho mnamo Agosti 21, 1974. Mpango wa msingi ulipokelewa vizuri, ilipendekezwa kuwa mradi huo upunguzwe hadi $ 700 milioni. Marekebisho ya mpango wa msingi wa msingi yalifanywa na mpango uliorekebishwa uliwasilishwa kwa UMTA mnamo Septemba 1974.

neg_context_src: Katika miaka ya mapema ya 1970, wakati upangaji wa mwisho ulikuwa unaendelea kwa kuanza kwenye barabara mpya za jiji, ubishani ulianza kuteleza wilayani juu ya uhalali wa mradi huo na gharama yake. Mpango wa usafirishaji wa 1968 ulifikiriwa kuwa "umezuiliwa" na haukuzingatia njia mbadala za reli ya chuma-kwenye-chuma ya usafirishaji wa haraka wa reli. Wafuasi wa reli walisema kwamba mfumo wa "L" ulikuwa mkubwa sana kuweza kuchukua nafasi ya vifaa na magari mpya kabisa, na kwamba kiasi cha abiria kwenye njia za reli za msingi zilizidi zile ambazo zinaweza kubeba kwa ufanisi na mabasi.

Mpango wa Usafirishaji wa eneo la Chicago, au kwa ujumla unajulikana kama Mradi wa Usafirishaji wa eneo la Chicago (CCATP) katika miaka ya 1970, ulikuwa uchunguzi wa kina wa mfumo wa usafirishaji wa haraka huko Chicago; Utafiti ulikuwa umeanza mnamo 1965.

Mnamo Aprili 1968, utafiti uliokamilishwa ulisababisha ripoti ya jumla ya tatu ambayo ilipendekeza safu ya mapendekezo ya kuunda tena na kupanua jamii za eneo kuu, na kwa uingizwaji wa mfumo wa Usafirishaji wa haraka na njia mpya ya kitanzi chini ya Randolph, Franklin, Van Buren, na Wabash, na mfumo mpya wa msambazaji. "

Miaka michache baada ya kufariki kwa Mradi wa Usafiri wa eneo la Chicago Central (CCATP), jiji hilo lilikuwa likifanya kazi ya mipango ya njia mbadala na za bei ghali kwa jiji la Chicago. Sehemu ya kati ilikuwa imekua zaidi ya matarajio ya Utafiti wa Upangaji wa Usafiri wa 1968 katika suala la maendeleo ya ujenzi na ukuaji wa ajira. Bado kulikuwa na wasiwasi kati ya viongozi wa raia wa Chicago kwamba ukuaji huu ungefanya vibaya mifumo ya usafirishaji ya Chicago ambayo ilikuwa ya kawaida. Kufikia miaka ya 1980 na 1990, njia ndogo za uingizwaji zilionekana kuwa ghali sana na upanuzi kwa mfumo wa usafirishaji wa reli ya CTA ulizingatiwa kuwa mdogo sana katika faida zao. Huduma ya ziada au iliyopanuliwa ya basi kwenye mitaa iliyojaa na iliyojaa vibaya ilizingatiwa kuwa haiwezekani.

Mradi wa Usafirishaji wa eneo la Chicago Central ulipitishwa rasmi na Jiji la Chicago kama sehemu ya mpango kamili wa Chicago. Mnamo Aprili 1970, Halmashauri ya Jiji la Chicago ilipitisha azimio la kuidhinisha uundaji na utekelezaji wa Wilaya ya Usafiri wa Mjini wa Chicago (CUTD). Pia ilifafanua mipaka ya wilaya hiyo, eneo lililozunguka jiji la Chicago - lililowekwa kaskazini na North Avenue, magharibi na Ashland Avenue, kusini na Stevenson Expressway, na mashariki na Ziwa Michigan. Mnamo Juni, CUTD ilipitishwa na kura ya maoni ya umma na nguvu ya kutoza ushuru kutoa sehemu ya fedha ya Mradi wa Usafirishaji wa eneo la Chicago, ambayo inaweza kuwa pesa ya mbegu kwa msaada mkubwa wa shirikisho, mwishowe, kuzika kitanzi cha umoja kinachojulikana. Mnamo Julai, ilianzishwa na amri ya Illinois kama shirika tofauti la manispaa na nguvu za ushuru.

Mradi wa mzunguko wa eneo kuu, ulioratibiwa na Baraza la Mipango ya Metropolitan, ulichagua mpango wa reli nyepesi ili kuongeza unganisho kwa eneo kubwa la jiji na reli za kusafiri na mifumo ya usafirishaji wa haraka. Mfumo uliopendekezwa ulipewa jina la "mzunguko wa eneo kuu", mtandao wa usafirishaji wa reli ya maili nane (13 km) unaounganisha vituo vya reli ya Kaskazini Magharibi, Muungano na Randolph Metra Suburban na Michigan Avenue, Streeterville, Navy Pier, Makumbusho, na McCormick Mahali. Mfumo huo ulikuwa ni pamoja na njia za mashariki-magharibi kaskazini na kusini mwa Mto wa Chicago na viungo vya kaskazini-kusini kwenye sehemu za Michigan Avenue na Columbus Drive.

Mpango wa Usafirishaji wa eneo la Chicago Central ulitaka ujenzi wa Subway kuanza mnamo 1969, na mfumo huo kufunguliwa katika hatua kati ya 1973 na 1978. Kulingana na ripoti ya 1968, njia mpya za wasambazaji na wasambazaji zinapaswa kuwa na abiria zaidi ya 390,000 kwa wastani wa wiki, pamoja na abiria 152,000 wa kila siku wanaotumia mfumo wa wasambazaji. Jumla ya wasambazaji wa kila siku wa kusafiri kwa abiria ambao walihamia au kutoka kwa reli za kusafiri (Metra ya leo na Amtrak) au mistari mingine ya Usafiri wa CTA ingekuwa mara mbili ya viwango hivi. Mapendekezo ya kifedha ya Mpango wa Usafirishaji wa eneo la Chicago yalikuwa, kwa kupatikana tena, yenye matumaini mengi hata kwa siku hizo kabla ya mfumuko wa bei wa miaka ya 1960 na 1970. Gharama iliyokadiriwa ya kujenga kitanzi na mifumo ya Subway Subway ilikuwa $ 478 milioni kwa dola 1969. Katika makadirio haya na mengine ya kifedha, CCATPs ilichukua "kuongezeka" kwa 5% kwa mwaka, makisio ya bahati mbaya ya viwango vya mfumko vya bei vya 8-11% vya miaka michache ijayo.

Mapendekezo ya mapema ya vifaa vya usafirishaji katika eneo la Chicago Central yalipitiwa, mipango mpya ilitayarishwa na kuchambuliwa, na mpango wa usafirishaji wa eneo la kati ulitengenezwa. Uwezo wa maendeleo ya eneo la kitanzi ulipimwa. Makadirio ya trafiki yalifanywa. Kuzingatia kulipewa kwa sababu za usanifu na mazingira, mahitaji ya kiutendaji, na njia zinazowezekana za kufadhili mfumo. Mnamo Aprili 1968 utafiti huo ulikuwa umefikia ripoti ya kiasi tatu cha kupendekeza ujenzi wa mfumo wa chini ya maili kumi na tano (kilomita 24) kuchukua nafasi ya mistari ya zamani iliyoinuliwa katikati mwa jiji la Chicago, ikiitaja Mradi wa Usafirishaji wa eneo la Chicago au CCATP.
Mfumo uliopendekezwa kama matokeo ya utafiti wa upangaji wa usafirishaji wa 1968 ulikuwa na vifaa viwili vikuu vya usafirishaji: miundo ya 'L' katika jiji la Chicago ilibadilishwa na barabara ndogo chini ya Mtaa wa Franklin, Van Buren Street, Wabash Avenue, na Mtaa wa Randolph. Njia ndogo ya kitanzi iliyopendekezwa iliunganishwa na tawi la Dan Ryan (wakati huo ilijengwa wakati huo; sasa sehemu ya mstari mwekundu) kwa kutumia kamba ya wastani ya iliyopendekezwa (lakini haijawahi kujengwa) Franklin Street Extension Expressway kutoka kona ya kusini magharibi ya kitanzi (van Buren/Franklin) kwenda Cermak-Chinatown. Mtaa wa Ziwa 'L' (Green Line) ilibadilishwa kutoka Damen Avenue kwenda kona ya kaskazini magharibi ya kitanzi (Franklin/Randolph) na Subway mpya chini ya Mtaa wa Randolph. Northside 'L' ambayo hubeba Ravenswood (Brown Line) na Evanston Express (Purple Line) treni kutoka Willow Street kwenda kona ya kaskazini magharibi ya kitanzi (Franklin/Randolph) ingekuwa imebadilishwa na Subway mpya chini ya Mtaa wa Orleans hadi Mtaa wa Idara, na kisha Northwest kando ya Clybourn Avenue (karibu na barabara za barabara) na barabara za kusini mwa barabara kuu ya barabara.

Mpango wa vifaa vya usafirishaji uliopanuliwa bila shaka ungefaidika eneo lote la mji mkuu wa Chicago. Miradi mingi ilikamilishwa kimsingi, ambayo ni upanuzi wa Subway Side West (Congress Line) katika wastani wa Eisenhower Expressway (katika Operesheni Juni 22, 1958), Ziwa Street Elevation (katika Operesheni Oktoba 28, 1962), sehemu ya Englewood Haraka Upanuzi (hadi Ashland/63rd, katika Operesheni ya Mei 6, Densi ya Densi ya Engle. Kennedy na O'Hare upanuzi wa usafirishaji wa haraka (katika operesheni Februari 1, 1970, ulikamilika Septemba 3, 1984), ishara kubwa na maboresho ya mfumo wa kudhibiti mafunzo kati ya 1967 na 1976, na Upanuzi wa Usafiri wa Haraka Kusini, uliojengwa katika mfumo wa Midway (katika Operesheni Oktoba 31, 1993). Uboreshaji wa hisa na vifaa vya kuboresha vilifanywa kati ya 1964 na 1992 na utoaji wa magari ya kiwango cha juu cha utendaji (mfululizo wa 2000, mfululizo wa 2200, mfululizo wa 2400, mfululizo wa 2600, na 3200-mfululizo). Uboreshaji wa nafasi nyingi za nguvu za traction, na kurekebisha tena vituo kadhaa vya terminal pia vilikamilishwa. Baadhi ya miradi ya kunyoosha ya Curve pia ilikamilishwa kama vile Curve ya barabara ya Harrison iliyojengwa ya 2002 kwenye mistari ya kijani na machungwa, ingawa wengi hawakuwa.

question_en: What does FIFA stand for?
pos_context_en: The Fédération Internationale de Football Association (FIFA ; French for 'International Federation of Association Football') is an organization which describes itself as an international governing body of association football, fútsal, beach soccer, and eFootball. FIFA is responsible for the organization of football's major international tournaments, notably the World Cup which commenced in 1930 and the Women's World Cup which commenced in 1991.
neg_context_en: Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.

Sweden beat Finland 8–1 on 2 October 1949 in Malmö. However, FIFA's website does not include this match in the list of matches or in the group standings. RSSSF's website lists the match with the note "Sweden played B-team", and does not provide group standings.
ㅟ is one of the Korean hangul. The Unicode for ㅟ is U+315F.
Ơ is one of the 12 Vietnamese language vowels. It is pronounced (an unrounded [o]).
X̂ is the Latin letter "X" with a circumflex. The letter is used in the Haida language and Aleut languages of Alaska.
ڼ is the twenty-ninth letter of Pashto alphabet. It represents the retroflex nasal (IPA: ) which is ण in Devanagari and is transliterated . In Saraiki it is written as ݨ.
s͎ is a symbol used in the Extensions to the International Phonetic Alphabet to represent a whistled s. The sound occurs in the Shona language represented by sv, as in the name of Morgan Tsvangirai.

Ŭ represents a semivowel in the orthography of Esperanto, which is an international auxiliary language publicly presented in 1887. As in Belarusian, Esperanto Ŭ is pronounced as a non-syllabic , primarily in the diphthongs "aŭ", "eŭ" and rarely "oŭ".
Ġ is the 7th letter of the Maltese alphabet, preceded by F and followed by G. It represents the sound .
Ĥ or ĥ is a consonant in Esperanto orthography, representing a voiceless velar fricative or voiceless uvular fricative . Its name in Esperanto is "ĥo" (pronounced ).
question_src: FIFA inasimama nini?
pos_context_src: Chama cha mpira wa miguu cha Fédération Internationale de (FIFA; Kifaransa kwa 'Shirikisho la Kimataifa la Chama cha Soka') ni shirika ambalo linajielezea kama kikundi cha kimataifa cha Chama cha Soka, Fútsal, Soka la Beach, na Efootball. FIFA inawajibika kwa shirika la mashindano makubwa ya kimataifa ya mpira wa miguu, haswa Kombe la Dunia ambalo lilianza mnamo 1930 na Kombe la Dunia la Wanawake ambalo lilianza mnamo 1991.
neg_context_title_src: 1950 kufuzu Kombe la Dunia la FIFA
neg_context_src: Winfield Toll Bridge, pia inajulikana kama Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, ni kihistoria wa kihistoria wa Cantilever Warren Truss Bridge iliyoko Winfield na Red House, Kaunti ya Putnam, West Virginia. Ilijengwa mnamo 1955, na inachukua Mto wa Kanawha, iliyobeba West Virginia Route 34. Cantilever kupitia-truss ina nafasi mbili za nanga kila futi 245 kwa urefu na urefu wa futi 462 kwa urefu kati ya mistari ya kituo cha pier. Span kuu ina futi mbili 128, inchi 4, mikono ya cantilever na miguu 205, inchi 4, iliyosimamishwa.

Uswidi ilipiga Ufini 8-1 mnamo 2 Oktoba 1949 huko Malmö. Walakini, wavuti ya FIFA haijumuishi mechi hii kwenye orodha ya mechi au kwenye msimamo wa kikundi. Wavuti ya RSSSF inaorodhesha mechi na noti "Uswidi ilicheza B-Timu", na haitoi msimamo wa kikundi.
ㅟ ni moja ya Hangul ya Kikorea. Unicode ya ㅟ ni U+315F.
Ơ ni moja ya vokali 12 za lugha ya Kivietinamu. Inatamkwa (isiyo na [O]).
X̂ ni barua ya Kilatini "X" na circuflex. Barua hiyo inatumika katika lugha ya Haida na lugha za Aleut za Alaska.
ڼ ni barua ya ishirini na tisa ya alfabeti ya Pashto. Inawakilisha pua ya retroflex (IPA :) ambayo ni ण katika Devanagari na imetafsiriwa. Katika Saraiki imeandikwa kama ݨ.

S͎ ni ishara inayotumika katika viongezeo kwa alfabeti ya kimataifa ya fonetiki kuwakilisha s. Sauti hiyo hufanyika katika lugha ya Kingereza inayowakilishwa na SV, kama kwa jina la Morgan Tsvangirai.

Ŭ inawakilisha semivowel katika orthografia ya Esperanto, ambayo ni lugha ya kimataifa ya msaidizi iliyowasilishwa hadharani mnamo 1887. Kama ilivyo kwa Belarusi, Esperanto ŭ hutamkwa kama isiyo ya syllabic, haswa katika diphthongs "aŭ", "eŭ" na mara chache "oŭ".
Ġ ni barua ya 7 ya alfabeti ya Kimalta, iliyotanguliwa na F na ikifuatiwa na G. Inawakilisha sauti.
Ĥ au ĥ ni konsonanti katika orthografia ya Esperanto, inayowakilisha fricative isiyo na sauti au isiyo na sauti. Jina lake katika Esperanto ni "ĥo" (limetamkwa).

question_en: Where is the Gulf of Tonkin?
pos_context_en: The Gulf of Tonkin (, ; also ) is a body of water located off the coast of northern Vietnam and southern China. It is a northern arm of the South China Sea. The Gulf is defined in the west by the northern coastline of Vietnam, in the north by China's Guangxi province, and to the east by China's Leizhou Peninsula and Hainan Island.
neg_context_en: On the morning of 2 August 1964, the morning after OPLAN commandos raided a North Vietnamese radio transmitter located on an offshore island, one of these destroyers, the USS "Maddox", was reported to have come under attack by DRV naval patrol boats in the Gulf of Tonkin. There was a second alleged attack on August 4, which was later shown to be a falsehood. These attacks, and the ensuing naval actions, known as the Gulf of Tonkin Incident, were seized upon by President Lyndon Johnson to secure passage by the U.S. Congress of the Southeast Asia Resolution (better known as the Gulf of Tonkin Resolution) on 7 August 1964, leading to a dramatic escalation of the Vietnam War. It has since been alleged that the Gulf of Tonkin Incident was partly a fabrication, including testimony by participants, such as squadron commander James Stockdale, in the events themselves. Even the attacks that did happen were not unprovoked, but a result of the OPLAN 34A raids, which was in essence an American operation.

US Naval forces had been introduced intermittently off the coast of Vietnam since March 1950 as "show the flag" tours to reinforce the Republic of Vietnam. In May 1964 three carrier task groups took up position at Yankee Station in the Gulf of Tonkin. Reconnaissance flights were conducted by these carriers, although no combat missions had started. The Soviets had assisted the Vietnamese in the construction of more sophisticated anti-aircraft installations. The Navy sought to bring electronic warfare "DeSoto missions" to identify these installations and sent the , leading to the Tonkin Gulf Incident.

It was originally claimed by the National Security Agency that a Second Gulf of Tonkin incident occurred on August 4, 1964, as another sea battle, but instead evidence was found of "Tonkin ghosts" (false radar images) and not actual North Vietnamese torpedo boats. In the 2003 documentary "The Fog of War", the former United States Secretary of Defense Robert S. McNamara admitted that the August 2 USS "Maddox" attack happened with no Defense Department response, but the August 4 Gulf of Tonkin attack never happened. In 1995, McNamara met with former Vietnam People's Army General Võ Nguyên Giáp to ask what happened on August 4, 1964 in the second Gulf of Tonkin Incident. "Absolutely nothing", Giáp replied. Giáp claimed that the attack had been imaginary.

On 2 August 1964, United States President Lyndon B. Johnson claimed that North Vietnamese forces had twice attacked American destroyers in the Gulf of Tonkin. Known today as the Gulf of Tonkin Incident, this event spawned the Gulf of Tonkin Resolution of 7 August 1964, ultimately leading to open war between North Vietnam and the United States. It furthermore foreshadowed the major escalation of the Vietnam War in South Vietnam, which began with the landing of US regular combat troops at Da Nang in 1965.

In the convention on Gulf of Tonkin signed between the Vietnamese government and the Chinese government, China respects the Vietnamese sovereignty over the island and there is no dispute over the island
The core issue to be settled in the Gulf of Tonkin is which principle should be used in order to divide the Gulf. In this context, the impact of islands is of crucial importance and, in particular, the Vietnamese controlled Bach Long Vi Island. The first question is whether or not it qualifies as an island according to the provisions of the 1982 United Nations Law of the Sea Convention (1982 UNCLOS). If it does impact on the tracing of a line of equidistance if this principle is applied in the Gulf of Tonkin. Logically, Vietnam would take the position that Bach Long Vi Island should have its full impact in any agreement on how to divide the Gulf. On the other hand, China has an interest in minimising the impact that the Island would have on any agreed delimitation. This could be done by, either arguing that Bach Long Vi is not an island in accordance with the provisions of 1982 UNCLOS or, by arguing that its impact should be minimised and possibly even be disregarded. For China to argue that it is not an island would be counterproductive as China has earlier controlled the island and has claimed that the island was inhabited before it was handed-over to Vietnam in the late 1950s.

The Beibu Gulf Economic Rim or Beibu Economic Belt () also known as Gulf of Tonkin Economic Belt in (Vietnamese: Vành đai kinh tế vịnh Bắc Bộ) defines the economic region or rim surrounding around China's southwestern coastal region and cities around the Gulf of Tonkin. The region is part of Chinese government's "Go West" strategy, to boost its less developed western regions. The implementation of the campaign, has resulted in many construction projects in cities on the Beibu Gulf Rim, especially in Guangxi. The Beibu Gulf economic rim has emerged as a new highlight of China-ASEAN cooperation, especially between Vietnam, who is also cooperating in this economic zone. It covers Guangdong, Hainan and Guangxi, and northern and central Vietnam.
The cooperation scope includes trade, investment, exploitation of marine, tourism and oceanic environmental protection.

The bay's Vietnamese and Chinese names – and , respectively – both mean "Northern Bay". The name "Tonkin", written "" in Hán-Nôm characters and in the Vietnamese alphabet, means "eastern capital", and is the former toponym for Hanoi, the present capital of Vietnam. It should not to be confused with Tokyo, which is also written "" and also means "eastern capital". During Vietnam's French colonial era, the northern region was called "Tonkin".

Various news sources, including "Time", "Life" and "Newsweek", ran articles throughout August on the Tonkin Gulf incident. "Time" reported: "Through the darkness, from the West and south ... intruders boldly sped ... at least six of them ... they opened fire on the destroyers with automatic weapons, this time from as close as 2,000 yards." "Time" stated that there was "no doubt in Sharp's mind that the US would now have to answer this attack", and that there was no debate or confusion within the administration regarding the incident.

The Gulf of Tonkin incident (), also known as the USS "Maddox" incident, was an international confrontation that led to the United States engaging more directly in the Vietnam War. It involved either one or two separate confrontations involving North Vietnam and the United States in the waters of the Gulf of Tonkin. The original American report blamed North Vietnam for both incidents, but eventually became very controversial with widespread belief that at least one, and possibly both incidents were false, and possibly deliberately so. On August 2, 1964, the destroyer , while performing a signals intelligence patrol as part of DESOTO operations, was pursued by three North Vietnamese Navy torpedo boats of the 135th Torpedo Squadron. "Maddox" fired three warning shots and the North Vietnamese boats then attacked with torpedoes and machine gun fire. "Maddox" expended over 280 3-inch (76.2 mm) and 5-inch (127 mm) shells in a sea battle. One U.S. aircraft was damaged, three North Vietnamese torpedo boats were damaged, and four North Vietnamese sailors were killed, with six more wounded. There were no U.S. casualties. "Maddox" "was unscathed except for a single bullet hole from a Vietnamese machine gun round."
question_src: Ghuba ya Tonkin iko wapi?
pos_context_src: Ghuba ya Tonkin (,; pia) ni mwili wa maji ulioko pwani ya Vietnam ya Kaskazini na China ya kusini. Ni mkono wa kaskazini wa Bahari ya China Kusini. Ghuba hiyo hufafanuliwa magharibi na pwani ya kaskazini ya Vietnam, kaskazini na Mkoa wa Guangxi wa China, na mashariki na Peninsula ya Leizhou ya China na Kisiwa cha Hainan.
neg_context_src: Asubuhi ya 2 Agosti 1964, asubuhi baada ya Oplan Commandos kuvamia transmiter ya redio ya Vietnamese ya Kaskazini iliyoko kwenye kisiwa cha pwani, mmoja wa waangamizi hawa, USS "Maddox", iliripotiwa kuwa ilishambuliwa na Boti za Patrol za DRV huko Ghuba ya Tonkin. Kulikuwa na shambulio la pili lililodaiwa mnamo Agosti 4, ambalo baadaye lilionyeshwa kuwa uwongo. Mashambulio haya, na vitendo vya majini vilivyofuata, vinavyojulikana kama Ghuba ya Tonkin, vilikamatwa na Rais Lyndon Johnson kupata kifungu na Bunge la Merika la Azimio la Asia ya Kusini (inayojulikana kama Ghuba ya Azimio la Tonkin) mnamo 7 Agosti 1964, na kusababisha kuongezeka kwa nguvu ya Vita ya Vietnam. Imekuwa ikidaiwa kuwa tukio la Ghuba ya Tonkin lilikuwa sehemu ya uwongo, pamoja na ushuhuda wa washiriki, kama vile Kamanda wa Kikosi James Stockdale, katika hafla zenyewe. Hata mashambulio ambayo hayakutokea hayakuwa yamepunguzwa, lakini matokeo ya shambulio la Oplan 34A, ambalo kwa kweli lilikuwa operesheni ya Amerika.

Vikosi vya majini vya Amerika vilianzishwa mara kwa mara kwenye pwani ya Vietnam tangu Machi 1950 kama safari za "Onyesha bendera" ili kuimarisha Jamhuri ya Vietnam. Mnamo Mei 1964 vikundi vitatu vya kazi vya wabebaji vilichukua nafasi katika Kituo cha Yankee katika Ghuba ya Tonkin. Ndege za reconnaissance zilifanywa na wabebaji hawa, ingawa hakuna misheni ya mapigano iliyoanza. Soviets walikuwa wamesaidia Kivietinamu katika ujenzi wa mitambo ya kisasa zaidi ya kupambana na ndege. Jeshi la wanamaji lilitaka kuleta vita vya elektroniki "Misheni ya DeSoto" kubaini mitambo hii na kutuma, na kusababisha tukio la Ghuba ya Tonkin.

Hapo awali ilidaiwa na Shirika la Usalama la Kitaifa kwamba tukio la pili la Ghuba ya Tonkin lilitokea mnamo Agosti 4, 1964, kama vita nyingine ya bahari, lakini badala yake ushahidi ulipatikana wa "vizuka vya Tonkin" (picha za uwongo za rada) na sio boti halisi za Vietnamese za Vietnamese. Katika hati ya 2003 "Fog of War", Katibu wa zamani wa Ulinzi wa Merika Robert S. McNamara alikiri kwamba shambulio la Agosti 2 USS "Maddox" lilitokea bila majibu ya Idara ya Ulinzi, lakini shambulio la Agosti 4 la Tonkin halijawahi kutokea. Mnamo 1995, McNamara alikutana na Mkuu wa zamani wa Jeshi la Watu wa Vietnam Võ Nguyên Giáp kuuliza kilichotokea mnamo Agosti 4, 1964 katika tukio la pili la Tonkin. "Hakuna kitu", Giáp akajibu. Giáp alidai kwamba shambulio hilo lilikuwa la kufikiria.

Mnamo tarehe 2 Agosti 1964, Rais wa Merika Lyndon B. Johnson alidai kwamba vikosi vya Vietnam Kaskazini vilikuwa vishambulia mara mbili waangamizi wa Amerika katika Ghuba ya Tonkin. Inayojulikana leo kama tukio la Ghuba ya Tonkin, hafla hii ilisababisha Ghuba ya Azimio la Tonkin la 7 Agosti 1964, na kusababisha vita wazi kati ya Vietnam Kaskazini na Merika. Ilionyesha zaidi kuongezeka kwa Vita vya Vietnam huko Vietnam Kusini, ambayo ilianza na kutua kwa askari wa kawaida wa vita huko Da Nang mnamo 1965.

Katika Mkutano wa Ghuba ya Tonkin ulisainiwa kati ya Serikali ya Vietnam na Serikali ya China, China inaheshimu uhuru wa Kivietinamu juu ya kisiwa hicho na hakuna mzozo juu ya kisiwa hicho
Suala la msingi la kutatuliwa katika Ghuba ya Tonkin ni kanuni gani inapaswa kutumiwa ili kugawa Ghuba. Katika muktadha huu, athari za visiwa ni muhimu sana na, haswa, Kisiwa cha Kivietinamu kilidhibitiwa na Kisiwa cha Vietnamese. Swali la kwanza ni ikiwa inastahili kama kisiwa kulingana na vifungu vya Sheria ya Umoja wa Mataifa ya 1982 ya Mkutano wa Bahari (1982 UNCLOS). Ikiwa inathiri athari ya ufuatiliaji wa mstari wa usawa ikiwa kanuni hii inatumika katika Ghuba ya Tonkin. Kimantiki, Vietnam ingechukua msimamo kwamba Kisiwa cha Bach Long VI kinapaswa kuwa na athari kamili katika makubaliano yoyote ya jinsi ya kugawa Ghuba. Kwa upande mwingine, China ina nia ya kupunguza athari ambayo kisiwa hicho kingekuwa na utaftaji wowote uliokubaliwa. Hii inaweza kufanywa na, ikisema kwamba Bach Long VI sio kisiwa kulingana na masharti ya 1982 UNCLOS au, kwa kusema kwamba athari zake zinapaswa kupunguzwa na labda hata kupuuzwa. Kwa China kusema kuwa sio kisiwa kingekuwa kisicho na faida kwani China imedhibiti kisiwa hapo awali na imedai kuwa kisiwa hicho kilikaliwa kabla ya kukabidhiwa Vietnam mwishoni mwa miaka ya 1950.

Beibu Ghuba ya Uchumi au ukanda wa Uchumi wa Beibu () pia inajulikana kama Ghuba ya Ukanda wa Uchumi wa Tonkin katika (Vietnamese: Vành đai Kinh Tế Vịnh Bắc Bộ) inafafanua mkoa wa uchumi au ukingo unaozunguka mkoa wa pwani wa kusini magharibi na miji karibu na Ghuba ya Tonkin. Mkoa huo ni sehemu ya mkakati wa "Go West" wa Serikali ya China, ili kuongeza mikoa yake ya Magharibi iliyoendelea. Utekelezaji wa kampeni, umesababisha miradi mingi ya ujenzi katika miji kwenye Beibu Ghuba ya Beibu, haswa huko Guangxi. Beibu Ghuba ya Uchumi imeibuka kama onyesho mpya la ushirikiano wa China-ASEAN, haswa kati ya Vietnam, ambaye pia anashirikiana katika eneo hili la uchumi. Inashughulikia Guangdong, Hainan na Guangxi, na Kaskazini na Kati Vietnam.
Wigo wa ushirikiano ni pamoja na biashara, uwekezaji, unyonyaji wa baharini, utalii na usalama wa mazingira ya bahari.

Majina ya Kivietinamu ya Bay na Wachina - na, mtawaliwa - zote zinamaanisha "Kaskazini mwa Bay". Jina "Tonkin", lililoandikwa "" kwa wahusika wa Hán-Nôm na katika alfabeti ya Kivietinamu, inamaanisha "mji mkuu wa mashariki", na ni jina la zamani la Hanoi, mji mkuu wa sasa wa Vietnam. Haipaswi kuchanganyikiwa na Tokyo, ambayo pia imeandikwa "" na pia inamaanisha "mji mkuu wa Mashariki". Wakati wa ukoloni wa Ufaransa wa Vietnam, mkoa wa kaskazini uliitwa "Tonkin".

Vyanzo anuwai vya habari, pamoja na "Wakati", "Maisha" na "Newsweek", viliendesha nakala mnamo Agosti kwenye tukio la Tonkin Ghuba. "Wakati" uliripoti: "Kupitia giza, kutoka magharibi na kusini ... waingiliaji waligonga kwa ujasiri ... angalau sita kati yao ... walifungua moto kwa waangamizi na silaha za moja kwa moja, wakati huu kutoka karibu kama yadi 2,000." "Wakati" ulisema kwamba kulikuwa na "bila shaka katika akili ya Sharp kwamba Amerika sasa italazimika kujibu shambulio hili", na kwamba hakukuwa na mjadala au machafuko ndani ya utawala kuhusu tukio hilo.

Tukio la Ghuba ya Tonkin (), pia inajulikana kama tukio la USS "Maddox", lilikuwa mzozo wa kimataifa ambao ulisababisha Merika kujihusisha moja kwa moja kwenye Vita vya Vietnam. Ilihusisha mzozo mmoja au mbili tofauti zinazohusisha Vietnam Kaskazini na Merika katika maji ya Ghuba ya Tonkin. Ripoti ya asili ya Amerika ililaumu Vietnam Kaskazini kwa matukio yote mawili, lakini mwishowe ikawa na utata sana na imani iliyoenea kwamba angalau moja, na labda matukio yote mawili yalikuwa ya uwongo, na labda kwa makusudi. Mnamo Agosti 2, 1964, Mwangamizi, wakati akifanya doria ya Ushauri wa Ishara kama sehemu ya shughuli za DeSoto, alifuatwa na boti tatu za Jeshi la Kivietinamu la Kivietinamu la 135 la Torpedo squadron. "Maddox" ilirusha risasi tatu za onyo na boti za Kivietinamu za Kaskazini kisha zikashambuliwa na torpedoes na moto wa bunduki ya mashine. "Maddox" ilizidisha zaidi ya 280 3-inch (76.2 mm) na 5-inch (127 mm) ganda katika vita vya bahari. Ndege moja ya Merika iliharibiwa, boti tatu za Kivietinamu za Kivietinamu ziliharibiwa, na mabaharia wanne wa Vietnamese waliuawa, na sita wengine walijeruhiwa. Hakukuwa na majeruhi wa Merika. "Maddox" "haikuwa na shida isipokuwa kwa shimo moja la risasi kutoka kwa bunduki ya mashine ya Kivietinamu."
report_src: Ghuba ya Tonkin iko pwani ya kaskazini ya Vietnam na kusini mwa China, ikiwa ni mkono wa kaskazini wa Bahari ya China Kusini, kati ya pwani ya kaskazini ya Vietnam upande wa magharibi, Mkoa wa Guangxi wa China upande wa kaskazini, na Peninsula ya Leizhou pamoja na Kisiwa cha Hainan upande wa mashariki [1].
all_claims: Ghuba ya Tonkin iko pwani ya kaskazini ya Vietnam na kusini mwa China, ikiwa ni mkono wa kaskazini wa Bahari ya China Kusini, kati ya pwani ya kaskazini ya Vietnam upande wa magharibi, Mkoa wa Guangxi wa China upande wa kaskazini, na Peninsula ya Leizhou pamoja na Kisiwa cha Hainan upande wa mashariki [1].

question_en: When was the American Diabetes Association formed?
pos_context_en: The ADA was founded in 1940 by six leading physicians − including Dr. Herman O. Mosenthal, Dr. Joseph T. Beardwood Jr., Dr. Joseph H. Barack, and Dr. E. S. Dillion − at their 1939 meeting of The American College of Physicians. In September 1946, they hosted a meeting in Toronto, Canada to celebrate the twenty-fifth anniversary of the discovery of insulin. The meeting served as a successful forum for hundreds of physicians and leading figures interested in the studies of diabetes and carbohydrate metabolism. The organization is now a national nonprofit with 40 affiliate organizations, more than 800 individual chapters, over a million volunteers, and almost 1,000 staff members − including officer and a board of directors.
neg_context_en: The Diabetic Association of Australia was formed in 1938. In 1956 the Diabetes Federation of Australia was formed and New South Wales changed its name to the Diabetic Association of NSW. In 2010, the name was changed to the Australian Diabetes Council, but in April 2014, after a change in the leadership, the organisation became known as Diabetes NSW. In 2016 following the merger with Diabetes ACT the organisation became known as Diabetes NSW & ACT - the peak consumer body for diabetes in New South Wales and the ACT.

In 1934, he conceived the idea of an association which would foster research and encourage education and welfare of patients. To this end a group of doctors and diabetics met in the London home of Lawrence's patient, H. G. Wells, the scientist and writer, and the Diabetic Association was formed. When other countries followed suit it became the British Diabetic Association (the BDA). Lawrence was Chairman of the Executive Council from 1934–1961 and Hon. Life President from 1962. His enthusiasm and drive ensured the life and steady growth of this association which soon became the voice of the diabetic population and constantly sought to promote the welfare of diabetics. There are now active branches through the country. He was also a prime mover in production of "The Diabetic Journal" (forerunner of Balance), the first issue of which appeared in January 1935. Many articles thereafter were contributed by himself anonymously. He and colleague Joseph Hoet were the main proponents in founding the International Diabetes Federation and he served as their first president from 1950–1958. At their triennial conferences, Lawrence's appearance was always greeted with acclaim.

He has carried out pioneering work in the medical field with a particular interest in diabetes. In 1982, he pioneered the formation of the Diabetes Association of the Caribbean, which now has 26 member countries, and was its President from 1985 to 1987 and its Vice President from 1989 to 1991. In 1991, he launched the University Diabetes Outreach Project (UDOP) with the help of a Wolfson Foundation grant. He played a key role in partnerships between the International Diabetes Federation and the Pan American Health Organization (PAHO/WHO), in responding to the emerging pandemic of type 2 diabetes, by applying the St. Vincent Declaration intervention model to the Americas, in the form of the Declaration of the Americas on Diabetes or DOTA (1996).

Dr. Charles Best, a co-inventor of medical insulin founded the Diabetic Association of Ontario in the late 1940s. As other provinces and territories started to form their own associations, it became clear that if the provincial branches combined their resources they could more effectively serve their membership. This culminated in the formation of the Canadian Diabetes Association in 1953.

The late national professor Muhammad Ibrahim is the founder of BIRDEM in 1980. Under his leadership, Bangladesh Diabetic Association (then named Diabetic Association for Pakistan) was formed in February 1956. Bangladesh Diabetic Association are nine separate organizations. These are the BIRDEM (Bangladesh Institute of Research and Rehabilitation in Diabetes, Endocrine and Metabolic Disorders), Rehabilitation and Vocational Training Center, National Healthcare Network, Ibrahim Cardiac Hospital and Research Center, Ibrahim Medical College, Bangladesh Institute of Health Sciences, BIRDEM Nursing College, Bangladesh University of Health Sciences and Healthcare Development Project. Professor Muhammad Ibrahim proposed a chamber of the lower house of his home in Segunbagicha, Dhaka to use the Association. In the home, he started the outdoor department for diabetes. First of all, there was a free medical treatment. During the Pakistan period, the Samity was given some land for the hospital in Segunbagicha. The hospital was inaugurated in 1980 at Shahbagh. In 2013 BIRDEM-2 hospital was started in Segunbagicha.

Founded in 1973, AADE works to define the practice of diabetes education, increase patients' access to the services of diabetes educators, and provide members with the support and tools to become leaders in the field of diabetes care.

Mayes became a volunteer working to improve the lives of people with diabetes when his son Wendell Mayes III was diagnosed with diabetes at age nine. He has served as Chairman of the American Diabetes Association (1974–77) and President of the International Diabetes Federation (1991–94), the first layperson to hold the position. The American Diabetes Association named its highest non-scientific award for Mayes and presented him with the first medal in 1986. The ADA also presented Mayes with the Charles H. Best Medal (1978), the Addison B. Scoville Award (1977), the Josiah Kirby Lilly Sr. Award (1991) and the Harold Rifkin Award (1994). In 1994 in Kobe, Japan, the Colloquium on Medical Science presented Mayes with the Masaji Takeda Medal. Mayes was honored by the American Diabetes Association Texas Affiliate in 1994 with a dinner in Dallas. When the State of Texas formed the Texas Diabetes Council in 1983, he served as its first chairman. For nine months in 1999 he returned to the Texas Diabetes Council to serve as its Interim Executive Director. He was the first inductee into the Texas Diabetes Hall of Fame.

William Christopher Stadie (June 15, 1886 – September 12, 1959) was a researcher, a Diabetes specialist. He was John Herr Musser Emeritus Professor of Research Medicine at the University of Pennsylvania. He also served as an editor of the "Diabetes", the journal of the American Diabetes Association. Other distinctions included: honorary degree of the University of Pennsylvania, the Phillips Medal of the American College of Physicians (1941), the Kober Medal for 1955 from the Association of American Physicians and the Banting Medal of the American Diabetes Association. During the 1918 influenza epidemic Stadie invented oxygen therapy for treatment of cyanosis, a condition resulting from pneumonia.

Diabetes is a monthly peer-reviewed medical journal published since 1952 by the American Diabetes Association. It covers research about the physiology and pathophysiology of diabetes mellitus including any aspect of laboratory, animal or human research. Emphasis is on investigative reports focusing on areas such as the pathogenesis of diabetes and its complications, normal and pathologic pancreatic islet function and intermediary metabolism, pharmacological mechanisms of drug and hormone action, and biochemical and molecular aspects of normal and abnormal biological processes. Diabetes also publishes abstracts presented at the ADA's annual meeting, Scientific Sessions, in as a supplement.

Created following Hurricanes Katrina and Rita in 2005 by the American College of Endocrinology (ACE) with support provided from Lilly Diabetes, the My Diabetes Emergency Plan is a comprehensive resource for diabetes patients in crises. The plan has three components: A pocket-sized checklist, an instructional “how-to” video and an educational website. Available in English and Spanish, the checklist details for diabetes patients the essential items and the practical steps to take in advance of an emergency situation - before they are faced with a difficult situation. The video provides patients with real-life examples of the elements they should include in their kits and can be viewed by visiting: www.mydiabetesemergencyplan.com.
question_src: Chama cha ugonjwa wa kisukari cha Amerika kiliundwa lini?
pos_context_src: ADA ilianzishwa mnamo 1940 na waganga sita wanaoongoza - pamoja na Dk. Herman O. Mosenthal, Dk. Joseph T. Beardwood Jr., Dk. Joseph H. Barack, na Dk E. S. Dillion - katika mkutano wao wa 1939 wa Chuo cha Waganga wa Amerika. Mnamo Septemba 1946, walishiriki mkutano huko Toronto, Canada kusherehekea maadhimisho ya miaka ishirini na tano ya ugunduzi wa insulini. Mkutano huo ulitumika kama mkutano mzuri wa mamia ya waganga na takwimu zinazoongoza zinazopendezwa na masomo ya ugonjwa wa kisukari na kimetaboliki ya wanga. Shirika sasa ni faida ya kitaifa na mashirika 40 ya ushirika, zaidi ya sura 800 za watu, zaidi ya kujitolea milioni, na wafanyikazi karibu 1,000 - pamoja na afisa na bodi ya wakurugenzi.
neg_context_title_src: Ugonjwa wa sukari NSW & amp; Kitendo
Chama cha Amerika cha Waalimu wa Kisukari
Chama cha Amerika cha Endocrinologists ya Kliniki
neg_context_src: Chama cha kisukari cha Australia kiliundwa mnamo 1938. Mnamo 1956 Shirikisho la ugonjwa wa kisukari la Australia liliundwa na New South Wales ilibadilisha jina lake kuwa Chama cha Diabetes cha NSW. Mnamo mwaka wa 2010, jina hilo lilibadilishwa kuwa Baraza la Ugonjwa wa kisukari la Australia, lakini mnamo Aprili 2014, baada ya mabadiliko katika uongozi, shirika hilo lilijulikana kama ugonjwa wa kisukari NSW. Mnamo mwaka wa 2016 kufuatia kuunganishwa na Sheria ya ugonjwa wa kisukari shirika hilo lilijulikana kama ugonjwa wa kisukari NSW & ACT - Kikosi cha Watumiaji wa Kisukari huko New South Wales na ACT.

Mnamo mwaka wa 1934, aligundua wazo la chama ambacho kinaweza kukuza utafiti na kuhimiza elimu na ustawi wa wagonjwa. Kufikia hii kundi la madaktari na wagonjwa wa kisukari walikutana katika nyumba ya London ya mgonjwa wa Lawrence, H. G. Wells, mwanasayansi na mwandishi, na chama cha kisukari kiliundwa. Wakati nchi zingine zilifuata ikawa Chama cha Ushujaa cha Briteni (BDA). Lawrence alikuwa mwenyekiti wa Halmashauri Kuu kutoka 1934-1961 na Mhe. Rais wa maisha kutoka 1962. Ushawishi wake na gari zilihakikisha maisha na ukuaji thabiti wa chama hiki ambacho hivi karibuni kilikuwa sauti ya idadi ya watu wa kisukari na mara kwa mara walitafuta kukuza ustawi wa wagonjwa wa kisukari. Sasa kuna matawi ya kazi kupitia nchi. Alikuwa pia kiongozi mkuu katika utengenezaji wa "Jarida la Ushujaa" (mtangulizi wa Mizani), toleo la kwanza ambalo lilionekana mnamo Januari 1935. Nakala nyingi baadaye zilichangiwa na yeye mwenyewe bila majina. Yeye na mwenzake Joseph Hoet walikuwa watetezi wakuu katika kuanzisha Shirikisho la Kimataifa la Ugonjwa wa Kisukari na aliwahi kuwa rais wao wa kwanza kutoka 1950-1958. Katika mikutano yao ya utatu, muonekano wa Lawrence kila wakati ulisalimiwa kwa madai.

Amefanya kazi ya upainia katika uwanja wa matibabu na shauku fulani ya ugonjwa wa sukari. Mnamo 1982, alifanya upainia wa Chama cha Kisukari cha Caribbean, ambacho sasa kina nchi wanachama 26, na alikuwa rais wake kutoka 1985 hadi 1987 na makamu wake wa rais kutoka 1989 hadi 1991. Mnamo 1991, alizindua Mradi wa Kufukuza Ugonjwa wa kisukari wa Chuo Kikuu (UDOP) kwa msaada wa ruzuku ya Wolfson Foundation. Alicheza jukumu muhimu katika ushirika kati ya Shirikisho la Kimataifa la Ugonjwa wa Kisukari na Shirika la Afya la Pan American (PAHO/WHO), katika kujibu janga linaloibuka la ugonjwa wa kisukari cha aina ya 2, kwa kutumia mfano wa kuingilia kati wa St.

Dk Charles Best, mtaalam wa insulini ya matibabu alianzisha Jumuiya ya kisukari ya Ontario mwishoni mwa miaka ya 1940. Kadiri majimbo mengine na wilaya zilianza kuunda vyama vyao, ilionekana wazi kwamba ikiwa matawi ya mkoa yangejumuisha rasilimali zao wanaweza kutumikia ushirika wao kwa ufanisi. Hii ilimalizika katika malezi ya Chama cha Kisukari cha Canada mnamo 1953.

Profesa wa marehemu wa kitaifa Muhammad Ibrahim ndiye mwanzilishi wa birdEm mnamo 1980. Chini ya uongozi wake, Chama cha Diabetes cha Bangladesh (ambacho kiliitwa Diabetetic Association for Pakistan) kiliundwa mnamo Februari 1956. Chama cha Diabetes cha Bangladesh ni mashirika tisa tofauti. Hizi ndizo birdem (Taasisi ya Utafiti na Ukarabati ya Bangladesh katika ugonjwa wa kisukari, shida ya endocrine na metabolic), Kituo cha Mafunzo ya Ufundi na Ufundi, Mtandao wa Kitaifa wa Huduma ya Afya, Hospitali ya Ibrahim Cardiac na Kituo cha Utafiti, Chuo cha Matibabu cha Ibrahim, Taasisi ya Bangladesh ya Sayansi ya Afya, Chuo cha Uuguzi wa Birdem. Profesa Muhammad Ibrahim alipendekeza chumba cha nyumba ya chini ya nyumba yake huko Segunbagicha, Dhaka kutumia chama hicho. Nyumbani, alianza idara ya nje ya ugonjwa wa sukari. Kwanza kabisa, kulikuwa na matibabu ya bure ya matibabu. Katika kipindi cha Pakistan, umoja ulipewa ardhi kwa hospitali huko Segunbagicha. Hospitali ilianzishwa mnamo 1980 huko Shahbagh. Mnamo 2013 Hospitali ya Birdem-2 ilianzishwa huko Segunbagicha.

Ilianzishwa mnamo 1973, AADE inafanya kazi kufafanua mazoezi ya elimu ya ugonjwa wa sukari, kuongeza upatikanaji wa wagonjwa katika huduma za waalimu wa ugonjwa wa sukari, na kuwapa wanachama msaada na zana za kuwa viongozi katika uwanja wa utunzaji wa kisukari.

Mayes alijitolea kufanya kazi ili kuboresha maisha ya watu wenye ugonjwa wa sukari wakati mtoto wake Wendell Mayes III alipogunduliwa na ugonjwa wa sukari akiwa na umri wa miaka tisa. Ametumika kama Mwenyekiti wa Chama cha Kisukari cha Amerika (1974-77) na Rais wa Shirikisho la Kidunia la Kimataifa (1991-94), mjumbe wa kwanza kushikilia msimamo huo. Chama cha kisukari cha Amerika kilitaja tuzo yake ya juu zaidi isiyo ya kisayansi kwa Mayes na ilimwasilisha medali ya kwanza mnamo 1986. ADA pia iliwasilisha Mayes na Charles H. Best Medal (1978), Addison B. Scoville Award (1977), Tuzo la Yosia Kirby Lilly Sr. (1991) na Tuzo la Harold). Mnamo 1994 huko Kobe, Japan, colloquium juu ya sayansi ya matibabu iliwasilisha mayes na medali ya Masaji Takeda. Mayes aliheshimiwa na ushirika wa Chama cha Kisukari cha Amerika Texas mnamo 1994 na chakula cha jioni huko Dallas. Wakati Jimbo la Texas lilipounda Baraza la Ugonjwa wa kisukari la Texas mnamo 1983, aliwahi kuwa mwenyekiti wake wa kwanza. Kwa miezi tisa mnamo 1999 alirudi katika Baraza la Ugonjwa wa kisukari la Texas kutumika kama mkurugenzi mtendaji wa mpito. Alikuwa inductee wa kwanza ndani ya Ukumbi wa ugonjwa wa kisukari wa Texas.

William Christopher Stadie (Juni 15, 1886 - Septemba 12, 1959) alikuwa mtafiti, mtaalam wa ugonjwa wa sukari. Alikuwa John Herr Musser Emeritus Profesa wa Tiba ya Utafiti katika Chuo Kikuu cha Pennsylvania. Pia aliwahi kuwa mhariri wa "ugonjwa wa kisukari", Jarida la Chama cha Kisukari cha Amerika. Tofauti zingine ni pamoja na: Shahada ya Heshima ya Chuo Kikuu cha Pennsylvania, medali ya Phillips ya Chuo cha Waganga wa Amerika (1941), medali ya Kober ya 1955 kutoka Chama cha Waganga wa Amerika na medali ya Banting ya Chama cha Wagonjwa wa kisukari cha Amerika. Wakati wa ugonjwa wa mafua ya mafua ya 1918 uligundua tiba ya oksijeni kwa matibabu ya cyanosis, hali inayotokana na pneumonia.

Ugonjwa wa kisukari ni jarida la matibabu lililopitiwa na rika la kila mwezi lililochapishwa tangu 1952 na Chama cha Kisukari cha Amerika. Inashughulikia utafiti juu ya fiziolojia na pathophysiology ya ugonjwa wa kisukari ikiwa ni pamoja na sehemu yoyote ya maabara, wanyama au utafiti wa kibinadamu. Mkazo ni juu ya ripoti za uchunguzi zinazozingatia maeneo kama vile pathogenesis ya ugonjwa wa sukari na shida zake, kazi ya kawaida na ya ugonjwa wa kongosho na kimetaboliki ya mpatanishi, mifumo ya dawa ya dawa na hatua ya homoni, na mambo ya biochemical na Masi ya michakato ya kawaida na isiyo ya kawaida ya kibaolojia. Ugonjwa wa kisukari pia huchapisha nakala zilizowasilishwa katika mkutano wa kila mwaka wa ADA, vikao vya kisayansi, kama nyongeza.

Iliundwa kufuatia vimbunga Katrina na Rita mnamo 2005 na Chuo cha Amerika cha Endocrinology (ACE) na msaada unaotolewa kutoka kwa ugonjwa wa kisukari wa Lilly, Mpango wa Dharura wa Ugonjwa wa kisukari ni rasilimali kamili kwa wagonjwa wa kisukari katika misiba. Mpango huo una vifaa vitatu: orodha ya ukaguzi wa ukubwa wa mfukoni, video ya kufundishia "jinsi ya" na wavuti ya elimu. Inapatikana kwa Kiingereza na Kihispania, maelezo ya orodha ya wagonjwa wa kisukari vitu muhimu na hatua za kuchukua kabla ya hali ya dharura - kabla ya kukabiliwa na hali ngumu. Video hiyo inapeana wagonjwa na mifano halisi ya vitu ambavyo wanapaswa kujumuisha kwenye vifaa vyao na vinaweza kutazamwa kwa kutembelea: www.mydiabetesemergencyplan.com.
