question_en: What is the largest U.S. Navy shipyard?
pos_context_en: The Norfolk Naval Shipyard, often called the Norfolk Navy Yard and abbreviated as NNSY, is a U.S. Navy facility in Portsmouth, Virginia, for building, remodeling, and repairing the Navy's ships. It is the oldest and largest industrial facility that belongs to the U.S. Navy as well as the most multifaceted. Located on the Elizabeth River, the yard is just a short distance upriver from its mouth at Hampton Roads.
neg_context_title_en: Delaware River Iron Ship Building and Engine Works
Delaware River Iron Ship Building and Engine Works
neg_context_en: Naval Base Kitsap is the third-largest Navy base in the U.S. It features one of the U.S. Navy's four nuclear shipyards, one of two strategic nuclear weapons facilities, the only West Coast dry dock capable of handling a Nimitz-class aircraft carrier and the Navy's largest fuel depot.

Charleston, North Charleston, Goose Creek, and Hanahan are home to branches of the United States military. During the Cold War, the Naval Base (1902–1996) became the third largest U.S. homeport, with 23,500 Navy and Marine personnel, and 13,200 civilians serving over 80 ships and submarines. In addition, the combined facilities of the Naval Base and Weapons Station created the largest U.S. submarine port. The Charleston Naval Shipyard repaired frigates, destroyers, cruisers, submarine tenders, and submarines. Also during this period, the shipyard conducted refueling of nuclear submarines.

The Bellingham Shipyards was founded in 1941 by Arch Talbot before the Second World War in Bellingham, Washington from the merger of the Bellingham Marine Railway and the Bellingham Iron Works. During the war the shipyard produced wooden minesweepers for the United States Navy. At the time they were the largest privately owned shipyard in the United States. The yard continued operations after the war under the name Bellingham Marine. They built Minesweepers for the U.S. and Belgium Navy, and were noted for their production of the Bell Boy Boats line. The company closed in 1963.

For the first dozen years of its operations, the Roach shipyard was by far the U.S Navy's biggest contractor. Between 1873 and 1885, the yard received almost $4 million in contracts from just one Navy department, four times as much as the next largest contractor. Unfortunately, Naval contracts in this era often turned out to be liabilities for shipyards, and this would also prove to be the case for John Roach & Sons.

In 1871, the Delaware River Iron Ship Building and Engine Works was opened by John Roach through the purchase of the Reaney, Son & Archbold shipyard. The first steel ships of the U.S. Navy were built at the Roach shipyard. For the first 15 years of operation, it was the largest and most productive shipyard in the United States. More tonnage of ships were built at the Roach shipyard than its next two competitors combined.

There are currently three shipyards on San Diego Bay, National Steel and Shipbuilding Company (NASSCO), Continental Maritime of San Diego (Huntington Ingalls), and Southwest Marine (BAE Systems). NASSCO is the largest new-construction shipyard on the west coast of the United States; "specializing in auxiliary and support ships for the U.S. Navy and oil tankers and dry cargo carriers for commercial markets."

Over the course of its 37-year history, the Roach shipyard had many notable achievements to its credit. In 1874 it built "City of Peking" and "City of Tokio", the two largest gross-tonnage ships ever built in the United States to that date and the second largest in the world after the experimental British behemoth . In 1883 it constructed America's first steamer with a steel-plated hull. The yard played a key role in the so-called "Birth of the New Navy" when it built the four "ABCD ships"—the U.S. Navy's first steel ships. It also established a reputation for itself as a builder of lavishly outfitted "night boats" for the Long Island Sound trade, and in its last years, built the first three American ships to be powered by steam turbines. In total, the Delaware River Works built 179 ships between 1871 and 1908, including 10 warships for the U.S. Navy.

The Portsmouth Naval Shipyard Museum and the associated Lightship Museum are located on the downtown Portsmouth, Virginia, United States waterfront. The museum covers the 250+ year relationship with the shipyard - America's oldest and largest naval shipyard located on the Portsmouth Waterfront. The city and the shipyard have been intertwined since the founding of the Gosport Shipyard in 1767, which was later renamed Norfolk Navy Yard and finally Norfolk Naval Shipyard. This rich history is told through exhibits, hands-on programs and special events.

The San Francisco Bay Naval Shipyard was a short-lived shipyard formed in 1965 as the combination of the San Francisco Naval Shipyard (aka Hunters Point) and the Mare Island Naval Shipyard. The combined yards were the largest naval shipyard in the world, but the desired cost savings did not materialize, and the two yards reverted to separate existences in February 1970. The shipyard was used for radioactive testing when the United States was testing the atomic bomb. The site has since been contaminated. Now the Hunters Point Naval Shipyard is a Superfund site, as designated by the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA). It is the Navy's job to clean up the site to "reasonable" levels to those who live adjacent to the shipyard.
question_src: Je! Ni meli gani kubwa zaidi ya meli ya Jeshi la Merika?
pos_context_src: Norfolk Naval Shipyard, ambayo mara nyingi huitwa Norfolk Navy Yard na kufupishwa kama NNSY, ni kituo cha Jeshi la Merika huko Portsmouth, Virginia, kwa ujenzi, kurekebisha, na kukarabati meli za Navy. Ni kituo cha kongwe na kubwa zaidi cha viwandani ambacho ni cha Jeshi la Merika la Merika na vile vile. Iko kwenye Mto wa Elizabeth, uwanja huo ni umbali mfupi tu kutoka kwa kinywa chake katika barabara za Hampton.
neg_context_title_src: Jengo la Meli ya Meli ya Mto Delaware na kazi za injini
Jengo la Meli ya Meli ya Mto Delaware na kazi za injini
Makumbusho ya meli ya meli ya Portsmouth
neg_context_src: Naval Base Kitsap ndio msingi wa tatu wa Navy katika U.S. Inaonyesha moja ya meli nne za meli za nyuklia za Merika, moja wapo ya vifaa viwili vya silaha za nyuklia, eneo la kavu la Pwani Magharibi yenye uwezo wa kushughulikia mbebaji wa ndege wa darasa la Nimitz na dawati kubwa la mafuta la Navy.

Charleston, North Charleston, Goose Creek, na Hanahan ni nyumbani kwa matawi ya jeshi la Merika. Wakati wa Vita ya Baridi, Naval Base (1902-1996) ikawa uwanja wa tatu wa nyumbani wa Merika, na 23,500 Navy na wafanyikazi wa baharini, na raia 13,200 wakitumikia meli zaidi ya 80 na manowari. Kwa kuongezea, vifaa vya pamoja vya Kituo cha Naval na Kituo cha Silaha kiliunda bandari kubwa zaidi ya manowari ya Merika. Charleston Naval Shipyard ilirekebisha frigates, waangamizi, wasafiri, zabuni za manowari, na manowari. Pia katika kipindi hiki, uwanja wa meli ulifanya kuongeza kasi ya manowari ya nyuklia.

Shiptards za Bellingham zilianzishwa mnamo 1941 na Arch Talbot kabla ya Vita vya Pili vya Ulimwengu huko Bellingham, Washington kutoka kwa kuunganishwa kwa Reli ya Marine ya Bellingham na Iron ya Bellingham. Wakati wa vita uwanja wa meli ulizalisha migodi ya mbao kwa Jeshi la Merika la Merika. Wakati huo walikuwa uwanja mkubwa zaidi wa kibinafsi wa meli nchini Merika. Yadi iliendelea shughuli baada ya vita chini ya jina Bellingham Marine. Waliunda wachimbaji wa migodi kwa Jeshi la Merika la Merika na Ubelgiji, na walibainika kwa utengenezaji wao wa mstari wa Boti za Bell Boy. Kampuni hiyo ilifungwa mnamo 1963.

Kwa miaka kadhaa ya kwanza ya shughuli zake, Roach Shipyard ilikuwa kontrakta mkubwa wa U.S Navy. Kati ya 1873 na 1885, uwanja huo ulipokea karibu dola milioni 4 katika mikataba kutoka kwa idara moja ya jeshi la majini, mara nne kama mkandarasi mkubwa zaidi. Kwa bahati mbaya, mikataba ya majini katika enzi hii mara nyingi iligeuka kuwa dhima ya barabara za meli, na hii pia inaweza kuwa kesi ya John Roach & Sons.

Mnamo 1871, jengo la meli ya chuma ya Delaware River na kazi za injini zilifunguliwa na John Roach kupitia ununuzi wa Reaney, Son & Archbold Shipyard. Meli za kwanza za chuma za Jeshi la Merika zilijengwa kwenye uwanja wa meli wa Roach. Kwa miaka 15 ya kwanza ya operesheni, ilikuwa meli kubwa na yenye tija zaidi nchini Merika. Tonnage zaidi ya meli zilijengwa katika uwanja wa meli wa Roach kuliko washindani wake wawili waliofuata pamoja.

Hivi sasa kuna meli tatu za meli kwenye San Diego Bay, Kampuni ya Kitaifa ya Steel na Shipbuilding (NASSCO), Maritime ya Bara ya San Diego (Huntington Ingalls), na Marine ya Kusini Magharibi (Mifumo ya BAE). Nassco ndio uwanja mkubwa zaidi wa ujenzi mpya katika pwani ya magharibi ya Merika; "Utaalam katika meli za msaidizi na msaada kwa Jeshi la Jeshi la Merika na Tanki za Mafuta na wabebaji kavu wa mizigo kwa masoko ya kibiashara."

Kwa kipindi chote cha historia yake ya miaka 37, Roach Shipyard ilikuwa na mafanikio mengi muhimu kwa deni lake. Mnamo 1874 iliunda "Jiji la Peking" na "Jiji la Tokio", meli mbili kubwa zaidi za jumla zilizowahi kujengwa nchini Merika hadi leo na ya pili kwa ukubwa ulimwenguni baada ya majaribio ya Uingereza. Mnamo 1883 iliunda mvuke wa kwanza wa Amerika na kitovu kilichowekwa na chuma. Yadi hiyo ilichukua jukumu muhimu katika kinachojulikana kama "Kuzaliwa kwa Jeshi la New Navy" wakati iliunda "meli za ABCD" nne-meli za kwanza za Navy za Merika. Pia ilianzisha sifa yenyewe kama mjenzi wa "boti za usiku" zilizowekwa wazi kwa biashara ya sauti ya Long Island, na katika miaka yake ya mwisho, iliunda meli tatu za kwanza za Amerika kuwezeshwa na turbines za mvuke. Kwa jumla, Mto wa Delaware kazi ulijengwa meli 179 kati ya 1871 na 1908, pamoja na meli 10 za kivita za Jeshi la Merika la Merika.

Jumba la kumbukumbu ya meli ya Portsmouth Naval na Jumba la Makumbusho ya Associated Lightship iko kwenye jiji la Portsmouth, Virginia, United States Maji. Jumba la kumbukumbu linashughulikia uhusiano wa miaka 250+ na uwanja wa meli - meli ya zamani zaidi na kubwa ya majini ya Amerika iliyo kwenye uwanja wa maji wa Portsmouth. Jiji na uwanja wa meli umekuwa ukishirikiana tangu kuanzishwa kwa Gosport Shipyard mnamo 1767, ambayo baadaye ilipewa jina la Norfolk Navy Yard na hatimaye Norfolk Naval Shipyard. Historia hii tajiri inaambiwa kupitia maonyesho, mipango ya mikono na hafla maalum.

San Francisco Bay Naval Shipyard ilikuwa uwanja wa meli wa muda mfupi ulioundwa mnamo 1965 kama mchanganyiko wa San Francisco Naval Shipyard (aka Hunters Point) na uwanja wa meli wa Mare Island. Yadi zilizojumuishwa zilikuwa uwanja mkubwa wa meli wa majini ulimwenguni, lakini akiba ya gharama iliyohitajika haikuonekana, na yadi hizo mbili zilirudishwa ili kutenganisha uwepo mnamo Februari 1970. Uwanja wa meli ulitumika kwa upimaji wa mionzi wakati Merika ilikuwa ikijaribu bomu la atomiki. Tovuti hiyo imechafuliwa tangu hapo. Sasa Hunters Point Naval Shipyard ni tovuti ya Superfund, kama ilivyotengwa na Wakala wa Ulinzi wa Mazingira (EPA). Ni kazi ya Jeshi la Wanamaji kusafisha tovuti ili "viwango" vya kawaida kwa wale ambao wanaishi karibu na uwanja wa meli.

Ford (CVN-78), inayomilikiwa na kuendeshwa na U.S. Navy; chombo hiki kina urefu wa takribani mita 337 (futi 1,106), kinaondoka bandari kikiwa na uzito wa zaidi ya tani 100,000, na kina uwezo wa kubeba zaidi ya ndege 75 pamoja na wafanyakazi na marubani wapatao 4,500.

question_en: What was Frances greatest victory?
pos_context_en: The Battle of Austerlitz (2 December 1805/11 Frimaire An XIV FRC), also known as the Battle of the Three Emperors, was one of the most important and decisive engagements of the Napoleonic Wars. In what is widely regarded as the greatest victory achieved by Napoleon, the "Grande Armée" of France defeated a larger Russian and Austrian army led by Emperor Alexander I and Holy Roman Emperor Francis II. The battle occurred near the town of Austerlitz in the Austrian Empire (modern-day Slavkov u Brna in the Czech Republic). Austerlitz brought the War of the Third Coalition to a rapid end, with the Treaty of Pressburg signed by the Austrians later in the month. The battle is often cited as a tactical masterpiece, in the same league as other historic engagements like Cannae or Gaugamela.
neg_context_title_en: 1994 France rugby union tour of Canada and New Zealand
France in the Eurovision Song Contest
neg_context_en: Summer campaigns saw him not only retake, sometimes with brutal reprisals, what he had lost in the "close" season, but also seek to widen his sphere of operation—and we see him in action in the Aveyron at St. Antonin and on the banks of the Rhone at Beaucaire. Simon's greatest triumph was the victory against superior numbers at the Battle of Muret—a battle which saw not only the defeat of Raymond of Toulouse and his Occitan allies—but also the death of Peter of Aragon—and the effective end of the ambitions of the house of Aragon/Barcelona in the Languedoc. This was in the medium and longer term of much greater significance to the royal house of France than it was to de Montfort—and with the battle of Bouvines was to secure the position of Philip Augustus vis a vis England and the Empire. The Battle of Muret was a massive step in the creation of the unified French kingdom and the country we know today—although Edward III, the Black Prince and Henry V would threaten later to shake these foundations.

Austria allied with its traditional rival, France, in the Diplomatic Revolution (1756); Austria, France, and Russia were all aligned against Prussia. Frederick preemptively attacked his enemies with an army of 150,000, beginning the Seven Years' War. The Austrian Army had been reformed by Kaunitz, and the improvements showed in their success over Prussia at Kolin. Frederick achieved one of his greatest victories, however, at Rossbach, where the Prussian cavalry of Friedrich Wilhelm von Seydlitz smashed a larger Franco-Imperial army with minimal casualties, despite being outnumbered two to one. Frederick then rushed eastward to Silesia, where Austria had defeated the Prussian army under the Duke of Bevern. After a series of complicated formations and deployments hidden from the Austrians, the Prussians successfully struck their enemy's flank at Leuthen, with Friedrich once again directing the battle; the Austrian position in the province collapsed, resulting in a Prussian victory even more impressive than the one at Rossbach.

Napoleon, upon ascending to First Consul of France in 1799, had inherited a chaotic republic; he subsequently created a state with stable finances, a strong bureaucracy, and a well-trained army. In 1805, Austria and Russia waged war against France. In response, Napoleon defeated the allied Russo-Austrian army at Austerlitz in December 1805, which is considered his greatest victory. At sea, the British severely defeated the joint Franco-Spanish navy in the Battle of Trafalgar on October 1805. 
This victory secured British control of the seas and prevented the invasion of Britain itself. Prussian concerns about increasing French power led to a resumption of war in October 1806. Napoleon quickly defeated the Prussians, and defeated Russia in June 1807, bringing an uneasy peace to the continent. The peace failed, though, as war broke out in 1809, and a new coalition was soon defeated.

LeMond's unexpected Tour victory resulted in significant media attention, with sports writer Nige Tassell describing it in 2017 as "now the biggest sports story of them all". Not only had LeMond overcome a significant time deficit, he had also won the Tour after coming back from a near-fatal hunting accident. Due to its small margin of victory and exciting racing, the 1989 Tour has repeatedly been named as one of the best editions in the race's history. In 2009, journalist Keith Bingham called it "the greatest Tour of them all", while Cyclingnews.com in 2013 described it as "arguably the best [Tour] there’s ever been". American media, traditionally not overly interested in cycling, made his victory headline news and TV broadcasters interrupted their regular programming to break the news. "Sports Illustrated", who named LeMond their Sportsperson of the Year, called it a "heroic comeback". A month after the Tour, LeMond also won the Road World Championship race in Chambéry, with Fignon coming in sixth. Due to LeMond's overall victory, ADR received the largest share of the prize money, at £185,700, followed by £129,000 for PDM and £112,700 for Super U.

In France, the victory was the cause of celebration, "Le Moniteur Universel" declaring that "the combat covers the French arms with glory and shows what they are capable of". Linois was proclaimed a national hero and presented with a "Sabre d'honneur" by Napoleon. The French victory over a significantly stronger British force was an unusual event in the war during which the Royal Navy had dominated at sea. Saumarez publicly represented the battle as a victory, declaring that he had "compleately succeeded in disabling the Enemy's ships", although in private he acknowledged the defeat. Historian Richard Gardiner commented that "The well trained and led French had fought hard and skillfully and a combination of weather, luck and shore support had given them the victory against a superior force of which they had captured one. It is, however, also significant that this rare British setback occurred close inshore with all the difficulties and chanciness that implied."

The 22–8 victory on 29 June was the biggest win by France over New Zealand up to then. In the second test, on 3 July, New Zealand led 20–16 with three minutes of the match remaining. As they tried to run down the clock, Philippe Saint-André started a move in his own 22 which, 65 seconds later, ended with Jean-Luc Sadourny crossing the French line to score what became known as (the try from the end of the world), giving them a 23–20 victory. It was the first time a side from the northern hemisphere had won a test series against the All Blacks.

Rick Broadbent, writing in "The Times", said that due to his victory, Franchitti should have become "a household name" and felt that his future career prospects would be unhindered. Mike Nicks in "The Observer" called Franchitti's win "the greatest of his career", while Jim McGill of "Scotland on Sunday" noted that while Formula One was promoted as the fastest and most glamorous motorsport, he wrote of his feeling that Franchitti's victory allowed CART to showcase its more "dramatic" action. Grace remarked on the possible implications of Franchitti's success on the promotion of CART in the United Kingdom, "If that doesn't sell this sport to Britain then I don't know what will." The "Stamford Mercury & Citizen" said the sound of the cars at the circuit was "one of those sporting moments which stand up the hairs on the back of your head."

Napoleon did not succeed in defeating the Allied army as thoroughly as he wanted, but historians and enthusiasts alike recognize that the original plan provided a significant victory, comparable to other great tactical battles such as Cannae. Some historians suggest that Napoleon was so successful at Austerlitz that he lost touch with reality, and what used to be French foreign policy became a "personal Napoleonic one" after the battle. In French history, Austerlitz is acknowledged as an impressive military victory, and in the 19th century, when fascination with the First Empire was at its height, the battle was revered by the likes of Victor Hugo, who "in the depth of [his] thoughts" was hearing the "noise of the heavy cannon rolling towards Austerlitz." In the 2005 bicentennial, however, controversy erupted when neither French President Jacques Chirac nor Prime Minister Dominique de Villepin attended any functions commemorating the battle. On the other hand, some residents of France's overseas departments protested against what they viewed as the "official commemoration of Napoleon," arguing that Austerlitz should not be celebrated since they believed that Napoleon committed genocide against colonial people.

France is one of the most successful countries in the Eurovision, winning the contest five times, coming second four times and coming third seven times. France was ranked first in number of victories (either alone or tied with other countries) without interruptions from 1960 to 1993. Moreover, Amina was close to victory with the song "Le Dernier qui a parlé..." in 1991, when she finished in joint first place (with the same number of points as Sweden). Therefore, the 'countback' rule applied, but both countries had an equal number of twelve points (four lots), but the victory went to Sweden, when France had fewer 10-point scores. Today, with the new rules, France would have won the competition, because they received points from more countries than Sweden. One year before, France was also close to winning with Joëlle Ursull performing Serge Gainsbourg's song "White and Black Blues". The song finished in equal second place with Ireland's entry.
question_src: Ushindi mkubwa zaidi wa Frances ulikuwa nini?
pos_context_src: Vita vya Austerlitz (2 Desemba 1805/11 Frimaire AN XIV FRC), pia inajulikana kama Vita ya Watatu watatu, ilikuwa moja ya shughuli muhimu na za maamuzi za vita vya Napoleon. Katika kile kinachozingatiwa sana kama ushindi mkubwa zaidi uliopatikana na Napoleon, "Grande Armée" ya Ufaransa ilishinda jeshi kubwa la Urusi na Austria lililoongozwa na Mtawala Alexander I na Mtawala Mtakatifu wa Roma Francis II. Vita hiyo ilitokea karibu na mji wa Austerlitz katika Dola ya Austria (Slavkov U BRNA ya kisasa katika Jamhuri ya Czech). Austerlitz alileta vita vya muungano wa tatu mwisho wa haraka, na Mkataba wa Pressburg uliosainiwa na Waustria baadaye mwezi. Vita mara nyingi hutajwa kama kito cha busara, katika ligi ile ile kama shughuli zingine za kihistoria kama Cannae au Gaugamela.
neg_context_title_src: 1994 Ziara ya Umoja wa Rugby ya Ufaransa ya Canada na New Zealand
Ufaransa katika mashindano ya wimbo wa Eurovision
neg_context_src: Kampeni za majira ya joto zilimwona sio tu, wakati mwingine na marudio ya kikatili, kile alichokuwa amepoteza katika msimu wa "karibu", lakini pia hutafuta kupanua nyanja yake ya kufanya kazi -na tunamuona akifanya kazi katika Aveyron huko St. Antonin na kwenye benki ya Rhone huko Beaucaire. Ushindi mkubwa wa Simon ulikuwa ushindi dhidi ya idadi kubwa kwenye Vita vya Muret - vita ambayo haikuweza kushindwa tu kwa Raymond wa Toulouse na washirika wake wa Occitan - lakini pia kifo cha Peter wa Aragon - na mwisho mzuri wa matarajio ya Nyumba ya Aragon/Barcelona katika lugha. Hii ilikuwa katika muda wa kati na mrefu wa umuhimu mkubwa kwa Royal House ya Ufaransa kuliko ilivyokuwa kwa Montfort -na kwa Vita ya Bouvines ilikuwa kupata msimamo wa Philip Augustus vis England na Dola. Vita vya Muret vilikuwa hatua kubwa katika uundaji wa ufalme wa umoja wa Ufaransa na nchi tunayoijua leo - ingawa Edward III, mkuu mweusi na Henry V wangetishia baadaye kutikisa misingi hii.

Austria ilishirikiana na mpinzani wake wa jadi, Ufaransa, katika Mapinduzi ya Kidiplomasia (1756); Austria, Ufaransa, na Urusi zote ziliunganishwa dhidi ya Prussia. Frederick aliwashambulia maadui wake na jeshi la 150,000, akianza vita vya miaka saba. Jeshi la Austria lilikuwa limebadilishwa na Kaunitz, na maboresho yalionyesha katika mafanikio yao juu ya Prussia huko Kolin. Frederick alifanikiwa moja ya ushindi wake mkubwa, hata hivyo, huko Rossbach, ambapo wapanda farasi wa Prussian wa Friedrich Wilhelm von Seydlitz alipiga jeshi kubwa la kifalme la Franco na majeruhi mdogo, licha ya kuwa na idadi mbili hadi moja. Frederick kisha akakimbilia mashariki kuelekea Silesia, ambapo Austria ilikuwa imeshinda jeshi la Prussian chini ya Duke ya Bevern. Baada ya safu kadhaa za fomu ngumu na kupelekwa zilizofichwa kutoka kwa Waustria, Prussians walifanikiwa kugonga adui wao huko Leuthen, na Friedrich tena akielekeza vita; Msimamo wa Austria katika mkoa huo ulianguka, na kusababisha ushindi wa Prussian hata wa kuvutia zaidi kuliko ule wa Rossbach.

Napoleon, alipopanda kwanza Consul ya Ufaransa mnamo 1799, alikuwa amerithi jamhuri ya machafuko; Baadaye aliunda serikali na fedha thabiti, urasimu wenye nguvu, na jeshi lililofunzwa vizuri. Mnamo 1805, Austria na Urusi zilipigana vita dhidi ya Ufaransa. Kujibu, Napoleon alishinda Jeshi la Washirika wa Russo-Austrian huko Austerlitz mnamo Desemba 1805, ambayo inachukuliwa kuwa ushindi wake mkubwa. Huko Bahari, Waingereza walishinda vikali Jeshi la Pamoja la Franco-Spanish katika Vita vya Trafalgar mnamo Oktoba 1805. 
Ushindi huu ulipata udhibiti wa Briteni wa Briteni na kuzuia uvamizi wa Briteni yenyewe. Maswala ya Prussian juu ya kuongezeka kwa nguvu ya Ufaransa yalisababisha kuanza tena vita mnamo Oktoba 1806. Napoleon aliwashinda Prussians haraka, na akashinda Urusi mnamo Juni 1807, na kuleta amani mbaya kwa bara hilo. Amani ilishindwa, hata hivyo, vita ilipoibuka mnamo 1809, na muungano mpya ulishindwa hivi karibuni.

Ushindi wa ziara isiyotarajiwa ya Lemond ulisababisha umakini mkubwa wa vyombo vya habari, na mwandishi wa michezo Nige Tassell akielezea mnamo 2017 kama "sasa hadithi kubwa ya michezo ya wote". Sio tu kwamba Lemond alishinda nakisi ya wakati muhimu, alikuwa pia ameshinda ziara hiyo baada ya kurudi kutoka kwa ajali ya uwindaji wa karibu. Kwa sababu ya kiwango chake kidogo cha ushindi na mbio za kufurahisha, Ziara ya 1989 imetajwa mara kwa mara kama moja ya matoleo bora katika historia ya mbio hizo. Mnamo mwaka wa 2009, mwandishi wa habari Keith Bingham aliiita "safari kubwa zaidi ya wote", wakati CyclingNews.com mnamo 2013 ilielezea kama "utalii bora zaidi". Vyombo vya habari vya Amerika, jadi ambavyo havipendezwi sana na baiskeli, vilifanya habari za kichwa cha ushindi na watangazaji wa Runinga waliingilia programu zao za kawaida kuvunja habari. "Sports Illustrated", ambaye alimtaja Lemond Sportsperson yao ya Mwaka, aliiita "kurudi kwa kishujaa". Mwezi mmoja baada ya ziara hiyo, Lemond pia alishinda mbio za Mashindano ya Dunia ya Barabara huko Chambéry, na Fignon akija katika sita. Kwa sababu ya ushindi wa jumla wa Lemond, ADR ilipokea sehemu kubwa zaidi ya pesa za tuzo, kwa $ 185,700, ikifuatiwa na Pauni 129,000 kwa PDM na Pauni 112,700 kwa Super U.

Huko Ufaransa, ushindi ndio uliosababisha sherehe, "Le Moniteur Universel" ikitangaza kwamba "mapigano yanashughulikia mikono ya Ufaransa na utukufu na inaonyesha kile wanachoweza". Linois alitangazwa shujaa wa kitaifa na akawasilishwa na "Saber d'Honneur" na Napoleon. Ushindi wa Ufaransa juu ya nguvu kubwa ya Uingereza ilikuwa tukio la kawaida katika vita wakati Jeshi la Royal lilikuwa limetawala baharini. Saumarez aliwakilisha hadharani vita kama ushindi, akitangaza kwamba alikuwa "amefanikiwa sana katika kulemaza meli za adui", ingawa kwa faragha alikubali kushindwa. Mwanahistoria Richard Gardiner alitoa maoni kwamba "Wafaransa waliofunzwa vizuri na waliongoza walikuwa wamepigana kwa bidii na kwa ustadi na mchanganyiko wa hali ya hewa, bahati na msaada wa pwani walikuwa wamewapa ushindi dhidi ya nguvu kubwa ambayo walikuwa wamekamata. Ni muhimu pia kwamba kurudi nyuma kwa Briteni hii ilitokea karibu na ugumu wote na uchungu ambao ulimaanisha."

Ushindi wa 22-8 mnamo Juni 29 ulikuwa ushindi mkubwa na Ufaransa juu ya New Zealand hadi wakati huo. Katika jaribio la pili, mnamo 3 Julai, New Zealand iliongoza 20-16 na dakika tatu za mechi iliyobaki. Walipojaribu kukimbia saa, Philippe Saint-André alianza harakati katika 22 yake ambayo, sekunde 65 baadaye, ilimalizika na Jean-Luc Sadurty akivuka mstari wa Ufaransa kufunga alama iliyojulikana kama (kujaribu kutoka mwisho wa ulimwengu), ikiwapa ushindi 23-20. Ilikuwa mara ya kwanza upande kutoka kwa ulimwengu wa kaskazini kuwa umeshinda safu ya majaribio dhidi ya Weusi wote.

Rick Broadbent, akiandika katika "The Times", alisema kwamba kwa sababu ya ushindi wake, Franchitti anapaswa kuwa "jina la kaya" na alihisi kuwa matarajio yake ya kazi ya baadaye hayatabadilishwa. Mike Nicks katika "The Observer" aliita ushindi wa Franchitti "Mkubwa zaidi wa kazi yake", wakati Jim McGill wa "Scotland Jumapili" alibaini kuwa wakati Mfumo wa kwanza ulipandishwa kama motorsport ya haraka na ya kupendeza zaidi, aliandika juu ya hisia zake kwamba ushindi wa Franchitti uliruhusu Cart kuonyesha hatua yake "ya kushangaza". Neema alisema juu ya athari zinazowezekana za mafanikio ya Franchitti juu ya kukuza CART huko Uingereza, "Ikiwa hiyo haitauza mchezo huu kwa Uingereza basi sijui nini." "Stamford Mercury & Citizen" ilisema sauti ya magari kwenye mzunguko ilikuwa "moja wapo ya wakati wa michezo ambao unasimama nywele nyuma ya kichwa chako."

Napoleon hakufanikiwa kushinda Jeshi la Washirika kabisa kama alivyotaka, lakini wanahistoria na wanaovutia wanatambua kuwa mpango wa asili ulitoa ushindi mkubwa, kulinganishwa na vita vingine vikubwa kama vile Cannae. Wanahistoria wengine wanapendekeza kwamba Napoleon alifanikiwa sana huko Austerlitz hivi kwamba alishindwa kuwasiliana na ukweli, na kile kilichokuwa sera ya kigeni ya Ufaransa ikawa "ya kibinafsi ya Napoleonic" baada ya vita. Katika historia ya Ufaransa, Austerlitz anakubaliwa kama ushindi wa kijeshi wa kuvutia, na katika karne ya 19, wakati hisia za kwanza na ufalme wa kwanza zilikuwa juu, vita hiyo iliheshimiwa na kupenda kwa Victor Hugo, ambaye "kwa kina cha mawazo yake" alikuwa akisikia "kelele ya kanuni nzito ikielekea Austerlitz." Mnamo 2005 Bicentennial, hata hivyo, ubishani uliibuka wakati Rais wa Ufaransa Jacques Chirac wala Waziri Mkuu Dominique de Villepin hawakuhudhuria kazi yoyote ya kukumbuka vita. Kwa upande mwingine, wakaazi wengine wa idara za nje za Ufaransa walipinga dhidi ya kile walichokiona kama "ukumbusho rasmi wa Napoleon," wakisema kwamba Austerlitz haipaswi kusherehekewa kwani waliamini kwamba Napoleon alifanya mauaji ya kimbari dhidi ya watu wa kikoloni.

Ufaransa ni moja wapo ya nchi iliyofanikiwa zaidi katika Eurovision, ikishinda mashindano mara tano, inakuja mara ya pili mara nne na kuja mara ya tatu mara saba. Ufaransa iliorodheshwa kwanza kwa idadi ya ushindi (iwe peke yake au iliyofungwa na nchi zingine) bila usumbufu kutoka 1960 hadi 1993. Zaidi ya hayo, Amina alikuwa karibu na ushindi na wimbo "Le Dernier Qui a Parlé ..." mnamo 1991, alipomaliza katika nafasi ya kwanza (pamoja na idadi kama hiyo ya Sweden). Kwa hivyo, sheria ya 'kuhesabu' ilitumika, lakini nchi zote mbili zilikuwa na idadi sawa ya alama kumi na mbili (kura nne), lakini ushindi ulikwenda Uswidi, wakati Ufaransa ilikuwa na alama chache za alama 10. Leo, na sheria mpya, Ufaransa ingeshinda mashindano, kwa sababu walipokea alama kutoka nchi nyingi kuliko Uswidi. Mwaka mmoja uliopita, Ufaransa pia ilikuwa karibu kushinda na Joëlle Ursull akiigiza wimbo wa Serge Gainbourg "White na Blue Blues". Wimbo ulimaliza katika nafasi ya pili sawa na kuingia kwa Ireland.
report_src: Ushindi mkubwa zaidi wa Ufaransa (na wa Napoleon) ulikuwa Vita vya Austerlitz, vilivyopiganwa 2 Desemba 1805, ambavyo pia vinajulikana kama “Vita ya Watatu Watatu” kwa sababu vilikutanisha Kaizari Napoleon wa Ufaransa dhidi ya Mtawala Alexander I wa Urusi na Mtawala Mtakatifu wa Roma Francis II wa Austria; katika mapambano hayo “Grande Armée” ilishinda jeshi kubwa la pamoja la Urusi na Austria, kumaliza haraka muungano wa tatu na kulazimisha Austria kutia sahihi Mkataba wa Pressburg baadaye mwezi huo [1].

question_en: Does the technology for cloning exist?
pos_context_en: With the cloning of a sheep known as Dolly in 1996 by somatic cell nuclear transfer (SCNT), the idea of human cloning became a hot debate topic. Many nations outlawed it, while a few scientists promised to make a clone within the next few years. The first hybrid human clone was created in November 1998, by Advanced Cell Technology. It was created using SCNT - a nucleus was taken from a man's leg cell and inserted into a cow's egg from which the nucleus had been removed, and the hybrid cell was cultured, and developed into an embryo. The embryo was destroyed after 12 days.
neg_context_en: Since Gateway cloning uses patented recombination sequences, and proprietary enzyme mixes available only from Invitrogen, the technology does not allow researchers to switch vendors and contributes to the lock-in effect of all such patented procedures.

Cloning in "Star Wars" does not seem to use this process, and instead depicts advanced machinery that directly processes the human subject's DNA, and produces the clone or clones, by the thousands, if desired. The clones in "Star Wars" can also be genetically altered during their pre-birth phase to have their growth hormones and learning abilities accelerated, as well as their independence and self-consciousness restricted.

Certain Christians also hold that, in the act of creating a human being, his or her dignity is also upheld by the presence of a loving union between the two partners, so that "only when love exists should the creation of other persons be envisaged." Because of this, "divine creation and co-creation are similar." In the act of scientific cloning, however, the embryo is a result of the artificial union of the sperm and the egg, so that "the presence of love between the co-creators does not exist." Thus, according to this view, the dignity of the person is not upheld. Rev. Demetri Demopulos, Greek Orthodox pastor and geneticist, states, "As an Orthodox Christian, I speak out in opposition to any attempt to clone a human being because humans are supposed to be created by acts of love between two people, not through the manipulation of cells in acts that are ultimately about self-love."

Molecular cloning refers to the process of making multiple molecules. Cloning is commonly used to amplify DNA fragments containing whole genes, but it can also be used to amplify any DNA sequence such as promoters, non-coding sequences and randomly fragmented DNA. It is used in a wide array of biological experiments and practical applications ranging from genetic fingerprinting to large scale protein production. Occasionally, the term cloning is misleadingly used to refer to the identification of the chromosomal location of a gene associated with a particular phenotype of interest, such as in positional cloning. In practice, localization of the gene to a chromosome or genomic region does not necessarily enable one to isolate or amplify the relevant genomic sequence. To amplify any DNA sequence in a living organism, that sequence must be linked to an origin of replication, which is a sequence of DNA capable of directing the propagation of itself and any linked sequence. However, a number of other features are needed, and a variety of specialised cloning vectors (small piece of DNA into which a foreign DNA fragment can be inserted) exist that allow protein production, affinity tagging, single stranded RNA or DNA production and a host of other molecular biology tools.

Large archives of Gateway Entry clones, containing the vast majority of human, mouse and rat ORFs (open reading frames) have been cloned from human cDNA libraries or chemically synthesized to support the research community using NIH (National Institutes of Health) funding (e.g., Mammalian Gene Collection, http://mgc.nci.nih.gov/). The availability of these gene cassettes in a standard Gateway cloning plasmid helps researchers quickly transfer these cassettes into plasmids that facilitate the analysis of gene function. Gateway cloning does take more time for initial set-up, and is more expensive than traditional restriction enzyme and ligase-based cloning methods, but it saves time, and offers simpler and highly efficient cloning for down-stream applications.

Panos Zavos, a former professor of the University of Kentucky, at the time had plans to create human clone embryos, but he stated to the effect that Clonaid's claims were without merit and that Eve did not exist. Severino Antinori, who had worked with Zavos on the development of human clone embryos, was critical of Klondyke's announcement, and said of it that, "An announcement of this type has no scientific corroboration and risks creating confusion." Robert Lanza of Advanced Cell Technologies said that Clonaid has no record of accomplishment for cloning anything, but he said that if Clonaid actually succeeded, there would be public unrest that may lead to the banning of therapeutic cloning, which has the capacity to cure millions of patients. The Vatican said that the claims expressed a mentality that was brutal and lacked ethical consideration. The Christian Coalition of America urged a human cloning ban and saw the alleged clone baby as an "aberration".

cDNA cloning is a major technology for analysis of the expression of genomes. The full-length first-strand can be synthesized through the commercially available reverse transcriptases. Synthesis of the second-strand was once a major limitation to cDNA cloning. Two groups of methods differing by the mechanism of initiation were developed to synthesize the second-strand. In a first group of methods, initiation of second-strand synthesis takes place within the sequence of the first strand. However, the digestion of the 3' end of the first strand is required and therefore results in the loss of the sequences corresponding to the 5'end of the mRNA. In a second group of methods, initiation of second-strand synthesis takes place outside the sequence of the first strand. This group of methods does not require digestion of the 3' end of the first strand. However, the limitation of this group of method lies upon the elongation. Cloning with T7 DNA polymerase helps overcome this limitation by allowing digestion of the poly(dT) tract during the second-strand synthesis reaction. Therefore, the size of the tract synthesized with terminal transferase is not required to be within a given size range and the resulting clones contain a tract of a limited size. Moreover, due to high 3’ exonuclease activity of T7 DNA polymerase, high yield of the full-length second-strand can be obtained.

Organism cloning (also called reproductive cloning) refers to the procedure of creating a new multicellular organism, genetically identical to another. In essence this form of cloning is an asexual method of reproduction, where fertilization or inter-gamete contact does not take place. Asexual reproduction is a naturally occurring phenomenon in many species, including most plants and some insects. Scientists have made some major achievements with cloning, including the asexual reproduction of sheep and cows. There is a lot of ethical debate over whether or not cloning should be used. However, cloning, or asexual propagation, has been common practice in the horticultural world for hundreds of years.

The nature of cellular technology renders many phones vulnerable to 'cloning': anytime a cell phone moves out of coverage (for example, in a road tunnel), when the signal is re-established, the phone sends out a 're-connect' signal to the nearest cell-tower, identifying itself and signalling that it is again ready to transmit. With the proper equipment, it's possible to intercept the re-connect signal and encode the data it contains into a 'blank' phone—in all respects, the 'blank' is then an exact duplicate of the real phone and any calls made on the 'clone' will be charged to the original account. This problem was widespread with the first generation analogue technology, however the modern digital standards such as GSM greatly improve security and make cloning hard to achieve.

The case has been widely credited for exposing Clonaid, the so-called "human cloning company" as a sham. Clonaid presented itself as the scientific research laboratory of a Canadian-based religious group called the Räelian Movement. The Räelians believe that cloning technology is a gift that will provide human immortality, brought to earth by extraterrestrials. They have collected large sums of money from at least one couple, allegedly to provide them with a child cloned from one of the parents’ DNA. The legal hearings brought about by Siegel exposed the cult’s lack of credibility when they failed to produce an allegedly cloned child for the purpose of DNA testing, which would have proven whether or not the child was a clone.
question_src: Je! Teknolojia ya cloning ipo?
pos_context_src: Pamoja na kuunganishwa kwa kondoo anayejulikana kama Dolly mnamo 1996 na uhamishaji wa nyuklia wa seli (SCNT), wazo la kuunganishwa kwa mwanadamu likawa mada ya mjadala moto. Mataifa mengi waliiondoa, wakati wanasayansi wachache waliahidi kutengeneza mwamba ndani ya miaka michache ijayo. Clone ya kwanza ya kibinadamu ya mseto iliundwa mnamo Novemba 1998, na teknolojia ya juu ya seli. Iliundwa kwa kutumia SCNT - kiini kilichukuliwa kutoka kwa kiini cha mguu wa mtu na kuingizwa ndani ya yai la ng'ombe ambalo kiini kilikuwa kimeondolewa, na kiini cha mseto kilibuniwa, na ikakuzwa kuwa kiinitete. Kiinitete kiliharibiwa baada ya siku 12.
neg_context_title_src: Maoni ya Kikristo juu ya cloning
neg_context_src: Kwa kuwa Cloning ya Gateway hutumia mlolongo wa kurudisha tena hati miliki, na mchanganyiko wa enzyme wa umiliki unaopatikana tu kutoka kwa Invitrogen, teknolojia hairuhusu watafiti kubadili wachuuzi na kuchangia athari ya kufunga ya taratibu zote za hati miliki.

Kuweka katika "Star Wars" haionekani kutumia mchakato huu, na badala yake inaonyesha mashine za hali ya juu ambazo husindika moja kwa moja DNA ya somo la mwanadamu, na hutoa mwamba au clones, na maelfu, ikiwa inataka. Clones katika "Star Wars" pia zinaweza kubadilishwa kwa vinasaba wakati wa kipindi chao cha kuzaliwa ili kuwa na homoni zao za ukuaji na uwezo wa kujifunza kuharakishwa, pamoja na uhuru wao na kujitambua.

Wakristo wengine pia wanashikilia kwamba, katika kitendo cha kuunda mwanadamu, hadhi yake pia inasimamiwa na uwepo wa umoja wa upendo kati ya wenzi hao wawili, ili "tu wakati upendo upo lazima uumbaji wa watu wengine utakusudiwa." Kwa sababu ya hii, "Uumbaji wa Kimungu na uundaji wa ushirikiano ni sawa." Katika kitendo cha kupigwa kisayansi, hata hivyo, kiinitete ni matokeo ya umoja wa bandia wa manii na yai, ili "uwepo wa upendo kati ya waundaji wa ushirikiano haipo." Kwa hivyo, kulingana na maoni haya, hadhi ya mtu haijasimamiwa. Mchungaji Demetri Demopulos, Mchungaji wa Orthodox wa Uigiriki na mtaalam wa maumbile, anasema, "Kama Mkristo wa Orthodox, nasema kinyume na jaribio lolote la kumtaja mwanadamu kwa sababu wanadamu wanapaswa kuundwa na vitendo vya upendo kati ya watu wawili, sio kupitia udanganyifu wa seli katika vitendo ambavyo hatimaye ni juu ya kujipenda."

Uwekaji wa Masi unamaanisha mchakato wa kutengeneza molekuli nyingi. Cloning hutumiwa kawaida kukuza vipande vya DNA vyenye jeni nzima, lakini pia inaweza kutumika kukuza mlolongo wowote wa DNA kama vile watangazaji, mlolongo usio na kumbukumbu na DNA iliyogawanyika kwa nasibu. Inatumika katika safu nyingi za majaribio ya kibaolojia na matumizi ya vitendo kutoka kwa uchapishaji wa vidole vya maumbile hadi uzalishaji mkubwa wa protini. Wakati mwingine, neno la cloning linatumika vibaya kurejelea kitambulisho cha eneo la chromosomal la jeni linalohusiana na phenotype fulani ya riba, kama vile katika hali ya juu. Kwa mazoezi, ujanibishaji wa jeni kwa chromosome au mkoa wa genomic haimmimize mtu kutenga au kukuza mlolongo unaofaa wa genomic. Ili kukuza mlolongo wowote wa DNA katika kiumbe hai, mlolongo huo lazima uunganishwe na asili ya replication, ambayo ni mlolongo wa DNA yenye uwezo wa kuelekeza uenezi wa yenyewe na mlolongo wowote uliounganishwa. Walakini, huduma zingine kadhaa zinahitajika, na aina ya veins maalum za cloning (kipande kidogo cha DNA ambayo kipande cha kigeni cha DNA kinaweza kuingizwa) zipo ambazo huruhusu uzalishaji wa protini, tagi ya ushirika, RNA moja au utengenezaji wa DNA na mwenyeji wa zana zingine za baiolojia.

Jalada kubwa la clones za kuingia kwa lango, zilizo na idadi kubwa ya wanadamu, panya na panya ORF (fremu za kusoma wazi) zimetengenezwa kutoka kwa maktaba za binadamu za cDNA au kemikali iliyoundwa ili kuunga mkono jamii ya utafiti kwa kutumia NiH (Taasisi za Kitaifa za Afya) (k.m. Mkusanyiko wa jeni la Mammalian, http:/mgc.nih. Upatikanaji wa kaseti hizi za jeni katika kiwango cha kawaida cha lango la lango husaidia watafiti kuhamisha haraka kaseti hizi kwenye plasmids ambazo zinawezesha uchambuzi wa kazi ya jeni. Kuweka kwa lango huchukua muda zaidi wa usanidi wa kwanza, na ni ghali zaidi kuliko enzyme ya kizuizi cha jadi na njia za msingi wa ligase, lakini huokoa wakati, na hutoa laini na nzuri sana kwa matumizi ya mkondo wa chini.

Panos Zavos, profesa wa zamani wa Chuo Kikuu cha Kentucky, wakati huo alikuwa na mipango ya kuunda viini vya kibinadamu, lakini alisema kwamba madai ya Clonaid hayakuwa na sifa na kwamba Eva hakuwepo. Severino Antinori, ambaye alikuwa amefanya kazi na Zavos juu ya maendeleo ya viini vya kibinadamu, alikuwa akikosoa tangazo la Klondyke, na akasema kwamba, "tangazo la aina hii halina uboreshaji wa kisayansi na hatari zinazounda machafuko." Robert Lanza wa Advanced Cell Technologies alisema kuwa Clonaid hana rekodi ya kufanikiwa kwa kuweka kitu chochote, lakini alisema kwamba ikiwa Clonaid atafanikiwa, kutakuwa na machafuko ya umma ambayo yanaweza kusababisha marufuku ya kukomesha matibabu, ambayo ina uwezo wa kuponya mamilioni ya wagonjwa. Vatican ilisema kwamba madai hayo yalionyesha mawazo ambayo yalikuwa ya kikatili na hayakuzingatiwa na maadili. Ushirikiano wa Kikristo wa Amerika ulihimiza marufuku ya kibinadamu na kumwona mtoto huyo anayedaiwa kama "uhamishaji".

CDNA cloning ni teknolojia kuu ya uchambuzi wa usemi wa genomes. Strand ya urefu kamili inaweza kutengenezwa kupitia maandishi yanayopatikana kibiashara. Mchanganyiko wa strand ya pili mara moja ilikuwa kizuizi kikubwa kwa cloning cDNA. Vikundi viwili vya njia tofauti na utaratibu wa kuanzishwa viliandaliwa ili kuunda strand ya pili. Katika kikundi cha kwanza cha njia, uanzishaji wa muundo wa pili-strand hufanyika ndani ya mlolongo wa kamba ya kwanza. Walakini, digestion ya mwisho wa 3 'wa kamba ya kwanza inahitajika na kwa hivyo husababisha upotezaji wa mlolongo unaolingana na 5'end ya mRNA. Katika kundi la pili la njia, uanzishaji wa muundo wa pili-strand hufanyika nje ya mlolongo wa kamba ya kwanza. Kikundi hiki cha njia hazihitaji digestion ya mwisho wa 3 wa kamba ya kwanza. Walakini, kiwango cha juu cha kundi hili la njia liko juu ya elongation. Kufunga na polymerase ya DNA ya T7 husaidia kuondokana na kizuizi hiki kwa kuruhusu digestion ya njia ya poly (DT) wakati wa mmenyuko wa pili wa strand. Kwa hivyo, saizi ya trakti iliyoundwa na uhamishaji wa terminal haihitajiki kuwa ndani ya safu ya ukubwa uliopeanwa na clones zinazosababishwa zina njia ya ukubwa mdogo. Kwa kuongezea, kwa sababu ya shughuli ya juu ya 3 'exonuclease ya polymerase ya T7, mavuno ya juu ya urefu kamili wa pili yanaweza kupatikana.

Kuweka kiumbe (pia huitwa cloning ya kuzaa) inamaanisha utaratibu wa kuunda kiumbe kipya cha multicellular, sawa na kingine. Kwa asili aina hii ya cloning ni njia ya kuzaa, ambapo mbolea au mawasiliano ya kati haifanyi. Uzazi wa kawaida ni jambo linalotokea kwa asili katika spishi nyingi, pamoja na mimea mingi na wadudu wengine. Wanasayansi wamefanya mafanikio makubwa na cloning, pamoja na kuzaliana kwa kondoo na ng'ombe. Kuna mjadala mwingi wa maadili juu ya ikiwa cloning inapaswa kutumika au. Walakini, uenezaji, au uenezi wa kawaida, imekuwa mazoea ya kawaida katika ulimwengu wa maua kwa mamia ya miaka.

Asili ya teknolojia ya rununu inapeana simu nyingi kuwa hatarini kwa 'cloning': wakati wowote simu ya rununu inatoka kwa chanjo (kwa mfano, kwenye handaki ya barabara), wakati ishara imewekwa tena, simu hutuma ishara ya 'kuunganisha tena' kwa mnara wa karibu wa seli, ikijitambulisha na kuashiria kuwa iko tayari tena kusambaza. Pamoja na vifaa sahihi, inawezekana kukatiza ishara ya kuunganisha tena na kuingiza data iliyo ndani ya simu 'tupu'-kwa njia zote, 'tupu' basi ni nakala kamili ya simu halisi na simu yoyote iliyotolewa kwenye 'Clone' itashtakiwa kwa akaunti ya asili. Shida hii ilienea na teknolojia ya analog ya kizazi cha kwanza, hata hivyo viwango vya kisasa vya dijiti kama vile GSM vinaboresha sana usalama na hufanya ugumu wa kufikia.

Kesi hiyo imekuwa na sifa kubwa kwa kufichua Clonaid, kinachojulikana kama "Kampuni ya Binadamu" kama sham. Clonaid alijitokeza kama maabara ya utafiti wa kisayansi wa kikundi cha kidini cha Canada kinachoitwa The Räelian Movement. Wa Räelians wanaamini kuwa teknolojia ya cloning ni zawadi ambayo itatoa kutokufa kwa wanadamu, iliyoletwa duniani na waendeshaji wa nje. Wamekusanya pesa nyingi kutoka kwa wanandoa angalau mmoja, inadaiwa kuwapa mtoto aliyechorwa kutoka kwa moja ya DNA ya wazazi. Usikilizaji wa kisheria ulioletwa na Siegel ulifunua ukosefu wa imani ya ibada hiyo wakati walishindwa kuzaa mtoto anayedaiwa kwa kusudi la upimaji wa DNA, ambayo ingethibitisha ikiwa mtoto alikuwa mwamba.
report_src: Ndiyo, teknolojia ya cloning ipo na imethibitishwa kivitendo: kondoo Dolly alizaliwa mwaka 1996 kupitia mbinu ya kuhamisha kiini cha nyuklia (SCNT), uthibitisho wa kwanza wa uundaji wa mnyama aliyeklonishwa kutoka kiini cha somatiki cha mnyama mzima [1]; mafanikio haya yalionyesha kuwa seli zilizo na DNA kamili ya mnyama mzima zinaweza “kurudishwa nyuma” na kuanzisha maisha mapya. Kwa binadamu, jaribio la kwanza lililofanikiwa la kloni mseto liliripotiwa Novemba 1998, ambapo kiini cha mguu wa binadamu kiliingizwa kwenye yai la ng’ombe lisilo na kiini na kiinitete kikakua hadi siku ya 12 kabla ya kuharibiwa, hatua iliyoonyesha uwezekano wa kiufundi wa cloning ya kibinadamu ingawa haikufikia kuzalisha kijusi kamili [1]. Hata hivyo, sheria na maadili vimezuia utafiti huu kuendelea kwa lengo la kuunda binadamu kamili, hivyo matumizi yaliyopo leo yamejikita zaidi kwenye cloning ya wanyama na tafiti za tiba (therapeutic cloning).

question_en: How much blood is in the human body?
pos_context_en: Blood accounts for 7% of the human body weight, with an average density around 1060 kg/m, very close to pure water's density of 1000 kg/m. The average adult has a blood volume of roughly , which is composed of plasma and several kinds of cells. These blood cells (which are also called corpuscles or "formed elements") consist of erythrocytes (red blood cells, RBCs), leukocytes (white blood cells), and thrombocytes (platelets). By volume, the red blood cells constitute about 45% of whole blood, the plasma about 54.3%, and white cells about 0.7%.
neg_context_en: When referring to human feces, blood in stool looks different depending on how early it enters the digestive tract—and thus how much digestive action it has been exposed to—and how much there is. The term can refer either to melena, with a black appearance, typically originating from upper gastrointestinal bleeding; or to hematochezia, with a red color, typically originating from lower gastrointestinal bleeding. Evaluation of the blood found in stool depends on its characteristics, in terms of color, quantity and other features, which can point to its source, however, more serious conditions can present with a mixed picture, or with the form of bleeding that is found in another section of the tract. The term "blood in stool" is usually only used to describe visible blood, and not fecal occult blood, which is found only after physical examination and chemical laboratory testing.

The brain consumes up to 20% of the energy used by the human body, more than any other organ. In humans, blood glucose is the primary source of energy for most cells and is critical for normal function in a number of tissues, including the brain. The human brain consumes approximately 60% of blood glucose in fasted, sedentary individuals. Brain metabolism normally relies upon blood glucose as an energy source, but during times of low glucose (such as fasting, endurance exercise, or limited carbohydrate intake), the brain uses ketone bodies for fuel with a smaller need for glucose. The brain can also utilize lactate during exercise. The brain stores glucose in the form of glycogen, albeit in significantly smaller amounts than that found in the liver or skeletal muscle. Long-chain fatty acids cannot cross the blood–brain barrier, but the liver can break these down to produce ketone bodies. However, short-chain fatty acids (e.g., butyric acid, propionic acid, and acetic acid) and the medium-chain fatty acids, octanoic acid and heptanoic acid, can cross the blood–brain barrier and be metabolized by brain cells.

Blood vessels carry blood throughout the body, which moves because of the beating of the heart. Venules and veins collect blood low in oxygen from tissues throughout the body. These collect in progressively larger veins until they reach the body's two largest veins, the superior and inferior vena cava, which drain blood into the right side of the heart. From here, the blood is pumped into the lungs where it receives oxygen and drains back into the left side of the heart. From here, it is pumped into the body's largest artery, the aorta, and then progressively smaller arteries and arterioles until it reaches tissue. Here blood passes from small arteries into capillaries, then small veins and the process begins again. Blood carries oxygen, waste products, and hormones from one place in the body to another. Blood is filtered at the kidneys and liver.

The fluids associated with the human body include air, oxygen, carbon dioxide, water, solvents, solutions, suspensions, serum, lymph, and blood. The major body fluid which acts as the lifeline of the living organisms is "Blood". Blood is an extremely complex biological fluid. It consists of blood cells suspended in plasma and other different types of cells which include white blood cells, platelets etc. The blood flow in arteries and veins are closely linked to the blood vessel properties.
Carrying the oxygen and nutrients to various tissues and organs of our body, delivering carbon dioxide to the lungs and accepting oxygen, bringing the metabolic by products to the kidneys, regulating the body's defence mechanism, that is, the immune system and facilitating an effective heat and mass transfer across the body are some of the major functions which blood performs in the human body.
Blood consists of the red blood cells or erythrocytes, white blood cells or leukocytes, and platelets or thrombocytes. The cells which are involved primarily in the transport of oxygen and carbon dioxide are known as Erythrocytes. The cells which are involved primarily in phagocytosis (the process of destruction of unknown particulate matter) and immune responses are known as Leukocytes; thrombocytes are the components of blood which are involved in blood clotting. In addition to these 55 to 60 percent of blood by volume consists of plasma. Plasma is the transparent, amber-colored liquid in which the cellular components of blood are suspended. Plasma contains constituents such as proteins, electrolytes, hormones, and nutrients. The serum is blood plasma from which clotting factors have been removed.Blood accounts for 6 to 8 percent of body weight in normal, healthy humans. The density of blood is slightly greater than the density of water at approximately 1060  kg/m3. The increased density comes from the increased density of a red blood cell compared with the density of water or plasma. 
Rheology is the study of the deformation and flow of matter. Blood Rheology is the study of blood, especially the properties associated with the deformation and flow of blood. Blood is a non-Newtonian fluid. However, often the non-Newtonian effect is very small due to various reasons. Thus, it is important to know about the blood rheology.
One of the characteristics of blood that affects the work required to cause the blood to flow through the arteries is the viscosity of blood. The viscosity of blood is in the range of 3 to 6 cP, or 0.003 to 0.006 Ns/m2. Blood is a non-Newtonian fluid, which means that the viscosity of blood is not a constant with respect to the rate of shearing strain. In addition to the rate of shearing strain, the viscosity of blood is also dependent on temperature and on the volume percentage of blood that consists of red blood cells. If blood is made stationary for several seconds then clotting begins in the blood, as a result of which the viscosity of the blood increases. When the stationary state is disturbed with increasing shear rate, the clot formation is destroyed and the viscosity decreases. Moreover, the orientation of red blood cells present in the blood also affects the viscosity of blood. Thus, we can say that blood is a shear thinning fluid, i.e., viscosity decreases with increase in shear rate. Beyond a shear rate of about 100s^-1, the viscosity is nearly constant and the blood behaves like a Newtonian fluid. Blood is a viscoelastic material, i.e., viscous and elastic because the effective viscosity of blood not only depends on the shear rate but also on the history of shear rate.It is also important to note that the normal blood flows much more easily compared to rigid particles, for the same particle volume fraction. This is due to the fact that red blood cells can accommodate by deforming in order to pass by one another.

Blood is circulated around the body through blood vessels by the pumping action of the heart. In humans, blood is pumped from the strong left ventricle of the heart through arteries to peripheral tissues and returns to the right atrium of the heart through veins. It then enters the right ventricle and is pumped through the pulmonary artery to the lungs and returns to the left atrium through the pulmonary veins. Blood then enters the left ventricle to be circulated again. Arterial blood carries oxygen from inhaled air to all of the cells of the body, and venous blood carries carbon dioxide, a waste product of metabolism by cells, to the lungs to be exhaled. However, one exception includes pulmonary arteries, which contain the most deoxygenated blood in the body, while the pulmonary veins contain oxygenated blood.

The blood sugar level, blood sugar concentration, or blood glucose level is the amount of glucose present in the blood of humans and other animals. Glucose is a simple sugar and approximately 4 grams of glucose are present in the blood of a human at all times. The body tightly regulates blood glucose levels as a part of metabolic homeostasis. Glucose is stored in skeletal muscle and liver cells in the form of glycogen; in fasted individuals, blood glucose is maintained at a constant level at the expense of glycogen stores in the liver and skeletal muscle.

The human heart is constantly contracting to move blood throughout the body. Through larger veins and arteries in the body, blood has been found to travel at approximately 0.33 m/s. Though considerable variation exists, and peak flows in the venae cavae have been found between . additionally, the smooth muscles of hollow internal organs are moving. The most familiar would be the occurrence of peristalsis which is where digested food is forced throughout the digestive tract. Though different foods travel through the body at different rates, an average speed through the human small intestine is . The human lymphatic system is also constantly causing movements of excess fluids, lipids, and immune system related products around the body. The lymph fluid has been found to move through a lymph capillary of the skin at approximately 0.0000097 m/s.

By weight, the average human adult male is approximately 60% water and the average adult female is approximately 55%. There can be considerable variation in body water percentage based on a number of factors like age, health, water intake, weight, and sex. In a large study of adults of all ages and both sexes, the adult human body averaged ~65% water. However, this varied substantially by age, sex, and adiposity (amount of fat in body composition). The figure for water fraction by weight in this sample was found to be 58 ±8% water for males and 48 ±6% for females. The body water constitutes as much as 93% of the body weight of a newborn infant, whereas some obese people are as little as 15% water by weight. This is due to how fat tissue does not retain water as well as lean tissue. These statistical averages will vary with factors such as type of population, age of people sampled, number of people sampled, and methodology. So there is not, and cannot be, a figure that is exactly the same for all people, for this or any other physiological measure.

The blood vessels are the part of the circulatory system, and microcirculation, that transports blood throughout the human body. These vessels are designed to transport nutrients and oxygen to the tissues of the body. They also take waste and carbon dioxide and carry them away from the tissues and back to the heart. Blood vessels are needed to sustain life as all of the body’s tissues rely on their functionality.There are three major types of blood vessels: the arteries, which carry the blood away from the heart; the capillaries, which enable the actual exchange of water and chemicals between the blood and the tissues; and the veins, which carry blood from the capillaries back toward the heart. The word "vascular", meaning relating to the blood vessels, is derived from the Latin "vas", meaning vessel. A few structures (such as cartilage and the lens of the eye) do not contain blood vessels and are labeled.

In vertebrates, it is composed of blood cells suspended in blood plasma. Plasma, which constitutes 55% of blood fluid, is mostly water (92% by volume), and contains proteins, glucose, mineral ions, hormones, carbon dioxide (plasma being the main medium for excretory product transportation), and blood cells themselves. Albumin is the main protein in plasma, and it functions to regulate the colloidal osmotic pressure of blood. The blood cells are mainly red blood cells (also called RBCs or erythrocytes), white blood cells (also called WBCs or leukocytes) and platelets (also called thrombocytes). The most abundant cells in vertebrate blood are red blood cells. These contain hemoglobin, an iron-containing protein, which facilitates oxygen transport by reversibly binding to this respiratory gas and greatly increasing its solubility in blood. In contrast, carbon dioxide is mostly transported extracellularly as bicarbonate ion transported in plasma.
question_src: Je! Ni damu ngapi katika mwili wa mwanadamu?
pos_context_src: Damu ina akaunti ya 7% ya uzani wa mwili wa mwanadamu, na wastani wa wiani karibu kilo 1060/m, karibu sana na wiani wa maji safi wa kilo 1000/m. Mtu mzima wastani ana kiasi cha damu cha takriban, ambayo inaundwa na plasma na aina kadhaa za seli. Seli hizi za damu (ambazo pia huitwa corpuscles au "vitu vilivyoundwa") zinajumuisha erythrocyte (seli nyekundu za damu, RBCs), leukocytes (seli nyeupe za damu), na thrombocyte (vidonge). Kwa kiasi, seli nyekundu za damu zinaunda karibu 45%ya damu nzima, plasma kuhusu 54.3%, na seli nyeupe karibu 0.7%.
neg_context_src: Wakati wa kurejelea kinyesi cha kibinadamu, damu kwenye kinyesi inaonekana tofauti kulingana na jinsi inavyoingia mapema kwenye njia ya kumengenya - na kwa hivyo ni hatua ngapi ya utumbo ambayo imefunuliwa na - na ni kiasi gani. Neno linaweza kurejelea kwa melena, na muonekano mweusi, kawaida hutoka kwa kutokwa na damu ya juu ya utumbo; au kwa hematochezia, na rangi nyekundu, kawaida hutoka kwa kutokwa na damu ya chini ya utumbo. Tathmini ya damu inayopatikana kwenye kinyesi inategemea sifa zake, kwa suala la rangi, wingi na huduma zingine, ambazo zinaweza kuelekeza kwa chanzo chake, hata hivyo, hali mbaya zaidi zinaweza kuwasilisha na picha iliyochanganywa, au kwa fomu ya kutokwa na damu ambayo hupatikana katika sehemu nyingine ya trakti. Neno "damu katika kinyesi" kawaida hutumiwa tu kuelezea damu inayoonekana, na sio damu ya kichawi, ambayo hupatikana tu baada ya uchunguzi wa mwili na upimaji wa maabara ya kemikali.

Ubongo hutumia hadi 20% ya nishati inayotumiwa na mwili wa mwanadamu, zaidi ya chombo kingine chochote. Kwa wanadamu, sukari ya damu ndio chanzo cha msingi cha nishati kwa seli nyingi na ni muhimu kwa kazi ya kawaida katika tishu kadhaa, pamoja na ubongo. Ubongo wa mwanadamu hutumia takriban 60% ya sukari ya damu kwa watu waliokaa haraka. Kimetaboliki ya ubongo kawaida hutegemea sukari ya damu kama chanzo cha nishati, lakini wakati wa sukari ya chini (kama vile kufunga, mazoezi ya uvumilivu, au ulaji mdogo wa wanga), ubongo hutumia miili ya ketone kwa mafuta na hitaji ndogo la sukari. Ubongo pia unaweza kutumia lactate wakati wa mazoezi. Ubongo huhifadhi sukari katika mfumo wa glycogen, pamoja na kiasi kidogo kuliko ile inayopatikana kwenye ini au misuli ya mifupa. Asidi ya mafuta ya mnyororo mrefu haiwezi kuvuka kizuizi cha damu-ubongo, lakini ini inaweza kuvunja hizi ili kutoa miili ya ketone. Walakini, asidi ya mafuta ya mnyororo mfupi (k.v., asidi ya butyric, asidi ya propionic, na asidi ya asetiki) na asidi ya mafuta ya mnyororo wa kati, asidi ya octanoic na asidi ya heptanoic, inaweza kuvuka kizuizi cha damu-ubongo na kutengenezwa na seli za ubongo.

Mishipa ya damu hubeba damu kwa mwili wote, ambayo hutembea kwa sababu ya kupigwa kwa moyo. Venules na mishipa hukusanya damu chini katika oksijeni kutoka kwa tishu kwa mwili wote. Hizi hukusanya katika mishipa kubwa inayoendelea hadi kufikia mishipa miwili kubwa ya mwili, vena cava bora na duni, ambayo huteleza damu upande wa kulia wa moyo. Kuanzia hapa, damu huingizwa ndani ya mapafu ambapo hupokea oksijeni na huingia nyuma upande wa kushoto wa moyo. Kuanzia hapa, huingizwa ndani ya artery kubwa ya mwili, aorta, na kisha hatua kwa hatua mishipa na arterioles hadi itakapofikia tishu. Hapa damu hupita kutoka mishipa ndogo hadi capillaries, kisha mishipa ndogo na mchakato huanza tena. Damu hubeba oksijeni, bidhaa za taka, na homoni kutoka sehemu moja mwilini hadi nyingine. Damu huchujwa kwenye figo na ini.

Maji yanayohusiana na mwili wa binadamu ni pamoja na hewa, oksijeni, dioksidi kaboni, maji, vimumunyisho, suluhisho, kusimamishwa, seramu, lymph, na damu. Maji kuu ya mwili ambayo hufanya kama njia ya viumbe hai ni "damu". Damu ni giligili ngumu sana ya kibaolojia. Inayo seli za damu zilizosimamishwa katika plasma na aina zingine tofauti za seli ambazo ni pamoja na seli nyeupe za damu, vidonge nk. Mtiririko wa damu katika mishipa na mishipa unahusishwa sana na mali ya mishipa ya damu. Kubeba oksijeni na virutubishi kwa tishu na viungo vya mwili wetu, kupeleka dioksidi kaboni kwenye mapafu na kukubali oksijeni, kuleta metabolic na bidhaa kwa figo, kudhibiti utaratibu wa ulinzi wa mwili, ambayo ni mfumo wa kinga na kuwezesha joto na uhamishaji mkubwa wa mwili kwa mwili ni kazi kubwa ambayo damu hufanya kwa damu. Damu ina seli nyekundu za damu au erythrocyte, seli nyeupe za damu au leukocytes, na vidonge au thrombocyte. Seli ambazo zinahusika kimsingi katika usafirishaji wa oksijeni na kaboni dioksidi hujulikana kama erythrocyte. Seli ambazo zinahusika hasa katika phagocytosis (mchakato wa uharibifu wa jambo lisilojulikana) na majibu ya kinga hujulikana kama leukocytes; Thrombocyte ni sehemu za damu ambazo zinahusika katika kufurika kwa damu. Mbali na asilimia 55 hadi 60 ya damu kwa kiasi huwa na plasma. Plasma ni kioevu cha wazi, chenye rangi ya amber ambamo sehemu za damu zinasimamishwa. Plasma ina maeneo kama protini, elektroni, homoni, na virutubishi. Seramu ni plasma ya damu ambayo sababu za kufungwa zimeondolewa.Blood akaunti kwa asilimia 6 hadi 8 ya uzani wa mwili kwa wanadamu wa kawaida, wenye afya. Uzani wa damu ni kubwa kidogo kuliko wiani wa maji kwa takriban kilo 1060/m3. Uzani ulioongezeka hutoka kwa kuongezeka kwa wiani wa seli nyekundu ya damu ikilinganishwa na wiani wa maji au plasma. Rheology ni utafiti wa mabadiliko na mtiririko wa jambo. Rheology ya damu ni utafiti wa damu, haswa mali zinazohusiana na deformation na mtiririko wa damu. Damu ni giligili isiyo ya Newtonia. Walakini, mara nyingi athari zisizo za Newtonia ni ndogo sana kwa sababu ya sababu tofauti. Kwa hivyo, ni muhimu kujua juu ya rheology ya damu. Moja ya sifa za damu zinazoathiri kazi inayohitajika kusababisha damu kupita kupitia mishipa ni mnato wa damu. Mnato wa damu uko katika safu ya 3 hadi 6 cp, au 0.003 hadi 0.006 ns/m2. Damu ni giligili isiyo ya Newtonia, ambayo inamaanisha kuwa mnato wa damu sio mara kwa mara kwa heshima na kiwango cha kukandamiza. Mbali na kiwango cha kunyoa, mnato wa damu pia hutegemea joto na asilimia ya damu ambayo ina seli nyekundu za damu. Ikiwa damu imetengenezwa kwa sekunde kadhaa basi kufurika huanza kwenye damu, kama matokeo ambayo mnato wa damu huongezeka. Wakati hali ya stationary inasumbuliwa na kuongezeka kwa kiwango cha shear, malezi ya clot huharibiwa na mnato hupungua. Kwa kuongezea, mwelekeo wa seli nyekundu za damu zilizopo kwenye damu pia huathiri mnato wa damu. Kwa hivyo, tunaweza kusema kuwa damu ni giligili ya kukausha shear, i.e., mnato hupungua na kuongezeka kwa kiwango cha shear. Zaidi ya kiwango cha shear cha karibu 100s^-1, mnato ni karibu kila wakati na damu hufanya kama giligili ya Newtonia. Damu ni nyenzo ya viscoelastic, i.e., viscous na elastic kwa sababu mnato mzuri wa damu sio tu inategemea kiwango cha shear lakini pia kwenye historia ya kiwango cha shear. Ni muhimu pia kutambua kuwa damu ya kawaida inapita kwa urahisi ikilinganishwa na chembe ngumu, kwa sehemu hiyo hiyo ya chembe. Hii ni kwa sababu ya ukweli kwamba seli nyekundu za damu zinaweza kubeba kwa kuharibika ili kupita.

Damu huzungushwa karibu na mwili kupitia mishipa ya damu na hatua ya kusukuma moyo. Kwa wanadamu, damu hupigwa kutoka kwa nguvu ya kushoto ya moyo kupitia mishipa hadi tishu za pembeni na inarudi kwenye atrium ya kulia ya moyo kupitia mishipa. Halafu huingia kwenye ventrikali ya kulia na hupigwa kupitia artery ya mapafu kwa mapafu na kurudi kwenye atrium ya kushoto kupitia mishipa ya mapafu. Damu kisha inaingia kwenye ventrikali ya kushoto kusambazwa tena. Damu ya arterial hubeba oksijeni kutoka kwa hewa ya kuvuta pumzi hadi seli zote za mwili, na damu ya venous hubeba kaboni dioksidi, bidhaa taka ya kimetaboliki na seli, kwa mapafu ili kumalizika. Walakini, ubaguzi mmoja ni pamoja na mishipa ya mapafu, ambayo ina damu iliyo na mwili zaidi katika mwili, wakati mishipa ya mapafu ina damu ya oksijeni.

Kiwango cha sukari ya damu, mkusanyiko wa sukari ya damu, au kiwango cha sukari ya damu ni kiasi cha sukari iliyopo katika damu ya wanadamu na wanyama wengine. Glucose ni sukari rahisi na takriban gramu 4 za sukari zipo kwenye damu ya mwanadamu wakati wote. Mwili unasimamia viwango vya sukari ya damu kama sehemu ya homeostasis ya metabolic. Glucose imehifadhiwa katika misuli ya mifupa na seli za ini kwa njia ya glycogen; Katika watu waliofungwa haraka, sukari ya damu huhifadhiwa kwa kiwango cha kila wakati kwa gharama ya maduka ya glycogen kwenye ini na misuli ya mifupa.

Moyo wa mwanadamu unaandika kila wakati kusonga damu kwa mwili wote. Kupitia mishipa mikubwa na mishipa mwilini, damu imepatikana kusafiri kwa takriban 0.33 m/s. Ingawa tofauti kubwa zipo, na mtiririko wa kilele kwenye venae cavae umepatikana kati. Kwa kuongeza, misuli laini ya viungo vya ndani vya mashimo inasonga. Kinachojulikana zaidi itakuwa tukio la peristalsis ambayo ni mahali ambapo chakula kilichochimbwa kinalazimishwa wakati wote wa njia ya utumbo. Ingawa vyakula tofauti husafiri kupitia mwili kwa viwango tofauti, kasi ya wastani kupitia utumbo mdogo wa binadamu ni. Mfumo wa lymphatic wa binadamu pia husababisha harakati za maji mengi, lipids, na bidhaa zinazohusiana na mfumo wa kinga karibu na mwili. Maji ya lymph yamepatikana kupitia njia ya ngozi ya ngozi kwa takriban 0.0000097 m/s.

Kwa uzani, wastani wa kiume wa watu wazima ni takriban maji 60% na wastani wa kike ni takriban 55%. Kunaweza kuwa na tofauti kubwa katika asilimia ya maji ya mwili kulingana na sababu kadhaa kama umri, afya, ulaji wa maji, uzito, na ngono. Katika utafiti mkubwa wa watu wazima wa kila kizazi na jinsia zote mbili, mwili wa binadamu wa watu wazima ulipata maji ~ 65%. Walakini, hii ilitofautiana sana na umri, jinsia, na adiposity (kiasi cha mafuta katika muundo wa mwili). Takwimu ya sehemu ya maji kwa uzito katika sampuli hii iligunduliwa kuwa maji 58 ± 8% kwa wanaume na 48 ± 6% kwa wanawake. Maji ya mwili hufanya kama asilimia 93 ya uzito wa mwili wa mtoto mchanga, wakati watu wengine feta ni kidogo kama 15% maji kwa uzito. Hii ni kwa sababu ya jinsi tishu za mafuta hazihifadhi maji na tishu konda. Viwango hivi vya takwimu vitatofautiana na sababu kama aina ya idadi ya watu, umri wa watu waliopigwa sampuli, idadi ya watu waliopigwa sampuli, na mbinu. Kwa hivyo hakuna, na haiwezi kuwa, takwimu ambayo ni sawa kwa watu wote, kwa hii au hatua nyingine yoyote ya kisaikolojia.

Mishipa ya damu ni sehemu ya mfumo wa mzunguko, na microcirculation, ambayo husafirisha damu katika mwili wote wa mwanadamu. Vyombo hivi vimeundwa kusafirisha virutubishi na oksijeni kwa tishu za mwili. Pia huchukua taka na kaboni dioksidi na kuzibeba mbali na tishu na kurudi moyoni. Mishipa ya damu inahitajika ili kudumisha maisha kwani tishu zote za mwili hutegemea utendaji wao. Kuna aina tatu kuu za mishipa ya damu: mishipa, ambayo hubeba damu mbali na moyo; capillaries, ambayo inawezesha kubadilishana halisi ya maji na kemikali kati ya damu na tishu; na mishipa, ambayo hubeba damu kutoka kwa capillaries kurudi moyoni. Neno "mishipa", linamaanisha linalohusiana na mishipa ya damu, limetokana na "vas" ya Kilatini, inamaanisha chombo. Miundo michache (kama vile cartilage na lensi ya jicho) hazina mishipa ya damu na zinaitwa.

Katika vertebrates, inaundwa na seli za damu zilizosimamishwa katika plasma ya damu. Plasma, ambayo hufanya 55% ya maji ya damu, ni maji mengi (92% kwa kiasi), na ina protini, sukari, ioni za madini, homoni, dioksidi kaboni (plasma kuwa kati kuu ya usafirishaji wa bidhaa), na seli za damu zenyewe. Albumin ndio protini kuu katika plasma, na inafanya kazi kudhibiti shinikizo ya damu ya colloidal. Seli za damu ni seli nyekundu za damu (pia huitwa RBCs au erythrocyte), seli nyeupe za damu (pia huitwa WBCs au leukocytes) na vidonge (pia huitwa thrombocyte). Seli nyingi zaidi katika damu ya vertebrate ni seli nyekundu za damu. Hizi zina hemoglobin, protini iliyo na chuma, ambayo inawezesha usafirishaji wa oksijeni kwa kugeuza tena gesi hii ya kupumua na kuongeza sana umumunyifu wake katika damu. Kwa kulinganisha, dioksidi kaboni husafirishwa sana nje kama ion ya bicarbonate inayosafirishwa katika plasma.
report_src: Kiasi cha damu mwilini hufikia takriban 7 % ya uzito wa mwili wa binadamu mzima [1]; kutokana na wiani wake ulio karibu na maji (≈ 1 kg/L) [1], asilimia hiyo hushabihiana na ujazo wa lita 4–6 kwa watu wazima wengi (kwa mfano, mtu wa kilo 70 angekuwa na karibu kilo/lita 4.9 za damu).
